e̩bu-wñ me̩ta ku ma che dab ikoko almo̩nd manyʼakpo-wñ kpai ododo-wñ kado e̩to̩-wñ oka; e̩bu-wñ me̩ta kti ma che dabu ikoko almo̩nd manyʼakpo-wñ kpai o̩do̩do̩-wñ kado e̩to̩ ekeji—abe̩le̩ i che todu e̩to̩ me̩fa ki ta dufu kwef akete le̩.
Oñ ago me̩le̩ ku ma che dab ikoko almo̩nd jʼo̩la oli akete le̩ onugo, manyʼakpo-wñ kpai ododo-wñ,
akpo laño̩ dʼofe ugbo kʼe̩to̩ meji e̩ji ta kwo, abe̩le̩ i de̩ tod e̩to̩-wñ me̩fa.
Akpo-wñ kpai e̩to̩-wñ chʼalukate kpai owñ; o̩chaka-wñ chʼuko̩lo̩ ku ma nʼo̩jamalia hiolo gwu alukate.
I nʼo̩jamalia hiolo che agege-wñ mebie kpai alapa-wñ kpai e̩wñ kʼalapa le̩ ajo̩ efu-wñ.
O̩jamalia hiolo alu ta-le̩ntʼka, i du che, owñ kpai ane̩-wñ chaka.

I la nʼoli akesia che ubo̩ ku ma gu e̩wñ ki akpo le̩ jo̩ oji-wñ; ujiji-wñ chʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ʼka, unabe̩-wñ ño̩ chʼo̩hi-bo̩wo̩ʼka; akolo-wñ me̩le̩ chʼokujo̩; o̩gba-wñ la chʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ meji; igba-wñ la chʼalukate kpai owñ.
Oñ i mʼo̩jamalia hiolo ko bʼo̩la-wñ ma, tʼoji-wñ, tʼakolo-wñ daka, kpai igba-wñ; oñ i fʼo̩jamalia gwu pe̩te̩ke̩ lamʼeti-wñ daka.
I ño̩ fʼe̩lika o̩jamalia meji che todu-wñ o̩gane̩ o̩jamalia ku ma gwu pe̩te̩ke̩ lamʼeti-wñ le̩, ugbo uka-wñ meji, akolo-wñ meji, kʼi chʼugbo kʼugbo̩lo̩ oli atunyu ku ma ne̩.
I la nʼoli ake̩sia fa ugbo̩lo̩ oli le̩, oñ i fʼo̩jamalia wenyu.
I laño̩ fʼekpo ki afo̩ ku ma du bato̩la le̩ che ge̩, kpai otulale hiolo ku ma gujo kʼi nʼe̩wñ kwe̩ kwe̩ kwe̩ ki akpo che, i che alu kʼe̩ne̩ ki chʼo̩ka otulale ache.
I ño̩ nʼoli akesia che ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ge̩; ujiji-wñ chʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, akolo-wñ me̩le̩ chʼokujo̩, o̩gba-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩ta.
I la fʼigba che oji uka-wñ me̩le̩; igba-wñ la chʼalukate kpai owñ, i la nʼebijeikpa wenyʼo̩la-wñ.
Oñ i fʼe̩wñ eku ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ che chaka, ucha-wñ kpai uko̩che̩-wñ kpai ugba-wñ kpai uko̩-wñ ku ma du tatʼe̩la kpai e̩wñ kʼelulu awane̩ jʼoji-wñ: o̩chaka e̩wñ e̩ku-wñ le̩ i nʼebijeikpa che.
I la fʼebijeikpa gwu kpataka kʼi chʼe̩gudu e̩gudu dab iga tod ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, i chʼe̩hiwane̩ bʼalu-wñ te̩ tʼalumeji-wñ.
I nʼebijeikpa fʼelika me̩le̩ da todu uka me̩le̩ ebijeikpa kpataka le̩, kʼi chʼugbo ku ma ko ugbo̩lo̩ oli le̩ tunyʼu;
i la nʼoli akesia gbe̩ ugbo̩lo̩ oli-wñ, oñ i fʼebijeikpa wenyʼu.
Tak i ko ugbo̩lo̩ oli le̩ tunyʼelika ki jo̩ akolo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, ku ma ne̩. I nʼakatakpo che kʼefu-wñ ki te̩ ofo.
Oñ i nʼebijeikpa che ukpachi ugwo̩wo̩-wñ, e̩wñ ugugu-wñ laño̩ chʼebijeikpa ge̩; ogigo abobule̩ ku ma jeju jʼalugbo̩na unyabo ujeju le̩ oñ i ne̩ che.
Tak i fʼologbo-wñ bu; ukpo ku ma du bʼologbo o̩pata o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ chʼukpo line̩n ku ma hi reju kʼowu-wñ chʼe̩da bie̩, i chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu me̩lu;
oli urane̩-wñ chʼogu, o̩ka-wñ chʼogu, ebijeikpa i che; uko̩ oli urane̩-wñ kpai ugbo̩lo̩-wñ ate̩ muda chʼajifa.
O̩pata-wñ o̩wo̩ awohi ño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu me̩lu; oli urane̩-wñ chʼogu o̩ka-wñ chʼogu, ebijeikpa i che; uko̩ oli urane̩-wñ kpai ugbo̩lo̩-wñ ate̩ muda chʼajifa.
Ukpo ku ma la ta jʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje, oli urane̩-wñ chʼe̩gwa, o̩ka-wñ la chʼe̩gwa; uko̩ oli urane̩ le̩ kpai ugbo̩lo̩-wñ ate̩ muda chʼajifa.
Todu o̩gba-wñ eju olodudu-wñ, i chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje.
Ukpo-wñ o̩wo̩ʼka chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwe̩lu, oli urane̩-wñ chʼe̩ta, oka-wñ la chʼe̩ta.
Abe̩le̩ i ño̩ de̩ o̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ; o̩wo̩ emi kpai o̩wo̩ ej ano̩mo̩ alu ologbo le̩, ukpo ku ma du bu chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwe̩lu, oli urane̩-wñ chʼe̩ta, o̩ka-wñ la chʼe̩ta.
Ukpo du ku ma ko bʼologbo le̩ daka chʼukpo line̩n ku ma hi reju.

O̩ka kʼoli urane̩ le̩ atunyʼu la chʼebijeikpa; uko̩ oli urane̩ le̩ kpai ugbo̩lo̩-wñ ate̩ muda chʼajifa; ebije ku ma gwu tunyʼoji-wñ ño̩ chʼajifa, oli urane̩ ologbo le̩ du nʼugbo̩lo̩ ajifa ate̩ ta tʼomune̩.

Ukpo uro̩na alaku ologbo le̩ chʼuko̩lo̩ e̩ne̩ ki chʼo̩ka iya eche nyʼukpo odufa kpai odufa ekpikpa kpai ekpikpa kpai line̩n ku ma hi reju; ujiji-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, o̩gba-wñ, owñ chʼo̩wo̩ unabe̩-wñ, chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, owñ chʼalu kʼukpo ku ma du bʼologbo le̩ de̩.
Oli urane̩-wñ la chʼe̩le̩; o̩ka-wñ me̩le̩ chʼebijeikpa, uko̩-wñ la chʼajifa, e̩wñ ki che̩gwu tʼoji-wñ kpai ugbo̩lo̩-wñ ku ma du nʼo̩ lale ño̩ chʼajifa ge̩.
Ale uña ugugu le̩ chaka kpai e-ologbo-wñ ki lʼo daka chʼebijeikpa.
Aluka e̩wñ todu uña ugugu le̩ de̩, owñ chʼuña ugugu e-ibenu le̩, ku ma kaluka-wñ alu ku Mose̩s dʼalu ñwu ma le̩, owñ chʼuko̩lo̩ kʼabo Lifai ku ma jʼef o̩wo̩ Itamar o̩ma Aro̩n atama che.
Oñ Be̩zale̩l, o̩ma Uri kʼi chʼo̩ma He̩r abo o̩lo̩pu Juda, fʼe̩wñ du ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s chekpa.

E̩ne̩ ki la manyʼowñ chʼOholiab, o̩ma Ahisamak, kʼi chʼabo o̩lo̩pu Dan, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki akina nyʼo̩la e̩wñ, o̩ka uko̩lo̩ ehi kpai echiya nyʼo̩la ukpo odufa, kpai odufa ekpikpa kpai ekpikpa kpai ukpo line̩n ku ma hi reju i che.

O̩jamalia du ku ma ne̩ chʼuko̩lo̩ le̩, owñ chʼuko̩lo̩ uña kiafo̩ le̩ chaka, owñ chʼo̩jamalia ku ma ko wa miejo le̩, o̩chaka-wñ che tale̩nt ogu nyoke me̩la kpai she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa chi icham, owñ chʼishe̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ le̩.
Ajifa abo ku ma kaluka ef abo o̩gbadu le̩ la che tale̩nt ogu me̩lu kpai she̩ke̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼogume̩lu mebie nyʼe̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩lu alu ki she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ de̩:

e̩ne̩ʼka ne̩ be̩kaʼka tod oji-wñ, (owñ chʼukpe̩reji she̩ke̩l, alu ki she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ le̩ de̩), i chʼutodu e̩ne̩ du ki lale tef abo ku ma kaluka, e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩do̩-wñ jo̩ ogu, owñ chʼaboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ulo̩gwa nyoke meta, one̩ oli me̩gwaka nʼoji-wñ.
Ajifa alu tale̩nt ogu me̩lu le̩ la chʼutodu ku ma ne̩ da o̩ka ki jʼofe uña kiafo̩ le̩, kpai o̩ka kʼi jʼofe ukpo ugbeju-wñ; o̩ka ogu me̩lu che tale̩nt ogu me̩lu; tale̩nt oka chʼo̩kaʼka.
Taku she̩ke̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼogume̩lu mebie nyʼe̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩lu le̩ i muko chʼuko̩ todu oli urane̩-wñ, oñ i mʼu du gwu tunyʼoji-wñ, tak i mʼugbo̩lo̩-wñ ate̩ ko ta tʼo̩.
Ebijeikpa ku ma kowa miejo le̩ chʼalu tale̩nt e̩te̩gwa, manyu she̩ke̩l icham me̩ta.
E-le̩ i muko che o̩ka o̩ka todu alu o̩na unyabo ujeju le̩, kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ebijeikpa le̩ kpai ebijeikpa kpataka ki chʼe̩gudu e̩gudu ki de̩ efu-wñ kpai e̩wñ eku e-ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ chaka
kpai o̩ka o̩ka ki la jʼe̩re̩ ologbo le̩ daka, kpai o̩ka o̩ka alu o̩na ologbo le̩ kpai ale uña ugugu le̩ chaka kpai ale ologbo ki ledaka.
Oñ ma mʼodufa kpai odufa ekpikpa kpai ekpikpa le̩ ko ga e̩wñ o̩la ku ma nyi ache e̩wñ ef uña kiafo̩; ma fʼe̩wñ o̩la kiafo̩ ga todu Aro̩n; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Tak i nʼo̩jamalia kpai odufa kpai odufa ekpikpa kpai ekpikpa kpai line̩n ku ma hi reju kʼowu-wñ chʼe̩da bie̩ che e̩fo̩d le̩.
Ma la fʼo̩jamalia gwu pe̩te̩ke̩ oñ ma fʼu kpana mie̩le̩ mie̩le̩ ku ma du chiya o̩ka o̩ka nyʼodufa kpai odufa ekpikpa kpai ekpikpa kpai line̩n ku ma hi reju le̩.
Ma fʼe̩wñ ojika-wñ che ku ma du gamʼo̩; eti-wñ meji chegamʼo̩.

Ma nʼo̩jamalia kpai odufa kpai odufa ekpikpa kpai ekpikpa kpai line̩n ku ma hi reju kʼowu-wñ chʼe̩da bie̩ che e̩wñ ujiñmi e̩fo̩d ki dʼo̩la-wñ ku ma ne̩ damu mʼo̩, kʼi chʼalukate kpai owñ, uko̩lo̩-wñ chʼokate; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Taku ma fʼuko̩lo̩ okuta one̩ks le̩ che, ma fʼo̩jamalia da nyʼu, oñ ma fʼina ko̩ nyʼu alu ku ma kʼma nyʼe̩wñ uhiuko̩, alu kʼodu amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Israe̩l de̩.
Tak i fʼu gamo̩ ukpo o̩j ika e-e̩fo̩d le̩, ki che okuta urewa todu amo̩ma Israe̩l; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Tak i fʼe̩wñ ube̩do̩ma che, uko̩lo̩-wñ chʼuko̩lo̩ o̩ka alu kʼuko̩lo̩ e̩fo̩d le̩ de̩; i chʼo̩jamalia kpai odufa kpai odufa ekpikpa kpai ekpikpa kpai line̩n ku ma hi reju kʼowu-wñ chʼe̩da bie̩.
Ago̩go̩-wñ me̩le̩ chʼokujo̩; ma fʼe̩wñ ube̩do̩ma le̩ che kʼi chʼeji nʼe̩do̩ o̩la-wñ, ujiji-wñ chʼo̩chali o̩wo̩ʼka, unabe̩-wñ la chʼo̩chali o̩wo̩ʼka, e̩ji nʼe̩do̩ omune̩.
Oñ ma fʼokuta ganyʼu o̩gba o̩gba ugbo me̩le̩. O̩gbaʼka-wñ che sardius kpai topaz kpai karbunke̩l e-le̩ chʼo̩gba ejodudu;
o̩gba ekeji la che e̩me̩rald kpai safaya kpai daimo̩nd;
o̩gba e̩ke̩ta la che jesint kpai age̩t kpai ame̩tist;
o̩gba e̩ke̩le̩ la che be̩re̩l kpai one̩ks kpai jaspe̩r; ma fʼo̩jamalia danyʼokuta ugbo ki jo̩ le̩.
Okuta le̩ la jo̩ alu kʼodu odu amo̩ma Israe̩l de̩, e̩gwe̩ji i che, alu kʼodu-ma de̩; i chʼe̩ko̩ nyʼu dab e̩wñ uhiuko̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ dʼalu kʼodu-wñ de̩, todu o̩lo̩pu me̩gweji le̩.
Taku ma fʼiyagba che tʼo̩la e̩wñ ube̩do̩ma le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼiku, uko̩lo̩-wñ chʼo̩jamalia hiolo ku ma fuba;
oñ ma nʼo̩jamalia chʼagbamune̩-wñ meji kpai elika o̩jamalia meji, taku ma fʼelika meji le̩ gamo̩ akolo e̩wñ ube̩do̩ma le̩ meji.
Taku ma mʼiyagba o̩jamalia meji ku ma ba le̩ ko tunyʼelika meji ki jʼeti e̩wñ ube̩do̩ma le̩.
Ma la kʼoji iyagba ku ma ba meji ki bo̩ jane̩ tunyʼagbamune̩ meji le̩; abe̩le̩ ma fʼu gamo̩ ukpo oj ika e̩fo̩d le̩, e̩j o̩gba-wñ.
Taku ma fʼelika o̩jamalia meji da, oñ ma fʼu gamo̩ iba e̩wñ ube̩do̩ma le̩ mejeji, eli-wñ kʼi me̩ru e̩fo̩d ejefu oñ ma du ne.
Ma la fʼelika o̩jamalia meji da, oñ ma fʼu gamo̩ o̩wo̩ o̩gane̩ ukpo ojika e̩fo̩d le̩ ejefu-wñ, e̩jo̩gba-wñ me̩ru ugbo ku ma ko gbako omune̩ ate̩ ñw e̩wñ ujiñmi e-e̩fo̩d le̩.

Taku ma mʼo̩jaja odufa ko tunyʼelika e̩wñ ube̩do̩ma kpai elika e-e̩fo̩d ku ma fuji mʼomune̩, todu ki nʼoji e̩wñ ujiñmi e-e̩fo̩d le̩ kʼe̩wñ ube̩do̩ma le̩ ki we etachi bʼe̩fo̩d te̩; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
I laño̩ fʼotogbo e̩fo̩d le̩ hi, o̩chaka-wñ chʼodufa;
e̩gudu alumeji otogbo le̩ dʼalu ku ma dʼo̩fa adika ogu; ma fʼe̩gba du nʼalu e̩gudu-wñ daka, kʼi we efana.
Taku ma ne̩ odufa kpai odufa ekpikpa kpai ekpikpa kpai ukpo line̩n kʼowu-wñ chʼe̩da bie̩ ga mʼeti otogbo le̩ dab e̩ro oli ku ma do̩ ko̩ po̩me̩grane̩t.
Ma laño̩ ne̩ o̩jamalia hiolo da ilo ilo, oñ ma mʼilo le̩ ko tunyʼagbagba po̩me̩grane̩t le̩ lʼe̩re̩ otogbo le̩ daka kʼi kpe̩gwa nyu po̩me̩grane̩t le̩;
ilo kpai po̩me̩grane̩t, ilo kpai po̩me̩grane̩t nʼeti e̩re̩ otogbo le̩ daka, ku ma nyi ache e̩wñ-ma; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Oñ ma nʼukpo line̩n ki chʼe̩hi reju gʼafe̩ todu Aro̩n, kpai amo̩ma-wñ,
alawoni-wñ laño̩ che ukpo line̩n ki chʼe̩hi reju, o̩tajia ki fe̩rʼeju ño̩ che ukpo line̩n ki chʼe̩hi reju, ichaka-wñ che line̩n efufu ku ma hi reju ku ma dʼowu-wñ bie̩.
E̩wñ ujiñmi-wñ la che line̩n ku ma hi reju kʼowu-wñ chʼeda bie̩ kpai odufa kpai odufa ekpikpa kpai ekpikpa, uko̩lo̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi achiya nyʼukpo jʼo̩la-wñ; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Oñ ma fʼo̩jamalia hiolo gwu pe̩te̩ke̩ todu ike̩be̩ kiafo̩ le̩, ma la fʼolubutu ko̩ nyʼu alu ku ma kina nyʼe̩wñ uhiuko̩ kakini, EFO̩ ÑWU JIHOFA.
Taku ma fʼowu odufa daku nyʼu ku ma dʼu ji manyʼala-woni ate̩-wñ; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼuko̩lo̩ uña ugugu e-unyabo ujeju le̩ che kpa; amo̩ma Israe̩l la fʼu che teju alu du ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s; abe̩le̩ ma che.
Taku ma mʼuña ugugu le̩ ko wʼugbo Mose̩s, unyabo kpai ane̩-wñ du kpai atanyi-wñ kpai akatakpo-wñ kpai oli ugbo̩lo̩-wñ kpai oli urane̩-wñ kpai o̩ka-wñ;
kpai año̩ okolo ku ma hi ekpikpa ku ma ko bʼoji-wñ ate̩ ma, kpai año̩ e̩la omi ku ma ko bʼoji e-le̩ ma, kpai ukpo ugbeju;
kpai akpati ibenu le̩ manyʼoli ugbo̩lo̩-wñ, kpai ugugu unye̩do̩;
itebulu-wñ kpai e̩wñ eku-wñ chaka kpai akala e-eju le̩,
akete ku ma nʼo̩jamalia hiolo che kpai agege-wñ, kʼagege-wñ tala jʼoji-wñ aro̩ne aro̩ne kpai e̩wñ eku-wñ chaka, kpai ekpo todu ugane̩;
kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-o̩jamalia kpai ekpo ku ma du batʼo̩la kpai otulale ku ma gujo ki akpo kpai ukpo uro̩na tod alo̩na unyabo le̩;
ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-ebijeikpa kpai ebijeikpa kpataka ki che̩gudu e̩gudu kʼi dʼefu-wñ, oli ugbo̩lo̩-wñ kpai e̩wñ eku-wñ chaka; ukpachi ugwo̩-wo̩ kpai e̩wñ ugugu-wñ;
ukpo ku ma du bʼologbo oli urane̩-wñ kpai o̩ka-wñ kpai ukpo uro̩na alu ologbo le̩, iku-wñ kpai ale-wñ; kpai e̩wñ eku chaka ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ ef uña ugugu, owñ chʼutod unyabo ujeju le̩:
e̩wñ o̩la ku ma hi ku ma nyi ache e̩wñ ef uña kiafo̩, kpai afe̩ kiafo̩ todu Aro̩n atama le̩, kpai afe̩ todu amo̩ma-wñ, ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ amatama.
Likpa alu du ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s, alu le̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l fʼuko̩lo̩-wñ che chaka.
Taku Mose̩s fʼuko̩lo̩ le̩ li chaka, me̩ la go, ma fʼu che me̩; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu ma abe̩le̩ ma fu che. Taku Mose̩s kadua ñwu ma.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
O̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu ejodudu oñ e̩ du uña ugugu e-unyabo ujeju-i dago.
Uwe̩ ki dʼakpati ibenu tʼefu-wñ, kʼe̩ la dʼukpo ugbeju le̩ ta gba akpati le̩ eju.
Tak e̩ mʼitebulu du wʼejefu, kʼe̩ la fʼe̩wñ ki ajo̩ oji-wñ te̩ru; tak e̩ dʼakete le̩ wa ejefu, kʼe̩ fʼuna tʼagege-wñ jo̩.
E̩ ki la du ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ o̩jamalia ku ma gu otulale jo oji-wñ le̩ dago o̩gba akpati ibenu, kʼe̩ fʼukpo uro̩na ta alu o̩na uña ugugu le̩.
Tak e̩ du ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo dago o̩fe̩ o̩gba alo̩na uña ugugu e-unyabo ujeju le̩,
kʼe̩ mʼukpachi ugwo̩wo̩ du gugu agbagba unyabo ujeju kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, kʼe̩ la fʼomiofo che nyʼu.
Tak e̩ fʼologbo le̩ bu daka, kʼe̩ fʼukpo uro̩na alu ologbo le̩ ta.
Tak e̩ mʼekpo ku ma ne̩ ba tʼo̩la le̩ du kʼe̩ fʼu ba tʼuña ugugu le̩ manyʼe̩wñ du ki jʼefu-wñ; e̩ che kʼi fo̩, kpai ane̩-wñ chaka; abe̩le̩ i amud e̩wñ ki afo̩.
E̩ ki ño̩ fʼekpo batʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ eku-wñ chaka, kʼe̩ che kʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ ki fo̩: abe̩le̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ afo̩ e-efo̩.
E̩ ki laño̩ fʼekpo batʼukpachi ugwo̩-wo̩ kpai e̩wñ ugugu-wñ, kʼe̩ che kʼi fo̩.
Tak e̩ nʼAro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ wa alu o̩na unyabo ujeju, kʼe̩ nʼomiofo fʼuma o̩la gwe̩.
Tak e̩ mʼe̩wñ o̩la ki afo̩ le̩ ko nyʼAro̩n o̩la; kʼe̩ fʼekpo le̩ batʼowñ o̩la, kʼe̩ che kʼi fo̩, todu kʼi chʼatama kʼi ache e̩wñ ñwu mi.
E̩ ki ño̩ kʼamo̩ma-wñ wa ge̩, kʼe̩ kʼafe̩ nyʼuma o̩la,
kʼe̩ fʼekpo ba tʼuma o̩la, alu kʼe̩ batʼata-ma o̩la le̩, kʼama ki chʼamatama ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu mi. Ekpo ki chebatʼuma o̩la le̩ chʼutodu ugugu atama ku ma je̩ ogbegbele̩, gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-ma.
Mose̩s fʼabe̩le̩ che; alu du ki Jihofa ñwa ñw u, abe̩le̩ i che.
Oñ i lewatu ochu ejodudu ef o̩do̩ ekeji, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu le̩, ma mʼuña ugugu le̩ ko dago.
Mose̩s la mʼuña ugugu le̩ ko dago, i mʼo̩ka-wñ ko nyʼane̩ jo̩, tak i mʼakatakpo-wñ ko dago, i la mʼoli ugbo̩lo̩-wñ ko tunyʼu, oñ i mʼoli urane̩-wñ ko dago jo̩;
tak i fʼunyabo ta bʼuña ugugu le̩ ma, oñ i mʼe̩wñ e̩boma ko bʼoji-wñ ma ate̩, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Tak i mʼe̩wñ ibenu le̩ du tʼef akpati, i la mʼugbo̩lo̩ oli ko tunyʼo̩la akpati, tak i dʼugugu unye̩do̩ nyʼate̩ kʼi nʼoji akpati le̩;
tak i dʼakpati le̩ wa ef uña ugugu, oñ i mʼukpo ugbeju ko ta, i la mʼu du gbʼakpati ibenu le̩ eju; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Tak i mʼitebulu le̩ du tef unyabo ujeju, o̩wo̩ o̩pata-wñ ate̩ uña ugugu ejo̩do̩da ñw ukpo ugbeju le̩,
oñ i mʼakala-wñ ko te̩ jo̩ oji-wñ o̩gba Jihofa; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Tak i mʼakete le̩ du tef unyabo ujeju o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ uña ugugu kʼi kpejuru itebulu le̩.
Tak i fʼuna tʼagege o̩gba Jihofa jo̩; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Oñ i mʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-o̩jamalia du tef unyabo ujeju o̩gba ukpo ugbeju le̩,
oñ i fʼotulale ki akpo gujo oji-wñ; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Tak i mʼukpo uro̩na alugbo̩na uña ugugu ko ta e̩gu-wñ.
Tak i mʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo du dago alu o̩na uña ugugu e-unyabo ujeju le̩, oñ i fʼe̩wñ e̩gujo che oji-wñ kpai e̩wñ ele ku ma kowa; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Tak i mʼukpachi ugwo̩wo̩ du gugu agbagba unyabo ujeju kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, i la che omiofo nyʼu ku ma nagwʼo̩la.
Oñ Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ nʼe-le̩ gwʼo̩wo̩-ma kpai e̩re̩-ma;
e̩gba ku ma nyʼef unyabo ujeju le̩ kpai e̩gba ku ma te̩me̩rʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ma fʼu gwe̩; aluki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Tak i fʼologbo le̩ bu nyʼuña ugugu kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ daka, oñ i mʼukpo uro̩na alu olo̩gbo le̩ ko ta. Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s fʼuko̩lo̩ le̩ chekpa.
Tak akpa le̩ lewa bʼoji unyabo ujeju le̩ ma, oñ ojima Jihofa che̩ko̩ uña ugugu le̩.
Mose̩s la neke gudu tef unyabo ujeju le̩ n, todabu kʼakpa le̩ gugu oji-wñ, kʼojima Jihofa la che̩ko̩ uña ugugu le̩.
Ule̩ du ku ma le, e̩gba du ku ma mʼakpa le̩ du bʼoji uña ugugu te̩, amo̩ma Israe̩l kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩ alo̩;
i muda che̩wñ ku ma ma du akpa le̩ bʼo̩ te̩ n, maku ma chʼe̩re̩ ule̩ n gbogbo tʼo̩jo̩ ku ma mʼu du bʼo̩ te̩.
Todu akpa Jihofa le̩ bʼoji uña ugugu ma o̩ro̩ka, una la dʼefu-wñ odu, eju abo unyi Israe̩l chaka ugbo du ku ma le kade.
Jihofa la nomudala do̩ Mose̩s, oñ i dʼef unyabo le̩ ako̩la ñw u, kakini,

E̩ nako̩la ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l, kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du efu-me̩ dʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ wa ñwu Jihofa, me̩ adʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-me̩ le̩ kwef ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ abe̩k okuno̩ abe̩k ame̩wño̩re̩ egini wa ñw u.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ chʼe̩wñ kʼi du kwef amokuno̩ wa gujo, mak o̩ko̩ ki mufu i adu wa; oñ i adʼu wa alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, alu ki anyo̩ ñw u eju Jihofa;
tak i adʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼoji e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kʼi duwa le̩, oñ e-le̩ anyʼo̩ eju kʼi chʼe̩wñ uboma todu-wñ.
Tak i adʼo̩mokuno̩ le̩ kpa o̩gba Jihofa; oñ amo̩ma Aro̩n e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, amatama le̩, anʼe̩bie̩ le̩ wa ku ma ta fio̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi dʼalugbo̩na unyabo ujeju le̩ daka.
Oñ i anʼaño̩ e̩la iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ kʼi fʼu kpanya jo̩.
Tak amo̩ma Aro̩n atama le̩ akʼuna jʼoj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, ma la atʼiji jo̩ oj una le̩;
tak amo̩ma Aro̩n, amatama le̩, akʼe̩la le̩ jo̩ oji-wñ aro̩ne aro̩ne, owñ chʼoji-wñ kpai ula-wñ, oj iji ki jʼoj una ki dʼoji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩;
i muda anʼomiofo gwe̩ ifi-wñ kpai e̩re̩-wñ. Tak atama agu o̩gbo̩dudu-wñ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, owñ chʼe̩wñ ku ma duwa lʼugbo una kʼi akpo ru Jihofa.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ kʼi du wa kʼi chʼiche̩bo̩ kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini owñ chʼamala abe̩k amewo, mak o̩ko̩ kʼi mufu i aduwa.
Tak i adʼu kpa o̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ o̩gba Jihofa, oñ amo̩ma Aro̩n, amatama, atʼe̩bie̩-wñ fio̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ daka.
Tak i akpanya jo̩ manyʼoji-wñ kpai ula-wñ, oñ atama le̩ akʼo̩gbo̩dudu-wñ wa te̩re̩ jʼoji iji ki dʼoj una kʼi jʼoj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩;
i muda anʼomiofo gwe̩ ifi-wñ kpai e̩re̩-wñ. Oñ atama le̩ akʼo̩gbo̩dudu-wñ wa kʼifʼu gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩; e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo i che, owñ chʼe̩wñ eduwa lʼugbo una kʼi akpo ru Jihofa.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ kʼi aduwa ñwu Jihofa chʼame̩we̩ e̩gujo ñw u, mak amikede abe̩k amo̩mo̩ke̩te̩be̩ chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ kʼi ako wa.
Tak atama adʼe-le̩ʼka wʼugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, oñ i amʼoji-wñ lida, tak i agujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩; oñ e̩bie̩-wñ awelo wʼane̩ akolo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩;
oñ i amʼujo̩kanyi-wñ kpai edudu-wñ ko kʼi dʼu rikpolo tʼane̩ e̩re̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ, uña elulu le̩.

I agwo̩nyu ika-wñ meji kʼi fʼu fana, i muda afana nyane̩ kpa n. Tak atama agu e-le̩ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, oj iji ki jʼoj una le̩; e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo i che, owñ chʼe̩wñ eduwa lʼugbo una kʼi akpo ru Jihofa.
Oñ e̩gba kʼonugo one̩ adʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ wa che Jihofa ele mak e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ le̩ kʼi chʼomu ku ma no̩ te̩ke̩te̩ke̩; i ki dʼekpo danyʼoji-wñ, kʼi adu frankinse̩ns danyʼoji-wñ,

kʼi la adʼu wʼugbo amo̩ma Aro̩n, amatama le̩, oñ i abʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kpai ekpo-wñ nyʼo̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ kpai frankinse̩ns-wñ chaka; tak atama agu e-le̩ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi chʼukpe̩ urewa-wñ. Owñ chʼe̩wñ eduwa lʼugbo una, kʼi akporu Jihofa.
E̩wñ ele kʼi duwa le̩ ki bo̩ achʼe-Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ; e̩wñ efo̩ e-efo̩ ef e̩wñ ku ma duwa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una i che.

Oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ du e̩wñ O̩jo̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele ku ma de̩ ef una wa mak akala ku ma ma du o̩jo̩wu tʼo̩ n, e-ku ma du omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kpe̩gwanyu ekpo che, abe̩k okpukpulu ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu efu-wñ n, ku ma du ekpo tafio̩ oji-wñ.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-we̩ chʼe̩wñ ele ku ma de̩ ef anade, i ki chʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼo̩jo̩wu ma do̩ n kʼekpo chʼekpe̩gwanyu.
Uwe̩ ki fʼu kpe̩ ukpe̩ ukpe̩ jo̩ tak e̩ dʼekpo danyʼu; e̩wñ ele i che.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-we̩ chʼe̩wñ ele ku ma de̩ ef ucha, ma anʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kpai ekpo che.
Tak uwe̩ ki kʼe̩wñ ele ku ma nʼe̩wñ-i che wa ñwu Jihofa; oñ e̩gba ku ma mʼu ko wa ñw atama, tak owñ adʼu wʼugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩.
Tak atama adʼukpe̩ urewa-wñ kwef e̩wñ ele omu le̩, kʼi gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, e̩wñ ku ma duwa lugbo una i che, e-kʼi akporu Jihofa.
Tak e̩wñ kibo̩ kwef e̩wñ ele omu ku ma duwa le̩ achʼe-Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ; e̩wñ efo̩ e-efo̩ ef e̩wñ ku ma ko wa ñwu Jihofa lef una i che.
Ma anʼo̩jo̩wu che e̩wñ ele omu du ku me̩ ko wa ñwu Jihofa n; todu ame̩ agu o̩jo̩wu abe̩k iño̩ du jo ki chʼe̩wñ eduwa ñwu Jihofa lef una n.
Me̩ ki ko e̩wñ le̩ chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ ef e̩wñ-me̩ ki tʼo̩gba wa ñwu Jihofa: ma ki muda agujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ki akpo n.
E̩ ki la abʼomu ru e̩wñ O̩jo̩ du ki kwef e̩wñ ele kʼe̩ du wa le̩; uwe̩ ki la je̩ ñw omu-alo O̩jo̩-we̩ ki ña ef e̩wñ ele-we̩ n; uwe̩ adʼomu wa manyʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-we̩ chaka.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ kʼe̩wñ ejo̩ga-we̩ wa che Jihofa ele, mak e̩wñ ele ejo̩ga e̩wñ-we̩ kʼuwe̩ ako wa achʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩ etito̩ ku ma gwu etito̩ ku ma ro̩ ef una.
E̩ ki la dʼekpo danyʼoji-wñ, kʼe̩ du frankinse̩ns tʼoji-wñ; e̩wñ ele de̩.
Tak atama abu kwef o̩ka ku ma gwu le̩ kpai ukpe̩ ekpo-wñʼka manyu frankinse̩ns chaka kʼi gujo che ukpe̩ urewa-wñ; e̩wñ eduwa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una i che.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-ure̩do̩, iche̩wñ kʼi du kwef amokuno̩ wa, dagba i chʼo̩ko̩ dagba i chʼole, e-kʼi mufu, oñ i adu wa che o̩gba Jihofa.
Tak i adʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼoji e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ le̩, oñ i akpa alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju; tak amo̩ma Aro̩n, amatama, atʼe̩bie̩-wñ fio̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ daka.
Tak i adʼe̩wñ kwef iche̩bo̩ e-ure̩do̩ le̩ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una, owñ chʼaya ki bʼoj ifi-wñ ma kpai ula du ki bʼifi-wñ ma,
kpai ekpili-wñ meji kpai ula ki bʼe-le̩ ma, e-ki dʼugbo ago-wñ, kpai udo̩-nare ate̩ o̩do̩-wñ kʼi abu manyʼekpili.
Tak amo̩ma Aro̩n agu e-le̩ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ nʼoji e̩wñ ku ma duwa gujo ki dʼoj iji ki jʼoj una le̩; e̩wñ ku ma duwa lugbo una ki akpo ru Jihofa i che.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ chʼe̩wñ ure̩do̩ ki aduwa kpa ñwu Jihofa kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini, o̩ko̩ abe̩k ole, e-ki mufu i aduwa.
I la chʼo̩mala i duwa che e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ mak i aduwa che o̩gba Jihofa,
i adʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼoji e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ oñ i adʼu kpa o̩gba unyabo ujeju le̩; tak amo̩ma Aro̩n atʼe̩bie̩-wñ fio̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ daka.

Tak i adu kwef e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-ure̩do̩ le̩ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una, owñ chʼula-wñ, kpai odukulu otihi-wñ ki chʼula le̩, i abʼu ugbo o̩gbo̩lo̩ ubi-wñ kpakpa kpai aya ki bʼifi-wñ ma kpai ula du ki bʼifi-wñ ma,
kpai ekpili-wñ meji kpai ula ki bʼo ma, owñ chʼe-ki me̩ru ago-wñ, kpai udo̩nare ate̩ o̩do̩-wñ ki abu manyʼekpili-wñ.
Tak atama agu e-le̩ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi chʼuje̩wñ ku ma duwa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ chʼewo, mak i adʼu wa che o̩gba Jihofa,
i adʼo̩wo̩ nʼoji-wñ, kʼi kpa o̩gba unyabo ujeju; tak amo̩ma Aro̩n atʼe̩bie̩-wñ fio̩ o̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ daka.
Tak i adʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ kwef e-le̩ wa chʼe̩wñ eduwa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una, owñ chʼaya ki bʼoj ifi-wñ ma, kpai ula du ki bʼifi-wñ ma,
kpai ekpili-wñ meji kpai ula ki bʼoji-wñ ma e-ki me̩ru ago-wñ, kpai udo̩nare ate̩ o̩do̩-wñ kʼi abu ma-nyʼekpili-wñ.
Tak atama agu e-le̩ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi chʼuje̩wñ ku ma duwa lugbo una, todu ki kpo. Ula du chʼe-Jihofa.
O̩da ki adago o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩ ef unyi-me̩ du de̩, kakini, Dagba i chʼula, dagba i chʼe̩bie̩, me̩ ki je̩ n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du dure kʼi ma gwejugode n, ef uko̩ du ki Jihofa te̩ ka ku ma ki che n, kʼi la fʼokate-wñ che,
i la che̩wñ kʼi chʼatama ku ma bʼekpo tʼoji kʼi dure, kʼi fʼudu fa wa abʼoji amone̩ le̩ ma, e̩gbale̩, i ki dʼo̩mo̩kokuno̩ kʼi mufu, wa ñwu Jihofa kʼi mud e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure tod edure kʼi dure le̩.
Oñ i adʼo̩kokuno̩ le̩ wa alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju o̩gba Jihofa, kʼi dʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼoji o̩kokuno̩ le̩ kʼi fʼo̩kokuno̩ le̩ kpa o̩gba Jihofa.
Tak atama ku ma fʼekpo ba tʼoji le̩ achʼe̩bie̩ o̩kokuno̩ le̩ wʼunyabo ujeju;
tak atama adʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ tunyʼe̩bie̩ le̩, oñ i atʼe̩bie̩-wñ fio̩ o̩gba Jihofa onu mebie, owñ chʼo̩gba ukpo ugbeju uña kiafo̩ le̩.

Tak atama achʼe̩bie̩ le̩ kado igba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-e̩wñ ki akpo o̩gba Jihofa le̩, owñ chʼe-ki dʼef unyabo ujeju le̩, tak i adʼe̩bie̩ o̩kokuno̩ ki bo̩ le̩ dajane̩ e̩re̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kʼi dago alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju le̩.
Tak i akʼula o̩kokuno̩ e-iche̩bo̩ adure le̩ chaka bʼo̩ te̩, aya ki bʼoj ifi-wñ ma, kpai ula ki bʼoj ifi-wñ ma chaka,
kpai ekpili-wñ meji kpai ula ki bʼo ma e-ki meru ago-wñ, oñ i abu udo̩nare ate̩ o̩do̩-wñ manyʼekpili-wñ,
(alu ku ma bu e̩la o̩kokuno̩ iche̩bo̩ e-ure̩do̩ le̩), tak atama agu e-le̩ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩.
Año̩ o̩kokuno̩ le kpai e̩la-wñ chaka manyʼoji-wñ kpʼe̩re̩-wñ kpai ifi-wñ kpai echu-wñ,
owñ chʼo̩gbo̩dudu o̩kokuno̩ le̩, i ako kwef uru dufu tʼugbo ki de̩ hiolo, ugbo ku ma kʼelulu dajo̩, oñ i anʼuna fʼu gujo o̩j iji; ugbo ku ma kʼelulu dajo̩ o̩mo̩ ma agujo.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka dure ku ma ma gwejugede n, kʼe̩wñ le̩ maja bʼeju abujeju te̩, ku ma la che e̩wñ okate ef uko̩ du ki Jihofa te̩ ñwu ma kʼama ki we eche,
e̩gba ku ma fʼadure ku ma ta le̩ ma tak abujeju le̩ adʼo̩mʼo̩kokuno̩ wa todu iche̩bo̩ adure, ma la adʼu wʼo̩gba unyabo ujeju le̩;
tak abogijo o̩gbadu akʼo̩wo̩-ma nʼoji o̩kokuno̩ le̩ o̩gba Jihofa o̩mo̩, taku ma adʼo̩kokuno̩ le̩ kpa o̩gba Jihofa.
Oñ atama ku ma fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji ane̩ e̩bie̩ o̩kokuno̩ le̩ wʼugbo unyabo ujeju,
tak atama adʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ tunyʼe̩bie̩ le̩ kʼi tafio̩ o̩gba Jihofa onu mebie, o̩gba ukpo ugbeju le̩.
Oñ i achʼe̩bie̩ le̩ kado igba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi dʼalugbo̩na unyabo ujeju o̩gba Jihofa le̩; tak i adʼe̩bie̩-wñ ki bo̩ dajane̩ e̩re̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kʼi dago alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju.
Tak i akʼula-wñ chaka kwo bʼe̩la-wñ te̩, oñ i agu e-le̩ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ i ache kpai o̩kokuno̩ le̩; alu kʼi che kpai o̩kokuno̩ e-iche̩bo̩ adure le̩, alu le̩ i ache kpai e-i; oñ atama ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu ma, taku ma ato̩no̩ ñwu ma.
Tak i adʼo̩kokuno̩ le̩ kwef uru dufu, kʼi gʼu jo alu kʼi gu o̩kokuno̩ ejodudu le̩ jo; e-le̩ chʼiche̩bo̩ adure todu abujeju le̩.
E̩gba kʼidachiʼka dure kʼi ma gwejugede n, kʼi che e̩wñʼka ef uko̩ du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ te̩ ñwu ma ku ma ki we eche, kʼi la fʼabi-wñ je̩,
iche̩wñ kʼadure kʼi ta le̩ kwodufu ñw u, e̩wñ O̩jo̩ kʼi aduwa achʼo̩mʼewo kʼi chʼobuko̩ ki mufu,
i la adʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼoji omʼewo le̩ kʼi fʼu kpa uña ugbo ku ma kpa e̩wñ eduwa gujo o̩gba Jihofa le̩; iche̩bo̩ adure i che.
Tak atama adʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ chʼe̩bie̩ kwef e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure le̩ kʼi la adʼu kado igba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩, tak i dʼe̩bie̩-wñ kibo̩ dajane̩ e̩re̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo.
Oñ i agu ula-wñ chaka jo oji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, alu kʼi che ula iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ le̩; abe̩le̩ atama ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ tod adure-wñ le̩, taku ma ato̩no̩ ñw u.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩no̩talaka dure kʼi ma gwejugede n, kʼi fʼe̩wñʼka che efu uko̩ du ku Jihofa te̩ ñwu ma ku ma we eche, kʼi la fʼabi je̩,
e̩gba kʼi fʼadure kʼi ta le̩ ma, i adʼewo wa kʼi chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ, owñ chʼole kʼi mufu, tod edure kʼi dure.
Tak i adʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼoji e̩la iche̩bo̩ adure le̩, kʼi akpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure uña ugbo ku ma kpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩.
Tak atama adʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ chʼe̩bie̩ le̩ kado igba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kʼi la dʼe̩bie̩-wñ kibo̩ dajane̩ e̩re̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩.
Tak i akʼula-wñ chaka bʼo̩ te̩ alu ku ma kʼula kwo̩la e̩la iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ le̩, oñ atama agu e-le̩ jo oji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi kporu Jihofa; atama la achʼe̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ, taku ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u.
I la che̩wñ kʼi dʼo̩mala wa kʼi chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ todu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure, mak ole kʼi mufu i aduwa,
oñ i adʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼoji e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure le̩, kʼi dʼu kpa uña ugbo ku ma kpa e̩wñ eduwa gujo, kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure.
Tak atama adʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ chʼe̩bie̩ le̩ kado igba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, oñ i adʼe̩bie̩-wñ kibo̩ dajane̩ e̩re̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩.

Ula-wñ du i la ako kwʼo̩la-wñ, alu ku ma kʼula ala kwʼo̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ le̩, tak atama agu e-le̩ jo oji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ oji e̩wñ ku ma du wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una; atama le̩ la ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ tod edure kʼi dure, taku ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du dure, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma fʼO̩jo̩ kpenʼo, ugbo e̩wñ kʼowñ onugo chʼe̩nibenu-wñ, abe̩k eli i li, abe̩k inabali-wñ i gbo̩, kʼi ma ka n, mak owñ onugo anʼudu-wñ.
Abe̩k e̩ne̩ʼka do̩wo̩kado e̩wñ elifo̩, dagba i chʼoku e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ elifo̩, abe̩k oku e̩wñ iñmi elifo̩, abe̩k oku e̩wñ elifo̩ ki afa ane̩pe̩te̩, kʼi ma la ma n, kʼo̩la-wñ mudaji, mak i ajabi.
Abe̩k i do̩wo̩kado e̩wñ elifo̩ ki dʼo̩la one̩, alu du kʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ki dʼo̩la one̩ ji le̩ de̩, kʼi ma la ma n, e̩gba kʼi ma, mak i fʼabi je̩.

Abe̩k one̩ nʼalu-wñ go̩ tebitele ofo kʼi ache e̩wñ bibi, abe̩k i ache e̩wñ e̩nyo̩, e̩wñ du ki che kʼone̩ aka tebitele tak i fʼO̩jo̩ kpe nʼo̩la-wñ kʼi ma la ma n, e̩gba kʼi ma, mak i fʼabi e-du kʼi che le̩ je̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼone̩ fʼabi e̩wñ-iʼka je̩, i ki gbalu adure kʼi ta,

tak i adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi-wñ wa ñwu Jihofa tod edure kʼi dure, i adʼoleʼka kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini wa, dagba i chʼala abe̩k ewo, kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure; tak atama ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod u wñ tod adure-wñ.

I la che̩wñ kʼo̩ko̩-wñ ma bʼe̩wño̩re̩ egini jo̩ n, mak i ki kʼamikede meji, abe̩k amo̩mʼo̩ke̩te̩be̩ meji wa chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi-wñ ñwu Jihofa tod edure kʼi dure le̩, oka chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ adure, ekeji la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo.
I ki mʼu ko wʼugbo atama, tak owñ le̩ adʼe-ki chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ adure wa che ejodudu; i ki mʼojʼ-wñ lida bʼo̩lo̩-wñ te̩, i muda ako̩da tinyo̩ n,
tak i achʼe̩bie̩ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure le̩ kʼi du tafio̩ nyʼakolo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ oñ e̩bie̩-wñ ki bo̩ awelo wʼane̩ e̩re̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩; iche̩bo̩ adure i che.
Tak i adʼekeji wa che iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo alu ku ma dʼoji-wñ te̩ le̩; oñ atama ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ, tod edure kʼi dure, taku ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u.

I muda che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ma tu ikede meji abe̩k o̩mʼo̩ke̩te̩be̩ meji n, mak e̩gbale̩ e̩ne̩ ki dure le̩ adʼe̩kpe̩gwa e̩fa omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ wa chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ tod iche̩bo̩ adure; i adʼekpo du tʼoji-wñ n, i la adu frankinse̩ns tʼoji-wñ n, todu iche̩bo̩ adure i che.
I la adʼu wʼugbo atama, tak atama adʼe̩ko̩ o̩wo̩-wñʼka kwefu-wñ ki chʼukpe̩ urewa-wñ, oñ i agʼu jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, manyʼe̩wñ ku ma ko wa ñwu Jihofa lʼugbo una le̩; e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure i che.
Abe̩le̩ atama ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ tod edure kʼi dure ugbo e̩wñ-i du, taku ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u. E̩bo̩bo̩-wñ chʼe-atama, alu ki de̩ ugbo e̩wñ ele ku ma duwa le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du fʼudu fe̩ ef e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-Jihofaʼka, kʼi dure ki ma la ma n; e̩gbale̩ i adʼokolo kʼi mufu kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini wa chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-abi-wñ kʼi je̩, uwe̩ ki fʼalaja-wñ ñwa alu ku she̩ke̩l ajifa e-uña kiafo̩ de̩; iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ i che.

I año̩ dʼe̩wñ akoji-wñ wa tod edure kʼi dure ef e̩wñ ki afo̩ le̩, i ñʼadʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩lu nʼoji-wñ kʼi adʼe-le̩ ñw atama; tak atama adʼokolo iche̩bo̩ abi le̩ che e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ, taku ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du dure kʼi la chʼe̩wñʼka ku Jihofa tuko̩ ñwu ma ku ma ki we eche, dagba i ma chaka ma n, i muda ajabi kpo̩, i la anʼudu-wñ.
I ki dʼokolo ki mufu kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini wa ñw atama alu kʼe̩ dʼalaja udu kʼi fe̩ te̩, oñ atama ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod uwñ tod edure kʼi dure kʼi ma la ma n, taku ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u.
E̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-abi kʼi je̩ i che; i fʼabi je̩ eju Jihofa.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du dure kʼi fʼudu Jihofa fe̩ ugbo o̩wo̩ edu yʼekeji-wñ eju ugbo e̩wñ kʼi du nyʼu o̩wo̩, abe̩k uhio̩-wo̩, abe̩k oji e̩ji, abe̩k i chʼekeji-wñ afuma,
abe̩k i fe̩wñ ki lenyo̩ ye, kʼi la rʼo̩lemi efu-wñ, kʼi la go̩ o̩lemi ef e̩wñ du kʼone̩ ache kʼi adure efu-wñ,
e̩gba kʼone̩ dure kʼi fʼabi je̩, tak i adʼe̩wñ kʼi gba oji le̩ dabiwa, abe̩k e̩wñ kʼi gba afuma, abe̩k e̩wñ ku ma du nyʼu o̩wo̩, abe̩k e̩wñ ki lenyo̩ kʼi fuye,
abe̩k e̩wñ du ki che kʼi go̩ olemi ugbo-wñ; i adʼe̩wñ le̩ dabiwa kʼoji chaka, i año̩ dʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩lu mʼo̩ kʼi du ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi ne̩ eñini eñini kʼi chʼiche̩bo̩ abi-wñ.
Tak i adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-abi eje̩ Jihofa wa ñw atama, owñ chʼokolo ki mufu kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini, alu kʼe̩ dʼalaja e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi te̩.
Oñ atama ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ o̩gba Jihofa, taku ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u ugbo e̩wñ du kʼone̩ ache kʼi ajʼabi.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

E̩ nañwa ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ kakini, E̩wñ ki chʼuko̩-o̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ de̩. E̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ ajʼoj igbeli oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kwʼodu gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩, ma la adejutʼuna-wñ ki najo̩ waa.

Tak atama adʼikagwoji-wñ e-line̩n efufu tʼo̩la, kʼi la mʼichaka-wñ e-line̩n efufu ko̩ nyʼo̩la, tak i akʼelulu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kʼuna fʼu lie̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, kʼi kʼo jʼane̩ e̩re̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ o̩wo̩ʼka.
Tak i agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ jʼane̩, kʼi mʼe̩wñ o̩la omune̩ ko̩ nyi, kʼi kʼelulu le̩ kwef uru dufu tʼugbo ki de̩ hiolo.

Ma ki dejutʼuna oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ kʼi najo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, i ki lu n; atama la agu iji jo oji-wñ odudu o̩jo̩ du, i la akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo jʼoji-wñ aro̩ne aro̩ne, i la ñʼagu ula e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ jo oji-wñ ge̩.
Una ki najo oji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩; i ki lu n.
E̩wñ ki la chʼuko̩-o̩la e̩wñ ele le̩ de̩. Amo̩ma Aro̩n adʼe-le̩ wa che o̩gba Jihofa, o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩.

Tak e̩ne̩ʼka-ma adʼe̩ko̩ o̩wo̩ʼka kwef omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ e-e̩wñ ele le̩, manyʼekpo-wñ kpai frankinse̩ns ki dʼoji e̩wñ ele le̩ chaka, kʼi la fʼe-le̩ gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi kpo ru Jihofa, kʼi chʼukpe̩ urewa-wñ.
E̩bo̩bo̩-wñ Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ aje̩; ma adʼo̩jo̩wu tʼo̩ n, ma la aje̩ ef uña kiafo̩ʼka; efu ologbo unyabo ujeju le̩ ma aje̩.
Ma adʼo̩jo̩wu tʼo̩ taku ma adʼe̩ n. U mʼe-le̩ du chʼukpe̩ e-ma ef e̩wñ ku ma duwa ñwu mi lʼugbo una; e̩wñ efo̩ e-efo̩ i che, alu kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure kpai e-abi eje̩ de̩.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ef amo̩ma Aro̩n aje̩, kʼi chʼukpe̩ e-ma ogbegbele̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩, ef e̩wñ eduwa ñwu Jihofa lʼugbo una, e̩ne̩ du kʼi kadʼo afo̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

E̩wñ O̩jo̩ kʼAro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ aduwa ñwu Jihofa o̩jo̩ ku ma fʼekpo ba tʼuma oji de̩: owñ chʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩gwa e̩fa omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼi mud e̩wñ ele eduwa ño̩ duwa o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, ukpe̩reji-wñ chʼe-odudu, ukpe̩-reji-wñ chʼe-ane̩.
Ma adʼekpo tʼo̩ ade̩ ef anade; e̩gba kʼi fʼu ñmo̩ nyʼo̩la tak e̩ dʼu wa ejefu; e̩ko̩da e̩ro-wñ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ ele, e̩ dʼu wa ñwu Jihofa kʼi kpo rʼu.
Oñ atama kʼi dʼef amo̩ma Aro̩n ku ma fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji kʼi akoji-wñ adʼu wa; e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ ogbegbele̩ i che; ma agu o̩chaka-wñ jo ñwu Jihofa.
Ma ki gu e̩wñ ele atama du jo hiele, ma ki je̩ e-le̩ n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

E̩ ki ka ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kakini, E̩wñ ki la chʼuko̩-o̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure de̩. Ugbo ku ma kpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, o̩mo̩ ma akpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure o̩gba Jihofa; e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ i che.
Atama ki adʼu wa che tod adure, owñ le̩ aje̩; ef uña kiafo̩ oñ ma aje̩ e-le̩, ef ologbo unyabo ujeju.
E̩wñ du ki kado e̩la-wñ afo̩; e̩gba kʼe̩bie̩ le̩ ta nyʼe̩wñ o̩laʼka, e̩ ki fʼe̩wñ kʼi ta nyʼu le̩ gwe̩ ef uña ki afo̩.
Tak ama ki kpʼucha ku ma gwe̩ nyʼu fo̩; i muda che̩wñ ku ma fʼu hi ef ucha ebije ikpa, ma afʼe-le̩ deli, ku ma fʼu larinyo̩ ef omiofo.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du kʼi dʼef amatama aje̩ e-le̩; e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ i che.
Ma muda aje̩ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure du ku ma dʼe̩bie̩-wñ wʼef unyabo ujeju ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ e̩boma ef uña ki afo̩ le̩ n; ma anʼuna gu e-le̩ jo.
Uko̩o̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩ de̩. E̩wñ ki afo̩ e-efo̩ i che;
ugbo ku ma kpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, o̩mo̩ ama ki kpa e̩wñ iche̩be̩ abi eje̩; kʼama ki dʼe̩bie̩-wñ tafio̩ o̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ daka.
I ako ula-wñ chaka wa, otihi-wñ ki yoyo kpai aga-wñ kʼi bʼifu-wñ ma
kpai ekpili-wñ meji manyʼula ki dʼo̩la-wñ, e-ki me̩ru ago-wñ, kpai udo̩nare ate̩ o̩do̩-wñ kʼi abu manyʼekpili-wñ;
atama agu e-le̩ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi mud e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ku ma du wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una. Iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩, i che.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ef amatama aje̩ e-le̩; ma aje̩ ef uña kiafo̩; e̩wñ efo̩ e-efo̩ i che.
Alu kʼiche̩bo̩ adure de̩ abe̩le̩ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ de̩; uko̩-o̩la e̩wñ meji le̩ chʼokate; atama kʼi nʼache e̩wñ e̩boma, owñ le̩ ane̩.
Oñ atama ki adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e̩ne̩ du wa, atama le̩ ane̩ año̩ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kʼi duwa le̩.
E̩wñ ele du ku ma ro̩ ef igbeli kpai e-ku ma de̩ ef ucha abe̩k anade, atama ki adʼu wa ane̩ e-le̩.
E̩wñ ele du dagba kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu, dagba kʼi chʼe-e̩gbe̩, amo̩ma Aro̩n e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ chaka ane̩, alu kʼoka ne̩ ekeji ane̩.
Uko̩o̩la, alu ku ma kpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la de̩, owñ chʼe-kʼone̩ aduwa ñwu Jihofa.

I la che̩wñ kʼi dʼu wa kʼi chʼe̩wñ ugwa, mak i ki ñʼakʼakala kʼo̩jo̩wu ma dʼo̩ n e-kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu kpai o̩kpukpulu ku ma bʼekpo tʼoji kpai akala ku ma nʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ che kʼi fʼekpo ñmo̩ nyʼo̩la wa manyʼe̩wñ ugwa ki adu wa le̩.
I akʼakala kʼi chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ kʼo̩jo̩wu dʼo̩ wa manyʼiche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ugwa-wñ.
Ab i fʼabe̩i che i adʼo̩ko̩ke̩ kwef e̩wñ O̩jo̩ okoke kʼi ko wa le̩ chʼe̩wñ edu nyʼate̩ ñwu Jihofa; atama kʼi afiʼe̩bie̩ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ anʼe-le̩.
Ma la aje̩ e̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-ure̩do̩ kʼi kpa tod ugwa o̩jo̩ kʼi du e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ wa le̩; i atʼe-du no̩ nyʼodudu n.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ le̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼi doji, abe̩k e̩wñ ki gʼe̩do̩la-wñ du wa, maku ma aje̩ o̩jo̩ kʼi dʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩-wñ wa le̩, ma la aje̩ e̩bo̩bo̩-wñ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ,
ama e̩la iche̩bo̩ le̩ ki bo̩ nyʼo̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ ma agʼujo ef una.
I la che̩wñ ku ma fʼe̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-wñ je̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ re i anyʼo̩ eju n, i anʼile ñw e̩ne̩ ki dʼu wa n; e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ i che̩, oñ e̩ne̩ du ki je̩ anʼudu-wñ.
Ma ajʼe̩la du ki kado e̩wñ e̩daji n; ma agu e-le̩ jo ef una. E̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ aje̩ e̩la-wñ.
Ama onugo e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ daji kʼi fʼe̩la iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ Jihofa je̩, ma ki kʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼabo-wñ te̩.

I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ e̩daji kwokadʼone̩, dagba kʼi chʼe̩daji e-one̩ dagba kʼi chʼe̩daji e-e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, abe̩k e̩wñ elifo̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ e̩do̩fulu du ki achʼone̩ ire̩, tak i fʼe̩la iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ e-Jihofa je̩, ma akʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼabo-wñ te̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, Me̩ ki je̩ ula du n, tʼe-o̩kokuno̩, tʼe-ala, tʼe-ewo.
Me̩ neke dʼula e̩la ki leku, kpai ula e̩la kʼame̩la fufana, che e̩wñ omune̩ ojoji du; i muda nʼugbo du ku me̩ aje̩ n.
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi je̩ ula e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kʼi dʼef ame̩la ku ma du che Jihofa lugbo una, onugo e̩ne̩ du ki je̩, ma ako̩da bʼamone̩-wñ te̩.
Alu du ki de̩ ugbo du ku me̩ jo̩ me̩ ki je̩ e̩bie̩ n dagba i chʼe-e̩we̩, dagba kʼi chʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ki dʼef unyi-me̩.
E̩ne̩ kʼi fʼe̩bie̩ je̩, ma akʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼamone̩-wñ te̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, E̩ne̩ ki adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa ñwu Jihofa, ki kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ wa ñwu Jihofa kwef e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-wñ.
E̩ne̩ le̩ anʼo̩wo̩-wñ onugo kʼe̩wñ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una; i akʼula manyʼache̩do̩-wñ wa, todu ku ma dʼache̩do̩ le̩ wa miejo, kʼi mud e̩wñ eduwa miejo o̩gba Jihofa.
Atama la agu ula-wñ jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, ache̩do̩-wñ muda chʼe-Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ.
Me̩ ki dʼo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ ñw atama ki mud e̩wñ edu nyʼate̩ ñw u, kwef e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ ku me̩ kpa ñw u;
o̩ma Aro̩n ki dʼe̩bie̩ kpai ula iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ le̩ wa anʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ e̩la le̩ ki chʼukpe̩ e-wñ.

Todu omi mʼache̩do̩ e-emiejo kpai o̩wo̩ ku ma du nyʼate̩ le̩ gba ugbo amo̩ma Israe̩l kwef e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ ku ma che, oñ u mʼu ko ñw Aro̩n atama kpai amo̩ma-wñ, kʼi mud ukpe̩ e-ma kwugbo amo̩ma Israe̩l ogbegbele̩.
E-le̩ mud ukpe̩ Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ef e̩wñ eduwa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una, o̩jo̩ kʼi bʼekpo tʼuma o̩la kʼi la ko ma jo̩ ku ma che e̩wñ amatama ñwu Jihofa;
Jihofa ñwa ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l ku ma kʼe-le̩ ñwu ma, o̩jo̩ kʼi fʼekpo ba tʼuma o̩la le̩. Ukpe̩ e-ma i che gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-ma.
Uko̩o̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e-e̩wñ ele kpai e-iche̩bo̩ adure kpai iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ kpʼe-e̩wñ eko nyʼo̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ kpai iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩;
owñ chʼe-ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s oj uwo Sainai o̩jo̩ kʼi ñwa ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l ku ma ki kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-ma wa ñwu Jihofa aje̩tachi Sainai le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
MʼAro̩n manyʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai e̩wñ o̩la-ma kpai ekpo ku ma ba tʼo̩la kpai o̩kokuno̩ e-iche̩bo̩ adure kpai amokolo meji kpai agba kʼakala kʼo̩jo̩wu ma do̩ n jʼefu-wñ le̩ ko;
kʼe̩ fʼo̩gbadu chaka do̩ wʼalugbo̩na unyabo ujeju.
Taku Mose̩s che alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñw u; oñ o̩gbadu le̩ jeju jʼalugbo̩na unyabo ujeju le̩.
Taku Mose̩s ka ñw o̩gbadu le̩ kakini, E̩wñ ki Jihofa ñwa kʼa che de̩.
Taku Mose̩s mʼAro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ko wa, oñ i nʼomiofo fʼuma o̩la gwe̩.

Tak i mʼafe̩ le̩ du tʼo̩ o̩la, i la me̩wñ ujiñmi le̩ du jʼo̩ iñmi, oñ i mʼotogbo le̩ du tʼo̩ o̩la, i la mʼe̩fo̩d du tʼo̩ o̩la, tak i du ujiñmi tod e̩fo̩d, e-ku ma hi o̩ka o̩ka le̩, jʼo̩ e̩do̩, oñ i mʼe-le̩ du tatʼe̩fo̩d ki chʼagbamune̩-wñ.
Tak i dʼe̩wñ ube̩do̩ma le̩ tʼo̩ o̩la, oñ i mʼUrim kpai Tumim ko noji e̩wñ ube̩do̩ma le̩.
Tak i dʼalawoni le̩ jiʼo oji, oñ i mʼo̩jamalia ku ma gwu pe̩te̩ke̩ le̩ du lamo o̩gba alawoni, owñ chʼike̩be̩ ki afo̩, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Taku Mose̩s mʼekpo ku ma du ba tʼo̩la le̩ du, oñ i mʼu du tafiʼo̩la uña ugugu le̩ kpai e̩wñ du ki jʼefu-wñ, i la che kʼi fo̩.
Tak i nʼe-i kʼi mudu tañʼo̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ onu mebie, abe̩le̩ i bʼekpo tʼo̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpai e̩wñ eku-wñ chaka, kpai o̩la ukpachi ugwo̩wo̩ kpai e̩wñ ki gugu oji-wñ, kʼi che kʼe̩wñ le̩ du ki fo̩.
Tak i mʼe̩bo̩bo̩ ekpo ebato̩la le̩ dudanyʼoji Aro̩n, oñ i ba tʼo̩ o̩la, kʼi che kʼi fo̩.
Taku Mose̩s mʼamo̩ma Aro̩n kowa, oñ i mʼafe̩ ko nyʼuma o̩la, i la mʼe̩wñ ujiñmi ko jʼuma iñmi, oñ i mʼo̩tajiya ki gbo̩gba ko do ma oji; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Tak i dʼo̩kokuno̩ iche̩bo̩ adure wa; oñ Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ kʼo̩wo̩-ma jʼoji o̩kokuno̩ iche̩bo̩ adure le̩.

Taku Mose̩s mʼu du kpa, oñ i mʼe̩bie̩ e-le̩ du, i la nʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ dʼe̩bie̩ le̩ kulu igba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ daka, oñ i fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ gwo rinyo̩, tak i dʼe̩bie̩ ki bo̩ da jʼe̩re̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, i la che kʼi fo̩, kʼi che e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ.
Tak i mʼula chaka ki bʼoj ifi-wñ ma ko kpai udo̩nare ate̩ o̩do̩-wñ, kpai ekpili-wñ meji manyʼula-wñ, oñ Mose̩s fʼe-le̩ gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩.
Ama o̩kokuno̩ le̩, tʼaño̩-wñ, tʼe̩la-wñ, tʼechu-wñ, i fʼu gujo ef una ejo̩do̩da uru le̩, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Tak i dʼokolo iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ wa; oñ Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ kʼo̩wo̩-ma jʼoji okolo le̩.
Taku Mose̩s mʼu du kpa, oñ i tʼe̩bie̩-wñ fia o̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ daka.
Tak i fʼe̩la okolo le̩ kpanya jo̩, oñ Mose̩s mʼoji-wñ kpai e̩kpanya-wñ kpai ula-wñ ko gujo.

Oñ i nʼomiofo gwe̩ ifi-wñ kpai e̩re̩-wñ, taku Mose̩s fʼo̩gbedudu okolo le̩ gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo todu kʼi kpo, owñ chʼe̩wñ ku ma duwa che Jihofa lugbo una, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Tak i dʼokolo ekeji le̩ wa, owñ chʼokolo ku ma ko nyʼo̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ le̩. Tak Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ kʼo̩wo̩-ma jʼoji okolo le̩.
Taku Mose̩s fʼu kpa, oñ i fʼe̩bie̩-wñ che, oñ i mʼu du kad oj eti Aro̩n awo̩to̩ kpai oj onu o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ kpai oj onu e̩re̩-wñ awo̩to̩.
Taku ma kʼamo̩ma Aro̩n wa, oñ Mose̩s dʼe̩bie̩ le̩ pe̩ nʼoj eti-ma awo̩to̩ kpai oj onu o̩wo̩-ma awo̩to̩ kpai oj onu e̩re̩-ma awo̩to̩. Taku Mose̩s tʼe̩bie̩ le̩ fiʼoj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ daka.
Tak i mʼula-wñ kpai otihi-wñ ki yoyo kpai aga ki bʼifi-wñ ma kpai udo̩nare ate̩ o̩do̩-wñ kpai ekpili-wñ meji manyʼula-wñ kpai o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ ko;
tak i mʼakalaʼka kʼo̩jo̩wu ma dʼo̩ n kpai akalaʼka ki chʼekpo, kpai o̩kpukpuluʼka ki jʼef agba o̩gba Jihofa le̩ ko, oñ i mʼu ko jʼoj ula kpai o̩wo̩ e̩la awo̩to̩ le̩;
tak i mʼo̩gbo̩dudu-wñ ko nyʼo̩wo̩ Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ, oñ i kʼo miejo o̩gba Jihofa ki mud e̩wñ eduwa miejo.
Taku Mose̩s mʼu gba bʼo̩wo̩-ma te̩, oñ i mʼu ko gujo oj iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, e̩wñ eko nyʼo̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ ku ma duwa ki akpo i che, owñ chʼe̩wñ ku ma ko wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una.
Taku Mose̩s mʼache̩do̩-wñ du oñ i miejo kʼi chʼe̩wñ eduwa miejo o̩gba Jihofa; e-le̩ chʼukpe̩ Mose̩s kwef e̩la eko nyʼo̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ le̩, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.

Taku Mose̩s mʼekpo ku ma bato̩-la le̩ ba re, kpai e̩bie̩ ki dʼoj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, oñ i mʼu du tafio̩ Aro̩n o̩la kpai e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, kpai amo̩ma-wñ, kpai oj e̩wñ o̩la amo̩ma-wñ manyʼu ge̩; abe̩le̩ i che kʼAro̩n afo̩, tʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ, kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, kpai e̩wñ o̩la amo̩ma-wñ manyʼu.

Taku Mose̩s ka ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ kakini, Ame̩ ki hi e̩la le̩ alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, o̩mo̩ me̩ je̩ e-le̩ kpai akala ki jʼef agba e-ekonyo̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ le̩, alu kʼu ñwa te̩ kakini, Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ aje̩ e-le̩.
Oñ e̩la-wñ kpai akala ki bo̩bo̩ me̩ ki muko gujo ef una.
Me̩ ñʼale alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju dufu gbogbo nyʼo̩jo̩ mebie n, gbogbo tak o̩jo̩ e̩wñ ekonyo̩wo̩ e̩ko̩-me̩ le̩ ki jo̩ kpa, todu o̩jo̩ mebie tak uko̩lo̩ ekʼe̩wñ nyʼume̩ o̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ le̩ jo̩ kpa.
Alu kʼa che eñini-i, abe̩le̩ Jihofa ñwa ñw a kʼa che kʼi mud e̩wñ e̩boma todu me̩.
Me̩ ajʼalugbo̩na unyabo ujeju le̩ o̩ro̩ka kpai odu gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie, ku me̩ la fide Jihofa-i de ku me̩ we̩ eku; todu abe̩le̩ ma ñwa ñwu mi.
Abe̩le̩ Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ fʼe̩wñ du ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu ma lugbo Mose̩s le̩ che.
Oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ taku Mose̩s fʼAro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai abogijo Israe̩l do̩ wa;
oñ i ka ñw Aro̩n kakini, Mʼo̩mʼokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka du todu iche̩bo̩ adure, kpai okoloʼka todu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, ejeji-wñ ki mufu, kʼe̩ mʼuma ko wa che o̩gba Jihofa.
Tak e̩ ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, Me̩ mʼobuko̩ʼka du todu iche̩bo̩ adure, kpai o̩mʼokuno̩ʼka kpai o̩malaʼka, ejeji-ma ki chʼo̩ma o̩do̩ʼka ku ma mufu, todu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo.
Kpai o̩kokuno̩ʼka kpai okoloʼka todu iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩, ku me̩ mʼu ko kpa o̩gba Jihofa, kpai e̩wñ ele kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyu; todu Jihofa atejugede ñwu me̩ eñini-i.
Taku ma mʼe̩wñ ku Mose̩s ñwa ñwu ma le̩ ko wa jʼo̩gba unyabo ujeju; oñ o̩gbadu le̩ chaka te̩ wa, ma la kwodago o̩gba Jihofa.
Taku Mose̩s kakini, E̩wñ ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu me̩ ku me̩ che le̩ de̩; tak ojima Jihofa atejugede ñwu me̩.

Taku Mose̩s ka ñw Aro̩n kakini, Te̩ me̩ru ugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-i kʼe̩ fʼiche̩bo̩ adure-we̩ kpai iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-we̩ che, kʼe̩ la fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che tod o̩la-we̩ kpai todu amone̩-i; tak e̩ mʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-amone̩-i kowa kʼe̩ che e̩wñ e̩boma todu ma; alu ki Jihofa ñwate̩.
Abe̩le̩ Aro̩n te̩ me̩ru ugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ oñ i fʼo̩mokuno̩ e̩-iche̩bo̩ adure le̩ kpa, owñ chʼe-kʼi chʼutodu o̩la-wñ onugo.
Tak amo̩ma Aro̩n mʼe̩bie̩ le̩ du ñw u, oñ i dʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ tunyʼe̩bie̩ le̩, i la mʼu du kado igba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, tak i dʼe̩bie̩ dajane̩ e̩re̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩;
i muda fʼula-wñ kpai ekpili-wñ kpai udo̩nare ate̩ o̩do̩-wñ ef e̩la iche̩bo̩ adure le̩ gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
I la gu e̩la-wñ kpai año̩-wñ jo ef una ejo̩do̩da uru le̩.
Tak i mʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo du kpa; oñ amo̩ma Aro̩n mʼe̩bie̩-wñ du ñw u, oñ i mʼu du tafio̩ o̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ daka.
Taku ma kʼe̩kpanya e̩la iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ ñw u oke oke manyʼoji-wñ; oñ i mʼu ko gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩.
I laño̩ fʼifi-wñ kpai e̩re̩-wñ gwe̩ oñ i fʼe-le̩ gujo manyʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩.
Tak i mʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-amone̩ le̩ ko wa jo̩ ñw u, oñ i mʼo̩mʼewo iche̩bo̩ adure kʼi chʼutodu amone̩ le̩ du, i la fʼu kpa, oñ i mʼu du wa gwʼuma o̩la rinyo̩, alu kʼi che e-ejodudu le̩.
Tak i dʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa che alu kʼuko̩-o̩la-wñ ka.
Tak i dʼe̩wñ ele wa ñw u, oñ i bʼu nyʼo̩wo̩ʼka e̩ko̩, tak i fʼu gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ manyʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-odudu le̩.
I laño̩ fʼo̩kokuno̩ kpai okolo le̩ kpa ge̩, owñ chʼiche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ tod amone̩ le̩; tak amo̩ma Aro̩n mʼe̩bie̩ le̩ du ñw u, oñ i mʼu du tafio̩ o̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ daka,
kpai ula o̩kokuno̩ kpai e-okolo le̩ kpai otihi-wñ ki yoyo kpai aga-wñ kpai ekpili-wñ kpai udo̩-nare ate̩ o̩do̩-wñ;
oñ ma mʼula le̩ ko jʼoj ache̩do̩-ma, tak i fʼula-wñ gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩.
Oñ Aro̩n mʼache̩do̩ meji le̩ kpai o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ ko miejo o̩gba Jihofa kʼi chʼe̩wñ edu miejo, alu ku Mose̩s ñwa ñwu ma.
Tak Aro̩n fʼo̩wo̩-wñ meji nadala rʼate̩ o̩wo̩ ugbo kʼamone̩ le̩ jo̩, i la kadua ñwu ma; tak i mugwo̩ru kwugbo kʼi fʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-adure kpai e-e̩gujo kpai e-ure̩do̩ che le̩ tane̩.
Taku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n nyʼef unyabo ujeju; oñ ma kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu wa akadua ñw amone̩ le̩, tak ojima Jihofa kwotejugede ñw amone̩ le̩ chaka.
Tak una kwʼo̩gba Jihofa wa, i la fʼe̩wʼñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai ula oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ lie̩; oñ e̩gba kʼamone̩ le̩ chaka fʼu li, ma gbʼogu, ma lewa afejubane̩ ma.

Oñ Nedab kpai Abaihiu, amo̩ma Aro̩n e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma mʼa-nade-wñ du, ma la fʼuna ne̩ nyʼefu-wñ, oñ ma du e̩wñ ki akpo le̩ nʼoji-wñ, abe̩le̩ ma dʼuna ejaduña wate̩ o̩gba Jihofa, owñ chʼe-kʼi ma ñwa ñwu ma n.
Tak una kwʼo̩gba Jihofa dufu fʼuma lie̩, ma la leku o̩gba Jihofa o̩mo̩.
Taku Mose̩s ka ñw Aro̩n kakini, E̩wñ ki Jihofa ka le̩ de̩, i kakini, Abo ku ma te̩ me̩ru mi ki bute̩ ñw efo̩-mi, ma abʼojima mʼumi eju amone̩ du. Tak Aro̩n chechi.
Taku Mose̩s fu Mishae̩l kpai E̩lzafan, amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Uzie̩l, o̩me̩nyi Aro̩n, do̩ wa, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Mute̩wa ku me̩ mʼamo̩maye-me̩ ko kwo̩gba uña kiafo̩ nyʼo̩do̩da uru-i.
Taku ma te̩me̩ru oñ ma mʼuma ko kpai afe̩-ma kwef uru le̩ dufu, alu ku Mose̩s ka.

Taku Mose̩s ka ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ E̩leaza kpai Itamar kakini, Me̩ ki dʼoji-me̩ te̩ chuku chuku n, me̩ ki la fʼukpo-me̩ na n, tode̩gba ku me̩ aku, tode̩gba kʼuwe̩do̩ awa bʼo̩gbadu-i chaka ma; i muda dʼugbo kʼamo̩maye-me̩, owñ chʼo̩gbo̩ abo unyi Israe̩l chaka, ki raku una ki Jihofa tajo-i.
Ame̩ ki kwʼef alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju-i dufu n, tode̩gba ku me̩ aku; todu ekpo ebatoji e-Jihofa dʼo̩la-me̩ me̩. Oñ ma che alu ku Mose̩s ka.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw Aro̩n kakini,
E̩ ki ñmʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai o̩te̩ una e̩gba ku me̩ nyʼef unyabo ujeju n, tʼuwe̩ tʼamo̩ma-we̩ tode̩gba ku me̩ aku; e-le̩ ki chʼuhio̩me̩ te̩ ñwu me̩ tʼogbegbele̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩.
Kʼame̩ ki fʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ kpai e̩wñ o̩ja ñwaru ojoji, kpai e̩wñ e̩daji kpai e̩wñ e̩fe̩;
kʼame̩ ki ko̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ du ku Jihofa ko̩la ñwu ma lugbo Mose̩s.

Taku Mose̩s ka ñw Aro̩n kpai E̩leaza kpai Itamar, amo̩ma-wñ ki bo̩, kakini, Me̩ mʼe̩wñ ele ki bo̩bo̩ ef e̩wñ ku ma kowa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una le̩ ko ku me̩ jʼakolo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku me̩ je̩, o̩jo̩wu ki do̩ n; todu e̩wñ ki afo̩ e-efo̩ i che;
me̩ ki la aje̩ e-le̩ ugbo kiafo̩, todabu kʼi chʼukpe̩-we̩ kpai ukpe̩ amo̩ma-we̩ kwef e̩wñ ku ma kowa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una; todu abe̩le̩ ma ñwa ñwu mi.

Ama me̩ aje̩ ache̩do̩ ku ma miejo kpai o̩wo̩ e̩la ku ma du nyʼate̩ le̩ ugbo du ki fe̩, uwe̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, kpai amo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ manyʼuwe̩ ge̩; todu e-le̩ chʼe-ku ma ko jo̩ kʼi chʼukpe̩ e-we̩ kpai e-amo̩ma-we̩, kwef e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l kowa.

Ma la akʼo̩wo̩ e̩la ku ma du nyʼate̩ le̩ kpai ache̩do̩ ku ma miejo wa manyʼula kʼi chʼe̩wñ ku ma kowa lugbo una le̩, ku ma ki miejo todu kʼi chʼe̩wñ eduwa miejo o̩gba Jihofa; uwe̩ anʼe-le̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ manyʼuwe̩, kʼi chʼukpe̩ e-we̩ ogbegbele̩; alu ki Jihofa ñwa te̩.
Taku Mose̩s fejude̩kparu etejane̩ o̩mewo iche̩bo̩ adure le̩, me̩ la go, ma fʼu gujo me̩! Tak i we̩do̩rʼE̩leaza kpai Itamar, amo̩ma Aro̩n ki bo̩ le̩, i kakini,
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ ma je̩ e̩la iche̩bo̩ adure ugbo uña kiafo̩ le̩ n? Todu e̩wñ efo̩ e-efo̩ i che, i la du ñwu me̩ ku me̩ ki nʼudu abo o̩gbadu-i, ku me̩ che e̩wñ e̩boma todu ma o̩gba Jihofa.
Go, ma la dʼe̩bie̩-wñ wa ejefu uña kiafo̩-i n: i ma dukpe̩ ku me̩ ma je̩ ef uña kiafo̩ tila, alu kʼomi ñwa ñwu me̩.

Tak Aro̩n ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Go, ma mʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-adure-ma kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-ma ko wa che o̩gba Jihofa eñini me̩; oñ e̩wñ-i ño̩ ke̩re̩bʼumi ta; u ma fʼe̩la iche̩bo̩ adure je̩ eñini, i ma nyo̩ Jihofa eju?
Oñ Mose̩s gbo̩, i la nyʼo̩ eju.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n, kakini,
Me̩ ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, E̩wñ ki jʼef e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ef e̩wñ iñmi du ki jʼile̩ kʼame̩ aje̩ de̩.
E̩wñ du kʼe̩re̩-wñ chʼe̩kpana, kʼi la chʼabetikpa, kʼi atije̩, kʼi jʼef ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ e-le̩ me̩ aje̩.
Ama abo ki atije̩ abe̩k e̩re̩-ma chʼe̩kpana kʼame̩ ma aje̩ ni de̩: inyakulumi, todabu kʼi atije̩ kʼe̩re̩-wñ ma la kpana n, i chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩.
Ekili kʼi atije̩ kʼe̩re̩-wñ muda kpana n, owñ chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩.
Kpai adeji kʼi atije̩ kʼe̩re̩-wñ ma la kpana n, chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩.
Kpai oko kʼe̩re̩-wñ chʼe̩kpana, kʼi chʼabetikpa, kʼi ma la atije̩ n, chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩.
Ame̩ ki je̩ e̩la abʼe-le̩ n, me̩ ki la do̩wo̩kado oku-ma n; ma chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩.
E̩wñ ku me̩ aje̩ ef ame̩wñ ki jʼef omi de̩. E̩wñ du ki nʼugwomi kpai ikpe̩ ki jʼef omi tʼef ohimini, tʼef aji, me̩ aje̩ e-le̩.
Ame̩wñ du ki muda jʼef ohimini kpai aji ki achiche̩ ef omi, kpai ame̩wñ iñmi du ku ma jʼef omi kʼi ma la nʼugwomi kpai ikpe̩ n achʼe̩wñ e̩de̩fulu ki achʼone̩ ire̩.
Abo le̩ achʼe̩wñ e̩do̩fulu ki achʼone̩ ire̩ alo waa; ame̩ ki jʼe̩la-ma n, oku-ma ki chʼe̩wñ eju je̩ ñwu me̩ pio.
E̩wñ du ki jʼef omi kʼi ma ne̩ ugwomi kpai ikpe̩ n, abʼe-le̩ ki chʼe̩wñ e̩do̩fulu ki achʼone̩ ire̩ ñwu me̩ gbogbo alo.
E̩wñ ki la achʼe̩wñ e̩do̩fulu ki achʼume̩ ire̩ ef ame̩we̩ de̩: me̩ ki je̩ e-le̩ n, e̩wñ ki akʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu ire̩ ma che: ugbono kpai opupu kpai o̩re̩,
okokolo kpai olokopio uche̩ uche̩-wñ
kpai o̩tagalama du uche̩ uche̩-wñ,
obijim kpai aja kpai ugu o̩lʼohimini abadi kpai uche̩ uche̩ amuji du,
kpai ogugu, kpai anumure kpai ogugu omoko̩
kpai ugo kpai o̩kpamadu kpai ugunu
kpai utu, kpai eje uche̩ uche̩-wñ, kpai apie̩pie̩ kpai ido̩.
E̩wñ du kʼi nʼika kʼi nʼe̩re̩ me̩le̩ alule̩ abʼe-le̩ chaka chʼe̩wñ e̩do̩fulu ire̩ ñwu me̩.
Me̩ muda aje̩ e̩wñ ki nʼika kʼi nʼe̩re̩ me̩le̩ alule̩, e-kʼi nʼikolo kado e̩re̩-wñ kʼi ane̩ roko ane̩.
Ef ame̩wñ le̩ e-ku me̩ aje̩ de̩: akubaliba uche̩ uche̩-wñ, kpai imiejo oji bo̩bo̩lo̩ uche̩ uche̩, kpai ateteleku uche̩ uche̩-wñ kpai akpachi uche̩ uche̩-wñ.
Ama ame̩wñ du ki bo̩ ki nʼika kʼi ño̩ nʼe̩re̩ me̩le̩ achʼe̩wñ e̩do̩fulu kʼi achʼume̩ ire̩.
Lugbo abo e-le̩ o̩la-me̩ adaji; e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ kado oku-ma, o̩la-wñ adaji gbogbo tak olu tunyʼane̩,
e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼoku-ma re nʼo̩wo̩, e̩ne̩ le̩ agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ, o̩la-wñ la mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyane̩.
E̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ du kʼe̩re̩-wñ chʼe̩kpana, kʼi ma chʼabetikpa n, abe̩k i ma la tije̩ n chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩; e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ kadʼabʼe-le̩, mak o̩la-wñ mudaji.
E̩wñ du ki adʼadaba o̩wo̩ bʼane̩ ma ef ame̩wñ iñmi ku ma nʼe̩re̩ me̩le̩ alule̩ du chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩; e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ kadʼoku-ma, mak o̩la-wñ mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyane̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼoku-ma nʼo̩wo̩ agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ; o̩la-wñ mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyane̩; ame̩wñ le̩ chʼelifo̩ ñwu me̩.
Abʼe-i chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩ ef ame̩wñ ki afa, ku ma fa ane̩pe̩te̩-i: aule̩ kpai ikeleku kpai uche̩ uche̩ olodo lile,
kpai abibie̩ kpai abaji kpai abuta kpai igbi kpai ailojegbe̩.
Abo e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩ ef e̩wñ du ki afa; e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ kadʼoku-ma, o̩la-wñ mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyane̩.

E̩wñ du kʼoku-maʼka lewa nu, e̩wñ le̩ mudaji, dagba i chʼe̩wñ eku ku ma nʼoli che, abe̩k e̩wñ ku ma du tʼo̩la, abe̩k año̩, abe̩k akpulu, owñ chʼe̩wñ eku du kʼi chʼe-ku ma ne̩ chʼuko̩lo̩; ma ki du tunyʼomiofo tila, i mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyane̩; e̩gbale̩ tak i afe̩.
E̩wñ eku ku ma la nʼama bo̩, e-du ki che kʼoka-wñ muñwa tefu-wñ, mak e̩wñ du ki dʼefu-wñ mudaji, me̩ la adʼe-le̩ kpo̩fo̩.
Uje̩wñ du ku ma je̩ e-kʼomiofo le̩ kado mudaji; omi du ku ma ñmo̩ kʼi dʼef e̩wñ eku abe̩le̩ mudaji.
E̩wñ du ki che kʼoku-ma muñwa nu, mudaji; dagba i chʼigbeli, dagba i chʼado, ekpo̩fo̩ ma akpo̩fo̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩; i mudaji me̩; e̩wñ elifo̩ i ache ñwu me̩.
Ama ugbo kʼomiofo abi kwef ane̩ dufu kpai obuga ugbo kʼomi gbagu, e-le̩ afe̩; ama e̩wñ du ki kado oku-ma adaji.
I la che̩wñ kʼoku-ma ugboʼka kado ulu e̩wñ ku ma tene edu gbe̩, e-le̩ fe̩;
i muda che̩wñ ku ma che omiofo nyʼulu le̩ tak oku-maʼka ñwa tʼo̩, i chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ du e-ku me̩ je̩ leku tinyo̩ ofo, e̩ne̩ ki ado̩wo̩kadʼoku-wñ adaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyane̩.
E̩ne̩ ki la je̩ e̩la oku le̩ agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ, oñ o̩la-wñ adaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyane̩; kpai e̩ne̩ ki dʼoku-wñ nʼo̩wo̩ ge̩, e̩ne̩ le̩ agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ, oñ i adaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyane̩.
E̩wñ du ki afa, kʼi afa ane̩pe̩te̩-i, e̩wñ ki akʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu ire̩ i che; ma aje̩ n.

E̩wñ du ki adʼefu-wñ bʼane̩ ma alule̩, kpai e̩wñ du ki nʼe̩re̩ me̩le̩ ale, abe̩k e̩wñ du ki nʼe̩re̩ wewe, ame̩wñ du ki afa, kʼi afa ane̩pe̩te̩-i, ame̩ ki je̩ abo e-le̩ n; todu e̩wñ e̩do̩fulu e-ire̩ ma che.
Ame̩ ki du e̩wñ ki afa le̩ gwʼo̩la-me̩ ihie̩ne̩ n; me̩ ki la ko ame̩wñ le̩ kpʼo̩la-me̩ bie̩ n kʼo̩la-me̩ ki daji n.
Todu omi che Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩; todule̩ me̩ che kʼo̩la-me̩ ki fo̩, ame̩ ki fo̩, todu omi afo̩. Me̩ ki ne̩ ame̩wñ ki afa kʼi achiche̩ ane̩-ile̩-i dʼo̩la-me̩ ji n.
Todu omi che Jihofa kʼi ko me̩ kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu wa-i, kʼu chʼO̩jo-me̩; todule̩ ame̩ ki fo̩, todabu kʼomi afo̩.
E-kide̩ chʼuko̩-o̩la ugbo ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, kpai e̩we̩, kpai onugo e̩wñ du ki añmiñmi ki achiche̩ ef omiofo, kpai onugo e̩wñ du kʼi afa ane̩pe̩te̩,
kʼi fʼe̩wñ ki ma fe̩ n kpai e̩wñ ki fe̩ daru ojoji, kʼo̩me̩-wñ ki te̩ agbagba e̩wñ iñmi ku ma je̩ kpai e̩wñ iñmi ku ma ma aje̩ n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼonobule̩ fʼefu nyo̩, kʼi la fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi, mak o̩la-wñ daji gbogbo kad o̩jo̩ mebie; alu kʼi de̩ iko elifo̩-wñ abe̩le̩ o̩la-wñ adaji.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ ma akʼaño̩ ki bʼo̩gba e̩pi-wñ ma da.

Tak i año̩ dʼef e̩bie̩ kʼi aje̩ ñw u fe̩ le̩ alo waa gbogbo o̩jo̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩ta; i ado̩wo̩kadʼe̩wñ du kʼi afo̩ n, i la agudu wʼef uña ki afo̩ n, gbogbo tak o̩jo̩ o̩ʼa egworinyo̩-wñ le̩ jo̩ kpa.
I muda che̩wñ kʼi fʼo̩ma onobule̩ bi, mak o̩la-wñ adaji gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ me̩gwe̩lu alu ki de̩ e̩gba kʼi achʼelifo̩; tak i año̩ dʼef e̩bie̩ ki aje̩ ñw u fe̩ le̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩jo̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩fa.

Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ o̩la egworinyo̩-wñ jo̩ kpa, dagba i chʼe-o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ dagba i chʼe-o̩ma onobule̩, i adʼo̩mala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka wa ugbo atama alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju todu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai o̩ma o̩ke̩te̩be̩ abe̩k omikede todu iche̩bo̩ adure;

tak atama le̩ adʼu wa che o̩gba Jihofa, kʼi la che e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ; e̩gbale̩ tak o̩la-wñ afe̩ bʼe̩bi e̩bie̩-wñ le̩ te̩. Uko̩o̩la onobule̩ kʼi bi o̩ma de̩, dagba i bi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ dagba i bi onobule̩.

I la che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ma bʼe̩wño̩re̩ egini jo̩ n, e̩gbale̩ i akʼamikede meji abe̩k amo̩ma o̩ke̩te̩be̩ meji wa, oka-wñ ki chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, ekeji-wñ ki la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ adure; tak atama le̩ ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu owñ, tak i afe̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kakini.

E̩gba kʼaño̩la one̩ ugboʼka ne, abe̩k i aru, abe̩k i nʼugboʼka kʼi awa dab olula ekpikpa, kʼi la mud o̩ga ikpemute ef año̩la-wñ, taku ma adʼe̩ne̩ le̩ wʼugbo Aro̩n atama, abe̩k ugbo o̩ma-wñʼka kʼi chʼatama,

oñ atama le̩ ago o̩ga ki dʼaño̩la-wñ; i la che̩wñ kʼedudu año̩la-wñ ugbo kʼo̩ga mʼu le̩ murida efufu, kʼi biu dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩ga le̩ legu año̩-wñ du tʼef o̩re̩la-wñ, mak o̩ga ikpemute de̩; atama agʼo, oñ i atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ chʼe̩daji.
I la che̩wñ kʼolula le̩ chʼefufu ef año̩la-wñ, kʼi go kʼi la dabe̩ne̩ kʼi ma legu año̩ du tʼejefu n, kʼedudu-wñ ma rida efufu n, e̩gbale̩ atama arʼo̩na nyʼu e̩ne̩ o̩ga le̩ tef unyi o̩jo̩ mebie;
tak atama adabi gʼo o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ; me̩ la go, i la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ dʼugboʼkate kʼi ma la kpatuka eju-wñ n, e̩gbale̩ atama año̩ fʼo̩na re nyʼu o̩jo̩ mebie omune̩ ge̩.

Tak atama año̩ gʼo o̩jo̩ e̩kebie e-le̩ ge̩; me̩ la go, ugbo kʼi dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩ga de̩ le̩ chane̩ echi kʼo̩ga le̩ ma kpatuka ef año̩la-wñ n, tak atama atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ me̩, eru i ru ofo; tak i agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, oñ i afe̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ru le̩ chane̩ e̩kpatuka ef año̩la-wñ, abu ki dʼo̩la-wñ ña atama ki fʼo̩la-wñ gworinyo̩, i año̩ dabi dʼo̩la-wñ ña atama le̩ ge̩;
tak atama agʼo; me̩ la go, iche̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ mukpatuka ef año̩la-wñ, e̩gbale̩ atama atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ chʼe̩daji; o̩ga ikpemute de̩.
E̩gba kʼo̩ga ikpemute dʼo̩la one̩, e̩gbale̩ ma adʼu wʼugbo atama;
tak atama le̩ ago; me̩ la go, iche̩wñ kʼaño̩la-wñ ugboʼka ne efufu kʼedudu-wñ mud efufu, kʼene-wñ dabe̩ne̩ kʼi ache ki dagbe,
mak o̩ga ikpemute kʼi dʼaño̩la-wñ igbelegbele le̩ de̩, oñ atama atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ chʼe̩daji; i adʼo̩ hi tef unyi n; todu o̩la-wñ mudaji.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga ikpemute le̩ mukpatuka abʼaño̩la-wñ ma ugbo du akwo oji-wñ gbogbo wa bʼe̩re̩ ane̩-wñ ma, kʼi de̩ abe̩le̩ eju atama, e̩gbale̩ atama agʼo,
me̩ la go, iche̩wñ kʼo̩ga ikpemute le̩ bʼaño̩la-wñ chaka du ma, tak i atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la e̩ne̩ o̩ga le̩ fe̩ me̩; i mud efufu chaka, o̩la-wñ fe̩ me̩.
Ama o̩jo̩ kʼo̩la-wñ dʼagbe ejugede mak i mudaji.
Tak atama ago ugbo ki dʼagbe le̩, oñ i atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ daji; o̩re̩la ki dagbe chʼe̩wñ elifo̩, o̩ga ikpemute i che.
I la che̩wñ kʼeju agbe le̩ rida kʼi mudabi dʼefufu, e̩gbale̩ i awʼugbo atama;
oñ atama agʼo, me̩ la go, iche̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ murida efufu, mak e̩gbale̩ atama atojomu ñw e̩ne̩ kʼo̩ga mu le̩ ka kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩; o̩la-wñ fe̩ me̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼikete o̩ko̩ dʼo̩la one̩, kʼi la bie̩,
tak ugbo kʼikete o̩ko̩ le̩ mu ño̩ wu efufu, abe̩k efufu efu-wñ le rʼekpikpa, e̩gbale̩ i adʼu ña atama;

tak atama le̩ agʼo, i la che̩wñ ki chʼeju dabe̩ne̩ kʼi legu año̩ du tʼejefu, kʼedudu-wñ la murida efufu, e̩gbale̩ atama atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ daji; o̩ga ikpemute i che, i dufu ugbo kʼikete o̩ko̩ mu le̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼatama gʼo, kʼedudu efufu ma de̩ efu-wñ n, kʼi ma la le gu año̩ du tʼejefu n, kʼi chane̩ echi, e̩gbale̩ atama adʼo̩ hi tef unyi o̩jo̩ mebie;
i la che̩wñ kʼi akpatuka rʼaño̩la, e̩gbale̩ atama atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ daji, o̩ga de̩.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼolula le̩ dʼalu kʼi de̩, kʼi ma la kpatuka n, mak ame̩ ikete o̩ko̩ le̩ de̩; tak atama atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ me̩.
Abe̩k e̩gba kʼaño̩la nʼugbo kʼuna gujo, kʼej agbe le̩ mud efufu ki le rʼekpikpa abe̩k efufu o̩lo̩la,

e̩gbale̩ atama agʼo; i la che̩wñ kʼedudu ugbo kʼi mu le̩ murida efufu kʼi achʼeju dabe̩ne̩ kʼi le gu año̩ du tʼejefu, mak ikpemute de̩, i le dufu ugbo kʼi gujo le̩, atama la atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ daji, o̩ga ikpemute i che.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼatama gʼo, kʼedudu efufu ma dʼugbo kʼi mu le̩ n, kʼi ma le gu año̩ du tʼejefu n, chai echi i chane̩ echi; e̩gbale̩ atama adʼo̩ hi tef unyi o̩jo̩ mebie,
tak atama agʼo o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ; i la che̩wñ kʼi akpatuka rʼu o̩la, e̩gbale̩ atama atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ daji; o̩ga ikpemute i che.
I la che̩wñ kʼolula le̩ dʼabakate, kʼi ma kpatuka rʼaño̩la n, chai echi i chane̩ echi, mak ugbo kʼi gujo le̩ dawu, oñ atama atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩; todu ame̩ ugbo kʼuna jo̩ le̩ de̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ nʼo̩ga kʼi mʼu oji abe̩k agba-wñ,

atama ago o̩ga le̩; me̩ la go, iche̩wñ ki biu dabe̩ne̩ kʼi le gu año̩ du tʼejefu, kʼiloji ki dʼefu-wñ de̩ chilo̩ko̩; e̩gbale̩ atama atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ daji, echakpa de̩, ikpemute e-oji abe̩k e-ilagba de̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼatama fʼo̩ga echakpa le̩ go, kʼi nʼeju dabe̩ne̩ ki ma le gu año̩ du tʼejefu n, kʼiloji edudu la dʼefu-wñ n, e̩gbale̩ atama adʼe̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩ga echakpa le̩ hi tef unyi o̩jo̩ mebie,
tak o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ atama ago o̩ga le̩; me̩ la go, iche̩wñ kʼechakpa le̩ ma gbʼane̩ nyʼo̩wo̩ n, kʼiloji e̩chilo̩ko̩ ma jʼefu-wñ n, kʼeju echakpa le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼi ma le gu año̩ du tʼejefu n,
e̩gbale̩ tak i alʼoji-wñ, i muda ala ugbo kʼi chakpa le̩ n; tak atama le̩ año̩ dʼe̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩ga echakpa le̩ hi tef unyi o̩jo̩ mebie omune̩;

tak o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ atama ago echakpa le̩; me̩ la go, iche̩wñ kʼechakpa le̩ ma gbane̩ nyʼo̩wo̩ n, kʼi dabe̩ne̩ kʼi ma legu año̩ du tʼejefu n, e̩gbale̩ tak atama atojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩; tak i agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, oñ o̩la-wñ afe̩.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ gworinyo̩ tak echakpa le̩ ño̩ kpatuka rʼu o̩la ololo, e̩gbale̩ atama agʼo;
me̩ la go, iche̩wñ kʼechakpa le̩ kpatuka rʼef año̩la, atama le̩ atejane̩ iloji chilo̩ko̩ ge̩ n; o̩la-wñ daji me̩.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼechakpa le̩ dʼabakate eju-wñ, kʼiloji edudu chane̩ efu dufu; mak echakpa le̩ bie̩ me̩, o̩la-wñ fe̩ me̩; atama le̩ la atojomu ñw u ka kʼi fe̩ me̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ nʼolula año̩la-wñ kʼeju-wñ chʼekpikpa, ki ño̩ chʼefufu;
atama agʼo; me̩ la go, i la che̩wñ kʼefufu olula año̩la le̩ cha, eru i ru dufu año̩la ofo; e̩ne̩ le̩ fe̩ me̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼoji one̩ kpo̩ñma, o̩bo̩bo̩lo̩ i che, o̩la-wñ muda fe̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼiloji one̩ kpo̩ñma bʼo̩gba oji-wñ te̩, o̩bo̩bo̩lo̩ o̩gba oji i che, o̩la-wñ muda fe̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼolula efufu ki le rʼekpikpa fʼo̩bo̩bo̩lo̩ oji abe̩k o̩gba oji-wñ ugboʼka mu mak o̩ga ikpemute kʼi adufu ugbo obo̩bo̩lo̩ oji-wñ abe̩k o̩gba oji-wñ de̩.
E̩gbale̩ atama agʼo; me̩ la go, iche̩wñ kʼo̩ga ki wu le̩ chʼefufu le rʼekpikpa o̩bo̩bo̩lo̩ oji-wñ abe̩k o̩gba oji-wñ le̩, kʼi chʼeju dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩ga ikpemute ef año̩la,
mak e̩ne̩ o̩ga ikpemute i che, o̩la-wñ daji; atama ki tojomu ñw u ka kʼo̩la-wñ daji chuu; o̩ga-wñ dʼoji-wñ.
Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼo̩ga ikpemute dʼo̩la-wñ le̩ akʼukpo e̩fana nyʼo̩la, iloji-wñ ate̩ ofofo oñ i adʼo̩wo̩ bʼuko ate̩-wñ ma, kʼi nakpogu kakini, O̩la-mi fe̩ n! O̩la-mi fe̩ n!
Gbogbo o̩jo̩ du kʼo̩ga le̩ dʼo̩la-wñ kade, o̩la-wñ mudaji; owñ kate agugu ef unyi ejo̩do̩da uru le̩.
Ukpo kʼo̩ga ikpemute dʼo̩ ge̩, dagba i chʼukpo edudu ala, dagba i chʼukpo line̩n ofofo;
tʼef udago-wñ tʼef uto̩ko̩-wñ, e-linen abe̩k edudu ala; dagba i chʼaño̩ odukulu, dagba i chʼe-ku ma nʼaño̩ che;
iche̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ chʼeju emimi, abe̩k ekpikpa ef ukpo, tʼef udago-wñ, tʼef uto̩ko̩-wñ, abe̩k ef año̩ odukulu, abe̩k e̩wñ ku ma nʼaño̩ che, o̩ga ikpemute de̩, ma la adʼu ña atama.
Tak atama ago o̩ga le̩, oñ i adʼe̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ dʼo̩la-wñ tʼef unyi kʼifʼo̩na re nyʼu o̩jo̩ mebie;

tak i año̩ go o̩ga le̩ o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ ge̩. I la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ mukpatuka o̩la ukpo le̩, dagba i chʼef udago-wñ, dagba i chʼef uto̩ko̩-wñ, abe̩k o̩la año̩ le̩, e̩wñ du ku ma chaka ne̩ che, o̩ga ikpemute ki adanyʼane̩ i che; e̩wñ elifo̩ i che.

Tak i akʼe̩wñ o̩la le̩ gujo, dagba o̩ga-wñ dʼef udago-wñ, dagba i dʼef uto̩ko̩-wñ, dagba ki chʼedudu ala abe̩ku line̩n abe̩k e̩wñ du ku ma nʼaño̩ che, e-du kʼatulubo̩ le̩ dʼefu-wñ: todu ikpemute kʼi ada nyʼane̩ i che; ma agwʼe̩wñ o̩la le̩ jo ef una.
I la che̩wñ kʼatama gʼo, kʼo̩ga le̩ ma kpatuka rʼef e̩wñ o̩la le̩ n, tʼef udago-wñ n, tʼef uto̩ko̩-wñ n, abe̩k ef e̩wñ du ku ma nʼaño̩ che;
e̩gbale̩ atama añwa ñwu ma ku ma gwe̩ e̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ dʼo̩la-wñ, tak i año̩ dʼu tʼef unyi arʼo̩na nyʼu o̩jo̩ mebie omune̩;

e̩gba ku ma fʼu gwe̩ tak atama agʼo, me̩ la go, i che̩wñ kʼeju o̩ga le̩ ma rida ojoji eju n, dagba kʼo̩ga le̩ ma chaka kpatuka n, e̩wñ e̩daji i che; uwe̩ ki gʼu jo ef una; o̩ga kʼi ada nyʼejefu i che, dagba i chʼejubi-wñ, dagba i chʼejo̩gba-wñ.
I la che̩wñ kʼatama gʼo, kʼo̩ga le̩ chane̩ echi abu ku ma fu gwe̩ le̩, tak i akpʼugbo kʼi mu e̩wñ o̩la le̩ na, abe̩k año̩, abe̩k udago-wñ, abe̩k uto̩ko̩-wñ.
I la che̩wñ kʼi ño̩ dabi dufu ef e̩wñ o̩la le̩ ge̩, abe̩k ef udago-wñ abe̩k ef uto̩ko̩-wñ, abe̩k ef e̩wñ du ku ma nʼaño̩ che, ekpatuka i akpatuka le̩; e̩ ki kʼe̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ dʼefu-wñ gujo ef una.
Ama e̩wñ o̩la kʼe̩ gwe̩ kʼo̩ga-wñ kwo bʼo̩ te̩, dagba i chʼudago-wñ dagba i chʼuto̩ko̩-wñ, abe̩k e̩wñ du ku ma nʼaño̩ che̩, ma ño̩ dabi gwe̩ onu ekeji, tak i afe̩.

Uko̩o̩la ugbo o̩ga ikpemute kʼi dʼef e̩wñ o̩la e-edudu ala, abe̩k e-line̩n le̩ de̩, dagba i dʼef udago-wñ, dagba i dʼef uto̩ko̩-wñ, abe̩k ef e̩wñ du ku ma nʼaño̩ che; taku ma atojomu ñw u ka kʼi fe̩, abe̩ku ma atojomu ñw u ka kʼi mudaji.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Uko̩o̩la e̩no̩ga ikpemute o̩jo̩ ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ la de̩ kakini, Ma adʼu wʼugbo atama;
tak atama le̩ akwʼef uru dufu wʼo̩do̩da oñ atama le̩ ate̩jane̩ o̩la-wñ. I la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga ikpemute takpa o̩la e̩no̩ga le̩,
e̩gbale̩ atama añwa ñwu ma ku ma mʼudeju ame̩we̩ meji kʼaño̩la-ma fe̩ kowa manyʼoli sidar kpai ukpo ekpikpa kpai hiso̩p tod e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ le̩;
tak atama añwa ñwu ma ku ma dʼe̩we̩ʼka kpa nyʼef e̩wñ eku ku ma ne̩ ama bo̩, ugbo kʼomi acha lʼofe-wñ.
I dʼe̩we̩ ki deju le̩ manyʼoli sidar kpai e̩wñ ekpikpa kpai hiso̩p le̩, oñ i akʼe-le̩ manyʼe̩we̩ ki deju le̩ tunyʼe̩bie̩ e-e̩we̩ ku ma kpa oji omi ki acha le̩;
tak i adʼe-le̩ tafio̩ o̩la e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gworinyo̩ bʼo̩ga ikpemute-wñ te̩ le̩ onu mebie; tak i atojomu ñw u ka kʼi fe̩, oñ i atʼe̩we̩ ki deju le̩ no̩ tʼegbili.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ku ma gwʼo̩larinyo̩ le̩ a gwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, i la alʼoji-wñ chaka, i agwʼo̩la-wñ ef omiofo, tak i afe̩; ubi le̩ tak i agudu wʼef uru, i muda agugu ejo̩do̩da unyabo-wñ o̩jo̩ mebie.
I lewatʼo̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ, i alʼoji-wñ kpai ilagba-wñ kpai igbegbeneju-wñ chaka; owñ chʼedudu du ki dʼoji-wñ i ala rinyo̩. Tak i a gwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, kʼi agwʼo̩la-wñ onugo ef omifo, tak i afe̩.

Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ i akʼamo̩ma okolo meji ku ma mufu kpai ole ala ki chʼo̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi mufu, tak i akpe̩ e̩fa omu ku ma no̩ te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ rʼe̩gwa kʼi mʼukpe̩-wñ me̩ta kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyu, ko kʼi che e̩wñ ele manyʼekpo e̩ñwa lo̩g oka.
Tak atama ki agwʼe̩ne̩ le̩ o̩la rinyo̩ adʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ache kʼi gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩, manyʼe̩wñ ki bo̩ le̩, gugu o̩gba Jihofa alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju.
Tak atama adʼo̩ma okolo le̩ʼka wa kʼi che e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ manyʼekpo e̩ñwa lo̩g oka le̩ tak i ako miejo o̩gba Jihofa kʼi mud e̩wñ ekowa emiejo;

tak i adʼo̩ma okolo le̩ kpa ugbo ku ma kpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, owñ chʼef uña kiafo̩ le̩; todu alu kʼatama ne̩ e̩la iche̩bo̩ adure, abe̩le̩ i ño̩ nʼe̩la iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ ge̩; e̩wñ efo̩ e-efo̩ i che.
Tak atama ache e̩bie̩ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩, oñ i adʼu kado oj eti awo̩to̩ e-e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ le̩, kpai oj onu o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩, kpai oj onu e̩re̩-wñ awo̩to̩.
Tak atama ache ekpo e̩ñwa lo̩g le̩, kʼi dʼu danyʼe̩dʼo̩wo̩ awohi-wñ onugo,
tak atama adʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ tunyʼekpo̩ ki dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ awohi le̩, oñ i anʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ tʼekpo le̩ fio̩ o̩gba Jihofa onu mebie;
tak atama aba ekpo ki bo̩ ef o̩wo̩-wñ tʼoj eti awo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ le̩ kpai tʼoji onu o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ kpai tʼoji onu e̩re̩-wñ awo̩to̩, noji e̩bie̩ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩;
tak atama le̩ adʼe̩bie̩ ki bo̩ ef o̩wo̩-wñ tʼoji e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩. Tak atama le̩ ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ o̩gba Jihofa.
Atama le̩ la achʼiche̩bo̩ adure kʼi che e̩wñ e̩boma tod e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ bʼe̩daji-wñ te̩ le̩. Anubi e-le̩ tak i akpa e̩la iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
tak atama akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ ele wa chʼiche̩bo̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩. Abe̩le̩ oñ atama ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ, tak i afe̩.

I la che̩wñ kʼi chʼe̩nubie̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ma tu e̩wñ nana abe̩le̩ n, mak i adʼo̩ma alaʼka wa kʼi chʼiche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ ku ma amiejo, ku ma che e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ, kpai ukpe̩ e̩ke̩gwa e̩fa omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu tod e̩wñ ele-wñ, manyʼekpo e̩ñwa lo̩g oka;
kpai amo̩ma ikede meji, cho̩kpo̩ni i chʼamo̩ma o̩ke̩te̩be̩ meji, alu kʼo̩wo̩-wñ atu; oka-wñ la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ adure, ekeji-wñ la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ i akʼabʼe-le̩ wʼugbo atama kʼi gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, o̩gba Jihofa;
tak atama adʼo̩mokolo iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩ kpai ekpo e̩ñwa lo̩g oka wa oñ atama ami e-le̩ ejo todu iche̩bo̩ emiejo o̩gba Jihofa.

Tak i adʼo̩mo̩kolo e-abi eje̩ le̩ kpa; tak atama ache e̩bie̩ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩ pe̩, oñ i adʼu tʼoj eti awo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩ le̩, kpai tʼoj onu o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩, kpai tʼoj onu e̩re̩-wñ awo̩to̩.
Tak atama adʼekpo le̩ danyʼe̩do̩wo̩ e-wñ onugo awohi pe̩;
oñ i anʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ dʼekpo kʼi dʼo̩wo̩-wñ awohi tafio̩ o̩gba Jihofa onu mebie;

tak atama le̩ la aba ekpo ki dʼo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ tʼoj eti awo̩to̩ e-e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwo̩la rinyo̩ le̩ kpai tʼoj onu o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ kpai tʼoj onu e̩re̩-wñ awo̩to̩, ugbo ku ma dʼe̩bie̩ iche̩bo̩ abi eje̩ le̩ te̩;
tak ekpo ki bo̩, owñ chʼe-ki dʼe̩do̩wo̩ atama le̩ i adʼu tʼoj e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma gwo̩la rinyo̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ o̩gba Jihofa.
Tak i adʼikedeʼka abe̩k amo̩mo̩ke̩te̩be̩ʼka wa che, owñ chʼalu kʼo̩wo̩-wñ tu,

alu kʼo̩wo̩-wñ tu le̩ oka-wñ chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ adure, ekeji-wñ la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo manyʼe̩wñ ele kʼi aduwa le̩; oñ atama la ache e̩wñ e̩boma o̩gba Jihofa tod e̩ne̩ ku ma che ku mu gwo̩la rinyo̩ le̩.
E-le̩ chʼuko̩-o̩la ugbo e̩ne̩ kʼo̩ga ikpemute dʼo̩la-wñ, e-kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ma tu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ egwo̩la rinyo̩ le̩ n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kakini,
E̩gba ku me̩ lewʼane̩ Kenan e-kʼu nadu ñwu me̩ ku me̩ ne̩, kʼomi la mʼo̩ga ikpemute du tef unyiʼka oj ane̩ ku me̩ ne̩ le̩;
e̩gbale̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼunyi le̩ awa ka ñw atama kakini, Eju-mi i dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩gaʼka dʼef unyi-mi.
Tak atama le̩ añwa ñwu ma ku ma tʼunyi le̩ no̩ o̩dagbolo o̩gba tak atama anyʼejefu kʼi go o̩ga le̩, tode̩gba kʼi aka kʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef unyi le̩ mudaji; ubile̩ tak atama anyʼejefu kʼi go unyi le̩.
Tak i atejane̩ o̩ga le̩; i la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ dʼef o̩do̩ unyi dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩lo̩do̩ le̩ mubu, kʼi chemimi eju abe̩k ekpikpa, kʼi go kʼi la dabe̩ne̩ kʼi te̩ tʼejefu o̩do̩ le̩;
e̩gbale̩ atama adufu wʼalugbo̩na unyi le̩, kʼi la fʼo̩na unyi le̩ re o̩jo̩ mebie.
Tak atama le̩ adabi wa o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ, oñ i agʼo; i la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ mukpatuka bʼo̩lo̩do̩ unyi le̩ ma;
e̩gbale̩ tak atama añwa ñwu ma ku ma mʼokuta kʼo̩ga le̩ jʼefu-wñ chi ku ma mʼu ko rikpolo tʼugbo ki ma fe̩ n ejo̩do̩da ewo le̩;
tak i aje̩ ñwu ma fʼo̩lo̩do̩ unyi le̩ ña lʼejefu-wñ daka, taku ma akʼike̩te̩ ku ma ña rinyo̩ le̩ wa adafo ejo̩do̩da ewo le̩ ugbo ki ma fe̩ n;
taku ma akʼokuta omune̩ tunyʼe̩gu ugbo ku ma chi okuta le̩ kwo, oñ i anʼike̩te̩ omune̩ fʼolo̩do̩ unyi le̩ kwo̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga le̩ ño̩ dabi tu dufu ef unyi le̩ abu kʼi mʼokuta-wñ chi, kʼi la fʼo̩lo̩do̩ unyi le̩ ña, kʼi la fʼu kwo,
e̩gbale̩ atama anyʼago; i la che̩wñ kʼo̩ga mukpatuka ef unyi le̩ mak o̩ga kʼi danyʼane̩ efu unyi le̩ i che: e̩wñ elifo̩ de̩.
Tak i agu unyi le̩ lo̩, tʼokuta-wñ, tʼigbo oli-wñ, tʼike̩te̩ unyi le̩ chaka; oñ i ako kwef ewo le̩ dufu tʼugbo ki ma fe̩ n.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, e̩ne̩ du kʼi mugudu tef unyi le̩ abu ku ma fu re, o̩la e̩ne̩ le̩ mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi dachi ef unyi le agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi aje̩ e̩wñ ef unyi le̩ agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ.
I muda che̩wñ kʼatama le̩ lewa tejane̩, kʼo̩ga le̩ ma kpatuka ef unyi abu ku ma fʼu kwo̩ le̩ n, e̩gbale̩ tak atama atʼojomu ka kʼunyi le̩ fe̩ me̩, todabu kʼo̩ga-wñ takpa.
Tak i ane̩ ame̩we̩ ke̩ke̩ meji kpai oli sida kpai e̩wñ ekpikpa kpai oli hiso̩p wa, kʼi gwʼunyi le̩ rinyo̩.
Oñ i akpa e̩we̩ʼka tef ucha ku ma nʼama bo̩, oji omi ki acha,
tak i akʼoli sida kpai hiso̩p kpai e̩wñ ekpikpa manyʼe̩we̩ kʼi deju le̩ wa, oñ i akʼe-le̩ tunyʼe̩bie̩ e̩we̩ ku ma kpa, kpai tunyʼomi ki acha le̩, kʼi tafio̩ unyi le̩ onu mebie.
Abe̩le̩ i anʼe̩bie̩ e̩we̩ le̩ kpai omi ki acha kpai e̩we̩ kʼi deju kpai oli sida kpai hisop kpai e̩wñ ekpikpa le̩ gwʼunyi le̩ rinyo̩;
oñ i atʼe̩we̩ ki deju no̩ tʼo̩do̩da ewo le̩ tʼegbili pee; abe̩le̩ i ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod unyi le̩, tak i afe̩.
E-le̩ chʼuko̩-o̩la tod o̩ga ikpemute uche̩ uche̩ du kpai todu o̩ga e̩ru o̩la,
kpai todu o̩ga ikpemute ki dʼo̩la ukpo, abe̩k unyi,
kpai todu e̩dawu kpai todu eikpa kpai todu olula;
kʼi ko̩ ma iko kʼe̩wñ ma fe̩ n, kpai iko kʼi fe̩: uko̩-o̩la ugbo o̩ga ikpemute le̩ de̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n, i kakini,
Me̩ ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l, kakini, E̩gba kʼo̩la e̩ne̩ du agbʼe̩ño̩ hiaala, e̩ño̩-wñ le̩ adʼo̩ o̩la ji.
Alu kʼe̩daji-wñ ef e̩ño̩-wñ e̩gba hiaala ade̩ de̩; dagba o̩la-wñ agba hiaala dufu, dagba i ma dufu n, e̩daji i che ñw u.
Ate̩ du kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi agbʼe̩ño̩ hiaala le̩ dachi oji-wñ mudaji; e̩wñ du kʼi la gugu oji-wñ adaji ge̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ kwokado ate̩-wñ le̩ agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ, tak i gwʼo̩la-wñ onugo ef omiofo, i la mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi la gugu oj e̩wñ du kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi arʼe̩ño̩ le̩ gugu agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ, tak i agwʼo̩la-wñ onugo ef omiofo, o̩la-wñ la adaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
E̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ kadʼaño̩la e̩ne̩ kʼi arʼe̩ño̩ agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ, kʼi la gwʼo̩la-wñ onugo ef omiofo, o̩la-wñ la adaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi arʼe̩ño̩ fʼito̩ to̩ rʼe̩ne̩ ki fe̩ o̩la, mak e̩ne̩ le̩ agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ kʼi la fʼo̩la-wñ onugo gwe̩ ef omiofo, o̩la-wñ la adaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
Ohidi du kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi arʼe̩ño̩ le̩ gugu oji-wñ mudaji.

O̩la e̩ne̩ du kʼi la dʼo̩wo̩ kado e̩wñ ki hi ofe-wñ mo̩ la adaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi la dʼe̩wñ abe̩le̩ nʼo̩wo̩ agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ, tak i agwʼo̩la-wñ onugo ef omiofo, o̩la-wñ la adaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi arʼe̩ño̩ do̩wo̩kado e̩gba kʼi ma gwʼo̩wo̩-wñ ejodudu n, e̩ne̩ le̩ agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ, tak i agwʼo̩la ef omifo, o̩la-wñ la adaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
E̩wñ eku du ku ma nʼama bo̩ kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ar ʼe̩ño̩ le̩ do̩wo̩kado ma adʼu kpo̩fo̩; oñ e̩wñ eku du ku ma nʼoli fa, e-le̩ ma ala nyo̩ ef omiofo.

Tak e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi rʼe̩ño̩ le̩ ache kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ gworinyo̩ bʼe̩ño̩-wñ le̩ te̩, i abʼo̩jo̩ mebie ñw o̩la-wñ todu kʼi gwʼo̩la-wñ rinyo̩, oñ i agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ; tak i agwe̩ o̩la-wñ onugo ef omiofo ki acha, tak i afe̩.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ i akʼamikede meji cho̩kpo̩ni i chʼamo̩mo̩ke̩te̩be̩ meji, kʼi lewa o̩gba Jihofa ugbo alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, tak i akʼo ñw atama;
oñ atama le̩ akʼe-le̩ wa chʼiche̩bo̩, oka-wñ chʼiche̩bo̩ adure, ekeji-wñ la chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo; oñ atama le̩ ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ o̩gba Jihofa tod e̩ño̩-wñ ki dufu le̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼato̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du kwefu-wñ dufu, e̩gbale̩ i agwʼo̩la-wñ chaka ef omiofo, i la adaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
Ma la anʼomiofo gwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la du, kpai año̩ du kʼato̩ le̩ tʼo̩, i la mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bʼonobule̩ dachi kʼi mʼo̩la da, ama meji le̩ agwʼo̩la ef omiofo, oñ ma mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼonobule̩ agbʼe̩bie̩ kʼi chʼe-kʼi agba dufu ochu ochu le̩, mak i adʼef o̩la e̩daji-wñ le̩ gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie, e̩ne̩ du kʼi la do̩wo̩kadʼo mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
Oñ e̩wñ du kʼonobule̩ le̩ dachi oji-wñ ef e̩daji-wñ le̩ mudaji; e̩wñ du kʼi la gugu oji-wñ mudaji ge̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ la kadʼate̩-wñ agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ onugo, kʼi la fʼo̩la-wñ gwe̩ ef omiofo, o̩la-wñ la mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ la kad e̩wñ kʼi gugu oji-wñ agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, kʼi laño̩ gwʼo̩la-wñ onugo ef omiofo, o̩la-wñ la mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩;
dagba kʼi chʼate̩, dagba ki chʼe̩wñ kʼonobule̩ le̩ gugu oji-wñ, e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ do̩wo̩kadʼo mak o̩la-wñ mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du bʼo̩ dachi, kʼo̩la e̩kpabie̩-wñ kwo tʼo̩ o̩la, mak o̩la e̩ne̩ le̩ mudaji gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie; ate̩ du kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ dachi oji-wñ ño̩ mudaji ge̩.

I la che̩wñ kʼo̩la onobule̩ rʼe̩bie̩ o̩jo̩ wewe ki ma chʼiko elifo̩-wñ n, abe̩k iche̩wñ kʼe̩bie̩ le̩ kpo̩kpe̩ tʼalu kʼiko elifo̩-wñ de̩ le, aluka o̩jo̩ du kʼere̩bie̩ e-o̩la e̩kpabie̩-wñ akade i adʼef o̩la e̩daji-wñ; ef o̩jo̩ elifo̩-wñ n, abe̩le̩ i mudaji.
Ate̩ du kʼi dachi oji-wñ o̩jo̩ du kʼi arʼe̩bie̩ kade ade̩ alu kʼate̩ elifo̩-wñ de̩ ñw u; oñ e̩wñ du kʼi la gugu oji-wñ mudaji, alu kʼe̩daji iko elifo̩-wñ de̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi la do̩wo̩kadʼe̩wñ le̩ mudaji ge̩; i la agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, kʼi la fʼo̩la-wñ onugo gwe̩ ef omiofo, i la mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼi fe̩ bʼe̩bie̩ eru-wñ te̩, tak i abʼo̩jo̩ mebie ñw o̩la-wñ, ubile̩ tak i afe̩.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ i akʼamikede meji abe̩k amo̩mo̩ke̩te̩be̩ meji wa ñw atama ugbo alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju.
Tak atama adʼoka-wñ che iche̩bo̩ adure, ekeji-wñ la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo; oñ atama ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ o̩gba Jihofa, tod e̩re̩bie̩ e̩daji-wñ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ oñ ame̩ afʼamo̩ma Israe̩l date̩ bʼo̩la e̩daji-ma te̩, tode̩gba ku ma ku ef o̩la e̩daji-ma, ugbo ku ma fʼuña ugugu-mi kʼi dʼalumeji-ma le̩ bie̩.
E-kide̩ chʼuko̩-o̩la e̩ne̩ kʼi arʼe̩ño̩ kpai e̩ne̩ kʼato̩-wñ kwefu-wñ dufu, kʼo̩la-wñ mudaji ugbo e̩wñ le̩;
kpai e-onobule̩ kʼi dʼef elifo̩-wñ; owñ chʼe̩ne̩ du, tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼonobule̩, kʼe̩wñʼka agbʼomi dufu año̩la-wñ, kpai tod e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ki bʼonobule̩ kʼo̩la-wñ daji dachi.
Taku Jihofa ko̩la ñwu Mose̩s, owñ chʼabu kʼamo̩ma Aro̩n meji le̩ leku, e̩gba ku ma te̩me̩rʼo̩gba Jihofa taku ma ku le̩;

oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, E̩ ka ñw Aro̩n, o̩maye-we̩, kʼi we ewa o̩gba ugugu unyie̩do̩ kʼi bʼoji akpati ibenu ma ejefu ukpo ugbeju ef uña kiafo̩ iko tʼiko du, kʼi we eku; todu omi atejugede ef akpa oj ugugu unyie̩do̩ le̩.
Alu ki ade̩ tak Aro̩n awʼef uña kiafo̩ le̩ de̩: i ane̩ o̩mʼokuno̩ e-o̩ko̩ wa todu iche̩bo̩ adure, kpai okolo tod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo.

I adʼafe̩ line̩n efufu kiafo̩ le̩ tʼo̩la, i akʼichaka line̩n efufu le̩ nyi, e̩wñ ulago line̩n efufu le̩ alʼago-wñ de, oñ i adʼalawoni line̩n efufu le̩ ji oji; e̩wñ o̩la kiafo̩ le̩ de̩. I la agwʼo̩la ef omiofo tak i ko nyʼo̩la.
Tak i agba amo̩ma obuko̩ meji ugbo o̩gbadu amo̩ma Israe̩l tod iche̩bo̩ adure, kpai okoloʼka tod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo.
Tak Aro̩n adʼo̩kokuno̩ chʼiche̩bo̩ adure todu onugo o̩la-wñ, oñ i ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod o̩la e-wñ, kpai tod abunyi-wñ.
Tak i agba amo̩mewo meji le̩ oñ i ako ma jʼo̩gba Jihofa alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju le̩;
tak Aro̩n aranya oji amo̩mewo meji le̩; oka aje̩ todu Jihofa, ekeji la aje̩ todu Azaze̩l.
Tak Aro̩n adʼo̩mewo e-kʼanya je̩ todu Jihofa le̩ wa oñ i adʼu che iche̩bo̩ adure;
ma muda adʼudeju o̩mewo e-kʼanya je̩ tod Azaze̩l wa o̩gba Jihofa, ku ma dʼu che e̩wñ e̩boma, ku ma fʼu kpuche̩ alo tef aje̩tachi todu Azaze̩l.
Tak Aro̩n adʼo̩kokuno̩ iche̩bo̩ adure e-wñ le̩ wa oñ i ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod o̩la-wñ kpai abunyi-wñ; i la adʼo̩kokuno̩ iche̩bo̩ adure le̩ kpa todu onugo o̩la-wñ.
Tak i akʼe̩ge̩ una e̩ko̩ anadeʼka kwo oji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ki dʼo̩gba Jihofa le̩, kpai e̩wñ ki akpo ku ma gwu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ e̩kʼo̩wo̩-wñ meji; oñ i akʼe-le̩ wʼejefu ukpo ugbeju;
kʼi mʼe̩wñ ki akpo le̩ ko nyʼuna o̩gba Jihofa kʼodudu-wñ ki lewa abʼoj ugugu unyie̩do̩ ki nʼoj akpati ibenu le̩ ma, kʼi we eku;
tak i achʼe̩bie̩ o̩kokuno̩ le̩ kʼi la nʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ taño̩ ejo̩gba o̩la ugugu unyie̩do̩ le̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ; i anʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ tʼe̩bie̩ le̩ fio̩ o̩gba ugugu unyie̩do̩ le̩ onu mebie.
