E̩gbale̩ tak i akpa o̩mewo e-iche̩bo̩ adure, owñ chʼe-kʼi chʼutodu amone̩ le̩, oñ i adʼe̩bie̩-wñ wʼejefu ukpo ugbeju le̩ kʼi anʼe̩bie̩-wñ che alu kʼi che kpai e̩bie̩ o̩kokuno̩ le̩, kʼi la atafio̩ oj ugugu unyie̩do̩, kpai o̩gba ugugu unyie̩do̩ le̩;
abe̩le̩ i ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod uña kiafo̩ le̩, tod e̩daji kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l daji, kpai todu echada-ma, owñ chʼaluka adure-ma du; abe̩le̩ i año̩ che tod unyabo ujeju kʼi dʼugbo ma alumeji e̩daji-ma.

E̩ne̩ du la adʼef unyabo ujeju e̩gba kʼi anyʼo̩mo̩ kʼi che e̩wñ e̩boma ef uña kiafo̩ le̩ n, gbogbo tak i la fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che tod o̩la e-wñ kpai todu abunyi-wñ kpai todu ujeju abo Israe̩l chaka kʼi ño̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu.
Tak i adufu nyʼugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi dʼo̩gba Jihofa kʼi ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod e-le̩ ge̩, oñ i ache e̩bie̩ o̩kokuno̩ kpai e̩bie̩ o̩mewo le̩, kʼi adʼu kado igba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ lale daka.
Tak i anʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ tʼe̩bie̩ le̩ fio̩ oji-wñ onu mebie, kʼi gwʼo̩ o̩la rinyo̩, kʼi la che kʼi fo̩ bʼe̩daji amo̩ma Israe̩l te̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi fʼe̩wñ e̩boma tod uña kiafo̩ kpai unyabo ujeju kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ che kpa, tak i adʼo̩mewo ki deju le̩ wa;

tak Aro̩n akʼo̩wo̩-wñ meji noji o̩mewo ki deju le̩, kʼi agbalu o̩chaka udu kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l fe̩ kpai echada-ma oji-wñ, owñ chʼo̩chaka adure-ma; i la akʼo noji o̩mewo le̩, kʼi dʼu kpuche̩ tef aje̩tachi lʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi fʼo̩la mu tane̩.
Oñ o̩mewo le̩ akʼudu-ma chaka nʼoji anyʼef ane̩ ugbo ki chʼe̩date̩ bʼone̩ te̩; tak e̩ne̩ le̩ atʼo̩mewo le̩ no̩ tef aje̩tachi o̩mo̩.
Tak Aro̩n awʼef unyabo ujeju, oñ i akʼe̩wñ o̩la line̩n efufu kʼi ko̩ nyʼo̩la e̩gba kʼi nyʼef uña kiafo̩ le̩ jʼane̩ kʼi atʼo̩ no̩ jʼo̩mo̩;

tak i agwʼo̩la-wñ ef omiofo ugboʼka kiafo̩ kʼi la kʼe̩wñ o̩la e-wñ nyʼo̩la, tak i akwo o̩mo̩ dufu, kʼi fʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-wñ kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-amone̩ che, kʼi fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che tod o̩la-wñ kpai todu amone̩ le̩.
Tak i akʼula e̩la iche̩bo̩ adure le̩ gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki atʼo̩mewo le̩ no̩ tod Azaze̩l agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ kpai o̩la e-wñ ef omiofo, ubile̩ tak i anʼugbo kʼi awʼef uru le̩.

Tak ama ki mʼoku o̩kokuno̩ iche̩bo̩ adure, kpai e-o̩mewo iche̩bo̩ adure, e-ku ma dʼe̩bie̩-wñ wa che e̩wñ e̩boma ef uña kiafo̩ le̩, ko jʼo̩do̩da uru; ma ki kʼaño̩-ma kpai e̩la-ma kpai echu-ma gujo ef una.
Oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi gu ma jo le̩ agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, tak i la agwʼo̩la-wñ ef omiofo, ubile̩ tak i a nʼugbo kʼi awʼef uru le̩.
E̩wñ ki la achʼuhio̩me̩ ogbegbele̩ ñwu me̩ de̩, kakini, ef ochu e̩kebie, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa ochu le̩, me̩ ki hi onugo o̩la-me̩ wane̩, me̩ ki la chʼuko̩lo̩ du n, tʼo̩mane̩, tʼilowa kʼi ge̩ne̩ ef ume̩;
todu o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i ma ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu me̩ kʼi fʼume̩ gworinyo̩; me̩ ki fe̩ bʼadure-me̩ du te̩ eju Jihofa.
O̩jo̩ uñmi ku me̩ ñmi choo i che ñwu me̩, me̩ ki la fʼonugo-me̩ dema te̩; uhio̩me̩-wñ che e-ogbegbele̩.
Tak atama ku ma fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji, ku me̩ la kʼe̩wñ nyʼu o̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ kʼi chʼatama koji ata-wñ, akʼe̩wñ o̩la line̩n efufu kiafo̩ le̩ nyʼo̩la, kʼi fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che;
i la ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod uña kiafo̩, i la ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod unyabo ujeju kpai todu ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, oñ i ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod amatama kpai todu abo ujeju le̩ chaka.
E̩wñ-i la achʼuhio̩me̩ ogbegbele̩ ñwu me̩, ku me̩ ki che e̩wñ e̩boma tod amo̩ma Israe̩l tod adure-ma du onuʼka o̩do̩ʼka. Oñ Mose̩s che alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñw u.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai amo̩ma Israe̩l chaka kakini, E̩wñ ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu me̩ la de̩, kakini,
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Israe̩l oka fʼo̩kokuno̩ abe̩k ala abe̩k ewo kpa ef uru-i, abe̩k i dʼu kpa ejo̩do̩da uru-i,

kʼi ma la dʼu wʼalugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, kʼi ma dʼu wa chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ ñwu Jihofa o̩gba uña ugugu Jihofa ejodudu n, me̩ afʼudu e̩bie̩ lorʼe̩ne̩ le̩; i mʼe̩bie̩ du dafo me̩; ma akʼe̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼamone̩-wñ te̩.
Owñ chʼutodu kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l ki kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ ku ma kpa egbili wa ñwu Jihofa, ugbo atama alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, ku ma ki kpa che e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ ñwu Jihofa;
tak atama atʼe̩bie̩-wñ fio̩ o̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa kʼi dʼalugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, kʼi la fʼula-wñ gujo kʼi kpo ru Jihofa.
Abe̩le̩ ma ñʼakpa e̩wñ e̩bie̩-ma ñw ikpakachi ge̩ n, owñ chʼe-ku ma ajo̩ko̩ bʼo̩ ej ubi le̩. Ei-ki chʼuhio̩me̩ ñwu ma nyʼo̩hio̩gu-ma ogbegbele̩.
Tak uwe̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abo Israe̩l du abe̩k amilowa ku ma jʼef abo ku ma ge̩ne̩ efu-ma le̩, kʼi du e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo abe̩k e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ du wa che,
kʼi ma la dʼu wʼalugbo̩na unyabo ujeju kʼi kpa ñwu Jihofa n; ma akʼe̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼamone̩-wñ te̩.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ef abo Israe̩l abe̩k ef amilowa ku ma ge̩ne̩ efu-ma, kʼi fʼe̩bie̩ e̩wñ du je̩ re, eju-mi akparu onugo one̩ kʼi jʼe̩bie̩ le̩, oñ nafʼu ko̩da bʼamone̩-wñ te̩.
Todu onugo iñmi o̩re̩la dʼef e̩bie̩; oñ omi mʼu du ñwu me̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ e̩boma tod onugo iñmi e-me̩; todu e̩bie̩ chʼe̩wñ e̩boma lef onugo iñmi le̩.
Todule̩ u ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini. E̩ne̩ du efu-me̩ aje̩ e̩bie̩ n, ilowa du kʼi ge̩ne̩ efu-me̩ la aje̩ e̩bie̩ n.
Oñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ef amo̩ma Israe̩l, abe̩k ef amilowa ku ma ge̩ne̩ efu-ma le̩, kʼi la kpa e̩wñ iñmi abe̩k e̩we̩ ku ma je̩ ef o̩de̩ adʼe̩bie̩-wñ dajane̩, i ki gbʼebutu bʼo ma.
Todu i chʼe-iñmi o̩re̩la du, e̩bie̩-wñ chʼiñmi-wñ; todule̩ u ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, Ame̩ ki je̩ e̩bie̩ o̩re̩la e̩wñ du n; todu iñmi o̩re̩la du chʼe̩bie̩-wñ; ma la akʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi je̩ da tinyo̩.

Oñ onugo e̩ne̩ du kʼi je̩ e̩la ki ku tinyo̩ ofo, abe̩k e-kʼe̩la fana, dagba i chʼo̩mane̩ dagba i chʼilowa, e̩ne̩ le̩ agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ ef omiofo, kʼi la fʼo̩la-wñ gwe̩ ef omiofo, oñ i mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩: e̩gbale̩ tak i afe̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼi ma gwe̩ n, abe̩k i ma gwʼo̩la n, e̩gbale̩ i ane̩ udu-wñ.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l, kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩.
Ame̩ ki che likpa alu kʼabo oj ane̩ Ijipti ugbo ku me̩ dodo le̩ ache n; me̩ ki la che likpa alu ku ma che oj ane̩ Kenan ugbo kʼu nako me̩ nyi le̩ n. Me̩ ki la lule̩ tikpa uhio̩me̩ e-ma n,
Alu kʼoj ajo̩-mi te̩ me̩ ki che, me̩ ki la de e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, ku me̩ lule̩ tikpa e-le̩; omi, Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩.
Todule̩ me̩ ade e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, kpai alu kʼoj ajo̩-mi ka, e-le̩ chʼe-kʼone̩ ache kʼi adeju lʼugbo-wñ: omi, Jihofa de̩.
E̩ne̩ du efu-me̩ ki te̩me̩rʼe̩ne̩ kʼi che efu-wñ anane̩, kʼi fʼu tago ofo n: omi, Jihofa de̩.
E̩ ki fʼata-we̩ tʼago ofo n, owñ chʼago iye-we̩; iye-we̩ de̩, e̩ ki fʼu tago ofo n.
Uwe̩ ki tʼo̩ya ata-we̩ ago ofo n: ago ofo ata-we̩ de̩.
E̩ ki tʼo̩maye-we̩ onobule̩ ago ofo n, dagba i chʼo̩ma ata-we̩, dagba i chʼo̩ma iye-we̩, dagba ma bi unyi, dagba ma bi ugbo onume̩, e̩ ki te̩ ago ofo n.
E̩ ki tʼonobule̩ kʼi chʼo̩ma o̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k e-o̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ ago ofo n: todu ago ofo e-ma chʼago ofo e-we̩ onugo.
E̩ ki tʼonobule̩ kʼi chʼo̩ma o̩ya ata-we̩ kʼi bi ñw ata-we̩ ago ofo n, o̩maye-we̩ de̩, e̩ ki fʼu tago ofo n.
E̩ ki fʼo̩maye ata-we̩ onobule̩ tago ofo n; efu ata-we̩ pio̩o̩ de̩.
E̩ ki fʼo̩maye iye-we̩ e-onobule̩ tago ofo n, todu efu iye-we̩ pio̩o̩ de̩.
E̩ ki la tʼo̩maye ata-we̩ e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ago ofo n, e̩ ki te̩me̩rʼoya-wñ n; iye-we̩ de̩.
Uwe̩ ki tʼo̩ya o̩ma-we̩ ago ofo n; o̩ya o̩ma-we̩ de̩, uwe̩ atʼo̩ ago ofo n.
Uwe̩ ki tʼo̩ya o̩maye-we̩ ago ofo n; todu ago ofo o̩maye-we̩ de̩.
Uwe̩ ki tʼonobule̩ kpai o̩ma-wñ onobule̩ ago ofo n, uwe̩ ki la dʼo̩ma o̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k o̩ma-wñ onobule̩ kʼe̩ fʼu tago ofo n; efu-we̩ pio̩o̩ de̩; ibe e̩wñ tuñ e-le̩ che.
Uwe̩ ki la ne̩ o̩ya manyʼo̩maye-wñ kʼi chʼo o̩bata abu kʼo̩maye-wñ deju ta, kʼe̩ la fʼu tago ofo n.
Uwe̩ ki te̩me̩ru onobule̩ ki dʼelifo̩ kʼe̩ fʼu tago ofo n.
E̩ ki bʼo̩ya ekeji-we̩ dachi kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ daji ugbo-wñ n.
E̩ ki mʼugbe̩-we̩ʼka du te̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw u kʼi le gu ef una du tu-gbo Mole̩k kʼe̩ la dʼe-le̩ kpa odu O̩jo̩-we̩ bie̩ n: omi, Jihofa de̩.
E̩ ki la bʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ dachi alu ku ma che kpai onobule̩ n: e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ e-le̩ che.
E̩ ki bʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ dachi kʼe̩ kpʼo̩la-we̩ bie̩ ugbo-wñ n; onobule̩ du la adʼo̩la-wñ ñw e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ʼka kʼi bʼo̩ dachi n: e̩wñ omefa e-le̩ che.
Me̩ ki kpʼo̩la-me̩ bie̩ ef e̩wñ-i du n, todu ef e̩wñ-i du oñ abo uche̩ichi e-kʼu nane ma dufu bʼo̩gba-me̩ te̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ kpabie̩ me̩;
ane̩ le̩ la mubie̩ me̩, todule̩ nawa dʼudu-wñ bʼo oji ma, oñ ane̩ le̩ are̩ abo-wñ rinyo̩.
Ame̩ ki muda ade uhio̩me̩-mi, kpai oji ajo̩-mi kʼu ka; me̩ ki la che e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-i du n, tʼo̩mane̩ tʼilowa kʼi ge̩ne̩ efu-me̩,
(todu e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-i du abo ane̩ o̩mo̩ te̩tache, owñ chʼabo ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ o̩gba ñwu me̩, oñ ane̩ le̩ mubie̩ te̩);
todu kʼane̩ le̩ ki we ere̩ me̩ rinyo̩ alu kʼi re̩ abo uche̩ ichi ki dʼo̩gba-me̩ rinyo̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-iʼka che, owñ chʼonugo abo du ku ma che, ma akʼuma da bʼamone̩-ma te̩.
Todule̩ me̩ ki de e̩wñ ide-mi ka ku me̩ ki we eche e̩wñ o̩hio̩gu ihie̩ne̩ ku ma jʼache o̩gba-me̩ le̩, kʼame̩ ki we ekpʼo̩la-me̩ bie̩ efu-wñ; omi, Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw o̩gbadu amo̩ma Israe̩l kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ki fo̩; todu omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, afo̩.
E̩ne̩ du efu-me̩ abumʼiye-wñ kpai ata-wñ, me̩ la ade o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi; omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.
Me̩ ki rida tugbo e̩wñ ofofo le̩ n, me̩ ki la fʼamo̩jo̩ da ñw o̩la-me̩ n; omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩.
E̩gba ku me̩ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa kpa ñwu Jihofa me̩ che alu ku me̩ ache ku me̩ arʼo̩ e̩do̩.
Me̩ ki dʼu je̩ o̩jo̩ ku me̩ dʼu wa che kpai o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ; e-du ki bo̩ gbʼo̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ ma anʼuna agujo.
I la che̩wñ ku me̩ je̩ re o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ, mak e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ i che, me̩ arʼo̩ e̩do̩ n,
e̩ne̩ du kʼi la aje̩ ane̩ udu-wñ, todabu kʼi fʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ e-Jihofa bie̩; ma akʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼamone̩-wñ te̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku me̩ kpa e̩wñ oko ane̩-me̩, me̩ ki kpa nyʼane̩ ago̩go̩-wñ me̩le̩ n, me̩ ki kʼe̩fiye̩ e̩wñ oko-me̩ ki bo̩ jʼane̩ n.
E̩ ki ko̩ e̩fiye̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ n, e̩ ki fʼe̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ ki wʼane̩ yajo̩ n; me̩ ki tʼo̩ no̩ ñw ame̩no̩bata kpai amilowa: omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.
Ame̩ ki joji n; me̩ ki chuji n; me̩ ki la rʼomune̩ olemi n.
Me̩ ki la go̩ odu-mi olemi ku me̩ fʼodu O̩jo̩-me̩ bie̩ n: omi, Jihofa, de̩.
E̩ ki la che ekeji-we̩ o̩lachi n, e̩ ki jʼowñ oji n. O̩me̩ e̩nuko̩lo̩-we̩ ki le̩ ñw o̩jo̩ o̩wo̩-we̩ n.
E̩ ki la bʼamajeti ina n, e̩ ki la dʼe̩wñ uke̩re̩ tʼo̩gba ñw afeju n, e̩ ki muda arailo O̩jo̩-we̩: omi, Jihofa, de̩.
Me̩ ki la chuji re ef ajo̩ n; me̩ ki bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ñw e̩nubie̩ n, me̩ ki la bumo̩ ame̩ne̩lile n; uwe̩ ki muda akajo̩ ekeji-we̩ lʼo̩na o̩kpakpa.
E̩ ki tʼaro̩lo̩ ef amone̩-we̩ n, e̩ ki la chechi dago e̩gba ku ma tene oji ekeji-we̩ n: omi, Jihofa, de̩.
Ulaka o̩maye-we̩ ki dʼe̩do̩-we̩ n, uwe̩ ki muda dʼo̩la bi ekeji-we̩ chuu, kʼe̩ we edure todu-wñ.
E̩ ki nache n, e̩ ki la dʼo̩la amo̩ma abo-we̩ tʼe̩do̩ n; e̩ ki muda fe̩do̩ ekeji-we̩ dab o̩la-we̩: omi, Jihofa, de̩.
Me̩ ki de uhio̩me̩-mi. Me̩ ki je̩ ñw ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩-me̩ ojoji ojoji ki kpʼo̩la-ma n; e̩ ki kʼulu e̩wñ meji kpe̩gwa nyʼomune̩ agbe̩ oko-we̩ n; ukpo ku ma nʼe̩wñ ojoji meji hi ki bʼo̩la-me̩ ma n.

E̩ne̩ du kʼi la bʼonobule̩ kʼi chʼadu dachi, owñ chʼe-ku ma du kpʼo̩ko̩, ku ma ma la fʼu la tane̩ n, ku ma ma la dʼu chʼo̩mone̩ n, me̩ gwili-wñ. Mala ako ma kpa n, todabu kʼonobule̩ le̩ ma nʼo̩la-wñ n.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ muda adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ udu kʼi fe̩ wa ñwu Jihofa, alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, owñ chʼokolo tod iche̩bo̩ udu efe̩.
Tak atama adʼokolo e-iche̩bo̩ udu efe̩ le̩ che e̩wñ e̩boma tod uwñ o̩gba Jihofa tod adure kʼi ta; oñ ma atʼadure kʼi ta le̩ no̩ ñw u.
Oñ e̩gba ku me̩ lewa oj ane̩ le̩ ku me̩ la ne oli e̩ro ojoji ojoji du ku me̩ je̩, e̩gbale̩ e̩ro-wñ adabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ e̩pi odukulu ñwu me̩; o̩do̩ me̩ta i achʼelifo̩ ñwu me̩; me̩ ki je̩ n.
Oñ o̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩-wñ e̩ro-wñ du afo̩, todu kʼi chʼe̩wñ ugwa ñwu Jihofa.
Tak o̩do̩ e̩ke̩lu-wñ me̩ aje̩ e̩ro-wñ, todu kʼi ro nana ñwu me̩: omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.
Me̩ ki je̩ e̩la du kʼe̩bie̩ bo̩ efu-wñ n. Me̩ ki nyʼugbo etikpo̩gu n, me̩ ki ne̩ agegugile̩ n.
Me̩ ki kʼe̩re̩ oji okokolo n, me̩ ki ja o̩wo̩ meji ilagba-me̩ kʼi bo̩ piepiele n.
Me̩ ki dʼabe̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ da todu abo ki ku n, me̩ ki la ko̩ ina du año̩la-me̩ n: omi, Jihofa, de̩.
E̩ ki kpʼo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ bie̩ kʼi mud ajo̩ko̩ n; tode̩gba kʼane̩ le̩ añwa tef o̩ko̩ eje̩, kʼane̩ le̩ kpe̩ko̩ ñw ibe ebibi.
Me̩ ki de o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi; me̩ ki la bʼe̩gahi mʼuña-mi kiafo̩ le̩: omi, Jihofa, de̩.
Me̩ ki rida tugbo abo ku ma dʼ iche̩kpa kpai ake̩ma n; me̩ ki tejane̩ ma ku ma fʼume̩ bie̩ n; omi, Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.
E̩ ki kwane̩ dago ñw abiloji efufu; kʼe̩ la bʼojima mʼeju e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼogijo; e̩ ki la railo O̩jo̩-we̩: omi, Jihofa, de̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼilowa ge̩ne̩ oj ane̩-we̩ kpai uwe̩, ame̩ ki chʼo ihianyi n.
Ilowa kʼi ge̩ne̩ kpai uwe̩ adab o̩mane̩ ñw e̩, e̩ ki la fe̩do̩ owñ dab o̩la-we̩; todu ame̩ chʼamilowa oj ane̩ Ijipti le̩: omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.
Uji du ki dʼef ajo̩ ku me̩ ka n, owñ chʼef ujiji e̩wñ eñwa kpai ef uwoji e̩wñ kpai ef alu kʼe̩wñ nana kade.
Me̩ ki nʼe̩bo̩ o̩kpakpa kpai okuta o̩kpakpa, kpai uñwʼe̩yo̩ o̩kpakpa, kpai uñwa ekpo o̩kpakpa: omi che Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, kʼi ko me̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu le̩.
Me̩ ki la fejutʼuhio̩me̩-mi chaka kpai oji ajo̩ kʼu du te̩ chaka ku me̩ fʼu che: omi, Jihofa, de̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

Anubi e-le̩ ge̩, uwe̩ ki ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼo̩ma Israe̩l, abe̩k ilowa kʼi ge̩ne̩ ef abo Israe̩l kʼi mʼo̩ma-wñ du ñwu Mole̩k, ma adʼu kpa chuu; amone̩ ane̩ le̩ ako okuta ro̩ dʼowñ.
Omi onugo afʼeju-mi kparʼe̩ne̩ le̩, kʼu nako̩da bʼef amone̩-wñ te̩, todabu kʼi dʼo̩ma-wñ oka ñwu Mole̩k, kʼi la fʼuña-mi kiafo̩ daji, kʼi ño̩ fʼodu-mi kiafo̩ bie̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼamone̩ ane̩ le̩ fʼeju-ma kpo̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ bo re e̩gba kʼi adʼo̩ma-wñ oka ñwu Mole̩k, ku ma ma mʼu du kpa n,
e̩gbale̩ eju-mi akparʼe̩ne̩ le̩, kpai akwo̩ra unyi-wñ, oñ nakʼuma da bʼef amone̩-ma te̩, tʼowñ tʼabo du ku ma tʼo̩ ubi ajo̩ko̩ bo̩ Mole̩k.
Onugo e̩ne̩ du kʼi arida tugbo amake̩ma kpai amabifa, ku ma jo̩ko̩ rʼuma ubi, eju-mi akparʼe̩ne̩ le̩, oñ nakʼo̩ da bʼef amone̩-wñ te̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nache kʼo̩la-me̩ ki fo̩, ku me̩ ki mud abo kiafo̩; todu omi. Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.
Me̩ ki la de uhio̩me̩-mi, ku me̩ che tʼeju-wñ; omi, Jihofa kʼi ache ku me̩ fo̩, de̩.
Me̩ ki dʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi bʼata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ ina kpa chuu; i fʼata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ bina me̩, e̩bie̩-wñ dʼoji-wñ.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ te̩mʼo̩ya e̩ne̩ omune̩, tʼe̩ne̩ ki te̩mo̩ o̩ya ekeji-wñ— tʼache̩ño̩ya le̩ tʼajo̩ko̩ le̩ ma ako kpa.
Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi bʼo̩ya ata-wñ dachi mʼago ofo e-ata-wñ du te̩ me̩: ekpa ma akpa ejeji ma chuu, e̩bie̩-ma nʼoji o̩la e-ma onugo.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ bʼo̩ya o̩ma-wñ dachi, ma akʼejeji ma kpa chuu; ma fʼe̩wñ o̩mefa che me̩; e̩bie̩-ma nʼoji o̩la e-ma onugo.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ dachi alu ku ma che kpʼonobule̩, ejeji ma fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ che me̩; ekpa ma ako ma kpa chuu, e̩bie̩-ma nʼoji o̩la e-ma onugo.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ fʼo̩ya ne̩ kʼi fʼiye-wñ ne̩ manyʼu e̩wñ ebita i che: ma agu uma jo ef una, tʼowñ, tʼama, todu kʼibe bibi du ki we edʼefu-me̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ dachi ma adʼu kpa chuu: me̩ ki ño̩ dʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ le̩ kpa ge̩.
1 la che̩wñ kʼonobule̩ te̩me̩rʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ʼka kʼi kwo dachi ñw u, uwe̩ ki mʼonobule̩ kpai e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ le̩ ko kpa; ekpa ma akpa ma chuu; e̩bie̩-ma nʼoji o̩la e-ma onugo.

I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ mʼo̩maye-wñ onobule̩ du, owñ chʼo̩ma ata-wñ abe̩k o̩ma iye-wñ, kʼi la fʼago ofo-wñ li, kʼonobule̩ le̩ li ago ofo e-wñ; e̩wñ anyo̩ i che; ma la akʼuma da rinyo̩ eju amo̩ma aboma; i mʼago ofo e-o̩maye-wñ du te̩ me̩, i ane̩ udu-wñ.
1 la che̩wñ kʼone̩ bʼonobule̩ kʼi kpo̩labie̩ dachi, kʼi la mʼago ofo-wñ du te̩; i la mʼe̩bi e̩bie̩-wñ du te̩ ofo me̩; onobule̩ le̩ la mʼe̩bi e̩bie̩-wñ bi te̩ me̩; ma akʼejeji-ma da bʼamone̩-ma te̩.
Uwe̩ ki la fʼo̩maye iye-we̩ abe̩k o̩maye ata-we̩ tago ofo n; todu amefu-wñ pio̩o̩ oñ i futago ofo le̩: ama ane̩ udu-ma.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ bʼo̩ya omenyi-wñ abe̩k o̩ya o̩maye ata-wñ dachi, mak i fʼomenyi-wñ abe̩k ata-wñ tago ofo me̩; ama ane̩ adure-ma; ma abi o̩ma taku ma ku n.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ mʼo̩ya o̩maye-wñ du, e̩wñ elifo̩ i che; i fʼo̩maye-wñ tago ofo me̩. Ejeji-ma abi o̩ma n.
Todule̩ me̩ ki de e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi du, kpai oji ajo̩ du kʼu du te̩ ku me̩ fʼu che; todu kʼane̩ ugbo kʼu nako me̩ nyi ku me̩ dodo o̩mo̩, kʼi we ere̩ me̩ dufu.
Ame̩ ki lule̩ tikpa e̩wñ o̩hio̩gu abo uche̩ichi e-kʼu nako rikpolo dufu bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩ n; todu abo le̩ fʼe̩wñ-i du che, oñ i kʼumi o̩la.
U muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, ame̩ ane̩ ane̩-ma, oñ nadʼu ñwu me̩ ki mud e-me̩, ane̩ ugbo kʼomi e̩nya kpai iño̩ acha i che. Omi che Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, kʼi fʼume̩ daru bʼamone̩ ki bo̩ te̩.

Todule̩ e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ki fe̩ kpai e-elifo̩ kpai e̩we̩ elifo̩ kpai e-kʼi fe̩ ki che̩daru ojoji eju-me̩ tila; me̩ ki nʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ abe̩k e̩we̩, abe̩k e̩wñ du kʼi afa ane̩pe̩te̩ e-kʼomi fudate̩ ka kʼi chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩ gwʼo̩la-me̩ ihie̩ne̩ n.
Ame̩ ki fo̩ ñwu mi; todu, omi, Jihofa, afo̩, omi la fʼume̩ date̩ ojoji bʼamone̩ kibo̩ te̩, ku me̩ ki chʼabo e-mi.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ kʼi ake̩ma, abe̩k i abifa, ekpa ma akpa chuu; ma arʼokuta do ma; e̩bie̩-ma anʼoji o̩la e-ma.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, E̩ nako̩la ñw amatama, amo̩ma Aro̩n le̩, kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki fʼo̩la-wñ daji tod abo ki ku ef abo-wñ n;
chai tod efu-wñ kʼi me̩rʼu anane̩, owñ chʼiye-wñ kpai ata-wñ kpai o̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai o̩ma-wñ onobule̩ kpai o̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩
kpai o̩maye-wñ onobule̩ e-kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, (kʼi me̩rʼu anane̩, kʼi ma nʼo̩ko̩ mama ta n; i neke dʼo̩la-wñ ji tod uwñ).
Abu kʼi chʼodu amone̩-wñ i adʼo̩la-wñ ji kʼi kpʼo̩la-wñ bie̩ n.
I la nʼugbo du ku ma la akpe̩te̩ oji yeele n, ma ala o̩wo̩ meji ilagba-ma n, ma la akʼo̩re̩la-ma da re n.
Ama ki fo̩ ñw O̩jo̩-ma, ma ki la kpʼodu O̩jo̩-ma bie̩ n; todu ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una, owñ chʼuje̩wñ O̩jo̩-ma; todule̩ ama afo̩.
Ma adʼajo̩ko̩ abe̩k e̩ne̩ ku ma fʼu kpabie̩ chʼo̩ya n; ma anʼonobule̩ kʼo̩ko̩-wñ ko̩ n: todu atama afo̩ ñw O̩jo̩-wñ.
Todule̩ uwe̩ achʼo kʼi fo̩; todu uje̩wñ e-O̩jo̩-we̩ i ako wa ñw u le̩: i afo̩ ñw e̩; todu omi, Jihofa kʼu naje̩ ñwu me̩ fo̩, omi afo̩ ge̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩ma onobule̩ atamaʼka fʼo̩la-wñ kpabie̩ ugbo o̩ko̩ eje̩, mak ata-wñ i bie̩ le̩; ma anʼuna fʼu gujo rinyo̩.

Agboji amatama ki tʼo̩gba ef amo̩maye-wñ, e-ku ma fʼekpo ku ma ba tʼo̩la le̩ danyʼu oji, ku ma la kʼe̩wñ nyʼu o̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ kʼi kʼe̩wñ o̩la le̩ nyʼo̩la, owñ le̩ atʼiloji-wñ no̩ chukuchuku n, i la afʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ na n;
i anyʼejefu ugbo kʼoku one̩ de̩ n, i la adʼo̩la-wñ ji tod ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ n;
i ñʼakwef uña kiafo̩ dufu n, i la afʼuña kiafo̩ e-O̩jo̩-wñ bie̩ n; todu e̩date̩ e-ekpo eba tʼoji e-O̩jo̩-wñ le̩ dʼo̩la-wñ: omi Jihofa de̩.
Onobule̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n i ane̩ chʼo̩ya.
O̩ya-ukuo̩ko̩ abe̩k e-kʼo̩ko̩-wñ ko̩ abe̩k e-ku ma fʼu kpabie̩ abe̩k ajo̩ko̩, abo e-le̩ i ane̩ n; chai onobule̩ kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, kʼi chʼabo o̩lo̩pu e-wñ, e-le̩ i ane̩ chʼo̩ya,
todu kʼi wʼe efʼugbe̩-wñ bie̩ ef amone̩-wñ, todu omi che Jihofa kʼu naje̩ ñw u afo̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw Aro̩n kakini, Gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩, e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼef ugbe̩-we̩ kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩ kʼi te̩me̩ru kʼi kʼuje̩wñ e-O̩jo̩-wñ wa n.
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi che kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩ ate̩me̩ru n, afeju abe̩k achika abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼeju-wñ nyo̩lo̩ abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼe̩gwagwunubi dʼo̩la-wñ,
abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼe̩re̩-wñ abe̩k o̩wo̩-wñ guche̩,
abe̩k abuke abe̩k o̩di abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼeju-wñ awo̩ abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼabikwa, abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ chemʼeikpa abe̩k e-kʼeikpa-wñ mukpo̩fo̩;
e̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼugbe̩ Aro̩n, atama le̩, kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩ re ate̩wa kʼi kʼe̩wñ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una n; abu kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩ i ate̩me̩rʼu kʼi kʼuje̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ wa ñw u n.
I aje̩ uje̩wñ e-O̩jo̩-wñ, tʼe-efo̩ e-efo̩ le̩, kpai e̩wñ kʼi afo̩ ofo,
i muda anyʼejefu ukpo ugbeju le̩ n; i la ate̩me̩rʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ n, todabu kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩; kʼi we efʼe̩wñ-mi kiafo̩ bie̩: todu omi che Jihofa kʼu naje̩ ñwu ma fo̩.
Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s ko̩la ñw Aro̩n, kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, kpai amo̩ma Israe̩l chaka.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ ka ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ku ma himama e̩wñ e-amo̩ma Israe̩l kiafo̩, owñ chʼe-ku ma che kiafo̩ ñwu mi, ku ma we efʼodu-mi kiafo̩ bie̩; omi Jihofa de̩.

E̩ naka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼugbe̩-me̩, gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩, kʼi la te̩me̩rʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ e-kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l che kʼi fo̩ ñwu Jihofa, abu kʼo̩la-wñ chʼe̩daji, eko̩da ma akʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼeju-mi te̩: omi Jihofa de̩.

E̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼugbe̩ Aro̩n, kʼi chʼe̩no̩ga ikpemute, abe̩k o̩la-wñ awʼomi aje̩ e̩wñ kiafo̩ le̩ n, gbogbo tak o̩la-wñ ki dabi afe̩. E̩ne̩ du ki do̩wo̩kadʼe̩wñ ki daji tod oku e̩wñ ki kadʼo kpai e̩ne̩ ki mʼo̩la da,
kpai e̩ne̩ du kʼi kado e̩wñ ki afa ane̩pe̩te̩ e-ki adʼo̩la one̩ ji, abe̩k e̩ne̩ ki aje̩ ñw o̩la-wñ daji, alu du kʼe̩daji-wñ chaka de̩—
onugo e̩ne̩ du kʼi ado̩wo̩kado e̩wñ e̩go̩-i, o̩la-wñ mudaji gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩; i la aje̩ e̩wñ kiafo̩ le̩ n, gbe̩gba kʼi fʼañ-o̩la-wñ gwe̩ ef omifo.
Tak e̩gba kʼolu tunyʼane̩ o̩la-wñ afe̩; ubi e-le̩ tak i aje̩ e̩wñ kiafo̩ le̩, todu uje̩wñ e-wñ de̩.
E̩wñ kʼi ku tinyo̩ ofo, abe̩k e-kʼame̩la fufana, i aje̩ kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ daji lugbo-wñ n: omi Jihofa de̩.
Todule̩ ama ki fʼe̩wñ ide-mi de, tode̩gba ku ma nʼadure todu-wñ, ku ma la ku efu-wñ e̩gba ku ma fʼu bie̩: omi che Jihofa kʼu, naje̩ ñwu ma fo̩.
E̩ne̩ ejaduña du aje̩ e̩wñ kiafo̩ le̩ n. Abane̩ omune̩ kʼi dʼunyi atama kpʼe̩nuko̩lo̩ ku ma rʼo̩me̩ ñw u aje̩ e̩wñ kiafo̩ le̩ n.
I muda che̩wñ kʼatama nʼo̩ko̩ fone̩ la ñw o̩la-wñ, e̩ne̩ le̩ aje̩; oñ abo ku ma bi ef unyi atama aje̩ e̩wñ e-wñ.
O̩ma atama kʼi mʼe̩ne̩ ejaduña du chʼo̩ko̩-wñ aje̩ e̩wñ ku ma du ne ate̩ ef e̩wñ kiafo̩ le̩ n.

Ama iche̩wñ kʼo̩ma atama muda o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ abe̩k o̩ko̩-wñ kʼo̩, kʼi ma la nʼo̩ma n, kʼi mudabi tʼunyi ata-wñ alu kʼi de̩ o̩jo̩ imo̩to̩-wñ, onobule̩ le̩ aje̩ uje̩wñ e-ata-wñ; e̩ne̩ ejaduña du muda aje̩ n.
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ ma ma n, kʼi la fʼe̩wñʼka kiafo̩ je̩, e̩gbale̩ i adʼukpe̩lu omune̩ e̩wñ le̩ manyʼu kʼi ako e̩wñ kiafo̩ le̩ ñw ata-ma.
Ama ki fʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ e-kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l ko ne ñwu Jihofa bie̩
ku ma je̩ ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l chʼudu abi ku ma je̩, e̩gba ku ma fʼe̩wñ-ma kiafo̩ le̩ je̩ n: todu omi che Jihofa kʼu naje̩ ñwu ma fo̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

E̩ nako̩la ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, kpai amo̩ma Israe̩l chaka kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼabunyi Israe̩l, abe̩k ilowa du kʼi dʼane̩ Israe̩l, kʼi dʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ wa, dagba i chʼoji kʼi da kʼi ara, dagba ki chʼe̩wñ ki gʼe̩do̩la-wñ aduwa ku ma mʼu du che iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñwu Jihofa,
todu kʼame̩ ki rʼo̩ e̩do̩ mak o̩ko̩ kʼi mufu me̩ du wa, dagba i chʼokuno̩ abe̩k ala abe̩k ewo.
Ama me̩ ki dʼe̩wñ du ki nyo̩lo̩ wa n; todu e-le̩ arʼo̩ e̩do̩ n.

Oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa ñwu Jihofa kʼi fʼoji kʼi da ñw u ra, abe̩k e̩wñ kʼi gʼe̩do̩la-wñ aduwa, dagba ki chʼokuno̩, dagba i chʼe̩wño̩re̩ egini, i amufu tak i arʼo̩ e̩do̩; i ki nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ du n.
Me̩ ki kʼafeju, abe̩k e-kʼachiku-wñ muguche̩, abe̩k i nyo̩lo̩, abe̩k ikete abe̩k abikwa, abe̩k eikpa, wa ñwu Jihofa n, me̩ ki ko abo e-le̩ wa che iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ñwu Jihofa n.
Me̩ neke gʼe̩do̩la-me̩ adʼo̩ko̩kuno̩ abe̩k e̩wño̩re̩ egini e̩ neke nʼe̩wñ ki nyarʼo̩la ugboʼka abe̩k i jiji tʼo̩la le, wa ñw u; i muda arʼo̩ e̩do̩ tod oji ku ma da n.
Me̩ ki la kʼe̩la du kʼeikpa-wñ gwenunu, abe̩ku ma fʼu dema, abe̩k ekpo̩fo̩, abe̩k eko̩da, wa ñwu Jihofa n; me̩ ki che abe̩le̩ ane̩-me̩ n;
me̩ la agba e̩wñ-iʼka kwʼo̩wo̩ ononojo ku me̩ duwa ki chʼuje̩wñ O̩jo̩-me̩ n. Todu e̩kpabie̩-ma dʼo̩la-ma; ma chʼe̩nyo̩lo̩; e-le̩ arʼo̩ e̩do̩ todu me̩ n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

E̩gba ku ma bi o̩kokuno̩ abe̩k ala abe̩k ewo e̩gbale̩ i atʼubi iye-wñ o̩jo̩ mebie; akwo o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ gbogbo alo i arʼo̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ dʼu chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ ku ma du wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una.
Dagba i chʼo̩kokuno̩ abe̩k e̩wño̩re̩ egini, me̩ ki kpa o̩ma kpʼiye-wñ o̩jo̩ okate n.
E̩gba ku me̩ kpa e̩wñ ugwa ñwu Jihofa, me̩ ki kpa alu kʼi arʼo̩ e̩do̩.
Me̩ aje̩ kpa o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩; me̩ ki tʼe-du no̩ gbʼodudu n: omi Jihofa de̩.
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ ki de uko̩ kʼu te̩ ku me̩ la che: omi Jihofa de̩.
Me̩ ki la kpʼodu-mi kiafo̩ bie̩ n, e̩fo̩ nafo̩ ef amo̩ma Israe̩l; omi, Jihofa kʼu naje̩ ñwu me̩ fo̩, de̩,
e-kʼi mʼume̩ ko kwʼoj ane̩ ljipti dufu, kʼu chʼO̩jo̩-me̩; omi Jihofa de̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l, kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, I chʼe-iko, iko uje̩wñ uyo̩ e-ku Jihofa date̩, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ atakoya-wñ kʼi chʼudo̩ ujeju kiafo̩, e-le̩ diʼiko iko uje̩wñ uyo̩-mi kʼu date̩.
O̩jo̩ me̩fa ma achʼuko̩lo̩: o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ muda chʼugugu yo̩o̩ e-uñmi, udo̩ ujeju kiafo̩ i che; alu du kʼuko̩lo̩ de̩ me̩ ki che n: ugugu yo̩o̩ ñwu Jihofa i che odo-me̩ chaka.
E-i la chʼuje̩wñ uje̩wñ uyo̩ ku Jihofa dʼiko-wñ te̩, owñ chʼudo̩ ujeju kiafo̩, e-ku me̩ atakoya-wñ iko-wñ.
Ochu ejodudu, ane̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu le̩, chʼElaloji e-Jihofa.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu le̩ chʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ ñwu Jihofa ku ma aje̩ akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu efu n le̩: o̩jo̩ mebie me̩ aje̩ akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu efu n.
O̩jo̩ ejodudu-wñ me̩ achʼujeju kiafo̩; me̩ achʼuko̩lo̩ akanya du n.
Me̩ muda akʼe̩wñ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una o̩jo̩ mebie; o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ laño̩ chʼujeju kiafo̩ ge̩; me̩ ki chʼuko̩lo̩ akanya du n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw abo Israe̩l, kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ lewa oj ane̩ e-kʼu nadu ñwu me̩ ku me̩ la fʼe̩wñ oko o̩mo̩ kpa, e̩gbale̩ me̩ akʼoti ki tʼo̩gba ef e̩wñ ku me̩ kpa le̩ wa ñw ata-ma;
tak i ami oti le̩ ejo o̩gba Jihofa, kʼame̩ ki rʼo̩ e̩do̩; o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ ugugu yo̩o̩ le̩ tak atama amʼi ejo.
Oñ o̩jo̩ ku me̩ mi oti le̩ ejo, me̩ adʼokolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi mufu wa kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñwu Jihofa.

E̩wñ ele ku me̩ aduwa manyʼu chʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ alu ukpe̩gwa meji kʼekpo gwe̩gwa nyʼu e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ eduwa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una kʼi akpo; iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ ki amanyʼu achʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma ukpe̩le̩ hin oka.
Me̩ ki la je̩ akala kpai e̩wñ e̩yo̩ e̩ro̩ n, kpai e-emimi n, gbogbo kad o̩jo̩ ku me̩ kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-me̩ wa le̩: e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩ odo-me̩ chaka i che.
Taku me̩ achane̩ ekaluka o̩jo̩-wñ akwo o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ uñmi le̩, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ ku ma kʼoti iche̩bo̩ emiejo le̩ wa; ebie mebie ajo̩ yiili,
me̩ akaluka o̩jo̩ ooje gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ uñmi e̩kebie le̩; taku me̩ adʼe̩wñ ele tito̩ wa ñwu Jihofa.
Me̩ akʼakala meji eji ku ma ami ejo kwef unyi-me̩ wa, ma ki nʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ ukpe̩gwa meji che akala le̩, o̩jo̩wu adʼefu-wñ taku ma de̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ejo̩ga ñwu Jihofa.

Me̩ ki la ko amo̩mokolo mebie ku ma chʼo̩mo̩do̩ʼka ku ma mufu, wa manyʼakala le̩, wate̩, kpai o̩ma okuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka, kpai amokolo meji; abʼe-le̩ achʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñwu Jihofa, manyʼe̩wñ ele-wñ kpai iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ, owñ chʼe̩wñ eduwa lugbo una kʼi akpo ru Jihofa.
Taku me̩ adʼomobukoʼka wa chʼiche̩bo̩ adure, kpai amo̩mʼokolo meji ku ma chʼo̩mo̩do̩ʼka o̩do̩ʼka tod iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩.
Tak atama ami e-le̩ ejo manyʼakala e-ejo̩ga e̩wñ oko manyʼamo̩mʼokolo meji le̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ emiejo o̩gba Jihofa; abʼe-le̩ afo̩ ñwu Jihofa tod atama le̩.
Taku me̩ atʼakoya o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, ki chʼujeju kiafo̩ ñwu me̩; me̩ ki chʼuko̩lo̩ akanya du n: uhio̩me̩ ogbegbele̩ odo-me̩ chaka gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩ i che.

Oñ e̩gba ku me̩ kpa e̩wñ oko ane̩-me̩ le̩, uwe̩ ki kpa gbogbo nyʼalu o̩me̩ oko-we̩ kpa n, e̩ ki la ya e̩fiye̩ e̩wñ oko-we̩ jo̩ n: uwe̩ ki tʼe-le̩ no̩ todu ame̩no̩bata kpai amilowa: omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, Ochu ekebie, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu le̩, me̩ añmi, urewa e-ogu ekpa i che, owñ chʼujeju kiafo̩.
Me̩ ki chʼuko̩lo̩ akanya du n; me̩ ki la kʼe̩wñ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa ochu e̩kebie-i chʼo̩jo̩ e̩wñ e̩boma; ujeju kiafo̩ ñwu me̩ i che, me̩ ki la hi onugo-me̩ wane̩, ku me̩ ko e̩wñ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una.
Me̩ ki la chʼuko̩lo̩ du o̩jo̩ le̩ n; todu o̩jo̩ e̩wñ e̩boma i che, kʼama ki fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che todu me̩ o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩.
Todu onugo e̩ne̩ du kʼi ma hi o̩la-wñ wane̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ n, ma ako̩da bʼef amone̩-wñ te̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi fʼuko̩lo̩ ʼka che o̩jo̩ le, nakpʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ rinyo̩ bʼef amone̩-wñ te̩.
Alu du kʼuko̩lo̩ chaka de̩ me̩ ki che n: uhio̩me̩ ogbegbele̩ odo-me̩ chaka i che gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩.
O̩jo̩ ku me̩ añmi yo̩o̩ i che, me̩ ki la hi onugo-me̩ wane̩; ane̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩la ochu le̩, akwo olane̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ gbogbo kad olane̩ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ me̩ ade o̩jo̩ uñmi-me̩ le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu e̩kebie-i chʼuje̩-wñ uyo̩ e-ebu emu; me̩ aje̩ e-le̩ ñwu Jihofa o̩jo̩ mebie.
O̩jo̩ ejodudu-wñ ki chʼo̩jo̩ ujeju kiafo̩, me̩ ki che uko̩lo̩ akanya du o̩jo̩ le̩ n.
Me̩ ki ko e̩wñ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie; o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ ki chʼujeju kiafo̩ ñwu me̩, oñ me̩ akʼe̩wñ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una; ujeju eju ekpa i che; me̩ ki chʼuko̩lo̩ akanya du n.

Abʼe-le̩ chʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ e-Jihofa kʼi dʼo̩jo̩-wñ te̩, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ atʼakoya-wñ kʼi mud iko iko ujeju kiafo̩ ku me̩ ki kʼe̩wñ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una, owñ chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ ele, e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ du kpai iche̩bo̩ omi, okoka-wñ nʼo̩jo̩ e-wñ;
e-le̩ chʼojoji ñw o̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi e-Jihofa, kpʼele-me̩, kpʼoji ku me̩ da du, kpʼe̩wñ ku me̩ gʼe̩do̩la-me̩ ako wa, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ ako wa ñwu Jihofa.

Ama o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu e̩kebie le̩, e̩gba ku me̩ mʼe̩ro ane̩ le̩ ko wa jo̩, me̩ ki de uje̩wñ uyo̩ e-Jihofa le̩ o̩jo̩ mebie; o̩jo̩ ejodudu-wñ chʼo̩jo̩ uñmi, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ laño̩ chʼo̩jo̩ uñmi ge̩.

Oñ o̩jo̩ ejodudu-wñ me̩ akʼe̩ro oli uto̩, kpai ima oli oli ki dab e̩kpe̩, kpai e̩to̩ oli ki hidu, kpai oli wilo ki jʼeti aji nyʼo̩wo̩; oñ me̩ ki jo̩ agwoguyo̩ o̩gba Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie.
Me̩ ki la de e-le̩ kʼi chʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ o̩jo̩ mebie o̩do̩ da o̩do̩ da; uhio̩me̩ ogbegbele gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩ i che; me̩ ade e-le̩ ef ochu e̩kebie.
Me̩ ki jo̩ ef ala ala o̩jo̩ mebie; e̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼo̩mane̩ Israe̩l agugu ef ala,
todu kʼamo̩lo̩pu-me̩ ki ma ka kʼomi je̩ ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l gugu ef ala ala e̩gba kʼu ko ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa: omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.
Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s ka e̩wñ ki chʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ e-Jihofa kʼi dʼo̩jo̩-wñ te̩ jane̩ ñw abo Israe̩l.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nañwa ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l ku ma kʼekpo o̩lif hiolo e-ku ma de̩ wa ñw e̩ tod agege le̩, kʼi je̩ ñw ugane̩ mʼane̩ ne̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
Aro̩n afʼu te̩ru jo̩ ejo̩do̩da ukpo ugbeju e-ibenu ef unyabo ujeju o̩gba Jihofa, akwo ej ane̩ gbogbo nyʼodudu o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩; uhio̩me̩ ogbegbele̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩ i che.
I akʼagege-wñ te̩ru jʼoji akete o̩jamalia hiolo o̩gba Jihofa le o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
Tak e̩ mʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ du kʼe̩ fʼakala me̩gweji de̩; ukpe̩gwa meji ajʼef akalaʼka.
Tak e̩ kʼo jo̩ oj itebulu o̩jamalia hiolo kʼi dʼo̩gba Jihofa le̩ o̩gba o̩gba meji, e̩fa-wñ chʼo̩gbaʼka.
Tak uwe̩ ki du frankinse̩ns hiolo nʼoji o̩gba meji le̩, todu kʼi manyʼuje̩wñ le̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ urewa ku ma ko wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una.
O̩jo̩ uñmi du i a te̩ru jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, todu amo̩ma Israe̩l; alo ogbegbele̩ i che.
E-le̩ la achʼe-Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩; oñ ma aje̩ ugboʼka kiafo̩, todu i chʼe̩wñ efo̩ e-e̩fo̩ ñw owñ kwef e̩wñ ku ma kowa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una; uhio̩me̩ ogbegbele̩ i che.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka kʼiye-wñ chʼabo Israe̩l, kʼata-wñ la chʼabo Ijipti, kwodufu nyef amo̩ma Israe̩l; oñ o̩ma onobule̩ Israe̩l le̩ kpai e̩ne̩ Israe̩lʼka kʼuja bʼo̩la-ma ef uru le̩,
tak o̩ma e-onobule̩ Israe̩l le̩ chakpabie̩ Odu le̩, oñ i fʼina bʼu. Taku ma mʼu du wʼugbo Mose̩s. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Shelomit, o̩ma Dibri ef abo o̩lo̩pu Dan.
Oñ ma fʼu dahi te̩ ku ma gbo̩ oji-wñ kwʼalu Jihofa.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Mʼe̩ne̩ kʼi bina le̩ du dufu wʼo̩do̩da uru-i; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi gbʼo̩, ma ki kʼo̩wo̩-ma nʼoji-wñ, tak abo o̩gbadu-i chaka ki kʼokuta ro̩ dʼowñ.
E̩ ño̩ ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi fʼO̩jo̩-wñ bina anʼudu adure-wñ.
Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi achʼakpabie̩ odu Jihofa, ekpa ma akpa e̩ne̩ le̩, abo ujeju-i chaka arʼokuta ñw u chuu; alu ku ma che o̩mane̩ ma ñʼache ilowa ge̩, e̩gba kʼi fʼakpabie̩ Odu le̩ che, ma adʼu kpa.
E̩ne̩ ki la fʼone̩ gwo kʼi leku, ma adʼu kpa chuu.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi la fʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ gwo kʼi leku adʼakoji-wñ ñw e̩ne̩ ki nʼe̩ ge̩, oji akoji oji.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ fʼekeji-wñ nyʼo̩lo̩, alu kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ le̩, alu le̩ ma achʼo,
e̩guche̩ akoji e̩guche̩, eju akoji eju, enyi akoji enyi; alu du kʼi fʼone̩ nyʼo̩lo̩, alu le̩ ma achʼo.
E̩ne̩ kʼi fʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kpa adʼakoji-wñ wa; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi fʼone̩ kpa ma akpa e̩ne̩ le̩.
Oji ajo̩-wñ ugbo me̩ achʼokate alu ki de̩ ñw ilowa abe̩le̩ i ade̩ ñw o̩mane̩ ge̩; todu omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.
Taku Mose̩s ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l; oñ ma mʼe̩ne̩ kʼi bina le̩ du kwef uru dufu, ma la kʼokuta ro̩ dʼo. Abe̩le̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l la che alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s oj uwo Sainai, kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l, kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ lewa oj ane̩ e-kʼu nadu ñwu me̩, ane̩ le̩ añmi o̩jo̩ uñmi ñwu Jihofa.
O̩do̩ me̩fa uwe̩ agbe̩ e̩wñ oko-we̩, oñ o̩do̩ me̩fa uwe̩ año̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ kʼe̩ la ya e̩ro-wñ jo̩;
o̩do̩ e̩kebie-wñ muda chʼo̩do̩ uñmi e-uñmi tod ane̩ le̩, eñmi ñwu Jihofa i che; e̩ ki gbe̩ e̩wñ oko-we̩ n, e̩ ki la ño̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki la ya inane̩ uche̩-we̩ kpai e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma kʼe̩ ma ño̩ n le̩ jo̩ n; o̩do̩ uñmi yo̩o̩ tod ane̩ le̩ i ache.
Uñmi ane̩ le̩ akʼuje̩-wñ ñwu me̩; todu uwe̩ kpai adu-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai adu-we̩ onobule̩ kpai e̩nuko̩lo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ rʼo̩me̩ ñw u, kpai e̩ne̩-we̩ kʼi kwʼane̩ omune̩ wa ge̩ne̩ ugbo uwe̩;
kpai todu ame̩la-we̩ abe̩re̩me̩le̩, kpai ame̩wñ iñmi ki jo̩ ane̩-we̩, unawo e̩wñ ki ako dufu chaka chʼutodu uje̩wñ.
Tak uwe̩ akaluka o̩do̩ uñmi mebie, owñ chʼo̩do̩ mebie mebie ugbo mebie; oñ aluka o̩jo̩ du ef o̩do̩ uñmi mebie le̩ achʼo̩do̩ 49 ñw e̩.
Tak uwe̩ aje̩ ñwu ma fʼo̩kakachi fa taa o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa ochu e̩kebie le̩; o̩jo̩ ku ma che e̩wñ e̩boma le̩ oñ me̩ aje̩ ñw o̩kakachi le̩ fa taa ugbo du oj ane̩-me̩.

Ame̩ ñʼache kʼo̩do̩ ooje-wñ le̩ ki fo̩, ku me̩ fʼakoya omi nʼo̩la-mi ta ugbo du ojane̩-me̩ ñw abo du ku ma dodo o̩mo̩. I achʼo̩do̩ o̩ga echi ñwu me̩; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ adabi tʼane̩ e-wñ kʼi ne̩, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ adabi nyʼakwora unyi-wñ.
O̩do̩ ooje-wñ le̩ achʼo̩do̩ o̩ga echi ñwu me̩; ame̩ agbe̩ e̩wñ n, me̩ la aya inane̩-wñ kpai e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma ku me̩ ma ño̩ n jo̩ o̩do̩ le̩ n.
Todu o̩do̩ o̩ga echi i che; i afo̩ ñwu me̩; eje̩ me̩ aje̩ e̩wñ oko-me̩ ofofo.
O̩do̩ o̩ga echi-i e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ adabi tʼunyi e-wñ.
I la che̩wñ ku me̩ fʼe̩wñ ta ñw ekeji-me̩ la, abe̩ku me̩ la e̩wñ ef o̩wo̩ ekeji-me̩, ame̩ ki chʼomune̩ je̩ n.
Aluka o̩do̩ ki da abu kʼo̩do̩ o̩ga echi lale alu le̩ oñ e̩ lo kʼe̩ la e̩wñ o̩wo̩ ekeji-we̩, alukʼo̩do̩ ku ma ko e̩wñ oko-wñ wʼunyi bo̩ alu le̩ i ata ñw uwe̩ la.
O̩do̩-wñ wewe mak e̩ dʼo̩ko̩ tʼo̩, o̩do̩-wñ ma bo̩ wewe n mak e̩ bʼo̩ko̩-wñ wane̩, todu e̩wñ kʼane̩ le̩ ako dufu o̩do̩ da o̩do̩ da oñ i ta ñw e̩ la.
Me̩ ki la dʼomune̩ mʼane̩ n, e̩ ki muda railo O̩jo̩-we̩: todu omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.
Todule̩ me̩ ache teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, ku me̩ laño̩ de oji ajo̩ kʼu du te̩ ku me̩ la che; abe̩le̩ taku me̩ adodo ane̩-me̩ le̩ to̩ko̩o̩.
Ane̩ le̩ la arʼo̩je̩ ñwu me̩, oñ me̩ aje̩ kefu, ku me̩ la dodo o̩mo̩ to̩ko̩o̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼame̩ kakini, E̩wñ a aje̩ o̩do̩ e̩kebie-wñ ta? Me̩ go, ma je̩ ñw a gbe̩ e̩wñ n, a la aya e̩wñ oko-wa jo̩ n;
omi añwa ñw e̩nyo̩-mi kʼi lewa abʼume̩ ma o̩do̩ e̩ke̩fa le̩, kʼi arʼo̩je̩ alu o̩do̩ me̩ta.
Taku me̩ ako e̩wñ gbe̩ o̩do̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ, ame̩ anʼe̩wñ oko-me̩ igbele aje̩; gbogbo wʼiko ku ma ko e̩wñ o̩do̩ e̩ke̩la le̩ wʼunyi, me̩ aje̩ e̩wñ igbele.
One̩ adʼane̩ le̩ ta pioo n; todu omi nʼane̩ le̩; todu ame̩ chʼamilowa kpai abane̩ omune̩ ugbo mi.
Oñ oj ane̩ du ku me̩ ne̩ le̩, me̩ aje̩ ñw one̩ ki gbʼane̩-wñ tane̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼale fʼo̩maye-we̩ mu kʼi la mʼane̩-wñ ojiʼka du ta, e̩gbale̩ abʼo̩wo̩ ata-wñ abe̩k abo̩wo̩ iye-wñ awa kʼi mʼe̩wñ kʼo̩maye-wñ ko ta le̩ gba tane̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ ma nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi agba tane̩ n, tak e̩wñ chane̩ era ñw u kʼi fʼe̩wñ kʼi ane̩ gbʼo̩ tane̩ li,
e̩gbale̩ i ki fʼaluka o̩do̩ kʼi ko ta le̩ lo, kʼi dabi kʼo̩ko̩ e-ki bo̩ nʼoji-wñ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi ta ñw u la le̩; tak i adabi tʼoj ane̩-wñ.
I muda che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ma tu kʼi adabi gba ñw o̩la-wñ n, e̩gbale̩ e̩wñ kʼi ta le̩ ajʼef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi la gbogbo wʼo̩do̩ o̩ga echi; ma atʼo̩wo̩ ñw u o̩do̩ o̩ga echi le̩, oñ i adabi tʼoj ane̩-wñ.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ mʼunyi ki dʼef ewo ki nʼaku du ta, mak i chenʼo̩da kʼi adabi gba tane̩ tak o̩do̩ kʼi dʼu ta le̩ muda; i la anʼo̩da e̩gba tane̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩do̩ odukulu.
I muda che̩wñ ku ma ma gba tane̩ tak o̩do̩ da n, e̩gbale̩ unyi ki dʼef ewo ki nʼaku le̩ amud e-e̩ne̩ kʼi la pioo, gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-wñ; ma atʼo̩ no̩ o̩do̩ o̩ga echi le̩ n.
Unyi ki muda dʼewo ojoko ojoko kʼi ma nʼaku n, abʼe-le̩ ma alo manyʼane̩ uche̩ egbili; abʼe-le̩ ma neke gba tane̩, ma la atʼo̩ no̩ o̩do̩ o̩ga echi le̩ chuu.
I muda chʼewo ewo abo Lifai, abo Lifai la neke gba unyi du ku ma ne̩ ewo ewo-ma le̩ tane̩ iko tʼiko du.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ Lifaiʼka ma gbʼo̩ tane̩ n, mak unyi ku ma duta ewo ugbo kʼane̩-wñ de̩ ma atʼo̩ no̩ o̩do̩ o̩ga echi; todu unyi abo Lifai ki jʼewo ewo-ma chʼane̩ kʼama ne̩ ef amo̩ma Israe̩l.
Ane̩ ije̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-ma kʼi lʼewo ewo-ma daka ma ata n; todu ane̩-ma o̩pioo i che.
I la che̩wñ kʼale fʼo̩maye-we̩ kʼi dʼugbo-we̩ mu kʼo̩wo̩-wñ nyaru e̩wñ, e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki gbʼo̩ nyi; i agugu ugbo we̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼilowa abe̩k abo ane̩ omune̩.
E̩ ki gbʼo̩ko̩ ugwo̩la abe̩k ile ugbo-wñ n, e̩ ki muda railo O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼo̩maye-we̩ ki gugu kpenyʼuwe̩.
Uwe̩ ki mʼo̩ko̩ ñw u kʼi dʼugwo̩la-wñ manyʼu ñw e̩ n, e̩ ki la jʼile ugbo uje̩wñ kʼe̩ du ñw u je̩ n.
Omi che Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ kʼi ko me̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu, kʼu dʼane̩ Kenan ñwu me̩, kʼu ño̩ chʼO̩jo̩-me̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼale fʼo̩maye-we̩ ki dʼugbo we̩ mu, kʼi mʼo̩la-wñ duta ñw e̩ la, uwe̩ ki ñwʼuko̩lo̩ adu ñw u che n.
I adab e̩nuko̩lo̩ kʼe̩ rʼo̩me̩ ñw u kpai abane̩ omune̩ ugbo we̩. I ache e̩wñ ñw e̩ gbogbo nyʼodo̩ o̩ga echi le̩;
e̩gbale̩ tak i akwo bʼuwe̩ te̩, tʼowñ, tʼamo̩ma-wñ manyʼu, oñ i adabi nyʼakwo̩ra unyi e-wñ, ugbo ane̩ amata-wñ oñ i adabi tu.
Todu amadu e-mi ma che, e-kʼomi ko kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu wa; ma ki ko ma ta chʼadu n.
Uwe̩ ki ñwʼoda o̩lachi ñw u n, e̩ ki narailo O̩jo̩-we̩.
I la chʼe-amadu-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ kʼuwe̩ ane̩, ame̩ ala amadu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ ugbo abo uche̩ichi ku ma lʼume̩ daka le̩.
Anubi e-le̩ ge̩, amo̩ma abane̩ omune̩ ku ma ge̩ne̩ efu-me̩ le̩, abo le̩ me̩ ala ge̩, kpai abo akwo̩ra unyi ku ma jʼugbo we̩, owñ chʼabo-ma ku ma bi oj ane̩-me̩; oñ abo le̩ achʼe̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-me̩ ne̩.

Me̩ la ako ma chʼe̩wñ ogu kʼamo̩ma-me̩ aje̩ ubi-me̩, ku ma mud e-ma pioo. Ame̩ neke kʼabo le̩ che amadu-me̩ ogbegbe-le̩; i muda chʼe-amo̩maye-me̩ ku me̩ chʼamo̩ma Israe̩l, me̩ ki ñwʼo̩da o̩lachi ñw omune̩ n.

I la che̩wñ kʼilowa abe̩k abane̩ omune̩ ugbo we̩ mud anana kʼale fʼo̩maye-we̩ kʼi dʼugbo-wñ mu kʼi la mʼo̩la-wñ duta ñw ilowa abe̩k abane̩ omune̩ ki dodo ugbo we̩ la, abe̩k abo akwo̩ra unyi ilowa le̩ʼka;
abu ku ma mʼu du ta le̩, i anʼugbo ku ma neke ño̩ dabi gbʼo̩ tane̩; o̩maye-wñ oka neke gbʼo̩ tane̩,
o̩maye ata-wñ abe̩k o̩mʼo̩maye ata-wñ neke gbʼo̩ tane̩, abe̩k e̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼefu-wñ pio̩o̩ ef akwo̩ra unyi ata-wñ ño̩ neke gbʼo̩ tane̩; i la che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩ e-wñ onugo tu mak i neke gbʼo̩la-wñ tane̩.

Tak owñ kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi la alʼo̩do̩-wñ akwʼo̩do̩ kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ ta ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ gbogbo wʼo̩do̩ o̩ga echi, oñ alu o̩do̩ oji-wñ adʼalu kʼo̩do̩-wñ de̩; ma alo o̩jo̩ kʼi dʼugbo e̩ne̩ le̩ alu ku ma kaluka o̩jo̩ e̩nuko̩lo̩ ku ma rʼo̩me̩ ñw u.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩do̩-wñ bo̩ wewe ta, alu kʼo̩do̩ le̩ de̩ i kʼo̩ko̩ kwef o̩ko̩ e-ku ma du la dabi wa agbʼo̩la-wñ tane̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩do̩ ki bo̩ gbogbo wa kad o̩do̩ o̩ga echi ma wewe n, mak i abʼo̩ lo; alu kʼo̩do̩-wñ kʼi ma chʼuko̩lo̩ ñw u bo̩ abe̩le̩ i adʼo̩ko̩ dabi wa agbʼo̩la-wñ tane̩.
I adʼugbo e̩ne̩ le̩ o̩do̩ o̩do̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩nuko̩lo̩ ku ma rʼo̩me̩ ñw u, i muda añwʼo̩da o̩lachi ñw u eju-we̩ n.
I la che̩wñ ku ma ma gbʼo̩ tane̩ o̩na-iʼka n, mak o̩do̩ o̩ga echi le̩ i atane̩, owñ kpai amo̩ma-wñ manyʼu.
Todu omi oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l chʼadu-wñ, ama chʼamadu-mi e-kʼu ko kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu wa: omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.

Ame̩ ki da ode ñw o̩la-me̩ n, me̩ ki la gbʼojibo dago ñw o̩la-me̩ n, me̩ ki dʼokuta dago chʼe̩wñ o̩nagbolo n, me̩ ki la dʼokuta ki biʼe̩wñ dago ane̩-me̩ ku me̩ dojikane̩ ñw u n; todu omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, de̩.
Ame̩ ki de o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi, o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi, me̩ ki la diba ñw uña-mi kiafo̩: omi Jihofa de̩.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ lule̩ teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, ku me̩ fʼuko̩ kʼu te̩ de, ku me̩ che tʼeju-wñ,
e̩gbale̩ naje̩ ñw omi ki lo̩ ñwu me̩, iko-wñ, tak ane̩ le̩ arʼo̩je̩ ñwu me̩, oñ oli ki jʼoko arʼe̩ro-wñ.
E̩wñ-me̩ ku me̩ te̩ ef aguo̩ko̩lo̩ ate̩ gbogbo taku me̩ chane̩ ekʼe-etito̩ wʼunyi, e̩wñ ku me̩ ko kwʼoko wʼunyi ate̩ gbogbo nyʼiko ku ma gbe̩ e̩wñ; oñ me̩ ajʼane̩-me̩ to̩ko̩o̩ ajʼuje̩wñ-me̩ e̩ke-fu.
Omi la adʼure̩do̩ wa bʼane̩ le̩ ma, me̩ adachi, i la anʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi anyʼume̩ okpo n; nakʼame̩wñ iñmi bie̩ne̩ rinyo̩ bʼane̩-me̩ te̩, ugbada la agudu tʼoj ane̩-me̩ n.
Ame̩ ñʼanʼame̩nebi-me̩ ule, ugbada agwo ma da jʼane̩ o̩gba-me̩.
E̩ne̩-me̩ me̩lu ane̩ one̩ ogume̩lu ule, e̩ne̩-me̩ ogu me̩lu la ane̩ one̩-ma icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩gwa ule; alu ugbada la agwʼame̩nebi-me̩ da jʼane̩ o̩gba-me̩.
Nadʼeju go me̩, oñ naje̩ ñwu me̩ chʼamabio̩ma, kʼu la aje̩ ñwu me̩ wewe nyo̩gba, oñ naje̩ ñw alo-mi kpai ame̩ ki lonyane̩.
Me̩ la aje̩ e̩wñ ku me̩ hi akule̩-wñ jane̩ gbogbo taku me̩ chane̩ ekʼe-igbele rinyo̩ kʼuña ki te̩ ñw e-etito̩.
Tak u nadʼuña ugugu-mi dago efu-me̩; me̩ la achʼumi eju ge̩ n.
Tak u natale efu-me̩ kʼu chʼO̩jo̩-me̩, oñ ame̩ achʼamone̩ ñwu mi.
Omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, kʼu ko me̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu, kʼame̩ ki we echʼadu-ma, de̩; u la fʼoli uno̩lo̩-me̩ guche̩, oñ u je̩ ñwu me̩ te̩dago kpakpa alule̩.
Ama iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma netirʼo̩la-mi n, ku me̩ ma la che teju uko̩-i chaka n;
ku me̩ la ko̩ e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, kʼoji ajo̩ kʼu dute̩ chʼonugo-me̩ eju, todu kʼame̩ ma che e̩wñ du kʼu tʼuko̩-wñ ñwu me̩ le̩ n, ku me̩ la fʼalo-mi bie̩,

abu kʼomi ache me̩ de̩: naje̩ ñw e̩do̩ ñwañwala ki nʼo̩da-me̩, kpai o̩ga ire̩ kpai afu ekpa kʼi aje̩ ñw eju gbe̩, kʼi lañʼafʼonugo one̩ gwegbo. Me̩ la ako e̩wñ-me̩ gbe̩ tinyo̩ ofo, todu ame̩nebi-me̩ akʼo je̩.
Eju-mi akpa ru me̩, kʼame̩nebi-me̩ ki gwo me̩ rʼo̩gba; abo ku ma chʼulaka-me̩ anʼo̩da-me̩; e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du ma nʼume̩ ule n, me̩ la ara.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ-i du wache me̩ ku me̩ ma la netirʼo̩la-mi n, e̩gbale̩ nako̩ me̩ o̩la ki tʼe-i le onu mebie tod adure-me̩.
Omi la akpʼuba ukpahiu-me̩ fo̩, oñ naje̩ ñw efojale-me̩ ki dab ebije, oñ ile̩-me̩ adab ebijeikpa;
me̩ la ache ukpahiu-me̩ rinyo̩ ofofo, todu ane̩-me̩ ñʼarʼo̩je̩ n, oli ane̩-me̩ la arʼe̩ro n.
I la che̩wñ ku me̩ lule̩ tʼo̩wo̩ aboji ñwu mi ta, ku me̩ ma la netirʼo̩la-mi n, egwo kʼu nagwo me̩ atʼabe̩i le onu mebie alu kʼadure-me̩ de̩.
Oñ nakpʼame̩wñ iñmi oko wa efu-me̩, kʼama ki ji amo̩ma-me̩, ku ma kʼame̩la-me̩ abe̩re̩me̩le̩ da rinyo̩, ku me̩ bo̩ ye̩ge̩ ye̩ge̩, oñ o̩na o̩na-me̩ amud oku.
Me̩ ma ko̩che̩ ugbo e̩wñ kʼu nache me̩ le̩ n, ku me̩ muda alule̩ tʼaboji ñwu mi ta,
e̩gbale̩ omi alule̩ tʼaboji ñwu me̩, oñ nagwo me̩, omi onugo agwo me̩ onu mebie tod adure-me̩.
Taku nadʼugbada wa abʼume̩ ma, e-kʼi anʼache̩ e-alo le̩; oñ e̩gba ku me̩ jeju jʼewo ewo-me̩ naje̩ ñw e̩wñ ibi kʼi wʼefu-me̩, taku me̩ atʼame̩nebi-me̩ o̩wo̩.
E̩gba kʼu nafʼo̩kpa akala-me̩ ku me̩ lo̩no le̩ guche̩, tak abobule̩ me̩gwa achʼakala-me̩ ef adidoʼkate, oñ ma adʼakala-me̩ noj e̩bo̩ taku ma adʼu dabiwa ñwu me̩; me̩ aje̩, i la akʼume̩ efu n.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ-i du wache kʼame̩ ma anetirʼo̩la-mi n, chai elule̩ me̩ alule̩ tʼaboji ñwu mi ta,
e̩gbale̩ nalule̩ tʼaboji ñwu me̩ ef e̩do̩fulu, oñ omi onugo ñʼakʼume̩ o̩la onu mebie tod adure-me̩.
Taku me̩ aje̩ o̩re̩la amo̩ma-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai o̩re̩la amo̩ma-me̩ onobule̩ me̩ ñʼaje̩ ge̩.
Omi akpʼotete-me̩ fo̩, nagu ojibo ku me̩ che ñw olu lo̩ wane̩, taku nakʼoku-me̩ bʼoj oku ode-me̩ ma; me̩ la achʼonugo-mi eju.
Oñ naje̩ ñw ewo ewo-me̩ mud alache̩ alache̩ jo̩, oñ nache kʼuña uña-me̩ kiafo̩ le̩ ki mud achigodo, nañʼagbo̩ e̩kpo e̩wñ-me̩ ge̩ n.
Naño̩ che kʼane̩ le̩ kʼi mud alache̩ te̩; kʼi mud e̩wñ aye ñw ame̩ne̩bi-me̩ ku ma adodo o̩mo̩.
Nakpa me̩ tuka rʼef abo uche̩ichi, oñ u nawʼugbada atʼume̩ ubi; ane̩-me̩ la amud alache̩, oñ ewo ewo-me̩ achihi rinyo̩.
E̩gbale̩ ane̩ le̩ anʼo̩jo̩ uñmi-wñ aje̩ gbogbo abu kʼi tʼo̩mo̩ alache̩ ofo, e̩gba kʼame̩ la jʼane̩ ame̩ne̩bi-me̩; e̩gbale̩ ane̩ le̩ anʼuñmi-wñ, koji o̩jo̩ uñmi ku me̩ ma dʼowñ akwoubi n.
O̩jo̩ du kʼi chʼalache̩ te̩ ofofo mak eñmi i añmi le̩, owñ chʼeñmi kʼi ma ñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-me̩ e̩gba ku me̩ jʼo̩mo̩ le̩ n.
I chʼe-abo-me̩ ki bo̩bo̩, naje̩ ñw e̩do̩-ma ki muda kpu oj ane̩ ame̩ne̩bi-ma le̩; iche̩ eñmi oli ane̩ ma ule̩, ma la ara alu kʼone̩ afule ugbada, e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du ma anʼuma ule̩ n, ma awane̩.
Ma la adʼe̩re̩ ko̩ omune̩, dabe̩ne̩ ku ma fule ugbada, dagba kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ne ma ule n; me̩ la anʼukpahiu du ku me̩ bʼame̩ne̩bi-me̩ dago n.
Me̩ alenyo̩ rʼef abo uche̩ichi, oñ ane̩ ame̩ne̩bi-me̩ le̩ ako me̩ mi.
Tak ame̩ ki bo̩bo̩ aku ñw e̩do̩dudu oj ane̩ ame̩ne̩bi-me̩ tod udu ku ma fe̩; ma la agbo̩gbe̩ rinyo̩ nʼoj e̩do̩dudu udu kʼamata-ma fe̩ dab ama ge̩.
Ama iche̩wñ ku ma agbalu udu-ma ku ma fe̩ kpai udu amata-ma ef ada-mi ku ma je̩, kpai ule̩ ku ma le tʼaboji ñwu mi,
tak omi ño̩ lule̩ tʼaboji ñwu ma, oñ u ko ma wʼane̩ ame̩nebi-ma; iche̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-ma kʼi ma de̩pi n ahiwane̩, ku ma gba o̩wo̩ udu ku ma bu ñwu ma;
mak u nadibekado alo-mi kʼu kpe̩ kpai Jeko̩b; kpai alo-mi kʼu kpe̩ kpai Aise̩k naño̩ dibekado alo-mi kʼu kpe̩ kpai Ebraham ge̩, tak u nadibekado ane̩ le̩.

Ma la atʼone̩ le̩ no̩, oñ ane̩ le̩ anʼo̩jo̩ uñmi-wñ aje̩ abu kʼi ate̩ alache̩ ofo ubi-ma; ma la tgbʼo̩wo̩ udu ku ma bu ñwu ma, todu, owñ chʼutodu eko̩ ku ma ko̩ oji ajo̩ kʼu dute̩, kʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi chʼonugo-ma eju.
Abu ma chaka che mi abe̩le̩, e̩gba ku ma jʼoj ane̩ ame̩ne̩bi-ma, nako̩ ma rinyo̩ n, ma achʼumi eju kʼu nakpa ma rinyo̩ hioko kʼu fʼalo-mi kpai ama bie̩ n; todu omi Jihofa, O̩jo̩-ma, de̩;
ama todu ma, nali-bekado alo e-amata-ma igbele̩ kʼomi ko kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu wa eju abo uche̩ichi, kʼomi ki chʼO̩jo̩-ma: omi Jihofa de̩.
E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ kpai uko̩-o̩la e-ki Jihofa dute̩ agbagba owñ kpai amo̩ma Israe̩l oj uwo Sainai lugbo Mose̩s.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l, kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba kʼone̩ fʼoji awuwu da, alu kʼe̩ fʼo̩ko̩ oji one̩ lo ñwu Jihofa i ade̩.

I chʼo̩ko̩ e-aboke̩le̩ oñ e̩ lo, mak abo kʼe̩ lo o̩ko̩-ma chʼabo kʼo̩do̩-ma jo̩ ogu gbogbo nyʼo̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta mak alu o̩ko̩ oji one̩ kʼe̩ lo achʼajifa she̩ke̩l ooje, kʼi cheju she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼi chʼonobule̩, o̩ko̩-wñ kʼe̩ lo ache she̩ke̩l ogue̩gwa.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩do̩-wñ chʼe̩lu gbogbo wa o̩do̩ ogu, e̩gbale̩ o̩ko̩ oji e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼe̩ lo achʼajifa she̩ke̩l ogu, tod onobule̩ i la ache she̩ke̩l me̩gwa.
I la che̩wñ kʼi chʼo̩ma ochuʼka gbogbo wa o̩do̩ me̩lu, e̩gbale̩ o̩ko̩ oji e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼe̩ lo ache ajifa she̩ke̩l me̩lu, oñ e-onobule̩ kʼuwe̩ alo ache ajifa she̩ke̩l me̩ta.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ dʼo̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta kpai ate̩to̩gba-wñ; i che e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mak o̩ko̩ kʼe̩ lo ache she̩ke̩l me̩gwe̩lu, todu onobule̩ i la ache sheke̩l me̩gwa.

I muda che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ma tu o̩ko̩ kʼe̩ lo le̩ n, e̩gbale̩ i adʼo̩la-wñ wa o̩gba atama, tak atama le̩ alo alu kʼo̩ko̩-wñ ade̩; aluka o̩ko̩ kʼo̩wo̩ kʼe̩ne̩ ki doji le̩ atu, alu le̩ atama alo o̩ko̩-wñ.
I la che̩wñ kʼi chʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kʼo̩da je̩ ñw one̩ du che e̩wñ O̩jo̩ ñwu Jihofa, e̩wñ e̩go̩-i du kʼone̩ adu wa ñwu Jihofa afo̩.

I arida n, i la adʼomune̩ kpailo̩ n, i adʼu kpailo̩ kʼe̩nyo̩ ki koji e̩bie̩ne̩ abe̩k e̩bie̩ne̩ ki koji e̩nyo̩ n; i la che̩wñ kʼi du e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kpailo̩ e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ maku tʼe-ejodudu, tʼe-kʼi du kpailo̩, ejeji-ma afo̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼi chʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ e-elifo̩, ku ma ma du wa chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ ñwu Jihofa n, e̩gbale̩ i adʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ le̩ wa o̩gba atama;
oñ atama le̩ atʼalu o̩ko̩-wñ, dagba i nyo̩ dagba i bie̩ne̩, alu kʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ chʼatama lo o̩ko̩-wñ alu le̩ i ade̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼi neku e̩gba tane̩ tila, e̩gbale̩ i adʼukpe̩lu omune̩ wa manyʼalo̩ko̩-wñ kʼe̩ lo le̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼone̩ che kʼunyi-wñ ki fo̩ todu ki fo̩ ñwu Jihofa, e̩gbale̩ atama alo alo̩ko̩-wñ, dagba i nyo̩ dagba i bie̩ne̩; alu kʼatama fʼo̩ko̩-wñ lo, alu le̩ i adago.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi che kʼunyi-wñ kʼi fo̩ le̩ neku e̩gba tane̩, mak i adʼukpe̩lu omune̩ manyʼalo̩ko̩-wñ kʼe̩ lo le̩, tak i amud e-wñ.

I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ che kʼo̩wo̩ʼka ane̩ uche̩-wñ kʼi fo̩ ñwu Jihofa, mak alu kʼe̩ lo alo̩ko̩-wñ achʼalu kʼulu e̩wñ ku ma neke gbe̩ nyʼu de̩; o̩ko̩ ulu barli boma ʼka ku ma ko gbe̩ chʼajifa she̩ke̩l ooje.
I la che̩wñ kʼi che kʼane̩ uche̩-wñ ki fo̩ akwo o̩do̩ o̩ga echi, alu kʼe̩ lʼo̩ko̩-wñ te̩ alu le̩ i adago.
I muda che̩wñ kʼo̩do̩ o̩ga echi late tak i che kʼane̩ uche̩-wñ ki fo̩, e̩gbale̩ atama alʼalʼo̩ko̩-wñ alu kʼo̩do̩ bo̩ wa akad o̩do̩ o̩ga echi omune̩, abe̩le̩ ma abʼalʼo̩ko̩-wñ kʼe̩ lo le̩ wane̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ache uche̩-wñ ki fo̩ le̩ neku e̩gbatane̩ tila, mak i adʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩-lu omune̩ manyʼo̩ko̩-wñ kʼe̩ lo le̩, tak i amud e-wñ pioo.
I muda che̩wñ kʼi ma neku e̩gba ane̩ uche̩ le̩ tane̩ n, abe̩k i fʼuche̩-wñ le̩ ta ñw e̩ne̩ omune̩ la, mak i ño̩ nʼugbo ku ma agbatane̩ ge̩ n,
oñ e̩gba kʼane̩ uche̩ le̩ kwotane̩ ef o̩do̩ o̩ga echi, mak i afo̩ ñwu Jihofa, abu kʼi chʼane̩ ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩; atama chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ane̩-i.
I la che̩wñ kʼi che kʼane̩ uche̩ kʼi nʼo̩ko̩ la afo̩ ñwu Jihofa, kʼane̩ uche̩ le̩ ma dʼef e̩wñ ogu e-wñ n,
e̩gbale̩ atama alo alʼo̩ko̩ kʼi cheju-wñ gbogbo wa kad o̩do̩ o̩ga echi tak e̩ne̩ le̩ ako alʼo̩ko̩ kʼe̩ lo le̩ wa o̩jo̩ le̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ ñwu Jihofa.
O̩do̩ o̩ga echi ane̩ uche̩ le̩ adabi tef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma gbala o̩wo̩-wñ, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼane̩ uche̩ le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ.
E̩wñ du kʼe̩ lo o̩ko-wñ, uwe̩ ki lo alu ku she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ de̩; gera ogu che she̩ke̩l oka.
Ama o̩ma ojo̩do̩ ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, e-kʼi chʼo̩ma ojo̩do̩ Jihofa, i nʼugbo du kʼone̩ ache kʼi fo̩ ñw u n; dagba i chʼo̩kokuno̩, dagba i chʼe̩wño̩re̩ egini, e-Jihofa i che.

I la che̩wñ kʼi chʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ e-elifo̩, e̩gbale̩ i alatane̩ alu kʼe̩ lo alʼo̩ko̩-wñ te̩, oñ i dʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩lu omune̩ manyʼo̩ko̩-wñ ge̩; i muda chʼe̩wñ ku ma ma gba tane̩ n, e̩gbale̩ ma adʼu ta alʼo̩ko̩ kʼe̩ lo le̩.

Ama ma adʼe̩wñ du ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩, e-kʼone̩ dute̩ ñwu Jihofa ef e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩, dagba i chʼone̩ dagba i chʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, dagba i chʼane̩ kʼi ma je̩ ogu-wñ ta n, ma la agba tane̩ n: e̩wñ du ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ mud e̩wñ kʼi afo̩ e-efo̩ ñwu Jihofa.
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩, e-ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ bʼef amone̩ te̩, ku ma ala tane̩ n; ekpa ma akpa e̩ne̩ le̩ chuu.
Oñ ukpe̩gwa e̩wñ du ane̩ le̩ ku ma te̩, dagba i chʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩ ane̩ le̩, dagba i chʼe̩ro oli, e-Jihofa i che; i fo̩ ñwu Jihofa.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ neku egba ukpe̩gwa e̩wñ owñ le̩ tane̩ tila, mak i adʼukpe̩lu omune̩ wa manyʼo̩ko̩-wñ.
I la chʼe-ukpe̩gwa amokuno̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini, e̩la e̩ke̩gwa e̩ke̩gwa du kʼi ale ofe o̩kpa afo̩ ñwu Jihofa.
I atejane̩ abe̩k i nyo̩ abe̩k i bie̩ne̩ n, i la adʼu kpailo̩ n; i la che̩wñ kʼi dʼu kpailo̩, maku tʼe-le̩ tʼe-kʼi du kpailo̩ todu-wñ, ejeji-wñ afo̩; ma agba e-le̩ tane̩ n.
Abo e-le̩ chʼuko̩ ki Jihofa te̩ ñwu Mose̩s tod amo̩ma Israe̩l oj uwo Sainai.
Oñ Jihofa dʼef unyabo ujeju aje̩tachi Sainai ako̩la ñwu Mose̩s, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu ekeji, o̩do̩ ekeji, ku ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti awa, i kakini,
E̩ nafʼuwewe oji one̩ o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi, kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, owñ chʼaluka odu one̩ odu one̩-ma, oji oji e̩ne̩ke̩le̩-ma du;
owñ chʼabo du ku ma jʼef abo Israe̩l kʼo̩do̩-ma jo̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ ku ma nʼukpahiu ku ma anyi oko ogu. Uwe̩ kpai Aro̩n ki fʼuma kaluka udala udala.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi kwʼef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu du amanyʼuwe̩; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ abo le̩ achʼuto̩gba unyi amata-wñ.
Odu aboke̩le̩ ku ma la adago manyʼuwe̩ le̩ de̩: E̩ne̩ Rube̩n chʼE̩lize̩r o̩ma Shede̩ur;
e̩ne̩ Simeo̩n che She̩lumie̩l o̩ma Zuri-shadai;
e̩ne̩ Juda che Nasho̩n o̩ma Aminadab;
e̩ne̩ Isakar che Netane̩l o̩ma Zuar;
e̩ne̩ Ze̩biulo̩n che Eliab o̩ma Helo̩n;
abo amo̩ma Jose̩f, e-e̩ne̩ Ifraim che E̩lishama o̩ma Amihud; e̩ne̩ Manasa che Gamelie̩l o̩ma Pedazur;
e̩ne̩ Be̩njamin che Abidan o̩ma Gideoni;
e̩ne̩ Dan che Ahieze̩r o̩ma Amishadai;
e̩ne̩ Ashe̩r che Pagie̩l o̩ma Okran;
e̩ne̩ Gad che Eliasaf o̩ma De̩ue̩l;
e̩ne̩ Naftali chʼAhira o̩ma Enan.
Abo-i chʼabo o̩gbadu le̩ ku ma do̩, amidachi o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu amatama ma che; ama chʼoji oji amone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e-abo Israe̩l.
Taku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n mʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma do̩ odu-ma le̩ ko,

oñ ma fʼabo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka do̩ jeju ugbokate o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu ekeji, taku ma choli ebi ku ma bi ma akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi, alu kʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma de̩, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, oji one̩ oji one̩-ma,
alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s. Abe̩le̩ i fʼuma kaluka ef aje̩tachi Sainai le̩.

Oñ amo̩ma Rube̩n, o̩mo̩gba Israe̩l le̩, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, oji one̩ oji one̩-ma, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du kʼo̩do̩-wñ jo̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩fa nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwa.

E-amo̩ma Simeo̩n o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, abo-ma ku ma kaluka likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, oji one̩ oji one̩-ma, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩.
Abo e-o̩lo̩pu Simeo̩n ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ooje nyoke me̩la nyʼone̩ oli me̩fa.
E-amo̩ma Gad o̩gba o̩gbo-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo o̩lo̩pu Gad ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwe̩ta.
E-amo̩ma Juda o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Juda ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo e̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩lu nyʼone̩ ulo̩gwa.
E-amo̩ma Isakar o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Isakar ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ooje nyoke me̩le̩ nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
E-amo̩ma Ze̩biulo̩n o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko ugbo ooje nyoke mebie nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko.

E-amo̩ma Jose̩f: owñ chʼe-amo̩ma Ifraim o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩;
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Ifraim ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ meji nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwa.
E-amo̩ma Manasa o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Manasa ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogue̩gwa nyoke meji nyʼone̩ ogwoko.
E-amo̩ma Be̩njamin, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩lu nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
E-amo̩ma Dan, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Dan ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke meji nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwe̩le̩.
E-amo̩ma Ashe̩r, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r ku ma kaluka le̩, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ meji nyokeʼka nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwa.
E-amo̩ma Naftali, o̩gba o̩gba-ma akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, likpa aluka odu-ma ku ma ko̩, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo du ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩:
abo e-o̩lo̩pu Naftali ku ma kaluka le̩, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ooje nyoke me̩ta nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Abo-i chʼabo ku ma kaluka le̩, owñ chʼabo ku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpai amidachi e-abo Israe̩l ku ma chʼone̩ me̩gweji kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma koji unyi ata-wñ le̩ kʼuma aluka.
Abe̩le̩ aluka amo̩ma Israe̩l du, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, akwʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, owñ chʼabo du ku ma jʼefu abo Israe̩l ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩—
aluka-ma du chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ulo̩gwa nyoke me̩ta nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwaka.
Ma muda kaluka o̩lo̩pu amata abo Lifai efu-ma n.
Todu Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Chai o̩lo̩pu abo Lifai kate oñ e̩ ma kaluka n, e̩ ki la fʼoji one̩-ma lo tʼef amo̩ma Israe̩l in;

e̩ ki la ko abo Lifai jo̩ ku ma nʼo̩da uña ugugu e-ibenu le̩ kpai ane̩-wñ chaka kpai e̩wñ kwe̩ kwe̩ kwe̩ du ki jʼo̩la-wñ; ama ane̩ uña ugugu le̩ kpai ane̩-wñ chaka, oñ ama ache e̩wñ ñw u, uru-ma la ale uña ugugu le̩ daka.
Tak e̩gba kʼuña ugugu le̩ achi e̩re̩ nyʼo̩gba, abo Lifai amʼu ta wane̩; oñ e̩gba ku ma che ku ma fʼuña ugugu le̩ fa dago, abo Lifai le̩ afa dago. E̩ne̩ ejaduña te̩me̩rʼu, ekpa ma akpa.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l afa unyabo e-ma udala udala, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ adʼugbo uru-wñ, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la adʼugbo agaliga e-wñ.
Abo Lifai muda afa unyabo-ma lʼuña ugugu ibenu le̩ daka, todu kʼuwe̩do̩ ki we ebʼo̩gbadu amo̩ma Israe̩l ma; abo Lifai la ade e̩wñ ide uña e-ugugue̩-ibenu le̩.
Amo̩ma Israe̩l fʼabe̩le̩ che; likpa e̩wñ du ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s, abe̩le̩ ma che.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kakini,
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ abo Israe̩l du afa unyabo-wñ ugbo agaliga e-wñ, kpenyʼe̩wñ ujiwe abunyi amata-ma; ama afa unyabo-ma jo̩ akpejurʼunyabo ujeju alʼo daka.
Oñ abo ku ma ru o̩wo̩ olodudu, o̩wo̩ ugbo kʼolu akwane̩ le̩, achʼabo agaliga uru e-Juda, udala udala-ma; idachi amo̩ma Juda che Nashon o̩ma Aminadab le̩,
oñ abudala-wñ, owñ chʼabo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo e̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩le̩ nyʼone̩ ulo̩gwa.
Oñ abo ku ma ru jo̩ aro̩ne-wñ chʼabo o̩lo̩pu Isakar, idachi amo̩ma Isakar la che Netane̩l o̩ma Zuar,
oñ abudala-wñ, abo ku ma la kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ooje nyoke me̩le̩ nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
O̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n, idachi amo̩ma Ze̩biulo̩n la che Eliab o̩ma Me̩lon,
oñ abudala-wñ, abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko ugbo ooje nyʼoke mebie nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Aluka one̩ ku ma kaluka udala udala ef uru Juda chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩la nyoke me̩fa nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩. Ama le̩ akwane̩ ule̩ ejodudu.
O̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ oñ agaliga uru Rube̩n ade̩, udala udala-ma; idachi amo̩ma Rube̩n la chʼE̩lize̩r o̩ma Shedeur
oñ abudala-wñ, abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩fa nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwa.
Oñ abo ku ma aru jo̩ aro̩ne-wñ, achʼabo o̩lo̩pu Simeo̩n, idachi amo̩ma Simeo̩n che Shelumie̩l o̩ma Zurishadai,
oñ abudala-wñ, abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ooje nyoke me̩la nyʼone̩ oli me̩fa.
Tak i chʼo̩lo̩pu Gad, idachi amo̩ma Gad che Eliasaf o̩ma Reue̩l,
oñ abudala-wñ abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwe̩ta.
Aluka one̩ du ku ma kaluka ef uru Rube̩n, udala udala-ma, chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo oli me̩ta nyokeʼka nyʼone̩ oli me̩la. Oñ abo-i chʼuche̩ ekeji ku ma akwane̩ ule̩.
E̩gbale̩ tak unyabo ujeju akwane̩ ule̩, manyʼabo uru abo Lifai alumeji uru uru le̩; alu ku ma ru jo̩ le̩, alu le̩ ma akwane̩ ule̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ adʼuña-wñ, ugbo agaliga e-wñ.
Agaliga uru abo Ifraim udala udala adʼo̩wo̩ olane̩, idachi amo̩ma Ifraim la chʼElishama o̩ma Amihud.
Oñ abudala-wñ, abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ meji nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwa.
Abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa aro̩ne owñ, idachi abo Manasa la che Gamelie̩l o̩ma Pedazur,
oñ abudala-wñ, abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogue̩gwa nyoke meji nyʼone̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩.
Tak i chʼo̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin, oñ idachi abo Be̩njamin la chʼAbidan o̩ma Gideoni,
abudala-wñ, abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩lu nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Aluka one̩ du ku ma kaluka ef uru Ifraim udala udala chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogume̩lu nyoke me̩jo̩ nyʼone̩ ogume̩lu. Abo-i la chʼuche̩ e̩ke̩ta ku ma akwane̩ ule̩.
Agaliga uru abo Dan udala udala adʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, idachi abo Dan la chʼAhie̩ze̩r o̩ma Amiahadai,
oñ abudala-wñ, abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke meji nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwe̩le̩.
Tak abo ku ma aru jo̩ aro̩ne-wñ achʼabo o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r, idachi abo Ashe̩r la che Pagie̩l o̩ma Okran,
oñ abudala-wñ, abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ meji nyokeʼka nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwa.
Tak i chʼabo o̩lo̩pu Naftali, idachi abo Naftali la chʼAhira o̩ma Enan,
oñ abudala-wñ, abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ooje nyoke me̩ta nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Aluka amone̩ ku ma kaluka ef uru Dan chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo oli me̩ta nyoke mebie nyʼone̩ ulo̩gwa. Abo-i akwane̩ ubi otitala atʼagaliga agaliga-ma ubi.
Abo-i chʼabo Israe̩l ku ma kaluka ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma; aluka one̩ ku ma kaluka udala udala ef uru uru-ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ulo̩gwa nyoke me̩ta nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwaka.
Ma muda kʼabo Lifai aluka tʼef abo Israe̩l in, alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s le̩.
Abe̩le̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l che. Alu du ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s, alu le̩ ma rujo̩ rujo̩, ugbo agaliga-ma, alu le̩ ma kwane̩ ule̩-ma, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ dʼef abo akwo̩ra unyi-wñ, alu kʼikpo unyi ata-wñ de̩.
Abo-i la chʼo̩gba o̩gba Aro̩n kpai Mose̩s iko ku Jihofa ko̩la ñwu Mose̩s oj uwo Sainai.
Odu odu amo̩ma Aro̩n la de̩: Nedab chʼo̩mo̩gba, kpai Abaihiu kpai E̩leaza kpai Itamar;
odu odu amo̩ma Aro̩n, amatama ku ma fʼekpo ba tʼuma oji e-kʼi kʼe̩wn nyʼuma o̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ ku ma che e̩wñ atama la de̩.

Nedab kpai Abaihiu la leku o̩gba Jihofa le̩, owñ chʼe̩gba ku ma kʼuna ejaduña wa o̩gba Jihofa, aje̩tachi Sainai le̩, ma la nʼo̩ma n. Abe̩le̩ tak E̩leaza kpai Itamar nache uko̩lo̩ atama eju Aro̩n ata-ma.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Kʼabo o̩lo̩pu Lifai wʼemi, kʼe̩ ko ma jo̩ ñw Aro̩n atama le̩, ku ma che e̩wñ ñw u.
Ama nʼide kʼi añwa ñwu ma, kpai e-o̩gbo̩ o̩gbadu-i du ede o̩gba unyabo ujeju, kʼama ki che e̩wñ uña ugugu;
ama la anʼide e̩wñ eku unyabo ujeju chaka ede, kpai ide e̩wñ abo Israe̩l kʼama ki che e̩wñ uña ugugu.
Oñ uwe̩ akʼabo Lifai le̩ ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ; ma mʼuma ko kwef abo Israe̩l ñw u pioo.
Oñ uwe̩ achi Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ jo̩, tak ama afejute̩ uko̩lo̩ atama-ma le̩; e̩ne̩ ejaduña du kʼi ate̩me̩ru, ekpa ma akpa.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
I la chʼomi, go, omi mʼabo Lifai ko kwef abo Israe̩l koji amo̩mo̩gba du ku ma kpʼo̩gba iye-ma na ef abo Israe̩l. Oñ abo Lifai le̩ ache abo e-mi,
todu amo̩mo̩gba du chʼe-mi; o̩jo̩ kʼomi fʼamo̩mo̩gba chaka kpa ane̩ Ijipti, u la che kʼamo̩mo̩gba abo Israe̩l du ki fo̩ ñwu mi, tʼe-one̩ tʼe-e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩; ama ache e-mi; omi Jihofa de̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s aje̩tachi Sainai kakini,
Kʼabo Lifai aluka, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amatama kpai akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma; e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du akwo ochuʼka nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ oñ uwe̩ akaluka.
Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s fʼuma kaluka alu ki Jihofa dʼalu ñw u, owñ chʼalu ku ma ñwa ñw u le̩.
Odu amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-Lifai la jo̩-i: Ge̩rsho̩n kpai Kohat kpai Me̩rari.
Odu amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ge̩rsho̩n akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma la jo̩-i: Libni kpai Shimeai.
Oñ amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-Kohat akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma che: Amram kpai Izhar kpai He̩bro̩n kpai Uzie̩l.
Oñ amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Me̩rari akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma che: Mali kpai Mushi. Abo-i chʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Lifai, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma.
Ge̩rsho̩n la chʼe̩te̩ akwo̩ra unyi abo Libni kpai akwo̩ra unyi abo Shimeai; abo-i la chʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Ge̩rsho̩n.
Abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma, owñ chʼaluka aboke̩le̩-ma akwo ochuʼka nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ chaka, aluka-ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo mebie nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwa.
Akwo̩ra unyi abo Ge̩rshon ñʼaru ejubi uña ugugu le̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu,
idachi abunyi ata abo Ge̩rsho̩n chʼEliasaf, o̩ma Lae̩l.
E̩wñ ide kʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ge̩rsho̩n ade ef unyabo ujeju chʼuña ugugu, kpai unyabo ki bʼo ma, kpai ukpo uro̩na e-unyabo ujeju le̩,
kpai ukpo ku ma ko bʼologbo kpai ukpo uro̩na tod ologbo, owñ chʼe-kʼi lʼuña ugugu kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ daka, kpai iku ku ma ne̩ che uko̩lo̩-wñ chaka.
Kohat la chʼe̩te̩ akwo̩ra unyi abo Amram kpai akwo̩ra unyi abo Izhar kpai akwo̩ra unyi abo He̩bro̩n kpai akwo̩ra unyi abo Uzie̩l: abo-i chʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Kohat.
Aluka aboke̩le̩-wñ chaka akwo ochuʼka nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩jo̩ nyʼulo̩gwa, ku ma ne̩ ide e̩wñ uña kiafo̩ le̩ ade.
Akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma Kohat le̩ aru jo̩ akolo uña ugugu o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩.
Oñ idachi unyi amata abo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Kohat chʼElizafan o̩ma Uzie̩l.
E̩wñ ide ku ma la ade chʼakpati kpai itebulu kpai agege kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ meji le̩ kpai e̩wñ eku uña kiafo̩ e-ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ kpai ukpo ugbeju, kpai ane̩ uko̩lo̩-wñ chaka.
Oñ E̩leaza, o̩ma Aro̩n atama achʼidachi ki tʼo̩gba ñw amidachi abo Lifai, i la afejutʼabo ku ma de e̩wñ ide e-uña kiafo̩ le̩.
Me̩rari chʼe̩te̩ akwo̩ra unyi abo Mali kpai akwo̩ra unyi abo Mushi: abo le̩ chʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi Me̩rari.
Oñ abo ku ma fʼuma kaluka efu-ma, owñ chʼaluka aboke̩le̩ akwo ochuʼka nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ chaka chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩fa nyʼone̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩.
Oñ idachi abo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi Me̩rari che Zurie̩l o̩ma Abihee̩l; ama le̩ arujo̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ uña ugugu le̩.
Oñ e̩wñ ide kʼamo̩ma Me̩rari ade chʼakatakpo uña ugugu kpai oli ugbo̩lo̩-wñ kpai oli urane̩-wñ kpai o̩ka-wñ kpai ane̩-wñ chaka; kpai uko̩lo̩ abʼe-le̩ chaka.
Kpai oli urane̩ ologbo-wñ kʼi lo daka, manyʼo̩ka-wñ kpai aba-wñ kpai iku-wñ.

Oñ abo ku ma arujo̩ o̩gba uña ugugu o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ, owñ chʼo̩gba unyabo ujeju o̩wo̩ ugbo kʼolu akwane̩, che Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ, ku ma nʼide uña kiafo̩ ade, owñ chʼide kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l nʼede-wñ le̩; e̩ne̩ ejaduña du kʼi la te̩me̩rʼu, ekpa ma akpa.

Oñ abo Lifai ku ma kaluka ma du, owñ chʼabo ku Jihofa nʼalu-wñ ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n ku ma kʼuma aluka le̩, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩-ma akwo ochuʼka nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ chaka chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogu nyoke meji.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Fʼamo̩mo̩gba abo Israe̩l e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ akwo ochuʼka nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ kaluka, kʼe̩ la fʼaluka odu-ma ma.
Tak uwe̩ akʼabo Lifai todu mi (omi Jihofa de̩), ama akoji amo̩mo̩gba du ef amo̩ma Israe̩l, oñ ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ abo Lifai akoji amo̩ma ojo̩do̩ ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ abo Israe̩l chaka.
Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s fʼamo̩mo̩gba du ef abo Israe̩l kaluka alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu.

Oñ amomo̩gba e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ chaka owñ chʼaluka odu one̩ odu one̩, akwo ochuʼka nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, abo ku ma kaluka ma le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogu nyoke meji nyʼone̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼe̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩ta.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ ki mʼabo Lifai ko koji amo̩mo̩gba du ku ma jʼef abo Israe̩l, kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ abo Lifai koji ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ e-ma; oñ abo Lifai achʼabo e-mi: omi Jihofa de̩.
Todu kʼe̩ gba amo̩mo̩gba abo Israe̩l o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩gwe̩ta ku ma kwu aluka abo Lifai bo̩ le̩,
e̩ nagba she̩ke̩l me̩lu e̩lu oji okoke-ma; alu ku she̩ke̩l uña kiafo̩ de̩ alu le̩ e̩ gba, (she̩ke̩l e-le̩ la che gera ogu),
e̩ la mʼo̩ko̩ ku ma ne̩ gba aluka one̩ ki kwu ma bo tane̩ le̩ ko ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s mʼo̩ko̩ ulʼone̩ tane̩ le̩ gba kwʼo̩wo̩ abo ku ma kwubo̩ noji abo kʼabo Lifai la tane̩ le̩;
i mʼo̩ko le̩ gba kwʼo̩wo̩ amo̩mo̩gba abo Israe̩l, owñ che she̩ke̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼoli mebie nyoke me̩gwe̩lu, alu ku she̩ke̩l uña kiafo̩ de̩;
oñ Mose̩s mʼo̩ko̩ ulone̩tane̩ le̩ ko ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ, alu kʼo̩la Jihofa de̩, owñ chʼalu ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n, kakini,
Me̩ ki fʼuwewe oji amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Kohat ma ef amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Lifai, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma,
akwo o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa gbogbo nyʼo̩do̩ ooje, abo du ku ma wʼef uko̩lo̩-ma le̩, ku ma che uko̩lo̩ ef unyabo ujeju.
E̩wñ ki chʼuko̩lo̩ amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Kohat ef unyabo ujeju, owñ chʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ de̩.
E̩gba kʼabo uru le̩ akwane̩ ule̩-ma, Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ anyʼejefu, ma la atʼukpo ugbeju ku ma ko rʼo̩na le̩ wane̩, oñ ma akʼo bʼoji akpati ibenu le̩ ma;
taku ma akʼaño̩ e̩la-omi le̩ bʼoji e-le̩ ma ge̩, taku ma akʼukpo kʼi chʼodufa chaka nadala abʼoji-wñ ma ate̩, taku ma akʼoli ugbo̩lo̩-wñ tunyʼu.
Taku ma adʼukpo odufa nadala bʼoji itebulu akala eju ma, oñ ma akʼo̩tara-wñ jʼoji-wñ kpai uko̩de̩-wñ kpai ugba-wñ kpai ukpake̩le̩ ku ma du che omiofo; oñ akala e-o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ ajʼoji-wñ;
taku ma akʼukpo ekpikpa odufa nadala bʼoji e-le̩ ma, oñ ma adʼaño̩ e̩la omi bʼoji e-le̩ ma, taku ma akʼoli ugbo̩lo̩-wñ tunyʼu.

Taku ma akʼukpo odufa, ku ma mʼu du bʼoji akete e-e̩mu le̩ ma kpai agege-wñ kpai e̩wñ ku ma ne̩ kpʼuna-wñ lu kpai e̩wñ ku ma kʼabo le̩ nyu kpai e̩wñ ku ma kʼekpo nyʼu chaka, owñ chʼe-ku ma ne̩ che uko̩lo̩-wñ:
taku ma akʼe-le̩ kpai e̩wñ eku-wñ chaka tunyʼaño̩ e̩la omi ku ma du bʼoji-wñ ma, oñ ma akʼo toji oli-wñ.
Taku ma akʼukpo odufa nadala jʼoji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-o̩jamalia le̩, oñ ma adʼaño̩ e̩la omi bʼo ma, taku ma akʼoli ugbo̩lo̩-wñ tunyu;
taku ma akʼe̩wñ eku uko̩lo̩-wñ ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ ef uña kiafo̩ le̩ chaka nyʼukpo odufa, oñ ma adʼaño̩ e̩la omi bʼoji e-le̩ ma, taku ma akʼojʼoji oti ugbo̩lo̩-wñ.
Taku ma agbʼelulu bʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ te̩, oñ ma akʼukpo odufa ekpikpa nadala jʼoji-wñ;

takuma akʼe̩wñ eku-wñ chaka jʼoji-wñ, owñ chʼe-ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, owñ chʼaido una-wñ kpai uko̩-wñ kpai uko̩che̩-wñ kpai ugba-wñ owñ chʼe̩wñ eku ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ chaka; taku ma akʼaño̩ e̩la omi nadala bʼoji-wñ ma, taku ma akʼoli ugbo̩lo̩-wñ tunyʼu.

Tak e̩gba kʼAro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ mʼe̩wñ ko bʼoji uña kiafo̩ le̩ kpai ane̩ uña kiafo̩ ma kpa chaka, abu kʼabo uru le̩ ache ku ma kwane̩ ule̩, ubi le̩ tak amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Kohat awa ku ma ne̩ e̩wñ-i, ma ki muda ado̩wo̩kado e̩wñ uña kiafo̩ le̩ n, tode̩gba ku ma ku. E̩wñ-i chʼadu amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Kohat ef unyabo ujeju.

Oñ e̩wñ ku E̩leaza o̩ma Aro̩n atama ade chʼekpo tod una-wñ kpai e̩wñ ki akpo le̩, kpai e̩wñ ele o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ kpai ekpo ku ma ba tʼo̩la kpai uña ugugu kpai e̩wñ du ki jʼefu-wñ efejutʼo̩, owñ chʼuña kiafo̩ le̩ kpai ane̩-wñ.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kakini,
Me̩ ki la fʼo̩lo̩pu akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Kohat ko̩da bʼef abo Lifai te̩ n;
e̩wñ kʼuwe̩ muda ache ñwu ma, kʼama ki deju, ku ma we eku, e̩gba ku ma te̩me̩ru e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ le̩ de̩: Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ anyʼejefu, ku ma dʼuko̩lo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kpai adu kʼi ane̩,
ma muda anyʼejefu ku ma go e̩wñ uña kiafo̩ le̩ n, i chaka chʼalu kʼone̩ adʼeju be ma ki le n, tode̩gba ku ma ku.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ ki ño̩ fʼuwewe oji amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ge̩rsho̩n ma ge̩, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma;
abo ku ma dʼo̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyʼate̩to̩gba gbogbo nyʼo̩do̩ ooje, uwe̩ akʼuma aluka, owñ chʼabo du ku ma gudu wʼejefu ku ma fʼogu uko̩lo̩ le̩ ja, ku ma la chʼuko̩lo̩ ef unyabo ujeju le̩.
E̩wñ ki chʼuko̩lo̩ akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Ge̩rsho̩n, ef e̩wñ eche kpai adu e̩ne̩ le̩ de̩;
ma anʼukpo ku ma ta chʼo̩do̩ uña ugugu le̩, kpai e-unyabo ujeju manyʼe̩wñ ki bʼoji-wñ ma, kpai año̩ e̩la omi kʼi bʼoji-wñ ma ate̩, kpai ukpo uro̩na alu unyabo ujeju le̩,
kpai ukpo ku ma du bʼologbo kpai ukpo tod alo̩na ologbo ki lʼuña ugugu kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ daka, kpai iku-wñ kpai ane̩ uko̩lo̩-wñ chaka; e̩wñ du ku ma che ugbo ane̩ uko̩lo̩ le̩, ama ache,
Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ añwʼuko̩lo̩ ñw amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ge̩rsho̩n ef adu ku ma ne̩ chaka, kpai ef e̩wñ du ki dukpe̩ ku ma che; ame̩ ki dʼide adu-ma du ñwu ma ku ma de.
E-le̩ la chʼuko̩lo̩ akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-Ge̩rsho̩n ef unyabo ujeju, oñ Itamar, o̩ma Aro̩n atama le̩, nʼo̩da ide ku ma ade.
I la chʼe-amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Me̩rari, uwe̩ akʼuma aluka akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma;
uwe̩ ki kʼaluka ma akwʼo̩do̩ o̩gue̩gwa gbogbo nyi o̩do̩ ooje, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi awʼef akanya le̩, kʼi ache uko̩lo̩ e-unyabo ujeju.
Ide adu ku ma ade la de̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ-ma du ku ma che ef unyabo ujeju: akatakpo uña ugugu le̩ kpai oli akofida-wñ kpai oli urane̩-wñ kpai o̩ka-wñ,
kpai oli urane̩ ologbo ki lodaka manyʼo̩ka-wñ, kpai aba-wñ kpai iku-wñ, manyʼe̩wñ eku-wñ chaka, kpai ane̩-wñ du ku ma ne̩ chʼuko̩lo̩-wñ; ame̩ ki dʼodu e̩wñ ide ku ma ade ef adu-ma okoke ñwu ma.
E̩wñ le̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Me̩rari ache, owñ chʼo̩chaka uko̩lo̩ ku ma ache ef unyabo ujeju, ma jʼef o̩wo̩ Itamar, o̩ma Aro̩n atama le̩.
Taku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpai amidachi abo o̩gbadu le̩ fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Kohat kaluka akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma,
akwʼo̩do̩ o̩gue̩gwa gbogbo nyʼo̩do̩ ooje, owñ chʼabo du ku ma wʼef akanya le̩ ku ma che uko̩lo̩ ef unyabo ujeju;
oñ abo-ma ku ma kaluka akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo meji nyʼooje chʼicham.

Abo le̩ chʼabo ku ma kaluka ef akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Kohat, owñ chʼo̩chaka amone̩ ku ma che uko̩lo̩ ef unyabo ujeju, e-ku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kʼuma aluka, alu ku Jihofa nʼalu-wñ ka lugbo Mose̩s.
Oñ amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ge̩rsho̩n ku ma kaluka akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma,
akwo o̩do̩ o̩gue̩gwa gbogbo nyʼo̩do̩ ooje, owñ chʼabo ku ma wʼef akanya le̩ ku ma che uko̩lo̩ ef unyabo ujeju,
owñ chʼabo-ma ku ma kaluka akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo meji nyʼone̩ ulo̩gwa nyʼogue̩gwa.
Abo-i la chʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ge̩rsho̩n, ku ma kaluka akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi, owñ chʼo̩chaka one̩ ku ma che uko̩lo̩ ef unyabo ujeju, e-ku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n fʼuma kaluka alu ku Jihofa nʼalu-wñ ka.
Oñ abo ku ma kaluka ef akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Me̩rari, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma,
akwo o̩do̩ o̩gue̩gwa gbogbo nyʼo̩do̩ ooje, e̩ne̩ du kʼi wʼef akanya le̩ kʼi chʼuko̩lo̩ ef unyabo ujeju,
owñ chʼabo e-ma ku ma la kaluka akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, chʼone̩ icham me̩le̩ yiili.
Abo-i chʼamo̩ma Me̩rari ku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n fʼuma kaluka akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi, alu ku Jihofa nʼalu-wñ ka lugbo Mose̩s.
O̩chaka one̩ ku ma kaluka ef abo Lifai, e-ku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpai amidachi Israe̩l kaluka akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi amata-ma,
akwʼo̩do̩ o̩gue̩gwa gbogbo wʼo̩do̩ ooje, e̩ne̩ du kʼi wa kʼi ache e̩wñ ef uko̩lo̩ le̩, kpai uko̩lo̩ adu e̩ne̩ ef unyabo ujeju,
abo e-le̩ ku ma kaluka chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩jo̩ nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwaka nyʼogue̩gwa oji.
Alu ku Jihofa nʼalu-wñ ka le̩, Mose̩s je̩ ñwu ma fʼuma kaluka, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼuko̩lo̩-wñ kʼi ache, kpai alu kʼadu-wñ ade̩; abe̩le̩ Mose̩s fʼuma kaluka, alu ku Jihofa nʼalu-wñ ka ñw u.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nañwa ñw abo Israe̩l ku ma je̩ ñw ame̩no̩ga ikpemute du kwef uru-i dufu, kpai e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ arʼe̩ño̩ kpai e̩ne̩ kʼoku e̩wñ fʼu o̩la daji;
tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼonobule̩ me̩ na je̩ ñwu ma dufu, e̩jo̩do̩da uru-i oñ me̩ aje̩ ñwu ma jo̩, kʼama ki we efʼuru-ma daji, e-kʼomi gugu alumeji-wñ-i.
Tak abo Israe̩l fʼabe̩le̩ che, ma la je̩ ñwu ma nyʼejo̩do̩da uru le̩; alu ku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s, alu le̩ abo Israe̩l che.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, E̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ fʼe̩wñ adure e-kʼamone̩ che che, kʼi la fʼudu Jihofa fe̩, kʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ fʼabi je̩,
mak i agbalu e̩wñ adure kʼi che le̩; oñ i adʼe̩wñ akoji udu ki fe̩ ki chʼeju-wñ yiili wa, oñ i ñʼadʼukpe̩lu-wñ mʼo̩, tak i ako ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi fʼudu-wñ.

Ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ma nʼefu o̩pio̩o̩ kʼi adʼe̩wñ akoji ñw u tod abi kʼi je̩ le̩ n, mak e̩wñ akoji tod abi kʼi je̩ che e-Jihofa oñ atama ki mʼu du; e-le̩ anʼoji okolo e-e̩boma e-ku ma aduwa che e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ.
Oñ e̩wñ du ku ma du nyʼate̩ ki jʼef e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-abo Israe̩l ku ma ko wa ñw atama, owñ ne̩.
Owñ la ane̩ e̩wñ e̩ne̩ du kiafo̩, e̩wñ du kʼone̩ ako ñw atama, owñ ne̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼo̩ya one̩ mʼe̩re̩ dutinyo̩, kʼi la fʼabi o̩ko̩-wñ je̩,
kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bʼo̩ dachi kʼi mʼo̩la da, kʼi la maja ñw o̩ko̩-wñ, kʼi la fʼo̩la-wñ daji maja maja, kʼi ma la nʼe̩ne̩ ki agba ibenu nyʼu n, ku ma ma mu ef e̩wñ kʼi ache le̩ n;
kʼe̩do̩ achʼe̩ko̩-wñ ñwe̩ñwe̩le̩, kʼi chane̩ etejane̩ o̩ya-wñ kʼi mudaji le̩; abe̩k e̩gba kʼe̩do̩-wñ achʼo ñwe̩ñwe̩le̩, kʼi atejane̩ o̩ya-wñ, kʼi ma la dʼo̩la ji n;

e̩gbale̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ adʼu o̩ya-wñ wʼugbo atama, oñ i ako e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ wa tod onobule̩-wñ, owñ chʼukpe̩gwa e̩fa omu barli; i ki dʼekpo danyʼu n, i ki la adu frankinse̩ns tʼoji-wñ n, todu e̩wñ ele e-ogu eja i che, e̩wñ ele e-urewa de̩, kʼi aje̩ ñwu ma rewa udu ku ma fe̩.
Tak atama le̩ adʼonobule̩ le̩ wa me̩ru, kʼi la aje̩ ñw u dago o̩gba Jihofa;
tak atama ane̩ omiofo kiafo̩ kʼi dʼef ucha ku ma nʼama bo̩, oñ i abʼebutu ki dʼane̩pe̩te̩ ef uña ugugu nyʼomiofo le̩.

Tak atama aje̩ ñw onobule̩ le̩ dago o̩gba Jihofa, tak i amʼonobule̩ le̩ oji tu, kʼi adʼe̩wñ ele e-urewa le̩ tef o̩wo̩-wñ, owñ chʼe̩wñ ele e-ogu-eja le̩. Oñ atama ane̩ omi e̩rikoko kʼi aje̩ ñw ama mu ef ewo-wñ.

Tak atama aje̩ ñw u go̩, oñ i aka ñw onobule̩ le̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma bʼe̩ dachi n, kʼe̩ ma la dʼe̩re̩ tinyo̩ tef e̩wñ e̩daji n, abu kʼo̩ko̩-we̩ nʼuwe̩-i, mak omi e̩rikoko ki aje̩ ñw ama mʼone̩-i kʼi fʼo̩wo̩ gwʼe̩ oji.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ mʼe̩re̩ du tinyo̩ abu kʼo̩ko̩-we̩ nʼuwe̩, i la che̩wñ kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ daji, kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ omune̩ bʼuwe̩ dachi,

(tak atama ki dʼule nyʼu ñw onobule̩ le̩, oñ atama le̩ aka ñw onobule̩ kakini,) Jihofa ki dʼuwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ina kpai e̩ne̩ kʼama amu alumeji amone̩-we̩, owñ chʼe̩gba ku Jihofa je̩ ñw uta-we̩ gbe̩, kʼefu-we̩ awu;
omi ki aje̩ ñw ama mu-i kʼi nyʼef ifu-we̩, kʼi la je̩ ñw efu-we̩ wu kʼuta-we̩ ki gbe̩ rinyo̩. Tak onobule̩ le̩ akakini, Ami, ami.
Tak atama le̩ ako̩ o̩la ama-i nyʼalo, kʼi la fʼu gwe̩ nyʼomi e̩rikoko le̩;
oñ i aje̩ ñw onobule̩ le̩ ñmo̩ omi e̩rikoko kʼi aje̩ ñw ama mu le̩, tak omi ki aje̩ ñw ama mu le̩ agudu wʼefu-wñ kʼi ka nyʼefu.
Tak atama agba e̩wñ ele e-ogu eja le̩ bʼo̩wo̩ onobule̩ le̩ te̩, oñ i adʼe̩wñ ele le̩ nʼo̩wo̩ amiejo o̩gba Jihofa, tak i adʼu wʼugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩;
tak atama le̩ abu e̩wñ ele le̩ nyʼo̩wo̩ʼka e̩ko̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ urewa-wñ, oñ i agʼu jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, ubile̩ tak i aje̩ ñw onobule̩ ñmo̩ omi le̩.

Tak abu kʼi je̩ ñw u fʼomi le̩ ñmo̩ kpa, e̩gba le̩ iche̩wñ kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ daji, kʼi la fʼabi o̩ko̩-wñ je̩ ochochi tak omi ki aje̩ ñw ama mu le̩ agudu wʼefu-wñ kʼi ka nyʼefu, tak efu-wñ awu, uta-wñ la agbe̩ rinyo̩, oñ onobule̩ amud e̩ne̩ ina alumeji amone̩-wñ.
I muda che̩wñ kʼonobule̩ le̩ ma fʼo̩la-wñ daji n, kʼi la fe̩, e̩gbale̩ ma atʼo̩ no̩, oñ i anyʼefu.
Uko̩o̩la e̩do̩ ñwe̩le̩ñwe̩le̩ le̩ de̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼonobule̩ kʼi nʼo̩ko̩ dʼe̩re̩ tinyo̩ kʼi la fʼo̩la-wñ daji,
abe̩k e̩gba kʼe̩do̩ ñwe̩le̩ñwe̩le̩ lewa bʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ma, kʼi la chane̩ etejane̩ o̩ya-wñ; e̩gbale̩ tak i adʼonobule̩-wñ dago o̩gba Jihofa, oñ atama ache teju uko̩-o̩la-i chaka o̩la-wñ.
Tak e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ afe̩ bʼudu te̩, onobule̩ le̩ la ane̩ udu-wñ.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw abo Israe̩l kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ fʼe̩wñ awuwu che, kʼi fʼoji e̩ne̩ Nazarait da, kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ ñwu Jihofa,

mak i ki fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ bʼOmi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai o̩te̩ una te̩; i añmo̩ omi e̩ka ku ma nʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma abe̩k o̩te̩ una che n, i añmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma du n, i la aje̩ e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma tʼe-etito̩ n, tʼe-e̩gbe̩ n.
O̩jo̩ du kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ kade i aje̩ e̩wñ du ku ma ne̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma che n, dagba i chʼe̩yo̩-wñ dagba i chʼeikpa-wñ.
Abe̩ du akadʼoji-wñ o̩jo̩ du kʼi dʼoji ka kʼi ada o̩la-wñ te̩ kade n; efo̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ afo̩ gbogbo tak o̩jo̩ kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ ñwu Jihofa kade ki jo̩; i ki tʼiloji-wñ no̩ kʼi gwe̩ jiji daru wane̩.
O̩jo̩ du kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ ñwu Jihofa kade le̩, i ñʼate̩ me̩ru oku e̩wñ n.
I chaka chʼata-wñ, abe̩k iye-wñ abe̩k o̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, abe̩k o̩maye-wñ onobule̩, ma leku i adʼo̩la-wñ ji ugbo oku-ma n; todabu kʼe̩date̩ ñw O̩jo̩-wñ bʼoji-wñ ma.
O̩jo̩ du kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ kade le̩ i afo̩ ñwu Jihofa.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ leku achigili nyʼu o̩la, kʼi la fʼoji e̩date̩-wñ daji, tak i alʼoji-wñ o̩jo̩ kʼi agwo̩la rinyo̩; o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ tak i ala.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ i akʼamikede meji abe̩k amo̩ma o̩ke̩te̩be̩ meji wʼugbo atama, alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju,
