tak atama le̩ adʼoka-wñ che iche̩bo̩ adure, ekeji-wñ la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, oñ i ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ, todabu kʼi dure ugbo oku one̩ le̩. Tak i ache kʼoji-wñ ki fo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩,
kʼi dabi fʼaluka o̩jo̩ kʼi date̩ le̩ date̩ ñwu Jihofa ge̩, oñ i adʼala o̩mojo̩do̩ʼka wa kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi-eje̩; o̩jo̩ kʼi je̩ kwoubi muda kwotinyo̩, todabu kʼe̩date̩-wñ le̩ mudaji.
E̩wñ ki la chʼuko̩-o̩la e̩ne̩ Nazarait e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ e̩date̩-wñ jo̩ kpa le̩ de̩: ma adʼowñ wa alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju,
oñ i adʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ wa ñwu Jihofa, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka ki mufu ki chʼutod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kpai ole ala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi mufu kʼi chʼutod iche̩bo̩ adure, kpai okoloʼka kʼi mufu todu iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩,

kpai akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n e̩ko̩ agbaʼka, kpai akala ku ma nʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ che e-ku ma dʼekpo fo̩ nyu, kpai o̩kpukpulu ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n ku ma dʼekpo tafio̩, kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ, kpai iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ.
Tak atama akʼe̩wñ le̩ wa o̩gba Jihofa, kʼi fʼiche̩bo̩ adure-wñ kpai iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-wñ che̩,
tak i adʼokolo le̩ che iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ ñwu Jihofa, manyʼakala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n ki chʼe̩ko̩ agba le̩; atama le̩ año̩ ko e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ wa che ge̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ Nazarait le̩ ala oji e̩date̩-wñ alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, tak i akʼiloji e-oji e̩date̩-wñ le̩ nyʼuna kʼi dʼofe e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩.
Tak atama adʼo̩wo̩ okolo e̩hi le̩ kpai akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n oka kwef agba le̩ kpai o̩kpukpulu ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n oka, oñ i akʼo nyʼe̩do̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ Nazarait le̩, owñ chʼabu kʼi fʼoji e̩date̩-wñ la,

tak atama ami e-le̩ e̩jo chʼiche̩bo̩ emiejo o̩gba Jihofa; e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ efo̩ todu atama le̩, manyʼache̩do̩-wñ ku ma miejo, kpai o̩wo̩-wñ ku ma du nyʼate̩; ubi le̩ tak e̩ne̩ Nazarait le̩ añmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma.

E-le̩ la chʼuko̩-o̩la todu e̩ne̩ Nazarait kʼi doji, e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ kʼi ache ñwu Jihofa todu e̩date̩-wñ le̩, e-le̩ amanyu e̩wñ ki bo̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ atu; alu kʼoji ki da de̩, alu le̩ i ache tʼeju uko̩ o̩la e-e̩date̩-wñ le̩ tila.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ kakini, Alu ku ma akadua ñw abo Israe̩l le̩ de̩: Ame̩ aka ñwu ma kakini,
Jihofa ki de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩, kʼi la fʼuwe̩ de:
Jihofa kʼi je̩ kʼugane̩ eju-wñ ki ta bʼuwe̩ ma, kʼi la lʼuwe̩ eju;
Eju Jihofa ki bo̩rʼuwe̩ kʼi dʼure̩do̩ chʼuwe̩ ele̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma adʼodu-mi nʼoji abo Israe̩l; oñ u nade̩nyo̩ ñwu ma.

Oñ i lewatʼo̩jo̩ ku Mose̩s mʼunyi ugugu le̩ du dago kpa kʼi la fʼekpo ba tʼo̩, kʼi che kʼi fo̩, kpai ane̩ du ki jʼefu-wñ, kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, kpai e̩wñ eku-wñ chaka, kʼi la fʼekpo fia rʼe-le̩ o̩la, kʼi che kʼi fo̩,
tak amidachi Israe̩l, ku ma chʼabo kʼoji-ma dufu unyi unyi amata-ma, kʼe̩wñ e-ma wa. Abo le̩ la chʼamidachi o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu, ama chʼabo ku ma tʼo̩gba abo ku ma kʼuma aluka le̩,

oñ ma kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-ma wa jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa, o̩ko̩ane̩ kʼanya afo̩ kʼe̩wñ bʼoji-wñ ma chʼe̩fa, kpai amokuno̩ me̩gweji; amidachi meji nʼo̩ko̩ane̩ʼka, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la nʼo̩kokuno̩ okʼoka; oñ ma ko ma wa o̩gba unyi ugugu le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Mʼu gba bʼo̩wo̩-ma te̩, ku ma ki ne̩ che uko̩lo̩ ef unyabo ujeju, kʼe̩ la mʼu ko ñw abo Lifai, e̩ du ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ alu kʼuko̩lo̩-wñ de̩.
Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s mʼo̩ko̩ane̩ le̩ kpai amokuno̩ gba, oñ i mʼu ko ñw abo Lifai.
I mʼo̩ko̩ane̩ meji kpai amokuno̩ me̩le̩ ko ñw amo̩ma Ge̩rsho̩n, alu kʼuko̩lo̩ e-ma de̩;
i la mʼo̩ko̩ane̩ me̩le̩ kpai amokuno̩ me̩jo̩ ko ñw amo̩ma Me̩rari, alu kʼuko̩lo̩ e-ma de̩, ama le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ Itamar o̩ma Aro̩n atama.
I muda du e-i du ñw amo̩ma Kohat in, todabu kʼama nʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ ef uña kiafo̩ ede; ojika e-ma ma akʼe̩wñ le̩ ne ane̩.
Oñ amidachi le̩ kʼe̩wñ-ma wa ku ma dʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ te̩ ñw O̩jo̩ e̩gba ku ma fʼekpo fia nyʼo̩la-wñ, oñ amidachi le̩ kʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-ma wa o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Ma ki ko e̩wñ O̩jo̩-ma wa, idachi du ki kʼo wa o̩jo̩ e-wñ, ku ma dʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ te̩ ñw O̩jo̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi ko e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ wa o̩jo̩ ejodudu che Nashon o̩ma Arninadab, kʼi chʼabo o̩lo̩pu Juda;

e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ la chʼugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ʼka ku ma nʼajifa che, uwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwu, alu ku she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ de̩, ejeji-wñ chʼe̩ko̩ ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa, kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka, okoloʼka, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mobuko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji, okolo me̩lu, o̩buko̩ me̩lu kpai amala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ la chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-Nasho̩n o̩ma Aminadab.
O̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ Netane̩l o̩ma Zuar, kʼi chʼidachi Isaka: kʼe-wñ wa;

i ko e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ wa, owñ chʼugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ʼka ku ma nʼajifa che, uwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l uña kiafo̩ de̩; ejeji-wñ chʼe̩ko̩ ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyu, todu e̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mʼokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka, okoloʼka, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mobuko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji, okolo me̩lu, o̩buko̩ me̩lu, amala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ la chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-Netane̩l o̩ma Zuar.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ chʼEliab o̩ma Helo̩n, kʼi chʼidachi abo Ze̩biulo̩n:

e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ la chʼugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ʼka ku ma nʼajifa che, uwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ de̩, ejeji-wñ chʼe̩ko̩ ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa, kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mʼokuno̩ o̩ko̩ ʼka, okoloʼka, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mobuko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji, okolo me̩lu, obuko̩ me̩lu, kpai amala omo̩doʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ la chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ Eliab o̩ma Helon.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩le̩-wñ chʼE̩lize̩r o̩ma Shedeur, kʼi chʼidachi abo Rube̩n;

e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ la chʼugba kpe̩te̩ke ʼka ku ma ne̩ ajifa che, uwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ de̩; ejeji-wñ chʼe̩ko̩ ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa, kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mʼokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka, okoloʼka, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka ki chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mobuko̩ ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji, okolo me̩lu, obuko̩ me̩lu, kpai amala o̩mo̩do̩ ʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ la chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-E̩lize̩r o̩ma She̩deur.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩lu-wñ che Shelumie̩l o̩ma Zurishadai, kʼi chʼidachi abo Simeo̩n:

e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ la chʼugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ʼka ku ma nʼajifa che, uwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ de̩; ejeji-wñ chʼe̩ko̩ ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyu, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka, okoloʼka, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mo̩buko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji, okolo me̩lu, obuko̩ me̩lu, kpai amala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ la chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-Shelumie̩l o̩ma Zurishadai.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩fa-wñ chʼEliasaf o̩ma Deue̩l kʼi chʼidachi abo Gad:

e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ la chʼugba kpe̩le̩ke̩ʼka ku ma nʼajifa che, uwoji-wñ che she̩kel o̩gbo me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ de̩; ejeji-wñ chʼe̩ko ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa kʼi che̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mokuno̩ okoʼka, okoloʼka, okolo omo̩do̩ʼka kʼi chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mobuko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji, okolo me̩lu, obuko̩ me̩lu, kpai amala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ la chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-Eliasaf o̩ma Deue̩l.
O̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ Elishama o̩ma Amihud, kʼi chʼidachi abo Ifraim;

e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ la chʼugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ʼka ku ma nʼajifa che, uwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ de̩; ejeji-wñ chʼe̩ko̩ ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyu, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa, kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka, okoloʼka, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mobuko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji, okolo me̩lu, obuko̩ me̩lu, kpai amala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ la chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-Elishama o̩ma Amihud.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ Gamalie̩l o̩ma Pedazur, kʼi chʼidachi abo Manasa:

e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ la chʼugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ʼka ku ma nʼajifa che, uwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka, kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l uña kiafo̩ de̩; ejeji-wñ chʼe̩ko̩ ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼe̩kpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka, okoloʼka, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mobuko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji, okolo me̩lu, obuko̩ me̩lu kpai amala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ Gamalie̩l o̩ma Pedazur.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩la-wñ chʼAbidan o̩ma Gideoni, kʼi chʼidachi abo Be̩njamin:

e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ la chʼugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ʼka ku ma nʼajifa che̩, uwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l e-ufia kiafo̩ de̩, ejeji-wñ che̩ko̩ ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyu, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa, kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka, okoloʼka, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka chʼutod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mo̩buko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji, okolo me̩lu, obuko̩ me̩lu, kpai amala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-Abidan o̩ma Gideoni.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa-wñ chʼAhieze̩r o̩ma Amishadai, kʼi chʼidachi abo Dan:

e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ la chʼugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ ʼka ku ma nʼajifa che, uwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ de̩, ejeji-wñ chʼe̩ko̩ ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyu, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa, kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka, okoloʼka, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka, kʼi chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mobuko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji okolo me̩lu, obuko̩ me̩lu kpai amala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ Ahieze̩r o̩ma Amishadai.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwaka-wñ che Pagie̩l o̩ma Okran, kʼi chʼidachi abo Ashe̩r:

e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ la chʼugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ʼka ku ma nʼajifa che, uwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ de̩; ejeji-wñ chʼe̩ko̩ ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyu, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa, kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka, okoloʼka, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka, kʼi chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mobuko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji, okolo me̩lu, obuko̩ me̩lu, kpai amala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-Pagie̩l o̩ma Okran.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gweji-wñ chʼAhira o̩ma Enan, kʼi chʼidachi abo Naftali:

e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-wñ la chʼugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ʼka ku ma nʼajifa che, uwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, kpai ugba ajifaʼka kʼi la chʼalu she̩ke̩l e̩te̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l e-uña kiafo̩ de̩; ejeji-wñ chʼe̩ko̩ ñw omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyu, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele;
uko̩de̩ o̩jamaliaʼka alu she̩ke̩l me̩gwa, kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo;
o̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka, okoloʼka, okolo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka, kʼi chʼutod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;
o̩mobuko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure;
e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼokuno̩ meji, okolo me̩lu, obuko̩ me̩lu, kpai amala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka me̩lu. Abo e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-Ahira o̩ma Enan.

E̩wñ ele ki kwʼo̩wo̩ amidachi Israe̩l ku me̩ ne̩ dʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ te̩ ñw O̩jo̩, o̩jo̩ ku ma fʼekpo fia nyʼu o̩la le̩ jo̩-i: ugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ me̩gweji ku ma nʼajifa che, kpai ugba ajifa me̩gweji, kpai uko̩de̩ o̩jamalia me̩gweji,

uwoji ugba kpe̩te̩ke̩ ku ma nʼajifa che le̩ okoke che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa, ugba-wñ okoka chʼe̩te̩gwa; o̩chaka ajifa ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ eku le̩ chʼalu she̩ke̩l icham me̩ta, alu ku she̩ke̩l uña kiafo̩ de̩,
uko̩de̩ o̩jamalia me̩gweji kʼi chʼe̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo le̩, okoka-wñ che she̩ke̩l me̩gwa, alu ku she̩ke̩l uña kiafo̩ de̩, o̩chaka o̩jamalia e-uko̩de̩ le̩ che she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ me̩fa;
o̩chaka amokuno̩ tod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo chʼamo̩kokuno̩ me̩gweji, amokolo chʼe̩gweji, amala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka chʼegweji manyʼe̩wñ ele-ma; kpai amo̩mobuko̩ me̩gweji todu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo;

o̩chaka amokuno̩ ku ma kpa tod iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ la chʼo̩kokuno̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩, amokolo-wñ chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta, amobuko̩-wñ chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta, amala e-o̩mo̩do̩ʼka chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta. Abo e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ele ku ma ko wa ku ma dʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ te̩ ñw O̩jo̩ abu ku ma fʼekpo fia nyʼu o̩la.
Tak e̩gba ku Mose̩s nyʼef unyabo ujeju kʼi ko̩la kpai owñ, i gbo̩ abu kʼomuko̩la le̩ dʼate̩ ñw ugugu unyie̩do̩ ki bʼoji akpati ibenu ma ako̩la ñw u, akwo alumeji amiche̩rub meji le̩; oñ i ko̩la ñw u.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw Aro̩n, kʼe̩ la ka ñw u kakini, E̩gba kʼe̩ dʼuna tʼagege le̩ agege-wñ mebie ki mʼane̩ ne̩ o̩gba akete.
Tak Aro̩n fʼabe̩le̩ che; oñ i dʼuna tʼagege-wñ kʼane̩ ki ne̩ o̩gba akete le̩, alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Oñ alu kʼuko̩lo̩ akete ku ma che le̩ de̩ de̩, uko̩lo̩ o̩jamalia ku ma gwu i che; akwʼofe-wñ gbogbo kad ododo-wñ, egwu ma gwʼu; alu kʼuwawe-wñ ku Jihofa du ña Mose̩s de̩, alu le̩ i che akete le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ namʼabo Lifai ko kwef amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Israe̩l, kʼe̩ fʼuma o̩la gwo rinyo̩.

Alu kʼuwe̩ la ache ma kʼe̩ fʼuma o̩la gwo rinyo̩ le̩ de̩: E̩ ki tʼomi ku ma duwa tod adure le̩ rʼuma o̩la, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu ma dʼabe̩ fʼedudu año̩la-ma la hioko, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñwu ma fʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma gwe̩, ku ma che kʼo̩la-ma ki fe̩.
E̩gbale̩ tak e̩ je̩ ñwu ma mʼo̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ ki chʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu ko; tak uwe̩ adʼo̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ omune̩ tod iche̩bo̩ adure.
Tak uwe̩ ki kʼabo Lifai wa jo̩ o̩gba unyabo ujeju le̩; kʼe̩ do̩ o̩gbo̩ o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l du jeju.
Uwe̩ ki la kʼabo Lifai wa jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa. Tak abo Israe̩l ki kʼo̩wo̩-ma nʼabo Lifai oji,
tak Aro̩n akʼabo Lifai le̩ wa miejo o̩gba Jihofa tod iche̩bo̩ emiejo e-abo Israe̩l todu kʼama ki ne̩ uko̩lo̩ Jihofa le̩ ache.
Tak abo Lifai akʼo̩wo̩ e-ma nʼamo̩kokuno̩ le̩ oji; tak uwe̩ ki mʼoka du che iche̩bo̩ adure, ekeji-wñ la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñwu Jihofa, kʼe̩ che e̩wñ e̩boma tod abo Lifai.
Tak uwe̩ aje̩ ñw abo Lifai dago jʼo̩gba Aro̩n, kpai o̩gba amo̩ma-wñ, kʼe̩ ko ma wa che iche̩bo̩ emiejo ñwu Jihofa.
Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ afʼabo Lifai date̩ bʼef abo Israe̩l te̩, oñ abo Lifai achʼabo e-mi.
Ubi le̩ tak abo Lifai anyʼejefu ku ma che uko̩lo̩ ef unyabo ujeju. Uwe̩ ki la fʼuma gwo rinyo̩, kʼe̩ la ko ma wa che iche̩bo̩ emiejo.
Todu ma mʼuma ko ñwu mi kwef abo Israe̩l pioo; ma koji e̩wñ du kʼi akpʼo̩gba iye-wñ na, owñ chʼamo̩mo̩gba abo Israe̩l du, omi mʼuma ko ñw o̩la-mi.
Todu omi ne̩ amo̩mo̩gba abo Israe̩l du, tʼe-one̩, tʼe-e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩; o̩jo̩ kʼomi fʼamo̩mo̩gba kpai amomojodo̩ chaka kpa oj ane̩ Ijipti le̩, omi che ku ma fo̩ ñwu mi.
Oñ omi mʼabo Lifai ko koji amo̩mo̩gba du ku ma jʼef abo Israe̩l.

Tak omi mʼabo Lifai ko kwef amo̩ma Israe̩l che Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ ele, kʼama ki che uko̩lo̩ tod amo̩ma Israe̩l ef unyabo ujeju, ku ma ki ño̩ fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che tod abo Israe̩l, todu kʼatulubo̩ ki we edʼef abo Israe̩l, e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l te̩me̩ru uña kiafo̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpai o̩gbo̩ o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l du che ñw abo Lifai; alu du ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s ugbo abo Lifai le̩, alu le̩ abo Israe̩l che ma.
Oñ abo Lifai fʼo̩la-ma gwo rinyo̩ bʼadure te̩, ma la fʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma gwe̩; tak Aro̩n mʼuma ko wa che iche̩bo̩ emiejo o̩gba Jihofa, Aro̩n la fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che ñwu ma kʼi che ku ma fe̩.
Ubi le̩ tak abo Lifai nyʼejefu ku ma che uko̩lo̩-ma ef unyabo ujeju eju Aro̩n kpai eju amo̩ma-wñ; alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s ugbo abo Lifai le̩, alu le̩ ma che ma.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩wñ ki chʼe-abo Lifai le̩ de̩: akwo o̩do̩ ogue̩lu nyʼate̩to̩gba ma anyʼejefu ku ma fʼogu uko̩lo̩ e-unyabo ujeju le̩ ja;
one̩ fʼo̩do̩ ooje da i ki tʼogu uko̩lo̩ le̩ e̩ja no̩, i ki ñʼache ge̩ n,
i muda ache e̩wñ manyʼamo̩maye-wñ ef unyabo ujeju, ku ma fʼide-ma de̩, i muda ache uko̩lo̩ le̩ du ge̩ n. Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ache ñw abo Lifai ugbo e̩wñ ide ku ma de le̩.
Taku Jihofa ko̩la ñwu Mose̩s ef aje̩tachi Sainai, ochu ejodudu o̩do̩ ekeji ku ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu,
i kakini, E̩ ki je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l fʼElaloji de iko-wñ ku ma date̩ le̩.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu-i, e̩gba ane̩, me̩ ki de iko-wñ ku ma date̩ le̩: ame̩ ade alu kʼuhio̩me̩-wñ du de̩, kpai alu ku ma dʼoji o̩la-wñ te̩ le̩.
Oñ Mose̩s ka ñw abo Israe̩l kʼama ki fʼElaloji de.
Oñ ma fʼElaloji de o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu ejodudu le̩, e̩gba ane̩-wñ, ef aje̩tachi Sainai; teju o̩la du ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s, abe̩le̩ abo Israe̩l che.
Aboke̩le̩ iche̩ka la jʼo̩mo̩ ku ma ma fe̩ n lugbo oku one̩ʼka, todabe̩le̩ ma ma neke de Elaloji o̩jo̩ le̩ n; oñ ma lewa o̩gba Mose̩s kpai o̩gba Aro̩n o̩jo̩ le̩;
tak aboke̩le̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, O̩la-wa fe̩ n, lugbo oku one̩ʼka, todule̩ e̩wñ chi ku ma fʼubi dʼuwa hi kʼa we eko e̩wñ O̩jo̩ Jihofa wa iko-wñ ku ma date̩ ef abo Israe̩l?
Taku Mose̩s ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ dago ta, kʼu gbo̩ e̩wñ ku Jihofa aka ugbo e-me̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du efu-me̩ abe̩k ef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-me̩ ma fe̩ n lugbo oku one̩ abe̩k i dʼule̩ o̩najiji; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ i ade Elaloji ñwu Jihofa kpo̩.
Ma ade ane̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu ekeji; ma aje̩ manyʼakala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n, kpai e̩wñ ido̩ro̩ ki arikoko.
Ma atʼe-du no̩ gbʼodudu n, ma la agu achiku-wñ oka che̩ n; alu ku ma kpʼoji o̩la Elaloji le̩ du, abe̩le̩ ama ade.

Ama e̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩, kʼi ma la dʼule̩ n, kʼi la we ede Elaloji, ma akʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼef amone̩-wñ te̩, todabu kʼi ma dʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ wa ñwu Jihofa iko-wñ ku ma date̩ n. E̩ne̩ le̩ ane̩ adure-wñ.

I la che̩wñ kʼilowa ge̩ne̩ efu-me̩, kʼi dʼe̩ e̩do̩ kʼi ade Elaloji ñwu Jihofa, alu kʼuhio̩me̩ Elaloji de̩, kpai alu ku ma kpʼoji o̩la-wñ te̩, abe̩le̩ i ache; ame̩ ane̩ uhio̩me̩ okate, i chaka chʼilowa, i chaka chʼo̩mane̩.
Tak o̩jo̩ ku ma dʼunyi ugugu le̩ dago, akpa le̩ bʼoji unyi ugugu ma, owñ chʼunyabo ibenu le̩; tak e̩gba ane̩ i dʼoji unyi ugugu le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼuna, gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩.
Abe̩le̩ i de̩ pioo; akpa le̩ bʼo ma i la dabe̩ne̩ kʼuna eju odu.
Oñ e̩gba du ku ma dʼakpa le̩ bʼunyabo le̩ te̩, tak abo Israe̩l kwane̩ ule̩; ugbo kʼakpa le̩ kwodago, o̩mo̩ abo Israe̩l ruru jo̩.
Jihofa dʼalu ñwu ma oñ ma kwane̩ ule̩, Jihofa la dʼalu ñwu ma oñ ma kworuru jo̩; alu du kʼakpa kpo̩kpe̩ oji unyi ugugu kade, alu le̩ ma jo̩ ef uru-ma.
Oñ e̩gba kʼakpa le̩ kpo̩kpe̩ oji unyi ugugu o̩jo̩ wewe, mak abo Israe̩l fʼe̩wñ ide ku Jihofa ñwa le̩ de, ma la kwane̩ ule̩ n.
I nʼe̩gba kʼakpa le̩ ajʼo̩jo̩ pe̩ oji unyi ugugu oñ ma kwojo̩ ef uru abu ku Jihofa dʼalu ñwu ma; oñ alu ku Jihofa adʼalu ñwu ma abe̩le̩ ma kwane̩ ule̩-ma.
I nʼe̩gba kʼakpa le̩ do̩mo̩ akwʼolane̩ nyʼodudu; tak e̩gba ku ma mʼakpa du kwʼo̩mo̩ odudu, ma kwane̩ ule̩-ma, dagba i chʼo̩ro̩kaʼka kpai oduʼka taku ma mʼakpa le̩ du, ma kwane̩ ule̩-ma.

Dagba i chʼo̩jo̩ meji, dagba ochu, dagba o̩jo̩-wñ ki wewe kʼakpa le̩ kpo̩kpe̩ oji unyi ugugu, kʼi gugu oji-wñ, mak abo Israe̩l kwojo̩ ef uru-ma, ma la kwane̩ ule̩ n; ama e̩gba ku ma mʼu du, ma kwane̩ ule̩.
Jihofa dʼalu ñwu ma oñ ma kworu jo̩, Jihofa la dʼalu ñwu ma oñ ma kwane̩ ule̩-ma; ma fʼe̩wñ ide Jihofa le̩ de, alu ku Jihofa ñwate̩ lugbo Mose̩s.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ ki fʼo̩kakachi ajifa meji che ñw o̩la-we̩; egwu me̩ agwu; uwe̩ ki la ne̩ e-le̩ do̩ abo̩gbadu jeju, kʼe̩ laño̩ ne̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw ule̩ abo uru uru-i kʼi akwane̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma fʼejeji-wñ, abo̩gbadu-i chaka akʼo̩la-ma jeju wʼugbo we̩ alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju.
I la che̩wñ ki chʼokate ma fa, mak amidachi, ku ma chʼagboji agboji abo Israe̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ akʼo̩la-ma jeju wʼugbo we̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku me̩ fa taa, tak abo uru uru ku ma jo̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu akwane̩ ule̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku me̩ fa taa onu keji, tak abo ku ma jo̩ o̩pata o̩wo̩ o̩gane̩ akwane̩ ule̩ e-ma. Ama ki fa taa todu ukwane̩ ule̩-ma.
Ama e̩gba ku me̩ che ku me̩ do̩ o̩gbadu le̩ jeju, ame̩ afa, me̩ ki muda afa taa n.
Amo̩ma Aro̩n, amatama la afa o̩kakachi le̩. E-le̩ la chʼuhio̩me̩ ñwu me̩ ogbegbele̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩.

Oñ e̩gba ku me̩ nyʼoko ogu oj ane̩-me̩, ku me̩ kobo̩ e̩ne̩ ki ako bʼume̩ kʼi achʼume̩ o̩pe̩cha, e̩gbale̩ ame̩ ki fa o̩kakachi taa; kʼama ki rewa me̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, taku ma agba me̩ bʼo̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-me̩ te̩.

O̩jo̩ uyo̩-me̩ ge̩, kpai ef uje̩wñ uyo̩-me̩ kʼiko iko-wñ chʼe̩date̩, kpai e̩gba kʼochu-me̩ ne, ame̩ ki fa o̩kakachi rʼoji iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-me̩ kpai iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-me̩; tak e-le̩ amud e̩wñ urewa ñwu me̩ o̩gba O̩jo̩-me̩: omi Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩.
Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ ekeji, ochu ekeji-wñ, o̩jo̩ e̩kogu ochu le̩, ma la mʼakpa le̩ du bʼunyi ugugu ibenu le̩ te̩.
Tak abo Israe̩l kwane̩ ule̩-ma arone aro̩ne ku ma kwʼef aje̩tachi Sainai alo; tak akpa le̩ kwodago aje̩tachi Paran.
Oñ ma chane̩ ule̩-ma ele alu ku Jihofa dʼalu ñwu ma lugbo Mose̩s.
Agaliga abo uru Juda kwane̩ ule̩-ma ejodudu alu kʼudala udala-ma de̩; Nashon o̩ma Aminadab la chʼe̩nuto̩gba udala e-wñ.
Netane̩l o̩ma Zuar la chʼe̩nuto̩gba udala o̩lo̩pu abo Isakar.
Eliab o̩ma Helon la chʼe̩nuto̩gba udala o̩lo̩pu abo Ze̩biulo̩n.
Taku ma mʼunyi ugugu le̩ ta wane̩; oñ amo̩ma Ge̩rsho̩n kpai amo̩ma Me̩rari kʼama ne̩ unyi ugugu le̩ kwane̩ ule̩.
Tak agaliga uru Rube̩n kwane̩ ule̩ alu kʼudala udala-ma de̩; oñ e̩nuto̩gba udala me̩ta le̩ chʼE̩lize̩r o̩ma Shedeur.
Shelumie̩l o̩ma Zurishadai la chʼe̩nuto̩gba udala o̩lo̩pu abo Simeo̩n.
Eliasaf o̩ma De̩ue̩l la chʼe̩nuto̩gba udala o̩lo̩pu Gad.
Tak abo Ko̩hat, kʼama ne̩ e̩wñ uña kiafo̩ kwane̩ ule̩; oñ abo ku ma dʼo̩gba le̩ fʼunyi ugugu fa dago anede ma.
Tak agaliga abo uru abo Ifraim kwane̩ ule̩ udala udala-ma; oñ e̩nuto̩gba udala e-wñ chʼElishama o̩ma Amihud.
Oñ Gamalie̩l o̩ma Pedazur la chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo udala olo̩pu abo Manasa.
Abidan o̩ma Gide̩oni la chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo udala o̩lo̩pu abo Be̩njamin.
Tak agaliga abo uru abo Dan, ki dʼubi otitala uru uru le̩ kwane̩ ule̩ udala udala-ma; Ahieze̩r o̩ma Amishadai la chʼe̩nuto̩gba udala udala-ma.
Pagie̩l o̩ma Okran la chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo udala o̩lo̩pu abo Ashe̩r.
Oñ Ahira o̩ma Enan chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo udala o̩lo̩pu abo Naftali.
Abe̩le̩ ule̩ abo Israe̩l ro̩nʼo̩la-ma udala udala e̩gba ku ma kwane̩ ule̩-ma.

Taku Mose̩s ka ñwu Hobab o̩ma Reue̩l e̩ne̩ Midian kʼi chʼana Mose̩s le̩ kakini, Awa anyʼugbo ku Jihofa ka kakini, Omi adʼu ñwu me̩; uwe̩ ki lewa kʼe̩ lebʼuwa, oñ a ache e̩nyo̩ ñw e̩; todu o̩la abo Israe̩l ku Jihofa ka tane̩ chʼe̩nyo̩.
I muda ka ñw u kakini, Nale n; nadabi tʼane̩ e-mi, ugbo amefu-mi.
Oñ i kakini, Agba, e̩ ki kwo bʼuwa te̩ n; todu uwe̩ chema alu kʼa che kʼa ru ru ef aje̩tachi-i, kʼuwe̩ ki chʼeju-wa.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ lebʼuwa, ochochi, e̩nyo̩ du ku Jihofa ache ñw a, o-le̩ a ache ñw e̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma kwane̩ ugbo uwo Jihofa le̩ oñ ma lʼule̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta; oñ akpati alo Jihofa le tʼo̩gba-ma ule̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta, kʼi te̩jane̩ uña uñmi ñwu ma.
Akpa Jihofa la debono ma o̩ro̩ka, e̩gba du ku ma kwʼuru-ma alo.
Oñ e̩gba du kʼakpati le̩ kwane̩ ule̩-wñ, Mose̩s kakini, Kwane̩, O Jihofa, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw ame̩nebi-we̩ ki fiatuka; kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw abo ku ma chulaka-we̩ ki ra rʼo̩gba-we̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼakpati kwogugu añmi, i kakini, O Jihofa, mudabi wʼugbo abo Israe̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ki ma nʼaluka n-i.
Tak amone̩ le̩ kwo keñmini, oñ e-le̩ bie̩ne̩ eti Jihofa; oñ e̩gba ku Jihofa gbʼo̩, uwe̩do̩-wñ mutajo, tak una e-Jihofa chane̩ ejo efu-ma, oñ i chane̩ aliye̩ iba iba uru le̩.
Tak amone̩ le̩ raku do̩ Mose̩s, oñ Mose̩s rodubo̩ Jihofa, tak una le̩ nye̩do̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma do̩ odu ugbo kide̩ ko̩ Tabe̩ra, todabu kʼuna Jihofa dʼefu-ma ajo.
Tak e̩wñ chane̩ erʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ ejaduña ki jʼefu-ma e̩do̩ tabale; tak abo Israe̩l ño̩ raku ge̩, oñ ma kakini, E̩ne̩ adʼe̩la ñw a je̩?
Ibe-wa chekado e̩ja kʼa je̩ Ijipti alafa, e̩gbe̩ kpai echi kpai lik kpai alubasa, kpai garlik;
fai onugo-wa la gbe̩ rinyo̩, i nʼe̩wñ du kʼeju-wa li tu mana-i le n.
Mana le̩ la dab e̩yo̩ ko̩rianda, oñ i dabu bdelium eju.
Amone̩ le̩ tale ayajo̩, oñ ma fʼu no̩ oj okuta, cho̩kpo̩ni ma gwu ef agu, taku ma fʼu hi ef ucha, oñ ma dʼu chʼakala; e̩ dʼu tʼalu i la dab akala ku ma nʼekpo etito̩ che.
Oñ e̩gba kʼeli chi bʼuru le̩ ma odu, mana le̩ lebʼo̩ wane̩.
Taku Mose̩s gbo̩ abu kʼamone̩ jʼaraku akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ dʼalugbo̩na unyabo-wñ; oñ uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo una una, oñ i ño̩ bie̩ne̩ eju Mose̩s.
Taku Mose̩s ka ñwu Jihofa kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ che adu-we̩ e̩bie̩ne̩-i ta? E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma la li mi eju n, kʼe̩ mʼadu amone̩-i chaka ko nʼumi oji?
Omi ma nyefu amone̩-i chaka ñw u? Omi bi ma? kʼuwe̩ aka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ ki ne̩ ma agbe̩do̩-we̩, alu kʼata anʼo̩ma kʼi añmʼe̩nya, tʼoj ane̩ kʼuwe̩ go̩ ñw amata-ma?
Ugbo nanʼe̩la kwo kʼu nako ñw amone̩-i chaka? Todu ma jʼaraku nyʼumi o̩la kakini, Dʼe̩la ñw a je̩.
Omi bo̩jo̩ kʼomi kate ane̩ o̩chaka amone̩-i n, adu-wñ woji tʼumi le.
I la che̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ache mi abe̩i, kʼe̩ la li mi eju, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ ekpa oñ e̩ kpa mi, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñwu mi kʼu we eli e̩bie̩ne̩ ki ache ki wa ake̩re̩bʼumi.

Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, E̩ fʼaboke̩le̩ e̩te̩gwa ku ma chʼabogijo Israe̩l do̩ jeju ñwu mi, owñ chʼabo kʼuwe̩ ma ka ku ma chʼabogijo amone̩-i, ku ma la chʼamako̩takada kʼamone̩-i jʼef o̩wo̩-ma; kʼe̩ la ko ma wʼugbo unyabo ujeju, kʼama ki dago o̩mo̩ kpenyʼuwe̩.
Tak omi agwo̩ru wa ako̩la kpai uwe̩ o̩mo̩; oñ u nabu afu kʼi dʼoji-we̩ kʼu nadu nʼuma oji; tak ama abʼe̩ nʼadu amone̩ le̩, ki ñʼachʼuwe̩ kate ane̩ ge̩ n.

Uwe̩ ki la ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ che kʼo̩la-me̩ ki fo̩ nyʼo̩na, tak ame̩ aje̩ e̩la; todu ame̩ fʼaku ro̩ nyu Jihofa eti kakini, E̩ne̩ adʼe̩la ñw a je̩? Todu ane̩ Ijipti chenyo̩ ñw a. Todule̩ Jihofa adʼe̩la ñwu me̩ je̩, oñ ame̩ aje̩.
Ame̩ aje̩ o̩jo̩ okate n, abe̩k o̩jo̩ meji n, abe̩k o̩jo̩ me̩lu n, abe̩k o̩jo̩ me̩gwa n, abe̩k o̩jo̩ ogu n,
chai ochu odukulu, gbogbo tak i alʼef iñmo̩-me̩ dufu, kʼi la achʼume̩ eju, todabu ku me̩ ko̩ Jihofa kʼi dʼefu-me̩-i, ku me̩ la raku o̩gba-wñ kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼa kwʼIjipti dufu wa-i?
Ama Mose̩s kakini, Amone̩ kʼomi dʼefu-ma-i chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ulo̩gwa ku ma lule̩ e̩re̩ ofo ta; kʼuwe̩ kakini, Nadʼe̩la ñwu ma ku ma je̩ gbogbo nyʼochu odukulu!
Ma akpa ame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpai amokuno̩ ñwu ma ki bʼuma jo̩? Abe̩k e̩ja du ki jʼef ohimini awa jo̩ ñwu ma ki bʼuma jo̩?
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, O̩wo̩ Jihofa anya me̩? Fai tak uwe̩ ali abe̩k o̩la-mi awa che̩ ñw e̩ abe̩k i ache̩ n.
Taku Mose̩s ledufu, oñ i mʼo̩la Jihofa du ka ñw amone̩ le̩; i la mʼaboke̩le̩ e̩te̩gwa ko kwef abogijo amone̩ le̩ wa jo̩, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma dago jo̩ lʼunyabo le̩ daka.
Taku Jihofa gwo̩ru ef akpa le̩ wane̩ ako̩la ñw u, oñ i mʼafu kʼi dʼoji-wñ bu, i la mʼu du nʼabogijo e̩te̩gwa le̩ oji, oñ e̩gba kʼafu le̩ kwotano ma oji, ma kwokache̩. Ma muda che onukeji n.

One̩ meji la bo̩ ubi ef uru le̩ ta, odu oka ko̩ Eldad, odu ekeji la ko̩ Me̩dad, oñ Afu le̩ kwotano ma; ama la jʼef abo ku ma ko̩ odu-ma le̩, ma muda dufu nyʼugbo unyabo le̩ n, oñ ma kache̩ ef uru le̩.
Tak okolobiaʼka fule nyʼaka ñwu Mose̩s, kakini, Eldad kpai Me̩dad jʼef uru akache̩.
Taku Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun, kʼi ache e̩wñ ñwu Mose̩s akwʼo̩jo̩ imo̩to̩ okolobia-wñ, dohi kakini, Mose̩s, odu-mi, fu ma naba.
Mose̩s muda ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ jʼogu ñwu mi? O, amone̩ Jihofa chaka ma chʼamakache̩ i ma nyo̩, ku Jihofa ki dʼAfu-wñ nʼuma oji!
Taku Mose̩s kpai abogijo Israe̩l mudabi tʼef uru le̩.

Tak afuʼka kwʼugbo Jihofa dufu, oñ i kʼamagbailo kwʼo̩la ohimini wa, oñ i ko ma ro̩ jʼane̩ o̩la uru le̩ daka, oñ ma jʼane̩ lʼuru le̩ daka ule̩ o̩jo̩ʼka o̩wo̩ ej emi-wñ, kpai ule̩ o̩jo̩ʼka ej ano̩mo̩-wñ, ma la nʼoji omune̩ jʼane̩pe̩te̩, dab ohibo̩wo̩ meji.

Tak amone̩ kwane̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩ kpai odu o̩jo̩ le̩ chaka kpai gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ ge̩, oñ ma kwo ya agbailo jo̩; e̩ne̩ kʼi ma ya nana n maku homa me̩gwa i yajo̩ le̩; taku ma mʼu ko kpatuka jo̩ o̩do̩da uru le̩ daka ñw o̩la-ma.
Abu ku ma fʼenyi do e̩la le̩ ababa, ku ma ma lo̩ ta n, uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼamone̩ le̩ ma, oñ Jihofa nʼo̩ga lile gwo amone̩ le̩ da.
Todule̩ ma dʼodu ugbo kide̩ ko̩ Kibro̩t-hatafa todabu ku ma kʼoku abo kʼe̩wñ rʼuma e̩do̩ tabale le̩ ji o̩mo̩.
Akwo Kibro̩t-hatafa amone̩ le̩ kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩ nyi Haze̩ro̩t; oñ ma kwojo̩ Haze̩ro̩t.
Miriam kpai Aro̩n ko̩la nyu Mose̩s o̩la tod onobule̩ Kush kʼi du chʼo̩ya, todu i mʼonobule̩ Kushʼka du chʼo̩ya-wñ.
Oñ ma kakini, Mose̩s kate oñ Jihofa ako̩la ñw u, ochochi? I ño̩ ko̩la ñw a ge̩ n? Oñ Jihofa gbʼo̩.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ku ma do̩ ko̩ Mose̩s le̩ la chʼe̩ne̩chikimi tabale, i chʼe̩ne̩chikimi tʼamone̩ du ku ma bʼeju ile̩-i ma le.
Tak achigili Jihofa ko̩la ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpai Miriam, i kakini, Ame̩ me̩ta ki dufu wa unyabo ujeju. Oñ ama me̩ta dufu wa.
Taku Jihofa gwo̩ru wa ef akpa kʼi dago waala le̩, oñ i kwodago alugbo̩na unyabo, tak i fʼAro̩n kpai Miriam do̩; oñ ama meji kwodufu wa.
Tak i kakini, Me̩ netirʼo̩la-mi-i: iche̩wñ kʼakache̩ dʼefu-me̩, omi Jihofa aje̩ ñw u kʼi ma mi ef ane̩ ego, nako̩la ñw u ef o̩na.
Adu-mi Mose̩s-i dʼabe̩le̩ n; owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼu ke̩do̩no ef abo unyi-mi chaka.
Oñ alu-mi kpai owñ ade ef o̩la, ejugede, i la chʼef ita n; i la anʼalu ki Jihofa de̩ ago chii. Mak abile ku me̩ ma railo ekalu nyʼadu-mi, Mose̩s-i, o̩la n?
Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼuma ma, oñ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le;
tak akpa le̩ kwo bʼoji unyabo te̩. Me̩ la go, o̩la Miriam chʼo̩ga ikpemute, i dabu sno. Oñ Aro̩n rʼeju da go Miriam, me̩ la go, o̩la-wñ chʼo̩ga ikpemute.
Tak Aro̩n ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, O, odu-mi, o̩ko̩ nagbabʼuwe̩, e̩ ki dʼadure-i nʼuwa oji n, todu a fʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩ che me̩, edure oñ a dure le̩.
Agba, e̩ ki je̩ ñw u kʼi dab abiku kʼukpe̩reji o̩re̩la-wñ je̩ rinyo̩ kwʼefu iye-wñ n.
Taku Mose̩s raku do̩ Jihofa, kakini, O, O̩jo̩, nabi we̩ ebi kʼe̩ fʼo̩ga-wʼñ che.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, I ma chʼata-wñ fʼito̩ rʼe eju kate, anyo̩ ma mʼu gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie n? Je̩ ñwu ma fʼu dahi tʼo̩do̩da uru-i o̩jo̩ mebie, ubi le̩ taku ma adʼu dabi wa ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma fu Miriam dahi tʼo̩do̩da uru le̩ o̩jo̩ mebie; amone̩ le̩ la kwane̩ ule̩, gbogbo taku ma du Miriam dabiwa n.
Ubile̩ tak amone̩ kwane̩ ule̩-ma akwo Haze̩ro̩t, oñ ma rujo̩ ef aje̩tachi Paran.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ ki fʼaboke̩le̩ kpe̩ nyʼoj ane̩ Kenan ku ma fʼo̩mo̩ tu, owñ chʼe-kʼu nadu ñw abo Israe̩l-i: uwe̩ ki kpe̩ e̩ne̩ʼka e̩ne̩ʼka kwef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu amata-ma okoka, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ efu-ma ki chʼidachi.
Oñ Mose̩s fu ma kpe̩ akwo aje̩tachi Paran alu ku Jihofa dʼalu ñw u; o̩chaka-ma chʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma chʼamagboji abo Israe̩l.
Odu kʼabo le̩ ko̩ la de̩: E̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n che̩ Shamua, o̩ma Zakur;
e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Simeo̩n che Shafat, o̩ma Hori;
e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Juda che Kele̩b, o̩ma Jefune;
e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Isakar che Igal, o̩ma Jose̩f;
e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Ifraim che Hoshea, o̩ma Nun;
e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin che Palti, o̩ma Rafu;
e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n che Gadie̩l, o̩ma Sodi;
e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Jose̩f (owñ chʼe̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Manasa) che Gadi, o̩ma Susi;
e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Dan che Amie̩l, o̩ma Gemali;
e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r che Setur, o̩ma Maike̩l;
e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Naftali che Nabi, o̩ma Fofsi;
e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Gad che Geue̩l, o̩ma Machi.
E-le̩ chʼodu aboke̩le̩ ku Mose̩s kpe̩ nyʼatu ane̩ le̩. Oñ Mose̩s do̩ Hoshea o̩ma Nun le̩ ko̩ Jo̩shua.
Taku Mose̩s fu ma kpe̩ nyʼatu ane̩ Kenan, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼo̩na-i du ku me̩ le rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, ku me̩ te̩gu nyʼoj ane̩ uwo le̩,
ku me̩ go ane̩ le̩ alu kʼi de̩, kpai amone̩ ku ma dodo jʼo̩mo̩, abe̩ku ma chʼe̩ne̩ ukpahiu abe̩ku ma chʼe̩gbo, abe̩ku ma wewe abe̩ku ma wewe n;
kpai alu kʼane̩ ku ma dodo oji-wñ le̩ de̩, abe̩k i nyo̩, abe̩k i bie̩ne̩, kpai ewo ewo ku ma jʼefu-wñ abe̩k i chʼuru uru ofo, abe̩k aku aku,
kpai alu kʼane̩ le̩ de̩, abe̩k i nʼo̩fu, abe̩k i nʼukpa n, abe̩k i nʼefoko, abe̩k i ne̩ n. Me̩ ki fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, ku me̩ la kʼe̩ro ane̩ le̩ iche̩ka wa. Iko le̩ la chʼiko kʼachiwebe̩te̩ma ejodudu akpa.
Abe̩le̩ ma mute̩gu le oñ ma fʼane̩ le̩ tu akwo aje̩tachi Zin gbogbo wa Rehob, me̩ru ugbo ku ma gudu nyi Hamat.
Ma le ane̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ oñ ma lewa He̩bro̩n; Ahiman kpai She-shai kpai Talmai, amo̩ma Anak, la jʼo̩mo̩. (Ma la fu He̩bro̩n ko o̩do̩ mebie taku ma ko̩ Zoan ane̩ Ijipti.)
Taku ma lewa o̩go̩ E̩shko̩l, oñ o̩mo̩ ma fʼikeli ki ne̩ acha achiwebe̩te̩maʼka ko̩da, ma la dʼoli tunyʼu, i tʼagbagba one̩ meji oñ ma ne̩; kpai po̩me̩grane̩t kpai o̩gbaikolo ge̩.
Ma dʼodu o̩mo̩ ko̩ o̩go̩ E̩shko̩l, todu acha kʼabo Israe̩l ko̩da kwʼo̩mo̩ wa.
O̩jo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji taku ma doji kwʼoko ane̩ le̩ etu wa.
Oñ ma lewa ugbo Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpai ugbo o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka aje̩tachi Paran, Kede̩sh; oñ ma kʼohi wa ñwu ma kpai abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka, ma laño̩ dʼe̩ro ane̩ le̩ ña ma.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, A le tʼane̩ ugbo kʼe̩ kpe̩ wa nyi le̩; omi e̩nya kpai iño̩ la acha o̩mo̩ dab omi aji ochochi, e̩ro-wñ la de̩.
Abo ku ma dodo oj ane̩ le̩ muda chʼamagbiti, ewo ewo-wñ la chenʼaku, i nana tabale; a ño̩ li amo̩ma Anak o̩mo̩.
Abo Amale̩k dodo oj ane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩; abo He̩t kpai abo Je̩bius kpai abo Amo̩r dodo oj ane̩ uwo o̩mo̩; oñ abo Kenan la dodo o̩la ohimini, kpai adabu Jo̩rdan jo̩.
Oñ Kele̩b je̩ ñw amone̩ le̩ chechi jo̩ o̩gba Mose̩s, i kakini, Lewa kʼa nyʼo̩mo̩ e̩re̩re̩-i kʼa mʼu gba; todu a che-bo̩jo̩ nyo̩nyo̩ kʼa fu ma du.
Ama aboke̩le̩ ku ma lebʼo̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ kakini, A neke nyʼakobʼamone̩ le̩ n; todu ama gbiti tʼuwa le.

Abe̩le̩ ma mʼinabali e̩bie̩ne̩ ane̩ ku ma tu le̩ du wa ñw abo Israe̩l, ma kakini, Ane̩ kʼa Iegu efu-wñ du kʼa fʼu tu le̩, chʼane̩ kʼi akʼabo ku ma dodo oji-wñ mi; amone̩ du kʼa la li o̩mo̩ chʼabo ku ma gbʼakachi.
A ño̩ li amo̩ma Anak kʼe̩te̩-ma chʼabo Ne̩fili o̩mo̩; awa la dab akpachi eju o̩la-wa, oñ abe̩le̩ a de̩ eju e-ma ge̩.
Tak abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka chʼomu-ma nyʼate̩ kwa taa; oñ amone̩ le̩ raku odu o̩jo̩ le̩.
Tak abo Israe̩l chaka kwokeñmini nyu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n o̩la, o̩gbo̩ abo o̩gbadu le̩ du ka ñwu ma kakini, O, a ma leku ane̩ Ijipti! Abe̩k a ma leku aje̩tachi-i, i ma me̩!
E̩wñ chi ku Jihofa ako wa wʼoj ane̩-i, kʼa ku ñw o̩kwo̩chageli? Amo̩ya-wa kpai abo-wa egini amud e̩wñ aluje̩ ñwu ma; i me̩ ñw a kʼa mudabi tʼIjipti n?
Taku ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, A ki mʼe̩ne̩ʼka du chʼagboji-wa, kʼa mudabi tʼIjipti.
Taku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n lewa fiʼane̩ o̩gba ujeju o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l le̩ chaka.
Oñ Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun kpai Kele̩b o̩ma Jefune, ku ma jʼef abo ku ma tu ane̩ le̩, fʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma fana,
oñ ma ka ñw o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka kakini, Ane̩ kʼa lale gu efu-wñ du kʼa fu tu le̩, chʼane̩ ki nyo̩ tabale.
Iche̩wñ kʼa nyo̩ Jihofa eju, mak i ako wa wʼef ane̩-i, oñ i adʼu ñw a; ane̩ ugbo kʼomi e̩nya kpai iño̩ acha dab aji i che.
Me̩ ki muda rʼe̩re̩ ubi ñwu Jihofa n; me̩ ki la railo abo ane̩ o̩mo̩ n, todu ama chʼuje̩wñ-wa; olubo̩-ma kwo bʼuma oji te̩ me̩, Jihofa la dʼugbo e-wa; me̩ ki railo ma n.
Ama abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka ka ku ma kʼokuta ro̩ do ma.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ amone̩-i ado̩ mi rʼibe̩te̩? Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ ma ako̩ edʼo̩la-mi rʼochochi kade? Ujiwe du kʼu chaka che efu-ma le̩.
Nanʼe̩wñ ibi agwo ma da, u ñʼaje̩ ñwu ma je̩ ogu-mi ge̩ n, oñ u nadʼuwe̩ che uche̩ichi amone̩ ki tʼuma le kʼi ño̩ nʼukpahiu tʼuma le ge̩.
Mose̩s muda ka ñwu Jihofa kakini, E̩gbale̩ abo Ijipti agbʼo̩; todu uwe̩ nʼukpahiu e-we̩ kʼamone̩-i kwefu-ma wa,

taku ma adʼu ka ñw abo ane̩ emi. Ama gbo̩ ka kʼuwe̩, Jihofa, dʼalumeji amone̩-i me̩; todu eju kparʼeju oñ ma liʼuwe̩, O Jihofa, akpa-we̩ la dago abʼuma ma, oñ uwe̩ dʼef akpa ki dago waala o̩ro̩ka kpai ef una ki dago waala odu atʼuma o̩gba.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ fʼamone̩-i kpa alu kate, e̩gbale̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma gbo̩ uwohi-we̩ akakini,
Todabu ku Jihofa ma neke kʼamone̩-i nyʼane̩ kʼi go̩ ñwu ma le̩ n, todule̩ i mʼuma ko kpa ef aje̩tachi-i.
Ifai le̩, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, ukpahiu Ondu ki nana, alu kʼe̩ ka tane̩ le̩ kakini,

Jihofa ache̩du e̩we̩do̩, ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ la tabale, i atʼudu kʼone̩ fe̩ kpai ada kʼi je̩ no̩ ñw u, i muda anʼugbo du kʼi adale ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi fʼabi je̩ n, i adʼudu kʼamata fe̩ nʼamo̩ma-ma oji gbogbo nyʼo̩gba o̩gba e̩ke̩ta kpai e̩ke̩le̩.
Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ tʼudu kʼamone̩-i fe̩ le̩ no̩, alu kʼunana ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ de̩, kpai alu kʼe̩ te̩tato̩no̩ ñw amone̩-i akwo Ijipti gbogbo wʼifai.
Taku Jihofa kakini, U tʼo̩ no̩ alu kʼe̩ ka le̩ me̩;
ama alu du ki de̩, oji-mi, kpai alu kʼef ile̩-i du ako̩ ñw ojima Jihofa,
todabu kʼabo-i chaka fʼojima-mi li, kpai ujiwe-mi kʼu che ef Ijipti kpai e-ef aje̩tachi-i, ku ma ño̩ jʼumi ma onu me̩gwa-i, ku ma ma la gba omu-mi gbo̩ n,
i nʼugbo du kʼejuma adʼane̩ kʼu go̩ ñw amata-ma n; e̩ne̩ du ef abo ku ma che̩de̩te̩-mi le̩ aliʼu n.
Chai adu-mi, Kele̩b, todabu kʼowñ nʼafu omune̩ ojoji efu-wñ, kʼi la tʼumi ubi ogbolo, owñ le̩ nadu wa oj ane̩ ugbo kʼi nyi le̩; ugbe̩-wñ la anʼane̩ le̩.
Abo Amale̩k kpai abo Kenan la dodo ef o̩go̩ le̩, todule̩ me̩ mudabi ku me̩ kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩-me̩ ku me̩ lʼo̩na Ohimini Ekpikpa le̩ nyʼef aje̩tachi o̩na.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n, kakini,
Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ abo o̩gbadu e̩bie̩ne̩-i akeñmini nyʼumi o̩la kade ta? Omi te̩tagbʼeñmini abo Israe̩l, owñ chʼe-ku ma ka nyʼumi o̩la le̩.
E̩ naka ñwu ma kakini, Oji-mi, Jihofa ka-i, alu ku me̩ ka kʼeti-mi gbo̩ le̩, alu le̩ nache me̩ chuu;
oku-me̩ awane̩ ef aje̩tachi-i; i nʼe̩ne̩ du ef abo ku ma kʼuma aluka chaka, owñ chʼaluka-me̩ du akwo o̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, ku me̩ keñmini nyʼumi o̩la le̩,
ñʼawʼoj ane̩ e-kʼomi dʼo̩wo̩-mi nyate̩ ka kʼomi aje̩ ñwu me̩ dodo o̩mo̩ n, chai Kele̩b, o̩ma Jefune kpai Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun.
Ama i chʼe-abo-me̩ egini-i, kʼame̩ ka kʼama amud e̩wñ aluje̩ ñwu ma, abo le̩ nako wʼoj ane̩ le̩, ama la ama ane̩ e-kʼame̩ chʼe̩de̩te̩-wñ-i.
I muda chʼe-ame̩, oku-me̩ awane̩ jʼef aje̩tachi-i.
Oñ amo̩ma-me̩ atale aje̩tachi-i dab amadide ame̩wño̩re̩ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, ma la anʼadu e̩wñtuñ-me̩, gbogbo tak oku-me̩ lenyo̩ rʼeju ef aje̩tachi-i.
Aluka o̩jo̩ ku me̩ je̩ ku me̩ tu ane̩ le̩, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, alu le̩ o̩do̩ʼka akoji o̩jo̩ʼka, oñ ame̩ ane̩ udu-wñ, owñ chʼo̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, taku me̩ ama ubi edagbo̩ e-mi.
Omi, Jihofa, ka me̩, e̩wñ le̩ nache abo o̩gbadu e̩bie̩ne̩ ku ma jeju nyu mi o̩la-i chuu: ma alenyo̩ rʼeju ef aje̩tachi-i, o̩mo̩ ma la aku.
Tak aboke̩le̩ ku Mose̩s kpe̩ nyʼatu ane̩ le̩, ku ma mudabi wa aje̩ ñw abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka keñmini nyʼu lugbo ohi e̩bie̩ne̩ ane̩ le̩ ku ma duwa,
aboke̩le̩ ku ma kʼohi e̩bie̩ne̩ ane̩ le̩ wa, leku ñw atulubo̩ eju Jihofa.
Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun kpai Kele̩b o̩ma Jefune muda bo̩ udeju ef aboke̩le̩ ku ma nyʼatu ane̩ le̩.
Oñ Mose̩s kʼo̩la-i ñw abo Israe̩l chaka, tak amone̩ le̩ kwodaido̩ ololo.
Oñ ma takpa kwane̩ odudu, ma la mute̩gu tʼoj ane̩ uwo o̩mo̩, ma kakini, Go, a jʼemi me̩, a anyʼugbo ku Jihofa katane̩ ñw a le̩; todu a dure me̩.
Taku Mose̩s kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ jʼadaba o̩la ku Jihofa nʼalu-wñ ka le̩ fai ke? I anʼoji n.
Me̩ ki te̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩ n, todu Jihofa dʼefu-me̩ n, ku ma we egwo me̩ da rʼo̩gba ame̩nebi-me̩.
Todu abo Amale̩k kpai abo Kenan jʼo̩gba-me̩ omo, oñ o̩kwo̩chageli agwo me̩ da jʼane̩, todabu ku me̩ mudabi bʼetu Jihofa ubi te̩, todule̩ Jihofa ma ñʼadʼugbo me̩ n,
Ma la fʼibenu je̩ oñ ma mute̩gu tʼoj uwo uwo le̩; akpati alo Jihofa, kpai Mose̩s muda kwef uru le̩ dufu n.
Tak abo Amale̩k kpai abo Kenan ku ma dodo oj ane̩ uwo le̩ mugwo̩ru wa agwo ma da, ma la nʼuma ule gbogbo wa Horma.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ ki ka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ lewa oj ane̩ kʼomi du ñwu me̩ ugbo ku me̩ adodo le̩,

kʼi la dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ ko e̩wñ wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una, dagba kʼi chʼokuno̩ dagba kʼi chʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini abe̩k iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, abe̩k iche̩bo̩ ku me̩ dʼoji-wñ, abe̩k e-ku me̩ gʼe̩do̩la-me̩ duwa, abe̩k ef uje̩wñ uyo̩ ku ma dʼiko-wñ te̩ le̩, ku me̩ che e̩wñ ki akpo ru Jihofa,
e̩gbale̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi ako e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ wa, adʼe̩wñ ele kʼi chʼukpe̩gwa e̩fa omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo e̩kpe̩le̩ hinʼka kpe̩ gwa nyʼu wa ñwu Jihofa;
kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩kpe̩le̩ hin oka todu iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ, uwe̩ añwʼe-le̩ che manyʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, abe̩ku todu iche̩bo̩ le̩, todu o̩mala-wñ okoka.
Abe̩k i chʼokolo e̩ duwa, uwe̩ ane̩ omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ e̩kpe̩gwa e̩fa meji e-kʼekpo e̩kpe̩gwa hinʼka kpe̩gwa nyʼu kʼi chʼe̩wñ ele-wñ;
e̩ ki du omi achiwebe̩te̩ma hin oka wa chʼiche̩bo̩ omi-wñ, kʼi chʼe̩wñ kʼi akpo ru Jihofa.
Oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ dʼo̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ wa chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, abe̩ku iche̩bo̩ e̩wñ ku ma dʼoji-wñ, abe̩ku iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ eche ñwu Jihofa,
maku me̩ akʼe̩wñ ele e̩kpe̩gwa omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼe̩kpe̩reji hin ekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu wa chʼe̩wñ ele manyʼomokuno̩ o̩ko̩ le̩,
iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ ku we̩ adu wa achʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩kpe̩reji hin oka, kʼi chʼiche̩bo̩ ku ma che lugbo una, kʼi akpo ru Jihofa.
Abe̩le̩ ma ache tod o̩kokuno̩ okoka, abe̩k okolo okoka, abe̩k o̩ma e̩wño̩re̩ egini okoka.
Alu kʼaluka-wñ kʼe̩ ñwo̩che de̩ abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ache ñw okoke-wñ du.
Abo du ku ma chʼo̩mane̩ ache e̩wñ-i alu kʼu ka-i, e̩gba ku ma kʼe̩wñ wa lugbo una, kʼi akpo ru Jihofa.
I la che̩wñ kʼilowa ge̩ne̩ ugbo me̩, abe̩k e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼefu-me̩ gbogbo nyʼohio̩gu-me̩, kʼi dʼe̩ e̩do̩ kʼi du e̩wñ wa lugbo una, ki akpo ru Jihofa, alu ku me̩ che, alu le̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ ache.
Todu ujeju-i, uhio̩me̩ todu me̩ kpai ilowa kʼi ge̩ne̩ efu-me̩ chʼoka, uhio̩me̩ ogbegbele̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩ i che; alu kʼame̩ de̩, abe̩le̩ ilowa ade̩ eju Jihofa.
Uko̩o̩la-wñ kpai alu ku ma du oji ajo̩-wñ te̩ todu me̩ kpai tod ilowa kʼi ge̩ne̩ efu-me̩ achʼoka.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ ki ka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ lewa oj ane̩ kʼu nako me̩ nyi le̩
ku me̩ la jʼuje̩wñ e-ane̩ le̩, ame̩ ki ko e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ edu nyʼate̩ wa ñwu Jihofa.
Me̩ adʼakala ku me̩ ne̩ omu-me̩ e-ejo̩ga che wa todu iche̩bo̩ edu nyʼate̩; alu kʼiche̩bo̩ eko̩ nyʼate̩ e-ajita ugwo̩ka de̩, abe̩le̩ me̩ adu nyʼate̩.
Me̩ ki kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ edu nyʼate̩ ñwu Jihofa kwef e̩jo̩ga omu-me̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩.
I la che̩wñ ku me̩ la, ku me̩ ma fʼuko̩-i du de n, owñ chʼe-ki Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s-i,
owñ chʼe-du ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu me̩ lugbo Mose̩s, akwʼo̩jo̩ ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu me̩ kpai ate̩to̩gba-wñ gbogbo nyʼohio̩gu-me̩,

iche̩wñ ki chʼela i la, kʼabo o̩gbadu-i ma ma n, abo o̩gbadu-i chaka adu o̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka wa todu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kʼi kpo ru Jihofa, manyʼe̩wñ ele-wñ kpai iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ, alu kʼoji ajo̩-wñ de̩, kpai o̩mʼobuko̩ʼka tod iche̩bo̩ adure.

Tak atama afʼe̩bo-ma che todu abo o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka, taku ma ato̩no̩ ñwu ma; todu ela i la, ma la mʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-ma duwa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una, ma fʼiche̩bo̩ adure-ma che o̩gba Jihofa me̩, tod ela ku ma la le̩;
taku ma ato̩no̩ ñw o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka, kpai ilowa kʼi ge̩ne̩ efu-ma; todu ela amone̩ le̩ chaka la.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ kate la kʼi fʼadure ta, mak i adʼolewo o̩mo̩do̩ʼka wa todu iche̩bo̩ adure.
Tak amatama le̩ ache e̩wñ e̩boma o̩gba Jihofa todu onugo e̩ne̩ kʼi la le̩, e̩gba kʼi ma ma n kʼi dure, kʼi che e̩boma todu owñ; taku ma ato̩no̩ ñw u.
Ame̩ anʼuko̩-o̩la okate tod e̩ne̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ kʼi ma gwejugede n, tod e̩ne̩ kʼi che o̩mane̩ ef abo Israe̩l, kpai tod ilowa kʼi age̩ne̩ efu-ma.
Ama onugo e̩ne̩ du kʼi gwejugede fʼo̩wo̩ kʼe̩do̩ ache, dagba i chʼo̩mane̩ dagba i chʼilowa, kʼi bu Jihofa ina, ma akʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼef amone̩-wñ te̩.
Todabu kʼi chʼe̩de̩te̩ o̩la Jihofa, kʼi la mʼuko̩ kʼi te̩ daba, ma akʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da pioo; udu-wñ kʼi fe̩ anʼo oji.
Oñ abu kʼabo Israe̩l jʼef aje̩tachi le̩, ma fʼe̩ne̩ʼka li kʼi achʼiji o̩jo̩ uñmi.
Oñ abo ku ma fʼu li abu kʼi achʼiji mʼowñ du wʼugbo Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpai ugbo abo̩gbadu le̩ chaka.
Oñ ma mʼu du nyʼabo ide o̩wo̩, todabu ku ma ma dʼoji e̩wñ ku ma achʼo dufu ta n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Ekpa ma akpa e̩ne̩ le̩; abo̩gbadu-i du akʼokuta ro̩ dʼo ejo̩do̩da uru-i.
Tak abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka mʼu duwa ejo̩do̩da uru le̩, oñ ma kʼokuta ro̩ dʼo, ma la mʼu du kpa, alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw abo Israe̩l, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu ma fo̩jaja da nyʼetiba e̩wñ o̩la-ma gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-ma, ku ma fʼiku odufa dakulu nyʼu etiba-wñ le̩;

oñ e-le̩ achʼo̩jaja ñwu me̩ kʼame̩ ki kejurʼu ku me̩ dibekado uko̩ du ki Jihofa te̩ ku me̩ ki fʼu de; ku me̩ la we etʼe̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-me̩ onugo abe̩k eju-me̩ kado ubi, owñ chʼe̩wñ ku me̩ te̩tajʼo̩ko̩ bʼo̩ akwoubi le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ ki dibekado, ku me̩ la che e̩wñ kʼomi tʼuko̩-wñ le̩ du, kʼame̩ ki fo̩ ñw O̩jo̩-me̩.
Omi che Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, kʼu ko me̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu kʼu chʼO̩jo̩-me̩: omi Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩.
Iko le̩ Ko̩ra, o̩ma Izhar, o̩ma Ko̩hat, o̩ma Lifai, manyu Detan kpai Abiram, amo̩ma Eliab, kpai On, o̩ma Pe̩le̩t, ku ma chʼamo̩ma Rube̩n,
mʼaboke̩le̩ ko; oñ ma kwane̩ tu Mose̩s o̩la, manyʼaboke̩le̩ oli me̩lu ku ma chʼamo̩ma Israe̩l, ma chʼamidachi abo o̩gbadu le̩, ma chʼame̩nuwohi ku ma do̩ ma nyʼojuju;

oñ abo le̩ kʼo̩la-ma jeju nyu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n o̩la, oñ ma ka ñwu ma kakini, E-me̩ bo̩jo̩ me̩! todu abo o̩gbadu-i chaka, okoke-ma du, afo̩ me̩, Jihofa la dʼefu-ma; mak e̩wñ chi ku me̩ hi o̩la-me̩ ne ñw abujeju Jihofa ke?
Tak e̩gba ku Mose̩s gbo̩, i lewa fʼeju-wñ bʼane̩ ma;
oñ i ka ñwu Ko̩ra kpai ame̩numana-wñ kakini, Odudu Jihofa aña wa abo ki chʼabo e-wñ, kpai e̩ne̩ kiafo̩, oñ i aje̩ ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ ki te̩me̩rʼuwñ, e̩ne̩ kʼi du i aje̩ ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ te̩me̩rʼu.
E̩wñ kʼame̩ ache de̩: Ame̩ ki mʼanade ko, owñ che Ko̩ra kpai ame̩numana-wñ-i chaka;
me̩ dʼuna tʼefu-wñ, ku me̩ ko e̩wñ ki akpo le̩ bʼoji-wñ ma o̩gba Jihofa o̩na, oñ e̩ne̩ ku Jihofa du, e̩ne̩ le̩ afo̩. I bo̩jo̩ me̩, ame̩, amo̩ma Lifai!
Taku Mose̩s ka ñwu Ko̩ra, kakini, Me̩ gbo̩ ta, ame̩ amo̩ma Lifai:

E̩wñ re i che eju-me̩, kʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l mʼume̩ date̩ bʼabo o̩gbadu Israe̩l te̩, kʼi la ko me̩ wa me̩ru o̩la-wñ ku me̩ che uko̩lo̩ ef uña ugugu e-Jihofa, ku me̩ la dago o̩gba abo o̩gbadu-i ku me̩ che e̩wñ ñwu ma?
Kʼowñ la dʼuwe̩ wa me̩rʼu, kpai amo̩maye-we̩ ku ma chʼamo̩ma Lifai manyʼuwe̩? Ame̩ ño̩ tene uko̩lo̩ atama ge̩?
Todule̩, Jihofa oñ uwe̩ kpai ame̩numana-we̩ jalunyʼu-i; i la chʼe-Aro̩n, e̩ne̩ owñ che, kʼame̩ keñmini nyʼu o̩la?
Taku Mose̩s kpʼone̩ nyʼado̩ Detan kpai Abiram, amo̩ma Eliab wa; oñ ma kakini, A le n.
E̩wñ ke̩ke̩ i che eju-we̩ kʼe̩ mʼuwa ko kwʼoj ane̩ ugbo kʼomi e̩nya kpai iño̩ acha le̩, kʼe̩ ko wa kpa ef aje̩tachi-i, kʼe̩ ño̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ chʼidachi-wa tila ge̩?
Ubile̩ ge̩, uwe̩ la ko wa wʼoj ane̩ ugbo kʼomi e̩nya kpai iño̩ acha n, e̩ la ko oko kpai uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ñw a kʼa je̩ ogu n. Uwe̩ neku ekpʼaboke̩le̩-i eju fo̩? A le n.
I la bi Mose̩s eju nana oñ i ka ñwu Jihofa kakini, E̩ ki nyʼe̩wñ ele-ma eti n. Omi gbʼoke̩ke̩te̩ okate ef o̩wo̩-ma n, u la che e̩ne̩ kate efu-ma e̩bie̩ne̩ n.
Taku Mose̩s ka ñwu Ko̩ra kakini, Uwe̩ kpai ame̩numana-we̩ chaka ki jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa o̩na, owñ chʼuwe̩ kpʼama kpai Aro̩n;

e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki ne̩ anade-wñ, ku me̩ la ko e̩wñ ki akpo jʼefu-wñ, tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ du kʼi nadʼanade wñ wa o̩gba Jihofa, anade-wñ chʼoli me̩lu; uwe̩ onugo ge̩, kpai Aro̩n, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki ne̩ anade-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ mʼanade-wñ du, oñ ma nʼuna nyʼefu-wñ, taku ma du e̩wñ ki akpo nʼoji-wñ, oñ ma kwodago alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju le̩ manyu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n.
Oñ Ko̩ra fʼabo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka do̩ jeju nyu ma o̩la alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju le̩. Tak ojima Jihofa kwotejugede ñw abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kakini,
Me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ daru bʼef abo o̩gbadu-i te̩, kʼu nafʼuma lie̩ e̩re̩re̩-i.
Taku ma lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ ma kakini, O O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ amafu o̩re̩la du, e̩ne̩ kate fʼadure ta, oñ uwe̩ awe̩do̩ rʼabo o̩gbadu-i chaka?
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw abo o̩gbadu-i kakini, Me̩ kwo bʼo̩la unyabo Ko̩ra kpai Detan kpai Abiram te̩.
Taku Mose̩s kwane̩ oñ i nyʼugbo Detan kpai Abiram; oñ abogijo Israe̩l tʼo̩ ubi.
Tak i ka ñw abo o̩gbadu le̩ kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩ ku me̩ kwo bʼunyabo ame̩ne̩bibi-i te̩, me̩ ki la do̩wo̩kadʼe̩wñ-ma du n, tode̩gba ku me̩ chile̩che̩ ef adure-ma chaka.
Abe̩le̩ ma kwo bʼo̩la unyabo Ko̩ra kpai Detan kpai Abiram te̩; taku Detan kpai Abiram dufu wa, oñ ma kwodago alugbo̩na unyabo-ma, manyʼamo̩ya-ma kpai amo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai abo-ma egini.
Taku Mose̩s kakini, Ugbo kʼame̩ ama ka ku Jihofa kpe̩ mi wa kʼu che e̩wñ-i du, kʼi ma chʼibe efu-mi nañwa-i n de̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼabo-i aku uku kʼamone̩ du aku, abe̩k iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ ki ake̩re̩bʼe̩ne̩ du ake̩re̩bʼuma, mak i che Jihofa kpe̩ mi wa n.

I muda che̩wñ ku Jihofa fʼe̩wñ etito̩ʼka nyi emi, kʼane̩pe̩te̩ mʼalu-wñ chi, kʼi mʼuma ko mi manyʼe̩wñ du kʼama ne̩, ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩jegu udeju udeju, tak i ane̩rʼume̩ eju ka kʼabo-i fʼe̩de̩te̩ Jihofa che.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼi fʼo̩la-i du ka kpa, kʼane̩ ugbo ku ma dago le̩ mukpana meji;
tak ane̩pe̩te̩ mʼalu-wñ chi oñ i mʼuma ko mi kpai abo unyi-ma chaka kpai aboke̩le̩ du ku ma jʼef o̩wo̩ Ko̩ra kpai ane̩-ma chaka.
Abe̩le̩ ama kpai e̩wñ du ku ma ne̩, gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩jegu udeju udeju; tak ane̩ hi alu de nyʼuma, oñ ma lenyo̩ rʼalumeji ujeju le̩.
Tak abo Israe̩l du ku ma donyu ma daka ra tod ukwa-ma ku ma gbo̩; todu ma kakini, To̩de̩gba kʼane̩ ñʼako wa mi ge̩!
Tak una kwʼugbo Jihofa dufu wa oñ i fʼaboke̩le̩ oli me̩lu ku ma ne̩ e̩wñ ki akpo le̩ wa liye̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw E̩leaza o̩ma Aro̩n atama kʼi namʼanade le̩ ko kwef una-i, kʼi la fʼuna-wñ fiatuka o̩mo̩. Todu e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ kiafo̩,

owñ chʼanade abo ku ma fʼadure ta nʼoji e-ma onugo; ama ki fʼu gwu kpe̩te̩ke̩ ku ma mud e̩wñ ku ma ko bʼoji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ma; todu ama kʼe̩wñ le̩ wa o̩gba Jihofa; todule̩ e̩wñ kiafo̩ i che. Abe̩le̩ e-le̩ achʼujiwe ñw abo Israe̩l.
Tak E̩leaza, atama le̩, mʼanade ebijeikpa le̩ ko, owñ chʼe-kʼabo ku ma gu uma jo le̩ ne̩ wa; oñ ma mʼu ko gwu kpe̩te̩ke̩ kʼi chʼuchi ku ma du bʼoji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ma,

kʼi chʼe̩wñ urewa ñw abo Israe̩l, todu kʼe̩ne̩ ejaduña du kʼi ma dʼef ugbe̩ Aro̩n in, kʼi we ete̩ me̩ru kʼi gu e̩wñ ki akpo jo eju Jihofa; kʼi we ede̩ alu ku Ko̩ra kpai ame̩numana-wñ de̩—owñ chʼalu ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu E̩leaza lugbo Mose̩s le̩.
Ama o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ abo o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka kwokeñmini nyu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n o̩la, ma kakini, Ame̩ fʼamone̩ Jihofa kpa kpa me̩.
Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼabo o̩gbadu le̩ jeju nyu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n o̩la, ama rʼeju da go o̩wo̩ ugbo kʼunyabo ujeju le̩ de̩; e̩la go, akpa le̩ bʼo ma, oñ ojima Jihofa kwotejugede.
Taku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n lewa o̩gba unyabo ujeju le̩.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Kwo bʼalumeji o̩gbadu-i te̩, kʼomi ki fʼuma liye̩ e̩re̩re̩-i. Taku ma lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.

Oñ Mose̩s ka ñw Aro̩n kakini, Mʼanade le̩ du kʼe̩ nʼuna kwʼoj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ nyʼu, kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ ki akpo le̩ ko jʼoji-wñ, kʼe̩ la mʼu du nyʼugbo abo o̩gbadu-i piopio, kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che todu ma; todu uwe̩do̩ kwʼo̩gba Jihofa awa, atulubo̩-wñ chane̩ me̩.
Tak Aro̩n mʼu du le alu ku Mose̩s ka, oñ i fule nyʼalumeji ujeju; e̩ la go, atulubo̩-wñ chane̩ ugbo amone̩ e̩gba le̩ me̩; oñ i dʼe̩wñ ki akpo le̩ wa che, oñ i fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che tod amone̩.
I la dago agbagba abo ki ku kpai abo ki deju; oñ ma fʼatulubo̩ le̩ dahi.
Abo kʼatulubo̩ le̩ kpa la chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩le̩ nyʼulo̩gwa nyʼone̩ ogume̩lu nʼoji, abo le̩ manyʼabo ku ma ku ugbo o̩la Ko̩ra le̩ ta.
Tak Aro̩n mudabi wʼugbo Mose̩s alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju le̩, oñ ma fʼatulubo̩ le̩ dahi te̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

E̩ nako̩la ñw abo Israe̩l kʼe̩ la gba o̩kpa o̩kpa kwo o̩wo̩-ma, o̩kpaʼka chʼutodu unyi e̩ne̩fe̩nyiʼka, e̩ gba o̩wo̩ amidachi-ma chaka alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩, owñ chʼo̩kpa me̩gweji. Tak e̩ fʼodu e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ko̩ nyʼo̩la o̩kpa-wñ.
Oñ e̩ ko̩ odu Aro̩n o̩la o̩kpa Lifai. Todu o̩kpaʼka ado̩mo̩ todu e̩nuto̩gba unyi unyi amata-ma okoka.
Tak uwe̩ amʼu ko ne jo̩ o̩gba e̩wñ ibenu ugbo kʼu nade kpai uwe̩ ef unyabo ujeju le̩.
Oñ i leʼa, o̩kpa e̩ne̩ kʼomi du adikoko; abe̩le̩ u naje̩ ñw eñmini abo Israe̩l ki muda bʼumi o̩la te̩, owñ chʼe-ku ma keñmini nyʼame̩ o̩la le̩.
Taku Mose̩s ko̩la ñw abo Israe̩l; oñ amidachi-ma chaka kʼo̩kpa ñw u, idachiʼka nʼoka, alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩, owñ chʼo̩kpa me̩gweji; o̩kpa Aro̩n la dʼef o̩kpa-ma le̩.
Taku Mose̩s kʼo̩kpa le̩ ne jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa ef unyabo ibenu.
Oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, Mose̩s nyʼef unyabo ibenu; e̩ la go, o̩kpa Aro̩n ki chʼutodu abo unyi Lifai, i bu, i la dʼikoko, oñ almond ki kpa jʼo̩la-wñ.
Taku Mose̩s mʼo̩kpa le̩ chaka ko kwʼo̩gba Jihofa dufu wa ñw abo Israe̩l chaka: taku ma go, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la mʼo̩kpa e-wñ du.

Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Mʼo̩kpa Aro̩n du dabi tʼo̩gba e̩wñ ibenu le̩ ku ma fʼide-wñ de kʼi chʼujiwe ñw amo̩ma ku ma fʼe̩re̩ ubi ro̩-i; kʼe̩ che kʼeñmini ku ma ka nyu mi o̩la ki muda, kʼama ki we eku.
Mose̩s fʼabe̩le̩ che; alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñw u, abe̩le̩ i che.
Tak abo Israe̩l ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Go, ochochi, i bʼiñmi eda ke, elenyo̩ o̩chaka-wa alenyo̩-i.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi ate̩ me̩ru, kʼi ate̩ me̩ru uña ugugu e-Jihofa aku. Edʼiñmi oñ o̩chaka-wa adʼiñmi-i?
Taku Jihofa ka ñw Aro̩n kakini, Uwe̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai abo unyi ata-we̩ manyʼuwe̩ ane̩ udu uña kiafo̩-i; oñ uwe̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ manyʼuwe̩ ane̩ udu uko̩lo̩ atama ku me̩ de.

E̩ ño̩ kʼamo̩maye-we̩, abo o̩lo̩pu Lifai, owñ chʼo̩lo̩pu ata-we̩ le̩ wa manyʼuwe̩, kʼama ki dama kpai uwe̩, ku ma che e̩wñ ñw e̩; uwe̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai uwe̩ muda ajo̩ o̩gba unyabo ibenu-i ache e̩wñ.
Ama le̩ anʼide kʼuwe̩ adu ñwu ma ade, kpai ide e̩wñ unyabo le̩ chaka; ma muda ate̩me̩rʼe̩wñ eku uña kiafo̩ kpai ugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ n, kʼama ki we eku, tʼame̩, tʼama.
Ma la adama kpai uwe̩, ku ma la fʼide unyabo ujeju de, todu uko̩lo̩ unyabo le̩ chaka; e̩ne̩ ejaduña du la ate̩me̩ru me̩ n.
Oñ ame̩ anʼide uña kiafo̩ ade, kpai ide ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ; kʼuwe̩do̩ ki ño̩ dabi bʼabo Israe̩l ma ge̩ n.
I la chʼe-mi, go, u mʼamo̩maye-me̩, abo Lifai le̩, ko kwef abo Israe̩l; u mʼuma ko chʼame̩ ele todu Jihofa ku ma ki che uko̩lo̩ unyabo ujeju le̩.

Tak uwe̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ manyʼuwe̩ ade uko̩lo̩ atama-me̩ le̩ ugbo e̩wñ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ chaka, kpai uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ du ki jʼejefu ukpo ugbeju le̩; ame̩ achʼuko̩lo̩ e-le̩. U mʼo̩da uko̩lo̩ atama-me̩ le̩ du chʼame̩ ele. E̩ne̩ ejaduña du kʼi la te̩me̩rʼu, ekpa ma akpa.

Taku Jihofa ka ñw Aro̩n kakini, Go, omi la mʼide e̩wñ iche̩bo̩-mi ku ma ko nyʼate̩ le̩ du ñw e̩ kʼe̩ de, owñ chʼe̩wñ abo Israe̩l du kiafo̩; uwe̩ omi ko ñw u todu ekpo ku ma ba tʼe̩ oji, kpai amo̩ma-we̩, kʼi chʼukpe̩-me̩ o̩gbegbele̩.

E̩wñ ki la achʼe-we̩ kwef e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ ku ma ma ko nyʼuna n le̩ de̩; e̩wñ O̩jo̩-ma du, kpai e̩wñ ele-ma du, kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure-ma, kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi-ma ku ma je̩ chaka, e-ku ma akowa ñwu mi achʼe-kiafo̩ e-efo̩ todu we̩ kpai todu amo̩ma-we̩.
Alu kʼe̩ je̩ e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ le̩ abe̩le̩ ame̩ aje̩; e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du aje̩; e̩wñ kiafo̩ ñw e̩ i che.

E̩wñ ki lañʼachʼe-we̩ de̩ ge̩, e̩wñ ku ma ko nyʼate̩ kwef e̩wñ ele-ma, manyʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ du kʼabo Israe̩l ko wa amiejo; e-le̩ omi muko ñw e̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ manyʼuwe̩, e-le̩ achʼuhio̩me̩ o̩gbegbele̩: e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼef unyi-we̩ kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ neke aje̩.
Ekpo e-ki nyo̩ tule chaka kpai e-ki nyo̩ tule ef omi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ kpai e̩wñ e̩yo̩, chaka, owñ chʼejo̩ga e̩wñ ku ma kowa ñwu Jihofa le̩, uwe̩ u ko ñwu.
Ero e̩wñ du ki dʼoj ane̩-ma e-kʼi abie̩ ejodudu, e-ku ma ko wʼugbo Jihofa le̩, uwe̩ ane̩; e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼef unyi-we̩ kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ neke aje̩.
E̩wñ du kʼi dʼef abo Israe̩l ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ uwe̩ ane̩.

E̩wñ o̩re̩la du kʼi akpʼo̩gba iye-wñ na, ef e̩la ku ma du wa ñwu Jihofa, dagba i chʼone̩ dagba i chʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, uwe̩ ane̩; e̩ muda ala o̩mo̩gba e-one̩ tane̩ tila, kpai o̩mojo̩do̩ e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ku ma ma de̩ hiolo n, uwe̩ ki la tane̩ ge̩.
Oñ abo ku ma la ma tane̩ le̩, akwo ochuʼka uwe̩ ala ma tane̩, alu kʼuwe̩ adʼaja-wñ che she̩ke̩l ajifa me̩lu, alu ku she̩ke̩l uña kiafo̩ de̩ (owñ che gera ogu).

Ama o̩mojo̩do̩ okuno̩, abe̩k o̩mojo̩do̩ ala, abe̩k o̩mojo̩do̩ ewo, uwe̩ ki la tane̩ n; ama fo̩. Uwe̩ ki tʼe̩bie̩ abo e-le̩ fio̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼe̩ gu ula-ma jo, kʼi mad e̩wñ ku ma duwa lugbo una, kʼi kpo ru Jihofa.
Uwe̩ muda anʼe̩la-ma, alu kʼache̩do̩ ku ma miejo kpai alu kʼuta e-awo̩to̩ de̩, alu le̩ uwe̩ ane̩.

E̩wñ eko nyate̩ ef e̩wñ kiafo̩ du kʼabo Israe̩l ko nyate̩ ñwu Jihofa le̩, uwe̩ u ko ñw u, kpai amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, kpai amo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ manyʼuwe̩, kʼi chʼuhio̩me̩ o̩gbegbele̩; alo e-omu ku ma kpe̩ o̩gba Jihofa o̩gbegbele̩ i ache ñw e̩ kpai amugbe̩-we̩ manyʼuwe̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw Aro̩n kakini, Uwe̩ ane̩ e̩wñ ogu du kʼe̩ je̩ oj ane̩-ma n, uwe̩ la anʼukpe̩ du efu-ma n; omi chʼukpe̩-we̩ kpai e̩wñ ogu kʼe̩ je̩ ef abo Israe̩l.
I la chʼe-abo Lifai, go, u mʼukpe̩gwa e̩wñ du oj ane̩ Israe̩l ko chʼe̩wñ ogu-ma ku ma je̩ koji uko̩lo̩-ma ku ma che, owñ chʼuko̩lo̩ unyabo ujeju le̩.
Ate̩to̩gba-i abo Israe̩l ki la te̩me̩ru unyabo ujeju n, tode̩gba ku ma nʼadu adure ku ma ku.
Abo Lifai ache uko̩lo̩ unyabo ujeju, ama la anʼudu e-ma; e-le̩ chʼuhio̩me̩ o̩gbegbele̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩; ma la ane̩ e̩wñ ogu du ku ma aje̩ ef abo Israe̩l in.
Todu u mʼukpe̩gwa e̩wñ abo Israe̩l, e-ku ma kowa che e̩wñ ekonyate̩ ñwu Jihofa ko ñw abo Lifai ki chʼe̩wñ ogu ku ma je̩; todule̩ oñ u ka ñwu ma ka kʼama ane̩ e̩wñ ogu du ef abo Israe̩l in.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

Anubile̩ ge̩, uwe̩ aka ñw abo Lifai kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ mʼukpe̩gwa e̩wñ gba kwʼo̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l, owñ chʼe-ma kʼu ko ñwu me̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ogu-me̩ le̩, tak ame̩ ako e̩wñ kwef e-le̩ nyate̩ ñwu Jihofa, owñ chʼe̩kpe̩gwa ki kwʼef e̩kpe̩gwa e̩wñ le̩.
Taku ma alʼe̩wñ-me̩ ku me̩ ko nyʼate̩ le̩ ru me̩ dabe̩ne̩ ki chʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩ ki kwo ajita ugwo̩ka, abe̩k i la dabe̩ne̩ kʼi kwʼef aguo̩kolo̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma.

Abe̩le̩ oñ ame̩ ñʼako e̩wñ edu nyate̩ wa ñwu Jihofa kwef e̩wñ e̩kpe̩gwa e-me̩ chaka, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ agba kwʼo̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l; taku kwef e-le̩ ame̩ ako e̩wñ ku me̩ ko nyate̩ ñwu Jihofa ñw Aro̩n atama.
Kwef e̩wñ du ku ma ko ñwu me̩ chaka, ame̩ ako e̩wñ nyate̩ ñwu Jihofa alu ki chʼukpe̩-wñ, owñ chʼe-ki nʼo̩ro̩ chaka, owñ chʼe-ki afo̩ ki dʼefu-wñ.

Todule̩ uwe̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ kʼo̩ro̩ ki dʼefu-wñ nyate̩, ma ki lʼe-ki bo̩ rʼabo Lifai dabe̩ne̩ ki chʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩ ki kwʼajita ugwo̩ka-ma, kpai omi-wñ kʼi akwʼef aguo̩ko̩lo̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma.
Ame̩ la aje̩ ugbo du ku me̩ jo̩, ame̩ kpai abunyi-me̩, todu e-le̩ chʼuro̩me̩ e-me̩ koji uko̩lo̩ ku me̩ che ef unyabo ujeju.
Ame̩ anʼadu adure du ugbo-wñ n, owñ chʼabu ku me̩ kʼo̩ro̩-wñ nyate̩ le̩. Ame̩ ki la je̩ kʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ e-abo Israe̩l chʼe̩wñ o̩ja n, kʼame̩ ki we eku.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kakini,

E̩wñ ki chʼuhio̩me̩ uko̩-o̩la e-ku Jihofa ñwate̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, E̩ ki ka ñw abo Israe̩l ku ma mʼagbadufu ole okuno̩ ekpikpa kʼi mufu duwa ñw e̩, kʼi ma nʼo̩lo̩ du o̩la-wñ n, e-kʼoli uno̩lo̩ ma kadʼo mama ta n.
Oñ ame̩ adʼe-le̩ ñw E̩leaza atama, tak owñ adʼu dufu wʼejo̩do̩da uru, oñ e̩ne̩ʼka akpa eju-wñ;
tak E̩leaza atama adʼo̩mo̩wo̩-wñ chʼe̩bie̩-wñ kʼi adʼu ta fio̩ rʼo̩wo̩ o̩gba unyabo ujeju onu mebie.
Taku ma agu agbadufu ole okuno̩ le̩ jo eju-wñ; ma agu año̩-wñ kpai e̩la-wñ, kpai e̩bie̩-wñ manyʼechu-wñ jo;
tak atama le̩ amʼolisida kpai hiso̩p kpai e̩wñ odufa ekpikpa ko, kʼi ko rikpolo nyʼalumeji ugbo kʼagbadufu ole okuno̩ ajo le̩.
Tak atama agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ gwe̩ ef omiofo, ubile̩ tak i agudu wʼef uru, oñ o̩la atama le̩ adaji gbogbo mʼe̩gba kʼolu tunyʼane̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki fʼu gujo agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ ef omiofo, kʼi ño̩ fʼo̩la-wñ gwe̩ ef omiofo, oñ o̩la e̩ne̩ le̩ adaji gbogbo mʼe̩gba kʼolu tunyʼane̩ ge̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ agbʼelulu agbadufu ole okuno̩ le̩ jo̩, kʼi du dajo̩ uña ki de̩ hiolo ejo̩do̩da uru le̩; ma ade e-le̩ todu o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l, kʼi chʼomi e̩nelifo̩; iche̩bo̩ adure i che.

Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi gba elulu agbadufu ole okuno̩ le̩ jo̩ agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, o̩la-wñ la adaji gbogbo mʼe̩gba kʼolu tunyʼane̩. Oñ e-le̩ ado̩mo̩ ñw abo Israe̩l, kpai todu ilowa kʼi age̩ne̩ efu-ma, ki chʼuhio̩me̩ o̩gbegbele̩.
E̩ne̩ ki ado̩wo̩kado oku one̩, o̩la-wñ mudaji gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie;
e̩ne̩ le̩ anʼomi le̩ agwʼo̩la-wñ rinyo̩ bʼadure te̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ tak o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ o̩la-wñ afe̩; i ma la gwʼo̩la-wñ rinyo̩ bʼadure te̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ n, mak i afe̩ o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ n.

E̩ne̩ du kʼi ado̩wo̩kado e̩ne̩ ki ku, owñ chʼoku e̩ne̩ ki ku kʼi ma la gwʼo̩la-wñ rinyo̩ bʼadure te̩ n, mak i adʼuña ugugu Jihofa-i ji, ma akʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼabo Israe̩l te̩; todabu ku ma ma tʼomiofo e-o̩la ebie̩ le̩ fiʼo̩ o̩la n, o̩la-wñ mudaji; e̩daji-wñ dʼo̩la-wñ ta.
Uko̩o̩la one̩ ki leku ef unyabo le̩ de̩: E̩ne̩ du kʼi awʼef unyabo le̩ kpai e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼef unyabo le̩, o̩la-wñ mudaji o̩jo̩ mebie.
Oñ e̩wñ eku du kʼalu-wñ chʼe̩chite̩, ku ma ma la dʼuchi-wñ ji mʼalu-wñ n mudaji me̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼegbili gbaa kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ kado e̩ne̩ ku ma nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa, abe̩k oku one̩, abe̩k achiku one̩, abe̩k ojinoji, o̩la-wñ mudaji o̩jo̩ mebie.
Todu abo kʼo̩la-ma daji, ma la abu elulu iche̩bo̩ adure ku ma gujo le̩, taku ma adʼu tef e̩wñ ekuʼka ku ma che omi eruru nyʼu;

tak e̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ adu hiso̩p tunyʼomiofo le̩, kʼi la du tafio̩ unyabo kpai e̩wñ eku le̩ chaka kpai o̩la abo ku ma jo̩ o̩mo̩, kpai o̩la e̩ne̩ kʼi do̩wo̩kado achiku, abe̩k e̩ne̩ ku ma du kpa, abe̩k oku one̩, abe̩k ojinoji;

oñ e̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ adʼu tafio̩ abo kʼo̩la-ma daji o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ kpai o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ; abe̩le̩ i la agwʼo̩la-wñ rinyo̩ o̩jo̩ e̩kebie, tak e̩ne̩ le̩ agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-wñ oñ i a gwʼo̩la ef omiofo, tak e̩gba kʼolu tunyʼane̩ o̩la-wñ afe̩.

E̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ daji, kʼi ma la fʼo̩la-wñ gworinyo̩ bʼadure te̩ n, ma akʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ da bʼef alumeji o̩gbadu te̩, todabu kʼi fʼuña kiafo̩ e-Jihofa bie̩; ma la tʼomiofo o̩la e̩bie̩ le̩ fiʼo̩ o̩la n; o̩la-wñ mudaji.

E-le̩ chʼuhio̩me̩ ñw abo e-le̩ ogbegbele̩. Tak e̩ne̩ kʼi atʼomiofo olu e̩bie̩ le̩ fiʼo̩ agwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la e-wñ; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi ado̩wo̩kado omiofo o̩la e̩bie̩ le̩ mak o̩la-wñ mudaji gbogbo mʼe̩gba kʼolu tunyʼane̩.
Oñ e̩wñ du kʼe̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ daji do̩wo̩kado, mudaji; onugo e̩ne̩ du kʼi la do̩wo̩kado mudaji gbogbo mʼe̩gba kʼolu tunyʼane̩.
Tak abo Israe̩l, owñ chʼo̩gbo̩ o̩gbadu le̩ chaka, lewa aje̩tachi Zin ochu ejodudu, oñ amone̩ le̩ kwojo̩ Kede̩sh; taku Miriam leku o̩mo̩, oñ ma mʼu du ji o̩mo̩.
Omiofo la do̩mo̩ todu abo o̩gbadu le̩ n; taku ma kʼo̩la-ma jeju nyu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n o̩la.
Tak amone̩ le̩ kʼuja bo̩ Mose̩s, oñ ma kakini, A ma leku e̩gba kʼamo̩maye-wa ku o̩gba Jihofa o̩mo̩ le̩ i ma me̩!
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ ko abo ujeju Jihofa wʼaje̩tachi-i, kʼawa ki ku emi? tʼawa tʼame̩la ki anʼadu-wa?

E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ je̩ ñw a kwʼIjipti wa-i, ku me̩ ko wa wʼugbo ki bie̩ne̩-i? i chʼuña ugbo e̩wñ e̩yo̩, abe̩k o̩gbaikolo, abe̩k achiwebe̩te̩ma, abe̩k ipo̩me̩grane̩t jo̩ i che n; omiofo la do̩mo̩ kʼa ñmo̩ n.
Taku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kwo bʼeju abo o̩gbadu le̩ te̩ nyʼalugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, oñ ma fʼeju bʼane̩ ma. Tak ojima Jihofa kwotejugede ñwu ma.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

Mʼo̩kpa le̩ du, kʼe̩ fʼabo o̩gbadu le̩ do̩ jeju, uwe̩ kpai Aro̩n o̩maye-we̩, kʼe̩ ka ñw okuta le̩ eju-ma, kʼi dʼomiofo-wñ dufu; abe̩le̩ uwe̩ adʼomiofo dufu ñwu ma kwef okuta le̩; abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ adʼomiofo ñw abo o̩gbadu le̩ kpai ame̩la ki anʼadu-ma ñmo̩.
Taku Mose̩s mʼo̩kpa le̩ du kwʼo̩gba Jihofa, alu kʼi ñwa ñw u.
Taku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n fʼabo o̩gbadu le̩ do̩ wa jo̩ o̩gba okuta le̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ku me̩ jʼalañu, me̩ neti; a adʼomiofo kwef okuta-i dufu ñwu me̩?
Taku Mose̩s chʼo̩wo̩-wñ nyate̩, oñ i dʼo̩kpa-wñ gwo okuta le̩ onu meji; tak omiofo kwodufu lile; oñ abo o̩gbadu le̩ kpai ame̩la ki anʼadu-ma ñmo̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kakini, Todabu kʼame̩ ma dʼo̩la-mi rʼochochi n, ku me̩ ma che kʼomi ki fo̩ eju abo Israe̩l in, todule̩ i chʼame̩ ako abo o̩gbadu-i wʼoj ane̩ kʼu ko ñwu ma le̩ n.
Omi Me̩riba de̩; ugbo kʼabo Israe̩l kʼuja bo̩ Jihofa, kʼi la fʼefo̩ ne̩ efu-ma.
Taku Mose̩s fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ akwo Kede̩sh nyʼugbo onu Ido̩m, kakini, Abu kʼo̩maye-we̩ Israe̩l ka de̩ kakini, Uwe̩ chema ihianyi du kʼi ke̩re̩bʼuwa-i:
alu kʼamata-wa gwo̩ru nyi Ijipti, kʼa la jo̩ Ijipti gbane̩ gbane̩; oñ abo Ijipti chʼawa kpai amata-wa e̩bie̩ne̩;
tak e̩gba kʼa raku do̩ Jihofa, i gbo̩ omu-wa, i la fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ wa, oñ i ko wa kwo Ijipti dufu; e̩ la go, a jo̩ Kede̩sh kʼi chʼewo ki dʼotitala alo̩me̩ ane̩-we̩.

Nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw a lale gu ef ane̩-we̩ du. A ale gu ef uche̩ abe̩k achiwebe̩te̩ma du n, a la añmo̩ omiofo obuga-me̩ n; ojikpadala onu oñ a ale, a anarʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi, gbogbo tak a alale gu ojane̩-we̩ du n.
Ido̩m muda ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ale gu efu-wa du n, tode̩gba kʼu nanʼo̩kwo̩chageli dufu wa abʼuwe̩.
Tak abo Israe̩l ka ñw u kakini, Ojikpadala oñ a ale; i la che̩wñ kʼa ñmo̩ omiofo-we̩, tʼomi tʼe̩wñ ukpa-mi, e̩gbale̩ narʼo̩me̩-wñ; e-le̩ kate, a che e̩wñ omune̩ n, e̩ je̩ ñwu mi lule̩ e̩re̩ lale ofo.
Oñ i kakini, Uwe̩ alale n. Tak Ido̩m kʼaboke̩le̩ wewe dufu wa ako̩bʼo̩, i la nʼo̩wo̩ e̩gbiti wa.
Abe̩le̩ Ido̩m ko̩ bi o̩na ñw abo Israe̩l ku ma lale gu ojane̩-wñ du, oñ abo Israe̩l muna bʼo̩ te̩.
Taku ma kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩ kwo Kede̩sh, oñ abo Israe̩l, owñ chʼo̩gbo̩ abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka, lewa uwo Ho̩r.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n oj uwo Ho̩r alo̩me̩ ane̩ Ido̩m le̩, kakini,
Ma agba Aro̩n tef abo-wñ; todu i ñʼagudu tʼoj ane̩ e-kʼomi go̩ ñw abo Israe̩l le̩ ge̩ n, todabu ku me̩ lañu ru o̩la kʼu ñwa ñwu me̩ ugbo omi Me̩riba le̩.
E̩ mʼAro̩n kpai E̩leaza o̩ma-wñ ko, kʼe̩ ko ma wʼoj uwo Ho̩r-i;
e̩ ki mʼe̩wñ o̩la Aro̩n gwo̩ bʼo̩ o̩la te̩, kʼe̩ ko nyʼE̩le̩aza, o̩ma-wñ, o̩la; oñ ma agba Aro̩n wʼugbo abo-wñ, i la aku o̩mo̩.
Mose̩s la che alu ki Jihofa ñwate̩; oñ ma mute̩gu nyʼoj uwo Ho̩r eju abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka.
Taku Mose̩s mʼe̩wñ o̩la Aro̩n gwo̩ bʼo̩ o̩la te̩, oñ i mʼu ko nyi E̩leaza, o̩ma-wñ, o̩la; tak Aro̩n leku oj uwo o̩mo̩. Oñ Mose̩s kpai E̩leaza gwo̩ru kwʼoj uwo le̩ wane̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka li ka kʼAro̩n leku, ma raku-wñ o̩jo̩ ogue̩gwa, owñ chʼabo unyi Israe̩l chaka.
Tak e̩ne̩ Kenan, kʼi chʼonu Arad, kʼi dodo o̩pata o̩gane̩ gbo̩ ka kʼabo Israe̩l alʼo̩na Atarim wa, i kwokʼogu bʼabo Israe̩l, i la fʼiche̩kibo̩ efu-ma mu.
Tak abo Israe̩l fʼoji da ñwu Jihofa, oñ ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ako amone̩-i nyʼumi o̩wo̩ ochochi, mak u nakʼewo ewo-ma jo̩ ñw e̩.
Taku Jihofa netirʼomu abo Israe̩l, oñ i mʼabo Kenan le̩ ko nyʼuma o̩wo̩; taku ma mʼabo le̩ kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko, kpai ewo ewo-ma; ma dʼodu ugbo kide̩ ko̩ Ho̩rma.
Taku ma kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩ kwo uwo Ho̩r lʼo̩na ale tʼOhimini Ekpikpa, ku ma dagbala lʼiba ane̩ Ido̩m; oñ uhia fʼamone̩ le̩ hia ej o̩na le̩.
Tak amone̩ le̩ chane̩ eko̩la nyʼO̩jo̩ kpai Mose̩s o̩la, kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ ko wa kwʼIjipti wa kʼa ku aje̩tachi-i? Todu uje̩wñ de̩ n, omiofo la de̩ n; uje̩wñ fuye̩ kide̩ kʼuwa o̩la me̩.
Taku Jihofa fʼamejo una una kpe̩ nyʼef amone̩ le̩, oñ ma fʼamone̩ le̩ lo̩, abo Israe̩l wewe la leku.
Tak amone̩ le̩ wʼugbo Mose̩s, oñ ma kakini, A fʼadure ta me̩, todabu kʼa ko̩la nyu Jihofa kpai uwe̩ o̩la; e̩ narodubo̩ Jihofa kʼi mʼamejo le̩ ko bʼuwa te̩. Taku Mose̩s chadua todu amone̩ le̩.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, E̩ nafʼejo e-una che ñw o̩la-we̩, kʼe̩ dʼu dago oj oli; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼejo lo̩ kʼi la ago adeju.
Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s nʼebije ekpikpa che ejo, oñ i mʼu du manyʼoli dago; oñ i lewa, i la che̩wñ kʼejo fʼe̩ne̩ʼka lo̩, kʼi go ejo ebije ekpikpa le̩, i adeju.
Tak abo Israe̩l kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩ alo, oñ ma lewa ru Obot.
Taku ma kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩ kwo Obot, oñ ma lewa ru Iye-abarim, ef aje̩tachi ki dʼo̩gba Moab o̩wo̩ olodudu.
Akwo o̩mo̩ ma kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩, oñ ma lewa ru ef o̩go̩ Zere̩d.
Akwo o̩mo̩ ma kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩, oñ ma lewa ru ejudaba Arno̩n, kʼi dʼaje̩tachi kʼi te̩ akwo alo̩me̩ abo Amo̩r alo le̩; todu Arno̩n le̩ chʼalo̩me̩ Moab, agbagba Moab kpai abo Amo̩r.
Todule̩ ma ka ef O̩takada Ogu Jihofa, kakini,
Kpai aji aji efoko o̩go̩ o̩go̩
Akwo o̩mo̩ ma nyi Bir; owñ chʼobuga e-ku Jihofa kʼo̩la-wñ ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Kʼamone̩ le̩ wa jo̩, kʼu nadʼomiofo ñwu ma.
E̩gbale̩ Israe̩l fʼeli-i ko̩ kakini:
Obuga, e-kʼamagboji gwa le̩
akwo Matana ma la nyi Nahalie̩l, akwo Nahalie̩l ma nyi Bamot,
oñ akwo Bamot ma nyi o̩go̩ kʼi dʼegbili Moab, nyʼoji Pisga kʼi bʼo̩do̩go̩ nʼane̩ aje̩tachi le̩.
Tak Israe̩l fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Siho̩n kʼi chʼonu abo Amo̩r, kakini,
Je̩ ñwu mi lale gu ef ane̩-we̩ du; a ana rʼo̩wo̩ʼka tef uche̩ abe̩k achiwebe̩te̩ma n; a la añmo̩ omi obuga-me̩ n; a ale ojikpadala onu, gbogbo tak a lale gu ane̩-we̩ du.
Siho̩n muda je̩ ñw Israe̩l lale gu ane̩-wñ du n. Oñ Siho̩n mʼaboke̩le̩-wñ du ko wa jo̩, i dufu wa akobo̩ Israe̩l aje̩tachi le̩ oñ i lewa Jahaz; i la kogu bʼabo Israe̩l.
Tak Israe̩l nʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli gwʼo da, oñ i mʼane̩-wñ gba akwo Arno̩n gbogbo nyi Jabo̩k, gbogbo wʼane̩ abo Amo̩n; todu alo̩me̩ abo Amo̩n chʼe̩gbiti.
Tak Israe̩l mʼewo ewo-i ko chaka, oñ Israe̩l kwogugu ewo ewo abo Amo̩r le̩ chaka, owñ che He̩shbo̩n, kpai adogbe-wñ chaka.
Todu He̩shbo̩n le̩ chʼewo Siho̩n kʼi chʼonu abo Amo̩r, e-kʼi kʼogu bo̩ onu Moab o̩gbo̩gba, kʼi la mʼane̩-wñ gba bʼo̩ o̩wo̩ te̩ chaka, gbogbo wa Amo̩n le̩.
Todule̩ abo ku ma kpʼita kakini,
Todu una kwo He̩shbo̩n dufu,
Atogwo ñw uwe̩, Moab!
A la tʼo̩fa ñw ma, He̩shbo̩n lenyo̩ rane̩ gbogbo nyi Dibo̩n,
Abe̩le̩ Israe̩l kwogugu ane̩ abo Amo̩r.
Taku Mose̩s fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼatu ane̩ Jeza; taku ma mʼadogbe-wñ adogbe-wñ gba, oñ ma fʼabo Amo̩r ku ma jo̩ o̩mo̩ ne.
Taku ma murida le o̩na Beshan; oñ O̩g, onu Beshan, dufu wa akobʼuma, owñ kpai amone̩-wñ chaka, ku ma jogu E̩drei.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, E̩ ki railo-wñ n: todu omi mʼowñ du tef o̩wo̩-we̩ me̩, tʼamone̩-wñ chaka, tʼane̩-wñ; uwe̩ ki la chʼo alu kʼuwe̩ che Siho̩n, onu abo Amo̩r, ku ma dodo He̩shbo̩n le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼowñ kpa, kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai amone̩-wñ chaka, gbogbo tak e̩ne̩ du ma bo̩ ñw u ge̩ n: oñ ma mʼane̩-wñ gba.
Tak abo Israe̩l kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩, oñ ma lewa ru egbili Moab, ejudaba Jo̩rdan odede Je̩riko.
Bele̩k, o̩ma Zipo̩r, fʼe̩wñ du kʼIsrae̩l che abo Amo̩r li chaka.
Okpo la chi Moab ofe tod amone̩ le̩ todabu ku ma chʼewewe; o̩la abo Israe̩l la kʼuma o̩la.
Taku Moab ka ñw abogijo Midian kakini, Fai o̩wo̩ one̩-i afʼe̩wñ du ki lo wa daka-i na, alu kʼo̩kokuno̩ alʼegbe oko kpa. Oñ Bele̩k, o̩ma Zipo̩r kʼi la chʼonu Moab iko le̩,
fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Belam, onu Beo̩r, Peto̩r, kʼi dʼo̩l Ohimini, oj ane̩ amo̩ma abo-wñ, kʼi fʼu do̩ wa; i kakini, Go, amone̩ʼka kwʼIjipti wa-i; ane̩ la bo̩ ñwu ma n, oñ ma kwojo̩ akpejuru mi-i.

Todule̩, agba, e̩ lewa fai, kʼe̩ fʼama na ñw amone̩-i mi; todu ma gbiti tʼumi le; ikani naneke gwo ma da, kʼu ne ma bʼane̩-i te̩; todu u chema ka kʼe̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ kadua ñw u fʼe̩nyo̩ ne̩ me̩, oñ e̩ne̩ ku we̩ nama ñw u, ama fʼu mu me̩.
Abe̩le̩ abogijo Moab kpai abogijo Midian kwʼo̩mo̩ le, e̩wñ uro̩me̩ ifa ebo̩ le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-ma, ma lewa ugbo Belam, oñ ma fʼuche̩ Bele̩k je̩rʼu.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ru emi odu-i ta, tak u nadʼohi ñwu me̩ alu ki Jihofa ako̩la ñwu mi; abe̩le̩ amagboji Moab le̩ kwogugu ugbo Belam.
Tak O̩jo̩ lewa ugbo Belam, oñ i kakini, Aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼugbo-we̩-i chʼe̩ne̩?
Taku Belam ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, Bele̩k o̩ma Zipo̩r, onu Moab, kpʼone̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
Go, amone̩ ku ma kwʼ Ijipti wa-i, ane̩ bo̩ ñwu ma n; fai e̩ lewa kʼe̩ nama ñwu ma; ikani naneke kʼogu bʼuma kʼu nane ma dufu.
Tak O̩jo̩ ka ñwu Belam kakini, Uwe̩ ki le kpai ama n, uwe̩ ki la anama ñw amone̩-i n, todu u mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñwu ma me̩.
Taku Belam kwane̩ odudu oñ i ka ñw amagboji Bele̩k, kakini, Me̩ nyʼane̩-me̩; todu Jihofa ko̩ eje̩ ñwu mi le bʼume̩.
Tak amagboji Moab le̩ kwane̩, oñ ma nyʼugbo Bele̩k, ma ka ñw u kakini, Belam ko̩ ele bʼuwa wa.
Taku Bele̩k ño̩ fʼamagboji omune̩ kpe̩ ge̩, ma wewe tule, ma ño̩ nʼojima tʼabo ejodudu le.
Oñ ma lewa ugbo Belam, ma la ka ñw u kakini, Abu ku Bele̩k, o̩ma Zipo̩r, ka de̩, kakini; Agba, e̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩wñ du dʼe̩ hi ewʼugbo mi n;
todu nahi uwe̩ nyo̩gba tef ojima ki nana tabale, e̩wñ du kʼuwe̩ aka ñwu mi nache; todule̩ o̩ko̩ nagba bʼuwe̩-i, lewa ke, kʼe̩ fʼama na ñw amone̩-i ñwu mi.
Belam muda dohi ñw amadu Bele̩k kakini, Dagba Bele̩k mʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia e̩ko̩ unyi-wñ ko ñwu mi, u neke le gu o̩la Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi du, kʼu nache e-ki nya abe̩k e-ki tule n.
Fai, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼame̩, me̩ ki ño̩ jʼemi odu-i ge̩, kʼomi ki ma alu ku Jihofa ñʼako̩la ñwu mi tʼe̩-i le ge̩,
Tak O̩jo̩ lewa ugbo Belam odu oñ i ka ñw u kakini, I chʼule̩ edo̩ we̩ oñ aboke̩le̩ le̩ lewa-i mak e̩ kwane̩ kʼe̩ le̩ bʼuma; ama chai e̩wñ kʼu naka ñw e̩, e-le̩ uwe̩ ache.
Taku Belam kwane̩ odudu, i la mʼofidi ko nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ oñ i lebʼamagboji Moab le̩.
Uwe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ la mutajo todabu kʼi alo; tak onuche̩ Jihofa kwodago ej o̩na kʼi kobʼo̩. Belam tanʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ alo, abimo̩to̩-wñ meji la jʼugbo-wñ.
Tak o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ fʼonuche̩ Jihofa li abu kʼi fʼo̩kwo̩chageli wo̩ nʼo̩wo̩ dago ej o̩na; oñ o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ muna bʼej o̩na te̩, i le tef egbe; taku Be̩lam fʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ja, kʼi rida tʼej o̩na.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ lewa dago ugbo kʼo̩na chʼe̩kpama, kʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma jʼo̩wo̩ mejeji-wñ, kʼo̩do̩ dʼej emi kpai ej ano̩mo̩ ñw u.
Oñ o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ fʼonuche̩ Jihofa li, i la fʼo̩la-wñ kuru o̩do̩, oñ i fʼe̩re̩ Belam de mʼo̩do̩; abe̩le̩ i ño̩ fʼu ja ge̩.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa ño̩ le tʼo̩gba ge̩, oñ i kwodago ugbo ki che̩kpama, ugbo ki ma nʼuña kʼone̩ ana tʼawo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n.
Oñ o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ fʼonuche̩ Jihofa li, i la kwodachi, Belam dʼubi-wñ ta; tak uwe̩do̩ Belam mutajo, oñ i dʼo̩kpa gwo o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ.
Taku Jihofa mʼalu o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ chi, oñ o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ ka ñwu Belam kakini, Ab u chʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ gwo mi onu me̩ta-i?
Taku Belam ka ñw o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ kakini, Todabu m kʼe̩ che mi ibe̩te̩-i o̩kwo̩chageli ma dʼo̩wo̩-mi, u ma fʼe̩ kpa.
Tak o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ ka ñwu Belam kakini, I chʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-we̩ u che n? e-kʼe̩ te̩tatano ubi-wñ akwe̩gba ku ma bi we̩ gbogbo tʼeñini n? U te̩tachʼuwe̩ abe̩le̩? Tak i kakini, O̩da.
Taku Jihofa mʼeju Belam chi, oñ i fʼonuche̩ Jihofa li abu kʼi adago ej o̩na kʼo̩kwo̩chageli-wñ chʼe̩wo̩ nʼo̩wo̩-wñ; tak i dʼoji lo̩ oñ i fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ja o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-we̩ onu me̩ta le̩ ta? go, omi dufu wa-i kʼu kobʼuwe̩, tod o̩na-we̩ kʼe̩ le chʼagbo̩ni eju-mi;
o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ la fʼumi li, i muna bʼumi o̩gba te̩ onu me̩ta-i. I ma na rʼo̩wo̩ʼka o̩gba-mi le̩ n, omi ma fʼe̩ kpa fai me̩ ku la mʼowñ gba kʼi deju chuu.
Taku Belam ka ñw onuche̩ Jihofa kakini, U fʼadure ta; todu u ma kʼuwe̩ dago ej o̩na akobʼumi n. Todule̩, fai, iche̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju-we̩ mak u namudabi.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa ka ñwu Belam kakini, E̩ le bʼaboke̩le̩-i; ama chai o̩la kʼu naka ñw e̩, e-le̩ kate uwe̩ ki i ka. Abe̩le̩ Belam lebʼamagboji Bele̩k le.
Tak e̩gba ku Bele̩k gbo̩ ka ku Belam awa, i dufu kʼi ledʼo gbogbo wʼewo Moab, kʼi dʼalo̩me̩ Arno̩n, e-kʼi dʼotitala alo̩me̩ le̩.
Taku Bele̩k ka ñwu Belam kakini, Omi kpʼone̩ adʼe̩ wa una una n? E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma wʼugbo mi n? O̩wo̩-mi bo̩jo̩ kʼu nadʼuwe̩ nyʼo̩gba kʼe̩ nʼojima n?
Taku Belam ka ñwu Bele̩k kakini. Go, u lewa ugbo we̩ me̩! omi muda neke ko̩la duge̩? O̩la kʼO̩jo̩ du tef alu-mi, e-le̩ naka.
Taku Belam lebo̩ Bele̩k, oñ ma lewa Kiriat-huzot.
Taku Bele̩k kʼamokuno̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpa, oñ i fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Belam kpai amagboji ku ma jʼugbo-wñ.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, Belek la mu Belam du, oñ i mʼu du te̩gu nyʼugbo otete e-Beal ki gbo̩gba le̩; tak i fʼotitala ugbo kʼamone̩ le̩ te̩ kade li.
Oñ Belam ka ñw Bele̩k kakini, E̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ mebie ne ñw mi emi, kʼe̩ la fʼamo̩kokuno̩ mebie kpai amokolo mebie ñwo̩che jo̩ ñw mi emi.
Oñ Bele̩k che alu ku Belam ka le̩; taku Bele̩k kpai Belam mʼo̩kokuno̩ʼka kpai okoloʼka ko che iche̩bo̩ oji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ okoke lale.
Taku Belam ka ñw Bele̩k kakini, Kwodago ugbo iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-we̩ le̩, oñ nalo; ikani Jihofa awa de kpai omi; e̩wñ du kʼi adu ña mi naka ñw e̩. Tak i nyʼoj oteteʼka.
O̩jo̩ la de kpai Belam; oñ Belam ka ñw u kakini, U fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ ne me̩, oñ u mʼo̩kokuno̩ʼka kpai okoloʼka ko che iche̩bo̩ oji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ okoke lale.
Taku Jihofa dʼo̩laʼka tunyu Belam alu, oñ i kakini, Mudabi nyʼugbo Bele̩k, kʼe̩ fʼabe̩le̩ ka ñw u.
Tak i mudabi nyʼugbo-wñ, e̩ la go, owñ kpai amagboji Moab chaka la dago kpenyʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-wñ le̩,
tak i mʼita-wñ du tʼalu akpa kakini,
Abu nale kʼu nanʼama ñw e̩ne̩ kʼO̩jo̩ ma nʼama ñw u n?
Todu u dago oj okuta-i u cheliʼu, U dʼoji uwo uwo le̩ eju-mi la dʼo; go, amone̩ kʼama kate dodo kpai o̩la-ma ma che, ma la alo ma rʼef abo uche̩ichi n!
E̩ne̩ neke kaluka ebutu e-Jeko̩b?
Taku Bele̩k ka ñw Belam kakini, E̩wñ e̩ che mi-i ta? Omi dʼuwe̩ wa kʼe̩ nama ñw ame̩nebi-mi, e̩ la go, e̩ la chʼe̩wñ du tʼedʼe̩nye̩ ñw ma le n.
Tak i dohi kakini, I chʼo̩la ku Jihofa du tʼumi alu oñ nʼalebo̩ kʼu naka tila n?
Taku Bele̩k ka ñw u kakini, Agba, e̩ le bʼumi nyʼugbo omune̩, ugbo kʼuwe̩ ali ma; o̩mo̩ uwe̩ ali ukpoji-ma otitala kate, i chʼo̩chaka-ma uwe̩ ali n. Tak e̩ dʼano̩mo̩ anama ñw ma ñw mi.
Tak i mʼowñ du le tʼegbili Zofim, tʼoji Pisga, i la fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ mebie ne o̩mo̩, oñ i mʼo̩kokuno̩ʼka kpai okoloʼka ko che iche̩bo̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ okoke lale.
Tak i ka ñw Bele̩k kakini, Kwodago ugbo iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-we̩ emi, kʼu nade kpai owñ ano̩mo̩.
Taku Jihofa de kpai Belam, oñ i dʼo̩laʼka tunyʼu alu, oñ i kakini, Mudabi nyʼugbo Bele̩k, kʼe̩ fʼabe̩le̩ ka ñw u.
Oñ i lewa ugbo-wñ, e̩ la go, i dago ugbo iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-wñ, amagboji Moab la jʼugbo-wñ. Taku Bele̩k ka ñw u kakini, Abu Jihofa ka?
Tak i mʼita-wñ du tʼalu akpa, i kakini,
O̩jo̩ chʼone̩ ofo kʼowñ aremi n,
E̩wñ kʼu gba de̩, owñ chʼe̩nyo̩ edu; i la mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñw ma me̩, u la neke rʼo̩ ida n.
I li e̩wñ ibe̩te̩ efu Jeko̩b in;
O̩jo̩ ko ma kwʼIjipti dufu wa-i;
I la nʼe̩wñ eche ru Jeko̩b kʼi amʼu n,
Go, amone̩ le̩ akwane̩ dab ole idu!
Taku Bele̩k ka ñw Belam kakini, Abe̩k enama ñw ma, abe̩k ekadua ñw ma, e̩ ki che kilikili n.
Ama Belam dohi ñw Bele̩k kakini, Omi ka ñw e̩ kakini, E̩wñ du ku Jihofa ka, e-le̩ nache tila n?
Taku Bele̩k ka ñw Belam kakini, Lewa ta, oñ nadʼe̩ nyʼugbo omune̩; ikani i anyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju kʼuwe̩ ki nama ñw ma ñw mi o̩mo̩.
Taku Bele̩k mu Belam du le tʼoji uwo Peo̩r, e-kʼi bʼo̩do̩go̩ ne aje̩tachi le̩.
Taku Belam ka ñw Bele̩k kakini, E̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ mebie ne ñw mi emi, kʼe̩ fʼo̩kokuno̩ mebie kpai okolo mebie ñwo̩che ñw mi emi.
Taku Bele̩k che alu ku Belam ka le̩, oñ i mʼo̩kokuno̩ʼka kpai okoloʼka ko che iche̩bo̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ okoke lale.
Tak e̩gba ku Belam li ki nyo̩ Jihofa eju kʼi de̩nyo̩ ñw Israe̩l, i le kpai e̩wñ ifa-wñ alu kʼi te̩tale akwoubi n, i muda f ʼeju daru o̩wo̩ aje̩tachi.
Taku Belam chi eju-wñ nyʼate̩, oñ i li abu kʼIsrae̩l ru ru jo̩ o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma, tak Afu O̩jo̩ lewʼo̩la-wñ,
oñ i mʼita-wñ du nʼalu akpa kakini,
owñ kʼi agbʼo̩la kʼO̩jo̩ aka,
Gʼabu kʼunyabo-we̩ nyo̩, O Jeko̩b,
I chʼetalajo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩go̩ o̩go̩,
Omiofo acha kwef otube̩ otube̩-wñ,
O̩jo̩ ko ma kwʼIjipti wa-i;
I hi e̩do̩ mane̩, i kwodachi dab idu,
Tak uwe̩do̩ Bele̩k mutajo bu Belam ma, oñ i dʼo̩wo̩ fi o̩wo̩ kpakpakpa; oñ Bele̩k ka ñw Belam kakini, Omi do̩ uwe̩ wa kʼe̩ nama ñw ame̩nebi-mi, e̩ go, uwe̩ la kadua ñw ma onu me̩ta-i.
Todule̩ e̩ nara dabi tʼe̩gu-we̩ ke; u ka ku nadʼuwe̩ nyo̩gba tef ojima inaina; e̩ la go, Jihofa fʼuwe̩ fa ubi bʼojima le̩ te̩.
Taku Belam ka ñw Bele̩k kakini, Omi ño̩ ka ñw amonuche̩-we̩ kʼe̩ kpe̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
Dagba ku Bele̩k ki kʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia e̩ko̩ unyi-wñ ñw mi, u ma neke daba o̩la ku Jihofa nʼalu-wñ ka, kʼu nache e̩nyo̩ abe̩k e̩bie̩ne̩ kpai e̩do̩ e-mi n? E̩wñ ki Jihofa ka, i chʼe-le̩ naka n?
I la chʼifai, go nanyʼugbo abo-mi; lewa, kʼu nadu ne̩rʼuwe̩ eju alu kʼamone̩-i ache amone̩-we̩ o̩jo̩ otitala.
Tak i mʼita-wñ du tʼalu akpa kakini,
owñ kʼi agbʼo̩la kʼO̩jo̩ ka,
U cheli owñ, i muda chʼabajo̩-i n;
Tak abomune̩ ane̩ Ido̩m,
Oñ ene̩ʼka kʼi kwefu Jeko̩b anʼo̩da,
Tak i go Amale̩k, oñ i mʼita-wñ lu nʼalu akpa, kakini,
Tak i kejuru e̩ne̩ Ken le̩, oñ i mʼita-wñ du nʼalu akpa, kakini,
I chaka dabe̩le̩, e̩ne̩ Ken achihi rinyo̩.
Tak i mʼita-wñ du nʼalu akpa kakini,
O̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ muda akwo o̩lʼomi Kitim wa kʼi che Ashe̩r kpai Ebe̩r o̩bata;
Taku Belam kwane̩, i le owñ, i la mudabi tʼe̩gu-wñ; oñ Bele̩k ño̩ le e-wñ ge̩.
Oñ abo Israe̩l kwogugu Shitim; tak amone̩ le̩ chane̩ eche̩ño̩ya bʼabigbe̩le̩ Moab.
Ama le̩ fʼamone̩-i do̩ wʼoko iche̩bo̩ amo̩jo̩-ma, oñ amone̩-i kwoje̩, ma laño̩ te̩kpe̩ ñw amo̩jo̩-ma.
Abe̩le̩ Israe̩l dʼo̩la-wñ dama kpai Beal-peo̩r. Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼIsrae̩l ma;
oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Mʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amone̩-i chaka ko, kʼe̩ ko ma lo̩ko̩li jo̩ ñwu Jihofa eju olu-i, todu kʼuwe̩do̩ Jihofa ki chʼuna una-i ki rida bʼabo Israe̩l te̩.
Taku Mose̩s ka ñw amakajo̩ Israe̩l kakini, E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ kʼi fʼaboke̩le̩-wñ ku ma kʼo̩la-ma dama kpai Beal-peo̩r le̩ kpa.
E̩ la go, e̩ne̩ Israe̩lʼka lewa, oñ i mʼonobule̩ Midianʼka du wʼugbo amo̩maye-wñ eju Mose̩s, kpai eju abo o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka, abu ku ma jʼaraku alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju le̩.
Tak e̩gba ku Finehas, o̩ma E̩leaza, kʼi chʼo̩ma Aro̩n atama, fʼu li, i kwane̩ bʼef abo o̩gbadu le̩ te̩, oñ i la mʼo̩kwo̩ du nʼo̩wo̩,
