i tʼe̩ne̩ Israe̩l le̩ ubi tef unyi ejefu, oñ i dʼo̩kwo̩ ro gu ama meji du, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ Israe̩l le̩ kpai efu onobule̩ le̩ oñ i rʼo̩ legudu. Abe̩le̩ ma fʼatulubo̩ dahi bʼabo Israe̩l te̩.
Abo kʼatulubo̩ le̩ kpa muda chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogu nyoke me̩le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Finehas, o̩ma E̩leaza, kʼi chʼo̩ma Aro̩n atama le̩, owñ mʼuwe̩do̩-mi rida bʼabo Israe̩l te̩ me̩, owñ chʼabu kʼi nʼogu e-mi aja efu-ma le̩, todu e-le̩ oñ omi ma fʼabo Israe̩l lie̩ ef ogu-mi kʼu ja n.
Todule̩ uwe̩ kika kakini, Go, u mʼalo ure̩do̩-mi du ñw u me̩;
oñ i ado̩mo̩ ñw owñ kpai amugbe̩-wñ ubi owñ, owñ chʼalo uko̩lo̩ atama eche o̩gbegbele̩, todabu kʼi jogu tod O̩jo̩-wñ, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che tod abo Israe̩l.
Odu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Israe̩l ku ma kpa le̩, e-ku ma kpa manyʼonobule̩ Midian le̩, la ko̩ Zimri, o̩ma Salu, kʼi chʼidachi abo unyi e̩ne̩fe̩nyi abo Simeo̩nʼka.
Oñ odu onobule̩ Midian ku ma kpa le̩ ko̩ Kozbi, o̩ma Zur; ata-wñ la chʼoji abo unyi e̩ne̩fe̩nyiʼka Midian.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Chʼabo Midian le̩ ihianyi, kʼe̩ gwo̩ ma da;
todu ama nʼo̩gwo̩-ma che me̩ ihianyi, owñ chʼo̩gwo̩ ku ma gwo̩ me̩ ef o̩la Peo̩r le̩, kpai ef o̩la Kozbi, o̩ma idachi Midian, o̩maye-ma onobule̩ le̩, e-ku ma du kpa o̩jo̩ atulubo̩ le̩ tod o̩la Peo̩r.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼatulubo̩ le̩ takpa, Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai Eleaza o̩ma Aro̩n atama, kakini,
E̩ ki fʼaluka oji one̩ o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka ma, akwo o̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, e̩ kaluka ma unyi unyi amata-ma, owñ chʼo̩chaka abo Israe̩l ku ma bʼoko ogu enyi jo̩.
Taku Mose̩s kpai E̩leaza atama le̩ ko̩la ñwu ma egbili Moab o̩la Jo̩rdan odenideni Je̩riko, ma kakini,
E̩ne̩ du kʼo̩do̩-wñ jo̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s le̩. Abo Israe̩l ku ma ño̩ kwʼIjipti wa le̩ che:
Rube̩n, o̩mo̩gba Israe̩l; amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Rube̩n: e-Hano̩k, kʼi chʼabo akwo̩ra unyi abo Hano̩k; e-Palu, abo akwo̩ra unyi abo Palu;
e-He̩zro̩n, abo akwo̩ra unyi abo He̩zro̩n; e-Karmi, akwo̩ra unyi abo Karmi.
Abo le̩ chʼabo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Rube̩n; abo-ma ku ma kaluka chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩ta, kpai one̩ e̩te̩gwa chi kwef icham ge̩.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Palu che: E̩liab.

Oñ amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ E̩liab che: Nemue̩l kpai De̩tan kpai Abiram. Abo le̩ la che Detan kpai Abiram ku ma chi kwef abo o̩gbadu, ku ma kuja bo̩ Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n ef abumana Ko̩ra e̩gba ku ma kuja bo̩ Jihofa le̩,
tak ane̩pe̩te̩ mʼalu-wñ chi mʼuma ko mi manyu Ko̩ra, e̩gba kʼabumana le̩ leku, iko kʼuna fʼone̩ oli me̩lu lie̩ le̩; oñ ma mud e̩wñ uwawe.
Amo̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ko̩ra muda ku no.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Simeo̩n, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma che: e-Nemue̩l kʼi chʼabo akwo̩ra unyi abo Nemue̩l; e-Jamin, abo akwo̩ra unyi abo Jamin; e-Jachin, abo akwo̩ra unyi abo Jachin;
e-Ze̩ra, abo akwo̩ra unyi abo Zera; e-Sho̩l, abo akwo̩ra unyi abo Sho̩l;
abo le̩ chʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Simeo̩n, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke meji nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oji.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Gad akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma che: e-Zefon, akwo̩ra unyi abo Ze̩fon; e-Hagi, akwo̩ra unyi abo Hagi; e-Shuni, akwo̩ra unyi abo Shuni;
e-O̩zni akwo̩ra unyi abo O̩zni; e-E̩ri, akwo̩ra unyi abo E̩ri;
e-Aro̩d, akwo̩ra unyi abo Aro̩d; e-Areli, akwo̩ra unyi abo Areli.
Abo-i chʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Gad, alu ku ma kʼuma aluka, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyʼoli me̩gwa oji.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Juda che: E̩r kpai Onan; E̩r kpai Onan la leku ane̩ Kenan.
Oñ amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Juda akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma che: e-She̩la, akwo̩ra unyi abo She̩la; e-Pe̩re̩z, akwo̩ra unyi abo Pe̩re̩z; e-Ze̩ra, akwo̩ra unyi abo Zera.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Pe̩re̩z la che: e-He̩zro̩n, akwo̩ra unyi abo He̩zro̩n; e-Hamul, akwo̩ra unyi abo Hamul.
Abo-i chʼabo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Juda, alu ku ma kʼuma aluka le̩, ma che one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩fa, nyʼone̩ oli me̩gwa.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Isakar akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma che: e-Tola, akwo̩ra unyi abo Tola; e-Pufa, akwo̩ra unyi abo Puni;
e-Jashub, akwo̩ra unyi abo Jashub; e-Shimro̩n, akwo̩ra unyi abo Shimro̩n.
Abo-i chʼabo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi Isakar alu ku ma kʼuma aluka le̩, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩le̩ nyʼone̩ oli me̩fa.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Be̩njamin akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma che: e-Sere̩d, akwo̩ra unyi abo Sere̩d; e-Elo̩n, akwo̩ra unyi abo Elo̩n; e-Jalee̩l, akwo̩ra unyi abo Jalee̩l.
Abo-i chʼabo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Be̩njamin, alu ku ma kʼuma aluka le̩, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyʼoli me̩gwa.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Jose̩f akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma che: Manasa kpai Ifraim.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Manasa che: e-Makir, akwo̩ra unyi abo Makir; Makir la bi Gilead: e-Gilead, akwo̩ra unyi abo Gilead.
Abo-i chʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Gilead: e-Ieze̩r, akwo̩ra unyi abo Ieze̩r; e-Hele̩k, akwo̩ra unyi abo Hele̩k;
e-Asrie̩l la chʼakwora unyi abo Asrie̩l; e-She̩ke̩m, akwo̩ra unyi abo She̩ke̩m;
oñ e-Shemida, akwo̩ra unyi abo Shemida; oñ e-Hefe̩r akwo̩ra unyi abo Hefe̩r.
Ze̩lo̩fe̩had, o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Hefe̩r, la nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, chai amo̩ma onobule̩: odu amo̩ma Ze̩lo̩fe̩had la ko̩ Mala kpai Noa kpai Hogla kpai Milka kpai Tirza.
Abo-i chʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Manasa; oñ abo-ma ku ma kaluka chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko ooje nyoke meji nyʼone̩ ogu me̩lu chi icham.
Abo-i chʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-Ifraim akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma: e-Shutela, akwo̩ra unyi abo Shutela; e-Beche̩r, akwo̩ra unyi abo Beche̩r; e-Tahan, akwo̩ra unyi abo Tahan.
Abo-i la chʼumo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Shutela; e-Eran, akwo̩ra unyi abo Eran.

Abo-i la chʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ifraim alu ku ma kʼuma aluka le̩, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke meji nyʼoli me̩gwa oji. Abo-i chʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Jose̩f akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Be̩njamin akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma che: e-Bila, akwo̩ra unyi abo Bila; e-Ashbe̩l, akwo̩ra unyi abo Ashbe̩l; e-Ahiram, akwo̩ra unyi abo Ahiram;
e-Shufam, akwo̩ra unyi abo Shufam; e-Hufam, akwo̩ra unyi abo Hufam.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Bila la che: Ard kpai Neaman; e-Ard, akwo̩ra unyi abo Ard; e-Neaman akwo̩ra unyi abo Neaman.
Abo le̩ chʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Be̩njamin akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma; oñ abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu nyʼone̩ ulo̩gwa.
Abo-i chamo̩ma Dan akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma: e-Shuham, akwo̩ra unyi abo Shuham. Abo le̩ chʼabo Dan akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma.
Akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Shuham chaka, alu ku ma kʼuma aluka chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩le̩ nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ashe̩r akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma che: e-Imna, akwo̩ra unyi abo Imna; e-Ishfi, akwo̩ra unyi abo Ishfi; e-Be̩raya, akwo̩ra unyi abo Be̩raya.
E-amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Be̩raya che: e-Hebe̩r, akwo̩ra unyi abo Hebe̩r; e-Malkie̩l, akwo̩ra unyi abo Malkie̩l.
Odu o̩ma onobule̩ e-Ashe̩r la ko̩ Sera.
Abo le̩ chʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ashe̩r alu ku ma kʼuma aluka le̩, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko ooje nyoke me̩ta nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Naftali akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma che: e-Jazee̩l, akwo̩ra unyi abo Jazee̩l; e-Guni, akwo̩ra unyi abo Guni;
e-Jeze̩r, akwo̩ra unyi abo Jeze̩r; e-Shile̩m, akwo̩ra unyi abo Shile̩m.
Abo le̩ chʼabo Naftali akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma; oñ abo ku ma kaluka efu-ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu nyʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Abo Israe̩l ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ulo̩gwa nyoke ka nyʼone̩ e̩te̩gwa chi icham.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Abo-i oñ ma akpe̩ ane̩ le̩ ñwu ma kʼi chʼe̩wñ ogu-ma likpa aluka odu-ma.
Abo ki wewe tule uwe̩ adʼe̩wñ ogu ñwu ma tule, abo ki nya tule uwe̩ adʼe̩wñ ogu ki nya tule ñwu ma; ma akʼe̩wñ ogu ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ alu kʼabo-wñ ku ma kaluka de̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, anya ero̩ ma nʼakpe̩ ane̩ le̩; alu kʼodu o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu amata-ma de̩, alu le̩ ma aje̩ e̩wñ ogu le̩.
Alu kʼanya je̩, alu le̩ ma akpe̩ e̩wñ ogu-ma ñw abo ku ma wewe tule kpai abo ku ma nya tule.
Abo-i la chʼabo ku ma kaluka kwef abo Lifai akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma: e-Ge̩rsho̩n, akwo̩ra unyi abo Ge̩rsho̩n; e-Kohat, akwo̩ra unyi abo Kohat; e-Me̩rari, akwo̩ra unyi abo Me̩rari.
Abo-i chʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Lifai: akwo̩ra unyi abo Libni, akwo̩ra unyi abo He̩bro̩n, akwo̩ra unyi abo Mali, akwo̩ra unyi abo Mushi, akwo̩ra unyi abo Ko̩ra. Kohat la bi Amram.
Odu o̩ya Amram la ko̩ Jokebe̩d, o̩ma Lifai, ku ma bi ñwu Lifai ane̩ Ijipti; owñ la bi Aro̩n kpai Mose̩s kpai Miriam o̩maye-ma onobule̩ ñw Amram.
Oñ ma bi Nedab kpai Abaihiu kpai E̩le̩aza kpai Itamar ñw Aro̩n.
Taku Nedab kpai Abaihiu leku, e̩gba ku ma nʼuna e̩jaduña wa o̩gba Jihofa le̩.

Abo-ma ku ma kaluka chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩ta, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩-ma du akwo ochuʼka nyʼate̩to̩-gba-wñ: todu ma fʼuma kaluka tef abo Israe̩l in. Todabu ku ma ma kʼe̩wñ ogu ñwu ma je̩ ef abo Israe̩l le̩ n.
Abo le̩ chʼabo ku Mose̩s kpai E̩leaza, atama, kaluka, e̩gba ku ma fʼabo Israe̩l kaluka egbili Moab o̩la Jo̩rdan odenideni Je̩riko le̩.
Ama e̩ne̩ kate ku Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n, atama le̩, kaluka e̩gba ku ma fʼabo Israe̩l chaka kaluka aje̩tachi Sainai le̩ dʼefu-ma n.
Todu Jihofa fʼo̩la-ma ka kakini, Ama aku aje̩tachi-i chuu. E̩ne̩ke̩le̩-ma okate la bo̩ n, chai Kele̩b o̩ma Jefune, kpai Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun le̩.

Tak amo̩ma onobule̩ e-Ze̩lo̩fe̩had, kʼi chʼo̩ma He̩fe̩r, kʼi chʼo̩ma Gilead, kʼi chʼo̩ma Makir, kʼi chʼo̩ma Manasa, ku ma chʼabo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi Manasa o̩ma Jose̩f te̩wa; odu amo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ la ko̩: Mala kpai Noa kpai Hogla kpai Milka kpai Tirza.
Oñ ma kwodago o̩gba Mose̩s kpai o̩gba E̩leaza, atama kpai o̩gba amidachi, kpai abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju, ma kakini,
Ata-wa leku aje̩tachi, i la dʼef abumana ku ma kʼo̩la-ma jeju nyu Jihofa ef abumana Ko̩ra le̩ n, uku kʼi ku muda chʼutod adure e-wñ kʼi ta; i la nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du n.
E̩wñ chi kʼodu ata-wa alu bʼakwo̩ra unyi-wñ te̩, todabu kʼi ma nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n? E̩ fʼane̩ bu ñw a kʼa ne̩ ef amo̩maye ata-wa.
Taku Mose̩s mʼo̩la-ma duwʼo̩gba Jihofa.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Ochochi, oñ amo̩ma Ze̩lo̩fe̩had ka le̩; uwe̩ ki kʼe̩wñ ogu ñwu ma ku ma ne̩ ef amo̩maye ata-ma; uwe̩ ki la ache kʼama ki je̩ e̩wñ ogu ata-ma.
Tak uwe̩ aka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ma nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n leku, e̩gbale̩ ame̩ ache kʼo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ kʼi je̩ e̩wñ ogu-wñ.
I la che̩wñ kʼi ma nʼo̩ma onobule̩ n, e̩gbale̩ me̩ akʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ ñw amo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼi ma nʼo̩maye n, e̩gbale̩ ame̩ akʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ ñw amo̩maye ata-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩.

I la che̩wñ kʼata-wñ ma nʼo̩maye n, e̩gbale̩ ame̩ akʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ ñw efu-wñ o̩pio̩o̩ kʼi dʼef akwo̩ra unyi-wñ, tak e̩ne̩ le̩ ane̩; e-le̩ la achʼuhio̩me̩ kpai oj ajo̩ ku ma du te̩ ñw abo Israe̩l, alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Mute̩gu nyʼoj uwo Abarim-i, kʼe̩ go ane̩ kʼomi ko ñw abo Israe̩l.
Tak e̩gba kʼe̩ fʼu li, ma ñʼadu we̩ onugo nyʼugbo abo-we̩ ge̩, alu ku ma dʼAro̩n o̩maye-we̩ le̩;
todabu ku me̩ lañu rʼo̩la kʼu nʼalu-mi ka aje̩tachi Zin le̩, owñ chʼef uja abo̩gbadu le̩, kʼe̩ che kʼomi ki fo̩ eju-ma ugbo omiofo le̩. (E-le̩ la chʼomi Me̩riba e-Kede̩sh ef aje̩tachi Zin le̩.)
Taku Mose̩s ka ñwu Jihofa kakini,
Jihofa, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ amafu o̩re̩la du, kʼi nachi one̩ kʼabo o̩gbadu-i ki jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ,
kʼi atʼuma o̩gba alo, kʼi ñʼatʼuma o̩gba awa ge̩, kʼi ane̩ ma lo, kʼi ane̩ ma wa; todu kʼabo o̩gbadu Jihofa-i ki we edab ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma ma nʼadejute̩ ma n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Mu Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun du, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼAfu dʼefu-wñ le̩, kʼe̩ la dʼo̩wo̩-we̩ nʼo oji;
e̩ je̩ ñw u dago o̩gba E̩leaza atama, kpai o̩gba abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka, tak e̩ fʼuko̩ te̩ ñw u eju-ma.
Tak uwe̩ ki bʼojima e-we̩ nʼowñ oji, kʼabo o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l chaka ki gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩.
Tak i adago o̩gba E̩leaza atama, kʼi atene tod uwñ o̩gba Jihofa alu kʼUrim akpʼoji ajo̩: i ka, ma adufu, i ka, ma awa. Owñ che Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l chaka manyʼu, owñ chʼabo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka.
Taku Mose̩s che alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñw u; i mu Jo̩shua du, oñ i je̩ ñw u dago o̩gba E̩leaza atama kpai o̩gba abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka,
tak i mʼo̩wo̩ ko nʼo oji, oñ i fʼuko̩ te̩ ñw u alu ku Jihofa ka lefu Mose̩s le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ ki ñwa ñw abo Israe̩l kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-mi, owñ chʼuje̩wñ-mi ku ma duwa ñwu mi lugbo una, e̩wñ ki akpo ru mi le̩, me̩ fejutʼo̩ ku me̩ ko wa ñwu mi iko-wñ kpakpa.
Uwe̩ ki la ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ ki lʼugbo una ku me̩ aduwa ñwu Jihofa le̩ de̩: amo̩ma ala o̩mo̩do̩ʼka kʼi mufu meji eji o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa, ku ma chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
O̩malaʼka uwe̩ aduwa che odudu, o̩mala ekeji uwe̩ aduwa che e̩gba ane̩;
manyʼukpe̩gwa e̩fa omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ todu e̩wñ ele, e-le̩ ki kpe̩gwa nyʼukpe̩le̩ hin ekpo ku ma de̩ nyo̩nyo̩.
Iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ de̩, e-ku ma che oj uwo Sainai kʼi chʼe̩wñ ki akpo, owñ chʼe̩wñ eduwa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una.
Oñ iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ achʼukpe̩le̩ hinʼka tod o̩malaʼka; uwe̩ ki du o̩te̩ una wa da jʼane̩ ñwu Jihofa ef uña kiafo̩ le̩.
Tak uwe̩ ki dʼo̩mala ekeji wa che e̩gba ane̩; alu kʼe̩wñ ele e-odudu de̩, kpai alu kʼomi-wñ ku me̩ duwa de̩, alu le̩ uwe̩ adʼu wa kʼi chʼe̩wñ eduwa ki kpo ru Jihofa.
Oñ e-o̩jo̩ uñmi achʼo̩mala meji ku ma chʼo̩mo̩do̩ʼka ku ma mufu kpai ukpe̩gwa omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ meji kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu todu e̩wñ ele, manyʼomi-wñ:
e-le̩ chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-o̩jo̩ uñmi du, e-le̩ anoji iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ kpai omi-wñ le̩.
E̩gba uchane̩ ochu ochu-me̩ ame̩ adʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa ñwu Jihofa: amokuno̩ o̩ko̩ meji, kpai okoloʼka, kpai o̩mala mebie ku ma chʼo̩mʼo̩do̩ʼka, ku ma mufu;

manyʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu ukpe̩gwa me̩ta todu e̩wñ ele, e-le̩ achʼutodu o̩kokuno̩ le̩ okoke: kpai omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu ukpe̩gwa meji todu e̩wñ ele, e-le̩ chʼutodu okoloʼka le̩;
kpai omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu ukpe̩gwaʼka todu e̩wñ ele todu amo̩mala okoke le̩; kʼi chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ki akpo, owñ chʼe̩wñ eduwa lugbo una ñwu Jihofa.

Oñ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ achʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma ukpe̩reji hin oka todu o̩kokuno̩ʼka, ukpe̩ta hinʼka ki chʼutodu okoloʼka, e-o̩malaʼka kʼi chʼukpe̩re̩le̩ hin oka; e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ku ma akowa ochu ochu du gbogbo tak o̩do̩ da.
Ma la ñʼadʼo̩mobuko̩ʼka wa kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure ñwu Jihofa; e-le̩ amanyʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩, kpai iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu ejodudu chʼ Elaloji e-Jihofa.
Oñ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu le̩ chʼuje̩wñ uyo̩-wñ; ma aje̩ akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie.
O̩jo̩ ejodudu-wñ achʼujeju kiafo̩: me̩ ki chʼuko̩lo̩ akanya du o̩jo̩ le̩ n;
me̩ ki muda kʼe̩wñ wa lugbo una kʼi chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñwu Jihofa; owñ chʼamo̩ma okuno̩ o̩ko̩ meji kpai okoloʼka kpai amala mebie ku ma chʼo̩mʼo̩do̩ʼka; me̩ fejutʼo̩ ma ki mufu eju-me̩;
manyʼe̩wñ ele-ma, owñ chʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyu; ukpe̩gwa me̩ta me̩ aduwa todu o̩kokuno̩ʼka, ukpe̩gwa meji la chʼutodu okoloʼka;
uwe̩ ki dʼukpe̩gwaʼka wa todu o̩mala oka oka ef amala mebie le̩ chaka;
o̩mewoʼka la ñʼachʼutodu iche̩bo̩ adure, kʼi mud e̩wñ e̩boma todu me̩.
Ame̩ ki la kʼame̩wñ le̩ wa ojoji ñw e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-odudu le̩, kʼowñ ki chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩.
Alu le̩ me̩ ako wa o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie, uje̩wñ eduwa lugbo una, ki akpo ru Jihofa de̩; ma akʼe-le̩ wa che ojoji ñw iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ kpai omi-wñ.
O̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ, me̩ ñʼanʼujeju kiafo̩ ge̩; me̩ ki che uko̩lo̩ akanya du n.
O̩jo̩ e̩wñ ejo̩ga le̩ ge̩, e̩gba ku me̩ du e̩wñ ele etito̩ wa ñwu Jihofa ef uje̩wñ uyo̩-me̩ o̩jo̩ mebie o̩jo̩ mebie le̩, me̩ ki ño̩ nʼujeju kiafo̩ ge̩; ame̩ ki che uko̩lo̩ akanya du n,
me̩ muda akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa kʼi chʼe̩wñ ki akpo ru Jihofa: owñ chʼamo̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ meji kpai okoloʼka kpai amala mebie ku ma chʼo̩mʼo̩do̩ʼka;
kpai e̩wñ ele-ma ge̩, kʼi chʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu, ukpe̩gwa me̩ta ki chʼutodu o̩kokuno̩ʼka, ukpe̩gwa meji la chʼutodu okoloʼka,
ukpe̩gwa oko̩-ka chʼutodu o̩mala okʼoka ef amala mebie le̩;
manyʼo̩mobuko̩ʼka, kʼi chʼe̩wñ e̩boma todu me̩.
Me̩ ki kʼabʼe-le̩ wa manyʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ le̩, ma ki mufu eju-me̩, kpai omi-wñ ge̩.
Oñ o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu e̩kebie ame̩ ki nʼujeju kiafo̩; ame̩ ki che uko̩lo̩ akanya du n. O̩jo̩ le̩ chʼo̩jo̩ o̩kakachi efa taa ño̩ fa taa ñwu me̩,
ame̩ ki kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa ki akpo ru Jihofa: owñ chʼo̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka kpai okoloʼka kpai amala mebie ku ma chʼo̩mʼo̩do̩ʼka ku ma mufu;
kpai e̩wñ ele-ma kʼi chʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu, ukpe̩gwa-wñ me̩ta chʼutodu o̩kokuno̩ le̩, ukpe̩gwa-wñ meji la chʼutodu okolo le̩,
ukpe̩gwaʼka chʼutodu amo̩mala mebie le̩ okʼoka lale;
kpai o̩mobuko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure, ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ e̩boma todu me̩;

abʼe-le̩ amanyʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-ochu etito̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩, kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai omi omi-ma, likpa alu kʼoji ajo̩-wñ ku ma ka de̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ki akpo ku ma kowa lugbo una ñwu Jihofa.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa ochu e̩kebie le̩ ame̩ ki nʼujeju ki afo̩ ge̩, me̩ ki hi onugo o̩la-me̩ wane̩; ame̩ ki chʼuko̩lo̩ du n,
me̩ ki muda kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa ñwu Jihofa, kʼi akpo: owñ chʼo̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ʼka kpai okoloʼka kpai amala mebie ku ma chʼo̩mʼo̩do̩ʼka; ama ki mufu eju-me̩;
kpai e̩wñ ele-ma, kʼi chʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼe̩kpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu, ukpe̩gwa-wñ me̩ta chʼutodu o̩kokuno̩, ukpe̩gwa-wñ meji chʼutodu okoloʼka le̩,
ukpe̩gwaʼka chʼutodu o̩mala okʼoka ef amo̩mala mebie le̩:
i ño̩ nʼo̩mobuko̩ʼka todu iche̩bo̩ adure manyʼiche̩bo̩ adure e-e̩boma le̩ kpai iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai iche̩bo̩ omi-wñ okoke lale.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu e̩kebie ame̩ ñʼanʼujeju kiafo̩ ge̩; ame̩ ache uko̩lo̩ akanya du n, me̩ ki la de̩ uje̩wñ uyo̩ ñwu Jihofa gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie;

oñ me̩ anʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa, owñ chʼe̩wñ ku ma du wa lugbo una, e-ki akpo ru Jihofa, owñ chʼo̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩ta kpai o̩ko̩lo̩ meji kpai amala me̩gwe̩le̩ ku ma chʼo̩mo̩do̩ʼka; ama le̩ ki mufu;
kpai e̩wñ ele-ma, owñ chʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼekpo kpe̩gwa nyʼu, amo̩kokuno̩ me̩gwe̩ta le̩ okʼoka-ma anʼukpe̩gwa me̩ta e̩ta lale, amokolo meji le̩ anʼukpe̩gwa meji e̩ji,
ukpe̩gwaʼka la chʼutodu amo̩mala me̩gwe̩le̩ okʼoka lale;
kpai o̩mobuko̩ʼka tod iche̩bo̩ adure; abo e-le̩ amanyʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai omi-wñ.
Oñ e-o̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ chʼo̩mokuno̩ o̩ko̩ me̩gweji kpai okolo meji kpai amala me̩gwe̩le̩ ku ma chʼo̩mʼo̩do̩ʼka ku ma muifu,
kpai e̩wñ ele kpai omi-wñ tod amo̩kokuno̩ le̩; todu amokolo kpai todu amo̩mala le̩, chʼalu kʼuwewe-ma de̩, likpa alu kʼo̩j o̩la-wñ ku ma du te̩ de̩;
manyʼo̩mobuko̩ʼka tod iche̩bo̩ adure, abo e-le̩ achʼojoji ñw iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai omi-ma.
Oñ e-ojo e̩ke̩ta-wñ chʼo̩kokuno̩ me̩gwaka kpai okolo meji kpai amala me̩gwe̩le̩ ku ma chʼomʼo̩do̩ʼka ku ma mufu,
kpai e̩wñ ele kpai omi-wñ tod amo̩kokuno̩ le̩ kpai tod amokolo kpai tod amo̩mala le̩, alu kʼuwewe-ma de̩, likpa alu ku ma dʼoji o̩la-wñ te̩;
manyʼo̩mewoʼka tod iche̩bo̩ adure; abo e-le̩ achʼojoji ñw iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai omi-wñ.
Oñ e-o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩le̩-wñ chʼo̩kokuno̩ me̩gwa kpai okolo meji kpai amala me̩gwe̩le̩ ku ma chʼo̩mʼo̩do̩ʼka ku ma mufu,
kpai e̩wñ ele kpai omi-wñ tod amo̩kokuno̩ le̩ kpai tod amokolo kpai tod amo̩mala alu kʼuwewe-ma de̩, likpa alu ku ma dʼoji o̩la-wñ te̩;
manyʼo̩mobuko̩ʼka tod iche̩bo̩ adure, abo e-le̩ achʼojoji ñw iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai omi-wñ.
Oñ e-o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩lu-wñ chʼo̩kokuno̩ me̩lu kpai okolo meji kpai amala me̩gwe̩le̩ ku ma chʼo̩mʼo̩do̩ʼka ku ma mufu,
kpai e̩wñ ele kpai omi-wñ tod amo̩kokuno̩ kpai tod amokolo kpai tod amo̩mala le̩, alu kʼuwewe-ma de̩, likpa alu ku ma dʼoji o̩la-wñ te̩;
manyʼo̩mewoʼka tod iche̩bo̩ adure; abo e-le̩ achʼojoji ñw iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai omi-wñ.
Oñ e-o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩fa-wñ chʼo̩kokuno̩ me̩jo̩ kpai okolo meji kpai amala me̩gwe̩le̩ ku ma chʼomʼo̩do̩ʼka, ku ma mufu,
kpai e̩wñ ele kpai omi-wñ tod amo̩kokuno̩ kpai tod amokolo kpai tod amo̩mala le alu kʼuwewe-ma de̩, likpa alu ku ma dʼoji o̩la-wñ te̩;
manyʼo̩mewoʼka tod iche̩bo̩ adure; abo e-le̩ achʼojoji ñw iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai omi-wñ.
Oñ e-o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ chʼo̩kokuno̩ mebie kpai okolo meji kpai amala me̩gwe̩le̩ ku ma chʼo̩mʼo̩do̩ʼka ku ma mufu,
kpai e̩wñ ele kpai omi-wñ tod amo̩kokuno̩ le̩ kpai tod amokolo kpai tod amo̩mala le̩ alu kʼuwewe-ma de̩, likpa alu ku ma dʼoji o̩la-wñ te̩;
manyʼo̩mewoʼka tod iche̩bo̩ adure; abo e-le̩ achʼojoji ñw iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai omi-wñ.
Oñ e-o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ ame̩ anʼujeju eju e̩kpa; ame̩ ache uko̩lo̩ akanya du n,
me̩ muda dʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa, owñ chʼe̩wñ eduwa lugbo una, kʼi akpo ru Jihofa: o̩kokunoʼka kpai okoloʼka kpai amala mebie ku ma chʼo̩mʼo̩do̩ʼka ku ma mufu,
kpai e̩wñ ele kpai omi tod o̩kokuno̩ kpai tod okolo kpai tod amo̩mala le̩ alu kʼuwewe-ma de, likpa alu ku ma dʼoji o̩la-wñ te̩;
manyʼo̩mewoʼka tod iche̩bo̩ adure; abo e-le̩ achʼojoji ñw iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ kpai omi-wñ.

Abo e-ele̩ me̩ ako wa ñwu Jihofa iko uje̩wñ uyo̩-me̩ kʼiko-wñ chʼe̩da te̩-i, e-le̩ amanyʼoji ku me̩ da kpai e̩wñ ku me̩ gʼe̩do̩la-me̩ ko wa, tod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-me̩ kpai e̩wñ ele-me̩ kpai tod omi-me̩ kpai tod iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-me̩.
Taku Mose̩s mʼe̩wñ du du ka ñw abo Israe̩l teju alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s le̩.
Taku Mose̩s ka ñw abo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu ku ma dʼoji dufu ef abo Israe̩l kakini, E̩wñ ki Jihofa ñwa ñw a le̩ de̩.
E̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ fʼoji da ñwu Jihofa, abe̩k i fʼO̩jo̩ kpenʼo̩la-wñ onugo mak o̩la-wñ ñʼarida ge̩ n; i ache tikpa o̩la du ki kwef alu-wñ dufu le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ge̩, e̩gba kʼonobule̩ fʼoji da ñwu Jihofa, kʼi la fʼO̩jo̩ kpenʼo̩la-wñ onugo abu kʼi dʼunyi ata-wñ o̩jo̩ igbe̩le̩-wñ,
kʼata-wñ la gbo̩ oji kʼi da kpai o̩la kʼi ne̩ fʼO̩jo̩ kpenʼo̩la-wñ onugo le̩, kʼata-wñ ma kʼabu du ñw u n; mak e̩gbale̩ oji du kʼi da adago, o̩la du kʼi ne̩ kpʼO̩jo̩ nʼonugo o̩la-wñ adago ge̩.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼata-wñ gbo̩ kʼi bʼi eju kʼi ko̩ eñeñini kʼi gbo̩ le̩, mak oji du kʼi da, abe̩k o̩la du kʼi ne̩ kpʼO̩jo̩ nʼonugo o̩la-wñ adago n; Jihofa la ato̩no̩ ñw u, todabu kʼata-wñ ko̩.
1 la che̩wñ kʼi nʼo̩ko̩ abu kʼoji le̩ dʼo̩la-wñ abe̩k o̩la fʼo̩ alu, kʼi ne̩ e-le̩ kpʼO̩jo̩ nʼonugo o̩la-wñ,
kʼo̩ko̩-wñ gbo̩ kʼi ma kʼabu du ñw u eñeñini kʼi gbo̩ le̩ n; e̩gbale̩ oji kʼi da le̩ adago, oñ o̩la kʼi ne̩ kpʼO̩jo̩ nʼonugo o̩la-wñ adago ge̩.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼo̩ko̩-wñ ko̩ eñeñini kʼi gbo̩ le̩, kʼi la fʼoji kʼi da abe̩k o̩la kʼi fʼo̩ alu kpachi, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ kpʼO̩jo̩ nʼonugo o̩la-wñ le̩; taku Jihofa ato̩no̩ ñw u.
Ama oji kʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ abe̩k onobule̩ kʼi mudaru bʼo̩ko̩-wñ te̩ da, e-du kʼi ne̩ kpʼO̩jo̩ nʼonugo o̩la-wñ, e-le̩ adago ñw u.
I la che̩wñ kʼi dʼunyi o̩ko̩-wñ kʼi fʼoji da, abe̩k i nʼo̩la ki fʼO̩jo̩ kpe̩nʼonugo o̩la-wñ
kʼo̩ko̩-wñ la gbo̩, kʼi ma la kʼabu du ñw u, kʼi ma la ko̩ n, e̩gbale̩ oji du kʼi da le̩ adago, oñ o̩la du kʼi ne̩ kpʼO̩jo̩ nʼonugo o̩la-wñ le̩ adago.

I muda che̩wñ kʼo̩ko̩-wñ fʼu kpachi, kʼi la fʼo̩la le̩ kpalu eñeñini kʼi gbʼo̩, e̩gbale̩ e̩wñ du ki kwʼalu-wñ dufu ugbo oji kʼi da abe̩k ugbo o̩la kʼi ne̩ kpʼO̩jo̩ nʼonugo o̩la-wñ adago ge̩ n; o̩ko̩-wñ fʼu kpachi me̩, Jihofa la ato̩no̩ ñw u.
Oji du kʼi da, kpai o̩la du kʼi kpʼO̩jo̩ nʼonugo o̩la-wñ kʼi fʼu dema te̩, o̩ko̩-wñ neke fʼu lonyane̩, o̩ko̩-wñ la neke kpachi.

I muda che̩wñ kʼo̩ko̩-wñ ma kʼabu du ñw u kʼo̩jo̩ ñwa o̩jo̩ adu n, mak owñ le̩ fʼoji du kʼi da, abe̩k o̩la du kʼi ne̩ kpʼO̩jo̩ nʼo̩la-wñ lonyane̩; abu kʼi ma kʼabu du ñw u e̩ñeñini kʼi gbo̩ le̩ n, mak i fʼu lonyane̩.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼi gbʼo̩ kʼi fʼu kpachi, kʼi la fʼo̩la le̩ kpalu, e̩gbale̩ owñ ane̩ udu onobule̩-wñ.
Abo e-le̩ chʼuhio̩me̩ uhio̩me̩ e-ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s, alu ki de̩ agbagba one̩ kpai o̩ya-wñ, kpai agbagba ata kpai o̩ma-wñ onobule̩ iko igbe̩le̩-wñ kʼi dʼunyi ata-wñ ta.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Kobʼabo Midian kʼe̩ fʼache̩ abo Israe̩l na; ubile̩ taku ma adʼuwe̩ tef abo-we̩.
Taku Mose̩s ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ chi aboke̩le̩ efu-me̩ ku me̩ fʼuma o̩la ji tod o̩gu, kʼama ki nyʼakobʼabo Midian, ku ma fʼache̩ Jihofa na ugbo abo Midian.
One̩ abo Israe̩l kʼuwe̩ ako nyʼoko ogu le̩ o̩lo̩pu du anʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma chi one̩ kwef abo Israe̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, o̩lo̩pu-ma okoke nʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko me̩gweji ku ma fʼo̩logu ji le̩.

Mose̩s fʼuma kpuche̩ nyʼoko ogu le̩, ama chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kwef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu okoke du, manyu Finehas, o̩ma E̩leaza atama, oñ e̩wñ eku uña kiafo̩ kpai opike ku ma afa taa jʼo̩wo̩-wñ.
Ma la kʼogu bo̩ abo Midian alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s, oñ ma fʼaboke̩le̩-ma du kpa.
Ma ño̩ fʼamonu Midian kpa manyʼabo-ma ki bo̩ ku ma kpa le̩; owñ chʼEfi kpai Re̩ke̩m kpai Zur kpai He̩r kpai Re̩ba, amonu Midian me̩lu le̩; ma ño̩ ne̩ o̩kwo̩chageli kpa Belam o̩ma Beo̩r ge̩.
Oñ abo Israe̩l fʼabobule̩ Midian kpai amo̩ma-ma egini mu lelo; ma mʼame̩la-ma abe̩re̩me̩le̩ chaka kpai e̩wñ ukpa-ma chaka kpai ane̩-ma chaka ko chʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩.
Ma la nʼuna fʼewo ewo-ma du ugbo du ku ma dodo kpai uru-ma du gujo rinyo̩.
Oñ ma mʼane̩ kʼogu le̩ je̩ chaka ko chʼe̩wñ aluje̩, tʼe-one̩, tʼe-e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩.
Taku ma kʼame̩namu le̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼogu je̩ kpai e̩wñ aluje̩ wʼugbo Mose̩s kpai ugbo E̩leaza atama kpai ugbo o̩gbadu abo Israe̩l, uru ki jʼegbili Moab o̩la Jo̩rdan odenideni Je̩riko le̩.
Taku Mose̩s kpai E̩leaza atama kpai amidachi abo o̩gbadu le̩, ledufu aledo ma ejo̩do̩da uru le̩.
Taku Mose̩s we̩do̩ rʼabo kʼabogu le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-ma, owñ chʼamagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpai amagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ku ma kwʼoko ogu le̩ wa.
Oñ Mose̩s ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ fʼabobule̩ chaka jadu ku ma deju?
Go, i chʼabo-i je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dʼe̩re̩ tinyo̩ bi Jihofa te̩ ugbo o̩la Peo̩r alu ku Belam ko̩ ma le̩ n? Abe̩le̩ tak atulubo̩ le̩ lewa abʼabo o̩gbadu Jihofa-i ma.
Todule̩ fai, me̩ ki fʼo̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ku ma jʼef abo egini-i kpa, me̩ ki ño̩ fʼabobule̩ du ku ma ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ lugbo ebʼo̩ dachi kpa.
Ama abimo̩to̩ abobule̩ du ku ma ma ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ lugbo ebʼo̩ dachi n, me̩ fʼuma de ku ma deju ñwu me̩.

Me̩ ki ru ejo̩do̩da uru-i o̩jo̩ mebie; e̩ne̩ du kʼi fʼone̩ kpa, kpai e̩ne̩ du kʼi do̩wo̩kado e̩ne̩ ku ma kpa, me̩ ki fʼo̩la-me̩ kpai ame̩namu-me̩ gwo rinyo̩ bʼadure te̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ kpai o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ.
Me̩ ki fʼe̩wñ o̩la du kpai e̩wñ du ku ma nʼaño̩ che kpai e̩wñ du ku ma nʼedudu ewo che kpai e̩wñ du ku ma nʼoli che gwo rinyo̩.
Tak E̩leaza atama ka ñw abogu ku ma nyʼoko ogu le̩ kakini, E̩wñ ki chʼuhio̩me̩ uko̩-o̩la e-ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s le̩ de̩:
chai o̩jamalia kpai ajifa kpai ebijeikpa kpai ebije kpai ebije tin kpai o̩de̩le̩ma,
owñ chʼe̩wñ du kʼuna ma jo n, me̩ ki du le gu ef una du, tak i afe̩; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma ñʼagwo rinyo̩ ef omi e̩wñ e̩daji le̩; e̩wñ du ki ma la bʼuna jo n, me̩ ki du le gu ef omi le̩ du.
Me̩ ki gwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la-me̩ o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ, tak ame̩ afe̩; ubi le̩ taku me̩ agudu wʼef uru-i.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Fʼuwewe e̩wñ kʼogu le̩ je̩ kaluka, tʼone̩, tʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, uwe̩ kpai E̩leaza atama kpai e̩ne̩ ki dʼoji dufu unyi unyi amata abo o̩gbadu-i ki kaluka;
taku me̩ ki fʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩ le̩ kpe̩ meji, ojiʼka chʼe-abogu ku ma nyʼoko ogu le̩, ojiʼka chʼe-abo o̩gbadu-i chaka.
Taku me̩ bu ñw abogu ku ma nyʼoko ogu le̩ alu ku ma ate̩re̩ ñwu Jihofa; alu kʼare̩-wñ ade̩ de̩, tʼe-one̩, tʼe-okuno̩, tʼe-oke̩ke̩te̩, tʼe-ame̩wño̩re̩ egini, ma chʼoli me̩gwa mak okʼoka ma achi;
e mugba kwef ukpe̩ e-ma kʼe̩ la ko ñw E̩leaza atama, kʼi chʼe̩wñ eko nyʼate̩ ñwu Jihofa.

I la chʼe-ukpe̩ abo Israe̩l le̩, e̩ ki chi okʼoka kwef ooje ooje, tʼe-one̩, tʼe-okuno, tʼe-o̩ke̩ke̩te̩, tʼe-ame̩wño̩re̩ egini, tʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ chaka kʼe̩ la mʼu ko ñw abo Lifai, kʼama nʼide unyi ugugu Jihofa ade le̩.
Taku Mose̩s kpai E̩leaza atama che alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Oñ e̩wñ aluje̩ ki bo̩ ef ane̩ kʼabogu le̩ ko, chʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ulo̩gwa nyʼe̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩lu,
amokuno̩-wñ la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo e̩te̩gwa nyoke meji.
Amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyokeʼka,
one̩-wñ du la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogue̩gwa nyoke meji, owñ chʼabobule̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ lugbo ebʼo̩ dachi n.
Oñ ukpe̩reji-wñ kʼi chʼukpe̩ e-abo ku ma nyʼoko ogu le̩, aluka ame̩wño̩re̩ egini chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo oli me̩fa nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke mebie nyʼoli me̩gwa oji;
are̩ Jihofa ef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini chʼulo̩gwa nyʼe̩te̩gwa nyʼoke me̩lu.
Amokuno̩ la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩fa; kwef e-le̩ e̩wñ are̩ Jihofa chʼe̩te̩gwa nyoke meji,
amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa nyʼoli me̩gwa oji; kwef e-le̩ e̩wñ are̩ Jihofa chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyokeʼka.
One̩-ma la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩fa, kwef abo le̩ are̩ Jihofa chʼone̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke meji.
Taku Mose̩s mʼe̩wñ are̩ le̩ ko, owñ chʼe-eko nyʼate̩ ñwu Jihofa, oñ i ko ñw E̩leaza atama, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Oñ kwef ukpe̩reji e-abo Israe̩l e-ku Mose̩s fʼe-ma kpai e-abo ku ma nyʼoko ogu le̩ kpe̩ru ojoji—
ukpe̩ e-abo o̩gbadu le̩ chʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oli me̩fa nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke mebie nyʼoli me̩gwa oji,
kpai amokuno̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩fa,
kpai amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa nyʼoli me̩gwa oji,
kpai one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩fa—

oñ ef ukpe̩ e-abo Israe̩l, Mose̩s, la mʼoka chi kwef ooje ooje-wñ okʼoka lale, tʼe-one̩, i tʼe-e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, oñ i mʼu ko ñw abo Lifai ku ma nʼide unyi ugugu Jihofa ade̩; alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s le̩.
Oñ abo kʼabogu icham, icham wewe le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-ma, owñ chʼamagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, kpai amagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu, te̩wʼugbo Mose̩s,
oñ ma ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Amadu-we̩-i fʼabogu ku ma jʼef o̩wo̩-wa kaluka, e̩ne̩ʼkate efu-wa chi n.

A la mʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-Jihofa ko wa me̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ li, owñ chʼe̩wñ ijaga o̩jamalia kpai iyagba e̩re̩ kpai ude̩ o̩wo̩ kpai elika kpai ako̩ eti kpai ako̩ o̩fa kʼawa ane̩ che e̩wñ e̩boma tod onugo-wa o̩gba Jihofa.
Taku Mose̩s kpai E̩leaza atama mʼo̩jamalia le̩ gba bʼo̩wo̩-ma te̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ ijaga ku ma gwu le̩ chaka.

Oñ o̩jamalia chaka ku ma kowa ako nyʼate̩ ñwu Jihofa le̩ ku ma gba ef o̩wo̩ amagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ chaka, kpai ef o̩wo̩ amagboji ogume̩lu ogume̩lu che she̩ke̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩fa nyʼo̩oje chi icham.
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ef abogu le̩ la ñʼane̩ ñw o̩la-wñ.

Taku Mose̩s kpai E̩leaza atama le̩ mʼo̩jamalia gba o̩wo̩ amagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpai ogume̩lu ogume̩lu, oñ ma mʼu ko wʼef unyabo ujeju le̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ urewa tod abo Israe̩l o̩gba Jihofa.
Abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad la nʼame̩wñukpa wewe tabale; oñ ma fʼane̩ Jeza kpai ane̩ Gilead li, e̩ go, ugbo le̩ chʼugbo ki nyo̩ ñw ame̩wñukpa.
Oñ amo̩ma Gad kpai amo̩ma Rube̩n lewa ka ñwu Mose̩s kpai E̩leaza atama kpai amidachi abo o̩gbadu le̩ kakini,
Atarot kpai Dibo̩n kpai Jeza kpai Nimra kpai He̩shbo̩n kpai Eleale kpai Sebam kpai Nebo kpai Beon,
owñ chʼane̩ ku Jihofa gwoda rʼo̩gba abo o̩gbadu Israe̩l le̩, o̩mo̩ chʼane̩ ki nyo̩ ñw ame̩wñukpa, amadu-we̩-i la chenʼame̩wñukpa.
Oñ ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ li wa eju, je̩ ñwu ma dʼane̩-i ñw amadu-we̩-i kʼa ne̩; e̩ ki ko wa wʼudaba Jo̩rdan-i n.
Ama Mose̩s ka ñw abo Gad kpai abo Rube̩n kakini, Amo̩maye-me̩ anyʼoko ogu, kʼame̩ ki gugu emi-i?
E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ la akpa abo Israe̩l e̩do̩ bie̩ ku ma we edaba nyʼoj ane̩ ku Jihofa ko ñwu ma le̩?
Abe̩le̩ amata-me̩ che e̩gba kʼu kpʼuma uche̩ akwo Kede̩sh-barne̩a ku ma nyʼago ane̩-i.
Todu e̩gba ku ma nyʼef o̩go̩ E̩shko̩l, ku ma fʼane̩ le̩ li, ma fʼabo Israe̩l e̩do̩ kpabie̩, kʼama ki we enyʼoj ane̩ ki Jihofa ko̩ ñwu ma.
Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo o̩jo̩ le̩, oñ i go̩ kakini,
Ochochi, eju aboke̩le̩ du ku ma kwʼ Ijipti dufu wa-i, kʼo̩do̩-ma chʼogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ ado ane̩ kʼomi go̩ ñw Ebraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Jeko̩b in, todabu ku ma ma tʼumi ubi ogbolo n;
e̩ne̩ du ale n chai Kele̩b o̩ma Jefune e̩ne̩ Kiniz le̩ kpai Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun, todu ama le̩ ti Jihofa ubi ogbolo.
Oñ uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo abʼIsrae̩l ma, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma chʼila jʼef aje̩tachi ale o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, gbogbo tak abo o̩gba ki fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ che eju Jihofa chaka lie̩ rinyo̩.
Me̩ la go, ame̩ kwane̩ koji amata-me̩ le̩, ato̩ ame̩nadure me̩ che, kʼuwe̩do̩ inaina e-Jihofa le̩ ki ño̩ buto̩ nyo̩gba abʼIsrae̩l ma!
Todu iche̩wñ kʼame̩ murida bʼo̩ ubi te̩, i ñʼatʼuma no̩ jʼef aje̩tachi-i ge̩; oñ ame̩ akpʼamone̩-i chaka bie̩ rinyo̩.
Taku ma te̩wʼugbo-wñ, oñ ma kakini, A afʼo̩gba ame̩wño̩re̩ egini bu ugbo kʼame̩wñukpa-wa ajʼefu-wñ emi, oñ a akʼunyi tod amo̩ma-wa egini,
awa onugo muda amʼo̩la ogu kʼa tʼabo Israe̩l o̩gba, gbogbo tak a ko ma wʼugbo e-ma ku ma ajo̩; oñ amo̩ma-wa egini la ajʼef ewo ki nʼaku-i tod abo ane̩ emi.
A adabi wʼunyi-wa gbogbo tak abo Israe̩l okoke ki gbʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ n.
Todu a aje̩ e̩wñ oguk pai ma ejudaba Jo̩rdan kpai ejʼano̩mo̩ ano̩mo̩-wñ n; todabu kʼe̩wñ ogu-wa ko tʼuwa o̩wo̩ ejemi ñwu Jordan o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ-i.
Taku Mose̩s ka ñwu ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ ache e-le̩, iche̩wñ kʼame̩ ajʼo̩logu ku me̩ tu Jihofa Ogba nyʼoko ogu le̩,
kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du efu-me̩ kʼi nʼebije ogu adaba o̩gba Jihofa, gbogbo tak i fʼame̩nebi-wñ ne dufu bʼeju-wñ te̩,
ku ma fʼane̩ le̩ dolo te̩ o̩gba Jihofa; ubile̩ tak ame̩ adabi, kʼame̩ ma ñʼanʼudu ugbo Jihofa kpai ugbo abo Israe̩l-i ge̩ n, tak ane̩-i achʼe-me̩ ku me̩ ne̩ eju Jihofa.
I muda che̩wñ kʼame̩ ma che abe̩le̩ n, go, Jihofa oñ ame̩ adure le̩; adure-me̩ la adʼofe-me̩ dufu chuu.
Fʼewo ko̩ ñw amo̩ma-me̩ egini, me̩ fʼo̩gba bu nyʼame̩wño̩re̩-me̩ egini; me̩ ki la che alu ku me̩ ka le̩.
Tak amo̩ma Gad kpai amo̩ma Rube̩n ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Amadu-we̩-i ache alu kʼodu-mi ñwa ñwu ma.
Amo̩ma-wa egini kpai amo̩ya-wa kpai ame̩wñ-ukpa-wa kpai ame̩la-wa abe̩re̩me̩le̩ chaka ajʼef ewo ewo Gilead le̩;
amadu-we̩-i muda adaba eiu Jihofa anyʼoko ogu, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ du kʼe̩wñ ebije ogu jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ, alu kʼodu-mi ka le̩.
Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s mʼo̩la-ma du tʼef o̩wo̩ E̩leaza, atama kpai Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun, kpai abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef unyi unyi amata o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l.

Taku Mose̩s ka ñwu ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼamo̩ma Gad kpai amo̩ma Rube̩n kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma fʼo̩logu ji eju Jihofa adaba Jordan kpʼame̩, ku ma la fʼane̩ le̩ dolo te̩ o̩gba-me̩; mak e̩gba le̩ me̩ akʼane̩ Gilead ñwu ma ku ma ne̩;
i muda che̩wñ kʼama ma je̩ ajʼo̩logu adaba kpai ame̩ n, mak ama ane̩ e̩wñ kpʼame̩ oj ane̩ Kenan.
Tak amo̩ma Gad kpai amo̩ma Rube̩n dohi kakini, Alu ki Jihofa ka ñw amadu-we̩-i, alu le̩ a ache.
A afʼo̩la ogu ji kʼa daba Jo̩rdan nyʼoj ane̩ Kenan eju Jihofa, oñ e̩wñ ogu-wa kʼa ane̩ ajʼugbo-wa ejemi Jo̩rdan-i.

Taku Mose̩s mʼu ko ñwu ma, owñ chʼamo̩ma Gad kpai amo̩ma Rube̩n kpai ukpe̩reji abo o̩lonu Manasa, o̩ma Jose̩f le̩, oj ane̩ Sihon, onu abo Amo̩r, kpai ojane̩ O̩g, onu Beshan, owñ chʼane̩ le̩ kpai ewo ewo ane̩ le̩ gbogbo wa kad alo̩me̩-wñ, owñ chʼewo ewo ane̩ ki lʼuma daka le̩.
Tak amo̩ma Gad fu Dibo̩n kpai Ataro̩t kpai Aroe̩r
kpai Atrot-shofan kpai Jeza kpai Jo̩gbeha
kpai Be̩t-nimra kpai Be̩t-haran ne, ewo ewo ki nʼaku i che, i la nʼo̩gba ku ma bu tod ame̩wño̩re̩ egini.
Tak amo̩ma Rube̩n fu He̩shbo̩n kpai Eleale kpai Kiria-taim
kpai Nebo kpai Beal-meo̩n, (ma la fʼodu ewo ewo le̩ rida), kpai Sibna ne; taku ma kʼodu ojoji ñw ewo ewo ku ma ne le.
Tak amo̩ma Makir o̩ma Manasa nyi Gilead, oñ ma fʼu du, ma la fʼabo Amo̩r ki jʼefu-wñ ne bʼo̩ te̩.
Mose̩s la du Gilead ñwu Makir o̩ma Manasa; oñ i fʼodo do o̩mo̩.
Taku Jair, o̩ma Manasa, le namʼadogbe ado̩gbe-ma gba, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Hafo̩t-jair.
Taku No̩ba le namu Kenat kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ gba, oñ i dʼodu-wñ rʼodu onugo o̩la e-wñ ko̩ Noba.
Ule̩ o̩jo̩ʼka o̩jo̩ʼka kʼabo Israe̩l ku ma jʼef o̩wo̩ Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n ku ma kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu udala udala le de̩.
Mose̩s la fʼodu ugbo ku ma kwane̩ ule̩-ma okoke ko̩ nyʼo̩takada aro̩ne aro̩ne alu ki Jihofa dʼalu ñw u; ule̩ okoke ku ma le abu ku ma dufu wa-i de̩.
Ma mʼane̩-ma ño̩ kwo Rame̩se̩s o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu ejodudu; o̩jo̩ñwa Elaloji le̩ abo Israe̩l nʼo̩wo̩ ki dago ale dufu eju abo Ijipti le̩ chaka
abu kʼabo Ijipti jʼo̩mo̩ akʼamomo̩gba-ma ji, owñ chʼabo-ma ku Jihofa gwo da jane̩ efu-ma le̩; Jihofa bʼudu ñw amo̩jo̩-ma alu kʼoji ajo̩-wñ de̩.
Abe̩le̩ oñ abo Israe̩l kwo Rame̩se̩s oñ ma lewa ru Suko̩t.
Taku ma kwo Suko̩t oñ ma lewa ru Etam, kʼi dʼo̩la aje̩tachi le̩.
Taku ma kwo Etam oñ ma mudabi wʼubi wa Pi-hahiro̩t, kʼi de̩ o̩gba Beal-zefo̩n; oñ ma lewa ru o̩gba Migdol.
Taku ma kwo o̩gba Hahiro̩t le̩ oñ ma lale gu alumeji ohimini du nyʼaje̩tachi; ma ño̩ lʼule̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta ef aje̩tachi Etam oñ ma lewa ru Mara.
Taku ma kwo Mara oñ ma lewa Elim; e̩bi omi me̩gweji kpai oli e̩t-e̩gwa ki biu e̩kpe̩ jʼElim le̩; oñ ma ru o̩mo̩.
Taku ma kwo Elim oñ ma lewa ru o̩la Ohimini Ekpikpa.
Taku ma kwo Ohimini Ekpikpa le̩ oñ ma lewa ru aje̩tachi Sin.
Taku ma kwo aje̩tachi Sin oñ ma lewa ru Dofka.
Taku ma kwo Dofka oñ ma lewa ru Alush.
Taku ma kwo Alush oñ ma lewa ru Refidim, ugbo kʼomiofo ma de̩ kʼamone̩ añmo̩ n.
Taku ma kwo Refidim oñ ma lewa ru aje̩tachi Sainai.
Taku ma kwo aje̩tachi Sainai oñ ma lewa ru Kibro̩t-hatafa.
Taku ma kwo Kibro̩t-hatafa oñ ma lewa ru Haze̩ro̩t.
Taku ma kwo Haze̩ro̩t oñ ma lewa ru Ritma.
Taku ma kwo Ritma oñ ma lewa ru Rimo̩n-pe̩re̩z.
Taku ma kwo Rimo̩n-pe̩re̩z oñ ma lewa ru Libna.
Taku ma kwo Libna oñ ma lewa ru Risa.
Taku ma kwo Risa oñ ma lewa ru Kehelata.
Taku ma kwo Kehelata oñ ma lewa ru e̩re̩ uwo Shefer.
Taku ma kwo uwo Shefe̩r oñ ma lewa ru Harada.
Taku ma kwo Harada oñ ma lewa ru Mak-helo̩t.
Taku ma kwo Mak-helo̩t oñ ma lewa ru Tahat.
Taku ma kwo Tahat oñ ma lewa ru Tera.
Taku ma kwo Tera oñ ma lewa ru Mitka.
Taku ma kwo Mitka oñ ma lewa ru Hashmona.
Taku ma kwo Hashmona oñ ma lewa ru Mose̩ro̩t.
Taku ma kwo Moso̩ro̩t oñ ma lewa ru Bene-jakan.
Taku ma kwo Bene-jakan oñ ma lewa ru Ho̩r-haggid-gad.
Taku ma kwo Ho̩r-haggid-gad oñ ma lewa ru Jotbata.
Taku ma kwo Jotbata oñ ma lewa ru Abrona.
Taku ma kwo Abrona oñ ma lewa ru E̩zionge̩ba.
Taku ma kwo E̩zionge̩ba oñ ma lewa ru aje̩tachi Zin (owñ che Kede̩sh).
Taku ma kwo Kede̩sh oñ ma lewa ru e̩re̩ uwo Ho̩r, kʼi dʼalo̩me̩ ane̩ Ido̩m le̩.
Tak Aro̩n atama mute̩gu tʼoj uwo Ho̩r alu ku Jihofa dʼalu ñw u, oñ i leku o̩mo̩, o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji kʼabo Israe̩l kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu; i leku o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu e̩ke̩lu o̩do̩ le̩.
O̩do̩ Aro̩n le̩ che o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩ta e̩gba kʼi leku oj uwo Ho̩r le̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ Kenan, kʼi chʼonu Arad, kʼi dodo o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ ane̩ Kenan le̩, gbʼinabali e̩wa abo Israe̩l.
Taku ma kwo uwo Ho̩r oñ ma lewa ru Zalmona.
Taku ma kwo Zalmona oñ ma lewa ru Punon.
Taku ma kwo Punon oñ ma lewa ru Obot.
Taku ma kwo Obot oñ ma lewa ru Iye-abarim, oj ane̩ Moab.
Taku ma kwo Iyim oñ ma lewa ru Dibo̩n-gad.
Taku ma kwo Dibo̩n-gad oñ ma lewa ru Almo̩n-diblataim.
Taku ma kwo Almo̩n-diblataim oñ ma lewa ru ane̩ uwo Abanin, o̩gba Nebo le̩.
Taku ma kwo ane̩ uwo Abarim, oñ ma lewa ru egbili Moab o̩la Jo̩rdan odenideni Je̩riko le̩;
ma ru jo̩ o̩la Jo̩rdan le̩ kwo Be̩t-je̩shi-mot gbogbo wa Ebe̩l-shitim kʼi dʼegbili Moab le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s egbili Moab o̩la Jo̩rdan odenideni Je̩riko le̩ kakini,
E̩ naka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ mu Jo̩rdan-i daba nyʼoj ane̩ Kenan,

tak ame̩ ki nʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩ o̩mo̩ bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩, ku me̩ la fʼokuta-ma ku ma kina nyʼu kpo̩fo̩ chaka, ku me̩ la fʼojibo-ma ku ma da le̩ guche̩, ku me̩ la fʼotete-ma ki gbo̩gba le̩ chaka gbe̩ wane̩,
tak ame̩ ki gbʼane̩ le̩ ku me̩ ne̩ ku me̩ dodo jʼo̩mo̩, todu omi mʼane̩ le̩ du ñwu me̩ ku me̩ ne̩.

Tak ame̩ aje̩ ane̩ le̩ ogu alu kʼanya aje̩ ñw akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-me̩; me̩ ki kʼe̩wñ ogu nana ñw abo o̩lo̩pu ku ma wewe tule, oñ abo ku ma ma wewe n, me̩ ki bʼe̩wñ ogu-ma wane̩; ugbo du kʼanya je̩ ñw one̩, mak e-le̩ chʼe-wñ; alu kʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu amata-me̩ de̩ alu le̩ ame̩ aje̩ e̩wñ ogu le̩.

Me̩ muda ko̩ ene abo ane̩ le̩ dufu bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩, mak abo-ma ku me̩ tʼuma no̩ jʼo̩mo̩ adab e̩wñ ki agwunyʼume̩ eju, ma ño̩ adab ikeke kʼi agwunyʼume̩ akolo, ma la akobʼume̩ oj ane̩ ugbo ku me̩ adodo le̩.
Tak u nachʼame̩ alu ki dʼibe-mi kʼu che ma.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nañwa ñwu abo Israe̩l, kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ mugudu tʼoj ane̩ Kenan (owñ chʼane̩ kʼame̩ aje̩ e̩wñ ogu, owñ chʼane̩ Kenan gbogbo kad alo̩me̩-wñ),
alo̩me̩ ane̩-me̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ la akwo aje̩tachi Zin ale akolo Ido̩m, oñ alo̩me̩-me̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ akwo oj Ohimini Omu ate̩tʼolodudu alo;

tak alo̩me̩-me̩ arida kwʼo̩mo̩ rʼo̩pata o̩gane̩ ate̩gu Akrabim le̩, i alale o̩mo̩ anyi Zin, tak i ate̩ kade o̩wo̩ o̩gane̩ Kede̩sh-bamea; tak i akwʼo̩mo̩ alo tu Hazar-adar, oñ i ale gu o̩mo̩ du nyi Azmo̩n;
tak alo̩me̩-wñ arida kwo Azmon anyi aji e-Ijipti le̩, oñ i atu dufu o̩la Ohimini.
Oñ alo̩me̩-me̩ o̩wo̩ olane̩ achʼOhimini Elile, kpai adabʼeti-wñ jo̩; e-le̩ la chʼalo̩me̩-me̩ o̩wo̩ olane̩.
E̩wñ ki ache alo̩me̩-me̩ o̩pata ate̩ la de̩: kwo Ohimini Elile le̩ me̩ ki fʼo̩me̩-me̩ hi kʼama ki ne̩ uwo Ho̩r;
kwo uwo Ho̩r le̩ me̩ ki fʼo̩me̩-wñ hi gbogbo wa alo̩na unyi Hamat, tak alo̩me̩ le̩ atudufu Zedad;
tak alo̩-me̩ le̩ ate̩ nyi Zifro̩n, oñ i akpoji Hazar-enan; e-le̩ la achʼalo̩me̩-me̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩.
Tak ame̩ ki fʼalo̩me̩-me̩ e-o̩wo̩ olodudu hi akwo Hazar-enan wa Shefam;
tak alo̩me̩ le̩ agwo̩ru kwo Shefam wa Ribla, o̩wo̩ olodudu Ain le̩; tak alo̩me̩ le̩ ate̩ tʼo̩gane̩ alo gbogbo wa kado akolo ohimini Chine̩re̩t o̩wo̩ olodudu;
tak alo̩me̩ le̩ ate̩ tʼo̩gane̩ akado Jo̩rdan, ukpoji-wñ la achʼOhimini Omu ge̩. E-le̩ la achʼane̩-me̩ alu kʼalo̩me̩-wñ le daka.
Taku Mose̩s ñwa ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, Ane̩ kʼame̩ aje̩ e̩wñ ogu alu kʼanya ero̩ aje̩ ñwu me̩ e-ki Jihofa ñwate̩ ku ma ki ko ñw abo o̩lo̩pu me̩la kpai ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu le̩;
todu o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Rube̩n alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩, kpai o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Gad alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩ kpai ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu Manasa, mʼe̩wñ ogu e-ma gba me̩;
amo̩lo̩pu meji kpai ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu le̩ mʼe̩wñ ogu e-ma gba udaba Jo̩rdan odenideni Je̩riko, o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
Odu aboke̩le̩ ku ma akpe̩ ane̩ le̩ ñwu me̩ ku ma je̩ e̩wñ ogu de̩: E̩leaza, atama, kpai Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun.
Tak ame̩ ki mʼidachi okoka chi kwef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu du ku ma kpʼane̩ le̩ ki mud e̩wñ ogu-me̩.
Odu aboke̩le̩ le̩ de̩: E̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Juda che Kele̩b, o̩ma Jefune.
E̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Simeo̩n che Shemue̩l, o̩ma Amihud.
E̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin che Elidad, o̩ma Chislon.
E̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Dan la chʼidachiʼka, owñ che Buki, o̩ma Jogli.
E̩ne̩ amo̩ma Jose̩f: e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Manasa, la chʼidachi, owñ che Hanie̩l, o̩ma Efod.
Oñ e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Ifraim, la chʼidachi, owñ che Kemue̩l, o̩ma Shiftan.
E̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Be̩njamin la chʼidachi, owñ chʼElizafan, o̩ma Parnak.
E̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Isakar la chʼidachi, owñ che Paltie̩l, o̩ma Azan.
Oñ e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Ashe̩r la chʼidachi, owñ chʼAhihud, o̩ma Shelomi.
E̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Naftali la chʼidachi, owñ che Pe̩dahe̩l, o̩ma Amihud.
Abo le̩ chʼabo ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu ma ku ma kpe̩ e̩wñ ogu ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l oj ane̩ Kenan.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s egbili Moab o̩la Jo̩rdan odenideni Je̩riko le̩ kakini,
E̩ ki ñwa ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l ku ma ki kʼewo ewo kwef e̩wñ ogu e-ma ñw abo Lifai ku ma dodo; me̩ ki ño̩ kʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼewo ewo-ma daka ñw abo Lifai ge̩.
Ewo ewo le̩ la chʼutodu ma ku ma dodo o̩mo̩, oñ ane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka chʼutodu ame̩la-ma abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kpai ane̩-ma kpai ame̩wñ iñmi-ma chaka.
Oñ unabe̩ ane̩ ije̩ ale ewo ewo le̩ daka kʼame̩ ako ñw abo Lifai ate̩ kwʼo̩lʼaku ohibo̩wo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ lo daka.

Tak ame̩ añwa ohibo̩wo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji ejo̩do̩da ewo le̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ, oñ o̩wo̩ o̩pata-wñ o̩gane̩ ño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji, o̩wo̩ o̩lane̩-wñ la chʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji, o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ laño̩ chʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji ge̩, ewo le̩ ki dʼalumeji. E-le̩ la chʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼewo ewo le̩ daka ñwu ma.
Oñ ewo ewo ku me̩ ako ñw abo Lifai le̩ achʼewo oke̩ko̩ me̩fa le̩, e-kʼame̩ adate̩ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi kpʼone̩ kʼi ra nyʼefu-wñ; ame̩ ñʼakʼewo o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke meji ñwu ma manyʼu ge̩.
Ewo ewo chaka kʼame̩ ako ñw abo Lifai le̩ chʼewo o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩jo̩, manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki To daka ge̩.

Ewo ewo ku me̩ la ako ñwu ma akwʼef e-kʼabo Israe̩l ne̩ le̩, me̩ ki bʼabo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu kʼabo-ma wewe gba; me̩ ki bʼabo o̩lo̩pu kʼabo-ma chʼo̩wo̩ wane̩ gba re; alu kʼe̩wñ ogu kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ je̩ de̩ i achi ewo-wñ ñw abo Lifai.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ mu Jo̩rdan daba tʼoj ane̩ Kenan,
e̩gba le̩ ame̩ ki chi ewo ewo jo̩ ñwu me̩ kʼi chʼewo oke̩ko̩ me̩fa, kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi kpʼone̩ kʼi ma je̩gede n, kʼi ra nyʼo̩mo̩.
Ewo ewo le̩ la achʼo̩ke̩ko̩ ñwu me̩ tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ ki akpo̩chi dʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kpa, kʼakpʼone̩ le̩ ki we eku, gbogbo tak i dago o̩gba abo o̩gbadu-i ku ma fʼoji ajo̩-wñ kpa.
Ewo ewo ku me̩ kojo̩ le̩ achʼewo oke̩ko̩ me̩fa ñwu me̩.
Ame̩ ki chi ewo me̩ta jo̩ ejudaba Jo̩rdan-i, me̩ ki la chi ewo me̩ta jo̩ oj ane̩ Kenan ge̩; kʼi chʼewo ewo oke̩ko̩.
Ewo me̩fa-i ajo̩ ki chʼoke̩ko̩ ñw abo Israe̩l kpai ilowa kpai abane̩ omune̩ efu-ma, todu kʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi kpʼone̩, kʼi ma jegede n, kʼi ra nyʼo̩mo̩.
I muda chʼe̩wñ kʼi du ebije gwo e̩ne̩ le̩, kʼi leku, mak akpone̩ i che; ekpa ma akpa akpone̩ tila.
I la che̩wñ kʼi nʼokuta o̩wo̩ kʼi du nʼu alu ki bʼone̩ ekpa jo̩, kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ leku, akpone̩ i che; ekpa ma akpa akpone̩ tila.
Abe̩k iche̩wñ ki chʼoli ki dʼo̩wo̩-wñ kʼi du fiʼo̩, ki bʼone̩ ekpa jo̩, kʼi la leku, akpone̩ i che; ekpa ma akpa akpone̩ tila.
Akpo̩chi onugo adʼakpone̩ le̩ kpa; i de kpai owñ, i mʼu du kpa.
I la chʼulaka-wñ i che kʼi dʼe̩wñ gwunyʼu, abe̩k i ro̩ e̩wñ dʼo, abe̩k i kpala anede owñ tak i dʼe̩wñ ro̩ dʼo, kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ leku,
abe̩ku ma chʼe̩nuja tak i dʼo̩wo̩-wñ gwʼo, kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ leku, maku ma adʼe̩ne̩ kʼi gwʼone̩ dajane̩ le̩ kpa tila; akpone̩ i che; akpo̩chi la akpa e̩gba kʼi de̩ kpai owñ.
I muda che̩wñ kʼi dʼe̩wñ gwunyʼu achigili ku ma ma chʼe̩no̩la-wñ n, abe̩k i dʼe̩wñ ro̩ dʼo kʼi ma kpala unede̩ owñ n,
abe̩k i chʼokuta ki bo̩jo̩ ki akpʼone̩ i ne̩, kʼi ma li e̩ne̩ le̩ tak i ro̩ nin, kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ leku, kʼi ma la chʼe̩no̩la-wñ n, kʼibe ma dʼefu-wñ kʼi achʼo e̩bie̩ne̩ n;
mak e̩gbale̩ abo o̩gbadu-i akajo̩ akpone̩ kpai akpo̩chi le̩ alu kʼoji ajo̩-i de̩;

tak abo o̩gbadu le̩ agba e̩ne̩ kʼi kpʼone̩ kwef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi akpo̩chi, oñ abo o̩gbadu le̩ adʼowñ dabi wa ewo oke̩ko̩-wñ ugbo kʼi ra nyi le̩; tak owñ agugu o̩mo̩ gbogbo tak agboji amatama lile ku ma bʼekpo tʼo̩ oji le̩ leku.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi kpʼone̩ le̩ mʼalo̩me̩ oke̩ko̩ ugbo kʼi ra nyi le̩ daba, e̩gba du kʼi chaka le,
kʼakpo̩chi fʼu li ejo̩do̩da alo̩me̩ ewo oke̩ko̩-wñ le̩, kʼakpo̩chi fʼakpone̩ le̩ kpa i nʼugbo kʼi ajabi o̩chi kʼi ta le̩ n.
Todu i dukpe̩ kʼi ma gugu ef ewo oke̩ko̩-wñ le̩ gbogbo tak agboji amatama lile leku; ama e̩gba kʼagboji amatama lile leku tak akpone̩ neke dabi tʼane̩-wñ kʼi ne̩.
E̩wñ-i la achʼuhio̩me̩ kpai oj ajo̩ ku ma du te̩ ñwu me̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩ ef odo-me̩ chaka.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi akpa one̩, alu ame̩nibenu ma agbo̩ taku ma adʼu kpa; e̩ne̩ kate muda agbʼibenu nyʼone̩ ku ma kpa n.
Anubile̩ ge̩ ame̩ ki gbʼo̩ko̩ kʼakpone̩ kʼi fʼabi je̩ adu wa kʼi la oji o̩la-wñ tane̩ n; ekpa ma adʼu kpa chuu.
Ame̩ ki la gbʼo̩ko̩ e̩boma kʼe̩ne̩ ki ra nyʼo̩ke̩ko̩-wñ duwa kʼi la oji o̩la-wñ tane̩ kʼi dabi tʼane̩-wñ gbogbo tak atama lile ki ku n.
Ame̩ ki ñʼakpʼane̩ ugbo ku me̩ jo̩ le̩ bie̩ abe̩le̩ n; todu e̩bie̩ akpʼane̩ bie̩, i la nʼugbo du ku ma che e̩wñ e̩boma tod ane̩ ku ma dʼe̩bie̩ dafo efu-wñ n, chai lugbo e̩bie̩ e-e̩ne̩ ki du dafo le̩.
Me̩ ki dʼane̩ ugbo ku me̩ dodo le̩, e-kʼomi la gugu alumeji-wñ-i ji n: todu omi, Jihofa, gugu alumeji abo Israe̩l.

Tak abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma Gilead, owñ chʼo̩ma Makir o̩ma Manasa, kʼi chʼabo unyi unyi amata ef amo̩ma Jose̩f le̩ te̩wa, oñ ma ko̩la o̩gba Mose̩s kpai o̩gba amidachi, ku ma dʼoji dufu ef unyi unyi amata abo Israe̩l;

ma kakini, Jihofa ñwa ñw odu-mi kʼi kpʼane̩-i ñw abo Israe̩l kʼi chʼe̩wñ ogu-ma ku ma je̩ lugbo anya ero: Jihofa laño̩ ñwa ñw odu-mi kʼi kʼe̩wñ ogu Ze̩lo̩fe̩had, o̩maye-wa e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩, ñw amo̩ma-wñ onobule̩.
I la che̩wñ ku ma nʼo̩ko̩ kwef o̩lo̩pu omune̩ ef abo Israe̩l-i, mak e̩wñ ogu e-ma achi kwef e̩wñ ogu amata-wa manyu e̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu ku ma atʼo̩ le̩, abe̩le̩ ma abʼukpe̩ e̩wñ ogu e-wa wane̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ o̩ga echi e-abo Israe̩l mudako, e̩gbale̩ ma ako e̩wñ ogu-ma manyʼe̩wñ ogu abo̩lo̩pu ku ma atʼo̩ le̩: oñ e̩wñ ogu e-ma achi kwef e̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu amata e-wa.
Taku Mose̩s ñwa ñw abo Israe̩l alu kʼo̩la Jihofa ka le̩ kakini, E̩wñ kʼabo o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Jose̩f ka le̩ chʼochochi.
E̩wñ ki Jihofa ñwa ñw a ugbo amo̩ma onobule̩ e-Ze̩lo̩fe̩had le̩ de̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki nyo̩ ma eju ama ki ne̩; ama chai e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼef akwo̩ra unyi abo o̩lo̩pu amata-ma ama ane̩.
E̩wñ ogu e-amo̩ma Israe̩l du achi kwef o̩lo̩puʼka nyef o̩lo̩pu omune̩ n; todu e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ abo Israe̩l agwo̩nyʼe̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu amata-wñ.
Oñ onobule̩ du kʼi nʼe̩wñ ogu ef o̩lo̩puʼka ef amo̩ma Israe̩l, achʼo̩ya e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi chʼabo akwo̩ra unyi abo o̩lo̩pu ata-wñ, kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ef amo̩ma Israe̩l ki ne̩ e̩wñ ogu ata-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ tak e̩wñ ogu ma ñʼachi kwef abo o̩lo̩puʼka tef abo o̩lo̩pu omune̩ n; todu abo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma agwo̩nyʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ.
Amo̩ma Ze̩lo̩fe̩had la che alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s;
todu Mala kpai Tirza kpai Ho̩gla kpai Milka kpai Noa, amo̩ma onobule̩ Ze̩lo̩fe̩had le̩, nʼamo̩ma amo̩maye atama chʼo̩ko̩-ma.
Ma nʼo̩ko̩-ma ef abo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma Manasa, o̩ma Jose̩f le̩; oñ e̩wñ ogu-ma kwojo̩ ñw abo o̩lo̩pu akwo̩ra unyi ata e-ma.
Abo e-le̩ chʼuko̩ kpai oji ajo̩ ku Jihofa ñwa ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l lugbo Mose̩s egbili Moab o̩la Jo̩rdan odenideni Je̩riko le̩.
O̩la-i chʼo̩la ku Mose̩s ka ñw abo Israe̩l chaka ef aje̩tachi ejudaba Jo̩rdan ef o̩go̩ Araba me̩ru Suf, o̩ge̩ge̩de̩ Paran kpai Tofe̩l kpai Leban kpai Haze̩ro̩t kpai Dizahab.
Akwo Ho̩re̩b lʼo̩na uwo Seir wa Kede̩sh-barnea chʼule̩ o̩jo̩ me̩gwaka.
Oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu e̩ke̩gwaka-wñ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji-wñ Mose̩s ko̩la ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l, alu du ku Jihofa du ñw u kʼi ñwa ñwu ma,
oñ chʼabu kʼi fu Siho̩n onu abo Amo̩r kʼi dodo He̩shbo̩n kpai O̩g onu Beshan kʼi dodo Ashte̩ro̩t ugbo E̩drei du.
Ejudaba Jo̩rdan, oj ane̩ Moab, Mose̩s chane̩ edʼuko̩-o̩la-i ne̩rʼuma eju, i kakini,
Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa ka ñw a Ho̩re̩b kakini, Alu ku me̩ kpo̩kpe̩ ugbo uwo-i nyo̩ me̩;

me̩ murida ku me̩ kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩-me̩, ku me̩ nyʼane̩ uwo abo Amo̩r kpai egbili du ki me̩rʼu ef o̩go̩ Araba o̩mo̩, oj ane̩ uwo kpai ane̩ uro̩je̩ kpai ane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ kpai ane̩ o̩lʼohimini, ane̩ abo Kenan kpai Le̩bano̩n gbogbo wa kado ohimini e-lile, owñ chʼohimini Yufretis.
Go, u mʼane̩ le̩ kojo̩ o̩gba-me̩ me̩; me̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ ku me̩ mʼane̩ ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-me̩ gba, i go̩ ñw Ebraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Jeko̩b ka kʼi adʼu ñwu ma kpai ugbe̩-ma ubi-ma ge̩.
Omi la ka ñwu me̩ iko le̩ kakini, Omi kate neke ne̩ me̩ n;
Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ je̩ ñwu me̩ wewe-i, me̩ la go, eñini-i uwewe-me̩ dab awo ojale.
Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-amata-me̩, kʼi ño̩ je̩ ñwu me̩ wewe tʼalu ku me̩ de̩ le icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ta, kʼi la de̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩, alu kʼi katane̩ ñwu me̩ le̩!
Ab u nale kʼomi kate ane̩ me̩ ku me̩ nʼumi oji-i, kpai adu-me̩ kpai uja-me̩?
Me̩ mʼabo ki nʼibe kpai abo ku ma mʼoji o̩la kpai ame̩nuwohi ko kwef o̩lo̩pu, o̩lo̩pu-me̩, oñ nako ma che amagboji-me̩.
Taku me̩ dohi ñwu mi kakini, E̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ka le̩ nyo̩ kʼa che.

Abe̩le̩ u mʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-me̩ ko, abo ku ma nʼibe kpai amenuwohi, oñ u mʼuma ko che amagboji-me̩, amagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, kpai amagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu, kpai amagboji one̩ ooje ooje, kpai amagboji one̩ me̩gwa e̩gwa, kpai amako̩takada ef abo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-me̩ du.
Tak u ñwa ñw amakajo̩-me̩ iko le̩ kakini, Me̩ ki netirʼo̩la ki dʼagbagba amo̩maye-me̩, ku me̩ fʼajo̩ o̩kpakpa ka agbagba one̩ kpai o̩maye-wñ, abe̩k ilowa ki dʼugbo-wñ.
Me̩ki nʼe̩nejuma ef ajo̩ n; ame̩ ki netirʼame̩nale kpai amanana okujo̩; me̩ ki chokpo eju one̩ n; todu oji ajo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ dute̩ de̩; oñ o̩la ki gbiti tʼume̩ le̩, e-le̩ me̩ ko wʼugbo mi, kʼu nanetirʼu.
U laño̩ ñwa ñwu me̩ e̩wñ du ki dʼukpe̩ ku me̩ che iko le̩.
Tak a kwo Ho̩re̩b alo, a le gu ef aje̩tachi inaina kʼi abailo kʼame̩ li le̩ ej o̩na ale tʼane̩ uwo uwo e-abo Amo̩r du, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa ñwa ñw a; oñ a lewa Kede̩sh-barnea.
Tak u ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ lewa ane̩ uwo e-abo Amo̩r, e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa du ñw a.
Go, Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mʼane̩ le̩ dute̩ o̩gba-we̩ me̩; te̩gu alo kʼe̩ mʼu gba, alu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-we̩, ka ñw e̩ le̩; e̩ ki railo n, e̩do̩-we̩ ki muda kpu n.
Taku me̩ mute̩wa ugbo-mi chaka, oñ me̩ kakini, A ki kpe̩ aboke̩le̩ tʼuwa o̩gba, ku ma nyʼatʼane̩ le̩ todu wa, ku ma kʼohi o̩na kʼa le kʼa nyʼo̩mo̩ dabiwa ñw a, kpai ewo ewo kʼa awa no.
O̩la le̩ la nyo̩ mi eju; oñ u mʼaboke̩le̩-me̩ me̩gweji ko, e̩ne̩ʼka e̩ne̩ʼka chʼutodu o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu okoke du;
taku ma murida te̩gu tʼoj ane̩ uwo le̩, oñ ma lewa ef o̩go̩ E̩shko̩l, ma la fane̩ le̩ go lale.
Taku ma mʼe̩ro e̩wñ ane̩ le̩ ka nyʼo̩wo̩-ma, oñ ma mʼu ko gwo̩ru wa ñw a, ma la mʼinabali du dabiwa ñw a, ma kakini, Ane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa du ñw a, chʼane̩ ki nyo̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ame̩ je̩ ate̩gu alo n, me̩ muda ko̩ e̩wñ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ nʼalu-wñ ka le̩;
oñ me̩ jʼef unyabo-me̩ akeñmini kakini, Todabu ki Jihofa chulaka wa, todule̩ i mʼuwa ko kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu, kʼi mʼuwa ko nyʼef o̩wo̩ abo Amo̩r, ku ma fʼuwa chile̩che̩ rinyo̩.

Ugbo a te̩gu nyi ta? amo̩maye-wa le̩ je̩ ñw e̩do̩ ko̩ wa biyoo, abu ku ma kakini, Abo le̩ gbe̩ tʼuwa le, ma ño̩ gbo̩gba tule; ewo ewo-ma tabale, aku-ma gba kad efojale; a laño̩ fʼamo̩ma Anak li o̩mo̩ ge̩.
Tak u ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Me̩ ki gagogodo n, me̩ ki la railo ma n.
Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ kʼi atʼume̩ o̩gba le̩, owñ onugo ajogu todu me̩, alu kʼi che ñwu me̩ eju-me̩ oj ane̩ Ijipti,
kpai ef aje̩tachi, ugbo kʼe̩ li ka ku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ne̩ we̩, alu kʼone̩ ane̩ e̩ma-wñ, ej o̩na du kʼame̩ le, gbogbo taku me̩ wʼugbo-i.
I chaka chʼef e̩wñ le̩ du ame̩ dʼo̩la Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ rʼochochi n;
owñ la tʼume̩ o̩gba ej o̩na le̩, kʼi tene uña ñwu me̩ ku me̩ fʼunyabo-me̩ fa o̩mo̩, i la le ef una odu kʼi ña me̩ o̩na ku me̩ ale, oñ i le ef akpa o̩ro̩ka.
Taku Jihofa gbo̩ omu uko̩la-me̩, oñ i bi eju, i la go kakini,
E̩ne̩ kate ef abo o̩gba e̩bie̩ne̩-i ali ane̩ ki nyo̩ kʼu go̩ kʼu nadu ñw amata-me̩ le̩ n.
Chai Kele̩b, o̩ma Jefune; owñ le̩ ali, oñ nadʼane̩ e-kʼi dʼe̩re̩-wñ wa tʼo̩ le̩ ñw u kpai amo̩ma-wñ, todabu kʼi tu Jihofa ubi ogbolo!
Jihofa ño̩ we̩do̩ bʼumi todu me̩ ge̩, i kakini, Uwe̩ onugo agudu nyʼo̩mo̩ n;
Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun, kʼi dago o̩gba-me̩-i, owñ agudu nyʼo̩mo̩; dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw u, todu owñ le̩ aje̩ ñw abo Israe̩l ku ma je̩ ane̩ le̩ ogu.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, amo̩ma-me̩ egini-i, kʼame̩ kakini, Ogu aje̩ ma, kpai abimo̩to̩-me̩, ku ma ma mʼe̩nyo̩ abe̩k e̩bie̩ne̩ tʼeñini-i ta n, ama le̩ agudu nyʼo̩mo̩, ama oñ nakʼo ñwu kʼama ki ne̩.
I muda chʼame̩, me̩ murida, ku me̩ kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩-me̩ nyʼef aje̩tachi lʼo̩na ohimini Ekpikpa.
Taku me̩ dohi, me̩ la ka ñwu mi kakini, A du Jihofa re me̩; a te̩gu alo kʼa jogu, alu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, ñwa ñwu wa. Tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ fʼo̩la ogu-wñ ji, oñ me̩ jibenu ete̩gu tʼane̩ uwo le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ki te̩gu lo n, me̩ ki la jogu n, todu omi dʼefu-me̩ n; tode̩gba kʼame̩nebi-me̩ agwo me̩ dajane̩.
U ka abe̩le̩ ñwu me̩, me̩ la nyʼeti n; me̩ muda lañu rʼu o̩la ki Jihofa nʼalu-wñ ka le̩, oñ me̩ fʼibenu je̩, me̩ la mute̩gu nyʼane̩ uwo le̩.
Tak abo Amo̩r, ku ma dodo ane̩ uwo le̩, kwo dufu akobʼume̩, oñ ma fu me̩ ne alu kʼamiño̩ anʼone̩, oñ ma gwo me̩ dajane̩ Seir gbogbo wa Ho̩rma.
Taku me̩ mudabiwa araku o̩gba Jihofa; Jihofa muda gbʼomu-me̩ n, i la nʼeti ru me̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ me̩ kwogugu Kede̩sh o̩jo̩ wewe, alu kʼo̩jo̩-wñ ku me̩ je̩ o̩mo̩ de̩.
Tak a murida, oñ a kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩-wa alo tʼaje̩tachi lʼo̩na ohimini Ekpikpa, alu ki Jihofa ka ñwu mi; oñ a talʼuwo Seir daka o̩jo̩ ki ma nʼaluka n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi, kakini,
Uwo ku me̩ tʼale daka-i, i nyo̩ me̩; murida tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩.
E̩ ki nañwa ñw amone̩-i, kakini, Ame̩ alale gu ef ane̩ amo̩maye-me̩, amo̩ma Iso̩ kʼama dodo Seir le̩ du; ma la arailo me̩. Todule̩ me̩ nafʼo̩la-me̩ de nyo̩nyo̩;
me̩ kʼuja bʼama n; todu nabʼane̩ e-ma du ñwu me̩ n, i chaka chʼugbo kʼadaba e̩re̩ amʼane̩ nabu ñwu me̩ n, todu omi mʼuwo Seir du ñw Iso̩ kʼi ne̩.
Ame̩ ki nʼo̩ko̩ la uje̩wñ ugbo ma, kʼame̩ ki je̩; me̩ ki ño̩ nʼo̩ko̩ la omiofo ugbo ma, kʼame̩ ki ñmo̩.
Todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñw e̩ ef uko̩lo̩ du kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ che; i chema ule̩ kʼe̩ le gu aje̩tachi inaina-i du; o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji-i Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ te̩tadʼugbo we̩; e̩wñ du ñʼuwe̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ oñ a kwobʼamo̩maye-wa, amo̩ma Iso̩ ku ma dodo Seir te̩ le, a kwobʼo̩na Araba kpai Elat kpai E̩zion-geba te̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ ki kpala nyu Moab in, e̩ ki la ko bʼuma n, todu nabʼane̩-ma ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ne̩ n; todabu kʼomi mu Ar ko ñw amo̩ma Lo̩t ku ma ne̩.
(Abo Emim dodo o̩mo̩ o̩gbo̩gba, amone̩ le̩ gbe̩, ma la wewe, ma chʼe̩gbo̩gba dabu amAnak:
ma ño̩ fʼabo le̩ lo rʼef abo Refaim alu ku ma che abo Anak; abo Moab muda do̩ ma ko Emim.
Abo Ho̩r ño̩ dodo Seir o̩gbo̩gba, ama amo̩ma Iso̩ gbʼe̩gu-ma je̩, ma fʼuma chile̩che̩ kwʼo̩gba-ma, taku ma kwododo o̩mo̩ koji ma, alu kʼabo Israe̩l che kpai ane̩ ki Jihofa ko ñwu ma ku ma ne̩.)
Me̩ kwane̩ fai ku me̩ daba aji Ze̩re̩d-i. Oñ a mʼaji Ze̩re̩d daba.

Abu kʼa kwo Kede̩sh-barnea gbogbo tak a wʼudaba ukpolo Ze̩re̩d le̩, chʼo̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩jo̩, gbogbo tak o̩gba aboke̩le̩ ku ma bʼoko ogu jo̩ iko le̩ du lie̩ bʼalumeji uru-i te̩, alu ki Jihofa go̩ ñwu ma.
Oñ o̩wo̩ Jihofa woji nʼuma, kʼi fʼuma kpa mʼane̩ bʼalumeji uru le̩ te̩, gbogbo taku ma lie̩ kpa.
Abe̩le̩ i lewatu e̩gba kʼaboke̩le̩ du ku ma chʼabʼogu lie̩ rinyo̩, ku ma leku bʼef amone̩ le̩ te̩,
taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini,
Uwe̩ adaba alo̩-me̩ Moab, owñ chʼAr le̩, eñini;
oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ lewa me̩rʼamo̩ma Amo̩n le̩, e̩ ki kpala nyu ma n, e̩ ki la ko bʼama n; todu nabʼane̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ne̩ n, todu u mʼu du ñw amo̩ma Lo̩t ku ma ne̩.
(O̩mo̩ ma ño̩ fulo rʼef ane̩ abo Refaim ge̩; abo Refaim dodo o̩mo̩ igbele, ama abo Amo̩n do̩ ma ko̩ abo Zamzum;
amone̩-wñ gbe̩gbe̩, ma ño̩ wewe, ma la gba dab abo Anak; Jihofa muda fu ma chile̩che̩ rʼo̩gba-ma; taku ma gbʼe̩gu-ma je̩, oñ ma kwododo koji ma;
alu kʼi che amo̩ma Iso̩ ku ma dodo Seir, e̩gba kʼi fʼabo Ho̩r chile̩che̩ rʼo̩gba-ma; kʼama la gbʼe̩gu-ma je̩, oñ ma kwododo o̩mo̩ koji ma gbogbo tʼeñini.
I chʼe-amAfim ku ma dodo ikpo unyi ikpo unyi jo̩ gbogbo wa Gaza, abo Kafto̩r ku ma kwefu Kafto̩r dufu wa, fu ma chile̩che̩ rinyo̩ oñ ma kwododo koji ma.)

Me̩ kwane̩, me̩ kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩-me̩, ku me̩ mʼukpolo Amo̩n daba; go, omi mu Siho̩n e̩ne̩ Amo̩r, kʼi chʼonu He̩shbo̩n, du tʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩, kpai ane̩-wñ ge̩; me̩ ki chane̩ e̩gba ane̩ le̩, ku me̩ kʼogu bʼo̩.
Eñini kide̩ nachane̩ edu ailo-we̩ kpai e̩gahi-we̩ bʼoji amone̩ ku ma jo̩ ugbo du o̩gane̩ efojale ma; ama agbo̩ uwohi-we̩, oñ o̩la-ma aga, e-we̩ la awo̩ ma.
Abe̩le̩ u fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼef i aje̩tachi Ke̩demo̩t ugbo Siho̩n, onu He̩shbo̩n, kpai o̩la ure̩do̩, u kakini,
Je̩ ñwu mi lale gu ef ane̩-we̩ du; natʼo̩na o̩na kate alo̩, nana tʼawo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n.
Eta uwe̩ ki ta uje̩wñ ñwu mi la, kʼomi kʼu je̩; kʼe̩ dʼomiofo ñwu mi ñmo̩, kʼe̩ gbʼo̩ko̩-wñ; je̩ ñwu mi le̩ e̩re̩ ofo lale gudu ofo,
alu kʼamo̩ma Iso̩ ku ma dodo Se̩ir, kpai abo Moab ku ma dodo Ar che ñwu mi; gbogbo tak u mu Jo̩rdan daba tʼoj ane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa adu ñw a.
Siho̩n, onu He̩shbo̩n, muda je̩ ñw a lale gu owñ du n; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ je̩ ñw e̩do̩-wñ no̩, oñ i dʼe̩do̩ e̩gbiti ñw u, todu kʼi mʼowñ du tʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ alu ki de̩ eñini-i.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini. Go, u chane̩ edu Siho̩n kpai ane̩-wñ te̩ o̩gba-we̩ me̩; e̩ chane̩ egba todu kʼuwe̩ ki ne̩ ane̩-wñ.
Taku Siho̩n kwodufu akobʼuwa, owñ kpai abo-wñ chaka, ma lewa Jahaz ku ma jogu.
Taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa mʼowñ du te̩ ñw a; oñ a fʼowñ kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai amone̩-wñ chaka gwoda.
A la mʼewo ewo-wñ chaka gba iko le̩, oñ a mʼewo du kʼone̩ jʼefu-wñ kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩, tʼaboke̩le̩, tʼabobule̩, tʼabo-ma egini; a tʼe-i du no̩ tane̩ n;
chai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kate a muko chʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ñw o̩la-wa, manyʼane̩ ewo ewo kʼa ko le̩.
Akwo Aroe̩r, ki dʼeti ukpolo Amo̩n le̩, kpai ewo ki dʼef ukpolo-wñ gbogbo wa Gilead, ewo du ki tʼuwa o̩wo̩ le do̩mo̩ n; Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa mʼe̩wñ le̩ chaka ko jo̩ ñw a.
Chai ane̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n oñ e̩ ma te̩ me̩ru n; owñ chʼo̩la aji Jabo̩k chaka, kpai ewo ewo ane̩ uwo-wñ, kpai ugbo du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa fʼuwa naba enyʼo̩mo̩.
Tak a murida, oñ a mute̩gu le rʼo̩na Beshan; tak O̩g, onu Beshan, ko dufu okobʼuwa, owñ kpai abo-wñ chaka wa ku ma jogu kpai awa E̩drei.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ ki railo owñ n; todu u mʼowñ kpai amone̩-wñ chaka kpai ane̩-wñ ko nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ me̩; uwe̩ la achʼowñ alu kʼe̩ che Siho̩n, onu abo Amo̩r, kʼi dodo He̩shbo̩n le̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa, ño̩ mu O̩g, onu Beshan, kpai amone̩-wñ chaka ko nyʼuwa o̩wo̩ ge̩; tak a fʼu gwoda gbogbo tak e̩ne̩ du ma ño̩ bo̩ ñw u ge̩ n.
A la mʼewo-wñ chaka ko iko le̩; ewo okate kʼa ma bʼuma gba n do̩mo̩ n; ewo-wñ chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta, kpai ane̩ du ki le Argo̩b daka, owñ chʼojane̩ O̩g Beshan.
Ewo-i chaka chenʼo̩kpe̩ kpai aku ki gbo̩gba kpai e̩wñ uro̩na kpai oli ugbo̩lo̩ ku ma ko kofida-wñ; manyʼadogbe adogbe wewe ki ma nʼaku n.
Oñ a mʼuma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ chaka, alu kʼa che Siho̩n onu He̩shbo̩n, a mʼewo du kʼone̩ jʼefu-wñ kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko manyʼaboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩ kpai abo-ma egini.
Ama ame̩la-ma abe̩re̩me̩le̩ du kpai ane̩ kʼogu je̩ ewo ewo, e-le̩ a muko chʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ñw o̩la-wa.
Abe̩le̩ a bʼamonu Amo̩r meji ku ma jʼejudaba Jo̩rdan gbʼane̩, akwo ukpolo Arno̩n gbogbo wa uwo He̩rmo̩n,
(abo Saido̩n la do̩ He̩rmo̩n le̩ ko̩ Sirion, oñ abo Amo̩r dʼo̩ ko̩ Senir),
owñ chʼewo ewo egbili le̩ chaka kpai Gilead chaka kpai Beshan chaka gbogbo wa Saleka kpai E̩drei, kʼi chʼewo ewo ojane̩ O̩g Beshan.

(Todu O̩g onu Beshan kate bo̩ ef e̩bo̩bo̩ abo Refaim; go, ate̩-wñ chʼate̩ ebije; e-le̩ de̩ Raba e-amo̩ma Amo̩n in? ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩la, unula-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩, alu kʼohibo̩wo̩ e-one̩ de̩.)
A mʼane̩ le̩ gba kʼa ne̩ iko le̩. Akwo Aroe̩r e-ki dʼo̩la ukpolo Amo̩n le̩ kpai ukpe̩reji ane̩-uwo e-Gilead kpai ewo ewo-wñ, u mʼu ko ñw abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad;
tak ane̩ Gilead kibo̩, kpai o̩chaka ane̩ Beshan, ojane̩ O̩g le̩, owñ chʼane̩ ki le Argo̩b daka du, u muko ñw ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa. (Ma la do̩ o̩chaka ane̩ Beshan ko̩ ane̩ Refaim.
Jair o̩ma Manasa mʼojane̩ Argo̩b chaka gba, gbogbo wʼalo̩me̩ abo Ge̩shur kpai abo Maakat, oñ i du Beshan hi odu o̩la-wñ ko̩ Hafo̩t-jair, gbogbo tʼeñini.)
U la mu Gilead du ñwu Machir.
Oñ u mʼane̩ akwo Gilead gbogbo wʼukpolo Amo̩n ko ñw abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad, alumeji ukpolo le̩ chʼalo̩me̩-wñ gbogbo wa ukpolo Jabo̩k, kʼi chʼalo̩me̩ ane̩ abo Amo̩n le̩;
Araba ge̩ kpai Jo̩rdan kpai alo̩me̩-wñ, akwo Chine̩re̩t gbogbo wʼohimini Araba, owñ chʼOhimini Omu, e̩re̩ uwo Pisga o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ.
Oñ u ñwa ñwu me̩ iko le̩ kakini, Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, mʼane̩-i chaka ko ñwu me̩ ku me̩ ne̩; e̩ne̩ du efu-me̩ ku me̩ gbiti bʼogu jo̩ ki fʼo̩la ogu ji adaba rʼamo̩maye-me̩, amo̩ma Israe̩l-i, o̩gba.
Chai amo̩ya-me̩ kpai abo-me̩ egini kpai ame̩wñukpa-me̩ u chema ka kʼame̩ nʼame̩wñukpa nana abo e-le̩ ajʼewo ewo-me̩ kʼomi ko ñwu me̩ le̩,

gbogbo taku Jihofa ki dʼuñmi ñw amo̩maye-me̩, alu kʼi du ñwu me̩-i, kʼama ño̩ gwo̩nyʼane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ako ñwu ma ejudaba Jo̩rdan-i; e̩gbale̩ tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ adabi tʼe̩wñ kʼi ne̩ kʼomi ko ñwu me̩ le̩.
U laño̩ ñwa ñwu Joshua iko le̩, kakini, E̩ nʼeju-we̩ do e̩wñ du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ chʼamonu meji-i; abe̩le̩ oñ Jihofa achʼojane̩ du ugbo kʼuwe̩ adaba nyi le̩.
Ame̩ ki railo ma n; todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ajogu todu me̩.
Tak u gbo̩ko̩bi Jihofa iko le̩, kakini,

O Ondu Jihofa, echane̩ uwe̩ chane̩ edʼunana-we̩ ña adu-we̩ me̩, kpai o̩wo̩-we̩ ki gbiti; todu O̩jo̩ e-ugbo dʼefojale abe̩k ane̩-ile̩-i kʼi neke che alu kʼuko̩lo̩ e-we̩ de̩, kpai alu kʼukpahiu-we̩ de̩?
Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi daba kʼu li ane̩ ki nyo̩ ki dʼudaba Jo̩rdan-i, ane̩ uwo ki nyo̩ le̩ kpai Le̩bano̩n.
Jihofa muda we̩do̩ru mi todu me̩, oñ i ma gbʼo̩la-mi n; taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, I bʼuwe̩ jo̩ ke; e̩ ki dʼo̩la le̩ wane̩ aka ñwu nu ge̩ n.
Mute̩gu tʼoj uwo Pisga, kʼe̩ chi eju-we̩ nyʼate̩ ago o̩wo̩ olane̩ kpai o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ kpai o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ kpai o̩wo̩ olodudu, kʼe̩ la nʼeju-we̩ agʼo; todu uwe̩ ñʼadaba Jo̩rdan in.
E̩ muda fʼuko̩-wñ te̩ ñwu Jo̩shua kʼe̩ la dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw u, kʼe̩ dʼugbiti ñw u; todu owñ atʼamone̩-i o̩gba daba, owñ la aje̩ ñwu ma gbʼane̩ kʼuwe̩ ali le̩.
Oñ a kwogugu o̩go̩ ki akpejuru Be̩t-peo̩r.
Fai, O Israe̩l, me̩ netirʼo̩la uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ kʼu nako̩ me̩-i, ku me̩ che; todu kʼame̩ ki deju, ku me̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ agba ane̩ ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-me̩, adu ñwu me̩.
Ame̩ ki butʼo̩la kʼu ñwa ñwu me̩-i n, me̩ ki la bu wane̩ n; kʼame̩ ki de uko̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ e-kʼu nañwa ñwu me̩.
Eju-me̩ li e̩wñ ki Jihofa che ugbo o̩la Beal-peo̩r le̩; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ fʼaboke̩le̩ du ku ma tu Beal-peo̩r ubi chile̩che̩ rinyo̩ bʼalumeji-me̩ te̩;
ame̩ ku me̩ muda yamo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, okoke me̩ du deju tʼeñini.
Go, omi fʼo̩la uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ ko̩ me̩ alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi ñwa ñwu mi kʼame̩ ki chʼabe̩le̩ oj ane̩ ugbo kʼame̩ anyi ku me̩ ne̩-i.

Todule̩ me̩ ki de ku me̩ che tʼeju-wñ; todu e-le̩ achʼibe-me̩ kpai oji o̩la ku me̩ ma eju amone̩, ku ma gbo̩ o̩la uhio̩me̩-i du ku ma akakini, Ochochi abo uche̩ichi inaina-i chʼamone̩ ki nʼibe ku ma la mʼoji o̩la gbe̩.
Todu ugbo abo uche̩ichi amone̩ lileʼka de̩, ku ma nʼO̩jo̩ ki me̩ru ma, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ de̩ e̩gba du kʼa kwadʼo̩?
Oñ ugbo abo uche̩ichi lile kʼi nʼo̩la uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ alu kʼuko̩-o̩la-i kʼu nadu te̩ ñwu me̩ eñini-i de̩ taa?

E-i kate, e̩ ki fʼo̩la-we̩ de, kʼe̩ la che̩do̩chacha kʼe̩ fʼonugo-we̩ de, tode̩gba kʼe̩ gbenyo̩ e̩wñ kʼeju-we̩ li, tode̩gba ki akwo bʼef e̩do̩-we̩ te̩ o̩jo̩ udeju-we̩ okate; uwe̩ ki la je̩ ñw amo̩ma-we̩ kpai amo̩ma amo̩ma-we̩ fʼu ma.

O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ dago o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ Ho̩re̩b le̩, e̩gba ku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Fʼamone̩ le̩ do̩ jeju ñwu mi, kʼu naje̩ ñwu ma gbo̩ o̩la-mi, kʼama ki ko̩che̩ erailo mi o̩jo̩ du ku ma deju ile̩-i, kʼama ki ño̩ ko̩ amo̩ma-ma abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Tak ame̩ te̩wa dago e̩re̩ uwo le̩, oñ una najo uwo le̩ gbogbo tʼo̩ge̩ge̩de̩ efojale, kʼe̩chubi kpai akpa kpai e̩chubi gbe̩m du te̩.
Taki Jihofa ko̩la ñwu me̩ kwef alumeji una le̩; ame̩ gbo̩ omu uko̩la, me̩ muda li alu kʼi de̩ n; chai omuko̩la kate do̩mo̩.
Tak I dʼo̩la alo-wñ kʼi kpe̩ kajane̩ ñwu me̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi ñwa ñwu me̩ ku me̩ che, owñ chʼo̩la me̩gwa le̩; oñ i fʼu ko̩ nyʼalo okuta meji.
Taki Jihofa ñwa ñwu mi iko le̩ kʼu ko̩ me̩ o̩la uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩, kʼame̩ ki che teju-wñ oj ane̩ ugbo ku me̩ adaba nyi ku me̩ ne̩ le̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nafʼo̩la-me̩ de nyo̩nyo̩. Todu me̩ li alu kʼi de̩ eju o̩jo̩ ki Jihofa ko̩la ñwu me̩ Ho̩re̩b kwef alumeji una le̩ re n,
nago, tode̩gba ku me̩ kpa o̩la-me̩ bie̩, ku me̩ chane̩ eda ojibo ki biu e̩wñʼka, dagba i biu o̩ko̩ abe̩k o̩ya,
dagba i biu e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kʼa dʼile̩ʼka, dagba i biu e̩we̩ʼka kʼi nʼika kʼi awu ojale,
dagba i biu e̩wñ kʼi afa ane̩pe̩te̩ʼka, dagba i biu e̩ja kʼi dʼef omi o̩gane̩ ile̩-iʼka;

tode̩gba kʼuwe̩ achi eju-we̩ nyʼojale kʼe̩ fʼolu abe̩k ochu abe̩k awo awo li, owñ chʼe̩wñ uwewe ojale le̩, ku ma fʼuwe̩ fa ubi kʼe̩ dojikane̩ ñwu ma, kʼe̩ re̩ e̩wñ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kpe̩ ñw amone̩ du kʼi dʼo̩gane̩ ojale-i.
Ama Jihofa mʼume̩ ko, oñ i ko me̩ kwef aido ebije le̩ dufu, owñ chʼakwʼIjipti, kʼame̩ ki chʼamone̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ogu kʼi aje̩, alu ki de̩ eñini-i.
Anubile̩ ge̩, Jihofa we̩do̩rʼumi todu me̩, oñ i fu go̩ ka kʼomi adaba Jo̩rdan in, kʼomi ma anyi oj ane̩ ki nyo̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼe̩ je̩ le̩ n.
Eku naku oj ane̩-i, nadaba Jo̩rdan in; ame̩ muda adaba, me̩ la agbʼane̩ ki nyo̩ le̩.
Me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ de, tode̩gba ku me̩ gbenyo̩ alo Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi kpe̩ kpai ame̩ taku me̩ fʼojibo bo̩ ki dab e̩wñʼka ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, funaba ñw e̩ le̩.
Todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, chʼuna kʼi afʼe̩wñ lie̩, O̩jo̩ ajogu i che.

E̩gba kʼuwe̩ abi amo̩ma, kpai amaaju, kʼame̩ la kpo̩kpe̩ oj ane̩ le̩, ku me̩ kpa o̩la-me̩ bie̩ ku me̩ la da ojibo kʼi biu e̩wñʼka, kʼame̩ la fʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ che eju Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ nyʼu uwe̩do̩;

nado̩ efojale kpai ile̩-i ku ma gba ibenu nyʼume̩ eñini-i, ka kʼelenyo̩ ame̩ alenyo̩ bʼane̩ le̩ te̩ hioko faifai, owñ chʼugbo ku me̩ adaba Jo̩rdan anyi kʼame̩ ki ne̩ le̩; ame̩ akwojolugbo o̩mo̩ n, me̩ muda achile̩che̩ rinyo̩ hioko.
Jihofa la akpa me̩ tuka rʼef amone̩ amone̩, tak ame̩ abo rere ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ugbo ki Jihofa ane̩ me̩ nyi.
O̩mo̩ me̩ la are̩ amo̩jo̩ oli kpai okuta kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ che, e-kʼi ma la gane̩ n, i la gbʼo̩la n, i la aje̩ e̩wñ n, i la gbulu n.
Me̩ muda ajʼo̩mo̩ atejane̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, tak uwe̩ ali owñ, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼe̩ nʼe̩do̩-we̩ chaka kpai onugo-we̩ chaka tejane̩-wñ.
E̩gba kʼuwe̩ dʼef o̩pe̩cha-we̩, kʼe̩wñ-i du lewa bʼuwe̩ ma, e̩gba o̩jo̩ otitala, uwe̩ adabi wʼugbo Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ la anetiru omuko̩la-wñ,
todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, chʼO̩jo̩ kʼi ali ejumomi one̩; i adeyakpʼuwe̩ n, i la akpʼuwe̩ bie̩ rinyo̩ n, i agbenyo̩ alo kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩ le̩ n.

Todu e̩ natene o̩la o̩jo̩ ki lale fai ta, e-ki do̩mo̩ o̩gba taku ma bi we̩, akwe̩gba kʼO̩jo̩ nyi one̩ ile̩-i, e̩ natene kwo ukpoji ojaleʼka gbogbo tʼukpoji-wñ ekeji, e̩wñ inaina e̩go̩-i do̩mo̩ mama me̩? abe̩ku ma gbʼinabali e̩wñʼka kʼi dab owñ?
One̩ gbo̩ omuko̩la O̩jo̩ kʼi dʼalumeji una ako̩la, alu kʼuwe̩ gbo̩ le̩, kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ deju ta?

Abe̩k O̩jo̩ʼka che kʼi nyʼako abo uche̩ichiʼka kwʼalumeji abo uche̩ichi omune̩, lugbo ejama, kpʼujiwe, kpʼe̩wñ uno̩ eche, kpai ogu eja, kpai o̩wo̩ ki gbiti, kpai o̩wo̩ kʼi nadala te̩, kpai e̩wñ ubailo inaina, alu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, che ñwu me̩ Ijipti eju-me̩ meji-i chaka?
Ma dʼe-le̩ ñʼuwe̩, kʼuwe̩ ki ma ka ki Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩; i nʼomune̩ tʼowñ le n.
I je̩ ñw e̩ gbo̩ omuko̩la-wñ kwʼefojale; todu kʼi kʼuwe̩ o̩la; i ño̩ je̩ ñw e̩ li una-wñ inaina ile̩-i, uwe̩ la gbo̩ o̩la kʼi ka alumeji una le̩.
Oñ todabu kʼi fe̩do̩ amata-we̩, i la mʼugbe̩-ma ko ñw o̩la-wñ ubi-ma ge̩, eju-wñ dʼane̩ oñ i nʼukpahiu-wñ ki nana dʼe̩ kwʼIjipti dufu,
i la fʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki wewe ki ño̩ gbiti tʼuwe̩ le ne dufu rʼo̩gba-we̩, kʼi dʼuwe̩ wʼejefu-i, kʼi mʼane̩-ma ko ñw e̩ kʼi mud e̩wñ ogu kʼe̩ je̩, alu ki de̩ eñini-i.
Todule̩ e̩ ki ma eñini kide̩, kʼe̩ la mʼu gba tʼe̩do̩, kakini, Jihofa, owñ le̩ chʼO̩jo̩ efojale ate̩-i, kpai ane̩-ile̩ o̩gane̩-i; omune̩ du do̩mo̩ n.
Todule̩ uwe̩ ki de uhio̩me̩-wñ kpai uko̩-wñ, kʼomi añwa ñw e̩ eñini-i, todu ki ra ñw e̩, kpai amo̩ma-we̩ ubi-we̩ ge̩, kʼuwe̩ ki kwojolugbo oj ane̩ e-ki Jihofa adu ñw e̩-i o̩jo̩ du.
Taku Mose̩s fʼewo me̩ta date̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu ejudaba Jo̩rdan,
todu kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi akpʼone̩ kʼi ra nyʼomo̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi fʼekeji-wñ kpa kʼi ma gwejugede n, kʼi ma la chʼulaka-wñ akwo ubi n, todu kʼi ra nyʼewo-iʼka kʼi deju.
Ewo le̩ che Bize̩r ane̩ egbili chʼutod abo Rube̩n, Ramo̩t-gilead chʼutod abo Gad, Golan Beshan la chʼutod abo Manasa.
E-i la chʼuko̩-o̩la ki Mose̩s ko jo̩ ñw abo Israe̩l;
abo-i chʼo̩la ibenu kpai uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ e-ki Mose̩s ka jane̩ ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l e̩gba ku ma kwʼ Ijipti dufu wa
ejudaba Jo̩rdan, ef o̩go̩ ki dʼiba Be̩t-peo̩r, oj ane̩ Siho̩n, onu abo Amo̩r, kʼi dodo He̩shbo̩n e-ki Mose̩s kpai amo̩ma Israe̩l gwo ma da, e̩gba ku ma kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu wa le̩.
Taku ma mʼane̩-wñ gba ku ma ne̩, kpai ane̩ O̩g onu Beshan, amonu abo Amo̩r ku ma jʼudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩;
akwo Aroe̩r, ki dʼotete ukpolo Amo̩n, gbogbo wa uwo Zayo̩n (e-le̩ che He̩rmo̩n),
manyʼo̩chaka ane̩ Araba kʼi dʼudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu, gbogbo wa ohimini Araba ki dʼe̩re̩ Pisga.
Taku Mose̩s nomudala do̩ abo Israe̩l chaka, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, O Israe̩l, me̩ gbo̩ o̩la uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ kʼu naka ñwu me̩ gbo̩ eñini-i, kʼame̩ ki ko̩che̩, ku me̩ la dejutʼo̩ ku me̩ che.
Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa fʼalo kpe̩ kpai awa Ho̩re̩b.
I chʼamata-wa oñ Jihofa kpʼalo-i kpai ama n, chai awa kʼudeju-wa chaka jʼemi eñini.
Jihofa kpai a me̩ kpejuru omune̩ i ko̩la ñwu me̩ oj uwo le̩ kwʼalumeji una le̩,
(omi dago agbagba Jihofa kpai ame̩ iko le̩, kʼu dʼo̩la Jihofa ka ñwu me̩; todu ame̩ chokpo una le̩, oñ me̩ ma te̩gu tʼoj uwo le̩ n). I kakini,
Omi che Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼi dʼuwe̩ kwʼane̩ Ijipti wa, kwef unyi adu le̩ dufu.
E̩ ki nʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ eju-mi n.
E̩ ki gbe̩ ojibo ñw o̩la-we̩ n, owñ chʼe̩wñ du ki biu e̩wñ ki dʼefojale ate̩, kpʼe-ki dʼile̩ o̩gane̩-i, kpʼe-ki dʼef omi o̩gane̩ ile̩-i n;
e̩ ki dojikane̩ ñwu ma n, e̩ ki re̩ ma n; todu omi Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, O̩jo̩ ajo̩gu u che, nadʼudu kʼamata-ma fe̩ nʼamo̩ma abo ku ma chʼulaka-mi oji, kpai oji abo o̩gba-ma e̩ke̩ta kpai e̩ke̩le̩;
u muda adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ñʼabo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ku ma fe̩do̩ mi ku ma la fʼuko̩ kʼu te̩ ñwu ma de.
E̩ ki dʼodu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ tʼalu ado̩ ofofo n: todu Jihofa adale ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼodu-wñ tʼalu ado̩ ofofo n.
E̩ ki fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi de kʼi fo̩, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ñwa ñw e̩.
O̩jo̩ me̩fa e̩ nache e̩wñ-we̩ kʼe̩ la fʼuko̩lo̩-we̩ du che;

o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ muda chʼo̩jo̩ uñmi ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; e̩ ki chʼuko̩lo̩ du o̩jo̩ le̩ n, tʼuwe̩ tʼo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩, tʼadu-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼadu-we̩ onobule̩, tʼo̩kokuno̩-we̩, tʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-we̩, tʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩-we̩ chaka, tʼilowa kʼi dʼef alaku-we̩, todu kʼadu-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai adu-we̩ onobule̩ ki ñmi alu kʼuwe̩ añmi.
E̩ ki la dibekado ka kʼuwe̩ chʼadu oj ane̩ Ijipti, taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ nʼo̩wo̩ e̩gbiti kpai o̩wo̩ kʼi nadala te̩ dʼuwe̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu; todule̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ñwa ñw e̩ kʼe̩ de o̩jo̩ uñmi.
E̩ ki bʼojima mʼata-we̩ kpai iye-we̩, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ñwa ñw e̩; todu kʼuwe̩ ki kwʼojolugbo, kʼi ra ñw e̩ oj ane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩-i.
E̩ ki kpʼone̩ n.
E̩ ki la te̩mʼo̩ya e̩ne̩ omune̩ n.
E̩ ki la joji n.
E̩ ki la gba ibenu o̩lemi nyʼekeji-we̩ n.

O̩ya ekeji-we̩ ki nyo̩ we̩ eju kʼe̩ ne̩ n; unyi ekeji-we̩ ki rʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ n, abe̩k uche̩-wñ, abe̩k adu-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, abe̩k adu-wñ onobule̩ abe̩k o̩kokuno̩-wñ, abe̩k o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ, abe̩k e̩wñ du kʼekeji-we̩ ne̩ n.

Jihofa dʼalumeji una kpai akpa kpai e̩chubi gbe̩m oj uwo le̩ ako̩la-i ñw abo ujeju-me̩ chaka; omuko̩la-wñ ka gbagada, i ño̩ bʼomune̩ tʼo̩ ge̩ n. Oñ i fʼu ko̩ rʼo̩la alo okuta meji, tak i mʼu ko ñwu mi.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku me̩ gbo̩ omuko̩la kwʼalumeji e̩chubi, kʼuwo le̩ najo, kʼame̩ te̩me̩ru mi, owñ chʼo̩chaka abo ku ma dʼoji dufu o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-me̩ kpai abogijo-me̩;
oñ me̩ kakini. Go, Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa mʼojima-wñ kpai unana-wñ du ña wa me̩, a la gbo̩ omuko̩la-wñ kwʼalumeji una le̩; a fuli eñini ka kʼO̩jo̩ ako̩la kpai one̩, oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ adeju kpo̩.
Todule̩ e̩wñ chi kʼa ñʼaku ge̩? todu una inaina-i afʼuwa liye̩; iche̩wñ kʼa ñʼagbo̩ omuko̩la Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa one̩de̩-i ge̩ mak eku a aku.
Todu e̩ne̩ do̩mo̩ ef o̩re̩la du, kʼi gbo̩ omuko̩la O̩jo̩ kʼi deju-i kʼi dʼalumeji una ako̩la alu kʼa gbo̩-i, kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ deju mama me̩?
Uwe̩ ki te̩me̩ru, kʼe̩ gbo̩ e̩wñ du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa aka, tak uwe̩ ki ka o̩la du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa aka ñw e̩ ñw a; tak a gbo̩, oñ a ache.
Jihofa la gbʼomu o̩la-me̩, e̩gba ku me̩ ko̩la ñwu mi le̩; taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Omi fʼomu o̩la kʼamone̩-i ka ñw e̩ gbo̩ me̩; e̩wñ du ku ma ka, o̩me̩me̩le̩ ma ka le̩.
O ef e̩do̩-ma ma dʼabe̩le̩, kʼama ki railo mi, ku ma fʼuko̩ du kʼu te̩ de o̩jo̩ du, todu ki ra ñwu ma kpai amo̩ma-ma tʼogbegbele̩!
Lo, kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mudabi nyʼef unyabo-me̩.
I muda chʼe-we̩, uwe̩ ki dago ugbo mi emi, tak u naka ñw e̩ uko̩ du kpai uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩, kʼuwe̩ ki ko̩ ma, kʼama ki che tʼeju-wñ ojane̩ kʼu nadu ñwu ma ku ma ne̩ le̩.
Todule̩ me̩ ki fejutʼo̩ ku me̩ che tʼeju alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ñwa ñwu me̩; ame̩ ki na tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n.
Ame̩ ki lule̩ o̩na du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ñwa ñwu me̩, todu kʼame̩ ki deju, todu ki la ra ñwu me̩, kʼame̩ ki kpojolugbo oj ane̩ kʼame̩ ane̩ le̩.
Uko̩ le̩ kpai uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ñwa ñwu mi kʼu ko̩ me̩ jo̩-i, kʼame̩ ki che tʼeju-wñ oj ane̩ ugbo ku me̩ adaba nyi ku me̩ ne̩ le̩;

todu kʼuwe̩ ki railo Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ fʼuhio̩me̩-wñ kpai uko̩-wñ kʼi te̩ ñw e̩ le̩ du de, owñ chʼe-kʼu nañwa ñw e̩-i, tʼuwe̩, tʼo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼaaju-we̩, o̩jo̩ du kʼojo̩lugbo-we̩ kade; todu kʼe̩ ño̩ kpojolugbo nana.

Todule̩ e̩ nagbo̩, O Israe̩l, kʼe̩ la fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ che tʼeju-wñ; todu ki ra ñw e̩, todu kʼame̩ ki wewe e̩kute̩, alu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-amata-we̩, katane̩ ñw e̩, owñ chʼoj ane̩ ugbo kʼomi e̩nya kpai iño̩ acha le̩.
O Israe̩l, gbo̩ ke: Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa che Jihofa okate;
uwe̩ ki la fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kpai ef e̩do̩-we̩ du kpai ef onugo-we̩ du kpai ukpahiu-we̩ chaka.
O̩la kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i ki gamʼe̩do̩-we̩;
oñ uwe̩ ki ka ka ño̩ ka ñw amo̩ma-we̩, kʼe̩ la nʼoluka-wñ ache e̩gba kʼe̩ guguane̩ ef unyi-we̩ kpai e̩gba kʼe̩ tʼej o̩na alule̩ kpai e̩gba kʼe̩ kwodachi kpai e̩gba kʼe̩ kwane̩.
Uwe̩ ki fʼu ji manyʼo̩wo̩-we̩ kʼi chʼujiwe, i ki la ache e̩wñ o̩gba oji kʼe̩ du manyʼagbagba igbegbeneju-we̩.
Uwe̩ ki la fʼu ko̩ nyʼoli alugbo̩na unyi-we̩, kpai o̩la e̩wñ kʼe̩ du re alaku-we̩.
Tak i awatu, e̩gba ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dʼe̩ wʼane̩ e-kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩, Ebraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Jeko̩b, kʼi adu ñw e̩, manyʼewo ewo ki nana kʼi nyo̩, e-ki ma chʼuwe̩ ko̩ n,

kpai unyi unyi ki che̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ du, e-ki ma chʼuwe̩ ko nyʼu tak i ko̩ n, kpai obuga ki chʼe̩gwa te̩, e-ki ma chʼuwe̩ gwa n, kpai uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai oli o̩lif, e-ki ma chʼuwe̩ gbe̩ n, kʼe̩ je̩ kefu,
e̩gbale̩ e̩ ki fʼo̩la-we̩ de tode̩gba kʼe̩ gbenyo̩ Jihofa kʼi mʼuwe̩ du kwʼane̩ Ijipti, kwef unyi adu le̩ dufu.
Uwe̩ ki railo Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, uwe̩ ki rʼo̩, kʼe̩ la nʼodu-wñ ago̩.
Ame̩ ki tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi n, owñ chʼamo̩jo̩ amone̩ ku ma lʼume̩ daka le̩;
todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼi dʼalumeji-we̩ le̩ chʼO̩jo̩ ajogu; tode̩gba kʼuwe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mutajo bʼuwe̩ ma, kʼi la fʼuwe̩ chile̩che̩ bʼeju ane̩-ile̩-i te̩.
Ame̩ ki la ji Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ma alu ku me̩ jʼowñ ma Masa le̩ n.
Me̩ ki nʼe̩do̩chacha ade uko̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ te̩ kpai o̩la ibenu-wñ kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ, e-kʼi ñwa ñw e̩ le̩.
Uwe̩ ki la che e̩wñ ki chʼo̩kpakpa kʼi ño̩ chenyo̩ eju Jihofa, todu kʼi ra ñw e̩, todu kʼuwe̩ ki nyʼo̩mo̩ kʼe̩ la ne̩ ane̩ ki nyo̩ ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-we̩
ka kʼi akʼame̩nebi-we̩ chaka e̩che̩ rʼo̩gba-we̩, alu ki Jihofa ka le̩.
E̩gba kʼo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼuwe̩ ene ejo̩gba-i kakini, E̩wñ chʼofe o̩la ibenu kpai o̩la uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa ñwa ñw e̩ ta?
E̩gbale̩ uwe̩ aka ñw o̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kakini, A chʼamadu Fero Ijipti; taki Jihofa nʼo̩wo̩ ukpahiu ko wa kwʼ Ijipti dufu wa;
Jihofa la dʼujiwe kpai uno̩ inaina kpai e-ki bie̩ne̩ ñe̩ña abʼoji Ijipti ma kpai abʼoji Fero ma kpai abʼoji abo unyi-wñ du ma, eju-wa;
oñ i mʼuwa ko kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu, todu kʼi ko wa wʼejefu-i, kʼi la dʼane̩ kʼi go̩ ñw amata-wa le̩ ñw a.
Taki Jihofa ñwa ñw a kʼa che tʼeju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-i chaka, kʼa railo Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa, todu ki nyo̩ ñw a o̩jo̩ du, todu kʼi fejute̩ wa kʼa deju, alu kʼa de̩ eñini-i,
Oñ e-le̩ achʼo̩kpakpa-wa iche̩wñ kʼa fejutʼo̩, kʼa che tʼeju uko̩-i du eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa, alu kʼi ñwa ñw a le̩.

E̩gba ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dʼuwe̩ wʼoj ane̩ ugbo kʼuwe̩ anyi kʼe̩ ne̩ le̩, kʼi la mʼabo uche̩ichi chi rinyo̩ bʼuwe̩ o̩gba te̩, owñ chʼabo He̩t kpai abo Girgash kpai abo Amo̩r kpai abo Kenan kpai Pe̩re̩z kpai abo Hifai kpai abo Je̩bius, amuche̩ichi amone̩ mebie ku ma wewe ku ma la ño̩ gbiti tʼuwe̩ le le̩,
oñ e̩gba ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼabo le̩ jo̩ ñw e̩, kʼuwe̩ la fʼuma gwoda; e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki ko ma jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko; uwe̩ ki kpʼalo okate kpai ama n, uwe̩ ki la li ejumomi-ma n.
Uwe̩ ki la ne̩ ma chʼo̩ya n, ama ki nʼabobule̩ e-me̩ n; uwe̩ ki dʼo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ kpʼo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, uwe̩ ki la ne̩ o̩ma-ma onobule̩ ñw o̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n.
Todu i arʼo̩ma-we̩ da bʼumi ubi te̩, kʼama ki re̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩: abe̩le̩ tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa ma atajo bʼuwe̩ ma, oñ i ma fʼe̩ chile̩che̩ piopio.
Ama abu kʼame̩ ache ama de̩: ame̩ ki gu ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-ma lo̩, ku me̩ la kpʼojibo-ma fo̩, me̩ ki fʼAshe̩rim-ma lo̩ rinyo̩, ku me̩ nʼuna gu ojibo-ma ku ma gbe̩ jo̩.
Todu uwe̩ chʼamone̩ ki afo̩ todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ fʼuwe̩ chi kʼe̩ chʼamone̩ kʼowñ onugo ane̩, kwef amone̩ du ku ma jo̩ ile̩-i.
E̩do̩ Jihofa la gamʼume̩ kʼi la fʼume̩ chi ñw o̩la-wñ, ukpe̩ ku me̩ wewe tʼamone̩ du le n; todu uwewe-me̩ nya tʼamone̩ du le;
chai todabu ki Jihofa afe̩do̩ me̩, kpai todabu kʼi ade o̩la kʼi go̩ ñw amata-me̩, todule̩ Jihofa nʼo̩wo̩ e̩gbiti ko me̩ dufu wa-i, oñ i fʼume̩ la kwef unyi adu tane̩, kwef o̩wo̩ Fero onu Ijipti.

Todule̩ uwe̩ ki ma ka ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, O̩jo̩ owñ che, O̩jo̩ kʼi achubi one̩, e-kʼi ade alo kʼi kpe̩ kpai ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ugbo abo ku ma fe̩do̩ owñ, ku ma la de uko̩-wñ, gbogbo tʼo̩gba o̩gba icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩,
i la aro̩me̩ ñw abo ku ma chulaka owñ ejugede, owñ chʼeje̩ ñwu ma lenyo̩ rʼile̩; i ache̩du ugbo e̩ne̩ kʼi achutaka-wñ n, i aro̩me̩ ñw u ejugede.
