Todule̩ uwe̩ ki de uko̩ le̩ kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ kpai oji ajo̩ e-kʼomi ñwa ñw e̩ eñini, kʼe̩ che tʼeju-wñ.
Tak i awatu, iche̩wñ kʼame̩ netiru oji ajo̩-i, kʼame̩ fʼu de ku me̩ la che tʼeju-wñ maku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ade alo kʼi kpe̩ kpai ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩ kpʼuwe̩;

i afe̩do̩ we̩, i la adʼe̩nyo̩ ñw e̩, i lañʼaje̩ ñw e̩ wewe nyo̩gba; i ñʼade̩nyo̩ ñw ugbe̩ año̩la-we̩ kpai e̩ro ane̩-we̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩-we̩ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ etito̩ kpai e̩kpo-we̩ kpai amo̩ma amokuno̩-we̩ kpai unawo ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini, oj ane̩ e-kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩ ka kʼi adu ñw e̩.
Uwe̩ i ade̩nyo̩ ñw u tʼamone̩ du le; tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼonobule̩ kʼi chʼagaji adʼefu-me̩ n, i la adʼefu ame̩la-we̩ abe̩re̩me̩le̩ n.
Jihofa la akʼo̩ga du bʼe̩ o̩la te̩; i ñʼadʼo̩ga e̩bie̩ne̩ e-Ijipti okate e-kʼe̩ ma le̩, bʼe̩ ma n, i muda akʼo bʼabo ku ma chulaka-we̩ ma.
Uwe̩ ki la fʼamone̩ du e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ako nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ liye̩; e̩ ki li ejumomi-ma n; e̩ ki la re̩ amo̩jo̩-ma n; todu e-le̩ achʼoku ñw e̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ aka ef e̩do̩-we̩ kakini, Abo uche̩ichi-i nana tʼumi le, ab u nale kʼu nabʼuma gba e̩wñ-ma?
E̩ ki railo ma n: uwe̩ ki muda dibekado e̩wñ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ che Fero kpai abo Ijipti chaka,

owñ chʼajama inaina kʼeju-we̩ li le̩ kpai ujiwe kpai e̩wñ uno̩ kpai o̩wo̩ e̩gbiti kpai o̩wo̩ kʼi nadala te̩, e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ne̩ du we̩ dufu wa le̩; abe̩le̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ache amone̩ du kʼailo-ma aba me̩.
Anubile̩ ge̩, Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ñʼakpʼamanukpe uche̩ rʼefu-ma, gbogbo tak abo ki bo̩ ku ma kʼo̩la-ma maja ñwu me̩ ki lenyo̩.
E̩ ki chokpo ma n; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dʼalumeji-we̩, O̩jo̩ inaina kʼi abailo i che.
Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ la ako abo uche̩ichi le̩ ro̩ rinyo̩ bʼuwe̩ o̩gba te̩ pe̩pe̩pe̩pe̩; uwe̩ aneke fʼuma liye̩ e̩gbakate n, tode̩gba kʼame̩wñ iñmi oko awewe bʼuwe̩ ma.
Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ muda ako ma nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ tʼo̩gba-we̩, i anʼe̩wñ uchobi inaina dʼuma utu gbogbo taku ma chile̩che̩ rinyo̩ kpa.
Owñ la akʼamonu nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩, tak uwe̩ ki che kʼodu-ma ki lenyo̩ bʼo̩gane̩ efojale-i te̩; i anʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi aneke dago o̩gba-we̩ gbogbo tak e̩ fʼuma chile̩che̩ rinyo̩ kpa n.

Ame̩ ki nʼuna gu ojibo amo̩jo̩-ma ku ma gbe̩ jo: ajifa kpai o̩jamalia ki dʼo̩la-ma ki nyo̩ we̩ eju kʼe̩ ne̩ n, uwe̩ ki la agba ñw o̩la-we̩ n, tode̩gba kʼi amʼe̩; todu e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ i che ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
Uwe̩ ki la dʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ wʼef unyi-we̩ kʼuwe̩ ki mud e̩wñ ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ dab owñ n in; i ki chʼe̩wñ ulaka-we̩, kʼi la chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñw e̩; todu e̩wñ ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ i che.
Uko̩ du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i, ame̩ ki fejutʼo̩ ku me̩ che, kʼame̩ ki deju, ku me̩ wewe nyo̩gba, ku me̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ ane̩ ane̩ e-ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-me̩ le̩.

Uwe̩ ki la dibekado o̩na du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ te̩tane̩ we̩ le ef aje̩tachi-i o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji-i, kʼi che kʼi hi uwe̩ wane̩, kʼi jʼuwe̩ ma, kʼi ma e̩wñ ki dʼef e̩do̩-we̩, abe̩k uwe̩ jʼade uko̩-wñ, abe̩k uwe̩ aje̩ n.

Oñ i hi uwe̩ wane̩, i la je̩ ñw ebi kpʼe̩, tak i du mana e-kʼuwe̩ ma ma mama ta n ñw e̩ je̩, amata-we̩ la mʼo̩ n; todu kʼi je̩ ñw e̩ ma kakini, One̩ adeju lugbo uje̩wñ eje̩ kate n, chai lugbo o̩la du ki kwef alu Jihofa dufu oñ one̩ adeju.
E̩wñ o̩la-we̩ la gbo rʼuwe̩ o̩la n, e̩re̩-we̩ la wu n, gbogbo o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji-i.
E̩ ki ma ef e̩do̩-we̩, ka kʼalu kʼone̩ akʼo̩ma-wñ o̩la, alu le̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ akʼuwe̩ o̩la ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ki fʼuko̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ de, kʼe̩ le o̩na-wñ, kʼe̩ la railo ow ñ.
Todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adʼuwe̩ wʼoj ane̩ e-ki nyo̩, ane̩ ki nʼaji aji, kpai ugbo kʼomi abi kwef ane̩ dufu, kpʼomi ki nʼefu kʼi acha ef o̩go̩-wñ kpai oj uwo-wñ,
ane̩ o̩ka wit kpai barli kpai ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai oli o̩gbaikolo̩ kpai po̩me̩grane̩t, ane̩ oli o̩lif kpai iño̩ i che,
ane̩ ugbo kʼuje̩wñ ma ñʼe̩ eje̩ n, e̩wñ du añʼe̩ o̩mo̩ n, ane̩ kʼokuta-wñ chʼebije kʼuwe̩ la neke gwa ebije ikpa kwef uwo-wñ.
Uwe̩ la aje̩ kʼefu, tak uwe̩ akele Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ tod ane̩ ki nyo̩ kʼi du ñw e̩.
E̩ nafʼo̩la-we̩ de tode̩gba kʼe̩ gbenyo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, owñ chʼuko̩-wñ kʼe̩ ma de n, kpai oji ajo̩-wñ kpai o̩la uhio̩me̩-wñ, e-kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i:
tode̩gba, abu kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ je̩ kʼefu-we̩ ko̩, kʼe̩ la fʼunyi o̩me̩me̩le̩ ko̩, kʼe̩ kwogugu efu-wñ,
kpai e̩gba kʼamokuno̩-we̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini anana waa, kʼajifa-we̩ kpʼo̩jamalia-we̩ anana, kʼe̩wñ du kʼe̩ ne̩ anana nyo̩gba,
tak e̩do̩-we̩ kwane̩, kʼe̩ la gbenyo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼi dʼuwe̩ kwʼane̩ Ijipti, kwef unyi adu le̩ dufu,
owñ kʼi ne̩ we̩ le gu ef aje̩tachi inaina ki abailo le̩ du, kʼejo e-una, kpai akpe jʼo̩mo̩, kpai ane̩ alugbe̩ ugbo kʼomiofo ma de̩ n, owñ kʼi du omiofo kwef okuta o̩mu ñw e̩,
owñ kʼi du mana ñw e̩ je̩ ef aje̩tachi, e-kʼamata-we̩ ma ma n, kʼowñ ki hi uwe̩ wane̩, kʼi la jʼuwe̩ ma, todu kʼi nyo̩ ñw e̩ O̩jo̩ otitala-we̩.
Tode̩gba kʼuwe̩ aka ef e̩do̩-we̩ kakini, Ukpahiu-mi kpai o̩wo̩-mi ki gbiti oñ u du che e̩wñ anana-i ñw o̩la-mi.
Uwe̩ ki muda dibekado Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, todu owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼukpahiu ñw e̩ kʼuwe̩ ane̩ e̩wñ anana; todu kʼi fʼalo kʼi kpe̩ e-kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩ le̩ lonyane̩, alu ki de̩ eñini-i.
Oñ i awatu, i la che̩wñ kʼuwe̩ agba Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ nyo̩, kʼe̩ la lule̩ tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi, kʼe̩ re̩ ma, kʼe̩ la dojikane̩ ñwu ma, nagbʼibenu nyʼume̩ eñini kide̩ kakini, Elenyo̩ ame̩ alenyo̩ pioo.
Alu kʼabo uche̩ichi e-ki Jihofa naje̩ ñwu ma lenyo̩ rʼame̩ o̩gba de̩ alu le̩ ame̩ alenyo̩ ge̩; todabu ku me̩ ko̩ enetirʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩.
O Israe̩l, gbo̩ ke; uwe̩ adaba Jo̩rdan eñini, kʼe̩ nyʼejefu o̩mo̩, kʼe̩ bʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma nana, ku ma ño̩ gbiti tʼuwe̩ le gbʼane̩, ewo ewo ki nana, kʼaku-wñ te̩ kad ojale,
amokoro ki gbo̩gba, amo̩ma Anak le̩, e-kʼe̩ ma ma, kʼuwe̩ la gbo̩ inabali-ma kakini, E̩ne̩ neke bʼejafu amo̩ma Anak jo̩?

Todule̩ e̩ ki ma eñini kide̩, kakini, Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi atʼuwe̩ o̩gba daba, una ki afʼe̩wñ liye̩ i che; owñ le̩ afʼuma chile̩che̩, owñ ako ma dajane̩ o̩gba-we̩, oñ uwe̩ abʼuma gbʼane̩ le̩, kʼe̩ la aje̩ ñwu ma lenyo̩ rʼane̩ piopio, alu ki Jihofa ka ñw e̩ le̩.

Abu ki Jihofa mʼuma ko rinyo̩ bʼe̩ o̩gba te̩, e̩ ki ka ef e̩do̩-we̩ kakini, Todu o̩kpakpa e-mi oñ Jihofa dʼumi wa kʼu ne̩ ane̩-i n; abu ki chʼutodu e̩wñ ebita kʼabo uche̩ichi-i ache oñ Jihofa ane ma dufu bʼe̩ o̩gba te̩.

I chʼutodu o̩kpakpa e-we̩, abe̩k utodu o̩kpakpa e̩do̩-we̩, oñ uwe̩ anyi o̩mo̩ kʼe̩ nʼane̩-ma n; chai tod e̩wñ ebita kʼabo uche̩ichi-i che oñ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ane ma dufu bʼe̩ o̩gba te̩, todu kʼi je̩ ñw o̩la ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-we̩ lonyane̩, Ebraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Je̩ko̩b le̩.
Todule̩ uwe̩ ki ma kakini, I chʼutodu o̩kpakpa e-we̩ oñ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adʼane̩ ki nyo̩-i ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ne̩ n; todu uwe̩ chʼamone̩ ku ma fʼo̩lo̩ lo.
Ibe-we̩ ki kado, e̩ ki gbenyo̩ n, alu kʼe̩ nyi Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ uwe̩do̩ ef aje̩tachi le̩; akwo o̩jo̩ kʼuwe̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu, gbogbo taku me̩ wʼugbo kide̩, ame̩ te̩talañuru Jihofa.
Me̩ ño̩ nyi Jihofa uwe̩do̩ Ho̩re̩b ge̩, oñ Jihofa we̩do̩ rʼume̩, i tene kʼi fʼume̩ chile̩che̩.
Egba kʼu nyʼoj uwo kʼu gbʼalo okuta, owñ chʼalo e-alo ki Jihofa kpe̩ kpai ame̩ le̩, kʼomi la gugu oj uwo le̩ o̩ro̩ka o̩gbo̩ meji kpai odu o̩gbo̩ meji; u la je̩ e̩wñ n, u la ñmʼomiofo n.
Taku Jihofa mʼalo okuta meji e-kʼo̩mo̩wo̩ O̩jo̩ kʼolubutu nyʼu le̩ ko ñwu mi; oñ o̩la du ki Jihofa ko̩la ñwu me̩ oj uwo kwʼalumeji una o̩jo̩ ujeju le̩ chʼe̩ko̩ nyʼu.
Tak i lewatu, e̩gba kʼo̩ro̩ka o̩gbo̩ meji kpai odu o̩gbo̩ meji le̩ kpoji, taku Jihofa mʼalo okuta meji le̩ ko ñwu mi, owñ chʼalo e-alo kʼi kpe̩ le̩.

Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ gwo̩ru kwʼemi alo piopio; todu amone̩-we̩ kʼe̩ mʼuma ko kwʼIjipti dufu wa le̩ fʼo̩la-ma kpabie̩ me̩; ma hika muna bʼo̩na e-kʼomi ñwa ñwu ma te̩ piopio; ma fʼojibo da ñw o̩la-ma me̩.
Taku Jihofa ño̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, Omi fʼamone̩-i li me̩, go, amone̩ kʼo̩lo̩-ma chʼe̩lo ma che;
tʼumi no̩ kʼu nafʼuma chile̩che̩, kʼu fʼodu-ma kpalu bʼo̩gane̩ efojale-i te̩; tak u nadʼuwe̩ che uche̩ichi amone̩ ki nʼukpahiu kʼi ño̩ nana tʼama le.
Abe̩le̩ u murida, oñ u gwo̩ru kwoj uwo le̩ wane̩, uwo le̩ najo una; alo okuta meji kʼo̩la alo kʼi kpe̩ chʼe̩ko̩ nyʼo̩la-wñ la jʼef o̩wo̩-mi meji.
Tak u li, me̩ la go, ame̩ fʼadure Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ta e̩gbale̩ me̩; ame̩ fʼo̩mokuno̩ da ñw o̩la-me̩; ame̩ hika muna bʼej o̩na ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu me̩ te̩.
Tak u gwo̩nyu alo okuta meji le̩, oñ u fʼu rikpolo kwef o̩wo̩-mi meji, u la fʼu kpo̩fo̩ eju-me̩.

Tak u lewa bane̩ma o̩gba Jihofa o̩ro̩ka o̩gbo̩ meji kpai odu o̩gbo̩ meji dab e̩gba ejodudu le̩; u la je̩ e̩wñ n, u la ñmo̩ omiofo n, tod adure du ku me̩ ta le̩, abu ku me̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ che eju Jihofa, ku me̩ nyʼu uwe̩do̩.
Todu u railo uwe̩do̩ kpai uke̩do̩fulu e-ki Jihofa we̩do̩ rʼume̩, i tene kʼi fʼume̩ chile̩che̩. Jihofa muda ño̩ ne̩tirʼumi iko le̩ ge̩.
Ewe̩do̩ ki Jihofa we̩do̩ rʼAro̩n, i tene kʼi fʼu chile̩che̩; tak u ño̩ fʼo̩ko̩ gbabʼo̩ todu Aro̩n iko le̩ ge̩.
Oñ u mʼe̩wñ adure-me̩ du, owñ chʼo̩mokuno̩ ku me̩ da le̩, oñ u nʼuna fʼu gujo, tak u fʼu guche̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩ oñ u fʼu no̩ kʼi mud ebutu; tak u kʼebutu-wñ rikpolo bʼef aji ki acha kwʼoj uwo le̩ ma.
Oñ ugbo Tabe̩ra kpai Masa kpai Kibro̩t-hatafa ge̩, ame̩ ño̩ nyu Jihofa uwe̩do̩ ge̩.

Tak e̩gba ki Jihofa fu me̩ kpuche̩ akwo Kede̩sh-barnea, kʼi kakini, Me̩ mute̩gu nyʼagbʼane̩ e-kʼomi du ñwu me̩ le̩, me̩ ko̩ enetirʼo̩la ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ nʼalu-wñ ka ñwu me̩, me̩ la ko̩ edʼo̩la-wñ rʼochochi, me̩ laño̩ ko̩ egbʼomu-wñ gbo̩.
Ame̩ te̩talañuru Jihofa akwo o̩jo̩ kʼu ma me̩.
Abe̩le̩ oñ u lewa bane̩ma o̩gba Jihofa o̩ro̩ka o̩gbo̩ meji kpai odu o̩gbo̩ meji le̩, todabu ki Jihofa ka kʼi afʼume̩ chile̩che̩.
Oñ u rodubo̩ Jihofa, u kakini, O Ondu Jihofa, e̩ ki fʼamone̩-we̩ kpai e̩wñ ogu-we̩ chile̩che̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼuwe̩ nʼunana-we̩ gba tane̩, kʼe̩ laño̩ nʼo̩wo̩ ugbiti ko ma kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu wa le̩.
E̩ nadibekado amadu-we̩ Ebraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Jeko̩b; e̩ ki go ugbite̩re̩ amone̩-i kpai e̩wñ ebita-ma kpai adure-ma n,
tode̩gba kʼabo ane̩ ugbo kʼe̩ ko wa kwo dufu le̩ akakini, Todabu ku Jihofa ma neke ko ma wʼoj ane̩ e-kʼi katane̩ ñwu ma n, kpai todabu kʼi chulaka ma, oñ i mʼuma ko dufu wa kʼi kpa ma ef aje̩tachi-i.
Todu amone̩ e-we̩ kpai e̩wñ ogu e-we̩ ma che, e-kʼuwe̩ nʼo̩wo̩ e̩gbiti kpai o̩wo̩-we̩ ki nadala te̩ ko ma dufu wa-i.
Iko le̩ Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Fʼalo okuta meji gbe̩ ñw o̩la-we̩ dab e-ejodudu le̩, kʼe̩ lewa ugbo mi oj uwo-i, e̩ ki ño̩ fʼakpati oli che.
Tak u nako̩ o̩la ki jʼo̩la alo ejodudu kʼe̩ ko kpo̩fo̩ le̩ nyʼo̩la alo-i. Tak e̩ mʼu ko jʼef akpati le̩.
Abe̩le̩ u nʼoli akesia fʼakpati che, oñ u fʼalo okuta meji gbe̩ dab e-ejodudu le̩, tak u mute̩gu nyʼoj uwo, alo meji le̩ la jʼef o̩wo̩-mi.
Oñ i fʼO̩la me̩gwa le̩ ko̩ nyʼalo alu kʼo̩rubutu ejodudu le̩ de̩, owñ chʼe-ki Jihofa dʼef una oj uwo aka ñwu me̩ o̩jo̩ ujeju le̩; taki Jihofa mʼu ko ñwu mi.
Tak u murida gwo̩ru uwo le̩ wane̩, oñ u mʼalo le̩ ko jʼef akpati kʼu che le̩; o̩mo̩ i la jo̩ alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu mi.
(Abo Israe̩l kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩ akwo Birot Bene-Jakan nyi Mose̩ra. O̩mo̩ Aro̩n ku, o̩mo̩ ma dʼu ji; tak E̩leaza o̩ma-wñ nache e̩wñ atama koji owñ.
Akwo o̩mo̩ ma nyi Gudgoda; akwo Gudgoda ma la nyi Jotbata, owñ chʼane̩ ki chʼaji aji.
Iko le̩ Jihofa fʼo̩lo̩pu abo Lifai date̩ ku ma nʼakpati alo e-Jihofa kʼi kpe̩, ku ma ki dago jʼo̩gba Jihofa ku ma che e̩wñ ñw u, ku ma la de̩nyo̩ ñw one̩ ef odu-wñ, gbogbo tʼeñini.
Todule̩ oñ Lifai ma nʼukpe̩ abe̩k e̩wñ ogu kʼi je̩ kpai amo̩maye-wñ n; Jihofa chʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ka ñw u.)
Oñ u kpo̩kpe̩ oj uwo alu kʼu che e̩gba ejodudu le̩, o̩ro̩ka o̩gbo̩ meji kpai odu o̩gbo̩ meji. Jihofa ño̩ netirʼumi iko le̩ ge̩; i du Jihofa e̩do̩ kʼi fʼuwe̩ chile̩che̩ n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩-we̩ kʼe̩ tʼamone̩-i o̩gba, kʼama ki nyʼo̩mo̩ ku ma gba ane̩ kʼu go̩ ñw amata-ma ka kʼu nadu ñwu ma.

I la chʼifai, Israe̩l, e̩wñ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ atene ugbo we̩ kʼi ma chʼailo Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ era n? kpai elule̩ ej o̩na-wñ du kpai efe̩do̩-wñ kpai enʼe̩do̩-we̩ chaka kpai onugo-we̩ chaka che e̩wñ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩,
kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ ki Jihofa tʼuko̩ ñw e̩ kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ, e-kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i de todu ki nyo̩ ñw e̩ n?
Go, efojale kpai efojale e-efojale kpai ile̩ kpai e̩wñ du ki jʼefu-wñ, Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ne̩;
e̩do̩ Jihofa muda chʼelamʼamata-we̩ ef ufe̩do̩, oñ i mʼugbe̩-ma ko ñw o̩la-wñ ubi-ma, tʼamone̩ du le, owñ chʼame̩, alu ki de̩ eñini-i.
Todule̩ me̩ nakʼaño̩ ki bʼoji e̩pi e-e̩do̩-me̩ ma da, me̩ ki ño̩ fʼo̩lo̩ lo ge̩ n.
Todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ chʼO̩jo̩ e-amo̩jo̩ kpai Ondu e-amodu, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ inaina kpai e-e̩gbiti kpai e-ubailo, kʼi ma la nʼe̩nejuma n, kʼi ma la gbʼo̩ko̩ ugwa n.
Owñ nʼajo̩ o̩ma kʼi ma nʼata n kpai e-amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ eka, i lañʼafe̩do̩ ilowa kʼi akʼuje̩wñ kpai e̩wñ o̩la ñw u.
Ame̩ ki fe̩do̩ e̩ne̩ ilowa; todabu ku me̩ chʼamilowa ane̩ Ijipti le̩.
Uwe̩ ki railo Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; uwe̩ ki rʼo̩ kʼe̩ la jimʼowñ, uwe̩ ki la go̩ odu-wñ.
Owñ chʼuñwulo̩-we̩; owñ la chʼO̩jo̩-we̩ kʼi fʼe̩wñ inaina kpai e̩wñ ubailo-i kʼeju-we̩ onugo li che ñw e̩.
Amata-we̩ gwo̩ru nyʼIjipti kpai one̩ e̩te̩gwa; fai Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ la fʼuwewe-me̩ che ku me̩ dab awo ojale.
Todule̩ uwe̩ ki fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ la fʼe̩wñ ide-wñ de, kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ kpai oji ajo̩-wñ kpai uko̩-wñ o̩jo̩ du.
Ame̩ ki la ma eñini-i: todu i chʼamo̩ma-me̩ oñ nako̩la ñwu ma-i n, ma mʼo̩ n, ma li o̩la ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ko̩ me̩ n, kpai unana-wñ kpʼo̩wo̩-wñ ki gbiti kpai o̩wo̩-wñ kʼi nadala te̩,
kpai ujiwe-wñ kpai e̩wñ kʼi che Fero onu Ijipti alumeji ane̩ Ijipti le̩ kpai ane̩-wñ chaka;

kpai e̩wñ kʼi che abogu Ijipti kpai amanya-ma, kpai o̩ko̩ ogu-ma; alu kʼi je̩ ñw omi Ohimini Ekpikpa mucha abʼuma ma abu ku ma nʼume̩ ule, kpai alu ki Jihofa je̩ ñw oji-ma ki lenyo̩ gbogbo tʼeñini kide̩;
kpai e̩wñ kʼi che me̩ ef aje̩tachi gbogbo taku me̩ wʼugbo kide̩;

kpai e̩wñ kʼi che Detan kpai Abiram, amo̩ma Eliab, o̩ma Rube̩n le̩; alu kʼane̩pe̩te̩ mʼalu-wñ chi te̩ kʼi ño̩ mʼuma ko mi, manyʼabo unyi-ma kpai unyabo-ma, kpai e̩wñ du ki deju kʼi tʼuma ubi, o̩ge̩ge̩de̩ abo Israe̩l chaka;
todu eju-me̩ fʼuko̩lo̩ inaina du ki Jihofa che li me̩.
Todule̩ ame̩ ki de uko̩ du kʼu nate̩ ñwu me̩ eñini-i, kʼame̩ ki fʼukpahiu ne̩, ku me̩ nyʼejefu agba ane̩ ugbo ku me̩ daba anyi ku me̩ ne̩ le̩,
kʼame̩ ki ño̩ kpojolugbo oj ane̩ ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-me̩ ka kʼi adu ñwu ma kpai ugbe̩-ma, ane̩ kʼomie̩nya kpai iño̩ acha efu-wñ le̩.
Todu ane̩ ugbo kʼuwe̩ anyi kʼe̩ gba le̩ biu ane̩ Ijipti ugbo ku me̩ kwo wa le̩ n, ugbo kʼe̩ dʼe̩yo̩-we̩ gbe̩, tak e̩ nʼe̩re̩-we̩ che omiofo nyʼu, dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ uche̩ kwe̩ kwe̩ kwe̩;
ama ane̩ ugbo ku me̩ daba agba le̩ chʼane̩ uwo kpai o̩go̩, i añmo̩ omi kwef omi ojale,
owñ chʼane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ afejutʼo̩; eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kadʼo pioo, akwo uchane̩ o̩do̩ gbogbo tʼukpoji o̩do̩.
Oñ i awatu, iche̩wñ kʼame̩ anyʼuko̩ uko̩ kʼomi añwa ñwu me̩ eñini-i eti o̩gbali, ku me̩ fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, ku me̩ la rʼo̩ kpai e̩do̩-me̩ chaka kpai onugo-me̩ chaka,
mak owñ adʼomi ojale ane̩-me̩ wa iko-wñ, owñ chʼomi ojo̩do̩ kpai omi otitala; kʼuwe̩ ki kʼo̩ka-we̩ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ etito̩ kpai ekpo-we̩ wa unyi.
Oñ i akʼije̩ jʼoko-we̩ tod ame̩la-we̩ abe̩re̩me̩le̩, uwe̩ la aje̩ e̩wñ kʼefu-we̩ ako̩.
Ame̩ nafʼo̩la-me̩ de, tode̩gba ku ma gba me̩ ibe̩, kʼame̩ muna tʼo̩wo̩ʼka, ku me̩ chane̩ erʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ku me̩ la dojikane̩ ñwu ma,
kʼuwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼume̩ ma, kʼi la fʼo̩na ojale re, kʼomi ki we elo̩, tak ane̩ ñʼarʼo̩je̩ ge̩ n, kʼame̩ lenyo̩ bʼane̩ ki nyo̩ ki Jihofa adu ñwu me̩-i te̩ piopio.
Todule̩ ame̩ ki ko o̩la-mi-i jo̩ ef e̩do̩-me̩ kpai ef onugo-me̩; me̩ ki la fʼu ji manyʼo̩wo̩-me̩ ki chʼujiwe, i ki mud e̩wñ o̩gba oji-me̩ agbagba igbegbeneju-me̩.
Me̩ ki la dʼu ko̩ amo̩ma-me̩, e̩ ki nʼoluka-wñ ache e̩gba kʼe̩ gugu ef unyi-we̩ kpai e̩gba kʼe̩ dʼej o̩na alule̩ kpai e̩gba kʼe̩ dachi kpai e̩gba kʼe̩ kwane̩.
Tak uwe̩ ki dʼu ko̩ nyʼo̩la oli alugbo̩na unyi-we̩ kpai o̩la e̩wñ ku ma du re ajaku, alaku-we̩,
todu kʼojo̩lugbo-me̩ kpai ojolugbo amo̩ma-me̩ ki kpo̩kpe̩ oj ane̩ ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-me̩ ka kʼi adu ñwu ma, alu kʼukpo̩kpe̩ ojolugbo efojale ki dʼate̩ ñw ile̩-i de̩.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼame̩ de uko̩ du kʼu ñwa ñwu me̩-i kpaka, ku me̩ fʼu che, ku me̩ fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, ku me̩ tʼo̩na-wñ chaka ale, ku me̩ jimʼowñ,
mak e̩gba le̩ Jihofa anʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi-i chaka dufu bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩, oñ ame̩ abʼabo uche̩ichi ki wewe ki ño̩ gbiti tʼume̩ le gbʼane̩.
Ugbo du ku me̩ adʼadaba e̩re̩-me̩ tʼo̩ amud e-me̩; alu o̩me̩ ane̩-me̩ ate̩ kwʼaje̩tachi gbogbo wa Le̩bano̩n kpai akwo o̩la ohimini, owñ chʼohimini Yufretis, gbogbo wa kado ohimini e-olane̩ le̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi neke nʼe̩re̩ane̩ o̩gba-me̩ ade̩ n; Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ adʼe̩gahi-me̩ kpai ailo-me̩ abʼane̩ du ku me̩ dʼe̩re̩ tʼo̩ ma, alu kʼi katane̩ ñwu me̩ le̩.
Go, e̩nyo̩ kpai ama oñ omi ako jo̩ ñwu me̩ eñini-i:
iche̩wñ ku me̩ gbʼuko̩ uko̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ kʼu nañwa ñwu me̩ eñini-i gbo̩, mak e̩nyo̩ i che,
i muda che̩wñ kʼame̩ ma gbʼuko̩ uko̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ gbo̩ n, kʼame̩ la muna bʼo̩na kʼu nañwa ñwu me̩ eñini-i te̩, ku me̩ tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼame̩ ma mʼo̩ n ubi, mak ama i che ñwu me̩.
Oñ i awatu, e̩gba ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adʼuwe̩ wʼoj ane̩ ugbo kʼuwe̩ agudu nyi kʼe̩ gba le̩, mak uwe̩ ki dʼe̩nyo̩ le̩ gugu oj uwo Gerizim, oñ ama le̩ agugu oji uwo Ebal.
I chʼuwo le̩ jʼudaba Jo̩rdan ejano̩mo̩ o̩na kʼi le rʼo̩wo̩ olane̩, oj ane̩ abo Kenan ku ma dodo egbili ki kpejuru Araba, me̩ru Gilgal o̩la oli Ok e-More le̩ n?
Todu edaba me̩ adaba Jo̩rdan-i ku me̩ gudu nyʼo̩mo̩ ku me̩ gba ane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ adu ñwu me̩; ame̩ ki bʼuma gba ku me̩ la dodo jʼo̩mo̩.
Ame̩ ki la fejutʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩ chaka, kpai oji ajo̩ e-kʼu nako jo̩ o̩gba-me̩ eñini-i, ku me̩ che tʼeju-wñ.
E̩wñ-i chʼuhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ e-kʼame̩ afejutʼo̩ ku me̩ che tʼeju-wñ oj ane̩ ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-amata-we̩, adu ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ne̩, o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-me̩ kade ile̩-i.
Me̩ fʼugbo du kʼabo uche̩ichi ichi ku me̩ bʼuma gbʼane̩ le̩ are̩ amo̩jo̩-ma kpo̩fo̩ rinyo̩ hioko, owñ chʼoj uwo uwo ki gbo̩gba kpai oj otete otete kpai of oli emimi du:

ame̩ ki fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-ma gulo̩ wane̩, ku me̩ kpʼe̩wñ ku ma ko gwanyʼane̩ le̩ fo̩ nʼane̩, ku me̩ nʼuna gu Ashe̩rim-ma jo; ame̩ ki la lo̩ ojibo amo̩jo̩-ma ku ma gbe̩ wane̩, ku me̩ fʼodu-ma kpalu bʼugbo kide̩ te̩.
Ame̩ ki che abe̩le̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ n.
Me̩ ki muda tejane̩ ugbo ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ adu oj ane̩ abo o̩lo̩pu olo̩pu-me̩ kʼi du odu-wñ tʼo̩mo̩, ku me̩ fʼugbo kʼi agugu che o̩mo̩;

o̩mo̩ ame̩ anyi, o̩mo̩ me̩ la ako e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-me̩ wa kpai e̩wñ e̩bie̩-me̩, kpai ukpe̩gwa e̩wñ-me̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-me̩ ako nyate̩, kpai oji ku me̩ da kpai e̩wñ ku me̩ gʼe̩do̩la-me̩ ako wa, kpai amo̩mojo̩do̩ amokuno̩-me̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩-me̩ egini;
me̩ la aje̩ e̩wñ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ o̩mo̩, oñ ame̩ ayo̩ ef e̩wñ du ku me̩ dʼo̩wo̩-me̩ kado ache, owñ chʼame̩ kpai abo unyi-me̩, abu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ efu-wñ le̩.
Ame̩ ki che likpa e̩wñ du kʼa jʼemi ache eñini-i n, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ ki rʼo̩la-wñ eju n;
todu me̩ wʼef uñmi kpai e̩wñ ogu e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ako ñw e̩ ta n.
Ama e̩gba ku me̩ mu Jo̩rdan-i daba, ku me̩ kwogugu oj ane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ aje̩ ñwu me̩ je̩ le̩, kʼi la dʼuñmi ñwu me̩ bʼame̩ne̩bi-me̩ ku ma lʼume̩ daka-i du te̩, kʼame̩ la kwogugu to̩ko̩o̩,

e̩gbale̩ i awatu, ka kʼugbo ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ adu kʼi aje̩ ñw odu-wñ tʼo̩mo̩, o̩mo̩ oñ ame̩ ako e̩wñ du kʼu nañwa ñwu me̩ wa, owñ chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-me̩ kpai e̩wñ e̩bie̩-me̩ kpai ukpe̩gwa e̩wñ-me̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-me̩ ko nyʼate̩ kpai oji ku me̩ da, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ go̩ ka ku me̩ adu ñwu Jihofa.

Tak ame̩ ki jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, ayo̩, ame̩ kpai amo̩ma-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai amo̩ma-me̩ onobule̩ kpai amadu-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai amadu-me̩ onobule̩ kpai e̩ne̩ Lifai kʼi dʼef aku, aku-me̩ abu kʼowñ ma ne̩ ukpe̩ abe̩k e̩wñ ogu ugbo me̩ n.
E̩ nafʼo̩la-we̩ de kʼuwe̩ ki we eko e̩wñ e̩gujo-we̩ wa che ugbo du kʼeju-we̩ li;
chai ugbo ki Jihofa adu ef abo o̩lo̩pu-we̩ oka, o̩mo̩ uwe̩ ako e̩wñ e̩gujo-we̩ wa che, o̩mo̩ uwe̩ la ache e̩wñ du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩-i.

Uwe̩ muda neke kpa e̩la kʼe̩ je̩ ef aku aku-we̩ chaka, alu du ki rʼe̩ e̩do̩, likpa alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dʼe̩nyo̩ ñw e̩; abo kʼo̩la-ma daji kpai abo kʼo̩la-ma fe̩ neke je̩, alu ku ma je̩ egbi kpai abede.
Chai e̩bie̩-wñ kate oñ me̩ ma je̩ n; ame̩ ki la mʼu du dajʼane̩pe̩te̩ dab omiofo.

I nʼugbo kʼuwe̩ aje̩ ukpe̩gwa e̩wñ e̩yo̩-we̩ n, abe̩k e-omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ n, abe̩k e-ekpo-we̩ n, abe̩k e-amo̩mojo̩do̩ amokuno̩-we̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini n, abe̩k oji du kʼe̩ da n, abe̩k e̩wñ kʼe̩ gʼe̩do̩la-we̩ ako wa n, abe̩k e̩wñ eko nyʼate̩ e-kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ ako wa n.

Uwe̩ kpai o̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai o̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ kpai adu-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai adu-we̩ onobule̩ kpai e̩ne̩ Lifai kʼi dʼef aku-we̩ muda aje̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ugbo ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu; oñ uwe̩ ayo̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ef e̩wñ du kʼe̩ dʼo̩wo̩-we̩ kado kʼe̩ che.
E̩ ki fʼo̩la-we̩ de̩ kʼuwe̩ ki we ehi e̩ne̩ Lifai tinyo̩ oj ane̩-we̩ gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-we̩.
E̩gba ku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ fʼalo̩me̩-we̩ hi ubi, alu kʼi katane̩ ñw e̩ le̩, kʼuwe̩ akakini, Naje̩ e̩la, todabu ki arʼonugo we̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ je̩, uwe̩ ki je̩ e̩la alu du ki rʼe̩ e̩do̩.

Iche̩wñ kʼuña ugbo ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ du kʼi adʼodu-wñ tʼo̩mo̩ jiji rʼuwe̩ tabale, mak uwe̩ ki kpa amokuno̩-we̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini ki Jihofa ko ñw e̩ alu kʼomi ñwa ñw e̩-i; uwe̩ ki je̩ ejefu aku aku-we̩ alu du ki rʼonugo-we̩ e̩do̩.
Alu ku ma je̩ e̩la egbi kpai abe̩de, alu le̩ uwe̩ ajʼe̩; tʼe̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ daji, tʼe̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ fe̩ aje̩ okujo̩.
Uwe̩ ki muda hi alu mʼe̩bie̩-wñ kilikili n; todu e̩bie̩ le̩ chʼiñmi; uwe̩ ki la je̩ iñmi-wñ manyʼe̩la-wñ n.
Uwe̩ ki je̩ n; uwe̩ ki mʼu du dajʼane̩pe̩te̩ dab omiofo.
Uwe̩ ki je̩ n; todu ki ra ñw e̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ ubi-we̩ ge̩, owñ chʼabu kʼe̩ che e̩wñ o̩kpakpa eju Jihofa.
Uwe̩ ki muda mʼe̩wñ ki afo̩ kʼe̩ ne̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼe̩ doji-wñ ko, kʼe̩ nyʼugbo ki Jihofa adu,
kʼuwe̩ ki kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gu-jo-we̩, tʼe̩la-wñ tʼe̩bie̩-wñ wa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; ama ki la dʼe̩bie̩ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩-we̩ danyʼoj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ O̩jo̩-we̩, tak uwe̩ aje̩ e̩la-wñ.
E̩ fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ gbo̩ o̩la du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩-i, todu ki ra ñw e̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ ubi-we̩ ogbegbele̩, owñ chʼabu kʼe̩ nʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ kʼi chʼo̩kpakpa eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, ache.
E̩gba ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ fʼabo uche̩ichi ichi ko̩da bʼuwe̩ o̩gba te̩, owñ chʼugbo kʼuwe̩ anyi kʼe̩ bʼuma gbʼane̩ le̩, kʼe̩ bʼuma gba kʼe̩ la dodo oj ane̩-ma,

fʼo̩la-we̩ de, kʼe̩ we etʼoku ku ma du te̩ ñw e̩ tak abu ku ma fʼuma chile̩che̩ bʼe̩ o̩gba te̩ kʼe̩ ño̩ wʼuma che ge̩; kʼe̩ we etene e̩wñ amo̩jo̩-ma kakini, Abʼabo-i che amo̩jo̩-ma ta? Omi onugo ñʼache abe̩le̩ ge̩.

Uwe̩ ki che abe̩le̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ n; todu ma fʼe̩wñ du ki chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñwu Jihofa, kʼi achʼulaka-wñ, che ñw amo̩jo̩ e-ma me̩; i chaka chʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai amo̩ma-ma onobule̩, ma ko ma gujo ef una ñw amo̩jo̩ e-ma.
E̩wñ du kʼu nañwa ñwu me̩, ame̩ ki fejutʼe-le̩ ku me̩ che: e̩ ki bu tʼo̩ n, e̩ ki la bu wʼane̩ n.
Iche̩wñ kʼakache̩ʼka kwane̩ ef ume̩, abe̩k ano̩naʼka, kʼi la dʼujiwe abe̩k e̩wñ uno̩ʼka ñw e̩,
tak ujiwe abe̩k e̩wñ uno̩ kʼi ka ñw e̩ wache̩, tak i aka ñw e̩ kakini, Wa, kʼa tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼame̩ ma ma ma n ubi, kʼa re̩ ma,
uwe̩ ki netirʼo̩la akache̩ le̩ abe̩k ano̩na le̩ n; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ajʼume̩ ma le̩, kʼi ma abe̩k ame̩ fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ kpai e̩do̩-me̩ chaka kpai onugo-me̩ chaka.
Ame̩ ki lule̩ tu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ubi, ku me̩ la railo owñ, ku me̩ de uko̩ uko̩-wñ ku me̩ ki la gba omu-wñ gbo̩, me̩ rʼo̩ ku me̩ la jimʼo̩.

Tak ama ki dʼakache̩ le̩ abe̩k ano̩na le̩ kpa, todabu kʼi ko̩la erʼume̩ da ubi bi Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ kʼi mʼume̩ ko kwʼane̩ Ijipti, kʼi la mʼume̩ gba kwef unyi adu le̩ te̩, kʼi kʼe̩ e̩che̩ bʼo̩na ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ñwa ñw e̩ kʼe̩ lule̩ efu-wñ te̩. Abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ akʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ rinyo̩ bʼef ume̩ te̩.

Iche̩wñ kʼo̩maye-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼuwe̩ kpʼowñ nʼiye abe̩k o̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, abe̩k o̩ma-we̩ onobule̩, abe̩k o̩ya ki mʼe̩ e̩do̩, abe̩k onuku-we̩ kʼi dab onugo o̩la-we̩ ñw e̩, chane̩ egbʼe̩ ibe umaja maja, kakini, Lewa, kʼa nyʼache amo̩jo̩ omune̩, e-kʼuwe̩ tʼamata-we̩ ma ma ma n,
owñ chʼamo̩jo̩ amone̩ ku ma lʼume̩ daka-i, dagba ma me̩rʼuwe̩ dagba ma jʼo̩na jiji, akwo ukpoji ile̩ o̩wo̩ʼka gbogbo tʼotitala ile̩ o̩wo̩ ekeji,
uwe̩ ki je̩ n, e̩ ki la netirʼu n, e̩ ki liʼu ejumomi n, e̩ ki la do̩wo̩mʼo̩ n, e̩ ki la dʼu maja n;
chai ekpa e̩ dʼu kpa; o̩wo̩ e-we̩ akadʼo ejodudu e̩gba ku ma kpa, ubile̩ tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ chaka akadʼo.
Uwe̩ ki la kʼokuta ro̩ dʼo kʼi ku, todabu kʼi tene efʼuwe̩ fa ubi bi Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼi dʼe̩ kwʼane̩ Ijipti wa, kwef unyi adu le̩ te̩.
Tak abo Israe̩l du agbo̩, oñ ma arailo, taku ma ñʼache e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ abe̩le̩ alumeji-we̩ ge̩ n.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ dʼef ewo-we̩ʼka ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ du ñw e̩ kʼe̩ dodo o̩mo̩, kʼe̩ gbo̩ kakini,
Ame̩nebili iche̩ka kwʼalumeji-me̩ dufu, ku ma la fʼabo ewo-ma fa wʼubi, kakini, Lewa, kʼa nyʼare̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼame̩ ma ma ma n;
mak uwe̩ ki nitele-wñ, kʼe̩ la atejane̩, kʼe̩ tene o̩bie̩ o̩bie̩; e̩ la go, iche̩wñ ki dʼabe̩le̩, ka ku ma fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abe̩le̩ che alumeji-we̩ ochochi,
uwe̩ ki nʼalu ugbada gwo abo ewo le̩ da chuu, kʼe̩ la mʼu ko jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko, e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼefu-wñ kpai ame̩la-ma abe̩re̩me̩le̩, e̩ ki nʼalu ugbada che.

Tak uwe̩ ki mʼane̩ kʼogu le̩ je̩ kowa jʼalumeji ojukpologu-wñ, tak e̩ nʼuna gu ewo le̩ kpai ane̩-wñ chaka jo ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ hioko; oñ o̩mo̩ le̩ amud ugbudu dago ogbegbele̩, ma ñʼako unyi o̩mo̩ ge̩ n.
E̩wñ kʼe̩ kojo̩ le̩ e̩ dʼokate-wñ mʼo̩wo̩-we̩ alo n; todu ki Jihofa ki rida bʼe̩kpuna uwe̩do̩-wñ te̩, kʼi lʼuwe̩ ejumomi, kʼi mo̩la ñw e̩, kʼi la je̩ ñw e̩ wewe nyo̩gba alu kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩,
e̩gba kʼe̩ gbʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ gbo̩, kʼe̩ la fʼuko̩-wñ du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i de, kʼe̩ che e̩wñ ki chʼo̩kpakpa eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
Ame̩ chʼamo̩ma Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩; me̩ ki du e̩wñ fʼo̩la-me̩ na n, me̩ ki la fʼo̩gba oji-me̩ la o̩bo̩bo̩lo̩ re tod e̩ne̩ kʼi ku n.
Todu uwe̩ chʼamone̩ ki afo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, Jihofa la chi uwe̩ kwef amone̩ du ku ma bʼeju ile̩-ma, kʼe̩ chʼamone̩ kʼowñ kʼi ne̩.
Uwe̩ ki je̩ e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ du n.
Ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ e-kʼame̩ aje̩ de̩: okuno̩ kpai e̩wño̩re̩ egini, owñ chʼala kpai ewo,
kpʼabede kpai egbi kpai ate̩ kpai obalenyi kpai o̩wa kpai e̩lañwa kpai e̩fa.
E̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ du kʼetikpa-wñ chʼe̩kpana meji, kʼi atije̩, e-le̩ ame̩ aje̩.
Ef ame̩la ki atije̩, abe̩k e-kʼetikpa-wñ chʼe̩kpana abo-i oñ ame̩ ma aje̩ n: inyakulumi kpai adeji kpai ekili, todabu ku ma tʼije̩, etikpa-ma muda kpana n, ama chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩.
Kpai oko ge̩, todabu kʼetikpa-wñ chʼe̩kpana, i muda tije̩ n, owñ le̩ chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩. Ame̩ ki je̩ e̩la-ma n, me̩ ki la do̩wo̩kado oku-ma n.
E̩wñ kʼame̩ aje̩ ef e̩wñ du ki jʼef omi le̩ jo̩-i: ame̩ aje̩ e-du ki nʼugwomi kpai ikpe̩.
Ame̩ ki muda je̩ e-du kʼi ma la nʼugwomi kpai ikpe̩ n; e̩wñ elifo̩ i la che ñwu me̩.
Ame̩ aje̩ ame̩we̩ du ki fe̩.
Abo e-kʼame̩ ma la aje̩ ni de̩: ugbono kpai opupu kpai o̩re̩
kpai igo kpai okokolo, uche̩ uche̩-ma,
kpai o̩tagalama uche̩ uche̩-wñ okoke du,
kpai obijim kpai aja kpai ugu o̩lʼomi abadi kpai amuji uche̩ uche̩-ma du,
ogugu kpai ogugu omoko kpai ugo,
kpai o̩kpamadu kpai ugunu kpai anumure,
kpai utu kpai e̩je̩ uche̩ uche̩-ma; kpai apie̩pie̩ kpai ido̩.
Oñ e̩wñ du ki nʼika kʼi afa chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwu me̩; ma aje̩ abo e-le̩ n.
Ame̩we̩ du ku ma fe̩ ame̩ aje̩.

Ame̩ ki je̩ e̩wñ du kʼi ku rinyo̩ ofofo n; e̩ ki dʼu ñw ilowa kʼi dʼef aku-we̩, kʼowñ ki je̩, abe̩k e̩ mʼu du ta ñw akichi; todu uwe̩ chʼamone̩ ki afo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩. Uwe̩ ki hi o̩mala abe̩k o̩ma ewo ef omie̩nya iye-wñ n.
Uwe̩ ki fʼukpe̩gwa unawo ugbe̩ kpai ulu-we̩ kʼe̩ du gbe̩ oko-we̩ o̩do̩ o̩do̩ te̩re̩wa.

Uwe̩ ki la je̩ ukpe̩gwa e̩wñ e̩yo̩-we̩ kpʼe-omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ tito̩ kpai e-ekpo-we̩, kpai amo̩mojo̩do̩ amokuno̩-we̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini, eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, ugbo kʼi du kʼi je̩ ñw odu-wñ dodo o̩mo̩; todu kʼuwe̩ ki ko̩che̩ ailo Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ era o̩jo̩ du ki ñwa.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩mo̩ chʼe̩jiji rʼuwe̩ kʼuwe̩ ma neke ne̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ e̩gba ku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ n, todabu kʼugbo ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ du, kʼi adʼodu-wñ tʼo̩mo̩ chʼe̩jiji rʼuwe̩ tabale,
mak e̩ mʼe̩wñ ukpe̩gwa le̩ ko ta kʼe̩ fʼo̩ko̩ le̩ ji nʼo̩wo̩ kʼe̩ nyʼugbo ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ du le̩,

tak e̩ mʼo̩ko̩ le̩ ko la e̩wñ du ki rʼe̩ e̩do̩, abe̩k amokuno̩, abe̩k ame̩wño̩re̩ egini, abe̩k omi achiwebe̩te̩ma, abe̩k o̩te̩ una, e̩wñ du ki chi kʼonugo-we̩ bi we̩; tak uwe̩ ki je̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ o̩mo̩ kʼuwe̩ ki yo̩, uwe̩ kpai abo unyi-we̩.
Uwe̩ ki hi e̩ne̩ Lifai kʼi dʼef aku aku-we̩ tinyo̩ n, todu owñ nʼukpe̩ abe̩k e̩wñ ogu kʼi aje̩ kpai uwe̩ n.
E̩gba du kʼo̩do̩ mud e̩ta uwe̩ ki ko ukpe̩gwa unawo e̩wñ oko-we̩ dufu wa o̩do̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, kʼuwe̩ ki ko ne jʼef aku aku-we̩;

tak abu kʼe̩ne̩ Lifai ma nʼukpe̩ abe̩k e̩wñ ogu kʼi aje̩ kpai uwe̩ n, owñ kpai ilowa kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi ma nʼata n kpai o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ku ma jo̩ ef aku aku-we̩ awa, ku ma je̩ kʼefu-ma ki ko̩; todu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ki de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ ef uko̩lo̩ du kʼe̩ nʼo̩wo̩-we̩ ache.
O̩do̩ mebie muda uwe̩ ki fʼuto̩no̩ che.
Alu kʼuto̩no̩ le̩ la ade̩ de̩: e̩ne̩ du ku ma je̩ o̩me̩ kʼi natʼe̩wñ kʼi me̩ ñw ekeji-wñ no̩ ñw u; i ki bi ekeji-wñ kpai o̩maye-wñ o̩me̩ le̩ n, todabu ku ma mʼuto̩no̩ e-Jihofa du kpogo me̩.
I chʼe-ononojo uwe̩ neke biʼu o̩me̩ kʼe̩ gba; e̩wñ-we̩ du ki la dʼugbo o̩maye-we̩ uwe̩ ki tʼo̩ no̩ ñw u.
I muda dukpe̩ kʼe̩nale du ki dʼef ume̩ n (todu Jihofa ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ oj ane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ogu-we̩ kʼe̩ ne̩),
e-le̩ kate, ku we̩ ki gbʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ gbo̩ ogbolo, kʼe̩ fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ che tʼeju uko̩ du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i.

Todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩, alu kʼi katane̩ ñw e̩, oñ uwe̩ ame̩ e̩wñ ñw abo uche̩ichi ichi wewe, uwe̩ muda ame̩ e̩wñ ugbo e-ma tak e̩ dʼe̩wñ hi o̩wo̩ n; uwe̩ anʼo̩da abo uche̩ichi ichi wewe, ma muda anʼo̩da e-we̩ n.

I che̩wñ kʼe̩nale dʼef ume̩, kʼi chʼo̩maye-we̩ʼka kʼi dʼef aku-we̩ʼka oj ane̩-we̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩, uwe̩ ki chʼo e̩do̩ kpako n, e̩ ki la fʼo̩wo̩ jugbe ñw o̩maye-we̩ kʼi chʼe̩nale le̩ n;
uwe̩ ki muda chi o̩wo̩ ñw u ofofo kʼe̩ me̩ e̩wñ ñw owñ ki bʼeku kʼi akʼu jo̩.

E̩ ki nago tode̩gba kʼibe bibi adʼe̩f e̩do̩-we̩ kʼe̩ kakini, O̩do̩ e̩kebie, owñ chʼo̩do̩ uto̩no̩ le̩, me̩rʼo̩wo̩ me̩, tak e̩ che eju bie̩ne̩ efu ñw o̩maye-we̩ kʼi chʼe̩nale, kʼe̩ ma la dʼe̩wñ du ñw u n; kʼi la raku do̩ Jihofa nyʼuwe̩ o̩la, ki mud adure eta ñw e̩.
Uwe̩ ki la ko ñw u ofofo, i ki wʼe̩ ab e̩ du ñw u n; todabu ki chʼutodu e̩wñ-i oñ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ ef uko̩lo̩-we̩ du kpai ef e̩wñ du kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ akado.
Todu ame̩nale awe ede̩ oj ane̩ le̩ n; todule̩ nañwa ñw e̩-i kakini, Uwe̩ ki chi o̩wo̩-we̩ ñw o̩maye-we̩ kpai e̩ne̩-we̩ kʼi chʼe̩no̩bata kpai ame̩nale-we̩ oj ane̩ le̩.
I che̩wñ ku ma dʼo̩maye-we̩, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Hibru abe̩k onobule̩ Hibru, ta ñw e̩ la, i arʼe̩ o̩do̩ me̩fa, tak o̩do̩ e̩kebie-wñ uwe̩ atʼo̩ no̩ kʼi ne̩ o̩la-wñ.
Oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ tʼo̩ no̩ kʼi lo ofofo, uwe̩ ki je̩ ñw u lo o̩wo̩ ofo n;
uwe̩ ki mʼame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini, kpai e̩wñ oji ajita ugwo̩ka-we̩ kpai e̩wñ aguo̩ko̩lo̩ e-omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ ko nyʼo̩la-wñ; alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñw e̩ alu le̩ uwe̩ ki du ñw u.
Uwe̩ ki nadibekado ka kʼuwe̩ chʼadu oj ane̩ Ijipti, taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ gbʼuwe̩ tane̩; todule̩ oñ nañwʼe̩wñ kide̩ ñw e̩ eñini-i.
I la che̩wñ kʼi ka ñw e̩ kakini, Na-kwo bʼe̩ te̩ n, todabu kʼi afe̩do̩ we̩ kpai abunyi-we̩, todabu ki ara ñw u ugbo we̩,
mak e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki mʼosipia du kʼe̩ dʼu gʼu eti du tunyu oli alugbo̩na, tak i amud adu-we̩ ogbegbele̩. Abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ ache adu-we̩ onobule̩ ge̩.

I ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼofu abʼe̩ eju-we̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ tʼo̩ no̩ kʼi kwo bʼuwe̩ te̩ ofofo n; todu i nʼile ñw e̩ dab one̩ meji ku ma ro̩me̩ uko̩lo̩ ñwu ma gbogbo wʼo̩do̩ me̩fa le̩. Abe̩le̩ taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ ef e̩wñ du kʼuwe̩ ache.

Uwe̩ ki che kʼamo̩mojo̩do̩ du kʼamokuno̩-we̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ e-gini abi o̩ko̩, ku ma fo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; e̩ ki nʼo̩mojo̩do̩ o̩kokuno̩-we̩ che uko̩lo̩ du n, e̩ ki la ja edudu o̩mojo̩do̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini n.
Eje̩ uwe̩ kpai abunyi-we̩ aje̩ e-le̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ o̩do̩ o̩do̩ ugbo ki Jihofa adu.
I muda che̩wñ kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩ kʼi achika, abe̩k i chʼafeju, abe̩k o̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ du dʼo̩la-wñ, uwe̩ ki dʼu kpa ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki fʼe-le̩ je̩ ef aku aku-we̩; tʼabo kʼo̩la-ma daji tʼabo kʼo̩la-ma fe̩ aje̩ okujo̩, alu ku ma je̩ egbi kpai abede le̩.
E̩wñ okate de̩, uwe̩ ki la je̩ e̩bie̩-wñ n; uwe̩ ki mʼe-le̩ du dajʼane̩pe̩te̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼomiofo.
Fejutʼochu Abib, kʼuwe̩ ki fʼElaloji de ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; todu ef ochu Abib le̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mʼe̩ du kwʼIjipti dufu odu.
Uwe̩ ki kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini abe̩k amokuno̩ kwef ujo̩ wa akpa Elaloji ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ef uña ki Jihofa adu kʼi je̩ ñw odu-wñ dodo omo̩.

E̩ ki je̩ akala kʼo̩jo̩wu kpe̩gwanyʼu manyʼe-le̩ n; o̩jo̩ mebie oñ uwe̩ aje̩ akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu efu n manyʼu, owñ chʼakala e-o̩bata todu uwe̩ kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu wa unaju, unaju—todu kʼuwe̩ ki dibekado o̩jo̩ kʼe̩ kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-we̩ kade.
Ama ki la li o̩jo̩wu ugbo we̩ ejefu alo̩me̩ ane̩-we̩ du gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ mebie le̩ n; e̩la du kʼe̩ du kpa e̩gba ane̩ o̩jo̩ ejodudu le̩, abo̩ gbogbo nyʼodudu n.
I nʼugbo kʼuwe̩ akpa e̩wñ Elaloji le̩ ejefu alaku e-we̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ n;
chai ugbo ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu kʼi je̩ ñw odu-wñ dodo o̩mo̩, o̩mo̩ uwe̩ akpa e̩wñ Elaloji e̩gbʼane̩-wñ, abu kʼolu atunyʼane̩, iko kʼe̩ kwʼIjipti dufu wa le̩.
Uwe̩ ki la hiʼi kʼe̩ je̩ uña ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu; tak odudu-wñ uwe̩ arida kʼe̩ nyʼef unyabo-we̩.
Uwe̩ ki je̩ akala kʼo̩jo̩wu ma dʼo̩ n gbogbo o̩jo̩ me̩fa; o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ ma ada ujeju eju e̩kpa ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; uwe̩ ki che uko̩lo̩ du o̩jo̩ le̩ n.
E̩ nafʼo̩jo̩ mebie ugbo mebie kaluka jo̩; e̩ ki chane̩ o̩jo̩ mebie ugbo mebie le̩ ekaluka iko kʼe̩ chane̩ ekpa o̩ka-we̩ ababa.
Tak uwe̩ ki de uje̩wñ uyo̩ e-o̩jo̩ mebie ebie le̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, uwe̩ ki gʼe̩do̩la-we̩ kʼe̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩ atu wa alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩;

tak uwe̩ ki do̩mo̩ ayo̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, owñ chʼuwe̩ kpai o̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai o̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ kpai adu-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai adu-we̩ onobule̩ kpai e̩ne̩ Lifai kʼi dʼef aku aku-we̩ kpai ilowa kpai e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n kpai o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ku ma jʼefu-we̩ le̩, uña e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu kʼi je̩ ñw odu-wñ dodo o̩mo̩.
Uwe̩ ki la dibekado ka kʼuwe̩ chʼadu Ijipti; uwe̩ ki la fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ che tʼeju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-i.
Uwe̩ ki fʼuje̩wñ e-ebu emu de o̩jo̩ mebie e̩gba kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ-we̩ ko wʼunyi kwʼoj ajita ugwo̩ka-we̩ kpai kwef aguo̩ko̩lo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩;

uwe̩ ki la yo̩ ef uje̩wñ-we̩ le̩, tʼuwe̩ tʼo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ kpai adu-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai adu-we̩ onobule̩, kpai e̩ne̩ Lifai kpai ilowa kpai e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n kpai o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ku ma jʼef aku aku-we̩.

O̩jo̩ mebie uwe̩ ki de uje̩wñ uyo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ uña e-ki Jihofa adu; todabu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ ef unawo e̩wñ-we̩ chaka kpai ef uko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-we̩ chaka, oñ e̩do̩-we̩ abo̩ ogbolo.

Aboke̩le̩-we̩ chaka akwo jo̩ ejugede o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ uña e-kʼi adu le̩ onu me̩ta o̩do̩ʼka: owñ chʼoko uje̩wñ e-akala kʼo̩jo̩wu ma do̩ n, kpai oko uje̩wñ e-ebie ebie le̩, kpai oko uje̩wñ e-ebu emu le̩. Ama ki la jo̩ ejugede o̩gba Jihofa o̩wo̩ ofo n;
e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ akʼe̩wñ wa alu kʼo̩wo̩-wñ atu, alu kʼe̩nyo̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ du ñw e̩ de̩.
Uwe̩ ki chi amakajo̩ kpai amako̩takada jo̩ aku aku-we̩ du e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩, alu kʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-we̩ de̩; ama ki nʼajo̩ o̩kpakpa kʼajo̩ amone̩-i.
Uwe̩ ki rʼoji ajo̩ da n; uwe̩ ki nʼe̩nejuma n; uwe̩ ki gbʼo̩ko̩ ugwa n, todu o̩ko̩ ugwa akpa eju anibe fo̩, i la agu o̩la e̩no̩kpakpa ji.
O̩kpakpa e-o̩kpakpa uwe̩ atʼo̩ ubi, kʼuwe̩ ki deju, kʼe̩ jʼane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ le̩.
Uwe̩ ki dʼoli du gbe̩ ki chʼAshe̩ra kʼi me̩ru ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼuwe̩ ache le̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki la du ojibo kʼi chʼe̩wñ ulaka Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dago n.
Uwe̩ ki du o̩kokuno̩ abe̩k e̩wño̩re̩ egini kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩, abe̩k e-kʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ du dʼo̩la-wñ kpa ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ n; todu e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ oñ e-le̩ che ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
Iche̩wñ ku ma fʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa li ef ume̩ ef aku aku-we̩ du e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩, kʼi fʼalo-wñ daba,
kʼi la nyʼare̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩, kʼi dojikane̩ ñwu ma, abe̩k olu abe̩k ochu abe̩k e̩wñ ki jo̩ ojale wewe-i, e-kʼomi ma ñwa ñwu ma ku ma che n,
kʼe̩ne̩ʼka mudu ka ñw e̩, kʼuwe̩ la gbʼinabali-wñ; e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki tejane̩ o̩bie̩ o̩bie̩, e̩ la go, iche̩wñ ki chʼochochi, ku ma la ma o̩pio̩o̩ ka ku ma fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abe̩le̩ che Israe̩l,
mak uwe̩ ki dʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ kʼi fʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩-i che dufu wa alaku-we̩, tak uwe̩ ki dʼokuta ro̩ dʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ le̩ kʼi ku.
Alu ame̩nibenu meji abe̩k e̩ta achʼoka, taku ma dʼe̩ne̩ kʼi aku kpa; ama ki gbo̩ alu e̩nibenu okate ku ma dʼone̩ kpa n.
O̩wo̩ ame̩nibenu le̩ akadʼo ejodudu tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ du akadʼo ku ma dʼu kpa. Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ki kʼe̩bie̩ne̩ rinyo̩ bʼef uwe̩ te̩.

Iche̩wñ kʼo̩laʼka chi kʼoji ajo̩-wñ firu we̩ eka, dagba i chʼo̩la one̩ e̩kpa, dagba i chʼo̩la agbagba one̩ meji, dagba i chʼugbo e̩wñ e̩chʼomune̩, owñ chʼo̩la du ki chi ewo ewo-we̩ kʼi gbiti tʼuwe̩ le, e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki kwane̩, kʼe̩ mute̩gu nyʼuña e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu,
oñ abu kʼuwe̩ lewugbo amatama ku ma chʼabo Lifai, kpai ugbo akajo̩ kʼi ado̩mo̩ iko le̩, tak uwe̩ ki tene; tak ama afʼoji ajo̩-we̩ kpa ñw e̩.
Tak uwe̩ ki che teju alu ku ma kpʼoji o̩la le̩ ugbo uña e-ki Jihofa adu le̩; uwe̩ ki fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ che tʼeju o̩la du ku ma kʼe̩;
likpa alu ku ma ako̩ uwe̩ kpai tʼeju oji ajo̩ ku ma du te̩ ñw e̩, alu le̩ uwe̩ ache; e̩ ki rida bʼoji ajo̩ ku ma ka ñw e̩ te̩ n, e̩ ki na tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n.

Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi ajibenu, kʼi ma la nyʼatama kʼi dago ache e̩wñ o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ o̩mo̩ eti n, abe̩k i ma la gbʼe-kʼakajo̩ ka n, eku e̩ne̩ le̩ aku; abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ la akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ rinyo̩ bʼ Israe̩l te̩.
Tak amone̩-i du agbo̩, oñ ma arailo, taku ma ma ñʼajibenu abe̩le̩ ge̩ n.
E̩gba kʼuwe̩ lewa ane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼe̩ la ne̩, kʼe̩ dodo o̩mo̩, kʼuwe̩ akakini, Nadʼonu gugu kʼi ne̩ mi, dab abo uche̩ichi chaka ku ma lʼumi daka-i;
e̩ne̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ achi, owñ le̩ kate oñ uwe̩ adu jʼonu-we̩. E̩ne̩ʼka ef amo̩maye-we̩ oñ uwe adu jʼonu-we̩; i nʼugbo du kʼuwe̩ adʼononojo kʼi ma chʼo̩maye-we̩ n jʼonu-we̩ n.
Amanya-wñ ki muda wewe nyo̩gba n, i ki je̩ ñw amone̩ dabi nyʼIjipti ku ma tene amanya wewe ñw u n, todabu ki Jihofa ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki ño̩ dabi lʼo̩na o̩mo̩ ge̩ n.
Amo̩ya-wñ ki la wewe nyo̩gba n, kʼe̩do̩-wñ ki we erida tʼubi; i ki la ne̩ ajifa kpai o̩jamalia nyo̩gba ololo ololo n.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi kwogugu oj ede o̩fe̩-wñ, owñ ki nada uko̩-o̩la-i nyʼef o̩takada omune̩ ñw o̩la-wñ, i ki ko̩ teju e-kʼi dʼo̩gba amatama ku ma chʼabo Lifai le̩;
e-le̩ la ade̩ ugbo-wñ, i la achʼo̩kalatu-wñ o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-wñ kade, todu kʼi ko̩che̩ ailo Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ era, kʼi fʼuko̩-o̩la-i du kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ de, kʼi che tʼeju-wñ;
kʼi we ehio̩la-wñ ne tʼamo̩maye-wñ le, kʼi la we ena bʼuko̩ le̩ te̩, tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ tʼo̩wo̩ awohi; todu kʼi kpojolugbo ef o̩fe̩-wñ, owñ kpai amo̩ma-wñ, alumeji Israe̩l.
Amatama, abo Lifai le̩, owñ chʼabo o̩lo̩pu Lifai chaka, anʼukpe̩ abe̩k e̩wñ ogu ku ma aje̩ manyʼabo Israe̩l in; ama aje̩ e̩wñ ku ma ko wa ñwu Jihofa lugbo una, kpai e̩wñ ogu e-wñ.
Ama la a ne̩ e̩wñ ogu du ku ma aje̩ ef amo̩maye-ma n; Jihofa chʼe̩wñ ogu e-ma, alu kʼi ko̩la tane̩ ñwu ma le̩.

E̩wñ ki la chʼoji ajo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ du te̩ kʼamone̩ ako ñw amatama kwef e̩wñ ku ma ko wa che iche̩bo̩, dagba i chʼo̩kokuno̩ dagba i chʼe̩wño̩re̩ egini: ama ki kʼo̩wo̩-wñ meji kpʼiti meji kpʼukulu-wñ ñw atama.
Uwe̩ ako ejo̩ga oka-we̩ kpai e-omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ e-etito̩ kpai e-ekpo-we̩ kpai ejo̩ga edudu ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini ku ma ja ñw u.
Todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mʼowñ chi kwef abo o̩lo̩pu-we̩ du, kʼi dago ache e̩wñ ef odu Jihofa, owñ chʼowñ kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ o̩jo̩ du.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ Lifaiʼka kwʼef abo Israe̩l du ef aku-we̩ʼka ugbo du kʼi age̩ne̩ dufu wa kʼe̩do̩ onugo-wñ la kʼo̩ e̩che̩ kʼi wʼugbo uña e-ki Jihofa adu,
e̩gba le̩ i ache e̩wñ ef odu Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ, alu kʼamo̩maye-wñ chaka ku ma chʼabo Lifai ache, owñ chʼabo ku ma dago ache e̩wñ o̩gba Jihofa o̩mo̩.
Ama la anʼukpe̩ e̩wñ eje̩ okujo̩, manyʼo̩ko̩ kʼi li ugbo e̩wñ amata-wñ kʼi ko ta.
E̩gba kʼe̩ lewa ane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩, uwe̩ ki ko̩che̩ kʼe̩ che e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ alu kʼabo uche̩ichi ichi o̩mo̩ ache n.
Ama ki li e̩ne̩ʼka ef ume̩ kʼi aje̩ ñw o̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k o̩ma-wñ onobule̩ kʼi le gu ef una du n, kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi abifa, abe̩k agegugile̩, abe̩k etikpo̩gu, abe̩k ochu,
abe̩k achifamu, abe̩k abo ku ma dʼiche̩kpa, abe̩k ake̩ma, abe̩k agomi,
todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi ache e̩wñ-i chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñwu Jihofa; i la chʼutodu e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-i oñ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ do̩mo̩ ane ma dufu bʼo̩gba-we̩ te̩.
Uwe̩ ki mufu eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
Todu abo uche̩ichi ichi kʼuwe̩ abʼuma gbʼane̩-i netirʼamagegugile̩ kpai amabifa; i muda chʼuwe̩, Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ je̩ ñw e̩ che abe̩le̩ n.
Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adʼakache̩ʼka kʼi dab omi kwane̩ ef amo̩maye-we̩ alumeji-we̩ ñw e̩—owñ le̩ me̩ anetiru—
alu kʼe̩ bi ugbo Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, Hore̩b, o̩jo̩ ujeju le̩, kʼe̩ kakini, E̩ ki ño̩ je̩ ñwu mi gbʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi ge̩ n, e̩ ki la je̩ ñwu mi li una inaina-i ge̩ n, todu kʼu we eku.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, E-ku ma ka le̩, o̩me̩me̩le̩ ma ka.
Nadʼakache̩ kʼi dab uwe̩ kwane̩ kwef amo̩maye-ma ñwu ma; tak u nadʼo̩la e-mi tef alu-wñ oñ i akʼe̩wñ du kʼu nañwa ñw u ñwu ma.
Oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi ma la gba o̩la-mi kʼi aka ef odu-mi gbo̩ n, omi atʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ene.
Akache̩ kʼi muda ajibenu akʼo̩laʼka ef odu-mi, e-ki ma chʼomi ñwa ñw u kʼi ka n, abe̩k i akʼo̩la ef odu amo̩jo̩ omune̩, eku akache̩ le̩ pitii aku.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ ka ef e̩do̩-we̩ kakini, Ab a le kʼa ama o̩la e-ki ma chʼiJihofa ka n?
E̩gba kʼakache̩ ko̩la ef odu Jihofa, iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ le̩ ma tʼo̩ ubi wa n, kʼi ma la che̩ n, mak e-le̩ chʼo̩la ki Jihofa ma ka n; akache̩ le̩ fʼibenu je̩ aka o̩la le̩, e̩ ki chokpo owñ n.
E̩gba ku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ akʼabo uche̩ichi ichi ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adʼane̩-ma ñw e̩ da rinyo̩, kʼe̩ la gbʼe̩gu-ma je̩, kʼe̩ dodo ewo ewo-ma, kpai ef unyi-ma,
uwe̩ ki fʼewo me̩ta date̩ ojoji ñw o̩la-we̩ oj ane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ne̩.
Uwe̩ ki ñw o̩na-wñ che ñw o̩la-we̩, kʼe̩ la fʼane̩-we̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ je̩ ogu kpe̩ me̩ta, todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki akpʼone̩ ki ra nyʼo̩mo̩.
Alu kʼo̩la e̩ne̩ kʼi kpʼone̩ tak i ra nyʼo̩mo̩ kʼi adeju ade̩ de̩. E̩ne̩ kʼi fʼekeji-wñ kpa alu kʼe̩wñ agbajiko kʼi ma ma n, kʼi ma la chʼulaka-wñ akwoubi n—
dab alu kʼone̩ anyʼefoko kpai ekeji-wñ alʼoli wane̩, kʼi nʼoli ada kʼe̩do̩ le̩ mukpe kʼi lewa nʼekeji-wñ kʼi leku—e̩ne̩ abe̩le̩ ara nyʼewo-iʼka, kʼi deju;

tode̩gba kʼakpo̩chi kʼe̩do̩fulu ranʼakpone̩ le̩, kʼi la fʼu mu todabu kʼugbo kʼewo le̩ de̩ chʼejiji, kʼi la adʼe̩wñ gwo kʼi ku; oji ajo̩ ku ma du te̩ le̩ ka kʼi aku n, todabu kʼi ma chʼulaka-wñ akwoubi n.
Todule̩ nañwa ñw e̩-i, kakini, Uwe̩ ki fʼewo me̩ta date̩ ñw o̩la-we̩.
I la che̩wñ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ hi alo̩me̩-we̩ ubi, alu kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩ le̩, kʼi la mʼane̩ kʼi katane̩ kʼi adu ñw amata-we̩ ko ñw e̩ chaka—

iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ade kʼe̩ la che tʼeju uko̩ du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i, owñ chʼefe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ la lule̩ tʼo̩na-wñ o̩jo̩ du, mak e̩gba le̩ uwe̩ ki ko ewo me̩ta omune̩ manyʼabo me̩ta-i ñw o̩la-we̩,
todu kʼe̩bie̩ e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼudu n ki we edafo alumeji ane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ogu, todu kʼudu e̩bie̩ ki we enʼuwe̩ oji.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du nʼulaka ekeji-wñ ache, kʼi la kpala anede owñ, tak i kwane̩ tʼo̩ o̩la kʼi du e̩wñ gwʼo kʼi ku, kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ la ara nyʼef ewo-iʼka;
e̩gbale̩ abogijo ewo-wñ akpʼone̩ nyʼadʼu kwʼo̩mo̩ wa, oñ ma adʼu ñw akpo̩chi, todu kʼi ku.
Uwe̩ ki liʼu ejumomi n, uwe̩ ki dʼe̩bie̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi ma fʼudu n tinyo̩ bʼoji Israe̩l te̩, todu ki ra ñw e̩.
Uwe̩ ki chi oli alʼo̩me̩ ekeji-we̩ e-kʼabo igbele du dago oj ane̩ ogu kʼuwe̩ aje̩ tinyo̩ n, owñ chʼoj ane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ne̩.
E̩nibenu okate akwane̩ gbʼibenu nyʼe̩ne̩ du todu udu kʼi fe̩ n, abe̩ku todu adureʼka, ef adure du kʼi ta n; chai alu ame̩nibenu meji abe̩k e̩ta tak o̩la adago.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩nibenu o̩lachiʼka kwane̩ kʼi gbʼibenu nyʼone̩ tod udu kʼi fe̩;
e̩gbale̩ abo meji ku ma nʼuja le̩ adago o̩gba Jihofa, eju amatama kpai amakajo̩ ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ iko le̩;
tak amakajo̩ le̩ agwili-wñ o̩bie̩ o̩bie̩, i la che̩wñ kʼe̩nibenu le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ olemi, kʼi la fʼibenu olemi gba nyʼo̩maye-wñ;
e̩gbale̩ ame̩ ki chʼo, alu kʼi nibe ka kʼi ache o̩maye-wñ; abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ki dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ kwo bʼalumeji-we̩ te̩.
Tak abo ki bo̩ agbo̩, oñ ma arailo, taku ma ma ñʼache e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ abe̩le̩ alumeji-we̩ ate̩to̩gba-i ge̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki lʼejumomi-wñ n; oji akoji oji, eju akoji eju, enyi akoji enyi, o̩wo̩ akoji o̩wo̩, e̩re̩ akoji e̩re̩.

E̩ dufu kʼe̩ kʼogu bʼame̩ne̩bi-we̩, kʼe̩ la fʼamanya kpai o̩ko̩ ogu kpai amone̩ ku ma wewe tʼuwe̩ le li, uwe̩ ki railo ma n; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dʼugbo we̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼuwe̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa.
Oñ e̩gba ku me̩ te̩me̩rʼo̩la-me̩ ku me̩ jogu, atama ki te̩wa ako̩la ñw amone̩ le̩,
i la aka ñwu ma kakini, Neti, abo Israe̩l, ame̩ chane̩ ete̩wa eñini-i ku me̩ kʼogu bʼame̩ne̩bi-me̩; e̩do̩-me̩ ki da kpu n; me̩ ki railo n, o̩la-me̩ ki ga n, okpo-ma ki chi me̩ ofe n;
todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ale bʼume̩, kʼi kʼogu bʼame̩nebi-me̩ todu me̩, todu kʼi jadu me̩.
Tak amako̩takada ako̩la ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ do̩mo̩ kʼi fʼunyi tito̩ ko̩, kʼi ma bi o̩na-wñ ta n? I ki dabi tʼunyi-wñ, tode̩gba kʼi aku ef ogu-i, kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ abiʼi.
E̩ne̩ do̩mo̩ kʼi fʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma gbe̩, kʼi ma la jʼe̩ro-wñ ta n? I ki dabi tʼunyi-wñ, tode̩gba kʼi aku ef ogu-i, kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ jʼe̩ro-wñ.
E̩ne̩ do̩mo̩ kʼi atene o̩ya, kʼi ma la du wʼunyi ta n? I ki dabi tʼunyi-wñ, tode̩gba kʼi aku ef ogu-i kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ amʼu du.

Tak amako̩takada ñʼako̩la ñw amone̩ le̩ nyʼo̩gba ta, ma la aka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ do̩mo̩ kʼi achokpo, kʼe̩do̩-wñ muda kpu? E̩ne̩ le̩ ki mudabi tʼunyi-wñ, tode̩gba kʼe̩do̩ amo̩maye-wñ amuya alu kʼe̩do̩ e-wñ de̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼamako̩takada fʼoji o̩la eka ñw amone̩ le̩ kpa, tak ama ki chi amonu ogu ku ma chʼamagboji amone̩ le̩.
E̩gba kʼuwe̩ ate̩me̩ru ewo kʼe̩ kogu bʼo̩, mak e̩ fʼakoya o̩la ure̩do̩ ta ñwu ma.
I la che̩wñ kʼi dohi ure̩do̩ ñw e̩, kʼi mʼo̩na-wñ bi ñw e̩, e̩gbale̩ amone̩ du kʼe̩ ali efu-wñ amud abo ku ma rʼuwe̩ are̩, ku ma che e̩wñ ñw e̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼi ma jʼache e̩wñ ure̩do̩ kpai uwe̩ n, chai ogu ma tene eja kpʼuwe̩, mak e̩ kpala nyʼu;
tak e̩gba ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mʼu du tʼef o̩wo̩-we̩, uwe̩ ki nʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli kpa e̩ne̩ke̩le̩-wñ du,

ama abobule̩ kpai abo egini kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kpai e̩wñ du ki bo̩ jʼef ewo le̩, owñ chʼane̩-wñ du kʼogu je̩, e̩ ki mʼu ko chʼe̩wñ aluje̩; uwe̩ ki la mʼane̩ ame̩nebi-we̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ko ñw e̩ ko je̩.
Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ache ewo ewo du ku ma jʼo̩na jiji ñw e̩, e-ki ma chʼewo ewo abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi-i n.
I muda che ewo ewo amone̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ako ñw e̩ ki chʼe̩wñ kʼuwe̩ aje̩ ogu, uwe̩ ki jadu e̩wñ du kʼi añmiñmi kʼi deju n;
uwe̩ ki muda mʼuma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko, owñ chʼabo He̩t kpai abo Amo̩r kpai abo Kenan kpai abo Pe̩re̩z kpai abo Hifai kpai abo Je̩bius, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ñwa ñw e̩ le̩;
ku ma ki we eko̩ me̩ ku me̩ che likpa e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ku ma te̩tache ñw amo̩jo̩ e-ma chaka taku me̩ du Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ re.

E̩gba kʼe̩ fʼala kpa nyʼewo kpo̩kpe̩ kpo̩kpe̩ ku me̩ kʼogu bʼo̩ todu ku me̩ dʼu, e̩ ki dʼo̩kanyi ro̩ dʼoli-wñ kʼe̩ kpʼo̩ bie̩ n; todu e̩wñ kʼuwe̩ aje̩ i che, uwe̩ ki lʼo̩ wane̩ n. Oli oko le̩ chʼone̩ tak uwe̩ akpala nyʼu?
Chai oli kʼe̩ ma, ka kʼi chʼoli ku ma ma je̩ de̩ n, e-le̩ e̩ neke kpabie̩ kʼe̩ lo̩ wane̩; kʼe̩ mʼu ko keju tod ewo ki ajogu kpai uwe̩ le̩, gbogbo tak ewo le̩ mugulo̩ wane̩.
Iche̩wñ ku ma fʼoku one̩ ku ma kpa li oj ane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ne̩ le̩, kʼi tʼegbili ofo, ku ma ma ma e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼu kpa n,
e̩gbale̩ abogijo-we̩ kpai amakajo̩-we̩ adufu wa, ma la añwa ujiji-wñ akwo ugbo kʼoku one̩ le̩ te̩ le̩ nyʼewo ewo ki lʼe̩ne̩ ku ma kpa le̩ daka;
tak abogijo ewo ki me̩rʼe̩ne̩ ku ma kpa le̩ tule amagbadufu ole okuno̩ ku ma ma dʼu che uko̩lo̩ ta n, kʼi ma la nʼoli uno̩lo̩ kʼi afa e̩wñ mama ta ni du;
tak abogijo ewo le̩ adʼagbadufu ole okuno̩ le̩ wʼef o̩go̩ ugbo kʼomi ki acha de̩, ugbo ku ma ma luche̩ n ku ma ma la kʼe̩wñ gbe̩ o̩mo̩ n, oñ ma agu agbadufu ole okuno̩ le̩ o̩lo̩ che̩ ef o̩go̩ o̩mo̩.

Tak amatama ku ma chʼamo̩ma Aro̩n ate̩wa, todu ama chʼabo ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ chi ku ma che e̩wñ ñw u, ku ma laño̩ de̩nyo̩ ñw one̩ che̩ ef odu Jihofa; alu kʼo̩la-ma de̩ oñ ma akpʼoji iñwa du kpai uja eko bʼone̩.
Tak o̩chaka abogijo ewo ki me̩rʼe̩ne̩ ku ma kpa le̩ tule agwʼo̩wo̩-ma bʼagbadufu ole okuno̩ ku ma gu o̩lo̩-wñ che̩ ef o̩go̩ le̩ ma;
taku ma atohi kakini, I chʼo̩wo̩-wa dʼe̩bie̩-i dafo n, eju-wa la liʼu n.
O Jihofa fʼe̩wñ bʼe-le̩ ma ñwu Israe̩l, amone̩-we̩, e-kʼuwe̩ gba tane̩, e̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩bie̩ e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼudu n ki tʼalumeji Israe̩l, amone̩-we̩ n; taku ma atʼe̩bie̩ edafo le̩ no̩ ñwu ma.
Abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ adʼe̩bie̩ e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼudu n tinyo̩ bʼalumeji-we̩ te̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼe̩ che e̩wñ ochochi eju Jihofa.
E̩gba kʼe̩ dufu akʼogu bʼame̩ne̩bi-we̩, ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mʼuma ko nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩, kʼe̩ mʼuma ko chʼame̩namu alo,
kʼe̩ li onobule̩ ef ame̩namu le̩ kʼi fe̩reju ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ dʼu chʼo̩ya-we̩,
mak e̩gbale̩ e̩ ki mʼu du wʼunyi-we̩, tak i alʼoji-wñ kʼi fʼanyiga-wñ le.
Tak i akʼe̩wñ o̩la amu-wñ le̩ jʼane̩, bʼo̩la-wñ te̩, i la agugu ef unyi-we̩ kʼi daido̩ ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ ochu odukulu, ubile̩ tak uwe̩ anyʼejefu ugbo-wñ, kʼe̩ chʼo̩ko̩-wñ, kʼowñ ki chʼo̩ya-we̩.
Oñ i lewatu kʼi ma dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ n, e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki tʼo̩ no̩ kʼi nyʼugbo du kʼi rʼe eju; uwe̩ ki muda dʼu ta tod o̩ko̩ kilikili n, uwe̩ ki chʼo dabe̩ne̩ kʼadu n, todu uwe̩ fʼowñ kpabie̩ me̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ nʼo̩ya meji, kʼoka chʼo̩ya o̩maye kʼoka la chʼo̩ya o̩machi, kʼama meji la fʼo̩ma bi ñw u, tʼe-ufe̩do̩, tʼe-ulaka;

i la che̩wñ kʼo̩mo̩gba chʼe-e̩ne̩ ulaka le̩, mak e̩gba ki lewatʼo̩jo̩ kʼi akpʼane̩-wñ abu kʼamo̩ma-wñ aje̩ e̩wñ o̩gu-wñ i nʼugbo kʼi adʼo̩ma e-o̩ya ufe̩do̩ chʼo̩mo̩gba eju o̩ma o̩ya ulaka kʼi chʼo̩mo̩gba o̩gbo̩lo le̩ n,
i ki muda fʼeju mʼe-o̩mo̩gba ne̩, owñ chʼo̩ma o̩ya o̩machi le̩, kʼi ako ukpe̩ meji e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ ñw u; todu owñ chʼe̩ro ukpahiu-wñ ejodudu: oji ajo̩ kʼi du te̩ ka kʼowñ chʼo̩mo̩gba.
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ nʼo̩ma kʼi ma gbʼo̩la n kʼi chʼagbite̩re̩, kʼi ma jʼagbʼomu ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ gbo̩ n; dagba ku ma chaka kʼo̩ o̩la, i anyʼuma eti n,
mak ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ agwo̩nyʼu ku ma mʼu du dufu wʼugbo abogijo ewo-wñ, alaku ewo-wñ,
tak ama ki ka ñw abogijo ewo-wñ kakini, O̩ma-wa-i agbʼo̩la n, agbite̩re̩ i che, i jʼagbʼomu-wa gbo̩ n; achajefu kpai añmo̩te̩ i che.
Tak aboke̩le̩ ewo-wñ chaka akʼokuta ro̩ dʼo kʼi ku, abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ki dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ tinyo̩ bʼalumeji-we̩ te̩; tak abo Israe̩l du agbo̩, oñ ma arailo.
I la che̩wñ kʼone̩ fʼadure kʼoji ajo̩ ka kʼi bʼuku jo̩ ta, ku ma mʼu du kpa, kʼe̩ mʼu du lo̩ko̩li oj oli,
oku-wñ adʼoj oli le̩ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩ n, e̩ ki la mʼu du ji eñini eñini le̩ chuu; todu e̩ne̩ ku ma mudu lo̩ko̩li mak ama O̩jo̩ mu le̩; uwe̩ ki we edʼane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ogu ji.
Uwe̩ ki li o̩kokuno̩ abe̩k e̩wño̩re̩ egini o̩maye-we̩ kʼi achila tinyo̩ kʼe̩ fʼeju kpʼuma bo n; alu du ki chaka de̩, uwe̩ ki ko ma dabiwa ñw o̩maye-we̩ chuu.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩maye-we̩ le̩ ma me̩ru we̩ n, kʼe̩ ma la mʼo̩ n, e̩gbale̩ e̩ ki mʼu du wʼunyi e-we̩, oñ i adugbo we̩ gbogbo tak o̩maye-we̩ wa tene-wñ, tak uwe̩ ki mʼu du dabi wa ñw u.
Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ñʼache kpai o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ ge̩; abe̩le̩ uwe̩ la ache kpai e̩wñ o̩la-wñ; abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ki la che kpai e̩wñ o̩maye-we̩ du ki lenyo̩, kʼuwe̩ fʼu li; uwe̩ ki fʼe̩ya kpʼo̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki li kʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ abe̩k o̩kokuno̩ o̩maye-we̩ kʼi lewane̩ ej o̩na, kʼe̩ la fʼeju kpʼuma bo n; uwe̩ ki te̩kʼo kʼi ko ma kwane̩ chuu.
Onobule̩ ki dʼe̩wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼo̩la n, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ki la dʼe̩wñ onobule̩ tʼo̩la n; todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi ache e̩wñ abe̩le̩ chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ lewa ke̩re̩bʼunyi e̩we̩ oj oli abe̩k ane̩pe̩te̩, kʼo̩ma jʼefu-wñ abe̩k e̩ge̩, kʼiye-wñ dadʼoj o̩ma-wñ abe̩k e̩ge̩-wñ, uwe̩ ki dʼiye-wñ manyʼo̩ma-wñ n;
uwe̩ ki tʼiye-wñ no̩ kʼi lo-wñ, e̩ muda neke kʼamo̩ma-wñ; todu ki ra ñw e̩, kʼuwe̩ ki kpojolugbo.
E̩gba kʼe̩ fʼunyi etito̩ ko̩, mak uwe̩ ki fʼo̩gba bu nyʼo̩pata ojokunyi-wñ daka, tode̩gba kʼone̩ ñwa kwʼo̩mo̩ wane̩, kʼe̩ we efʼudu e̩bie̩ fa abʼunyi-we̩ ma.
Uwe̩ ki kʼulu ojoji meji gbe̩ ef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ n, tode̩gba kʼe̩ro-wñ chaka afo̩, tʼe-ulu kʼe̩ du gbe̩ le̩, tʼunawo uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ ge̩.
E̩ ki du o̩kokuno̩ kpai o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ jimʼomune̩ kʼe̩ ne̩ luche̩ n.
E̩ ki la kʼukpo kʼowu meji kpe̩gwa nyu bʼo̩la ma n, owñ chʼedudu ala kpai owu e-owu edama.
Uwe̩ ki du o̩jaja nʼukpo ubo̩-lama-we̩ ago̩go̩-wñ me̩le̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ fʼo̩ya ne̩, kʼi la nyʼejefu ugbo-wñ, kʼi chane̩ echulaka-wñ,
kʼi la dʼe̩wñ anyo̩ gwunʼo, kʼi je̩ ñw odu e̩bie̩ne̩ kwolamʼo̩ o̩la, kʼi kakini, Omi fʼonobule̩-i ne̩, tak e̩gba kʼu te̩me̩rʼu, u ke̩re̩bʼo̩ n;
e̩gbale̩ ata igbe̩le̩ le̩ kpai iye-wñ akʼe̩wñ ijali aga igbe̩le̩ le̩ dufu wʼalaku ugbo abogijo ewo le̩;
tak ata igbe̩le̩ le̩ aka ñw abogijo kakini, U mʼo̩ma-mi du ñw e̩ne̩-i kʼi chʼo̩ya-wñ, oñ i chane̩ echʼulaka-wñ;
me̩ la go, i du e̩wñ anyo̩ gwunʼo, i kakini, U ke̩re̩bʼo̩ma-we̩ n. E̩wñ-i la chʼijali aga o̩ma-mi. Taku ma afʼukpo le̩ nadala jʼo̩gba abogijo ewo le̩.
Tak abogijo ewo le̩ amʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ du ku ma kʼo̩ o̩la;

ma la abʼo̩ko̩ ajifa alu ejika ñw u, ku ma kʼe-le̩ ñw ata igbe̩le̩ le̩, todabu kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ je̩ ñw odu e̩bie̩ne̩ lamʼo̩ onobule̩ Israe̩l ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n o̩la: owñ le̩ la achʼo̩ya-wñ; i nʼugbo du kʼi adʼu tinyo̩ gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ n.
I muda che̩wñ kʼo̩la le̩ chʼochochi ku ma ma li ijali aga-wñ ugbo igbe̩le̩ le̩ n,

e̩gbale̩ ma adʼigbe̩le̩ le̩ dufu wʼalugbo̩na unyi ata-wñ, tak aboke̩le̩ ewo-wñ ako okuta ro̩dʼo kʼi ku, todabu kʼi fʼe̩wñtuñ che ane̩ Israe̩l, owñ chʼo̩ko̩ kʼi je̩ ef unyi ata-wñ; abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ rinyo̩ bʼalumeji-we̩ te̩.

Iche̩wñ ku ma fʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ li abu kʼi abʼo̩ya e̩nomune̩ dachi, e̩gbale̩ amamejeji ki ku, tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi bʼonobule̩ le̩ dachi, tʼonobule̩ le̩ ge̩; abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ rinyo̩ bʼIsrae̩l te̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼigbe̩le̩ kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, e-ku ma du kpʼo̩ko̩ do̩mo̩, kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka fʼu li ef ewo, kʼi bʼo̩ dachi,

e̩gbale̩ ame̩ ki ko amamejeji dufu wʼalaku ewo le̩, ku me̩ kʼokuta kpa ma, e-igbe̩le̩ le̩ chʼutodabu kʼi de̩ ef ewo kʼi ma la kwa n, oñ e-e̩ne̩ke̩ke̩le̩ le̩ chʼutodabu kʼi fʼo̩ya ekeji-wñ kpabie̩; abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ rinyo̩ bʼalumeji-we̩ te̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ fʼigbe̩le̩ ku ma du kpʼo̩ko̩ li oko, kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ fʼu demane̩, kʼi la bʼo̩ dachi, mak e̩gbale̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi bʼo̩ dachi kate aku.
E̩ muda chʼigbe̩le̩ le̩ abu du n; adure ki bʼuku jo̩ dʼef igbe̩le̩ le̩ n; todu dabalu ki de̩ e̩gba kʼone̩ kwane̩ tʼekeji-wñ o̩la kʼi mʼu du kpa, abe̩le̩ o̩la-i de̩;
todu, i fʼu li oko, igbe̩le̩ ku ma du kpʼo̩ko̩ le̩ kwa i la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi ajadu-wñ n.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ fʼigbe̩le̩ kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n e-ku ma ma dʼu kpʼo̩ko̩ ta n li, kʼi la gwo̩nyʼu, kʼi bʼo̩ dachi, kʼone̩ lewa ke̩re̩bʼuma,
e̩gbale̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi bʼo̩ dachi akʼo̩ko̩ ajifa ooje wa ñw ata igbe̩le̩ le̩, tak i mud o̩ya-wñ todabu kʼi fʼu kpabie̩; i la nʼugbo du kʼi adʼu tinyo̩ mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ n.
One̩ ki ne̩ o̩ya ata-wñ n, i ki la chi ata-wñ ofe te̩ n.
E̩ne̩ kʼi chʼonoji dagba eikpa-wñ kpo̩fo̩, dagba i chʼeko ma kʼo, i ñʼagudu wʼef ujeju Jihofa n.
Agbabi agudu wʼef ujeju Jihofa n; gbogbo tʼo̩gba o̩gba-wñ e̩ke̩gwa e̩ne̩-wñ du agudu wʼef ujeju Jihofa n.
E̩ne̩ Amo̩n kpai e̩ne̩ Moab agudu wʼef ujeju Jihofa gbogbo tʼo̩gba e̩ke̩gwa-ma n, e̩ne̩ du efu-ma agudu wʼef ujeju Jihofa ogbegbele̩ n;

todabu ku ma ma nʼuje̩wñ kpai omiofo ledo me̩ ej o̩na e̩gba ku me̩ kwʼIjipti awa le̩ n, kpai todabu ku ma fʼo̩me̩ ra ñwu Belam, o̩ma Beo̩r, kʼi kwo Peto̩r e-Me̩sopotemia wa kʼi kobʼume̩ kʼi nama ñwu me̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ko̩ enetiru o̩la Belam; Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ muda rʼama le̩ da ki mud e̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩, todabu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ fe̩do̩ we̩.
Uwe̩ ki tene ki nʼure̩do̩ ñwu ma n, kʼe̩wñ ki ra ñwu ma o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-we̩ kade ogbegbele̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki hihie̩ne̩ e̩ne̩ Ido̩m in, todu o̩maye-we̩ i che; uwe̩ ki hihie̩ne̩ e̩ne̩ Ijipti in, todabu ku we̩ chʼilowa oj ane̩-wñ le̩.
Amo̩ma-ma kʼo̩gba-ma e̩ke̩ta abi agudu tef ujeju Jihofa.
E̩gba kʼe̩ dufu aruru ogu kʼe̩ tene eko̩bʼame̩nebi-we̩, e̩ ki fʼo̩la-we̩ de bʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du te̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka dʼefu-me̩ kʼo̩la-wñ ma fe̩ n lugbo e̩wñ ki gbajiko-wñ odu, mak i ki kwʼef uru le̩ dufu; i ki wʼef uru le̩ n;
ama i lewatʼe̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ adu, i ki fʼo̩la-wñ gwe̩ ef omiofo, e̩gba kʼolu tunyane̩, tak i awʼef uru le̩.
Uwe̩ ki laño̩ nʼuña ejo̩do̩da uru le̩ ugbo kʼuwe̩ adufu nyi;
e̩ ki la nʼuko̩che̩ ef e̩wñ ido̩na ogu-we̩; oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ nyʼagwʼe̩re̩ che̩, e̩ ki nʼuko̩che̩ le̩ gwʼura, tak e̩ dabi fʼe̩wñ ki akwʼef uwe̩ dufu gbabo.
Todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ tʼale alumeji uru-we̩, kʼi gbʼuwe̩, kʼi la mʼame̩nebi-we̩ ko jo̩ o̩gba-we̩, uru-we̩ ki la fo̩, kʼi we eli e̩wñ ki ma chʼeju-wñ kʼi ali n ef uwe̩ kʼi muna bʼe̩ te̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki dʼadu kʼi ra bʼo̩wo̩ odu-wñ te̩ wʼugbo we̩ dabiwa ñw odu-wñ n;
i ki gugu ugbo we̩, alumeji-we̩ ugbo kʼi du kʼi gugu ef aku-we̩ʼka, ugbo ki rʼe eju tule; uwe̩ ki chʼo o̩bata n.
Onobule̩ kʼi nʼo̩ko̩ e̩je̩ achʼe̩wñ ucholo ode kʼi dʼef amo̩ma onobule̩ e-Israe̩l in, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi nʼe̩wñtuñ eche achʼe̩wñ ucholo ode kʼi dʼef amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-Israe̩l in.
Uwe̩ ki dʼuro̩me̩ o̩ko̩ eje̩, kpai o̩ko̩ ku ma du lʼabia wʼef unyi Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ ro̩me̩ oji kʼe̩ da n; todu e̩wñ-i mejeji chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
Uwe̩ ki me̩ o̩ko̩ ñw o̩maye-we̩ kʼi dʼo̩ko̩ ugwo̩la mʼo̩ n; dagba i chʼo̩ko̩ i me̩, abe̩k uje̩wñ abe̩k e̩wñ du kʼi me̩ ki nʼugwo̩la n.

Uwe̩ neke me̩ e̩wñ ñw ononojo kʼe̩ gbʼo̩ko̩ ugwo̩la, e̩ ki muda me̩ e̩wñ ñw o̩maye-we̩ kʼe̩ gbʼo̩ko̩ ugwo̩la n; todu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ki de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ ef e̩wñ du kʼe̩ dʼo̩wo̩-we̩ kado oj ane̩ ugbo kʼuwe̩ anyi kʼe̩ ne̩ le̩.
E̩gba kʼe̩ fʼoji da ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, e̩ ki che̩du era n; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ atene ugbo we̩ chuu; tak i mud adure eta ñw e̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ ko̩ edoji, e-le̩ achʼadure ñw e̩.
E̩wñ ki kwʼef alu-we̩ dufu uwe̩ ki fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ che teju-wñ; owñ chʼalu kʼe̩ dʼoji ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, alu kʼe̩ la gʼe̩do̩la-we̩ nʼalu-we̩ ka kʼuwe̩ adu ñw u.
E̩gba kʼe̩ wʼef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ekeji-we̩, uwe̩ neke je̩ e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩kʼefu, alu kʼi rʼe̩ eju, e̩ ki muda kʼe-du nyʼef e̩wñ eku-we̩ n.
E̩gba kʼe̩ wʼef uche̩ ekeji-we̩ ku ma ma kpa ta n, e̩ neke nʼo̩wo̩ jʼoji o̩ka da, uwe̩ ki muda dʼo̩be̩ kad o̩ka ekeji-we̩ e-ki dago jo̩ n.

E̩gba kʼone̩ fʼo̩ya ne̩ ku ma mamʼu du tʼunyi-wñ, e̩gbale̩, iche̩wñ kʼi ma li onobule̩ le̩ eju n, todabu kʼi fʼe̩wñʼka ki ma chʼeju-wñ n li o̩la-wñ mak i ki fʼo̩takada e̩daru ko̩ ñw u, kʼi dʼu tunyʼu o̩wo̩, tak i anʼo bʼef unyi-wñ te̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi kwo bʼef unyi o̩ko̩-wñ te̩, i neke nyʼanʼo̩ko̩ omune̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩ko̩ e-ubiane̩ chane̩ echʼulaka-wñ, kʼi la fʼo̩takada e̩daru ko̩ ñw u kʼi mudu tunyʼu o̩wo̩, kʼi la fʼu ne bʼef unyi-wñ te̩, abe̩k iche̩wñ kʼo̩ko̩ e-ubiane̩ ki nʼe̩ chʼo̩ya leku,

mak o̩ko̩-wñ ejodudu e-kʼi nʼo tinyo̩ le̩, neke dabi dʼu chʼo̩ya abu kʼo̩la-wñ daji le̩ n; todu e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa, uwe̩ ki la je̩ ñw adure ki dʼane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ du ñw e̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ogu n.
E̩gba kʼone̩ fʼo̩ya etito̩ ne̩, i ki tef abogu dufu n, ma ki la adu uko̩lo̩ʼka nʼo oji n; o̩wo̩-wñ atane̩ ofo o̩do̩ʼka unyi-wñ, kʼe̩do̩ o̩ya-wñ kʼi ne̩ le̩ ki bo̩.
E̩ne̩ du ki gba iye okuta abe̩k o̩ma-wñ uhio̩wo̩ n; todu oji one̩ oñ i ma gba uhio̩wo̩ le̩.
Iche̩wñ ku ma li e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi fʼo̩maye-wñ kʼi chʼabo Israe̩l oka ji, kʼi la chʼo dabe̩ne̩ kʼadu abe̩k i mʼu duta, mak ajoji le̩ ki ku; abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ akʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kwo bʼalumeji-we̩ te̩.
E̩ ki fʼo̩la-we̩ de ugbo atulubo̩ ikpemute, kʼe̩ fejutʼo̩ gbali kʼe̩ che teju alu du kʼamatama ku ma chʼabo Lifai ako̩ me̩; alu kʼomi ñwa ñwu ma le̩, alu le̩ ame̩ ki fejutʼo̩ ku me̩ che.
E̩ na dibekado e̩wñ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ che Miriam ej o̩na abu kʼame̩ kwʼ Ijipti awa le̩.
E̩gba kʼe̩ me̩ e̩wñʼka ñw ekeji-we̩, uwe̩ ki gudu wʼef unyi-wñ kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ uhio̩wo̩ gba kwʼo̩mo̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki dago o̩doda, tak e̩ne̩ kʼe̩ me̩ e̩wñ ñw u adʼe̩wñ uhio̩wo̩ dufu wa ñw e̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ chʼe̩no̩bata, e̩wñ uhio̩wo̩-wñ ki le̩ ñw o̩jo̩ ugbo-we̩ n;
e̩gba kʼolu tunyʼane̩ uwe̩ ki dʼe̩wñ uhio̩wo̩ le̩ dabi wa ñw u, todu kʼi kʼukpo-wñ le̩ bʼo̩la ma dachi, kʼi kadua ñw e̩; e-le̩ la achʼo̩kpakpa ñw e̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
Uwe̩ ki fʼe̩ne̩ uko̩lo̩ kʼe̩ rʼo̩me̩ ñw u kʼi chʼe̩no̩bata kpʼe̩nale demane̩ n, dagba i chʼo̩maye-we̩ʼka, dagba i dʼef amilowa ku ma jʼoj ane̩-we̩ ejefu aku aku-we̩;
uwe̩ ki rʼo̩me̩ ñw u o̩jo̩ kʼi che le̩, olu ki tunyane̩ ake̩re̩bʼo̩ n, (todu e̩no̩bata i che, i la kibenʼo̩ko̩ le̩); tode̩gba kʼi araku do̩ Jihofa nyʼuwe̩ o̩la, kʼi mud adure ñw e̩.
Ma ki kpa amata koji amo̩ma n, ma ki la akpa amo̩ma koji amata n; ma akpa e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ tod adure e-wñ.
Uwe̩ ki rʼoji ajo̩ e̩ne̩ ilowa da n, abe̩k e-e̩ne̩ kʼi ma nʼata n, e̩ ki la gba e̩wñ o̩la o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ uhio̩wo̩ n;
ama uwe̩ ki dibekado ka kʼuwe̩ chʼadu Ijipti, taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mʼe̩ gba kwʼo̩mo̩; todule̩ oñ nañwa ñw e̩ kʼe̩ chʼe̩wñ-i.

E̩gba kʼe̩ kpa e̩wñ oko-we̩ kʼe̩ gbenyo̩ oti o̩kaʼka tʼoko, e̩ ki dabi adʼu n; e-le̩ achʼe-amilowa, kpai e-abo ku ma ma nʼata n, kpai e-o̩yaukuo̩ko; todu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ki de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ ef uko̩lo̩ du kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ ache.
E̩gba kʼe̩ dʼe̩wñ gwo oli o̩lif-we̩ kʼe̩ro-wñ ki wane̩, uwe̩ ki dabi du e̩wñ gwo e̩to̩-wñ onukeji n; e-le̩ achʼutodu amilowa kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi ma nʼata nʼkpai o̩yaukuo̩ko̩.
E̩gba kʼe̩ kʼe̩ro uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩, e̩ ki dabi ko e̩fiye̩-wñ n; e-le̩ achʼutodu amilowa kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi ma nʼata n kpai o̩yaukuo̩ko̩.
Uwe̩ ki la dibekado ka kʼuwe̩ chʼadu oj ane̩ Ijipti, todule̩ oñ nañwa ñw e̩ kʼe̩ chʼe̩wñ-i.
Iche̩wñ kʼiñwa chi ñw one̩ meji, ku ma dʼo̩la-ma ajo̩, ku ma fʼajo̩-ma ka; mak ama ki dale ñw e̩no̩kpakpa, ku ma ki kpa e̩ne̩bibi abi.
I la che̩wñ ki dukpe̩ ku ma ja e̩ne̩bibi le̩, mak akajo̩ aje̩ ñw u kwodachi, ku ma fʼu ja edili alu ki chʼeju udu kʼi fe̩ eju-wñ.
Ma neke ja edili o̩gbo̩ meji, i ki tʼabe̩i le n; tode̩gba kʼeja-wñ atʼe-i le kʼo̩maye-we̩ mud e̩wñ e̩fule̩fu eju-we̩.
Uwe̩ ki fʼalita ga nyʼo̩kokuno̩ alu e̩gba ki do̩mo̩ agwʼo̩ka n.

Iche̩wñ kʼamo̩maye dodo kpai omune̩, kʼe̩ne̩ʼka efu-ma kʼi ma la nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n leku, maku ama ki dʼo̩ya e̩ne̩ kʼi ku le̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ewo aduña o̩do̩da ofo kʼi ne̩ n; o̩maye o̩ko̩-wñ ki nyʼejefu ugbo-wñ kʼi ne̩ chʼo̩ya-wñ, i la ache o̩wo̩ o̩maye o̩ko̩ ñw owñ.
Oñ i awatu, o̩ma ejodudu kʼi abi, ma adʼu rʼodu o̩maye-wñ kʼi ku le̩, kʼodu-wñ ki we elu bʼIsrae̩l te̩.

I la che̩wñ ki ma dʼe̩ne̩ le̩ e̩do̩ kʼi adʼo̩ya o̩maye-wñ n, e̩gbale̩ o̩ya o̩maye-wñ ate̩gu nyʼalaku ugbo abogijo, oñ i akakini, O̩maye o̩ko̩-mi ko̩ edu odu o̩maye-wñ kwane̩ Israe̩l me̩; i jʼache o̩wo̩ o̩maye o̩ko̩ ñwu mi n.
E̩gbale̩ abogijo ewo-wñ adʼo wa, ku ma ko̩la ñw u: i la che̩wñ kʼi gwo̩nyʼu kpaka kakini, I dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu ne̩ n;
e̩gbale̩ o̩ya o̩maye-wñ awʼugbo-wñ eju abogijo le̩, kʼi gwʼe̩da bʼo̩ e̩re̩ te̩, kʼi fiʼito rʼo̩ eju; oñ onobule̩ le̩ atohi kakini, Abu ku ma ache e̩ne̩ du kʼi ma kʼunyi o̩maye-wñ n i de̩.
Oñ abo Israe̩l adʼodu-wñ ko̩, Unyi e̩ne̩ kuma mʼe̩da-wñ gwo̩.
E̩gba kʼaboke̩le̩ kʼuja bʼomune̩ kʼo̩ya e̩ne̩ʼka-ma te̩wa kʼi gba o̩ko̩-wñ kwʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi akpʼo̩, kʼi fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala,
kʼi la gwo̩nyʼu eikpa, mak e̩ ki mʼo̩wo̩-wñ ko̩da tinyo̩, e̩ ki liʼu ejumomi n.
Uwe̩ ki ne̩ okuta ku ma ne̩ ñwa uwoji e̩wñ oj e̩bo̩ ojoji ojoji ef ikpa-we̩ n, owñ chʼe-ki nana kpai e-kekele n.
Uwe̩ ki ne̩ agbamgbam ku ma du ñwa e̩wñ ojoji ojoji ef unyi-we̩ n, owñ chʼe-ki nana kpai e-kekele n.
Okuta ku ma du ñwa uwoji e̩wñ ki mufu kpai e-ki chʼeju-wñ oñ uwe̩ ane̩, kpai e̩fa ki mufu e-ki chʼeju-wñ oñ uwe̩ ane̩ ge̩; todu kʼe̩ kwojolugbo oj ane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩.
Todu o̩chaka amone̩ ku ma chʼe̩wñ abe̩le̩ kpai o̩chaka amone̩ ku ma chʼe̩wñ uji, chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
E̩ nadibekado e̩wñ kʼAmale̩k chʼuwe̩ abu kʼame̩ kwʼIjipti awa le̩,
owñ chʼabu kʼi ledʼuwe̩ ej o̩na o̩mo̩, kʼi la fʼabo ku ma dʼe̩re̩-ma ubi kpa, e̩ne̩ du ki ma gbo̩ o̩la n, ku ma jʼubi-we̩ le̩, e̩gba kʼo̩la-we̩ chʼe̩da kʼuhia hiʼuwe̩ le̩; i la railo O̩jo̩ n.

Todule̩ i awatu e̩gba ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mʼuñmi du ñw e̩ bʼame̩ne̩bi-we̩ du ku ma lʼuwe̩ daka te̩ oj ane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ogu-we̩ kʼe̩ ne̩, uwe̩ ki fʼurewa Amale̩k kpalu bʼo̩gane̩ efojale te̩; uwe̩ ki gbenyo̩ n.
I lewatʼe̩gba kʼe̩ lewa oj ane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ogu-we̩, kʼe̩ la mʼu gba kʼe̩ dodo o̩mo̩,

e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki du kwef ejo̩ga e̩ro e̩wñ du kʼane̩ ako dufu, e-kʼuwe̩ ako wʼunyi kwef uche̩-we̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ le̩, tak uwe̩ ki mʼu ko nyʼagba, kʼe̩ lo tʼugbo ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu kʼi je̩ ñw odu-wñ dodo o̩mo̩.
Tak uwe̩ ki nyʼugbo atama kʼi ado̩mo̩ iko le̩, kʼuwe̩ ki ka ñw u kakini, Eka naka ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ eñini-i, ka kʼu lewa oj ane̩ ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-wa ka kʼi adu ñw a me̩.
Tak atama amʼagba le̩ gba bʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ te̩, kʼi la dʼu guane̩ o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.

Tak uwe̩ ki dohi eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kakini, Ata-mi chʼe̩ne̩ Siria kʼi le kʼi lenyo̩; i la gwo̩ru nyʼIjipti oñ i ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩, ma la wewe n; o̩mo̩ le̩ i la mud uche̩ichi amone̩ lile, ki gbiti, kʼamone̩-wñ chewewe.
Tak abo Ijipti chane̩ eche wa e̩bie̩ne̩, ma la fʼuwa dema, oñ ma dʼuko̩lo̩ adu ki gbiti nʼuwa oji.
Tak a raku do̩ Jihofa, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ amata-wa, oñ Jihofa gbʼomu-wa, i la li o̩bata-wa,
kpai akanya uko̩lo̩ kʼa che kpai ekpa wa ku ma kpa wa ma; taku Jihofa nʼo̩wo̩ ki gbiti kpai o̩wo̩ kʼi nadala te̩ kpai e̩wñ ubailo inaina kpai ujiwe kpai uno̩ ko wa kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu;
i la mʼuwa ko wʼugbo kide̩, oñ i dʼane̩-i ñw a, ane̩ kʼomi e̩nya kpai iño̩ acha efu-wñ-i.
E̩ la go, fai u mʼe̩jo̩ga e̩ro e̩wñ kʼane̩ ko dufu ko wa-i, owñ chʼe-kʼuwe̩, O Jihofa ko ñwu mi. Tak uwe̩ ki mʼu du gugu o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ la dojikane̩ o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩;
tak uwe̩ ki yo̩ ef e̩wñ ki nyo̩ du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ muko ñw e̩ kpai abo unyi-we̩, owñ chʼuwe̩ kpai e̩ne̩ Lifai kpai ilowa kʼi dʼefu-we̩.

E̩gba kʼe̩ fʼe̩kpe̩gwa unawo e̩wñ-we̩ chaka ra kpa o̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta le̩, kʼowñ chʼo̩do̩ ete̩re̩ e̩kpe̩gwa e̩wñ kʼe̩ la mʼu ko ñw abo Lifai kpai ilowa kpai abo ku ma ma nʼata n kpai o̩yaukuo̩ko̩, kʼama ki je̩ ef aku aku-we̩, kʼefu-ma ki ko̩,

tak uwe̩ ki ka eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kakini, U mʼukpe̩ e̩wñ ki afo̩ le̩ ko kwʼef unyi-mi me̩, u la mʼu ko ñw abo Lifai kpai ilowa kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi ma nʼata n kpai o̩yaukuo̩ko̩, tʼeju uko̩ du kʼe̩ te̩ ñwu mi; u daba uko̩-we̩ okate n, u la gbenyo̩ n;

u dʼe̩wñ du kwʼefu-wñ je̩ e̩gba kʼu do̩mo̩ adeku n, u nʼo̩la e̩daji-mi dʼe̩wñ le̩ maja n, u la bu kwʼefu-wñ tod abo ki ku n; u te̩tanetirʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi, u fʼe̩wñ du che i teju alu kʼe̩ ñwa ñwu mi le̩.
E̩ ki dʼunyi ugugu-we̩ ki afo̩ efojale le̩ agʼo̩gane̩-i kʼe̩ de̩nyo̩ ñw amone̩-we̩ Israe̩l kpai ane̩ kʼe̩ du ñw a, alu kʼe̩ go̩ ñw amata-wa, ane̩ kʼomi e̩nya kpai iño̩ acha efu-wñ-i.
Eñini kide̩ oñ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ añwa ñw e̩ kʼe̩ che teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-i kpai oj ajo̩-i; todule̩ uwe̩ ki fʼu de kʼe̩ che kpai e̩do̩-we̩ chaka kpai onugo-we̩ chaka.
Eñini-i uwe̩ ka ki Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩-we̩, ka kʼuwe̩ alule̩ tʼo̩na-wñ, kʼuwe̩ ade uhio̩me̩-wñ kpai uko̩-wñ kpai oj ajo̩-wñ, kʼuwe̩ la anetiru omu-wñ;
Jihofa laño̩ nʼo̩la-we̩ aka eñini kide̩ ka kʼe̩ chʼamone̩ todu kʼowñ kʼi ne̩, alu kʼi katane̩ ñw e̩ le̩, ka kʼuwe̩ ki de uko̩-wñ chaka,
ka kʼi ahiʼuwe̩ dago tatate̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi du kʼi che, ef uñwulo̩-we̩ kpai ef odu e̩nyo̩ ene̩, kpai ef ojima, ka kʼuwe̩ ki chʼamone̩ ki afo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, alu kʼi ka le̩.
Oñ Mose̩s kpai abogijo Israe̩l ñwa ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ fʼuko̩ du kʼu te̩ ñwu me̩ eñini-i de.
Oñ o̩jo̩ ku me̩ daba Jo̩rdan-i tʼoj ane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩, kʼuwe̩ ki mʼokuta lile ko dago jo̩, kʼe̩ nʼo̩bia fʼu kwo̩;

tak uwe̩ ki ko̩ orubutu uko̩-o̩la-i du nyʼo̩la okuta le̩, e̩gba kʼuwe̩ adaba kʼe̩ gudu tʼoj ane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩, owñ chʼane̩ kʼomi e̩nya kpai iño̩ acha efu-wñ le̩, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩ amata-we̩ le̩, katane̩ ñw e̩.
Tak i lewatʼe̩gba ku me̩ mu Jo̩rdan-i daba, kʼame̩ ki kʼokuta kʼu ñwa ñw e̩ eñini-i dago jo̩ oj uwo Ebal, tak uwe̩ ki nʼo̩bia kwʼo̩.
Tak uwe̩ ki fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ o̩mo̩, ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-okuta i ache; uwe̩ ki dʼe̩wñ ebjje du kadʼo n.
Uwe̩ ki nʼokuta odukulu nʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; e̩ ki la ko e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa che oji-wñ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩;
uwe̩ ki la fʼiche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ che kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ je̩ o̩mo̩; oñ uwe̩ ayo̩ o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
Uwe̩ ki la fʼo̩la uko̩-o̩la-i ko̩ nyʼo̩la okuta le̩ ejugede pee.
Taku Mose̩s kpai amatama, abo Lifai le̩, ka ñw abo Israe̩l chaka kakini, Me̩ chechi ku me̩ netirʼo̩la, O abo Israe̩l: Eñini kide̩ uwe̩ mud amone̩ e-Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
Todule̩ uwe̩ ki gbʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ gbo̩, kʼe̩ la fʼuko̩-wñ kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ de, owñ chʼe-kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i.
Taku Mose̩s ñwa ñw amone̩ le̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩ kakini,
E̩gba ku me̩ mu Jo̩rdan-i daba abo-i adago jʼoj uwo Gerizim ki ma kadua ñw amone̩: owñ che Simeon kpai Lifai kpai Juda kpai Isakar kpai Jose̩f kpai Be̩njamin.
Oñ abo-i adago jʼoj uwo Ebal tod ama ena le̩: owñ che Rube̩n kpai Gad kpai Ashe̩r kpai Ze̩biulo̩n kpai Dan kpai Naftali.
Tak abo Lifai adʼomu dago aka ñw aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka, kakini:
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi agbe̩ abe̩k i ada ojibo kʼi adʼu dago uña umaja, e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñwu Jihofa kʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼo̩ka uko̩lo̩ che! Tak amone̩ le̩ du adohi kakini, Ami.
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ rʼo̩che̩ke̩ne̩. Tak amone̩ le̩ du akakini. Ami.
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi hiʼoli uhio̩me̩ ane̩ ekeji-wñ wʼubi. Tak amone̩ le̩ du akakini, Ami.
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi je̩ ñw afeju la bʼo̩na te̩. Tak amone̩ le̩ du akakini, Ami.
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi rʼoji ajo̩ ilowa abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼi ma nʼata n, abe̩k o̩yaukuo̩ko da. Tak amone̩ le̩ du akakini, Ami.
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi bʼo̩ya ata-wñ dachi, todabu kʼi mʼago ofo ata-wñ du te̩. Tak amone̩ le̩ akakini. Ami.
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi bʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ dachi. Tak amone̩ le̩ du akakini. Ami.
Am ki mu e̩ne̩ kʼi bʼo̩maye-wñ onobule̩ dachi, i chaka chʼo̩ma ata-wñ abe̩k o̩ma iye-wñ. Tak amone̩ le̩ du akakini, Ami.
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi bʼiye o̩ya-wñ dachi. Tak amone̩ le̩ du akakini. Ami.
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi fʼekeji-wñ kpa maja. Tak amone̩ le̩ du akakini, Ami.
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi agbʼo̩ko̩ kʼi kpa e̩ne̩ kʼi ma fʼudu n. Tak amone̩ le̩ du akakini, Ami.
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi ma che teju uko̩-o̩la-i kʼi lonyane̩ n. Tak amone̩ le̩ du akakini, Ami.

I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ netirʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ gbali, kʼe̩ fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ che uko̩-wñ-i du, owñ chʼe-kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i, maku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adʼuwe̩ gugu atate̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi du ku ma jʼile̩-i le.
Tak e̩wñ e̩nyo̩-i du awa bʼuwe̩ ma, i la ara nʼuwe̩; e̩ ki netirʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dee.
E̩nyo̩ le̩ adʼugbo-we̩ ef ewo, i la adʼugbo-we̩ oko.
E̩nyo̩ la adʼugbo ugbe̩ ki kwʼaño̩la-we̩ kpai e̩ro ane̩ uche̩-we̩ kpai ugbe̩ ame̩la-we̩ abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kpai amo̩ma amokuno̩-we̩ kpai unawo ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini.
E̩nyo̩ la adʼugbo agba-we̩, kpai agu-we̩.
E̩nyo̩ adʼugbo-we̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ gudu wa, e̩nyo̩ la adʼugbo-we̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ edufu.
Jihofa akʼame̩nebi-we̩ ku ma kwane̩ tʼuwe̩ o̩la jo̩ ku ma gwo ma dajane̩ rʼo̩gba-we̩, ma alʼo̩naʼka wa akobʼuwe̩, oñ ma ara lʼo̩na mebie rʼo̩gba-we̩.
Jihofa añwa ñw e̩nyo̩ ki bʼuwe̩ ma ef aka aka-we̩ kpai ef e̩wñ du kʼe̩ du nʼo̩wo̩ kʼe̩ che; i la ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ oj ane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ade uko̩ uko̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ la lule̩ tʼo̩na-wñ, Jihofa afʼuwe̩ e̩re̩ lonyane̩ ñw o̩la-wñ kʼe̩ chʼamone̩ ki afo̩ alu kʼi go̩ ñw e̩ le̩.
Tak abo ile̩ du ali ka ku ma dʼodu Jihofa mʼuwe̩; ma la arailo we̩.
Oñ Jihofa akʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ o̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩ ef ugbe̩ año̩la-we̩ kpai ef ugbe̩ ame̩la-we̩ abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kpai ef e̩ro uche̩-we̩, oj ane̩ e-ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-we̩ kʼi adu ñw e̩.

Jihofa abi o̩na o̩pata-wñ ugbo kʼe̩wñ-wñ jo̩ kʼi chʼefojale ñw e̩, kʼi adʼomiojale ane̩-we̩ wa iko-wñ, kʼi la ade̩nyo̩ ñw uko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-we̩ du; uwe̩ la ame̩ e̩wñ ñw abo uche̩ichi ojoji wewe, e̩ muda ame̩ ugbo e-ma n.
Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ anetirʼuko̩ uko̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ e-kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i, kʼe̩ fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ che,

kʼe̩ ma la rida tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi bʼo̩la du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i te̩ kʼe̩ nyʼatʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi kʼe̩ re̩ ma n in, maku Jihofa adʼuwe̩ chʼoji, i la chʼotihi n; atate̩ kate uwe̩ la ade̩.

I muda awatu, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ ma je̩ netirʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ n, kʼe̩ ma la fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ che teju uko̩-wñ kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i n, mak e̩gbale̩ ama-i du abʼe̩ ma, i la ara nʼuwe̩ amʼe̩.
Ama adʼoji-we̩ ef ewo, ama la adʼoji-we̩ oko.
Ama adʼoji agba-we̩ kpai agu-we̩.
Ama amu ugbe̩ año̩la-we̩ kpai e̩ro ane̩-we̩ kpai amo̩ma amokuno̩-we̩, kpai unawo ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini.
Ama adʼoji-we̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ gudu wʼejefu, ama la adʼoji-we̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ dufu nyʼo̩do̩da.

Jihofa akpe̩ ama ki amʼone̩ kpai e̩wñ e̩gwuji kpai uka uche̩ wa kʼi bʼuwe̩ ma ef e̩wñ du kʼe̩ dʼo̩wo̩-we̩ kadʼo kʼe̩ che, gbogbo tak e̩ chile̩che̩ rinyo̩, kʼe̩ lenyo̩ o̩piopio; tod e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ ache, kʼe̩ ño̩ du mi tinyo̩ ge̩.
Jihofa aje̩ ñw e̩wñ ibi ki manyʼuwe̩ o̩la, gbogbo tak i fʼuwe̩ lie̩ bʼoj ane̩ ugbo kʼuwe̩ anyi kʼe̩ ne̩-i te̩.
Jihofa anʼo̩ga ire̩ kpʼuwe̩, kpai afu kʼi akpa one̩ kpai o̩la ekpa gaa kpai e̩wñ ki akpa dab una kpai omi eda kpai ikpe̩-tubi kpai e̩kpebu; e̩wñ le̩ la aranʼe̩ gbogbo tak e̩ lenyo̩.
Oñ efojale kʼi bʼuwe̩ oji ma ate̩-i achʼebije ikpa, ane̩pe̩te̩ kʼi dʼo̩gane̩ e̩re̩-we̩ la achʼebije.
Jihofa aje̩ ñw omiojale-we̩ kʼi mud omu ki akwu kpai ebutu; i la akwo efojale wa abʼe̩ ma gbogbo tak i fʼe̩ kpabie̩ rinyo̩.
Jihofa adʼuwe̩ te̩ ñw ame̩nebi-we̩ ku ma gwʼuwe̩ dajane̩ rʼo̩gba-ma; uwe̩ adufu lʼo̩naʼka aledo ma, tak uwe̩ ara lʼo̩na mebie rʼo̩gba-ma; ma anʼuwe̩ tʼemi tʼemi ojane̩ ojane̩ amonu du ile̩-i.
Oku-we̩ la amud uje̩wñ ñw ame̩we̩ ojale kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ile̩-i; i la anʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi anyʼuma okpo ku ma kwo bʼo̩ te̩ n.
Jihofa ane̩ ikete o̩ko̩ e-Ijipti le̩ gwʼuwe̩, kpai alido-wñ kpai ikwa kpai ifo̩ e-ki ma je̩ gbʼogu n.
Jihofa agwʼuwe̩ imu kpai eju efo̩ kpai awuwu ef e̩do̩-we̩;
uwe̩ la atache gogogo o̩ro̩ka alu kʼafeju ache gogogo ef e̩chubi e-wñ, o̩na-we̩ du ara ñw e̩ n; ma adʼe̩ mʼane̩, ma la adinya e̩wñ-we̩ o̩jo̩ du, i la anʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi agbʼe̩ n.
Uwe̩ atene o̩ya, oñ e̩ne̩ omune̩ la abʼo̩ dachi; uwe̩ ako̩ unyi, uwe̩ muda agugu efu-wñ n; uwe̩ adʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma gbe̩, uwe̩ muda akʼe̩ro-wñ che e̩wñ n.

Ma adʼo̩kokuno̩-we̩ kpa eju-we̩ meji, uwe̩ muda je̩ e̩la-wñ n; ma adʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-we̩ bʼuwe̩ eju te̩ afuma, ma la adʼu dabiwa ñw e̩ n; ma akʼame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini ñw ame̩nebi-we̩, i la anʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi agbʼe̩ n.
Ma ako amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ ñw abo omune̩; uwe̩ la akʼeju rʼo̩na, eju-ma la anʼuwe̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩; o̩wo̩-we̩ akoji O̩jo̩ n.
Abo uche̩ichi kʼuwe̩ ma ma n akʼe̩ro ane̩ le̩ du kpai akanya uko̩lo̩ du kʼe̩ che je̩; chai edʼe̩ mane̩ kpai efʼe̩ kpetili mane̩ oñ ma ajʼefu-wñ o̩jo̩ du.
Abe̩le̩ e̩wñ kʼeju-we̩ ali a gwʼuwe̩ imu.
Jihofa anʼikete o̩ko̩ ki ma agbʼogu n gwʼuwe̩ okuku kpai e̩re̩, akwʼadaba e̩re̩-we̩ gbogbo tʼakpe̩te̩ oji-we̩.
Jihofa adʼuwe̩ kpai onu e-kʼuwe̩ adʼu gugu kʼi nʼuwe̩ wugbo abo uche̩ichi kʼe̩ ma ma ma n, tʼuwe̩ tʼamata-we̩ ma ma n; o̩mo̩ tak uwe̩ are̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼi chʼoli kpai okuta.
Uwe̩ la amud e̩wñ awuwu kpai ita kpai o̩la ku ma du tʼaku aku, ef amone̩ du ugbo ki Jihofa anʼe̩ le.
Uwe̩ anʼugbe̩ e̩wñ kpai ulu e̩wñ nana wʼef uche̩-we̩, uwe̩ muda ako wʼunyi yegeyege; todu amimiejo amʼu ko je̩.
Uwe̩ adʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma gbe̩ kʼe̩ la fejutʼo̩, e̩ muda añmʼomi-wñ n, e̩ la akʼe̩ro-wñ n; todu amide̩ amʼu ko je̩.
Uwe̩ anʼoli o̩lif ugbo du gbogbo kad alo̩me̩-we̩, e̩ muda adʼekpo-wñ kulu o̩la-we̩ n; todu o̩lif-we̩ le̩ aña rinyo̩.
Uwe̩ abi amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩, i chʼuwe̩ muda ane̩ ma n; todu ma anyʼef amu.
Oli-we̩ du kpai e̩ro ane̩-we̩ du amimiejo ane̩.
Ilowa kʼi dʼalumeji-we̩ le̩ ahi tʼatate̩ ñw e̩ alo waa; uwe̩ la ahi wane̩ alo waa.
Owñ la adʼe̩wñ me̩ ñw uwe̩, e̩ muda adʼu me̩ ñw owñ n; owñ achʼoji, uwe̩ la achʼotihi.
Ama-i du la abʼuwe̩ ma, i ara nʼuwe̩, i la amʼe̩, gbogbo tak e̩ chihi rinyo̩, todabu kʼe̩ ma netirʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ n, kʼe̩ fʼuko̩-wñ kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ e-kʼi ñwa ñw e̩ de n.
E̩wñ-i la adʼo̩la-we̩ kʼi chʼujiwe kpai e̩wñ uno̩, i lañʼadʼo̩la amugbe̩-we̩ ogbegbele̩ ge̩.
Tod abu kʼe̩ ma re̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kpai uyo̩ kpai e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ n, tod e̩wñ du ki jo̩ ñw e̩ ololo le̩,

todule̩ uwe̩ adʼef ebi kpai alugbe̩ kpai ago ofo kpai eku e̩wñ du kʼi aku one̩ are̩ ame̩nebi-we̩ e-ki Jihofa akpuche̩ rʼuwe̩ o̩la, oñ i adʼebije uno̩lo̩ nʼuwe̩ o̩lo̩ gbogbo tak i fʼe̩ chile̩che̩ rinyo̩.
Jihofa ako abo uche̩ichi kwʼo̩najiji wa ako bʼuwe̩, ma akwʼukpoji ile̩ wa dabe̩ne̩ kʼore̩ ki awu, owñ chʼabo uche̩ichi kʼe̩ ma gbo̩ ichi-ma n;
abo uche̩ichi kʼeju-ma chebu nyʼo̩wo̩, e-kʼabogijo ma wʼuma eju n, ma la ali abimo̩to̩ eju n,

ma la akʼugbe̩ ame̩la-we̩ abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kpai e̩ro ane̩pe̩te̩-we̩ je̩, gbogbo tak e̩ chihi rinyo̩; ma la atʼo̩ka, abe̩k omi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩, abe̩k ekpo, abe̩k amo̩ma amokuno̩-we̩ abe̩k unawo ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini no̩ ñw e̩ n, gbogbo taku ma je̩ ñw e̩ lenyo̩ rane̩.

Ma la akpala nyʼe̩ ef aku aku-we̩ du, gbogbo tak o̩do̩-we̩ ki gbo̩gba kʼi la chenʼe̩wñ ebije kʼe̩ chubiyo̩ le̩ ki mugulo̩ ugbo du oj ane̩-we̩; ma la akpala nyʼe̩ ef aku aku-we̩ du ugbo du oj ane̩-we̩, e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩.
Oñ uwe̩ adʼugbe̩ año̩la-we̩ onugo je̩, owñ chʼo̩re̩la amo̩ma-we̩ aboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ du ñw e̩, ef ala kʼe̩nebi-we̩ akpa nyʼe̩ kpai ef o̩bata kʼi achʼe̩.
E̩ne̩ kʼi de̩ efu-me̩ kʼe̩do̩ ma te̩te̩gbo ñw u n, kʼi aliura ololololo abie̩nefu ñw o̩maye-wñ kpai o̩ya agbe̩do̩-wñ kpai amo̩ma otitala ku ma bo̩ ñw u;
todule̩ i abʼo̩re̩la amo̩ma-wñ kʼi aje̩ le̩ ñwu ma je̩ n, todabu kʼe̩wñ du ma bo̩ ñw u n, owñ chʼef ala kʼe̩nebi-we̩ akpa nyʼe̩ kpai ef o̩bata kʼi achʼe̩ ef aku aku-we̩ du.

Onobule̩ kʼi dʼefu-me̩ kʼe̩do̩ ma te̩te̩gbo ñw u n kʼi aliura ololololo, e-kʼi ma nʼe̩do̩ edʼadaba e̩re̩-wñ mʼane̩ n, tod ura kʼi ali kpai e̩do̩ ki ma gbo ñw u n, abie̩nefu ñw o̩ko̩ agbe̩do̩-wñ kpai o̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai o̩ma-wñ onobule̩,

i adʼo̩maina kʼi kwʼagada-wñ kpai amo̩ma-wñ kʼi abi ñwu ma je̩ n; todu i akpa ma je̩ umaja maja tod eku e̩wñ du ki akʼu, owñ chʼef ala kʼe̩nebi-we̩ akpa nyʼe̩, kpai ef o̩bata kʼi achʼe̩ ef aku aku-we̩ du.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ ko̩ efejutʼuko̩-o̩la du ku ma ko̩ rʼef ubuku-i, kʼe̩ ma railo odu ojima kpai e-ubailo-i n, owñ che JIHOFA O̩JO̩-WE̩;
mak e̩gbale̩ Jihofa aje̩ ñw egwo ku ma gwʼuwe̩ ki mud e̩wñ ugoju, egwo ku ma agwo amugbe̩-we̩ ñʼachʼegwo inaina, kʼi akpo̩kpe̩ nana kpai o̩ga e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼi ñʼakpo̩kpe̩ ge̩.
I la akʼo̩ga abo Ijipti du kʼe̩ railo-wñ le̩ dabiwa abʼe̩ ma ge̩; oñ i amanyʼuwe̩ o̩la.
Owñ chʼo̩ga du kpai egwo du e-ku ma ma ko̩ nyef ubuku uko̩-o̩la-i n, e-le̩ Jihofa ako wa abʼe̩ ma, gbogbo tak i fʼe̩ chile̩che̩.
Ame̩ chaka wewe dab awo ojale akwoubi aluka-me̩ abo̩ rere: todabu kʼe̩ ma nyʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ eti n.

Oñ i awatu, alu ki Jihofa yo̩ ñwu me̩ kʼi la che e̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩, kʼi laño̩ je̩ ñwu me̩ wewe nyo̩gba, abe̩le̩ Jihofa ayo̩ ñwu me̩ kʼi aje̩ ñwu me̩ lenyo̩, kʼi la fʼume̩ kwu rinyo̩: oñ ma afʼume̩ nya rinyo̩ bʼoj ane̩ ugbo kʼe̩ nyi kʼe̩ ne̩ le̩ te̩.

Jihofa la afʼe̩ kpatuka rʼef amone̩ du, akwo ukpoji ile̩ o̩wo̩ʼka gbogbo tʼukpoji ile̩ o̩wo̩ ekeji; o̩mo̩ uwe̩ la ate̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩ ku ma chʼoli kpʼokuta e-ku we̩ ma ma ma mama ta n, tʼuwe̩ tʼamata-we̩ ma ma n.
Uwe̩ la anʼuñmi du ef abo uche̩ichi le̩ n, i la anʼugbo kʼe̩re̩-we̩ amʼane̩ n; Jihofa muda adʼe̩do̩ e̩ga ñw e̩ o̩mo̩, kpai eju e̩gbe̩, kpai e̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩;
oji-we̩ la agbali te̩ eju-we̩; okpo la achʼuwe̩ ofe tʼodu tʼo̩ro̩ka, uwe̩ la arailo tod oji-we̩.
Odudu uwe̩ akakini, O, olu ki hika tunyane̩ ke n! e̩gba ane̩ uwe̩ la akakini, O, o̩jo̩ ki hika ñwa ke n! tod okpo ki adʼe̩do̩-we̩, kpai e̩wñ kʼeju-we̩ ali.

Taku Jihofa adʼe̩ tʼo̩ko̩ nyʼIjipti lʼo̩na e-kʼu ka ñw e̩ kakini, Eju-we̩ ñʼali o̩na-i ge̩ n; o̩mo̩ le̩ me̩ la ache ku me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ ñw ame̩nebi-me̩ la ku me̩ mud amadu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩, i la anʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi ala me̩ n.
E-le̩ chʼo̩la alo ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s kʼi kpe̩ kpai amo̩ma Israe̩l ane̩ Moab, manyʼalo e-kʼi kpe̩ kpai ama Ho̩re̩b le̩.
Taku Mose̩s fʼabo Israe̩l chaka do̩ wa, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ li e̩wñ ki Jihofa che Fero kpai amadu-wñ chaka kpai ane̩-wñ chaka eju-me̩ ane̩ Ijipti;
owñ chʼajama lile kʼeju-we̩ li le̩, owñ chʼujiwe kpai uno̩ inaina le̩;
Jihofa muda dʼe̩do̩ ñw e̩ kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ kpai eju kʼe̩ nʼagane̩ kpai eti kʼe̩ nʼagbo̩la gbogbo tʼeñini n.
Omi la ne̩ me̩ le ef aje̩tachi le̩ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji; e̩wñ o̩la-me̩ la gbo rʼume̩ o̩la n, e̩da-we̩ la gbo nyʼuwe̩ e̩re̩ n;
me̩ la je̩ akala n, me̩ la ñmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai o̩te̩ una n; todu kʼame̩ ki ma ka kʼomi che Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩.
