Oñ e̩gba ku me̩ lewa ugbo kide̩-i, Siho̩n onu He̩shbo̩n kpai O̩g onu Beshan kwo dufu wa akobʼuwa, tak a fʼuma gwoda rinyo̩;
oñ a mʼane̩-ma gba, a la mʼu ko ñw abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad, kpai ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa kʼi chʼe̩wñ ogu e-ma ku ma je̩.
Todule̩ me̩ ki de o̩la alo-i, ku me̩ che tʼeju-wñ, ki ra ñwu me̩ ef e̩wñ du ku me̩ che.
O̩chaka-me̩ dago jʼo̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ eñini-i me̩; tʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-me̩, tʼabogijo-me̩, tʼamako̩takada-me̩, owñ chʼo̩chaka aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l,
kpai amo̩ma-me̩ egini kpai amo̩ya-me̩ kpai ilowa-we̩ kʼi dʼef uru-we̩, tʼe̩ne̩ kʼi akpʼiji-we̩ na tʼe̩ne̩ kʼi akpʼomiofo ñw e̩,
todu kʼuwe̩ ki gudu tʼef alo ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ go le̩, owñ chʼe-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ akpe̩ kpʼuwe̩ eñini-i;
todu kʼi nʼugbo kʼi afʼuwe̩ lonyane̩ kʼe̩ chʼamone̩-wñ eñini-i, kʼowñ ki chʼO̩jo̩ ñw e̩, alu kʼi ka ñw e̩ kpai alu kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩, owñ chʼEbraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Jeko̩b.
I la chʼame̩ kate oñ nakpʼalo-i kpʼowñ n, kʼu la ago̩-i n.
U muda kpe̩ kpai e̩ne̩ ki dago kpʼawa o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa emi eñini-i, manyʼe̩ne̩ ki ma dʼemi kpʼawa eñini-i n.
Todu ame̩ chema alu kʼa dodo ane̩ Ijipti, kpai alu kʼa lale gu alumeji abo uche̩ichi du wa, owñ chʼabo ku me̩ lale gudu le̩;
me̩ la fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma li me̩, kpai ode-ma ki chʼoli kpai okuta kpai ajifa kpai o̩jamalia, kʼi jʼefu-ma le̩.

Tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ʼka abe̩k akwo̩ra unyi e̩ne̩ʼka abe̩k o̩lo̩puʼka adʼefu-me̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ arida bi Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa te̩ eñini-i, kʼi ale teke re̩ amo̩jo̩ abo uche̩ichi ki jo̩-i; tode̩gba kʼili ki aro o̩bia abe̩k o̩ge̩le̩ adʼefu-me̩;
ki lewatu abu kʼi agbo̩ o̩la ama-i, kʼi akadua ñw o̩la-wñ ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, Omi anʼure̩do̩, dagba u lule̩ likpa alu kʼu nañwa ef e̩do̩-mi. E-le̩ ma je̩ ñwu ma fʼe-ki nʼomi kpʼe-e̩gbe̩ gba rinyo̩.
Jihofa atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u n, chai uwe̩do̩ Jihofa kpai ogu-wñ kʼi aja akpodudu rʼe̩ne̩ le̩ o̩la, oñ o̩chaka ama ku ma ko̩ rʼef ubuku-i awa bʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ma, taku Jihofa akpʼodu-wñ lu bʼo̩gane̩ efojale te̩.
Oñ Jihofa adʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kwef abo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l du kʼi fʼu date̩ ñw e̩bie̩ne̩, likpa alu kʼama du ki dʼef alo ku ma ko̩ ref ubuku uko̩-o̩la-i de̩.
Tak abo o̩gba ki awa, owñ chʼamo̩ma-me̩ ku ma akwane̩ ubi-me̩, kpai ononojo kʼi akwʼane̩ o̩najiji wa li egwo ane̩ le̩ kpai o̩ga ojoji ojoji ki Jihofa aje̩ ñw u bʼane̩-i ma akakini,

O̩chaka ane̩ le̩ chʼitolu kpai omu kpai una una, ma la du e̩wñ gbe̩ o̩mo̩ n, i abi e̩wñ n, egbe du atiga o̩mo̩ n, i dab e̩gulo̩ e-So̩do̩m kpai Gomo̩ra kpai Adma kpai Ze̩bo̩im, e-ki Jihofa gulo̩ ef uwe̩do̩-wñ kpai ef e̩do̩fulu-wñ;
li, abo uche̩ichi ichi du akakini, E̩wñ chi ki Jihofa chʼane̩-i abe̩-i ta? E̩wñ chʼoji ukpuna uwe̩do̩ inaina-i?
E̩gbale̩ amone̩ akakini, Todabu ku ma hi alo Jihofa, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ amata-ma, tinyo̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi kpe̩ kpai ama e̩gba kʼi ko ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu wa,
oñ ma nyʼare̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩, ma la dojikane̩ ñwu ma, owñ chʼamo̩jo̩ ku ma ma ma n, kpai e-kʼi ma kpe̩ ñwu ma ku ma che n;
todule̩ oñ uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼane̩-i ma, kʼi kʼama du ku ma ko̩ ef ubuku-i wa bʼo ma;
oñ Jihofa we̩do̩ mu ma wu tʼe̩te̩te̩te̩ kwʼane̩-ma ef e̩do̩fulu, kpai ef ubieju inaina, oñ i mʼuma ko rikpolo tʼoj ane̩ omune̩, alu ki de̩ eñini-i.
E̩wñ umaja, Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa ne̩; e̩wñ ki kwotejugede awa kpʼamo̩ma-wa ne̩ ogbegbele̩, kʼawa ki che tʼeju o̩la du kʼuko̩-o̩la-i ka.
Oñ i awatu, e̩gba kʼe̩wñ-i du lewa bʼuwe̩ ma, owñ chʼe̩nyo̩ kpai ama kʼu kojo̩ o̩gba-we̩-i, kʼuwe̩ la rʼo̩ wa ef abo uche̩ichi ichi du ugbo ku Jihofa O̩jo̩ fʼuwe̩ ne tu,
kʼe̩ mudabi abi Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ la gbʼomu-wñ gbo̩ ef e̩wñ du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i, uwe̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩;
e̩gbale̩ taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ arʼamu-we̩ da, oñ i ali uwe̩ ejumomi, tak i adabi fʼuwe̩ yajo̩ kwef amone̩ du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ fʼuwe̩ kpatuka ru ge̩.
Dagba ma fʼabo-we̩ ne rʼukpoji ojale otitala, Jihofa afʼuwe̩ yajo̩ o̩mo̩, oñ i adʼuwe̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ wa;
Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ la adʼuwe̩ wʼoj ane̩ e-kʼamata-we̩ ne̩ le̩, kʼuwe̩ ki ne̩ ge̩; i la ache e̩nyo̩ kpai uwe̩, kʼi ño̩ je̩ ñw e̩ wewe tʼamata-we̩ le.
Taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ akʼe̩pi e-e̩do̩-we̩ da, kpai e-e̩do̩ ugbe̩-we̩, kʼuwe̩ ki fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kpai e̩do̩-we̩ chaka kpai onugo-we̩ chaka, todu kʼuwe̩ ki deju.
Taku Jihofa ako ama-i du wa abʼoji ame̩nebi-we̩ kpai abo ku ma chulaka we̩ kpai abo ku ma doli we̩ ma.
Tak uwe̩ adabi kʼe̩ gbʼomu Jihofa gbo̩, kʼe̩ la de uko̩-wñ du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i.

Taki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ aje̩ ñw uko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-we̩ du ki ra ñw e̩ ololo, ef e̩ro año̩la-we̩ kpai ef e̩ro ame̩la-we̩ abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kpai ef e̩ro ane̩-we̩, todu Jihofa ñʼayo̩ ñw e̩ kʼi nyo̩ ñw e̩ alu kʼi yo̩ ñw amata-we̩,

e̩gba kʼuwe̩ agbʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ gbo̩, kʼe̩ de uko̩ kʼi te̩ kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ e-ku ma ko̩ rʼef ubuku uko̩-o̩la-i de; iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ arida abo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kpai e̩do̩-we̩ chaka kpai onugo-we̩ chaka.
Todu uko̩ kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i, gbiti tʼuwe̩ le n, i la dʼo̩najiji n.
I la dʼefojale n, tak uwe̩ aka kakini, E̩ne̩ ate̩gu tʼef ojale kʼi gba kwʼo̩mo̩ wa ñw a kʼa ki gbo̩ kʼa che?
I la dʼudaba ohimini abadi n, tak uwe̩ aka kakini, E̩ne̩ agbe̩re̩ ñw u nyʼudaba ohimini-i kʼi gba wa ñw a, kʼa ki gbo̩ kʼa che?
O̩la le̩ la chʼeme̩ru we̩ anane̩, ef alu-we̩, kpai ef e̩do̩-we̩, todu kʼuwe̩ ki che.
Go, u mʼiñmi kpai e̩nyo̩ kpai uku kpai e̩bie̩ne̩ ko jo̩ o̩gba-we̩ eñini-i me̩;

owñ chʼe-kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini ka kʼuwe̩ ki fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ na-lule̩ o̩na o̩na e-wñ, kʼe̩ la de uko̩ kʼi te̩ kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ kpai oji ajo̩-wñ kʼi aka, todu kʼuwe̩ ki deju kʼe̩ wewe nyo̩gba, taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ oj ane̩ ugbo kʼuwe̩ anyi kʼe̩ gba le̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-we̩ murida bʼo̩ te̩, kʼe̩ ma je̩ agbo̩ n, kʼe̩wñ fʼuwe̩ fa wʼubi kʼe̩ la dojikane̩ ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩, kʼe̩ re̩ ma;
eka naka ñw e̩ eñini, ka kʼelenyo̩ ame̩ alenyo̩ chuu; ame̩ la akwojo̩lugbo oj ane̩ ugbo kʼuwe̩ adaba Jo̩rdan-i kʼe̩ gba le̩ n.
Oñ nado̩ ojale kpai ile̩ ku ma gbibenu nyʼume̩ eñini-i, ka kʼomi mʼiñmi kpai uku kpai e̩nyo̩ kpai ama kojo̩ o̩gba-me̩-i; todule̩ e̩ mʼiñmi du, kʼuwe̩ kpai ugbe̩-we̩ ki deju,

kʼe̩ nafe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ gbʼomu-wñ gbo̩, kʼe̩ la gamanyʼu; todu e-le̩ chʼiñmi-we̩ kpai ojolugbo-we̩, todu kʼuwe̩ ki dodo oj ane̩ ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-we̩ kʼi adu ñwu ma, owñ chʼEbraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Je̩ko̩b.
Taku Mose̩s nyʼaka o̩la kide̩ ñw abo Israe̩l chaka.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩do̩-mi jʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa eñini-i; u neke lelo lewa ge̩ n. Jihofa la ka ñwu mi kakini, Uwe̩ adaba Jo̩rdan in.
Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ onugo atʼuwe̩ o̩gba daba; owñ afʼabo uche̩ichi ichi-i chile̩che̩ rʼuwe̩ o̩gba, oñ uwe̩ abʼuma gbʼane̩ le̩. Jo̩shua la atʼuwe̩ o̩gba daba, alu ki Jihofa ka le̩.
Taku Jihofa ache ma alu kʼi che Siho̩n kpai O̩g, amonu abo Amo̩r, kpai alu kʼi che ane̩-ma, e̩gba kʼi fʼuma chile̩che̩ le̩.
Jihofa la ako ma nyʼume̩ o̩wo̩, tak ame̩ ki che ma alu du kʼuko̩ kʼomi ñwa ñwu me̩ ka.
Me̩ fʼo̩wo̩ gbo ku me̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, me̩ ki railo n, me̩ ki la chokpo ma n: todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ale bʼuwe̩: i aje̩ ñw ukpahiu-we̩ bulo̩ n, i la ahi uwe̩ tinyo̩ n.

Taku Mose̩s nʼomu dala do̩ Jo̩shua, oñ i ka ñw u eju abo Israe̩l chaka kakini, Fʼo̩wo̩ gbo, kʼe̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩; todu uwe̩ ki lebʼamone̩-i tʼoj ane̩ ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-ma ka kʼi adu ñwu ma; uwe̩ ki la je̩ ñwu ma je̩ e̩wñ ogu le̩.
Jihofa chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi atʼuwe̩ o̩gba; owñ le̩ adʼugbo we̩, i aje̩ ñw ukpahiu-we̩ bulo̩ n, i la ahi uwe̩ tinyo̩ n; e̩ ki railo n, e̩do̩-we̩ ki da kpu n.
Taku Mose̩s fʼo̩takada uko̩-o̩la-i ko̩, oñ i mʼu ko ñw amatama, amo̩ma Lifai, kʼama ne̩ akpati alo Jihofa kpai abogijo Israe̩l chaka ge̩.
Taku Mose̩s ñwa ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba du kʼo̩do̩ da ebie, iko o̩do̩ e̩wñ eto̩no̩ tane̩ ku ma date̩ le̩, e̩gba uje̩wñ uyo̩ e-ala ku ma ne le̩,
e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l chaka lewa ku ma kwojʼejugede o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ef uña kʼi adu le̩, uwe̩ ki kalata uko̩-o̩la-i eju abo Israe̩l chaka kʼama ki gbo̩.

Kʼamone̩-i wa jeju, tʼaboke̩le̩ tʼabobule̩, tʼabo egini, kpai ilowa-we̩ kʼi dʼef aku aku-we̩, kʼama ki gbo̩, ku ma ko̩che̩ ku ma railo Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, ku ma fejutʼo̩ kʼama ki che o̩la uko̩-o̩la-i du,
todu kʼamo̩ma-ma ku ma ma mʼo̩ n, ki gbo̩, ku ma ko̩che̩ ku ma railo Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, gbogbo o̩jo̩ du kʼume̩ jʼoj ane̩ ugbo ku me̩ adaba Jo̩rdan ku me̩ gba le̩.

Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini. Go, o̩jo̩ uku-we̩ me̩ me̩; fi Jo̩shua do̩ wa, ku me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ wa jʼef unyabo ujeju, kʼomi ki dʼo̩laʼka tunyʼu o̩wo̩. Taki Mose̩s kpai Jo̩shua le, oñ ma kʼo̩la-ma wa jʼef unyabo ujeju le̩.
Oñ Jihofa kwotejugede ef akpa ki dago waala ef unyabo le̩; akpa ki dago waala le̩ la dago me̩ru alugbo̩na unyabo.

Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, Go, uwe̩ achʼolu manyʼamata-we̩; tak amone̩-i akwane̩ ajo̩ko̩ tʼamo̩jo̩ ononojo ane̩ ugbo ku ma anyi ku ma jʼefu-ma le̩ ubi, oñ ma ahi umi tinyo̩, ma la afʼalo-mi kʼu kpe̩ kpai ama bie̩.

Tak uwe̩do̩-mi amutajo abʼuma ma O̩jo̩ le̩, oñ nahi uma tinyo̩, naño̩ dʼeju-mi maja bʼuma te̩, oñ e̩wñ o̩mo̩ ako ma mi, e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kpai o̩pe̩cha wewe ake̩re̩bʼuma, todabe̩le̩ ma aka o̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, I chʼutodabu kʼO̩jo̩-wa ma dʼefu-wa n oñ e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ke̩re̩bʼuwa-i n?
Omi la adʼeju-mi maja o̩jo̩ le̩ chuu, todu e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du ku ma che, owñ chʼabu ku ma rida abʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nafʼo̩la eli-i ko̩ nyʼo̩takada, ku me̩ mʼu du ko̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l; mʼu du tʼuma alu, todu kʼeli-i ki mud e̩nibenu-mi nyʼamo̩ma Israe̩l.

Todu e̩gba kʼomi mʼuma ko wa oj ane̩ kʼu go̩ ñw amata-ma ugbo kʼomie̩nya kpai iño̩ acha efu-wñ le̩, ku ma je̩ kʼefu, ku ma yoyo, e̩gbale̩ ma arida abʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ku ma re̩ ma, ku ma do̩ mi rʼibe̩te̩ ku ma fʼalo-mi bie̩.

Tak e̩gba kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kpai o̩pe̩cha wewe ke̩re̩bʼuma, mak eli-i achʼe̩nibenu ki agbibenu nyʼuma (todu alu amugbe̩-ma agbenyo̩ n); todu u chema ibe ku ma ñwa ef e̩do̩-ma eñini-i o̩gba tak u ko ma wʼoj ane̩ kʼomi go̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s fʼo̩la eli-i ko̩ rʼef o̩takada o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, oñ i mʼu du ko̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l.
Tak i mʼo̩laʼka du tu Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun le̩ o̩wo̩, oñ i kakini, Fʼo̩wo̩ gbo, kʼe̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩; todu uwe̩ akʼamo̩ma Israe̩l wʼoj ane̩ kʼu go̩ ñwu ma le̩: omi adʼugbo-we̩.
Oñ i lewatu, abu ku Mose̩s fʼo̩la uko̩-o̩la-i ko̩ nyʼef ubuku kpa, gbogbo tʼukpoji-wñ,
taku Mose̩s ñwa ñw abo Lifai, ku ma ne̩ akpati alo Jihofa le̩ kakini,
Mʼubuku uko̩-o̩la-i du, ku me̩ mʼu du tʼakolo akpati alo Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ le̩, todu kʼi tʼo̩mo̩ kʼi gbibenu nyʼuwe̩.
Todu u chema abu kʼe̩ lañu ru kpai o̩lo̩-we̩ ki chelo dago; go, abu kʼomi deju manyʼume̩ eñini-i ta, ame̩ lañu ru Jihofa me̩; u leku, abu me̩ ache kade!
Me̩ kʼabogijo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-me̩ chaka kpai amako̩takada-me̩ wa jeju o̩gba-mi, kʼu nakʼo̩la kide̩ kʼeti-ma ki gbo̩, kʼu fʼefojale kpai ile̩ do̩ wa ku ma gbibenu nyʼuma.

Todu u chema ka kʼudubi-gba-mi ame̩ akpʼo̩la-me̩ bie̩ rinyo̩ kpa, ku me̩ la ana bʼo̩na e-kʼu ñwa ñwu me̩ te̩; tak e̩bie̩ne̩ ake̩re̩bʼume̩ o̩jo̩ otitala, todabu ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa, ku me̩ nʼuko̩lo̩ ku me̩ nʼo̩wo-me̩ che biʼowñ eju.
Taku Mose̩s dʼo̩la eli-i tʼeti abujeju Israe̩l chaka, gbogbo tak i fʼu ka kpoji.
Ame̩ efojale, neti kʼu nako̩la;
Uko̩o̩la-mi akito̩ wane̩ dab omiojale,
Todu nadʼodu Jihofa ka dufu.
Okuta le̩, uko̩lo̩-wñ mufu;
Ma fʼo̩la-ma kpabie̩ ugbo-wñ,
Abu kʼe̩ dʼomina gwe̩ Jihofa eju de̩?
Ibe-we̩ ki tʼO̩jo̩ igbelegbele,
E̩gba kʼO̩machala fʼe̩wñ ogu-ma kpe̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
Todu ukpe̩ e-Jihofa chʼamone̩-wñ,
I fʼowñ li ane̩ aje̩tachi,
Alu kʼo̩re̩ akʼamo̩ma-wñ dufu,
Jihofa kate nʼowñ le,
I je̩ ñw u tanʼotete otete ane̩-ile̩ ale,
Ekpo e-amokuno̩, kpai omie̩nya ame̩wño̩re̩ egini,
Je̩shurun muda chane̩ eyoyo̩, i la fʼe̩re̩ ubi ro̩ ñw u;
Ma nʼamo̩jo̩ ejaduña nyʼowñ ogu eja;
Ma fʼiche̩bo̩ che ñw amebili, ku ma ma chʼO̩jo̩ n,
Uwe̩ la dʼibe tʼOkuta ki bi uwe̩ n,
Jihofa fʼu li, oñ i do̩ ma rʼibe̩te̩,
Tak i kakini, Nadʼeju-mi maja bʼuma te̩,
Ma nʼe̩wñ ki ma chʼO̩jo̩ n nyʼumi ogu eja;
Todu una che̩kote̩ ef uwe̩do̩-mi,
Nagbʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa abʼuma oji ma;
udelu ada ma,
Ugbada adʼo̩do̩da,
U kakini, Nakpʼuma tuka rʼo̩najiji,
i ma chʼailo e̩nebi le̩ kʼomi ara n,
Todu uche̩ amone̩ ku ma ma nʼe̩ne̩ ki abʼuma lʼo̩la n ma che,
O, ma ma nʼibe ke n, kʼama ki mʼoji e̩wñ-i,
Ab e̩ne̩ʼka ale kʼi anʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ule?
Todu okuta e-ma la dab Okuta e-wa n,
Todu ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma e-ma chʼachiwebe̩te̩ma ki kwo So̩do̩m,
Omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-ma chʼolo ejo,
I chʼe-le̩ maja ugbo mi-i n?
Ache̩ ena chʼe-mi, kpai o̩me̩ era koji,
Todu Jihofa añwʼabo-wñ go
Tak i akakini, Ugbo amo̩jo̩-ma jo̩?
e-ki je̩ ula e̩wñ iche̩bo̩-ma,
Me̩ go ta ka kʼomi, omi chʼowñ,
Todu omi achi o̩wo̩-mi dago kad efojale.
I la che̩wñ kʼu fʼo̩be̩chageli-mi ki adʼojiji no̩,
Naje̩ ñw o̩fa-mi ñmʼe̩bie̩ ki amʼu dab o̩te̩,
Ame̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, me̩ fʼo̩ga uyo̩ chi manyʼamone̩-wñ;
Taku Mose̩s lewa ka o̩la eli-i chaka nyʼamone̩ le̩ eti chaka ku ma gbo̩, owñ kpai Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun le̩.
Tak e̩gba ku Mose̩s fʼo̩la-i ka ñw abo Israe̩l du kpa,
i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼe̩do̩-me̩ du tʼo̩la kʼu nakajane̩ ñwu me̩ eñini-i, kʼame̩ ki ñwa ñw amo̩ma-me̩ ku ma fejutʼo̩ ku ma che tʼeju o̩la uko̩-o̩la-i chaka.
Todu i chʼe̩wñ ofofo ugbo me̩ n; chai iñmi-me̩ i che, owñ lef e-le̩ ame̩ akwo̩jolugbo oj ane̩ ku me̩ adaba Jo̩rdan-i ku me̩ gba le̩.
Taki Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, kakini,
Mute̩gu tʼane̩ uwo Abiram-i kʼe̩ nyʼoji uwo Nebo, owñ chʼe-ki dʼoj ane̩ Moab, odenideni Je̩riko le̩; kʼe̩ la fʼane̩ Kenan go, owñ chʼe-kʼomi adu ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l ku ma ne̩;
kʼuwe̩ ki ku oj uwo ugbo kʼuwe̩ ate̩gu nyi le̩, ku ma mʼuwe̩ du tʼef abo-we̩, alu kʼAro̩n o̩maye-we̩ leku oj uwo Ho̩r, taku ma mʼowñ du tʼef abo-wñ le̩;
todabu ku me̩ fʼada-mi je̩ alumeji amo̩ma Israe̩l ugbo omi Me̩riba-Kede̩sh, ef aje̩tachi Zin le̩; todabu ku me̩ ma la butʼefo̩-mi alumeji amo̩ma Israe̩l in.
Todu uwe̩ ali ane̩ le̩ o̩gba-we̩ o̩mo̩; e̩ muda nyʼane̩ e-kʼomi adu ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l le̩ n.
Adua ku Mose̩s, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, ko ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l o̩gba tak i ku le̩ de̩.
I kakini,
Ochochi, i afe̩do̩ amone̩-i;
Mose̩s fʼuko̩-o̩la ñwa ñw a,
Oñ i mud onu efu Je̩shurun,
Rube̩n ki deju, kʼi la we eku;
E-Juda la de̩: Oñ i kakini:
E-Lifai kʼi la ka de̩ kakini,
e-ki nʼo̩la ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ aka kakini, Ma wʼumi eju n; i la ma ka kʼi nʼamo̩maye-wñ n,
Ama ako̩ Jeko̩b oji ajo̩ kʼe̩ ka,
O Jihofa, de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩wñ kʼi ne̩,
E-Be̩njamin kʼi ka le̩ de̩, kakini,
E-Jose̩f kʼi la ka de̩, kakini,
kpai lugbo e̩wñ akoko ki chʼe̩ro olu,
kpai e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ e-uwo uwo ki jʼo̩mo̩ igbelegbele,
kpai e̩wñ akoko ane̩-ile̩-i kpai e̩wñ ki kpe̩ko̩-wñ,
Omojo̩do̩ o̩kokuno̩-wñ ki nʼe̩gahi,
E-Ze̩biulo̩n kʼi ka le̩ de̩, kakini,
Ama ado̩ amone̩ amone̩ wa ugbo uwo le̩;
E-Gad kʼi ka de̩ kakini,
I la dʼukpe̩ ejodudu te̩ ñw o̩la-wñ,
E-Dan kʼi ka la de̩, kakini,
E-Naftali kʼi la ka de̩, kakini,
E-Ashe̩r kʼi la ka de̩, kakini,
Uro̩na o̩gba-we̩ achʼebije kpai ebijeikpa;
O Je̩shurun, i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki dab O̩jo̩ n,
O̩jo̩ e-ogbegbele̩ le̩ chʼunyi ugugu-we̩,
Abe̩le̩ Israe̩l kwogugu yo̩o̩,
O Israe̩l, e̩ gbede! E̩ne̩ dab uwe̩?
Taku Mose̩s mute̩gu kwʼegbili Moab nyʼuwo Nebo, tʼoj uwo Pisga, e-kʼi dʼodenideni Je̩riko. Taki Jihofa dʼane̩ Gilead du ñʼo̩ gbogbo wʼi Dan,
kpai ane̩ Naftali chaka, kpai ane̩ Ifraim kpai Manasa, kpai ane̩ Juda chaka gbogbo wa ohimini o̩wo̩ olane̩,
kpai o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, kpai egbili o̩go̩ Je̩riko, ki chʼewo oli ki ata yaala dab e̩kpe̩, gbogbo wa Zoar.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Ane̩ kʼu go̩ ñw Ebraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Jeko̩b, kʼu kakini, Nadu ñw ugbe̩-we̩ le̩ de̩: omi je̩ ñw e̩ li kpai eju-we̩, uwe̩ muda adaba nyʼo̩mo̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ Mose̩s, adu Jihofa, leku ane̩ Moab o̩mo̩, alu kʼo̩la Jihofa de̩.
Oñ i mʼu du ji ef o̩go̩ oj ane̩ Moab odenideni Be̩t-peo̩r: e̩ne̩ du la ma ugbo kʼojinoji-wñ de̩ gbogbo tʼeñini n.
O̩do̩ Mose̩s la chʼo̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩fa e̩gba kʼi leku: eju-wñ la gane̩ pee; ukpahiu-wñ la dabu n.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l raku Mose̩s egbili Moab le̩ o̩jo̩ ogue̩gwa; abe̩le̩ o̩jo̩ aku ero̩ eku Mose̩s ku ma de̩ kpoji.
Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun la che̩ko̩ ñw Afu e-ibe; todu Mose̩s mʼo̩wo̩-wñ ko nʼo oji; abe̩le̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l ne̩tirʼo̩la-wñ, oñ ma che alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s.
Akache̩ ki dabu Mose̩s kwane̩ ef abo Israe̩l akwihi le̩ ge̩ n, owñ ki Jihofa kʼeju rʼu eju le̩,
ugbo ujiwe, kpai uno̩ chaka, ki Jihofa fʼu kpuche̩ kʼi che Fero kpai abuko̩lo̩-wñ chaka kpai ane̩-wñ chaka, oj ane̩ Ijipti
kpai ef o̩wo̩ e̩gbiti le̩ chaka kpai e̩wñ ubailo inaina chaka ki Mose̩s che eju abo Israe̩l chaka.
Oñ i lewatu abu ku Mose̩s, adu Jihofa le̩, leku, Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun kʼi ache e̩wñ ñwu Mose̩s le̩, kakini,
Mose̩s adu-mi la leku me̩; todule̩ uwe̩ ki kwane̩ kʼe̩ daba Jo̩rdan-i, uwe̩ kpai amone̩-i chaka, me̩ nyʼoj ane̩ kʼu nadu ñwu ma, owñ chʼamo̩ma Israe̩l-i.
Ugbo du kʼadaba e̩re̩-we̩ mʼane̩, uwe̩ omi du ñwu, alu kʼu ka ñwu Mose̩s le̩.
Akwo aje̩tachi kpai ane̩ Le̩bano̩n kide̩, gbogbo wʼohimini elile, owñ chʼohimini Yufretis, kpai ane̩ abo He̩t chaka gbogbo wʼOhimini Elile o̩wo̩ olane̩, e-le̩ chʼalo̩me̩-we̩.
I nʼene̩ du kʼi aneke gbʼo̩na nyʼuwe̩ o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-we̩ kade n; alu kʼu dʼugbo Mose̩s, alu le̩ nadʼugbo we̩ ge̩; nawe ehi iñmi kʼe̩ n, nahi uwe̩ tinyo̩ n.
Fʼeju gbiti kʼe̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩; todu uwe̩ aje̩ ñw amone̩-i je̩ ane̩ kʼu go̩ ñw amata-ma ka kʼu nadu ñwu ma-i e̩wñ ogu.

Fʼeju gbiti kate, kʼe̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ nana, kʼe̩ fejute̩ kʼe̩ che teju alu du kʼuko̩-o̩la ki Mose̩s, adu-mi, ñwa ñw e̩ le̩ ka; e̩ ki rida bʼo̩ te̩ tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n, todu ki ra ñw e̩ ugbo du kʼuwe̩ anyi.

O̩la o̩takada uko̩-o̩la-i akwo bʼuwe̩ alu te̩ n, ama e̩ nayaye-wñ tʼo̩ro̩ka tʼodu, todu kʼuwe̩ ki dejute̩ kʼe̩ che teju alu du ku ma kʼo̩rubutu efu-wñ; todu e̩gbale̩ e̩wñ-we̩ kʼe̩ che anawo ñw e̩, e̩gbale̩ tak i ara ñw e̩.
I chʼomi ñwa ñw e̩ n? E̩ fʼeju gbiti kʼe̩ la fʼe̩do̩ ne̩; e̩ ki chokpo n, e̩do̩-we̩ ki da kpu n; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dʼugbo we̩ ugbo du kʼuwe̩ anyi.
Taku Jo̩shua ñwa ñw amako̩takada amone̩ le̩ kakini,

Me̩ na le alumeji uru-i ku me̩ ka ñw amone̩ kakini, Me̩ fʼo̩na uje̩wñ che ñw o̩la-me̩; todu i ajo̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta tak ame̩ adaba Jo̩rdan-i kʼume̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ abʼuma gbʼane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ du ñwu me̩ ku me̩ ne̩-i n.
Taku Jo̩shua ka ñw abo Rube̩n, kpai abo Gad, kpai ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu abo Manasa kakini,
Me̩ nadibetʼo̩la e-ki Mose̩s adu Jihofa le̩ ñwa ñwu me̩, kakini, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ mʼuñmi du ñwu me̩ me̩, i laño̩ mʼane̩-i du ñwu me̩ ge̩.

Amo̩ya-me̩ kpai abo-me̩ egini, kpai ame̩wñukpa-me̩, ajo̩ oj ane̩ e-ki Mose̩s du ñwu me̩ ejudaba Jo̩rdan-i; ama ame̩nugbiti ku ma nʼuwohi ku ma jʼefu-me̩ chaka amʼo̩la ogu ku me̩ daba o̩gba amo̩maye-me̩, ku me̩ bʼuma che;

gbogbo taku Jihofa du uñmi ñw amo̩maye-me̩ alu kʼi du ñwu me̩, kʼama ki ño̩ mʼane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ adu ñwu ma gba ge̩; e̩gbale̩ tak ame̩ adabi tʼoj ane̩ kʼame̩ ne̩-i, ku me̩ mʼu gba, owñ chʼe-ki Mose̩s adu Jihofa du ñwu me̩ ejudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ.
Taku ma dohi ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, E̩wñ du kʼe̩ ñwa ñw a ache, ugbo du kʼe̩ kpʼuwa nyi a ale.
Alu kʼa netirʼo̩la Mose̩s ef e̩wñ du, alu le̩ a anetirʼo̩la-we̩; Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼi dʼugbo we̩ alu kʼi dʼugbo Mose̩s le̩ dee.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi alañu rʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ ñwa ñw a te̩, kʼi ma la netirʼo̩la-we̩ e̩wñ du kʼe̩ ñwa ñw u n, ekpa ma akpʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kʼi ku. Uwe̩ ki fʼeju gbiti kʼe̩ la fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ dee.

Taku Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun le̩, fʼone̩ meji kpe̩ maja maja akwo Shitim atu ane̩ʼka, i kakini, Me̩ nyʼafʼane̩ le̩ go, owñ che Je̩riko. Taku ma le, ma lewa unyi ajo̩ko̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Rehab, oñ ma ru o̩mo̩.
Taku ma mudu ka ñw onu Je̩riko kakini. Go, aboke̩le̩ abo Israe̩l mugudu wʼemi odu-i ku ma tu ane̩-wa.
Tak onu Je̩riko kpuche̩ nyʼugbo Rehab, kakini, Mʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma wʼugbo we̩ le̩ ko dufu wa, owñ chʼabo ku ma gudu wʼef unyi-we̩ le̩; todu ama wa ku ma tu ane̩-i.
Onobule̩ le̩ la mʼaboke̩le̩ meji le̩ ko maja e̩gba le̩ me̩; oñ i kakini, Ochochi aboke̩le̩ le̩ wʼugbo mi, u muda ma ugbo ku ma kwo wa n;
oñ i lewatu ame̩ru iko ku ma rʼo̩na alaku le̩, e̩gba kʼane̩ chubi, aboke̩le̩ le̩ ledufu; u la mʼugbo kʼaboke̩le̩ le̩ le n; rano ma piopio, todu me̩ amu ma.
E̩gbale̩ i la mʼuma ko le tʼojokunyi, i ko ma maja ef oli flaks e-kʼi ko te̩jo̩ ojokunyi le̩.
Tak abo le̩ rano ma tʼej o̩na kʼuma nyi Jo̩rdan ugbo ki de̩ hie̩hie̩le̩ le̩; abu kʼabo ku ma rano ma ledufu ababale̩ ma fʼalaku re.
Oñ o̩gba taku ma dachi onobule̩ le̩ mute̩gu wʼugbo ma ojokunyi le̩,
oñ i ka ñw aboke̩le̩ le̩ kakini, U chema ka ki Jihofa mʼane̩-i du ñwu me̩, kʼokpo-me̩ fʼuwa mu me̩, kʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩-i ayo̩ dab ekpo ru me̩ o̩gba.

Todu a gbo̩ alu ki Jihofa je̩ ñw omi Ohimini Ekpikpa gbe̩ bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩, e̩gba ku me̩ kwʼIjipti dufu wa le̩, kpai e̩wñ ku ma che amonu Amo̩r meji ku ma jʼudaba Jo̩rdan le̩, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ che Siho̩n kpai O̩g, ku me̩ mʼuma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ jali.
Oñ abu kʼa gbo̩, ababale̩ e̩do̩-wa muyo̩ efu-wa, une̩do̩ ño̩ bo̩ efu e̩ne̩ du ge̩ n, todu me̩; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ chʼO̩jo̩ efojale ate̩, kpai ile̩ o̩gane̩-i.
Todule̩ narodubʼume̩ fai, kakini, Ame̩ ki fi Jihofa go̩ ñwu mi, ka kʼalu kʼu fʼe̩nyo̩ che ñwu me̩, abe̩le̩ ame̩ ñʼache e̩nyo̩ ñw abo unyi ata-mi, me̩ ki ño̩ dʼe̩wñ uhio̩wo̩ ochochi ñwu mi ge̩;
kʼame̩ ajadu ata-mi, kpai iye-mi kpai amo̩maye-mi, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩, kpai e̩wñ du ku ma ne̩, kʼame̩ ki la gba oji-wa te̩ kʼa we eku.
Tak aboke̩le̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Oji-wa ki koji e-me̩, iche̩wñ kʼame̩ ma du o̩la-wa-i ka dufu n; mak e̩gba ki Jihofa mʼane̩-i du ñw a a ache e̩nyo̩ kpai ochochi kpʼuwe̩.
Tak i je̩ ñwu ma le bʼiku lʼowe windo tane̩, todu unyi-wñ lamo̩la aku, unyi-wñ ugbo kʼi de̩ dʼoj aku le̩.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nyʼugbo uwo le̩, tode̩gba kʼabo ku ma rano me̩ wa ke̩re̩bʼume̩; me̩ maja o̩mo̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta, gbogbo tak abo ku ma rano me̩ le̩ mudabi; ubile̩ taku me̩ neke lo me̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini. Ego̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw a go̩ le̩ afu wa oji.

Go, e̩gba kʼa lewa oj ane̩-i, uwe̩ ki mʼowu ekpikpa-i du nʼowe ugbo kʼe̩ ko wa le tʼane̩ le̩; tak uwe̩ ki mʼata-we̩ kpai iye-we̩, kpai amo̩maye-we̩, kpai abo unyi ata-we̩ chaka kowa jʼugbo we̩ ef unyi-we̩-i.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du lʼalugbo̩na unyi-we̩ dufu tʼej o̩na, e̩bie̩-wñ adʼoji e-wñ, i la anʼudu ñw a n; i muda che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩ kado e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼef unyi kpai uwe̩ mak e̩bie̩-wñ adʼoji e-wa.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ mʼo̩la-wa-i duka mak e̩gbale̩ ego̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw a go̩ ñw e̩ le̩ afʼuwa oji.
Tak i kakini, I ki dʼalu ku me̩ ka le̩. Oñ i je̩ ñwu ma kwʼo̩mo̩, oñ ma le ma; tak i mʼowu ekpikpa le̩ du ji mʼowe le̩.
Tak abo le̩ le, oñ ma lewa ane̩ uwo le̩, ma la gugu o̩mo̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta, gbogbo tak abo ku ma rano ma le̩ mudabi; todu abo ku ma rano ma le̩ tejane̩ ma ugbo du o̩na o̩mo̩, ma la li ma n.
Tak aboke̩le̩ meji le̩ mudabi gwo̩ru oji uwo tane̩, oñ ma mudaba wʼugbo Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun; oñ ma mʼe̩wñ du ki ke̩re̩bʼuma du ka ñw u.
Oñ ma ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Ochochi, Jihofa mʼane̩ le̩ chaka ko nyʼuwa o̩wo̩ me̩; e̩do̩ abo ane̩ o̩mo̩ chaka la muyo̩ rʼo̩gba-wa.
Taku Jo̩shua takpa kwane̩ odudu-wñ, owñ kpai abo Israe̩l chaka muño̩ bu Shitim te̩ lewa o̩la Jo̩rdan; oñ ma ru o̩mo̩ o̩gba taku ma daba.
Abu kʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta jo̩ amako̩takada lale alumeji uru le̩;
oñ ma ñwa ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ fʼakpati alo e-Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ li, abu kʼamatama ku ma chʼabo Lifai le̩ ane̩, e̩gbale̩ me̩ muño̩ bʼuña-me̩-i te̩ ku me̩ tʼo̩ ubi,
kʼame̩ ki ma o̩na ki chʼukpe̩ kʼame̩ ale; todu ame̩ le o̩na-i mama ta n. Owe muda ate̩ agbagba ame̩ kpai owñ, ujiji-wñ adab ohibo̩wo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji; ame̩ ki te̩me̩rʼu n.
Taki Jo̩shua ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ che kʼo̩la-me̩ ki fo̩; todu Jihofa ache e̩wñ awuwu efu-me̩ o̩na.
Taki Jo̩shua ka ñw amatama le̩ kakini, Mʼakpati alo le̩ du ku me̩ dʼo̩gba amone̩-i daba. Taku ma mʼakpati alo le̩ du, oñ ma tʼamone̩ le̩ o̩gba.
Taki Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Eñini-i nachane̩ eje̩ ñw e̩ nana eju abo Israe̩l chaka, kʼama ki ma ka kʼalu kʼu dʼugbo Mose̩s, alu le̩ nadʼugbo we̩ ge̩.
Uwe̩ ki la ñwa ñw amatama ku ma ne̩ akpati alo le̩, kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ lewa eti omi Jo̩rdan, me̩ ki dago choo efu omi Jo̩rdan.
Taki Jo̩shua ka ñw abo Israe̩l chaka kakini, Me̩ lewa ku me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩.

Taki Jo̩shua kakini, Alu ku me̩ ale ku me̩ ama ka kʼO̩jo̩ ki deju dʼefu-me̩ le̩ de̩, ka ki nʼugbo du ki achi n, owñ le̩ afʼabo Kenan kpai abo He̩t kpai abo Hifai kpai abo Pe̩re̩z kpai abo Girgash kpai abo Amo̩r kpai abo Je̩bius ne dufu bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩.
Go, akpati alo Ondu e-abo ile̩ du alale o̩gba-me̩ tefu Jo̩rdan.
Todule̩ nachʼone̩ me̩gwe̩ji kwef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l fai, o̩lo̩pu du ne̩ e̩ne̩ʼka e̩ne̩ʼka.
Taki awatu, e̩gba kʼadaba e̩re̩ amatama ku ma nʼakpati Jihofa kʼi chʼOndu ile̩ du, tunyʼomi Jo̩rdan, mak omi Jo̩rdan le̩ amuko̩da meji, owñ chʼomi ki acha kwʼate̩ wa, i la agba dago ugbo okate logoo.
Abe̩le̩ e̩gba kʼamone̩ le̩ kwo bʼunyabo-ma te̩ ku ma daba Jo̩rdan, kʼamatama ku ma ne̩ akpati alo le̩ jʼo̩gba amone̩ le̩,
tak e̩gba kʼabo ku ma nʼakpati le̩ lewa Jo̩rdan, kʼe̩re̩ amatama ku ma nʼakpati le̩ kwo tunyʼeti omi (todu Jo̩rdan awobi bʼoji otete-wñ chaka ma iko ku ma ko e̩wñ oko wʼunyi le̩),

omi ki kwʼo̩wo̩ ate̩ awa kwodago, oñ i kwane̩ dago logoo ugbo okate, o̩najiji, ugbo Adam, ewo ki me̩ru Zaretan, tak e-kʼi acha nyʼo̩gane̩ rʼo̩wo̩ ohimini Araba, owñ chʼOhimini Omu le̩, e-le̩ muko̩da bʼe-ate̩ te̩ hioko; tak amone̩ le̩ mudaba me̩ru Je̩riko anane̩.
Oñ amatama ku ma ne̩ akpati alo e-Jihofa le̩ kwodago kpaka ane̩ e̩gbe̩ alumeji Jo̩rdan le̩ gbogbo tak abo ichi le̩ mudaba Jo̩rdan hioko.
Tak i lewatu, e̩gba kʼabo ichi le̩ chaka mudaba Jo̩rdan hioko, Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini,
Fʼone̩ me̩gweji chi ñw o̩la-we̩ kwef amone̩-i, o̩lo̩pu du nʼe̩ne̩ʼka e̩ne̩ʼka,
tak e̩ ñwa ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼokuta me̩gweji ko kwʼalumeji Jo̩rdan-i, kwʼugbo kʼe̩re̩ amatama dago kpaka, ku me̩ mʼu ko daba kpai ame̩, oñ me̩ akʼo jane̩ ef unyi uru le̩ odu eñini.
Taku Jo̩shua fʼaboke̩le̩ me̩gweji ku ma chʼabo Israe̩l e-kʼi ñwʼuma o̩la che jo̩ do̩ wa, o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu du nʼe̩ne̩ʼka e̩ne̩ʼka;
oñ Jo̩shua ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ki dʼo̩gba akpati Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ le̩ lale rʼalumeji Jo̩rdan kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ kʼi mʼokuta du nʼika-wñ, likpa alu kʼuwewe o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l de̩,
todu kʼi chʼujiwe efu-me̩, todu e̩gba kʼamo̩ma-me̩ atene ej o̩gba kakini, E̩wñ chʼofe okuta ku me̩ ko jo̩-i ta?
E̩gbale̩ ame̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, Omi Jo̩rdan-i muko̩da meji rʼo̩gba akpati alo Jihofa; e̩gba kʼakpati le̩ mudaba Jo̩rdan, omi Jo̩rdan le̩ muko̩da. Oñ okuta-i achʼurewa ñw abo Israe̩l ogbegbele̩.

Tak abo Israe̩l che alu ki Jo̩shua ñwa ñwu ma, oñ ma mʼokuta me̩gweji ko kwef alumeji Jo̩rdan, alu ki Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua, uwewe-wñ dʼalu kʼuwewe o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l de̩; taku ma mʼu ko lebʼuma tʼugbo ku ma ru, oñ ma mʼu ko jʼane̩ o̩mo̩.
Taku Jo̩shua mʼokuta me̩gweji ko dago alumeji Jo̩rdan ugbo kʼe̩re̩ amatama ku ma nʼakpati alo le̩ mane̩; i la jʼo̩mo̩ gbogbo tʼeñini.
Todu amatama ku ma nʼakpati le̩ dago alumeji Jo̩rdan, gbogbo tak e̩wñ du ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Jo̩shua kʼi ka ñw amone̩ le̩ che kpa, teju alu du ki Mose̩s ñwa ñwu Jo̩shua.
oñ i lewatu, abu kʼamone̩ le̩ chaka mudaba hioko, tak akpati Jihofa kpai amatama le̩ ño̩ daba eju amone̩ le̩.
Oñ abo Rube̩n, kpai abo Gad, kpai ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu abo Manasa, fʼo̩lʼogu mu daba rʼo̩gba abo Israe̩l, alu ki Mose̩s ka ñwu ma;
abo kʼo̩la-ma chʼe̩mu ogu ku ma daba o̩gba Jihofa nyʼegbili Je̩riko ku ma nyʼoko ogu, dab one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji.
O̩jo̩ le̩ Jihofa je̩ ñwu Jo̩shua mud e̩ne̩ lile eju abo Israe̩l chaka; taku ma railo owñ, alu ku ma railo Mose̩s, gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini,
E̩ nañwa ñw amatama ku ma nʼakpati ibenu le̩ kʼama ki te̩gu kwefu Jo̩rdan dufu wa.
Todule̩ Jo̩shua ñwa ñw amatama le̩ kakini, Me̩ mute̩gu kwefu Jo̩rdan wa.

Tak i lewatu, e̩gba kʼamatama ku ma ne̩ akpati alo Jihofa le̩ mute̩gu kwʼalumeji Jo̩rdan dufu wa, kʼadabe̩re̩ amatama le̩ kwo tʼane̩ e̩gbe̩, tak omi Jo̩rdan mudabi tʼe̩gu-wñ, oñ i wobi lʼoji otete alu ki che akwoubi le̩.
Amone̩ le̩ la mute̩gu kwefu Jo̩rdan dufu o̩je̩ e̩ke̩gwa ochu ejodudu, oñ ma ru Gilgal kʼi de̩ alo̩me̩ Je̩riko o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ.
Tak okuta me̩gweji ku ma ko kwefu Jo̩rdan le̩, e-le̩ Jo̩shua muko dago jo̩ Gilgal.
Tak i ka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, E̩gba kʼamo̩ma-me̩ atʼamata-ma ene ejo̩gba-i kakini, E̩wñ chʼofe okuta-i ta?
E̩gbale̩ ame̩ aje̩ ñw amo̩ma-me̩ ma kakini, Israe̩l daba Jo̩rdan-i oj ane̩ e̩gbe̩.
Todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ je̩ ñw omi Jo̩rdan-i gbe̩ bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩, gbogbo taku me̩ daba kpa, dabalu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ che Ohimini Ekpikpa kʼi je̩ ñw u gbe̩ bʼuwa o̩gba te̩, gbogbo tak a mudaba,
todu kʼabo ile̩-i du ki ma ka kʼo̩wo̩ Jihofa gbiti; kʼame̩ ki railo Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ o̩jo̩ du ki ñwa.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼamonu abo Amo̩r ku ma jʼudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olane̩ le̩ chaka kpai amonu abo Kenan ku ma jʼo̩lʼohimini chaka, gbo̩ abu ki Jihofa je̩ ñw omi Jo̩rdan gbe̩ bʼabo Israe̩l o̩gba te̩, gbogbo taku ma mudaba kpa, e̩do̩-ma muyo̩ efu-ma, afu laño̩ bo̩ efu-ma ge̩ n, tod abo Israe̩l le̩.
Adiko le̩ Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Me̩ du okuta o̩mu che abe̩ ñw o̩la-me̩, ku me̩ dabi kʼe̩pi abo Israe̩l da onukeji.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua fʼabe̩ okuta o̩mu che ñw o̩la-wñ, oñ i kʼe̩pi abo Israe̩l da Gibeat-haaralo̩t.
E̩wñ ki chi ku Jo̩shua la dʼuma e̩pi le̩ de̩: Aboke̩le̩ du ku ma jʼef abo ku ma kwʼ Ijipti dufu wa le̩, owñ chʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma jogu chaka leku ej o̩na ef aje̩tachi, abu ku ma kwʼIjipti dufu wa.
Todu amone̩ du ku ma kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu wa fʼe̩pi da, ama amone̩ du ku ma bi ej o̩na ef aje̩tachi abu ku ma kwʼIjipti dufu wa le̩, la dʼe̩pi ta n.

Todu abo Israe̩l tale ef aje̩tachi le̩ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, gbogbo taku ma fʼabo ichi le̩ du, owñ chʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma jogu ku ma kwʼ Ijipti dufu wa le̩, lie̩ kpa, todabu ku ma ma netirʼomu Jihofa n; owñ chʼabo ki Jihofa fugo̩ ñwu ma ka kʼi aje̩ ñwu ma fʼeju-ma do ane̩ e-ki Jihofa go̩ ñw amata-ma ka kʼi adu ñw a n, ane̩ kʼomi e̩nya kpai iño̩ acha efu-wñ.
Taku Jo̩shua fʼamo̩ma-ma kʼi ko kwane̩ koji ma e̩pi da; todu e̩pi-ma chʼodukulu ta, abu ku ma ma dʼuma e̩pi ej o̩na le̩ n.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ku ma fʼabo ichi le̩ e̩pi da kpa, kʼama kwojo̩ e̩gu-ma ef uru le̩ gbogbo tak i bie̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Omi fʼina Ijipti li bʼume̩ o̩la te̩ eñini-i me̩. Todule̩ ma dʼodu ugbo ki de̩ ko̩ Gilgal, gbogbo tʼeñini.
Oñ abo Israe̩l kworu Gilgal le̩; ma la fʼElaloji je̩ ane̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu le̩ ef egbili Je̩riko.
Tak ama fʼo̩ka e-echi ane̩ le̩ je̩ o̩jo̩ñwa Elaloji gbage̩de̩, owñ chʼakala kʼo̩jo̩wu ma do̩ n, kpai akakpa e̩ro̩.
Taku mana le̩ we o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, owñ chʼabu ku ma fʼe̩wñ oko ane̩ le̩ je̩; oñ abo Israe̩l ño̩ ne̩ mana le̩ ge̩ n, chai ero ane̩ Kenan ma je̩ o̩do̩ le̩.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ki Jo̩shua me̩ru Je̩riko le̩, kʼi la chi eju-wñ nyʼate̩ ago, e̩ la go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka dago kpenyʼu, o̩be̩chageli-wñ chʼe̩wo̩ nʼo̩wo̩; taki Jo̩shua nyʼugbo-wñ aka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩-wa e̩ che̩? abe̩k e̩ dʼef abo ku ma fʼuwa kpama?
Oñ i kakini, O̩da; ama todu kʼu chʼagboji abogu Jihofa oñ u wa-i. Taku Jo̩shua lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ i dojikane̩, i la ka ñw u kakini, Ab odu-mi aka ñw adu-wñ-i?
Tak agboji abogu Jihofa le̩ ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Mʼe̩da-we̩ gwo̩ bʼe̩re̩-we̩ te̩, todu ugbo kʼe̩ dago le̩ afo̩. Taku Jo̩shua fʼabe̩le̩ che̩.
Alaku Je̩riko chaka la chere, ma mʼukodo-wñ ko tunyu todu abo Israe̩l; e̩ne̩ du adufu n, e̩ne̩ du la agudu wʼejefu n.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini. Go, u mʼiJe̩riko du tʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ me̩, kpai onu-wñ, kpai ame̩nugbiti-wñ ku ma nʼuwohi,
oñ ane̩ ale ewo le̩ daka, aboke̩le̩ ku ma jogu chaka ale ewo le̩ daka onuʼka. Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ache gbogbo nyʼo̩jo̩ me̩fa.
Oñ amatama mebie ane̩ o̩kakachi o̩ga echi mebie ale rʼo̩gba akpati le̩; tak o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ ama ale ewo le̩ daka onu mebie, oñ amatama anʼo̩kakachi-ma afa.

Tak i awatu, e̩gba ku ma fa igba o̩ga echi le̩ taa, kʼame̩ la gbo̩ omu o̩kakachi le̩, amone̩ du anʼukwa akwa nana; tak o̩do̩ aku ewo le̩ agulo̩ bʼane̩ ma, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ efu amone̩ le̩ afʼe̩do̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ ate̩gu tʼo̩gba-wñ alo.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun le̩, fʼamatama do̩ wa oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼakpati alo le̩ du, tak amatama mebie ki nʼo̩kakachi o̩ga echi mebie rʼo̩gba akpati Jihofa le̩.
Tak i ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ kanyi alo ku me̩ le ewo le̩ daka, ku me̩ je̩ ñw aboke̩le̩ kʼo̩la-ma che̩mu ogu ku ma lale rʼo̩gba akpati Jihofa.
Oñ alu ki Jo̩shua ka ñw amone̩ le̩, amatama mebie ku ma nʼo̩kakachi o̩ga echi mebie o̩gba Jihofa le̩ le rʼo̩gba, oñ ma nʼo̩kakachi-ma afa, akpati alo Jihofa la tʼuma ubi.
Oñ aboke̩le̩ ku ma mʼo̩la ogu le rʼo̩gba amatama ku ma fa o̩kakachi le̩, oñ abo ki dʼubi tʼakpati ubi, ma nʼo̩kakachi afa abu ku ma alo.
Jo̩shua la ñwa ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki kpogu n, e̩ne̩ du ki gbʼomu-me̩ n, o̩la du ki kwef alu-me̩ dufu n, gbogbo nyʼo̩jo̩ kʼu naka ñwu me̩ ku me̩ kpogu; e̩gbale̩ taku me̩ akpogu.
Abe̩le̩ i je̩ ñw akpati Jihofa ki le ewo le̩ daka, i le onuʼka; taku ma lewa uru le̩, oñ ma kworu.
Taki Jo̩shua takpa kwane̩ odudu, oñ amatama mʼakpati Jihofa du.

Tak amatama mebie ku ma nʼo̩kakachi o̩ga echi mebie rʼo̩gba akpati Jihofa lale, ma nafa o̩kakachi le̩ alo waa; oñ aboke̩le̩ ku ma mʼo̩la ogu le̩ le rʼo̩gba-ma, tak abo ki dʼubi tʼakpati Jihofa ubi, ma nʼo̩kakachi afa abu ku ma lo.
Tak o̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ ma le ewo le̩ daka onuʼka, oñ ma mudabi tʼef uru. Abe̩le̩ ma che gbogbo o̩jo̩ me̩fa.
Oñ lewatu o̩jo̩ e̩kebie ma takpa kwane̩ e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ añwa bulubulu, oñ ma le ewo le̩ daka alu le̩ onu mebie: ma la le ewo le̩ daka onu mebie o̩jo̩ le̩.
Tak i lewatu, onu e̩kebie-wñ, e̩gba kʼamatama fa o̩kakachi-ma, Jo̩shua ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ kpogu ke; todu Jihofa mʼewo-i du ñwu me̩ me̩.
Me̩ ki mʼewo-i dute̩ ñwu Jihofa, tʼowñ, tʼe̩wñ du ki jʼefu-wñ; chai Rehab, ajo̩ko̩ le̩ kate adeju, owñ kpai abo du ku ma jʼef unyi-wñ kpai owñ, todabu kʼowñ mʼabo kʼa kpuche̩ le̩ ko maja.

I la chʼe-ame̩, me̩ ki fʼo̩la-me̩ de ugbo e̩wñ ku me̩ dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩, tode̩gba ku me̩ mʼu dute̩ ku me̩ adabi wa chi kwef uwñ; me̩ fʼabe̩le̩ che maku me̩ aje̩ ñw uru Israe̩l ki mud e̩wñ ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ge̩, ku me̩ ma la je̩ ñw u ñmin.
Ama ajifa-wñ chaka kpai o̩jamalia-wñ chaka kpai e̩wñ eku ebije ikpa kpai ebije, e̩wñ le̩ afo̩ ñw u Jihofa; e-le̩ atʼef akpulu e-Jihofa.

Abe̩le̩ amone̩ le̩ kwokpogu, oñ ma fʼo̩kakachi fa. Oñ i watu, e̩gba kʼamone̩ le̩ gbʼomu o̩kakachi ma nʼukwa elile akwa, tak o̩do̩ aku le̩ gulo̩ bane̩ma, oñ amone̩ du mute̩gu nyʼewo le̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ fʼe̩do̩ kʼe̩do̩ tʼo̩gba-wñ, oñ ma fʼewo le̩ du.
Taku ma nʼalu obe̩chageli kʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef ewo le̩ jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼonobule̩ tʼimo̩to̩ tʼogijo tʼo̩kokuno̩ tʼe̩wño̩re̩ egini tʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩.
Taki Jo̩shua ka ñw aboke̩le̩ meji ku ma nyʼatu ane̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ nyʼef unyi ajo̩ko̩ le̩ ku me̩ dʼonobule̩ le̩ dufu wa, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ alu ku me̩ go̩ ñw u le̩.

Tak abokolobia ku ma nyʼatu ane̩ le̩, nyʼejefu oñ ma du Rehab, kpai ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ kpai amo̩maye-wñ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ dufu; ma ño̩ kʼamefu-wñ chaka dufu ge̩; oñ ma mʼuma ko jʼej o̩do̩da uru abo Israe̩l le̩.
Taku ma fʼewo gujo rinyo̩ kpai e̩wñ du ki jʼefu-wñ; chai ajifa-wñ kpai o̩jamalia-wñ kpai e̩wñ eku ebijeikpa kpai ebije, ma mʼe-le̩ ko nyʼef akpulu ef unyi Jihofa.

Ama Jo̩shua fu Rehab ajo̩ko̩ le̩ kpai abo unyi ata-wñ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ jadu ku ma deju; oñ onobule̩ le̩ gugu alumeji abo Israe̩l gbogbo tʼojolu eñini, todabu kʼi kʼamonuche̩ ki Jo̩shua kpe̩ atʼane̩ Je̩riko le̩ maja.
Taku Jo̩shua je̩ ñwu ma go̩ iko le̩ kakini, Ama ki fʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi kwane̩ anʼo̩do̩ Je̩riko-i mu eju Jihofa. E̩re̩-wñ kʼi adudane̩ chʼo̩mo̩gba-wñ elenyo̩, alaku-wñ edudago chʼudabi-wñ elenyo̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa dʼugbo Jo̩shua; oñ uwohi-wñ dʼugbo du ane̩ le̩.

Ama amo̩ma Israe̩l fʼada je̩ efu e̩wñ ku ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩; todu Ekan, o̩ma Karmi, o̩ma Zabdi, o̩ma Zara, ef o̩lo̩pu Juda, mʼe̩wñ ko kwef e̩wñ ku ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩; tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo abʼabo Israe̩l ma.
Jo̩shua la fʼone̩ kpe̩ kwo Je̩riko nyi Ai kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ʼka Be̩t-afe̩n, o̩wo̩ olodudu Be̩te̩l, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ te̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩ atʼane̩ le̩. Tak aboke̩le̩ le̩ le natʼane̩ Ai.

Oñ ma mudabi wʼugbo Jo̩shua, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ki je̩ ñw o̩chaka amone̩-i le n, chai aboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji abe̩k e̩ta ki le ku ma fʼAi kpo̩fo̩; e̩ ki je̩ ñw amone̩-i chaka ki chʼo̩bata anyʼomo n, todu abo le̩ wewe n.
Abe̩le̩ uwewe aboke̩le̩ ku ma dab one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta nyʼo̩mo̩; oñ ma ra rʼo̩gba aboke̩le̩ Ai.

Aboke̩le̩ Ai le̩ la fʼaboke̩le̩-ma kpa dab one̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩fa; oñ ma fʼuma ne bʼalaku le̩ te̩ gbogbo nyi Shebarim, oñ ma fʼuma kpa ugbo agwo̩ru le̩. Tak e̩do̩ amone̩ le̩ muyo̩, oñ i mud omi elu-ma.
Taku Jo̩shua fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, oñ i lewa fʼeju ro̩ bʼane̩ ma o̩gba akpati Jihofa gbogbo tʼolane̩, owñ kpai abogijo Israe̩l; taku ma fʼebutu gba nyʼo̩la-ma oji.

Taku Jo̩shua kakini, Atogwo, Ondu Jihofa, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ kʼe̩ko amone̩-i du wʼudaba Jo̩rdan-i kʼe̩ mʼuwa ko nyʼef o̩wo̩ abo Amo̩r, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw a lenyo̩? E̩do̩-wa du kʼa gugu ejudaba Jo̩rdan le̩, i ma nyo̩.
O, Ondu, abʼu naka, abu kʼabo Israe̩l murida rʼame̩nebi-ma o̩gba.
Todu abo Kenan, kpai abo ku ma dodo ane̩-i chaka agbʼinabali-wñ, taku ma ado nyʼuwa daka, taku ma akʼodu-wa da bʼane̩-ile̩ te̩; oñ abʼuwe̩ ache todu odu-we̩ inaina-i ta?
Taki Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Kwane̩ dago, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ fʼeju-we̩ ro̩ bʼane̩ ma-i ta?

Abo Israe̩l fʼadure ta; ma laño̩ fʼalo-mi kʼu ñwa ñwu ma daba ge̩; ma la mʼe̩wñ ko kwef e̩wñ ku ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩; ma la fʼoji ji, ma ño̩ dʼo̩wo̩ ye eju ge̩; ma laño̩ mʼe̩wñ le̩ ko jʼef ane̩ e-ma ge̩.

Todule̩ oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l ma neke dago o̩gba ame̩nebi-ma n; oñ ma murida rʼo̩gba ame̩nebi-ma, todabu kʼama mʼo̩la-ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ me̩. U ñʼadʼugbo me̩ ge̩ n, chai e̩gba ku me̩ fʼe̩wñ ku ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩ chile̩che̩ bʼalumeji-me̩ te̩.

Kwane̩, fʼamone̩-i che ku ma fo̩, kʼe̩ la kakini, Me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ gwo rinyo̩ nyʼo̩na; todu abu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l ka de̩ kakini, O Israe̩l, e̩wñ ku ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ oka dʼalumeji-me̩; ame̩ neke dago o̩gba ame̩nebi-me̩ n, gbogbo taku me̩ dʼe̩wñ ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩ tinyo̩ bʼalumeji-me̩ te̩.

Todule̩ ama ako me̩ wa, o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu, odudu o̩na; tak abu i ade̩ de̩, o̩lo̩pu ki Jihofa mu adufu wa ikpunyi ikpunyi; tak ikpunyi ki Jihofa mu adufu wa akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi, tak abo akwo̩ra unyi ki Jihofa mu adufu wa okʼoka.
Taku ma afʼe̩ne̩ku Jihofa mu kʼe̩wñ ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩ dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ gujo, tʼowñ tʼe̩wñ du kʼi ne̩: todabu kʼi mʼalo Jihofa daba kpai todabu kʼi fʼe̩wñ tuñu che efu Israe̩l.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua takpa kwane̩ odudu, oñ i kʼabo Israe̩l wa o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu, oñ o̩la le̩ fʼabo o̩lo̩pu Juda mu;
tak i mʼabo Juda ko wa; oñ i fʼabo ikpunyi Zera mu: tak i mʼabo ikpunyi Ze̩ra kowa okʼoka; oñ i fu Zabdi mu;
tak i mʼabo akwo̩ra unyi-wñ duwa okʼoke; oñ i fu Ekan, o̩ma Karmi, o̩ma Zabdi, o̩ma Ze̩ra, ef o̩lo̩pu Juda mu.
Tak i Jo̩shua ka ñw Ekan kakini, O̩ma-mi, agba, e̩ ki dojima ñwu Jihofa, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l, kʼe̩ gbalu ñw u; ka ñwu mi e̩wñ kʼe̩ che fai; e̩ ki du maja ñwu mi n.
Tak Ekan dohi ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Ochochi, u fu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l dure me̩, e̩wñ kʼu che la de̩;

e̩gba kʼu fʼotogbo Babilo̩n o̩me̩me̩le̩ li ef ane̩ kʼa ko le̩, kpai ajifa alu she̩ke̩l ulo̩ko̩ kpai odukulu o̩jamaliaʼka kʼuwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l ooje, e̩gbale̩ u chʼejufufu-wñ oñ u mʼu ko; e̩ la go, i gwaji ane̩pe̩te̩ ef unyabo-mi le̩, ajifa la jʼofe-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼo̩mo̩, oñ ma fule nyʼef unyabo le̩; e̩ la go, i maja ef unyabo-wñ le̩, oñ ajifa jʼofe-wñ o̩gane̩.
Taku ma mʼu ko kwef unyabo le̩, oñ ma mʼu ko wʼugbo Jo̩shua, kpai abo Israe̩l chaka; taku ma mʼu ko jʼane̩ o̩gba Jihofa.

Taku Jo̩shua, kpai abo Israe̩l chaka, gwo̩nyu Ekan o̩ma Ze̩ra, kpai ajifa le̩, kpai otogbo, kpai odukulu o̩jamalia le̩, kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ kpai amo̩kokuno̩-wñ kpai amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩-wñ egini kpai unyabo-wñ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩; oñ ma mʼu ko wa jʼef o̩go̩ Eko̩r.
Taku Jo̩shua kakini, Ab e̩ le kʼe̩ ma chʼuwa uñmi n? Jihofa achʼuwe̩ uñmi eñini-i n. Tak abo Israe̩l chaka kʼokuta ro̩ dʼo; ma la nʼuna fʼuma gujo, oñ ma kʼokuta ro̩ do ma.
Oñ ma mʼokuta re bʼo̩ oji ma dago dab ugbu-du lile kʼi dʼo̩mo̩ gbogbo tʼeñini; taku Jihofa rida bʼe̩kpuna uwe̩do̩-wñ te̩. Todule̩ oñ ma dʼodu ugbo kide̩ ko̩ O̩go̩ Eko̩r, gbogbo tʼeñini.

Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, E̩ ki railo n, e̩do̩-we̩ ki muda kpu n; mʼabo ku ma jogu chaka ko lebʼuwe̩, kʼe̩ kwane̩, kʼe̩ nyi Ai; go, u mʼonu Ai, kpai abo-wñ, kpai ewo-wñ, kpai ane̩-wñ ko nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ me̩;
uwe̩ ki la che Ai kpai onu-wñ alu kʼe̩ che Je̩riko kpai onu-wñ le̩; e̩ muda mʼane̩-wñ kʼogu je̩ kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩-wñ ko chʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ñw o̩la-we̩: e̩ ki kpala nyʼewo le̩, ejubi-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua kwane̩, kpai abo ku ma jogu chaka, ku ma nyi Ai; taku Jo̩shua fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa chi, ame̩nugbiti ku ma nʼuwohi le̩, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma le odu.
Tak i ñwa ñw ma kakini, Go, ame̩ ki kpala nyʼewo le̩ ejubi-wñ; me̩ ki le jiji bʼewo le̩ te̩ n, ama o̩la-me̩ ki chʼe̩rnu chaka;
tak omi, kpai amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo mi, ate̩me̩rʼewo le̩. Oñ i awatu, e̩gba ku ma dufu wa kʼuma kobʼuwa alu ku ma wa che e̩gba ejodudu le̩, a ara rʼo̩gba-ma;
tak ama dufu wa atʼuwa ubi gbogbo tak a fʼuma fa bʼewo le̩ te̩; todu ama akakini, Ma ra rʼo̩gba-wa alu ku ma che ejodudu le̩. Abe̩le̩ a ara rʼo̩gba-ma;
tak ame̩ ki kwane̩ kwugbo ku me̩ kpala jo̩ le̩, ku me̩ mʼewo le̩ gba; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ amʼu du tʼume̩ o̩wo̩.
Tak i awatu, e̩gba ku me̩ mʼewo le̩ gba nyʼo̩wo̩, tak ame̩ adʼuna tʼewo le̩, ku me̩ che alu ki Jihofa ka le̩, me̩ go, omi ñwa ñwu me̩ me̩.
Taku Jo̩shua fʼuma kpe̩ lo; oñ ma nyʼakpala nyʼu le̩, ma la jo̩ agbagba Be̩te̩l kpai Ai, o̩wo̩ olane̩ Ai; Jo̩shua muda le̩ ef amone̩ le̩ odu o̩jo̩ le̩.
Oñ Jo̩shua takpa kwane̩ odudu-wñ, oñ i mʼamone̩ le̩ ko talajo̩, tak owñ kpai abogijo Israe̩l tʼamone̩ le̩ o̩gba nyi Ai.
Tak abo ku ma jogu ku ma jʼugbo-wñ le̩ chaka mute̩gu alo, oñ ma te̩me̩ru ejo̩gba ewo le̩, oñ ma ru o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ Ai, o̩go̩ la dʼagbagba ama kpai Ai.
Tak i mʼone̩ dabu icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu ko, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma kpala jo̩ agbagba Be̩te̩l kpai Ai, o̩wo̩ olane̩ ewo le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma kʼamone̩ le̩ jo̩, owñ chʼabo uru ku ma jo̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ ewo le̩ chaka, kpai abo-ma ku ma kpala jo̩ o̩wo̩ olane̩ ewo le̩. Taku Jo̩shua nyʼalumeji o̩go̩ odu o̩jo̩ le̩.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼonu Ai fʼu li, owñ kpʼabo-wñ chaka chane̩ enaju, oñ ma takpa kwane̩, tak aboke̩le̩ ewo le̩ ledufu ku ma kogu bʼabo Israe̩l Araba ugbo ku ma kate̩ le̩; i la ma kʼaboʼka kpala jo̩ anede owñ ejubi ewo le̩ n.
Taku Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l chaka chʼakpaine̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩wo̩ abo le̩ tʼe-ma le, oñ ma rale rʼo̩na aje̩tachi.
Oñ ma fʼamone̩ du ku ma jʼef ewo le̩ do̩wajo̩ ku ma rano ma; taku ma rano Jo̩shua, oñ ma gwʼuma o̩gwo̩ bʼewo le̩ te̩.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ki ma ledufu arano abo Israe̩l bo̩ ef Ai abe̩ku Be̩te̩l in; ma la tʼewo le̩ no̩ te̩ gbagada, oñ ma rano abo Israe̩l.
Taki Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, E̩ fʼopiolo ki dʼef o̩wo̩-we̩ le̩ nadala rʼo̩wo̩ Ai; todu namʼu du tʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩. Taki Jo̩shua fʼopiolo ki dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ le̩ nadala rʼo̩wo̩ Ai.
Oñ abo ku ma kpala jo̩ le̩ kwane̩ kwʼugbo ku ma jo̩ le̩ piopio, tak abu kʼi fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala te̩, ababale̩ ma fule, oñ ma mugudu wʼef ewo le̩, ma la mʼu gba nyʼo̩wo̩; taku ma hika dʼuna tʼewo le̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼaboke̩le̩ Ai dejubi, me̩ la go, ma li kʼodudu ewo le̩ ate̩gu nyʼojale; tak o̩wo̩-ma ma bo̩jo̩ ku ma ra nyʼugbo du n, tak abo ku ma ra rʼo̩wo̩ aje̩tachi le̩ mudabi abʼabo ku ma rano ma ma.
Oñ e̩gba ku Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l chaka li ka kʼabo ku ma kpala jo̩ mʼewo le̩ gba nyʼo̩wo̩, kʼodudu ewo le̩ ate̩gu lukuu tʼate̩, ma murida agwʼaboke̩le̩ Ai dajane̩.

Oñ abo ki bo̩ kwʼef ewo le̩ dufu wa akobʼuma; abe̩le̩ ma jʼalumeji abo Israe̩l, abo iche̩ka dʼejemi, iche̩ka la dʼejano̩mo̩; ma la gwo ma dajane̩ gbogbo e̩ne̩ ma du bo̩ n, e̩ne̩ du ef uma la fʼuma o̩wo̩ n.
Ma muda fʼonu Ai mu udeju, oñ ma mʼu du wʼugbo Jo̩shua.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l fʼabo ku ma dodo Ai le̩ kpa kpa egbili ef aje̩tachi ugbo ku ma rano ma le̩, kʼalu ugbada fʼuma gwo dajane̩ chaka, gbogbo taku ma fu ma lie̩ kpa, abo Israe̩l chaka mudabi wʼAi, oñ ma nʼalu ugbada gwo ma da.
Amone̩ du ki wane̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, tʼaboke̩le̩ tʼabobule̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji, owñ chʼabo Ai chaka.
Todu Jo̩shua fʼo̩wo̩-wñ kʼi du nʼopiolo dala te̩ kama gbogbo tak i mʼabo du ku ma dodo Ai le̩ kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ n.
Chai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kpai ane̩ ewo le̩ kʼogu je̩; e-le̩ kate abo Israe̩l muko chʼe-ma, likpa alu kʼo̩la de̩ ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Jo̩shua le̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua fʼAi gujo, oñ i mʼu du ko̩ ugbudu tʼogbegbele̩, alache̩ i che gbogbo tʼeñini.

I la mʼonu Ai le̩ du lo̩ko̩li oj oli gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩: tak abu kʼolu atunyane̩ Jo̩shua ñwa ñwu ma, taku ma mʼoku-wñ du tane̩ bʼoj oli te̩, oñ ma mʼu du rikpolo tʼalaku ewo le̩, ma la fʼokuta re bʼoji-wñ ma ki gba dab ugbudu lile, kʼi dago o̩mo̩ gbogbo tʼeñini.
Taku Jo̩shua fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpa ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, oj uwo Ebal,

alu ku Mose̩s, adu Jihofa le̩ ñwa ñw abo Israe̩l, owñ chʼalu kʼi che̩ko̩ tane̩ ef ubuku uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s, ubo̩-wñ chʼokuta okuta odukulu, e-kʼone̩ ma dʼebije kado kʼi gbe̩ n; oñ ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa che ñwu Jihofa oji-wñ, kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩.
Tak i fʼuwo̩li o̩lubutu uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s kʼi du wa eju abo Israe̩l le̩ ko̩ nyʼo̩la okuta o̩mo̩.

Tak abo Israe̩l, tʼo̩mane̩, tʼilowa, kpai amako̩takada-ma, kpai amakajo̩-ma chaka, kwodago ejemi kpai ejano̩mo̩ akpati le̩ o̩gba amatama ku ma chʼabo Lifai ku ma nʼakpati alo Jihofa, ukpe̩reji-ma jʼo̩gba uwo Gerizim, ukpe̩reji-ma la jʼo̩gba uwo Ebal; alu ki Mose̩s adu Jihofa ñwa ñwu ma e̩gba ejodudu le̩, kʼama ki kadua ñw abo Israe̩l.
Oñ anubile̩, i fʼo̩la o̩takada uko̩-o̩la duu kalata, tʼe̩nyo̩-wñ kʼi adu ñw one̩, tʼama-wñ kʼi ana ñw one̩, teju e̩wñ duu ku ma ko̩ nyʼo̩takada uko̩-o̩la le̩.
I nʼo̩la duu ku Mose̩s ñwa te̩, ku Jo̩shua ma dago o̩gba ujeju Israe̩l le̩ akalata n, tʼabobule̩, tʼabo egini, tʼamilowa ku ma jʼale efu ma.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼamonu du ku ma jʼudaba Jo̩rdan ane̩ uwo-wñ kpai ane̩ o̩go̩-wñ o̩la Ohimini Elile o̩gba Le̩bano̩n le̩ gbʼinabali-wñ, owñ chʼabo He̩t kpai abo Amo̩r kpai abo Kenan kpai abo Pe̩re̩z kpai abo Hifai kpai abo Je̩bius le̩;
ma kʼo̩la-ma wa jeju jo̩, alu-ma chʼokate, ku ma kʼogu bo̩ Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l.
Ama e̩gba kʼabo ku ma dodo Gibeo̩n gbʼinabali e̩wñ ki Jo̩shua che Je̩riko kpai e-kʼi che Ai,
mu la fʼugbeju che, ma fʼo̩la-ma che dabe̩ne̩ kʼama chʼamonuche̩ onuʼka, ma mʼe̩gbo akpulu ko nʼubi amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-ma wa, kpai aiko omi achiwebe̩te̩ma e-igbele ki chʼe̩kpana taku ma ga,
kpai e̩da ki gbo taku ma bʼe̩wñ mo̩ jʼe̩re̩-ma, e̩wñ o̩la e̩gbo jʼo̩la-ma; uje̩wñ du ku ma ne̩ nyʼo̩na aje̩ la chʼe̩gbe̩, i chʼe̩kpebu.
Taku ma nyʼuru Gilgal ugbo Jo̩shua, oñ ma ka ñw u kpai aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l kakini, A kwʼane̩ o̩najiji wa; todule̩ me̩ kpʼalo kpai awa ke.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ka ñw abo Hifai le̩ kakini, Ikani i chʼefu-wa oñ me̩ dodo; ab a le kʼa kpʼalo kpai ame̩?
Taku ma ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Amadu-we̩ a che. Taki Jo̩shua ka ñwu ma kakini, Abo ugbo me̩ che ta? Ugbo me̩ kwo wa?
Ma ka ñw u kakini, Ane̩ ki dʼo̩najiji oñ amadu-we̩ kwo wa-i, todu odu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; todu a gbo̩ uwohi-wñ, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che Ijipti,
kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che amonu abo Amo̩r meji ku ma jʼudaba Jo̩rdan le̩, owñ che Siho̩n onu He̩sh-bo̩n, kpai O̩g onu Beshan, e-kʼi de̩ Ashtaro̩t.
Oñ abogijo-wa kpai abo ane̩-wa chaka ka ñw a kakini, Me̩ mʼuje̩wñ ku me̩ je̩ ej o̩na ko nyʼo̩wo̩, ku me̩ ledo ma, ku me̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, Amadu-me̩ a che; todule̩ fai me̩ kpʼalo kpai awa ke.
Uje̩wñ ule̩-wa-i chebo̩ una e̩gba kʼa ko kwef unyi-wa dufu kʼa wʼugbo me̩-i, fai, e̩ la go, i gbe̩, i la kpebu;
aiko omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-i chʼetito̩ e̩gba kʼa chʼomi nyʼu e̩ko̩ kʼa kwane̩ unyi; e̩ la go, i kpana me̩; e̩wñ o̩la-wa-i, kpai e̩da-wa gbo noj ujiji ule̩-wñ ki tabale.
Tak aboke̩le̩ le̩ bʼuma jʼuje̩wñ ule̩-ma, ma la ti Jihofa ene n.
Taku Jo̩shua fʼure̩do̩ che kpai ama, oñ i fʼalo kpe̩ kpai ama, kʼi je̩ ñwu ma deju; amidachi abo o̩gbadu le̩ go̩ ñwu ma.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta ku ma kpʼalo kpai ama le̩ jo̩, ma gbʼinabali ka ku ma chʼabo ki dodo me̩ru ma anane̩, ma laño̩ dodo efu-ma ge̩.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩ oñ ma lewa ewo-ma o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta. Alu kʼodu ewo-ma ko de̩; Gibeo̩n kpai Chefira kpai Birot kpai Kiriat-jearim.
Abo Israe̩l muda kpa ma n, todabu kʼamidachi abo o̩gbadu le̩ fu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, go̩ ñwu ma. Tak abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka chane̩ ekʼeñmini nyʼamidachi o̩la.
Ama amidachi le̩ du ka ñw abo o̩gbadu chaka kakini, A fi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l go̩ ñwu ma me̩, todule̩ a neke ño̩ do̩wo̩kado ma fai ge̩ n.
E̩wñ kʼa ache ñwu ma de̩, a je̩ ñwu ma deju; tode̩gba kʼuwe̩do̩ lewa bʼuwa ma todu ego̩ kʼa go̩ ñwu ma le̩.
Tak amidachi le̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Je̩ ñwu ma deju. Abe̩le̩ ma mud abo ku ma kpʼiji na kpai abo ku ma kpʼomiofo ñw abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka, alu kʼamidachi le̩ ka ñwu ma.
Taki Jo̩shua fʼuma do̩ wa, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ gwʼuwa o̩gwo̩, kʼame̩ kakini, Awa chʼabo o̩najiji? me̩ la dodo efu-wa.
Todule̩ ama fʼume̩ mu me̩, adu eche ada efu-me̩ ogbegbele̩ n, owñ chʼabo ku ma kpʼiji na kpai abo ku ma kpʼomiofo todu unyi O̩jo̩-mi.

Ma dohi ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Todabu ku ma ka ñw amadu-we̩-i kpaka, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ñwa ñw adu-wñ Mose̩s, kʼi adʼane̩-i chaka ñwu me̩, kʼi la fʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩-i kparinyo̩ bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩; todabe̩le̩ a chokpo oji o̩la-wa nana tod uwe̩, oñ a che e̩wñ-i.
E̩ la go ta, a jʼef o̩wo̩-we̩: alu ki chenyo̩ ki chʼo̩kpakpa eju-we̩ kʼe̩ che ñw a, e̩ che ke.
Abe̩le̩ i la che ma, oñ i mʼuma gba kwef o̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l, kʼama ki we ekpa ma.
Taku Jo̩shua ko ma che amakpijina kpai amakpomiofo todu abo o̩gbadu le̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, kpai tod ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-Jihofa uña ugbo kʼi adu ñw o̩la-wñ gbogbo tʼojolu eñini.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼAdoni-Zede̩k onu Je̩rusale̩m gbo̩ alu ki Jo̩shua fu Ai du kʼi la mʼu dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko, (kʼi la che Ai kpai onu-wñ alu kʼi che Je̩riko kpai onu-wñ ge̩), kpai alu kʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩ Gibeo̩n fʼure̩do̩ che kpai abo Israe̩l, ku ma la jo̩ efu-ma,
ma chane̩ erailo tabale, todabu ku Gibeo̩n chʼewo ki nana, dabe̩ne̩ kʼewo onu, todabu kʼi laño̩ nana tʼAi le, aboke̩le̩-wñ chaka la chʼamagbiti.
Todule̩ Adoni-Zede̩k, onu Je̩rusale̩m le̩ fʼone̩ kpe̩ru Hohma onu He̩bro̩n, kpai Piram onu Jarmut, kpai Jafia onu Lakish, kpai De̩bir onu Eglo̩n, kakini,
Me̩ te̩gu wa ku me̩ te̩ko mi, kʼa ki fu Gibeo̩n kpo̩fo̩; todu owñ fʼure̩do̩ che kpai Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l.

Tak amonu abo Amo̩r me̩lu le̩, owñ chʼonu Je̩rusale̩m kpai onu He̩bro̩n kpai onu Jarmut kpai onu Lakish kpai onu Eglo̩n, kʼo̩la-ma jeju jo̩, tak ama kpai abogu-ma chaka mute̩gu ku ma ru le Gibeo̩n daka, oñ ma kʼogu bʼo̩.

Tak abo Gibeo̩n kpʼone̩ nyʼugbo Jo̩shua uru Gilgal le̩, ma kakini, E̩ ki bo̩wo̩lo̩ ugbo ate̩ko amadu-we̩-i n; mute̩gu wʼugbo wa piopio, kʼe̩ mʼuwa gba; todu amonu Amo̩r du ku ma dodo ane̩ uwo le̩ kʼo̩la-ma jeju nyʼuwa.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua kwo Gilgal mute̩gu le, owñ, kpai abogu du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kpai amagbiti ku ma nʼuwohi chaka.
Taki Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, E̩ ki railo ma n, todu omi mʼuma ko nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩; e̩ne̩kate efu-ma adago o̩gba-we̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua lewa bʼuma ma achigili, abu kʼi kwo Gilgal te̩gu alo gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩.
Oñ Jihofa fʼuma biya o̩gba abo Israe̩l, oñ i nʼuku elile akpa ma Gibeo̩n, tak i fʼuma ne lʼo̩na ategu Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n, i la gwo ma da gbogbo wa Azika gbogbo wa Makeda.

Oñ i lewatu abu ku ma jʼara rʼogha abo Israe̩l, abu ku ma agwo̩ru Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n le̩, Jihofa ko okuta elile ro̩ kwo ojale wa abʼuma oji ma gbogbo wa Azika, oñ ma leku; abo ku ma ku noj okuta o̩mo̩jo̩cha la wewe tʼabo kʼabo Israe̩l nʼugbada kpa le.
Taki Jo̩shua ko̩la ñwu Jihofa o̩jo̩ ki Jihofa mʼabo Amo̩r ko nyʼabo Israe̩l o̩wo̩ le̩, oñ i ka eju abo Israe̩l kakini,
Tak olu kwodago, ochu la kwʼe̩gu-wñ n,
O̩jo̩ʼka ki Jihofa netirʼomu one̩ abe̩le̩ la dʼo̩gba-wñ n, i la dʼubi-wñ n; todu Jihofa fʼogu ja todu abo Israe̩l.
Taku Jo̩shua mudabi, oñ abo Israe̩l chaka la lebʼowñ nyʼuru Gilgal le̩.
Oñ amonu me̩lu le̩ ra nyʼakʼo̩la-ma maja ef owo Makeda.
Taku ma mudu ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Ma fʼamonu me̩lu le̩ li abu ku ma maja ef owo Makeda.
Taki Jo̩shua kakini, Me̩ mʼokuta elile li bʼalu owo le̩ ma, ku me̩ kʼone̩ jʼo̩mo̩ ku ma fʼuma de;
me̩ ki muda kpo̩kpe̩ o̩mo̩ n, me̩ ki rano ame̩nebi-me̩ le̩, me̩ gbʼuma ubi, me̩ je̩ ñwu ma gudu wʼef ewo-ma n; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ mʼuma ko nyʼume̩ o̩wo̩ me̩.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ki Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l gwo ma dajane̩ e̩kute̩ gbogbo taku ma lie̩ rinyo̩, kʼe̩bo̩bo̩-ma ki bo̩ mugudu nyʼef ewo ewo ki nʼaku,
tak amone̩ le̩ chaka mudabi wʼuru-ma ugbo Jo̩shua Makeda kpai ure̩do̩; e̩ne̩ du gbe̩do̩ hi alu kado abo Israe̩l o̩la n.
Taku Jo̩shua kakini, Mʼalu owo bi ku me̩ kʼamonu me̩lu le̩ kwef owo le̩ dufu ñwu mi.
Taku ma fʼabe̩le̩ che, ma la kʼamonu me̩lu le̩ kwef owo dufu ñw u, owñ che onu Je̩rusale̩m kpai onu He̩bro̩n kpai onu Jarmut kpai onu Lakish kpai onu Eglo̩n.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ku ma kʼamonu dufu wʼugbo Jo̩shua, Jo̩shua fʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka do̩ wa, oñ i ka ñw ame̩nuto̩gba ef abogu ku ma le bʼowñ le̩ kakini, Mute̩wa, ku me̩ mʼe̩re̩ ko dʼamonu-i o̩lo̩. Oñ ma mute̩wa, taku ma mʼe̩re̩-ma ko dʼuma o̩lo̩.
Taki Jo̩shua ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ki chokpo n, e̩do̩-me̩ ki muda kpu n; me̩ fʼeju gbiti, me̩ fʼugbe̩do̩ ne̩; todu abe̩le̩ oñ Jihofa ache ame̩nebi-me̩ kʼame̩ abʼuma jogu chaka.
Ubile̩ taku Jo̩shua fʼuma gwo utili utili, oñ i ko ma kpa, tak i ko ma lo̩ko̩li o̩la oli me̩lu. Oñ ma lo̩ko̩li o̩la oli le̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩.

Oñ i lewatu adiko kʼolu atunyʼane̩ Jo̩shua ñwa ñwu ma, oñ ma mʼuma ko kwʼoji oli wʼane̩, taku ma ko ma rikpolo jʼef owo ugbo ku ma kʼo̩la-ma maja le̩, oñ ma kʼokuta elile-lile bʼalu owo le̩ ma, gbogbo tʼeñini.

Jo̩shua la fu Makeda du o̩jo̩ le̩, oñ i nʼalu ugbada gwo ma, kpai onu-wñ da ge̩; i mʼuma ko jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko tʼowñ tʼonugo one̩ du ku ma jʼefu-wñ, i tʼe̩ne̩ kate no̩ kʼi bo̩ n; i la che onu Makeda alu kʼi che onu Je̩riko.
Taku Jo̩shua kwo Makeda lale tu Libna, abo Israe̩l du la jʼugbo-wñ, oñ i kʼogu bo̩ Libna le̩;

taki Jihofa ño̩ mʼo̩mo̩ kpai onu-wñ ko nyʼabo Israe̩l o̩wo̩ ge̩; oñ i nʼalu ugbada gwʼo da, kpai amonugo one̩ du ku ma jʼefu-wñ; i tʼe̩ne̩ kate no̩ kʼi bo̩ efu-wñ n. I la che onu-wñ alu kʼi che onu Je̩riko le̩ ge̩.
Taki Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l chaka manyʼowñ, kwo Libna lale tu Lakish, oñ ma ru nyʼu jo̩, ma la kʼogu bʼo̩;
Jihofa laño̩ mu Lakish le̩ du tʼabo Israe̩l o̩wo̩ ge̩, oñ i fʼu du o̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ, i la nʼalu ugbada gwʼo da, kpai amonugo one̩ du ku ma jʼefu-wñ, alu du kʼi che Libna le̩.
Taku Horam onu Geze̩r lewa kʼi gbutu ñwu Lakish le̩; oñ Jo̩shua fʼowñ kpai amone̩-wñ gwoda gboogbo, i la tʼe̩ne̩ du no̩ kʼi bo̩ o̩mo̩ n.
Taki Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l du manyʼu kwo Lakish lale nyi Eglo̩n, ma la ru nyʼu, oñ ma kʼogu bʼo̩; ma la fʼu du o̩jo̩ le̩;
taku ma nʼalu ugbada gwo da; oñ i mʼamonugo one̩ du ku ma jʼefu-wñ kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ hioko, alu du kʼi che Lakish le̩.
Taki Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l du kwo Eglo̩n lale tu He̩bro̩n; oñ ma kogu bʼo̩.

Ma la fʼu du oñ ma nʼalu ugbada gwʼo da tʼonu tʼadogbe-wñ chaka tʼamonugo one̩ du ku ma jʼefu-wñ; i tʼe̩ne̩ du no̩ kʼi bo̩ n, alu du kʼi che Eglon; i la mʼu dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko manyʼamonugo one̩ du ku ma jʼefu-wñ.
Taku Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l du mudabi nyi Debir, oñ ma kogu bʼo̩,

i la fʼu du manyʼonu-wñ kpai adogbe-wñ chaka; oñ ma nʼalu ugbada gwo ma da, ma la mʼamonugo one̩ chaka ku ma jʼefu-wñ kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩; i tʼe̩ne̩ kate no̩ kʼi bo̩ n. Alu kʼi che He̩bro̩n, kpai alu kʼi che Libna, abe̩le̩ i ño̩ che Debir, kpai onu-wñ ge̩.

Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua fʼane̩ le̩ chaka gwoda, tʼane̩ uwo-wñ, tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, tʼane̩ o̩go̩, tʼate̩gu-wñ, tʼamonu-ma chaka; i tʼe̩ne̩ kate no̩ kʼi bo̩ n, i mʼe̩wñ du ki añmiñmi kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ñwate̩.
Oñ Jo̩shua gwo ma da akwo Kede̩sh-barnea gbogbo wa Gaza, kpai ane̩ Goshe̩n chaka gbogbo wa Gibeo̩n.
Oñ Jo̩shua mʼamonu-i chaka kpai ane̩-ma gba e̩gba kate, todabu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, jogu tod abo Israe̩l.
Taki Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l chaka mudabi wʼuru Gilgal le̩.
Tak i lewatu, e̩gba ki Jebin, onu Hazo̩r, gbʼinabah-wñ, i la fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Jobab onu Madon kpai tugbo onu Shimro̩n kpai tugbo onu Akshaf
kpai tugbo amonu ku ma jʼane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ kpai oj ane̩ uwo-wñ kpai efu Araba kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ Chine̩re̩t kpai ane̩ o̩go̩-wñ kpai otete Do̩r o̩wo̩ olane̩,
tugbo abo Kenan o̩wo̩ olodudu kpai o̩wo̩ olane̩ kpai abo Amo̩r kpai abo He̩t kpai abo Pe̩re̩z kpai abo Je̩bius oj ane̩ uwo le̩ kpai abo Hifai ku ma jo̩ e̩re̩ He̩rmo̩n oj ane̩ Mizpa.
Taku ma ledufu, ama kpai abogu-ma chaka, amone̩-wñ tabale, uwewe-ma la dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩lanyi ki dʼo̩la ohimini, ma nʼamanya kpai o̩ko̩ ogu otemeje.
Tak amonu le̩, chaka le dʼo̩la-ma, oñ ma lewa ru ugbokate, ugbo omi Me̩rom, ku ma kʼogu bʼabo Israe̩l.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, E̩ ki railo ma n, todu iko-i o̩na nakʼoku-ma jo̩ ñw abo Israe̩l: e̩ ki fʼilolo e̩re̩ amanya-ma ko̩da kʼe̩ la fʼo̩ko̩ ogu-ma gujo rinyo̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua kpai abo ogu chaka ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, lewa ugbo ma ugbo omi Me̩rom le̩ achigili, taku ma lewa abʼuma ma.

Oñ Jihofa mu ma ko nyʼabo Israe̩l o̩wo̩, taku ma gwo ma da, ma fu ma ne gbogbo wa Saido̩n elile le̩, gbogbo wa Misrefo̩t-maim, gbogbo wa o̩go̩ Mizpe o̩wo̩ olodudu; oñ ma gwo ma da gbogbo ma je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du bo̩ deju ge̩ n.
Jo̩shua la che ma alu ki Jihofa ka ñw u; i fʼilolo e̩re̩ amanya-ma ko̩da, oñ i fʼo̩ko̩ ogu-ma gujo rinyo̩.
Taku Jo̩shua mudabi tʼubi iko le̩, oñ i fu Hezo̩r du, i la nʼugbada kpa onu-wñ; todu Hezo̩r le̩ chʼoji ojane̩ ojane̩ o̩mo̩ chaka akwoubi.
Oñ ma nʼalu ugbada fʼamonugo one̩ chaka ku ma jʼefu-wñ gwo dajane̩, ma ko ma jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko; e̩ne̩ du bo̩ kʼi añmiñmi efu-ma n, oñ i nʼuna fu Hezor gujo rinyo̩.
Taku Jo̩shua mʼewo ewo amonu le̩ chaka kpai amonu-ma chaka ko oñ i nʼalu ugbada gwo ma da, i la mʼuma ko jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko, alu ki Mose̩s adu Jihofa le̩ ñwate̩.
Abo Israe̩l muda gu ewo okate ki dago oji otete ugbo ku ma ko unyi igbele, jo n, chai Hezo̩r kate; e-le̩ Jo̩shua fugujo.

Oñ abo Israe̩l mʼane̩ ewo ewo-i kʼogu le̩ je̩ du kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩-wñ ko chʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ñw o̩la-ma; ma muda nʼalu ugbada gwo amone̩-wñ du da, gbogbo taku ma fu ma kpa rinyo̩ kpa, ma la tʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi añmiñmi no̩ n.
Alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s, adu-wñ, alu le̩ Mose̩s ñwa ñwu Jo̩shua; abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua che; e̩wñ du ki Mose̩s ñwa ñw u i dʼokate-wñ tinyo̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua mʼane̩ le̩ chaka gba, tʼane̩ uwo-wñ, tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ chaka, tʼane̩ Goshe̩n le̩ chaka, tʼane̩ o̩go̩, tʼAraba, kpai ane̩ uwo e-Israe̩l kpai o̩go̩ ane̩ le̩ ge̩
akwo uwo Halak, kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ ate̩gu nyi Seir le̩, gbogbo wa Beal-gad ef o̩go̩ Lebanon e̩re̩ uwo He̩rmo̩n. Oñ i mʼamonu-ma chaka ko, i la fʼuma gwoda, oñ i fu ma kpa.
Jo̩shua la kʼogu bʼamonu le̩ gbane̩ gbane̩.
I nʼewo du kʼi chʼure̩do̩ kpai abo Israe̩l in, chai abo Hifai ku ma dodo Gibeo̩n; ogu le̩ fʼuma du chaka.
Todu Jihofa dʼe̩do̩ e̩gbiti ñwu ma, ku ma kʼogu wa bʼabo Israe̩l ma, kʼi mu ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ne̩ du ki we eli ma eju, todu kʼi kpa ma rinyo̩, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s le̩.

Taki Jo̩shua lewa iko le̩, oñ i fʼabo Anak ko̩da rinyo̩ bʼane̩ uwo kpai He̩bro̩n kpai Debir kpai Anab, te̩, kpai bʼane̩ uwo Juda chaka te̩, kpai bʼane̩ uwo e-Israe̩l te̩ chaka; Jo̩shua mʼama kpai ewo ewo-ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko.
Abo Anak okate bo̩ oj ane̩ Israe̩l in; chai Gaza kpai Gat kpai Ashdo̩d, oñ ma bo̩bo̩ re.

Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua mʼo̩gbo̩ ane̩ le̩ chaka gba, likpa alu du ki Jihofa ko̩la ñwu Mose̩s; taku Jo̩shua mʼu ko chʼe̩wñ ogu ñw abo Israe̩l, likpa alu ku ma chʼe̩kpe̩ru ojoji ojoji o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma. Tak ane̩ le̩ bo̩ lii ñw ogu.
Abo-i la chʼamonu ane̩ le̩ e-kʼabo Israe̩l gwo dajane̩, ku ma mʼane̩-ma gba ejudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu, akwo o̩go̩ Amo̩n gbogbo wa uwo He̩rmo̩n, kpai ane̩ Araba chaka o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩:
Siho̩n, onu abo Amo̩r kʼi dodo He̩shbo̩n, kʼo̩da-wñ te̩ kwo Aroe̩r, kʼi dʼotete o̩go̩ Arno̩n, kpai e-ki dʼalumeji o̩go̩ le̩, kpai ukpe̩reji Gilead, gbogbo wʼaji Jabo̩k alo̩me̩ abo Amo̩n le̩,

kpai Araba gbogbo wa ohimini Chine̩ro̩t, o̩wo̩ olodudu, kpai gbogbo wʼohimini Araba, owñ chʼOhimini Omu o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩, o̩na ku ma nyi Be̩t-je̩shimo̩t, kpai rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, o̩gane̩ e̩re̩ uwo Pisga;
kpai alo̩me̩ Og onu Beshan, kʼi dʼef e̩bo̩bo̩ abo Refaim, ku ma dodo Ashtaro̩t kpai Edrei
kʼi nʼo̩da uwo He̩rmpn kpai Salaka kpai Beshan chaka, gbogbo wʼalo̩me̩ abo Ge̩shur kpai abo Maakat, kpai ukpe̩reji Gilead gbogbo wʼalo̩me̩ Siho̩n onu He̩shbo̩n.
Mose̩s, adu Jihofa le̩, kpai abo Israe̩l gwo ma dajane̩; taku Mose̩s adu Jihofa le̩ mʼane̩ le̩ ko ñw abo Rube̩n, kpai abo Gad, kpai ukpe̩reji abo Manasa ku ma ki ne̩.

Oñ abo-i chʼamonu ane̩ e-ki Jo̩shua kpai abo Israe̩l gwo dajane̩ udaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ kwo Beal-gad ef o̩go̩ Le̩bano̩n gbogbo wa uwo Halak kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ ate̩gu nyi Se̩ir le̩ (oñ Jo̩shua mʼe-le̩ ko ñw o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l ku ma ki ne̩ likpa alu ku ma che̩kpe̩ru ojoji ojoji;

ane̩ uwo kpai ane̩ o̩go̩ kpai oj ane̩ Araba kpai ane̩ ate̩gu uwo kpai ane̩ ef aje̩tachi kpai o̩pata o̩wo̩ o̩gane̩; ane̩ abo He̩t kpai abo Amo̩r kpai abo Kenan kpai abo Pe̩re̩z kpai abo Hifai kpai abo Je̩bius):
onu Je̩riko chʼoka; onu Ai, kʼi dʼakolo Be̩te̩l, chʼoka;
onu Je̩rusale̩m chʼoka, onu He̩bro̩n chʼoka;
onu Jannut chʼoka; onu Lakish chʼoka;
onu Eglo̩n chʼoka; onu Geze̩r chʼoka;
onu Debir chʼoka; onu Ge̩de̩r chʼoka;
onu Ho̩rma chʼoka; onu Arad chʼoka;
onu Libna chʼoka; onu Adulam chʼoka;
onu Makeda chʼoka; onu Be̩te̩l chʼoka;
onu Tapua chʼoka; onu He̩fe̩r chʼoka;
onu Afe̩k chʼoka; onu Lasharo̩n chʼoka;
onu Mado̩n chʼoka; onu He̩zo̩r chʼoka;
onu Shimro̩n-me̩ro̩n chʼoka; onu Akshaf chʼoka;
onu Taanak chʼoka; onu Me̩gido chʼoka;
onu Kede̩sh chʼoka; onu Jo̩kneam efu Karme̩l chʼoka;
onu Do̩r oji otete Do̩r chʼoka; onu abo Go̩i efu Gilgal chʼoka;
onu Tirza chʼoka; amonu le̩ chaka chʼogue̩gwa nyokeʼka.
Jo̩shua la chʼogijo me̩, o̩do̩-wñ chenana; taki Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ chʼogijo, o̩do̩-we̩ la wewe me̩, ane̩ ki bo̩ ku me̩ agba chʼe-me̩ chenana ta.
Ane̩ ki bo̩ le̩ de̩: ugbo du kʼabo Filistia de̩, kpai abo Ge̩shur

(akwo Shiho̩r e-ki dʼo̩gba Ijipti le̩, gbogbo wʼalo̩me̩ E̩kro̩n o̩pata o̩wo̩ ate̩, e-ku ma fulo rʼefu e-abo Kenan le̩; amodu abo Filistia me̩lu le̩, abo Gaza kpai abo Ashdo̩d kpai abo Ashkelo̩n kpai abo Gat kpai abo E̩kro̩n), kpai abo Afim,
ku ma jʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ ge̩, ane̩ abo Kenan chaka, kpai Me̩ara kʼabo Saido̩n ne̩ le̩, gbogbo wa Afe̩k, gbogbo wʼalo̩me̩ abo Amo̩r,
kpai ane̩ abo Gebal, kpai Le̩banon o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ chaka, akwo Beal-gad e̩re̩ uwo He̩rmo̩n gbogbo wʼugbo kʼe̩ gudu tʼoj ane̩ Hamat,

abo du ku ma dodo ane̩ uwo akwo Le̩bano̩n gbogbo wa Misrefo̩tmaim, owñ chʼabo Saido̩n chaka. Omi onugo ane abo le̩ rinyo̩ bʼo̩gba abo Israe̩l te̩; e-le̩ kale, uwe̩ ki bʼu ñw abo Israe̩l kʼi chʼe̩wñ ogu ku ma je̩, dabalu kʼomi ñwa ñw e̩ dee.
Todule, ifai, uwe̩ ki fʼane̩-i kpe̩ ñw abo o̩lo̩pu me̩la le̩, kpai ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa kʼi mud e̩wñ ogu ku ma aje̩.
Abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad mʼe̩wñ ogu-ma gba manyu Manasa ejudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩, alu ki Mose̩s, adu Jihofa, du ñwu ma le̩;
akwo Aroe̩r kʼi dʼotete o̩go̩ Arno̩n, kpai ewo ki dʼalumeji o̩go̩-wñ, kpai egbili Me̩deba chaka gbogbo wa Dibo̩n;
kpai ewo ewo Sihon onu abo Amo̩r chaka e-kʼi jʼo̩fe̩-wñ He̩shbo̩n, gbogbo wa alo̩me̩ ubo Amo̩n;
kpai Gilead kpai alo̩me̩ abo Ge̩shur kpai abo Maukat kpai uwo He̩rmo̩n chaka kpai o̩chaka Beshan gbogbo wa Saleka;
o̩chaka ojane̩ O̩g Beshan, kʼi jʼonu Ashtaro̩t kpai Edrei (owñ le̩ bo̩ kate kwef e̩bo̩bo̩ abo Refaim); todu Mose̩s fʼabo le̩ gwo dajane̩ oñ i fʼuma ne rinyo̩.
I chaka dabe̩le̩ abo Israe̩l fʼabo Ge̩shur kpai abo Maakat ne rinyo̩ n; ama abo Ge̩shur kpai abo Maakat dodo alumeji abo Israe̩l gbogbo tʼeñini.
Chai abo o̩lo̩pu Lifai kate oñ Mose̩s ma dʼe̩wñ ogu ñwu ma je̩ n; e̩wñ ku ma ko wa lugbo una ñwu Jihofa kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l chʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ, dabalu kʼi ka ñwu ma le̩.
Mose̩s la kʼukpe̩ ñw o̩lo̩pu abo Rube̩n likpa akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma.
Alo̩me̩-ma la te̩ akwo Aroe̩r, kʼi dʼetiba o̩go̩ Arno̩n, kpai ewo ki dʼalumeji o̩go̩ le̩ kpai egbili ki me̩ru Me̩deba le̩ chaka;
manyu He̩shbo̩n kpai adogbe-wñ ki jo̩ egbili le̩ chaka; Dibo̩n kpai Bamo̩t-beal kpai Bat-beal-meon,
kpai Jahaz kpai Kedemo̩t kpai Me̩faat,
kpai Kiri-ataim kpai Sibma kpai Ze̩re̩t-shahar oj uwo ki dʼef o̩go̩ le̩,
kpai Be̩t-peo̩r kpai akolo uwo Pisga kpai Be̩t-je̩shimot,

kpai adogbe egbili le̩ chaka kpai ojane̩ Sihon onu abo Amo̩r le̩ chaka, owñ chʼe-kʼi jo̩fe̩ He̩shbo̩n, e-ki Mose̩s gwo dajane̩ manyʼamidachi Midian le̩, Efi kpai Reke̩m kpai Zur kpai He̩r kpai Reba, ku ma chʼamado-kanya Siho̩n, ku ma dodo oj ane̩ le̩.
Belam o̩ma Beo̩r ge̩, ake̩ma le̩, abo Israe̩l ño̩ mu Belam o̩ma Beo̩r ake̩ma le̩ du kpa ugbada efu abo-ma ki bo̩ ku ma kpa le̩.
Jo̩rdan kpai ane̩ eto̩ba-wñ chʼalo̩me̩ abo Rube̩n. E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu abo Rube̩n akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma ewo ewo-wñ kpai ikpo-unyi ikpo-unyi-wñ.
Oñ Mose̩s ño̩ ko e̩wñ ñw abo o̩lo̩pu Gad likpa alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩.
Ojane̩-ma che Jeza kpai ewo ewo Gilead chaka, kpai ukpereji ane̩ abo Amon, gbogbo wa Aroe̩r kʼi dʼo̩gba Raba le̩,
kpai akwo He̩shbo̩n wa Ramat-mizpe kpai Betonim, kpai akwo Mahanaim wa ane̩ Debir:

kpai ef o̩go̩ Be̩t-haram kpai Be̩t-nimra kpai Suko̩t kpai Zafo̩n kpai ojane̩ Sihon, onu He̩shbon, ki bo̩bo̩ le̩, Jo̩rdan chʼalo̩me̩-wñ gbogbo wʼukpoji ohimini Chine̩re̩t ejudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu.
E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu abo Gad likpa akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma ewo ewo-wa kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-wñ.
Oñ Mose̩s ño̩ ko e̩wñ ñw abo ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu Manasa ge̩; ma kpe̩ ñw ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma.
Alo̩me̩-ma te̩ akwo Mahanaim, o̩chaka Beshan kpai o̩chaka ojane̩ O̩g, onu Beshan, kpai adogbe Jair chaka, ewo o̩gbo̩ me̩ta ki jo̩ Beshan le̩;
kpai ukpe̩reji Gilead kpai Ashtaro̩t kpai Edrei, ewo ojane̩ O̩g efu Beshan, abo e-le̩ chʼutodu Makir o̩ma Manasa, owñ chʼukpe̩reji abo Makir ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu ki Mose̩s kpe̩ egbili Moab, udaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩.
Mose̩s muda dʼe̩wñ ogu du ñw abo o̩lo̩pu Lifai n: Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, chʼe̩wñ ogu e-ma, alu kʼi ka ñwu ma le̩.
E̩wñ ogu kʼabo Israe̩l gba oj ane̩ Kenan, owñ chʼe-kʼE̩leaza atama le̩ kpai Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun, kpai abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l kpe̩ ñwu ma.
Alu kʼanya ku ma ro̩ je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩, alu le̩ oñ e̩wñ ogu-wñ de̩, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s, todu abo o̩lo̩pu me̩la le̩ kpai ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu ki noji-wñ ge̩.
Todu Mose̩s mʼe̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu meji kpai ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu ki bo̩ le̩ ko ñwu ma ejudaba Jo̩rdan me̩; i muda kʼe̩wñ ogu ñw abo Lifai je̩ kpai ama n.
Todu abo Jose̩f chʼo̩lo̩pu meji, Manasa kpai Ifraim; ma la dʼukpe̩ du ñw abo Lifai oj ane̩ le̩ n, chai ewo kʼama ki dodo efu-wñ, kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ tod ame̩wño̩re̩-ma kpai ane̩-ma.
Abo Israe̩l che alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s; ma fʼane̩ le̩ kpe̩.
Tak abo Juda te̩me̩ru Jo̩shua Gilgal; oñ Kele̩b, o̩ma Jefune e̩ne̩ Kiniz le̩, ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ chema o̩la-mi kpai uwe̩ ki Jihofa ko̩la ñwu Mose̩s Kede̩sh-barnea le̩.
O̩do̩-mi jo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji e̩gba ki Mose̩s adu Jihofa le̩ kpe̩ mi kwo Kede̩sh-barnea nyʼatʼane̩-i; tak u mʼohi o̩la le̩ du dabi wa ñw u alu ki de̩ ef e̩do̩-mi.
Amo̩maye-mi ku ma mute̩gu le bʼumi la je̩ ñw e̩do̩ amone̩-i muya; omi tu Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi ubi ogbolo.
Taku Mose̩s fugo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, Ane̩ ugbo kʼe̩re̩-mi mane̩ le le̩ ache e̩wñ ogu ñwu mi kpai amo̩ma-mi ogbegbele̩ chuu, todabu kʼu tu Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ ubi o̩gbolo.

Fai, e̩ go ke, Jihofa la fejute̩ mi kʼu deju o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu-i alu kʼi ka le̩, owñ chʼakwe̩gba ki Jihofa kʼo̩la le̩ ñwu Mose̩s, gbogbo abu kʼabo Israe̩l nalule̩ ef aje̩tachi le̩; fai, e̩ la go, o̩do̩-mi jo̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ nyoke me̩lu eñini-i.
Ukpahiu-mi dʼalu ki de̩ o̩jo̩ ki Mose̩s kpe̩ mi uche̩ le̩ tʼeñini; abe̩le̩ ukpahiu-mi de̩ tʼeñini-i, dagba i chʼutodu ogu eja, kpai elelo lewa.

Todule̩, fai e̩ dʼane̩ uwo ki Jihofa kʼo̩la-wñ o̩jo̩ le̩ ñwu mi; todu uwe̩ gbʼinabali o̩jo̩ le̩ alu kʼamAnak kpai ewo ewo ki nana ki nʼaku jʼo̩mo̩; ikani Jihofa adʼugbo mi kʼu nane ma dufu alu ki Jihofa ka le̩.
Taki Jo̩shua kadua ñw u; oñ i mu He̩bro̩n du ñwu Kele̩b, o̩ma Jefune, kʼi mud e̩wñ o̩gu-wñ.
Todule̩ He̩bro̩n mud e̩wñ ogu Kele̩b o̩ma Jefune, e̩ne̩ Kiniz le̩, gbogbo tʼeñini, todabu kʼi tu Jihofa O̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l ubi o̩gbolo.
Odu He̩bro̩n ko̩ Kiriat-arba igbele; Arba le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi tu ma le ef abo Anak le̩. Tak ane̩ le̩ ñmi ñw ogu.
Oñ anya ku ma ro̩ todu abo o̩lo̩pu Juda likpa alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma le̩ je̩ kado alo̩me̩ Ido̩m, gbogbo wʼaje̩tachi Zin o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, ugbo ukpoji o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩.
Alo̩me̩-ma o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩ la te̩ akwo ukpoji Ohimini Omu, owñ chʼakwo okpo ki akpejuru o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩;

oñ i akwʼo̩mo̩ le rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ ate̩gu Akrabim, tak i alale o̩mo̩ nyi Zin, tak i ate̩gu lʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ Kede̩sh-barnea, tak i alale me̩ru He̩zro̩n, kʼi te̩gu nyi Adar, tak i rida anyi Karka,
oñ i alale o̩mo̩ anyi Azmo̩n, tak i akpoji aji Ijipti le̩; eledufu alo̩me̩-wñ la dʼohimini abadi: e-le̩ la chʼalo̩me̩-me̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩.
Alo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olodudu chʼOhimini Omu, gbogbo wʼade Jo̩rdan kpai ohimini le̩. Tak alo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ te̩ akwo okpo Ohimini Omu kʼi dʼade Jo̩rdan le̩;
oñ alo̩me̩ le̩ ate̩gu nyi Be̩t-hogla, tak i alale o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ Be̩t-araba; oñ alo̩me̩-wñ te̩ kad okuta Bohan, o̩ma Rube̩n le̩;

tak alo̩me̩ le̩ anyi Debir kwo o̩go̩ Ekor, abe̩le̩ i arida tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ akpejuru Gilgal, kʼi me̩ru ate̩gu Adumim, e-ki dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ aji le̩; tak alo̩me̩-wñ alale nyʼugbo omi En-shime̩sh, eledufu-wñ la de̩ E̩n-roge̩l;

tak alo̩me̩-wñ ate̩gu lʼo̩go̩ o̩ma Hino̩m lʼakolo e̩ne̩ Je̩bius le̩, (e-le̩ che Je̩rusale̩m); tak alo̩me̩ le̩ mute̩gu tʼoji uwo kʼi dʼo̩gba o̩go̩ Hino̩m o̩wo̩ olane̩ le̩, owñ chʼe-ki dʼukpoji ukpolo Refaim o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩;
tak alo̩me̩ le̩ te̩ akwo oj uwo le̩ wa ugbo e̩bi omi Neftoa, oñ i ledufu nyʼewo ewo oj uwo Efro̩n; tak i rida kwʼo̩mo̩ anyi Beala (owñ le̩ che Kiriat-jearim),

tak alo̩me̩-wñ arida akwo Beala tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ anyi uwo Seir, tak i alale o̩mo̩ ale akolo uwo uwo Jearim o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ (owñ le̩ che Chesalo̩n), tak i agwo̩ru nyi Be̩t-shimesh, oñ i alale iba Timna;
tak alo̩me̩-wñ ledufu anyi akolo E̩kro̩n o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, tak alo̩me̩-wñ te̩ gbogbo wa Shikeron, oñ i alale o̩me̩ nyi uwo Beala, tak i ledufu Jabnee̩l; eledufu alo̩me̩-wñ akpoji o̩la ohimini le̩.
Tak alo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olane̩ che Ohimini Elile, kpai o̩la-wñ. E-le̩ chʼalo̩me̩ abo Juda ale daka, alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩.
Tak i mʼukpe̩ ʼka du ñwu Kele̩b, o̩ma Jefune le̩, ef abo Juda, alu kʼo̩la ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Jo̩shua de̩, owñ che Kiriat-arba, owñ che He̩bro̩n, (Arba le̩ chʼata Anak).
Taku Kele̩b fʼamo̩ma Anak me̩ta ne kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu, ama che Sheshai kpai Ahinmu kpai Talmai, amo̩ma Anak le̩.
Tak i mute̩gu kwʼo̩mo̩ nyʼakobo̩ abo ku ma dodo Debir; odu Debir igbele la ko̩ Kiriat-sefe̩r.
Taku Kele̩b kakini, E̩ne̩ ki fu Kiriat-sefe̩r gulo̩, kʼi mʼu gba, nadu Aksa o̩ma-mi ñw u kʼi chʼo̩ya-wñ.
Oñ O̩tnie̩l o̩ma Kenaz, o̩maye Kele̩b, fʼu du; tak i mu Aksa o̩ma-wñ du ñw u chʼo̩ya-wñ.
Oñ e̩gba kʼonobule̩ le̩ lewa i kʼo̩ e̩che̩ nyʼugbo ata-wñ kʼi bi ane̩ʼka; oñ onobule̩ le̩ mudachi bʼoji o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ te̩, taki Kele̩b ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩?
Oñ i kakini, E̩ dʼe̩nyo̩ʼka ñwu mi; abu kʼuwe̩ mʼane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ du ñwu mi, e̩ ki ño̩ kʼe̩bi e̩bi omi ñwu mi ge̩. Tak i mʼe̩bi omi o̩wo̩ ate̩ kpai o̩wo̩ o̩gane̩ ko ñw u.
E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu Juda, likpa alu kʼakwora unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩.
Oñ ewo ewo abo o̩lo̩pu Juda akwo ukpoji-wñ o̩wo̩ alo̩me̩ Ido̩m o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩ che Kabzee̩l kpai Ede̩r kpai Jagur
kpai Kina kpai Dimona kpai Adada
kpai Kede̩sh kpai Hazo̩r kpai Itnan
kpai Zif kpai Tele̩m kpai Bealo̩t
kpai Hazo̩r-hadata kpai Keriot-he̩zro̩n (owñ le̩ che Hazo̩r),
Amam kpai Shema kpai Molada
kpai Hazar-gada kpai He̩shmo̩n kpai Be̩t-pe̩le̩t
kpai Hazar-shual kpai Birshiba kpai Biziotia,
Beala kpai Iim kpai Eze̩m
kpai E̩ltolad kpai Chesil kpai Ho̩rma
kpai Ziklag kpai Madmana kpai Sansana
kpai Le-bao̩t kpai Shilhim kpai Ain kpai Rimo̩n: o̩chaka ewo le̩ che ogu nyoke me̩la, manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma ge̩.
Oj ane̩ o̩go̩ Eshtaol kpai Zora kpai Ashna
kpai Zanoa kpai En-ganim kpai Tapua kpai Enam;
Jarmut kpai Adulam kpai Soko kpai Azika
kpai Shaaraim kpai Adi-taim kpai Gedera kpai Gederotaim: ewo me̩gwe̩le̩ manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Zenan kpai Hadasha kpai Midgal-gad
kpai Dilean kpai Mizpa kpai Jo̩ktee̩l
kpai Lakish kpai Bo̩zkat kpai Eglo̩n
kpai Kabon kpai Laman kpai Chitlish,
kpai Gedero̩t kpai Be̩t-dago̩n kpai Naama kpai Make̩da: ewo me̩gwe̩fa manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Libna kpai Ete̩r kpai Ashan
kpai Ifta kpai Ashna kpai Nerib,
kpai Keila kpai Akzib kpai Maresha: ewo me̩la manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
E̩kro̩n manyu adogbe adogbe-wñ kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-wñ;
akwo E̩kro̩n gbogbo wa ohimini abadi, e-du ki jʼakolo̩ Ashdo̩d, manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Ashdo̩d manyu adogbe adogbe-wñ kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-wñ; Gaza manyu adogbe adogbe-wñ kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-wñ; gbogbo wa aji Ijipti kpai Ohimini Elile kpai o̩la-wñ ge̩.
Oñ oj ane̩ uwo le̩, Shamir kpai Jatir kpai So̩ko̩
kpai Dana kpai Kiriat-sana (owñ le̩ che Debir)
kpai Anab kpai Eshtemo kpai Anim
kpai Goshe̩n kpai Holon kpai Gilo: ewo me̩gwaka manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Arab kpai Duma kpai Eshan
kpai Janim kpai Be̩t-tapua kpai Afeka
kpai Humta kpai Kiriat-arba (owñ le̩ che He̩bro̩n) kpai Zior: ewo me̩la manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Mao̩n kpai Karme̩l kpai Zif kpai Juta
kpai Je̩zree̩l kpai Jokdeam kpai Zanoa
kpai Rein kpai Gibea kpai Timna: ewo me̩gwa manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Halhul kpai Be̩t-zur kpai Gedo̩r
kpai Maarat kpai Be̩t-ano̩t kpai E̩lteko̩n: ewo me̩fa manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Kiriat-beal (owñ che Kiriat-jearim) kpai Raba: ewo meji manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Ef aje̩tachi le̩ ge̩, Be̩t-araba kpai Midin kpai Sekaka
kpai Nibshan kpai Ewo Omu le̩ kpai E̩nge̩di: ewo me̩fa manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Abo Israe̩l muda neke ne abo Je̩bius ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m le̩ dufu n: abe̩le̩ oñ abo Je̩bius le̩ dodo kpenyu abo Juda Je̩rusale̩m o̩mo̩ gbogbo tʼeñini.
Oñ anya ku ma ro̩ je̩ ñw abo Jose̩f je̩ akwo Jo̩rdan ame̩ru Je̩riko gbogbo wa o̩gba e̩ga Je̩riko o̩wo̩ olodudu, nyʼef aje̩tachi ugbo ku ma te̩gu kwo Je̩riko ale tʼane̩ uwo Be̩te̩l le̩;
oñ i akwo Be̩te̩l anyi Luz, oñ i alale o̩mo̩ tʼalo̩me̩ abo Arki, Ataro̩t;
tak i agwo̩ru tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ anyi alo̩me̩ abo Je̩fle̩t, gbogbo wʼalo̩me̩ Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n e-o̩gane̩, gbogbo wa Geze̩r, eledufu-wñ la dʼo̩la Ohimini.
Oñ abo Jose̩f, Manasa kpai Ifraim mʼe̩wñ ogu e-ma gba.
Alo̩me̩ abo Ifraim akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma la de̩: o̩me̩ e̩wñ ogu-ma o̩wo̩ olodudu chʼAtaro̩t-adar, gbogbo wa Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n e-ate̩,
tak alo̩me̩-wñ akwo o̩mo̩ rʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ anyi Mikmatat o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩; tak alo̩me̩-wñ arida tʼo̩wo̩ olodudu wa Taanat-shailo, oñ i alale o̩mo̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu anyi Janoa,
tak i agwo̩ru akwo Janoa nyi Ataro̩t kpai Naara, oñ i te̩ gbogbo wa Je̩riko, tak i ledufu o̩la Jo̩rdan.
Akwo Tapua alo̩me̩-wñ ale tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ gbogbo wa aji Kana; eledufu-wñ la dʼo̩la ohimini. E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu Ifraim likpa akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma,
manyu ewo ewo ku ma date̩ ñw abo Ifraim alumeji e̩wñ ogu abo Manasa, ewo ewo le̩ chaka manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Ma nʼabo Kenan ku ma dodo Geze̩r dufu n: abe̩le̩ abo Kenan muda dodo alumeji abo Ifraim gbogbo tʼeñini, ma muda chʼamadu ku ma re̩ ma.
Ukpe̩ kʼanya je̩ ñw abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa le̩ de̩, todu owñ chʼo̩ma o̩gba Jose̩f. Abu ku Makir, o̩mo̩gba Manasa, kʼi chʼata Gilead le̩, chʼagbiti o̩gu, ma kpe̩ Gilead kpai Beshan ñw u.

Abe̩le̩ anya je̩ ñw abo Manasa kibo̩ alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩, todu amo̩ma Abieze̩r kpai todu amo̩ma Hele̩k kpai todu amo̩ma Asrie̩l kpai todu amo̩ma She̩ke̩m kpai todu amo̩ma Hefe̩r kpai todu amo̩ma Shemida; abo e-le̩ chʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Manasa o̩ma Jose̩f akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma.
Ama Ze̩lo̩fe̩had, o̩ma Hefe̩r, o̩ma Gilead, o̩ma Makir, o̩ma Manasa le̩, muda nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, chai abobule̩; odu amo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ la de̩: Mala kpai Noa kpai Hogla kpai Milka kpai Tirza.

Tak ama lewa o̩gba E̩leaza atama le̩ kpai o̩gba Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun kpai o̩gba amidachi le̩, oñ ma kakini, Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s kʼi du e̩wñ ogu ñw a je̩ manyu amo̩maye-wa e̩ne̩ke̩le̩. Abe̩le̩ i kʼe̩wñ ogu ñwu ma je̩ ef amo̩maye ata-ma alu ki Jihofa ñwate̩.
Abe̩le̩ Manasa je̩ iku me̩gwa manyʼane̩ Gilead kpai Beshan, e-ki dʼudaba Jo̩rdan;
todabu kʼamo̩ma Manasa onobule̩ nʼe̩wñ ogu manyʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩. Oñ amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Manasa kibo̩ ne̩ ane̩ Gilead.
Oñ alo̩me̩ Manasa te̩ akwo Ashe̩r wa Mikmetat, e-ki dʼo̩gba She̩ke̩m le̩; tak alo̩me̩ le̩ lale rʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ wʼugbo abo ku ma dodo E̩n-tapua.
Manasa ne̩ ane̩ Tapua le̩, abo Ifraim muda ne̩ Tapua kʼi dʼalo̩me̩ Manasa le̩.
Tak alo̩me̩-wñ gwo̩ru nyʼaji Kana, o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ aji le̩. Ifraim nʼewo ewo e-le̩ ef ewo ewo Manasa. Tak alo̩me̩ Manasa dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ aji le̩, oñ i ledufu o̩la ohimini;
o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ chʼe-Ifraim, o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ la chʼe-Manasa, Ohimini le̩ chʼalo̩me̩-wñ; oñ i te̩ kado Ashe̩r o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ kpai Isakar o̩wo̩ olodudu.

Efu Isakar kpai Ashe̩r le̩ Manasa ño̩ ne̩ Be̩t-shean kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ kpai Ibleam kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ kpai abo ku ma dodo Do̩r kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ kpai abo ku ma dodo E̩ndo̩r kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ kpai abo ku ma dodo Taanak kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ kpai abo ku ma dodo Me̩gido kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ owñ chʼotete me̩ta le̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ abo Manasa neke ne abo ewo le̩ dufu n; abo Kenan la neku edodo oj ane̩ le̩ chuu.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l fʼukpahiu ne̩, ma je̩ ñw abo Kenan che uko̩lo̩ ire̩ ñwu ma, oñ ma ma ne ma dufu hioko n.
Tak amo̩ma Jose̩f ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Abu ku chʼo̩wo̩ one̩ e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ dʼukpe̩ okate kʼanya je̩ ñwu mi ki chʼe̩wñ ogu kʼu naje̩? todu Jihofa te̩tade̩nyo̩ ñwu mi akwoubi
Taki Jo̩shua ka ñwu ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ chʼo̩wo̩ one̩, mute̩gu nyʼefoko o̩mo̩ kʼe̩ da ñw o̩la-we̩ oj ane̩ abo Pe̩re̩z kpai e-abo Refaim o̩mo̩, abu kʼane̩ uwo Ifraim ma nʼuña ñw e̩ n.

Tak abo Jose̩f kakini, Ane̩ uwo le̩ nʼuña bʼuwa jo̩ n; abo Kenan ku ma dodo oj ane̩ o̩go̩ chaka chene̩ o̩kogu ebije, tʼabo ku ma jo̩ Be̩t-shean kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ, tʼabo ku ma jo̩ ef o̩go̩ Je̩zree̩l.
Taku Jo̩shua ka ñw abo unyi Jose̩f, owñ che Ifraim kpai Manasa le̩, kakini, Uwe̩ chʼamone̩ ki wewe, e̩ laño̩ nʼukpahiu nana; i chʼukpe̩ okate kʼanya je̩ oñ uwe̩ ane̩ n,

ane̩ uwo le̩ lañʼachʼe-we̩ ge̩, todu dagba i chʼefoko, uwe̩ la adarinyo̩, kʼuwe̩ ane̩ o̩mo̩ gbogbo wʼukpoji-wñ otitala; todu uwe̩ anʼabo Kenan dufu, dagba ma chaka ne̩ o̩kogu e-ebije, dagba ma chaka gbiti.
Tak abo̩gbadu Israe̩l chaka kʼo̩la-ma jeju Shailo, oñ ma fʼunyabo ujeju fa o̩mo̩; ane̩ le̩ chʼedolo te̩ o̩gba-ma.
O̩lo̩pu mebie la bo̩ ef abo Israe̩l ku ma ma kpe̩ e̩wñ ogu ñwu ma tan.
Taki Jo̩shua ka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ ame̩ ache e̩ne̩gbo ku me̩ we enyʼejefu agba ane̩ e-ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-amata-me̩, ko ñwu me̩ kade ta?
Me̩ chi one̩ me̩ta e̩ta ef o̩lo̩pu-me̩ okoke ñw o̩la-me̩, tak u nakpe̩ ma uche̩, kʼama ki kwane̩ ku ma te̩le oj ane̩ le̩ du, ku ma fʼu jiwe alu ku ma aje̩ e̩wñ ogu-ma; tak ama ki wʼugbo mi.
Tak ama ki fʼu kpe̩ ukpe̩ mebie, Juda ki gugu ej o̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩ waa, oñ abo unyi Jose̩f ki gugu alo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩.
Ame̩ ki jiwe ane̩ le̩ kʼi chʼukpe̩ mebie, oñ me̩ dʼo̩lubutu ujiwe le̩ wʼugbo mi; tak u naranya todu me̩ o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa emi.

Abo Lifai nʼukpe̩ du efu-me̩ n, todu uko̩lo̩ atama Jihofa eche chʼe̩wñ ogu e-ma; Gad kpai Rube̩n kpai ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa la mʼe̩wñ ogu e-ma gba eju-daba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩, owñ chʼe-ki Mose̩s, adu Jihofa, ko ñwu ma.

Tak aboke̩le̩ le̩ kwane̩, oñ ma le ma; oñ Jo̩shua ñwa ñw abo ku ma nyʼajiwe ane̩ le̩ kakini, Lo, ku me̩ te̩le oj ane̩ le̩ du, ku me̩ fʼu jiwe alu ki de̩ ku me̩ mudabi wʼugbo mi; tak u naranya todu me̩ o̩gba Jihofa Shailo emi.
Tak aboke̩le̩ le̩ le, oñ ma fʼoj ane̩ le̩ le chaka, oñ ma fʼu jiwe̩ ewo ewo, kʼi chʼukpe̩ mebie, nyʼef ubuku; taku ma lewa uru Shailo ugbo Jo̩shua,
taki Jo̩shua fʼanya ro̩ todu ma efu Shailo o̩gba Jihofa le̩; o̩mo̩ Jo̩shua la fʼane̩ le̩ kpe̩ ñw abo Israe̩l, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼukpe̩-wñ.
Tak anya abo o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin je̩ alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩, oñ alo̩me̩ ukpe̩ e-ma ledufu agbagba abo Juda kpai abo Jose̩f.
Alo̩me̩-ma o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ te̩ kwo o̩la Jo̩rdan; tak alo̩me̩-wñ le akolo Je̩riko o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, oñ i mute̩gu le gu ef ane̩ uwo du tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩; ukpoji-wñ la chʼaje̩tachi Be̩t-afe̩n.
Tak alo̩me̩ le̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ lale nyi Luz (owñ le̩ che̩ Be̩te̩l) o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ, tak alo̩me̩-wñ agwo̩ru nyʼAtaro̩t-adar nyʼoj uwo kʼi dago o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ Be̩t-horo̩n e-o̩gane̩.

Tak alo̩me̩-wñ te̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ oñ i murida o̩wo̩ olane̩ le rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, akwugbo uwo kʼi dago o̩gba Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩; oñ ukpoji-wñ che Kiriat-beal (owñ le̩ che Kiriat-jearim), ewo abo Juda i che. E-le̩ chʼo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olane̩.
