O̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ la te̩ kwʼukpoji Kiriat-jearim otitala; tak alo̩me̩-wñ ale tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ nyʼe̩bi omi Neftoa;

tak alo̩me̩-wñ agwo̩ru nyʼotitala uwo kʼi dago o̩gba o̩go̩ o̩ma Hino̩m, e-kʼi dʼef o̩go̩ Refaim o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ tak i agwo̩ru lʼef o̩go̩ Hino̩m tʼakolo abo Je̩bius o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, oñ i agwo̩ru alo tʼE̩n-rogel;
tak i te̩ alo tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ ki ledufu E̩n-shime̩sh, tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le rʼo̩wo̩ Ge̩lilo̩t kʼi me̩ru ate̩gu Adumim le̩; tak i gwo̩ru nyʼokuta Bohan, o̩ma Rube̩n le̩;
tak i adabʼo̩mo̩ jo̩ lale tʼotete ki kpejuru Araba o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, tak i agwo̩ru nyʼAraba;

oñ alo̩me̩ le̩ dabʼo̩mo̩ jo̩ lale nyi Be̩t-hogla o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ; oñ alo̩me̩-wñ kpoji okpo ki dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ Ohimini Omu alu Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ: alo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ de̩.
Taki Jo̩rdan mud alo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olodudu. E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma alu kʼalo̩me̩-ma le daka.
Oñ ewoewo abo o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma, che Je̩riko kpai Be̩t-hogla kpai Eme̩k-keziz
kpai Be̩t-araba kpai Ze̩ma-raim kpai Be̩te̩l
kpai Afim kpai Para kpai Ofra
kpai Chefar-amoni kpai O̩fni kpai Geba: ewo me̩gweji manyʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma:
Gibeon kpai Rama kpai Birot
kpai Mizpe kpai Che̩fira kpai Moza
kpai Reke̩m kpai Irpe̩e̩! kpai Tarala
kpai Zela, kpʼEle̩f kpai Je̩bius (owñ che Je̩rusale̩m), kpai Gibeat kpai Kiriat: ewo ewo me̩gwe̩le̩ manyʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma. E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma.
Tak anya ekeji ku ma ro̩ je̩ todu Simeo̩n, owñ chʼutodu abo o̩lo̩pu Simeo̩n akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-wñ; e̩wñ ogu-wñ la dʼalumeji e̩wñ ogu amo̩ma Juda.
E̩wñ ku ma ne̩ tod e̩wñ ogu-ma la de̩, Birshiba kpai Shiba kpai Molada
kpai Hazar-shual kpai Bala kpai Eze̩m
kpai E̩ltolad kpai Betul kpai Ho̩rma
kpai Ziklag kpai Be̩t-markabot kpai Hazar-susa
kpai Be̩t-labao̩t kpai Sharuhen; ewo me̩gwe̩ta manyʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma;
Ain kpai Rimo̩n kpai Ete̩r kpai Ashan: ewo me̩le̩ manyʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma;
manyʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi du ki le ewo ewo-i daka gbogbo nyi Bealat-bie̩r kpai Rama e-o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ ge̩. E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu Simeo̩n akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-wñ.
E̩wñ ogu amo̩ma Simeo̩n le̩ kwʼef ane̩ kʼanya je̩ ñw abo Juda; todu ukpe̩ amo̩ma Juda le̩ gbe̩ tu ma le, todule̩ oñ amo̩ma Simeo̩n ne̩ e̩wñ ogu ef e̩wñ ogu e-ma le̩.
Tak anya e̩ke̩ta je̩ todu amo̩ma Ze̩biulo̩n akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-wñ. Oñ alo̩me̩ e̩wñ ogu-ma te̩ gbogbo wa kado Sarid;
tak alo̩me̩-wñ te̩gu tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ alo tu Mareala, oñ i le kado Dabeshe̩t, tak i te̩ kad aji kʼi dʼo̩gba Jokneam;
akwo Sarid i murida le rʼowe̩ olodudu nyʼalo̩me̩ Chislo̩t-tabor;
akwʼo̩mo̩ i anyi Dabe̩rat, tak i ate̩gu nyi Jafia; akwʼo̩mo̩ i dabo̩jo̩ lʼo̩wo̩ olodudu anyi Gat-he̩fe̩r, anyi E̩t-kazin, oñ i ledufu Rimon e-kʼi ate̩ gbogbo wa kado Nea;
tak alo̩me̩-wñ dagbala lʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ anyi Hanato̩n; oñ i akpoji o̩go̩ Ifta-e̩l;
kpai Katat kpai Nahalal kpai Shimro̩n kpai Idala kpai Be̩tle̩he̩m: ewo me̩gweji manyʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu kʼamo̩ma Ze̩biulo̩n je̩ akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-wñ, owñ chʼewo ewo-i kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Anya e̩ke̩le̩ ku ma ro le̩ todu Isakar, owñ chʼutodu amo̩ma Isakar alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩.
Oñ alo̩me̩-ma te̩ kado Je̩zree̩l kpai Chesulo̩t kpai Shune̩m
kpai Hafaraim kpai Shion kpni Anaharat
kpai Rabit kpai Kishion kpai Ebe̩z
kpai Reme̩t kpai E̩n-gamm kpai E̩n-hada kpai Be̩t-paze̩z;
alo̩me̩ le̩ ño̩ te̩ kado Tabo̩r kpai Shahazuma kpai Be̩t-shime̩sh; alo̩me̩-ma la kpoji o̩la Jo̩rdan: owñ chʼewo me̩gwe̩fa manyʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu Isakar, alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩: owñ chʼewo ewo le̩ manyʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Tak anya e̩ke̩lu je̩ todu abo o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩.
Oñ alo̩me̩-ma te̩ kado He̩lkat kpai Hali kpai Bete̩n kpai Akshaf
kpai Alamele̩k kpai Amad kpai Mishal; o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ la te̩ kado Karme̩l kpai Shiho̩r-libnat,
tak i murida tʼo̩wo̩ olodudu anyi Be̩t-dagan, oñ i te̩ kado Ze̩biulo̩n kpai o̩go̩ Ifta-e̩l tak i le rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ anyi Be̩t-eme̩k kpai Neie̩i; tak i alo rʼo̩wo̩ awohi kado Kabul,
kpai Ebro̩n kpai Rehob kpai Hamo̩n kpai Kana gbogbo wa Saido̩n elile;
tak alo̩me̩ le̩ arida nyi Rama gbogbo te̩ kado ewo Taie̩r ku ma bʼaku nyʼu le̩; tak alo̩me̩ le̩ murida anyi Hosa, oñ i akpoji o̩la ohimini me̩ru ojane̩ Akzib,
kpai Uma kpai Afe̩k kpai Rehob; ewo ogu nyoke meji manyʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma le̩.
E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩: owñ chʼewo ewo-i manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Anya e̩ke̩fa je̩ todu abo Naftali, owñ chʼutodu abo Naftali alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩.
Oñ alo̩me̩-ma chane̩ akwo Hele̩f, kwugbo oli ok efu Zaananim le̩ alegu Adami-nekeb kpai Jabnee̩l du gbogbo wa Lakum: oñ i kpoji o̩la Jo̩rdan;

tak alo̩me̩ le̩ murida tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ anyi Azno̩t-tabo̩r, tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ anyi Hu-ko̩k, oñ i te̩ kado Ze̩biulo̩n o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ kpai Ashe̩r o̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ kpai Juda o̩la Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩.
Ewo ewo ki nʼaku che Zidim kpai Ze̩r kpai Hamat kpai Rakat kpai Chine̩re̩t
kpai Adama kpai Rama kpai Hazo̩r
kpai Kede̩sh, kpai Edrei kpai E̩n-hazo̩r,
kpai Iron kpai Migdale̩l kpai Ho̩rem kpai Be̩t-anat kpai Be̩t-shime̩sh: owñ chʼewo ewo me̩gwe̩la manyʼikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu abo o̩lo̩pu Naftali alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩. Owñ chʼewo ewo le̩ manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Anya e̩kebie je̩ todu abo o̩lo̩pu Dan alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩.
Oñ alo̩me̩ e̩wñ ogu e-ma te̩ kado Zo̩ra kpai Eshtaol kpai Irshe-me̩sh,
kpai Shaala-bin kpai Aija-lo̩n kpai Itla
kpai Elo̩n kpai Timna, kpai E̩kro̩n
kpai E̩lte̩ke kpai Gibe̩to̩n kpai Bealat
kpai Jehud kpai Be̩ne-berak kpai Gat-rimo̩n,
kpai Me̩-jarko̩n kpai Ra-kon; alo̩me̩-wñ la te̩ kado Jo̩pa.

Oñ alo̩me̩ ane̩ abo Dan iche̩ka fʼuma o̩wo̩; oñ abo Dan mute̩gu kʼogu bo̩ Leshe̩m, abu ku ma bu ma gba ku ma la nʼalu ugbada gwo ma dajane̩, taku ma mʼu gba chʼe-ma, oñ ma dodo o̩mo̩, oñ ma rʼodu Leshe̩m da ko̩ Dan, alu kʼodu Dan o̩ra-ma de̩.
E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ o̩gu abo o̩lo̩pu Dan alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩, owñ chʼewo ewo-i manyu ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-ma.
Abu ku ma fʼane̩ le̩ kpe̩ ojane̩ ojane̩ alu kʼe̩wñ ogu ku ma aje̩ de̩, ki mud e̩wñ ogu-ma; tak abo Israe̩l mʼe̩wñ ogu du ñwu Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun, alumeji-ma.
Alu kʼo̩la Jihofa de̩ abe̩le̩ ma mʼewo kʼi bi ma du ñw u, owñ che Timnat-se̩ra kʼi dʼoj ane̩ uwo Ifraim; tak i dabi fʼewo le̩ ko̩, oñ i kwo gugu o̩mo̩.

E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu e̩wñ ogu, e-kʼE̩leaza atama kpai Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun kpai abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l, rʼanya Shailo, eju Jihofa alugbo̩na unyabo ujeju ku ma kpʼane̩ le̩ ñwu ma. Abe̩le̩ ma fʼane̩ le̩ kpe̩ ojane̩ ojane̩ kpa.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini,
E̩ ki ka ñw abo Israe̩l, kakini, Me̩ ki kʼewo ewo oko e̩ko̩ jo̩ ñw o̩la-me̩, owñ chʼe-kʼu ka ñwu me̩ lugbo Mose̩s le̩,
todu kʼe̩ne̩ ki kpʼone̩ kʼi ma gwejugede n kʼi ma la ma n, kʼi ra nyʼo̩mo̩; ewo ewo le̩ la achʼoko e̩ko̩ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi akpʼo̩chi.
I ki ra nyʼewo-iʼka, oñ i adago alaku ewo le̩, kʼi aka ofe o̩la-wñ ñw abogijo ewo le̩ ku ma ki gbo̩; tak ama ki gbʼo̩ tef ewo le̩ ku ma bʼuña ñw u kʼi gugu ugbo ma.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ ki akpo̩chi ranʼo, ama ki du e̩ne̩ ki kpʼone̩ le̩ ñw u n; todabu kʼi ma gwejugede kpa ekeji-wñ n, i la chʼulaka ñw u akwoubi n.

Tak i agugu ef ewo le̩ gbogbo tak i lewa dago o̩gba abo̩gbadu ku ma fʼajo̩-wñ ka, gbogbo tak e̩ne̩ kʼi jʼagboji amatama iko le̩ kʼi leku: e̩gbale̩ tak akpone̩ le̩ nekʼadabi nyʼewo-wñ, ef unyi aja-wñ, owñ chʼef ewo ugbo kʼi ra kwo le̩.
Taku ma fu Kede̩sh Galili oj ane̩ uwo Naftali kpai She̩ke̩m oj ane̩ uwo Ifraim kpai Kiriat-arba (owñ cho He̩bro̩n) oj ane̩ uwo Juda date̩.

Oñ ejudaba Jo̩rdan odenideni Je̩riko, o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ, ma mu Bize̩r kʼi dʼef aje̩tachi egbili le̩ ef ane̩ abo o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n kpai Ramo̩t, ane̩ Gilead ef ane̩ abo o̩lo̩pu Gad kpai Golan ane̩ Beshan ef ane̩ abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa ko̩jo̩.

Abo e-i chʼewo ewo ku ma chi jo̩ todu abo Israe̩l chaka kpai amilowa ku ma ge̩ne̩ efu-ma, todu kʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi kpʼone̩ kʼi ma gwejugede n, kʼi ra nyʼo̩mo̩, kʼi we eku lʼo̩wo̩ akpo̩chi, gbogbo tak i lewa dago o̩gba abo̩gbadu le̩.
Tak abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef abogijo abo Lifai te̩wʼugbo E̩leaza atama kpai ugbo Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun kpai ugbo abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef abogijo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l;
oñ ma ka ñwu ma efu Shailo oj ane̩ Kenan le̩ kakini, Jihofa ñwate̩ lʼugbo Mose̩s ka ku ma ki kʼewo ewo ñw a kʼa dodo efu-wñ, kpai ane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka tod ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩-wa.
Tak abo Israe̩l mʼewo ewo-i kpʼokije̩ ki lʼo daka ko ñw abo Lifai kwef e̩wñ ogu e-ma, alu ki Jihofa ñwate̩.
Tak anya je̩ todu akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Kohat, Abe̩le̩ abo Aro̩n atama ku ma jʼef abo Lifai jʼewo me̩gwe̩ta kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu Juda kpai e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu Simeo̩n kpai e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin.
Tak abo Kohat kibo̩ je̩ ewo me̩gwa kwef e̩wñ akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi o̩lo̩pu Ifraim kpai kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu Dan kpai kwef e̩wñ ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu Manasa le̩.

Tak abo Ge̩rsho̩n jʼewo me̩gwe̩ta kwef e̩wñ akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi o̩lo̩pu Isakar kpai kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r kpai kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu abo o̩lo̩pu Naftali kpai kwef e̩wñ ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa efu Beshan.
Abo Me̩rari alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩ je̩ ewo me̩gweji kwef e̩wñ abo o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n kpai kwef e̩wñ abo o̩lo̩pu Gad, kpai kwef e̩wñ abo o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n.
Tak abo Israe̩l mʼewo ewo le̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼuma daka ko ñw abo Lifai alu kʼanya je̩ ñwu ma, alu ki Jihofa ñwate̩ lʼugbo Mose̩s.
Taku ma ño̩ mʼewo ewo kʼa kʼodu-ma jo̩-i ko ñwu ma kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu abo Juda kpai kwef e̩wñ o̩lo̩pu abo Simeon,
abo-i chʼutodu amo̩ma Aro̩n kʼi dʼef akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Kohat ku ma chʼo̩lo̩pu abo Lifai; abu kʼanya je̩ todu ma ejodudu.
Oñ ma mu Kiriat-arba, oj ane̩ uwo Juda, manyu ane̩ ije̩ ki lʼowñ daka ko ñwu ma. Arba le̩ chʼata Anak le̩, (owñ che He̩bro̩n).
Ma muda mʼoko-wñ kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi-wñ ko ñwu Kele̩b o̩ma Jefune kʼi ne̩ me̩.
Ma ño̩ mu He̩bro̩n ki chʼoke̩ko todu e̩ne̩ ki kpʼone̩ le̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Libna ge̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Jatir manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai E̩shtemoa manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Holon manyʼane̩ ile̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Debir manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Ain manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka, kpai Juta manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka, kpai Be̩t-shime̩sh manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka ko ñw Aro̩n atama le̩: owñ chʼewo me̩la kwef abo o̩lo̩pu meji le̩.
E-kʼi la kwef e-o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin che Gibeo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Geba manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki To daka
kpai Anato̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Almo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka: owñ chʼewo me̩le̩.
Ewo ewo amo̩ma Aro̩n owñ chʼamatama o̩chaka-wñ chʼewo me̩gwe̩ta manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka.
Tak anya je̩ ewo ewo abo o̩lo̩pu Ifraim todu abo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Kohat, kʼi chʼabo Lifai le̩, owñ chʼamo̩ma Kohat kibo̩.
Ma mu She̩ke̩m, kʼi chʼewo oke̩ko̩ tod e̩ne̩ kʼi kpʼone̩, manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka oj ane̩ uwo Ifraim, kpai Geze̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka,
kpai Kibzaim manyʼane̩ ije̩ k lʼo daka kpai Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka ko ñwu ma: ewo me̩le̩ i che.
E-ki la kwef e-o̩lo̩pu Dan che, E̩l-teke manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Gibe̩to̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Aijalon manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Gat-Rimon manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka: owñ chʼewo me̩le̩.
E-ki la kwef ukpe̩reji e-abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa che: Taanak manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Gat-rimo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka: owñ chʼewo meji.
Ewo ewo e-abo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma Kohat ki bo̩ chaka chʼe̩gwa, manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼuma daka.

Oñ ma mu Golan e-Beshan kʼi chʼoko e̩ko̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Be-e̩shte̩ra manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka ko ñw amo̩ma Ge̩rshon ku ma chʼabo akwo̩ra unyiʼka ef akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Lifai kwef ukpe̩reji e-abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa: owñ chʼewo meji.
E-ki la kwef e-abo o̩lo̩pu Isakar che, Kishion manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka, kpai Dabe̩rat manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Jarmut manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai En-ganim manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka: owñ chʼewo me̩le̩.
E-ki la kwef e-abo o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r che Mishal manyʼarie̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Abdo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai He̩lkat manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Rehob manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka: owñ chʼewo me̩le̩.

E-ki la kwef e-abo o̩lo̩pu Naftali che, Kede̩sh, e-Galili manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka, ewo kʼi chʼoke̩ko̩ todu e̩ne̩ ki kpʼone̩ le̩, kpai Hamo̩t-do̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Kartan manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki To daka: owñ chʼewo me̩ta.
O̩chaka ewo ewo abo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Ge̩rsho̩n chʼewo me̩gwe̩ta manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼuma daka.
Taku ma mu Jokneam kpai ane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Karta manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka,
kpai Dimna manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Nahalal manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka ko kwef e-o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n ñw akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Me̩rari, ama chʼabo Lifai ki bo̩: ewo-wñ chʼe̩le̩.
Kwef e-abo o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n ma mu Bize̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Jahaz manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai Kedemo̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Me̩faat manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka ko ñwu ma: owñ chʼewo me̩le̩.
Oñ e-ku ma ko ñwu ma kwef e-abo o̩lo̩pu Gad che Ramo̩t e-Gile̩ad manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka, owñ chʼoke̩ko̩ todu e̩ne̩ kʼi akpʼone̩, kpai Mahanaim manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka
kpai He̩shbo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka kpai Jeza manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼo daka; o̩chaka-wñ chʼewo me̩le̩.
Ewo ewo du kʼanya je̩ ñw amo̩ma Me̩rari alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩, ama chʼabo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi Lifai ki bo̩ la chʼewo me̩gweji.
Ewo ewo abo Lifai du ku ma jʼalumeji ane̩ kʼabo Israe̩l ne̩ le̩, chʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩jo̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩ ki lʼuma daka.
Ewo ewo le̩ du nʼo̩ko ije̩-wñ kʼi lʼo daka; abe̩le̩ i de̩ ugbo ewo ewo-i chaka.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa mʼane̩ chaka kʼi go̩ ka kʼi ako ñw amata-ma ko ñw abo Israe̩l; oñ abu ma mʼu gba ma kwo dodo jʼo̩mo̩.
Jihofa la mʼuñmi du ñwu ma ugbo du, alu du kʼi go̩ ñw amata-ma le̩; e̩ne̩ du ef ame̩nebi-ma chaka dago o̩gba-ma n; todu Jihofa mʼame̩ne̩bi-ma chaka ko nyʼuma o̩wo̩.
O̩la e̩nyo̩ du ki Jihofa ka tane̩ ñw abo unyi Israe̩l le̩, okate-wñ chi n; o̩chaka-wñ lewa che̩.
Taku Jo̩shua fʼabo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad kpai ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa le̩ do̩ wa,
oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ fʼe̩wñ du ku Mose̩s, adu Jihofa le̩, ñwa ñwu me̩ de me̩, me̩ laño̩ netirʼomu-mi ef e̩wñ du kʼomi ñwa ñwu me̩ ge̩;
o̩jo̩ wewe (kʼa jʼef ogu-i eja), gbogbo tʼeñini me̩ hi amo̩maye-me̩ tinyo̩ mama ta n, me̩ la fʼuko̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ du ñwu me̩ ku me̩ de de me̩.
Fai Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ la mʼuñmi du ñw amo̩maye-me̩ alu kʼi ka ñwu ma; todule̩ me̩ ki mudabi tʼunyabo-me̩, oj ane̩ kʼame̩ ne̩ le̩, owñ chʼe-ki Mose̩s adu Jihofa, du ñwu me̩ ejudaba Jo̩rdan le̩.

Me̩ nago, ku me̩ che̩do̩ chacha ku me̩ che tʼeju uko̩ kpai uko̩-o̩la ki Mose̩s adu Jihofa ñwa ñwu me̩, ku me̩ fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, ku me̩ la lule̩ tʼo̩na-wñ chaka, ku me̩ de uko̩-wñ, ku me̩ manyʼowñ o̩la, ku me̩ ki la che e̩wñ ñw u kpai e̩do̩-me̩ chaka kpai onugo-me̩ chaka.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua kadua ñwu ma, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma le ma; taku ma le tʼunyabo-ma.

I chʼe-abo ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu Manasa le̩, Mose̩s mʼane̩ ku ma ane̩ du ñwu ma Beshan; Jo̩shua muda dʼane̩ ñw abo ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu Manasa ki bo̩ ef amo̩maye-ma ejudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ. Oñ e̩gba ki Jo̩shua je̩ ñwu ma lo tʼunyabo-ma kʼi la kadua ñwu ma,

i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ kʼe̩wñ anana elile kpai ame̩wñukpa nana kpai ajifa kpai o̩jamalia kpai ebije ikpa kpai ebije kpai e̩wñ o̩la nana nana dabi tʼunyabo-me̩; me̩ fʼe̩wñ ame̩ne̩bi-me̩ kʼogu je̩ le̩ kpe̩ kpai amo̩maye-me̩.

Tak abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad, kpai abo ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu Manasa mudabi, oñ ma kwo bʼefu amo̩ma Israe̩l te̩ Shailo kʼi dʼoj ane̩ Kenan ku ma nyʼoj ane̩ Gilead, tʼane̩ kʼama ne̩ le̩, owñ chʼe-ku ma bʼamone̩ gba le̩, alu ki Jihofa ka lʼugbo Mose̩s.
Tak e̩gba ku ma lewa oj ane̩ o̩la Jo̩rdan, e-ki dʼoj ane̩ Kenan, abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad kpai ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manama fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne o̩la Jo̩rdan o̩mo̩, e̩ kejuru ubo̩-wñ, i tabale.
Tak abo Israe̩l gbo̩ kakini. Go, abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad kpai ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne kʼi kpejurʼane̩ Kenan, o̩la Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ ugbo kʼabo Israe̩l ne̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l gbʼo̩, o̩gbo̩ abo̩gbadu abo Israe̩l le̩ du kʼo̩la-ma jeju wa Shailo, ku ma kʼogu bʼuma.
Tak abo Israe̩l fu Finehas o̩ma E̩leaza atama kpe̩ ru abo Rube̩n, kpai abo Gad kpai ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa oj ane̩ Gilead le̩,

ma fʼamidachi me̩gwa kpe̩ lebʼo̩, idachiʼka kwef unyi e̩ne̩fe̩nyiʼka todu o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l okoke; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma la chʼe̩nuto̩gba unyi ata-wñ kʼi nʼo̩da akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Israe̩l chaka.
Oñ ma lewa ugbo abo Rube̩n, kpai abo Gad kpai ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa, oj ane̩ Gilead, oñ ma ka ñwu ma kakini,

Abu kʼo̩gbo̩ abo o̩gbadu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Ada O̩jo̩ Israe̩l ku me̩ je̩-i chʼe̩wñ ge̩? kʼame̩ ki rida bʼetu Jihofa ubi te̩ eñini-i, kʼame̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñw o̩la-me̩ ku me̩ ki fʼe̩re̩ ubi ro̩ ñwu Jihofa eñini-i ta?
Udu kʼa fe̩ Peo̩r le̩ nyarʼuwa? kʼame̩ ñʼarida bʼetu Jihofa ubi te̩ eñini-i ge̩? Dagba e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ chaka bʼabo o̩gbadu Jihofa-i ma, e-Peo̩r le̩ la takpa bʼuwa o̩la te̩ gbogbo tʼojolu eñini-i ta n.
I la awatu, abu ku me̩ ko̩ Jihofa eñini-i, i awe̩do̩rʼo̩gbo̩ abo o̩gbadu Israe̩l-i o̩na.

I la che̩wñ kʼane̩ ku me̩ ne̩ le̩ mudaji maku me̩ mudaba wa oj ane̩ Jihofa ugbo kʼuña ugugu Jihofa de̩, ku me̩ la nʼane̩ efu-wa; me̩ ki muda ko̩ Jihofa kpai awa n, owñ chʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku me̩ ne ñw o̩la-me̩ ojoji ñw ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa-i.
Ekan o̩ma Zera le̩ fʼada je̩ ef e̩wñ ku ma dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩ n? tak uwe̩do̩ lewa bʼabo o̩gbadu Israe̩l du ma n? I la chʼowñ kate lenyo̩ ef udu kʼi fe̩ le̩ n.
Tak abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad kpai ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa le̩ dohi, oñ ma ka ñw ame̩nuto̩gba abo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e-Israe̩l kakini,
E̩ne̩ ki gbiti le̩, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ e-amo̩jo̩, Jihofa! E̩ne̩ ki gbiti le̩, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ amo̩jo̩, Jihofa! Owñ le̩ chema; Israe̩l onugo la ama ge̩! Iche̩wñ ki chʼekʼo̩ a kʼo̩, abe̩k ada Jihofa oñ a je̩

kʼa fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne-i kʼa rida bʼetu Jihofa ubi te̩ me̩ ki bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ñw a eñini-i n; abe̩k iche̩wñ ki chʼutodu kʼa ki fʼe̩wñ e̩gujo abe̩k e̩wñ ele abe̩k iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ che oji-wñ oñ ane-i, maku Jihofa onugo ki tʼuwa ene.
Tod ejiji kʼa da oñ a ache-i; tode̩gba kʼamo̩ma-me̩ ma ka ñw amo̩ma e-wa kakini, E̩wñ chʼo̩wo̩ e-me̩ kpai Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ge̩?
Todu Jihofa mu Jo̩rdan-i du chʼuhio̩me̩ agbagba awa kpai ame̩, ame̩ abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad; ame̩ nʼukpe̩ du ugbo Jihofa n. Abe̩le̩ amo̩ma-me̩ ma aje̩ ñw amo̩ma-wa we erailo Jihofa.
Todule̩ oñ awa kakini, A ki che kʼa fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñw o̩la-wa, i chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo n, i la chʼutodu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ du n;

chai kʼi mud e̩nibenu agbagba awa kpai ame̩ kpai agbagba abo o̩gba o̩gba-wa ki dʼubi-wa, ka kʼa ane̩ e̩wñ e̩gujo-wa kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩-wa kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-wa che o̩gba Jihofa kʼa rʼo, todu kʼamo̩ma-me̩ ki we eka ñw amo̩ma-wa e̩gbate̩gba kakini, Ame̩ nʼukpe̩ du ugbo Jihofa n.

Todule̩, oñ a kakini, I awatu, e̩gba kʼama aka abe̩le̩ ñw a abe̩k abo o̩gba o̩gba-wa e̩gbate̩gba, awa la aka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ go uwo̩li ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa-i e-kʼamata-wa ne, i chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo n, i la chʼutodu iche̩bo̩ du n; chai kʼi chʼe̩nibenu agbagba wa kpai ame̩.

O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na eko̩ Jihofa kʼa ki fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ che todu e̩wñ e̩gujo abe̩k e̩wñ i ele abe̩k e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ du, amanyʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa e-ki dʼo̩gba uña ugugu-wñ le̩ kʼa rida bʼetu Jihofa ubi te̩ eñini-i.

Tak e̩gba ku Finehas atama, kpai amidachi abo o̩gbadu, ama chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef abo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e-abo Israe̩l ku ma jʼugbo-wñ le̩ gbo̩ o̩la kʼabo Rube̩n kpai Gad kpai abo Manasa ka le̩, i nyo̩ ma eju nana.

Taku Finehas, o̩ma E̩le̩aza atama le̩, ka ñw abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad kpai abo Manasa kakini, Eñini-i a chema ka ki Jihofa dʼalumeji-wa, todabu ku me̩ ma jʼada Jihofa-i n; ame̩ mʼabo Israe̩l gba bʼo̩wo̩ Jihofa te̩ fai me̩.
Taku Finehas, o̩ma E̩le̩aza atama le̩ kpai amidachi mudabi bʼabo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad te̩, oñ ma kwʼoj ane̩ Gilead wʼoj ane̩ Kenan ugbo abo Israe̩l, oñ ma mʼo̩la le̩ du dabi wa ñwu ma.
Oñ e̩wñ le̩ nyo̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l eju; tak abo Israe̩l kwo kele O̩jo̩, ma ño̩ ko̩la ete̩gu tʼuma o̩la akogu bʼuma ku ma fʼane̩ ugbo kʼabo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad dodo kpo̩fo̩ ge̩ n.
Tak abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad dʼodu ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ ko̩ Ibenu; todu, ma kakini, E̩nibenu i che agbagba wa ka ki Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩.
Oñ i lewatu abu ki jʼo̩jo̩ wewe, e̩gba ki Jihofa mʼuñmi du ñw abo Israe̩l bʼame̩nebi-ma chaka ki lʼuma daka te̩, ki Jo̩shua chʼogijo, kʼi la kwojolugbo nana,
Jo̩shua fʼabo Israe̩l chaka do̩ wa, abogijo-ma kpai abo ku ma dʼoji dufu efu-ma kpai amakajo̩-ma kpai amako̩takada-ma, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi chʼogijo, u kwojolugbo nana me̩;
me̩ la fʼe̩wñ du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ che abo uche̩ichi chaka todu me̩ li me̩, todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki jʼogu todu me̩.

Go, omi la fʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi kibo̩ kpe̩ nyʼume̩ o̩wo̩ alu kʼanya-me̩ je̩ ku ma mud e̩wñ ogu kʼabo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-me̩ aje̩, akwo o̩la Jo̩rdan le̩, manyu abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du e-kʼu fugwo da rinyo̩, gbogbo wa Ohimini Elile, o̩wo̩ ugbo kʼolu atunyane̩ le̩.
Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ la akʼuma e̩che̩ dufu bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩, owñ la ane ma bʼume̩ eju te̩; tak ame̩ abʼuma gbʼane̩-ma alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ka ñwu me̩ le̩.
Todule̩ me̩ ki fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ nana kʼame̩ ki de ku me̩ che e̩wñ du ku ma ko̩ rʼef ubuku uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s, kʼame̩ ki we ena bʼo̩ te̩ tʼawo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi,
kʼame̩ ki we egwe̩gwa nyʼabo uche̩ichi ku ma bo̩ efu-me̩-i; alu-me̩ ki himʼodu amo̩jo̩-ma e̩do̩ n, me̩ ki go̩ ma n, me̩ ki re̩ ma n, me̩ ki la doji lo̩ ñwu ma n;
me̩ ki muda lamo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, alu ku me̩ te̩tache gbogbo tʼeñini-i.
Todu Jihofa fʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki wewe kpai e-ki gbiti ne dufu bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩ me̩; i la chʼe-ame̩ e̩ne̩ du la bʼume̩ jo̩ gbogbo tʼeñini n.
E̩ne̩ kate efu-me̩ ane̩ one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ure, todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ajogu todu me̩, alu kʼi katane̩ ñwu me̩ le̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nafʼo̩la-me̩ de nyo̩nyo̩ kʼame̩ ki fe̩do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩.
Cho̩kpo̩ni, iche̩wñ kʼame̩ dabi wʼubi re, ku me̩ lamo̩ e̩bo̩bo̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma bo̩bo̩ efu-me̩-i, ku me̩ chʼo̩ko̩ nʼo̩ya, ku me̩ nyʼejefu ugbo ma, kʼama la wʼejefu ugbo me̩,

me̩ ki ma ogbolo ka ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ñʼanʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi te̩ bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩ alo waa ge̩ n; chai oku kpai ada jo̩ ñwu me̩ ki amu me̩, ma la achʼe̩wñ ki agwunyʼume̩ akolo kpai ikeke ef eju-me̩ gbogbo taku me̩ lenyo̩ bʼane̩ ki nyo̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ du ñwu me̩-i te̩.

Me̩ la go, o̩na kʼabo ile̩-i du ale oñ nale eñini-i. Ame̩ la chema e-e̩do̩-me̩ du kpʼef onugo-me̩ du ka kʼe̩wñ okate chi kwef o̩la e̩nyo̩ du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ka ñwu me̩ le̩ n; o̩chaka-wñ lewa che ugbo me̩ me̩, okate-wñ chi n.

I lañʼawatu, kʼalu kʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ katane̩ ñwu me̩ le̩ lewa bʼume̩ ma, alu le̩ Jihofa ñʼakʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ chaka wa abʼume̩ ma, gbogbo tak i fʼume̩ kpabie̩ rinyo̩ kwo bʼane̩ ki nyo̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ du ñwu me̩-i te̩,

e̩gba ku me̩ fʼalo Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ daba, owñ chʼe-kʼi ñwa ñwu me̩ le̩, ku me̩ nyʼare̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩, ku me̩ la dʼoji lo̩ ñwu ma. E̩gba le̩ uwe̩do̩ Jihofa ajo bʼume̩ ma, oñ ame̩ alenyo̩ bʼoj ane̩ ki nyo̩ kʼi du ñwu me̩-i te̩ piopio.

Taku Jo̩shua fʼabo o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka do̩ wa jeju She̩ke̩m, oñ i fʼabogijo Israe̩l kpai abo ku ma dʼoji dufu efu ma kpai amakajo̩-ma kpai amako̩takada-ma chaka do̩ wa; tak ama le̩ kʼo̩la-ma wajo̩ o̩gba O̩jo̩.

Taku Jo̩shua ka ñw amone̩ le̩ chaka kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l ka de̩ kakini, Igbele igbele amata-me̩ dodo ejudaba Yufretis le̩, owñ che Te̩ra, ata Ebraham kpai ata Neho̩r; oñ ma jʼare̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩ o̩mo̩.
Tak omi mʼata-me̩ Ebraham du kwʼejudaba ohimini le̩, oñ u nʼowñ le ugbo du oj ane̩ Kenan-i, u laño̩ je̩ ñw ugbe̩-wñ wewe; u la du Aise̩k ñw u;
tak u mu Jeko̩b kpai Iso̩ ko ñwu Aise̩k. U la mʼuwo Seir du ñw Iso̩ kʼi ne̩, Jeko̩b kpai amo̩ma-wñ la gwo̩ru nyʼIjipti.
Tak u fu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpe̩lo, oñ u fʼIjipti gwoda, owñ chʼe̩wñ kʼu che efu-ma le̩; ubile̩ tak u mʼume̩ ko dufu wa.
U la mʼamata-me̩ ko kwʼ Ijipti dufu wa, oñ me̩ lewa o̩la ohimini le̩; tak abo Ijipti nʼo̩kogu kpai abo ku ma tanʼanya ranʼamata-me̩ gbogbo wa o̩la Ohimini Ekpikpa le̩.
Tak e̩gba ku ma chane̩ eraku do̩ Jihofa, i mʼe̩chubi du tʼagbagba ame̩ kpai abo Ijipti le̩, tak i dʼohimini wa abʼuma ma; eju-me̩ la li e̩wñ kʼu che Ijipti; oñ me̩ jo̩ ef aje̩tachi le̩ kpo̩kpe̩.
Tak u mʼume̩ ko wa ane̩ abo Amo̩r ku ma dodo udaba Jo̩rdan le̩; oñ ma kogu bʼume̩ tak u mʼuma ko nyʼume̩ o̩wo̩, oñ me̩ bʼuma gbʼane̩-ma, omi la fu ma kpabie̩ rinyo̩ bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩.
Taku Bele̩k o̩ma Zipo̩r, onu Moab le̩, kwane̩ akogu bʼabo Israe̩l; oñ i fʼone̩ kpe̩ ado̩ Belam, o̩ma Beo̩r le̩, kʼi nʼama ñwu me̩;
i muda dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu nyi Belam eti n; todule̩ i kadua ñwu me̩ kpo̩; abe̩le̩ oñ omi mʼume̩ gba bʼo̩ o̩wo̩ te̩.

Taku me̩ mu Jo̩rdan-i daba, oñ me̩ lewa Je̩riko, tak abo Je̩riko le̩ kʼogu bʼame̩, alu kʼabo Amo̩r le̩, kpai abo Pe̩re̩z, kpai abo Kenan, kpai abo He̩t, kpai abo Girgash, kpai abo Hifai, kpai abo Je̩bius ño̩ che ge̩; oñ u mʼuma ko nyʼume̩ o̩wo̩.
Tak u fʼanukpe kpuche̩ rʼume̩ o̩gba, oñ i fʼuma ne bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩, alu kʼi che amonu abo Amo̩r meji le̩; i la hiʼo̩wo̩ ugbada-we̩ kpai o̩o̩do̩-we̩ n.
Tak u mʼane̩ ki ma chʼame̩ chʼakanya-wñ n du ñwu me̩ kpai ewo ewo e-ki ma chʼame̩ ko̩ n, oñ me̩ dodo jʼo̩mo̩; me̩ jʼaje̩ e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai oli o̩lif e-ki ma chʼame̩ ne n.
Todule̩ fai me̩ ki railo Jihofa, ku me̩ rʼo̩ ogbolo ef ochochi; me̩ ki kʼamo̩jo̩ e-kʼamata-me̩ re̩ ma ejudaba Ohimini le̩ kpai e-oj ane̩ Ijipti le̩ rinyo̩ bʼume̩ o̩la te̩; me̩ ki re̩ Jihofa.

I la che̩wñ kʼere̩ Jihofa bie̩ne̩ eju-me̩, me̩ tu eñini-i ku me̩ du e̩ne̩ kʼame̩ are̩, abe̩k amo̩jo̩ kʼamata-me̩ re̩ ejudaba Ohimini le̩, abe̩k amo̩jo̩ e-abo Amo̩r, kʼame̩ dodo jʼoj ane̩-ma-i; i muda chʼomi kpai abo unyi e-mi, awa are̩ Jihofa.
Tak amone̩ le̩ dohi kakini, Kʼawa ki ti Jihofa no̩, kʼa che e̩wñ ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩ ki dab ale ñʼane̩ ñw a;

todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi mʼawa kpai amata-wa ko kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti kwef unyi adu le̩ wa, kʼowñ la fʼujiwe inaina le̩ che eju-wa, kʼi laño̩ fejute̩ wa ej o̩na du kʼa le kpai ef amone̩ chaka kʼa le gu efu-ma du le̩;
Jihofa laño̩ fʼamone̩ le̩ chaka ne bʼuwa o̩gba te̩, tʼabo Amo̩r ku ma dodo jʼane̩ le̩; todule̩ awa onugo are̩ Jihofa, todu owñ chʼO̩jo̩ e-wa.
Jo̩shua muda ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Ame̩ neke re̩ Jihofa n; todu O̩jo̩ afo̩; O̩jo̩ ki ajʼogu i che; i aje̩ kpai ada ku me̩ je̩ kpai adure-me̩ le̩ n.
Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ hi Jihofa tinyo̩, ku me̩ la re̩ amo̩jo̩ ononojo, mak owñ arida ache me̩ e̩bie̩ne̩, i la afʼume̩ lie̩, anubi e̩nyo̩ kʼi che ñwu me̩ le̩.
Tak amone̩ le̩ ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, O̩da; Jihofa oñ a are̩.
Taki Jo̩shua ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Ame̩ chʼabo ku me̩ gbibenu nyʼo̩la-me̩, ka kʼame̩ mu Jihofa du ku me̩ arʼo̩. Oñ ma kakini, A chʼame̩nibenu abe̩le̩.
Todule̩ fai, me̩ kʼamo̩jo̩ o̩nonojo ku ma jʼefu-me̩ le̩ rinyo̩, ku me̩ hiʼe̩do̩ wane̩ ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l.
Tak amone̩ le̩ ka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini, Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa oñ a arʼo̩, omu-wñ a anetirʼu.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua fʼalo kpe̩ kpai amone̩ le̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, oñ i fʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kpai o̩da ajo̩ du te̩ ñwu ma She̩ke̩m.
Taku Jo̩shua fʼorubutu o̩la-i ko̩ nyʼubuku uko̩-o̩la e-O̩jo; tak i mʼokuta elile du, oñ i mʼu du dago of oli ok ki me̩ru uña kiafo̩ e-Jihofa o̩me̩.
Taki Jo̩shua ka ñw amone̩ le̩ chaka kakini. Go, okuta-i achʼe̩nibenu nyʼuwa; todu i gbo̩ o̩la Jihofa kʼi ka ñw a-i chaka; todule̩ owñ achʼe̩nibenu nyʼume̩, tode̩gba ku me̩ fʼaire̩ O̩jo̩-me̩ re̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩shua je̩ ñw amone̩ le̩ chaka le ma, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼugbo e̩wñ ogu e-wñ.
Tak i lewatu anubi e̩wñ-i, ki Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun, adu Jihofa le̩, leku, o̩do̩-wñ la chʼogume̩lu nyoke me̩gwa.
Oñ ma mʼu du ji ef e̩wñ ogu e-wñ Timnat-sera, kʼi dʼoj ane̩ uwo e-Ifraim, o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ uwo Gaash le̩.
Abe̩le̩ abo Israe̩l re̩ Jihofa gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku Jo̩shua, kpai o̩jo̩ du kʼabogijo ku ma bo̩ e̩gba ki Jo̩shua ku deju kade, owñ chʼabo ku ma ma uko̩lo̩ du ki Jihofa che todu abo Israe̩l.

Taku ma mʼachiku Jose̩f, e-kʼabo Israe̩l ko kwʼIjipti wa, ko ji She̩ke̩m, ef e̩bu ane̩ ki Jeko̩b la o̩wo̩ amo̩ma Hemo̩r kʼi chʼata She̩ke̩m le̩ todu o̩ko̩ ajifa ogume̩lu; oñ e-le̩ mud e̩wñ ogu amo̩ma Jose̩f.
Tak E̩leaza, o̩ma Aro̩n leku; oñ ma mʼowñ du ji oj uwo Finehas, o̩ma-wñ, owñ chʼe-ku ma du ñw u oj ane̩ uwo e-Ifraim le̩.
Oñ i lewatu abu ki Jo̩shua leku, abo Israe̩l ti Jihofa ene kakini, E̩ne̩ adʼo̩gba te̩gu tʼabo Kenan o̩la kʼi kʼogu bʼuma todu wa ejodudu taʼ
Taki Jihofa kakini, Juda ale; go, u mʼane̩ le̩ du nyʼowñ o̩wo̩ me̩.

Taki Juda ka ñwu Simeo̩n o̩maye-wñ kakini, Lebʼumi tʼoj ane̩ kʼanya je̩ ñwu mi le̩, kʼawa ki kʼogu bʼabo Kenan le̩; tak u naño̩ lebʼuwe̩ tʼoj ane̩ kʼanya je̩ ñw e̩ abe̩le̩ ge̩. Abe̩le̩ Simeo̩n lebʼo̩.
Taki Juda mute̩gu lo oñ Jihofa mʼabo Kenan kpai abo Pe̩re̩z ko nyʼuma o̩wo̩; oñ ma fʼone̩-ma icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa gwodajane̩ Beze̩k.
Ma la fʼAdo̩ni-heze̩k li Beze̩k, taku ma kʼogu bʼo̩, oñ ma fʼabo Kenan kpai abo Pe̩re̩z gwodajane̩.
Ado̩ni-beze̩k muda ra; taku ma ranʼo oñ ma fʼu mu, ma la fʼonu o̩wo̩-wñ kpai onu e̩re̩-wñ ko̩da rinyo̩.

Taku Ado̩ni-beze̩k kakini, Amonu e̩te̩gwa, ku ma mʼonu o̩wo̩ kpai onu e̩re̩-ma ko̩da rinyo̩, fʼuje̩wñ-ma fiye̩ ofe itebulu e-mi; alu kʼu che le̩, alu le̩ O̩jo̩ fʼo̩me̩-wñ ra ñwu mi me̩. Taku ma mʼowñ du wa Je̩rusale̩m, oñ i leku o̩mo̩.
Tak abo Juda kʼogu bʼiJe̩rusale̩m, ma la mʼu gba, oñ ma nʼalu ugbada gwoda, taku ma dʼuna tʼewo le̩.
Ubile̩ tak abo Juda mugwo̩ru alo ku ma kʼogu bʼabo Kenan ku ma dodo ane̩ uwo, kpai ane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, kpai ane̩ o̩go̩ le̩.
Taki Juda le tekekobʼabo Kenan ku ma dodo He̩bro̩n (odu He̩bro̩n igbele la ko̩ Kjriat-arba); oñ ma fu Sheshai gulo̩, kpai Ahiman kpai Talmai.
Akwo o̩mo̩ i la nyʼako bʼabo ku ma dodo Debir. Odu Debir igbele la ko̩ Kiriat-sefe̩r.
Taku Kele̩b kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼi fu Kiriat-sefe̩r gwoda, kʼi la mʼu gba, nadu Aksa, o̩ma-mi, ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ kʼi chʼo̩ya-wñ.
Tak O̩tnie̩l, o̩ma Kenaz, okekele Kele̩b e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, fʼu du; tak i mʼAksa o̩ma-wñ du ñw u chʼo̩ya.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼonobule̩ le̩ lewa ugbo-wñ, i la fʼowñ hio̩wo̩ kʼi bi ane̩ uche̩ʼka ugbo ata-wñ; tak onobule̩ le̩ mudachi kwʼoji o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ tane̩, oñ Kele̩b ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ e̩ tene?
I ka ñw u kakini, Dʼe̩wñ ele ñwu mi; abu kʼe̩ mʼane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩ du ñwu mi, e̩ ki ño̩ dʼe̩bi omi ñwu mi ge̩. Taku Kele̩b mʼe̩bi omi e-ate̩ kpai e-o̩gane̩ ko ñw u.
Oñ abo o̩lo̩pu e̩ne̩ Ken, ana Mose̩s le̩, la kwʼewo e-oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩ alebo̩ abo Juda nyʼaje̩tachi Juda, owñ chʼe-kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ Arad le̩; taku ma nyʼadodo ef amone̩ le̩.
Taki Juda lebo̩ Simeo̩n o̩maye-wñ, oñ ma fʼabo Kenan ku ma dodo Zefat gwoda. Ma la mʼo̩mo̩ kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko. Oñ ma dʼodu ewo le̩ ko Ho̩rma.
Juda ño̩ fu Gaza du, manyʼane̩-wñ kadʼalo̩me̩-wñ, kpai Ashke̩lo̩n manyʼane̩-wñ kadʼalo̩me̩-wñ, kpai E̩kro̩n manyʼane̩-wñ kadʼalo̩me̩-wñ.
Jihofa la dʼubi Juda, oñ i mʼane̩ uwo le̩ gba, i muda neke nʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩ o̩go̩ le̩ dufu n, todabu ku ma nʼo̩ko̩ogu ebije.
Taku ma mu He̩bro̩n du ñwu Kele̩b, alu ki Mose̩s ka le̩; oñ i fʼamo̩ma Anak me̩ta le̩ ne dufu.
Abo Be̩njamin la nʼabo Je̩bius ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m dufu n; abe̩le̩ abo Je̩bius gugu kpenyʼabo Be̩njamin Je̩rusale̩m gbogbo tʼeñini.
Abo unyi Jose̩f ño̩ te̩gu akobo̩ Be̩le̩l ge̩; Jihofa la dʼubi-ma.
Tak abo unyi Jose̩f fʼone̩ kpe̩ atu ane̩ Be̩te̩l. (Odu ewo le̩ la ko̩ Luz akwoubi.)
Tak abo ku ma tʼane̩ le̩ li eneʼka kʼi akwʼef ewo le̩ dufu awa, oñ ma ka ñwu kikini, A gbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, e̩ ña wa o̩na kʼa gudu nyʼef ewo-i tak a adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ñʼe̩.
Tak i dʼugbo ku ma gudu nyʼewo le̩ ña ma: oñ ma nʼalu ugbada fʼewo le̩ gwoda, ma muda tʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kpai abo-wñ chaka no̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ nyʼojane̩ abo He̩t oñ i fʼewo ko̩ o̩mo̩, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Luz; e-le̩ la chʼodu-wñ gbogbo tʼeñini.

Manasa la nʼabo Be̩t-shean kpai abo adogbe-wñ dufu n, kpai abo Taanak kpai abo adogbe-wñ n, kpai abo ku ma dodo Do̩r kpai abo adogbe-wñ n, kpai abo ku ma dodo Ibleam kpai abo adogbe-wñ n, kpai abo ku ma dodo Me̩gido kpai abo adogbe-wñ n; abo Kenan la neku edodo ane̩ le̩ tila.
Tak i lewatu, e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l fʼukpahiu ne̩, ma je̩ ñw abo Kenan re̩ ma, ma muda ne ma dufu hioko n.
Ifraim la nʼabo Kenan ku ma dodo Geze̩r dufu n; abo Kenan le̩ la gugu efu-ma Geze̩r le̩.
Ze̩biulo̩n nʼabo ku ma dodo Kitro̩n dufu n, kpai abo ku ma dodo Nahalo̩l in; abo Kenan la kwogugu efu-ma, oñ ma mud abo ku ma re̩ ma.
Ashe̩r nʼabo ku ma dodo Ako dufu n, kpai abo ku ma dodo Saidon, kpai abo Alab, kpai abo Akzib, kpai abo He̩lbo̩n, kpai abo Afik, kpai abo Rehob in;
ama abo Ashe̩r le̩ dodo ef abo Kenan ku ma dodo ane̩ le̩; todu ma ne ma dufu n.

Naftali nʼabo ku ma dodo Be̩t-shime̩sh dufu n, kpai abo ku ma dodo Be̩t-anat in; i muda kwogugu ef abo Kenan, ku ma dodo ane̩ le̩; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩, abo ku ma dodo Be̩t-shime̩sh, kpai abo ku ma dodo Be̩t-anat mud abo ku ma re̩ ma.
Oñ abo Amo̩r fʼabo Dan kpa lʼubiubi tʼoj ane̩ uwo, todu ma je̩ ñwu ma gwo̩ru wʼef o̩go̩ n;
abo Amo̩r le̩ muda neku ku ma dodo oji uwo Here̩s kpai Aijalo̩n kpai Shaalbim tila, o̩wo̩ abo unyi Jose̩f muda nʼuma oji tabale, oñ abo le̩ mud abo ku ma re̩ ma.
Alome̩ abo Amo̩r la te̩ akwo ate̩gu Akrabim, kwʼugbo okuta le̩ mute̩gu alo.

Tak onuche̩ Jihofa mute̩gu kwo Gilgal wa Bochim. Oñ i kakini, Omi je̩ ñwu me̩ kwʼIjipti dufu, oñ u mʼume̩ ko wa oj ane̩ e-kʼu go̩ ñw amata-me̩ le̩. Oñ u kakini, U ñʼakpʼalo-mi kpai ame̩ bie̩ ogbegbele̩ n.
Ame̩ ki la kpʼalo kpai abo ane̩-i du n; me̩ ki fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-ma gulo̩. Me̩ la netirʼomu-mi n. E̩wñ chi ku me̩ che-i ta?
Todule̩ u laño̩ kakini, U ñʼane ma dufu bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩ ge̩ n; ma muda akado me̩ akolo dab ikeke, amo̩jo̩ e-ma la achʼoku ñwu me̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼonuche̩ Jihofa kʼo̩la-i ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l chaka, tak amone̩ le̩ chi omu-ma nyʼate̩ araku.
Oñ ma dʼodu o̩mo̩ ko̩ Bochim; ma la fʼiche̩bo̩ che ñwu Jihofa o̩mo̩.
E̩gba ki Jo̩shua je̩ ñw amone̩ le̩ muchi, tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ abo Israe̩l nyʼugbo e̩wñ ogu e-wñ, ku ma mʼane̩ le̩ gba.
Amone̩ le̩ la che e̩wñ ñwu Jihofa gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku Joshua, gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku abogijo ku ma kpʼojolugbo tu Jo̩shua le, owñ chʼabo ku ma fʼuko̩lo̩ inaina ku Jihofa che todu abo Israe̩l le̩ li.
Oñ o̩do̩ Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun, adu Jihofa le̩, jo̩ ogu me̩lu nyoke me̩gwa tak i leku.
Oñ ma mʼu du ji ejefu alo̩me̩ e̩wñ ogu-wñ Timnat-he̩re̩s, ane̩ uwo Ifraim, o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ uwo Gaash le̩.
Uku laño̩ mʼabo o̩gba le̩ chaka ko wʼugbo amata-ma; tak abo o̩lo̩pu omune̩ ku ma ma ma Jihofa, ku ma ma la ma uko̩lo̩ kʼi che todu abo Israe̩l in, kwane̩ ubi-ma.
Tak abo Israe̩l fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, ma la kwoche e̩wñ ñw ami-Beal;

oñ ma hiu Jihofa O̩jo̩ amata-ma kʼi ko ma kwʼane̩ Ijipti wa le̩ tinyo̩; ma kwotʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi, owñ chʼamo̩jo̩ amone̩ ku ma jo̩ lʼuma daka le̩, oñ ma kwodojikane̩ ñwu ma; ma la nyi Jihofa uwe̩do̩.
Ma hiu Jihofa tinyo̩, oñ ma kwoche amiBeal kpai Ashtaro̩t.

Abe̩le̩ uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼIsrae̩l ma, oñ i mʼuma ko nyʼamajakpa e̩wñ o̩wo̩, oñ abo le̩ mʼuma ko je̩; i la mʼuma kota tef o̩wo̩ ame̩ne̩bi-ma ku ma lʼuma daka le̩, oñ ma ma neke ño̩ dago o̩gba ame̩ne̩bi-ma ge̩ n.
Ugbo du ku ma le ru, o̩wo̩ Jihofa chʼagwunyʼuma, alu ki Jihofa ka kʼi go̩ ñwu ma le̩; oñ ma li o̩bata tabale.
Taki Jihofa kʼamakajo̩ kwane̩, abo le̩ la fʼuma jadu kwef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma ko ma je̩ le̩.
Ma la nyʼamaka-jo̩-ma le̩ eti n; todu ma tʼajo̩ko̩ bʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩, ma la dojikane̩ ñwu ma; ma hika muna bʼo̩na kʼamata-ma le ku ma gbʼuko̩ uko̩ ki Jihofa te̩ gbo̩ le̩, te̩; ma che dab amata-ma n.

Tak e̩gba du ki Jihofa kʼamakajo̩ kwane̩ ñwu ma, e̩gbale̩ Jihofa la dʼugbo akajo̩ le̩, oñ i fʼuma jadu bʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩ne̩bi-ma te̩ gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku akajo̩ le̩; todu ifi-ma ku ma fi noji abo ku ma fu ma kpa ma, ku ma la che ma o̩bata wo̩ Jihofa.

Ama e̩gba kʼakajo̩ le̩ leku, ma ño̩ mudabi tubi, oñ ma chane̩ eche e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ tʼamata-ma le, owñ chʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ etʼo̩ ubi, ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu ma, ku ma la dojikane̩ ñwu ma ge̩; ma we e̩wñ ugbite̩re̩-ma du eche n.
Oñ uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼIsrae̩l ma; oñ i kakini, Todabu kʼabo ichi-i fʼalo-mi e-kʼu ñwa ñw amata-ma daba ku ma ma la nyʼomu-mi eti n,
akwe̩gba-i u ñʼanʼabo uche̩ichi ki Jo̩shua to̩no̩ jo̩ tak i ku le̩ dufu bʼuma o̩gba te̩ ge̩ n,
todu kʼu nʼabo le̩ ñwa abo Israe̩l go̩, abe̩ku ma jʼade̩ o̩na Jihofa ku ma alule̩ o̩na le̩ alu kʼamata-ma che, abe̩ku ma aje̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ oñ Jihofa tʼabo uche̩ichi le̩ no̩, kʼi ma la ne ma dufu piopio n; i la ko ma nyu Jo̩shua o̩wo̩ n.
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi-i la chʼabo ki Jihofa to̩no̩, kʼi ne̩ ma ñwa abo Israe̩l go, owñ chʼaluka abo Israe̩l kʼeju-ma ma dʼogu ane̩ Kenan le̩ chaka n;
owñ chʼutodu kʼabo Israe̩l o̩gba o̩gba ki ma ogu eja, kʼi ko̩ abo ku ma ma mʼogu eja akwoubi n.
Owñ chʼamodu abo Filistia me̩lu le̩, kpai abo Kenan chaka, kpai abo Saido̩n, kpai abo Hifai ku ma dodo uwo Le̩bano̩n, akwo uwo Beal-he̩rmo̩n gbogbo wa alo̩na ugbo ku ma gudu nyi Hamat.
Abo le̩ la jo̩, kʼi ne̩ ma ñwʼabo Israe̩l go, kʼi ma abe̩ku ma anyʼuko̩ uko̩ ki Jihofa te̩ eti, owñ chʼo̩la kʼi ñwa ñw amata-ma lugbo Mose̩s le̩.
Abe̩le̩ abo Israe̩l kwogugu ef abo Kenan, kpai ef abo He̩t, kpai ef abo Amo̩r, kpai ef abo Pe̩re̩z, kpai ef abo Hifai, kpai ef abo Je̩bius;
oñ ma mʼamo̩ma-ma ko che o̩ya-ma, oñ ma mʼamo̩ma e-ma ko ñw amo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩; ma la kwore̩ amo̩jo̩-ma.
Abo Israe̩l la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, ma la gbenyo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma, oñ ma kwore̩ amiBeal kpai Ashe̩rot.
Todule̩ uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼIsrae̩l ma, oñ i mʼuma ko ta tef o̩wo̩ Kushan-rishataim onu Me̩sopotemia; oñ abo Israe̩l re̩ Kushan-rishataim o̩do̩ me̩jo̩.
Ama e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l raku do̩ Jihofa, Jihofa mʼe̩najaduʼka du kwane̩ ñwu abo Israe̩l, owñ le̩ fʼuma jadu, owñ che O̩tnie̩l o̩ma Kenaz, okekele Kele̩b.
Afu Jihofa lewa bʼowñ ma, oñ i kajo̩ abo Israe̩l; i la dufu nyʼoko ogu, taku Jihofa mu Kushan-rishataim, onu Me̩sopotemia le̩, du tʼo̩ o̩wo̩; o̩wo̩-wñ la gbiti tu Kushan-rishataim le.
Abe̩le̩ ane̩ le̩ fʼuñmi ne̩ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji. Tak O̩tnie̩l, o̩ma Kenaz le̩, leku.
Tak abo Israe̩l ño̩ kwoche e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa ge̩; taku Jihofa dʼukpahiu ñwu E̩glo̩n onu Moab kʼi ko bʼabo Israe̩l, todabu ku ma fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che le̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ kʼabo Amo̩n kpai abo Amale̩k wa jeju ugbo-wñ, oñ i le nagwo abo Israe̩l da, taku ma mʼewo oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩ gba.
Oñ abo Israe̩l re̩ E̩glon onu Moab o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩.

Ama e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l raku do̩ Jihofa, Jihofa la dʼe̩najadu kwane̩ ñwu ma, owñ che Ehud, o̩ma Gera, e̩ne̩ Be̩njamin, abawohi i che. Tak abo Israe̩l kʼe̩wñ ire̩ kpuche̩ lʼo̩wo̩-wñ wa ñw E̩glo̩n onu Moab le̩.
Ehud la fʼugbada ki nʼeju meji gwu ñw o̩la-wñ, ujiji-wñ che ohibaʼka; i mʼu du ji mʼuta-wñ awo̩to̩ ejefu ukpo-wñ.
Tak i mʼe̩wñ ire̩ le̩ kowa ñw E̩glo̩n onu Moab. E̩glo̩n le̩ la chʼe̩ne̩ oyo tabale.
Tak e̩gba kʼEhud mʼe̩wñ ire̩ le̩ ko ñw u kpa, i je̩ ñw abo ku ma nʼe̩wñ ire̩ le̩ wa ku ma dʼo̩gba alo.
Owñ onugo muda lekado ojibo okuta ki jo̩ Gilgal tak i mudabi, oñ i kakini, U chenʼuche̩ kʼu naje̩rʼuwe̩ ejubi, onu. Tak i kakini, Chechi ta. Oñ abo ki ma dago kpenyʼu kwʼugbo-wñ dufu.
Tak Ehud lewa ugbo-wñ, owñ kate la gugu unyi ojale ugbo kʼafu afe̩rʼu o̩la. Tak Ehud kakini, U chenʼuche̩ kʼi kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ kʼu naje̩rʼe̩. Oñ i kwane̩ bʼe̩wñ ugugu-wñ te̩.
Tak Ehud fʼo̩wo̩-wñ awohi nadala, i la mʼugbada wo̩ kwʼakolo-wñ awo̩to̩, oñ i mʼu du gwunyʼu efu;
uka-wñ kwotunyʼu manyʼo̩be̩ ge̩, tak ula-wñ kwobʼoji o̩be̩ ma, todu i wo̩ ugbada le̩ bʼefu-wñ te̩ n; oñ i ledufu ejubi.
Tak Ehud dufu nyʼef atakpa, oñ i fʼo̩na unyi ojale le̩ renyʼu, oñ i fʼu tʼigede.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi le, amadu onu lewa; taku ma go, oñ ma li kʼo̩na unyi ojale le̩ chetʼigede; taku ma kakini, I dʼejefu unyi ojale le̩ agu e̩re̩ che̩.
Oñ ma jo gbogbo anyo̩ fʼuma mu; go, i la bi o̩na unyi ojale le̩ n, ma mʼo̩ma igede-wñ du oñ ma mʼu bi; me̩ la go, odu-ma leku tʼane̩pe̩te̩ o̩mo̩.
Oñ abu ku ma kpo̩kpe̩ o̩mo̩ Ehud rale, oñ i lale tʼejubi ojibo okuta le̩, i la fʼuma o̩wo̩ nyi Seira.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi lewa, i fʼo̩kakachi fa ane̩ uwo Ifraim o̩mo̩; tak abo Israe̩l mugwo̩ru kwʼane̩ uwo le̩ kpai owñ, owñ la tʼuma o̩gba.

Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini. Me̩ tʼumi ubi; todu Jihofa mʼame̩nebi-me̩, abo Moab le̩, ko nyʼume̩ o̩wʼo̩ me̩. Abe̩le̩ ma gwo̩ru tʼo̩ ubi, oñ ma mʼugbo ki Jo̩rdan de̩ hie̩hie̩le̩ ugbo kʼone̩ adaba o̩wo̩ Moab le̩ gba nyʼo̩wo̩, i la je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ki daba n.
Oñ ma fʼaboke̩le̩ Moab dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ gwa kpa iko le̩, o̩chaka-ma ayoyo, ma chʼamagbiti; e̩ne̩ kate fʼo̩ o̩wo̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ o̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l fʼabo Moab du o̩jo̩ le̩. Tak ane̩ le̩ fʼuñmi ne̩ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩.
Ubi-wñ Shamgar o̩ma Anat la do̩mo̩, owñ le̩ nʼe̩wñ ku ma du gwunyʼamokuno̩ ofe ku ma lule̩ kpa aboke̩le̩ Filistia ulo̩gwa: owñ le̩ ño̩ fʼabo Israe̩l jadu ge̩.
Abu kʼEhud leku, abo Israe̩l ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che ge̩.
Taki Jihofa mʼuma ko ta te̩ Jebin onu Renan o̩wo̩, i jʼo̩fe̩-wñ Hazo̩r; onu ogu-wñ che Sisera, kʼi la dodo Haro-she̩t e-abo uche̩ichi le̩.
Tak abo Israe̩l raku do̩ Jihofa; todu e̩ne̩ le̩ nʼo̩ko̩ ogu ebije ogu me̩lu me̩la; i la fʼabo Israe̩l dema o̩do̩ ogu.
Oñ Debo̩ra, akache̩ onobule̩, kʼi chʼo̩ya Lapido̩t, kajo̩ abo Israe̩l iko le̩.
I te̩tagugu of oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ e-Debo̩ra agbagba Rama kpai Be̩te̩l oj ane̩ uwo Ifraim; oñ abo Israe̩l nawʼugbo-wñ kʼi kpʼoji ajo̩-ma.

I fʼone̩ kpe̩ ado̩ Barak o̩ma Abino̩am kʼi kwo Kede̩sh-naftali wa. Oñ onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, I che Jihofa, O̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l, ñwa kakini, Lo kʼe̩ te̩me̩rʼuwo Tabo̩r o̩mo̩ kʼe̩ la mʼaboke̩le̩ Naftali kpai abo Ze̩biulo̩n icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa ko le bʼuwe̩ n?
Tak u nafu Sisera kʼi chʼonu ogu Jebin manyʼo̩ko̩ ogu-wñ, kpai o̩wo̩ amone̩-wñ fa wʼugbo we̩, ugbo ukpolo Kisho̩n oñ namʼowñ du nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩.
Taku Barak ka ñw u kakini, E̩ le bʼumi nale; i muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ ma le n, nale n.
Oñ onobule̩ le̩ kakini, Nale bʼuwe̩ chuu; ama ule̩ kʼuwe̩ ale-i e̩ nʼojima-wñ n, todu Jihofa adu Sisera ta tef o̩wo̩ onobule̩. Taki Debo̩ra kwane̩, oñ i lebo̩ Barak nyi Kede̩sh.
Taki Barak fu Ze̩biulo̩n kpai Naftali do̩ wa Kede̩sh; aboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa la fʼe̩re̩ nʼe̩re̩-wñ te̩gu alo; Debo̩ra la lebʼo̩ ge̩.
Hebe̩r, e̩ne̩ Ken le̩, la fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ bʼabo Ken ku ma chʼabo Ho̩bab ana Mose̩s te̩ e̩gba le̩ me̩, i la fʼunyabo-wñ fa o̩najiji ugbo oli ok Zaananim, ki me̩ru Kede̩sh.
Taku ma muduka ñwu Sisera ka ki Barak, o̩ma Abino̩am, mute̩gu nyʼoj uwo Tabo̩r me̩,
oñ Sisera mʼo̩ko̩ ogu-wñ ebije ogu me̩lu me̩la chaka ko wa jʼugbo kate, kpai amone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ akwo Haroshe̩t e-abo uche̩ichi gbogbo wa ukpolo Kisho̩n.

Taku Debo̩ra ka ñwu Barak kakini, Kwane̩! todu eñini chʼo̩jo̩ ki Jihofa mu Sisera du tʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩, Jihofa tʼuwe̩ o̩gba dufu ta n? Oñ Barak mugwo̩ru uwo Tabo̩r wane̩, aboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa tʼo̩ ubi.
Taku Jihofa nʼalu ugbada fu Sisera kpai o̩ko̩ ogu-wñ chaka kpai abogu-wñ chaka biya rʼo̩gba Barak; taku Sisera mudachi kwʼef o̩ko̩ ogu-wñ tane̩, oñ i ra le kpʼe̩re̩ ofo.
Barak la rano o̩ko̩ ogu-wñ, kpai abogu le̩ gbogbo wa Haroshe̩t e-abo uche̩ichi, oñ abogu Sisera le̩ chaka lewane̩ alu ugbada; e̩ne̩ke̩le̩-ma okate bo̩ n.
Ama Sisera rale e̩re̩ ofo tʼunyabo Jee̩l, o̩ya Hebe̩r e̩ne̩ Ken le̩; todu o̩la du dʼagbagba Jebin onu Hezo̩r kpai abo unyi Hebe̩r e̩ne̩ Ken le̩ n.
Oñ Jee̩l ledufu kʼi ledo Sisera, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Muna, odu-mi, muna wʼugbo mi emi; e̩ ki railo n. Tak i muna wʼugbo-wñ ef unyabo le̩, oñ onobule̩ le̩ mʼugbologo ko bʼo̩ o̩la ma.
Taku Sisera ka ñw u kakini, Dʼomiofo ñwu mi ñmo̩ pe̩, agba, alugbe̩ akpa mi. Tak i muji o̩cha omi e̩nya chi, oñ i du ñw u kʼi ñmo̩, tak i kʼe̩wñ le̩ bʼo̩ o̩la ma ge̩.
Tak i ka ñw onobule̩ kakini, Kwodago alugbana unyabo-i, tak e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du wa tʼuwe̩ ene kakini, E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du dʼemi n? Uwe̩ ki dohi ñw u kakini, O̩da.

Taku Jee̩l, o̩ya Hebe̩r le̩, mʼoli unyabo ku ma fa ku ma du tunyane̩ du, oñ i mʼutumu du nʼo̩wo̩, tak i le ye̩ye̩ nyʼugbo-wñ oñ i mʼoli le̩ du kanyʼibeti-wñ, oñ i mugudu tunyʼane̩ ugbo kʼi dachi, todu i mʼolu uhia du. Oñ i leku.

E̩ la go, abu ki Barak arano Sisera, Jee̩l kwodufu aledʼo, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Lewa kʼu nadʼe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ tejane̩ ñw u le̩ ñʼuwe̩. Tak i nyʼef unyabo-wñ; e̩ la go, Sisera la leku tʼo̩mo̩, oli unyabo le̩ tunyʼibeti-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ O̩jo̩ fu Jebin onu Kenan du o̩gba abo Israe̩l o̩jo̩ le̩.
Oñ o̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l fʼukpahiu ne̩ nyo̩gba tule waa akobo̩ Jebin onu Kenan, gbogbo taku ma fu Jebin onu Kenan le̩ ko̩da rinyo̩.
Taku Debo̩ra kpai Barak o̩ma Abinoam fʼeli ko̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, kakini:
Todabu kʼame̩nuto̩gba mʼo̩gba du Israe̩l,
Me̩ gbo̩, ame̩ amonu; me̩ neti, ame̩ abo̩da;
Jihofa, e̩gba kʼe̩ kwo Seir le̩ dufu,
Uwo uwo chane̩ eya rinyo̩ eju Jihofa ki dʼane̩ le̩,
Iko Shamgar, o̩ma Anat le̩,
Ikpunyi ikpunyi de̩ Israe̩l ge̩ n,
Ma chi amo̩jo̩ etito̩,
E̩do̩-mi dʼugbo amigo̩bina Israe̩l
Ame̩ ku me̩ tano o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ efufu le̩,
Ugbo kʼekuku ma de̩ n, o̩gba e̩ga ugbo ku ma wa kpa omiofo,
Mʼolu ji, mʼolu ji, Debo̩ra!
Tak e̩bo̩bo̩ abo ku ma bi lʼeju O̩jo̩, kpai amone̩ le̩ mugwo̩ru wa;
Abo ku ma fʼili nyʼane̩ Amale̩k kwo Ifraim wa,
amagboji Isakar la jʼugbo Debora,
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ gugu ef iga amala,
Gilead la kwogugu udaba Jordan le̩;
Ze̩biulo̩n chʼamone̩ ki fʼo̩la-ma gbalijo̩ ñw uku;
Amonu lewa ajogu;
Ma kwʼojale wa ajo̩gu,
Ukpolo Kisho̩n mu ma ko lo,
E̩gbale̩ e̩re̩ amanya chane̩ eda nyʼane̩
Me̩ fʼama na ñw Me̩roz, onuche̩ Jihofa ka-i,
Ma ade̩nyo̩ ñw Jee̩l tʼabobule̩ du le,
I bi omiofo, i la dʼomie̩nya ñw u,
Tak i dʼo̩wo̩-wñ tatʼoli unyabo
I fʼoji dalo̩ tʼagada onobule̩ le̩, i lewane̩,
Iye Sisera nyope lʼiwindo ago o̩do̩da,
Abobule̩ aguchi ku ma nʼibe dohi ñw u,
I chʼane̩ kʼogu je̩, oñ ma jʼo̩mo̩ akpe̩ le̩ n?—
Ame̩nebi-we̩ chaka ki lenyo̩ abe̩le̩, O Jihofa!
Oñ abo Israe̩l ño̩ che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa; taki Jihofa ño̩ mʼuma ko nyʼo̩wo̩ Midian o̩do̩ mebie.
Oñ o̩wo̩ abo Midian tʼabo Israe̩l le; todu abo Midian le̩, abo Israe̩l fʼowo ki jʼoj uwo uwo le̩ che ñw o̩la-ma, kpai ura, kpai aku aku le̩.
E̩gba du kʼabo Israe̩l fʼe̩wñ gbe̩, abo Midian kpai abo Amale̩k kpai abo olodudu le̩ lewa akobʼuma;
oñ ma kpala nyʼuma, ku ma fʼe̩wñ kʼane̩ du dufu le̩ kpabie̩ rinyo̩, gbogbo tak one̩ lewa Gaza, ma la tʼuje̩wñ du no̩ ñw abo Israe̩l in, tʼe̩wño̩re̩ egini, tʼo̩kokuno̩, tʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩.
Todu ama kpai ame̩wñukpa-ma kpai unyabo-ma kpe̩re̩ wa; uwewe-ma ki wa dab amimiejo; tʼama, tʼaminyakulumi-ma nʼaluka n; ma la wʼoj ane̩ le̩ ku ma fʼu kpabie̩.
Abo Israe̩l la mud e̩ne̩ ubie̩ tabale noji abo Midian le̩; tak abo Israe̩l kworaku do̩ Jihofa.
Tak i lewatu, e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l raku do̩ Jihofa noji abo Midian le̩,
Jihofa la fʼakache̩ʼka kpuche̩ rʼabo Israe̩l; oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, ka de̩ kakini, Omi ko me̩ kwʼIjipti wa, u la mʼume̩ ko kwʼef unyi-adu le dufu;
oñ u mʼume̩ gba bʼo̩wo̩ abo Ijipti te̩, kpai bʼo̩wo̩ abo du ku ma fʼume̩ dema te̩, u fʼuma ne bʼume̩ o̩gba te̩, oñ u mʼane̩-ma ko ñwu me̩.
Tak u ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Omi che Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩; me̩ ki diba ñw amo̩jo̩ abo Amo̩r, e-ku me̩ dodo oj ane̩-ma-i n. Me̩ muda nyʼomu-mi eti n.
Tak Onuche̩ Jihofa lewa, oñ i kwogugu ofe ok ki de̩ Ofra, e-ki Joash e̩ne̩ Abiezra ne̩ le̩. O̩ma-wñ Gideo̩n la do̩mo̩ agwʼo̩ka ef agu o̩ko̩lo̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma, kʼi mʼu du-abo Midian maja.
Tak Onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ kwotejugede ñw u, i ka ñw u kakini, Jihofa dʼugbo we̩, uwe̩ e̩nugbiti ki nʼuwohi le̩.

Taku Gideon ka ñw u kakini, O, Odu-mi, iche̩wñ ki Jihofa dʼugbo wa, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩wñ-i chaka ke̩re̩bʼuwa-i? Ugbo uko̩lo̩ aye-wñ du kʼamata-wa kʼinabali ñw a le̩ de̩? Ma kakini, I che Jihofa ko wa kwʼ Ijipti wa n? Ama fai Jihofa hi uwa tinyo̩, i la mʼuwa ko nyʼabo Midian Owo̩.
Taki Jihofa kejurʼu, oñ i kakini, Uwe̩ ki nale ef ukpahiu-we̩-i, kʼe̩ la fʼIsrae̩l jadu bʼo̩wo̩ abo Midian te̩; i chʼomi kpʼe̩ uche̩-i n?
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, O, Ondu, e̩wñ nadʼu jadu abo Israe̩l? Abo o̩lo̩pu e-mi chʼame̩nubie̩ tʼuma le efu Manasa, omi la chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi nya ef abo unyi ata-mi.
Taki Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Omi muda adʼugbo we̩ chuu, uwe̩ la akpa abo Midian le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼama chʼe̩ne̩ kate.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ali umi eju-i, mak e̩ dʼujiwe ña mi, ka kʼuwe̩ ako̩la ñw omi-i.
Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ e̩ ki kwo bʼemi te̩ n, gbogbo tak u mudabi wʼugbo we̩, kʼu la adʼe̩wñ ele-mi dufu wa, kʼu mʼu du gugu o̩gba-we̩. Oñ i kakini, Nagugu emi deju we̩.

Taki Gideon nyʼejefu, oñ i fʼo̩ma ewo ñwo̩che, kpai akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n, kʼi nʼomu alu e̩faʼka che; i mʼe̩la le̩ ko nyʼagba, oñ i dʼomi akele-wñ danyʼucha, tak i mʼu ko dufu wʼugbo-wñ of oli ok le̩, oñ i mʼu ko wʼugbo-wñ.
Tak Onuche̩ O̩jo̩ ka ñw u kakini, Mʼe̩la kpai akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n le̩ ko jʼoji okuta-i, tak e̩ dʼomi akele-wñ dafo. Oñ i fʼabe̩le̩ che.

Tak Onuche̩ Jihofa fʼoji o̩kpa ki dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ nadala te̩ akadʼe̩la kpai akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n le̩; tak una kwane̩ kwef okuta le̩, oñ i fʼe̩la kpai akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n le̩ lie̩; tak Onuche̩ Jihofa takpa rʼe eju.
Oñ Gideo̩n fu ma ka kʼOnuche̩ Jihofa de̩; taku Gideon kakini, Atogwo, O Ondu, Jihofa! Todu eju-mi kpai eju Onuche̩ Jihofa de me̩.
Jihofa muda ka ñw u kakini, E̩do̩-we̩ ki nyi, e̩ ki railo n, uwe̩ aku n.
Taku Gideon fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa o̩mo̩, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jihofa-shalo̩m.I dago Ofra e-abo Abiezra gbogbo tʼeñini ta.

Oñ i lewatʼodu o̩jo̩ le̩, Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Mʼo̩ko̩ okuno̩ ata-we̩ du, owñ chʼo̩ko̩ okuno̩ ekeji kʼo̩do̩-wñ chʼebie le̩, kʼe̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼata-we̩ ne̩ le̩ gulo̩ wane̩ kʼe̩ la fʼAshe̩ra ki me̩rʼu o̩mo̩ lo̩ wane̩.
Tak e̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, oji aku-i, alu ku ma ñwate̩ le̩, tak e̩ mʼo̩ko̩ okuno̩ ekeji le̩ du, kʼe̩ mʼu du che iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, iji-wñ kʼi chʼoli Ashe̩ra e-kʼe̩ lo̩ wane̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ Gideo̩n mʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ me̩gwa chi, oñ i che alu ki Jihofa ka ñw u; ama abu kʼi arailo abo unyi ata-wñ kpai aboke̩le̩ ewo le̩, i che o̩ro̩ka n, o̩jo̩ du tak i che.

Tak e̩gba kʼabo ewo le̩ kwane̩ odudu odudu, me̩ go, ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-Beal le̩ mugulo̩ wane̩, Ashe̩ra ki jʼo̩la-wñ chelo̩ jʼane̩, oñ o̩ko̩ okuno̩ ekeji jʼoji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku ma ne o̩mo̩ alu kʼu ma du che lef una.
Taku ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, E̩ne̩ che-i ta? Tak e̩gba ku ma tejane̩-wñ ku ma la fʼene-wñ tu, ma kakini, Gideon, o̩ma Joash, che-i.
Tak aboke̩le̩ ewo le̩ ka ñwu Joash kakini, Mʼo̩ma-we̩ du dufu wa kʼi ku, todu i fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Beal gulo̩, i laño̩ fʼAshe̩ra ki jo̩ o̩la-wñ lo̩ jʼane̩ ge̩.

Taki Joash ka ñw abo du ku ma dago akejurʼu kakini, Ame̩ alʼubi Beal? ame̩ ajadu owñ? Ma adʼe̩ne̩ du ki alʼubi Beal kpa tak olu ki wʼoji. I chʼo̩jo̩ʼka i che, i jʼuja o̩la-wñ, todu ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-wñ oñ ma gulo̩-i.
Tudule̩ ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Je̩rubeal o̩jo̩ le̩, kakini, Beal ki nakʼuja bʼo̩, todabu kʼi fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ gulo̩ wane̩.
Tak abo Midian chaka kpai abo Amale̩k kpai abo o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩ chaka kʼo̩la-ma wa jeju, oñ ma mu Jo̩rdan daba lewa ru o̩go̩ Je̩zre̩e̩l.
Ama Afu Jihofa lewa bo̩ Gideon ma; oñ i fʼo̩kakachi fa; tak abo Abieze̩r kʼo̩la-ma jeju rʼo̩ ubi.
Tak i fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ lʼugbo du ojane̩ Manama; abo le̩ laño̩ kʼo̩la-ma jeju rʼo̩ ubi ge̩; tak i fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Ashe̩r kpai ugbo Ze̩biulo̩n kpai ugbo Naftali; oñ abo le̩ mute̩gu ledo ma.
Taki Gideon ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ajadu abo Israe̩l lʼo̩wo̩-mi, alu kʼe̩ ka le̩,

go, nadʼaño̩ ala ku ma ma fʼe̩bo̩ n bʼajita ugwʼoka ma; i la che̩wñ kʼeli chi nyʼedudu-wñ kate, kʼane̩pe̩te̩-wñ chaka la chʼe̩gbe̩, e̩gbale̩ tak u nama ka kʼuwe̩ ajadu Israe̩l lʼo̩wo̩-mi alu kʼe̩ ka le̩.
Abe̩le̩ i la de̩. I takpa kwane̩ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, tak i fedudu le̩ piri, oñ i fʼu dalo̩ tak omi eli-wñ wane̩ e̩ko̩ ugbaʼka.

Taki Gideon ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, Uwe̩do̩-we̩ ki tajo̩ bʼumi ma n, kʼu ko̩la ñw e̩ onu-kate-i ta; narodubʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi nʼaño̩-i chʼajama onukate ta; narodubʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw edudu le̩ ki chʼe̩gbe̩, kʼeli ki chi nyʼane̩pe̩te̩ chaka.
Tak O̩jo̩ fʼabe̩le̩ che odu o̩jo̩ le̩; todu oji año̩ le̩ kate chʼe̩gbe̩, eli la chi nyʼane̩pe̩te̩ ugbo du.

Taku Je̩rubeal, kʼowñ che Gideo̩n le̩, kpai amone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, takpa takpa kwane̩, oñ ma lewa rurujo̩ ugbo e̩bi omi Harod; uru abo Midian la jʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ ñwu ma, e̩re̩ uwo More ef o̩go̩ le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Gideo̩n kakini, Amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo we̩ le̩ chʼewewe tʼomi ekʼabo Midian nyʼuma o̩wo̩ le, tode̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l aba ñwu mi, kakini, O̩wo̩-mi onugo gba mi.

Fai e̩ ka ki tʼamone̩-i du eti kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki achokpo, kʼo̩la-wñ aga, kʼi mudabi kʼi kwo bʼuwo Gile̩ad-i te̩. Tak amone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke meji mudabi; oñ i bʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa.

Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Gideon kakini, Amone̩-i chʼewewe ololo ta; e̩ namʼuma ko wʼeti omi, tak u nañwa ma go todu uwe̩ o̩mo̩; taki awatu, e̩ne̩ du kʼomi aka ñw e̩ kakini, E̩ne̩-i ale bʼuwe̩, e̩ne̩ le̩ alebʼe̩; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼu ka ñw e̩ kakini, E̩ne̩-i alebʼe̩ n, e̩ne̩ le̩ ale n.

Abe̩le̩ i mʼamone̩ le̩ ko wʼeti omi le̩; taku Jihofa ka ñwu Gideon kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi nʼukpalu-wñ ñmo̩ taka taka alu kʼabia añmo̩, e̩ ki mʼe̩ne̩ le̩ date̩ ojoji; abe̩le̩ e̩ che kpʼe̩ne̩ ki akʼokuku nyʼane̩ añmo̩ ge̩.
Aluka aboke̩le̩ ku ma nʼukpalu añmo̩ taka taka, ku ma nʼo̩wo̩-ma chʼomi nyʼalu, chʼone̩ oli me̩fa; ama amone̩ ki bo̩ le̩ chaka kʼokuku nyane̩ ku ma ñmʼomiofo.

Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Gideon kakini, Nanʼaboke̩le̩ oli me̩fa ku ma nʼukpalu añmo̩ taka taka le̩ ajadu me̩, oñ nako abo Midian nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩; e̩ ki la je̩ ñw amone̩ du ku ma bo̩ le̩ ki lo, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼi dabi tʼe̩gu-wñ.

Oñ ma mʼuje̩wñ ule̩ amone̩ le̩ kpai o̩kakachi-ma ko nyʼo̩wo̩; tak i je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l le̩ chaka mudabi tʼunyabo-wñ, i muda gwo̩nyʼaboke̩le̩ oli me̩fa le̩; uru abo Midian la jʼo̩gane̩-wñ ef o̩go̩ le̩.
Tak i lewatu odu o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, ki Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ gwo̩ru akobo̩ uru le̩; todu u mʼu ko nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ me̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ chokpo egwo̩ru nyʼo̩mo̩, mak uwe̩ kpai adu-we̩ Pura ki gwo̩ru nyʼo̩mo̩;
tak uwe̩ agbo̩ e̩wñ ku ma jʼaka, ubile̩ tak o̩wo̩-we̩ agbiti kʼe̩ gwo̩ru akobo̩ abo uru le̩. Tak owñ kpʼadu-wñ Pura gwo̩ru wa kade ugbo abo ku ma jʼo̩la ogu jo̩ iba iba uru le̩ ade.
Oñ abo Midian kpai abo Amale̩k kpai abo o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩ chaka dachi jo̩ ef o̩go̩ le̩, uwewe-ma dab amimiejo; aminyakulumi-ma la nʼaluka n, uwewe-ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩lanyi ki dʼeti ohimini.

E̩gba ki Gideon lewa o̩mo̩, go, e̩ne̩ʼka do̩mo̩ aka ofe o̩na kʼi na ñw ekeji-wñ; i kakini, Go, u fʼo̩na na; e̩ la go, aknla ku ma nʼomu barli che muñwa chu uru abo Midian, i lewa nu unyabo, oñ unyabo le̩ lewane̩, oñ i murida oji kadane̩, abe̩le̩ unyabo le̩ munadala te̩.
Tak ekeji-wñ dohi kakini, I chʼomune̩ n, ugbada Gideon o̩ma Joash, e̩ne̩ Israe̩l le̩ de̩; O̩jo̩ la mʼabo Midian kpai abogu-wñ chaka ko nyʼowñ o̩wo̩ me̩.
Oñ e̩gba ki Gideon gbo̩ abu ku ma ka ofe o̩na le̩, kpai oji-wñ ku ma ka dufu, i la dojikane̩; tak i mudabi tef uru abo Israe̩l, oñ i kakini, Kwane̩; todu Jihofa mʼabogu Midian ko nyʼume̩ o̩wo̩ me̩.
Tak i fʼaboke̩le̩ oli me̩fa le̩ kpe̩ru uche̩ me̩ta, oñ i mʼo̩kakachi, kpai ugege kʼe̩mu jʼefu-wñ ko nyʼuma o̩wo̩ chaka lale.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ kejuru mi, ku me̩ che alu kʼu nache; me̩ la go, e̩gba kʼu lewa kade otitala uru le̩, alu kʼu nache, abe̩le̩ ame̩ ki che ge̩.
E̩gba kʼu fʼo̩kakachi fa, omi kpai e̩ne̩ du ki dʼugbo mi, e̩gbale̩ ame̩ ki ño̩ fa o̩kakachi ugbo du lʼuru le̩ daka ge̩, ku me̩ ka kakini, Todu Jihofa kpai todu Gideon!

Abe̩le̩ Gideon, kpai aboke̩le̩ ogu me̩lu ku ma jʼugbo-wñ lewa bʼotitala uru le̩ ma e̩gba ku ma chane̩ ide alumeji odu ede, e̩gba ku ma ko abo ide le̩ wa de ababa; oñ ma fʼo̩kakachi le̩ fa, taku ma fʼugege ki jʼef o̩wo̩-ma kpo̩fo̩.

Abo uche̩ me̩ta le̩ fʼo̩kakachi fa, ma fʼugege-ma kpo̩fo̩, oñ ma gwo̩wo̩nyu e̩mu o̩wo̩ awohi-ma, o̩kakachi la jʼo̩wo̩-ma awo̩to̩ kʼama ki fa; taku ma kpogu kakini, Ugbada Jihofa kpai e-Gideon le̩ de̩!
Tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma kwodago uña-wñ ale uru le̩ daka, oñ abogu le̩ chaka ra le; ma la fʼogu kpa, oñ ma ra le.

Ma la fʼo̩kakachi oli me̩fa le̩ fa, taku Jihofa je̩ ñw ugbada e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki kobo̩ ekeji-wñ, ugbo du ef uru le̩; oñ abogu le̩ ra gbogbo wa Be̩t-shita o̩wo̩ Ze̩rera, gbogbo wa alo̩me̩ Ebe̩l-mehola, ame̩ru Tabat.
Taku ma fʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l do̩ kwo Naftali kpai Ashe̩r kpai Manasa chaka wa jeju, oñ ma rano abo Midian.

Taku Gideon fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ lugbo du ane̩ uwo Ifraim kakini, Me̩ gwo̩ru wa akobʼabo Midian, me̩ gbʼuma o̩gba ugbo omi le̩, gbogbo wa Be̩t-bara, kpai Jordan ge̩. Abe̩le̩ ma fʼaboke̩le̩ Ifraim chaka do̩ wa jeju, oñ ma mʼomi le̩ gba gbogbo wa Be̩t-bara, kpai Jo̩rdan ge̩.

Oñ ma fʼamagboji abo Midian meji, Oreb kpai Zee̩b mu; taku ma du Oreb kpa ugbo okuta Oreb le̩, oñ ma du Zee̩b kpa ugbo aguo̩ko̩lo̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma e-Zee̩b. Ma rano abo Midian waa; taku ma mʼoji Oreb kpai Zee̩b ko̩da wa ñwu Gideon udaba Jo̩rdan le̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Ifraim ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-kʼe̩ che wa-i, kʼe̩ ma do̩ wa e̩gba kʼe̩ nyʼakogu bo̩ abo Midian n? Oñ ma dʼo̩la le̩ biʼu una una.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ omi che ki dab e-kʼame̩ che le̩? I chʼe̩fiye̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma Ifraim i nyo̩ tʼonugo onugo achiwebe̩te̩ma e-Abieze̩r le n?
O̩jo̩ mʼamagboji Midian, Oreb kpai Zee̩b le̩ ko nyʼume̩ o̩wo̩: e̩wñ omi neke che ki dab e-kʼame̩ che le̩? Tak abu kʼi fʼabe̩le̩ ka, e̩do̩-ma nyi ugbo-wñ.
Taku Gideon lewa Jordan, owñ kpai aboke̩le̩ oli me̩fa ku ma jʼugbo-wñ le̩ mudabi; ma chuba, ma muda arano ma alo waa.
Oñ i ka ñw aboke̩le̩ Suko̩t kakini, Agba, me̩ kʼe̩bo̩ uje̩wñ ñw abo ku ma tʼumi ubi-i je̩; todu ma chuba. Zeba kpai Zalmuna, amonu Midian oñ narano-i.
Tak amagboji Suko̩t dohi ñw u kakini, E̩ fʼo̩wo̩ do Zeba kpai Zalmuna o̩wo̩ me̩? kʼa kʼuje̩wñ ñw abogu-we̩ je̩?
Taku Gideon kakini, E̩gba ki Jihofa mu Zeba kpai Zalmuna ko nyʼumi o̩wo̩, e̩gba le̩ nanʼikeke kpʼiñwa aje̩tachi-i gwu me̩ año̩la alu ku ma gwu o̩ka.
Tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ mute̩gu nyi Penue̩l oñ i ño̩ ka ñw abo le̩ abe̩le̩ ge̩. Tak aboke̩le̩ Penue̩l ño̩ dohi ñw u alu kʼaboke̩le̩ Suko̩t dohi ñw u le̩.
Tak i ño̩ ka ñw aboke̩le̩ Penue̩l kakini, E̩gba kʼu mudabi wa o̩lafia, nagu o̩do̩go̩-i lo̩.

Zeba kpai Zalmuna le̩ jo̩ Karkor, abogu-ma jʼugbo-ma, ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩lu, owñ chʼe̩bo̩bo̩ abo o̩wo̩ olodudu ki bo̩ chaka; todu aboke̩le̩ ku ma bʼugbada ewo̩ nʼo̩wo̩ jo̩ ki wane̩ o̩mo̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩fa.
Taku Gideon mute̩gu lʼo̩na abo ku ma jʼef unyabo o̩wo̩ olodudu No̩ba kpai Jogbe̩ha, oñ i fʼabogu le̩ gwodajane̩, todu abogu le̩ jʼañmi.
Taku Zeba kpai Zalmuna ra, oñ i rano ma; i fu Zeba kpai Zalmuna, amonu Midian meji le̩ mu, oñ i fʼabogu-ma chaka nyʼokpo.
Taku Gideon, o̩ma Joash le̩, mudabi kwo oko ogu ate̩gu He̩re̩s le̩.
I fʼokolobiaʼka mu kwef aboke̩le̩ Suko̩t, oñ i fʼene abo-wñ tʼo̩ chili chili; tak o̩kolobia le̩ fʼodu amidachi Suko̩t kpai abogijo-ma ko̩ nyʼo̩takada ñw u, one̩ e̩te̩gwa nyoke mebie ma che.

Tak i nyʼugbo aboke̩le̩ Suko̩t oñ i kakini, Go, Zeba kpai Zalmuna la jo̩-i, owñ chʼabo ku me̩ ne̩ abʼumi na le̩, kakini, E̩ fʼo̩wo̩ do Zeba kpai Zalmuna o̩wo̩ me̩? kʼa ki kʼuje̩wñ ñw abo-we̩ kʼuhia hia ma le̩?
Tak i mʼabogijo ewo le̩ ko, oñ i nʼikeke kpai iñwa aje̩tachi le̩ kʼaboke̩le̩ Suko̩t o̩la.
I ño̩ fʼo̩do̩go̩ Penue̩l gulo̩ wane̩, oñ i fʼaboke̩le̩ ewo le̩ kpa.
Tak i ka ñwu Zeba kpai Zalmuna kakini, Aboke̩le̩ ku me̩ kpa Tabo̩r fa? abu ma de̩ ta? Ma dohi kakini, Alu kʼuwe̩ de̩, abe̩le̩ ma de̩. E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma che̩biu o̩ma onu.
Tak i kakini, Amo̩maye-mi de̩, iye-wa chʼoka. Oji Jihofa! Me̩ ma jadu ma ku ma deju, u ma kpa me̩ n.
Tak i ka ñwu Je̩te̩r, o̩mo̩gba-wñ kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ kpa ma. Okolobia le̩ muda wo̩ ugbada-wñ n; i chokpo, todu kʼi chʼimo̩to̩ okolobia ta.

Taku Zeba kpai Zalmuna kakini, Uwe̩ ki kwane̩ kʼe̩ bʼuwa ma; todu alu kʼone̩ de̩, alu le̩ ukpahiu-wñ de̩. Taku Gideon kwane̩, oñ i fu Zeba kpai Zalmuna kpa, tak i mʼuko̩lo̩ ki dab ochu ki tʼo̩fa aminyakulumi-ma ko.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ka ñwu Gideon kakini, Uwe̩ ki chʼonu-wa ke, tʼuwe̩, tʼo̩ma-we̩, kpai aaju-we̩ ge̩; todu uwe̩ mʼuwa gba kwef o̩wo̩ abo Midian me̩.
Gideon muda ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi ajʼonu-me̩ n, o̩ma-mi la aje̩ onu-me̩ n; Jihofa aje̩ onu-me̩.
Taku Gideon ka ñwu ma kakini, Ebiʼka nabi me̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ me̩ ki kʼaketi kwef e̩wñ kʼogu je̩ le̩ ñwu mi. (Aketi abo le̩ chʼo̩jamalia, ukpe̩ ku ma chʼabo Ishmae̩l.)
Taku ma dohi kakini, A ko ñw e̩ kpai e̩do̩ʼka. Taku ma fʼukpo̩ʼka nadala te̩, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼake̩ti ki dʼef e̩wñ kʼogu kʼi je̩ nyʼefu-wñ.

Uwoji aketi o̩jamalia kʼi bi le̩ che she̩ke̩l o̩jamalia icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gume̩lu mebie; manyʼuko̩lo̩ ki dab ochu le̩ kpai e̩wñ ijaga-ma kpai otogbo odufa ekpikpa ki jʼo̩la amonu Midian le̩, kpai ahika ki jʼo̩fa aminyakulumi-ma.
Taki Gideon mʼe̩wñ le̩ ko che e̩fo̩d, oñ i mʼu du le tʼewo-wñ, owñ chʼOfra le̩; tak abo Israe̩l chaka kwojo̩ko̩ bʼo̩ o̩mo̩; oñ i mud oku ñwu Gideon, kpai abunyi-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼabo Midian du eju abo Israe̩l, ma ño̩ hi oji-ma dago ge̩ n. Tak ane̩ le̩ fʼuñmi ne̩ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji iko Gideon le̩.
Taku Je̩rubeal, o̩ma Joash, letekegugu unyi-wñ onugo.
Gideon la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e̩te̩gwa kʼi bi e̩pi-wñ, todu i nʼo̩ya wewe.
Oñ abadu-wñ kʼi de̩ She̩ke̩m ño̩ bi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ñw u ge̩, i la dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Abime̩le̩k.
Taku Gideon, o̩ma Joash le̩, leku abu kʼi kwojo̩lugbo nana, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef oji Joash ata-wñ, ef Ofra e-abo Abieze̩r le̩.
Oñ i lewatu abu ki Gideon leku, ababa le̩ abo Israe̩l ño̩ murida ajo̩ko̩ bo̩ amiBeal ge̩, oñ ma mu Beal-be̩rit du chʼo̩jo̩-ma.
Abo Israe̩l laño̩ rewa Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma, kʼi mʼuma gba kwef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-ma ku ma jo̩ lʼuma daka le̩ n;
ma la mʼo̩la ñw abo unyi Je̩rubeal, owñ che Gideon, teju e̩nyo̩ du kʼi du ñw abo Israe̩l in.
Tak Abime̩le̩k, o̩ma Je̩rubeal le, nyi She̩ke̩m aka ñw amome̩nyi-wñ kpai abunyi ata iye-wñ chaka, kakini,

Nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, me̩ du tʼaboke̩le̩ She̩ke̩m-i eti chaka kakini, Kali e-ki nyo̩ ñwu me̩ tule, kʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Je̩rubeal chaka, owñ chʼone̩ e̩te̩gwa, ki nʼo̩da me̩, abe̩k e̩ne̩ kate kʼi nʼo̩da me̩? Ame̩ ki ño̩ rewa ka kʼomi chʼachiku-me̩ kpai o̩re̩la-me̩.
Tak amomenyi-wñ le̩ dʼo̩la-wñ-i chaka tʼaboke̩le̩ She̩ke̩m eti; oñ e̩do̩-ma mudu ku ma tʼAbime̩le̩k ubi, todu ma kakini, Owñ chʼo̩maye-wa.
Taku ma mʼo̩ko̩ ajifa e̩te̩gwa ko kwef unyi Beal-be̩rit ñw u, e-le̩ i ko chʼo̩gu ñw ame̩no̩wai kpai ame̩ne̩fule̩fu, oñ ma tʼo̩ ubi.
Tak i le tʼunyi ata-wñ Ofra le̩, oñ i fʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ amo̩ma Je̩rubeal e̩te̩gwa le̩ kpa oj okutaʼka; Jo̩tam, udabi Je̩rubeal, muda bo̩ todu i ra maja.
Tak aboke̩le̩ She̩ke̩m duu, kpai abunyi Milo chaka, kʼo̩la-ma wa jeju ugbo oli ok, o̩na gboolo ki de̩ She̩ke̩m le̩, oñ ma du Abime̩le̩k jʼonu.
Tak e̩gba ku ma mʼu du ka ñwu Jotam, i nyʼadago oj uwo Gerizim kpakpa, i chi omu-wñ nyate̩ o̩mo̩, i la kpogu do̩ ma, kakini, Me̩ netirʼumi, ame̩ aboke̩le̩ She̩ke̩m, todu kʼO̩jo̩ ki netiru me̩.
Oli ojoji du ledufu iko ʼka ku ma fʼekpo ba tʼe̩ne̩ʼka-ma oji kʼi jʼonu-ma; oñ ma ka ñw oli o̩lif kakini, Uwe̩ ki jʼonu-wa.
Ama oli o̩lif le̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Natʼekpo-mi ku ma ne̩ bʼojima mʼO̩jo̩ kpai one̩ no, kʼu nadʼo̩la-mi tʼamiejo lʼoli oli oji?
Tak oli oli le̩ ka ñw oli o̩gbaikolo kakini, Uwe̩ ki lewa, kʼe̩ jʼonu-wa ke.
Ama oli o̩gbaikolo ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi atʼurinyo̩-mi kpai e̩ro-mi ki nyo̩ no, kʼu nyʼadʼo̩la-mi tʼamiejo lʼoli oli oji?
Tak oli ki jo̩ le̩ ka ñw ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma kakini, Lewa, kʼe̩ jʼonu-wa.
Ama ikeli le̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi atʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma-mi e-tito̩ ki abʼO̩jo̩ kpai one̩ e̩do̩ no̩ kʼu nyʼadʼo̩la-mi tʼamiejo lʼoli oli oji?
Tak oli le̩ chaka ka ñw iñwa kakini, Uwe̩ ki lewa, kʼe̩ jʼonu-wa.

Tak iñwa le̩ ka ñw oli ki jo̩ le̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ ku me̩ abʼekpo tʼumi oji kʼu jʼonu-me̩ ochochi, maku me̩ lewa chubiyo̩ olubo̩-mi; i ma dʼabe̩le̩ n, mak una ki kwʼef iñwa-i dufu kʼi fʼoli Sidar e-Le̩banon lie̩.

Todule̩ fai, iche̩wñ ku me̩ fʼe̩wñ ochochi ki mufu che, owñ chʼAbime̩le̩k ku me̩ du jʼonu-me̩ le̩, kʼe̩wñ ku me̩ che Je̩rubeal kpai abunyi-wñ chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩, ku me̩ fʼe̩wñ ki chʼeju uko̩lo̩-wñ che ñw u—
todu ata-mi fʼogu ja todu me̩, i la dʼoji o̩la-wñ tinyo̩, oñ i mʼume̩ gba kwef o̩wo̩ abo Midian;
oñ ame̩ kwane̩ achagwunyʼabunyi ata-mi eñini-i, ku me̩ la fʼamo̩ma-wñ aboke̩le̩ e̩te̩gwa le̩ kpa oj okutaʼka, oñ me̩ du Abime̩le̩k, o̩ma adu-wñ le̩ jʼonu abo She̩ke̩m, ukpe̩ kʼowñ chʼo̩maye-me̩;—
i la chʼe̩wñ ochochi kpai e̩wñ ki mufu oñ me̩ che ñwu Je̩rubeal kpai abunyi-wñ eñini-i, mak ame̩ ki yo̩ ñw Abime̩le̩k ke, owñ kʼi nayo̩ ñwu me̩ ge̩
I ma dʼabe̩le̩ n, una ki kwʼef Abime̩le̩k dufu wa ki fʼabo She̩ke̩m kpai abunyi Milo le̩ lie̩; una ki ño̩ kwʼef abo She̩ke̩m dufu wa, kpai kwʼef abunyi Milo, kʼi fʼAbime̩le̩k lie̩.
Taku Jotam ra le owñ, oñ i ra nyi Bir, oñ i kwogugu o̩mo̩, todu ailo Abime̩le̩k o̩maye-wñ kʼi ara.
Abime̩le̩k la jʼo̩fe̩ Israe̩l o̩do̩ me̩ta.
Oñ O̩jo̩ fʼafu e̩bie̩ne̩ʼka kpuche̩ wa kʼi tʼagbagba Abime̩le̩k kpai abo She̩ke̩m le̩; tak abo She̩ke̩m chane̩ edʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼAbime̩le̩k o̩kpo̩;

todu kʼo̩lachi ku ma che amo̩ma Je̩rubeal e̩te̩gwa le̩, kpai e̩bie̩-ma, ki lewa bʼAbime̩le̩k o̩maye-ma kʼi kpa ma le̩ oji ma, kpai abʼoji aboke̩le̩ She̩ke̩m ku ma je̩ ñwu o̩wo̩-wñ gbiti kʼi kpa amo̩maye-wñ le̩ ma.
Tak aboke̩le̩ She̩ke̩m kʼabo-ma iche̩ka kpalajo̩ oj uwo, oj uwo, oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi lale ugbo ma o̩mo̩ ma bʼo̩ gbʼane̩; oñ ma mʼu du ka ñw Abime̩le̩k.
Taku Gee̩l, o̩ma Ebe̩d kpai amo̩maye-wñ lewa, oñ ma mudaba nyi She̩ke̩m; tak aboke̩le̩ She̩ke̩m le̩ mʼe̩do̩ konʼo.
Oñ ma nyʼoko akʼe̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma-ma wa, taku ma fʼu te̩, ma kwo chiya, oñ ma le tef unyi o̩jo̩-ma, ma kwoje̩ ma kwoñmo̩, ma kwobʼAbime̩le̩k ina.

Taki Gee̩l o̩ma Ebe̩d le̩ kakini, Abime̩le̩k chʼe̩ne̩? Awa abo She̩ke̩m chʼe̩ne̩ kʼa arʼo̩? I chʼo̩ma Je̩rubeal de̩ n? Zebul chʼako̩takada-wñ n? Me̩ re̩ aboke̩le̩ Hemo̩r ata She̩ke̩m le̩. E̩wñ chi kʼawa arʼo̩?
O, amone̩-i ma jʼef o̩wo̩ e-mi! E̩gbale̩ omi ma fʼAbime̩le̩k yo̩ tane̩. Tak i ka ñw Abime̩le̩k kakini, Kʼone̩ mʼabogu-we̩ kʼe̩ dufu wa!
Tak e̩gba ku Zebul agboji ewo le̩ gbo̩ o̩la ki Gee̩l o̩ma Ebe̩d le̩ ka, uwe̩do̩-wñ mutajo.
Oñ i fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Abime̩le̩k ye̩ye̩, i kakini, Go, Gee̩l o̩ma Ebe̩d kpai amo̩maye-wñ lewa She̩ke̩m; e̩ la go, ma jʼakʼabo ewo-i e̩che̩ ku ma kwane̩ bʼe̩.
Todule̩ e̩ kwane̩ odu, uwe̩ kpai amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo we̩ le̩, ku me̩ kpala jo̩ oko le̩ anede ma.
Tak e̩ takpa kwane̩ odudu e̩gba kʼolu atadufu ababa kʼe̩ gwo̩ko̩ rʼewo le̩ o̩la; tak e̩gba kʼowñ kpai amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ dufu wa ku ma kobʼuwe̩, tak uwe̩ ama alu kʼe̩ chʼo.
Tak Abime̩le̩k kpai amone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kwane̩ odu, oñ ma fʼo̩la-ma kpe̩ uche̩ me̩le̩, ma lewa kpala nyu She̩ke̩m le̩.
Taki Gee̩l o̩ma Ebe̩d le̩ ledufu, oñ i kwodago alu aku ewo le̩; oñ Abime̩le̩k kpai amone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kwane̩ ugbo ku ma kpala jo̩ le̩.
Tak e̩gba ki Gee̩l fʼaboke̩le̩ le̩ li, i ka ñwu Zebul kakini, Go, amone̩ nagwo̩ru kwʼoj uwo le̩ wane̩-i! Taki Zebul ka ñw u kakini, Ojiji uwo e̩ li le̩, oñ i dab amone̩.
Taki Gee̩l ño̩ ko̩la kakini, Go, amone̩ nagwo̩ru wa alumeji ane̩ o̩mo̩-i, uche̩ʼka ale o̩na ok ugbo ku ma bifa le̩ awa.
Taku Zebul ka ñw u kakini, Alu-we̩ kʼe̩ ka fa-i le̩ fa? kʼuwe̩ kakini, Abime̩le̩k chʼe̩ne̩, kʼa arʼo̩? I chʼamone̩ kʼe̩ chʼe̩de̩te̩ ma le̩ jo̩-i n? Agba, dufu kʼe̩ bʼuma ja ke.
Taku Gee̩l tʼaboke̩le̩ She̩ke̩m o̩gba dufu abʼAbime̩le̩k jogu.
Abime̩le̩k la fʼu ne, oñ i ra rʼo̩gba-wñ alo, amone̩ wewe chagbe ma lewane̩ gbogbo wʼabʼalu aku ma.
Tak Abime̩le̩k kwogugu Aruma; oñ Zebul fu Gee̩l kpai amo̩maye-wñ ne dufu, kʼama ki we gugu She̩ke̩m.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, aboke̩le̩ le̩ ledufu nyʼoko. Oñ ma mʼu du ka ñw Abime̩le̩k.
Tak i mʼabo-wñ ko, oñ i fʼuma kpe̩ru uche̩ me̩ta, ma la kpala jo̩ oko le̩; oñ i go, amone̩ nadufu kwef ewo le̩, tak i kwane̩ tʼuma o̩la, oñ i fʼuma gwoda.
Tak Abime̩le̩k kpai uche̩ amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ gwo̩ko̩ wa dago alu aku ewo le̩, oñ abo uche̩ meji gwo̩ko̩ ru amone̩ du ku ma jʼoko le̩ o̩la, oñ ma kpa ma.
Abime̩le̩k la kogu bʼabo le̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩; i fʼewo le̩ du, oñ i fʼamone̩ ku ma jo̩ ef uwñ kpa; i la fʼewo le̩ gulo̩ likii, oñ i fʼomu fiarʼane̩ o̩mo̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼaboke̩le̩ o̩do̩go̩ She̩ke̩m le̩ du gbʼinabali-wñ, ma mugudu wʼef aku unyi E̩l-be̩rit.
Taku ma mudu ka ñw Abime̩le̩k ka kʼaboke̩le̩ o̩do̩go̩ She̩ke̩m le̩ chaka wa jo̩ ugbo kate me̩.

Tak Abime̩le̩k mute̩gu tʼoji uwo Zalmo̩n, tʼowñ tʼaboke̩le̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ; oñ Abime̩le̩k mʼo̩kanyi du nʼo̩wo̩, oñ i mʼe̩to̩ oliʼka da wane̩, i mʼu du nʼika-wñ. Oñ i ka ñw aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kakini, E̩wñ kʼu che̩ ku me̩ li-i, me̩ hika che i alu kʼu che̩-i.

Abe̩le̩ aboke̩le̩ le̩ okoke fʼe̩to oli-wñ da wane̩, taku ma tʼAbime̩le̩k ubi, oñ ma mʼu ko yama o̩la aku le̩, ma fʼuna tʼo̩ abʼuma oji ma, todule̩ abo o̩do̩go̩ She̩ke̩m le̩ chaka ño̩ ku ge̩, aboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩ dab one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩.
Tak Abime̩le̩k nyi Tebe̩z, oñ i fʼuru mu lʼo daka, i la fʼu du.
O̩do̩go̩ ki gbiti muda dʼef ewo le̩, o̩mo̩ aboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩ ewo le̩ chaka ra nyi, oñ ma fʼo̩na re nyʼo̩la-ma; taku ma mute̩gu tʼojokunyi o̩do̩go̩ le̩.
Oñ Abime̩le̩k lewa ugbo o̩do̩go̩ le̩, oñ i kogu bʼo̩, i la te̩me̩rʼalugbana o̩do̩go̩ le̩ kʼi dʼuna tʼo̩.
Tak onobule̩ʼka mʼoma okuta une̩wñ du rikpolo do Abime̩le̩k oji, i la fachiku oji-wñ kpo̩fo̩.

Tak i fʼokolobia kʼi anʼane̩ ogu-wñ do̩ wa piopio, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Mʼugbada-we̩ wo, kʼe̩ du mi kpa, todu ku ma ki we edu o̩la-mi ka, kakini, Onobule̩ dʼu kpa. Tak okolobia-wñ le̩ du gunyu dufu eju eke-ji, oñ i leku.
Tak e̩gba kʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l li ka kʼAhime̩le̩k leku me̩, ma kwo̩mo̩ le, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ mudabi tʼe̩gu-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ oñ O̩jo̩ fʼo̩me̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ Abimele̩k rʼo̩, owñ che e-kʼi che a lawn, ugbo amo̩ma ata-wñ e̩te̩gwa kʼi kpa le̩.
E̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du kʼaboke̩le She̩kem che le̩, O̩jo̩ mududabi wa abʼuma oji ma, abe̩le̩ ama ki Jotam o̩ma Je̩rubeal na le̩ lewa anʼuma oji.
Ubi Abime̩le̩k taku Tola, o̩ma Pua, o̩ma Dodo, e̩ne̩ Isakarʼka, kwane̩ kʼi jadu abo Israe̩l; oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ dodo Shamir oj ane̩ uwo Ifraim.
Owñ le̩ la kajo̩ abo Israe̩l o̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩ta, tak i leku, oñ ma mʼu du ji Shamir.
Ubi-wñ Jair, e̩ne̩ Gilead le̩, kwane̩ owñ le̩ kajo̩ abo Israe̩l o̩do̩ ogu nyoke meji.
I la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ogue̩gwa, ku ma tano amo̩ma o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ogue̩gwa, ma la nʼewo me̩gwa, ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Hafo̩t-jair gbogbo tʼeñini, ewo ewo le̩ jo̩ oj ane̩ Gilead.
Taku Jair leku, oñ ma mʼu du ji Kamon.

Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, ma la kwore̩ ñw amiBeal kpai Ashtaro̩t kpai amo̩jo̩ Siria kpai amo̩jo̩ Saido̩n kpai amo̩jo̩ Moab kpai amo̩jo̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n, kpai amo̩jo̩ abo Filistia; oñ ma hiu Jihofa tinyo̩, ma rʼo̩ n.
Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa bʼamo̩ma Israe̩l ma una una, oñ i mʼuma ko ta tef o̩wo̩ abo Filistia, kpai tef o̩wo̩ abo Amo̩n ge̩.
Oñ ma fʼamo̩ma Israe̩l gwomane̩, ma la fʼuma demane̩ o̩do̩ le̩. Ma fʼamo̩ma Israe̩l du ku ma jʼudaba Jo̩rdan oj ane̩ abo Amo̩r, kʼi de̩ Gilead le̩, che abe̩le̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩.
Amo̩ma Amo̩n ño̩ mu Jo̩rdan daba ku ma ño̩ kogu bo̩ Juda kpai Be̩njamin kpai abunyi Ifraim ge̩; abe̩le̩ abo Israe̩l chʼe̩kpama te̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l raku do̩ Jihofa kakini, A du we̩ re me̩, abu kʼa tʼO̩jo̩-wa no̩, kʼa la rʼamiBeal.
Taki Jihofa ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, Omi gba me̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ abo Ijipti kpai abo Amo̩r kpai amo̩ma Amo̩n kpai abo Filistia n?
Abo Saido̩n kpai abo Amale̩k kpai abo Maon ño̩ fʼume̩ kpama n? me̩ la raku do̩ mi, tak u mʼume̩ gba bʼef o̩wo̩-ma te̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ me̩ hiu mi tinyo̩-i, oñ me̩ kwore̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩: todule̩ omi ñʼajadu me̩ ge̩ n.
Me̩ nyʼaraku do̩ amo̩jo̩ ku me̩ chi ñw o̩la-me̩ le̩; ama ki jadu me̩ iko o̩bata-me̩-i.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l ka ñwu Jihofa kakini, A fʼadure ta me̩; e̩ che wa alu ki rʼe̩ eju; e̩ muda mʼuwa gba eñini ta, o̩ko̩ oñ a gbabʼuwe̩.
Oñ ma kʼamo̩jo̩ ononojo le̩ rinyo̩ bʼefu-ma te̩, oñ ma kwo che e̩wñ ñwu Jihofa; tak onugo e̩do̩-wñ kpa tod akanya kʼabo Israe̩l ali le̩.
Tak amo̩ma Amo̩n jejujʼugbo-kate, oñ ma lewa ru Gilead; oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l wa jeju ugbokate ge̩, ma la kworu Mizpa.
Tak amone̩ le̩, owñ chʼamagboji abo Gilead, ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, E̩ne̩ achane̩ ogu eko̩ bʼamo̩ma Amo̩n? E̩ne̩ le̩ achʼagboji abo du ku ma dodo Gilead chaka.
Oñ Je̩fta, e̩ne̩ Gilead, chʼagbiti ogu kʼi nʼuwohi, i muda chʼo̩ma ajo̩ko̩. Gilead le̩ la bi Je̩fta.
O̩ya Gilead la fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi ñw u; tak e̩gba kʼamo̩ma kʼo̩ya-wñ le̩ bi gbakpa, ma fu Je̩fta ne bʼunyi te̩, ma la ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ la aje̩ e̩wñ ogu unyi ata-wa n; todu iye-we̩ chʼojoji.
Taku Je̩fta ra bʼamo̩ma ata-wñ te̩, oñ i kwogugu ane̩ To̩b; oñ aboke̩le̩ ame̩no̩fogoli iche̩ka wa jo̩ ugbo-wñ, tak owñ kpʼama nyʼañʼane̩.
Oñ i lewatu abu ku ma jo̩ pe̩, amo̩ma Amo̩n chane̩ ekʼogu bʼIsrae̩l.
Oñ e̩gba kʼamo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ chane̩ ekʼogu bʼIsrae̩l, abogijo Gilead gbe̩re̩ Je̩fta ane̩ Tob le̩;
ma ka ñwu Je̩fta kakini, Lewa kʼe̩ chʼachokolobia-wa, todu kʼa ki bʼamo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ jogu.
Taku Je̩fta ka ñw abogijo Gilead kakini, I chʼulaka-mi me̩ che oñ me̩ ne mi bʼunyi ata-mi te̩ n? E̩wñ chi ku me̩ gbe̩re̩ mi abu ku ma kobʼume̩-i?
Tak abogijo Gilead ka ñwu Je̩fta kakini, Todu kʼa wʼugbo we̩ abajo̩-i la de̩, kʼuwe̩ ki lebʼuwa, kʼa bʼamo̩ma Amo̩n jogu; tak uwe̩ ache agboji-wa, kʼa dodo Gilead chaka.
Oñ Je̩fta ka ñw abogijo Gilead kakini, I la che̩wñ ku me̩ dʼumi wʼunyi, kʼu jogu kpai amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩, ku Jihofa la mʼuma ko nyʼumi o̩wo̩, omi ache agboji-me̩ ke n?
Tak abogijo Gilead ka ñwu Je̩fta kakini, Jihofa ki chʼe̩nijali agbagba wa-i; a ache teju o̩la kʼe̩ ka-i chuu.
Taku Je̩fta lebʼabogijo Gilead, oñ amone̩ le̩ dʼowñ che achokolobia kpai agboji-ma; Je̩fta laño̩ kʼo̩la-wñ du jane̩ o̩gba Jihofa Mizpa.
Taku Je̩fta fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩rʼonu amo̩ma Amo̩n, kakini, Ab u chʼe̩, kʼuwe̩ wʼugbo mi kʼe̩ kogu bʼane̩-mi?

Tak onu amo̩ma Amo̩n dohi ñw amonuche̩ Je̩fta le̩, kakini, Todu e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l kwʼIjipti awa le̩ ma mʼane̩-mi gba akwo Amo̩n gbogbo wa Jabo̩k, kpai gbogbo wa Jo̩rdan; todule̩ e̩ namʼo̩wo̩ ta bʼane̩ le̩ te̩ ye̩e̩.
Taki Je̩fta ño̩ fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩rʼonu amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ ge̩.
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Abu ku Je̩fta aka de̩ kakini, I chʼabo Israe̩l gbʼane̩ Moab in, kpai ane̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ n,
ama e̩gba ku ma kwʼIjipti wa le̩, abo Israe̩l lale gu ef aje̩tachi le̩ du wa Ohimini Ekpikpa, oñ ma lewa Kede̩sh.

E̩gba le̩ Israe̩l fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩rʼonu Ido̩m kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi lale gu ef ane̩-we̩ du; onu Ido̩m muda nyeti n. Ma ño̩ fʼonuche̩ kpe̩rʼonu Moab ge̩; i muda je̩ n. Oñ Israe̩l kwogugu Kede̩sh.

Taku ma le ef aje̩tachi le̩, oñ ma dagbala le ej ubi ane̩ Ido̩m kpai ane̩ Moab, oñ ma lewa o̩wo̩ olodudu ane̩ Moab le̩, ma la rujʼejudaba Arno̩n le̩; ma muda le gu alo̩me̩ du tʼoj ane̩ Moab in, todu Arno̩n le̩ chʼalo̩me̩ Moab.
Tak Israe̩l fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Siho̩n, onu abo Amo̩r, onu He̩shbo̩n le̩; Israe̩l la ka ñw u kakini, A gbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw a lale gu ef ane̩-we̩ du nyʼuña e-mi.
Siho̩n muda dʼo̩la Israe̩l rʼochochi kʼi aje̩ ñw u lale gu oj ane̩-wñ du n; abe̩le̩ Siho̩n kʼabo-wñ chaka wa jeju, oñ ma lewa ru Jahaz, taku ma kwo jogu kpai abo Israe̩l.
Taku Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, mu Siho̩n kpai abo-wñ chaka ko nyʼabo Israe̩l o̩wo̩, oñ ma fʼuma gwoda; abe̩le̩ Israe̩l mʼane̩ abo Amo̩r ku ma dodo ane̩ o̩mo̩ chaka gba.
Oñ ma mʼane̩ abo Amo̩r le̩ chaka gba, akwo Amo̩n gbogbo wa Jabo̩k, kpai akwo aje̩tachi gbogbo wa Jo̩rdan.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, fʼabo Amo̩r ne kwo bʼamone̩-wñ Israe̩l o̩gba te̩; i ñʼadʼugbo kʼuwe̩ agba ge̩?
I chʼe-i ki Chimosh o̩jo̩-we̩ du ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ne̩, i chʼe-le̩ oñ uwe̩ ane̩ n? Oñ e̩wñ du ku Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa fʼone̩-wñ ne bʼo̩ te̩ bʼuwa o̩gba te̩, e-le̩ oñ a ane̩.
Uwe̩ nyo̩ tu Bele̩k o̩ma Zipo̩r, onu Moab le̩ le? Owñ kuja bʼabo Israe̩l mama me̩? Abe̩k i kogu bʼuma?
Abu kʼabo Israe̩l gugu He̩shbo̩n kpai adogbe-wñ, kpai Aro̩e̩r kpai adogbe-wñ, kpai ewo ewo du ku ma jo̩ o̩la Amo̩n le̩ lale, o̩do̩ oli me̩fa le̩, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma dabi gba iko le̩ n?
I la chʼomi du we̩ re n, e̩ muda che mi e̩bie̩ne̩, ogu kʼe̩ kobʼumi le̩; Jihofa kʼi chʼakajo̩-wa, kʼi fʼajo̩ agbagba amo̩ma Israe̩l kpai amo̩ma Amo̩n ka eñini ke.
I chaka ka abe̩le̩ onu amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ la nyʼo̩la ki Je̩fta kpʼonuche̩ rʼu eti n.
Tak Afu Jihofa lewa bu Je̩fta ma, oñ i lale gu efu Gilead kpai Manasa du, i la lale nyi Mizpe e-Gilead le̩, oñ akwo Mizpe e-Gilead le i lale gudu nyʼugbo amo̩ma Amo̩n.
Taki Je̩fta go̩ ñwu Jihofa, i kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ akʼamo̩ma Amo̩n nyʼumi o̩wo̩ ochochi,
mak e̩gba le̩, e̩ne̩ du ki adufu lʼalugbana-mi wa aledo mi, i ra ñwu mi kʼu mudabi kwugbo amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ wa, e-le̩ la ache e-Jihofa, oñ nadʼu wa ache iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo.
Abe̩le̩ Je̩fta lale tugbo amo̩ma Amo̩n, kʼi jogu kpai ama; oñ Jihofa mʼuma ko nyʼowñ o̩wo̩.
Tak i kwokpa ma akwo Aro̩e̩r gbogbo wa Minit le̩, owñ ebʼewo ewo ogu, kpai gbogbo wa Abe̩l-che̩ramimi, uku kʼi nʼakpa ma tabale. Abe̩le̩ oñ ma fʼamo̩ma Amo̩n du bʼamo̩ma Israe̩l o̩gba te̩.
Taku Je̩fta lewa Mizpe unyi-wñ le̩; e̩ la go, o̩ma-wñ onobule̩ nʼeicha kpai ido eta aledʼo; owñ la chʼo̩ma kate kʼi ne̩; i nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ du tʼowñ le n.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼi fʼu li, i fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, oñ i kakini, Atogwo, o̩ma-mi! E̩ mʼumi oji dalo̩ tabale me̩, e̩ la kwotʼef abo ku ma ma je̩ ñwu mi ñmi n; todu u mʼalu-mi chi ñwu Jihofa, u la neke dabi tʼubi n.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Ata-mi, e̩ mʼalu-we̩ chi ñwu Jihofa me̩, e̩ che mi alu ki kwef alu-we̩ dufu le̩, todabu ki Jihofa fʼache̩-we̩ na abʼoji ame̩nebi-we̩ ma, owñ chʼamo̩ma Amo̩n le̩.
Tak i ka ñw ata-wñ kakini, E̩wñ ʼka ku ma ache mi de̩; tʼumi no̩ ochu meji, kʼu kwʼemi nyʼugbo uwo uwo le̩, kʼu raku todu kʼu ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, omi kpai abigbe̩le̩-mi.
Tak i kakini, Lo ke. Oñ i je̩ ñw u le ochu meji; tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le owñ, owñ kpai abigbe̩le̩-wñ le̩, oñ i raku oj uwo uwo le̩ todu kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n le̩.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼochu meji le̩ jo̩, i mudabi wʼugbo ata-wñ, owñ la chʼo teju ego̩ kʼi go̩ le̩. I la mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du mama ta n. E-le̩ la mud e̩wñ o̩gu Israe̩l
ka kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l abobule̩ ale o̩do̩ o̩do̩ ku ma raku o̩ma Je̩fta o̩ma Gilead le̩ o̩jo̩ me̩le̩ o̩do̩ da o̩do̩ da.

Ma fʼaboke̩le̩ Ifraim do̩ jeju, oñ ma legudu tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩; oñ ma ka ñwu Je̩fta kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ mudaba nyʼakogu bʼamo̩ma Amo̩n, kʼe̩ ma la ado̩ wa kʼa le bʼe̩ n? A anʼuna gu unyi-we̩ jo̩ abʼe̩ oji ma.
Taku Je̩fta ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi kpai abo-mi chʼe̩nuja amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩; e̩gba kʼu do̩ me̩ le̩, me̩ la gba mi kwef o̩wo̩-ma n.
Tak e̩gba kʼu li ka kʼame̩ jʼagba mi n, u mʼoji-mi du tinyo̩, oñ u mudaba akobʼamo̩ma Amo̩n, taku Jihofa mʼuma ko nyʼumi o̩wo̩; todule̩ e̩wñ chi ku me̩ wa ugbo mi eñini ku me̩ kʼuja ba mi ta?

Taku Je̩fta mʼaboke̩le̩ Gilead chaka ko wa jeju, oñ i kwojogu kpai abo Ifraim le̩; aboke̩le̩ Gilead la gwʼabo Ifraim dajane̩, ukpe̩ ku ma kakini, Ame̩ abo Gilead, me̩ chʼabo Ifraim ku me̩ chʼe̩nara, ku me̩ jʼalumeji Ifraim, kpai alumeji Manasa.

Oñ abo Gilead le̩ mʼugbo ki de̩ hie̩le̩hie̩le̩ ku ma le daba Jo̩rdan gba nyʼabo Ifraim. Abe̩le̩, e̩gba kʼabo Ifraim ku ma ara kakini, Je̩ ñwu mi daba, e̩gbale̩ aboke̩le̩ Gilead atʼe ene kakini, Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ Ifraim? kʼi kakini, O̩da;

e̩gbale̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ka kakini, Shi-bole̩t, kʼi la kakini, Sibole̩t; todu alu-wñ tʼo̩ kʼi aka n; e̩gbale̩ ma gwo̩nyʼu oñ ma dʼu kpa ugbo ki Jo̩rdan de̩ hie̩le̩hie̩le̩ le̩. Abo Ifraim ki wane̩ iko le̩ la chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke meji.
Je̩fta la kajo̩ abo Israe̩l o̩do̩ me̩fa. Taku Je̩fta e̩ne̩ Gilead leku, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef ewo Gilead oka.
Ubi-wñ Ibzan e-Be̩tle̩he̩m kajo̩ Israe̩l.

Owñ le̩ la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ogue̩gwa; kpai amo̩ma onobule̩ ogue̩gwa kʼi fʼu kpe̩ru ewo ewo, tak i kʼamo̩ma onobule̩ ogue̩gwa kwo ewo ewo wʼunyi todu amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩. I la kajo̩ abo Israe̩l o̩do̩ mebie.
Tak Ibzan leku, oñ ma mʼu du ji Be̩tle̩he̩m.
Ubi-wñ ge̩, Elon e̩ne̩ Ze̩biulo̩n kajo̩ abo Israe̩l; i la kajo̩ abo Israe̩l o̩do̩ me̩gwa.
Tak Elon e̩ne̩ Ze̩biulo̩n le̩ leku, oñ ma mʼu du ji Aijalo̩n oj ane̩ Ze̩biulo̩n le̩.
Ubi-wñ Abdon o̩ma Hile̩l e̩ne̩ Pirato̩n la kajo̩ abo Israe̩l.
I la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, amaaju-wñ la chʼogue̩gwa, ma la tano amo̩ma o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ e̩te̩gwa; owñ la kajo̩ abo Israe̩l o̩do̩ me̩jo̩.
Tak Abdon o̩ma Hile̩l e̩ne̩ Pirato̩n le̩ leku, oñ ma mʼu du ji Pirato̩n oj ane̩ Ifraim, ane̩ uwo abo Amale̩k.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l ño̩ che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa ge̩; taku Jihofa mʼuma ko nyef o̩wo̩ abo Filistia o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji.
Oñ e̩ne̩ Zoraʼka do̩mo̩, abo o̩lo̩pu Dan i la che, odu-wñ ko̩ Manoa; o̩ya-wñ la chʼagaji, i la bi o̩ma n.
Tak Onuche̩ Jihofa kwotejugede ñw onobule̩ le̩, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Go ta, agaji uwe̩ che, e̩ la bi o̩ma du n; e̩ muda anyʼefu, kʼe̩ bi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩.
Todule̩ e̩ nago, agba, e̩ ki la ñmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma n, kpai o̩te̩ una n, e̩ ki la je̩ e̩wñ du ki ma de̩hiolo n,
todu, go, uwe̩ anyʼefu, kʼe̩ la abi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩. Abe̩ du ki kad oji-wñ n, todu imo̩to̩ le̩ achʼe̩ne̩ Nazarait ñw O̩jo̩ kwef uwile̩, owñ le̩ achane̩ ejadu abo Israe̩l bʼef o̩wo̩ abo Filistia te̩.
