Tak onobule̩ le̩ lewa ka ñw o̩ko̩-wñ kakini, E̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ʼka lewa ugbo mi, eju-wñ la dabu eju Onuche̩ e-O̩jo̩, i abailo nana tabale; u latʼe e̩ne̩ ugbo kʼi kwo wa n, i la kʼodu-wñ ñwumin;

i muda aka ñwu mi kakini, Go, uwe̩ anyefu, kʼe̩ la bi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩; e̩ ki ño̩ ñmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai o̩te̩ una du ge̩ n, e̩ ki la je̩ e̩wñ du ki ma de̩ hiolo n, todu imo̩to̩ le̩ ache e̩ne̩ Nazarait ñw O̩jo̩ akwo ef uwile̩ gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ.
Taku Manoa gbo̩ko̩bo̩ Jihofa kakini, O, Ondu, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼe̩, e̩ je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ kpuche̩ wa le̩ kʼi ño̩ dabi wʼugbo wa ge̩, kʼi ko̩ wa alu kʼa ache kpai o̩ma ku ma abi le̩.
Tak O̩jo̩ gbʼomu Manoa gbo̩, oñ Onuche̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ mudabi wa ugbo onobule̩ abu kʼi gugu o̩ko; ama Manoa, o̩ko̩-wñ dʼugbo-wñ n.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ hio̩wo̩wane̩, oñ i fule wa muduka ñw o̩ko̩-wñ, i ka ñw u kakini, Go, e̩ne̩ kʼi wʼugbo mi o̩jo̩ le̩ ño̩ kwotejugede ñwu mi ge̩.
Taki Manoa kwane̩, i tʼo̩ya-wñ ubi, oñ i wʼugbo e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩, i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ che e̩ne̩ kʼi ko̩la ñw onobule̩-i? Tak i kakini, Omi de̩.
Taku Manoa kakini, O̩la kʼe̩ ka le̩ ki wa che ke; ab a anʼo̩ma le̩ le? E̩wñ i ache?
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa ka ñwu Manoa kakini, E̩wñ du kʼu ka ñw onobule̩ le̩ kʼi nago.
I ki je̩ e̩wñ du ki kwefu ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma n, e̩ ki je̩ ñw u ñmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpʼo̩te̩ una n, i ki je̩ e̩wñ du ki ma de̩ hiolo n; e̩wñ du kʼu ñwa ñw u le̩ i ki dejutʼo̩.
Taku Manoa ka ñw Onuche̩ Jihofa kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ e̩ gugu pe̩e̩, kʼa fʼo̩ma ewo ñwo̩che ñw e̩.

Tak Onuche̩ Jihofa ka ñwu Manoa kakini, Dagba e̩ chadahi mi, omi aje̩ uje̩wñ-we̩ n; i la che̩wñ kʼuwe̩ añwʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo che, maku Jihofa chʼe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ ko ñw u. Todu Manoa ma ka kʼi chʼOnuche̩ Jihofa n.
Taku Manoa ka ñw Onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ kakini, Ab odu-we̩ ko̩? Todu, e̩gba kʼo̩la wache̩, kʼa ki dojima ñw e̩?
Tak Onuche̩ Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ tene odu-mi? Abu kʼodu-mi ko̩ Awuwu?
Abe̩le̩ Manoa mʼo̩ma ewo le̩ du manyʼe̩wñ ele oñ i mʼu du ñwu Jihofa oji okuta le̩; tak Onuche̩ le̩ chane̩ eche e̩wñ awuwu, oñ Manoa kpai o̩ya-wñ kejurʼu jo̩.

Todu i wache abu kʼo̩go̩ una le̩ nate̩gu kwo oji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ rʼo̩wo̩ ojale e̩gbale̩ Onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ mute̩gu ef o̩go̩ una e-ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩. Oñ Manoa kpai o̩ya-wñ kejurʼu jo̩; taku ma lewa fejubane̩-ma.
Onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ ño̩ tejugede ñwu Manoa kpai o̩ya-wñ ge̩ n. Taku Manoa ma ka kʼOnuche̩ Jihofa de̩.
Oñ Manoa ka ñw o̩ya-wñ kakini, Eku a aku chuu, todabu kʼa fʼO̩jo̩ li-i.
Ama o̩ya-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ ki ma nyo̩ Jihofa eju kʼi ko wa kpa, i ma gba iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ ele o̩wo̩-wa n, i ma la kʼe̩wñ-i du ña wa n, i ma ka e̩wñ e̩go̩-i ñw a iko-i n.
Onobule̩ la fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Samson; oñ o̩ma le̩ nagba o̩kone̩ alo waa, Jihofa la de̩nyo̩ ñw u.
Tak Afu Jihofa chane̩ edʼu e̩do̩ kwane̩ Mahane̩-dan, agbagba Zo̩ra kpai E̩shtaol.
Oñ Samson mugwo̩ru nyi Timna. I la fʼonobule̩ kʼi chʼo̩ma abo Filistia li.
Tak i mute̩gu wa aka ñw ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ, i kakini, U fʼonobule̩ li Timna, o̩ma abo Filistia i che: lo kʼe̩ tene owñ ñwu mi.

Oñ ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ ka ñwu kakini, Onobule̩ du dʼef amo̩ma amo̩maye-we̩, kpai ef amone̩-mi-i kʼe̩ ne̩ n, kʼuwe̩ anyʼatene o̩ya ef abo Filistia abo e̩pi odukulu-i? Samson muda ka ñw ata-wñ kakini, Uwe̩ kʼe̩ tene ñw omi ke; todu i nyo̩ mi eju.
Ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ la ma ka ki Jihofa nʼe-le̩ wa n; todu i tene aida abo Filistia le̩. Iko kʼa ka-i, abo Filistia le̩ nʼo̩da abo Israe̩l.
Taku Samson kpai ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ gwo̩ru nyi Timna, oñ ma lewa uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma e-Timna le̩. E̩ la go, o̩ma agaguʼka kwa tʼo̩ o̩la.
Tak Afu Jihofa lewa o̩la-wñ, oñ i fʼagagu le̩ fana dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩ma ewo; i la nʼe̩wñ du o̩wo̩-wñ n. I muda ka e̩wñ kʼi che le̩ ñw ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ n.
Tak i mugwo̩ru nyʼo̩mo̩, oñ i bʼonobule̩ le̩ choluka; i la nyo̩ Samson eju nana.
Oñ i de̩ pe̩ tak i mudabi nyʼo̩mo̩ kʼi fʼu ne̩; oñ i muna kʼi go oku agagu le̩, e̩ la go, amiño̩ ma jʼef oku agagu le̩, i la chenʼomi.
Tak i mʼomi le̩ du nʼo̩wo̩-wñ, oñ i le owñ, i la naje̩ abu kʼi alo; tak i lewa ugbo ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ oñ i mʼu du ñwu ma, ma laño̩ je̩ ge̩. I muda ka ñwu ma ka kʼef oku agagu i nʼomi iño̩ le̩ kwo n.
Oñ ata-wñ mugwo̩ru nyʼugbo onobule̩ le̩. Samson la fu uje̩wñ uyo̩ che o̩mo̩ ge̩; todu abu kʼabokolobia ache e̩gba le̩ de̩.
Oñ i lewatu, abu ku ma fʼowñ li, ma fʼabo oje̩go̩-wñ ogue̩gwa ko wa ku ma jʼugbo-wñ.

Taku Samson ka ñwu ma kakini, Je̩ ñwu mi kpʼitaʼka ñwu me̩ ta; iche̩wñ kʼame̩ neke ka oji-wñ ñwu mi tak o̩jo̩ mebie-i ki jo̩, ku me̩ la fʼoji-wñ li, maku nakʼotogbo line̩n ogue̩gwa ñwu me̩, kpai e̩wñ o̩la alomuda ogue̩gwa ge̩;
ama me̩ ma neke ka oji-wñ ñwu mi n, mak e̩gbale̩ ame̩ ako otogbo line̩n ogue̩gwa ñwu mi, kpai e̩wñ o̩la alomuda ogue̩gwa ge̩. Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Kpʼita-we̩ waa, kʼa agbo̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini,

Tak i lewatu o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ, ma ka ñw o̩ya Samson kakini, Gbʼo̩ko̩-we̩ ibe, kʼi ka oji ita le̩ ñw a, tode̩gba kʼa anʼuna fʼuwe̩ kpai abunyi ata-we̩ gujo rinyo̩. E̩ do̩ wa wʼemi kʼe̩ gwo wa ale le̩? I chʼabe̩le̩ n?

Tak o̩ya Samson chane̩ eraku nyʼowñ o̩la, oñ i kakini, Ulaka-mi e̩ che, e̩ fe̩do̩ mi n; e̩ la kpʼita ñw amo̩ma abo-mi, e̩ la ka oji-wñ ñwu mi n. Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Go, u la ka ñw ata-mi kpai iye-mi n, u ñʼaka ñw e̩ ge̩?

Tak i raku eju-wñ o̩mo̩ o̩jo̩ mebie abu ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ aje̩ uje̩wñ uyo̩ le̩; tak i lewatu o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ, oñ i mudu ka ñw u, todabu kʼi achʼo añwahia; tak onobule̩ le̩ mʼoji ita-wñ du ka ñw amo̩ma abo-wñ.
Taku gbogbo tak olu tunyane̩ o̩jo̩ e̩kebie aboke̩le̩ ewo le̩ ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ rinyo̩ tʼiño̩ le? E̩wñ la gbiti tʼagagu le? Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini,

Tak Afu Jihofa ño̩ lewa o̩la-wñ, oñ i mugwo̩ru nyi Ashkelo̩n, i la fʼaboke̩le̩-ma ogue̩gwa kpa, oñ i mʼane̩-ma ko, tak i mʼe̩wñ o̩la alomuda ko kwef ane̩ le̩ ñw abo ku ma ka oji ita le̩. Uwe̩do̩-wñ la mutajo, oñ i mute̩gu le tʼunyi ata-wñ.
Taku ma dʼo̩ya Samson ñw ekeji-wñ kʼi tʼo̩gba o̩ya.
Oñ i lewatʼe̩gba ku ma kpa o̩ka, Samson nʼo̩ma ewo anyʼafejudo o̩ya-wñ; oñ i kakini, Nanyʼejefu ugbo o̩ya-mi. Ata o̩monobule̩ le̩ muda je̩ ñw u le n.
Ata-wñ la ka ñw u kakini, Omi do̩ kʼulaka-wñ uwe̩ che ogbolo; oñ u mʼu du ñw ekeji-we̩. Okekele-wñ achʼuto̩ tʼowñ le n? Agba, e̩ fʼe-le̩ ne̩ akoji-wñ.
Taku Samson ka ñwu ma kakini. U fʼabo Filistia che e̩bie̩ne̩ e̩ne̩de̩-i, i nʼugbo ku ma akʼalu nyʼumi o̩la ge̩ n.
Taku Samson le tekemu amokeleku oli me̩fa, oñ i mʼe̩mu ko, i mʼuma ofe rida gbʼomune̩, oñ i mʼe̩muʼka du ji mo̩ agbagba otihi meji eji.
Tak abu kʼi mʼuna du tʼe̩mu e̩mu le̩, i tʼuma no̩ jʼef o̩ka abo Filistia kʼi tʼoko kpai ef uche̩ o̩lif le̩ ge̩.

Tak abo Filistia kakini, E̩ne̩ che e̩wñ-i ta? Oñ ma kakini, Samson, kʼi chʼana e̩ne̩ Timna le̩ che, todabu kʼi mʼo̩ya-wñ du, kʼi la mʼu du kpo̩ ekeji-wñ. Tak abo Filistia mute̩gu wa, oñ ma nʼuna fʼonobule̩ le̩ kpai ata-wñ gujo.
Taku Samson ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ che abe̩le̩ mak u nafʼache̩ o̩la-mi na chuu, ubi le̩ tak u nawe.
Oñ i ne̩ uku lile kpa ma rinyo̩ chuku chuku; tak i gwo̩ru nyʼagugu ef awo okuta Etam.
Tak abo Filistia mute̩gu wa, oñ ma kworuru jo̩ Juda, ma la fʼo̩la-ma kpatuka Lehi.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Juda kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ mute̩gu wa akobʼuwa ke? Oñ ma kakini, Ule̩ Samson eji oñ a lewa-i, kʼa ki chʼo alu kʼi che wa.

Tak aboke̩le̩ Juda icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta mugwo̩ru nyʼugbo awo okuta Etam le̩, oñ ma ka ñwu Samson kakini, Uwe̩ ma kʼabo Filistia nʼo̩da wa n? E̩wñ e̩ che wa-i ta? Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Alu ku ma che mi, alu le̩ u che ma.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, A gwo̩ru wa-i kʼa fʼuwe̩ ji, kʼa mʼe̩ du tʼabo Filistia o̩wo̩. Taku Samson ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ go̩ ñwu mi ka kʼame̩ abʼumi ma n.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, O̩da; chai eji oñ a ji we̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩, kʼa mʼe̩ du tʼuma o̩wo̩; i chekpʼe̩ a akpʼe̩ n. Taku ma nʼiku etito̩ meji fʼu ji, oñ ma mu du kwugbo okuta le̩ wa.

Tak e̩gba kʼi lewa Lehi, abo Filistia nakpogu ledʼo; taku Afu O̩jo̩ lewa wʼo̩la, oñ iku ku ma du ji o̩wo̩-wñ le̩ murida kʼi dabe̩ne̩ kʼowu kʼuna jo, oñ e̩wñ ku ma du jiʼu le̩ kwo bʼo̩wo̩-wñ te̩ muye̩e̩.
Tak i fʼachiku agba o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ li, achiku le̩ chʼetito̩, i la fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala amʼu du, oñ i nʼe-le̩ kpa aboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩.
Taki Samson kakini,
Tak i lewatu, e̩gba kʼi fʼo̩la le̩ ka kpoji, i mʼachiku le̩ du rikpolo tane̩ bʼo̩wo̩-wñ te̩; oñ ma dʼodu ugbo ki de̩ ko̩ Ramat-le̩hi.
Alugbe̩ la chane̩ ekpʼo̩ tabale, oñ i raku do̩ Jihofa kakini, Uwe̩ la mʼujadu elile-i duwa lʼo̩wo̩ adu-we̩-i; fai omi ñʼaku ñw alugbe̩, kʼu ñwa tef o̩wo̩ abo e̩pi odukulu le̩ ge̩?
Tak O̩jo̩ mʼugbo kʼi tʼawo Lehi le̩ du kpana, oñ omi chane̩ edufu; abu kʼi ñmo̩, afu-wñ mudabiwa, oñ o̩la-wñ ruko. Todule̩ ma dʼodu ugbo ki de̩ ko̩ E̩nhako̩re; e-le̩ la de̩ Lehi gbogbo tʼeñini.
Owñ la kajo̩ abo Israe̩l iko abo Filistia le̩ gbogbo wʼo̩do̩ o̩gu.
Taku Samson nyi Gaza, i fʼajo̩ko̩ʼka li o̩mo̩, oñ i nyʼejefu ugbo-wñ.

Ma ka ñw abo Gaza kakini, Samson lewa emi me̩. Taku ma donyʼugbo kʼi de̩ daka, oñ ma kpala jo̩ anede owñ ugbo alaku ewo le̩ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩, ma la chechi jo̩ odu le̩, kakini, O̩jo̩ muñwa fai, tak a adʼowñ kpa.

Oñ Samson dachi gbogbo tʼalumeji odu, tak i kwane̩ alumeji odu, oñ i gwo̩wo̩nyu e̩wñ ku ma du rʼo̩na alaku le̩ kpai oli otuka-wñ meji, oñ i mʼu wu tʼoli uro̩na-wñ du, oñ i mʼu ko nʼika-wñ alo tʼoji uwo ki dʼo̩gba He̩bro̩n o̩mo̩.
Oñ i lewatu ubile̩ ge̩, i laño̩ fe̩do̩ onobule̩ ef o̩go̩ So̩re̩k, odu onobule̩ le̩ ko̩ De̩laila.

Tak amo̩ga abo Filistia mute̩gu wʼugbo onobule̩ le̩, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Gbʼo̩ ibe, kʼe̩ li ugbo kʼukpahiu-wñ ki tabale le̩ de̩, kʼe̩ li e̩wñ kʼa ache kʼa fʼu du, kʼa fʼu ji kʼa fʼu dema tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-wa ako o̩ko̩ ajifu icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼogume̩lu ñw e̩.
Taku Delaila ka ñwu Samson kakini, Agba, e̩ ka ñwu mi ugbo kʼukpahiu-we̩ inaina-i kwo, kpai e̩wñ ku ma neke du ji uwe̩ ku ma fʼe̩ dema.
Taku Samson ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ ku ma ne̩ e̩cha emimi mebie ki ma gbe̩ n, du ji mi, tak ukpahiu-mi agulo̩, u la adab abo ki bo̩.
Tak amo̩ga abo Filistia le̩ ko e̩cha emimi mebie ki ma gbe̩ n wa ñw onobule̩ le̩, oñ i ne̩ e-le̩ fʼu ji.

E̩gbale̩ i nʼabo iche̩ka ku ma kpala jʼef unyi-wñ ejefu anede owñ. Tak onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Abo Filistia lewa o̩la-we̩, Samson! Tak i fʼe̩cha le̩ jada, alu kʼowu ajada e̩gba kʼi kado una. Abe̩le̩ ma ño̩ ma oji ukpahiu-wñ ta n.
Taku Delaila ka ñwu Samson kakini, Go, e̩ te̩tachʼumi uke̩, e̩ la rʼumi olemi; agba, e̩wñ ma neke ne̩ ji uwe̩ ke?
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, I la che̩wñ ku ma du iku etito̩ e-ku ma ma ne̩ ji e̩wñ du mama ta n ji mi, tak ukpahiu-mi agulo̩, oñ nadab abo ki bo̩.
Abe̩le̩ Delaila mʼiku etito̩ ko, oñ i nʼe-le̩ fʼu ji, tak i ka ñw u kakini, Samson, abo Filista lewa o̩la-we̩ me̩! Abo iche̩ka la kpala jʼef unyi ejefu le̩, oñ i fʼu jada bʼo̩wo̩ te̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼowu.
Taki Delaila ka ñwu Samson kakini, Uwe̩ te̩tachʼumi uke̩ akwoubi-i, e̩ larʼumi olemi; ka ñwu mi e̩wñ ma adu ji uwe̩ ke. Tak i ka ñw u kakini. Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ fʼe̩ba iloji-mi mebie le̩ hi nyʼukpo.
Tak onobule̩ che oñ i fʼebije-wñ kʼatunyʼu ge̩. Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Abo Filistia lewa o̩la-we̩ me̩, Samson! Tak i mʼolu ji, oñ i mʼebije ku ma du tunyu oli iduabo kpai ukpo onugo wu kwʼo̩mo̩.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Ab e̩ le kʼe̩ kakini, Omi afe̩do̩ we̩, e̩do̩-we̩ la dʼugbo mi n? E̩ fʼumi chʼuke̩ onu me̩ta me̩, e̩ la ka ñwu mi ugbo kʼukpahiu-we̩ inaina le̩ kwo n.
Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼi akutʼo̩ o̩la eka ñw u o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa, kʼi la akʼo̩ e̩che̩, uhia fʼu hia—uku ma me̩!

Tak i mʼefu chi ñw u chaka, i la ka ñw u kakini, Abe̩ kadʼomi oji mama ta n; Nazarait e-O̩jo̩ omi che akwef uwile̩: iche̩wñ ku ma fʼumi oji la e̩gbale̩ tak ukpahiu-mi akwo bʼumi te̩, oñ ukpahiu-mi agulo, oñ nadab abo ile̩ ki bo̩.

Oñ abu ku Delaila li ka kʼi mʼefu-wñ chi ñw u chaka, i fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ ado̩ amo̩ga abo Filistia le̩, i kakini, Mute̩gu wa onuʼka-i ta, todu i mʼefu-wñ chi ñwu mi chaka me̩. Tak amo̩ga abo Filistia mute̩gu wʼugbo-wñ o̩mo̩, ma la nʼo̩ko̩ le̩ ef o̩wo̩-ma wa.
Oñ i je̩ ñw u dʼoji-wñ nʼe̩re̩-wñ alolu; tak i je̩ ñwu ma do̩ e̩ne̩ʼka wa, oñ i mʼe̩ba iloji mebie le̩ la; tak i chane̩ edema, oñ ukpahiu-wñ kwo bʼo̩ o̩la te̩.
Tak i kakini, Abo Filistia lewa o̩la-we̩ me̩, Samson! Tak i mʼolu ji, oñ i kakini, Nalo dufu alu kʼu te̩tache le̩, kʼu fʼo̩la-mi miejo tane̩. I la ma ki Jihofa kwo bʼo̩ te̩ n.
Tak abo Filistia le̩ gwo̩wo̩nyʼu, oñ ma la fʼe eju kpo̩fo̩, ma la mʼu du gwo̩ru wa Gaza, oñ ma nʼigbaligba ebije ekpikpa fʼu ji; owñ la chʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eno̩ oj okuta ef unyiuga o̩mo̩.
Ama abu ku ma fʼu la le̩ iloji-wñ chane̩ eko̩.
Tak amo̩ga abo Filistia le̩ kʼo̩la-ma wa jeju ku ma fʼiche̩bo̩ lile che ñwu Dago̩n o̩jo̩-ma, ku ma ño̩ yo̩ ge̩; todu ma kakini, O̩jo̩-wa mu Samson e̩nebi-wa le̩ du tʼuwa o̩wo̩ me̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼamone̩ le̩ fʼu li, ma kwo je̩nyu ñw O̩jo̩-ma; todu ma kakini, O̩jo̩-wa mʼe̩nebi-wa, kʼi akpa ane̩-wa bie̩-i, kʼi fʼabo-wa wewe kpa le̩ du tʼuwa o̩wo̩ me̩.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼe̩do̩-ma chane̩ ebo̩ ololo, kʼama kakini, Do̩ Samson wa, kʼi chiya ñw a. Taku ma kpʼone̩ adu Samson kwʼunyiuga wa; i la chiya ñwu ma. Ma la mʼowñ du gugu agbagba oli ugbogaga meji le̩.
Taku Samson ka ñw okolobia kʼi gwo̩nyʼu o̩wo̩ le̩ kakini, Je̩ ñwu mi dʼo̩wo̩-mi kad oli ugbogaga kʼunyi-i dʼoji-wñ, todu kʼu hi o̩la kʼo̩.

Aboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩ la che̩ko̩ ef unyi le̩; amo̩ga abo Filistia chaka la jo̩ o̩mo̩; aboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩ ku ma jʼojokunyi-wñ ku ma go abu ku Samson do̩mo̩ achiya le̩, ma dab one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta.

Taku Samson kwa do̩ Jihofa, i kakini, O Ondu, Jihofa narodubʼe̩ kʼe̩ libekado mi, kʼe̩ du ukpahiu ñwu mi onu kate-i, O O̩jo̩ o̩ko̩ nagba bʼe̩ kʼu fʼache̩ o̩la-mi na ugbo abo Filistia todu eju-mi meji-i.
Taku Samson gwo̩nyu oli ugbogaga meji ki jʼalumeji kʼunyi dʼoji-wñ le̩, oñ i lo̩nʼejeji-wñ, o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ dʼoka, o̩wo̩-wñ awohi dʼekeji.

Taki Samson kakini, Omi ki ku manyʼabo Filistia ke! Oñ i hi e̩do̩wane̩ ake̩che̩ ukpahiu-wñ; tak unyi le̩ mugulo̩ bʼamo̩ga kpai abo du ku ma jʼefu-wñ ma. Abe̩le̩ abo kʼi kpa ma ef uku-wñ le̩ tʼabo kʼi kpa ef udeju-wñ le.
Tak amo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai abunyi ata-wñ chaka mugwo̩ru wa, ma la mʼowñ du wa aji agbagba Zora kpai E̩shtaol ugbo ku ma ji Manoa ata-wñ. Owñ la kajo̩ abo Israe̩l o̩do̩ ogu.
E̩ne̩ ane̩ uwo Ifraim oka la do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Maika.

E̩ne̩ le̩ ka ñw iye-wñ kakini, Ajifa icham nyʼoli me̩la ku ma bʼe̩ gba le̩, e-kʼe̩ ge̩bo̩ nʼo̩ kʼe̩ ño̩ ka kʼi tʼumi eti le̩, go, ajifa le̩ dʼugbo mi; omi du. Tak iye-wñ kakini, Jihofa ki de̩nyo̩ ñw o̩ma-mi.

Tak i mʼajifa icham nyʼoli me̩fa le̩ ko dabi wa ñw iye-wñ; oñ iye-wñ kakini, Omi fʼajifa le̩ date̩ ñwu Jihofa kʼi fo̩ todu o̩ma-mi, kʼi fʼojiboʼka gbe̩, kʼi la fʼo̩ka da; todule̩ oñ nadʼu dabiwa ñw e̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi mʼo̩ko̩ le̩ ko dabiwa ñw iye-wñ, iye-wñ mʼajifa o̩gwo̩ko̩ chi oñ i mʼu ko ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi adʼo̩na, owñ le̩ la fʼojibo gbe̩ oñ i fʼo̩ka da; oñ e-le̩ jʼef unyi Maika le̩.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ku ma do̩ Maika le̩ la chenʼunyi amo̩jo̩, oñ i fʼe̩fo̩d kpʼamude oji che, oñ i kʼe̩wñ nyʼo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka o̩wo̩ e̩ko̩, oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ mud atama-wñ.
Iko le̩ onu du la dʼIsrae̩l in; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ che e̩wñ ki nyo̩ o̩la-wñ eju.
Oñ okolobiaʼka kʼi chʼabo o̩lo̩pu Juda kʼi ño̩ dʼef abo Lifai kʼi kwo Be̩tlehe̩m e-Juda do̩mo̩; oñ i ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩.
Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ kwobʼewo Be̩tle̩he̩m e-Juda te̩, kʼi ge̩ne̩ ugbo du kʼi ali uña; oñ i lewa ane̩ uwo Ifraim, abu kʼi alale i lewa unyi Maika.
Taku Maika ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo e̩ kwo? Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Abo Lifai e-Be̩tle̩he̩m e-Juda omi che, nanyʼage̩ne̩ ugbo du kʼu li uña.
Taku Maika ka ñw u kakini, Bʼumi dodo kʼe̩ chʼata kpai atama ñwu mi, oñ nako ajifa me̩gwa ñw e̩ o̩do̩ da o̩do̩ da, kpai e̩wñ kʼe̩ ko nyʼo̩la kpai uje̩wñ-we̩. Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ Lifai le̩ mugudu nyʼo̩mo̩.
Oñ i nyo̩ e̩ne̩ Lifai le̩ eju kʼi bʼe̩ne̩ le̩ dodo; okolobia le̩ la dab o̩ma-wñʼka ñw owñ.
Taku Maika ko e̩wñ nyʼe̩ne̩ Lifai le̩ o̩wo̩ e̩ko̩, oñ okolobia le̩ mud atama-wñ, i la dʼef unyi Maika le̩.
Taku Maika kakini, Fai tak u ma ka ki Jihofa ache e̩nyo̩ kpai omi, todabu kʼu chenʼe̩ne̩ Lifaiʼka kʼi che atama-mi.
Iko le̩ onu du dʼIsrae̩li n. Oñ iko le̩ abo o̩lo̩pu Dan tene ane̩ e̩wñ ogu-ma ku ma dodo jʼo̩mo̩; todu gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i e̩wñ ogu-ma tʼuma o̩wo̩ ef abo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩li ta n.

Tak amo̩ma Dan fʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma chʼame̩nuwohi me̩lu chi kwef o̩gbo̩dudu abo o̩lo̩pu-ma chaka, oñ ma kpʼuma uche̩ akwo Zora kpai akwo E̩shtaol, ku ma nyʼatu ane̩ le̩, ku ma tejane̩ alu kʼe̩wñ de̩ o̩mo̩; oñ ma ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nyʼatejane̩ ane̩ le̩. Taku ma lewa ane̩ uwo Ifraim, ugbo unyi Maika, oñ ma ru jʼo̩mo̩.
E̩gba ku ma lewa odede unyi Maika le̩, ma mejuma omuko̩la okolobia e̩ne̩ Lifai le̩; taku ma muna o̩mo̩, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼuwe̩ wʼemi? E̩wñ e̩ che emi? E̩wñ e̩ ne̩ emi?
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ ku Maika che ñwu mi de̩, e̩wñ kʼi du ñwu mi de̩; i laño̩ fʼo̩gu che ñwu mi, oñ u mud atama-wñ.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Agba, e̩ tʼO̩jo̩ ene ñw a, ule̩-wa-i ara ñw a?
Tak atama le̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ le kpʼo̩lafia. Eju Jihofa tʼo̩na-me̩ ku me̩ le le̩.

Tak aboke̩le̩ me̩lu le̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le, oñ ma lewa Laish, oñ ma li alu kʼamone̩ ku ma jo̩ o̩mo̩ chubiyʼo̩la-ma jo̩ ofo, ma jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩ alu kʼabo Saido̩n de̩, todu i nʼonu ane̩ du o̩mo̩ kʼi kʼanyo̩ mʼuma n, ma la jo̩ o̩najiji ñw abo Saido̩n, ma la naru e̩ne̩ du n.
Oñ ma lewa Zora kpai E̩shtaol ugbo amo̩maye-ma, tak amo̩maye-ma ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu me̩ ka?
Taku ma kakini, Me̩ kwane̩ kʼa nyʼakobʼuma; todu a fʼane̩ le̩ li me̩, me̩ la go, i chʼane̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩. Ame̩ la chechi jʼemi ofo? Me̩ ki chʼiñelebu egudu nyʼo̩mo̩ agba ane̩ le̩ n.
E̩gba ku me̩ alo me̩ awʼugbo amone̩ ku ma jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩. Ane̩ le̩ la chenabe̩; todu O̩jo̩ mʼu du nyʼume̩ o̩wo̩ me̩, eku e̩wñ du ki dʼile̩ aku one̩ o̩mo̩ n.
Tak aboke̩le̩ o̩lo̩pu Dan ulo̩gwa akwo Zora kpai E̩shtaol alo.
Oñ ma lewa ru Kiriat-jearim oj ane̩ Juda; todule̩ ma dʼodu ugbo kide̩ ko̩ Mahane̩-Dan gbogbo tʼeñini; go, i dʼejubi Kiriat-jearim le̩.
Ma lale gu o̩mo̩ du tʼoj ane̩ uwo Ifraim, oñ ma lewa unyi Maika.

Tak aboke̩le̩ me̩lu ku ma nyʼatʼane̩ Laish le̩ ka ñw amo̩maye-ma kakini, Ame̩ chema kʼe̩fo̩d kpai amude kpai ojibo ku ma gbe̩ kpai ojibo ku ma da jʼef unyi ki jo̩-i? Todule̩ me̩ ki fʼibe e̩wñ ki dukpe̩ ku me̩ che kpe̩.
Taku ma muna o̩mo̩, oñ ma lewa unyi e̩ne̩ Lifai okolobia le̩, owñ chʼunyi Maika, oñ ma tene o̩lafia-wñ.
Aboke̩le̩ ulo̩gwa ku ma chʼamo̩ma Dan kʼo̩la-ma che̩mu ogu dago jʼalu aku le̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ me̩lu ku ma tʼane̩ le̩, mute̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩ amʼojibo ku ma gbe̩ kpai e̩fo̩d kpai amude kpai ojibo ku ma da le̩ ko; atama le̩ la dago kpenyʼaboke̩le̩ ulo̩gwa ku ma ji o̩la ogu jʼalaku le̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼabo le̩ nyʼef unyi Maika, ku ma la mʼojibo ku ma gbe̩ kpai e̩fo̩d, kpai amude kpai ojibo ku ma du le̩ ko wa, atama ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ me̩ che-i?

Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Chechi, fʼo̩wo̩ bʼalu-we̩ ma kʼe̩ lebʼuwa, kʼe̩ chʼata kpai atama ñw a. I nyo̩ tule ñw e̩ kʼe̩ chʼatama abo unyi e̩ne̩ʼka, abe̩k e̩ chʼatama ñw abo o̩lo̩pu kpai abo unyi e̩ne̩fe̩nyiʼka Israe̩l?
Tak e̩do̩ atama le̩ bo̩, oñ i mʼe̩fo̩d kpai amude kpai ojibo ku ma gbe̩ le̩ ko, oñ i tʼalumeji amone̩ le̩ alo.
Abe̩le̩ ma mʼoji rida alo, ma la mʼabo egini kpai ame̩wñukpa-ma kpai ane̩-ma ko rʼo̩gba.
E̩gba ku ma kwʼunyi Maika le jiji, aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼef unyi unyi ki me̩ru unyi Maika le̩ kʼo̩la-ma jeju, oñ ma rano amo̩ma Dan.
Taku ma kwado̩ amo̩ma Dan. Taku ma dʼejubi, oñ ma ka ñwu Maika kakini, E̩wñ chʼuwe̩, kʼe̩ kʼamone̩ wewe abe̩i wa ta?
Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ kakini, Ame̩ mʼamo̩jo̩-mi kʼomi che ko, kpai atama, oñ me̩ le me̩, e̩wñ u ño̩ ne̩ ge̩? Abile ku me̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩wñ chʼuwe̩ ta?
Tak amo̩ma Dan ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki ño̩ gbo̩ omu-we̩ efu-wa emi ge̩ n, tode̩gba kʼame̩ne̩do̩fulu agwo̩ko̩ wa abʼe̩ ma, kʼoji-we̩ manyʼoji abo-we̩ chaka ño̩ lenyo̩ ge̩.
Tak amo̩ma Dan le ma; oñ abu ki Maika li ka kʼo̩wo̩-ma tʼowñ le, i mubidagba le tʼunyi-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ ma mʼe̩wñ ki Maika che le̩ kpai atama kʼi ne̩, ko, oñ ma lewa Laish ugbo amone̩ ku ma jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩ ku ma chubiyʼo̩la-ma jo̩, taku ma nʼalu ugbada gwo ma dajane̩ oñ ma nʼuna gu ewo le̩ jo.
I la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi agba ma n, todu o̩mo̩ chʼejiji ru Saido̩n; ma la naru e̩ne̩ du n; o̩mo̩ la dʼef o̩go̩ kʼi me̩ru Be̩t-rehob le̩. Taku ma dabi fʼewo le̩ ko̩, oñ ma kwojʼo̩mo̩.
Ma la do̩ odu ewo le̩ ko̩ Dan, alu kʼodu Dan ata-ma ku ma bi ñwu Israe̩l le̩ de̩; odu ewo le̩ muda ko̩ Laish e̩gba ejodudu.

Tak amo̩ma Dan mʼojibo ku ma gbe̩ le̩ du dago ñw o̩la-ma; taku Jo̩natan, o̩ma Ge̩rsho̩n, kʼi chʼo̩ma Mose̩s le̩, kpai amo̩ma-wñ chʼamatama ñw abo o̩lo̩pu Dan gbogbo wa o̩jo̩ kʼabo omune̩ wa gba ane̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma mʼojibo e-ki Maika gbe̩ ñw o̩la-wñ le̩ du dago ñw o̩la-ma, gbogbo abu kʼunyi O̩jo̩ de̩ Shailo le̩ chaka.
Gibea Oñ i lewatu iko le̩, e̩gba kʼonu du ma dʼIsrae̩li n, e̩ne̩ Lifaiʼka do̩mo̩ kʼi ge̩ne̩ ejubi ane̩-uwo e-Ifraim. Owñ le̩ fʼabaduʼka ne̩ ñw o̩la-wñ Be̩tle̩he̩m e-Juda.
Tak abadu le̩ kwojo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩ o̩la, oñ i kwo bʼo̩ te̩ le tʼunyi ata-wñ Be̩tle̩he̩m e-Juda, i la dʼo̩mo̩ gbogbo ochu me̩le̩.

Tak o̩ko̩-wñ kwane̩, oñ i gbe̩re̩ owñ kʼi kpo̩te̩rʼu e̩do̩, kʼi dʼu dabiwa unyi, adu-wñ oka dʼugbo-wñ kpai amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ meji. Tak onobule̩ le̩ dʼowñ wa unyi ata-wñ; oñ e̩gba kʼata igbe̩le̩ le̩ liʼu, i kwoyo̩ ede kʼeju-ma de.
Tak ana-wñ, ata igbe̩le̩ le̩, chʼadahi-wñ, oñ i bʼo̩ gugu o̩jo̩ me̩ta; abe̩le̩ ma kwoñmo̩ aje̩ oñ ma ru jʼo̩mo̩.
Tak i lewatu o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩le̩-wñ, ma takpa kwane̩, oñ i fʼo̩la ule̩ mu; ata igbe̩le̩ le̩ la ka ñw ana-wñ kakini, E̩ mʼo̩we̩ uje̩wñ bu kʼe̩do̩ we̩ ki gbiti tak e̩ lo.
Abe̩le̩ ma kwojʼaje̩ añmo̩; oñ ata igbe̩le̩ le̩ ka ñw e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kakini, Agba, e̩ ki fe̩do̩je̩ nyʼo̩na ta, kʼe̩do̩-we̩ ki bo̩.
E̩ne̩ le̩ la kwane̩ kʼi lo, ana-wñ muda kutʼo̩, tak i ño̩ le̩ o̩mo̩ ñwʼo̩jo̩.
Tak i ño̩ takpa kwane̩ odudu o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩lu-wñ kʼi lo, oñ ata igbe̩le̩ le̩ kakini, E̩ guane̩ kʼane̩ ki lo̩ kʼo̩la-we̩ ki ruko ta, agba! Abe̩le̩ ama meji kwoje̩ e̩wñ.

Tak e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kpai abadu-wñ kpai adu-wñ kwane̩ ku ma lo, ana-wñ, ata igbe̩le̩ le̩, ka ñw u kakini, Go, olu alo me̩; agba, e̩ le̩ gbʼodudu ta. Go, o̩jo̩ adu; ru emi, kʼe̩do̩-we̩ ki bo̩; tak e̩ takpa kwane̩ kʼe̩ nyʼunyi-we̩ o̩na.
Ama e̩ne̩ le̩ ko̩ le̩ o̩mo̩ odu o̩jo̩ le̩; oñ i kwane̩ i le owñ. Tak i lewa odede Je̩bius (owñ che Je̩rusale̩m). Amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ meji kʼofidi ji mʼo̩ ubi jʼugbo-wñ; abadu-wñ la dʼugbo-wñ ge̩.
E̩gba ku ma me̩ru Je̩bius, o̩jo̩ bo̩ pe̩ ki du; oñ adu le̩ ka ñw odu-wñ kakini, Agba, lewa kʼa muna tef ewo abo Je̩bius-i, kʼa ru o̩mo̩.
Tak odu-wñ ka ñw u kakini, A ana tef ewo abononojo ku ma ma chʼamo̩ma Israe̩li n; a muda alegudu nyi Gibea.
Tak i ka ñw adu-wñ kakini, Lewa kʼa te̩me̩ru unyiʼka emi, kʼa ru Gibea abe̩ku Rama.
Abe̩le̩ ma lale gudu alo waa; tak olu tunyʼane̩ ke̩re̩bʼuma me̩ru Gibea, e-Be̩njamin.
Oñ ma muna tʼo̩mo̩, ku ma nyʼef ewo Gibea aru. I la mugudu tef ewo le̩ oñ i kwoguane̩ ojukpologu o̩mo̩; todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi agba ma wʼunyi-wñ aru n.
Me̩ la go, ogijoʼka kwʼoko uko̩lo̩ uche̩-wñ awa e̩gba ane̩ le̩; e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼabo ane̩ uwo Ifraim, i la age̩ne̩ Gibea. Abo ugbo ki de̩ la chʼabo Be̩njamin.
Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ mʼeju-wñ chi nyate̩, oñ i fʼe̩ne̩ ilo̩na le̩ li ojukpologu ewo le̩; tak ogijo le̩ kakini, Ugbo e̩ nyi? Ugbo e̩ kwo wa?
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, A kwo Be̩tle̩he̩m e-Juda kʼa lo tʼejubi ane̩ uwo Ifraim; o̩mo̩ chʼunyi-mi; oñ u nyi Be̩tle̩he̩m e-Juda; fai nanyʼunyi Jihofa; i la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi agba mi wʼunyi-wñ n.
A chenʼegbe kpai e̩wñ kʼamo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wa aje̩, uje̩wñ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma ño̩ do̩mo̩ todu mi kpai adu-we̩ onobule̩-i kpai todu okolobia kʼi dʼugbo amadu-we̩-i ge̩: eku e̩wñ du aku wa n.
Tak ogijo le̩ kakini, I ra ñw e̩ kpo̩o̩! i chaka dʼabe̩le̩, me̩ tʼadu le̩ no̩ ñwu mi ke, me̩ ki muda ale̩ ojukpologu-i odu-i n.
Abe̩le̩ i mʼowñ du wa unyi-wñ, i la ko ije̩ ñw amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ je̩; taku ma fʼe̩re̩-ma gwe̩, ma fʼe̩wñ je̩ ma la ñmo̩.

Abu ku ma jʼahi o̩la-ma ifi kpai o̩do̩ ko, go, aboke̩le̩ ewo le̩, ame̩nebili iche̩ka, lewa donyʼunyi le̩ daka, oñ ma chane̩ edu e̩wñ ño̩ olugbana; taku ma ko̩la ñw e̩ne̩fe̩nyi ogijo le̩ kakini, Mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi wʼunyi-we̩ le̩ dudufu wa, kʼa ki fʼowñ ma.

Tak e̩ne̩ le̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi le̩, le dufu ugbo ma, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩da, amo̩maye-mi, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼume̩, me̩ ki che e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ e̩go̩-i n; abu kʼe̩ne̩-i mugudu wʼef unyi-mi, me̩ ki chʼo e̩wñ tuñ abe̩le̩ n.
Go, o̩ma-mi kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mama ta n kpai abadu e̩ne̩ le̩ jʼemi; nako ma dufu wa, ku me̩ kpa ma bie̩, ku me̩ che ma alu du ki rʼume̩ eju; me̩ ki muda che e̩ne̩-i e̩wñ idada abe̩le̩ n.

Ama aboke̩le̩ le̩ ko̩ enyʼu eti. Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ gwo̩nyʼabadu-wñ, oñ i mʼu du dufu ñwu ma; taku ma bʼo̩ dachi, ma la fʼu chʼo̩bata odu le̩ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩. Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ chane̩ eñwa, ma tʼowñ no̩.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ chane̩ eñwa onobule̩ le̩ lewa bʼane̩ ma alugbana unyi e̩ne̩ kʼodu-wñ dʼugbo-wñ le̩ gbogbo tak ane̩ mune̩.
Tak odu-wñ kwane̩ odudu, i la mʼo̩na unyi le̩ bi, kʼi dufu kʼi lo owñ; e̩ la go, onobule̩, kʼi chʼabadu-wñ le̩, bʼane̩ ma alugbana unyi le̩, i kʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼubo̩ alugbana.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Kwane̩ kʼa lo; i nʼohi n. Tak i mʼowñ du nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ; oñ i kwane̩ le tʼunyi-wñ.
Tak e̩gba kʼi lewa ef unyi-wñ, i mʼo̩be̩ du, oñ i gwo̩nyʼabadu-wñ le̩, i la fʼo̩wo̩-wñ kpai e̩re̩-wñ kpanya oñ i fʼu ku o̩kpo̩ me̩gweji, tak i kʼo kpuche̩ nyʼugbo du kʼalo̩me̩ Israe̩l te̩ kade.

Abe̩le̩ i la de̩, kʼe̩ne̩ du ki fʼu li kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki che e̩wñ abe̩-i ku ma li akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l kwʼIjipti wa gbogbo tʼeñini n; me̩ fʼibe-wñ kpe̩, me̩ nyʼo̩juju nyʼu ku me̩ ka oji-wñ.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l chaka le dufu akwo Dan gbogbo wa Birshiba, manyʼabo ane̩ Gilead, oñ o̩gbadu le̩ jeju wʼugbo Jihofa Mizpa dabʼe̩ne̩ kate.
Tak amagboji amone̩ le̩ du, owñ chʼabo o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka, kʼo̩la-ma wa jo̩ ef ujeju amone̩ e-O̩jo̩ le̩, ama chʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma le e̩re̩ ofo ku ma bʼugbada ewo̩ jo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ulo̩ko̩.
(Amo̩ma Be̩njamin la gbo̩ ka kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l mute̩gu le tu Mizpa me̩.) Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, E̩ ka ñw a, abile kʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩-i wache ta?
Tak e̩ne̩ Lifai, o̩ko̩ onobule̩ ku ma kpa le̩, dohi kakini, U lewa Gibea ki Be̩njamin ne̩ le̩, owñ chʼomi kpai abadu-mi, kʼa ru.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Gibea kwane̩ tʼumi o̩la, oñ ma donyʼunyi le̩ lʼumi daka odu; ibe dʼefu-ma ku ma du mi kpa, ma la fʼabadu-mi kpabie̩ chaka, tak i leku.
Tak u mʼabadu-mi du, oñ u fʼu kwu, oñ u kʼo kpuche̩ rʼugbo du ojane̩ e̩wñ ogu Israe̩l-i; todu ma fʼe̩wñ abutabu kpai e̩wñ tuñu che ane̩ Israe̩l me̩.
Me̩ go, ame̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l, o̩chaka-me̩, me̩ ka alu ku me̩ li.
Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka kwane̩ e̩re̩ okate, ma kakini, E̩ne̩ du ef uwa anyʼunyabo-wñ n, e̩ne̩ du ef uwa la adabi tʼunyi-wñ n.
E̩wñ kʼa muda che Gibea fai de̩: a akobʼo̩ alu kʼanya je̩;

a la achi one̩ me̩gwa e̩gwa kwef one̩ ogume̩lu o̩gume̩lu, ef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l okoke du, one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu kwef one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ chaka, kpai one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kwef one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa ku ma kʼuje̩wñ wa tod amone̩-i, todu e̩gba ku ma lewa Gibea e-Be̩njamin, kʼama ki che ma teju alu kʼe̩wñtuñ kʼama che ojane̩ Israe̩l de̩.
Abe̩le̩ aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka jeju nyʼewo le̩, ma gamʼomune̩ dabe̩ne̩ ku ma chʼe̩ne̩kate.
Tak abo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l fʼaboke̩le̩ kpe̩ rʼugbo du ef abo o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin le̩, ma kakini, E̩wñ bie̩ne̩ ki wache ef ume̩-i chʼe̩wñ ta?
Todule̩ me̩ kʼaboke̩le̩, ame̩nebili, ku ma jo̩ Gibea le̩ dufu ñw a, kʼa fʼuma kpa, kʼa kʼe̩bie̩ne̩-i kwo bʼIsrae̩l te̩. Be̩njamin muda ko̩ enetirʼomu amo̩maye-ma, amo̩ma Israe̩l le̩.
Tak amo̩ma Be̩njamin kʼo̩la-ma kwʼewo ewo wa jeju Gibea, ku ma nyʼakogu bʼamo̩ma Israe̩l.

Oñ ma fʼamo̩ma Be̩njamin ku ma kwef ewo ewo wa ku ma bʼugbada ewo̩ jo̩ kaluka o̩jo̩ le̩, ma chʼaboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩fa, manyʼabo ku ma dodo Gibea, aluka aboke̩le̩ Gibea ku ma chi le̩ chʼogume̩lu mebie.
Ef amone̩-i chaka amabawohi ku ma chi jo̩ chʼone̩ ogume̩lu mebie; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma neke gwʼune̩cha ado odeele iloji oka, ma la adʼu re n.
Oñ aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l, ku ma chʼojoji ñw abo Be̩njamin ku ma kaluka le̩ chʼaboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ulo̩ko̩ ku ma bʼugbada ewo jo̩; aboke̩le̩-i chaka chʼame̩nogu.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l kwane̩, ma la mute̩gu nyi Be̩te̩l, ku ma tʼO̩jo̩ ene; ma kakini, E̩ne̩ adʼogu-i kwane̩ ñw a kʼa ko bʼamo̩ma Be̩njamin? Taki Jihofa kakini, Juda ale ejodudu.
Amo̩ma Israe̩l kwane̩ odudu, oñ ma lewa ru nyu Gibea le̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ledufu akogu bo̩ Be̩njamin; aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l la kʼame̩nogu tala jo̩ nyʼuma Gibea.
Tak amo̩ma Be̩njamin kwo Gibea dufu wa, oñ ma fʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke meji gwodajane̩ o̩jo̩ le̩
Tak amone̩ le̩, owñ chʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l, dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw o̩la-ma, oñ ma ño̩ kʼabogu tala jo̩ ugbo ku ma tala jo̩ o̩jo̩ ejodudu le̩ ge̩.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l mute̩gu wa araku o̩gba Jihofa gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩; taku ma tu Jihofa ene kakini, Omi ñʼate̩nyʼo̩mo̩ akogu bʼamo̩ma Be̩njamin o̩maye-mi ge̩? Taku Jihofa kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ kobʼo̩.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l ño̩ te̩wa akobʼamo̩ma Be̩njamin o̩jo̩ ekeji le̩ ge̩.
Taku Be̩njamin kwo Gibea dufu akobʼuma o̩jo̩ ekeji le̩ ge̩, i laño̩ fʼaboke̩le̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩ gwodajane̩ ge̩; abo-i chaka chʼabo ku ma nʼugbada.

Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l chaka, kpai amone̩ le̩ chaka, mute̩gu wa Be̩te̩l, oñ ma kworaku, ma la gugu ane̩ o̩gba Jihofa o̩mo̩, ma fʼalu ji o̩jo̩ le̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩; taku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa che o̩gba Jihofa.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l ti Jihofa ene, (todu akpati alo O̩jo̩ de̩ Be̩te̩l o̩mo̩ iko le̩,

Finehas, o̩ma E̩leaza, o̩ma Aro̩n le̩, dago o̩gba-wñ iko le̩) oñ ma tene kakini, U ñʼadufu akogu bʼamo̩ma Be̩njamin, o̩maye-mi, ge̩? Abe̩k u we? Taki Jihofa kakini, Mute̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩; todu nadʼu tʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ o̩na.
Tak Israe̩l je̩ ñw amone̩ kpala nyu Gibea daka.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l mute̩gu akobʼamo̩ma Be̩njamin o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta le̩ ge̩, ma la kʼo̩la-ma tala jo̩ nyu Gibea, alu ku ma che akwoubi le̩.

Tak amo̩ma Be̩njamin ledufu akobʼabo Israe̩l, oñ abo Israe̩l fʼuma fa wʼubi bʼewo le̩ te̩. Taku ma chane̩ egwo amone̩ le̩ da ku ma kpa ma dab akwoubi ojikpadala ki ale tu Be̩te̩l kpʼekeji kʼi le tu Gibea kpai oko o̩mo̩, aboke̩le̩ ku ma kpa dab one̩ ogue̩gwa.
Tak amo̩ma Be̩njamin kakini, A chane̩ egwo ma da dab e̩gba ejodudu le̩ ge̩. Amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, A ki ra, kʼa fʼuma fa wʼubi tʼojikpadala bʼewo le̩ te̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l le̩ chaka kwane̩ kwʼe̩gu-ma, oñ ma kʼo̩la-ma tala jo̩ Beal-tamar; oñ abo Israe̩l ku ma kpala jo̩ gwo̩ko̩ kwʼuña-ma dufu, owñ chegbili Geba le̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa ku ma chi kwef abo Israe̩l chaka lewa akobo̩ Gibea, ogu le̩ kpuna; ma muda ma ka kʼe̩bie̩ne̩ me̩ru awa le̩ n.

Taku Jihofa gwʼabo Be̩njamin dajane̩ rʼo̩gba Israe̩l; amo̩ma Israe̩l la fʼaboke̩le̩ Be̩njamin icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩lu nyʼogume̩lu oji kpa rinyo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩; abo-i chaka chʼabo ku ma nʼugbada.
Abe̩le̩ amo̩ma Be̩njamin li ka kʼama fʼuma gwo dajane̩ me̩; todu aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l bo̩wo̩lo̩ ñwu Be̩njamin, todabu ku ma ke̩do̩nʼabo ku ma ko kpala jo̩ nyu Gibea le̩.
Tak abo ku ma kpala jo̩ le̩ hiane̩ wa, oñ ma gwo̩ko̩ wa abo Gibea ma; tak abo ku ma kpala jo̩ le̩ fʼo̩la-ma fa wa, oñ ma nʼalu ugbada fʼabo ewo le̩ chaka gwodajane̩.
Oñ ujiwe kʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l kpai abo ku ma kpala jo̩ le̩ du te̩ ñw o̩la-ma de̩, kakini, Ma ache kʼodudu ki kwane̩ tuu ef ewo le̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l murida ef ogu le̩, taku Be̩njamin chane̩ ekpa aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ ogue̩gwa; todu ma kakini, A chane̩ egwo ma da, dab ef ogu ejodudu le̩ me̩.
Ama e̩gba kʼodudu le̩ chane̩ elo̩ kwʼef ewo le̩ tʼate̩, abo Be̩njamin dejubi; e̩ la go, o̩gbo̩ ewo le̩ chaka mud odudu ki ate̩gu nyʼojale lukuu.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l murida, oñ e̩do̩ amo̩ma Be̩njamin muda kpo; todu ma li ka kʼe̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ lewa bʼuma ma me̩.
Todule̩ ma mubidagba aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l alʼo̩na aje̩tachi le̩; ogu le̩ muda tʼuma ubi una una awa; oñ abo ku ma kwʼef ewo ewo le̩ dufu ko ma kpa rinyo̩ alumeji o̩mo̩.
Taku ma donyʼabo Be̩njamin le̩ daka, ma fʼuma ne, ma la fʼuma kpetili mane̩ ugbo uña uñmi-ma, gbogbo wa o̩dede̩ Gibea o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩.
Aboke̩le̩ Be̩njamin ku ma la wane̩ o̩mo̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩; abo le̩ chaka chʼamagbiti ku ma nʼuwo-hi.

Taku ma murida ara ro̩wo̩ aje̩tachi wʼugbo okuta Rimo̩n; aboke̩le̩ ma ku ma ño̩ fiye̩ ojukpologu chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu ge̩, ma la kado ma ubi gbogbo wa Gido̩m, oñ ma fʼaboke̩le̩-ma icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji gwodajane̩ ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ abo Be̩njamin ku ma bʼugbada ewo jo̩ ku ma wane̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ chaka chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩lu; aboke̩le̩-i chaka chʼamagbiti ku ma nʼuwohi.
Aboke̩le̩ ulo̩gwa muda murida ara rʼo̩wo̩ aje̩tachi tugbo okuta Rimo̩n le̩, oñ ma jʼef okuta Rimo̩n le̩ ochu me̩le̩.

Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ño̩ rida abʼamo̩ma Be̩njamin ma ge̩, oñ ma nʼalu ugbada gwo ma dajane̩, tʼabo ewo le̩ chaka tʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, tʼe̩wñ du ku ma li; anubile̩ ge̩, ewo ewo du ku ma li ma fʼu gujo.
Aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l la go Mizpa kakini, E̩ne̩ du ef uwa adʼo̩ma-wñ ñw e̩ne̩ Be̩njamin nʼe̩ o̩ya n.
Tak amone̩ le̩ lewa Be̩te̩l, oñ ma kwogugu o̩gba O̩jo̩ o̩mo̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩, ma la chi omu-ma nyʼate̩ araku anyianyi.
Ma kakini, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, abile kʼe̩wñ-i watuno Israe̩l, ka kʼo̩lo̩pu Israe̩lʼka muchi eñini?
Tak i lewatu o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, amone̩ le̩ takpa kwane̩, oñ ma fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne o̩mo̩, taku ma kwokʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa che.

Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼef abo o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka kʼi ma wʼef ujeju le̩ ugbo Jihofa n? Todu ma go̩ elile nʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ma dufu wa ñwu Jihofa Mizpa le̩ n, ma go̩ kakini, Ma adʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kpa chuu.
O̩la Be̩njamin, o̩maye-ma le̩, wo̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l, oñ ma kakini, O̩lo̩puʼka muko̩da bʼIsrae̩l te̩ eñini-i me̩!
Ab a achʼo̩la o̩ya tod abo-ma ki bo̩bo̩ le̩? Abu kʼa fu Jihofa go̩ ka kʼa akʼamo̩ma-wa ñwu ma ku ma nʼe̩ chʼo̩ya n?
Taku ma kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼef abo o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l kʼi ma te̩gu wa ñwu Jihofa Mizpa le̩ n? E̩ la go, i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki kwo Jebe̩sh-gilead wa uru ugbo ujeju le̩ n.
Todu e̩gba ku ma fʼamone̩ le̩ kaluka, go, e̩ne̩ du kʼi dodo Jebe̩sh-gilead dʼo̩mo̩ n.

Tak abo o̩gbadu le̩ fʼamagbiti icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji ku ma nʼuwohi tule kpe̩ nyʼo̩mo̩, oñ ma ñwa ñwu ma kakini, Lo, ku me̩ nʼalu ugbada fʼabo ku ma dodo Jebe̩sh-gilead gwodajane̩, manyʼabobule̩-ma manyʼabo-ma egini.
E̩wñ ku me̩ ache de̩ kakini, Me̩ ki mʼaboke̩le̩ du kpai abobule̩ du ku ma bʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ dachi kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko
Taku ma fʼamo̩ma igbe̩le̩ ulo̩ko̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n li ef abo ku ma dodo Jebe̩sh-gilead; oñ ma mʼuma ko wa uru Shailo kʼi dʼojane̩ Kenan le̩.
Tak abo o̩gbadu le̩ chaka fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ rʼamo̩ma Be̩njamin ku ma jʼef okuta Rimo̩n le̩, oñ ma fʼakoya ure̩do̩ ta ñwu ma.
Tak abo Be̩njamin mudabiwa iko le̩; oñ ma mʼabobule̩ ku ma jadu oji-ma kwef abobule̩ Jebe̩sh-gilead le̩, ko ñwu ma; abobule̩ le̩ muda lʼuma de n.
Oñ o̩la Be̩njamin wo̩ amone̩ le̩, todabu ki Jihofa fʼowe chete̩ ef o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l.
Tak abogijo abo o̩gbadu le̩ kakini, Ab a ache o̩la o̩ya tod abo ki bo̩, abu kʼabobule̩ chihi bi Be̩njamin te̩?
Taku ma kakini, E̩wñ ogu ade̩ tod abo Be̩njamin ki fu tane̩ tila, todu kʼo̩lo̩puʼka kʼi we ekpalu bʼefu Israe̩l te̩.
A muda aneke kʼo̩ya ñwu ma kwef amo̩ma e-wa n; todu amo̩ma Israe̩l go̩ le̩, kakini, Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼo̩ya ñw abo Be̩njamin.

Taku ma kakini, Go, uje̩wñ uyo̩ e-Jihofa ade̩ Shailo o̩do̩ da o̩do̩ da, owñ chʼe-kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ Be̩te̩l, o̩wo̩ olodudu ikpadala kʼi akwo Be̩te̩l anyi She̩ke̩m, kpa; o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ Lebona le̩.
Taku ma ñwa ñw amo̩ma Be̩njamin le̩ kakini, Me̩ lo, ku me̩ maja jo̩ ef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩;

me̩ tejane̩, me̩ la go, iche̩wñ kʼamo̩ma igbe̩le̩ Shailo dufu wa ku ma tido ef iya le̩, e̩gbale̩ me̩ kwʼef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ dufu wa, kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼi mʼo̩ya ñw o̩la-wñ kwef amo̩ma Shailo le̩, tak i adabi tʼane̩ Be̩njamin.

Tak i awatu, e̩gba kʼamata-ma abe̩k amo̩maye-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ lewa ku ma rʼuwa aino̩, e̩gbale̩ a aka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼu ko chʼuwa ele n? Todabu ka ma gba o̩ya todu ma okoke ef ogu le̩ n, i la chʼame̩ ko ñwu ma n; cho̩kpo̩ni me̩ ma fʼabi je̩ me̩.

Tak amo̩ma Be̩njamin fʼabe̩le̩ che, oñ aluka-ma fʼo̩ya dinya ñw o̩la-ma kwef abo ku ma tido le̩, oñ ma mʼuma ko le; taku ma mudabi le tʼugbo e̩wñ ogu-ma, ma la fʼewo ewo le̩ ko̩, oñ ma kwododo ef uwñ.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l kwʼo̩mo̩ le iko le̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼugbo abo o̩lo̩pu-wñ kpai ugbo abo unyi-wñ, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu nyʼugbo e̩wñ ogu-wñ.
Iko kʼa ka le̩, onu du dʼIsrae̩li n: e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ache e̩wñ ki nyo̩ o̩la-wñ eju.
Oñ i lewa, iko kʼamakajo̩ nʼo̩da le̩, ukpo̩ta dʼoj ane̩ le̩ akpa. Tak e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m e-Judaʼka nyʼage̩ne̩ ane̩ Moab, owñ kpai o̩ya-wñ kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ meji.
Odu e̩ne̩ le̩ ko̩ Elime̩le̩k, odu o̩ya-wñ la ko̩ Neomi. Odu amo̩ma-wñ meji la ko̩ Malo̩n kpai Chilio̩n. Abo E̩frat e-Be̩tle̩he̩m e-Juda ma che. Ma lewa ane̩ Moab, oñ ma kpo̩kpe̩ o̩mo̩.
Tak Elime̩le̩k, o̩ko̩ Neomi, leku, oñ i bo̩ owñ kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ meji.
Taku ma fʼabobule̩ Moab le̩ ne̩ chʼo̩ya; odu e̩ne̩ʼka ko̩ O̩rpa, odu ekeji-wñ la ko̩ Rutu. Oñ ma gugu o̩mo̩ dab o̩do̩ me̩gwa.
Taku Malo̩n kpai Chilio̩n, ejeji-ma, leku. Abe̩le̩ amo̩ma-wñ meji kpai o̩ko̩-wñ leku bʼonobule̩ le̩ te̩.
Tak owñ kpai amo̩ya amo̩ma-wñ kwane̩, kʼi mudabi bʼojane̩ Moab te̩, todu i gbo̩ ane̩ Moab le̩ abu ki Jihofa lewa fejudo abo-wñ, kʼi la mʼuje̩wñ ko ñwu ma.
Abe̩le̩ owñ kpai amo̩ya amo̩ma-wñ meji kwʼugbo ku ma jo̩ le̩. Oñ ma kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩ ku ma mudabi tʼane̩ Juda.
Neomi muda ka ñw amo̩ya amo̩ma-wñ meji le̩ kakini, Me̩ lo, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki mudabi tʼunyi iye-wñ. Jihofa ki mo̩la ñwu me̩, alu ku me̩ che kpai abo ki ku le̩, kpai omi ge̩.
Jihofa ki je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki li uñmi ef unyi o̩ko̩-wñ. Tak i dʼalu ko̩ ma alu. Oñ ma chi omu-ma nyate̩ araku.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, O̩da, a alebʼuwe̩ dabi tʼugbo abo-we̩.
Oñ Neomi kakini, Me̩ mudabi, amo̩ma-mi! E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ ale bʼumi? Omi ño̩ nʼo̩ma efu ku ma achʼo̩ko̩-me̩ ta?
Me̩ mudabi amo̩ma-mi; me̩ lo me̩; omi chʼogijo tʼo̩ko̩ ene̩ le me̩. Omi ma kakini, U chenʼukibeno ta, u chaka nʼo̩ko̩ odu eñini kʼu ño̩ fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi,
ame̩ jʼaje̩do̩ gbogbo taku ma gba kpa? Ame̩ jʼawe enʼo̩ko̩ anede e-le̩? O̩da, amo̩ma-mi, todu e̩do̩-mi kpabie̩ nana todu me̩. Todu o̩wo̩ Jihofa kwodufu achagwunyʼumi me̩.
Taku ma ño̩ chʼomuma nyate̩ araku ge̩. Tak O̩rpa dʼalu ko̩ iye o̩ko̩-wñ alu, Rutu muda kutʼofe.
Tak i kakini, Go, o̩ya o̩maye o̩ko̩-we̩ mudabi tʼugbo abo-wñ kpai o̩jo̩-wñ me̩; mudabi tʼo̩ya o̩maye o̩ko̩we̩ ubi ke.
Taku Rutu kakini, E̩ ki kʼumi e̩che̩ kʼu tʼe̩ no̩ n, kʼu dabi bʼuwe̩ ubi te̩ n; todu ugbo du kʼuwe̩ anyi, nanyi; ugbo kʼe̩ ru, naru; abo-we̩ achʼabo-mi, O̩jo̩-we̩ la achʼO̩jo̩ e-mi;
ugbo kʼuwe̩ aku, o̩mo̩ naku, o̩mo̩ ma la adʼumi ji. Iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ omune̩ tʼuku le fʼuwe̩ kpʼomi daru, Jihofa ki fʼabe̩le̩ che mi kpai e-ki tʼe-i le̩ ge̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi li ka kʼibe-wñ kad elo kpai owñ ogbolo, i tʼo̩la eka ñw u no̩.
Abe̩le̩ ama meji le gbogbo taku ma lewa Be̩tle̩he̩m. Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ku ma lewa Be̩tle̩he̩m, o̩chaka abo ewo le̩ mudutu nyʼuma o̩la. Abobule̩ kakini, Neomi de̩?
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ki do̩ mi ko̩ Neomi n, me̩ do̩ mi ko̩ Mara ; todu Odobao̩gagu fʼe̩wñ urikoko ololo che kpai omi me̩.
E̩ko̩ e̩ko̩ oñ u ledufu, Jihofa la mʼumi du dabi wʼunyi o̩wo̩ ofo. E̩wñ chi ku me̩ do̩ mi ko̩ Neomi, abu ki Jihofa la gba ibenu nyʼumi, kʼOdobao̩gagu la che mi o̩bata?
Abe̩le̩ Neomi mudabiwa. Rutu e̩ne̩ Moab kʼi chʼo̩ya o̩ma-wñ laño̩ dabi kwo ojane̩ Moab le̩ wa ge̩. Oñ ma lewa Be̩tle̩he̩m iko ku ma chane̩ eja o̩ka barli.
Neomi la nʼefu o̩ko̩-wñ oka, e̩nugbiti kʼi nʼo̩ko̩ nana i che. Abo o̩lo̩pu Elime̩le̩k i che. Odu-wñ la ko̩ Boaz.
Taku Rutu, e̩ne̩ Moab le̩, ka ñwu Neomi kakini, Je̩ ñwu mi nyʼoko kʼu ja o̩ka tʼe̩ne̩ ki ali mi eju ubi. Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Lo, o̩ma-mi.
Tak i le, oñ i lewa oko aja tʼabo ku ma kpa ubi. I la nʼejile alewa anʼukpe̩ uche̩ Boaz kʼi chʼabo o̩lo̩pu Elime̩le̩k.
E̩ la go, Boaz kwo Be̩tle̩he̩m wa, oñ i ka ñw abo ku ma kpʼo̩ka kakini, Jihofa ki dʼugbo me̩. Oñ ma dohi ñw kakini, Jihofa ki de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩!
Taki Boaz ka ñw e̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ kʼabo ku ma kpʼo̩ka le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ kakini, Igbe̩le̩ e-e̩ne̩ de̩-i?
Tak e̩nuko̩lo̩ kʼabo ku ma kpʼo̩ka le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ dohi kakini, Igbe̩le̩ abo Moab kʼowñ kpai Neomi kpe̩re̩ kwʼane̩ Moab wa de̩.
Owñ le̩ kakini, Agba, e̩ je̩ ñwu mi jʼo̩ka kʼu fʼu yajo̩ atʼabo ku ma kpa ubi aido aido. Oñ i lewa, oñ i te̩tadʼemi akwʼodudu gbogbo wʼifai, chai e̩du kʼi che ef unyi pe̩.
Taku Boaz ka ñwu Rutu kakini, O̩ma-mi, e̩ gbo̩? E̩ ki nyʼaja ef uche̩ omune̩ n. E̩ ki tʼemi le n. E̩ ki muda dʼemi ugbo abo igbe̩le̩-mi anane̩.
E̩ dʼeju-we̩ le bʼuche̩ o̩ka ku ma kpa kʼe̩ tʼuma ubi. U fʼuko̩ te̩ ñw abokolobia ku ma we edo̩wo̩kadʼuwe̩ n? Alugbe̩ akpʼe̩ e̩ nyʼugbo añmo̩i kʼe̩ ñmo̩ omi kʼabokolobia le̩ kpa.
Tak i fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ i dʼoji kadane̩, i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ li mi eju? kʼe̩ dʼibe te̩ mi, omi kʼu chʼononojo-i?

Taku Boaz dohi ñw u kakini, E̩wñ du kʼe̩ che ñw iye o̩ko̩-we̩ akwʼe̩gba kʼo̩ko̩-we̩ leku, ma du ña mi chaka; kpai alu kʼe̩ tʼata-we̩ kpai iye-we̩ kpai ane̩ ugbo ku ma jʼubi-we̩, no̩, kʼe̩ lewa ugbo amone̩ kʼe̩ ma ma ma kwo ubi n.
Jihofa ki rʼo̩me̩ uko̩lo̩-we̩ ñw e̩, Jihofa ki la dʼakoji ñw e̩ e̩ko̩, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l e-kʼe̩ lewa kʼe̩ gbʼo̩la-we̩ nyi ef ika-wñ.
Tak i kakini, Uwe̩ ki li mi eju, odumi; todubu kʼe̩ fʼumi e̩do̩ nyi, todabu kʼo̩la-we̩ la kwo tʼadu-we̩ igbe̩le̩-i e̩do̩, dagba u chaka ma dʼef amadu-we̩ abigbe̩le̩-i n.

Tak e̩gba kʼiko uje̩wñ jo̩ Boaz ka ñw u kakini, Lewa emi, kʼe̩ bʼuje̩wñ je̩, kʼe̩ bʼo̩we̩ o̩je̩-we̩ tunyʼomi e̩ka ki de̩. Tak i kwoguane̩ kpenyʼabo ku ma kpʼo̩ka, oñ i mʼo̩ka e̩ro̩ du nʼo̩wo̩ dala ñw u, oñ i je̩, efu-wñ la ko̩, oñ i tʼe̩bo̩bo̩ no̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi kwane̩ kʼi jʼo̩ka, Boaz hi abokolobia-wñ owu kakini, Me̩ tʼowñ no̩ kʼi ja ugbo oti le̩, me̩ ki bʼo̩ ina n.
Me̩ ki ño̩ tʼe̩bo̩bo̩ no̩ jʼane̩ ojʼinata-wñ ñw u. Me̩ je̩ ñw u ja, me̩ ki dejurʼu n.
Abe̩le̩ i fʼo̩ka ja oko le̩ gbogbo wʼolane̩; tak i f e-wñ kʼi ja gwu, i dab e̩ñwa e̩fa o̩ka barliʼka.
Tak i mʼu du oñ i nyʼef ewo le̩; iye o̩ko̩-wñ la fʼe-kʼi ja li; i mʼe-kʼi je̩ bo̩ e̩gba kʼefu-wñ ko̩ le̩ ko dufu ñw u.

Tak iye o̩ko̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo e̩ ja eñini? Ugbo e̩ la che uko̩lo̩-i? O̩jo̩ ki de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi fʼibe tʼe̩ le̩. Tak i fʼe̩ne̩ kʼi chʼuko̩lo̩ ugbo-wñ jiwe ñw iye o̩ko̩-wñ, oñ i kakini, Odu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼu chʼuko̩lo̩ ugbo-wñ eñini ko̩ Boaz.
Taku Neomi ka ñw o̩ya o̩ma-wñ kakini, Jihofa ki de̩nyo̩ ñw u, owñ ki ma tʼemo̩la ñw abo ki deju kpai abo ki ku no̩ ni. Taku Neomi ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ le̩ chʼefu-wa anane̩, i nʼo̩da e̩gba wa tane̩.
Taku Rutu e̩ne̩ Moab le̩ kakini, I ño̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, Uwe̩ ki me̩rʼabokolobia-mi anane̩, gbogbo taku ma mʼe̩wñ oko-mi ko wʼunyi kpa.
Taku Neomi ka ñwu Rutu, o̩ya o̩ma-wñ kakini, I nyo̩, o̩ma-mi, kʼe̩ dufu lebʼabigbe̩le̩-wñ, kʼone̩ ki we eke̩re̩bʼe̩ ef uche̩ omune̩.
Abe̩le̩ i hi me̩rʼabigbe̩le̩ Boaz kʼi ja kpai ama, gbogbo taku ma kʼo̩ka barli kpai wit wʼunyi kpa; i la gugu ugbo iye o̩ko̩-wñ.
Taku Neomi, iye o̩ko̩-wñ, ka ñw u kakini, O̩ma-mi, i chʼe-kʼu natene uña uñmi ñw e̩, todu ki ra ñw e̩ n? Boaz, kʼe̩ dʼugbo abigbe̩le̩-wñ le̩, chʼefu-wa de̩ n?
Go, i do̩mo̩ akpʼo̩ka barli tuka oj ajita ugwo̩ka odu-i.
Todule̩ e̩ fʼo̩la gwe̩, kʼe̩ dʼekpo kurʼo̩la; tak e̩ kʼukpo bʼo̩la ma, kʼe̩ la gwo̩ru nyʼugbo ajita ugwo̩ka le̩; e̩ muda je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ fʼe̩ li n, gbogbo tak i fʼe̩wñ je̩ kʼi laño̩ ñmo̩ kpa.
E̩gba kʼi muda kwodachi e̩ fʼeju kʼugbo kʼi dachi hi, tak e̩ nyʼejefu kʼe̩ mʼukpo ko bʼe̩re̩-wñ te̩, kʼe̩ kwodachi; tak i aka ñw e̩ e̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ache.
I dohi ñw u kakini, E̩wñ du kʼe̩ ka nache.
Tak i gwo̩ru nyʼugbo ajita ugwo̩ka le̩, oñ i che alu kʼiye o̩ko̩-wñ ka ñw u chaka.
Tak e̩gba ki Boaz fʼuje̩wñ je̩ kʼi la fʼomi ñmo̩, kʼe̩do̩-wñ la bo̩, i le nyʼadachi o̩wo̩ʼka o̩ka ku ma ko jo̩ le̩. Tak onobule̩ le̩ le ye̩ye̩ wa, i la mʼukpo ka bʼe̩re̩-wñ te̩, oñ i kwodachi.
Oñ i lewatu alumeji odu, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ jagigili, tak i mʼo̩la-wñ rida; e̩ la go, onobule̩ʼka dachi e̩re̩-wñ!
I kakini, Uwe̩ e̩ne̩ de̩? Oñ i kakini, Omi Rutu adu-we̩ onobule̩ de̩; e̩ fʼeti ukpo-we̩ nadala bʼadu-we̩ onobule̩-i ma, todu uwe̩ nʼo̩da kʼe̩ gba wa tane̩.
Oñ i kakini, Jihofa ki de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩, o̩ma-mi, emo̩la kʼe̩ mo̩la ubiane̩-i tʼe-ejodudu le todabu kʼe̩ ma tʼabo okolobia ubi n, i chaka chʼe̩nubie̩, i chaka chʼanana.
Fai o̩ma-mi, e̩ ki railo n; e̩wñ du kʼe̩ ka nache ñw e̩, todu abo ewo-mi chaka chema ka kʼonobule̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩ che.
Ochochi, omi chenʼo̩da egba me̩ tane̩, i muda nʼe̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩da e̩gba me̩ tane̩ tʼumi le ta.

E̩ le̩ emi eñini ta, tak odudu, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ jʼagbʼe̩ tane̩, i nyo̩, owñ ki che alu ki chʼukpe̩ kʼefu pio̩o̩ ache ke; i muda che̩wñ kʼi ma jʼagbʼe̩ tane̩ n, e̩gbale̩ tak u nagbʼe̩ tane̩, oji Jihofa! Kwodachi gbʼodudu ta.
Abe̩le̩ i dachi e̩re̩-wñ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩, oñ e̩gba kʼi kwane̩ one̩ la amʼone̩ e̩gba le̩ ta n; todu i kakini, Je̩ ñw one̩ ki ma ka kʼonobule̩-i wʼugbo ajita ugwo̩ka-i n.
Tak i kakini, E̩ dʼukpo ki bʼoji-we̩ ma le̩ wa kʼe̩ gwo̩nyʼu te̩; oñ i gwo̩nyu tak e̩ne̩ le̩ fʼe̩ñwa o̩ka barli me̩fa ñwa nyʼu, i la mʼu du nʼo ika; tak i nyʼef ewo.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi lewa ugbo iye o̩ko̩-wñ, i kakini, Ab e̩ le, o̩ma-mi? Tak i mʼe̩wñ du kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ che ñw u du ka ñw u.
I kakini, E̩ñwa o̩ka barli me̩fa-i, i ñwa ñwu mi, todu i kakini, E̩ ki nyʼugbo iye o̩ko̩-we̩ o̩wo̩-ofo n.
Tak i kakini, Guguane̩ ye̩e̩, o̩ma-mi, gbogbo tak e̩ ma alu kʼo̩la le̩ ade̩, todu e̩ne̩ le̩ añmi gbogbo tak i fʼe̩wñ le̩ che kpa eñini-i n.
Taku Boaz mute̩gu nyʼalaku, oñ kwoguguane̩ o̩mo̩; e̩ la go, e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩da egba ma tane̩ ki Boaz kʼo̩la-wñ le̩ alale; oñ i kakini, Uwe̩ ki alo-i, na emi, kʼe̩ guguane̩; oñ i muna aguguane̩.
Tak i mʼabogijo me̩gwa ewo le̩ ko wa, oñ i kakini, Me̩ gugu emi. Oñ ma kwoguguane̩.
Tak i ka ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩da egba ma tane̩ le̩ kakini, Neomi, e-kʼi dabi kwʼane̩ Moab wa, ache kʼi bʼane̩ kʼo̩maye-wa Elime̩le̩k ne̩ le̩ ta.

Oñ ibe ka ñwu mi kʼu nadʼo̩la le̩ tʼuwe̩ e̩ti, kakini, Uwe̩ ki mʼu gba la eju abo ku ma gugu emi, kpai eju abogijo abo-mi-i. Iche̩wñ ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ gba tane̩, mʼu gba tane̩ ke; i muda che̩wñ ki ma dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ gba tane̩ n, mak e̩ ka ñwu mi, kʼu ma; todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi agba tane̩ tʼuwe̩ le n, tak omi ro̩nʼe̩. Tak i kakini, Omi agba tane̩.
Taku Boaz kakini. E̩ fʼuche̩ ki dʼo̩wo̩ Neomi le̩ la, maku Rutu, e̩ne̩ Moab kʼi chʼo̩ya e̩ne̩ ki ku le̩, e̩ ñʼala manyʼu o̩jo̩ le̩ chuu, kʼe̩ dʼodu e̩ne̩ kʼi ku le̩ kwane̩ tʼoji e̩wñ ogu-wñ.
Tak e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩da egba ma tane̩ le̩, kakini, U neke gba tane̩ ñw o̩la-mi n, tode̩gba kʼu nakpa e̩wñ ogu-mi onugo bie̩. Uwe̩ ki mʼo̩da e̩gba tane̩ e-mi du, todu u neke gba tane̩ n.
E̩wñ kʼabo Israe̩l che igbegbele ugbo e̩wñ e̩gbatane̩ abe̩k e̩wñ ekpailo̩ ku ma fʼo̩la le̩ lonyane̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, One̩ mʼe̩da-wñ gwo̩ kʼi mʼu du ñw ekeji-wñ, tak e-le̩ mud ijali-wa ojane̩ Israe̩l.
Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩da egba ma tane̩ le̩ ka ñwu Boaz kakini, Kwo la ñw o̩la-we̩ ke, oñ i mʼe̩da-wñ gwo̩.
Taki Boaz ka ñwu abogijo, kpai amone̩ le̩ chaka kakini, Ame̩ chʼame̩nibenu eñini-i ka kʼomi fʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼe-Elime̩le̩k kpai e̩wñ du ki chʼe-Chilio̩n kpai e-Malo̩n la o̩wo̩ Neomi me̩.

Anubile̩ ge̩, omi ño̩ fu Rutu, e̩ne̩ Moab kʼi chʼo̩ya Malo̩n le̩ la kʼi chʼo̩ya-mi, kʼu dʼodu e̩ne̩ ki ku kwane̩ oji e̩wñ ogu-wñ, kʼodu e̩ne̩ ki ku le̩ ki we elu bʼef amo̩maye-wñ te̩, kpai alaku uña-wñ; ame̩ chʼame̩nibenu eñini-i.

Tak o̩chaka amone̩ ku ma jʼalaku le̩ kpai abogijo kakini, Awa chʼame̩nibenu. Jihofa ki je̩ ñw onobule̩ ki awʼef unyi-we̩-i kʼi dabu Reche̩l kpai Lea, kʼama meji le̩ fʼunyi Israe̩l biko le̩. E̩ ki fʼukpahiu ne̩ E̩frata, kʼe̩ mud e̩nuwohi Be̩tle̩he̩m;
unyi-we̩ ki la dab unyi Pe̩re̩z, e̩ne̩ ku Temar bi ñwu Juda le̩, noj ugbe̩ ki Jihofa ako ñw e̩ ugbo igbe̩le̩-i.
Abe̩le̩ Boaz mi Rutu du, oñ i mud o̩ya-wñ; tak i nyʼejefu ugbo-wñ oñ Jihofa je̩ ñw u fefunyo̩, tak i fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi.
Tak abobule̩ le̩ ka ñwu Neomi kakini, Jihofa ki nele, owñ kʼi ma tʼuwe̩ no̩ kʼe̩ we enʼefu o̩pio̩o̩ eñini-i n; odu-wñ ki nʼuwohi ane̩ Israe̩l.
Owñ la achʼe̩ne̩ kʼi arʼuwe̩ iñmi ko, kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi ane̩ uwe̩ o̩jo̩-we̩; todu o̩ya o̩ma-we̩ kʼi afe̩do̩ we̩ le̩, kʼi chenyo̩ ñw e̩ tʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mebie le, owñ le̩ fʼu bi.
Taki Neomi mʼo̩ma le̩ du, i la mʼu du mʼe̩do̩-wñ, oñ i ne̩ gba.
Tak amekeji-wñ, abobule̩ le̩, mʼodu du ñw u, ma kakini, Ma fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi ñwu Neomi me̩. Ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Obe̩d; owñ chʼata Je̩si kʼi chʼata Defid.
O̩gba o̩gba Pe̩re̩z le̩ de̩: Pe̩re̩z bi He̩zro̩n,
He̩zro̩n, la bi Ram, Ram la bi Aminadab,
Aminadab la bi Nesho̩n, Nesho̩n la bi Salmo̩n,
Salmo̩n la bi Boaz, Boaz la bi Obe̩d,
Obe̩d la bi Je̩si, Je̩si la bi Defid.
E̩ne̩ Ramataim-zofim oka do̩mo̩, abo ane̩ uwo Ifraim i che. Odu-wñ la ko̩ E̩lkana, o̩ma Je̩roham o̩ma E̩laihiu o̩ma Tohi o̩ma Zuf e̩ne̩ Ifraim ge̩.
Owñ la nʼamo̩ya meji; ma dʼodu oka ko̩ Hana, odu ekeji la ko̩ Penina. Penina nʼo̩ma, Hana muda ne̩ n.
Oñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩-i akwʼewo-wñ te̩gu nyi Shailo o̩do̩ tʼo̩do̩ du kʼi dojikane̩, kʼi ño̩ chʼiche̩bo̩ ñwu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, Shailo. Amo̩ma Ilai meji, Hofni kpai Finehas, la chʼamatama Jihofa jʼo̩mo̩.
Oñ o̩jo̩ kʼE̩lkana achʼiche̩bo̩-wñ i mʼukpe̩ ukpe̩ ko ñwu Penina o̩ya-wñ kpʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ chaka.
I muda kʼukpe̩ meji ñwu Hana, todu i afe̩do̩-wñ dagba Jihofa chaka fʼo̩na o̩ma ebi-wñ re.
Obugu-wñ la kicha o̩ma ñw u kʼi kpʼo̩ e̩do̩ bie̩, todabu ki Jihofa fʼo̩na o̩ma ebi-wñ re.
Abe̩le̩ i la de̩ o̩do̩ tʼo̩do̩ du. Iko du kʼi te̩gu nyʼunyi Jihofa i nʼicha o̩ma aka ñw u.
Todule̩ i kworaku oñ i ko̩ ejʼe̩wñ. Tak E̩lkana, o̩ko̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Hana, e̩wñ chʼe̩ aku? E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma je̩ e̩wñ n? E̩wñ chi kʼe̩do̩-we̩ kpabie̩ abe̩i? Omi nyo̩ ñw e̩ tʼamo̩ma me̩gwa le n?
Oñ abu ku ma fʼe̩wñ je̩ ku ma la ñmo̩ Shailo o̩mo̩, Hana kwane̩. (Ilai, atama la gugu oji e̩wñ ugbo oli alugbo̩na unyi Jihofa.)
E̩do̩dudu onobule̩ le̩ la tabale, oñ i narodubo̩ Jihofa, i naraku anyanyi.

Tak i go kakini, O Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ jʼago o̩bata adu-we̩ onobule̩-i ochochi, kʼe̩ la adibekado mi, kʼe̩ ma agbenyo̩ adu-we̩ onobule̩-i n, kʼuwe̩ jʼadʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ñw adu-we̩ onobule̩-i, mak omi adʼu ñwu Jihofa o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-wñ kade; abe̩ du la akad oji-wñ n.
Abu kʼi nachadua o̩gba Jihofa alo waa le̩, Ilai kejurʼalu-wñ.
Oñ Hana naka ef e̩do̩-wñ; uko-wñ nachiche̩, ma muda gbo̩ uko̩la-wñ n; oñ Ilai do̩ ka kʼo̩te̩ fʼu mu.
Todule̩ Ilai ka ñw u kakini, Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ o̩te̩ amʼuwe̩ kade? Mʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ du tinyo̩ bʼo̩la-we̩ te̩.
Ama Hana dohi kakini, O̩da, odu-mi; onobule̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ ma nyo̩ n u che. Tʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma tʼo̩te̩ una, u ñmʼejeji-wñ n, chai onugo e̩do̩-mi oñ u du da jʼane̩ o̩gba Jihofa-i.
Uwe̩ ki do̩ ka kʼadu-we̩ onobule̩-i chʼe̩nebili n. Todu u te̩tako̩la kwef aye ki dʼef e̩do̩-mi ololo kpʼicha o̩ma ku ma ka ñwu mi.
Tak Ilai dohi kakini, Lo kpʼure̩do̩; O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ki la dʼebi kʼe̩ bi ugbo-wñ ñw e̩.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ kakini, Uwe̩ ki li adu-we̩ onobule̩-i eju dee. Tak onobule̩ le wñ, i la fʼe̩wñ je̩, oñ eju-wñ ño̩ kpa ge̩ n.
Ma takpa kwane̩ odudu o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ oñ ma dojikane̩ o̩gba Jihofa. Taku ma mudabi tʼunyi-ma Rama. E̩lkana la fʼo̩ya-wñ, Hana, ma; Jihofa la dibekadʼo.
Oñ e̩gba kʼiko-wñ jo̩ Hana fʼefu nyo̩ oñ i fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi. I la dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Samiue̩l, Ukpe̩ kʼu bi ebi o̩ma le̩ ugbo Jihofa, i ka.
Tak E̩lkana, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩, manyʼabunyi-wñ chaka nyʼakʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ o̩do̩ wa ñw O̩jo̩ kpʼoji kʼi da.
Hana muda le n; todu i ka ñw o̩ko̩-wñ kakini, Chai e̩gba kʼo̩ma-i mʼalu e̩nya da, tak u nadʼu wa todu kʼi kwote̩ o̩gba Jihofa, kʼi gugu o̩mo̩ ogbegbele̩.

Oñ E̩lkana, o̩ko̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ du ki chenyo̩ tule eju-we̩ e-le̩ e̩ che ke. Guane̩ gbogbo tak i mʼalu e̩nya da: Jihofa ki fʼo̩la-wñ lonyane̩ dee. Oñ onobule̩ le̩ dʼe̩re̩ ma ubi, i la dʼe̩nya ñw o̩ma-wñ ñmo̩ gbogbo tak i mʼalu e̩nya da.
Tak e̩gba kʼi mʼalu e̩nya da, i mʼowñ du le manyʼamo̩kokuno̩ me̩ta, kpʼomu e̩ñwa e̩faʼka, kpʼaiko omi achiwebe̩te̩ma, oñ i mʼowñ du wʼunyi Jihofa, Shailo.
I la chʼimo̩to̩ kekele ta. Taku ma fʼo̩kokuno̩ kpa, oñ ma dʼo̩ma le̩ wʼugbo Ilai.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ kakini, O odu-mi, Oji-we̩! Odu-mi, omi, onobule̩ ki dago ugbo we̩ emi arodubo̩ Jihofa le̩ de̩.
Tod o̩ma-i oñ u rodubʼo̩; Jihofa la mʼebi kʼu biʼi du ñwu mi me̩:
todule̩ omi ño̩ mʼowñ du me̩ ñwu Jihofa; alu du kʼudeju-wñ de̩ kade u mʼu du me̩ ñwu Jihofa. Tak i dojikane̩ ñwu Jihofa o̩mo̩.
Taku Hana kwochadua, i kakini, E̩do̩-mi nagwoguyo̩ efu Jihofa; igba-mi dago efu Jihofa. Alu-mi chʼe̩chi te̩ bʼame̩nebi-mi ma, todu nayo̩ ef ujadu-we̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi afo̩ dabu Jihofa de̩ n, e̩ne̩ omune̩ do̩mo̩ tʼuwe̩ le n; i la nʼokuta du dab O̩jo̩-wa n.
E̩ ki ko̩la uba uba abe̩le̩ ge̩ n, o̩la eke ki dufu alu-we̩ n; todu Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩ ki ma e̩wñ, i la añwa e̩wñ kʼone̩ che go.
O̩o̩do̩ o̩o̩do̩ amagbiti muguche̩ me̩, ukpahiu muda lʼago abo ku ma ke̩re̩ de.

Abo kʼefu-ma te̩te̩ko̩ akwoubi mʼo̩la-ma ko jʼef o̩wo̩ amone̩ achuko̩lo̩ tod uje̩wñ, oñ abo kʼebi te̩te̩kpa ma, i ño̩ kpa ma ge̩ n. I-i, agaji fʼo̩ma mebie bi me̩, onobule̩ ki la nʼamo̩ma wewe le̩ mud awule̩.
Jihofa akpʼone̩, i ñʼadʼone̩ daji ge̩; i adʼone̩ gwo̩ru gbogbo nyʼef O̩je̩gu, i lañʼadʼu kwʼo̩mo̩ wa ge̩.
Jihofa adʼone̩ chʼe̩ne̩gbo, i adʼone̩ chʼanana, i ahi one̩ wane̩, i lañʼahiʼu dago ge̩.
I adʼe̩nubie̩ kwane̩ kwef ebutu; i adʼe̩nale kwane̩ kwʼojeita, kʼi mʼuma ko gugu ef ame̩numo̩la, ku ma la je̩ ugugu ojima. Todu agbamune̩ ane̩-ile̩-i chʼe-Jihofa, i la mʼile̩ du gugu oji-wñ.
I ade e̩re̩ abo-wñ ku ma kpe̩do̩rʼuwñ, ma muda aje̩ ñw ame̩ne̩bibi chechi jo̩ ef e̩chubi; todu i chʼukpahiu aje̩ ñw one̩ du n.
E̩do̩ abo ku ma je̩ Jihofa iñwa ada kpu; i ako̩la akpabana rʼuma oji efojale. Jihofa akajo̩ ukpoji ukpoji ane̩-ile̩; i la adʼukpahiu ñw onu-wñ, i adʼigba e̩ne̩-wñ kʼi fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji dago.
Tak E̩lkana le tʼunyi-wñ Rama. Oñ imo̩to̩ le̩ nache e̩wñ ñw Jihofa eju Ilai atama le̩.
Amo̩ma Ilai e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ la chʼame̩nebili; Jihofa kpʼe̩wñ ki chʼeju-wñ kʼamatama ki gba o̩wo̩ amone̩ la wʼuma eju n.
E̩gba du kʼone̩ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa, abu kʼe̩la-wñ gugu una ana, imo̩to̩ atama nʼagana abenyi me̩ta o̩wo̩ wa,
oñ i fʼe-le̩ ro̩ nyʼucha abe̩k uchade̩ abe̩k ugba kʼe̩la jʼef uwñ; e-du kʼagana le̩ mudu dufu, atama mʼu gba ñw o̩la-wñ; abu ku ma che abo Israe̩l du ku ma wa Shailo o̩mo̩ de̩.
Ochochi, o̩gba taku ma gu ula-wñ jo, imo̩to̩ atama awa ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa le̩ kakini, Dʼe̩la wa ku ma ro̩ ñw atama je̩, todu i jʼagbʼe̩la e̩hi ugbo we̩ n, chai e̩la emimi.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Ama ki gu ula-wñ jo ejodudu tak e̩ mʼalu du ki rʼe̩ e̩do̩ du; i adohi kakini, O̩da, uwe̩ ki dʼu ñwu mi abajo̩-i, cho̩kpo̩ni nagba ukpahiu.
Adure abokolobia le̩ la tabale eju Jihofa, todu abo le̩ chʼe̩de̩te̩ e̩wñ ele eko wa ñwu Jihofa.
Samiue̩l la do̩mo̩ ache e̩wñ o̩gba Jihofa, imo̩to̩ kʼe̩fo̩d line̩n efufu lʼo ago de i che.
Iye-wñ la agʼafe̩ ke̩ke̩ wa ñw u o̩do̩ tʼo̩do̩ du e̩gba kʼowñ kpʼo̩ko̩-wñ kpe̩re̩ wa ku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ o̩do̩ wa.
Tak Ilai kadua ñw E̩lkana kpʼo̩ya-wñ, kakini, Jihofa ki dʼugbe̩ ñw e̩ lugbo onobule̩-i, todu ebi kʼi bi Jihofa le̩. Taku ma le tʼunyi-ma.
Oñ Jihofa nyʼafejudo Hana, i la fefunyo̩ oñ i fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ me̩ta kpʼonobule̩ meji bi. Oñ Samiue̩l, imo̩to̩ le̩, nagba waa eju Jihofa.
Ilai la chʼogijo nana, oñ i gbʼinabali e̩wñ du kʼamo̩ma-wñ achʼabo Israe̩l chaka, kpʼalu kʼama bʼabobule̩ ku ma che e̩wñ alo̩na unyabo ujeju dachi.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ ache e̩wñ abe̩i? Todu u gbʼinabali e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ku me̩ jʼache alu amone̩-i chaka.
O̩da, amo̩ma-mi, todu i chʼinabali e̩nyo̩ amone̩-i aro̩ oñ nagbo̩-i n. Ame̩ aje̩ ñw amone̩ O̩jo̩ daba.
E̩ne̩ʼka dʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ re, O̩jo̩ chʼe̩ne̩ agbagba-ma; one̩ muda du Jihofa re fa, e̩ne̩ achʼologu tod owñ? Ma muda ko̩ enetirʼomu atama, todu i du Jihofa e̩do̩ kʼi fʼuma kpa.
Oñ Samiue̩l, imo̩to̩ le̩, nagba o̩kone̩ alo, Jihofa kpʼamone̩ ño̩ liʼi eju.
Tak e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ʼka wʼugbo Ilai, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Omi dʼo̩la-mi tejugede ñw abo unyi ata-we̩ e̩gba kuma jʼIjipti achʼadu ñw abunyi Fero le̩ n?

Omi la chi owñ kwef abo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka kʼi mud atama e-mi, kʼi mute̩gu nyʼugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-mi kʼi gu otulale jo, kʼi fʼe̩fo̩d nyi o̩gba-mi n? Omi laño̩ fʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-mi ki kwʼugbo abo Israe̩l ko ñw ata-we̩.

E̩wñ chi ku me̩ fʼe̩re̩ tʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩-mi kpai e̩wñ ele-mi kʼu ñwa ñwu ma ku ma che ef unyi ugugu-mi le̩ mane̩, ku me̩ la dojima ñw amo̩ma-me̩ tʼumi le, ku me̩ la ño̩ mʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ tule ef ele du kʼabo-mi, abo Israe̩l ako wa le̩ ko je̩ ku me̩ yoyo?

Todule̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, kakini, Omi ka kʼabo unyi-we̩ kpai abo unyi ata-we̩ alule̩ o̩gba-mi ogbegbele̩ ochochi; ama e̩wñ ki Jihofa muda aka de̩, kakini, E-le̩ ki jiji rʼumi; todu abo ku ma dojima ñwu mi oñ omi adojima ñwu ma, abo ku ma la che e̩de̩te̩-mi awʼe̩ne̩ du eju n.
Go ke, iko kʼu nakʼo̩wo̩-we̩ da rinyo̩ awa, kpʼo̩wo̩ abo unyi ata-we̩, kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ogijo okate ki bo̩ ef unyi-we̩ n.
Tak uwe̩ ali e̩ne̩ ki akobʼume̩ ef odo-mi ef e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ du kʼomi ache ñw abo Israe̩l; e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ogijo du adʼef unyi-we̩ ogbegbele̩ n.
E̩ne̩-we̩ kʼomi ma ñʼako̩da bʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-mi te̩ n, ado̩mo̩ kʼi fʼuwe̩ eju gbe̩ kʼi la agwʼe̩ e̩do̩dudu: uku la akpa abo-we̩ du ku ma ne̩gba ef unyi-we̩ ababa ku ma gbakpa.
E̩wñ ki la ake̩re̩bʼamo̩ma-we̩ meji, Ho̩fni kpai Finehas le̩, ki chʼujiwe ñw e̩: ama mejeji aku o̩jo̩ okate.

Tak omi adʼatama kʼi chʼe̩ne̩-mi kpaka kwane̩ ñw o̩la-mi, kʼi la ache teju e̩wñ du ki dʼe̩do̩-mi kpai ibe-mi. Omi la akʼunyi o̩kpaka ñw u; tak owñ alule̩ o̩gba e̩ne̩-mi ku ma bʼekpo tʼo̩ oji le̩ o̩jo̩ du.
Oñ e̩ne̩ du ki bo̩ ef abo-we̩ awa te̩kpe̩ ñw u tod o̩ko̩ʼka kpʼuje̩wñʼka, oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ akakini, Agba, e̩ dʼugugu atamaʼka ñwu mi kʼu fʼe̩bu o̩je̩ʼka ne̩ kʼu je̩.
Oñ Samiue̩l imo̩to̩ le̩ nache e̩wñ ñwu Jihofa eju Ilai. Iko le̩ o̩la Jihofa aña; ane̩ ego chʼo̩gbe̩nugbe̩ n.
Oñ iko le̩ abu kʼIlai la dachi e̩gu-wñ (eju-wñ chane̩ echubi e̩gba le̩ me̩, i gane̩ nyo̩nyo̩ ge̩ n);
agege O̩jo̩ la kpalu ta n, ku Samiue̩l dachi ef unyi Jihofa ugbo kʼakpati O̩jo̩ de̩.
Taku Jihofa fu Samiue̩l do̩, oñ i je̩ kakini, Omi de̩!
Tak i fule nyʼugbo Ilai, i kakini, Omi de̩, todu uwe̩ do̩ mi. I kakini, U dʼudo̩ n; mudabi adachi. Abe̩le̩ i nyʼadachi.
Taku Jihofa ño̩ dʼudo̩ kakini, Samiue̩l! Taku Samiue̩l kwane̩ oñ i nyʼugbo Ilai, i kakini, Omi de̩; todu uwe̩ do̩ mi le̩. Oñ i dohi kakini, U dʼudo̩ n, o̩ma-mi; nyʼadachi ke.
Samiue̩l la ma Jihofa iko le̩ ta n, o̩la Jihofa la tejugede ñw u ta n.
Taku Jihofa ño̩ do̩ Samiue̩l onuke̩ta ge̩. I kwane̩ nyʼugbo Ilai, oñ i kakini, Omi de̩; todu uwe̩ do̩ mi. Tak Ilai fuma ka ku Jihofa ado̩ imo̩to̩ okolobia le̩.
Todule̩ Ilai ka ñwu Samiue̩l kakini, Nyʼadachi; i la che̩wñ kʼi ado̩ we̩, uwe̩ ki kakini, Ka ke, Jihofa, todu adu-we̩ dʼemi aneti. Abe̩le̩ Samiue̩l nyʼadachi e̩gu-wñ.
Taku Jihofa lewa dago, oñ i dʼudo̩ alu kʼi te̩te̩che̩ le̩, Samiue̩l, Samiue̩l! Oñ Samiue̩l kakini, Ka, todu adu-we̩ aneti-i.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Samiue̩l kakini. Go, nache e̩wñ ʼka Israe̩l kʼi aje̩ ñw eti mejeji e̩ne̩ du kʼi agbʼo̩ achʼo kpoo.
O̩jo̩ le̩ omi ache Ilai e̩wñ du kʼu ka ugbo abo unyi-wñ, akwʼuchane̩-wñ gbogbo tʼotitala-wñ.
Todu u ka ñw u ka kʼu nabʼudu, alu kʼoji ajo̩ ka, ñw abo unyi-wñ ogbegbele̩, tod udu ku ma fe̩ kʼowñ ma; todu amo̩ma-wñ fʼama bʼo̩la-ma oji ma, i la ba ma n.
Todule̩ u la go̩ ñw abo unyi Ilai ka kʼudu kʼabo unyi Ilai fe̩ le̩ anʼugbo ku ma anʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ ele wa ñw O̩jo̩ achi udu-wñ ogbegbele̩ n.
Oñ Samiue̩l dachi gbogbo o̩jo̩ muñwa, tak i mʼo̩na unyi Jihofa bi; Samiue̩l la railo eka oji ane̩ kʼi go le̩ ñw Ilai,
Tak Ilai fu Samiue̩l do̩, i kakini, Samiue̩l, o̩ma-mi. Oñ I dohi kakini, Omi de̩.
Tak i kakini, E̩wñ i ko̩la-wñ ñw e̩? Agba, e̩ ki dʼu maja ñwu mi n. O̩jo̩ ki chʼabe̩le̩ ñw e̩, kpʼe-kʼi tule, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ dʼe̩wñ kate ef e̩wñ du kʼi kañwe̩ le̩ maja ñwu mi.
Taku Samiue̩l danʼo̩la le̩ aka ñw u chaka, i dʼe̩wñʼkate maja ñw u n. Tak i kakini, Jihofa de̩, i ki che e̩wñ ki nyʼo̩ eju.
Oñ Samiue̩l nagbʼo̩kone̩ alo, Jihofa la dʼugbo-wñ. I la je̩ ñw o̩la-wñ okate tinyo̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ abo Israe̩l chaka akwo Dan gbogbo wa Birshiba fuma ka ku Samiue̩l mud akache̩ Jihofa kpaka me̩.
Taku Jihofa ño̩ tejugede Shailo ge̩; todu Jihofa dʼo̩la-wñ dufu ñwu Samiue̩l Shailo o̩mo̩ lef o̩la Jihofa.
O̩la Samiue̩l la wʼugbo abo Israe̩l du. Oñ abo Israe̩l dufu nyʼajogu kpʼabo Filistia, oñ ma ruru jo̩ E̩be̩niza; abo Filistia la ruru jo̩ Afe̩k.
Tak abo Filistia kʼo̩la-ma dojo̩ ku ma ja kpʼabo Israe̩l. Oñ e̩gba kʼogu le̩ kpa nyane̩ abo Filistia fʼabo Israe̩l ne, oñ ma fʼabogu dabe̩ne̩ kʼaboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ kpa oko o̩mo̩.

Tak e̩gba kʼabogu le̩ mudabi wa uru ogu, abogijo Israe̩l kakini, E̩wñ chi ki Jihofa fʼuwa gwo rʼabo Filistia o̩gba eñini-i ta? A nyʼadʼakpati alo Jihofa kwo Shailo wʼugbo wa, todu kʼi wʼef uwa kʼi gba wa kwef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-wa.

Abe̩le̩ abo le̩ fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nyi Shailo oñ ma dʼakpati alo Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kwʼo̩mo̩ wa, owñ chʼe-ki gugu alumeji amiche̩rub le̩. Amo̩ma Ilai meji, Ho̩fni kpai Finehas, la jʼugbo akpati alo O̩jo̩ o̩mo̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼakpati alo Jihofa lewa uru le̩, abo Israe̩l fʼo̩ga lile chi oñ ane̩ onugo mʼu gbaje̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo Filistia gbo̩ ekuku o̩ga ku ma chi le̩, ma kakini, E̩wñ chʼoji ekuku o̩ga lile ku ma chi uru abo Israe̩l ta? taku ma fʼoji-wñ ma ka kʼakpati Jihofa lewʼuru le̩ me̩.
Oñ ailo fʼabo Filistia mu, todu ma kakini, O̩jo̩ lewʼuru le̩ me̩. Taku ma kakini, Atogwo chʼe-wa! todu e̩wñ abe̩i de̩ mama ta n.
Atogwo chʼe-wa! E̩ne̩ agba wa kwʼo̩wo̩ amo̩jo̩ e̩gbiti-i? Abo-i chʼamo̩jo̩ ku ma nʼegwo ojoji ojoji gwʼabo Ijipti ef aje̩tachi le̩.
O ame̩ abo Filistia, me̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, fʼo̩la e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mu, kʼame̩ ki we echʼadu abo Hibru, alu kʼama te̩tachʼadu-me̩ le̩; fʼo̩la e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mu ku me̩ ja ke.
Abe̩le̩ abo Filistia ja, oñ ma fʼabo Israe̩l ne, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ra tʼunyabo-wñ; one̩ ekpa o̩jo̩ le̩ la tabale; todu abo Israe̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa ku ma lo e̩re̩ ofo lewane̩.
Ma ño̩ mʼakpati O̩jo̩ du ge̩; ma la fʼamo̩ma Ilai meji, Ho̩fni kpai Finehas kpa.
E̩ne̩ Be̩njamin oka kwef abo ku ma dojo̩ aja le̩ fule wa Shailo o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, ukpo-wñ chʼe̩fana, ebutu la bʼoji-wñ ma.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi lewʼo̩mo̩, go Ilai gugu oj e̩wñ ugugu-wñ afʼeju fe̩rʼo̩na, todu e̩do̩-wñ agagogodo tod akpati O̩jo̩. Tak e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ mugudu wʼef ewo kʼi la mʼu du ka, abo ewo le̩ chaka kwokwa.
Oñ e̩gba kʼIlai gbʼekuku ukwa le̩ i kakini, E̩wñ chʼoji utu ki da ku ma chʼekuku-wñ-i? Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ hiane̩ wa aka ñw Ilai.
O̩do̩ Ilai la chʼoke meji chi ogume̩lu, eju-wñ la gbe̩ mʼakpo, kʼi ma ño̩ gane̩ ge̩ n.
Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ ka ñw Ilai kakini, Omi ki kwʼokogu le̩ wa de̩, eñini-i omi ra kwʼugbo ogu le̩ wa. Tak i tene kakini, Ab ogu le o̩ma-mi?
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki nʼinabali le̩ wa dohi kakini, Abo Israe̩l ra rʼo̩gba abo Filistia, uku ki kpa ef amone̩-wa tabale, amo̩ma-we̩ meji, Ho̩fni kpai Finehas, ño̩ leku; ma laño̩ mʼakpati O̩jo̩ du ge̩.

Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼi hi alu mʼo̩la akpati O̩jo̩, Ilai muñwa lʼubi kwʼoj e̩wñ ugugu-wñ o̩wo̩ʼka alaku o̩mo̩; o̩lo̩-wñ la muguche̩ oñ i leku: todu anagbo i che, i ño̩ chʼe̩gbʼo̩ro̩. O̩do̩ kʼi kajo̩ abo Israe̩l la chʼo̩gbo̩ meji.

O̩ya o̩ma-wñ Finehas dʼefu, ane̩-wñ la me̩ e̩gba le̩ me̩: oñ e̩gba kʼi gbʼinabali ka ku ma mʼakpati O̩jo̩ du, kʼata o̩ko̩-wñ kpʼo̩ko̩-wñ onugo leku, i mute̩kpe̩, i la fʼo̩ma bi; todu e̩re̩re̩le̩ efu fʼu mu.
Oñ abu kʼi ache kʼi ku abobule̩ ku ma dago kpenyʼu ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki railo n, todu e̩ fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi me̩. I muda dohi n, i la nyʼeti re n.
I dʼodu o̩ma le̩ ko̩ Ikabo̩d; i kakini, Ojima kwobʼIsrae̩l te̩ me̩; todabu ku ma mʼakpati O̩jo̩ du, kpai todu ata o̩ko̩-wñ kpʼo̩ko̩-wñ.
I kakini, Ojima kwobʼIsrae̩l te̩ me̩; todu ma mʼakpati O̩jo̩ du.
Abo Filistia la mʼakpati O̩jo̩ du, oñ ma mʼu du kwo E̩be̩niza nyi Ashdo̩d.
Tak abo Filistia mʼakpati O̩jo̩ du, oñ ma du wʼef unyi Dago̩n, ma la mʼu du gugu me̩ru Dago̩n.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo Ashdo̩d takpa kwane̩ odudu o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, go, Dago̩n fʼeju bʼane̩ ma dachi o̩gba akpati Jihofa. Taku ma mu Dago̩n du oñ ma mʼu du dago e̩gu-wñ.

Tak e̩gba ku ma takpa kwane̩ odudu o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, go Dago̩n ño̩ fʼeju bʼane̩ ma dachi o̩gba akpati Jihofa ge̩; oji Dago̩n kpʼo̩wo̩-wñ meji la che̩ko̩da jʼoj ubo̩ alugbo̩na, chai o̩kakpunu Dago̩n bo̩ ñw u.
Todule̩ amatama Dago̩n kpʼabo du ku ma gudu wʼef unyi Dago̩n ma ñʼadʼe̩re̩ tʼubo̩ alugbo̩na unyi Dago̩n Ashdo̩d gbogbo tʼeñini n.
O̩wo̩ Jihofa la woji nʼabo Ashdo̩d le̩ oji; i fʼuma gwʼalache̩, i laño̩ kʼalido wa bʼuma ma, tʼabo Ashdo̩d, tʼabo adogbe-wñ.
Oñ e̩gba kʼaboke̩le̩ Ashdo̩d li ka kʼi de̩ abe̩le̩, ma kakini, Akpati O̩jo̩ Israe̩l agugu ef uwa n; todu o̩wo̩-wñ woji nʼuwa oji tabale kpai oji Dago̩n o̩jo̩-wa.

Todule̩ ma fʼuche̩ kpe̩ ado̩ amo̩ga abo Filistia wugbo ma, oñ ma kakini, Ab a ache kpʼakpati O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l-i? Taku ma dohi kakini, Ama ki nʼakpati O̩jo̩ Israe̩l dagbala nyi Gat. Abe̩le̩ ma mʼakpati O̩jo̩ Israe̩l du le.
Oñ i lewatu abu ku ma mʼu du dagbala le, o̩wo̩ Jihofa chʼagwunyʼewo le̩, oñ utu ki da tabale: i la fʼaboke̩le̩ ewo le̩ gwo, tʼabo ofo tʼabo ki nana; oñ alido fʼuma mu.
Taku ma dʼakpati le̩ kpuche̩ nyi E̩kro̩n. Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼakpati O̩jo̩ lewa E̩kro̩n, abo E̩kro̩n kwokwa kakini, Ma mʼakpati O̩jo̩ Israe̩l du dagbala wa ñw a ku ma fʼawa kpʼabo-wa kpa.

Todule̩ ma fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼakʼamo̩ga abo Filistia wa jeju chaka, oñ ma kakini, Dʼakpati O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l kpuche̩ kwʼemi alo kʼi mudabi tʼe̩gu-wñ kʼi we efʼawa kpʼabo-wa kpa rinyo̩. Todu utu ki akpʼone̩ da ugbo du ewo le̩; o̩wo̩ O̩jo̩ ki nʼuma oji o̩mo̩ gbe̩.
Aboke̩le̩ ku ma ma la ku n, alido fʼuma mu; ma la gbʼukwa ewo le̩ efojale.
Akpati Jihofa le̩ la dʼoj ane̩ ab Filistia ochu mebie.
Tak abo Filistia fʼamatama kpʼamabifa do̩ wa, kakini, E̩wñ a ache kpʼakpati Jihofa-i? ka ñw a kʼa adu hiʼu te̩ kʼa dʼu kpuche̩ ate̩gu-wñ.

Taku ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ dʼakpati O̩jo̩ Israe̩l kpuche̩ kwʼemi mak i chʼakpokpo oñ me̩ adʼu kpuche̩ n; me̩ ki la dʼe̩wñ abi ku me̩ je̩ dabi wa ñw u chuu. E̩gbale̩ tak o̩ga-me̩ atakpa, oñ ame̩ ama e̩wñ ki chi kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ma kwo bʼume̩ oji te̩ n.

Taku ma kakini, E̩wñ chʼe̩wñ abi eje̩ kʼa adʼu dabiwa ñw u? Oñ ma dohi kakini, Alido e-o̩jamalia me̩lu, kpai amikeleku o̩jamalia me̩lu alu kʼuwewe amo̩ga abo Filistia de̩, todu atulubo̩ okate chʼame̩ kpʼamo̩ga-me̩ chaka.
Todule̩ ame̩ ki chʼojibo alido-me̩ kpʼikeleku-me̩ ku ma kpʼane̩-i bie̩; ku me̩ bʼojima mʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l. Ikani i abʼo̩wo̩ loñwu me̩ kpʼamo̩jo̩-me̩ kpʼane̩-me̩ pe̩e̩.
E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ tene efʼe̩do̩-me̩ no̩ alu kʼabo Ijipti kpai Fero fʼe̩do̩-ma no̩ le̩? Abu kʼi fʼukpahiu che ef uma, ma tʼuma no̩ n?

Oñ ma le ma n? Todule̩ me̩ mʼo̩kane̩ etito̩ du ku me̩ ñwʼo̩ che, kpʼamokuno̩ meji kʼe̩nya-ma chenʼomi, e-kʼoli uno̩lo̩ ma nʼuma o̩lo̩ mama ta n; taku me̩ mʼiku amokuno̩ le̩ du ronyʼo̩kane̩. Me̩ muda mʼamo̩ma-ma ko bʼuma te̩ wʼunyi.
Taku me̩ mʼakpati Jihofa du tʼef o̩kane̩ le̩; oñ me̩ ki mʼe̩wñ o̩jamalia ku me̩ ko chʼe̩wñ abi eje̩ ku me̩ ako dabiwa ñw u ko jʼef akpati akolo-wñ, taku me̩ dʼukpuche̩ kwʼemi, kʼi lo owñ.

Taku me̩ fʼeju bʼo̩ le; iche̩wñ kʼi ale o̩na alo̩me̩ ane̩-wñ nyi Be̩t-shime̩sh, mak owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki che wa e̩bie̩ne̩ inaina-i. I ma dʼabe̩le̩ n, e̩gbale̩ tak a ma ka kʼi chʼo̩wo̩-wñ kado wa n, chai egbajiko i gbajiko wa.
Tak aboke̩le̩ le̩ fʼabe̩le̩ che, oñ ma mʼamokuno̩ meji kʼe̩nya-ma chenʼomi ko ronyʼo̩kane̩ adu le̩, oñ ma fʼamo̩ma-ma dahi jʼunyi.
Taku ma mʼakpati Jihofa du tʼef o̩kane̩ le̩, kpʼakpati kʼamikeleku o̩jamalia kpai ojibo alido-ma jʼefu-wñ.
Tak amokuno̩ le̩ mʼo̩na kpaala ku ma le nyi Be̩l-shime̩sh du, ma nakwa abu ku ma le ojikpadala alo; ma la na tʼawo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n; oñ amoga abo Filistia tʼuma ubi gbogbo nyʼalo̩me̩ Be̩t-ahime̩ah.
Abo Be̩t-shime̩sh la jʼo̩go̩ o̩mo̩ akpa oka wit-ma; oñ ma kwoyo̩ eli ku ma liʼu.
Tak o̩kane̩ le̩ lewa oko Jo̩shua, e̩ne̩ Bet-shime̩sh, oñ i kwodago omo̩, okuta lileʼka dʼugbo le̩. Taku ma fʼoli o̩kane̩ le̩ kpana, oñ ma mʼamokuno̩ ko chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñwu Jihofa.

Tak abo Lifai mʼakpati Jihofa du wʼane̩, kpʼakpati ki manyʼu e-kʼojibo o̩jamalia le̩ jʼefu-wñ, oñ ma mʼu ko jʼoj okuta lile le̩; tak aboke̩le̩ Be̩t-shime̩sh mʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ki bo̩ ko wa chʼiche̩bo̩ ñwu Jihofa o̩jo̩ le̩.
Oñ abu kʼamo̩ga abo Filistia me̩lu le̩ li, ma mudabi tʼE̩kro̩n o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩.

E-le̩ la chʼalido o̩jamalia kʼabo Filistia ko dabiwa ki mud e̩wñ abi eje̩ ku ma ko wa ñwu Jihofa: Oka chʼutodu Ashdo̩d, oka chʼutodu Gaza, oka chʼutodu Ashkelo̩n oka chʼutodu Gat, oka chʼutodu E̩kron.

Oñ aluka amikeleku o̩jamalia chʼalu kʼuwewe ewo ewo abo Filistia kʼamo̩ga me̩lu le̩ nʼo̩da-ma, tʼewo ku ma bʼaku nyu kpʼewo ojoko ojoko gbogbo wʼokuta lile ku ma rʼakpati Jihofa gu oji-wñ; owñ chʼe-ki dʼoko Jo̩shua e̩ne̩ Be̩t-shime̩sh gbogbo tʼeñini.
Tak i fʼaboke̩le̩ Be̩t-shime̩sh iche̩ka kpa, ukpe̩ ku ma gʼef akpati Jihofa. I fʼaboke̩le̩-ma e̩te̩gwa kpa; tak amone̩ le̩ kwodaido̩ todabu ki Jihofa nʼuku lile kpa amone̩ le̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Be̩t-shime̩sh kakini, E̩ne̩ bo̩jo̩ kʼi adago o̩gba Jihofa, O̩jo̩ kiafo̩-i? Ugbo e̩ne̩ oñ i akwo bʼuwa te̩ anyi ke?
Taku ma fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo abo ku ma dodo Kiriat-jearim kakini, Abo Filistia mʼakpati Jihofa du dabiwa me̩. Me̩ gwo̩ru wa ku me̩ mʼu du atʼugbo me̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Kiriat-jearim lewa, ma la mʼakpati Jihofa du, oñ ma mʼu du le tʼunyi Abinadab oj uwo le̩. Taku ma fʼE̩leaza, o̩ma-wñ, o̩la gworinyo̩ kʼi fo̩, kʼi de akpati Jihofa.
Oñ akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼakpati le̩ kwogugu; Kiriat-jearim, iko-wñ kpo̩kpe̩, todu o̩do̩ ogu i che. Oñ abunyi Israe̩l chaka fʼo̩la eku mu atene Jihofa.

Taku Samiue̩l ko̩la ñw abo unyi Israe̩l chaka kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ adabi wa abo̩ Jihofa kpai e̩do̩-me̩ chaka ochochi, mak ame̩ ki kʼode abononojo kpai Ashtaro̩t rinyo̩ bʼef ume̩ te̩, kʼame̩ dʼe̩do̩-me̩ kado Jihofa ku me̩ rʼowñ kate; tak i agba me̩ kwef o̩wo̩ abo Filistia.
Abe̩le̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l mʼamiBeal kpai Ashtaro̩t ko rinyo̩, oñ ma re̩ Jihofa kate.
Taku Samiue̩l kakini, Me̩ kʼabo Israe̩l chaka wa jo̩ Mizpa, oñ narodubo̩ Jihofa todu me̩.
Taku ma jeju Mizpa, oñ ma fʼomiofo kpa, taku ma mʼu du dajane̩ o̩gba Jihofa, ma laño̩ ji alu o̩jo̩ le̩. O̩mo̩ ma ño̩ kakini, A du Jihofa re me̩. Samiue̩l la fʼajo̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l ka Mizpa.
Oñ e̩gba kʼabo Filistia gbo̩ ka kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l wa jo̩ Mizpa, amo̩ga abo Filistia te̩gu nyʼakobʼabo Israe̩l. Tak e̩gba kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l gbo̩, ma railo abo Filistia.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l ka ñwu Samiue̩l kakini, Ekwa kʼe̩ kwa do̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa todu wa ki nʼuda n, kʼi jadu wa kʼa we etʼo̩wo̩ abo Filistia.
Taku Samiue̩l mʼo̩mala kʼi añmʼe̩nya du, oñ i mʼu du che iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo odukulu ñwu Jihofa. Samiue̩l ño̩ kwado̩ Jihofa todu Israe̩l; Jihofa la mʼohi du ñw u.

Oñ abu ku Samiue̩l do̩mo̩ ache iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ abo Filistia te̩ wa ku ma jogu kpai abo Israe̩l; Jihofa muda nʼomu akpabana lile ka rʼabo Filistia oji o̩jo̩ le̩, oñ i fʼuma biya; oñ abo-ma fʼuma ne rʼo̩gba abo Israe̩l.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l kwo Mizpa ranʼabo Filistia, oñ ma gwo ma gbogbo taku ma lewa o̩gane̩ Be̩tkar.
Taku Samiue̩l mʼokuta du oñ i mʼu du dago agbagba Mizpa kpai She̩n, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ E̩be̩niza, i kakini, Jihofa te̩tate̩ko wa.
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼabo Filistia du, ma la ño̩ daba alo̩me̩ abo Israe̩l ge̩ n. O̩wo̩ Jihofa la chagwunyʼabo Filistia iko Samiue̩l le̩ du.

Tak ewo ewo kʼabo Filistia bʼabo Israe̩l gba, ma mʼu du dabi wa ñw Israe̩l akwo E̩kron gbogbo wa Gat, abo Israe̩l la mʼane̩-ma gba bʼo̩wo̩ abo Filistia te̩. Tak uja ño̩ dʼagbagba abo Israe̩l kpai abo Amo̩r ge̩ n.
Oñ Samiue̩l kajo̩ abo Israe̩l gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ.
1 la dagbala le tu Be̩te̩l kpai Gilgal kpai Mizpa aro̩ne arone o̩do̩ o̩do̩: i laño̩ kajo̩ abo Israe̩l ugbo-i chaka.
Oji eda-wñ la che Rama, todu o̩mo̩ unyi-wñ de̩; i laño̩ kajo̩ abo Israe̩l o̩mo̩ ge̩. I ño̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpa ñwu Jihofa o̩mo̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku Samiue̩l mud ogijo, i mʼamo̩ma-wñ ko chʼamakajo̩ abo Israe̩l.
Odu o̩mo̩gba-wñ ko̩ Joe̩l; odu ekeji la ko̩ Abija; ama chʼamakajo̩ jo̩ Birshiba.
Amo̩ma-wñ le̩ muda lʼikpa-wñ n, ma muna tef alu o̩ko̩ eche, ma gbʼo̩ko̩ je̩, ma ño̩ fʼoji ajo̩ rida.
Tak abogijo Israe̩l chaka kʼo̩la-ma wa jo̩, oñ ma lewa Rama ugbo Samiue̩l,
ma ka ñw u kakini, Go, uwe̩ chʼogijo me̩, amo̩ma-we̩ la lʼikpa-we̩ n: e̩ mʼonu du ñw a fai kʼi kajo̩ wa alu kʼabo uche̩ichi chaka ache le̩.
E̩wñ ku ma ka le̩ la bie̩ne̩ eju Samiue̩l, owñ chʼe-ku ma kakini, Dʼonu ñw a kʼi kajo̩ wa. Taku Samiue̩l rodubo̩ Jihofa.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Samiue̩l kakini, Netirʼamone̩ le̩ ef e̩wñ du ku ma ka ñw e̩; todu i chʼuwe̩ ma ko̩-i n, chai omi ma ko̩, kʼomi ki we echʼonu-ma.
Likpa e̩wñ du ku ma che akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼomi mʼuma ko kwʼIjipti wa gbogbo tʼojolu eñini, owñ chʼe-ku ma hi umi tinyo̩ ku ma re̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩, abe̩le̩ ma achʼuwe̩-i ge̩.
Todule̩ fai, e̩ gbʼomu-ma ke. E̩ ki muda katane̩ ñwu ma kpaka, kʼe̩ laño̩ dʼalu kʼonu-ma kʼi awa je̩ ade̩ ña ma.
Abe̩le̩ Samiue̩l fʼo̩la Jihofa du ka ñw amone̩ ku ma bi onu ugbo-wñ le̩.
I kakini, Alu kʼonu kʼi ajʼo̩fe̩-me̩ ache me̩ de̩: i akʼamo̩ma-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ jo̩ tod o̩kogu o̩kogu-wñ kpai todu kʼama ki chʼamananya-wñ kpai todu ku ma ki fule tʼo̩kogu-wñ o̩gba;

i la achi amagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpai amagboji one̩ ooje ooje ñw o̩la-wñ; abo iche̩ka la alʼuche̩-wñ, iche̩ka ak ʼe̩wñ oko-wñ wʼunyi, abo iche̩ka la ache e̩wñ ido̩na ogu-wñ kpai ane̩ okogu-wñ.
Tak i akʼamo̩ma-me̩ onobule̩ ku ma chʼotulale ñw u, ku ma hi uje̩wñ ñw u, ku ma ño̩ che e̩wñ ayaga ñw u.
I agba ane̩ uche̩-me̩ kpʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-me̩ kpai uche̩ oli o̩lif-me̩ e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ kʼi mʼu ko ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ.
I la agba ukpe̩gwa ukpe̩gwa e̩wñ e̩yo̩-me̩ kpai uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-me̩, oñ i ako ñw amonoji-wñ kpʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ.
I agba amadu-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼamadu-me̩ onobule̩ kpʼabokolobia-me̩ ki nyo̩ kpʼamo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-me̩ oñ i ane̩ ma chʼuko̩lo̩-wñ.
I la ako ukpe̩gwa ame̩wño̩re̩-me̩ egini, oñ ame̩ onugo amud amadu-wñ.
O̩jo̩ le̩ ame̩ akwa noj onu ku me̩ du ñw o̩la-me̩-i, Jihofa muda adohi ñwu me̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ n.
Amone̩ le̩ muda ko̩ egbʼomu Samiue̩l; oñ ma kakini, O̩da! One̩ ajʼonu-wa chuu,
kʼawa ki ño̩ dab abo uche̩ichi ki bo̩ chaka, todu kʼonu-wa ki kajo̩ wa, kʼi laño̩ tʼuwa o̩gba kʼi jʼogu todu wa.
Tak abu ku Samiue̩l fʼo̩la amone̩ le̩ du gbo̩, i mʼu du ka nyu Jihofa eti.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Samiue̩l kakini, Gbʼomu-ma, kʼe̩ mʼonu du ñwu ma. Taku Samiue̩l ka ñw aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l kakini, E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki lo tʼunyo̩ja-wñ.
Oñ e̩ne̩ Be̩njamin oka do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Kish, o̩ma Abie̩l i che, o̩ma Zero̩r, o̩ma Be̩ko̩rat, o̩ma Aña. E̩ne̩ Be̩njamin ki chʼagbiti ogu i che.
I la nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ So̩l imo̩to̩ okolobia e̩gbo̩gbo̩ i che, i nʼe̩ne̩ du ef amo̩ma Israe̩l kʼi chʼuto̩ eju tʼowñ le n. Akwʼojika-wñ nyʼate̩ oñ i du gba tʼamone̩ le̩ du le.
Oñ amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ Kish, ata So̩l, lenyo̩. Taku Kish ka ñwu So̩l, o̩ma-wñ kakini, E̩ mʼaduʼka du fai, kʼe̩ kwane̩ kʼe̩ nyʼatene amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩.
Tak i lale gu ef ane̩ uwo Ifraim kpai ane̩ Shalisha du. Ma muda li ma n; oñ ma lale gu ef ane̩ Shaalim du, ma la jʼo̩mo̩ n. Tak i lale gu ef ane̩ abo Be̩njamin du ma muda li ma n.
E̩gba ku ma lewa ane̩ Zuf, So̩l ka ñw adu-wñ kʼi dʼugbo-wñ le̩ kakini, Wa kʼa dabi, tode̩gba kʼe-amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ma ñʼawʼata-mi eju ge̩ n, kʼi achane̩ edejiji wa.
Tak i dohi ñw u kakini, Go ta, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ʼka dʼewo-i, e̩ne̩ ku ma bʼojima mʼo̩ i che; e̩wñ du kʼi aka awache̩ chuu. A ki nyʼo̩mo̩ ta; ikani i neke ka ule̩ e̩wñ kʼa ale-i ñw a.
Taku So̩l ka ñw adu-wñ kakini, Ama, iche̩wñ kʼa le fa? E̩wñ a adu wa ñw e̩ne̩ le̩? Todu uje̩wñ ef ikpa-wa takpa me̩. I la nʼe̩wñ ele du kʼa adu wa ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ n: e̩wñ a ane̩?
Tak adu le̩ dohi ñwu So̩l ge̩ kakini, Go, u chenʼukpe̩le̩ o̩ko̩ she̩ke̩l ajifa ef o̩wo̩-mi, e-le̩ nadu ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩-i, kʼi ka o̩na-wa ñw a.
Oj ane̩ Israe̩l akwoubi, e̩gba kʼone̩ anyʼatʼO̩jo̩ ene ab i aka de̩ kakini, Lewa, kʼa nyʼugbo agane̩; todu e̩ne̩ ku ma do̩ ka kʼakache̩ abajo̩-i, akwoubi ma dʼo̩ ka kʼagane̩.
Taku So̩l ka ñw adu-wñ kakini, E̩ ka nyo̩ gbe̩, lewa kʼa lo ke. Abe̩le̩ ma nyʼewo ugbo kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ de̩.
Oñ abu ku ma ate̩gu nyʼewo le̩ ma de kpʼabimo̩to igbe̩le̩ ku ma dufu nyʼakpʼomiofo, oñ ma tʼuma ene kakini, Agane̩ le̩ dʼemi?
Tak abo le̩ dohi ñwu ma kakini, Go, owñ dʼO̩gba-we̩ le̩; hiane̩ alo ke, todu eñini-i i gudu wʼef ewo-i; todu amone̩ emi chenʼiche̩bo̩ ku ma che oj otete le̩ eñini.

Ababa ku me̩ mugudu wʼef ewo, ame̩ aliʼu o̩gba tak i nyʼoj otete le̩ kʼi je̩ e̩wñ; todu amone̩ jʼaje̩ e̩wñ tak i wa n, todu owñ akadua bʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ le̩ ma; ubi le̩ tak abo ku ma do̩ ma wa aje̩. Todule̩ me̩ nate̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩ fai; todu iko-i oñ me̩ aliʼu.
Taku ma mute̩gu nyʼewo le̩, oñ abu ku ma mugudu wʼef ewo, go, Samiue̩l kpejurʼuma awa kʼi te̩gu nyʼotete le̩.
E̩gba ki bʼonu ku So̩l awa-i, Jihofa mu Samiue̩l eti bi, kakini,

Ame̩ru iko-i o̩na, omi akpʼone̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Be̩njamin wʼugbo we̩, tak uwe̩ abʼekpo tʼo̩ oji kʼi chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo-mi, Israe̩l; owñ le̩ ajadu amone̩-mi kwef o̩wo̩ abo Filistia; todu u rʼeju da go amone̩-mi me̩, todabu kʼukwa-ma tʼumi eti.
Tak e̩gba ki Samiue̩l fu So̩l li, Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Go, e̩ne̩ kʼomi kʼo̩la-wñ ñw e̩ le̩ de̩! E̩ne̩-i anʼo̩da amone̩-mi.
Taku So̩l te̩me̩ru Samiue̩l alaku le̩, oñ i kakini, Agba, e̩ ka ñwu mi ugbo kʼunyi agane̩ le̩ de̩.
Taku Samiue̩l dohi ñwu So̩l kakini, Omi, agane̩ le̩ de̩; mute̩gu tʼumi o̩gba nyʼugbo otete le̩, todu uwe̩ aje̩ e̩wñ kpʼomi eñini; odudu tak u naje̩ ñw e̩ lo, oñ naka e̩wñ du kʼi dʼe̩do̩-we̩ ñw e̩.
I la chʼe-amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-we̩ ku ma lenyo̩ enyike̩ta le̩, e̩ ki dʼibe tʼe-ma n; todu ma fʼuma li me̩. E̩ne̩ oñ e̩wñ du kʼabo Israe̩l ñeju-wñ dʼugbo-wñ ta? I chʼuwe̩ kpʼabo unyi ata-we̩ n?

So̩l dohi kakini, I chʼe̩ne̩ Be̩njamin omi che n? I chʼabo o̩lo̩pu ki nya ef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l u che n? Unyi ata-mi la chʼe-ki nya tʼunyi du ef o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin le n? Abile kʼe̩ ka abe̩le̩ ñwu mi?
Taku Samiue̩l mu So̩l kpʼadu-wñ du, oñ i mʼuma ko wʼef unyi ugbo kʼabononojo aru, i la je̩ ñwu ma gugu ugugu ojima ki tule ef abo ku ma do̩ wa, abo le̩ la dab one̩ ogue̩gwa.
Taku Samiue̩l ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki ahi o̩je̩ kakini, Mʼukpe̩ kʼu du ñw e̩ e-kʼu ka ñw e̩ kakini, Mʼu du gugu o̩wo̩ʼka ugbo-we̩ le̩ du wa.

Tak e̩ne̩ ki ahi o̩je̩ mʼuta e̩la le̩ du kpʼe̩wñ ki dʼoji-wñ, i la mʼu du gugu o̩gba So̩l. Oñ i kakini, Go, e-ku ma do̩wo̩mo̩ tane̩ le̩ de̩! mʼu du gugu o̩gba-we̩ kʼe̩ je̩; todabu ku ma fʼu de tane̩ ñw e̩ gbogbo wʼiko ku ma date̩, todu u kakini, U fʼamone̩ do̩ wa me̩. Abe̩le̩ So̩l bi Samiue̩l je̩ e̩wñ o̩jo̩ le̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma mugwo̩ru otete le̩ wʼef ewo, i choluka kpai So̩l oj o̩pata unyi.
Taku ma takpa kwane̩; oñ i lewatu abu kʼo̩jo̩ añwa bulubulu, Samiue̩l do̩ So̩l wʼoj o̩pata unyi le̩ kakini, Kwane̩, kʼu fʼe̩ kpe̩ kwʼemi alo. Taku So̩l kwane̩, oñ amameji ledufu, owñ kpai Samiue̩l.
Oñ abu ku ma agwo̩ru ugbo alo̩me̩ ewo le̩, Samiue̩l ka ñwu So̩l kakini, Ka ñw adu-i kʼi dʼo̩gba anede wa (oñ i le), uwe̩ ki muda dago yo̩o̩ ta, kʼomi aje̩ ñw e̩ gbʼo̩la O̩jo̩.
Taku Samiue̩l mʼuli ekpo du, i la mʼu du danyʼoji-wñ, oñ i dʼalu kʼalu-wñ, i kakini, I cheka kʼO̩jo̩ fʼekpo ba tʼuwe̩ oji kʼe̩ mud e̩nuto̩gba e̩wñ o̩gu-wñ de̩ n?

E̩gba kʼe̩ kwo bʼumi te̩ eñini-i, uwe̩ ali aboke̩le̩ meji ugbo ojinoji Reche̩l, aio̩me̩ Be̩njamin Ze̩lza; oñ abo le̩ aka ñw e̩ kakini, Ma fʼamo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ kʼe̩ nyʼatene le̩ li me̩; e̩ la go, e-amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ awʼata-we̩ eju ge̩ n, ejiji e-we̩ i ada kakini, Ab u nache e-o̩ma-mi ta?

Tak uwe̩ akwʼo̩mo̩ tej o̩gba alo, oñ uwe̩ awʼugbo oli ok Tebo̩r; o̩mo̩ one̩ me̩ta ku ma ate̩gu nyʼugbo O̩jo̩ Be̩te̩l ade̩ kpʼuwe̩, oka anʼamo̩ma ewo me̩ta, omune̩ anʼakala me̩ta, oñ e̩ne̩ omune̩ anʼaiko omi achiwebe̩te̩ma.
Ama la agwʼe̩, ku ma la akʼakala meji ñw e̩ e-kʼuwe̩ agba o̩wo̩-ma.

Ubile̩ tak uwe̩ awʼugbo uwo e-O̩jo̩, ugbo kʼamisoja abo Filistia uche̩ʼka jo̩ le̩. Oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ lewa ewo o̩mo̩, uwe̩ ade kpʼuche̩ amakache̩ʼka ku ma agwo̩ru kwo̩j otete le̩ awa, ubo̩ kpʼeicha kpʼalige̩ta kpʼumolo ajʼo̩gba-ma; ma la anʼache̩ aka.
Oñ Afu Jihofa awa bʼuwe̩ ma ukpahiu ukpahiu, tak uwe̩ abʼuma kache̩, uwe̩ la arida amud e̩ne̩ omune̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼujiwe kʼu ka-i lewa bʼuwe̩ ma, uwe̩ ki che alu ki tʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩; todu O̩jo̩ dʼugbo-we̩.

Tak uwe̩ agwo̩ru tʼumi o̩gba nyi Gilgal; e̩ la go, omi agwo̩ru wʼugbo-we̩ kʼu fʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo che, kpai iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩. Uwe̩ ki jʼo̩jo̩ mebie o̩mo̩ gbogbo tak u wʼugbo-we̩, kʼu ñʼuwe̩ e̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ache.
Oñ abe̩le̩ abu kʼi mubidagba kʼi kwo bu Samiue̩l te̩, O̩jo̩ mʼe̩do̩-wñ rida ojoji; oñ ujiwe e̩wñ-i chaka wache o̩jo̩ le̩.
Tak e̩gba ku ma lewa ugbo uwo o̩mo̩, go, uche̩ amakache̩ʼka de kpai owñ; tak Afu O̩jo̩ lewa bʼowñ ma ukpahiu ukpahiu, oñ i kwokache̩ ef uma.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼabo du ku ma mʼo̩ akwoubi fʼu li, ma kakini, Go, i akache̩ manyʼamakache̩, tak amone̩ le̩ ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-ki wache o̩ma Kishi-i ta? So̩l ño̩ dʼef amakache̩ ge̩?
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka ki dʼugbo le̩ dohi, oñ i kakini, E̩ne̩ la chʼata-ma ta? Todule̩ i mud ita kakini, So̩l ño̩ dʼef amakache̩ ge̩?
Tak e̩gba kʼi fʼache̩ ka kpoji, i lewa uña otete le̩.
Tak efu So̩l oka ka ñw u kpai adu-wñ kakini Ugbo me̩ le tu? Tak i kakini, I chʼoko efeju amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ n? Tak e̩gba ki mune̩ rʼuwa eju ka kʼa ñʼali ma ge̩ n, a lewa ugbo Samiue̩l.
