Tak efu So̩l le̩ kakini, Narodubʼe̩ kʼe̩ ka ñwu mi e̩wñ ki Samiue̩l ka ñw e̩.
Taku So̩l ka ñw efu-wñ le̩ kakini, I ka ñw a ejugede pee ka ku ma fʼamo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ li me̩. I muda ka o̩la o̩fe̩ ojane̩ e-ku Samiue̩l ka le̩ ñw u n.
Taku Samiue̩l fʼamone̩ le̩ do̩ jeju ñwu Jihofa Mizpa;

oñ i ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, Abu ku Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ka de̩ kakini, Omi mʼIsrae̩l du kwʼIjipti wa, u laño̩ gba me̩ kwef o̩wo̩ abo Ijipti kpai kwef o̩wo̩ abo ojane̩ ojane̩ du ku ma fʼume̩ kpama le̩.

Ame̩ muda ko̩ O̩jo̩-me̩ eñini; owñ onugo la ajadu me̩ kwef e̩bie̩ne̩-me̩ kpai o̩pe̩cha-me̩ chaka; me̩ la ka ñw u kakini, Chai onu oñ e̩ du ñw a. Todule̩ me̩ nakʼo̩la-me̩ wa jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa fai, o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-me̩, kpai icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩-me̩.
Abe̩le̩ Samiue̩l mʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka ko me̩ru, oñ ma mʼo̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin du.
Tak i mʼo̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin du me̩ru, akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi; tak i mʼabunyi Matrait du; oñ i mu So̩l, o̩ma Kish, du. Ama e̩gba ku ma tejane̩-wñ, ma liʼu n.
Todule̩ ma ño̩ tu Jihofa ene ge̩ kakini, One̩ ño̩ bo̩ kʼi awʼemi ta? Taku Jihofa dohi kakini, Go, i dʼo̩la-wñ maja ef ane̩-me̩ kʼi jo̩-i.
Taku ma fule nyʼadʼu kwʼo̩mo̩ wa; oñ e̩gba kʼi dago ef amone̩ le̩, i gba tʼe̩ne̩ du ef amone̩ le̩ le akwo ojika-wñ nyate̩.
Taku Samiue̩l ka ñw amone̩ le̩ chaka kakini, Me̩ li e̩ne̩ ku Jihofa chi-i, kʼe̩ne̩ du ma dab owñ ef amone̩-i n? Tak amone̩ le̩ du fʼo̩ga chi, oñ ma kakini, Oji onu ki gbo kala kala!
Taku Samiue̩l ka ñw amone̩ le̩ alu kʼo̩fe̩ ojane̩ le̩ ade̩, oñ i fʼu ko̩ nyʼef ubuku, oñ i mʼu du te̩ o̩gba Jihofa. Taku Samiue̩l je̩ ñw amone̩ chaka kwʼo̩mo̩ le, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼunyi-wñ.
Oñ So̩l le̩ tʼunyi-wñ Gibea; abogu kʼO̩jo̩ dʼo̩wo̩ che ma e̩do̩, le bʼowñ.
Ama amo̩ma ebili iche̩ka kakini, Ab e̩ne̩-i ale kʼi ajadu wa? Oñ ma chʼe̩de̩te̩ ñw u, ma la dʼe̩wñ ele wa ñw u n, i muda fʼeti chʼo̩hialigbo̩ e-le̩.
Oñ Nehash e̩ne̩ Amo̩n le̩ lewa, i la kpala nyu Jebe̩sh-gilead. Tak aboke̩le̩ Jebe̩sh chaka ka ñwu Nehash kakini, Fʼalo che kpai awa tak a arʼuwe̩.
Taku Nehash e̩ne̩ Amo̩n le̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Ab i ade̩ tak u nache kpai ame̩ de̩ kakini, Eju-me̩ awo̩to̩ du ki kpo̩fo̩; tak u namʼu du te̩ ki chʼina abʼoji abo Israe̩l du ma.
Tak abogijo Jebe̩sh ka ñw u kakini, Fʼo̩jo̩ mebie da ñw a, kʼa fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo du alo̩me̩ ane̩ Israe̩l; tak e̩gbale̩, iche̩wñ ki ma nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi ajadu wa n, a adufu wʼugbo-we̩.
Tak amonuche̩ lewa Gibea e-So̩l, oñ ma mʼo̩la-i du ka nyʼamone̩ le eti; tak amone̩ le̩ chʼomu-ma nyʼale̩, oñ ma kworaku.
Me̩ la go So̩l tʼamokuno̩ ubi kwʼo̩ko o̩mo̩ awa. Taku So̩l kakini, E̩wñ chʼamone̩ aku-i? Taku ma mʼo̩la abo Jebe̩sh le̩ du ka ñw u.
Tak e̩gba kʼi gbʼo̩la-i, Afu O̩jo̩ lewa bu So̩l ma oñ uwe̩do̩-wñ mutajo tabale.

Tak i mʼamokuno̩ meji ko̩, i la fʼunu kpanya jo̩, oñ i mʼu ko nyʼamonuche̩ o̩wo̩ kʼi kpe̩ ma nyʼugbo du ane̩ Israe̩l. I kakini, E̩ne̩ ki ma dufu atu So̩l kpai Samiue̩l ubi n, mak abe̩i ma ache amokuno-wñ! Tak ailo Jihofa lewa bʼamone̩ le̩ ma, oñ ma dufu wa e̩re̩ kate.
Tak i fuma kaluka Be̩ze̩k, oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oli me̩fa, aboke̩le̩ Juda la che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa.

Taku ma ka ñw amonuche̩ ku ma wa le̩ kakini, Abu kʼame̩ aka ñw abo Jebe̩sh-gilead le̩ de̩: kakini, O̩na, iko kʼolu akpa nyʼane̩, me̩ afʼujadu ne̩. Tak amonuche̩ le̩ lewa ka ñw abo Jebe̩sh-gilead; oñ e̩do̩-ma bo̩.
Todule̩ abo Jebe̩sh kakini, O̩na a adufu wa ñwu me̩, taku me̩ ache wa alu du ki rʼume̩ eju.

Oñ abe̩le̩ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, So̩l la mʼamone̩ le̩ ko jo̩ uche̩ me̩ta; oñ ma lewa alumeji uru le̩ ide inajo̩, oñ ma fʼabo Amo̩n gwoda gbogbo tak olu kpa nyʼane̩. Oñ i lewatu abo ki bo̩ mukpatuka, i chaka chʼone̩ meji bo̩ jʼugbo kate ge̩ n.
Tak amone̩ le̩ ka ñwu Samiue̩l kakini, E̩ne̩ kakini, So̩l aje̩ onu wa? Mʼabo le̩ ko wa kʼa fʼuma kpa.
Taku So̩l kakini, Ma adʼe̩ne̩ kate kpa eñini-i n; todu eñini Jihofa fʼujadu che ef Israe̩l.
Taku Samiue̩l ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Lewa kʼa nyi Gilgal, kʼa dʼo̩fe̩ ojane̩-i nyane̩.

Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka nyi Gilgal; oñ Gilgal o̩mo̩ ma du So̩l jʼonu o̩gba Jihofa; o̩mo̩ le̩ ma laño̩ ko e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa che o̩gba Jihofa: o̩mo̩ ge̩, So̩l kpai aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka gwo̩guyo̩ tabale.
Taku Samiue̩l ka ñw abo Israe̩l chaka kakini, Go, omi gbʼomu-me̩ ef e̩wñ du ku me̩ ka ñwu mi me̩, u la fʼonu che kʼi ne me̩.
Me̩ ño̩ go ke, onu le̩ do̩mo̩ alule̩ o̩gba-me̩-i; omi chʼogijo, iloji-mi la chʼefufu; me̩ la go, amo̩ma-mi jʼugbo-me̩. Omi la nʼule̩-mi ale eju-me̩ akwʼo̩jo̩ okolobia-mi gbogbo wʼeñini kide̩.

Omi dago-i: me̩ gbibenu nyʼumi o̩gba Jihofa-i kpai o̩gba e̩ne̩-wñ kʼi fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji-i. O̩kokuno̩ e̩ne̩ omi du? Abe̩k o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ e̩ne̩ omi du? Abe̩k e̩ne̩ omi chʼo uji? E̩ne̩ omi fʼu kpama? E̩ne̩ omi gba o̩ko̩ ugwa o̩wo̩-wñ kʼu du yʼo̩la-mi eju? Kʼu nadu dabi wa ñwu me̩.
Taku ma kakini, Uwe̩ chʼuwa uji n, e̩ la kpa wa ma n, uwe̩ la gba e̩wñ du o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ du n.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Jihofa chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi agbʼibenu nyʼume̩, e̩ne̩ kʼi fʼekpo batʼo̩ oji-i ño̩ chʼe̩nibenu eñini-i, ka kʼame̩ li e̩wñ du ef o̩wo̩-mi n. Taku ma kakini, Owñ le̩ chʼe̩nibenu.
Taku Samiue̩l ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Jihofa chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi chi Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n, kʼi ño̩ mʼamata-me̩ ko kwʼojane̩ Ijipti wa.
Todule̩ me̩ kwodago yo̩o̩ fai ta, kʼu nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩ eju Jihofa, lugbo e̩wñ o̩kpakpa du ki Jihofa che, owñ chʼe-kʼi che ñw ame̩ kpai amata-me̩.
E̩gba ku Jeko̩b lewa Ijipti, kʼamata-me̩ la kwado̩ Jihofa, e̩gbale̩ Jihofa fu Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n kpe̩ wa. Ama le̩ kʼamata-me̩ kwʼIjipti dufu, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma dodo ugbo-i.
Ama ma fu Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma gbe̩nyo̩; oñ i mʼuma ko ta tef o̩wo̩ Sise̩ra kʼi chʼagboji abogu Hazo̩r, kpai tef o̩wo̩ abo Filistia, kpai tef o̩wo̩ onu Moab, oñ abo le̩ kogu bʼama.
Taku ma kwado̩ Jihofa oñ ma kakini, A f ʼadure ta, todabu kʼa tu Jihofa no̩ kʼa re̩ amiBeal kpai Ashtaro̩t. E̩ muda mʼuwa gba kwef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-wa fai, tak a arʼe̩.
Taku Jihofa fu Je̩rubeal kpai Barak, kpai Je̩fta kpai Samiue̩l kpe̩ wa, oñ i mʼume̩ gba bʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-me̩ te̩ o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du; oñ me̩ kwododo to̩ko̩o̩.
Tak e̩gba ku me̩ li ka ku Nehash, onu amo̩ma Amo̩n, lewa kʼi ko bʼume̩ ame̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩da, chai onu ki nʼo̩da wa; Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ la chʼonu-me̩ e̩gbale̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nago onu ku me̩ du-i, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ la bi ebi-wñ le̩; me̩ la go Jihofa mʼonu du gugu kʼi nʼo̩da-me̩ me̩.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ railo Jihofa, ku me̩ la arʼo̩, ku me̩ la agbʼomu-wñ, ku me̩ ma lañurʼo̩la alu Jihofa n, taku tʼame̩ tʼonu kʼi ne̩ me̩ achʼamatu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ ubi alo waa;
ama iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma gbo̩ omu Jihofa n, ku me̩ la lañu rʼo̩la alu Jihofa, e̩gbale̩ o̩wo̩ Jihofa achʼagwunyu me̩ alu kʼi gwunyʼamata-me̩.
Todule̩ me̩ kwodago choo fai taku me̩ li e̩wñ inaina ku Jihofa ache eju-me̩-i.
Eñini chʼiko ku ma kpa o̩ka wit in? Nakwado̩ Jihofa kʼi je̩ ñw akpabana ko̩la, kʼomi ki lo̩, kʼame̩ ki ma, kʼame̩ ki li ka kʼe̩wñ bibi ku me̩ che eju Jihofa onu ku me̩ bi ñw o̩la-me̩ le̩ tabale̩.
Abe̩le̩ Samiue̩l kwado̩ Jihofa; taku Jihofa je̩ ñw akpabana ko̩la kʼomi ojale ki lo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩. Oñ amone̩ le̩ chaka railo Jihofa kpai Samiue̩l tabale̩.
Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka ka ñwu Samiue̩l kakini, Fʼologu che bo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ tod amadu-we̩-i kʼa we eku; todu a ño̩ mʼe̩bie̩ne̩-i du manyʼadure-wa chaka, owñ chebi onu kʼa bi le̩.
Taku Samiue̩l ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ ki railo n; ame̩ fʼe̩bie̩ne̩-i du che mana; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ me̩ ki la rida bʼe̩tu Jihofa ubi te̩ n, me̩ ki muda re̩ Jihofa kpai e̩do̩-me̩ chaka;
me̩ ki la muna tʼo̩wo̩ʼka n; me̩ ki tʼe̩wñ ofofo ki ma nʼile n, ki ma la agbʼone̩ n, ubi n, todu e̩wñ le̩ chaka chʼo̩wai.
Todu Jihofa jʼatʼamone̩-wñ no̩ tinyo̩ n, todu odu-wñ ki tabale, todabu ki nyo̩ Jihofa eju kʼi ko me̩ che amone̩ ñw o̩la-wñ.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, i bo̩ tʼe-mi, ewe echadua todu me̩, kʼu du Jihofa re, e-le̩ ki jiji rʼumi. Omi muda ako̩ me̩ lo̩na ki nyo̩ ogbolo.
Chai erailo me̩ narailo Jihofa dee, ku me̩ la rʼo̩ kpai e̩do̩-me̩ chaka ochochi; todu me̩ nafʼibe e̩wñ inaina kʼi che ñwu me̩ lo.
I muda che̩wñ ku me̩ ache e̩wñ bibi alo waa, ame̩ alenyo̩, tʼame̩ tʼonu-me̩.
So̩l la jʼonu o̩do̩ʼka; tak e̩gba kʼi fʼonu Israe̩l je̩ o̩do̩ meji,

So̩l fʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta chi ñw o̩la-wñ; ef abo le̩ one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji jʼugbo So̩l Mikmaah kpai oj uwo Be̩te̩l, oñ one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ jʼugbo Jo̩natan Gibea e-Be̩njamin. Oñ i je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ef amone̩ kibo̩ kʼi le tʼunyabo-wñ.
Taku Jo̩natan fʼuche̩ amisoja abo Filistia ku ma jo̩ Geba gwo, oñ abo Filistia gbo̩. Taku So̩l fʼo̩kakachi fa ugbo du ane̩ le̩ kakini, AmaHibru ki nagbo̩!
Oñ abo Israe̩l chaka gbo̩ ka ku So̩l fʼuche̩ amisoja abo Filistia le̩ gwo; ma ño̩ gbo̩ ka kʼabo Filistia ahihie̩ne̩ abo Israe̩l. Taku ma fʼamone̩ le̩ do̩ wʼugbo So̩l Gilgal.

Abo Filistia la kʼo̩la-ma wajo̩ ku ma jogu kpai abo Israe̩l, o̩kogu-ma chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa, amananya che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩fa, uwewe amone̩-ma la dab e̩lanyi ki dʼeti ohimini; oñ ma lewa jo̩ Mikmash, o̩wo̩ olodudu Be̩t-afe̩n.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l li ka kʼama kwotʼo̩ me̩, (todu amone̩ le̩ gane̩ n); tak amone̩ le̩ kʼo̩la-ma maja ef owo kpai ef etutu kpai akpolo okuta kpai ef ura kpai ef obuga
oñ abo Hibru iche̩kibo̩ mudaba Jordan tʼojane̩ Gad kpai Gilead; So̩l muda de̩ Gilgal ta, amone̩ chaka la nʼo̩la ega atʼo̩ ubi.
Oñ i jʼo̩jo̩ mebie, alu kʼiko de̩ ku Samiue̩l da. Samiue̩l la wa Gilgal in; oñ amone̩ le̩ fiatuka bʼo̩ te̩.
Taku So̩l kakini, Mʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ ko wʼugbo mi emi. Tak i fʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo che.
Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼi fʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ che kpa ababa, go, Samiue̩l lewa; oñ So̩l kwodufu aledʼo, kʼi fʼu gwa.
Taku Samiue̩l kakini, E̩wñ e̩ che-i? Oñ So̩l kakini, Abu kʼu li ka kʼamone̩ a fiatuka bʼumi te̩, kʼe̩ ma la wa iko kʼe̩ da n, kʼabo Filistia la kʼo̩la-ma dojo̩ Mikmash;
todule̩ u kakini, Fai abo Filistia agwo̩ru wa Gilgal abʼumi ma, u la gbo̩ko̩bo̩ Jihofa kʼi li mi eju ta n. Todule̩ u fʼeju kpolo che, oñ u fʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo che.

Taku Samiue̩l ka ñwu So̩l kakini, Idada e̩ che le̩; e̩ la de uko̩ ku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ te̩ le̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ñwa ñw uwe̩ onugo; cho̩kpo̩ni fa-i Jihofa ma fʼo̩fe̩-we̩ ugbo abo Israe̩l lonyane̩ ogbegbele̩.

Fai o̩fe̩-we̩ la anʼe̩rane̩ n Jihofa la fʼe̩ne̩ kʼi adʼalu kʼe̩do̩-wñ onugo de̩ tene ñw o̩la-wñ me̩. Jihofa la fuñwa ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ ka kʼi achʼe̩nuto̩gba abo-wñ, ukpe̩ kʼuwe̩ ma de e̩wñ ku Jihofa ñwa ñw e̩ le̩ n.
Taku Samiue̩l kwane̩, oñ i kwo Gilgal nyi Gibea e-Be̩njamin.
So̩l kpai Jo̩natan, o̩ma-wñ, kpai amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-ma o̩mo̩ la kwogugu Geba e-Be̩njamin: abo Filistia muda ruru jo̩ Mikmash.
Tak amakpunyifo̩ kwef uru abo Filistia wa uche̩ me̩ta; Uche̩ʼka rida tʼo̩na alenyi Ofra, tʼane̩ Shual;
oñ uche̩ omune̩ rida tʼo̩na Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n; uche̩ omune̩ la rida lʼo̩na alo̩me̩ ki akpejurʼo̩go̩ Zeboim o̩wo̩ aje̩tachi o̩mo̩.
One̩ ali agwalo̩ ugbo du ane̩ Israe̩l e̩gbale̩ n; todu abo Filistia kakini, Tode̩gba kʼabo Hibru agwʼugbada abe̩k o̩kwo̩ ñw o̩la-ma.
Abo Israe̩l du gwo̩ru nyʼugbo abo Filistia, kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼi no̩ aña-wñ, kpai uko̩che̩-wñ kpai e̩do̩-wñ kpai o̩pia-wñ.
Ma la arʼo̩me̩ o̩ko̩ me̩le̩ todu o̩pia kpai uko̩che̩ eno̩; e-o̩kwo̩ abalu me̩ta kpai odu chʼo̩ko̩ meji.
Abe̩le̩ i lewatu, o̩jo̩ kʼogu chi le̩, ma li ugbada abe̩k o̩kwo̩ ef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ du ku ma jʼugbo So̩l kpai Jo̩natan le̩ n. Chai ugbo So̩l kpai Jo̩natan, o̩ma-wñ, ma liʼi.
Tak uche̩ amisoja abo Filistia ku ma dide o̩mo̩ ledufu nyʼugbo kʼo̩na lʼef o̩go̩ Mikmash.
Oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ʼka taku Jo̩natan, o̩ma So̩l, ka ñw okolobia kʼi anʼane̩ ogu-wñ kakini, Lewa, kʼa nyʼugbo abide abo Filistia ku ma jʼudaba o̩mo̩. I muda ka ñw ata-wñ n.
So̩l la gugu iba o̩wo̩ʼka Gibea ofʼoli po̩me̩grane̩t e-ki de̩ Migro̩n; oñ amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ dab one̩ ulo̩gwa;
manyʼAhija, o̩ma Ahitub, o̩maye Ikabo̩d kʼi chʼo̩ma Finehas, o̩ma Ilai, atama Jihofa Shailo i che; i ne̩ e̩fo̩d o̩la. Amone̩ le̩ la ma ku Jo̩natan kwʼo̩mo̩ le n.
Oñ agbagba o̩na o̩na ku Jo̩natan ache kʼi daba nyʼugbo abide abo Filistia le̩ okuta agogo dʼo̩wo̩ʼka-wñ, oñ okuta ago̩go̩ dʼo̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ: odu oka-wñ ko̩ Boze̩z, odu ekeji-wñ la ko̩ Sene.
Okuta ago̩go̩ʼka le̩ dago go̩mugo̩mu o̩wo̩ o̩pata awohi, o̩gba Mikmash, oñ ekeji-wñ dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata awo̩to̩ o̩gba Geba.

Taku Jo̩natan ka ñw okolobia ki anʼane̩ ogu-wñ kakini, Lewa kʼa daba nyʼugbo abide abo e̩pi odukulu-i; ikani Jihofa ache uko̩lo̩ ñw a; todu i nʼe̩wñ du ki adu Jihofa hi ejadu lʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ n, dagba ma wewe, dagba ma de̩ ke̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ ki anʼane̩ ogu-wñ ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ du ki dʼe̩do̩-we̩ e̩ che: rida waa, go, omi dʼugbo-we̩ alu du kʼe̩do̩-we̩ neku.
Taku Jo̩natan kakini, Go, awa adaba nyʼugbo abo-i, a adʼo̩la-wa te̩ ñwu ma ku ma ma.
Iche̩wñ ku ma ka abe̩le̩ ñw a kakini, Dago o̩mo̩ gbʼe̩gba kʼa wʼugbo we̩; e̩gba le̩ a akwodago e̩gu-wa le̩, a la ate̩-gu nyʼugbo ma n.
Ama iche̩wñ ku ma ka abe̩le̩ ñw a kakini, Mute̩gu wʼugbo wa; e̩gba le̩ tak a ate̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩; todu Jihofa mʼuma ko jʼef o̩wo-wa, e̩wñ ki la chʼujiwe ñw a la de̩.
Tak ama meji dʼo̩la-ma te̩ kʼabide abo Filistia ki ma. Oñ abo Filistia kakini, Me̩ go, abo Hibru akwef ura ugbo ku ma kʼo̩la-ma maja dufu me̩.

Tak aboke̩le̩ abide le̩ dohi ñwu Jo̩natan kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼane̩-wñ le̩ kakini, Mute̩gu wʼugbo wa kʼa dʼe̩wñʼka ña me̩. Taku Jo̩natan ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki nʼane̩-wñ kakini, Tʼumi ubi waa; todu Jihofa mʼuma ko jʼef o̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l me̩.
Taku Jo̩natan mʼe̩wo̩-wñ ko dʼane̩ te̩gu, oñ e̩ne̩ ki anʼane̩ ogu-wñ tʼo̩ ubi. Taku ma chane̩ e̩wane̩ o̩gba Jo̩natan, oñ e̩ne̩ ki nʼane̩ ogu-wñ le̩ tʼubi-wñ akpa ma.
Oñ ekpa ku Jo̩natan kpʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼane̩ ogu-wñ kpa ma ejodudu i dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ ogu ku, ane̩ ugbo du ku ma jo̩ le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼukpe̩ji ikpoga.
Tak egagogodo lewa tef uni kpʼef uche̩ ef amone̩ le̩ chaka; abide kpʼabo ku ma kpʼane̩ fo̩ la ño̩ gagogodo ge̩; oñ ane̩ chane̩ emiejo. Abe̩le̩ egagogodo e-O̩jo̩ do̩mo̩.
Tak abide So̩l Gibea e-Be̩njamin kejuru o̩me̩; me̩ la go, o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ jʼarida yo̩o̩ yo̩o̩.
Taku So̩l ka ñw amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kakini, Me̩ fʼabo-wa kaluka ku me̩ li e̩ne̩ kʼi kwʼef uwa. Oñ e̩gba ku ma fʼuma kaluka go, Jo̩natan kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi anʼane̩ ogu-wñ do̩mo̩ n.
Taku So̩l ka ñw Abija kakini, Dʼakpati O̩jo̩ wa. Todu akpati O̩jo̩ dʼugbo amo̩ma Israe̩l iko le̩.
Oñ i lewatu abu ku So̩l nako̩la ñw atama le̩, kʼe̩kuku ki dʼef uru abo Filistia nache nyo̩gba lo waa; taku So̩l ka ñw atama le̩ kakini, Mʼo̩wo̩-we̩ du.
Oñ So̩l kpʼamone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ chaka mudabi wa, oñ ma kwojʼogu. Me̩ la go, ugbada e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ agwunyʼekeji-wñ, uchobi inaina i che.
Oñ abo Hibru ku ma jʼugbo abo Filistia akwoubi, ku ma la le̩bʼuma nyʼef uru le̩, abo le̩ ño̩ murida tef abo Israe̩l ku ma jʼugbo So̩l kpai Jo̩natan.
Abe̩le̩ ge̩, aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka ku ma kʼo̩la-ma maja ane̩ uwo ku ma do̩ ko̩ Ifraim, e̩gba ku ma gbo̩ ka kʼabo Filistia ara me̩, abo le̩ ño̩ rano ma una una ef ogu le̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa fʼabo Israe̩l jadu o̩jo̩ le̩: oñ ogu le̩ lale gu Be̩t-afe̩n du.

I muda kpatane̩ ñw aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l o̩jo̩ le̩; todu So̩l fʼO̩jo̩ go̩ nʼamone̩ le̩, i kakini. E̩ne̩ du ki dʼuje̩wñ kadʼalu gbogbo tak olu eñini-i ki tunyʼane̩ kʼu la fʼache̩ o̩la-mi na ugbo ame̩nebi-mi-i, ama ki fʼu mu. Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ du ef amone̩ le̩ dʼuje̩wñ kadʼalu n.
Oñ amone̩ le̩ chaka wʼeti okoʼka; iño̩ la jʼane̩pe̩te̩ o̩mo̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼamone̩ le̩ lewa efoko le̩, go, iño̩ akito̩ wʼane̩. E̩ne̩ du muda hi o̩wo̩-wñ mʼalu n; todu amone̩ arailo ego̩ ku ma go̩ le̩.
Jo̩natan muda gbo̩ e̩gba kʼata-wñ ñwañw amone̩ ugbo ego̩ kʼi go̩ le̩ n. Todule̩ i fʼo̩kpa ki dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ nadala oñ i dʼoji-wñ tunyʼapachi iño̩, tak i hi o̩wo̩-wñ mʼalu-wñ; oñ eju-wñ le̩ane̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka ef amone̩ le̩ dohi kakini, Ata-we̩ fʼO̩jo̩ go̩ nʼamone̩-i gbali kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki fʼuje̩wñ je̩ eñini kide̩ ama ki fʼu mu. O̩la amone̩ le̩ la chʼe̩da.
Taku Jo̩natan kakini, Ata-mi mʼihianyi ko wa abʼane̩-i ma me̩; nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, me̩ go abu kʼeju-mi mune̩, todabu ku dʼiño̩-i re kadʼalu.
Iche̩wñ kʼamone̩-i ma fʼe̩wñ je̩ alu ki rʼuma eju kwef ane̩ ame̩nebi-ma ku ma ko eñini-i, i ma nyo̩ tule nana n? tak ekpa ku ma ma kpʼabo Filistia ma nana tule n?
Ma la fʼabo Filistia kpa o̩jo̩ le̩ akwo Mikmash gbogbo wa kad Aija-lo̩n. Uhia la fʼamone̩ le̩ hia tabale;
tak amone̩ le̩ gwo̩ko̩ rʼane̩ kʼogu je̩, oñ ma mʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpai amokuno̩ kpai amo̩ma okuno̩ ko kpa jʼane̩pe̩te̩ o̩mo̩; amone̩ le̩ la muko je̩ manyʼe̩bie̩-wñ.
Taku ma mudu ka ñwu So̩l kakini. Go, amone̩-i adu Jihofa re, owñ chʼe̩wñ ku ma je̩ manyʼe̩bie̩-wñ. Oñ i kakini, O̩wo̩ me̩ du tef ukpo aro̩kpo̩ le̩; fʼokuta elile li wʼugbo-mi eñini-i.

Taku So̩l kakini, Me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ kpatuka rʼef amone̩-i ku me̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼi nadʼo̩kokuno̩-wñ wa, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼi la dʼe̩wño̩re̩-wñ egini wa, ku ma fʼu kpa emi ku ma je̩; ku me̩ la we edu Jihofa re ef uje̩wñ ku me̩ je̩ manyʼe̩bie̩ le̩. Tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ amone̩ le̩ chaka dʼo̩kokuno̩ wʼugbo-wñ odu o̩jo̩ le̩, oñ ma mʼu ko kpa o̩mo̩.
Taku So̩l fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa, e-le̩ chʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ o̩mama kʼi ne ñwu Jihofa.

Taku So̩l kakini, Lewa kʼa gwo̩ru nyʼugbo abo Filistia odu, kʼa mʼane̩-ma ko gbogbo tak ane̩ ki ne̩, kʼa tʼe̩ne̩ kate no̩ kʼi bo̩ n. Taku ma kakini, E̩wñ du ki rʼe̩ eju e̩ che ke. Tak amatama kakini, Lewa kʼa te̩me̩ru O̩jo̩ ta.
Taku So̩l tene kʼO̩jo̩ ki ñʼo̩ o̩la, kakini, Omi agwo̩ru anʼabo Filistia ubi, abe̩? Uwe̩ ako ma jʼef o̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l? I muda dohi ñw u o̩jo̩ le̩ n.
Taku So̩l kakini, Me̩ te̩wʼemi, ame̩ agboji amone̩-i, chaka, kʼa ma kʼa li ugbo kʼadure-i chane̩ kwo eñini-i.
Todu oji Jihofa ki ajadu Israe̩l, dagba ki che Jo̩natan o̩ma-mi, eku i aku chuu. I muda nʼe̩ne̩ du ef amone̩ le̩ chaka kʼi dohi ñw u n.
Tak i ka ñw abo Israe̩l chaka kakini, Ame̩ ki jo̩wo̩ʼka o̩mo, oñ omi kpai Jo̩natan, o̩ma-mi, ajʼo̩wo̩ ekeji. Tak amone̩ le̩ ka ñwu So̩l kakini, E̩ che e̩wñ ki rʼuwe̩ eju ke.
Todule̩ So̩l ka ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l, kakini, E̩ ki je̩ ñw anya ki je̩ o̩kpakpa. Tak i fu Jo̩natan kpai So̩l je̩; oñ i lʼamone̩ le̩ oji.
Taku So̩l kakini, Me̩ fʼanya ro̩ agbagba-mi kpai Jo̩natan, o̩ma-mi. Oñ i fu Jo̩natan je̩.
Taku So̩l ka ñwu Jo̩natan kakini, Ka ñwu mi e̩wñ kʼe̩ che. Taku Jo̩natan mudu ka ñw u, oñ i kakini, Ochochi, omi mʼoji o̩kpa ki dʼef o̩wo̩-mi du jʼiño̩ ma re; e̩ la go, eku naku tila-i.
Taku So̩l kakini, O̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che kpai e-kʼi tʼe-i le ge̩; todu uwe̩ aku chuu, Jo̩natan.

Tak amone̩ le̩ ka ñwu So̩l kakini, Jo̩natan, kʼi fʼujadu inaina che ef Israe̩l-i aku ge̩? E-le̩ ame̩rʼu kikili n: oji Jihofa, iloji-wñ okate awʼane̩pete̩ n; todu owñ kpʼO̩jo̩ chʼuko̩lo̩ le̩ eñini-i. Abe̩le̩ amone̩ le̩ mu Jo̩natan gba tane̩ kʼi we eku.
Taku So̩l mudabi bʼabo Filistia ubi te̩; oñ abo Filistia mudabi tʼe̩gu e-ma.

E̩gba ku So̩l mʼo̩da onu ojane̩ Israe̩l gba, i kʼogu bʼame̩nebi-wñ chaka o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du, i kobo̩ Moab kpʼamo̩ma Amo̩n kpai Ido̩m kpai amonu Zoba kpai abo Filistia; oñ ugbo du kʼi rida tu i fʼuma du.
I la fʼe̩wñ ugbiti che; i fʼabo Amale̩k gwo da, oñ i mʼabo Israe̩l gbatane̩ kwef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma kpʼuma fo̩.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ So̩l la che Jo̩natan, kpai Ishfi kpai Malkishua; oñ amo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ chʼeji, odu e-o̩mo̩gba-wñ ko̩ Me̩rab, odu okekele-wñ ko̩ Maikal:
odu o̩ya So̩l la ko̩ Ahinoam, o̩ma Ahimaz. Odu onu abogu-wñ ko̩ Abina, o̩ma Ne̩r, kʼi chʼo̩maye ata So̩l.
Kish chʼata So̩l; Ne̩r kʼi chʼata Abina la chʼo̩ma Abie̩l.
Ogu ku ma ja kpʼabo Filistia o̩jo̩ du chʼekpuna gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku So̩l. Oñ e̩gba du ku So̩l fʼe̩nukpahiu abe̩k e̩nagbiti li, i mʼe̩ne̩ le̩ gba tʼef abo-wñ.
Taku Samiue̩l ka ñwu So̩l kakini, Jihofa kpe̩ mi wa kʼu fʼekpo ba tʼuwe̩ oji kʼe̩ jʼonu amone̩-wñ, owñ chʼabo Israe̩l; todule̩ e̩ nanetiru omuko̩la Jihofa fa-i.
Abu ku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩, U fʼe̩wñ kʼAmale̩k che abo Israe̩l ma du, owñ chʼalu kʼi kobʼo̩ ejo̩na e̩gba kʼi kwʼIjipti awa le̩.

Fa-i e̩ lo kʼe̩ fʼAmale̩k gwoda, kʼe̩ la fʼe̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩, e̩ ki do̩wo̩mʼuma n; tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼonobule̩ e̩ kpa ma, tʼimo̩to̩ kekele tʼo̩me̩kpa, tʼo̩kokuno̩ tʼe̩wño̩re̩ egini, tʼinyakulumi tʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩.
Taku So̩l fʼabo-wñ do̩ wa, oñ i fuma kaluka Te̩laim; abo ku ma lule̩ e̩re̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gwo̩ko̩, aboke̩le̩ Juda la che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa.
Oñ e̩gba ku So̩l lewa ewo Amale̩k le̩, i je̩ ñw abo-wñ kpala jo̩ ef o̩go̩-wñ.

Taku So̩l ka ñw abo Ken kakini, Me̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ alo; me̩ ki kwʼef abo Amale̩k gwo̩ru alo, tode̩gba kʼu nakpa me̩ manyʼuma; todu ame̩ mo̩la ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l e̩gba ku ma kwʼane̩ Ijipti wa. Abe̩le̩ abo Ken kwo bʼef abo Amale̩k te̩.
Taku So̩l fʼabo Amale̩k gwoda, akwo Hafila abu kʼe̩ nyi Shur, e-ki dʼo̩gba Ijipti le̩.
Oñ i fʼEgag, onu abo Amale̩k le̩ mu udeju udeju, tak i nʼalu ugbada mʼamone̩ le̩ chaka kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ kpa.

So̩l kpai amone̩-wñ muda do̩wo̩mo̩ Egag, kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ kpai amokuno̩ kpai ame̩la ki yoyo kpai amo̩mala kpai e̩wñ du ki nyo̩; ma ko̩ ekʼabo e-le̩ jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩; oñ ma mʼe̩wñ e̩de̩te̩ du kpai e̩wñ o̩jeita kojo̩ ñwʼuku hioko.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Samiue̩l kakini,
So̩l kʼomi du jʼonu le̩ awo̩ mi; todu i mudabi bʼumi ubi te̩ me̩, i la che e̩wñ kʼomi ñwa ñw u n. Oñ Samiue̩l we̩do̩; tak i kwokwado̩ Jihofa gbogbo ñwʼo̩jo̩.

Taku Samiue̩l takpa kwane̩ kʼi ledo So̩l odudu-wñ. Oñ ma mudu ka ñw Samiue̩l kakini, So̩l lewa Karme̩l me̩, e̩ la go, i m ʼe̩wñ urewa-wñ du dago o̩mo̩, tak i murida, oñ i legudu, i la gwo̩ru nyi Gilgal.
Taku Samiue̩l lewa ugbo So̩l; oñ So̩l ka ñw u kakini, O̩jo̩ ki de̩nyo̩ ñwʼe̩: u fʼe̩wñ ku Jihofa ñwa le̩ che kpa me̩.
Taku Samiue̩l kakini, Mak e̩wñ chʼoji ukwa ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ki dʼeti-mi-i, kpai ukwa amokuno̩ kʼu nagbo̩-i?

Taku So̩l kakini, Ugbo abo Amale̩k oñ ma ko ma kwo wa: todu amone̩-i do̩wo̩mo̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpai amokuno̩ e-o̩me̩mele̩ ku ma ko che iche̩bo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ chaka a kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩.
Taku Samiue̩l ka ñwu So̩l kakini, We ta! Kʼu naka ñw e̩ e̩wñ ku Jihofa ka ñwu mi odu eñini-i. Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Ka waa.
Taku Samiue̩l kakini, Dagba kʼe̩ nya eju o̩la-we̩, i chʼuwe̩ ma du chʼe̩nuto̩gba o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l in? Jihofa la fʼekpo ba tʼuwe̩ oji kʼe̩ jʼonu abo Israe̩l;
taku Jihofa fʼuwe̩ kpe̩ nyʼule̩, oñ i kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ fʼabo Amale̩k, ame̩nadure le̩, kojo̩ ñw uku hioko kʼe̩ la kogu bʼama gbogbo taku ma lenyo̩ rʼile̩.
Mak e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma gbʼomu Jihofa gbo̩ n? Kʼe̩ muda gwo̩ko̩rʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩ le̩, kʼe̩ la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che ta?
Taku So̩l ka ñwu Samiue̩l kakini, Ochochi, u mʼomu Jihofa gbagbo̩, u laño̩ le o̩na ku Jihofa kpe̩ mi le̩, u la fʼEgag, onu abo Amale̩k, mu wa, oñ u fʼabo Amale̩k kojo̩ ñw uku hioko.
Amone̩-i muda mʼe̩wñ e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ kʼogu je̩ le̩ ko̩, owñ chʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpai amokuno̩ kpai e̩wñ ki nyo̩ tule ef e̩wñ kʼa kojo̩ le̩, ku ma muko che iche̩bo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ Gilgal.
Taku Samiue̩l kakini,
Todu e̩re̩ ubi ero̩ kpʼifa ebo̩ chʼadure okujo̩,
Taku So̩l dohi ñwu Samiue̩l kakini, U fʼadure ta, todu u mʼe̩wñ ku Jihofa ñwa daba, kpai o̩la-we̩ ge̩, todabu kʼu railo amone̩-i kʼu la gbʼomu-ma gbo̩.
Todule̩ fa-i, narodubʼe̩, e̩ tʼadure-mi-i no̩ tinyo̩ bʼumi oji te̩, kʼe̩ murida aba mi, todu kʼu dojikane̩ ñwu Jihofa.
Samiue̩l muda ka ñwu So̩l kakini, U ñʼadabi lebʼe̩ ge̩ n; todabu kʼe̩ ko o̩la Jihofa, Jihofa laño̩ ko̩ eje̩ ñw e̩ chʼonu Israe̩l ge̩.
Oñ abu ku Samiue̩l murida kʼi alo, So̩l gwo̩nyʼeti otogbo-wñ, oñ i mʼu fana.
Taku Samiue̩l ka ñw u kakini, Jihofa la fʼojane̩ Israe̩l fana bʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ te̩ eñini-i, oñ i mʼu du ñw ekeji-we̩ʼka, e-kʼi nyo̩ tʼuwe̩ le.
E̩wñʼka ño̩ de̩-i ge̩: Ukpahiu Israe̩l aremi n, i ajumama n, todu owñ chʼone̩ ofo tak i ajumama n.
Taku So̩l kakini, U fadure ta, e̩ ki muda bʼojima mʼumi eju abogijo amone̩-i kpai eju abo Israe̩l kʼe̩ la mudabi aba mi, todu kʼu dojikane̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo-we̩, agba!
Abe̩le̩ Samiue̩l murida atu So̩l ubi; oñ So̩l dojikane̩ ñwu Jihofa.
Taku Samiue̩l kakini, MʼEgag, onu abo Amale̩k du wʼugbo mi emi. Tak Egag nayo̩ awʼugbo-wñ. Egag kakini, Ibe e̩rikoko ku ma adʼumi kpa lale me̩.
Taku Samiue̩l kakini, Alu kʼugbada-we̩ ma je̩ ñw abobule̩ ki nʼo̩ma n, abe̩le̩ iye-we̩ anʼo̩ma ef abobule̩ ge̩ n. Taku Samiue̩l fʼEgag kpanya jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa Gilgal.
Taku Samiue̩l le tu Rama, oñ So̩l mute̩gu tʼunyi e-wñ, Gibea e-So̩l.
Samiue̩l ño̩ li So̩l gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ ge̩ n; todu Samiue̩l adeku So̩l; oñ i wo̩ Jihofa ugbo onu Israe̩l kʼi du So̩l je̩ le̩.

Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Samiue̩l kakini, Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba e̩ deku So̩l kade? Abu kʼu ko̩ eje̩ ñw u chʼonu Israe̩l? Fʼekpo ba nyʼigba-we̩ e̩ko̩, kʼe̩ lo. Nakpʼe̩ nyʼugbo Je̩si, e̩ne̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m le̩; todu u fʼonu li ñw o̩la-mi ef amo̩ma-wñ.
Taku Samiue̩l kakini, Abu nache kʼu nale? So̩l gbo̩ i adʼumi kpa. Taku Jihofa kakini, Mʼole okuno̩ agbadufu du alo, kʼe̩ ka kakini, U lewa kʼu che iche̩bo̩ ñwu Jihofa.
Oñ e̩ fu Je̩si do̩ wʼugbo iche̩bo̩ le̩, tak u nañʼe̩ e̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ache. Uwe̩ la abʼekpo toji e̩ne̩ kʼu nadʼodu-wñ ñw e̩ ñwu mi.
Taku Samiue̩l che e̩wñ ku Jihofa ka, oñ e̩gba kʼi lewa Be̩tle̩he̩m abogijo ewo le̩ lewa ugbo-wñ kpai o̩la egagogodo; oñ ma kakini, Ure̩do̩ e̩ ne̩ wa?

Tak i kakini, Ure̩do̩ i che; u wa kʼu fʼiche̩bo̩ che ñwu Jihofa; me̩ gwʼo̩la-me̩ rinyo̩ ku me̩ fo̩, ku me̩ lebʼumi nyʼoko iche̩bo̩ le̩. Tak i fu Je̩si kpai amo̩ma-wñ o̩la gwo rinyo̩ ku ma fo̩, oñ i do̩ ma wʼugbo iche̩bo̩ le̩.
Tak i lewatu abu ku ma lewa, i gʼE̩liab, oñ i kakini, E̩ne̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo batʼo̩ oji dʼo̩gba-wñ-i chuu.

Jihofa muda ka ñwu Samiue̩l kakini, E̩ ki nyeti alu kʼeju-wñ de̩ n, kpʼegba kʼi gba le̩ n; todu u ko̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ me̩; todu i chʼalu kʼone̩ ali e̩wñ oñ omi ali n; todu one̩ ago alu kʼej o̩do̩da-wñ de̩, Jihofa muda ago ef e̩do̩.
Taku Je̩si fʼAbinadab do̩ wa, oñ i je̩ ñw u lale o̩gba Samiue̩l. Tak i kakini, I la chʼe̩ne̩-i Jihofa du ni ge̩.
Taku Je̩si je̩ ñwu Shama lale o̩mo̩. Oñ i kakini, Jihofa la dʼe̩ne̩-i n.
Abe̩le̩ Je̩si je̩ ñw amo̩ma-wñ mebie lale o̩gba Samiue̩l. Taku Samiue̩l ka ñwu Je̩si kakini, I chʼabo-i oñ Jihofa du n.

Taku Samiue̩l ka ñw Je̩si kakini, Abokolobia takpa? Tak i kakini, I bʼe-kekele ta, e̩ la go, i do̩mo̩ adejutʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini. Taku Samiue̩l ka ñwu Je̩si kakini, Kpʼone̩ nyʼadʼo̩ wa; todu a aguane̩ gbogbo tak i wʼemi n.
Tak i fʼone̩ kpe̩ amʼowñ du wʼunyi. Año̩la-wñ la de̩ yo̩o̩, eju-wñ chʼalifia, i che̩fe̩rʼeju. Taku Jihofa kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji; todu owñ le̩ de̩.
Abe̩le̩ Samiue̩l mʼigba ekpo le̩ du, oñ i fu ba tʼowñ oji alumeji amo̩maye-wñ. Oñ Afu Jihofa lewa bu Defid ma ukpahiu ukpahiu, akwo o̩jo̩ le̩ gbogbo alo. Taku Samiue̩l kwane̩, oñ i le tu Rama.
Afu Jihofa la kwo bu So̩l te̩. Oñ afu e̩bie̩ne̩ʼka kwʼugbo Jihofa wa anyʼu ailo.
Tak abuko̩lo̩ So̩l ka ñw u kakini, E̩ go ta, afu e̩bie̩ne̩ʼka kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ wa anyʼuwe̩ ailo me̩.
Odu-wa ki nañwa ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ ku ma jʼo̩gba-we̩-i ku ma tejane̩ e̩ne̩ ki chʼo̩ka umolo enu. Tak e̩gba kʼafu e̩bie̩ne̩ kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ wʼo̩la-we̩, e̩ne̩ le̩ anʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼu tak eju-we̩ ane̩.
Taku So̩l ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ natene e̩ne̩ kʼi meju e̩wñ enu nyo̩nyo̩ ñwu mi, ku me̩ mʼu du wʼugbo mi

Tak e̩nuko̩lo̩ʼka dohi kakini, Go, u fʼo̩ma Je̩si, e̩ne̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m oka li, i chʼo̩ka e̩wñ enu, e̩nagbiti i che, kpai e̩ne̩ ki meju ogu eja. I la meju o̩la eka e̩te̩le̩, i chenʼaño̩la bo̩lo̩bo̩lo̩; Jihofa la dʼugbo-wñ.
Taku So̩l fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Je̩si, oñ i kakini, Je̩ ñwu Defid o̩ma-we̩ wʼugbo-mi, e-kʼi dʼugbo ame̩wño̩re̩ egini le̩.
Taku Je̩si mʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ du, kpai uje̩wñ, kpai aiko omi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai o̩mʼewo, oñ i mʼu ko kpuche̩ lʼo̩wo̩ Defid, o̩ma-wñ nyʼugbo So̩l.
Taku Defid lewʼugbo So̩l ejefu, oñ i kwodago o̩gba-wñ, i la fe̩do̩-wñ tabale; oñ i mud e̩ne̩ kʼi anʼane̩ o̩gu-wñ.
Taku So̩l fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Je̩si kakini, Agba, e̩ ki je̩ ñwu Defid kʼi dʼugbo-mi; todu i cherʼumi eju tabale.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼafu e̩bie̩ne̩ kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ wa abu So̩l ma. Defid mʼumolo du, oñ i nʼo̩wo̩-wñ anu. Abe̩le̩ eju So̩l lewane̩, tak e̩do̩-wñ bo̩, oñ afu e̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ kwo bʼo̩ te̩.
E̩gbale̩ abo Filistia kʼabogu-ma wajo̩ ku ma nyʼokogu; oñ ma jeju jo̩ Soko kʼi dʼoj ane̩ Juda, ma la ruru jo̩ E̩fe̩s-dammim agbagba Soko kpai Azika.
Taku So̩l kpʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l kʼo̩la-ma wa jo̩, oñ ma ruru jo̩ ef o̩go̩ Ela, ma la kʼabogu dojo̩ ku ma kogu bʼabo Filistia.
Tak abo Filistia dago jʼoj uwo o̩wo̩ʼka, oñ abo Israe̩l dago jʼoj uwo o̩wo̩ ekeji. O̩go̩ la dʼagbagba-ma.
Oñ e̩nugbitiʼka kwef uru abo Filistia dufu, odu-wñ ko̩ Golayat, abo Gat; o̩gba-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa nyʼo̩gabaʼka.
Ukata ebije ekpikpa la dʼoji-wñ, afe̩ ebije dʼo̩la-wñ; uwoji afe̩ le̩ che she̩ke̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu.
I laño̩ dʼebijeikpa ji mʼo̩go̩lo̩-wñ, opiolo ku ma nʼebije ekpikpa che la lo̩ko̩li agbagba ika-wñ meji.
Oli kʼi la du tunyʼo̩kwo̩-wñ dab ugbo̩lo̩ oli kʼahiukpo adʼukpo-wñ wenyu; uwoji ebije o̩kwo̩-wñ che she̩ke̩l ebije ulo̩gwa; e̩ne̩ kʼi anʼikpako-wñ tʼowñ o̩gba.

Tak i kwodago, oñ i chane̩ ekwa do̩ abo udala udala Israe̩l, i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ dufu wa akʼo̩la-me̩ dojo̩ ku me̩ jʼogu-i? I chʼabo Filistia omi che n? Ame̩ la chʼamadu So̩l n? Mʼe̩ne̩ʼka chi koji o̩la-me̩, ku me̩ je̩ ñw u gwo̩ru wʼugbo-mi-i.
I la che̩wñ kʼi neke bʼumi ja, kʼi la adʼumi kpa, e̩gbale̩ a achʼamadu e-me̩; i muda che̩wñ kʼu fʼe̩ne̩ le̩ du, kʼu la mʼu du kpa, mak ame̩ achʼama-du e-wa ku me̩ re̩ wa.
Oñ e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ kakini, Ina nabu abo ogu Israe̩l eñini-i; mʼe̩ne̩ʼka chi dufu ñwu mi kʼa ja kpai o̩la-wa.
Tak e̩gba ku So̩l kpai abo Israe̩l chaka gbʼo̩la e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩, oñ e̩do̩-ma muda kpu, oñ ma railo tabale.
Defid la chʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ E̩frat e-Be̩tle̩he̩m e-Juda kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Je̩si; e̩ne̩ le̩ la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ me̩jo̩. I la chʼogijo ef adiko So̩l, anagbo ef amone̩ i che.
Amo̩ma Je̩si ogijo me̩ta la tu So̩l ubi nyʼoko ogu e̩gbale̩ me̩. Odu amo̩ma-wñ me̩ta ki nyʼogu le̩ ko̩ E̩liab, o̩mo̩gba-wñ, arone-wñ la chʼAbinadab, e̩ke̩ta-ma la che Shama.
Oñ Defid chʼimo̩to̩ ef uma; abogijo me̩ta le̩ la tu So̩l ubi.
Defid la lelo lewa ugbo So̩l kʼi kʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini e-ata-wñ je̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m.
Oñ e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ nate̩wa odudu kpai ane̩, i la dʼo̩la-wñ te̩ abe̩le̩ o̩jo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji.
O̩jo̩ʼka Je̩si ka ñwu Defid o̩ma-wñ kakini, E̩ mʼe̩ro̩ e̩wñ e̩yo̩ e̩faʼka du tod amo̩maye-we̩, kpai akala me̩gwa-i kʼe̩ mʼu ko nyʼuru ugbo amo̩maye-we̩ piopio;
kʼe̩ mʼe̩ma omi e̩nya me̩gwa-i ko nyʼugbo abogijo isoja icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e-ma le̩, kʼe̩ gʼalu kʼamo̩maye-we̩ de̩, kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ ujiwe-ma gba wa.
E̩gbale̩ So̩l kpai ama, kpai aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka jʼef o̩go̩ Ela ajogu kpai abo Filistia.

Oñ Defid takpa takpa kwane̩ odudu, i la tʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini no̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ adideʼka, oñ i mʼe̩wñ le̩ ko le alu ku Je̩si ñwa ñw u. I lewa alu o̩kpe̩ abu kʼabogu ku ma nyʼoko ogu eja chane̩ echʼukulu ogu.
Tak abo Israe̩l kpai abo Filistia kʼo̩la-ma dojo̩ ku ma ja, abogu le̩ kpejurʼo̩la-ma.
Taku Defid tʼadu-wñ no̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi adide ane̩-ma, oñ i fule nyʼugbo abogu le̩. I lewa fʼamo̩maye-wñ gwa.
Oñ abu kʼi do̩mo̩ ako̩la kpai ama go, e̩ne̩ Filistia e-Gat, kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Golayat, e̩nagbiti le̩, mute̩gu kwef udala abo Filistia awa, oñ i nʼo̩la alu kʼi te̩taka le̩ gbage̩de̩ aka; Defid la gbʼo̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l fʼe̩ne̩ le̩ li o̩chaka-ma ra bʼo̩ te̩, ma la chokpo tabale.

Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l kakini, Ame̩ li e̩ne̩ kʼi te̩gu awa-i? Todu kʼi bʼabo Israe̩l ina oñ i awa-i ochochi; ab i ade̩ de̩, onu akʼe̩wñ ñw e̩ne̩ du kʼi mʼowñ du kpa, kʼi mud anana otemeje. I lañʼadʼo̩ma-wñ kpʼo̩. I aje̩ ñw abo unyi ata-wñ ku ma nʼo̩la-ma ogbolo oj ane̩ Israe̩l.

Taku Defid ko̩la ñw aboke̩le̩ ku ma dago kpenyʼu kakini, E̩wñ ma ache ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi mʼe̩ne̩ Filistia-i du kpa, kʼi laño̩ mʼina du bʼoji abo Israe̩l te̩ ta? Todu e̩ne̩ e̩pi odukulu e-Filistia-i, e̩ne̩ owñ che kʼi abʼabogu e-O̩jo̩ ki deju ina ta?
Tak amone̩ le̩ dohi ñw u alu le̩ ge̩ kakini, Abe̩-i abe̩-i oñ ma ache ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi adʼu kpa.

Oñ E̩liab acho̩gba-wñ gbo̩ e̩gba kʼi ako̩la ñw aboke̩le̩ le̩; tak uwe̩do̩ E̩liab mutajo bu Defid ma, oñ i kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ gwo̩ru wʼemi? Ame̩-wño̩re̩ egini re ef aje̩tachi le̩ e̩ne̩ e̩ tʼuma no jʼugbo-wñ? U chema uba-we̩ kpai e̩bie̩ne̩ ki dʼe̩do̩-we̩; todu kʼe̩ go ogu ku ma ja oñ e̩ wa-i.
Taku Defid kakini, Ab u che ta? I nʼe̩wñ ki chi n?
Oñ i murida kwʼugbo-wñ tʼugbo e̩ne̩ omune̩, i laño̩ ka abe̩le̩ ge̩. Tak amone̩ le̩ ño̩ dohi ñw u alu ku ma ka o̩gbo̩gba le̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩la ku Defid ka kwo tʼamone̩ eti, ma lewa ka jʼane̩ ñwu So̩l; oñ i fʼone̩ kpe̩ adʼo̩.
Taku Defid ka ñwu So̩l kakini, E̩do̩ e̩ne̩ du ki da tod e̩ne̩ le̩ n; adu-we̩-i alo kʼi ja kpai e̩ne̩ Filistia-i.
Taku So̩l ka ñwu Defid kakini, Uwe̩ neke ledo e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ kʼe̩ bʼo̩ ja n; todu imo̩to̩ uwe̩ che ta, owñ le̩ la chʼe̩ne̩ ogu akwʼo̩jo̩ imo̩to̩-wñ.
Taku Defid ka ñwu So̩l kakini, Adu-we̩-i do̩mo̩ adejute̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ egini e-ata-wñ; tak e̩gba kʼidu lewa, abe̩k ibe̩a kʼi mʼo̩ma e̩wño̩re̩ egini du kwef ujo̩,
omi dufu atʼo̩ ubi, u la mʼu du kpa, oñ u mʼu gba bʼo̩ alu te̩. E̩gba kʼi kwane̩ akobʼumi u gwo̩nyʼilagba-wñ, u fʼe̩wñ nʼu, u mʼu du kpa.
Adu-we̩-i fʼidu kpai ibe̩a ejeji-ma kpa; e̩ne̩ Filistia e̩pi odukulu-i la adab oka ef uma ge̩, abu kʼi fʼabogu e-O̩jo̩ ki deju bina.
Oñ Defid kakini, Jihofa e-ki mʼumi gba kwef o̩wo̩ idu kpai kwef o̩wo̩ ibe̩a, owñ le̩ agba mi kwef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ Filistia-i. Taku So̩l ka ñwu Defid kakini, Lo ke, Jihofa la adʼugbo-we̩.
Oñ So̩l mʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ ko nyu Defid o̩la; i la dʼukata ebije ekpikpa dʼo oji, i ño̩ dʼafe̩ ebije le̩ tʼo̩la-wñ.

Taku Defid mʼugbada-wñ du ji mʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ le̩, oñ i chʼajama-wñ kʼi lo, todu i jʼe̩wñ le̩ ma ta n. Taku Defid ka ñwu So̩l kakini, U neke nʼe̩wñ-i lo̩ n, todu o̩la-mi ma e-le̩ n. Taku Defid mʼu ko jʼane̩ bʼo̩la-wñ te̩.

Oñ i mʼo̩kpa-wñ du nʼo̩wo̩, i mʼokuta me̩lu kʼo̩la-wñ de̩ bo̩lo̩ bo̩lo̩ re kwef ukpolo, oñ i mʼu ko jʼef ikpa adejute̩ ala kʼi ne̩, owñ chʼef alita-wñ; inata-wñ la dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ. Tak i te̩me̩rʼe̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ alo.
Tak e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ nawa waa ate̩ me̩ru Defid; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼikpako-wñ tʼowñ o̩gba.
Tak e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ Filistia gʼemi gʼemi koolo, kʼi la fu Defid li, i chʼe̩de̩te̩-wñ; todu abu kʼi chʼimo̩to̩ kʼaño̩la-wñ de̩ yo̩o̩, eju-wñ la chʼuto̩ ego.
Tak e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ ka ñwu Defid kakini, Omi chʼabia kʼe̩ nʼo̩kpa agbe̩re̩ mi? Tak e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ nama ñwu Defid ef odu amo̩jo̩ e-wñ.
Tak e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ ka ñwu Defid kakini, Lewa ugbo-mi kʼu kʼo̩re̩la-we̩ ñw ame̩we̩ ojale, kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ oko.
Taku Defid ka ñw e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ kakini, Uwe̩ nʼugbada kpai o̩kwo̩ kpai opiolo wʼugbo mi; omi muda awʼugbo-we̩ ef odu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du-i, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ e-abo Israe̩l kʼuwe̩ bina le̩.

Eñini kide̩ Jihofa adʼuwe̩ tef o̩wo̩-mi oñ nadʼe̩ kpa, u la akʼuwe̩ oji da bʼo̩la-we̩ te̩; tak u nakʼoku o̩wo̩ abo Filistia-i ñw ame̩we̩ ojale kpai ame̩wñ iñmi ile̩-i eñini kide̩; kʼabo ile̩ du ki ma ka kʼO̩jo̩ do̩mo̩ ñw abo Israe̩l,
kʼabo ujeju-i chaka ki ma ka ki chʼugbada kpai o̩kwo̩ oñ Jihofa ane̩ jadu one̩ n; todu ogu kʼa ja-i chʼe-Jihofa. Owñ le̩ ako me̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-wa.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ kwane̩, kʼi ledo Defid awa anane̩. Defid hio̩ane̩, i fule fʼoji do abogu le̩ ki de kpai e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩.
Taku Defid dʼo̩wo̩ tunyʼikpa-wñ, oñ i mʼokutaʼka du kwef uwñ, oñ i fʼinata gwu, i la fʼo̩gba oji e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ mu; okuta le̩ la kwotunyʼo̩gboji-wñ, tak i lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.
Abe̩le̩ Defid nʼinata kpai okuta fʼe̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ du, i la fʼe̩wñ nʼu, i la mʼu du kpa; ugbada la dʼef o̩wo̩ Defidi n.
Taku Defid fule wa banʼe̩ne̩ Filistia le̩, oñ i mʼugbada-wñ du, i la mʼu wo̩ kwʼako̩-wñ, oñ i fʼu kpa, i ño̩ nʼe̩ kʼoji-wñ da bʼo̩la-wñ te̩. Tak e̩gba kʼabo Filistia li kʼe̩nagbiti-ma leku, ma ra.

Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l kpai e-Juda kwane̩, ma la fʼo̩ga chi oñ ma nʼabo Filistia ule gbogbo wa Gat, kpʼalaku E̩kro̩n. Oñ abo Filistia ku ma chagbe lewane̩ jʼej o̩na Shaariam, gbogbo wa Gat, gbogbo wa E̩kro̩n.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l mudabi bʼabo Filistia enule te̩, oñ ma mʼane̩ ef uru-ma ño̩.
Defid la mʼoji e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ du, oñ i mʼu du wa Je̩rusale̩m; i la mʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ ko jʼef unyabo-wñ.
Oñ e̩gba ku So̩l li Defid abu kʼi dufu kʼi ako bʼe̩ne̩ Filistia le̩, i ka ñw Abina kʼi chʼonu ogu-wñ, kakini, Abina, okolobia-i chʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ ta? Tak Abina kakini, Oji-we̩ O onu, u ma n.
Tak onu kakini, E̩ tene o̩ma e̩ne̩ kʼagbadufu-i che.
Tak abu ku Defid mojida kwʼokʼekpa e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ awa, Abina mʼowñ du wa o̩gba So̩l, oji e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ dʼo̩wo̩-wñ.
Taku So̩l ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩, okolobia-i, o̩ma e̩ne̩ uwe̩ che̩? Taku Defid dohi kakini, Omi chʼo̩ma adu-we̩ Je̩si, e̩ne̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m le̩.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼi fʼo̩la ka ñwu So̩l kpoji, e̩do̩ Jo̩natan kwo manyʼe̩do̩ Defid, oñ Jo̩natan fe̩do̩ owñ dab onugo o̩la-wñ.
Taku So̩l mʼowñ du o̩jo̩ le̩, i ño̩ je̩ ñw u dabi tʼunyi ata-wñ ge̩ n.
Taku Jo̩natan kpai Defid chʼalo todabu kʼi fe̩do̩ owñ dab onugo o̩la-wñ.
Taku Jo̩natan mʼotogbo ki dʼo̩la-wñ gwo̩ ñwu Defid kpai e̩wñ o̩la-wñ, tʼugbada-wñ, tʼo̩o̩do̩-wñ, tʼe̩wñ ujago-wñ i mʼu ko ñw u.
Taku Defid ledufu nyʼugbo du ku So̩l akpʼo̩ nyi, i la ra ñw u. Taku So̩l mʼowñ du chʼuto̩gba abo ogu. E-le̩ la chenyo̩ amone̩ du eju kpai eju abuko̩lo̩ So̩l ge̩.

Oñ i lewatu abu ku ma jʼej o̩na awa, e̩gba ku Defid doji kwʼoko ekpa e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩, kʼabobule̩ nʼeli eko̩ kpai ido eta kwef ewo ewo Israe̩l chaka awa, aledo onu So̩l kpʼeicha kpai uyo̩ kpai e̩wñ ido.
Oñ abobule̩ nako̩ ñw o̩la-ma abu ku ma jʼachiya kakini,

Taku So̩l we̩do̩ nana, o̩la-i la bie̩ne̩ eju-wñ, oñ i kakini, Ma ka e-Defid icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa, icham nyʼo̩ gwo̩ ko̩ me̩gwa, e-mi ku ma ka chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kate; e̩wñ ño̩ bo̩ kʼi ane̩ tʼede ojane̩-i kate le̩?
Oñ eju So̩l nabi Defid le akwo o̩jo̩ le̩ gbogbo tʼejo̩gba-wñ.

Oñ i lewatu, o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, afu e̩bie̩ne̩ kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ wa bi So̩l ma ukpahiu ukpahiu, oñ i chane̩ ekekale̩ alumeji abo unyi-wñ; oñ Defid nʼo̩wo̩-wñ anʼumolo alu kʼi ache o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa. So̩l la nʼo̩kwo̩-wñ ef o̩wo̩-wñ;
taku So̩l fʼo̩kwo̩ ro̩; todu i kakini, Nafu Defid ka mʼo̩do̩. Defid la jʼeju bʼo̩ eju te̩ onu meji.
Taku So̩l kworailo Defid, ukpe̩ ku Jihofa dʼugbo-wñ kʼi la kwo bi So̩l te̩.
Todule̩ So̩l mʼu du bʼo̩la-wñ eju te̩, oñ i dʼowñ chʼagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩; tak i nalelo lewa eju amone̩ le̩.
O̩na du ki Defid le la ra ñw u; Jihofa la dʼugbo-wñ.
Oñ e̩gba ku So̩l li kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ mu ibe ibe ache e̩wñ, i chane̩ echʼokpo-wñ.
Abo Israe̩l kpai abo Juda chaka muda fe̩do̩ Defid todu i alelo lewa eju-ma.

Taku So̩l ka ñwu Defid kakini, Go, nadu Me̩rab, o̩ma-mi ogijo ñw e̩ chʼo̩ya, uwe̩ʼki chʼagbiti todu mi dee, kʼe̩ la fʼogu Jihofa ja. Todu So̩l kakini, o̩wo̩-mi ki kadʼo n, chai o̩wo̩ abo Filistia ki kadʼo ke.
Taku Defid ka ñwu So̩l kakini, Omi chʼe̩ne̩? E̩ne̩ abo-mi che? O̩lo̩pu ata-mi chʼe̩wñ ef Israe̩l kʼomi achʼana onu-i?
Ama i lewatu e̩gba ki mud iko ku ma du Me̩rab, o̩ma So̩l le̩, ñwu Defid, ma mʼowñ du ñw Adrie̩l, e̩ne̩ Me̩ho̩lat, kʼi chʼo̩ya-wñ.
Defid la chʼemu Maikal, o̩ma So̩l onobule̩, e̩do̩, oñ ma mʼu du ka ñwu So̩l tak e-le̩ rʼe̩ eju.
Taku So̩l kakini, Nadʼu ñw u, todu kʼi mud oku ñw u, kʼo̩wo̩ abo Filistia ki chʼagwunyʼuwñ. Todule̩ So̩l ka ñwu Defid kakini, Onu meji kʼuwe̩ amud ana-mi eñini de̩.
Taku So̩l ñwa ñw amadu-wñ ku ma nʼoluka ache kpai Defid maja maja, kʼama ki ka ñw u kakini, Go, onu ayo̩ ñw e̩, abuko̩lo̩-wñ chaka la afe̩do̩-we̩, todule̩ e̩ ki mud ana onu ke.
Tak abuko̩lo̩ So̩l fʼo̩la le̩ ka nyu Defid eti. Oñ Defid kakini, E̩wñ fuye̩ i che eju-me̩ kʼomi kʼu chʼana onu? Omi ku chʼe̩nukpa, ku ma la do̩ mi rʼo̩che̩ke̩ne̩-i?
Tak abuko̩lo̩-wñ ka ñwu So̩l kakini, Alu ku Defid ka le̩ de̩.

Taku So̩l kakini, Abu ku me̩ aka ñwu Defid de̩, kakini, Onu atene kʼe̩ che e̩wñ ana ñw u n, chai año̩ ki bʼe̩pi abo Filistia ogume̩lu ma e̩ ko ñw u, kʼache̩ onu ki na oji ame̩nebi-wñ. Ibe la dʼefu So̩l ka kʼe-le̩ aje̩ ñwu Defid wane̩ o̩wo̩ abo Filistia.
Oñ e̩gba kʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ kʼo̩la-wñ-i ñwu Defid, i nyo̩ Defid eju nana kʼi mud ana onu. O̩jo̩-wñ la jo̩ kpa n,

taku Defid kwane̩, owñ kpʼabo-wñ le oñ ma fʼaboke̩le̩ abo Filistia o̩gwo̩ko̩ kpa; taku Defid mʼaño̩ ki bʼoji e̩pi-ma ma kowa, oñ ma mʼaluka-wñ du ko ñw onu, todu kʼi mud ana onu. Taku So̩l la mu Maikal, o̩ma-wñ, du ñw u chʼo̩ya.
Oñ So̩l fʼu li, i laño̩ fu ma ka ku Jihofa dʼugbo Defid; Maikal, o̩ma So̩l, la fe̩do̩ owñ.
Taku So̩l ño̩ chokpo Defid tule; oñ So̩l mud e̩nebi Defid gbogbo alo.
Tak amagboji abo Filistia ledufu, oñ i lewatu e̩gba du ku ma ledufu, i ño̩ ra ñwu Defid tʼabuko̩lo̩ So̩l du le; abe̩le̩ odu-wñ nʼuwohi e̩nyo̩ nana.
Taku So̩l ko̩la ñwu Jo̩natan, o̩ma-wñ kpai abuko̩lo̩-wñ chaka, kʼama ki du Defid kpa. Jo̩natan, o̩ma So̩l le̩, muda ayo̩ ñwu Defid nana.
Taku Jo̩natan ka ñwu Defid kakini, So̩l, ata-mi, afeju kʼi dʼuwe̩ kpa; todule̩ narodubʼe̩ kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ de odudu, kʼe̩ kwogugu ugbo o̩fio̩lifio̩, kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ maja:
tak u nadufu nyʼadago kpenyʼata-mi oko ugbo kʼe̩ de̩, oñ nadʼo̩la-we̩ choluka kpai ata-mi; iche̩wñ kʼu fʼe̩wñʼka li, naka ñw e̩.
Taku Jo̩natan nʼo̩la e̩nyo̩ e-Defid aka ñwu So̩l, ata-wñ; oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Onu ki dʼadu-wñ Defid re n; todu i dʼuwe̩ re n, uko̩lo̩-wñ kʼi te̩tache la nyo̩ ñw e̩ tabale;

todu i mʼoji-wñ du tinyo̩ kʼi la mʼe̩ne̩ Filistia le̩ du kpa, oñ Jihofa fʼujadu inaina che todu abo Israe̩l chaka. Uwe̩ li, e̩ la yo̩; todule̩ e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ adʼe̩bie̩ ki ma nʼudu n-i re, kʼe̩ kpa Defid tebitele?
Oñ So̩l nyʼomu Jo̩natan eti. Taku So̩l fu Jihofa go̩ kakini, Oji Jihofa, ma ñʼadʼowñ kpa n.
Taku Jo̩natan fu Defid do̩, oñ Jo̩natan mʼe̩wñ-i du du ne̩rʼu eju. Taku Jo̩natan mu Defid du wʼugbo So̩l oñ i dʼugbo-wñ alu kʼi te̩te̩de̩ e̩gbo̩gba le̩.
Tak ogu ño̩ chi ge̩. Defid la le dufu, oñ i jogu kpʼabo Filistia, i la nʼuku kpa ma nana oñ ma ra rʼo̩gba-wñ.
Tak afu e̩bie̩ne̩ ki kwʼugbo Jihofa ño̩ bi So̩l ma, abu kʼi gugu ef unyi-wñ kʼo̩kwo̩-wñ dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ; Defid la nʼo̩wo̩-wñ anʼe̩wñ.
Oñ So̩l feju kʼi nʼo̩kwo̩ le̩ du Defid kpa manyʼo̩do̩; i muda jʼeju bʼeju So̩l te̩, oñ i mʼo̩kwo̩ le̩ du ro̩ tunyʼo̩do̩. Taku Defid ra, oñ i fʼu o̩wo̩ tane̩ odu o̩jo̩ le̩.
Taku So̩l fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼunyi Defid, ku ma fʼeju bʼo̩ le, ku ma mʼu du kpa odudu. Taku Maikal o̩ya Defid, ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ ma jadu oji o̩la-we̩ odu eñini-i n, o̩na ma adʼe̩ kpa.
Abe̩le̩ Maikal du Defid lʼope unyi tane̩; oñ i le. I la ra, oñ i fʼuma o̩wo̩.
Taku Maikal mʼamude oji-wñ du, oñ i mʼu du dachi oj ate̩, oñ i mʼaloji ku ma nʼedudu ewo che du tʼugbo oji-wñ, oñ i mʼukpo ko bʼo ma.
Tak e̩gba ki So̩l fʼamonuche̩-wñ kpe̩ wa ku ma mu Defid du, onobule̩ le̩ kakini, I achʼo̩ga.
Taku So̩l fʼamonuche̩-wñ kpe̩ wa kʼeju-ma ki do Defid onugo; i kakini, Me̩ mʼu duwa ñwu mi tʼate̩ tʼate̩, kʼu nadʼu kpa.
Tak e̩gba kʼamonuche̩ mugudu wʼejefu, go, amude oji-wñ la tʼoj ate̩ manyʼaloji edudu ewo ugbo oji-wñ le̩.

Taku So̩l ka ñw Maikal, kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ bʼumi eju maja abe̩i? kʼe̩ je̩ ñw e̩nebi-mi lo, kʼi la fʼumi o̩wo̩-i? Taku Maikal dohi ñwu So̩l kakini, Owñ ka ñwu mi kakini, Je̩ ñwu mi lo, e̩wñ chi kʼu nadʼe̩ kpa?
Defid la ra i fʼuma o̩wo̩ oñ i lewa ugbo Samiue̩l Rama. Oñ i fʼe̩wñ du ku So̩l chʼo ka ñw u. Tak owñ kpai Samiue̩l gwo̩ru nyʼagugu Nayo̩t.
Oñ ma mudu ka ñwu So̩l kakini. Go, Defid de̩ Nayot e-Rama.

Taku So̩l fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼamu Defid. Oñ e̩gba ku ma ti amakache̩ ku ma do̩ jeju ku ma jo̩ akache̩, ku Samiue̩l la chʼagboji-ma dago, Afu O̩jo̩ lewa bʼamonuche̩ So̩l ma, oñ ama le̩ ño̩ kwokache̩ ge̩.
Tak e̩gba ku ma mʼe-le̩ du ka ñwu So̩l, i fʼamonuche̩ omune̩ kpe̩, tak abo le̩ ño̩ kache̩ ge̩. Taku So̩l fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ onuʼke̩ta. Ama laño̩ kache̩ ge̩.
Tak owñ onugo letu Rama; oñ i lewa ugbo obuga lile ki de̩ Se̩ku. Tak i tene kakini, Ugbo Samiue̩l kpai Defid de̩? Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka kakini, Go, ama jo̩ Nayot e-Rama.
Tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ nyi Nayot e-Rama; Afu O̩jo̩ laño̩ lewa bʼowñ onugo ma ge̩, oñ abu kʼi alo̩, i nʼache̩ aka gbogbo tak i lewa Nayot e-Rama.
Tak i ño̩ mʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ gwo̩ jʼane̩, i laño̩ kache̩ eju Samiue̩l, oñ i dachi ago ofo gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩. Todule̩ ma kakini, So̩l ño̩ dʼef amakache̩ ge̩?
Taku Defid ra bo̩ Nayo̩t e-Rama te̩, oñ i lewa o̩gba Jo̩natan, i kakini, E̩wñ omi che ta? Udu e̩wñ omi fe̩? E̩wñ la chʼadure kʼu ta eju ata-we̩ kʼi atene oji-mi taa?
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, E-le̩ ame̩rʼuwe̩ n; uwe̩ aku n. Go, ata-mi jʼache e̩wñ re tʼe-ki nana n, chai e̩gba kʼi ji tʼumi eti; e̩wñ chi kʼata-mi adʼe̩wñ-i maja ñwu mi? O̩da, i chʼabe̩le̩ n.

Taku Defid ño̩ go̩ mʼo̩, oñ i kakini, Ata-we̩ chema nyo̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ li mi eju; oñ i kakini, Me̩ ki je̩ ñwu Jo̩natan ma n, tode̩gba kʼe̩do̩-wñ akpabie̩; i muda chʼochochi, oji Jihofa, kpai oji onugo-we̩ ge̩, i bo e̩re̩ okate kʼu nachi kʼu nanyʼef uku.
Taku Jo̩natan ka ñwu Defid kakini, E̩wñ du ki dʼe̩do̩-we̩, e-le̩ nache todu we̩.
Taku Defid ka ñwu Jo̩natan kakini. Go, ochu ane̩ o̩na, i la nʼo̩na kʼomi awe guguane̩ aje̩ e̩wñ kpʼonu n. Uwe̩ ki muda je̩ ñwu mi lo kʼu dʼo̩la-mi maja oko gbogbo nyʼolane̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ.
Iche̩wñ kʼata-we̩ tene mi re, mak e̩ ka ñw u kakini, Defid gbo̩ko̩bʼumi eju e̩kpa eju e̩kpa kʼi ra nyi Be̩tle̩he̩m, ewo-wñ; todu iche̩bo̩ ku ma che o̩do̩ o̩do̩ tod abunyi-wñ lewane̩ me̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼi ka abe̩-i kakini, I nyo̩ gbe̩; mak adu-we̩-i anure̩do̩: i muda che̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-wñ kpa nana, mak uwe̩ ki ma ka kʼi fʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ñwa te̩ kʼi ache.
Todule̩ e̩ namo̩la ñw adu-we̩-i; todu uwe̩ je̩ ñw adu-we̩-i chʼalo e-Jihofa kpʼuwe̩: i muda che̩wñ kʼudu kʼu fe̩ dʼef umi, uwe̩ onugo ki dʼumi kpa; todu e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ adʼumi nyʼugbo ata-we̩?
Taku Jo̩natan kakini, E-le̩ ki jiji rʼuwe̩; todu iche̩wñ kʼomi ma ma re̩ ka kʼata-mi fʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ñwa nyʼuwe̩, omi ma ka ñw e̩ n?
Taku Defid ka ñwu Jo̩natan kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼata-we̩ mʼohi o̩ko̩ko̩ du ñw e̩ fa, e̩ne̩ aka ñwu mi?
Taku Jo̩natan ka ñwu Defid kakini, Lewa, kʼa nyʼoko o̩mo̩. Tak ama meji le tʼoko le̩.

Taku Jo̩natan ka ñwu Defid kakini, Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l! E̩gba kʼu natʼo̩wo̩ nyʼata-mi efu dabe̩ne̩ kʼiko-i o̩na, abe̩k o̩to̩na, go, iche̩wñ kʼe̩nyo̩ do̩mo̩ ñwu Defid, omi akpe̩ one̩ wa adʼoji-wñ dufu ñw e̩ n?

Iche̩wñ ki rʼata-mi eju kʼi achʼuwe̩ e̩bie̩ne̩, kʼomi ma du dufu ñw e̩, kʼu fʼuwe̩ ke̩che̩ alo, kʼuwe̩ ki lo kpʼure̩do̩ n, maku Jihofa ki fʼabe̩le̩ che ñwu Jo̩natan, kpai e-ki tʼe-i le ge̩: Jihofa ki la dʼugbo-we̩ alu kʼi te̩te̩dʼugbo ata-mi.
I la chʼabu kʼu deju-i kate oñ uwe̩ adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ Jihofa ña mi kʼu we eku ofo n;
uwe̩ ki ño̩ kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ da bʼunyi-mi te̩ ogbegbele̩ n; e̩ ki che n, dagba i chʼadiko e̩gba ku Jihofa fʼame̩nebi Defid okoke ko̩da bʼeju ile̩-i te̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩natan chʼalo kpai abunyi Defid kakini, Jihofa la atene ef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi Defid.
Taku Jo̩natan je̩ ñwu Defid ño̩ go̩ ge̩, iugbo efe̩do̩ kʼi afe̩do̩ owñ; todu i fe̩do̩ owñ alu kʼi afe̩do̩ onugo o̩la-wñ.
Taku Jo̩natan ka ñw u kakini, Ochu ane̩ o̩na, ma atene we̩ chuu, todu e̩wñ ugugu-we̩ ate̩ ofo.
Oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ fʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta je̩ tak uwe̩ ki hika gwo̩ru nyʼugbo kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ maja o̩jo̩ kʼo̩la le̩ chi, kʼe̩ la kwogugu ugbo okuta Eze̩l le̩.
Tak u natʼo̩fa me̩ta lʼo̩wo̩ʼka-wñ, dabe̩ne̩ kʼu najuko.

E̩ la go, nafʼimo̩to̩-mi kpe̩, oñ naka ñw u kakini, Lo kʼe̩ tene o̩fa le̩ wa. Iche̩wñ kʼu naka ñw imo̩to̩ okolobia le̩ kakini, Go, o̩fa le̩ dʼejemi ñw e̩, mak e̩ mʼu du kʼe̩ lewa; todu ure̩do̩ i che ñw e̩, i nʼo̩la n, oji Jihofa.
I muda che̩wñ kʼu ka ñw okolobia le̩ abe̩-i, kakini. Go, o̩fa dʼejo̩gba-we̩ o̩mo̩; mak e̩ lo we̩, todu Jihofa je̩ ñw e̩ kwʼemi.
I la chʼe-o̩la kʼomi kpʼuwe̩ ka le̩, go, Jihofa dʼagbagba-mi kpʼuwe̩ ogbegbele̩.
Abe̩le̩ Defid dʼo̩la-wñ maja oko le̩. Oñ e̩gba kʼochu ne, onu kwoguane̩ kʼi jʼuje̩wñ.
Onu la gugu oji akpa-wñ alu kʼi te̩tache, owñ chʼakpa ki dʼo̩lo̩do̩ le̩; Jo̩natan la dago o̩mo̩, oñ Abina gugu akolo So̩l; uña Defid la te̩ ofo.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ So̩l kʼabu du o̩jo̩ le̩ n: todu i do̩ kakini, E̩wñʼka ke̩re̩bʼo̩ kʼo̩la-wñ ma fe̩ n le̩; o̩la-wñ fe̩ n de̩.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩jo̩ñwa ochu etito̩, o̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ, kʼuña Defid la te̩ ofo ta. Taku So̩l ka ñwu Jo̩natan o̩ma-wñ kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼo̩ma Je̩si ma wa je̩ e̩wñ n? Tʼo̩nale̩ tʼeñini, i wa n.
Taku Jo̩natan dohi ñwu So̩l kakini. Defid tʼumi ene eju e̩kpa eju e̩kpa kʼi nyi Be̩tle̩he̩m:

i la kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi lo, todu abunyi-wa chenʼiche̩bo̩ ku ma che ef ewo le̩; o̩maye-mi la fʼuko̩ te̩ ñwu mi. Fa-i, i la che̩wñ kʼe̩ li mi eju, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi lo kʼu fejudʼamo̩maye-mi. E̩wñ ki chi kʼi ma wʼugbo itebulu onu ni de̩.
Tak uwe̩do̩ So̩l mutajo bu Jo̩natan ma, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩, o̩ma onobule̩ ki ma mʼofane̩ n. Omi ma kʼo̩ma Je̩si kʼe̩ fa mʼo̩la le̩ amud anyo̩ ñw e̩ n? kʼi ñʼamud anyo̩ ñw ago ofo e-iye-we̩ n?
Todu gbogbo abu kʼo̩ma Je̩si le̩ deju ile̩-i, uwe̩ anʼe̩re̩ ane̩ n, kpʼo̩fe̩-we̩ n. Todule̩ e̩ ki fʼone̩ kpe̩ amʼu du wa ñwu mi fa-i, todu e̩nuku i che.
Taku Jo̩natan dohi ñwu So̩l ata-wñ kakini, E̩wñ chi ku ma adʼu kpa? Ab i che taa?
Taku So̩l fʼo̩kwo̩ ro̩ ñw u kʼi dʼu kpa; lugbo e-le̩ Jo̩natan ma ka kʼata-wñ fuñwa tʼe̩do̩-wñ ka kʼi adu Defid kpa chuu.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩natan we̩do̩ nana oñ i kwane̩ bʼitebulu te̩, i la jʼuje̩wñ du o̩jo̩ ekeji ochu le̩ n, todu e̩do̩-wñ kpabie̩ todu Defid, todabu kʼata-wñ kʼanyo̩ mʼo̩.
Oñ i lewatʼodudu-wñ, Jo̩natan nyʼoko le̩ iko kʼi da ñwu Defid, imo̩to̩ kekeleʼka la dʼugbo-wñ.
Tak i ka ñw imo̩to̩-wñ le̩ kakini, Fule, kʼe̩ tene o̩fa kʼu nata-i. Oñ abu kʼimo̩to̩ le̩ fule alo i fʼo̩fa ta lʼo oji.
Tak e̩gba kʼimo̩to̩ le̩ lewʼugbo kʼo̩fa ku Jo̩natan ta te̩, Jo̩natan kwado̩ imo̩to̩ le̩ kakini, O̩fa le̩ dʼej o̩gba-we̩ o̩mo̩ n?
Oñ Jo̩natan kwado̩ imo̩to̩ le̩ kakini, Hio̩ane̩ piopio, e̩ ki che̩du n. Tak imo̩to̩ Jo̩natan mʼo̩fa le̩ re, oñ i lewa ugbo odu-wñ.
Imo̩to̩ le̩ la ma oji e̩wñ le̩ du n; chai Jo̩natan kpai Defid kate mʼoji o̩la le̩.
Taku Jo̩natan mʼebije o̩gu-wñ ko ñw imo̩to̩-wñ le̩, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ-i ko nyʼef ewo.

Tak e̩gba kʼimo̩to̩ le̩ le, ababa le̩ Defid kwane̩ kwʼugbo kʼi de̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ o̩mo̩, oñ i lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ i dojikane̩ onu me̩ta. Taku ma dʼalu kʼomune̩ alu oñ ma chane̩ eraku kpai o̩la-ma, gbogbo tak e-Defid tabale.

Oñ Jo̩natan ka ñwu Defid kakini, Lo kpai ure̩do̩, todabu kʼawa mejeji go̩ ef odu Jihofa kakini, Jihofa adʼagbagba omi kpai uwe̩, kpai agbagba ugbe-mi kpai ugbe̩-we̩ tʼogbegbele̩. Tak i kwane̩ oñ i le owñ, oñ Jo̩natan la letʼef ewo.
Taku Defid lewa Nob ugbo Ahime̩le̩k, alama le̩; oñ Ahime̩le̩k nʼo̩la ega ledo Defid, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Abile ki chʼuwe̩ kate wa kʼe̩ne̩ du ma lebʼe̩ n?

Taku Defid ka ñw Ahime̩le̩k atama le̩ kakini, Onu fʼuko̩lo̩ʼka ñwa ñwu mi kʼu che, oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ma uko̩lo̩ kʼu kpʼe̩ kʼe̩ che n, kpai e̩wñ kʼomi ñwa ñw e̩-i n; omi la fʼugboʼka jiwe ñw abokolobia kʼa de o̩me̩.
Todule̩ e̩wñ dʼef o̩wo̩-we̩ abajo̩-i ta? Mʼakala me̩lu ko̩ nyʼumi o̩wo̩, abe̩k e̩wñ du ki dʼane̩.
Tak atama le̩ dohi ñwu Defid kakini, Akala ofofo du la dʼef o̩wo̩-mi n, chai akala kiafo̩ do̩mo̩; iche̩wñ kʼabokolobia-we̩ ma te̩mʼabobule̩ n dee.

Taku Defid dohi ñw atama le̩ kakini, Ochochi akwʼenyi-ke̩ta kʼu dufu wa-i ma fʼabobule̩ naba ugbo wa; e̩wñ eku abokolobia afo̩ chaka, dagba kʼule̩-i ki chaka chʼule̩ o̩ja ofofo; abile kʼe̩wñ eku-ma ma fo̩ eñini-i tule n?
Todule̩ atama mʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ le̩ ko ñw u; todu akala du dʼane̩ o̩mo̩ n, chai akala e-eju ku ma ko kwʼo̩gba Jihofa, ku ma kʼakala una una jʼo̩mo̩ koji-wñ o̩jo̩ ku ma ko kwʼo̩mo̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi dʼef amadu So̩l dʼane̩ o̩mo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, ma fʼu dahi tʼo̩gba Jihofa; odu-wñ la ko̩ Doe̩g, abo Ido̩m. Owñ chʼagbiti ef amadejutala ku ma jʼef o̩wo̩ So̩l.
Oñ Defid ka ñw Ahime̩le̩k kakini, O̩kwo̩ abe̩k ugbada du la dʼef o̩wo̩-we̩ emi n? Todu tʼugbada tʼe̩wñ ebije ogu, omi ne̩ wa n, todabu kʼuko̩lo̩ onu le̩ chʼunaju.

Tak atama le̩ kakini, Ugbada Go̩layat, e̩ne̩ Filistia kʼe̩ kpa ef o̩go̩ Ela, go, ukpo wenyʼe-le̩ tʼubi e̩fo̩d emi; iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ neku e-le̩, e̩ mʼu du, todu e-du dʼemi tʼe-le̩ le n. Taku Defid kakini, i nʼe-du ki dab e-le̩ n; mʼu du ñwu mi.
Taku Defid kwane̩, oñ i ra o̩jo̩ le̩ tod ailo So̩l kʼi ara, oñ i nyʼugbo Akish, onu Gat.
Tak abuko̩lo̩ Akish ka ñw u kakini, I che Defid, onu ane̩ le̩ de̩-i n? I chʼowñ ma du tʼef eli ako̩ ñw o̩la-ma ef ido-ma n? kakini,
Taku Defid mʼo̩la-i du tʼo̩wo̩, i la chane̩ erailo Akish onu Gat, nana.
Oñ i mʼalu kʼi te̩tache rida ugbo-ma. I fʼakpaine che dabe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼef o̩wo̩-ma ahimu, i chane̩ ekina nyʼalugbana alaku nyaña nyaña. I la je̩ ñw ito̩-wñ bʼo̩ alu wa bʼilagba-wñ ma.
Tak Akish ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ go, me̩ li kʼe̩ne̩-i ahimu n? E̩wñ chi ku me̩ dʼu wʼugbo-mi ta?
Amahimu cheña mi ku me̩ mʼe̩ne̩-i du wʼugbo-mi kʼi chʼiya imu eju-mi? E̩ne̩-i atʼef unyi-mi?
Taku Defid kwʼo̩mo̩ le, oñ i fʼuma o̩wo̩ le tʼugbo owo Adulam. Oñ e̩gba kʼamo̩maye-wñ kpai abunyi ata-wñ chaka gbo̩, ma gwo̩ru nyʼugbo-wñ o̩mo̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼef ihianyi, kpai e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩me̩ dʼo̩ o̩la, kpai e̩ne̩ du kʼefu-wñ chʼe̩kpa, ma kʼo̩la-ma wa jʼugbo-wñ; oñ i mud agboji-ma; aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ la dab one̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Taku Defid kwʼo̩mo̩ le tu Mizpe e-Moab, oñ i ka ñw onu Moab kakini, Narodubʼe̩ todu kʼe̩ je̩ ñw ata-mi kpai iye-mi ku ma dufu wa ajʼugbo-we̩, gbogbo tak u ma e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ ache todu mi.
Tak i mʼuma ko wa o̩gba onu Moab le̩: oñ ma gugu kpʼowñ gbogbo taku Defid kwef akpolo okuta le̩ dufu.
Taku Gad, akache̩, ka ñwu Defid kakini, Uwe̩ ki gugu ef akpolo okuta-i n; kwo bʼemi te̩ kʼe̩ nyʼoj ane̩ Juda. Taku Defid kwʼo̩mo̩ le oñ i lewa efoko He̩re̩t.
Taku So̩l gbo ka ku ma fu Defid li, kpai aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ. So̩l la gugu Gibea, of oli tamarisk oj otete Rama, o̩kwo̩-wñ la dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ, oñ abuko̩lo̩-wñ chaka donyʼu daka.

Taku So̩l ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ ku ma donyʼowñ le̩ kakini, Me̩ neti, ame̩ abo Be̩njamin; o̩ma Je̩si-i adʼoko kpai uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ñwu me̩ okoke? I aje̩ ñw o̩chaka-me̩ chʼamagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpai amagboji one̩ ogu me̩lu ogu me̩lu?

Kʼo̩chaka-me̩ fʼalu jo̩ nyʼumi, kʼe̩ne̩ du ma du dufu ñwu mi e̩gba kʼo̩ma-mi achʼalo kpʼoma Je̩si le̩ n? E̩ne̩ du la dʼef ume̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ kpabie̩ todu mi n. Me̩ la adu dufu ñwu mi ka kʼo̩ma-mi akʼadu-mi e̩che̩ tʼumi o̩la kʼi kpala adede mi alu ki de̩ eñini n?
Taku Doe̩g, e̩ne̩ Ido̩m kʼabuko̩lo̩ So̩l jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ le̩ dohi, kakini, Omi li o̩ma Je̩si le̩ kʼi awa Nob, ugbo Ahime̩le̩k, o̩ma Ahitub.
I ño̩ tu Jihofa ene todu-wñ, i la mʼuje̩wñ ko ñw u tak i ño̩ mʼugbada Golayat, e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩, du ñw u.
Tak onu kpʼone̩ nyʼado Ahime̩le̩k atama, kʼi chʼo̩ma Ahitub, kpai abunyi ata-wñ chaka, kpai amatama ku ma jo̩ Nob wa; oñ o̩chaka-ma lewa ugbo onu.
Taku So̩l kakini, Neti, uwe̩, o̩ma Ahitub; oñ i dohi kakini, Omi de̩, odu-mi.

Taku So̩l ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ fʼalu jo̩ nyʼumi, uwe̩ kpai o̩ma Je̩si le̩? Kʼuwe̩ mʼakala ko ñw u kpai ugbada, kʼe̩ laño̩ tʼO̩jo̩ ene tod uwñ, todu kʼi kwane̩ tʼumi o̩la, kʼi kpala anede mi, alu kʼi ache eñini-i?
Tak Ahime̩le̩k dohi ñw onu kakini, E̩ne̩ la dʼef abuko̩lo̩-we̩ chaka kʼi chʼe̩ne̩-we̩ kpaka dabu Defid? Kʼowñ chʼana onu, kʼe̩ la chi efu ñw u chaka, kʼi laño̩ chenʼojima ef unyi-we̩?
Ihi eñini u te̩tatʼO̩jo̩ ene todu-wñ? E-le̩ ki me̩rʼumi n; onu ki bʼulu e̩wñ du mʼadu-wñ-i n, kpai abunyi ata-mi n; todu adu-we̩ mʼofe e̩wñ-i du n, tʼe-re tʼe-ki nana, u ma n.
Tak onu kakini, Eku uwe̩ aku, Ahime̩le̩k, tʼuwe̩, tʼabunyi ata-we̩ chaka.

Tak onu ka ñw amonuchʼonu ku ma fule ku ma donyʼowñ kakini, Murida ku me̩ kpa amatama Jihofa-i; todabu kʼo̩wo̩-ma dʼubi Defid, ku ma ma kʼi ara, ma la du dufu ñwu mi n. Ama abuko̩lo̩ onu jʼanʼo̩wo̩-ma dala ku ma bʼamatama Jihofa ma n.

Tak onu ka ñwu Doe̩g e̩ne̩ Ido̩m le̩, kakini, Uwe̩ ki rida abʼamatama le̩ ma. Taku Doe̩g, e̩ne̩ Ido̩m le̩, rida oñ i lewa bʼamatama ma, i la fʼone̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ nyoke me̩lu ku ma nyʼe̩fo̩d line̩n efufu kpa.
Oñ i nʼalu ugbada gwo No̩b ewo amatama le̩ da, tʼaboke̩le̩, tʼabobule̩, tʼabimo̩to̩, tʼamo̩me̩kpa, kpai amokokuno̩ kpai amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini, alu ugbada i ne̩ kpa ma.
Tak o̩ma Ahime̩le̩k oka, kʼi chʼo̩ma Ahitub, kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Abayata, fu ma o̩wo̩, oñ i ra tu Defid ubi.
Tak Abayata ka ñwu Defid ka ku So̩l mʼamatama Jihofa ko kpa me̩.
Taku Defid ka ñw Abayata kakini, U chema o̩jo̩ le̩, e̩gba ku Doe̩g, e̩ne̩ Ido̩m dʼane̩ o̩mo̩ ka kʼi aka ñwu So̩l chuu; omi chʼe̩wñ ki chi ku ma kpa abunyi ata-we̩ chaka.
Uwe̩ ki gugu ugbo omi; e̩ ki railo n, todu e̩ne̩ kʼi atene oji-mi le̩, owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi atene oji-we̩ ge̩; todu ugbo mi ma adide we̩ kpaka.
Taku ma ka ñwu Defid kakini. Go, abo Filistia jʼo̩mo̩ akʼogu bʼabo Keila, ma la jʼo̩mo̩ adinya e̩wñ kwʼoj ajita ugwo̩ka-ma.
Todule̩ Defid tu Jihofa ene kakini, U lo kʼu fʼabo Filistia-i gwoda? Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Defid kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ fʼabo Filistia gwoda, kʼe̩ fu Keila jadu.
Tak abo Defid ka ñw u kakini, Go, a jo̩ Juda emi achokpo, iche̩wñ kʼa lo̩ tu Keila ajo̩gu bʼabogu abo Filistia fa, chʼe-le̩ atule n?
Taku Defid ño̩ tu Jihofa ene ge̩. Oñ Jihofa dohi ñw u kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ gwo̩ru nyi Keila; todu nakʼabo Filistia le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-we̩.
Taku Defid kpai abo-wñ letu Keila, oñ ma bʼabo Filistia ja, ma la mʼame̩-wñ ukpa-ma ko, oñ ma nʼuku lile kpa ma. Abe̩le̩ Defid fʼabo ku ma dodo Keila jadu.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼAbayata, o̩ma Ahime̩le̩k ra nyʼugbo Defid, Keila, i la nʼe̩fo̩d o̩wo̩ gwo̩ru wa.
Oñ ma muduka ñwu So̩l ka ku Defid lewa Keila. Taku So̩l kakini, O̩jo̩ mʼowñ du tʼumi o̩wo̩ me̩; i fʼo̩na re nyʼo̩la-wñ, ewo ki nʼalaku kpai e̩wñ ku ma du rʼo̩na kʼi gudu tʼo̩ le̩.
Taku So̩l fʼamone̩ du do̩ wa ku ma nyʼokogu, ku ma gwo̩ru nyi Keila, ku ma kpala nyu Defid kpai abo-wñ.
Defid la chema ka ku So̩l añwʼibe e̩bie̩ne̩ nyʼowñ; tak i ka ñw Abayata atama le̩, kakini, Mʼe̩fo̩d le̩ du wʼemi.
Taku Defid kakini, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l. Adu-we̩-i gbo̩ ochochi, ka ku So̩l atene kʼi wa Keila-i kʼi fʼewo-i gulo̩ todu mi.
Abo Keila-i jʼadʼumi tʼef o̩wo̩-wñ? So̩l agwo̩ru wa alu kʼadu-we̩ gbo̩-i? O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, ka ñw adu-we̩. Taku Jihofa kakini, I agwo̩ru wa.
Taku Defid kakini, Abo Keila-i jʼako mi kpai abo-mi jʼef o̩wo̩ So̩l? Oñ Jihofa kakini, Ma adʼe̩ ñw u.
Taku Defid kpai abo-wñ kwane̩, ma kwʼefu Keila dufu alo; ma dab one̩ ulo̩gwa; oñ ma le tʼugbo tʼugbo du ki je̩ le ñwu ma. Taku ma ka ñwu So̩l kaku Defid ra bi Keila te̩ me̩; tak i we edufu.
Oñ Defid kwogugu ef aje̩tachi ef akpolo okuta o̩mo̩, i la kwogugu oj ane̩ uwo ef aje̩tachi Zif. So̩l la tejane̩-wñ o̩jo̩ du, O̩jo̩ muda dʼu tef o̩wo̩-wñ n.
Oñ Defid li ka ku So̩l dufu wa kʼi tene oji-wñ. Defid la dʼef aje̩tachi Zif efoko.
Taku Jo̩natan, o̩ma So̩l, kwane̩ oñ i nyʼugbo Defid efoko o̩mo̩, kʼi dʼune̩do̩ ñw u ef O̩jo̩.
I ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki railo n; todu o̩wo̩ So̩l ata-mi ahimʼuwe̩ n; uwe̩ la aje̩ onu Israe̩l, oñ omi achʼe̩ne̩ ki aro̩nʼuwe̩; ata-mi, So̩l, ño̩ chema e-le̩.
Tak ama meji fʼalo che eju Jihofa. Defid la kwogugu efoko o̩mo̩, oñ Jo̩natan le tʼunyi-wñ.
Tak abo Zif lewʼugbo So̩l Gibea; ma kakini, I che Defid dʼo̩la-wñ maja ef akpolo okuta efoko oj uwo Hakila, e-ki dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ egbili ugbo wa le̩ n?
Todule̩ e̩ gwo̩ru wa fai, O onu, alu du kʼonugo-we̩ neku, e̩ gwo̩ru wa; edʼowñ tef o̩wo̩ onu achʼukpe̩ e-wa.
Taku So̩l kakini, Jihofa ki de̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩; todabu ku me̩ li mi ejumomi.
Lo, narodubʼume̩, ku me̩ fʼo̩gbali-wñ ma ta, ku me̩ ma, ku me̩ li ugbo kʼe̩re̩-wñ de̩, kpai e̩ne̩ ki fʼu li o̩mo̩; todu ma ka ñwu mi ka kʼugbeju-wñ tabale.

Todule̩ me̩ go, ku me̩ ma uña uña du ugbo kʼi adade kʼi adʼo̩la-wñ maja, taku me̩ nʼo̩gbali-wñ wʼugbo-mi, kʼu nale bʼume̩; oñ i awatu iche̩wñ kʼi dʼoj ane̩-i, omi atejane̩-wñ ugbo abo Juda du ku ma chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩-i.
Taku ma kwane̩, oñ ma dʼo̩gba So̩l nyi Zif.
Taku So̩l kpai abo-wñ le nyʼatejane̩ owñ. Oñ ma mudu ka ñwu Defid. Todule̩ i mugwo̩ru wʼugbo okuta le̩, oñ i kwogugu ef aje̩tachi Moan. Tak e̩gba ku So̩l gbo̩, i ne Defid ule ef aje̩tachi Moan.

So̩l la le ej emi uwo le̩, oñ Defid kpai abo-wñ le ejʼano̩mo̩-wñ. Taku Defid hio̩ane̩ kʼi kwo bʼo̩mo̩ te̩ todu ailo So̩l kʼi ara; todu So̩l kpai abo-wñ che ku ma donyu Defid kpai abo-wñ daka ku ma fʼuma mu.
Ama onuche̩ʼka lewa ugbo So̩l, i kakini, Hio̩ane̩ wa piopio; abo Filistia lewa mʼane̩ ño̩ oj ane̩-i me̩.
Abe̩le̩ So̩l mudabi bʼene Defid ule te̩, oñ i ledo abo Filistia: todule̩ ma do̩ ugbo ki de̩ ko̩ Sela-hamale̩ko̩t.
Taku Defid mute̩gu kwʼo̩mo̩ le, oñ i kwo gugu ef akpolo okuta E̩nge̩di.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ku So̩l mudabi bʼabo Filistia ubi te̩, ku ma ka ñw u kakini. Go, Defid dʼef aje̩tachi E̩nge̩di.
Taku So̩l fʼabo Israe̩l chaka tu oñ i mʼaboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta ki chi kwef uma ko le nyʼatejane̩ Defid kpai abo-wñ oj okuta ugbo kʼa-mewo ef oko ajo̩.
Oñ i lewa ugbo iga ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ej o̩na ugbo kʼowoʼka de̩; oñ So̩l le tʼef uwñ ki fʼe̩wñ bʼe̩re̩-wñ ma. Defid kpai abo-wñ la gugu jʼejefu ejefu owo le̩.

Tak abo Defid ka ñw u kakini, Go, o̩jo̩ ku Jihofa da ñw e̩ kakini, Go, omi adʼe̩nebi-we̩ tef o̩wo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ chʼo e̩wñ du ki nyʼuwe̩ eju, o̩jo̩ le̩ jo̩ me̩. Taku Defid kwane̩, i la mʼeti otogbo So̩l o̩gane̩ ko̩da maja.
Oñ i lewatu ubi le̩, kʼe̩do̩ Defid kpabie̩, todabu kʼi mʼeti otogbo So̩l ko̩da.
Oñ i ka ñw abo-wñ kakini, Jihofa ki kpo̩na echʼodu-mi e̩wñ-i, e̩ne̩ ki Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼoji-i, kʼomi adʼo̩wo̩ kadʼo abu kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji.
Abe̩le̩ Defid nʼo̩la-i fʼabo-wñ ba, i je̩ ñwu ma kwane̩ tu So̩l o̩la n. Taku So̩l kwane̩ kwʼef owo le̩, i le owñ.
Ubi le̩ Defid ño̩ kwane̩ ge̩, oñ i kwʼef owo dufu, i la kwado̩ So̩l kakini, Odu-mi, Onu-i. Tak e̩gba ku So̩l dʼejubi, Defid te̩kpe̩, i fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ i dojikane̩.
Taku Defid ka ñwu So̩l kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ nyʼo̩la kʼamone̩ aka ofofo eti? E-ku ma ka kakini, Go, Defid atene kʼi chʼuwe̩ e̩bie̩ne̩?

Go, eju-we̩ li eñini-i alu ku Jihofa mʼuwe̩ du tef o̩wo̩-mi ef owo le̩ eñini-i. Abo kibo̩ la kʼumi e̩che̩ kʼu dʼe̩ kpa; u muda chʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ ñw e̩; oñ u kakini, Nadʼo̩wo̩-mi dufu akado odu-mi n; todu e̩ne̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji i che.

Anubi e-le̩, ata-mi, go, ochochi, go eti otogbo-we̩ ki dʼef o̩wo̩-mi-i; todu eti otogbo-we̩ kʼu ko̩da kʼu ma dʼe̩ kpa n, e̩ ki ma kʼe̩ ño̩ li ka kʼe̩bie̩ne̩ abe̩k ada kʼu je̩ dʼef o̩wo̩-mi n, u la dʼe̩ re n, dagba kʼe̩ chaka kpala jo̩ anede oji-mi kʼe̩ dʼu.
Jihofa ki kajo̩ agbagba-mi kpai uwe̩, Jihofa ki la fʼache̩ mi na ugbo we̩; o̩wo̩-mi muda akadʼuwe̩ n.
Alu kʼita abo igbe-legbele ka kakini, Ef e̩ne̩bibi oñ e̩wñ bibi adufu kwo; o̩wo̩-mi muda akadʼuwe̩ n.
E̩ne̩ oñ onu Israe̩l dufu wa tod uwñ-i ta? E̩ne̩ oñ e̩ nʼo̩ ule? Oku abia. Itakpitiʼka.
Todule̩ Jihofa ki chʼakajo̩, kʼi fale da agbagba omi kpai uwe̩, i go, kʼi gbʼomu-mi ka, kʼi fʼoji ajo̩-mi kpa, kʼi dʼumi bʼe̩ o̩wo̩ te̩.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku Defid fʼo̩la-i ka ñwu So̩l kpa, So̩l kakini, Omuko̩la-we̩ de̩? O̩ma-mi, Defid? Taku So̩l chʼomu-wñ nyate̩ i kworaku.
Tak i ka ñwu Defid kakini, Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ o̩kpakpa tʼomi le; todu e̩nyo̩ oñ e̩ che ñwu mi, u muda fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ chʼe̩.
Uwe̩ la ka eñini-i, alu kʼe̩ che e̩nyo̩ kpai omi, Jihofa chaka dʼumi tef o̩wo̩-we̩, uwe̩ dʼumi kpa n.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼone̩ fʼe̩ne̩bi-wñ li, i aje̩ ñw u lo o̩lafia? Todule̩ Jihofa kʼi mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñw e̩ tod e̩wñ kʼe̩ che ñwu mi eñini-i.
Fa-i, go, u la chema kʼuwe̩ achʼonu chuu, kʼojane̩ o̩fe̩ alonyane̩ ef o̩wo̩-we̩.
Todule̩ e̩ go Jihofa ñwu mi fa-i, ka kʼuwe̩ ñʼakʼugbe̩-mi da rinyo̩ ubi-mi n, kʼuwe̩ ñʼakpʼodu-mi lu kwef unyi ata-mi n.
Taku Defid go̩ ñwu So̩l. Oñ So̩l le tʼunyi; Defid kpai abo-wñ muda mute̩gu nyʼef akpolo okuta le̩.
Oñ Samiue̩l leku; tak abo Israe̩l chaka kʼo̩la-ma jeju, ma dʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef unyi-wñ Rama.

Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka de̩ Maon kʼi achʼuko̩lo̩ Karme̩l; e̩ne̩ le̩ la chʼe̩nelile ololo, i la nʼame̩wño̩re egini icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta, amewo-wñ la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩; oñ i do̩mo̩ aja edudu ame̩wño̩re̩-wñ egini le̩ Karme̩l.

Odu e̩ne̩ le̩ la ko̩ Nebal; oñ odu o̩ya-wñ ko̩ Abige̩l; onobule̩ le̩ la chenʼibe nyo̩nyo̩, eju-wñ la chʼuto̩ ego; e̩ne̩ke̩le̩-wñ muda chʼe̩ne̩ ukpe̩do̩, i la bie̩ne̩ ef e̩wñ du kʼi ache; owñ la chʼabo unyi Kele̩b.
Oñ Defid gbo̩ ef aje̩tachi o̩mo̩ ka ku Nebal do̩mo̩ aja edudu ame̩wño̩re̩-wñ egini.
Taku Defid fʼabokolobia me̩gwa kpe̩, oñ Defid ka ñw abokolobia le̩ kakini, Me̩ te̩gu nyi Karme̩l ku me̩ nyʼugbo Nebal, ku me̩ fʼu gwa ñwu mi.
Abu ku me̩ aka ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi gugu achile̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, Agba-o! I ra ñw e̩ kpo̩o̩, ure̩do̩ ki dʼugbo abunyi-we̩, ure̩do̩ kʼi la dʼugbo e̩wñ du kʼe̩ ne̩.
Fai u la gbo̩ ka kʼuwe̩ chenʼabo ku ma ja edudu amala-we̩; a la je̩ ñw anyo̩ mu amadide amala-we̩ ku ma te̩te̩jʼugbo-wa n, e̩wñ-ma du la lenyo̩ gbogbo abu ku ma jo̩ Kartne̩l-i n.
Tʼabokolobia-we̩ ene, ma aka ñw e̩. Todule̩ e̩ ki li abokolobia-i eju; todu o̩jo̩ e̩nyo̩ oñ a awa-i. Agba, e̩wñ du ki tʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ o̩mo̩ e̩ ko ñw amadu-we̩-i kpai Defid, o̩ma-we̩-i.
Tak e̩gba kʼabokolobia Defid lewa, ma ko̩la ñwu Nebal teju o̩la-i chaka ef odu Defid, oñ ma we.
Taku Nebal dohi ñw amadu Defid kakini, E̩ne̩ cho Defid? O̩ma Je̩si-i la chʼe̩ne̩? Amadu wewe do̩mo̩ ku ma ra bʼo̩wo̩ amodu-ma te̩ ojolu eñini.
Abu ki dʼabe̩le̩ omi akʼakala-mi kpai omi-mi kpai e̩la kʼu kpa tod abo ku ma ja edudu amala-mi, kʼu mʼu ko ñw amone̩ kʼomi ma mema ugbo ku ma kwo wa n?
Abe̩le̩ abokolobia Defid mu-bidagbʼo̩, oñ ma mudabi, ma lewa ka ñwu Defid alu kʼi ka chaka.

Taku Defid ka ñw abo-wñ kakini, E̩nene̩ne̩ne̩ me̩ chaka kʼi mʼugbada-wñ du ji mʼago. Tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ma chaka mʼugbada-wñ du ji mʼago; Defid laño̩ mʼugbada e-wñ du ji mʼago ge̩. Abo ku ma tu Defid ubi alo la dab one̩ ulo̩ko̩; one̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ la kwojo̩ ugbo ane̩-ma.
Okolobiaʼka muda ka ñw Abige̩l, o̩ya Nebal, kakini, Go, Defid fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ kwef aje̩tachi wa akadua ñw odu-wa; tak i gwo̩ko̩rʼuma o̩la.
Abo le̩ la che e̩nyo̩ ñw a tabale; anyo̩ la mu wa n; e̩wñ-wa du la lenyo̩ gbogbo abu kʼa le kpʼama, e̩gba kʼa jʼegbili o̩mo̩ n;
ama chʼo̩gba ki bu nyi wa tʼodu tʼo̩ro̩ka gbogbo abu kʼa jʼugbo-ma adejute̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ egini-wa le̩.
Todule̩ uwe̩ ki ma fa-i, kʼe̩ kpibe e̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ache; todu ma fʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ñwa nyʼodu-wa, kpai abunyi-wñ chaka; todu ebili-wñ je̩ ñw one̩ ko̩la ñw u n.

Tak Abige̩l hio̩ane̩, i la mʼe̩bo̩ uje̩-wñ o̩gwo̩ko̩ ko, kpai aiko omi achiwebe̩te̩ma meji kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini me̩lu ku ma fu kwu, kpai e̩ñwa o̩ka e̩ro̩ me̩lu, kpai o̩wo̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩gbe̩ ogume̩lu, kpai e̩bo̩ e̩ro o̩gbaikolo o̩gwo̩ko̩, oñ i mʼu ko nʼamo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ubi.
Tak i ka ñw abokolobia-wñ kakini, Me̩ kanyi dʼo̩gba-mi; go, omi tʼume̩ ubi awa le̩. I muda ka ñwu Nebal, o̩ko̩-wñ n.
Abe̩le̩, abu kʼi tanʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ agwo̩ru wʼugbo o̩fio̩lifio̩ uwo le̩, go Defid kpʼabo-wñ kpejurʼu gwo̩ru awa o̩gba-wñ; oñ i de kpai ama.
Defid la fʼo̩la-i katane̩ e̩gba le̩ me̩, kakini, Ede kʼu de e̩wñ du kʼe̩ne̩-i ne̩ aje̩tachi kʼe̩wñ du kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ne̩ ma lenyo̩ n, chʼofofo: i la d ʼe̩bie̩ne̩ rʼo̩me̩ e̩nyo̩ ñwu mi.
I chaka chʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ okate ef e̩wñ du kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ne̩ kʼu to̩no̩ kʼo̩jo̩ añwa ke̩re̩bʼo̩, mak O̩jo̩ ki chʼabe̩le̩ ñw ame̩ne̩bi Defid, kpʼe-ki tʼe-le le ge̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼAbige̩l fu Defid li, i hio̩ane̩ mudachi bʼoj o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ te̩, oñ i lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma o̩gba Defid, i la dojikane̩.
Tak i lewane̩ e̩re̩-wñ oñ i kakini, Odu-mi, udu kide̩ ki bʼumi ma; agba, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw adu-we̩ onobule̩-i ki ko̩la nyʼuwe̩ eti, e̩ ki la gbʼo̩la kʼadu-we̩ onobule̩-i aka ta,

nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ odu-mi, e̩ ki nyi e̩ne̩bili le̩ eti n, owñ che Nebal le̩; todu alu kʼodu-wñ de̩, abe̩le̩ i de̩: Nebal oñ odu-wñ ko̩ ibe̩te̩ la dʼo̩la-wñ. Omi, adu-we̩ onobule̩-i, u li abokolobia odu-mi kʼe̩ kpuche̩ wa le̩ n.

Todule̩ fa-i, odu-mi Oji Jihofa, kpai Oji onugo-we̩, abu ku Jihofa fʼuwe̩ dahi kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ ki we etunyʼe̩bie̩, kʼuwe̩ ki we enʼo̩wo̩-we̩ jadu oji o̩la-we̩. Todule̩ fai ame̩nebi-we̩ kpai abo ku ma tene echʼodu-mi e̩bie̩ne̩, ki de̩ alu ku Nebal de̩.
Oñ e̩ je̩ ñwu ma kʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ kʼadu-we̩ ko wʼugbo odu-mi-i ñw abokolobia ku ma tʼodu-mi ubi.

Agba, o̩ko̩ nagbabʼe̩ kʼe̩ mʼada kʼadu-we̩ onobule̩-i je̩ le̩ du chʼe ele: todu Jihofa ache kʼunyi odu-mi ki chʼunyi o̩kpaka chuu, todabu kʼodu-mi nʼogu Jihofa aja; ma ñʼali e̩bie̩ne̩ ef uwe̩ gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-we̩ n.

Dagba one̩ ki kwane̩ kʼi nʼuwe̩ ule, kʼi laño̩ tene onugo oji-we̩, i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma adʼonugo odu-mi ji manyʼabo ki deju manyu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; owñ akʼonugo ame̩nebi-we̩ ro̩ rinyo̩ dabe̩ne̩ ku ma ko ma gwʼinata.
I la awatu e̩gba ku Jihofa fʼe̩wñ du che ñw odu-mi teju o̩la e̩nyo̩ kʼi ka lʼugbo-we̩, kʼi ño̩ mʼuwe̩ du chʼe̩nuto̩gba Israe̩l,

kʼe̩wñ-i ki we eche e̩wñ ero̩ko̩ibu ñw e̩, kʼi we eche e̩wñ ki agwunyʼodu-mi e̩do̩, ka kʼuwe̩ dʼe̩bie̩ dafo tebitele ofo n, odu-mi la fʼache̩ o̩la-wñ na ni ge̩. Tak e̩gba ku Jihofa fʼe̩nyo̩ che ñw odu-mi, e̩ nadibekado adu-we̩ onobule̩-i.
Taku Defid ka ñw Abige̩l kakini, Jihofa ki nʼele, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l kʼi fʼuwe̩ kpuche̩ kʼe̩ ledo mi eñini-i!
O̩jo̩ ki la de̩nyo̩ ñw ibe-we̩ kʼe̩ lo le̩, O̩jo̩ ki la de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩, uwe̩ kʼe̩ gwo̩nyʼumi kʼu ma dʼo̩wo̩ tunyʼe̩bie̩ eñini n, kʼu laño̩ we enʼo̩wo̩-mi fʼache̩ o̩la-mi na.

Todu i ma chi n, Oji Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, e-kʼi ma je̩ ñwu mi chʼuwe̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ n, uwe̩ ma hio̩ane̩ wa aledo mi-i n, ochochi, i chaka chʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kate i ma bo̩ ñwu Nebal kʼo̩jo̩ ma ñwa ke̩re̩bʼo̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ Defid mʼe̩wñ kʼi ko wa le̩ gba kwʼo̩wo̩-wñ, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Lo tʼunyi-we̩ kpai ure̩do̩; go, u mʼomu-we̩ gbagbo̩ me̩, eju-we̩ kʼu li, i nyo̩ me̩.

Tak Abige̩l lewa ugbo Nebal; go, i la fʼo̩te̩ hi ef unyi-wñ, dabe̩ne̩ kʼoko̩te̩ e-amonu abe̩i; e̩do̩ Nebal la chʼe̩bo̩ nana, todu o̩te̩ fʼu mu tabale: todule̩ o̩ya-wñ ka abu du ñw u n, tʼo̩la re tʼe-ki nana, gbogbo tak ane̩ mune̩ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ.
Oñ i lewatu odudu-wñ, e̩gba kʼo̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma takpa o̩la Nebal, kʼo̩ya-wñ mʼe̩wñ-i du ka ñw u, ofuu la muda ef uwñ, oñ i dabe̩ne̩ kʼokuta te̩.
Oñ i lewa, i ño̩ dab o̩jo̩ me̩gwa, taku Jihofa fu Nebal kpa kʼi ku.

Tak e̩gba ku Defid gbo̩ ka ku Nebal leku i kakini, Jihofa ki nʼele, abu kʼi fʼomu-mi ka ugbo ina-mi ki kwʼo̩wo̩ Nebal wa le̩, kʼi ma la je̩ ñw adu-wñ-i tunyʼe̩bie̩ne̩ n. Jihofa la mʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ku Nebal che du dabi wa abʼoji-wñ onugo ma. Taku Defid fʼuche̩ kpe̩ akʼo̩la Abige̩l, kʼi mʼowñ du chʼo̩ya.
Tak e̩gba kʼamadu Defid lewa ugbo Abige̩l Karme̩l, ma ko̩la ñw u kakini, Defid fʼuwa kpuche̩ wʼugbo-we̩, kʼa mʼuwe̩ du wa ñw u kʼe̩ chʼo̩ya-wñ.
Tak i kwane̩, oñ i te̩kpe̩ afʼeju bʼane̩ ma, i kakini, Go, adu-we̩ onobule̩-i chʼadu ki agwʼe̩re̩ amadu odu-mi.
Tak Abige̩l hio̩ane̩, i kwane̩ atanʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩, manyʼabigbe̩le̩-wñ me̩lu ku ma tʼo̩ ubi; oñ i tʼamonuche̩ Defid ubi, i la mud o̩ya-wñ.
Defid ño̩ mʼAhinoam e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l le̩ du e̩gba le̩ me̩; oñ amameji chʼo̩ya-wñ.
E̩gba le̩ So̩l la mʼo̩ma-wñ Maikal, o̩ya Defid le̩, du ñw Palti, o̩ma Laish, kʼi chʼabo Galim, me̩.
Tak abo Zif lewʼugbo So̩l Gibea, ma kakini, Defid dʼo̩la-wñ maja uwo Hakila, e-ki dʼo̩gba aje̩tachi o̩mo̩ le̩ n?
Taku So̩l kwane̩, oñ i gwo̩ru nyʼaje̩tachi Zif o̩mo̩, aboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko me̩ta kʼi chi kwef abo Israe̩l jʼugbo-wñ ku ma tene Defid ef aje̩tachi Zif le̩.
Oñ So̩l lewa ruru jo̩ uwo Hakila, kʼi dʼo̩gba aje̩tachi ej o̩na o̩mo̩. Defid la gugu ef aje̩tachi, oñ i li abu ku So̩l atʼo̩ ubi ef aje̩tachi le̩.
Todule̩ Defid fʼabo ku ma tu ane̩ kpe̩, oñ ma ma ka ku So̩l lewa, ochochi.
Taku Defid kwane̩ oñ i lewʼugbo ku So̩l ru le̩. Defid la li ugbo ku So̩l dachi, kpai Abina, o̩ma Ne̩r, kʼi chʼonu ogu-wñ; So̩l la dachi ef o̩gba ugbo ku ma kʼane̩ jo̩, amone̩ la ruru jo̩ dʼo̩ ka.
Taku Defid mʼohi du ñw Ahi-me̩le̩k, e̩ne̩ abo He̩t le̩, kpai Abishai, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya kʼi chʼo̩maye Jo̩ab, kakini, E̩ne̩ alebʼumi nyʼugbo So̩l ef uru o̩mo̩? Tak Abishai kakini, Nale bʼuwe̩.
Abe̩le̩ Defid kpai Abishai lewa ugbo amone̩ le̩ odu. E̩ la go, So̩l dachi alolu ef o̩gba ugbo kʼane̩ jo̩, o̩kwo̩-wñ tunyʼane̩ ugbo oji-wñ; oñ Abina kpai amone̩ le̩ dachi lʼo daka.
Tak Abishai ka ñwu Defid kakini, O̩jo̩ mʼe̩nebi-we̩ du tʼef o̩wo̩-we̩ eñini me̩: todule̩ narodubʼe̩ fai, e̩ je̩ ñwu mi dʼo̩kwo̩ gwunyʼu tunyʼane̩ onukate, omi agwunyʼu onu meji n.
Taku Defid ka ñwu Abishai kakini, E̩ ki kpa n; todu e̩ne̩ neke dʼo̩wo̩ dufu achagwunyʼe̩ne̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji ki ma chʼabi i je̩ n?
Oñ Defid kakini, Oji Jihofa! Jihofa adʼu kpa; abe̩k o̩jo̩ uku-wñ awa; abe̩k okogu i anyi tak i alenyo̩.
Jihofa ki kpo̩na, o̩wo̩-mi edu dufu chʼagwunyʼe̩ne̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji; ama fa-i nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ mʼo̩kwo̩ kʼi dʼugbo oji-wñ du, kpai o̩cha omi-wñ, kʼa lo wa.

Abe̩le̩ Defid mʼo̩kwo̩ kpai o̩cha ki dʼugbo oji So̩l ko̩; taku ma kwʼo̩mo̩ le. E̩ne̩ du la li n, ma la ma n, e̩ne̩ du la ji olu n; todu o̩chaka ma jʼalolu, todabu kʼolu lile kʼi kwʼugbo Jihofa wa fʼuma mu.
Taku Defid le tʼo̩wo̩ʼka-wñ o̩mo̩, oñ i kwodago oj uwo o̩najiji; agbagba-ma te̩ nana;
taku Defid kwado̩ amone̩ le̩, kpai Abina, o̩ma Ne̩r; i kakini, Uwe̩ adohi n, Abina? Tak Abina dohi kakini, Uwe̩ e̩ne̩ akwado̩ onu-i?
Taku Defid ka ñw Abina kakini, I chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ uwe̩ che n? E̩ne̩ dab uwe̩ oj ane̩ Israe̩l? E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma fʼide odu-we̩ onu de n? Todu e̩ne̩ʼka kwef amone̩ wa kʼi dʼonu kʼi chʼodu-we̩-i kpa.
E̩wñ kʼuwe̩ che-i nyo̩ no. Oji Jihofa, ame̩ chʼame̩ne̩ uku, todabu ku me̩ ma fʼide odu-me̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji de n, e̩ go ugbo kʼo̩kwo̩ onu de̩ fa-i kpai o̩cha omi ki dʼugbo oji-wñ ge̩.
Taku So̩l mejuma omuko̩la Defid, oñ i kakini, Omuko̩la-we̩ de̩, Defid o̩ma-mi? Taku Defid kakini, Omuko̩la-mi de̩, odu-mi, o Onu.
Oñ i kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼodu-mi anʼadu-wñ ule-i ta? Todu ab u che? Abe̩k e̩bie̩ne̩ e̩wñ dʼef o̩wo̩-mi?

Todule̩ fa-i nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, odu-mi onu-i, kʼi gbo̩ o̩la adu-wñ-i. Iche̩wñ kʼi che Jihofa fʼe̩ ke̩che̩ tʼumi o̩la, je̩ ñw u ki gbo̩ ekpo e̩wñ ele; i muda che̩wñ ki chʼamo̩ma amone̩ che, ama ki mu ma eju Jihofa. Todu ma fʼumi ne̩ tʼo̩do̩da eñini-i, kʼu we enʼukpe̩ ef e̩wñ ogu e-Jihofa. Ma kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ re̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩.
Todule̩ fa-i e̩ je̩ ñw e̩bie̩-mi ki dajane̩ ubi Jihofa n. Todu itakpiti oñ onu Israe̩l wa atene-i, dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ado̩de̩ agbailo oj uwo uwo.
Taku So̩l kakini, U fʼadure ta! Mudabiwa, o̩ma-mi; todu u ñʼachʼuwe̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ ge̩ n, abu kʼiñmi-mi chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ eju-we̩ eñini-i. Go, idada u te̩tache-i u ño̩ la tabale.
Taku Defid dohi, i kakini, Go, o̩kwo̩-we̩ de̩, O onu! E̩ je̩ ñw okolobiaʼka ki wʼemi amʼu du.
Jihofa la adu o̩kpakpa-wñ kpai o̩kpaka-wñ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩; todabu ku Jihofa mʼuwe̩ du tef o̩wo̩-mi eñini, kʼomi ma jʼadʼo̩wo̩-mi dufu chʼagwunyʼe̩ne̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji n.
E̩ la go, alu kʼonugo oji-we̩ chʼe̩wñ ina ina eju-mi eñini-i, alu le̩ onugo oji e-mi ki ño̩ mud e̩wñ ina eju Jihofa, kʼi la ño̩ mʼumi gba kwef o̩pe̩cha chaka.
Taku So̩l ka ñwu Defid kakini, O̩jo̩ ki de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩, Defid o̩ma-mi; eche uwe̩ ache e̩wñ, edu uwe̩ adu chuu. Abe̩le̩ Defid le owñ, oñ So̩l mudabi tʼe̩gu-wñ.

Taku Defid ka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, Nalenyo̩ o̩jo̩ʼka o̩wo̩ So̩l chuu; i nʼe̩wñ du ki nyo̩ ñw omi tʼera tʼane̩ abo Filistia le n; tak uhia etene mi ef alo̩me̩ Israe̩l du ahia So̩l. Abe̩le̩ tak u nafʼo̩ o̩wo̩.
Taku Defid kwane̩ owñ kpai one̩ ulo̩gwa ku ma jʼugbo-wñ mudaba tugbo Akish o̩ma Mao̩k, onu Gat.
Taku Defid bʼAkish gugu Gat owñ kpai abo-wñ. E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼabunyi-wñ tu Defid kpai amo̩ya-wñ meji, Ahinoam, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l, kpai Abige̩l, e̩ne̩ Karme̩l, o̩ya Nebal le̩.
Taku ma mudu ka ñwu So̩l ka ku Defid ra tu Gat, oñ i ma ño̩ tejane̩ uwñ ge̩ n.
Taku Defid ka ñwu Akish kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ li mi eju abajo̩-i, e̩ je̩ ñwu ma bʼuña ñwu mi ef ewoʼka egbili kʼu dodo o̩mo̩. Todu abile kʼadu-we̩ adodo ewo onu-i kpʼuwe̩?
Tak Akish mu Ziklag du ñw u o̩jo̩ le̩. Todule̩ o̩wo̩ amonu Juda ne̩ Ziklag gbogbo tʼeñini.
Oñ aluka o̩jo̩ ku Defid dodo ane̩ Filistia chʼo̩do̩ odukulu kpai ochu me̩le̩.
Taku Defid le teke kpʼewo abo Ge̩shur oka fo̩ kpʼe-abo Geze̩r kpʼe-abo Amale̩k; todu abo le̩ chʼabo ki dodo ane̩ le̩ kwʼigbelegbele, owñ chʼabu kʼone̩ anyi Shur, gbogbo wʼane̩ Ijipti.

Defid la fʼane̩ le̩ gwoda, i la tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ no̩ ki deju n, oñ i mʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpʼamokuno̩ kpʼamo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ kpʼaminyakulumi kpʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma ko. Tak i mudabi wa, oñ i lewʼugbo Akish.
Tak Akish kakini, Abo ugbo oñ e̩ nyʼakpa ma fo̩ eñini-i ge̩? Taku Defid kakini, Abo Juda o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ kpʼabo Je̩rame̩l o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, kpʼabo Ken o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ ge̩.
Defid la tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ du no̩ ku ma deju kʼi ko ma wa Gat in, i ye̩ni, Tode̩gba ku ma dʼofe-wa dufu, kakini, Abe̩le̩ i te̩tache abu kʼi gugu ane̩ abo Filistia le̩.
Oñ Akish dʼo̩la Defid rʼochochi kakini, I je̩ ñw abo-wñ, abo Israe̩l, ahihie̩ne̩ uwñ ogbolo me̩; todule̩ adu-mi i che ogbegbele̩.

Oñ i lewatu adiko o̩jo̩ le̩ kʼabo Filistia kʼabo uru uru-ma wa jo̩ tod ogu, ku ma kʼogu bo̩ Israe̩l. Tak Akish ka ñwu Defid kakini, Uwe̩ ki ma okpoko-wñ, ka kʼuwe̩ adufu lebʼumi ef abogu-wa, uwe̩ kpai abo-we̩.
Taku Defid ka ñw Akish kakini, Todule̩ e̩wñ kʼadu-we̩-i ache, uwe̩ ama. Tak Akish ka ñwu Defid kakini, Todule̩ nadʼuwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi adide oji-mi ogbegbele̩.
Samiue̩l leku e̩gba le̩ me̩, abo Israe̩l chaka fʼeku-wñ de̩ me̩, ma la mʼu du ji Rama, owñ chʼef ewo-wñ onugo. So̩l la mʼamachobochi kpai amake̩ma ko bʼane̩ le̩ te̩ e̩gba le̩.
Tak abo Filistia kʼo̩la-ma jeju, oñ ma lewa ruru jo̩ Shune̩m. So̩l la kʼabo Israe̩l chaka jeju oñ ma lewa ruru jo̩ Gilboa.
Tak e̩gba ku So̩l fʼabogu abo Filistia li, i kwochokpo, e̩do̩-wñ la ga tabale.
Oñ e̩gba ku So̩l tu Jihofa ene, Jihofa dohi ñw u n, dagba i chʼelugbo o̩na ena, dagba i chʼurim dagba i chʼamakache̩, i dohi ñw u n.
Taku So̩l ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ natene onobule̩ kʼi ake̩ma ñwu mi, kʼu nanyʼugbo-wñ atene. Oñ abuko̩lo̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Go, onobule̩ kʼi ake̩ma dʼE̩ndo̩r.

Taku So̩l fe̩wñʼka fo̩ nyʼeju, oñ i mʼe̩wñ o̩la omune̩ ojoji ko nyi, oñ i le, aboke̩le̩ meji ño̩ lebʼo̩, oñ ma lewʼugbo onobule̩ le̩ odu: oñ i kakini, Bʼumi ifa, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ ke̩ma ñwu mi, kʼe̩ ño̩ dʼe̩ne̩ du kʼu naka ñw e̩ kwane̩ ñwu mi.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Go, uwe̩ chema e̩wñ ku So̩l che le̩, abu kʼi fʼamake̩ma kpʼamachobochi ko̩da bʼane̩-i te̩ me̩, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ fʼoku bane te̩ ñw oji-mi kʼi mud uku ñwu mi?
Taku So̩l fu Jihofa go̩ ñw u kakini, Oji Jihofa, uwe̩ ajabi ef e̩wñ-i du n.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ nadʼu kwane̩ ñw e̩? Oñ i kakini, Du Samiue̩l kwane̩ wa.
Tak e̩gba kʼonobule̩ fu Samiue̩l li, i chʼomu nyate̩ akwa nana; oñ onobule̩ le̩ ka ñwu So̩l kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ nʼakpaine̩ wʼugbo-mi-i? Todu So̩l onugo uwe̩ che.
Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki chokpo n; e̩wñ e̩ li ta? Oñ onobule̩ ka ñwu So̩l kakini, Nali o̩jo̩ʼka kʼi dufu kwef ane̩pe̩te̩ awa.
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Ab año̩la-wñ de̩? Oñ i kakini, E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ogijo te̩gu awa-i; ukpo la bʼo̩la-wñ ma. Taku So̩l mejuma ka ku Samiue̩l de̩. Oñ i mute̩kpe̩ afejubane̩ma, i la dojikane̩.

Taku Samiue̩l ka ñwu So̩l kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ che mi ihianyi kʼe̩ dʼumi kwane̩ wa-i? Taku So̩l dohi kakini, Ma che mi añwahia tabale; todu abo Filistia akʼogu wa ba mi; O̩jo̩ la kwo bʼumi te̩, i la dohi ñwu mi ge̩ n, dagba i chʼugbo amakache̩, dagba i chʼugbo o̩na ena, todule̩ oñ u dʼuwe̩, kʼuwe̩ ki je̩ ñwu mi ma e̩wñ kʼu nache.
Taku Samiue̩l kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ tʼumi ene, abu ku Jihofa kwo bʼuwe̩ te̩, kʼi la mud e̩no̩la-we̩?
Jihofa la fʼalu kʼi ka lʼalu-mi chʼuwe̩; Jihofa la mʼo̩fe̩ le̩ ko̩da nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ me̩, oñ i mʼu du ñw ekeji-we̩, owñ che Defid.
Todabu kʼe̩ ma gba omu Jihofa gbo̩ n, kʼe̩ ma la che teju uwe̩do̩-wñ inaina abʼoji Amale̩k ma n, todule̩ Jihofa fʼe̩wñ-i chʼuwe̩ eñini-i.
Anubile̩ ge̩ Jihofa ñʼakʼabogu Israe̩l nyʼo̩wo̩ abo Filistia manyʼuwe̩. O̩na uwe̩ kpʼamo̩ma-we̩ ajʼugbo-mi; Jihofa la akʼabogu Israe̩l nyʼo̩wo̩ abo Filistia ge̩.
Tak ababale̩ So̩l fʼo̩la-wñ nadala dachi ane̩pe̩te̩ o̩la-wñ naga tabale tod o̩la Samiue̩l le̩; ukpahiu ño̩ bo̩ efu-wñ ge̩ n; todu i jʼuje̩wñ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩ n, i la je̩ tak o̩jo̩ ñwa n.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ lewa ugbo So̩l, i la li kʼe̩do̩ ñwañwala achʼo tabale, i ka ñw u kakini, Go, adu-we̩ onobule̩-i gbʼomu-we̩ gbo̩, u la mʼoji-mi dutinyo̩ todu we̩, oñ u gbʼo̩la kʼe̩ ka ñwu mi gbo̩.
Todule̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼuwe̩ ki gbʼomu adu-we̩ onobule̩-i gbo̩ fa-i kʼu dʼe̩bo̩ uje̩wñ re gugu o̩gba-we, kʼe̩ je̩, kʼe̩ nʼukpahiu e̩gba kʼe̩ lo we̩.
I muda ko̩, i kakini, U je̩ n. Ama amadu-wñ manyʼonobule̩ le̩ kutʼowñ; tak i gbʼomu-ma gbo̩. Abe̩le̩ tak i kwane̩ bʼane̩pe̩te̩ te̩, oñ i kwogugu oj ate̩.
Onobule̩ le̩ la chenʼo̩mokuno̩ ki yoyo unyi-wñ. Oñ i hio̩ane̩, i la mʼu du kpa; tak i mʼomu du, i fʼu fo̩, oñ i mʼu du chʼakala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n.
Tak i mʼu du wa gugu o̩gba So̩l, kpai o̩gba abuko̩lo̩-wñ; oñ ma je̩. Taku ma kwane̩, oñ ma le odu o̩jo̩ le̩.
Oñ abo Filistia mʼabogu-ma chaka ko wa jo̩ Afe̩k; abo Israe̩l la ruru jo̩ o̩la e̩bi omi ki de̩ Je̩zree̩l.
Tak amodu abo Filistia lale o̩gume̩lu, ogume̩lu kpai icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩; oñ Defid kpai abo-wñ lale ubi-ma manyʼAkish.

Tak amagboji abo Filistia kakini, Abo Hibru ku ma jo̩-i fa? Tak Akish ka ñw amagboji abo Filistia kakini, I che Defid, adu So̩l onu Israe̩l, kʼi te̩te̩ dʼugbo-mi o̩jo̩ wewe kpʼo̩do̩ wewe-i de̩ n? U la li e̩wñ du ef uwñ akwe̩gba kʼi ñwa tef o̩wo̩-mi gbogbo tʼeñini-i n.

Ama amagboji abo Filistia we̩do̩ bʼo̩; tak amagboji abo Filistia le̩ ka ñw u kakini. Je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ mudabi, kʼi mudabi tʼe̩gu ugbo kʼe̩ bʼane̩ ñw u o̩mo̩, e̩ ki je̩ ñw u le bʼuwa nyʼogu-i n, tode̩gba kʼa chane̩ eja ki amud e̩no̩la-wa. Todu e̩wñ e̩ne̩-i adu nyi odu-wñ e̩do̩ ki ma chʼoji abo-wa-i n?
I che Defid ku ma du tʼef eli ako̩ ñw o̩la-ma le̩ de̩ n? kakini,
