Tak Akish fu Defid do̩ wa, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Oji Jihofa, e̩no̩kpakpa e̩ te̩te̩che, edufu-we̩ kpai ewa-we̩ ef ogu kpʼomi chenyo̩ eju-mi; todu u li e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ef uwe̩ akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼe̩ wʼugbo mi gbogbo tʼeñini-i n. I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ amodu abo Filistia li uwe̩ eju n.
Todule̩ e̩ mudabi fa-i ta, kʼe̩ lo kpai ure̩do̩, kʼe̩ we ebi amodu abo Filistia eju.
Taku Defid ka ñw Akish kakini, Ama, ab u che? E̩wñ e̩ li ef adu-we̩-i gbogbo abu kʼu te̩te̩dʼo̩gba-we̩ gbogbo tʼojolu eñini? todu kʼe̩ ma je̩ ñw u mi dufu akogu bʼame̩ne̩bi odu-mi onu n?
Tak Akish dohi, oñ i ka ñwu Defid kakini, U chema ka kʼe̩ nyo̩ eju-mi, dabe̩ne̩ kʼonuche̩ ki kwʼugbo O̩jo̩; i muda chaka dʼabe̩le̩ amagboji abo Filistia kakini, I ale bʼuwa nyʼogu-i n.
Todule̩ e̩ takpa kwane̩ odudu manyʼabuko̩lo̩ odu-we̩ ku ma le bʼuwe̩ wa le̩; oñ e̩gba ku me̩ kwane̩ odudu odudu kʼane̩ mune̩ ababale̩ me̩ kwʼemi alo.
Abe̩le̩ Defid takpa kwane̩, owñ kpai abo-wñ, ku ma lo odudu, ku ma dabi tʼane̩ abo Filistia. Tak abo Filistia te̩gu nyi Je̩zree̩l.
Oñ i lewatu gbogbo taku Defid kpai abo-wñ lewa Ziklag o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ abo Amale̩k le̩ lewa fʼunyi ki dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ kpo̩fo̩ manyu Ziklag, oñ mu fu Ziklag gwoda, ma la fʼu gujo rinyo̩.
Ma la fʼabobule̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ du ku ma jʼef uwñ mu lelo, tʼabo e-kekele, tʼabo ki nana. Ma kpʼe̩ne̩ du n, ma muda mʼuma ko kwʼo̩mo̩ oñ ma le ma.
Tak e̩gba ku Defid kpʼa-bo-wñ lewa ewo le̩, go, una fʼu gujo rinyo̩ me̩; amo̩ya-ma kpʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ jʼef amu.
Taku Defid kpʼamone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ chi omu-ma nyʼate araku, gbogbo taku ma ño̩ nʼukpahiu ero̩ ge̩ n.
Ma ño̩ fʼamo̩ya Defid meji Ahinoam, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l le̩ kpʼAbige̩l, o̩ya Nebal e̩ne̩ Karme̩l, mu alo ge̩.

Defid la mʼugbo kʼi ale ru n, todu amone̩ le̩ ko̩la okuta ero̩ dʼo, todu e̩do̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ef amone̩ le̩ chaka chʼe̩kpabie̩ tod amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩. Defid muda du ukpahiu ñw o̩la-wñ efu Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ.
Taku Defid ka ñw Abayata, atama, kʼi chʼo̩ma Ahime̩le̩k le̩, kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ du e̩fo̩d le̩ wa emi ñwu mi. Tak Abayata mʼe̩fo̩d le̩ du wʼugbo Defid.
Taku Defid tene ugbo Jihofa kakini Iche̩wñ kʼu naranʼabudala-i, namu ma? Tak i dohi ñw u kakini, Rano ma: todu uwe̩ amu ma chuu, i nʼugbo du ki achi n, uwe̩ adabi gba e̩wñ le̩ chaka.
Abe̩le̩ Defid le manyʼone̩ ulo̩gwa ku ma jʼugbo-wñ le̩, oñ ma lewa aji Besor, o̩mo̩ abo ku ma bo̩ ubi jo̩.
Ama Defid rano ma alo waa, owñ kpai one̩ ulo̩ko̩, todu one̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ ma ubi, owñ chʼabo kʼuhia hia ma ku ma ma neke daba aji Beso̩r n.
Taku ma fʼe̩ne̩ Ijiptiʼka li oko o̩mo̩, oñ ma mʼu du wʼugbo Defid, ma la dʼuje̩wñ ñw u, oñ i mʼu du je̩; taku ma dʼomi ñw u ñmo̩;
oñ ma bʼe̩bo̩ e̩ro o̩gbaikolo ñw u, kpai o̩wo̩ e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩gbe̩ meji. Tak e̩gba kʼi fu je̩, iñmi-wñ lewane̩; todu o̩ro̩ka me̩ta kpʼodu me̩ta kʼi ma je̩ kʼi ñmo̩ ni de̩.
Taku Defid ka ñw u kakini, Ef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ e̩ de̩? Ugbo e̩ kwo? Oñ i kakini, Okolobia abo Ijipti u che, u chʼadu e̩ne̩ Amale̩k oka. Odu-mi la tʼumi no̩ tinyo̩-i todabu kʼu lewane̩ o̩ga enyike̩ta.
A le tekeñʼane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ abo Ke̩re̩t, kpʼe-kʼo̩wo̩ abo Juda ne̩, kpʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ Kele̩b. A laño̩ gu Ziklag jo.
Taku Defid ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ jʼane̩ mi nyʼugbo udala le̩? Oñ i kakini, E̩ fʼO̩jo̩ go̩ ñwu mi ka kʼe̩ ñʼakpa-mi n, kʼe̩ la ñʼadʼumi tef o̩wo̩ odu-mi ge̩ n, tak u nane̩ we̩ nyʼugbo udala le̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi fʼowñ ne̩ gwo̩ru nyʼo̩mo̩, go, ma chʼe̩kpatuka bʼane̩ ma o̩mo̩ chaka. Ma jʼaje̩wñ, ma añmo̩, kpʼido eta, todabu kʼane̩ ku ma ko kwʼoj ane̩ abo Filistia kpʼane̩ Juda chenana.
Taku Defid gwo ma da akwʼe̩gba kʼane̩ arefu gbogbo tak olu tunyane̩ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ. E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ef uma fʼo̩ o̩wo̩ n, chai abokolobia ulo̩ko̩ ku ma tanʼaminyakulumi ku ma ra.
Oñ Defid dabi mʼe̩wñ du kʼabo Amale̩k le̩ ko gba. Defid la ño̩ mʼamo̩ya-wñ meji gba tane̩ ge̩.
I nʼe̩wñ du ki bo̩ ku ma ma ko dabi wa n, tʼe̩wñ kekele, tʼe-lile, tʼo̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼo̩monobule̩, tʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩, tʼe̩wʼñ du ku ma ko le̩; Defid mʼo̩chaka-wñ ko dabi wa.
Taku Defid mʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini chaka kpʼamokuno̩, ku ma ne̩ ma lo rʼo̩gba ame̩wñ ukpa ki bo̩ ko, oñ i kakini, e̩wñ kʼogu Defid je̩ le̩ de̩.

Taku Defid lewa ugbo one̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ kʼuhia hia ma ku ma ma neke tu Defid ubi n, ku ma ño̩ je̩ ñwu ma jo̩ et aji Beso̩r le̩; oñ abo le̩ kwo dufu aledo Defid kpʼabo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ. Tak e̩gba ku Defid te̩me̩ru amone̩ le̩ i tene o̩lafia-ma.

Tak ame̩ne̩bibi kpai ame̩nebili chaka ku ma le bi Defid dohi kakini, Todabu ku ma ma lebʼuwa n, a adʼane̩ du ef ane̩ kʼa dabi gba-i ñwu ma n, chai o̩ya-wñ oñ a adu ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kpai amo̩ma-wñ kʼi ne̩ makwʼemialo.
Taku Defid kakini, Amo̩maye-mi, ame̩ ache abe̩le̩ ugbo e̩wñ ku Jihofa ko ñw a le̩ n, owñ fejute̩ wa, i la mʼabo udala ku ma kobʼuwa le̩ ko nyʼuwa o̩wo̩.
E̩ne̩ ñʼanyʼume̩ eti ef o̩la-i ge̩? Todu alu kʼukpe̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi anyʼogu de̩ alu le̩ ukpe̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi adago kpenyʼane̩ ade̩ ge̩: ma akpe̩ okujo̩.
Akwo o̩jo̩ le̩ nyʼate̩tʼo̩gba, abe̩le̩ i de̩; oñ i mʼu du chʼuhio̩me̩ kpʼo̩da ku ma ñwa te̩ ñw abo Israe̩l tʼo̩jo̩ olu eñini.
Tak e̩gba ku Defid lewa Ziklag, i kʼe̩wñ kwef ane̩ kʼogu je̩ le̩ kpuche̩ rʼabogijo Juda, owñ chʼugbo amonuku-wñ. I kakini, Go, ele e̩nyo̩ todu me̩ de̩, i kwʼef ane̩ ame̩nebi Jihofa kʼogu je̩.
I ko kpuche̩ rʼabo ku ma jo̩ Be̩te̩l kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ Ramo̩t ki dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ Jatir,
kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ Aroe̩r, kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ Sifmo̩t, kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ E̩shtemoa,
kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ Rekal, kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ ewo ewo abo Je̩ramee̩l, kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ ewo ewo abo Ken,
kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ Ho̩rma, kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ Bo̩rashan kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ Atak,
kpʼabo ku ma jo̩ He̩bro̩n, kpʼugbo du ku Defid kpai abo-wñ te̩tale.
Oñ abo Filistia kʼogu bo̩ abo Israe̩l. Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ra rʼo̩gba abo Filistia, oñ ma che ma agbe̩, ma lewane̩ oj uwo Gilboa.
Abo Filistia la tu So̩l kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ubi unauna; oñ abo Filistia fu Jo̩natan kpai Abinadab kpai Malki-shua, amo̩ma So̩l le̩ kpa.
Ogu le̩ la nu So̩l oji te̩ tabale, oñ abo ku ma nʼo̩o̩do̩ ranʼo fʼu mu; i ño̩ mʼugbo kʼi ale ru n, noj abo ku ma nʼo̩o̩do̩ le̩.

Taku So̩l ka ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi anʼane̩ ogu-wñ kakini, Mʼugbada-we̩ wo̩ kʼe̩ du gwunyʼumi, tode̩gba kʼabo e̩pi odukulu-i awa dʼu gwunyʼumi, ku ma gwʼumi uke̩. Ama e̩ne̩ kʼi anʼane̩ o̩gu-wñ le̩ je̩ che n; todu i achokpo nana. Todule̩ So̩l mʼugbada-wñ du, oñ i lewane̩ abʼo ma.
Tak e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi anʼane̩ ogu-wñ li ka ku So̩l leku, owñ le̩ ño̩ lewane̩ abʼugbada-wñ ma abe̩le̩ ge̩, tak i leku kpʼowñ.
Abe̩le̩ So̩l leku, kpʼamo̩ma-wñ me̩ta, kpʼe̩ne̩ kʼi anʼane̩ ogu-wñ, kpʼabo-wñ chaka, o̩jo̩ kate le̩.

Tak e̩gba kʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ku ma jo̩ udaba o̩go̩ le̩, kpʼabo ku ma jʼudaba Jo̩rdan, li ka kʼabo Israe̩l ara, ku So̩l kpʼamo̩ma-wñ ño̩ leku, ma tʼewo ewo no̩ tinyo̩, oñ ma ra; tak abo Filistia lewa gugu ef uwñ.
Oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ ñwa-wñ, e̩gba kʼabo Filistia wa ku ma fiʼane̩ bʼo̩la abo ki ku le̩ te̩, ma fu So̩l kpʼamo̩ma-wñ me̩ta li abu ku ma wane̩ jʼoj uwo Gilboa le̩.
Taku ma fʼoji-wñ ko̩da, oñ ma mʼane̩ ogu-wñ ko bʼo̩la-wñ te̩, oñ ma fʼone̩ kpe̩ tʼoj ane̩ Filistia ugbo du, ku ma mʼinabali-wñ du wʼef unyi amode-ma kpʼugbo amone̩.
Oñ ma mʼane̩ ogu-wñ ko̩ jʼef unyi Ashta-ro̩t; taku ma mʼoku-wñ du kamʼo̩do̩ Be̩t-shan.
Oñ e̩gba kʼabo ku ma dodo Jebe̩sh-gilead gbo̩ inabali e̩wñ kʼabo Filistia che So̩l,
aboke̩le̩ du ku ma nʼe̩do̩ kwane̩, oñ ma le odu gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩, ma la mʼoku So̩l kpʼe-amo̩ma-wñ ko bʼo̩lo̩do̩ Be̩t-shan te̩; oñ ma lewa Je̩be̩sh afʼoku-ma gujo o̩mo̩.
Taku ma mʼachiku-ma ko, oñ ma mʼu ko ji of oli tamarisk Jebe̩sh, oñ ma fʼalu ji gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie.
Oñ abu ku So̩l leku, e̩gba ki Defid doji kwoko ekpa abo Amale̩k, ki Defid la jʼo̩jo̩ meji Ziklag;
oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ, go, one̩ kwʼuru abogu So̩l le̩ wa, ukpo-wñ chʼe̩fana nyʼo̩ o̩la, ebutu la dʼoji-wñ: oñ e̩gba kʼi lewʼugbo Defid, i fʼeju bʼane̩ ma oñ i dojikane̩ ñw u.
Taku Defid ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo e̩ kwo wa? Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, U fʼuma o̩wo̩ kwʼuru abogu Israe̩l wa.
Taki Defid ka ñw u kakini, Ab o̩la le̩ le ta? Agba, e̩ ka ñwu mi ke. Tak i dohi kakini, Amone̩ ra bʼogu le̩ te̩ me̩, amone̩ wewe laño̩ lewane̩, ma leku. So̩l kpai Jo̩natan o̩ma-wñ ño̩ leku ge̩.
Taku Defid tʼokolobia kʼi ka ñw u le̩ ene kakini, Ab i le kʼe̩ ma ka ku So̩l kpʼo̩ma-wñ Jo̩natan leku?
Tak okolobia ki ko̩la ñw u ka ñw u kakini, Abu kʼu le gagaga akpachu oj uwo Gilboa, go, So̩l lo̩nʼo̩kwo̩-wñ o̩mo̩; e̩ la go, abo ku ma jʼef o̩ko̩ ogu kpʼamananya tʼo̩ ubi anane̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi gʼubi-wñ, i fʼumi li, oñ i fʼumi do̩. Tak u dohi kakini, Omi de̩.
Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, Uwe̩ e̩ne̩ de̩? Tak u dohi ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ Amale̩k u che.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Agba, e̩ dago kpenyʼumi kʼe̩ fʼumi kpa; todu ochuchu fʼumi mu, iñmi-mi dʼef umi ogbolo ta.
Abe̩le̩ u kwo dago kpenyʼu, oñ u mʼu du kpa, todabu kʼu chema ka kʼi ñʼaye abu kʼi wane̩ o̩mo̩ le̩ ge̩ n; tak u mʼike̩be̩ ki dʼoji-wñ du, kpai ude̩ ki damʼo̩wo̩-wñ, oñ u mʼu ko wa ñw odu-mi emi-i.
Defid muda gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ oñ i fʼu fana; abe̩le̩ aboke̩le̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ ño̩ che;
taku ma kwodaido̩, oñ ma raku oñ ma nʼalu aji gbogbo nyʼane̩, todu Sol kpai o̩ma-wñ Jo̩natan, kpai todu amone̩ Jihofa, kpʼabunyi abo Israe̩l; todabu kʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli gwo ma da jʼane̩.
Taku Defid tʼokolobia ki ka ñw u le̩ ene kakini, Ugbo e̩ kwo? Oñ i dohi kakini, O̩ma ilowa, e̩ne̩ Amale̩k, u che.
Taku Defid ka ñw u kakini, Ab i le kʼe̩ ma railo enʼo̩wo̩ dala akpa e̩ne̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji-i n?
Taku Defid fʼokolobiaʼka do̩ wa, oñ i kakini, Te̩ nyʼugbo-wñ kʼe̩ bʼo ma. Tak i mʼu du kpa.
Defid la ka ñw u kakini, E̩bie̩-we̩ ki bʼonugo-we̩ oji ma; todu alu-we̩ fʼibenu gba nyʼuwe̩ kakini, U mʼe̩ne̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji du kpa me̩.
Taku Defid nʼinaku kide̩ ada todu So̩l kpai Jo̩natan o̩ma-wñ
oñ i je̩ ñw ma ko̩ abo Juda eli o̩o̩do̩ le̩, go, ma fʼeli-wñ ko̩ nyʼubuku Jashar kakini,
O Israe̩l, ma mʼegbi-we̩ du kpa oj otete otete-we̩ me̩!
Me̩ ki dʼo̩la le̩ ka efu Gat in,
O uwo uwo Gilboa,
O̩o̩do̩ Jo̩natan dubigba e̩bie̩ abo ku ma kpa
Ma fe̩do̩ So̩l kpai Jo̩natan, ma chʼuto̩ ef udeju-ma,
Ame̩ amo̩ma onobule̩ Israe̩l, me̩ naraku So̩l,
Me̩ go abu kʼame̩nugbiti lewane̩
E̩do̩-mi kpabie̩ tod uwe̩ Jo̩natan, o̩maye-mi;
Me̩ go abu kʼame̩nugbiti lewane̩ ke,
Oñ i lewatu ubi le̩ ge̩, Defid tu Jihofa ene kakini, Omi ate̩gu nyʼewo Judaʼka? Taku Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Mute̩gu alo. Taku Defid kakini, E-ugbo nate̩gu nyi? Tak i kakini, Lo tu He̩bro̩n.
Abe̩le̩ Defid mute̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩ kpʼamo̩ya-wñ meji, Ahinoam, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l le̩, kpʼAbige̩l, o̩ya Nebal e̩ne̩ Karme̩l le̩.
Oñ Defid kʼaboke̩le̩ okoke du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ wa kpai abo unyi-ma. Ma la fʼodo do ewo ewo He̩bro̩n.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Juda lewa, oñ ma fʼekpo ba tu Defid oji o̩mo̩ kʼi jʼonu abunyi Juda.
Taku Defid fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo abo Jebe̩sh-gilead, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Jihofa ki de̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩, abu ku me̩ mo̩la ñwu So̩l, odu-me̩, ku me̩ la mʼu du ji.
Fai Jihofa ki chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ochochi ñw ame̩ ke: abe̩le̩ omi ñʼadʼakoji e̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩ tod e̩wñ ku me̩ che-i.
Todule̩ me̩ fʼo̩wo̩ gbiti fai, ku me̩ chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩; todu So̩l, odu-me̩ leku, abunyi Juda laño̩ mʼumi du jʼonu-ma ge̩.
Abina, o̩ma Ne̩r, kʼi chʼonu ogu So̩l le̩, la mʼIshbo̩she̩t o̩ma So̩l du daba nyi Mahanaim e̩gba le̩ me̩;
oñ i du owñ jʼonu Gilead kpai abo Ashur kpai Je̩zree̩l kpai Ifraim kpai Be̩njamin kpai abo Israe̩l chaka.
O̩do̩ Ishbo̩she̩t, o̩ma So̩l le̩ chʼo̩gbo̩ meji e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l, i la jʼonu-wñ o̩do̩ meji. Abo unyi Juda muda tu Defid ubi.
Oñ iko ku Defid jʼonu abo unyi Juda He̩bro̩n chʼo̩do̩ mebie kpai ochu me̩fa.
Oñ Abina o̩ma Ne̩r le̩ kpai amadu Ishbo̩she̩t, o̩ma So̩l, kwo Mahanaim nyi Gibeo̩n.
Taku Joab, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, kpai amadu Defid dufu, oñ ma de kpai ama ugbo abukpe omi e-Gibeo̩n; taku ma kwoguguane̩, aboʼka jʼo̩wo̩ʼka abukpe omi le̩, abomune̩ la jʼo̩wo̩ ekeji abukpe omi le̩.
Taku Abina ka ñwu Joab kakini, Agba, e̩ ki je̩ ñw abokolobia kwane̩ ku ma chiya o̩gba-wa-i. Taku Joab kakini, Ma kwane̩ ke n!
Taku ma kwane̩, oñ ma mudaba aluka aluka: abo me̩gweji kwane̩ todu Be̩njamin kpai Ishbo̩she̩t o̩ma So̩l, amadu Defid me̩gweji ño̩ kwane̩ ge̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ gwo̩nyʼekeji-wñ oji, tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ dʼo̩kwo̩chageli-wñ gwunyʼekeji-wñ akolo; abe̩le̩ ma lewane̩ alukate; todu le̩ ma do̩ ugbo kide̩ ko̩ He̩lkathazurim, owñ de̩ Gibeo̩n.
Tak ogu kpuna tabale o̩jo̩ le̩: oñ amadu Defid fʼAbina kpai aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l du.
Amo̩ma Ze̩ruaya me̩ta la jʼo̩mo̩, ama che Joab kpai Abishai kpai Asahe̩l; e̩re̩ Asahe̩l la ale̩ dab egbi oko.
Oñ Asahe̩l rano Abina; oñ eno kʼi ano Abina alo i na tʼawo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n.
Tak Abina dejubi, oñ i kakini, Asahe̩l, uwe̩ de̩? Tak i dohi kakini, Omi de̩.
Tak Abina ka ñw u kakini, Muna tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi-we̩ le̩, kʼe̩ gwo̩nyʼokolobiaʼka kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ ko. Asahe̩l muda ko̩ ena bʼo̩ ubi te̩.
Tak Abina ño̩ ka ñwu Asahe̩l ge̩ kakini, Muna tʼo̩wo̩ʼka bʼumi ubi te̩; e̩wñ chi kʼu nagwo we̩ da jʼane̩? E̩gbale̩ ab u nale kʼu nachi eju-mi go Jo̩ab, o̩maye-we̩?

I muda ko̩ ena tʼo̩wo̩ʼka; todule̩ Abina mʼofe o̩kwo̩-wñ du gwunyʼu o̩la. O̩kwo̩ le̩ mu da dufu ubi-wñ; oñ i lewane̩ o̩mo̩, i leku e̩re̩re̩ le̩. Tak abo du ku ma wʼugbo kʼAsahe̩l wane̩ kʼi ku le̩, kwodago.
Joab kpʼAbishai muda rano Abina; oñ e̩gba ku ma lewa uwo Ama olu tunyane̩, owñ chʼuwo ki dʼo̩gba Gia ej o̩na aje̩tachi Gibeo̩n.
Tak amo̩ma Be̩njamin kʼo̩la-ma jeju tʼAbina ubi, oñ ma mud udala, ma la kwodago oj uwoʼka.
Tak Abina do̩ Joab, oñ i kakini, O̩kwo̩chageli akʼone̩ mi ogbegbele̩? Uwe̩ ma ka kʼukpoji-wñ achʼulikoko e̩do̩ n? Ab i akpo̩kpe̩ kade tak uwe̩ aka ñw amone̩-i ku ma mudabi b etʼamo̩maye-ma ubi te̩?
Taku Joab kakini, Oji O̩jo̩, i ma chʼabu kʼe̩ ka-i n, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ abo-i ma kwo bʼetʼo̩maye-wñ ubi te̩ odudu chuu.
Taku Joab fʼo̩kakachi fa, oñ amone̩ le̩ chaka kwodago, ma ño̩ nʼabo Israe̩l ule ge̩ n, ma laño̩ ja ge̩ n.
Tak Abina kpʼabo-wñ lule̩ agu ef Araba du odu gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩; taku ma mu Jo̩rdan daba, oñ ma le gu efu Bitro̩n du chaka, taku ma lewa Maha-naim.
Joab mudabi bʼetʼAbina ubi te̩; oñ e̩gba kʼi f ʼamone̩ le̩ chaka do̩ jeju, abo kʼi chi kwef amadu Defid chʼone̩ me̩gwe̩la manyʼAsahe̩l.
Amadu Defid muda fʼabo Be̩njamin kpʼabo Abina kpa gbogbo tak one̩-ma oli mebie nyoke me̩gwa leku.
Taku ma mʼAsahe̩l du, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef oji ata-wñ ki de̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m. Taku Joab kpʼabo-wñ lule̩ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩ oñ o̩jo̩ ñwa ke̩re̩bʼuma He̩bro̩n.
Oñ ogu dʼagbagba unyi So̩l kpai unyi Defid kpo̩kpe̩ kpo̩kpe̩; ukpahiu Defid la anyo̩gba o̩gba, ukpahiu abo unyi So̩l nabulo̩ waa.
Ma la fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi ñwu Defid Hebro̩n. Ahinoam, ene Je̩zree̩l bi Amno̩n o̩mo̩gba-wñ ñw u;
ekeji-wñ che Chileab, kʼAbige̩l, o̩ya Nabal e̩ne̩ Karme̩l le̩, bi ñw u; e̩ke̩ta la chʼAbsalom, o̩ma Maaka kʼi chʼo̩ma Talmai, onu Ge̩shur;
e-e̩ke̩le̩ la chʼAdonija o̩ma Hagit; e̩ke̩lu-ma la che Shefatia o̩ma Abital;
e̩ke̩fa la chʼItream e-kʼE̩gla, o̩ya Defid, bi ñw u. Abo-i ma bi ñwu Defid He̩bro̩n.
Oñ abu kʼogu dʼagbagba unyi So̩l kpai unyi Defid, Abina nache kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ki gbiti ef unyi So̩l.
Abadu So̩l oka la do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Rizpa, o̩ma Aya; oñ Ishbo̩she̩t dʼo̩la bi Abina kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ bʼabadu ata-mi dachi?

O̩la Ishbo̩she̩t le̩ la wo̩ Abina nana, oñ i kakini, Oji abia e-abo Juda omi che? Eñini kide̩ omi dʼemi achʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼunyi So̩l ata-we̩ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ kpʼamonuku-wñ kʼu ma la mʼe̩ du tef o̩wo̩ Defid in; uwe̩ muda adʼudu ugbo onobule̩-i ñwu mi eñini-i kpo̩.
O̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che Abina, kpai e-ki tʼabe̩i le ta, iche̩wñ kʼomi ma che alu ku Jihofa go̩ ñwu Defid in;
kʼi gba o̩fe̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ abo unyi So̩l, kʼi la dʼede Defid kwane̩ kʼi nʼo̩da Israe̩l kpai Juda, akwo Dan gbogbo wa Birshiba.
I la neke dʼohi omune̩ du ñwu Abina n, todu i railo owñ.
Tak Abina fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Defid ugbo kʼi de̩, kakini, E̩ne̩ nʼane̩-i ta? I ño̩ kakini, Chʼalu kpai omi, e̩ go, tak o̩wo̩-mi ado̩mo̩ kpʼuwe̩, kʼu kʼabo Israe̩l chaka ñw e̩.
Oñ i kakini, I nyo̩, nachʼalu kpʼuwe̩; i muda nʼe̩wñʼka kʼu natene ugbo-we̩ ta: owñ de̩ kakini, Uwe̩ ali eju-mi n, chai e̩gba kʼe̩ du Maikal o̩ma So̩l, wa ejodudu, takʼe̩ wa kʼe̩ li eju-mi.
Taku Defid fʼamonuche kpe̩ rʼIshbo̩she̩t, o̩ma So̩l, kakini, Du Maikal, o̩ya-mi, ñwu mi, owñ chʼe-kʼu kʼaño̩ ki bʼoj e̩pi abo Filistra ogume̩lu ma wa chʼana-wñ le̩.
Tak Ishbo̩she̩t, fʼonuche̩ kpe̩, oñ i mʼu gba bʼo̩ko̩-wñ o̩wo̩ te̩, owñ che Paltie̩l o̩ma Laish le̩.
O̩ko̩-wñ la lebʼo̩, i naraku abu kʼi alo oñ i tʼo̩ ubi nyi Bahurim. Tak Abina ka ñw u kakini, Mudabi alo; oñ i mudabi.
Tak Abina fʼoluka che kpai abogijo Israe̩l, i kakini, Igbelegbele me̩ te̩te̩-tene Defid kʼi jʼonu me̩ akwoubi.
Me̩ che abajo̩-i ke; todu Jihofa fʼo̩la Defid ka kakini, O̩wo̩ adu-mi Defid oñ nadu gba amone̩-mi Israe̩l kwef o̩wo̩ abo Filistia, kpai kwef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-ma chaka.
Tak Abina ño̩ ko̩la nyʼabo Be̩njamin eti; oñ Abina ño̩ le kʼi ka e̩wñ du ki nyo̩ abo Israe̩l kpʼo̩gbo̩ abo unyi Be̩njamin du eju le̩ nyu Defid eti He̩bro̩n.
Abe̩le̩ Abina lewa He̩bro̩n ugbo Defid, one̩ ogu la jʼugbo-wñ. Taku Defid fʼo̩je̩ ojo hi ñw Abina kpai aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ.

Tak Abina ka ñwu Defid kakini, Omi akwane̩ alo, kʼu kʼabo Israe̩l chaka wa ñw odu-mi onu, kʼama ki chʼalu kpʼuwe̩, kʼuwe̩ ki jʼonu alu du kʼonugo-we̩ neku. Taku Defid je̩ ñw Abina ki lo; oñ i le ef ure̩do̩.
E̩ la go, abo Defid kpai Joab doji kwʼoko ejakpa wa, oñ ma nʼane̩ ku ma dinya wa nana nana; Abina la dʼugbo Defid He̩bro̩n e̩gba le̩ n; todu i je̩ ñw u kwʼo̩mo̩ lo, i la le ef ure̩do̩.
E̩gba ku Joab kpʼabogu du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ lewa, ma mudu ka ñwu Joab kakini, Abina, o̩ma Ne̩r le̩ wʼugbo onu, i ño̩ je̩ ñw u le, i la le kpʼure̩do̩.
Taku Joab lewʼugbo onu, oñ i kakini, E̩wñ uwe̩ che-i? Go, Abina lewʼugbo we̩; e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ je̩ ñw u lo, kʼi la le owñ pio?
Uwe̩ chema Abina, o̩ma Ne̩r le̩, ka kʼi wa kʼi dʼuwe̩ ibe, kʼi la fʼedufu-we̩ kpai ewa-we̩ ma, kʼi ño̩ ma e̩wñ du kʼuwe̩ ache.
Tak e̩gba ku Joab kwʼugbo Defid dufu wa, i fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ rano Abina, oñ ma mʼowñ du dabi kwʼobuga Sira wa; Defid muda ma no.
Tak e̩gba ku Abina mudabi wa He̩bro̩n, Joab mʼowñ du tʼo̩wo̩ʼka alumeji alaku, kʼi ko̩la ñw u ye̩ye̩, tak i fʼe̩wñ ro̩nyʼu o̩la o̩mo̩, oñ i leku, tod e̩bie̩ Asahe̩l o̩maye-wñ.
Tak anubile̩, e̩gba ku Defid gbo̩, i kakini, Omi kpai abojane̩-mi nʼudu o̩gba Jihofa ugbo e̩bie̩ Abina, o̩ma Ne̩r le̩, ogbegbele̩ n.

I ki wane̩ abʼoji Joab kpʼabo unyi ata-wñ chaka ma; e̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ awʼe̩ño̩, abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ ikpemute, abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼi anʼo̩kpa lule̩, abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼugbada agwoda jʼane̩, abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼuje̩wñ anyarʼu kʼi we edʼef abo unyi Joab in.
Abe̩le̩ Joab kpai Abishai, o̩maye-wñ kpa Abina, todabu kʼi fʼo̩maye-ma Asahe̩l kpa Gibe̩o̩n, ef ogu le̩.
Taku Defid ka ñw Joab kpai amone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kakini, Me̩ fʼe̩wñ o̩la-me̩ fana, me̩ kʼe̩gbanukpo nyʼo̩la, ku me̩ daido̩ o̩gba Abina. Taku Defid onu le̩ tʼokuegu le̩ ubi.
Oñ ma du Abina ji He̩bro̩n; tak onu chi omu-wñ nyate̩ araku ugbo ura Abina; amone̩ chaka ño̩ raku ge̩.
Tak onu fʼinaku da tod Abina, kakini,
Ma kʼiku nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ n,

Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka wʼugbo Defid ku ma je ñw u jʼuje̩wñ abu kʼolu bo̩; ama Defid fʼO̩jo̩ go̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che mi, kpai e-ki tʼe-i le ge̩, iche̩wñ kʼu dʼakala kpai e̩wñ du ki bo̩ kad alu gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
Amone̩ le̩ chaka la li, oñ i rʼuma eju; alu kʼe̩wñ du kʼonu che cherʼamone̩ le̩ du eju.
Abe̩le̩ amone̩ le̩ kpai abo Israe̩l chaka ma ka kʼibe dʼefu onu kʼi dʼAbina o̩ma Ne̩r kpa n.
Tak onu ka ñw abo-wñ kakini, Ame̩ chema ka kʼagboji kpai e̩ne̩ lile lewane̩ ane̩ Israe̩l eñini n?
Omi la ño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ aule̩ eñini, dagba ma dʼekpo tʼumi oji kʼu chʼonu; abo-i, owñ chʼamo̩ma Ze̩ruaya-i, gbiti tʼumi le: Jihofa ki rʼo̩me̩ ñw ache̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ teju alu kʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩-wñ de̩!
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩ma So̩l gbo̩ ka kʼAbina leku He̩bro̩n, o̩wo̩-wñ che gbe̩ne̩ke̩, oñ abo Israe̩l chaka chʼe̩do̩ñwañwala.

O̩ma So̩l le̩ la nʼaboke̩le̩ meji ku ma chʼamagboji udala udala. Odu oka ko̩ Beana, oñ odu ekeji ko̩ Rekab; ma chʼamo̩ma Rimo̩n e̩ne̩ Birot e-amo̩ma Be̩njamin (todu ma ño̩ fu Birot le̩ loru Be̩njamin;
abo Birot le̩ la ra nyi Gitaim, oñ ma te̩ta-ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩ tʼeñini).

Jo̩natan, o̩ma So̩l, la nʼo̩maʼka kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩ e̩re̩. E̩gba ku ma dʼinabali So̩l kpai Jo̩natan kwo Je̩zree̩l wa o̩do̩-wñ chʼe̩lu; tak e̩ne̩ ki anʼe̩ gba mʼu du rale; oñ i lewatʼabu kʼi ahio̩wane̩ kʼi ra, i ñwa nʼane̩, tak i mud achika. Odu-wñ la ko̩ Me̩fibo̩she̩t.
Taku Rekab kpai Beana, amo̩ma Rimo̩n e̩ne̩ Biro̩t le̩ ño̩ le, oñ ma lewa unyi Ishbo̩she̩t me̩rʼiko kʼolu akpanyʼane̩, abu kʼi do̩mo̩ añmi o̩ro̩ka.
Oñ ma lewʼef unyi o̩mo̩ dabe̩ne̩ ku ma anʼo̩ka wit kwʼo̩mo̩; ma la dʼe̩wñ gwunyʼu o̩la; taku Rekab kpai Beana, o̩maye-wñ, rale.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma lewʼef unyi le̩, abu kʼi dachi oj ate̩-wñ ef unyi olu-wñ, ma du e̩wñ gwunyʼu oñ ma mʼu du kpa, taku ma kʼoji-wñ da; ma la mʼoji-wñ du, oñ ma le o̩na Araba gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩.

Taku ma mʼoji Ishbo̩she̩t du wʼugbo Defid He̩bro̩n; oñ ma ka ñw onu kakini, Go, oji Ishbo̩she̩t o̩ma So̩l e̩nebi-we̩ kʼi tene oji-we̩ le̩ de̩; Jihofa la fʼache̩ odu-mi onu na ugbo So̩l eñini, kpʼugbo ugbe̩-wñ ge̩.
Taku Defid dohi ñwu Rtkab kpai Beana o̩maye-wñ, ku ma chʼamo̩ma Rimo̩n, e̩ne̩ Birot le̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Oji Jihofa, owñ kʼi mʼonugo-mi gba kwef o̩pe̩cha du le̩,
e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ka ñwu mi kakini, Go, So̩l leku me̩, abu kʼi do̩ ka kʼinabali e̩nyo̩ i duwa le̩, omi gwo̩nyʼu, oñ u mʼu du kpa Ziklag, e-le̩ chʼo̩me̩ kʼu ra ñw u todu inabali-wñ.
Oñ e̩gba kʼame̩ne̩bibi fʼe̩no̩kpakpa kpa ef unyi-wñ oj ate̩-wñ, ab i atule kʼomi ñʼatene e̩bie̩-wñ o̩wo̩-me̩ fai? Kʼu mʼume̩ ko bʼane̩-ile̩ te̩.

Taku Defid ñwa ñw abokolobia-wñ, oñ ma mu ma ko kpa, ma la kʼuma o̩wo̩ kpai e̩re̩ da, taku ma kʼoku-ma lo̩ko̩li o̩wo̩ʼka abukpe omi He̩bro̩n. Ma muda mʼoji Ishbo̩she̩t du, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef oji Abina He̩bro̩n o̩mo̩.
Tak o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka lewʼugbo Defid He̩bro̩n, oñ ma ko̩la kakini, Go, awa kpʼuwe̩ chʼachikuʼka kpʼo̩re̩laʼka.
Igbele e̩gba ku So̩l chʼonu-wa, uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ko Israe̩l dufu, uwe̩ laño̩ ko ma dabiwa; Jihofa la ka ñw e̩ kakini, Uwe̩ achʼadejute̩ amone̩-mi Israe̩l, uwe̩ la achʼe̩nuto̩gba Israe̩l ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ abogijo Israe̩l chaka lewa He̩bro̩n ugbo onu. Taku Defid onu fʼalo che kpai ama He̩bro̩n eju Jihofa; oñ ma fʼekpo ba tu Defid oji kʼi jʼonu Israe̩l.
O̩do̩ Defid chʼogue̩gwa e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼo̩fe̩, oñ i jʼo̩fe̩ le̩ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji.
I fʼo̩fe̩ Juda o̩do̩ mebie kpai ochu me̩fa je̩ He̩bro̩n o̩mo̩; tak i fʼo̩fe̩ abo Israe̩l kpai abo Juda chaka je̩ o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩ta Je̩rusale̩m ge̩.

Oñ onu kpʼabo-wñ nyi Je̩rusale̩m akobʼabo Je̩bius ku ma dodo ane̩ o̩mo̩; oñ abo le̩ ka ñwu Defid kakini, Uwe̩ ñʼagudu wʼemi n; amafeju kpai amachika anʼuwe̩ kwʼemi. Ama do̩ kakini, Defid neke gudu wʼemi n.
Ichaka dʼabe̩le̩ Defid fʼaku Zayo̩n le̩ du; oñ e-le̩ gbage̩de̩ mud ewo Defid.

Taku Defid kʼo̩la o̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi akpa abo Je̩bius, i ki nyʼo̩gbe̩ga kʼi fʼamachika kpai amafeju kʼonugo Defid achulaka ma le̩ kpa. Todu ma kakini, Amafeju kpai amachika jo̩ le̩; i neke gudu wʼef unyi n.
Taku Defid kwododo ef aku le̩ oñ ma dʼo̩ ko̩ ewo Defid. Oñ Defid fʼunyi ko̩ lo daka akwo Milo gbogbo wʼejefu.
Defid la nanana nyʼo̩gba waa; todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du, dʼugbo-wñ.
Taku Hairam, onu Taya, fʼamonuche̩ kpai amafoli kpai amano̩do̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Defid; i ño̩ kʼoli sida kpuche̩ lo ge̩, oñ ma fʼunyi ko̩ ñwu Defid.
Defid la li ka ku Jihofa mʼe̩re̩-wñ du nyane̩ kʼi chʼonu abo Israe̩l, kʼi laño̩ dʼo̩fe̩ ojane̩-wñ dago, todu Israe̩l amone̩-wñ.
Taku Defid ño̩ mʼamabadu kpʼamo̩ya omune̩ ko ñw o̩la-wñ kwef abo Je̩rusale̩m, abu kʼi kwo He̩bro̩n wa. Ma ño̩ fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ bi ñwu Defid ge̩.
Odu abo ku ma bi ñw u Je̩rusale̩m le̩ de̩: Shamua kpai Shobab kpai Netan kpai So̩lomon
kpʼIbhar kpʼElishua kpai Nefeg kpai Jafia
kpai Elishama kpʼEliada kpʼElife̩le̩t.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo Filistia gbo ka ku ma fʼekpo ba tu Defid oji kʼi jʼonu Israe̩l, abo Filistia chaka nyʼatene Defid; Defid la gbo̩, oñ i gwo̩ru nyʼugbo aku le̩.
E̩gbale̩ abo Filistia lewa kʼo̩la-ma tala jo̩ efo̩go̩ Re̩feim me̩.
Taku Defid tene ugbo Jihofa kakini, Nanyʼakobʼabo Filistia-i? Uwe̩ ako ma jʼef o̩wo̩-mi? Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Defid kakini, Mute̩gu alo; todu omi akʼabo Filistia le̩ jʼef o̩we̩-we̩ chuu,
Taku Defid lewa Beal-pe̩razim, oñ Defid gwo ma da o̩mo̩; oñ i kakini, Jihofa muke̩che̩ bʼame̩nebi-mi ma, alu kʼomi aji agu o̩gba lo̩. Todule̩ i dʼodu ugbo kide̩ ko̩ Beal-pe̩razim,
Oñ ma tʼojibo ojibo-ma no̩ jʼomo, taku Defid kpʼabo-wñ mʼu ko kwʼo̩mo̩.
Oñ abo Filistia ño̩ wa e̩de̩mune̩ ge̩, ma la kʼo̩la-ma tala jo̩ ef o̩go̩ Re̩feim.
Tak e̩gba ku Defid tene ugbo Jihofa, i kakini, E̩ ki te̩gu alo n; e̩ muda le ubi ma, kʼe̩ lewa bʼuma ma ame̩ru oli mulbe̩ri o̩mo̩.
Oñ i awatu, e̩gba kʼe̩ gbʼiche̩ oj oli mulbe̩ri le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼamone̩ jʼalule̩, e̩gbale̩ tak e̩ hika che; todu iko le̩ Jihofa atʼuwe̩ o̩gba kʼi fʼabogu abo Filistia kpa.
Oñ Defid che, alu ku Jihofa ñwa ñw u le̩, oñ i fʼabo Filistia kpa akwo Ge̩ba gbogbo tak e̩ wa Ge̩zar.
Taku Defid ño̩ mʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ku ma fʼuma ñwa go taku ma chi ma, ko wa jeju ge̩, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa.
Oñ Defid kwane̩, tak owñ kpai amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ chaka kwo Beali-juda le ku ma dʼakpati O̩jo̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ wa, akpati ku ma dʼOdu le̩ mʼo̩, owñ chʼOdu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi gugu ate̩ ñw amiche̩rub.
Ma la dʼakpati O̩jo̩ gugu oj okane̩ tito̩, oñ ma mʼu du kwef unyi Abinadab kʼi dʼoj uwo le dufu. Oñ Uza kpai Ahio, amo̩ma Abinadab, nʼo̩kane̩ dtp le̩ alo.
Ma la mʼu du kwef unyi Abinadab kʼi dʼoj uwo le̩ dufu manyʼakpati O̩jo̩. Ahio la tʼakpati le̩ e̩gba.
Taku Defid kpʼabo unyi Israe̩l chaka nachiya o̩gba Jihofa; ma nʼe̩wñ iya ojoji ojoji e̩wñ ku ma du oli fe̩r che, kpʼumolo kpʼenuge kpʼeicha kpʼijenu kpʼoke.
Tak e̩gba ku ma lewa oj ajita ugbo ku Nakon agwʼo̩ka-wñ, Ura fʼo̩wo̩ nadala kadʼakpati O̩jo̩, oñ i gwo̩nyʼu, todu e̩re̩ amokuno̩ kʼe̩wñʼka e̩me̩.
Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo abʼUza ma; tak O̩jo̩ fʼowñ kpa o̩mo̩ tod ibenu kʼi je; oñ i leku ugbo akpati O̩jo̩ o̩mo̩.
I la bi Defid eju todabu ku Jihofa gulo̩ bʼUza ma; oñ i dʼodu ugbo ki de̩ ko̩ Pe̩rez-uza gbogbo tʼeñini.
Taku Defid railo Jihofa o̩jo̩ le̩: oñ i kakini, Ab u nale kʼakpati Jihofa awʼugbo mi ta?
Todabe̩le̩ Defid ko̩ edʼakpati Jihofa wʼugbo-wñ ef ewo Defid, Defid muda nʼe̩ tʼo̩wo̩ʼka tef unyi Obe̩d-ido̩m, e̩ne̩ Gat le̩.
Akpati Jihofa la kpo̩kpe̩ ef unyi Obe̩d-ido̩m, e̩ne̩ Gat le̩ ochu me̩ta; Jihofa la de̩nyo̩ ñw Obe̩d-ido̩m, kpai abo unyi-wñ du.
Taku ma mudu ka ñwu Defid kakini, Jihofa mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñw abo unyi Obe̩d-ido̩m kpʼe̩wñ du kʼi ne̩, tod akpati O̩jo̩. Taku Defid nʼuyo̩ nyʼadʼakpati O̩jo̩ kwef unyi Obe̩d-ido̩m wa ewo Defid.
Oñ abe̩le̩ e̩gba kʼabo ku ma nʼakpati Jihofa mʼe̩re̩ me̩fa chi, i fʼo̩kokuno̩ʼka kpai e̩la ki yoyoʼka kpa chʼiche̩bo̩.
Taku Defid dʼukpahiu du kʼi ne̩ tido o̩gba Jihofa; e̩fo̩d line̩n efufu la lʼago Defid de.
Abe̩le̩ Defid kpʼabo unyi Israe̩l du nʼo̩ga achi manyʼo̩kakachi efa adʼakpati Jihofa wa.
Tak abe̩le̩, abu kʼakpati Jihofa agudu wʼef ewo Defid, Maikal, o̩ma So̩l, nyʼope go, oñ i li abu ku Defid onu aroko atido o̩gba Jihofa le̩; oñ i chʼe̩de̩te̩-wñ ef e̩do̩-wñ.
Taku ma dʼakpati Jihofa wa oñ ma mʼu du gugu uña-wñ alumeji unyabo ku Defid fa todu-wñ. Taku Defid fʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ che o̩gba Jihofa.
Oñ e̩gba ku Defid fʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ che kpa, i kadua ñw amone̩ le̩ ef odu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du.

Tak i fʼakalaʼka kpai ukpe̩ e̩laʼka kpʼe̩bo̩ achwebe̩te̩ma e̩gbe̩ʼka kpe̩ ñw amone̩ le̩ okoke chaka, owñ chʼo̩gbo̩ uwewe abo Israe̩l le̩ du tʼaboke̩le̩ tʼabobule̩. Abe̩le̩ tak amone̩ chaka kwʼo̩mo̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼunyi-wñ.

Taku Defid mudabi kʼi kadua ñw abunyi-wñ. Oñ Maikal, o̩ma So̩l, dufu wa aledo Defid i kakini, Ojima onu Israe̩l gbe̩ eñini-i! kʼowñ mʼofe-wñ chi te̩ eju abimo̩to̩ abobule̩ e-amadu-wñ eñini dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ne̩be̩te̩ʼka kʼi ma mʼanyo̩ n, kʼi adʼofe-wñ te̩!
Taku Defid ka ñwu Maikal kakini, Eju Jihofa e-ki chi mi tʼata-we̩ le, kpʼetʼabo unyi-wñ du le, kʼi du mi chʼe̩nuto̩gba amone̩ Jihofa, owñ chʼabo Israe̩l; todule̩ oñ omi achiya o̩gba Jihofa mana.
Omi ñʼadʼo̩la-mi chʼibe̩te̩ tʼe-i le ta, naño̩ che e̩ne̩fule̩fu eju o̩la-mi; i muda chʼe-abimo̩to̩ abobule̩ kʼuwe̩ ka le̩, e̩nojima u che eju-ma.
Oñ Maikal o̩ma So̩l le̩ nʼo̩ma du gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ n.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼonu kwogugu ef unyi-wñ, ku Jihofa la mʼuñmi du ñw u bʼame̩nebi-wñ du ku ma lʼo daka te̩,
kʼonu ka ñwu Netan, akache̩ kakini, Go ta, omi gugu ef unyi sida, akpati O̩jo̩ la gugu ef ukpo ku ma ta te̩ ofo.
Taku Netan ka ñw onu kakini, Lo kʼe̩ che e̩wñ du ki dʼe̩do̩-we̩; todu Jihofa dʼugbo-we̩.
Oñ i lewatu odu o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, kʼo̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo Netan kakini,
Lo kʼe̩ ka ñw adu-mi Defid kakini, Abu ku Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Uwe̩ ako̩ unyi todu kʼomi ki gugu ef uwñ?
Todu u gugu ef unyi akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼu kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l kwef Ijipti wa gbogbo tʼeñini-i n, u muda te̩talule̩ ef unyabo kpai uña ugugu le̩.
Ugbo du kʼu te̩talule̩ kpai amo̩ma Israe̩l, omi kʼo̩laʼka ñw o̩lo̩pu Israe̩lʼka kʼu ñwa ñw u kʼi dejute̩ Israe̩l amone̩-mi-i ka kʼe̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma kʼunyi sida ñw omi n?

Todule̩ e̩wñ kʼuwe̩ aka ñw adu-mi Defid fai de̩ kakini, Abu ku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini, Omi mʼuwe̩ du kwef iga ala, akwʼoko etʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ubi, kʼuwe̩ ki mud e̩nuto̩gba amone̩-mi, owñ chʼIsrae̩l;
omi la te̩te̩dʼugbo-we̩ ugbo du kʼe̩ nyi, u laño̩ fʼame̩nebi-we̩ chaka ko̩da bʼo̩gba-we̩ te̩; naño̩ che kʼe̩ fʼodu lile ne̩, dabe̩ne̩ kʼodu abo lile ku ma jʼile̩-i.
Oñ nadʼuña te̩ ñw amone̩-mi, Israe̩l; u la ako ma gbe̩, kʼama ki dodo uña e-ma, kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ñʼami ma ejo ge̩ n; amo̩ma uji ñʼade ma mane̩ dab e̩gba igbele le̩ ge̩ n,
kpai akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼu kʼamakajo̩ jo̩ ku ma nʼo̩da amone̩-mi Israe̩l; oñ u je̩ ñw e̩ nʼuñmi ugbo ame̩nebi-we̩ du. Anubile̩ ge̩ Jihofa aka ñw e̩-i kakini, Jihofa akʼunyi ñw e̩.
E̩gba kʼo̩jo̩-we̩ jo̩ kpa, kʼe̩ cholu manyʼamata-we̩, nadʼugbe̩-we̩ dago ubi-we̩, owñ chʼe-ki akwʼefu-we̩ dufu, tak u nahi o̩fe̩ ojane̩-wñ e̩re̩ nyane̩.
Owñ le̩ akʼunyi tod odu-mi, oñ omi ahi ede o̩fe̩ ojane̩-wñ e̩re̩ nyane̩ ogbegbele̩.
Omi achʼata-wñ, owñ la achʼo̩ma-mi. Owñ muda achane̩ eche̩ño̩ e̩wñ, nanʼitali e-one̩ kʼo̩ o̩la kpai alu ku ma ja amo̩ma amone̩.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩-mi muda akwo bʼo̩ te̩ alu kʼu mʼu du kwo bi So̩l kʼomi mʼu yo̩ o̩gba tak e̩ wa je̩ te̩ n.
Unyi-we̩ kpai o̩fe̩ ojane̩-we̩ la ake̩re̩nyane̩ chidaa, ogbegbele̩ eju-we̩; ede-we̩ adago kpaka ogbegbele̩.
Teju o̩la-i du, kpai teju e̩wñ o̩jo̩ o̩na kʼi li chaka, oñ Netan ko̩la ñwu Defid.
Taku Defid onu nyʼejefu, oñ i kwoguguane̩ o̩gba Jihofa; i kakini, O Ondu Jihofa, e̩ne̩ omi che, unyi-mi la chʼe̩wñ, kʼuwe̩ du mi gbogbo wʼemi?
E-le̩ laño̩ chʼe̩wñ ke̩ke̩ eju-we̩, O Ondu Jihofa; uwe̩ ño̩ nʼo̩la abo unyi adu-we̩ aka todu ki nana ate̩tʼo̩gba-i ge̩; alu kʼo̩da one̩ ade̩ de̩? O Ondu Jihofa.
E̩wñ Defid neke ño̩ ka ñw e̩ ge̩? Todu uwe̩ chema adu-we̩-i, O Ondu Jihofa.
Tod o̩la-we̩, kpai alu ki dʼuwe̩ onugo e̩do̩, oñ uwe̩ fʼe̩wñ inaina-i chaka che, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw adu-we̩ ki ma.
Todule̩, uwe̩ tabale, O Jihofa O̩jo̩; todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dab uwe̩ n, i la nʼo̩jo̩ omune̩ du tʼuwe̩ le n, ugbo e̩wñ du kʼa nʼeti-wa gbo̩.

E̩ne̩ la dab amone̩-we̩, Israe̩l? Uche̩ amone̩ʼkate ile̩-i kʼO̩jo̩ nyʼagbatane̩ ñw o̩la-wñ; ku ma mud amone̩-wñ, kʼi la fʼodu ne̩ ñw o̩la-wñ; kʼi che e̩wñ nana todu we̩, kpai e̩wñ ubailo tod ane̩-we̩, eju amone̩-we̩ kʼe̩ gba ma tane̩ ñw o̩la-we̩ bʼIjipti te̩, kpai kwef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi kpai amo̩jo̩-ma?
Uwe̩ la fʼamone̩-we̩ Israe̩l, e̩re̩ nyane̩ ñw o̩la-we̩ ku ma mud amone̩ ñw e̩ ogbegbele̩; tak uwe̩, Jihofa, mud O̩jo̩-ma.
Fai ge̩, O Jihofa O̩jo̩, o̩la adu-we̩ kʼe̩ ka le̩, kpʼe-unyi-wñ, e̩ ki mʼu du dago ogbolo o̩gbegbele̩, kʼe̩ la che alu kʼe̩ ka le̩;
kʼodu-we̩ ki nana ogbegbele̩, kakini, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du chʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l; oñ unyi adu-we̩ Defid anʼe̩re̩ ane̩ o̩gba-we̩.
Tod uwe̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, uwe̩ du dufu ñw adu-we̩ kakini, Nakʼunyi ñw e̩; todule̩ oñ adu-we̩-i ne̩do̩ kʼi fʼadua-i che ñw e̩.
I la chʼifai, O Ondu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ uwe̩ che, o̩la kʼe̩ ka la chʼochochi; uwe̩ laño̩ fʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩-i katane̩ ñw adu-we̩ me̩.
Fai todule̩, i ki nyo̩ we̩ eju kʼe̩ de̩nyo̩ ñw unyi adu-we̩-i, todu kʼi do̩mo̩ o̩gba-we̩ ogbegbele̩; todu, uwe̩ O Ondu Jihofa, ka-i; oñ e̩nyo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ du wa ab unyi adu-we̩-i ma ogbegbele̩.
Tak ubi le̩ Defid fʼabo Filistia gwoda, i la fʼuma kamuhi: oñ Defid mʼo̩da ewo ki chʼiye-ma gba bʼo̩wo̩ abo Filistia te̩.

Tak i fʼabo Moab kpa, oñ i nʼiku ñwa ma; i je̩ ñwu ma dachi ane̩pe̩te̩; tak i fʼiku meji ñwa kʼi fʼuma kpa, oñ i fʼiku odukuluka ñwa tod abo kʼi aje̩ ñwu ma deju. Abe̩le̩ abo Moab mud amadu ñwu Defid oñ ma dʼe̩wñ ele wa ñw u.
Defid ño̩ gwo̩ Hadadeza o̩ma Rehob, onu Zoba, da, abu kʼi alo kʼi dabi dʼo̩da-wñ dago alu ohimini Yufretis.

Oñ Defid bʼowñ gba amananya icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼogume̩lu nyʼogume̩la chʼicham kpai abo ku ma le e̩re̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu. Defid la fʼilolo e̩re̩ amanya ku ma fʼo̩kogu ko̩da; abo kʼi to̩no̩ bʼo̩kogu ogume̩lu jo̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo Siria ku ma jo̩ Damaskus gbutu ñwu Hadadeza onu Zoba, Defid fʼabo Siria icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke meji gwoda.
Taku Defid kʼabo ide jo̩ Siria e-Damaskus; tak abo Siria mud amadu ñwu Defid, oñ ma dʼe̩wñ ele wa ñw u. Jihofa la fu Defid jadu ugbo du kʼi nyi.
Taku Defid mʼugbe̩yo̩ o̩jamalia kʼabo Hadadeza ne ko, oñ i mʼu ko wa Je̩rusale̩m.
Defid laño̩ ko ebije ekpikpa nana nana kwo Beta kpai Berotai, ki chʼewo ewo, Hadadeza.
Tak e̩gba ku Toi, onu Hamat, gbo̩ ka ku Defid fʼabogu Hadadeza gwoda chaka,

Toi fʼo̩ma-wñ, Joram, kpe̩ nyʼugbo Defid onu kʼi tene o̩lafia-wñ, kʼi kadua ñw u, todabu kʼi kogu bo̩ Hadadeza kʼi la fʼu gwoda todu Hadadeza te̩te̩kogu bo̩ Toi. Jo̩ram la ne̩ e̩wñ eku ajifa kpai e̩wñ eku o̩jamalia, kpai e̩wñ eku ebijeikpa wa.
Defid onu ño̩ fʼe̩wñ le̩ date̩ ñwu Jihofa manyʼajifa kpai o̩jamalja e-abo uche̩ichi du kʼi fʼuma dolo te̩ e-ki fudate̩ ñw u:
e-abo Siria kpʼe-abo Moab kpʼe-amo̩ma Amo̩n kpʼe-abo Filistia kpʼe-abo Amale̩k, kpai ane̩ Hadadeza, o̩ma Rehob, onu Zoba, e-kʼogu je̩ le̩.
E̩gba kʼi doji kwʼokʼegwo abo Siria one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩ da ef o̩go̩ Omu le̩, Defid la fʼodu ne̩.
Tak i kʼabo ide abo ide jo̩ Ido̩m; ugbo du ane̩ Ido̩m i ko abo ide jo̩, oñ abo Ido̩m chaka mud amadu Defid. Jihofa la jadu Defid ugbo du kʼi le.
Abe̩le̩ Defid jʼonu abo Israe̩l chaka; oñ Defid je̩ ñw ajo̩ o̩kpakpa kpʼe̩wñ ochochi ki do̩mo̩ ñw amone̩-wñ chaka.
Joab, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, la nʼo̩da abogu-wñ; oñ Jihoshafat o̩ma Ahilud, chʼako̩takada;
Zedo̩ko̩ma Ahitub kpai Ahime̩le̩k o̩ma Abayata la chʼamatama; Se̩raya chʼadejutʼo̩takada;
Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada, la nʼo̩da abo Ke̩re̩t kpai abo Pe̩le̩t; amo̩ma Defid la chʼuto̩gba abo ku ma ate̩ko-wñ.
Taku Defid kakini, I ño̩ nʼe̩ne̩ unyi So̩l ki bo̩ kʼu nadʼumo̩la ñʼo̩ todu Jo̩natan?
Adu abo unyi So̩l oka la do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Ziba, oñ ma fʼu do̩ wʼugbo Defid; tak onu ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ che Ziba? Oñ i kakini, Adu-we̩ le̩ de̩.
Tak onu kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ unyi So̩l du ki bo̩, kʼu nadʼumo̩la O̩jo̩ ñʼo̩ n? Taku Ziba ka ñw onu kakini, O̩ma Jo̩natan oka bo̩ ta, achika i che.
Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo i de̩? Oñ Ziba ka ñw onu kakini, Go, i dʼunyi Machir, o̩ma Amie̩l, Lo-debar.
Taku Defid onu fʼone̩ kpe̩ amʼu du kwef unyi Machir, o̩ma Amie̩l, kwo Lo-debar wa.
Taku Me̩fibo̩she̩t, o̩ma Jo̩natan, kʼi chʼo̩ma So̩l le̩, lewʼugbo Defid, oñ i fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, i la dojikane̩. Taku Defid kakini, Me̩fibo̩she̩t. Oñ i dohi kakini, Go, adu-we̩ de̩.
Taku Defid ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki railo n, todu nadʼumo̩la ñʼuwe̩ todu Jo̩natan, ata-we̩, chuu; naño̩ dʼane̩ uche̩ So̩l, ata-we̩, dabi ñw e̩ chaka, uwe̩ la ajʼuje̩wñ oji itebulu e-mi o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
Tak i dojikane̩ ñw u, oñ i kakini, Adu-we̩-i chʼe̩wñ? kʼuwe̩ adʼeju go oku abia kʼomi che-i?
Tak onu fu Ziba, adu So̩l le̩, do̩ wa, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ du ku So̩l kpʼabo unyi-wñ chaka ne̩ omi muko ñw o̩ma odu-we̩-i.

Uwe̩ la aluche̩-wñ, owñ chʼuwe̩ kpʼamo̩ma-we̩ kpai amadu-we̩: oñ uwe̩ akʼe̩ro-wñ wa kʼo̩ma odu-we̩-i kʼi nʼe̩wñ kʼi aje̩. Me̩fibo̩she̩t, o̩ma odu-we̩-i, muda aje̩ uje̩wñ oji itebulu e-mi o̩koko̩lo̩. Ziba le̩ la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ me̩gwe̩lu, kpʼamadu ogu.
Taku Ziba ka ñw onu kakini, Alu du kʼodu-mi onu ñwa ñw adu-we̩-i, abe̩le̩ adu-we̩ ache. Abe̩le̩ Me̩fibo̩she̩t jʼuje̩wñ oj itebulu Defid dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩ma onuʼka.
Me̩fibo̩she̩t la nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kekeleʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Maika. Abo du ku ma jʼunyi Ziba chʼamadu ñwu Me̩fibo̩she̩t.
Abe̩le̩ Me̩fibo̩she̩t kwogugu Je̩rusale̩m; todu i nʼuje̩wñ aje̩ oj itebulu onu o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩. I la achika e̩re̩ meji.
Oñ i lewatu ubi le̩ ge̩, kʼonu amo̩ma Amo̩n leku, taku Hanun, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.
Taku Defid kakini, Nadʼumo̩la ña Hanun, o̩ma Nehash le̩, alu kʼata-wñ dʼumo̩la ña mi. Oñ Defid fʼabo-wñ kpe̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ kʼi nyʼowñ e̩do̩ ugbo uku ata-wñ. Tak abo Defid lewa oj ane̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n.

Ama amagboji amo̩ma Amo̩n ka ñwu Hanun odu-ma kakini. Defid fʼabo ku ma nyʼone̩ e̩do̩ kpe̩ wʼugbo-we̩-i kʼi dojima ñw ata-we̩ eju-we̩? Defid fʼabo-wñ kpe̩ wʼugbo-we̩ kʼi tejane̩ ewo-i, kʼi tu ane̩-i, todu kʼi gʼu lo̩ n?
Taku Hanun mʼamadu Defid ko̩, oñ i fʼilagba-ma la o̩wo̩ʼka o̩wo̩ʼka, oñ i fʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma ko̩da alumeji, gbogbo kad ofe-ma, tak i je̩ ñwu ma lo.
E̩gba ku ma mudu ka ñwu Defid i fʼone̩ kpe̩ ledo ma; todu anyo̩ fʼaboke̩le̩ le̩ mu tabale. Tak onu kakiru, Me̩ jo̩ Je̩riko gbogbo tak ilagba-me̩ fu, taku me̩ dabi wʼunyi.

Oñ e̩gba kʼamo̩ma Amo̩n li ka kʼama mud e̩ne̩ ki aluru Defid, amo̩ma Amo̩n fʼone̩ kpe̩ fʼo̩gu che ñw abo Siria ku ma jo̩ Be̩t-reho̩b, kpai abo Siria ku ma jo̩ Zo̩ba, one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu ku ma le e̩re̩ ma che, kpai onu Maaka manyʼabo-wñ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, kpai aboke̩le̩ To̩b icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji.
Taku Defid gbʼo̩, oñ i fu Joab kpe̩, kpʼabogu-wñ ku ma chʼamagbiti chaka.
Tak amo̩ma Amo̩n dufu wa, oñ ma mʼabo ogu ko do jo̩ alaku ewo le̩; abo Siria e-Zoba kpai Rehob kpai aboke̩le̩ To̩b kpai Maaka jo̩ kpʼo̩la-ma oko o̩mo̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku Joab li ka kʼabo ogu do̩nyʼama o̩gba ñw ubi; i fʼone̩ chi kwef amo̩gagu o̩gagu abo Israe̩l chaka, oñ i ko ma do jo̩ ku ma ja kpai abo Siria:
tak i mʼamone̩ kibo̩ ko nyʼAbishai, o̩maye-wñ, o̩wo̩; kʼi ko ma do jo̩ ku ma ja kpai amo̩ma Amo̩n.
Oñ i kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩ abo Siria tʼe-mi le mak uwe̩ agbutu ñwu mi, i la che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n tʼe-we̩ le, mak u nawa gbutu ñw e̩.
Me̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, kʼa fʼo̩kone̩ che tod abo-wa eñini, kpai todu ewo ewo O̩jo̩-wa; Jihofa ki la che e̩wñ ki nyʼo̩ eju.
Abe̩le̩ Joab kpʼamone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ te̩wa ku ma ja kpai abo Siria; oñ abo Siria ra rʼo̩gba-wñ.
Tak e̩gba kʼamo̩ma Amo̩n li kʼabo Siria ara, ama le̩ ño̩ ra rʼo̩gba Abishai abe̩le̩ ge̩, oñ ma mugudu nyʼef ewo le̩. Taku Joab mudabi kwʼokʼogu amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩, oñ i lewa Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ e̩gba kʼabo Siria li kʼabo Israe̩l akpa ma, ma fʼo̩la-ma do̩ jeju.
Taku Hadareza fʼonuche̩ kpe̩, oñ i kʼabo Siria ku ma jʼudaba ohimini dufu wa; oñ ma lewa Helam, Shobak kʼi chʼonu ogu Hadareza tʼuma o̩gba.
Oñ ma mudu ka ñwu Defid, tak i fʼabo Israe̩l chaka do̩ jeju oñ i mu Jo̩rdan daba oñ i lewa Helam. Taku abo Siria kʼo̩la-ma do jo̩ ku ma ko bo̩ Defid, oñ ma ja kpʼowñ.

Abo Siria la ño̩ ra rʼo̩gba abo Israe̩l; oñ Defid fʼabo Siria ku ma jʼef o̩kʼogu ogume̩lu chi icham kpa, kpʼamananya icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji; i ño̩ fu Shobak kʼi chʼonu abogu-ma kpa, oñ i leku o̩mo̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼamonu ku ma chʼamadu Hadareza chaka li ka kʼabo Israe̩l akpa ma, ma fʼo̩o̩do̩-mu guche̩ ñw abo Israe̩l, ma kwore̩ ma. Abe̩le̩ abo Siria railo ete̩ko amo̩ma Amo̩n akwihi le̩.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ mudako, iko kʼamonu adufu nyʼoko ogu Defid fu Joab kpʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ manyʼabo Israe̩l chaka kpe̩ lo; oñ ma fʼamo̩ma Amo̩n kpo̩fo̩, ma ño̩ kpala nyu Raba. Defid muda dʼe̩re̩ ma ubi Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ i lewatʼolane̩ ku Defid kwane̩ kwʼoj ate̩-wñ oñ i tʼojokunyi onu ale. I dʼojokunyi o̩mo̩ oñ i li onobule̩ʼka kʼi dago agwo̩la; onobule̩ le̩ la che̩fe̩rʼeju tabale.
Taku Defid fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼatene inabali onobule̩ le̩. Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka kakini, I che Batsheba, o̩ma Eliam, kʼi chʼo̩ya Uraya, e̩ne̩ He̩t, le̩ de̩ n?
Taku Defid fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼamʼu du wa; oñ onobule̩ le̩ wʼejefu ugbo-wñ, tak i bʼo̩ dachi (todu i fʼo̩la-wñ gworinyo̩ bʼo̩la edaji-wñ te̩ e̩gbale̩ me̩). Tak i mudabi tʼunyi-wñ.
Onobule̩ le̩ la fʼefu nyo̩, oñ i fʼone̩ kpe̩ wa aka ñwu Defid kakini, Ochu alʼumi oji me̩.
Taku Defid fʼuche̩ kperu Joab, kakini, FʼUraya, e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩, kpe̩ wʼugbo mi. Taku Joab fʼUraya kpe̩ nyʼugbo Defid.
Oñ e̩gba kʼUraya lewʼugbo-wñ, Defid tene o̩lafia Joab, kpai o̩lafia amone̩, kpai inabali ogu.
Taku Defid ka ñw Uraya kakini, Gwo̩ru nyʼunyi-we̩, kʼe̩ rʼiñmi ta. Taku Uraya kwef unyi onu dufu, oñ ma nʼe̩wñ ojo onu tʼo̩ ubi.
Uraya muda lolu alugbana unyi onu amanyʼabuko̩lo̩ odu-wñ chaka; i la gwo̩ru nyʼunyi-wñ n.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma ka ñwu Defid kakini, Uraya gwo̩ru nyʼunyi-wñ n. Defid ka ñw Uraya kakini, I chʼule̩ e̩ kwo wa-i n? E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma gwo̩ru nyʼunyi-we̩ n?

Tak Uraya ka ñwu Defid kakini, Akpati O̩jo̩, kpʼabo Israe̩l, kpʼabo Juda jʼef ala ala le̩; odu-mi, Joab, kpʼabuko̩lo̩ odu-mi ru jo̩ egbili gbaa; tak omi anyʼunyi-mi aje̩ e̩wñ, añmo̩, kʼu ño̩ bʼo̩ya-mi dachi? Oji-we̩, alu kʼonugo-we̩ deju, nache e̩wñ le̩ n.
Taku Defid ka ñw Uraya kakini, gugu emi eñini ta, o̩na tak u naje̩ ñw e̩ lo. Abe̩le̩ Uraya gugu Je̩rusule̩m o̩jo̩ le̩, kpai o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ ge̩.
Tak e̩gba ku Defid fʼu do̩, i fʼe̩wñ je̩, i ño̩ ñmo̩ eju-wñ; tak i je̩ ñw o̩te̩ fʼu mu. Oñ e̩gba ane̩ i ledufu kʼi dachi oj ate̩-wñ manyʼabuko̩lo̩ odu-wñ, i muda gwo̩ru nyʼunyi-wñ n.
Oñ i lewatʼodudu-wñ, Defid la fʼo̩takada ko̩ru Joab, oñ i mʼu du kpuche̩ lʼo̩wo̩ Uraya.
I ko̩ nyʼef o̩takada le̩ kakini, DʼUraya-i dago o̩gba ogu ugbo kʼi kpuna tule, tak e̩ te̩ ubi bʼo̩ te̩, ku ma mʼu du kpa.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ku Joab do̩mo̩ adide ewo le̩, i mʼuña bu ñw Uraya ugbo kʼi ma kʼame̩nagbiti jo̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ ewo le̩ kwodufu wa ajogu kpai Joab; amone̩ iche̩ka ku ma chʼabuko̩lo̩ Defid la wane̩ o̩mo̩; Uraya e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩ ño̩ leku ge̩.
Taku Joab fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼaka ñwu Defid o̩la e̩wñ du ki che ugbo ogu le̩;
oñ i ñwa ñw onuche̩-wñ kakini, E̩gba kʼe̩ fʼo̩la e̩wñ ki che ugbo ogu-i ka ñw onu kpoji,
iche̩wñ kʼonu kʼe̩do̩fulu kʼi ka ñw e̩ kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ te̩ me̩ru ewo abe̩i taku me̩ jogu ta? Me̩ ma ka kʼama ajʼoj aku ato̩fa ñwu me̩ n?

E̩ne̩ gwʼAbime̩le̩k o̩ma Je̩rubeshe̩t, dajane̩ le̩? I chʼonobule̩ dago oj o̩do̩ dʼo̩mo̩bolo̩ ro̩ dʼo oji todu kʼi ku Tebe̩zi n? E̩wñ chi ku me̩ te̩ me̩rʼaku abe̩i? E̩gbale̩ e̩ ka kakini, Adu-we̩ Uraya e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩ ño̩ leku ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ onuche̩ le̩ le, oñ i mʼinabali e̩wñ du ku Joab kpʼo̩ uche̩ du ña Defid.
Onuche̩ le̩ la ka ñwu Defid kakini, Abo le̩ tʼuwa le, oñ ma dufu wʼugbo wa egbili, tak a la bʼuma ma gbogbo wʼalu aku.
Abo ku ma nʼo̩o̩do̩ la jʼoj o̩do̩ ato̩fa ñw amadu-we̩; amadu onu iche̩kibo̩ la leku, adu-we̩ Uraya e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩ ño̩ leku ge̩.

Taku Defid ka ñw onuche̩ le̩ kakini, Abu kʼuwe̩ aka ñwu Joab de̩ kakini, E̩wñ-i ki bie̩ne̩ eju-we̩ n, todu o̩kwo̩chageli agwʼe-tʼe-du da abe̩le̩; fʼogu-we̩ bʼefu ku me̩ ko bʼewo le̩ ku me̩ fʼu gulo̩. Uwe̩ ki dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw u abe̩le̩.
E̩gba kʼo̩ya Uraya le̩ gbo̩ ka kʼUraya o̩ko̩-wñ leku, i la deku o̩ko-wñ.
Tak e̩gba kʼi fʼeku da kpa, Defid fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ wa mʼowñ du wʼunyi-wñ, oñ i mud o̩ya-wñ, i la fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi ñw u. E̩wñ ku Defid che le̩ muda bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa.
Taku Jihofa fu Netan kpe̩ nyʼugbo Defid. Oñ i lewa ka ñw u kakini, One̩ meji jʼewoʼka; oka chʼanana, oka chʼe̩nukpa.
Anana le̩ chene̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpai amokuno̩ tabale;

e̩nukpa le̩ muda nʼe̩wñ du n, chai igbe̩le̩ ala re oka, e-kʼi la tak i ne̩ gba: i la dʼugbo-wñ anana waa manyʼamo̩ma-wñ; e̩wñ kʼowñ onugo bu tʼalu oñ i adu ñw u je̩, i añmʼomi ef ago-wñ, i la dachi agbe̩do̩-wñ, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ ñw u.

Tak abelo̩naʼka wʼugbo anana le̩. I la ko̩ edu kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpai amokuno̩ e-wñ kʼi dʼoka-wñ kpa tod abelo̩na kʼi wʼugbo-wñ le̩. I muda mʼo̩mala e-e̩nukpa le̩ du, oñ i mʼu du kpa ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi wʼugbo-wñ le̩.
Tak uwe̩do̩ Defid mutajo nʼe̩ne̩ le̩ oji tabale; oñ i ka ñwu Netan kakini, Oji Jihofa! E̩ne̩ kʼi fʼe̩wñ-i che chebʼuku jo.
E̩ne̩ le̩ la adʼo̩mala le̩ dabi wa ñw u onu me̩le̩ todabu kʼi fʼe̩wñ-i che, kʼi rna la liʼ ejumomi-wñ n.
Taku Ne̩tan ka ñwu Defid kakini, Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ le̩. Abu ku Jihofa, O̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l, ka de̩ kakini, Omi fʼekpo ba tʼuwe̩ oji kʼe̩ jʼonu Israe̩l, omi la gbʼe̩ kwef o̩wo̩ So̩l;
u la dʼunyi odu-we̩ ñw e̩, u la kʼamo̩ya odu-we̩ yamʼagbe̩-do̩-we̩, u laño̩ mʼunyi abo Israe̩l kpai abo Juda ko̩ ñw e̩ ge̩; e-le̩ ma nyarʼe̩, omi ma ño̩ kʼe̩wñ ojoji ojoji manyʼu ñw e̩ ta.

E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ che̩de̩te̩ o̩la Jihofa, kʼe̩ la che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju-wñ? Uwe̩ nʼo̩kwo̩chageli gwo Uraya e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩ da, e̩ la mʼo̩ya-wñ gba chʼo̩ya e-we̩, o̩kwo̩chageli amo̩ma Amo̩n oñ e̩ ne̩ kpa.
Todule̩ o̩kwo̩chageli ñʼakwo bʼunyi-we̩ te̩ ogbegbele̩ n, todabu kʼe̩ che̩de̩te̩ mi, kʼe̩ la mʼo̩ya Uraya e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩ du chʼo̩ya-we̩.
Abu ku Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Nakʼe̩bie̩ne̩ kwane̩ kwef unyi-we̩ onugo abʼuwe̩ ma; eju-we̩ meji nakʼamo̩ya-we̩ ñw ekeji-we̩, owñ la abʼamo̩ya-we̩ dachi eju olu ki kade-i.
Todu uwe̩ che maja maja; omi muda ache e̩wñ-i eju abo Israe̩l du, kpai eju olu ki kade-i ge̩.
Taku Defid ka ñwu Netan kakini, U fu Jihofa dure me̩! Taku Netan ka ñwu Defid kakini, Jihofa laño̩ mʼadure-we̩ du tinyo̩ me̩; uwe̩ aku n.
Ama todabu kʼuwe̩ bʼuña lile te̩ ñw ame̩nebi Jihofa ku ma chʼakpabie̩-wñ, o̩ma ku ma abi ñw e̩ le̩ aku chuu.
Taku Netan kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyi-wñ.
Todule̩ Defid chane̩ egbo̩ko̩bʼO̩jo̩ todu o̩ma le̩; oñ Defid fʼalu ji, i la nyʼejefu adachi ane̩pe̩te̩ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩.
Tak abogijo unyi-wñ kwane̩, oñ ma kpe̩nyʼu ku ma dʼu kwane̩ kwʼane̩pe̩te̩; i muda je̩ n, i la jʼuje̩wñ kpai ama n.

Oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ ekebie-wñ, o̩ma le̩ leku. Oñ abuko̩lo̩ Defid railo eka ñw u kʼo̩ma le̩ leku, todu ma kakini, Go, e̩gba kʼo̩ma le̩ deju, a ko̩la ñw u i la nyʼuwa eti n, ab a ale kʼa ka ñw u ka kʼo̩ma le̩ leku? I neke chʼo̩la-wñ e̩bie̩ne̩.
Defid la li abu kʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ jʼako̩la ye̩ye̩ nyʼomune̩ eti, oñ Defid ma ka kʼo̩ma le̩ leku; taku Defid ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, O̩ma le̩ leku? Oñ ma kakini, i leku.

Taku Defid kwane̩, i la fʼo̩la gwe̩, oñ i mʼekpo du kuru o̩la-wñ, i la mʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ gwo jʼane̩, i mʼomune̩ ko nyi; tak i lewʼef unyi Jihofa, oñ i dojikane̩; tak i lewʼunyi e-wñ; oñ e̩gba kʼi tene, ma dʼuje̩wñ gugu o̩gba-wñ, oñ i mʼu du je̩.
Tak abuko̩lo̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, E-kʼuwe̩ che-i chʼe̩wñ ta? Uwe̩ fʼalu ji, e̩ ño̩ raku o̩ma le̩ e̩gba kʼi deju; e̩gba kʼo̩ma le̩ muda leku, e̩ kwane̩ aje̩ e̩wñ.
Tak i kakini, Abukʼo̩ma le̩ deju, omi jialu, u ño̩ raku; todu u kakini, E̩ne̩ ma, abe̩ku Jihofa ali mi eju, todu kʼo̩ma le̩ kʼi deju?
Fai i la leku, tod e̩wñ najialu? U neke dʼu dabi wa ge̩? Omi anyʼugbo owñ, i muda adabi wʼugbo e-mi ge̩ n.
Taku Defid nyi Batsheba, o̩ya-wñ e̩do̩, oñ i nyʼejefu ugbo-wñ abʼo̩ dachi. I la fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi, oñ Defid dʼodu-wñ ko̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n.
Jihofa la lʼedo owñ; oñ i fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼu lʼo̩wo̩ Netan akache̩ le̩; abe̩le̩ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jedidia todu Jihofa.
Oñ Joab kʼogu bo̩ Raba e-amo̩ma Amo̩n, i la fʼewo onu-ma du.
Taku Joab fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ru Defid, oñ i kakini, Omi mʼogu kobo̩ Raba; i-i, omi fʼewo omiofo le̩ du me̩.
Todule̩ e̩ mʼamone̩ kibo̩ ko wa jo̩, kʼe̩ ko ma ruru nyu ewo-i kʼe̩ la fʼu du; tode̩gba kʼomi amʼewo-i gba, ku ma dʼodu e-mi mʼo̩.
Taku Defid mʼamone̩ chaka ko wa jo̩, i la nyi Raba, oñ i kogu bʼo, i la mʼu gba.
Tak i mʼike̩be̩ onu abʼewo le̩ chi bʼo̩ oji te̩; uwoji-wñ la chʼo̩jamalia tale̩nt oka, okuta akoko jʼo̩la-wñ; oñ ma mʼu du do Defid oji. Tak i mʼane̩ kʼogu je̩ ko kwef ewo dufu, i nana tabale.

Tak i mʼamone̩ ku ma jʼewo le̩ ko dufu wa, oñ i ko ma jo̩ ñw iso̩ kpai ebije ki ale̩, kpai e̩do̩, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma lale gu ef unyi ugbo ku ma ro̩ otubeli du. Abe̩le̩ i che abʼewo ewo amo̩ma Amo̩n chaka. Taku Defid kpai amone̩-wñ chaka mudabi wa Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ i lewatu ubi le̩, Absalom, o̩ma Defid nʼo̩maye onobule̩ ki chʼali-fia, e-kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Temar: onobule̩ le̩ la mu Amno̩n, o̩ma Defid, e̩do̩.
E̩do̩ñwañwala kʼAmno̩n che tod o̩maye-wñ, Temar, je̩ ñw o̩ga fʼu mu; todu i ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mama ta n; i la firʼAmno̩n alu kʼi ale kʼi ado̩wo̩kadʼo.
Amno̩n muda nʼonukuʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jo̩nadab, o̩ma Shimea o̩maye Defid, i che; Jo̩nadab le̩ la chʼe̩ne̩ ugbeju tabale.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩, o̩ma onu, o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa e̩ gbo̩gbe̩ alo? Uwe̩ aka ñwu mi e̩wñ kʼi chi n? Tak Amno̩n ka ñw u kakini, Temar, o̩maye o̩maye-mi Absalom, chemʼumi e̩do̩.

Taku Jo̩nadab ka ñw u kakini, E̩ kwodachi oj ate̩-we̩, kʼe̩ chʼakpaine̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ cho̩ga; tak e̩gba kʼata-we̩ lewa, go, e̩ ka ñw u kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw o̩maye-mi Temar lewa kʼi dʼuje̩wñ ñwu mi je̩, kʼi fʼuje̩wñ le̩ ñwo̩che eju-mi, kʼu fʼu li, kʼu ño̩ je̩ kwef o̩wo̩-wñ.

Abe̩le̩ Amno̩n kwodachi, oñ i chʼakpaine̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼi acho̩ga. Tak e̩gba kʼonu lewa go, Amno̩n ka ñw onu kakini, Agba, e̩ je̩ ñw o̩maye-mi Temar lewa, ki fʼakala meji che eju-mi, kʼu je̩ kwef o̩wo̩-wñ.
Taku Defid fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼunyi ugbo Temar, i kakini, Lo tʼunyi o̩maye-we̩ Amno̩n abajo̩-i kʼe̩ fʼuje̩wñ ñwo̩che ñw u.
Abe̩le̩ Temar le tʼunyi o̩maye-wñ Amno̩n ugbo kʼi dachi o̩mo̩. Tak i mʼomu e̩fo̩ du, oñ i fʼu kpo, tak i mʼu du bo̩ akala eju-wñ, oñ i fʼakala le̩ de̩.
Tak i mʼanade-wñ du, oñ i mʼu ko dajo̩ o̩gba-wñ; i la ko̩ eje̩. Tak Amno̩n kakini, Je̩ ñw abo-i chaka ki kwodufu bʼumi te̩. Abe̩le̩ o̩chaka amone̩ le̩ kwʼugbo-wñ dufu.
Tak Amno̩n ka ñwu Temar kakini, Mʼuje̩wñ le̩ du wʼef unyi emi kʼu naje̩ o̩wo̩-we̩. Taku Temar mʼakala kʼi che le̩ ko wʼef unyi ugbo Amno̩n, o̩maye-wñ.
Tak e̩gba kʼi mʼu ko wʼugbo-wñ kʼi je̩, Amno̩n gwo̩nyʼu, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Lewa bʼumi dachi, o̩maye-mi.
Tak i dohi ñw u kakini, O̩da, o̩maye-mi; e̩ ki chi mi ukata abe̩le̩ n; todu i dukpe̩ ku ma che e̩wñ abe̩i ojane̩ Israe̩l kilikili n: uwe̩ ki che e̩wñ-tuñ-i n.
Mak omi, ugbo nadʼanyo̩-mi le? I la chʼe-we̩, uwe̩ adab e̩no̩waiʼka ef abo Israe̩l. Fai, agba, e̩ ka ñw onu; todu i ako̩ edʼumi ñw e̩ n.
I muda ko̩ egbʼomu-wñ gbo̩; oñ abu kʼi gbiti tʼowñ le, i fʼu kamane̩, tak i bʼo̩ dachi.
Tak Amno̩n chane̩ echulaka-wñ nana tabale; todu ulaka-wñ kʼi ache tʼefe̩do̩ kʼi fe̩do̩-wñ ejodudu le. Tak Amno̩n ka ñw u kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ lo we̩!
Tak onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, O̩da n, todu ene mi dufu-i bie̩ne̩ nana tʼe-kʼe̩ che mi le̩ le. I la ko̩ enetirʼu.
Tak i fʼokolobia kʼi ache e̩wñ ñw u do̩ wa, oñ i kakini, Mʼonobule̩-i du dufu bʼumi eju te̩ ke, kʼe̩ fʼoli tʼo̩na ubi-wñ.
Onobule̩ le̩ la nyʼafe̩ kʼina-wñ chʼojoji ojoji; todu amo̩ma onu ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n anyʼafe̩ abe̩le̩. Tak adu-wñ mʼowñ du dufu, oñ i fʼoli tʼo̩na ubi-wñ.
Taku Temar mʼelulu ko nyʼo̩la-wñ oji, oñ i fʼafe̩ e̩kina kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ le̩ fana; i la mʼo̩wo̩-wñ ko gbʼoji, tak i le owñ, oñ i nʼaku aro̩ taa ab i alo.
Tak Absalom o̩maye-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Amno̩n o̩maye-we̩ wʼugbo we̩ le̩? E̩ muda chechi ta, o̩maye-mi, todu kʼo̩maye-we̩ de̩, e̩wñ-i ki wʼe̩ n. Abe̩le̩ Temar kate gugu ef unyi Absalom o̩maye-wñ.
Ama e̩gba kʼonu Defid gbo̩ e̩wñ-i chaka, i wʼo̩ nana.
Absalom la ko̩la e̩nyo̩ abe̩k e̩bie̩ne̩ ñw Amno̩n in; todu Absalom nʼulaka Amno̩n ache, todabu kʼi fʼo̩maye-wñ Temar demane̩.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼo̩do̩ odukulu meji muda, kʼAbsalom nʼabo ku ma ja edudu amala-wñ Beal-hazo̩r, e-kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ʼka Ifraim. Absalom fʼamo̩ma onu chaka do̩ wa.
Tak Absalom lewa ugbo onu, oñ i kakini, Go ta, adu-we̩-i chenʼabo ku ma ja edudu amala-wñ; nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼonu kpai abo-wñ ki lebʼadu-we̩-i.
Tak onu ka ñw Absalom kakini, I ki dʼabe̩le̩ n, o̩ma-mi, o̩chaka wa ki le n, tode̩gba kʼaduwa anʼe̩ oji. I muda kutʼo̩: i la je̩ le n, i muda kadua ñw u.
Tak Absalom kakini, E̩ ma le n, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw o̩maye-mi Amno̩n kʼi lebʼuwa. Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼi ale bʼe̩?
Absalom muda kutʼo̩, tak i je̩ ñw Amno̩n kpai amo̩ma onu chaka ku ma lebʼo̩.

Tak Absalom ñwa ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ feju bʼo̩ le ta, e̩gba kʼe̩do̩ Amno̩n bo̩ ñw o̩te̩; tak e̩gba kʼu naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Me̩ du e̩wñ nu Amno̩n, e̩gbale̩ me̩ mʼu du kpa; me̩ ki railo n; i chʼomi ñwa ñwu me̩ n? Me̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, fejugbiti.
Oñ abuko̩lo̩ Absalom che Amno̩n alu ku Absalom ñwa ñwu ma. Tak amo̩ma onu chaka kwane̩, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ tano imiulu-wñ oñ ma ra le.
Oñ i lewatu, abu ku ma jʼej o̩na alo, inabali-wñ lewa ugbo Defid kakini, Absalom fʼamo̩ma onu kpa chaka, e̩ne̩ kate bo̩ n.
Tak onu kwane̩, oñ i fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, i la kwodachi ane̩pe̩te̩; oñ abuko̩lo̩-wñ chaka dago kpenyʼu, ukpo-ma la chʼe̩fana.

Tak Jo̩nadab, o̩ma Shimea, o̩maye Defid, dohi, oñ i kakini, Odu-mi kʼi do̩ ka ku ma fʼabokolobia ku ma chʼamo̩ma onu chaka kpa n; todu Amno̩n kate ku; todu alu kʼAbsalom fʼe-le̩ ka te̩ akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼi fu Temar o̩maye-wñ de-mane̩ le̩ de̩.
Todule̩ fai, odu-mi onu ki mʼo̩la-i du tʼe̩do̩, kʼi do̩ ka kʼamo̩ma onu chaka ku n; chai Amno̩n kate ku.
Absalom muda ra. Oñ okolobia kʼi adide o̩mo̩ mʼeju-wñ chi go ej o̩na, me̩ la go, amone̩ wewe darʼo̩ ubi le o̩na ibe̩ uwo.
Taku Jonadab ka ñw onu kakini, Go, amo̩ma onu lewa me̩; alu kʼadu-we̩ ka le̩, abe̩le̩ i de̩.
Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼi fʼo̩la le̩ ka kpoji ababa, go, amo̩ma onu lewa, ma la chi omu-ma nyate̩ araku. Tak onu kpai abuko̩lo̩-wñ chaka ño̩ nʼaku aro̩ nana.
Absalom muda ra, oñ i nyʼugbo Talmai, o̩ma Amihud, kʼi chʼonu Ge̩shur.
Defid la deku o̩ma-wñ o̩jo̩ du. Abe̩le̩ Absalom ra, oñ i le tu Ge̩shur, i la dʼo̩do̩ me̩ta o̩mo̩.
E̩do̩ Defid onu la akʼo̩ e̩che̩ kʼi dufu nyʼugbo Absalom; todu e̩do̩-wñ nyi ugbo Amno̩n me̩, abu kʼi leku.
Oñ Joab, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, ma ka kʼe̩do̩ onu bo̩rʼAbsalom.

Taku Joab fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyi Tekoa, oñ i du onobule̩ kʼi chʼanibeʼka wa, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Agba, e̩ fʼakpaine̩ che dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ deku, e̩ la mʼe̩wñ eku ko nyʼo̩la, o̩ko̩ nagbabʼe̩-i, e̩ ki la dʼekpo kulu o̩la-we̩ n, e̩ ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼonobule̩ kʼi adeku e̩ne̩-wñ ki ku kpo̩kpe̩;
tak e̩ nyʼugbo onu, kʼe̩ kʼabe̩le̩ ñw u. Abe̩le̩ Joab mʼo̩la le̩ du tʼowñ alu.
Oñ e̩gba kʼonobule̩ Tekoa le̩ ko̩la ñw onu, i lewa fʼeju-wñ bʼane̩ ma, oñ i dojikane̩, i kakini, O onu, te̩ko mi.
Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ ehʼuwe̩? Oñ i dohi kakini, O̩ya ukuo̩ko̩ omi che ochochi, o̩ko̩-mi la leku me̩.
Oñ adu-we̩-i nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ meji, tak ama meji fʼuja ja oko, e̩ne̩ du la do̩mo̩ kʼi aba ma n, ama oka fʼe̩wñ nu ekeji, oñ i mʼu du kpa.

E̩ la go, abo-wñ chaka kwane̩ tʼadu-we̩-i o̩la, oñ ma kakini, E̩ dʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼo̩maye-wñ kpa le̩ wa, kʼa dʼu kpa koji o̩maye-wñ ki kpa, abe̩le̩ i dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma ño̩ fʼe̩ne̩ ki aje̩ ogu-wñ kpabie̩ ge̩. Abe̩le̩ ma akpa e̩ge̩ una-mi ki bo̩ lu, todu ku ma we etʼe̩bo̩bo̩ one̩ no̩ tane̩ ñw o̩ko̩-mi eju ile̩-i.
Tak onu ka ñw onobule̩ kakini, Lo tʼunyi-we̩ kʼu nañwa ñwu ma e̩wñ ku ma ache ugbo-we̩.
Tak onobule̩ Tekoa le̩ ka ñw onu kakini, Odu-mi O onu udu le̩ ki bʼomi kpai abo unyi ata-mi ma; onu kpai ede-wñki fʼudu n.
Tak onu kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi che kʼi kʼo̩laʼka ñw e̩, e̩ mʼu du wʼugbo mi, i ñʼado̩wo̩kadʼuwe̩ ge̩ n.
Tak i kakini, Agba, Onu ki narewa Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, todu kʼakpo̩chi kʼi ño̩ kpa e̩wñ du bie̩ ge̩ n, tode̩gba ku ma kpa o̩ma-mi bie̩. Oñ i kakini, Oji Jihofa! Iloji o̩ma-we̩ okate awʼane̩pe̩te̩ n.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ kakini, Agba, o̩ko̩ nagbabʼe̩, e̩ je̩ ñw adu-we̩-i kʼi fʼo̩laʼka ka ñw odu-mi onu-i. Oñ i kakini, Ka waa.

Tak onobule̩ le̩! kakini, I dʼabe̩le̩, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ abe̩i ñwa nyʼamone̩ O̩jo̩ ta? Todu oji o̩la kʼonu kpa-i dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ i kpa abi, abu kʼonu ma dʼe̩ne̩-wñ kʼi ne tinyo̩ le̩ dabi wʼunyi n.
Todu eku a aku tila, a dab omiofo ki dajʼane̩pe̩te̩, e-ku ma ma neke ño̩ gba ge̩ n; O̩jo̩ la gbʼone̩ iñmi ofofo n, i muda añwa o̩na te̩ kʼe̩ne̩-wñ ku ma fu ne tinyo̩, kʼi we elenyo̩ bʼo̩ te̩ pioo.
Oñ o̩la kʼu lewa aka ñw odu-mi onu-i, chʼutodabu kʼamone̩ nyʼumi okpo: tak adu-we̩-i kakini, Nako̩la ñw onu ta; ikani onu afʼebi kʼadu-wñ bi che.
Todu onu agbo̩, kʼi gba adu-wñ kwef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi neku ekpa omi kpai o̩ma-mi bie̩ bʼef e̩wñ ogu O̩jo̩ te̩.

Tak adu-we̩-i kpibe kakini, Agba, o̩la onu-i ki mud e-ki aje̩ ñw o̩la le̩ mu da; todu alu kʼonuche̩ O̩jo̩ de̩, abe̩le̩ odu-mi onu de̩ ugbo e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ kpai e̩bie̩ne̩ ema: Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ki la dʼugbo-we̩!
Tak onu dohi oñ i ka ñw onobule̩ le̩ kakini, Agba, e̩ ki dʼe̩wñ du kʼu natʼuwe̩ ene maja ñwu mi n. Tak onobule̩ le̩ kakini, Odumi onu kʼi ka ta.

Tak onu kakini, O̩wo̩ Joab dʼef e̩wñ-i chaka kpai uwe̩? Tak onobule̩ dohi, oñ i kakini, Alu kʼonugo-we̩ deju, O odu-mi onu, e̩ne̩ du neke rida tʼawo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi bʼe̩wñ kʼodu-mi onu ka-i te̩ n; todu adu-we̩ Joab ñwa ñwu mi, owñ la kʼo̩la-i chaka nyʼadu-we̩ alu.
Todu adu-we̩ Joab la fʼe̩wñ-i che kʼo̩la le̩ ki rida. Odu-mi la chenʼibe alu kʼonuche̩ O̩jo̩ nʼibe, kʼi ma e̩wñ du ki dʼile̩.
Tak onu ka ñwu Joab kakini, Go ta, u fʼe̩wñ-i che me̩; todule̩ e̩ nalo, kʼe̩ dʼAbsalom okolobia le̩ wa.
Taku Joab lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ i dojikane̩, i la kadua ñw onu; taku Joab kakini, Eñini-i oñ adu-we̩-i ma ka kʼuwe̩ ali mi eju, odu-mi O onu, owñ chʼabu kʼonu fʼebi kʼadu-wñ bi che.
Taku Joab kwane̩ letu Ge̩shur, oñ i dʼAbsalom wa Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak onu kakini, Je̩ ñw u na tʼunyi e-wñ, kʼi li eju-mi n. Abe̩le̩ Absalom muna tʼunyi e-wñ, i la li eju onu n.
I la nʼe̩ne̩ du oj ane̩ Israe̩l chaka ku ma je̩nyu alifia-wñ dab Absalom n, akwʼadaba e̩re̩-wñ gbogbo wʼakpe̩te̩ oji-wñ i nʼuchalu n.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi fʼiloji-wñ ja, i mʼiloji-wñ du nʼe̩bo̩, e̩ñwa-wñ chʼalu she̩ke̩l o̩gwo̩ko̩, alu kʼonu añwa e̩wñ, o̩do̩ da o̩do̩ da i aja; todu iloji-wñ gbe̩ gbe̩, todule̩ i fʼu ja.
Ma la fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ me̩ta kpai onobule̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Temar bi ñw Absalom: owñ chʼonobule̩ kʼi chʼuto̩ eju.
Oñ Absalom gugu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ meji odukulu; i la li eju onu n.
Tak Absalom fuche̩ kpe̩ ado̩ Joab wa kʼi kpe̩rʼonu; i la ko̩ ewʼugbo-wñ. Tak i ño̩ kpe̩ onu keji ge̩; i la je̩ wa n.
Tak i ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ go, oko Joab me̩rʼe-mi, i la chenʼo̩ka barli o̩mo̩; me̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ afʼuna tʼo̩. Abe̩le̩ abuko̩lo̩ Absalom fʼuna tʼoko o̩mo̩.
Taku Joab kwane̩, oñ i lewʼugbo Absalom unyi-wñ, i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼabuko̩lo̩-we̩ dʼuna tʼoko-mi?

Oñ Absalom dohi ñwu Joab kakini, Go, omi fʼone̩ kpe̩rʼuwe̩ kakini, Lewa emi kʼu nakpʼe̩ uche̩ nyʼugbo onu, kʼe̩ kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼu kwo Ge̩shur wa? i ma me̩ ñwu mi kʼu gugu o̩mo̩ ta. Todule̩ fai e̩ je̩ ñwu mi li eju onu; i la che̩wñ kʼi nʼudu kʼu fe̩, i ki mʼumi du kpa ke.
Abe̩le̩ Joab lewʼugbo onu oñ i ka ñw u; tak i fʼAbsalom do̩, oñ i wʼugbo onu, i la fʼeju-wñ bʼane̩ ma adojikane̩ o̩gba onu; tak onu dʼalu ko̩ Absalom alu.
Oñ i lewatu ubi le̩ ge̩, kʼAbsalom fʼo̩kogu kpai amanya ñwo̩che jo̩ ñw o̩la-wñ, kpai aboke̩le̩ ooje ku ma fule rʼo̩gba-wñ.

Tak Absalom takpa kwane̩ odudu, oñ i lewa dago ej o̩na alaku. Abe̩le̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du nʼo̩la ki dukpe̩ kʼi du wʼugbo onu kʼi ka, tak Absalom nado̩ e̩ne̩ le̩, i aka ñw u kakini, Ewo ugbo e̩ de̩? Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ kakini, Adu-we̩ chʼabo olopu Israe̩l oka.
Tak Absalom naka ñw u kakini, Go, o̩la-we̩ chenyo̩, i la chʼochochi; i muda nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼonu du gugu kʼi gbʼo̩la-we̩ n.
Absalom ño̩ ka kakini, O ma ma du mi chʼakajo̩ ane̩-i, kʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi nʼo̩la abe̩k ajo̩ kʼi nawʼugbo-mi, tak omi ma dale o̩kpakpa!
Abe̩le̩, e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du te me̩rʼu kʼi dojikane̩ ñw u, i fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala gwo̩nyʼe̩ne̩ le̩, tak i adʼalu-wñ kʼo̩ alu.
Alu le̩ oñ Absalom che kpʼabo Israe̩l du ku ma wʼugbo onu ku ma kajo̩; abe̩le̩ Absalom moji e̩do̩ abo Israe̩l ji.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼo̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji muda, Absalom ka ñw onu kakini, Narodubʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi lo tu He̩bro̩n kʼu fʼo̩me̩ oji kʼu da ra ñwu Jihofa.
Todu adu-we̩-i fʼoji da abu kʼu gugu Ge̩shur ojane̩ Siria le̩, kakini, Iche̩wñ ku Jihofa adʼumi dabi wa Je̩rusale̩m ochochi, e̩gbale̩ nare̩ Jihofa.
Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, Lo ke, i ra we̩ kpo̩o̩. Abe̩le̩ i kwane̩, oñ i le tu He̩bro̩n.
Absalom muda fʼabo ku ma tu ane̩ kpe̩rʼamo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ gbʼuko̩la o̩kakachi, ame̩ ki kakini, Absalom fʼonu je̩ He̩bro̩n.
Oñ aboke̩le̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ ku ma do̩ ma kwo Je̩rusale̩m lebʼAbsalom, ma la le kpai e̩do̩ foo-ma; ma ma e̩wñ du n.

Tak Absalom do̩mo̩ achʼiche̩bo̩ oñ i fʼone̩ kpe̩ ado̩ Ahitofe̩l e̩ne̩ Gilo, kʼi chʼe̩no̩hiala Defid, kwʼewo-wñ, owñ che Gilo. Alu ku ma da nyu Defid le̩ la alonyane̩ me̩; todu amone̩ anana ugbo Absalom alo waa.
Tak onuche̩ʼka lewʼugbo Defid, i kakini, E̩do̩ aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka kwomanyʼAbsalom.

Taku Defid ka ñw abo-wñ chaka ku ma jʼugbo-wñ Je̩rusale̩m kakini. Me̩ kwane̩, kʼa ra; todu i ma dʼabe̩le̩ n e̩ne̩ du ef uwa afʼAbsalom o̩wo̩ n. Me̩ hio̩wane̩ kʼa lo, tode̩gba kʼi arano wa amu wa pio pio, kʼi la kʼe̩bie̩ne̩ bʼuwa ma, kʼi nʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli gwʼewo-i da.
Tak abuko̩lo̩ onu ka ñw onu kakini, Go, o̩la amadu-we̩-i che̩mu ku ma che e̩wñ du kʼodu-mi onu du.
Tak onu ledufu, oñ abunyi-wñ chaka tʼo̩ ubi. Onu la tʼabobule̩ me̩gwa no̩ jʼubi ku ma dejutʼunyi-wñ, amabadu-wñ ma che.
Abe̩le onu ledufu, oñ amone̩ le̩ chaka tʼo̩ ubi; ma la kwodago unyi otitala ewo le̩.
Abuko̩lo̩-wñ chaka le akolo-wñ; abo Ke̩re̩t chaka kpʼabo Pe̩le̩f chaka kpʼabo Gat chaka, owñ chʼone̩ ulo̩gwa ku ma tʼo̩ ubi kwo Gat wa le̩ lale rʼo̩gba onu.
Tak onu ka ñw Itai e̩ne̩ Gat le̩ kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ alebʼuwa? Mudabi, kʼe̩ bʼonu gugu; todu ononojo e̩ che, kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi ño̩ kwʼane̩ omune̩ wa; mudabi tʼe̩gu-we̩.

Abu ki chʼo̩nale̩ anane̩ kʼe̩ wa de̩, omi aje̩ ñw e̩ le tʼemi, tʼemi kpʼawa? abu ki chʼugbo tʼugbo ki tʼumi o̩wo̩ oñ nale-i? Uwe̩ ki mudabi, kʼe̩ la mʼamo̩maye-we̩ ko dabi kpai uwe̩; ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ochochi ki dʼugbo we̩.
Tak Itai dohi ñw onu kakini. Oji Jihofa! kpʼoji onu ge̩! Ugbo du kʼodu-mi onu de̩, dagba i chʼuku, dagba i chʼiñmi, o̩mo̩ oñ adu-we̩-i año̩ de̩ chuu.
Taku Defid ka ñw Itai kakini, Lale ke. Oñ Itai e̩ne̩ Gat le̩ kpʼabo-wñ chaka kpai abimo̩to̩ egini ku ma jʼugbo-wñ chaka mudaba.
Tak abʼane̩ o̩mo̩ chaka nʼomu lile araku, amone̩ le̩ chaka la daba. Onu onugo ño̩ mudaba aji Kidro̩n, tak amone̩ le̩ chaka mudaba ale rʼo̩wo̩ o̩na aje̩tachi.
Me̩ la go, Zedo̩k ño̩ lewa, oñ abo Lifai chaka jʼugbo-wñ, ma la nʼakpati alo O̩jo̩, oñ ma mʼakpati O̩jo̩ du gugu ane̩. Tak Abayata mute̩gu wʼo̩mo̩ gbogbo tak amone̩ lale kwef ewo le̩ chaka.
Tak onu ka ñwu Zedo̩k kakini, Mʼakpati O̩jo̩ du dabi tefewo-i; iche̩wñ ki Jihofa li mi eju, i adʼumi dabi wa ge̩, i año̩ dʼe-le̩ kpʼuña ugugu-wñ ña mi ge̩;
i muda che̩wñ kʼi ka ñwu mi abe̩i kakini, U nʼuyo̩ efu we̩ n; go, omi de̩, i ki che mi alu du ki nyʼo̩ eju.
Onu ño̩ ka ñwu Zedo̩k atama le̩ kakini, I chʼagane̩ uwe̩ che n? Mudabi tef ewo kpai ure̩do̩, kpʼamo̩ma-we̩ meji manyʼuwe̩, Ahimaaz o̩ma-we, kpai Jonatan o̩ma Abayata.
Go, nakpo̩kpe̩ ugbo ku ma daba omi o̩na aje̩tachi, gbogbo tak u ma alu kʼo̩la ki kwʼugbo we̩ wa de̩.
Taku Zedok kpai Abayata ño̩ mʼakpati O̩jo̩ du dabi wa Je̩rusale̩m. Oñ ma kwogugu o̩mo̩.

Taku Defid te̩gu lʼo̩na ate̩gu uwo O̩lif alo̩, i naraku abu kʼi alo; e̩wñ la bʼo̩ oji ma, i tʼe̩re̩ ofo: oñ amone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma dʼe̩wñ bʼoji-wñ ma, ma la nʼaku aro̩ ate̩gu alo.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka ka ñwu Defid kakini, Ahitofe̩l dʼef abo ku ma dʼalu nyʼe̩ manyʼAbsalom. Taku Defid kakini, O Jihofa, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, mʼohi ku Ahitofe̩l ate̩ rida ibe̩te̩.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ku Defid mute̩gu tʼoji-wñ kpa ugbo ki dojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩, go Hushai, e̩ne̩ Arki, ledʼowñ awa, afe̩-wñ chʼe̩fana, ikete̩ la dʼoji-wñ.
Taku Defid ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ le bʼomi, uwe̩ amud adu nʼumi oji.

I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ mudabi tef ewo, kʼe̩ la ka ñw Absalom kakini, O onu, nachʼadu-we̩; alu kʼu chʼadu ata-we̩ akwoubi, abe̩le̩ nache adu-we̩ fai; tak uwe̩ anʼohi e-we̩ fʼohi kʼAhitofe̩l ate̩ du ñwu mi.
Uwe̩ laño̩ ne̩ Zedo̩k kpai Abayata, amatama le̩, manyʼuwe̩ o̩mo̩ n? Todule̩ i ade̩ kʼe̩wñ du kʼe̩ gbo̩ ef unyi onu, uwe̩ adʼu ka ñwu Zedo̩k kpai Abayata, amatama le̩.
Go, ama nʼamo̩ma-ma mejeji jʼo̩mo̩, owñ chʼAhimaaz o̩ma Zedo̩k kpai Jonatan o̩ma Abayata; e̩wñ du kʼe̩ gbo̩ e̩ fʼuma kpe̩ wʼugbo mi.
Abe̩le̩ Hushai onuku Defid lewʼef ewo; Absalom laño̩ lewa Je̩rusale̩m.

Oñ e̩gba ku Defid kpare uwo le̩ pe̩, go Ziba, adu Me̩fibo̩she̩t de kpai owñ, i nʼamo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ meji kʼofidi dʼubi-ma, akala o̩gwo̩ko la jʼoji-ma, kpʼo̩wo̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩gbe̩ ogume̩lu, kpʼe̩ro oli ki de̩ e̩gba o̩lo̩ji ogume̩lu, kpʼaiko omi achiwebe̩te̩ma.

Tak onu ka ñwu Ziba kakini, E̩wñ chʼoji e̩wñ-i? Oñ Ziba kakini, Amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ chʼutodu kʼabo unyi onu ki tanʼo; akala kpʼe̩roli o̩lo̩ji le̩ la chʼutodu kʼabokolobia ki je̩; oñ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma chʼutodu kʼabo ki fʼuma hia ef aje̩tachi-i añmo̩.
Tak onu kakini, Oñ ugbo o̩ma odu-we̩ de̩? Taku Ziba ka ñw onu kakini, Go, i kwogugu Je̩rusale̩m; todu i kakini, Eñini tak abo unyi Israe̩l adʼo̩fe̩ ata-mi dabiwa ñwu mi.
Tak onu ka ñwu Ziba kakini, Go, e̩wñ du ki chʼe-Me̩fibo̩she̩t le̩ mak uwe̩ ne̩. Taku Ziba kakini, Oji-mi nadu kʼane̩-i; uwe̩ ki li mi eju dee, odu-mi, O onu.
Tak e̩gba kʼonu Defid lewa Bahurim, go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka kʼi dʼef o̩lo̩pu unyi So̩l dufu wa, odu-wñ ko̩ Shimeai, o̩ma Ge̩ra; i kwodufu wa, i la nʼina abʼu abu kʼi awa.
Oñ i ne̩ ikpolo okuta aro̩ ñwu Defid, kpʼabuko̩lo̩ onu Defid chaka. Oñ amone̩ le̩ chaka, kpʼamagbiti le̩ chaka, jʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ kpai o̩wo̩ awohi-wñ.
Oñ abu ku Shimeai ka e̩gba kʼi bina le̩ de̩ kakini, Kwemi alo, kwemi alo ke, uwe̩ e̩ne̩ e̩bie̩, uwe̩ e̩nebili!

Jihofa mʼe̩bie̩ abo unyi So̩l rida dabi wa bʼuwe̩ oji ma me̩, owñ kʼuwe̩ jʼonu koji-wñ le̩; Jihofa la mʼojane̩ le̩ du tef o̩wo̩ Absalom o̩ma-we̩ me̩; e̩ la go, e̩bie̩ne̩-we̩ muda bʼuwe̩ ma me̩, todu kʼuwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ e̩bie̩.
Tak Abishai o̩ma Ze̩ruaya ka ñw onu kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼoku abia-i abʼodu-mi onu ina? Agba, e̩ je̩ ñwu mi mudaba nyʼo̩mo̩, kʼu mʼu oji bu!
Tak onu kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-mi kpai ame̩, amo̩ma Ze̩ruaya? Iche̩wñ kʼi abina, ki la chʼabu ku Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Fi Defid bina; mak e̩ne̩ atene kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ che abe̩i?

Taku Defid ka ñwu Abishai kpʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ chaka kakini, Me̩ go ta, o̩ma-mi kʼi kwef ifu-mi, owñ le̩ atene oji-mi; i chʼukpe̩ kʼe̩ne̩ Be̩njamin-i ache tʼe-le̩ le n? Tʼowñ no̩, kʼi nabina waa; todu Jihofa ka ñw u.
Ikani Jihofa afejuwo̩ o̩bata ku ma che mi, ku Jihofa adʼe̩nyo̩ rʼo̩me̩ ñwu mi todu ina kʼi bu eñini.
Abe̩le̩ Defid kpʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ tʼej o̩na alo; oñ Shimeai la le akolo uwo o̩wo̩ʼka-wñ o̩mo̩, oñ i nʼina abʼu alo, i la nʼokuta aro̩ ñw u, i ño̩ nʼebutu akwu.
Tak uhia fʼonu kpai amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ chaka hia oñ ma lewa ugbo ku ma adaba le̩; oñ o̩la-ma ruko o̩me̩.
Oñ Absalom kpʼamone̩ chaka, owñ chʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l, lewa Je̩rusale̩m. Ahitofe̩l la dʼugbo-wñ.
Oñ e̩gba ku Hushai, e̩ne̩ Arki, onuku Defid le̩ lewa ugbo Absalom, Hushai ka ñw Absalom kakini, Oji Onu ki gbo kala kala, oji Onu ki gbo kala kala.
Tak Absalom ka ñw Hushai kakini, E̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ che kpʼonuku-we̩ de̩-i? E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma lebʼonuku-we̩ n?
Tak Hushai ka ñw Absalom kakini, O̩da; chai e̩ne̩ ku Jihofa kpai amone̩-i kpai aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka du, e-e̩ne̩ le̩ omi che, oñ ugbo e̩ne̩ le̩ omi la agugu.
Anubile̩ ge̩, e̩ne̩ oñ i dukpe̩ kʼu narʼo̩? I dukpe̩ kʼu nache eju o̩ma-wñ n? Alu kʼu che e̩wñ eju ata-we̩, alu le̩ nache eju-we̩.
Tak Absalom ka ñw Ahitofel kakini, Ka alu kʼe̩ li kʼa che̩.

Tak Ahitofe̩l ka ñw Absalom kakini, E̩ nyʼejefu ugbo amabadu ata-we̩, owñ chʼabo kʼi to̩no̩ jʼubi ku ma dejutʼunyi-wñ; tak abo Israe̩l chaka agbo̩ kʼata-we̩ ahihie̩ne̩ we̩ me̩; tak o̩wo̩ abo du ku ma jʼugbo-we̩ agbiti.
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼunyabo fa ñw Absalom ojokunyi le̩; oñ Absalom nyʼejefu ugbo amabadu ata-wñ eju abo Israe̩l chaka.
Ohi Ahitofe̩l du kʼi ate̩ iko le̩ la dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ tene ugbo o̩la O̩jo̩; abe̩le̩ ohi du kʼAhitofe̩l te̩ de̩, tʼe̩gba kʼi dʼugbo Defid kpai e-ugbo Absalom ge̩.
Oñ Ahitofe̩l ño̩ ka ñw Absalom kakini, E̩ je̩ ñwu mi fʼaboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji chi fai, kʼu kwane̩ arano Defid odu-i.
Oñ nawa banʼo, abu kʼuhia fʼu hia, e̩gba kʼo̩wo̩-wñ gulo̩, oñ nanyʼo okpo; tak amone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ ara; u la adʼonu kate kpa,
taku nakʼamone̩ le̩ chaka dabiwa ñw e̩; e̩ne̩ kate kʼe̩ feiu dee, ma kʼo̩gbo̩dudu amone̩ chaka mudabiwa; oñ amone̩ le̩ chaka ajo̩ kpʼure̩do̩.
Oñ o̩la le̩ la nyo̩ Absalom kpʼabogijo Israe̩l chaka eju nana.
Tak Absalom kakini, Me̩ ki fu Hushai, e̩ne̩ Arki le̩ do̩ wa kpo̩fo, kʼa ño̩ gbo̩ e̩wñ kʼi aka ge̩.
Tak e̩gba ku Hushai lewʼugbo Absalom, Absalom kʼo̩la kʼAhitofe̩l ka le̩ ñw u; tak i tene kakini, A che e̩wñ kʼi ka? I ma dʼabe̩le̩ n, uwe̩ ki ka.
Taku Hushai ka ñw Absalom kakini, Alu kʼAhitofe̩l ka le̩ nyo̩ iko-i n.
Hushai ño̩ ka kakini, Uwe̩ chema ata-we̩ kpai abo-wñ, kama chʼamagbiti, e̩do̩-ma la chʼe̩kpa dab ibe̩a efoko ku ma mʼamo̩ma-wñ ko; ata-we̩ la chʼe̩ne̩ ogu, i jʼale̩ ef amone̩ le̩ n.
Go, ugbo kʼi de̩ i maja ef uraʼka me̩, abe̩k o̩fio̩lifio̩ ugboʼka; oñ i awatu, e̩gba kʼiche̩ka ef uma lewane̩ ababa le̩, e̩ne̩ du ki agbʼo̩ akakini, Ma fʼabo ku ma tʼAbsalom ubi kpa kpa me̩-o!
I la chaka chʼe̩ne̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ dab e̩do̩ idu, amuyo̩ hioko; todu abo Israe̩l chaka chema kʼata-we̩ chʼagbiti ogu, oñ abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ chʼo̩ka ogu.
Ama e-ku li de̩ kakini, Kʼama ki kʼabo Israe̩l chaka jo̩ ugbo we̩, akwo Dan gbogbo wa Birshiba, ku ma wewe dab e̩lanyi ohimini; kʼeju-we̩ onugo ki dʼane̩ ef ogu le̩.
Abe̩le̩ tak a awa ke̩re̩bʼo̩ ugbo du kʼa fʼu li, oñ a awa bʼo ma dab eli ki achi bʼane̩ ma; taku tʼowñ, tʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, i chaka chʼokate-ma abo̩ n.
I la che̩wñ kʼi ra tef ewoʼka, mak abo Israe̩l chaka akʼiku wa ewo le̩, tak a fʼu fa tef ukpolo, gbogbo taku ma ñʼali okutaʼka kʼi nʼoji omune̩ o̩mo̩ n.

Tak Absalom kpai aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka kakini, O̩la Hushai, e̩ne̩ Arki le̩, nyo̩ tʼe-Ahito̩fe̩l le. Todu Jihofa ñwate̩ kʼi fʼuko̩la e̩nyo̩ e-kʼAhitofe̩l ka le̩ du, todu ku Jihofa ki kʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa abʼAbsalom ma.
Taku Hushai ka ñwu Zedo̩k kpai Abayata, amatama le̩, kakini, Alu kʼAhitofe̩l ko̩ Absalom kpai abogijo le̩ de̩; alu kʼomi la ko̩ ma e-mi la de̩; oñ i danʼo̩la le̩ aka ñwu ma.

Todule̩ me̩ fʼone̩ kpe̩ piopio, ku me̩ ka ñwu Defid kakini, E̩ ki le̩ ugbo ku ma adaba aji aje̩tachi o̩mo̩ odu-i n, ama alu du ki de̩ e̩ mudaba tʼej ano̩mo̩; tode̩gba ku ma mʼonu kpai amone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ ko mi.
Jonatan kpai Ahimaaz la jo̩ En-roge̩l anede ohi-wñ; oñ imo̩to̩ onobule̩ʼka te̩te̩chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ajuche̩ rʼuma; taku ma le tekeka ñwu Defid onu; todu ku ma ki we enyʼef ewo tode̩gba kʼamone̩ ali ma.
Imo̩to̩ okolobiaʼka muda fʼuma li, oñ i mudu ka ñw Absalom. Tak abo meji le̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le piopio, oñ ma lewa unyi e̩ne̩ʼka Bahurim, obuga dʼef ologbo-wñ; oñ ma kpare tʼef uwñ.
Tak onobule̩ o̩mo̩ fʼukpo uro̩na nadala bʼalu obuga le̩ ma, oñ i fʼo̩ka ku ma gwu te̩rʼoji-wñ; abo ki bo̩ la ma n.

Tak abuko̩lo̩ Absalom lewa unyi ugbo onobule̩ le̩; oñ ma kakini, Ugbo Ahimaaz kpai Jonatan jo̩? Tak onobule̩ le̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Ma le tʼudaba aji omo̩. Tak e̩gba ku ma tejane̩ ma ku ma ma li ma n, ma mudabi tu Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ i lewatu, abu ku ma le ma, abo meji le̩ kwef obuga dufu, oñ ma nyʼaka ñwu Defid onu, ma ka ñwu Defid kakini, Kwane̩ piopio, kʼe̩ mudaba omi-i, todu alu kʼAhitofe̩l lʼo̩la nyʼuwe̩ de̩.
Taku Defid kwane̩, kpai amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ chaka, oñ ma mudaba Jo̩rdan. Gbogbo tak ane̩ ki ne̩, e̩ne̩ du bo̩ kʼi ma daba Jo̩rdan ni n.

Oñ e̩gba kʼAhitofe̩l li ka ku ma tʼo̩la kʼi lo le̩ ubi n, i mʼofidi du nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ, oñ i kwane̩, i le tʼunyi-wñ, ewo-wñ. I la fʼuko̩ te̩ ñw abo-wñ tak i dʼo̩la-wñ lo̩; oñ i leku, ma la mʼu du ji ef oji ata-wñ.
Oñ Defid lewa Mahanaim. Tak Absalom mudaba Jo̩rdan awa, tʼowñ tʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka manyʼowñ.
Absalom la mʼAmasa du chʼonu ogu koji Joab. Amasa le̩ la chʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Itra, e̩ne̩ Ishmae̩l, kʼi le tejefu ugbo Abige̩l, o̩ma Nahash, kʼi chʼo̩maye Ze̩ruaya, iye Joab.
Oñ abʼIsrae̩l kpʼAbsalom ruru jo̩ ane̩ Gilead.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ku Defid lewa Mahanaim, Shobi, o̩ma Nahash kʼi de̩ Raba kʼi dʼef amo̩ma Amo̩n, kpai Machir, o̩ma Amie̩l kʼi de̩ Lo-debar, kpai Barzilai e̩ne̩ Gilead kʼi de̩ Rogelim;
abo le̩ kʼate kpai ucha kpai o̩ka wit kpai barli kpʼomu, kpʼakakpa e̩ro, kpʼe̩gwa, kpʼirere, kpʼe̩wñ omune̩,

kpʼiño̩, kpʼekpo okuno̩ kpʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini, kpʼomie̩nya okuno̩ ki ma kpo̩chi wa todu Defid kpʼamone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kʼama ki je̩; todu ma kakini, Ebi la akpa amone̩-i, uhia ahia ma, alugbe̩ la akpa ma, ef aje̩tachi-i.
Taku Defid fʼamone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kaluka, oñ i mʼamagboji abo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpai amagboji ogume̩lu ogume̩lu ko ñwu ma.

Taku Defid je̩ ñw amone̩ ledufu, ukpe̩re̩ta-ma jʼef o̩wo̩ Joab, ukpe̩re̩ta-ma la jʼef o̩wo̩ Abishai, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya o̩maye Joab le̩, oñ ukpe̩re̩ta-ma la jʼef o̩wo̩ Itai e̩ne̩ Gat le̩. Tak onu ka ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Omi onugo ñʼadufu kpʼame̩ ge̩.

Ama amone̩ le̩ kakini, Uwe̩ adufu n; todu iche̩wñ kʼa ra, ma anyʼawa eti n; dagba ukpe̩reji wa leku, e-le̩ awʼuma eju n; uwe̩ muda chʼejʼone̩-wa icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa; todule̩ i me̩ kʼuwe̩ kʼi fʼo̩la mu te̩ ef ewo-i ki nʼugbo kʼe̩ gbutu ñw a.
Tak onu ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ ki nyo̩ tule eju-me̩ e-le̩ nache. Tak onu kwodago ej o̩na alaku le̩, oñ amone̩ chaka dufu alo ogume̩lu ogume̩lu, kpai icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩.
Tak onu ñwa ñwu Joab kpʼAbishai kpʼItai, kakini, Me̩ che me̩ne̩ me̩ne̩ kpai okolobia le̩, owñ chʼAbsalom, todu mi. Oñ amone̩ gbo̩ alu kʼonu ñwa ñw amagboji le̩ du ugbo o̩la Absalom.
Abe̩le̩ amone̩ kwodufu nyʼoko akobo̩ Israe̩l; oñ ma fʼogu le̩ ja efoko Ifraim.
Oñ abuko̩lo̩ Defid gwʼabo Israe̩l dajane̩, uku ki kpa ma o̩jo̩ le̩ tabale, one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu ku.
Todu ogu le̩ kpatuka bʼoj ane̩ o̩mo̩ chaka ma; oñ efoko le̩ kʼamone̩ mi o̩jo̩ le̩ tʼe-kʼo̩kwo̩chageli ko ma mi le.

Tak Absalom lewa gbajiko kpʼabuko̩lo̩ Defid. Oñ Absalom tanʼimiulu-wñ alo, tak imiulu lʼofe ugbo kʼe̩to̩ oli ok lile gwuji te̩, oji Absalom la gbaji tʼoli ok, oñ i lo̩ko̩li agbagba ojale kpai ane̩ o̩mo̩; imiulu kʼi tanʼo la le owñ.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka fʼu li, i la mʼu du ka ñwu Joab kakini, Go, u fʼAbsalom li abu kʼi lokoli e̩to̩ oli ok oka.
Taku Joab dohi ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi ka ñw u kakini, E̩ la go, e̩ fʼu li, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma fʼu gwoda jane̩ o̩mo̩ n? Tak omi ma kʼajifa me̩gwa ñw e̩ manyʼe̩wñ ulagoʼka.

Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ ka ñwu Joab kakini, Dagba u gba ajifa icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩wo̩-mi-i, nanʼo̩wo̩-mi dala kado o̩ma onu-i n; todu eti-wa gbo̩ abu kʼonu ñwa ñw e̩ kpʼAbishai, kpʼItai, kakini, Nago edʼo̩wo̩ kado Absalom okolobia le̩.
Abe̩k i ma dukpe̩ kʼu fʼuji che nyʼo̩la-mi (e̩wñ du la maja ñw onu n), e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ onugo ma chʼe̩ne̩ agwunyʼumi.
Taku Joab kakini, I nʼugbo kʼu nakpo̩kpe̩ abe̩i ugbo we̩ emi n. Tak i mʼopiolo me̩ta ko nyʼo̩wo̩, oñ i mʼu ko gwunyʼe̩do̩ Absalom, abu kʼi deju lo̩ko̩li o̩la oli ok o̩mo̩.
Tak abokolobia me̩gwa ku ma ne̩ e̩wñ ido̩na ogu Joab donyʼu, oñ ma gwʼAbsalom da jane̩, ma mʼu du kpa.
Taku Joab fʼo̩kakachi fa, oñ amone̩ le̩ mudabi bʼerano abo Israe̩l ubi te̩; todu Joab fʼamone̩ le̩ dahi.
Taku ma mʼoku Absalom du, oñ ma mʼu du rikpolo tef ura lile efoko o̩mo̩, ma la kʼokuta nyʼu gbogbo ki gba dab ugbudu lile. Tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ abo Israe̩l rale tʼunyabo-wñ.

E̩gba kʼAbsalom deju i la mʼe̩wñ urewa-wñ oka du dago ñw o̩la-wñ, owñ chʼe-ki dago ef o̩go̩ onu le̩; todu i kakini, U nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi aje̩ ñwu ma rewa odu-mi n; oñ i mʼe̩wñ urewa le̩ du rʼodu-wñ onugo. Ma laño̩ dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Urewa Absalom gbogbo tʼeñini.
Tak Ahimaaz o̩ma Zedo̩k kakini, Je̩ ñwu mi fule alo fai, kʼu mʼinabali le̩ du wa ñw onu abu ki Jihofa fʼoji ajo̩-wñ kpa ugbo ame̩nebi-wñ.
Oñ Joab ka ñw u kakini, I nʼugbo kʼuwe̩ anʼinabali lo eñini n, chai o̩jo̩ omune̩ uwe̩ anʼinabali lo; uwe̩ muda anʼinabali du lo eñini n, todabu kʼo̩ma onu leku.
Taku Joab ka ñw e̩ne̩ Kush le̩ kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ li le̩ ka ñw onu. Oñ e̩ne̩ Kush le̩ dojikane̩ ñwu Joab, oñ i fule alo.

Tak Ahimaaz o̩ma Zedo̩k ño̩ ka ñwu Joab kakini, Agba, alu du ki de̩, e̩ je̩ ñwu mi kʼu ño̩ ra tʼe̩ne̩ Kush le̩ ubi. Taku Joab kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ afule, o̩ma-mi? Abu ki ma nʼinabali ki chʼeju e-we̩ n?
E̩wñ du ki che̩, e̩ je̩ ñwu mi fule alo. Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Ra lo ke! Tak Ahimaaz fule lʼo̩na egbili, oñ i du e̩ne̩ Kush le̩ o̩gba.
Defid la gugu agbagba alaku meji le̩; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi adide mute̩gu tʼojokunyi alaku oj aku, tak i chʼeju nyate̩ ago; me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ kate fule awa.
Tak ade aku le̩ dʼomu nyate̩ ka ñw onu. Tak onu kakini, Iche̩wñ ki chʼowñ kate, mak inabali dʼalu-wñ. Oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ fule awa rara, i la me̩ru awa.
Tak ade aku le̩ fʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ li kʼi fule awa; oñ ade aku le̩ kwa do̩ e̩ne̩ ki ade alaku, oñ i kakini, Go, e̩ne̩ kate ño̩ fule awa-i. Tak onu kakini, Owñ ño̩ nʼinabali ge̩.
Tak ade alaku le̩ kakini, Eju-mi ule e̩ne̩ ejodudu dab ule Ahimaaz, o̩ma Zedo̩k. Tak onu kakini, E̩ne̩ e̩nyo̩ de̩, i la anʼinabali e̩nyo̩ wa.

Tak Ahimaaz dudo̩, oñ i ka ñw onu kakini, I ra me̩! Tak i dojikane̩ o̩gba onu, oñ i fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, i kakini, Jihofa, O̩jo-we̩ ki nʼele; owñ kʼi mʼamone̩ ku ma chʼo̩wo̩ nyate̩ akobʼodu-mi onu-i ko nyʼuwa o̩wo̩.
Tak onu kakini, Absalom, okolobia le̩ fa, i ma? Tak Ahimaaz dohi kakini, E̩gba ku Joab fʼadu onu-i kpe̩ wa, owñ chʼomi, u li abu kʼutu lile da o̩mo̩, omi muda ma e̩wñ ki che n.
Tak onu kakini, Lale tʼo̩wo̩ʼka kʼe̩ dago emi. Tak i le tʼo̩wo̩ʼka adago chii.
Me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ Kush le̩ lewa; oñ e̩ne̩ Kush le̩ kakini, Inabali tod odu-mi onu de̩; todu Jihofa fʼache̩ na ñw e̩ eñini ugbo abo du ku ma kwane̩ tʼuwe̩ o̩la.

Tak onu ka ñw e̩ne̩ Kush le̩ kakini, Absalom, okolobia le̩ fa, i raa? Tak e̩ne̩ Kush le̩ dohi kakini, Ame̩nebi odu-mi onu, kpai abo du ku ma kwane̩ tʼuwe̩ o̩la ku ma chʼuwe̩ e̩bie̩ne̩, ama ki de̩ alu kʼokolobia le̩ de̩.
Oñ i gwunyʼonu e̩do̩ tabale, i mute̩gu tef unyi alaku ate̩, i kworaku. Oñ abu kʼi naka alo de̩ kakini, O̩ma-mi Absalom, o̩ma-mi, o̩ma-mi Absalom! I ma chʼomi ku koji we̩, O Absalom, o̩ma-mi, o̩ma-mi.
Oñ ma ka ñwu Joab kakini, Go, onu do̩mo̩ araku, i la adeku Absalom.
Edu ku ma du o̩jo̩ le̩ la mud eku eda ñw amone̩ chaka; todu amone̩ gbo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, Onu do̩mo̩ achʼe̩do̩dudu o̩ma-wñ.
Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka muji ye̩ye̩ tef ewo o̩jo̩ le̩, alu kʼanyo̩ amu amone̩ ku ma ra kwef ogu ku ma muji kwʼo̩mo̩ ye̩ye̩.
Tak onu fʼe̩wñ bʼeju-wñ ma oñ onu nʼomu lile akwa kakini, O o̩ma-mi Absalom, O Absalom, o̩ma-mi, o̩ma-mi!

Taku Joab mugudu wʼef unyi ugbʼonu oñ i kakini, Uwe̩ je̩ ñw anyo̩ fʼeju abuko̩lo̩-we̩ chaka mu eñini, ama la jadu oji-we̩ eñini-i, kpʼoji amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, kpʼe-amo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩, kpʼoji amo̩ya-we̩, kpʼoji amabadu-we̩,

owñ chʼabu ku we̩ fe̩do̩ abo ku ma chulaka we̩, kʼe̩ la chʼulaka abo ku ma fe̩do̩ we̩. Todu uwe̩ ka dufu pee eñini kakini, Amagboji-we̩ kpai abo-we̩ awʼe̩ eju n; todu eñini kide̩ u fʼu ma ka kʼAbsalom ma deju, kʼo̩chaka-wa ma ku eñini, e-le̩ ma nyo̩ we̩ eju nyo̩nyo̩.

Todule̩ fai e̩ kwane̩ kʼe̩ nyʼo̩lo̩fe̩, kʼe̩ ko̩la anye̩do̩ ñw abo-we̩; todu nago̩ Jihofa, kakini, Uwe̩ ma dufu n, i nʼe̩ne̩ kate kʼi ad emi kpʼuwe̩ odu eñini-i n; e-le̩ la abie̩ne̩ ñw e̩ tʼe̩bie̩ne̩ du ki ke̩re̩bʼuwe̩ akwo o̩jo̩ okolobia-we̩ gbogbo wʼifai le.

Tak onu kwane̩, oñ i kwogugu alaku. Taku ma mudu ka ñw amone̩ le̩ chaka kakini, Go, onu kwogugu alaku me̩. Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka wʼo̩gba onu o̩mo̩. E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ abo Israe̩l la rale tʼunyabo e-wñ e̩gba le̩ me̩.

Oñ amone̩ le̩ jo̩ agwajo̩ nʼo̩la-ma ugbo du ef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka, ma kakini. Onu mʼuwa gba bʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-wa te̩, i laño̩ jadu wa kwef o̩wo̩ abo Filistia; fai i la ra kwʼojane̩-i bʼAbsalom te̩ me̩.
Absalom, kʼa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji kʼi jʼonu-wa, la leku ef ogu. Todule̩ fai, e̩wñ chi ki ma nʼo̩la onu edu dabiwa ku me̩ ka ge̩ n?

Taku Defid onu fʼuche̩ kpe̩ ru Zedo̩k kpʼAbayata, amatama, kakini, Me̩ ko̩la ñw abogijo Juda kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ dʼubi otitala ugbo onu edu dabiwʼunyi-wñ ke? abu kʼuko̩la abo Israe̩l chaka kwotʼonu eti, ka ku ma adʼu wʼunyi-wñ.
Ame̩ chʼamo̩maye-mi, me̩ chʼachiku-mi kpai o̩re̩la-mi; todule̩ e̩wñ chi kʼame̩ chʼabo ubi otitala ki adʼonu dabiwa?
Me̩ naka ñw Amasa kakini, Uwe̩ ño̩ chʼachiku-mi, kpai o̩re̩la-mi n? O̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che ñwu mi, kpai e-ki tʼe-le̩ le ge̩, iche̩wñ ku we̩ ma mud onu abogu o̩gba-mi e̩gu Joab pioo n.
Oñ i gu aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka o̩la che̩, dab e̩ne̩ kʼe̩do̩-ma chʼe-e̩ne̩ kate: abe̩le̩ ma fʼone̩ kpe̩rʼonu kakini, Mudabiwa, uwe̩ kpai abuko̩lo̩-we̩ chaka.
Abe̩le̩ onu mudabiwa, oñ i lewa eti Jo̩rdan. Tak abo Juda lewa Gilgal ku ma nyʼaledʼonu, ku ma dʼonu daba Jo̩rdan wa.
Taku Shimeai, o̩ma Gera e̩ne̩ Be̩njamin le̩ kʼi chʼabo Bahurim hio̩-wane̩ wa, oñ i gwo̩ru wa ef aboke̩le̩ Juda kʼi ledʼonu Defid.
Aboke̩le̩ Be̩njamin icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ la jʼugbo-wñ manyu Ziba, adu abunyi So̩l le̩ kpai amo̩ma-wñ me̩gwe̩lu, kpai amadu-wñ ogu manyʼowñ ge̩; oñ ma gwo̩ko refu Jo̩rdan ku ma wʼo̩gba onu.
Oñ o̩ko̩ ki ako abo unyi onu daba, ki ñʼache alu ki nyʼonu eju, nalelo lewa. Taku Shimeai, o̩ma Gera, lewa bʼane̩ ma o̩gba onu, e̩gba kʼi ache ki daba Jo̩rdan wa.
Oñ i ka ñw onu kakini, Odu-mi ki lʼudu rʼumi n, e̩ ki la libekadʼudu kʼadu-we̩ fe̩ o̩jo̩ kʼodu-mi onu kwo Je̩rusale̩m le̩ n, todu kʼonu ki we edʼu tʼe̩do̩.
Todu adu-we̩-i chema ka kʼi dure. Todule̩ go, eñini-i omi chʼe̩ne̩ ejodudu ef abo unyi Jose̩f chaka kʼi lewa ledo odu-mi onu.
Ama Abishai, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, dohi, kakini, Ma adu Shimeai kpa tod e̩wñ-i n? Todabu kʼi fʼina bu e̩ne̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji n?
