Taku Defid kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-mi kpai ame̩, amo̩ma Ze̩ruaya, kʼame̩ achʼame̩no̩la-mi eñini-i? Ma ñʼadu e̩ne̩ du kpa oj ane̩ Israe̩l eñini-i? Todu, omi ma ka kʼonu Israe̩l omi che eñini?
Oñ onu ka ñwu Shimeai kakini, Uwe̩ aku n. Tak onu fu go̩ ñw u.
Me̩fibo̩she̩t, o̩ma So̩l, ño̩ gwo̩ru wa aledo onu; i la gwʼe̩re̩-wñ n, i la ñwʼilagba-wñ che n, i la fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ gwe̩ n, akwo o̩jo̩ kʼonu kwʼo̩mo̩ le gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ ki dabiwa unyi kpai ure̩do̩.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼi lewa Je̩rusale̩m kʼi ledʼonu, kʼonu ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma lebʼumi n, Me̩fibo̩she̩t?
Tak i dohi kakini, Odu-mi, O onu, adu-mi fʼumi gwo̩gwo̩. Todu adu-we̩-i kakini, Nadʼo̩fidi nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-mi, kʼu tanʼo lebʼonu, todabu kʼadu-we̩-i chʼe̩no̩lo̩.
Ulu i la bumʼadu-we̩-i ñw odu-mi onu. Odu-mi onu muda dab onuche̩ O̩jo̩: todule̩ e̩ nache e̩wñ ki nyʼuwe̩ eju.
Todu abo unyi ata-mi chaka jo̩ dab oku one̩ eju odu-mi onu-i; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ uwe̩ mʼadu-we̩-i du gugu ef abo ku ma je̩ e̩wñ oj itebulu-we̩ onugo. Todule̩ ugbo i ño̩ nʼugbo kʼu naraku ñw onu ge̩?
Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ño̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ le̩ wane̩ aka ge̩? U kakini, Uwe̩ kpai Ziba ki fʼane̩ le̩ kpe̩.
Taku Me̩fibo̩she̩t ka ñw onu kakini, I-i, je̩ ñw u mʼo̩gbo̩dudu-wñ ko, abu kʼodu-mi onu lewa unyi-wñ onugo kpai ure̩do̩.
Oñ Barzilai, e̩ne̩ Gilead, gwo̩ru kwo Rogelim wa; owñ kpʼonu kpe̩re̩ daba Jo̩rdan, todu kʼi chʼahite̩-wñ daba Jo̩rdan wa.
Barzilai la chʼogijo nana, o̩do̩-wñ chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩le̩; owñ la nʼuje̩wñ kʼonu a je̩ abu kʼi de̩ Mahanaim; todu Barzilai chʼanana tabale.
Oñ onu ka ñwu Barzilai kakini, Wa, kʼe̩ daba kpʼomi, kʼe̩ manyʼumi Je̩rusale̩m kʼu nanʼe̩.
Oñ Barzilai ka ñw onu kakini, O̩do̩ udeju-mi bʼo̩jo̩ mʼonu? kʼomi ate̩gu lebʼonu nyi Je̩rusale̩m?

Eñini-i o̩do̩-mi la chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩le̩; omi ma ojoji e̩nyo̩ kpai e̩bie̩ne̩ ge̩? Adu-we̩-i ama urinyo̩ e̩wñ kʼu naje̩ abe̩k e̩wñ kʼu nañmo̩ ge̩? Omi neke gbʼomu eli kʼaboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩ ako̩? Todule̩ e̩wñ chi kʼadu-we̩-i ñʼachʼadu anʼodu-mi onu oji ta?
E-ki dʼadu-we̩-i e̩do̩ kate chʼedaba Jo̩rdan-i kpʼonu, e̩wñ chi kʼonu arʼumi o̩me̩ abe̩i todu e-le̩?

Agba, e̩ je̩ ñw adu-we̩-i kʼi mudabi, todu kʼu ku ef ewo e-mi onugo, ugbo ojinoji ata-mi kpai e-iye-mi. E̩ la go, adu-we̩ Chim-ham de̩; je̩ kʼowñ ki mudaba lebʼodu-mi onu; tak e̩ chʼe̩wñ du ki rʼe̩ eju ñw u.
Tak onu dohi kakini, Chim-ham adaba lebʼumi, e̩wñ du ki la rʼuwe̩ eju, nache ñw u; adu du ki la dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ dʼu nʼumi oji nane̩ ñw e̩.
Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka mudaba Jo̩rdan, onu ño̩ mudaba: tak onu dʼalu kalu Barzilai, oñ i kadua ñw u; taku Barzilai mudabi tʼe̩gu-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ onu mudaba nyi Gilgal, Chimham la mudaba kpʼowñ. Abo Juda chaka la dʼonu daba wa, kpai ukpe̩reji abo Israe̩l ge̩.

Me̩ la go, aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka lewʼugbo onu oñ ma ka ñw onu kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼamo̩maye-wa, aboke̩le̩ Juda, mʼuwe̩ ji? ku ma la mʼonu kpai abunyi-wñ ko daba Jo̩rdan wa, kpai aboke̩le̩ Defid chaka manyʼowñ?
Tak aboke̩le̩ Juda chaka dohi ñw aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l kakini, Todabu kʼonu chʼefu-wa anane̩. E̩wñ chi kʼo̩la-i abi me̩ eju? I nʼe̩wñ re kʼonu la ñw a je̩? Abe̩k i dʼe̩wñʼka chʼuwa ele?

Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l dohi ñw aboke̩le̩ Juda kakini, Awa chenʼukpe̩ me̩gwa ef onu, a ño̩ nʼe̩wñ ugbo Defid tʼame̩ le; todule̩ e̩wñ chi ku me̩ chʼe̩de̩te̩-wa, ku me̩ ma gbʼalu-wa ejodudu taku me̩ dʼonu wa dabiwa-in? Oñ o̩la aboke̩le̩ Juda chʼo̩ko̩ko̩ tʼo̩la aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l le.
Oñ e̩nebiliʼka wa gbajiko o̩la le̩ o̩mo̩, odu e̩ne̩ le̩ ko̩ Shiba, o̩ma Bikri, e̩ne̩ Be̩njamin i che. Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ fʼo̩kakachi fa, oñ i kakini,
Abe̩le̩ aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka kwobo̩ Defid ubi te̩, oñ ma kwo tu Shiba o̩ma Bikri ubi; abo Juda muda manyʼonu-ma, akwo Jo̩rdan gbogbo wa Je̩rusale̩m.

Abe̩le̩ Defid lewʼunyi-wñ Je̩rusale̩m; tak onu mʼabobule̩ me̩gwa ku ma chʼamabadu-wñ le̩ ko, owñ chʼabo kʼi tʼuma no̩ jʼubi ku ma dejutʼunyi, oñ i ko ma jʼef o̩wo̩ one̩, owñ la nʼuje̩wñ-ma ku ma aje̩, i muda nyʼejefu ugbo ma n. Abe̩le̩ ma fʼuma dahi jʼejefu gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-ma, ma kwojo̩ dab amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩.
Tak onu ka ñw Amasa kakini, E̩ fʼaboke̩le̩ Juda do̩ jeju ñw mi gbogbo tak o̩jo̩ me̩ta ki jo̩, eju-we̩ onugo ki la dʼane̩.
Abe̩le̩ Amasa le nyʼadʼabo Juda jeju; i muda kpo̩kpe̩ tʼiko ku ma da ñw u le.

Taku Defid ka ñw Abishai kakini, Fai taku Shiba, o̩ma Bikri, achʼuwa e̩bie̩ne̩ tʼe-kʼAbsalom che wa le; e̩ mʼabuko̩lo̩ odu-we̩-i ko, kʼe̩ ranʼo, tode̩gba kʼi alo tef ewo ki nʼaku, kʼi la kwo bʼuwa eju te̩.
Tak abo Joab ledufu atʼo̩ ubi kpai abo Ke̩re̩t kpai abo Pe̩le̩t kpai ame̩nugbiti chaka; oñ ma kwo Je̩rusale̩m dufu ku ma rano Shiba, o̩ma Bikri le̩.

E̩gba ku ma lewa ugbo okuta lile ki de̩ Gibeo̩n, Amasa lewa de kpai ama. Joab la kʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ bʼo̩la ma, e̩wñ lʼago-wñ de, oñ o̩kwo̩chageli tunyʼako-wñ ji mʼago-wñ; oñ abu kʼi dufu alo i muwo̩ tane̩.
Taku Joab ka ñw Amasa kakini, E̩ raa, o̩maye-mi? Taku Joab nʼo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ gwo̩nyʼilagba Amasa kʼi dʼalu kʼalu-wñ.
Amasa la nyeti o̩kwo̩chageli ki dʼo̩wo̩ Joab le̩ n; abe̩le̩ i fʼu ro̩nyʼu o̩la, oñ ifi-wñ mu dajʼane̩, i laño̩ dabi dʼu gwunyʼu ge̩ n; tak i leku.
Okolobia Joab oka la dago kpenyʼoku-wñ o̩mo̩, kʼi ka kakini, E̩ne̩ ki Joab chenyʼo̩ eju, kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ Defid, i ki tu Joab ubi.

Amasa la dachi ef e̩bie̩-wñ ajilo̩ku oj ikpadala o̩mo̩. Tak e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ li kʼamone̩ kwodago jo̩, i mʼoku Amasa du bʼoj ikpadala te̩ tef oko, i la mʼe̩wñ o̩laʼka ko bʼo ma, owñ chʼabu kʼi li ka kʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi lewʼugbo-wñ kwodago.
E̩gba ku ma mʼu du bʼoj ikpadala te̩, amone̩ le̩ chaka daru Joab ubi, ku ma rano Shiba, o̩ma Bikri.
Oñ i lale gu o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l du wa Ebe̩l; kpai Be̩t-maaka, kpʼabo Beri chaka, tak ama le̩ kʼo̩la-ma jeju, oñ ma ño̩ tʼo̩ ubi.
Taku ma lewa kpala nyu Shiba, Ebe̩l e-Be̩t-maaka, oñ ma fʼike̩te̩ gba dago o̩la ewo le̩ dab uwo, i gbadago ef o̩kpe̩-wñ; tak amone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo Joab dʼe̩wñ nu o̩do̩ le̩ ku ma gʼu lo̩.
Tak onobule̩ʼka ki nʼibe ef ewo le̩ kwado̩ ma, kakini, Neti, neti; o̩ko̩ nagbabʼuwe̩, me̩ ka ñwu Joab kakini, Te̩ me̩rʼemi kʼu nako̩la ñw e̩.
Tak i te̩ me̩rʼu; oñ onobule̩ le̩ kakini, Uwe̩ che Joab? Oñ i dohi kakini, Omi de̩. Tak onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, E̩ nanetirʼo̩la adu-we̩ onobule̩-i. Oñ i dohi kakini, Nagbo̩.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ ko̩la kakini, Ma te̩taka kwʼigbelegbele kakini, Ma anyʼEbe̩l atene chuu: abe̩le̩ taku ma kpoji o̩la.
Tak omi dʼef abo ure̩do̩ kpai abo ku ma chubi O̩jo̩ Israe̩l; uwe̩ tene kʼe̩ kpʼewo kpai iye bie̩ Israe̩l; e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ neku ekʼe̩wñ ogu Jihofa mi?
Taku Joab dohi kakini, E-le̩ ki me̩ru mi n, e-le̩ ki me̩ru mi n, kʼomi ki kʼe̩wñ mi abe̩k ekpʼo̩ bie̩.

I chʼabe̩le̩ o̩la-i de̩ n; ama e̩ne̩ ka kʼi chʼabo ane̩ uwo Ifraim, kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Shiba o̩ma Bikri, dʼo̩wo̩ nyate̩ chagwunyu onu, owñ chʼachagwunyu Defid; me̩ dʼowñ kate dufu wa, tak u nakwo bʼewo-i te̩. Tak onobule̩ le̩ ka ñwu Joab kakini. Go, ma adʼoji-wñ rikpolo lʼoj o̩do̩ ñw e̩.

Tak onobule̩ le̩ nyʼugbo amone̩ le̩ chaka ibe ibe. Oñ ma fʼoji Shiba, o̩ma Bikri, ko̩da, ma la mʼu du rikpolo tʼo̩do̩da ñwu Joab. Tak i fʼo̩kakachi-wñ fa, oñ ma muchi kwʼewo le̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼunyabo-wñ. Oñ Joab mudabiwa Je̩rusale̩m ugbo onu.
Joab la chʼonu abogu Israe̩l chaka. Oñ Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada chʼagboji abo Ke̩re̩t kpai abo Pe̩le̩t;
Adoram la chʼagboji amilebula; oñ Jiho̩shafat o̩ma Ahilud chʼako̩takada iko iko e̩wñ;
Shefa la chʼako̩takada; Zedo̩k kpai Abayata chʼamatama;
Ira, abo Jair, la chʼe̩ne̩ ki tʼo̩gba ef abo ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu Defid.
Ukpo̩ta la kpa o̩do̩ me̩ta aro̩ne aro̩ne adiko Defid, oñ Defid tene eju Jihofa. Taku Jihofa kakini, Todu So̩l i che, kpai tod unyi-wñ ki chʼe̩bie̩ e̩bie̩, todabu ki fʼabo Gibeo̩n kpa rinyo̩.

Tak onu fʼabo Gibeo̩n do̩ wa, abo Gibeo̩n le̩ la dʼef amo̩ma Israe̩l in, chai e̩bo̩bo̩ abo Amo̩r ma che; amo̩ma Israe̩l muda fu go̩ ñwu ma; So̩l la feju kʼi kpa ma rinyo̩ ef ogu eja-wñ tod amo̩ma Israe̩l kpai Juda.
Oñ Defid ka ñw abo Gibeo̩n kakini, E̩wñ nache ñwu me̩? E̩wñ nache ki abʼe̩wñ le̩ ma, kʼame̩ ki kadua ñw e̩wñ ogu Jihofa-i?

Taku abo Gibeo̩n ka ñw u kakini, I la chʼo̩la ajifa kpai o̩jamalia tʼagbagba-wa kpai So̩l in, kpʼabunyi-wñ n; i laño̩ dukpe̩ e-wa kʼa dʼone̩ kpa Israe̩l in. Tak i kakini, E̩wñ ku me̩ ka e-le̩ nache ñwu me̩.
Taku ma ka ñw onu kakini, E̩ne̩ ki fʼuwa lie̩ kʼi laño̩ fʼe̩wñ ñwa nyʼuwa, ku ma fʼuwa kpo̩lʼo kʼa we̩ ebo̩ alo̩me̩ Israe̩l chaka,
je̩ ñwu ma mʼaboke̩le̩ mebie ef amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ko ñw a, kʼa ako ma lo̩ ñwu Jihofa, Gibea e-So̩l, e-ku Jihofa du le̩. Tak onu kakini, Nako ma ñwu me̩.
Onu muda do̩wo̩mo̩ Me̩fibo̩she̩t, o̩ma Jonatan o̩ma So̩l le̩, todu ego̩ Jihofa kʼi tʼagbagba ma, owñ chʼagbagba Defid kpai Jonatan, o̩ma So̩l le̩.

Oñ onu mʼamo̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ meji ku Rizpa, kʼi chʼo̩ma onobule̩ Aya, bi ñwu So̩l ko̩, owñ chʼArmoni kpai Me̩fibo̩she̩t, kpai amo̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Maikal o̩ma So̩l me̩lu, owñ chʼe-kʼi bi ñw Adriel o̩ma Barzilai abo Me̩holat le̩.
Oñ i mʼuma ko nyʼabo Gibeo̩n o̩wo̩. Taku ma ko ma lo̩ oj uwo o̩gba Jihofa, oñ amamebie lewane̩ e̩gbakate. Ma la ko ma kpa iko ku ma kpa e̩wñ oko, e̩gba ejodudu-wñ e̩gba ku ma chane̩ ekpa o̩ka barli.

Taku Rizpa, o̩ma onobule̩ Aya le̩, mʼe̩gbanukpo ko, oñ i fʼu nadala ñw o̩la-wñ jʼoji okuta, akwo uchane̩ iko ku ma kpa e̩wñ oko le̩ gbogbo tak omi kwʼojale wa danyʼu; i la je̩ ñw ame̩we̩ ojale ku ma ñmi oji-wñ o̩ro̩ka n, kpʼame̩wñ iñmi odu n.
Taku ma mʼe̩wñ ku Rizpa, o̩ma Aya kʼi chʼabadu So̩l che le̩ du ka ñwu Defid.
Taku Defid nyʼamʼachiku So̩l kpai Jonatan o̩ma-wñ ko bʼo̩wo̩ abo Jebe̩sh-gilead te̩, ama la chʼabo ku ma mʼachiku-ma ji kwo oj ikpadala Be̩t-shan, iko kʼabo Filistia fu So̩l kpa Gilboa.
Oñ i mʼachiku So̩l kpʼachiku Jonatan o̩ma-wñ ko kwʼo̩mo̩ wa: taku ma fʼachiku abo ku ma ko lo le̩ re.
Taku ma kʼachiku So̩l kpai achiku Jonatan wa ji Zela oj ane̩ Be̩njamin ef ojinoji Kish ata-wñ. Ma la fʼe̩wñ du kʼonu ñwa ñwu ma che. Ubi le̩ tak O̩jo̩ gbʼologu todu ane̩ le̩.
Tak abo Filistia ño̩ kʼogu bʼabo Israe̩l; oñ Defid mugwo̩ru le, abuko̩lo̩-wñ la manyʼu, oñ ma bʼabo Filistia ja. Tak uba muda ju Defid e̩do̩;
oñ Ishbibe̩nob, kʼi de̩ ef amo̩ma akachi le̩, uwoji o̩kwo̩-wñ tʼe̩bo̩ me̩gweji le, alu ku ma ñwa ihio̩, e̩wñ ido̩na ogu kʼi ji mʼo̩la chʼetito̩, oñ i nʼibe ka kʼi adu Defid kpa.

Ama Abishai o̩ma Ze̩ruayo, te̩ mʼo̩, i la dʼe̩wñ gwo e̩ne̩ Filistia le̩, oñ i mʼu du kpa. Tak aboke̩le̩ Defid fu go̩ ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ñʼadufu nyʼokogu kpai awa ge̩ n, tode̩gba kʼe̩ fʼe̩mu Israe̩l kpalu.
Oñ i lewatu ubi le̩ ge̩, kʼogu ño̩ chi ñwu ma kpʼabo Filistia Go̩b. Taku Sibe̩kai, e̩ne̩ Husha, du Saf kʼi dʼef amo̩ma akachi le̩ kpa.
Tak ogu ño̩ chi ñwu ma kpʼabo Filistia Go̩b ge̩; oñ E̩lhanan, o̩ma Jare-origim, e̩ne̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m, du Golayat e̩ne̩ Gat kpa, oli o̩kwo̩-wñ dab oli idabo.
Tak ogu ño̩ chi Gat ugbo kʼe̩ne̩ʼka kʼi gbo̩gba tabale de̩, o̩wo̩-wñ du chenʼo̩mo̩wo̩ me̩fa, e̩re̩-wñ du la nʼo̩me̩re̩ me̩fa, aluka-wñ du chʼogu nyoke me̩le̩; i laño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma bi ñw akachi le̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi fʼIsrae̩l bina, Jonatan o̩ma Shimei, o̩maye Defid, mʼowñ du kpa.
Ma fʼabo me̩le̩-i bi ñw akachi le̩ Gat; oñ ma lewane̩ o̩wo̩ Defid kpai o̩wo̩ abuko̩lo̩-wñ.
Taku Defid kʼo̩la eli-i ñw Jihofa, o̩jo̩ ku Jihofa mʼowñ gba kwef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-wñ chaka kpai kwef o̩wo̩ So̩l.
Oñ i kakini,
O̩jo̩, okuta-mi, owñ nachubiyʼo̩,
Nakwado̩ Jihofa kʼi dukpe̩ ku ma je̩nyʼu,
Todu akpoli e-uku lʼumi daka,
iku o̩jegu chewenyʼumi,
Udo̩ Jihofa ef o̩pe̩cha-mi;
Tak ile̩ kwomiejo, i la ga ligaliga;
odudu kwef iñmo̩-wñ dufu tʼate̩,
I ño̩ fʼefojale efojale hiwane̩, tak i mugwo̩ru wa;
I la tanʼiche̩rub ale, i la wu;
I la je̩ ñw e̩chubi mud ala ala ki lʼo daka,
Ane̩ ki mune̩ o̩gba-wñ
Uko̩la Jihofa chʼakpabana kwʼefojale,
I la kʼo̩fa-wñ kpuche̩ dufu oñ i fʼuma kpatuka;
Tak ugbo unefu ohimini kwotejugede,
I fʼuche̩ kpe̩ kwʼatate̩, i mʼumi du,
I gba mi bʼo̩wo̩ e̩nebi-mi ki gbiti te̩,
Ma lewa bʼumi ma o̩jo̩ uchobi-mi;
I ño̩ du mi dufu tef uña ki nʼabe̩;
Jihofa fʼo̩me̩ ra ñw mi alu kʼo̩kpakpa-mi de̩;
Todu omi fʼo̩na o̩na Jihofa de me̩,
Todu oji ajo̩-wñ kʼi ka jʼo̩gba-mi chaka,
U laño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ogbolo o̩gba-wñ;
Todule̩ Jihofa mʼakoji-wñ du ñw mi alu kʼo̩kpakpa-mi de̩,
Uwe̩ añʼe̩numo̩la ka kʼuwe̩ chʼe̩numo̩la;
Uwe̩ añʼe̩ne̩ ki de̩ yaala ka kʼuwe̩ de̩ yaala;
Uwe̩ la ajadu ame̩no̩bata,
Todu uwe̩ chʼagege-mi, O Jihofa;
Todu lugbo we̩ omi rale gu ef udala du,
I chʼe-O̩jo̩—o̩na-wñ mufu;
Todu e̩ne̩ chʼO̩jo̩ ki ma che Jihofa n?
O̩jo̩ chʼaku-mi ki gbiti,
I aje̩ ñw e̩re̩-mi le̩ dab e̩re̩ e̩labikolo,
I ako̩ o̩wo̩-mi ogu e̩ja,
Uwe̩ laño̩ mʼugbe̩yo̩ ujadu-we̩ du ñw mi me̩,
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw ugbo kʼe̩re̩-mi atane ki nabe̩,
U ranʼame̩nebi-mi, oñ u fʼuma kpo̩fo,
U la fʼuma lie̩; u ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ro̩ gu ma efu du ku ma ño̩ kwane̩ ge̩ n;
Todu uwe̩ dʼukpahiu jʼumi iñmi tod ogu le̩;
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw ame̩nebi-mi mʼubi dagba mi,
Ma go, i muda nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi ajadu man;
Tak u fʼuma gwu nuku nuku dab ebutu ane̩pe̩te̩,
Uwe̩ laño̩ mʼumi gba bʼef iñwa amone̩-mi te̩ me̩;
O̩la amo̩ma abononojo naga wo̩wo̩wo̩ wʼugbo-mi;
Abononojo agbo rinyo̩,
Jihofa deju; okuta-mi ki nʼele,
owñ chʼO̩jo̩ ki fʼache̩-mi na,
kʼi laño̩ mʼumi du kwef ame̩nebi-mi dufu;
Todule̩ nagogbodʼuwe̩ ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, O Jihofa,
Ujadu inaina i ako ñw onu-wñ,
Otitala o̩la ku Defid ka la de̩:
Afu Jihofa ko̩la lef umi,
O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ka ñw mi,
E̩ne̩ le̩ adab ane̩ ki ane̩ odudu,
Ochochi, unyi-mi dʼabe̩le̩ ugbo O̩jo̩ n?
Ame̩nebili chaka la dab ikeke ku ma ko rinyo̩,
E̩ne̩ ki muda ado̩wo̩kado ma
Odu amagbiti ku Defid ne̩ la jo̩-i: Josheb-basshebe̩t, e̩ne̩ Takemon, owñ chʼuto̩gba amagboji abogu; owñ le̩ chʼAdino, e̩ne̩ E̩zna, kʼi dago akpa one̩ icham e̩gbaʼkate.
E̩leaza ro̩nʼo, owñ chʼo̩ma Dodai, o̩ma e̩ne̩ Ahoa oka, owñ dʼef amagbiti me̩ta ku ma jʼugbo Defid e̩gba ku ma fʼabo Filistia ku ma jeju akogu bʼuma bina, kʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l la kwʼo̩mo̩ le.

E̩ne̩ le̩ kwane̩ oñ i fʼabo Filistia kpa gbogbo tak o̩wo̩-wñ kpa, kʼo̩wo̩-wñ la kama nyʼobe̩chageli; Jihofa la fʼujadu lile che o̩jo̩ le̩; oñ edabi kʼamone̩ le̩ dabi atʼowñ ubi chʼutodu ku ma ñʼane̩ kate.
Taku Sharna o̩ma Agi, e̩ne̩ Harar, ro̩nʼo. Oñ abo Filistia kʼo̩la-ma do jo̩, ugbo kʼikpoga ane̩ ki che̩ko̩ ñw irere de̩; amone̩ le̩ la ra bʼabo Filistia te̩.
Owñ le̩ muda dago alumeji ikpoga ane̩ le̩, oñ i mʼu gba te̩, i la fʼabo Filistia kpa; abe̩le̩ Jihofa fʼujadu inaina che.
One̩ me̩ta kwef abo ogue̩gwa ku ma dʼoji dufu le̩ la gwo̩ru le, oñ ma lewa ugbo Defid ef owo Adulam iko ku ma kpa e̩wñ oko; abudala abo ogu Filistia la ruru jo̩ ef o̩go̩ Re̩feim.
Defid la dʼef aku e̩gba le̩; oñ abide abo Filistia jo̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m iko le̩.
Oñ Defid ko̩la ado̩jo̩ omiofo, kakini, O, i ma nʼe̩ne̩ʼka kʼi adʼomi obuga Be̩tle̩he̩m e-ki me̩rʼalaku le̩ ñwu mi ñmo̩!
Tak amagbiti me̩ta le̩ ko̩da le gu ef abo ogu Filistia du, oñ ma fʼomiofo kpa kwef obuga Be̩tle̩he̩m, kʼi me̩rʼalaku le̩, oñ ma mʼu du wʼugbo Defid, i muda ko̩ eñmo̩, i la mʼu du dajane̩ ñwu Jihofa.
Oñ i kakini, E-le̩ ki jiji rʼumi, O Jihofa, todu kʼu che-i. Omi añmʼe̩bie̩ aboke̩le̩ ku ma dʼoji-ma nʼo̩wo̩ ale? Todule̩ i ma je̩ ñmo̩ n. E̩wñ kʼame̩nugbiti me̩ta le̩ che de̩.
Oñ Abishai, o̩maye Joab o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, chʼuto̩gba ef one̩ me̩ta. I la dʼo̩kwo̩-wñ nyʼate̩ abo one̩ oli me̩fa i la fʼuma kpa, oñ i fʼodu ne̩ ef ama me̩ta le̩.
I chʼowñ nʼojima tule ef ama me̩ta n? Todule̩ ma mʼu du che agboji-ma: o̩wo̩-wñ muda tu o̩wo̩ abo ejodudu me̩ta le̩ n.
Oñ Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada o̩ma e̩nuwohi ki de̩ Kabzee̩l, e-kʼi fʼe̩wñ ukpahiu nana che, owñ fʼabo Arie̩l e-Moab meji le̩ kpa; l laño̩ gwo̩ru tʼalumeji ura iko ki sno alo̩ i fʼidu kpa o̩mo̩.

I laño̩ fʼe̩ne̩ Ijiptiʼka kpa, eju e̩ne̩ le̩ chefe̩ rʼeju. E̩ne̩ Ijipti le̩ la nʼo̩kwo̩ o̩wo̩; oñ i nʼugbolo oli gwo̩ru nyʼugbo-wñ, i la mʼo̩kwo̩ gba gbulu bʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ Ijipti le̩ te̩, oñ i nʼo̩kwo̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩ fʼu kpa.
Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada, fʼe̩wñ kʼa ka-i che, oñ i fʼodu ne̩ ef amagbiti me̩ta le̩.
I nʼojima tʼabo ogue̩gwa le̩ le, o̩wo̩-wñ muda tu abo me̩ta ejodudu le̩ n. Defid la mʼabo ide-wñ ko nyef o̩wo̩-wñ.
Asahe̩l, o̩maye Joab, chʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef abo ogue̩gwa le̩; E̩lhanan, o̩ma Dodo, e-Be̩tle̩he̩m;
Shama e̩ne̩ Haro̩d, Elika e̩ne̩ Haro̩d;
Helez e̩ne̩ Palti; Ira, o̩ma Ike̩sh, e̩ne̩ Tekoa;
Abie̩ze̩r e̩ne̩ Anatot; Me̩bunai e̩ne̩ Husha;
Zalmo̩n e̩ne̩ Ahoa; Ma-harai e̩ne̩ Neto̩fat;
Heleb o̩ma Beana, e̩ne̩ Neto̩fat; Itai o̩ma Ribai, e-Gibea kʼi dʼef amo̩ma Be̩njamin;
Be̩naya e̩ne̩ Pirato̩n; Hidai, kʼi chʼabo aji Gaash;
Abialbo̩n e̩ne̩ Arbat; Azmefe̩t e̩ne̩ Barhuma;
Eliaba e̩ne̩ Shaalbo̩n; amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Jashan, Jonatan;
Shama e̩ne̩ Harar; Ahiam o̩ma Sharar, e̩ne̩ Arar;
Elifale̩t o̩ma Ahasbai, o̩ma e̩ne̩ Maakat; Eliam o̩ma Ahitofe̩l, e̩ne̩ Gilo̩n;
He̩zro̩ e̩ne̩ Karme̩l; Paarai e̩ne̩ Arbi;
Igal, o̩ma Netan e-Zoba; Bani, e̩ne̩ Gad;
Zele̩k e̩ne̩ Amo̩n; Naharai, e̩ne̩ Birot: abo le̩ chʼabo ku ma ne̩ e̩wñ ido̩na ogu ñwu Joab o̩ma Ze̩ruaya le̩.
Ira, e̩ne̩ Itri; Gerab, e̩ne̩ Itri;
Uraya, e̩ne̩ He̩t: o̩chaka-ma chʼogue̩gwa nyoke mebie.
Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa ño̩ mutajo bʼIsrae̩l ma ge̩, oñ i fu Defid ke̩che̩ abʼuma ma, i kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ fʼabo Israe̩l kpʼabo Juda kaluka.
Tak onu ka ñwu Joab onu ogu-wñ kʼi dʼugbo-wñ le̩, kakini, E̩ nalelo lewa gu ef o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l chaka du, akwo Dan gbogbo wa Birshiba, kʼe̩ fʼamone̩ le̩ kaluka, kʼomi ku ma aluka amone̩.
Taku Joab ka ñw onu kakini, Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼi nakʼamone̩ wa manyʼabo-i alu du ku ma de̩, ku ma dʼabe̩le̩ ugbo ogume̩lu; eju odu-mi onu kʼi li ma: ama e̩wñ chi kʼe̩wñ-i nyo̩ odu-mi onu eju ta?
I chaka ka abe̩le̩, o̩la onu fʼe-Joab du, kpai e-amagboji ogu-wñ. Taku Joab kpai amagboji ogu kwo dufu bʼo̩gba onu te̩ ku ma fʼabo Israe̩l kaluka.
Taku ma mu Jo̩rdan daba, oñ ma lewa ru Aroe̩r, o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ ewo kʼi dʼalumeji o̩go̩ Gad gbogbo wa Jeza.
Oñ ma lewa Gilead kpai ane̩ Tatim-hodshi; oñ ma lewa Dan-jaan, ma la dagbala gbogbo wa Saidon,
oñ ma lewa aku Taya, kpai ewo ewo abo Hifai kpai abo Kenan chaka; oñ ma ledufu tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ Juda, ugbo Birshiba.
Abe̩le̩ e̩gba ku ma lelo lewa ugbo du ane̩ le̩ kpa, e̩gba kʼochu me̩la nyʼo̩jo̩ ogu jo̩ ma doji wa Je̩rusale̩m.

Taku Joab mʼaluka amone̩ kʼi kaluka le̩ du ñw onu; aboke̩le̩ ku ma nʼuwohi ku ma bʼo̩kwo̩chageli ewo̩ jo̩ ku ma jo̩ Israe̩l che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo icham; aboke̩le̩ Juda la chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oli me̩gwa.

Oñ e̩do̩ Defid kpabie̩ abu kʼi fʼamone̩ le̩ kaluka. Taku Defid ka ñwu Jihofa, U fʼadure inaina ta ugbo e̩wñ kʼu che-i, ama fai, O Jihofa, nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, mʼudu kʼadu-we̩-i fe̩ du tinyo̩; todu u fʼe̩wñ idada che tabale.
Tak e̩gba ku Defid kwane̩ odudu-wñ, o̩la Jihofa lewa ugbo Gad akache̩, kʼi chʼagane̩ Defid, kakini,
Lo, kʼe̩ ko̩la ñwu Defid kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ E̩wñ me̩ta nadute̩ ñw e̩: e̩ dʼoka ef uwñ, kʼomi ki chʼe̩.

Abe̩le̩ Gad lewa ugbo Defid, oñ i mudu ka ñw u, i la ka ñw u kakini, O̩kpo̩ta akpa ane̩-we̩-i o̩do̩ mebie? Abe̩k uwe̩ ara rʼo̩gba abo ku ma chʼuwe̩ ope̩cha ku ma nʼuwe̩ ule ochu me̩ta? Abe̩k e̩wñ ibi adʼoj ane̩-we̩-i o̩jo̩ me̩ta? E̩ nafʼu lo, kʼe̩ kpibe ohi kʼu nadu dabiwa ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi kpe̩ mi wa-i.
Taku Defid ka ñwu Gad kakini, O̩pe̩cha kʼu dʼef uwñ-i gbe̩: a ki ñwa tef o̩wo̩ Jihofa; todu ejumomi e-wñ tabale; i ki la je̩ ñwu mi ñwa tef o̩wo̩ one̩ n dee.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa je̩ ñw e̩wñ ibi ki lewa bʼIsrae̩l ma akwo odudu gbogbo wʼiko kʼi da ñwu ma le̩; tak amone̩ chane̩ eku akwo Dan gbogbo wa Birshiba, aboke̩le̩-wñ che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e̩te̩gwa.

Tak e̩gba kʼonuche̩ O̩jo̩ fʼo̩wo̩ nadala rʼo̩wo̩ Je̩rusale̩m kʼi fu kpabie̩, e̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ wo̩ Jihofa, oñ i ka ñw onuche̩ kʼi akpa amone̩ bie̩ kakini, I bo̩jo̩ me̩; o̩wo̩-we̩ ki kadʼo̩mo̩ ke. Onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ la dʼugbo ajita e-Arauna e̩ne̩ Je̩bius, ugbo ku ma gwʼo̩ka-wñ.

Tak e̩gba kʼi li onuche̩ kʼi akpa amone̩ le̩, Defid ko̩la ñwu Jihofa, oñ i kakini, Go, omi dure, omi la fʼudu-i; i muda chʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini-i, e̩wñ ama che ke? Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, o̩wo̩-we̩ ki kobʼomi kpʼabunyi ata-mi.
Taku Gad lewʼugbo Defid o̩jo̩ le̩, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Mute̩gu alo, kʼe̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa oj ajita ugwo̩ka e-Arauna, e̩ne̩ Je̩bius, le̩.
Taku Defid te̩gu le teju o̩la ku Gad ka, alu ku Jihofa ñwa le̩.
Tak Arauna nyope go, oñ i li onu kpʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ ku ma fʼeju darʼowñ awa. Tak Arauna ledufu, oñ i dojikane̩ o̩gba onu, eju-wñ la bʼane̩ ma.

Tak Arauna kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼodu-mi onu wʼugbo adu-wñ-i? Taku Defid kakini, Kʼu fʼajita ugwo̩ka le̩ la ef o̩wo̩-we̩, kʼu fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa, todu e̩wñ ibi le̩ ki we, kʼi kwo bʼamone̩-i te̩.

Tak Arauna ka ñwu Defid kakini, Odu-mi onu ki namʼe̩wñ du ki nyʼowñ eju ko, kʼi mʼu ko che O̩jo̩; go, amokuno̩ tod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo jo̩-i, e̩wñ ku ma ne̩ gwʼo̩ka kpai oli uno̩lo̩ amokuno̩ jo̩-i ki chʼiji.
E̩wñ le̩ du, O onu, Arauna ko ñw onu. Arauna laño̩ ka ñw onu, kakini, Uwe̩ ki ru Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ e̩do̩.

Tak onu ka ñw Arauna kakini, O̩da; ela nala ugbo-we̩ alu kʼaja-wñ de̩; u la agba e̩wñ alafa ako chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi n. Abe̩le̩ Defid kʼo̩ko̩ ajifa she̩ke̩l ooje la ajita ugwo̩ka le̩ kpʼamokuno̩-wñ.
Taku Defid fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne o̩mo̩, oñ i kʼe̩wñ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ ure̩do̩ wa che. Abe̩le̩ Jihofa mʼologu gba tod ane̩ le̩, oñ e̩wñ ibi la takpa bʼIsrae̩l te̩.
Oñ onu Defid mud ogijo, i la wʼile̩ kpo̩kpe̩; ma la kʼukpo bʼo̩ o̩la ma, i muda agbʼafu ñw u n.

Todule̩ ame̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Je̩ ñwu ma tene o̩ma igbe̩le̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n oka tod odu-mi onu-i, kʼi dʼugbo onu, kʼi dejutʼo̩, kʼi bʼuwe̩ mʼo̩la adachi, todu kʼi kpuna mʼodu-mi onu o̩la.
Abe̩le̩ ma kwotejane̩ o̩migbe̩le̩ ki chʼuto̩ eju ugbo du ojane̩ Israe̩l, taku ma fʼAbishag, e̩ne̩ Shune̩m oka, li; oñ ma mʼu du wʼugbo onu.
Igbe̩le̩ le̩ chʼuto̩ tabale; i chane̩ edejutʼonu, i la che e̩wñ ñw u; onu muda kpʼo̩ bie̩ n.
Oñ Adonija, o̩ma Hagit, hi o̩la-wñ ne kakini, Omi ajʼonu; tak i fʼo̩kane̩ ogu che ñw o̩la-wñ, kpai amananya, manyʼaboke̩le̩ ooje kʼama ki fule rʼo̩ o̩gba.
Ata-wñ la kʼo̩la akpe̩do̩bie̩ ñw u mama ta n, kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ che e̩wñ e̩go̩-i? I laño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼaño̩la-wñ chefe̩rʼeju; abine Absalom i la che.
Oñ i fʼo̩la lo kpai Joab, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, kpʼAbayata, atama le̩: taku ma kwotʼAdonija ubi ate̩kʼo.
Zedo̩k atama, kpai Be̩naya o̩ma Jiho̩yada, kpai Netan akache̩, kpai Shimeai, kpai Rei, kpai amagbiti ki Defid ne̩ le̩, abʼe-le̩ la jʼugbo Adonija n.

Tak Adonija fʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpʼamokuno̩ kpʼame̩la ki yoyo kpa ugbo okuta Zohele̩t ki dʼo̩wo̩ʼka E̩nroge̩l; oñ i fʼamo̩maye-wñ du, ku ma chʼamo̩ma onu, do̩ wa kpʼaboke̩le̩ Juda du ku ma chʼame̩nuko̩lo̩ onu.
I muda do̩ Netan akache̩, kpai Be̩naya kpai amagbiti le̩ kpai So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩maye-wñ wa n.
Taku Netan ka ñwu Batsheba, lye So̩lo̩mo̩n, kakini, Uwe̩ gbo̩ ka kʼAdonija o̩ma Hagit mud onu? Defid, odu-wa la ma n.
Todule̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ lewa fa-i kʼu naka ñw e̩ e̩wñ kʼe̩ che kʼe̩ fʼoji o̩la-we̩ kpʼoji So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩ma-we̩ jadu.

E̩ lo kʼe̩ nyʼejefu ugbo onu Defid, kʼe̩ la ka ñw u kakini, Odu-mi, O onu, i chʼuwe̩ go̩ ñw adu-we̩ onobule̩-i, kakini, So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩ma-we̩ ajʼonu koji mi chuu, kʼowñ la agugu oj ede-mi n? Mak e̩wñ chi kʼAdonija ajʼonu-i ge̩?
Go, abu kʼe̩ dago o̩mo̩ akʼo̩la ñw onu, omi la atʼuwe̩ ubi wa agbʼuwe̩ ibenu.
Taku Batsheba nyʼejefu ugbo onu ef unyi olu-wñ: onu la chʼogijo tabale; oñ Abishag e̩ne̩ Shune̩m le̩ do̩mo̩ ache e̩wñ ñw onu.
Taku Batsheba dʼoji lo̩, oñ i dojikane̩ ñw onu. Tak onu kakini, E̩wñ dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩?
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Odu-mi, uwe̩ go Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ñw adu-we̩ onobule̩-i kakini, So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩ma-we̩ ajʼonu koji we̩, owñ la agugu oj ede-we̩ chuu.
E̩ la go ta, Adonija fʼonu je̩; uwe̩, odu-mi, onu, e̩ la ma n.
I la fʼamo̩kokuno̩ kpai ame̩la ki yoyo kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpa e̩kute̩. Oñ i fʼamo̩ma onu do̩ wʼo̩mo̩ kpʼAbayata, atama, kpai Joab onu abogu: i muda do̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n, adu-we̩, wa n.
I la chʼuwe̩, odu-mi onu, eju abo Israe̩l du chekorʼuwe̩ todu kʼuwe̩ ki ka ñwu ma e̩ne̩ ki agugu oj ede odu-mi, onu, aro̩ne-wñ.
Cho̩kpo̩ni i lewa tʼe̩gba kʼodu-mi onu chʼolu manyʼamata-wñ, ma alo mi kpʼo̩ma-mi So̩lo̩mo̩n rʼame̩nadure.
Me̩ la go, abu kʼi do̩mo̩ ako̩la ñw onu, Netan akache̩ le̩ mugudu wa.
Oñ ma ka ñw onu kakini, Go, Netan, akache̩ de̩. Tak e̩gba kʼi mugudu wʼo̩gba onu, i dojikane̩ o̩gba onu, i fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.
Taku Netan kakini, Odu-mi, O onu, uwe̩ ka kakini, Adonija ajʼonu ro̩nʼuwe̩, kʼowñ la agugu oj ede-we̩?

Todu eñini-i i mugwo̩ru le, i la fʼamo̩kokuno̩ kpai ame̩la ki yoyo kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpa e̩kute̩, oñ i fʼamo̩ma onu chaka kpai amagboji abogu kpʼAbayata, atama do̩; e̩ la go, ma jʼo̩gba-wñ aje̩ añmo̩, oñ ma jo̩ akakini, Oji onu Adonija ki gbo kala kala.
I muda do̩ omi, omi kʼu chʼadu-we̩-i, kpai Zedo̩k, atama, kpai Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada, kpai So̩lomo̩n, adu-we̩ n.
Odu-mi onu fʼe̩wñ kide̩ che̩? kʼi ma la du ña amadu-wñ e̩ne̩ ki agugu oj ede odu-mi onu aro̩ne-wñ n?
Tak onu Defid dohi kakini, Do̩ Batsheba wa ñwu mi. Taku Batsheba mugudu wʼugbo onu, oñ i kwodago o̩gba onu.
Tak onu go̩, kakini, Oji Jihofa! Owñ ki mʼonugo-mi gba kwef o̩bata du,
ochochi, alu kʼu fu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l go̩ ñw e̩ kakini, So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma-we̩ ajʼonu ro̩nʼumi chuu, kʼi la agugu oj ede-mi akoji mi; abe̩le̩ nache eñini-i ochochi.
Taku Batsheba te̩kpe̩ afʼeju bʼane̩ ma, i dojikane̩ ñw onu, oñ i kakini, Oji odu-mi, onu Defid, ki do̩mo̩ ogbegbele̩.
Tak onu Defid kakini, Fu Zedo̩k, atama do̩ wa ñwu mi, kpai Netan, akache̩ kpai Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada le̩. Oñ ama le̩ lewa jʼo̩gba onu.
Tak onu ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼame̩nuko̩lo̩ odu-me̩-i ko lebʼume̩, oñ me̩ je̩ ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma-mi, ki tanʼimiulu e-mi onugo, ku me̩ dʼu gwo̩ru nyi Gihon;
taki Zedo̩k, atama, kpai Netan, akache̩, ki fʼekpo ba tʼowñ oji o̩mo̩, kʼi mud onu abo Israe̩l, taku me̩ fʼo̩kakachi fa, ku me̩ kakini, Oji onu So̩lo̩mo̩n ki gbo kala kala.
Tak ame̩ ki lʼowñ ubi awa, kʼowñ ki lewa gugu oj ede-mi; todu owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ajʼonu koji-mi; omi la fuñwate̩ ka kʼowñ achʼe̩nuto̩gba Israe̩l kpai Juda.
Taku Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada, dohi ñw onu kakini, Ami, Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-odu-mi onu, ki ño̩ ka abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Alu ki Jihofa te̩te̩dʼugbo odu-mi onu, kʼi ño̩ dʼugbo So̩lo̩mo̩n abe̩le̩ ge̩, kʼi je̩ ñw ede e-wñ ki ño̩ nana tʼede onu Defid, odu-mi le ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ Zedo̩k, atama, kpai Netan, akache̩, kpai Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada, kpʼabo Ke̩re̩t kpʼabo Pe̩le̩t mugwo̩ru le, oñ ma je̩ ñwu Solomo̩n tane imiulu e-onu Defid, oñ ma mʼu du wa Gihon.
Taki Zedo̩k, atama le, mʼigba ekpo du kwef unyabo, oñ i mʼu du ba ti So̩lo̩mo̩n oji. Taku ma fʼo̩kakachi fa; oñ amone̩ le̩ chaka kakini, Oji onu Solomo̩n ki gbo kala kala.
Tak amone̩ du darʼo̩ ubi te̩gu wa, oñ amone̩ le̩ fʼo̩kpana fa, ma la nʼuyo̩ lile ayo̩. Oñ ane̩ chane̩ ekpana noj ekuku-ma.
Oñ abu kʼAdonija kpʼabo du kʼi do̩ ma wʼugbo-wñ me̩ru eje̩ e̩wñ kpa, ma gbʼo̩. Tak e̩gba ki Joab gbʼuko̩la o̩kakachi, i kakini, E̩wñ chʼoji ewo ki dutu kpʼekuku-i?
Abu kʼi nʼo̩la-i aka, go, Jonatan, o̩ma Abayata atama le̩, lewa. Oñ Adonija kakini, Mugudu wa; todu uwe̩ chʼe̩nome̩me̩le̩, inabali e̩nyo̩ oñ e̩ ne̩ wa-i.
Taku Jonatan dohi ka ñw Adonija kakini, Ochochi, odu-wa, onu Defid, mu So̩lo̩mo̩n du jʼonu me̩;
onu la fi Zedok, atama kpai Netan, akache̩, kpai Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada, kpʼabo Ke̩re̩t kpʼabo Pe̩le̩t kpuche̩ lebʼo̩; oñ ma je̩ ñw u tane̩ imiulu onu ale;
Zedo̩k, atama le̩, kpai Netan, akache̩, la fʼekpo ba tʼowñ oji Gihon kʼi mud onu. Ma la mute̩gu kwʼo̩mo̩ wa kpʼuyo̩, oñ ewo-i mud uyo̩ te̩ lii. Ekuku kʼame̩ gbo̩ le̩ de̩.
So̩lo̩mo̩n la gugu oj ede ojane̩-i me̩.

Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, ame̩nuko̩lo̩ onu chaka lewa ku ma kadua ñw odu-wa, onu Defid kakini, O̩jo̩-we̩ ki je̩ ñw odu So̩lo̩mo̩n ki nyo̩ tʼodu e-we̩ le, kʼi la je̩ ñw ede-wñ ki nana tʼede-we̩ le ge̩; oñ onu dojikane̩ oj ate̩-wñ.
Onu laño̩ ka kakini, Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ki nʼele, owñ le̩ kʼi mʼe̩ne̩ʼka du ñwu mi kʼi gugu oj ede-mi eñini-i, kʼeju-mi la nali-i.
Tak abo kʼAdonija do̩ wa le̩ chaka kworailo, ma la kwane̩, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le owñ.
Oñ ailo So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼAdonija mu; oñ i kwane̩ le nagwo̩nyʼigba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩.

Taku ma mʼu du ka ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n kakini, Go, Adonija arailo onu So̩lo̩mo̩n; todu go, i agwo̩nyʼigba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, i kakini, Onu So̩lo̩mo̩n ki go̩ ñwu mi eñini-i ka kʼi anʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa adu-wñ-i n.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼi mud e̩no̩me̩me̩le̩, mak iloji-wñ okate achi tʼane̩pe̩te̩ n; i muda che̩wñ ku ma fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ li ef uwñ, eku i aku.
Abe̩le̩ onu So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼone̩ kpe̩, oñ ma mʼowñ du gwo̩ru kwʼugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ wa. Tak i lewa adojikane̩ ñw onu So̩lo̩mo̩n; So̩lo̩mo̩n la ka ñw u kakini, Lo tʼunyi-we̩.
E̩gbale̩ o̩jo̩ Defid me̩rʼejo̩ kʼi aku; oñ i fʼuko̩ te̩ ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma-wñ kakini,
Elo nalo tʼo̩na kʼabo ile̩ du ale; todule̩ uwe̩ ki rukpahiu ne̩, kʼe̩ mud e̩ne̩ke̩le̩;

kʼe̩ la fʼe̩wñ ide Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ de, kʼe̩ nale o̩na o̩na-wñ, kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ de kpʼuko̩ uko̩ kʼi te̩ kpʼo̩la ajo̩-wñ kpʼo̩la ibenu-wñ, teju alu ku ma ko̩ rʼef uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s, todu kʼuwe̩ ki che e̩wñ du ibe ibe, ugbo du kʼe̩ rʼo̩la-we̩ da anyi.

Todu ki Jihofa ki fʼo̩la kʼi ka lʼugbo-mi le̩ lonyane̩, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼamo̩ma-we̩ fʼe̩re̩-ma de, ku ma la lule̩ o̩gba-mi ochochi, kpʼe̩do̩-ma chaka, kpʼonugo-ma chaka, mak uwe̩ awe enʼone̩ ki agugu oj ede abo Israe̩l ge̩ n.

Uwe̩ ño̩ chema e̩wñ ki Joab, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya che mi, owñ chʼe-kʼi che amagboji abogu Israe̩l meji le̩, owñ chʼAbina, o̩ma Ne̩r, kpʼAmasa, o̩ma Je̩te̩r, kʼi fʼuma kpa le̩, i dʼe̩bie̩ ogu dafo iko ure̩do̩, i la dʼe̩bie̩ ogu kado e̩wñ kʼi du lago-wñ de, kpai e̩da kʼi dʼe̩re̩-wñ.
Todule̩ e̩ nache alu kʼibe-we̩ ka ñw e̩, e̩ la je̩ ñw oji abiloji efufu le̩ ki nyʼef o̩jegu kpai ure̩do̩ n.
E̩ muda mo̩la ñw amo̩ma Barzilai, e̩ne̩ Gilead le̩, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw ma jʼef abo ku ma jʼuje̩wñ oj itebulu e-we̩; todu abu kʼama wʼugbo mi e̩gba kʼu ra bʼAbsalom o̩maye-we̩ te̩ le̩ de̩.

E̩ la go, Shimeai, o̩ma Gera e̩ne̩ Be̩njamin e-Bahurim, kʼi fʼina bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩ bu mi o̩jo̩ kʼu nyi Mahanaim le̩ dʼugbo we̩; i muda gwo̩ru wa ledo mi o̩la Jo̩rdan, oñ u fi Jihofa go̩ ñw u kakini, Nanʼo̩kwo̩chageli akpʼe̩ n.
E̩ ki che kpai owñ dabe̩ne̩ kʼi ma fʼudu ni n, todu anibe e̩ che; uwe̩ la ama e̩wñ ki dukpe̩ kʼe̩ chʼo, uwe̩ la adʼoji abiloji efufu le̩ gwo̩ru nyʼo̩jegu e̩bie̩ e̩bie̩.
Oñ Defid cholu manyʼamata-wñ. Ma la mʼu du ji ewo Defid.
Aluka o̩jo̩ du ki Defid jʼonu Israe̩l chʼo̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji: onu-wñ kʼi je̩ i dʼo̩do̩ mebie He̩bro̩n, tak i dʼo̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩ta Je̩rusale̩m.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n kwogugu oj ede ata-wñ Defid; o̩da ojane̩-wñ la lonyane̩ nana tabale.
Oñ Adonija, o̩ma Hagit, lewʼugbo Batsheba iye So̩lo̩mo̩n. Tak iye le̩ kakini, O̩lafia dʼe̩ wa? Oñ i kakini, O̩lafia i che.
Oñ i kakini, U chenʼo̩laʼka kʼu naka ñw e̩. Oñ iye le̩ kakini, Ka waa.
Tak i kakini, Uwe̩ chema ka kʼo̩fe̩ ojane̩-i chʼe-mi, kʼabo Israe̩l du mʼeju-ma korʼomi ka kʼomi ma jʼonu; o̩fe̩ le̩ muda murida me̩, i la mud e-o̩maye-mi, todu owñ ne̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ Jihofa.
Oñ fai u chenʼo̩ko̩ʼka kʼu nagbabʼe̩; e̩ ki dubigba mi n. Tak iye le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Ka waa.
Oñ i kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ ko̩la ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n onu, todu i ade̩yakpʼo̩la-we̩ n, todu kʼi dʼAbishag, e̩ne̩ Shune̩m le̩ ñwu mi chʼo̩ya.
Taku Batsheba kakini, I nyo̩; nakʼo̩la-we̩ ñw onu.

Todule̩ Batsheba nyʼugbo So̩lo̩mo̩n, kʼi ko̩la ñw u todu Adonija. Oñ onu kwane̩ ledʼo, i la te̩kpe̩ ñw u, tak i kwoguguane̩ oj ede-wñ, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma dʼede omune̩ wa tod iye onu; tak iye-wñ kwogugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ.
Tak i kakini, U chenʼebiʼka re kʼu nabi we̩: e̩ ki dubigba mi n. Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, Tene waa, iye-mi; todu u jʼadubigbʼe̩ n.
Oñ i kakini, E̩ je̩ ñwu ma dʼAbishag e̩ne̩ Shune̩m le̩, ñw Adonija, o̩maye-we̩, kʼi chʼo̩ya-wñ.

Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n onu dohi, oñ i ka ñw iye-wñ kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ abi Abishag, e̩ne̩ Shune̩m le̩, tod Adonija ta? Mak uwe̩ ki ño̩ bi o̩fe̩-i ñw u ge̩; todu acho̩gba-mi i che; owñ chʼutod owñ kpʼAbayata atama le̩ kpai Joab o̩ma Ze̩ruaya.
Taku Solomon onu fi Jihofa go̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che mi, kʼi laño̩ che mi tule, ki ma chʼoji o̩la-wñ onugo kʼAdonija ka ne le̩ n.
Todule̩ fa-i oji Jihofa, kʼi hi mi e̩re̩ nyane̩, kʼi la du mi gugu oj ede Defid ata-mi, kʼi laño̩ fʼunyi che ñwu mi, alu kʼi katane̩ le̩, ma adʼAdonija kpa eñini-i chuu.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n onu fu Be̩naya o̩ma Jiho̩yada kpuche̩; tak owñ le̩ lewa bʼo ma, abe̩le̩ i leku.

Tak onu ka ñw Abayata, atama le̩ kakini, E̩ nalo tʼAnato̩t, ugbo ane̩ uche̩-we̩ le̩; todu e̩ne̩ uku uwe̩ che; u muda adʼuwe̩ kpa iko-i ta n, todabu kʼe̩ nʼakpati Ondu Jihofa ti Defid, ata-mi, o̩gba, todu o̩bata du kʼata-mi li uwe̩ ño̩ li ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼAbayata ke̩che̩ tinyo̩ bʼatama eche ñwu Jihofa te̩, todu kʼo̩la Jihofa ki che̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi ka ugbo abo unyi Ilai Shailo le̩.
Oñ inabali le̩ wʼugbo Joab; todu Joab murida atʼAdonija ubi, abʼi mo chaka rida atʼAbsalom ubi n. Taku Joab ra tef unyabo Jihofa, oñ i gwo̩nyʼigba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ o̩mo̩.
Taku ma mudu ka ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n onu kaki Joab ra le tef unyabo Jihofa; e̩ la go, i dʼugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ o̩mo̩. Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n fu Be̩naya o̩ma Jiho̩yada kpe̩ lo kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ bʼo ma.

Taku Be̩naya lewʼugbo unyabo Jihofa le̩, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Abu kʼonu ka de̩ kakini, Dufu wa. Tak i kakini, O̩da; todu emi naku. Taku Be̩naya dabi mʼohi o̩la le̩ du wa ñw onu, kakini, Abu ki Joab ka de̩, abe̩le̩ i la dohi ñwu mi.
Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, Che alu kʼi ka, kwobʼo ma, kʼe̩ mʼu du ji; todu kʼe̩ mʼe̩bie̩ ki ma nʼudu n, e-ki Joab du dafo le̩, ko kwo bʼo̩la e-mi kpai o̩la abo unyi ata-mi te̩.

Oñ Jihofa adʼe̩bie̩ e-wñ dabi wa abʼoji-wñ onugo ma, todabu kʼi lewa abʼaboke̩le̩ meji ku ma chʼame̩no̩kpakpa kpai ame̩ne̩nyo̩ tʼowñ onugo le ma, kʼi la nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma, ata-mi Defid la ma n, owñ chʼAbina, o̩ma Ne̩r, kʼi chʼonu abogu Israe̩l, kpai Amasa, o̩ma Je̩te̩r, onu abogu Juda ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ oñ e̩bie̩-ma adabi abʼoji Joab ma, kpʼabʼoji ugbe̩-wñ ma ogbegbele̩; i muda chʼe-Defid, kpʼugbe̩-wñ kpai abo unyi-wñ, kpai ede-wñ, ure̩do̩ ado̩mo̩ ñwu ma kwʼugbo Jihofa ogbegbele̩.
Taku Be̩naya o̩ma Jiho̩yada, mute̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩, oñ i lewa bʼo ma, i la mʼu du kpa; taku ma mʼowñ du ji ef unyi-wñ onugo aje̩tachi.
Tak onu mi Be̩naya o̩ma Jiho̩yada du gugu e̩gu-wñ kʼi chʼonu abogu: oñ onu mu Zedo̩k ata-ma le̩ du gugu e̩gu Abayata.
Tak onu kpʼone̩ ado̩ Shimeai, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Fʼunyi ko̩ ñw o̩la-we̩ Je̩rusale̩m, kʼe̩ gugu o̩mo̩, e̩ ki la kwʼo̩mo̩ nyʼugbo du n.
Todu o̩jo̩ kʼe̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu, kʼe̩ la mʼukpolo Kidro̩n daba, uwe̩ ki ma ka kʼeku uwe̩ aku chuu, e̩bie̩-we̩ la adʼoji e-we̩ onugo.
Taku Shimeai ka ñw onu kakini, O̩la le̩ che nyo̩; alu kʼodu-mi onu ka-i, abe̩le̩ oñ adu-we̩ ache. Taku Shimeai gugu Je̩rusale̩m kpo̩kpe̩ pe̩e̩.
Oñ i lewatʼe̩gba kʼo̩do̩ me̩ta muda, tak amadu Shimeai meji rale tʼugbo Ekish, o̩ma Maaka, onu Gat. Taku ma mudu ka ñwu Shimeai kakini, Go, amadu-we̩ le̩ jo̩ Gat.
Taku Shimeai kwane̩, i mʼofidi konʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ, oñ i nyi Gat, ugbo Ekish, kʼi tene amadu-wñ le̩; oñ Shimeai le, i la mʼamadu-wñ ko kwo Gat wa.
Taku ma mudu ka ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n ka ki Shimeai kwo Je̩rusale̩m nyi Gat, tak i dabi wa.

Taku onu fʼone̩ kpe̩ ado̩ Shimeai, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Omi je̩ ñw e̩ fu Jihofa go̩ kʼu laño̩ katane̩ ñw e̩ kpaka kakini, Uwe̩ ki ma chuu, kakini, O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ kwʼemi dufu, kʼe̩ tale ugbo du ki che, eku uwe̩ aku chuu n? Uwe̩ la ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩la kʼu gbo̩-i che nyo̩.
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma fʼego̩ kʼe̩ go̩ Jihofa-i kpʼuko̩ kʼu te̩ ñw e̩ de ni ta?
Tak onu ño̩ ka ñwu Shimeai kakini, Uwe̩ chema e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ du kʼe̩do̩-we̩ mune̩, e-kʼuwe̩ che Defid ata-mi le̩; todule̩ Jihofa adʼe̩bie̩ne̩-we̩ dabi abʼuwe̩ onugo oji ma-i.
Ama e̩nyo̩ achʼe-So̩lo̩mo̩n onu, oñ ede Defid alonyane̩ eju Jihofa ogbegbele̩.
Abe̩le̩ onu ñwa ñwu Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada; oñ i ledufu abʼo ma, abe̩le̩ i leku.
Taku Solomon fʼe̩wñ ana che ñwu Fero onu Ijipti, i la mʼo̩ma Fero du, oñ i mʼowñ du wʼewo Defid, gbogbo tak i fʼunyi e-wñ ko̩ kpa kpʼunyi Jihofa kpʼaku ki le Je̩rusale̩m daka.
Ama amone̩-wñ jo̩ achʼiche̩bo̩ oj otete otete ki gbo̩gba todabu ki ma nʼunyi du ku ma ko̩ tod odu Jihofa gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ le̩ ta n.
So̩lo̩mo̩n la fe̩do̩ Jihofa, i nalule̩ teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ Defid, ata-wñ; i muda nʼiche̩bo̩ ache kpai otulale agujo oj otete otete le̩.
Tak onu nyi Gibeo̩n kʼi chʼiche̩bo̩ o̩mo̩; todu o̩mo̩ le̩ chʼotete ki to̩gba: So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ wa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-le̩.
Jihofa kwotejugede ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n Gibeon ef o̩na kʼi na odu; oñ O̩jo̩ kakini, Bi mi e̩wñ kʼu nadu ñw e̩.

Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n kakini, Uwe̩ dʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ nana dufu ñw adu-we̩ Defid ata-mi, teju alu kʼi lule̩ o̩gba-we̩ ef ochochi kpʼef o̩kpakpa kpʼalu kʼe̩do̩-wñ chʼokpoko ugbo we̩; uwe̩ ño̩ fʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ lile-i de tod uwñ ge̩, owñ chʼo̩ma kʼe̩ du ñw u kʼi gugu oj ede-wñ, alu ki de̩ eñni-i.
I chʼifai, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩-mi, uwe̩ mʼadu-we̩-i du chʼonu koji Defid ata-mi me̩; omi la chʼimo̩to̩ re ofo; u ma eledufu kpai edabi wa n.
Adu-we̩-i la dʼalumeji amone̩-we̩ e-kʼe̩ chi ñw o̩la-we̩-i, amone̩ inaina, kʼuwewe-ma ma nʼaluka n, ki ma jʼalo n.
Todule̩ e̩ nadʼe̩do̩ ki agbʼo̩la ñw adu-we̩-i kʼi kajo̩ amone̩-we̩, todu kʼi mʼojoji e̩nyo̩ kpai e̩bie̩ne̩; todu e̩ne̩ bo̩jo̩ kʼi akajo̩ amone̩-we̩ ki wewe-i?
Oñ o̩la le̩ chenyo̩ Jihofa eju, abu ki So̩lo̩mo̩n bi e̩wñ le̩.

Tak O̩jo̩ ka ñw u kakini, Todabu kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ-i bi mi, kʼe̩ ma la bi e̩wñ o̩la-we̩ kʼojo̩lugbo-we̩ ki kpo̩kpe̩ n, e̩ la bi e̩wñ anana tod o̩la-we̩ n, e̩ la bi oji ame̩nebi-we̩ n, chai ibe e̩ bi todu kʼe̩ ma oji ajo̩ kʼe̩ ka;
go, omi che alu kʼe̩ ka me̩: go, u mʼe̩do̩ ibe kpai e-ki amʼoji o̩la du ñw e̩, todabe̩le̩ i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dab uwe̩ o̩gba tak e̩ wa n, i la anʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi akwane̩ kʼi adab uwe̩ ubi-we̩ ge̩ n.
Omi laño̩ mʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ ma bi n du ñw e̩ ge̩, tʼe̩wñ anana, tʼojima; todabe̩le̩ i anʼe̩ne̩ du ef amonu kʼi adab uwe̩ gbogbo tak e̩ ku n.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ jʼalule̩ o̩na e-mi, kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi de, kpʼuko̩ uko̩ kʼu te̩, alu kʼata-we̩ Defid lule̩ le̩, mak u naje̩ ñw olugbo-we̩ ki nyʼo̩gba.

Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n mʼolu ji; e̩ la go, o̩na ena i che: oñ i lewa Je̩rusale̩m, i la kwodago o̩gba akpati alo e-Jihofa, oñ i kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wache, kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩, oñ i fʼo̩je̩ uyo̩ hi ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ chaka.
Tak abobule̩ meji ku ma chʼamajo̩ko̩ lewa ugbo onu, oñ ma kwodago o̩gba-wñ.
Tak onobule̩ ejodudu kakini, Keka, odu-mi, omi kpai onobule̩-i jʼunyiʼka; omi fʼo̩ma bi ugbo-wñ ef unyi le̩.
Oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta kʼu bi o̩ma le̩, kʼonobule̩-i ño̩ bi o̩ma ge̩. Oñ a ajo̩ kpʼo̩la-wa o̩mo̩; e̩nomune̩ du dʼef unyi le̩ kpʼawa n, chai awa meji kate jʼef unyi le̩.
Tak o̩ma onobule̩-i leku odu, todabu kʼi dachi nʼo.
Tak i kwane̩ alumeji odu, amʼo̩ma-mi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du kwʼakolo-mi abu kʼadu-we̩ onobule̩-i alolu, oñ i mʼu du dachi agbe̩do̩-wñ, i la dʼo̩ma-wñ ki ku le̩ dachi agbe̩do̩ e-mi.
Tak e̩gba kʼu kwane̩ odudu kʼu dʼe̩nya ñw o̩ma-mi ñmo̩, go, i mud oku one̩ te̩; ama e̩gba kʼu fʼo̩la-wñ go odudu, go, i chʼo̩ma-mi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼu bi le̩ de̩ n.
Tak onobule̩ ekeji kakini, O̩da; chai e-kʼi deju chʼo̩ma-mi, e-kʼi ku la chʼo̩ma e-we̩. Tak e-i kakini, O̩da; chai e-kʼi ku chʼo̩ma e-we̩, oñ e-kʼi deju chʼo̩ma e-mi. Abe̩le̩ ma jʼaka o̩gba onu le̩.
Tak onu kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka aka kakini, O̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi deju-i chʼe-mi, oñ o̩ma e-we̩ ku le̩; ekeji la aka kakini, O̩da; todu e-kʼi ku chʼo̩ma-we̩, o̩ma-mi la chʼe-kʼi deju.
Tak onu kakini, Mʼo̩kwo̩chageli du wa ñwu mi. Oñ ma mʼo̩kwo̩chageli du wa o̩gba onu o̩mo̩.
Tak onu kakini, Fʼo̩ma ki deju le̩ ko̩da meji, kʼe̩ la mʼojiʼka du ñw e̩ne̩ʼka, kʼe̩ mʼojiʼka du ñw e̩ne̩ ekeji.

Tak onobule̩ e-kʼo̩ma ki deju le̩ chʼe-wñ kʼo̩la ñw onu todabu kʼo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ chemʼo̩ e̩do̩, oñ i kakini, Keka, odu-mi, mʼudeju o̩ma-i du ñw u, i la nʼugbo du kʼe̩ kpa n. Ama e̩ne̩ ekeji kakini, Tʼorm, tʼuwe̩ ane̩ n; fʼu ko̩da meji.
Tak onu dohi kakini, Mʼo̩ma ki deju le̩ du ñw e̩ne̩-i, i nʼugbo du kʼe̩ dʼu kpa n; owñ chʼiye-wñ.
Oñ abo Israe̩l chaka gbʼinabali ajo̩ kʼonu ka le̩; taku ma kworailo onu; todu ma cheli ka kʼibe O̩jo̩ dʼef uwñ, kʼi akajo̩ o̩kpakpa.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n jʼonu abo Israe̩l chaka.
Abo-i la chʼamidachi ku ma jʼugbo-wñ; Azaraya o̩ma Zedo̩k chʼatama;
E̩lihore̩f kpai Ahija, amo̩ma Shisha, chʼamako̩takada-wñ; Jiho̩shafat, o̩ma Ahilud chʼako̩takada inabali iko e̩wñ;
Be̩naya o̩ma Jiho̩yada la chʼonu abogu; Zedo̩k kpai Abayata la chʼamatama;
Azaraya, o̩ma Netan, la chʼagboji amachokolobia; Zabud, o̩ma Netan chʼuto̩gba abo̩hiala, onuko onu i che;
abunyi onu la jʼef o̩wo̩ Ahaishar. Abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ are̩ la jʼef o̩wo̩ Ado̩nairam, o̩ma Abda.
Oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n nʼone̩ me̩gweji ku ma ko dago jo̩ kʼabo Israe̩l chaka jʼef o̩wo̩-ma, abo le̩ nʼuje̩wñ etene tod onu kpai abo unyi-wñ: e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma nʼuko̩lo̩-wñ ochuʼka o̩do̩ ʼka kʼi atene wa.
Abu kʼodu abo le̩ ko̩ de̩: Be̩n-he̩r nʼe-ane̩ uwo Ifraim;
Be̩n-de̩ke̩r ne̩ Me̩kaz kpai Shoalbim kpai Be̩t-shime̩sh kpai Ilon-be̩tanan;
Be̩n-hise̩d nʼArubo̩t (Soko kpai ane̩ He̩fe̩r du jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ);
Be̩n-abinadab nʼane̩ otete Do̩r chaka (Tafat, o̩ma So̩lo̩mo̩n, chʼo̩ya-wñ).
Beana, o̩ma Ahilud, ne̩ Taanak kpai Me̩gido kpai Be̩t-shean ki dʼokolo Zaretan, o̩gane̩ Je̩zree̩l le̩, akwo Be̩t-shean wa Abe̩l-mehola gbogbo tʼudaba Jokmeam chaka;

Be̩n-ge̩be̩r ne̩ Ramo̩t-gilead (owñ le̩ ne̩ ewo ewo Jair, o̩ma Manasa, owñ chʼe-ki jʼojane̩ Gilead, owñ nʼane̩ Argo̩b, e-ki de̩ Beshan, i chʼewo ewo elile o̩gbo̩ me̩ta, i chenʼaku okoke, ebijeikpa ma du rʼo̩na alaku-wñ);
Ahinadab, o̩ma Ido, ne̩ ugbo Mahanaim;
Ahi-maaz ne̩ Naftali (owñ le̩ ne̩ Basemat, o̩ma So̩lo̩mo̩n, chʼo̩ya ge̩);
Beana o̩ma Hushai ne̩ Ashe̩r kpai Be-alo̩t;
Jiho̩shafat, o̩ma Parua, ne̩ Isakar;
Shimeai, o̩ma Ela, ne̩ Be̩njamin;
Gebe̩r o̩ma Uri nʼojane̩ Gilead, owñ chʼane̩ Siho̩n, onu abo Amo̩r, kpai e-O̩g, onu Beshan; ma chi owñ kate dago ojane̩ le̩.
Abo Juda kpai abo Israe̩l la wewe dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩lanyi ki dʼeti ohimini, abʼuwewe-ma de̩ de̩. Oñ ma jo̩ aje̩ e̩wñ, kpai eñmo̩, kpai iya eche.
Oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n nʼo̩da ojane̩ ojane̩ du akwo o̩lohimini le̩ gbogbo wʼane̩ abo Filistia, gbogbo wa alo̩me̩ Ijipti; abo le̩ kʼe̩wñ ele wa, oñ ma re̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ.
Uje̩wñ So̩lo̩mo̩n ku ma la tene todu o̩jo̩ okate de̩: akpulu omu ki de̩ te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩jo̩, kpai e̩li o̩ka akpulu oli me̩fa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩.

Amokuno̩ ki yoyo chʼe̩gwa, amokuno̩ ku ma ko kwʼoko ije̩ wa la chʼogu, ame̩wño̩re̩ egini la chʼogume̩lu, e-le̩ manyu amabede, kpai amegbi kpai amate̩ kpai amajuwe̩ kpai amidagwo̩ kpai e̩wñ e̩gʼe-le̩ ki yoyo.
Todu owñ nʼo̩da ejʼemi ohimini le̩ chaka, akwo Tifsa gbogbo wa Gaza, amonu du ku ma jʼej emi ohimini le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ: ane̩ la bo̩ ñw u ugbo du lʼo daka.
Oñ abo Juda kpai abo Israe̩l jo̩ e-ma to̩ko̩o̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kwogugu ofe achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ, kpai ofe oli o̩gbaikolo-wñ, akwo Dan gbogbo wa Birshiba, gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku So̩lo̩mo̩n.
So̩lo̩mo̩n la nʼunyi icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji kʼamanya che̩ko̩ ñw u tod o̩ko̩ ogu-wñ, kpai abo ku ma nʼanya icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji.
Oñ abo ku ma ko dago jo̩ le̩ nʼuje̩wñ eko wa todu So̩lo̩mo̩n onu, kpai tod e̩ne̩ du ki awʼitebulu So̩lo̩mo̩n onu, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ne̩ ochu e-wñ; ma je̩ ñw e̩wñ du ki ña ma n.
Ma ño̩ ko o̩ka barli kpai egbe wa o̩mo̩ tod amanya kpai amagema, ma ko wʼugbo ku ma nʼeku-wñ alu ku ma ñwa ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩.
Abe̩le̩ O̩jo̩ dʼibe kpai oji o̩la ema ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n nana tabale, kpai e̩do̩ ki de̩ gbagada, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩lanyi eti ohimini.
Ibe So̩lo̩mo̩n la tʼibe abo o̩wo̩ olodudu le chaka, i ño̩ tʼibe e-abo Ijipti chaka le ge̩.
Todu i nʼibe tʼamone̩ du le; i ne̩ tʼE̩tan e̩ne̩ E̩zra le̩ le, i la ne̩ tu Heman kpai Kalko̩l kpai Darda, amo̩ma Maho̩l, le̩ le: uwohi-wñ la dʼugbo du ef abo uche̩ichi ku ma lʼo daka.
Ita kʼi kpa chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta; eli kʼi la ko̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyoke me̩lu.

I nʼina-bali oli ojoji ojoji aka, i chane̩ kwo oli sida ki jʼoji Le̩bano̩n gbogbo kad oli hiso̩p kʼi atiga o̩la o̩do̩; i ño̩ nʼo̩la ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ aka kpai e-ame̩we̩ kpai e-ame̩wñ ki afa ane̩pe̩te̩ kpai e-ame̩ja ge̩.
Oñ abo iche̩ka kwʼef amone̩ du wa ku ma gbo̩ ibe So̩lo̩mo̩n, kpai kwʼugbo amonu ile̩-i du ki gbo̩ inabali ibe-wñ kʼi ne̩.
Taku Hairam onu Taya fʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ kpuche̩ nyʼugbo So̩lo̩mo̩n; todu i gbo̩ ka ku ma fʼekpo ba tʼowñ oji kʼi jʼonu gugu e̩gu ata-wñ, todu Hairam te̩tefe̩do̩ Defid.
Oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼuche̩ kpe̩ru Hairam kakini,
Uwe̩ chema abu ki Defid, ata-mi, ma neke kʼunyi todu odu Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ n, todu ogu eja ki dʼo̩ o̩la ugbo tʼugbo du, gbogbo taku Jihofa ko ma jʼo̩gane̩ adaba e̩re̩-wñ.
Fa-i Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi la mʼuñmi du ñwu mi ugbo tʼugbo du; i nʼe̩no̩la du kpai e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ki wa che emi ge̩ n.
E̩ la go, u fʼuñwa ef e̩do̩-mi ka kʼu nakʼunyi todu odu Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi, alu ki Jihofa ko̩la ñwu Defid, ata-mi, kakini, O̩ma-we̩, e-kʼu nadu gugu oj ede-we̩ koji we̩, owñ akʼunyi tod odu-mi le̩.

Todule̩ fa-i e̩ naka ku ma fʼoli sida da ñwu mi Le̩bano̩n; abuko̩lo̩-mi la ajo̩ kpʼabuko̩lo̩-we̩; oñ u narʼo̩me̩ ñw e̩ tod abuko̩lo̩-we̩ alu du kʼe̩ ka, todu uwe̩ chema ka ki nʼe̩ne̩ du ef uwa kʼi chʼo̩ka igbo oli ebu dab abo Saido̩n in.
Oñ i lewatu abu ki Hairam gbo o̩la ki So̩lo̩mo̩n ka le̩, i yo̩ nana, oñ i kakini, Jihofa ki nʼele eñini-i, owñ chʼe-ki dʼo̩ma ki nʼibe ñwu Defid kʼamone̩ inaina-i ki jʼefo̩wo̩-wñ.
Taku Hairam fʼuche̩ kpe̩ru So̩lo̩mo̩n kakini, Uche̩ e̩wñ kʼe̩ kpe̩ru mi le̩ u gbo̩ me̩: nache alu du kʼe̩ tene ugbo igbo oli sida le̩ kpai ugbo igbo oli fir ge̩.

Abuko̩lo̩-mi akʼo gwo̩ru kwo Le̩bano̩n wa o̩la ohimini abadi; tak u nafʼigbo igbo oli le̩ tamʼomune̩ ki nʼeju ohimini alo tʼugbo kʼuwe̩ aka ñwu mi, tak u naje̩ ñwu ma fʼu ko̩da bʼomune̩ te̩ o̩mo̩, tak uwe̩ amʼu ko; e̩ kʼuje̩wñ wa tod abo unyi-mi, mak e̩ fʼe̩wñ kʼu natene chekpa me̩.
Abe̩le̩ Hairam mʼigbo oli sida kpai oli fir ko ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n alu du kʼi tene.

Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n mʼe̩ñwa o̩ka wit ko̩r icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu ko ñw Hairam ki chʼuje̩wñ tod abo-wñ, kpai e̩ñwa ekpo ku ma de̩ nyo̩nyo̩ ko̩r ogu, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼigaluwa o̩gwo̩ko̩. Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n ko ñwu Hairam o̩do̩ o̩do̩.
Jihofa la dʼibe ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n alu kʼi katane̩ ñw u; oñ e̩do̩ Hairam kpai So̩lo̩mo̩n bo̩ru omune̩; tak ama meji le̩ fʼalo kpe̩.
Tak onu So̩lo̩mo̩n je̩ ñwu ma chi one̩ uko̩lo̩ kwʼugbo du ojane̩ Israe̩l wa; one̩ kʼi je̩ ñwu ma chi wa ku ma rʼo̩ ire̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa.
Oñ i fʼuma kpe̩ nyi Le̩banon, one̩: icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa nʼochuʼka aro̩ne aro̩ne; ma fʼochuʼka je̩ Le̩bano̩n, taku ma jʼochu meji unyi. Adonai-ram la chʼagboji abo ku ma nʼuko̩lo̩ ire̩ ache le.
Oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n nʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e̩te̩gwa ku ma nʼadu-wñ, kpai one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ ku ma jʼane̩ uwo le̩ ada okuta;
abo le̩ chʼojoji ñw abo ku ma ko dago jo̩ kʼuko̩lo̩ le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-ma, one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta nyʼoli me̩fa nʼo̩da abo ku ma jʼef uko̩lo̩ le̩ ache.
Tak onu ñwa ñwu ma, oñ ma kʼokuta lile kʼaja-wñ chʼe̩kpuna wa, ku ma nʼokuta ku ma da chʼunyane̩ unyi le̩.
Oñ amakʼunyi e-So̩lo̩mo̩n kpai amakʼunyi Hairam kpai abo Ge̩bal chʼabo ku ma da; ma la fʼigbo oli kpai okuta ñwo̩che ku ma ne̩ kʼunyi le̩.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ ulo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l kwʼIjipti wa, owñ chʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ki So̩lo̩mo̩n jʼonu Israe̩l, ochu Zif, kʼi chʼochu ekeji ef o̩do̩, kʼowñ chane̩ ekʼunyi Jihofa le̩.
Oñ ujiji unyi ki So̩lo̩mo̩n onu ko̩ todu Jihofa le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, o̩gba-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogue̩gwa.
Oñ ujiji agbaru ki dʼo̩gba uña e̩gahi unyi le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, alu kʼunabe̩ unyi le̩ de̩; unefu-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa o̩gba unyi.
Oñ i fʼoli iwido che todu unyi le̩ kʼoli-wñ chʼeko̩fi omune̩ da ki chʼe̩gudu jo̩.
Oñ i fʼo̩pata fia nʼoji omune̩ ki dachi nʼo̩do̩ unyi le̩ daka. I lʼunyi e̩gahi kpai uña efo̩ e-efo̩ daka. Oñ i fʼu ko̩da ki chʼunyi unyi lo daka.

Unabe̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, unabe̩ e-ki dʼalumeji chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa, unabe̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ ate̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ mebie; todu i fʼagbamune̩-wñ che kʼi dufu o̩do̩da o̩lʼo̩do̩ le̩ alo daka, todu kʼe̩wñ du ki we egwunyʼo̩do̩ unyi le̩ onugo.
Unyi ku ma ane le̩, ma nʼokuta ku ma ñwo̩che kpa kwef oko ne; ma gbʼiche̩ ihama kpai e̩do̩ kpai e̩wñ ido̩na ebije du abu ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ ane̩ n.
Alugbana unyi ki yamo̩ akolo-wñ alumeji dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ unyi; oñ ma te̩gu agube ki chʼadagbala gbogbo tʼunyi alumeji, ma kwef e-alumeji le̩ tef e̩ke̩ta-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ i kʼunyi le̩, oñ i fʼu kpoji: i la kʼugbo̩lo̩ oli kpai akatakpo oli sida te̩ rʼoji-wñ.
Oñ i fʼunyi ki nʼoji omune̩ le̩ ko̩ yamo̩ o̩lo̩do̩ unyi le̩ du, o̩gba-wñ okoke chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu; agbamune̩-wñ chʼigbo oli sida ki kado unyi le̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo So̩lo̩mo̩n kakini,

I chʼe-unyi kʼuwe̩ ako̩-i iche̩wñ kʼe̩ jʼalule̩ teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, kʼe̩ kʼajo̩ alu kʼomi ñwate̩, kʼe̩ la de uko̩-mi du kʼe̩ lule̩ teju-wñ; mak u naje̩ ñw o̩la-mi lonyane̩ ugbo we̩, owñ chʼe-kʼu ka ñwu Defid ata-we̩
Tak omi agugu ef amo̩ma Israe̩l, u ñʼahi abo-mi Israe̩l tinyo̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼunyi le̩ ko, oñ i fʼu kpoji.
I nʼakatakpo oli sida chʼo̩do̩ unyi le̩ ejefu. Akwʼe̩rane̩ o̩do̩ le̩ gbogbo kad o̩pata-wñ ate̩, i mʼoli ko bʼo ma ejefu; oñ i kʼoli fir bʼajita unyi le̩ ma.
I la nʼakatakpo oli sida ko̩ ohibo̩wo̩ ogu unyi le̩ ejubi, akwʼane̩pe̩te̩-wñ gbogbo wa kad o̩pata-wñ ate̩; i la fʼu ko̩ ejefu-wñ abe̩le̩, kʼi chʼunyi ejefu kʼi chʼuña kiafo̩ e-efo̩ le̩.
Oñ unyi le̩, owñ chʼunyi e̩gahi ejo̩gba-wñ, chʼohibo̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji.
Oli sida ki bʼejefu unyi le̩ ma chʼe̩kina dab e̩rʼugba kpai ododo; oli sida i che chaka; ma li okuta-wñ du n.
Oñ i fʼuña kiafo̩ ñwo̩che alumeji unyi ejefu le̩, kʼi dʼakpati alo Jihofa gugu o̩mo̩.

Ujiji ejefu uña kiafo̩ le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, o̩gba-wñ laño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu ge̩; tak i mʼo̩jamalia hiolo ko gamʼo̩ oñ i ño̩ ko gamʼo̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku ma nʼoli sida che ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼo̩jamalia hiolo gamʼejefu unyi le̩, oñ i mʼiyagba o̩jamalia ko kofi o̩gba uña kiafo̩ le̩ da; i la mʼo̩jamalia ko gamʼo̩.
Abe̩le̩ i kʼo̩jamalia gamʼo̩lʼunyi le̩ chaka gbogbo taku ma fʼuko̩lo̩ unyi le̩ chekpa; i ño̩ kʼo̩jamalia gamʼo̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-uña kiafo̩ le̩ chaka ge̩.
Tak i nʼoli o̩lif fʼiche̩rub meji gbe̩ ef uña kiafo̩ le̩, o̩gba-wñ mejeji chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa.
Ika che̩rub o̩wo̩ ʼka la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, ika-wñ o̩wo̩ ekeji chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu ge̩; akwo otitala ika-wñ o̩wo̩ʼka tʼotitala ika-wñ o̩wo̩ ekeji chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa.
Che̩rub ekeji laño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa ge̩. E̩ñwa iche̩rub meji le̩ chʼoka, alu kʼo̩la-wñ mejeji le̩ de̩ la chʼoka.
O̩gba che̩rub oka chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa, abe̩le̩ che̩rub ekeji de̩ ge̩.
Tak i mʼiche̩rub le̩ ko jʼef unyi ejefu le̩; ika iche̩rub la chenadala, todu kʼikaʼka ki kad o̩do̩ʼka, kʼika che̩rub ekeji la kad o̩do̩ ekeji; ika-ma la kad omune̩ alumeji unyi le̩.
Oñ i kʼo̩jamalia wenyʼiche̩rub meji le̩ o̩la.
I la fʼina ko̩ nyu o̩lo̩do̩ unyi le̩ du daka, ejefu-wñ kpai ejo̩do̩da-wñ, ina-wñ chʼuwo̩li iche̩rub, kpai oli ki dab e̩kpe, kpai ododo ki mutu.
I la mʼo̩jamalia ko bʼajita unyi le̩ ma, tʼejefu, tʼejo̩do̩da.
Oñ i nʼoli olif chʼolugbana tod alu o̩na unyi kiafo̩ le̩: oli afida ate̩ alugbana kpai oli akolo-wñ chʼukpe̩re̩lu-wñ.

Oli o̩lif oñ i ne̩ che o̩lugbana meji; oñ i fʼina iche̩rub kpai oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ kpai ododo ki mutu ko̩ nyʼu, tak i kʼo̩jamalia gamʼo̩la-wñ; oñ i mʼo̩jamalia ko nadala bʼo̩la iche̩rub kpai oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩ ma.
Abe̩le̩ i ño̩ ne̩ oli o̩lif che oli alugbana unyi e̩gahi onugo, owñ chʼukpe̩re̩le̩-wñ;
kpai olugbana oli fir meji: olugbana-wñ oka chʼe̩kpana meji kʼi aguche̩ nʼo̩la-wñ, oñ e̩kpana olugbana ekeji le̩ aguche̩ nʼo̩la-wñ ge̩.
Tak i fʼina iche̩rub kpai oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ kpʼododo ki mutu ko nyʼu; oñ i kʼo̩jamalia gamʼo̩, i fʼu ka tunyʼina-wñ.
Tak i nʼokuta ku ma da ne anuku, o̩gba okuta me̩ta nʼoji omune̩, tak igbo oli sida mud o̩gba omune̩ noji e-le̩.
Ma la fʼe̩re̩ unyi Jihofa nyane̩ ef ochu Zif, o̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩.
Oñ o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwaka, ochu Bul, owñ chʼochu e̩ke̩jo̩, ma fʼuko̩lo̩ unyi le̩ che kpa kpai e̩ko̩da-wñ chaka, teju alu du ku ma ñwa te̩. Abe̩le̩ i dʼef unyi le̩ eko̩ o̩do̩ mebie.
So̩lo̩mo̩n la dʼef unyi e-wñ onugo eko̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩ta, abe̩le̩ i fʼuko̩lo̩ unyi-wñ chekpa.

Todu i nʼoli kwʼef oko Le̩bano̩n kʼunyi-wñ le̩: ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje, o̩gba-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogue̩gwa, i tane̩ oji oli sida ku ma ko che oli urane̩-wñ o̩gba o̩gba me̩le̩, igbo oli sida la nʼoji oli urane̩-wñ le̩.
Taku ma fʼoli sida te̩ru oji igbo oli o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu ki nʼoji oli urane̩ le̩: o̩gbaʼka-wñ chʼe̩gwe̩lu.
Tak igbo oli jo̩ o̩gba o̩gba me̩ta, ope-wñ la chʼaro̩ne omune̩ o̩gba o̩gba me̩ta.
Ma nʼoli ku ma fa ago̩go̩ me̩le̩ chʼolugbana-wñ chaka kpai oli ugbogaga-wñ, igbo oli ma ne̩ che. Ope-wñ la kpejurʼope o̩gba o̩gba me̩ta.

Tak i mʼoli urane̩ ko chʼagbaru-wñ; ujiji-wñ la chʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ ooje, unabe̩-wñ la chʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ ogue̩gwa; tak i nʼagbaru ej o̩gba e-le̩; oñ ma ko oli urane̩ dago jʼej o̩gba e-le̩ ge̩, oñ i fʼubo̩ alugbana ne o̩mo̩.
Tak i fʼatakpa ugbo kʼi akpʼede kʼi akajo̩ ko̩, owʼñ chʼatakpa ajo̩: oñ ma kʼoli sida bʼo̩la-wñ ma akwo ajita-wñ o̩gane̩ kad o̩pata-wñ ate̩.

Tak unyi-wñ ugbo kʼi ache kʼi gugu owñ chʼanuku ekeji ejefu atakpa le̩, ma che uko̩lo̩ e-le̩ abe̩le̩ ge̩. I ño̩ fʼunyi ko̩ tod o̩ma Fero (owñ chʼe-ki So̩lo̩mo̩n ne̩ chʼo̩ya), e-le̩ dab atakpa le̩ ge̩.

Ma kʼokuta kʼalaja-wñ chʼe̩kpuna ne e̩wñ-i du, owñ chʼokuta ku ma da, e-ku ma fuñwa ojoji ojoji, ma nʼiso̩ le, tʼejefu, tʼejo̩do̩da-wñ, akwo e̩re̩-wñ gbogbo kad okuta ki kpʼoji-wñ ate̩; abe̩le̩ i de̩ ejo̩do̩da ge̩ gbogbo wa ologbo lile.
Okuta udane̩-wñ ño̩ chenʼo̩ko̩ nana, okuta-wñ chʼelilelile. I nʼokuta ki chʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa, i ño̩ nʼokuta ki chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩jo̩ ge̩.
Oji-wñ ate̩ laño̩ chʼokuta ki nʼo̩ko̩ nana ge̩, okuta ku ma da e̩ñwa e̩ñwa i che, kpai oli sida.
Oñ ologbo lile ki lʼo daka chʼokuta ku ma da ku ma ne nʼoji omune̩ o̩gba o̩gba me̩ta, oñ o̩gba-wñ oka chʼigbo oli sida, i dab anuku unyi Jihofa kpai agbaru unyi le̩.
Tak onu So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ adu Hairam kwo Taya wa.

Owñ chʼo̩ma o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ kʼi chʼabo o̩lo̩pu Naftali, ata-wñ la chʼe̩ne̩ Taya, e̩ne̩ ki ache uko̩lo̩ ebijeikpa i che; ibe kpai oji e̩wñ ema kpai o̩ka uko̩lo̩ eche chʼe̩kʼefu-wñ, i ache uko̩lo̩ du ku ma nʼebijeikpa che. Oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ lewa ugbo So̩lo̩mo̩n onu, i la fʼuko̩lo̩-wñ che chaka.
Todu owñ nʼebijeikpa chʼebije meji ki dago waala, o̩gbaʼka-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩: iku ki chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gweji tak i alʼoka-wñ daka. Ejeji-wñ chʼokujo̩.
Tak i nʼebijeikpa da ukata meji kʼi du gugu oj e̩wñ ebijeikpa meji ki dago waala le̩; o̩gba ukata oka chʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, o̩gba ukata ekeji laño̩ chʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ me̩lu ge̩.
E̩wñ ki dab iga jʼo̩mo̩, kpai iyagba ku ma ko chʼo̩ñwe̩ nyʼu, todu ukata ki jʼoji ebije ki dago waala le̩: ebie chʼutodu ukataʼka, ebie la chʼutodu ukata ekeji.
Abe̩le̩ i fʼebije ki dago waala le̩ che; oñ i fʼo̩gba po̩me̩grane̩t meji chenyʼoj iga kʼi bʼoji ukata kʼi nʼoji ebije ki dago waala le̩ ma; abe̩le̩ i ño̩ che todu ukata ekeji ge̩.
Oñ ma che uko̩lo̩ ukata ki bʼoji ebije ki dago waala le̩ ef agbaru le̩ ma kʼi dabu odo-do ku ma do̩ ko̩ lili, i chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩.
Oñ ukata ukata ño̩ nʼoji ebije ki dago waala meji le̩ ate̩, ame̩ru ugbo efu-wñ kʼiga le̩ yamo̩: oñ po̩me̩grane̩t ki lʼukata ekeji le̩ daka o̩gba o̩gba chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩.

Tak i mʼe̩wñ ebije ekpikpa waala le̩ ko dago ugbo agbaru unyi e̩gahi le̩; i la dʼebije waala e-o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ dago, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jakin, tak i dʼebije waala e-o̩wo̩ awohi dago, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Boaz.
Ma che uko̩lo̩ oj ebije ki dago waala le̩ dabu ododo lili ge̩; abe̩le̩ taku ma fʼuko̩lo̩ ebije ki dago waala le̩ chekpa.
Tak i fʼebije da kʼomi agba gu ef uwñ; akwo alu-wñ ejemi tʼejano̩mo̩-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa, i chʼokokolo, o̩gba-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu; iku ki alʼo̩ de chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogue̩gwa.

Tak o̩gane̩ eti-wñ ki kama le̩, ikoko ne daka, e̩gwa-wñ jʼef ohibo̩wo̩ʼka, abe̩le̩ ma le e̩gbagu omi le̩ daka, ikoko le̩ chʼo̩gba o̩gba meji, ma fʼu da manyʼu e̩gba ku ma da onugo e̩wñ e̩gbagu omi le̩.

E-le̩ nʼubi amokuno̩ me̩gweji, okuno̩ me̩ta kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, e̩ta-wñ la kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olane̩, e̩ta-wñ kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, e̩ta-wñ la kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu; taku ma du e̩wñ e̩gbagu omi le̩ nʼuma ubi, ofe-ma chaka jʼejefu.
Ukpa-wñ chʼadaba o̩wo̩ʼka; ma fʼuko̩lo̩ eti-wñ che dab eti ago, dabe̩ne̩ kʼeli ododo lili; i aje̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼotube̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji.
Tak i nʼebijeikpa che o̩ka me̩gwa; ujiji o̩kaʼka chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩, o̩gba-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩ta.
Alu kʼuko̩lo̩ o̩ka-wñ le̩ la de̩ de̩: i chenʼe̩wñ ki yamo̩ iba-wñ lale; e̩wñ ki yamo̩ le̩ tʼagbagba ukpa ku ma bu tʼeti-wñ ate̩ kpai o̩gane̩;

oñ amidu kpai amokuno̩ kpai amiche̩rub jʼo̩la e̩wñ ki yamo̩ iba-wñ ki tʼagbagba ukpa eti-wñ le̩; oñ ma fʼe̩wñ che dab akete oj ukpa eti-wñ ate̩; tak o̩gane̩ amidu kpai amokuno̩ ma fʼe̩wñ kʼuko̩lo̩-wñ dab iyagba che lo̩ko̩li lʼo̩la-wñ daka.

O̩ka-wñ okoka le̩ nʼo̩da me̩le̩ ku ma nʼebije ekpikpa che; ebije ugbadu ne̩ ki tunyʼo̩da-wñ chʼebijeikpa ge̩. E̩re̩-wñ me̩le̩ ne̩ o̩papata ojika. Ma fʼika-wñ le̩ damanyʼu ofe ukpachi ugwo̩wo̩, iyagba jʼo̩la-wñ okoke lale.

Oñ unabe̩ alu-wñ ef ukata-wñ kpai ate̩-wñ le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka; ma la fʼalu-wñ che okokolo dabe̩ne̩ kʼakete okokolo ku ma kʼe̩wñ no, ohibo̩wo̩ʼka kpai ukpe̩reji; alu-wñ ño̩ chʼe̩kina ge̩, iba-wñ la chʼago̩go̩ me̩le̩, e-le̩ ño̩ chʼokokolo ge̩ n.
O̩da-wñ me̩le̩ la jʼo̩gane̩ iba-wñ le̩; iwili o̩da-wñ la tunyʼofe-wñ: o̩gba o̩da le̩ oka chʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka kpai ukpe̩reji.
Uko̩lo̩ o̩da le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼuko̩lo̩ o̩da o̩ko̩ogu, ugbo̩lo̩-wñ, kpai fo̩m, kpʼiwili-wñ, kpai o̩da-wñ chʼuko̩lo̩ o̩na eda.
O̩papata ojika me̩le̩ la jo̩ ago̩go̩ me̩le̩ o̩ka o̩ka le̩: o̩papata ojika-wñ chʼe̩re̩ʼka kpai o̩ka onugo.
Ugele-wñ okokolo ne oj o̩ka le̩ kʼo̩gba-wñ chʼukpe̩re-ji ohibo̩wo̩; agbamune̩ e̩wñ ki jʼoji o̩ka le̩ kpʼiba-wñ chʼe̩re̩ oka kpai owñ.
Tak i fʼamiche̩rub kpai amidu kpai oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ kina nyʼo̩la alo agbamune̩-wñ le̩, kpai iba-wñ lale, alu kʼoka oka-wñ nʼuña, oñ iyagba iyagba lʼo daka.
Alu kʼi che oka me̩gwa le̩ de̩: i fʼo̩chaka-wñ da e̩re̩ onu kate, e̩ñwa-wñ chʼe̩re̩ʼka, o̩la-wñ la chʼe̩re̩ʼka ge̩.
Tak i nʼebije ekpikpa che ukpachi ugwo̩wo̩ me̩gwa: ukpachi-wñ oka aje̩ otube̩ o̩gbo̩ meji; ukpachi ugwo̩wo̩ le̩ okoka chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩; ukpachi ugwo̩wo̩ le̩ la nʼoji o̩ka me̩gwa le̩ okoka lale.

Tak i mʼo̩ka me̩lu ko dago o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ unyi le̩, oñ o̩ka-wñ me̩lu i ko jʼo̩wo̩ awohi unyi le̩ ge̩; tak i mʼe̩wñ e̩gbagu omi le̩ du gugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ unyi le̩, o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ me̩ru o̩pata o̩gane̩.
Hairam la fʼukpachi ugwo̩wo̩ kpai uko̩che̩ kpai ochibu-wñ che. Abe̩le̩ Hairam fʼuko̩lo̩ du kʼi ache tod onu So̩lo̩mo̩n ef unyi Jihofa le̩ che kpoji;
ebije ki dago waala meji le̩, kpai ugba meji todu ukata ki jʼoji ebije ki dago waala le̩; kpai uko̩lo̩ ku ma che dab iga meji le̩ kʼi bʼoji ugba ukata ki jʼoj ebije ki dago waala meji le̩ ma;
kpai po̩me̩grane̩t ulo̩ko̩ todu iga meji le̩; po̩me̩grane̩t jʼo̩la igaʼka o̩gba o̩gba ugbo meji, todu kʼi bʼoji ugba ukata meji ki jʼoji ebijeikpa ki dago waala le̩ ma;
kpai o̩ka me̩gwa le̩, kpai ukpachi ugwo̩wo̩ me̩gwa ki nʼoji o̩ka le̩;
kpai e̩wñ e̩gbagu omi oka le̩, kpʼamokuno̩ me̩gweji ki jʼofe e̩wñ e̩gbagu omi le̩.
Ucha-wñ kpʼuko̩che̩-wñ kpʼochibu-wñ, e̩wñ eku le̩ du e-ki Hairam che todu So̩lo̩mo̩n onu ef unyi Jihofa chʼebije ekpikpa ku ma gwe̩ hiolo.
Onu fʼo̩na e̩wñ le̩ du da egbili Jo̩rdan, ane̩ etulu ki dʼagbagba Suko̩t kpai Zaretan.
So̩lo̩mon la tʼe̩wñ eku le̩ eñwa go no̩, todabu kʼi wewe tabale. Ma la tejane̩ alu kʼuwoji ebijeikpa-wñ de̩ n.
So̩lo̩mo̩n la fʼe̩wñ eku du ki jʼef unyi Jihofa le̩ che: ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ o̩jamalia le̩, kpʼitebulu ku ma kʼakala eju jʼoji-wñ, o̩jamalia abʼe-le̩ che;
kpʼakete agege le̩, e̩lu jʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩, e̩lu la jʼo̩wo̩ awohi, o̩gba uña kiafo̩ le̩, o̩jamalia hiolo e-le̩ che; kpʼododo-wñ, kpʼagege-wñ, kpʼalapa-wñ, chʼo̩jamalia;

kpʼagowñ kpʼe̩wñ ku ma ne̩ kpʼuna-wñ lu kpʼochibu-wñ kpʼuko̩de̩-wñ kpʼaido-wñ, e-le̩ chʼo̩jamalia hiolo; kpʼukodo-wñ, tʼe-ki chʼutodu olugbana unyi ejefu, uña kiafo̩ e-efo̩ le̩, kpai todu olugbana unyi, ki chʼunyi e̩gahi onugo, e-o̩jamalia i che.

Abe̩le̩ uko̩lo̩ du ku So̩lo̩mo̩n onu che ef unyi Jihofa takpa. Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n mʼe̩wñ du ki Defid, ata-wñ che ki fo̩ le̩ ko wa, ajifa kpʼo̩jamalia le̩ kpʼe̩wñ eku-wñ, oñ i mʼu ko jʼef o̩pata unyi ef unyi Jihofa le̩.

Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼabogijo Israe̩l kpai amuto̩gba o̩lo̩pu, o̩lo̩pu, owñ chʼamidachi ef amata amo̩ma Israe̩l, jeju ugbo So̩lo̩mo̩n onu. Je̩rusale̩m, kʼama ki dʼakpati alo Jihofa kwef ewo Defid, Zayo̩n, wa.
Oñ aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka kʼo̩la-ma wa jeju ugbo So̩lo̩mo̩n onu ugbo uje̩wñ uyo̩ ochu E̩tanim, owñ chʼochu e̩kebie.
Oñ abogijo Israe̩l chaka lewa, tak amata-ma mʼakpati le̩ du.
Oñ ma dʼakpati Jihofa le̩ wa, kpai unyabo ujeju, kpai e̩wñ eku kiafo̩ chaka ki jʼef unyabo le̩; e̩wñ le̩ amatama kpai abo Lifai muko wa.
Oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n onu kpai abo̩gbadu Israe̩l chaka, ku ma jeju wʼugbo-wñ le̩, jo̩ kpʼowñ o̩gba akpati le̩ akpa ame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpai amokuno̩ ku ma ma neke kʼaluka uwewe-ma n, ma la neke lo dama n.
Tak amatama dʼakpati alo Jihofa wʼuña-wñ ef uña e̩gahi unyi le̩, tef uña kiafo̩ e-efo̩, owñ chʼofe ika amiche̩rub le̩.
Todu amiche̩rub nʼika-ma dala oji uña akpati le̩, oñ amiche̩rub le̩ bʼoji akpati le̩ kpai oli ugbo̩lo̩-wñ ate̩ ma.
Oñ ujiji oli ugbo̩lo̩-wñ je̩ ñwu ma li oji-wñ ef uña kiafo̩ ki dʼo̩gba uña e̩gahi le̩: ma muda ali o̩do̩da n. O̩mo̩ i la jo̩ tʼeñini.
E̩wñ du la dʼef akpati le̩ n, chai alo okuta meji ku Mose̩s ko jʼo̩mo̩ Ho̩re̩b le̩, owñ chʼe̩gba ki Jihofa kpʼalo kpai amo̩ma Israe̩l, e̩gba ku ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa le̩.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼamatama kwʼef uña kiafo̩ dufu, kʼakpa le̩ che̩ko̩ ef unyi Jihofa,
abe̩le̩ amatama la neke dago ache e̩wñ-ma n, todu akpa le̩: todu ojima Jihofa che̩ko̩ ef unyi Jihofa.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n ko̩la kakini,
Omi la fʼunyi ugbo kʼe̩ dodo ef uwñ i ko̩ ñw e̩ ochochi,
Tak onu mʼeju-wñ rida oñ i kadua ñw abo ujeju Israe̩l le̩ chaka: oñ abo ujeju Israe̩l chaka kwodago.
Tak i kakini, Jihofa ki nʼele, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l e-ki nʼalu-wñ ko̩la ñw ata-mi Defid, kʼi laño̩ nʼo̩wo̩-wñ che alu kʼi ka, kakini,

Akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼu kʼamone̩-mi Israe̩l kwʼIjipti dufu omi dʼewoʼku ef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l du kʼu ko̩ unyi o̩mo̩ n, todu kʼodu-mi ki dʼugbo le̩ n; u rnuda chi Defid kʼamone̩-mi Israe̩l-i ki jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ.
I la dʼef e̩do̩ Defid, ata-mi kʼi kʼunyi tod odu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l.
Ama Jihofa ka ñwu Defid, ata-mi, kakini, Abu kʼi dʼef e̩do̩-we̩ kʼe̩ kʼunyi tod odu-mi le̩, o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩ che todubu kʼi dʼe̩do̩-we̩ le̩.
I muda chʼuwe̩ akʼunyi le̩ n; chai o̩ma-we̩ kʼi akwʼef uta-we̩ dufu, owñ le̩ akʼunyi tod odu-mi.
Jihofa la che teju o̩la kʼi ka le̩ me̩; todu omi kwane̩ e̩gu Defid, ata-mi, u la gugu oj ede Israe̩l alu ki Jihofa katane̩ le̩; u la fʼunyi le̩ ko̩ todu odu Jihofa, ki chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l.
O̩mo̩ le̩ omi la bʼuña ukpati-wñ te̩, owñ chʼe-kʼalo Jihofa kʼi kpe̩ kpai amata-wa e̩gba kʼi ko ma kwʼIjipti dufu le̩ dʼef uwñ.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n kwodago o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa eju abo ujeju Israe̩l chaka, oñ i fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala rʼo̩wo̩ efojale;

tak i kakini, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, O̩jo̩ du ki dab uwe̩ efojale ate̩ kpai ile̩ o̩gane̩-i do̩mo̩ n; uwe̩ kʼe̩ de alo kʼe̩ kpe̩ kpʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ugbo amadu-we̩ ku ma lule̩ o̩gba-we̩ kpai e̩do̩-ma chaka,
uwe̩ kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ katane̩ ñw adu-we̩ Defid ata-mi de: ochochi, uwe̩ nʼalu-we̩ ko̩la, tak e̩ nʼo̩wo̩-we̩ che teju-wñ alu ki de̩ eñini-i.

Todule̩, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, e̩ nafʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ katane̩ ñw u le̩ de ñwʼadu-we̩ Defid, ata-mi, kakini, One̩ kʼi agugu oj ede Israe̩l, añʼuwe̩ o̩gba-mi n; amo̩ma-we̩ ki nago o̩na ku ma le dee, kʼama ki lule̩ o̩gba-mi alu kʼe̩ te̩te̩lule̩ o̩gba-mi le̩.
Todule̩ fa-i, O O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, o̩la-we̩ le̩ ki lonyane̩, owñ chʼe-kʼe̩ ka ñw adu-we̩ Defid, ata-mi le̩.
Ama O̩jo̩ jʼadodo ile̩-i, ochochi? Go, efojale kpai efojale e-efojale neke gbʼuwe̩ n; e̩wñ chʼe-unyi kʼu ko̩-i ge̩!
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ e̩ nadejute̩ adua adu-we̩, kpai ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kʼi abi. O Jihofa, O̩jo̩-mi, kʼe̩ nanetiru aku kpai adua e-kʼadu-we̩ ache o̩gba-we̩ eñini-i;
kʼeju-we̩ ki kparʼo̩wo̩ unyi-i odu kpai o̩ro̩ka, owñ chʼuña ugbo kʼuwe̩ kakini, Odu-mi adʼugbo kide̩; kʼuwe̩ ki netiru adua kʼadu-we̩-i ache rʼo̩wo̩ uña kide̩.

Kʼe̩ la netirʼebi kʼadu-we̩-i bi ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ugbo we̩, kpʼe-amone̩-we̩ Israe̩l e̩gba ku ma chʼadua rʼo̩wo̩ uña kide̩: ochochi uwe̩ ki gbo̩ ef efojale ugbo kʼe̩ dodo le̩; tak e̩gba kʼe̩ gbo̩, e̩ to̩no̩ chʼuwa ele.
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ dʼekeji-wñ re, ku ma je̩ ñw u go̩, kʼi fʼO̩jo̩ kpenʼo̩la-wñ, kʼego̩ kʼi go̩ le̩ wʼo̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-we̩ ef unyi-i;

mak uwe̩ ki gbo̩ efojale, kʼe̩ che, kʼe̩ la kajo̩ amadu-we̩, kʼe̩ fʼe̩ne̩bibi le̩ kpabi, owñ chʼe̩wñ kʼi che edudabi abʼowñ onugo oji ma, kʼe̩ la fʼale da ñw e̩no̩kpakpa, kʼe̩ du ñw u teju alu kʼo̩kpakpa-wñ de̩.

E̩gba kʼame̩nebi-ma chane̩ egwʼamone̩-we̩ Israe̩l dajane̩, todabu ku ma du we̩ re; iche̩wñ ku ma ño̩ mudabi abʼuwe̩, ku ma la gogbododu-we̩, ku ma chʼadua ku ma la bi ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ugbo we̩ ef unyi kide̩;
tak uwe̩ ki gbo̩ efojale le̩, kʼe̩ la tʼadure amone̩-we̩ Israe̩l no̩ kʼe̩ la ko ma dabi wʼoj ane̩ e-kʼe̩ du ñw amata-ma le̩.
E̩gba kʼojale re, kʼomi ma ño̩ lo̩ ge̩ n, tod edure ku ma du we̩ re; iche̩wñ ku ma chʼadua rʼo̩wo̩ uña kide̩, ku ma la gogbodʼodu-we̩, ku ma rida bʼadure-ma le̩ te̩, abu kʼe̩ che ma o̩bata;

mak uwe̩ ki gbo̩ efojale le̩, kʼe̩ tʼadure amadu-we̩ no̩, owñ chʼamone̩-we̩ Israe̩l-i, e̩gba kʼe̩ ko̩ ma o̩na e-ki nyo̩ ki dukpe̩ ku ma le; kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw omi ki lo̩ abʼane̩-we̩ ma, owñ chʼe-kʼe̩ du ñw amone̩-we̩ ki mud e̩wñ ogu-ma.

Iche̩wñ kʼukpo̩ta akpa ane̩-i, iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ ki akpʼo̩je̩ bie̩ do̩mo, iche̩wñ kʼoka mud ebibi, abe̩k ido abe̩k imiejo abe̩k ide̩ do̩mo̩; iche̩wñ kʼe̩nebi-ma kpala nyʼuma ef ewo-ma; e̩wñ ibi du kpai o̩ga du ki do̩mo̩;
adua du abe̩k ebi ufe̩de̩nyo̩ du kʼe̩ne̩ du ef uma che, abe̩k e-kʼabo-we̩ Israe̩l du che, e̩ne̩ du ki che kʼi ma alu kʼe̩wñ ibi e̩do̩ e-wñ de̩, kʼi fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala rʼo̩wo̩ unyi-i:

mak uwe̩ ki gbo̩ efojale ugbo kʼe̩ gugu le̩, kʼe̩ tʼo̩ no̩ ñwu ma, kʼe̩ fuche, kʼe̩ la du ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ teju alu kʼo̩na-wñ kʼi le de̩, uwe̩ chema alu kʼe̩do̩-wñ de̩; todu uwe̩, uwe̩ kate, chema ef e̩do̩ amo̩ma amone̩ chaka;
kʼama ki railo we̩ o̩jo̩ du ku ma deju oj ane̩ e-kʼuwe̩ du ñw amata-wa-i.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, ugbo o̩la ononojo, kʼi ma dʼef abo-we̩ Israe̩l in, e̩gba kʼi kwʼane̩ o̩najiji dufu wa tod odu-we̩,
todu ama agbo̩ uwohi odu-we̩ inaina, kpai e̩wñ o̩wo̩-we̩ ki gbiti, kpai o̩wo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ nadala te̩; e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ abe̩le̩ lewa kʼi chʼadua rʼo̩wo̩ unyi-i,

uwe̩ ki gbo̩ efojale ugbo kʼe̩ gugu le̩, kʼe̩ la che teju alu du kʼononojo le̩ araku dʼe̩ todu-wñ; todu kʼamone̩ ile̩ du ki ma odu-we̩, kʼama ki railo we̩, alu kʼabo-we̩ Israe̩l ache, todu kʼama ki ño̩ ma ka kʼunyi kʼu ko̩-i ma du rʼodu-we̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼabo-we̩ anyʼoko ogu ku ma jogu bʼame̩nebi-ma lʼo̩na du kʼuwe̩ akpe̩ ma lelo, kʼama chʼadua ñwu Jihofa rʼo̩wo̩ ewo kʼe̩ du-i, kpai arʼo̩wo̩ unyi e-kʼu ko̩ tod odu-we̩-i:
mak uwe̩ ki gbo̩ adua-ma kpai ebi ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ku ma bi efojale kʼe̩ gbʼomu-ma ka.

Iche̩wñ ku ma dʼuwe̩ re (todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki ma adure n), kʼe̩ we̩do̩ bʼuma, kʼe̩ la mʼuma ko jʼef o̩wo̩ e̩nebi-ma, ku ma fʼuma mu lelo tʼane̩ e̩nebi le̩, i chaka chʼo̩najiji abe̩k i chaka chʼanane̩;
iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ ku ma che gwunyʼuma e̩do̩ ane̩ ugbo ku ma mu ma lelo le̩ ku ma ribeda, ku ma bi uwe̩ ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ane̩ abo ki mu ma lelo le̩, kakini, A dure me̩, a la fʼudu fe̩, a fʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ che;

iche̩wñ ku ma murida abʼe̩ kpai e̩do̩-ma kpai onugo-ma chaka ane̩ ame̩nebi-ma le̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma fʼuma mu lelo le̩, ku ma la chʼadua ñw e̩ rʼo̩wo̩ ane̩-ma, owñ chʼe-kʼe̩ du ñw amata-ma, ewo kʼe̩ du-i, kpai unyi e-kʼu ko̩ tod odu-we̩-i;
mak e̩gba le̩ uwe̩ ki gbo̩ adua-ma kpai ebi ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ku ma bi, efojale ugbo kʼe̩ dodo le̩ kʼe̩ gbʼomu-ma ka;
kʼe̩ to̩no̩ ñw amone̩-we̩ ku ma dʼuwe̩ re le̩, kpai ena ku ma na bʼe̩ te̩; kʼe̩ che ku ma mud ame̩nejumomi eju abo ku ma mu ma lelo le̩, kʼama ki li ma ejumomi
(todu abo-we̩ ma che, kpai e̩wñ ogu-we̩, e-kʼe̩ ko kwʼIjipti wa, owñ chʼakwʼalumeji aido ebije le̩)
todu kʼeju-we̩ ki bi rʼadu-we̩ e̩gba kʼi abiebi ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai tʼabo-we̩ Israe̩l e̩gba ku ma biebi ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ge̩, kʼuwe̩ ki netirʼuma e̩gba du ku ma raku dʼuwe̩.
Todu uwe̩ fʼuma date̩ bʼabo ile̩ du te̩, kʼama ki mud e̩wñ ogu-we̩, alu kʼe̩ ka lugbo Mose̩s adu-we̩, e̩gba kʼe̩ kʼamata-wa kwʼIjipti dufu wa le̩, O Ondu Jihofa.

Oñ i lewatu, abu ki So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼoji adua kʼi che-i kpai ebi ufede̩nyo̩ kʼi abi ugbo Jihofa-i du kpa, i kwane̩ kwʼo̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa, owñ chʼugbo kʼi kʼokuku-wñ nyʼane̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ chenadala rʼe̩wo̩ efojale le̩.
Tak i kwodago, oñ i chʼomu-wñ nyʼate̩ akadua ñw abo ujeju Israe̩l le̩ chaka, kakini,
Jihofa ki nʼele, owñ ki mʼuñmi du ñw amone̩-wñ Israe̩l teju alu du kʼi katane̩ le̩; ef o̩la e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ kʼi katane̩ i nʼokate ki chi tinyo̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi katane̩ lugbo Mose̩s, adu-wñ.
Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, ki dʼugbo wa, alu kʼi dʼugbo amata-wa i ki kwo bʼuwa te̩ n, i ki la hi uwa tinyo̩ n:
todu kʼi mʼe̩do̩-wa rida tʼugbo-wñ, kʼawa ki lule̩ o̩na o̩na-wñ du, kʼa fʼuko̩-wñ, kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ, kpai oji ajo̩ kʼi dute̩ de, owñ chʼe-kʼi ñwa ñw amata-wa le̩.
Oñ o̩la-mi e-kʼu ne̩ bi ufe̩de̩nyo̩ o̩gba Jihofa-i, ki name̩ru Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, o̩ro̩ka kpai odu, todu kʼi gbʼomu adu-wñ kpʼomu amone̩-wñ, Israe̩l ka, alu kʼeku-wñ aku o̩jo̩ du;
todu kʼuche̩uche̩ amone̩ ojoji ojoji du ile̩ ki ma ka ki Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩; i nʼomune̩ n.
Todule̩ e̩do̩-me̩ ki nachʼokpoko ugbo Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa, ku me̩ lule̩ teju uhio̩me̩-wñ, ku me̩ la de̩ uko̩-wñ, alu ku me̩ che eñini-i.
Tak onu kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka manyʼuwñ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa o̩gba Jihofa ache.

Oñ e̩wñ ki So̩lo̩mo̩n ko wa chʼiche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi ko wa che ñwu Jihofa, chʼamokuno̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogu nyoke meji, kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩fa. Abe̩le̩ onu kpʼamo̩ma Israe̩l chaka bi o̩na unyi Jihofa le̩.

O̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩ onu fʼalumeji ologbo kʼi dʼo̩gba unyi Jihofa le̩ che kʼi fo̩; todu o̩mo̩ oñ i kʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa che kpai e̩wñ ele, kpai ula e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩, todabu kʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku ma nʼebijeikpa che e-ki dʼo̩gba Jihofa le̩ nyarʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kpai e̩wñ ele, kpai ula iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ e̩gba.

Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ le̩ hi iko le̩, abo Israe̩l chaka la jʼugbo-wñ, ujeju-wñ tabale akwʼugbo ku ma gudu wa Hamat gbogbo wa aji Ijipti, ma jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa, o̩jo̩ mebie meji, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ me̩gwe̩le.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ i je̩ ñw amone̩ kwʼo̩mo̩; ma la kadua ñw onu, oñ ma nʼuyo̩ kpai e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ alo tʼunyabo-ma todu e̩nyo̩ du ki Jihofa du ña Defid, adu-wñ, kpai abo-wñ Israe̩l ge̩.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ki So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼunyi Jihofa ko̩ kpa kpai unyi onu kpai e̩wñ du ki dʼe̩do̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n ki nyʼo̩ eju kʼi che,
taku Jihofa kwotejugede ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n onukeji, alu kʼi tejugede ñw u Gibeo̩n, le̩.

Oñ Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, U gbo̩ adua kʼe̩ che, kpai ebi ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ bi o̩gba-mi-i; omi fʼunyi kʼuwe̩ ko̩-i che ki fo̩, kʼu dʼodu-mi tʼo̩mo̩ ogbegbele̩; oñ eju-mi kpai e̩do̩-mi akadʼo̩mo̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
I la chʼuwe̩, iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ jʼalule̩ o̩gba-mi, alu ki Defid ata-we̩ le le̩ kpai e̩do̩ foo, kpai o̩kpakpa, todu kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ du kʼu ñwa ñw e̩ che, kʼe̩ la fʼuhio̩me̩-mi de, kpʼoji ajo̩ kʼu dute̩;
mak u nache kʼede ojane̩-we̩ ki lonyane̩ kʼamugbe̩-we̩ ki gugu oji-wñ ku ma nʼo̩da Israe̩l ogbegbele̩ teju alu kʼu katane̩ ñwu Defid, ata-we̩, kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼi agugu oj ede Israe̩l añʼuwe̩ n.
Iche̩wñ kʼume̩ muda murida bʼumi ubi te̩, ame̩ abe̩k amo̩ma-me̩, ku me̩ ma de uko̩-mi, kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi kʼu ko jʼo̩gba-me̩ le̩ n, kʼame̩ nyʼache amo̩jo̩ omune̩, ku me̩ la dojikane̩ ñwu ma;

mak e̩gba le̩ omi akʼabo Israe̩l da bʼoj ane̩ e-kʼomi du ñwu ma-i te̩; tak unyi-i, e-kʼu che kʼi fo̩ tod odu-mi, nadʼu ro̩ tinyo̩ bʼumi eju te̩; tak Israe̩l amud ita kpai icha ugbo amone̩ ojoji ojoji du.
Oñ awuwu unyi-i, ki chaka nʼojima abe̩-i, amʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi alale gudu, ma aka kʼe̩he̩e̩, oñ ma akakini, E̩wñ chi ki Jihofa che ane̩-i, kpai unyi-i abe̩i ta?

Taku ma adohi kakini, Todabu ku ma hi Jihofa, O̩jo̩-ma, kʼi kʼamata-ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu le̩, tinyo̩, ku ma la gwo̩nyʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩, ku ma dojikane̩ ñwu ma, ku ma la che ma: todule̩ oñ Jihofa kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩-i du wa bʼuma ma.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ ogu muda, owñ chʼiko ki So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼunyi meji le̩, unyi Jihofa kpʼunyi onu.
Abu ki Hairam, onu Taya, la ko oli sida kpai oli fir ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n manyu o̩jamalia, alu du kʼi tene, e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ le̩ muda So̩lo̩mo̩n la kʼewo ogu ki jʼoj ane̩ Galili ñwu Hairam.
Taku Hairam kwo Taya dufu kʼi wa go ewo ewo ki So̩lo̩mo̩n ko ñw u le̩; i la nyʼe eju n.
Tak i kakini, Ewo e̩wñ oñ e̩ ko ñwu mi-i, o̩maye-mi? Oñ ma fʼo̩mo̩ do̩ kʼane̩ Kabul gbogbo tʼeñini.
Hairam la mʼo̩jamalia tale̩nt o̩gbo̩ me̩fa ko kpuche̩rʼonu akwoubi.
E̩wñ ki chʼofe one̩ ki So̩lo̩mo̩n ko wʼoko uko̩lo̩ le̩ de̩, owñ chʼutodu ku ma ki kʼunyi Jihofa, kpʼunyi-wñ onugo, kpai Milo, kpai aku Je̩rusale̩m, kpai Hazo̩r kpai Me̩gido kpai Geze̩r.
Fero, onu Ijipti, mute̩gu, i la fu Geze̩r du, tak i fʼu gujo, oñ i fʼabo Kenan ku ma dodo ewo le̩ kpa, oñ i mʼu du ñw o̩ma-wñ kʼi chʼo̩ya So̩lo̩mo̩n le̩ kʼi chʼukpe̩-wñ kʼi adu nyʼunyi o̩ko̩.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n dabi fu Geze̩r le̩ ne, kpai Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n e-o̩gane̩,
kpai Bee̩-lat, kpai Tamar ef aje̩tachi ojane̩-wñ,

kpai ewo ojoko ojoko du ugbo ki So̩lo̩mo̩n ne̩ ki akʼuje̩wñ jo̩, kpʼewo ewo kʼi ne̩ todu o̩ko̩ ogu-wñ, kpʼewo ewo tod amanʼanya-wñ, kpʼe-ki So̩lo̩mo̩n tene kʼi ko̩ Je̩rusale̩m todu ki nʼuyo̩ ñw u, kpʼoji Le̩bano̩n, kpʼoj ane̩ ugbo kʼo̩da-wñ te̩ kade chaka.
I chʼe-amone̩ ki bo̩ kwef abo Amo̩r kpʼabo He̩t kpʼabo Pe̩re̩z kpʼabo Hifai kpʼabo Je̩bius du, ku ma ma dʼef amo̩ma Israe̩l n;
amo̩ma-ma ki bo̩ ubi-ma oj ane̩ le̩, owñ chʼe-kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l ma neke ko jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ogbo-lo n, kwef abo le̩ oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n chi amone̩ kʼama ki chʼuko̩lo̩ adu gbogbo tʼeñini.
So̩lo̩mo̩n muda kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l chʼadu n; chai abogu-wñ ama che, kpʼamibolo-wñ, kpʼamagboji-wñ, kpʼachokolobia-wñ, kpʼamagboji o̩ko̩ ogu-wñ kpʼamanʼanya-wñ.
Abo-i la chʼamagboji abo ku ma chi dago kʼuko̩lo̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n ki jʼef o̩wo̩-ma, owñ chʼone̩ oli me̩gwaka, oñ amone̩ ku ma che uko̩lo̩ le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-ma.
O̩ma Fero onobule̩ le̩ la kwʼef ewo Defid lewa ef unyi-wñ ku ma ko̩ ñw u le̩: tak i fu Milo ne.

Onu me̩ta tak o̩do̩ da So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼiche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-kʼi ne ñwu Jihofa, oñ i nʼotulale agujo manyʼu, oj e-ki dʼo̩gba Jihofa le̩. Abe̩le̩ i fʼuko̩lo̩ unyi le̩ chekpa.
Tak onu So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼo̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ che jo̩ E̩zion-geba ki dʼakolo Ailo̩t le̩, o̩l Ohimini Ekpikpa, ane̩ Ido̩m.
Taku Hairam fʼamibolo-wñ, ku ma chʼamagwo̩ko̩ ku ma ma alu kʼohimini de̩ kpe̩ manyʼamibolo So̩lo̩mo̩n ef o̩ko̩ ku ma che jo̩ le̩.
Taku ma lewa Ofir, oñ ma kʼo̩jamalia alu tale̩nt ulo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ kwʼo̩mo̩, oñ ma mʼu ko wʼugbo onu So̩lo̩mo̩n.
Tak e̩gba kʼonu onobule̩ Shiba gbo̩ uwohi So̩lo̩mo̩n ugbo odu Jihofa le̩, i lewa kʼi nʼita ekpa jʼowñ ma.

Oñ i lewa Je̩rusale̩m, abo-wñ ku ma darʼo̩ ubi tabale, kpʼaminyakulumi ku ma nʼadu e̩wñ ido̩ro̩ kpʼo̩jamalia nana otemeje kpʼokuta akoko; tak e̩gba kʼi lewʼugbo So̩lo̩mo̩n, i fʼo̩la du ki dʼe̩do̩-wñ ka jane̩ ñw u.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n mʼoji o̩la-wñ chaka du ka ñw u; e̩wñ du ki maja ñw onu kʼi ma la du ka ñw u ni de̩ n.
Tak e̩gba kʼonu Shiba le̩ li ibe So̩lo̩mo̩n chaka kpʼunyi kʼi ko̩ le̩

kpʼuje̩wñ oj itebulu-wñ kpʼalu kʼamibolo-wñ gugu e-ma jo̩, kpʼalu kʼabo ku ma che e̩wñ ñw u dago jo̩ kpʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma, kpʼabo ku ma nʼago omi ñw u, kpʼate̩gu-wñ ugbo kʼi ate̩gu nyʼunyi Jihofa; i nʼenʼibe du efu ge̩ n.
Tak i ka ñw onu kakini, Inabali e̩wñ kʼuwe̩ che kpʼibe-we̩ kʼu gbo̩ ane̩-mi chʼochochi.
U muda dʼo̩la le̩ rʼochochi n, gbogbo tak u lewa fʼeju-mi onugo dʼo; e̩ la go, ma la kʼukpe̩reji-wñ ñwu mi n; ibe-we̩ kpʼalu ki ra ñw e̩ tʼuwohi-wñ kʼomi gbo̩ le.
Abo-we̩ gbede, amibolo-we̩ ku ma dago jʼo̩gba-we̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ ku ma gbo̩ ibe-we̩ gbede ge̩.

Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, ki nʼele, owñ ki yo̩ ñw e̩ kʼi la dʼuwe̩ gugu oj ede Israe̩l. Todabu ki Jihofa fe̩do̩ Israe̩l ogbegbele̩, todule̩ i dʼuwʼe̩ jʼonu, kʼuwʼe̩ ki che teju oj ajo̩ kʼi dute̩ kpai o̩kpakpa.
Tak i mʼo̩jamalia tale̩nt o̩gbo̩ me̩fa ko ñw onu kpʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩ nana nana kpʼokuta okuta akoko; ma ño̩ kʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩ e̩kute̩ wa alu kʼonu onobule̩ Shiba ko wa ñw onu So̩lo̩mo̩n le̩ ge̩ n.
Oñ o̩ko̩ Hairam ki wewe ki kʼo̩jamalia kwo Ofir wa le̩, ño̩ kʼoli almug nana kwo Ofir wa kpai okuta akoko ge̩.
Tak onu nʼoli almug le̩ che oli urane̩ todu unyi Jihofa, kpai todu unyi onu, kpʼumolo kpʼubo̩ todu amakeli ge̩: oli almug e̩gʼe-le̩ ño̩ wa ge̩ n; e̩ne̩ du li e̩go̩-wñ gbogbo tʼeñini n.
Tak onu So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼe̩wñ du ki dʼonu Shiba le̩ e̩do̩ ñw u, owñ chʼe̩wñ du kʼi bi, manyʼe̩wñ du ki tu So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩wo̩ kʼi du ñw u. Abe̩le̩ i mudabi oñ i le tʼane̩ e-wñ, owñ kpai abuko̩lo̩-wñ.
Oñ uwoji o̩jamalia ki lewʼugbo So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩do̩ okate che tale̩nt o̩jamalia ulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩fa,
manyʼe̩wñ kʼamagbagbata ne̩ wa, kpʼe̩wñ kʼamachinyama ne̩ wa kpʼe̩wñ ki kwʼugbo amonu Arabia du kpʼe̩wñ kʼamigo̩bina ane̩ o̩mo̩ ko wa ge̩.
Onu So̩lo̩mo̩n nʼo̩jamalia gwu ugbe̩yo̩ lile o̩gwo̩ko̩; o̩jamalia she̩ke̩l ulo̩gwa ma du gwu ugbe̩yo̩ʼka.

Oñ i ño̩ nʼo̩jamalia gwu ugbe̩yo̩ oli me̩fa; o̩jamalia she̩ke̩l oli me̩ta ma du gwu ugbe̩yo̩ oli me̩fa; o̩jamalia she̩ke̩l oli me̩ta ma du gwu ugbe̩yo̩ e-le̩ okoka: tak onu mʼu ko jʼef unyi e-efoko Le̩bano̩n.
Onu ño̩ nʼenyi adagba che ede lile, oñ i mʼo̩jamalia e-ku ma gwe̩ hiolo tʼuma le du wenyʼu.
Ubo̩-wñ kʼi ate̩gu le tʼoj ede-wñ chʼe̩fa, ejubi oj ede le̩ chʼokokolo; i nʼuko̩wo̩no eju meji ugbo kʼi agugu, amidu meji dago akolo uko̩wo̩no meji le̩.
Amidu me̩gweji la jʼoj ubo̩ me̩fa le̩ o̩wo̩ mejeji. I nʼojane̩ du ugbo ku ma che e̩go̩-wñ n.
Ago du kʼonu So̩lo̩mo̩n adu ñmʼomi chʼo̩jamalia, e̩wñ eku du ef unyi e-efoko Le̩bano̩n la chʼo̩jamalia hiolo; i nʼe-du ki chʼajifa n; ma lo ajifa rʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ iko So̩lo̩mon in.

Todu onu nʼo̩ko Tarshish wewe nʼoj ohimini le̩ manyʼo̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ Hairam ge̩. Onuʼka ef o̩do̩ me̩ta o̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ Tarshish te̩take̩che̩ wa, ane̩ o̩jamalia kpai ajifa, kpʼenyi adagba, kpai amoge, kpʼamewe̩ ku ma do̩ ko̩ piko̩k wa.
Abe̩le̩ onu So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼamonu ile̩ du du nana ef e̩wñ ene̩ kpai ibe.
Oñ amone̩ ile̩-i du feju eju So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼama ki gbo ibe-wñ e-kʼO̩jo̩ du tʼef e̩do̩-wñ.
Oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma nʼe̩wñ ele-wñ wa, e̩wñ eku ajifa, kpai e̩wñ eku o̩jamalia kpʼe̩wñ o̩la kpʼe̩wñ ido̩na ogu kpʼe̩wñ ido̩ro kpʼamanya kpai amimiulu, i chenʼukpe̩ ku ma ne̩ wa o̩do̩da o̩do̩da.

Taku So̩lo̩mon mʼo̩ko̩ ogu kpʼabo ku ma nʼanya ko wa jo̩. O̩ko̩ ane̩ ogu kʼi ne̩ la chʼicham nyʼulo̩gwa; kpʼamananya icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩gweji, kʼi ko jo̩ ewo ewo o̩ko̩ ane̩ ogu, kpʼugbo onu Je̩rusale̩m ge̩.
Oñ onu le̩ che kʼajifa ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m dabe̩ne̩ kʼokuta. I la che kʼoli sida ki chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼoli sikamo̩r ki jʼane̩ o̩go̩ le̩.
Oñ amanya ki So̩lo̩mo̩n ne̩, Ijipti ma ko kwo wa: amanyaja onu le̩ mʼu gba la ugba ugba.
O̩ko̩ ane̩ oguʼka la kwʼIjipti wa todu she̩ke̩l ajifa ulo̩gwa, alaja anyaʼka la chʼoli me̩ta; abe̩le̩ ma la nʼo̩wo̩-ma ko wa tod amonu He̩t chaka, kpai amonu abo Siria.
Oñ onu So̩lo̩mo̩n fe̩do̩ abobule̩ ononojo wewe manyʼe̩ma Fero le̩ ge̩; abobule̩ abo Moab kpai e-abo Amo̩n kpai e-Ido̩m kpai e-Saido̩n kpai e-He̩t;
ma chʼabo uche̩ichi e-ki Jihofa ka ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l kakini, Ame̩ ki ne̩ ma n, ama ki la ne̩ me̩ n; todu ma arʼume̩ e̩do̩ da tʼamo̩jo̩-ma ubi chuu; So̩lo̩mo̩n la gwo̩nyʼabobule̩ le̩ ef ufe̩do̩.
I la nʼamo̩ya oli me̩gwe̩le̩, amo̩ma onu ma che; manyu amabadu oli me̩gwe̩fa; oñ amo̩ya-wñ le̩ rʼowñ e̩do̩ da.
Todu i lewatʼe̩gba ki So̩lo̩mo̩n mud ogijo, kʼamo̩ya-wñ rʼowñ e̩do̩ da tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi; e̩do̩-wñ laño̩ chʼokpoko ogbolo ugbo Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ, dabalu kʼe̩do̩ Defid, ata-wñ de̩ ge̩ n.
Todu So̩lo̩mo̩n i kwotʼAshio̩re̩t, kʼi chʼo̩jo̩ onobule̩ e-abo Saido̩n, ubi; i ño̩ kwotu Milkom, e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abo Amo̩n le̩, ubi ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, i la tu Jihofa ubi ogbolo alu ki Defid, uta-wñ, che n.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼotete du todu Chimo̩sh e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ Moab, oj uwo ki kpejuru Je̩rusale̩m le̩, i ño̩ che todu Mole̩k e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ i ño̩ che tod amo̩ya-wñ ononojo le̩ chaka, oñ ma fʼotulale gujo, ma ño̩ fʼiche̩bo̩ che ñw amo̩jo̩-ma.
Jihofa la we̩do̩ru So̩lo̩mon, ukpe̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ rida bi Jihofa te̩, owñ ki chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l kʼi tejugede ñw u onu meji le̩,
kʼi la ñwa ñw u ugbo e̩wñ le̩, ka kʼowñ ki we etʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi. I muda de e̩wñ ki Jihofa ñwa le̩ n.
Todule̩ Jihofa ka ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n kakini, Todabu kʼe̩wñ-i dʼugbo we̩, kʼe̩ ma la fʼalo-mi kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi kʼu ñwa ñw e̩ le̩ de n, nafʼojane̩-i ge̩ bʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ te̩ chuu, oñ nadu ñw adu-we̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ omi ache o̩kpanachi e-we̩-i ta n, todu Defid, ata-we̩. U muda age̩ bʼo̩ma-we̩ o̩wo̩ te̩.
Omi muda age̩ ojane̩-i chaka bʼo̩ o̩wo̩ te̩ n; nadu o̩lo̩puʼka ñw o̩ma-we̩ todu Defid, adu-mi le̩, kpai todu Je̩rusale̩m e-kʼu du le̩.
Taku Jihofa mʼe̩nujaʼka du kwane̩ tu So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩la, owñ che Hadad, e̩ne̩ Ido̩m: owñ dʼef ugbe̩ onu Ido̩m.
Todu i lewatʼe̩gba ki Defid dʼIdo̩m, ki Joab kʼi chʼonu abogu, mute̩gu nyʼakʼoku abo ku ma kpa ji, i la fʼaboke̩le̩ Ido̩m okoke du kpa.
(Todu Joab kpai abo Israe̩l chaka kpo̩kpe̩ o̩mo̩ ochu me̩fa, gbogbo tak i fʼaboke̩le̩ Ido̩m okoke gwoda.)
