Oñ Hadad ra, owñ kpai abo Ido̩m iche̩ka ku ma ijʼef amadu ata-wñ, ku ma nyʼIjipti. Hadad chʼimo̩to̩ e̩gba le̩ ta.

Ma la kwane̩ ule̩-ma Midian oñ ma lewa Paran; taku ma mʼaboke̩le̩ iche̩ka ko kwo Paran lebʼuma, oñ ma lewa Ijipti, ugbo Fero onu Ijipti; onu le̩ dʼunyi ñw u, oñ i mʼukpe̩ uje̩wñ e-wñ ko jo̩ ñw u, i la bʼane̩ ñw u.
Fero la li Hadad eju nana, oñ i dʼo̩maye o̩ya e-wñ onugo ñw u chʼo̩ya, owñ chʼo̩maye Tafenes, o̩ya onu.
Oñ o̩maye Tafenes le̩ bi Genubat, o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, ñw u, Tafenes nʼo̩ma le̩ gba ef unyi Fero; Genubat la dʼef unyi Fero ef amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-Fero.
Tak e̩gba; ki Hadad gbo̩ Ijipti ka ki Defid cholu manyʼamata-wñ ki Joab onu ogu le̩ leku ge̩, Hadad ka ñwu Fero kakini, Je̩ ñwu mi lo, kʼu mudabi tʼane̩ e-mi.
Fero muda ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ ñʼuwe̩ ugbo mi, kʼe̩ tene edabi tʼane̩-we̩? Go. Tak i dohi kakini, O̩da, e̩ muda je̩ ñwu mi lo ke.
Oñ O̩jo̩ ño̩ du e̩nuja kwane̩ tʼowñ o̩la ge̩, owñ che Rezon, o̩ma E̩liada, kʼi ra bʼo̩wo̩ odu-wñ Hadadeza, onu Zoba, te̩.
Tak i mʼaboke̩le̩ ko mʼe̩do̩ oñ i mud agboji udalaʼka, owñ chʼe̩gba ki Defid fʼuma kpa le̩; taku ma nyi Damaskus, oñ ma fʼodo do o̩mo̩, i la fʼo̩fe̩ je̩ Damaskus.
Owñ le̩ la chʼe̩nuja abo Israe̩l o̩kpanachi So̩lo̩mo̩n chaka. E-le̩ manyʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ki Hadad che ma. Abe̩le̩ e̩de̩te̩ abo Israe̩l achʼo, i la jʼonu Siria.
Taki Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat, e̩ne̩ Ifraim kʼi de̩ Ze̩re̩da, kʼi chʼadu So̩lo̩mo̩n, iye-wñ chʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩, kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Ze̩rua, owñ le̩ ño̩ dʼo̩wo̩-wñ kwane̩ ki kobʼonu.
E̩wñ ki chi kʼi la dʼo̩wo̩-wñ kwane̩ ki ko̩bʼonu le̩ de̩: So̩lo̩mo̩n do̩mo̩ ako̩ Milo; kpʼeñwʼewo Defid, ata-wñ, ugbo kʼi gulo̩, che.
E̩ne̩ ku ma do̩ Je̩ro̩boam le̩ la chʼe̩nagbiti kʼi nʼuwohi; oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n li okolobia le̩ ki kpe̩do̩rʼuko̩lo̩-wñ, tak i mʼuko̩lo̩ unyi Jose̩f du du ñw u kʼi nʼo̩da-wñ.
Oñ i lewatu iko le̩, e̩gba ki Je̩ro̩boam kwo Je̩rusale̩m dufu, akache̩ ku ma do̩ kʼAhija e̩ne̩ Shilo̩n fʼu li ej o̩na. Ahija le̩ la mʼotogbo etito̩ ko nyi e̩gba le̩ me̩: oñ ama meji tetejʼoko le̩.
Tak Ahija gwo̩nyʼotogbo etito̩ ki nyi le̩, oñ i fʼu fana me̩gweji.
Tak i ka ñwu Je̩ro̩boam kakini, Mʼe̩fana-wñ me̩gwa ko; todu abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ka de̩ kakini, Go, nache kʼu ge̩ ojane̩ le̩ bi So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩wo̩ te̩, oñ omi ako o̩lo̩pu me̩gwa ñw e̩;
(owñ muda ane̩ o̩lo̩puʼka todu adu-mi Defid, kpai todu Je̩rusale̩m ewo kʼomi du kwef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l chaka le̩;)

todabu ku ma hi umi tinyo̩, ku ma la dojikane̩ ñw Ashto̩re̩t, o̩jo̩ onobule̩ e-abo Saido̩n, kpai Chimo̩sh o̩jo̩ e-abo Moab, kpai Milko̩m o̩jo̩ e-amo̩ma Amo̩n; ma la lule̩ o̩na e-mi ku ma ki che e̩wñ okpoko eju-mi n, ku ma la de̩ e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi kpai oji ajo̩ kʼu dute̩ alu ki Defid ata-wñ che n.

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ omi agba o̩chaka ojane̩ le̩ bʼowñ o̩wo̩ te̩ n; omi muda adʼowñ chʼe̩no-jima o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-wñ kade, todu adu-mi Defid kʼu chi le̩ kʼowñ le̩ fʼuko̩ uko̩-mi kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi de;
ama nagba ojane̩ le̩ bʼo̩ma-wñ o̩wo̩ te̩, tak u nadu ñw e̩, owñ chʼo̩lo̩pu-wñ me̩gwa.
Oñ nadʼo̩lo̩puʼka ñw o̩ma-wñ, todu ki Defid, adu-mi le̩, ki nʼagege o̩gba-mi Je̩rusale̩m o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩; owñ chʼewo kʼu du kʼu dʼodu-mi tʼo̩.
Tak omi adʼuwe̩, oñ uwe̩ ajʼonu alu du ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩. Uwe̩ la achʼonu kine̩ Israe̩l.

I la che̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ane̩tirʼo̩la du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩, kʼe̩ la lule̩ o̩na ona-mi, kʼe̩ la achʼe̩wñ ki chʼo̩kpakpa eju-mi, owñ chʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi kpai uko̩ uko-mi ede alu ki Defid, adu-mi, chi le̩, mak u nadʼugbo we̩, oñ omi ako̩ unyi o̩kpaka ñw e̩, alu kʼu ko̩ ñwu Defid, tak u nakʼabo Israe̩l ñw e̩.
Abe̩le̩ oñ omi adʼugbe̩ Defid mane̩ tod e̩wñ-i, i muda chʼogbegbele̩ n.
Todule̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n tene kʼi du Je̩ro̩boam kpa. Oñ Je̩ro̩boam kwane̩, i ra nyʼIjipti ugbo Shishak, onu Ijipti. I la dʼIjipti gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku So̩lo̩mo̩n.
O̩la e̩wñ So̩lo̩mo̩n ki bo̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼi che, kpai ibe kʼi ne, i chʼef o̩takada e̩wñ ki So̩lo̩mo̩n che oñ ma ko̩ te n?
Oñ iko ki So̩lo̩mo̩n jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m kʼi nʼo̩da abo Israe̩l chaka chʼo̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ewo Defid, ata-wñ. Taku Reho̩boam o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ Reho̩boam le tu She̩kem, todu abo Israe̩l chaka lewa She̩ke̩m ku ma dʼu jʼonu.
Tak e̩gba ki Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat, gbʼo̩ (todu owñ dʼIjipti ta, owñ chʼugbo kʼi ra nyi bʼeju So̩lo̩mo̩n te̩ le̩, Je̩ro̩boam la gugu Ijipti.
Tak ama fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ adʼo̩ wa;) Je̩ro̩boam kpʼujeju abo Israe̩l chaka lewa, oñ ma ko̩la ñwu Reho̩boam kakini,
Ata-we̩ je̩ ñw oli uno̩lo̩-wa ki wo̩ wa tabale. Todule̩ uwe̩ ki bo̩wo̩lo̩ ñw a ugbo uko̩lo̩ o̩bata kʼa che ñw ata-we̩, kpai ugbo oli uno̩lo̩ kʼi je̩ ñw u woji nʼuwa, tak a arʼe̩.
I la kakini, Me̩ lo ta, o̩jo̩ me̩ta taku me̩ mudabi wʼugbo mi. Tak amone̩ le̩ le.
Taku Reho̩boam onu nyojuju kpai abogijo ku ma jʼo̩gba So̩lo̩mo̩n, ata-wñ, e̩gba kʼi deju, i kakini, Ab i de̩ eju-me̩? ab u nadohi ñw amone̩-i:

Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, I la che̩wñ kʼuwe̩ adʼo̩la-we̩ chʼadu ñw amone̩-i eñini-i kʼe̩ la che e̩wñ ñwu ma, kʼe̩ la nʼo̩la e̩nyo̩ aka e̩gba kʼe̩ dohi ñwu ma, e̩gbale̩ tak ama achʼamadu-we̩ o̩gbegbele̩.
I muda hi ibe kʼabogijo le̩ du ñw u tinyo̩, oñ i nyojuju kpʼabokolobia ku ma chʼej e̩go̩ kpʼowñ, ku ma la jʼo̩gba-wñ.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ibe e̩wñ dʼefu-me̩ kʼu nadohi ñw amone̩ ku ma ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ ki bo̩wo̩lo̩ ugbo oli uno̩lo̩ e-kʼata-we̩ du nʼuwa o̩lo̩ le̩?

Tak abokolobia ku ma chʼej e̩go̩-wñ kakini, Alu kʼuwe̩ aka ñw amone̩ ku ma ko̩la ñw e̩ kakini, Ata-we̩ je̩ ñw oli uno̩lo̩-wa woji, uwe̩ ki muda abo̩wo̩lo̩ ñw a; alu kʼuwe̩ aka ñwu ma de̩, kakini, O̩mo̩wo̩ ubi e-mi jukpa tʼuta ata e-mi le.
Oñ fa-i, abu kʼata-mi dʼoli uno̩lo̩ ki woji nʼume̩ o̩lo̩, omi abutʼoli uno̩lo̩-me̩. Ata-mi la nʼitali kʼume̩ o̩la, omi muda anʼamakpe kʼume̩ o̩la.
Abe̩le̩ Je̩roboam kpai amone̩ le̩ chaka wʼugbo Reho̩boam o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ, alu kʼonu ka le̩ kakini, O̩to̩na me̩ mudabi wʼugbo mi.
Tak onu dohi ñwu ma o̩ko̩ko̩; abu kʼi hi ohi o̩la kʼabogijo du ñw u le̩ tinyo̩,
i ko̩la ñwu ma teju ohi kʼabokolobia le̩ du ñw u. I kakini, Ata-mi je̩ ñw oli uno̩lo̩-me̩ woji, omi la abutʼoli uno̩lo̩-me̩ ge̩; ata-mi la nʼitali kʼume̩ o̩la, e-mi chʼamakpe oñ nane̩ kʼume̩ o̩la.
Abe̩le̩ oñ onu ma nyʼamone̩ le̩ eti n. Todu e̩wñ ki Jihofa duwa te̩ i che, todu kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ lonyane̩. Owñ chʼe-ki Jihofa ka lʼugbo Ahija e̩ne̩ Shilo̩n le̩ ñwu Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l du li ka kʼonu ma anyʼuma eti n, amone̩ le̩ dohi ñw onu kakini,
I muda chʼamo̩ma Israe̩l ku ma dodo ewo ewo Juda Reho̩boam chʼonu-ma.

Oñ Rehoboam onu, fʼAdoram, kʼi nʼo̩da abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ e̩re̩ kpe̩ nyʼo̩mo̩; tak abo Israe̩l chaka kʼokuta ro dʼo̩, oñ ma fʼu kpa. Taku Reho̩boam onu hika tʼef o̩ko̩ ogu-wñ, kʼi ra nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Abe̩le̩ abo Israe̩l ko̩ abo unyi Defid gbogbo tʼeñini.

Oñ i lewatʼe̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l chaka gbo̩ ka ki Je̩ro̩boam mudabiwa me̩, ma fʼuche̩ kpe̩ adʼo wʼujeju-ma, oñ ma mʼu du jʼonu abo Israe̩l chaka, i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki tʼabo unyi Defid ubi n, chai o̩lo̩pu Juda kate.

Tak e̩gba ku Reho̩boam lewa Je̩rusale̩m, i kʼabo unyi Juda kpai abo unyi Be̩njamin wa jeju, ama chʼaboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩la ku ma chi, ma chʼo̩ka ogu eja, kʼama ki kʼogu bʼabo unyi Israe̩l, todu kʼi dʼojane̩ le̩ dabi wa ñwu Rehoboam o̩ma So̩lo̩mo̩n.
O̩la O̩jo̩ muda wʼugbo She̩maya, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩, kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñwu Reho̩boam, o̩ma So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu Juda, kpʼabo unyi Juda kpai Be̩njamin chaka, kpʼamone̩ kibo̩, kakini,

Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki le n, me̩ ki la jogu bʼamo̩maye-me̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l le̩ n, ene̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki mudabi tʼunyi-wñ todu omi chʼe̩te̩ e̩wñ-i. Abe̩le̩ oñ ma netirʼo̩la Jihofa, oñ ma mudabi ile ma, alu kʼo̩la Jihofa ka.
Taku Je̩ro̩boam fu She̩ke̩m ko̩ ane̩ uwo Ifraim, oñ i dodo o̩mo̩; i la kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu oñ i fu Pe̩nue̩l ko̩.
Taku Je̩ro̩boam ka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, Ojane̩-i la adabi tʼo̩wo̩ abo unyi Defid fa-i;

iche̩wñ kʼamone̩-i nyʼakʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa che unyi Jihofa Je̩rusale̩m mak e̩do̩ abo-i ñʼarida tʼugbo odu-ma, owñ che Reho̩boam, onu Juda le; tak ama adʼumi kpa, ku ma la mudabi tʼugbo Reho̩boam, onu Juda.

Tak onu fʼojuju nyi, i la mʼo̩jamalia ko che amo̩ma okuno̩ meji, tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Enyi Je̩rusale̩m jiji tabale ñwu me̩; abo Israe̩l, me̩ go amo̩jo̩-me̩, ku ma ko me̩ kwʼojane̩ Ijipti dufu wʼemi!
Tak i mʼoka-wñ du dago Be̩te̩l, oñ i dʼekeji-wñ dago Dan.
Oñ e̩wñ-i mud e̩wñ adure; todu amone̩ le̩ nyʼo̩gba oka-wñ adojikane̩, i chaka che gbogbo nyi Dan.
Tak i fʼunyi ko̩ otete otete, oñ i chi e̩ne̩ tʼe̩ne̩ du kwef amone̩ le̩ chaka kʼi ko ma chʼamatama, ku ma ma jʼef amo̩ma Lifai n.

Taku Je̩ro̩boam fʼo̩jo̩ uje̩wñ uyo̩ da ochu e̩ke̩jo̩, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu le̩, dab uje̩wñ uyo̩ ki de̩ Juda; oñ i kʼe̩wñ wa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩. Abe̩le̩ i ño̩ che Be̩te̩l ge̩. I fʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ kpa ñw amo̩ma okuno̩ kʼi che le̩. Oñ i mʼamatama otete otete kʼi du le̩ ko wa jo̩ Be̩te̩l.

Oñ i kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi kpa Be̩te̩l o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu e̩ke̩jo̩; owñ chʼochu kʼi ñwa ef e̩do̩ e-wñ onugo. I la fʼo̩jo̩ uje̩wñ uyo̩ da tod amo̩ma Israe̩l, oñ i kʼe̩wñ wa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, i la fʼotulale gujo.
Me̩ la go, o̩la Jihofa je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ʼka kwo Juda wa Be̩te̩l. Je̩ro̩boam la dago kpenyʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi gu otulale jo.

Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ kwa bʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ ma lʼugbo o̩la Jihofa, i kakini, O ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, ma abi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka ñw abo unyi Defid, odu-wñ ako̩ Josaya; owñ le̩ la akʼamatama otete otete ku ma gu otulale jo oji-we̩ chʼiche̩bo̩ oji-we̩. Ma la akʼachiku amone̩ gujo oji-we̩.
Tak i mʼujiwe-wñ dute̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, kakini, E̩wñ ki chʼujiwe-wñ ki Jihofa ka le̩ de̩ kakini: Go, ma age̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-i, ma la akʼelulu ki jʼoji-wñ dafo.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼonu gbo̩ o̩la kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ ka, owñ chʼe-kʼi kwa bʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-Be̩te̩l ma le̩, taku Je̩ro̩boam fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala ugbo kʼi dago kpenyʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, kakini, Me̩ gwo̩nyʼu. Tak o̩wo̩-wñ kʼi nadala ñʼo̩ le̩ gbe̩, oñ i ma ño̩ neke kama mʼe̩do̩-wñ ge̩ n.
Ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ ño̩ ge̩, elulu-wñ laño̩ dafo bʼoj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ te̩, teju ujiwe kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ du ñw u lʼugbo o̩la Jihofa.

Tak onu tohi, oñ i ka ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, E̩ gbo̩ko̩bo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, fa-i, kʼi li mi eju, todu kʼo̩wo̩-mi ki mudabi tʼiko. Tak e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ gbo̩ko̩bo̩ Jihofa oñ o̩wo̩ onu mudabi tʼiko ñw u, i laño̩ dʼalu kʼi te̩te̩de̩ akwoubi.
Tak onu ka ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, Lebʼumi nyʼunyi-mi, kʼo̩la-we̩ ki ruko, oñ nadʼe̩wñ eleʼka ñw e̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ ka ñw onu kakini, E̩ chaka dʼukpe̩reji unyi-we̩ ñwu mi, omi anyʼejefu kpʼuwe̩ n, u la abʼuje̩wñ je̩ abe̩k omi eñmo̩ ugbo-i n.
Todu abe̩le̩ ma ñwañwu mi lʼugbo o̩la Jihofa kakini, Uwe̩ ajʼuje̩wñ n, e̩ la añmʼomi n, e̩ la adabi lʼo̩na kʼe̩ le nyʼo̩mo̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ i le o̩na omune̩, i ño̩ dabi le o̩na e-kʼi le nyi Be̩te̩l le̩ n.
Oñ akache̩ ogijoʼka dodo Be̩te̩l o̩mo̩. Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka ef amo̩ma-wñ lewa ka ñw u uko̩lo̩ du kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ che Be̩te̩l o̩jo̩ le̩; tʼo̩la kʼi ka ñw onu, ma ño̩ ka e-le̩ ñw ata-ma ge̩.
Tak ata-ma ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩na ugbo i ie̩? Amo̩ma-wñ la li o̩na kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ ki kwo Juda wa le̩ le.
Tak i ka ñw amo̩ma-wñ kakini, Kʼofidi nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ñwu mi. Oñ ma mʼofidi ko nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ñw u; tak i kwotanʼo.
Oñ i ranʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, i la fʼu li abu kʼi gugu of oliʼka; oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ ki kwo Juda wa le̩ n? Tak i kakini, Omi de̩.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Lebʼumi nyʼunyi-mi kʼe̩ jʼuje̩wñ.
Oñ i kakini, I nʼugbo kʼu nadabi kpʼuwe̩ n, i la nʼugbo kʼu nanyʼejefu kpʼuwe̩ n. U la ajʼuje̩wñ abe̩k eñmʼomi kpʼuwe̩ ugbo-i n.
Todu ma ka ñwu mi lʼugbo o̩la Jihofa kakini, Uwe̩ ki jʼuje̩wñ n, uwe̩ ki la ñmʼomi o̩mo̩ n, e̩ ki laño̩ dabi lʼo̩na kʼe̩ lewa n.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Omi ño̩ chʼakache̩ alu kʼuwe̩ de̩; oñ onuche̩ʼka ko̩la ñwu mi lʼugbo o̩la Jihofa kakini, Mʼu du dabi wʼef unyi-we̩ kpʼuwe̩, todu kʼi jʼuje̩wñ, kʼi ñmo̩ omi. Olemi i la aro̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ i mudabi kpʼowñ, oñ i fʼuje̩wñ le̩ je̩ ef unyi-wñ, i laño̩ ñmʼomi.
Oñ i lewatu, abu ku ma guane̩ aje̩ e̩wñ, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo akache̩ ki dʼowñ dabiwa;
oñ i kwa ka ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ ki kwo Juda wa le̩ kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, abu kʼe̩ lañu rʼo̩la ki kwʼalu Jihofa-i, kʼe̩ ma la de uko̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo-we̩ te̩ ñw e̩ n,
kʼe̩ muda dabiwa kʼe̩ la fʼuje̩wñ je̩ kʼe̩ la fʼomi ñmo̩ ugbo kʼi ka ñw e̩ kakini, E̩ ki jʼuje̩wñ n, e̩ ki la ñmo̩ omi n; oku-we̩ awʼoji amata-we̩ n.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼi fʼuje̩wñ je̩ kʼi la fʼomi ñmo̩ tak e̩ne̩ le̩ kʼofidi nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ñw u, owñ chʼutodu akache̩ kʼi dʼu dabiwa le̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi le iduʼka de kpʼowñ ej o̩na, i la mʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ du kpa. Oku-wñ la tʼej o̩na o̩mo̩, oñ o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ kwodago kpenyʼu; idu le̩ ño̩ dago kpenyʼoku-wñ ge̩.
E̩ la go, aboke̩le̩ alale, oñ ma li oku one̩ ki tʼej o̩na, kpʼidu ki dago kpenyʼoku le̩. Taku ma lewa mudu ka ef ewo ugbo kʼakache̩ ogijo le̩ dodo.

Tak e̩gba kʼakache̩ ki dʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kwʼej o̩na dabi wa le̩ gbo̩, i kakini, E̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ kʼi lañu ru omu Jihofa le̩ de̩: todule̩ oñ Jihofa mʼowñ du ñw idu, kʼi fʼu fana kʼi la mʼu du kpa, teju o̩la ki Jihofa ka ñw u.
Tak i ka ñw amo̩ma-wñ kakini, Mʼofidi ko nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ñwu mi. Oñ ma mʼu ko nʼu-bi-wñ.
Tak i le nali oku-wñ kʼi tʼej o̩na le̩, kpʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ kpʼidu ku ma dago kpenyʼoku le̩. Idu la bʼoku e̩ne̩ le̩ je̩ n, i la fʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ na n.
Tak akache̩ le̩ mʼoku e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ du; i la mʼu du nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ, oñ i mʼu du dabi wa. Tak i lewa ewo akache̩ ogijo le̩ kʼi daido̩, kʼi ño̩ mʼu du ji.
Tak i mʼoku-wñ du dachi ef oji e-wñ onugo Oñ ma kwodʼaido̩-wñ kakini, Atogwo, o̩maye-mi!
Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼi mʼowñ du ji, i ka ñw amo̩ma-wñ kakini, E̩gba kʼomi leku, maku me̩ dʼumi ji ef oji ugbo ku ma dʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩-i ji. Me̩ kʼachiku-mi jo̩ kpenyʼachiku-wñ.
Todu uko̩la kʼi kwa rʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Be̩te̩l oji, kpai e-kʼi kwa rʼunyi unyi otete otete ki jʼewo ewo Samaria awache̩ chuu.

Anubi e-le̩ ge̩, Je̩ro̩boam la rida bʼo̩na-wñ ki bie̩ne̩ te̩ n, i muda ño̩ dabi chi e̩ne̩ tʼe̩ne̩ du kwef amone̩ le̩ kʼama ki chʼamatama otete otete le̩ kpo̩ ge̩. E̩ne̩ du ki je̩, onu kʼe̩wñ nyʼu o̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ todu kʼamatama otete otete ki jʼo̩mo̩.
Oñ e̩wñ-i mud adure ñw abo unyi Je̩ro̩boam todu ku ma ki kʼo̩ da rinyo̩, ku ma ki fʼu kpabie̩ rinyo̩ bʼeju ile̩-i te̩.
Iko le̩ o̩ga fʼAbija, o̩ma Je̩ro̩boam, mu.

Taku Je̩ro̩boam ka ñw o̩ya-wñ kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ kwane̩, kʼe̩ fʼafe̩ kpanyi, kʼama ki we ema ka kʼuwe̩ chʼo̩ya Je̩ro̩boam; kʼe̩ nyi Shailo; go, o̩mo̩ le̩ Ahija, akache̩ de̩, e-kʼi ka ñwu mi ka kʼomi ajʼonu amone̩-i.
E̩ la mʼeli o̩je̩ me̩gwa ko lebʼuwe̩ kpai akala kpai o̩cha iño̩, kʼe̩ nyʼugbo-wñ; owñ le̩ aka ñw e̩ alu kʼejo̩gba o̩ma-i ade̩.
Oñ o̩ya Je̩ro̩boam fʼabe̩le̩ che. I kwane̩, i letu Shailo, oñ i lewa unyi Ahija. Ahija laño̩ gane̩ ge̩ n, eju-wñ gbe̩ mʼakpo todu i chʼogijo.
Jihofa la ka ñw Ahija kakini, Go, o̩ya Je̩ro̩boam awa kʼi tene ugbo we̩ alu kʼo̩la o̩ma-wñ ade̩; todu i acho̩ga. Abe̩i, abe̩i uwe̩ aka ñw u.

Abe̩le̩ i la de, e̩gba kʼAhija ebo̩ e̩re̩ ane̩-wñ, abu kʼi agudu wʼalugbo̩na, i kakini, Mugudu wa, uwe̩ o̩ya Je̩ro̩boam. E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ chʼakpaine dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ omune̩? Todu ma dʼinabali ki woji kpe̩ mi uche̩ rʼuwe̩.
Lo, kʼe̩ ka ñwu Je̩ro̩boam kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼu dʼuwe̩ kwef amone̩ le̩ dago, kʼu la dʼuwe̩ chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo-mi Israe̩l,

kʼu la fʼojane̩ le̩ ge̩ bʼabo unyi Defid te̩, kʼu mʼu du ñw e̩; uwe̩ la muda dab alu kʼadu-mi Defid de̩ n, kʼowñ le̩ fʼuko̩ uko̩-mi de, oñ i tʼumi ubi kpʼe̩do̩-wñ chaka, e̩wñ ki chʼo̩kpakpa eju-mi kate i nache.
Uwe̩ muda fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ che tʼabo du ku ma wa o̩gba-we̩ le, e̩ la le tekeche amo̩jo̩ omune̩ ñw o̩la-we̩, kpai ojibo eda, kʼe̩ bi mi eju, e̩ la mʼumi du rikpolo tʼubi-we̩.

Todule̩ go, omi akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa abʼunyi Je̩ro̩boam ma, oñ nakʼaboke̩le̩ okoke du da bi Je̩ro̩boam o̩wo̩ te̩, tʼo̩to̩ tʼohi, omi la agbʼunyi Je̩ro̩boam rinyo̩ hioko, alu kʼone̩ agbʼechu rinyo̩ gbogbo tak i takpa chaka.
E̩ne̩ Je̩ro̩boam kʼi leku ef ewo amabia amʼu du je̩; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi leku o̩ko̩ ame̩we̩ ojale amʼu du je̩. Todu Jihofa fʼe-le̩ ka me̩.
Todule̩ e̩ kwane̩, kʼe̩ nyʼunyi-we̩. E̩gba kʼe̩ mʼe̩re̩-we̩ dʼatʼewo le̩, o̩ma-i aku.
Oñ abo Israe̩l chaka adʼaido̩-wñ, ma la adʼu ji. Todu owñ kate chʼe̩ne̩ Je̩ro̩boam ki atʼef oji; todu ma fʼe̩wñʼka ki chenyo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l eju, li ef uwñ, ef unyi Je̩ro̩boam.
Jihofa la adʼonu ki anʼo̩da abo Israe̩l kwane̩ ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi akʼabo unyi Je̩roboam da rinyo̩ o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i. E̩wñ le̩? i chaka chʼifa-ifa?

Todu Jihofa agwo abo Israe̩l alu kʼomi ohimini ami elikpo ejo, i la agu abo Israe̩l du rinyo̩ bʼojane̩ ki nyo̩ kʼi du ñw amata-ma te̩, oñ i akpa ma tuka rʼej udaba ohimini todabu ku ma fʼAshe̩rim-ma che ku ma bi Jihofa eju.
I la atʼabo Israe̩l no̩ tinyo̩ tod adure adure Je̩ro̩boam, owñ chʼe-kʼowñ onugo che kpai e-kʼi ño̩ je ñw abo Israe̩l che ge̩.
Tak o̩ya Je̩ro̩boam kwane̩, oñ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le. I lewa Tirza, oñ abu kʼi lewa kado ubo̩ alugbo̩na unyi le̩, o̩ma-i mʼiñmi da.
Tak abo Israe̩l chaka mʼu du ji, oñ ma dʼaido̩-wñ, teju o̩la Jihofa kʼi ka lʼalu adu-wñ, Ahija, akache̩ le̩.
O̩la Je̩ro̩boam ki bo̩, alu kʼi jʼogu kpai alu kʼi jʼonu, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l.
Je̩roboam la jʼonu o̩do̩ ogu nyoke meji, tak i cholu manyʼamata-wñ. Oñ Nedab, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.

Rehoboam, o̩ma So̩lo̩mo̩n, la jʼonu-wñ Juda. O̩do̩ Reho̩boam la chʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyokeʼka tak i chane̩ onu-wñ eje̩. Oñ i jʼonu o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩bie Je̩rusale̩m kʼi chʼewo ki Jihofa du kwef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka kʼi dʼodu-wñ tʼo̩mo̩. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Naama, e̩ne̩ Amo̩n.
Juda la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ che eju Jihofa. Oñ ma nʼe̩wñ adure ku ma jʼache nyʼowñ ogu eja tʼe̩wñ du kʼamata-ma che le.
Todu ama ño̩ ko otete otete ñw o̩la-ma, kpai ode ode, kpai Ashe̩rim, oj uwo du ki gbo̩gba, kpai of oli emimi du.
Amache̩wñtuñ ef unyi ode-ma ño̩ jʼane̩ o̩mo̩. Ma jo̩ ache teju e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abo uche̩ichi e-ki Jihofa ne bʼeju abo Israe̩l te̩ le̩.
Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ e̩ke̩lu ku Reho̩boam jʼonu, Shishak, onu Ijipti, lewa kobo̩ Je̩rusale̩m;
oñ i mʼe̩wñ akoko ño̩ bʼunyi Jihofa kpai unyi onu te̩. I mʼe̩wñ du ño̩ le. I ño̩ mʼugbe̩yo̩ o̩jamalia du ki So̩lo̩mo̩n che le̩ ko ge̩.
Taku Reho̩boam fʼugbe̩yo̩ ebije-ikpa che koji-wñ oñ i mʼu ko nyʼamagboji abide o̩wo̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma de alugbo̩na unyi onu.
Oñ ab i de̩ de: e̩gba du kʼonu nyʼef unyi Jihofa abo ide anʼugbe̩yo̩ le̩ le̩; taku ma mʼu ko dabi wa unyi ide ge̩.
O̩la Rehoboam ki bo̩ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, i che̩ko̩ tʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda le̩ n?
Ogu la dago agbagba Reho̩boam kpai Je̩ro̩boam o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
Taku Reho̩boam cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ugbo amata-wñ ef ewo Defid. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Naama, e̩ne̩ Amo̩n le̩. Tak Abijam, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ Abijam chane̩ ejʼonu Juda o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩ Je̩ro̩boam, onu, o̩ma Nebat le̩.
I jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩ta. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Maaka kʼi chʼo̩ma Abishalo̩m.
I ño̩ lule̩ ef e̩wñ adure du kʼata-wñ che akwoubi; e̩do̩-wñ la de̩ jalii ugbo Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ alu kʼe̩do̩ Defid ata-wñ de̩ n.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, todu Defid, Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ mʼagege du ñw u Je̩rusale̩m, abu kʼi dʼo̩ma-wñ dago ubi-wñ; abe̩le̩ i fu Je̩rusale̩m lonyane̩;
todu abu ki Defid che e̩wñ o̩kpakpa eju Jihofa kʼi ma la na bʼe̩wñ du kʼi ñwa ñw u te̩ n O̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-wñ kade, chai ugbo o̩la Uraya, e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩, kate.
Ogu la dago agbagba Reho̩boam kpai Je̩ro̩boam o̩jo̩ kʼudeju-wñ kade.
Oñ o̩la Abijam ki bo̩ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, i che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda n? Ogu ño̩ dago agbagba Abijam kpai Je̩ro̩boam.
Tak Abijam cholu manyʼamata-wñ. Oñ ma mʼu du ji ewo Defid: oñ Esa, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ o̩do̩ Je̩ro̩boam onu Israe̩l e̩kogu Esa chane̩ ejʼonu Juda,
i la jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyokeʼka. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Maaka, o̩ma Abishalo̩m.
Esa la che e̩wñ tʼo̩kpakpa eju Jihofa alu ki Defid ata-wñ che.
I kʼamache̩wñtuñ le̩ bʼojane̩ le̩ te̩, oñ i mʼode du kʼata-wñ che ko rinyo̩.
Tak i ño̩ bʼiye-wñ Maaka gbʼo̩da iye onu, todabu kʼi fʼojibo ihie̩ne̩ʼka che ñw Ashe̩ra. Esa la fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-wñ lo̩ wane̩, oñ i fu gujo eti aji Kidro̩n.
Ma muda kʼotete otete kwʼo̩mo̩ n; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ e̩do̩ Esa chʼo̩jalii ugbo Jihofa o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-wñ kade.
I la mʼe̩wñ kʼata-wñ che ki fo̩ ko wʼef unyi Jihofa kpai e̩wñ kʼowñ onugo che ki fo̩, ajifa kpai o̩jamalia kpai e̩wñ eku.
Ogu laño̩ dago agbagba Esa kpai Beasha, onu Israe̩l o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-ma kade.
Beasha onu Israe̩l kobo̩ Juda, kʼi la fu Rama ko̩, kʼi che kʼi je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du we edufu kpai egudu nyʼugbo Esa onu Juda.

Tak Esa mʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia du ki bo̩ ef e̩wñ akoko ef unyi Jihofa ko, kpai e̩wñ akoko unyi onu, oñ i mʼu ko nyʼabimo̩to̩-wñ o̩wo; tak Esa onu fʼuma kpe̩ru Be̩n-hedad, o̩ma Tabrimo̩n, o̩ma He̩zio̩n, onu Siria, kʼi dodo Damaskus, kakini,
Omi kpʼuwe̩ ki kpʼalo alu kʼata-mi kpʼata-we̩ che: go, e̩wñ ele ajifa kpʼo̩jamalia oñ u ko̩ kpuche̩ rʼe̩ le̩; lo, kʼe̩ fʼalo-we̩ kpai Beasha, onu Israe̩l bie̩, kʼi te̩ wʼubi bʼumi te̩.
Taku Be̩n-hedad netirʼEsa onu, oñ i je̩ ñw amonu ogu-wñ kobo̩ ewo ewo Israe̩l. I la fʼIjo̩n kpai Dan kpai Abe̩l-be̩t-maaka kpai Chine̩re̩t manyʼane̩ Naftali chaka du.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ki Beasha gbo̩ inabali-wñ, i tʼewo Rama eko̩ no̩, oñ i kwogugu Tirza.
Tak onu Esa fʼakoya ta ñw abo Juda chaka, e̩ne̩ du bo̩ tʼane̩ n; taku ma mʼokuta Rama ko kpʼigboli-wñ chaka, owñ chʼe-ku Beasha ne̩ ko̩. Tak Esa onu mʼe-le̩ ko ko̩ Geba e-Be̩njamin kpai Mizpa.
Oñ o̩la Esa du ki bo̩ kpai ugbiti-wñ, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, kpai ewo ewo kʼi ko̩, i che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda n? O̩ga la fʼe̩ e̩re̩ mu o̩jo̩ ogijo-wñ.
Tak Esa cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ugbo amata-wñ, ewo Defid ata-wñ; taku Jiho̩shafat, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.
Nedab, o̩ma Je̩ro̩boam la chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l o̩do̩ ekeji kʼEsa jʼonu Juda; oñ i fʼonu Israe̩l je̩ o̩do̩ meji.
Owñ le̩ ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ che eju Jihofa, i la lule̩ lʼikpa ata-wñ, kpai ef adure-wñ e-ki je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure.
Taku Beasha, o̩ma Ahija kʼi chʼabo unyi Isakar, dʼalu nyʼu. Oñ Beasha fʼowñ kpa Gibe̩to̩n; abo Filistia ne̩ omo̩; todu Nedab kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka jʼakpala nyu Gibe̩ton.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta kʼEsa jʼonu Juda oñ Beasha du Nedab kpa, tak i jʼonu koji-wñ.

Oñ ilewatu, e̩re̩re̩ kʼi jʼonu le̩, i fʼabo unyi Je̩ro̩bo̩am du kpa rinyo̩. I tʼe̩ne̩ kate ki añmʼiñmi no̩ ñwu Je̩ro̩bo̩am in, gbogbo tak i fʼowñ kpa likii; teju alu kʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka le̩ de̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi ka lʼalu adu-wñ Ahija, e̩ne̩ Shilo̩n le̩.
Todu adure adure Je̩ro̩bo̩am kʼi che, kpai e-ki je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure, todu ki bi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, eju.
O̩la Nedab ki bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ du kʼi che, i chʼeko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Ogu la dʼagbagba Esa kpai Beasha, onu Israe̩l, o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-ma kade.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta kʼEsa jʼonu Juda, Beasha, o̩ma Ahija, chane̩ ejʼonu abo Israe̩l chaka Tirza. I je̩ o̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩.
I ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che. I la lule̩ lʼikpa Je̩ro̩boam kpai ef adure-wñ e-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure ge̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Jihiu, o̩ma Hananai, agwunyu Beasha, kakini,
Abu kʼu mʼe̩ du kwef ebutu, kʼu fʼuwe̩ hine, kʼu la dʼuwe chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo-mi Israe̩l, tak e̩ kwolule̩ lʼikpa Je̩ro̩bo̩am, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw amone̩-mi Israe̩l dure, ku ma nʼadure-ma bi mi eju;
go, omi afu Beasha kpʼabo unyi-wñ gba rinyo̩ hioko; oñ nache kʼunyi-we̩ ki dab unyi Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat.
E̩ne̩ Beasha ki leku ef ewo, amabia amʼu du je̩; e̩ne̩ ki la leku oko, ame̩we̩ ojale amʼu du je̩.
O̩la Beasha ki bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ kʼi che kpʼugbiti-wñ, i che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Oñ Beasha cholu manyʼamata-wñ, ma la mʼu du ji Tirza. Tak Ela, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.

Amanyʼe-le̩ o̩la Jihofa lewa agwunyu Beasha kpʼabʼunyi-wñ lʼalu Jihiu akache̩, o̩ma Hananai le̩, tod e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ du kʼi che eju Jihofa, kʼi la nʼuko̩lo̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ che bi owñ eju, abu kʼowñ kpʼabo unyi Je̩ro̩boam chʼe̩re̩ʼka, kʼi laño̩ mʼowñ du kpa.
O̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩fa kʼEsa jʼonu Juda, Ela o̩ma Beasha, chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l Tirza. I la je̩ o̩do̩ meji.
Oñ adu-wñ, Zimri, kʼi chʼagboji ukpe̩reji o̩ko̩ ogu-wñ dʼalu nyʼu. Oñ e̩gba kʼi de̩ Tirza añmʼo̩te̩ ki fʼu mu ef unyi Arza kʼi nʼo̩da unyi onu Tirza.
Zimri la mugudu nyʼejefu oñ i fʼe̩wñ nʼu, oñ i mʼu du kpa o̩do̩ Esa, onu Juda, ogu nyoke mebie. Tak i jʼonu koji-wñ.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼi chane̩ onu-wñ eje̩, abu kʼi lewa gugu oj ede-wñ ababa, i mʼabo unyi Beasha ko kpa chaka. I tʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du no ñw u n, i chaka chʼe-efu-wñ pio̩o̩, i chaka chʼe-onuku-wñ ofo.
Abe̩le̩ Zimri fʼabo unyi Beasha du kpa rinyo̩ teju o̩la Jihofa kʼi ka agwunyu Beasha lʼalu Jihiu, akache̩ le̩,
tod adure Beasha du kpai adure Ela, o̩ma-wñ, owñ chʼe-kʼama onugo dure kpʼe-ku ma je̩ ñw Israe̩l dure, ku ma nʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩-ma nyi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l uwe̩do̩.
Oñ o̩la Ela ki bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ du kʼi che, i che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
O̩do̩ ogu nyoke mebie kʼEsa jʼonu Juda, Zimri jʼonu o̩jo̩ mebie Tirza. Oñ amone̩ le̩ ru ru nyʼu Gibe̩to̩n, e-kʼabo Filistia ne̩ le̩.
Tak amone̩ ku ma ruru jo gbo̩ kakini, Zimri fʼalo da nyʼonu, tak i ño̩ mʼu du kpa, todule̩ abo Israe̩l chaka ku ma jʼuru le̩ mʼO̩mri kʼi chʼagboji abogu du jʼonu Israe̩l o̩jo̩ le̩.
Tak O̩mri kwo Gibe̩to̩n te̩gu alo, abo Israe̩l chaka la le bʼo̩, oñ ma kwokpala nyu Tirza.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku Zimri li ka ku ma fʼewo le̩ du, i le tʼef unyi onu ejefu. Tak i fʼunyi onu gujo bʼo̩la-wñ oji ma, oñ i leku,
tod adure kʼi ta ugbo e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa kʼi che, elule̩ kʼi lule̩ likpa Je̩ro̩boam, kpai ef adure kʼi che kʼi je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure ge̩.
Oñ o̩la Zimri ki bo̩ kpʼalu kʼi da nyʼonu, i che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
E̩gbale̩ abo Israe̩l chʼe̩dareji, ukpe̩reji amone̩ tu Tibni, o̩ma Ginat, ubi ku ma mʼu du jʼonu; ukpe̩reji-ma la tʼO̩mri ubi.
Amone̩ ku ma tʼO̩mri ubi muda fʼamone̩ ku ma tu Tibni, o̩ma Ginat, ubi du: abe̩le̩ Tibni leku, oñ O̩mri jʼonu le̩.
O̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyokeʼka kʼEsa jʼonu Juda, O̩mri chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l. I je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gweji. O̩do̩ me̩fa oñ i je̩ Tirza.
Tak i nʼajifa alu tale̩nt meji la uwo Samaria o̩wo̩ Sheme̩r. Tak i fʼunyi ko̩ oj uwo le̩, oñ i dʼodu ewo kʼi ko le̩ ko̩ Samaria ki bi odu Sheme̩r e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼuwo le̩.
O̩mri ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che. I la fʼe̩wñ bibi che tʼabo du ku ma je̩ akwoubi le.
Todu i lule̩ likpa ki Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat le chaka, kpai ef adure-wñ du e-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure, kʼama ki nʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩-ma nyi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, uwe̩do̩.
Oñ o̩la O̩mri ki bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ kʼi che, kpai ugbiti-wñ kʼi du dufu, i che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Abe̩le̩ O̩mri cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji Samaria. Tak Ehab o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩jo̩ kʼEsa jʼonu Juda, Ehab o̩ma O̩mri chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l, Ehab o̩ma O̩mri la jʼonu Israe̩l Samaria o̩do̩ ogu nyoke meji.
Ehab o̩ma O̩mri la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che tʼabo du ku ma je̩ akwoubi le.
Oñ i lewatu, dabe̩ne̩ kʼelule̩ ef adure Jeroboam o̩ma Nebat, chʼe̩wñ fuye̩ eju-wñ, i ño̩ fʼu Je̩zebel O̩ma E̩tbeal onu Saido̩n, ne̩ chʼo̩ya, tak i re̩ Beal, i laño̩ dojikane̩ ñw u.
Tak Ehab fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpa todu Beal ef unyi Beal e-kʼi ko̩ Samaria.
Oñ i fʼAshe̩ra che; Ehab ño̩ chʼe̩wñ tʼe-i le kʼi nyi Jihofa O̩jo̩ Israe̩l uwe̩do̩ tʼamonu Israe̩l du ku ma je̩ akwoubi le.

O̩kpanachi e-wñ oñ Hie̩l, e̩ne̩ Be̩te̩l, fu Je̩riko ko̩. E̩re̩-wñ kʼi du nyane̩ oñ Abaram o̩mo̩gba-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ lenyo̩; alaku-wñ kʼi la du dago, Segub, o̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-kekele lenyo̩; teju o̩la ku Jihofa ka lʼalu Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun.
Oñ E̩laija, e̩ne̩ Tishbi, kʼi dʼef abo ku ma ge̩ne̩ Gilead, ka ñw Ehab kakini, Oji Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, e-kʼu dago o̩gba wñ-i: Eli achi n, omi alo̩ agbagba o̩do̩-i n, chai e̩gba kʼu ka.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo-wñ kakini,
Kwʼemi alo, kʼe̩ rida tʼo̩wo̩ olodudu, kʼe̩ kwomaja o̩la aji Ke̩re̩t, ki dʼejano̩mo̩ Jo̩rdan le̩.
E-le̩ tak uwe̩ añmo̩ omi aji le̩; omi la ñwa ñw amo̩tagalama ku ma dʼuje̩wñ ñw e̩ je̩ o̩mo̩.
Abe̩le̩ i nyʼache teju o̩la ki Jihofa ka. Todu i nyʼagugu o̩la aji Ke̩re̩t ki dʼudaba Jo̩rdan le̩.
Oñ amo̩tagalama kʼuje̩wñ kpʼe̩la wa ñw u odudu, kpʼuje̩wñ kpʼe̩la e̩gba ane̩, oñ i nañmo̩ aji le̩.
I de̩ pe̩ tak aji le̩ gbe̩, todabu kʼomi ma lo̩ ane̩ o̩mo̩ n.
Tak o̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo-wñ kakini,
Kwane̩ kʼe̩ lo tu Zare̩fat, e-kʼo̩wo̩ abo Saido̩n ne̩, kʼe̩ gugu o̩mo̩, go, omi ñwa ñw o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ʼka o̩mo̩ kʼi dʼuje̩wñ ñw e̩ je̩.
Abe̩le̩ i kwane̩ nyi Zare̩fat. Oñ e̩gba kʼi lewʼalaku ewo le̩, go, o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ do̩mo̩ achʼiji. Tak i nʼomudala dʼo kakini, Chʼomiofo nyʼe̩wñ eku wa ñwu mi re, kʼu ñmo̩, agba.
E̩re̩ kʼi chi alo kʼi che wa, i nʼomudala dʼo̩ kakini, E̩ bʼuje̩wñ nʼo̩wo̩ wa ñwu mi pe̩, awa.

Oñ i kakini, Oji Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, u nʼakala okate n, chai omu e̩ko̩ o̩wo̩ʼka ki bo̩ ef ucha, kpai ekpo re ef uli. E̩ la go, u dʼemi achʼiji re ofo, kʼu nyʼejefu ade̩ e-le̩ tod omi kpʼo̩ma-mi, kʼa je kʼa ku.
Tak E̩laija ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki railo n; nyʼache alu kʼe̩ ka le̩; e̩ muda fʼakala kekele che kʼe̩ mʼu du wa ñwu mi ejodudu, ubi le̩ tak e̩ che e-we̩ kpʼe-o̩ma-we̩.
Todu abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, ka de̩ kakini, Omu atakpa ef ucha le̩ n, ekpo la anya ef uli le̩ n, gbogbo wa kad o̩jo̩ ki Jihofa aje̩ ñw omi ki lo̩ bʼile̩ ma.
Oñ i le nache alu kʼE̩laija ka; tak onobule̩ le̩, kpai E̩laija, kpʼabo unyi onobule̩ le̩ je̩ gboogbo.
Omu ucha le̩ la takpa n ekpo uli le̩ la nya n, teju o̩la Jihofa, owñ chʼe-kʼi ka lʼalu E̩laija.
Anubi e-le̩ ge̩, o̩ma onobule̩ ki chʼiye unyi le̩, chane̩ echo̩ga; o̩ga-wñ la bie̩ne̩, iñmi bo̩ efu-wñ n.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw E̩laija kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-mi kpʼuwe̩, uwe̩ e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩? Uwe̩ wʼugbo mi, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi rewa udu kʼu fe̩, kʼe̩ la dʼo̩ma-mi kpa!
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Dʼo̩ma-we̩ wa ñwu mi. Tak i mʼu gba bʼo̩ e̩do̩ te̩, oñ i mʼu du le tʼunyi ojale ugbo kʼi ru, oñ i mʼu du dachi oj ate̩-wñ onugo.
Tak i raku do̩ Jihofa kakini, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩-mi, uwe̩ ño̩ dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa abʼoji o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ kʼu nage̩ne̩ ugbo-wñ-i ma, kʼe̩ la dʼo̩ma-wñ kpa?
Tak i fʼo̩la-wñ nadala abʼo̩ma le̩ ma onu me̩ta, oñ i naraku do̩ Jihofa kakini, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩-mi, o̩ko̩ nagbabʼe̩, e̩ ki je̩ ñw onugo iñmi o̩ma-i ki dabi wʼef uwñ ge̩.
Jihofa la netirʼomu E̩laija, oñ onugo iñmi o̩ma le̩ mudabi wa ef uwñ, oñ i mudaji.
Tak E̩laija mʼo̩ma le̩ du, oñ i mʼu du gwo̩ru kwef e̩ko̩da unyi le̩ tef unyi, i la mʼu du ñw iye-wñ; oñ E̩laija kakini, Go, o̩ma-we̩ deju.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw E̩laija kakini, Fa-i tak u ma ka kʼuwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩, kʼo̩la Jihofa ki la dʼef alu-we̩ chʼochochi.
Oñ i lewatu abu ku ma fʼo̩jo̩ wewe je̩, o̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Elaija kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ dufu ñw Ehab go; tak omi aje̩ ñw omi lo̩ bʼile̩ ma.
Abe̩le̩ Elaija nyʼadʼo̩la-wñ dufu ñw Ehab go. E̩gbale̩ ukpo̩ta akpa Samaria tabale.
Oñ Ehab fʼObadaya, kʼi nʼo̩da unyi-wñ, do̩ wa (Obadaya le̩ la abe̩gahi Jihofa tabale;
todu alu kʼe-le̩ de̩ de̩: e̩gba ki Je̩ze̩bel fʼamakache̩ Jihofa gwoda rinyo̩, Obadaya mʼamakache̩ ogume̩lu ko, oñ i mʼuma ko maja jʼef owo ooje ooje. I la kʼuje̩wñ kpai omiofo ñwu ma.)

Oñ Ehab ka ñw Obadaya le̩ kakini, E̩ nafʼane̩-i le chaka, ugbo du kʼe̩bi omi de̩, kpai aji aji du: ikani awa neke li ije̩ kʼa gba amanya kpʼamimiulu ku ma we eku, kʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ le̩ ki we elenyo̩ rʼuwa o̩wo̩ chaka.
Taku ma fʼane̩ le̩ kpe̩ rʼeji ñw o̩la-ma kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki le efu-wñ: Ehab kate lʼo̩na e-wñ ojoji, tak Obadaya kate lʼo̩na omune̩.
Oñ abu kʼObadaya dʼej o̩na alo, go, E̩laija de kpʼowñ; i la fʼu ma, i fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ i kakini, Uwe̩ de̩, odu-mi, E̩laija?
Tak i dohi ñw u kakini, Omi de̩; lo, kʼe̩ ka ñw odu-we̩ kakini, Go, E̩laija de̩.
Tak i kakini, Ugbo e̩wñ u dure, kʼuwe̩ nʼeku edʼadu-we̩-i tʼEhab o̩wo̩ kʼi dʼu kpa?
Oji Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, uche̩ichi amone̩ kpʼojane̩ ugbo kʼodu-mi ma kpʼone̩ uche̩ atene we̩ n i de̩ n; oñ e̩gba ku ma kakini, I dʼemi n, i je̩ ñw abo ojane̩ kpai uche̩ichi le̩ go ka kʼama li uwe̩ n.
Fai uwe̩ kakini, Lo, ka ñw odu-we̩ kakini, Go, E̩laija de̩!
Tak e̩gba kʼu kwʼugbo we̩ ababa Afu Jihofa adʼuwe̩ nyʼugbo kʼomi ma ma n; oñ e̩gba kʼu lewa ka ñw Ehab, kʼi ma la li uwe̩ n, i adʼumi kpa. Omi adu-we̩-i la te̩tarailo Jihofa kwʼo̩jo̩ imo̩to̩-mi.
Ma ka ñw odu-mi e̩wñ kʼomi che e̩gba ku Je̩ze̩be̩l fʼamakache̩ Jihofa kpa n? Alu kʼu kʼaboke̩le̩ ogume̩lu kwef amakache̩ Jihofa le̩ maja ef owo ooje ooje n? kʼu la nʼuje̩wñ kpʼomiofo adu ñwu ma n?
Oñ fai uwe̩ kakini, Lo, ka ñw odu-we̩ ka ki go, E̩laija de̩; i la adʼumi kpa.
Tak E̩laija kakini, Oji Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, e-kʼu dago o̩gba-wñ-i, kakini, Nadʼo̩la-mi dufu ñw u go eñini chuu.
Abe̩le̩ tak Obadaya ledo Ehab, oñ i ka ñw u; tak Ehab ledo E̩laija.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼEhab fʼE̩laija li, Ehab ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ de̩? Uwe̩ kʼe̩ ma je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l ñmi n?
Tak i dohi kakini, I chʼomi ma je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l ñmi ni n; chai uwe̩ kpai abo unyi ata-we̩, owñ chʼuko̩ uko̩ Jihofa ku me̩ hiu tinyo̩, kʼuwe̩ la tʼamiBeal ubi.
Todule̩ e̩ nafʼone̩ kpe̩ fai, kʼe̩ la kʼabo Israe̩l du jeju wʼugbo mi uwo Karme̩l, manyʼamakache̩ Beal oli me̩la kpʼamakache̩ Ashe̩ra ulo̩ko̩ ku ma jʼuje̩wñ oj itebulu Je̩ze̩be̩l.
Abe̩le̩ Ehab fʼone̩ kpe̩rʼamo̩ma Israe̩l chaka, oñ i kʼamakache̩ le̩ jeju ugbo kate uwo Karme̩l.

Tak E̩laija te̩me̩rʼamone̩ le̩ chaka, oñ i kakini, Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ me̩ jʼada yo̩yo̩yo̩ agbagba ibe meji le̩ ta? Iche̩wñ ki Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩, me̩ tʼo̩ ubi; i muda che Beal chʼO̩jo̩, maku me̩ tʼo̩ ubi. Amone̩ le̩ la dohi du ñw u n.
Tak E̩laija ka ñw amone̩ kakini, Omi, omi kate bo̩ kʼu chʼakache̩ Jihofa; amakache̩ Beal la chʼone̩ oli me̩la.

Todule̩ ama ki kʼamo̩kokuno̩ meji wa ñw a; tak ama ki mʼo̩kokuno̩ʼka du tod o̩la-ma, ku ma fʼu kpanya ku ma ko jʼoj iji, ama ki la dʼuna tʼo̩ n. Tak omi afʼo̩kokuno̩ ekeji kwu, kʼu ko nʼoj iji, u la adʼuna tʼo̩ n.
Tak ame̩ ki kwa do̩ odu O̩jo̩ e-me̩, oñ omi akwado̩ odu Jihofa; oñ O̩jo̩ ki anʼuna dohi, owñ ki chʼO̩jo̩. Tak amone̩ le̩ du dohi kakini, I ka nyo̩ gbe̩.
Tak E̩laija ka ñw amakache̩ Beal kakini, Me̩ gʼo̩kokuno̩ ku me̩ adu tod o̩la-me̩, ku me̩ fʼu kwu ejodudu, todu ame̩ chʼewewe. Tak ame̩ ki kwado̩ odu o̩jo̩ e-me̩, me̩ ki muda dʼuna tʼo̩ n.

Taku ma mʼo̩kokuno̩ ku ma du ñwu ma le̩ du, oñ ma fʼu kwu, taku ma kwokwado̩ odu Beal akwʼodudu gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼolu woji; ma kakini, O Beal, dohi ñw a! Omuko̩la du la ka n, i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki dohi n. Taku ma jʼada yo̩yo̩yo̩ alʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku ma che le̩ daka.

Tak i lewa tʼe̩gba kʼolu wʼoji oñ E̩laija chane̩ eko̩ ma ru, oñ i kakini, Me̩ kwa taa! Todu o̩jo̩ i che, ube̩k ibe i akpe̩, abe̩k ena i na tʼugboʼka, abe̩k i dʼule̩, abe̩k ikani i chʼolu i ale̩, oñ i dukpe̩ ku me̩ jʼo olu.
Taku ma kwokwa taa, oñ ma nʼo̩be̩ kpʼo̩fa kʼo̩la-ma da alu kʼe̩wñ o̩gu-ma de̩, gbogbo tak o̩la-ma chane̩ echʼe̩bie̩ chakpaa.
Oñ abe̩le̩ i de̩, e̩gba kʼolu mukparʼoji, taku ma kwokache̩ gbogbo wʼiko ku ma kʼe̩wñ ele ane̩ wa che; omuko̩la du la de̩ n, i la nʼe̩ne̩ du ki dohi n, e̩ne̩ du la nyeti n.
Tak E̩laija ka ñw amone̩ le̩ chaka kakini, Me̩ te̩wʼugbo-mi. Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka te̩wʼugbo-wñ. Tak i fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa ku ma gulo̩ wane̩ le̩ ñwo̩che.
Tak E̩laija mʼokuta me̩gweji ko, alu kʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Jeko̩b wewe kade, owñ che Jeko̩b kʼo̩la Jihofa wʼugbo-wñ kakini, Ma adʼodu-we̩ ko̩ Israe̩l.
Tak i nʼokuta le̩ ko̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ef odu Jihofa; oñ i fʼo̩go̩lo̩ na le ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ daka, kʼunana-wñ aje̩ igaluwa meji.
Tak i fʼiji te̩ru, i fʼo̩kokuno̩ kpanya jo̩, oñ i mʼu ko nʼoj iji le̩. Tak i kakini, Kpʼomi nyʼotube̩ me̩le̩ e̩ko̩, ku me̩ mʼu du danyʼoj e̩la iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩, kpai oj iji-wñ.
Tak i kakini, Me̩ chʼabe̩le̩ onu keji ge̩; taku ma che onu keji. Tak i kakini, Me̩ chʼonu ke̩ta ta; taku ma che onu ke̩ta.
Omi le̩ la cha le ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ daka, o̩go̩lo̩ le̩ ño̩ ko̩ ñw omi ge̩.

Oñ i lewatʼiko e̩wñ ele e-ane̩ eche le̩, tak E̩laija akache̩, te̩wa, oñ i kakini, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Ebraham, kpʼe-Aise̩k kpai e-Israe̩l, e̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ma eñini-i ka kʼuwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ efu Israe̩l, kʼomi la chʼadu-we̩, kʼomi la fʼe̩wñ-i du che lʼugbo o̩la-we̩.
Gbʼomu-mi, O Jihofa, gbʼomu-mi kʼamone̩-i ki ma ka kʼuwe̩ Jihofa, chʼO̩jo̩, kʼuwe̩ la mʼe̩do̩-ma rida.
Tak una Jihofa mugulo̩ wane̩, oñ i fʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ lie̩ kpai iji-wñ kpʼokuta-wñ kpai ebutu-wñ, i laño̩ fʼomiofo ki dʼef o̩go̩lo̩ le̩ fana ge̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼamone̩ le̩ chaka fʼu li, ma lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma; oñ ma kakini, Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩, Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩.
Tak E̩laija ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ fʼamakache̩ Beal mu; e̩ne̩ʼkate ef uma ki fʼume̩ o̩wo̩ n, taku ma fʼuma mu; oñ E̩laija mʼuma ko gwo̩ru nyʼaji Kisho̩n, i la ko ma kpa o̩mo̩.
Tak E̩laija ka ñw Ehab kakini, Mute̩gu alo kʼe̩ je̩ kʼe̩ ñmo̩, todu ekuku akiliwo omi dago-i.
Abe̩le̩ Ehab mute̩gu alo kʼi je̩ e̩wñ kʼi ñmo̩. Tak E̩laija mute̩gu tʼoj uwo Karme̩l; oñ i mute̩kpe̩ wʼane̩; i mʼoji-wñ dalo̩ tunyʼagada-wñ.
Tak i ka ñw e̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Mute̩gu alo kʼe̩ go o̩wo̩ ohimini abadi. Tak i mute̩gu i la go, oñ i kakini, E̩wñ du do̩mo̩ n. Tak i kakini, E̩ ño̩ le onu mebie ta.

Oñ i lewatʼonu e̩kebie-wñ, i kakini, Go, akpa kekeleʼka dabe̩ne̩ kʼadaba o̩wo̩ one̩ akwane̩ kwef ohimini dufu. Tak i kakini, Mute̩gu alo kʼe̩ ka ñw Ehab kakini, Fʼo̩la-we̩ mu kʼe̩ gwo̩ru alo kʼomi ojale ki we edʼuwe̩ hi.
Tak i de̩ pe̩ oñ ojale nachubi nʼoj omi ki du le̩ kpai afu. Tak omi lo̩ akiliwo. Ehab la tʼo̩kane̩-wñ alo oñ i nyi Je̩zree̩l.
O̩wo̩ Jihofa la dʼo̩la E̩laija; tak i fʼe̩wñ lʼago-wñ de, oñ i fule tʼEhab o̩gba gbogbo wa alaku Je̩zree̩l.
Tak Ehab fʼe̩wñ du kʼE̩laija che ka ñw Je̩ze̩be̩l, kpai alu kʼi nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa amakache̩ le̩ chaka.
Taku Je̩ze̩be̩l fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo E̩laija kakini, Omi ma dʼoji-we̩ che dab oji e̩ne̩ʼka ef uma gbogbo wʼe̩gba-i o̩na n, mak amo̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che ñwu mi, kpʼe̩wñ ki tʼabe̩le̩ le ta.
Tak e̩gba kʼE̩laija fʼe-le̩ ma, i kwane̩, oñ i ra le tod oji-wñ, oñ i lewa Birshiba, e-ku Juda ne̩. I la tʼe̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ no̩ o̩mo̩.
Ama owñ onugo nyʼajetachi ule̩ o̩jo̩ʼka, oñ i lewa gugu of oli re̩te̩m. Tak i chane̩ edʼo̩jo̩ uku. Oñ i kakini, E-le̩ bo̩jo̩; fa-i, O Jihofa, mʼoji-mi du; todu omi nyo̩ tʼamata-mi le n.
Tak i kwodachi of oli re̩te̩m oka o̩mo̩ alolu. E̩ la go, onuche̩ O̩jo̩ʼka do̩wo̩kadʼo, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ je̩ e̩wñ.
Tak i go, e̩ la go, uje̩wñ oka ku ma ro̩ oj okuta ki kpuna dʼugbo oji-wñ kpʼo̩cha omiofo ge̩. Tak i je̩, oñ i ñmo̩, tak i murida adachi.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ ño̩ lewa onuʼkeji, oñ i do̩wo̩kadʼo, i kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ je̩, todabu kʼule̩-i tʼe̩ le.
Tak i kwane̩, oñ i fʼe̩wñ je̩, i laño̩ ñmo̩. Oñ uje̩wñ kʼi je̩ le̩ dʼukpahiu ñw u tak i le o̩ro̩ka o̩gbo̩ meji kpʼodu o̩gbo̩ meji gbogbo wa Ho̩re̩b, uwo O̩jo̩.
Oñ i lewa owoʼka o̩mo̩. O̩mo̩ i la ru. E̩ la go, o̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo-wñ, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ e̩ che emi, E̩laija?

Tak i kakini, Omi te̩tajogu Jihofa O̩jo̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du nana; todu amo̩ma Israe̩l hi alo-we̩ tinyo̩ ma fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-we̩ gulo̩ wane̩, ma la nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa amakache̩-we̩. Omi, omi kate, bo̩; ma laño̩ tene oji e-mi edu ge̩.

Tak i kakini, Dufu nyʼo̩do̩da, kʼe̩ dago o̩gba Jihofa oj uwo-i. E̩ la go, Jihofa lale, tak afu inaina ju akpʼuwo le̩ fo̩, i laño̩ kpʼokuta le̩ fo̩ o̩gba Jihofa ge̩; Jihofa muda dʼef afu le̩ n. Abu kʼalʼu le̩ lale tak ane̩ kwomiejo. Jihofa la dʼef ane̩ ki miejo le̩ n.
Oñ abu kʼane̩ miejo le̩ una ño̩ lewa. Jihofa laño̩ dʼef una le̩ ni ge̩. Oñ abu kʼuna le̩ lale tak omuko̩la me̩ne̩ wa.
Abe̩le̩, abu kʼE̩laija gbʼo̩, i fʼukpo-wñ wenyʼeju, oñ i le dufu. I kwodago alu owo le̩. E̩ la go, omuko̩laʼka wʼugbo-wñ kakini, E̩wñ e̩ che emi, E̩laija?

Oñ i kakini, U te̩tajogu Jihofa O̩jo̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du nana; todu amo̩ma Israe̩l hi alo-we̩ tinyo, ma la gu ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-we̩ lo̩, oñ ma nʼo̩kwo̩chageli fʼamakache̩-we̩ kpa. Omi, omi kate, bo̩. Ma la tene oji e-mi ku ma du gee̩
Taku Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Mudabi lʼo̩na-we̩ tʼaje̩tachi Damaskus; oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ lewʼo̩mo̩ uwe̩ ki fʼekpo ba tu Hazae̩l oji kʼi mud onu Siria.
Tak uwe̩ abʼekpo tu Jihiu, o̩ma Nishi, oji kʼi jʼonu Israe̩l, kpai E̩laisha, o̩ma Shafat Ebe̩lmehola, uwe̩ abʼekpo tʼo̩ oji kʼi mud akache̩ koji we̩.
Oñ i awatu, e̩ne̩ ki afʼo̩kwo̩chageli Hazae̩l o̩wo̩ tane̩, Jihiu akpa. Oñ e̩ne̩ ki afʼo̩kwo̩chageli Jihiu o̩wo̩ tane̩, E̩laisha akpa.
I chaka adʼabe̩le̩, omi tʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo mebie no̩ tane̩ ñw o̩la-mi ef Israe̩l. Owñ chʼokuku du ki ma te̩kpe̩ ñwu Beal in, kpai alu du ki ma akʼo̩ alu n.

Tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le, oñ i fʼE̩laisha, o̩ma Shafat, li abu kʼi do̩mo̩ aluche̩. Amokuno̩ kʼoli uno̩lo̩ nʼuma o̩lo̩ eji eji ugbo me̩gweji jʼo̩gba-wñ. Owñ la dʼugbo e̩ke̩gweji-ma le̩. Tak E̩laija lale ugbo-wñ, oñ i mʼukpo ko ro̩ bʼo̩ oji ma.
Tak i tʼamokuno̩ le̩ no̩, i la rano E̩laija, oñ i kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi dalukalu ata-mi kpʼiye-mi tak omi atʼe̩ ubi. Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Mudabi todu ab u chʼe̩?

Tak i mudabi bʼo̩ ubi te̩, oñ i mʼamokuno̩-wñ meji kʼoli uno̩lo okate nʼuma o̩lo̩ le̩ ko, oñ i fu ma kpa. I la nʼe̩wñ ido̩na amokuno̩ le̩ chʼiji kʼi hi e̩la-ma. Tak i mʼu ko ñw amone̩, ma la je̩. Tak i kwane̩. I la tʼE̩laija ubi, oñ i che e̩wñ ñw u.
Oñ Be̩n-hedad, onu Siria, kʼabogu-wñ chaka jeju; amonu ogue̩gwa nyoke meji laño̩ jʼugbo-wñ kpʼamanya kpʼo̩kane̩ ogu wewe. Tak i mute̩gu akpala nyu Samaria kʼi la kʼogu bʼo̩.
Oñ i fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼef ewo le̩ ugbo Ehab onu Israe̩l. I kakini, Abu ku Be̩n-hedad ka de̩ kakini,
Ajifa-we̩ kpʼo̩jamalia-we̩ omi ne̩; kpʼamo̩ya-we̩ kpʼamo̩ma-we̩, abo ki chʼuto̩ ef uma omi ne̩ ge̩.
Tak onu Israe̩l dohi kakini, Alu kʼe̩ ka le̩, odu-mi, onu, abe̩le̩ i de̩: uwe̩ ne̩ mi kpʼe̩wñ du kʼu ne̩.
Tak amonuche̩ le̩ ño̩ mudabi wa ge̩, oñ ma kakini, Abu ku Be̩n-hedad ka de̩ kakini, Omi fʼone̩ kpe̩rʼuwe̩ ochochi ka kʼuwe̩ ki mʼajifa-we̩ kpʼo̩jamalia-we̩ kpʼamo̩ya-we̩ kpʼamo̩ma-we̩ ko wa ñwu mi;
omi muda akpe̩ abuko̩lo̩-mi wʼugbo we̩ adiko e̩gba-i o̩na, ama la atejane̩ ef unyi-we̩ kpʼef unyi unyi abuko̩lo̩ e-we̩, oñ e̩wñ du ki jʼo̩mo̩ ki rʼuwe̩ eju e-le̩ ama agwo̩nyʼu ku ma ko kwʼo̩mo̩ wa.

Tak onu Israe̩l fʼabogijo ane̩ le̩ chaka do̩ wa, oñ i kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, me̩ go ta ku me̩ li alu kʼe̩ne̩-i atene e̩bie̩ne̩; todu i fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼumi kʼu kʼamo̩ya-mi kpʼamo̩ma-mi kpʼajifa-mi kpʼo̩jamalia-mi ñw u; u la ko̩ n.
Tak abogijo chaka kpʼamone̩ le̩ du ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki gbʼo̩ n, e̩ ki la je̩ n.

Todule̩ i ka ñw amonuche̩ Be̩n-hedad kakini, Me̩ ka ñw odu-mi, onu, ka kʼe̩wñ du kʼi fʼuche̩-wñ kpe̩rʼadu-wñ e̩gba ejodudu le̩, e-le̩ nache. I muda nʼugbo du kʼu nache e̩wñ kʼe̩ ka ef e-i n. Tak amonuche̩ le̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le, oñ ma dabi adʼinabali le̩ ñw u ge̩.
Taku Be̩n-hedad fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼu, oñ i kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼebutu Samaria anana bo̩jo̩ kʼamone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-mi ki ne̩ e̩kʼo̩wo̩ʼka e̩kʼo̩wo̩ʼka, mak amo̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che mi kpʼe-ki tule ta!
Tak onu Israe̩l dohi kakini, E̩ne̩ ki aji o̩logu ki je̩nyʼo̩la-wñ dab e̩ne̩ kʼi agwʼo̩ jʼane̩ n.
Oñ i lewatu abu ku Be̩n-hedad gbʼohi uche̩ kʼi kpe̩ abu kʼowñ kpʼamonu le̩ jʼef ebu-ma añmʼomi, i ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ dojo̩. Taku ma kwodojo̩ akobʼewo le̩.
E̩ la go, akache̩ʼka te̩me̩rʼEhab, onu Israe̩l, oñ i kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Uwe̩ cheli o̩wo̩ amone̩-i chaka? Go, omi amʼuma ko jʼef o̩wo̩-we̩ eñini-i; tak uwe̩ ama ka kʼomi che Jihofa.
Tak Ehab kakini, Lʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩? Tak i kakini, Alu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Lʼo̩wo̩ amagbadufu e-amagboji ojane̩ ojane̩-we̩. Tak i tene kakini, E̩ne̩ achane̩ ogu-i? Oñ i dohi kakini, Uwe̩.

Tak i mʼamagbadufu e-amagboji ojane̩ ojane̩ ko, aluka-ma chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke meji. Ubi le̩ tak i kʼamone̩ le̩ chaka wa jo̩, owñ chʼamo̩ma Israe̩l chaka, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo mebie.
Taku ma ledufu o̩ro̩ka gbaa. Be̩n-hedad la dʼef ebu añmʼo̩te̩ ki mʼu, owñ kpʼamonu ogue̩gwa nyoke meji ku ma ate̩ko-wñ le̩.
Tak amagbadufu e-amagboji ojane̩ ojane̩ le̩ ledufu ejodudu. Oñ Be̩n-hedad fʼamone̩ kpuche̩, oñ ma kʼohi wa ñw u kakini, Aboke̩le̩ iche̩ka kwo Samaria; wa jo̩-i.
Tak i kakini, Ma nʼo̩lafia wa? Mu ma udeju udeju; dagba ma dufu wa ku ma jogu, mu ma udeju udeju.
Abe̩le̩ abo-i kwef ewo le̩ dufu, owñ chʼamagbadufu e-amagboji ojane̩ ojane̩ le̩ kpai abogu ku ma tʼuma ubi.
Tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma fʼe̩ne̩ʼka kpa oñ abo Siria ra. Abo Israe̩l la rano ma. Be̩n-hedad, onu Siria, muda tanʼanya manyʼamananya oñ i fʼuma o̩wo̩.
Tak onu Israe̩l ledufu oñ i fʼamanya kpʼo̩ko̩ogu o̩ko̩ogu gwodajane̩. I la fʼabo Siria kpa akpa kpa.
Tak akache̩ le̩ te̩me̩rʼonu Israe̩l, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Lo kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ ruko. E̩ fejuwo̩ e̩wñ ki dukpe̩ kʼe̩ che. Todu e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ muda onu Siria akogu wa bʼe̩ ge̩.
Oñ abuko̩lo̩ onu Siria ka ñw u kakini, Amo̩jo̩-ma chʼamo̩jo̩ oj uwo uwo, todule̩ ma nʼukpahiu tʼuwa le. A muda ajogu kpʼama egbili tak a anʼukpahiu tʼuma le chuu.
E̩wñ kʼuwe̩ lañʼache de̩, mʼamonu le̩ ko, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼi kwʼe̩gu-wñ, kʼe̩ la kʼame̩nuto̩gba jʼe̩gu-ma;

kʼe̩ la fʼabogu kaluka ñw o̩la-we̩ ku ma wewe dab abogu ku ma lenyo̩ rʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ le̩. Anya ki dago e̩gu anya. O̩kane̩ ogu ki dago e̩gu o̩kane̩ ogu. Tak a ajogu kpʼama egbili. Abe̩le tak a anʼukpahiu tʼuma le chuu. Oñ i nyʼuma eti; i la fʼabe̩le̩ che.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba o̩do̩ tito̩, taku Be̩n-hedad kʼabo Siria wa jo, oñ i nyʼAfe̩k kʼi kʼogu bʼabo Israe̩l.
Tak abo Israe̩l kʼo̩la-ma jeju jo̩, oñ amone̩ kʼuje̩wñ wa ñwu ma. Taku ma ledo ma. Amo̩ma Israe̩l rujo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼujo̩ amewo kekele meji; abo Siria la che̩ko̩ ane̩ le̩.

Tak e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ lewa ko̩la ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼabo Siria kakini, Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩ e-oj uwo, i muda chʼO̩jo̩ ef o̩go̩ n; todule̩ nakʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ inaina-i nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩. Tak ama ama ka kʼomi che Jihofa.
Oñ ma rujo̩ akpejurʼomune̩ o̩jo̩ mebie. Tak o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ ma mʼo̩wo̩ ko de. Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l fʼabo Siria ku ma le e̩re̩ ofo one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogume̩lu kpa o̩jo̩ʼkate.
Tak abo ki bo̩ ra nyi Afe̩k, tʼef ewo le̩, aku ewo o̩mo̩ la mugulo̩ abʼoji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogu nyoke mebie ki bo̩ ma.

Tak abuko̩lo̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Go, a gbo̩ ka kʼamonu Israe̩l chʼonu ku ma ma gbegbe li ejumomi one̩ n; a agbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, e̩ je̩ ñw a kʼe̩gbanukpo lʼago, kʼa fʼiku da mʼoji, kʼa ki ledufu nyʼugbo onu Israe̩l. Ikani i agbʼoji-we̩ tane̩.

Abe̩le̩ ma fʼe̩gbanukpo lʼago oñ ma fʼiku da mʼoji-ma, taku ma nyʼugbo onu Israe̩l. Oñ ma kakini, Adu-we̩, Be̩n-hedad kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, e je̩ ñwu mi deju. Tak i kakini, I deju ta? O̩maye-mi de̩,

Aboke̩le̩ le̩ la do̩ ka kʼe̩re̩ lile ma ko̩ le̩, oñ ma hika dʼalu nʼalu-wñ, oñ ma kakini, I-i, o̩maye-we̩, Be̩n-hedad le. Tak i kakini, Me̩ lo ku me̩ mʼu du wa. Taku Be̩n-hedad ledufu wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i je̩ ñw u mute̩gu wʼef o̩kane̩ ogu-wñ.

Taku Be̩n-hedad ka ñw u kakini, Ewo ewo du kʼata-mi bʼata-we̩ gba le̩ nakʼo dabiwa ñw e̩. Uwe̩ ki laño̩ chʼikpa-dala ikpadala ñw o̩la-we̩ Damaskus alu kʼata-mi che Samaria. Ehab kakini, E̩ kpʼalo abe̩le̩ kpʼomi mak u natʼe̩ no̩. Abe̩le̩ i fʼalo kpe̩ kpʼowñ, oñ i tʼowñ no̩ kʼi lo.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka ef amo̩ma amakache ka ñw ekeji-wñ lʼugbo o̩la Jihofa kakini, Fʼumi gwo, agba! E̩ne̩ le̩ muda ko̩ egwʼo.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Todabu kʼe̩ ma gbʼomuʼJihofa gbo̩ n, go, ababa kʼe̩ kwʼugbo-mi alo, idu adʼe̩ kpa. Tak ababa kʼi kwo bʼo̩ te̩ idu fʼu li, oñ i mʼu du kpa.
Tak i fʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ li, oñ i kakini, Agba, fʼumi gwo. Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ fʼu gwo; i fʼu gwo o̩me̩me̩le̩ oñ i fʼu chagbe.
Tak akache̩ le̩ kwo bʼo̩mo̩ te̩, oñ i nyʼej o̩na anede onu. I la mʼukpo ko bʼeju ma kʼone̩ ki we emʼo̩.

Tak abu kʼonu alale i kwadʼonu, i kakini, Adu-we̩-i nyʼalumeji ogu ku ma ja le̩, e̩ la go, e̩ne̩ʼka muna adʼe̩ne̩ʼka wʼugbo-mi. I kakini, Fʼe̩ne̩-i de; iche̩wñ kʼi fʼe̩ o̩wo̩ alu du ki che kʼi le, mak oji-we̩ akoji oji-wñ, cho̩kpo̩ni ajifa alu tale̩nt oka e̩ ra ñwu mi.
Oñ abu kʼo̩wo̩ adu-we̩-i dʼef e̩wñ eche tʼemi tʼano̩mo̩, e̩ne̩ le̩ le. Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñw u kakini, Abe̩le̩ ajo̩-we̩ la ade̩; uwe̩ onugo fʼoji-wñ kpa me̩.
Tak i hika mʼukpo ko bʼeju-wñ te̩, oñ onu Israe̩l mejumʼowñ ka kʼi dʼef amakache̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ ka ñw onu kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼuwe̩ je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼomi dute̩ ñw o̩la-mi fʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ le̩, todule̩ oji e-we̩ akoji oji-wñ, amone̩-we̩ la akoji amone̩-wñ ge̩.
Tak onu Israe̩l le tʼunyi-wñ, i nalañu, e̩do̩-wñ kpa nana, oñ i lewa Samaria.
Oñ anubi e̩wñ le̩ Nebo̩t, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l, nʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma Je̩zree̩l me̩rʼunyi Ehab, onu Samaria le̩, anane̩.

Oñ Ehab ka ñwu Nebo̩t kakini, Mʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ le̩ du ñwu mi kʼu nadʼu chʼuche̩ uje̩wñ egini, todabu kʼi me̩rʼunyi-mi; tak u nadʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ki nyo̩ tʼe-le̩ le ñw e̩ koji. I nyo̩ we̩ eju mak u nadʼo̩ko̩ alu aja-wñ ñw e̩.
Oñ Nebo̩t dohi ñw Ehab kakini, Jihofa ki kpo̩na e-le̩, kʼomi ki dʼe̩wñ ogu amata-mi ñw e̩.

Tak Ehab wʼef unyi-wñ alañu, e̩do̩-wñ la kpa, tod o̩la ku Nebo̩t, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l le̩, ka ñw u; todu i kakini, Omi adʼe̩wñ ogu amata-mi ñw e̩ n. Oñ i kwodachi oj ate̩-wñ, i la mʼeju-wñ rida tʼubi oñ i ko̩ eje̩ e̩wñ.
Taku Je̩ze̩be̩l, o̩ya-wñ lewʼugbo-wñ, i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ lañu abe̩-i, kʼuwe̩ ma aje̩ e̩wñ n?

Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Todabu kʼu ko̩la ñwu Nebo̩t, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l le̩, kʼu la ka ñw u kakini, Mʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ le̩ du ñwu mi la, cho̩kpo̩ni uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma omune̩ rʼuwe̩ eju nadʼe-le̩ ñw e̩ koji; oñ i dohi ñwu mi kakini, Nadʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-mi ñw e̩ n.
Taku Je̩ze̩be̩l, o̩ya-wñ, ka ñw u kakini, I chʼuwe̩ nʼo̩da ojane̩ Israe̩l in? Kwane̩ kʼe̩ le̩ e̩wñ, e̩do̩-we̩ ki bo̩; omi adʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma Nebo̩t, e̩ne̩ Je̩zeree̩l le̩, ñw e̩.
Tak i fʼile̩ta ko̩, oñ i dʼodu Ehab tʼo̩, i la nʼuhiuko̩ onu fʼu hiuko̩. Tak i mʼile̩ta le̩ du kpuche̩ rʼugbo abogijo kpʼugbo abo ki nʼojuna ku ma jʼewo-wñ le̩, ku ma dodo kpenyu Nebo̩t.
Oñ i ko̩ ef ile̩ta le̩ kakini, Fʼo̩jo̩ alu eji da, ku me̩ ki hi Nebo̩t tʼoji ef amone̩.
Taku me̩ kʼame̩nebili meji gugu o̩gba-wñ, kʼama ki gbʼijali nyʼu, kakini, Uwe̩ ko̩ O̩jo̩ kpʼonu. Taku me̩ ki mʼowñ du kwʼef ewo dufu ku me̩ kʼokuta ro̩ dʼo kʼi ku.
Tak aboke̩le̩ ewo-wñ, owñ chʼabogijo kpʼame̩nojima ku ma dodo ewo-wñ le̩, che alu ki Je̩ze̩be̩l kpuche̩ rʼuma, alu kʼi ko̩ nyʼile̩ta kʼi du kpuche̩ rʼuma le̩.
Ma fʼo̩jo̩ alu eji da, oñ ma hi Nebo̩t tʼoji ef amone̩ le̩.

Tak aboke̩le̩ meji, ku ma chʼame̩nebili, lewa gugu o̩gba-wñ. Oñ ame̩nebili le̩ gbʼijali nyʼu, Nebo̩t ma gbanyʼu le̩, eju amone̩, kakini, Nebo̩t ko̩ O̩jo̩ kpʼonu. Taku ma mʼu du kwʼef ewo dufu oñ ma kʼokuta ro̩ dʼo kʼi ku.
Taku ma fʼuche̩ kpe̩ru Je̩ze̩be̩l kakini, Ma fʼokuta ro̩ do Nebo̩t, i leku me̩.

Oñ i lewatʼe̩gba ki Je̩ze̩be̩l gbo̩ ka ku ma fʼokuta ro̩ do Nebo̩t, kʼi la leku me̩, taku Je̩ze̩be̩l ka ñw Ehab kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ gba uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma Nebo̩t, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l le̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi ko̩ edu ñw e̩ la le̩; todu Nebo̩t deju ge̩ n, i leku me̩.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼEhab gbo̩ ka ki Nebo̩t leku, tak Ehab kwane̩ kʼi gwo̩ru nyʼef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma Nebo̩t, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l, kʼi mʼu gba chʼe-wñ.
Tak o̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo E̩laija, e̩ne̩ Tishbi le̩, kakini,
Kwane̩, kʼe̩ ledo Ehab, onu Israe̩l, kʼi dodo Samaria. Go, owñ dʼef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma Nebo̩t, ugbo kʼi gwo̩ru nyi kʼi mʼu gba chʼe-wñ.

Tak uwe̩ ki ko̩la ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, E̩ kpa, e̩ ño̩ mʼu gba chʼe-we̩ ge̩? Oñ uwe̩ ako̩la ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ugbo kʼamabia fʼe̩bie̩ Nebo̩t na, o̩mo̩ le̩ amabia afʼe̩bie̩-we̩ na, owñ chʼe-we̩ onugo.
Tak Ehab ka ñw E̩laija kakini, Uwe̩ fʼumi li? uwe̩, e̩nebi-mi-i? Tak i dohi kakini, Omi fʼuwe̩ li ukpe̩ kʼe̩ mʼo̩la-we̩ dute̩ kʼe̩ che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa.
Go, omi akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa abʼuwe̩ oji ma, oñ nagbʼuwe̩ rinyo̩ hioko. Omi la akʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ okoke du, kpʼe̩ne̩ ku ma dʼo̩ hi tʼef unyi kpʼe̩ne̩ ku ma tʼo̩ no̩ tʼo̩do̩da ef Israe̩l, da bʼEhab te̩.
Nache kʼunyi-we̩ ki dab unyi Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebo̩t, kʼi ño̩ dab unyi Beasha, o̩ma Ahija, todu enyi kʼe̩ ityi mi uwe̩do̩, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure.
Jihofa laño̩ dʼo̩la Je̩ze̩be̩l tʼalu aka kakini, Amabia adu Je̩ze̩be̩l je̩ ugbo o̩kpe̩ Je̩zree̩l.
E̩ne̩ Ehab kʼi aku ef ewo amabia adʼu je̩; oñ e̩ne̩ ki aku oko ame̩we̩ ojale aje̩.
I la nʼe̩ne̩ du ki dab Ehab kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ ta kʼi che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa n, e-kʼo̩ya-wñ Je̩ze̩be̩l, kʼo̩ e̩che̩ le̩.
I la fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ che tabale, owñ chʼode kʼi tʼo̩ ubi le̩. I che teju alu du kʼabo Amo̩r, ki Jihofa ne ma dufu bʼamo̩ma Israe̩l o̩gba te̩, che.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼEhab gbʼo̩la le̩, i la fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, oñ i kʼe̩gbanukpo bʼo̩la ma, i kwoji alu, i la dachi kpʼe̩gbanukpo, i nale ye̩ye̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo E̩laija, e̩ne̩ Tishbi le̩, kakini,

E̩ li alu kʼEhab ahi o̩la-wñ wane̩ o̩gba-mi le̩? Todabu kʼi ahi o̩la-wñ wane̩ o̩gba-mi, omi ñʼakʼe̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ wache o̩kpanachi e-wñ-i ge̩ n, chai o̩kpanachi o̩ma-wñ nakʼe̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ wa abʼoji abunyi-wñ ma.
Oñ ma jʼo̩do̩ me̩ta, kʼogu ma dʼagbagba abo Siria kpʼabo Israe̩l n.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta ku Jiho̩shafat, onu Juda, gwo̩ru nyʼugbo onu Israe̩l.
Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Ame̩ ma ka kʼa ne̩ Ramo̩t-gilead le̩ n? Oñ a achechi jʼemi? kʼa ma la agba bʼef o̩wo̩ onu Siria te̩ n?

Tak i ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat kakini, Uwe̩ alebʼumi nyʼokogu Ramo̩t-gilead? Taku Jiho̩shafat ka ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, Alu kʼuwe̩ de̩ omi de̩, amone̩-mi la dabe̩ne̩ kʼamone̩-we̩, amanya e-mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼamanya-we̩.
Taku Jiho̩shafat ka ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, E̩ muda tene alu kʼo̩la Jihofa de̩ eñini-i ta, agba.

Tak onu Israe̩l fʼamakache̩ do̩ wa jeju. Ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩. Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi anyʼoko ekogu bo̩ Ramo̩t-gilead? abe̩k u le n? Taku ma kakini, Mute̩gu alo, todu Ondu adʼu tʼef o̩wo̩ onu.
Ama Jiho̩shafat kakini, Akache̩ Jihofa okate dʼemi amanyʼabo-i, todu kʼa ki tene ugbo-wñ n?

Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñwu Jihoshafat kakini, I chenʼe̩ne̩ kate kʼa neke tu Jihofa ene ugbo-wñ, owñ che Maikaya, o̩ma Imla; owñ muda chʼe̩ne̩ ulaka-mi; todu i akache̩ e̩nyo̩ ugbo mi n, chai e̩bie̩ne̩. Oñ Jiho̩shafat kakini, Onu ki ka abe̩le̩ n,
Tak onu Israe̩l fʼonojiʼka do̩ wa; i kakini, Du Maikaya, o̩ma Imla le̩, wa piopio.
Oñ onu Israe̩l kpai Jiho̩shafat onu Juda, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma gugu oj ede-wñ, otogbo-ma dʼo̩la-ma; ma jʼugbo ki te̩ gbaa alaku Samaria. Amakache̩ chaka la jʼo̩gba-ma akache̩.
Oñ Ze̩de̩kaya, o̩ma Chenaana, fʼigba ebije che ñw o̩la-wñ, oñ i kakini, Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, E̩wñ-i uwe̩ ane̩ kʼabo Siria e̩che̩ gbogbo taku ma lie̩ rinyo̩.
Amakache̩ le̩ chaka kache̩ abe̩le̩, kakini, Mute̩gu nyi Ramo̩t-gilead ki ra ñw e̩; todu Jihofa adʼu tʼef o̩wo̩ onu-i.
Tak onuche̩ kʼi nyʼado̩ Maikaya wa ka ñw u kakini, Go ta, amakache̩ chaka nʼalu okate ako̩la e̩nyo̩ ñw onu: nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼo̩la e-we̩ ki chʼe̩re̩ʼka kpʼe-ma, kʼuwe̩ ki ka e̩nyo̩ ge̩.
Taku Maikaya kakini, Oji Jihofa! E̩wñ ki Jihofa aka ñwu mi, e-le̩ naka.
Tak e̩gba kʼi lewʼugbo onu, onu ka ñw u kakini, Maikaya, a nyi Ramo̩t-gilead kʼa jʼogu? Abe̩k a we? Tak i dohi ñw u kakini, Mute̩gu alo ki ra ñw e̩, todu Jihofa adʼu tʼef o̩wo̩ onu.
Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, E̩re̩ onu monu oñ omi agʼO̩jo̩ nʼe̩ kʼuwe̩ ki ka e̩wñ du ñw omi tʼochochi ef odu Jihofa le n?

Tak i kakini, U fʼabo Israe̩l chaka li abu ku ma che̩kpatuka bʼoj uwo uwo ma, ma jo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma ma nʼadide n; oñ Jihofa kakini, Abo-i nʼodu n; e̩ je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ki dabi tʼunyi-wñ kpʼure̩do̩.
Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñwu Jihoshafat kakini, Omi ka ñw e̩ ka kʼi akache̩ e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ ugbo mi n, chai e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ n?
Taku Maikaya kakini, Todule̩ e̩ nagbʼo̩la Jihofa ke: omi la li Jihofa abu kʼi gugu oj ede-wñ, uwewe abo efojale chaka dago jʼo̩gba-wñ o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ kpʼo̩wo̩ awohi-wñ.
Taku Jihofa kakini, E̩ne̩ agbʼEhab ibe? kʼowñ ki nyi Ramo̩t-gilead kʼi wane̩ o̩mo̩? Tak e̩ne̩ʼka kʼe-wñ, e̩ne̩ omune̩ la kʼe-wñ.
Tak afuʼka kwodufu wa, oñ i kwodago o̩gba Jihofa, i kakini, Omi agbʼo̩ ibe.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ uwe̩ anʼe̩ che? Oñ i kakini, Nadufu kʼu chʼafu olemi ef alu amakache̩-wñ chaka. Tak i kakini, Uwe̩ agbʼo̩ ibe, e̩ la afʼu du. Dufu alo, kʼe̩ che abe̩le̩.
Todule̩ ifa-i go, Jihofa mʼafu olemi du tʼef alu amakache̩-we̩ chaka. Jihofa la ka e̩bie̩ne̩ ugbo we̩.
Taku Ze̩de̩kaya, o̩ma Chenaana, te̩wa, oñ i fʼawo ko̩ Maikaya iti, oñ i kakini, O̩wo̩ ugbo Afu Jihofa le kwʼugbo mi kʼi ako̩la ñw e̩ ke?
Taku Maikaya kakini, Go, o̩jo̩ kʼe̩ nyʼef unyi ejefu kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ maja tak uwe̩ ali.
Tak onu Israe̩l kakini, Me̩ mu Maikaya du ku me̩ mʼu du dabi nyʼugbo Amo̩n, agboji ewo-i, kpʼugbo Joash, o̩ma onu,
ku me̩ ka kakini, Abu kʼonu ka de̩ kakini, Dʼe̩ne̩-i tʼunyi uga ku me̩ dʼuje̩wñ o̩bata kpʼomi o̩bata ñw u ñmo, gbogbo tak u dabiwa kpʼure̩do̩.
Taku Maikaya kakini, Iche̩wñ ki anʼugbo kʼuwe̩ adabiwa kpʼure̩do̩ re kilikili maku Jihofa ko̩la ugbo-mi ge̩ n de̩. Tak i kakini, Me̩ gbo̩, ame̩ amone̩-i o̩chaka-me̩.
Abe̩le̩ onu Israe̩l kpai Jiho̩shafat, onu Juda, mute̩gu nyi Ramo̩t-gilead.
Tok onu Israe̩l ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat kakini, Nakpʼafe̩-mi nyi kʼu nyʼef ogu-i; uwe̩ ki muda kʼotogbo-we̩ nyʼo̩la. Tak onu Israe̩l fʼafe̩-wñ kpanyi oñ i nyʼef ogu le̩.
Onu Siria la ñwa ñw amagboji o̩kogu-wñ ogue̩gwa nyoke meji tane̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki ja kpʼe̩ne̩ du n, tʼe-kekele tʼe-ki nana, chai onu Israe̩l kate.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼamagboji ogu-wñ fu Jiho̩shafat li ma kakini, Onu Israe̩l le̩ de̩ chuu; ma muna tʼo̩mo̩ ku ma ja kpʼowñ; taku Jiho̩shafat kwokwa.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼamagboji o̩kogu le̩ li ka kʼi chʼonu Israe̩l de̩ n, taku ma mudabi bʼeranʼowñ ubi te̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka tʼo̩fa echichi ofofo oñ i lʼowe afe̩ ebije onu Israe̩l amʼu. Todule̩ i ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki agwa o̩kogu-wñ kakini, Mʼo̩wo̩-we̩ rida kʼe̩ mʼumi du bʼef ogu-i te̩; todu agbe-mi tabale.
Tak ogu le̩ ño̩ nana nyo̩gba o̩jo̩ le̩; oñ ma gwo̩nyʼonu dago ef o̩kogu-wñ kʼi ja kpʼabo Siria tak i leku adarane̩-wñ. E̩bie̩-wñ la cha kwef agbe-wñ tʼef o̩kogu le̩.
Oñ ukwa dago ugbo du ef ogu le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼiko kʼolu atunyʼane̩, ma kakini, E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki ayʼewo-wñ, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼi lo tʼane̩ e-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ onu leku. Oñ ma mʼu du wa Samaria. Ma la dʼonu ji Samaria.
Taku ma fʼo̩kogu-wñ gwe̩ ugbo abukpe omi Samaria; oñ amabia fʼe̩bie̩-wñ na. Ugbo kʼamajo̩ko̩ agwʼo̩la i che. I che teju alu kʼo̩la ku Jihofa ka de̩.
Oñ inabali e̩wñ ki bo̩ kʼEhab che, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che kpʼunyi kʼi nʼenyi adagba ko̩ kpʼewo ewo du kʼi ko̩, o̩la-wñ chaka che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ kʼAmonu Israe̩l che le̩ n?
Abe̩le̩ Ehab cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ Ehazaya, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
Jiho̩shafat o̩ma Esa, la chane̩ ejʼonu Juda o̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ kʼEhab jʼonu Israe̩l.
O̩do̩ Jihoshafat chʼogue̩gwa nyoke me̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu; i la je̩ o̩do̩ ogue̩lu Je̩rusale̩m. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Azuba, o̩ma Shilhi.
I la lule̩ o̩na Esa, ata-wñ, chaka; i na bʼo̩ te̩ n, i nache e̩wñ ki chʼokpoko eju Jihofa; i muda je̩ ñwu ma kpʼotete otete le̩ fo̩ n. Amone̩ la te̩tache iche̩bo̩ kpʼotulale egujo oj otete otete le̩.
Oñ Jiho̩shafat fʼalu de kpʼonu Israe̩l kʼure̩do̩ ki do̩mo̩.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ki Jiho̩shafat che kpʼugbiti-wñ kʼi du dufu kpai alu kʼi jogu, inabali-wñ chaka che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ kʼAmonu Juda che le̩ n?
I la fʼabo ki bo̩ ef amachʼe̩wñtuñ ku ma kʼo̩la-ma ñw ode ode iko ata-wñ Esa le̩ ne bʼane̩ le̩ te̩.
Onu du la dʼIdo̩m e̩gba le̩ n, agbe̩kunyo̩ʼka do̩mo̩.
Jiho̩shafat la fʼo̩ko̩ Tarshish che kʼama ki nyʼOfir ako o̩jamalia wa; ma muda le̩ n, todu o̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ le̩ kpo̩fo̩ E̩zion-ge̩ba.
Tak Ehazaya, o̩ma Ehab, ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat kakini, E̩ je̩ ñw abuko̩lo̩-mi ki lebʼabuko̩lo̩-we̩ ef o̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ le̩. Jiho̩shafat muda je̩ n.
Jiho̩shafat cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji manyʼamata-wñ ewo Defid, ata-wñ. Taku Jiho̩ram, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
Ehazaya o̩ma Ehab chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l Samaria o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwebie ku Jiho̩shafat jʼonu Juda. I jʼonu Israe̩l o̩do̩ meji.
I la che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa, oñ i lule̩ o̩na ata-wñ kpʼo̩na iye-wñ kpʼo̩na Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebo̩t, e-kʼi je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.
I la re̩ Beal, i laño̩ dojikane̩ ñw u. Oñ i nyi Jihofa O̩jo̩ Israe̩l uwe̩do̩ alu du kʼata-wñ che le̩.
Oñ abu kʼEhab leku, abo Moab fʼe̩re̩ ubi ro̩ ñw abo Israe̩l.

Ehazaya la muñwa lʼope unyi ojale-wñ kʼi de̩ Samaria anʼane̩, oñ i kwochʼo̩ga; tak i fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nyʼatene ugbo Bee̩l-zebub, o̩jo̩ E̩kro̩n, abe̩k omi akwane̩ o̩ga kide̩.

Ama onuche̩ Jihofa ka ñwu E̩laija e̩ne̩ Tishbi le̩ kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ ledo amonuche̩ onu Samaria, kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Ukpe̩ kʼO̩jo̩ du ma dʼIsrae̩l in, oñ ame̩ nyʼatene ugbo Bee̩l-zebub, o̩jo̩ E̩kro̩n le̩?
Todule̩ e̩wñ ki Jihofa aka fa-i de̩ kakini, Uwe̩ akwʼoj ate̩-we̩ ugbo kʼe̩ te̩gu nyi le̩ tane̩ n, eku uwe̩ la aku. Tak E̩laija kwʼo̩mo̩ le.
Tak amonuche̩-wñ mudabi wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, i Abile kʼame̩ dabiwa-i?

Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka te̩gu ledo wa, oñ i ka ñw a kakini, Me̩ lo, me̩ mudabi nyʼugbo onu ki kpʼume̩ uche̩ le̩, ku me̩ ka ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ukpe̩ kʼO̩jo̩ du ma dʼIsrae̩l in, oñ uwe̩, akpuche̩ atene ugbo Bee̩l-zebub, o̩jo̩ E̩kro̩n? Todule̩ uwe̩ ñʼakwʼoj ate̩-we̩ ugbo kʼe̩ te̩gu nyi le̩ tane̩ n, eku uwe̩ la aku.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu e̩ne̩ kʼi te̩gu wa ledo me̩ kʼi la kʼo̩la-i ñwu me̩ le̩ de̩ ta?
Oñ ma dohi ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ ki nyʼafe̩ ku ma nʼedudu che kʼaño̩ la lʼago-wñ de i che. Tak i kakini, E̩laija, e̩ne̩ Tishbi le̩, de̩.
Tak onu fʼagboji one̩ ooje manyʼone̩ ooje-wñ kpe̩rʼuwñ. Oñ i mute̩gu nyʼugbo-wñ; e̩ la go, i gugu oj uwo le̩, tak i ka ñw u kakini, O uwe̩ e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩, onu kakini, Mugwo̩ru wa.

Tak E̩laija dohi, oñ i ka ñw agboji one̩ ooje le̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼomi chʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩, mak una ki nagwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa kʼi fʼuwe̩ kpʼabo-we̩ ooje le̩ lie̩. Tak una mugwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa oñ i fʼowñ kpʼabo-wñ ooje lie̩.
Tak i ño̩ fʼagboji ooje omune̩ manyʼabo-wñ ooje kpe̩rʼu ge̩. Tak e-le̩ dohi ka ñw u kakini, O uwe̩ e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩, abu kʼonu ka le̩ de̩ kakini, Mugwo̩ru wa piopio!

Tak E̩laija dohi ka ñwu ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼomi chʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩, mak una ki nagwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa kʼi fʼuwe̩ kpʼabo-we̩ ooje lie̩. Tak una O̩jo̩ mugwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa, oñ i fʼowñ kpʼabo-wñ ooje le̩ lie̩.

Tak i ño̩ fʼagboji one̩ ooje e̩ke̩ta kpe̩ manyʼabo-wñ ooje ge̩. Tak agboji ooje e̩ke̩ta le̩ mute̩gu, oñ i lewa kʼokuku nyʼane̩ o̩gba E̩laija, oñ i gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩, i la ka ñw u kakini, O uwe̩, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩, agba, e̩ je̩ ñw oji-mi kpʼoji amadu-we̩ ooje-i ki mud e̩wñakoko eju-we̩
E̩ go, una gwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa, oñ i fʼamagboji one̩ ooje meji o̩gbo̩gba le̩ kpʼabo-ma ooje ooje lie̩; e̩ muda je̩ ñw oji-mi mud e̩wñ akoko eju-we̩ fa-i ke.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa ka ñw E̩laija kakini, Gworu lebʼo̩ alo; e̩ ki railo owñ n. Tak i kwane̩, oñ i mugwo̩ru lebʼo̩ nyʼugbo onu,

tak i ka ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Abu kʼuwe̩ fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼatene ugbo Bee̩l-zebub, o̩jo̩ E̩kro̩n le̩, ukpe̩ kʼO̩jo̩ du ma dʼIsrae̩l in kʼuwe̩ atene ugbo o̩la-wñ i che? todule̩ uwe̩ ñʼagwo̩ru kwʼoj ate̩ ugbo kʼe̩ mute̩gu nyi le̩ tane̩ n, eku uwe̩ la aku.
Abe̩le̩ i leku alu kʼo̩la Jihofa kʼE̩laija ka le̩ de̩. Taku Jihoram chane̩ ejʼonu koji-wñ o̩do̩ ekeji ki Jihoram o̩ma Jiho̩shafat jʼonu Juda; todabu kʼi ma nʼo̩ma n.
Oñ uko̩lo̩ ki bo̩ kʼEhazaya che, inabali-wñ la che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada o̩la Iko E̩wñ kʼAmonu Israe̩l che le̩ n?
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ki Jihofa ache kʼi dʼE̩laija ef ofutu tʼefojale, kʼE̩laija kwo Gilgal lebʼE̩laisha.
Tak E̩laija ka ñwu E̩laisha kakini, Agba, e̩ gugu emi ta; todu Jihofa kpe̩ mi gbogbo nyi Be̩te̩l. Tak E̩laisha kakini, Oji Jihofa, kpʼoji onugo-we̩ ge̩, nakwo bʼe̩ te̩ n.

Abe̩le̩ ama gwo̩ru nyi Be̩te̩l. Tak amo̩ma amakache̩ ku ma jo̩ Be̩te̩l kwodufu nyʼugbo E̩laisha, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ chema ka ki Jihofa adʼodu-we̩ bʼuwe̩ o̩gba te̩ eñini-i? Oñ i kakini, Iii, u chema; me̩ chechi.
Tak E̩laija ka ñw u kakini, E̩laisha, Agba, e̩ gugu emi ta; todu Jihofa kpe̩ mi nyi Je̩riko. Tak i kakini, Oji Jihofa, kpai oji onugo-we̩ ge̩, nakwo bʼe̩ te̩ n. Abe̩le̩ ma lewa Je̩riko.
Tak amo̩ma amakache̩ ku ma jo̩ Je̩riko te̩me̩ru E̩laisha, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ chema ka ki Jihofa adʼodu-we̩ bʼuwe̩ o̩gba te̩ eñini? Oñ i dohi kakini, lii, u chema; me̩ chechi.
Tak E̩laija ka ñw u kakini, Agba, e̩ gugu emi ta; todu Jihofa kpe̩ mi nyi Jo̩rdan. Tak i kakini, Oji Jihofa kpʼoji onugo-we̩ ge̩, nakwo bʼe̩ te̩ n. Tak ama meji kʼe̩re nyʼule̩ alo.
Tak aboke̩le̩ ooje, ef amo̩ma amakache̩, le tekejo̩ akpejuru ma o̩najiji; oñ ama meji dago eti Jo̩rdan.
Tak E̩laija mʼaliche̩ba-wñ ko, oñ i fʼu che̩, tak i mʼu du gwʼomi le̩, oñ i mukpe̩ meji, oka le tʼemi, oka le tʼano̩mo̩, oñ ama meji le ane̩ e̩gbe̩ daba.

Oñ i lewatu, abu ku ma mudaba, E̩laija ka ñw E̩laisha kakini, E̩ bi mi e̩wñ kʼu nache ñw e̩ o̩gba taku ma mʼumi du bʼe̩ te̩. Tak E̩laisha kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw ukpe̩ afu e-we̩ meji ki bʼumi o̩la ma.
Tak i kakini, E̩wñ ki gbiti e̩ tene le̩; iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ali mi abu ku ma adʼumi bʼe̩ te̩, mak i adʼabe̩le̩ ñw e̩; e̩ ma muda li n, i adʼabe̩le̩ n.
Oñ i lewatu, abu ku ma alule̩ alo ku ma nʼoluka ache, e̩ la go, o̩kogu e-una kpʼamanya e-una, fʼuma daru bʼomune̩ te̩; oñ E̩laija mute̩gu ef ofutu tʼefojale.
E̩laisha la fʼu li, oñ i kwa kakini, Ata-mi, ata-mi, o̩kogu e-Israe̩l kpʼamanya-wñ de̩! Oñ i ño̩ li owñ ge̩ n.
I laño̩ mʼaliche̩ba E̩laija ki mugwo̩ bʼo̩la-wñ te̩ le̩ ko nʼo̩wo̩, tak i dabi, oñ i lewa dago oj ugbogbo Jo̩rdan.

Tak i mʼaliche̩ba E̩laija kʼi mu gwo̩ bʼo̩la-wñ te̩ le̩ ko, oñ i mʼu ko gwo omi aji le̩, i kakini, Ugbo Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-E̩laija de̩? Tak e̩gba kʼi fʼomi aji le̩ gwo, i mukpe̩ reji, oka le tʼemi oka le tʼano̩mo̩; oñ E̩laisha mudaba.
Tak e̩gba kʼamo̩ma amakache̩ ku ma jo̩ Je̩riko ame̩rʼu o̩mo̩ fʼu li, ma kakini, Afu E̩laija tane̩ E̩laisha. Taku ma wa de kpai owñ, oñ ma fʼo̩la-ma te̩kpe̩ wane̩ o̩gba-wñ.

Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Go, ta, ame̩nugbiti ooje jʼugbo amadu-we̩-i; agba, e̩ je̩ ñwu ma lo, ku ma tene odu-we̩, tode̩gba kʼAfu Jihofa mʼu du te̩gu, kʼi la mʼu du tinyo̩ oji uwoʼka, abe̩k ef o̩go̩ʼka. Tak i kakini, Me̩ ki gbe̩do̩ kpuche̩ abe̩le̩ n.
Tak abu ku ma kutʼo̩ gbogbo tak anyo̩ fʼu mu, i kakini, Me̩ kpe̩ ke. Todule̩ ma fʼone̩ ooje kpe̩ lo; oñ ma tejane̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta, ma muda liʼu n.
Taku ma mudabi wʼugbo-wñ, abu kʼi de̩ Je̩riko ta; oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, U ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Me̩ ki le ni n?
Tak aboke̩le̩ ewo le̩ ka ñw E̩laisha kakini, Go, o̩ko̩ a agbabʼe̩, ugbo kʼewo-i jo̩ chʼuto̩ tabale, alu kʼodu-mi cheli, omi-wñ muda bie̩ne̩. Ane̩-wñ la aje̩ ñwu ma kʼo̩ma rinyo̩.
Tak i kakini, Dʼugba etito̩ wa ñwu mi, me̩ ki la dʼomu tʼef uwñ pe̩. Oñ ma mʼu du wa ñw u.
Tak i ledufu nyʼugbo e̩bi omi-ma le̩, i la mʼomu ko rikpolo nyʼef uwñ, oñ i kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Omi fʼo̩ga omi-i che me̩. Uku kpai o̩ma eko̩ rinyo̩ año̩ kwʼugbo-wñ dufu ge̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ o̩ga omi le̩ takpa tʼeñini, alu kʼo̩la kʼE̩laisha ka le̩ de̩.
Tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ mute̩gu nyi Be̩te̩l; oñ abu kʼi dʼej o̩na alo, abimo̩to̩ okolobia kwef ewo le̩ dufu akʼo̩ ru, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Mute̩gu alo, uwe̩ abʼoji kpo̩ñma; mute̩gu alo, uwe̩ abʼoji kpo̩ñma.
Tak i dejubi, i fʼu ma li, oñ i nama ñwu ma ef odu Jihofa. Tak amole ibe̩r meji kwʼefoko o̩mo̩ dufu, oñ ma fʼabimo̩to̩ okolobia-ma o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke meji fana.
Tak i kwo o̩mo̩ le tʼuwo Karme̩l, oñ akwʼo̩mo̩ i mudabi nyi Samaria.
Oñ Jihoram, o̩ma Ehab, chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l Samaria, o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩ ki Jiho̩shafat jʼonu Juda. I la je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gweji.
I ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, i muda che dab ata-wñ kpʼiye-wñ n; todu i mʼojibo Beal kʼata-wñ che le̩ du tinyo̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ i gwo̩nyʼadure Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat le̩, owñ chʼe-ki ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure: i kwo bʼe-le̩ te̩ n.
Oñ Me̩sha, onu Moab, chʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼamala; i la kʼamo̩mala icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu me̩lu, kpʼamokolo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu me̩lu manyʼedudu-ma rʼare̩ ñw onu Israe̩l.
Ama i lewatu e̩gba kʼEhab leku, onu Moab le̩ fʼe̩re̩ ubi ro ñw onu Israe̩l.
Tak onu Jihoram kwo Samaria dufu iko le̩, oñ i kʼabo Israe̩l chaka wajo̩.

Tak i le nakpʼuche̩ ru Jiho̩shafat onu Juda kakini, Onu Moab ko̩ mi me̩; e̩ je̩ kʼe̩ lebʼumi akʼogu bo̩ Moab? Oñ i kakini, Nale; omi dʼalu kʼuwe̩ de̩, abo-mi la dab abo-we̩, amanya-mi ño̩ dab amanya-we̩ ge̩.
Tak i kakini, O̩na e-ugbo oñ a ale nyʼo̩mo̩? Tak i dohi kakini, O̩na aje̩tachi Ido̩m.
Abe̩le̩ onu Israe̩l le̩ kpai onu Juda kpai onu Ido̩m. Oñ ma dagbala dagbala le ule̩ o̩jo̩ mebie; omiofo la do̩mo̩ todu abogu kpʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ki tʼuma ubi n.
Tak onu Israe̩l kakini, Atogwo! Todu Jihofa fʼamonu me̩ta-i ko wa jʼugbo okate kʼi mʼuma ko jʼo̩wo̩ Moab.
Ama Jiho̩shafat kakini, Akache̩ Jihofaʼkate dʼemi, kʼa tu Jihofa ene lʼugbo-wñ n? Tak e̩nuko̩lo̩ onu Israe̩l oka dohi kakini, E̩laisha, o̩ma Shafat, dʼemi, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki chʼomiofo nyʼE̩laija o̩wo̩.
Taku Jiho̩shafat kakini, O̩la Jihofa dʼugbo-wñ. Abe̩le̩ onu Israe̩l kpai Jiho̩shafat kpai onu Ido̩m gwo̩ru nyʼugbo-wñ.

Tak E̩laisha ka ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-mi kpʼuwe̩? Nyʼugbo amakache̩ ata-we̩ kpai ugbo amakache̩ iye-we̩ ke. Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñw u kakini, O̩da, todu Jihofa fʼamonu me̩ta-i kowa jo̩ kʼi ko ma jʼo̩wo̩ Moab.
Tak E̩laisha kakini, Oji Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, e-kʼomi dago o̩gba-wñ-i, ochochi, i ma chʼeju Jiho̩shafat, onu Juda, ki wʼumi eju n, u ma rʼeju-mi da ago ugbo kʼe̩ de̩ n, u ma le li uwe̩ n.
Ama fa-i, me̩ ki la dʼe̩ne̩ ki anʼumolo wa ñwu mi. Oñ i lewatu abu kʼene̩ le anʼumolo, o̩wo̩ Jihofa lewa abʼowñ ma.
Oñ i kakini, Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Me̩ che kʼo̩go̩-i ki chʼe̩ko̩ ñw uta, uta.
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Ame̩ ñʼali afu n, me̩ lañʼali omi ojale n; o̩go̩-i muda ako̩ ñw omi, oñ ame̩ añmo̩ tʼame̩ tʼame̩wñ ukpa-me̩ tʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩-me̩.
E̩wñ kʼa ka-i la chʼe̩wñ fuye̩e̩ eju Jihofa ta; i año̩ ko abo Moab le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-me̩ ge̩.
Tak ame̩ ki gwo ewo du ki nʼaku kpai ewo o̩me̩me̩le̩ du da, me̩ ki la lʼoli o̩me̩me̩le̩ du wane̩, me̩ ki kʼe̩bi e̩bi omi du re, me̩ ki lañʼakʼokuta nyʼe̩bu e̩bu ane̩ ki nyo̩ du ku me̩ kpʼo̩ bie̩.
Oñ i lewatu odudu-wñ, dabe̩ne̩ kʼiko ku ma kʼe̩wñ ele wa odudu le̩, e̩ la go, omi nacha kwʼo̩na Ido̩m le̩ awa, oñ ane̩ o̩mo̩ chaka chʼomiofo.
Oñ e̩gba kʼabo Moab chaka gbo̩ ka kʼamonu le̩ wa akʼogu bʼuma, ma kʼo̩la-ma jeju, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ du kʼo̩do̩-wñ bʼe̩wñ ogu eko nyʼo̩la jo̩, gbogbo tʼabogijo, oñ ma kwodago jo̩ alo̩me̩ ane̩ma.
Tak u ma takpa kwane̩ odudu, oñ olu nafu bʼomi le̩ ma. Tak abo Moab fʼomi ki me̩ru ma li kʼi la kpa dab e̩bie̩.
Oñ ma kakini, E̩bie̩ de̩; amonu le̩ kobʼo̩lama me̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la fʼekeji-wñ kpa de̩. Fa-i abo Moab, a alo kʼa jʼakpa ke!
Ama e̩gba ku ma lewa uru abo Israe̩l, abo Israe̩l kwane̩ agwo abo Moab da, oñ ma ra rʼuma o̩gba; taku ma nyʼo̩gba alo toj ane̩ le̩ agwo abo Moab da jane̩.

Ma la guʼewo ewo-ma lo̩; oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma dʼokuta-wñ rikpolo tʼe̩bu e̩bu ane̩ ki nyo̩ okoke, oñ ma konyʼu e̩ko̩-wñ. Ma la fʼe̩bi omiofo chaka kare, oñ ma fʼoli-wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ du lo̩, gbogbo tak okuta ku ma to̩no̩ kibo̩ chʼefu Kir-hare̩se̩t kate; ama abo inata donyʼewo le̩ daka, oñ ma fʼu gwoda.
Tak e̩gba kʼonu Moab li ka kʼogu kpuna tʼowñ le, i mʼaboke̩le̩ oli me̩gwe̩le̩ ku ma nʼo̩be̩chageli ko le bʼowñ, kʼi chʼe̩do̩ kpulu gu ef uma du anyʼugbo onu Ido̩m; ma muda neke che n.
Tak i mʼo̩ma-wñ ogijo kʼi dʼukpe̩ kʼi jʼo̩fe̩ koji-wñ du, oñ i mʼu du chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo oj o̩do̩ o̩mo̩. Oñ uwe̩do̩ inaina mutajo bʼabo Israe̩l oji ma; taku ma kwo bʼo̩ te̩, oñ ma mudabi tʼane̩-ma.

Oñ onobule̩ʼka kʼi dʼef amo̩ya amo̩ma amakache̩ raku nyʼE̩laisha O̩la kakini, O̩ma-we̩, o̩ko̩-mi, leku me̩; uwe̩ la chema kʼadu-we̩-i railo Jihofa, oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩ o̩me̩ lewa kʼi kʼamo̩ma-mi meji chadu.
Tak E̩laisha ka ñw u kakini, Abʼu nache ñw e̩, ka ñwu mi, e̩wñ e̩ ne̩ ef unyi-we̩? Oñ i kakini, Adu-we̩ onobule̩-i nʼe̩wñ du ef unyi-wñ n, chai uli ekpoʼka.
Tak i kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ nyʼo̩do̩da ame̩ e̩wñ eku ugbo amekeji-we̩, e̩wñ eku kʼef uwñ te̩ ofo; e-kʼe̩ me̩ kʼi de̩ ke̩ n.
Tak uwe̩ ki nyʼejefu kʼe̩ fʼo̩na re nyʼo̩la-we̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩, kʼe̩ chi nyʼe̩wñ eku le̩ chaka; e-kʼi ko̩ e̩ mʼu du gugu iba.
Abe̩le̩ i kwʼugbo-wñ le, oñ i fʼo̩na re nyʼo̩la-wñ kpai amo̩ma-wñ; oñ ma kʼe̩wñ eku le̩ wʼugbo-wñ, tak i nachi nyʼu.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼe̩wñ eku le̩ che̩ko̩ chaka, i ka ñw o̩ma-wñ kakini, E̩ dʼe̩wñ eku wa ta. Tak i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ eku du bo̩ n. Tak ekpo le̩ muda.
Tak i lewa ka ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩. Oñ i kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ mʼekpo le̩ ko ta, kʼe̩ fʼo̩me̩-we̩ ra, kʼuwe̩ kpai amo̩ma-we̩ ki nʼe̩bo̩bo̩-wñ chʼeku o̩la-me̩.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩jo̩ʼka kʼE̩laisha lale nyi Shune̩m, ugbo kʼanana onobule̩ʼka de̩; oñ i kutʼo̩ kʼi jʼuje̩wñ. Abe̩le̩ i la de̩, e̩gba du kʼi alale, i ana nyʼo̩mo̩ kʼi jʼuje̩wñ.
Oñ onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw o̩ko̩-wñ kakini, Go ta, u cheli kʼe̩ne̩-i chʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ kiafo̩, kʼi alale gu emi du e̩gba du.
Agba, a ki fʼunyi kekeleʼka ko̩ oj o̩do̩-i; kʼa kʼate̩ kpʼitebulu kpʼe̩wñ ugugu, kpʼagege jʼo̩mo̩ ñw u; tak i awatu e̩gba kʼi lewʼugbo wa, i ana nyʼo̩mo̩.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩jo̩ʼka, kʼi lewʼo̩mo̩, i la muna tʼef unyi o̩mo̩, oñ i kwodachi.
Tak i ka ñw Ge̩hezai, imo̩to̩-wñ, kakini, Dʼe̩ne̩ Shune̩m-i wa. Oñʼe̩gba kʼi fʼu do̩ i lewa dago o̩gba-wñ.

Oñ i ka ñw adu-wñ kakini, Ka ñw onobule̩-i, kakini, Go uwe̩ te̩tadibete̩ wa kʼe̩ chʼakanya e̩wñ-i du; e̩wñ a ache todu we̩ ke? Uwe̩ neku kʼa kʼo̩la-we̩ ñw onu? abe̩k onu ogu? Tak i dohi kakini, Ef abo-mi onugo u gugu-i.
Oñ i kakini, Mak e̩wñ a ache ñw u ke? Taku Ge̩hezai dohi kakini, Ochochi, i nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, oko-wñ la chʼogijo.
Oñ i kakini, Dʼo̩ wa. Oñ e̩gba kʼi fʼu do̩, onobule̩ le̩ wa dago alugbana.
Tak E̩laisha kakini, Iko e̩gba-i o̩do̩ omune̩ uwe̩ agba o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mʼe̩do̩. Tak i kakini, O̩da, odu-mi, uwe̩ e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩, uwe̩ ki rʼadu-we̩ onobule̩-i olemi n.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ fʼefu nyo̩, oñ e̩gba kʼo̩do̩-wñ muda ko iko le̩ i fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi alu kʼE̩laisha ka ñw u.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩ma le̩ chane̩ echʼo̩kone̩ alo, i lewa tʼo̩jo̩ʼka, i dufu nyʼugbo ata-wñ ugbo abo ku ma kpʼo̩ka.
Oñ i ka ñw ata-wñ kakini, Oji-mi, oji-mi! Tak i ka ñw e̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Mʼu du nyʼugbo iye-wñ.
Tak e̩gba kʼi mʼu du kʼi la du wa ñw iye-wñ, i nʼe̩re̩ iye-wñ gbogbo wʼolu woji tak i leku.
Tak i mute̩gu amʼu du dachi oj ate̩ e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, oñ i fʼo̩na re nyʼu, tak i le dufu.
Tak i nʼomu dala dʼo̩ko̩-wñ kakini, Agba, e̩ je̩ ñw e̩nuko̩lo̩ʼka ki lewʼugbo mi, kpʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ʼka, kʼomi ki fule nyʼugbo e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, kʼu dabi wa.
Tak i kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ anyʼugbo-wñ eñini? Ochu ne etito̩ n, i la chʼo̩jo̩ uñmi de̩ n. Tak i kakini, I ra ke.
Tak i dʼofidi nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩, oñ i ka ñw e̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Kanyi kʼa lo; ule̩-wñ ki bulo̩ ñwu mi n, chai e̩gba kʼu ka ñw e̩.
Abe̩le̩ i le, oñ i lewʼugbo e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ uwo Karme̩l.
agba, fule ledʼo ta, kʼe̩ la ka ñw u kakini, O̩lafia i che? O̩ko̩-we̩ chʼo̩lafia? O̩ma-we̩ le̩ chʼo̩lafia? Oñ i dohi kakini, O̩lafia i che.

Tak e̩gba kʼi lewʼugbo e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ ugbo uwo le̩, i gwo̩nyʼe̩re̩-wñ. Taku Ge̩hezai te̩wa kʼi kʼe̩ e̩che̩ wubi; ama e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, Tʼowñ no̩; todu e̩do̩-wñ chʼe̩kpa; Jihofa la dʼoji-wñ maja ñwu mi, i la ka ñwu mi n.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ kakini, Omi bi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ugbo odu-mi? U kakini, e̩ ki rʼumi olemi n in?

Tak i ka ñwu Ge̩hezai kakini, Mʼukpo-we̩ ko̩ jʼiñmi, e̩ la mʼo̩kpa-mi du nʼo̩wo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ lo we̩; iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ kpai e̩ne̩ du de, e̩ ki gwʼo̩ n; i la che̩wñ kʼone̩ gwʼe̩, e̩ ki je̩ n; tak e̩ mʼo̩kpa-mi du nʼeju o̩ma le̩.
Tak iye o̩ma le̩ kakini, Oji Jihofa, kpai oji onugo-we̩ ge̩, nakwo bʼe̩ te̩ n. Tak i kwane̩, oñ i tʼonobule̩ le̩ ubi.
Taku Ge̩hezai dʼo̩gba ma, oñ i mʼo̩kpa du nʼeju imo̩to̩ le̩; i muda nʼuko̩la n, i la nyʼeti n. Todule̩ i mudabi aledʼo, oñ i ka ñwu kakini, O̩ma le̩ jʼolu ta n.
Tak e̩gba kʼE̩laisha lewʼef unyi le̩, go, o̩ma le̩ leku te̩, oñ i dachi oj ate̩ e-wñ.
Todule̩ i nyʼejefu, oñ i fʼo̩na re nyʼo̩la-wñ kpʼimo̩to̩ le̩, oñ i narodubo̩ Jihofa.
Tak i mute̩gu adachi bʼo̩ma le̩ ma, oñ i dʼalu-wñ kad alu e-wñ, eju-wñ la kado eju e-wñ, o̩wo̩-wñ la bʼo̩wo̩-wñ ma; i la fʼo̩la-wñ nadala bʼo ma; tak año̩la imo̩to̩ le̩ chane̩ ekpuna waa.
Tak i mudabi, i lelo lewa ef unyi le̩ onuʼka; tak i mute̩gu anʼo̩la-wñ dala bʼo ma; oñ imo̩to̩ le̩ tʼachifo onu mebie, imo̩to̩ le̩ mʼeju chi.
Tak i do̩ Ge̩hezai kakini, Dʼe̩ne̩ Shune̩m le̩ wa. Abe̩le̩ i fʼu do̩. Tak e̩gba kʼi mugudu wʼejefu ugbo-wñ, i kakini, Mʼo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩-i du.
Tak i nyʼejefu, oñ i lewane̩ e̩re̩-wñ, oñ i dojikane̩; tak i mʼo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du, oñ i ledufu.

Tak E̩laisha ño̩ lewa Gilgal ge̩. Oñ ebi chane̩ ekpa ojane̩ le̩; amo̩ma amakache̩ la gugu jʼo̩gba-wñ; tak i ka ñw e̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Mʼucha lile le̩ du gu una, kʼe̩ hi e̩gwa tod amo̩ma amakache̩-i.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka le̩ tʼoko adʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩ wa, i la fʼikeliʼka li oko o̩mo̩, oñ i kʼe̩ro ikeli efoko le̩ nyʼef ukpo-wñ e̩ko̩ tak i lewa fʼu ko̩da nyʼucha o̩je̩; todu ma ma e̩wñ kʼi che n.
Abe̩le̩ ma mʼu ko dajo̩ kʼaboke̩le̩ le̩ ki je̩. Oñ i lewatʼabu ku ma jo̩ ajuje̩wñ le̩, kʼama kwa kakini, O uwe̩ e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩-i, uku dʼef ucha-i. Ma la neke je̩ n.
Ama i kakini, Me̩ dʼomu e̩wñ e̩yo̩ wa. Tak i mʼu du danyʼucha le̩; oñ i kakini, Me̩ mʼu ko dajo̩ kʼabo-i ki je̩. E̩wñ bie̩ne̩ du la dʼef ucha le̩ ge̩ n.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka kwo Beal-shalisha wa, oñ i kʼuje̩wñ ejo̩ga wa ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, odukulu uje̩wñ barli chʼogu, kpai akakpa emimi ef ikpa-wñ. Tak i kakini, Mʼu ko ñw abo-i ku ma je̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ ki achʼe̩wñ ñw u kakini, E̩wñ? Nakʼe̩wñ-i jʼo̩gba aboke̩le̩ ogume̩lu-i? Ama i kakini, Mʼu ko ñw abo-i ku ma je̩; todu abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Ma aje̩ kʼi aku uma bo̩.
Abe̩le̩ i mʼu ko gugu o̩gba-ma, oñ ma je̩, ma la tʼe̩bo̩bo̩-wñ no̩, teju o̩la ki Jihofa ka le̩.
Neaman, onu abogu onu Siria, la chʼe̩ne̩ lile eju odu-wñ, i la chenʼojima, ukpe̩ ki Jihofa fʼabo Siria jadu lʼo̩wo̩-wñ. I laño̩ chʼagbiti ki de̩ kpa-ka, i muda chʼe̩ne̩ o̩ga ikpemute.
Oñ abo Siria ledufu udala udala e̩gba le̩ me̩, ma la fʼimo̩to̩ onobule̩ kekeleʼka mu kwʼane̩ Israe̩l wa; owñ la dʼo̩wo̩ o̩ya Neaman.
Oñ i ka ñw odu-wñ onobule̩ kakini, O odu-mi, ma dʼugbo akache̩ kʼi de̩ Samaria, i ma fʼo̩ga ikpemute-wñ chekpa.
Taku Neaman nyʼejefu, oñ i ka ñw odu-wñ kakini, Abe̩i, abe̩i oñ imo̩to̩ onobule̩ kʼi kwʼane̩ Israe̩l ka-i.
Tak onu Siria kakini, Lo, kʼu nadʼo̩takada kpʼuche̩ rʼonu Israe̩l.
Tak i mʼo̩takada le̩ du wa ñw onu Israe̩l, o̩takada le̩ kakini, E̩gba kʼo̩takada-i lewʼugbo we̩, go, u fu Neaman, o̩ma-mi, kpe̩ wʼugbo we̩, kʼuwe̩ ki fʼo̩ga ikpemute-wñ che.

Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼonu Israe̩l fʼo̩kalatu o̩takada le̩ che, i fʼukpo-wñ fana, oñ i kakini, Omi chʼO̩jo̩? ku nakpʼone̩ kʼu nadabi dʼu daji? tak e̩ne̩-i akpʼone̩ wʼugbo mi kʼu fʼo̩ga ikpemute-wñ chekpa? Nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, me̩ dibetʼo̩ ku me̩ li alu kʼi atene aida-mi.

Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼE̩laisha, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, gbo̩ ka kʼonu Israe̩l fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, i fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo onu kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ o̩la-we̩ fana? Je̩ ñw u wʼugbo mi, tak i ama ka kʼakache̩ dʼIsrae̩l.
Abe̩le̩ Neaman lewa kpai amanya-wñ kpai o̩kogu o̩kogu-wñ, oñ i kwodago alugbana unyi E̩laisha.
Tak E̩laisha fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo-wñ kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ gwo̩la ef aji Jo̩rdan onu mebie, tak o̩re̩la-we̩ adabiwa ñw e̩ oñ o̩la-we̩ afe̩.

Neaman muda we̩do̩, i la kwʼo̩mo̩ le, i kakini, Omi do̩ kʼi adufu wʼugbo mi tila, kʼi dago akwadʼodu Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ, kʼi la adʼo̩wo̩ che fe̩fe̩fe̩le̩ lale oji ugbo kʼo̩ga-mi de̩ kʼi la fʼo̩ga ikpemute-i chekpa.
Abana kpai Farpar, aji Damaskus le̩, nyo̩ tʼomi Israe̩l du le n? I nʼugbo kʼu nagwʼo̩la ef e-le̩ kʼo̩la-mi afe̩ n? Tak i murida ke̩do̩fulu alo.

Tak abuko̩lo̩-wñ te̩me̩rʼu, oñ ma ko̩la ñw u kakini, Ata-mi, iche̩wñ kʼakache̩ le̩ ma ka ñw e̩ kʼe̩ che e̩wñ lileʼka, uwe̩ ma che n? I chʼe-i me̩ tule nana n? Abu kʼi ka ñw e̩ kakini, Fʼo̩la gwe̩ kʼe̩ fe̩ n?
Tak i gwo̩ru nyʼo̩mo̩ oñ i dʼo̩la-wñ tunyu Jo̩rdan onu mebie, alu kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ ka; tak o̩re̩la-wñ mudabi dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩re̩la imo̩to̩ okolobia, oñ o̩la-wñ fe̩.

Tak i mudabi tʼugbo e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, owñ kpai abo-wñ chaka, oñ i lewa dago o̩gba-wñ; tak i kakini, E̩ go ta, u chema ka kʼO̩jo̩ du dʼile̩-i n chai oj ane̩ Israe̩l. Todule̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ gba e̩wñ eleʼka kwʼo̩wo̩ adu-we̩-i fai.
Ama i kakini, Oji Jihofa e-kʼu dago o̩gba-wñ-i, nagbʼe-du n. Oñ i kutʼo̩ kʼi gba; i muda ko̩.

Taku Neaman kakini, E̩ ma chaka je̩ abe̩le̩ n, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu ma bʼane̩ oj adu imiulu meji ñw adu-we̩-i todu akwʼe̩gba-i adu-we̩-i akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo abe̩k e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ du ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩ n, chai Jihofa nako ñw u.

Ef e̩wñ-i Jihofa ki du ba ñw adu-we̩-i: e̩gba kʼodu-mi anyʼef unyi Rimo̩n kʼi dojikane̩ o̩mo̩, kʼi alo̩ nʼo̩wo̩-mi, kʼu la adojikane̩ ef unyi Rimo̩n e̩gba kʼu nadojikane̩ ef unyi Rimo̩n le̩, Jihofa ki dʼe-le̩ ba ñw adu-we̩-i.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Lo kpai ure̩do̩.
Ama Ge̩hezai, imo̩to̩ E̩laisha e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, kakini, Go, odu-mi bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ñwu Neaman e̩ne̩ Siria le̩, abu kʼi ma gba e̩wñ kʼi ne̩ wa te̩ o̩wo̩-wñ n. Oji Jihofa nara nʼo, kʼu nagbʼe̩wñ ugbo-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ Ge̩hezai rano Neaman. Tak e̩gba ki Neaman li ka kʼe̩ne̩ʼka afule tʼo̩ ubi, i mudachi tane̩ bʼef o̩kogu-wñ te̩ kʼi ledʼo, oñ i kakini, O̩lafia i che?

Tak i ka ñw u kakini, O̩lafia i che. Odu-mi kpe̩ mi wa kakini, Go, faifai abokolobia meji ku ma chʼamo̩ma amakache̩ kwʼoj ane̩ uwo e-Ifraim wʼugbo mi; agba, e̩ mʼitale̩nt ajifaʼka du ñwu ma, kpai e̩wñ o̩la anyimuda meji ge̩.

Taku Neaman kakini, I ki nyʼuwe̩ eju kʼe̩ gbʼitale̩nt meji. Oñ i kutʼo̩, tak i mʼajifa itale̩nt meji ji nyʼakpulu meji, manyʼe̩wñ o̩la anyimuda meji, oñ i mʼu ko nʼamadu-wñ meji ika; tak ama nʼe̩ tʼo̩gba-wñ alo̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi lewa e̩re̩ uwo, i mʼu gba bʼuma o̩wo̩ te̩, oñ i mʼu ko jʼef unyi; tak i je̩ ñw aboke̩le̩ le̩ mudabi le, oñ ma le ma.
