Owñ muda le tʼejefu adago o̩gba odu-wñ. Tak E̩laisha ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo e̩ kwo, Ge̩hezai? Oñ i kakini, Imo̩to̩-we̩-i nyʼugbo du n.

Tak i ka ñw u kakini, E̩do̩-mi lebʼuwe̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ murida bʼo̩kogu-wñ te̩ aledʼuwe̩ n? Iko ku ma agba o̩ko̩ de̩? Iko ku ma agba e̩wñ o̩la kpʼuche̩ o̩lif kpʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma, kpʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpʼamokuno̩ kpʼamadu aboke̩le̩ kpʼamadu abobule̩ le̩ de̩?
Todule̩ ikpemute Neaman le̩ amanyʼuwe̩ o̩la, kpai ugbe̩-we̩ ogbegbele̩. Tak i mud e̩ne̩ o̩ga ikpemute efufu dabu sno kwʼo̩gba-wñ le.
Tak amo̩ma amakache̩ ka ñw E̩laisha kakini, Go ta, ugbo kʼa gugu o̩gba-we̩-i chʼe̩kpama tʼuwa le.
A agbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw a nyʼo̩la Jo̩rdan kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-wa ki namʼigbo oli du kwʼo̩mo̩, kʼa fʼuña che ñw o̩la-wa o̩mo̩ ugbo kʼa gugu. Tak i dohi kakini, Me̩ lo ke.
Tak e̩neʼka kakini, I ki nyʼuwe̩ eju kʼe̩ lebʼamadu-we̩, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼuwe̩-i. Tak i dohi kakini, Nale.
Abe̩le̩ i le bʼuma. Tak e̩gba ku ma lewa Jo̩rdan, ma kwodʼoli.
Tak abu kʼe̩ne̩ʼka alo̩ igbo oli, e̩yo̩ o̩kanyi mukpe tef omi; tak i kwa kakini, Atogwo, odu-mi, ebi ma bi-i.
Tak e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, Ugbo i kpe tʼo? Oñ i dʼo̩mo̩ ñʼo̩. Tak i mʼe̩to̩ oliʼka da, i la mʼu du ro̩ tef uwñ o̩mo̩, oñ i je̩ ñw ebije le̩ mutu nʼejʼomi.
Tak i kakini, Mʼu du ke. Abe̩le̩ i fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala amʼu du.
Iko le̩ onu Siria ajogu kpai abo Israe̩l; oñ i nalʼo̩la kpai abuko̩lo̩-wñ, kakini, Ugbo abe̩i, ugbo abe̩i oñ uru-mi ade̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼonu Israe̩l kakini, Nago̩, kʼe̩ we ele gu ugbo abe̩i du; todu abo Siria mugwo̩ru wʼo̩mo̩ me̩.
Tak onu Israe̩l fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ ka ñw u, owñ chʼugbo kʼi juka ñw u le̩; oñ i fʼo̩la-wñ jadu o̩mo̩, i chʼonuʼka kpai onu meji kate n.
Tak e̩do̩ onu Siria achʼo giligili tabale tod e̩wñ le̩; oñ i fʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ do̩ wa, i la ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ aje̩ dʼe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼef uwa le̩ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ onu Israe̩l ña mi n?
Tak e̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ oka kakini, O̩da, odu-mi, O onu, chai E̩laisha akache̩ kʼi dʼane̩ Israe̩l aka ñw onu Israe̩l o̩la kuwe̩ aka ef unyi olu-we̩.
Tak i kakini, Me̩ lo ku me̩ tejane̩ ugbo kʼi de̩, kʼomi ki kpʼone̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ amʼu du wa. Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Go, i de̩ Dotan.
Todule̩ i mʼamanya kpʼo̩kogu kpʼabogu wewe ko kpuche̩ nyʼo̩mo̩; oñ ma lewa odu adonyʼewo le̩ daka.

Tak e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ takpa kwane̩ dufu odudu, go, abogu kpai amanya kpai o̩kogu wewe donyʼewo daka. Tak e̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ ñw u le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Atogwo, odu-mi! Ab a ache?
Tak i dohi kakini, E̩ ki railo n; todu abo ku ma jʼugbo wa wewe tʼabo ku ma jʼugbo ma le.

Tak E̩laisha chadua oñ i kakini, Narodubʼe̩, Jihofa, kʼe̩ mʼeju-wñ chi, kʼi gane̩. Taki Jihofa mʼeju okolobia le̩ chi; oñ i gane̩: me̩ la go, oj uwo le̩ che̩ko̩ ñw amanya kpai okogu e-una adonyʼE̩laisha daka.
Tak e̩gba ku ma gwo̩ru wʼugbo-wñ, E̩laisha rodubo̩ Jihofa, oñ i kakini, Narodubʼe̩ kʼe̩ fʼabo-i eju chubi. Tak i fʼuma eju kpo̩fo̩ teju alu kʼo̩la E̩laisha ka.
Tak E̩laisha ka ñwu ma kakini, I chʼo̩na le̩ de̩n, emi la chʼewo le̩ n; me̩ tʼumi ubi, kʼu ne̩ me̩ nyʼugbo e̩ne̩ ku me̩ tene le̩. Oñ i ne̩ ma nyi Samaria.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku ma lewa Samaria, E̩laisha kakini, Jihofa, mʼeju abo-i chi kʼama ki gane̩. Taki Jihofa mʼeju-ma chi, oñ ma kwogane̩; me̩ la go, ma jʼalumeji Samaria.
Tak e̩gba kʼi fʼuma li onu Israe̩l ka ñw E̩laisha kakini, Ata-mi, u kpa ma? U kpa ma?
Tak i dohi kakini, Uwe̩ ki kpa ma n; abo kʼe̩ nʼugbada-we̩ kpai o̩o̩do̩-we̩ mu ma, e̩ ñʼakpa ma ge̩? kʼuje̩wñ kpai omi jo̩ ñwu ma, ku ma je̩ ku ma ñmo̩ kʼama ki nyʼugbo odu-ma.
Tak i fʼuje̩wñ hi ñwu ma nana; oñ e̩gba ku ma fʼe̩wñ je̩ ku ma la ño̩ fʼomi ñmo̩, i je̩ ñwu ma kwʼo̩mo̩ le, oñ ma le tʼugbo odu-ma. Tak abo udala udala Siria ma ño̩ wʼoj ane̩ Israe̩l ge̩ n.
Oñ i lewatu anubi le̩, ku Be̩n-hedad, onu Siria, fʼabogu-wñ do̩ jeju chaka, oñ i mute̩gu nyʼakpala nyu Samaria.
Ukpo̩ta inaina la dʼane̩ Samaria akpa; me̩ la go, ma kpala nyʼu gbogbo taku ma chane̩ eta oji o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ o̩ko̩ ajifa o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩, o̩ko̩ echu o̩ke̩te̩be̩ e̩kʼo̩wo̩ meji abe̩k e̩ta chʼajifa me̩lu.
Oñ abu kʼonu Israe̩l alale oj aku, onobule̩ʼka kwa dʼo̩ kakini, Te̩ko mi, odu-mi O onu.
Oñ onu kakini, Jihofa ma te̩ko̩ we̩ n, ugbo nanʼe̩wñ kwo kʼu nadu te̩ko we̩? akwʼoj ajita ugwo̩ka, abe̩k akwʼef agu oko̩lo̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma?
Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chʼuwe̩? Tak i dohi kakini, Onobule̩-i ka ñwu mi kakini, Dʼo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ wa, kʼa mʼu du je̩ eñini, tak a aje̩ o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-mi o̩na.
Abe̩le̩ a fʼo̩ma-mi hi oñ a mʼu du je̩; tak o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ u ka ñw u kakini, Dʼo̩ma-we̩ wa kʼa mʼu du je̩; i la mʼo̩ma e-wñ du maja.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼonu gbo̩ o̩la onobule̩ le̩ i fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana (elale i alale oj o̩do̩ le̩); tak amone̩ go, e̩ la go, e̩gbanukpo bo̩ año̩la-wñ ejefu i ma.
Tak i kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼoji E̩laisha, o̩ma Shafat, kad o̩lo̩-wñ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩ eñini, mak O̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che mi kpʼe-ki tʼabe̩-i le.

E̩laisha muda gugu ef unyi-wñ, abogijo la gugu kpenyʼu. Tak onu fʼe̩ne̩ʼka kpe̩ kwef abo ku ma jʼo̩gba-wñ; ama o̩gba tak onuche̩ le̩ ki wʼugbo-wñ, i ka ñw abogijo kakini, Me̩ go alu kʼo̩ma akpone̩-i fʼone̩ kpe̩ wa kʼi mʼumi oji bu? Me̩ go, e̩gba kʼonuche̩-wñ lewa me̩ fʼona re, ku me̩ nʼolugbana kʼe̩ e̩che̩ ubi: i chʼiche̩ e̩re̩ odu-wñ dʼubi-wñ awa le̩ n?
Abu kʼi nʼo̩la le̩ aka kpʼama, go, onuche̩ le̩ mugwo̩ru wʼugbo-wñ; oñ i kakini, Me̩ go, e̩wñ bie̩ne̩-i kwʼugbo Jihofa; e̩wñ chi kʼu ñʼakibeno Jihofa gbogbo alo ge̩?
Tak E̩laisha kakini, Me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa: abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Dabe̩ne̩ kʼiko-i o̩na ma adʼe̩ñwa omu te̩ke̩ te̩ke̩ ta she̩ke̩l oka, e̩ñwa barli meji la che she̩ke̩l ge̩, alaku Samaria-i.

Tak agboji ogu e-kʼonu lo̩ nʼo o̩wo̩ alule̩ dohi ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, Go, iche̩wñ ki Jihofa ma bi ope ope te̩ efojale, e̩wñ kʼe̩ ka-i ma neke che? Oñ i kakini, Go, uwe̩ aliʼi kpai eju-we̩, e̩ muda aje̩ n.
E̩gbale̩ abo̩ga ikpemute me̩le̩ jʼalaku: oñ ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼawa gugu emi gbogbo tak a ku?

Iche̩wñ kʼa kakini, A mugudu tʼef ewo-i ukpo̩ta la dʼef ewo-i, tak a leku o̩mo̩; i la chʼe̩wñ kʼa jʼemi yo̩o̩ eku a aku kpo̩. Todule̩ me̩ lewa ta, kʼawa ki ñwa chʼef o̩wo̩ abogu Siria-i; iche̩wñ ku ma gba wa oji lʼo̩wo̩, mak a adeju; i la che̩wñ ku ma ko wa kpa, eku a aku kate.
Taku ma kwane̩ e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ adu bulubulu, ku ma nyʼuru abo Siria, go, e̩gba kʼuma lewa nʼuru abo Siria e̩ne̩ du do̩mo̩ n.

Todu Ondu je̩ ñu abogu abo Siria le̩ gbo ekuku o̩kogu o̩kogu, kpai ekuku amanya, owñ chʼekuku abogu hie lile: taku ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, Me̩ go, onu Israe̩l la fʼogu amonu abo He̩t, kpai amonu abo Ijipti la bʼuwa ma.
Todule̩ ma kwane̩ rale e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ adu bulubulu le̩, ma tʼunyabo-ma no̩ kpʼamanya-ma kpʼamo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-ma, owñ chʼuru le̩ chaka alu ki de̩, oñ ma rale tod oji-ma.

Tak e̩gba kʼaboga ikpemute le̩ lewa nʼuru le̩, ma le tʼef unyaboʼka, ma la fʼe̩wñ je̩ ma la ñmo̩, taku ma kʼajifa kwʼo̩mo̩ kpʼo̩jamalia kpʼe̩wñ o̩la, oñ ma mʼu ko maja; taku ma mu dabi, oñ ma mugudu tʼef unyabo omune̩, oñ ma mʼe̩wñ ko kwʼo̩mo̩ ge̩, ma laño̩ mʼu ko wa maja.

Taku ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, E-kʼa che-i nyo̩ no. Eñini chʼo̩jo̩ uche̩ e̩nyo̩, a la achʼechi jʼemi; iche̩wñ kʼa che̩du gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩, e̩bie̩ne̩-wa-i adu wa ofe dufu; todule̩ me̩ lewa ta, kʼa nyʼaka ñw abo unyi onu.

Abe̩le̩ ma lewa nʼomudala do̩ amadaku ewo le̩; oñ ma ka ñwu ma kakini, Awa lewa uru abo Siria le̩, me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ du do̩mo̩ n, a la gbe̩gbʼomuko̩la e̩ne̩ du n, chai amanya ki ro jo̩, kpai amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ki ro jo̩ ge̩, kpai unyabo unyabo-ma alu ki de̩.
Tak amadaku le̩ nomudala ado̩ abo unyi onu ku ma jʼejefu.

Tak onu kwane̩ odu le̩, oñ i ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Naka e̩wñ kʼabo Siria che wa ñwu me̩. Ama chema kʼebi akpa wa; todule̩ ma kwef uru-ma dufu ku ma maja oko; ma kakini, E̩gba ku ma kwef ewo le̩ dufu, a fʼuma mu udeju udeju tak a nyʼef ewo.

Tak e̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ oka dohi kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw abo iche̩ka ki mʼanya me̩lu ki bo̩ jʼewo-i ko, go, ama adʼalu kʼuwewe abo Israe̩l ki bo̩ ef uwñ de̩; cho̩kpo̩ni, go, ma adab uwewe abo Israe̩l kʼoji-ma lenyo̩ le̩; kʼe̩ je̩ ñw a kpʼonuche̩ nyʼago.
Abe̩le̩ma mʼo̩kane̩ ogu meji ko manyʼamanya; oñ onu fʼuma kpe̩ tʼabogu Siria ubi, i kakini, Me̩ lo ku me̩ go.
Taku ma tʼuma ubi gbogbo wa aji Jo̩rdan; me̩ la go, ej o̩na-wñ chaka che̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ o̩la kpai e̩wñ eku, kʼunaju-ma je̩ ñw abo Siria ko rinyo̩. Tak amonuche̩-wñ mudabi wa, oñ ma mʼu du ka ñw onu.
Tak amone̩ le̩ ledufu, oñ ma mʼane̩ uru abo Siria le̩ ño̩. Abe̩le̩ ma fʼe̩ñwa emu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ ta she̩ke̩l oka; e̩ñwa barli meji la che she̩ke̩l ge̩, alu kʼo̩la Jihofa ka le̩.
Onu la dʼo̩da alaku le̩ ede ñw agboji kʼi alo̩ nʼo̩wo̩-wñ le̩; tak amone̩ fʼu te̩ mane̩ alaku o̩mo̩, i la leku alu kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ ka le̩, owñ chʼe-ki ka e̩gba kʼonu gwo̩ru wʼugbo-wñ le̩.
Oñ i lewatu, alu kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ ka ñw onu kakini, E̩ñwa barli meji che she̩ke̩l oka, omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ oka laño̩ che she̩ke̩l oka dabe̩ne̩ kʼiko-i o̩na alaku Samaria;
kʼagboji le̩ dohi ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ kakini, E̩ la go ta, iche̩wñ ki Jihofa abi ope te̩ ef efojale, e̩wñ le̩ neke che? Tak i kakini, Go, uwe̩ aliʼi kpai eju-we̩, e̩ muda aje̩ n.
Oñ i lewache̩ abe̩le̩ ñw u; todu amone̩ le̩ fʼu te̩mane̩ alaku o̩mo̩, oñ i leku.

E̩laisha la ko̩la ñw onobule̩ e-kʼi dʼo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ daji le̩ kakini, Kwane̩, kʼuwe̩ kpai abunyi-we̩ ki nyʼage̩ne̩ ugbo du kʼame̩ neke ge̩ne̩: todu Jihofa fʼukpo̩ta do̩ wa me̩; oñ i awa bʼane̩-i ma gbogbo nyʼo̩do̩ mebie.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ kwane̩ e̩gbale̩, oñ i che alu kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ ka; oñ i le kpai abunyi-wñ. Oñ i kwoge̩ne̩ oj ane̩ abo Filistia o̩do̩ mebie.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼo̩do̩ mebie le̩ jo̩ kʼonobule̩ le̩ mudabi bʼojane̩ Filistia te̩ wa; oñ i dufu kʼi raku nyʼonu o̩la todu unyi-wñ kpai ane̩-wñ.
E̩gbale̩ onu do̩mo̩ ako̩la kpai Ge̩hezai imo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, Agba, e̩ kʼinabali e̩wñ inaina du kʼE̩laisha che ñwu mi.

Oñ i lewatu abu ki do̩mo̩ aka ñw onu alu kʼi dʼe̩ne̩ ki ku le̩ daji, go, onobule̩ kʼi je̩ ñw o̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi dabi deju, raku nyʼonu o̩la tod unyi-wñ kpai ane̩-wñ. Taku Ge̩he̩zai kakini, Odu-mi, O onu, onobule̩ le̩ de̩, o̩ma-wñ kʼE̩laisha la du daji le̩ de̩ ge̩,

Tak e̩gba kʼonu tʼonobule̩ le̩ ene, i ka abe̩le̩ ñw u, tale onu dʼonojiʼka ñw u, i kakini, E̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ akwoubi, e̩ ko dabi wa ñw u, kpai e̩ro ane̩-wñ chaka, e-ki ro akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼi tʼane̩ le̩ no̩ gbogbo wʼifai.
Tak E̩laisha lewa Damaskus. Be̩n-hedad onu Siria, la chʼo̩ga; oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ lewa emi me̩.
Tak onu ka ñw u Hazae̩l kakini, Kʼe̩wñ ele nyʼo̩wo̩, kʼe̩ ledo e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, kʼe̩ tu Jihofa ene lʼugbo-wñ, kakini, Nakwane̩ o̩ga-mi?

Abe̩le̩ Hazae̩l ledʼowñ, i la nʼe̩wñ ele o̩wo̩ alo, owñ chʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ du ki de̩ Damaskus, oj adu inyakulumi o̩gbo̩ meji. Tak i lewa dago o̩gba-wñ, oñ i kakini, Be̩n-hedad, o̩ma-we̩ kʼi chʼonu Siria, kpe̩ mi wʼugbo we̩, i kakini, I akwane̩ o̩ga ki de̩?
Tak E̩laisha ka ñw u kakini, Lo kʼe̩ ka ñw u kakini, O̩ga-we̩ le̩ ata-kpa chuu; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ Jihofa mudu ña mi ka kʼi aku tila.
Tak i mʼeju korʼe̩ne̩ le̩ chii, gbogbo tak i kwocha-nyo̩: tak e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ mutʼaku.

Taku Hazae̩l kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼodu-mi araku-i? Oñ i dohi kakini, Todu u chema e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ ache amo̩ma Israe̩l; uwe̩ agu aku aku-ma jo, uwe̩ la anʼo̩be̩chageli kpa abokolobia-ma, uwe̩ la akʼabo-ma egini jamane̩; uwe̩ laño̩ akpʼabobule̩-ma ki defu efu na.
Taku Hazae̩l kakini, Adu-we̩ ki chʼabia-i, abile kʼi ache e̩wñ ina-i ta? Tak E̩laisha dohi kakini, Jihofa du ña mi kʼuwe̩ ajʼonu Siria.
Tak i kwo bʼE̩laisha te̩, oñ i lewa ugbo odu-wñ; owñ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Ab E̩laisha ka ñw e̩, oñ i dohi kakini, I ka ñwu mi ka kʼo̩ga-we̩ atakpa chuu.
Oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, i mʼukpo kʼi adu bʼo̩ o̩la ma ko, oñ i mʼu du tunyʼomi tak i fʼu nadala bʼeju-wñ ma, todu kʼi ku; taku Hazae̩l jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ o̩do̩ e̩ke̩lu ku Joram o̩ma Ehab jʼonu Israe̩l: Jihoshafat la chʼonu Juda e̩gba le̩; Jihoram o̩ma Jiho̩shafat onu Juda chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ.
O̩do̩-wñ chʼogue̩gwa nyoke meji e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu; i la jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩jo̩.
Oñ i lule̩ lʼo̩na amonu Israe̩l, alu kʼabo unyi Ehab che; todu i nʼoma Ehab chʼo̩ya-wñ; i la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ Jihofa jʼakpa abo Juda bie̩ n, todu Defid adu-wñ le̩, alu kʼi katane̩ ñw u ka kʼi adʼagege ñw u tod amo̩ma-wñ e̩gba du.
O̩kpanachi-wñ Ido̩m ko Juda, oñ ma kwojʼonu o̩la-ma.
Taku Joram daba nyi Zair, o̩kʼogu-wñ chaka jʼugbo-wñ; tak i kwane̩ odu, oñ i kpa abo Ido̩m ku ma lʼo daka, kpʼamagboji abo o̩kʼogu; tak amone̩ le̩ ra le tʼunyabo-ma.
Abe̩le̩ Ido̩m fʼugbite̩re̩ che ko̩ Juda gbogbo tʼeñini. Tak abo Libna ño̩ ko iko le̩ ge̩.
Uko̩lo̩ ki bo̩ ki Joram che, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda le̩ n?
Taku Joram cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji manyʼamata-wñ ef ewo Defid; tak Ehazaya jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩gweji ki Joram, o̩ma Ehab, jʼonu Israe̩l Ehazaya o̩ma Jihoram onu Juda chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ.
O̩do̩ Ehazaya chʼogu nyoke meji e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu; i la jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ʼka. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Atalaya o̩ma O̩mri onu Israe̩l.
Oñ i lule̩ lʼo̩na abʼunyi Ehab, i la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, alu kʼabo unyi Ehab che le̩; todu ana abo unyi Ehab i che.
Owñ la lebu Joram o̩ma Ehab nyʼogu ku ma kobo̩ Hazae̩l onu Siria Ramo̩t-gilead: oñ abo Siria le̩ fu Joram chagbe.

Tak onu Joram mudabi wa Je̩zree̩l ku ma kpʼagbe kʼabo Sina chʼo Rama, e̩gba kʼi kʼogu bo̩ Hazae̩l onu Siria le̩. Tak Ehazaya o̩ma Jihoram onu Juda nyʼafejudo Joram o̩ma Ehab Je̩zree̩l, todabu kʼi achʼo̩ga.
Tak E̩laisha akache̩ fʼo̩ma akache̩ʼka do̩ wa, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Fʼukpo-we̩ jʼago kʼe̩ mʼuli ekpo-i du nʼewo kʼe̩ nyi Ramo̩t-gilead.
Tak e̩gba kʼe̩ lewa o̩mo̩, e̩ tejane̩ Jihiu o̩ma Jiho̩shafat, o̩ma Nimshi le̩, kʼe̩ nyʼejefu, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw u kwane̩ kwef amo̩maye-wñ kʼe̩ mʼu du le tef unyi ejefu.
Tak e̩ mʼuli ekpo-i du, oñ e̩ mʼu du danyʼu oji kʼe̩ kakini, Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Omi fʼekpo ba tʼuwe̩ oji kʼe̩ jʼonu Israe̩l. Tak e̩ mʼo̩na bi, kʼe̩ ra, e̩ ki che̩du o̩mo̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ okolobia le̩, owñ chʼokolobia kʼi chʼakache̩ le̩, nyi Ramo̩t-gilead.

Tak e̩gba kʼi lewa, go, amagboji abogu gugu o̩mo; oñ i kakini, U chene̩ uche̩ ku ma kpe̩ mi wʼugbo-we̩, agboji. Taku Jihiu kakini, Owñ chʼugbo e̩ne̩ ef o̩chaka-wa-i? Tak i kakini, Ugbo we̩, uwe̩ agboji.

Tak i kwane̩, oñ i le tʼef unyi; oñ i mʼekpo le̩ du danyʼu oji, i la ka ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, ka le̩ de̩, kakini, Omi fʼekpo ba tʼuwe̩ oji kʼuwe̩ ki jʼonu amone̩ Jihofa, owñ chʼonu Israe̩l.
Uwe̩ ki la kpa abo unyi Ehab, odu-we̩-i kʼu fʼache̩ amadu-mi, amakache̩ le̩ na, kpai e̩bie̩ amadu Jihofa du, oji Je̩ze̩be̩l.
Todu o̩gbo̩ abo unyi Ehab chaka alenyo̩; omi la akʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du bʼEhab te̩, tʼe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼef abo Israe̩l ku ma fʼu dahi tʼef unyi, tʼe̩ne̩ ku ma to̩no̩ tʼo̩fe̩.
Oñ nache kʼunyi Ehab ki dʼab unyi Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat, kpai dab unyi Beasha o̩ma Ahija le̩.
Tak amabia aje̩ Je̩ze̩be̩l ugbo ane̩ Je̩zree̩l, i la anʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼu ji n. Tak i mʼo̩na bi, i ra.
Taku Jihiu kwodufu ugbo amadu odu-wñ le̩, oñ e̩ne̩ʼka ka ñw u kakini, O̩lafia i ne̩ wa? E̩wñ chi kʼahimu-i wʼugbo we̩ ta? Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ chema e̩ne̩ le̩, kpʼalu kʼo̩la-wñ de̩.
Taku ma kakini, Olemi; e̩ ka ñw a ta. Tak i kakini, Ab i ka ñwu mi de̩ kakini, Abu ku Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Omi fʼekpo ba tʼuwe̩ oji kʼe̩ chʼonu Israe̩l.
Taku ma hiane̩ oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma mʼafe̩-wñ du, oñ ma mʼu ko jʼoji ubo ugbo ku ma te̩gu kʼi gugu oji-wñ, taku ma fʼo̩kakachi fa, kakini, Jihiu chʼonu!
Abe̩le̩ Jihiu o̩ma Jiho̩shafat o̩ma Nimshi jʼalu nyu Joram. (Joram la do̩mo̩ ade Ramo̩t-gilead, owñ kpai abo Israe̩l chaka, tode̩gba ku Hazae̩l onu Siria awʼo̩mo̩;

onu Joram muda mudabi wa Je̩zree̩l ku ma fʼagbe kʼabo Siria chʼo le̩ kpa, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼi ja kpai Hazae̩l onu Siria le̩.) Taku Jihiu kakini, Iche̩wñ ki chʼibe ki dʼef ume̩ de̩, maku me̩ je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ki fʼume̩ o̩wo̩, kʼi ledufu ewo-i kʼi nyʼaka Je̩zree̩l in.
Abe̩le̩ Jihiu tef o̩kogu oñ i nyi Je̩zree̩l, todu o̩mo̩ Joram dachi. E̩gbale̩ Ehazaya onu Juda la mugwo̩-ru wʼo̩mo̩ kʼi fejudo Joram me̩.
Oñ adaku dago oji o̩do̩go̩ Je̩zree̩l, tak i li abo Jihiu, abu kʼi awa, oñ i kakini, U cheli o̩wo̩ one̩. Taku Joram kakini, Fʼananyaʼka kpuche̩ ledo ma, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw u ka kakini, O̩lafia i che̩?

Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ʼka tanʼanya aledʼowñ, oñ i kakini, Abu kʼonu ka de̩, kakini, O̩lafia i che̩? Taku Jihiu kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-we̩ kpai o̩lafia? Lale tʼubi-mi. Tak adaku le̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Onuche̩ lewʼugbo ma, i muda ño̩ dabi wa ge̩ n.
Tak i fʼe̩ne̩ ekeji kʼi tanʼanya kpe̩, e̩ne̩ le̩ lewa ugbo ma, oñ i kakini, Abu kʼonu ka de̩ kakini, O̩lafia i che: Taku Jihiu dohi kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-we̩ kpai o̩lafia? Lale tʼubi-mi.
Tak adaku le̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, I le gbogbo wʼugbo ma, i muda doji awa n. Alu ku ma nʼanya la chebiu alu ku Jihiu, o̩ma Nimshi, anʼanya; todu kʼi anʼanya bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩.

Taku Joram kakini, Me̩ mʼo̩la. Taku ma fʼo̩ko̩ ogu-wñ ñwo̩che. Taku Joram, onu Israe̩l, kpai Ehazaya, onu Juda, le dufu, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ dʼef o̩ko̩ ogu-wñ, oñ ma ledufu ledo Jihiu, ma la fʼu li ugbo ukpe̩ ane̩ Nebo̩t, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l le̩.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ku Joram fu Jihiu li, i kakini, O̩lafia i che, Jihiu? Tak i dohi kakini, Gbogbo abu kʼo̩ko̩ eje̩ e-iye-we̩ Je̩ze̩be̩l kpai obochi-wñ kʼi ache chʼewewe abe̩-i, o̩lafia de̩?
Taku Joram mʼo̩wo̩ rida, oñ i ra, i la ka ñw Ehazaya kakini, Akpaine de̩, O Ehazaya!
Taku Jihiu mʼo̩o̩do̩-wñ du nʼo̩wo̩, oñ i ta amu Joram agbade o̩papata ojika-wñ meji, oñ o̩fa-wñ mutu e̩do̩-wñ kpakpa, oñ i nyiwo̩lo̩ wʼane̩ ef oko ogu-wñ.

Tak i ka ñwu Bikar onu ogu-wñ kakini, Mʼowñ du, kʼe̩ mʼu du ro̩ tinyo̩ ane̩ uche̩ Nebo̩t, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l le̩; todu e̩ rewa e̩gba kʼomi kpai uwe̩ tanʼanya kpe̩re̩ atʼata-wñ Ehab ubi, alu ki Jihofa dʼadu o̩lachi-i nʼowñ oji kakini,

Omi li e̩bie̩ Nebo̩t o̩nale̩ ochochi, kpai e̩bie̩ amo̩ma-wñ, Jihofa ka-i; oñ omi achʼuwe̩ koji ugbo ukpe̩ ane̩ kide̩, Jihofa ka-i, Todule̩ e̩ mʼu du fai, kʼe̩ mʼu du ro̩ tinyo̩ oj ukpe̩ ane̩ kide̩, alu kʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka de̩.

Ama e̩gba kʼEhazaya, onu Juda, liʼu, i rale o̩na aje̩wu oko o̩mo̩. Taku Jihiu ranʼo, oñ i kakini, Mʼu du kpa ef o̩kogu le̩ ge̩; owñ chʼugbo ate̩gu Gur kʼi me̩ru Ibleam. Tak i ra nyi Me̩gido, oñ i leku omo.
Tak abuko̩lo̩-wñ mʼowñ du tʼef o̩kogu nyi Je̩rusale̩m, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef oji-wñ manyʼamata-wñ ewo, Defid.
Oñ o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwaka Joram, o̩ma Ehab, Ehazaya chane̩ ejʼonu Juda.
Tak e̩gba ki Jihiu lewa Je̩zree̩l, Je̩ze̩be̩l gbʼinabali-wñ; oñ i fʼo̩tajele ko̩ nyʼeju, i la fʼugbogbo ji, tak i nyʼope go.
Oñ abu ku Jihiu nagudu wʼalaku, onobule̩ le̩ kakini, O̩lafia i che? Uwe̩ Zimri, akpa odu-we̩ le̩?
Tak i chʼeju-wñ nyʼate̩ ago ope le̩, oñ i kakini, E̩ne̩ chʼabo e-mi? E̩ne̩? Oñ amonoji meji abe̩k e̩ta dʼeju dufu o̩mo̩ agʼo.
Tak i kakini, Dʼonobule̩ le̩ ro̩ nʼane̩. Abe̩le̩ ma mʼu du ro nʼane̩; e̩bie̩-wñ nʼe-ki ta nyʼo̩la o̩do̩ kpʼe-ki tanyʼo̩la amanya; tak i fʼowñ kpetili mʼane̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi mugudu wʼejefu i fʼe̩wñ je̩, i la ñmo̩; oñ i kakini, Me̩ fejute̩ onobule̩ kʼama mu le̩, ku me̩ mʼu du ji; todu o̩ma onu i che.
Taku ma le tʼo̩mo̩ ku ma mʼu du ji; ama e-ku ma li chʼakokolo oji-wñ kpai e̩re̩-wñ kpai e̩do̩wo̩-wñ kate.
Todule̩ ma mudabi wa ka ñw u. Oñ i kakini, O̩la ku Jihofa ka le̩ de̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi ka lʼalu adu-wñ E̩laija, e̩ne̩ Tishbi le̩, kakini, Oj ukpe̩ ane̩ Je̩zree̩l amabia aje̩ o̩re̩la Je̩ze̩be̩l;
oñ oku Je̩ze̩be̩l adab echu abʼeju ukpe̩ ane̩ uche̩ Je̩zree̩l ma, todu kʼama ki we eka kakini, Je̩ze̩be̩l de̩.

Ehab la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e̩te̩gwa Samaria. Oñ Jihiu fʼo̩takada ko̩, i la mʼu ko kpuche̩ nyi Samaria, ugbo amagboji Je̩zree̩l le̩, owñ chʼabogijo-ma, kpai nyʼugbo abo ku ma nʼamo̩ma Ehab gba kakini,
Fai ababa kʼo̩takada-i lewa ugbo me̩, abu kʼamo̩ma odu-me̩ jʼugbo me̩ le̩, kʼo̩ko̩ gu jʼugbo me̩ kpai amanya kpʼewo ki nʼalaku kpʼe̩wñ ido̩na ogu;
me̩ fʼamo̩ma odu-me̩ tuku me̩ mʼe-kʼi nyo̩ tule kʼi chʼeju-wñ tule, ku me̩ la dʼu gugu oj ede ata-wñ, ku me̩ wa jogu todu unyi odu-me̩.
Ama ma railo tabale, ma kakini, Me̩ go, amonu meji le̩ nʼe̩rane̩ bʼowñ jo̩ n, ab a ale kʼa nʼe̩rane̩ bo̩jo̩?

Tak e̩nuto̩gba unyi le̩, kpai e̩ne̩ ki tʼo̩gba ewo le̩, tʼabogijo ge̩, kpʼabo ku ma nʼamo̩ma le̩ gba, fʼuche̩ kpe̩ru Jihiu kakini, Amadu-we̩ a che, e̩wñ du kʼe̩ ka ñw a a ache; a adʼene̩ du jʼonu n; uwe̩ ki che e̩wñ ki nyo̩ we̩ eju ke.

Tak i fʼo̩takada ko̩ rʼuma onu keji kakini, Iche̩wñ ku me̩ chʼabo e-mi, i la che̩wñ ku me̩ jʼanetirʼumi, maku me̩ ki mʼoji aboke̩le̩ ku ma chʼamo̩ma odu-me̩ le̩ bu, ku me̩ wʼugbo mi Je̩zree̩l e̩gba-i o̩na. E̩gbale̩ amo̩ma onu ku ma chʼone̩ e̩te̩gwa le̩, jʼugbo ame̩ne̩ lile ewo le̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma ne̩ ma gba.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼo̩takada le̩ lewa ugbo ma, ma mʼamo̩ma onu e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ko, oñ ma mʼuma ko kpa, owñ chʼone̩ e̩te̩gwa le̩, taku ma mʼoji-ma ko nyʼagba, oñ ma mʼu ko kpuche̩ nyi Je̩zree̩l.
Tak onuche̩ʼka lewa ka ñw u kakini, Ma mʼoji amo̩ma onu le̩ ko wa me̩. Tak i kakini, Mʼu ko nʼoji omune̩ jo̩ aido meji alaku le̩ gbogbo tak o̩jo̩ ki ñwa.
Oñ i lewatu odudu-wñ, tak i ledufu, i la kwodago, oñ i ka ñw amone̩ le̩ chaka kakini, Ame̩ chʼabo̩kpakpa; go, omi jʼalu nyʼodu-mi, oñ u dʼu kpa; ama e̩ne̩ kʼabo-i du kpa ta?
Ame̩ ki ma fa-i kakini, O̩la Jihofa okate achi wʼane̩ n, owñ chʼe-ki Jihofa ka ugbo unyi Ehab; todu Jihofa fʼe̩wñ kʼi ka lugbo adu-wñ E̩laija le̩ che̩ me̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jihiu kʼabo unyi Ehab du ki bo̩ Je̩zree̩l kpa, kpai ame̩ne̩lile-wñ chaka kpʼamonuku-wñ o̩lali kpʼamatama-wñ, gbogbo tak i ma tʼe̩ne̩-wñ du no̩ ki bo̩ n.
Tak i kwane̩, oñ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le, i la nyi Samaria. Oñ abu kʼi dʼunyi amadidala ugbo ku ma jʼedudu amala ej o̩na o̩mo̩,
Jihiu de kpai amo̩maye Ehazaya onu Juda, oñ i kakini, Abo e̩ne̩ me̩ che? Taku ma dohi kakini, Awa chʼamo̩maye Ehazaya: egwo̩ru a agwo̩ru nyʼagwa amo̩ma onu kpai amo̩ma o̩ya-wñ.
Tak i kakini, Me̩ mu ma udeju udeju. Taku ma fʼuma mu udeju, oñ ma ko ma kpa ugbo obuga ki dʼunyi ugbo ku ma jʼedudu amala le̩, owñ chʼone̩ ogbo̩ meji nyoke meji; i la tʼe̩ne̩ du ef uma no̩ n.

Tak abu kʼi kwʼo̩mo̩ le, i lewa ke̩re̩bo̩ Jiho̩nadab o̩ma Rekab kʼi ledʼowñ awa; oñ i fʼu gwa, i la ka ñw u kakini, E̩do̩-we̩ chʼo̩kpakpa alu kʼe̩do̩-mi de̩ kpai e̩do̩-we̩? Taku Jiho̩nadab dohi kakini, Abe̩le̩ i de̩. Iche̩wñ kʼi dʼabe̩le̩, e̩ dʼo̩wo̩ ñwu mi. Tak i mʼo̩wo̩ du ñw u; oñ i mʼu du wʼugbo-wñ ef o̩kogu le̩.
Tak i kakini, Le bʼumi, kʼe̩ li alu kʼe̩do̩ mi tʼe̩wñ todu Jihofa. Abe̩le̩ ma je̩ ñw u kwo tʼef o̩kogu-wñ ale.
Tak e̩gba kʼi lewa Samaria i kʼabo Ehab ki bo̩ Samaria kpa, gbogbo tak i fʼowñ kpa rinyo̩ kpa alu kʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka le̩ de̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi ka ñw E̩laija.
Taku Jihiu mʼamone̩ le̩ chaka ko wa jeju, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ehab re̩ Beal re; Jihiu muda arʼo̩ nana.

Todule̩ fa-i me̩ fʼamakache̩ Beal chaka do̩ wʼugbo mi kpʼabo du ku ma dojikane̩ ñw u, kpʼamatama-wñ chaka; me̩ je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ki bo̩ ubi n; todu u chenʼiche̩bo̩ inaina kʼu nache ñwu Beal; e̩ne̩ ki ma wa n adeju n. Jihiu muda che lef ugbeju, todu kʼi li uña kʼi mʼama-dojikane̩ ñwu Beal chaka ko kpa.
Taku Jihiu kakini, Me̩ fʼujeju eju e̩kpa che kiafo̩ todu Beal. Tak u ma fʼakoya-wñ ta.

Jihiu la fʼone̩ kpe̩ tʼugbo du oj ane̩ Israe̩l; tak amadojikane̩ ñwu Beal chaka lewa, i la nʼe̩ne̩ kate ki bo̩ ubi kʼi ma wa n. Oñ ma lewʼef unyi Beal; ef unyi Beal le̩ la che̩ko̩ ñw one̩ kwʼejuʼka tʼeju ekeji.
Tak i ka ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi ade e̩wñ ucholo o̩mo̩ kakini, Kʼafe̩ ucholo dufu todu amadojikane̩ ñwu Beal chaka. Oñ i kʼafe̩ ucholo dufu ñwu ma
Taku Jihiu kpai Jiho̩nadab, o̩ma Rekab, le tʼef unyi Beal, oñ i ka ñw amadojikane̩ ñwu Beal kakini, Me̩ tejane̩, ku me̩ li ka kʼadu Jihofa okate dʼefu-me̩ emi n, chai amadojikane̩ ñwu Beal kate.
Taku ma nyʼejefu ku ma che iche̩bo̩ kpai iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo.

Oñ i lewatu abu kʼi fʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo che kpa ababa le̩, Jihiu ka ñw amonuche̩-wñ kpai amagboji kakini, Me̩ nyʼejefu ku me̩ kpa ma; me̩ je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du kʼi dufu n. Taku ma nʼalu o̩kwo̩chage̩li kpa ma; oñ amonuche̩ le̩ kpai amagboji ko ma rikpolo jʼo̩do̩da, oñ ma nyʼewo unyi Beal.
Taku ma kʼojibo ki dago jʼef unyi Be̩al dufu, ma fʼu gujo.
Ma la fʼojibo Be̩al onugo gulo̩ wane̩, oñ ma gʼunyi Beal le̩ lo̩, oñ ma la mʼu du che unyi ocheliga gbogbo wʼojolu eñini.
Abe̩le̩ Jihiu fu Beal kpabie̩ rinyo̩ bʼoj ane̩ Israe̩l te̩ kpa.

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, ugbo e̩wñ adure e-Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat le̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure, Jihiu la kwo bʼe-le̩ te̩ n, owñ chʼamo̩ma okuno̩ e-o̩jamalia ku ma jo̩ Be̩te̩l kpʼe-ki jo̩ Dan,

Oñ Jihofa ka ñwu Jihiu kakini, Ukpe̩ kʼuwe̩ fʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ che ugbo e̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju-mi kʼe̩ che le̩, kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ du che abo unyi Ehab teju alu ki dʼumi e̩do̩, amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ gbogbo tʼo̩gba o̩gba e̩ke̩le̩ agugu oj ede Israe̩l.
Jihiu muda ko̩ enetirʼu kʼi dʼe̩do̩ tʼelule̩ teju uko̩-o̩la Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ogbolo; i kwo bʼe̩wñ adure Je̩ro̩boam eche te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.
Iko le̩ Jihofa chane̩ ekʼone̩ da bʼabo Israe̩l te̩; Hazae̩l la ko ma kpa alo̩me̩ alo̩me̩ Israe̩l chaka;
akwo Jo̩rdan tʼo̩wo̩ olodudu, owñ chʼane̩ Gilead chaka, abo Gad kpai Rube̩n kpʼabo Manasa, akwo Aroe̩r, e-ki me̩ru o̩go̩ Arno̩n le̩, owñ che Gilead kpai Beshan.
Oñ inabali e̩wñ ki bo̩ ki Jihiu che, kpʼe̩wñ du kʼi che, e-le̩ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ kʼAmonu Israe̩l Che n?
Taku Jihiu cholu manyʼamata-wñ; oñ ma mʼu du ji Samaria. Jihoahaz o̩ma-wñ la je̩ koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ ku Jihiu jʼonu Israe̩l Samaria kade chʼo̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩jo̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼAtalaya iye Ehazaya li ka kʼo̩ma-wñ leku, i kwane̩ kʼi fʼugbe̩ onu chaka kpa rinyo̩.

Ama Jiho̩she̩ba, o̩ma onu Joram onobule̩, kʼi chʼo̩maye Ehazaya, mu Joash o̩ma Ehazaya du, oñ i mʼu ji kwef amo̩ma onu ku ma akpa le̩, tʼowñ, tʼe̩ne̩ kʼi anʼe̩, i mʼuma ko jʼef unyi ugbo ku ma kʼate̩ jo̩; ma la mʼu du maja bʼeju Atalaya te̩, oñ ma ma dʼu kpa n;
i la maja ugbo-wñ ef unyi Jihofa le̩ o̩do̩ me̩fa. Oñ Atalaya chʼonu ane̩ le̩.

Tak o̩do̩ e̩kebie-wñ Jiho̩yada fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ kʼi ko amagboji one̩ ogu-me̩lu ogume̩lu ku ma nʼo̩da abide wa, kpai amonuche̩, oñ i mʼuma ko wʼugbo-wñ ef unyi Jihofa; tak i fʼalo kpe̩ kpai ama, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma go̩ ñw u ef unyi Jihofa le̩, tak i dʼo̩ma onu ña ma.
Oñ i ñwa ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ kʼame̩ ache de̩, kakini, Ukpe̩re̩ta me̩ ku me̩ guduwa o̩jo̩ uñmi, achʼamadide unyi onu;
ukpe̩re̩ta me̩ʼka ajo̩ alaku Sur; ukpe̩re̩taʼka la ajo̩ ugbo alaku ubi amadide le̩: abe̩le̩ ame̩ anʼide le̩ ade, kʼame̩ kʼi fʼo̩na-wñ kpa;
tak uche̩ meji-me̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma ledufu o̩jo̩ uñmi le̩ chaka, adide unyi Jihofa lʼonu daka.

Oñ ame̩ adonyʼonu daka, e̩wñ ido̩na ogu ki nadʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi gudu tef abo ku ma tala jo̩ le̩, me̩ je̩ ñwu ma mʼu du kpa; ame̩ ki la jʼugbo onu e̩gba kʼi adufu kpʼe̩gba kʼi agudu tʼejefu.

Tak amagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu le̩ che teju e̩wñ du ki Jihoyada, atama le̩, ñwate̩; oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ mʼabo-wñ ko, owñ chʼabo kidukpe̩ ku ma gudu nyʼejefu o̩jo̩ uñmi, manyʼabo ki dukpe̩ ku ma ledufu o̩jo̩ uñmi, oñ ma lewa ugbo Jiho̩yada atama.
Tak atama le̩ mʼo̩kwo̩ kpai ugbe̩yo̩ kʼonu Defid ne̩, ki jʼef unyi Jihofa le̩, ko ñw amagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu.
Tak abo ide kwodago jo̩, e̩wñ ido̩na ogu-wñ dʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩, akwʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ unyi le̩ gbogbo tʼo̩wo̩ awohi-wñ, ma talajo̩ o̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpai o̩la unyi le̩, alʼonu daka.
Tak i mʼo̩ma onu du dufu, i la mʼike̩be̩ du dʼo oji, oñ i mʼe̩wñ ibenu du ñw u; taku ma mʼu du jʼonu, ma la fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji; taku ma kwogwʼo̩wo̩, oñ ma kakini, Oji onu ki gbo kalakala!
Tak e̩gba kʼAtalaya gbʼekuku abo ide kpai amone̩, i lewa ugbo amone̩ efunyi Jihofa;

oñ i go, e̩ la go, onu dago ugbo ebije ikpa ki dago waala o̩mo̩, alu ku ma che le̩, oñ amagboji kpai amafʼo̩kakachi jʼugbo onu; amone̩ ane̩ le̩ du jʼayo̩, oñ ma nʼo̩kakachi ala. Tak Atalaya fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, oñ i chane̩ ekpogu kakini, Alo ma da nyu mi-i! Alo ma da nyu mi-i!

Taku Jiho̩yada, atama, ñwa ñw amagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu ku ma nʼo̩da abogu, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Mʼu du dufu lʼagbagba abo ku ma tala jo-i; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi tʼo̩ ubi, me̩ nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa. Todu atama le̩ kakini, Me̩ ki dʼu kpa ef unyi Jihofa n.
Abe̩le̩ ma mʼo̩na bite̩ ñw u; oñ i lʼo̩na kʼamanya ale tʼunyi onu; o̩mo̩ le̩ ma la dʼu kpa.
Taku Jiho̩yada fʼalo kpe̩ agbagba Jihofa kpʼonu kpʼamone̩ le̩, kʼama ki chʼamone̩ Jihofa; kpʼagbagba onu kpʼamone̩ le̩ ge̩.

Tak abo ane̩ le̩ chaka le tʼunyi Beal, oñ ma fʼu kpo̩fo̩ wane̩; ma fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ kpai ojibo-wñ guche̩ rinyo̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩, oñ ma du Maian, atama Beal, kpa o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩. Tak atama O̩jo̩ fʼabo ku ma anʼo̩da unyi Jihofa chi jo̩.

Oñ i mʼamagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu kpʼabo ku ma dide kpʼamonuche̩, kpai amone̩ ane̩ le̩ chaka ko; tak abo le̩ dʼonu gwo̩ru kwugbo unyi Jihofa wa, oñ ma le o̩na alaku adide tʼunyi onu. Tak i kwogugu oj ede amonu.
Abe̩le̩ amone̩ ane̩ le̩ chaka nayo̩, oñ ewo le̩ fʼuñmi ne̩. Ma la nʼo̩be̩chageli kpa Atalaya ugbo unyi onu e̩gbale̩ me̩.
O̩do̩ Jihoash chʼebie e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼo̩fe̩.
Jihoash chane̩ ejʼo̩fe̩ o̩do̩ e̩kebie ki Jihiu jʼonu; i la jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Zibia e-Birshiba.
Jihoash la fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju Jihofa che o̩jo̩ du ku Jiho̩yada atama nʼo̩la akʼowñ.
Ma muda gbʼotete otete le̩ rinyo̩ n; amone̩ le̩ te̩tache iche̩bo̩ kpai otulale egujo oj otete le̩.

Taku Jihoash ka ñw amatama kakini, O̩ko̩ e̩wñ ki afo̩ ku ma ko wʼef unyi Jihofa chaka, owñ chʼo̩ko̩ ku ma ne̩ la e̩wñ iko le̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩ko̩ alu kʼabo-wñ de̩ eju-wñ, kpai o̩ko̩ ki dʼe̩ne̩ du e̩do̩ kʼi ko wʼef unyi Jihofa-i,
je̩ ñw amatama ki mʼe-le̩ ko, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼi nagba kwugbo abo kʼi ma ma; tak ama ki nʼe̩ ñw e̩kpabie̩ unyi-i che, ugbo du ku ma li e̩kpabie̩-wñ.
I muda lewatu o̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩ta ku Jihoash jʼonu, amatama la ñw e̩kpabie̩ unyi le̩ che ta n.

Tak onu Jihoash fu Jiho̩yada atama do̩ wa, kpʼamatama ki bo̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ ma ñw e̩kpabie̩ unyi le̩ che n? todule̩ ame̩ ki ño̩ gbʼo̩ko̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ abo ku me̩ ma ma le̩ fa-i ge̩ n, me̩ muda mʼu ko wa todu e̩kpabie̩ unyi le̩.
Tak amatama je̩ ka kʼama agba o̩ko̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ amo̩ja ge̩ n, i la chʼama añwʼe̩kpabie̩ unyi le̩ che n.

Ama Jiho̩yada, atama, mʼakpati du, oñ i mʼuchi-wñ gudu, tak i mʼu du gugu akolo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, i dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abu kʼone̩ agudu nyʼef unyi Jihofa le̩, tak amatama ku ma de alo̩na kʼo̩ko̩ du ku ma ko wʼef unyi Jihofa le̩ nyʼefu-wñ.
Abe̩le̩, e̩gba ku ma li kʼo̩ko̩ chenana ef akpati le̩, tak ako̩takada onu kpai agboji amatama mute̩gu wa, oñ ma fʼo̩ko̩ ku ma li ef unyi Jihofa le̩ kaluka nyʼef akpulu, akpulu.
Taku ma mʼo̩ko̩ ku ma ñwa le̩ ko nyʼef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma che uko̩lo̩ le̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma fejute̩ unyi Jihofa: tak ama le̩ mʼu ko dufu ñw amikapita kpʼamakunyi ku ma che uko̩lo̩ unyi Jihofa,
kpʼamano̩do̩, kpʼamadokuta, kʼama ki la igbo̩ oli kpai okuta ku ma da kʼama ki ñwʼe̩kpabie̩ unyi Jihofa che, kpʼe̩wñ du ku ma ñwa te̩ ku ma ne̩ ñwʼunyi le̩ che.
Ma muda nʼo̩ko̩ ku ma ko wʼef unyi Jihofa le̩ che ago ajifa n kpʼe̩wñ ku ma ne̩ kpʼuna lu kpʼochibu kpʼo̩kakachi kpʼe̩wñ eku o̩jamalia du, abe̩k e̩wñ eku ajifa n;
todu ma mʼe-le̩ ko ñw abo ku ma che uko̩lo̩ le̩, oñ ma nʼe-le̩ añwʼunyi Jihofa che.
Ma la lo̩ kpai aboke̩le̩ le̩ n, owñ chʼabo ku ma kʼo̩ko̩ nyʼuma o̩wo̩ kʼama ki rʼo̩me̩ ñw abo ku ma che uko̩lo̩ le̩; todu abo le̩ achubi one̩.
Ma la kʼo̩ko̩ tod e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi ku ma je̩ kpai o̩ko̩ tod e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure wʼef unyi Jihofa n; amatama nʼe-le̩.
Oñ Hazae̩l, onu Siria, mute̩gu nyʼakogu bo̩ Gat, oñ i fʼu du; taku Hazae̩l kpejuru ete̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m.

Taku Jihoash onu Juda mʼe̩wñ ki afo̩ chaka ko kpuche̩ ru Hazae̩l onu Siria, owñ chʼe̩wñ ki afo̩ e-ku Jiho̩shafat kpai Jiho̩ram kpai Ahazaya, amata-wñ ku ma chʼamo̩ma Juda le̩, che ki fo̩ chaka, kpai e̩wñ e-owñ onugu ki afo̩, kpai o̩jamalia du ku ma li ef e̩wñ akoko ef unyi Jihofa, kpai ef unyi onu; taku Hazae̩l kwo bo̩ Je̩rusale̩m te̩.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ki Joash che, kpai uko̩lo̩ du kʼi che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ ref o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda le̩ n?
Tak amadu-wñ kwane̩, oñ ma fʼalu jo̩ nyʼu, taku ma fu Joash kpa unyi Milo, o̩na kʼi agwo̩ru nyi Sila le̩.
Todu Jo̩zakar, o̩ma Shimeat kpai Jiho̩zabad, o̩ma Shome̩r, amadu-wñ, fʼu gwo oñ i leku; ma la mʼowñ du ji manyʼamata-wñ ewo Defid; tak Amazaya, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji owñ.
O̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩ta ku Joash, o̩ma Ahazaya, jʼonu Juda, Jihoahaz, o̩ma Jihiu, chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l, Samaria; i je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwebie.
I ño̩ che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa, oñ i tʼadure Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat, ubi; owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩; i kwo bʼe-le̩ te̩ n.
Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo abʼIsrae̩l ma, oñ i mʼuma ko nyʼo̩wo̩ Hazae̩l, onu Siria, kpʼef o̩wo̩ Be̩n-hedad, o̩ma Hazae̩l o̩jo̩ du.
Taku Jihoahaz gbo̩ko̩bo̩ Jihofa, oñ Jihofa netirʼu; todu i cheli ku ma fʼabo Israe̩l de mʼane̩, alu kʼonu Siria fʼuma demane̩.
(Taku Jihofa mʼe̩najadu du ñw abo Israe̩l, abe̩le̩ ma kwef o̩wo̩ abo Siria tane̩; tak amo̩ma Israe̩l, kwogugu ef unyabo-ma dab igbele.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma kwo bʼadure abo unyi Je̩ro̩boam te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩, chai elule̩ ma kwolule̩ ef uwñ; Ashe̩ra laño̩ bo̩ Samaria ta.)

Todu i tʼamone̩ no̩ ñwu Jihoahaz in, chai amananya ooje, kpai o̩kogu me̩gwa kpʼabo ogu ku ma lule̩ e̩re̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa; todu onu Siria fʼuma kpa rinyo̩, i che ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼebutu ku ma kpetili mʼane̩.
E̩wñ ki bo̩ ki Jihoahaz che, e̩wñ du kʼi che, kpʼukpahiu-wñ, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Taku Jihoahaz cholu manyʼamata-wñ; oñ ma mʼu du ji Samaria. Taku Joash o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji owñ.
O̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke mebie ku Joash jʼonu Juda, Jihoash o̩ma Jihoahaz le̩ jʼonu Israe̩l Samaria. I je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩fa.
I la nʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa ache; i kwo bʼadure Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat, du te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure; i la talule̩ ef uwñ.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ki Joash che, e̩wñ du kʼi che, kpai ukpahiu-wñ kʼi du jogu kpʼAmazaya, onu Juda, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada lko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Oñ Joash cholu manyʼamata-wñ; taku Je̩ro̩boam gugu oj ede-wñ; oñ ma du Joash ji Samaria manyʼamonu Israe̩l.
E̩gbale̩ o̩ga ki adu E̩laisha kpa lewʼo̩la-wñ me̩; taku Joash, onu Israe̩l gwo̩ru wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i raku abʼo ma, i kakini, Ata-mi, Ata-mi, o̩kogu Israe̩l kpai amananya-wñ ge̩!
Tak E̩laisha ka ñw u kakini, Mʼo̩o̩do̩ kpai o̩fa ko; oñ i mʼo̩o̩do̩ kpai o̩fa ko.
Tak i ka ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, Mʼo̩wo̩-we̩ du dʼoo̩do̩; oñ i dʼo̩wo̩ dʼo. Tak E̩laisha kʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼoj o̩wo̩ onu.

Oñ i kakini, Mʼope o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩ bi; tak i mʼu bi. Tak E̩laisha kakini, Tʼo̩fa; oñ i fʼu ta. Tak i kakini, O̩fa ujadu e-Jihofa le̩ de̩, owñ chʼo̩fa e-ujadu ugbo abo Siria; todu uwe̩ agwʼabo Siria dajane̩ Afe̩k, gbogbo tak e̩ fʼuma lie̩ kpa.
Tak i kakini, Mʼo̩fa le̩ ko; tak i mʼu ko. Oñ i ka ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, Gwo ane̩pe̩te̩; i la gwo onu me̩ta, tak i we.

Tak e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ we̩do̩ rʼu, oñ i kakini, I dukpe̩ kʼe̩ ma gwo onu me̩lu abe̩k e̩fa; tak uwe̩ ma fʼabo Siria gwodajane̩ gbogbo tak e̩ fʼuma lie̩ kpa; fa-i uwe̩ la agwo abo Siria dajane̩ onu me̩ta tete.
Oñ E̩laisha leku, ma la mʼu du ji. Tak udala udala abo Moab lewa fʼane̩ kpo̩fo̩ e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ etito̩ muda ababa.

Oñ i lewatu, abu ku ma nʼoku one̩ aji, go, ma fʼabo udalaʼka li; taku ma mʼoku e̩ne̩ le̩ duro̩ tef oji E̩laisha; oñ abu kʼoku e̩ne̩ le̩ kado achiku E̩laisha ababa i mudaji, oñ i mʼe̩re̩ ko dʼane̩, i kwane̩ dago.
Hazae̩l, onu Siria le̩, la fʼabo Israe̩l demane̩ okpanachi Jihoahaz chaka.
Jihofa muda li uma eju oñ i chejumomi ma, i la dʼeju wo̩ ma, tod alo kʼi kpe̩ kpai Ebraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Jeko̩b, oñ i ko̩ efʼuma chile̩che̩, i la ko ma rikpolo bʼeju-wñ te̩ ta n.
Taku Hazae̩l, onu Siria, leku; oñ Be̩n-hedad, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji owñ.
Taku Jihoash, o̩ma Jihoahaz, dabi bo̩ Be̩n-hedad o̩ma Hazae̩l gba ewo ewo le̩, owñ chʼewo ewo ku Hazae̩l bo̩ Jihoahaz ata-wñ gba ef ogu. Onu me̩ta Joash kpʼo̩, oñ i dabi gba ewo ewo Israe̩l le̩.
O̩do̩ ekeji ku Joash, o̩ma Jihoahaz, jʼonu Israe̩l Amazaya, o̩ma Joash onu Juda, chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ.
O̩do̩-wñ chʼogu nyoke me̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu; oñ i je̩ o̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩la Je̩rusale̩m. Odu iye-w ñ la ko̩ Jihoadin e-Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ i fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju Jihofa che, i muda che dab e-Defid ata-wñ n; i che dab alu ku Joash, ata-wñ, che le̩ chaka.
Ma muda gbotete otete le̩ rinyo̩ n; amone̩ le̩ te̩tache iche̩bo̩ kpai otulale egujo, oj otete otete le̩.
Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼo̩da ojane̩ le̩ lonyane̩ o̩wo̩-wñ, ababa le̩ i fʼabuko̩lo̩ ku ma kpa ata-wñ onu le̩, kpa.

I muda kpa amo̩ma amakpo̩ne̩ le̩ n. I che teju alu ku ma ko̩ nyʼef o̩takada uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s, alu ku Jihofa ñwa le̩ kakini, Ma akpa amata todu amo̩ma n, ma la akpa amo̩ma todu amata n; chai e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ aku tod adure e-wñ.
I fʼabo Ido̩m icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa kpa ef o̩go̩ Omu, i ño̩ gba Sela ef ogu, tak i dʼodu o̩mo̩ ko̩ Jo̩ktie̩l, gbogbo tʼeñini.
Tak Amazaya fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ru Jihoash, o̩ma Jihoahaz, o̩ma Jihiu, onu Israe̩l, kakini, Lewa kʼa li eju.

Taku Jihoash, onu Israe̩l, fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼAmazaya, onu Juda, kakini, Ikeke kʼi de̩ Le̩bano̩n kpʼuche̩ ru Sida ki de̩ Le̩bano̩n kakini, Dʼo̩mo̩-we̩ ñw o̩ma-mi kʼi chʼo̩ya-wñ; tuk e̩wñ iñmiʼka ki dʼoko Le̩banon lale, oñ i fʼe̩re̩ tʼikeke le̩ mane̩.
Uwe̩ fʼabo Ido̩m le̩ kpa ochochi, tak e̩do̩-we̩ hi uwe̩ ne; buba-wñ waa, kʼe̩ kwoguane̩ unyi; todu e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ afʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ bʼo̩la-we̩ oji ma kʼuwe̩ ki wʼane̩, tʼuwe̩, tʼabo Juda manyʼuwe̩?
Amazaya muda gbo̩ n. Todule̩ Jihoash, onu Israe̩l mute̩gu le; tak owñ kpai Amazaya, onu Juda, kpejuru o̩la-ma Be̩t-shime̩sh, e-ki dʼojane̩ Juda.
Tak o̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l chane̩ etʼe-abo Juda le; oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma rale tʼunyabo-wñ.

Taku Jihoash, onu Israe̩l, fʼAmazaya, onu Juda kʼi chʼo̩ma Jihoash o̩ma Ahazaya, mu Be̩t-shime̩sh, oñ i lewa Je̩rusale̩m. I la faku Je̩rusale̩m kpo̩fo̩ akwo alaku Ifraim gbogbo wʼalaku ago̩go̩-wñ, owñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Tak i mʼo̩jamalia kpʼajifa, kpai e̩wñ eku du ku ma li ef unyi Jihofa ko, kpai e̩wñ ki jʼef o̩pata unyi onu, kpʼabo-ma ku ma mu ma e̩wñ uhio̩wo̩ lo ge̩, taku ma mudabi tu Samaria.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ki Jihoash che le̩, kpʼukpahiu-wñ, kpai alu kʼi ja kpai Amazaya onu Juda le̩, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Taku Jihoash cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji Samaria ugbo amo̩uu Israe̩l; oñ Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ abu ku Jihoash, o̩ma Jihoahaz onu Israe̩l, leku Amazaya o̩ma Joash onu Juda ño̩ deju o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩lu ta.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ kʼAmazaya che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ kʼAmonu Juda che le̩ n?
Taku ma fʼalo da nyʼu Je̩rusale̩m; oñ i ra nyi Lakish; ma muda fʼʼonuche̩ kpe̩ tʼo̩ ubi nyi Lakish, oñ ma mʼu du kpa o̩mo̩.
Taku ma mʼoku-wñ du nʼubi amanya wa; oñ ma mʼu du ji Je̩rusale̩m ugbo amata-wñ ef ewo Defid le̩.
Tak abo Juda chaka mʼAzaraya du, oñ ma mʼu du jʼonu koji Amazaya ata-wñ. O̩do̩-wñ chʼe̩gwe̩fa e̩gbale̩.
Owñ fʼewo Hat ne, oñ i mʼu du dabiwa ñwu Juda, abu kʼonu cholu manyʼamata-wñ le̩.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu kʼAmazaya, o̩ma Joash onu Juda, iʼonu, Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Joash onu Israe̩l chane̩ ejʼonu Samaria, i la je̩ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyokeʼka.
I la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che. I kwo bʼadure Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat du te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.

I fʼalo̩me̩ ane̩ Israe̩l hi dabi tʼe̩gu-wñ akwʼugbo ku ma gudu wa Hemat gbogbo wa omi Araba, alu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ka, owñ chʼe-kʼi ka lʼalu adu-wñ Jona o̩ma Amitai, akache̩ kʼi chʼabo Gat-he̩fe̩r le̩.
Todu Jihofa fʼo̩bata abo Israe̩l li, abu kʼi rikoko tabale kʼe̩ne̩ du la bo̩ n, tʼe̩ne̩ ku ma dʼo̩ hi, tʼe̩ne̩ ku ma to̩no̩ kʼi tale; e̩nate̩ko du la do̩mo̩ todu abo Israe̩l in.
Jihofa la ka kʼi akpʼodu abo Israe̩l lu bʼo̩gane̩ efojale te̩ n; oñ i fʼuma jadu lʼo̩wo̩ Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Joash le̩.

Oñ o̩la Je̩ro̩boam ki bo̩, kpʼe̩wñ du kʼi che, kpʼukpahiu-wñ, alu kʼi jogu, kpʼalu kʼi dabi gba Damaskus, kpai Hemat e-Juda, ñw abo Israe̩l, inabali e-le̩ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Oñ Je̩ro̩boam cholu manyʼamata-wñ, owñ che manyʼamonu Israe̩l le̩; taku Ze̩karaya, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ ogu nyoke mebie ki Je̩ro̩boam jʼonu Israe̩l, Azaraya, o̩ma Amazaya onu Juda, chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ.
O̩do̩-wñ chʼe̩gwe̩fa e̩gba ki chane̩ ejʼonu; i la jʼonu o̩do̩ ooje nyoke meji Je̩rusale̩m; odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Je̩kolaya e-Je̩rusale̩m.
Owñ la fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju Jihofa che alu du kʼata-wñ Amazaya che.
Ma muda gbʼotete otete le̩ rinyo̩ n; amone̩ le̩ tetache iche̩bo̩ kpai otulale egujo oj otete otete.
Taku Jihofa fʼonu le̩ gwʼo̩ga, oñ i mud e̩no̩ga ikpemute gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ. I la gugu ef unyi kʼi chʼe̩date̩ ojoji. Jotam o̩ma onu le̩ la nʼo̩da abo unyi-wñ, owñ nʼajo̩ amone̩ ane̩ le̩ aka.
Oñ o̩la Azaraya kibo̩ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda le̩ n?
Oñ Azaraya cholu manyʼamata-wñ; taku ma mʼowñ du ji manyʼamata-wñ ef ewo Defid; taku Jotam o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩jo̩ kʼAzaraya jʼonu Juda Ze̩karaya o̩ma Je̩ro̩boam jʼonu Israe̩l Samaria ochu me̩fa.
I la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, alu kʼamata-wñ che; i kwo bʼadure Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat eche te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.
Taku Shalum o̩ma Jebe̩sh fʼalu da nyʼu, oñ i fʼu gwo eju amone̩, tak i mʼu du kpa, oñ i jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩la Ze̩karaya kibo̩, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l.
Owñ chʼo̩la Jihofa, e-kʼi ka ñwu Jihiu kakini, Amo̩ma-we̩ agugu oj ede Israe̩l kad o̩gba e̩ke̩le̩-we̩. Abe̩le̩ i wa che̩.
Shalum o̩ma Jebe̩sh chane̩ ejʼonu o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩la kʼUzaya jʼonu Juda; oñ i jʼonu ochuʼka Samaria.
Taku Me̩nahe̩m, o̩ma Gedai, mute̩gu kwo Tirza alo, oñ i lewa Samaria, akpa Shalum o̩ma Jebe̩sh Samaria, oñ i mʼu du kpa. Tak i jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ O̩la Shalum kibo̩, kpai alo kʼi da le̩, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l.

Taku Me̩nahe̩m fu Tifsa kpo̩fo̩, kpʼabo du ku ma jʼefu uwñ, kpai alo̩me̩-wñ, akwo Tirza le̩. Todabu ku ma ma bi o̩na ñw u n, todule̩ i fʼu kpo̩fo̩. I la mʼabobule̩ du ku ma defu ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ efu kpana.
O̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩la kʼAzaraya jʼonu Juda, Me̩nahe̩m o̩ma Gedai chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l. I la je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwa Samaria.
I laño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che; i kwo bʼadure Je̩roboam, o̩ma Nebat, eche te̩ o̩jo̩ du kʼi deju kade n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.
Taku Pul, onu Asiria, lewa kobʼane̩ le̩; taku Me̩nahe̩m mʼajifa tale̩nt icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ko ñwu Pul, todu kʼi mud e̩ne̩ ubi-wñ kʼo̩fe̩ le̩ ki lonyane̩ ef o̩wo̩-wñ.

Me̩nahe̩m le nafʼo̩ko̩ le̩ bu ñw amanana ef abo Israe̩l kʼama ki ra, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ne̩ she̩ke̩l ajifa ooje, kʼi ko ñw onu Asiria le̩. Abe̩le̩ tak onu Asiria mudabi oñ i ma kpo̩kpe̩ oj ane̩ o̩mo̩ n.
Oñ o̩la Me̩nahe̩m ki bo̩, kpʼe̩wñ du kʼi che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Taku Me̩nahe̩m cholu manyʼamata-wñ; oñ Pe̩kahaya, o̩ma-wñ, jʼanu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ ooje kʼAzaraya jʼonu Juda, Pe̩kahaya o̩ma Me̩nahe̩m chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l Samaria. I la je̩ o̩do̩ meji.
I ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che; i kwo bʼadure Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat eche te̩ n, owñ chʼe-ki ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.

Taku Peka o̩ma Re̩malaya, agboji ogu-wñ, fʼalu da nyʼu, oñ i mʼu du kpa Samaria, ef unyi onu onugo onugo, manyʼArgob kpai Arie; aboke̩le̩ Gilead ooje ño̩ jʼugbo-wñ o̩mo̩; i mʼu du kpa, tak i jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ o̩la Pe̩kahaya ki bo̩ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩.
O̩do̩ ooje nyoke meji kʼAzaraya jʼonu Juda Peka o̩ma Re̩malaya chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l Samaria. I la je̩ o̩do̩ ogu.
I laño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che; i kwo bʼadure Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat eche te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩.

O̩kpanachi Peka onu Israe̩l le̩, Tiglat-pilesa onu Asiria lewa fʼAijo̩n du kpai Ebe̩l-be̩t-maaka kpai Janoa kpai Kede̩sh kpai Hazo̩r kpai Gilead kpai Galili kpai ane̩ Naftali chaka; oñ i fʼabo le̩ mu nyʼAsiria.
Taku Hoshia, o̩ma Ela, fʼalo da nyu Peka o̩ma Re̩malaya, oñ i mʼu du kpa tʼane̩, tak i jʼonu koji-wñ o̩do̩ Jotam o̩ma Uzaya e̩kogu.
Oñ o̩la Peka kibo̩, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩.
O̩do̩ ekeji ki Peka o̩ma Re̩malaya jʼonu Israe̩l Jotam, o̩ma Uzaya, chane̩ ejʼonu Juda.
O̩do̩-wñ chʼogue̩lu e̩gba ki chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ; i la je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩fa Je̩rusale̩m. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Jerusha o̩ma Zedo̩k.
Owñ la fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju Jihofa che; i che teju alu du kʼata-wñ Uzaya che le̩.
Ma muda gbʼotete otete le̩ rinyo̩ n; amone̩ tetache̩ iche̩bo̩ kpai otulale e̩gujo oj otete otete le̩. Owñ fʼalaku unyi Jihofa o̩wo̩ ate̩ ne̩.
Oñ o̩la Jotam ki bo̩, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda n?
Iko le̩ Jihofa chane̩ ekpe̩ Re̩zin onu Siria, kpai Peka, o̩ma Remalaya, nyʼakobo̩ Juda.
Oñ Jotam cholu manyʼamata-wñ, taku ma mʼu du ji manyʼamata-wñ ef ewo Defid ata-wñ le̩. Oñ Ehaz o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ Peka o̩ma Re̩malaya e̩ke̩gwebie̩, Ehaz o̩ma Jotam onu Juda chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ.
O̩do̩ Ehaz chʼogu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu. I la jʼonu o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩fa Je̩rusale̩m. I la nʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ ache eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ, alu ki Defid ata-wñ che n,
i muda le tʼo̩na amonu Israe̩l. Ochochi, i ño̩ je̩ ñw o̩ma-wñ lale gu ef una du teju alu kʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abo uche̩ichi de̩, owñ chʼabo ki Jihofa ko ma rikpolo rinyo̩ bʼo̩gba amo̩ma Israe̩l te̩ le̩.
I laño̩ fʼiche̩bo̩ che kpai otulale egujo oj otete otete lale kpʼoj uwo uwo kpʼofe oli emimi du.
Taku Re̩zin, onu Siria, kpai Peka o̩ma Re̩malaya, onu Israe̩l, mute̩gu wa Je̩rusale̩m ku ma jo̩gu; oñ ma kpalo nyʼEhaz, ma muda neke dʼu n.
Iko le̩ Re̩zin onu Siria mudabi gba Hat ñwu Siria, i la fʼabo Ju ne bʼIlat te̩. Tak abo Siria lewa Hat, oñ ma fʼodo do o̩mo̩ gbogbo tʼojolu eñini.
Todule̩ Ehaz fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ ru Tiglat-pilesa, onu Asiria, kakini, Omi chʼadu-we̩ kpai o̩ma-we̩, mute̩gu wa kʼe̩ gba mi kwʼo̩wo̩ onu Siria, kpai kwʼo̩wo̩ onu Israe̩l ku ma kwane̩ tʼumi o̩la-i.
Tak Ehaz mʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia ku ma li ef unyi Jihofa kpai ef o̩pata unyi onu ko, i la mʼu ko kpe̩ru onu Asiria ele.
Oñ onu Asiria netirʼu; tak onu Asiria mute̩gu akogubo̩ Damaskus oñ i fʼu du, tak i fʼuma mu nyi Kir, i la fu Re̩zin kpa.

Tak onu Ehaz nyi Damaskus kʼi fejudo Tiglat-pilesa onu Asiria, oñ i fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi de̩ Damaskus li. Tak onu Ehaz fʼalu kʼi de̩ ñwa oñ i mʼu du kpuche̩ ru Uraija atama, kpai alu kʼuwo̩li-wñ de̩, teju alu ku ma chuko̩lo̩-wñ.
Tak Uraija atama fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne teju alu du kʼonu Ehaz kpuche̩rʼu kwo Damaskus le̩, alu le̩ Uraija atama fʼu che anede ewa onu Ehaz kʼi akwo Damaskus wa.
Tak e̩gba kʼonu kwo Damaskus wa, onu fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ li, oñ onu te̩me̩ru ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, i la fʼiche̩bo̩ che oji-wñ.
Tak i ño̩ fʼe̩wñ e̩gujo kʼi du wa gujo oji-wñ, kpai e̩wñ ele-wñ. I la mʼiche̩bo̩ omi-wñ du danyʼu, i laño̩ fʼe̩bie̩ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-wñ tafio̩ oji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩.
Tak i mʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ebije ekpikpa kʼi dʼo̩gba Jihofa le̩ du kwʼo̩gba unyi le̩, wa, owñ chʼekwʼagbagba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-wñ kpai unyi Jihofa, oñ i mʼu du gugu o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-wñ le̩.

Tak onu Ehaz ñwa ñw Uraija atama kakini, Uwe̩ agu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-odudu kpai iche̩bo̩ ele olane̩, kpai iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-onu, kpai iche̩bo̩ ele-wñ manyʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-amone̩ ane̩-i chaka, kpai iche̩bo̩ ele-ma, kpai iche̩bo̩ omi-ma jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ lile-i; uwe̩ la atʼe̩bie̩ e-iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo chaka kpai e̩bie̩ iche̩bo̩ chaka ño̩ oji-wñ; ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ebijeikpa le̩ muda ado̩mo̩ ñwu mi kʼu tene ugbo-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ Uraija atama che teju alu du kʼonu Ehaz ñwa ñw u.
Tak onu Ehaz mʼoli o̩ka-wñ ko̩da tinyo̩, oñ i mʼukpachi ugwo̩wo̩ du bʼoji-wñ te̩, i la mʼohimini-wñ du tane̩ bʼubi amokuno̩ e-ebije ikpa le̩ te̩, oñ i mʼu du gugu oji ajita okuta.
Tak i mʼo̩na e-o̩jo̩ uñmi e-ki nʼojokunyi ku ma ko̩ ef unyi le̩, kpai ugbo kʼonu agudu wa rida tʼunyi Jihofa, todu onu Asiria.
Oñ o̩la Ehar kibo̩, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda n?
Tak Ehaz cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji manyʼamata-wñ ef ewo Defid; taku He̩ze̩kaya o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩gweji kʼEhaz jʼonu Juda, Hoshia o̩ma Ela chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l Samaria, oñ i je̩ o̩do̩ me̩la.
I laño̩ chʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa, i muda che alu kʼamonu Israe̩l ku ma je̩ o̩gba-wñ che n.
Shalmane̩zer, onu Asiria, mʼogu ko wa bʼo̩; taku Hoshia mud adu-wñ, oñ i kʼe̩wñ ele wa ñw u.

Tak onu Asiria li ka ku Hoshia adʼalo nyʼowñ; todu i fʼamonuche kpe̩ ru So onu Ijipti, oñ i ma ma ño̩ ko e̩wñ ele wa ñw onu Asiria, alu ki tetache o̩do̩ da o̩do̩ da ge̩ n; todule̩ onu Asiria fʼu dahi, oñ i mʼigbaligba ko nyʼu ago tʼef unyi uga.
Tak onu Asiria mute̩gu nyʼugbo du ane̩ le̩, i la te̩gu nyi Samaria, oñ i kpala nyʼu o̩do̩ me̩ta.
O̩do̩ Hoshia e̩ke̩la onu Asiria fu Samaria du, oñ i mʼabo Israe̩l ño̩ le tu Asiria, oñ i mʼuma ko jo̩ Hela, kpai o̩la omi Hebe̩r, owñ chʼaji Gozan le̩, kpai ewo ewo, abo Me̩dia.
Oñ i dʼabe̩le̩, todabu kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l du Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma re, owñ kʼi ko ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa, kwʼo̩wo̩ Fero onu Ijipti le̩, ku ma la kworailo amo̩jo̩ omune̩,
ku ma la ño̩ lule̩ teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ abo uche̩ichi ku Jihofa ko rikpolo bʼo̩gba amo̩ma Israe̩l te̩, kpai e-kʼamonu Israe̩l che le̩.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l ño̩ che e̩wñ ki ma nyo̩ n nyu Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma maja maja. Ma la fʼotete otete ne ñw o̩la-ma ef ewo-ma chaka, akwo o̩do̩go̩ abo ide gbogbo wa ewo kʼi nʼaku;
ma la kʼojibo kpai Ashe̩rim gugu oj uwo du ki gbʼo̩gba, kpai of oli emimi chaka;
taku ma fʼotulale gujo oj otete o̩mo̩ le̩ du, alu kʼabo uche̩ichi ki Jihofa mʼuma ño̩ bʼo̩gba-ma te̩ che le̩; oñ ma kwoche e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼama ki nyi Jihofa uwe̩do̩,
ma la chʼode e-kʼi Jihofa ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ki che e̩wñ le̩ n.

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ Jihofa ka ñw abo Israe̩l kpai abo Juda lʼalu amakache̩ okoke kpai lʼalu amagane̩ okoke du, kakini, Me̩ rida bʼo̩na e̩bie̩ne̩-me̩ te̩, kʼame̩ ki de uko̩ uko̩ kʼu te̩, kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, teju alu du kʼuko̩-o̩la e-kʼu ñwa ñw amata-me̩ le̩ de̩, owñ chʼe-kʼu du kpuche̩rʼume̩ lʼugbo amadu-mi amakache̩ le̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma ko̩ egbo̩; ma la fʼo̩lo̩-ma lo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩lo̩ amata-ma, ku ma ma dʼo̩lo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma rʼochochi n.

Oñ ma ko̩ e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ kpai alo-wñ kʼi kpe̩ kpai amata-ma kpai o̩la ibenu kʼi gba ma le̩; oñ ma kwotʼe̩wñ o̩wai ubi, tak ama onugo mud o̩wai, ma la lʼikpa abo uche̩ichi ku ma lʼuma dak a le̩, owñ chʼabo ku Jihofa ka ñwu ma ku ma we eche dab abo le̩.
Ma la hi uko̩ du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma te̩ ñwu ma tinyo̩, oñ ma fʼojibo da ñw o̩la-ma, owñ chʼamo̩ma okuno̩ meji, ma la fʼAshe̩ra che, oñ ma dojikane̩ ñw o̩wo̩ e̩wñ ojale, ma la re̩ Beal.
Ma ño̩ je̩ ñw amo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ ku ma le gu ef una le̩ du, ma la nʼifa abo̩, kpai e̩wñ ifamu ache, ma la ño̩ mʼo̩la-ma ko ta ñw e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa eche ku ma nyi u uwe̩do̩.
Todule̩ Jihofa we̩do̩ rʼabo Israe̩l tabale̩, oñ i mʼuma ko rinyo̩ bʼeju-wñ te̩; i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki bo̩ n, chai o̩lo̩pu Juda kate.
Juda laño̩ de̩ uko̩ uko̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma te̩ ñwu ma ni ge̩, chai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kʼabo Israe̩l che, e-le̩ ma lule̩ ef uwñ.
Taku Jihofa ko̩ amugbe̩ Israe̩l chaka, oñ i fʼuma chʼukata, i la mʼuma kojʼef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma jʼuma akpa, gbogbo tak i mʼuma ko rinyo̩ bʼeju-wñ te̩.
Todu i fʼabo Israe̩l kpanya bʼunyi Defid te̩; taku ma du Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat, chʼonu, oñ Je̩ro̩boam le̩ fʼabo Israe̩l ne bʼetu Jihofa ubi te̩, i la je̩ ñwu ma fʼadure inaina ta.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l kwolule̩ ef adure Je̩ro̩boam du kʼi che; ma kwo bʼe-le̩ te̩ n;
gbogbo taku Jihofa mʼabo Israe̩l ño̩ bʼeju-wñ te̩ alu kʼi ka lʼalu amadu-wñ amakache̩ le̩ chaka. Abe̩le̩ ma mʼabo Israe̩l ko bʼoj ane̩-ma onugo te̩ nyʼAsiria gbogbo tʼojolu eñini.

Tak onu Asiria kʼamone̩ kwo Babilo̩n wa, kpai kwo Kuta, kpai kwo Afa, kpai kwo Hemat, kpai Se̩farfe wa, oñ i mʼuma ko jʼef ewo ewo Samaria koji amo̩ma Israe̩l; tak ama gbʼane̩ Samaria nyʼo̩wo̩, oñ ma kwododo ef ewo ewo-wñ.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku ma chane̩ edodo o̩mo̩, ma la railo Jihofa n; todule̩ Jihofa fʼamidu kpe̩ rʼef una, oñ amidu le̩ fʼabo iche̩kibo̩-ma kpa.

Todule̩ ma kʼo̩la ñw onu Asiria kakini, Abo uche̩ichi kʼuwe̩ ño̩ kʼe̩ ko ma jʼewo ewo abo Samaria le̩ ma oji ajo̩ kʼo̩jo̩ ane̩ o̩mo̩ du te̩ n; todule̩ i fʼamidu kpe̩ rʼef uma, e̩ la go, ma kpa ma, todabu ku ma ma ma e̩wñ elifo̩ o̩jo̩ ane̩ o̩mo̩ n.
Tak onu Asiria ñwa ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼatamaʼka ku me̩ du kwʼo̩mo̩ du dabi wʼo̩mo̩; kʼama ki nyʼadodo o̩mo̩, tak owñ ki nako̩ ma oji ajo̩ kʼo̩jo̩ ane̩ le̩ du te̩.
Abe̩le̩ atamaʼka e-ku ma ño̩ kwo Samaria le̩ lewa dodo Be̩te̩l, oñ i ko̩ ma alu ku ma che ku ma railo Jihofa.
Abo uche̩ichi le̩ okoke du muda, fʼamo̩jo̩ e-ma che, oñ ma ko ma jʼef unyi unyi oj otete otete kʼabo Samaria che le̩, abo uche̩ichi okoke du ko̩ jʼef ewo e-ma ugbo ku ma dodo le̩.
Oñ abo Babilo̩n fu Suko̩t-beno̩t che, oñ abo Kut fu Ne̩rgal che, oñ abo Hemat fu Ashima che,
oñ abo Afa fu Nibhaz kpai Tartak che. Tak abo Se̩farfe fʼamo̩ma-ma gujo ef una ñw Adrame̩le̩k kpai Aname̩le̩k, amo̩jo̩ abo Se̩farfe le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma chokpo Jihofa, oñ ma kwochi o̩la-ma chʼamatama otete otete le̩, tak ama le̩ che iche̩bo̩ todu ma ef unyi otete otete.
Ma chokpo Jihofa, ma la che o̩jo̩ e-ma onugo, alu kʼe̩wñ o̩gu abo uche̩ichi ugbo ku ma ño̩ ma kwo wa de̩.
Gbogbo tʼojolu eñini ma te̩tache alu ku ma che o̩gbo̩gba le̩.
Ama chʼabo ki Jihofa kpalo kpai ama, kʼi la ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ki railo amo̩jo̩ omune̩ n, me̩ ki la dojikane̩ ñwu ma n, me̩ ki che ma n, me̩ ki la che iche̩bo̩ ñwu ma n;
chai Jihofa, e-kʼi nʼukpahiu lile kpai o̩wo̩-wñ enadala te̩ ako me̩ kwoj ane̩ Ijipti wa, owñ le̩ me̩ railo, owñ le̩ me̩ adojikane̩ ñw u, owñ le̩ me̩ ki la che iche̩bo̩ ñw u;
oñ e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ kpai uko̩-o̩la, kpai uko̩ kʼi te̩, e-kʼi ko̩ tane̩ todu me̩, e-le̩ me̩ adejutʼo̩ ku me̩ che ogbegbele̩; me̩ ki la railo amo̩jo̩ omune̩ n;
me̩ ki gbenyo̩ alo kʼu kpe̩ kpʼame̩ n; me̩ ki la railo amo̩jo̩ omune̩ n,
chai Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, me̩ arʼailo-wñ; tak owñ agba me̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ ame̩ne̩bi-me̩ chaka.
Ma muda gbo̩ n, oñ ma che alu ku ma te̩tache o̩gbo̩gba le̩.
Abe̩le̩ abo uche̩ichi le̩ nachokpo Jihofa, oñ ma nʼojibo-ma ku ma gbe̩ ache; amo̩ma-ma che abe̩le̩ ge̩ kpai amo̩ma amo̩ma-ma, alu kʼamata-ma che, alu le̩ ma che gbogbo tʼojolu eñini.
Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta ku Hoshia, o̩ma Ela, jʼonu Israe̩l taku He̩ze̩kaya, o̩ma Ehaz, chane̩ ejʼonu Juda.
O̩do̩-wñ chʼogue̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ; i la je̩ o̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩la Je̩rusale̩m. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Ebai o̩ma Ze̩karaya.
1 la che e̩wñ ki chʼo̩kpakpa eju Jihofa, alu du ki Defid ata-wñ che.

I fʼotete otete le̩ gbe̩ rinyo̩, i la fʼojibo ojibo gulo̩ rinyo̩, i ño̩ fʼAshe̩ra lo̩ wane̩; tak i fʼejo ebije ekpikpa ki Mose̩s che le̩ guche̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩; todu gbogbo wʼiko le̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l tetagu otulale jo ñw u; oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Ne̩hushatan.
Ike̩do̩no Jihofa O̩jo̩ Israe̩l; abe̩le̩ i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dab owñ ef amonu Juda du ku ma je̩ ubi-wñ n, kpai ef abo ku ma je̩ dʼo̩gba-wñ n.
Todu owñ yamo̩ Jihofa, i kwo bʼo̩ ubi te̩ n; i la ño̩ de uko̩ uko̩ kʼi te̩, owñ chʼe-ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s le̩.
Jihofa la dʼugbo-wñ; ugbo du kʼi dufu nyi, i ara ñw u; oñ i ko̩ onu Asiria, i ño̩ rʼo̩ ge̩ n.
I fʼabo Filistia kpa gbogbo wa Gaza kpai alo̩me̩-wñ, akwo o̩do̩go̩ abide gbogbo wa ewo kʼi nʼaku.
Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ku He̩ze̩kaya jʼonu, owñ chʼo̩do̩ e̩kebie Hoshia o̩ma Ela onu Israe̩l, Shalmanise̩r, onu Asiria, la mute̩gu wa kʼi kobo̩ Samaria, tak i kpala nyʼu.
Oñ e̩gba kʼo̩do me̩ta muda ma fʼuma du; owñ chʼo̩do̩ He̩ze̩kaya e̩ke̩fa, owñ chʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩la Hoshia onu Israe̩l, ma fu Samaria du.
Tak onu Asiria mʼabo Israe̩l le̩ ño̩ le tʼAsiria, oñ i mʼuma ko jo̩ Hela, kpai o̩la Hebo̩r aji Gozan le̩, kpai ef ewo ewo abo Me̩dia,
todabu ku ma ma gbʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma gbo̩ n, ma la fʼalo-wñ daba, owñ chʼe̩wñ du ki Mose̩s, adu Jihofa le̩, ñwa ñwu ma, ma la ko̩ egbʼo̩ kpai eche ge̩.
Oñ o̩do̩ onu He̩ze̩kaya e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ Se̩nake̩rib, onu Asiria, mute̩gu wa akobo̩ ewo Juda du ki nʼaku, oñ i fʼu du.

Taku He̩ze̩kaya, onu Juda, fʼuche̩ kpe̩ru onu Asiria Lakish, kakini, U dure me̩; mudabi bʼumi o̩la te̩; e̩wñ kʼe̩ du nʼumi oji, nane̩. Tak onu Asiria le̩ fʼajifa tale̩nt oli me̩fa kpai o̩jamalia tale̩nt ogue̩gwa bu ñwu He̩ze̩kaya onu Juda.
He̩ze̩kaya la mʼajifa du ku ma li ef unyi Jihofa kpai e-ku ma li ef o̩pata unyi onu ko ñw u.
Iko le̩ He̩ze̩kaya mʼe-ki jʼalugbana unyi Jihofa ko̩da wane̩ kpai akwo o̩la oli ugbogaga-wñ, owñ chʼe-ku He̩ze̩kaya onu Juda ko wenyʼu le̩, oñ i mʼu ko ñw onu Asiria.

Tak onu Asiria fu Tartan kpai Rabsaris kpai Rabshake̩ kpe̩ kwo Lakish nyʼugbo onu He̩ze̩kaya, ma kʼabogu wewe wa Je̩rusale̩m. Oñ ma mute̩gu lewa Je̩rusale̩m. Tak e̩gba ku ma mute̩gu wa kpa, ma lewa dago ugbo o̩cha omi abukpe omi e-ate̩ le̩, oñ chʼe-ki dʼej o̩na oko agwukpo.
Tak abu ku ma nʼomu dala do̩ onu, E̩layakim o̩ma Hilkaya, kʼi nʼo̩da abo unyi onu, kpai She̩bna, ako̩takada, kpai Joa o̩ma Esaf, ako̩takada inabali e̩wñ onu, dufu wa ugbo ma.
Taku Rabshake̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ka ñwu He̩ze̩kaya faifai kakini, Abu kʼonu lile kʼi chʼonu Asiria le̩ ka de̩ kakini, Ukibeno kʼuwe̩ ake̩do̩no-i chʼe̩wñ?
Uwe̩ kakini, (i muda chʼo̩la alu ofofo), E̩ne̩ kʼi abʼuwa lʼo̩la kpai ukpahiu tod ogu do̩mo̩. E̩ne̩ uwe̩ ke̩do̩nʼo̩ kʼe̩ ko̩ mi?
Fa-i, go, uwe̩ ke̩do̩nʼo̩kpa elikpo kʼi guche̩ le̩, owñ che Ijipti; i la che̩wñ kʼone̩ lo̩nʼo i agwunyʼu o̩wo̩, kʼi achʼo agbe; abe̩le̩ Fero onu Ijipti de̩ ñw abo du ku ma ke̩do̩nʼo.

Iche̩wñ ku me̩ muda ka ñwu mi kakini, A ke̩do̩no Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa; i chʼowñ He̩ze̩kaya kʼotete otete-wñ kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ rinyo̩ le̩ n, kʼi la ka ñw abo Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m kakini, Ame̩ ki dojikane̩ o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Je̩rusale̩m in in?
Todule̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, e̩ gwʼinene kpai odu-mi onu Asiria, tak omi akʼamanya icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji ñw e̩, ikani uwe̩ neke ali one̩ wewe ku ma atano ma.
I dʼabe̩-i fa? ab e̩ le kʼuwe̩ aneke rʼeju agbojiʼka ki nya ef amadu odu-mi da, kʼe̩ la ke̩do̩nʼabo Ijipti tod o̩kogu kpai amananya?
Ewa kʼu wa akʼogu bʼuña kide̩ kʼu fʼu kpabie̩ Jihofa dʼugbo mi n? Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Mute̩gu nyʼako̩gu bʼane̩-i, kʼe̩ fʼu kpabie̩.

Tak E̩layakim, o̩ma Hilkaya, kpai She̩bna kpai Joa ka ñwu Rabshake̩ kakini, Agba, e̩ ko̩la ñw amadu-we̩-i alu ichi Siria, todu a gbʼe-le̩; e̩ ki la ko̩la ñw a alu ichi amaJu, kʼeti amone̩ ku ma jʼoj o̩do̩-i ki gbo̩ n.

Taku Rabshake̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Odu-mi fʼumi kpe̩ rʼodu-we̩ kpai ugbo we̩ kʼu kʼo̩la-i? I chʼugbo abo ku ma gugu oj o̩do̩, kʼama ki jʼechu o̩la-ma, kʼuma ki ñmo̩ itomiofo-ma manyʼuwe̩ oñ i kpe̩ mi rʼu n?
Taku Rabshake̩ kwodago, oñ i chʼomu-wñ nyate̩ aka nana alu ichi amaJu kakini, Ame̩ ki gbʼo̩la onu lile le̩, owñ chʼonu Asiria!
Abu kʼonu le̩ ka de̩ kakini, Me̩ ki je̩ ñwu He̩ze̩kaya gba me̩ ibe n; todu i aneke gba me̩ kwef o̩wo̩-wñ n.
Me̩ ki la je̩ ñwu He̩ze̩kaya che ku me̩ ke̩do̩no Jihofa n, abu kʼi akakini, Jihofa agba wa chuu, i la adʼewo-i tʼef o̩wo̩ onu Asiria n.

Me̩ ki netiru He̩ze̩kaya n; todu abu kʼonu Asiria ka de̩ kakini, Me̩ fʼe̩nyo̩ che kpʼomi ku me̩ dufu wa ñwu mi; tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki naje̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma e-wñ, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki naje̩ e̩rʼo̩gbaikolo-wñ, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki nañmo̩ omi obuga e-wñ;

gbogbo tak u wa ko me̩ kwʼemi tʼef ane̩ ki dab ane̩-me̩-i onugo, ane̩ o̩ka kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma tito̩ i che, ane̩ uje̩wñ kpai uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ane̩ oli o̩lif kpai iño̩ i la che̩, kʼame̩ ki deju ku me̩ we eku, oñ e̩gba ku He̩ze̩kaya agba me̩ ibe̩, kakini, Jihofa agba wa, me̩ ki ne̩tirʼu n.
I nʼo̩jo̩ abo uche̩ichi du kʼi gba ane̩-wñ kwef o̩wo̩ onu Asiria mama me̩?
Ugbo amo̩jo̩ Hemat kpai Arpad jo̩? Ugbo amo̩jo̩ abo Se̩farfe kpʼe-Hina kpʼe-Ifa jo̩? Ama gba Samaria bʼumi o̩wo̩ te̩ me̩?
Ugbo abo ku ma jʼef amo̩jo̩ abo ane̩ ojoji ojoji ku ma gbʼane̩-ma bʼumi o̩wo̩ te̩ jo̩? Taku Jihofa agba Je̩rusale̩m bʼumi o̩wo̩ te̩?
Amone̩ le̩ muda chechi jo̩, ma dohi o̩la kate ñw u n; todu uko̩ kʼonu te̩ ñwu ma tane̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, Me̩ ki dohi ñw u n.

Tak E̩layakim, o̩ma Hilkaya, kʼi nʼo̩da abunyi onu, kpai She̩bna, ako̩takada, kpai Joa, o̩ma Esaf ako̩takada Inabali onu, lewa ugbo He̩ze̩kaya, ukpo o̩la-ma chʼe̩fana, taku ma dʼo̩la Rabshake̩ le̩ ka ñw u.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼonu He̩ze̩kaya gbo̩, i fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, tak i kʼe̩gbanukpo nyʼo̩la, oñ i le tʼef unyi Jihofa.
Tak i fʼE̩layakim, kʼi nʼo̩da abunyi-wñ le̩ kpai She̩bna ako̩takada kpʼabogijo ef amatama, kpe̩rʼAizaya akache̩ kʼi chʼo̩ma Emo̩z, e̩gbanukpo la bʼo̩la-ma ma.
Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Abu ku He̩ze̩kaya ka de̩ kakini, Eñini-i chʼo̩jo̩ o̩pe̩cha kpai uka enu, kpai ina ebu; todu i lewa tʼo̩jo̩ amo̩ma ebi, ukpahiu la do̩mo̩ ku ma du kʼuma e̩che̩ dufu n.

Ikani Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ agbo̩ o̩la du ki kwʼalu Rabshake̩, e-kʼonu Asiria odu-wñ kpe̩ wa kʼi afo̩ko̩ O̩jo̩ e-ki deju, kʼi adejurʼo̩la ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ gbo̩ le̩; todule̩ e̩ ki mʼadua-we̩ du dago tod e̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩ ki bo̩.
Abe̩le̩ abuko̩lo̩ onu He̩ze̩kaya lewa ugbo Aizaya.
Tak Aizaya ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ku me̩ aka ñw odu-me̩ de̩ kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, E̩ ki railo o̩la kʼe̩ gbo̩ le̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼabuko̩lo̩ onu Asiria du chʼakpabie̩ mi le̩.
Go, nadʼafuʼka tʼef uwñ, tak i agbʼinabali, oñ i adabi tʼane̩ e-wñ onugo; tak u naje̩ ñw u wane̩ lʼalu o̩be̩chageli oj ane̩ e-wñ onugo.
Abe̩le̩ Rabshake̩ mudabi, oñ i lewa ke̩re̩bʼabu kʼonu Asiria najogu bʼabo Libna; todu i gbo̩ ka kʼi kwo bo̩ Lakish te̩ me̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi gbʼinabali Tirhaka, onu Itiopia, kakini, Go, i ledufu wa kʼi jogu kpʼuwe̩, i ño̩ dabi fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ru He̩ze̩kaya kakini,
Abu ku me̩ aka ñwu He̩ze̩kaya onu Juda le̩ de̩, kakini, Uwe̩ ki je̩ ñw O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ ke̩do̩no le̩ gbʼe̩ ifce kakini, Ma adu Je̩rusale̩m tef o̩wo̩ onu Asiria ni n.
Go, uwe̩ gbo̩ e̩wñ kʼamonu Asiria che ojane̩ ojane̩ chaka, alu ku ma ko ma jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ hioko; uwe̩ ñʼafu ge̩?
Amo̩jo̩ abo uche̩ichi gba ma? Owñ chʼe-kʼamata-mi fukpabie̩ rinyo̩ le̩, Go̩zan kpai Heran kpai Rize̩f kpai amo̩ma Ide̩n ku ma jo̩ Te̩lasar?
Ugbo onu Hemat de̩? kpai onu Arpad kpai onu ewo Se̩farfe kpʼe-Hina kpai Ifa?
Taku He̩ze̩kaya mʼo̩takada le̩ gba kwʼef o̩wo̩ amonuche̩, oñ i fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che; taku He̩ze̩kaya mute̩gu nyʼef unyi Jihofa, oñ i fʼu nadala te̩ o̩gba Jihofa.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya kwochʼadua o̩gba Jihofa, oñ i kakini, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l; uwe̩ kʼe̩ gugu ate̩ amiche̩rub le̩, uwe̩, uwe̩ kate, chʼO̩jo̩ ojane̩ ojane̩ ile̩ du; uwe̩ fʼefojale kpʼane̩ ile̩ che.
Hi eti-we̩ wane̩, kʼe̩ gbo̩, O Jihofa; mʼeju-we̩ chi, O Jihofa, kʼe̩ li; kʼe̩ la gbo̩ o̩la ku Se̩nake̩rib ka le̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi du kpʼo̩ uche̩ wa kʼi fo̩ko̩ O̩jo̩ ki deju.
Ochochi, Jihofa, amonu Asiria fʼabo uche̩ichi kpʼane̩-ma chihi rinyo̩,
ma la kʼamo̩jo̩-ma jʼef una; todu abo le̩ chʼamo̩jo̩ n, chai uko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩ one̩ ofo, oli kpai okuta; i che tod e-le̩ oñ ma fʼuma kpabie̩ rinyo̩.
Todule̩ fa-i, O Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa, nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, mʼuwa gba kwef o̩wo̩-wñ, todu kʼojane̩ ojane̩ ile̩-i du ki ma ka kʼuwe̩ Jihofa, uwe̩ kate chʼO̩jo̩.
Tak Aizaya, o̩ma Emo̩z, fʼuche̩ kpe̩ru He̩ze̩kaya kakini, Abu ku Jihofa O̩jo̩ Israe̩l ka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼuwe̩ chadua ñw mi bo Se̩nake̩rib onu Asiria le̩ ma, u gbo̩.
O̩la-wñ ki Jihofa ka le̩ de̩ kakini,
E̩ne̩ uwe̩ fʼo̩ko̩-wñ kʼe̩ chʼakpabie̩-wñ le̩?
Uwe̩ fʼo̩ko̩ Ondu lugbo amonuche̩-we̩ me̩,
U fʼura gwa
Uwe̩ gbʼinabali
e̩wñ ki chi kʼabo ku ma dodo o̩mo̩ nʼukpahiu re ofo,
Omi muda chema uguane̩-we̩
Tod o̩fu kʼe̩ lo̩rʼumi le̩

E̩wñ ki achʼujiwe-wñ ñw e̩ la de̩ kakini: O̩do̩-i ame̩ aje̩ e̩wñ ki tiga o̩to̩to̩la-wñ, tak o̩do̩ ekeji ame̩ aje̩ e̩wñ ki atiga kwef e-le̩; oñ o̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta ame̩ ki gbe̩ e̩wñ, ku me̩ ko wʼunyi, ame̩ ki ne achiwebe̩te̩ma, ku me̩ je̩ e̩ro-wñ.
Tak e̩bo̩bo̩ abo unyi Juda ki fʼuma o̩wo̩ le̩ adabi fʼili nyʼane̩, ma la arʼe̩ro ate̩;
todu Je̩rusale̩m chʼugbo kʼe̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩ akpatuka kwo dufu, uwo Zayo̩n la chʼugbo kʼabo ki fʼuma o̩wo̩ akwo. E̩do̩ Jihofa ki tʼo̩ ache e̩wñ-i.
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ka o̩la onu Asiria le̩ de̩ kakini, I agudu wʼef ewo-i n, i la atʼo̩fa o̩mo̩ n, i anʼugbe̩yo̩ wʼo̩gba-wñ n, i la akpʼugbudu nyʼu n.
O̩na kʼi lewa le̩, e-le̩ gbage̩de̩ i adabi le lo̩, i la awʼef ewo-i n, Jihofa ka-i.
Todu omi abʼo̩gba nyʼewo-i kʼu fʼu jadu, todu e-mi onugo kpai todu adu-mi Defid.

Oñ i lewatu odu o̩jo̩ le̩ onuche̩ Jihofa ledufu, oñ i fʼamone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo oli me̩ta nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke me̩lu kpa ef uru abo Asiria le̩; oñ e̩gba kʼamone̩ takpa kwane̩, odudu, go, abo le̩ chaka chʼoku one̩ jo̩.
Todule̩ Se̩nake̩rib onu Asiria kwo bʼo̩mo̩ te̩, oñ i le owñ, i la mudabi agugu Nine̩fa.

Oñ i lewatu abu kʼi do̩mo̩ adojikane̩ ef unyi Nisro̩k, o̩jo̩-wñ, Adrame̩ie̩k kpai Shareze̩r, amo̩ma-wñ, nʼo̩be̩chageli kpa, taku ma fʼo̩ o̩wo̩ le tʼoj ane̩ Ararat. Oñ Isar-hado̩n o̩ma wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
Iko le̩ He̩ze̩kaya achʼo̩ga me̩rʼe̩ku. Tak Aizaya akache̩ kʼi chʼo̩ma Emo̩z le̩ lewʼugbo-wñ, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Fʼuko te̩ ñw abo we̩; todu uwe̩ aku, e̩ ñʼaye ge̩ n.
Tak i mʼeju-wñ rida tʼo̩do̩, oñ i rodubo̩ Jihofa kakini,
O Jihofa, nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, e̩ nadibekado alu kʼu te̩talule̩ o̩gba-we̩ ef ochochi kpai e̩do̩ foo, kʼu la fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju-we̩ che. Tak He̩ze̩kaya kworaku anyanyi.
Oñ i lewatu, o̩gba tak Aizaya dufu tʼalumeji ewo le̩, o̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo-wñ kakini,

Mudabi, kʼe̩ ka ñwu He̩ze̩kaya e̩nuto̩gba amone̩-mi le̩, kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Defid ata-we̩, ka de̩ kakini, Omi gbo̩ adua-we̩, u la fʼomi aku-we̩ li me̩; go, omi achʼo̩ga-we̩ kpa; o̩to̩na uwe̩ ate̩gu nyʼunyi Jihofa.
Omi la abu o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩lu tʼolugbo-we̩; u ñʼagba uwe̩ kpai ewo-i kwef o̩wo̩ onu Asiria; u la abʼo̩gba nyʼewo-i todu e-mi onugo, kpai tod adu-mi Defid ge̩.
Tak Aizaya kakini, Mʼe̩bo̩ ero o̩gbaikolo du. Taku ma mʼu du nʼikete̩ o̩ko̩-wñ oñ i muye.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya ka ñw Aizaya kakini, E̩wñ chʼujiwe-we̩ ka ku Jihofa achʼo̩ga-mi kpa, kʼomi ate̩gu nyʼunyi Jihofa o̩to̩na ta?
Tak Aizaya kakini, E̩wñ ki achʼujiwe kʼi akwʼugbo Jihofa ñw e̩ ka ku Jihofa ache e̩wñ kʼi ka le̩ de̩ kakini; olubo̩ ki te̩ nyʼo̩gba e̩re̩ me̩gwa abe̩k i te̩ tʼubi e̩re̩ me̩gwa?
Taku He̩ze̩kaya dohi kakini, Kʼolubo̩ ki te̩ nyʼo̩gba e̩re̩ me̩gwa e-le̩ gbegbe n; o̩da, ama olubo̩ ki nate̩ tʼubi e̩re̩ me̩gwa.
Tak Aizaya akache̩ le̩ raku do̩ Jihofa; oñ i dʼolubo̩ dabi ubi e̩re̩ me̩gwa, ugbo kʼi agwo̩ru ubo̩ Ehaz le le̩.
Iko le̩ Be̩rodak-baladan, o̩ma Baladan, onu Babilo̩n, mʼo̩takada kpai e̩wñ ele ko kpuche̩ ru He̩ze̩kaya todu i gbo̩ ka ku He̩ze̩kaya fʼo̩ga che.

Taku He̩ze̩kaya netirʼuma, oñ i dʼunyi e̩wñ akoko-wñ ña ma chaka, ajifa-wñ kpai o̩jamalia-wñ kpai e̩wñ ido̩ro̩ kpai ekpo kʼaja-wñ kpuna, kpai unyi e̩wñ ido̩na ogu-wñ kpai e̩wñ du ku ma li ef e̩wñ akoko-wñ. I nʼe̩wñ ki bo̩ unyi-wñ kpai ugbo du kʼo̩da-wñ te̩ kade, kʼi ma du ña ma n in.
Tak Aizaya, akache̩, lewʼugbo He̩ze̩kaya, onu, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Ab abo le̩ ka ñw e̩? Ugbo ma la kwo wʼugbo-we̩ ta? Taku He̩ze̩kaya kakini, Ma kwʼane̩ o̩najiji, owñ che Babilo̩n ma kwo wa.
Tak i kakini, E̩wñ ma li ef unyi-we̩? Oñ He̩ze̩kaya dohi kakini, Ma fʼe̩wñ du ki dʼef unyi-mi li; e̩wñ du bo̩ ef e̩wñ akoko-mi kʼomi ma du ña ma ni n.
Tak Aizaya ka ñwu He̩ze̩kaya kakini, E̩ nagbʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka.
Go, iko-wñ awa kʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef unyi-we̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼamata-we̩ ko maja jo̩ gbogbo tʼojolu eñini, ma año̩ alo tu Babilo̩n; e̩wñ du abo̩ n, Jihofa ka-i.
Ma la ako amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ku ma akwʼef uta-we̩ dufu, e-kʼuwe̩ abi, alo ge̩; tak ama amud amonoji ef unyi onu Babilo̩n le̩.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya ka ñw Aizaya kakini, O̩la Jihofa kʼuwe̩ ka le̩ chenyo̩. I ño̩ kakini, I chʼab i de̩ de̩ n? Ure̩do̩ kpai ochochi ki do̩mo̩ iko e-mi dee.
Oñ o̩la He̩ze̩kaya ki bo̩ kpai ukpahiu-wñ du, alu kʼi fʼabukpe omi le̩ gwa, kpai o̩na omi kʼomi la ale wʼef ewo le̩, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda n?
Oñ He̩ze̩kaya cholu manyʼamata-wñ; taku Manasa, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ Manasa chʼe̩gweji e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ; i la je̩ Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ ooje nyoke me̩lu. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ He̩fziba.
I la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, teju alu kʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abo uche̩ichi ki Jihofa ne rinyo̩ bʼamo̩ma Israe̩l o̩gba te̩ de̩.

Todu i dabi ko̩ otete otete e-kʼata-wñ He̩ze̩kaya gulo̩ rinyo̩ le̩; i la ño̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne dago ñwu Beal, oñ i fʼAshe̩ra che, alu kʼEhab onu Israe̩l le̩ che, i laño̩ dojikane̩ ñw uwewe e̩wñ ojale, i la re̩ ma.
I ño̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne jo̩ ef unyi Jihofa, owñ chʼugbo ki Jihofa kʼo̩la-wñ kakini, Je̩rusale̩m oñ omi adʼodu-mi te̩.
I laño̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne jo̩ ef ologbo kpʼanuku unyi Jihofa le̩ todu uwewe e̩wñ ojale chaka.

Oñ i je̩ ñw o̩ma-wñ lale gu ef una le̩ du, i agʼile̩ gʼegu, i la nʼe̩wñ ojoji kʼi nago tak i ako̩la, i che̩ne̩ uma kpai abo ku ma gʼomi kpai amachobochi ge̩; i fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che nana nana, kʼi nyʼowñ uwe̩do̩.

Tak i mʼojibo Ashe̩ra ku ma gbe̩ le̩, owñ chʼe-kʼowñ che, i dʼe-le̩ dago ef unyi e-ki Jihofa ka ñwu Defid kpai o̩ma-wñ So̩lo̩mo̩n kakini, Ef unyi ki de̩, kpai efu Je̩rusale̩m-i, e-kʼu du kwef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka o̩mo̩nadʼodu-mi te̩ ogbegbele̩.

Omi ñʼache kʼe̩re̩ abo Israe̩l ki chʼalakpa tale bʼoj ane̩ e-kʼomi du ñw amata-ma-i te̩ ge̩ n, chai e-le̩ kate, ama ki dejute̩ kʼama ki che teju e̩wñ du kʼu ñwa ñwu ma, kpai teju uko̩-o̩la e-kʼadu-mi Mose̩s ñwa ñwu ma chaka.
Ma muda gbo̩ n; taku Manasa ko ma la kʼama ki che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ tʼe-kʼabo uche̩ichi ki Jihofa kpʼuma fo̩ rinyo̩ o̩gba amo̩ma Israe̩l che le.
Taku Jihofa ko̩la lʼalu amadu-wñ, amakache̩ le̩, kakini,
Todabu ku Manasa, onu Juda, fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-i che, kʼi laño̩ fʼe̩wñ bibi che tʼe-du kʼabo Amo̩r, ku ma dʼo̩mo̩ tak i wa, che le, kʼi ño̩ nʼode-wñ je̩ ñw abo Juda dure-i;
todule̩ abu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa abʼi Je̩rusale̩m kpai Juda ma, e-kʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi agbo̩ inabali-wñ, eti-wñ meji achʼo kpoo.
U la afʼiku Samaria fa abʼi Je̩rusale̩m ma, kpai iku e̩ñwa e-abo unyi Ehab; tak u nadu e̩wñ li Je̩rusale̩m alu kʼone̩ ali o̩tara, naliʼi, narida bʼane̩ ma.
Tak u namʼe̩bo̩bo̩ e̩wñ ogu-mi ko rinyo̩, oñ nako ma jʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-ma; ama la amud e̩wñ aluje̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼogu je̩ ñw ame̩nebi-ma chaka.
Todabu ku ma te̩tache e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju-mi, ma laño̩ nyʼumi uwe̩do̩ akwo o̩jo̩ kʼamata-ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa gbogbo tʼojolu eñini.

Anubi le̩ ge̩ Manasa kʼe̩bie̩ ki ma nʼudu n dafo tabale, gbogbo tak i je̩ ñwu Je̩rusale̩m che̩ko̩ ñw u kwo otitala ejuʼka tʼotitala eju ekeji; e-le̩ manyʼadure-wñ kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Juda dure, owñ chʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa ku ma che le̩.
Oñ o̩la Manasa ki bo̩, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, kpai edure kʼi dure, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko̩ E̩wñ Amo-nu Juda le̩ n?
Taku Manasa cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef uche̩ ubioko unyi-wñ onugo, ef uche̩ Uza i che; tak Amo̩n o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ Amo̩n chʼogu nyoke meji e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ; i la jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ meji. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Me̩shule̩me̩t, o̩ma Heruz e-Jo̩tba.
I laño̩ che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa, alu ku Manasa ata-wñ che.
Oñ i tale o̩na o̩na du kʼata-wñ le, i la chʼode ode kʼata-wñ che, i laño̩ dojikane̩ ñwu ma;
oñ i hi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-wñ, tinyo̩. I la lule̩ o̩na Jihofa n.
Tak abuko̩lo̩ Amo̩n fʼalo da nyʼu, oñ ma mʼonu du kpa ef unyi-wñ onugo.
Ama amone̩ ane̩ le̩ fʼabo du ku ma dʼalu nyʼAmo̩n onu kpa; tak amone̩ ane̩ le̩ du Josaya, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ o̩la Amo̩n kibo̩ kʼi che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda le̩ n?
Taku ma mʼu du ji ef oji-wñ ef uche̩ Uza le̩; oñ Josaya, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ Josaya chʼe̩jo̩ e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ; i la jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyokeʼka. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Jidaida o̩ma Adia e-Bo̩zkat.
I la fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju Jihofa che, oñ i lule̩ o̩na Defid ata-wñ chaka, i la na tʼawo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n.
Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩ ku Josaya jʼonu, kʼonu fu Shefan, o̩ma Azalaya, o̩ma Me̩shulam, ako̩takada le̩, kpe̩ nyʼunyi Jihofa, kakini,
Mute̩gu nyʼugbo Hilkaya, agboji amata-ma le̩, kʼowñ ki kaluka o̩ko̩ ku ma ko wʼef unyi Jihofa, owñ chʼe-kʼamadalo̩na gba ugbo amone̩-i;
kʼama ki ko̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ abuko̩lo̩ ku ma fejute̩ unyi Jihofa, tak abo le̩ ki nako ñw abuko̩lo̩ ku ma jʼef unyi Jihofa, kʼama ki ñw o̩do̩ unyi O̩jo̩ ugbo ki gulo̩ che,
kpai amikapita kpai amakʼunyi kpai amanʼo̩do̩ okuta, kʼama ki ne̩ la oli kpai okuta ku ma da ku ma ne̩ ñwʼunyi le̩ che.
Ma muda lo o̩ko̩ ku ma ko̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-ma kpʼama n; todu ma chʼamachubi one̩.
Taku Hilkaya, agboji amatama le̩, ka ñwu Shefan, ako̩takada le̩, kakini, Omi fʼo̩takada uko̩-o̩la li ef unyi Jihofa. Oñ Hilkaya mʼo̩takada le̩ du ñwu She̩fan, tak i fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che.
Taku Shefan ako̩takada le̩ lewʼugbo onu, oñ i ño̩ dʼinabali ñw onu, i kakini, Abuko̩lo̩-we̩ kʼo̩ko̩ ku ma li ef unyi le̩ dajane̩, oñ ma mʼu ko ñw abuko̩lo̩ ku ma fejute̩ unyi Jihofa.
Taku Shefan, ako̩takada le̩, ka ñw onu kakini, Hilkaya atama mʼo̩takadaʼka du nyʼumi o̩wo̩. Oñ Shefan fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che o̩gba onu.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼonu gbʼo̩la ki dʼef o̩takada uko̩-o̩la le̩, i fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana.
Tak onu ñwa ñwu Hilkaya, atama, kpai Ahaikam, o̩ma Shefan, kpai Akbo̩r, o̩ma Maikaya, kpai Shefan, ako̩takada, kpai Aseya, e̩nuko̩lo̩ onu le̩, kakini,

Me̩ lo, ku me̩ tu Jihofa ene ñwu mi, kpai todu amone̩-i, kpai todu abo Juda chaka, ugbo o̩la o̩takada ku ma li-i; todu e̩do̩fulu Jihofa ki mutajo bʼuwa ma-i tabale, todabu kʼamata-wa ma ne̩tirʼo̩la o̩takada-i, kʼama ki che teju e̩wñ du ku ma ko̩ nyʼu kʼawa ki che n.

Abe̩le̩ Hilkaya, atama le̩, kpai Ahaikam kpai Akbo̩r kpai Shefan kpai Aseya nyʼugbo Hulda, akache̩ onobule̩ kʼi chʼo̩ya Shalum o̩ma Tikfa, o̩ma Harhas kʼi adejute̩ e̩wñ ide onu, (onobule̩ le̩ la gugu Je̩rusale̩m ef e̩kpe̩ru eju ekeji-wñ); oñ ma bʼo̩ chʼoluka.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l aka de̩ kakini, Me̩ ka ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi kpe̩ me̩ wʼugbo mi le̩ kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa abʼuña-i ma, kpai abʼabo ku ma dodo ef uwñ ma, owñ chʼo̩la du ki dʼef o̩takada kʼonu Juda chʼo̩kalatu-wñ le̩.
Todabu kʼuma hiʼumi tinyo̩, ku ma fʼotulale gujo ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩, kʼama ki nʼuko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-ma du nyʼumi uwe̩do̩, todule̩ e̩do̩fulu-mi akwane̩ abʼuña-i ma, i la anʼugbo ku ma akpalu n.
I muda chʼe-onu Juda ki kpe̩ me̩ nyʼatu Jihofa ene-i, abu kʼame̩ aka ñw u de̩ kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩ kakini, I chʼe-o̩la kʼuwe̩ gbo̩ le̩,

todabu kʼe̩do̩-we̩ chʼelo̩la, kʼuwe̩ la hiʼo̩la-we̩ wane̩ o̩gba Jihofa e̩gba kʼe̩ gbo̩ o̩la kʼu ka bʼuña-i ma, kpai e-kʼu ka bʼabo ku ma dodo ef uwñ ma le̩, ka kʼama amud akpokpo e̩wñ kpai ina, kʼuwe̩ la fʼe̩wñ o̩la-we̩ na, kʼe̩ la raku o̩gba-mi-i, omi ño̩ gbʼe-we̩ ge̩, Jihofa aka-i.
Todule̩, go nadʼuwe̩ wʼugbo amata-we̩, uwe̩ la atʼef oji we̩ ef ure̩do̩. Eju-we̩ la ati e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ du kʼu nakowa abʼuña-i ma n. Taku ma dabi akʼohi o̩la le̩ ñw onu.
Tak onu fʼonuche̩ kpe̩, oñ ma kʼabogijo Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m chaka wa jʼugbo-wñ.

Tak onu mute̩gu nyʼunyi Jihofa, owñ kpai aboke̩le̩ Juda chaka kpai abo du ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m kpai amatama kpai amakache̩ kpai amone̩ chaka, tʼabo e-kekele tʼabo e-lile; oñ i fʼo̩kalatu o̩la du ki dʼef o̩takada alo e-ku ma li ef unyi Jihofa le̩ che nyʼuma eti.

Onu la dago kpenyu ebije ekpikpa kʼi dago waala le̩, oñ i fʼalo kpe̩ o̩gba Jihofa, ka kʼi alule̩ tu Jihofa ubi, kʼi la ade uko̩ uko̩ kʼi te̩ kpai o̩la ibenu-wñ kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ kpai e̩do̩-wñ chaka, kpai onugo-wñ chaka, kʼi fʼo̩la alo ku ma ko̩ nyʼef o̩takada le̩ lonyane̩. Oñ amone̩ le̩ du dago jo̩ aje̩nyʼalo le̩.

Tak onu ñwa ñwu Hilkaya agboji amatama, kpai amatama uche̩ ekeji kpai abo ku ma de alo̩na, kʼama ki mʼe̩wñ eku du ku ma che todu Beal kpai e-ku ma che todu Ashe̩ra kpai e-ku ma che todu uwewe e̩wñ ojale le̩ ko kwef unyi Jihofa dufu; tak i mʼu ko gujo ejubi Je̩rusale̩m oko Kidro̩n, oñ i mʼelulu-wñ ko nyi Be̩te̩l.

Tak i fʼamatama kʼamonu Juda chi jo̩ ku ma chʼode le̩ kamane̩, owñ chʼabo kʼamonu Juda chi jo̩ ku ma gu otulale jo oj otete otete ewo ewo Juda kpai uña ki le Je̩rusale̩m daka le̩, kpai abo ku ma gu otulale jo ñwu Beal, kpai olu kpai ochu kpai ilawo kpai uwewe e̩wñ ojale le̩ chaka manyʼuma.

Tak i mʼAshe̩ra du kwʼef unyi Jihofa dufu nyʼej ubi Je̩rusale̩m tʼo̩la aji Kidro̩n, oñ i fʼu gujo rinyo̩ o̩la aji Kidro̩n le̩, tak i fʼu gwu ebutu, oñ i fʼebutu-wñ kwu abʼojinoji ojinoji ame̩no̩talaka ma.
Tak i fʼunyi unyi amache̩wñtuñ ugbo ode ku ma jʼef unyi Jihofa gulo̩ wane̩, owñ chʼugbo kʼabobule̩ ahi ukpo unyabo todu Ashe̩ra le̩.

Tak i mʼamatama chaka ko kwef ewo ewo Juda wa, oñ i fʼotete otete ugbo kʼamatama agu otulale jo le̩ daji, akwo Giba wa Birshiba; tak i mʼotete otete ki jo̩ alaku alaku ku ma jo̩ ugbo ku ma gudu wa alaku Jo̩shua, agboji ewo le̩, gulo̩ wʼane̩, owñ chʼe-ki jʼo̩wo̩ awohi abu kʼone̩ agudu lʼalaku wʼewo le̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ amatama otete otete le̩ mute̩gu wa ugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa Je̩rusale̩m le̩ n, ma muda aje̩ uje̩wñ ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu efu n ef amo̩maye-ma.
Tak i fu Tofe̩t daji, owñ chʼe-ki dʼef o̩go̩ amo̩ma Hinom le̩, i che todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki we eje̩ ñw o̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ ki le gu ef una du nyʼugbo Mole̩k.
Tak i mʼamanya kʼamonu Juda muko ñw olu ugbo alugbana unyi Jihofa me̩rʼunyi Netan-me̩le̩k, onoji le̩, ki yamo̩ unyi Jihofa, ko kwʼo̩mo̩; tak i nʼuna fʼo̩kogu e-olu le̩ gujo rinyo̩.

Oñ onu fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ki jʼojokunyi Ehaz o̩wo̩ ate̩ le̩, owñ chʼe-kʼamonu Juda che te̩, kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ki Manasa che ef ologbo kpʼanuku unyi Jihofa kpo̩fo̩ rinyo̩ i la mʼebutu-wñ ko ra kwʼo̩mo̩, oñ i fʼu kwu nyʼef aji Kidro̩n.

Oñ otete otete ki jʼo̩gba Je̩rusale̩m, owñ chʼe-ki jʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ uwo uchile̩che̩ le̩, owñ chʼe-ku So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu Israe̩l, du dago tod Ashte̩re̩t, e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abo Saido̩n le̩, kpai todu Chimo̩sh, e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ e-Moab, kpai todu Milko̩m, e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ e-amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩, onu fʼe-le̩ chaka daji.
I la fʼojibo-wñ kpo̩fo̩ rinyo̩, i fʼAshe̩rim lo̩ wane̩, tak i kʼachiku one̩ jʼe̩gu-wñ e̩ko̩.

Anubi le̩ ge̩ i ño̩ fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ki de̩ Be̩te̩l kpai otete otete e-ki Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Ne̩bat, kʼi je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure le̩ du dago, owñ chʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-le̩ kpai otete-wñ i fu kpo̩fo̩ rʼane̩; tak i fʼotete-wñ gujo, oñ i fʼu gwʼebutu, i la fʼAshe̩ra le̩ gujo.

Oñ abu ku Josaya rʼeju da i li ojinoji ki jʼoj uwo o̩mo̩; tak i kpʼone̩ nyʼakʼachiku kwʼef ojinoji le̩ dufu, oñ i mʼu ko gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, oñ i fʼu daji, alu ku Jihofa ka e-kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ kʼi dʼe̩wñ-i kpogo, dʼu kpo̩go̩ igbegbele le̩.
Tak i kakini, Ojinoji kʼu nali o̩mo̩ fa? Tak aboke̩le̩ ewo le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Ojinoji e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ kʼi kwo Juda wa kʼi du e̩wñ kʼuwe̩ che ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Be̩te̩l-i kpogo le̩ de̩.
Tak i kakini, Tʼo̩ no̩; e̩ne̩ du ki do̩wo̩kadʼachiku-wñ n. Abe̩le̩ ma tʼachiku-wñ no̩, manyʼachiku akache̩ ki kwo Samaria wa le̩.
Oñ unyi otete du ku ma jʼewo ewo Samaria, e-kʼamonu Israe̩l che kʼama ki nyu Jihofa uwe̩do̩ le̩ Josaya mʼu ko kwʼo̩mo̩, oñ i chʼo teju e̩wñ du kʼi che Be̩te̩l.
Tak i kʼamatama otete otete du ki jʼo̩mo̩ kpa oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, i la fʼachiku one̩ gujo oji-wñ; tak i mudabi tu Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak onu ñwa ñw amone̩-wñ chaka kakini, Me̩ ki fʼElaloji je̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, dabalu ku ma ko̩ nyʼef o̩takada alo-i.
Ochochi, i la nʼElaloji ku ma de alu ku ma de̩ e-le̩ n, akwʼiko amakajo̩ ku ma kajo̩ Israe̩l le̩, kpai iko amonu Israe̩l du, kpai iko amonu Juda.
Ma la de Elaloji-i ñwu Jihofa Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩ ku Josaya jʼonu.

Anubi le̩ ge̩, Josaya mʼabo ku ma gomi kpai abo ku ma ke̩ma kpai amude kpai ode kpai e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ du ku ma li ane̩ Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m ko rinyo̩, todu ki fʼuko̩-o̩la ku ma ko̩ nyʼef o̩takada ku Hilkaya atama le̩ li ef unyi Jihofa lonyane̩.

I la nʼonu du kʼi je̩ o̩gba-wñ ki murida abo̩ Jihofa kpai e̩do̩-wñ chaka kpai onugo-wñ chaka kpai ukpahiu-wñ chaka, teju alu kʼuko̩-o̩la Mose̩s ka le̩ dab owñ n; i laño̩ nʼe̩ne̩ kʼi kwane̩ ubi-wñ kʼi dab owñ ge̩ n.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, Jihofa rida bʼukpuna uwe̩do̩-wñ inaina le̩ te̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼuwe̩do̩-wñ mutajo abo Juda ma, tod e̩wñ du ku Manasa che bi owñ eju le̩.
Taku Jihofa kakini, Omi ñʼako Juda kwo bʼumi eju te̩ ge̩, alu kʼu ko Israe̩l le̩, oñ nako ewo kʼu du chʼe-mi-i ro̩ tinyo̩, owñ che Je̩rusale̩m-i, kpai unyi e-kʼu kakini, Odu-mi adʼo̩mo̩.
Oñ o̩la Josaya kibo̩, kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che̩, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko̩ E̩wñ Amonu Juda le̩ n?
Adiko e-wñ Fero-neko, onu Ijipti, mute̩gu nyʼo̩l ohimini Yufretis akogu bo̩ onu Asiria; taku Josaya onu le̩ te̩ke̩ ko bo̩; tak e̩gba kʼi fʼowñ li Fero-neko fʼowñ kpa Me̩gido.

Tak ubuko̩lo̩-wñ mʼoku-wñ du tef o̩kogu Me̩gido, oñ ma mʼu du kwʼo̩mo̩ wa Je̩rusale̩m, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef oji-wñ onugo. Tak abo ane̩ le̩ mu Jihoahaz, o̩ma Josaya, du, oñ ma fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji, ma la dʼowñ jʼonu koji ata-wñ.
O̩do̩ Jihoahaz la chʼogu nyoke me̩ta e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ; oñ i jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m ochu me̩ta; odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Hamiutal o̩ma Je̩re̩maya e-Libna.
I la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che alu du kʼamata-wñ che le̩.
Taku Fero-neko mʼu du tʼagba Ribla, oj ane̩ Hemat, todu kʼi we echʼonu Je̩rusale̩m. Oñ i mʼabane̩ le̩ ko nyʼef are̩ ku ma ko tale̩nt ajifa ogume̩lu kpai tale̩nt o̩jamaliaʼka ñwu ma ku ma rʼo̩.
Taku Fero-neko du E̩layakim, o̩ma Josaya, jʼonu e̩gu Josaya ata-wñ. I la mʼodu-wñ rida ko̩ Jiho̩yakim. Tak i mu Jihoahaz du kwʼo̩mo̩; owñ le̩ la lewa Ijipti. Tak i leku o̩mo̩.
