Taku Jiho̩yakim nakʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia le̩ wa ñwu Fero. I muda gbʼo̩ko̩ udu o̩wo̩ abo ane̩ le̩ todu kʼi li o̩ko̩ alu ki Fero ñwañw u le̩; i kutʼabo ane̩ le̩ abʼuma gba ajifa kpʼo̩jamalia le̩; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ne̩ alu kʼi bu ñw u, todu kʼi ko ñwu Fero-neko.
O̩do̩ Jiho̩yakim la chʼogue̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ; oñ i je̩ Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩gwaka. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Ze̩baida o̩ma Pe̩deya e-Ruma.
I laño̩ chʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa alu du kʼamata-wñ che le̩.
Iko-wñ le̩ Ne̩biukadne̩za onu Babilo̩n mute̩gu wa oñ Jiho̩yakim mud adu-wñ gbogbo o̩do̩ me̩ta; tak i murida oñ i kʼo̩.

Taku Jihofa fʼudala udala abo Kaldia kpai udala udala abo Siria kpai udala udala abo Moab kpai udala udala amo̩ma Amo̩n, kpuche̩ wa akobʼo̩. I la kpʼuma uche̩ wa akobo̩ Juda kʼi lenyo̩ bʼane̩ te̩, teju alu kʼo̩la Jihofa de̩ e-kʼi ka lugbo amadu-wñ amakache̩.
Ochochi, Jihofa ñwañwu ma tak e̩wñ-i lewa bo̩ Juda ma, kʼi mʼuma ko bʼeju-wñ te̩, todu adure Manasa, teju alu kʼe̩wñ du kʼi che de̩,
kpai tod e̩bie̩ ki ma fʼudu n kʼi du dafo ge̩; todu i je̩ ñwu Je̩rusale̩m che̩ko̩ ñw e̩bie̩ ki ma fʼudu n. Jihofa la jʼato̩no̩ n.
Oñ o̩la Jiho̩yakim kibo̩ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda le̩ n?
Oñ Jiho̩yakim cholu manyʼamata-wñ taku Jiho̩yachin, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ onu Ijipti ño̩ kwʼane̩-wñ wa ge̩ n; todu onu Babilo̩n bʼonu Ijipti gba e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ akwo ohimini Ijipti gbogbo wa ohimini Yufretis.
O̩do̩ Jihoyachin chʼe̩gwe̩jo̩ e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu; i la je̩ Je̩rusale̩m ochu me̩ta. Odu iye-wñ la ko Ne̩hushta o̩ma E̩lnetan e-Je̩rusale̩m le̩.
I laño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, teju e̩wñ du kʼata-wñ che.
Iko le̩ abuko̩lo̩ Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n, mute̩gu wa Je̩rusale̩m, oñ ma kpala nyʼewo le̩.
Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n, la lewʼewo le̩, abu kʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ kpala nyʼu o̩mo̩.
Taku Jiho̩yachin, onu Juda, ledufu nyʼugbo onu Babilo̩n, owñ kpai iye-wñ kpai abuko̩lo̩-wñ kpai amagboji-wñ kpai amonoji-wñ; oñ onu Babilo̩n fʼowñ mu o̩do̩ e̩ke̩jo̩ kʼi jʼonu.

Tak i mʼe̩wñ akoko unyi Jihofa chaka, kpai e̩wñ unyi onu ko kwʼo̩mo̩, oñ i fʼe̩wñ eku ku ma nʼo̩jamalia che ko̩da rinyo̩ pe̩le̩pe̩le̩, owñ chʼe-ku So̩lo̩mo̩n onu Israe̩l che ef unyi Jihofa, alu ki Jihofa ka le̩.

Oñ i mʼabo Je̩rusale̩m chaka ko lo, kpai amagboji chaka, kpai ame̩nugbiti ku ma de̩ kpaka chaka, owñ chʼame̩namu icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa, kpai abo ku ma chʼo̩ka e̩wñ eche chaka kpʼamagwalo̩; e̩ne̩ du bo̩ n, chai abo ku ma chʼame̩nubie̩ tule ef amone̩ ane̩ le̩.
I ño̩ mu Jiho̩yachin du le tu Babilo̩n ge̩; kpai iye onu kpai amo̩ya onu kpai amonoji-wñ kpai ame̩nugbiti ane̩ le̩; i fʼuma mu kwo Je̩rusale̩m nyi Babilo̩n.

Oñ ame̩nugbiti chaka, owñ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ mebie, kpai abo ku ma chʼo̩ka e̩wñ eche kpai amagwalo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, o̩chaka-ma chenʼukpahiu, ma la bʼogu eja jo̩, abo e-le̩ onu Babilo̩n ko chʼame̩namu lo tu Babilo̩n.
Tak onu Babilo̩n du Matanaya, o̩maye ata Jiho̩yachin, jʼonu koji-wñ, oñ i mʼodu-wñ rida ko̩ Ze̩de̩kaya.
O̩do̩ Ze̩de̩kaya la chʼogu nyokeʼka e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu; oñ i je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwaka Je̩rusale̩m. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Hamiutal o̩ma Je̩re̩maya e-Libna.
Owñ laño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ che eju Jihofa, teju e̩wñ du ki Jiho̩yakim che le̩.
Todu lugbo uwe̩do̩ Jihofa e̩wñ le̩ wa Je̩rusale̩m kpai Juda, gbogbo tak i mʼuma ko rinyo̩ bʼeju-wñ te̩ kpa.

Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ e̩ke̩la kʼi jʼonu, ochu e̩ke̩gwa-wñ, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa ochu le̩, Ne̩biukadne̩za onu Babilo̩n lewa akobo̩ Je̩rusale̩m, owñ kpai abogu-wñ chaka, oñ ma ru ru nyʼu, ma la fʼo̩kpe̩ gwa le Je̩rusale̩m daka.
Abe̩le̩ ma kpala nyʼewo le̩ gbogbo wʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwaka ku Ze̩de̩kaya jʼonu.
Oñ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩la ochu e̩ke̩le̩-wñ ukpo̩ta akpa ewo le̩ bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩, todule̩ uje̩wñ du do̩mo̩ tod amone̩ ane̩ le̩ n.
Tak aboke̩le̩ ogu gu aku ewo du, oñ o̩chaka-ma rale odu lʼo̩na alaku kʼi dʼagbagba aku meji le̩, owñ chʼe-ki me̩rʼuche̩ ubioko onu (e̩gbale̩ abo Kaldia donyʼewo le̩ daka me̩).
Tak onu le o̩na Araba. Ama abogu Kaldia ranʼonu, oñ ma fʼu mu egbili Je̩riko; abogu-wñ chaka la fia bʼo̩ te̩.
Taku ma mʼonu du, oñ ma ne̩ nyi Ribla ugbo onu Babilo̩n. Oñ ma fʼajo̩-wñ ka.
Ma la fʼamo̩ma Ze̩de̩kaya kpa eju-wñ, taku ma fʼeju Ze̩de̩kaya kpo̩fo̩, oñ ma nʼigbaligba ebije ikpa fʼu ji, oñ ma mʼu du le tu Babilo̩n.
Tak ochu e̩ke̩lu, o̩jo̩ e̩kebie ochu le̩, owñ chʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩la ku Ne̩biukadne̩za onu Babilo̩n jʼonu-wñ, Ne̩biuzaredan, agboji abide, kʼi chʼe̩nuko̩lo̩ onu Babilo̩n lewa Je̩rusale̩m.
I la fʼunyi Jihofa gujo, kpai unyi onu; kpai unyi du ki jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m, owñ chʼunyi lile du, i fʼu gujo rinyo̩.
Tak abogu abo Kaldia ku ma jʼugbo agboji abide le̩ chaka gu o̩do̩ Je̩rusale̩m lo̩ daka.
Taku Ne̩biuzaredan fʼe̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩ ewo le̩, kpai abo-ma ku ma ñwa chʼef o̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n, kpai e̩bo̩bo̩ uwewe-ma ku ma bo̩ re, mu le.
Agboji abide le̩ muda tʼabo ku ma chʼe̩nubie̩ tule ane̩ o̩mo̩ no̩ kʼama ki chʼamaluche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai uche̩ kibo̩.
Tak ebije ikpa ki dago waala ef unyi Jihofa kpai o̩ka-wñ kpai ohimini ku ma nʼebije ikpa che kʼi jʼef unyi Jihofa le̩ chaka, abo Kaldia fu kpo̩fo̩, oñ ma mʼebije ikpa-wñ ko le tu Babilo̩n.
Ucha-wñ kpai uko̩che̩-wñ kpai e̩wñ ku ma ne̩ kpʼuna lu kpai uko̩de̩-wñ kpai e̩wñ eku du ku ma ne̩ chʼuko̩lo̩ o̩mo̩, e-ku ma nʼebije ikpa che, ma laño̩ mʼu ko le.
Kpai aido-wñ kpai o̩chibu-wñ, e-du ki chʼo̩jamalia, ma mʼo̩jamalia-wñ ko, e-du kʼi chʼajifa, ma mʼajifa-wñ ko, agboji abide le̩ mʼe-le̩ ko le.
Ebije ikpa ki dago waala meji le̩ kpai ohiminiʼka kpai o̩ka-wñ e-ki So̩lo̩mo̩n che todu unyi Jihofa le̩, uwoji ebije ikpa e̩wñ eku-i du nʼeñwa n.

O̩gba ebije ikpa ki dago waala le̩ʼka chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩, i la nʼukata ebije ikpa oji-wñ; o̩gba ukata le̩ la chʼohiba me̩ta; i nʼuko̩lo̩ ku ma danyʼu dab iga, kpai po̩me̩grane̩t o̩la ukata le̩ daka; o̩chaka-wñ chʼebije ikpa: ebije ki dago waala ekeji ño̩ ne̩ abe̩le̩, manyʼuko̩lo̩ ku ma danyʼu dab iga ge̩.
Tak agboji abide mu Se̩raya agboji amatama du, kpai Ze̩fanaya ata-ma ekeji kpai amadʼalo̩na me̩ta le̩ ko.

Tak i mʼonojiʼka ku ma kʼo̩da aboke̩le̩ ogu nyʼo̩wo̩ du kwef ewo; kpai aboke̩le̩ me̩lu ku ma jʼef abo ku ma ali eju onu ku ma li ef ewo kpʼako̩takada agboji abogu, kʼi ako̩ amone̩ ane̩ o̩mo̩ jeju; kpai aboke̩le̩ abo ane̩ o̩mo̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta ku ma li ef ewo.
Taku Ne̩biuzaredan agboji abide mʼabo le̩ ko, oñ i ko ma wa Ribla ugbo onu Babilo̩n.
Tak onu Babilo̩n ko ma kpa, i la fʼuma kpa ku Ribla oj ane̩ Hemat. Abe̩le̩ ma mu abo Juda, oñ ma mʼuma ño̩ lelo bʼoj ane̩-ma te̩.
I chʼe-amone̩ ki bo̩ ane̩ Juda, e-ku Ne̩biukadne̩za onu Babilo̩n to̩no̩ jʼo̩mo̩, i mʼo̩da abo le̩ du ñwu Ge̩dalaya o̩ma Ahaikam, o̩ma Shefan, kʼi che Go̩bina.

Oñ e̩gba kʼamagboji abogu chaka gbo̩ ka kʼonu Babilo̩n du Ge̩dalaya je̩ Go̩bina, ama kpai aboma lewa ugbo Ge̩dalaya, Mizpa, owñ chʼIshmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya kpai Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, kpai Se̩raya, o̩ma Tanhiume̩t e̩ne̩ Netofata le̩, kpai Jaazanaya, o̩ma e̩ne̩ Maakat le̩, ama kpai abo-ma.
Taku Ge̩dalaya go̩ ñwu ma kpai abo-ma, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ki railo tod ame̩nuko̩lo̩ abo Kaldia-i n: me̩ dodo ane̩-i, ku me̩ re̩ onu Babilo̩n, tak i ara ñwu me̩.

Ama i lewatu ochu e̩kebie-wñ, Ishmae̩l o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, o̩ma Elishama kʼi dʼef ugbe̩ onu, lewa, one̩ me̩gwa jʼugbo-wñ, oñ ma fu Ge̩dalaya kpai amaJu kpai abo Kaldia ku ma jʼugbo-wñ Mizpa le̩ gwoda, oñ i leku.
Tak amone̩ le̩ du, tʼabo ki nya, tʼabo ki nana, kpai amagboji abogu lewʼIjipti; todu ma railo abo Kaldia.

Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke mebie ku ma mu Jiho̩yachin onu Juda, ochu e̩ke̩gweji-wñ, o̩jo̩ ogu nyoke mebie ochu le̩, tak Ifil-me̩rodak, onu Babilo̩n, mʼoji Jiho̩yachin du dago kwʼef unyi uga, todu o̩do̩ le̩ i chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ;
i la ko̩la umo̩la ñw u, tak i dʼede-wñ gugu ate̩ ñw ede amonu du ku ma gugu Babilo̩n kpai owñ.
I la fʼe̩wñ o̩la unyi uga-wñ kpailo̩. Oñ Jiho̩yachin nʼuje̩wñ aje̩ o̩gba-wñ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-wñ kade.
I la chʼe-o̩ko̩ uje̩wñ-wñ, onu le̩ kʼo̩ko̩ uje̩wñ ñw u o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, o̩jo̩ du nʼukpe̩-wñ, o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-wñ kade.
Ade̩m, Se̩t, Inosh,
Kenan, Ma-halalel, Jare̩d,
Ino̩k, Me̩tusala, Lame̩k,
Noa, She̩m, Ham kpai Jefe̩t.
Amo̩ma Jefe̩t, che: Gome̩r kpai Mago̩g kpai Madai kpai Jafan kpai Tubal kpai Me̩she̩k kpai Tiras.
Amo̩ma Gome̩r che: Ashkenaz kpai Difat kpai Togarma.
Amo̩ma Jafan che: E̩laisha kpai Tarshish kpai Kitim kpai Rodanim.
Amo̩ma Ham che: Kush kpai Mizraim, Put kpai Kenan,
Amo̩ma Kush la che: Siba kpai Hafila kpai Sabta kpai Raama kpai Sabtika. Amo̩ma Raama la che: Shiba kpai Didan.
Kush la bi Nimrod; owñ chane̩ echagbiti ile̩-i.
Mizraim la bi abo Lud kpai abo Anam kpai abo Le̩hab kpai abo Naftuh
kpai abo Patrus kpai abo Kaslu, e̩te̩ abo Filistia de̩, kpai abo Kafto̩r.
Kenan la bi Saidon, o̩mo̩gba-wñ, kpai He̩t
kpai e̩ne̩ Je̩bius kpai e̩ne̩ Amo̩r kpai e̩ne̩ Girgash
kpai e̩ne̩ Hifai kpai e̩ne̩ Arki kpai e̩ne̩ Saini,
kpai e̩ne̩ Arfad kpai e̩ne̩ Ze̩mar kpai e̩ne̩ Hamat.
Amo̩ma She̩m che: Elam kpai Ashur kpai Arpaksad kpai Lud kpai Aram kpai Uz kpai Hul kpai Ge̩te̩r kpai Mishe̩k.
Arpaksad la bi Shila, Shila la bi E̩be̩r.
Ma la fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ meji bi ñw E̩be̩r: odu oka ko̩ Pe̩le̩g; todu iko-wñ oñ ma fʼane̩-ile̩ kpe̩ru; odu o̩maye-wñ la ko̩ Jo̩ktan.
Jo̩ktan la bi Almo̩dad kpai Shile̩f kpai Hazar-mafe̩t kpai Jira,
kpai Hado̩ram kpai Uzal kpai Dikla,
kpai Ibal kpai Abimae̩l kpai Shiba
kpai Ofir kpai Hafila kpai Jobab. Abo-i chaka chʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Jo̩ktan.
She̩m, Arpaksad, Shila,
Ibe̩r, Pe̩le̩g, Reu
Sirug, Neho̩r, Te̩ra,
Ebram (owñ le̩ chʼEbraham).
Amo̩ma Ebraham che̩: Aise̩k kpai Ishmae̩l.
O̩gba o̩gba ma jo̩-i: o̩mo̩gba Ishmae̩l che Ne̩baio̩t; tak i che Kedar kpai Adbil kpai Mibsam,
Mishma kpai Duma kpai Masa kpai Hadad kpai Tenia,
Jitur, Nefish kpai Kedema. Amo̩ma Ishmae̩l jo̩ le̩.
Amo̩ma Ke̩tura, e̩naja Ebraham la che̩: i fu Zimran kpai Jo̩kshan kpai Midan kpai Midian kpai Ishbak kpai Shua bi. Oñ amo̩ma Jo̩kshan che̩: Shiba kpai Didan.
Oñ amo̩ma Midian la che: Ifa kpai Ife̩r kpai Hino̩k kpai Abaida kpai E̩ldea. Abo-i chaka chʼamo̩ma Ke̩tura.
Ebraham la bi Aise̩k. Amo̩ma Aise̩k che: Iso̩ kpai Israe̩l.
Amo̩ma Iso̩ che: Elaifaz, Reue̩l kpai Jiush kpai Jealam kpai Ko̩ra.
Amo̩ma Elaifaz che: Teman kpai Omar, Zifai kpai Getam, Kenaz kpai Timna kpai Amale̩k.
Amo̩ma Reue̩l che: Nehat, Zira, Shama kpai Me̩za.
Amo̩ma Se̩ir la che: Lo̩tan kpai Sho̩bal kpai Zibeo̩n kpai Ena kpai Daisho̩n kpai Izar kpai Daishan.
Amo̩ma Lo̩tan la che: Ho̩ri kpai Homam; Timna la chʼo̩maye Lo̩tan onobule̩.
Amo̩ma Sho̩bal che: Ale̩an kpai Manahat kpai Ibal kpai Shifai kpai Onaro. Amo̩ma Zibeo̩n la che: Aya kpai Ena.
Amo̩ma Ena che: Daisho̩n. Amo̩ma Daisho̩n la che: Amram kpai E̩shban kpai E̩tran kpai Kiran.
Amo̩ma Ize̩r che: Bilhan kpai Zefan, kpai Jekan. Amo̩ma Daishan che: Uz kpai Eran.
Abo-i la chʼamonu ku ma jo̩fe̩ ojane̩ Ido̩m, o̩gba tak onu du jo̩fe̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l: Bila o̩ma Beo̩r: odu ewo-wñ la ko̩ Dinhaba.
Bila leku taku Jobab o̩ma Ze̩ra abo Bo̩zra je̩ koji-wñ.
Oñ Jobab leku taku Husham abo ojane̩ abo Teman je̩ koji-wñ.
Husham la leku taku Hadad o̩ma Bidad kʼi fu Midian gwo da oko Moab je̩ koji-wñ. Odu ewo-wñ la ko̩ Efit.
Hadad leku taku Samla abo Masrika je̩ koji-wñ.
Samla leku taku Sho̩l, abo Riho̩bo̩t, kʼi dʼo̩la Ohimini le̩, je̩ koji-wñ.
Sho̩l leku taku Be̩al-hanan o̩ma Akbo̩r je̩ koji-wñ.
Oñ Be̩al-hanan leku taku Hadad je̩ koji-wñ; odu ewo-wñ la ko̩ Peai. Odu o̩ya-wñ la ko̩ Me̩he̩tabe̩l, o̩ma Me̩tre̩d kʼi chʼo̩ma onobule̩ Me̩zahab.
Oñ Hadad leku.
Oho̩libama chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi; Ela chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi; Peino̩n chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi;
Kenaz chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi; Teman chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi; Mibzar chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi;
Magdie̩l chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi; Airam chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi. Ame̩ne̩fe̩nyi Ido̩m jo̩ le̩.
Abo-i chʼamo̩ma Israe̩l e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩: Rube̩n, Simeo̩n, Lifai kpai Juda, Isakar kpai Ze̩biulo̩n,
Dan, Jose̩f kpai Be̩njamin, Naftali, Gad kpai Ashe̩r.
Amo̩ma Juda che: E̩r kpai Onan kpai She̩la; O̩ma Shua e̩ne̩ Kenan le̩ fʼabo me̩ta-i bi ñw u. Oñ E̩r, o̩mo̩gba Juda, chʼe̩ne̩bibi eju Jihofa; oñ i mʼu du kpa.
Taku Temar, o̩ya o̩ma-wñ, fu Pe̩re̩r kpai Ze̩ra bi ñw u. Amo̩ma Juda e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ chaka chʼe̩lu.
Amo̩ma Pe̩re̩z che; He̩zro̩n kpai Hamul.
Oñ amo̩ma Ze̩ra che: Zimrai kpai Itan kpai Himan kpai Kalko̩l kpai Dera; o̩chaka-ma chʼe̩lu.
Amo̩ma Karmai che: Ekar akʼihianyi wa ñw Israe̩l, kʼi fʼada je̩ ef e̩wñ ku ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩.
O̩ma Itan la che: Azaraya.
Amo̩ma He̩zro̩n ku ma bi ñw u che; Je̩ramee̩l kpai Ram kpai Kilubai.
Oñ Ram bi Aminadab, Aminadab la bi Nasho̩n kʼi chʼidachi ef amo̩ma Juda.
Oñ Nasho̩n bi Salma, Salma la bi Boaz.
Bo̩az la bi Obe̩d, Obe̩d la bi Je̩si;
oñ Je̩si bi E̩liab, o̩mo̩gba-wñ, Abinadab la tekeji, Shima la chʼe̩ke̩ta,
Netane̩l chʼe̩ke̩le̩, Ra-dai te̩ke̩lu,
Oze̩m te̩ke̩fa, Defidi te̩kebie;
amo̩maye-ma onobule̩ la che Ze̩riuaya kpai Abige̩l. Amo̩ma Ze̩ruaya la che Abishai kpai Joab kpai Asahe̩l, e̩ta ma che.
Abige̩l la bi Amasa; ata Amasa la che Jite̩r, e̩ne̩ Ishmae̩l le̩.
Kele̩b, o̩ma He̩zro̩n la fʼo̩ma ne̩ lugbo o̩ya-wñ Azuba, kpai lugbo Je̩rio̩t; amo̩ma onobule̩ le̩ la che: Jishe̩r kpai Shobab kpai Ardon.
Tak Azuba leku oñ Kele̩b fʼIfrat ne̩, e-le̩ la fu He̩r bi ñw u.
He̩r la bi Uri, oñ Uri la bi Be̩zale̩l.
Ubi le̩ taku He̩zro̩n nyʼejefu ugbo o̩ma onobule̩ Makir, ata Gilead. I mʼe-le̩ du e̩gba kʼo̩do̩-wñ chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta. I la fu Sigo̩b bi ñw u.
Sigo̩b la bi Jair, kʼi ne̩ ewo ogu nyoke me̩ta oj ane̩ Gilead.
Oñ Gishur kpai Eram bo̩ Jair gba unyi unyi-wñ, manyu Kenat kpai adogbe-wñ, owñ chʼewo ewo o̩gbo̩ me̩ta. Abo-i chaka chʼe-amo̩ma Makir, kʼi chʼata Gilead.
Abu ku He̩zro̩n la ku Kele̩b-e̩frata, tak Abaija, o̩ya He̩zro̩n, fʼAshur, ata Te̩koa, bi ñw u.
Amo̩ma Je̩ramee̩l, o̩mo̩gba He̩zro̩n la che: Ram, o̩mo̩gba-wñ, kpai Buna kpai Ore̩n kpai Oze̩m, kpai Ahi-ja.
Je̩ramee̩l la nʼo̩ya omune̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Atara; owñ chʼiye Onam.
Oñ amo̩ma Ram, kʼi chʼo̩mo̩gba Je̩ramee̩l, che: Maaz kpai Jamin kpai Ike̩r.
Oñ amo̩ma Onam che: Shameai kpai Jeda. Amo̩ma Shameai la che Nedab kpai Abaishur.
Odu o̩ya Abaishur la ko̩ Abiheil; owñ la bi Aban kpai Molid ñw u.
Amo̩ma Nedab la che Sele̩d kpai Apeim; Sele̩d la nʼoma tak i ku n.
Amo̩ma Apeim la che Ishi. Amo̩ma Ishi la che Shishan. Oñ amo̩ma Shishan che Aleai.
Amo̩ma Jeda, o̩maye Shameai, la che Jite̩r kpai Jo̩natan. Jite̩r la nʼo̩ma tak i ku n.
Amo̩ma Jo̩natan la che Pile̩t kpai Zeza. Abo-i chʼamo̩ma Je̩ramee̩l.
Shishan la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n chai amo̩ma onobule̩. Oñ Shishan nʼadu, e̩ne̩ Ijipti, kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jarha.
Oñ Shishan dʼo̩ma-wñ ñwu Jarha, adu-wñ, kʼi chʼo̩ya-wñ; oñ i fʼAteai bi ñw u.
Ateai la bi Netan, Netan la bi Zebad,
Zebad la bi E̩flal, oñ E̩flal bi Obe̩d,
Obe̩d la bi Jihiu, oñ Jihiu bi Azaraya,
Azaraya la bi Hile̩z, oñ Hile̩z bi E̩liesa,
E̩liesa la bi Sisamai, oñ Sisamai bi Shalum,
Shalum la bi Je̩kamaya, oñ Je̩kamaya bi Elishama.
Oñ amo̩ma Kele̩b o̩maye Je̩ramee̩l e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Me̩sha, o̩mo̩gba-wñ, kʼi chʼata Zif; kpʼamo̩ma Maresha kʼi chʼata He̩bro̩n.
Amo̩ma He̩bro̩n la che Ko̩ra kpai Tapua kpai Re̩ke̩m kpai Shema.
Shema la bi Reham kʼi chʼata Jo̩rkoam; oñ Re̩ke̩m bi Shameai.
O̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Shameai la che Mao̩n; Mao̩n la chʼata Be̩t-zur.
Tak Ifa e̩naja Kele̩b fu Haran kpai Moza kpai Geze̩z bi; oñ Haran bi Geze̩z.
Amo̩ma Jadeai la che Rige̩m kpai Jotan kpai Gishan kpai Pe̩le̩t kpai Ifa kpai Shaaf.
Maaka, e̩naja Kele̩b bi Shibe̩r kpai Tirhena.
Onobule̩ le̩ ño̩ bi Shaaf ata Madmana, Shiba, ata Makbina, kpai ata Gibea; o̩ma Kele̩b onobule̩ la che Aksa.
Abo-i chʼamo̩ma Kele̩b.
Salma, ata Be̩tle̩he̩m. Hare̩f ata Be̩t-gade̩r.
Shobal ata Kiriat-jearim ño̩ nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩: Haroe kpai ukpe̩reji abo Me̩naho̩t.
O̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Kiriat-jearim la che abo Itrai, kpai abo Piu-hai kpai abo Shumat kpai abo Mishra; ama chʼe̩te̩ abo Zara kpai abo E̩shteul.
Amo̩ma Salma che Be̩tle̩he̩m kpai abo Nito̩f, Atarot-be̩t-joab kpai ukpe̩reji abo Manahat, abo Zora.
Akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amako̩takada ku ma dodo Jebe̩z la che abo Tairat, abo Shime̩at, kpʼabo Sukat. Abo-i chʼabo Ken ku Hima, ata abunyi Rekab, chʼe̩te̩-ma.
Abo-i la chʼamo̩ma Defid ku ma bi ñw u He̩bro̩n: o̩mo̩gba-wñ che Amno̩n, ku Ahinoam, e̩ne̩ Je̩zree̩l le̩ bi ñw u, ekeji che Danie̩l kʼAbige̩l, e̩ne̩ Karme̩l bi;
e̩ke̩ta che Absalom, o̩ma Maaka kʼi chʼo̩ma onobule̩ Talmai onu Gishur; e̩ke̩le̩ che Adonija o̩ma Hagit;
e̩ke̩lu che She̩fataiya ku Abaital bi; e̩ke̩fa che Itre̩am ku E̩gla o̩ya-wñ bi.
Ma fʼo̩ma me̩fa bi ñw u He̩bro̩n, i la jʼonu o̩mo̩ o̩do̩ mebie kpʼochu me̩fa. I la jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩ta.
Abo ku ma bi ñw u Je̩rusale̩m la che: She̩me̩a kpai Shobab kpai Netan kpai So̩lo̩mo̩n, Batshua, o̩ma Amie̩l, bi ama me̩le̩ le̩;
kpai Ibhar kpai Elishama kpai Ilife̩le̩t
kpai Noga kpai Ne̩fe̩g kpai Jafaiya
kpai Elishama kpai Eliada kpai Ilife̩le̩t, e̩la ma che.
Abo-i du chʼamo̩ma Defid e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, manyʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ame̩naja-wñ; Temar la chʼo̩maye-ma onobule̩.
Oñ o̩ma So̩lo̩mo̩n e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Reho̩boam, kpai Abaija o̩ma-wñ, Esa o̩ma-wñ, Jiho̩shafat o̩ma-wñ,
Jo̩ram o̩ma-wñ, Ehazaya o̩ma-wñ, Joash o̩ma-wñ,
Amazaya o̩ma-wñ, Azaraya o̩ma-wñ, Jotam o̩ma-wñ,
Ehaz o̩ma-wñ. He̩ze̩kaya o̩ma-wñ Manasa o̩ma-wñ,
Amo̩n o̩ma-wñ, Josaya o̩ma-wñ.
Amo̩ma Josaya la che: o̩mo̩gba-wñ Jo̩hanan, ekeji che Jiho̩yakim, e̩ke̩ta che Ze̩de̩kaya, e̩ke̩le̩ che Shalum.
Oñ amo̩ma Jiho̩yakim che: Je̩konaya o̩ma-wñ, Ze̩de̩kaya o̩ma-wñ.
Amo̩ma Je̩konaya e̩namu le̩ che Salatie̩l o̩ma-wñ,
kpai Malkairam kpai Pe̩daya kpai She̩nezar, Je̩kamaya, Hoshama kpai Ne̩dabaya.
Oñ amo̩ma Pe̩daya che Ze̩rubabe̩l kpai Shimeai. Amo̩ma Zerubabe̩l la che Me̩shulam kpai Hananaya kpai Shelomit o̩maye-ma onobule̩;
kpai Hashuba kpai Ohe̩l kpai Be̩re̩kaya kpai Hasadaya, Jushab-he̩se̩d, e̩lu ma che.
Oñ amo̩ma Hananaya che Pe̩latiya kpai Jesaya; amo̩ma Re̩faya, amo̩ma Amo̩n, amo̩ma Obadaya, amo̩ma She̩kanaya.
Oñ amo̩ma She̩kanaya che She̩maya. Amo̩ma She̩maya la che Hatush kpai Aige̩al kpai Baraya kpai Nearaya kpai Shefat, e̩fa ma che.
Amo̩ma Nearaya che E̩leoinai kpai Hizkaya kpai Azrajkam, eta ma che.
Oñ amo̩ma E̩le̩oinai che Hodafaya kpai Ilaiashib kpai Pe̩laya kpai Akub kpai Jo̩hanan kpai Dalaya kpai Anenai, ebie ma che.
Amo̩ma Juda che Pe̩re̩z, He̩zro̩n kpai Karmai kpai He̩r kpai Shobal.
Reaya, o̩ma Shobal, la bi Jehat; Jehat la bi Ahumai kpai Lehad. Akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Zo̩ra de̩.
Ata Beam ne̩ abo-i: Je̩zree̩l kpai Ishma kpai Idbash; odu o̩maye-ma onobule̩ la ko̩ Haze̩le̩lponai;
kpai Pe̩nue̩l ata Gedo̩r kpai Ize̩r ata Husha. Abo-i chʼamo̩ma He̩r o̩mo̩gba E̩frata, ata Be̩tle̩he̩m.
Oñ Ashur ata Te̩koa nʼo̩ya meji, Hila kpai Neara.
Ne-ara la bi Ahuzam kpai He̩fe̩r kpai Time̩nai kpai Heahashtarai ñw u. Abo le̩ chʼamo̩ma Neara e̩ne̩ke̩le̩.
Amo̩ma Hila la che Zire̩t kpai Zo̩har kpai E̩tnan.
Ko̩z la bi Enub kpai Zobiba kpai o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Aharhe̩l o̩ma Harum.
Je̩be̩z la nʼojima tʼamo̩maye-wñ le; iye-wñ la dʼodu-wñ Je̩be̩z, kakini, Ukpe̩ kʼu bi kpʼe̩do̩dudu.

Je̩be̩z la kwado̩ O̩jo̩ Israe̩l kakini, O, uwe̩ ma de̩nyo̩ ñwu mi ochochi, kʼe̩ hi alo̩me̩-mi tʼubi, kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ ki la dʼugbo mi, kʼe̩ laño̩ fʼumi de bʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ te̩, kʼi we e̩chʼe̩do̩dudu ñwu mi! Tak O̩jo̩ dʼe̩wñ kʼi bi le̩ ñw u.
Oñ Kilub o̩maye Shuha fu Mihe̩r kʼi chʼata E̩shto̩n bi.
E̩shto̩n la bi Be̩t-refa kpai Pasiya kpai Te̩hina kʼi chʼata Ir-nehash. Abo le̩ chʼaboke̩le̩ Reka.
Amo̩ma Kenaz la che O̩tnie̩! kpai Se̩raya. Amo̩ma O̩tnie̩l che Hatat.
Mio̩no̩tai la bi O̩fra; Se̩raya la bi Joab kʼi chʼata Ge̩-hara-shim; todu ama chʼamachʼo̩na e̩wñ.
Amo̩ma Kele̩b o̩ma Je̩fune la che Airu, Ela, kpai Neam; kpai amo̩ma Da kpai Kenaz.
Oñ amo̩ma Je̩-hale̩lil che Zif kpai Zaifa, Tairia kpai Asaril.

Amo̩ma E̩zra la che Jite̩r kpai Mire̩d kpai Ife̩rkpai Jelo̩n; abo-i la chʼamo̩ma Bitiya, o̩ma Eero e-onobule̩, e-ki Mire̩d ne̩ o̩ya; i la fʼefu nyo̩ oñ i bi Miriam kpai Shameai kpai Ishba, ata E̩shte̩moa.
O̩ya-wñ kʼi chʼabo Juda fu Je̩re̩d ata Gedo̩r bi, kpai Hebe̩r ata Soko, kpai Je̩kutie̩l, ata Zanoa.
Oñ amo̩ma o̩ya Hodaya, o̩maye onobule̩ Neham chʼata Keila, e̩ne̩ Garma le̩, kpai E̩shte̩moa, e̩ne̩ Maaka ge̩.
Amo̩ma Shaimon la che Amno̩n kpai Rina, Be̩nhenan kpai Tailo̩n. Oñ amo̩ma Ishai che Zohe̩t kpai Be̩n-zohe̩t.
Amo̩ma Shila, o̩ma Juda, che E̩r ata Lika kpai Leada ata Maresha, kpai abo unyi unyi abo ku ma hi ukpo line̩n ne̩ke̩ ne̩ke̩, ef abunyi Ashbia;
kpai Jokim kpai aboke̩le̩ Koziba kpai Joash kpai Seraf, kʼi nʼo̩da Moab, kpai Jashubaile̩-he̩m. O̩la-i chʼe-igbelegbele
Abo le̩ la chʼamabucha kpai abo ku ma dodo Netaim kpai Ge̩de̩ra. Ma bʼonu gugu o̩mo̩ tod uko̩lo-wñ.
Amo̩ma Simeo̩n che Ne̩miue̩l kpai Jamin, Jerib, Zira kpai Sho̩l;
Shalum o̩ma-wñ, Mibsam o̩ma-wñ, Mishma o̩ma-wñ.
Amo̩ma Mishma la che Hamiue̩l o̩ma-wñ, Zakur o̩ma-wñ kpai Shimeai o̩ma-wñ.
Shimeai la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ me̩gwe̩fa, kpʼamo̩ma onobule̩ me̩fa; amo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ muda nʼamo̩ma wewe n; amo̩lo̩pu-ma du la bi o̩ma wewe dab amo̩ma Juda n.
Oñ ma dodo Bir-shiba kpai Moleda kpai Hezar-shual,
kpai Bilha kpai Ize̩m kpai Tolad,
kpai Be̩tue̩l kpai Ho̩rma kpai Ziklag
kpai Be̩t-markabo̩t kpai Hazar Susim kpai Be̩tbe̩rai kpai Sheareaim. Ewo ewo-ma gbogbo kad iko ku Defid jo̩fe̩ jo̩-i.
Adogbe adogbe-ma la chʼItam kpai Ain, Rimo̩n kpai Toke̩n kpai Ashan, ewo me̩lu;
kpai adogbe adogbe-ma du ki lʼewo ewo le̩ daka gbogbo wa Beal. Ugbo le̩ chʼodo odo-ma, kpai o̩takada o̩gba o̩gba-ma.
Me̩shobab kpai Jamle̩k kpai Josha, o̩ma Amazaya,
kpai Joe̩l kpai Jihiu, o̩ma Jo̩sibaya, o̩ma Seraya, o̩ma Asie̩l,
kpai E̩lioinai kpai Jeakoba kpai Je̩shohaya kpai Asaya kpai Adie̩l kpai Je̩simie̩l kpai Be̩naya
kpai Ziza, o̩ma Shifai, o̩ma Alo̩n, o̩ma Je̩daya, o̩ma Shimri, o̩ma She̩ma-ya.
Abo ku ma dʼodu-ma le̩ chʼamidachi ef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma: unyi unyi amata-ma la wewe nyo̩gba tabale.
I Oñ ma le tʼalo̩me̩ Gido̩r, gbogbo wʼo̩wo̩ olodudu ogo̩ le̩, ku ma tene ije̩ tod ame̩wño̩re̩-ma egini.
Oñ ma fʼugbo kʼije̩ ara nyo̩nyo̩ li. Ane̩ o̩mo̩ la chʼenabe̩, oñ i che̩bo̩ no̩ko̩o; todu abo Ham dodo o̩mo̩ igbele.

Oñ abo ku ma kʼodu-ma-i wa iko He̩ze̩kaya onu Juda, oñ ma fʼunyabo unyabo-ma gwo kpai abo Me̩un ku ma li o̩mo̩, oñ ma mu ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ gbogbo tʼeñini; taku ma fʼodo do koji ma; todabu kʼije̩ dʼo̩mo̩ tod ame̩wño̩re̩-ma egini.
Oñ abo iche̩ka efu amo̩ma Simeo̩n, aboke̩le̩-wñ chʼoli me̩gwa, nyi uwo Seir. Abo ku ma dʼoji dufu efu ma che Pe̩latiya kpai Nearaya kpai Re̩faya kpai Uzie̩l, amo̩ma Ishai.
Oñ ma fʼabʼe̩bo̩bo̩ Amale̩k ku ma fʼuma o̩wo̩ igbele gwoda. Ma la dodo o̩mo̩ gbogbo tʼemni.

Amo̩ma Rube̩n, o̩mo̩gba Israe̩l (todu owñ chʼo̩mo̩gba; ama abu kʼi fʼate̩ ata-wñ kpabie̩, ma mʼo̩da o̩mo̩gba-wñ du ñw amo̩ma Jo̩se̩f o̩ma Israe̩l. Ma muda akaluka o̩gba o̩gba-ma lʼo̩na o̩da o̩mo̩gba le̩ n.
Todu Juda mʼo̩gba amo̩maye-wñ du, ugbo-wñ oñ e̩nuto̩gba kwo; o̩da o̩mo̩gba muda chʼe-Jo̩se̩f).
Amo̩ma Rube̩n, o̩mo̩gba Israe̩l la che Heno̩k kpai Palu, He̩zro̩n kpai Karmi.
Amo̩ma Joe̩l che She̩maya o̩ma-wñ, Go̩g o̩ma-wñ, Shimeai o̩ma-wñ,
Maika o̩ma-wñ, Reaya o̩ma-wñ, Beal o̩ma-wñ.
Bira o̩ma-wñ, e-ki Tilgat-piliesa onu; Asiria mu lelo: owñ chʼidachi abo Rube̩n.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma fʼo̩gba o̩gba amo̩maye-wñ lo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩maye-wñ: Jiaye̩l chʼoji-ma, kpai Ze̩karaya,
kpai Bila o̩ma Ezaz, o̩ma Shima, o̩ma Joe̩l kʼi dodo Aroe̩r gbogbo wa Nibo kpai Beal-meon:
oñ olodudu-wñ i dodo gbogbo wʼalo̩me̩ aje̩tachi le̩, akwo ohimini Yufretis, todabu kʼame̩wñu-kpa-ma rabi oj ane̩ Gilead.
Oñ iko So̩l ma kogu bʼabo Hagar, o̩wo̩-ma la ko̩ ma nʼane̩; taku ma kwododo unyabo unyabo-ma ugbo du o̩wo̩ olodudu Gilead le̩.
Oñamo̩ma Gad dodo kado ma oj ane̩ Be̩shan gbogbo wa Salka.
Joe̩l chʼoji, She̩fam la chʼekeji kpai Jeanai kpai Shefat oj ane̩ Beshan.
Oñ amo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu amata-ma che Maike̩l kpai Me̩shulam kpai Shiba kpai Jorai kpai Jekan kpai Zaya kpai Hibe̩r, ebie ma che.
Abo-i chʼamo̩ma Abiheil, o̩ma Hurai, o̩ma Jaroa, o̩ma Gilead, o̩ma Maike̩l, o̩ma Jeshishai, o̩ma Jado, o̩ma Buz;
Ehai o̩ma Abdie̩l, o̩ma Guni, e̩ne̩ ki dʼoji dufu unyi unyi amata-ma.
Ma la dodo oj ane̩ Gilead, Beshan kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ kpai oj ane̩ Sharo̩n ugbo kʼije̩ de̩ gbogbo nyʼalo̩me̩-ma.
Ma fʼabo-i lo o̩gba o̩gba o̩kpanachi Jotam, onu Juda, kpai o̩kpanachi Je̩ro̩boam, onu Israe̩l.

Amo̩ma Rube̩n kpai abo Gad kpai ukpe̩reji abo̩lo̩pu Manasa, amagbiti, owñ chʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma bʼugbe̩yo̩ kpʼo̩kwo̩chageli ene̩ jo̩, ku ma neke tʼo̩fa, ku ma la chʼo̩ka ogu e̩ja chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩le̩ kpʼo̩gbo̩ meji chʼicham oji, owñ chʼabo ku ma neke dufu nyʼogu.
Oñ ma kogu bʼabo Hagar kpai Jitur kpai Ne̩fish kpai Nodab.
Oñ ma gbutu ñwu ma ef ogu le̩, tak abo Hagar tʼuma o̩wo̩ manyʼabo du ku ma jʼugbo ma; todu ma kwadʼO̩jo̩ ef ogu le̩, oñ i mʼo̩ko̩-ma gbagbo̩, ukpe̩ ku ma ke̩do̩nʼowñ.

Ma la mʼame̩wñu-kpa-ma ko; inyakulumi-ma che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ooje, ame̩wño̩re̩ egini la che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oli me̩lu, amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ la che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji, onugo one̩ la che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogume̩lu.
Abo kʼuku kpa ma jʼane̩ la wewe, todabu kʼogu le̩ kwʼugbo O̩jo̩. Taku ma dodo o̩mo̩ koji ma gbogbo wʼamu le̩.
Oñ amo̩ma ukpe̩reji abo̩lo̩pu Manasa dodo oj ane̩-i. Ma wewe nyo̩gba akwo Beshan gbogbo wa Beal-he̩rmo̩n kpai Sine̩r kpai uwo He̩rmo̩n.

Abo-i la chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef unyi unyi amata-ma: owñ che Ife̩r kpai Ishai kpai Ilaie̩i kpai Azrie̩l kpai Je̩re̩maya kpai Ho̩dafaya kpai Jadie̩l. Ame̩nukpahiu ku ma chʼagbiti ma che. Ma chʼame̩nuwohi, ku ma chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef unyi unyi amata-ma.
Taku ma fʼada o̩jo̩ amata-ma je̩, oñ ma kwojo̩ko̩ bʼamo̩jo̩ abo ane̩ le̩, owñ chʼabo kʼO̩jo̩ fu ma kpo̩fo̩ rinyo̩ o̩gba-ma le̩.

Tak O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l du e̩do̩ Pul onu Asiria kpai e̩do̩ Tilgat-pilnesa kwane̩, oñ i mu ma ño̩ le; owñ chʼabo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad kpai ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa; oñ i mu ma ko wa Hela kpai Hebor kpai Heara kpai wʼo̩la ohimini Gozan gbogbo tʼeñini.
Amo̩ma Lifai e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Ge̩rsho̩n, Ko̩hat kpai Me̩rari.
Oñ amo̩ma Kohat e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Amram, Izhar kpai He̩bro̩n kpai Uzie̩l.
Amo̩ma Amram la che Aro̩n kpai Mose̩s kpai Miriam. Oñ amo̩ma Aro̩n e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Nedab kpʼAbaihiu, E̩learn kpai Itamar.
E̩leaza bi Finehas; Fine-has bi Abaishua;
oñ Abaishua bi Bukai; Bukai la bi Uzai;
Uzai la bi Ze̩rahaiya; oñ Ze̩rahaiya bi Me̩rayo̩t;
Me̩rayo̩t bi Amaraya; oñ Amaraya bi Ahaitub;
Ahaitub la bi Ze̩do̩k; oñ Zedo̩k bi Ahimaaz;
Ahimaaz la bi Azaraya; oñ Azaraya bi Johanan;
Johanan la bi Azaraya, (owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩da ugugu atama ef unyi ki So̩lo̩mo̩n ko̩ Je̩rusale̩m).
Azaraya la bi Amaraya; oñ Amaraya bi Ahaitub;
Ahaitub la bi Zedo̩k; oñ Zedo̩k bi Shalum;
Shalum la bi Hilkaya; oñ Hilkaya bi Azaraya;
Azaraya la bi Se̩raya; oñ Se̩raya bi Je̩hozadak.
Oñ Je̩hozadak le e̩gba ku Jihofa nʼo̩wo̩ Ne̩biukadne̩za mu Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m ño̩ le le̩.
Amo̩ma Lifai e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Ge̩rsho̩m, Kohat kpai Me̩rari.
Oñ abu kʼodu amo̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ko̩ de̩: Libni kpai Shimeai.
Oñ amo̩ma Kohat e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Amram kpai Izhar kpai He̩bro̩n kpai Uzie̩l.
Amo̩ma Me̩rari e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Mali kpai Mushi. Oñ abo-i chʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Lifai unyi unyi amata-ma.
E-Ge̩rsho̩m che Libni o̩ma-wñ, Jahat o̩ma-wñ, Zima o̩ma-wñ,
Joa o̩ma-wñ, Ido o̩ma-wñ, Ze̩ra o̩ma-wñ, Jeate̩rai o̩ma-wñ.
Amo̩ma Kohat e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Aminadab o̩ma-wñ, Ko̩ra o̩ma-wñ, A sir o̩ma-wñ,
E̩lkana o̩ma-wñ, kpai Ibayasaf o̩ma-wñ, kpai Asir o̩ma-wñ,
Tahat o̩ma-wñ, Urie̩l o̩ma-wñ, Uzaya o̩ma-wñ, Sho̩l o̩ma-wñ;
oñ amo̩ma E̩lkana e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Amesai kpai Ahaimot.
I chʼe-E̩lkana, amo̩ma E̩lkana e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Zofai o̩ma-wñ, kpai Nehat o̩ma-wñ;
E̩liab o̩ma-wñ, Je̩roham o̩ma-wñ, E̩lkana o̩ma-wñ.
Oñ amo̩ma Samiue̩l e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che, o̩mo̩gba-wñ Fashnai kpai Abaija ekeji-wñ.
Amo̩ma Me̩rari che Mali, Libni o̩ma-wñ, Shimeai o̩ma-wñ, Uza o̩ma-wñ,
Shimea o̩ma-wñ, Hagaiya o̩ma-wñ, Asaya o̩ma-wñ.
Oñ abo-i chʼabo ku Defid kʼo̩da uko̩lo̩ eli jʼef o̩wo̩-ma ef unyi Jihofa, abu kʼakpati alo le̩ fʼuñmi ne.
Oñ e̩wñ-ma ku ma che chʼeli eko̩ o̩gba uña ugugu unyabo ujeju, gbogbo taku So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼunyi Jihofa ko̩ Je̩rusale̩m; ma la dejutʼukpe̩ e-ma aro̩ne aro̩ne alu ku ma du ñwu ma.
Oñ abo ku ma dago jo̩ kpʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ la de̩: amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abo Kohat che Heman akeli, o̩ma Joe̩l, o̩ma Samiue̩l,
o̩ma E̩lkana, o̩ma Je̩roham, o̩ma Ilaie̩l, o̩ma Toa,
o̩ma Zuf, o̩ma E̩lkana, o̩ma Me̩hat, o̩ma Amesai,
o̩ma E̩lkana, o̩ma Joe̩l, o̩ma Azaraya, o̩ma Ze̩fanaya,
o̩ma Tehat, o̩ma Asir, o̩ma Ibayasaf, o̩ma Ko̩ra,
o̩ma Izhar, o̩ma Kohat, o̩ma Lifai, o̩ma Israe̩l.
Kpai o̩maye-wñ Esaf, kʼi dago o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ, owñ chʼEsaf, o̩ma Be̩re̩kaya, o̩ma Shimea,
o̩ma Maike̩l o̩ma Baaseya, o̩ma Malkija,
o̩ma E̩tnai, o̩ma Zira, o̩ma Adaya,
o̩ma Etan, o̩ma Zima, o̩ma Shimeai,
o̩ma Jahat, o̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m, o̩ma Lifai.
Oñ amo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼamo̩ma Me̩rari jʼo̩wo̩ awohi-ma; Itan o̩ma Kishai, o̩ma Abdai, o̩ma Maluk,
o̩ma Hashabaiya, o̩ma Amazaya, o̩ma Hilkaya,
o̩ma Amzai, o̩ma Beni, o̩ma Sheme̩r,
o̩ma Malai, o̩ma Mushai, o̩ma Me̩rari, o̩ma Lifai.
Oñ ma mʼamo̩maye ma, abo Lifai le̩, kojo̩ ñw e̩wñ eche ef uña ugugu e-unyi O̩jo̩.

Aro̩n kpʼamo̩ma-wñ muda gu e̩wñ jo dab otulale oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kpʼoj ubo̩ otulale, tod uko̩lo̩ ef uña efo̩ e-efo̩ chaka, ku ma che e̩wñ e̩boma todu Israe̩l, teju alu du ku Mose̩s, adu O̩jo̩ le̩, ñwate̩.
Abo-i la chʼamo̩ma Aro̩n e̩ne̩ke̩le̩: E̩leaza o̩ma-wñ, Finehas o̩ma-wñ, Abaishua o̩ma-wñ,
Bukai o̩ma-wñ, Uzai o̩ma-wñ, Ze̩ra-haiya o̩ma-wñ,
Me̩rayo̩t o̩ma-wñ, Amaraya o̩ma-wñ, Ahaitub o̩ma-wñ,
Zedo̩k o̩ma-wñ, Ahimaaz o̩ma-wñ.
Oñ ugbo-i chʼuña ugugu ugugu-ma alu ku ma ruru jo̩ alo̩me̩ e-ma: e-amo̩ma Aro̩n, o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Kohat, (todu anya ejodudu ku ma ro̩ chʼe-ma)
ma du He̩bro̩n, oj ane̩ Juda, kpai ane̩ ije̩-wñ ki lʼo daka ñwu ma;
ma muda ko oko oko ewo le̩ kpʼadogbe̩-wñ ñwu Kele̩b, o̩ma Je̩fune.
Ma la mʼewo ewo ki chʼoko e̩ko̩ ko ñw amo̩ma Aro̩n, owñ che He̩bro̩n kpai Libna manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, kpai Jatir kpai E̩shte̩moa manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ,
kpai Haile̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, Dibe̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ,
kpai Ashan manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Be̩t-shime̩sh manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ;
oñ oj ane̩ abʼo̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin Geba kpʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, kpai Ale̩me̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, kpʼAnato̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ. Ewo-ma du ugbo du ef o̩lo̩pu-ma chʼewo me̩gwe̩ta.
Ma la ko alu kʼanya je̩ kwef akwo̩ra unyi ef o̩lo̩pu (Ifraim kpai ef o̩lo̩pu Dan) kpai kwef ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu Manasa ñw amo̩ma Kohat ki bo̩, ewo me̩gwa.
Ma ko ewo me̩gwe̩ta kwef o̩lo̩pu Isakar, kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu Naftali kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu Manasa Beshan ñw amo̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩.
Anya je̩ ewo me̩gweji kwef o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n, kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu Gad kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n, ñw amo̩ma Me̩rari alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma de̩.
Amo̩ma Israe̩l la mʼewo ewo le̩ manyu ane̩ ije̩-wñ ko ñw abo Lifai.
Oñ ma mʼewo ewo ku ma dʼodu-wñ-i e-kʼanya je̩ kwef o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Juda kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Sime̩o̩n kpai kwef o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Be̩njamin ko̩ ñwu ma.
Ma la mʼewo ewo oko e̩ko̩ She̩ke̩m, oj ane̩ uwo e-Ifraim manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Geze̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ ge̩
kpai Jokmeam manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n manyʼnae̩ ije̩-wñ,
kpai Aijalo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Gat-rimo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ
ko ñw abo akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma Kohat ku ma nʼewo ewo e-ma kwef o̩lo̩pu Ifraim.
Oñ kwef ukpe̩reji abo̩lo̩pu Manasa: Ene̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Baileam manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, achʼutodu abo akwo̩ra unyi amo̩ma Ko̩hat ki bo̩.
Oñ ma ko ñw amo̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m kwef ane̩ abo akwo̩ra unyi ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu Manasa, Golan e-Beshan manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Ashto̩ro̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ,
oñ kwef ane̩ o̩lo̩pu Isakar; Kede̩sh manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, kpai Dabe̩ro̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ,
kpai Ramo̩t manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Ene̩m manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ;
oñ kwef o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r; Me̩shal manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Abdo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ
kpai Huko̩k manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Re̩hob manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ;
oñ kwef o̩lo̩pu Naftali, Kede̩sh oj ane̩ Galili manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Hamo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Kiriataim manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ
Ma ko kwef ane̩ abo o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n: Rimono manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ, Tabo̩r manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ ñw amo̩ma Me̩rari ki bo̩;
oñ ejudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu wñ odede Je̩riko ma ko kwef ane̩ abo o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n: Bize̩r ef aje̩tachi manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Jaza manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ
kpai Kedemo̩t ge̩ manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Me̩feal manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ;
oñ kwef ane̩ abo o̩lo̩pu Gad, Ramo̩t kʼi dʼoj ane̩ Gilead manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Mahanaim manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ
kpai He̩shbo̩n manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ kpai Je̩za manyʼane̩ ije̩-wñ ñwu ma.
Oñ amo̩ma Isakar e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Tola kpai Pua kpai Jashub kpai Shirmo̩n, e̩le̩ ma che.

Oñ amo̩ma Tola che Uzai kpai Refaya kpai Je̩rie̩l kpai Jameai kpai Ibsam kpai Shemue̩l, abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef unyi unyi amata-ma ma che, e-Tola, ku ma chʼamagbiti ki nʼuwohi ef o̩gba e-ma: aluka-ma o̩kpanachi Defid che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke meji nyʼulo̩gwa oji.
Amo̩ma Uzai la che Izrahaiya. Oñ amo̩ma Izrahaiya che Maike̩l kpai Obadaya kpai Joe̩l kpai Ishaiya, e̩lu ma che; o̩chaka-ma chʼabo ki tʼoji.
Oñ amanyu ma, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩ udala udala abʼogu che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩fa, todu ma nʼamo̩ya kpʼa-mo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ wewe.
Amo̩maye-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ku ma jʼef akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi Isakar, ku ma chʼamagbiti ki nʼuwohi ku ma fʼo̩gba-ma lo nyʼo̩takada, o̩chaka-ma che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ nyoke mebie.
E-Be̩njamin che Bila kpai Bike̩r kpai Je̩diee̩l, e̩ta ma che.

Amo̩ma Bila la che E̩zbo̩n kpai Uzai kpai Uzie̩l kpai Je̩rimot kpai Arai, e̩lu ma che; abo ku ma dʼoji dufu unyi unyi amata-ma amagbiti ki nʼuwohi ma che; oñ ma fu ma lo nyʼo̩takada kwʼe̩te̩-ma, aluka-ma che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke meji nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke me̩le̩ oji.
Oñ amo̩ma Bike̩r che Ze̩mira kpai Joash kpai E̩lieza kpai E̩lioenai kpai O̩mri kpai Je̩re̩mo̩t kpai Abaija kpai Anato̩t kpai Alame̩t. Abo-i du chʼamo̩ma Bike̩r.
Oñ ma fu ma lo nyʼo̩takada kwʼe̩te̩-ma, o̩gba o̩gba-ma, abo ku ma dʼoji dufu unyi unyi amata-ma, amagbiti ki nʼuwohi, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oji.
Amo̩ma Je̩diee̩l la che Bilhan. Oñ amo̩ma Bilhan che Jeush kpai Be̩njamin kpai Ehiud kpai Ke̩neana kpai Zitan kpai Tarshish kpai Ahaishehar.
Abo-i chaka chʼamo̩ma Je̩diee̩l alu kʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu unyi unyi amata-ma de̩, amagbiti ki nʼuwohi, ma che one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwebie nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oji ku ma neke dufu ef abogu ku ma jogu.
Kpai Shupim ge̩, kpai Hupim, amo̩ma Ir, Hushim amo̩ma Ehe̩r.
Amo̩ma Naftali e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Jazie̩l kpai Guni kpai Jeze̩r kpai Shalum, amo̩ma Bilha.
Amo̩ma Manasa e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che: Azrie̩l, kʼe̩naja-wñ e̩ne̩ Aram Je̩ bi ñw u; i no̩ bi Makir, ata Gilead;
Makir la fʼo̩ya ne̩ ñw Hupim kpai Shupim; odu o̩maye-wñ onobule̩ ko̩ Maaka; odu ekeji-wñ ko Ze̩lo̩fe̩had; Ze̩lo̩fe̩had la nʼamo̩ma onobule̩.
Oñ Maaka, o̩ya Makir fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Pire̩sh; odu o̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ la ko̩ Shire̩sh; oñ amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Ulam kpai Reke̩m.
Amo̩ma Ulam la che Bidan. Abo-i chʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-Gilead, o̩ma Makir o̩ma Manasa.
Oñ Kamole̩ke̩t, o̩maye-wñ onobule̩, fʼIshod kpai Abieze̩r kpai Mahela bi.
Oñ amo̩ma She̩maida che Ahaian kpai Shike̩m kpai Likhai kpai Anaiam.
Oñ amo̩ma Ifraim che, Shutila kpai Bire̩d o̩ma-wñ kpai Tehat o̩ma-wñ, kpai E̩lada o̩ma-wñ, kpai Tehat o̩ma-wñ,
kpai Zebad o̩ma-wñ, kpai Shutila o̩ma-wñ, kpai Ize̩r kpai E̩lead e-kʼaboke̩le̩ Gat ku ma bi ane̩ le̩ mʼu du kpa, todabu ku ma gwo̩ru wa ku ma kʼame̩wñ ukpa-ma.
Ifraim, ata-ma, la deku ma kpo̩kpe̩. Tak amo̩maye-wñ lewa ku ma nyʼe̩ e̩do̩.
Tak i letejefu ugbo o̩ya-wñ, oñ i fefu nyo̩, i la fʼo̩me̩ne̩kele̩ bi, oñ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Be̩raya, ukpe̩ kʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa bʼunyi-wñ ma.
O̩ma-wñ onobule̩ la ko̩ Shira kʼi fu Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n o̩gane̩ kpʼe-ate ko̩ kpai Uze̩n-Shira ge̩.
O̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ la ko̩ Rifa kpai Rishef kpai Tila o̩ma-wñ kpai Tehan o̩ma-wñ.
Leadan o̩ma-wñ, Amihud o̩ma-wñ, E̩lishama o̩ma-wñ,
Nun o̩ma-wñ, Jo̩shua o̩ma-wñ.
Ane̩-ma kpʼodo-ma la che Be̩te̩l kpʼadogbe-wñ, Naaran dʼo̩wo̩ olodudu, Geze̩r kpʼadogbe-wñ jʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ; She̩ke̩m ge̩ kpʼadogbe-wñ gbogbo wa Gaza kpʼadogbe-wñ;
Be̩tshean kpai adogbe-wñ, Taanak kpʼadogbe-wñ, Me̩gido kpʼadogbe-wñ, Do̩r kpʼadogbe-wñ, jo̩ alo̩me̩ amo̩ma Manasa. Amo̩ma Jose̩f o̩ma Israe̩l, dodo o̩mo̩.
Amo̩ma Asha che, Imna kpai Ishfa kpai Ishfai kpai Be̩raya kpai Sira o̩maye-ma onobule̩.
Amo̩ma Be̩raya la che, Hibe̩r kpai Malkie̩l kʼi chʼata Birzee̩t.
Hibe̩r la bi Jafle̩t kpai Sho̩me̩r kpai Hotam kpai Shua o̩maye-ma onobule̩.
Amo̩ma Jafle̩t la che, Pesak kpai Bimhal kpai Ashfat. Amo̩ma Jaflet la jo̩ le̩.
Amo̩ma Shome̩r la che, Ehai kpai Ro̩ga, Je̩huba kpai Aram.
Amo̩ma Hele̩m, o̩maye-wñ la che, Zofa kpai Imna kpai Shile̩sh kpai Emal.
Amo̩ma Zofa che, Sua kpai Hame̩fe̩r kpai Shual kpai Birai kpai Imra,
Bize̩r kpai Ho̩d kpai Shama kpai Shil-sha kpai Itran kpai Bira.
Amo̩ma Jite̩r la che, Je̩fune kpai Pispa kpai Era.
Amo̩ma Ula la che, Era kpai Hanie̩l kpai Rizia.

Abo-i chaka chʼamo̩ma Asha, abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef unyi amata-ma ma che. Amagbiti kʼo̩la-ma chefe̩ ma che, ma chʼabo ki tʼo̩gba ef amidachi. Oñ aluka-ma du ku ma lo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma ku ma bʼogu eja jo̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩fa.
Be̩njamin la fʼo̩mo̩gba-wñ Bila bi, Ashbe̩l chʼekeji, Ahara la chʼe̩ke̩ta,
Noha chʼe̩ke̩le̩, Refa la chʼe̩ke̩lu.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Bila la che, Ada kpai Gira kpai Abaihad
kpai Abaishua kpai Neaman kpai Ahoa
kpai Gira kpai She̩fufan kpai Huram.
Abo-i la chʼamo̩ma Ihud, abo-i chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata-ma ef abo ku ma dodo Giba, oñ ma mʼuma ño̩ nyi Manahat;
kpai Neaman kpai Ahaija kpai Gira; i mʼuma ño̩ le; oñ i fu Uza kpai Ahaihud bi.
Shehereim la fʼamo̩ma bi ane̩ Moab abu kʼi fʼamo̩ya-wñ Hushim kpai Beara ne.
Taku Hode̩sh o̩ya-wñ fu Jobab kpai Zaibia kpai Misha kpai Malkam,
kpai Jeuz kpat Shokia kpai Mirma bi ñw u; abo-i chʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata ma che.
Oñ Hushim fʼAbaitub kpai E̩lpeal bi ñw u.
Amo̩ma E̩lpeal la che, Ibe̩r kpai Maisham, kpai Sheme̩d kʼi fʼOno ko̩ kpai Lod manyʼadogbe ado̩gbe-wñ;
kpai Be̩raya kpai Shema ku ma chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata abo ku ma dodo Aijalo̩n, ku ma fʼabo ku ma dodo Gat ne.
Kpai Ahayo, Sheshak, kpai Je̩re̩mo̩t
Ze̩badaya kpai Arad kpai Ede̩r,
kpai Maike̩l kpai Ispa kpai Joha chʼamo̩ma Be̩raya.
Kpai Ze̩badaya kpai Me̩shulam kpai He̩zikai kpai Uibe̩r.
Ishme̩rai ge̩ kpai Je̩slaya kpai Jobab la chʼamo̩ma E̩lpeal.
Jekim kpai Zikrai kpai Zabdi
kpai E̩lienai kpai Ziltai kpai Ilaie̩l
kpai Adaya kpai Be̩raya kpai Shimrat la chʼamo̩ma Shimeai.
Ishpan kpai Ibe̩r kpat Ilaie̩l
kpai Abdo̩n kpai Zikrai kpai He̩no̩n
kpai Hananaya kpai Elam kpai Anatotija
kpai Ife̩deya kpai Pe̩nue̩l la chʼamo̩ma Sheshak.
Shamsherai kpai Shiharaya kpai Atalaya
kpai Jaare̩shaya kpai Ilaija kpai Zikrai chʼamo̩ma Je̩roham.
Abo-i chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata-ma alu kʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma de̩. Abo ki tʼoji ma che. Abo-i dodo Je̩rusale̩m.
Ata Gibeo̩n dodo Gibeo̩n; odu o̩ya-wñ la ko̩ Maaka.
Amo̩ma-wñ la de̩, o̩mo̩gba-wñ la che Abdo̩n kpai Zur kpai Kish kpai Beal kpai Nedab
kpai Gedo̩r kpai Ahayo kpai Zeke̩r.
Miklot la bi Shime̩ya. Abo-i du la dodo manyʼamo̩maye-ma Je̩rusale̩m ma le̩.
Ne̩r la bi Kish; Kish la bi So̩l; So̩l la bi Jonatan kpai Malkishua kpai Abinadab kpai E̩sh-beal.
O̩ma Jonatan la che Me̩ri-beal, Me̩ri-beal la bi Maika.
Oñ amo̩ma Maika che Paito̩n kpai Mile̩k kpai Tere̩a kpai Ehaz.
Ehaz la bi Je̩hoada; Je̩hoada la bi Ale̩me̩t; kpai Azmefe̩t kpai Zimrai; Zimrai la bi Moza.
Mo̩za la bi Baine̩a; Refa chʼo̩ma-wñ, E̩liasa chʼo̩ma e-wñ, Eze̩l chʼo̩ma-wñ.
Eze̩l la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ me̩fa, abʼodu-ma ko̩ de̩: Azraikam, Bo̩ke̩ru kpai Ishmae̩l kpai She̩a-raya kpai Obadaya kpai Henan. Abo-i chaka chʼamo̩ma Eze̩l.
Amo̩ma Ishe̩k, o̩maye-wñ la che Ulam chʼo̩mo̩gba-wñ, Jihush chʼekeji, E̩laife̩le̩t la chʼe̩ke̩ta-ma.
Oñ amo̩ma Ulam chʼamagbiti ku ma nʼuwohi, ma chʼamato̩fa; ma la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ wewe, kpai amaaju e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ oli me̩ta. Abo-i chaka chʼe-amo̩ma Be̩njamin e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼabo Israe̩l du ko̩ nyʼo̩takada o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu; e̩ la go, ma che̩ko̩ nyʼibuku amonu Israe̩l; ma la mu Juda ño̩ nyi Babilo̩n todu ada ku ma je̩.
Oñ abo ku ma dabi dodo ewo ewo-ma chʼabo Israe̩l kpʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai kpai abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩.
Amo̩ma Juda kpʼamo̩ma Be̩njamin kpʼamo̩ma Ifraim kpai Ma-nasa ku ma gugu Je̩rusale̩m che
Utai o̩ma Amihud, o̩ma O̩mri, o̩ma Imrai, o̩ma Benai ef amo̩ma Pe̩re̩z, o̩ma Juda le̩.
E-abo Shailo̩n la che Asaya kʼi chʼo̩mo̩gba kpʼamo̩ma-wñ.
Amo̩ma Ze̩ra ku ma jʼef uma la che Jeue̩l, kpʼamo̩maye-ma, ulo̩gwa nyʼe̩le̩gwa.
Amo̩ma Be̩njamin ku ma jʼef uma la che Salu o̩ma Me̩shulam, o̩ma Ho̩dafaya, o̩ma Hase̩nua
kpai lbneaya, o̩ma Je̩roham kpʼEla o̩ma Uzai, o̩ma Mikrai kpai Me̩shulam o̩ma She̩fe̩taya o̩ma Reue̩l, o̩ma Ibna-ija;
kpʼamo̩maye-ma alu kʼo̩gba o̩gba-ma de̩, aluka one̩-wñ che icham nyʼoli me̩ta nyoke me̩fa. Abo-i chaka chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata-ma ef unyi amata-ma.
Abo ku ma dʼef amatama la che Je̩daya kpai Je̩ho̩yarib kpai Jekin,
kpʼAzaraya o̩ma Hilkaya, o̩ma Me̩shulam, o̩ma Zedo̩k o̩ma Me̩rayo̩t o̩ma Ahaitub kʼi chʼe̩nuto̩gba unyi o̩jo̩;
kpai Adaya o̩ma Je̩roham, o̩ma Pashur, o̩ma Malkija, kpai Maase̩e o̩ma Adie̩l, o̩ma Jaze̩ra, o̩ma Me̩shulam, o̩ma Me̩shile̩mit, o̩ma Ime̩r;
kpʼamo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef unyi unyi amata-ma, icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ meji chʼicham; ma chʼo̩je̩bi one̩ tod uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ef unyi O̩jo̩.
E-abo Lifai la che, She̩maya o̩ma Hashub, o̩ma Azraikam, o̩ma Hasha-baya, ef amo̩ma Me̩rari;
kpai Bakbakkar, Hire̩sh kpai Gelal kpai Matanaya o̩ma Maika, o̩ma Zikrai o̩ma Esaf,
kpai Obadaya o̩ma She̩maya, o̩ma Galal, o̩ma Je̩dutun kpai Be̩re̩kaya o̩ma Esa, o̩ma E̩lkana ku ma dodo adogbe adogbe abo Ne̩to̩fatai.
Abo ku ma de alo̩na che, Shalum kpai Akub, kpai Talmo̩n kpai Ahaiman kpʼamo̩maye-ma; Shalum chʼagboji.
Ama te̩tajo̩ alaku onu o̩wo̩ olodudu akwoubi; ama chʼama-dalo̩na ef uru amo̩ma Lifai.

Oñ Shalum o̩ma Ko̩re̩, o̩ma Ibaisaf, o̩ma Ko̩ra kpʼamo̩maye-wñ ef abo unyi ata-wñ. Abo Ko̩ra le̩ la nʼo̩da uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ñw O̩jo̩ ku ma dide o̩na o̩na unyabo; alu kʼamata-ma te̩te̩nʼo̩da uru Jihofa ku ma de alo̩na-wñ.
Oñ Fine̩has o̩ma E̩leaza chʼe̩nuto̩gba-ma akwoubi, Jihofa la dʼugbo-wñ.
Ze̩karaya o̩ma Me̩she̩le̩maya chʼe̩ne̩ ki ade o̩na unyabo ujeju.

Aluka abo-i chaka ku ma chi ku ma dide alo̩na alo̩na che o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyoke me̩gwe-ji. Ma fʼabo le̩ lo likpa o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu ef adogbe adogbe-ma owñ chʼabo ku Defid kpai Samiue̩l, agane̩ le̩, ko jo̩ ugugu abo ku ma chubi one̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ama kpʼamo̩ma-ma nʼedejutʼalaku alaku unyi Jihofa, owñ chʼunyi unyabo kʼama ki dide o̩mo̩,
Ama-de alo̩na alo̩na jo̩ o̩wo̩ afu me̩le̩, o̩wo̩ olodudu kpʼo̩wo̩ olane̩, kpʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, kpʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩.
Oñ i dukpe̩ kʼamo̩maye-ma ku ma jo̩ adogbe adogbe-ma, ki wa o̩jo̩ mebie o̩jo̩ mebie ikoʼka ikoʼka ku ma jʼugbo ma:
todu amade alo̩na me̩le̩ ki tʼo̩gba ku ma chʼabo Lifai, ugugu-ma chʼugugu abo ku ma ke̩do̩no ma, ama la nʼo̩da unyi kekele unyi kekele kpʼe̩wñ akokokijʼef unyi O̩jo̩.
Todu ama le̩ ruru jo̩ lʼunyi O̩jo̩ daka, todabu kʼama nʼudu e̩wñ le̩ ede, ama nʼo̩na-wñ ebi odudu o̩jo̩ du.
Oñ abo-ma iche̩ka nʼedejute̩ e̩wñ eku ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ unyi O̩jo̩ le̩. Todu ekaluka ma kʼe̩wñ le̩ aluka taku ma kowa ejefu, oñ ma ño̩ kaluka taku ma ko dufu.
Abo-ma iche̩ka ño̩ nʼo̩da ane̩ efu-wñ; kpʼe̩wñ eku kiafo̩ le̩ chaka, kpʼomu-wñ te̩ke̩ te̩ke̩ kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ kpʼekpo-wñ, kpai frankinse̩ns-wñ, kpʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩.
Oñ amo̩ma amatama iche̩ka añwʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩ che ki ñwo̩.
Oñ ma ke̩do̩no Matitaiya, e̩ne̩ Lifaiʼka kʼi chʼo̩mo̩gba Shalum e̩ne̩ Ko̩ra, kʼi dejutʼe̩wñ ku ma de̩ ef anade.
Oñ amo̩maye-ma iche̩ka, ku ma jʼef amo̩ma Kohat nʼo̩da akala ku ma te̩jo̩ ku ma che o̩jo̩ uñmi du.
Amakeli la jo̩-i: ma chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata abo Lifai, ku ma jʼef unyi kekele unyi kekele le̩, ku ma ma nʼe̩wñ omune̩ ache n; todu ma jʼef uko̩lo̩-ma o̩ro̩ka kpʼodu.
Abo-i chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata ef abo Lifai ef akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi-ma ku ma chʼabo ki tʼo̩gba. Abo-i la gugu Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ Jeie̩l, ata Gibeo̩n, gugu Gibeo̩n, odu o̩ya-wñ ko̩ Maaka:
Abdo̩n la chʼo̩mo̩gba-wñ, tak i bi Zur kpai Kish kpai Beal kpai Ne̩r kpai Nedab
kpai Gedor kpai Ahayo kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Miklot.
Miklot la bi She̩me̩am. Ama laño̩ dodo kpenyʼamo̩maye-ma Je̩rusale̩m kpʼamo̩maye-ma.
Ne̩r la bi Kish; Kish la bi So̩l; So̩l la bi Jonatan kpai Malkishua kpai Abinadab kpai E̩sh-beal.
O̩ma Jonatan la che Me̩ribeal; Me̩ribeal la bi Maika
Amo̩ma Maika la che Paito̩n kpai Mile̩k kpai Tarea kpai Ehaz.
Oñ Ehaz bi Jara: Jara la bi Ale̩me̩t, kpʼAzmefe̩t, kpai Zimrai; Zimrai la bi Moza;
Moza la bi Baine̩a; kpai Re̩faya o̩ma-wñ; E̩liaza o̩ma-wñ, Eze̩l o̩ma-wñ.
Eze̩l la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ me̩fa kʼodu-ma ko̩, Azraikam kpai Boke̩ru kpai Ishmae̩l kpai Shiaraya kpai Obadaya kpai Henan; abo-i chʼamo̩ma Eze̩l.
Oñ abo Filistia kogu bʼabo Israe̩l; tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ra rʼo̩gba abo Filistia, oñ ma kpa ma jʼane̩ o̩lʼuwo Gilboa.
Abo Filistia tu So̩l kpʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ubi unauna; oñ abo Filistia fu Jo̩natan kpʼAbinadab kpai Malkishua amo̩ma So̩l le̩ gwo.
Ogu le̩ la nu So̩l oji te̩, oñ abo ku ma nʼo̩o̩do̩ ranʼo fʼu mu; oñ abo ku ma nʼo̩o̩do̩ le̩ fʼu chagbe̩.

Taku So̩l ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki anʼane̩ ogu-wñ kakini, Mʼugbada-we̩ wo̩, kʼe̩ dʼu gwunyʼumi, tode̩gba kʼabo e̩pi odukulu-i lewa agwʼumi uke̩. Ama e̩ne̩ ki nʼane̩ o̩gu-wñ le̩ ko̩; todu i chokpo nana. Todule̩ So̩l mʼugbada-wñ du oñ i le̩ane̩ abʼoma.
Tak e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ ki anʼane̩ ogu-wñ li ka ku So̩l leku, owñ le̩ ño̩ lewane̩ abʼugbada-wñ ma, tak i leku.
Abe̩le̩ So̩l leku oñ amo̩ma-wñ me̩ta kpʼabo unyi-wñ chaka leku e̩re̩ʼkate.
Tak e̩gba kʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l du ku ma jʼef o̩go̩ le̩ li ka ku ma ra, ku ma ño̩ li ka ku So̩l kpʼamo̩ma-wñ leku, ma hi ewo ewo-ma tinyo̩, oñ ma ra ge̩. Tak abo Filistia lewa gugu o̩mo̩.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩jo̩ñwa-wñ e̩gba kʼabo Filistia wa ku ma ñʼane̩ bʼo̩la abo ki ku le̩ te̩, ma fu So̩l kpʼamo̩ma-wñ li abu ku ma wane̩ jʼoj uwo Gilboa le̩.
Taku ma mʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ gwo̩, oñ ma mʼoji-wñ kpʼane̩ ogu-wñ ko, taku ma fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo du oj ane̩ Filistia, ku ma mʼinabali le̩ du ñw ode ode-ma kpʼabo-ma.
Taku ma mʼane̩ ogu-wñ ko̩ jʼef unyi o̩jo̩-ma, oñ ma dʼoji-wñ lo̩ko̩li ef unyi Dago̩n.
Oñ e̩gba kʼabo Jebe̩sh-gilead gbʼinabali e̩wñ du kʼabo Filistia che So̩l le̩,
aboke̩le̩ du ku ma nʼe̩do̩ kwane̩ ma la mʼoku So̩l kpʼe-amo̩ma-wñ ko, oñ ma mʼu ko wa Jebe̩sh, taku ma kʼachi-ku-ma ji of oli tamarisk Jebe̩sh, oñ ma fʼalu ji gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie.
Abe̩le̩ So̩l leku tod e̩re̩ ubi ki ro̩ ñwu Jihofa, tod o̩la Jihofa kʼi ma de n; kpai ukpe̩ kʼi tene ohi o̩la ugbo abifa
kʼi ma la tene ugbo Jihofa n; todule̩ i mʼu du kpa, oñ i mʼo̩da ojane̩ le̩ rida du ñwu Defid, o̩ma Je̩si.
Tak abo Israe̩l chaka kʼo̩la-ma wʼugbo Defid He̩bro̩n, ma kakini, Go, awa kpʼuwe̩ chʼachiku kpʼo̩re̩laʼka.

Igbele i chaka chʼe̩gba ki So̩l chʼonu le̩, uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ko̩ Israe̩l dufu, uwe̩ laño̩ ko ma dabi wa. Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, la ka ñw e̩ kakini, Uwe̩ achʼadejute̩ amone̩-mi, Israe̩l; uwe̩ la achʼe̩nuto̩gba abo-mi, Israe̩l.
Abe̩le̩ abogijo Israe̩l chaka lewa He̩bro̩n ugbo onu Taku Defid fʼalo che kpʼama He̩bro̩n eju Jihofa; oñ ma fʼekpo ba tu Defid oji kʼi jʼonu Israe̩l, alu ku Jihofa ka lʼalu Sumiue̩l le̩.
Taku Defid kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka nyi Je̩rusale̩m (owñ che Je̩bius); ugbo kʼabo Je̩bius ku ma dodo ane̩ le̩ la jo̩.
Tak abo ku ma dodo Je̩bius ka ñwu Defid kakini, Uwe̩ ñʼagudu wʼejefu emi n. I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ Defid fʼaku Zayo̩n le̩ du; oñ e-le̩ gbage̩de̩ mud ewo Defid.
Taku Defid kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki fʼabo Je̩bius gwoda ejodudu, e̩ne̩ le̩ la achʼoji kpʼonu ogu. Oñ Joab, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, mute̩gu le ejodudu; abe̩le̩ ma mʼowñ du chʼoji.
Taku Defid kwododo ef aku le̩; todule̩ oñ ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Ewo Defidi.
Oñ i fʼewo le̩ ne daka, akwo Milo gbogbo le daka; Joab la fʼugbo ki bo̩ ewo le̩ ñwo̩che.
Defid la nanana nyo̩gba waa; todu ku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du dʼugbo-wñ.
Abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef ame̩nugbiti ki Defid ne̩ la jo̩-i, owñ chʼabo ku ma manyʼu o̩la kpaka ojane̩-wñ le̩, manyʼabo Israe̩l chaka, ku ma dʼowñ jʼonu teju o̩la Israe̩l ku Jihofa ka.
Aluka amagbiti ku Defid ne̩ le̩ de̩: Jesho̩be̩am, e̩ne̩ Hakmo̩n oka, chʼoji abo ogue̩gwa le̩; owñ le̩ dʼo̩kwo̩-wñ kwane̩ akobʼone̩ oli me̩fa, oñ i ko ma kpa e̩re̩ kate.
E̩leaza, o̩ma Dodo, e̩ne̩ Ahoʼka ro̩nʼo̩, i dʼef amagbiti me̩ta le̩.
Owñ dʼugbo Defid Pas-damim, ugbo kʼabo Filistia kʼo̩la-ma wa jo̩ ku ma jogu ugbo kʼe̩bu ane̩ kʼo̩ka barli chʼe̩kʼef uwñ de̩; amone̩ le̩ la ra rʼo̩gba abo Filistia.
Tak ama dago jʼalumeji e̩bu ane̩ le̩, ma la mʼu gba te̩, oñ ma fʼabo Filistia gwoda; Jihofa la nʼujadu lile gba ma.
Tak one̩ me̩ta kwʼefabo ogue̩gwa ku ma dʼoji dufu le̩ gwo̩ru nyʼugbo Defid, ugbo okuta ef owo Adulam; abogu Filistia la ruru jo̩ ef o̩go̩ Re̩feim.
Defid la dʼef aku e̩gba le̩, oñ abide abo Filistia jo Be̩tle̩he̩m iko le̩.
Defid ñeju kakini, O, i ma nʼe̩ne̩ ki adʼomi obuga ki me̩ru alaku Be̩tle̩he̩m le̩ ñwu mi ñmo̩!
Tak abo me̩ta le̩ gwo̩ko̩ gu alumeji uru abo Filistia du, oñ ma fʼomiofo kpa kwef obuga kʼi dʼalaku Be̩tle̩he̩m le̩, taku ma ma mʼu du wa ñwu Defid; Defid muda ko̩ eñmʼo̩, i la du dajane̩ ñwu Jihofa.
Oñ i kakini, O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na, kʼomi kʼu chʼe-i: omi añmo̩ e̩bie̩ abo ku ma mʼoji e-ma du tinyo̩-i? Todu oji-ma ma du tinyo̩ oñ ma ne̩ wa-i. Todule̩ i ko̩ eñmʼo̩. E̩wñ kʼamagbiti me̩ta le̩ che de̩.
Oñ Abishai, o̩maye Joab, chʼoji abo me̩ta; i dʼo̩kwo̩-wñ kwane̩ akobʼone̩ oli me̩fa oñ i fʼuma gwo dajane̩, i la fʼodu ne̩ ef ama me̩ta le̩.
Ef amame̩ta le̩ owñ nʼojima tʼabo meji ki bo̩ le, i laño̩ chʼagboji; o̩wo̩-wñ muda tʼo̩wo̩ abo me̩ta ejodudu le̩ le n.
Be̩naya o̩ma Jiho̩yada, o̩ma e̩nuwohiʼka kʼi de̩ Kabzee̩l, kʼi la fʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu wewe che; owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki fʼamidu e-Moab meji kpa; i la gwo̩ru nyʼef uraʼka iko ku sno dʼane̩ oñ i fʼidu kpa o̩mo̩.

I ño̩ fʼe̩ne̩ Ijipti kpa, e̩ne̩ le̩ gba tabale, ohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩; o̩kwo̩ ki dabu ugbolo oli kʼahiukpo ane̩ fʼukpo wenyʼu dʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ Ijipti le̩; oñ i nʼo̩kpa agwo̩ru nyʼugbo-wñ, i la bʼe̩ne̩ Ijipti le̩ gbʼo̩kwo̩-wñ, oñ i nʼo̩kwo̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩ fʼu kpa.
Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada, fʼe̩wñ le̩ che, oñ i nʼodu ef amagbiti me̩ta le̩.
Go, i nʼojima tʼabo ogue̩gwa le̩ le, o̩wo̩-wñ muda tu o̩wo̩ abo me̩ta le̩ n. Oñ Defid mʼowñ du chʼagboji abo ide-wñ.
Amagbiti abogu jo̩-i, Asahe̩l, o̩maye Joab; E̩lhenan o̩ma Dodo e-Be̩tle̩he̩m;
Shamot, e̩ne̩ Haroar; Hile̩z e̩ne̩ Pilo̩n;
Aira o̩ma Ike̩sh, e̩ne̩ Te̩koa; Abieze̩r, e̩ne̩ Anato̩t,
Sibe̩kai, e̩ne̩ Husha; Aile̩yai e̩ne̩ Ahoa;
Maharai, e̩ne̩ Ne̩tofa; Hile̩d o̩ma Beana, e̩ne̩ Ne̩tofa;
Aiteyei o̩ma Raibeai e-Gibea, e-amo̩ma Be̩njamin, Be̩naya, e̩ne̩ Paire̩to̩n;
Hureai, ki kwʼo̩la aji aji Geash; Abaie̩l, e̩ne̩ Arba le̩;
Azmefe̩t, e̩ne̩ Beharum; Ilayaba, e̩ne̩ Shealbo;
amo̩ma Hasham e̩ne̩ Gizo̩n; Jo̩natan, o̩ma Shagi, e̩ne̩ Harar;
Ahayam, o̩ma Sekar, e̩ne̩ Harar; Ilaifo̩l o̩ma Ur,
Hefe̩r, e̩ne̩ Me̩kiro̩t; Ahija, e̩ne̩ Pilo̩n;
He̩zro̩, e̩ne̩ Karme̩l; Nearai o̩ma E̩zbai;
Joe̩l o̩maye Netan; Mibhar o̩ma Hagirai,
Zile̩k, e̩ne̩ Amo̩n; Neharai, e̩ne̩ Birot, kʼi anʼane̩ ogu Joab o̩ma Ze̩ruaya le̩;
Aira, e̩ne̩ Itrai, Gare̩b, e̩ne̩ Itrai;
Uraya, e̩ne̩ He̩t; Zebad o̩ma Aleai;
Adina o̩ma Shiza, e̩ne̩ Rube̩n kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼoji dufu ef abo Rube̩n kpʼone̩ ogue̩gwa manyʼuwñ;
Henan o̩ma Maaka kpai Joshafat, e̩ne̩ Mitnai;
Uzaya, e̩ne̩ Ashtirat; Shema kpai Jehaye̩l, amo̩ma Hotam, e̩ne̩ Aroe̩r le̩,
Je̩diee̩l o̩ma Shimrai kpai Joha o̩maye-wñ, e̩ne̩ Taiza le̩,
Ilaie̩l, e̩ne̩ Mahefa kpai Je̩re̩beai kpai Jo̩shafaya, amo̩ma E̩lneam kpai Itma, e̩ne̩ Moab,
Ilaie̩l kpai Obe̩d kpai Jasie̩l, e̩ne̩ Me̩zo̩be.
Oñ abo-i chʼabo ku ma wʼugbo Defid, Ziklag, abu kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ dahi tʼo̩mo̩ todu So̩l, o̩ma Kish; ma la jʼef amagbiti-wñ, ku ma gbutu-wñ ef ogu le̩.
Amato̩fa ma che, ma la neke nʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ kpʼawohi gwʼunata, kpʼo̩fa eta kpo̩fo̩. Ma chʼabo Be̩njamin, amefu So̩l.
Oji-ma chʼAhieze̩r, tak i che Joash, ma chʼamo̩ma She̩maa, e̩ne̩ Gibea, kpai Jizie̩l kpai Pile̩t amo̩ma Azmefe̩t, kpai Be̩reka kpai Jihiu, e̩ne̩ Anato̩t,
kpai Ismaya, e̩ne̩ Gibe̩o̩n, kʼi chʼagbiti ef abo o̩gue̩gwa le̩, kʼa bo ogue̩gwa le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ, kpai Je̩re̩-maya kpai Jahezie̩l kpai Johanan, kpai Jo̩zabad, e̩ne̩ Ge̩dira;
Iluzai kpai Je̩nmot kpai Bialaya kpai She̩maraya, kpai Sbe̩fataiya, e̩ne̩ Haruf,
E̩lkana kpai Je̩saya kpai Azarie̩l kpai Joize̩r kpai Jo̩sho̩be̩am, abo Ko̩ra,
kpai Joila kpai Ze̩badaya, amo̩ma Je̩roham e-Gedo̩r.

Oñ abo Gad ku ma fʼo̩la-ma date̩ ñwu Defid ef akpolokuta ef aje̩tachi le̩ do̩mo̩, amagbiti ki nʼuwohi ma che, ma chʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma ko̩che̩ ogu, ku ma meju ikpako kpʼo̩kwo̩ ene̩ jogu; eju-ma la dab eju idu, ma le̩ dab amate̩ ku ma jʼoj uwo.
Ize̩r chʼe̩ne̩ ejodudu, Obadaya chʼekeji, E̩liab chʼe̩ke̩ta,
Mishmana chʼe̩ke̩le̩, Je̩re̩maya chʼe̩ke̩lu,
Ateai chʼe̩ke̩fa, Ilaie̩l chʼe̩kebie,
Johanan chʼe̩ke̩jo̩, E̩lzebad chʼe̩ke̩la,
Je̩re̩maya chʼe̩ke̩gwa, Makbanai chʼe̩ke̩gwaka.
Amo̩ma Gad-i chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef abogu; e̩ne̩ ki nya efu ma bʼone̩ ogume̩lu jo̩, oñ e̩ne̩ ki tule bʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ jo̩.
Abo le̩ chʼabo ku ma mu Jo̩rdan daba ochu ejodudu, e̩gba ki awobi lʼoj o̩gba-wñ; oñ ma fʼabo du ku ma jʼo̩go̩ o̩go̩ le̩ nʼule̩, rʼo̩wo̩ olodudu kpai rʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ ge̩.
Amo̩ma Be̩njamin kpai Juda iche̩ka la wʼugbo akpolokuta le̩ ugbo Defid.

Taku Defid dufu aledo ma, oñ i dohi ñwu ma kakini, Iche̩wñ ku me̩ nʼure̩do̩ wa ku me̩ te̩ko mi-i, mak e̩do̩-mi amanyu me̩; i muda chʼewa me̩ wa ku me̩ mʼumi du tʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩no̩la-mi abu kʼu ma nʼe̩wñ afuma du kʼomi nʼo̩wo̩-mi che n, O̩jo̩ e-amata-wa ki li, kʼi fʼuka nurʼume̩.
Tak Afu lewa bʼo̩la Amesai kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ ki d oji dufu ef amagboji abo ogu le̩ ma, i kakini,

Abo Manasa iche̩ka ño̩ chi o̩la-ma wʼugbo Defid, e̩gba kʼowñ kpʼabo Filistia kpe̩re̩ wa akogu bi So̩l le̩; ma muda gbutu ñwu ma n; todu abu kʼamodu abo Filistia fʼojuju o̩la le̩ nyi, ma je̩ ñwu Defid mudabi, ma kakini, I anʼoji-wa ñwa chʼef o̩wo̩ odu-wñ So̩l.

Abu kʼi dʼejo̩na alo tu Ziklag, abo Manasa ku ma ñwa chʼef o̩wo̩-wñ chʼAdna kpai Jo̩zabad kpai Je̩dieye̩l kpai Maike̩l kpai Jo̩zabad kpai E̩laihiu kpai Ziltai, amagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e-abo Manasa.
Oñ ma gbutu ñwu Defid ugbo amaja-kpa e̩wñ, todu o̩chaka-ma chʼamagbiti ku ma de̩ kpaka, ma la chʼamagboji agboji ef abogu le̩.
Amone̩ nawa bo̩ Defid o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa ku ma te̩kʼo, gbogbo taku ma mud uru lile, dabe̩ne̩ kʼuru e-O̩jo̩.
Aluka oji one̩ ku ma mʼo̩logu wʼugbo Defid He̩bro̩n, ku ma mʼojane̩ So̩l gba ñw u, alu kʼo̩la Jihofa ka, de̩.
Abo Juda ku ma ne̩ ugbe̩yo̩ kpai o̩kwo̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩fa nyʼicham oka oji.
Abo Simeo̩n chʼamagbiti ku ma nʼuwohi icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo mebie, nyʼogume̩lu oji.
Abo Lifai chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ nyʼulo̩gwa.
Je̩ho̩yada la chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo Aro̩n, oñ one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩ta nyʼogume̩lu chʼicham oji jugbo-wñ.
Kpai Zado̩k kʼi chʼokolobia kʼi chʼagbiti kʼi nʼuwohi manyʼamagboji abogu ogu nyoke meji kwʼunyi ata-wñ.
Abo Be̩nja-min, efu So̩l le̩, chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩ta todu ojile-ma te̩tatʼabo unyi So̩l ubi akwoubi.
Abo Ifraim chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogu nyʼicham oka oji, amagbiti ku ma nʼuwohi, ku ma chʼame̩n uwohi ef unyi amata-ma.
Abo ku ma kwʼef ukpe̩reji abo o̩lo̩pu Manasa le̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩gwe̩jo, ku ma chi ma odu odu ku ma ko, ku ma wa du Defid jʼonu.
Abo Isakar ku ma ma iko iko-wñ ku ma ma alu ki dukpe̩ kʼabo Israe̩l ache, abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef uma chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩; amo̩maye-ma du agbʼo̩la-ma gbo̩.
Abo Ze̩biulo̩n ku ma dufu ef abogu kʼo̩la-ma che̩mu jo̩ ñw ogu kʼido̩na ogu ojoji du jʼef o̩wo̩-ma chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ooje. E̩do̩-ma la chʼokate abu ma tala jo̩.
Abo Naftali chʼamagboji icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, oñ abo ku ma nʼugbe̩yo̩ kpai o̩kwo̩ manyʼuma o̩la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogue̩gwa nyoke mebie.
Abo Dan kʼo̩la-ma che̩mu ogu chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogu nyoke me̩jo̩ nyʼulo̩gwa.
Abo Ashe̩r ku ma chʼo̩ka ogu eja ku ma tala jo̩ ef abogu chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ meji.
Abo Rube̩n kpai abo Gad kpai ukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu abo Manasa kʼo̩la-ma che̩mu ñw ogu ku ma kwʼudaba Jo̩rdan wa chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩fa.
Abogu-i chaka ku ma tala jo̩ udala udala, e̩do̩-ma chʼofoo oñ ma lewa He̩bro̩n ku ma du Defid jʼonu abo Israe̩l chaka; abe̩le̩ e̩do̩ abo Israe̩l du ki bo̩ ño̩ chʼokate ku ma du Defid jʼonu ge̩.
Ma jʼugbo Defid o̩mo̩ aje̩ añmo̩ gbogbo o̩jo̩ me̩ta, todu amo̩maye-ma fʼo̩la mu tane̩ todu ma.

Abo ku ma me̩ru ma o̩mo̩ gbogbo nyʼIsakar kpai Ze̩biulo̩n kpai Naftali kʼuje̩wñ nʼubi amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ kpai aminyakulumi kpai amimiulu kpai amokuno̩ wa; omu e̩wñ e̩yo̩ kpai e̩ro o̩gbaikolo ki gbe̩ mʼomune̩ kpai acha acha achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩gbe̩ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma, kpai amokuno̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini tabale, todu uyo̩ de̩ Israe̩l me̩.
Taku Defid nyojuju kpai amagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpʼone̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu, owñ chʼe̩nuto̩gba okoke du.

Oñ Defid ka ñw ujeju Israe̩l chaka kakini, Iche̩wñ ki chenyo̩ eju e-me̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa la chʼe̩te̩-wñ, a ki fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo du ugbo amo̩maye-wa, ugbo du ku ma bo̩ ojane̩ Israe̩l, kpʼugbo amatama kpʼabo Lifai ku ma jʼewo ewo-ma ku ma nʼane̩, ije̩-ma manyʼuma, kʼama ki kʼo̩la-ma jeju wʼugbo wa;
kʼa ki mʼakpati alo O̩jo̩-wa du dabi wʼugbo wa; todu a nyʼugbo-wñ atene iko e-So̩l in.
Tak abujeju le̩ chaka ka kʼama ache abe̩le̩; todu e̩wñ le̩ tʼo̩kpakpa eju amone̩ le̩ du.
Abe̩le̩ Defid mʼabo Israe̩l chaka ko wa jeju ugbo kate, akwo Shiho̩r, aji Ijipti le̩, gbogbo wʼej o̩na ugbo ku ma gudu nyi Hamat, ku ma dʼakpati alo O̩jo̩ akwo Kiriat-jearim wa.
Taku Defid kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka mute̩gu nyi Be̩ala, owñ che Kiriat-jearim e-abo Juda, ku ma dʼakpati alo O̩jo̩ Jihofa kʼede-wñ dʼate̩ ñw amiche̩rub ku ma dʼodu-wñ tʼo̩mo̩.
Taku ma ne̩ akpati O̩jo̩ oj o̩kane̩ etito̩, ma mʼu du kwef unyi Abinadab: Uza kpai Ahayo ño̩ o̩kane̩ le̩ o̩na.
Oñ Defid kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka chiya alu du kʼukpahiu-ma de̩ o̩gba Jihofa, ma nʼeli ako̩ kpʼokugulu kpʼumolo anu, kpai ubo̩ kpai eicha kpai oke kpai o̩kakachi.
Tak e̩gba ku ma lewa ajita ugwo̩-ka e-Kido̩n, Uza fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala ki gwo̩nyʼakpati le̩; todu amokuno̩ (ku ma afʼo̩kane̩ le̩) fʼe̩re̩ ko̩ e̩wñ.
Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo abʼUza ma, oñ i fʼu gwo nʼane̩, todabu kʼi fʼo̩wo̩ nadala akado akpati le̩; i la leku eju O̩jo̩ o̩mo̩.
Tak e-le̩ bi Defid eju, todabu ku Jihofa gwo̩ko̩ abʼUza ma: oñ i dʼodu ugbo le̩ ko̩ Pe̩re̩z-uza, gbogbo tʼeñini.
Defid la chokpo O̩jo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, i kakini, Ab u nale kʼu nadʼakpati O̩jo̩ wʼunyi ñw o̩la-mi?
Abe̩le̩ Defid ma ño̩ dʼakpati le̩ wʼugbo-wñ ef ewo Defid in, chai edu i dʼu a-tʼiba tef unyi Obe̩d-ido̩m, e̩ne̩ Gat.
Akpati O̩jo̩ le̩ la gugu ef unyi Obe̩d-ido̩m ugbo abo-wñ ochu me̩ta; oñ Jihofa de̩nyo̩ ñw unyi Obe̩d-ido̩m, kpʼe̩wñ du kʼi ne̩.
Taku Hairam, onu Taya, fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ ru Defid, kpai igbo oli sida kpʼamano̩do̩, kpʼamikapita ku ma fʼunyi ko̩ ñw u.
Oñ Defid li ka ku Jihofa fʼowñ e̩re̩ lonyane̩ kʼi chʼonu Israe̩l; todu o̩da ojane̩-wñ tʼate̩ ololo tod abo-wñ Israe̩l.
Oñ Defid ño̩ fʼamo̩ya omune̩ ne̩ Je̩rusale̩m, Defid laño̩ fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ bi ge̩.
Abu kʼodu odu amo̩ma-wñ ki ne̩ Je̩rusale̩m ko̩ de̩: Shamua kpai Shobab, Netan kpai So̩lo̩mo̩n
kpʼIbhar kpai Ilaishua kpai E̩lpale̩t,
kpai Noga kpai Ne̩fe̩g kpai Jafaya
kpai E̩lishama kpai Bilayade kpai Ilife̩le̩t.
Oñ abo Filistia gbo̩ ka ku ma fʼekpo ba tu Defid oji kʼi mud onu abo Israe̩l chaka; tak abo Filistia chaka mute̩gu wa ku ma te̩jane̩ Defid. Defid la gbʼinabali-ma oñ i dufu nyʼakʼogu bʼuma.
Oñ abo Filistia lewa tala jo̩ ef o̩go̩ Re̩feim
Taku Defid tʼO̩jo̩ ene kakini, Omi ate̩gu nyʼakʼogu bʼabo Filistia? Uwe̩ akʼuma nyʼumi o̩wo̩? Taku Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Te̩gu alo̩, kʼu nako ma nyʼef o̩wo̩-we̩.

Abe̩le̩ ma mute̩gu wa Beal-pe̩razim oñ Defid fʼuma gwoda o̩mo̩; taku Defid kakini, O̩jo̩ nʼo̩wo̩ e-mi fʼame̩ne̩bi-mi guche̩ me̩, alu kʼomi ako ugbo du le̩. Todule̩ oñ ma dʼodu ugbo kide̩ ko̩ Beal-pe̩razim.
Oñ ma hi amo̩jo̩-ma tinyo̩ jʼo̩mo̩, taku Defid ñwa ñwu ma, oñ ma nʼuna gʼuma jo rinyo̩.
Tak abo Filistia ño̩ dabi kʼo̩la-ma tala jo̩ ef o̩go̩ le̩.
Taku Defid ño̩ tʼO̩jo̩ ene; oñ O̩jo̩ ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ki te̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩ agbe̩re̩ ma n; mudagbala kʼe̩ lewa bʼuma ma ugbo ujo̩ oli mulbe̩ri le̩.
Tak i ade̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ gbʼiche̩ e̩re̩ ki jʼoj oli mulbe̩ri alule̩, e̩gbale̩ tak uwe̩ adufu kʼe̩ jogu; todu O̩jo̩ dʼuwe̩ o̩gba le kʼi fʼabogu abo Filistia gwoda.
Taku Defid che alu kʼO̩jo̩ ñwa ñw u; oñ ma fʼabogu abo Filistia gwoda akwo Gibeo̩n gbogbo wa Geze̩r.
Tak uwohi Defid ledufu tʼojane̩ ojane̩ du; Jihofa la je̩ ñw ailo-wñ ki ba abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi chaka.
Tak i fʼunyi unyi ko̩ ñw o̩la-wñ ef ewo Defid; oñ i ñwʼuña che tod akpati O̩jo̩, i la fʼunyabo fa ñw u.
Taku Defid kakini, I dukpe̩ kʼene̩ du ki ne̩ akpati O̩jo̩ tʼabo Lifai le n; todu ama chʼabo ki Jihofa chi ma ku ma ne̩ akpati O̩jo̩, ku ma lañʼache̩ e̩wñ ñw u o̩gbe̩gbe̩le̩.
Taku Defid kʼabo Israe̩l du wa jeju Je̩rusale̩m, ku ma dʼakpati Jihofa te̩gu wa uña-wñ e-kʼi ñwo̩che tane̩ ñw u.
Defid la kʼamo̩ma Aro̩n kpai abo Lifai wa jʼugbokate.
Abo ku ma chʼamo̩ma Kohat che, Urie̩l chʼagboji-ma, kpʼamo̩maye-wñ ku ma chʼone̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩fa;
e-amo̩ma Me̩rari, Asaya chʼagboji-ma, oñ amo̩maye-wñ chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩;
e-amo̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m, Joe̩l chʼagboji-ma, amo̩maye-wñ la chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa;
e-amo̩ma Ilaizefan, She̩maya chagboji-ma, amo̩maye-wñ la chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩;
e-amo̩ma He̩bro̩n, Ilaie̩l chʼagboji-ma, amo̩maye-wñ la chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩le̩;
e-amo̩ma Uzie̩l, Aminadab chʼagboji-ma, oñ amo̩maye-wñ chʼogu me̩lu nyoke me̩gweji.
Taku Defid fu Zedo̩k kpʼAbayata amatama do̩ wa, kpʼabo Lifai, owñ che Urie̩l kpai Asaya kpai Joe̩l kpai She̩maya kpai Ilaie̩l kpʼAminadab,
oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, A me̩ chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata abo Lifai: me̩ chʼo̩la-me̩ ku me̩ fo̩, tʼame̩ tʼamo̩maye-me̩, kʼame̩ ki dʼakpati Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, wʼugbo kʼu ñwo̩che te̩ ñw u.
Todabu ki ma chʼame̩ nʼe̩ e̩gba ejodudu le̩ n, Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, muke̩che̩ bʼuwa ma, todu a tene ugbo-wñ, alu kʼoji ajo̩ ka kʼa che n.
Abe̩le̩ amatama kpʼabo Lifai chʼo̩la-ma ku ma fo̩ ku ma dʼakpati Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l le̩, te̩gu wa.
Tak amo̩ma Lifai mʼugbo̩lo̩ oli kʼakpati O̩jo̩ lo̩ko̩li o̩la-wñ du nʼika-ma alu ku Mose̩s ñwa ñwu ma teju o̩la ki Jihofa ka le̩.
Taku Defid ko̩la ñw agboji abo Lifai ku ma kʼamo̩maye-ma ku ma keli dago jo̩, kʼe̩wñ iya ki jʼo̩wo̩-ma, kʼubo̩ kpʼumolo kpʼeicha ki ka dufu, ku ma chʼomu uyo̩ taa!
Oñ abo Lifai chi Himan, o̩ma Joe̩l; ma chi Esaf o̩ma Be̩rakaya, kwef amo̩maye-wñ; oñ ma chi Etau, o̩ma Kushaya, kwef amo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼamo̩ma Me̩rari;

ma laño̩ chi amo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼo̩gba ekeji ku ma de alo̩na; ama che Ze̩karaya, Be̩n kpai Jeezie̩l, She̩maira-mo̩t kpai Je̩haie̩l kpai Unai, E̩liab kpai Be̩naya kpai Maaseya kpai Matitaya kpai Ilife̩li kpai Mikneya kpai Obe̩d-ido̩m kpai Jeaye̩l.
Abe̩le̩ amakeli Himan kpai Esaf kpai Itan jo̩ kpai oke ki chʼebijeikpa ku ma nu gogogogo,
kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Ezie̩l kpai She̩mairamo̩t kpai Jehaie̩l kpai Unai kpai E̩liab kpai Maaseya kpai Be̩naya kpai ubo̩ ku ma nu uko̩la Alamot;
kpai Matataiya kpai Ilife̩li kpai Mikneya kpai Obe̩d-ido̩m kpai Jeaye̩l kpai Azazaya, umolo-ma la chʼuko̩la She̩minit ku ma tʼo̩gba eli.
Oñ Ke̩nanaya ki chʼagboji abo Lifai chʼutodu eli; i ko̩ ma eli edu kwane̩, todu kʼi chʼo̩ka-wñ.
Be̩rakaya kpai E̩lke̩na chʼamade alo̩na todu akpati le̩.

Oñ She̩banaya kpai Jiho̩shafat kpai Ne̩tane̩l kpai Amesai kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Be̩naya kpai E̩lieza, amatama le̩, nʼo̩kakachi afa o̩gba akpati O̩jo̩; oñ Obe̩d-ido̩m kpai Je̩haya chʼamadʼalo̩na tod akpati le̩.
Abe̩le̩ Defid kpʼabogijo Israe̩l kpʼamagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, nyʼadʼakpati alo Jihofa kwef unyi Obe̩d-ido̩m te̩gu wa kpʼuyo̩.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼO̩jo̩ te̩ko abo Lifai ku ma nʼakpati alo Jihofa, tak ama mʼamo̩kokuno̩ mebie kpʼamokolo mebie ko chʼiche̩bo̩.
Defid la nyi otogbo ku ma nʼukpo line̩n ku ma hi reju ga manyʼabo Lifai ku ma nʼakpati le̩ chaka kpʼamakeli kpai Ke̩nanaya kʼi chʼagboji kʼi adʼeli kpʼamakeli; Defid la nʼe̩fo̩d line̩n efufu o̩la.
Abe̩le̩ oñ abo Israe̩l du dʼakpati alo Jihofa te̩gu wa kpʼoga echi, kpʼuko̩la bijila, kpʼo̩kakachi, kpʼoke, ma la nu ubo̩ kpʼumolo kʼamone̩ agbo̩.
Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼakpati alo Jihofa lewa ewo Defid, Maikal, o̩ma So̩l le̩, nyʼope go, oñ i li abu ku Defid, ki chʼonu, do̩mo̩ atido, kʼi achiya, oñ i chʼe̩de̩te̩-wñ ef e̩do̩-wñ.
Ma la mʼakpati O̩jo̩ le̩ du wʼeje-fu, oñ ma mʼu du gugu alumeji unyabo ki Defid fa tod uwñ le̩. Taku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa jʼo̩gba O̩jo̩.
Tak e̩gba ki Defid fʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼiche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ le̩ che kpa, i de̩nyo̩ ñw amone̩ le̩ ef odu Jihofa.
Tak i fʼodukulu uje̩wñ kpʼo̩kpo̩ e̩laʼka kpʼe̩bo̩ e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩maʼka kpe̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ Israe̩l okoke du, tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼonobule̩.
Tak i chi abo Lifai iche̩ka ku ma jʼo̩gba akpati Jihofa ache e̩wñ, ku ma je̩ ñw ma rewa, ku ma gogbo̩do̩, ku ma ño̩ je̩nyu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l.

Esaf chʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼoji dufu, aro̩ne-wñ la che Ze̩karaya, Jeaye̩l kpai She̩maira-mo̩t kpai Jehaie̩l kpai Matatiya kpai E̩liab kpai Be̩naya kpai Obe̩d-ido̩m, kpai Jeaye̩l, ama nʼubo̩ kpʼumolo; Esaf la nʼoke egwu.
Oñ Be̩naya kpai Jahezie̩l amatama le̩, nʼo̩kakachi afa o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ o̩gba akpati alo O̩jo̩.
Tak o̩jo̩ le̩ Defid dʼegogbodo̩ Jihofa lʼo̩wo̩ Esaf kpʼamo̩maye-wñ nyane̩ ejodudu:
O me̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa, me̩ kwadʼodu-wñ,
Me̩ fʼeli ko̩ ñw u, me̩ kʼeli dʼo̩,
Me̩ je̩nyʼodu-wñ kiafo̩ le̩;
Me̩ tene Jihofa kpʼukpahiu-wñ,
Me̩ dibetʼuko̩lo̩ awuwu-wñ kʼi che,
O ame̩ ugbe̩ Israe̩l, adu-wñ le̩,
Owñ che Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa;
Me̩ dibekado alo-wñ e̩gba du,
e-kʼi kpe̩ kpʼEbraham,
kʼi la fʼu lonyane̩ ñw Jeko̩b kʼi mud e̩wñ uhio̩me̩,
i kakini, Uwe̩ oñ nadʼane̩ Kenan ñw u,
E̩gba kʼaluka-ma de̩ re,
ku ma tale kwʼugbo abo uche̩ichi tʼugbo abo uche̩ichi omune̩,
i je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du che ma e̩bie̩ne̩ n;
kakini, Me̩ ki do̩wo̩kado abo kʼu fʼekpo ba tʼuma oji-i n,
Me̩ keli Jihofa, ane̩ ile̩-i du!
Me̩ dʼojima-wñ ka dufu ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
Todu Jihofa tabale, i dukpe̩ ku ma je̩nyʼu ololololo,
Todu amo̩jo̩ amone̩ du chʼo̩wai ode;
E̩gahi kpʼojima jʼo̩gba-wñ;
Me̩ du ñw Jihofa, ame̩ o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu amone̩,
Me̩ dʼojima ki chʼukpe̩ odu-wñ ñw Jihofa;
o̩la-me̩ ki ga o̩gba-wñ, ane̩-ile̩-i du;
Efojale ki nayo̩, ane̩-ile̩ ki la gwoguyo̩,
Ohimini abadi ki chekuku, kpʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef uwñ,
Tak oli efoko akeli uyo̩
O me̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa, todu e̩ne̩nyo̩ i che;
Me̩ ki la ka kakini,
Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ki nele,
Oñ i tʼEsaf kpʼamo̩maye-wñ no̩ jʼo̩gba akpati alo Jihofa o̩mo̩, ku ma che e̩wñ o̩gba akpati le̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, alu ki dukpe̩ ku ma che o̩jo̩ du;
kpai Obe̩d-ido̩m manyʼamo̩maye-ma, ma chʼone̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩jo̩; kpai Obe̩d-ido̩m o̩ma Je̩dutun kpai Hosa ku ma chʼamade o̩na;
kpai Zedo̩k atama kpai amo̩maye-wñ amatama ge̩, o̩gba unyabo Jihofa oj otete kʼi de̩ Gibeo̩n,
ku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa che ñwu Jihofa odudu kpai ane̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, ku ma cho teju alu du ku ma ko̩ tef uko̩-o̩la Jihofa, e-kʼi ñwa ñw abo Israe̩l;
Hi man kpai Je̩dutun kpʼabubo abo ku ma chi ku ma dʼodu-ma okoke le̩ ku ma gogbodo̩ Jihofa todabu kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ chʼo̩gbegbele̩.
Himan kpai Je̩dutun nʼo̩kakachi kpai o̩ke tod abo ku ma anu, kpai e̩wñ iya tod eli O̩jo̩ manyu ma. Amo̩ma Je̩dutun la jo̩ alaku.
Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka kwʼo̩mo̩; oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼunyi-wñ; Defid la mudabi kʼi kadua ñw abunyi-wñ.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku Defid kwogugu unyi e-wñ, ku Defid ka ñwu Netan, akache̩, kakini, Go, omi gugu ef unyi ku ma nʼoli sida ko̩, akpati alo Jihofa muda dʼef ukpo ku ma ko ta ofo.
Taku Netan ka ñwu Defid kakini, E̩ che e̩wñ du ki dʼe̩do̩-we̩, todu O̩jo̩ dʼugbo we̩.
Oñ i lewatʼodu o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Netan kakini,
Lo, kʼe̩ ka ñw adu-mi Defid kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, Uwe̩ ako̩ unyi ñwu mi kʼu nagugu ef uwñ n:
todu omi te̩te̩gugu ef unyi akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼomi du Israe̩l te̩gu wa le̩ gbogbo tʼeñini n. U muda kwef unyabo tef unyabo kpai kwʼuña ugugu tʼuña ugugu omune̩.
Ugbo du kʼu tʼalule̩ kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka, u ko̩la du kpʼamakajo̩ Israe̩l kʼomi ñwa ñwu ma ku ma chʼama-dejute̩ abo-mi Israe̩l kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ ma fʼunyi sida ko̩ ñwu mi n? mama me̩?
Todule̩ abu kʼuwe̩ aka ñwu Defid adu-mi fai de̩ kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Omi mʼuwe̩ du kwʼoko ije̩ wa, kwʼetʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ubi, kʼuwe̩ ki chʼe̩nu-to̩gba abo-mi Israe̩l;
u la te̩te̩dʼugbo we̩ ugbo du kʼe̩ le, u ño̩ fʼame̩-ne̩bi-we̩ chaka ko̩da rinyo̩ bʼuwe̩ o̩gba te̩; u la che kʼe̩ fʼodu ne̩ kʼi dabe̩ne̩ kʼodu ame̩ne̩lile ku ma jo̩ ile̩-i.
U lañʼabʼuña te̩ ñw abo-mi Israe̩l. Naño̩ ko ma gbe̩, kʼama ki gugu uña e-ma, na ñʼachi kwʼo̩mo̩ ge̩ n; amo̩ma bibi ñʼagwʼuma e̩gbo, dab e̩gba ejodudu
kpʼakwʼo̩jo̩ kʼomi ñwa ñw amakajo̩ ku ma nʼo̩da abo-mi Israe̩l ge̩ n, u la afʼame̩nebi-we̩ dolo chaka. Anoji e-le̩, omi aka ñw e̩-i ka ku Jihofa akʼunyi ñw e̩.
Oñ i awatu, e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩-we̩ jo̩ kpa kʼi dukpe̩ kʼe̩ nyʼugbo amata-we̩, kʼomi adʼugbe̩-we̩ kwane̩ gugu ubi-we̩, kʼowñ le̩ adʼef amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ onugo; oñ nafʼojane̩-wñ lonyane̩.
Owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki akʼunyi ñwu mi, oñ nafʼede e-wñ lonyane̩ tʼogbegbele̩.
Omi achʼata-wñ, owñ la achʼo̩ma-mi. U la adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-mi kwo bʼo̩ te̩ alu kʼu mʼu du bʼe̩ne̩ ki je̩ o̩gba-we̩ te̩ n;
u la ahiʼu gugu ef unyi-mi kpʼef ojane̩-mi ogbegbele̩; e̩re̩ ede-wñ la alonyane̩ ogbegbele̩.
Netan ko̩la ñwu Defid teju o̩la-i du kpai teju ane̩ ego-i chaka.
Taku Defid onu mugudu tʼejefu, oñ i kwogugu o̩gba Jihofa, oñ i kakini, Omi chʼe̩ne̩? O, Jihofa O̩jo̩, unyi-mi la chʼe̩wñ? kʼuwe̩ mʼumi du gbogbo wʼemi?
E-le̩ laño̩ chʼe̩wñ ke̩ke̩ eju-we̩, O O̩jo̩; e̩ laño̩ fʼo̩la e̩wñ ejo̩gba ejo̩gba ugbo unyi adu-we̩ ka me̩; ugugu-mi la dabe̩ne̩ kʼugugu e̩ne̩ ojima eju-we̩, O Jihofa O̩jo̩.
Abu Defid neke ño̩ ka ñw e̩ ugbo ojima kʼe̩ du ñw adu-we̩-i? Todu uwe̩ chema adu-we̩-i.
O Jihofa, tod adu-we̩-i, kpai alu kʼe̩do̩-we̩ onugo de̩, oñ e̩ fʼe̩wñ inaina-i du che, kʼamone̩ ki ma e̩wñ inaina-i chaka.
O Jihofa, i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dab uwe̩ n, i la nʼO̩jo̩ omune̩ tʼuwe̩ le n, lugbo e̩wñ du kʼa nʼeti-wa gbo̩.

Oñ ugbo abo uche̩ichiʼka de̩ ile̩-i kʼi dababo-we̩ Israe̩l? e-kʼO̩jo̩ nyʼagba ma tane̩ ñw o̩la-wñ ku ma mud amone̩, kʼe̩ fʼodu ne̩ ñw o̩la-we̩ lugbo e̩wñ lile kpʼe̩wñ ubailo kʼe̩ che, owñ chʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi kʼe̩ ne ma dufu bʼamone̩ we̩ kʼe̩ gba ma kwʼIjipti o̩gba te̩.
Todu uwe̩ mʼabo-we̩ Israe̩l ko che abo-we̩ onugo onugo tʼogbegbele̩; oñ uwe̩ Jihofa mud O̩jo̩-ma.
I chʼifai, O Jihofa, e̩ ki je̩ ñw o̩la adu-we̩ kpʼo̩la unyi-wñ kʼe̩ ka le̩ ki dago kpaka ogbegbele̩, kʼe̩ la che alu kʼe̩ ka.
I ki dago kpaka kʼodu-we̩ ki nʼuwohi nyʼo̩gba ogbegbele̩ ku ma ka kakini, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du chʼO̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ ñw abo Israe̩l gbo: unyi Defid, adu-we̩, kʼi lonyane̩ o̩gba-we̩.
Todu uwe̩, O O̩jo̩-mi mudu tejugede ñw adu-we̩ ka kʼuwe̩ akʼunyi ñw u, todule̩ oñ adu-we̩ li uña ki chadua o̩gba-we̩-i.
I la chʼifai, O Jihofa, uwe̩chʼO̩jo̩, e̩ la fʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩-i katane̩ ñw adu-we̩-i.
Fai i ki la nyʼuwe̩ eju kʼe̩ dʼe̩nyo̩ ñw unyi adu-we̩ todu ki dʼo̩gba-we̩ ogbegbele̩: todu uwe̩, O Jihofa, mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñw u me̩, i la anʼe̩nyo̩ le̩ ogbegbele̩.
Tak ubi e-le̩ i lewatu ku Defid fʼabo Filistia gwoda, oñ i fʼuma dolo, tak i mu Gat kpʼadogbe-wñ gba bʼabo Filistia o̩wo̩ te̩.
Tak i fu Moab gwoda; oñ abo Moab le̩ mud amadu ñwu Defid, ma la kʼe̩wñ ele wa.
Taku Defid fu Hadareza, onu Zoba, gwoda gbogbo wa He̩mat, abu kʼi alo kʼi fʼo̩da-wñ lonyane̩ o̩la ohimini Yufretis.

Defid la bʼo̩ gbʼo̩kogu icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpai amana-nya icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ mebie kpʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu ku ma le e̩re̩ o̩fo, oñ Defid mʼili e̩re̩ amanya o̩kogu le̩ chaka ko̩da, i muda dʼo̩wo̩ mʼamanya ku ma abʼo̩kogu ogu me̩lu jo̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo Siria e̩-Damaskus lewa ku ma te̩ko̩ Hadareza, onu Zoba, Defid fʼabo Siria one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke meji gwoda.
Taku Defid kʼabide jo̩ Sina e-Damaskus le̩; oñ abo Siria mud amadu ñwu Defid, ma laño̩ kʼe̩wñ ele wa ge̩. Jihofa la fu Defid jadu ugbo du kʼi le.
Taku Defid mʼikpako e-o̩jamalia, ki jʼo̩la abuko̩lo̩ Hadareza ko, oñ i mʼu ko wa Je̩rusale̩m.
Defid la mʼebijeikpa nana ko kwo Tibhat kpai Kun, ewo ewo Hadareza, oñ e-le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n mu ko che ohimini ebijeikpa, kpʼe̩wñ ki dago waala le̩, kpʼe̩wñ eku ku ma nʼebijeikpa che.
Tak e̩gba ku Tou, onu He̩mat, gbo̩ ka ku Defid fʼabogu Hadareza, onu Zobah, gwoda chaka,

i fu Hado̩ram, o̩ma-wñ, kpuche̩ nyʼugbo onu Defid, kʼi fʼu gwa, kʼi ño̩ kadua ñw u, todabu kʼi kogu bo̩ Hadareza kʼi la fʼu gwoda (todu Hadareza te̩takogu bo̩ Tou;) i laño̩ kʼe̩wñ eku o̩jamalia kpʼajifa, kpʼebijeikpa kpuche̩ wa ge̩.

Abʼe-le̩ Defid, onu, ño̩ date̩ ñwu Jihofa, manyʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia, kʼi ko kwʼane̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du wa, owñ che kwo Ido̩m kpai kwo Moab kpai kwʼane̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n kpai kwʼane̩ abo Filistia kpai kwʼane̩ abo Amale̩k.
Oñ Abishai, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, fʼabo Ido̩m icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩ gwoda ef o̩go̩ Omu.
Tak i kʼabo ide jo̩ Ido̩m; oñ abo Ido̩m chaka mud amadu ñwu Defid, Jihofa la jadu Defid ugbo du kʼi nyi.
Oñ Defid jʼonu abo Israe̩l chaka; i la che teju alu kʼoji ajo̩ ka kpʼo̩kpakpa kpʼabo-wñ chaka.
Jo̩ab, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, la nʼo̩da abogu; Je̩ho̩shafat, o̩ma Ahilud, chʼakʼinabali nyʼo̩takada;
Ze̩do̩k, o̩ma Ahaitub, kpʼAbime̩-le̩k, o̩ma Abayata, chʼamatama; Shaf-sha, la chʼako̩takada-ma;
Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada, la nʼo̩da abo Ke̩re̩t kpai abo Pe̩le̩t; oñ amo̩ma Defid chʼabo ku ma tʼo̩gba me̩rʼonu anane̩.
Tak i lewatu anubi e-le̩ ku Nehash, onu amo̩ma Amo̩n, leku, oñ o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.

Taku Defid kakini, Namo̩la ñwu Hene̩n, o̩ma Nehash, todabu kʼata-wñ mo̩la ñwu mi le̩. Abe̩le̩ Defid fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼanyʼu e̩do̩ tod ata-wñ. Tak abuko̩lo̩ Defid lewa ane̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n ugbo Hene̩n todu ku ma nyʼe̩ e̩do̩.
Amagboji amo̩ma Amo̩n muda ka ñwu Hene̩n kakini, Uwe̩ do̩ ka ki Defid adojima ñw ata-we̩? abo kʼi kpe̩ wa anyʼe̩ e̩do̩-i? I chʼane̩-i etejane̩ kpʼe̩kpo̩fo̩ kpʼe̩tu oñ amadu-wñ wʼugbo-we̩-i n?
Abe̩le̩ Hene̩n mʼabuko̩lo̩ Defid ko, oñ i fʼuma ilagba la, i la fʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma bu alumeji gbogbo kad ofe-ma, tak i je̩ ñwu ma lo̩.
Tak abo iche̩ka nyʼaka ñwu Defid alu ku ma che abo-wñ, oñ i fʼone̩ kpe̩ ledo ma; todu abo le̩ chanyo̩ gbali. Tak onu kakini, Me̩ jo̩ Je̩riko gbogbo tak ilagba-me̩ ki gwe̩, taku me̩ dabiwa.

Tak e̩gba kʼabo Amo̩n li ka kʼama fʼo̩la-ma gwʼihie̩ne̩ ugbo Defid, Hene̩n, kpʼabo Amo̩n kʼajlfa alu tale̩nt icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpuche̩ ku ma la o̩kogu o̩kogu kpʼamananya kwʼane̩ Me̩sopotemia kpʼoj ane̩ Aram-Maaka, kpai oj ane̩ Zo̩ba wa.

Abe̩le̩ ma fʼo̩kogu icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke meji, manyʼonu Maaka kpʼabo-wñ la. Oñ abo le̩ lewa ruru jo̩ o̩gba Me̩deba. Tak amo̩ma Amo̩n kʼo̩la-ma kwʼewo ewo-ma wa jo̩, oñ ma lewa ku ma jogu.
Oñ Defid gbo, tak i fu Joab kpʼamagbiti abogu-wñ chaka kpe̩ nyʼo̩mo̩.
Oñ amo̩ma Amo̩n dufu wa akʼo̩la-ma tala jo̩ ku ma jogu alaku ewo le̩. Amonu ku ma wa le̩ jo̩ kpʼo̩la-ma egbili o̩mo̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku Joab li ka kʼogu le̩ donyʼuwñ o̩gba ñʼubi i fʼaboke̩le̩ Israe̩l e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ chi chaka, oñ i ko ma dojo̩ ku ma ja kpʼabo Siria.
Tak i kʼamone̩-wñ ki bo̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ o̩maye-wñ Abishai; oñ ma kʼo̩la-ma dojo̩ ku ma jakpʼamo̩ma Amo̩n.
Tak i kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩ abo Siria tʼe-mi le, tak uwe̩ ki gbutu ñwu mi, i muda che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩ abo Amo̩n tʼe-we̩ le, mak omi agbutu ñw e̩.
E̩ ki fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, kʼa fʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che tod abo-wa, kpai tod ewo ewo O̩jo̩-wa. Jihofa ki nache e̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ Joab kpʼabo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ te̩wa o̩gba abo Siria ku ma jogu; oñ ma ra rʼo̩gbawñ.
Tak e̩gba kʼamo̩ma Amo̩n li ka kʼabo Siria ara, ama ño̩ ra rʼo̩gba Abishai, o̩maye-wñ, abe̩le̩ ge̩, oñ ma mugudu tef ewo. Taku Joab lewa Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo Siria li ka kʼama ma bʼabo Israe̩l jo̩ n, ma fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ oñ ma fʼabo Siria ku ma jo̩ udaba ohimini do̩ dufu, oñ Shofak, ki chʼagboji abogu Hadareza tʼuma o̩gba.

Taku ma mudu ka ñwu Defid; oñ i mʼabo Israe̩l chaka ko wa jo̩, oñ i mu Jo̩rdan daba. Ma lewa bʼuma ma, oñ ma kʼabogu dojo̩ ku ma ja. Tak e̩gba ku Defid kʼabogu-wñ dojo̩ ku ma ja kpʼabo Siria, ama la ja kpʼowñ.

Tak abo Siria ra rʼo̩gba abo Israe̩l; oñ Defid fʼabo Siria ku ma jʼef o̩kogu icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ mebie kpa manyʼabo ku ma le e̩re̩ ofo one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji. I ño̩ fu Shofak agboji abogu kpa ge̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo Hadareza li ka kʼo̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l tʼe-ma le ma fʼo̩la-ma kpai Defid ño̩ru, oñ ma kworʼo̩. Abo Siria la ko̩ ete̩ko amo̩ma Amo̩n akwihi le̩.

Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ muda ko, iko kʼamonu adufu le̩, Joab mʼukpahiu abogu ko dufu wa, oñ i fʼane̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n kpo̩fo̩ tak i lewa kpala nyʼu Raba. Defid muda gugu Je̩rusale̩m. Taku Joab fu Raba gwoda, oñ i fʼu gulo̩.

Taku Defid mʼike̩be̩ onuma gba bʼo̩ oji te̩, oñ i li ka kʼuwoji-wñ chʼokujo kpai tale̩nt o̩jamaliaʼka, okuta akoko laño̩ jʼo̩la-wñ; oñ ma mʼu du do Defid oji. Tak i kʼane̩ kʼogu je̩ ewo le̩ dufui, i nana tabale.
I ño̩ kʼamone̩ ku ma jʼef ewo le̩ dufu wa, oñ i ko ma jo̩ ñw iso̩ kpʼebije ki ale̩ kpʼo̩kanyi. Abe̩le̩ Defid che ewo ewo amo̩ma Amo̩n chaka. Taku Defid kpʼamone̩ le̩ chaka mudabi tu Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ i lewatʼanubi e-le̩ kʼogu chi ñw ama kpʼabo Filistia Geza: taku Sibe̩kai e̩ne̩ Husha le̩ fu Se̩pai, kʼi dʼef amo̩ma akachi o̩mo̩ kpa; oñ ma fʼuma du.
Tak ogu ño̩ chi ñw ama kpʼabo Filistia ge̩; oñ Elhena, o̩ma Jee̩r, fu Lamai, o̩maye Golayat, e̩ne̩ Gat le̩, kpa; oli o̩kwo̩-wñ la dab ugbo̩lo̩ oli iduabo̩.
Tak ogu ño̩ chi Gat ge̩, ugbo kʼe̩ne̩ʼka kʼi gbʼakachi inaina de̩, o̩mo̩wo̩-wñ kpʼo̩me̩re̩-wñ chʼogu nyoke me̩le̩; e̩fa e̩fa i che. Ma laño̩ fʼowñ bi ñw akachi le̩ ge̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi fʼabo Israe̩l bina, Jonatan, o̩ma Shimea o̩maye Defid, fʼu kpa.
Ma fʼabo le̩ bi ñw akachi le̩ Gat; ma la wane̩ o̩wo̩ Defid, kpʼo̩wo̩ abo-wñ.
Taku Setan kwane̩ akobo̩ abo Israe̩l, oñ i ki Defid e̩che̩ ki fʼabo Israe̩l kaluka.
Oñ Defid ka ñwu Joab kpʼamagboji amone̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ lo ku me̩ fʼabo Israe̩l kaluka akwo Birshiba gbogbo wa Dan; ku me̩ kʼohi wa ñwu mi, kʼu fʼaluka-ma ma.

Taku Jo̩ab kakini, Jihofa ki je̩ ñw abo-wñ ku ma wewe tʼalu ku ma de̩ abajo̩i le onu ogume̩lu ta; O odu-mi onu, o̩chaka-ma chʼamadu odu-mi-i n? e̩wñ chi kʼodu-mi atene e̩wñ-i? e̩wñ chi kʼi adʼo̩la-wñ chʼe̩wñ ki aje̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dʼO̩jo̩ re ta?
I chaka kʼabe̩le̩, o̩la onu fʼe-Joab du. Todule̩ Joab kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼugbo du ane̩ Israe̩l, oñ i lewa Je̩rusale̩m.

Taku Joab mʼonu ki chʼaluka amone̩ kʼi kaluka le̩ du ñwu Defid. Oñ o̩chaka aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ku ma bʼo̩kwo̩chageli ewo jo̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogume̩lu; e-Juda la chʼaboke̩le̩ one̩ Icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ulo̩ko̩ nyʼe̩te̩gwa ku ma bʼo̩kwo̩chageli ewo jo̩.
I muda kaluka abo Lifai kpʼabo Be̩njamin tʼefu ma n; todu o̩la kʼonu ka le̩ chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñwu Joab.
Oñ e̩wñ le̩ bie̩ne̩ eju O̩jo̩; todule̩ i fʼabo Israe̩l gwoda.
Taku Defid ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, U fʼadure ta tabale, e̩wñ kʼomi che-i, fai o̩ko̩ nagba bʼe̩, kʼe̩ la dʼudu kʼadu-we̩-i fe̩ tinyo̩; todu u fʼe̩wñ idada che nana.
Taku Jihofa ko̩la ñwu Gad, ki chʼagane̩ Defid, kakini,
Lo, kʼe̩ ka ñwu Defid kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, E̩wñ me̩ta oñ nano̩wo̩ dala ñw e̩-i; mʼo̩ka-wñ du kʼu chʼe̩.
Abe̩le̩ Gad lewʼugbo Defid oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, E-ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ e̩ du ke:

abe̩k ukpo̩ta ki kpa o̩do̩ me̩ta; abe̩k elenyo̩ rʼo̩gba ame̩no̩la-we̩ kʼo̩kwo̩chageli ame̩nebi-we̩ ki mʼe̩ ochu me̩ta; abe̩k o̩kwo̩chageli Jihofa, owñ chʼe̩wñ ibi ki che ane̩-i kʼonuche̩ Jihofa ki nado̩mo̩ akpʼe̩wñ bie̩ ugbo du ef alo̩me̩ Israe̩l gbogbo o̩jo̩ me̩ta. Todule̩ fai e̩ fulo kʼu ma ohi kʼu nadu dabiwa ñw e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi uche̩-i.
Taku Defid ka ñwu Gad kakini, U kwo̩tʼo̩ me̩: o̩ko̩ nagbabʼe̩, e̩ je̩ ñwu mi ñwa tef o̩wo̩ Jihofa; todu ejumomi-wñ tabale: e̩ ki muda je̩ ñwu mi ñwa tef o̩wo̩ one̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa fʼe̩wñ ibi kpe̩ ru abo Israe̩l o̩la; oñ aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l ki wane̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e̩te̩gwa.

O̩jo̩ la fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ nyi Je̩rusale̩m kʼi fʼu kpabie̩; oñ abu kʼi do̩mo̩ akpʼo̩ bie̩ Jihofa go, oñ e̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ wʼo̩ tak i ka ñw onuche̩ ki do̩mo̩ akpʼe̩wñ bie̩ le̩ kakini, I bo̩jo̩ me̩, bʼo̩wo̩-we̩ lo̩ ta. Onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ la dago ugbo ajita ugwo̩ka O̩rnan e̩ne̩ Je̩bius le̩.

Taku Defid mʼeju-wñ ko rʼate̩, oñ i li abu kʼonuche̩ Jihofa dago agbagba ane̩ ile̩ kpʼefojale, kʼo̩kwo̩chageli chʼe̩wo̩ nʼo̩wo̩-wñ kʼi nadala te̩ abʼoji Je̩rusale̩m ma. Taku Defid kpʼabogijo kʼe̩gbanukpo dʼo̩la-ma le̩, lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.

Oñ Defid ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, I chʼomi ñwa ñwu ma ku ma kʼamone̩ Israe̩l aluka n? Omi chʼe̩ne̩ ki dure, kʼu la fʼe̩wñ bibi inuina le̩ che. I la chʼe-ame̩wño̩re̩ egini-i, e̩wñ ma che? O Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw o̩wo̩-we̩ ki kobʼumi kpʼabo unyi ala-mi; i ki muda ko̩bo̩ abo e-we̩ n, kʼe̩wñ ibi ki che ma n.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa ñwa ñw u Gad kʼi ka ñwu Defid, ku Defid ki mute̩gu alo kʼi fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa oj ajita ugwo̩ka O̩rnan e̩ne̩ Je̩bius le̩.
Taku Defid mute̩gu alo, o̩la ku Gad ka ef odu Jihofa le̩.
Tak O̩rnan dejubi, oñ i fʼonuche̩ le̩ li, amo̩ma-wñ me̩le̩ ku majʼugbo-wñ la kʼo̩la-ma maja. O̩rnan la do̩mo̩ agwʼo̩ka wit.
