Taku Defid lewa ugbo O̩rnan, O̩rnan go, oñ i fu Defid li, tak i kwo bʼajita ugwo̩ka le̩ te̩ nyʼo̩do̩da oñ i te̩kpe̩ ñwu Defid, eju-wñ la bʼane̩ ma.
Taku Defid ka ñw O̩rnan kakini, Mʼugbo ajita ugwo̩ka-i du ñwu mi kʼu nʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ñwu Jihofa oji-wñ; e̩ du mi la, e̩ ki bʼaja-wñ wane̩ n, kʼe̩wñ ibi-i ki bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ugbo amone̩-i.

Tak O̩rnan ka ñwu Defid kakini, E̩ mʼu du ke; odu-mi onu ki che e̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju-wñ; go nakʼamokuno̩ tod e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñw e̩, kpʼane̩ ku ma ne̩ gwʼo̩ka ki chʼiji, kpʼo̩ka wit tod e̩wñ ele̩-wñ ge̩; o̩chaka-wñ nako̩ chʼe̩ ele.
Taku Defid, onu, ka ñw O̩rnan kakini, O̩da; omi muda ala alu kʼaja-wñ de̩ yiili; todu omi agbʼe̩wñ e-we̩ todu Jihofa n, u la akʼe̩wñ kʼomi ma chʼudu-wñ n che iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo n.
Taku Defid mʼo̩jamalia kʼuwoji-wñ che she̩ke̩l ulo̩gwa ko ñw O̩rnan tod ugbo kide̩.
Taku Defid fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne ñwu Jihofa o̩mo̩, oñ i kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa che, oñ i kwado̩ Jihofa; tak i nʼuna kwʼefojale wa oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ dohi ñw u.
Taku Jihofa ko̩la ñw onuche̩ le̩, oñ i mʼo̩kwo̩chageli-wñ du dabi tunyu ako̩-wñ.
Iko le̩, e̩gba ku Defid li ka ku Jihofa mʼohi du ñw u ugbo ajita ugwo̩ka O̩rnan, e̩ne̩ Je̩bius le̩, i la chʼiche̩bo̩ o̩mo̩.
Todu uña ugugu Jihofa e-ki Mose̩s che aje̩tachi le̩, kpʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-wñ, jʼo̩i otete ki gbo̩gba Gibeo̩n iko le̩.
Defid la neke nyʼo̩gba-wñ o̩mo̩ kʼi tʼO̩jo̩ ene n, todu i railo todu o̩kwo̩chageli onuche̩ Jihofa le̩.
Taku Defid kakini, Unyi Jihofa O̩jo̩ de̩-i, ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-abo Israe̩l la de̩.
Taku Defid ñwa ñwu ma ku ma kʼamilowa du oj ane̩ Israe̩l wa; oñ i kʼamano̩do̩ jo̩ adʼokuta ku ma ane̩ kʼunyi O̩jo̩.
Defid la fʼebije ñwo̩che jʼane̩ e̩kute̩ ki kʼo chʼale olugbo̩na kpʼalaku ku ma nʼe̩ akʼe̩wñ mʼomune̩, ebije ikpa-wñ laño̩ tabale, uwoji-wñ nʼeka n;
oli sida-wñ la nʼaluka n; todu abo Saido̩n kpʼabo Taya kʼoli sida wa ñwu Defid e̩kute̩ e̩kute̩.

Taku Defid kakini, So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma-mi, chʼimo̩to̩, i gbʼiko ta n; oñ i dukpe̩ kʼunyi ku ma ako̩ ñwu Jihofa kʼi nana tabale, ki nʼuwohi kpʼojima ugbo du oj ane̩ oj ane̩ chaka. Todule̩ omi akʼe̩wñ uko̩lo̩ jʼane̩ tod uwñ. Abe̩le̩ Defid kʼe̩wñ jʼane̩ ñw u ololo tak i ku.
Tak i fʼo̩ma-wñ So̩lo̩mo̩n do̩wa, oñ i ñwa ñw u kʼi kʼunyi todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l.
Oñ Defid ka ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n kakini. I chʼe-mi, o̩ma-mi, i dʼe̩do̩-mi kʼu kʼunyi ñw odu Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi.
O̩la Jihofa muda wʼugbo mi kakini, Uwe̩ dʼe̩bie̩ dafo ololo, e̩ laño̩ fʼogu inaina ja ge̩: e̩ ñʼako̩ unyi ñw odu-mi n, todabu kʼe̩ dʼe̩bie̩ nana dafo bʼile̩ ma eju-mi.

Go, ma abi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ñw e̩ e-kʼi achʼe̩ne̩ yo̩o̩; oñ nadʼuñmi ñw u kʼi añmi ñw ame̩nebi-wñ du ku ma ajo̩ lʼo daka; todu ma adʼodu-wñ ko̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n; omi adʼuñmi kpʼure̩do̩ ñw abo Israe̩l o̩kpanachi e-wñ:
Owñ le̩ akʼunyi tod odu-mi; owñ la achʼo̩ma e-mi, oñ omi achʼata-wñ; u la afʼede o̩fe̩-wñ lonyane̩ kʼi nʼo̩da abo Israe̩l ogbegbele̩.
Fai o̩ma-mi, Jihofa ki dʼugbo we̩; i ki ra ñw e̩, kʼe̩ la kʼunyi Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, teju alu kʼi nʼo̩la-we̩ aka le̩.
Jihofa ki dʼibe kpʼoji e̩wñ ema ñw e̩ dee, kʼi ñwa ñw e̩ teju alu kʼe̩wñ Israe̩l ade̩; todu kʼuwe̩ ki de uko̩-o̩la Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩.

E̩gba le̩ tak i ara ñw e̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼe̩ dejute̩ kʼe̩ che teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kpʼoji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu Mose̩s ugbo abo Israe̩l. Feju gbiti, kʼe̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩; e̩ ki railo n, e̩do̩-we̩ ki da kpu n.

Go ta, u fʼe̩wñ te̩re̩ jo̩ tod unyi Jihofa ef o̩bata-mi, o̩jamalia che tale̩nt icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogume̩lu, ajifa-wñ la che tale̩nt icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, uwoji ebijeikpa kpʼebije dudu nʼeka n; todu e̩kute̩ i che; u ño̩ fʼigbo̩ oli kpʼokuta ñwo̩che jʼane̩ ge̩; uwe̩ ki la ko mʼo̩ ta.
Anubile̩ ge̩, abuko̩lo̩ la jʼugbo-we̩ e̩kute̩, abo ku ma kpʼoli na, kpʼabo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ okuta kpʼoli, kpʼamone̩ du ku ma chʼo̩ka uko̩lo̩ ojoji ojoji chaka;
aluka o̩jamalia kpʼajifa kpʼebijeikpa kpʼebije edudu, i nʼeka n. Kwane̩, kʼe̩ kʼo̩wo̩ nyʼuko̩lo̩ le̩, Jihofa ki la dʼugbo we̩.
Defid ño̩ ñwa ñw amagboji Israe̩l chaka ku ma te̩ko o̩ma-wñ, So̩lo̩mo̩n.
I kakini, Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ dʼugbo me̩ n? I dʼuñmi ñwu me̩ o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du n? Todu i mʼabo du ku ma dodo ane̩-i ko nyʼumi o̩wo̩ me̩. Oñ ane̩-i chʼedolo te̩ o̩gba Jihofa kpʼo̩gba abo-wñ.

Fe̩do̩-me̩ kpʼonugo-me̩ kparʼetejane̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩; me̩ ki la kwane̩ ku me̩ fʼuña ugugu Jihofa O̩jo̩ ko̩, ku me̩ mʼakpati alo Jihofa kpʼe̩wñ eku kiafo̩ e-O̩jo̩, ko wʼef unyi ku ma ako̩ ñw odu Jihofa.
Oñ Defid mud ogijo, o̩jo̩-wñ jo̩; oñ i du So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu abo Israe̩l.
Tak i mʼamagboji Israe̩l chaka, manyʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai ko wa jeju.
Oñ ma fʼabo Lifai akwʼe̩ne̩ kʼo̩do̩-wñ jʼogue̩gwa nyʼate̩to̩gba kaluka; oñ aluka oji one̩ oji one̩-wñ che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩jo̩.
Abo le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ nʼuko̩lo̩ unyi Jihofa afejute̩; icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩fa-ma chʼamako̩takada kpʼamakajo̩;
icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩-ma chʼamadʼo̩na; icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩-ma la ne̩ e̩wñ eli kʼomi che tod eli uje̩nyu aje̩-nyu Jihofa.
Taku Defid fʼuma kpe̩ru uche̩ uche̩ alu kʼamo̩ma Lifai de̩: Ge̩rsho̩n, Kohat kpai Me̩rari.
E-abo Ge̩rsho̩n che Leadan kpai Shimeai.
Amo̩ma Leadan, Je̩haie̩l chʼoji kpai Zitan kpai Joe̩l, ma chʼe̩ta.
Amo̩ma Shimeai, She̩lomit kpai Hazie̩l kpai Haran, ma chʼe̩ta. Abo-i chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata Leadan.
Amo̩ma Shimeai, Jehat, Zaina kpai Jeush kpai Be̩raya, abo me̩le̩-i chʼamo̩ma Shimeai.
Jehat la chʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼoji dufu efu-ma, kpai Zaiza e̩nekeji; Jeush kpai Be̩raya muda nʼamo̩ma wewe n. Todule̩ ma gwodama mud akwo̩ra unyi okate e̩gba ku ma kʼunyi aluka.
Amo̩ma Kohat e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che: Amram, Izhar, He̩bro̩n kpʼUzie̩l, e̩le̩ ma che.

Amo̩ma Amram e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che̩: Aro̩n kpai Mose̩s; oñ ma fʼAro̩n date̩ ki fo̩ ogbegbele̩ dab e̩wñ ki afo̩ e-efo̩ le̩; owñ kpʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, ku ma gu otulale jo o̩gba Jihofa, ku ma che e̩wñ ñw u, ku ma la de̩nyo̩ ñw one̩ ef odu-wñ ogbegbele̩.
I muda chʼe-Mose̩s, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, ma fʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ko̩ tef abo o̩lo̩pu Lifai.
Amo̩ma Mose̩s e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Ge̩rsho̩m kpai E̩lieza.
Amo̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Shebue̩l tʼo̩gba.
Amo̩ma E̩lieza che Rihabaya oji; E̩lieza la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ omune̩ n; amo̩ma Rihabaya e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ muda wewe tabale.
Amo̩ma Izhar e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che She̩lomit chʼoji.
Amo̩ma He̩bro̩n e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Je̩raiya chʼe̩ne-jodudu, Amaraya chʼekeji, Jahe̩zie̩l chʼe̩ke̩ta, Je̩kameam la chʼe̩ke̩le̩-ma.
Amo̩ma Uzie̩l e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Maika chʼe̩nejodudu, Ishaya la chʼekeji.
Amo̩ma Me̩rari e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Mali kpai Mushi, amo̩ma Mali che E̩leaza kpai Kish.
Tak E̩leaza leku, i la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, chai abobule̩ kate; oñ amo̩maye-ma amo̩ma Kish la mʼuma ko chʼo̩ya.
Amo̩ma Mushi e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Mali kpai Ida kpai Je̩re̩mot, e̩ta ma che.

Abo-i chʼamo̩ma Lifai e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩, ma chʼoji akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi alu ku ma kʼodu-ma nyʼo̩takada teju alu kʼodu e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ku ma jʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba de̩, kʼama ki chʼuko̩lo̩ ku ma che ef unyi Jihofa.
Todu Defid kakini, Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, mʼuñmi du ñw abo-wñ me̩; i la agugu Je̩rusale̩m ogbegbele̩;
omune̩ de̩ ge̩, i ño̩ nʼugbo kʼabo Lifai ñʼanʼadu uña ugugu le̩ kpʼe̩wñ eku ku ma nʼache e̩wñ ñw u ge̩ n.
Todu lefo̩la otitala ki Defid ka, i je̩ ñwu ma fʼamo̩ma Lifai ku ma dʼo̩do̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba kaluka.

Todu ugugu uko̩lo̩ e-ma chʼuche̩ kʼamo̩ma Aro̩n akpe̩ ma, todu e̩wñ eche ef unyi Jihofa, ef ologbo-wñ kpai ef e̩ko̩da unyi-wñ kpʼugbo e̩wñ kiafo̩ le̩ egworinyo̩, owñ chʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ ku ma che tod unyi O̩jo̩;

kpʼuko̩lo̩ akala ku ma te̩jo̩ o̩gba o̩gba le̩ kpai tod omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ tod e̩wñ ele eduwa, dagba i chaka chʼabada ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n, dagba i chʼe-ku ma ro̩ ef ucha, abe̩k e-ki ñmʼomi nyʼo̩la, kpai todu e̩wñ ojoji ojoji e̩ñwa e-e̩bo̩ kpʼe̩ñwa unana-wñ;
ku ma ñʼadago odudu o̩jo̩ du ku ma gogbodo̩ Jihofa ku ma je̩nyu ñw u, kpʼe̩gba ane̩ abe̩le̩ ge̩;

ku ma la dago abe̩le̩ e̩gba du ku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa ñwu Jihofa o̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi kpʼe̩gba kʼochu ne etito̩ kpʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ ku ma dʼiko iko-wñ te̩, aluka-wñ chʼalu kʼo̩da-wñ de̩, ku ma jʼo̩gba Jihofa ache o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
Ama la ne̩ e̩wñ unyi abo ujeju ede kpʼe̩wñ uña kiafo̩ kpʼe̩wñ du kʼamo̩ma Aro̩n amo̩maye-ma ñwa ñwu ma ef e̩wñ eche ef unyi Jihofa le̩.
Ukpe̩ru amo̩ma Aro̩n la jo̩-i: Amo̩ma Aro̩n e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ la che Nedab kpʼAbaihiu, E̩leaza kpʼItamar.
Nedab kpʼAbaihiu muda leku dʼo̩gba ata-ma. Ma la nʼo̩ma n. Todule̩ oñ E̩leaza kpʼItamar fʼuko̩lo̩ ugugu atama che.
Oñ Defid fʼuma kpe̩ru, tu Zedo̩k kʼi dʼef amo̩ma E̩leaza, tu Ahime̩le̩k kʼi dʼef amo̩ma Itamar, alu kʼugugu-ma de̩ ef e̩wñ ku ma che ñw O̩jo̩.

Oñ ma fʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu li ef amo̩ma E̩leaza tʼe-ku ma li ef amo̩ma Itamar le. Abu ku ma fʼuma kpe̩ru le̩ de̩: Amo̩ma E̩leaza ku ma dʼoji dufu ef unyi unyi amata-ma chʼe̩gwe̩fa; oñ e-amo̩ma Itamar alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩ chʼe̩jo̩.
Ma la nʼanya ero̩ fʼuma kpe̩ru okujo̩. Todu amagboji uña kiafo̩ do̩mo̩ kpai amagboji e-O̩jo̩ ef amo̩ma E̩leaza kpʼef amo̩ma Itamar.

Taku She̩maya o̩ma Netane̩l ako̩takada kʼi dʼef abo Lifai fʼuma ko̩ eju onu kpʼamagboji kpai Zedo̩k atama kpʼAhime̩le̩k o̩ma Abaiatar, kpʼeju amata amatama kpʼabo Lifai ku ma dʼojidufu; ma mʼakwo̩ra unyiʼka du todu E̩leaza, ma la mʼoka du todu Itamar.
Oñ Je̩ho̩yarib fʼanya ejodudu ku ma ro̩ je̩, Je̩daya fʼekeji je̩,
Harim je̩ e̩ke̩ta, Sio̩rim je̩ e̩ke̩le̩,
Malkija je̩ e̩ke̩lu, Maijamin je̩ e̩ke̩fa,
Hako̩z je̩ e̩kebie, Abaije̩ je̩ e̩ke̩jo̩,
Je̩shua je̩ e̩ke̩la, She̩kanaya je̩ eke̩gwa,
Ilayashib je̩ e̩ke̩gwaka, Jekim je̩ e̩ke̩gweji,
Hupa je̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩ta, Je̩she̩be̩ab je̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩,
Bilga je̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu, Ime̩r je̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩fa.
Hize̩r je̩ e̩ke̩gwebie, Hapize̩z je̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩,
Pe̩tahaya je̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩la, Je̩he̩ze̩ke̩l je̩ e̩kogu,
Jekin je̩ e̩kogu nyoke, Gamul je̩ e̩kogu nyoke meji,
De̩laya je̩ e̩kogu nyoke me̩ta, Maazaya je̩ e̩kogu nyoke me̩le̩.
Alu ku ma fʼuma kpe̩ru ef uko̩lo̩-ma, ku ma wʼef unyi Jihofa alu kʼo̩da kʼata-ma Aro̩n ko ñwu ma de̩, alu ku Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ñwa ñw u de̩.
Oñ amo̩ma Lifai e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ki bo̩ jo̩-i: e-amo̩ma Amram che Shubee̩l; e-amo̩ma Shubee̩l che Je̩daiya,
e-Rihabaya, owñ che e-amo̩ma Rihabaya e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, E̩shaya chʼe̩nejodudu,
e-abo Izhar che She̩lomot; e-amo̩ma She̩lomot che Jehat.
E-amo̩ma He̩bro̩n che Je̩raya tʼo̩gba, Amaraya tʼekeji, Jahezie̩l te̩ke̩ta, Je̩kame̩am te̩ke̩le̩.
Amo̩ma Uzie̩l che Maika; e-amo̩ma Maika che Shemir.
E̩shaya chʼo̩maye Maika; e-amo̩ma E̩shaya che Ze̩karaya.
Amo̩ma Me̩rari che Mali kpai Mushi; amo̩ma Jeazaiya che Bino.
Amo̩ma Me̩rari lugbo Jeazaiya che Bino kpai Sho-ham kpai Zakur kpai Ibrai.
E-Mali che E̩leaza, e-ki ma nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n.
E-Kish: o̩ma Kish e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Je̩ramil.
Amo̩ma Mushi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ la che Mali kpai Ide̩r kpai Je̩re̩mot. Abo-i chʼamo̩ma abo Lifai alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩.

Abo-i ño̩ fʼanya ro̩ alu kʼamo̩maye-ma amo̩ma Aro̩n le̩ ro̩ eju Defid, onu, kpai eju Zedo̩k kpai Ahime̩le̩k, kpʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata amatama, kpʼabo Lifai ge̩. Abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata che alu kʼamo-kekele-ma de̩ ge̩.

Ubi e-le̩ ge̩, Defid kpʼamagboji abogu fʼamo̩ma Esaf kpai Himan kpai Je̩dutan iche̩ka date̩ ojoji todu e̩wñ eche ñw O̩jo̩ le̩, ku ma nʼumolo kpʼubo̩ kpʼeicha akache̩; oñ aluka abo ku ma achʼuko̩lo̩ alu kʼe̩wñ ku ma ache ñw O̩jo̩ de̩;
e-amo̩ma Esaf che Zakur kpai Jose̩f kpai Ne̩tanaya kpʼAsharila, amo̩ma Esaf ku ma jʼef o̩wo̩ Esaf ku ma akache̩ e̩gba kʼonu ka ñwu ma.

E-Je̩dutan de̩: amo̩ma Je̩dutan e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Ge̩dalaya kpai Zirai kpai Je̩shaya, Hashabaya kpai Madtaya, e̩fa ma che, ma jʼef o̩wo̩ ata-ma Je̩dutan kʼi nʼumolo akache̩ kʼi gogbo̩do̩ kʼi je̩nyu ñwu Jihofa.
E-Himan de̩; amo̩ma Himan e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Bukaya, Matanaya, Uzie̩l, She̩biue̩l kpai Je̩re̩mot, Hananaya, Hane̩nai, Ilayata, Gidaitai, kpai Romamtai-iza, Jo̩shbe̩-kasha, Malotai, Ho̩tir kpai Maheziot.
Abo-i chaka chʼamo̩ma Himan, agane̩ onu ef O̩la O̩jo̩, kʼi dʼigba-wñ kwane̩. O̩jo̩ la mʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ me̩gwe̩le̩ kpʼamo̩ma onobule̩ me̩ta ko ñwu Himan.
Abo-i chaka jʼef o̩wo̩ ata-ma tod eli eko̩ ef unyi Jihofa. Ma nʼoke kpʼubo̩ kpʼumolo tod e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩ eche. Onu chʼe̩ne̩ ki añwa ñw Esaf, Je̩dutan kpai Himan.
Oñ aluka-ma manyʼamo̩maye-ma ku ma ko̩ ma eli eko̩ ñwu Jihofa, owñ chʼo̩chaka abo ku ma chʼo̩ka-wñ che o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ nyoke me̩jo̩.
Ma la fʼanya ro̩ ku ma ma uko̩lo̩-ma, tʼe-kekele tʼe-ki nana, tʼakone̩wñ tʼe̩ne̩ ki ako̩che̩.
Anya Esaf ejodudu ku ma ro̩ je̩ Jose̩f; ekeji je̩ Ge̩dalaya, kʼowñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ kpʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ chʼone̩ me̩gweji.
E̩ke̩ta je̩ Zakur; kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
E̩ke̩le̩ je Izrai, kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
E̩ke̩lu je̩ Ne̩tanaya, kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
E̩ke̩fa je̩ Bukaya, kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
Ekebie-wñ je̩ Je̩sharila kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
Eke̩jo̩ je Je̩shaya kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
E̩ke̩la je̩ Matanaya kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩kele̩, e̩gweji ma che.
E̩ke̩gwa je̩ Shimeai kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
E̩ke̩gwaka-wñ je̩ Azaril kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
E̩ke̩gweji-wñ je̩ Hashabaya kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che̩.
E̩ke̩gwe̩ta-wñ je̩ Shubee̩l kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
Eke̩gwe̩le̩-wñ je̩ Matataya kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
E̩ke̩gwe̩lu-wñ je̩ Je̩re̩mo̩t kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che̩.
E̩ke̩gwe̩fa-wñ je̩ Hananaya kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
E̩ke̩gwebie-wñ je̩ Jo̩shbe̩kasha kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che̩.
E̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩-wñ je̩ Hane̩nai kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
E̩ke̩gwe̩la-wñ je̩ Malotai kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che̩.
Ekogu-wñ je̩ Ilayata kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che̩.
E-ogu nyoke-wñ je̩ Hotir kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
E-ogu nyoke meji-wñ je̩ Ge̩daltai kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che̩.
E-ogu nyoke me̩ta-wñ je̩ Maheziot kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che̩.
E-ogu nyoke me̩le̩-wñ je̩ Romamtai-iza kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, e̩gweji ma che.
Ukpe̩ru amadalo̩na uche̩uche̩ jo̩-i: e-abo Ko̩ra, Me̩she̩le̩maya o̩ma Kori ef amo̩ma Esaf.
Me̩she̩lemaya ño̩ nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩; Ze̩karaya chʼo̩mo̩gba-wñ, Je̩diae̩l chʼekeji, Ze̩badaya chʼe̩ke̩ta, Jatnie̩l chʼe̩ke̩le̩,
Elam chʼe̩ke̩lu, Jihohenan chʼe̩ke̩fa, Ele̩oinai chʼe̩kebie,
Obe̩d-ido̩m la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩: She̩maya chʼo̩mo̩gba-wñ, Jihozabad chʼekeji, Joa chʼe̩ke̩ta, Se̩kar chʼe̩ke̩le̩, Ne̩tane̩l chʼe̩ke̩lu.
Amie̩l chʼe̩ke̩fa, Isakar chʼe̩kebie, Piultai chʼe̩ke̩jo̩, todu O̩jo̩ de̩nyo̩ ñw u.
Ma ño̩ fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi ñwu She̩maya, o̩ma-wñ, ku ma nʼo̩da unyi ata-ma; todu amagbiti ku ma nʼuwohi ma che.
Amo̩ma She̩maya le̩ che O̩tnai kpai Re̩fee̩l kpʼObe̩d kpʼE̩lzebad kʼamo̩maye-wñ chʼa-magbiti kpʼE̩laihiu kpai Se̩makaya.
Abo-i chaka jʼef amo̩ma Obe̩d-ido̩m. Ama kpʼamo̩ma-ma kpʼamo̩maye-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ nʼukpahiu bʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ñw O̩jo̩ le̩ jo̩; abo Obe̩d-ido̩m chʼone̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke meji.
Me̩she̩le̩maya la nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼamo̩maye e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, amagbiti ma che. Ma chʼone̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩.
Hosa ki dʼef amo̩ma Me̩rari ño̩ nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ge̩. Se̩mrai chʼoji-ma, todu dagba kʼi ma chʼo̩mo̩gba n, ata-wñ muda dʼu chʼoji-ma.
Hilkaya chʼekeji, Te̩balaya chʼe̩ke̩ta, Ze̩karaya chʼe̩ke̩le̩; amo̩ma kpʼamo̩maye Hosa e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ chaka chʼe̩gwe̩ta.
Ukpe̩ru amadalo̩na uche̩uche̩ jʼef abo-i, owñ chʼef abo ku ma tʼo̩gba le̩, ugugu e-ma dab e-amo̩maye-ma ku ma che e̩wñ ef unyi Jihofa;
oñ ma fʼanya ro̩, tʼabo e-kekele tʼabo elile, alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩, alaku du nʼoka oka.
Anya e-o̩wo̩ olodudu la fu She̩limaya je̩. Taku ma fʼanya ro̩ todu o̩ma-wñ Ze̩karaya, ki chʼe̩ne̩ ki atohi o̩la ibe ibe. Anya-wñ la je̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩.
E-Obe̩d-ido̩m chʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩. E-amo̩ma-wñ la chʼunyi ku ma kʼe̩wñ jʼefu-wñ.
E-Shupim kpai Hosa chʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ manyʼalaku Shaleke̩t, o̩na ku ma che ugbo ku ma te̩gu le̩, ide-ma kadʼomune̩.
Abo Lifai me̩fa jʼo̩wo̩ olodudu, one̩ me̩le̩ la jʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ o̩jo̩ du, one̩ me̩le̩ la jʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ o̩jo̩ du, oñ ef unyi ugbo ku ma kʼe̩wñ jo̩ le̩ ma chʼeji eji.
Todu Parbar o̩wo̩ olane̩, one̩ me̩le̩ jʼo̩na ugbo ku ma te̩gu le̩, eji la jo̩ Parbar.
Ukpe̩ru amadalo̩na ku ma jʼef abo Ko̩ra kpʼef abo Me̩rari de̩.
I la chʼe-abo Lifai, Ahija nʼo̩da e̩wñ akoko unyi O̩jo̩ kpʼe̩wñ akoko kiafo̩ le̩.
I chʼe-amo̩ma Leadan, owñ chʼamo̩ma abo Ge̩rsho̩n ku ma chʼo̩lo̩pu Leadan, owñ chʼame̩ne̩fe̩nyi ku Leadan, e̩ne̩ Ge̩rsho̩n le̩ ne̩ che Je̩hailai.
Amo̩ma Je̩hailai e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ che Ze̩tam kpai Joe̩l o̩maye-wñ, ku ma nʼedejutʼe̩wñ akoko unyi Jihofa.
E-abo Amram kpʼe-abo Izhar kpʼe-abo He̩bro̩n kpʼe-abo Uzie̩l:
kpai She̩bue̩l, o̩ma Ge̩rsho̩m o̩ma Mose̩s, nʼo̩da e̩wñ akoko le̩.
Amo̩maye-wñ e-E̩lieza che Rihabaya, o̩ma-wñ kpai Je̩shaya o̩ma-wñ kpai Jo̩ran o̩ma-wñ kpai Zikrai o̩ma-wñ kpai She̩lomit o̩ma-wñ.

She̩lomit kide̩ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ nʼe̩wñ akoko kiafo̩ le̩ chaka ede, owñ chʼe-ki Defid onu, kpʼabogijo kʼoji-ma dufu kpʼamagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpʼe-ogume̩lu ogume̩lu kpʼamagboji abogu che ki fo̩ le̩.
Ma chi kwef e̩wñ kʼogu-ma je̩ jo oñ ma che ki fo̩ ku ma ane̩ chʼuko̩lo̩ ef unyi Jihofa.
Oñ e̩wñ du ku Samiue̩l, agane̩ le̩, kpai So̩l, o̩ma Kish, kpʼAbina, o̩ma Ne̩r, kpai Jo̩ab, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya che ki fo̩, e̩wñ du ku ma che ki fo̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ She̩lomit kpʼamo̩maye-wñ.
E-abo Izhar, Ke̩ne̩naya kpʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ nʼo̩da abo Israe̩l tod uko̩lo̩ o̩do̩da, ama chʼamako̩takada kpʼamakajo̩.

E-abo He̩bro̩n, Ha-shabaya kpʼamo̩maye-wñ, amagbiti icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gume̩lu chʼicham ma che. Ma nʼefejute̩ abo Israe̩l ku ma jʼudaba Jo̩rdan kpʼate̩tʼo̩wo̩ o̩lane̩-wñ, tod uko̩lo̩ Jihofa chaka kpʼe̩wñ onu eche.

E̩ne̩ abo He̩bro̩n che Je̩raija kʼi chʼoji abo He̩bro̩n alu kʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma de̩ lo̩na amata-ma. O̩do̩ e̩ko̩gbo̩ meji ki Defid jʼonu ma tejane̩ ma, oñ ma fʼamagbiti ki nʼuwohi li efu-ma Jeza e-Gilead.

Amo̩maye-wñ ku ma chʼamagbiti che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji nyʼogume̩lu chʼicham, amata ku ma dʼoji dufu. Defid onu mʼuma ko chʼamafejute̩ abo Rube̩n kpʼabo Gad kpʼukpe̩reji o̩lo̩pu abo Manasa, ugbo e̩wñ e-O̩jo̩ okoke du kpai todu e̩wñ onu ge̩.

Oñ aluka amo̩ma Israe̩l jo̩-i, owñ chʼabogijo ku ma dʼoji dufu kpai amagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, kpai one̩ ogume̩lu, ogume̩lu kpʼamako̩takada ku ma re̩ onu ef e̩wñ du ugbo ukpe̩ru ukpe̩ru amone̩ ku ma lewa lelo ochu ochu, ochu du ki dʼef o̩do̩; ukpe̩ru okoke du nʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩.
E̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩da abo uche̩ ejodudu ku ma nʼochu ejodudu che Jasho̩be̩am o̩ma Zabdie̩l; abo ukpe̩ru e-wñ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩.
E̩ne̩ ki dʼef amo̩ma Pire̩z i che, i chʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼoji dufu ef amagboji abogu chaka ochu ejodudu le̩.
Oñ ukpe̩ru-ma ochu ekeji jʼef o̩wo̩ Dodai, e̩ne̩ Ahoa, Miklot ño̩ nʼo̩da ef abo uche̩ e-wñ ge̩. Abo uche̩-wñ ño̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ ge̩.
Agbo̩-ji abogu e̩ke̩ta todu ochu e̩ke̩ta che Be̩naya o̩ma Jiho̩yada, atama kʼi dʼoji dufu i che. Abo uche̩ e-wñ la chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩.
Be̩naya le̩ chʼe-ki chʼagbiti ef abo ogue̩gwa le̩, owñ laño̩ nʼo̩da abo ogue̩gwa le̩. Ammaizabad o̩ma-wñ la dʼef abo uche̩ e-wñ.
E̩ne̩ e̩ke̩le̩ tod ochu e̩ke̩le̩ chʼAzahe̩l, o̩maye Jo̩ab. Ze̩badaya o̩ma-wñ la ro̩no. One̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ la jʼef uche̩ e-wñ.
Agboji e̩ke̩lu tod ochu e̩ke̩lu che Shamhut, e̩ne̩ Izra le̩. One̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ la jʼef uche̩ e-wñ ge̩.
E̩ne̩ e̩ke̩fa tod ochu e̩ke̩fa che Aira, o̩ma Ikke̩sh, e̩ne̩ Te̩ko̩a. One̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ la jʼef uche̩ e-wñ.
E̩ne̩ e̩kebie tod ochu e̩kebie che Hile̩z e̩ne̩ Pilo̩n, kʼi dʼef amo̩ma Ifraim. Abo uche̩ e-wñ la chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩.
E̩ne̩ e̩ke̩jo̩ tod ochu e̩ke̩jo̩ che Sibe̩kai, e̩ne̩ Husha e-abo Ze̩ra. Abo uche̩ e-wñ la chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩.
E̩ne̩ e̩ke̩la tod ochu e̩ke̩la chʼAbieze̩r e̩ne̩ Anato̩t e-abo Be̩njamin. One̩ ki la jʼef uche̩ e-wñ che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩.
E̩ne̩ e̩ke̩gwa tod ochu e̩ke̩gwa che Maharai, e̩ne̩ Ne̩to̩f, kʼi dʼef abo Ze̩ra. One̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ la jʼef abo uche̩ e-wñ.
E̩ne̩ e̩ke̩gwaka tod ochu e̩ke̩gwaka che Be̩naya e̩ne̩ Paireto̩n kʼi dʼef amo̩ma Ifraim. One̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ la jʼef uche̩ e-wñ.
E̩ne̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩ji tod ochu e̩ke̩gwe̩ji che He̩ldai e̩ne̩ Ne̩to̩f kʼi dʼef abo O̩tnie̩l. One̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ la jʼef uche̩ e-wñ ge̩.
Abo kʼabo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l jʼef o̩wo̩-ma che; e̩nuto̩gba abo Rube̩n chʼE̩lieza, o̩ma Zikri, e-abo Simeo̩n che She̩fataya, o̩ma Maaka;
e-abo Lifai che Hashabaya o̩ma Kemue̩l; e-abo Aro̩n che Zedo̩k;
e-abo Juda che E̩laihiu, o̩maye Defid oka; e̩ne̩ Isakar che O̩mri, o̩ma Maike̩l;
e̩ne̩ Ze̩biulo̩n che Ishmaya, o̩ma Obadaya; e̩ne̩ Naftali che Je̩re̩mot, o̩ma Azrie̩l;
E̩ne̩ amo̩ma Ifraim che Ho̩shiya, o̩ma Azazaya; e̩ne̩ ukpe̩reji abo̩lo̩pu Manasa che Joe̩l, o̩ma Pe̩daya;
e̩ne̩ ukpe̩re̩ji abo Manasa ku ma jo̩ Gilead che Ido, o̩ma Ze̩karaya; e̩ne̩ Be̩njamin che Jeasie̩l, o̩ma Abina;
e̩ne̩ Dan che Azaril, o̩ma Je̩roham. Abo le̩ chʼamagboji o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l.
Defid muda kaluka abo kʼo̩do̩-ma ma jo̩ ogu n, todabu ku Jihofa ka kʼi aje̩ ñw uwewe abo Israe̩l ki dab ilawo ojale.
Jo̩ab, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, chane̩ ekaluka ma, i muda gbaluka kpa n. Oñ uwe̩do̩ lewa bʼIsrae̩l ma tod e̩wñ le̩. Ma la ko̩ aluka-wñ nyʼo̩takada Iko Iko E̩wñ e-Defid onu n.

E̩wñ akoko onu la jʼef o̩wo̩ Azmefe̩t, o̩ma Adie̩l. Oñ unyi unyi ugbo ku ma kʼe̩wñ jo̩ egbili, kpʼe-ki jʼewo ewo kpʼe-ki jʼadogbe, adogbe, kpʼe-ki jʼef o̩do̩go̩ o̩do̩go̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ Jo̩natan, o̩ma Uzaya.
Oñ abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ oko ku ma lʼuche̩-wñ jʼef o̩wo̩ E̩zra, o̩ma Kilub,
Uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma la jʼef o̩wo̩ Shimeai, o̩ma Remat. Oñ e̩wñ oko achiwebe̩te̩ma ku ma ko wʼunyi kpʼugbo ku ma kʼomi-wñ jo̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ Zabdi, e̩ne̩ Shiñna.
Oli o̩lif kpai oli sika-mo̩r ki jʼane̩ o̩go̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ Beal-hanan, e̩ne̩ Ge̩dir. Oñ ugbo ku ma kʼekpo jo̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ Joash,
ujo̩ ujo̩ amokuno̩ ku ma jʼije̩ Sharo̩n jʼef o̩wo̩ Shitreai, e̩ne̩ Sharo̩n. Oñ ujo̩ ujo̩ amokuno̩ ku ma jo̩ o̩go̩ o̩go̩ la jʼef o̩wo̩ Shafat o̩ma Adlai,
Aminyakulumi la jʼef o̩wo̩ Obil, e̩ne̩ Ishmae̩l. Amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ la jʼef o̩wo̩ Je̩de̩ya, e̩ne̩ Me̩ronot, oñ ame̩wño̩re̩ egini la jʼef o̩wo̩ Jeziz e̩ne̩ Hagir.
Abo-i du chʼabo ku ma nʼo̩da ane̩ ki Defid onu ne̩.
Oñ Jo̩natan, o̩me̩nyi Defid, chʼe̩no̩hiala, e̩ne̩ ki mʼoji e̩wñ i che, kpʼako̩takada. Je̩hie̩l, o̩ma Hakmonai, la dʼugbo amo̩ma onu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩.
Ahito̩fe̩l la chʼe̩no̩hiala onu. Hushai, e̩ne̩ Arki, la chʼonuku onu
E̩ne̩ ki rone Ahito̩fe̩l che Jiho̩yada, o̩ma Be̩naya, kpʼAbiatar. Onu ogu tod onu che Jo̩ab.

Taku Defid kʼamagboji Israe̩l chaka wa jeju Je̩rusale̩m owñ chʼamagboji o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma kpʼamagboji ukpe̩ru ukperu amone̩ ku ma che e̩wñ ñw onu kpʼamagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, kpʼamagboji one̩ ogume̩lu, ogume̩lu, kpʼabo ku ma nʼo̩da ane̩ kpʼame̩wñ ukpa kʼonu kpʼamo̩ma-wñ ne̩, manyʼamonoji kpʼamagbiti kpʼame̩nuwohi chaka.

Taku Defid onu mʼe̩re̩-wñ ko dʼane̩ dago, oñ i kakini, Me̩ gbʼo̩la-mi, amo̩maye-mi kpʼabo-mi: I chʼe-mi, i dʼe̩do̩-mi kʼu fʼunyi uñmi ko̩ tod akpati alo Jihofa, kpai todu e̩wñ uke̩re̩no e-O̩jo̩-wa; u la fʼo̩la unyi le̩ eko̩ mu.
O̩jo̩ muda ka ñwu mi kakini, Uwe̩ akʼunyi tod odu-mi n, todabu kʼuwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ogu e̩ja, kʼe̩ la dʼe̩bie̩ dafo.

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, Jihofa O̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l fʼumi chi kwef abo unyi ata-mi chaka kʼu chʼonu ki anʼo̩da Israe̩l ogbegbele̩. Todu i fu Juda chi todu kʼi chʼe̩nuto̩gba; oñ ef unyi abo Juda, ef unyi ata-mi, ef amo̩ma ata-mi omi nyʼo̩ eju kʼi dʼumi jʼonu abo Israe̩l chaka.
Oñ ef amo̩ma-mi chaka (todu Jihofa mʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ wewe ko ñwu mi me̩). I fu So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩ma-mi chi kʼi gugu oj ede o̩fe̩ ojane̩ Jihofa kʼabo Israe̩l ki jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ.
I la ka ñwu mi kakini, So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma-we̩, owñ le̩ akʼunyi-mi kpʼologbo ologbo-mi; todu omi fʼowñ chi kʼi chʼo̩ma e-mi, omi la achʼata-wñ.
Omi la afʼo̩fe̩ ojane̩-wñ lonyane̩ ogbegbele̩, iche̩wñ kʼi gwo̩nyʼuko̩ uko̩ kʼu te̩ kpʼoj ajo̩ kʼu kpa kpaka kʼi che teju-wñ alu ki de̩ eñini-i.

Todule̩, abajo̩-i, eju abo Israe̩l chaka, owñ chʼujeju Jihofa-i kpʼugbo kʼO̩jo̩ agbʼo̩-i me̩ fejute̩, me̩ ño̩ tejane̩ uko̩ du ku Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ te̩, todu kʼame̩ ki ne̩ ane̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩-i kʼame̩ ki la tʼo̩ no̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ogu amo̩ma-me̩ ubi-me̩ ogbegbele̩.

I la chʼuwe̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma-mi, uwe̩ ki fʼO̩jo̩ ata-we̩ ma, kʼe̩ nʼe̩do̩ ki mufu kpʼibe kolokolo rʼo̩; todu Jihofa atejane̩ ef e̩do̩ okoke du; i la chema ibe du kʼone̩ akpe̩. Uwe̩ tene owñ. I aje̩ ñw e̩ liʼu. E̩ muda hiʼu tinyo̩, i adʼuwe̩ tinyo̩ ogbegbele̩.
E̩ fʼo̩la mu; todu Jihofa fʼuwe̩ chi kʼe̩ kʼunyi tod uña kiafo̩ le̩; fʼeju gbiti, kʼe̩ che.

Taku Defid mʼe̩wñ ujiwe alu kʼagbaru le̩ ade̩ du ñw o̩ma-wñ So̩lo̩mo̩n kpʼe-unyi unyi-wñ kpʼunyi unyi e̩wñ akoko-wñ kpʼe-e̩ko̩da unyi ojale-wñ kpʼe̩ko̩da unyi-wñ ejefu, kpʼunyi ugugu e̩wñ unyie̩do̩ le̩;
kpujiwe alu kʼe̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ lef Afu ade̩, tod ologbo ologbo unyi Jihofa kpʼe̩ko̩da unyi-wñ ki lʼo daka chaka, ugbo ku ma akʼe̩wñ akoko unyi O̩jo̩ jo, kpai tod e̩wñ akoko ku ma ko jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩
kpai tod ukpe̩ru amatama kpʼabo Lifai aro̩ne aro̩ne kpai tod uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ef unyi Jihofa chaka kpai tod e̩wñ eku du ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ ef unyi Jihofa.
Alu kʼuwoji o̩jamalia de̩ tod e̩wñ eku du ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ ojoji ojoji chaka; alu kʼuwoji ajifa de̩ tod e̩wñ eku du ku ma ne che e̩wñ ojoji ojoji du.
Uwoji akete o̩jamalia kpʼagege-wñ de̩ ge̩; kpʼuwoji o̩jamalia tod akete okoke du kpʼagege-wñ, kpʼuwoji ajifa todu aketeʼka kpʼagege-wñ chʼalu ku ma nʼe̩ akete okoke du che e̩wñ.
Uwoji o̩jamalia tod itebulu okoke ku ma tʼakala jʼoji-wñ, kpʼajifa tod itebulu ajifa du,
kpʼo̩jamalia hiolo tod ukp-wñ ku ma du ta tʼe̩la kpʼugba-wñ kpʼago-wñ, tod ugba o̩jamalia le̩, uwoji okoke-wñ chʼeñwa e̩bo̩; tod ugba e-ajifa, uwoji okoke-wñ chʼeñwa e̩bo̩ ge̩.
Todu ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ otulale i nʼo̩jamalia ku ma gwe̩ ku ma fʼu ñwa oj e̩bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ kʼi awo̩li-wñ tod o̩kogu e-o̩jamalia chʼamiche̩rub ku ma fʼika-ma nadala ku ma bʼoj akpati alo Jihofa ma.
E̩wñ-i du ma je̩ ñwu mi mʼoji-wñ ef olubutu lugbo o̩wo̩ Jihofa ki dʼoji-mi, owñ chʼuko̩lo̩ du ku ma ache alu kʼuwo̩li-i de̩.

Taku Defid ka ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩ma-wñ kakini, Feju gbiti kʼe̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, kʼe̩ fʼu che. E̩ ki railo n, e̩do̩-we̩ ki da kpu n; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ e-mi, dʼugbo we̩; i aje̩ ñw e̩ gwegbo n, i ahi uwe̩ tinyo̩ n, gbogbo tak uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche tod unyi Jihofa ki takpa.

E̩ la go, ukpe̩ru amatama kpʼabo Lifai chʼutod e̩wñ eche ef unyi O̩jo̩ chaka. Oñ e̩numo̩la du kʼi chʼo̩ka uko̩lo̩ adʼugbo we̩ ugbo uko̩lo̩ ojoji ojoji du, alu du kʼe̩wñ eche de̩. Amagboji kpʼamone̩-i chaka ñʼakʼo̩la-ma ñw e̩ ku ma che alu du kʼe̩ ñwa ñwu ma.

Taku Defid onu ka ñw abo ujeju le̩ chaka kakini, So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma-mi, e̩ne̩ kate kʼO̩jo̩ chi-i, chʼimo̩to̩ ta, o̩wo̩-wñ gbo n, uko̩lo̩-i la tabale; tod unyi ojima-i achʼutodu one̩ n, chai todu Jihofa O̩jo̩.

Abe̩le̩ u fʼo̩la mu tane̩ tod unyi O̩jo̩-mi, alu du kʼo̩wo̩ bo̩jo̩ kade, o̩jamalia do̩mo̩ tod e̩wñ o̩jamalia, ajifa do̩mo̩ tod e̩wñ ajifa, ebijeikpa do̩mo̩ tod e̩wñ ebije ikpa, ebije do̩mo̩ tod e̩wñ ebije, oli la do̩mo̩ tod e̩wñ oli, manyʼe-le̩ okuta one̩ks do̩mo̩ kpʼokuta ku ma da e̩wñ nyʼu, kpʼokuta o̩tajele, kpʼokuta kʼina-wñ chʼojoji ojoji, kpʼokuta akoko ojoji ojoji chaka, kpʼokuta marbe̩l e̩kute̩.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, todabu kʼunyi O̩jo̩-mi chʼewʼumi eju, omi mʼe̩wñ o̩jamalia kpʼajifa e-mi onugo ko wa tod unyi O̩jo̩-mi, e-le̩ nʼoji e̩wñ du kʼu ñwo̩che jo̩ tod unyi kiafo̩ le̩ ojoji,
tale̩nt e-o̩jamalia-wñ che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta, owñ chʼo̩jamalia Ofir, ajifa-wñ ku ma gwe̩ la che tale̩nt icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ mebie ku ma du lamʼo̩do̩ unyi unyi le̩.
O̩jamalia do̩mo̩ tod e̩wñ o̩jamalia, ajifa la do̩mo̩ tod e̩wñ ajifa, tod uko̩lo̩ du kʼabo ku ma chʼo̩ka-wñ ache. Mak e̩ne̩ agʼe̩do̩ o̩la-wñ adʼo̩la-wñ wa kʼe̩wñ nyʼo̩wo̩ e̩ko̩ ñw Jihofa eñini ta?

Tak abo ku ma dʼoji dufu unyi unyi amata-ma kpʼame̩nuto̩gba abo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l, kpʼamagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, kpʼone̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu, manyʼabo ku ma chʼamagboji uko̩lo̩ onu, gʼe̩do̩ o̩la-ma kʼe̩wñ wa.

Oñ e̩wñ ku ma ko wa tod uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ugbo unyi O̩jo̩ che, o̩jamalia-wñ che tale̩nt icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu kpai darik icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa; e-ajifa la che tale̩nt icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa, ebije ikpa che tale̩nt icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩, kpʼebije̩ ofo tale̩nt icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogume̩lu.
Tak abo ku ma nʼokuta akoko mʼu ko wa unyi e̩wñ akoko unyi Jihofa ki dʼef o̩wo̩ Jehie̩l e̩ne̩ Ge̩rsho̩n le̩.
Tak amone̩ le̩ kwoyo̩ todabu ku ma gʼe̩dʼo̩la-ma ko wa. Todu ma nʼe̩do̩ ki mufu akʼo wa kpʼe̩do̩-ma ñwu Jihofa. Defid, ki chʼonu, ño̩ nʼuyo̩ lile ayo̩ ge̩.
Todule̩ Defid nʼele Jihofa aka eju abo ujeju le̩ chaka, oñ Defid kakini, Uwe̩, ki nʼele, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, ata-wa, tʼogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa.

Uwe̩, O Jihofa nʼunana-wñ kpʼukpahiu-wñ kpʼojima-wñ kpʼugbiñmi-wñ, kpʼe̩gahi-wñ inaina, todu uwe̩, ne̩ e̩wñ du ki jʼefojale kpʼane̩-ile̩; o̩da ojane̩-wñ uwe̩ ne̩, O Jihofa, oñ uwe̩ dʼatate̩ ñw e̩wñ du kʼe̩ chʼoji.
Tʼe̩wñ anana, tʼojima kwʼugbo we̩, uwe̩ la nʼo̩da e̩wñ du; ukpahiu kpʼugbiti jʼef o̩wo̩-we̩. Echʼe̩wñ du ki nana, kpʼedʼukpahiu ñw e̩wñ du la dʼef o̩wo̩-we̩.
Todule̩, O̩jo̩-wa, a agogbodʼuwe̩ abajo̩-i, a la aje̩nyu ñw odu-we̩ ki nʼojima.
E̩ne̩ omi muda che? Abo e-mi la che̩ne̩? kʼawa neke gʼe̩dʼo̩la-wa kʼe̩wñ wa abe̩-i? Todu e̩wñ du kwʼugbo we̩ wa, e̩wñ ki la kwʼef o̩wo̩ e-we̩ wa oñ a ko ñw e̩-i.
Todu amilowa oñ a che o̩gba-we̩; a chʼabane̩ omune̩ alu kʼamata-wa de̩. O̩jo̩ ukpo̩kpe̩-wa ile̩-i la dab ojiji e̩wñ. I la nʼukibeno du n.
O Jihofa O̩jo-wa, e̩wñ e̩kute̩ kʼa ñwo̩che jo̩-i todu kʼa kʼunyi ñw e̩ tod odu-we̩ kiafo̩ kwʼef o̩wo̩ e-we̩ wa, uwe̩ la nʼo̩chaka-wñ.

O̩jo̩-mi, omi chema ka kʼuwe̩ ajʼe̩do̩ one̩ ma, e̩wñ o̩kpakpa la cherʼuwe̩ e̩do̩. I chʼe-mi, ef o̩kpakpa e̩do̩-mi oñ u gʼe̩dʼo̩la-mi akʼe̩wñ-i du wa; fa-i u ño̩ nʼuyo̩ li abo-we̩, kʼeju-ma jʼane̩ emi, ku ma gʼe̩dʼo̩la-ma akʼe̩wñ wa ñw e̩.
O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Ebraham kpʼe-Aise̩k kpʼe-Israe̩l, amata-wa le̩, e̩ ki fejutʼe̩wñ-i kʼi dʼef ibe ki dʼe̩do̩ abo-we̩ ku ma kpe̩ ogbegbele̩, kʼe̩ la fʼe̩do̩-ma lonyane̩ rʼuwe̩.
E̩ ki la dʼe̩do̩ ki mufu ñw o̩ma-mi, So̩lo̩mo̩n, todu kʼi fʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ ñwate̩, kpʼo̩la ibenu-we̩ kpʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-we̩ de, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ-i du che, kʼi ño̩ fʼunyi ojima kʼu fʼane̩-wñ kpama-i ko̩.
Taku Defid ka ñw abo ujeju le̩ chaka kakini, Me̩ kele Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ fa-i ke. Tak abo ujeju le̩ chaka kele Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-amata-ma, oñ ma fʼoji dalo̩, ma la dojikane̩ ñwu Jihofa, kpai onu.

Oñ ma fʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ kpa ñwu Jihofa; tak o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa ñwu Jihofa, amo̩ko̩kuno̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, amokolo chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, amo̩mala la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, manyʼiche̩bo̩ omi-ma kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩kute̩ tod abo Israe̩l chaka.
Oñ ma nʼe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ aje̩ añmo̩ eju Jihofa o̩jo̩ le̩.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n kwogugu oj ede Jihofa kʼi chʼonu koji Defid, ata-wñ, i la ra ñw u. Abo Israe̩l du la gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩.
Tak amagboji chaka kpʼamagbiti kpʼamo̩ma Defid du fʼo̩la-ma kamuhite̩ ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu le̩.
Oñ Jihofa du ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼi ehʼe̩ne̩ lile tabale eju abo Israe̩l chaka. I la mʼe̩gahi onu du ñw u e-kʼonu Israe̩l du ki je̩ o̩gba-wñ ma ne̩ mama ta n.
Abu ku Defid, o̩ma Je̩si, chʼonu abo Israe̩l chaka le̩ de̩.
Oñ iko kʼi jʼonu Israe̩l chʼo̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji. I je̩ o̩do̩ mebie He̩bro̩n, i la je̩ Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩ta.
Tak e̩gba kʼi chʼogijo nyo̩nyo̩ i ku, o̩jo̩-wñ kpʼanana-wñ kpʼojima-wñ jo̩ kpa. Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ e̩wñ du ki Defid che, akwʼejodudu gbogbo tʼe-otitala, go, ina-bali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Samiue̩l, agane̩ le, kpʼef o̩takada Netan akache̩, kpʼef o̩takada Gad, agane̩ le̩,
manyʼo̩la onu-wñ chaka kpʼukpahiu-wñ kpʼiko iko ki lale oji-wñ kpʼoji abo Israe̩l, kpʼoji ojane̩ ojane̩ ane̩ ojoji ojoji chaka.
Oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩ma Defid fʼe̩rane̩ ne̩ ojane̩-wñ le̩ alo waa, Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wñ la dʼugbo-wñ. Oñ i dʼowñ chʼe̩ne̩ lile tabale.

Oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n ko̩la ñw abo Israe̩l chaka, i ko̩la ñw amagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, kpʼone̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu, kpʼamakajo̩ kpʼamidachi du ki jʼoj ane̩ Israe̩l, owñ chʼamata ku ma dʼoji dufu.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n manyʼabo ujeju le̩ chaka nyʼugbo otete ki de̩ Gibeo̩n; todu o̩mo̩ unyabo ujeju e-O̩jo̩ ku Mose̩s, adu Jihofa, che ef aje̩tachi le̩ de̩.
(Defid muda dʼakpati O̩jo̩ kwo Kiriat-jearira wʼugbo ki Defid ñwo̩che te̩ ñw u e̩gbale̩ me̩; todu i fʼunyabo fa tod uwñ Je̩rusale̩m.)
Anubile̩ ge̩, ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-ebijeikpa ku Be̩zale̩l o̩ma Uri o̩ma He̩r che dʼo̩gba uña ugugu Jihofa o̩mo̩; oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n kpʼabo ujeju le̩ tene Jihofa ugbo-wñ.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n mute̩gu nyʼugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ebije-ikpa ki dʼugbo unyabo ujeju o̩gba Jihofa o̩mo̩, oñ i kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ wa che oji-wñ.
Odu o̩jo̩ le̩ O̩jo̩ kwotejugede ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩ bi mi e̩wñ kʼu nadʼu ñw e̩.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, E̩ dʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ nana ña ata-mi. Defid me̩, e̩ laño̩ du mi jʼonu koji-wñ.
Fai, O Jihofa O̩jo̩, e̩wñ kʼe̩ katane̩ ñwu Defid, ata-mi, ki dago kpaka; todu uwe̩ mʼumi du jʼonu amone̩ ku ma wewe dab ebutu ane̩pe̩te.
Fai uwe̩ ki dʼibe ñwu mi kpʼe̩wñ ema, kʼu lelo lewa o̩gba amone-i; todu e̩ne̩ neke kajo̩ abo̩-we̩ ki tabale-i?

Tak O̩jo̩ ka ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n kakini, Todabu kʼe̩wñ-i dʼe̩do̩-we̩, kʼe̩ ma la bi e̩wñ anana kpʼidu kpʼojima kpʼoji abo ku ma chʼulaka-we̩ n, e̩ la bi ojolugbo n, chai ibe kpʼe̩wñ ema kʼe̩ ne̩ kajo̩ abo-mi e-kʼomi dʼuwe̩ jʼonu-ma oñ e̩ bi;
u mʼibe kpai e̩wñ ema ko ñw e̩ me̩; u lañʼakʼe̩wñ anana kpʼidu kpʼojima ñw e̩ alu kʼamonu du ku ma je̩ o̩gba we̩ ma ne̩ mama n, e̩ne̩ du kʼi aje̩ ubi we̩ la ane̩ e̩go̩-wñ n.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n kwo bʼotete ki de̩ Gibeo̩n te̩ akwo o̩gba unyabo ujeju le̩ wa Je̩rusale̩m; oñ i jʼonu abo Israe̩l.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼo̩kogu kpʼa-mananya wa jo̩. I la nʼo̩kogu icham nyʼulo̩gwa kpʼamananya icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji kʼi ko jʼewo o̩kogu kpʼugbo onu Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ onu che kʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia ki jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m dabe̩ne̩ kʼokuta. I la che kʼoli sida ki wewe jo̩ dab oli sikamo̩r ane̩ o̩go̩.
Amanya ku So̩lo̩mo̩n ne̩ ma ko kwʼ ljipti kpai Kue. Amanyaja onu mʼuma gba la Kue.
Ma nʼo̩kogu kwʼIjipti wa o̩ko̩ ajifa ulo̩gwa; aja anya la chʼolime̩ta. Abe̩le̩ ma ne̩ wa lʼo̩wo̩-ma añw amonu abo He̩t du kpʼamonu Siria ge̩.
Oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n mʼe̩do̩ du tʼunyi eko̩ tod odu Jihofa kpʼunyi tod o̩fe̩ ojane̩-wñ.

Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼaboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e̩te̩gwa kaluka jo̩ ku ma nʼadu, kpʼaboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ ku ma fʼokuta da ane̩ uwo, kpʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta nyʼulo̩gwa ku ma fejute̩ ma.
Oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ru Huram, onu Taya, kakini, Alu kʼe̩ che kpai Defid, ata-mi, kʼe̩ la kʼoli sida kpuche̩ rʼu kʼi fʼunyi ko̩ ñw o̩la-wñ ki agugu, e̩ che abe̩le̩ kpʼomi.

Go, omi ache kʼu kʼunyi tod odu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-mi, kʼu mʼu du te̩ ñw u, kʼu fʼotulale e̩rinyo̩ gujo o̩gba-wñ, kpʼutod akala e-eju ki chʼo̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩, kpʼutodu iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-odudu kpʼane̩ kpʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi kpʼe̩gba kʼochu ne etito̩ kpʼe̩gba uje̩wñ uyo̩ e-Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa kʼiko-wñ che̩date̩. E-le̩ chʼogbegbele̩ ñw abo Israe̩l.
Oñ unyi kʼu nako̩-i chʼinaina; todu O̩jo̩-wa chʼinaina tʼamo̩jo̩ du le.
E̩ne̩ muda nʼukpahiu kʼi akʼunyi ñw u? Abu kʼefojale kpʼefojale e-efojale ma bo̩jo̩ kʼi agbʼo̩ n? Mak e̩ne̩ omi che kʼomi akʼunyi ñw u? Chai todu otulale egujo o̩gba-wñ ofo.

Todule̩ fai e̩ fʼone̩ ki chʼo̩ka uko̩lo̩ o̩jamalia kpʼajifa kpʼebije ikpa kpʼebije dudu kpʼukpo odufa ekpikpa kpʼe-ekpikpa kpʼe-odufa, kʼi la ma alu ku ma kina nyʼe̩wñ ojoji ojoji kpe̩ wa ñwu mi kʼi dʼugbo amo̩ka ku ma jʼugbo-mi Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m, owñ chʼabo ku Defid ata-mi ko ma jo̩.
E̩ ki ño̩ kʼoli sida kpʼoli fe̩r kpʼoli algum kwʼefoko Le̩bano̩n kpuche̩ wa ñwu mi, todu u che ma ka kʼabuko̩lo̩-we̩ chemeju oli Le̩bano̩n ekpana. E̩ la go, abuko̩lo̩ e-mi la ajʼugbo abuko̩lo̩-we̩,
owñ chʼutodu ku ma ñw oli che ñwu mi e̩kute̩, todu unyi kʼu na che kʼu ko̩-i atabale, awuwu-wñ agbe̩.

E̩ la go, omi akʼe̩ñwa o̩ka wit e̩gwu ko̩r icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu, kpʼe̩ñwa barli kor icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu, kpʼomi achi-webete̩ma otube̩ lile icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu, kpʼekpo o̩lif otube lile icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu ñw abuko̩lo̩-we̩ amakpoli na ku ma fʼoli le̩.
Taku Huram, onu Taya, mʼohi-wñ danyʼo̩takada, oñ i mʼe-le̩ du kpuche̩ ru So̩lo̩mo̩n, i kakini, Todabu ki Jihofa fe̩do̩ abo-wñ i mʼuwe̩ du chʼonu-ma.

Huram ño̩ ka kakini, Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l kʼi che efojale kpʼane̩ ile̩-i, kʼi ño̩ dʼo̩ma anibe kʼi ache e̩wñ ibe ibe kʼi la mʼoji e̩wñ ñwu Defid onu, todu kʼi kʼunyi ñwu Jihofa kpʼunyi tod o̩fe̩ ojane̩-wñ le̩, ki nele.
Fai u la fu Huram Abi kʼi chʼone̩ kʼi chʼo̩ka kʼoji e̩wñ ema dʼefu-wñ kpuche̩ wa le̩.

Owñ chʼo̩ma onobule̩ ki dʼef amo̩ma Dan, ata-wñ la chʼabo Taya ki chʼo̩ka uko̩lo̩ o̩jamalia kpʼajifa kpʼebijeikpa kpʼebije dudu kpʼokuta kpʼoli kpʼodufa ekpikpa kpʼodufa kpʼukpo line̩n ku ma hi reju kpʼekpikpa kʼi laño̩ chʼo̩ka ina ojoji ojoji eko̩ nyʼe̩wñ kʼi ache teju alu du ku ma ñʼo̩ manyʼamo̩ka e-we̩, kpai manyʼamo̩ka odu-mi Defid, ata-we̩.
Fai i chʼe-o̩ka wit kpai barli kpʼekpo kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma kʼodu-mi ka le̩, i ki kʼo kpuche̩rʼamadu-wñ-i,
oñ a adʼoli kwʼefoko Le̩bano̩n wa; alu du kʼeku-wñ aku uwe̩; tak a akʼo ji mʼomune̩ kʼa la ko nʼej omi wʼugbo we̩ Jo̩pa; tak uwe̩ ane̩ te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼamage̩ne̩ du ku ma jʼoj ane̩ Israe̩l kaluka, alu ku Defid ata-wñ kʼuma aluka le̩; oñ ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oli me̩ta nyoke me̩ta nyʼulo̩gwa oji li.

Tak i kʼabo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ e̩te̩gwa ma jo̩ ku ma nʼadu, oñ i kʼabo-ma icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ chʼamadoli oj uwo uwo; oñ i kʼabo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta nyʼulo̩gwa oji jo̩ ku ma fejute̩ ma ku ma kpʼuko̩lo̩ ñwu ma.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n chane̩ ekʼunyi Jihofa Je̩rusale̩m oj uwo Moraya, ugbo kʼi kwotejugede ñwu Defid, ata-wñ. Ugbo ki Defid bu te̩ oj ajita ugwo̩ka e-O̩rnan e̩ne̩ Je̩bius le̩.
Oñ i chane̩ ekʼo̩ o̩jo̩ kʼochu ekeji nʼolu meji, o̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ki jʼo̩fe̩.
E̩re̩ unyi ki So̩lo̩mo̩n du nyʼane̩ todu ki ko̩ unyi O̩jo̩ le̩ de̩; ujiji-wñ chʼohiba o̩gbo̩ me̩ta, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohiba ogu; ohiba igbele le̩ ma ne̩ ñwa.
Ujiji agbaru ki dʼo̩gba-wñ chʼohiba ogu; alu kʼunabe̩ unyi de̩, o̩gba-wñ la chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa; i la kʼo̩jamalia hiolo lamo̩ ejefu-wñ.
Oñ i nʼoli fe̩r rʼo̩pata unyi ki tule, tak i kʼo̩jamalia hiolo lamo̩ e-le̩, oñ i nʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ kpai iyagba chʼo̩ñwe̩ nyʼu.
Tak i nʼokuta akoko chʼo̩ñwe̩ nyʼunyi le̩ ki chʼuto̩; o̩jamalia-wñ chʼo̩jamalia Par-feim.
I ño̩ kʼo̩jamalia lamo̩ unyi ge̩, tʼoli igbo̩-wñ, tʼoli alugbo̩na-wñ, tʼo̩do̩-wñ, oli ugbo̩na-wñ, oñ i fʼamiche̩rub ko̩ nyʼo̩lo̩do̩-wñ.
Tak i fʼunyi efo̩ e-efo̩ ko̩; ujiji-wñ chʼalu kʼunabe̩ unyi le̩ de̩, owñ chʼohiba o̩gu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohiba o̩gu; tak i kʼo̩jamalia ki de̩ hiolo alu tale̩nt ulo̩gwa lamʼo̩.
Uwoji ale-wñ che she̩ke̩l o̩jamalia ooje. I ño̩ kʼo̩jamalia lamʼe̩ko̩da unyi ojale-wñ.
Tak i fʼamiche̩rub meji che dab ojibo ef unyi efo̩ e-efo̩ le̩. Ma la kʼo̩jamalia lamʼe-le̩ ge̩.
Ujiji ika, ika amiche̩rub le̩ la chʼohiba ogu; oka, ika-wñ oka chʼohiba me̩lu, oñ i te̩ kad o̩lo̩do̩ unyi; ika-wñ ekeji ño̩ chʼohiba me̩lu, oñ i te̩ kad ika iche̩rub ekeji.
Ika iche̩rub ekeji la chʼohiba me̩lu, i te̩ kad o̩lo̩do̩ unyi, oñ ika-wñ ekeji la chʼohiba me̩lu, oñ i tanyʼika iche̩rub ejo̩-dudu le̩.
Ika amiche̩rub-i nadala te̩ kad ohiba ogu; ma kʼe̩re̩ ma dʼane̩ dago, oñ ma kpʼeju-ma rʼunyi le̩.
I la nʼe̩wñ odufa kpʼekpikpa odufa kpʼekpikpa kpʼukpo line̩n ku ma hi rʼeju chʼukpo ugbeju, oñ i fʼamiche̩rub chenyʼu.
I la che e̩wñ meji ki dago waala jo̩ o̩gba unyi le̩, o̩gba-wñ chʼohiba ogue̩gwa nyʼo̩ke me̩lu, oñ ukata ki jʼoji-wñ okoke chʼohiba me̩lu.
Tak i fʼiyagba che ef unyi ejefu le̩ oñ i mʼu ko nʼoj e̩wñ ki dago waala le̩; tak i fu po̩me̩grane̩t ogu me̩lu che oñ i ko tatʼiyagba le̩.
Tak i kʼe̩wñ ki gba waala dago o̩gba unyi O̩jo̩, oka-wñ dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩, ekeji la dʼo̩wo̩ awohi; oñ i dʼodu e-ki dago o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ ko̩ Jakin, odu e-o̩wo̩ awohi ko̩ Boaz.
Ubile̩ i fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ebije ikpa che, ujiji-wñ chʼohiba ogu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohiba o̩gu, oñ o̩gba-wñ chʼohiba me̩gwa.
Tak i fʼohimini le̩ da. Akwʼalu-wñ ej emi tʼalu-wñ ej ano̩mo̩ chʼohiba me̩gwa, okokolo i che; o̩gba-wñ la chʼohiba me̩lu; kʼujiji iku ki alʼo de chʼohiba ogue̩gwa.
E̩wñ ki bi amokuno̩ jʼofe-wñ, ma la jo̩ alʼo daka, e̩gwa-wñ chʼohibaʼka, ma dʼohimini le̩ tejefu adonyʼu daka, ma fʼu da e̩re̩kate kpʼowñ.

I dago nʼubi amokuno̩ me̩gweji; e̩ta-wñ kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, e̩ta-wñ kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩lane̩, e̩ta-wñ kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, oñ e̩ta-wñ kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu. Ma la dʼohimini le̩ gugu ubi-ma ate̩, o̩fe-ma chaka jʼejefu.
Ukpa-wñ chʼo̩gabaʼka; ma fʼalu-wñ che dab eti alu ago, dabe̩ne̩ kʼododo lili. I agbʼomi otube̩ lile icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta.

1 ño̩ fʼukpachi ugwo̩wo̩ me̩gwa che. I la mʼe̩lu ko jʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩, oñ i mʼe̩lu ko̩ jʼo̩wo̩ awohi, ku ma gwo̩la ef uwñ; ma fʼe̩wñ du ku ma ñwo̩che tod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo larinyo̩ ef e-le̩; ohimini le̩ la chʼutodu kʼamatama ki gwo̩la ef uwñ.
Tak i fʼakete o̩jamalia me̩gwa che teju alu kʼo̩da-wñ de̩. Oñ i mʼu ko gugu ef unyi O̩jo̩, e̩lu jʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩, oñ e̩lu jʼo̩wo̩ awohi.
I ño̩ fʼitebulu me̩gwa che ge̩, oñ i mʼu ko jʼef unyi O̩jo̩. E̩lu-wñ jʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩, e̩lu-wñ la jʼo̩wo̩ awohi. Tak i nʼo̩jamalia fʼochibu ogu me̩lu che.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, i fʼologbo amatama che, kpʼologbo lile kpʼolugbana tod ologbo le̩; tak i kʼebije ikpa lamʼolugbana-wñ.
I la mʼohimini le̩ du gugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ owñ chʼo̩wo̩ olodudu alerʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩.
Oñ Huram fʼucha kpʼuko̩che̩ kpʼo̩chibu-wñ che. Abe̩le̩ Huram fʼuko̩lo̩ kʼi ache ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu, ef unyi O̩jo̩ le̩ kpoji.
Owñ chʼe̩wñ meji ki dago waala le̩ kpʼugba-wñ kpʼukata meji ki jʼoji e̩wñ meji ki dago waala le, kpʼiga meji ku ma ko bʼoji ugba meji e-ukata ki jʼoji e̩wñ ki dago waala le̩ ma,
kpai po̩me̩grane̩t ulo̩ko̩ tod iga meji le̩; po̩me̩grane̩t jʼo̩gba o̩gba meji tod igaʼka, kʼi bʼoji ugba ukata meji ki jʼoji e̩wñ ki dago waala le̩ ma.
I ño̩ fʼakete che, i la fʼukpachi ugwo̩wo̩ che gugu oji akete le̩.
Ohimini-wñ chʼoka, amokuno̩ me̩gweji jʼofe-wñ
kpʼucha ucha-wñ kpʼuko̩che̩-wñ, kpʼuko̩-wñ ku ma ko ta tʼe̩la, kpʼe̩wñ eku-wñ chaka, e-le̩ du Huram Abi nʼebije ikpa ki ade̩ che todu So̩lo̩mo̩n onu kpai todu unyi Jihofa.
Onu fʼe̩wñ le̩ da egbili Jo̩rdan ugbo ane̩ etulu agbagba Suko̩t kpai Ze̩re̩da.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼe̩wñ eku-i du che ki chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩ jo̩; todu ma neke ma uwoji ebijeikpa ku ma ne̩ che n.
So̩lo̩mo̩n la nʼo̩jamalia hiolo che e̩wñ eku du ki jʼef unyi O̩jo̩, kpʼubo̩ o̩jamalia le̩ ge̩, kpʼitebulu itebulu kʼakala e-eju le̩ jʼoji-wñ;
kpʼakete akete manyʼagege-wñ ki ajʼo̩gba unyi ejefu le̩ ajo alu kʼo̩da-wñ de̩.
Oñ ododo-wñ kpʼagege-wñ kpʼalapa-wñ chʼo̩jamalia, o̩jamalia-wñ la mufu kpa.

Oñ e̩wñ ku ma ne̩ kpʼuna lu le̩ kpʼochibu-wñ kpʼuko̩de̩-wñ kpʼigbeli-wñ chʼo̩jamalia hiolo ge̩. I la chʼe-ugbo ku ma gudu wʼef unyi le̩ owñ chʼolugbana e-ejefu tod uña kiafo̩ e-efo̩ le̩ kpʼolugbana unyi O̩jo̩ onugo, o̩jamalia i che chaka.

Abe̩le̩ uko̩lo̩ du ku So̩lo̩mo̩n che tod unyi Jihofa takpa. Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n mʼe̩wñ kʼata-wñ Defid ko jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩ ko wʼejefu-wñ; owñ chʼajifa-wñ kpʼo̩jamalia-wñ kpʼe̩wñ eku du, oñ i mʼu ko jʼef e̩wñ akoko e-unyi O̩jo̩.

Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼabo ki dʼoji dufu Israe̩l kpʼamagboji o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu owñ chʼamidachi ef abogijo amo̩ma Israe̩l, wa jeju Je̩rusale̩m, ku ma dʼakpati alo Jihofa kwʼef ewo Defid, ki che Zayo̩n le̩, te̩gu wa.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka kʼo̩la-ma wa jeju ugbo onu ugbo uje̩wñ uyo̩ ki de̩ ochu ekebie le̩.
Oñ abogijo Israe̩l du wa tak abo Lifai mʼakpati le̩ du;
oñ ma mʼakpati le̩ kpʼunyabo ujeju kpʼe̩wñ eku kiafo̩ du ki jʼef unyabo le̩ ko wa; amatama, ku ma chʼabo Lifai, mʼabʼe-le̩ ko te̩gu wa.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu, kpʼabo ujeju Israe̩l chaka ku ma jʼo̩gba akpati le̩ kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpʼamokumo̩ ku ma ma neke ka aluka uwewe-ma n kpa ñw u.
Tak amatama mʼakpati alo Jihofa du wʼejefu agugu uña-wñ, owñ chʼejefu unyi le̩, tʼuña kiafo̩ e-efo̩ ofe ika amiche̩rub le̩.
Amiche̩rub la fʼika-ma nadala abʼoji uña akpati le̩ ma, oñ amiche̩rub bʼakpati le̩ kpʼoli ugbolo-wñ ki jʼate̩-wñ ma.
Ujiji oli ugbolo le̩ je̩ ñwu ma li oj oli ugbo̩lo̩ le̩ ugbo akpati ki dʼo̩gba unyi ejefu le̩; ma muda jʼo̩do̩da aliʼi n. I la jʼo̩mo̩ gbogbo tʼeñini.
E̩wñ du dʼef akpati le̩ n chai alo meji ku Mose̩s ko jʼo̩mo̩ Hore̩b e̩gba ki Jihofa kpʼalo kpʼamo̩ma Israe̩l, e̩gba ku ma kwʼIjipti wa le̩.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼamatama kwʼef uña kiafo̩ le̩ dufu, (todu amatama du kʼeju-ma dʼane̩ o̩mo̩ fʼo̩la-ma che ki fo, ma la nyeti alu kʼukpe̩-ma de̩ aro̩ne aro̩ne n;

kpʼabo Lifai ku ma chʼamakeli, owñ chʼo̩chaka abo Esaf kpʼabo Heman kpʼabo Jedutun kpʼamo̩ma-ma kpʼamo̩maye-ma kʼukpo line̩n ku ma hi reju dʼo̩la-ma, nʼoke kpʼubo̩ kpʼumolo dago jo̩ ugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ, oñ amatama o̩gbo̩ me̩fanʼo̩kakachi afa manyʼuma o̩la.

I lewatu, e̩gba kʼalu abo ku ma fʼo̩kakachi kpʼabo ku ma keli dabe̩ne̩ kʼalu okate, kʼomu-ma chʼoka kʼamone̩ agbo̩ abu ku ma aje̩nyu ku ma la gogbodo̩ Jihofa,) kpʼe̩gba ku ma chʼomu-ma nyʼate̩, manyʼo̩kakachi kpʼoke kpʼe̩wñ iya ku ma ne̩ keli ku ma je̩nyu ñwu Jihofa ma kakini,
Amatama la nekʼadago ache e̩wñ-ma n noj akpa le̩: todu ojima Jihofa che̩ko̩ ef unyi O̩jo̩.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n kakini,
Omi muda fʼunyi ugbo kʼe̩ dodo ko̩ ñw e̩,
Tak onu mʼeju-wñ rida, oñ i kadua ñw abujeju Israe̩l chaka; oñ abo ujeju Israe̩l le̩ chaka kwodago jo̩.
Tak i kakini, Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ki nele, owñ ki nʼalu-wñ ko̩la ñwu Defid ata-mi kʼi laño̩ nʼo̩wo̩-wñ che e̩wñ kʼi ka le̩ kpa.
I kakini, Akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼu kʼabo-mi kwʼojane̩ Ijipti dufu wa, u dʼewo ka ef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l du kʼu kʼunyi efu uwñ kʼodu-mi ki tʼo̩mo̩ n; u la chi e̩ne̩ du kʼi mud e̩nuto̩gba abo-mi Israe̩l-i n;
omi muda du Je̩rusale̩m, kʼodu-mi ki tʼo̩mo̩; u laño̩ chi Defid kʼabo-mi Israe̩l ki jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ.
I la dʼef e̩do̩ Defid ata-mi kʼi kʼunyi tod odu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l.
Jihofa muda ka ñwu Defid, ata-mi, kakini, Abu ki dʼef e̩do̩-we̩ kʼe̩ kʼunyi tod odu-mi, edʼe̩ e̩do̩ ki dʼe̩ e̩do̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩ che le̩;
i chaka dʼabe̩le̩, i chʼuwe̩ akʼunyi le̩ n; chai o̩ma-we̩ ki akwʼefu uta-we̩ dufu, owñ le̩ akʼunyi tod odu-mi.
Jihofa la che teju o̩la-wñ kʼi ka le̩ me̩; oñ omi kwane̩ e̩gu Defid, ata-mi, u la gugu oj ede Israe̩l alu ki Jihofa katane̩ le̩ oñ u la fʼunyi-i ko̩ tod odu Jihofa O̩jo̩ Israe̩l.
U la mʼakpati kʼalo Jihofa kʼi kpe̩ kpʼamo̩ma Israe̩l dʼef uwñ du gugu ef uwñ me̩.
Oñ i kwodago o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa eju abo ujeju Israe̩l chaka; i la fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala jo̩.

(Todu So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼakpata ebije ikpa ro̩, ujiji-wñ chʼo̩hiba me̩lu, unabe̩-wñ chʼohiba me̩lu, o̩gba-wñ la chʼohiba me̩ta, oñ i dʼu dago alumeji ologbo le̩; tak i kwodago oji-wñ, oñ i te̩kpe̩ akʼokuku nyʼane̩ eju abo ujeju Israe̩l le̩ chaka; i la fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala rʼojale.)
Oñ i kakini, O Jihofa O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, i nʼO̩jo̩ du kʼi dab uwe̩ efojale kpʼane̩ ile̩ n; uwe̩ kʼe̩ fʼalo kpʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ de kpʼamadu-we̩ ku ma lule̩ o̩gba we̩ kpʼe̩do̩-ma chaka;
kʼe̩ la fʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ katane̩ ñwu Defid ata-mi de ñw u me̩; ochochi, e̩ nʼalu-we̩ ko̩la, tak e̩ nʼo̩wo̩-we̩ che kpa, alu ki de̩ eñini-i.

Todule̩ fai, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, e̩ nafʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ katane̩ ñw adu-we̩ Defid, ata-mi, de ñw u, e-kʼe̩ kakini, O̩ne̩ ki a gugu oj ede Israe̩l eju-mi añʼuwe̩ n, chai e-le̩ kate: amo̩ma-we̩ ki fʼo̩la-ma de̩, ku ma lule̩ ef uko̩-o̩la-mi dabalu kʼuwe̩ te̩talule̩ o̩gba-mi le̩.
Todule̩ fai, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, o̩la-we̩ ki dago kpaka, owñ chʼe-kʼe̩ ko̩la ñw adu-we̩ Defid.
O̩jo̩ muda abʼone̩ gugu ane̩-ile̩-i ochochi? Go, efojale kpʼefojale e-efojale neke gbʼe̩ n; e̩wñ ño̩ chʼe-unyi kʼu ko̩-i ge̩!
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ adua adu-we̩-i ki wʼe̩ eju, kpʼo̩ko̩-wñ ki agba bʼe̩, O Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi, kʼe̩ ne̩tirʼukwa kpʼadua kʼadu-we̩ ache o̩gba-we̩-i;
kʼeju-we̩ ki chʼefe̩rʼunyi-i o̩ro̩ka kpʼodu, owñ chʼugbo kʼe̩ ka kʼuwe̩ adʼodu-we̩ tʼo̩mo̩-i; kʼe̩ netirʼadua kʼadu-we̩ ache rʼo̩wo̩ uña kide̩.
E̩ ki la neti o̩ko̩ kʼadu-we̩-i agbabʼe̩, kpʼe-abo-we̩ Israe̩l, e̩gba ku ma fʼadua che rʼo̩wo̩ uña-i, kʼe̩ la dʼugbo kʼe̩ gugu o̩mo̩ agbʼo̩, owñ chʼefojale; oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ gbo, e̩ ki tʼo̩la no̩ ñw a.
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ dʼekeji-wñ re, ku ma fʼe̩bo̩ kpe nʼo ku ma je̩ ñw u ge̩bo̩, kʼego̩ kʼi go̩ le̩ chʼo̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-we̩ ef unyi kide̩;

mak uwe̩ ki dʼefojale agbo̩, kʼe̩ la che, kʼe̩ fʼajo̩ amadu-we̩ ka kʼe̩ ro̩me̩ ñw e̩ne̩bibi kʼe̩ dʼo̩na kʼi ale wa abʼo̩ oji-wñ onugo ma; kʼe̩ dale ñw e̩no̩kpakpa kʼe̩ dʼu ñw u teju alu kʼo̩kpakpa-wñ de̩.
I la chʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩bi-ma fʼabo Israe̩l, amone̩-we̩-i, gwodajane̩ tod edure ku ma dʼe̩ re, ku ma ño̩ mudabiwa ago̩gbodo odu-we̩, ku ma chʼadua, ku ma la fʼologu che o̩gba we̩ ef unyi-i;
e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki dʼefojale agbo̩, kʼe̩ tʼadure amone̩-we̩ Israe̩l no̩, kʼe̩ la ko ma dabiwa ojane̩ kʼe̩ du ñwu ma kpʼamata-ma-i.
E̩gba kʼefojale re kʼomi du ma lo̩ n, todabu ku ma dʼuwe̩ re; iche̩wñ ku ma chʼadua rʼo̩wo̩ uña kide̩ ku ma la gogbodo̩ odu-we̩, ku ma laño̩ rida bʼadure-ma te̩, abu kʼe̩ che ma o̩bata:

e̩gba le̩ uwe̩ ki dʼefojale agbo̩, kʼe̩ tʼadure amadu-we̩ no̩, kpʼe-amone̩-we̩ Israe̩l, e̩gba kʼe̩ do̩mo̩ ako̩ ma o̩na o̩me̩me̩le̩ ki dukpe̩ ku ma le; tak e̩ ño̩ dʼomi kpuche̩ wa abʼane̩-we̩ ma, owñ chʼe-kʼe̩ du ñw amone̩-we̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ogu-ma ku ma aje̩.

Iche̩wñ kʼo̩kpo̩ta kpa ane̩-i, iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ ibi lewa, iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ oko chʼido̩ abe̩k i akpebu abe̩k imiejo abe̩k ide̩ akpʼe̩wñ-ma bie̩; i la che̩wñ kʼame̩nebi-ma la kpala nyʼuma oj ane̩ ugbo kʼalaku alaku ma jo̩; alu du kʼatulubo̩ abe̩k o̩ga le̩ de̩;
adua du kpʼo̩ko̩ kʼe̩ne̩ du abe̩k amone̩-we̩ abo Israe̩l chaka agbabʼe̩, kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma fʼatulubo̩ kpʼe̩do̩dudu e-wñ ma, kʼi la fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala rʼo̩wo̩ unyi kide̩,
e̩gba le̩ uwe̩ ki dʼefojale ugbo kʼe̩ gugu le̩ agbo̩, kʼe̩ la tʼo̩ no̩ kʼe̩ du ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼe̩ chemʼef e̩do̩-wñ alu kʼe̩wñ kʼi che de̩, (todu uwe̩, uwe̩ kate, ma ef e̩do̩ amo̩ma amone̩);
kʼama ki railo we̩, ku ma lule̩ o̩na o̩na-we̩, o̩jo̩ du ku ma deju ojane̩ kʼuwe̩ du ñw amata-wa kade.
I chʼe-o̩la ononojo, kʼi ma dʼef abo-we̩ Israe̩l-i n, e̩gba kʼi kwʼojane̩ o̩najiji wa tod odu-we̩ inaina, kpʼo̩wo̩-we̩ ki gbiti, kpʼo̩wo̩-we̩ ki nadala te̩; e̩gba ku ma lewa achʼadua rʼo̩wo̩ unyi-i:

e̩gba le̩ uwe̩ ki dʼefojale agbo̩, owñ chʼugbo kʼe̩ gugu le̩, kʼe̩ la che e̩wñ du kʼononojo le̩ akwa dʼuwe̩ tod uwñ; kʼamone̩ du ane̩-ile̩ ki ma odu-we̩, ku ma railo we̩, alu kʼabo-we̩ Israe̩l ache, kʼama ki ma ka ku ma do̩ unyi kʼu ko̩-i rʼodu-we̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼabo-we̩ dufu nyʼokogu lʼo̩na du kʼe̩ kpe̩ ma ku ma ja kpʼame̩nebi-ma ku ma la rodubʼe̩ rʼo̩wo̩ ewo kʼe̩ du-i kpʼunyi kʼu ko̩ tod odu-we̩-i;
mak uwe̩ ki dʼefojale agbʼadua-ma kpʼo̩ko̩ ku ma gbabʼe̩, kʼe̩ la che alu kʼoji ajo̩-ma de̩.
Iche̩wñ ku ma dʼe̩ re (todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi ma adure ni n), kʼe̩ we̩do̩ rʼuma, kʼe̩ la mʼuma ko ñw e̩nebi-ma, ku ma la fʼuma mu alo tʼane̩ o̩najiji abe̩k ane̩ ki me̩rʼo̩wo̩;

iche̩wñ kʼama raʼu du tʼe̩do̩ oj ane̩ ugbo ku ma mu ma ño̩ nyi le̩, kʼibe-ma la murida, ku ma kwogbʼo̩ko̩ bʼe̩ oj ane̩ ugbo ku ma mu ma nyi le̩ kakini, Awa dure, a fʼe̩wñ uji che, a la fʼe̩wñ bibi che me̩;

iche̩wñ ku ma mudabi abʼe̩ kpʼe̩do̩-ma chaka kpʼonugo-ma chaka oj ane̩ ugbo ku ma chʼame̩namu, ugbo ku ma mu ma ño̩ nyi le̩, ku ma chadua rʼo̩wo̩ ane̩ e-ma, owñ chʼe-kʼe̩ du ñw amata-ma kpʼewo kʼuwe̩ du le̩, kpai rʼo̩wo̩ unyi kʼu ko̩ tod odu-we̩-i,
mak uwe̩ ki dʼefojale ugbo uña ugugu-we̩ le̩, kʼe̩ gbʼadua-ma kpʼo̩ko̩ ku ma gba bʼe̩ kʼe̩ che alu kʼoji ajo̩-ma de̩, kʼe̩ la tʼedure kʼamone̩-we̩ dʼe̩ re le̩ no̩.
Fai, O O̩jo̩-mi, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼe̩, e̩ je̩ ñw eju-we̩ ki bi, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw eti-we̩ ki tʼadua ku ma che ef uña kide̩.
Todule̩, e̩ kwane̩ fai, O Jihofa O̩jo̩, kʼe̩ nyʼef uña uñmi-we̩-i,
O Jihofa O̩jo̩, e̩ ki rʼeju e̩ne̩-we̩ kʼe̩ bʼekpo tʼo̩ oji da bʼe̩ te̩ n; e̩ dibekado ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ che ñwu Defid adu-we̩ le̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼadua-wñ che kpa, una gwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa, i la fʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ ku ma kpa le̩ lie̩; tak ojima Jihofa che̩ko̩ ef unyi le̩.
Amatama la neke gudu tef unyi Jihofa n todabu kʼojima Jihofa che̩ko̩ ef unyi Jihofa.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l chaka jo̩ ago abu kʼuna le̩ mugwo̩ru wa, kʼojima Jihofa la bʼoj unyi le̩ ma; oñ ma te̩kpe̩, eju-ma la bʼane̩ ma oj ajita o̩mo̩, oñ ma dojikane̩, ma la gogbodo̩ Jihofa, kakini,
Tak onu kpʼamone̩ le̩ chaka kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa che o̩gba Jihofa.
Oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu, fʼamokuno̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu nyoke meji, kpʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩fa kpa ñw u. Abe̩le̩ onu kpʼamone̩ le̩ chaka mʼunyi O̩jo̩ le̩ du te̩ ñw u.

Tak amatama kwojʼuña uña uko̩lo̩-ma; abo Lifai ño̩ jʼe̩gu-ma kpʼe̩wñ iya Jihofa ku ma ne̩ keli, owñ chʼe-ki Defid onu che ku ma ne̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa (todu ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ chʼo̩gbegbele̩), e̩gba ki Defid nʼe̩wñ ku ma che le̩ aje̩nyʼO̩jo̩: oñ amatama fʼo̩kakachi o̩gba ma; abo Israe̩l chaka la kwo̩dago jo̩.

So̩lo̩mo̩n la fʼalumeji ologbo kʼi dʼo̩gba unyi Jihofa che ki fo̩; todu o̩mo̩ i kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼula iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ wa che, todu kʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ebije ikpa ki So̩lo̩mo̩n che le̩ ma bʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ ele kpʼula le̩ jo̩ kʼi agba n.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n je̩ ñw uje̩wñ uyo̩ ki do̩mo̩ gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie iko le̩, kpʼabo Israe̩l du manyʼowñ; ujeju-wñ na-na tabale, ma kwʼugbo ku ma gudu wa Hemat gbogbo wa ukpolo Ijipti.
Oñ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ ma chʼujeju eju e̩kpa. Todu ma fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩dute̩ ñw O̩jo̩ de o̩jo̩ mebie, uje̩wñ uyo̩ le̩ la chʼo̩jo̩ mebie.
Tak o̩jo̩ kʼochu e̩kebie nʼolu ogu nyoke me̩ta, i je̩ ñw amone̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyabo-ma, kpʼuyo̩ kpʼe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ tod e̩nyo̩ ki Jihofa du ña Defid kpʼiSo̩lo̩mo̩n kpʼIsrae̩l amone̩-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼunyi Jihofa kpʼunyi onu ko̩ kpa. E̩wñ du ki wʼef e̩do̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼi che ef unyi Jihofa kpʼef unyi-wñ onugo, i la che uya uya.
Taku Jihofa kwotejugede ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n odu, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, U fʼadua-we̩ gbo̩ me̩, oñ u mʼuña-i du ñw o̩la-mi kʼi chʼunyi iche̩bo̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼomi fʼef ojale re kʼomi ma lo̩ n, abe̩k iche̩wñ kʼomi ñwa ñw amimiejo ku ma kʼe̩wñ ane̩-i mi, abe̩k iche̩wñ kʼu dʼe̩wñ ibi kpuche̩ wʼef amone̩-mi-i;

kʼamone̩-mi ku ma dʼodu-mi mʼuma ahiʼo̩la-ma wane̩, ku ma chadua, ku ma la tene eju-mi, ku ma mu rida bʼo̩na o̩na bibi-ma te̩, e̩gba le̩ omi adʼefojale agbo̩, oñ natʼadure-ma no̩, tak u nafʼo̩ga ane̩-ma chekpa.
Fai eju-mi abi rʼu oñ e̩ti-mi atʼadua ku ma che ef uña-i.
Fai omi mʼunyi-i du, oñ u che ki fo̩, kʼodu-mi ki dʼo̩mo̩ ogbebele̩; eju-mi kpʼe̩do̩-mi la adʼo̩mo̩ pioo.
I la chʼe-we̩, iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ alule̩ o̩gba mi alu ku Defid, ata-we̩ lule̩ le̩, kʼe̩ la che teju e̩wñ du kʼu ñwa ñw e̩ kʼe̩ la ade e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi kpʼalu kʼoji ajo̩-mi ka;
e̩gbale̩ nafʼede ojane̩-we̩ lonyane̩, alu kʼu fʼalo-wñ kpe̩ kpai Defid, ata-we̩ kakini, One̩ ki anʼo̩da Israe̩l añʼuwe̩ n.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ muna bʼo̩ te̩, kʼe̩ la hiʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi kpʼuko̩ uko̩ kʼu te̩ kʼu koj o̩gba we̩-i, tinyo̩, kʼe̩ la nyʼare̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼe̩ dojikane̩ ñwu ma;
e̩gba le̩ namʼuma chi tʼili tʼili kwʼoj ane̩-mi e-kʼu du ñwu ma; oñ unyi kʼu che ki fo̩ tod odu-mi-i nadʼu rikpolo kwo bʼeju-mi te̩, oñ nadʼowñ chʼita kpʼicha kʼamone̩ du aka.
Oñ unyi ki dʼatate̩-i, awuwu-wñ amʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi alale, i la akakini, E̩wñ chi ki Jihofa fʼabe̩i che ane̩-i kpʼunyi-i ta?

Tak ama adohi kakini, Todabu ku ma hi Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-amata-ma kʼi ko ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa tinyo̩, taku ma la gwo̩nyʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩, ku ma dojikane̩ ñwu ma, ku ma laño̩ re̩ ma; todule̩ oñ i kʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩-i du wa bʼuma ma-i.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼo̩do̩ ogu jo̩, iko o̩do̩ ogu le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼunyi Jihofa kpʼunyi e-wñ onugo ko̩ kpa:
So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼewo ewo ku Huram ko ñw u le̩ ko̩, oñ i je̩ ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l gugu o̩mo̩.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n nyi Hemat-zoba, oñ i fʼo̩mo̩ du.
Tak i fu Tadmo̩r ef aje̩tachi ko̩, kpʼewo ewo du ugbo ku ma akʼane̩ jo̩ Hemat.
I ño̩ fu Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n e-ate̩ kpai Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n e-o̩gane̩ ko̩, ewo, ewo ku ma ñwo̩che kʼi gbiti bʼo̩gu jo̩ i che, i chʼenʼaku kpʼakpeleku kpʼugbo̩lo̩ oli ku ma nʼare;

kpai Be̩alat, kpʼewo du ku So̩lo̩mo̩n ne ku ma kʼane̩ jʼefu-wñ, kpʼewo ewo tod o̩kogu-wñ chaka, kpʼewo, ewo tod amananya-wñ, kpʼe-du ki du So̩lo̩mo̩n e̩do̩ kʼi ko̩ Je̩rusale̩m kpai Le̩bano̩n kpʼoj ane̩ du kʼi nʼo̩da-wñ.
Amone̩ du ki bo̩ ef abo He̩t kpʼabo Amo̩r kpʼabo Pe̩re̩z kpʼabo Hifai kpʼabo Je̩bius, ku ma ma chʼabo Israe̩l-i n;
owñ chʼamo̩ma-ma ku ma bo̩ ubi-ma oji ane̩ le̩, e-kʼabo Israe̩l ma fʼuma kpa kpa n, So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼabo le̩ chʼamadu ku ma rire̩ gbogbo tʼojoluñini.
So̩lo̩mo̩n muda kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l du chʼamadu todu uko̩lo̩-wñ n; ama la chʼabogu kpʼabo ki dʼoji dufu ef amagboji-wñ kpʼamagboji o̩kogu-wñ kpʼamananya-wñ.
Ama chʼamagboji So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu, ku ma dʼoji dufu ma chʼone̩ oli me̩lu ku ma nʼo̩da amone̩.
Oñ So̩lo̩mo̩n mʼo̩ma Fero onobule̩ du kwʼewo Defid wʼunyi kʼi ko̩ tod uwñ; todu i kakini, O̩ya-mi agugu ef unyi Defid onu Israe̩l n, todabu kʼo̩mo afo̩, owñ chʼugbo kʼakpati Jihofa wa le̩.
Taku So̩lo̩mon kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa che ñwu Jihofa oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa, e-ki che o̩gba agbaru le̩,

alu ki dʼukpe̩ ku ma che o̩jo̩ du, ma kʼo wa alu ku Mose̩s fʼuko̩-wñ te̩, o̩jo̩ uñmi, o̩jo̩ uñmi kpʼochu etito̩, ochu etito̩ kpʼe̩gba uje̩wñ uyo̩ kʼiko-wñ chʼe̩da te̩, onu me̩ta o̩do̩ʼka owñ chʼe̩gba uje̩wñ uyo̩ kʼo̩jo̩wu ma dʼo̩ n le̩, kpʼe̩gba uje̩wñ e-ebie ebie, kpʼe̩gba uje̩wñ e-ebu emu.

Oñ i fʼuche̩ uche̩ amatama kpe̩ jo̩ tod uko̩lo̩-ma alu ku Defid ata-wñ fʼuko̩-wñ te̩, kpʼabo Lifai ef e̩wñ ide e-ma ku ma je̩nyu O̩jo̩ ku ma ño̩ che e̩wñ eju amatama alu kʼi dʼukpe̩ ku ma che o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa; i ño̩ fʼamadalo̩na date̩ uche̩ uche̩ alo̩na okoke du; todu alu ku Defid, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, ñwa ñwu ma de̩.
Ma la na bʼuko̩ kʼonu te̩ ñw amatama kpʼabo Lifai ef o̩la du te̩ n, kpʼugbo e̩wñ akoko le̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ ma la fʼe̩wñ uko̩lo̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n du che kpa akwʼo̩jo̩ ku ma dʼe̩re̩ unyi Jihofa nyʼane̩, gbogbo tak i takpa. Oñ ma fʼunyi Jihofa le̩ ko̩ kpa.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n nyʼE̩zio̩n-geba kpai Ailot eti ohimini abadi oj ane̩ Ido̩m.

Taku Huram kʼo̩ko̩ kpʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ ku ma mʼe̩wñ ohimini abadi kpuche̩ rʼu lʼo̩wo̩ abuko̩lo̩-wñ; tak ama manyʼabuko̩lo̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n nyi Ofir, ma la kʼo̩jamalia alu tale̩nt oli me̩la kwʼo̩mo̩ wa, oñ ma mʼu ko nyʼugbo So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu.

Oñ e̩gba kʼonu Shiba, onobule̩, gbʼuwohi So̩lo̩mo̩n, i lewa Je̩rusale̩m kʼi nʼene ki gbiti ju So̩lo̩mo̩n ma. I nʼabo-wñ wewe wa, kpʼaminyakulumi ku ma nʼadu e̩wñ ido̩ro̩ kpʼo̩jamalia ololo ololo, kpʼokuta akoko. Tak i lewʼgbo So̩lo̩mo̩n oñ i bʼo̩ choluka e̩wñ du ki dʼe̩do̩-wñ.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n mʼohi ene-wñ du du ñw u; i nʼe̩wñ du ki maja ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n kʼi ma du ka ñw u ni n.
Tak e̩gba kʼonu Shiba le̩ fʼibe So̩lo̩mo̩n li, kpʼunyi kʼi ko̩,

kpʼuje̩wñ oj itebulu-wñ kpʼalu kʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ gugu jo̩, kpʼalu kʼabo ku ma che e̩wñ ñw u dago jo̩, kpʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma kpʼabo ku ma nʼomi-wñ kpʼe̩wñ o̩la e-ma kpʼugbo kʼi ate̩gu le tʼunyi Jihofa, ibe takpa rʼe efu.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw onu kakini, Inabali e̩wñ kʼe̩ che kpʼibe-we̩ kʼu gbo̩ oj ane̩-mi chʼochochi,
omi muda dʼo̩la-ma rʼochochi n, gbogbo tak u lewa, kʼeju-mi la fʼu li; e̩ la go, ma la ka ukpe̩reji unana ibe-we̩ ñwu mi n: uwe̩ tʼuwohi kʼu gbo̩ le.
Abo-we̩ gbede, abuko̩lo̩-we̩ ku ma dago jʼo̩gba-we̩ agbo̩ ibe-we̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ gbede.

Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, ki nele, owñ ki yo̩ ñw e̩ kʼi la dʼuwe̩ gugu oj ede-wñ, kʼe̩ chʼonu todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩; todabu kʼO̩jo̩-we̩ fe̩do̩ abo Israe̩l, kʼi fʼuma e̩re̩ lonyane̩ ogbegbele̩, todule̩ i mʼuwe̩ du jʼonu-ma kʼe̩ kajo̩ o̩kpakpa kpʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa eche.
Tak i mu tale̩nt i o̩jamalia o̩gbo̩ me̩fa ko ñw onu, kpʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩ ololo ololo, kpʼokuta akoko; e̩go̩ e̩wñ ido̩ro̩ kʼonu Shiba ko ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu, la de̩ ge̩ n.
Oñ abuko̩lo̩ Huram kpʼabuko̩lo̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n, ku ma kʼo̩jamalia kwʼOfir wa, ño̩ kʼoli algum kpʼokuta akoko wa ge̩.
Oñ onu kʼoli algum le̩ chʼubo̩ ubo̩ ugbo ku ma ate̩gu nyʼunyi Jihofa, kpʼunyi onu. I ño̩ nʼoli le̩ che umolo kpʼubo̩ tod amakeli; ma la li e̩go̩-wñ oj ane̩ Juda mama ta n.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu, mʼe̩wñ du ki dʼonu Shiba e̩do̩ ko̩ ñw u, e̩wñ du kʼi bi, manyʼe̩wñ kʼi ko wa ñw onu. Tak i mudabi, oñ i le tʼane̩ e-wñ, owñ kpʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ.
Uwoji o̩jamalia ki wʼo̩wo̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩do̩ʼkate che o̩jamalia tale̩nt ulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩fa,
manyʼe-kʼamagbagbata kpʼamany-aja ne̩ wa ge̩, manyʼo̩jamalia kpʼajifa kʼamonu Arabia du kpʼamigo̩bina ane̩ le̩ ko wa ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n.
Onu So̩lo̩mo̩n la nʼo̩jamalia ku ma gwu kpe̩te̩ke̩ chʼugbe̩yo̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩; she̩ke̩l o̩jamalia ulo̩gwa i ne̩ chʼugbe̩yo̩ oka.
I la nʼo̩jamalia ku ma gwu kpe̩te̩ke̩ chʼo̩kpatabeli oli me̩fa; o̩jamalia she̩ke̩l oli me̩fa i ne̩ che o̩kpatabeliʼka. Oñ onu mʼe-le̩ ko jʼef unyi efoko Lebano̩n.
Onu nʼenyi adagba chʼede lile, oñ i kʼo̩jamalia hiolo yamʼo̩.

Ubo̩ ku ma te̩gu tʼoj ede le̩ chʼe̩fa. I nʼuke̩re̩no o̩jamalia ku ma ji mʼede̩ le̩, oñ i nʼugbo ku ma kʼo̩wo̩ no o̩wo̩ meji ugbo ugugu-wñ. Amidu meji la dago jo̩ ugbo ku ma kʼo̩wo̩ no o̩wo̩ mejeji le̩.
Oñ amidu me̩gweji dago jʼo̩wo̩ʼka kpʼo̩wo̩ ekeji oj ubo̩ me̩fe̩fa le̩; ma che e̩go̩-wñ oj ane̩ du n.
E̩wñ eku du ku So̩lo̩mo̩n la ne̩ ñmʼomi chʼo̩jamalia. E̩wñ eku du ki jʼunyi efoko Le̩bano̩n chʼo̩jamalia hiolo; ajifa wʼone̩ eju o̩kpanachi So̩lo̩mo̩n-i n.

Todu o̩ko̩ o̩ko̩-onu anyi Tarshish, abuko̩lo̩ Huram alebʼo̩; onuʼka o̩do̩ me̩ta, onuʼka o̩do̩ me̩ta, o̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ Tarshish nʼo̩jamalia kpʼajifa kpʼenyi adagba kpʼame̩do̩ kpai ame̩we̩ kʼina-ma chʼuto̩ eju ku ma do̩ ko̩ piko̩k wa.
Oñ abe̩le̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼamonu ane̩ile̩ du du ef e̩wñ anana kpʼibe.
Tak amonu ane̩-ile̩ du wa tene eju So̩lo̩mo̩n, ku ma gbo̩ ibe kʼO̩jo̩ du tʼef e̩do̩-wñ.

Oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma kʼe̩wñ ele-wñ wa, e̩wñ eku ajifa kpʼe̩wñ eku o̩jamalia kpʼe̩wñ o̩la kpʼido̩na ogu ku ma ko nyʼo̩la, kpʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩ kpʼamanya kpʼamimiulu. I chenʼukpe̩ ku ma ko wa o̩do̩ da o̩do̩ da.
So̩lo̩mo̩n la nʼunyi icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ todu amanya kpʼo̩kogu; amananya-wñ kʼi ko jʼewo ewo o̩kogu kpʼugbo onu Je̩rusale̩m la che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji.
Oñ i nʼo̩da amonu du ku ma jo̩ akwo o̩lʼohimini Yufretis gbogbo wa ane̩ abo Filistia gbogbo wa alo̩me̩ ane̩ Ijipti.
Onu la je̩ ñw ajifa ki jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩yo̩go̩ okuta. I la je̩ ñw oli sida ki wewe jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m dabe̩ne̩ kʼoli sikamo̩r ki jʼite̩.
Oñ ma kʼamanya kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti kpai kwʼoj ane̩ du wa ñwu So̩lo̩mo̩n.

Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ki So̩lo̩mo̩n che tʼe-ejodudu, tʼe-otitala, inabali-wñ jʼef o̩la ku Netan akache̩ ko̩, kpʼef ache̩ Ahija, e̩ne̩ Shailo̩n, kpʼef ane̩ ego kʼIdo agane̩ le̩ go ugbo o̩la Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat le̩ n?
So̩lo̩mo̩n la jʼonu abo Israe̩l chaka Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji.
Taku So̩lo̩mo̩n chʼolu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef ewo Defid ata-wñ; taku Reho̩boam, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ Reho̩boam le tu She̩ke̩m; todu abo Israe̩l du lewa She̩ke̩m ku ma mʼu du jʼonu.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat, gbʼo̩, (todu owñ dʼIjipti, ugbo kʼi ra nyi bʼeju So̩lo̩mo̩n onu te̩), Je̩ro̩boam mudabi kwʼojane̩ Ijipti wa.
Oñ ma fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ adʼo wa; taku Je̩ro̩boam kpʼabo Israe̩l du lewa, oñ ma ko̩la ñwu Reho̩boam kakini,
Ata-we̩ je̩ ñw oli uno̩lo̩-wa ki bie̩ne̩: todule̩ fai, uwe̩ ki bo̩wo̩lo̩ ñw a ugbo uko̩lo̩ ata-we̩ ki bie̩ne̩ le̩, kʼe̩ bʼuwoji oli uno̩lo̩ kʼi du nʼuwa o̩lo̩ le̩, wane̩, tak awa arʼe̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩jo̩ me̩ta taku me̩ mudabi wa. Oñ amone̩ le̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le.
Taku Reho̩boam, onu, fʼojuju nyi kpʼabogijo ku ma dago jʼo̩gba So̩lo̩mo̩n, ata-wñ, e̩gba kʼi ma ku ta n, i kakini, Ohi e̩wñ me̩ du ñwu mi, kʼu nadʼohi ñw amone̩-i?
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ mo̩la ñwu amone̩-i kʼe̩ nyo̩ ma eju, kʼe̩ la kʼo̩la e̩nyo̩ ñwu ma, e̩gbale̩ ma amud amadu-we̩ ogbegbele̩.
I muda hi ohi kʼabogijo du ñw u tinyo̩, oñ i fʼojuju nyi kpʼabokolobia kʼowñ kpʼama gba nyʼo̩la-maku ma dago jʼo̩gba-wñ.
I la ka ñwu ma kakini, Ohi e̩wñ ame̩ adu ñwu mi? kʼa dʼohi ñw amone̩ ku ma ko̩la ñwu mi-i, kakini, E̩ bʼuwoji oli uno̩lo̩ kʼata-we̩ du nʼuwa o̩lo̩ le̩ wane̩.

Tak abokolobia kʼowñ kpʼama gba nyʼo̩la-ma ko̩la ñw u kakini, Abu kʼuwe̩ adu ohi ñw amone̩ ku ma ko̩la ñw e̩, kakini, Ata-we̩ je̩ ñw oli uno̩lo̩-wa woji, uwe̩ ki la bʼuwoji-wñ wane̩ ñw a; abu kʼuwe̩ aka ñwu ma de̩ kakini, O̩mo̩wo̩ ubi-mi jukpa tʼuta ata-mi le.
Alu kʼata-mi dʼoli uno̩lo̩ ki woji chʼadu nʼume̩ oji, omi abu to̩ oli uno̩lo̩-me̩ ge̩! ata-mi nʼitali ko̩ me̩ o̩la, e-mi muda chʼamakpe!
Abe̩le̩ Je̩ro̩boam kpʼamone̩ le̩ du wʼugbo Reho̩boam o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta le̩, alu kʼonu ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩jo̩ me̩ta taku me̩ mudabi wa ugbo mi.
Tak onu dʼohi o̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ ñwu ma; Reho̩boam, onu le̩, la hi ohi kʼabogijo du ñw u tinyo̩.
I la ko̩la ñwu ma teju ohi kʼabokolobia le̩ du ñw u, kakini, Ata-mi je̩ ñw oli-uno̩lo̩-me̩ ki woji, omi la abu to̩; ata-mi nʼitali ko̩ me̩ o̩la; e-mi muda chʼamakpe!
Abe̩le̩ onu ko̩ enetirʼamone̩ le̩; todu O̩jo̩ che, todu ki Jihofa ki che teju o̩la-wʼñ kʼi ka lʼalu Ahija, e̩ne̩ Shailon le̩, ñwu Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat.
Oñ abo Israe̩l du li ka kʼonu ko̩ enetirʼuma, tak amone̩ le̩ mʼohi du ñw onu kakini,
I muda chʼe-amone̩ Israe̩l ku ma gugu ewo ewo Juda, Reho̩boam jʼonu ma.

Taku Reho̩boam, onu, fu Hado̩ram, kʼi nʼo̩da abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ ire̩ kpuche̩; amo̩ma Israe̩l muda kʼokuta ro̩ dʼo, oñ i leku. Taku Reho̩boam, onu le̩, hika mute̩gu tʼef o̩kogu-wñ kʼi ra nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Abe̩le̩ abo Israe̩l ko̩ abo unyi Defid gbogbo tʼeñini.

Oñ e̩gba ku Reho̩boam lewa Je̩rusale̩m, i fʼabo unyi Juda kpai Be̩njamin do̩ jeju, one̩ ku ma chi chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩la ku ma meju ogu, ku ma nyʼakogu bʼabo Israe̩l, ku ma dabi gba ojane̩ le̩ ñwu Reho̩boam.
O̩la Jihofa muda wʼugbo She̩maya, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩, kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñwu Reho̩boam, o̩ma So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu Juda, kpʼabo Israe̩l du ku ma jo̩ Juda kpai Be̩njamin kakini,

Abu ku Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki te̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩ n, me̩ ki la jogu kpʼamo̩maye-me̩ n: e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki mudabi tʼunyi-wñ; todu ugbo mi oñ e̩wñ-i kwo. Ma la netirʼo̩la Jihofa, oñ ma mudabi elo ku ma che ku ma lo akobo̩ Je̩ro̩boam le̩.
Reho̩boam la kwogugu Je̩rusale̩m, oñ i fʼewo ewo ko̩ oj ane̩ Juda tode̩gba kʼamone̩ awa kʼogu bʼo̩.
I fu Be̩tle̩he̩m kpʼEtam, kpai Te̩koa
kpai Be̩t-zur kpai Shoko kpai Adulam
kpai Gat kpai Maresha kpai Zif
kpai Adoreim kpai Lakish kpai Azika
kpai Zo̩ra kpʼAijalo̩n kpai He̩bro̩n, ki jʼoj ane̩ Juda kpai Be̩njamin ko̩. Ewo, ewo ki nʼaku, i che.
I la che kʼewo ewo ki nʼaku le̩ ki nʼukpahiu, i la kʼame̩nuto̩gba jʼefu-wñ, i kʼuje̩wñ maja jʼo̩mo̩ kpʼekpo kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma.
Oñ ef ewo ewo du i kʼu-gbe̩yo̩ kpʼo̩kwo̩ jo̩, i la che ku ma gbiti tabale. Owñ la ne̩ Juda kpai Be̩njamin.
Tak amatama kpʼabo Lifai ku ma jʼoj ane̩ Israe̩l ugbo du, ke̩che̩ wʼugbo-wñ kwʼugbo du kʼalo̩me̩-ma kade.
Todu abo Lifai tʼadogbe, adogbe-ma no̩ kpʼane̩ ku ma ne̩, oñ ma lewa Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m: todu Je̩ro̩-boam kpʼamo̩ma-wñ hiʼuma tinyo̩, kʼama ki we echuko̩lo̩ ugugu atama ñwu Jihofa;
tak i chi amatama ñw o̩la-wñ todu otete otete ki gbo̩gba, kpai tod ode ikpakachi kpai tod amo̩mokuno̩ kʼi che le̩.
Abo ku ma dʼe̩do̩ tʼatene Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, kwʼef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l du atʼuma ubi wa Je̩rusale̩m ku ma che iche̩bo̩ ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-ma.
Abe̩le̩ ma dʼugbiti ñw ojane̩ Juda, oñ ma je̩ ñwu Reho̩boam, o̩ma So̩lo̩mo̩n, kʼi nʼukpahiu gbogbo o̩do̩ me̩ta; todu ma le o̩na Defid kpai So̩lo̩mo̩n gbogbo o̩do̩ me̩ta.
Reho̩boam la fʼo̩ya ne, owñ che Me̩halat, o̩ma Je̩rimot, o̩ma Defid e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩; iye-wñ che Abiheil o̩ma E̩liyab kʼi chʼo̩ma Je̩si.
I la fʼamo̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi ñw u; Jiush kpai Shamaraya kpai Zeham.
Ubi-wñ i ne̩ Maaka, o̩ma Absalo̩m; oñ i fʼAbaija kpʼAteai kpai Zaiza kpai She̩lomit, bi ñw u.

Reho̩boam la fe̩do̩ Maaka, o̩ma Absalo̩m, tʼamo̩ya-wñ kpʼamabadu-wñ du le. Todu i nʼo̩ya me̩gwe̩jo̩ kpʼabadu o̩gbo̩ me̩ta, i la fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ogu nyoke me̩jo̩ kpai amo̩ma onobule̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta bi.
Taku Reho̩boam fʼAbaija, o̩ma Maaka, chi kʼi chʼoji, kʼi chʼe̩nuto̩gba ef amo̩maye-wñ; todu ibe dʼef uwñ kʼi adʼu jʼonu.
I la fʼe̩wñ che ibe ibe, oñ i mʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ko kpatuka rʼugbo du oj ane̩ Juda kpai Be̩njamin, ugbo ewo du ki nʼaku; i la kʼuje̩wñ ñwu ma e̩kute̩. I ño̩ tene o̩ya wewe ñwu ma.
Oñ i lewatʼe̩gba kʼo̩fe̩ ojane̩ Reho̩boam lonyane̩, kʼi la fʼukpahiu ne̩, i hi uko̩-o̩la Jihofa tinyo̩, abo Israe̩l du la manyʼu.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩lu ku Reho̩boam jʼonu oñ Shishak, onu Ijipti, mute̩gu wa akobo̩ Je̩rusale̩m, todabu ku ma fʼada Jihofa je̩.
I nʼo̩kogu icham nyʼulo̩ko̩, kpai amananya icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta. Amone̩ ku ma lebʼo̩ kwʼIjipti wa nʼaluka n: Amilibia, kpʼAmisuki kpʼabo Itio̩pia.
Oñ i fʼewo ewo ki nʼaku oj ane̩ Juda du gbogbo tak i lewa Je̩rusale̩m.

Taki She̩maya, akache̩, lewʼugbo Reho̩boam kpai amagboji Juda ku ma kʼo̩la-ma wa jeju Je̩rusale̩m todu Shishak, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ame̩ hi umi tinyo̩ me̩, todule̩ u ño̩ tʼume̩ no̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ Shishak.
Tak amagboji Israe̩l manyʼonu hi o̩la-ma wane̩; oñ ama kakini, Jihofa chʼo̩kpakpa.

Tak e̩gba ku Jihofa li ka ku ma hi o̩la-ma wane̩, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo She̩maya kakini, Ma fʼo̩la-ma hi wane̩ me̩: nakpʼama fo̩ n, nabʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ñwu ma re ta, uke̩do̩fulu-mi la adafo bi Je̩rusale̩m ma lʼo̩wo̩ Shishak-i n.
Ma muda achʼamadu-wñ kʼama ki ma alu kʼe̩wñ eche ñwu mi de̩, kpʼalu kʼe̩wñ eche ñw abo ojane̩ ojane̩ ki bo̩ de̩.
Abe̩le̩ Shishak, onu Ijipti, mute̩gu wa kobo̩ Je̩rusale̩m oñ i mʼe̩wñ akoko unyi Jihofa ko, kpʼe̩wñ akoko unyi onu; i mʼu ko chaka. I ño̩ mʼugbe̩yo̩ o̩jamalia ku So̩lo̩mo̩n che le̩ ko le ge̩.
Taku Reho̩boam onu fʼugbe̩yo̩ ebije ikpa che koji, oñ i mʼu ko nyʼagboji abide o̩wo̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma de alo̩na unyi onu.
Abe̩le̩ e̩gba du kʼonu mugudu tʼef unyi Jihofa, abide le̩ lewa kʼo; taku ma mʼu ko dabiwa unyi abide le̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi hi o̩la-wñ wane̩, uwe̩do̩ Jihofa murida bʼo̩ te̩, kʼi we ekpʼo̩ bie̩ hioko; e̩wñ ki nyo̩ lañe̩ jo̩ Juda ta.

Abe̩le̩ Reho̩boam onu dʼugbiti ñw o̩la-wñ Je̩rusale̩m oñ i fʼo̩fe̩-wñ je̩ alo waa. Todu o̩do̩ Reho̩boam chʼo̩gbo̩-meji nyokeʼka e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu; i la jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩gwebie, owñ chʼewo ki Jihofa du kwef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka, todu kʼi dʼodu-wñ tʼo̩mo̩. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Neama e̩ne̩ Amo̩n.
I la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ che, ukpe̩ kʼi ma dʼe̩do̩-wñ te̩ atene Jihofa n.

Oñ e̩wñ ku Reho̩boam che, tʼe-ejodudu tʼe-otitala, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩la She̩maya, akache̩, kpʼe-Ido agane̩ le̩, alu ku ma fʼo̩gba o̩gba-wñ ko̩ tʼo̩ le̩ n? Ogu la dʼagbagba Reho̩boam kpai Je̩ro̩boam o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
Taku Reho̩boam chʼolu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef ewo Defid. Tak Abaija, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩ ku Je̩ro̩boam jʼonu, Abaija chane̩ ejʼonu Juda.
I jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩ta. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Maikaya, o̩ma Uriel e-Gibea. Ogu ño̩ dʼagbagba Abaija kpai Je̩ro̩boam ge̩.

Oñ Abaija kʼabogu ku ma chʼamagbiti wa aja, ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo uloko ku ma chi. Taku Je̩ro̩boam chʼaboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo icham ku ma chʼamagbiti ku ma nʼuwohi tala jo̩ kʼi ko bʼo̩.
Taku Abaija kwodago oj uwo Ze̩mareim, kʼi dʼoj ane̩ uwo Ifraim, oñ i kakini, Gbʼo̩la-mi, O Je̩ro̩boam kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka!
I dukpe̩ kʼame̩ ma ka ku Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, mʼo̩da ojane̩ Israe̩l du ñwu Defid ogbegbele̩ n? I chʼalo e-omu owñ kpe̩ kpʼowñ kpʼamo̩ma-wñ n?
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat, adu So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩ma Defid, kwane̩, oñ i fʼe̩re̩ ubi ro̩ ñw odu-wñ.
Ame̩ne̩fule̩fu ku ma chʼamo̩ma ebili la kʼo̩la-ma wa jʼugbo-wñ oñ ma dʼugbiti ñw o̩la-ma akobo̩ Reho̩boam o̩ma So̩lo̩mo̩n, e̩gba ku Reho̩boam chʼimo̩to̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ ma gbo n, kʼi ma bʼuma jo̩ ta n.
Fai taku me̩ nʼibe ka kʼame̩ bʼo̩da ojane̩ Jihofa kʼi dʼef o̩wo̩ amo̩ma Defid jo̩; me̩ la chʼo̩wo̩ one̩ otemeje; amo̩mokuno̩ o̩jamalia ku Je̩ro̩boam che ku ma chʼamo̩jo̩ ñwu me̩ le̩ jʼugbo me̩.

Ame̩ fʼamatama Jihofa ku ma chʼamo̩ma Aro̩n kpʼabo Lifai ne dufu me̩ n? Oñ me̩ fʼamatama che ñw o̩la-me̩ alu kʼabo ane̩ omune̩ omune̩ ache n? Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ du kʼi nʼo̩mo̩kokuno̩ kpʼamokolo mebie wa kʼi ko nyʼo̩wo̩ e̩ko, mak i mud atama ñw e̩wñ ki ma chʼamo̩jo̩ n.
I muda chʼe-wa, Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩-wa, awa la hiʼu tinyo̩ n; amatama ku ma ache e̩wñ ñwu Jihofa, chʼamo̩ma Aro̩n, abo Lifai la jʼef uko̩lo̩ e-ma:

ma la gu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai otulale ki rinyo̩ jo̩ ñwu Jihofa odudu kpʼane̩ o̩jo̩ du; akala e-eju le̩ ño̩ che̩te̩ru jʼoj itebulu ki de̩ hiolo le̩, kpʼakete o̩jamalia manyʼagege-wñ, ku ma dʼuna tʼo̩ ane̩ ane̩: todu awa ade e̩wñ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa ñwa ñw a. Ame̩ muda hiʼu tinyo̩.

Me̩ la go, O̩jo̩ dʼugbo wa, kʼi chʼoji-wa manyʼamatama-wñ ku ma nʼo̩kakachi e-e̩wñ achigili kʼi aka taa le̩ ku ma fa rʼume̩ oji. O amo̩ma Israe̩l, ame̩ ki kogu bo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-me̩ n; todu i ara ñwu me̩ n.
Je̩ro̩boam muda je̩ ñwu ma kpala lʼejubi-ma: abe̩le̩ ama jʼo̩gba abo Juda, oñ abo ku ma kpala maja jʼej ubi-ma.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo Juda gʼej ubi, go, ogu dʼo̩gba-ma, i laño̩ dʼubi-ma ge̩. Taku ma raku do̩ Jihofa, oñ amatama nʼo̩kakachi afa.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Juda fʼogu kpa; oñ abu kʼaboke̩le̩ Juda nakpogu, i lewatu, O̩jo̩ fu Je̩ro̩boam kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka gwoda o̩gba Abaija kpʼabo Juda.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l ra rʼo̩gba abo Juda; oñ O̩jo̩ mʼuma ko nyʼuma o̩wo̩.
Tak Abaija kpʼabo-wñ nʼuku lile kpa ma; oñ abo Israe̩l ku ma chi le̩ ku ma wane̩ aku o̩mo̩ chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo oli me̩gwa.
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼamo̩ma Israe̩l chʼukata iko e-le̩, oñ amo̩ma Juda fʼuma du todabu ku ma chubiyo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-ma.
Oñ Abaija rano Je̩roboam; i la mʼewo ewo gba bʼo̩ o̩wo̩ te̩, Be̩te̩l manyʼadogbe-wñ kpai Je̩shena manyʼadogbe-wñ kpʼIfro̩n manyʼadogbe-wñ.
Ukpahiu Je̩ro̩boam laño̩ dabi tiko iko Abaija ge̩ n. Jihofa la fu gwoda, oñ i leku.
Abaija muda gbiti nyʼo̩gba alo. Oñ i fʼamo̩ya me̩gwe̩le̩ ne̩ ñw o̩la-wñ. I la fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ogu nyoke meji, kpʼamo̩ma onobule̩ me̩-gwe̩fa bi.
E̩wñ ki bo̩ kʼAbaija che, kpʼalu kʼi le, kpʼo̩la kʼi ka, ma ko̩ rʼef o̩takada inabali Ido akache̩ le̩.
Tak Abaija chʼolu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef ewo Defid. Tak Esa, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ. Iko-wñ ane̩ le̩ nʼuñmi o̩do̩ me̩gwa.
Esa la che e̩wñ kʼi nyo̩ kpʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa eju Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wñ.
I la mʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ abononojo kpʼotete otete ko rinyo̩, oñ i mʼumanede e-okuta kpo̩fo̩, i fʼujo̩ oli Ashe̩ra lo̩wane̩,
oñ i ñwa ñw abo Juda ku ma tene Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-ma, ku ma la che teju uko̩-o̩la-wñ kpʼuko̩ kʼi te̩ ñwu ma.
I ño̩ mʼotete otete kpʼojibo ojibo olu ko kwʼef ewo ewo Juda. Ojane̩ le̩ la fʼuñmi ne̩ o̩gba-wñ.
Oñ i fʼewo ewo ki nʼaku ko̩ oj ane̩ Juda; todu ane̩ le̩ fʼuñmi ne̩. Ogu du la de̩ ñw u o̩do̩ o̩do̩ kʼa ka le̩ n, todabu ku Jihofa mʼuñmi du ñw u.

Tak i ka ñw abo Juda kakini, A ki fʼewo ewo-i ko̩, kʼa fʼaku bunyʼu daka kpʼo̩do̩go̩ o̩do̩go̩ kpʼalaku kpʼugbo̩lo̩ oli, abu kʼane̩ te̩ o̩gba wa-i ukpe̩ kʼa tene Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa; a tene wñ, oñ i mʼuñmi du ñw a ugbo tʼugbo du. Abe̩le ma fu ko̩, oñ i ra ñwu ma.

Esa la chenʼabogu icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oli me̩fa ku ma nʼo̩kpata-beli kpʼo̩kwo̩, ku ma kwʼoj ane̩ Juda; abo ku ma kwʼoj ane̩ Be̩njamin, ku ma nʼugbe̩yo̩ ku ma tʼo̩fa chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo oli me̩lu nyʼo̩gue̩gwa abo-i chaka chʼamagbiti ki nʼuwohi.
Taku Zira, e̩ne̩ Itiopia, nʼabogu icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpʼo̩kogu oli me̩fa dufu wa akobʼo̩. Oñ i lewa Maresha.
Tak Esa dufu aledʼo, oñ ma kʼabogu dojo̩ ef o̩go̩ Ze̩fata Maresha.

Esa kwado̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wñ, oñ i kakini, Jihofa, i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dabʼuwe̩ kʼi ate̩ko agbagba amagbiti kpʼamegbo n: te̩ko wa, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa; todu a chubiyʼ uwe̩, ef odu e-we̩ oñ a wa kʼa kobʼo̩wo̩ one̩-i. O Jihofa, uwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩-wa; e̩ ki je̩ ñw one̩ fʼe̩ du n;
abe̩le̩ Jihofa fʼabo Itiopia gwoda o̩gba Esa kpʼo̩gba abo Juda; tak abo Itiopia ra.

Tak Esa kpʼamone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ rano ma gbogbo wa Guar; oñ abo Itiopia wane̩ gbogbo tak e̩ne̩ du efu ma ma bo̩ deju ge̩ n; todu ma chʼe̩kpo̩-fo̩ te̩ o̩gba Jihofa kpʼo̩gba abogu-wñ; ane̩ kʼogu je̩ ku ma ko kwʼo̩mo̩ tabale.
Taku ma fʼewo ewo du ki jo̩ le Girar daka gwoda; todu ailo Jihofa lewa bʼuma ma. Ma la mʼewo ewo le̩ ane̩ ño̩ hiele̩; todu ane̩ kʼogu aje̩ ki jʼef ewo ewo le̩ che nana.
Ma ño̩ fʼunyabo unyabo abo ku ma nʼame̩wñ ukpa gwoda, ma la kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kwʼo̩mo̩ e̩kute̩, kpʼaminyakulumi, taku ma mudabi wa Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak Afu O̩jo̩ lewa bʼAzaraya, o̩ma Ode̩d, ma;

oñ i dufu aledo Esa. I ka ñw u kakini, Me̩ gbʼo̩la-mi, Esa kpʼabo Juda kpʼabo Be̩njamin chaka: Jihofa dʼugbo me̩ abu ku me̩ jʼugbo-wñ; i la che̩wñ kʼame̩ tene owñ, i aje̩ ñwu me̩ liʼu: i muda che̩wñ kʼame̩ hiʼu tinyo̩ owñ ahiʼume̩ tinyo̩.
Iko kʼabo Israe̩l ma nʼO̩jo̩ ochochi n, kpʼiko ku ma ma nʼatama kʼi ako̩ ma n, ku ma ma nʼuko̩-o̩la n te̩ jiji,
ama e̩gba ku ma jʼef o̩bata ma rida abo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, ma la tene owñ oñ ma fʼu li.
Iko kʼa ka le̩ i nʼuñmi ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi dufu n, e̩ne̩ ki gudu wa la ne̩ n; uchobi inaina bʼabo ku ma dodo oj ane̩ ane̩ ugbo du ma.
Ma fʼabo uche̩ ichiʼka kpo̩fo̩ rʼabo uche̩ ichi omune̩, ewo laño̩ kpo̩fo̩ rʼewo omune̩; todu O̩jo̩ nʼo̩pe̩cha ojoji ojoji du fʼuma kpo̩fo̩.
Ame̩ ki muda fʼeju gbiti, o̩wo̩-me̩ ki lo̩ n; todu uko̩lo̩-me̩ chenʼuro̩me̩.

Tak e̩gba kʼEsa gbʼo̩la-i, kpʼache̩ ku Ode̩d akache̩ ka le̩, i fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, oñ i mʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ko bʼoj ane̩ Juda kpai Be̩njamin du te̩, kpai kwʼef ewo, ewo kʼi gba oj ane̩ uwo Ifraim; i la fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi dʼo̩gba agbaru Jihofa le̩ ñwo̩che etito̩.

Tak i kʼabo Juda kpʼabo Be̩njamin chaka kpʼabo ku ma ge̩ne̩ efu ma jeju, manyʼabo Ifraim kpʼabo Manasa kpʼabo Simeo̩n: todu abo ku ma kʼo̩la-ma kwʼef abo Israe̩l ku ma wʼef o̩wo̩-wñ e̩gba ku ma li ka ku Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wñ, dʼugbo-wñ, chʼe̩kute̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma kʼo̩la-ma jeju jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m ochu e̩ke̩ta o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu kʼEsa jʼonu.
Oñ ma fʼamokuno̩ ogume̩lu chʼicham kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ mebie ko kwʼef e̩wñ kʼogu je̩ le̩ kpa ñwu Jihofa o̩jo̩ le̩.
Taku ma fʼalu jo̩ oñ ma kpalo ka ku ma anʼe̩do̩-ma kpʼonugo-ma chaka atene Jihofa O̩jo̩ amata-ma,
taku ma akpa e̩ne̩ du kʼi ko̩ etene Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, dagba i nya, dagba i nana, dagba i chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩, dagba i chʼonobule̩.
Taku ma dʼomu dago ago̩ Jihofa, ma nʼo̩ga achi, ma nʼo̩kakachi afa kpai ibijila.
Tak abo Juda du yo̩ ego ku ma go le̩; todabu kʼe̩do̩-ma chaka tʼego ku ma go̩ le̩, oñ ma tene owñ kpʼe̩do̩-ma chaka. Ma fʼowñ li, taku Jihofa dʼuñmi ñwu ma ale ma daka.
I ño̩ du Maaka, iye Esa onu le̩, tane̩ bʼugugu iye onu te̩, todabu kʼi fʼojibo ihie̩ne̩ che todu Ashe̩ra; Esa la fʼojibo-wñ le̩ lo̩ wane̩, i fʼu kwu ebutu, tak i fʼu gujo ef o̩go̩ Kidro̩n.
Ma muda kʼotete otete rinyo̩ bʼoj ane̩ Israe̩l te̩ n; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ e̩do̩ Esa mufu o̩jo̩ udeju-wñ chaka.
Oñ i mʼe̩wñ kʼata-wñ che ki fo̩ le̩ ko wʼef unyi O̩jo̩, kpʼe-kʼowñ onugo che ki fo̩, owñ chʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia kpʼe̩wñ eku.
Ogu la ño̩ de̩ ge̩ n gbogbo tak Esa fʼo̩fe̩-wñ je̩ o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyʼoke me̩lu.
O̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩fa kʼEsa jʼonu, Beasha, onu Israe̩l, mute̩gu wa akobo̩ Juda, oñ i fu Rama ko̩, kʼi we eje̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du dufu abe̩k egudu nyʼugbo Esa onu Juda.
Tak Esa mʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia ko kwef e̩wñ akoko unyi O̩jo̩ kpʼe-unyi onu, oñ i kʼo kpuche̩ ru Be̩n-hedad onu Siria, kʼi gugu Damaskus, kakini,
Omi kpʼuwe̩ fʼalu jo̩ alu kʼata-mi kpʼata-we̩ jʼalu: go, u mʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia ko kpuche̩ rʼuwe̩ le̩; lo, kʼe̩ fʼalo-we̩ kpai Beasha, onu Israe̩l, bie̩, todu kʼi kwo bʼumi oji te̩.
Taku Be̩n-hedad netiru Esa onu, oñ i fʼamagboji abogu-wñ kpe̩ nyʼakʼogu bʼewo ewo Israe̩l; ma la fʼIjo̩n kpai Dan kpai Ebe̩l-meim gwoda, kpʼewo Naftali du ugbo kʼaka jo̩.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku Beasha gbʼinabali-wñ, i tu Rama eko̩ no̩, i la mʼo̩wo̩ du nʼuko̩lo̩-wñ.
Tak Esa, onu, mʼabo Juda chaka ko; taku ma mʼokuta Rama, kpʼigbo oli-wñ ku Beasha ne̩ kʼo̩ le̩ ko kwʼo̩mo̩. Oñ i mʼe-le̩ ko ko̩ Geba kpai Mizpa.
Iko le̩ Hane̩ni, agane̩ le̩ wʼugbo Esa, onu Juda, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Todabu kʼe̩ chubiyo̩ onu Siria kʼe̩ ma la chubiyo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ n, todule̩ oñ abogu onu Siria fʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩-i.
Abo Itiopia kpʼabo Libia chʼabogu wewe n? O̩kogu-ma kpʼamananya-ma la wewe tabale n? Oñ ukpe̩ kʼe̩ la chubiyo̩ Jihofa i mʼuma ko nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩.
Todu eju Jihofa ale tʼemi tʼemi ugbo du ile̩-i, kʼi adʼo̩la-wñ dufu chʼagbiti tod abo kʼe̩do̩-ma fe̩ rʼu. E̩ fʼe̩wñ idada che ef e-i me̩; todu akwʼe̩gba-i uwe̩ adʼef ogu eja.
O̩la agane̩ le̩ bi Esa eju, oñ i mʼu du tʼef unyi-uga; todu e̩do̩-wñ kpa ololo noji e̩wñ-i. Tak Esa fʼamone̩ iche̩ka te̩-mane̩ iko le̩.
E̩ la go, e̩wñ kʼEsa che tʼe-ejodudu tʼe-otitala, go inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ ef o̩takada amonu Juda kpʼIsrae̩l.
Oñ o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩la kʼEsa jʼonu o̩ga fʼe̩re̩-wñ mu, o̩ga-wñ la bie̩ne̩ alo waa, i chaka chʼef oga-wñ le̩ i tene Jihofa n, chai amobochi.
