Tak Esa cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ i leku o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyokeʼka kʼi jʼonu.

Taku ma mʼu du ji ef oji-wñ onugo, owñ chʼe-kʼi da ñw o̩la-wñ ewo Defid; ma la mʼu du dachi oj ate̩ kʼe̩wñ e̩kpo e̩rinyo̩ che̩ko̩ ñw u, owñ chʼe̩wñ ojoji ojoji kʼabo ku ma chʼoka otulale che. Ma la fʼuna lile lile ko tod uwñ.
Taku Jiho̩shafat, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ. Oñ i dʼugbiti ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi kobo̩ Israe̩l.
I kʼabogu jʼewo Juda du ki nʼaku, i laño̩ mʼabo ide kojo̩ oj ane̩ Juda, kpʼewo ewo Ifraim e-kʼEsa ata-wñ du le̩.
Jihofa la dʼugbo Jiho̩shafat, todabu kʼi lule̩ o̩na o̩na ki Defid ata-wñ le e̩gba ejodudu le̩, i la nyʼugbo amiBeal atene n.
I muda tene ugbo O̩jo̩ e-ata-wñ, oñ i lule̩ teju uko̩ uko̩ kʼi te̩, i la likpa e̩wñ kʼabo Israe̩l jʼache n.
Oñ Jihofa fʼo̩fe̩ ojane̩ le̩ lonyane̩ ef o̩wo̩-wñ. Abo Juda chaka la kʼe̩wñ ele wa ñwu Jiho̩shafat, oñ i fʼe̩wñ anana kpʼojima ne̩ ololo.
I la fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ lʼo̩na o̩na Jihofa; i ño̩ mʼotete otete kpai ujo̩ ujo̩ Ashe̩ra ko bʼane̩ Juda te̩.
Tak o̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta kʼi jʼonu i fʼamagboji-wñ Be̩nhe̩il kpʼObadaya kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Netane̩l kpai Maikaya kpuche̩ nyʼako̩ amone̩ e̩wñ ewo ewo Juda;

abo Lifai laño̩ manyʼuma, owñ che She̩maya kpai Ne̩tanaya kpai Ze̩badaya kpai Asahe̩l kpai She̩maira-mo̩t kpai Je̩ho̩natan kpai Adonija kpai Tobaija kpai To̩bado̩naija ku ma chʼabo Lifai le̩. Abo ku ma manyʼuma o̩la la che E̩lishama kpai Jiho̩ram, ku ma chʼamatama.
Oñ ma ko̩ one̩ e̩wñ Juda, ma la nʼo̩takada uko̩-o̩la Jihofa ugbo ma: oñ ma tale ugbo du ewo ewo Juda, akʼone̩ o̩la ef amone̩ le̩.
Tak ailo Jihofa bʼojane̩ ojane̩ du ki le Juda daka ma, todule̩ ma kʼogu bo̩ Jiho̩shafat-i n.

Abo Filistia iche̩kibo̩ la kʼe̩wñ ele wa ñwu Jiho̩shafat, kpʼajifa ku ma rʼire̩ ñw u: abo Arabia la kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini wa ñw u, amokolo che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ mebie nyʼo̩gume̩lu chʼicham oji kpai amobuko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ mebie nyʼogume̩lu chʼicham oji.
Jiho̩shafat la nana nyo̩gba ololo waa. Tak i fʼunyi unyi ku ma bʼaku nyʼu ko̩ ojane̩ Juda kpʼewo ewo ugbo ku ma akʼidujo̩.
I la nʼidu nana ewo ewo Juda kpʼabogu ku ma chʼamagbiti ku ma wohi ma, ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m.

Oñ alu ku ma kʼuma aluka unyi unyi amata-ma de̩: e-Juda chʼamagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩: Adna chʼagboji, amagbiti ku ma wohi ma ku ma jʼugbo-wñ che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oli me̩fa;
e̩ne̩ kʼi la ro̩nʼo-wñ che Jiho̩henan kʼi chʼagboji, one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo oli me̩lu nyʼogwe̩gwa la jʼugbo-wñ;
e̩ne̩ kʼi la ro̩nʼowñ la che Amasaya, o̩ma Zikri, e-kʼi gʼedo̩la-wñ adʼo̩la-wñ ñwu Jihofa; amagbiti ku ma wohi ma ku ma jʼugbo-wñ la che one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gwo̩ko̩.
E-Be̩njamin la de̩: Eli-ada kʼi chʼagbiti kʼi nʼuwohi; abo ku ma nʼo̩o̩do kpʼugbe̩yo̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ la chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gwo̩ko̩;
Je̩hozabad la ro̩nʼowñ oñ one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩la kʼo̩la-ma la che̩mu ñw ogu la jʼugbo-wñ.
Abo̩ le̩ chʼabo ku ma jʼanede alu onu, manyʼabo kʼonu ko ma jo̩ ewo ewo ki nʼaku ugbo du oj ane̩ Juda.
Oñ Jiho̩shafat nʼe̩wñ anana kpʼojima e̩kute̩; oñ i le teke fʼalu de̩ kpʼEhab ugbo o̩la o̩ya.
Abu kʼi jʼo̩do̩ pe̩ tak i gwo̩ru nyi Samaria ugbo Ehab. Oñ Ehab fʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpʼamokuno̩ kpa ñw u ololo ololo, kpai todu amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, oñ i gbo̩ ibe kʼi lebʼo̩ nyi Ramo̩t-gile̩ad.
Ehab, onu Israe̩l, la ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat, onu Juda kakini, Uwe̩ alebʼumi nyi Ramo̩t-gilead? Tak i dohi ñw u kakini, Omi dʼalu kʼuwe̩ de̩, abo-mi la dabe̩ne̩ kʼabo-we̩; omi adʼef ogu le̩ kpʼuwe̩.
Tak Jiho̩shafat ka ñw onu Israe̩l kakini, Agba, e̩ tene o̩la Jihofa eñini ta.
Tak onu Israe̩l kʼamakache̩ wa jo̩, ma chʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, A nyi Ramo̩t-gilead kʼa jo̩gu, abe̩k u nawe? Taku ma kakini, Mute̩gu alo, oñ O̩jo̩ adʼu tʼonu o̩wo̩.
Ama Jiho̩shafat kakini, I nʼakache̩ Jihofaʼka emi manyʼabo-i, kʼa tene I ugbo owñ n?

Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat kakini, E̩ne̩ʼkate kʼa ti Jihofa e̩ne̩ lugbo-wñ bo̩ ta; ulaka-wñ muda ache mi, todu i akache̩ e̩nyo̩ ñwu mi n, chai e̩bie̩ne̩ e̩gba du: owñ che Maikaya, o̩ma Imla. Taku Jiho̩shafat kakini, Onu ki ka abe̩le̩ n.
Tak onu Israe̩l fʼonojiʼka do̩ wa oñ i kakini, E̩ nyʼado̩ Maikaya, o̩ma Imla, wa pio-pio.
Tak onu Israe̩l kpai Jiho̩shafat onu Juda, kʼotogbo-ma nyʼo̩la oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ gugu oj ede-wñ, ma la gugu o̩gbaa ugbo ku ma gudu lʼalaku Samaria; amakache̩ du la jʼo̩gba ma akache̩.
Taku Ze̩de̩kaya o̩ma Ke̩-neana, fʼigba ebije che ñw o̩la-wñ, oñ i kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Uwe̩ anʼe̩wñ-i kʼabo Siria e̩che̩ gbogbo tak e̩ fʼuma lie̩ kpa.
Tak amakache̩ le̩ chaka kache̩ abe̩le̩ ge̩, ma kakini, Mu te̩gu nyi Ramo̩t-gilead, kʼi ra ñw e̩; todu Jihofa adʼu nyʼonu o̩wo̩.
Tak onuche̩ kʼi nyʼado̩ Maikaya ko̩la ñw u kakini, Go, amakache̩ nʼaluʼkate ako̩la e̩nyo̩ ñw onu; todule̩, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼe̩, alu-we̩ ki dab e-ma oka, kʼuwe̩ ki ka e̩nyo̩.
Taku Maikaya kakini, Oji Jihofa, e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩-mi aka, e-le̩ naka.
Tak e̩gba kʼi lewa ugbo onu, onu ka ñw u kakini, Maikaya, a nyʼakobo̩ Ramo̩t-gilead kʼa jogu? abe̩k u nawe? Tak i kakini, Me̩ te̩gu alo, ki ra ñwu me̩; ma la ako ma nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩.
Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, E̩re̩ monu oñ omi akpe̩bo̩ nʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ we eko̩la du tʼochochi le ef odu Jihofa ñwu mi?

Tak i kakini, Omi fʼabo Israe̩l chaka li abu ku ma chʼe̩kpatuka jʼoj uwo uwo dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma ma nʼe̩ne̩ ki adejute̩ ma n; oñ Jihofa kakini, Abo-i nʼodu n; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ki mudabi tʼunyi-wñ ef ure̩do̩.
Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat, Omi ka ñw e̩ ka kʼi akache̩ e̩nyo̩ ugbo mi ni n? chai e̩bie̩ne̩ n?
Oñ Maikaya kakini, Todule̩ ame̩ ki gbʼo̩la Jihofa: u fu Jihofa li abu kʼi gugu oj ede-wñ, oñ o̩wo̩ abo efojale du dago jo̩ o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ kpʼawohi-wñ.
Taku Jihofa kakini, E̩ne̩ agba Ehab onu Israe̩l ibe kʼi te̩gu nyi Ramo̩t-gilead kʼi wane̩? Tak e̩ne̩ʼka kʼabe̩i, oñ e̩ne̩ omune̩ kʼe-wñ ojoji.
Tak afuʼka dufu wa, oñ i kwodago o̩gba Jihofa, i kakini, Omi agbʼo̩ ibe. Taku Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ e̩ nʼache?
Oñ i kakini, Nadufu, kʼu chʼafu olemi ef alu amakache̩-wñ chaka. Tak i kakini, Uwe̩ agbʼo̩ ibe ochochi, e̩ ñʼafʼu du: dufu alo kʼe̩ che abe̩le̩.
Todule̩ fai, e̩ go, Jihofa mʼafu olemi du tʼef alu amakache̩-we̩-i; Jihofa la fʼo̩la e̩bie̩ne̩ ka ugbo we̩ me̩.
Taku Ze̩de̩kaya, o̩ma Ke̩neana, te̩ me̩rʼu oñ i dʼo̩wo̩ gwo Maikaya iti, oñ i kakini, Onu ugbo oñ Afu Jihofa kwʼugbo mi le kʼi ko̩la ñw e̩?
Taku Maikaya kakini, go, Uwe̩ ali o̩jo̩ kʼuwe̩ anyʼunyi unyi ejefu kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ maja.
Tak onu Israe̩l kakini, Me̩ mu Maikaya du, ku me̩ mʼu du dabiwa ugbo Emo̩n, agboji ewo-i, kpʼugbo Joash, o̩ma onu;
kʼe̩ kakini, Abu kʼonu ka de̩, kakini, Mʼe̩ne̩-i du tef unyi uga, kʼe̩ la dʼuje̩wñ o̩bata ñw u je̩ kpʼomi o̩bata ñw u ñmo̩, gbogbo tak u mudabiwa ef ure̩do̩.
Taku Maikaya kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ nʼure̩do̩ re dabiwa, maku Jihofa ko̩la lugbo mi n de̩. Tak i kakini, Me̩ gbo̩, ame̩ amone̩-i, o̩chaka me̩.
Abe̩le̩ onu Israe̩l kpai Jiho̩shafat, onu Juda, mute̩gu nyi Ramo̩t-gilead.
Tak onu Israe̩l ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat, kakini, Nakpʼafe̩ lu, tak u nyʼef ogu-i; uwe̩ ki muda kʼotogbo-we̩ nyʼo̩la. Abe̩le̩ onu Israe̩l fʼafe̩-wñ kpalu; oñ ma nyʼef ogu le̩.
Onu Siria la ñwa ñw amagboji abo o̩kogu-wñ tane̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki ja kpʼe̩ne̩ kekele kpʼe̩ne̩ lile du n, chai onu Israe̩l kate me̩ ja kpʼowñ.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼamagboji abo o̩kogu le̩ fu Jiho̩shafat li, ma kakini, Onu Israe̩l de̩! Oñ ma donyʼu ku ma kobʼo̩; Jiho̩shafat muda kwa, Jihofa la te̩kʼowñ; oñ O̩jo̩ je̩ ñwu ma na bʼo̩ te̩.
Tak i lewatu e̩gba kʼamagboji o̩kogu Li ka kʼi chʼonu Israe̩l de̩ n, ma mudabi bʼeranʼo te̩.

Tak e̩ne̩ʼka fʼoo̩do̩-wñ fa echichi ofo, oñ o̩fa-wñ lʼowe afe̩ ebije afʼonu Israe̩l mu. Tak i ka ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi agwa o̩kogu-wñ kakini, Mʼo̩wo̩-we̩ rida kʼe̩ mʼumi du kwef abogu-i dufu; todu ma fʼumi chʼagbe me̩.
Ogu le̩ ño̩ kwane̩ tule o̩jo̩ le̩, oñ onu Israe̩l fʼo̩la-wñ lo dago ef o̩kogu-wñ le̩ akobʼabo Siria gbogbo nyʼane̩; tak ame̩ru iko kʼolu tunyane̩ i mʼiñmi da.
Oñ Jihoshafat onu Juda mudabi tʼunyi-wñ Je̩rusale̩m ef ure̩do̩.

Taku Jihiu, o̩ma Hane̩nai agane̩ le̩, dufu ledʼo, oñ i ka ñw onu Jihoshafat kakini, I dʼukpe̩ kʼuwe̩ ate̩ko ame̩ne̩bibi? kʼe̩ la fe̩do̩ abo ku ma chʼulaka Jihofa? Todule̩ uwe̩do̩ kwʼugbo Jihofa wa bʼuwe̩ ma me̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, i nʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ ku ma li ef uwe̩, owñ chʼujo̩ ujo̩ Ashe̩ra kʼe̩ ko bʼane̩-i te̩, kʼe̩ la dʼe̩do̩ te̩ atene O̩jo̩.
Oñ Jiho̩shafat gugu Je̩rusale̩m. Tak i ño̩ dufu nyʼef amone̩ le̩ akwo Birshiba gbogbo wa ane̩ uwo Ifraim, oñ i ko ma dabi wa ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-ma.
I la kʼamakajo̩ jo̩ ewo ewo oj ane̩ le̩ ugbo du ef ewo ewo Juda ki nʼaku,
oñ i ka ñw amakajo̩ kakini, Me̩ fʼibe tʼe̩wñ ku me̩ che; todu ame̩ kajo̩ koji one̩ n, chai koji Jihofa; i la dʼugbo me̩ ef ajo̩ le̩.
Todule̩ fai, ame̩ ki je̩ ñw ailo Jihofa ki bʼume̩ ma; me̩ fejutʼe̩wñ ku me̩ che; todu uji du dʼugbo Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa n, i nʼe̩nejuma n, kpʼo̩ko̩ ugwa egba n.
Anubile̩ ge̩, Jiho̩shafat ño̩ kʼabo Lifai kpʼamatama kpʼamata ku ma dʼoji dufu Israe̩l jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m, tod ajo̩ Jihofa eka, kpai tod o̩la ki achi. Taku ma mu dabi wa Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ i ñwa ñwu ma kakini, Abe̩le̩ ame̩ ache ef ailo Jihofa, me̩ ki chubi wñ, e̩do̩-me̩ ki de̩ fo̩o̩.

Oñ o̩la du ki chi ef amo̩maye-me̩ ku ma gugu ewo ewo-ma kʼi awʼugbo me̩, ugbo e̩bie̩ edafo abe̩ku ma gwejugede abe̩k egbajiko i gbajiko kpʼuko̩-o̩la kpʼuko̩ kʼi te̩ kpʼuhio̩me̩ ku ma du te̩ kpʼoji ajo̩, me̩ ki la juka ñwu ma ku ma we efʼudu Jihofa, tak uwe̩do̩ kʼi we bʼame̩ kpʼamo̩maye-me̩ oji ma. Me̩ fʼe-i che, mak ame̩ ñʼafʼudu n.

Me̩ la go, Amaraya, kʼi chʼagboji amatama, nʼo̩da-me̩ ugbo e̩wñ e-Jihofa chaka; Ze̩badaya, o̩ma Ishmae̩l, la chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo unyi Juda ugbo e̩wñ e-onu chaka: abo Lifai la ñʼachʼamako̩takada jʼo̩gba me̩. Me̩ fʼejugbiti ku me̩ che; Jihofa ki la adʼugbo e̩ne̩ ki nyo̩.
Oñ i lewatu anubi le̩, kʼamo̩ma Moab kpʼamo̩ma Amo̩n kpʼabo Me̩on iche̩kibo̩ manyʼuma, lewa kogu bo̩ Jiho̩shafat.
Tak abo iche̩ka lewa ka ñwu Jiho̩shafat kakini, O̩wo̩ one̩ otemeje kwo Siria ejudaba ohimini wa ku ma kobʼuwe̩-i; e̩ la go, ma jo̩ Hazazo̩n-temar (owñ chʼE̩nge̩di).
Taku Jiho̩shafat kworailo, oñ i fʼe̩do̩ kparu e̩tene Jihofa; tak i fʼo̩jo̩ alu eji da ugbo du oj ane̩ Juda.
Tak abo Juda kʼo̩la-ma wa jeju ugbo kate, ku ma tene Jihofa; ma la kwʼewo ewo Juda chaka wa atene Jihofa.
Taku Jiho̩shafat kwo̩dago ef ujeju abo Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m, ef unyi Jihofa, o̩gba ologbo etito̩ le̩;
oñ i kakini, O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-wa, uwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ efo̩jaie̩ n? Uwe̩ la nʼo̩da ojane̩ ojane̩ abo uche̩ichi du n? Ukpahiu kpʼugbiti la jʼef o̩wo̩-we̩, e̩ne̩ du la abʼe̩ jo̩ n.
O O̩jo̩-wa, i chʼuwe̩ fʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩-i ne dufu bʼamone̩-we̩, Israe̩l, o̩gba te̩ n? kʼe̩ la mʼu du ñw ugbe̩ Ebraham, e̩nufe̩do̩-we̩, ogbegbele̩ n?
Ma la kwogugu o̩mo̩, oñ ma fʼunyi kiafo̩ ko̩ ñw odu-we̩ o̩mo̩, ma kakini,

Iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ lewa bʼuwa ma, o̩kwo̩chageli abe̩k ajo̩ abe̩k e̩wñ ibi abe̩k o̩kpo̩ta, kʼawa la dago jʼo̩gba unyi-i kpʼo̩gba we̩ (todu odu-we̩ dʼef unyi-i) kʼa akwadʼuwe̩ ef o̩bata-wa le̩, tak uwe̩ agbo̩ kʼe̩ la ajadu wa.

E̩ la go fai ta, amo̩ma Amo̩n kpai Moab kpai abo uwo Se̩ir, kʼuwe̩ ma je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l gudu nyʼefu ma e̩gba ku ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu wa le̩ n, (todu ma muna bʼuma o̩la te̩, oñ ma ma kpa ma bie̩ n;)
go, o̩me̩ ku ma ra wa de̩, ma awa ku ma ko wa rikpolo bʼe̩wñ-we̩ kʼe̩ ne̩ te̩, owñ chʼe-kʼe̩ du ñw a kʼa je̩ e̩wñ ogu.
O O̩jo̩-wa, uwe̩ akajo̩ ma n? todu awa nʼukpahiu du eju o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile ku ma wa ku ma kobʼuwa-i n; a la ma alu kʼa ache n; eju-wa muda chefe̩rʼuwe̩.
Oñ abo Juda chaka kwo̩dago jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa, manyʼamo̩ma-ma egini kpʼamo̩ya-ma kpʼamo̩ma-ma.
Tak Afu Jihofa lewa bo Jahezie̩l, o̩ma Ze̩karaya, o̩ma Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiaye̩l, o̩ma Matanaya, e̩ne̩ Lifai kʼi dʼef amo̩ma E̩saf oji ma alumeji ujeju le̩;

oñ i kakini, Me̩ neti, abo Juda chaka, kpʼame̩ ku me̩ dodo Je̩rusale̩m, kpʼuwe̩ Jiho̩shafat onu: Abu ki Jihofa aka ñwu me̩ de̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki railo n, e̩do̩-me̩ ki da kpu tod o̩wo̩ amone̩-i n; todu ogu-i e̩ja chʼe-me̩ n, chai e-O̩jo̩ i che.
O̩na me̩ gwo̩ru nyʼakobʼuma. Go, ma jo̩ ate̩gu Ziz awa me̩; me̩ la ali ma oj o̩go̩ le̩ ame̩ru aje̩tachi Je̩rue̩l.

I dʼugbo kʼame̩ aja ef ogu-i n, me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ tala jo̩, ku me̩ dago chii, ku me̩ li ujadu ku Jihofa ache todu me̩, O Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m. Me̩ ki railo n, e̩do̩-me̩ ki da kpu n: o̩na me̩ dufu ku me̩ ledo ma; Jihofa la adʼugbo me̩.
Taku Jiho̩shafat fʼoji-wñ dalo, eju-wñ tʼunyʼane̩; tak abo Juda kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m chaka leane̩ o̩gba Jihofa, ma dojikane̩ ñwu Jihofa.
Tak abo Lifai ku ma jʼef amo̩ma Kohat kpʼef amo̩ma Ko̩ra kwane̩ ku ma nʼomu-ma je̩nyu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, taa.

Taku ma takpa kwane̩ odudu, oñ ma le dufu nyʼaje̩tachi Te̩koa: oñ abu ku ma dufu alo, Jiho̩shafat kwane̩ dago, i kakini, Me̩ gbʼomu-mi, O Juda, kpʼame̩ ku me̩ dodo Je̩rusale̩m: me̩ ki dʼo̩la Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ rʼochochi, tak ame̩ adago kpaka; me̩ ki dʼo̩la amakache̩-wñ rʼochochi tak i ara ñwu me̩.
Tak i fʼo̩la lo kpʼamone̩, oñ i chi abo ku ma akeli ñwu Jihofa, ku ma la je̩nyu ñw u ef e̩wñ alifia kiafo̩, abu ku ma dufu ku ma jʼo̩gba abo ku ma fʼo̩logu mu alo, ku ma ka kakini,
Tak e̩gba ku ma chane̩ ekeli oye ku ma la añwulo̩-wñ, Jihofa mʼaboʼka ko maja jo̩ anede amo̩ma Amo̩n kpai Moab kpʼuwo Seir ku ma wa ku ma kobo̩ abo Juda le̩; oñ ma gwo ma da.
Tak amo̩ma Amo̩n kpai Moab kwane̩ ku ma kʼogu bʼabo ku ma dodo uwo Seir ku ma fʼuma kpa rinyo̩ hioko. Tak e̩gba ku ma fʼabo ku ma dodo Seir kpa kpa, ma chane̩ ebʼo̩la-ma che akpʼomune̩ bie̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo Juda lewa ugbo o̩do̩go̩ ide ef aje̩tachi le̩, ku ma kejurʼo̩wo̩ ugbo kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ jo̩; e̩ la go, ama chʼoku one̩ jʼane̩pe̩te̩ o̩mo̩, i la nʼe̩ne̩ du ki futane̩ n.

Tak e̩gba ku Jiho̩shafat kpʼabo-wñ lewa ku ma ñʼane̩-ma, e̩wñ ku ma li o̩mo̩ chʼe̩kute̩, tʼidu nana manyʼoku one̩, kpʼe̩wñ akoko ki bo. Ma la neke ne̩ e̩wñ ku ma gwo̩ bʼoku abo le̩ te̩ kpa n. O̩jo̩ me̩ta ma je̩ taku ma ñʼane̩ kʼogu le̩ je̩ kpa, todabu kʼi tabale.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩le̩-wñ ma kʼo̩la-ma jeju ef o̩go̩ Be̩reka. Todu o̩mo̩ ma kele Jihofa: todule̩ ma dʼodu o̩mo̩ ko̩ o̩go̩ Be̩reka gbogbo tʼeñini.
Tak aboke̩le̩ Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m chaka mudabi ku ma dabi nyi Je̩rusale̩m kpʼuyo̩, Jiho̩shafat la tʼuma o̩gba; todu Jihofa je̩ ñwu ma gwoye rʼame̩nebi-ma oji.
Oñ ma wʼunyi Jihofa Je̩rusale̩m kpʼubo kpʼumolo kpʼo̩kakachi.
Ailo O̩jo̩ la bʼojane̩ ojane̩ ane̩ du ma e̩gba ku ma gbo̩ ka ku Jihofa jʼogu bʼame̩nebi Israe̩l.
Abe̩le̩ ojane̩ Jiho̩shafat bo̩ lii, todu O̩jo̩-wñ dʼuñmi ñw u ugbo du alʼo daka.
Abe̩le̩ Jiho̩shafat jʼonu Juda; o̩do̩-wñ chʼogue̩gwa nyoke me̩lu tak i chane̩ ejonu. Oñ i jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩lu. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Azuba, o̩ma Shilhai.
I la lule̩ o̩na Esa, ata-wñ, i na bʼo̩ te̩ n; i nʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa eju Jihofa ache.
Chai otete otete oñ ma ma ko kwʼo̩mo̩ n; amone̩ le̩ la kpʼe̩do̩ rʼO̩jo̩ e-amata-ma e̩gba le̩ ta n.
E̩wñ ki bo̩ ku Jiho̩shafat che, tʼe-ejodudu tʼe-ubiane̩, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ ef o̩takada o̩la Jihiu, o̩ma Hane̩nai, ku ma ko tunyʼo̩takada amonu Israe̩l.
Oñ ubi le̩ Jiho̩shafat, onu Juda, ma kpʼEhazaya, onu Israe̩l kʼi fʼe̩wñ bibi che tabale.
I la ma kpʼowñ ku ma chʼo̩ko̩ ki anyi Tarshish. Oñ ma fʼo̩ko̩ le̩ che E̩zion-geba.
Tak E̩lieza, o̩ma Dodafahu e-Maresha fʼache̩ ka no Jiho̩shafat oji, kakini, Todabu kʼuwe̩ ma kpʼEhazaya, Jihofa la fʼuko̩lo̩-we̩ kpabie̩ me̩. Tak oko oko le̩ mukpo̩fo̩, oñ ma ma neke nyi Tarshish in.
Taku Jiho̩shafat chʼolu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji manyʼamata-wñ ef ewo Defid. Taku Jihoram, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.
I laño̩ chenʼamo̩maye e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, ku ma chʼamo̩ma Jiho̩shafat: Azaraya kpai Je̩haye̩l kpai Ze̩karaya kpʼAzaraya kpai Maike̩l kpai She̩fataya; abo-i chaka chʼamo̩na e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Jiho̩shafat, onu Juda.
Oñ ata-ma kʼe̩wñ lile chʼuma ele, e-ajifa do̩mo̩ kpʼe-o̩jamalia kpʼe-e̩wñ akoko ki bo̩, manyʼewo ewo ki nʼaku oj ane̩ Juda: i muda dʼo̩fe̩-wñ ñw o̩ma-wñ Jihoram je̩, ukpe̩ kʼi chʼo̩mo̩gba-wñ.
Oñ abu ku Jihoram kwane̩ kʼi nʼo̩da ojane̩ ata-wñ, kʼi la mʼukpahiu du ñw o̩la-wñ, i nʼo̩kwo̩chageli fʼamo̩maye-wñ du kpa, kpʼamagboji Israe̩l iche̩ka ge̩.
O̩do̩ Jihoram la chʼogue̩gwa nyoke meji e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ; i la jonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩jo̩.
Oñ i lule̩ o̩na amonu Israe̩l, alu kʼabo unyi Ehab che le̩; todu i nʼo̩ma Ehab chʼo̩ya: i la nʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa ache.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ Jihofa ko̩ ekpʼunyi Defid bie̩, tod alo kʼi kpe̩ kpai Defid, kpʼalu kʼi ka kʼi adʼagege ñwu Defid kpʼamo̩ma-wñ o̩jo̩ du.
Iko-wñ Ido̩m gbʼo̩la-ma tane̩ bʼef o̩wo̩ Juda te̩, oñ ma fʼonu che ñw o̩la-ma.
Taku Jihoram manyʼamonu ogu-wñ kpʼo̩kogu-wñ du lale rʼo̩mo̩: oñ i kwane̩ odu, i la fʼabo Ido̩m ku ma donyʼu daka gwoda, manyʼamagboji abo o̩kogu o̩kogu ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ abo̩ Ido̩m kwo bʼef o̩wo̩ Juda te̩ gbogbo tʼeñini. Iko le̩ ge̩ abo̩ Libna gbʼo̩la-ma tane̩ bʼef o̩wo̩-wñ te̩, todabu kʼi hi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-wñ, tinyo̩.
Anoji e-le̩ i ño̩ fʼotete otete che oj uwo uwo Juda ge̩, oñ i je̩ ñw abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m ku ma nyʼajo̩ko̩, oñ i je̩ ñwu abo Juda chila.
Tak o̩takada kwʼugbo E̩laija, akache̩, wʼugbo-wñ kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Defid ata-we̩, ka de̩, kakini, Todabu kʼe̩ ma lule̩ o̩na o̩na Jiho̩shafat, ata-we̩, kpai o̩na o̩na Esa, onu Juda le̩ n,

kʼe̩ muda lule̩ o̩na o̩na amonu Israe̩l, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñwu Juda kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m ku ma tʼachʼe̩wñ abutabu alu kʼabo unyi Ehab tʼachʼe̩wñ abutabu le, kʼe̩ laño̩ fʼamo̩maye-we̩ ku ma chʼabo unyi ata-we̩ ku ma la nyo̩ tʼuwe̩ le kpa:
go, Jihofa anʼegwo lile gwʼabo-we̩ kpʼamo̩ma-we̩ kpʼamo̩ya-we̩ kpʼane̩-we̩ chaka da.
O̩ga e̩bie̩ne̩ ñʼamu we̩ ge̩, o̩ga-wñ amu ifi-we̩ gbogbo tak ifi-we̩ ake̩che̩ dufu noji o̩ga ki ache we̩ o̩jo̩ ñwa o̩jo̩ ñwa.
Oñ Jihofa dʼe̩do̩ abo Filistia kpʼama Arabia ku ma dabane̩ Itiopia jo kwane̩ ku ma kobo̩ Jihoram.
Oñ ma lewa akobo̩ abo Juda, ma la gwulo̩ bʼo̩mo̩ ma, oñ ma mʼane̩ du ku ma li unyi onu ño̩, manyʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩ya-wñ. Abe̩le̩ o̩ma du bo̩ ñw u n, chai Jihoahaz o̩ma-wñ e-kekele.
Anubi e̩wñ le̩ du Jihofa nʼoga ki ma gbʼogu n gwʼifi-wñ da.
Abe̩le̩ gbogbo abu kʼodo meji muda ko, ifi-wñ kwoke̩che̩ dufu noj o̩ga-wñ le̩, oñ i leku ef iwo̩ o̩ga le̩ ki bie̩ne̩. Abo-wñ la kʼuna tod uwñ alu ku ma ko tod amata-wñ n.
O̩do̩-wñ chʼogue̩gwa nyoke meji e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu, oñ i jonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩jo̩; uku-wñ la wʼe̩ne̩ du eju n. Ma mʼu du ji ef ewo Defid, i muda chʼef ulo̩ja amonu n.
Tak abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m du Ehazaya, udabi-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ; todu udala abo ku ma le̩bʼamArabia wa kobo̩ uru le̩ fʼabo e-ogijo kpa kpa. Abe̩le̩ Ehazaya, o̩ma Jihoram, onu Juda, fʼonu je̩.
O̩do̩ Ehazaya chʼogu nyoke meji e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu; i la jonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ʼka: odu iye-wñ ko̩ Atalaya, aaju Omri.
Owñ le̩ ño̩ lule̩ o̩na o̩na abunyi Ehab; todu iye-wñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ako owñ kʼi chʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩.
Abe̩le̩ i fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, alu kʼabunyi Ehab che le̩; todu ama le̩ mud abo̩hiala-wñ abu kʼata-wñ leku ku ma nʼe̩ tʼef ulenyo̩.
I la lule̩ alu ku ma kʼo̩, oñ i lebo̩ Jihoram, o̩ma Ehab onu Israe̩l, nyʼokogu ku ma kogu bo̩ Hazae̩l onu Siria, Ramo̩t-gilead. Abo Siria la fu Joram chagbe.

Tak i mudabi wa Je̩zree̩l kʼi kpʼagbe ku ma chʼo Rema e̩gba kʼi bo̩ Hazae̩l, onu Siria, jogu le̩. Abe̩le̩ Ehazaya, o̩ma Jihoram onu Juda, gwo̩ru nyi Je̩zree̩l afejudo Jo̩ram o̩ma Ehab todu kʼi achʼo̩ga le̩.
O̩jo̩ nyi Ehazaya ete̩mane̩ le̩ ef ewa kʼi wʼugbo Joram: todu abu kʼi lewa i lebo̩ Jihoram ku ma kobo̩ Jihiu, o̩ma Nimshi, ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji kʼi kʼabo unyi Ehab da rinyo̩.
Oñ i lewatu abu ku Jihiu do̩mo̩ ache e̩wñ kʼoji ajo̩ ka, abʼunyi Ehab ma, i fʼamagboji Juda kpʼamo̩ma amo̩maye Ehazaya ku ma che e̩wñ ñw Ehazaya li oñ i fʼuma kpa.

Tak i kwotejane̩ Ehazaya, oñ ma fʼu mu abu kʼi maja Samaria; taku ma mʼu du wʼugbo Jihiu, oñ ma fʼu kpa. Ma la mʼu du ji, todu ma kakini, O̩ma Jihoshafat kʼi tene Jihofa kpʼe̩do̩-wñ chaka le̩ de̩. I muda nʼe̩ne̩ du ef abo unyi Ehazaya kʼi nʼukpahiu bʼo̩fe̩ ojane̩ le̩ jo̩ n.
Oñ e̩gba kʼAtalaya, iye Ehazaya, li ka kʼo̩ma-wñ leku, i kwane̩, oñ i fʼamo̩ma o̩fe̩ abunyi Juda kpa.

Ama Je̩ho̩shabe̩at, o̩ma onobule̩ Jiho̩ram mu Joash, o̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ehazaya du, oñ i mʼu ji kwef amo̩ma onu ku ma kpa le̩, i la mʼowñ kpʼe̩ne̩ kʼi anʼe̩ du tʼef unyi ugbo ku ma kʼane̩ ate̩ jo̩. Abe̩le̩ Je̩ho̩shabe̩at, o̩ma Jihoram onu, kʼi chʼo̩ya Jiho̩yada atama, (todu owñ chʼo̩maye Ehazaya), mʼu du maja bʼAtalaya te̩, oñ i ma dʼu kpa n.
I la maja ef unyi O̩jo̩ ugbo ma o̩do̩ me̩fa. Oñ Atalaya jonu ane̩ le̩.

Tak ef o̩do̩ e̩kebie e̩do̩ gbo ñwu Jiho̩yada, oñ i je̩ ñw amagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu fʼalo kpe̩ kpʼowñ, owñ che Azaraya, o̩ma Je̩roham kpai Ishmae̩l, o̩ma Jihohenan kpʼAzaraya, o̩ma Obe̩d kpai Maaseya, o̩ma Adaya kpai Ilaishafat, o̩ma Zikri.
Taku ma tale ugbo du ane̩ Juda, oñ ma kʼabo Lifai kwʼef ewo ewo Juda chaka wajo̩, manyʼamata ku ma dʼoji dufu Israe̩l, oñ ma lewa Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak abo ujeju le̩ chaka fʼalo kpe̩ kpʼonu ef unyi O̩jo̩. Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ go, o̩ma onu-i ajʼo̩fe̩ alu ki Jihofa ka ugbo amo̩ma Defid le̩.
E̩wñ ku me̩ ache la de̩: ukpe̩re̩ta ame̩ ku me̩ chʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai, ku me̩ gudu wa o̩jo̩ uñmi, ade alo̩na alo̩na;
ukpe̩re̩ta-me̩ la ajo̩ unyi onu; oñ ukpe̩re̩ta ajo̩ alaku e̩rane̩-wñ; oñ amone̩ du la ajʼologbo ologbo unyi Jihofa.
Me̩ ki muda je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du gudu wʼef unyi Jihofa n, chai amatama kpʼabo Lifai ku ma che e̩wñ o̩mo̩; ama le̩ agudu wa todu o̩la-ma afo; amone̩ le̩ du muda ade ide Jihofa.
Oñ abo Lifai adonyʼonu daka, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ anʼebije ogu-wñ o̩wo̩; e̩ne̩ du kʼi la mugudu wʼef unyi-i ma amʼu du kpa; ame̩ ki nakpe̩re̩ kpʼonu e̩gba kʼi agudu wa kpʼe̩gba kʼi adufu.

Abe̩le̩ abo Lifai kpʼabo Juda chaka che alu du ku Jihoyada atama ñwate̩. E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la mʼabo-wñ ko mʼe̩do̩, owñ chʼabo kʼi dʼukpe̩ ku ma gudu wa o̩jo̩ uñmi, manyʼabo ki dʼukpe̩ ku ma dufu o̩jo̩ uñmi; todu Jiho̩yada tʼuche̩ du no̩ ku ma nyʼunyi n.
Taku Jiho̩yada kʼo̩kwo̩ kpai ugbe̩yo̩ kpʼe̩wñ ube̩do̩ma ki Defid onu ne̩ ki jʼef unyi O̩jo̩ ñw amagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu.
Tak i kʼamone̩ le̩ du jo̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼopiolo-wñ o̩wo̩, ma tala jo̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ unyi le̩ tʼo̩wo̩ awohi-wñ, ale rʼo̩wo̩ ugbo kʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ de̩ kpʼunyi, kpʼugbo kʼonu de̩ daka.
Taku ma mʼe̩ma onu le̩ du dufu wa, oñ ma dʼike̩be̩ onu dʼo oji, ma la dʼe̩wñ ibenu ñw u, oñ ma mʼu du jʼonu. Taku Jihoyada kpʼamo̩ma-wñ fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji; oñ ma kakini, Oji onu ki gbo kala kala.
Tak e̩gba kʼAtalaya gbʼekuku amone̩ ku ma jʼafule ku ma jʼaje̩nyʼonu, i lewʼugbo amone̩ ef unyi Jihofa:

tak i go, e̩ la go, onu dago ugbo oli-wñ ki dago waala ame̩rʼalo̩na, oñ amagboji kpʼamafʼo̩kakachi jʼugbo onu; amone̩ ane̩ le̩ du jʼayo̩, ma la nʼo̩kakachi afa; amakeli laño̩ jʼo̩mo̩ anu e̩wñ iya-ma, kpai abo ku ma ko ma eli uje̩nyu eko̩. Tak Atalaya fʼukpo-wñ fana, oñ i kakini, Alu ma danyʼumi-i! alu ma danyʼumi-i!

Taku Jiho̩yada kʼamagboji one̩ o̩gume̩lu ogume̩lu ku ma nʼo̩da abogu dufu, oñ ika ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼu du kwʼugbo ku ma tala jo̩ le̩ dufu; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi atʼo̩ ubi, ma anʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa; todu atama le̩ kakini, Me̩ ki kpa ef unyi Jihofa-i n.
Taku ma bʼuña ñw u; oñ i le alaku amanya tʼunyi onu: o̩mo̩ ma la dʼu kpa.
Taku Jiho̩yada kpʼalo, owñ kpʼamone̩ le̩ chaka kpʼonu, kʼama ki chʼamone̩ Jihofa.
Tak amone̩ le̩ du le tʼunyi Beal, oñ ma fʼu gulo̩. Ma la mʼubo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ kpʼojibo ojibo-wñ ko kpo̩fo̩ ye̩ge̩ ye̩ge̩, taku ma fu Matan, atama Beal kpa o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ.

Taku Jiho̩yada fʼugugu ugugu abo unyi Jihofa ñwa rʼuko̩lo̩-ma ef o̩wo̩ amatama ku ma chʼabo Lifai e-ki Defid fʼuma kpe̩ru uche̩ uche̩ jo̩ ef unyi Jihofa kʼama ki kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa ñwu Jihofa, alu ku ma ko̩ ef uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s, kʼama ki che kpʼuyo̩ kpʼeli eko̩ alu ki Defid ñwa ñwu ma le̩.
Oñ i kʼamade alo̩na jo̩ alaku alaku unyi Jihofa, kʼe̩ne̩ du ki ma fe̩ n ree, kʼi we egudu wa.

Tak i mʼamagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu, kpʼa-me̩nojima kpʼame̩nuto̩gba amone̩ le̩ kpʼamone̩ du oj ane̩ le̩ ko, oñ ma dʼonu gwo̩ru kwʼunyi Jihofa wa: taku ma le alaku e-ate̩ wʼunyi onu, oñ ma mʼonu du gugu oj ede o̩fe̩ ojane̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ amone̩ ane̩ le̩ du nayo, oñ ewo le̩ nʼuñmi abu ku ma nʼo̩kwo̩chageli fʼAtalaya kpa.
O̩do̩ Joash chʼebie e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejonu; i la jonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji; odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Zaibia, e-Birshiba.
Oñ Joash che e̩wñ ki nyo̩ eju Jihofa o̩jo̩ udeju Jiho̩yada atama le̩ chaka.
Jiho̩yada la fʼo̩ya meji ne̩ ñw u; oñ i fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ bi.
Oñ i lewatu ubi e̩wñ-i, ibe-wñ dʼefu Joash kʼi ñw unyi Jihofa che tʼiko-wñ.

Tak i fʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai ko wa jo̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nyʼewo ewo Juda ku me̩ gbʼo̩ko̩ ugbo abo Israe̩l du wa ku me̩ ñw unyi O̩jo̩-me̩ che o̩do̩ o̩do̩; me̩ hika che. Abo̩ Lifai le̩ muda hika che n.

Tak onu fu Jiho̩yada, kʼi chʼoji-ma le̩, do̩ wa, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma kutʼabo Lifai ku ma nyʼagbʼo̩ko̩ udu ki Mose̩s adu Jihofa ka, kwʼugbo ujeju abo Juda kpai kwo Je̩rusale̩m tod unyabo ibenu le̩ n?
Todu amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Atalaya, onobule̩ bibi le̩, fʼunyi O̩jo̩ kpabie̩; ma ño̩ kʼe̩wñ ku ma ko jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ef unyi Jihofa chaka ñwu ami Beal.
Tak onu ñwa ñwu ma, oñ ma fʼakpatiʼka che, ma la mʼu du gugu o̩do̩da ugbo alaku unyi Jihofa.
Taku ma fʼakoya ta ugbo du Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m kʼama ki kʼo̩ko̩ udu ku Mose̩s, adu Jihofa le̩, bu ñw abo Israe̩l ef aje̩tachi le̩ wa ñwu Jihofa.
Tak amagboji amone̩ le̩ du kwoyo̩, oñ ma mʼu ko wa ro̩ nyʼef akpati le̩ gbogbo taku ma ko wa kpa.

Abe̩le̩ i la de̩, ka kʼe̩gba du kʼabo Lifai dʼakpati wʼugbo abo onu, ku ma li ka kʼo̩ko̩ nana jʼefu-wñ, ako̩takada onu kpʼabo ku ma che e̩wñ ñw agboji amatama ki chʼoji mʼe̩wñ ki jʼefu-wñ ko, taku ma ño̩ dʼakpati le̩ dabi tʼe̩gu-wñ. Abe̩le̩ ma che o̩jo̩ du. Ma la kʼo̩ko̩ wa jo̩ ololo ololo.

Tak onu kpai Jiho̩yada mʼu ko ñw abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eku unyi Jihofa; oñ ama fʼo̩gu che ñw amanʼo̩do̩ kpʼamafʼoli ku ma ñw unyi Jihofa che tʼiko-wñ, ma ño̩ ko ñw abo ku ma gwalo̩ ebije kpʼebije ikpa ku ma ñw unyi Jihofa che.
Abe̩le̩ abuko̩lo̩ nache, oñ uko̩lo̩ unyi eñwo̩che le̩ naya o̩wo̩-ma. Ma la dʼunyi O̩jo̩ dago alu kʼi de̩. Oñ ma ño̩ bʼukpa tʼo̩ kʼi gbiti.

Tak e̩gba ku ma fʼu che kpa, ma kʼe̩bo̩bo̩ o̩ko̩ wa jo̩ o̩gba onu kpai Jiho̩yada, oñ ma du kwef e-le̩ che e̩wñ eku tod unyi Jihofa, owñ chʼe̩wñ eku ku ma ane̩ che e̩wñ ku ma dʼu nʼe̩wñ wa ñw O̩jo̩, tʼuko̩de̩, kpʼe̩wñ eku o̩jamalia kpʼajifa. Ma laño̩ nʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa che ef unyi Jihofa o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ o̩jo̩ udeju Jiho̩yada du.
Jiho̩yada la chʼogijo alo, o̩jo̩-wñ jo̩ oñ i ieku; o̩do̩-wñ chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwa tak i ku.
Oñ ma mʼu du ji ef ewo Defid, ugbo amonu, todabu kʼi fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ che ane̩ Israe̩l, tʼe-ki che ñw O̩jo̩ tʼe-kʼi che ñw unyi-wñ ge̩.
Tak abu ku Jiho̩yada leku amagboji Juda lewa te̩kpe̩ ñw onu. Oñ onu netiru ma.
Oñ ma hi unyi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-ma, tinyo, ma la kwoche ujo̩ ujo̩ oli Ashe̩ra kpai ode ode: tak uwe̩do̩ lewa bi Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m ma tod udu-ma ku ma fe̩ le̩.
Oñ i fʼamakache̩ kpe̩ru ma, kʼi ko ma dabi wa ñwu Jihofa; abo le̩ la gbʼibenu nyʼuma oji; ma muda nyeti n.

Tak Afu O̩jo̩ du Ze̩karaya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada atama le̩, tʼo̩la dab ukpo; oñ i kwodago o̩wo̩ ate̩ ñw amone̩ le̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼO̩jo̩ aka de̩ kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ fʼuko̩ uko̩ ki Jihofa te̩ daba, todu kʼe̩wñ du ki ño̩ ara ñwu me̩ ge̩ n? Todabu kʼame̩ hi Jihofa tinyo̩, owñ laño̩ hi ume̩ tinyo̩ ge̩.
Taku ma fʼalu jo̩ nyʼu; oñ onu fʼuko̩ te̩ ñwu ma oñ ma kʼokuta ro̩ ñw u ef ologbo unyi Jihofa.
Abe̩le̩ oñ Joash onu, ma ño̩ rewa emo̩la ku Jiho̩yada, ata Ze̩karaya, mo̩la ñw u n; i muda dʼo̩ma-wñ kpa. Oñ abu kʼi aku i kakini, Jihofa ki go, kʼi fʼo̩me̩-wñ ra.

Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼodo̩ le̩ muda ko, abogu abo Siria mute̩gu wa akobʼo: oñ ma lewa Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m, ma la fʼamagboji amone̩ le̩ kpa rinyo̩ bʼef amone̩ le̩ te̩, oñ ma mʼane̩-ma du kʼogu le̩ je̩ ko kpuche̩ rʼonu Damaskus.
Todu abogu abo Siria ku ma wa le̩ wewe n, Jihofa muda kʼabogu wewe wewe nyʼuma o̩wo̩ todabu ku ma hi Jihofa O̩jo̩ amata-ma tinyo̩. Abe̩le̩ ma che teju alu kʼoji ajo̩ ka abu Joash ma.

Tak e̩gba ku ma kwo bʼo̩ te̩ (todu agbe-wñ bie̩ne̩ oñ ma tʼo̩ no̩ tʼo̩mo̩), abuko̩lo̩-wñ onugo fʼalu jo̩ nyʼu tod e̩bie̩ o̩ma Jiho̩yada atama kʼi du dafo le̩, oñ ma mʼu du kpa oj ate̩-wñ, tak i leku. Oñ ma mʼu du ji ef ewo Defid; ma muda dʼu ji ulo̩ja amonu n.
Abo ku ma jalunyʼu la de̩: Zebad, o̩ma Shime̩at, onobule̩ Amo̩n oka, kpai Je̩hozabad, o̩ma Shimrit, onobule̩ Moab oka ge̩.
I la chʼe-o̩la amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, kpʼadu inaina ki nʼo oji, kpʼunyi O̩jo̩ edu nyane̩, go, ma fʼinabali-wñ ko̩ ref o̩la o̩takada amonu le̩. Tak Amazaya o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji owñ.
O̩do̩ Amazaya la chʼogue̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejonu. Oñ i jonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩la. Odu iye-wñ la ko Jihoadan e-Je̩rusale̩m.
I la fʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa eju Jihofa che, e̩do̩-wñ muda dʼef uwñ kpa n.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼi fʼerane̩ ne ef o̩fe̩ ojane̩ le̩, i fʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ du ku ma kpʼata-wñ onu le̩ kpa.

I la kpa amo̩ma-ma n, i muda che teju alu ku ma ko̩ nyʼuko̩-o̩la o̩takada Mose̩s, ugbo ki Jihofa ñwate kakini, Amata aku todu amo̩ma n, amo̩ma la aku tod amata n; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ muda aku tod adure kʼowñ onugo ta.

Anubile̩ ge̩ Amazaya mʼabo Juda kowa jo, oñ i fʼuma kpe̩ru jo̩ teju alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩, ma la jʼef o̩wo̩ amagboji one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, kpʼamagboji one̩ ogu me̩lu ogu me̩lu, owñ chʼo̩chaka abo Juda kpʼabo Be̩njamin. I la fʼabo kʼo̩do-ma jo̩ ogu nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ ka-luka, oñ i fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oli me̩fa ku ma bʼogu jo̩, ku ma chʼo̩ka o̩kwo̩ kpʼugbe̩yo̩ ene̩, ku ma ñwa ma go taku ma chi ma li.
I ño̩ ne̩ tale̩nt ajifa ogume̩lu chʼo̩gu ñw amagbiti Israe̩l ku ma nʼuwohi icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogume̩lu.
Ama e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ʼka wʼugbo-wñ kakini, O onu, e̩ ki je̩ ñw abogu Israe̩l lebʼuwe̩ n; todu Jihofa dʼugbo abo Israe̩l in, owñ chʼamo̩ma Ifraim le̩ chaka.
I la che̩wñ kʼuwe̩ alo, lo ke! e̩do̩-we̩ ki gbo tod ogu le̩. O̩jo̩ aje̩ ñw e̩ wane̩, eju e̩nebi le̩; todu O̩jo̩ chenʼukpahiu ete̩ko, kpʼedu nʼane̩.
Tak Amazaya ka ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, Itale̩nt ogume̩lu kʼu ko ñw abogu Israe̩l fa? ab u nache e-le̩? Tak e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ dohi kakini, Jihofa neke dʼe̩wñ ki tʼe-le̩ le nana ñw e̩.
Tak Amazaya fʼuma daru bʼomune̩ te̩, kʼabogu ku ma kwo Ifraim wʼugbo-wñ le̩ ku ma mudabi tʼunyi; todule̩ uwe̩do̩-ma mutajo bi Juda ma nana, taku ma we̩do̩ nana dabi tʼunyi.
Amazaya muda fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, oñ i kʼabo-wñ dufu, oñ i nyʼo̩go̩ Omu. I la fʼamo̩ma Seir icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa gwoda.
Oñ amo̩ma Juda no̩ fʼabo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa mu udeju udeju. Ma la mʼuma ko wa jʼoji okuta ki gba, taku ma ko ma rikpolo kwʼoji okuta le̩ wʼane̩, oñ o̩chaka-ma muguche̩ ye̩ge̩ ye̩ge̩.

Ama abogu kʼAmazaya je̩ ñwu ma dabi ku ma we̩ elebʼo̩ nyʼo̩kogu le̩ lewa bʼewo ewo Juda ma akwo Samaria gbogbo wa Be̩t-ho̩ro̩n, oñ ma fʼabo o̩mo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta gwoda, ma la mʼane̩ ño̩ nana.

Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼAmazaya doji kwʼoko ekpa abo Ido̩m wa, kʼi la kʼamo̩jo̩ amo̩ma Seir wa, oñ i mʼuma ko dago jo̩ ku ma mud amo̩jo̩ e-wñ, i la fʼo̩la-wñ te̩kpe̩ o̩gba-ma, i laño̩ gu otulale jo ñwu ma.
Tak uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼAmazaya ma, oñ i fʼakache̩ʼka kpe̩rʼu, akache̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ tene amo̩jo̩ amone̩ ku ma ma gba abo e-ma onugo bʼef o̩wo̩-we̩ te̩ n?

Oñ i lewatu abu kʼi ako̩la kpʼowñ, onu ka ñw u kakini, Ma mʼuwe̩ du chʼe̩no̩hiala onu me̩? We! E̩wñ chi ku ma adʼe̩ kpa? Tak akache̩ le̩ we, oñ i kakini, U chema ka kʼO̩jo̩ fʼibe-wñ ñwa kʼi akpʼuwe̩ bie̩, todabu kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ-i che, kʼe̩ ma la ne̩tirʼohi-mi n.
Tak Amazaya onu Juda fʼo̩juju nyi, oñ i fʼone̩ kpe̩ru Joash, o̩ma Jiboahaz, o̩ma Jihiu, onu Israe̩l, kakini, Lewa kʼa liʼeju o̩la-wa.

Taku Joash, onu Israe̩l, fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼAmazaya, onu Juda, kakini, Ikeke ki de̩ Le̩bano̩n fʼuche̩ kpe̩ru sida ki de̩ Le̩bano̩n kakini, Mʼo̩ma-we̩ du ñw o̩ma-mi kʼi chʼo̩ya-wñ: tak e̩wñ iñmiʼka ki de̩ Le̩bano̩n lale, oñ i fʼikeke le̩ te̩mane̩.

Uwe̩ kakini, Go, omi fʼIdo̩m gwoda me̩; e̩do̩-we̩ la kwane̩ kʼe̩ buba; e̩ ki guane̩ unyi fai ta; e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ adʼo̩wo̩-we̩ tunyʼe̩bie̩ne̩ kʼe̩ fa bʼo̩la-we̩ ma kʼe̩ wane̩? tʼuwe̩, tʼabo Juda manyʼuwe̩.
Amazaya muda gbo̩ n; todu O̩jo̩ nyi, kʼi mʼuma ko jʼef o̩wo̩ e̩nebi-ma, todabu ku ma tene amo̩jo̩ abo Ido̩m.
Abe̩le̩ Joash, onu Israe̩l, mute̩gu wa; tak owñ kpʼAmazaya, onu Juda, li eju o̩la-ma Be̩t-shime̩sh kl de̩ Juda.
Oñ abo Israe̩l fʼabo Juda du; tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ra tʼunyabo-wñ.

Taku Joash, onu Israe̩l, fʼAmazaya, onu Juda, kʼi chʼo̩ma Joash kʼi chʼo̩ma Jihoahaz, mu Be̩t-shime̩sh, oñ i mʼu du wa Je̩rusale̩m; tak i fʼaku Je̩rusale̩m kpo̩fo̩ akwo alaku Ifraim gbogbo wa alaku e-alo-wñ; ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Tak i mʼo̩jamalia kpʼajifa kpʼe̩wñ eku du ki jʼef unyi O̩jo̩ ef o̩wo̩ Obe̩d-ido̩m, kpʼe̩wñ akoko du ki jʼunyi onu, kpʼamone̩ ku ma ko chʼe̩wñ uhio̩-wo̩, taku ma mudabi tu Samaria.
Oñ abu ku Joash o̩ma Jihoahaz, onu Israe̩l leku, Amazaya o̩ma Joash onu Juda ño̩ deju o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩lu ta.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ kʼAmazaya che, tʼe-e̩j odudu tʼe-otitala, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada amonu Juda kpʼIsrae̩l in?
Oñ akwʼiko kʼAmazaya murida bʼetu Jihofa ubi te̩, ma fʼalu jo̩ nyʼu Je̩rusale̩m; oñ i ra tu Lakish: ma muda fʼone̩ kpe̩ tʼo̩ ubi nyi Lakish, oñ ma fʼu kpa o̩mo̩.
Taku ma mʼu du nʼubi amanya wa, oñ ma mʼu du ji manyʼamata-wñ ef ewo Juda.
Tak abo Juda chaka mʼUzaya, kʼo̩do̩-wñ chʼe̩gwe̩fa, du jʼonu koji ata-wñ Amazaya.
Owñ le̩ fʼIlot ko̩, oñ i mʼu du dabi wa ñwu Juda, abu kʼonu le̩ cholu manyʼamata-wñ.
O̩do̩ Uzaya chʼe̩gwe̩fa e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejonu; oñ i jonu o̩do̩ ooje nyoke meji Je̩rusale̩m: odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Je̩kilaya e-Je̩rusale̩m.
I la che e̩wñ o̩kpakpa eju Jihofa alu du kʼata-wñ Amazaya che.
Oñ i dʼe̩do̩-wñ te̩ etene O̩jo̩ iko Ze̩karaya kʼi che̩moji ef e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e̩li. Oñ gbogbo abu kʼi atene Jihofa, O̩jo̩ je̩ ñw u ra ñw u.
Tak i ledufu akogu bʼabo Filistia, oñ i fʼaku Gat gulo̩ kpʼaku Jabne̩ kpʼaku Ashdo̩d; tak i fʼewo ewo ko ane̩ Ashdo̩d, kpʼef abo Filistia le̩.
O̩jo̩ la te̩ko-wñ ugbo abo Filistia kpʼugbo abo Arabia ku ma gugu Gur-beal, kpʼabo Me̩on.
Abo Amo̩n la kʼe̩wñ ele wa ñw Uzaya; oñ odu-wñ kpatuka ugbo du gbogbo wʼugbo ku ma gudu tʼojane̩ Ijipti; todu i mud agbiti tabale.
Anubile̩ ge̩, Uzaya ño̩ fʼodogo̩ ne Je̩rusale̩m ugbo alaku Alo le̩ kpʼugbo alaku O̩go̩ kpʼugbo kʼalaku arida, oñ i fʼukpa bu tʼo̩.

Tak i fʼo̩do̩go̩ ne ef aje̩tachi, i la fʼobuga gwa wewe, tod i nʼame̩wñ ukpa nana; tʼoj ane̩ o̩go̩ kpʼegbili; i la nʼamaluche̩ kpʼamadejutʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma oj ane̩ uwo kpʼoj ane̩ ki arʼo̩je̩; todu e̩wñ uche̩ chemʼe̩ e̩do̩.
Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, Uzaya nʼabogu ku ma bʼogu jo̩, ku ma dufu udala udala, alu ku Jiaie̩l, o̩male̩ kpai Maaseya, ako̩takada, kʼuma aluka, oñ ma jʼef o̩wo̩ Hananaya, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef amagboji ogu onu.
Aluka amata ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata amagbiti ku ma nʼuwohi du, che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji nyʼulo̩gwa.
Ukpa-hiu abogu la jʼef o̩wo̩-ma, mu chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oli me̩fa nyoke mebie nyʼoli me̩gwa oji oñ ma nʼukpahiu nana ajogu ku ma te̩ko onu ugbo e̩nebi-wñ.
Oñ Uzaya fʼugbe̩yo̩ kpai o̩kwo̩ kpai ukata ebije kpai afe̩ ebije kpʼo̩o̩do kpʼokuta ku ma du gwʼune̩cha ñwo̩che jo̩ ñwu ma, owñ chʼutodu o̩wo̩ abogu le̩ chaka.

Tak i fʼijini kʼabo ku ma chʼo̩ka uko̩lo̩-wñ ñwa ñw u che Je̩rusale̩m, kʼijini le̩ ki jʼoj o̩do̩go̩ kpʼoj aku aku, ku ma ne̩ tʼo̩fa kpʼokuta lile ero̩. Odu-wñ la mukpatuka rʼo̩najiji; todu alu ku mu te̩kʼo chʼawuwu, gbogbo tak i fʼukpahiu ne̩.
Ama e̩gba kʼi fʼukpahiu ne̩, e̩do̩-wñ kwane̩ kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ onugo kpabie̩, oñ i fʼada Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wñ, je̩; i la mugudu tef unyi Jihofa kʼi gu otulale jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ otulale le̩.
Oñ Azaraya, atama, tʼo̩ ubi nyʼejefu o̩mo̩ amatama Jihofa o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ ku ma chʼamagbiti ño̩ lebʼo̩;

oñ ma gbʼo̩na nyʼUzaya onu, ma ka ñw u kakini, I chʼe-uwe̩. Uzaya, agu otulale jo ñwu Jihofa n, chai amatama ku ma chʼamo̩ma Aro̩n, ku ma fʼuma che ku ma fo̩ ku ma gu otulale jo; e̩ kwef uña kiafo̩-i dufu; todu uwe̩ fʼada je̩ me̩; e-le̩ nʼojima ñw e̩ ugbo Jihofa O̩jo̩ n.
Tak Uzaya we̩do̩; i la nʼanade ef o̩wo̩-wñ kʼi gu otulale jo; oñ abu kʼi do̩mo̩ awe̩do̩ rʼamatama, o̩gane̩-ekpa kwane̩ o̩gboji-wñ eju amatama ef unyi Jihofa, akolo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ otulale le̩.

Tak Azaraya, agboji amatama kpʼamatama chaka kejurʼu, e̩ la go, o̩gane̩-ekpa la dʼo̩gboji-wñ, taku ma kʼe̩ e̩che̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu; ochochi, owñ onugo ño̩ hio̩wane̩ kʼi kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu, ukpe̩ ki Jihofa fʼu gwo.

Oñ Uzaya onu le̩ chʼe̩no̩ga ikpemute gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ. Oñ i gugu unyi ubioko, abu kʼi chʼe̩no̩ga ikpemute; todu e-le̩ fʼu daru bʼunyi Jihofa te̩. Jotam o̩ma-wñ, la nʼo̩da abunyi onu, oñ i nakajo̩ amone̩ ane̩ le̩.
Oñ e̩wñ kibo̩ kʼUzaya che, tʼe-ejodudu tʼe-otitala, Aizaya, akache̩, kʼi chʼo̩ma Emo̩z, fʼu ko̩ nyʼo̩takada.
Abe̩le̩ Uzaya cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji manyʼamata-wñ oko oji kʼamonu ne̩; todu ma kakini, E̩no̩ga ikpemute de̩. Taku Jotam, o̩ma-wñ jonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ Jotam chʼogue̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejonu; oñ i jonu o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩fa Je̩rusale̩m. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Je̩rusha, o̩ma Zedo̩k.
I la fʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa eju Jihofa che, teju e-du kʼata-wñ Uzaya che; i muda gudu tef unyi Jihofa n. Oñ amone̩ le̩ nache e̩wñ e̩kpabie̩ alo waa.
Owñ fʼalaku unyi Jihofa, e-ate̩, ne, i laño̩ butʼaku Ofe̩l ene nana ge̩,
i ño̩ kʼewo ewo ane̩ uwo Juda, i la fʼunyi unyi oji-ma kpʼo̩do̩go̩ o̩do̩go̩ ne efoko efoko.

I ño̩ jogu kpʼonu amo̩ma Amo̩n, oñ i fʼuma du. Tak amo̩ma Amo̩n kʼajifa alu tale̩nt ogume̩lu, kpʼe̩ñwa o̩ka wit icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa kpʼe̩ñwa o̩ka barli icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa wa ñw u o̩do̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩. Abe̩le̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n ño̩ ko wa ñw u o̩do̩ ekeji kpʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩tam fʼukpahiu ne̩ ukpe̩ kʼi fʼo̩na o̩na-wñ ñwo̩che jo̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ku Jotam che, kpʼogu kʼi ja du kpʼo̩na o̩na du kʼi le, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ ref o̩takada amonu Israe̩l kpai Juda.
O̩do̩-wñ chʼo̩gue̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ e̩jonu, i la jonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩-fa.
Taku Jotam cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef ewo Defid; tak Ehaz, o̩ma-wñ, je̩ koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ Ehaz chʼogu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejonu. Oñ i jonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩fa; i la chʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa eju Jihofa alu kʼata-wñ Defidi che n.
Chai o̩na o̩na amonu Israe̩l oñ i le, i ño̩ fʼojibo ojibo da todu amiBeal ge̩.
Anoji e-le̩ i fʼotulale gujo ef o̩go̩ o̩ma Hino̩m, oñ i kʼamo̩ma-wñ gujo ef una le̩, alu kʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abo uche̩ ichi ki Jihofa fʼuma ne̩ rinyo̩ bʼo̩gba amo̩ma Israe̩l te̩ le̩ de̩.
I la chʼiche̩bo̩ kpʼotulale egujo oj otete otete, kpʼoj uwo uwo, kpʼo̩f oli emimi du.
Todule̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wñ, mʼowñ du tef o̩wo̩ onu Siria; taku ma fʼu gwo, oñ ma fʼo̩wo̩ abo-wñ lilemu lelo̩; ma la mʼuma ko wa Damaskus. Ma laño̩ mʼowñ du tef o̩wo̩ onu Israe̩l oñ i nʼuku lile kpa ma.
Todu Pika, o̩ma Re̩malaya, fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩fa kpa Juda o̩jo̩ʼkate. O̩chaka-ma chʼamagbiti. Todabu ku ma hi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-ma, tinyo̩.
Taku Zikri, agbiti kʼi de̩ Ifraim, fu Maaseya, o̩ma onu, kpʼAzraikam, e̩ne̩ uto̩gba unyi le̩, kpʼE̩lkana e̩ne̩ ekeji onu, kpa.

Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l fʼamo̩maye-ma icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gwo̩ko̩ mu lelo, tʼabobule̩, tʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼamo̩ma onobule̩, oñ ma ño̩ kʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ nana; ma la mʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩ le̩ ko wa Samaria.

Akache̩ Jihofaʼka muda do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Ode̩d; i le dufu kʼi ledo o̩wo̩ abogu ku ma wa Samaria le̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Go, todabu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-me̩ we̩do̩ ru Juda i mʼuma ko jʼef o̩wo̩-me̩, oñ me̩ fʼuma kpa ef e̩do̩ e̩kpa ki te̩ gbogbo kad efojale.
Fai i la dʼe̩do̩-me̩ ku me̩ fʼamo̩ma Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m demane̩ ku ma chʼadu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ ñwu me̩. Abi Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, kʼame̩ onugo je̩ jʼugbo e-me̩ n?
Todule̩ me̩ gbʼo̩la-mi, ku me̩ la kʼame̩namu le̩ kpuche̩ dabi, owñ chʼabo ku me̩ mu ef amo̩maye-me̩ le̩: todu ukpuna uwe̩do̩ Jihofa bʼume̩ ma me̩.

Tak abo iche̩ka ef abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef Ifraim, owñ che Azaraya, o̩ma Johanan kpai Be̩re̩kaya, o̩ma Me̩shile̩mot kpai Je̩hizkaya, o̩ma Shalum kpai Amesa, o̩ma Hadlai, kwane̩ ku ma gbʼo̩na nyʼabo ku ma kwʼoko̩gu le̩ wa.

Oñ ma ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ akʼame̩namu le̩ gudu wʼemi n: todu e̩wñ ki adʼabi Jihofa eje̩ wa anʼuwa oji oñ me̩ ñw ibe-wñ le̩, ku me̩ butʼadure-wa kpʼabi-wa kʼa je̩; todu abi kʼa je̩ tabale me̩, uwe̩do̩ ki kpuna la bʼIsrae̩l ma me̩.
Abe̩le̩ abo ku ma kʼe̩wñ ogu nyʼo̩la le̩ tʼame̩namu kpʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩ le̩ no̩ jʼane̩ o̩gba amagboji kpʼo̩gba amone̩ le̩ chaka.

Tak aboke̩le̩ kʼa dʼodu-ma ate̩ le̩ kwane̩, oñ ma mʼame̩namu le̩ ko̩, oñ ma nʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩ le̩ ako bʼe̩ne̩ du ki tago ofo efu-ma o̩la ma, ma la kʼe̩wñ nyʼuma o̩la, ma la kʼe̩da nyʼuma e̩re̩, oñ ma kʼuje̩wñ kpʼomi ñwu ma ñmo̩, ma la fʼekpo ba tʼuma o̩la, oñ ma kʼabo-ma du kʼo̩la-ma cheda nʼubi amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩, oñ ma ko ma wa Je̩riko, ewo oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩, ugbo amo̩maye-ma. Taku ma mudabi tu Samaria.
Tak iko le̩ Ehaz onu fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼonu Asiria kʼite̩kʼo.
Toduabo Ido̩m ño̩ lewa fʼabo Juda gwoda, oñ ma mʼame̩namu ko lelo.

Abo Filistia ño̩ kpʼewo ewo ki jʼef o̩go̩ fo̩, kpʼe-ki jʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ Juda, oñ ma fu Be̩t-shime̩sh kpʼAijalo̩n kpai Ge̩dirot kpai Shoko manyʼadogbe adogbe-wñ du kpai Timna manyʼadogbe ado̩gbe-wñ kpai Gimzo kpʼadogbe adogbe-wñ ko ge̩; oñ ma kwogugu o̩mo̩.
Todu Jihofa chʼabo Juda ukata tod Ehaz onu Israe̩l; todu i chi Juda ofe, oñ i fʼada Jihofa je̩ bie̩ne̩.
Taku Tilgat-pilnesa, onu Asiria, lewʼugbo-wñ achʼo o̩bata, i la te̩kʼo n.
Todu Ehaz mʼe̩wñ ko kwef unyi Jihofa kpai kwef unyi onu kpai kwʼo̩wo̩ amagboji, oñ i mʼu ko ñw onu Asiria; i muda te̩kʼowñ n kpo̩.
Tak iko o̩bata-wñ le̩ i ño̩ fʼada Jihofa je̩ tule ta, owñ chʼonu Ehaz le̩ gbage̩de̩.

Todu i fʼiche̩bo̩ che ñw amo̩jo̩ Damaskus, ku ma fʼu gwoda le̩; i kakini, Abu kʼamo̩jo̩ amonu Siria te̩ko ma, omi ache iche̩bo̩ ñwu ma kʼama ki te̩ko mi. Abo le̩ muda chʼe̩te̩ e̩kpabie̩-wñ kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka.
Tak Ehaz mʼe̩wñ eku unyi O̩jo̩ yajo̩, oñ i fʼe̩wñ eku unyi O̩jo̩ ko̩da kpikpi, tak i fʼo̩na o̩na unyi Jihofa re. Oñ i fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ che ñw o̩la-wñ ugbo du ki chʼo̩pee Je̩rusale̩m.
I la fʼotete otete che ewo Juda okoke du kʼi gu otulale jo ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩, i la bi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-wñ, eju.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ kʼowñ che, kpʼo̩na-wñ du ki le, tʼe-ejodudu tʼe-otitala, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ jʼef o̩takada amonu Juda kpʼIsrae̩l.
Tak Ehaz cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef ewo le̩, owñ che Je̩rusale̩m; ma muda dʼu wʼilo̩ja amonu Israe̩l in; taku He̩ze̩kaya, o̩ma-wñ jonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ He̩ze̩kaya chʼogue̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejonu. I la jonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩la. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Abaija, o̩ma Ze̩karaya.
I la che e̩wñ ki chʼo̩kpakpa eju Jihofa teju alu du kʼata-wñ Defid che.
O̩do̩ ejodudu kʼi jonu, ochu-wñ ejodudu, i mʼolugbo̩na unyi Jihofa bi, oñ i fʼu ñwo̩che.
Tak i kʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai, wʼejefu, oñ i ko ma wa jʼugbokate ojukpologu o̩wo̩ olodudu,
tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ gbʼomu-mi, ame̩ abo Lifai; me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ gworinyo̩ fai ku me̩ fo̩, me̩ che kʼunyi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-me̩, ki fo̩ ge̩. Me̩ ki la kʼe̩wñ iwa kwef uña kiafo̩-i dufu.
Todu amata-wa fʼada je̩ me̩, ma la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, che, ma la hiʼu tinyo̩, oñ ma mʼeju-ma rida bʼodo Jihofa te̩, ma la mʼubi-ma dagbʼo̩.
Ma laño̩ fʼo̩na o̩na atakpa le̩ re, ma fʼagege-wñ kpalu, ma la gu otulale jo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kowa ef uña kiafo̩-i ñw O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l in.
Todule̩ uwe̩do̩ Jihofa te̩tabi Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m ma, oñ i mʼu ko jo̩ ku ma mud e̩wñ o̩la ega gogodo, ku ma mud e̩wñ awuwu kpʼe̩wñ chui, alu kʼame̩ che li kpʼeju e-me̩-i.
Todu, go, amata-wa leane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli, oñ amo̩ma-wa e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ kpʼamo̩ya-wa jʼef amu tod e̩wñ le̩.
Oñ i dʼe̩do̩-mi kʼu kpʼalo kpai Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, kʼuwe̩do̩-wñ ki kpuna-i ki rida bʼuwa te̩.
Amo̩ma-mi, me̩ ki tʼo̩la no̩ ajo̩ ofo n; todu Jihofa chi me̩ ku me̩ dago o̩gba-wñ, ku me̩ che e̩wñ ñw u, ku me̩ chʼabo-wñ ku me̩ che e̩wñ ñw u, ku me̩ la gu otulale jo ñw u.

Tak abo Lifai kwane̩; owñ che Me̩hat, o̩ma Amesai kpai Joe̩l, o̩ma Azaraya, ku ma jʼef amo̩ma abo Kohat; kpʼabo ku ma jʼef amo̩ma Me̩rari; owñ che Kish, o̩ma Abdai kpai Azaraya, o̩ma Je̩hale̩le̩l; oñ abo Ge̩rsho̩n che Joa, o̩ma Zima kpʼIde̩n, o̩ma Joa;
oñ abo ku ma chʼamo̩ma Ilaizefan che Shimrai kpai Jiye̩l; e-amo̩ma Esaf la che Ze̩karaya kpai Matanaya;
oñ e-amo̩ma Himan che Jihaye̩l kpai Shimeai; e-amo̩ma Je̩dutun la che She̩maya kpai Uziye̩l.
Oñ ma kʼamo̩maye-ma wajo̩, oñ ma fʼo̩la-ma gworinyo̩ ku ma fo̩, taku ma lewa alu kʼonu tʼuko̩ ñwu ma alu kʼo̩la Jihofa de̩ le̩, ku ma che kʼunyi Jihofa ki fe̩.
Tak amatama nyʼejefu ejefu unyi Jihofa ku ma che ki fe̩, oñ ma mʼe̩wñ iwa du ku ma li ejefu unyi Jihofa le̩ ko dufu wʼologbo unyi Jihofa. Tak abo Lifai mʼu ko le tʼo̩do̩da wʼaji Kidro̩n.

Oñ ma chane̩ eche kʼi fo̩ o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu ejodudu-wñ, tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩ ochu le̩ ma lewa agbaru Jihofa. Ma la che o̩jo̩ me̩jo̩ taku ma fʼunyi Jihofa che ki fo̩; ma fʼu che kpoji o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩-gwe̩fa ochu ejodudu le̩.

Taku ma nyʼejefu ugbo He̩ze̩kaya onu, oñ ma kakini, A fʼunyi Jihofa che ki fe̩ chaka me̩, kpʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo manyʼe̩wñ eku-wñ chaka, kpʼitebulu akala ku ma ko tala jo̩ o̩gba o̩gba le̩, manyʼe̩wñ eku-wñ chaka.
Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, e̩wñ eku du kʼEhaz, onu, ko rinyo̩ e̩gba kʼi fʼada je̩ le̩, a fʼu ñwo̩che oñ a che ki nafo̩ me̩; e̩ la go, i jʼo̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa le̩.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya takpa kwane̩, oñ i fʼamagboji ewo le̩ do̩ jeju, tak i mute̩gu tʼunyi Jihofa.

Taku ma kʼamo̩kokuno̩ mebie kpʼamokolo mebie kpʼamo̩ma ala mebie kpʼamobuko̩ mebie wa ku ma kʼo chʼiche̩bo̩ adure tod ojane̩ le̩ kpai tod uña kiafo̩ kpai todu Juda. Tak i ka ñw amatama amo̩ma Aro̩n ku ma kowa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa le̩.

Abe̩le̩ ma fʼamo̩kokuno̩ le̩ kpa, tak amatama mʼe̩bie̩-ma gba, oñ ma mʼu du tafio̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩. Taku ma fʼamokolo kpa, oñ ma dʼe̩bie̩-ma tafio̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ge̩. Taku ma ño̩ fʼamo̩mala le̩ kpa, oñ ma dʼe̩bie̩-ma tafio̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩.
Taku ma kʼamobuko̩ wa jʼo̩gba onu kpʼabujeju le̩ tod iche̩bo̩ adure; taku ma kʼo̩wo̩-ma nʼoji-ma.

Tak amatama fʼuma kpa, oñ ma dʼe̩bie̩-ma gwʼuma o̩la rinyo̩ tod adure oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, ku ma fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che tod abo Israe̩l chaka; todu onu ka kʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼiche̩bo̩ adure le̩ chʼutodu abo Israe̩l chaka.

Tak i kʼo̩ke kpʼubo̩ kpʼumolo nyʼabo Lifai o̩wo̩ oñ i ko ma jo̩ ef unyi Jihofa, alu ki Defid kpai Gad, agane̩ onu le̩, kpai Netan akache̩, fʼuko̩-wñ te̩ todu uko̩ le̩ kwugbo Jihofa lʼalu amakache̩-wñ.
Tak abo Lifai mʼe̩wñ iya Defid le̩ ko nʼo̩wo̩ dago jo̩, oñ amatama nʼo̩kakachi.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya ñwa ñwu ma ku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ wa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩. Oñ adiko kʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ chane̩, eli Jihofa ño̩ chane̩ ge̩, kpʼo̩kakachi manyʼe̩wñ iya Defid onu Israe̩l.
Tak abujeju le̩ chaka dojikane̩, oñ amakeli kwokeli, oñ abo ku ma fʼo̩kakachi chane̩ efa; e̩wñ-i du che gbogbo tak iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ takpa.
Tak e̩gba ku ma mʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ko wa che kpa, onu kpʼabo du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ mute̩kpe̩ adojikane̩.
Anubile̩ He̩ze̩kaya, onu, kpʼamagboji ñwa ñw abo Lifai ku ma nʼo̩la Defid kpʼo̩la Esaf, agane̩ le̩, ku ma keli uje̩nyu ñwu Jihofa. Oñ ma nʼe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ akeli uje̩nyu, ma la fʼoji-ma dalo̩ adojikane̩.

Taku He̩ze̩kaya mʼohi du kakini, Fai taku o̩wo̩-me̩ che̩ko̩ ñwu Jihofa; me̩ mute̩wa ku me̩ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ ugwa wʼef unyi Jihofa ke. Tak abo̩gbadu le̩ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ ugwa wʼejefu; oñ ame̩numo̩la du kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa.
Aluka e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kʼabo̩gbadu le̩ kowa la chʼo̩kokuno̩ e̩te̩gwa, amokolo chʼogume̩-lu, amo̩mala la chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩: o̩chaka-wñ chʼutodu e̩wñ egujo ñwu Jihofa.
Oñ e̩wñ ku ma kojo̩ ñw u chʼamokuno̩ ulo̩gwa kpʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta.

Amatama la nyarʼuko̩lo̩-wñ, oñ ma ma neke fʼe̩wñ e̩gujo le̩ kpanya kpa n; todule̩ amo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼabo Lifai te̩ko ma, gbogbo tak uko̩lo̩ le̩ kpoji, gbogbo tak amatama fʼo̩la-ma gworinyo̩ ku ma fo̩; todu e̩do̩ abo Lifai tʼo̩kpakpa ku ma fʼo̩la-ma gworinyo̩ ku ma fo̩ tʼe̩do̩ amatama le.
E̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo la chʼe̩kute̩, manyʼula e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ manyʼomi e̩duwa tod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo. Abe̩le̩ ma fʼe̩wñ ku ma che ef unyi Jihofa te̩ru aro̩ne aro̩ne.
He̩ze̩kaya kpʼamone̩ le̩ du kwoyo̩, tod e̩wñ ku Jihofa che ñw amone̩ le̩: todu e̩wñ le̩ chʼachigili.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼabo Israe̩l kpʼabo Juda chaka; i ño̩ fʼo̩takada ko̩rʼabo Ifraim kpai Manasa, kʼama ki wʼunyi Jihofa Je̩rusale̩m ku ma fʼElaloji de ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l.
Todu onu kpʼamagboji kpʼabujeju du ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m fʼibe kpe̩ ka ku ma ade Elaloji ef ochu ekeji.
Todu ma neke de iko le̩ n, todabu kʼamatama ku ma fʼo̩la-ma che ki fo̩ wewe bo̩jo̩ ta n, amone̩ la kʼo̩la-ma jeju Je̩rusale̩m ta n.
Oñ e-le̩ nyo̩ onu kpʼabujeju le̩ eju chaka.
Oñ ma dʼo̩da-wñ te̩ ku ma tʼakoya-wñ ugbo du ane̩ Israe̩l, akwo Birshiba gbogbo wa Dan, kʼama ki wa Je̩rusale̩m ade Elaloji ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l. Todu ma de alu ku ma ko̩ le̩ kpo̩kpe̩ me̩.

Abe̩le̩ amime̩cho̩ja ku ma fule nʼo̩takada kʼi kwʼo̩wo̩ onu kpʼo̩wo̩ amagboji le̩ nyʼugbo du ane̩ Israe̩l kpai Juda, alu kʼonu fʼuko̩-wñ te̩ ñwu ma, ma kakini, Ame̩, amo̩ma Israe̩l, me̩ mudabi wʼugbo Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Ebraham, Aise̩k kpai Israe̩l, tak owñ adabi wʼugbo abubo̩-me̩ ku me̩ fʼamonu Asiria o̩wo̩ tane̩ le̩.
Me̩ ki la de̩ alu kʼamata-me̩ kpʼamo̩maye-me̩ de̩ n; owñ chʼabo ku ma fʼada Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-amata-ma, je̩, tak i mʼuma ko chʼe̩wñ ugoju, alu ku me̩ li-i.

Me̩ ki la fʼo̩lo̩-me̩ no̩ alu kʼamata-me̩ che le̩ n; me̩ ki la kʼo̩wo̩-me̩ ñwu Jihofa, ku me̩ gudu tʼef uña-wñ kiafo̩ e-kʼi che ki fo̩ tʼogbegbele̩, ku me̩ la re̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, kʼuwe̩do̩-wñ ki kpuna le̩ ki rida bʼume̩ o̩la te̩.

Todu iche̩wñ kʼame̩ arida wa bo̩ Jihofa, abo ku ma mʼamo̩maye-me̩ kpʼamo̩ma-me̩ lelo le̩ ali uma ejumomi, kʼama ki ño̩ dabi wʼojane̩-i: todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ chʼe̩nufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ali ejumomi; iche̩wñ ku me̩ mudabi wʼugbo-wñ i jʼarʼeju-wñ da bʼume̩ te̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ amime̩cho̩ja ku ma fule le̩ le gu ef ewo ewo du oj ane̩ Ifraim kpai Manasa gbogbo wa Ze̩biulo̩n; ma muda nyʼuma anyi nacha, oñ ma kʼuma ru.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, abo Ashe̩r kpai Manasa kpai Ze̩biulo̩n iche̩ka hi o̩la-ma wane̩, oñ ma lewa Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ o̩wo̩ O̩jo̩ laño̩ wa abi Juda ma kʼi dʼe̩do̩ okate ñwu ma, ku ma che e̩wñ kʼonu kpʼamagboji fʼuko̩-wñ te̩ lef o̩la Jihofa.
Oñ amone̩ wewe jeju jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m ochu ekeji ku ma de uje̩wñ kʼo̩jo̩wu ma do̩ n le̩, o̩gbadu-wñ tabale.
Taku ma kwane̩, oñ ma mʼubo iche̩ho ki jo̩ Jerusale̩m kpʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ otulale du ko, oñ ma mʼu ko rinyo̩ ef aji Kidro̩n.
Taku ma fʼElaloji kpa o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu ekeji. Anyo̩ la mu amatama kpʼabo Lifai, oñ ma che o̩la-ma ki fo̩, taku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wʼef unyi Jihofa.
Oñ ma kwodago jʼuña-ma aro̩ne aro̩ne alu kʼuko̩-o̩la Mose̩s, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, ka: amatama fʼe̩bie̩ ku ma gba o̩wo̩ abo Lifai tafio.
Todu i nʼamone̩ wewe ef o̩gbadu le̩ ku ma ma fʼo̩la-ma che ki fo̩ n: todule̩ abo Lifai nʼo̩da e̩wñ Elaloji ekpa tod e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ ma fe̩ n, ku ma je̩ ñwu ma fo̩ todu Jihofa.

Todu o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ nana ma che o̩la-ma ki fo̩ n; abo Ifraim kpai Manasa kpai Isakar kpai Ze̩biulo̩n jʼefu ma wewe; ma muda je̩ Elaloji le̩ ojoji ñw alu kʼo̩takada le̩ ka, He̩ze̩kaya muda fʼadua che todu ma kakini, Jihofa kʼi nyo̩ kʼi nadʼu chʼe̩ne̩ du
ki dʼe̩do̩-wñ te̩ atene O̩jo̩, Jihofa kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ amata-wñ ele, dagba o̩la-wñ ma gworinyo̩ tʼeju alu ku ma che e̩wñ uña kiafo̩ le̩ ki fe̩ n.
Oñ Jihofa netirʼo̩la He̩ze̩kaya oñ i fʼo̩ga amone̩ le̩ che.

Tak abo Israe̩l kʼeju ma dʼane̩ Je̩rusale̩m le̩ fʼuje̩wñ akala kʼo̩jo̩wu ma do̩ n de o̩jo̩ mebie, e̩do̩-ma bo̩ tabale; oñ abo Lifai kpʼamatama nʼe̩wñ iya ki ako̩la uje̩nyu je̩nyu Jihofa o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa.

Taku He̩ze̩kaya ko̩la anye̩do̩ ñw abo Lifai du ku ma mʼoji e̩wñ ema e̩nyo̩ e-Jihofa. Abe̩le̩ ma je̩ e̩wñ ku ma ko wa ñw O̩jo̩ ef uje̩wñ le̩ gbogbo o̩jo̩ mebie, ma la nʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ ache, kpai egogbodo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩ amata-ma le̩.
Tak abo̩gbadu le̩ chaka fʼalu jo̩ ku ma ño̩ de o̩jo̩ mebie omune̩ ta; oñ ma ño̩ nʼuyo̩ ade o̩jo̩ mebie omune̩.

Todu He̩ze̩kaya, onu Juda, kʼo̩kokuno̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ mebie ñw o̩gbadu le̩ ku ma ko nyʼate̩ ache O̩jo̩; oñ amagboji kʼamo̩kokuno̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kpʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa ñw o̩gbadu le. Oñ amatama wewe fʼo̩la-ma che ku ma fo̩.
Tak abo̩gbadu Juda chaka, manyʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai kpʼabo̩gbadu du ku ma kwʼane̩ Israe̩l wa, kpʼamilowa ku ma kwʼane̩ Israe̩l wa ku ma la gugu Juda kwoyo̩.
Abe̩le̩ uyo̩ tabale Je̩rusale̩m; todu akwʼo̩kpanachi So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma Defid onu Israe̩l, e̩go̩-wñ de̩ Je̩rusale̩m mama ta n.
Tak amatama ku ma chʼabo Lifai kwane̩ akadua ñw amone̩: oñ ma gbʼomu-ma, adua-ma la mute̩gu tʼunyi ugugu-wñ kiafo̩ le̩, owñ che gbogbo nyʼefojale.

Oñ e̩gba ku ma fʼe̩wñ-i du che kpa, abo Israe̩l du ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ le̩ dufu nyʼewo ewo Juda, oñ ma fʼojibo ojibo guche̩ ye̩ge̩ ye̩ge̩, ma la fʼujo̩ ujo̩ oli Ashe̩ra lo̩ wane̩, oñ ma fʼotete otete kpo̩fo̩, kpʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ du oj ane̩ Juda kpai Be̩njamin kpai Ifraim kpai Manasa ge̩, gbogbo taku ma fʼu kpabie̩ kpa. Tak abo Israe̩l chaka mudabi, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼe̩gu-wñ, nyʼef ewo ewo e-ma.

Taku He̩ze̩kaya fʼamatama kpai abo Lifai date̩ ukpe̩ru ukpe̩ru alu kʼuche̩ uche̩-ma de̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼe̩-wñ alu kʼi ache e̩wñ, tʼamatama tʼabo Lifai tod e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ ekowa, kʼama ki che e̩wñ, ku ma la gogbodo̩ ku ma laño̩ jʼalaku alaku uru Jihofa aje̩nyʼu.

E̩wñ kʼonu ko kwʼef ane̩-wñ wa chʼutod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, tod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-odudu kpʼe-ane̩, kpʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo tod o̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi, kpai todu ochu ki ane̩ tito̩, kpʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ ku ma dʼo̩jo̩-wñ te̩, alu ku ma ko̩ nyʼuko̩-o̩la Jihofa.
Anoji e-le̩ i ñwa ñw amone̩ ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m ku ma kʼukpe̩ amatama kpʼabo Lifai wa ñwu ma, kʼe̩do̩-ma ki kwane̩ ef uko̩-o̩la Jihofa.
Oñ abu kʼo̩da le̩ kwo dufu ababa abo Israe̩l kʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩ ejo̩ga kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ kpʼekpo kpʼiño̩ kpʼe̩wñ oko du wa ololo ololo; ma ño̩ ko ukpe̩re̩gwa e̩wñ du wa e̩kute̩.
Oñ abo Israe̩l kpai Juda ku ma gugu ewo ewo Juda, ama le̩ ño̩ kʼukpe̩re̩gwa amokuno̩ kpʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpʼukpe̩re̩gwa e̩wñ kʼamone̩ kojo̩ ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-ma, wa, oñ ma mʼu ko jo̩ aido aido.
Ef ochu e̩ke̩ta ma chane̩ adʼe̩re̩ aido aido le̩ nyʼane̩ oñ ma che kpa ef ochu e̩kebie.
Oñ e̩gba ku He̩ze̩kaya kpʼamagboji lewa go e̩wñ ku ma kojo̩ aido aido le̩, ma kele̩ Jihofa, oñ ma kadua ñw amone̩-wñ Israe̩l.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya tʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai ene o̩la aido aido le̩.

Tak Azaraya, agboji amatama, kʼi chʼabunyi Ze̩do̩k, dohi ñw u kakini, Akwe̩gba ku ma chane̩ eko e̩wñ edu ne ate̩ wʼef unyi Jihofa, a tetaje̩ e̩wñ, i la bʼuwa jo̩, oñ i bo̩ jane̩ e̩kute̩: todu Jihofa mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñw abo-wñ me̩; oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ jane̩ chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩-i.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya ñwa ñwu ma ku ma ñwʼe̩ko̩da unyi ef unyi Jihofa che̩; oñ ma fʼu ñwo̩che;

taku ma kʼe̩wñ edu ne ate̩ le̩ wʼejefu manyʼukpe̩re̩gwa e̩wñ ku ma kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ alu kʼone̩ achubi one̩. Oñ Kono̩naya abo Lifai le̩ chʼe̩nuto̩gba kʼe̩wñ-i jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ, Shimeai o̩maye-wñ la chʼe̩ne̩ ekeji;

oñ Je̩haye̩l kpai Azazaya kpai Nehat kpai Asahe̩l kpai Je̩rimo̩t kpai Jo̩zabad kpʼIlaie̩l kpʼIsmakaya kpai Me̩hat kpai Be̩naya chʼamafejule̩, ma la jʼef o̩wo̩ Kono̩naya kpai Shimeai o̩maye-wñ, alu ku He̩ze̩kaya onu, kpai Azaraya kʼi chʼe̩nuto̩gba unyi O̩jo̩ dʼo̩da ñwu ma le̩.
Oñ Ko̩re̩, o̩ma Imna abo Lifai kʼi ade alaku o̩wo̩ olodudu, nʼo̩da e̩wñ kʼamone̩ gʼe̩do̩la-ma ako wa ñw O̩jo̩, kʼi fʼe̩wñ ku ma du ne̩ ate̩ kpʼe̩wñ ki afo̩ e-efo̩ le̩ kpe̩ ñw amone̩.

Ide̩n kpai Minayamin kpai Je̩shua kpai She̩maya kpai Amaraya kpai She̩kanaya la jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ, ewo ewo amatama, ef ugugu ku ma ke̩do̩no ma ku ma du ñwu ma, ku ma kpe̩ ñw amo̩maye-ma uche̩ uche̩, tʼabo ki nana tʼabo ki nya,

manyʼabo ku ma fʼaboke̩le̩-ma lo rʼef o̩takada o̩gba, o̩gba, akwʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ o̩do̩ me̩ta kpai ate̩to̩gba-wñ, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi agudu nyʼef unyi Jihofa alu kʼi dukpe̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ-wñ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa, tod e̩wñ ku ma che ef ugugu e-ma likpa alu kʼukpe̩ru-ma de̩,
tʼamatama ku ma lo rʼef o̩takada tʼeju unyi unyi amata-ma, kpʼabo Lifai ku ma dʼo̩do̩ ogu kpʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, ef e̩wñ-ma ku ma de ukpe̩ru ukpe̩ru-ma;
kpʼabo-ma egini chaka, kpʼamo̩ya-ma kpʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼamo̩ma-ma onobule̩ owñ chʼo̩gbo̩dudu one̩ ku ma fulo rʼef o̩takada; todu ma fʼo̩la-ma gworinyo̩ ki fo̩ todu e̩wñ ku ma ke̩do̩no ma le̩.

I chʼe-amo̩ma Aro̩n ku ma chʼamatama ku ma jʼoko ane̩ ije̩ ewo ewo-ma, aboke̩le̩ jʼewo ewo le̩ ku ma fʼodu-ma do̩ ku ma kpʼukpe̩ ñw aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼef amatama, kpʼabo Lifai du ku ma fʼuma lo rʼef o̩takada le̩.
Abe̩le̩ He̩ze̩kaya la che ugbo du Juda; oñ i fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ kʼi la chʼo̩kpakpa ki chʼalu ku ma chubi one̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ che.
Oñ uko̩lo̩ du kʼi chane̩ eche ef e̩wñ eche ef unyi O̩jo̩ kpʼef uko̩-o̩la kpʼef uko̩ ku ma te̩, kʼi tene O̩jo̩-wñ, i che kpʼe̩do̩-wñ chaka, oñ i ra ñw u.
Ubi e̩wñ-i du, kpʼubi O̩jo̩ abe̩i eche, Se̩nake̩rib, onu Asiria, lewa, oñ i mugudu wʼoj ane̩ Juda, oñ i ru ru nyʼewo ewo ki nʼaku; i la nʼibe ka kʼi akpʼo̩mo̩ fo̩ ñw o̩la-wñ.
Tak e̩gba ku He̩ze̩kaya li ka ku Se̩nake̩rib lewa, kʼi la fʼeju-wñ kparʼekogubo̩ Je̩rusale̩m,
i nyʼojuju kpʼamagboji-wñ kpʼamagbiti-wñ kʼi fʼo̩na e̩bi omi ej o̩do̩da ewo le̩ re; ma la bʼo̩ che.
Abe̩le̩ amone̩ wewe jeju jo̩, oñ ma fʼona e̩bi omi le̩ re chaka, kpʼukpolo kʼi acha gu alumeji ane̩ le̩ du, ma kakini, Tode̩wñ amonu Asiria awa kumali omi nana?

Tak i fʼukpahiu ne̩, oñ ma fʼaku kʼi lo̩ le̩ chaka ne, i la dʼu kwane̩ gbogbo wʼo̩do̩go̩ o̩do̩go̩-wñ, kpʼo̩do̩ ekeji ejo̩do̩da-wñ, oñ ma bʼukpa to Milo, e-ewo Defid le̩, ma la fʼe̩wñ ido̩na ogu kpʼugbe̩yo̩ che e̩kute̩.
Tak i kʼamonu ogu jo ku ma nʼamone̩ le̩, oñ i ko ma wa jʼugbo-wñ oj ukpologu me̩rʼalaku ewo le̩. Tak i ko̩la anye̩do̩ ñwu ma, kakini,
Me̩ ki fʼejugbiti, me̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, me̩ ki railo n, e̩do̩-me̩ ki da kpu tod onu Asiria-i n, kpai todu o̩wo̩ one̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ chaka n; todu abo ku ma jʼugbo wa wewe tʼabo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ le:
o̩wo̩ o̩re̩la dʼugbo-wñ; Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa muda dʼugbo e-wa kʼi te̩ko wa, kʼi la fʼogu e-wa ja. Tak e̩do̩ amone̩ dachi nʼo̩la ku He̩ze̩kaya onu Juda ka le̩.

Ubi le̩ Se̩nake̩rib fʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ kpuche̩ nyi Je̩rusale̩m (owñ onugo la dʼo̩gba Lakish, ukpahiu-wñ du la jʼugbo-wñ), oñ i fʼuche̩ kpe̩ ru He̩ze̩kaya onu Juda kpʼabo Juda du ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m, kakini,
Abu ku Se̩nake̩rib onu Asiria aka de̩ kakini, E̩wñ me̩ ke̩do̩no, ku me̩ kwojo̩ Je̩rusale̩m kʼu kpala nyu-i?
He̩ze̩kaya agba me̩ ibe kʼi mʼume̩ ko ñw uku ukpo̩ta kpʼalugbe̩, kakini, Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa agba wa kwef o̩wo̩ onu Asiria n?

I che He̩ze̩kaya le̩ gbage̩de̩ mʼotete otete-wñ kpʼubo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ ko, tak i ñwa ñw abo Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m, kakini, Ame̩ adojikane̩ o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ okate, oji-wñ ame̩ la agu otulale jo n?
Ame̩ ma e̩wñ kʼomi kpʼamata-mi che abo ane̩ du n? I nugbo du kʼamo̩jo̩ abuche̩ichi ane̩ ane̩ kibo̩ neke gbʼane̩-ma tane̩ bʼo̩wo̩-mi te̩?
E̩ne̩ dʼef amo̩jo̩ abuche̩ichi du kʼamata-mi fʼu kpo̩fo̩ hioko, kʼi neke gbʼabo-wñ bʼo̩wo̩-mi te̩, tak O̩jo̩ e-me̩ neke gba me̩ bʼo̩wo̩-mi te̩?

Todule̩ ame̩ ki je̩ ñwu He̩ze̩kaya da me̩ ibe, kʼi la agba me̩ ibe abe̩i n; me̩ ki la dʼo̩la-wñ rʼochochi n; todu i nʼo̩jo̩ abo uche̩ichiʼka abe̩k ojane̩ʼka kʼi neke gbʼabo-wñ bʼo̩wo̩-mi te̩ n, kpai bʼo̩wo̩ amata-mi te̩ n: abʼO̩jo̩ e-me̩ ale kʼi agba me̩ bʼef o̩wo̩-mi te̩?
Oñ abuko̩lo̩-wñ ño̩ nʼo̩la omune̩ omune̩ aka nyu Jihofa O̩jo̩ kpai adu-wñ He̩ze̩kaya tʼe-le̩ le ta.

I ño̩ fʼo̩takada ko̩ abu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, ina, kʼi la ako̩la achakpabie̩ uwñ, kakini, Alu kʼamo̩jo̩ abuche̩ichi ane̩ ane̩ ma gbʼabo-ma bʼo̩wo̩-mi te̩ n le̩, abe̩le̩ oñ O̩jo̩ e-He̩ze̩kaya ma ñʼagbʼabo-wñ bʼo̩wo̩-mi te̩ n.
Taku ma dʼomu dago aka nana alu ichi abo Juda ñw abo Je̩rusale̩m ku ma jʼoj aku le̩, ku ma nyʼuma okpo, ku ma laño̩ che ma e̩do̩ñwañwala; todu kʼama ki fʼewo le̩ du.
Oñ ma nʼo̩la O̩jo̩ e-Je̩rusale̩m aka alu ku ma nʼo̩la amo̩jo̩ amone̩ ile̩-i aka, e-ki chʼuko̩lo̩ kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ che le̩.
Todule̩ He̩ze̩kaya onu kpai Aizaya akache̩, o̩ma Emo̩z, chadua oñ ma kwarʼefojale.

Taku Jihofa fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ wa, oñ e-le̩ fʼamagbiti ku ma nʼuwohi chaka gwoda jʼane̩, kpʼame̩nuto̩gba kpʼamagboji ogu ef uru onu Asiria. Oñ i mudabi tʼane̩-wñ kpʼanyo̩. Tak e̩gba kʼi mugudu tʼef unyi o̩jo̩-wñ, abo-wñ onugo kʼi dʼato̩-wñ bi nʼo̩kwo̩chagali kpa o̩mo̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa fu He̩ze̩kaya kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m jadu bʼo̩wo̩ Se̩nake̩rib onu Asiria te̩, kpai bʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ du te̩, oñ i fʼuma de o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du.
Tak amone̩ wewe ko e̩wñ ele wa Je̩rusale̩m ñwu Jihofa, kpʼe̩wñ akoko ñwu He̩ze̩kaya, onu Juda ge̩; todabe̩le̩ i mud e̩ne̩lile eju abo uche̩ichi du akwʼe̩gba le̩.
Iko le̩ o̩ga le kʼi du He̩ze̩kaya kpa: tak i rodubo̩ Jihofa; oñ i ko̩la ñw u, i la mʼe̩wñ ujiweʼka du ñw u.
He̩ze̩kaya muda dabi che teju alu ku ma che̩nyo̩ ñw u n; todu i hi o̩la-wñ ne; todule̩ uwe̩do̩ wa bʼowñ kpʼabo Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m ma.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya fʼo̩la-wñ hi wane̩ tod uba e̩do̩-wñ le̩, tʼowñ tʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m, todabe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩do̩ Jihofa ma wa bʼuma ma o̩kpanachi He̩ze̩kaya n.

He̩ze̩kaya la nʼe̩wñ anana kpʼojima nana tabale. I fʼunyi unyi akpulu ko ñw o̩la-wñ todu ajifa kpai o̩jamalia kpai todu okuta akoko kpai todu e̩wñ ido̩ro̩ kpai todu ugbe̩yo̩ kpai todu e̩wñ ki nyo̩ ojoji ojoji du;
i ño̩ ro̩ aka aka tod e̩wñ e̩yo̩ ki tʼoko awa etito̩, kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma tito̩ kpʼekpo; kpʼunyi unyi tod ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ojoji ojoji, kpʼiga iga tod ujo ujo ame̩wño̩re̩ le̩.
Anoji e-le̩ i ño̩ fʼewo ewo ne̩ ñw o̩la-wñ kpʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini, i la nʼame̩wñ ukpa kpʼamokuno̩ ololo; todu O̩jo̩ kʼane̩ ñw u nana ololo.
He̩ze̩kaya ki de̩ gbage̩de̩ ño̩ fʼo̩na e̩bi omi Giho̩n e-ate̩ le̩ kpa, oñ i mʼu rida kʼi gwo̩ru wa o̩wo̩ olane̩ ewo Defid kpakpa. Uko̩lo̩ du ku He̩ze̩kaya che la ra ñw u.
Ama ugbo o̩la amajomudechi amagboji Babilo̩n, ku ma fʼuche̩ kpe̩ rʼu ku ma tene e̩wñ awuwu ku ma che ane̩ le̩. O̩jo̩ tʼowñ no̩ kʼi jʼo̩ ma, todu kʼi ma e̩wñ du ki dʼef e̩do̩-wñ.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ku He̩ze̩kaya che kpai e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ kʼi che, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ of o̩takada ane̩-ego e-Aizaya akache̩, o̩ma Emo̩z le̩, ef o̩takada amonu Juda kpai Israe̩l.

Taku He̩ze̩kaya cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ugbo ki dʼatate̩ tule ef ojinoji amo̩ma Defid. Tak abo Juda chaka kpai abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m bʼojima mʼo̩ iko uku-wñ. Taku Manasa o̩ma-wñ jonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ Manasa chʼe̩gweji e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejonu; i la jonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ ooje nyoke me̩lu.
1 la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, likpa alu kʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abo uche̩ichi ki Jihofa ne rinyo̩ bʼabo Israe̩l o̩gba te̩ de̩.
I ño̩ dabi ko̩ otete otete e-ku He̩ze̩kaya ata-wñ kpo̩fo̩ wane̩ le̩; oñ i fʼubo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne todu amiBeal, i la fʼujo̩ ujo̩ oli Ashe̩ra che, oñ i dojikane̩ ñw o̩wo̩ e̩wñ ojale du, i la re̩ ma.
Tak i fʼubo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne̩ ef unyi Jihofa, ugbo ki Jihofa kakini, Odu-mi la ade̩ Je̩rusale̩m ogbegbele̩.
Oñ i fʼubo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ne tod o̩wo̩ e̩wñ ojale du ef ologbo unyi Jihofa meji le̩.

I ño̩ je̩ ñw amo̩ma-wñ lale gu ef una du ef o̩go̩ o̩ma Hino̩m le̩; i nago akpa, i nʼe̩wñ ifamu ache, i chʼe̩wñ obochi, i chʼe̩wñ kpʼamadaje̩nu kpʼamochu; i fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che dabo̩ta, kʼi biʼi eju.

Taki mʼojibo kʼi gbe̩ le̩ du dago ef unyi O̩jo̩, owñ chʼe-kʼO̩jo̩ ka ñwu Defid kpai So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩ma-wñ kakini, Ef unyi-i, efu Je̩rusale̩m-i, kʼomi du kwef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l du, omi adʼodu-mi te̩ ogbegbele̩;

u ñʼadʼe̩re̩ Israe̩l kwo oj ane̩ kʼomi dute̩ ñw amata-me̩ n; e̩wñ okate de̩, iche̩wñ ku ma dejute̩ ku ma che e̩wñ du kʼu ñwa ñwu ma lugbo Mose̩s teju uko̩-o̩la du kpʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kpʼe̩wñ kʼoji ajo̩ ka,
oñ Manasa kʼabo Juda kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m la, ku ma chʼe̩bie̩ne̩ tʼabo uche̩ichi ku Jihofa kpabie̩ bʼabo Israe̩l o̩gba te̩ le.
Jihofa la ko̩la ñwu Manasa kpʼabo-wñ; ma muda nyeti n.
Todule̩ Jihofa kʼamagboji abogu onu Asiria wa bʼuma ma, owñ le̩ nʼuwo̩ mu Manasa tak i fʼu ji igbaligba ebije ikpa, oñ i mʼu du le tu Babilo̩n.
Tak e̩gba kʼi dʼef o̩pe̩cha le̩ i chologu bo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wñ, oñ i hi o̩la-wñ wane̩ nana o̩gba O̩jo̩ e-amata-wñ,
i la rodubʼo̩; tak i gbo̩ urodubo̩-wñ, i la gbo̩ ologu kʼi che, tak i mʼowñ du dabiwa Je̩rusale̩m wʼef o̩fe̩ ojane̩-wñ. Taku Manasa fuma ka ku Jihofa, owñ le̩ chʼO̩jo̩.

Tak ubi le̩ i fʼaku ne ejo̩do̩da aku ewn Defid, o̩wo̩ olane̩ Giho̩n, ef o̩go̩ le̩, gbogbo wʼalaku E̩ja; i la nʼe nyʼOfe̩l daka, oñ i ne kʼi gba nana ololo: tak i kʼamagboji abogu jʼewo ewo Juda du ki nʼaku.
I la mʼamo̩jo̩ abononojo kpai ode ode ko kwef unyi Jihofa, kpʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ du kʼi ne oj uwo unyi Jihofa kpai efu Je̩rusale̩m oñ i mʼu ko arinyo̩ bʼef ewo le̩ te̩.
Tak i fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa ñwo̩che, oñ i kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ kpʼugwa wa che oji-wñ; i la ñwa ñw abo Juda ku ma re̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, amone̩ nache iche̩bo̩ oj otete otete le̩ alo waa, ma muda che ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma kate.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ku Manasa che, kpʼadua kʼi che ñw O̩jo̩-wñ, kpʼo̩la amagane̩ ku ma ko̩la ñw u ef odu Jihofa. O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, go, ma fʼinabali-wñ ko̩ ref inabali e̩wñ kʼamonu Israe̩l che.

Kpai adua kʼi che, kpʼalu kʼO̩jo̩ gbʼadua-wñ, kpʼadure-wñ chaka kpʼada kʼi je̩ kpai ugbo du kʼi nʼotete otete, kʼi la ko ujo ujo oli Ashe̩ra kpai ojibo ojibo ku ma gbe̩ le̩ dago jo̩ o̩gba tak i hi o̩la-wñ wane̩ le̩, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ ref o̩takada inabali Hozai.
Abe̩le̩ Manasa cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef unyi-wñ onugo; tak Amo̩n, o̩ma-wñ, jonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ Amo̩n chʼogu nyoke meji e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejonu; oñ i jonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ meji.
I la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che, alu kʼata-wñ Manasa che; Amo̩n la che iche̩bo̩ ñw ojibo du kʼata-wñ gbe̩ le̩, oñ i re̩ ma.
I la hi o̩la-wñ wane̩ o̩gba Jihofa alu ku Manasa ata-wñ hi o̩la-wñ wane̩ n; todu Amo̩n kide̩ nafudu alo waa.
Tak abuko̩lo-wñ jʼalu nyʼu oñ ma mʼu du kpa ef unyi-wñ onugo.
Ama abʼane̩ o̩mo̩ fʼabo du ku ma jalunyʼAmo̩n onu kpa; tak abane̩ le̩ mʼo̩ma-wñ Josaya, du jonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ Josaya chʼe̩jo̩ e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu; oñ i jʼonu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyokeʼka.
I la che e̩wñ o̩kpakpa eju Jihofa, oñ i lule̩ o̩na o̩na Defid, ata-wñ; i la na tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n.

Todu ef o̩do̩ e̩ke̩jo̩ kʼi jʼonu, abu kʼi chʼimo̩to̩ ta, i chane̩ etene O̩jo̩ Defid, ata-wñ; oñ ef o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gweji i chane̩ eche ku Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m ki fe̩ bʼotete otete kpai ujo̩ ujo̩ oli Ashe̩rim kpai ojibo ojibo ku ma gbe̩ kpʼojibo ojibo ku ma da le̩ te̩.

Taku ma kʼubo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ amiBeal kpo̩fo̩ wane̩ eju-wñ; oñ ojibo ojibo olu ki jʼoji-ma atate̩, i fʼulo̩ wane̩; tak i fʼAshe̩rim kpʼojibo ojibo ku ma gbe̩ kpʼe-ku ma da ge̩ ye̩ge̩ ye̩ge̩, oñ i fʼu gwu ebutu, tak i bʼu rʼojinoji ojinoji abo ku ma che ma akwoubi le̩.
I la mʼachiku amatama ko gujo oj ubo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-ma onugo, oñ i che ku Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m ki fe̩.
Abe̩le̩ i che ewo ewo Manasa kpʼIfraim kpai Simeo̩n gbogbo wa Naftali ef alache̩-ma lale.
I la fʼubo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpo̩fo̩ wane̩, oñ i fʼAshe̩rim-ma kpʼojibo ojibo ku ma gbe̩ le̩ gwu ebutu; i la fʼojibo ojibo olu ugbo du ojane̩ Israe̩l lo̩ wane̩, tak i mudabi wa Je̩rusale̩m.

Oñ ef o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩ kʼi jonu, e̩gba kʼi che kʼane̩ kpʼunyi le̩ ki fe̩ kpa, i fu Shefan, o̩ma Azalaya, kpai Maaseya, agboji ewo le̩ kpai Joa o̩ma Joahaz, kʼi akʼinabali nyʼo̩takada, kpuche̩ nyʼañwʼunyi Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wñ, che.

Oñ ma lewʼugbo Hilkaya, agboji amatama oñ ma mʼo̩ko̩ ku ma ko wʼef unyi O̩jo̩, owñ chʼe-kʼabo Lifai ku ma de o̩na o̩na gba o̩wo̩ Manasa kpʼIfraim kpʼe̩bo̩bo̩ abo Israe̩l kpʼabo Juda kpai Be̩njamin chaka kpai abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m, ko wa jo̩.
Tak abo le̩ mʼu ko jʼef o̩wo̩ abuko̩lo̩ ku ma fejute̩ unyi Jihofa; tak abo ku ma chuko̩lo̩ ef unyi Jihofa le̩ mʼu ko ñw unyi le̩ che tʼe̩gu-wñ;
ma kʼo ñw amafoli kpʼamano̩do̩ ku ma mʼu ko la okuta ku ma da kpʼigbo oli ku ma ko che oli agbamune̩ kpʼoli ikeli tod unyi unyi kʼamonu Juda fʼu kpo̩fo̩ le̩.

Abo le̩ fʼuko̩lo̩-wñ che alu ku ma achubi one̩ nyo̩nyo̩. Oñ abo ku ma du ñwu ku ma fejute̩ ma che Jehat kpai Obadaya, ku ma chʼabo Lifai ef amo̩ma Me̩rari; kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Me̩shulam, ef amo̩ma Kohat, ku ma fejutʼo; abo Lifai-i chaka la chʼo̩ka e̩wñ eli enu.
Ama ño̩ nʼo̩da abo ku ma nʼadu ge̩, oñ ma fejutʼabo du ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩, alu du kʼe̩wñ ku ma che de̩; oñ abo Lifai iche̩ka chʼamako̩takada, iche̩ka chʼamo̩male̩, iche̩ka la chʼamadona.
Tak e̩gba ku ma kʼo̩ko̩ kʼamone̩ ko wʼef unyi Jihofa le̩ dufu, Hilkaya, atama fʼo̩takada uko̩-o̩la Jihofa kʼi lʼo̩wo̩ Mose̩s wa le̩ li.
Taku Hilkaya mʼohi du, oñ i ka ñwu Shefan, ako̩takada, kakini, Omi fʼo̩takada uko̩-o̩la li ef unyi Jihofa. Taku Hilkaya mʼo̩takada le̩ du ñwu Shefan.
Oñ Shefan nʼo̩takada le̩ nyʼugbo onu, i ño̩ dʼo̩la dabi wa ñw onu ge̩, kakini, E̩wñ du ku ma ko nyʼabuko̩lo̩-we̩ o̩wo̩ ku ma che, ma jʼo̩mo̩ ache.
Ma la mʼo̩ko̩ ku ma li ef unyi Jihofa ko dajane̩, ma la mʼu ko nyʼamafejute̩, kpʼabuko̩lo̩ le̩ o̩wo̩ me̩.
Taku Shefan, ako̩takada le̩, ka ñw onu kakini, Hilkaya, atama mʼo̩takadaʼka du ñwu mi-i. Taku Shefan chane̩ o̩kalatu-wñ eche o̩gba onu.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼonu fʼo̩la uko̩-o̩la lʼe̩ gbo̩, i fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana.
Tak onu ñwa ñwu Hilkaya kpʼAhaikam o̩ma Shefan, kpai Abdo̩n o̩ma Maika, kpai Shefan ako̩takada le̩, kpʼAsaiya e̩nuko̩lo̩ onu, kakini,

Me̩ nyʼatene ugbo Jihofa todu mi, kpai todu abo ku ma bobo Israe̩l kpai Juda, ugbo o̩la o̩takada ku ma li-i; todu uke̩do̩fulu Jihofa ki dafo bʼuwa ma-i tabale, todabu kʼamata-wa ma de o̩la Jihofa, ku ma che teju o̩la du ku ma ko̩ nyʼo̩takada-i n.

Abe̩le̩ Hilkaya kpʼabo kʼonu ka ñwu ma le̩, nyʼugbo Ho̩lda, akache̩ onobule̩, kʼi chʼo̩ya Shalum, o̩ma Tokhat o̩ma Hasra, adalo̩na unyi e̩wñ ku ma ko nyʼo̩la, (onobule̩ le̩ la gugu Je̩rusale̩m ikpo unyi ekeji); taku ma bʼo̩ chʼoluka abe̩le̩.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l aka de̩, kakini, Me̩ ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ me̩ wa ugbo mi le̩, kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi okʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa abʼuña-i ma, kpai abʼabo ku ma dodo emi ma, owñ chʼama du ku ma ko̩ nyʼo̩takada ku ma fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che o̩gba onu Juda le̩.
Todabu ku ma hi umi tinyo̩ ku ma la fʼotulale gujo ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩, kʼama ki nʼuko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-ma chaka anyʼumi uwe̩do̩; todule̩ uke̩do̩fulu-mi adafo bʼuña-i ma, i la nʼugbo du ku ma akpalu n.
I muda chʼe-onu Juda kʼi kpe̩ me̩ wa atene ugbo Jihofa le̩, abu ku me̩ aka ñw u de̩, kakini, Abu ku Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ka ugbo o̩la kʼe̩ gbo̩ le̩ de̩,

kakini, Todabu kʼe̩do̩-we̩ lo̩la, kʼe̩ la hi o̩la-we̩ wane̩ o̩gba O̩jo̩ abu kʼe̩ gbʼo̩la kʼi ka rʼuña-i, kpai e-kʼi ka rʼabo ku ma dodo emi oji, kʼe̩ la hi o̩la-we̩ wane̩ o̩gba mi, kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ o̩la-we̩ fana, kʼe̩ ño̩ raku o̩gba mi, omi ño̩ gbʼe-we̩ ge̩, Jihofa aka-i.
Go, omi adʼuwe̩ wʼugbo amata-we̩, ma la adʼuwe̩ tef ura-we̩ kpʼure̩do̩, eju-we̩ ño̩ adʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du kʼu nako wa abʼuña-i ma n, kpai abʼabo ku ma dodo uña-i ma n. Taku ma mʼo̩la du dabiwa ñw onu.
Tak onu fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼadʼabogi-jo Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m wa jʼugbokate.

Tak onu mute̩gu nyʼunyi Jihofa, manyʼaboke̩le̩ Juda chaka kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m kpʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai kpʼamone̩ le̩ chaka tʼabʼe̩-lile tʼabʼe-kekele; tak i fʼo̩kalatu o̩la du ki jʼef o̩takada alo ku ma li ef unyi Jihofa le̩ che nyʼuma eti.

Tak onu kwodago uña-wñ, oñ i fʼalo kpe̩ o̩gba Jihofa, ka kʼi alule̩ tu Jihofa ubi kʼi la ade uko̩ uko̩ kʼi te̩ kpʼo̩la ibenu-wñ kpʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ, kpʼe̩do̩-wñ kpʼonugo-wñ chaka, todu kʼi che teju o̩la alo ku ma ko̩ nyʼo̩takada-i.
Tak i je̩ ñw abo du ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m kpai Be̩njamin ku ma dago kpaka. Oñ abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m che alu kʼalo O̩jo̩ ka, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ e-amata-ma.

Oñ Josaya mʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ du ko bʼoj ane̩ du kʼo̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l ne̩ te̩, oñ i je̩ ñw amone̩ du ku ma jo̩ Israe̩l ku ma re̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma. O̩jo̩ du kʼi deju ma kwo bʼetu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-amata-ma, ubi te̩ n.
Taku Josaya fʼElaloji de ñwu Jihofa Je̩rusale̩m; ma la fʼe̩wñ Elaloji le̩ kpa o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu ejodudu.
Tak i hi amatama jo̩ ugugu ugugu e-ma, oñ i dʼugbe̩do̩ ñwu ma ku ma che e̩wñ-ma ef unyi Jihofa.

Tak i ka ñw abo Lifai ku ma fo̩ todu Jihofa ku ma la ko abo Israe̩l e̩wñ kakini, Dʼakpati alo kiafo̩ le̩ tef unyi ki So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma Defid kʼi chʼonu Israe̩l ko̩ le̩; i dʼugbo kʼume̩ ne̩ ika ge̩ n. Fa-i ame̩ ki re̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, kpʼabo-wñ Israe̩l.
Me̩ ki la fʼo̩la-me̩ ñwo̩che jo̩ ukpe̩ru ukpe̩ru teju alu kʼunyi unyi amata-me̩ de̩, alu ku Defid onu Israe̩l kpai So̩lo̩mo̩n o̩ma-wñ ko̩ nyʼo̩takada.
Taku me̩ kwodago jʼef uña kiafo̩ le̩ alu kʼuche̩ uche̩ unyi unyi amata todu amo̩maye ku ma chʼamo̩ma amone̩-i de̩, teju alu kʼakwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo Lifai chʼe̩kpe̩ru jo̩.
Taku me̩ fʼElaloji kpa, ku me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ che ku me̩ fo̩, oñ me̩ fʼu ñwo̩che jo̩ todu amo̩maye-me̩ ku ma ki che teju o̩la Jihofa kʼi lʼo̩wo̩ Mose̩s wa.

Taku Josaya kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini owñ chʼamo̩mala kpai amo̩mewo wa ne ate̩ tod amo̩ma amone̩ le̩, o̩chaka-wñ chʼutodu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ Elaloji, tod abo du kʼeju mu dane̩ o̩mo̩; aluka-wñ che icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko ogue̩gwa, manyʼamo̩kokuno̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta: e̩wñ-i kwef e̩wñ kʼonu ne̩.

Tak amagboji-wñ gʼe̩do̩la-ma kʼe̩wñ nyʼate̩ jo̩ tod amone̩ kpʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai. Hilkaya kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Jehaye̩l, ku ma chʼame̩nuto̩gba unyi O̩jo̩, mʼame̩wño̩re̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji nyʼulo̩gwa kpʼo̩kokuno̩ oli me̩fa ko ñw amatama ku ma kowa che Elaloji.

Ko̩nanaya ge̩ kpai She̩maya kpai Ne̩tane̩l amo̩maye-wñ kpai Hashabaya kpai Jiaye̩l kpai Jo̩zabad, agboji abo Lifai, kʼame̩wño̩re̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu, kpʼamo̩kokuno̩ oli me̩gwa ñw abo Lifai ku ma ko wa che Elaloji.
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼe̩wñ uko̩lo̩-wñ ñwo̩che jo̩, amatama la dago jʼuña e-ma, kpai uche̩ uche̩ abo Lifai, alu kʼonu tʼuko̩ ñwu ma le̩.
Taku ma fʼElaloji le̩ kpa, oñ amatama nʼe̩bie̩ ku ma gba kwʼo̩wo̩-ma tafio̩, oñ abo Lifai fʼe̩la-wñ kpanya jo.

Taku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo jʼo̩wo̩ʼka kʼama ki ko ñw uche̩ uche̩ unyi unyi amata-ma amo̩ma amone̩ le̩, kʼama ki ko wa ñwu Jihofa alu ku ma ko̩ nyʼo̩takada Mose̩s le̩. Abe̩le̩ ma ño̩ che kpʼamo̩kokuno̩ le̩ ge̩.

Taku ma nʼuna fʼe̩la Elaloji le̩ ro̩ alu kʼo̩da-wñ de̩; oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ki afo̩ ku ma ko wa le̩ ma fu hi ef ucha, kpʼef ucha o̩go̩ kpʼef e̩wñ omune̩ ku ma du gʼuna, taku ma hika ko nyʼugbo amo̩ma amone̩ le̩ chaka.

Ubi le̩ taku ma fʼe̩wñ ñwo̩che ñw o̩la-ma kpai todu amatama, todabu kʼo̩wo̩ amatama, amo̩ma Aro̩n le̩, jʼef e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼula-wñ ekowa che gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩: todule̩ oñ abo Lifai ñwo̩che ñw o̩la-ma kpai todu amatama ku ma chʼamo̩ma Aro̩n.

Oñ amakeli, amo̩ma Esaf le̩, jʼuña e-ma alu ku Defid kpai Esaf kpai Heman kpai Jedutun, agane̩ onu le̩ fʼuko̩-wñ te̩; amadʼalo̩na la jʼalaku alaku okoke du; i nʼugbo ku ma kwo bʼoj uko̩lo-ma te̩ n todu amo̩maye-ma, abo Lifai, fʼu ñwo̩che ñwu ma.
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼe̩wñ uko̩lo̩ unyi Jihofa ñwo̩che jo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, kʼama ki fʼElaloji de ku ma ño̩ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa alu ku Josaya, onu fʼuko̩-wñ te̩.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l kʼeju-ma dʼane̩ o̩mo̩, fʼElaioji kpʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ akala kʼo̩jo̩wu ma do̩ n de iko le̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩jo̩mebie.

Akwe̩gba Samiue̩l akache̩ le̩, ma de Elaloji e̩go̩-wñ ane̩ Israe̩l-i n. I nʼamonu Israe̩l du ku ma de Elaloji alu ku Josaya kpʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai kpʼabo Juda chaka kpʼabo Israe̩l du kʼeju-ma dʼane̩ kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m chaka de le̩ n.
Ma fʼElaloji-i de o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩ ku Josaya jʼonu.
Anubi e̩wñ-i du abu ku Josaya fʼunyi O̩jo̩ ñwo̩che jo̩, Niko, onu Ijipti, mute̩gu wa kʼi kʼogu bo̩ Karkemish, kʼi dʼo̩la Yufretis le̩: taku Josaya le dufu kʼi kobʼo.

Niko muda fʼonuche̩ kpe̩rʼu kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-mi kpʼuwe̩? Uwe̩ onu Juda? I chʼuwe̩ omi wa kobʼo eñini-i n; chai abo unyi kʼomi kpʼama nʼuja; O̩jo̩ la ñwa ñwu mi kʼu hika che. We ekobʼO̩jo̩ kʼi dʼugbo-mi-i, kʼi we ekpʼuwe̩ bie̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ Josaya ko̩ erejuda bʼo̩ te̩, i muda fʼafe̩ kpalu todu kʼi bʼo̩ ja; i la netiru o̩la ku Niko ka kwʼalu O̩jo̩ le̩ n, oñ i wa ja ef o̩go̩ Me̩gido.
Oñ amato̩fa tʼo̩fa ñwu Josaya onu; tak onu ka ñwu abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Mʼumi du kwʼemi alo todu agbe̩ ku ma che mi che bie̩ne̩.

Abe̩le̩ abuko̩lo̩-wñ mʼu du kwef okogu le̩ oñ ma mʼu du tef o̩kogu ekeji kʼi ne̩, taku ma mʼu du wa Je̩rusale̩m; i la leku, oñ ma mʼu du ji ef ojinoji amata-wñ. Tak abo Juda kpʼabo Je̩rusale̩m chaka kwodaido̩ Josaya.

Oñ Je̩re̩maya dinaku Josaya; oñ amakeli du tʼaboke̩le̩ tʼabobule̩ nʼo̩la Josaya aka ef inaku ku ma da gbogbo tʼo̩jo̩ oluñini; taku ma dʼo̩da-wñ te̩ ñw o̩la-ma Israe̩l. E̩ la go, i che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩la Edinaku le̩.
Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ ki Josaya che, kpʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ kʼi che teju e̩wñ ku ma ko̩ ef uko̩-o̩la Jihofa,
oñ e̩wñ kʼi che, tʼe-ejodudu tʼe-otitala, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada amonu Israe̩l kpai Juda.
Tak abʼane̩ le̩ mu Jihoahaz, o̩ma Josaya du oñ ma mʼu du jʼonu koji ata-wñ Je̩rusale̩m.
O̩do̩ Jihoahaz chʼogu nyoke me̩ta e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ. I la fʼonu-wñ je̩ Je̩rusale̩m ochu me̩ta.
Tak onu Ijipti mʼu yo̩ tane̩ Je̩rusale̩m, oñ i fʼo̩ko bu ñw abo oj ane̩ le̩; ajifa-wñ chʼalu tale̩nt ogume̩lu, o̩jamalia-wñ la che tale̩nt oka.
Tak onu Ijipti dʼE̩layakim, o̩maye-wñ, jʼonu Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m. I la mʼodu-wñ rida ko̩ Jiho̩yakim. Taku Niko fʼo̩maye-wñ Jihoahaz mu, oñ i mʼu du le tʼIjipti.
O̩do̩ Jiho̩yakim chʼogu nyoke me̩lu e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ. I la jʼonu-wñ gugu Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩gwaka. I ño̩ fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ che eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ.
Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n, mute̩gu wa ako̩bʼo̩. Oñ i nʼigbaligba ebije ikpa fʼu ji kʼi mʼu du lo tu Babilo̩n.
Oñ Ne̩biukadne̩za kʼe̩wñ eku unyi Jihofa iche̩ka nyi Babilo̩n, oñ i mʼu ko jʼef unyi alifia-wñ Babilo̩n.
E̩wñ ki bo̩ ki Jiho̩yakim che, kpʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-wñ kʼi che, kpʼe̩wñ ku ma li ef uwñ, go, ma fʼe-le̩ ko̩ rʼef o̩takada amonu Israe̩l kpai Juda. Taku Jiho̩-yachin, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
O̩do̩ Jiho̩yachin chʼe̩gwe̩jo̩ e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu-wñ. Oñ i jʼonu-wñ Je̩rusale̩m ochu me̩ta nyʼo̩jo̩ me̩gwa. I la ño̩ fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ che eju Jihofa ge̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ muda ko Ne̩biukadne̩za onu fʼuche̩ kpe̩ wa ku ma mʼu du wa Babilo̩n, manyʼe̩wñ eku akoko kwef unyi Jihofa. Oñ i dʼo̩maye-wñ Ze̩de̩kaya jʼonu Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m.
O̩do̩ Ze̩de̩kaya chʼogu nyokeʼka e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼonu. Oñ i jʼonu o̩do̩ me̩gwaka Je̩rusale̩m.
I la fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ che eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ; i hi o̩la-wñ wane̩ eju Je̩re̩maya akache̩ kʼi nʼo̩la ki kwef alu Jihofa aka le̩ n.
Tak i ño̩ ko̩ Ne̩biukadne̩za onu, kʼi je̩ ñw u fʼO̩jo̩ go ikoʼka le̩: i la fʼo̩lo̩-wñ lo dago, oñ i fʼe̩do̩-wñ no̩ kʼi we erida tʼugbo Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l.
Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, abo ku ma doji dufu ef amatama chaka kpai amone̩ le̩ fʼada je̩ atʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abo uche̩ ichi ubi tabale; ma la fʼunyi Jihofa kʼi je̩ ñw u fo̩ Je̩rusale̩m o̩mo̩ daji.
Taku Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-ma fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ rʼuma lʼo̩wo̩ amonuche̩-wñ, i natakpa takpa kwane̩ akpe̩rʼuma, todabu kʼi ali abo-wñ, kpʼunyi-wñ ugbo kʼi agugu le̩ ejumomi.
Ma muda kʼamonuche̩ O̩jo̩ ru oñ ma chʼe̩de̩te̩ o̩la-wñ, ma chukochu nyʼamonuche̩-wñ gbogbo tak uke̩do̩fulu Jihofa kwane̩ bʼabo-wñ ma, gbogbo tak o̩ga-ma ma ñʼagbogu ge̩ n.

Todule̩ i mʼonu abo Kaldia duwa kʼi kobʼuma, oñ i nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa abokolobia-ma ef unyi uña-ma kiafo̩ le̩; i li okolobia kpʼonobule̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, kpʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ogijo kpʼe̩ne̩ iloji efufu ejumomi n. I mʼuma ko jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ chaka.
Tak i mʼe̩wñ eku unyi O̩jo̩ chaka, tʼe-lile tʼe-ke̩ke̩, kpʼe̩wñ akoko unyi Jihofa, kpʼe̩wñ akoko onu, kpʼe-amagboji-wñ ko, oñ i muko wa Babilo̩n chaka.
Taku ma fʼunyi O̩jo̩ gujo rinyo̩, oñ ma fʼaku Je̩rusale̩m gulo̩ wane̩, ma la fʼuna tʼunyi alifia-wñ chaka agujo rinyo̩, oñ ma fʼe̩wñ eku-wñ e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ chaka kpabie̩ rinyo̩.
Tak i mʼabo ku ma fu tane̩ bʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli te̩ ko le tu Babilo̩n; oñ ma mud amadu-wñ kpʼamadu amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, gbogbo tak onu ojane̩ Pe̩rsia nʼo̩da o̩mo̩,
todu kʼo̩la Jihofa e-kʼi ka lʼalu Je̩re̩maya ki che̩ kpa, gbogbo tak ane̩ le̩ fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-wñ je̩ kpa. O̩jo̩ du kʼi chʼalache̩ te̩ le̩ i fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi de, kʼo̩do̩ e̩te̩gwa ki jo̩.

Oñ o̩do̩ ejodudu ki Sairo̩s jʼonu Pe̩rsia, todu kʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka lʼalu Je̩re̩maya ki che̩, Jihofa dʼibe ti Sairo̩s onu Pe̩rsia le̩ efu, todu kʼi fʼakoya ta ugbo du ojane̩-wñ, kʼi ño̩ fʼo̩takada-wñ ko̩ kakini,

Abu ki Sairo̩s onu Pe̩rsia ka le̩ de̩, kakini, Jihofa, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ efojale, mʼojane̩ ojane̩ ile̩-i du ko ñwu mi me̩; i la fʼuko̩ te̩ ñwu mi kʼu fʼunyi ko̩ ñw u Je̩rusale̩m ane̩ Juda. E̩ne̩ du ki dʼefu-me̩ ku me̩ chʼabo-wñ chaka, Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ ki dʼugbo-wñ, kʼi la te̩gu.

Oñ o̩do̩ ejodudu ki Sairo̩s jʼonu Pe̩rsia, todu kʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka lʼalu Je̩re̩maya ki che̩, Jihofa dʼibe ti Sairo̩s onu Pe̩rsia le̩ efu, todu kʼi fʼakoya ta ugbo du ojane̩-wñ, kʼi ño̩ fʼo̩takada-wñ ko kakini:
Abu ki Sairo̩s onu Pe̩rsia ka le̩ de̩, kakini, Jihofa, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ efojale, mʼojane̩ ojane̩, ile̩-i du ko ñwu mi me̩; i la fʼuko̩ te̩ ñwu mi kʼu fʼunyi ko̩ ñw u Je̩rusale̩m ane̩ Juda.
E̩ne̩ du ki dʼefu-me̩ ku me̩ chʼabo-wñ chaka, O̩jo̩-wñ ki dʼugbo-wñ, kʼi la te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m e-ki dʼojane̩ Juda le̩, kʼi ko̩ unyi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, owñ le̩ chʼO̩jo̩, e-ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m.
