E̩ne̩ du ki bo̩, ugbo du kʼi chaka ge̩ne̩, abo ku ma jʼugbo kʼi de̩ le̩ ki nakʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia kpai ane̩ ki bo̩ kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ chʼate̩ko-wñ, e-le̩ amanyu e̩wñ ku ma gʼe̩do̩la-ma adu wa todu unyi O̩jo̩ ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak amata ku ma dʼoji dufu Juda kpai Be̩njamin kpai amatama kpai abo Lifai kwane̩, owñ chʼabo du kʼO̩jo̩ dʼ ibe tʼuma efu ku ma nyʼako̩ unyi Jihofa ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak abo du ku ma jo̩ lʼuma daka ne̩ e̩wñ ajifa kpai o̩jamalia, kpai ane̩ kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kpai e̩wñ akoko̩, manyʼe̩wñ du ku ma gʼe̩do̩la-ma ko wa, dʼukpahiu ñw o̩wo̩-ma.
Sairo̩s onu le̩ ño̩ kʼe̩wñ eku unyi Jihofa dufu, owñ chʼe-ki Ne̩biukadne̩za ko kwo Je̩rusale̩m wa, kʼi la mʼu ko jʼef unyi amo̩jo̩ e-wñ.
Ab e-le̩ Sairo̩s onu Pe̩rsia je̩ ñwu Mitredat, adigede-wñ, ko dufu wa, kʼi fʼu kaluka nyʼef o̩wo̩ She̩sh-baza idachi Juda.
Aluka e̩wñ le̩ la de̩; e̩wñ ku ma nʼo̩jamalia che ki dab akpe̩te̩ chʼogue̩gwa, e̩wñ abe̩le̩ ku ma nʼajifa che chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, o̩be̩ chʼogu nyoke me̩la,
ugba ku ma nʼo̩jamalia che chʼogue̩gwa, ugba ku ma nʼajifa che o̩wo̩-ba chʼulo̩ko̩ nyoke me̩gwa, kpai e̩wñ eku omune̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ge̩.
E̩wñ eku o̩jamalia kpai ajifa le̩ du chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lunyʼulo̩ko̩. E̩wñ-i chaka oñ She̩sh-baza ko dabi wa e̩gba ku ma kʼabo kʼogu jʼamata-ma le̩ kwo Babilo̩n te̩gu wa Je̩rusale̩m.

Abo-i chʼamo̩ma ojane̩ le̩ ku ma te̩gu dufu kwef abo amu ku ma ño̩ ma lo le̩, owñ chʼabo ki Ne̩biukadne̩za onu Babilo̩n le̩ ño̩ nyi Babilo̩n, ku ma la mudabi wa Je̩rusale̩m kpai Juda, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼewo e-wñ.
Abo le̩ kpe̩re̩ wa kpai Zerubabe̩l kpai Je̩shua kpai Nihe̩maya kpai Se̩raya kpai Ree̩laya kpai Mo̩rde̩kai kpai Bilshan kpai Mispar kpai Bigfai kpai Rehum kpai Beana.
amo̩ma Parosh chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji nyʼoli me̩ta nyʼogu nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma She̩fatia che oli mebie nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma Ara chʼogue̩lu chʼicham nyʼete̩gwa nyoke melu.
Amo̩ma Pahat-moab, kwef amo̩ma Je̩shua kpai Joab, chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji nyʼicham nyoke megweji.
Amo̩ma Elam chicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼoli me̩lu nyoke me̩le̩.
Amo̩ma, Zatu chʼicham nyʼo̩gbo̩ mebie nyʼoke me̩lu.
Amo̩ma Zakai chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩jo̩.
Amo̩ma Bani chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma Bebai chʼulo̩gwa nyʼogu nyoke me̩ta.
Amo̩ma Azgad chʼicham nyʼulo̩ko̩ nyi ogu nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma Adonikam chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩fa.
Amo̩ma Bigfai chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji nyʼooje nyoke me̩fa.
Amo̩ma Adin chʼulo̩ko̩ nyʼooje nyoke me̩le̩.
Amo̩ma Ate̩r e-He̩ze̩kaya chʼoke meji chi ef o̩gume̩lu.
Amo̩ma Bezai chʼoli me̩fa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ nyoke me̩ta.
Amo̩ma Jora chʼogume̩lu nyoke me̩gweji.
Amo̩ma Hashum chʼo̩gwo̩-ko̩ nyʼogu nyoke me̩ta.
Amo̩ma Gibar chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ nyoke me̩gwe̩lu.
Amo̩ma Be̩tle̩he̩m chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩ta.
Aboke̩le̩ Ne̩tofa chʼooje nyoke me̩fa.
Aboke̩le̩ Anato̩t chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩jo̩.
Amo̩ma Azmafe̩t chʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma Kiriat-arim, kpai Chifaira kpai Biro̩t che ulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ mebie nyoke me̩ta.
Amo̩ma Rama kpai Geba chʼulo̩gwa nyʼogu nyo̩-keʼka.
Aboke̩le̩ Mikmas chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke meji.
Aboke̩le̩ Be̩te̩l kpai Ai chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼogu nyoke me̩ta.
Amo̩ma Nebo chʼooje nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma Magbish chʼoli me̩ta nyoke me̩fa.
Amo̩ma Elam ekeji le̩ chʼicham nyʼulo̩ko̩ nyʼooje nyoke me̩le̩.
Amo̩ma Harim chʼoli me̩fa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩.
Amo̩ma Lod kpai Hadid kpai Ono chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩lu.
Amo̩ma Je̩riko chʼoli me̩fa nyʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu.
Amo̩ma Se̩naa chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩ta nyʼulo̩gwa nyʼogue̩gwa.
Amatama jo̩-i; amo̩ma Je̩daya, ku ma chʼabo unyi Je̩shua, chʼicham nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ me̩jo̩ nyoke me̩gwe̩ta.
Amo̩ma Ime̩r chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼooje nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma Pashur chʼicham nyʼulo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke mebie.
Amo̩ma Harim chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyoke me̩gwebie.
Abo Lifai jo̩-i: amo̩ma Je̩shua kpai Kadmie̩l, ku ma jʼef amo̩ma Ha-dafia, chʼe̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩le̩.
Amakeli jo̩-i; amo̩ma Esaf chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩jo̩.
Amo̩ma amadalo̩na jo̩-i: amo̩ma Shalum kpai amo̩ma Ete̩r kpai amo̩ma Talmo̩n kpai amo̩ma Akkub kpai amo̩ma Hatita kpai amo̩ma Shobai, o̩chaka-ma chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwe̩la.
Abʼuko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ jo̩-i: amo̩ma Ziha kpai amo̩ma Hazufa kpai amo̩ma Tabaot
kpai amo̩ma Keros kpai amo̩ma Siaha kpai amo̩ma Padon
kpai amo̩ma Lebana kpai amo̩ma Hagaba kpai amo̩ma Akkub
kpai amo̩ma Hagab kpai amo̩ma Shamlai kpai amo̩ma Hanan
kpai amo̩ma Gide̩l kpai amo̩ma Gehar kpai amo̩ma Reaya
kpai amo̩ma Kozin kpai amo̩ma Neko̩da kpai amo̩ma Gazam
kpai amo̩ma Uza kpai amo̩ma Pasea kpai amo̩ma Besai
kpai amo̩ma Asna kpai amo̩ma Me̩unim kpai amo̩ma Nefisim
kpai amo̩ma Bakbuk kpai amo̩ma Hakufa kpai amo̩ma Harhur
kpai amo̩ma Bazlut kpai amo̩ma Me̩hida kpai amo̩ma Harsha
kpai amo̩ma Barkos kpai amo̩ma Sise̩ra kpai amo̩ma Tema
kpai amo̩ma Nezia kpai amo̩ma Halifa.
Amo̩ma amadu So̩lo̩mo̩n jo̩-i: amo̩ma Sotai kpai amo̩ma Hasofe̩re̩t kpai amo̩ma Pe̩ruda
kpai amo̩ma Jaala kpai amo̩ma Darkon kpai amo̩ma Gide̩l
kpai amo̩ma She̩fatia kpai amo̩ma Hatil kpai amo̩ma Poche̩re̩t-hazebaim kpai amo̩ma Ami.
Abʼuko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ kpai amo̩ma amadu So̩lo̩mo̩n chaka che oke me̩jo̩ chi ef ulo̩ko̩.

Abo ku ma kwo Te̩l-mela kpai Te̩l-harsha kpai Che̩rub kpai Adan kpai Ime̩r te̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩ le̩ jo̩-i: ma muda ne̩ e̩wñ ijali o̩lo̩pu-ma n kpai ugbe̩-ma n, abe̩k ama chʼabo Israe̩l, abe̩ku ma chʼabo Israe̩l in.
Amo̩ma Delaya kpai amo̩ma Tobaya kpai amo̩ma Ne-koda, aluka-ma chʼulo̩gwa nyʼooje nyoke meji.
Abo ku ma jʼef amo̩ma amatama la jo̩-i: amo̩ma Habaya kpʼamo̩ma Hako̩s kpʼamo̩ma Barzilai e-kʼi nʼo̩ya kwʼef amo̩ma Barzilai abo Giliad le̩, ku ma dʼodu-wñ manyʼuma le̩.
Abo le̩ tene o̩takada odu-ma ef abo ku ma lo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma le̩, ma muda li u n; todule̩ ma dab e̩wñ e̩daji ugbo abo ki bo̩, oñ ma mʼuma ko jʼane̩ bʼef uko̩lo̩ amatama te̩.
Tak igo̩bina ka ñwu ma kʼama ki we eje̩ e̩wñ ki afo̩ e-efo̩ le̩, gbogbo tak ata-maʼka kʼi ne̩ Urim kpai Tumim ki kwane̩.
O̩gbo̩ abujeju le̩ chaka chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogbo̩ meji nyoke meji nyʼoli mebie nyoke me̩gwa.
Amadu-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai amadu-ma onobule̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ mebie nyʼoli me̩fa nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke mebie ño̩ manyʼuma. Ma ño̩ ne̩ amakeli aboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ manyʼuma ge̩.
Amanya-ma chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwefa; amimiulu-ma chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu;
aminyakulumi-ma chʼulo̩-ko̩ nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke me̩lu; amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-ma chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩fa nyʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa.
Tak e̩gba kʼamata ku ma dʼoji dufu iche̩ka lewa unyi Jihofa kʼi de̩ Je̩rusale̩m ma gʼe̩do̩la-ma akʼe̩wñ ele wa todu unyi O̩jo̩ ku ma ko̩ dago e̩gu-wñ;

alu kʼo̩wo̩-ma tu oñ ma ko jʼef akpati o̩ko̩ tod uko̩lo̩ le̩; aluka e̩wñ ku ma kowa le̩ che darik o̩jamalia icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyokeʼka, uwoji ajifa kʼe̩bo̩ du chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu, kpʼafe̩ amatama ogume̩-lu.
Abe̩le̩ amatama le̩ kpai abo Lifai kpai amone̩ iche̩ka, kpai amakeli kpai amadalo̩na kpai abo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩, kwogugu ewo ewo-ma, oñ abo Israe̩l chaka jʼewo ewo e-ma.
Tak e̩gba kʼochu ekebie jo̩, kʼabo Israe̩l la jo̩ ewo ewo amone̩ le̩ kʼo̩-la ma wa jeju Je̩rusale̩m ugboʼkate.

Taki Je̩shua, o̩ma Jozadak, kpai amo̩maye-wñ ku ma chʼamatama, kpai Ze̩rubabe̩l, o̩ma Shealtie̩l, kpai amo̩maye-wñ, kwane̩ oñ ma fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ne, kuma che e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo oji-wñ, alu ku ma ko̩ ef uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩.
Oñ ma dʼubo̩ le̩ dago e̩gu-wñ; todu okpo chi ma ofe todu abo ojane̩ ojane̩ o̩mo̩; taku ma kwokʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wache oji-wñ ñwu Jihofa, owñ chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo e-odudu kpai e-ane̩.
Oñ ma fʼuje̩wñ e-ebu emu le̩ de alu ku ma ko̩tane̩, ma fʼaluka e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo che o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa alu ku ma hio̩me̩-wñ te̩, alu ki dukpe̩ ku ma che o̩jo̩ du;
ubile̩ taku mafʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ che, kpai e-ochu tito̩ kpai uje̩wñ uyo̩ e-Jihofa kiafo̩ du e-kʼiko-wñ chʼedate̩, kpai e-e̩ne̩ du ki gʼe̩do̩la-wñ akʼe̩wñ wa ñwu Jihofa ele o̩fo.
O̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu ekebie le̩ ma chane̩ eko e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa ñwu Jihofa. Ma muda dʼe̩re̩ unyi Jihofa nyane̩ ta n.

Ma ño̩ kʼo̩ko̩ ñw abo ku ma ne kpai abo ku ma fʼoli; kpʼuje̩wñ kpai omi kpai ekpo ñw abo Saido̩n kpai abo̩ Taya, todu ku ma ko oli sidar kwʼoko Le̩bano̩n wʼo̩la ohimini Jo̩pa, alu ki Sairo̩s, onu Pe̩rsia le̩, bu ñwu ma.

Oñ ef o̩do̩ ekeji ku ma wʼunyi O̩jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m, ochu ekeji-wñ, Zerubabe̩l, o̩ma Shealtie̩l, kpai Je̩shua, o̩ma Jozadak, kpai amo̩maye-ma ki bo̩ ku ma chʼamatama kpai abo Lifai, kpai amone̩ ku ma kwʼef amu le̩ wa Je̩rusale̩m chane̩, oñ ma chi abo Lifai kʼo̩do̩-ma ma nyaru ogu n, ku ma nʼo̩da edejutʼuko̩lo̩ unyi Jihofa.

Taku Je̩shua kpai amo̩ma-wñ kpai amo̩maye-wñ, kpai Kadmie̩l kpai amo̩ma-wñ, ku ma chʼamo̩ma Juda le̩, kwane̩ aluʼkate ku ma dejutʼabo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩; owñ chʼamo̩ma He̩nedad manyʼamo̩ma-ma kpai amo̩maye-ma, abo Lifai le̩.

Tak e̩gba kʼamakunyi dʼe̩re̩ unyi Jihofa nyane̩, ma kʼamatama kʼo̩la-ma che̩mu jo̩ kpai o̩kakachi-ma, kpai abo Lifai ku ma chʼamo̩ma Esaf kpai eicha-ma, ku ma je̩nyu Jihofa, alu ki Defid, onu Israe̩l, ñwa jo̩;
ef eje̩nyʼu kpai egogbodo̩ Jihofa ma kwokʼeli ñw omune̩, ma kakini,
Ama amatama kpai abo Lifai wewe kpai amata ku ma dʼoji dufu owñ chʼabogijo ku ma li unyi ejodudu le̩, abu ku ma dʼe̩re̩ unyi-i nyʼane̩ eju-ma, ma kworaku taa, amone̩ wewe la kpʼogu taa noj uyo̩;
abe̩le̩ amone̩ neke ma ojoji ekuku abo ku ma chʼo̩ga uyo̩ kpai ekuku amone̩ ku ma raku n todu amone̩ le̩ kpʼogu taaa, oñ ma gbʼekuku-wñ o̩najiji.
Oñ e̩gba kʼabo ku ma che Juda kpai Be̩njamin o̩pe̩cha gbo̩ ka kʼamo̩ma amu le̩ jo̩ akʼunyi ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l,

ma te̩ me̩ru Zerubabe̩l, kpai amata ku ma dʼoji dufu le̩, oñ ma ka ñwu ma kakini, A abʼume̩ kʼunyi; todu a tene O̩jo̩-me̩ alu ku me̩ tene owñ; a te̩tʼakpa e̩wñ e̩bie̩ ñw u akwʼiko E̩zar-hadon, onu Asiria, e-ki ko wa wʼemi le̩.

Ama Ze̩rubabe̩l kpai Je̩shua kpai abo ki bo̩ ef amata ku ma dʼoji dufu Israe̩l, ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩wo̩-me̩ dʼef uko̩lo̩ unyi eko̩ ñw O̩jo̩-wa kpai awa n; awa o̩to̩to̩la-wa kate akʼo̩ ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, alu ki Sairo̩s onu Pe̩rsia ñwa ñwu wa.
Tak amone̩ ane̩ le̩ fʼamone̩ Juda le̩ o̩wo̩ bulo̩, ma chane̩ echʼuma e̩do̩ ñwañwala tod unyi ku ma ko̩ le̩.
Taku ma fʼo̩gu che ñw amulo̩la tʼuma o̩la, ku ma kpʼo̩na nyʼuma o̩jo̩ du ki Sairo̩s onu Pe̩rsia deju, gbogbo taku Darius wa jʼonu Pe̩rsia.
Tak iko onu Ahasue̩rus, abu kʼi jʼonu ababa, ma fʼo̩takada ko̩ agwajo̩ nʼabo ku ma dodo Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m.

Oñ ef o̩kpanachi Artaze̩rksis, Bishlam kpai Mitre̩dat kpai Tabee̩l kpai ame̩numana-ma ki bo̩, fʼo̩takada ko̩ ru Artaze̩rksis, onu Pe̩rsia; ma fʼo̩takada le̩ ko̩ alu kʼabo Siria ako̩ kpai ichi Siria ge̩.
Rehum, kʼi chʼagboji amatohio̩la, kpai Shimshai, ako̩takada, fʼo̩takada ko̩ rʼonu Artaze̩rksis nyu abo Je̩rusale̩m abe̩le̩—

Taku Rehum, agboji amatohio̩la, kpai Shimshai, ako̩takada le̩, kpai ame̩numana-ma ki bo̩, owñ chʼabo Daine kpʼabo Afarsat kpʼabo Tarpe̩l kpʼabo Afar kpʼabo Arkefai kpʼabo Babilo̩n kpʼabo Shushan kpʼabo Deha kpʼabo Elam
kpʼabo uche̩ichi kibo̩ e-kʼe̩ne̩lile kpai e̩nojima ku ma do̩ ko̩ Osnappar ko daba wa gugu ef ewo Samaria, kpʼojane̩ kibo̩ ejudaba ohimini le̩, kpʼe-ki bo̩.
Alu ku ma ko̩ nyʼef o̩takada ku ma du kpuche̩ rʼArtaze̩rksis kʼi chʼonu le̩ de̩, kakini, Amadu-we̩, kʼa chʼabo udaba ohimini, abe̩le̩ abe̩le̩.
Onu ki ma kakini, amaju ku ma kwugbo we̩ wa le̩, ma lewa ugbo wa Je̩rusale̩m; ma jʼemi ane ewo ugbite̩re̩ ki bie̩ne̩ le̩, ma la fʼaku-wñ ne kpa me̩, ma la fʼe̩re̩ ane̩ e̩re̩ ane̩-wñ ñwo̩che lale me̩.
Onu ki nama fai kakini, Iche̩wñ ku ma fʼewo-i ne, ku ma fʼaku-wñ ne kpa, ma jʼadʼo̩ko̩ are̩ kpai o̩ko̩ ane̩ kpai o̩ko̩ ku ma bu ñwu ma wa n; ukpoji-wñ abie̩ne̩ ñw amonu.
Fai todabu kʼa afʼomu unyi onu na, i la chʼeju-wñ ñw a kʼa li ku ma chi onu ukata n, todule̩ oñ a kpe̩ uche̩ wa arʼonu aino̩-i;

ku ma ki natejane̩ ef o̩takada iko e̩wñ amata-we̩ le̩; abe̩le̩ tak uwe̩ ali ef o̩takada iko e̩wñ le̩ alu kʼewo-i chʼagbite̩re̩, kʼi akpʼe̩wñ amonu bie̩, kpai e̩wñ ojane̩ ojane̩, kʼama la dʼamone̩ utu ku ma la gbʼo̩la-ma tane̩ igbelegbele, e̩wn ki chi ku ma fʼewo-i gwʼalache̩ te̩ le̩ de̩.
A agbʼibenu ñw onu kakini, Ma fʼewo kide̩ ne, ku ma la fʼaku-wñ ne kpa, lu-gbo kide̩ uwe̩ añʼanʼukpe̩ du ejudaba ohimini-i n.

Tak onu mʼohi-wñ du kpuche̩ ru Rehum, agboji amatohio̩la, kpai Shimshai, ako̩takada le̩, kpai abo umana-ma ku ma dodo Samaria, kpai ugbo ki-bo̩ ejudaba ohimini le̩ kakini, I ra ñw me̩ kpoo̩, abe̩le̩, abe̩le̩.
Ma fʼo̩takada ku me̩ du kpuche̩ rʼuwa le̩ kalata jʼane̩ o̩gba-mi pee.
Tak u dʼo̩da te̩, ma fu tejane̩ me̩, oñ ma fu li ka kʼewo le̩ kwane̩ tʼamonu o̩la igbele, kʼugbite̩re̩ kpai utu ku ma gbʼo̩la-ma tane̩ da ewo le̩ akwoubi.
Amonu ki gbiti nʼo̩da Je̩rusale̩m igbele, ma ño̩ nʼo̩da udaba ohimini le̩ chaka, abo kibo̩ la dʼo̩ko̩ are̩, kpʼo̩ko̩ ane̩, kpʼo̩ko̩ ku ma bu ñwu ma ñw amonu le̩.
Me̩ ki dʼo̩da te̩ ku me̩ je̩ ñw abo-i we, kʼama we ekʼunyi ewo kide̩, gbogbo tak u dʼo̩da-wñ te̩.
Me̩ fʼo̩la mu, me̩ ki la bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ef e̩wñ-i n: e̩wñ chi kʼe̩wñ akpabie̩ abe̩i, kʼofu ki bʼamonu?

Tak e̩gba ku ma fʼo̩takada onu Artaze̩rksis ku ma da le̩ kalata o̩gba Rehum, kpai Shimshai ako̩takada, kpʼame̩numana-ma, ma hio̩wane̩ te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m ugbo amaJu, ma nʼukpahiu o̩wo̩-ma je̩ ñwu ma we.
Tak uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ kʼi de̩ Je̩rusale̩m chi; oñ i chi gbogbo wʼo̩do̩ ekeji ki Darius jʼonu Pe̩rsia.
Iko le̩ amakache̩, owñ che Hagai ki chʼakache̩, kpai Ze̩karaya, o̩ma Ido, ama le̩ kache̩ ñw amaju ku ma jo̩ Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m; ma ka lugbo odu O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ki bʼuma ma le̩.
Taku Ze̩rubabe̩l, o̩ma Shealtie̩l, kpai Je̩shua, o̩ma Jozadak, kwane̩ oñ ma chane̩ ekʼunyi O̩jo̩ ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m; amakache̩ O̩jo̩ la manyu ma ate̩ko ma.
Iko le̩ Tatenai, kʼi chʼigo̩bina udaba ohimini le̩ kpai Shetar-bozenai kpʼame̩numana-ma wʼugbo ma, oñ ma ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼo̩da ñwu me̩ ku me̩ kʼunyi-i ku me̩ la fʼaku-i ne kpa?
Tak alu kʼa ka ñwu ma le̩ de̩, kakini, Abu kʼodu aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼef uko̩lo̩ unyi le̩ eko̩ ko̩ de̩.
Eju O̩jo̩-ma la dʼugbo abogijo amaju, oñ abo le̩ ño̩ je̩ ñwu ma we ge̩ n, gbogbo tak o̩la le̩ ki tʼugbo Darius, ku ma dʼohi-wñ tef o̩takada wa ñwu ma.
O̩la o̩takada Tatenai, igo̩bina udaba ohimini le̩, kpai Shetar-bozenai kpai ame̩numana-wñ abo Afarsak ku ma jʼudaba ohimini le̩ ku ma da ku ma dʼu kpuche̩ ru Darius kʼi chʼonu le̩ de̩.
Ma dʼo̩takada kpuche̩ rʼu, o̩takada le̩ kakini, Tugbo Darius, kʼi chʼonu, i ra ñw e̩ kpo̩o̩.
Onu ki ma kakini, Awa nyʼojane̩ Juda, ugbo unyi O̩jo̩ Inaina le̩, ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ anʼokuta lile ako̩; ma mʼigbo̩ oli du tʼef o̩do̩ le̩ me̩; uko̩lo̩-i la ache ma e̩do̩chacha, i la ya o̩wo̩-ma.
Tak a tʼabogijo le̩ ene̩, abu kʼa ka ñwu ma le̩ de̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼo̩da ñwu me̩ ku me̩ kʼunyi-i, ku me̩ la nʼaku-wñ kpa?
A ño̩ tene odu-ma ge̩, kʼa nʼijali-wñ ugbo we̩, kʼa la kʼodu aboke̩le̩ ku ma chʼame̩nuto̩gba-ma.
Abu ku ma la dʼohi ñw a de̩ kakini, Awa chʼamadu O̩jo̩ e-efojale kpai ane̩ ile̩, awa jʼakʼunyi ku ma ko̩ igbelegbele, o̩do̩ ki ma nʼaluka n, owñ chʼe-kʼonu Israe̩l lile ko̩ kʼi la fʼu che kpa.
Ama abu kʼamata-wa nyʼO̩jo̩ e-efojale uwe̩do̩, i mʼuma ko jʼef o̩wo̩ Ne̩biukadne̩za onu Babilo̩n, e̩ne̩ Kaldia le̩, owñ le̩ kpʼunyi-i fo̩ oñ i mʼamone̩ ño̩ nyi Babilo̩n.
Ama ef o̩do̩ ejodudu ku Sairo̩s jʼonu Babilo̩n, Sairo̩s onu le̩, dʼo̩da te̩ ku ma kʼunyi O̩jo̩-i.

Oñ e̩wñ eku o̩jamalia kpai ajifa kʼi jʼef unyi O̩jo̩, e-ku Ne̩biukadne̩za ko kwef unyi ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m iko le̩, kʼi la mʼu ko wa jʼef unyi ode Babilo̩n; Sairo̩s onu mʼe̩wñ eku le ko kwef unyi ode Babilo̩n, oñ ma mʼu ko ñw ene̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ She̩sh-baza, oñ i mʼowñ du je̩ igo̩bina.
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Mʼe̩wñ eku-i ko, kʼe̩ lo kʼe̩ mʼu ko wa jʼef unyi ki de Je̩rusale̩m le̩, tak e̩ je̩ ñwu ma dabi kʼunyi O̩jo̩ e̩gu-wñ.
Tak She̩sh-baza le̩ lewa, oñ i dʼe̩re̩ unyi O̩jo̩ ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m nyane̩. Akwʼiko le̩ gbogbo tʼo̩jolu eñini ma tetʼakʼunyi le̩, ma la che kpa ta n.

Todule̩, iche̩wñ ki nyo̩ onu eju, e̩ naje̩ ñwu ma tejane̩ ef unyi onu ugbo ku ma kʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ jo̩, e-ki de̩ Babilo̩n le̩, kʼe̩ li abe̩k abe̩le̩ i de̩ ka kʼonu Sairo̩s dʼo̩da le̩ te̩ ku ma ko̩ unyi O̩jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m-i? tak onu ki dʼe̩wñ ki nyʼowñ eju ef o̩la-i kpuche̩ ru wa.
Taku Darius, onu le̩, dʼo̩da te̩, oñ ma kwotejane̩ ef unyi o̩takada, ugbo ku ma kʼe̩wñ ome̩me̩le̩-ma jo̩ Babilo̩n.
Oñ ma fʼaño̩ ku ma kʼinabali-wñ nyu li Achime̩ta, ef unyi ojima ki dʼojane̩ Me̩dia, oñ ma fʼabe̩le̩ ko nyu ki chʼe̩wñ ibenu kakini,

O̩do̩ ejodudu ku Sairo̩s je̩ onu, onu Sairo̩s le̩ dʼo̩da te̩ kakini, O̩la unyi O̩jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m de̩, ma ki fʼunyi le̩ ko̩, owñ chʼuña ugbo ku ma kpa e̩wñ e̩bie̩ le̩, ma ki fʼunyane̩-wñ che kpaka; o̩gba unyi le̩ achʼohibo̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta, unabe̩-wñ la achʼohibo̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta,
e̩re̩-wñ anʼo̩gba o̩gba okuta elile me̩ta, tak igbo oli tito̩ ane̩ oji e-le̩; ama ki la kʼo̩ko̩ kwef unyi onu arʼo̩me̩-wñ.

E̩wñ eku o̩jamalia kpai ajifa unyi O̩jo̩ le̩ e-ki Ne̩biukadne̩za ko kwef unyi ojima ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m kʼi la mʼu ko wa Babilo̩n, adabi jʼe̩gu-wñ; ma ako dabi wa unyi ojima ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m, okoke-wñ adabi tʼe̩gu-wñ; oñ uwe̩ akʼo wʼef unyi O̩jo̩.
Todule̩ fai, uwe̩, Tatenai, kʼe̩ che igo̩bina udaba ohimini le̩, ti She̩tar-bozenai, kpʼame̩numana-me̩ abo Afarsak le̩, ku ma jʼudaba ohimini, me̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ tʼo̩najiji;
mʼo̩wo̩-me̩ ta bʼuko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ le̩ te̩; me̩ je̩ ñw igo̩bina amaJu kpai abogijo amaju le̩ ku ma kʼunyi O̩jo̩ e̩gu-wñ.

Noji e-le̩ ge̩, nadʼo̩da te̩ ugbo e̩wñ ku me̩ ache ñw abogijo amaju le̩ tod uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ le̩ eko̩, kakini, Me̩ hika chi kwef e̩wñ ane̩ onu, owñ chʼe̩wñ are̩ ku ma rʼo̩ udaba ohimini le̩, ku me̩ ko ñw aboke̩le̩-i alu ku ma kpʼo̩ko̩ bie̩ kade, kʼe̩wñ du ki da ma hi n.

Kpai e̩wñ du kʼeku-wñ aku ma, tʼamo̩ma o̩kokuno̩ kpʼamokolo kpʼamo̩mala, tod e̩wñ e̩gujo ku ma du wa ñw O̩jo̩ e-efojale; Oka wit ge, kpʼomu, kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma, kpʼekpo teju alu kʼamatama ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m aka; je̩ ñwu ma ko ñwu ma o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa, i ki nʼechi n;
kʼama ki kpa e̩wñ e̩bie̩ ki akpo e̩rinyo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ e-efojale, kʼame̩ ki chadua tod oji onu, kpai amo̩ma-wñ.
Omi ño̩ dʼo̩da te̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki rʼo̩la-i da, ma ki mʼigbo oliʼka chi kwʼunyi-wñ, ku ma la dʼe̩ne̩ le̩ nyʼo̩kpa oji-wñ; unyi-wñ ki mud ojeta todu e̩wñ kʼi che le̩.

O̩jo̩ ki je̩ ñw odu-wñ gugu o̩mo̩, kʼi nafʼamonu kpʼamone̩ du ku ma fʼo̩wo̩ nadala ku ma rʼo̩ ida ke̩che̩ nʼane̩, (owñ chʼerida ku ma li uña) ku ma gwʼunyi O̩jo̩ ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m le̩ lo̩. Omi, Darius, mʼo̩da du te̩ me̩; eche-wñ ki nachʼe̩do̩chacha.
Taku Tatenai, igo̩bina udaba ohimini le̩, kpai Shetar-bozenai, kpʼame̩numana-ma, nʼe̩do̩chacha ache alu le̩, ukpe̩ kʼonu Darius kpʼuche̩ le̩ rʼuma.

Oñ abogijo amaJu nʼo̩do̩ le̩ ane̩ waa, oñ i nara ñwu ma, lugbo ache̩ ki Hagai akache̩, kpai Ze̩karaya o̩ma Ido le̩ ka. Ma la fʼu ne kpoji teju alu kʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ñwate̩, kpʼalu ki Sairo̩s kpai Darius kpai Artaze̩rksis onu Pe̩rsia dʼo̩da-wñ te̩.
Ma fʼuko̩lo̩ unyi le̩ che kpa o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta ochu Adar, owñ chʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩fa ki Darius jʼonu.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l, owñ chʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai kpʼamo̩ma-ma kibo̩ ku ma jʼef amu le̩, abo le̩ fʼo̩jo̩ ku ma bi unyi O̩jo̩ de kpai uyo̩.

E̩wñ ku ma la ko wa e̩gba ku ma bi unyi O̩jo̩ le̩ de̩: amo̩kokuno̩ chʼogume̩lu, amokolo chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, amo̩mala chʼulo̩ko̩; oñ e̩wñ adure eko wa tod abo Israe̩l chaka chʼamobuko̩ me̩gweji alu kʼaluka o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo Israe̩l de̩.
Taku ma kʼamatama jo̩ uche̩ uche̩-ma, abo Lifai la jo̩ ukpe̩ ukpe̩ e-ma todu e̩wñ eche ñw O̩jo̩, e-kʼi de̩ Je̩rusale̩m; owñ chʼalu ku ma ko̩ ef o̩takada Mose̩s le̩.
Tak amo̩ma ku ma kwef amu le̩ fʼElaloji de o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu ejodudu

Todu amatama kpʼabo Lifai fʼo̩la-ma che ki fe̩ alukate; o̩gbo-ma du che-fe̩: oñ ma fʼElaloji le̩ kpa tod amo̩ma ku ma kwef amu le̩ chaka, kpai tod amo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼamatama kpʼutod oji e-ma onugo ge̩.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l ku ma dabi kwef amu le̩ wa, kpʼabo ku ma fʼo̩la-ma date̩ ñwu ma kwef iwa abo uche̩ichi ane̩ le̩, ku ma tene Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, abo le̩ je̩.

Oñ ma fʼuje̩wñ kʼo̩jo̩wu ma dʼo̩ n de kpai uyo̩ o̩jo̩ mebie; todu Jihofa mʼuyo̩ du ñwu ma me̩; i laño̩ mʼe̩do̩ onu Asiria rida te̩ ma, kʼi dʼukpahiu ñw o̩wo̩-ma ef uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l.
Abu kʼe̩wñ le̩ chekpa ef o̩kpanachi Artaze̩rksis onu Pe̩rsia, E̩zra o̩ma Se̩raya, kʼi chʼo̩ma Azaraya, kʼi chʼo̩ma Hilkaya,
o̩ma Shalum, o̩ma Zedo̩k, o̩ma Ahitub,
o̩ma Amaraya, o̩ma Azaraya, o̩ma Me̩rayo̩t,
o̩ma Ze̩rahaya, o̩ma Uzi, o̩ma Buki,
o̩ma Abishua, o̩ma Finehas, o̩ma E̩leaza, o̩ma Aro̩n agboji amatama;

E̩zra kide̩ kwo Babilo̩n te̩gu alo; owñ chʼako̩takada kʼi chʼo̩ka e̩wñ uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s, ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ko wa le̩; e̩wñ du kʼi la bi onu muko ñw u, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ, dʼo̩wo̩ nʼo oji.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l iche̩ka kpʼamatama iche̩ka kpʼabo Lifai iche̩ka kpʼamukeli iche̩ka kpʼamadalo̩na iche̩ka kpʼabo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ iche̩ka, nyi Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ e̩kebie kʼArtaze̩rksis jʼonu.
Oñ E̩zra lewa Je̩rusale̩m ochu e̩ke̩lu, owñ chʼo̩do̩ e̩kebie e-onu le̩.
Todu o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu ejodudu oñ i chane̩ emo̩la akwo Babilo̩n alo; oñ o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu e̩ke̩lu i lewa Je̩rusale̩m, alu kʼO̩jo̩ dʼo̩wo̩ e̩nyo̩ nʼo oji.
Todu E̩zra mʼe̩do̩-wñ dute̩ etene uko̩-o̩la Jihofa, kʼi la che, kʼi ño̩ ko̩ ma e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ ojane̩ Israe̩l.
Oñ alu ku ma da nyʼo̩takada ku Artaze̩rksis du ñw E̩zra, kʼi chʼatama kpai ako̩takada le̩ de̩: owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ako̩takada uko̩ ki Jihofa te̩, kpai o̩la e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ ñw abo Israe̩l.
Artaze̩rksis, onu amonu du, tʼugbo E̩zra atama le̩, kʼi chʼako̩takada o̩lo̩da O̩jo̩ e-efojale, i ra ñw e̩ kpo̩o̩, kpʼe-ki bo̩.
O̩da nadute̩-i kakini, E̩ne̩ ki dʼef abo Israe̩l kpʼamatama e-ma kpʼabo Lifai ojane̩-mi, kʼi dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma nyi Je̩rusale̩m, abo le̩ ki lebʼuwe̩.
Ukpe̩ kʼonu kpai abo̩hiala-wñ me-bie kpʼuwe̩ uche̩ kʼe̩ te̩jane̩ alu kʼe̩wñ du de̩ Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m, alu kʼo̩lo̩-da O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼi dʼef o̩wo̩-we̩ le̩ ka,
kʼe̩ la nʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia kʼonu kpʼabohiala-wñ gʼe̩do̩la-ma ko wa ñw O̩jo̩ Israe̩l kʼo̩do-wñ de̩ Je̩rusale̩m
kpai ajifa kpʼo̩jamalia du kʼuwe̩ ali ojane̩ Babilo̩n, manyʼe-kʼamone̩ kpai amatama gʼe̩do̩la-ma ako wa todu unyi O̩jo̩-ma ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m;

todule̩ uwe̩ anʼe̩do̩chacha anʼo̩ko̩ le̩ la amo̩kokuno̩, kpai amokolo, kpai amo̩mala, manyʼe̩wñ ele e-omu, kpʼe̩wñ ele e-omi, kʼe̩ ko nyʼache oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ki dʼunyi O̩jo̩-me̩ ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m le̩.
E-du ki chenyo̩ eju-we̩ kpai amo̩maye-we̩ ku me̩ nʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia ki bo̩ che, ame̩ ki chʼe-le̩ alu ki dʼO̩jo̩-me̩ e̩do̩.
Oñ e̩wñ eku ku ma ako ñw e̩ todu e̩wñ ucholo unyi O̩jo̩-we̩ le̩, e-le̩ e̩ nakowa jo̩ o̩gba O̩jo̩ e-Je̩rusale̩m.
E̩wñ du ki bo̩ kʼeku-wñ aku todu unyi O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼi dʼugbo kʼe̩ ko ñwu ma, mak e̩ dʼu kwef unyi e̩wñ akoko onu le̩.

Tak, omi Artaze̩rksis, kʼu chʼonu-i, omi adʼo̩da ñw amadigede du ku ma jʼudaba ohimini le̩ kakini, E̩wñ du kʼE̩zra atama, kʼi chʼako̩takada e̩wñ o̩lo̩da O̩jo̩ e-efojale, atene ugbo me̩, me̩ ki che kpʼe̩do̩chacha,
gbogbo kad ajifa talent ogume̩lu, kpai e̩ñwa o̩ka wit ogume̩lu, gbogbo kad otube̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma o̩gwo̩ko̩, kpai otube̩ ekpo o̩gwo̩ko̩, omu ki nʼaluka n.
E̩wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ e-efojale ñwate̩, me̩ ki che tʼeju-wñ kpakpa tod unyi O̩jo̩ e-efojale; tod e̩wñ chi kʼeju ekparʼojane̩ onu kpai amo̩ma-wñ ade̩ ke?

A ño̩ je̩ ñwu me̩ ma kakini, I che e-amatama, kpʼabo Lifai kpʼamukeli kpʼamadalo̩na kpʼabo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩, abe̩k e̩ne̩ du ki ache e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩ kide̩, o̩da aje̩ ku ma gba e̩wñ are̩ kpʼokane̩ o̩wo̩-ma n, i la nʼo̩ko̩ ebu ñwu ma n.

I chʼuwe̩ Ezra, mak ibe O̩jo̩-we̩ ki dʼo̩wo̩-we̩ le̩ oñ e̩ lebʼo̩, kʼe̩ namʼamakajo̩ kpai amuluo̩la chi jo̩ ku ma kajo̩ amone̩ du ku ma jʼudaba ohimini le̩, owñ chʼabo du ku ma mʼoli o̩lo̩da O̩jo̩-we̩, oñ e̩ne̩ ki ma ma n, me̩ kʼo̩.

Oñ e̩ne̩ du ki ma che alu kʼo̩lo̩da O̩jo̩-we̩, kpʼalu kʼo̩lo̩da onu ka n, me̩ hika chʼe̩ne̩ le̩ teju alu kʼoji ajo̩ ka, dagba i chʼekpa, dagba i chʼene̩ bʼane̩ te̩, dagba i chʼane̩-wñ eño̩, dagba i che edu tʼunyidudu.
Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-wa kʼi nʼele, owñ ki dʼe̩wñ abe̩i tef e̩do̩ onu, kʼi cho̩ñwe̩ nyʼunyi Jihofa ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m;

kʼi ño̩ fʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ fa gbogbo wʼugbo mi o̩gba onu kpʼabo̩hiala-wñ kpai amagboji onu ku ma gbiti chaka. Oñ ukpahiu-mi nyo̩gba alu kʼo̩wo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-mi, nʼumi oji, tak u chi abo ku ma dʼoji dufu kwef abo Israe̩l ku ma te̩gu lebʼumi nyʼo̩mo̩.
Abo-i la chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu unyi unyi-ma, o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo ku ma kwo Babilo̩n te̩gu lebʼumi ef o̩kpanachi onu Artaze̩rksis la jo̩-i:
ef amo̩ma Finehas, Ge̩rshom le. Ef amo̩ma Itamar, Danie̩l, ef amo̩ma Defid, Hatush,
ef amo̩ma She̩kanaya, ef amo̩ma Paro̩sh, Ze̩karaya; oñ abo ku ma le bʼo̩ ku ma lo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma che aboke̩le̩ oli me̩ta.
Ef amo̩ma Pahut-moab, E̩liehoenai o̩ma Ze̩rahaya le; oñ aboke̩le̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ ño̩ lebʼo̩.
Ef amo̩ma She̩kanaya, o̩ma Jaha-zie̩l; aboke̩le̩ oli me̩fa la lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Edin, Ebe̩d, o̩ma Jo̩natan; oñ aboke̩le̩ ooje lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Elam, Je̩shaya, o̩ma Atalaya; oñ aboke̩le̩ e̩te̩gwa lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Shefatia, Ze̩badaya, o̩ma Maike̩l; aboke̩le̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ lebʼo̩.
Ef amo̩ma Joab, O̩badaya, o̩ma Je̩hie̩l; aboke̩le̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyoke me̩gwe̩jo̩ la lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma She̩lomit, o̩ma Jo̩se̩-faya; aboke̩le̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩jo̩ la lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Bebai, Ze̩karaya, o̩ma Bebai; aboke̩le̩ ogu nyoke me̩jo̩ lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Azgad, Johanan, o̩ma Hakatan; aboke̩le̩ ogu me̩lu nyoke me̩gwa lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Adonikam otitala, odu-ma jo̩-i: Elife̩le̩t kpai Jeue̩l kpai Shamaya; aboke̩le̩ o̩gbo me̩ta lebʼuma.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Bigfai, Utai kpai Zabud; aboke̩le̩ e̩te̩gwa la lebʼuma.
Tak u ko ma jʼugboʼkate o̩la aji ki acha nyʼAhafa; o̩mo̩ a la ru jo̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta. Tak u fʼamone̩ le̩ ma kpai amatama, oñ u li ka kʼo̩ma Lifai du dʼef uma n.

Tak u kpʼone̩ ado̩ E̩lieza kpai Arie̩l kpai She̩maya kpai E̩lnetan kpai Jarib kpai E̩lnetan kpai Netan kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Me̩shulam, abo ku ma dʼoji dufu; kpai Jo̩yarib, kpai E̩lnetan ge̩, ku ma chʼabo ku ma ma ojie̩wñ.

Tak u fʼuma kpe̩ nyʼugbo Ido kʼi dʼoji dufu ugboʼka ku ma do̩ ko̩ Kasifia; tak u ka ñwu ma alu ku ama aka ñw Ido kpai amo̩maye-wñ ku ma chʼabo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩, ugbo ku ma do̩ ko̩ Kasifia le̩, kʼama ki ko abo ku ma che e̩wñ wa, tod unyi O̩jo̩-wa.
Oñ alu kʼo̩wo̩ e̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩-wa nʼuwa oji ma dʼe̩ne̩ʼka ki nʼibe ef uma ñw a ef amo̩ma Mali, o̩ma Lifai, o̩ma Israe̩l; kpai She̩re̩baya manyʼamo̩ma-wñ kpai amo̩maye-wñ, one̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩;
kpai Ha-shabia, oñ Je̩shaya ef amo̩ma Me̩rari, kpai amo̩maye-wñ kpai amo̩ma-ma manyʼu, one̩ ogu;
oñ ef abo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩, e-ki Defid kpai amagboji kowa ku ma che e̩wñ ñw abo Lifai, ma chʼabo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩: ma fʼodu e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma do̩ chaka.
Tak u fʼakoya alu eji ta o̩la aji Ahafa le̩, kʼawa ki hio̩la-wa wane̩ o̩gba O̩jo̩-wa, todu kʼawa ki tʼe ene o̩na kpoolo todu wa kpai amegini-wa, kpai e̩wñ-wa du kʼa ne̩.

Todu anyo̩ je̩ ñwu mi tʼonu ene kʼi kʼuche̩ amisoja kpai amananya wa ku ma te̩ko wa ugbo ame̩nebi-wa ej o̩na n, todabu kʼa ka ñw onu kakini, O̩wo̩ e̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩-wa anʼoji abo du ku ma tene owñ; ukpahiu-wñ kpai uwe̩do̩-wñ muda dʼoji abo du ku ma hiʼu tinyo̩.
Abe̩le̩ a kwojalu, oñ a gbo̩ko̩bʼO̩jo̩-wa todu e̩wñ-i; i la mʼomu-wa gbagbo̩.
Tak u mʼagboji amatama me̩gwe-ji chi jʼane̩, owñ che She̩re̩baya kpai Hashabaya kpʼamo̩maye-ma me̩ gwa manyu ma.

Oñ u fʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia kpai e̩wrñ eku le̩ ñwa nyʼuma o̩wo̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ ku ma ko ne ate̩ tod unyi O̩jo̩-wa, owñ che e-kʼonu kpʼabo̩hiala-wñ, kpʼamagboji-wñ, kpʼabo Israe̩l du kʼeju-ma dʼane̩ o̩mo̩ muko wa le̩.
U fʼajifa tale̩nt oli me̩gwe̩ta, kpʼe̩wñ eku ku ma nʼajifa che alu tale̩nt ogume̩-lu ñwa nyʼuma o̩wo̩; e-o̩jamalia che tale̩nt o̩gume̩lu.
Ugba o̩jamalia ogu alu darik icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩; kpʼe̩wñ eku meji ku ma ne̩ ebije ekpikpa kʼi ade̩ ñaña, kʼaja-wñ kpuna dab o̩jamalia, che.
Tak u ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ afo̩ ñwu Jihofa, e̩wñ eku le̩ du ñʼafo̩ ge̩; ajifa kpai o̩jamalia le̩ la che e̩wñ ku ma gʼe̩do̩la-ma kowa ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-amata-me̩.
Me̩ fʼu de̩, me̩ la dejutʼo̩, gbogbo wʼe̩gba ku ma fʼu ñwa eju amagboji amatama kpai abo Lifai kpai amagboji amo̩ra abo Israe̩l Je̩rusale̩m, ef e̩ko̩da unyi unyi ejefu unyi Jihofa.
Abe̩le̩ amatama kpai abo Lifai mʼadu ajifa kpʼo̩jamalia kpʼe̩wñ eku le̩ gba, ku ma ko wa jʼef unyi O̩jo̩-wa Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak a kwo bʼo̩la ohimini Ahafa te̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gweji ochu ejodudu kʼa nyi Je̩rusale̩m; o̩wo̩ O̩jo̩-wa la dʼoji-wa, oñ i mʼuwa gba bʼo̩wo̩ ame̩nebi kpʼabo ku ma kpala jo̩ ej o̩na le̩ te̩.
Tak a lewa Je̩rusale̩m, oñ a je̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta o̩mo̩.

Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩le̩-wñ ma fʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia kpʼe̩wñ eku le̩ ñwa o̩j e̩bo̩ ef unyi O̩jo̩-wa, (ma mʼu ko) nyu Me̩re̩-mo̩t, kʼi chʼo̩ma Uraya atama le̩, o̩wo̩; E̩le̩aza, o̩ma Finehas, la dʼugbo-wñ; Jozabad, o̩ma Je̩shua, kpai Noadaya o̩ma Binui, abo Lifai, la manyʼuma.
O̩gbo̩-wñ du chʼenaluka kpai alu kʼuwoji-wñ de̩; ma fʼuwoji-wñ chaka ko̩ iko le̩.

Amo̩ma abo ku ma mu, ku ma kwʼugbo ku ma mu ma nyi wa le̩, ma ko e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa che O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, amo̩kokuno̩ tod abo Israe̩l chaka chʼe̩gweji, amokolo chʼo̩gbo me̩le̩ nyoke me̩gwe̩fa, amo̩ma la chʼe̩te̩gwa nyoke mebie, amobuko̩ tod iche̩bo̩ adure chʼe̩gweji; e̩wñ-i du chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñwu Jihofa.
Ma ño̩ mʼo̩da, o̩da kʼonu ko̩ ko ñw amisatrap onu kpʼamigo̩bina udaba ohimini le̩; oñ abo le̩ kwote̩ko amone̩ le̩ kpai unyi O̩jo̩ ge̩.

Oñ e̩gba kʼe̩wñ le̩ fʼoji ne̩, tak amagboji te̩me̩ru mi, ma kakini, Abo Israe̩l, kpai amatama kpai abo Lifai la fʼo̩la-ma daru bʼamone̩ ane̩ ane̩-i te̩ ta n, ma jʼache teju e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma, owñ chʼe-abo Kenan kpʼabo He̩t kpʼabo Pe̩re̩z kpʼabo Je̩bius kpʼabo Amo̩n kpʼabo Moab, kpʼabo Ijipti, kpʼabo Amo̩r.

Todu ma mʼamo̩ma-ma onobule̩ ko ñw o̩la-ma kpʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩. Abe̩le̩ ugbe̩ ki afo̩-i fʼo̩la-ma gwe̩gwanyʼamone̩ ojane̩ ojane̩-i; ochochi, o̩wo̩ amagboji, kpʼabo ku ma ro̩no ma tʼo̩gba ef ada ku ma je̩-i.
Tak e̩gba kʼu gbʼe̩wñ-i, u fʼe̩wñ o̩la-mi kpai otogbo-mi fana, tak u chane̩ echi iloji-mi kpai ilagba-mi rinyo̩, ugoju-wñ la mʼumi da, oñ u kwogugu ane̩.
Tak abo du kʼo̩la-ma aga tod o̩la kʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ka tod ejʼada kʼabo ku ma mu lelo le̩ jʼada kʼo̩la-ma jeju wʼugbo mi; oñ ugoju mʼumi da gugu ane̩ gbogbo wʼiko ku ma kʼe̩wñ ele ane̩ wa.
Tak iko e̩gba ku ma kʼe̩wñ ele ane̩ wa u kwane̩ kpʼe̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩-mi, e̩wñ o̩la-mi kpai otogbo-mi che̩fana ta; tak u mʼokuku-mi konyʼane̩, oñ u fʼo̩wo̩-mi nadala jo̩ ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-mi;
oñ u kakini, O O̩jo̩-mi, anyo̩ fumi mu, anyo̩ je̩ ñwu mi chi eju-mi ago uwe̩ n, O̩jo-mi, todu agboni-wa wobi lʼuwa oji me̩, abi kʼa je̩ gba gbogbo kad efojale.

Akwʼe̩gba amata-wa a te̩te̩dʼef abi inai-na eje̩ gbogbo tʼojolu eñini; todu agbo̩-ni-wa le̩ oñ ma mʼawa kpai amonu-wa kpai amatama-wa ko nyʼamonu ojane̩ ojane̩ o̩wo̩, ma mʼawa ko ñw o̩kwo̩cha-geli kpʼamu, kpʼinya eda, kpʼeju etunyʼane̩, alu ki ño̩ de̩ eñini-i ge̩.
Faʼ Jihofa, O̩jo-wa, dʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ña wa iko re-i, kʼi tʼe̩bobo-wa no̩ kʼa fʼuma o̩wo̩, kʼi mʼaleʼka du ñw a ef uña-wñ kiafo, kʼO̩jo̩-wa ki mʼuwa eju ne̩, kʼi la je̩ ñw a ruko re ef uko̩lo̩ adu-wa.

Todu amadu a che; O̩jo̩-wa muda tʼuwa no̩ tinyo̩ ef adu-wa n, i la mʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ du nadala te̩ ñw a eju amonu Persia, kʼi je̩ ñw a ruko, kʼa dʼunyi O̩jo-wa dago, kʼa fʼalache̩-wñ ñwo̩che, kʼi dʼaku ñw a efu Juda kpai efu Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ fa-i, O O̩jo̩-wa, ab a ñʼaka ubi e-i ge̩? Todu a tʼuko̩ kʼe̩ te̩ no̩ tinyo̩,

owñ chʼe-kʼe̩ ñwate̩ lʼo̩wo̩ amadu-we̩, amakache̩, kakini, Ane̩ ugbo ku me̩ anyi ku me̩ ne̩ le̩, chʼane̩ ki chʼe̩daji lugbo e̩daji e-amone̩ ojane̩ ojane̩ le̩, lugbo e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma, e-ku ma je̩ ñw iwa-ma ko̩ ñw u akwʼoji-wñ otitala o̩woʼka tʼoji-wñ otitala o̩wo̩ e̩ke-ji.

Todule̩ fa-i, ame̩ ki kʼamo̩ma-me̩ onobule̩ ñw amo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, me̩ ki la kʼamo̩ma-ma onobule̩ ñw amo̩ma-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, me̩ ki tene ure̩do̩-ma n, me̩ ki la tene kʼe̩wñ ki ra ñwu ma ogbegbele̩ n; kʼame̩ ki gbiti ku me̩ jʼe̩nyo̩ ane̩ le̩, kʼi mud e̩wñ ogu amo̩ma-me̩ ogbegbele̩.
Anubi e̩wñ du ki wa bʼuwa ma todu e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ kʼa che, kpʼabi inaina kʼa je̩, abu kʼuwe̩, O̩jo̩-wa, fʼudu ki nyaru alu kʼagboni-wa de̩ bu ñw a, kʼe̩ laño̩ mʼabubo̩ amone̩ ko ñw a,

a ñʼadabi akpo̩la uko̩-we̩ bie̩ kʼawa kpʼabo ku ma chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ kʼa ne̩ o̩la-wa? I dʼabe̩i uwe̩ ma we̩do̩ rʼuwa gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼe̩ fʼuwa lie̩ kʼabubo̩ amone̩ ki ño̩ de̩ ge̩ n, kʼe̩ne̩ du ki fu tane̩ n?

O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ o̩kpakpa; todu awa chʼabubo̩ amone̩ ki bo̩ kʼa fʼo̩wo̩ tane̩, alu ki de̩ eñini-i, go, ef abi-wa oñ a ajo̩ o̩gba we̩-i; todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki neke dago o̩gba-we̩ tod e̩wñ-i n.

Oñ abu kʼE̩zra do̩mo̩ achadua, kʼi nagbalu, kʼi nʼaku aro̩, kpai o̩la-wñ efiʼane̩ o̩gba unyi O̩jo̩, ujeju aboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩ kpai abimo̩to̩ inaina kwʼef abo Israe̩l wa jeju ugbo-wñ; todu amone̩ le̩ araku anyʼanyi.

Taku She̩kanaya, o̩ma Je̩hie̩l, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Elam dohi, oñ i ka ñw E̩zra kakini, A fʼada O̩jo̩-wa je̩, a la nʼabobule̩ ononojo kwef amo̩ma ane̩-i chʼo̩ya: ukibeno todu abo Israe̩l tod e̩wñ-i muda do̩mo̩ ta.

Todule̩ a ki kpilo kpai O̩jo̩-wa ta, kʼa kʼamo̩ya le̩ jʼane̩ kpai amo̩ma-ma du ku ma bi ñw a, teju alu kʼalu odu-mi kpai abo kʼo̩la-ma aga todu uko̩ O̩jo̩-wa adʼibe ñw a; a ki che teju alu kʼuko̩-o̩la ka.
Kwane̩; todu o̩la-we̩ de̩, a la jo̩ ugbo we̩; fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, kʼe̩ che ke.
Tak E̩zra kwane̩, oñ i je̩ ñw amagboji amatama, kpai abo Lifai, kpai abo Israe̩l chaka go̩ ka kʼama ache teju o̩la le̩. Abe̩le̩ ma fu go̩.
Tak E̩zra kwane̩ kwʼo̩gba unyi O̩jo̩, oñ i le tʼef unyi Jehohana, o̩ma E̩liashib, ejefu; oñ i lewa o̩mo̩ i je̩ e̩wñ du n, i la ñmʼomi n; todu i nadaido̩ todu ada kʼabo ku ma kwef amu le̩ je̩.
Taku ma fʼakoya ta ugbo du ane̩ Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m ñw amo̩ma ame̩namu le̩, kʼama ki kʼo̩la-ma wa jeju Je̩rusale̩m;
ka kʼe̩ne̩ du ki ma wa tak o̩jo̩ me̩ta ki jo̩ n, mak alu kʼamagboji kpai abogijo lo te̩ kakini, Ma akʼane̩-wñ du jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩, ma la adʼowñ onugo ru bʼujeju abo ku ma kwef amu le̩ te̩.

Tak aboke̩le̩ Juda kpai Be̩njamin chaka kʼo̩la-ma wa jeju Je̩rusale̩m tak o̩jo̩ me̩ta le̩ jo̩, ochu e̩ke̩la, o̩jo̩ ogu ochu le̩ i che. Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka guguane̩ jo̩ ojukpologu o̩gba unyi O̩jo̩, o̩la-ma naga tod o̩la-i kpai tod omi ki alo̩ akiliwo.
Tak E̩zra, atama le̩, kwane̩ dago, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ f ʼada je̩, me̩ la kʼabobule̩ ononojo chʼo̩ya, ku me̩ che kʼabi kʼabo Israe̩l je̩ ki nyo̩gba.
Todule̩ me̩ ki gbalu ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩ amata-me̩, ku me̩ che e̩wñ ki rʼe̩ e̩do̩; me̩ ki la fʼo̩la-me̩ daru bʼamone̩ ane̩-i kpai abobule̩ ononojo te̩.
Tak abo ujeju le̩ chaka dʼomu dago nana dohi, oñ ma kakini, Abe̩le̩ i de̩; i dukpe̩ kʼa che alu kʼe̩ ka le̩.
Amone̩-i muda chewewe, iko-i la chʼiko kʼomi alo̩ nana, a la neke jʼo̩do̩da n; uko̩lo̩-i la chʼuko̩lo̩ o̩jo̩ʼka abe̩k o̩jo̩ meji n; todu a muna bʼo̩ te̩ ef o̩la-i tabale.

Me̩ ki chi amagboji wa koji abo ujeju-i chaka, tak abo du ku ma nʼabobule̩ ononojo chʼo̩ya ef ewo ewo-wa-i, ku ma nawa iko iko ku ma date̩; abogijo ewo ewo du kpai amaka-jo̩ ki nawa kpai ama, gbogbo tak uwe̩do̩ O̩jo̩-wa inaina-i ki rida bʼuwa oji te̩, gbogbo taku ma fʼo̩la o̩ya i che kpa chaka.
Chai Jo̩natan, o̩ma Asahe̩l, kpai Jazeya, o̩ma Tikfa, kate kwane̩ dago, ma ko̩. Oñ Me̩shulam kpai Shabe̩tai (e̩ne̩ Lifai) amanyʼu-ma.

Tak ame̩namu ku ma kwef amu le̩ fʼabe̩le̩ che. Oñ ma fʼE̩zra, atama le̩, kpai abo ku ma dʼoji dufu iche̩ka, alu kʼunyi unyi amata-ma de̩, kpe̩ru bʼabo kibo̩ te̩, ma la fʼodu-ma do̩ okoke; taku ma kwogugu ane̩ o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu e̩ke̩gwa le̩, ku ma ñwa o̩la le̩.
Oñ ma fʼo̩la aboke̩le̩ ku ma nʼamo̩ya ononojo ka kpa tak o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu ejodudu jo̩.
Oñ ma fʼamo̩ma amatama iche̩ka ku ma nʼabobule̩ ononojo chʼo̩ya li: e-amo̩ma Je̩shua ki chʼo̩ma Jo̩zadak, kpai amo̩maye-wñ che, Maaseya kpʼE̩lieza kpai Jarib kpai Ge̩dalaya.
Tak abo le̩ dʼo̩wo̩-ma tʼo̩ kakini, Ama atʼo̩ya-ma le̩ no̩ tane̩; oñ abu ku ma fʼabi le̩ je̩, ma nʼokolo kwef ame̩wño̩re̩-ma egini wa tod abu ku ma fʼabi je̩.
Amo̩ma Ime̩r che Hanani kpai Ze̩badaya.
Oñ amo̩ma Harim ku ma ne̩ che Maaseya kpʼE̩laija kpai She̩maya kpai Je̩hie̩l kpai Uzaya.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Pashur, E̩lionai kpai Maaseya kpʼIshmae̩l kpai Ne̩tane̩l kpai Jozabad kpai E̩lasa ne̩.
Oñ ef abo Lifai, Jozabad kpai Shimeai kpai Ke̩laya (owñ le̩ che Ketita) kpai Pe̩tahiya kpai Juda kpai E̩lieza ne̩.
Oñ ef amukeli E̩laiashib ne̩. Oñ ef amadalo̩na Shalum kpai Te̩le̩m kpʼUri ne̩.
Oñ ef abo Israe̩l; ef amo̩ma Pero̩sh, Ramaya kpʼIzaya kpai Malkija kpai Mijamin kpai E̩lieza kpai Malkija kpai Be̩naya ne̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Elam, Matanaya kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Je̩hie̩l kpʼAbdi kpai Je̩re̩mo̩t kpʼE̩laija ne̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Zatu, E̩lioenai kpʼE̩liashib kpai Matanaya kpai Je̩re̩mo̩t kpai Zabad kpai Aziza ne̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Bebai, Jehohanan kpai Hananaya kpai Zabai kpʼAtlai ne.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Bani, Me̩shulam kpai Maluk kpʼAdaya kpai Jashub kpai Shial kpai Je̩re̩mo̩t ne̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Pahat-moab, Adna kpai Chelal kpai Be̩naya kpai Maaseya kpai Matanaya kpai Be̩zale̩l kpai Binui kpai Manasa ne̩.
Amo̩ma Harim, ku ma ne̩ la che, E̩lieza kpʼIsshi-ja kpai Malkija kpai Shemaya kpai Shime̩o̩n,
kpai Be̩njamin kpai Maluk kpai She̩maraya.
Ef amo̩ma Hashum, Matenai kpai Matata kpai Zabad kpai E̩life̩le̩t kpai Je̩re̩meai kpai Manasa kpai Shimeai ne̩.
Ef amo̩ma Bani, Maadeai kpʼAmram kpʼUe̩l
kpai Be̩naya kpai Be̩de̩ya kpai Che̩luhi,
kpai Fana-ya kpai Me̩re̩mo̩t kpʼE̩laiashib,
kpai Matanaya kpai Matenai kpai Jaasu,
kpai Bani kpai Biniu-ai kpai Shimeai,
kpai She̩le̩maya kpai Natan kpai Adaya,
Makna-debai kpai Shashai kpai Sharal,
kpʼAzare̩l kpai She̩le̩maya kpai She̩maraya,
kpai Shalum kpʼAmaraya kpai Jose̩f.
Ef amo̩ma Nebo, Jeie̩l kpai Matataya kpai Zabad kpai Zebina kpʼIddo kpai Jo̩e̩l kpai Be̩naya.
Abo-i chaka fʼabobule̩ ononojo ne̩ chʼo̩ya; o̩ya iche̩ka la bi amo̩ma ñwu ma.
O̩la Nihe̩maya o̩ma Hakalaya le̩ de̩.
Hanani, o̩maye-miʼka, lewa, owñ kpai aboke̩le̩ Juda iche̩ka; tak u tʼuma ene o̩la amaJu ku ma mufu tane̩, owñ chʼame̩namu ki bo̩ le̩, kpai o̩la Je̩rusale̩m.
Taku ma ka ñwu mi kakini, Abubo̩ amone̩ ku ma bo̩ kwef amu ku ma jʼojane̩ le̩ ali o̩bata nana kpai ina; aku Je̩rusale̩m mugulo̩ wane̩, ma la fʼalaku-wñ gujo rinyo̩.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼu gbʼo̩la le̩, u kwogugu ane̩ araku, tak u nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ pe̩ adaido̩; tak u fʼaluji achadua o̩gba O̩jo̩ e-efojale.
Oñ u kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩ O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-efojale, kʼe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ inaina kʼi abailo kʼi la ade alo kpai ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ugbo abo ku ma fe̩do̩ owñ, ku ma la de uko̩ kʼi ate̩;

nʼeti, kʼe̩ mʼeju-we̩ chi, kʼuwe̩ ki netiru adua adu-we̩-i e-kʼu nache o̩gba-we̩ odu kpai o̩ro̩ka iko-i tod amo̩ma Israe̩l, amadu-we̩, abu kʼu do̩mo̩ agbalu adure amo̩ma Israe̩l, owñ chʼe-kʼa dʼe̩ re le̩. Ochochi, omi kpai abo unyi ata-mi dʼe̩ re me̩.
A fʼakpabie̩-we̩ che nana tabale, a la de uko̩ kʼe̩ te̩ abe̩k uhio̩me̩, uhio̩me̩, abe̩k o̩la oji ajo̩ e-kʼuwe̩ ñwa ñw adu-we̩ Mose̩s le̩ n.
Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ nadibekado o̩la kʼe̩ ñwa ñw adu-we̩ Mose̩s le̩, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ fʼada-mi je̩, nafʼume̩ fiatuka rʼef amone̩ ojoji ojoji;

ama me̩ mudabi wʼugbo mi ku me̩ fʼuko̩ uko̩-mi de ku me̩ che, dagba i nʼabo̩ iche̩ka ef ume̩ ku ma ko̩ rikpolo jʼukpoji efojale otitala, naya ma kwʼo̩mo̩ wa jo̩ tak u nako ma wa jʼuña kʼu du kʼu dʼodu-mi tʼo̩mo̩.
Abo-i la chʼamadu-we̩ kpai amone̩-we̩ e-kʼuwe̩ nʼukpahiu-we̩ inaina kpai o̩wo̩-we̩ ki gbiti gba ma tane̩.
O Ondu, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, nʼeti-we̩ rʼadua adu-we̩-i, kpʼadua amadu-we̩ ku ma yo̩ ñw ailo odu-we̩ era; nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw u ra ñw adu-we̩ eñini-i, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw e̩ne̩-i liʼowñ ejumomi.
Oñ i lewatu ochu Nisan, o̩do̩ e̩ko̩gu kʼArtaze̩rksis jʼonu, e̩gba kʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma jʼo̩gba-wñ, u la mʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma du nʼo̩wo̩ ñw onu. U la bʼeju-mi nyʼo̩wo̩ eju-wñ mama ta n.
Tak onu ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼeju-we̩ kpa, e̩ la chʼo̩ga n? I chʼe̩wñ omune̩ n, e̩do̩dudu de̩. Tak ailo fʼumi mu nana.
Oñ u ka ñw onu kakini, Oji onu ki gbo kala kala! E̩wñ chi kʼeju-mi ma kpa n, abu kʼewo ugbo kʼojinoji amata-mi jo̩ chʼalache̩ te̩, kʼuna la fʼalaku-wñ jo rinyo̩?
Tak onu ka ñwu mi kakini, Ebi e̩wñ e̩ bi ke? Abe̩le̩ u rodubʼO̩jo̩ e-efojale.
Tak u ka ñw onu kakini, Iche̩wñ ki nyo̩ onu eju, kʼuwe̩ ali adu-we̩-i eju, kʼe̩ jʼakpe̩ mi nyi Juda, nyʼewo ugbo kʼojinoji amata-mi jo̩, kʼu fʼu ko̩.
Tak onu ka ñwu mi kakini (o̩ya-wñ la gugu kpenyʼu), O̩jo̩ onu e̩ je̩ ule̩-we̩? iko e̩gba oñ e̩ dabi wa? Abe̩le̩ i nyo̩ onu eju kʼi kpe̩ mi; tak u fʼiko-wñ ka ñw u.
Uño̩ka ñw onu kakini, Iche̩wñ ki nyo̩ onu eju, kʼi naje̩ ñwu ma kʼo̩takada ñwu mi kʼu ko ñw amigo̩bina ku ma jʼudaba ohimini le̩, kʼama ki je̩ ñwu mi lale gudu gbogbo tak u lewa Juda;

kpai o̩takada kʼu nadu ñw Asaf, e̩ne̩ ki ade efoko onu le̩, kʼi kʼoli ñwu mi kʼu bʼigbo-wñ tod alaku unyi lile kʼi manyʼunyi le̩ kpai tod o̩do̩ ewo le̩ kpai tod unyi kʼomi onugo atʼo̩. Tak onu mʼu ko ñwu mi teju alu kʼo̩wo̩ e̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩-mi nʼumi oji.
Tak u lewa ugbo amigo̩bina udaba ohimini le̩, oñ u mʼo̩takada onu ko ñwu ma. Onu la fʼamagboji abogu kpai amananya kpuche̩ lebʼumi.
Tak e̩gba ku Sanbalat e̩ne̩ Horon le̩ kpai Tobaya e̩nuko̩lo̩ kʼi chʼabo Amo̩n, gbʼinabali-wñ i bi ma eju nana tabale todabu kʼe̩ne̩ʼka wa kʼi tene kʼi che e̩wñ ki ara ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l.
Abe̩le̩ u lewa Je̩rusale̩m oñ u jʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta o̩mo̩.

Tak u kwane̩ odu, omi kpai aboke̩le̩ pe̩ ku ma jʼugbo mi; u la ka ñw e̩ne̩ du e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩-mi du tʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu che Je̩rusale̩m in. E̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ du la dʼugbo-mi n, chai e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kʼu tanʼo kate.
Tak u le Alaku O̩go̩ dufu odu nyʼugbo obuga ogbemgbem ale e-le̩ tʼAlaku Ubioko ge̩, tak u go aku Je̩rusale̩m kʼi chʼe̩lo̩ bʼane̩ ma kpʼalaku-wñ alaku-wñ k una jo rinyo̩.
Tak u legudu nyʼAlaku E̩bi omi kpʼugbo abukpe ku ma gwa tod onu; i muda nʼugbo kʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kʼu tanʼo̩ le̩ ale n.
Tak u mu-te̩gu lʼo̩cha o̩cha aji le̩ odu, oñ u fʼaku le̩ go; tak u mudabi tʼubi oñ u mugudu tʼAlaku O̩go̩ le̩, abe̩le̩ u mudabi.
Amachimo̩la-mi la mʼugbo kʼu nyi n, abe̩k e̩wñ kʼu che n; u la ka ñw amaJu, abe̩k amatama, abe̩k ame̩nojima, abe̩k amachimo̩la-mi abe̩k abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ kibo̩ le̩ ta n.
Tak u ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ cheli e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ ki ke̩re̩bʼuwa-i, abu ki Je̩rusale̩m chʼalache̩ te̩, una la fʼalaku alaku-wñ jo̩ rinyo̩. Me̩ lewa, kʼa nʼo̩do̩ Je̩rusale̩m, kʼa we echʼoli ina ejo̩gba.
Tak u ka ñwu ma alu kʼo̩wo̩ e̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ nʼumi oji, kpʼo̩la kʼonu ka ñwu mi ge̩. Taku ma kakini, A kwane̩ kʼa ne. Abe̩le̩ ma dʼukpahiu ñw o̩wo̩-ma tod uko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩ le̩.

Ama e̩gba ku Sanbalat e̩ne̩ Horon le̩ kpai Tobaya ki chʼe̩nuko̩lo̩, kʼi chʼabo Amo̩n, kpai Ge̩she̩m ki chʼe̩ne̩ Arabia le̩ gbʼo̩, ma kwonyʼuwa anyinacha oñ ma che̩de̩te̩ wa, ma kakini, E̩wñ me̩ che-i ta? Ame̩ kʼonu?
Tak u dohi ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩jo̩ e-efojale, owñ le̩ aje̩ ñw u ra ñw a, todule̩ oñ awa kʼa chʼamadu-wñ akwane̩ kʼa ne; ame̩ muda nʼukpe̩, abe̩k o̩kpakpa, abe̩k urewa du efu Je̩rusale̩m in.

Tak E̩liashib agboji amatama kwane̩ manyʼamo̩maye-wñ amatama le̩, oñ ma fʼAlaku Ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ne. Ma fʼu che kʼi fo̩ oñ ma mʼolugbana-wñ ko dago; ma che kʼi fo̩ gbogbo wa o̩do̩go̩ Hameya gbogbo wa odo̩go̩ Hanane̩l.
Aboke̩le̩ Je̩riko la jʼakolo-wñ ane. Zakur o̩ma Imri dʼakolo-wñ o̩wo̩ʼka ane̩.
Amo̩ma Hase̩naa la ne Alaku E̩ja: ma kʼigbo oli-wñ nyʼane̩ oñ ma kʼolu-gbana-wñ dago, tʼukodo-wñ, tʼoli uro̩-na-wñ.
Oñ Me̩re̩mo̩t o̩ma Uraya, o̩ma Hakoz dʼakolo̩ e-ma añwo̩che. Oñ Me̩shulam o̩ma Be̩re̩kaya, o̩ma Me̩shczabe̩l dʼakolo-ma añwo̩che. Zedo̩k o̩ma Beana dʼakolo e-ma añwo̩che.
Oñ abo Te̩koa jʼakolo e-ma añwo̩che; abojima-ma muda je̩ dʼo̩lo̩-ma tʼuko̩lo̩ Ondu-ma n.
Oñ Je̩hoyada, o̩ma Paseya, kpai Me̩shulam, o̩ma Be̩so̩deya, fʼAlaku Igbele le̩ ñwo̩che; ma kʼigbo-wñ jo̩, oñ ma kʼo̩lugbana-wñ dago kpai ukodo-wñ kpai ugbo̩lo̩ oli ku ma du rʼo̩na-wñ.
Oñ Me̩lataya e̩ne̩ Gibeo̩n le̩ kpai Jadon e̩ne̩ Me̩ro̩nota aboke̩le̩ Gibeo̩n, kpai Mizpa, ku ma jʼef o̩da igo̩bina eju-daba ohimini, jʼakolo e-ma añwo̩che.

Uzie̩l, o̩ma Harhaya, ku ma chʼama-gwalo̩ o̩jamalia, jʼakolo-wñ añwo̩che. Oñ Hananiya e̩ne̩ʼka ef abo ku ma che otulale, dʼakolo-wñ añwo̩che; ma la fʼaku Je̩rusale̩m ne gbogbo wʼugbo o̩do̩ ki nʼabe̩ le̩.
Oñ Refaya, o̩ma He̩r, agboji ukpe̩reji ane̩ Je̩rusale̩m, jʼakolo e-ma añwo̩che.
Oñ Je̩daya, o̩ma Harumaf, dʼakolo e-ma añwo̩che o̩wo̩ ugbo kʼunyi-wñ de̩ kpakpa; oñ Hatush, o̩ma Hashabeniya, dʼakolo-wñ añwo̩che.
Malkija, o̩ma Harim, kpai Hashub, o̩ma Pahat-moab, fʼukpe̩ omune̩ ñwo̩che kpai o̩do̩go̩ aido aido le̩.
Oñ Shalum, o̩ma Halo̩he̩sh, agboji ukpe̩reji ane̩ Je̩rusale̩m owñ kpai amo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ jʼakolo-wñ añwo̩che.

Hanun kpai abo ku ma dodo Zanoa ñw Alaku O̩go̩ le̩ che; ma fʼu ne, taku ma kʼolugbana-wñ dago, tʼukodo-wñ kpai ugbo̩lo̩ oli uro̩na-wñ, manyʼo̩do̩-wñ ohibo̩wo̩ icham nyo̩gwo̩ko̩ gbogbo wa Alaku Ubio̩ko.
Oñ Malkija o̩ma Rekab, kʼi chʼagboji ojane̩ Be̩t-hakere̩m fʼAlaku Ubio̩ko le̩ ñwo̩che; i fʼu ne, tak i kʼo̩lu-gbana-wñ dago, tʼuko̩do-wñ, kpai ugbo̩lo̩ oli uro̩na-wñ.

Oñ Shalun, o̩ma Kol-hoze, agboji ojane̩ Mizpa, fʼAlaku E̩bi omi le̩ ñwo̩che; i fʼu ne, i mʼe̩wñ ko bʼo ma, tak i kʼo̩lugbana-wñ dago kpai ukodo-wñ kpai ugbo̩lo̩ oli uro̩na-wñ, tak i fʼo̩do̩ abukpe omi Shela me̩rʼuche̩ onu ne, gbogbo wʼagube ki agwo̩ru kwʼewo Defid wane̩.
Aro̩ne-wñ Nihe̩maya o̩ma Azbuk, agboji ukpe̩reji ane̩ Be̩tzur, de̩ añwo̩che gbogbo wʼugbo ki te̩ kado ojinoji Defid, kpai gbogbo wa kado abukpe omi ku ma che le̩, kpai awa kado unyi amagbiti.
Aro̩ne-wñ abo Lifai añwo̩che, owñ che Rehum o̩ma Bani Hashabiya agboji ukpe̩reji ane̩ Keila jʼakolo-wñ añwo̩che tod abo-jane̩-wñ.
Aro̩ne-wñ amo̩maye-ma jʼañwo̩che, owñ che Bafai o̩ma He̩ne-dad, agboji ukpe̩reji ane̩ Keila;
oñ Eze̩r o̩ma Je̩shua, agboji Mizpa, dʼakolo-wñ añwo̩che ukpe̩ omune̩ ame̩rʼate̩gu ku ma nyʼunyi ane̩ ogu, ugbo arida-wñ le̩.
Aro̩ne-wñ Baruk, o̩ma Zabai, fʼeju gbiti añwʼukpe̩ omune̩ che akwʼugbo arida-wñ le̩ gbogbo wʼalugbo̩na unyi E̩liashib agboji amatama.
Aro̩ne-wñ Me̩re̩mo̩t, o̩ma Uraya, o̩ma Hako̩s fʼukpe̩ omune̩ ñwo̩che akwʼalugbo̩na unyi E̩liashib gbogbo tʼotitala unyi E̩liashib.
Oñ aro̩ne-wñ amatama añwo̩che, abo̩ Egbili ma che.
Aro̩ne-ma Be̩njamin kpai Hashub nañwʼe-ki me̩rʼunyi-ma che. Aro̩ne-ma Azaraya, o̩ma Maaseya, o̩ma Ananaya, nañwʼe-ki dʼakolo unyi-wñ onugo che.
Aro̩ne-wñ Binui, o̩ma He̩nedad nañwʼukpe̩ omune̩ che akwʼunyi Azaraya gbogbo wʼarida-wñ gbogbo wʼalo-wñ.
Pa-lal o̩ma Uzai che ugbo arida-wñ kpai ugbo o̩do̩go̩ ki ne o̩wo̩ʼka unyi onu ate̩, owñ chʼe-ki me̩rʼalaku abo-ide. Aro̩ne-wñ Pe̩daya, o̩ma Parosh, che.
Abo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ la dodo Ofe̩l gbogbo wʼugbo ki merʼAlaku Omi o̩wo̩ olodudu, kpai o̩do̩go̩ ki ne te̩.
Aro̩ne-wñ abo Te̩koa nañwʼukpe̩ omune̩ che, ugbo o̩do̩go̩ lile ki ne te̩, gbogbo wʼodo̩ Ofe̩l.
Amatama jʼañwʼate̩ Alaku Amanya che, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ache ame̩rʼunyi e-wñ.
Aro̩ne-wñ Zedo̩k, o̩ma Ime̩r, nañwʼe-ki me̩ru unyi-wñ che. Aro̩ne-wñ She̩maya o̩ma She̩kanaya ade Alaku O̩wo̩ Olodudu de̩ añwo̩che.
Aro̩ne-wñ Hananaya o̩ma She̩le̩maya kpai Hanun e̩ke̩fa o̩ma Zalaf jʼañwʼukpe̩ omune̩ che. Aro̩ne-wñ Me̩shulam, o̩ma Be̩re̩kaya, nañwʼe-ki me̩rʼo̩la unyi-wñ che.
Aro̩ne-wñ Malkija agwalo̩ o̩jamaliaʼka de̩ añwo̩che gbogbo wa unyi abo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ kpai unyi amanyaja gbogbo wa kado Alaku Hamifkad, kpai gbogbo wa ate̩gu alo-wñ.
Agbagba ate̩gu alo le̩ kpai Alaku Ame̩wño̩re̩ egini amagwalo̩ o̩jamalia kpai amanyaja jʼañwo̩che.
Oñ i lewatʼe̩gba ki Sanbalat gbo̩ ka kʼa jʼanʼo̩do̩ le̩, i kwowe̩do̩, i bieju nana tabale, i chane̩ ekʼamaJu ru.

Tak i chane̩ ekʼo̩la eju amo̩maye-wñ kpai eju abogu Samaria kakini, AmaJu, ame̩gbo ki de̩, e̩wñ ma jʼache ta? A tʼuma no̩ abe̩-i? Ma ache iche̩bo̩? Ma ache kpa o̩jo̩ kate? Ma akʼokuta kwʼojeita ojeita dabiwa jʼe̩gu-wñ? Okuta ku ma gujo rinyo̩ le̩?
Oñ Tobaya, e̩ne̩ Amo̩n, dago kpe̩nyʼu, oñ i kakini, I chaka chʼe̩wñ ku ma ne le̩ ajo te̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩, i agu o̩do̩ okuta-ma lo̩!
O O̩jo̩-wa, gbo̩, todu ma che̩de̩te̩ wa. E̩ ki la mʼina-ma le̩ dudabi abʼama onugo oji ma, mʼu ma ko che e̩wñ kʼogu je̩ ef ane̩ amu.
E̩ ki la dʼe̩wñ bʼudu ku ma fe̩ ma n, i ki nʼe̩wñ du ki akpʼadure-ma lu bʼeju-we̩ te̩ n; todu ama biʼuwe̩ eju eju abo ku ma jʼanʼo̩do̩-i.
Abe̩le̩ a fʼo̩do̩ le̩ ne; o̩do̩ le̩ chaka kwogamʼomune̩ gbogbo wʼukpe̩reji o̩gba-wñ. Todu e̩do̩ amone̩ le̩ tʼuko̩lo̩-ma.
Ama i lewatʼe̩gba ki Sanbalat kpai Tobaya kpai abo Arabia, kpai abo Amo̩n kpʼabo Ashdo̩d gbo̩ ka kʼo̩do̩ Je̩rusale̩m eñwo̩che anoji alo ku ma chane̩ elʼugbo ki kpo̩fo̩ ko, e̩gbale̩ ma we̩do̩nana;
tak o̩chaka-ma fʼalu jo̩ ku ma wa kʼogu bo̩ Je̩rusale̩m ku ma fʼu biya.
Ama a fʼodu ra bʼO̩jo̩-wa, a mʼabo ide ko jo̩ ku ma de odu kpai o̩ro̩ka tod abo le̩.
Taku Juda kakini, Ukpahiu abo ku ma nʼadu lo̩, etutu la chʼenana ta; todabe̩le̩ a la neke nʼo̩do̩ le̩ n.
Abo ku ma kobʼuwa le̩ laño̩ kakini, Ma ama n ma ali n, chai e̩gba kʼa lewʼalumeji-ma kʼa kpa ma kʼa fʼuko̩lo̩ le̩ kpachi.
Oñ e̩gba kʼamaJu ku ma dodo me̩ru ma lewa, ma ka ñw a onu me̩gwa kakini, Ma akwʼugbo duu ku ma jo̩ wa akobʼuwa (ugbo du ku ma dabi kwowa le̩).
Todule̩ u mʼamone̩ ko jo̩ ubi o̩do̩ le̩ ugbo ki ma gbo̩gba n, kpai ugbo ki chʼe̩kpo̩fo̩. U ko ma gugu akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi, kpai o̩kwo̩chageli-ma kpai o̩kwo̩-ma kpai o̩o̩do̩-ma.

Tak u go, oñ u kwane̩, u ka ñw abojima kpai amachimo̩la igo̩bina kpai amone̩ ki bo̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki railo ma n. Me̩ nadibekado Ondu, kʼowñ chʼinaina, i la abailo, ame̩ ki ja tod amo̩maye-me̩ kpai amo̩ma-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai amo̩ma-me̩ onobule̩ kpai amo̩ya-me̩ kpai unyi-me̩.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼame̩nebi-wa le̩ gbo̩ ka kʼa fʼofe-ma ma, kʼO̩jo̩ la fʼojuju-ma le̩ chʼibe̩te̩, tak o̩chaka-wa mudabi tʼo̩la o̩do̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼugbo uko̩lo̩-wñ.
Oñ akwihi le̩ gbogbo alo, ukpe̩reji amibolo-mi nʼuko̩lo̩ le̩ ache, oñ ukpe̩reji-ma gwo̩nyʼo̩kwo̩ kpai ugbe̩yo̩ kpai o̩o̩do̩ kpai adika ogu; oñ amagboji jʼubi abo unyi Juda chaka.
Abo ku ma nʼo̩do̩ kpai abo ku ma nʼadu fʼo̩la-ma ñwo̩che jo; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼo̩wo̩ʼka ache uko̩lo̩, oñ i nʼo̩wo̩ ekeji gwo̩nyʼido̩na ogu-wñ.
Oñ abo ku ma nʼo̩do̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma mʼo̩kwo̩chageli-wñ du tʼachala, abe̩le̩ tak i anʼo̩do̩. E̩ne̩ ki afʼo̩kakachi la dʼugbo e-mi.
Tak u ka ñw abogijo kpai amachimo̩la igo̩bina kpai amone̩ ki bo̩ kakini, Uko̩lo̩-i nana tabale, awa la chʼe̩daru bʼomune̩ te̩ oj o̩do̩-i, e̩ne̩ʼka la jiji rʼeke-ji.
Ugbo du ku me̩ gbʼuko̩la o̩ka-kachi, me̩ muke̩che̩ wʼugbo-wa o̩mo̩. O̩jo̩-wa ajogu todu wa.
Abe̩le̩ a jʼef uko̩lo̩ le̩ eche, ukpe̩reji-ma la gwo̩nyʼo̩kwo̩ akwʼiko kʼo̩jo̩ añwa gbogbo wʼiko kʼawo adufu.
Abe̩le̩, u ño̩ ka ñw amone̩ iko le̩ ge̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kpai e̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ ki naru ef aku Je̩rusale̩m, ku ma ki chʼabo ku ma dide odu ñw a, ku ma la chʼuko̩lo̩ o̩ro̩ka.
Abe̩le̩ tʼomi, tʼamo̩maye-mi, tʼabimo̩to̩-mi, tʼabo ide ku ma tʼumi ubi, i nʼe̩ne̩ du ef uwa ki kʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ jʼane̩ n, ido̩na ogu e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ.
Tak ukwa lile dago ef amone̩ le̩ kpai ef amo̩ya-ma nyʼamo̩maye-ma amaJu o̩la.
Todu i nʼabo̩ iche̩ka ku ma kakini, Awa manyʼamo̩ma-wa e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ chʼe̩wewe; je̩ ñw a tene e̩wñ e̩yo̩ kʼa je̩ kʼa deju.
I nʼabo ku ma ño̩ kakini, A adʼane̩ uche̩-wa tʼof o̩ko̩, kpai uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-wa kpai unyi-wa; je̩ ñw a nyʼakʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩ wa, tod e̩wñ ki aña emi.
I ño̩ nʼabo ku ma kakini, A mʼane̩ uche-wa kpai uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-wa ko̩ tʼofʼo̩ko̩ kʼa li o̩ko̩ kʼa re̩ onu.

Año̩la e-wa la dʼabu año̩la amo̩maye-wa, amo̩ma e-wa la dab amo̩ma e-ma; e̩ la go, awa la akʼamo̩ma-wa e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ jʼef adu, amo̩ma-wa onobule̩ iche̩ka la jʼef adu me̩; i la nʼe̩wñ du kʼa neke che n; todu abo omune̩ mʼane̩ uche̩-wa kpai uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-wa gba me̩.
Tak u we̩do̩ nana e̩gba kʼu gbo̩ aku-ma kpai o̩la ku ma ka-i.
Oñ u kwonyojuju, u la kobʼabo ojima kpai amachimo̩la igo̩bina, oñ u ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ agbʼo̩ko̩ ugwo̩la ef o̩wo̩ o̩maye-wñ; tak ufʼujeju lile da nyʼuma o̩la.

Oñ u ka ñwu ma kakini, Alu kʼo̩wo̩-wa tu awa fʼamo̩maye-wa amaJu ku ma ko̩ ta ñw abo uche̩ichi la tane̩; i la dʼame̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ kʼamo̩maye-me̩ ta! awa oñ ame̩ ma ta ñw u? Taku ma chechi, ma li o̩la du ku ma aka n.
U ño̩ kakini, E̩wñ ku me̩ che le̩ nyo̩ no. I dukpe̩ kʼame̩ lule̩ ef ailo O̩jo̩-wa tod ina abo uche̩ichi, ame̩nebi-wa le̩ n?
Abe̩le̩ ge̩, omi kpai amo̩maye-mi kpai amibolo-mi jʼamʼo̩ko̩ kpai e̩wñ e̩yo̩ ñwu ma. Nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, awa ki tʼo̩ko̩ ugwo̩la egba no̩.

O̩ko̩ nagba bʼume̩ kakini, Me̩ kʼane̩ uche̩-ma kpai uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-ma kpai uche̩ o̩lif-ma kpai unyi unyi-ma kpai ukpe̩ o̩ko̩ e̩kogume̩lu kpai e-e̩wñ e̩yo̩ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ kpai e-ekpo ku me̩ bʼuma gba le̩ dabi wa ñwu ma eñini-i.
Taku ma kakini, A akʼe̩wñ-ma dabi wa ñwu ma, a ñʼatene e̩wñ ugbo ma ge̩ n. Abe̩le̩ a ache, owñ chʼalu kʼe̩ ka le̩. Tak u fʼamatama do̩ wa, ku ma je̩ ñwu ma go̩ ka kʼama ache teju alu ku ma katane̩-i.

U ño̩ fʼo̩wo̩-mi kpai e̩re̩-mi gbanyo̩, oñ u kakini, Abe̩le̩ O̩jo̩ ki nagbʼe̩ne̩ du ki ma che teju o̩la ku me̩ katane̩-i n nyo̩ bʼunyi-wñ kpai uko̩lo̩-wñ te̩; abe̩le̩ ama ki fʼe̩ne̩ le̩ gbanyo̩, kʼi mud e̩ne̩ o̩wo̩ ofo. Tak abo ujeju le̩ chaka kakini, Ami. Oñ ma kwo je̩nyu Jihofa. Amone̩ le̩ la che teju o̩la ku ma katane̩ le̩.

Anoji e-le̩ ge̩ akwihi ku ma dʼumi che igo̩bina Juda owñ chʼakwʼo̩do̩ ogu gbogbo wa o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke meji kʼArtaze̩rksis jʼonu, owñ chʼo̩do̩ me̩gweji, omi kpai amo̩maye-mi jʼuje̩wñ ukpe̩ igo̩bina kʼu che mama ta n.

Amigo̩bina ku ma je̩ tak u wa je̩ dachinʼamone̩ le̩, oñ ma bʼuma gbʼuje̩wñ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma, manyʼajifa she̩ke̩l o̩gbo̩ meji ge̩, Ichaka chʼamadu-ma ma chenʼo̩da amone̩-i. Omi muda chʼabe̩le̩ n, todu ailo O̩jo̩ kʼu nara.
Ochochi, omi ño̩ gwo̩nyʼuko̩lo̩ aku-i, a gbʼane̩ du la n; amibolo-mi chaka la jeju nyʼuko̩lo̩ e̩mi-i.
Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, amaJu iche̩ka kpai amachimo̩la igo̩bina one̩ oli me̩ta, manyʼabo ku ma kwef abo uche̩ichi ku ma lʼuwa daka-i, ku ma wʼugbo wa le̩, ño̩ jʼoj itebulu-mi.

E̩wñ ku ma la ñwo̩che jo̩ o̩jo̩ okate che o̩kokuno̩ʼka kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini o̩me̩me̩le̩ me̩fa; ma ño̩ fʼame̩la abiwe̩ ñwo̩che ñwu mi ge̩, oñ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa ma kʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma ojoji ojoji wa jo̩; i chaka nana u gba ma ukpe̩ igo̩bina n, todu adu ki nʼamone̩-i oji gbe̩gbe̩.
O O̩jo̩-mi, e̩ rewa e̩wñ du kʼu che ñw amone̩-i ki mud e̩nyo̩ ñwu mi.

Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku ma dʼinabali ñwu Sanbalat kpai Tobaya kpai Ge̩she̩m e̩ne̩ Arab le̩ kpai ame̩nebi-wa ki bo̩, ka kʼomi fʼo̩do̩ le̩ ne ki ma ño̩ nʼugbo kʼi kpo̩fo̩ ge̩ n, (u muda kʼolugba-na dago alaku alaku iko le̩ ta n),
taku Sanbalat kpai Ge̩she̩m kpʼuche̩ rʼumi kakini, Wa kʼa de ewo egbili Ono. Ibe la dʼef uma ku ma che mi e̩bie̩ne̩.
Tak u fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ rʼuma kakini, U dʼemi ache uko̩lo̩ o̩temeje. To̩da-be̩le̩ u neke gwo̩ru wa n; tod e̩wñ uko̩lo̩-i akpachi, kʼu to̩no̩ kʼu gwo̩ru wʼugbo me̩?
Oñ ma fʼuche̩ e̩gʼe-le̩ kpe̩rʼumi onu me̩le̩; u la dohi abe̩le̩ ñwu ma.
Tak onu e̩ke̩lu-wñ Sanbalat fʼadu-wñ kpuche̩rʼumi e̩go̩ le̩, o̩takada ku ma ko̩ chʼenadala nʼo̩wo̩-wñ.

Ma ko̩ nyʼu kakini, Ma ka ef abo uche̩ichi ka kʼibe dʼef uwe̩ kpai amaJu ka ku me̩ ako̩ onu. Gashmu ka abe̩le̩. Todule̩ oñ uwe̩ do̩mo̩ an, o̩do̩, i la dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ chʼonu-ma, abu kʼa gbo le̩ de̩.
Uwe̩ laño̩ mʼamakache̩ ko jo̩ ku ma fʼakoya-we̩ ta Je̩rusale̩m kakini, Onu de̩ Juda. Fai awa la adʼinabali alu kʼo̩la le̩ de̩ ñw onu. Todule̩ e̩ lewa, kʼa nyojuju.
Tak u fʼuche̩ kpe̩ rʼu kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi ache e̩wñ kʼuwe̩ aka le̩ n. E-le̩ chʼakpaine̩ ibe efu-we̩ oñ e̩ ka le̩.
Todu i dʼuma e̩do̩ chaka ku ma nyʼuwa okpo, ma kakini, O̩wo̩-ma abulo̩ ef uko̩lo̩-ma, tak i awe enʼoji. O O̩jo̩, dʼukpahiu ñw o̩wo̩-mi fa-i ke.

Tak u nyʼef unyi She̩maya, o̩ma Delaya, ki chʼo̩ma Me̩he̩tabe̩l, kʼi fʼo̩na re nyʼo̩la-wñ tef unyi, oñ i kakini, Awa ki jeju ef unyi O̩jo̩, ef unyi lile le̩, kʼa la fʼolugbo̩na unyi lile le̩ re; todu ma awa ku ma dʼe̩ kpa; ochochi, ma awa odu ku ma dʼe̩ kpa.
Tak u kakini, E̩gʼ e-mi-i ara? E̩ne̩ chʼe̩go̩ mi kʼi anyʼef unyi O̩jo̩ lile-i todu kʼi jadu oji o̩la-wñ? U le n.
Tak i ne̩rʼumi eju, oñ u li ka ki chʼO̩jo̩ kpʼo̩ wa-i n; chai owñ kate kʼache̩-i nyʼumi; Tobaya kpai Sanbalat la chʼo̩gu ñw u.
Todu ku ma chʼogu ñw u le̩ de̩ kakini, kʼomi ki railo kʼu fʼabe̩le̩ che, kʼu dure, kʼama ki gwo̩nyʼo̩la le̩ ki mud uwohi e̩bie̩ne̩, ku ma nʼe̩wñ ku ma dʼu bʼumi ina.
O O̩jo-mi, e̩ narewa Tobaya kpai Sanbalat teju uko̩lo̩-ma-i kpai akache̩ onobule̩, Noadaya, kpai amakache̩ kibo̩, ki dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma nyʼumi okpo ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼodo̩ le̩ ne kpa o̩jo̩ kʼochu Elul nʼo̩jo̩ ogue̩lu, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ ooje nyoke meji.
Oñ i lewatʼe̩gba kʼame̩nebi-wa chaka gbo, abo uche̩ichi du ku ma lʼuwa daka le̩ kwo railo, oñ i mud e̩wñ achukata ñwu ma eju-ma; todu ma li ka kʼo̩wo̩ O̩jo̩-wa dʼef uko̩lo̩ le̩.
Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, iko le̩ abojima amaJu ko̩ o̩takada wewe kpuche̩ru Tobaya. O̩takada e-Tobaya la wʼugbo e-ma.
Todu amone̩ wewe jo̩ Juda ku ma ñmʼe̩bo̩ kpʼowñ, todabu kʼowñ nʼo̩ma She̩kanaya o̩ma Ara chʼo̩ya; Jehohanan, o̩ma-wñ la ne̩ o̩ma Me̩shulam o̩ma Be̩re̩kaya chʼo̩ya.
Ma ño̩ fʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ kʼi che ka jane̩ ñwu mi, ma la mʼo̩la e-mi du ka ñw u. Oñ Tobaya ko̩ o̩takada kpuche̩ wa kʼi nyʼumi okpo.
Oñ i lewatʼe̩gba ku ma fʼo̩do̩ ne kpa kʼomi la mʼolugbana-wñ konyʼu ku ma fʼamadalo̩na kpai amakeli kpai abo Lifai chi jo̩,
kʼomi dʼo̩da Je̩rusale̩m tʼo̩wo̩ o̩maye-mi Hanani, kpai Hanana-ya ki chʼagboji unyi onu; todu owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki achubi one̩, i la arailo O̩jo̩ tʼamone̩ wewe le.

Tak u ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ki je̩ ñwu ma bi alaku Je̩rusale̩m gbogbo tak olu ki kpa nyʼane̩ n; abo ide ki dago jʼo̩mo̩ taku ma rʼo̩na, tak ame̩ ki dʼoli uro̩na tʼo̩. Me̩ fʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m chi jo̩ chi jo̩ ku ma dide, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki nʼiko ide-wñ, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki la ne̩ ame̩ru unyi e-wñ.
Ewo le̩ la chenabe̩, i chenana amone̩ muda ña ef uwñ ma la kʼunyi ta n.

Oñ O̩jo-mi du tʼe̩do̩-mi kʼu fʼabo-jima kpai amachimo̩la igo̩bina kpai amone̩ do̩ jeju, ku ma fʼaluka-ma lo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu. Tak u fʼo̩takada o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo ku ma te̩gu wa ejodudu le̩ li, oñ u li alu ku ma ko ef uwñ kakini.

Abo-i chʼabo ojane̩ le̩, ku ma mu ma ño̩ le taku ma mudabi kwef amu le̩ wa; owñ chʼabo ki Ne̩biukadne̩za onu Babilo̩n mu ma ño̩ le̩, ku ma la mudabi wa Je̩rusale̩m kpai Juda, kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼewo-wñ.
Owñ chʼabo ku ma lebo Zerubabe̩l kpai Je̩shua kpai Nihe̩maya kpai Azaraya kpai Raamaya kpai Nahamani kpai Morde̩kai kpai Bilshan kpai Mispe̩re̩t kpai Bigfai kpai Nehum kpai Beana.
amo̩ma Parosh chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ me̩jo̩ nyoke me̩gweji.
Amo̩ma She̩fatia chʼoli mebie nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma Ara chʼulo̩gwa nyʼooje nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma Pahat-moab, ku ma chʼamo̩ma Je̩shua kpai Joab, chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji nyʼicham nyʼo̩ke me̩gwe̩jo̩ oji.
Amo̩ma Elam chʼicham nyʼulo̩ko̩ nyʼooje nyoke me̩le̩.
Amo̩ma Zatu chʼicham nyʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu.
Amo̩ma Zakai chʼo̩-gbo̩lo̩ meji chʼicham.
Amo̩ma Binui chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩jo̩.
Amo̩ma Bebai chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ nyoke me̩jo̩.
Amo̩ma Azgad chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji nyʼoli me̩fa nyʼo̩gu nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma Adoni-kam chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ me̩ta nyoke mebie.
Amo̩ma Bigfai chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ me̩ta nyoke mebie.
Amo̩ma Adin chʼulo̩gwa nyʼooje nyoke me̩lu.
Amo̩ma Ate̩r, e-He̩ze̩kaya, chʼoke meji chʼo̩gume̩lu.
Amo̩ma Hashura chʼoli me̩fa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ nyoke me̩jo̩.
Amo̩ma Bezai chʼoli me̩fa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ nyoke me̩le̩.
Amo̩ma Harif chʼo̩gume̩lu nyoke me̩gweji.
Amo̩ma Gibeo̩n chʼoke me̩lu chʼogume̩lu.
Aboke̩le̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m kpai Netofa chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩la nyoke me̩jo̩.
Aboke̩le̩ Anato̩t chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩jo̩.
Aboke̩le̩ Be̩tazmafe̩t chʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke meji.
Aboke̩le̩ Kiriat-jearim kpai Chefira kpai Birot chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ mebie nyoke me̩ta.
Aboke̩le̩ Rama kpai Geba chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ nyokeʼka.
Aboke̩le̩ Mikmas chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke meji.
Aboke̩le̩ Be̩te̩l kpai Ai chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩ta.
Aboke̩le̩ Nebo ekeji le̩ chʼooje nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma Elam ekeji chʼicham nyʼulo̩ko̩ nyʼooje nyoke me̩le̩.
Amo̩ma Harim chʼoli me̩fa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩.
Amo̩ma Je̩riko chʼoli me̩fa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu.
Amo̩ma Lo̩d kpai Hadid kpai Ono chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ me̩fa nyokeʼka.
Amo̩ma Senaa chʼe̩-te̩gwa chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩.
E-amatama de̩: amo̩ma Je̩daya, e-abo unyi Je̩shua chʼicham nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ me̩jo̩ nyoke me̩gwe̩ta.
Amo̩ma Ime̩r chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼooje nyoke meji.
Amo̩ma Pashur chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼoli me̩le̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke mebie.
Amo̩ma Harim chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyoke me̩gwe̩bie.
E-abo Lifai de̩: amo̩ma Je̩shua, e-Kadmie̩l ef amo̩ma Hode̩fa, chʼe̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩le̩.
E-amakeli de̩: amo̩ma Esaf chʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ mebie nyoke me̩jo̩.
E-amadalo̩na de̩: amo̩ma Shalum, amo̩ma Ate̩r, amo̩ma Talmo̩n, amo̩ma Akub, amo̩ma Hatita, amo̩ma Sho̩bai, aluka-ma du chʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwe̩jo̩.
E-abo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ de̩: amo̩ma Ziha, amo̩ma Hasufa, amo̩ma Ta-bao̩t,
amo̩ma Keros, amo̩ma Sia, amo̩ma Pado̩n,
amo̩ma Le̩banu, amo̩ma Hagaba, amo̩ma Salmai,
amo̩ma Hanun, amo̩ma Gide̩l, amo̩ma Gahar,
amo̩ma Reaya, amo̩ma Rezin, amo̩ma Neko̩da,
amo̩ma Gazam, amo̩ma Uza, amo̩ma Pasiya,
amo̩ma Be̩sai, amo̩ma Me̩unim, amo̩ma Ne̩fushe̩sim,
amo̩ma Ba-kbuk, amo̩ma Hakufa, amo̩ma Ha-rhur,
amo̩ma Baslit, amo̩ma Me̩-hida, amo̩ma Marsha,
amo̩ma Barkos, amo̩ma Sisera, amo̩ma Tema,
amo̩ma Neziya, amo̩ma Hatifa.
E-amo̩ma amadu So̩lo̩mo̩n de̩; amo̩ma Sotai, amo̩ma Sofe̩re̩t, amo̩ma Perida,
amo̩ma Jaala, amo̩ma Darkon, amo̩ma Gide̩l,
amo̩ma She̩fatiya, amo̩ma Hatil, amo̩ma Po-che̩re̩t-hazebaim, amo̩ma Amo̩n.
Abo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ chaka, manyʼamo̩ma amadu So̩lo̩mo̩n chʼoke me̩jo̩ chi ef ulo̩ko̩.
Oñ abo ku ma kwo Te̩l-mela kpai Te̩l-harshakpai Che̩rub kpai Ado̩n kpai Ime̩r le̩ jo̩-i; ma muda nʼujiwe unyi amata-ma n, kpai ugbe̩-ma n, abe̩k abo Israe̩l ma che, a ma n:
amo̩ma Delaya, amo̩ma To̩baya, amo̩ma Neko̩da, chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ meji nyoke meji.
E-amatama la de̩: amo̩ma Habaya, amo̩ma Hakos, amo̩ma Barzilai, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩ma Barzilai, e̩ne̩ Ge̩liad le̩ oka chʼo̩ya, tak amone̩ chane̩ e̩dʼo̩ odu o̩lo̩pu o̩ya-wñ.
Abo-i tene ugbo ku ma kʼodu-ma jo̩ ef abo ku ma lo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma le̩, ma muda li u n: todule̩ oñ ma fuma lorʼe̩wñ e̩daji, oñ ma mʼuma ko jʼane̩ bʼef uko̩lo̩ atama te̩.
Tak igo̩bina ka ñwu ma ka kʼama ki we eje̩ e̩wñ efo̩ e-efo̩, gbogbo tak atama ki ne̩ Urim kpai Tumim ki kwane̩.
O̩gbo̩ abo ujeju le̩ du chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke meji nyʼoli me̩fa nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta,

manyʼamadu-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩, ku ma chʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ mebie nyʼoli me̩fa nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke mebie; ma laño̩ ne̩ abobule̩ kpai aboke̩le̩ ku ma keli o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu ge̩.
Amanya-ma chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩gwe̩fa, amimiu-lu-ma chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ meji nyoke me̩lu;
aminyakulumi chʼulo̩ko̩ nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke me̩lu; amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩fa nyʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ me̩fa.
Amata ku ma dʼoji dufu iche̩ka ño̩ kʼe̩wñ uko̩lo̩ le̩ wa. Igo̩bina mʼo̩jamalia alu darik icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ko nyʼef akpati o̩ko̩, manyʼochibu ooje, manyʼafe̩ amatama oli me̩gwa nyʼogue̩gwa.
Amata ku ma dʼoji dufu iche̩ka la kʼo̩jamalia alu darik icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu, kpai e̩ñwa ajifa icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ oji tef akpati o̩ko̩ e-uko̩lo̩.
E̩wñ kʼamone̩ kibo̩ la ko wa chʼo̩jamalia alu darik icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogu, kpʼajifa e̩ñwa icham meji nyʼulo̩ko̩, kpai afe̩ amatama o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke mebie.
Oñ amatama kpai abo Lifai kpai amadalo̩na kpai amakeli kpai amone̩ iche̩ka kpai abo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ kpai abo Israe̩l chaka jʼewo ewo-ma.
Alu amone̩ le̩ chaka chʼokate, oñ ma kʼo̩la-ma jeju jʼugboda ki dʼo̩gba Alaku Omi; oñ ma ka ñw E̩zra, ako̩takada le̩, kʼi dʼo̩takada uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s wa, owñ chʼe-ki Jihofa ñwate̩ todu abo Israe̩l.
Tak E̩zra, atama, nʼuko̩-o̩la le̩ wa o̩gba abo ujeju, tʼaboke̩le̩, tʼabobule̩, tʼe̩ne̩ du ki nʼibe ki agbo̩ oji-wñ, i nʼe̩ wa o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu e̩kebie le̩.

Tak i fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che o̩gba ugbo̩da ki dʼo̩gba Alaku Omi le̩ akwʼodudu odudu gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼolu wʼoji, eju aboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩ kpai abo ku ma bo̩jo̩ emʼoji-wñ; amone̩ le̩ du la nʼeti rʼo̩la o̩takada uko̩-o̩la le̩.

Oñ E̩zra ako̩takada dago oji akpata ku ma nʼoli ro̩ tod e̩wñ le̩ gbage̩de̩; oñ Matita-ya kpai Shema kpai Anaya kpai Uraya kpai Hilkaya kpai Maaseya dago akolo-wñ o̩wo̩ awo̩to; oñ Pe̩daya kpai Mishae̩l kpai Malkija kpai Hashum kpai Hashbadana kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Me̩shulam la jo̩ o̩wo̩ awohi-wñ.
Tak E̩zra mʼo̩takada le̩ chi eju amone̩ chaka; (todu ugbo kʼi dago dʼate̩ ñw amone̩ le̩ du;) tak e̩gba kʼi mʼu chi amone̩ le̩ chaka kwane̩ dago.
Tak E̩zra kele Jihofa, O̩jo̩ inaina; oñ amone̩ le̩ chaka dohi kakini, Ami, ami, oñ ma kʼo̩wo̩-ma nyʼate̩; ma la fʼoji dalo̩, oñ ma dojikane̩ ñwu Jihofa, eju-ma chebʼane̩ ma.

Je̩shua kpai Bani kpai She̩re̩baya kpai Jamin kpai Akub kpai Shabe̩tai kpai Hodaya kpai Maaseya kpai Kelita kpai Azaraya kpai Jozabad kpai Hanan kpai Pelaya kpai abo Lifai laño̩ je̩ ñw amone̩ mʼoji uko̩-o̩la le̩; oñ amone̩ le̩ dago jʼe̩gu-ma.
Oñ ma fʼo̩la uko̩-o̩la O̩jo̩ ef o̩takada le̩ kalata ejugede pee; ma la dʼoji-wñ dufu, kʼabo le̩ ki mʼoji e̩wñ ku ma kalata-wñ.

Oñ Nihe̩maya kʼi chʼigo̩bina kpai E̩zra atama ki chʼako̩takada kpai abo Lifai ku ma nʼo̩la ako amone̩ ka ñw amone̩ le̩ chaka kakini, Eñini-i chʼo̩je̩ kiafo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-me̩; me̩ ki daido̩ n, me̩ ki raku n. Todu amone̩ le̩ chaka kworaku e̩gba ku ma gbo̩ o̩la uko̩-o̩la le̩.

Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ lo, me̩ kwojʼula, me̩ ki ñmʼomi e̩rinyo̩, me̩ kʼukpe̩ abo ku ma ma ñwʼe̩wñ che todu ma n kpuche̩ rʼuma; todu eñini-i chʼo̩jo̩ kiafo̩ ñw Ondu-wa: e̩do̩-me̩ ki kpabie̩ n; todu uyo̩ Jihofa chʼukpahiu-me̩.
Abe̩le̩ abo Lifai fʼamone̩ le̩ du ba, ma kakini, Me̩ chechi, todu eñini-i chʼo̩jo̩ kiafo̩; e̩do̩-me̩ ki kpabie̩ n.
Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka le ma ku ma je̩ e̩wñ ku ma ñmʼomi ku ma la kʼukpe̩ ukpe̩ uje̩wñ le̩ kpuche̩ rʼabo kibo̩, ku ma yo̩ nana, todabu ku ma gbʼoji o̩la ku ma duka ñwu ma le̩.
Tak o̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amone̩ le̩ chaka kpʼamatama manyʼabo Lifai jeju jʼugbo E̩zra, ako̩takada le̩, todu ku ma ki netirʼo̩la uko̩-o̩la le̩.
Taku ma fuli ka ku ma ko̩ nyʼef uko̩-o̩la le̩ alu ki Jihofa ñwate̩ lugbo Mose̩s ka ki dukpe̩ kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l ku ma gugu ef ebu ebu iko uje̩wñ uyo̩ e-ochu e̩kebie,

ku ma mʼu du kpogo ku ma gbo̩ ef ewo ewo-ma chaka, kpai Je̩rusale̩m, kakini, Me̩ dufu nyʼugbo uwo le̩, ku me̩ mʼe̩to̩ o̩lif ko wa, kpai e̩to̩ o̩lif e-efoko̩, kpai e̩to̩ oli Mirtal kpai ima oli oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ kpai e̩to̩ oli ki nʼidu, ku me̩ mʼebu ebu alu ku ma ko̩tane̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ amone̩ le̩ le dufu, oñ ma mʼu ko wa amʼebu ebu ñw o̩la-ma, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ fʼe̩bu-wñ mu oj unyi-wñ kpai ef ologbo-wñ kpai ef ologbo unyi O̩jo̩ kpai ugbo̩da Alaku Omi kpai ugbo̩da Alaku Ifraim.
Tak abujeju ku ma mudabi kwʼef amu le̩ chaka fʼebu mu, oñ ma kwogugu ef ebu; todu Israe̩l che abe̩le̩ akwʼiko Jo̩shua o̩ma Nun gbogbo wʼiko kʼa ka-i n. Tak uyo̩ inaina tinyo̩ o̩mo̩.

O̩jo̩ ñwa o̩jo̩ ñwa akwʼo̩jo̩ ejodudu-wñ gbogbo tʼo̩jo̩ otitala-wñ i ño̩ nʼo̩takada uko̩-o̩la O̩jo̩ achʼo̩kalatu. Ma la fʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ le̩ de o̩jo̩ mebie, tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ chʼujeju eju e̩kpa alu kʼuhio̩me̩-wñ de̩.
Oñ o̩jo̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ ochu-i amo̩ma Israe̩l fʼalu ji, ajeju jo̩, e̩gba-nukpo dʼo̩la-ma oñ ma gbʼebutu nyʼo̩la.
Amugbe̩ Israe̩l la fʼo̩la-ma daru bʼabo ononojo du te̩, oñ ma dago agbalu adure-ma, kpai udu kʼamata-ma fe̩.
Taku ma kwo̩dago jʼe̩gu-ma, oñ ma chʼo̩kalatu ef o̩takada uko̩-o̩la Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma ukpe̩re̩le̩ o̩jo̩ʼka; ukpe̩re̩le̩ʼka ma jʼagbalu le̩, ma la ño̩ dojikane̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma.
Taku Je̩shua kpai Bani kpai Kadmie̩l kpai She̩banaya kpai Buni kpai She̩re̩baya kpai Bani kpai Che̩nani dago jʼoji ubo̩ ugbo kʼabo Lifai ate̩gu le̩, oñ ma chʼomu nyate̩ kwado̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma.

Tak abo Lifai le̩. Je̩shua kpai Kadmie̩l kpai Bani kpai Hashabneya kpai She̩re̩baya kpai Hodaya kpai She̩banaya kpai Petahaya, kakini, Kwane̩ ku me̩ keli Jihofa kʼi chʼO̩jo-me̩ kwo ogbegbe-le̩ nyʼogbegbele̩; ama ki kele odu-we̩ e-ojima ki dʼatate̩ ñw ele eka du kpai uñwulo̩.

Uwe̩ che Jihofa, owñ chʼuwe̩ kate; uwe̩ fʼefojale che, owñ chʼefojale e-efojale le̩, manyʼuwewe e̩wñ-ma du, ane̩-ile̩ kpai e̩wñ du ki jʼoji-wñ, ohimini ohimini kpai e̩wñ du ki jʼef uwñ, uwe̩ la adejute̩ ma chaka; ame̩wñ efojale du la adojikane̩ ñw e̩.
Uwe̩ che Jihofa, O̩jo̩ ki chi Ebram, kʼe̩ la dʼu kwef Ur e-abo Kaldia dufu, kʼe̩ la dʼodu Ebraham ñw u;

kʼe̩ li alu kʼe̩do̩-wñ de̩ kpaka o̩gba-we̩. E̩ la fʼalo kpe̩ kpai owñ kʼuwe̩ adʼane̩ abo Kenan kpai e-abo He̩t kpai e-abo Amo̩r kpai e-abo Pe̩re̩z kpai e-abo Je̩bius kpai e-abo Girgash ñw ugbe̩-wñ, e̩ laño̩ che teju o̩la-we̩ kpa; tod uwe̩ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa.
Uwe̩ la li o̩bata amata-wa Ijipti, oñ e̩ gbo̩ ukwa-ma etʼOhimini Ekpikpa le̩.
Uwe̩ la dʼujiwe kpai uno̩ ñe̩ña abʼiFero kpai amadu-wñ du kpai abo ojane̩-wñ du ma; todu uwe̩ ma ku ma ñwo̩ ñwu ma. Oñ e̩ fʼodu ne̩ ñw o̩la-we̩, alu kʼi de̩ eñini-i.
Uwe̩ la fʼohimini kpana o̩gba-ma, todabe̩le̩ ma le ane̩ e̩gbe̩ gu alumeji ohimini le̩ du; uwe̩ la mʼabo ku ma nʼuma ule koʼri-kpolo jʼef unefu-wñ, alu ku ma dʼokuta ro̩ tef omi ki nana.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, uwe̩ dʼef akpa ki dago waala le̩ ane̩ ma le o̩ro̩ka; uwe̩ la dʼef una ki dago waala odu, kʼe̩ dʼugane̩ ñwu ma o̩na ugbo ki dukpe̩ ku ma ale.
Uwe̩ ño̩ gwo̩ru wʼoji uwo Sainai, oñ e̩ ko̩la ñwu ma kwʼefojale. E̩ laño̩ mʼo̩la oji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa kpai uko̩-o̩la ochochi kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ ki nyo̩ kpai uko̩ uko̩ ko ñwu ma,
e̩ laño̩ je̩ ñwu ma ma o̩jo̩-uñmi-we̩ kiafo̩, e̩ fʼuko̩ uko̩ kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kpai uko̩-o̩la ñwa ñwu ma lugbo Mose̩s adu-we̩ le̩.

Uwe̩ la dʼuje̩wñ kwʼefojale ñwu ma tod ebi ki kpa ma. E̩ la dʼomiofo kwef okuta wa ñwu ma tod alugbe̩ ki akpa ma. Tak e̩ ka ñwu ma ku ma nyʼo̩mo̩ ku ma gba ane̩ e-kʼe̩ dʼo̩wo̩ nyʼate̩ ka kʼe̩ du ñwu ma le̩.
Ama kpai amata-wa muda kwoñwo̩, ma la fʼo̩lo̩-ma lo dago, ma la netiru uko̩ kʼe̩ te̩ ñwu ma le̩ n;

ma la ko̩ egbagbo̩. Ma la dibetʼe̩wñ uno̩-we̩ kʼe̩ che ef uma n. Ma muda fʼo̩lo̩-ma lo dago. Oñ ef eko̩ ku ma kʼuwe̩ le̩ ma fʼone̩ chi kʼi chʼagboji-ma ku ma dabi tef adu-ma. Uwe̩ muda chʼO̩jo̩ kʼi atʼo̩la no̩; e̩ li one̩ eju, e̩nejumomi kʼe̩ ma hika we̩do̩ n e̩ che. Ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ chʼololo, oñ e̩ ma hi uma rinyo̩ n.
Ochochi, e̩gba ku ma fʼo̩mokuno̩ da ñw o̩la-ma, ku ma la kakini, O̩jo̩-we̩ ki dʼuwe̩ kwef Ijipti wa le̩ de̩, ku ma la fʼe̩wñ achakpabie̩ che nana;

i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ejumomi-we̩ ki chʼololo le̩ je̩ ñwʼe̩ hiʼuma rinyo̩ ef aje̩tachi n; akpa ki dago waala ki ane̩ ma mʼo̩na le̩ la kwo bʼuma oji te̩ o̩ro̩ka n, kpai una ki dago waala odu ki dʼugane̩ ñwu ma ki ña ma o̩na ugbo ki dukpe̩ ku ma ale.
Uwe̩ ño̩ dʼAfu-we̩ ki nyo̩ wa kʼi ko̩ ma e̩wñ. E̩ la gwo̩nyu mana-we̩ wʼubi bʼuma alu te̩ n. Oñ e̩ dʼomi ñwu ma tod alugbe̩.
Ochochi, e̩ gba ma nyi ef aje̩tachi le̩ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, e̩wñ du ña ma n; e̩wñ o̩la-ma gbo n, e̩re̩-ma la wu n.
Noji e-le̩ uwe̩ ño̩ mʼojane̩ ojane̩ kpʼamone̩ amone̩ ko ñwu ma. Oñ e̩ kpe̩ ñwu ma gbogbo kad ago̩go̩-wñ me̩le̩; abe̩le̩ ma gbʼane̩ Si-ho̩n, owñ chʼane̩ onu He̩shbo̩n le̩, kpai ane̩ O̩g onu Beshan.
Uwe̩ ño̩ je̩ ñw amo̩ma-ma wewe dab awo ojale, tak e̩ ko ma wʼojane̩ e-kʼe̩ ka ñw amata-ma ka kʼama ki nyʼo̩mo̩ ku ma bʼuma gba.

Abe̩le̩ amo̩ma le̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ agbʼane̩ le̩. Uwe̩ la fʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩ le̩ du o̩gba-ma, owñ chʼabo Kenan. E̩ la mʼabo le̩ manyʼamonu-ma kpai amone̩ ane̩ le̩ ko nyʼuma o̩wo̩, kʼama ki che ma alu ki rʼuma eju.

Ma la mʼewo ewo kʼi nʼaku kpai ane̩ uro̩je̩ gba. Taku ma fʼunyi unyi kʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ du che̩kʼef uwñ ne̩, kpai obuga ku ma gwa, uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai uche̩ oli o̩lif kpai oli ki are̩ro e̩kwute̩; abe̩le̩ ma fʼe̩wñ je̩, efu-ma la ko̩, oñ ma yoyo. Oñ ma kwoyo̩ ñw e̩nyo̩-we̩ ki chʼololo le̩.

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma ko̩ egbagbo̩ oñ ma lañu rʼe̩, ma la dʼuko̩-o̩la-we̩ tinyo̩ ubi-ma; ma ño̩ kʼamakache̩-we̩, ku ma gbʼibenu nyʼuma ku ma rʼuma da dabiwa ñw e̩, kpa, ma la fʼe̩wñ achakpabie̩ che nana.

Todule̩ uwe̩ mʼuma ko nyʼabo ku ma kobʼuma o̩wo̩, oñ ma fʼuma de mane̩; tak iko o̩pe̩cha-ma e̩gba ku ma chane̩ ekwadʼuwe̩, uwe̩ dʼefojale agbo̩; oñ alu kʼejumomi-we̩ chʼololo ololo, uwe̩ kʼabo ku ma ajadu-ma ñwu ma oñ ma fʼuma jadu kwef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma kobʼuma.

Ama abu ku ma fʼuñmi ne̩, ma ño̩ chʼe̩bie̩ne̩ eju-we̩ ge̩; todule̩ e̩ tʼuma no̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-ma kʼama ki nʼo̩da-ma; ama e̩gba ku ma mudabi akwa dʼe̩ uwe̩ dʼefojale agbo̩; oñ e̩ gba ma o̩gbe̩nugbe̩ teju alu kʼejumomi-we̩ de̩.

E̩ la gbʼ ibenu nyʼuma todu kʼe̩ ño̩ ko ma dabi wa ef uko̩-o̩la-we̩ ge̩. Alu du ki de̩ ma kwoñwo̩, ma la netirʼuko̩ uko̩ kʼe̩ te̩ n, ma muda fʼo̩la oji ajo̩-we̩ dure, (owñ chʼe-kʼone̩ ache teju-wñ kʼi adeju ef uwñ le̩), oñ ma fʼika-ma gbe̩nyi, ma la fʼo̩lo̩-ma lo dago, ma ko̩ egbo̩la.
E̩ muda je̩ kpai ama o̩do̩ wewe, e̩ gbʼ ibenu nyʼuma lugbo Afu-we̩ lʼalu amakache̩-we̩; ma muda nyeti n: todule̩ e̩ mʼuma ko nyʼamone̩ ojane̩ ojane̩ o̩wo̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ tod ejumomi-we̩ ki chʼololo oñ e̩ ma kpʼuma lu likii n, e̩ la hiʼuma tinyo̩ n; todu uwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ ki ali one̩ eju kpai ejumomi.

Todule̩, O̩jo̩-wa, e-Inaina, e-ki gbiti, O̩jo̩ ki la abailo, kʼi ade alo kpai ufe̩de̩nyo̩, ihianyi du ki wa bʼawa kpʼamonu-wa kpʼamagboji-wa kpʼamata-ma-wa, kpʼamakache̩-wa kpʼamata-wa, kpʼamone̩-we̩-i du ma, akwʼiko amonu Asiria gbogbo tʼo̩jolu eñini ki de̩ re eju-we̩ n.
E̩ muda nʼo̩kpakpa ef e̩wñ du ki wa bʼuwa ma-i; todu uwe̩ te̩tache e̩wñ ochochi, ama awa muda che e̩wñ bibi.
Amonu-wa, kpʼamagboji-wa kpʼamatama-wa kpʼamata-wa la de uko̩-o̩la-we̩ n, ma la netirʼuko̩ uko̩-we̩, kpʼibenu kʼe̩ gba nyʼuma n.
Todu ma rʼe̩ ojane̩-ma n, kpʼef e̩nyo̩-we̩ inaina kʼe̩ du ñwu ma le̩ kpʼojane̩ lile ki arʼo̩je̩ kʼe̩ dute̩ ñwu ma le̩ n, ma la dʼubi gbʼuko̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩-ma le̩ n.
Go, amadu a che eñini-i; i la chʼe-ane̩ kʼe̩ du ñw amata-wa ku ma jʼe̩ro-wñ kpʼe̩nyo̩-wñ, go amadu a che jʼoji-wñ-i.
I la arʼo̩je̩ nana ñw amonu kʼe̩ ko jo̩ ku ma nʼo̩da-wa tod adure-wa; ma laño̩ anʼo̩da año̩la e-wa, kpʼame̩la-wa abe̩re̩me̩le̩; alu ki nyo̩ ma eju, o̩pe̩cha-wa la tabale.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ du, alo ogbolo oñ a akpe̩-i, a la akʼo nyʼo̩takada; oñ amagboji-wa, kpʼabo Lifai-wa kpai amatama-wa jo̩ abu kʼa hiʼuko̩-i.
Oñ abo ku ma fʼu hiuko̩ che Ni-he̩maya igo̩bina, kʼi chʼo̩ma Ha-kaiaya kpai Ze̩de̩kaya
kpai Se̩raya kpʼAzaraya kpai Je̩re̩maya
kpai Pash-hur kpʼAmaraya kpai Malkija
kpai Hatush kpai She̩banaya kpai Maluk
kpai Harim kpai Me̩re̩mo̩t kpʼObadaya
kpai Danie̩l kpai Gi-neto̩n kpai Baruk
kpai Me̩shulam kpʼAbija kpai Mijamin
kpai Maa-zaya kpai Bilgai kpai She̩maya; abʼe-le̩ chʼamatama.
Abo Lifai la jo̩-i: Je̩shua o̩ma Azanaya kpai Binui kʼi dʼef amo̩ma He̩nedad kpai Kadmie̩l
kpai amo̩maye-wñ, She̩banaya kpai Hodaya kpai Kelita kpai Pelaya kpai Hanan
kpai Maika kpai Rehob kpai Hashabaya
kpai Zakur kpai She̩re̩baya kpai Shebanaya
kpai Hodaya kpai Bani kpai Beninu.
Amagboji amone̩ jo̩-i; Paro̩sh kpai Pahatmo̩ab kpʼElam kpai Zatu kpai Bani
kpai Buni kpʼAzgad kpai Bebai
kpai Adonija kpai Bigfai kpʼAdin
kpai Ate̩r kpai He̩re̩-kaya kpʼAzur
kpai Hodaya kpai Hashum kpai Bezai
kpai Harif kpʼAnato̩t kpai Nobai
kpai Ma-gpiash, kpai Me̩shulam kpai Herir
kpai Me̩she̩zabel kpai Zedo̩k kpai Ja-dua
kpai Pe̩latiya kpai Hanan kpʼAnaya
kpai Hoshe̩ya kpai Hana-naya kpai Hashub
kpai Halo̩he̩sh kpai Pilha kpai Shobe̩k
kpai Re-hum kpai Hashabna kpai Maaseya,
kpʼAhiya kpai Hanan kpʼAnan
kpai Maluk kpai Harim kpai Beana.

Tak amone̩ ku ma bo̩, owñ che amatama kpʼabo Lifai kpʼamadalo̩na kpʼamakeli kpʼabo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩, kpʼabo du ku ma fʼo̩la-ma daru bʼamone̩ ojane̩ ojane̩ te̩ ñw uko̩-o̩la O̩jo̩, kpʼamo̩ya-ma kpʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼamo̩ma-ma onobule̩, e̩ne̩ du ki ma e̩wñ, kʼi la mʼoji e̩wñ,

ama le̩ manyʼamo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼabojima-ma, ma la fʼama na te̩ ñw o̩la-ma, oñ ma fugo̩ ka kʼama alule̩ teju uko̩-o̩la O̩jo̩, owñ chʼe-ku ma duwa lʼo̩wo̩ Mose̩s, adu O̩jo̩ le̩, kʼama la adejutʼo̩ ku ma ache uko̩ du ki Jihofa Ondu-wo te̩ kpai o̩la oji ajo̩-wñ kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ.
Ka kʼawa akʼamo̩ma-wa onobule̩ ñw abo ane̩ le̩ n, awa la agba amo̩ma-ma onobule̩ tod amo̩ma-wa e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n.

I la che̩wñ kʼabo ane̩ le̩ kʼe̩wñ eku abe̩k e̩wñ e̩yo̩ wa o̩jo̩ uñmi ku ma ta, awa jʼagba la o̩wo̩-ma o̩jo̩ uñmi kpai o̩jo̩ du kiafo̩ n; kʼa la ñʼatʼo̩do̩ e̩kebie o̩do̩ e̩kebie no̩ kʼane̩ ki ñmi kpai ome̩ du e̩gba.
A ño̩ fʼuko̩ te̩ ñw o̩la-wa ka kʼa abu ukpe̩re̩ta she̩ke̩l ñw o̩la-wa kʼa ra o̩do̩ o̩do̩ tod uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩-wa;

todu akala e-ku ma te̩ eju O̩jo̩, kpai todu e̩wñ ele ku ma duwa o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, kpai tod e̩wñ e̩gujo ku ma duwa o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ ge̩, tod o̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi, tod ochu etito̩ ochu etito̩, tod uje̩wñ uyo̩ ki chenʼadiko adiko le̩, kpai tod ame̩wñ kiafo̩, kpai tod e̩wñ ku ma duwa todu adure ku ma che e̩wñ e̩boma tod Israe̩l, kpai tod uko̩lo̩ du ef unyi O̩jo̩-wa.

Tak a fʼanya ro̩, owñ chʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai, kpʼame̩no̩talaka, tod iji eko-wa, kʼa kʼo wʼef unyi O̩jo̩-wa, teju alu kʼunyi unyi amata-wa de̩, iko iko ku ma da te̩, o̩do̩ o̩do̩, kʼama ki du kʼuna oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa, alu ku ma ko̩ nyʼo̩takada uko̩-o̩la le̩.
Kʼa ño̩ kʼe̩wñ ejo̩ga oko-wa kpai ejo̩ga e̩ro oli ojoji ojoji du, wʼunyi Jihofa o̩do̩ o̩do̩;

kpai amo̩mo̩gba-wa e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ alu ku ma ko̩ ef uko̩-o̩la le̩, kpʼamo̩mo̩gba amokuno̩-wa, kpʼame̩wño̩re̩-wa egini, kʼa kʼo wʼunyi O̩jo̩-wa, ugbo amatama ku ma che e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩-wa;

kʼa ki ño̩ kʼejo̩ga omu-wa kpʼe̩wñ kʼa ko ne ate̩ le̩ wa, kpʼe̩ro oli ojoji ojoji du, kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ kpʼekpo wa ñw amatama ef e̩ko̩da e̩ko̩da unyi ef unyi O̩jo̩-wa; kʼa ño̩ kʼukpe̩re̩gwa e̩wñ oko-wa ñw abo Lifai; todu ama le̩, owñ chʼabo Lifai, agba e̩wñ ukpe̩re̩gwa ewo ewo oj uche̩-wa du.
Oñ ata-ma kʼi chʼo̩ma Aro̩n adʼef abo Lifai e̩gba kʼabo Lifai agba e̩wñ ukpe̩re̩gwa le̩; tak abo Lifai ako ukpe̩gwa e̩wñ ukpe̩re̩gwa le̩ wʼunyi O̩jo̩-wa, ugbo e̩ko̩da unyi, ef akpulu.

Todu amo̩ma Israe̩l kpʼamo̩ma Lifai ako e̩wñ eduwa ku ma ko ne ate̩ kwef e̩wñ e̩yo̩ kpʼe-omi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ kpʼe-ekpo wʼef e̩ko̩da unyi unyi, ugbo kʼe̩wñ eku e-unyi kiafo̩ le̩ kpʼamatama ku ma che e̩wñ, kpai amadalo̩na, kpai amakeli jo̩; a ñʼahi unyi O̩jo̩-wa tinyo̩ n.
Oñ amagboji amone̩ le̩ dodo Je̩rusale̩m: abo kibo̩ la rʼanya ku ma dʼe̩ne̩ʼka e̩ne̩ʼka kwef one̩ me̩gwa one̩ me̩gwa wa dodo Je̩rusale̩m, ewo kiafo̩ le̩, oñ one̩ me̩la e̩la ajʼewo ewo kibo̩.
Tak amone̩ kadua ñwʼaboke̩le̩ du ku ma gʼe̩do̩la-ma ka kʼama awa dodo Je̩rusale̩m.

Oñ abo-i chʼamagboji ojane̩ le̩ ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m, i muda chʼe-ewo ewo Juda, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ dodo ewo-wñ ugbo ane̩-wñ, abo Israe̩l, amatama kpai abo Lifai kpʼabo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ kpʼamo̩ma amadu So̩lo̩mo̩n.
Oñ amo̩ma Juda iche̩ka kpʼamo̩ma Be̩n-jamin iche̩ka dodo Je̩rusale̩m. E-amo̩ma Juda che: Ataya, o̩ma Uzaya, o̩ma Ze̩karaya, o̩ma Amaraya, o̩ma Shefataya, o̩ma Mahalale̩l ef amo̩ma Pe̩re̩z;
kpai Maaseya, o̩ma Baruk, o̩ma Kol-hoze, o̩ma Hazaya, o̩ma Ada-ya, o̩ma Joiarib, o̩ma Ze̩karaya, o̩ma e̩ne̩ Shilo̩n le̩.
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Pe̩re̩z du ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m chʼone̩ kpaka ulo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩jo̩.
Abo-i la chʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-Be̩njamin: Salu o̩ma Me̩shulam, o̩ma Joe̩d, o̩ma Pe̩daya, o̩ma Kolaya, o̩ma Maaseya, o̩ma Itie̩l, o̩ma Je̩shaya.
Oñ ubi-wñ che Gabai kpai Salai, chʼicham nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩jo̩.
Oñ Joe̩l, o̩ma Zikri, chʼe̩ne̩ ki ago uko̩lo̩-ma; Juda, o̩ma Hasenua la chʼe̩ne̩ ekeji ki nʼo̩da ewo le̩.
Amatama che: Je̩daya, o̩ma Joiarib kpai Jachin;
Se̩raya, o̩ma Hilkaya, o̩ma Me̩shulam, o̩ma Zedo̩k, o̩ma Me̩rayo̩t, o̩ma Ahitub chʼe̩nu-to̩gba unyi O̩jo̩,
kpai amo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ unyi le̩, chʼicham nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ nyoke meji; kpʼAdaya, o̩ma Jeroham, o̩ma Pelalaya, o̩ma Amzi, o̩ma Ze̩karaya, o̩ma Pashur, o̩ma Malkija
kpai amo̩maye-wñ, ku ma chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata chʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyoke meji; kpai Amash-sai, o̩ma Azare̩l, o̩ma Azai, o̩ma Me̩shilemo̩t, o̩ma Ime̩r
kpai amo̩maye-ma ku ma chʼamagbiti ku ma de̩ kpaka chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke me̩jo̩; oñ e̩ne̩ ki ago ma che Zabdie̩l, o̩ma Hagedolim.
Oñ e-abo Lifai che: She̩maya, o̩ma Hasshub, o̩ma Azraikara, o̩ma Hasliabaya, o̩ma Buni,
kpai Sha-betai kpai Jozabad, ama le̩ jʼef amagboji abo Lifai ku ma nʼeju edute̩ uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ ej o̩do̩da;
kpai Matanaya o̩ma Maika, o̩ma Zabdi, o̩ma Esaf, kʼi chʼe̩nuto̩gba kʼi ago̩gbo-do̩ ef adua, kpai Bakbukaya, ki chʼe̩ne̩ ekeji ef amo̩maye-wñ, kpai Abda, o̩ma Shamua, o̩ma Galal, o̩ma Jedutun.
Aluka abo Lifai ku ma jʼef ewo kiafo̩ le̩ chʼone̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ me̩le̩ nyoke me̩le̩.
Oñ amadalo̩na che: Akub kpai Talmo̩n kpai amo̩maye-ma ku ma dide alaku chʼone̩ o̩gbo̩lo̩ me̩jo̩ nyoke me̩gweji.
Oñabo Israe̩l ki bo̩; e-amatama ku ma chʼabo Lifai jʼewo ewo Juda du, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ dʼugbo e̩wñ ogu-wñ.
Ama abo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ dodo Ofe̩l; oñ Ziha kpai Gishpa nʼo̩da abo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki ago abo Lifai Je̩rusale̩m che Uzi o̩ma Bani, o̩ma Hasha-baya, o̩ma Matanaya, o̩ma Maika, ef amo̩ma Esaf, amakeli le̩ ku ma nʼo̩da uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩.
Todu i nʼuko̩ kʼonu te̩ todu ma. I nʼukpe̩ kʼi ñwate̩ tod amakeli alu kʼi achʼeku ñwu ma o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa.
Oñ Pe̩tahaya, o̩ma Me̩she̩zabe̩l, ef amo̩ma Ze̩ra, o̩ma Juda, dago akolo onu tod o̩la du kʼamone̩-wñ ko wa.
