I la chʼe-ikpo unyi ikpo unyi kpai ojoko ojoko-wñ, amo̩ma Juda iche̩ka dodo Kiriat-arba kpai adogbe-wñ, kpai Dibo̩n kpai adogbe-wñ, kpai Je̩kabzee̩l kpai ikpo unyi-wñ ikpo unyi-wñ ge̩,
kpai Jeshua kpai Molada kpai Be̩tpele̩t,
kpai Hazar-shual kpai Birshiba kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ,
kpai Ziklag, kpai Me̩ko̩na kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ,
kpai En-Ri-mo̩n kpai Zora kpai Jarmut,
Za-no̩ah kpai Adulam kpai ikpo unyi ikpo unyi e-ma, Lakish kpai ojoko ojoko-wñ. Arika kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ. Abe̩le̩ ma kworujo̩ akwo Birshiba gbogbo wa o̩go̩ Hinom.
Amo̩ma Be̩njamin laño̩ jo̩ akwo Geba, ugbo Mikmash kpai Aija kpai Be̩te̩l kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ
kpai Anato̩t kpai Nob kpʼAnanaya
kpai Ha-zor kpai Ramah kpai Gitaim
kpai Hadid kpai Zeboim kpai Nebalat
kpai Lod kpai Ono, o̩go̩ amo̩ka uko̩lo̩ le̩.
Uche̩ abo Lifai okʼoka la manyu Be̩njamin ojane̩ Juda.
Oñ abo-i chʼamatama kpai abo Lifai ku ma te̩gu lebo̩ Zerubabe̩l, o̩ma Shealtie̩l, kpai Je̩shua: Se̩raya kpai Je̩re̩maya kpai Ezra,
Amara-ya kpai Maluk kpai Hattush
kpai Shekanaya kpai Rehum kpai Me̩re̩mat
kpai Ido kpai Gineto̩i kpai Abija
kpai Mijamin kpai Maadaya kpai Bilga
kpai Shemaya kpai Joiarib kpai Je̩daya
kpai Salu kpai Amo̩k kpai Hilkaya kpai Je̩daya. Abo-i chʼabo ki tʼo̩gba ef amatama kpai amo̩maye-ma iko Je̩shua.
Oñ abo Lifai che: Je̩shua kpai Binui kpai Kadmie̩l kpai She̩re̩baya kpai Juda kpai Matanaya, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ ki to̩gba ugwa egwa, owñ kpai amo̩maye-wñ.
Bakbukaya kpai Uno amo̩maye-ma ño̩ jo̩ kpe̩nyʼuma alu kʼugugu uko̩lo̩-ma de̩.
Je̩shua la bi Joiakim, Joiakim la bi Eliashib, Eliashib la bi Joyada,
Joyada la bi Jonatan, Jonatan la bi Jadua.
Iko Joyakim amatama ku ma chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata la jʼo̩mo̩: e-Se̩raya, Me̩raya; e-Je̩re̩maya, Hananaya;
e-E̩zra, Me̩shulam; e-Amaraya, Jehohanan;
e-Maluk. Jonatan; e-Sbe̩banaya, Jose̩f;
e-Harim. Adna; e-Me̩rayo̩t, He̩lkai;
e-Ido, Ze̩karaya; e-Gineton, Me̩shulam;
e-Abija, Zikri; e-Miniamin, e-Moadaya, Piltai;
e-Bilga, Shamua; e-She̩maya, Je̩honatan;
oñ e-Joiarib, Matenai; e-Je̩daya, Uzi;
e-Salai, Kalai; e-Amo̩k, Ebe̩r;
e-Hilkaya, Hashabaya; e-Jedaya, Ne̩ta-ne̩l.
I chʼe-abo Lifai, iko Eliashib kpai Joyada kpai Johanan kpai Jadua, ma fʼodu abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata unyi ko̩ nyʼef ibuku; ma ño̩ kʼodu amatama nyʼu gbogbo taku Darius abo Pe̩rsia le̩ jʼo̩fe̩.
Ma ño̩ kʼodu amo̩ma Lifai ku ma chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef amata nyʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ gbogbo wʼiko Johanan o̩ma Eliashib.

Oñ abo ku ma tʼo̩gba ef abo Lifai che: Hashabaya kpai Se̩re̩baya kpai Je̩shua o̩ma Kadmie̩l, manyʼamo̩maye-ma ku ma jo̩ kpenyu ma, ku ma je̩nyu ku ma laño̩ gogbodo̩ alu ki Defid e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ fʼuko̩-wñ te̩, iko ide aro̩ne aro̩ne.
Matanaya kpai Bakbukaya kpʼObadaya kpai Me̩shu-lam kpai Talmo̩n kpʼAkub chʼamada-lo̩na ku ma nʼide akpulu akpulu alaku alaku ade.
Abo-i jʼo̩mo̩ iko Jo̩iakim o̩ma Je̩shua o̩ma Jozadak, kpai iko Nihe̩maya igo̩bina le̩, kpai e-Ezra ata-ma kʼi ño̩ chʼako̩takada le̩.

Oñ iko ku ma dʼaku Je̩rusale̩m ñw O̩jo̩, ma tejane̩ abo Lifai ugbo du ku ma jo̩ ku ma ko ma wa Je̩rusale̩m ku ma fʼedu te̩ ñw O̩jo̩ le̩ de kpai uyo̩, tʼugwa egwa, tʼeli eko̩, manyʼeicha kpai ubo̩ kpai umolo.
Tak amo̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ amakeli le̩ kʼo̩la-ma wa jo̩, tʼabo ku ma jʼegbili ki le Je̩rusale̩m daka, tʼabo ku ma jʼane̩ abo Ne̩tofat;
ma ño̩ kwo Be̩tgilgal wa, kpai kwo oko oko Geba kpai Azmafe̩t; todu amakeli le̩ fʼiga iga-ma bu le Je̩rusale̩m daka.
Tak amatama kpai abo Lifai fʼo̩la-ma gwo rinyo̩; ma ño̩ fʼo̩la amone̩ gwo rinyo̩ kpai alaku le̩ kpai o̩do̩-wñ.
Tak u mʼamagboji Juda ko wa jʼoj o̩do̩ le̩, u fʼuche̩ amone̩ chi jo̩ wewe ugbo meji, ku ma jo̩ agwugwa, ku ma nalule̩ tʼo̩la-ma ubi; uche̩ʼka lʼo̩j o̩do̩ ro̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ o̩wo̩ Alaku Ubioko.
Abo ku ma tʼuma ubi che Hoshaya kpai ukpe̩reji amagboji Juda
kpai Azaraya kpai E̩zra kpai Me̩shulam
kpai Juda kpai Be̩njamin kpai Shemaya kpai Je̩re̩maya,
kpai amo̩ma amatama iche̩ka kpai o̩kakachi-ma: Ze̩karaya o̩ma Jonatan, o̩ma Shemaya, o̩ma Matanaya, o̩ma Maikaya, o̩ma Zakur, o̩ma Esaf
kpai amo̩maye-wñ Shemaya kpai Azare̩l kpai Milali kpai Gi-lalai kpai Ma-ai kpai Ne̩tane̩l kpai Juda kpai Hanani, manyʼane̩ eli e-Defid e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩. Oñ E̩zra ako̩takada le̩ tʼuma o̩gba.
Ma le Alaku E̩bi omi tʼo̩gba-ma kpakpa, ma mute̩gu lʼubo̩ ewo Defid ugbo ku ma te̩gu aku ate̩ ñw unyi Defid le̩, gbogbo wʼAlaku Omi o̩wo̩ olodudu.
Tak uche̩-ma ekeji ku ma jʼagwugwa le do ma, omi la tʼuma ubi lʼoj o̩do̩ manyʼukpe̩reji amone̩ ate̩ ñw o̩do̩go̩ aido̩ aido le̩, gbogbo wʼugbo o̩do̩ ki nʼabe̩,
ate̩ ñw Alaku Ifraim ale gu Alaku Igbele le̩ du kpai Alaku E̩ja kpai o̩do̩go̩ Hanane̩l kpai o̩do̩go̩ Hamea, gbogbo wʼAlaku Ame̩wño̩re egini; oñ ma kwodago Alaku abo Ide.
Abe̩le̩ uche̩ amone̩ meji ku ma gwugwa ef unyi O̩jo̩, kpai omi, kpai ukpe̩reji amachimo̩la igobina manyʼumi dago jo̩;
manyʼE̩layakim kpai Maase̩ya kpai Miniamin kpai Maikaya kpʼElio̩enai kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Hanan-aya, ku ma chʼamatama ku ma nʼo̩ka-kachi;
kpai Maaseya kpai She̩-maya kpai E̩leaza kpʼUzi kpai Jehoha-nan kpai Malkija kpʼElam kpʼE̩ze̩r. Tak amakeli mʼeli da taa, manyu Je̩sra-haya kʼi adejutʼama.
Ma la mʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ inaina ko wa che o̩jo̩ le̩, ma la yo̩; todu O̩jo̩ je̩ ñwu ma nʼuyo̩ lile ayo̩; tak abobule̩ kpʼabimo̩to̩ ño̩ yo̩ ge̩; abe̩le̩ ma gbʼekuku uyo̩ ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m o̩najiji.

Ma laño̩ chi aboke̩le̩ ku ma nʼo̩da unyi unyi o̩pata ugbo ku ma kʼe̩wñ akoko jo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, tod e̩wñ eduwa ku ma ko ne ate̩ le̩ kpʼe̩wñ ejo̩ga kpʼukpe̩re̩-gwa e̩wñ, ku ma ko ukpe̩ kʼo̩lo̩da ñwate̩ kwef uche̩ ewo ewo tod amatama kpai abo Lifai wa jʼef uwñ; todu abo Juda nayo ñw amatama kpai abo Lifai ku ma dago jo̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma fe̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ ñwa ñwu ma de, kpai ide egwo̩la rinyo̩; amakeli kpai amadalo̩na ño̩ che alu ki Defid kpai o̩ma-wñ So̩lo̩mo̩n fʼuko̩-wñ te̩.
Todu iko Defid kpai Esaf igbele igbele ame̩nuto̩gba amakeli do̩mo̩, kpai eli uñwulo̩ O̩jo̩, kpai eli O̩jo̩ egogbodʼo̩.

Abe̩le̩ iko Zeru-babe̩l, kpʼiko Nihe̩maya, abo Israe̩l chaka kʼukpe̩ ukpe̩ amakeli kpai amadalo̩na wa, o̩jo̩ ñw o̩jo̩ ñwa alu ki abʼeku-wñ jo̩, ma la fʼukpe̩ abo I ifai date̩ ojoji; tak abo I ifai fʼe-amo̩ma Aro̩n date̩.
O̩jo̩ le̩ ma fʼo̩kalatu ef o̩takada Mose̩s che kʼamone̩ ki gbo̩; oñ ma fuli abu ma korubutu o̩mo̩ ka kʼi dʼugbo kʼe̩ne̩ Amo̩n kpai e̩ne̩ Moab ki gudu wʼef ujeju O̩jo̩ ogbegbele̩ n;
todabu ku ma ma kʼuje̩wñ kpai omi wa ledo amo̩ma Israe̩l n, mu muda chʼo̩gu ñwu Belam tʼuma o̩la, kʼi nʼama ñwu ma; O̩jo̩-wa muda fʼama le̩ rida e̩nyo̩.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku ma gbo̩ o̩la o̩da le̩ ma fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma chʼe̩kpe̩gwa nyʼomune̩ le̩ chaka daru bʼabo Israe̩l te̩.
E̩gba ku ma ma chʼe-le̩ ta n, Eliashib atama, ku ma dʼo̩da ako̩da unyi e unyi O̩jo̩-wa ñw u, abu kʼi chʼefu Tobaya,

i fʼef unyi lile le̩ʼka ñwo̩che ñw u, owñ chʼef unyi ugbo ku ma te̩te̩ ko e̩wñ ele, kpai frankinse̩ns kpai e̩wñ eku kpai ukpe̩ e̩ke̩gwa e̩wñ e̩yo̩ kpai e-omi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ kpai e-ekpo̩ jo̩, owñ chʼe-ku ma fʼuko̩-wñ te̩ ñwu ma ku ma kowa tod abo Lifai kpai amakeli kpai amadalo̩na; manyʼe̩wñ eko ne ate̩ tod amatama ge̩.
Ama ef e-le̩ du, omi de̩ Je̩rusale̩m in; todu e̩gba kʼArtaze̩rksis onu Babilo̩n fʼo̩fe̩ je̩ o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke meji, omi nyʼugbo onu; tak abu kʼu nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ pe̩ u bi onu kʼi bʼiko ñwu mi
tak u lewa Je̩rusale̩m oñ u fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ kʼEliashib che todu Tobaya ma, owñ che̩ko̩da unyi kʼi ñwo̩che ñw u ef ologbo unyi O̩jo̩ le̩.
I la bie̩ne̩ eju-mi tabale; todule̩ u kʼane̩ Tobaya le̩ rikpolo kwef e̩ko̩da unyi le̩ dufu.
Tak u ñwa ñwu ma, oñ ma fʼef e̩ko̩da unyi unyi le̩ gworinyo̩; tak u mʼe̩wñ eku unyi O̩jo̩ le̩ ko dabiwa jʼo̩mo̩, manyu e̩wñ ele kpai frankinse̩ns ge̩.
Tak u li ka kʼama te̩takʼukpe̩ abo Lifai ñwu ma n; todabe̩le̩ abo Lifai kpai amakeli ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ le̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ra tʼoj oko-wñ.
Tak u ko bʼamachimo̩la igo̩bina, oñ u kakini, E̩wñ chi ku ma hi unyi O̩jo̩ tinyo̩? Tak u ko ma wa jo̩, oñ u ko ma jʼe̩gu-ma.
Tak abo Juda chaka kʼukpe̩-re̩gwa e̩wñ e̩yo̩ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ kpai ekpo wa ef o̩pata.

Tak u chi amadigede ku ma nʼo̩da o̩pata o̩pata le̩, ama che Shele̩maya kʼi chʼatama kpai Zedo̩k ako̩takada kpai Pe̩daya kʼi chʼabo Lifai, e̩ne̩ ki rone̩ ma la che Hanan o̩ma Zakur, o̩ma Mata-naya; todu ma fʼabo le̩ lo rʼabo ku ma chubi one̩, uko̩lo̩-ma la chʼe̩wñ ekpe̩ ñwamo̩maye-ma.
O O̩jo̩-mi, e̩ na-dibekado mi todu e̩wñ-i, e̩ ki la fʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ kʼu che tod unyi O̩jo̩-mi, kpai alu kʼu che ku ma dejutʼo̩, kpalu n.

Iko le̩ u fʼaboke̩le̩ Juda iche̩ka li abu ku ma jʼate̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ef agu-o̩ko̩lo̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi, ma la kʼoti oti e̩wñ e̩yo̩ wʼunyi, ma la kʼadu nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-ma ge̩; ma la ño̩ che abe̩le̩ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma onugo kpai e̩ro o̩gbaikolo̩ kpai adu ojoji ojoji du, oñ ma kʼe-le̩ wʼefu Je̩rusale̩m o̩jo̩ uñmi; oñ u gbʼibenu rʼuma oji o̩jo̩ ku ma nʼuje̩wñ wa ata.
Aboke̩le̩ Taya ño̩ dodo jʼo̩mo̩, ku ma la kʼe̩ja, kpai e̩wñ aja ojoji ojoji chaka wa, oñ ma kʼo̩ ta ñw amo̩ma Juda la o̩jo̩ uñmi kpai efu Je̩rusale̩m ge̩.
Tak u kobʼabo ojima Juda, oñ u ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩bie̩ne̩ e̩wñ me̩ che-i ku me̩fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi bie̩?
Ichʼabu kʼamata-me̩ che le̩ de̩ n? O̩jo̩-wa la kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩-i du bʼawa kpʼewo-i oji ma n? Me̩ la kʼuwe̩do̩ omune̩ wa abʼ Israe̩l oji ma lugbo o̩jo̩ uñmi ku me̩ jʼabie̩ ta.

Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼane̩ chane̩ erefu ugbo alaku Je̩rusale̩m kʼo̩jo̩ uñmi bo̩ o̩na, u ka ñwu ma ku ma fʼo̩na re, u ño̩ ka ñwu ma ku ma we ebi gbogbo tak o̩jo̩-uñmi ki lale. U ño̩ kʼabokolobia-mi iche̩ka gugu alaku alaku kʼone̩ ki we enʼadu gudu lʼo̩mo̩ wa o̩jo̩-uñmi.
Abe̩le̩ amachinyama kpai abo ku ma ta e̩wñ aja ojoji ojoji du rujo̩ ejo̩do̩-da Je̩rusale̩m onuʼka, abe̩k onu meji.
Tak u fʼibenu gba nyʼuma, oñ u ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ ru jʼo̩la o̩do̩-i? Me̩ fʼabe̩le̩ che e̩do̩mune̩ na gwo̩nyu me̩. Akwihi le̩ ma ño̩ wa o̩jo̩-uñmi ge̩ n.

Tak u ka ñw abo Lifai kʼama ki fʼo̩la-ma gwo̩rinyo̩, kʼama ki lewa de alaku alaku le̩, ku ma je̩ ñw o̩jo̩-uñmi ki fo̩. O O̩jo̩-mi, e̩ ki ño̩ dibekadʼele̩ ñwu mi ge̩, kʼe̩ chʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ ñwu mi teju alu kʼunana ufe̩de̩-nyo̩-we̩ de̩.
Iko le̩ u ño̩ fʼamaJu ku ma nʼabobule̩ Ashdo̩d kpai Amo̩n kpai Moab chʼo̩ya li;
ukpe̩reji amo̩ma-ma la kʼichi Ashdo̩d, ma la neke kʼichi amaju n, chai alu kʼichi e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ de̩.

Tak u kobʼuma, u la bʼuma ina, u la fʼabo-ma ki bo̩ gwo, oñ u gu uma iloji du, u la je̩ ñwu ma fʼO̩jo̩ go̩, kakini, Ame̩ ñʼakʼamo̩ma-me̩ onobule̩ ñw amo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, me̩ la agbʼamo̩ma-ma onobule̩ ñw amo̩ma-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, me̩ la agba ñw o̩la-me̩ n.

So̩lo̩mo̩n onu Israe̩l dure lugbo e̩wñ-i n? I muda nʼonu du ef abo uche̩ichi wewe kʼi dab owñ n, O̩jo̩-wñ fe̩do̩-wñ, oñ O̩jo̩ je̩ ñw u jʼonu abo Israe̩l du: ichaka dʼabe̩le̩ abobule̩ ononojo le̩ je̩ ñw owñ onugo dure.
Awa ñʼanetirʼe-me̩ kʼa fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ inaina-i du che, kʼa nʼabobule̩ ononojo chʼo̩ya kʼa fʼada O̩jo̩-wa je̩?
O̩ma Joyadaʼka kʼi chʼo̩ma Eliashib agboji amatama le̩, nʼo̩ma Sanbalat e̩ne̩ Horon le̩ chʼo̩ya; todule̩ u fʼu ne bʼo̩la-mi te̩.
O O̩jo̩-mi, e̩ nadibekado ma, todabu ku ma fʼuko̩lo̩ atama le̩ daji, ma la fʼalo amatama kpai e-abo Lifai bie̩.
Abe̩le u fʼama gwe̩ hiolo bʼe̩wñ ononojo du te̩, oñ u fʼe̩wñ ide-ma kpe̩ru ñw amatama kpai abo Lifai, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼuko̩lo̩ e-wñ;
kpai tod iji eko wa, iko iko ki chʼe̩date̩, kpai todu e̩wñ ejo̩ga. O O̩jo̩-mi, e̩ nadibekado e̩nyo̩ ñwu mi.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩kpanachi Ahasurus, (Ahasurus kide̩ chʼe-kʼo̩da onu-wñ te̩ kwo India gbogbo wʼltiopia, i nʼo̩da ojane̩ ojane̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke mebie),
oñ adiko le̩ onu Ahasurus gugu oj ede o̩fe̩-wñ kʼi dʼef unyi ku ma do̩ ko̩ Shushan,
o̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta kʼi jʼo̩fe̩ i fʼo̩te̩ hi ñw amagboji-wñ chaka kpai abuko̩lo̩-wñ, ukpahiu Pe̩rsia kpai Me̩dia, owñ chʼabo ku ma bi lʼeju O̩jo̩ kpai amagboji ojane̩ ojane̩ le̩, jʼo̩gba-wñ,
e̩gbale̩ i kʼe̩wñ akoko ojane̩-wñ ki nʼojima kpai anana e-ojima onu-wñ kʼi je̩ ña ma o̩jo̩ wewe, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩la.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ le̩ jo̩, onu fʼo̩te̩ hi ñw amone̩ du ku ma jʼef unyi ku ma do̩ ko̩ Shushan le̩, tʼabo ki nana, tʼabo e-kekele, o̩jo̩ mebie ma je̩ ologbo ugbo̩da unyi onu le̩.

Ma ne̩ line̩n ku ma hi reju chʼiku odufa ekpikpa fʼukpo efufu kpai emimi kpai odufa ji mʼelika ajifa kʼi ta nyʼoli ugbogaga ku ma nʼokuta e̩kina che. E̩wñ ugugu-wñ chʼo̩jamalia kpai ajifa, e-le̩ jʼoj ajita okuta ekpikpa kpai efufu kpai odo kpai edudu.
Ma dʼomi tef e̩wñ eku o̩jamalia ñwu ma ku ma ñmo̩, (e̩wñ eku le̩ chʼo̩la ojoji ojoji), omi e-onu la chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩ jo̩, alu kʼo̩wo̩ onu de̩.
Eñmo̩ ku ma ñmo̩ teju alu kʼo̩lo̩da je̩, i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi akutʼekeji-wñ kʼi ñmo̩ n, todu abu kʼonu du te̩ ñw amagboji unyi-wñ kʼama ki che alu ki nyo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ eju.
Fashti o̩ya onu ño̩ hi o̩te̩ ñw abobule̩-ma ef unyi onu e-kʼAhasurus onu le̩ ne̩.
O̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ e̩gba kʼe̩do̩ onu che̩bo̩ ñw omi, i ñwañwu Me̩human kpai Bizta kpai Harbona kpai Bigta kpai Abagta kpai Zeta kpai Karkas, amonoji mebie ku ma che e̩wñ eju Ahasurus onu,
kʼama ki du Fashti, o̩ya onu, wa o̩gba onu, kpai ike̩be̩ onu-wñ, kʼi ña amone̩ kpai amagboji alifia-wñ; todu i fe̩reju ego.
Ama Fashti, o̩ya onu, ko̩ ewa ef udo kʼonu kpʼamonoji dʼo̩ le̩. Todule̩ onu we̩do̩ tabale oñ e̩do̩fulu-wñ nabʼu je̩.
Tak onu ka ñw amanibe ku ma chema alu kʼe̩wñ de̩ iko le̩ (todu alu kʼonu te̩tache ugbo e̩ne̩ du kʼi ma oli o̩lo̩da kpai ajo̩ eka le̩ de̩,

abo ku ma ronʼowñ la che Karshena kpai Sheta kpai Admata kpai Tarshish kpai Me̩re̩s kpai Marsena kpai Me̩mukan, abo le̩ chʼamagboji mebie ojane̩ Pe̩rsia kpai Me̩dia ku ma ali eju onu, kʼugugu-ma tʼo̩gba ojane̩ le̩) kakini,
Abʼo̩lo̩da aje̩ ñw a che Fashti, o̩ya onu, abu kʼi ma che e̩wñ kʼonu Ahasurus ka lʼo̩wo̩ amonoji le̩ ni ta?
Taku Me̩mukan tohi o̩gba onu kpai amagboji le̩ kakini. I chʼonu kate oñ Fashti fʼudu-wñ n, i laño̩ che amagboji chaka kpo̩fo̩, kpai amone̩ du ku ma jʼojane̩ ojane̩ onu Ahasurus chaka ge̩.

Todu inabali e̩wñ kʼo̩ya onu che akpatuka rʼo̩do̩da tʼabobule̩ du eti ki je̩ ñw amo̩ko̩-ma ku ma ño̩ wʼuma eju ge̩ n, e̩gba ku ma du kpogo ka kʼonu ñwañwu ma ku ma du Fashti, o̩ya onu, wʼo̩gba-wñ, i la wa n.
Tak eñini ki de̩ abobule̩ aguchi Pe̩rsia kpai Me̩dia ku ma gbo̩ e̩wñ kʼo̩ya onu che-i ñʼaka ñw amagboji onu abe̩le̩ ge̩. Abe̩le̩ e̩de̩te̩ kpai uwe̩do̩ akpo̩rane̩.

I la che̩wñ ki chenyo̩ onu eju kʼi naje̩ ñw o̩la o̩daʼka ki dufu, ku ma ko̩ tef o̩lo̩da abo Pe̩rsia kpai Me̩dia todu kʼi we erida, ka ki Fashti ki ño̩ wʼo̩gba Ahasurus o-nu ogbegbele̩ ge̩ n; onu ki la kʼane̩ onu-wñ ñw e̩ne̩ omune̩ kʼi nyo̩ tʼowñ le.
Tak e̩gba kʼoji ajo̩ kʼonu aka le̩, e-kʼi adʼu kpogo ugbo du ojane̩-wñ (todu i tabale), amo̩ya chaka adojima ñw amo̩ko̩ e-ma, tʼabo ki nana tʼabo e-kekele.
Oñ o̩la le̩ nyo̩ onu kpai amagboji eju, tak onu che alu ku Me̩mukan ka;

todu i fʼo̩takada kpe̩ nyʼojane̩ ojane̩ onu chaka, e̩ko̩-wñ la dʼalu kʼorubutu ojane̩ ojane̩ de̩, i le tʼugbo amone̩ du alu kʼichi-ma de̩, kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi nanʼo̩da ef unyi e-wñ, kʼi nakʼo̩la alu kʼichi abo-wñ de̩.
Ubi e̩wñ le̩ ge̩, e̩gba kʼe̩do̩fulu onu Ahasurus nyi, i rewa Fashti, kpai e̩wñ kʼi che le̩, kpai oji ajo̩-wñ ku ma kpa.
Tak amachuko̩lo̩ onu ku ma che e̩wñ ñw u kakini, Je̩ ñwu ma tejane̩ abigbe̩le̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n ku ma chʼalifia ñw onu.

Onu ki la kʼamone̩ jo̩ ojane̩ ojane̩ du ugbo kʼoda-wñ te̩ kade ku ma tu, kʼama le̩ ki ko abigbe̩le̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n ku ma chʼalifia chaka wʼunyi onu ku ma do̩ ko̩ Shushan-i, tef unyi abobule̩ ku ma ko ma nyʼef o̩wo̩ Hegai, onoji onu kʼi ade abobule̩; kʼama ki ko e̩wñ ku ma ne̩ gwo̩la-ma rinyo̩ ñw ma.
Tak imo̩to̩ onobule̩ kʼi nyʼonu eju ki chʼiye unyi koji Fashti. Oñ e-kʼi ka-i nyo̩ onu eju, tak i fʼabe̩le̩ che.
Oñ e̩ne̩Juʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Mo̩rde̩kai dʼef unyi onu ku ma do̩ ko̩ Shushan le̩, owñ le̩ chʼo̩ma Jair kʼi chʼo̩ma Shimei, o̩ma Kish e̩ne̩ o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin oka,
ku ma mu du bi Je̩rusale̩m te̩ manyʼame̩namu ku ma ko lo kpai Je̩konaya onu Juda, owñ chʼabo ki Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n, mʼuma ño̩ le̩.

Owñ le̩ la ne̩ Hadasa o̩ma efu-wñʼka gba, owñ chʼE̩sta. Todu i nʼata n, i la nʼiye n; imo̩to̩ onobule̩ le̩ la chʼuto̩ eju, i chʼalifia, oñ e̩gba kʼata-wñ kpai iye-wñ leku Mo̩rde̩kai mʼowñ du chʼo̩ma-wñ onugo.

Abe̩le̩ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼo̩la onu kpai o̩da kʼi dute̩ tʼamone̩ eti kʼabimo̩to̩ abobule̩ wewe jeju jʼunyi Shushan, o̩wo̩ Hegai, ma laño̩ mʼE̩sta du wʼef unyi onu, tef o̩wo̩ Hegai kʼi ade abobule̩ le̩.

Oñ imo̩to̩ onobule̩ le̩ nyo̩ owñ eju; tak i chane̩ emo̩la ñw u; oñ i hika mʼe̩wñ kʼi ane̩ gwo̩la rinyo̩ ko ñw u piopio, manyʼe̩wñ ki chʼukpe̩-wñ, kpai abimo̩to̩ abobule̩ mebie ki chʼeju-wñ ku ma ko ñw u kwef abʼunyi onu. I la mʼowñ du manyʼabimo̩to̩-wñ mebie kwʼo̩mo̩ tʼuña ki nyo̩ tʼuma le ef unyi abobule̩.
E̩sta je̩ ñw ma ma abo ugbo kʼi che kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼefu-wñ n; todu Mo̩rde̩kai hiʼo owu kʼi we eje̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ma.
Oñ Mo̩rde̩kai nalule̩ o̩gba ologbo unyi abobule̩ le̩ o̩jo̩ du, kʼi ma alu kʼe-E̩sta de̩, kpai alu ku ma achʼo.

Oñ e̩gba kʼiko imo̩to̩ onobule̩ okoke le̩ jo̩ ku ma agudu nyʼugbo onu Ahasurus, owñ chʼabu ku ma fʼe̩wñ kʼo̩da ka che ñw abobule̩ le̩ ochu me̩gwe-ji, (todu alu kʼo̩jo̩ egwo̩la rinyo̩-ma ajo̩ de̩, ochu me̩fa ma nʼekpo mur che, oñ ochu me̩fa ma nʼe̩wñ ki akpo kpai e̩wñ ki bo̩ tod o̩la abobule̩ egworinyo̩ che).
Alu kʼimo̩to̩ awʼugbo onu abe̩le̩ ma kʼe̩wñ ki dʼe̩ e̩do̩ ñw u kʼi du le bʼowñ kwef unyi abobule̩ tef unyi onu.

E̩gba ane̩ i le, tak o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ i dabi tef unyi abobule̩ ekeji tef o̩wo̩ Shaashgaz, onoji onu kʼi ade ame̩ne̩nyi onu; tak i ño̩ wʼejefu ugbo onu ge̩ n, chai e̩gba kʼonu ayo̩ ñw u, ki la fʼodu-wñ do̩.

Oñ e̩gba kʼiko E̩sta, o̩ma Abihail, efu Mo̩rde̩kai kʼi mʼowñ du chʼo̩ma-wñ le̩, e̩gba kʼiko-wñ jo̩ kʼi nyʼejefu ugbo onu i tene e̩wñ du n, chai e̩wñ ku Hegai, onoji onu kʼi ade abobule̩, ka. Oñ abo du ku ma fʼeju dʼE̩sta li owñ eju.
Abe̩le̩ ma mʼE̩sta du wʼugbo onu Ahasurus ef unyi onu ochu e̩ke̩gwa, owñ chʼochu Tebe̩t, odo e̩kebie kʼi jʼo̩fe̩-wñ,
onu fe̩do̩ E̩sta tʼabobule̩ le̩ du le, i la liʼu eju, i la mʼo̩la ñw u tʼamigbe̩le̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n kibo̩ chaka le, abe̩le̩ i mʼike̩be̩ onu du dʼo oji oñ i dʼowñ chʼiye unyi koji Fashti,
tak onu fʼo̩te̩ lile hi ñw amagboji-wñ kpai abuko̩lo̩-wñ chaka; owñ chʼoko̩te̩ E̩sta. Oñ i fʼuñmiʼka da te̩ ñw ojane̩ ojane̩-wñ, i la mʼe̩wñ ko chʼele alu kʼo̩wo̩ onu-wñ tu.
Tak e̩gba ku ma kʼamigbe̩le̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n le̩ jeju onu keji, Mo̩rde̩kai gugu alaku onu.
E̩sta la je̩ ñw ma ma e̩ne̩ ki chʼefu-wñ kpai abo-wñ e̩gbale̩ ta n, alu ku Mo̩rde̩kai ñwañw u; todu E̩sta che e̩wñ ku Mo̩rde̩kai ñwañw u, alu kʼi che e̩gba kʼi dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ le̩.
Adiko le̩, abu ku Mo̩rde̩kai gugu alaku onu, amonoji onu meji, Bigtan kpai Te̩re̩sh kʼama jʼef abo ku ma de o̩na, we̩do̩ oñ ma che ku ma gwo̩nyʼonu Ahasurus.
Oñ o̩la le̩ muta tu Mo̩rde̩kai eti, owñ la dʼu ña E̩sta o̩ya onu le̩; oñ E̩sta mʼu du ka ñw onu ef odu Mo̩rde̩kai.
Tak e̩gba ku ma fʼili e̩wñ le̩ gwa, ku ma li ka kʼabe̩le̩ i de̩, ma kʼamameji le̩ lo̩ko̩li oj oli. Oñ ma dʼo̩la le̩ ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ eju onu le̩.
Ubi e̩wñ le̩ ge̩ onu Ahasurus mu Heman o̩ma Hamedata, e̩ne̩ Egag le̩, du nyo̩gba, oñ i mʼowñ du kwane̩, i hi uña ugugu-wñ tʼo̩gba ñw amagboji ku ma jʼugbo-wñ chaka.
Tak abuko̩lo̩ onu ku ma jʼef alaku onu chaka te̩kpe̩ ñw Heman, ma dojikane̩ ñw u; todu abu kʼonu ñwa ugbo-wñ le̩ de̩. Mo̩rde̩kai muda te̩kpe̩ n, i la dojikane̩ ñw u n.
Tak abuko̩lo̩ onu ku ma jʼef alaku le̩ ka ñw Mo̩rde̩kai kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ daba uko̩ kʼonu te̩ ta?
Oñ i lewatu, abu ku ma ko̩la ñw u o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa kʼi mala nyʼuma eti n, ma mudu ka ñw Heman, ku ma li abe̩k o̩la Mo̩rde̩kai adago abe̩k i adago n: todu e̩gbale̩ i ka ñwu ma kʼowñ chʼe̩ne̩Ju me̩.
Tak e̩gba ku Heman li ka ku Mo̩rde̩kai ma te̩kpe̩ n, kʼi ma la dojikane̩ ñw u n, e̩gbale̩ Heman che̩ko̩ ñw e̩do̩fulu.

Ama e̩de̩te̩-wñ je̩ ñw u do̩wo̩kado Morde̩kai kate n. Todu ama ka ñw u e̩ne̩ kʼabo Mo̩rde̩kai che e̩gbale̩ me̩; todule̩ Heman feju alu kʼi ale kʼi akpa amaJu ku ma jʼugbo du ojane̩ Ahasurus chaka, owñ chʼabo Mo̩rde̩kai le̩.

Ochu ejodudu, kʼi chʼochu Nisan, o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gweji kʼAhasurus jʼonu, ma fʼifa pur le̩ bo̩, owñ chʼanya ku ma ro̩, o̩gba Heman o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa, kpai ochu ochu gbogbo wʼochu e̩ke̩gweji, owñ chʼochu Adar.

Taka Heman ka ñw onu Ahasurus kakini, Amone̩ʼka do̩mo̩ ku ma chʼe̩kpatuka jo̩ ugbo tʼugbo du ef amone̩-i ojane̩ ojane̩ o̩fe̩-we̩ du; o̩lo̩da-ma chʼojoji ñw o̩lo̩da amone̩ du, ma la de o̩lo̩da onu-i n: todule̩ i dukpe̩ kʼonu aje̩ kpai ama n.

Iche̩wñ ki rʼonu eju, je̩ ñw ma fʼo̩takadaʼka ko̩ ku ma ki kpa ma rinyo̩; u la akʼo̩ko̩ ajifa tale̩nt icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa nyʼef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma nʼo̩da uko̩lo̩ onu le̩ ku ma ache, ku ma ko nyʼef unyi o̩ko̩ onu.
Tak onu mʼelika-wñ wo̩ bʼo̩wo̩-wñ te̩, oñ i mʼu du ñw Heman, o̩ma Hamedata, e̩ne̩ Egag, kʼi akobʼamaJu le̩.
Tak onu ka ñwu Heman kakini, U mʼajifa le̩ ko ñw e̩ me̩, kpai amone̩ le̩ ge̩, kʼe̩ che ma alu ki nyo̩ we̩ eju.

Taku ma fʼamako̩takada onu le̩ do̩ wa o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩ta ochu ejodudu, taku ma fʼo̩la ko̩ teju alu du ku Heman ñwa rʼamigo̩bina kpai amakomonu ku ma nʼo̩da ojane̩ ojane̩ du kpai amagboji amone̩ chaka, rʼojane̩ ojane̩ okoke du teju alu kʼo̩lubutu-wñ de̩, ma ko̩ rʼamone̩ ojoji ojoji chaka alu ichi e-ma; ma fʼu ko̩ ef odu onu Ahasurus, oñ ma nʼelika onu fʼu hiuko̩.

Oñ ma mʼo̩takada le̩ ko kpuche̩ lʼo̩wo̩ abo ku ma fule nyʼojane̩ ojane̩ onu le̩ chaka, ku ma fʼamaJu chaka chihi rinyo̩, ku ma kpa ma, ku ma je̩ ñwu ma lenyo̩ rʼane̩, tʼimo̩to̩, tʼogijo, tʼabimo̩to̩ egini, tʼabobule̩, o̩jo̩ okate, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩ta ochu e̩ke̩gweji, owñ chʼochu Adar, ku ma la mʼane̩-ma ko je̩.
E̩go̩ alu kʼolubutu le̩ de̩ ma mudute̩ kʼi chʼo̩da ojane̩ ojane̩ chaka, oñ ma mʼu du kpogo ugbo amone̩ du, ku ma ki fʼo̩la-ma mu jo̩ anede o̩jo̩ le̩.
Amonuche̩ onu le̩ fule rʼugbo du alu kʼonu ka. Ma laño̩ dʼo̩da le̩ ka dufu Shushan, unyi onu le̩. Tak onu kpai Heman kwoguguane̩ ku ma ñmʼomi; ama ibe abo̩ ewo Shushan dajugu nyʼomune̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku Mo̩rde̩kai fʼe̩wñ ku ma che le̩ chaka ma, Mo̩rde̩kai fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, oñ i kʼe̩gbanukpo nyʼo̩la kpai elulu, i la ledufu nyʼalumeji ewo le̩, oñ i fʼaku anyanyi ro̩ taa;
oñ i le gbogbo wʼo̩gba alaku onu, todu ma je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du kʼi nyʼe̩gbanukpo gudu alaku onu n.
Oñ ojane̩ ojane̩ okoke du ugbo du kʼo̩la onu kpai o̩da-wñ wa, edaido̩ lile lewatʼef amaJu o̩mo̩ kpai alu eji kpʼaku ero̩ kpai inaku eda. Amone̩ wewe la kʼe̩gbanukpo nyʼo̩la adachi ef elulu.
Tak abimo̩to̩ E̩sta kpʼamonoji-wñ lewa ka ñw u, tak e̩do̩ o̩ya onu le̩ kpabie̩ tabale̩; oñ i mʼe̩wñ o̩la ko kpuche̩-ru Mo̩rde̩kai, ku ma mʼe̩gbanukpo le̩ gba bʼowñ o̩la te̩, i muda gba n.
Tak E̩sta kpʼone̩ ado̩ Hatak, onoji onuʼka, e̩ne̩ kʼi du ñw u kʼi dejutʼowñ, oñ i ñwa-ñw u kʼi nyʼugbo Mo̩rde̩kai kʼi ma e̩wñ ki chʼoji-wñ kpai e̩wñ ki chi kʼi ache.
Abe̩le̩ Hatak ledufu nyʼoju-kpologu ewo le̩ ugbo Mo̩rde̩kai, owñ chʼe-ki dʼugbo̩da alaku onu le̩,
taku Mo̩rde̩kai mʼe̩wñ du ki chʼo du ka ñw u, kpai alʼonu kʼo̩ko̩ che kpa-kpa e-ku Heman ka kʼi ara ñw abo unyi o̩ko̩ onu todu amaJu le̩, kʼi fʼuma kpa rinyo̩.

I ño̩ dʼo̩takada e̩go̩ olubutu o̩da ku ma ko̩ le̩ ñw u, owñ chʼe-ku ma kpe̩ ñwu ma efu Shushan ku ma fʼuma kpa rinyo̩, kʼi dʼu ña E̩sta, kʼi laño̩ du ka jane̩ ñw u, kʼi ñwañw u kʼi nyʼejefu ugbo onu, kʼi gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩, kʼi biebi o̩gba-wñ tod amone̩-wñ.
Taku Hatak lewa dʼo̩la Mo̩rde̩kai ka ñwu E̩sta.
Tak E̩sta ko̩la ñwu Hatak, oñ i dʼalu kʼi aje̩ru Mo̩rde̩kai ka ñw u kakini,

Abuko̩lo̩ onu chaka, kpai amone̩ ojane̩ ojane̩ onu, chema ka kʼe̩ne̩ du abe̩k e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ kʼi gudu wʼef anuku, ki ma chedo̩ ma dʼo̩ n, o̩da todu-wñ chʼokate, kʼama ki mʼu du kpa, chai abo kʼonu adʼokute̩ o̩jamalia nadala ñwu ma kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ki deju. Onu la do̩ mi kʼu wʼejefu ugbo-wñ o̩jo̩ ogue̩gwa-i n.
Taku ma dʼo̩la E̩sta ka ñwu Mo̩rde̩kai.
Taku Mo̩rde̩kai ka ñwu ma ku ma mʼohi du dabi wa ñw E̩sta, kakini, E̩ ki kpibe ef e̩do̩-we̩ ka kʼuwe̩ afu tane̩ ef unyi onu le̩ tʼamaJu ki bo̩ le n.

Todu iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ chechi himm iko-i, mak e̩gbale̩ uñmi kpai ujadu akwane̩ ñw amaJu kwʼugbo omune̩, ama uwe̩ kpai abo unyi ata-we̩ alenyo̩; e̩ne̩ ma, ikani i chʼutodu e-le̩ oñ uwe̩ wʼugbo o̩fe̩ le̩ todu iko ki dʼabe̩i?
Tak E̩sta ka ñwu ma ku ma dabi dʼohi wa ñwu Mo̩rde̩kai kakini,

Lo, kʼe̩ fʼamaju chaka ku ma jo̩ Shushan do̩ jeju, ku me̩ fʼalu ji todu mi, me̩ ki la je̩ e̩wñ n, me̩ ki la ñmo̩ n gbogbo o̩jo̩ me̩ta, tʼodu tʼo̩ro̩ka. Omi onugo kpai abimo̩to̩-mi añʼajialu abe̩le̩ ge̩. Abe̩le̩ taku nanyʼejefu ugbo onu, alu kʼo̩da ma je̩ n le̩; iche̩wñ kʼoji-mi lenyo̩, mak u lenyo̩ ke.
Abe̩le̩ Mo̩rde̩kai le owñ, oñ i che teju alu du kʼE̩sta ñwa ñw u.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ, kʼE̩sta fʼo̩la onu-wñ mu, oñ i kwodago anuku unyi onu, e-ki me̩rʼunyi onu. Onu la gugu oj ede-wñ, ef unyi ugugu onu-wñ, ame̩rʼugbo ku ma gudu wʼef unyi le̩.
Tak abe̩le̩, e̩gba kʼonu fʼE̩sta, o̩ya onu li, kʼi dago anuku le̩, onu li owñ eju; tak onu fʼokute̩ o̩jamalia kʼi dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ nadala ñw u. Abe̩le̩ E̩sta te̩me̩rʼu, oñ i do̩wo̩kadʼoji okute̩ le̩.
Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ E̩sta, o̩ya onu? E̩wñ e̩ tene? Ma adu ñw e̩, i chaka chʼukpe̩-reji ojane̩-i.
Tak E̩sta kakini, Iche̩wñ ki chenyo̩ onu eju, onu kpai Heman ki wʼoko̩te̩ kʼomi ñwo̩che ñw u eñini-i.
Tak onu kakini, Je̩ ñwu Heman hio̩-wane̩ todu ki dʼalu kʼE̩sta ka-i. Abe̩le̩ onu kpai Heman lewa oko̩te̩ kʼE̩sta ñwo̩che te̩.
Tak onu ka ñw E̩sta ugbo oko̩te̩ le̩, kakini, E̩wñ chʼebi kʼe̩ bi ta? taku ma ad u ñw e̩; e̩wñ e̩ tene? I chaka chʼukpe̩reji ojane̩-i ma ache ñw e̩.
Tak E̩sta mʼohi du ñw u kakini, Ebi kʼu nabi, kpai e̩wñ kʼu natene de̩ kakini,
Iche̩wñ kʼonu li mi eju, kʼi la nyo̩ onu eju kʼi dʼebi kʼu nabi ñwu mi, kʼi laño̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼu natene, je̩ ñw onu kpai Heman wʼoko̩te̩ kʼu nañwo̩che todu ma; o̩na tak u nache alu kʼonu ka-i.
Taku Heman ledufu o̩jo̩ le̩ kpai uyo̩, e̩do̩-wñ la bo̩. Ama e̩gba ku Heman fu Mo̩rde̩kai li alaku onu, kʼi ma kwane̩ n, kʼi ma la gʼo̩la tod uwñ n, e̩do̩fulu Mo̩rde̩kai che̩ko̩ ef uwñ.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ Heman m ʼo̩la-wñ ne̩, oñ i le tʼunyi. Tak i kpuche̩ nakʼame̩nufe̩do̩-wñ kpai Ze̩re̩sh o̩ya-wñ wa.
Taku Heman da nʼo̩la ojima anana-wñ aka ñwu ma, kpai uwewe amo̩ma-wñ kpai e̩wñ du e-kʼonu dʼowñ nyo̩gba ef uwñ, kpai alu kʼi dʼowñ tʼo̩gba ñw amagboji kpai abuko̩lo̩ onu.
Heman ño̩ ka kakini, Ochochi E̩sta o̩ya onu le̩ je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du gudu wʼugbo okote̩ kʼi ñwo̩che te̩ kpai onu n, chai omi kate; i ño̩ do̩ mi kʼu wa o̩na manyʼonu ge̩.
E̩wñ-i du muda wʼumi eju, gbogbo abu kʼu nali ka ku Mo̩rde̩kai, e̩ne̩ Ju le̩, gugu alaku unyi onu n.

Taku Ze̩re̩sh, o̩ya-wñ, kpai ame̩nufe̩do̩-wñ chaka ka ñw u kakini, Je̩ ñwu ma dʼoli gwanyane̩ kʼo̩gba-wñ ki chʼohiba ooje, tak e̩ ko̩la ñw onu odudu kʼama ki du Mo̩rde̩kai kpa oku; tak e̩ lebʼonu nyʼoko̩te̩ le̩ kpai uyo̩. Oñ e-le̩ nyo̩ Heman eju; oñ i je̩ ñwu ma dʼoli le̩ gwanyane̩.
Odu o̩jo̩ le̩ eju onu gbe̩, oñ i ñwa-ñwu ma ku ma dʼo̩takada ku ma ko̩ o̩la e̩wñ du ki che iko iko akwoubi nyu wa. Taku ma fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che eju onu.

Oñ ma li abu ki che̩ko̩lubutu o̩mo̩ kakini, Mo̩rde̩kai mu Bigtana kpai Te̩re̩sh ofe tu. Ama chʼabo meji ku ma jʼef amonoji onu ku ma jʼef abo ku ma de alugbo̩na, ku ma la tene uña ku ma gwo̩nyʼonu Ahasurus o̩gbo̩gba le.
Tak onu kakmi. Ojima kpai ubumo̩ e̩wñ ma du ñwu Mo̩rde̩kai tod e̩wñ kʼi che-i taa? Tak abuko̩lo̩ onu ku ma che e̩wñ ñw u le̩ kakini, Ma che e̩wñ du ñw u n.
Tak onu kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼanuku o̩mo̩? E̩gbale̩ Heman lewa ef ologbo unyi onu kʼi ko̩la ñw onu ku ma du Mo̩rde̩kai kpa oku kʼi ñwo̩che tod uwñ me̩.
Tak abuko̩lo̩ onu ka ñw u kakini. Go, Heman dago ologbo o̩mo̩. Tak onu kakini, Je̩ ñw u muguduwa.
Abe̩le̩ Heman muguduwa. Tak onu ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ ma ache ñw e̩ne̩ kʼonu ayo̩ ñw u kʼi adʼojima ñw u ta? Oñ Heman ka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, E̩ne̩ oñ onu ayo̩ ñw u kʼi adʼojima ñw u tʼumi le?
Taku Heman ka ñw onu kakini, Todu e̩ne̩ kʼonu ayo̩ ñw u kʼi adʼojima ñw u
je̩ ñwu ma kʼotogbo onu kʼi te̩tanyi wa, kpai anya kʼonu atanʼo le̩, kʼo̩ke̩be̩ onu ki dʼoji-wñ;

tak ama ki kʼe̩wñ o̩la le̩ kpai anya le̩ nyʼagboji onu ku ma dʼojima ñw u tʼuma le o̩wo̩, taku ma ako nyʼe̩ne̩ kʼonu ayo̩ ñw u kʼi adʼojima ñw u le̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw u tanʼanya le̩ alule̩ ojukpologu ewo-i, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu ma takoya tʼo̩gba-wñ kakini, Abu ku ma che ñw e̩ne̩ kʼonu ayo̩ ñw u kʼi adʼojima ñw u le̩ de̩.
Tak onu ka ñwu Heman kakini, Hio̩wane̩, mʼe̩wñ o̩la le̩ kpai anya ko, alu kʼe̩ ka le̩, kʼe̩ fʼabe̩le̩ che ñwu Mo̩rde̩kai e̩ne̩Ju kʼi gugu alaku onu le̩. E̩ ki je̩ ñw e-du kʼe̩ ka le̩ ki chi n.

Taku Heman mʼe̩wñ o̩la le̩ kpai anya ko, oñ i kʼe̩wñ o̩la le̩ nyu Mo̩rde̩kai o̩la, oñ i je̩ ñw u tanʼanya le̩ alule̩ ojukpo-lo̩gu ef ewo le̩, i la natakoya o̩gba-wñ kakini, Abu ku ma che ñw e̩ne̩ kʼonu ayo̩ ñw u kʼi adʼojima ñw u le̩ de̩.
Taku Mo̩rde̩kai mudabiwʼala-ku onu ge̩. Heman muda hio̩wane̩ le tʼunyi-wñ. I nadaido̩, e̩wñ la bʼoji-wñ ma.

Taku Heman fʼe̩wñ du ki ke̩re̩bʼo̩ choli ñwu Ze̩re̩sh o̩ya-wñ kpai ame̩nufe̩do̩-wñ le̩ chaka. Tak ame̩no̩fili-wñ kpai Ze̩re̩sh, o̩ya-wñ, ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ ku Mo̩rde̩kai e-kʼuwe̩ chane̩ echʼo̩wo̩ wane̩ o̩gba-wñ le̩ chʼugbe̩ amaJu mak uwe̩ la adʼu n, e̩ la awane̩ o̩gba-wñ chuu.
Oñ abu ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ acholuka kpʼowñ, amonoji onu lewa, oñ ma naju edu Heman nyʼoko̩te̩ kʼE̩sta ñwo̩che le̩.
Abe̩le̩ onu kpai Heman lewa o̩ko̩te̩ kpai E̩sta o̩ya onu.
Tak onu ño̩ ka ñw E̩sta o̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ ugbo oko̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩, kakini, E̩wñ chʼebi kʼe̩ bi, o̩ya-mi, E̩sta? Ma la adʼu ñw e̩. E̩wñ e̩ tene? I chaka chʼukpe̩re̩ji ojane̩-mi, ma ache ñw e̩.
Tak E̩sta o̩ya onu dohi kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ li mi eju, O onu, kʼi la nyo̩ onu eju, i ki je̩ ñwu ma tʼoji-mi no̩ ñwu mi, ebi kʼu nabi-i; kpai oji abo-mi naño̩ tene ge̩.

Todu ma mʼuwa ko ta me̩, tʼomi, tʼabo-mi, ku ma kpa wa bie̩, ku ma fʼuwa kpa rinyo̩, kʼa lenyo̩. I la che̩wñ ku ma ma mʼuwa ko ta kʼa mud adu aboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩, omi ma chechi; ama e̩ne̩ ki akobʼuwa le̩ la neke dʼakoji ofu ki ma bʼonu-i ñw u n.
Tak onu Ahasurus ko̩la ñw E̩sta, o̩ya onu, kakini, E̩ne̩ de̩? ugbo e̩ne̩ le̩ de̩? e̩ne̩ ajʼ ibenu abe̩i?
Tak E̩sta kakini, E̩ne̩ ki ache wa o̩pe̩cha kpai e̩nebi ache! Owñ che Heman e̩nebie̩ne̩-i! Tak ailo fu Heman mu eju onu kpai eju o̩ya-wñ le̩.
Tak onu kwane̩ ke̩do̩fulu kwʼugbo oko̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ anyʼef uche̩ o̩la unyi onu; taku Heman kwane̩ dago kʼi bi oji-wñ ugbo E̩sta, o̩ya onu, todu i li ka kʼonu fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ñwa nyʼowñ me̩.

Tak onu dabi kwʼef uche̩ o̩la unyi onu wʼoko̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩, oñ Heman fiane̩ tʼoj ate̩ ugbo kʼE̩sta gugu; tak onu kakini, I ñ amʼo̩ya onu uja eju-mi, ef unyi-mi-i ge̩? Abu kʼo̩la le̩ kwʼef alu onu dufu ma dʼe̩wñ bʼeju Heman ma.

Taku Harbo-na, onojiʼka ki dʼo̩gba onu kakini, Go ge̩, oli kʼo̩gba-wñ chʼohiba ooje e-ku Heman che todu Mo̩rde̩kai kʼi ko̩la e̩nyo̩ ñw onu le̩, dago unyi Heman o̩mo̩. Tak onu kakini, Mʼowñ du lo̩ oji-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ ma mu Heman du lo̩ oj oku kʼi ñwo̩che te̩ todu Mo̩rde̩kai. Tak e̩do̩fulu onu nyi.
O̩jo̩ le̩ onu Ahasurus mʼunyi Heman, e̩ne̩ ki ako̩bʼamaJu le̩ ko ñw E̩sta o̩ya onu. Taki Mo̩rde̩kai lewa o̩gba onu, todu E̩sta mʼalu kʼagbagba-ma de̩ duka me̩;
tak onu mʼelika o̩wo̩-wñ gwo̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi gba bʼo̩wo̩ Heman te̩ oñ i mʼu du ñwu Mo̩rde̩kai. Tak E̩sta mʼo̩da unyi Heman le̩ du ñwu Mo̩rde̩kai.
Tak E̩sta ño̩ lewa bane̩ma ako̩la o̩gba onu ge̩, oñ i nʼomi aku agbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ku Heman e̩ne̩ Egag le̩ che kpachi, kpai eñwa kʼi ñwa nyʼamaJu le̩.
Tak onu fʼokute̩ o̩jamalia-wñ nadala ñw E̩sta, abe̩le̩ E̩sta kwane̩ oñ i kwodago o̩gba onu.

Tak i kakini, Iche̩wñ ki rʼonu e̩do̩, kʼonu la li mi eju, kʼe̩wñ le̩ la chʼo̩kpakpa eju onu, kʼomi la nyo̩ owñ eju, je̩ ñwu ma kʼo̩takada ku ma dʼo̩takada ku Heman o̩ma Hamedata, e̩ne̩ Egag le̩, ñwʼibe e-wñ nyʼu le̩ dabiwa, owñ chʼe-kʼi ko̩ kʼi fʼamaJu chaka ku ma jʼojane̩ ojane̩ onu chile̩che̩ le̩.
Todu abʼu nale kʼu na-je̩do̩ ugbo e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ki awa abʼabo-mi ma-i? Ab u nale kʼu naje̩do̩ ku ma fʼamefu-mi chile̩che̩ rinyo̩?
Tak onu Ahasurus ka ñw E̩sta, o̩ya onu kpai Mo̩rde̩kai e̩ne̩Ju le̩ kakini, Go, u mʼunyi Heman ko ñwu E̩sta me̩, ma la mʼowñ onugo du lo̩ oj oku le̩, todabu kʼi nʼo̩wo̩ dala akobʼamaJu.
Ame̩ onugo ki fʼo̩takada ko̩ tod amaJu ef odu onu alu ki nyʼume̩ eju, ku me̩ nʼelika onu fʼu hiuko̩; todu orubutu ku ma ko ef odu onu kʼama la nʼelika onu fʼu hiuko̩ e̩ne̩ du neke rida n.

Taku ma fʼamako̩takada onu do̩ wa iko le̩, owñ chʼochu e̩ke̩ta, ki ko̩ Sifan, o̩jo̩ ogu nyoke me̩ta-wñ; oñ ma fʼu ko̩ rʼe̩ne̩ du teju alu ku Mo̩rde̩kai ñwa ñw amaJu kpai amakomomu kpai amigobina kpai amagboji ojane̩ ojane̩, ku ma jo̩ akwʼIndia gbogbo wʼItiopia, owñ chʼojane̩ ojane̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke mebie, rʼojane̩ ojane̩ okoke alu kʼolubutu-wñ de̩, kpai amone̩ du alu kʼichi ichi-ma de̩, kpai amaJu alu kʼolubutu-ma de̩ kpai alu kʼichi-ma de̩ ge̩.

Oñ i fʼu ko̩ ef odu onu Ahasurus, tak i nʼelika onu fʼu hiuko̩, i la mʼu ko kpuche̩ lʼo̩wo̩ abo ku ma nʼanya, ku ma tanʼame̩la ki afule o̩me̩me̩le̩, ku ma ne̩ ache uko̩lo̩ onu, e-kʼo̩ko anya onu kpʼiye-ma.

Ef o̩takada le̩ onu dʼo̩da ñw amaJu ku ma jʼewo ewo chaka ku ma kʼo̩la-ma jeju wʼugbo kate, ku ma jadu oji-ma, ku ma kpʼe̩wñ bie̩, ku ma kpʼone̩, ku ma la che kʼukpahiu amone̩ kpai e-ojane̩ ki akobʼuma, tʼamo̩ma egini, tʼabobule̩-ma, kʼabo le̩ ki lenyo̩ bʼane̩ te̩, ku ma mʼane̩-ma ko je̩.
I bʼo̩jo̩ kate ñwu ma ojane̩ ojane̩ onu Ahasurus chaka, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩ta ochu e̩ke̩gweji, ki chʼochu Adar.

Todu kʼo̩la le̩ ki kpatuka rʼojane̩ okoke du, ma kʼo̩takada alu kʼolubutu le̩ de̩ kpe̩rʼamone̩ du, kʼi dʼo̩da ñw amaJu ku ma ño̩ fʼo̩la-ma mu jo̩ anede o̩jo̩ le̩, ku ma fʼache̩ o̩la-ma na ugbo ame̩nebi-ma.
Abe̩le̩ abo ku ma tanʼanya ki afule ku ma dʼu chʼuko̩lo̩ onu le̩ ledufu; o̩da kʼonu dute̩ le̩ nʼuma aju i la kʼuma e̩che̩; ma dʼo̩la le̩ dufu efu Shushan, unyi onu.
Taku Mo̩rde̩kai kwʼo̩gba onu ledufu, otogbo onu odufa kpai efufu dʼo̩la-wñ, ike̩be̩ o̩jamalia lile dʼoji-wñ, kpai afe̩ line̩n ku ma hi reju kpai odufa ekpikpa. Oñ abewo Shushan kwocho̩ga, ma la ayo̩.
Tak amaJu fʼugane̩ kpai e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ kpai uyo̩ kpai oji-ma ne̩.

Oñ ojane̩ ojane̩ du kpai ewo du ugbo du kʼeñwa kʼonu ñwa kpai o̩la-wñ le̩ lewa te̩, amaJu nʼe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ kpai uyo̩ kpai uje̩wñ uyo̩ kpai o̩jo̩ e̩nyo̩. Tak amone̩ wewe kwef abane̩ le̩ murida tef amaJu, todu ailo amaJu kwobʼuma ma.

Oñ ochu e̩ke̩gweji, owñ chʼochu Adar, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩ta ochu le̩, e̩gba kʼo̩da kʼonu ñwa kpai o̩la kʼi dute̩ me̩ru eche, o̩jo̩ kʼame̩nebi amaJu kibeno ka kʼama anʼo̩da-ma, (o̩la le̩ muda murida ojoji, oñ amaJu nʼo̩da abo ku ma chulaka ma,)
tak amaJu kʼo̩la-ma jeju jo̩ ewo ewo-ma ugbo du ojane̩ ojane̩ onu Ahasurus chaka, ku ma gwo̩nyʼabo ku ma tene eche ma e̩bie̩ne̩. E̩ne̩ du la bʼuma jo̩ n, todu ailo-ma kwobʼamone̩ du ma.
Oñ amagboji ojane̩ ojane̩ chaka, kpai amakomonu kpai amigobina kpai abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ onu, bʼamaʼJu che, todabu kʼailo Morde̩kai bʼumama.
Todu Mo̩rde̩kai chʼe̩ne̩lile ef unyi onu, uwohi-wñ le̩ dufu tʼojane̩ ojane̩ chaka; todu e̩ne̩ ku ma do̩ ko̩ Mo̩rde̩kai le̩ nanana alo waa.
Oñ amaju nʼo̩kwo̩chageli chaka kpai one̩ ekpa kpai echile̩che̩ gwʼame̩nebi-ma chaka dajane̩; oñ ma che abo ku ma chulaka ma e̩wñ du ki dʼuma e̩do̩.
Efu Shushan, unyi onu le̩, amaJu fʼone̩ oli me̩gwa kpa, ma fʼuma chile̩che̩,
manyu Parshandata kpai Dalfon kpai Aspata
kpai Porata kpai Adalia kpai Aridata
kpai Parmashta kpai Arisai kpai Aridai kpai Faizata.
Ma fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Heman o̩ma Hamedata, e̩ne̩ ki kobʼamaʼJu le̩ me̩gwa kpa; ma muda do̩wo̩-kadʼane̩-ma n.
O̩jo̩ le̩ ma ño̩ mʼaluka one̩ ku ma kpa efu Shushan unyi onu du ka ñw onu.

Tak onu ka ñw E̩sta o̩ya-wñ kakini, AmaJu fʼaboke̩le̩ oli me̩gwa kpa efu Shushan unyi onu-i, manyʼamo̩ma Heman me̩gwa le̩. Abu e-kʼuma che ojane̩ ojane̩ onu ki bo̩ ade̩? E̩wñ chʼebi kʼe̩ ñʼabi ge̩? Ma la adʼu ñw e̩. E̩wñ chʼe-kʼe̩ ñʼatene manyʼu ge̩? Ma la ache.
Tak E̩sta kakini, Iche̩wñ ki rʼonu e̩do̩, e̩ je̩ ñwu ma dʼo̩da ñw amaJu ku ma jo̩ Shushan ku ma ño̩ che alu kʼo̩da e-eñini de̩ o̩na ge̩. Kʼe̩ laño̩ je̩ ñw ma kʼamo̩ma Heman me̩gwa lo̩ko̩li oku le̩.
Tak onu ñwañwu ma ku ma fʼabe̩le̩ che, ma ño̩ dʼo̩da le̩ wʼane̩ Shushan; oñ ma kʼamo̩ma Heman me̩gwa le̩ lo̩ko̩li.
Tak amaJu ku ma jo̩ Shushan ño̩ kʼo̩la-ma jeju o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu Adar ge̩, oñ ma fʼaboke̩le̩ oli me̩fa kpa Shushan; ma muda do̩wo̩kadʼane̩-ma n.

Oñ amaJu ki bo̩ ku ma jʼojane̩ ojane̩ onu le̩kʼo̩la-ma jeju ku ma jadu ojima, taku ma nʼuñmi ugbo ame̩ne̩bi-ma, ma la kpʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ u-gbo e̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩lu kwef abo ku ma chʼulaka-ma; ma muda do̩wo̩kadʼane̩-ma n.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩ta ochu Adar ma che-i; taku ma kwoñmi o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩-wñ, oñ ma dʼu chʼojo uje̩wñ eje̩ kpai e̩do̩ e̩bo̩.
Ama amaju ku ma jo̩ Shushan kʼo̩la-ma jeju o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩ta-wñ kpai o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩-wñ; tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩-lu ochu le̩ ma ñmi, oñ ma mʼu du chʼo̩jo̩ uje̩wñ eje̩ kpai e̩do̩ e̩bo̩.
Todule̩ amaJu adogbe adogbe ku ma dodo ewo ewo ki ma nʼaku n, adʼo̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu Adar chʼo̩jo̩ e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ kpai uje̩wñ eje̩, kpai o̩jo̩ e̩nyo̩ ku ma kʼe̩wñ kpuche̩ rʼo̩la-ma.
Taku Mo̩rde̩kai fʼe̩wñ le̩ ko̩ rʼef o̩takada, oñ i mʼo̩takada le̩ ko kpuche̩ rʼamaJu chaka ku ma jʼojane̩ ojane̩ onu Ahasurus tʼabo ku ma me̩ru tʼabo ku ma jʼo̩najiji,
kʼi dʼu dago ñwu ma ku ma fʼo̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu Adar de, kpai o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu-wñ ge̩, o̩do̩ o̩do̩,

abu kʼi chʼo̩jo̩ kʼamaJu ñmi ñw ame̩nebi-ma, kpai ochu ku ma rida ñwu ma kwef e̩do̩dudu tef e̩do̩ e̩bo̩, kpai akwo edaido̩ tef o̩jo̩ e̩nyo̩; kʼama ki che kʼo̩jo̩ meji le̩ ki chʼo̩jo̩ uje̩wñ eje̩ kpai e-e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ kpai o̩jo̩ ku ma kʼe̩wñ kpuche̩ rʼo̩la-ma, kʼama ki chʼame̩nale ele.
Tak amaJu mʼu gba ku ma che alu ku ma chane̩ eche le̩, kpai alu ki Mo̩rde̩kai kʼo̩lubutu ñwu ma.

Todabu ku Heman o̩ma Hamedata, e̩ne̩ Egag, kʼi akobʼamaJu chaka, ñwa nyʼamaJu kʼi fʼuma kpabie̩ rinyo̩, kʼi laño̩ fu pur le̩ ro̩, owñ chʼifa-wñ kʼi abo̩, kʼi fʼuma lie̩, kʼi laño̩ fʼuma kpabie̩ rinyo̩;
ama e̩gba kʼo̩la le̩ lewʼo̩gba onu, i fuñwa ñwu ma lef o̩takada kʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ kʼi ñwa nyʼamaJu le̩ ki mudabi abʼoji-wñ onugo ma, ku ma ño̩ mʼowñ kpai amo̩ma-wñ ko kpa oku.
Todule̩ ma fʼodu o̩jo̩ meji le̩ do̩ ko̩ Purim, alu kʼodu pur de̩. Todule̩, tod o̩la ki dʼef o̩takada-i du, kpai e̩wñ du ku ma li ugbo e̩wñ-i, kpai e̩wñ ki wʼugbo ma le̩,

amaju mudu dago, ma mugba nʼo̩la-ma kpʼamugbe̩-ma kpʼabo du ku ma kʼo̩la-ma dama kpʼama oji, todu ki we enʼuda, kʼama ki de o̩jo̩ meji le̩ alu kʼolubutu-wñ de̩, alu kʼiko-wñ ku ma date̩ de̩ o̩do̩ o̩do̩,
kʼama ki rewa iko le̩ ku ma ki fʼu de gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-ma, o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu du, ojane̩ du, kpai ewo du, kʼo̩jo̩ Purim ki de̩ ki we̩ ekpachi ef amaJu, kʼure-wa-wñ ki we enʼuda ef amugbe̩-ma ge̩.
Tak E̩sta, o̩ya onu, kʼi chʼo̩ma Abihail, kpai Mo̩rde̩kai e̩ne̩Ju le̩, fʼo̩la ko̩ nyʼo̩takada kpaka adʼo̩la o̩takada Purim ekeji le̩ lonyane̩.
Abe̩le̩ i mʼo̩takada ko kpuche̩ rʼamaju chaka, ojane̩ ojane̩ onu Ahasurus o̩gbo̩ me̩fa nyoke mebie le̩, o̩la-wñ chʼure̩do̩ kpai e-ochochi,

ku ma ki fʼo̩jo̩ Purim le̩ lonyane̩ iko iko-wñ ki chʼe̩date̩ alu ku Mo̩rde̩kai e̩ne̩Ju le̩ kpai E̩sta, o̩ya onu, du dago ñwu ma kpai alu ku ma du dago ñw o̩la-ma kpai todu amugbe̩-ma ge̩, ugbo o̩la alueji kpai aku ku ma ro̩ le̩.
Oñ o̩la kʼE̩sta ka le̩ fʼe̩wñ Purim le̩ lonyane̩; taku ma fʼu ko̩ rʼef ibuku.
Oñ onu Ahasurus fʼe̩wñ ire̩ bu ñw abo ile̩ kpai abo oj e̩da e̩da ohimini.
Oñ e̩wñ kʼukpahiu-wñ che chaka, kpai ugbiti-wñ kpai o̩la unana Mo̩rde̩kai chaka, owñ chʼe-kʼonu dʼu nyʼo̩gba le̩, ama fʼe-le̩ ko̩ rʼef ibuku e̩wñ iko iko amonu Me̩dia kpai Pe̩rsia le̩ n?
Todu Mo̩rde̩kai, e̩ne̩Ju le̩, kpalu nʼonu Ahasurus, i laño̩ chʼe̩ne̩-lile ef amaJu, oñ o̩wo̩ amo̩maye-wñ jʼo̩la-wñ, i tene e̩nyo̩ abo-wñ, i ño̩ nʼo̩la ure̩do̩ aka ñw amugbe̩-wñ chaka.
E̩ne̩ʼka dʼane̩ Uz ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Job. E̩ne̩ le̩ mufu, i la chʼe̩no̩kpakpa, e̩ne̩ ki arailo O̩jo̩ i che, kʼi la dʼubi gbʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩.
Ma la fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mebie bi ñw u, kpʼamo̩ma onobule̩ me̩ta.

Ame̩wñukpa-wñ ño̩ che ame̩wño̩re̩ egini icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo mebie, aminyakulumi-wñ la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩ta, amoku-no̩ ejima ejima ku ma ne̩ lʼuche̩ chʼoli me̩gwa, ole o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ la chʼoli me̩gwa, amikono-wñ ño̩, wewe tabale; tod abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩-i chʼe̩ne̩ lile tʼamo̩ma olodudu le chaka.
Oñ amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ nahi uje̩wñ uyo̩ unyi e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ o̩jo̩ e-wñ. Taku ma fʼuche̩ kpe̩ adʼamo̩maye-ma onobule̩ wa ku ma je̩ ku ma ñmo̩ kpʼama.

Abe̩le̩ e̩gbakʼo̩jo̩ uje̩wñ-ma le̩ lewa de, Job fʼuche̩ kpe̩ afʼuma o̩la gwo rinyo̩. Tak i takpa kwane̩ odudu oñ i kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa che alu kʼuwewe-ma de̩; todu Job kakini, Ikani amo̩ma-mi dʼO̩jo̩ re, ku ma fʼakpabie̩ O̩jo̩ che ef e̩do̩-ma. Abe̩le̩ Job nache o̩ko̩kolo.
Oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ kʼamo̩ma O̩jo̩ lewa jʼo̩gba Jihofa, E̩nebi le̩ ño̩ wʼefu-ma.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw E̩nebi le̩ kakini, Ugbo e̩ kwo wa? Tak E̩nebi le̩ dohi ñwu Jihofa kakini, U kwo ale tʼemi tʼano̩mo̩ ile̩, kpʼalelo lewa efu-wñ.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw E̩nebi le̩ kakini, Uwe̩ fʼibe adu-mi Job lo me̩? Todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dab owñ ile̩ n; i nʼuchalu n, e̩no̩kpakpa i che, one̩ ki arailo O̩jo̩ kʼi la mubidagbʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ i che.
Tak E̩nebi le̩ dohi ñwu Jihofa kakini, Job arailo O̩jo̩ ofofo?
I chʼo̩gba e̩ bu nyʼu n, kpʼunyi-wñ, kpʼe̩wñ kʼi ne̩ daka n? Uwe̩ mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñwuko̩lo̩kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ache; ame̩wñukpa-wñ la nʼawo tabale oj ane̩ le̩.
Uwe̩ muda dʼo̩wo̩-we̩ dufu, kʼe̩ dʼu kado e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ tak i araire̩ we̩ eju-we̩ kpakpa.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw E̩nebi le̩ kakini, Go, e̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-we̩; chai owñ onugo oñ e̩ ma dʼo̩wo̩ akado n. Abe̩le̩ E̩nebi le̩ kwʼo̩gba Jihofa le dufu.
Oñ i lewa tʼo̩jo̩ʼka e̩gba kʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ jʼef unyi acho̩gba-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ajʼe̩wñ kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma eñmo̩,
onuche̩ʼka wʼugbo Job kakini, Amokuno̩ jo̩ aluche̩, oñ amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ jʼajije̩ ugbo ma o̩mo̩;
tak abo Sabe̩an bʼuma ma, oñ ma mʼuma ko le chaka; ochochi, ma nʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli kpa abokolobia; omi kate fʼuma o̩wo̩ oñ u wa ka ñw e̩-i.
Abu kʼi do̩mo̩ ako̩la ta, e̩ne̩ omune̩ ño̩ wa, oñ i kakini, Una O̩jo̩ ñwa kwʼefojale, i la fʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpʼabo okolobia lie̩ rinyo̩, omi kate la fʼuma o̩wo̩ oñ u wa ka ñw e̩-i.

Abu kʼi nako̩la ta, e̩ne̩ omune̩ ño̩ lewa, oñ i kakini, Abo̩ Kaldia mud uda me̩ta, oñ ma wa jakpa aminyakulumi; ma la mʼuma ko le. Ochochi, ma ño̩ nʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli kpa abokolobia; oñ omi kate fʼuma o̩wo̩, oñ u wa ka ñw e̩-i.
Abu kʼi do̩mo̩ ako̩la ta, e̩ne̩ omune̩ ño̩ lewa, oñ i kakini, Amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ jo̩ aje̩ e̩wñ añmʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma ef unyi acho̩gba-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩;
e̩ la go, afu ibi kwʼo̩wo̩ aje̩tachi wa, i lewa nʼago̩go̩ me̩le̩ unyi le̩, oñ i mulo̩ bʼabokolobia le̩ ma, oñ ma leku; omi kate la futane̩, oñ u wa ka ñw e̩-i.
Taku Job kwane̩ oñ i fʼotogbo-wñ fana, i la fʼoji-wñ la, tak i lewa bʼane̩ ma adojikane̩;
tak i kakini, Ago ofo oñ u ne̩ kwef iye-mi, ago ofo nadabi nyʼo̩mo̩ ge̩; Jihofa mʼu ko wa, Jihofa laño̩ mʼu ko le ge̩. Odu Jihofa ki nele.
Ef e̩wñ-i du Job dure n, i la gwunʼO̩jo̩ idada ofo n.
Oñ i ño̩ lewa che o̩jo̩ kʼamo̩ma e-O̩jo̩ lewa kʼo̩la-ma jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa, E̩nebi le̩ laño̩ lewa ef uma kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ wa o̩gba O̩jo̩ ge̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw E̩nebi le̩ kakini, Ugbo e̩ kwo wa? E̩ne̩bi le̩ la dohi ñwu Jihofa kakini, U kwo ale tʼemi tʼano̩mo̩ ile̩, kpai alelo lewa efu-wñ.

Taku Jihofa ka ñw E̩nebi le̩ kakini, Uwe̩ fʼibe adu-mi Job lo me̩? todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dab owñ ile̩ n, i nʼuchalu n, e̩no̩kpakpa i che; e̩ne̩ ki arailo O̩jo̩ kʼi la mubidagba e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ i che. I la agwo̩nyʼochochi-wñ ta, dagba e̩ chaka kʼumi e̩che̩ kʼu kobʼo̩, kʼu mʼu du mi tebitele ofo.
Tak E̩ne̩bi le̩ dohi ñwu Jihofa kakini, Año̩ koji año̩: e̩wñ du kʼone̩ ne̩ i adu jadu oji-wñ.
E̩ muda nʼo̩wo̩-we̩ dala kadʼachiku-wñ kpʼo̩re̩la-wñ, tak i abʼuwe̩ na eju-we̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw E̩nebi le̩ kakini, Go, owñ dʼef o̩wo̩-we̩; chai iñmi-wñ e̩ bu te̩.
Abe̩le̩ E̩ne̩bi le̩ kwʼo̩gba Jihofa le dufu, oñ i nʼikete̩ o̩ko̩ ki bie̩ne̩ kpa Job, akwʼadaba e̩re̩-wñ gbogbo tʼakpe̩te̩ oji-wñ.
Tak i mʼanade du ña o̩la-wñ; oñ i kwogugu ef elulu.
Tak o̩ya-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ agwo̩nyʼochochi-we̩ ta? BʼO̩jo̩ ina kʼe̩ ku.
Ama i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ko̩la alu kʼonobule̩ e̩fule̩fu aka. E̩wñ? A gbʼe̩nyo̩ o̩wo̩ O̩jo̩, a ñʼagba e̩bie̩ne̩ ge̩ n? Ef e̩wñ-i du Job nʼuko-wñ dure n.

Oñ e̩gba kʼamonuku Job me̩ta gbʼinabali e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du ki wa bu Job ma, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kwʼugbo kʼi de̩ wa: E̩laifaz e̩ne̩ Teman, kpai Bildad e̩ne̩ Shua, kpai Zofar e̩ne̩ Naamat. Oñ ma fʼalu jo̩ ku ma wa bʼo̩ raku ku ma nyʼi e̩do̩.
Tak e̩gba ku ma chʼeju nyʼate̩ o̩najiji ma mejumʼowñ n; ma dʼomu dago araku, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma fʼotogbo-wñ fana, ma la fʼebutu gba bʼo̩la-ma oji ma rʼo̩wo̩ efojale.
Abe̩le̩ ma kwogugu ane̩pe̩te̩ kpʼowñ o̩ro̩ka mebie kpʼodu mebie, e̩ne̩ du la kʼo̩la okate ñw u n: todu ma li ka kʼiwo̩-wñ tabale.
Ubile̩ taku Job chi alu-wñ oñ i fʼama na ñw o̩jo̩ ku ma biʼu.
Job la dohi kakini:
O̩jo̩ ku ma bi mi kʼi lenyo̩,
O̩jo̩ le̩ ki chubi!
E̩chubi kpʼojiji uku ki ka kʼe-ma de̩.
I chʼe-odu le̩, e̩chubi gbe̩m ki fʼu mu!
Odu le̩ kate ki te̩ ojoji;
Abo ku ma nama ñw o̩ro̩ka le̩ ki nanʼama ñw odu le̩ ge̩, kwane̩.
Je̩ ñw ilawo ki agane̩ e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ adu bulubulu le̩ ki chubi;
ukpe̩ kʼi ma re abio̩ma iye-mi n,
E̩wñ chi kʼomi ma ku kwef uwile̩ n?
E̩wñ chi kʼokuku gba mi ne̩?
Todu, fai omi ma dachi ye̩e̩;
manyʼamonu kpʼabo̩hiala ane̩-ile̩-i
abe̩ku manyʼamagboji ku ma nʼo̩jamalia,
Abe̩ku dab o̩ma ku ma ko rinyo̩ ku ma bi maja maja,
O̩mo̩ ame̩ne̩bibi we o̩fu elo̩,
O̩mo̩ ame̩namu jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩ kpʼo̩la-ma;
Abo kekele kpʼabo lile jʼo̩mo̩,
E̩wñ chi ku ma dʼugane̩ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼef akanya,
Ku ma jo̩ anede uku, kʼi mala awan,
ku ma la gwoguyo̩,
E̩wñ chi kʼi adʼugane̩ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼo̩na-wñ maja,
Todu ifi-mi kʼu nafi adʼuje̩wñ-mi o̩gba,
Todu e̩wñ kʼu railo le̩ lewa bʼumi ma me̩,
E̩do̩-mi dachi n, u la gu chi n;
Tak E̩laifaz, e̩ne̩ Teman dohi kakini:
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ che kʼi bʼuwe̩ chʼolu-ka i abiʼe̩ eju?
Go, uwe̩ ko̩ amo̩ma wewe o̩la me̩,
Uko̩la-we̩ gwo̩nyʼe̩ne̩ ki che ki wane̩ dago,
Fai i la wʼugbo we̩ me̩, oñ e̩do̩-we̩ mukpabie̩;
I chʼailo O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ ra chʼuke̩do̩no e-we̩ n?
E̩ nadibetʼo̩, agba, e̩ne̩ ki jale tak i lenyo̩, de̩ mama me̩?
Alu kʼomi te̩tali, abo ku ma luche̩ ibe̩te̩
Iñmi ki kwef iñmo̩ ñmiru ma oñ ma lenyo̩,
Ukwa idu, kpʼomuko̩la idu ki acho̩ko̩,
Idu ki gbo̩ alenyo̩ tod e̩la kʼi akpaje̩ añʼo̩,
Ma gwo̩ wa adʼinabaliʼka ñw mi ye̩ye̩,
Alu kʼone̩ akpibe kʼi agane̩ odu,
ailo fu mi mu, kpʼo̩la ega,
Tak afuʼka lale gu o̩gba-mi du;
I kwodago,
One̩ ki aku neke jale eju O̩jo̩?
Go, i adʼo̩la amadu-wñ rʼochochi re n,
mak e-abo ku ma dodo ef unyi ike̩te̩ tule n?
Agbagba odudu kpʼane̩ oñ ma kpa ma bie̩;
Ma fʼiku unyabo-ma jada ef uma n?
Dʼudo̩ ta; i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi adohi ñw e̩?
E̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩ akpa e̩nidada,
Omi onugo li abu kʼe̩nidada atʼili nyʼane̩,
Amo̩ma-wñ meme̩ru ujadu n,
Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼebi akpʼo̩ mʼe̩wñ oko-wñ ko je̩ kpa,
Todu e̩wñ ibe̩te̩ akwʼef ebutu dufu n,
ma muda bi one̩ tʼef akanya
I muda chʼe-mi, omi ma tene O̩jo̩,
i ache e̩wñ inaina kʼili-wñ ma je̩ gwa n,
i aje̩ ñw omi ojale lo̩ bʼile̩ ma
todu kʼi akʼabo ku ma chʼo̩wo̩ wane̩ gugu atate̩,
I agu e̩wñ ibe kʼabo ugbeju ñwa ji,
I amu amanibe ef ugbeju-ma onugo;
Ama de kpʼe̩chubi o̩ro̩ka gbaa,
I muda agba e̩nale bʼo̩kwo̩chageli te̩, owñ chʼalu-ma,
Abe̩le̩ tak e̩nubie̩ nʼukibeno,
Go, e̩ne̩ kʼO̩jo̩ dʼo̩la biʼu gbede;
Todu owñ achʼone̩ agbe, owñ ñʼaji ge̩;
Owñ agbʼe̩ ef o̩pe̩cha me̩fa;
I ala we̩ tane̩ bʼuku te̩ ef ukpo̩ta,
Ma adʼuwe̩ maja bʼitali ukpalu te̩,
Uwe̩ anyanyi akpʼe̩wñbie̩ kpʼukpo̩ta,
Todu uwe̩ kpʼokuta oko ajʼalu,
Tak uwe̩ ama ka kʼunyabo-we̩ dʼef ure̩do̩,
Uwe̩ ama ka kʼugbe̩-we̩ atabale,
O̩do̩-we̩ ajo̩ tak e̩ nyʼef oji,
E-kʼa tejane̩-wñ kʼa li le̩ de̩; ochochi i che.
Taku Job dohi kakini:
O, ma ma fʼe̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩-mi ñwago, ku ma ma dʼo̩bata-mi nʼe̩bo̩!
Todu i ma woji tʼe̩lanyi ohimini abadi le;
Todu o̩fa Odobao̩gagu jʼef umi;
O̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ef oko akwa e̩gba kʼi nʼegbe kʼi aje̩?
E̩wñ o̩gbo̩ ki ma nʼomu e̩burʼu n, jʼaje̩?
Onugo-mi ko̩ ekadʼo;
O O̩jo̩ ma dʼebi kʼu bi ñw mi,
O i ma nyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju kʼi fʼumi kpo̩fo̩ rʼane̩,
E-le̩ ma chʼe̩wñ unye̩do̩-mi;
E̩wñ chʼukpahiu-mi, kʼu nakibe̩nʼe̩wñ?
Ukpahiu-mi chʼukpahiu okuta?
I chʼabu kʼate̩ko du ma dʼefu-mi ni n?
I dukpe̩ kʼonuku e̩ne̩ ki adaku kʼi mo̩la ñw u
Amo̩maye-mi che mi ayechi dab ukpolo,
kʼi chubi noji aisi ki bʼoji-wñ ma,
E̩gba kʼane̩ chane̩ ekpa i alenyo̩ rʼeju;
Amanyaja muna bʼo̩cha-wñ te̩;
Amanyaja Tema kejuru ma,
Anyo̩ mu ma ukpe̩ ku ma ke̩do̩nʼo;
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ de̩ ñw mi;
Omi kakini, Me̩ dʼe̩wñ ñw mi?
Abe̩k e̩ gba mi kwef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ ki akobʼumi le̩?
Ko̩ mi o̩la, tak u nachechi;
O̩la o̩kpakpa nʼukpahiu tabale̩!
Me̩ jʼuko̩la ofofo iñwa?
Ochochi, ame̩ neku e̩rʼanya oji e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n,
Todule̩ i ki nyo̩ me̩ eju ku me̩ kejurʼumi fa-i ta;
Mudabi, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼume̩, uji du ki dʼefu-me̩ n.
Uji dʼoj ukpalu-mi?
One̩ nʼogu eja ef ile̩ n?
I dab adu ki añeju olubo̩,
abe̩le̩ oñ ma bu ochu ochu te̩ ñw mi ofofo,
E̩gba kʼu dachi u kakini, E̩gba odu-i alale kʼu nakwane̩?
Ide̩ kpai ebutu chʼukpo ubo̩lama-mi;
O̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa-mi ahiane̩ tʼo̩ko̩ ahiukpo le.
O, me̩ rewa kakini, Udeju-mi chʼiñmi eñmi ofo;
Eju e̩ne̩ ki ali mi ñʼago mi ge̩ n;
Alu kʼakpa ojale takpa reju le̩,
I adabi tʼunyi-wñ ge̩ n,
Todule̩ oñ omi ma ñʼahi alu-mi de n;
Omi chʼohimini abadi abe̩k e̩la ohimini abadi inainaʼka? kʼuwe̩ aje̩ ñw ma de mi?
E̩gba kʼu kakini, Ate̩-mi anyʼumi e̩do̩,
tak uwe̩ nʼo̩na aje̩ ñw e̩do̩-mi muda kpu
todabe̩le̩ onugo-mi adu o̩wo̩ ewo nyʼofa
I fʼumi hia; u tene kʼu deju o̩gbegbele̩ n.
One̩ chʼe̩wñ? kʼuwe̩ abumʼo̩?
Kʼuwe̩ awa fejudʼo odudu o̩jo̩ du?
Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ e̩ ma rejuda bʼumi te̩ n?
Omi dure fa? E̩wñ oñ omi chʼuwe̩, uwe̩, Adejutʼone̩ le̩?
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma tʼada kʼu je̩ no̩
Taku Bildad e̩ne̩ Shuha dohi kakini:
Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ e̩ gwo̩nyʼo̩la abe̩i eka taa?
O̩jo̩ arʼoji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa da?
Iche̩wñ kʼamo̩ma-we̩ dʼowñ re,
Iche̩wñ ki ma dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ tene O̩jo̩ gbali
iche̩wñ kʼe̩ ma de̩hiolo kʼe̩ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa,
Dagba uchane̩-we̩ ma chaka de̩ re,
Todu o̩ko̩ nagba bʼe̩, tʼabo igbegbele ene,
(todu awachʼabo o̩nale̩ anane̩, a ma e̩wñ du n,
Ama le̩ ako̩ uwe̩ e̩wñ n? Ma aka ñw e̩ n?
E̩pio̩ ma de̩ n, o̩la e̩che̩ aya?
Abu kʼi chʼemimi ta ku ma ma kpa n,
Abe̩le̩ o̩na o̩na abo du ku ma gbenyo̩ O̩jo̩ de̩;
E̩wñ kʼi lamʼo̩ ako̩da meji,
I alo̩nʼunyi-wñ, i muda adago n;
Owñ chʼemimi ej olu,
Ili-wñ wenyʼokuta ku ma gba dago;
I muda che̩wñ kʼi mʼu du bʼe̩gu-wñ te̩,
Go, uyo̩ ki dʼej o̩na-wñ le̩ de̩;
Go, O̩jo̩ adʼe̩ne̩ ki mufu rikpolo tinyo̩ n,
I muda aje̩ ñw alu-we̩ ko̩ ñw anyi,
Anyo̩ achʼe̩wñ ubo̩lama abo ku ma chulaka we̩,
Taku Job dohi oñ i kakini:
Ochochi, u chema kʼabe̩le̩ i de̩:
Iche̩wñ ki nyʼo̩ eju kʼi bʼo̩ jiñwa,
Anibe i che ef e̩do̩-wñ, ukpahiu-wñ la gbiti—
Owñ kʼi ako uwo uwo kwʼe̩gu-wñ, ki ma ma n,
kʼi amiʼane̩-ile̩ ejo kwo bʼegu-wñ te,
kʼi añwa ñw olu, kʼi ma la akwane̩ n,
kʼowñ kate fʼojale ojale nadala te̩,
kʼi ache Abia ñʼe̩la kpʼAjuwe̩ anʼo̩ma kpʼO̩ya O̩machi,
kʼi ache e̩wñ ogbeme̩de̩ kʼoji-wñ ma jʼali n,
Go, i alale gu mi du, u la liʼu n;
Go, i fʼe̩wñ mu, e̩ne̩ neke dʼo̩ hi?
O̩jo̩ afʼuwe̩do̩-wñ wʼubi n;
Ab omi ma le kʼu nadohi ñw u,
Dagba u ma chaka chʼe̩no̩kpakpa,
Omi ma dudo̩, kʼi ma dohi ñw mi,
Todu i adʼafu ibi gu umi che̩,
I jʼaje̩ ñw mi ñmiñmi n,
I chʼe-ukpahiu, go, agbiti i che!
Dagba u chʼe̩no̩kpakpa, alu-mi onugo akpʼumi abi;
Omi chaka mufu; u muda nyʼo̩la-mi eti n;
O̩chaka-wñ chʼokate; todule̩ u kakini,
Iche̩wñ kʼedili kpʼone̩ achigili,
Ma mʼile̩-i du tʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩ne̩bibi me̩;
Fai o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa-mi ahiane̩ tʼonuche̩ onu le̩;
I alale gudu dab o̩ko̩ ki ahiane̩,
Iche̩wñ kʼu kakini, Nagbe̩nyo̩ o̩la ki awo̩ mi-i,
narailo e̩wñ e̩do̩dudu-mi chaka,
Ekpa mi abi ma akpa mi abi;
Iche̩wñ kʼu nʼomi sno agwʼo̩la-mi,
uwe̩ muda adʼumi ro̩ tef o̩go̩lo̩ e̩pio̩,
Todu owñ chʼone̩ dab omi, kʼomi adʼohi ñw u n,
Abuja dʼagbagba wa,
I ki mʼo̩kpa-wñ du bʼumi o̩la te̩,
E̩gbale̩ tak omi ma ko̩la, kʼu ma ño̩ railo-wñ ge̩ n;
Udeju-mi chʼihianyi ñw onugo-mi;
Naka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, E̩ ki kpa mi abi n;
I nyo̩ ñw e̩ kʼe̩ dʼone̩ mʼane̩?
Uwe̩ nʼeju o̩re̩la?
Ukpo̩kpe̩-we̩ dab ukpo̩kpe̩ e-one̩?
kʼuwe̩ atejane̩ udu kʼu fe̩,
Dagba uwe̩ chaka ama ka kʼomi chʼe̩ne̩bibi n,
O̩wo̩-we̩ fʼumi bo̩ mʼomune̩ e̩te̩le̩ lale;
E̩ ki rewa ka kʼe̩ bo̩ mi alu ku ma nʼama bo̩ e̩wñ;
Uwe̩ dʼumi dafo dab omi e̩nya,
Uwe̩ kʼaño̩ kpʼo̩re̩la bʼumi o̩la ma,
E̩ la dʼiñmi kpʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ chʼumi ele;
E̩ muda mʼe̩wñ-i ko maja ef e̩do̩-we̩;
Iche̩wñ kʼomi dure, e̩gba le̩ uwe̩ fʼeju ko̩ mi hi,
Iche̩wñ kʼomi chʼe̩ne̩bibi, atogwo chʼe-mi!
U hi o̩la-mi dago, uwe̩ adʼo̩de̩-mi dab idu,
Uwe̩ aje̩ ñw ame̩nibenu etito̩ kwane̩ tʼumi o̩la,
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ du mi kwʼef abio̩ma dufu?
omi ma de̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼomi ma de̩ mama ta n,
O̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa-mi chʼo̩ree n?
o̩gba tak u kwʼemi alo tʼugbo kʼu ma ñʼadabi wa ge̩ n,
ane̩ ki chubi gbe̩m, ane̩ ojiji uku ugbo kʼe̩wñ du de̩ juguu,
Taku Zofar e̩ne̩ Naama dohi kakini:
Ma dohi ñw uko̩la kʼi chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩-i n?
Uba-we̩ aje̩ ñw amone̩ chechi jo̩?
Todu uwe̩ kakini, Uko̩ o̩la-mi chefe̩,
O, O̩jo̩ ma fʼo̩la ka,
kʼi ma dʼe̩wñ afili ibe ñʼuwe̩!
Uwe̩ neke tejane̩ kʼe̩ li O̩jo̩?
E̩gba kʼefojale gba te̩—e̩wñ e̩ neke che?
E̩ñwa-wñ jiji tʼane̩-ile-i le,
Iche̩wñ kʼi alale gu efu-wñ du, kʼi fʼone̩ dahi tʼunyi-wñ,
Todu i chema ame̩no̩wai;
E̩nidada muda ane̩ oji e̩wñ ema,
Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ añwʼe̩do̩-we̩ che,
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩wn ibe̩te̩ dʼef o̩wo̩-we̩, mʼu du tinyo̩ o̩najiji,
Tak uwe̩ aneke dʼeju-we̩ dago ki we enʼuchalu;
Uwe̩ agbenyo̩ akanya-we̩;
Udeju-we̩ ade̩ jalii tʼolu ki dʼoji le;
Oñ uwe̩ ake̩do̩no, todabu kʼukibeno do̩mo̩;
Uwe̩ ñʼadachi añmi oñ e̩ne̩ du la anyʼuwe̩ okpo n;
Eju ame̩ne̩bibi muda ama;
Taku Job dohi kakini:
I ja n, ame̩ kate chʼone̩,
Omi muda mʼoji e̩wñ, i chʼame̩ kate n;
Omi, kʼu kwadʼO̩jo̩, kʼi la dohi ñw mi,
Ef ibe e̩ne̩ ki gugu to̩ko̩o̩ e̩wñ o̩labi chʼe̩wñ e̩de̩te̩;
Ura jʼef unyabo amadinya,
E̩ muda atʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ oko ene, oñ ma ako̩ uwe̩ e̩wñ; kpʼame̩we̩ ojale, ama la aka ñw e̩;
cho̩kpo̩ni e̩ ko̩la ñw ane̩ ile̩, tak owñ akʼuwe̩ e̩wñ;
E̩ne̩ ma ma ef e̩wñ-i du
Ef o̩wo̩-wñ oñ onugo e̩wñ ki deju du de̩,
Eti ajʼo̩la ma alu kʼalu ajʼuje̩wñ ma n?
Ibe dʼugbo abogijo,
Ugbo O̩jo̩ oñ ibe kpʼugbiti de̩;
Go, i gu e̩wñ lo̩, i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki neke ne ge̩ n;
Go, i fʼo̩wo̩ nʼomi, i la agbe̩;
Ukpahiu kpʼibe dʼugbo-wñ;
I anʼabo̩hiala alo ago ofo,
I atu igbaligba amonu,
I ane̩ amatama alo ago ofo,
I abʼabo ku ma ke̩do̩no ma gbʼuko̩la-ma,
I akʼe̩de̩te̩ danyʼoji abojima,
I akʼe̩wñ ki bʼe̩wñ unefu ef e̩chubi ma bʼo̩ te̩,
I aje̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki nana nyo̩gba, i ñʼakpa ma rinyo̩ ge̩:
I agbʼamone̩ ki tʼo̩gba ile̩-i ibe,
Ma tʼache bobobo ef e̩chubi ugbo kʼugane̩ ma de̩ n;
Go, eju-mi fʼe̩wñ-i du li me̩,
E̩wñ kʼame̩ ma, omi ño̩ ma ge̩;
I muda dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu ko̩la ñw Odobao̩gagu,
Ame̩ muda chʼamaga olemi nyʼo̩la;
O, me̩ ma chechi jo̩,
Me̩ gbʼomu-mi ta,
Ame̩ aka e̩wñ ki ma tʼo̩kpakpa n tod O̩jo̩,
O̩jo̩ chʼe̩nejuma-me̩,
I nyo̩ kʼi tejane̩ o̩la e-me̩?
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ nʼe̩nejuma maja maja
Egahi-wñ abʼume̩ ailo n?
O̩la ibe-me̩ chʼita elulu,
Me̩ chechi, tʼumi no̩ kʼu ko̩la,
E̩wñ chi kʼu nadʼenyi dʼo̩re̩la-mi?
I chaka kpa mi, nakibenʼo kpo̩;
E-le̩ ñʼachʼujadu-mi ge̩,
Me̩ netirʼuko̩la-mi nyo̩nyo̩,
Go ta, omi fʼo̩la-mi re jo̩ me̩;
E̩ne̩ abʼumi ka?
Chai e̩wñ meji kate oñ e̩ we eche mi,
E̩ ki fʼo̩wo̩-we̩ ubi bʼumi te̩ tʼo̩najiji,
Tak uwe̩ ki dudo̩, oñ omi adohi;
Aluka udu kʼu fe̩ kpʼadure-mi kʼu ta chʼonu taa?
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ dʼeju-we̩ maja,
Uwe̩ anyʼeñmi kʼafu adʼu alo okpo?
Todu uwe̩ ako e̩wñ e̩rikoko nyʼumi,
Uwe̩ ñʼakʼe̩re̩-mi nyʼodo ge̩,
Oñ u dab e̩wñ e̩che̩ ki achihi rinyo̩,
O̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa one̩ kʼonobule̩ bi kpo̩kpe̩ n
I adufu wa dab ododo, tak akwacha;
Oñ uwe̩ achi eju ago e̩ne̩ e̩go̩-i
E̩ne̩ neke dʼe̩wñ ki fe̩ dufu kwef e̩wñ ki ma fe̩ n?
I la che̩wñ ku ma fʼo̩jo̩ kʼone̩ adeju da te̩,
mʼeju du bʼo̩ te̩ kʼi nʼuñmi,
Todu i chʼe-oli ukibeno dʼugbo-wñ,
Dagba ili-wñ gbo̩ ef ane̩,
ulu omi ki agbo̩, i ñʼapa
One̩ muda leku, ma mʼu du dachi ane̩;
Alu kʼomi agbe̩ bʼe̩dagu omi te̩,
Abe̩le̩ one̩ adachi, kʼi ma ñʼakwane̩ ge̩ n;
O, uwe̩ ma du mi maja ef o̩jegu,
One̩ leku, i ñʼadeju ge̩?
Uwe̩ ma dudo̩, tak omi ma je̩;
Fa-i, e̩ la kʼaluka e̩re̩ du kʼu nachi,
Ada kʼu je̩ chʼe̩ji tef akpulu,
Uwo lile ki wane̩, akpo̩fo̩ rinyo̩,
omiofo afʼokuta je̩le̩;
Uwe̩ afʼowñ du o̩gbegbele̩, oñ i alale;
Amo̩ma-wñ fʼojima ne̩, i la ma n;
Chai año̩la-wñ onugo kʼi awo̩ oñ i nʼibe-wñ,
Tak E̩laifaz e̩ne̩ Teman dohi kakini:
Anibe anʼe̩wñ ema kʼi chʼafu ofo dohi?
I anʼuko̩la ibe̩te̩ ajiñwa?
Uwe̩ muda gu ailo O̩jo̩ era lo̩,
todu udu kʼe̩fe̩ akʼalu-we̩ o̩la kʼiaka,
Alu-we̩ onugo kpʼe̩ abi, i chʼomi n;
Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ejodudu ku ma bi?
Eti-we̩ dʼane̩ ugbo kʼO̩jo̩ alʼo̩la maja?
E̩wñ e̩ ma kʼawa ma ma n?
Amabʼiloji efufu, kpʼabogijo jʼef uwa,
Enyʼone̩ e̩do̩ kʼO̩jo̩ anyʼone̩ e̩do̩ anyarʼuwe̩?
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩do̩-we̩ adʼe̩ alo abe̩i?
Kʼe̩ la rʼafu-we̩ da akobʼO̩jo̩?
O̩ne̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼi afe̩?
Go, i adʼo̩la abo-wñ ki afo̩ rʼochochi n,
e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ kʼi ache ku ma do̩ kʼone̩ fa?
Nadʼu ñʼuwe̩, gbʼo̩la-mi ta;
(owñ chʼe̩wñ kʼanibe gbo̩ ugbo
ama kate ma dʼane̩-i ñw ma,
E̩ne̩bibi achʼiwo̩ gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ,
Ekuku ki abailo jʼef eti-wñ;
I do̩ ka kʼi adabi bʼef e̩chubi te̩,
I tale ugbo du atene uje̩wñ, kakini, Ugbo i de̩?
o̩pe̩cha kpʼuwa anyʼu okpo;
Todabu kʼi nʼo̩wo̩ dala akobʼO̩jo̩,
i fʼo̩lo̩ lo afule ledʼo
todabu kʼeju-wñ yoyo te̩ noj ura,
kʼi la dodo ef ewo ki date̩ ojoji,
i ñʼachʼanana n, one̩-wñ la akpo̩kpe̩ n,
i akwo bʼef e̩chubi te̩ n;
I ki do̩ e̩wñ ibe̩te̩ ofofo rʼochochi, ki gwʼo̩la-wñ o̩gwo̩ n;
Ma arʼo̩me̩ ñw u kpa tak iko-wñ jo̩,
I añʼe̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ ki ma kpa ta n wane̩, dab ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma,
Todu ujeju ame̩nayechi achʼamagaji,
Ma fʼefu akanya nyo̩, ma la fʼibe̩te̩ bi,
Taku Job dohi, kakini;
Omi fʼe̩wñ abe̩le̩ wewe gbo̩ me̩;
Uko̩la afu ofo anʼuda n?
Omi onugo neke ka alu ku me̩ ka le̩,
Omi muda anʼalu-mi adʼukpahiu ñw me̩,
Dagba u chaka ako̩la, e̩do̩dudu-mi dabu n,
Fa-i i muda fʼumi hia me̩;
Uwe̩ la fʼumi o̩la no̩,
I fʼumi fana ef uwe̩do̩-wñ, i la chʼulaka-mi;
Ma chʼalu te̩ ago mi,
O̩jo̩ mʼumi du ñw e̩ne̩bie̩ne̩ le̩,
U gugu to̩ko̩o̩, oñ i fʼumi guche̩ meji;
amatʼo̩fa-wñ donyʼumi daka.
I agu umi che̩ kpi kpi;
U fʼe̩gbanukpo ga nyʼaño̩la-mi,
Eju-mi kpa ñw aku ero̩,
dagba akpulu eche du ma dʼef o̩wo̩-mi n,
O ane̩, e̩ ki bʼe̩bie̩-mi ma n,
I chaka chʼifa-i, go, e̩nibenu-mi dʼefojale,
Amonuku-mi anyʼumi anyinacha;
O, abuja ma dʼagbagba one̩ kpʼO̩jo̩,
Todu o̩do̩ re lale fa-i
O̩la-mi muda, o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa-mi kpalu,
Anyinacha donyʼumi daka-i,
Dʼe̩wñ uhio̩wo̩ wa, uwe̩ kʼe̩ gbʼumi o̩wo̩ ugbo o̩la-we̩;
Todu uwe̩ dʼoji e̩wñ ema maja ñw e̩do̩-ma,
E̩ne̩ ki adʼofe amonuku-wñ dufu todu kʼi je̩ ma e̩wñ,
I muda mʼumi du chʼita ñw amone̩,
Eju-mi ño̩ de̩ bulubulu ñw e̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩,
I achʼawuwu ñw ame̩no̩kpakpa,
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, e̩no̩kpakpa agwo̩nyʼo̩na-wñ alo,
I muda chʼame̩, me̩ ki ño̩ te̩wa ge̩, o̩chaka-me̩,
O̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa-mi lale me̩, ibe e̩wñ kʼu ñwate̩ mukpabie̩ me̩,
Ma mʼodu rida o̩ro̩ka;
Iche̩wñ kʼibe-mi kado mak o̩jegu chʼunyi-mi,
iche̩wñ kʼu ka ñw ura kakini, Uwe̩ chʼata-mi
mak ugbo ukibeno-mi de̩?
I agwo̩ru lebʼumi nyʼef o̩jegu?
Taku Bildad e̩ne̩ Shuha dohi kakini:
Gbogbo wʼe̩gba oñ ame̩ adʼoku te̩ ñw uko̩la taa?
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ fʼuwa lo rʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩?
Uwe̩ kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ fana ef uwe̩do̩-we̩,
Ochochi, ma akpʼugane̩ e̩ne̩bibi lu,
Ugane̩ ef unyabo-wñ achubi,
E̩re̩-wñ kʼi anadala jiji le̩ abu wane̩
E̩re̩-wñ onugo anʼowñ nyʼef iga,
Oku la amʼu agbe̩re̩,
Ma dʼoku maja ane̩pe̩te̩ anede owñ,
E̩wñ ailo anyʼokpo o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du,
Ebi la fʼiñmi-wñ bulo̩,
E̩wñ año̩la-wñ alie̩ rinyo̩,
Ma afʼo̩ kwʼef unyaho-wñ kʼi ake̩do̩nʼo le̩,
E̩wñ ki ma chʼowñ ne̩ n agugu ef unyabo-wñ;
Ili-wñ agbe̩ kwʼo̩gane̩,
Urewa-wñ alenyo̩ bʼane̩ te̩,
Ma akʼo̩ e̩che̩ kwefugane̩ tef e̩chubi,
I anʼo̩ma n, i la anʼaaju ef abo-wñ n,
E̩wñ ki achʼo ugoju mʼabo olane̩ da,
Abu kʼodo agboni ade̩ de̩ chuu,
Taku Job dohi kakini:
Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ ame̩ akpa mi e̩do̩ bie̩ kade taa?
Onu me̩gwa ku me̩ bʼumi ina de̩;
I chaka chʼochochi ka kʼomi la me̩,
I la che̩wñ kʼame̩ ahi o̩la-me̩ ne ñw mi,
mak a me̩ ki ma ka kʼO̩jo̩ mʼo̩la-mi rida,
Go, omi akwa kakini, Elelelele-o! E̩ne̩ du la agbo̩ n;
I fʼo̩gba kpa nyʼo̩na-mi, u la neke legudu n,
I mʼojima-mi gwojane̩ bʼumi o̩la te̩,
I agu umi lo̩ o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du, u le me̩,
I laño̩ fʼuna uwe̩do̩-wñ tajo bʼumi ma,
Abogu-wñ awa;
I mʼamo̩maye-mi ko rʼo̩najiji ñw mi,
Amefu-mi jʼatʼugbo mi n, abo ku ma ma mi chaka la gbenyo̩ mi;
abo ku ma ge̩ne̩ ef unyi-mi;
Nadʼadu-mi omu, i la adʼohi ñw mi n;
Afu ki kwef iñmo̩-mi chʼejaduña ñw o̩ya-mi,
I chaka chʼabimo̩to̩ egini, ma chʼe̩de̩te̩ mi;
Amonuku-mi o̩lali chaka hihie̩ne̩ mi,
Achiku-mi gamʼaño̩-mi kpʼo̩re̩la-mi,
Li umi ejumomi, li umi ejumomi, O, ame̩ amonuku-mi,
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ doli mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩ chʼO̩jo̩?
O, ma ma fʼo̩la-mi ko̩ nyʼo̩takada!
Ku ma ma nʼiko ebije kpai o̩de̩le̩-ma
Todu u chema ka kʼAnache̩-mi deju,
oñ e̩gba kʼaño̩ o̩la-mi-i kpabie̩ rinyo̩,
e-kʼeju-mi onugo ali ka kʼi dʼubi-mi,
Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ kakini, A ñʼadoli-wñ ta!
ame̩ onugo ki chokpo o̩kwo̩chageli,
Taku Zofar e̩ne̩ Naamat dohi kakini:
E̩wñ ki chi kʼibe efu-mi adʼohi ñw mi de̩,
U gbo̩ eju ku ma daru mi, oñ i mud anyo̩ ñw mi,
Uwe̩ mʼe-i kwʼigbelegbele n?
ka kʼegwoye e̩ne̩bibi te̩ jiji n,
Dagba i gba kadʼefojale,
i muda lenyo̩ ogbegbele̩ dab echu-wñ onugo;
I awu alo dab o̩na kʼone̩ ana, ma ñʼali ge̩ n;
Eju ki liʼu ñʼaliʼi ge̩ n,
Amo̩ma-wñ afeju kʼame̩nubie̩ ki li ma eju,
Achiku-wñ chʼachiku okolobia ta,
Dagba e̩wñ bibi chaka rinyo̩ ef alu-wñ,
dagba i dʼo̩wo̩ mʼo̩, kʼi ma jʼatʼo̩ no̩ n,
uje̩wñ ef ifi-wñ muda rida;
I mʼe̩wñ anana ko mi me̩, i ñʼare̩ dufu ge̩;
I amie̩ olo olijo,
Eju-wñ adʼaji aji n,
E̩wñ kʼi chʼakanya uko̩lo̩-wñ le̩, i akʼo dabi jʼe̩gu-wñ,
Todu i fʼame̩nubie̩ te̩mane̩ oñ i hi uma rinyo̩,
Todabu kʼefu-wñ ma nʼuñmi n,
I ajʼuje̩wñ kʼi abo̩ n;
Iko kʼi nʼe̩wñ kwubo̩, ubie̩ ake̩re̩bʼo̩;
Efu-wñ che ki ko̩
I ara bʼe̩wñ ido̩na ogu ki chʼebije te̩;
I afʼo̩ kwef año̩la-wñ dufu,
Ma kʼe̩chubi du ne anede e̩wñ akoko-wñ;
Efojale efojale adʼudu kʼi fe̩ tejugede,
E̩wñ du ki kojo̩ unyi-wñ akwo bʼo̩ te̩,
Ukpe̩ kʼe̩ne̩bibi ane̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ de̩,
Taku Job dohi kakini;
Me̩ neti rʼo̩la-mi nyo̩nyo̩,
Je̩ ñw mi kʼu ko̩la,
I chʼe-mi, one̩ oñ omi akʼo̩la-mi ñw u?
Kejuru mi, kʼawuwu-wñ ki mu me̩,
I chaka chʼibe-mi tʼo̩ ofo, ailo-wñ fʼumi mu,
E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ne̩bibi deju,
E̩re̩ ugbe̩-ma alonyane̩ manyʼuma eju-ma,
Unyi-ma jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩, i nʼailo era n,
O̩kokuno̩-ma aje̩ ñw ma nyʼefu, i achi n;
Ma kʼabo-ma egini kpuche̩ dufu dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini,
Ma nʼeicha kpʼumolo akeli,
Ma jo̩ ajʼura o̩jo̩ du,
Oñ ma ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, Kwo bʼuwa te̩!
E̩ne̩ chʼOdobao̩gagu, kʼa arʼo̩?
Go, e̩nyo̩-ma hiʼo̩wo̩ e-ma n;
Onu monu oñ ma kpʼe̩mu ame̩ne̩bibi lu?
Ma dab ikakpunu egbe ej afu?
Ame̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ akʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩-wñ jo̩ anede amo̩ma-wñ.
Eju-wñ onugo ki li o̩labi-wñ,
Todu e̩wñ bo̩ unyi-wñ kʼi awʼo̩ eju ubi-wñ e̩gba kʼi leku?
I nʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ako̩ O̩jo̩ e̩wñ ema?
I nʼe̩gba kʼiñmi e̩ne̩ʼka ako̩ kpa tak i aku,
ukpachi-wñ che̩ko̩ ñw omi e̩nya
E̩ne̩ omune̩ aku ef e̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩-wñ,
Ma kwodachi ef ebutu okujo̩,
Go, u chema ibe ki dʼefu-me̩,
Todu ame̩ kakini, Ugbo unyi e̩numo̩la le̩ de̩?
Ame̩ tʼabelo̩na ene mama ta n?
Ka ku ma do̩wo̩mʼe̩ne̩bie̩ne̩ iko uchobi?
E̩ne̩ adʼo̩na-wñ ki Ie ka eju-wñ?
Ma muda anʼe̩ nyʼalu oji,
Aya o̩go̩ rinyo̩ ñw u;
Mak abile ku me̩ nʼe̩wñ o̩wai anyʼumi e̩do̩?
Tak E̩laifaz e̩ne̩ Teman dohi kakini:
One̩ neke nʼile ñw O̩jo̩?
Uwe̩ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa fa, i arʼO̩dobao̩gagu e̩do̩?
Ukpe̩ kʼe̩ railo-wñ, oñ i adejurʼe̩,
E̩wñ bibi-we̩ tabale n?
Todu uwe̩ gbʼe̩wñ uhio̩wo̩ o̩wo̩ o̩maye-we̩ o̩lachi ofo,
Uwe̩ la dʼomiofo ñw e̩ne̩ kʼuhia hiʼo̩ kʼi ñmo̩ n,
I muda chʼe-e̩ne̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ gbo̩ka, owñ nʼane̩-i.
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ le o̩wo̩ ofo,
Todule̩ oñ oku lʼuwe̩ daka,
e̩ li e̩chubi kpai uwobi omi ki bʼe̩ ma-i n.
O̩jo̩ dʼatate̩ efojale n?
Oñ uwe̩ kakini, E̩wñ O̩jo̩ ma?
Akpa ki jukpa chʼe̩wñ ubo̩lama-wñ, kʼi we egane̩,
Uwe̩ ñʼagwo̩nyʼo̩na igbele
Ku ma fʼuma dinya kwʼemi tak iko-ma jo̩;
Ku ma ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, Kwo bʼuwa te̩,
I muda je̩ ñw unyi-ma ko̩ ñw e̩wñ e̩nyo̩—
Ame̩no̩kpakpa ali oñ ma ayo̩;
Ma kakini, Ma fʼabo ku ma kwane̩ tʼuwa o̩la ko̩da rinyo̩ me̩,
E̩ fʼu mʼo̩la fa-i, kʼe̩ gugu ef ure̩do̩;
O̩ko̩ nagba bʼe̩, e̩ mʼuko̩ o̩la gba kwʼalu-wñ,
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ mudabi abʼOdobao̩gagu, ma anʼuwe̩ nyʼo̩gba ge̩,
kʼe̩ kʼe̩wñ akoko-we̩ jʼef ebutu,
tak Odobao̩gagu achʼe̩wñ akoko,
e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ anʼuyo̩ ef Odobao̩gagu,
Uwe̩ arodubʼo̩, oñ i agbʼo̩;
E̩gbale̩ e̩ ñʼakpibe e̩wñ tane̩ te̩, tak i alonyane̩ ñw e̩,
E̩gba ku ma hi uwe̩ wane̩, uwe̩ akakini, Edʼu kwane̩ ño̩ do̩mo̩
Tʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ma jale n, i agbʼo̩;
Taku Job dohi kakini:
Eñini-i ge̩, o̩la-mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼe-la ñuru.
O, omi ma ma ugbo kʼu naliʼu,
Omi ma choli jo̩ o̩gba-wñ
U ma mʼo̩la kʼi ma ne̩ adohi ñw mi,
I ma nʼukpahiu-wñ inaina ja kpʼomi?
O̩mo̩ e̩no̩kpakpa ma neke bʼo̩ lʼo̩la,
Go, nalo tʼo̩gba, i la do̩mo̩ n;
u le tʼo̩wo̩ awohi ugbo kʼi achʼuko̩lo̩, eju-mi la dʼo n;
I muda mʼo̩na kʼu nale-i,
E̩re̩-mi tʼej e̩re̩-wñ kpakpa;
U la dabi tʼubi bʼuko̩ kʼalu-wñ te̩ te̩ n;
Owñ muda dʼalu kʼi de̩, e̩ne̩ la neke rʼo̩ ida?
E̩wñ ki cheñwate̩ ñw mi, i ache;
Todule̩ nache̩do̩ ñwañwala todu eju-wñ ki dane̩;
Todu O̩jo̩ je̩ ñw e̩do̩-mi muda kpu;
todu ma kʼumi da tinyo̩ tak e̩chubi-i wa n,
E̩wñ chi kʼOdobao̩gagu ma dʼiko ajo̩ te̩ n?
I nʼabo ku ma chi oli ej o̩me̩ tinyo̩;
Ma fʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n ne bʼo̩ te̩;
Ma kʼe̩nale e̩che̩ bʼej o̩na te̩;
Go, dab amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ef oko ku ma jʼaje̩tachi
Ma yʼije̩ kwʼoko wa
Ma dachi ago ofo gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩ tod ukpo ku ma ma ne̩ n,
Omi akpa ma oj uwo uwo,
I nʼabo ku ma dinya amo̩me̩kpa ku ma ma nʼata n bʼe̩nya iye-ma te̩,
Ama tale ago ofo, ma nʼe̩wñ ubo̩lama n;
Ma jʼef o̩gba abo-i achʼekpo̩;
Amone̩ jo̩ ewo afifi,
Abo-i chʼabo ku ma ko̩ ugane̩,
Ane̩ chane̩ ene̩ akpone̩ akwane̩,
Eju ache̩ño̩ya kpai ajo̩ko̩ aneju iko kʼo̩jo̩ adu bulu bulu,
Ane̩ chubi ma gwʼura tef unyi;
Todu odudu e-ma chʼiñaliña odu;
I ahiane̩ ej omi alo;
Alu kʼane̩ e̩gbe̩ kpai olu efu adʼomi sno mi;
Efu ki bʼi agbenyo̩-wñ;
Agaji kpʼe̩ne̩ ki ma nʼo̩ma n chʼuje̩wñ-ma,
O̩jo̩ muda nʼukpahiu-wñ aje̩ ñw agbiti kpojo̩lugbo;
I aje̩ ñw ma jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩, oñ ma jʼañmi;
Ma hi o̩la-ma ne pe̩e̩, taku ma le ma;
I ma dabe̩le̩ n, e̩ne̩ agbʼijali ka kʼu chʼe̩nolemi?
Taku Bildad e̩ne̩ Shuha dohi kakini:
O̩da kpʼe̩gahi jʼugbo-wñ;
Abogu-wñ nʼaluka?
Abʼone̩ ale kʼi mud e̩no̩kpakpa eju O̩jo̩?
Go, i chaka chʼochu, i nʼugane̩ n,
e̩wñ chʼe-one̩ ki aku, kʼi chʼide̩;
Taku Job dohi kakini;
Ete̩ko kʼe̩ te̩ko e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼukpahiu n igbe̩!
Ibe kʼe̩ ko̩ e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼibe n-i ño̩ tabale,
E̩ne̩ e̩ ka o̩la abe̩i jane̩ ñwu ta?
O̩la abo o̩gane̩,
Ef ojegu tago ofo eju-wñ,
I fʼo̩pata o̩wo̩ ate̩ nadala abʼagbagba ofofo le̩ ma,
I aji omiofo tefakpa-wñ ki jukpa le̩,
I adʼe̩wñ bʼeju ede-wñ ma,
I fʼo̩me̩-wñ fa te̩ bʼeju omi ma okokolo
Oli ugbogaga efojale jʼami,
I nʼukpahiu-wñ abʼomi ohimini abadi,
Iñmi-wñ kʼi ñmi rʼu ojale kwote̩ gbaa,
Go, e̩wñ-i chʼiba iba-wñ kʼi ale ta;
Taku Job danʼoluka-wñ, oñ i kakini:
O̩jo̩, kʼi mʼukpe̩ e-mi du tinyo̩,
(gbogbo abu kʼiñmi dʼefu-mi ta,
uko-mi ñʼakʼe̩wñ uji n,
Eje̩ kʼame̩ nʼochochi ki jiji rʼumi;
Nagwo̩nyʼo̩kpakpa-mi, u jʼatʼo̩ no̩ n;
E̩nebi-ml ki dab e̩ne̩bibi,
Todu e̩wñ chʼukibeno e̩nayechi,
O̩jo̩ agbʼukwa-wñ,
Odobao̩gagu achʼuyo̩-wñ?
Nako̩ me̩ alu kʼo̩wo̩ O̩jo̩ de̩;
Go, o̩chaka-me̩ fʼu li o̩to̩to̩la-me̩ me̩;
Ukpe̩ e̩ne̩bibi kʼi dʼugbo O̩jo̩ de̩,
Amo̩ma-wñ awewe nyo̩gba, uje̩wñ o̩kwo̩chageli ma che;
Atulubo̩ akʼabo-wñ ku ma bo̩ ji,
Dagba i gbʼajifa jo̩ dab ebutu,
i chaka gba jo̩, e̩no̩kpakpa la anyi,
Unyi-wñ kʼi ako̩ dab unyi agara,
Anana i che e̩gba kʼi dachi, i muda ñʼache ge̩ n;
Okpo fʼu mu dab uwobi omi;
Afu olodudu mʼu du alo, oñ i le wñ,
Todu i akʼe̩wñ ro̩ boma, i abʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ n;
Ma agwʼo̩wo̩ rʼo̩ oji,
I chenʼura ku ma gwa kʼajifa jʼefu-wñ chuu,
Ma kʼebije kwʼef ane̩ dufu,
Ma fʼoji e̩chubi kpa,
Ma bi ura-wñ ugbo kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩ n;
I chʼe-ane̩-ile̩, uje̩wñ akwʼefu-wñ dufu;
Okuta-wñ chʼuña safaya,
E̩we̩ du ki akpʼe̩la je̩ la mʼo̩na le̩ n,
Ame̩la une̩do̩ dʼe̩re̩ tʼo̩ mama ta n;
One̩ muda anʼo̩wo̩ dala kad okuta ki gbiti,
I anʼo̩go̩lo̩ ef okuta,
I are aji aji ki we echa,
Ama ugbo ma ali ibe ta?
One̩ ma alu aja-wñ n,
Unefu kakini, I dʼefu-mi n,
Ma anʼo̩jamalia la n,
Ma ane̩ o̩jamalia e-Ofir kpai
O̩jamalia kpai egigo neke chʼokujo̩ kpʼowñ n,
E̩wñ chʼe-ko̩ral kpai kristal ge̩?
Ma neke du topaz Itiopia wawe-wñ n,
Mak ugbo ibe kwo ta?
I maja ñw eju e̩wñ du ki deju,
E̩kpabie̩ kpʼuku kakini,
O̩jo̩ chema o̩na-wñ,
Todu i ago gbogbo tʼotitala ane̩-ile̩-i,
E̩gba kʼi mʼirwoji du ñw afu,
e̩gba kʼi fʼo̩me̩ hi te̩ tod omi ojale,
e̩gbale̩ i fʼu li oñ i ka dufu;
Tak i ka ñw one̩ kakini,
Taku Job ño̩ danʼoluka-wñ, i kakini:
O omi ma de̩ alu kʼu de̩ ochu ochu ki lale igbegbele,
e̩gba kʼugane̩ omutula-wñ bʼumi oji ma,
alu kʼu de̩ iko adanyi-mi,
e̩gba kʼOdobao̩gagu dʼugbo mi ta,
e̩gba kʼugbo du kʼu nale chʼura ura,
E̩gba kʼu dufu nyʼalaku ewo,
abokolobia fʼumi li oñ ma hi nyʼubi,
amagboji we o̩la eka,
oli kwotʼame̩nuto̩gba alu,
E̩gba kʼeti gbo̩, i kakini, Owñ gbede,
todabu kʼu mʼe̩no̩bata kʼi akwa gba,
E̩ne̩ ki ache kʼi lenyo̩ kadua ñw mi;
U mʼo̩kpakpa du tʼo̩la, oñ i mud e̩wñ ubo̩lama-mi;
Omi chʼeju ñw amafeju,
U chʼata ñw ame̩nale,
U la fʼo̩go̩ e̩nuji guche̩,
E̩gba le̩ u kakini, Ef unyi-mi naku,
ili-mi ta gbogbo kad omi,
ojima-mi dʼugbo mi etitʼetito̩,
Amone̩ netiru mi, ma la chechi jo̩
U fʼe-mi ka, ma ñʼaka ge̩ n,
Ma neju mi alu kʼone̩ aneju omi ojale;
E̩gba ku ma ma dʼo̩ rʼochochi n, eju-mi chʼanyi ñw ma,
Omi chi o̩na ñw ma, oñ u gugu dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩nuto̩gba-ma,
Fa-i abo kʼomi je̩ ñw ma, dʼumi te̩ achuke̩,
Ile e̩wñ naje̩ ugbo ukpahiu o̩wo̩-ma?
Ma gbo̩gbe̩ te̩ ñw ubie̩ kpʼebi
ma chi eñmi etutuʼka,
Ma fʼuma ne bʼef amone̩ te̩;
Todule̩ ma gugu ef ukpolo ki abailo,
Ma jʼef etutu akwa;
Amo̩ma ame̩nidada kpʼamo̩ma abo u ma ma nʼodu n ma che,
Omi la mud eli-ma fa-i me̩,
Ma hihie̩ne̩-mi, ma je̩ te̩mʼumi n;
Todabu kʼO̩jo̩ fʼe̩cha o̩o̩do̩-mi kpare kʼi laño̩ fʼumi chʼukata,
Ame̩nofogoli akwane̩ o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-mi,
Ma fʼo̩na e-mi kpabie̩,
Ma wa dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩do̩ ma gulo̩ awa;
E̩wñ ubailo murida abʼumi ma;
Onugo-mi kwodafo efu-mi fa-i me̩;
Odu achiku achiku-mi akpa mi na,
Ukpahiu lile fʼe̩wñ o̩la-mi kpabie̩;
I mʼumi du rikpolo tʼef e̩pio̩,
Naraku dʼuwe̩, e̩ la dohi ñw mi n;
Uwe̩murida e̩ne̩ kʼi ache mi o̩lachi;
Uwe̩ adʼumi kwane̩ tʼoj afu,
I-i, u chema kʼuwe̩ adʼumi wa ñw uku,
E̩ne̩ kʼunyi gulo̩ bʼo ma anʼo̩wo̩ data n?
Omi raku tod e̩ne̩ ki achʼo̩bata o̩jo̩ te̩ n?
E̩gba kʼomi muda neju e̩nyo̩, e̩bie̩ne̩ lewa;
E̩do̩-mi ache giligili, i ñmi n;
Año̩la-mi kpa, i muda chʼolu che n;
Omaye amogbemgbem omi che,
Año̩-mi da chi da chi, oñ i alaño̩,
Todule̩ umolo-mi mud edaido̩,
Omi fʼilo kpe̩ kpʼeju-mi me̩;
Todu e̩wñ ma chʼukpe̩ e-O̩jo̩ kʼikwʼate̩?
I chʼuchobi ake̩re̩bʼame̩nuji n?
I ali o̩na o̩na-mi n?
Omi kpʼolemi ma kpe̩re̩,
je̩ ñw ma fʼumi ñwago oj e̩bo̩ o̩kpakpa,
E̩re̩-mi ma muna bʼo̩na te̩,
mak e̩gbale̩ omi ki fʼe̩wñ gbe̩, kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ ki je̩;
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñʼka gwʼe̩do̩-mi o̩gwo̩ kʼu tene o̩ya one̩,
mak e̩gbale̩ o̩ya-mi ki no̩ e̩wñ tod e̩ne̩ omune̩,
Todu e-le̩ ma chʼudu e̩bie̩ne̩;
todu una ki afʼe̩wñ lie̩ gbogbo tʼef e̩kpabie̩ e-le̩ che,
Omi ma fʼeju kpʼo̩la adu-mi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ bo,
mak abʼu nache e̩gba kʼO̩jo̩ kwane̩?
I chʼe̩ne̩ ki che mi efu iye-mi chʼowñ n?
Iche̩wñ kʼu fʼame̩nubie̩ ubi bʼe̩wñ ki dʼuma e̩do̩ te̩,
abe̩k omi kate gugu abu e̩wñ-mi je̩,
(o̩da, akwʼo̩jo̩ okolobia-mi i dʼugbo mi agba dabe̩ne̩ kʼu chʼata-wñ,
iche̩wñ kʼomi li e̩ne̩ du ki alenyo̩ tod ukpo kʼi ma ne̩ n,
iche̩wñ kʼago-wñ ma kadua ñw mi n,
iche̩wñ kʼomi chi o̩wo̩-mi nyʼate̩
mak e̩gbale̩ o̩papata ojika-mi kʼi ñwa bʼo̩ te̩,
Todu uchobi ki akwʼugbo O̩jo̩ chʼe̩wñ ubailo ñw mi,
Iche̩wñ kʼomi dʼo̩jamalia chʼukibeno-mi,
iche̩wñ kʼomi gwoguyo̩ ukpe̩ kʼu nʼe̩wñ nana tabale,
iche̩wñ kʼomi gʼolu e̩gba kʼi afu,
kʼe̩wñ le̩ gwʼe̩do̩-mi o̩gwo̩ maja maja,
e-le̩ ma ño̩ chʼudu kʼamakajo̩ abʼudu-wñ ñw mi,
Iche̩wñ kʼomi gwoguyo̩ abu ku ma fʼe̩ne̩ kʼi chulaka-mi kpabie̩,
(ochochi, omi je̩ ñw alu-mi dure
iche̩wñ kʼaboke̩le̩ unyabo-mi ma ka n, kakini,
(ilowa ru ojukpologu n;
i la chʼe̩wñ kʼu dʼechada-mi maja dab Ade̩m,
todabu kʼu railo o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile,
O, omi ma nʼe̩ne̩ʼka kʼi agbʼomu-mi!
Omi ma mʼu du nʼika-mi ale chuu;
U ma choli e̩re̩-mi kʼu chi ñw u;
Iche̩wñ kʼane̩ uche̩-mi kwa achagwunyu mi,
iche̩wñ kʼomi je̩ ura-wñ kʼu ma rʼo̩me̩ ñw u n,
mak ikeke ki tiga koji e̩wñ e̩yo,
Abe̩le̩ abo me̩ta-i we ohi edu ñw Job, todabu kʼi chʼe̩no̩kpakpa eju o̩la-wñ.
Tak E̩laihiu o̩ma Barake̩l, e̩ne̩ Buz kʼi dʼef olo̩pu Ram kwowe̩do̩. I we̩do̩ru Job ukpe̩ kʼi adale ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi ma dale ñw O̩jo̩ n.
I ño̩ we̩do̩rʼamonuku Job me̩ta le̩ ukpe̩ ku ma ma li ohi du n, ma la kpa Job abi kpo̩.
E̩laihiu le̩ la kpo̩kpe̩ tak i ko̩la ñw Job ukpe̩ ku ma chʼogijo ñw u.
Tak e̩gba kʼE̩laihiu li ka kʼohi du dʼef alu abo me̩ta le̩ n, i kwowe̩do̩.
Oñ E̩laihiu o̩ma Barake̩l e̩ne̩ Buz le̩ dohi kakini:
U kakini, Ogijo ki ka ta,
Afuʼka muda dʼef e̩ne̩ du,
I chʼame̩ne̩lile nʼibe n,
Todule̩ u kakini, Netirʼumi;
Go, omi neju uko̩la-me̩,
U netirʼame̩,
Nago, tode̩gba ku me̩ kakini, A fʼibe li me̩;
I chʼomi i kʼo̩la ñw u n,
Ugoju mʼuma da dago, ma ño̩ dohi ge̩ n;
Omi achechi dago ukpe̩ kʼoli kpotʼuma alu?
Omi ñʼadohi ukpe̩ e-mi ge̩;
Todu uko̩la chekʼumi efu,
Go, ef e̩do̩-mi dab achiwebe̩te̩ma ki ma nʼawo kʼafu-wñ ale dufu n;
Nako̩la, kʼe̩do̩-mi ki bo̩;
U nʼe̩nejuma du n, agba
Todu u meju ma akʼurinyo̩ o̩fa n,
Alu du ki de̩, Job, agba, e̩ gbʼo̩la-mi ke, netirʼuko̩la-mi chaka.
Go ta, u mʼalu-mi chi te̩ me̩;
O̩la-mi aka o̩kpakpa ki dʼe̩do̩-mi,
Afu O̩jo̩ che mi,
Uwe̩ neke che, mak e̩ dohi ñw mi;
Go, omi dʼalu kʼuwe̩ de̩ ugbo O̩jo̩;
Ailo e-mi era anyʼuwe̩ okpo n;
Uwe̩ la ka oñ eti-mi gbo̩,
U che̩fe̩, i nʼada du kʼu je̩ n;
Go, i atene aida mi,
I mʼumi e̩re̩ ko nyʼodo,
Go, ohi nadu ñw e̩ kakini, E̩ nʼo̩kpakpa ef e-le̩ n.
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ bʼo̩ ja?
Todu O̩jo̩ ako̩la lʼo̩naʼka,
Ef o̩na ena kpʼane̩ ego odu,
e̩gbale̩ i abi eti amone̩,
todu kʼi rʼone̩ da bʼibe kʼi ñwa te̩,
I agwo̩nyʼonugo one̩ ubi bʼenyʼef o̩lo̩ulu te̩,
Ma ño̩ dʼiwo̩ wa akʼone̩ e̩wñ oj ate̩-wñ,
Todule̩ efu-wñ ahihie̩ne̩ uje̩wñ,
O̩re̩la-wñ aje̩ rinyo̩, ku ma we eliʼu;
Ochochi, onugo-wñ aleme̩ru o̩lo̩ulu me̩,
Iche̩wñ kʼonuche̩ʼka dʼugbo-wñ,
tak i amo̩la ñw u, kʼi ño̩ kakini,
o̩re̩la-wñ achʼetito̩ dab imo̩to̩;
I arodubʼO̩jo̩, oñ i aliʼu eju,
i anʼeli ako̩ eju amone̩, oñ i aka kakini:
I mʼonugo-mi gba kʼi we enyʼef o̩lo̩ulu,
Go, O̩jo̩ ache e̩wñ-i du kpʼone̩,
kʼi mʼonugo-wñ du dabi kwʼo̩lo̩ulu wa,
E̩ go nyo̩nyo̩, Job, netirʼumi;
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ nʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ ka, dohi ñw mi;
I ma nʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ ka n, mak e̩ netirʼumi;
Tak E̩laihiu dohi kakini:
Me̩ netirʼo̩la-mi, ame̩ amanibe-i, dʼeti tʼo̩la-mi, ame̩ ku me̩ mʼe̩wñ;
todu eti ajʼo̩la ma
Awa ki tu e-ki tʼo̩kpakpa kʼa dʼu;
Todu Job ka kʼowñ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa,
narʼemi nyʼo̩kpakpa-mi;
E̩ne̩ dabu Job?
kʼi tale kpʼamachʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩
Todu i kakini,
Todule̩ me̩ netirʼumi, ame̩ ku me̩ mʼoji e̩wñ,
Todu alu kʼuko̩lo̩ one̩ de̩, abe̩le̩ i arʼo̩me̩ ñw u,
Ochochi, O̩jo̩ ache e̩wñ bibi du n,
E̩ne̩ dʼo̩da ile̩ ñw u?
Iche̩wñ ki chʼo̩la-wñ kate oñ e̩do̩-wñ tʼo̩,
mak o̩re̩la du alenyo̩ alukate,
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ chemʼoji e̩wñ, e̩ gbʼe-i ke;
E̩ne̩ʼkate kʼajo̩ o̩kpakpa chʼe̩wñ ulaka-wñ anʼo̩da one̩?
E̩ne̩ ki aka ñw onu kakini, Uwe̩ e̩nebili,
kʼamagboji ma chʼame̩nejuma-wñ n,
Achigili ma leku;
Todu eju-wñ tʼo̩na o̩na e-one̩,
I nʼe̩chubi kpʼojiji uku
Todu i dʼiko te̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du
I kajo̩ amagbiti tak i fʼuma ge̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩ n,
Abu kʼi fʼuko̩lo̩-ma ma nyo̩nyo̩,
I agwo ma dajane̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩ne̩bibi
todabu ku ma muna bʼetʼo̩ ubi te̩,
todule̩ oñ inaku ame̩nubie̩ le gbogbo tʼugbo-wñ,
i dʼuñmi wa, e̩ne̩ akpʼo̩ abi?
todu kʼe̩ne̩ ki ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n ki we ejʼo̩fe̩,
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini,
e̩wñ kʼomi ma li n, e̩ ko̩ mi;
Uro̩me̩-wñ adʼalu ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩,
Abo ku ma mʼoji e̩wñ aka ñw mi kakini,
Job ma e̩wñ kʼi aka n,
Ma ma jʼiJob ma gbogbo nyane̩,
Todu i ñʼajʼada manyʼadure kʼi ta;
E̩laihiu dohi kakini:
E̩ nibe ka kʼe-le̩ chʼo̩kpakpa?
Kʼuwe̩ aka kakini, ile e̩wñ i ane̩ ñw mi?
Omi adohi ñw e̩,
Chʼeju-we̩ nyʼojale kʼe̩ go;
Uwe̩ dure fa, ab e-le̩ achʼo?
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ chʼo̩kpakpa fa, ile e̩wñ owñ aje̩ ef e-le̩?
E̩wñ bibi-we̩ neke chʼone̩ e̩go̩-we̩,
Todabu kʼone̩ ete̩mane̩ chʼo̩gbe̩nugbe̩ amone̩ jʼakwa;
I muda nʼe̩ne̩ du ki aka n, kakini, Ugbo O̩jo̩, Acho̩na-mi,
I aje̩ ñw a nʼibe tʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ile̩ le,
O̩mo̩ ma jʼakwa, i la adohi ñw ma n,
Ochochi, O̩jo̩ agbʼo̩la ibe̩te̩ n,
Ab e̩ chaka ka kʼuwe̩ aliʼu n,
Fa-i, ukpe̩ kʼO̩jo̩ ma wa fejudʼe̩ ef uwe̩do̩ n,
todule̩ oñ Job achi alu-wñ ako̩la o̩wai,
E̩laihiu ño̩ ka kakini:
Fe̩do̩je̩ kpʼomi pe̩e̩ ta, oñ nañʼuwe̩,
Omi akʼe̩wñ ema-mi kwʼo̩najiji wa,
Todu ochochi, uko̩la-mi chʼolemi n;
Go, O̩jo̩ gbiti, i muda dʼe̩wñ du rʼo̩che̩ke̩ne̩ n;
I adejutʼiñmi ame̩ne̩bibi n,
I adʼeju-wñ bʼame̩no̩kpakpa te̩ n,
Iche̩wñ ku ma fʼuma ji igbaligba
e̩gbale̩ i aje̩ ñw ma ma e̩wñ ku ma che
I ñʼabi eti-ma rʼo̩la eko̩che̩,
Iche̩wñ ku ma neti ku ma la rʼo̩,
Iche̩wñ ku ma ma muda nyeti n,
Ama ame̩nayechi ef e̩do̩-ma agba uwe̩do̩ jo̩ ñw o̩la-ma;
Ma aku o̩jo̩ okolobia-ma,
I nʼo̩bata-ma agba ame̩no̩bata,
Ochochi, i dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi gwʼuwe̩ o̩gwo̩ kwef alu ekpama kʼe̩ kpama te̩
Udu ku ma bu ñw ame̩ne̩bibi muda che̩ko̩ efu-we̩;
Nago, tode̩gba kʼuke̩do̩fulu agwʼuwe̩ o̩gwo̩ kʼe̩ chane̩ echʼe̩de̩te̩;
Aku kʼe̩ ro̩ agbʼo̩na nyʼo̩pe̩cha-we̩?
E̩ ki ño̩ ñeju o̩jo̩ edu,
Nago, e̩ ki rida tʼef e̩wñ ibe̩te̩ n,
Go, O̩jo̩ dʼatate̩ ef ukpahiu-wñ;
E̩ne̩ ka ñw u ka kʼo̩na kʼe̩ le de̩?
E̩ narewa kʼe̩ diba ñw uko̩lo̩-wñ,
Amone̩ du mʼeju korʼu;
Go, O̩jo̩ tabale, a la mʼo̩ n;
Todu i afa ito̩ ito̩ omi tʼatate̩,
oñ ojale akʼe-le̩ dajane̩,
E̩ne̩ du neke mʼoji alu ku ma fʼakpa akpa fa te̩?
Go, i fʼugane̩-wñ nadala te̩ lʼo̩la-wñ daka,
Todu e-le̩ i adu kajo̩ amone̩;
I akʼo̩mamanya bʼo̩wo̩-wñ ma,
Akpabana chʼonuche̩-wñ ki ka kʼi lewa me̩,
I-i e̩do̩-mi ñʼaga tod e-le̩ ge̩, oñ i mu chi bʼe̩gu-wñ te̩.
Me̩ neti, me̩ netirʼekuku omu-wñ
I atʼo̩ no̩ kʼi ko̩la ugbo du o̩gane̩ efojale,
Ubi le̩ tak omuʼka akwa;
Omu O̩jo̩ ki aka akpabana chʼawuwu;
Todu i aka ñw isno kakini, Lewa bʼane̩ ma;
I fʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ du hiuko̩,
Tak ame̩wñ iñmi oko du atʼef ura-ma,
O̩lulu akwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ wa,
Iñmi kʼO̩jo̩ ñmiru oñ omi mud ais,
I-i, i akʼadu omi jʼef akpa ki jukpa,
Ef o̩wo̩-wñ ma jo̩ ku ma tale okokolo,
dagba i je̩ ñw u wa kʼi chʼitali, dagba i chʼutod ane̩-wñ,
Gbo̩ e-i, O Job;
Uwe̩ chema alu kʼO̩jo̩ ache kʼi añwa ñw ma?
I chetʼe̩ ibe alu kʼi che kʼi kʼakpa ne jo̩?
abile kʼukpo ubo̩lama-we̩ akpuna
Uwe̩ neke fʼojale nadala te̩,
Ko̩ wa o̩la kʼa aka ñw u;
One̩ aka ñw u ka kʼomi neku o̩la eka?
Fa-i amone̩ neke go ugane̩
O̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ una ada kʼi chʼuto̩ eju dab o̩jamalia;
Odobao̩gagu—awa neke gwili-wñ n;
Todule̩ oñ amone̩ arailo-wñ;
Taku Jihofa dʼef ololo adohi ñw Job, i kakini:
E̩ne̩ nʼuko̩la kʼe̩wñ ema ma dʼef uwñ-i n agwʼohi o̩la ji taa?
Fʼe̩wñ lʼago-we̩ de kʼe̩ fʼo̩la e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mu,
Ugbo uwe̩ de̩ e̩gba kʼu dʼe̩re̩ ile̩-i nyʼane̩ taa?
E̩ne̩ ka kʼab e̩ñwa-wñ ade̩ de̩—e̩ chema chuu!
E̩wñ ma dʼe̩re̩-wñ nyane̩ oji wñ?
Abu kʼilawo ilawo inajo̩ jʼakʼeli,
E̩ne̩ la rʼo̩na o̩na ohimini abadi,
e̩gba kʼu kʼakpa chʼe̩wñ ubo̩lama-wñ,
Kʼu la fʼo̩me̩-wñ hi te̩,
kʼu kakini, Emi uwe̩ akade, uwe̩ ale gu emi du n,
Akwʼe̩gba ku ma bi we̩, uwe̩ ñwa ñw o̩jo̩ ki añwa mama me̩? Kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw ane̩ ki ma uña-wñ ugbo kʼi ane̩?
Todu kʼi gwo̩nyʼeti afe̩ ane̩ ile̩,
I arida alu kʼo̩bia arida e̩gba ku ma dʼe̩wñ ehiuko̩ kamʼo̩,
Ma fʼugane̩-ma fa ubi bʼame̩ne̩bibi te̩,
E̩ gudu tʼugbo kʼomi ohimini abadi abi kwo me̩?
Ma mʼalaku alaku uku du tejugede ñw e̩?
Uwe̩ nʼibe alu kʼunabe̩ ile̩ de̩?
Ugbo chʼo̩na unyi ugane̩?
Todu kʼe̩ mʼu du le tʼo̩ja-wñ
Uwe̩ chema, todu ma fʼe̩ bi e̩gba le̩ me̩,
E̩ mugudu tʼef akpulu ugbo ku ma kʼisno jo̩?
Owñ chʼe-kʼu kojo̩ tod iko o̩bata,
Ugbo chʼo̩na tʼugbo ku ma fʼugane̩ kpe̩ru jo̩ taa?
E̩ne̩ nʼo̩cha tod omi ki alo̩ akiliwo le̩?
Kʼi kʼomi ojale wa abʼane̩ ugbo kʼone̩ du ma de̩ n ma?
kʼane̩ o̩kpakpala kʼi chihi te̩ ofo ki bo̩,
Omi ojale chenʼata?
Efu e̩ne̩ oñ ais kwo dufu?
Omi-wñ ama te̩ dab okuta,
Uwe̩ neke nʼigbaligba fʼO̩ya O̩machi ji?
Uwe̩ neke nʼilawo ilawo dufu iko-wñ?
Uwe̩ ma e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ e̩wñ efojale?
Uwe̩ neke chʼomu-we̩ nyʼate̩ kʼi kad akpa,
Uwe̩ neke kpʼo̩mamanya uche̩, kʼi alo
E̩ne̩ dʼibe tʼefu?
E̩ne̩ nʼibe kʼi akʼakpa aluka?
E̩gba kʼebutu acha ajʼugboʼkate kʼi ma te̩
Uwe̩ neke do̩de̩ e̩la ñw ole idu kʼi je̩?
E̩gba ku ma hi e̩do̩ mane̩ ye̩ye̩ ef unyi-ma,
E̩ne̩ akʼuje̩wñ jo̩ ñw o̩tagalama,
E̩ chema iko kʼamewo oko abi o̩ma?
E̩ neke kaluka ochu ochu ku ma je̩?
Owñ chʼe̩gba ku ma hi ofe wʼane̩,
Amo̩ma-ma agbiti alo, ma ne̩ ma gba o̩do̩da pee;
E̩ne̩ tʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ oko tane̩ kʼi lo-wñ?
E-kʼomi dʼegbili me̩de̩de̩ chʼunyi-wñ,
Utu ki dʼef ewo chʼe̩de̩te̩ eju-wñ;
I tʼoj uwo uwo ale kʼi chʼokije̩-wñ,
E̩fa jʼache e̩wñ ñw e̩?
Uwe̩ neke nʼiku ji e̩fa kʼi akʼe̩be̩ ñw e̩?
Uwe̩ ake̩do̩nʼo ukpe̩ kʼukpahiu-wñ tabale?
Uwe̩ adʼo̩ rʼochochi ka kʼi akʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩-we̩ wʼunyi?
Obijim anʼika dala;
Todu i atʼe̩ge̩-wñ no̩ jʼef ane̩,
i la agbenyo̩ ka kʼe̩re̩ neke kpʼo̩fo̩ mʼane̩,
E̩do̩-wñ kparʼamo̩ma-wñ dabe̩ne̩ ki ma chʼowñ ne̩ n;
todabu kʼO̩jo̩ ma dʼibe ñw u,
E̩gba kʼi adʼika kʼi ra,
Uwe̩ dʼukpahiu ñw anya?
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw u ta dab imiejo?
I dʼef o̩go̩ adʼo̩wo̩-wñ gwʼane̩, ukpahiu-wñ chʼuyo̩-wñ;
