I akerʼe̩wñ ailo, e̩do̩-wñ la ada kpu n;
Ahiagba ako̩la nyʼu o̩la,
I achʼo̩ko̩, i alo̩fu kʼi kʼane̩ mi;
O̩kakachi ogu fʼo̩la ka, i kakini, Ibaa!
Ibe e-we̩ je̩ ñw uji ada?
Uwe̩ ñwa ñw o̩re̩ tak i ate̩gu
I adodo oj apata, oñ i akʼunyi-wñ
O̩mo̩ i atejane̩ e̩la kʼi amu;
Amo̩ma-wñ amie̩ e̩bie̩;
Oñ Jihofa ño̩ ka ñw Job kakini:
E̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ du ma nyʼo̩ eju n akobʼOdobao̩gagu?
Taku Job dohi ñw Jihofa, i kakini:
Go, omi chʼe̩wñ o̩che̩ke̩ne̩ ofo; ab u nadohi ñw e̩?
Omi ko̩la onuʼka me̩, u ñʼadohi ge̩ n;
Taku Jihofa dʼef ololo le̩ adohi ñw Job, i kakini:
Fʼe̩wñ lʼago-we̩ de, kʼe̩ fʼo̩la e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mu;
Uwe̩ ñʼatu ajo̩ kʼu naka ge̩?
Uwe̩ nʼo̩wo̩ dab e-O̩jo̩?
Kʼe̩gahi kpʼuto̩ nyʼo̩la ke;
Kʼo̩fu uwe̩do̩-we̩ dajane̩,
Kejurʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi ake, kʼe̩ fʼu hi wa ne̩;
Ko ma maja jʼugboʼkate ef ebutu;
Tak omi agogbodʼe̩,
Go o̩kaku kʼomi ño̩ che manyʼuwe̩ ge̩;
Go ta, ukpahiu-wñ dʼago-wñ,
I ata otihi-wñ dab oli sida;
Achiku-wñ chʼologbo ebijeikpa,
Owñ tʼo̩gba ef uko̩lo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ che;
Todu uwo uwo akʼuje̩wñ dufu ñw u
I adachi ofe oli lotus,
Oli lotus le̩ chʼolubo̩ abʼo ma;
Go, ohimini chaka wobi, i ajʼakpukputu n;
I kʼeju jo̩, one̩ neke mʼu?
E̩ neke nʼuwo̩ fa Lifayatan du-fu?
E̩ neke dʼiku tunyʼiñmo̩-wñ?
I agbo̩ko̩ ño̩ gbo̩ko̩ bʼe̩?
I jʼakpʼalo kpʼuwe̩?
Uwe̩ adʼu chiya dab e̩we̩?
Amame̩ja anyʼaja-wñ?
E̩ neke kʼo̩daji ro̩nyʼu kʼugbo du año̩-wñ ma abo̩ n?
Dʼo̩wo̩ kadʼo ke;
Go, e̩do̩ one̩ ki kibeno ka kʼi adʼu akpabie̩;
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki nʼe̩do̩ kʼi adʼu e̩do̩ kwane̩ n.
E̩ne̩ dʼe̩wñ ñw mi ejodudu kʼu nadabi dʼakoji ñw u?
I chʼe-e̩wñ año̩la-wñ ojoji ojoji le̩,
E̩ne̩ neke gwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ jʼane̩?
E̩ne̩ neke bi olugbana eju-wñ?
Ikpako ki bʼubi-wñ ma o̩gba o̩gba chʼuba-wñ,
I kad omune̩ kʼafu ma nekʼale agbagba-wñ n.
I chegamʼomune̩;
Achifo-wñ abʼuna,
O̩go̩ una la akwef alu-wñ dufu;
Odudu la akwef iñmo̩-wñ dufu,
Afu iñmo̩-wñ adʼuna tʼige̩,
Ukpahiu ru o̩lo̩-wñ,
Ikpe̩ o̩re̩la-wñ gamʼomune̩,
E̩do̩-wñ gbiti dab okuta,
E̩gba kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ kwane̩, amagbiti achokpo;
Dagba one̩ nʼo̩kwo̩chageli gwoda, i chʼo abu du n;
Ebije dab e̩gbe eju-wñ,
O̩fa aje̩ ñw u ra n;
I fʼugbo̩lo̩ oli lorʼikakpunu egbe ofo;
Efu-wñ ki akulu ane̩ chʼanade ki ale̩;
I aje̩ ñw ugbo ki nefu ki na dab ucha;
I ache kʼikpa-wñ ki fane̩ atʼo̩ ubi;
E̩go̩-wñ ki ma arailo n, dʼile̩ n.
I ago e̩wñ du ki jʼatate̩;
Taku Job dohi ñw Jihofa kakini:
U chema ka kʼuwe̩ neke che e̩wñ du,
E̩ne̩ nʼuko̩la kʼe̩wñ ema ma dʼef uwñ-i n akʼo̩la kʼu lo maja taa?
Gbo̩ ta, o̩ko̩ nagbabʼe̩ oñ nako̩la;
Eti-mi gbʼinabali-we̩ akwoubi,
todule̩ nahihie̩ne̩ o̩la-mi-i,

Abe̩le̩ abu ku Jihofa fʼo̩la le̩ ka ñw Job kpa, Jihofa ka ñw E̩laifaz e̩ne̩ Teman le̩, kakini: Uwe̩do̩-mi mutajo nyʼuwe̩ kpʼamonuku-we̩ meji le̩; todu o̩la-mi ku me̩ ka le̩ tʼo̩kpakpa alu kʼe-adu-mi Job de̩ n.

Todule̩ fa-i, me̩ mʼamo̩kokuno̩ mebie kpʼokolo mebie ko, ku me̩ nyʼugbo adu-mi Job, ku me̩ kʼe-le̩ wa chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo tod o̩la-me̩; tak adu-mi Job achadua todu me̩, todu omi agbʼe-wñ tode̩gba kʼu che me̩ alu kʼidada-me̩ de̩; todu ame̩ kʼo̩la-mi tʼo̩kpakpa, alu kʼadu-mi Job ka n.
Abe̩le̩ E̩laifaz e̩ne̩ Teman le̩, kpai Bildad e̩ne̩ Shuha, kpai Zofar e̩ne̩ Naaman, le tekeche e̩wñ ki Jihofa ka ñw ma; oñ Jihofa mʼe-Job gba.
Taku Jihofa mʼe̩wñ Job rida, e̩gba kʼi fʼologu che tod amonuku-wñ; oñ Jihofa dabi kʼe̩wñ ñw Job tʼalu kʼi ne̩ akwoubi le onu meji.

Tak amo̩maye-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ onobule̩ kpʼabo du kʼi ma ma akwoubi, wʼugbo-wñ, oñ ma bʼo̩ jʼuje̩wñ ef unyi-wñ; oñ ma jʼachʼiwo̩-wñ, ma nyʼu e̩do̩ tod e̩bie̩ne̩ du ku Jihofa ko wa abʼo ma le̩. E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma la dʼo̩ko̩ʼka kpʼelika o̩jamaliaʼka ñw u.

Abe̩le̩ Jihofa de̩nyo̩ ñw otitala Job tʼejodudu-wñ le; oñ i nʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩gwe̩le̩ kpʼaminyakulumi icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩fa, kpʼamokuno̩ ku ma ne̩ lʼuche̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩; kpʼamo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ole icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ge̩.
I ño̩ nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mebie kpʼamo̩ma onobule̩ me̩ta ge̩.
I dʼodu e-ejodudu ko Je̩maima; ekeji ko Kezaya; e̩ke̩ta la ko̩ Ke̩re̩n-hapuk.
I nʼabobule̩ du ku ma fe̩reju dab amo̩ma onobule̩ Job ojane̩ le̩ du n; ata-ma la kpʼe̩wñ ogu ñw ma alu kʼi kpe̩ ñw amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩.
Abu kʼe-le̩ kpoji chaka Job ño̩ deju o̩do̩ ogbo̩ mebie ge̩, i la li amo̩ma-wñ kpʼamaaju-wñ gbogbo kad o̩gba o̩gba me̩le̩.
Oñ Job gbo nana; i kpojolugbo ololo, tak i leku.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi ma alule̩ tʼikpa alu kʼame̩ne̩bibi akʼo̩ n,
kʼuko̩-o̩la Jihofa la cherʼowñ e̩do̩,
Owñ la adab oli ku ma ne eti aji aji,
Ame̩ne̩bibi dʼabe̩le̩ n,
Todule̩ ame̩ne̩bibi ñʼanʼe̩rane̩ ef ajo̩ n,
todu Jihofa chema o̩na abo̩kpakpa,
E̩wñ chi kʼabo uche̩ichi jʼalo̩fu-i?
Amonu ile̩ kʼo̩la-ma dojo̩,
A ki fʼigbaligba-ma jada,
E̩ne̩ ki gugu efojale le̩ anyanyi,
E̩gbale̩i ako̩la ñw ma ef uwe̩do̩-wñ,
Alu du ki de̩ omi mʼonu-mi du jo̩fe̩
Alu kʼuhio̩me̩-wñ de̩, naka dufu:
Tʼumi ene oñ nakʼabo uche̩ichi chʼe̩wñ ogu-we̩ kʼe̩ je̩,
Uwe̩ anʼo̩kpa ebije kpa ma fo̩,
Todule̩, ame̩ amonu, eju-me̩ ki ne̩ ke;
Me̩ nare̩ Jihofa kpai e̩gahi,
Me̩ ki dʼalu kʼO̩ma le̩ alu tode̩gba kʼi awe̩do̩, kʼame̩ la lenyo̩ ej o̩na;
O Jihofa, gʼab ame̩nuja-mi wewe nyʼo̩gba!
Amone̩ wewe nʼo̩la onugo-mi aka kakini,
Uwe̩, O Jihofa, muda chʼugbe̩yo̩ ki lʼumi de,
U nʼomu-mi akwado̩ Jihofa,
U kwodachi, u lolu;
Narailo one̩ icham icham wewe
O Jihofa, kwane̩!
Ujadu chʼe-Jihofa;
Dohi ñw mi e̩gba kʼu nadʼe̩, O O̩jo̩ e-o̩kpakpa-mi!
O̩ ame̩ amo̩ma aboke̩le̩, gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ ojima-mi amud e̩wñ achukata ta?
Ame̩ ki muda ma ka ki Jihofa fʼe̩ne̩ ki akpe̩do̩rʼu date̩ ñw o̩la-wñ me̩;
Me̩ we̩do̩, me̩ ki muda dure n;
Me̩ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ o̩kpakpa wa,
Amone̩ wewe jo̩ akakini, E̩ne̩ aje̩ ñw a li e̩nyo̩?
Uwe̩ mʼuyo̩ du tʼef e̩do̩-mi tʼe-ki dʼef e̩do̩-ma
Tʼedachi-mi, tʼolu ele̩-mi, ure̩do̩ i che;
Netirʼuko̩la-mi, O Jihofa;
Nyʼomu ukwa-mi eti,
O Jihofa, uwe̩ agbʼomu-mi odudu;
Todu uwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ kʼe̩wñ bibi du ma rʼe̩ eju n;
Abo ku ma buba adago jo̩ eju-we̩ n;
Uwe̩ afʼabo ku ma rʼolemi chile̩che̩;
I muda chʼomi, ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ ki che̩kute̩
O Jihofa, ne̩ mi le ef o̩kpakpa-we̩
Todu e̩wñ kpaka dʼef alu-ma n;
Kpa ma abi, O O̩jo̩;
E̩ ki muda je̩ ñw abo du ku ma chubiyʼuwe̩ gwoguyo̩, ama ki chʼo̩ga uyo̩ ogbegbele̩;
Todu uwe̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩no̩kpakpa, O Jihofa;
O Jihofa, e̩ ki dʼo̩la bi mi ef uwe̩do̩-we̩ n,
O Jihofa, li mi eju todu u gwe̩gbo te̩;
E̩do̩ ache onugo-mi kpukputu.
Mudabiwa, O Jihofa, gbʼonugo-mi tane̩;
Tod urewa-we̩ du dʼef uku n;
Ifi efi fʼumi hia me̩;
Eju-mi agbe̩ noj e̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩,
Me̩ kwo bʼumi te̩, ame̩ amachuko̩lo̩ ibe̩te̩ chaka;
Jihofa fʼo̩ko̩-mi kʼu gbabʼo̩ gbo̩ me̩;
Anyo̩ amu ame̩nebi-mi chaka, o̩la-ma la aga gogodo;
O Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi, uwe̩ nachubiyo̩;
tode̩gba ku ma fʼonugo-mi na alu kʼidu afʼe̩wñ na,
O Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi, iche̩wñ kʼomi fʼe-i che,
iche̩wñ kʼu dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ro̩me̩ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ chʼoka kpʼomi
mak e̩ je̩ ñw e̩nebi le̩ ki ranʼonugo-mi kʼi fʼu mu,
Kwane̩, O Jihofa, ef uwe̩do̩-we̩,
Ujeju amone̩ amone̩ ki donyʼuwe̩ daka:
Jihofa añwa amone̩ du go;

Todu i adʼumi maja ef ala-wñ o̩jo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩;
Fai taku ma adʼoji-mi kwane̩
O Jihofa, e̩gba kʼu nachʼomu-mi nyʼate̩ akwa, gbo̩ ke,
Uwe̩ kakini, Me̩ tene eju-mi.
E ki dʼeju-we̩ maja ñw mi n.
E̩gba kʼata-mi kpai iye-mi hi umi tinyo̩,
Ko̩ mi o̩na-we̩, O Jihofa;
E̩ ki dʼumi ñw e̩wñ ki dʼabo ku ma che mi o̩pe̩cha e̩do̩ n;
I ma chʼabu kʼu do̩ rʼochochi ka kʼu nali e̩nyo̩ Jihofa
Nede Jihofa;
O Jihofa, uwe̩ nakwado̩-i;
Gbʼomu o̩ko̩ kʼu nagba,
E̩ ki fa mi alo manyʼame̩ne̩bibi,
Du ñw ma likpa alu kʼuko̩lo̩-ma de̩,
Todabu ku ma ma nyʼe̩wñ ki Jihofa ache eti n,
Jihofa ki nʼele!
Jihofa chʼukpahiu-mi kpai ugbe̩yo̩-mi;
Jihofa chʼukpahiu-ma,
Fʼabo-we̩ jadu, kʼe̩ la de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩wñ ogu-we̩;
Ame̩, amo̩ma agbiti le̩, me̩ bumo̩ Jihofa,
Me̩ ki bʼojima odu-wñ mo̩ Jihofa;
Omuko̩la Jihofa bʼeju omi omi ma;
Omuko̩la Jihofa chegboka,
Omuko̩la Jihofa agu oli sida che̩,
I aje̩ ñw ma ñwugu dab o̩mokuno̩,
Omuko̩la Jihofa ada nyaa.
Omuko̩la Jihofa ami aje̩tachi ejo,
Omuko̩la Jihofa aje̩ ñw ame̩la abi-kolo bi o̩ma,
Jihofa gugu oj uwobi omi le̩;
Jihofa adʼukpahiu ñw abo-wñ!
O Jihofa, nadʼuwe̩ nʼoji ago, todu e̩ fʼumi fa dufu me̩,
O Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi, u kwadʼe̩,
O Jihofa, e̩ mʼonugo-mi du kwef o̩jegu dufu me̩,
Me̩ kʼeli do̩ Jihofa, ame̩ ku me̩ kpe̩do̩rʼu le̩,
Todu e̩ chʼeju be oñ uwe̩do̩-wñ takpa,
I chʼomi, e̩gba kʼe̩wñ ra ñw mi le̩,
O Jihofa, eli mi eju kʼe̩ li mi eju,
U kwadʼe̩. O Jihofa;
Ile e̩wñ dʼef e̩bie̩-mi edafo?
O Jihofa, gbo̩, kʼe̩ li mi eju!
Uwe̩ fʼeku-mi ede̩ rida tef ido eta me̩;
todu kʼojima-mi ki nakʼeli do̩ uwe̩, ki we echi echi.
O Jihofa, uwe̩ nachubiyʼo̩; e̩ ki je̩ ñw anyo̩ mʼumi o̩gbegbele̩ n;
Hi eti-we̩ wane̩ ñw mi,
Todu uwe̩ chʼokuta-mi kpai aku-mi;
mʼumi yo̩ kwef iga ku ma du maja te̩ ñw mi-i,
Uwe̩ nadʼafu-mi nyʼo̩wo̩;
Abo ku ma nyʼe̩wñ o̩wai eti chʼe̩wñ ulaka-mi;
E̩do̩-mi bo̩ oñ nayo̩ ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩,
uwe̩ la da mi hi tef o̩wo̩ e̩nebi le̩ n;
Li mi eju, O Jihofa, todu u dʼef o̩pe̩cha;
Todu udeju-mi akpabie̩ ñw e̩do̩-dudu,
U mud oli ina ñw ame̩no̩la-mi chaka,
Ibe-mi kwef e̩do̩-ma dab e̩ne̩ ki ku;
U gbo̩ alu kʼamone̩ wewe akpa mi bie̩—
U muda ke̩do̩nʼuwe̩, O Jihofa,
Iko-mi du jʼef o̩wo̩-we̩;
Je̩ ñw eju-we̩ ki chʼugane̩ bʼadu-we̩-i ma;
Je̩ ñw anyo̩ ki mʼumi n, O Jihofa,
Je̩ ñw uko ki aremi ki mud ajalu,
E̩nyo̩ kʼuwe̩ do̩wo̩mo̩ te̩,
Uwe̩ ako ma maja uña umaja o̩gba-we̩
Jihofa ki nʼele,
I chʼe-mi, edejiji kʼu dejiji u kakini,
Ame̩ ki fe̩do̩ Jihofa, ame̩ ku me̩ kpe̩do̩rʼowñ chaka!
Fʼeju gbiti, me̩ ki la fʼe̩do̩ gbo,
E̩ne̩ ku ma tʼada kʼi je̩ no̩ ñw u,
E̩ne̩ ki Jihofa ma lo udu rʼu n,
E̩gba kʼu chechi, achiku-mi gbe̩ rinyo̩
Todu odu kpʼo̩ro̩ka o̩wo̩-we̩ nʼumi oji te̩;
U je̩ ñw e̩ ma adure-mi,
Todule̩ e̩ne̩ du ki akpe̩do̩rʼuwe̩
Uwe̩ chʼuña umaja-mi,
Nakʼe̩ ibe oñ nakʼuwe̩ o̩na kʼuwe̩ ale
Me̩ ki dab anya abe̩k imiulu ku ma ma mʼoji e̩wñ n;
E̩ne̩bibi anʼe̩do̩dudu wewe;
E̩do̩-me̩ ki bo̩ efu Jihofa,
Me̩ fʼo̩ga uyo̩ chi efu Jihofa, O ame̩ ame̩no̩kpakpa!
Me̩ ki nʼumolo gogbodo̩ Jihofa,
Me̩ ki kʼeli etito̩ ñw u,
Todu o̩la Jihofa chʼo̩kpakpa;
I afe̩do̩ e̩wñ o̩kpakpa kpai ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka;
Lugbo o̩la Jihofa oñ ma che efojale efojale,
I akʼomi ohimini abadi jo̩ dab ugbudu;
Ile̩ du ki narailo Jihofa,
Todu eka i ka oñ i do̩mo̩;
Jihofa aje̩ ñw o̩la kʼabo uche̩ichi alo ki mud ibe̩te̩:
O̩la ki Jihofa alo adago ogbegbele̩,
Abo ichiki Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩-ma gbede,
Jihofa dʼefojale akejuru,
ugbo kʼi dodo i anyope̩ ago
owñ ki abo̩ e̩do̩-ma chaka,
Onu afʼo̩la-wñ jadu lugbo abogu-wñ ki wewe n;
Anya egbʼone̩, chʼolemi,
Go, eju Jihofa bʼabo ku ma railo-wñ ma,
kʼi gba onugo-ma bʼuku te̩,
Onugo-wa do̩mo̩ anede Jihofa;
Todu e̩do̩-wa ayo̩ ef uwñ,
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ ki bʼuwa ma, O Jihofa,
Nakele Jihofa iko tʼiko du;
Onugo-mi aje̩nyu efu Jihofa;
O ame̩ ki bʼumi je̩ ñw Jihofa kʼi nana nyo̩gba,
Omi tene Jihofa oñ i dohi ñw mi,
Ma kejurʼowñ oñ eju-ma mune̩;
E̩no̩bata-i fʼukwa kwa, oñ Jihofa gbʼo̩,
Onuche̩ Jihofa aruru lʼabo
O ame̩ ki jama ku me̩ li ka ki Jihofa chenyo̩!
O ame̩ ki railo Jihofa, ame̩ abo-wñ kiafo̩,
Amo̩ma idu nʼe̩gba ku ma chʼame̩nukpa, i nʼe̩gba kʼebi akpa ma;
Te̩wa, ame̩ abimo̩to̩, netirʼo̩la-mi,
Ugbo one̩ de̩ kʼiñmi chenyʼo̩ eju,
Fʼukpalu-we̩ de bʼe̩bie̩ne̩ te̩,
Kwo bʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ te̩, kʼe̩ che e̩nyo̩;
Eju Jihofa chefe̩rʼabo̩kpakpa,
Eju Jihofa chekparʼabo ku ma che e̩wñ bie̩ne̩,
Abo̩kpakpa kwa. Jihofa la agbo̩,
Jihofa me̩rʼabo kʼe̩do̩-ma chʼe̩kpabie̩,
E̩wñ bie̩ne̩ ki ake̩re̩bʼe̩no̩kpakpa chewewe;
I ade achiku-wñ;
E̩bie̩ne̩ ako ame̩ne̩bibi kpa;
Jihofa ala onugo amadu-wñ tane̩;
Jihofa, e̩ ki bʼabo ku ma jʼumi iñwa jiñwa;
Gwo̩nyʼugbe̩yo̩ kekele kpʼe-lile,
E̩ ki ño̩ mʼo̩kwo̩ wo̩ kʼe̩
Je̩ ñw anyo̩ ki mu abo
Je̩ ku ma dab igbogbo kʼafu ako alo,
O̩na-ma ki chʼugbo ki chubi kʼi la nʼito̩lo̩,
Todu iga ku ma du maja ef ura anede mi nʼe̩te̩ n;
Je̩ ñw uchile̩che̩ ki lewa bʼo ma iko kʼi ma nʼibe-wñ n!
Tak onugo-mi ayo̩ efu Jihofa,
Achiku-mi du aka kakini,
Ame̩nibenu o̩lachi akwane̩ me̩;
E̩bie̩ne̩ ma du rʼumi o̩me̩ e̩nyo̩;
I muda chʼe-mi, e̩gba ku ma chʼo̩ga—
u chʼo̩la-mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼi chʼonuku-mi abe̩k o̩maye-mi;
Ama e̩gba kʼomi achika ma yo̩,
ma lʼenyi bʼumi ma,
Ondu, gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ uwe̩ adago ago ofo?
Nagogbodʼuwe̩ ef ujeju lile le̩;
E̩ ki je̩ ñw ame̩nebi-mi olemi ofo
Todu ma ko̩la ure̩do̩ n,
Ochochi, ma chi alu-ma te̩ fo̩o̩ rʼumi;
O Jihofa, uwe̩ fʼu li me̩; e̩ ki chechi n!
Dʼo̩la-we̩ e̩do̩ kwane̩, kʼe̩ la mʼolu ji kʼe̩ fʼoji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa-mi kpa ñw mi,
O Jihofa, O̩jo̩-mi, kʼajo̩-mi likpa alu kʼo̩kpakpa-we̩ de̩;
E̩ ki je̩ ñw ma we eka ef e̩do̩-ma kakini,
E̩ ki je̩ ñw anyo̩ ki mu abo ku ma yo̩ tod e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ki ke̩re̩bʼumi
Je̩ ñw abo kʼo̩kpakpa-mi che̩wʼuma eju
Ukpalu-mi la anʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa-we̩
Ada kʼe̩ne̩bibi aje̩ nʼakomu ef e̩do̩-wñ
Todu i ache kʼe̩wñ du ki de̩ me̩e̩le̩ eju o̩la-wñ
O̩la alu-wñ chʼibe̩te̩ kpai akpaine̩;
I añwʼibe e̩wñ ibe̩te̩ oj ate̩-wñ;
O Jihofa, ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ dʼefojale efojale,
O̩kpakpa-we̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼuwo uwo e-O̩jo̩,
O O̩jo̩, akoko ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ gbe̩gbe̩!
Ula ki dʼunyi-we̩ akʼuma e̩fu,
Todu ugbo-we̩ oñ e̩bi omi iñmi de̩;
O uwe̩ ki je̩ ñw ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ ki
E̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩re̩ uba ki wa akobʼumi n,
O̩mo̩ amachuko̩lo̩ ibe̩te̩ lewane̩ me̩,
E̩ ki kpe̩do̩bie̩ tod amachʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ n,
Todu ma aja ma dab egbe fai fai,
Ke̩do̩no̩ Jihofa, kʼe̩ la che e̩wñ e̩nyo̩;
Eliura-we̩ ki ño̩ chʼefu Jihofa,
Mʼo̩na-we̩ lino Jihofa;
I aje̩ ñw o̩kpakpa-we̩ kwodufu dab ugane̩,
Chechi o̩gba Jihofa, kʼe̩ fe̩do̩je̩ anede owñ;
We ewe̩do̩, kʼe̩ la hi uke̩do̩fulu-we̩ tinyo̩!
Todu ama akʼamachʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ da rinyo̩;
I bo re ta, tak e̩ne̩bibi le̩ ma ñʼado̩mo̩ ge̩ n;
Ame̩ne̩chikimi muda aje̩ ane̩-i,
E̩ne̩bibi añwa e̩wñ nyʼe̩no̩kpakpa,
Ondu muda anyanyi-wñ,
Ame̩ne̩bibi mʼo̩kwo̩chageli-ma wo̩ ma la fʼo̩o̩do̩ fa,
o̩kwo̩chageli-ma agwunyʼe̩do̩ e-ma onugo,
E̩wñ ree kʼe̩no̩kpakpa ne̩ nyo̩
Todu ma agwʼo̩wo̩ ame̩ne̩bibi che̩;
Jihofa chema eñini ñʼo̩na e-abo ki mufu,
anyo̩ la amu ma iko e̩bie̩ne̩ n,
Ame̩ne̩bibi muda alenyo̩;
E̩ne̩bibi ame̩ e̩wñ, i la ara n,
todu abo kʼowñ de̩nyo̩ ñw ma aje̩ ane̩-i e̩wñ ogu,
Jihofa fʼugbo kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ adʼe̩re̩ tʼo̩ ñwo̩che te̩ ñw u,
dagba i wane̩, i chʼedʼu tinyo̩ o̩pioo de̩ n,
U chʼimo̩to̩ g bog bo, u la mud ogijo me̩;
I chʼemo̩la, i ame̩ e̩wñ ñw one̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩,
Kwo bʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ te̩ kʼe̩ che e̩wñ e̩nyo̩;
Todu Jihofa afe̩do̩ ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka;
Abo̩kpakpa aje̩ ane̩-i e̩wñ ogu,
Alu e̩no̩kpakpa nʼe̩wñ ibe aka,
Uko̩o̩la O̩jo̩-wñ dʼef e̩do̩-wñ;
E̩ne̩bibi afʼeju bʼe̩no̩kpakpa le,
Jihofa atʼo̩ no̩ tef o̩wo̩-wñ n,
Nede Jihofa, kʼe̩ la fʼo̩na-wñ de,
U fʼe̩ne̩bibi li e̩gba kʼukpahiu-wñ abailo,
I muda lale rinyo̩, e̩ la go, i ño̩ de̩ ge̩ n;
Kejurʼe̩ne̩ ki mufu, e̩ la go e̩no̩kpa kpa,
I chʼe-abo ku ma jʼada ño̩ jʼada, ma akpʼuma fo̩ rinyo̩ alukate;
Ujadu ame̩no̩kpakpa muda dʼugbo Jihofa;
Oñ Jihofa ate̩ko ma i la agba ma te̩;
O Jihofa, e̩ ki dʼo̩la bi mi ef uwe̩do̩-we̩ n,
Todu o̩fa-we̩ fʼumi mu gbali,
Todu e̩do̩-we̩ ki kpa oñ o̩re̩la-mi ugbo du ma bo̩ n;
Todu udu kʼu fe̩ ko̩ alʼumi oji me̩;
Agbe-mi alu, i agbʼe̩ño̩
i fʼumi o̩lo̩ go̩, i la fʼumi pu wane̩ tabale;
Todu ago-mi kpa gaa chaka,
O̩la-mi muda gbe̩ne̩ke̩, i awo̩ mi tabale;
Ondu, e̩wñ kʼu nañeju-wñ du jʼo̩gba-we̩,
E̩do̩-mi ache kpu kpu, ukpahiu-mi atakpa;
Ame̩nufe̩do̩-mi kpai abo ku ma me̩ru mi hi o̩la-ma wʼubi bʼatulubo̩-mi te̩,
Abo ku ma tene oji-mi ño̩ bʼoku ne te̩,
Omi muda gbo̩ n, dabe̩ne̩ kʼu chʼajeti,
Ochochi, omi dab e̩ne̩ kʼeti-wñ ma agbo̩la n,
Todu, uwe̩ Jihofa oñ naneju-wñ;
Todu u kakini, Tode̩gba ku ma gwoye rʼumi oji,
Todu u fʼo̩la ule̩ echika mu me̩,
Todu nadʼudu kʼu fe̩ ka dufu,
O̩la ame̩nebi-mi muda ale̩, ma gbiti,
Abo ku ma dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ rʼo̩me̩ e̩nyo̩ la chʼame̩no̩la-mi
E̩ ki hi umi tinyo̩ n, O Jihofa!
Hiane̩ wa kʼe̩ te̩ko mi,
U kakini, Nafejutʼo̩na o̩na kʼu nale,
U chechi te̩ dab ajalu,
e̩do̩-mi kpa efu-mi.
Jihofa, e̩ je̩ ñw mi ma ukpoji-mi,
Go, uwe̩ je̩ ñw o̩jo̩-mi chʼo̩gaba o̩wo̩ ofofo,
Ochochi, one̩ atale dabe̩ne̩ kʼojiji ofo!
Ondu, e̩wñ omi anede-wñ fai ge̩?
Mʼumi gba bʼada du kʼu je̩ te̩.
U mud ajalu, u chi alu n;
Mʼatulubo̩-we̩ du bʼumi o̩la te̩;
E̩gba kʼe̩ nuka akʼone̩ o̩la
Gbʼadua-mi, O Jihofa,
Mʼeju-we̩ rida bʼumi te̩, kʼe̩do̩-mi ki lewane̩,
U te̩taneju ño̩ neju Jihofa;
I mʼumi du kwef ura ugbo kʼekuku de̩,
I la mʼeli etito̩ du tʼumi alu,
E̩ne̩ ki adu Jihofa chʼuke̩do̩no-wñ gbede,
O Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi, uwe̩ je̩ ñw uko̩lo̩-we̩ ki fiteju
E̩wñ e̩bie̩ kpai e̩wñ ele rʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ n;
Tak u kakini, Go, u lewa me̩;
i cherʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu nache e̩wñ ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩, O O̩jo-mi; ochochi, uko̩-o̩la-we̩ dʼef e̩do̩-mi.
Omi fʼuche̩nyo̩ o̩kpakpa je̩rʼabo ujeju lile me̩;
U fʼo̩kpakpa-we̩ gwebo ef e̩do̩-mi n,
O Jihofa, uwe̩ ki do̩wo̩mʼejumomi o̩gbaje̩je̩-we̩ ñw omi n;
Todu e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ ki ma nʼaluka n donyʼumi daka-i;
O Jihofa, i ki nyʼuwe̩ eju kʼe̩ mʼumi gba!
Je̩ ñw anyo̩ ki mu abo ku ma tene onugo-mi ku ma fʼu kpabie̩
Je̩ ñw abo ku ma ka ñw mi kakini, Ibaa, ibaa!
E̩ muda je̩ ñw abo ku ma tene we̩
Omi chʼe̩no̩bata kpai e̩nale;
E̩ne̩ ki anyi ame̩nubie̩ eti, gbede Jihofa agbʼo̩ o̩jo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩;
Jihofa adejutʼo̩ i aje̩ ñw oji-wñ do̩mo̩;
Jihofa adʼu yʼe̩do̩ oj ate̩ o̩ga-wñ;
U kakini, O Jihofa, lʼumi eju;
Ame̩nebi-mi akʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ nyʼumi kakini:
I la che̩wñ kʼi lewa fejudo mi, e̩wñ o̩wai i aka,
Abo ku ma chulaka-mi chaka dʼo̩la-mi tʼaka nyʼomune̩ eti
Ma ka kʼe̩wñ ebiliʼka danyʼu o̩la le̩;
Ochochi, onuku-mi o̩lali e-kʼu ke̩do̩nʼo,
Ama uwe̩, O Jihofa, e̩ ki lʼumi eju,
Ugbo e-i oñ u ma ka kʼu che rʼuwe̩ e̩do̩,
I la chʼe-mi, uwe̩ agwo̩nyu mi dago ef e̩do̩ foo-mi,
Jihofa ki nʼele, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l,
Alu kʼabede ache fafafa atene omi,
Alugbe̩ O̩jo̩ akpa onugo-mi,
Omi aku-mi te̩te̩chʼuje̩wñ-mi tʼodu tʼo̩ro̩ka,
Ibe-mi chekadʼe̩wñ-i,
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ dʼoji lo̩ efu-mi, O onugo-mi?
O O̩jo̩-mi, onugo-mi fʼoji dalo̩ efu-mi,
Unefu akwado̩ unefu
Jihofa adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ te̩ o̩ro̩ka;
Naka ñw O̩jo̩, okuta-mi, kakini:
Ame̩no̩la-mi jʼabʼumi ina,
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ dʼoji lo̩, O onugo-mi?
Fʼajo̩-mi ka o̩kpakpa, O O̩jo̩, kʼe̩ gbʼomu-mi ka
Todu uwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ ukpahiu-mi;
O, e̩ fʼugane̩-we̩ kpʼochochi-we̩ kpe̩ dufu;
E̩gba le̩ tak u nanyʼugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ O̩jo̩,
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ dʼoji lo̩, O onugo-mi?
Awa nʼeti-wa gbo̩ me̩, O O̩jo̩, amata-wa ka ñw a,
uwe̩ nʼo̩wo̩-we̩ fʼabo uche̩ichi ne dufu,
Todu i chʼugbada e-ma oñ ma ne̩ gbʼane̩ le̩ n,
Uwe̩ chʼOnu-mi O O̩jo̩-mi,
Lugbo we̩ oñ a akʼabo ku ma kobʼuwa e̩che̩ wane̩;

Abe̩le̩ ma aje̩ ñw ma kʼe̩re̩, ukpalu-ma onugo akobʼuma;
Tak amone̩ du arailo;
E̩do̩ e̩no̩kpakpa abo̩ efu Jihofa,
Uñwulo̩ chechi jo̩ Zayo̩n ñw e̩, O O̩jo̩;
O uwe̩ kʼe̩ gbʼadua le̩!
Udu e̩fe̩ tʼumi le̩.
E̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ achi kʼi te̩wa kʼi gugu ef ologbo-we̩, gbede!
Uwe̩ anʼe̩wñ ubailo dʼohi o̩kpakpa ñw a,
kʼuwe̩ nʼukpahiu fʼe̩re̩ uwo uwo lonyane̩,
uwe̩ ki aba uwe̩do̩ ohimini abadi,
oñ abo ku ma dodo ukpoji otitala
Uwe̩ lewa afejudʼane̩ ile̩-i me̩, e̩ la chʼomio̩fo rʼu,
Uwe̩ atʼomiofo rʼe̩be̩-wñ kʼi wo̩ ane̩,
Uwe̩ adʼe̩nyo̩-we̩ chʼike̩be̩ o̩do̩ o̩do̩ ki da;
Ura-wñ akito̩ jʼojije̩ ki dʼaje̩tachi,
okije̩ okije̩ akʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini bʼo̩la-ma,
Me̩ ki kpogu uyo̩ ñw O̩jo̩, ame̩ abo ile̩ du;
Me̩ dʼojima odu-wñ kʼeli dʼo̩;
Ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, Ubailo uko̩lo̩-we̩ gbe̩!
Abo ile̩ du adojikane̩ ñw e̩;
Me̩ lewa ku me̩ gʼuko̩lo̩ O̩jo̩:
I mʼohimini abadi rida ane̩ e̩gbe̩;
ugbiñmi-wñ i adu nʼo̩da e̩wñ du ogbegbele̩,
O ame̩ amone̩, me̩ keli O̩jo̩-wa,
owñ ki mʼonugo-wa du gugu ef iñmi,
Todu uwe̩, O O̩jo̩, e̩ fʼuwa ñwago me̩;
Uwe̩ fʼuwa mu ef iga;
uwe̩ je̩ ñw amone̩ tanʼanya ale oji-wa;
Omi anʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo agudu wʼef unyi-we̩;
todu uko-mi muchi
Nakʼe̩la ki yoyo wa achʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gu jo ñw e̩,
Me̩ lewa ku me̩ gbo̩, ame̩ ku me̩ rʼailo O̩jo̩ chaka,
Omi nʼalu-mi akwa dʼo̩,
Omi ma li ibe̩te̩ ef e̩do̩-mi,
O̩jo̩ muda gbʼo̩ me̩, ochochi;
O̩jo̩ ki nʼele,
O̩jo̩ ki lʼuwa eju kʼi la dʼe̩nyo̩ ñw a
kʼama ki ma o̩na-we̩ ane̩-ile,
Je̩ ñw amone̩ amone̩ gogbodʼe̩, O O̩jo̩;
O je̩ ñw e̩do̩ abo uche̩ichi ki bo̩ ku ma nakeli uyo̩,
Je̩ ñw amone̩ amone̩ gogbodʼuwe̩, O O̩jo̩!
Ane̩-ile̩ kʼe̩ro-wñ dufu me̩;
O̩jo̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw a;
O̩jo̩ ki kwane̩, ame̩ne̩bi-wñ ki mukpatuka;
Alu kʼafu akʼodudu rinyo̩, abe̩le̩ e̩ ne̩ ma rinyo̩;
E̩do̩ ame̩no̩kpakpa abo̩;
Kʼeli ñwʼO̩jo̩, kʼeli do̩ odu-wñ;
O̩jo̩ kʼi gugu ef unyi ugugu-wñ ki-afo̩ le̩
O̩jo̩ aje̩ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼowñ kate gugu kʼi nʼunyi;
O̩ O̩jo̩, e̩gba kʼe̩ dufu atʼabo-we̩ o̩gba,
ane̩-ile̩-i kwomiejo, efojale ño̩ mugulo̩ bʼile̩ ma eju O̩jo̩;
O O̩jo̩, uwe̩ gʼe̩do̩la-we̩ kʼe̩wñ ele wa bʼe̩wñ ogu-we̩ ma;
a bo-we̩ e-iñmi gugu o̩mo̩;
Ondu adʼo̩la te̩;
Amonu udala udala abogu jʼara, era ma ra!
e̩gba kʼame̩ dachi alumeji iga iga amala le̩—
E̩gba kʼOdo̩bao̩gagu fʼamonu kpatuka rʼef uwñ,
Uwo̩ Beshan chʼuwo e-O̩jo̩;
Ame̩ uwo uwo ki gbo̩gba le̩, e̩wñ chi ku me̩ jʼagʼuwo
O̩ko̩ ogu O̩jo̩ chʼicham ogue̩lu,
Uwe̩ mute̩gu tʼatate̩ me̩,
Ondu ki nʼele̩,
O̩jo̩-wa chʼO̩jo̩ ki agbʼone̩;
O̩jo̩ muda adʼe̩wñ gwo ame̩nebi-wñ oji,
Ondu kakini, Naño̩ ko ma dabi kwo Beshan wa,
kʼuwe̩ ki dʼe̩re̩-we̩ tunyʼe̩bie̩,
Elo kʼe̩ lo le̩ ma fʼu li me̩, O O̩jo̩,
amakeli mʼo̩gba du, abo ku ma nu e̩wñ tʼo̩ ubi,
Ame̩ ki kele O̩jo̩ ef ujeju ujeju,
O̩mo̩ Be̩njamin kekele, kʼi nʼo̩da-ma de̩,
O̩jo̩-we̩ fʼukpahiu-we̩ ñwate̩;
Todu unyi-we̩ kʼi de̩ Je̩rusale̩m
Dejurʼe̩la kʼi dʼef e̩che̩,
Amidachi akwʼIjipti wa;
Me̩ keli do̩ O̩jo̩, ame̩ ojane̩ ojane̩ ile̩-i;
owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi tane̩ efojale e-efojale kʼi jʼo̩mo̩ kwʼigbelegbele;
Me̩ dʼukpahiu ñw O̩jo̩,
O O̩jo̩, ailo-we̩ aba, kwʼef uña uña-we̩ kiafo̩,
Jadu mi, O O̩jo̩!
Epio̩ ki nʼefu,
Aku kʼu naro̩ fʼumi hia;
Abo ku ma chʼulaka-mi echichi ofofo
O O̩jo̩, uwe̩ chema idada-mi;
O Ondu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du,
Todu i chʼutod uwe̩ oñ omi chʼoli-ina-i,
Omi mud e̩ne̩ o̩wo̩ ejaduña ñw amo̩maye-mi,
Todu e̩do̩-mi ki tʼunyi-we̩ mʼumi ibe ko,
U la raku, onugo-mi najialu,
E̩gba kʼu kʼe̩gbanukpo chʼe̩wñ ubʼo̩la-mi ma,
Abo ku ma gugu jʼalaku adʼo̩la-mi te̩ aka,
I muda chʼe-mi, uwe̩ nachaduwa ñw u, O Jihofa.
Mʼumi gba kwef e̩pio̩-i
E̩ ki je̩ ñw uwobi omi lʼumi oji n,
Dohi ñw mi, O Jihofa, todu ufe̩de̩-nyo̩-we̩ nyo̩ gbe̩;
E̩ ki la dʼeju-we̩ maja bʼadu-we̩-i te̩ n;
Te̩ me̩rʼonugo-mi, kʼe̩ mʼu gbatane̩,
Uwe̩ chema ina-mi,
Ina ku ma bʼumi fʼumi e̩do̩ kpabie̩,
Ma ño̩ mʼololo du chʼuje̩wñ-mi,
Ite̩bulu e-ma ki mud ada te̩ ñw ma;
Eju-ma ki chubi ku ma we egane̩;
Mʼubieju-we̩ dudanyʼuma oji,
Je̩ ñw uru-ma ki mud alache̩,
Todu ma doli e̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ kpʼo̩ igbe̩ le̩,
E̩ ki bʼudu manyʼudu ñw ma;
Je̩ ñw ma fʼuma kpalu bʼef ubuku e-iñmi te̩;
Ama omi muda chʼe̩no̩bata kpai e̩ne̩ iwo̩;
Nanʼeli je̩nyu ñw odu O̩jo̩;
E-le̩ anyo̩ Jihofa eju tʼo̩kokuno̩ le
Ame̩ne̩do̩chikimi fʼu li me̩, e̩do̩-ma la bo̩;
Todu Jihofa agbʼomu e̩nale,
Efojale kpai ane̩-ile̩ ki naje̩nyʼu,
Todu O̩jo̩ ajadu Zayo̩n
ugbe̩ amadu-wñ lañʼaje̩ o̩mo̩ e̩wñ ogu,
O O̩jo̩, mʼumi gba!
Je̩ ñw anyo̩ ki mu abo ku ma tene oji-mi
Je̩ ñw abo ku ma ka kakini, Ibaa, ibaa, ki mudabi wʼubi
Je̩ ñw abo du ku ma tene we̩
Omi muda chʼe̩no̩bata kpai e̩nale;
Uwe̩, O Jihofa, nachubiyo̩;
Mʼumi gba ef o̩kpakpa-we̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw mi fʼuma o̩wo̩ tane̩;
Uwe̩ ki chʼokuta ugbo kʼu nagugu,
O O̩jo̩-mi, je̩ ñw mi fʼe̩ne̩bibi le̩ o̩wo̩ tane̩,
Todu uwe̩ chʼukibeno-mi, O Ondu Jihofa,
Uwe̩ oñ omi dachino kwef uwile̩;
Omi dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ uno̩ ñw amone̩ wewe;
Alu-mi ako̩ ñw uñwulo̩-we̩,
E̩ ki hi umi tinyo̩ o̩jo̩ ogijo-mi n;
Todu ame̩nebi-mi nʼo̩la-mi aka,
ma kakini, O̩jo̩ tʼo̩ no̩ tinyo̩ me̩;
O O̩jo̩, e̩ ki jiji rʼumi n;
Je̩ ñw anyo̩ ki mu abo ku ma chʼe̩no̩la onugo-mi kʼi fʼuma lie̩;
Omi muda akibeno o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩,
Alu-mi anʼo̩kpakpa-we̩,
Nawa ef ukpahiu Ondu Jihofa,
O O̩jo̩, uwe̩ te̩tako̩ mi e̩wñ kwʼo̩jo̩ imo̩to̩-mi,
I-i, u chaka chʼogijo kʼiloji-mi chʼefufu,
O O̩jo̩, o̩kpakpa-we̩ ño̩ dʼatate̩ ge̩.
Uwe̩ kʼe̩ mʼo̩pe̩cha ki bie̩ne̩ wewe du ña wa le̩
Uwe̩ aje̩ ñw unana-mi ki nyo̩gba,
Naño̩ nʼufele ago̩gbo̩dʼuwe̩
Uko-mi achʼo̩ga-uyo̩,
Ukpalu-mi ñʼanʼoluka o̩kpakpa-we̩ ache
Dʼoji ajo̩-we̩ ñw onu kʼi kpa, O O̩jo̩,
O̩wñ anʼo̩kpakpa kpʼoj ajo̩ amone̩-we̩,
Uwo uwo akʼure̩do̩ wa ñw amone̩,
I akpʼoji ajo̩ ame̩no̩bata ku ma jʼef amone̩,
Alu kʼukpo̩kpe̩ olu de̩ abe̩le̩ ma arailo we̩ kade,
I agwo̩ru wa dab omiojale kʼi ajo̩ bʼoj egbe ku ma ja etito̩ ma,
O̩kpanachi e-wñ oñ e̩wñ ara ñw ame̩no̩kpakpa,
Owñ ñʼanʼo̩da kwʼohimini abadi oka gbogbo wa kadʼohimin! abadi ekeji, le̩ gbogbo wʼukpoji ile̩-i!
Abo ku ma dodo ef aje̩tachi ate̩kpe̩ o̩gba-wñ,
Amonu Tarshish kpai amonu ala ala akʼe̩wñ ele wa,
Ochochi, amonu du adojikane̩ o̩gba-wñ,
Todu e̩gba kʼe̩nale akwa, i agbʼo̩,
Owñ ali e̩nubie̩ kpʼe̩nale ejumomi,
I agba onugo-ma tane̩ bʼuji kpai o̩lachi te̩;
Owñ la adeju,
E̩wñ e̩yo̩ achʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩
Odu-wñ ado̩mo̩ ogbegbele̩,
Jihofa O̩jo̩, O̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l ki nele,
Oñ odu-wñ e-ojima le̩ ki nele ogbegbele̩;
Aduwa Defid, o̩ma Je̩si le̩, kpojime̩.
Ochochi O̩jo̩ che nyo̩ ñw abo Israe̩l,
I la chʼe-mi, e̩re̩-mi bo̩ pe̩ kʼi le,
Todu e̩gba kʼu li alu kʼe̩wñ ara ñw ame̩ne̩bibi,
Todu uku-ma awo̩ ma n;
Ma chʼakanya dab abo ki bo̩ n;
Todule̩ uba lʼuma o̩fa de dabe̩ne̩ kʼiyagba;
Oyo-ma akʼo̩kpo̩ e̩yo̩ eju-ma dufu,
Ma ke, ma nʼo̩la e̩wñ afuma eche aka bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩;
Ma dʼalu-ma gugu efojale,
Todule̩ amone̩-wñ adabi wʼemi;
Oñ ma kakini, Ab O̩jo̩ ale kʼi ama?
Go, ame̩ne̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ de̩;
U fʼe̩do̩-mi gwe̩ ki fe̩ echichi ofofo ochochi,
Todu i nʼe̩wñ agwo mi gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩,
Omi ma kakini, Ab omi aka de̩.
E̩gba kʼu do̩mo̩ akpibe alu kʼu nale kʼu namʼoji-wñ,
gbogbo tak u le tef uña kiafo̩ e-O̩jo̩,
Ochochi, uwe̩ mʼuma ko gugu ugbo ki añwo̩;
E̩ dʼeju be, ma mud akpokpo e̩wñ jo̩,
Alu kʼo̩na de̩ e̩gba kʼone̩ jʼolu,
E̩gba kʼe̩do̩-mi kpabie̩ le̩,
ibe e̩la u ne̩, u ma e̩wñ du n,
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ omi dʼugbo we̩ e̩gba du;
Uwe̩ anʼohi o̩la-we̩ ña mi ona,
E̩ne̩ omi ne̩ efojale?
O̩re̩la-mi kpai e̩do̩-mi agbe̩,
Todu go, abo ku ma jʼo̩na jiji ñw e̩ alenyo̩;
I muda che̩nyo̩ ñw mi kʼu te̩me̩ru O̩jo̩;
O O̩jo̩, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ko wa rinyo̩ o̩pioo ke?
Dibekado abʼujo̩-we̩, e-kʼuwe̩ ne̩
Mʼe̩re̩-we̩ chi nyʼugbo achigodo kʼi chʼo̩pioo le̩;
Ame̩no̩la-we̩ fʼukwa kwa alumeji ujeju-we̩ me̩;
I dabe̩ne̩ kʼaboke̩le̩ mʼo̩kanyi kowa abʼujo̩ oli ma.
Ma la nʼutumu kpai ugbolo oli
Ma mʼuna du tʼuña-we̩ kiafo̩ me̩;
Ma ka ef e̩do̩-ma kakini, A ki fʼuma kpo̩fo̩ hioko;
A li ujiwe-wa n;
O O̩jo̩, gbogbo wʼe̩gba oñ e̩ne̩ ki achʼuwa o̩pe̩cha le̩ ab ina kade?
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ fʼo̩wo̩-we̩ wʼubi,
O̩jo̩ muda chʼonu-mi kwʼigbele-gbe̩le,
Lugbo ukpahiu-we̩ e̩ fʼohimini abadi kpe̩ru ojoji;
Uwe̩ fʼoji oji Lifayatan kpo̩fo̩
Uwe̩ fʼe̩biomi kpai aji kpana;
O̩ro̩ka uwe̩ ne̩, uwe̩ ño̩ ne̩ odu ge̩;
Uwe̩ fʼalo̩me̩ alo̩me̩ ane̩-ile̩-i du ñwate̩;
O Jihofa, e̩ nare̩wa kakini, E̩nebi le̩ fʼe̩ bina me̩,
O, e̩ ki mʼike̩de̩ akpe̩re̩-we̩ du ñw ame̩la oko n;
E̩ nabumo̩ ñw alo le̩;
O, e̩ ki je̩ ñw abo ku ma fʼuma te̩-mane̩ le̩ ku ma dabiwa kpai anyo̩ n;
O O̩jo̩, kwane̩, kʼuwe̩ onugo ki kʼo̩la-we̩;
E̩ ki gbenyo̩ omuko̩la ame̩no̩la-we̩ n,
A go̩gbodʼuwe̩, O O̩jo̩; a gogbodo̩;
Iko kʼu date̩ jo̩,
E̩gba kʼane̩-ile̩-i kpai abo ku ma dodo ef uwñ aya,
Omi ka ñw abo ku ma je̩nyʼo̩la-ma kakini, Me̩ ki che e̩wñ uba abe̩le̩ n,
me̩ ki kʼigba-me̩ kwane̩ tʼatate̩ n,
Todu i chʼakwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu n i la achʼakwʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ n
chai O̩jo̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki akpʼoji ajo̩,
Todu ago-omiʼka dʼef o̩wo̩ Jihofa,
Omi muda adʼu ka dufu ogbegbele̩,
Omi akʼigba ame̩ne̩bibi chaka da rinyo̩,
Ema O̩jo̩ de̩ Juda,
Ebu-wñ la de̩ Sele̩m,
O̩mo̩ i fʼo̩fa ki ada ñaña guche̩ rinyo̩,
Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ e̩gahi kpʼe̩ne̩ ojima
Abo kʼe̩do̩-ma gbo mud e̩wñ kʼogu je̩;
O O̩jo̩ e-Jeko̩b, eju kʼe̩ darʼu,
Uwe̩, owñ chʼuwe̩ le̩, chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma arailo-wñ!
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw ma gbo̩ alu ku ma bʼudu ñw one̩ efojale;
e̩gba kʼO̩jo̩ kwane̩ kʼi fʼoji ajo̩ kpa
Ochochi uke̩do̩fulu one̩ agogbodʼuwe̩ chuu;
Me̩ dʼoji, me̩ ki la rʼo̩me̩-wñ ñw Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩;
I akʼafu ame̩nʼuto̩gba da rinyo̩,
Na nʼomuko̩la-mi raku do̩ O̩jo̩,
O̩jo̩ o̩pe̩cha-mi u kwo̩te̩jane̩ Ondu;
U rewa O̩jo̩, mak ifi nafi;
Uwe̩ fʼumi eju fa te̩;
U fʼe̩wñ iko igbele lo me̩,
Narewa eli kʼu ko odu;
Eko rinyo̩ e-Ondu chʼo̩gbegbele̩?
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ muda hioko?
O̩jo̩ gbenyo̩ emo̩la?
Oñ u kakini, E̩gbo-mi de̩
Narewa e̩wñ ki Jihofa che;
U ñʼayaye uko̩lo̩-we̩ du,
O O̩jo̩, o̩na-we̩ dʼef uña kiafo̩.
Uwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ aye,
Uwe̩ la nʼo̩wo̩ e-we̩ gbʼamone̩-we̩ tane̩,
Omi le̩ fʼuwe̩ li, O O̩jo̩,
Akpa ojale kʼomi dafo;
Omuko̩la akpabana-we̩ la dʼef ololo;
O̩na-we̩ la dʼef ohimini abadi,
Uwe̩ nʼamone̩-we̩ le lʼo̩wo̩ Mose̩s kpai Aro̩n
O̩ amone̩-mi, nʼeti rʼuko̩-o̩la-mi;
Nachi alu-mi ef ita;
e-kʼa gbo̩ kʼa la ma,
A dʼu maja ñw amo̩ma-ma n,
Todu i dʼo̩la ibenu dago efu Jeko̩b,
todu kʼabo̩gba ki ro̩no ma kʼi ma,
kʼama ki kibeno O̩jo̩,
kʼama ki we edab amata-ma,
Amo̩ma Ifraim, kʼo̩o̩do̩ la jʼo̩wo̩-ma,
Ma de alo O̩jo̩ n,
Oñ ma gbenyo̩ e̩wñ kʼi che,
I fʼe̩wñ aye che eju amata-ma
I fʼohimini abadi kpana meji oñ i je̩ ñw ma laic gu ef uwñ du,
I ño̩ nʼakpa ane̩ ma le o̩ro̩ka,
I fʼokuta okuta kpana ef aje̩tachi,
I ño̩ che kʼomi ki cha kwef okuta dufu dab aji,
Ma muda adʼu re alo waa,
Oñ ma jʼO̩jo̩ ma ef e̩do̩-ma
Ochochi, ma kwokalu nyʼO̩jo̩ ola, ma kakini,
Go, i dʼe̩wñ gwo okuta le̩, tak omi muke̩che̩ dufu,
Todule̩ Jihofa gbo̩, oñ i bi eju;
todabu ku ma ma dʼo̩la O̩jo̩ rʼochochi n,
I chaka ñwa ñw ojale ate̩,
i la je̩ ñw mana lo̩ abʼuma oji ma ku ma je̩,
One̩ kʼuje̩wñ amagbiti je̩;
I je̩ ñw afu o̩wo̩ olodudu kʼi ju ojale,
i je̩ ñw e̩la kʼi lo̩ bʼuma oji ma dab ebutu,
i la je̩ ñw ma wʼane̩ alumeji uru-ma,
Abe̩le̩ ma je̩ oñ efu-ma ko̩ nyo̩nyo̩,
E̩wñ ku ma ñeju-wñ le̩ la chʼuma eju n,
tak uwe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ kwane̩ akobʼuma
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma nʼadure ache kpo̩;
Todule̩ i fʼo̩joñwʼo̩jo̩ñwa-ma che ki takpa rʼane̩,
E̩gba kʼi kpa ma taku ma chane̩ etene owñ;
Oñ ma rewa ka kʼO̩jo̩ chʼokuta-ma,
Ma muda nʼurinyo̩ o̩fa aka ñw u,
Todu e̩do̩-ma chʼogbolo kpai owñ n;
Ama abu kʼowñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ali one̩ ejumomi,
I rewa ka kʼo̩re̩la ofofo ma che,
E̩re̩ monu ma lañu rʼu efaje̩tachi le̩ ta?
Taku ma ño̩ dabi ajʼO̩jo̩ ma ño̩ jʼo̩ ma,
Ma dibekado o̩wo̩-wñ n,
abu kʼi kʼujiwe-wñ dago jo̩ ane̩ Ijipti,
I la fʼohimini-ma rida e̩bie̩,
I fʼamachichi wewe wewe kpuche̩ wʼefu ma, oñ ma mʼuma ko lie̩,
I laño̩ mʼunawo e̩wñ-ma ko ñw amide̩,
I nʼokuta o̩mo̩jo̩cha kpa ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma-ma,
I laño̩ mʼame̩la-ma ki anʼadu ko ñw okuta o̩mo̩jo̩cha ge̩,
I la fʼukpuna uwe̩do̩-wñ ro̩ bʼuma oji ma,
I fʼo̩na re̩ru ñw uwe̩do̩-wñ;
I la fʼamo̩mo̩gba chaka kpa ane̩ Ijipti,
I muda ne̩ abo̩ e-wñ dufu dabe̩ne̩ kʼa mala,
1 la ne̩ ma le to̩ko̩o̩, todule̩ oñ ma ma railo n;
Tak i mʼuma ko wʼalo̩me̩-wñ kiafo̩ le̩,
I fʼabo uche̩ichi ne dufu bʼuma o̩gba te̩;
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma jʼO̩jo̩ Chamachala ma kpo̩, ma lañu rʼu, ma de o̩la ibenu-wñ n,
ama ma mubidagbʼo̩, oñ ma dʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo aro̩kpo̩ dab amata-ma;
Ma nʼotete otete-ma bi owñ eju,
E̩gba kʼO̩jo̩ gbo̩, e̩do̩-wñ kwane̩,
I hi uña kiafo̩ e-Shailo le̩ tinyo̩,
i la dʼukpahiu-wñ ñw ma mu,
I laño̩ mʼabo-wñ ko ñw o̩kwo̩chageli ge̩,
Una fʼabokolobia-ma lie̩,
O̩kwo̩chageli gwʼamata-ma da jʼane̩,
Tak Ondu mʼolu ji dabalu kʼone̩ ajʼolu kwane̩,
Oñ i nʼabo ku ma kobʼuma akpa ubiubi;
I ko̩ unyabo Jose̩f,
i muda chi o̩lo̩pu Juda,
Tak i fʼuña kiafo̩ e-wñ ko̩ dago dab uña ki gbo̩gba,
I ño̩ chi Defid adu-wñ,
ugbo ole ala ku ma nʼo̩ma ubi oñ i dʼu kwo wa
Abe̩le̩ owñ dejute̩ ma teju alu kʼe̩do̩-wñ de̩ foo,
O O̩jo̩, abuche̩ichi mugudu wʼef e̩wñ ogu-we̩;
Ma mʼoku amadu-we̩ ko
Ma kʼe̩bie̩-ma dafo dabe̩ne̩ kʼomiofo
Awa mud oli ina ugbo amekeji-wa,
Gbogbo wʼe̩gba, O Jihofa? Uwe̩ agwo̩nyʼuwe̩do̩-we̩ pioo?
Mʼuke̩do̩fulu-we̩ du danyu abo uche̩ichi
Todu ma mu Jeko̩b du mi,
E̩ ki rewa udu kʼabo-wa igbelegbele fe̩ kʼe̩ ko bʼuwa oji ma n;
Te̩ko wa, O O̩jo̩ e-ujadu-wa,
E̩wñ chi kʼabo uche̩ichi aka kakini,
E̩ ki je̩ ñw ifi kʼe̩namu afi ki gudu wʼugbo we̩;
E̩ dʼuro̩me̩ mebie tunyʼagbe̩do̩ ame-keji-wa
Abe̩le̩ tak awa kʼa chʼamone̩-we̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma jʼokije̩-we̩,
Neti, uwe̩ adide Israe̩l le̩,
eju Ifraim kpai Be̩njamin kpai Manasa!
O O̩jo̩, mʼuwa rida tʼe̩gu-wa;
O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ kʼi nʼe̩wñ du,
Uwe̩ te̩tadʼuje̩wñ omi aku ñw ma je̩,

Mʼuwa rida tʼe̩gu-wa, O O̩jo̩ kʼi nʼe̩wñ du;
Uwe̩ dʼikeliʼka kwef Ijipti wa;
E̩ fʼo̩mo̩ ñwo̩che tane̩ ñw u;
Olubo̩-wñ bʼuwo uwo le̩ ma,
i tʼe̩to̩ tʼohimini abadi,
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ gu o̩gba-wñ lo̩,
Ehi kʼi kwef oko wa nakpʼo̩ bie̩, ame̩la oko la aje̩.
Murida ge̩, egbo̩ko̩ a gbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, O O̩jo̩ kʼi nʼe̩wñ du le̩!
owñ chʼikeli kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ awo̩to̩ da nyʼane̩-i.
Una fʼu jo, i mulo̩ wane̩ me̩;

Mʼuwa rida tʼe̩gu-wa, O Jihofa O̩jo̩ kʼi nʼe̩wñ du!
Me̩ keli taa ñw O̩jo̩ ukpahiu-wa; me̩ kpogu uyo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ e-Jeko̩b!
Me̩ fʼeli da, me̩ gwu eicha,
Fʼo̩kakachi fa e̩gba kʼochu ne̩ etito̩,
Todu e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ i che todu Israe̩l,
I mʼu dute̩ efu Jose̩f kʼi chʼe̩wñ ibenu,
U mʼojika-wñ du bʼadu ene̩ te̩;
Uwe̩ dʼef o̩pe̩cha oñ e̩ do̩ mi, omi la fʼuwe̩ yo̩ dufu;
Gbo̩, amone̩-mi, tak u nagbʼibenu ñw e̩!
O̩jo̩ ejaduña adʼef uwe̩ n;
Omi che Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩,
Ama amone̩-mi nyʼomu-mi eti n;
Todule̩ omi mʼuma ko ñw e̩do̩-ma ki chʼagbo̩go̩,
O amone̩-mi ma jʼanetiru mi,
Omi ma fʼame̩nebi-ma du piopio,
Amachulaka Jihofa ma ma gbʼe̩lo̩ ñw u,

O̩jo̩ dago ef ujeju O̩jo̩ me̩;

Ma ma e̩wñ n, ma la mʼoji e̩wñ n,

Alu kʼuna akʼoko,
abe̩le̩ e̩ ki nʼafu ibi-we̩ rano ma
E̩ ki che kʼeju ki mud eju anyo̩,
Che kʼanyo̩ ki mu ma, kʼe̩do̩-ma ki muda kpu gbogbo alo; ochochi, je̩ ñw ukata-ma ki chi ku ma lenyo̩.

Todu Jihofa O̩jo̩ chʼolu kpai ikpa-ko;
O Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du,
Jihofa, uwe̩ li ane̩-we̩ eju;
Uwe̩ tʼudu kʼamone̩-we̩ fe̩ no̩;

Murida abʼawa, O O̩jo̩ e-ujadu-wa,
Uwe̩ awe̩do̩rʼuwa ogbegbele̩?

Nagbo̩ e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ Jihofa aka,
Ujadu-wñ cheme̩ru abo ku ma railo-wñ,
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ochochi de kpai o̩la-ma;
Ochochi atiga kwef ane̩,
Ochochi, Jihofa adʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ wa,
O̩kpakpa atʼowñ o̩gba,
Hi eti-we̩ wane̩, O Jihofa, kʼe̩ dohi ñw mi,
Fejutʼonugo-mi, todu e̩numo̩la u che;

Che kʼonugo adu-we̩-i ki yo̩,
Todu uwe̩, Ondu, chʼe̩ne̩nyo̩, uwe̩ hika tʼo̩la no̩ ñw one̩, ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ la chʼe̩kute̩ ñw abo du ku ma kwadʼuwe̩.
O Jihofa, netirʼadua-mi;
O̩jo̩ o̩pe̩cha-mi nakwadʼuwe̩,
I nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dab uwe̩ ef amo̩jo̩ n, O Ondu,
Abo uche̩ichi du kʼuwe̩ che awa dojikane̩
Todu uwe̩ tabale, e la ache e̩wñ aye,
Ko̩ mi o̩na-we̩, O Jihofa,

Todu ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ che kpʼomi ta bale;

Ama uwe̩, O Ondu, O̩jo̩ ejumomi kʼe̩ li one̩ eju e̩ che,
O rida aba mi, kʼe̩ mo̩la ñw mi;
Dʼujiwe e̩nyo̩ ña mi,
Unyane̩-wñ dʼoj uwo uwo kiafo̩;

O ewo O̩jo̩,
Narʼomu do̩ Rehab kpai Babilo̩n
Ma la anʼo̩la Zayo̩n aka kakini,
E̩gba kʼi akʼamone̩ nyʼef o̩takada.
Tʼabo ku ma keli, tʼabo ku ma tido, akakini,
O Jihofa, O̩jo̩ ujadu-mi,
Je̩ ñw adua-mi ki gudu wʼugbo kʼe̩ de̩,
Todu onugo-mi che̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩,
Ma fʼumi kaluka tef abo ku ma gwo̩ru tef o̩lo̩ulu;
ku ma hiʼu tinyo̩ tef abo ki ku,
Uwe̩ dʼumi dachi ef o̩lo̩ulu o̩gane̩ o̩gane̩,
Uke̩do̩fulu-we̩ dachi no mi de̩mm,
Uwe̩ mʼabo-mi ku ma ma mi ko jʼo̩najiji ñw mi me̩;
eju-mi agbe̩ noj o̩bata.
Uwe̩ achʼe̩wñ aye ñw abo ki ku?
Ma adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ ka ef ura?
Ma ama e̩wñ aye-we̩ ef e̩chubi?
Ama uwe̩, O Jibofa, naraku dʼo̩;
Jihofa, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ dʼonugo-mi tinyo-i?
Omi chʼe̩no̩bata, u te̩te̩dʼo̩wo̩ uku kwʼo̩jo̩ okolobia-mi,
Ukpe̩do̩-we̩ ki kpuna le̩ lʼumi oji;
I lʼumi de dabe̩ne̩ kʼomiofo gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩;
E̩ mʼe̩nufe̩do̩ kpai onuku ko jʼo̩najiji ñw mi me̩;
Nanʼeli ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Jihofa ako̩ ogbegbele̩;
Todu u kakini, Ma anʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ nyʼo̩gba ogbegbele̩;
Omi fʼalo kpe̩ kpai e̩ne̩-mi kʼu chi le̩,
Nafʼugbe̩-we̩ lonyane̩ ogbegbele̩,
Efojale efojale agogbodʼe̩wñ aye-we̩, O Jihofa,
Todu e̩ne̩ dʼojale ku ma du awo̩li Jihofa taa?
I dʼugbo ku ma railo O̩jo̩ tabale ef o̩hiala abo kiafo̩,
O Jihofa O̩jo̩ kʼi nʼe̩wñ du,
Uwe̩ nʼo̩da o̩fu kʼohimini alo̩ le̩;

Efojale efojale uwe̩ ne̩, ane̩-ile̩ ño̩ chʼe-we̩ ge̩;
Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki nyi o̩pata ate̩ kpai o̩pata o̩gane̩ te̩;
Uwe̩ chenʼo̩wo̩ ki gbiti;
O̩kpakpa kpai ajo̩ ochochi eka chʼudane̩ ede-we̩;
Amone̩ ku ma ma udo̩ uje̩wñ uyo̩ gbede,
ma yo̩ ñw odu-we̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩,
Todu uwe̩ chʼojima ukpahiu-ma;

E̩gbale̩ uwe̩ kʼo̩la ñw e̩ne̩-we̩ ki amo̩la le̩ ef ane̩ ego
Omi fu Defid adu-mi li me̩;
oñ o̩wo̩-mi alonyane̩ ugbo-wñ,
E̩nebi du abʼudu ñw u n,
Omi la akʼabo ku ma chʼo o̩pe̩cha gwomane̩ eju-wñ,
Ubi one̩ kʼu nache kpai ufe̩de̩nyo̩-mi adʼugbo-wñ,

e̩gbale̩ nanʼokute̩ wa fejudo ada ku ma je̩

Nabie̩ alo-mi n,
U fʼefo̩-mi go̩ onuʼka me̩;
Ugbe̩-wñ ado̩mo̩ ogbegbele̩,
I alonyane̩ ogbegbele̩ dab ochu;
E̩ la mʼu du tinyo̩, e̩ ño̩ kʼo̩,
Uwe̩ fʼalo adu-we̩ bie̩ me̩;
Uwe̩ fʼologbo-wñ chaka gulo̩ wane̩ me̩,
Abo du ku ma lale mʼu du chʼe̩wñ akpa;
Uwe̩ la mʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abo ku ma chʼo o̩pe̩cha du dago me̩; uwe̩ je̩ ñw ame̩nebi-wñ chaka ki yo̩.
Ochochi, uwe̩ mʼalu ugbada-wñ rida tʼubi,
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw e̩gahi-wñ kpade me̩,

O, e̩ nadibekado alu kʼiko-mi chʼo̩ree,
Ugbo one̩ ki adeju kʼi ma ñʼali uku n de̩?

Jihofa ki nele ogbegbele̩!
Ondu, uwe̩ te̩te̩chʼunyi ugugu-wa o̩gba o̩gba du.
O̩gba taku ma kʼuwo uwo dufu,
Uwe̩ arʼone̩ da kʼi dabi mud ebutu,
Todu o̩do̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ eju-we̩
Uwe̩ ako ma alo dabe̩ne̩ kʼuwobi omi; ma dab olu ele̩ ofo,
odudu o̩la-wñ aya oñ i agba alo;
Uwe̩do̩-we̩ afʼuwa lie̩;
Uwe̩ mʼudu kʼa fe̩ kojo̩ o̩gba-we̩ me̩,
Todu o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa e-wa chaka alale rinyo̩ ef o̩fu kʼe̩ lo̩ le̩,
Iko o̩do̩ o̩do̩ e-wa chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩gwa,
E̩ne̩ ma ukpahiu uwe̩do̩-we̩ taa?
Ko̩ wa kʼa fʼo̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa-wa kaluka
Mudabiwa, O Jihofa! gbogbo wʼe̩gba taa?
Odudʼodudu e̩ dʼufe̩de̩nye̩-we̩ ñwa kʼefu-wa ki ko̩,
E̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩do̩-wa ki bo̩ alu kʼo̩jo̩ kʼe̩ de wa ma le̩ kpo̩kpe̩ kade,
uko̩lo̩-we̩ ki kwotejugede ñw ama du-we̩ ke,

E̩ne̩ ki gugu ef uña umaja e-O̩ma-chala,
nanʼo̩la Jihofa aka kakini, Owñ chʼoko ubi-mi kpai alaku-mi;
Todu i agbʼuwe̩ bʼoku e̩ne̩ ki amʼe̩la te̩
i akʼugbogbolo ika-wñ bʼuwe̩ ma,
Uwe̩ arailo e̩wñ okpo odu n,
abe̩k e̩wñ ibi ki alule̩ ef e̩chubi n,
One̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ chaka awane̩ akolo-we̩,
Chai eju-we̩ adʼo ofofo
Todu uwe̩, O Jihofa, chʼoko ubi-mi,
uwe̩ kpʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du agbajiko n,
Todu i añwa ñw amonuche̩-wñ
E̩do̩wo̩-ma ma anʼuwe̩,
Uwe̩ adʼe̩re̩ tʼidu kpai olijo mane̩,
Todabu kʼi manyʼumi ef ufe̩do̩, naje̩ ñw u fʼuma o̩wo̩;
I akwado̩ mi, omi la adohi ñw u;
Naje̩ ñw olugbo-wñ ki bo̩jo̩ alu kʼe̩do̩-wñ abo̩,
Egogbodo̩ Jihofa chʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩,
kʼa ki dʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ ka dufu odudu,
a nʼe̩wñ ki nʼiku me̩gwa anu kpai ubo̩,
Todu uwe̩. Jihofa, je̩ ñw e̩do̩-mi bo̩ lugbo uko̩lo̩-we̩;
Uko̩lo̩-we̩ tabale, O Jihofa!
One̩ ki ache e̩wñ dab e̩la ofo ama n,
e̩gba kʼo̩la ame̩ne̩bibi aya dab egbe
uwe̩, O Jihofa, muda dʼatate̩ ogbegbele̩.
Todu go, O Jihofa, ame̩ne̩bi-we̩,
Uwe̩ muda dʼigba-mi dago dabe̩ne̩ kʼigba e̩fa me̩;

ede-we̩ chʼe̩lonyane̩ kwʼigbelegbele̩;

Tak i do̩ o̩kpo̩ta wa bʼane̩ le̩ ma,

Tak Israe̩l lewa Ijipti;

Me̩ je̩nyu ñw Jihofa!

E̩ nalibekado mi, O Jihofa, alu kʼe̩ li amone̩-we̩ eju;

Tak omiofo le̩ kwo bʼabo ku ma che ma o̩pe̩cha le̩ oji ma;

Jadu wa, O Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa,
Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l le̩ ki nʼele,
O me̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa, todu i chenyo̩,
Abo ki Jihofa gba ma tane̩ ki naka ke,

Ma tʼagojilo gojilo ef aje̩tachi ej o̩na ane̩ o̩kpakpala,
ebi kpai alugbe̩ kpa ma,

i ko ma kwef e̩chubi kpai ojiji uku dufu,
Ama ki gogbodo̩ Jihofa tod ufe̩de̩-nyo̩-wñ,
Todu i fʼo̩lugbana ebije ekpikpa kpo̩fo̩ rinyo̩,
Ma fʼame̩nidada dema todu ada ku ma je̩,
onugo-ma hihie̩ne̩ uje̩wñ du,
Taku ma raku do̩ Jihofa ef o̩pe̩cha-ma,
i fʼo̩la-wñ kpuche̩ wa, afʼo̩ga-ma che kpa,
Ama ki gogbodo̩ Jihofa tod ufe̩de̩-nyo̩-wñ,
Ama ki la chʼiche̩bo̩ ugwa ñw u,
Abo ku ma gwo̩ru tʼo̩ko̩ tʼej ohimini abadi ale,
abo e-le̩ cheli uko̩lo̩ Jihofa,
Todu eka i aka, oñ i adʼafu ibi kwane̩,
Ma te̩gu gbogbo nyʼojale, ma ño̩ dabi gwo̩ru nyʼo̩lo̩ulu ge̩;
ma mi daa, mi daa, ma la ro̩ko̩ibu dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ kʼo̩te̩ mʼu,
Taku ma raku do̩ Jihofa ef ihianyi-ma,
i je̩ ñw afu ibi ki we hiolii,
E̩gbale̩ e̩do̩-ma bo̩ todabu ku ma jo̩ yo̩o̩,
Ama ki gogbodo̩ Jihofa tod ufe̩de̩-nyo̩-wñ,
Ama ki ño̩ hi owñ tʼatate̩ ef ujeju amone̩,
I arʼaji aji da ki mud aje̩tachi,
ane̩ uro̩je̩ rida ane̩ o̩kpakpala,
I arʼaje̩tachi da chʼoduda omi,
O̩mo̩ i aje̩ ñw abo kʼebi akpa ma ki dodo,
ma kʼe̩wñ gbe̩ oko, oñ ma chi ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma ne,
1 ade̩nyo̩ ñw ma oñ ma awewe nyo̩gba ololo;
Ma dabi bu ma wane̩
i mʼe̩de̩te̩ e-wñ dudanyu ame̩numo̩la oji
i muda dʼe̩nale gugu atate̩ bʼo̩bata te̩,
Ame̩no̩kpakpa ali oñ e̩do̩-ma ayo̩;
E̩ne̩ ki nʼibe ki afʼibe tʼe̩wñ-i;
E̩do̩-mi de̩ kpoko, O O̩jo̩, eli nako̩, ochochi, nakʼeli dʼuwe̩!
Mʼolu ji, ubo̩ kpai umolo!
O Jihofa, nagogbodʼuwe̩ ef amone̩,
Todu ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ chenana legu efojale du,
O O̩jo̩, uwe̩ ki dʼatate̩ ñw efojale efojale!
Nʼo̩wo̩-we̩ awo̩to̩ jadu wa, kʼe̩ la dohi ñw a,
O̩jo̩ ka ef efo̩-wñ kakini:
Omi ne̩ Gilead; omi ne̩ Manasa;
Moab chʼukpachi ugwo̩la-mi;
E̩ne̩ adʼumi wʼef ewo ki nʼaku le̩?
O O̩jo̩, i chʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ ko wa rinyo̩ le̩ ache n?
Gbutu ñw a ef o̩pe̩cha-wa,
Lugbo O̩jo̩ oñ a ache e̩wñ ugbiti;
E̩ ki chechi n, O O̩jo̩ kʼu na-ñwulo̩-wñ!
Todu alu bibi kpai alu abo ku ma
Ma ño̩ nʼo̩la ulaka adonyʼumi daka,
Todu efe̩do̩ kʼu nafe̩do̩ oñ ma kobʼumi,
Ma la dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ro̩me̩ e̩nyo̩ ñw mi,
E̩ ki dʼo̩da-wñ tef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩bibi;
E̩gba ku ma fʼajo̩-wñ ka, e̩ ki je̩ ñw ma fʼabi kpʼo̩;
Olugbo-wñ ki jiji n;
Amo̩ma-wñ ki mud abo ku ma ma nʼata n,
Amo̩ma-wñ ki mud e̩nabobo jʼale abi e̩bi;
Abo ku ma tʼo̩ko̩ ñw u la ki mʼane̩-wñ ño̩ chaka;
I ki nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi amo̩la ñw u n,
Ame̩maji-wñ ki lu;
Ama ki re̩wa udu kʼamata-wñ fe̩ eju Jihofa,
Eju Jihofa ki kadʼo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩;
Todabu kʼi ma dibekado emo̩la ñw one̩ n,
Ochochi, i fe̩do̩ ama ena; i ki lewa bʼowñ onugo ma abe̩le̩!
I mʼama ena ko nyʼo̩la-wñ dab afe,
E-le̩ ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼukpo kʼi ako bʼo̩la ma,
E-kide̩ chʼuro̩me̩ ki Jihofa ara ñw amabulumʼume̩ le̩,
Ama uwe̩, O Jihofa Ondu,
Todu omi chʼe̩no̩bata kpai e̩nale,
U le me̩, u dabe̩ne̩ kʼojiji e̩wñ ki te̩ jiji;
Okuku-mi gbogu noj alu eji;
U la mud oli ina ñw ma;
Te̩ko mi, O Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi!
Kʼama ki ma ka kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ de̩;
Ama ki nʼama waa, uwe̩ ki muda de̩nyo̩ waa!
Ukata echi ki chʼe̩wñ kʼamabulumʼumi ako bʼo̩la ma;
Nanʼalu-mi gogbodo̩ Jihofa ololo;
Todu owñ dago o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ e̩nale,
Jihofa ka ñw ondu-mi kakini:
Jihofa anʼokute̩ ukpahiu-we̩ dala kwefu Zayo̩n dufu.
Amone̩-we̩ gʼe̩do̩la-ma akʼo̩la-ma wa dab e̩wñ iche̩bo̩
Jihofa go̩ me̩
Ondu kʼi dʼowe̩ awo̩to̩-we̩ le̩,
I akajo̩ ef abo uche̩ichi,
I añmʼomi aji ej o̩na le̩;
Me̩ ie̩nyu ñw Jihofa.
Uko̩lo̩ Jihofa chenana,
Uko̩lo̩-wñ chʼojima kpai e̩gahi,
1 che ku ma rewa uko̩lo̩ aye-wñ;
I mʼuje̩wñ ko ñw abo ku ma railo-wñ me̩;
I mʼukpahiu kʼi nachʼuko̩lo̩-wñ duña abo-wñ me̩,
Uko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-wñ chʼochochi kpai ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka;
i chʼelonyane̩ gbogbo alo ogbegbele̩,
I mʼugbone̩tane̩ du kpuche̩ rʼamone̩-wñ,
Ailo Jihofa era chʼuchane̩ ibe ene̩;
Me̩ je̩nyu ñw Jihofa.
Ugbe̩-wñ achʼagbiti ane̩ ile̩-i;
Idu kpai e̩wñ anana jʼef unyi-wñ;
Ugane̩ akwane̩ ef e̩chubi ñw ame̩-no̩kpakpa;
I ara ñw e̩numo̩ia kʼi ame̩ e̩wñ ñw one̩,
Todu ma achʼo iche̩ ogbegbele̩ n;
I arailo inabali e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼi agbo̩ n;
E̩do̩-wñ de̩ kpaka, i arailo n,
I te̩tafiʼe̩wñ tuka, i mʼe̩wñ ko ñw ame̩nale;
E̩ne̩bibi aliʼu oñ i abi eju;
Me̩ je̩nyu ñw Jihofa!
Odu Jihofa ki nele
Akwʼugbo kʼolu atadufu gbogbo tʼugbo kʼi atunyane̩
Jihofa dʼatate̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du,
E̩ne̩ dabu Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa,
E-kʼi ahiʼo̩la-wñ wane̩ kʼi go
I adʼe̩nubie̩ kwane̩ kwef ebutu,
todu kʼi dʼu gugu ef ame̩numo̩la,
I aje̩ ñw agaji kʼi fʼunyi ne̩,
E̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l kwʼIjipti dufu,
Juda mud uña-wñ ki afo.
Ohimini abadi fʼu li oñ i ra,
Uwo uwo ki gbo̩gba jʼañwugu dab amokolo,
E̩wñ chʼuwe̩, ohimini abadi, kʼe̩ ra?
Ame̩ uwo uwo ku me̩ ñwugu dab amokolo?
Uwe̩ ane̩ ile̩ e̩ namiejo, eju Ondu ki dʼane̩,
owñ kʼi mʼapata rida oduda omi,
I chʼawa n, O Jihofa, i chʼawa n,
E̩wñ chi kʼabo uche̩ichi abo uche̩ichi aka kakini,
O̩jo̩-wa dʼefojale efojale;
Ode-ma chʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia,
I nʼalu, i muda ko̩la n;
I nʼeti, i la gbʼo̩la n;
I nʼo̩wo̩, i la dʼu che e̩wñ n;
Abo du ku ma chʼo̩na-wñ adab owñ;
O Israe̩l, e̩ nake̩do̩no Jihofa!
Abo unyi Aro̩n, me̩ nake̩do̩no Jihofa!
Ame̩ ku me̩ railo Jihofa, me̩ nake̩ do̩no Jihofa!
Jihofa te̩tadibete̩ wa; i ade̩nyo̩ ñw a;
i ade̩nyo̩ ñw abo ku ma railo Jihofa,
Jihofa ki dʼu manyʼu ñw me̩ alo waa,
Jihofa mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñw me̩ me̩,
Efojale efojale chʼefojale e-Jihofa,
Abo ki ku aje̩nyu Jihofa n,
Awa muda akele Jihofa
Nafe̩do̩ Jihofa, todabu kʼi gbo̩ omu-mi kpai o̩ko̩ kʼu gbabʼo̩.
Todabu kʼi hi eti-wñ wane̩ ñw mi,
Iku uku wenyʼumi o̩la;
Tak u kwokwado̩ odu Jihofa:
Jihofa ali one̩ eju i chʼe̩no̩kpakpa;
Jihofa adejute̩ ame̩nemo̩;
Mudabi, tef uñmi-we̩, O onugo-mi;
Todu uwe̩ mʼonugo-mi gba bʼuku te̩ me̩,
Nalule̩ eju Jihofa
Omi dʼo̩ rʼochochi, todule̩ oñ u ko̩la,
u ka ef unaju-mi kakini,
E̩wñ nadu ñw Jihofa
Nadʼago ujadu,
oji kʼu da nara ñw Jihofa
Uku abo-wñ ku ma kpe̩do̩rʼowñ
O Jihofa, omi chʼadu-we̩;
Nache iche̩bo̩ ugwa ñw e̩
Oji kʼu da nara ñw Jihofa
ef ologbo unyi Jihofa,
Me̩ je̩nyu Jihofa, ame̩ abo uche̩ichi du!
Todu ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ chenana ñw a;
O me̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa, todu i chenyo̩;
Israe̩l ki ka kakini,
Abo unyi Aro̩n ki ka kakini,
Abo ku ma railo Jihofa kika kakini,
Efuña-e̩kpama-mi u kwa do̩ Jihofa;
Jihofa chʼe̩ne̩-mi narailo n.
Jihofa chʼe̩ne̩-mi i dʼef abo ku ma te̩ko mi;
Jihofa che̩nyo̩ echubiyʼo̩
Jihofa chenyo̩ echubiyʼo̩
Abo uche̩ichi du donyʼumi daka;
Ma donyʼumi, ochochi, ma donyʼumi daka;
Ma donyʼumi dabe̩ne̩ kʼamiño̩,
Uwe̩ fʼe̩wñ ro̩, ro̩, ño̩ ro̩ ñw mi bie̩ne̩ todu kʼu wane̩,
Jihofa chʼukpahiu-mi kpai eli-mi;
Uko̩la uyo̩ kpai ujadu
o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ Jihofa dago atate̩,
Omi aku n, chai edeju nadeju,
Jihofa ko̩ mi o̩la ki wo̩ mi,
Mʼalaku o̩kpakpa bi ñw mi,
Alaku Jihofa de̩;
Nagogbo̩dʼuwe̩ todu kʼe̩ mʼohi du ñw mi me̩
Okuta kʼamano̩do̩ ko̩ le̩
E̩wñ-i kwʼugbo Jihofa;
Eñini chʼo̩jo̩ ki Jihofa che;
Fʼujadu che fa-i ke, a gbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, O Jihofa!
Ekele ma kele e̩ne̩ kʼi awa ef odu Jihofa!
Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩,
Uwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩-mi, oñ nagogbo̩dʼuwe̩;
O me̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa, todu i chenyo̩;
Abo ku ma mufu jʼej o̩na le̩ gbede,
Abo ku ma de o̩la ibenu-wñ gbede,
kʼama ma ñʼache e̩wñ uji n,
Uwe̩ ñwa te̩ kʼa ki dejute̩
O o̩na o̩na kʼu nale ma chelonyane̩
E̩gbale̩ anyo̩ amu mi n,
Nanʼe̩do̩ okpoko gogbodʼuwe̩,
Omi adejutʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-we̩;
E̩wñ okolo̩bia ane̩ gwe̩ o̩na-wñ kʼi ade̩ hiolo ta?
Omi nʼo̩gbo̩ e̩do̩-mi du atene we̩;
U mʼo̩la-we̩ du maja ef e̩do̩-mi,
Uwe̩ ki nele, O Jihofa;
Omi nʼuko-mi adʼoj ajo̩
Omi te̩tayo̩ lʼo̩na o̩la ibenu-we̩,
Nayaye o̩la kʼe̩ ka ñw one̩ kʼi de le̩,
Nayo̩ ef e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-we̩;
Chʼo̩wo̩-we̩ ñw adu-we̩-i,
Uwe̩ ki mʼumi eju chi,
Ilowa omi che ane̩-ile̩-i;
Onugo-mi akpabie̩ tod eñeju
Uwe̩ adejurʼabo ku ma ke kʼama dʼoji-ma,
E̩ mʼina kpai e̩de̩te̩ liʼubi bʼumi te̩,
Amagboji ño̩ jʼane̩ achakpabie̩ mi,
O̩la ibenu-we̩ chʼuyo̩-mi,
Onugo-mi gamʼebutu;
U dʼo̩na o̩na-mi ka, uwe̩ la dohi ñw mi me̩;
Je̩ ñw mi ma o̩na o̩la kʼe̩ ka ñw one̩ kʼi de le̩,
Onugo-mi akito̩ rinyo̩ noj e̩do̩dudu;
Mʼo̩na olemi du bʼumi te̩;
Omi mʼo̩na ogbolo du me̩,
Omi gamʼo̩la ibenu-we̩, O Jihofa;
Nafule lʼo̩na uko̩ kʼe̩ te̩
O Jihofa, e̩ nako̩ mi o̩na e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-we̩;
Dʼoji e̩wñ ema ñw mi, tak u nade uko̩-o̩la-we̩
Je̩ ñw mi le ikpa uko̩ kʼe̩ te̩,
Hi e̩do̩-mi wane̩ ñw o̩la ibenu-we̩,
Mʼeju-mi rida bʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩ ego te̩;
Fʼo̩la-we̩ kʼi chʼe-abo ku ma railo-we̩,
Mʼina-mi kʼailo-wñ aba mi le̩ rida bʼumi te̩;
Go, u te̩tañeju o̩la kʼe̩ ka ñw one̩ ki de̩;
E̩ ki je̩ ñwʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ ki ño̩ wʼugbo mi, O Jihofa,
abe̩le̩ tak u nanʼohi kʼu nadu ñw e̩ne̩ ki abʼumi ina,
E̩ ki la mʼo̩la ochochi le̩ du bʼumi alu te̩ hioko n,
Abe̩le̩ tak u nadejutʼuko̩-o̩la-we̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩,
tak u nanʼo̩la-mi ale,
U ñʼanʼo̩la ibenu-we̩ aka eju amo-nu,
todu uko̩ kʼe̩ te̩ chʼuyo̩-mi,
U ñʼakʼo̩wo̩-mi dago ñwʼuko̩ kʼe̩ te̩, e-kʼu nafe̩do̩ le̩,
E̩ nadibekado o̩la kʼe̩ ka ñw adu-we̩-i,
E̩wñ ki anyʼumi e̩do̩ ef o̩bata-mi de̩
Abo ku ma ke te̩tado̩kanyi rʼumi oji dabo̩ta,
U dibekado oj ajo̩ kʼe̩ kpa igbelegbele,
E̩do̩fulu gwo̩nyʼumi gaga tod ame̩ne̩bibi,
E̩wñ uhio̩me̩-we̩ te̩te̩chʼeli-mi
Ibe-mi chʼekadʼodu-we̩ odu, O Jihofa,
E̩wñ le̩ omi ne̩,
Jihofa chʼukpe̩ e-mi;
Omi tene kpʼe̩do̩-mi chaka kʼe̩ li umi eju;
U fʼibe o̩na o̩na-mi kpe̩ me̩,
U hio̩wane̩ u la ache̩du n
Igbaligba ame̩ne̩bibi te̩tawe̩nyʼumi,
Iñaliña odu nakwane̩ agogbo̩dʼuwe̩,
Omi chʼe̩ne̩ uma abo̩ du ku ma railo we̩,
O Jihofa, ane̩-ile̩ che̩ko̩ ñw ufe̩de̩-nyo̩-we̩;
O Jihofa, uwe̩ fʼe̩nyo̩ che kpai adu-we̩
Ko̩ mi oj ajo̩ ki nyo̩ kpai e̩wñ ema,
O̩gba taku ma chʼumi ukata u chila;
Uwe̩ chenyo̩ uwe̩ la che e̩wñ e̩nyo̩;
Abo ku ma ke fʼolemi ji nʼumi oji,
e̩do̩-ma chʼula ki ma te̩ kpo̩chii,
Echʼumi ukata ku ma chʼumi ukata le̩ fʼe̩nyo̩ che ñw mi, todu kʼu ko̩che̩ e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-we̩.
Uko̩o̩la alu-we̩ chenyo̩ ñw mi
O̩wo̩-we̩ che mi i la fʼumi bo̩;
Abo ku ma railo we̩ ali mi oñ e̩do̩-ma abo̩,
O Jihofa, u chema ka kʼoj ajo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ kpa chʼo̩kpakpa,
Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ki anyʼumi e̩do̩,
Ejumomi o̩gbaje̩je̩-we̩ ki nabʼumi ma, kʼomi ki deju;
Anyo̩ ki mu abo ku ma ke,
E̩ je̩ ñw abo ku ma railo we̩ ki rida aba mi,
Che kʼe̩do̩-mi ki mufu ef uhio̩me̩-we̩,
Onugo-mi adaku tod ujadu-we̩;
Eju-mi ma tod o̩la-we̩,
Todu omi dabu aiko ef odudu una,
O̩jo̩ onu oñ adu-we̩-i aje̩ taa?
Abo ku ma ke fʼo̩fe̩ gwa jo̩ ñw mi,
Uko̩ du kʼe̩ te̩ chʼo̩kpaka;
I bo̩ re ku ma ma fʼumi lie̩ ane̩-ile̩;
Mʼiñmi du ñw mi teju alu kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ de̩,
O Jihofa,
Ubi one̩ kʼe̩ che tʼo̩gba o̩gba du;
I dago alu kʼoj ajo̩ kʼe̩ ka de̩ tʼeñini;
I ma chʼuko̩-o̩la-we̩ ki chʼuyo̩-mi n,
Nagbenyo̩ o̩la kʼe̩ ka ñw one̩ kʼi de le̩ ogbegbele̩ n;
Uwe̩ ne̩ mi, jadu mi;
Ame̩ne̩bibi kpala jo̩ ku ma fʼumi chile̩che̩;
U li ka kʼalu du kʼe̩wñ mufu i chenʼukade,
O, efe̩do̩ kʼu nafe̩do̩ uko̩-o̩la-we̩!
Uko̩ kʼe̩ te̩ je̩ ñw mi nʼibe tʼame̩nebi-mi le,
Omi chemʼoji o̩la tʼabo ku ma ko̩ mi e̩wñ le chaka,
Omi chemʼoji e̩wñ tʼabogijo le,
Omi te̩tahi e̩re̩-mi wubi bʼo̩na e̩bie̩ne̩ du te̩,
U kwo bʼoj ajo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ kpa te̩ n;
O, erinyo̩ kʼo̩la-we̩ arinyo̩ ef alu-mi,
Lugbo o̩la kʼe̩ ka ñw one̩ kʼi de oñ namʼoji e̩wñ;
O̩la-we̩ chʼe̩mu ñw e̩re̩-mi
U fugo̩ me̩, u la fulo̩nyane̩,
Ma chʼumi ukata tabale̩;
Nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, kʼe̩ gba e̩wñ kʼalu-mi gʼe̩do̩la-wñ ko wa-i, O Jihofa,
Onugo-mi agbali nʼo̩wo̩-mi e̩gba du,
Ame̩ne̩bibi fʼoku bane ñw mi me̩,
O̩la ibenu-we̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu-mi ogbegbele̩;
Omi fʼe̩do̩-mi hiwane̩ kʼu che teju uhio̩me̩-we̩
Ulaka abo kʼibe-ma chʼejeji ache mi,
Uwe̩ chʼuña umaja-mi kpai o̩kpa-tabeli-mi;
Me̩ kwo bʼumi te̩, ame̩ amache̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩,
Hi umi dago teju alu kʼe̩ ka le̩, todu kʼu deju,
Gwo̩nyʼumi dago, tak e̩wñ du ma ño̩ ache mi n
Uwe̩ akʼabo du ku ma na bʼo̩me̩ kʼe̩ hi te̩ rʼibe̩te̩;
Uwe̩ akʼame̩ne̩bibi ane̩-ile̩ rinyo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼiwa;
O̩la-mi aga tod ailo̩-we̩ kʼu nara,
U te̩te̩ che teju oj ajo̩ ochochi, u la ache e̩wñ o̩kpakpa; uwe̩ ki tʼumi no̩ ñw abo ku ma de mi ma n.
Uwe̩ ki gbʼadu-we̩-i o̩wo̩ tod e̩nyo̩;
Eju-mi ma tod ujadu-we̩,
Che kpai adu-we̩-i teju alu kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ de̩,
Omi chʼadu-we̩; dʼoji o̩la ema ñw mi,
Iko ki Jihofa ache e̩wñ lewa me̩,
Todule̩ nafe̩do̩ uko̩ kʼe̩ te̩
Todule̩ o̩la du kʼe̩ ka ñw one̩ ki de chʼo̩kpakpa eju-mi;
O̩la ibenu-we̩ chʼaye;
O̩la-we̩ e̩bite̩ adʼugane̩ ñw one̩;
U mʼalu-mi chi te̩ ache fa fa fa,
Go mi kʼe̩ li mi eju,
Fʼugbo kʼe̩re̩-mi awa dane̩ ef ule̩ kʼu nale ñwo̩che teju o̩la-we̩,
Mʼumi gba bʼafuma one̩ te̩,
Ugane̩ eju-we̩ ki bʼadu-we̩-i ma,
Eju-mi agbʼomi dabe̩ne̩ kʼomi aji aji,
Uwe̩ che e̩no̩kpakpa, O Jihofa,
Uwe̩ fʼo̩la ibenu-we̩ ñwate̩ ef o̩kpakpa
E̩do̩-mi ki tʼo̩la-we̩ mʼumi ibe ko,
O̩la-we̩ de̩ jali,
Omi chʼenya e̩nʼide̩te̩ u che,
O̩kpakpa e-we̩ chʼo̩kpakpa ogbegbele̩,
O̩pe̩cha kpai uwa fʼumi mu me̩,
Ibenu-we̩ chʼo̩kpakpa ogbegbele̩;
O̩gbo̩ e̩do̩-mi du oñ u ne̩ dudo̩;
Uwe̩ nadʼudo̩; jadu mi,
U dʼo̩jo̩ eñwa nyo̩ adudo̩;
Eju-mi adʼide ide odu nyo̩,
Netirʼomuko̩la-mi teju alu kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ de̩;
Abo ku ma nʼibe e̩wñ bibi akpe̩ me̩ru awa me̩,
Uwe̩ muda me̩rʼanane̩, O Jihofa,
U te̩te̩ ma kwef o̩la ibenu-we̩ kwʼigbelegbele
Go o̩bata-mi, kʼe̩ yo̩ mi dufu,
Gbʼajo̩-mi ka kʼe̩ gba mi tane̩;
Ujadu jiji rʼame̩ne̩bibi,
Ejumomi o̩gbaje̩je̩-we̩ tabale. O Jihofa;
Abo ku ma doli mi kpai abo ku ma che mi o̩pe̩cha chʼewewe,
U go abo ku ma dʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼo̩kpo̩, oñ i te̩ mi e̩do̩,
Go alu kʼu nafe̩do̩ o̩la kʼe̩ ka ñw one̩ kʼi de!
E̩gwodama o̩gbo̩ o̩la-we̩ du chʼochochi;
Amagboji te̩tadoli mi tebitele ofo;
Nayo̩ ñw o̩la-we̩
Olemi chʼe̩wñ ulaka-mi kpai e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-mi,
Naje̩nyu ñwʼe̩ onu mebie o̩jo̩ du
Abo ku ma afe̩do̩ uko̩-o̩la-we̩ nʼure̩do̩ ololo;
Omi te̩takibeno kʼujadu-we̩ awa, O Jihofa,
Onugo-mi te̩tadejute̩ o̩la ibenu-we̩;
Omi te̩tadejute̩ o̩la kʼe̩ ka ñw one̩ kʼi de kpai o̩la ibenu-we̩,
Je̩ ñw ukwa-mi ki te̩ me̩ru o̩gba we̩, O Jihofa;
Je̩ ñw o̩ko̩ kʼu nagba ki wʼo̩gba we̩;
Uko-mi akʼuñwulo̩-we̩ dufu
Ukpalu-mi anʼeli o̩la-we̩ ako̩,
Je̩ ñw o̩wo̩-we̩ te̩ko mi,
U te̩tañeju ujadu-we̩, O Jihofa,
Je̩ ñw onugo-mi ki deju, tak i aje̩-nyu ñw e̩,

U raku do̩ Jihofa ef o̩pe̩cha-mi,
Mʼonugo-mi gba, O Jihofa,

Iche̩wñ kʼamo̩ma-we̩ ade alo-mi
Todu Jihofa mu Zayo̩n du;

I dabe̩ne̩ kʼekpo ki nyo̩ kʼi dʼoji,
Dabe̩ne̩ kʼeli He̩rmo̩n,
Go, me̩ je̩nyu ñw Jihofa,
Me̩ kʼo̩wo̩-me̩ kwane̩, uña-i afo̩,
Jihofa kʼi che efojale kpai ane̩-ile̩,
Me̩ je̩nyu Jihofa,
ame̩ ku me̩ dago ef unyi Jihofa,
Me̩ je̩nyu Jihofa, todu Jihofa chenyo̩;

E̩wñ du ki nyo̩ Jihofa eju, i che,

Siho̩n onu abo Amo̩r,

Odu-we̩, O Jihofa, chʼogbegbele̩,

I nʼalu, i muda ko̩la n,

O abo unyi Lifai, me̩ ki kele Jihofa!
Jihofa ki nele kwefu Zayo̩n,

O me̩ gogbodo̩ Ondu e-amodu,
Ẹne̩ kʼowñ kate ache e̩wñ aye inaina,

O̩jo̩ kʼu dudo̩, e̩ mʼohi du ñw mi,

Gbo̩ aduwa-mi, O Jihofa;

Jihofa chenyo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du,
Uko̩lo̩-we̩ du agogbodʼuwe̩, O Jihofa,
Ma anʼojima ojane̩-we̩ aka,
kʼama ki je̩ ñw amo̩ma amone̩ ki ma e̩wñ ugbiti kʼi che,
Ojane̩-we̩ chʼojane̩ e-ogbegbele̩,
Jihofa agwo̩nyʼabo du ku ma a wa ne̩,
E̩wñ duu kʼeju jo̩ aneju we̩,
Uwe̩ chi o̩wo̩-we̩,
O̩na o̩na Jihofa du chʼo̩kpakpa,
Jihofa me̩ru abo du ku ma kwadʼowñ,
I ache kʼe̩wñ ki rʼabo ku ma railo owñ eju ki jo̩ kpa,
Jihofa nʼabo du ku ma fe̩do̩ owñ adejute̩ ma;
Alu-mi añwulo̩ Jihofa,
Me̩ je̩nyu Jihofa!
Abu kʼu deju-i naje̩nyu Jihofa;
Me̩ ki ke̩do̩no ame̩numo̩la n,
Iñmi-wñ muda i mudabi tef ane̩pe̩te̩-wñ;
E̩ne̩ ki nʼO̩jo̩ e-Jeko̩b kʼi chʼate̩ko-wñ gbede,
kʼi che efojale kpai ane̩-ile̩,
owñ ki ache teju alu kʼoj ajo̩ ka tod abo ku ma de ma mane̩;
Jihofa achʼeju amafeju.
Jihofa afejutʼamilowa,
Jihofa ajʼonu ogbegbele̩,
Me̩ je̩nyu Jihofa!
Jihofa ane̩ Je̩rusale̩m me̩;
I añwʼe̩do̩ abo kʼe̩do̩-ma kpabie̩ che,
I akʼilawo aluka,
Ondu-wa gbe̩, ukpahiu-wñ la chʼololo;
Jihofa agwo̩nyʼame̩ne̩chikimi dago,
Me̩ nʼugwa akʼeli ñw Jihofa;
I akʼakpa bʼeju efojale ma,
I akʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩,
Ukpahiu anya chʼuyo̩-wñ n,
abo ku ma railo Jihofa muda rʼowñ e̩do̩,
Je̩nyu ñw Jihofa. O Je̩rusale̩m!
Todu i mʼukpahiu du ñw oli uro̩na alaku-we̩ me̩;
I aje̩ ñw ure̩do̩ ki dʼejefu alo̩me̩-we̩;
I akpʼo̩la kʼi ñwate̩ uche̩ wʼile̩;
I akʼisno wa dabe̩ne̩ kʼedudu ala;
I akʼaisi-wñ ro̩ rʼo̩do̩da dab o̩we̩ o̩je̩;
I akpʼo̩la-wñ uche̩ dufu, oñ i je̩ ñw u muya chaka;
I adʼo̩la-wñ ñw Jeko̩b,
I chʼabe̩le̩ kpai abo uche̩ichi du mama ta n;
Me̩ je̩nyu Jihofa!
Amonuche̩-wñ chaka, me̩ ki je̩nyʼowñ,
Olu kpai ochu, ki je̩nyʼowñ,
Efojale e-efojale le̩ ki je̩nyʼowñ,
Abo le̩ ki naje̩nyu ñw odu Jihofa!
I la fʼe̩re̩-ma lonyane̩ gbogbo alo ogbegbele̩;
Ame̩ ame̩la lile ki jʼef ohimini kpai o̩lo̩ulu du ku me̩ jo̩ ile̩-i,
una kpʼokuto̩mo̩jo̩cha, sno kpai atula,
Uwo uwo lile kpai uwo kekele du,
Ame̩wñ egini kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ du,
Amonu ile̩ kpai amone̩ ojoji du,
Tʼabokolobia tʼabigbe̩le̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n,
Ama le̩ ki je̩nyu odu Jihofa,
I la mʼigba du kwane̩ tod abo-wñ me̩,
Me̩ je̩nyu Jihofa!
Israe̩l ki nayo̩ ef e̩ne̩ ki chʼo̩na-wñ le̩,
Ama ki je̩nyu odu-wñ ef ido ku ma ta,
Todu abo Jihofa cherʼowñ e̩do̩;
Abo ku ma kpe̩do̩rʼu ki nagwoye ef ojima;
EdʼO̩jo̩ dago ki dʼef alu-ma
ku ma fʼache̩ o̩la-ma na ugbo abo uche̩ichi
ku ma nʼigbaligba ji amonu-ma
ku ma che ma teju alu kʼoj ajo̩-ma
Me̩ je̩nyu ñw Jihofa!
Je̩nyu ñw owñ tod e̩wñ ugbiti kʼi che;
Me̩ nʼomu o̩kakachi je̩nyu ñw owñ;
Me̩ nʼeicha kpai ido eta je̩nyu ñw owñ;
Me̩ nʼilo ki ako̩la goñ goñ le̩ je̩nyʼowñ;
E̩wñ du ki añmiñmi ki naje̩nyu ñw Jihofa!
Ita, ita ki So̩lo̩mo̩n, o̩ma Defid, onu Israe̩l kpa de̩:
Kʼone̩ ki ma e̩wñ ibe kpai o̩la ki dukpe̩ ku ma kʼone̩,

O̩ma-mi, iche̩wñ kʼame̩nadure ache ku ma gwʼuwe̩ o̩gwo̩,

O̩chaka-wñ tejugede ñw e̩ne̩ ki mʼoji e̩wñ
Me̩ mʼo̩la-mi kʼu nakʼone̩ gba, i ki chʼajifa n,
todu ibe e̩nyo̩ tu rubi le,
Omi, ibe, bʼugbeju dodo,
Ebʼe̩gahi Jihofa chʼulaka e̩wñ e̩bi-e̩ne̩ eche.
O̩la elo kpai ibe ogbolo chʼe-mi,
Lʼugbo mi oñ amonu achʼuko̩lo̩-ma,
lʼugbo mi oñ amagboji che e̩wñ o̩da-ma,
Nafe̩do̩ abo ku ma fe̩do̩ mi,
E̩wñ anana kpai ojima jʼugbo mi,
E̩ro-mi nyo̩ tʼo̩jamalia le, ochochi, i tʼo̩jamalia kʼi de̩ hiolo le,
Nalule̩ o̩na ugbo kʼo̩kpakpa de̩,
todu kʼu je̩ ñw abo ku ma fe̩do̩ mi ku ma je̩ e̩wñ ogu ogbolo,
Jihofa ne̩ mi e̩gba uchane̩ o̩na-wñ,
Ma dʼumi dago kwʼigbelegbele,
E̩gba kʼunefu du ma do̩mo̩ ta n, ma fʼumi bi,
E̩gba kʼe̩re̩ uwo uwo ki gbo̩gba ma mʼane̩ ta n,
e̩gba kʼi ma che ane̩ ile̩, abe̩k oko oko,
E̩gba kʼi fʼefojale efojale ñwo̩che te̩, omi dʼane̩ o̩mo̩,
e̩gba kʼi che kʼojale ki ma te̩ ate̩-i,
e̩gba kʼi fʼo̩me̩ ohimini abadi hite̩,
e̩gbale̩ uchʼo̩je̩bi uko̩lo̩ ugbo-wñ;
u do̩mo̩ agwoguyo̩ ef ile̩-wñ kʼi chʼugbo kʼone̩ adodo
Todule̩, amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, me̩ nanetirʼumi fai ta:
Me̩ gbʼo̩la ku ma kʼone̩, ku me̩ nʼibe,
E̩ne̩ ki agbʼo̩la-mi kʼi adago
Todu e̩ne̩ ki fʼumi li fʼiñmi li
ama e̩ne̩ ki muda dʼumi re mak e̩bie̩ne̩ i chʼo̩la-wñ onugo;
Ibe fʼunyi-wñ ko̩ me̩,
I fʼame̩la-wñ kpa me̩, i fʼomi-wñ pe̩gwa,
I fʼabigbe̩le̩-wñ kpe̩ nyʼadago otete otete
E̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼe̩nemo̩ kʼi namuna wʼemi!
Lewa, kʼe̩ jʼuje̩wñ e-mi
Hi e̩wñ imo̩ tinyo̩ kʼe̩ deju,
E̩ne̩ kʼi ako̩ e̩ne̩ ki ake o̩la, anyo̩ i agba bʼo̩la-wñ ma,
E̩ ki dʼo̩la bi e̩ne̩ ki ake̩ n tode̩gba kʼi achʼulaka-we̩;
E̩ ko̩ anibe tak i anʼibe tule;
Ebʼe̩gahi Jihofa chʼuchane̩ ibe e̩ne̩,
Todu lʼugbo mi oñ olugbo-we̩ akpo̩kpe̩ tule,
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ chʼanibe̩, mak o̩la-we̩ e̩ nʼibe ñw u;
Onobule̩ ki ake̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ chʼake-kale̩;
I la gugu atugbo̩na unyi-wñ,
kʼi do̩ abo ilo̩na ku ma alale,
E̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼe̩nemo̩, kʼi namuna wʼemi!
Omi ku ma ji ñmo̩ arinyo̩,
E̩ne̩ le̩ la ma ka kʼabegu jʼo̩mo̩ le̩ n,
Ita So̩lo̩mo̩n jo̩-i.
E̩wñ akoko ku ma ne̩ lef ali bibi anʼile du n,
Jihofa aje̩ ñw ebi kpa onugo e̩no̩kpakpa gbogbo alo n,
E̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩wo̩ e̩no̩kpo̩ ache e̩wñ adʼe̩nukpa,
E̩ne̩ ki aya e̩wñ jo̩ iko-wñ mak o̩ma ki nʼibe i che,
E̩nyo O̩jo̩ jʼoji abo̩kpakpa,
Urewa abo̩kpakpa chʼe̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ʼka,
E̩ne̩ kʼibe dʼe̩do̩-wñ agba uko̩ uko̩ ku ma te̩,
E̩ne̩ ki alule̩ tʼo̩kpakpa mak e̩re̩-wñ amane̩ kpaka,
E̩ne̩ ki abʼone̩ eju adʼe̩do̩dudu wa,
Alu e̩no̩kpakpa chʼe̩bi iñmi,
Ulaka anyʼuja,
Ma ali ibe ef uko e̩ne̩ ki ma e̩wñ,
Amanibe kʼe̩wñ ema ne jo̩,
E̩wñ kʼanana ne̩ chʼewo-wñ ki nʼaku;
E̩wñ kʼame̩no̩kpakpa ne̩ ache ale rʼo̩wo̩ iñmi,
E̩ne̩ kʼo̩la ku ma kʼowñ chʼewo eju dʼej o̩na iñmi me̩,
E̩ne̩ ki adʼulaka maja efu nʼuko olemi,
O̩la wewe wewe eka awe ene̩ ena bʼO̩jo̩ te̩ ef uwñ n,
Ukpalu ame̩no̩kpakpa chʼajifa o̩me̩me̩le̩;
Uko e̩no̩kpakpa akʼuje̩wñ ñw amone̩ wewe je̩,
E̩nyo Jihofa aje̩ ñw one̩ chʼanana,
Eche e̩wñtuñ chʼe̩wñ iya ñw ake̩-donʼo̩la-wñ,
E̩wñ ki abʼe̩ne̩bibi ailo awa bʼo ma chuu,
Ololo lale, e̩ne̩bibi ade̩ ge̩ n,
Alu kʼomi e̩ka de̩ ugbo enyi, kpai alu kʼodudu de̩ ugbo eju,
Ebʼe̩gahi Jihofa abʼojolugbo tʼo̩ ñw one̩,
Ukibeno ame̩no̩kpakpa chʼe̩do̩ e̩bo,
O̩na Jihofa chʼaku ki gbiti tod e̩ne̩do̩ ki mufu,
Ma achi e̩no̩kpakpa e̩re̩ ogbegbele̩ n,
Alu e̩no̩kpakpa apa ibe dufu,
Uko e̩no̩kpakpa chema e̩wñ ki nyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju,
E̩bo̩ uji chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñw Jihofa,
Uba awa tak anyo̩ awa;
E̩do̩ foo e-abo ku ma che e̩wñ tʼeju-wñ aña ma o̩na,
E̩wñ ene̩ nana nʼile o̩jo̩ uwe̩do̩ n,
O̩kpakpa ki dʼo̩la abo ku ma mufu aje̩ ñw o̩na-ma tejugede,
O̩kpakpa e-abo ku ma che e̩wñ tʼeju-wñ agba ma,
E̩ne̩bibi leku, e̩wñ uñeju-wñ lenyo̩,
Ma gbʼe̩no̩kpakpa bʼef o̩pe̩cha te̩,
E̩nayechi anʼalu-wñ kpʼekeji-wñ bie̩,
E̩gba ki ra ñw ame̩no̩kpakpa, abʼewo le̩ ayo̩;
E̩nyo̩ ku ma du ñw abo ku ma che e̩wñ tʼeju-wñ, adʼojima ewo kwane̩;
E̩ne̩ ki dʼekeji-wñ rʼo̩che̩ke̩ne̩ nʼibe n,
E̩ne̩ ki atale aro̩lo̩ atʼofe e̩wñ ki maja,
Ugbo kʼeñʼone̩ o̩na ibe ibe ma de̩ n, amone̩ awane̩;
E̩ne̩ ki agbo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ o̩wo̩ e̩jaduña agu o̩la-wñ che̩ bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩,
O̩nobule̩ ki ali one̩ eju anʼojima,
E̩ne̩ ki amo̩la achʼe̩nyo̩ ñw onugo o̩la-wñ,
E̩ne̩bibi agba uro̩me̩ ayechi,
Alu kʼo̩kpakpa ale rʼo̩wo̩ iñmi,
Abo̩ kʼe̩do̩-ma chʼe̩do̩ agbo̩go̩ chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñw Jihofa,
Dagba ame̩ne̩bie̩ne̩ fʼo̩wo̩ ta tʼomune̩ o̩wo̩ i nʼugbo ku ma awe ebʼudu ñw ma n,
Alu kʼelika o̩jamalia de̩ ef iñmo̩ oko
E̩wñ kʼame̩no̩kpakpa añeju-wñ chʼe̩nyo̩ kate;
I nʼe̩ne̩ ki afiatuka kʼi anʼawo ñw u tule;
Onugo e̩ne̩ ki akadua ñw one̩ ayoyo,
E̩ne̩ ki ado̩wo̩mo̩ e̩wñ e̩yo̩, amone̩ anama ñw u,
E̩ne̩ ki nʼe̩do̩chacha atene e̩wñ e̩nyo̩, i atene ku ma liʼi eju de̩,
E̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩nʼe̩wñ anana kʼi ne̩ awane̩,
E̩ne̩ ki ma aje̩ ñw abo-wñ ñmi n, e̩wñ ogu-wñ kʼi aje̩ chʼafu ki aju;
E̩ro e̩no̩kpakpa chʼoli e-iñmi,
Go, ma adʼakoji ñw e̩no̩kpakpa ane̩-ile̩-i,
E̩ne̩ ki chemʼe̩do̩ ku ma kʼo̩ o̩la, mak e̩wñ ema chemʼe̩ e̩do̩ de̩,
Jihofa ali e̩ne̩nyo̩ eju,
E̩wñ bibi eche afʼone̩ e̩re̩ lonyane̩ n,
Onobule̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ chʼike̩be̩ o̩ko̩-wñ,
Ibe kʼame̩no̩kpakpa akpe̩ tʼalu kʼoji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa aka;
O̩la kʼame̩ne̩bibi aka chʼala ekpa anede e̩bie̩,
Ma gu ame̩ne̩bibi lo̩, ma ñʼado̩mo ge̩ n,
Ma aje̩nyu ñw one̩ teju alu kʼibe-wñ de̩,
E̩ne̩ ku ma do̩rʼo̩che̩ke̩ne̩, kʼi muda chenʼadu
Oji ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ e-e̩no̩kpakpa chewʼo̩ eju,
E̩ne̩ ki adejutʼuche̩-wñ chʼakpata-kpa uje̩wñ,
E̩ne̩bibi atene iga ame̩ne̩bie̩ne̩,
Ena kʼuko one̩ ana bʼo̩na te̩ chʼoku ki bie̩ne̩,
Efu one̩ ako̩ ñw e̩nyo̩ lʼugbo e̩ro alu-wñ,
O̩na e̩nidada chʼo̩kpoko eju o̩la-wñ,
Ubieju e̩nidada tejugede e̩re̩re̩ le̩,
E̩ne̩ kʼochochi akpodudu kwef alu-wñ mak o̩kpakpa i adu ñʼone̩ le̩,
I nʼe̩ne̩ ki atʼo̩fa alu ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩kwo̩chageli ki agwunyʼone̩,
Uko ki aka ochochi alonyane̩ ogbegbele̩,
Egba one̩ ibe dʼef e̩do̩ abo ku ma ñw ibe e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ku ma che,
I nʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩ du ki agbajiko e̩no̩kpakpa n,
Uko̩ ki arʼolemi chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñw Jihofa,
E̩ne̩ ki gbeju adʼe̩wñ kʼi ma maja,
Owo̩ e̩ne̩ ki nʼe̩do̩chacha anʼo̩da e̩wñ,
Ejiji eda akʼone̩ mane̩,
E̩no̩kpakpa aña ekeji-wñ o̩na,
Acho̩kpo̩ aro̩ e̩la kʼi kpa o̩de̩ n,
Ej o̩na o̩kpakpa oñ iñmi de̩,
O̩ma ki nʼibe agba o̩la kʼata-wñ akʼowñ,
One̩ aje̩ e̩nyo̩ kwef e̩ro alu-wñ,
E̩ne̩ ki ade̩ alu-wñ, mak oji o̩la-wñ i ade le̩;
Onugo e̩nejudo̩o̩ neku e̩wñ, i la nʼe̩wñ du n,
Olemi ero̩ chʼe̩wñ ulaka e̩no̩kpakpa,
O̩kpakpa ade e̩ne̩ kʼo̩na-wñ de̩ kpo̩o̩lo,
I chenʼe̩ne̩ ki amʼeju anana ki ma la ne̩ e̩wñ du n;
E̩wñ kʼone̩ adu la oji o̩la-wñ tane̩ chʼe̩wñ anana-wñ,
Ugane̩ e̩no̩kpakpa ayo̩,
Uba anʼiñwa kate wa,
E̩wñ anana ku ma je̩ alafa ofo ada-bu,
E̩wñ ukibeno kʼe̩wa-wñ achi ño̩ chi akpʼe̩do̩ bie̩,
E̩ne̩ ki ache̩de̩te̩ o̩la-i, o̩la-i agwo̩nyʼowñ,
Uko̩o̩la anibe chʼe̩bi omi iñmi,
Emoji e̩wñ nyo̩nyo̩ je̩ ñw ma li one̩ eju,
E̩nugbeju du anʼe̩wñ kʼi ma chuko̩lo̩,
Onuche̩ bibi añwa tef e̩bie̩ne̩,
Ale kpai anyo̩ ade̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki ma je̩ ñw ma kʼo̩ o̩la n,
One̩ fʼe̩wñ ki neku chekpa, i arinyo̩ ñw onugo-wñ;
E̩ne̩ ki abʼanibe kpe̩re̩ anʼibe,
E̩bie̩ne̩ arano ame̩nadure,
E̩wñ ogu e̩ne̩nyo̩ abo̩ gbogbo nyʼugbo amaaju-wñ,
Uje̩wñ nana dʼef uche̩ kʼe̩nukpa alo,
E̩ne̩ ki do̩wo̩mʼitali-wñ mak ulaka o̩ma-wñ i ache le̩,
E̩no̩kpakpa aje̩ e̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-wñ abo̩,
Onobule̩ anibe du akʼunyi ñw o̩la-wñ,
E̩ne̩ ki tale ef o̩kpakpa-wñ maku Jihofa i bʼe̩gahi ñw u,
O̩kpa uba dʼef alu e̩nidada,
Ugbo kʼame̩wño̩re̩ ma de̩ n, unyi-ma chefe̩;
E̩nibenu ki achubi one̩ arʼolemi n,
Akone̩ru atene ibe, i la liʼu n,
Kwo bʼeju ake̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ te̩,
Ibe e̩nugbeju owñ chʼema oji o̩na-wñ kʼi ale,
Abi kʼame̩nidada je̩ chʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩ eju-ma,
E̩do̩ one̩ chema alu kʼe̩wñ awʼo̩ kade,
Ma agu unyi ame̩ne̩bibi lo̩,
I chenʼo̩na ki teju-wñ eju one̩,
Dagba one̩ chaka anʼanyi anyi, i awe enʼe̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩ n,
E̩ne̩ ki alʼubi ubi ef e̩do̩-wñ, o̩na kʼi ale akʼowñ efu,
E̩nemo adʼo̩la du rʼochochi,
Anibe arailo, oñ i akwo bʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ te̩,
E̩ne̩ ki hika we̩do̩ ache e̩wñ idada,
Ame̩nemo̩ aje̩ idada e̩wñ ogu,
Ame̩ne̩bie̩ne̩ ate̩kpe̩ ñw ame̩ne̩nyo̩,
Dagba i chʼekeji-wñ onugo, e̩nukpa chʼe̩nulaka-wñ,
E̩ne̩ ki ache̩de̩te̩ ekeji-wñ mak adure i ata le̩;
I chela oñ abo ku ma ñw ibe e̩bie̩ne̩ ala-i n?
Akanya uko̩lo̩ du chenʼile,
E̩wñ anana e-amanibe chʼike̩be̩-ma,
E̩nibenu ochochi agba onugo amone̩ tane̩,
Ef ebʼe̩gahi Jihofa oñ uke̩do̩no ogbolo de̩,
Ebʼe̩gahi Jihofa chʼe̩bi omi iñmi,
Uwewe amone̩ chʼojima onu,
E̩ne̩ ki ma hika we̩do̩ n chʼemoji e̩wñ nana,
E̩do̩ ki dachi chʼiñmi o̩re̩la,
E̩ne̩ ki adʼame̩nubie̩ mane̩ mak Acho̩na-wñ i abʼo̩ ina le̩;
Ma ne e̩ne̩bibi tinyo̩ ef e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩-wñ,
Ibe dachi ef e̩do̩ e̩ne̩ ki amʼoji e̩wñ,
E̩wñ o̩kpakpa eche adʼabo uche̩ichi ki che oji dufu,
Onu ali adu ki ache e̩wñ ibe ibe eju,
Ohi edu yo̩o̩ arʼe̩do̩fulu da bʼone̩ te̩,
Ukpalu anibe adʼe̩wñ ema ka tʼo̩kpakpa,
Eju Jihofa dʼugbo du,
Ukpalu ki añwʼo̩la che chʼoli iñmi,
E̩nidada ache̩de̩te̩ o̩la kʼata-wñ akʼowñ,
E̩wñ akoko nana jʼef unyi e̩no̩kpakpa,
Uko̩ amanibe afʼe̩wñ ema fiatuka;
E̩wñ kʼame̩ne̩bibi kpa ñw Jihofa chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñw u,
O̩na ame̩ne̩bibi chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñw Jihofa,
I chenʼo̩la ki bie̩ne̩ ku ma ko̩ e̩ne̩ ki adʼo̩na tinyo̩;
O̩jegu kpai o̩lo̩ulu tʼopee eju Jihofa,
E̩ne̩ ki ake atene ku ma dʼo̩la bi u n;
E̩do̩ e̩bo̩ anʼeju anyi wa,
E̩do̩ e̩ne̩ ki mʼoji e̩wñ atene e̩wñ ema,
O̩jo̩ du ki ñwa chʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ñw e̩no̩bata,
E̩wñ ene̩ re manyʼe̩gahi Jihofa, chenyo̩
Ukpe̩ e̩wñ ayagaʼka e̩je̩ ugbo kʼufe̩do̩ de̩
E̩ne̩ e̩do̩fulu anyʼo̩la wa,
O̩na e̩nejudo̩o̩ dab o̩gba ikeke,
O̩ma ki nʼibe aje̩ ñw e̩do̩ ata-wñ abo̩,
Idada chʼuyo̩ ugbo e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼibe efu n,
Ugbo ki ma nʼojuju enyi n, ibe e̩wñ kʼone̩ ñwa anoji n,
One̩ anʼuyo̩ lef ohi kʼalu-wñ du,
O̩na anibe chʼate̩gu tef iñmi,
Jihofa awu unyi e̩ne̩ uba tinyo̩ tilitili,
Ibe e̩bie̩ne̩ eñwa chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñw Jihofa,
E̩ne̩ ki ajakpa e̩wñ aje̩ ñw unyi-wñ onugo ñmi n,
E̩do̩ e̩no̩kpakpa akpibe tak i adohi,
Jihofa chejiji rʼame̩ne̩bibi,
Eju ki ne̩ aje̩ ñw e̩do̩ bo̩,
Eti ki ne̩rʼo̩la kʼiñmi ako̩
E̩ne̩ ki ko̩ eje̩ ñw ma kʼo̩ o̩la mak e̩de̩te̩ onugo o̩la-wñ i ache le̩,
Ebʼe̩gahi Jihofa chʼo̩la kʼibe akʼone̩, chi o̩la wane̩ la dʼo̩gba ñw ojima.
E̩wñ kʼe̩do̩ ñwa ki che chʼe̩wñ one̩,
O̩na du kʼone̩ ale chʼefe̩ eju-wñ onugo.
Fʼuko̩lo̩-we̩ lino Jihofa,
Jihofa fʼe̩wñ du che tod ukpe̩ e-wñ,
E̩ne̩ du kʼuba dʼef e̩do̩-wñ chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñw Jihofa;
Lʼugbo ejumomi kpai ochochi tak e̩wñ abʼudu ma,
E̩gba kʼona one̩ nyo̩ Jihofa eju,
E̩wñ re manyʼo̩kpakpa
E̩do̩ one̩ añwa o̩na kʼi ale,
O̩la ki kwef uko onu dab ifa ebo̩;
E̩ñwa kpai e̩bo̩ o̩kpakpa Jihofa ne̩;
Amonu chane̩ eche e̩wñ bibi e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ i che,
Uko o̩kpakpa chʼube̩do̩ amonu,
E̩dofulu onu dabe̩ne̩ kʼonuche̩ uku, anibe muda anyʼe̩ e̩do̩.
Eju onu kwote̩ foo mak iñmi le-wane̩,
Onu monu ibe e̩ne̩ nyo̩ tʼo̩jamalia ene̩ le ta?
Ikpadala abo ku ma che e̩wñ tʼeju-wñ owñ chʼekwo bʼe̩bie̩ne̩ te̩;
Uba dʼo̩gba ñw ekpabie̩,
Ehi o̩la wane̩ manyʼame̩no̩bata chenyo̩
E̩ne̩ ki anyi o̩la le̩ eti ali enyo̩,
Ma ado̩ abo ku ma nʼibe efu ko̩ ame̩nugbeju,
O̩ji e̩wñ ema chʼe̩bi omi iñmi ñw e̩ne̩ ki ne̩,
E̩do̩ anibe ako̩ alu-wñ o̩la,
O̩la ube̩do̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼapachi iño̩,
I chenʼo̩na ki tʼeju-wñ eju one̩,
Ebi e̩ne̩ ki achʼakanya uko̩lo̩ abʼo̩ chʼakanya;
E̩ne̩ ebili agwa e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ dufu,
E̩nayechi akʼuja fiatuka,

E̩nejudo̩o̩ nʼibe eju o̩la-wñ tʼone̩
E̩ne̩ ki alale kʼi adʼo̩wo̩ tunyu uja ki ma hiʼo̩wo̩-wñ n
Dab ahimu ki aro̩ iji una,
abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ de̩ ki akʼekeji-wñ e̩che̩ wane̩ kʼi akakini, I chʼiya u bʼe̩ che n?
Tod iji ki ma de̩ n oñ una alu;
Alu kʼe̩ge̩ una de̩ ugbo ige̩ kpai alu kʼuna de̩ ugbo iji,
O̩la aro̩lo̩ dab o̩we̩ o̩je̩ ki rinyo̩;
Uko kʼi akʼe̩nyo̩ malamala manyʼe̩do̩ bie̩ne̩
E̩ne̩ ki achʼulaka anʼuko-wñ achʼakpaine̩

E̩ne̩ ki gwʼo̩fe̩ añwa chʼu,
Ukpalu olemi achʼulaka abo kʼi kpa ma bie̩,
E̩ ki je̩nyu ñw o̩la-we̩ ugbo e̩wñ o̩jo̩ o̩na n,

Okuta woji, e̩lanyi la nʼuwoji ge̩,
E̩dofulu chʼo̩lachi, uwe̩do̩ la chʼuwobi omi;
Edejurʼone̩ ejugede me̩
Agbe kʼe̩nufe̩do̩-wñ ache one̩ chʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa ñw u;
E̩ne̩ kʼefu-wñ ko̩ afʼe̩re̩ tʼapachi iño̩ mane̩,
Dab e̩we̩ ki chila bʼunyi-wñ te̩,
Ekpo kpai otulale abʼe̩do̩,
E̩ ki kʼonuku e-we̩ kpai e-ata-we̩ rinyo̩ n;
O̩ma-mi, nʼibe ke, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw e̩do̩-mi ki bo̩,
E̩nugbeju fʼeju dʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩, i kwo maja;
Mʼotogbo e̩ne̩ ki gbo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ o̩wo̩ ejaduña gba,
