Omi ki akito̩ te̩ te̩ te o̩jo̩ kʼomi lo̩ nana
ebʼo̩ dab afu eba
Ebije anʼebije ki le̩,
E̩ne̩ ki adejutʼoli o̩gbaikolo aje̩ e̩ro-wñ,
Alu kʼomi adʼeju ñʼeju,
Oku one̩ achʼefo̩jegu kpai o̩lo̩ulu eju ogbegbele̩ n,
Ucha ku ma yo̩ ajifa ef uwñ do̩mo̩, aido la do̩mo̩ tod o̩jamalia,
Dagba e̩ nʼo̩magu fʼe̩nidada gwu ef agu manyʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩, idada-wñ la akwo bʼo̩ te̩ n.
E̩ nachedochacha kʼe̩ ma alu kʼame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini de̩,
todu e̩wñ anana chʼe̩wñ ogbegbele̩ n;
Ma mʼegbe ko tak e-etito̩ adʼo̩la dufu,
amo̩mala chʼutodu ukpo o̩la-we̩,
omi e̩nya ewo la abʼuje̩wñ-we̩ jo̩, kpai uje̩wñ abo unyi-we̩
Ame̩ne̩bibi ara e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du ma nʼuma ure n,
Tod ena kʼabo ane̩ na bʼO̩jo̩ te̩
E̩nukpa ki atʼame̩nubie̩ mane̩
Abo ku ma hi uko̩-o̩la tinyo̩ aje̩nyu ñw ame̩ne̩bibi,
Ame̩ne̩bie̩ne̩ mʼoji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka n,
E̩nukpa ki alule̩ ef o̩kpakpa-wñ
E̩ne̩ ki ade uko̩-o̩la chʼo̩ma ki nʼibe,
E̩ne̩ ki ache mʼane̩-wñ lugbo o̩ko̩ eta kpai ile eje̩,
E̩ne̩ ki mʼeti du bʼuko̩-o̩la egbo̩ te̩,
E̩ne̩ ki aje̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ tʼeju-wñ la rʼo̩na e̩bie̩ne̩
Anana chʼanibe eju o̩la-wñ,
E̩gba kʼame̩no̩kpakpa du, ojima-wñ chʼotemeje;
I ara ñw e̩ne̩ ki fʼe̩wñ bʼena kʼi na ma n,
E̩ne̩ kʼailo era-wñ chʼo̩pioo gbede;
Idu ki te̩ akwa kpai ibe̩a ki tʼado̩de̩
E̩nuto̩gba ki ma mʼoji e̩wñ n, ño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki atʼone̩ mane̩ ololo;
One̩ kʼe̩bie̩ e̩ne̩ du nʼo oji ara tef o̩fe̩,
E̩ne̩ ki alule̩ tʼeju-wñ ma agbʼo̩ tane̩,
E̩ne̩ ki alʼuche̩-wñ anʼuje̩wñ ki bo̩jo̩,
E̩ne̩ ki achubi one̩ anʼe̩nyo̩ e̩kute̩,
Enʼame̩nejuma nyo̩ n;
E̩ne̩ ki nʼeju bie̩ne̩ ahiane̩ tʼe̩wñ anana ubi,
E̩ne̩ ki dʼo̩la bi one̩, one̩ ali e̩ne̩ le̩ eju ubiane̩-wñ
E̩ne̩ ki fʼoji ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ ji kʼi la kakini,
E̩nikalabani anyʼuja,
E̩ne̩ ki ke̩do̩nʼe̩do̩-wñ onugo chʼake̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ;
Eku e̩wñ aku e̩ne̩ ki akʼe̩wñ ñw ame̩nukpa n,
E̩gba kʼame̩ le̩bibi kwane̩, mak e̩ tejane̩ tak e̩ li one̩,
E̩ne̩ ku ma dejuru ño̩ dejuru o̩gbe̩nugbe̩ kʼi fʼo̩lo̩ lo dago
E̩gba kʼame̩no̩kpakpa kwotʼo̩gba amone̩ agwoguyo̩;
E̩ne̩ ki afe̩do̩ ibe, ata-wñ agwoguyo̩,
Onu anʼoj ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka fʼojane̩-wñ lonyane̩,
E̩ne̩ ki akʼo̩ligo̩ligo̩ o̩fa ñw ekeji-wñ
Oku dʼef ena kʼe̩ne̩bie̩ne̩ ana bʼO̩jo̩ te̩,
E̩no̩kpakpa adʼibe te̩ e̩wñ ki dʼame̩nubie̩ o̩la;
Amakone̩ru aje̩ ñw una tʼewo,
Iche̩wñ kʼanibe tʼukana kpai e̩nidada,
Abo ku ma tene e̩bie̩ achulaka e̩ne̩ ki mufu,
Ake̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ akʼibe du kl dʼefu-wñ dufu,
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩da ne̩tirʼo̩la o̩lemi,
E̩nukpa kpai e̩ne̩ uji ade;
Onu ki adejutʼo̩la ame̩nubie̩
Itali kpai eju edaru anʼibe wa,
Ame̩ne̩bibi tʼo̩gba, ena bʼO̩jo̩ te̩ anyo̩gba;
Kʼo̩ma-we̩ o̩la oñ i adʼuñmi ñw e̩;
Ugbo kʼibe e̩wñ ejo̩gba ma de̩ n, amone̩ tʼo̩la-ma no̩ rinyo̩ ofo,
Uko̩la ofo akʼadu o̩la n,
E̩ li one̩ ki anaju o̩la eka?
E̩ne̩ ki ache̩do̩ adu-wñ kwʼo̩jo̩ imo̩to̩-wñ,
E̩nuwe̩do̩ adʼuja kwane̩,
Eke kʼone̩ ake abʼu wane̩,
E̩ne̩ ki mana kpai ajoji achulaka onugo o̩la-wñ;
O̩la egagogodo tod one̩ anʼoku te̩ ñw one̩,
Amone̩ wewe atene kʼonu ki li ma eju,
E̩nuji la chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ñw abokpa-kpa,
O̩la Agur o̩ma Jake e-Masa de̩.
Omi chʼe̩la tʼe-e̩ne̩ du le̩.
U la ko̩che̩ ibe n,
E̩ne̩ te̩gu tʼefojale tak i gwo̩ru wʼane̩?
Ma fʼo̩la O̩jo̩ okoke du ñwago me̩;
E̩ ki butʼo̩la-wñ n,
U fʼe̩wñ meji bi ugbo we̩ me̩;
mʼe̩wñ o̩wai kpai e̩wñ olemi ko bʼumi te̩ rʼo̩najiji;
tode̩gba kʼefu-mi ko̩ kʼu nare̩ kakini,
E̩ ki chʼakpabie̩ adu ñw odu-wñ n,
Abo o̩gbaʼka do̩mo̩ ku ma nama ñw ata-ma
Abo̩ o̩gbaʼka do̩mo̩ ku ma chefe̩ eju o̩la-ma
Abo o̩gbaʼka do̩mo̩—eju-ma gu ate̩ ate̩ ololo,
Abo o̩gbaʼka do̩mo̩ kʼenyi-ma chʼo̩kwo̩chageli,
Aro̩ ki añmʼe̩bie̩ chenʼo̩ma onobule̩ meji,
O̩jegu kpai efu agaji,
Eju ki akʼata-wñ ru
E̩wñ me̩ta do̩mo̩ kʼaye-wñ tʼumi le;
alu kʼo̩re̩ ale ojale,
Abe̩le̩ o̩na o̩ya kʼi ajo̩ko̩ de̩:
Todu e̩wñ me̩ta oñ ile̩-i aga;
todu adu e̩gba kʼi fʼonu je̩,
todu o̩ya ku ma chʼulaka-wñ,
E̩wñ me̩le̩ do̩mo̩ ku ma chenya ef ile̩,
akpiti kpai ame̩wñ e̩go̩ le̩ chʼabo ku ma ma gbiti n,
ekili chʼe̩nawule̩,
amakubaliba nʼonu n,
e̩ neke gwo̩nyʼabuta,
E̩wñ me̩ta do̩mo̩ ku ma lule̩ e̩te̩le̩;
idu, kʼi chʼagbiti ef ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩
anya ogu kpai obuko̩,
Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ fʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩ che, owñ chʼo̩la-we̩ ehi ne,
Todu omi e̩nya epili adʼekpo dufu,
O̩la Lemiue̩l onu Masa, kʼiye-wñ kʼowñ, de̩:
E̩wñ de̩, o̩ma-mi? E̩wñ de̩, o̩ma efo̩je̩-mi?
E̩ ki dʼukpahiu-we̩ ñw abobule̩ n,
I dukpe̩ amonu n, O Lemiue̩l,
tode̩gba ku ma ñmo̩ ku mi la gbenyo̩ alu kʼo̩da ka,
Dʼo̩te̩ una ñw e̩ne̩ ki gbali te̩ ñw elenyo̩,
je̩ ñw u ñmo̩ kʼi gbenyo̩ ale-wñ,
Mʼalu-we̩ chi koji amajalu,
Chi alu-we̩, kʼajo̩ tʼo̩kpakpa,
Onobule̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩, e̩ne̩ ali?
O̩ko̩-wñ ke̩do̩nʼo,
Onobule̩ le̩ ache e̩nyo̩ ñw u, i la achʼo e̩bie̩ne̩ n,
I atejane̩ edudu ala kpa; owu,
I dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩ko̩ ki akʼigwa e̩wñ aja,
I laño̩ adʼo̩jo̩ nyo̩ kwane̩
I akpibe alu kʼane̩ uche̩ de̩, tak i ala;
I adʼukpahiu lʼago-wñ de
I ajʼe̩wñ aja ma kʼi go e-ki anʼile ñw u.
O̩wo̩-wñ dʼijele,
I anʼo̩wo̩-wñ dala ñw ame̩no̩bata,
I arailo afu ki akpa tod abo unyi-wñ n,
I ahi ukpo ki jukpa ñw o̩la-wñ;
Ma chema o̩ko̩-wñ ojukpologu,
I ahi ukpo line̩n reju kʼi dʼu ta;
I akʼukpahiu kpai ojima bʼo̩la ma,
Alu-wñ kʼi achi chʼibe ibe̩,
I afejutʼo̩na kʼabo unyi-wñ ale nyo̩nyo̩,
Amo̩ma-wñ kwane̩, oñ ma kadua ñw u;
Amo̩ma onobule̩ wewe te̩tache e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩,
Eli one̩ eju chʼolemi, alifia chʼofofo,
Bʼukpe̩ e̩ro uko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-wñ ñw u,
O̩la Ako̩la ñw ujeju, kʼi chʼo̩ma Defid, onu ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m de̩.
O̩wai e-o̩wai, Ako̩la ñw ujeju kakini.
Ile e̩wñ one̩ ne̩ ugbo uko̩lo̩ akanya du
O̩gbaʼka le, o̩gbaʼka awa,
Olu akwane̩, olu la atunyane̩,
Afu alo tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩,
Aji du acha nyʼohimini abadi,
E̩wñ du che̩ko̩ ñw uhia;
E̩wñ du ki te̩te̩de̩, e-le̩ ade̩ alo waa,
I nʼe̩wñʼka ku ma neke kakini,
Urewa e̩wñ igbele de̩ ge̩ n,
Omi, Ako̩la ñw ujeju-i, chʼonu ki nʼo̩da Israe̩l, Je̩rusale̩m.
U dʼe̩do̩-mi tʼenʼibe atene kpʼetejane̩ e̩wñ du ku ma che o̩gane̩ efojale. Akanya ki awo̩-i oñ O̩jo̩ ko ñw amo̩ma amone̩ ku ma ne̩ fʼo̩la-ma demane̩.
Ufʼuko̩lo̩ du ku ma che o̩gane̩ olu-i li me̩. Go, e̩wñ du la chʼo̩wai, enʼafu ule ofo i che.
E̩wñ ki mugo̩ jʼato̩ru n, e̩wñ ki ana la nʼaluka n.
U ka ef e̩do̩-mi kakini, Go, u mud e̩ne̩ lile me̩, u ño̩ fʼibe ne̩ tʼabo du ku ma nʼo̩da Je̩rusale̩m o̩gba-mi le. I-i, e̩do̩-mi la fʼe̩wñ ibe kpʼe̩wñ ema li ololo.
U ño̩ mʼe̩do̩-mi du tʼibe ene̩, kʼu ño̩ ma e̩wñ imu kpʼidada ge̩. Eju-mi laño̩ mune̩ ru ka kʼe̩wñ-i du ño̩ chʼafu enʼo̩ ule ofo ge̩.
Todu ibe ene̩ nana chʼe̩do̩ wuulu ene̩ nana,
U ka ef e̩do̩-mi kakini, Lewa ta, kʼu nanʼe̩wñ e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ jʼuwe̩ ma; todule̩ e̩ li e̩nyo̩ ke. E̩ la go, e-le̩ ño̩ mud o̩wai ge̩.
U nʼo̩la anyi aka, kakini, Imu i ahi le̩. U nʼe̩wñ e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ aka kakini, Ab i ache?

U tejane̩ ef e̩do̩-mi alu kʼu nale kʼu nʼo̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma je̩ ñw año̩la-mi ya, kʼe̩do̩-mi ki ño̩ nʼibe agwo̩nyʼo̩na-wñ alo, kʼu ño̩ gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ iyachi, gbogbo tak u li e-ki nyo̩ kʼamo̩ma amone̩ ki che o̩gane̩ olu o̩jo̩ du ku ma deju-i.
U fʼuko̩lo̩ lile che ñw o̩la-mi; u fʼunyi unyi ko̩ ñw o̩la-mi, u la fʼuche̩ uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ne ñw o̩la-mi ge̩.
U fʼuche̩ o̩la unyi kpʼujo̩ oli ku ma jʼolubo̩-wñ che ñw o̩la-mi. U la fʼoli ki aro ojoji ojoji du ne o̩mo̩.
U ño̩ fʼo̩fe̩ o̩fe̩ gwa kʼomi ki gbagu efu-wñ kʼi cha nyʼoko ugbo ku ma nʼoli etito̩ kʼo̩la-wñ ki ya.
U fʼamadu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ la; ma ño̩ fʼamabinyi bi ef unyi-mi. U laño̩ ne̩ ujo̩ ujo̩ ame̩wñukpa kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini tʼabo du ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m o̩gba-mi le.
U ño̩ kʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia yajo̩ ñw o̩la-mi, kpʼe̩wñ ako-ko amonu kpʼe-ojane̩ ojane̩. U fʼamakeli aboke̩le̩ kpʼabobule̩ ne̩ ñw o̩la-mi manyʼe̩wñ uñeju amo̩ma amone̩ o̩ya kpʼamabadu e̩kute̩.
Abe̩le̩ omi mud e̩ne̩lile kpʼanana tʼabo du ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m o̩gba-mi le; ibe-mi la kwo bʼumi te̩ n.

E̩wñ du kʼi añʼumi eju u ko̩edʼu ñw ma n; u la fʼo̩wo̩ mʼe̩do̩-mi ne̩ bʼe̩wñ uyo̩ du te̩ n. Todu e̩do̩-mi gwoguyo̩ noji akanya uko̩lo̩-mi chaka; e-le̩ la chʼe̩wñ kʼu ne̩ kwef akanya uko̩lo̩-mi du kʼu che.
Tak u rida ago uko̩lo̩ du kʼo̩wo̩-mi che, kpʼakanya du kʼu che ef uwñ. E̩ la go, o̩chaka-wñ chʼo̩wai, kpʼafu enʼo̩ ule. I la nʼile du kʼone̩ aje̩ o̩gane̩ olu-i n.
Tak u murida kʼu go e̩wñ ibe kpʼe̩wñ imu kpʼe̩wñ idada; todu e̩wñ oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi aro̩ne onu-i ache ge̩? Chai e̩wñ ku ma che igbegbele!
Tak i ne̩rʼumi eju ka kʼibe me̩ tʼidada le alu kʼugane̩ me̩ tʼe̩chubi le.
Eju anibe dʼoji-wñ, ake̩do̩nola-wñ la lule̩ ef e̩chubi; u muda li ka kʼe̩wñ okate ake̩re̩bʼo̩chaka-ma.
Tak u ka ef e̩do̩-mi kakini, Alu ki ake̩re̩bʼake̩do̩nola-wñ abe̩le̩ i ake̩re̩bʼumi ge̩, mak e̩wñ chi kʼomi anʼibe tule ta? Oñ u ka ef e̩do̩-mi kakini, E̩wñ o̩wai e-i ño̩ che ge̩.
Todu urewa anibe chʼogbegbele̩ tʼe-ake̩do̩nola-wñ le n. Iko̩ ki awa e̩jo̩-gba-i ma fʼe̩wñ du gbenyo̩ kpo̩kpe̩ me̩; abile kʼanibe kpʼake̩do̩nola-wñ aku okujo̩?
Abe̩le̩ edeju-i chʼe̩wñ ulaka-mi, todabu kʼuko̩lo̩ ku ma che o̩gane̩ olu-i chʼe̩bie̩ne̩ eju-mi, todu o̩chaka-wñ chʼo̩wai, afu ene ule i che.
Akanya uko̩lo̩-mi du kʼu che o̩gane̩ olu-i la chʼe̩wñ ulaka-mi, abu kʼu natʼo̩ no̩ tane̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki awa ubi-mi chuu.
E̩ne̩ ama abe̩k anibe i ache? abe̩k agbo̩go̩? I muda anʼo̩da e̩wñ du kʼu chʼakanya todu-wñ, kpʼe̩wñ kʼu nʼibe-mi che o̩gane̩ olu-i. E-i ño̩ chʼo̩wai ge̩.
Todule̩ u murida kʼu je̩ ñw e̩do̩-mi muda ugbo uko̩lo̩ akanya du kʼu che o̩gane̩ o̩lu-i,
todu i nʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼibe kpʼe̩wñ ema kpʼo̩ka e̩wñ chʼakanya uko̩lo̩-wñ, i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ i atʼe̩wñ kʼi ne̩ le̩ no̩ tane̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki ma chʼakanya-wñ n. E-le̩ ño̩ chʼo̩wai kpai e̩bie̩ne̩ inaina!
Todu e̩wñ one̩ ne̩ kwef uko̩lo̩ akanya-wñ kpʼuja e̩do̩-wñ kʼi ne̩ gwʼo̩la-wñ uhia o̩gane̩ o̩lu-i?
Todu o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ du chʼe̩do̩dudu, akanya-wñ kʼi che la chʼe̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩; i chaka chʼodu e̩do̩-wñ adachi n. E-le̩ ño̩ chʼo̩wai ge̩.
I nʼe̩wñ du ki nyo̩ tule ñw one̩ tʼuje̩wñ eje̩ kpʼomi eñmo̩ le n, kʼi la je̩ ñw onugo-wñ li e̩nyo̩ kwef uko̩lo̩ akanya-wñ. E-le̩ u ño̩ li ka kʼo̩wo̩ O̩jo̩ i kwo wa ge̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ neke je̩ e̩wñ, e̩ne̩ neke hika dufu tʼumi le̩?

Todu O̩jo̩ adu ibe kpʼe̩wñ ema kpʼuyo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ ki arʼowñ e̩do̩. I muda dʼo̩bata e̩wñ eyajo̩ ugbudu ugbu-du ñw e̩nadure, todu kʼi ko ñw e̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ ki rʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩. E-le̩ ño̩ chʼo̩wai kpʼafu ene ule̩ ge̩.
E̩wñ du chenʼadiko, o̩la du ki dʼo̩gane̩ ojale che̩nʼiko-wñ:
iko o̩ma ebi, kpʼiko one̩ eku;
iko e̩wñ edu kpa, kpʼiko o̩ga eche kpa;
iko aku ero̩, kpʼiko anyi enyi;
iko okuta eko rinyo̩, kpʼiko okuta eyajo̩;
iko e̩wñ etene, kpʼiko e̩wñ elenyo̩;
iko e̩wñ ekpana, kpʼiko e̩wñ ega;
iko ufe̩do̩, kpʼiko ulaka eche;
Ile e̩wñ achuko̩lo̩ aje̩ kwef akanya-wñ du kʼi ache taa?
Omi fʼakanya kʼO̩jo̩ ko ñw amo̩ma amone̩ kʼo̩wo̩-ma ki dʼefu-wñ li me̩.
I fʼe̩wñ du che kʼi chʼalifia iko-wñ; i laño̩ dʼogbegbele̩ tʼef e̩do̩-ma, one̩ muds neke tejane̩ uko̩lo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ ache kwʼejodudu-wñ gbogbo tʼukpoji-wñ n.
U chema ka ki nʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ tule todu ma tʼegwoguyo̩ kpʼeche e̩wñ ki nyo̩ gbogbo abu ku ma deju-i le n.
Kʼe̩ne̩ du ki je̩ e̩wñ ki ñmo̩ kʼi ño̩ li e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ kwef akanya uko̩lo̩-wñ chaka, ele O̩jo̩ de̩.
U chema ka kʼe̩wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ che chʼogbegbele̩; i nʼe̩wñ du ku ma abu tʼo̩ n, i la nʼe̩wñ du ku ma abu wane̩ n; O̩jo̩ la che kʼamone̩ ki bʼe̩gahi ñw u.
E̩wñ du ki do̩mo̩ te̩te̩do̩mo̩ igbelegbele; e̩wñ ki ade̩ ejo̩gba do̩mo̩ igbelegbele me̩; O̩jo̩ la ate̩jane̩ e̩wñ ki lale tʼubi.
I ño̩ tʼe-le̩ le̩ ge̩, u ño̩ li o̩gane̩ olu ka kʼuña ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka, o̩mo̩ e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ de̩, oñ uña e̩wñ o̩kpakpa, o̩mo̩ e̩wñ ki ma nyo̩ n ño̩ de̩ ge̩.
U ka ef e̩do̩-mi kakini, O̩jo̩ akajo̩ ame̩no̩kpakpa kpʼame̩ne̩bibi. Todu iko dʼano̩mo̩ todu o̩la kpʼuko̩lo̩ du.
U ka ef e̩do̩-mi kakini, Todu amo̩ma amone̩, oñ O̩jo̩ do̩mo̩ añwa ma go, kʼama ki li ka kʼe̩la ofo ma che.

Todu e̩wñ ki ake̩re̩bʼamo̩ma amone̩ ñʼake̩re̩bʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ge̩; chai e̩wñ okate ake̩re̩bʼuma: alu kʼoka-wñ aku abe̩le̩ e-ekeji aku ge̩; ochochi, iñmi-ma chʼokate. One̩ la rʼedʼoji dufu tʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ le n; todu o̩chaka-wñ chʼo̩wai.
O̩chaka-ma anyʼugboʼkate; e̩te̩-ma chaka chʼebutu, oñ o̩chaka-ma ñʼadabi chʼebutu ge̩.
E̩ne̩ ma afu e-amone̩ abe̩k i anyʼate̩? kpʼafu ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, i anyʼo̩gane̩ ane̩-ile̩?
Abe̩le̩ u fu li ka ki nʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ tʼone̩ eyo̩ ef uko̩lo̩-wñ kʼi ache le n, todu ukpe̩ e-wñ de̩: todu e̩ne̩ adʼu dabiwa kʼi ali e̩wñ ki wache ubi-wñ?

Tak u ño̩ rida ago edemane̩ ku ma dʼone̩ mane̩ o̩gane̩ olu-i chaka: e̩ la go, i chʼomi aku abo ku ma de ma mane̩ te̩, ma la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi anyʼuma e̩do̩ n; ukpahiu la dʼubi abo ku ma de amone̩ mane̩ le̩; amone̩ le̩ muda nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi anyʼuma e̩do̩ n.
Todule̩ u kwoje̩nyu ñw abo ki ku, oñ u ka kʼabo ku ma ku kpo̩kpe̩ gbede tʼabo ku ma deju abajo̩-i le;
ochochi, e̩ne̩ ki gbede tʼama meji le chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma ma bi ta n, kʼi ma la li uko̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ ku ma che o̩gane̩ olu-i n.
Tak u li abu kʼakanya uko̩lo̩ du kpʼuko̩lo̩ o̩ka du kʼone̩ ache aje̩ ñw ulie̩na ki dʼagbagba one̩ kpʼekeji-wñ. E-le̩ ño̩ chʼo̩wai kpʼafu ene ule.
Ake̩do̩nola-wñ mʼo̩wo̩-wñ ko mʼe̩do̩ te̩, oñ i aje̩ o̩re̩la-wñ onugo.
E̩ko̩ o̩wo̩ʼka manyʼuñmi me̩ tʼe̩ko o̩wo̩ meji manyʼakanya uko̩lo̩ kpʼafu ene ule le.
Tak u mudabiwa oñ u li e̩wñ o̩wai o̩gane̩ olu-i.

I nʼe̩ne̩ kʼowñ kate dago, i la nʼekeji n, i la nʼo̩ma n, i nʼo̩maye n; i chaka dabe̩le̩ akanya uko̩lo̩-wñ la nʼuda n; e̩wñ anana-wñ la bʼeju-wñ jo̩ n; i la atene kakini, Tod e̩ne̩ oñ u nachʼakanya e̩wñ-i, kʼomi aje̩ ñw ofu e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ ki bʼonugo-mi taa? E̩wñ owai ño̩ de̩ ge̩; ochochi, akanya e̩bie̩ne̩ i che.
Eji nyo̩ tʼoka le, todabu ku ma nʼuro̩me̩ ki nyo̩ tod uko̩lo̩ akanya-ma.
Todu iche̩wñ ku ma wane̩, oka adʼekeji-wñ kwane̩; ama atogwo ñw e̩ne̩ kʼowñ kate ale tak i wane̩, kʼi ma la nʼe̩ne̩ kʼi adʼu kwane̩ n.
Omune̩ de̩ ge̩, one̩ meji dachi jo̩, o̩la-ma akpuna mʼomune̩; abʼe̩ne̩ʼkate ale kʼafu ma kpʼo̩ n?
Dagba one̩ neke fʼe̩ne̩ ʼkate du, one̩ meji abʼowñ jo̩. Odeele owu me̩ta ku ma da mʼomune̩ ahika ko̩da n.
Okolobia ki chʼe̩no̩wo̩ ofo kʼi la nʼibe, me̩ tʼonu kʼi chʼogijo kʼi chʼake̩do̩nola-wñ kʼi ma je̩ ñw one̩ kʼo̩ o̩la ge̩ n le.
Todu i nʼe̩ne̩ ki kwʼef unyi dudu dufu kʼi jʼonu; i la nʼe̩ne̩ ku ma bi o̩mo̩fe̩ kʼi amud e̩nukpa.
Omi fʼabo du ku ma deju ku ma jʼalule̩ o̩gane̩ olu-i li, ku ma jo̩ kpʼokolobia, owñ chʼe-ekeji ki koji-wñ;
aluka amone̩ du kʼowñ nʼo̩da-ma nʼukpoji n; abo ku ma jʼubi awa muda ayo̩ ñw u n. E̩wñ o̩wai de̩ ge̩, kpʼafu ene ule.
Fʼe̩re̩-we̩ de e̩gba kʼe̩ nyʼunyi O̩jo̩; todu ete̩me̩ru kʼe̩ gbʼo̩la me̩ tʼeko e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ amake̩do̩nola-ma wa le; todu ama ma ka kʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ma che le̩ n.
Alu-we̩ ki ya n, e̩ ki la je̩ ñw e̩do̩-we̩ ki naju o̩la eka eju O̩jo̩ n, todu O̩jo̩ dʼefojale, uwe̩ la dʼane̩-ile̩-i, todule̩ uko̩la-we̩ ki chʼorere.
Todu o̩na ena kpʼakanya uko̩lo̩ e̩kute̩ akpe̩re̩ wa; omu ake̩do̩nola-wñ kpʼuko̩la e̩kute̩ akpe̩re̩ wa ge̩.
E̩gba kʼe̩ dʼoji ñw O̩jo̩, e̩ ki che̩du era n; todu i nʼe̩do̩ e̩bo ugbo amake̩do̩nola-ma n. Fʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ dʼoji le̩ ra.
I nyo̩ kʼe̩ we edʼoji, tʼedʼoji tak e̩ ma ra n le.
E̩ ki je̩ ñw alu-we̩ je̩ ñw o̩re̩la-we̩ dure n, e̩ ki la ka eju onuche̩ kakini, Ela u la le̩ n; e̩wñ chi kʼO̩jo̩ awe̩do̩rʼomuko̩la-we̩ kʼi la akpʼuko̩lo̩ kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ che bie̩?
Todu ugbo kʼo̩na ena chʼe̩kute̩, kpai ugbo kʼuko̩la ofo chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩ e̩wñ o̩wai jo̩: uwe̩ ki muda railo O̩jo̩.

Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ li abu ku ma tʼame̩nu-kpa mane̩, kʼame̩nafuma mʼoii ajo̩ ochochi, kpʼo̩kpakpa ko bʼoj ane̩ʼka te̩, o̩la le̩ ki chʼe̩ awuwu n; todu e̩ne̩ ki dʼate̩ ñw abo ate̩ anyeti; abo ku ma jʼate̩ ñw ama do̩mo̩.
Anubile̩ ge̩, ile ki kwʼef ane̩, e̩ne̩ du ne̩, oko are̩ ñw onu onugo.
O̩ko̩ abʼe̩ne̩ ki afe̩do̩ o̩ko̩ jo̩ n; ile eje̩ la abʼe̩ne̩ ki afe̩do̩ e̩wñ anana jo̩ n. E̩wñ o̩wai ño̩ de̩ ge̩.
E̩gba kʼane̩ nana nyo̩gba, abo ku ma aje̩ ño̩ nana nyo̩gba ge̩; e̩wñ chʼile kʼe̩ne̩ ki ne̩ aje̩ tʼenʼeju-wñ ago ma ofo le?
Olu kʼe̩ne̩ ki achʼakanya uko̩lo̩ ale̩ abʼe̩ e̩do̩, dagba i chaka je̩ e̩wñ re dagba i je̩ e̩wñ nana; efu anana ki ko̩ ololo la aje̩ ñw u lolu n.
E̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ tabale kʼu li o̩gane̩ olu-i do̩mo̩: owñ chʼe̩wñ anana kʼanana agwo̩nyu kʼi chʼo̩la-wñ e̩bie̩ne̩,
e̩wñ anana le̩ la alenyo̩ rʼo̩wo̩ lʼugbo e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼi adʼu che. I la che̩wñ kʼi fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi e̩wñ abo̩ o̩wo̩-wñ n.
Alu kʼi kwʼefu iye-wñ dufu ago ofo abe̩le̩ i alo alu kʼi wa le̩. I la nʼe̩wñ du kwef uko̩lo̩ akanya kʼi che kʼi adu nʼo̩wo̩ alo n.
E-i ño̩ chʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ tabale kakini, Alu du kʼi de̩ e̩gba kʼi wʼile̩ abe̩le̩ i alo; e̩wñ chʼile kʼi ne̩ todu akanya uko̩lo̩ kʼi che tod afu ofo;
o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ du i dʼef e̩chubi aje̩ e̩wñ; e̩do̩dudu kpʼo̩ga kpʼuwe̩do̩ ki manyʼu chʼe̩kute̩.

Go, e̩wñ kʼu li kʼi nyo̩ kʼi laño̩ chʼeju-wñ che todu kʼone̩ ki je̩ kʼi la ñmo̩, kʼi la ali e̩nyo̩ ef akanya uko̩lo̩ du kʼi ache o̩gane̩ olu-i, aluka o̩jo̩ ude-ju-wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ du ñw u, todu ukpe̩-wñ de̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼO̩jo̩ kʼe̩wñ anana kpʼidu ñw u, kʼi laño̩ dʼukpahiu ñw u kʼi dʼu che e̩wñ ñw o̩la-wñ, kʼi U agbʼukpe̩-wñ kʼi la ali e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ kwef akanya uko̩lo̩-wñ, ele kʼO̩jo̩ du ñw u de̩.
Todu i ñʼarewa o̩jo̩ udeju-wñ nyo̩nyo̩ n, todu O̩jo̩ aje̩ ñw e̩do̩-wñ bo̩ e̩gba du.
E̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ʼka kʼu li o̩gane̩ olu-i do̩mo̩, i la woji nʼamone̩ oji:

e̩ne̩ kʼO̩jo̩ kʼe̩wñ anana, kpʼidu, kpʼojima ñw u, kʼi ma nʼe̩wñ du ki bo̩ kʼonugo-wñ añeju-wñ n, kʼO̩jo̩ ma muda dʼukpahiu ñw u kʼi aje̩ n, chai ononojo mʼu ko je̩; e-le̩ chʼo̩wai, o̩ga ki bie̩ne̩ i la che.

One̩ chaka bi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ogume̩lu, kʼi la deju o̩do̩ wewe, kʼojo̩lugbo-wñ kpo̩kpe̩ nana, kʼonugo-wñ ma ko̩ ñw e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ n, kʼi ma la nʼe̩ne̩ kʼi adʼu ji n, u kakini, O̩ma kʼiye-wñ ko rinyo̩ me̩ tʼowñ le.
Todu ewa-wñ chʼo̩wai, elo-wñ la chʼef e̩chubi, e̩chubi la bʼodu-wñ ma;
eju-wñ la dʼolu n, i la mʼo̩ n, e-le̩ nʼuñmi lʼekeji le.
Dagba i chaka deju o̩do̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ onu meii, kʼi ma la li e̩nyo̩ du n, o̩chaka-ma anyʼugbo kate n?
Akanya uko̩lo̩ du kʼone̩ ache, i ache ñw alu-wñ, i muda bʼebi-wñ jo̩ n.
E̩wñ anibe ne̩ du ake̩do̩nola-wñ ta? E̩wñ do̩mo̩ ñw e̩no̩bata kʼi meju emʼo̩la-wñ ne̩ eju abo ku ma deju?
E̩wñ kʼeju ali nyo̩ tʼeñeju e̩wñ tʼemi tʼemi le; e-le̩ ño̩ chʼo̩wai, kpʼafu ene ule ge̩.
E̩wñ du ki te̩te̩de̩, ma dʼodu ñw u kpo̩kpe̩ me̩, ma chema ab one̩ de̩, kʼi ma la neke bʼe̩ne̩ ki gbiti tʼowñ le kajo̩ n.
Abu kʼe̩wñ wewe do̩mo̩ ki aje̩ ñw e̩wñ o̩wai nana nyo̩gba, ugbo e̩tule e-one̩ de̩ efu-wñ?
Todu e̩ne̩ ma e-ki nyo̩ ñw one̩ o̩jo̩ du kʼi aje̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼojiji e̩wñ ef udeju o̩wai-i? E̩ne̩ neke ka ñw one̩ e̩wñ ki awa ubi-wñ o̩gane̩ olu-i.
Odu e̩nyo̩ ene̩ nyo̩ tʼekpo o̩me̩me̩le̩ ene̩ le;
Elo tʼunyi eku ede̩ nyo̩ tʼelo tʼunyi oko̩te̩ le; todu e-le̩ chʼukpoji amone̩ du, oñ e̩ne̩ ki deju adʼu tʼe̩do̩-wñ.
E̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩ nyo̩ tʼanyi le, todu lugbo eju ki kpa oñ iwo̩ e̩do̩ abuchi.
E̩do̩ anibe dʼunyi eku ede̩; e̩do̩ amake̩do̩nola-ma muda jʼef unyi anyi.
Uka amanibe egbo̩ nyo̩ tʼeli amake̩do̩nola-ma egbo̩ le.
Todu alu kʼuko̩la ikeke ki jʼofe ucha de̩, abe̩le̩ oñ anyi ake̩do̩nola-wñ de̩; e-le̩ ño̩ chʼowai ge̩.
Afuma eche agwʼanibe imu chuu,
Ukpoji e̩wñ nyo̩ tʼuchane̩-wñ le; e̩ne̩ ki fe̩do̩je̩ nyo̩ tʼe̩ne̩ ki ake le.
E̩ ki naju ef e̩do̩-we̩ kʼe̩ we̩do̩ n,
E̩ we eka kakini, Ab i le kʼiko igbele nyo̩ tʼabajo̩-i le?
Ibe ene̩ chenyo̩ dab e̩wñ ogu eje̩,
Todu olubo ibe dab olubo̩ o̩ko̩;
E̩ ki fʼibe uko̩lo̩ O̩jo̩ kpe̩;
O̩jo̩ ura e̩ ki jʼura, oñ o̩jo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ e̩ ki kpibe; O̩jo̩ fʼoka-wñ che ki fʼika tʼika kpai ekeji, todu kʼone̩ ki we eli e̩wñ ki awache ubi-wñ.
E̩wñ-i du u fuli o̩jo̩ o̩wai kʼu je̩: i chenʼe̩no̩kpakpa kʼi alenyo̩ ef o̩kpakpa-wñ. I laño̩ nʼe̩ne̩bibi kʼi akpo-jolugbo ef uko̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼi ache.
E̩ ki chʼe̩no̩kpakpa guʼe̩gu du n, e̩ ki la che kʼe̩ nʼibe ololo ololo n; e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ kpʼo̩la-we̩ tinyo̩?
E̩wñ bibi-we̩ ki chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩ n, e̩ ki la gwʼo̩la-we̩ idada n, e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ adʼiko-we̩ nyo̩ aku?
I nyo̩ kʼe̩ gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ-i, kʼe̩ muda we efʼo̩wo̩-we̩ ubi bʼe-le̩ te̩; todu e̩ne̩ ki arailo O̩jo̩ akwʼef e̩wñ le̩ dufu chaka.
Ibe chʼukpahiu ñw anibe, tʼabo̩da me̩gwa ku ma jʼewoʼka le.
Ochochi, i nʼe̩no̩kpakpa okate ile̩-i kʼi achʼe̩nyo̩ kʼi ma adure n.
E̩ ki netiru o̩la tʼo̩la du ku ma ka n, tode̩gba kʼe̩ gbo̩ abu kʼadu-we̩ abʼe̩ na;
ef e̩do̩-we̩ onugo chema ka kʼuwe̩ fʼina bu abo omune̩ o̩gbe̩nugbe̩.
E̩wñ-i du u nʼibe ajama; u kakini, Omi anʼibe; i muda jiji rʼumi.
E̩wñ ki do̩mo̩, jʼo̩najiji, i la nʼefu tabale; e̩ne̩ neke gwʼili-wñ?
U murida oñ e̩do̩-mi kad e̩wñ ema, kʼu tejane̩, kʼu laño̩ tene ibe, kʼu ma udo-jijo̩ e̩wñ, kʼeju-mi ki neru ka kʼe̩wñ bibi chʼibe̩te̩, kʼe̩wñ idada la chʼimu ehi.
U li ka kʼonobule̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ chʼoku kpʼiga, kʼo̩wo̩-wñ la chʼigbaligba, rikoko tʼuku le. E̩ne̩ du ki ache e̩wñ ki rʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ afʼonobule̩ le̩ o̩wo̩; oku-wñ mud amu e̩nadure.
Me̩ go, e̩wñ kʼu li le̩ de̩, Ako̩la ñw ujeju ka-i; u tejane̩ okoke kʼu mʼoji-wñ.
E̩wñ kʼonugo-mi tene o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩, u li e-le̩ n; u fʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka li ef amone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, u muda li onobule̩ʼkate ef abo-i chaka n.
E̩ go e-i kʼu li ta: ka kʼO̩jo̩ chʼone̩ tʼo̩kpakpa; ma muda tejane̩ e̩wñ ibe eñwa wewe.
E̩ne̩ dab anibe?
U kakini, Fʼe̩wñ kʼonu ñwa de, e-le̩ chʼutodu O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ go̩;
e̩ ki naju kʼe̩ kwo bʼeju-wñ te̩ n; e̩ ki jukutʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ n, todu i ache e̩wñ ki rʼowñ eju.
Todu o̩la onu chenʼukpahiu; e̩ne̩ la neke ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ e̩ che?
E̩ne̩ ki ade uko̩ kʼonu te̩ ali e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du n; e̩do̩ anibe la ama iko kpʼajo̩;
todu o̩la du chenʼiko, kpʼajo̩-wñ ku ma aka; todu e̩bie̩ne̩ one̩ nʼo oji te̩ olo̩lo̩.
Todu t ma e̩wñ ki awache n, todu e̩ne̩ neke ka ñw u alu kʼi ade̩?
I nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi nʼo̩da afu kʼi agwo̩nyʼafu n; abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ du la nʼo̩da o̩jo̩ uku n; i nʼedʼo̩la-we̩ tane̩ ef ogu n. Abe̩le̩ e̩wñ bibi la adʼe̩ne̩ ki tʼo̩ o̩wo̩ tane̩ n.
U fʼe̩wñ-i du li, oñ u dʼe̩do̩ tʼuko̩lo̩ du ku ma che o̩gane̩ olu-i. I che̩nʼe̩gba kʼone̩ anʼo̩da e̩ne̩ omune̩ ki abie̩ne̩ ñw u.
U ño̩ li abu ku ma kʼame̩ne̩bibi ji, oñ ma le ma. Oñ abo ku ma fʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa che kwʼuña kiafo̩ alo; taku ma gbenyo̩ ma ef ewo le̩: e-le̩ ño̩ chʼo̩wai kpo̩.
Todu abu ku ma ma hika je̩ ñw abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ chʼudu ku ma bu ñwu ma n, todule̩ oñ e̩do̩ amo̩ma amone̩ gbo ku ma che e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩.
Dagba e̩nadure chaka chʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ onu ogume̩lu, kʼi laño̩ kpo-jolugbo, omi muda ma kʼi anyo̩ ñw abo ku ma railo O̩jo̩ chuu, owñ chʼabo ku ma railo jʼo̩gba-wñ.
1 muda anyo̩ ñw e̩ne̩bibi n, i la akpʼojolugbo-wñ kʼi dab ojiji e̩wñ n, todabu kʼi ma railo o̩gba O̩jo̩ n.

E̩wñ o̩wai oka ku ma che ile̩-i do̩mo̩: owñ chʼabu kʼame̩no̩kpakpa do̩mo̩ kʼi ake̩re̩bʼuma teju alu kʼi ake̩re̩bʼuko̩lo̩ ame̩ne̩bibi; abe̩le̩ ge̩, i nʼame̩ne̩bibi ku ma nʼejile teju alu kʼuko̩lo̩ o̩kpakpa anʼejile. U kakini, E-le̩ ño̩ chʼo̩wai ge̩.

Tak u je̩nyʼe̩wñ anyi, todabu kʼone̩ ma nʼe̩wñ du ki nyo̩ o̩gane̩ olu-i tʼe̩wñ e̩je̩ kpʼe̩wñ eñmo̩ kpʼe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ le n; todu e-le̩ alebʼo̩ ef akanya uko̩lo̩-wñ o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-wñ, kʼO̩jo̩ du ñw u o̩gane̩ olu-i, akade.
E̩gba kʼu dʼe̩do̩-mi tʼe̩wñ ibe ema, kʼu li akanya du ku ma che ile̩-i, (todu i nʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ma dʼolu chʼeju tʼodu tʼo̩ro̩ka n).

Tak u fʼuko̩lo̩ O̩jo̩ li chaka, u ka kʼone̩ neke li uko̩lo̩ du ku ma che o̩gane̩ o̩lu-i n. Todu alu du kʼone̩ chaka chʼo̩la-wñ akanya kʼi atejane̩ i aliʼu n kpo̩. Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, dagba anibe do̩ kʼi ama, i nekʼaliʼu n.
Todu u mʼe̩wñ-i du du tʼe̩do̩ kʼu tejane̩ ofe-wñ, ka kʼame̩no̩kpakpa kpʼamanibe kpʼuko̩lo̩-ma jʼef o̩wo̩ O̩jo̩; dagba i chʼufe̩do̩ dagba i chʼulaka, one̩ amʼo̩ n. E̩wñ du jʼo̩gba-ma.

E̩wñ duawʼugbo e̩ne̩ duokujo̩, e̩wñ okate ache e̩no̩kpakpa kpʼe̩ne̩bibi; tʼe̩ne̩nyo̩, tʼe̩ne̩ ki fe̩, tʼe̩ne̩ ki ma fe̩ n, tʼe̩ne̩ ki achʼiche̩bo̩, tʼe̩ne̩ ki ma chʼiche̩bo̩ n; alu kʼe̩ne̩nyo̩ de̩ alu le̩ e̩nadure de̩; tʼe̩ne̩ ki age̩bo̩, tʼe̩ne̩ ki acho-kpo e̩bo̩ ego̩.

E̩bie̩ne̩ ki dʼef e̩wñ du ku ma che o̩gane̩ olu-i le̩ de̩, ka kʼe̩wñ kate ake̩re̩bʼuma chaka. Ochochi, e̩do̩ amo̩ma amone̩ che̩ko̩ ñw e̩bie̩ne̩; imu ehi dʼef e̩do̩-ma abu ku ma deju, ubi e-le̩ ma la anyʼugbo abo ki ku.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki manyʼabo ku ma deju chaka nʼukibeno: todu abia ki deju me̩ tʼidu ki ku le.
Todu abo ku ma deju chema ka kʼama aku, abo ki ku muda ma e̩wñ du n, i ño̩ nʼuloko ñwu ma ge̩ n; todu ma gbenyo̩ urewa-ma.
Tʼufe̩do̩-ma, tʼulaka-ma, tʼulie̩na-ma lenyo̩ kpo̩kpe̩ me̩. Ma laño̩ nʼukpe̩ ef e̩wñ du ku ma che o̩gane̩ o̩lu-i o̩gbegbele̩ ge̩ n.
Lo we̩, e̩ jʼuje̩wñ-we̩ kpʼuyo̩, kʼe̩ la ñmʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ kpʼe̩-do̩ e̩bo̩; todu O̩jo̩ mʼuko̩lo̩-we̩ gba me̩.
E̩wñ o̩la-we̩ ki fe̩ e̩gba du; e̩ ki je̩ ñw ekpo ki kwo bʼoji-we̩ te̩ n.
E̩ ki nʼe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ bʼo̩ya-we̩ kʼe̩ fe̩do̩ gugu o̩jo̩ udeju-we̩ e-o̩wai du kʼi du ñw e̩ o̩gane̩ olu-i; todu e̩wñ ki chʼukpe̩-we̩ ef udeju-i de̩, kpʼef akanya-we̩ du kʼuwe̩ ache o̩gane̩ olu-i.
E̩wñ du kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ tʼo̩, e̩ nʼukpahiu-we̩ che; todu i nʼuko̩lo̩ du kpʼibe e̩wñ eñwa kpʼe̩wñ ema kpʼibe ef o̩jegu ugbo kʼuwe̩ anyi le̩ n.

Oñ u mudabi ali o̩gane̩ olu-i, kakini, Ule era i chʼe̩ne̩ ki ahio̩wane̩ adu n; i la chʼabo ki nʼukpahiu adu ef ogu n; i la chʼamanibe nʼuje̩wñ n; i ñʼachʼabo ku ma mʼoji e̩wñ ane̩ e̩wñ anana n; i la chʼabo ku ma chʼo̩ka uko̩lo̩ oñ ma aliʼuma eju n; iko kpʼe̩wñ agbajiko muda ake̩re̩bʼe̩ne̩ du.
Todu one̩ ñʼama iko-wñ n, i dab ame̩ja ku ma mu ef iga bie̩ne̩, kpʼame̩we̩ ku ma nʼoku mu, abe̩le̩ oñ ma mu amo̩ma amone̩ iko e̩bie̩ne̩, e̩gba kʼi lewa banʼuma achigili.
Omi ño̩ li ibe o̩gane̩ olu-i abe̩i, oñ i wʼumi eju nana.
Ewo ke̩ke̩ do̩mo̩, one̩ re la jʼefu-wñ. Tak onu lile wa akʼogu bʼo̩, i la fʼala kpa nyʼu, i laño̩ fʼaku lile bu nyʼu.
Oñ ma fʼe̩no̩wo̩ ofoʼka kʼi chʼanibe li o̩mo̩. Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ nʼibe-wñ gba ewo le̩ tane̩; i muda nʼe̩ne̩ du ki rewa e̩no̩wo̩ ofo le̩ n.
Tak u kakini, Ibe nyo̩ eʼukpahiu le, i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma achʼe̩de̩te̩ ibe e̩no̩wo̩ ofo le̩ kpo̩, ma la nyʼo̩la-wñ kʼi ka eti n.
O̩la anibe ku ma gbo ye̩e̩ la nyo̩ tʼogu kʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩da ef amake̩do̩nola-ma akpa le.
Ibe nyo̩ tʼe̩wñ ido̩na ogu le; e̩nadureʼka muda akpʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ nana bie̩.
Oku amachichi je̩ ñw ekpo e̩ne̩ ki achʼotulale alu;
E̩do̩ anibe dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ,
Ochochi e̩gba kʼakamagbo̩ alule̩ ej o̩na, ibe nyaru owñ,
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩do̩ e̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩da chane̩ ekparʼe̩, e̩ ki kwo bʼuña-we̩ te̩ n,
E̩bie̩ne̩ʼka kʼomi li o̩gane̩ olu-i do̩mo̩, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼila ki kwʼugbo e̩no̩-da;
ma dʼidada gugu ef uña o̩gba oñ amanana gugu ej ubi.
Omi li abu kʼamadu tanʼanya, kʼamagboji lule̩ ane̩pe̩te̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼamadu.
E̩ne̩ ki agwʼura añwa tʼef uwñ;
E̩ne̩ ki akʼokuta okuta achʼo agbe,
Iche̩wñ kʼalu ebije ma le̩ n, kʼone̩ ma no̩ alu-wñ n,
Ejo fʼone̩ lo̩ tak achifamu kʼi gbʼo̩ ibe,
O̩la ki kwef alu anibe afʼone̩ mʼo̩ o̩la,
Uchane̩ o̩la alu-wñ chʼidada,
Idada akekale̩ nyʼo̩gba,
Akanya kʼamake̩do̩nola-ma ache agwʼuma uhia,
Atogwo ñw e̩, O ane̩, e̩gba kʼonu-we̩ chʼimo̩to̩,
O ane̩, e̩gba kʼonu-we̩ chʼomone̩, e̩ gbede,
Iñelebu aje̩ ñw ojokunyi atada;
Ma hi o̩je̩ uyo̩ tod anyi,
E̩ ki bʼonu ina n, i chaka chʼef e̩do̩-we̩, e̩ che n;
Kʼuje̩wñ-we̩ ro̩ jʼej omi,
Fʼukpe̩-wñ kpe̩ ñw abo mebie kpʼe̩-jo̩,
Iche̩wñ kʼakpa ko̩ ñw omi ojale,
E̩ne̩ ki agʼej afu afiʼe̩yo̩ tuka n;
Alu kʼuwe̩ ma mʼo̩na afu n, kpʼo̩na kʼachiku ef abio̩ma onobule̩ ki defu ale n, alu le̩ oñ uwe̩ ma mʼuko̩lo̩ O̩jo̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ du le̩ n.
E̩ kʼe̩yo̩-we̩ gbe̩ odudu waa. E̩ ki la fʼo̩wo̩-we̩ wʼubi e̩gha ane̩ n, todu uwe̩ mʼe-kʼi ara n, abe̩k e-i, abe̩k e-le̩, abe̩k ukani ejeji-wñ anyo̩ okujo̩.
Ugane̩ arinyo̩ ochochi, i la nyo̩ kʼeju ki li o̩lu.
Todu dagba one̩ chaka deju o̩do̩ wewe, kʼi nʼuyo̩ ef uwñ okoke du; i ki muda dibetʼo̩jo̩ e̩chubi, todu i awewe; e̩wñ du ki awa chʼowai.

O okolobia, e̩ nayo̩ abu kʼe̩ chʼokolobia, e̩ ki la je̩ ñw e̩do̩-we̩ ki bo̩ o̩jo̩ okolobia-we̩, kʼe̩ la lule̩ o̩na kʼe̩do̩-we̩ du, teju alu kʼeju-we̩ agane̩ kade; uwe̩ ki muda ma kakini, O̩jo̩ adʼuwe̩ ajo̩ tod e̩wñ-i du.
Todule̩ e̩ ki mʼe̩do̩dudu du tinyo̩ bʼef e̩do̩-we̩ te̩, kʼe̩ la kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kwo bʼo̩re̩la-we̩ te̩; todu iko imo̩to̩ okolobia kpai iko adanyi chʼowai.
E̩ ki la dibetʼe̩ne̩ ki nyi we̩ o̩jo̩ okolobia-we̩, o̩gba tak iko e̩bie̩ne̩ ki wa, kʼo̩do̩ e̩gba kʼuwe̩ akakini, “U nʼube̩do̩ ef uwñ n” mute wa;
o̩gba tak olu kpʼugane̩ kpʼochu kpʼilawo chane̩ echubi kʼomi lo̩ kʼakpa mudabiwa;
o̩jo̩ kʼo̩la amadide unyi chane̩ ega, kʼamagbiti adʼoji lo̩, kʼabobule̩ ku ma no̩ e̩wñ we enʼe̩wñ, ukpe̩ leu ma bo̩ re ofo, kʼabo ku ma nyʼope gʼo̩do̩da chubi;
kʼama fʼalu o̩na ojukpologu re; kʼekuku e̩wñ eno̩ bo̩ re, kʼone̩ akwane̩ todu omuko̩la e̩we̩ kʼi agbo̩, ku ma fʼamo̩ma onobule̩ ku ma keli chi ukata;

ochochi, ama ño̩ railo e̩wñ ki dʼatate̩; e̩wñ okpo la jʼej o̩na; tak oli almond adikoko; kʼakpachi la chʼadu, kʼeñeju e̩wñ ma de̩ ge̩ n; todabu kʼone̩ anyʼunyi-wñ ki chʼogbegbele̩, oñ abo ku ma deku tale ej o̩na ej o̩na;
o̩gba tak iku ajifa le̩ muko̩da, abe̩k otube̩ o̩jamalia mukpo̩-fo̩, abe̩k o̩cha kpo̩fo̩ alu e̩bi omi, abe̩k injini ku ma du kpʼomiofo mukpabie̩ alu obuga,
tak ebutu mudabi tʼane̩pe̩te̩ ugbo kʼi de̩ akwoubi, kʼafu la mudabi tʼugbo O̩jo̩ kʼi dʼu wa.
O̩wai e-o̩wai, Ako̩la ñw ujeju ka-i; e̩wñ du chʼo̩wai.
Ubi le̩ ge̩ abu kʼAko̩la ñw ujeju le̩ chenʼibe, i ño̩ ko̩ amone̩ e̩wñ ibe ema ge̩. I nakpibe̩, i kwotejane̩, i la fʼita ita wewe te̩ru jo̩.
Ako̩la ñw ujeju le̩ kwotejane̩ o̩la ki abe̩do̩, kpʼe̩wñ ku ma ko̩ tʼo̩kpakpa, owñ chʼo̩la ochochi.
O̩la amanibe dab ebije ku ma du gwunyʼofe kʼokuno̩ kʼi lule̩, eyajo̩-wñ la dab ale ku ma fuka nyʼe̩wñ kpaka: adidala okate ko wa.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, o̩ma-mi, e̩ ki je̩ ñwu ma kʼuwe̩ e̩wñ o̩la; o̩takada etito̩ e̩che̩ i nʼuda n, oñ e̩wñ eko̩che̩ ololo agwʼo̩re̩la uhia.
Ukpoji o̩la-i chaka de̩; a fʼe̩wñ du gbo̩ me̩; railo O̩jo̩, kʼe̩ fʼuko̩ uko̩ kʼi te̩ de; todu e-ki chʼo̩gbodudu e̩wñ e-one̩de̩.
Todu O̩jo̩ adʼuko̩lo̩ okoke du wʼef ajo̩, i chaka chʼe̩wñ du ki maja, dagba i nyo̩ dagba i bie̩ne̩.
Eli e-eli ki chʼe-So̩lo̩mo̩n de̩.
O i ki dʼalu-wñ kʼumi alu!
ekpo-we̩ akpo nyo̩nyo̩,
Fa mi, awa la afule tʼuwe̩ ubi.
U chʼedudu, u muda chʼuto̩ eju,
Me̩ ki kejurʼumi ukpe̩ kʼu chʼedudu n,
O uwe̩ kʼonugo-mi afe̩do̩-wñ le̩,
Uwe̩ ma ma n,
O, e̩no̩wo̩-mi, omi dʼuwe̩ wawe,
Iti-we̩ chʼuto̩ ñw e̩wñ ijaga ku ma re nyʼu,
Awa aba o̩jamalia okokolo ñw e̩,
Abu kʼonu gugu itebulu-wñ,
E̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ dabe̩ne̩ kʼakpulu mur,
E̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ dab ododo he̩na ki tiga jo̩ yolo yolo
Go, uwe̩ chʼalifia, e̩no̩wo̩-mi;
Go, uwe̩ chʼalifia, uwe̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ le̩,
igbo oli unyi-wa che sida,
Omi chʼo̩dodo Sharo̩n,
Dabe̩ne̩ kʼododo lili ki jʼef ikeke,
Alu kʼoli ape̩l de̩ ef oli efoko,
I mʼumi du wʼunyi omi achiwebe̩te̩ma,
Dʼe̩gbe̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma chʼabune mi,
Oji-mi nʼo̩wo̩-wñ awohi,
Ame̩ amo̩ma onobule̩ Je̩rusale̩m,
Omuko̩la e̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ de̩!
E̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ le̩ dab egbi,
E̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ le̩ ko̩la oñ i ka ñw umi kakini:
todu go, afu o̩we̩ takpa me̩,
Ododo kwodufu ane̩-ile̩,
E̩ro oli o̩gbaikolo akpa me̩,
O ikede-mi, kʼe̩ dʼef akpolokuta, ugbo umaja o̩gba okuta lile,
Me̩ fʼamakajuwe̩ mu ñw a,
Omi nʼe̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ le̩, owñ la ne̩ mi ge̩,
Gbogbo tak afu chane̩ efe̩rʼo̩la
U tejane̩ e̩ne̩ kʼonugo-mi afe̩do̩ le̩ oj ate̩-mi odu;
Fai nakwane̩ kʼu te̩ le ewo-i,
Amadide ku ma tale ewo le̩,
U lale gu ma du re ofo,
Ame̩ amo̩ma onobule̩ Je̩rusale̩m,
E̩ne̩ kwʼaje̩tachi awa-i?
Go, iga So̩lo̩mo̩n le̩ de̩!
o̩chaka-ma nʼo̩kwo̩chageli,
Onu So̩lo̩mo̩n nʼoli Le̩bano̩n
I nʼajifa chʼoli urane̩-wñ,
Me̩ ledufu, ame̩ amo̩ma onobule̩ Zayo̩n,
Go, uwe̩ chʼalifia, e̩no̩wo̩-mi,
Enyi-we̩ dab ujo̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ ku ma jʼedudu-ma ababa
Uko-we̩ dab owu ekpikpa,
O̩lo̩-we̩ dab o̩do̩go̩ Defid
E̩nya-we̩ meji dab amo̩ma egbi meji,
Gbogbo tak afu chane̩ efe̩ rʼo̩la,
Uwe̩ chʼalifia chaka e̩no̩wo̩-mi;
Kwo Le̩bano̩n lebʼumi, o̩ya-mi;
Uwe̩ mʼune̩do̩ du ñw mi me̩, o̩maye-mi, o̩ya-mi,
Alu kʼe̩ che̩do̩ chʼalifia gbe̩, o̩maye-mi, o̩ya-mi!
E̩wñ ki akʼitp kwʼalu-we̩ wʼane̩ dab omi apachi iño̩, O o̩ya-mi;
O̩maye-mi, o̩ya-mi le̩, chʼuche̩ ku ma bʼo̩gba nyʼu,
E̩pa-we̩ chʼujo̩ oli po̩me̩grane̩t
spaiknad kpai safron, kalamus kpai sinamo̩n,
Uwe̩ chʼe̩bi omi ef uche̩, obuga omi ki abi dufu e̩ che,
Mʼolu ji, O afu o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩,
O̩maye-mi, o̩ya-mi, u lewa ef uche̩-mi,
U dachi alolu, eju e̩do̩-mi muda jo̩,
U mʼafe̩-mi gwo̩ jane̩ me̩,
E̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ dʼo̩wo̩ lʼowe̩ tʼejefu,
U kwane̩ kʼu mʼu bi ñw e̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ le̩,
U mʼo̩na bi ñw e̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ le̩,
Amadide ku ma tale ewo le̩,
NagʼO̩jo̩ nʼame̩, ame̩ amo̩ma onobule̩ Je̩rusale̩m,
Ugbo oñ e̩ne̩ kʼe̩ che̩do̩-wñ le̩ fʼe̩ne̩
Eju e̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ le̩ ade̩ ki atekpo,
Oji-wñ chʼo̩jamalia e-e̩gwe̩;
Eju-wñ la dab amikede eti aji,
Iti-wñ dab ikpoga e̩wñ idoro,
O̩wo̩-wñ chʼelika elika o̩jamalia,
E̩re̩-wñ dab okuta e̩kina meji ki dago waala,
Alu-wñ arinyo̩ tabale,
Ugbo e̩ne̩ kʼe̩ che̩do̩-wñ le̩ letu,
E̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ gwo̩ru le tʼef uche̩-wñ,
E̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ ne̩ mi, omi laño̩ nʼe̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ le̩;
Uwe̩ chʼalifia, e̩no̩wo̩-mi, alifia we̩ dabu Tirza,
Mʼeju-we̩ rida bʼumi te̩, todu i tʼumi le—
Enyi-we̩ dab ujo̩ amole ala,
Ibakpiti-we̩ dab e̩bu e̩ro po̩me̩grane̩t
Amo̩ya onu chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta, abaja-wñ chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩le̩,
Ikede e-mi, e̩ne̩-mi ki mufu-i, chʼokate,
E̩ne̩ chʼonobule̩ kʼeju-wñ ade̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩jo̩ añwa-i?
Omi gwo̩ru nyʼef uche̩ oli ku ma kpʼe̩yo̩-wñ je̩,
U nʼenʼibe-wñ n, oñ onugo-mi dʼumi gugu
Mudabiwa, mudabiwa, uwe̩ e̩ne̩ Shulam le̩,
O, e̩re̩-we̩ ki tʼef e̩da le̩ nyo̩ ego,
Ukodo-we̩ dab ago okokolo
E̩nya-we̩ meji dab amo̩ma e̩la abi-kolo,
O̩lo̩-we̩ dab o̩do̩go̩ ku ma nʼenyi adagba che.
Oji-we̩ kad o̩lo̩-we̩ dabu Karme̩l,
Go ab e̩ fe̩reju kpai alu kʼe̩rʼone̩ e̩do̩,
O̩gba kʼe̩ gba dab e̩kpe̩,
U kakini, Nate̩gu e̩kpe̩ le̩ nagwo̩nyʼima-wñ.
ikpako o̩fa-we̩ la adab achiwebe̩te̩ma ki nyo̩ tʼuma le
E̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ ne̩ mi,
Lewa, e̩ne̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-wñ,
awa ki takpa kwane̩ anyʼoko achiwebe̩te̩ma,
Ododo o̩lafe̩ akpo me̩,
O uwe̩ ma dab o̩maye-mi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩,
Omi ma nʼuwe̩ le kʼu dʼe̩
Oji-mi ma nʼo̩wo̩-wñ awohi,
Ame̩ amo̩monobule̩ Je̩rusale̩m, nagʼO̩jo̩ nʼume̩,
E̩ne̩ kwʼef aje̩tachi awa-i?
Mʼumi du chʼuhiuko̩ e̩do̩-we̩,
Omio̩fo̩ nana nana neke kpʼufe̩do̩ lu n,
Awa che̩nʼo̩maye onobule̩ ke̩ke̩,
I ma chʼo̩do̩,
Omi chʼo̩do̩,
So̩lo̩mo̩n nʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma Be̩-e̩l-hemo̩n;
Uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-mi, kʼomi ne̩, tʼo̩gba-mi-i;
Uwe̩ kʼe̩ gugu oko le̩,
Hiane̩ wa, uwe̩ kʼu nache̩do̩-i,
Ane̩ kʼAizaya, o̩ma Emoz, go de̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m kʼi li o̩kpanachi Uzaya kpai Jotam kpʼEhaz kpai He̩ze̩kaya, amonu Juda le̩.
O efojale, gbo̩ ke, O ile̩, netiru ke;
O̩kokuno̩ chema odu-wñ,
Keka! uche̩ ame̩nadure,
E̩wñ chi ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku ma gwo me̩ itali ta?
Akwʼadaba e̩re̩ gbogbo tʼakpe̩te̩ oji,
Ane̩-me̩ chʼakpokpo te̩,
O̩monobule̩ Zayo̩n bo̩ tʼo̩mo̩
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du le̩
Ame̩, ame̩nuto̩gba So̩do̩m,
E̩wñ chʼe-mi kpʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ inaina ku me̩ kpa-i?

Me̩ ki ño̩ kʼe̩wñ ele o̩wai wa ge̩ n;
Ochu etito̩-me̩ kpai ujeju ujeju ku me̩ da
E̩gba ku me̩ fʼo̩wo̩-me̩ nadala jo̩,
Fʼo̩la-me̩ gwe̩; chʼo̩la-me̩ ki fe̩;
ko̩che̩ e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ eche;

I la che̩wñ ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ laño̩ mugbagbo̩,
me̩ muda ko̩ ku me̩ la fʼe̩re̩ ubi ro̩,

Todule̩ Ondu,
Tak u nadʼo̩wo̩-mi dabiwa abʼuwe̩ ma
Oñ nakʼamakajo̩-we̩ dabi jʼe̩gu-ma dab e̩gba ejodudu le̩, kpʼabo̩hiala-we̩ alu ku ma de̩ kwʼabakwane̩ ge̩.
Ma anʼajo̩ o̩kpakpa gba Zayo̩n tane̩,
Echile̩che̩ abo ku ma fʼada je̩ kpʼame̩nadure achʼaluʼkate,
Todu anyo̩ amu me̩ tod oli ok
Todu ame̩ adab oli ok
Amagbiti la adab owu e̩fa,
O̩la Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m kʼAizaya,
I awatu e̩gba o̩jo̩ otitala
tak amone̩ ojoji ojoji wewe anyʼaka kakini:
Owñ la akajo̩ agbagba abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
O abunyi Jeko̩b,
Todu uwe̩ fʼabo-we̩ hi tinyo̩,
Ajifa kpʼo̩jamalia la che̩ko̩ ane̩-ma,
Ode ño̩ che̩ko̩ ane̩-ma;
Abe̩le̩ oñ one̩ achʼo̩la-wñ ukata,
Mugudu tʼef okuta le̩,
Ma ahi eju eke e-one̩ wane̩,
Todu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du chenʼiko o̩jo̩
kpai abʼoli sida e-Le̩bano̩n du kʼi hi o̩la-wñ ne tʼatate̩ le̩ oji ma;
kpai abʼoji uwo uwo du ki gbo̩gba ma,
kpai abʼoji o̩do̩go̩ du ki gbo̩gba ma,
kpai abʼoji o̩ko̩ Tarshish ma chaka,
Tak ehine e-one̩ adʼoji lo̩,
Ode ode du la atakpa rʼeju hioko.
Tak amone̩ anyʼef owo owo okuta kpʼef ura ura ane̩pe̩te̩
O̩jo̩ le̩ amone̩ akʼode-ma
kʼama ki nyʼef owo okuta
Me̩ ki we eke̩do̩nʼone̩
Todu, go, Ondu, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wn du,
agbiti kpʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-ogu,
agboji one̩ ooje
Oñ nakʼabimo̩to̩ chʼamajo̩fe̩-ma,
Amone̩ le̩ la ate̩ omune̩ mane̩,
E̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ gwo̩nyʼo̩maye-wñ
iko le̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ ako̩, kakini:
Todu Je̩rusale̩m fʼe̩re̩ ko̩ me̩,
Alu kʼeju-ma de̩ agbʼibenu nyʼuma;
Me̩ ki nʼo̩la e̩no̩kpakpa aka ka kʼi anyo̩ ñw u,
Atogwo ki chʼe-e̩ne̩bibi! Todu i abie̩ne̩ ñw u,
I chʼe-amone̩-mi—abimo̩to̩ fʼuma te̩mane̩,
Jihofa kwane̩ dago ki ja,
Jihofa abʼabogijo amone̩-wñ kpʼamajo̩fe̩-ma kajo̩:
Abu me̩ le ku me̩ fʼamone̩-mi te̩mane̩,
Ubi e-le̩ ge̩, Jihofa kakini:
todule̩ Ondu anʼo̩ga gwo akpe̩te̩ oji
O̩jo̩ le̩ Ondu akʼude̩ ku ma ko nyʼe̩re̩ le̩ rinyo̩ kpai iga oji kpʼe̩wñ ijaga-ma ki dab ochu kekele;
uko̩lo̩ ku ma du tʼo̩fa kpʼiyagba-ma kpʼugbogbo ku ma wenyʼo̩fa;
kpʼugbogbo oji kpʼiyagba e̩re̩ kpʼukpo ide̩kwo kpʼakpati e̩wñ ki akpo kpʼude̩ o̩wo̩;
kpʼelika o̩wo̩ kpʼelika iñmo̩;
kpʼafe̩ ku ma dʼu mʼo̩la kpʼo̩chada ku ma ko nʼika kpʼigbe̩chi kpʼikpa;
kpʼukpo ne̩wu ne̩wu kpʼukpo line̩n ku ma hi reju kpʼalawoni kpʼukpo ubo-jima.
Oñ i awatu e̩wñ e̩che̩ ade̩ koji e̩wñ ki akpo;
O̩kwochageli agwʼaboke̩le̩-we̩ da jane̩,
Alaku-wñ adinaku, i la adaido̩;

Abobule̩ mebie la agwonyʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ʼka o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i, ma akakini, A anʼuje̩wñ ñw o̩la-wa, awa la anʼe̩wñ ubo̩lama kʼa ko bʼo̩la-wa ma, e̩ ki muda je̩ ñw ma dʼodu-we̩ mʼuwa ofo; kʼe̩ mʼina le̩ ko bʼuwa o̩la te̩.
Iko le̩ E̩pa e-Jihofa achʼalifia kpʼojima, e̩ro ane̩ kpʼe̩bi-wñ la achʼe̩wñ uba kpʼe̩wñ ijaga ñw abo Israe̩l ku ma mufu tane̩.
Oñ i awatu ka ku ma ado̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma to̩no̩ ti Zayo̩n kpʼe̩ne̩ ki bo̩ Je̩rusale̩m ko̩ Abo Kiafo̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ du ku ma kʼodu-wñ tʼef abo ki deju Je̩rusale̩m,
e̩gba kʼOndu nʼAfu e-ajo̩ kpʼe-una fʼechu amo̩ma onobule̩ Zayo̩n gwe̩ rinyo̩ kpa, kʼi la fʼe̩bie̩ Je̩rusale̩m deli rinyo̩ bʼalumeji-wñ te̩,
taku Jihofa anyi akpa kpʼoduduna o̩ro̩ka, kpʼuna ki ajo gaa odu, kʼi bʼoji uña ugugu kpʼujeju ujeju oj uwo Zayo̩n du ma; todu kʼi chʼe̩wñ ubʼojima-wñ du ma ate̩.
Abe̩le̩ ebu ade̩ kʼi chʼolubo̩ tod o̩la ki akpa o̩ro̩ka, kʼi ño̩ mud uña ki agbʼone̩ nyi tod afu kpʼomi ki alo̩.
Je̩ ñw mi kʼeli tod e̩nufe̩do̩-mi eli uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma e-e̩nufe̩do̩-mi i che:
I la fʼane̩-wñ nu, oñ i fʼokuta-wñ re kwʼefu-wñ,
Oñ fa-i, ame̩ ku me̩ dodo Je̩rusale̩m kpai aboke̩le̩ Juda, nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩ ku me̩ dale agbagba-mi
E̩wñ bo̩ kʼomi ma che ñw uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-mi n?
Fa-i tak u naka ñw me̩
Nache kʼi mud ikpo te̩;
Todu uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma e-Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du
Atogwo! ñw abo ku ma kʼunyi kad omune̩,
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ko̩la nyʼumi eti kakini:
Todu ikpoga uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma me̩gwa anʼomi otube̩ meji,
Atogwo! ñw abo ku ma takpa kwane̩ odudu,
Umolo kpʼumolo lile kʼi nʼiku me̩gwa kpʼ
Todule̩ oñ amone̩-mi lerʼef amu
Todule̩ oñ efu o̩jegu mula
O̩ma one̩ la mu te̩kpe̩ wane̩, ukata e̩ne̩ lile muchi,
Ma muda fu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du hi tʼatate̩ ef ajo̩ o̩kpakpa,
Tak amo̩mala ajo̩ ajʼije̩ dabe̩ne̩ ku ma jʼokije̩ e-ma,
Atogwo! ñw abo ku ma nʼiku olemi afʼudu wa,
kʼama kakini; I ki hiane̩ wa ke,
Atogwo! ñw abo ku ma do̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼe̩nyo̩
Atogwo! ñw abo ku ma chʼo̩ka eju o̩la-ma,
Atogwo! ñw abo ku ma chʼamagbiti omi achiwebe̩te̩ma eñmo̩,
ku ma la dale ñw e̩ne̩bibi tod o̩ko̩ ugwa,
Todule̩, alu kʼo̩go̩ una fʼo̩kakpunu egbe lie̩ mʼane̩,
Todule̩ oñ uwe̩do̩ Jihofa mutajo bʼoji amone̩-wñ ma,
I la adʼagaliga dago ñw abo uche̩ichi ku ma jʼo̩najiji,
Uhia la ahia e̩ne̩ du ef uma n, e̩ne̩ du akʼe̩re̩ n,
o̩fa-ma ale̩,
Uka-ma ku ma nu dab ole idu,
Iko kʼa ka-i ma la akwa rʼuma oji,
O̩do̩ kʼUzaya onu le̩ ku, u fʼOndu li abu kʼi gugu oj ede, i chʼe̩hine tʼatate̩; e̩rane̩ otogbo-wñ che̩ko̩ ef unyi O̩jo̩.
Amise̩rif dago jʼatate̩ ñw u: e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma nʼika me̩fa e̩fa: eji i ko bʼeju ma, eji i ko bʼe̩re̩ ma, eji i la nʼawu.
Oñ oka-wñ nakwado̩ ekeji kakini: I afo̩, i afo̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du afo̩; o̩gbo̩ ile̩ du che̩ko̩ ñw ojima-wñ.
Tak e̩rane̩ alugbo̩na alugbo̩na kwo miejo tod omu e̩ne̩ ki akwa, unyi le̩ la che̩ko̩ ñw odudu.
Tak u kakini, Atogwo chʼe-mi! e-mi ta me̩! todabu kʼomi chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi nʼuko kʼi chechiwa, kʼu laño̩ dodo alumeji amone̩ kʼuko-ma chechiwa: todu eju-mi dʼOnu, owñ che Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du!
Tak ise̩rif oka muwu wʼugbo mi, e̩ge̩ una kʼi nʼalapa du kwʼoj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ dʼo̩wo̩-wñ.
Oñ i mʼu du kad alu-mi, i kakini, Go, e̩wñ-i kad uko-we̩ me̩; udu kʼe̩ fe̩ kwo bʼe̩ te̩, e̩wñ bʼadure-we̩ ma me̩.
Tak u gbʼomu Ondu kʼi akakini, E̩ne̩ nakpʼo̩ uche̩? E̩ne̩ ale todu wa? Tak u kakini, Omi de̩! Kpe̩ mi.
Tak i kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ ka ñw amone̩-i kakini:
E̩ che kʼe̩do̩ amone̩-i ki mud agbo̩go̩,
Tak u kakini, Ondu gbogbo nyʼe̩gba ta? I kakini:
ki Jihofa mʼamone̩ ko kwʼemi rʼo̩najiji,
Dagba e̩kpe̩gwa-wñ oka chaka bo̩ jʼef uwñ,
Oñ i lewatʼo̩kpanachi Ehaz, o̩ma Jo̩tam kʼi chʼo̩ma Uzaya, onu Juda le̩, ku Re̩zin, onu Siria, kpai Peka, o̩ma Re̩malaya onu Israe̩l, mute̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m ku ma kʼogu bʼo̩, ma muda neke dʼu n.
Taku ma mʼu du ka ñw abunyi Defid kakini, Abo Siria muchi wa manyʼIfraim me̩, e̩do̩-wñ kpʼe̩do̩ abo-wñ kwoga alu kʼafu aje̩ ñw oli efoko ki miejo le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw Aizaya kakini, Fa-i uwe̩ kpai She-ar-ja-shub, o̩ma-we̩, ki dufu nyʼojikpadala oko agwʼukpo le̩, kʼe̩ ledo Ehaz alu o̩cha omi kʼi acha kwʼabukpe omi ate̩ le̩ wa,
kʼe̩ ka ñw u kakini, Fʼo̩la mu, kʼe̩ de̩ yo̩o̩, e̩ ki railo n, e̩do̩-we̩ ki da kpu tod ajobo̩ e̩mu meji ku ma jʼakpʼodudu-i n, owñ chʼuwe̩do̩ Re̩zin kpai Siria kpʼe-o̩ma Re̩malaya kʼi kpuna le̩.
Todabu ku Siria kpʼlfraim kpʼoma Re̩malaya fʼibe e̩bie̩ne̩ ñwa nyʼuwe̩, kakini,
Awa ki te̩gu ru Juda o̩la kʼe̩do̩ ki ko̩ ma biyoo, kʼa fʼuña ñw o̩la-wa kʼa dʼo̩ma Tabee̩l jʼonu gugu alumeji-wñ,
abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Todu oji Siria che Damaskus,
Oji Ifraim la che Samaria,
Taku Jihofa ño̩ ko̩la ñw Ehaz kakini,
Ti Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, ene kʼi dʼujiwe ñw e̩; tʼe ene ugbo unefu o̩gane̩ abe̩k atate̩ efojale.
Ehaz muda kakini, Natʼe ene n, omi la aji Jihofa ma n.
Tak i kakini, Me̩ gbo̩ ta, ame̩ abunyi Defid! e-kʼame̩ gwʼone̩ uhia chʼe̩wñ fuye̩ eju-me̩? ku me̩ ño̩ che ku me̩ gwʼO̩jo̩-mi uhia ge̩?
I dʼabe̩le̩ mak Ondu onugo adʼujiwe ñw e̩. Go, igbe̩le̩ kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n le̩ adefu, i la abi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, oñ i adʼodu-wñ ko̩ Imaniue̩l.
Okume̩ agwe kpʼiño̩ oñ i aje̩ gbogbo tak eju-wñ mune̩ kʼi ko̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼi mʼe̩nyo̩ du.
Todu o̩gba tak imo̩to̩ le̩ ma kʼi ko̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼi mʼe̩nyo̩ du, ma ahi ane̩ kʼamonu-wñ meji kʼuwe̩ o̩la-i tinyo̩.
Jihofa akʼiko wa abʼoji uwe̩ kpʼabo-we̩ kpʼabʼunyi ata-we̩ ma, owñ chʼiko kʼe̩go̩-wñ ma de̩ akwe̩gba kʼIfraim mudaru bi Juda te̩ n—owñ chʼonu Asiria.
Oñ i awatu iko le̩ ka ki Jihofa afufo do̩ achichi ki dʼo̩najiji oji aji aji Ijipti, manyʼiño̩ ki dʼojane̩ Asiria.
Tak ama awa, o̩chaka-ma achi wa jo̩ o̩go̩uwo o̩go̩kpe̩-i kpʼef e̩kpana okuta kpʼoj o̩gba ikeke chaka kpʼoj okije̩ du.
O̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i Ondu anʼabe̩ uloji kʼi faya kwʼejudaba ohimini le̩, owñ chʼonu Asiria, oñ i anʼe̩ lʼoji kpʼedudu gbogbo wa abʼe̩re̩ ma, i la ñʼafʼilagba lie̩ manyʼu.
Oñ i awatu iko le̩ ka kʼone̩ ade agbadufu ole okuno̩ʼka kpʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini meji ku ma deju;
todu omi e̩nya-ma kʼi chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩, i anʼokume̩ agwe aje̩; todu abo du ku ma bojʼalumeji ane̩-i aje̩ okume̩ agwe kpʼiño̩.
I lañʼade̩ iko le̩ ka kʼugbo du kʼikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ kʼaja-wñ bo̩ she̩ke̩l icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ jo̩ te̩tajo̩ akwoubi, o̩mo̩ amud iñwa kpʼikeke.
One̩ anʼo̩fa kpʼo̩o̩do̩ tak i awʼo̩mo̩, todabu kʼojane̩ le̩ chaka mud iñwa kpʼikeke.

Otete otete du ugbo ku ma te̩te̩nʼuko̩che̩ aluche̩ oji-wñ, one̩ ñʼate̩ me̩rʼu ge̩ n, tod ailo iñwa kpʼikeke kʼi ara; chai ugbo ku ma kʼamo̩kokuno̩ jo̩ kpʼugbo kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini akpetili mʼane̩ i che.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, Mʼalo lile du kʼe̩ nʼiko̩ e-one̩ ko̩ nyʼu kakini, “Todu Mahe̩r-shalal-hash-baz.”
Tak u kʼame̩nibenu meji ku ma chubi mi wa gba mi ibenu, owñ chʼUraya, atama, kpai Ze̩karaya, o̩ma Je̩be̩re̩kaya,
oñ u te̩wʼugbo akache̩ onobule̩ le̩; i la fʼefu nyo̩, oñ i fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi. Taku Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, E̩ dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Mahe̩r-shalal-hash-baz;
todu o̩gba tak o̩ma le̩ nʼibe kʼi akwa kakini, Ata-mi kpai lye-mi, ma akʼe̩wñ anana Damaskus kpʼe̩wñ Samaria kʼogu je̩ alo tʼonu Asiria o̩gba.
Taku Jihofa ño̩ ko̩la ñw mi kakini:
Abu kʼamone̩-i ko̩ omi Shailo kʼi te̩ nuku le̩, ku ma la rʼomi rʼane̩ o̩gba Re̩zin kpʼo̩ma Re̩malaya le̩;
ifai, tod e-le̩, go, Ondu akʼomi Ohimini kʼi nʼukpahiu kʼi ño̩ nana le̩ wa abʼuma oji ma, owñ chʼonu Asiria kpʼojima-wñ chaka; i la awobi bʼo̩cha-wñ du ma, i ñʼawobi lʼoj o̩gba-wñ du;
eruru-wñ la awa bi Juda ma, i awobi lale gu o̩mo̩ du ta, i awobi gbogbo kad o̩fa; e̩nadala ika-wñ meji ako̩ unabe̩ ane̩-we̩, O Imaniue̩l.
Me̩ cho̩ko̩, O amone̩, ku ma fʼume̩ ge̩ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩;
Me̩ nyojuju, ojuju-me̩ la amud ofofo;
Todu Jihofa nʼo̩wo̩ e̩gbiti ko̩la abe̩le̩ ñw mi, i la juka ñw mi kʼu we elʼikpa amone̩-i, i kakini:
I chʼo̩de̩de̩ e̩wñ kʼamone̩-i ka kʼalu ejo̩ nyu, kʼuwe̩ aka kʼalu ejo̩nyu n, e̩ ki railo e̩wñ kʼama arailo-wñ le̩ n, e̩ ki la gagogodo n.
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼame̩ ache kiafo̩; owñ le̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ubailo-me̩, owñ ki chʼegagogodo-me̩.
Owñ achʼuña kiafo̩ ñw me̩, i muda achʼokuta ewane̩ kpai apata okuta ki adʼone̩ hi ñw abo unyi Israe̩l mejeji. I achʼada kpai oku ñw abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m.
Amone̩ wewe ef uma la adʼe̩re̩ kʼo̩, ma awane̩, ma aguche̩, oku amʼuma, ma ako ma alo.
Uwe̩ ki fʼo̩la ibenu le̩ ji, fʼuko̩-o̩la le̩ hiuko̩ ef amako̩che̩-mi.
Omi anede Jihofa, owñ kʼi adʼeju-wñ maja bʼabo unyi Jeko̩b te̩, u la akejurʼo̩na ñw u.
Me̩ go, omi kpʼamo̩ma ki Jihofa ko ñw mi chʼujiwe kpai e̩wñ aye ki jo̩ Israe̩l kwʼugbo Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi gugu oj uwo Zayo̩n le̩.

Tak e̩gba ku ma aka ñw e̩ kakini, E̩ natene ugbo abo ku ma dʼaje̩nu kpai abo ku ma dʼe̩bo̩ ku ma ko̩la etikpo̩gu kpai abo ku ma ko̩la ñw o̩la-ma: i dukpe̩ kʼamone̩ atene ugbo o̩jo̩-ma n? Ma ñʼatʼabo ki ku ene tod abo ki deju?
Me̩ nyʼugbo uko̩-o̩la kpai o̩la ibenu-wñ! Ma ma ko̩la teju o̩la-i n, mak o̩jo̩ eñwa ade̩ ñw ma ge̩ n de̩.
Ma la alale gu ef uwñ du, o̩bata inaina akʼuma o̩la kpai ebi; oñ i awa tʼe̩gba kʼebi akpa ma, ma agwʼo̩la-ma uwe̩do̩, ma la abʼonu-ma kpai o̩jo̩-ma ina, taku ma akʼeju rʼate̩:
ma la ago ane̩pe̩te̩, me̩ la go, o̩pe̩cha kpai e̩chubi kpai uwa i che te̩; ma la ane̩ ma rʼefe̩chubi gbe̩m.

O̩bulubulu muda ade̩ ñw onobule̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ kpabie̩ le̩ n. O̩gbo̩gba i je̩ ñw ma che̩de̩te̩ ane̩ Ze̩biulo̩n kpai ane̩ Naftali, ama e̩gba iko otitala i aje̩ ñw o̩na ohimini le̩ ki nʼojima, owñ chʼane̩ ejudaba Jo̩rdan, Galilie-abo uche̩ichi le̩.
Amone̩ ku ma te̩talule̩ ef e̩chubi le̩
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw abo ichi-i wewe nyo̩gba,
Todu uwe̩ fʼoli uno̩lo̩ kʼi chʼadu-wñ
Todu me̩ akʼe̩da du kʼisoja nyi da nyane̩ ef ekuku
Todu ma fʼo̩ma bi ñw a,
Enyo̩gba o̩da-wñ kpai ure̩do̩ anʼuloji n,
Ondu dʼo̩laʼka kpuche̩ru Jeko̩b,
amone̩ le̩ du la ama,
Otubeli-wñ mugulo̩ wane̩ me̩,a muda ane sida koji-wñ.
Todule̩ Jihofa akʼame̩no̩la Re̩zin kwane̩ akobʼo̩,
Abo Siria ajʼolodudu, abo Filistia la ajʼolane̩
Amone̩ le̩ la rida tʼugbo e̩ne̩ kʼi gwo ma da n,
Todule̩ Jihofa la akʼIsrae̩l oji kpai otihi da,
Ogijo kpai e̩nojima chʼoji,
todu abo ku ma nʼamone̩-i mʼo̩na je̩ ñw ma la,
Todule̩ Ondu la ayo̩ ñw abokolobia-ma n,
Todu e̩wñ bibi eche agu e̩wñ jo dab una,
Lugbo o̩fu e̩do̩ Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du oñ ane̩-i jo rinyo̩,
E̩ne̩ʼka adʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ adinya, ebi la akpʼo̩ waa,
Manasa aje̩ Ifraim, Ifraim la aje̩ Manasa,
Atogwo chʼe-abo ku ma dʼo̩da ibe̩te̩ wane̩!
ku ma rʼe̩nubie̩ da bʼajo̩ o̩kpakpa te̩
Abu me̩ ñʼache o̩jo̩ kʼi awa gʼuko̩lo̩-me̩?
Chai o̩la-ma ma ahi wane̩ ef ame̩namu
Atogwo! e̩ne̩ Asiria, kʼi chʼo̩kpa uwe̩do̩-mi,
Nakpʼo̩ uche̩ rʼuche̩ amone̩ ku ma chʼame̩nayechi-i,
I muda chʼabu kʼi neku eche de̩ n,
todu i kakini:
Kalno dabu Karkemish in?
Alu kʼo̩wo̩-mi chʼojane̩ ojane̩ ode ode
alu kʼu che Samaria kpai ode-wñ
Todule̩ i awatu ka kʼe̩gba kʼOndu fʼuko̩lo̩-wñ chaka che abʼoj uwo Zayo̩n kpai abʼiJe̩rusale̩m ma, i abʼudu ñw e̩wñ kʼi dʼe̩do̩ onu Asiria kʼi agba kpai eju-wñ ki chʼeju eke.
Todu i kakini:
O̩wo̩-mi la fʼe̩wñ anana amone̩ amone̩ li
O̩kanyi aba ñw e̩ne̩ ki ane̩ dʼoli?
Todule̩ Ondu, kʼi che Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du,
Ugane̩ e-Israe̩l la akoji una,
I la akʼojima efoko-wñ kpai e-ane̩-wñ ki aro̩je̩ mi
Oñ e̩bo̩bo̩ oli efoko-wñ ade̩ ke̩e̩
Oñ i awatu iko le̩, kʼe̩bo̩bo̩ abo Israe̩l kpai abo unyi Jeko̩b ku ma fʼuma o̩wo̩ tane̩, ma ñʼadabi lo̩nʼe̩ne̩ ki gwo ma le̩ ge̩ n, ma muda alo̩no Jihofa, E̩ne̩ Kiafo̩ e-Israe̩l le̩, ochochi.
E̩bo̩bo̩-wñ, owñ chʼe̩bo̩bo̩ abo Jeko̩b le̩, adabi wa ñw O̩jo̩ Odo̩bao̩gagu.
Todu dagba amone̩-we̩, Israe̩l, dab e̩lanyi ohimini, e̩bo̩bo̩-ma kate adabiwa. Ma fʼida-wñ ñwate̩ me̩, o̩kpakpa ki de̩ ef uwñ abʼo̩ alu.
Todu Ondu, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, achʼida kʼi ñwate̩ alumeji ane̩-ile̩-i.
Todule̩, Ondu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kakini: O amone̩-mi ku me̩ dodo Zayo̩n, me̩ ki railo e̩ne̩ Asiria le̩ n, dagba i nʼo̩kpa agwo me̩, kʼi laño̩ mʼokute̩-wñ du kwane̩ abʼame̩, alu kʼabo Ijipti che le̩.
Todu i bo̩ re tak e̩do̩ e̩kpa-mi kpʼuwe̩do̩-mi akpoji ef e̩kpabie̩ e-ma.
Taku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du adʼedili kwane̩ abʼo̩ kʼi dʼalu kʼekpa abo Midian ugbo okuta O̩re̩b le̩ de̩; o̩kpa-wñ la abʼohimini ma, oñ i adʼu kwane̩ alu kʼi che Ijipti.
I awatu iko le̩ adu-wñ akwo bʼika-we̩ te̩, oli uno̩lo̩-wñ la akwo bʼuwe̩ o̩lo̩ te̩, oli uno̩lo̩ le̩ akpabie̩ rinyo̩ noj oyo-ma.
I lewa Ayat me̩;
ma tʼo̩pe̩ uwo le̩ le me̩,
Chʼomu nyate̩ kʼe̩ kwa, O o̩ma onobule̩ Galim!
Madmena chʼe̩nara,
Eñini kide̩-i i awa ru No̩b,
Go, Ondu, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du le̩
Tak i anʼebije da efoko ugbo ki jukpa,
Epaʼka apa kwʼe̩te̩ Je̩si dufu,
Tak Afu Jihofa awʼoji-wñ añmi,
Uyo̩-wñ la adʼef ailo Jihofa era.
i muda anʼo̩kpakpa akajo̩ ame̩nubie̩,
O̩kpakpa la achʼe̩wñ ujiñmi-wñ,
O̩gu abʼo̩mala ge̩ne̩,
Okuno̩ kpai ole be̩a ajo̩ alʼije̩;
O̩ma ki añmʼe̩nya achiya alʼura olijo,
Ma ache e̩wñ du e̩bie̩ne̩ abe̩k ekpʼe̩wñ bie̩
Oñ iko le̩ ili Je̩si adago chʼagaliga amone̩ ojoji ojoji; abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi atejane̩ uwñ; uña uñmi-wñ la achʼojima.

Tak i awache iko le̩ kʼOndu adʼo̩wo̩-wñ tʼo̩ onukeji kʼi fʼe̩bobo̩ amone̩-wñ la ñw o̩la-wñ, owñ chʼabo ku ma bo̩bo̩ kwʼAsiria kpai Ijipti kpai Patro̩s kpai Kush kpai Elam kpai Shainar kpai Hemat kpai ala ala ohimini abadi.
I la adʼagaliga dago tod abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
Ulie̩na Ifraim akwo bʼo̩ e̩do̩ te̩,
Ma muda awu rʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ abʼika abo Filistia ma,
Taku Jihofa adʼukpalu ohimini Ijipti
Tak ikpadala ade̩ tod abo-wñ ku ma bo̩bo̩
O̩jo̩ le̩ uwe̩ aka kakini:
Go, O̩jo̩ chʼujadu-mi;
Todule̩ ame̩ anʼuyo̩ akpa omi kwef obuga ujadu.
O̩jo̩ le̩ me̩ la aka kakini:
Keli do̩ Jihofa, todu i fʼe̩wñ ojima che me̩;
Fʼogu kpa, kwa taa, uwe̩ kʼe̩ dodo Zayo̩n le̩,
O̩la Babilo̩n kʼAizaya, o̩ma Emo̩z, li de̩.
Me̩ dʼagaliga dago oj uwo ki de̩ gbagada,
Omi onugo fʼo̩la ñwa ñw abo-mi kiafo̩,
Ekuku-wñ jʼoj uwo oj uwo
Ma kwʼoj ane̩ o̩najiji wa,
Kwa anyanyi, todu o̩jo̩ e-Jihofa me̩rʼo̩wo̩ me̩;
Todule̩ oñ o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ du gwulo̩,
e̩do̩-ma la ada kpu.
Me̩ go, o̩jo̩ e-Jihofa awa le̩,
Todu awo ojale kpai ujo̩-wñ anʼugane̩ ge̩ n;
Nabʼudu ñw abʼile̩ ugbo du kʼone̩ te̩ kade tod e̩bie̩ne̩-ma,
Nache kʼone̩ kʼi ña tʼo̩jamalia ku ma gwe̩ le,
Todule̩ oñ nuje̩ ñw efojule ki ga,
I la adab egbi ku ma dʼo̩de̩-wñ,
E̩ne̩ du ku ma li, ma adʼe̩wñ gwu nyʼu,
Ma ñʼakʼamo̩me̩kpa-ma jʼamane̩ eju-ma;
Go, omi akʼabo Me̩dia, kʼajifa ma wʼuma eju n,
O̩o̩do̩ o̩o̩do̩-ma la akʼabokolobia jʼamane̩ ku ma ge̩ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩;
Taku Babilo̩n, kʼi chʼuto̩ ojane̩ ojane̩ wewe,
One̩ ñʼadodo ef uwñ ogbegbele̩ ge̩ n
Chai ame̩la oko muda adachi o̩mo̩,
Amotinya ajʼef o̩do̩go̩-wñ akwa,
Todu Jihofa ali Jeko̩b ejumomi, i ñʼadu Israe̩l, i la ako ma jʼoj ane̩ e-ma kpo̩: oñ amilowa amanyʼuma, ma la agamʼabunyi Jeko̩b.
Tak amone̩ amone̩ ako ma wa jʼuña e-ma, oñ abunyi Israe̩l akʼabo le̩ chʼamadu-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ oj ane̩ Jihofa; ma la amʼabo ku ma mu ma le̩, oñ ama anʼo̩da abo ku ma dema mʼane̩ le̩.
Tak i awatʼo̩jo̩ ki Jihofa mʼuñmi du ñw me̩ bʼe̩do̩dudu-me̩, kpai e̩do̩ ega, kpai uko̩lo̩ adu inaina ku ma ko me̩ jʼef uwñ le̩ te̩,
kʼuwe̩ akpʼita-i rʼonu Babilo̩n oji kakini:
Jihofa la fʼo̩kpa ame̩ne̩bibi guche̩,
ku ma kʼe̩do̩fulu agwo amone̩
Ane̩-ile̩-i du jʼañmi to̩ko̩o̩;
I chaka chʼoli saiprus agwoye rʼuwe̩ oji,
Ef o̩jegu o̩gane̩ mudutu du ane̩ ile̩;
Abo le̩ chaka adohi
Ma mʼeñwo̩-we̩ du gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩jegu,
Gʼab e̩ ñwa kwʼefojale wane̩,
Kʼuwe̩ la ka ef e̩do̩-we̩ kakini,
nate̩gu tʼatate̩ ñw akpa akpa ki gbo̩gba,
Ma muda dʼuwe̩ gwo̩ru nyʼefo̩jegu me̩,
Abo ku ma li uwe̩ akejurʼe̩,
kʼi je̩ ñw ile̩-i rida mud aje̩tachi?
Amonu abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du dachi uña ojima,
Ma muda mʼuwe̩ du rikpolo tinyo̩ bʼojinoji-we̩ te̩,
Ma adʼuwe̩ ji manyʼuma n,
Me̩ fʼo̩na uku ñwo̩che te̩ ñw amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩
Nakwane̩ tʼuma o̩la, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka-i, nakʼodu eko̩ kpai e̩bo̩bo̩ one̩ kpai o̩ma kpai aaju da bi Babilo̩n te̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Oñ unachʼo kʼi mud unyi itodobi, kpai ite̩ ugbo oduda, uchile̩che̩ la chʼo̩wo̩ kʼu nadu gba rinyo̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du go̩ me̩, i kakini;
ka kʼu nagu e̩ne̩ Asiria le̩ che̩ oj ane̩-mi,
Ibe kʼu ñwate̩
Todu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du fʼe-le̩ mute̩ ef e̩do̩-wñ,
O̩do̩ kʼonu Ehaz leku o̩la-i lewa, kakini:
O Filistia, o̩chaka-me̩, me̩ ki gwoye
O̩mo̩gba e̩nubie̩ la ajʼuje̩wñ,
Kpogu, O alaku; ewo le̩ ki kwa taa;
Abʼone̩ adohi ñw amonuche̩ abo uche̩ichi ta?
O̩la Moab de̩.
Ma nyi Bayit kpai Dibo̩n,
ma kʼe̩gbanukpo lago de ajʼej o̩na-ma;
He̩shbo̩n kpai Eleale la akpogu,
E̩do̩-mi akwa todu Moab;
todu omi Nimrim
Todule̩ e̩wñ ku ma yajo̩ e̩kute̩
Todu ogu ku ma kpa le̩,
Todu omi Dimon che̩ko̩ ñw e̩bie̩;
Me̩ kʼamo̩mala e̩ne̩ ki nʼane̩ kpuche̩,
Todu abu ki ade̩ de̩ kakini;
Me̩ tohi,
e̩ ki je̩ ñw abo-mi ku ma ne ma bʼunyi te̩ le̩
Taku ma adʼedeʼka lonyane̩ ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩
Awa gbʼinabali eke ku Moab ake, i ake tabale;
Todule̩ Moab akpogu todu Moab,
Todu ane̩ uche̩ He̩shbo̩n ache ki ku,
Todule̩ omi anʼaku e-Jeza araku
Ma la mʼe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ ko me̩,
Todule̩ efu-mi ako̩la dab umolo todu Moab,
Tak i awatu, e̩gba ku Moab dʼo̩la-wñ wa te̩, e̩gba kʼuhia fʼu hia oj otete le̩, kʼi lewʼuña-wñ kiafo̩ kʼi cha-duwa, i anʼoji ñw u n.
O̩la Moab ki Jihofa ka igbelegbele le̩ de̩.

Jihofa muda aka aba-jo̩-i kakini, Gbogbo tak o̩do̩ me̩ta ki jo̩, o̩do̩-wñ dab o̩do̩ e̩nuko̩lo̩ ku ma rʼo̩me̩ ñw u, ojima Moab amud e̩wñ e̩de̩te̩, manyʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ ki tabale le̩, e̩bo̩bo̩-ma la ade̩ re̩e, i awʼone̩ eju n.
O̩la Damaskus de̩.
Ma hi ewo ewo Aro̩e̩r tinyo̩ me̩;
Ifraim ñʼanʼaku ge̩ n,
Oñ i awatu iko le̩
I la adab e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ ki akpʼo̩ka akpʼo̩ka-wñ
E̩fiye̩-wñ muda abo̩ ef uwñ,
Iko kʼa ka-i amone̩ adʼeju go Acho̩na-ma, E̩ne̩ Kiafo̩ e-Israe̩l le̩ la awʼuma eju;
ma ñʼago ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku ma nʼo̩wo̩-ma chʼuko̩lo̩-wñ ge̩ n; ma ñʼanyi e̩wñ ku ma nʼo̩mo̩-wo̩ e-ma che eti ge̩ n, dagba i chaka chʼAshe̩rim, dagba i chʼojibʼolu.
O̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i ewo ewo-ma ki gbiti adab efoko ugbo ku ma hiʼu tinyo̩ kpai oj uwo uwo, owñ chʼe-ku ma hiu tinyo̩ bʼeju amo̩ma Israe̩l te̩, tak i adʼalache̩ te̩.
Todu uwe̩ gbenyo̩ O̩jo̩ e-ujadu-we̩ me̩,
O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ du gbe̩ e̩ fʼala-wñ ne nyo̩nyo̩,
Aya, ekuku amone̩ wewe-i,
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi afule dab eruru omi ki wewe,
E̩gba ane̩, go, i chʼokpo echʼone̩ ofe!
Atogwo! ane̩ ugbo kʼika ika agwu
kʼi akpʼamonuche̩-wñ le ej ohimini,
Ame̩ ku me̩ dodo ile̩-i chaka,
Todu abu ki Jihofa ka ñw mi de̩, kakini:
Todu o̩gba taku ma kpʼe̩wñ oko, e̩gba kʼikoko-wñ muña rinyo̩,
Ma atʼuma no̩ jo̩ ñw ame̩we̩
Iko le̩ ma anʼe̩wñ ele wa ñw Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du
O̩la Ijipti de̩.
Tak u nakʼo̩wo̩ nyʼabo Ijipti efu ku ma kobʼabo Ijipti,
une̩do̩ Ijipti la adafo alumeji-wñ;
Oñ nakʼabo Ijipti nyʼodu o̩lachi o̩wo̩;
Omi Naye̩l le̩ la aña,
tak aji aji-wñ alu;
Oko ije̩ o̩la Naye̩l
Amekwuji adinaku,
Anyo̩ la amʼabo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ owu line̩n eta,
Ma la agu ugbogaga-wñ che̩ ye̩ge̩-ye̩ge̩,
Amagboji Zoan chʼame̩nidada ogbolo;
Mak ugbo amanibe-we̩ jo̩ ta?
Amagboji Zoan mud ame̩nidada,
Jihofa la fʼafu ochuchu danyʼalumeji-wñ;
Uko̩lo̩ du la ade̩ tod Ijipti
O̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i abo Ijipti adab abobule̩, o̩la-ma agagogodo, ma achokpo tod o̩wo̩ Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ki amiejo, owñ chʼe-kʼi amiejo lʼuma oji le̩.
Tak ane̩ Juda amud e̩wñ ubailo ñw abo Ijipti; e̩ne̩ du ku ma hialu mʼe̩wñ Ijipti ugbo-wñ arailo, todu e̩wñ ki Jihofa ñwa, owñ chʼe-kʼi ñwa nyʼu.
O̩jo̩ le̩ ewo me̩lu ku ma kʼichi Kenan ajʼojane̩ Ijipti, ku ma ago̩ ñw Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du. Odu oka-wñ ako̩ Ewo Ulenyo̩.
O̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa adago alumeji ane̩ Ijipti, kpai e̩wñ ku ma gwanyidago waala ñw Jihofa alo̩me̩-wñ.
I adago o̩mo̩ kʼi chʼujiwe kpʼe̩wñ ibenu ñw Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ane̩ Ijipti; todu ama akwado̩ Jihofa noji abo ku ma te̩ ma mane̩, tak i adʼE̩najadu kpuche̩ rʼuma, kpai E̩nagbiti, tak owñ agba ma.
Taku Jihofa aje̩ ñw abo ijipti ki fʼowñ ma, oñ abo Ijipti la ama Jihofa o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i; ochochi, ma anʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ kpai e̩wñ ele wa adojikane̩ ñw u, ma la adoji ñw Jihofa, taku ma ache.
Jihofa la agwo Ijipti, egwo i agwʼo, tak i akpʼagbe-wñ. Ma la adabi wa ñw Jihofa, oñ i anetirʼo̩ko̩ ku ma gbabʼo̩, tak i achʼo̩ga-ma kpa.
O̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i ikpadala ate̩ akwʼ Ijipti nyi Asiria, oñ e̩ne̩ Asiria awʼIjipti, oñ e̩ne̩ Ijipti anyʼAsiria, tak abo ijipti kpai abo Asiria adojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ugbokate.
O̩jo̩ le̩ Israe̩l achʼe̩ne̩ke̩ta manyʼIjipti kpai Asiria, e̩nyo̩ ki kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ ki atʼalumeji ane̩-ile̩-i ma ache,
todabu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du de̩nyo̩ ñw ma kakini, E̩nyo̩ ki chʼe-Ijipti abo-mi, kpai e-Asiria uko̩lo̩ kʼo̩wo̩-mi che le̩, kpai Israe̩l e̩wñ ogu-mi.
O̩do̩ ku Tartan lewa Ashdo̩d, owñ chʼe̩gba ki Sargo̩n, onu Asiria kpʼo̩ uche̩ wa, kʼi la kʼogu bʼAshdo̩d kʼi la fʼu du,
iko e-le̩ Jihofa ko̩la lʼalu Aizaya o̩ma Emo̩z, kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ mʼe̩gbanukpo le̩ tu bʼago-we̩ te̩, kʼe̩ la mʼe̩da gwo̩ bʼe̩re̩-we̩ te̩. Oñ i fʼabe̩le̩ che, i tʼago ofo kpai e̩re̩ ofo alule̩.
Taki Jihofa kakini, Alu kʼadu-mi Aizaya-i tʼale ago ofo kpai e̩re̩ ofo o̩do̩ me̩ta kʼi chʼujiwe kpai e̩wñ awuwu ugbo o̩la Iiipti kpai o̩la Itiopia le̩,
abe̩le̩ oñ onu Asiria akʼame̩namu Ijipti alo, manyʼabo Itiopia ku ma ne bʼane̩-ma te̩, tʼimo̩to̩, tʼogijo, ago ofo kpai e̩re̩ ofo, ofe-ma la ate̩ ofo, ki mud anyo̩ ñw abo Ijipti.
E̩do̩-ma la ada kpu, ibe-ma la adajugu nyʼomune̩, noji Itiopia ku ma kibeno le̩, kpʼe-Ijipti ki chʼalifia-ma.
Tak abo ku ma dodo ane̩ o̩lʼomi-i aka o̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, Go, abu kʼukibeno-wa de̩ owñ chʼugbo kʼa ra nyi ku ma te̩ko wa, ku ma gba wa bʼo̩wo̩ onu Asiria te̩! Ab awa ale kʼa amufu tane̩?
O̩la aje̩tachi o̩lʼohimini abadi le̩ de̩.
Ma dʼane̩ ego ki gbiti ka ñw mi;
Todule̩ ago-mi awo̩ mi;
E̩do̩-mi tʼugbo kate n, ailo fʼumi mu;
Ma fʼitebulu ñwo̩che,
Todu abu kʼOndu ka ñw mi de̩ kakini:
I fʼo̩ko̩ ogu li, amanʼanya ku ma kpe̩re̩ ejeji,
Tak i kwa dab idu kakini:
E̩ la go, o̩kogu kʼone̩ che̩ko̩-wñ awa-i,
O o̩ma-mi kʼu fʼugwu kʼu fʼu fe̩ dab o̩ka,
O̩la Duma le̩ de̩.
Adide le̩ kakini:
O̩la Arabia le̩ de̩.
Me̩ chʼomiofo wa ñw e̩ne̩ kʼalugbe̩ akpʼo̩ le̩,
Todu ma ra bʼo̩kwo̩chageli te̩,
Todu abu kʼOndu ka ñw mi de̩ kakini, Gbogbo tak o̩do̩ ki da, alu kʼo̩do̩ e̩ne̩ ki achʼuko̩lo̩ ku ma rʼo̩me̩ ñw u de̩, ojima Kedar chaka atakpa rʼane̩;
oñ aluka e̩bo̩bo̩ amato̩fa, owñ chʼamagbiti ef amo̩ma Kedar, abo̩ ree; todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l ka me̩.
O̩la O̩go̩ Ane̩ Ego de̩.
O, uwe̩ kʼe̩ che̩ko̩ ñw ogu ekpa,
Amagboji-we̩ chaka ra e̩gbaʼkate,
Todule̩ u kakini,
Todu Ondu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du chenʼo̩jo̩ uchobi
Elam la ne̩ ahiagba-wñ
Oñ i lewatu kʼo̩go̩ o̩go̩-we̩ ki nyʼuwe̩ eju tule che̩ko̩ ñw o̩kogu,
Tak i mʼukpo uro̩na Juda ko.
tak ame̩ li kak ugbo ku ma gu aku ewo Defid du, chewewe, ame̩ fʼomi e̩dagu omi o̩gane̩ le̩ do̩wajʼugbokate,
taku me̩ fʼunyi unyi Je̩rusale̩m kaluka, oñ me̩ fʼunyi-wñ gulo̩ ku me̩ ne̩ fʼaku-wñ ñwo̩che tod ogu.
Me̩ ño̩ fʼobuga gwa agbagba o̩do̩ meji le̩ tod e̩dagu omi igbele le̩. Me̩ muda go e̩ne̩ ki che e̩wñ-i n, me̩ la diba ñw e̩ne̩ ki fʼe̩wñ le̩ ñwa e̩i e̩do̩-wñ igbelegbele n.
O̩jo̩ le̩ Ondu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du,
e̩ la go, i mud uyo̩ kpai e̩do̩ e̩bo̩
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du dʼo̩la-wñ tejugede ef eti-mi kakini:
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka le̩ de̩ kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ nyʼugbo adi-gede-i, owñ che She̩bna, kʼunyi le̩ dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ, kʼe̩ kakini,
E̩wñ uwe̩ ache emi? E̩ne̩ uwe̩ la ne̩ emi kʼe̩ fʼoji gwa ñw o̩la-we̩ emi ta? Oji i agwa ñw o̩la-wñ ate̩-i, okuta i ada kʼi dʼu chʼunyi ñw o̩la-wñ.
Go, Jihofa adʼe̩ ro̩ fuu tinyo̩, uwe̩ agbiti. Ochochi, i agwo̩nyʼuwe̩ gaga,
i la akʼe̩wñ wenyu wenyu ño̩ wenyʼuwe̩ chuu, oñ i dʼuwe̩ rikpolo kʼe̩ li gbigbili tʼane̩ ki nabe̩; o̩mo̩ uwe̩ aku, oñ o̩mo̩ o̩kogu ojima-we̩ ajo̩, uwe̩ kʼe̩ chʼachi unyi odu-we̩ ukata.
Omi la akʼuwe̩ e̩che̩ bʼugugu uko̩lo̩-we̩ te̩, taku ma afʼuwe̩ wane̩ bʼudago-we̩ te̩.
Tak i awatu o̩jo̩ le̩, kʼomi ado̩ adu-mi E̩layakim, o̩ma Hilkaya wa,
oñ nadʼafe̩-we̩ tʼo̩ o̩la, kʼu ñʼadʼe̩wñ ago-we̩ jiʼu iñmi, tak u nadʼo̩da-we̩ tef o̩wo̩-wñ; owñ la achʼata ñw abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m kpai abunyi Juda.
U la adʼo̩migede unyi Defid nʼika-wñ; owñ abi, e̩ne̩ du la are n; owñ are, oñ e̩ne̩ du la abi n.
Oñ nadʼu kamo̩ dab ale ugbo ki de̩ kpaka, tak owñ amud ede ojima ñw abunyi ata-wñ.
Ma la adʼojima abunyi ata-wñ chaka lo̩ko̩li o̩la-wñ, ugbe̩ kpai ato̩, e̩wñ eku kekele du, akwʼago omi gbogbo tʼugege chaka.
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kakini, O̩jo̩ le̩, ale ku ma du kamʼugbo ki de̩ kpaka le̩ achi wane̩; ma la ada, tak i alo̩ wane̩; oñ adu ki lo̩ko̩li o̩la-wñ ako̩da rinyo̩, todu Jihofa ka me̩.
O̩la Taya de̩.
Chechi, ame̩ ku me̩ dodo o̩lʼomi,
Oñ ejʼomi ki nana le̩;
Anyo̩ ki mʼe̩, O Saido̩n, todu ohi mini le̩,
E̩gba ku ma dʼinabali-wñ wa Ijipti,
Me̩ mudaba nyi Tarshish ke,
Ewo uyo̩-me̩ de̩-i,
E̩ne̩ ñwʼibe-i nyu Taya taa?
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du fʼibe-i ñwa,
E̩ nawobi bʼane̩-we̩ ma alu ku Naye̩l ache le̩,
I fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala bʼoj ohimini abadi ma,
Oñ i kakini:

Me̩ go, ane̩ abo Kaldia! Abo-i te̩te̩do̩mo̩ n; e̩ne̩ Asiria le̩ fʼu che te̩ tod abo ku ma dodo aje̩tachi. Ma mʼodo̩go̩-ma ko dago jo̩, ma fʼunyi unyi ojima-wñ kpo̩fo̩ rinyo̩, ma mʼu du chʼalache̩ te̩.
Kwa, ame̩ o̩ko̩ Tarshish,
Oñ i awatu, iko le̩ ma agbenyo̩ Taya gbogbo nyʼo̩do̩ e̩te̩gwa, alu kʼo̩kpanachi onuʼka de̩. O̩do̩ e̩te̩gwa le̩ muda i ade̩ ñw Taya dab alu kʼeli ajo̩ko̩ ka:
Mʼumolo du,
Oñ i awatu abu kʼo̩do̩ e̩te̩gwa le̩ jo̩ taku Jihofa awa fejudo Taya, tak onobule̩ le̩ adabi tʼef o̩la-wñ eduta le̩, i la ajo̩ko̩ bʼojane̩ ojane̩ du ki jʼoj ane̩ ile̩-i.

Oñ e̩wñ aja-wñ kpai uro̩me̩ o̩ko̩ eje̩-wñ kʼi agba amud e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-Jihofa; ma ako ne jo̩ n, ai ako maja n, todu ane̩ aja-wñ achʼutod abo ku ma gugu o̩gba Jihofa, kʼama ki je̩ kʼefu, kʼama ki ño̩ nʼukpo ki akwojolugbo.
Go, Jihofa ache kʼane̩ ki chʼakpokpo te̩, i ache kʼi dʼalache̩,
Oñ alu kʼi ade̩ de̩, alu ki de̩ ugbo amone̩, alu le̩ i ñʼade̩ ugbo amatama ge̩;
Ane̩-i ate̩ ofo hioko, i adʼalache̩ te̩ hiele;
Ane̩-i adaido̩, i la agbo rinyo̩,
Ane̩-i ño̩ chʼe̩daji
Todule̩ oñ ama ku ma na le̩ mʼane̩-i ko mi,
Omi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ adaido̩,
Iya eicha awe me̩,
Ma anʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma añmo̩ akeli n;
Ewo ki chʼachigodo le̩ mugulo̩ me̩,
Aku ero̩ jʼejo̩na-wñ tod omi achiwebe̩te̩ma;
Ewo le̩ chʼalache̩ te̩,
Todu ab i ade̩ alumeji ane̩-i
Abo-i achʼomu-ma nyʼate̩, ma akeli uyo̩;
Todule̩, me̩ nadʼojima ñw Jihofa o̩wo̩ olodudu;
A gbo̩ abu ku ma jʼukpoji ile̩ akʼeli dʼO̩jo̩ kakini,
Ailo kpai o̩fe̩ kpai oku abʼuwe̩ ma me̩,
Oñ i awatu kʼe̩ne̩ ki ara bʼekuku ailo le̩ te̩
Ile̩-i mukpo̩fo̩ kpa,
Ile̩-i tʼaro̩ko̩ibu dab e̩ne̩ kʼo̩te̩ mu,
I la awatu o̩jo̩ le̩, ku Jihofa abʼudu
Ma la akʼama wajo̩
Tak eju ochu aku e̩bo̩no̩,
O, Jihofa, uwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩-mi;
Todu uwe̩ mʼewo du chʼugbudu,
Todule̩ amone̩ ku ma chʼamagbiti abumʼuwe̩;
Todu uwe̩ te̩tachʼaku ñw e̩nubie̩,
alu kʼane̩ e̩gbe̩ akpa nyʼane̩ o̩la.

Taku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du anʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ hi uje̩wñ uyo̩ ñw amone̩ du oj uwo-i, uje̩wñ o̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ki bie̩ nyu, kpʼe-e̩wñ oyo kʼo̩ko̩to̩ chʼe̩kefu-wñ, e-o̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ki bie̩ nyu ku ma fʼu ta jalii.
Tak i akʼe̩wñ ki bʼeju amone̩ du ma mi oj uwo-i, kpai ukpo ubojima kʼi chenadala bʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du ma.
I adʼuku mi pioo; oñ Ondu Jihofa ali omi aku bʼeju du te̩, i la akʼina ku ma bʼabo-wñ bʼile̩-i te̩; todu Jihofa ka me̩.
Ma la aka o̩jo̩ le̩ kakini, Go, O̩jo̩-wa de̩-i; a tetanede owñ, i la ajadu wa; Jihofa de̩-i; a te̩tanede owñ, e̩do̩-wa ki bo̩, kʼa la gwoguyo̩ ef ujadu-wñ.
Todu o̩wo̩ Jihofa añmi oj uwo kide̩, ma la ate̩ Moab mane̩ uña-wñ, alu ku ma tʼegbe nyʼe̩pio̩ o̩la ugbudu echu ame̩wño̩re̩.
I anʼo̩wo̩-wñ dala alumeji-wñ alu kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi agwʼomi anʼo̩wo̩ dala kʼi gwʼomi; Jihofa muda ahi eke-wñ wane̩ manyʼo̩wo̩-wñ ki aya uko̩lo̩ le̩.
I agu aku-we̩ ki gbo̩gba le̩ lo̩ wane̩, i adʼu dachʼane̩, i arʼo̩ nʼane̩pe̩te̩, owñ chʼef ebutu.
O̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i taku ma akʼeli-i ane̩ Juda kakini:
Me̩ mʼalaku-wñ bi,
E̩ne̩ kʼibe-wñ kʼi akpe̩ che̩konʼuwe̩,
Ame̩ ki nake̩do̩no Jihofa gbogbo alo pioo,
Todu i fʼabo ku ma gugu atate̩ le̩ hi wane̩,
E̩re̩ atʼo̩ mʼane̩,
O̩na e̩no̩kpakpa de̩ te̩e̩le̩;
Jihofa, awa te̩tejʼej o̩na ugbo kʼuwe̩ akpʼoji o̩la anede we̩; odu-we̩ kpai urewa-we̩
Eju-we̩ anʼonugo-mi odu;
Dagba ma chaka lʼe̩ne̩bibi eju
Jihofa, o̩wo̩-we̩ chʼe̩chi nyʼate̩,
Jihofa, uwe̩ adʼure̩do̩ te̩ ñw a,
O Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa,
Abo uku ma che, ma ñʼadeju n;
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi-i wewe nyo̩gba, O Jihofa,
Jihofa, ef o̩pe̩cha ma kwotejane̩ we̩,
Dabalu kʼonobule̩ ki defu,
a defu, a tʼagbalagbala ef iwo̩-wa,
Abo-we̩ ki ku adeju, oku abo-mi akwane̩.
Lewa, abo-mi, me̩ mugudu tef unyi-me̩,
Todu go, Jihofa akwʼuña-wñ dufu
O̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i Jihofa anʼo̩kwo̩chageli-wñ lile ki ale̩ ki ño̩ nʼukpahiu abʼudu ñw Lifayatan ejo ki ara le̩, kpai Lifayatan ejo ki afa no̩ko̩ no̩ko̩, i la akpa drago̩n ki dʼef ohimini abadi ge̩.
O̩jo̩ le̩:
Omi, Jihofa, chʼe̩ne̩ ki adejutʼo̩;
U nʼuke̩do̩fulu n.
Cho̩kpo̩ni owñ ki nado̩wo̩ dʼukpahiu-mi,
Jeko̩b afʼili nyʼane̩ ej o̩gba,
I fʼu gwo alu kʼi gwo abo ku ma gwo owñ?
Eno kʼe̩ no ma, chʼekobʼuma kʼe̩ kobʼuma;
Todule̩ lugbo e̩wñ-i oñ e̩wñ abʼudu ku Jeko̩b fe̩ ma,
Todu ewo ki nʼaku le̩ kate dago e-wñ,
E̩gba kʼe̩to̩-wñ gbe̩ ma anya rinyo̩;
I la awatu iko le̩ ki Jihofa agwu e̩wñ e̩yo̩ akwo uwobi ohimini Yufretis gbogbo wa aji Ijipti; i are e̩fiye̩-me̩ okoke, ame̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l.

Oñ i awatu iko le̩ kʼama afa o̩kakachi lile, tak abo ku ma jo̩ alenyo̩ oj ane̩ Asiria kpai abo ku ma ne bʼane̩-ma te̩ ku ma jo̩ ane̩ Ijipti awa ku ma dojikane̩ ñw Jihofa oj uwo kiafo̩ Je̩rusale̩m le̩.
Atogwo ñw ike̩be̩ uba e-amañmo̩te̩ Ifraim,
Go, Ondu chenʼagbiti ki nʼukpahiu;
Ma anʼe̩re̩ fʼike̩be̩ uba amañmo̩te̩
oñ ododo alifia ki achʼuto̩ ki akwacha le̩
Iko le̩ Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du amud ike̩be̩ ki achʼuto̩ eju,
i ñʼamud afu ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka ñw e̩ne̩ ki gugu akajo̩,
Abo-i ño̩ jʼaro̩kpibu ñw o̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ge̩
Todu oj itebulu du che̩ko̩ ñw ire̩ kpai iwa,
E̩ne̩ i akʼo̩ e̩wñ ema?
Todu i chʼe̩wñ ekʼone̩, e̩wñ e̩kʼone̩,
O̩da! Jihofa muda anʼamone̩ kʼuko-ma chʼaduña
I ka ñw ma kakini,
Todule̩ oñ o̩la Jihofa achʼe̩wñ eko̩ ma, e̩wñ eko̩ ma,
Todule̩ me̩ nagbʼo̩la Jihofa, ame̩ amache̩de̩te̩ e̩wñ,
Todu me̩ kakini, A fʼalo kpe̩ kpʼuku me̩,
todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini,
Oñ naje̩ kʼajo̩ o̩kpakpa ki chʼe̩re̩-wñ ku ma fa,
Tak alo kʼame̩ kpe̩ kpʼuku le̩ abie̩,
E̩gba du kʼi alale i amu me̩;
Todu ujiji ate̩-wñ nyarʼone̩ enʼe̩re̩ dala,
Todu Jihofa akwane̩ dab ugbo uwo Pe̩razim,
Todule̩ me̩ ki ño̩ chʼabo ku ma che̩de̩te̩ ge̩ n,
Me̩ neti, ku me̩ gbʼomu-mi;
E̩be̩ eko̩ ño̩ ko̩ i nʼe̩wñ egbe̩ nyʼu n?
E̩gba kʼi fʼane̩-wñ rʼe̩ru,
Todu O̩jo̩-wñ akʼo̩ tʼo̩kpakpa,
Ma gwu igogo ef agu dab o̩ka n
Eno̩ ma no̩ e̩wñ e̩yo̩ tod uje̩wñ;
E̩wñ-i laño̩ kwʼugbo Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ge̩,
Atogwo ñw Arie̩l, Arie̩l,ewo ugbo ki Defid ru le̩!
U muda adʼo̩bata ñw Arie̩l ta,
Oñ omi arʼuru ogu nyʼuwe̩ daka,
Ma la ahi uwe̩ wane̩, ef ane̩pe̩te̩ oñ uwe̩ ade̩ ako̩la,
Ama o̩wo̩ abo̩wo̩ ejaduña-we̩ adab ebutu ki akwu,
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du,
Tak o̩wo̩ abo uche̩ichi du ku ma kʼogu bʼArie̩l,
Ma la adab e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ kʼebi akpʼo̩ kʼi nʼo̩na ka kʼi nʼe̩wñ aje̩
Me̩ jo̩ ku me̩ yaye-wñ,
Todu Jihofa mʼafu olu lile du danyʼume̩ oji,

Ane̩ du ku ma go le̩ la dab o̩la ku ma ko̩ nyʼef ubuku ku ma fʼu hiuko̩ te̩. E̩gba ku ma dʼu tunyʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ ki ma o̩kalatu eche, kakini, A agbokobʼe̩ kʼe̩ chʼo̩kalatu ñw a. Tak i adohi kakini, U neke che n, todu ma fʼu hiuko̩.
Taku ma dʼubuku le̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki ma ko̩che̩ n, kakini, A agbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ chʼo̩kalatu ñw a. Tak i adoln kakini, U neke che n, todu u ko̩che̩ o̩takada n.
Oñ Ondu kakini:
todule̩, go, nañʼachʼe̩wñ awuwu ef amone̩-i,
Atogwo ñw abo ku ma maja ejefu ejefu bi Jihofa, kʼi chʼe̩no̩hiala ki adʼibe ñw ma te̩,
Me̩ rʼe̩wñ da bʼane̩ ma!
Iko-wñ bo̩ re
Tak o̩jo̩ le̩ amajeti agbʼo̩la
Ame̩ne̩chikimi lañʼanʼuyo̩ nana nyʼo̩gba efu Jihofa ge̩,
Todu ma mʼe̩nubailo le̩ du chʼofofo, e̩ne̩ ki ache̩de̩te̩ le̩ atakpa,
ku ma kpʼone̩ abi tod o̩la ki fʼo̩ alu,
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ki gba Ebraham aka ugbo abo unyi Jeko̩b de̩, kakini:
Ama e̩gba kʼi fʼamo̩ma-wñ,
Abo ku ma la ef afu-ma ge̩, ama le̩ ñʼawʼugbo oji e̩wñ ema,
Atogwo ñw amo̩ma agbo̩go̩, Jihofa ka-i,
ma kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩ ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼIjipti,
Todule̩ oñ aku Fero achʼanyo̩-me̩,
Todu amagboji-wñ jo̩ Zoan,
anyo̩ amʼuma chaka
O̩la ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩ de̩.
Todu Ijipti ate̩ko echichi ofofo, i la anʼoji du n,
Lo fai ke, kʼe̩ fʼu ko̩ nyʼalo eju-ma,
Todu ama agbʼe̩nyo̩ n,
ku ma ka ñw amagane̩ kakini, Me̩ ki gane̩ n;
me̩ kwo bʼo̩na te̩, muna bʼo̩na-wñ te̩,
Todule̩ abu kʼE̩ne̩ Kiafo̩ e-Israe̩l aka de̩ kakini,
todule̩ udu ku me̩ fe̩-i
i la adʼu kpo̩fo̩ alu ku ma kpʼucha abucha fo̩
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa ki chʼE̩ne̩ Kiafo̩ e-Israe̩l ka de̩ kakini,
me̩ muda kakini,
E̩ne̩ʼka agwo̩ko̩ uja rʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, ma la ara,
Todule̩ oñ Jihofa do̩mo̩ anede me̩ todu kʼi li me̩ eju; todule̩ oñ i hi o̩la-wñ ne todu kʼi li me̩ ejumomi.
Todu amone̩-i adodo Zayo̩n, Je̩rusale̩m; uwe̩ ñʼaraku ge̩ n; omu ukwa-we̩ kʼi agbo̩ i aliʼuwe̩ eju chuu; i gbo̩ i adohi ñw e̩.
Dagba Ondu ki kʼuje̩wñ o̩pe̩cha ñw me̩, kʼi la dʼomi ki akpa me̩ ma ñw me̩ ñmo̩, e̩ne̩ ki ako̩ we̩ e̩wñ le̩ muda amaja ge̩ n, eju-we̩ la ado e̩ne̩ ki akʼuwe̩ e̩wñ le̩.
E̩gba ku me̩ natʼawo̩to̩ kpʼe̩gba ku me̩ natʼawohi eti-we̩ la agbʼuko̩laʼka ubi-we̩ kakini, O̩na de̩-i, me̩ lʼe-i.
Tak ame̩ afʼojibo-me̩ ku me̩ gbe̩ ku ma kʼajifa wenyʼu le̩, kpʼojibo-me̩ ku me̩ da ku ma kʼo̩jamalia wenyʼu daji. Uwe̩ akʼe̩wñ le̩ rinyo̩ dab e̩wñ elifo̩; uwe̩ aka ñw u kakini, Kwʼemi!

Tak i aje̩ ñw omi lo̩ tod ulu e̩wñ kʼe̩ gbe̩, owñ chʼe-kʼuwe̩ agbe̩ ane̩ le̩, kpai uje̩wñ kʼane̩ le̩ akʼo dufu. I la achʼuje̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩, i la achʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩. O̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i, ame̩wñukpa-we̩ ajʼoko lile ajije̩;
amo̩kokuno̩ kpʼamo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ku ma lʼuche̩ ane̩ ajʼije̩ ku ma bʼomu ru, e-ku ma nʼuko̩che̩ kpʼo̩da fe̩.
Tak aji kpʼo̩cha omi ajʼoj uwo ki gbo̩gba du kpai oj otete ki nana, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ ku ma kpʼone̩ wewe le̩, e̩gba kʼo̩do̩go̩ o̩do̩go̩ awane̩.
Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, ugane̩ ochu adab ugane̩ o̩lu. Oñ ugane̩ olu adab e-eñini onu mebie, dabe̩ne̩ kʼugane̩ o̩jo̩ mebie, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ ki Jihofa aji ugbo ki awo̩ abo-wñ, kʼi akpa agbe ugbo kʼi gwo ma le̩.
Go, odu Jihofa akwʼo̩najiji wa,
afu ki akwef iñmo̩-wñ dab aji ki awobi
Ame̩ anʼeli ako̩, alu kumane̩ odu e̩gba ku me̩ jo̩ ajʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ kiafo̩; kpai e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ dab e̩gba kʼone̩ anʼufele ake̩re̩ nyʼule̩ ale tʼoj uwo Jihofa, ugbo Okuta Israe̩l le̩.
Jihofa la aje̩ ñw ma gbʼomu e-e̩gahi-wñ le̩, i la adʼo̩wo̩-wñ ki acho̩ko̩ wane̩ ef uwe̩do̩ kpʼo̩go̩ una ki alie̩ e̩wñ, manyʼomi ki alo̩ akiliwo, kpʼafu ibi, kpʼokuto̩mo̩jo̩cha ñe̩ña.
Todu omu Jihofa aje̩ ñw e̩do̩ e̩ne̩ Asiria le̩ ki muda kpu, e̩gba kʼi anʼokute̩-wñ gwʼo.
Oñ ewane̩ o̩kpa-wñ okoke du ku ma bu ñw u, e-ki Jihofa agwʼo le̩, anʼuko̩la eicha kpʼumolo manyu. Oñ e̩gba ku ma mʼogu kode, i anʼo̩wo̩-wñ che bububu aja kpʼama.
Todu ma fu Tofe̩t
Atogwo ñw abo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼIjipti atene ate̩ko
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ owñ ño̩ chʼanibe ge̩,
Abo Ijipti le̩, one̩ ma che, ma chʼO̩jo̩ n;
Todu abu ki Jihofa ka ñw mi de̩ kakini,
Alu kʼame̩we̩ jʼada, alu le̩ oñ Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du
Me̩ mudabi abʼe̩ne̩ ku me̩ na ubi bʼo̩ te̩ bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩ le̩, ame̩, abo Israe̩l.
Todu o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ akʼode-wñ ki chʼajifa, kpʼode-wñ ki chʼo̩jamalia ro̩ rinyo̩, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ nʼo̩wo̩-me̩ onugo che ñw o̩la-me̩ ki mud adure ñw me̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ Asiria le̩ awane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli, i la chʼe-one̩ n;
Tak okuta kʼi lo̩nʼo le̩ alale rinyo̩ noji okpo kʼi achi,
Go, Onuʼka adejutʼane̩ wñ lo̩na o̩kpakpa,
Tak one̩ adab uña umaja bʼafu ki aju te̩,
Oñ abo ku ma gane̩ ade̩ bulubulu ge̩ n,
Tak e̩do̩ abo kuma naju amʼoji e̩wñ ema,
Ma ñʼado̩ e̩nidada kʼe̩numo̩la iko le̩ ge̩ n,
Todu e̩nidada aka e̩wñ idada-wñ,
Ane̩ uko̩lo̩ e̩nugbeju la chʼe̩bie̩ne̩;
E̩numo̩la muda añwibe e̩wñ umo̩la,
Kwane̩, ame̩ abobule̩ ku me̩ jʼañmi le̩, me̩ gbʼomu-mi;
Ame̩ abobule̩ ku me̩ ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-me̩ le̩,
Me̩ gagogogodo, ame̩ abobule̩ ku me̩ jʼañmi le̩,
Me̩ kʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩-me̩ tod uche̩ oko ku ma ñeju-wñ le̩, kpʼachiwebe̩te̩ma ki aro nana,
ikeke kpai iñwa atiga ane̩ abo-mi;
Todu ma ahi unyi ojima tinyo̩,
gbogbo taku ma dʼAfu danyʼuwa oji kwʼate̩,
E̩gbale̩ ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka adodo aje̩tachi,
Uko̩lo̩ o̩kpakpa la achʼure̩do̩,
Tak amone̩-mi agugu ef unyi ure̩do̩,
Dagba ki chʼiko kʼokuto̩mo̩jo̩cha awane̩ iko kʼefoko le̩ mulo̩ bʼane̩ ma,
Ame̩ ku me̩ kʼe̩yo̩ gbe̩ o̩la omi du, me̩ gbede,
Atogwo ñw uwe̩, kʼe̩ kpʼe̩wñ bie̩,
O Jihofa, li wa eju; a te̩tanede we̩.
Ekuku ki dab akpabana kʼamone̩ gbo̩ le̩ oñ ma ra;
ma la añʼane̩ alu kʼamide̩ añʼane̩;
Ma fu Jihofa hi ne me̩, todu i gugu atate̩;
e̩wñ kʼi achʼugbogaga e̩wñ o̩kpanachi e-we̩
Go, amo̩ga-ma jʼo̩do̩da akwa;
Ikpadala ikpadala mud oku o̩na,
Ane̩-i tʼadaido̩, i te̩ ache̩do̩dudu;
Fai tak u nakwane̩, Jihofa ka-i,
Efu-me̩ ku me̩ anyo̩ achʼigbogbo, me̩ abi ikakpunu;
Amone̩ amone̩ la adabe̩ne̩ kʼokuta sime̩ti ku ma ro̩, dabe̩ne̩ kʼikeke ku ma lo̩ wane̩,
Ame̩ ku me̩ jʼo̩najiji, me̩ gbo̩ e̩wñ kʼu che-i;
Ame̩nadure ku ma jo̩ Zayo̩n achokpo;
E̩ne̩ ki alule̩ tʼo̩kpakpa, kʼi la akʼo̩la e̩wñ o̩kpakpa;
Owñ le̩ adodo atate̩;
Eju-we̩ ali onu le̩ ef alifia-wñ;
E̩do̩-we̩ ayaye okpo:
Uwe̩ ñʼali ame̩nugbolu ge̩ n,
Go Zayo̩n, ewo ujeju ujeju-wa ku ma da le̩!
Jihofa muda adʼugbo wa o̩mo̩ ef e̩gahi-wñ,
Todu Jihofa chʼakajo̩-wa, Jihofa chʼe̩ne̩ ki adʼo̩da ñw a,
Iku iku-we̩ lo̩ me̩;
Tak e̩ne̩ du ki adodo o̩mo̩ aka kʼu nachʼo̩ga n;
Te̩wa, ame̩ abuche̩ichi uche̩ichi, ku me̩ gbo̩;
Todu abo uche̩ichi du chebi Jihofa eju me̩,
Ma ñʼako oku abo ku ma kpa ro̩ jʼo̩do̩da,
O̩wo̩ e̩wñ ojale du la ayo̩ rinyo̩,
Todu o̩kwo̩chageli-mi fʼe̩wñ ñmo̩ kefu efojale;
Jihofa nʼo̩kwo̩chageli; i che̩ko̩ ñw e̩bie̩,
Oñ ame̩fa agwo̩ru wa kpʼama,
Todu Jihofa chenʼo̩jo̩ ache̩ ena
Oñ aji aji Ido̩m amud o̩bia te̩,
Ma akpalu odu kpʼo̩ro̩ka n;
Akpaguna kpʼitodobi anʼo̩mo̩,
Ma ado̩ ame̩nojima-wñ wa ojane̩ le̩, e̩ne̩ du la adʼo̩mo̩ n;
Iñwa atiga ef unyi ojima-wñ,
Ame̩la aje̩tachi ade kpʼame̩la ala ala o̩mo̩,
O̩mo̩ okuanya achʼunyi-wñ, i la anyʼe̩ge̩,
Me̩ natejane̩ ef o̩takada Jihofa ku me̩ cho̩kalatu,
I la fʼanya ro̩ todu ma me̩,
Aje̩tachi kpʼane̩ e̩gbe̩ ayo̩,
I adikoko ololo, i agwoguyo̩,
Ame̩ ki dʼukpahiu ñw o̩wo̩ ki ma gbiti n,
Ka ñw abo ku ma chokpo kakini,
Tak eju amafeju achi,
Tak e̩ne̩ ki achika aroko dab abede,
ugbo kʼe̩lanyi abʼeju je̩ nye̩nye̩nye̩,
Ikpadala adʼano̩mo̩ kpʼo̩na,
Idu du adʼo̩mo̩ n,
Oñ abo ki Jihofa la ma tane̩
Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ku He̩ze̩kaya jʼonu taku Se̩nake̩rib, onu Asiria, lewa ako̩bʼewo ewo Juda ki nʼaku du, oñ i fʼuma du.
Tak onu Asiria le̩ fu Rabshake̩ kpe̩ akwo Lakish nyi Je̩rusale̩m ugbo onu He̩ze̩kaya, abogu-wñ chewewe. Oñ i dago ugbo o̩na kʼomi acha tef abukpe ojikpadala uche̩ ugbo ku ma gwʼukpo le̩.
Tak E̩layakim, o̩ma Hilkaya, kʼi chʼagboji abunyi onu kpai She̩bna ako̩takada kpai Joa, o̩ma Esaf, ako̩takada kʼi ako̩ inabali e̩wñ kʼi wache iko du, kwo dufu wʼugbo-wñ.
Taku Rabshake̩ ka ñw ma kakini, Me̩ ka ñw He̩ze̩kaya fa-i kakini, Abu kʼonu lile le̩, owñ chʼonu Asiria, ka de̩ kakini: E̩wñ chʼuke̩do̩no kʼe̩ ke̩do̩no ta?
kʼuwe̩ kakini, O̩la eka ofo chʼibe elo kpʼukpahiu ki bʼogu eja jo̩? E̩ne̩ e̩ ke̩do̩no kʼe̩ fʼe̩re̩ ubi ro̩ ñw mi taa?
Go, uwe̩ ake̩do̩nʼokute̩ ikpo ki guche̩-i, owñ chʼIjipti, one̩ lo̩nʼe-le̩ i agwunyʼo̩wo̩-wñ, i la agu o̩wo̩ du; abe̩le̩ Fero, onu Ijipti, de̩ ñw abo du ku ma ke̩do̩nʼowñ.

I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ ka ñw mi kakini, A ke̩do̩no Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki He̩ze̩kaya mʼotete otete kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ ko rinyo̩ le̩ n? kʼi la ka ñw abo Juda kpʼabo Je̩rusale̩m kakini, Ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku me̩ adojikane̩ o̩gba-wñ-i de̩.
Todule̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, e̩ gwinene kpʼodu-mi onu Asiria: nakʼamanya icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji ñw e̩, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ nʼone̩ ku ma meju anya ene ku ma tanʼamanya icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ meji.
Mak ab e̩ le kʼe̩ bʼagboji ogu kate kʼi nya ef amadu odu-mi-i jo̩ ta? kʼe̩ la ke̩do̩nʼIjipti tod o̩ko̩ogu kpai amanya ta!
Omi wa kʼu kobʼane̩-i kʼu fʼu kpabie̩ ubi Jihofa? Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, E̩ nyʼakobʼane̩-i kʼe̩ fʼu kpabie̩.

Tak E̩layakim kpai She̩bna kpai Joa ka ñw Rabshake̩ kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ ko̩la ñw amadu-we̩-i ichi Siria, todu a gbo̩ e-le̩; e̩ ki la ko̩la ñw a ichi amaJu n, ki we etʼeti amone̩ ku ma jʼoj o̩do̩-i.
Ama Rabshake̩ kakini, Odu-we̩ kpʼuwe̩ kate oñ odu-mi kpʼumi uche̩ ru kʼu kʼo̩la-i ñw me̩? I chʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼoj o̩do̩ i kpe̩ mi rʼu, kʼama ki je̩ echu-ma ku ma ñmo̩ itomifo-ma kpʼame̩ n?
Taku Rabshake̩ kwodago oñ i nʼomu lile akwa alichi amaJu, i kakini, Me̩ gbʼo̩la onu lile le̩, owñ chʼonu Asiria!
Abu kʼonu le̩ ka de̩ kakini: Me̩ ki je̩ ñw He̩ze̩kaya gba me̩ ibe n, todu i aneke jadu me̩ n.
Me̩ ki la je̩ ñw He̩ze̩kaya je̩ ñw me̩ ke̩do̩no Jihofa n, kʼi akakini, Jihofa agba wa chuu; ma ñʼadʼewo-i tef o̩wo̩ onu Asiria n.

Me̩ ki netiru He̩ze̩kaya n; todu abu kʼonu Asiria ka de̩ kakini: Me̩ ki fʼo̩fa kpʼo̩kpa guche̩ ñw mi ku me̩ dufu wʼugbo mi; kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki je̩ e̩ro ikeli e-wñ, kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki je̩ e̩ro o̩gbaikolo-wñ, kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ okoke ki ñmo̩ omi obuga e-wñ;
gbogbo tak u mudabiwa kʼu mʼume̩ ño̩ nyʼane̩ ki dab e-me̩-i, ane̩ ki nʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩ kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩, ane̩ uje̩wñ kpʼane̩ uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma i che.
Me̩ nago tode̩gba ku He̩ze̩kaya agba me̩ ibe, kʼi akakini, Jihofa agba wa. I nʼo̩jo̩ abo uche̩ichiʼka kʼi gbʼane̩-wñ kwef o̩wo̩ onu Asiria mama me̩?
Ugbo amo̩jo̩ Hamat kpai Arpad jo̩? Ugbo amo̩jo̩ abo Se̩farfa jo̩? Ama gba Samaria bʼef o̩wo̩-mi te̩ me̩?
E̩ne̩ dʼef amo̩jo̩ ane̩ le̩ chaka ku ma gbʼane̩-ma bʼumi o̩wo̩ te̩, taku Jihofa ñʼagba Je̩rusale̩m bʼumi o̩wo̩ te̩?
Ma muda chechi jo̩, ma la dʼohi du ñw u n, todu onu tuko̩ ñw ma kakini, Me̩ ki dʼohi ñw u n.

Tak E̩layakim, o̩ma Hilkaya, kʼi chʼagboji abunyi onu, kpai She̩bna ako̩takada, kpai Joa, o̩ma Esaf kʼi akʼo̩takada inabali iko e̩wñ, fʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma fana wʼugbo He̩ze̩kaya, oñ ma kʼo̩la Rabshake̩ le̩ ñw u.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼonu He̩ze̩kaya gbʼo̩, i fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, oñ i kʼe̩gbanukpo nyʼo̩la, tak i le tef unyi Jihofa.
I la fʼE̩layakim, kʼi chʼagboji abunyi-wñ, kpai She̩bna ako̩takada, kpʼabogijo amatama kpe̩ nyʼugbo Aizaya akache̩ kʼi chʼo̩ma Emo̩z, e̩gbanukpo dʼo̩la-ma.
Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Abu ku He̩ze̩kaya ka de̩ kakini, Eñini-i chʼo̩jo̩ o̩pe̩cha kpʼekʼone̩ o̩la, kpʼicha eka; todu iko ku ma bi amo̩ma lewa me̩, a la nʼukpaluu kʼa bi o̩ma n.

Ukani Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, gbo̩ o̩la ku Rabshake̩ ka le̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼonu Asiria, odu-wñ, kpuche̩ wa kʼi bʼO̩jo̩ ki deju ina, kʼi la anukarʼu tod o̩la e-ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, gbo̩ le̩; todule̩ e̩ nadʼaduwa-we̩ kwane̩ tod abubo̩ amone̩ ku ma bo̩-i.
Abe̩le̩ abuko̩lo̩ He̩ze̩kaya lewʼugbo Aizaya,
oñ Aizaya ka ñw ma kakini, Abu ku me̩ aka ñw odu-me̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, Jihofa kakini: E̩ ki railo uko̩la kʼe̩ gbo̩ le̩ n, owñ chʼe-kʼamadu onu Asiria ne̩ chakpabie̩ mi.
Go, nadʼafuʼka tʼowñ efu, oñ i agbʼinabaliʼka, tak i adabi tʼojane̩ e-wñ; oñ naje̩ ñw u wane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli oj ane̩ e-wñ onugo.
Abe̩le̩ Rabshake̩ mudabi, oñ i lewa ke̩re̩bʼonu Asiria abu kʼi do̩mo̩ akʼogu bo̩ Libna; todu owñ gbʼinabali ka kʼi kwo bo̩ Lakish te̩ me̩.
E̩gbale̩ i gbʼinabali Tirhaka, onu Itiopia, kakini, Owñ kwodufu wa kʼi kʼogu bʼuwe̩ me̩. Tak e̩gba kʼi gbo̩, i fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo He̩ze̩kaya kakini,
Abu ku me̩ aka ñw He̩ze̩kaya onu Juda le̩ de̩, kakini: E̩ ki je̩ kʼO̩jo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ ke̩do̩no kʼi dʼe̩ ibe kakini, Ma adu Je̩rusale̩m tʼonu Asiria o̩wo̩ n in.
Go, uwe̩ gbo̩ e̩wñ kʼamonu Asiria che ojane̩ ojane̩ du, abu ku ma ko ma jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ chaka. Oñ uwe̩ afu?
Amo̩jo̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi kʼamata-mi kpʼama fo̩ mʼuma gba? Ama che Gozan kpai Haran kpai Reze̩f kpai amo̩ma Ide̩n ku ma jo̩ Te̩lasar le̩.
Ugbo onu Hamat kpʼonu Arpad kpʼonu ewo Se̩farfa kpʼe-Hena kpʼe-Iffa jo̩?
Oñ He̩ze̩kaya mʼo̩takada gba kwʼo̩wo̩ amonuche̩ le̩, i fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che; taku He̩ze̩kaya mute̩gu nyʼef unyi Jihofa oñ i fʼu nadala te̩ o̩gba Jihofa.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya kwochaduwa ñw Jihofa kakini:
O Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, uwe̩ O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, kʼe̩ gugu ate̩ ñw amiche̩rub le̩, uwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ ojane̩ ojane̩ du ki dʼile̩, owñ chʼuwe̩ kate; uwe̩ che efojale kpai ane̩-ile̩-i.
Hi eti-we̩ wane̩, O Jihofa, kʼe̩ gbo̩; mʼeju-we̩ chi, O Jihofa, kʼe̩ li; kʼe̩ la gbo̩ o̩la ki Se̩nake̩rib-i ka du, owñ kpʼone̩ wa kʼi bʼO̩jo̩ ki deju ina.
Ochochi, Jihofa, amonu Asiria fʼojane̩ ojane̩ du chihi rinyo̩ kpai ane̩ ane̩-ma.
Ma la mʼamo̩jo̩-ma kojʼef una; todu abo le̩ chʼamo̩jo̩ oke n, chai uko̩lo̩ kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ che, oli kpʼokuta i che; todu ku ma kpʼama fo̩ le̩ de̩.
Fa-i todule̩, O Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa, gba wa bʼo̩wo̩-wñ te̩, kʼabojane̩ ojane̩ ile̩ du ki ma ka kʼuwe̩ che Jihofa, owñ chʼuwe̩ kate.
