Tak Aizaya, o̩ma Emo̩z, fʼuche̩ kpe̩ru He̩ze̩kaya kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ka de̩, kakini: Abu kʼe̩ fʼaduwa che bo Se̩nake̩rib onu Asiria ma ugbo mi,
mak o̩la ki Jihofa ka ugbo e-wñ le̩ de̩ kakini:
E̩ne̩ e̩ bʼo̩ ina kʼe̩ la chʼakpabie̩-wñ le̩ taa?
E̩ la fʼOndu bina lʼalu amadu-we̩,
U fʼura gwa,
Uwe̩ gbo̩
Todule̩ ukpahiu abo ku ma dodo o̩mo̩ nya,
Omi muda chema egugu ane̩-we̩
Todu o̩fu kʼe̩ lo̩rʼumi

E̩wñ ki la achʼujiwe-wñ ñw e̩ le̩ de̩ kakini: Me̩ aje̩ inane̩ e̩wñ e̩do̩-i, tak e-o̩do̩ ekeji achʼe-ki atiga kwef e-le̩ ge̩; taku me̩ fʼe̩wñ gbe̩ o̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta, ku me̩ la ko wʼunyi, me̩ ki la fʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma nyi kʼame̩ ki je̩ e̩ro-wñ.
Tak abubo̩ abo Juda ku ma fu tane̩ ñʼatʼili nyʼane̩, ma la aro e̩ro tʼate̩;
todu abubo̩ amone̩ akwefu Je̩rusale̩m dufu, oñ abo ku ma mufu tane̩ akwʼoj uwo Zayo̩n dufu. E̩do̩ Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du akʼe̩ e̩che̩ kʼi che.
Todule̩ o̩la onu Asiria ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini: I awʼef ewo-i n, i la atʼo̩fa nyʼo̩mo̩ n, i la anʼo̩kpatabeli wʼo̩do̩da alaku-wñ n, i la akpa ugbudu ogu ku ma dago oji uwñ akobʼo̩ n.
O̩na kʼi lewa e-le̩ i adabi le lo, i ñʼagudu wʼef ewo-i n, Jihofa ka-i.
Todu omi ahie̩do̩ bʼewo-i ma kʼu fʼu jadu, todu onugo e-mi kpʼe-Defid adu-mi.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa le dufu, oñ i fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩la nyoke me̩lu kpa ef uru abo Asiria le̩; oñ e̩gba kʼamone̩ kwane̩ odudu odudu, go, abo-i mud oku one̩ jo̩ chaka.
Taku Se̩nake̩rib onu Asiria kwʼo̩mo̩ le, i la mudabi tʼubi agugu Nine̩fa.
Tak abu kʼi do̩mo̩ adojikane̩ ef unyi Nisro̩k, o̩jo̩-wñ, Adra-me̩le̩k kpai Share̩ze̩r, amo̩ma-wñ, nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa; oñ ma ra tʼane̩ Ararat. Tak E̩sarhado̩n, o̩ma-wñ, jʼo̩fe̩ koji uwñ.

Iko le̩ o̩ga fu He̩ze̩kaya mu, oñ iñmi dʼo̩wo̩ O̩jo̩ i bo̩. Tak Aizaya akache̩, o̩ma Emoz le̩, lewʼugbo-wñ, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini: Fʼane̩-we̩ kpama, todu uwe̩ aku, e̩ ñʼaye ge̩ n.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya mʼeju-wñ rida tʼo̩do̩, oñ i kwogbo̩ko̩bo̩ Jihofa,
i la kakini, O Jihofa nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, fa-i e̩ nadibekadʼalu kʼu tetalule̩ o̩gba-we̩ ogbolo kpʼe̩do̩ʼka, kʼu la fʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ che eju-we̩. Taku He̩ze̩kaya kworaku anyanyi.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Aizaya, kakini:
Lo, kʼe̩ ka ñw He̩ze̩kaya kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Defid ata-we̩ ka de̩, kakini: U fʼaduwa-we̩ gbo̩ me̩, u la fʼomi aku-we̩ li, go, omi abu o̩do̩ me̩-gwe̩lu tʼolugbo-we̩.
Omi ñʼagbʼuwe̩ kpʼewo-i kwef o̩wo̩ onu Asiria, oñ nahie̩do̩ bʼewo-i ma.
Ujiwe ki akwʼugbo Jihofa wa ñw e̩ ka ki Jihofa ache e̩wñ kʼi katane̩ ñw e̩-i de̩:
Go, naje̩ ñw olubo̩ olu ki da nʼagube Ehazle̩ ki dabiwʼubi e̩re̩ me̩gwa. Abe̩le̩ olu mudabiwʼubi kwʼugbo kʼi le kade e̩re̩ me̩gwa o̩la agube le̩.
O̩takada ku He̩ze̩kaya onu Juda ko̩, abu kʼi fʼo̩ga che kʼo̩ga-wñ takpa de̩ kakini:
Omi kakini, Olu-mi le oji,
U kakini, Nali Jihofa
Ma mʼugugu-mi ta bʼumi te̩
U nyʼo̩la-mi e̩do̩ gbogbo nyʼodudu;
U kekale̩ dab akpadede abe̩k olufia,
Abʼu naka taa? I chʼo̩la eka, i ka ñw mi me̩,
O Ondu, lugbo e̩wñ-i oñ amone̩ adeju,
Go, ekpabie̩ kʼe̩do̩-mi kpabie̩ le̩
Todu efo̩jegu neke gogbodʼe̩ n,
E̩ne̩ ki deju, e̩ne̩ ki deju, owñ le̩ agogbodʼe̩,
Jihofa che kʼi jadu mi me̩,
Aizaya la ka e̩gba le̩ me̩ kakini, Ama ki mʼe̩bo̩ e̩ro o̩gbaikolo du, ku ma dʼu garaʼiketo̩ko̩-wñ, tak i adabi tʼiko.
He̩ze̩kaya ño̩ ka e̩gbale̩ me̩ kakini, E̩wñ chʼujiwe ka kʼu nate̩gu nyʼunyi Jihofa taa?
Iko le̩ Me̩rodak-baladan, o̩ma-Baladan, onu Babilo̩n, kʼo̩takada manyʼe̩wñ ele kpuche̩ ru He̩ze̩kaya, todu i gbo̩ ka kʼi chʼo̩ga, kʼo̩ga-wñ la takpa.

Oñ He̩ze̩kaya yo̩ ñw ma, i la dʼunyi e̩wñ akoko-wñ ña ma, tʼajifa-wñ, kpʼo̩jamalia kpʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩ kpʼekpo ki nʼaja kpʼunyi e̩wñ ido̩na ogu-wñ chaka, owñ chʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef unyi e̩wñ akoko-wñ. I nʼe̩wñ du ki jʼunyi-wñ kpai ojane̩-wñ ku He̩re̩kaya ma ko ña ma n.
Tak Aizaya akache̩ le̩, wʼugbo He̩ze̩kaya onu kakini, Abʼabo-i ka-i? Ugbo ma kwo wʼugbo-we̩? He̩ze̩kaya kakini, Ma kwo ane̩ o̩najiji wʼugbo mi, owñ che Babilo̩n.
Tak i kakini, E̩wñ ma li ef unyi-we̩? Oñ He̩ze̩kaya dohi kakini, Ma fʼe̩wñ du ki jʼunyi-mi li; i nʼe̩wñ du ef unyi e̩wñ akoko-mi kʼomi ma du ña ma n.
Tak Aizaya ka ñw He̩ze̩kaya kakini, Gbʼo̩la ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka kakini:
Go, iko awa, e̩gba ku ma añʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef unyi-we̩, kpai e̩wñ kʼamata-we̩ ko jʼef o̩pata gbogbo wʼeñini kide̩ nyi Babilo̩n; e̩wñ du abo̩ n, Jihofa ka-i.
Oñ ef amo̩ma-we̩ kʼama akwef uta-we̩ dufu, e-kʼuwe̩ abi, ma ako ge̩; tak ama amud amonoji ef unyi onu Babilo̩n.
Taku He̩ze̩kaya ka ñw Aizaya kakini, O̩la Jihofa kʼe̩ ka le̩ chenyo̩. I ño̩ ka kakini, Todu ure̩do̩ kpʼochochi ade̩ iko e-mi.
Me̩ ki nyʼuma e̩do̩, me̩ ki nyʼabo-mi e̩do̩,
Me̩ nakʼo̩la unye̩do̩ ñw abo Je̩rusale̩m,
Omuko̩la e̩ne̩ ki akwa ef aje̩tachi kakini:
O̩go̩ o̩go̩ du ahi tʼate̩,
Tak ojima Jihofa atejugede,
Omuko̩laʼka kakini, Kwa!
Egbe-wñ akwacha, ododo-wñ acha,
Egbe akwacha, ododo acha;
Uwe̩, Zayo̩n, uwe̩ kʼe̩ nʼakoya uche̩nyo̩ wa,
Go, Ondu Jihofa anʼugbiti wa,
I akʼujo̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-wñ nyʼokije̩ dab adidala,
E̩ne̩ ne̩ e̩do̩wo̩-wñ ñwa omiofo du?
E̩ne̩ fʼAfu Jihofa kpe̩ru e̩ñwa e̩ñwa,
E̩ne̩ i bʼo̩ lʼo̩la todu kʼeju-wñ ki ne̩?
Go, abuche̩ichi uche̩ichi dab e̩kito̩ omiʼka ki kito̩ kwef otube̩,
Le̩bano̩n bebʼiji-wñ jo̩ n,
Abuche̩ichi du chʼo̩wai eju-wñ,
Mak e̩ne̩ uwe̩ adʼO̩jo̩ wawe-wñ taa?
Ode! E̩nuko̩lo̩ ada,
E̩ne̩ kʼale mʼu kʼi ma ne̩ e̩wñ kʼi ako ne n
Ame̩ ma n? Ame̩ te̩te̩gbo̩ n?
E̩ne̩ kʼi gugu atate̩ ñw e̩wñ ki bʼile̩ ma okokolo ate̩-i,
kʼi akʼame̩nojima chʼe̩wñ o̩wai,
Ma ko gbe̩ kpo̩kpe̩ n, ma la ko fia kpo̩kpe̩ n,
Mak e̩ne̩ me̩ adʼumi wawe-wñ
Mʼeju-me̩ korʼate̩, ago:
O Jeko̩b, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ka,
Uwe̩ ma n? Uwe̩ te̩te̩gbo̩ n?
I adʼukpahiu ñw abokʼo̩gawu achʼo,
I chaka chʼabimo̩to̩, ochuchu ache ma, uhia la ahia ma,
iñmi abo ku ma nede Jihofa muda aruko,
Me̩ chechi jo̩ o̩gba-mi, O ala ala;
E̩ne̩ dʼe̩ne̩ʼka kwane̩ olodudu
I anʼuma ule i alale gudu hiaala,
E̩ne̩ chʼe̩wñ abe̩i, kʼi la fʼuche̩ kpa,
Ala ala fʼu li me̩ ma la arailo,
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ate̩ko ekeji-wñ,
Abe̩le̩ afoli adugbe̩do̩ ñw agwalo̩ o̩jamalia,
I muda chʼuwe̩, Israe̩l, adu-mi le̩,
uwe̩ kʼu gwo̩nyu kwʼukpoji ukpoji ane̩ ile̩,
e̩ ki railo n, todu omi dʼugbo we̩,
Go, anyo̩ amu abo du kʼe̩do̩-ma kparʼuwe̩,
Uwe̩ ate̩jane̩ ma,
Todu omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩,
E̩ ki railo n, uwe̩ ideneku ki kʼodu Jeko̩b,
Go, omi dʼuwe̩ chʼugwo̩ka etito̩,
uwe̩ afʼu fe̩ oñ afu ako ma rinyo̩,
Ame̩no̩bata kpʼame̩nale natejane̩ omiofo,
Nabi o̩na omi ki mud ohimini oj otete o̩kpakpala,
Nakʼoli sida kpai akesia kpai me̩rte̩l kpʼoli o̩lif e-efoko
kʼama ki li ku ma ma,
Me̩ kʼomu-me̩ ke, Jihofa ka-i;
Ama ki ko dufu wa, kʼama ki choli e̩wñ ki awa ejo̩gba jʼane̩ ñw a.
Me̩ choli e̩wñ ki awa ejo̩gba-i,
Me̩ go, e̩te̩-me̩ chʼo̩wai ofofo,
Omi mʼe̩ne̩ʼka du kwane̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, i lewa me̩,
E̩ne̩ choli jʼane̩ kwʼejodudu kʼawa ki ma?
Omi chʼe̩nejodudu ki ka ñw Zayo̩n, kakini, Me̩ go, me̩ go ma,
E̩gba kʼu natejane̩, one̩ de̩ n;
Me̩ go, o̩chaka-ma chʼibe̩te̩;
Go adu-mi, e-kʼu nagbʼo̩ ne̩ dago,
I akwa n i la achʼomu-wñ nyʼate̩ n,
i agu elikpo ki mute̩muu che̩ n,
Ejuduu achʼo n, e̩do̩-wñ akpabie̩ n
O̩jo̩, Jihofa,
Omi Jihofa, fʼe̩ do̩ ef o̩kpakpa,
kʼe̩ chi eju amafeju,
Omi che Jihofa, abʼodu-mi ko̩ de̩;
Me̩ go, e̩wñ o̩gbo̩gba le̩ lewa che me̩,
Me̩ ki kʼeli etito̩ ñw Jihofa,
Aje̩tachi kpai ewo ewo-wñ ki nachʼomu-ma nyʼate̩,
Ama ki dʼojima ñw Jihofa,
Jihofa adufu dabe̩ne̩ kʼagbiti,
Echi kʼu chi i me̩ ane̩-i ge̩ n,
Nakpʼuwo kpʼotete fo̩ rinyo̩,
Omi la akʼamafeju wa
Ma arʼabo ku ma ke̩do̩nʼojibo ku ma gbe̩,
Me̩ gbo̩ ke, ame̩ amajeti;
E̩ne̩ chʼafeju ki ma chʼadu-mi n?
Uwe̩ ali e̩wñ wewe, e̩ muda tejane̩-wñ n;
I nyo̩ Jihofa eju tod o̩kpakpa-wñ,
Ama abo-i chʼamone̩ ku ma jʼuma oji ku ma dʼuma inya,
E̩ne̩ dʼef ume̩ ki jʼanetirʼe̩wñ-i?
E̩ne̩ du Jeko̩b te̩ ku ma ñʼo̩ ane̩?
Todule̩ oñ i dʼe̩kpuna e̩do̩fulu-wñ danyʼu oji
Ama fa-i abu Jihofa,
E̩gba kʼe̩ le gu ef omi omi du nadʼugbo-we̩;
Todu omi che Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩,
Abu kʼuwe̩ chʼe̩wñ akoko eju-mi,
E̩ ki railo n, todu omi dʼugbo we̩;
naka ñw o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ kakini, Dʼu tinyo̩,
owñ chʼe̩ne̩ du ku ma dʼodu-mi mʼo̩,
Kʼamafeju ku ma nʼeju dufu wa,
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du ki wa jʼugboʼkate,
Ame̩ chʼame̩nibenu-mi, Jihofa ka-i,
Omi, omi le̩, che Jihofa,
Omi ka me̩, u fʼu jadu, omi laño̩ du ñʼone̩,
O̩jo̩ omi la che, i-i, akwʼo̩jo̩ le̩ omi le̩ de̩;
Abu ki Jihofa,
Omi che Jihofa, E̩ne̩-me̩ Kiafo̩,
Abu ki Jihofa
kʼi akʼo̩ko̩ ogu kpai anya dufu,
kakini: Me̩ ki dibekadʼe̩wñ o̩gbo̩gba n,
Go, omi ache e̩wñ etito̩;
Ame̩wñ iñmi oko abʼojima mʼumi,
owñ chʼamone̩ kʼu bo̩ ñw o̩la-mi,
E̩ muda kwado̩ mi n, O Jeko̩b;
Uwe̩ la kʼe̩wñ ame̩wño̩re̩ egini-we̩ wa ñw mi tod iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo n,
E̩ nʼo̩ko̩ la o̩mo̩ wa ñw mi n,
Omi, omi le̩
E̩ nare mi wa, awa ki kajo̩;
Ata-we̩ ejodudu dure,
Todule̩ u fʼamagboji uña kiafo̩ le̩ o̩la bie̩,
E̩ muda gbo̩ ta, O Jeko̩b, adu-mi,
Jihofa kʼi fʼuwe̩ che,adu-mi,e-kʼomi chi le̩.
Todu nadʼomiofo danyʼe̩ne̩ kʼalugbe̩ akpa,
Ama atiga dabe̩ne̩ kʼegbe eti omi
E̩ne̩ʼka akakini, E̩ne̩ Jihofa omi che,
Abu ki Jihofa, Onu Israe̩l
E̩ne̩ dab omi? kʼi adudo̩,
Ame̩ ki railo n, me̩ ki la chokpo n;
Abo du ku ma gbʼojibo chʼofofo chaka, e̩wñ ku ma la yo̩ ñw u le̩ anʼile n; ame̩nibenu e-ma la agane̩ n, ma la ma e̩wñ n, kʼanyo̩ ki mu ma.
E̩ne̩ fʼo̩jo̩ʼka bo̩ abe̩k i fʼojibo da kʼi ma nʼile du n?
Go, anyo̩ amu ame̩numana-wñ chaka, amado̩na le̩ chʼone̩ ofo; ama ki kʼo̩la-ma wa jeju, ama ki hi dago ke, ailo amu ma, anyo̩ amu ma alukate.
Agwalo̩ nʼebije agwu i achʼuko̩lo̩ ef ige̩-wñ; i anʼutum añwʼo̩ che teju-wñ, i anʼo̩wo̩-wñ ki gbiti agwu; i-i, ebi akpʼo̩, ukpahiu-wñ la abulo̩; i añmʼomi n, ochuchu achʼo.
Afoli afʼiku fa te̩, i anʼafu fʼina-wñ; i anʼaña agbe̩ tʼeju-wñ, tak i anʼiku ku ma du ñwʼe̩wñ okokolo ñwa; i la añwʼo̩ che kʼi dab ojibo one̩, alu kʼalifia one̩ de̩, kʼi gugu ef unyi.
I alo̩ oli sida; cho̩kpo̩ni i adu oli holm abe̩k ok, oñ i atʼo̩ no̩ dago efoko o̩mo̩ kʼi nana; i achi oli fe̩r ne, oñ omi alo̩ nyʼu.
Gbogbo tak i amud iji ñw one̩; i la nʼe-kʼi adu kʼuna awa, i-i, i nʼe-kʼi adu kʼuna akala; i-i, i lañʼadʼu chʼo̩jo̩, kʼi adojikane̩ ñw u, i adʼu gbe̩ ojibo tak i abʼane̩ ma o̩gba-wñ.
I mʼe̩bo̩bo̩-wñ ko gujo ef una; i la arʼe̩la je̩ oji-wñ, i arʼe̩la je̩, oñ efu-wñ ko̩; i-i, i awʼuna, oñ i kakini, Ibaa, o̩la-mi ya, omi fʼuna li me̩!
Tak i adʼe-ki bo̩ chʼo̩jo̩ʼka, owñ chʼojibo-wñ kʼi gbe̩ le̩; i fʼeju bʼane̩ ma ñw u, oñ i dojikane̩ ñw u; i la arodubʼo̩, kakini, Uwe̩ ki gba mi, todu o̩jo̩-mi e̩ che!
Ma ma n, ma la kpʼibe-wñ n; todu i fʼe̩wñ fo̩ nyʼuma eju, kʼama ki we egane̩ kpai e̩do̩-ma kʼama ki we emʼoji-wñ.

E̩ne̩ du la libekadʼo n, e̩wñ ema kpʼoji e̩wñ ema dʼede̩ n tak ama ki kakini, U mʼojiʼka-wñ ko gujo; u ño̩ fʼakala che oj e̩ge̩-wñ, u fʼe̩la ro̩ je̩; u ñʼadʼe̩bo̩bo̩-wñ che e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ge̩? U ñʼafʼeju bʼane̩ ma ñw igbo oli?
Uje̩wñ kʼi aje̩ chʼelulu, e̩do̩-wñ ki mʼolemi gba le̩ je̩ ñw u muna tʼo̩wo̩ ka. I la neke gba onugo-wñ tane̩ n, i la neke ka kakini, I chʼolemi dʼo̩wo̩-mi awo̩to̩-i n?
Ibe-we̩ ki nakado e̩wñ-i, O Jeko̩b,
U fʼada kʼe̩ je̩ gba rinyo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼakpa ki chubi,
Keli, ame̩ efojale todu Jihofa che me̩;
Abu ki Jihofa, Agbʼe̩ tane̩ te̩,
kʼi akʼujiwe amaremi gwuji,
kʼi fʼo̩la adu-wñ lonyane̩,
kʼi la aka ñw unefu le̩ kakini, Gbe̩ ke,
kʼi nʼo̩la Sairo̩s aka kakini, Adidala-mi de̩,
Abu ki Jihofa aka ñw e̩ne̩-wñ kʼi fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji kʼowñ che Sairo̩s,
Natʼuwe̩ o̩gba,
nakʼe̩wñ akoko e̩chubi ñw e̩,
Todu Jeko̩b, adu-mi,
Omi che Jihofa, omune̩ du la de̩ n,
kʼama ki ma akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu
Omi abo̩ ugane̩ te̩, u la anyi e̩chubi,
O efojale, kito̩ kwʼate̩ le̩ wane̩,
Atogwo ñw e̩ne̩ ki abʼAcho̩na-wñ ja,
Atogwo ñw e̩ne̩ ki aka ñw ata-wñ kakini, E̩wñ e̩ bi-i? abe̩k i aka ñw onobule̩ kakini, Efu e̩wñ e̩ che-i?
Abu ki Jihofa,
Omi fʼile̩-i che te̩,
Omi dʼu kwane̩ ef o̩kpakpa,
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Ochochi, uwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ maja,
Anyo̩ amu ma; ochochi, eju-ma aku e̩bo̩no̩ chaka,
Jihofa muda anʼujadu o̩gbegbele̩ jadu Israe̩l;
Todu abu ki Jihofa, ki nyi efojale efojale,
U ka maja
Me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ jeju ku me̩ lewa,
Ame̩ ki ka dufu, me̩ ko dufu wa;
Me̩ rʼeju da go mi, kʼama ki fʼume̩ jadu,
U fʼo̩la-mi onugo go̩ me̩,
Ma anʼo̩la-mi aka kakini, Chai efu Jihofa
Ma adale ñw ugbe̩ Israe̩l chaka efu Jihofa,
Be̩l adʼoji lo̩, Nebo̩ ate̩kpe̩ me̩,
Ma ate̩kpe̩, ma adʼoji lo̩ alukate,
Me̩ netirʼumi, O abunyi Jeko̩b,
gbogbo tʼo̩jo̩ ogijo omi chʼowñ,
E̩ne̩ oñ ame̩ aka kʼomi biʼu, ku me̩ la adu mi chʼokujo̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ le̩,
Abo ku ma tʼo̩wo̩ nyʼakpulu ku ma kʼo̩jamalia akpabie̩,
Ma mʼu du nʼika, ene̩ ma ne̩,
Ibe-me̩ ki tʼo̩, ku me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ ña ka kʼone̩ me̩ che;
me̩ ki dibekado e̩wñ o̩gbo̩gba e-igbegbele:
kʼu nʼo̩la ukpoji e̩wñ aka dufu kwʼabakwane̩
nadʼe̩we̩ ki achʼe̩ño̩ e̩la kwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu wa,
Me̩ ne̩tirʼumi, ame̩ kʼe̩do̩-me̩ gbiti le̩,
nadʼo̩kpakpa e-mi wa me̩rʼanane̩, i ñʼadʼo̩najiji ge̩ n,
Mugwo̩ru wa kʼe̩ gugu ef ebutu,
Mʼo̩mokuta ko kʼe̩ nʼe̩wñ,
Ago-we̩ ate̩ ofo,
Agbone̩tane̩ e-wa le̩—odu-wñ ko̩ Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du—
Chechi gugu kʼe̩ nyʼef e̩chubi,
U we̩do̩rʼabo-mi,
Tak uwe̩ kakini, Omi achʼodu one̩ ogbegbele̩,
Todule̩ e̩ gbʼe-i ke, uwe̩ kʼe̩ tʼo̩la-we̩ no̩ ñw e̩wñ ube̩do̩,
E̩wñ meji-i muda ake̩re̩bʼe̩
Todu uwe̩ ke̩do̩nʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩-we̩ le̩,
Todule̩ oñ e̩bie̩ne̩ awa bʼe̩ ma,
Kwodago ef e̩wñ ifamu-we̩
Ojuju-we̩ kʼe̩ nyi wewe wewe le̩ fʼe̩ hia me̩;
Go, ama dab ikakpunu e̩wñ,
Abe̩le̩ oñ e̩wñ kʼe̩ te̩tachʼakanya uko̩lo̩-wñ ade̩ ñw e̩,
Me̩ gbʼo̩, ame̩ abunyi Jeko̩b,
Todu ama ka ku ma chʼabo ewo kiafo̩ le̩,
U fʼe̩wñ o̩gbo̩gba ka dufu kpo̩kpe̩ me̩,
Todu kʼu chema ka kʼe̩do̩-we̩ cheno̩,
todule̩ u mudu ka ñw e̩ igbelegbele,
Uwe̩ gbo̩ me̩; gʼe̩wñ-i du;
E̩wñ ku ma nyi fai fai i che, i chʼe̩wñ igbegbele n;
Ochochi, e̩ gbʼo̩ mama ta n, e̩ la ma mama ta n,
Todu odu e-mi oñ u mʼuwe̩do̩-mi ne̩,
Go, omi fʼe̩ gwe̩ me̩, i muda chʼalu ku ma gwe̩ ajifa n;
Todu onugo e-mi, todu onugo e-mi, oñ nache,
Netiru mi, O Jeko̩b,
Ochochi, o̩wo̩-mi dʼunyane̩ ane̩ ile̩ te̩,
Me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ jeju jo̩ chaka, ku me̩ gbo̩!
Omi, omi le̩, ka me̩, u la fʼu do̩,
Me̩ te̩me̩rʼumi, me̩ gbʼe-i ke:
Abu ki Jihofa,
O, uwe̩ ma netirʼuko̩ uko̩-mi!
amugbe̩-we̩ ma ño̩ dab e̩lanyi ge̩,
Kwo bi Babilo̩n te̩, ra bʼabo Kaldia te̩,
Alugbe̩ la kpa ma e̩gba kʼi ne̩ ma le gu ef egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta du n;
Jihofa kakini, I nʼure̩do̩ du ñw ame̩ne̩bibi n.
O ala, ala, me̩ netirʼumi,
I la che kʼalu-mi kʼi dab o̩kwo̩chageli ki ale̩,
Oñ i ka ñw mi kakini, Uwe̩ chʼadu-mi,
Omi muda kakini, U fʼakanya uko̩lo̩ che tinyo̩ ofo,
Fai taku Jihofa,
oñ i kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa,
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini:
kʼe̩ ka ñw abo ku ma fʼuma ji te̩,
Ebi kpʼalugbe̩ akpa ma n,
Oñ nache kʼuwo uwo-mi du ki mud ejo̩na,
Go, abo-i akwʼo̩najiji wa,
O efojale, efojale kʼeli ke, O ile̩ uwe̩ ki gwoguyo̩;
Ama Zayo̩n kakini, Jihofa hi umi tinyo̩ me̩.
Onobule̩ neke gbenyo̩ o̩ma ki añmʼe̩nya-wñ?
Go, omi fʼuwe̩ ko̩ nyʼe̩do̩wo̩-mi me̩;
O̩wo̩ abo ku ma nʼo̩do̩-we̩ aya tʼo̩wo̩ abo ku ma gu uwe̩ lo̩ le,
Chʼeju-we̩ nyʼate̩ kʼe̩ go dagbala daka kʼe̩ go ke;
Todu i chʼuña-we̩ ki chʼalache̩ ki chʼo̩kpakpala te̩,
Oñ amo̩ma kʼe̩ bi ku le̩
Tak uwe̩ aka ef e̩do̩-we̩ kakini:
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Amonu achʼamata-we̩ ku ma ane̩ we̩ gba,
E̩wñ kʼagbiti mu, ma abʼo̩ gba?
Abu ki Jihofa muda ka de̩ kakini:
Naje̩ ñw abo ku ma fʼuwe̩ te̩mane̩ kʼo̩re̩la e-ma onugo je̩,
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
E̩wñ chi kʼomi wa kʼe̩ne̩ du ma do̩mo̩ n?
Nakʼe̩chubi bʼo̩la efojale efojale ma,
Ondu Jihofa mʼukpalu abo ku ma ko̩ ma e̩wñ du ñw mi,
Ondu Jihofa mʼeti-mi bi,
U mʼubi-mi dute̩ ñw abo ku ma gwʼo,
Todu Ondu Jihofa ate̩ko mi;
E̩ne̩ ki adale ñw mi me̩rʼanane̩.
Go, Ondu Jihofa ate̩ko mi;
E̩ne̩ dʼef ume̩ ki arailo Jihofa?
Go, o̩chaka-me̩ ku me̩ kʼuna,
Me̩ netirʼumi, ame̩ ku me̩ ranʼo̩kpakpa,
Me̩ ki kejurʼEbraham ata-me̩,
Todu Jihofa anyi Zayo̩n e̩do̩;
Me̩ netirʼumi, abo-mi,
O̩kpakpa e-mi me̩ru awa,
Me̩ ki chʼeju-me̩ nyʼate̩ gʼefojale,
Netirʼumi, ame̩ ku me̩ chemʼo̩kpakpa,
Todu ojudu ako ma je̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼukpo,
Mʼolu ji, mʼolu ji, kʼukpahiu bʼo̩la
I chʼuwe̩ je̩ ñw ohimini gbe̩ le̩ n?
Abe̩le̩ abo ki Jihofa la ma tane̩ adabiwa,
Omi, owñ chʼomi pitii chʼe̩ne̩ ki anyʼuma e̩do̩;
Kʼe̩ la gbenyo̩ Jihofa ki chʼo̩na-we̩,
Ma ahika tʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼoji lo̩ le̩ no̩ tane̩;
Todu omi che Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩,
Omi la mʼuko̩la-mi du tʼef alu-we̩ me̩,
Mʼolu ji, mʼolu ji,
I nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi añʼo̩ o̩na
E̩wñ meji-i ke̩re̩bʼe̩—
Amo̩ma-we̩ mudaku,
Todule̩ e̩ gbʼe-i ke, uwe̩ e̩no̩bata,
abu kʼOndu-we̩ Jihofa,
oñ nadʼu tunyʼabo ku ma chʼuwe̩ o̩bata o̩wo̩,
Mʼolu ji, mʼolu ji,
Kwane̩, fʼebutu o̩la-we̩ gbanyo̩;
Todu abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ma ko me̩ ta ofofo ma gbʼo̩ko̩ n, egba me̩ tane̩ la anʼo̩ko̩ efu n.
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Abo-mi nyʼIjipti e̩gba ejodudu le̩ ku ma ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩. E̩ne̩ Asiria le̩ la fʼuma te̩mane̩ o̩lachi ofo.
E̩wñ u dʼemi ache fa-i? abu ku ma kʼamone̩-mi alo ofofo. Jihofa aka-i. Abo ku ma nʼo̩da-ma jʼakpogu, Jihofa ka-i, ma la dʼodu-mi rʼibe̩te̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
Todule̩ abo-mi ama odu-mi; todule̩ ma ama o̩jo̩ le̩ ka kʼomi ki ako̩la-i de̩; me̩ go, omi de̩.
Go abu kʼe̩re̩ e̩ne̩ ki dʼoj uwo uwo
Neti, abide-we̩ adʼomu me̩,
Mʼeli da taa, omu eli-me̩ ki chʼokate,
Jihofa mʼo̩wo̩-wñ kiafo̩ du dufu
Me̩ kwo bʼo̩ te̩, me̩ kwo bʼo̩ te̩, me̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu,
Todu ame̩ adufu unaju unaju n,
Me̩ go, adu-mi ache e̩wñ ibe ibe,
Alu kʼawuwu-we̩ fʼamone̩ wewe mu—
abe̩le̩ i aje̩ ñw abo ucheichi wewe jagigili;
E̩ne̩ dʼo̩la kʼa gbo̩ le̩ rʼochochi?
Todu i gba mud o̩kone̩ o̩gba-wñ dabe̩ne̩ kʼoli emele,
Amone̩ chʼe̩de̩te̩-wñ, ma la tʼo̩ no̩ tinyo̩;
Ochochi, i mʼegbo-wa gbane̩,
Ma muda fʼu chagbe tod ada kʼawa je̩,
O̩chaka-wa chila dab ame̩wño̩re̩ egini me̩;
Ma fʼu chʼo̩bata, ma fʼu chukata,
Ma hika dʼowñ kwʼugbo ku ma fʼu
Ma dʼura-wñ tʼugbo ame̩ne̩bibi,
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ i ru Jihofa e̩do̩ kʼi fʼu gwenunu;
i ali e̩wñ kwef uko̩lo̩ akanya kʼonugo-wñ ache, e̩do̩-wñ abo̩;
Todule̩ nadʼukpe̩-wñ te̩ ef ame̩ne̩-lile,
O agaji, kʼe̩ ma bi o̩ma n, keli ke;
Fʼuña ñw unyabo-we̩,
Todu uwe̩ agbʼane̩ nyʼo̩wo̩ rʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ kpai awohi, amugbe̩-we̩ la ane̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
E̩ ki railo n, todu anyo̩ amʼe̩ n;
Todu Acho̩na-we̩ le̩ owñ chʼo̩ko̩-we̩,
Todu Jihofa fʼe̩ do̩
Iko re oñ u dʼuwe̩ tinyo̩,
Uwe̩do̩-mi ki ko̩ adafo
Todu e-kide̩ chebiu omi Noa ñw mi:
Todu dagba uwo uwo ki kwo
O uwe̩ e̩no̩bata, kʼafu ibi arʼuwe̩ nyʼojale le̩, kʼe̩do̩-we̩ ma nyi n,
U la ako okuta rubi che o̩ñwe̩ jʼojokunyi-we̩ lale,
Amo̩ma-we̩ chaka achʼabo ku Jihofa ko̩ ma e̩wñ,
Ma afʼe̩ lonyane̩ ef o̩kpakpa;
Go, ma akʼo̩la-ma jeju,
Go, omi nyi agwalo̩
e̩wñ ido̩na ogu du ku ma gwu ku
Uwe̩, e̩ne̩ du kʼolugbe̩ akpʼo̩,
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ kʼo̩ko̩ ala e̩wñ ki ma chʼuje̩wñ n?
Hi eti-we̩ wane̩, kʼe̩ wʼugbo mi;
Go, omi mʼowñ du chʼe̩nibenu ñw amone̩ amone̩,
Go, uwe̩ adʼo̩ abo ichiʼka kʼe̩ ma ma ma n,
Me̩ tejane̩ Jihofa abu kʼi dʼugbo kʼame̩ ali,
e̩ne̩bie̩ne̩ ki hiʼo̩na-wñ tinyo̩,
Todu ibe ki dʼefu-mi chʼojoji ñw ibe ki dʼefu e-me̩,
Todu alu kʼefojale efojale jʼatate̩ ñw ile̩-i,
Todu alu kʼomi alo̩ kwʼojale wʼane̩, kpai alu ki sno agwo̩ru kwʼojale wa,
alu le̩ o̩la ki akwef alu-mi dufu ade̩ ge̩;
Todu ame̩ adufu alo kpʼuyo̩,
Oli fe̩r atiga koji ikeke;
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
E̩ne̩ ki ache-i gbede,
Ononojo ki dʼo̩la-wñ manyu Jihofa ki we eka kakini,
Todu o̩la amonoji ku ma de o̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi,
Omi akʼe̩wñ urewa kpai odu ñw ma ef unyi-mi kpʼef aku-mi
I che-abononojo ku ma kʼo̩la-ma manyu Jihofa,
nakʼabo e-le̩ wʼugbo uwo-mi kiafo̩,
Ondu Jihofa ki aya abo Israe̩l
Ame̩ ame̩wñ iñmi oko chaka, me̩ lewa mu ko je̩—
Abide-wñ chʼamafeju,
Ochochi, amabia le̩ chʼamachajefu;
Ma kakini, Me̩ lewa-oo, kʼa kʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma wa jo̩,
Eno̩kpakpa alenyo̩,
i agudu tef ure̩do̩;
Me̩ te̩wʼemi, ame̩ amo̩ma onobule̩ ki agʼakpa,
E̩ne̩ me̩ chʼo uke̩?
ame̩ ku me̩ jʼago̩larʼode
Ef okuta bo̩lo̩ bo̩lo̩ ef o̩go̩ le̩ oñ ukpe̩-we̩ de̩;
E̩ mʼate̩-we̩ du dago
E̩ la dʼe̩wñ urewa-we̩ dago
Uwe̩ la nʼe̩kpo anyʼugbo onu,
O̩na-we̩ ki jiji fʼe̩ hia,
E̩ne̩ oñ e̩ dejiji-wñ kʼe̩ la chokpo
Nakʼo̩kpakpa-we̩ kpʼuko̩lo̩ kʼe̩ che dufu,
E̩gba kʼe̩ kwa, mak abo kʼe̩ gba jo̩ le̩ ki gbʼe̩ ke!
Taku ma akakini,
Todu abu kʼE̩ne̩ ki ne̩ atate̩
Todu iñwa-mi eje̩ kpʼone̩ chʼogbegbele̩ n,
Todu ugbite̩re̩ ejufufu-wñ oñ u we̩do̩,
U fʼo̩na o̩na-wñ li me̩, omi muda achʼo̩ga-wñ kpa;
Omi anyi e̩ro uko:
Ame̩ne̩bibi muda dab omi ohimini ki aro̩ gbagbagba;
Ure̩do̩ do̩mo̩ ñw ame̩ne̩bibi n, O̩jo̩-mi ka-i.
Kwa taa, e̩ ki bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ n,
Ma muda tene mi o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa,
E̩wñ chi kʼa ji alu kʼe̩ ma la li n?
Go, alu eji-me̩ chʼuja kpʼiñwa,
Alu eji kʼomi adu de̩-i?
Alu eji kʼomi adu
I chʼuje̩wñ-we̩ ekpe̩ kpʼabo kʼebi akpa ma n?
E̩gba le̩ tak ugane̩-we̩ ata dufu dab o̩jo̩ ki añwa,
E̩gbale̩ uwe̩ adʼudo̩, oñ Jihofa adohi;
i la che̩wñ kʼuwe̩ fʼonugo-we̩ fa du fu ñw e̩ne̩ kʼebi akpʼo̩
Jihofa la añʼe̩ o̩na o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩,
Tak abo kʼuwe̩ chʼe̩te̩-ma adabi ko̩ e̩gu-ma ki chʼalache̩ te̩ le̩;
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ mʼe̩re̩-we̩ chi bʼo̩jo̩-uñmi te̩,
e̩gbale̩ taku Jihofa achʼuyo̩-we̩,
Go, o̩wo̩ Jihofa nya rʼone̩ ejadu n,
udu ku me̩ fe̩ muda
Todu o̩wo̩-me̩ chʼe̩kpabie̩ ñw e̩bie̩,
E̩ne̩ du la adʼone̩ ajo̩ lʼo̩na o̩kpakpa n,
Ma kpa e̩ge̩ o̩fanuñwa,
Unyi agara ku ma hi le̩ anyo̩ eko bo̩lama n,
E̩re̩-ma afule nyʼugbo e̩wñ bie̩ne̩,
Ma mʼo̩na ure̩do̩ n,
Todule̩ oñ ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka jiji rʼuwa,
Awa nʼo̩wo̩ tejane̩ o̩do̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼafeju,
O̩chaka-wa achekuku dab amibe̩a,
Todu ada kʼa je̩ awe we nyʼo̩gba eju-we̩,
ada eje̩ kpai aire̩ Jihofa ere̩
Ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka mudabi wʼubi,
I-i, ochochi aña,
Tak i li ka kʼone̩ de̩ n,
I mʼo̩kpakpa du bʼe̩do̩ ma dab e̩wñ ido̩na ogu,
Alu ki chʼeju uko̩lo̩-ma, abe̩le̩ i ara ñw ma,
Abe̩le̩ tak ama arailo odu Jihofa akwʼo̩wo̩ olane̩,
Tak Agbone̩tane̩ awa Zayo̩n,

I la chʼe-mi, alo kʼu nakpe̩ kpʼama de̩, Jihofa ka-i: Afu-mi kʼi bʼuwe̩ ma le̩ kpai o̩la-mi kʼu du tʼuwe̩ alu anʼuda alu-we̩ n, kpai alu ugbe̩-we̩ n, kpai alu ugbe̩ ugbe̩-we̩ n, akwʼe̩gba-i tʼogbegbele̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Kwane̩, mʼane̩ ne̩; todu ugane̩-we̩ lewa me̩,
Todu, go, e̩chubi abʼile̩ ma,
Oñ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi agbe̩re̩ ugane̩-we̩,
Chʼeju-we̩ nyate̩ kʼe̩ go dagbala daka kʼe̩ li;
E̩gbale̩ tak uwe̩ ali, oñ eju-we̩ ane̩,
O̩wo̩ aminyakulumi ake̩che̩ wa bʼe̩ ma,
Ma akʼame̩wño̩re̩ Kedar egini wa jo̩ ñw e̩,
E̩ne̩ chʼabo ku ma wu tuu dab akpa-i,
Ala ala aneju-mi chuu,
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-abononojo anʼaku aku-we̩,
Alu aku alu aku-we̩ la abite̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩;
Todu abo uche̩ichi kpai ojane̩
Ojima Le̩banon awʼugbo-we̩,
Tak amo̩ma abo ku ma dʼo̩bata ñw e̩ le̩
Abu kʼuwe̩ te̩te̩chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma hiʼu tinyo̩ ku ma la chʼulaka-we̩,
Uwe̩ ñʼañmo̩ omi e̩nya abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
Omi akʼo̩jamalia wa koji ebijeikpa,
Ma ñʼagbʼiche̩ o̩lachi eche ojane̩-we̩ ge̩ n,
Olu ñʼachʼugane̩-we̩ o̩ro̩ka ge̩ n,
Olu-we̩ ñʼatunyane̩ ge̩ n,
Abo-we̩ chaka ñʼachʼame̩no̩kpakpa ge̩;
E̩ne̩ ki nya amud one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩,
Afu Ondu Jihofa dʼo̩la-mi,
kʼu fʼakoya ta kakini, O̩do̩ ki anyo̩ Jihofa eju le̩ de̩,
kʼu du te̩ ñw abo ku ma daido̩ Zayo̩n—
Ma adabi ko̩ achigodo igbegbele le̩,
Abo̩wo̩ e̩jaduña la adago akʼije̩ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩-me̩ egini je̩,
ma muda ado̩ me̩ ko̩, Amatama e-Jihofa,
Me̩ anʼukpe̩ meji koji anyo̩-me̩.
Todu ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka nyʼomi, Jihofa eju,
Ma ama ugbe̩-ma ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
Nayo̩ efu Jihofa ololo,
Todu alu kʼane̩ akʼiga e̩wñ dufu,
Todu Zayo̩n oñ omi ma achechi n,
Tak abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ali o̩kpakpa-we̩,
Uwe̩ lʼachʼike̩be̩ alifia ef o̩wo̩ Jihofa
Ma ñʼadʼuwe̩ kʼE̩ne̩ ku ma hiu tinyo̩ ge̩ n,
Todu alu kʼokolobia anʼonobule̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n chʼo̩ya, abe̩le̩ amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ anʼuwe̩ chʼo̩ya,
Omi kʼabide jo̩ oj aku aku-we̩,
me̩ ki la je̩ ñw u ñmi n,
Jihofa fʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ kpai o̩wo̩ ukpahiu-wñ go̩ kakini:
chai abo ku ma ko wʼunyi aje̩,
Lale, lale gu ef alaku du,
Go, Jihofa mʼu du kpogo
Ma ado̩ ma ko̩, Abo Kiafo̩,
E̩ne̩ kwʼIdo̩m awa-i?
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩wñ o̩la-we̩ akpa chuaa-i?
Omi kate fʼaguo̩ko̩lo̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ te̩,
Todu o̩jo̩ ache̩ ena dʼef e̩do̩-mi,
Oñ u go, i la nʼe̩ne̩ du ki te̩ko n;
U la fʼamone̩ amone̩ te̩mane̩ ef uwe̩do̩-mi,
Naje̩ ñw ma rewa ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Jihofa,
Todu i kakini, Ochochi, abo-mi ma che,
O̩pe̩cha du kʼama li owñ li duu,
Ma muda lañu rʼu
Tak i rewa o̩jo̩ igbegbele,
Kʼi je̩ ñw o̩wo̩-wñ ki nʼojima le̩
kʼi ne̩ ma le gu unefu le̩ du?
Alu kʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩go̩,
Uwe̩ kʼe̩ dʼefojale, tʼeju kpe̩ kʼe̩ go,
Todu uwe̩ chʼAta-wa,
O Jihofa, e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ aje̩ ñw a la bʼo̩na o̩na-we̩ te̩
Abo-we̩ kiafo̩-i ne̩ uña-we̩ kiafo̩ kpo̩kpe̩ re ofo;
Awa dab abo kʼuwe̩ ma nʼo̩da-ma mama ta n,
Aa, uwe̩ ma fʼefojale efojale kpana, kʼe̩ gwo̩ru wʼane̩,
alu ki de̩ e̩gba kʼuna tʼikpe̩le̩ iji
E̩gba kʼe̩ che e̩wñ ubailo kʼawa ma neju-wñ n,
Todu amone̩ te̩tagbo̩ akwo igbegbele n,
Todu uwe̩ ado̩wo̩mo̩ e̩ne̩ ki ayo̩ ñw e̩wñ o̩kpakpa eche,
Todu o̩chaka-wa adab e̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ daji,
I la nʼe̩ne̩ du ki akwa do̩ odu-we̩ n,
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, O Jihofa, uwe̩ chʼAta-wa;
E̩ ki we̩do̩ tabale n, O Jihofa,
Ewo ewo-we̩ kiafo̩ mud aje̩tachi,
Unyi-wa kiafo̩, unyi-wa ki chʼalifia,
E̩wñ-i du oñ uwe̩ aje̩do̩ ta, O Jihofa?
Abo ku ma ma tʼe̩ne̩ du e̩ne̩ n atene mi me̩;
U fʼo̩wo̩-mi nadala jo̩ gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩
ma chʼamone̩ ku ma jo̩ eju-mi achʼe̩wñ ki abi mi eju o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩,
ku ma la gugu ugbo ojinoji,
kʼama kakini, Uwe̩ kate ki dago o̩wo̩ʼka o̩mo̩,
Go, orubutu-wñ che̩ko̩ jʼo̩gba-mi:
udu e-me̩ onugo manyʼudu kʼamata-me̩ fe̩;
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Omi la adʼugbe̩ʼka kwefu Jeko̩b dufu,
Sharo̩n amud okije̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ egini,
I muda chʼame̩ ku me̩ hiu Jihofa tinyo̩,
omi la adʼo̩jo̩ che me̩ ñw o̩kwo̩chageli,
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini;
go, amadu-mi akeli taa todu e̩do̩-ma ki bo̩,
Ame̩ la atʼodu-me̩ no̩ tane̩ ñw abo-mi kʼu chi kʼi chʼoli ina ñw ma,
Todabe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ ki neku kʼO̩jo̩ ki de̩nyo̩ ñw u ojane̩ le̩,
Todu go, nanyi efojale efojale etito̩
E̩do̩-me̩ ki bo̩, me̩ ki la gwoguyo̩ ogbegbele̩
Tak u nagwoguyo̩ efu Je̩rusale̩m,
O̩me̩kpa ki ajʼo̩jo̩ pe̩ tak i dabi
Ma la akʼunyi ku ma adodo ef uwñ;
Ama ako̩ kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ awa dodo ef uwñ n;
Ama achʼakanya uko̩lo̩ tinyo̩ ofofo n,
O̩gba taku ma dʼudo̩, omi adohi,
O̩gu kpʼo̩mala ajo̩ ajije̩,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
O̩wo̩-mi fʼe̩wñ-i du che,
E̩ne̩ ki akpa o̩kokuno̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ i kpa le̩;
omi ñʼachi e̩wñ o̩bata ñw ma ge̩,
Me̩ gbʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka,
Gbo̩, ekuku achi ewo le̩!
O̩gba tak i chane̩ echefu
E̩ne̩ gbʼe̩wñ e̩go̩-i?
Omi afejutʼo̩ma gbogbo wʼiko ku ma abi, tak u ma ñʼaje̩ ñw u bi ge̩ n?
Me̩ bi Je̩rusale̩m gwoguyo̩, e̩do̩-me̩ ki bo̩ tod uwñ,
kʼame̩ ki ñmo̩ e̩nya e̩do̩ enyi-wñ, kʼefu-me̩ ki ko̩;
Todu abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Dab e̩ne̩ kʼiye-wñ anyʼe̩ e̩do̩,
Eju-me̩ la aliʼu, e̩do̩-me̩ la ayo̩,
Todu go, Jihofa alʼef una wa,
Todu Jihofa anʼuna kpai o̩kwo̩chageli che tʼeju alu

Abo ku ma gwʼo̩la-ma rinyo̩ ku ma chʼo̩la-ma ki fe̩ ku ma tʼe̩ne̩ʼka ubi alumeji uche̩ o̩la unyi le̩, ku ma jʼajʼe̩la oko kpai e̩wñ ki akʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu e-ire̩ kpai ikeleku, ida-ma achʼaluʼkate, Jihofa ka-i.
Todu u chema e̩wñ ku ma che kpʼibe ku ma kpe̩, iko kʼu nakʼabo uche̩ichi du kpai ichi ichi du wa jʼugbokate awa me̩; oñ ma awa, ma la ali ojima-mi,

tak u nadʼujiwe dago efu-ma. Oñ nakʼabo-ma ku ma fʼo̩wo̩ tane̩ kpuche̩ rʼabo uche̩ichi, nyi Tarshish kpai Pul kpai Lud ku ma tʼo̩fa, kpai Tubal kpai Jafan, tʼugbo ala ala ki jʼo̩najiji, kʼama ma gbʼuwohi-mi n, ku ma ma la li ojima-mi n; tak abo le̩ adʼojima-mi ka dufu ef abo uche̩ichi.

Tak ama akʼamo̩maye-me̩ chaka nʼoj amanya kpai ef o̩kogu kpai ef iga kpai oj o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ kpai oj e̩wñ ojoji ojoji kwef abo uche̩ichi du wa Je̩rusale̩m, uwo-mi kiafo̩ le̩, ku ma chʼe̩wñ ele ekowa ñw Jihofa, alu kʼabo Israe̩l akʼe̩wñ ele eduwa-ma nyʼe̩wñ eku ki fe̩ wʼef unyi Jihofa, Jihofa ka-i.
Omi ñʼachi one̩ efu-ma ku ma chʼamatama kpai abo Lifai, Jihofa ka-i.
Todu alu kʼefojale efojale etito̩ kpai ane̩ ile̩ etito̩ kʼu nache jʼo̩gba-mi gbogbo alo,
Akwʼiko kʼochuʼka ne gbogbo wʼiko kʼochu omune̩ ne
Taku ma adufu ago oku amone̩ ku ma ko mi; todu ide̩-ma aku n, una-ma la alu n, oñ ma achʼe̩wñ o̩lajijili ñw o̩re̩la du.
O̩la Je̩re̩maya, o̩ma Hilkaya, kʼi dʼef amatama ku ma jo̩ Anato̩t, oj ane̩ Be̩njamin, de̩.
Owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼo̩la Jihofa wʼugbo-wñ o̩kpanachi Josaya o̩ma Amo̩n onu Juda le̩, owñ chʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩ta kʼi jʼo̩fe̩.
I ño̩ wa o̩kpanachi Jiho̩yakim o̩ma Josaya onu Juda, gbogbo tak o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwaka Ze̩de̩kaya o̩ma Josaya onu Juda da, gbogbo wʼe̩gba ku ma mʼabo Je̩rusale̩m ño̩ le ochu e̩ke̩lu le̩.
Oñ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩gba tak u fʼe̩ bo̩ tʼefu iye-we̩ u fʼe̩ ma,
Tak u kakini, Ayaa! Ondu Jihofa! Go, omi mejuma kʼo̩la n, todu imo̩to̩ u che.
Jihofa muda ka ñw mi kakini,
E̩ ki railo ma n,
Taku Jihofa fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala akadʼalu-mi: oñ Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini,
Go, eñini-i omi mʼo̩da abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi kpai
Oñ o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini, Je̩re̩maya, e̩wñ e̩ li le̩? Tak u kakini, U che li o̩kpa oli ide.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, E̩ gane̩ gbe̩, todu u dʼemi ade o̩la-mi kʼu che teju-wñ.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi onu keji, kakini, E̩wñ e̩ li le̩? Oñ u kakini, U cheli ucha kʼomi dʼefu-wñ ana, ofe-wñ dubigbʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, E̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ agulo̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩ wa abʼabo du ku ma dodo ane̩-i ma.

Todu, go, edo̩ nado o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu ab ojane̩ ojane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩ du wa, Jihofa ka-i; ama le̩ la awa, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma adʼede-wñ wa dago ugbo ku ma gudu-wa alaku alaku Je̩rusale̩m, ma la akpala nyʼaku-wñ ale daka, kpai ewo ewo Juda chaka.
Tak omi akpʼoji ajo̩-ma rʼuma oji, tod e̩wñ bibi du ku ma che ku ma hi umi tinyo̩ le̩; ku ma la fʼotulale gujo ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩, ma laño̩ dojikane̩ ñw uko̩lo̩ kʼo̩wo̩-ma onugo che.
I muda chʼuwe̩, fʼukpo-we̩ dakulu nyʼago; kwane̩, kʼe̩ la ka e̩wñ du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ ñwu ma. E̩do̩-we̩ ki da kpu todu ma n, tode̩gba kʼomi la ache kʼe̩do̩-we̩ ki muda kpu eju-ma.

I la chʼomi, go, nadʼuwe̩ chʼewo ki nʼaku kpai ugbogaga ebije dago kpai o̩do̩ o̩do̩ ebijeikpa, nʼojane̩-i oji chaka, kpai nʼamonu Juda oji, kpai nʼamagboji-wñ oji, kpai nʼamatama-wñ oji kpai nʼamone̩ ane̩-i oji.
Ama la akʼuja bʼe̩; ma muda adʼe̩ n, todu omi dʼugbo-we̩ kʼu gbʼe̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Oñ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
Lo, kʼe̩ fʼakoya ta kʼabo Je̩rusale̩m du ki gbo̩, kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini,
Israe̩l la fo̩ todu Jihofa,
Me̩ ki gbʼo̩la Jihofa, O abo unyi Jeko̩b, kpai akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩rʼunyi abo Israe̩l chaka.
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Ama la ka n kakini, Ugbo Jihofa kʼi ko wa kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa de̩ ta?
Oñ u ko me̩ wa ane̩ uro̩je̩,
Amatama la ka n kakini, Ugbo Jihofa de̩?
Todule̩ nako bʼame̩ ta, Jihofa ka-i,
Todu, me̩ daba nyʼala Saipro̩s ku me̩ go,
I nʼabo uche̩ichiʼka ki fʼamo̩jo̩-ma kpailo̩?
Awuwu ki fʼe̩ mu, O efojale, efojale tod e̩wñ-i,
todu amone̩-mi fʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ meji che:
Israe̩l mud adu? Adu ku ma bi unyi i che?
Amo̩midu nuka rʼowñ o̩la,
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Me̩mfis kpai Tafanhes
I chʼuwe̩ onugo kʼe̩wñ-i wa bʼo̩la-we̩ oji ma
Oñ ifai, e̩wñ e̩ ne̩ ej o̩na Ijipti?
E̩wñ bibi e-we̩ onugo akʼuwe̩ o̩la,
Todu akwʼigbegbele u fʼoli uno̩lo̩-we̩ guche̩,
Uwe̩ muda chʼikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma ochochi kʼu ne,
Todu dagba kʼe̩ dʼalo gwʼo̩la-we̩,
Ab e̩ le kʼe̩ kakini, O̩la-mi daji n?
o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ efoko kʼo̩la-wñ chema aje̩tachi,
Fʼe̩re̩-we̩ de ki we ete̩ ofo
Alu kʼanyo̩ amu ajoji e̩gba kʼamone̩ fʼu li,
ku ma la ka ñw oli kakini, Ata-mi e̩ che,
Ugbo amo̩jo̩-we̩
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ akobʼumi?
Egwo kʼomi gwo amo̩ma-me̩ chʼofofo,
O abo̩gba-i, me̩ ki go o̩la Jihofa.
Igbe̩le̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n neke gbenyo̩ e̩wñ ijaga-wñ?
Go alu kʼe̩ fʼo̩na-we̩ da nyo̩nyo̩,
Ma ño̩ fʼe̩bie̩ onugo ame̩nale
e̩ muda aka kʼe̩ chʼabu du n, kpo̩;
Gʼabu kʼe̩ tara tʼemi tʼemi
E̩ ñʼakʼo̩wo̩ mʼoji
Ma kakini,
Chʼeju-we̩ nyʼate̩ kʼe̩ go oj uwo uwo kʼoji-wñ de̩ bo̩lo̩ bo̩lo̩ le̩!
Todule̩ oñ omi ma lo̩ n,
Akwe̩gba ki de̩ uwe̩ ñʼakwa do̩ mi kakini,
I adʼo̩la tʼe̩do̩ ogbegbele̩?
Anubi le̩ Jihofa ka ñw mi iko Josaya onu kakini, e̩ fʼe̩wñ kʼIsrae̩l che ki alʼubi ubi le̩ li me̩? I mute̩gu tʼoj uwo du ki gbo̩gba kpai of oli emimi du, oñ i tʼajo̩ko̩ o̩mo̩.
Tak abu kʼi fʼe̩wñ-i du che u kakini, I adabi wʼugbo mi. I muda dabi wa n. Taku Juda o̩maye-wñ kʼi adʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼo̩kpo̩ le̩ fʼuli.

Tak u li kakini, Omi chaka dʼIsrae̩l ki alʼubi ubi le̩ tinyo̩ kʼu la mʼo̩takada e̩daru du ñw u tod o̩ko̩ eje̩-wñ le̩, Juda o̩maye-wñ ki adʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼo̩kpo̩ le̩ ko̩ erailo. Owñ muda ño̩ lenʼajo̩ko̩ ge̩.
Todabu kʼe̩wñ abutabu-wñ chʼe̩wñ fuye̩ abe̩le̩ eju-wñ, i fʼane̩-i du kpabie̩, i laño̩ tʼajo̩ko̩ kpʼokuta kpʼoli.
I la chaka chʼe̩wñ-i du, Juda, o̩maye-wñ, ki adʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼo̩kpo̩ le̩, la dabi wʼugbo mi kpai e̩do̩-wñ chaka n, chai lef akpaine̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, Israe̩l ki alʼubi ubi le̩ du tejugede ka kʼowñ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa tu Juda ki adʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼo̩kpo̩ le̩ le.
Lo, kʼe̩kʼo̩la-i takoyarʼo̩wo̩o̩pata ate̩, kʼe̩ kakini,
Uwe̩ ki je̩ udu kʼe̩ fe̩ dee,
Mudabi wa, O amo̩ma ku me̩ lʼubi ubi le̩, Jihofa ka-i;
Tak omi akʼamadejute̩ ñw me̩ alu kʼe̩do̩-mi du, oñ am a akʼe̩wñ ema kpai oji e̩wñ ema ñw me̩ je̩.

Oñ i awatʼe̩gba kʼame̩ fʼamo̩ma bi ku me̩ la wewe oj ane̩-i, iko le̩, Jihofa aka-i, ama ñʼaka kakini, Akpati alo Jihofa ge̩ n; ibe-wñ la atʼuma efu n; ma la arewa n; ma la anyʼafejudʼo ge̩ n; ma ñʼache abe̩le̩ du ge̩ n.
Iko kʼa ka-i ma adʼodu Je̩rusale̩m ko Ede Jihofa; oñ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du ajeju wʼugbo-wñ ugbo odu Jihofa Je̩rusale̩m; ma ñʼalule̩ tʼe̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-ma ki bie̩ne̩ añwa ubi ge̩ n.
Iko le̩ abo unyi Juda kpai abo unyi Israe̩l akpe̩re̩, oñ ama akpe̩re̩ kwo ane̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩ wa ane̩ kʼomi du ñw amata-me̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ogu-ma.
Omi muda kakini,
Ochochi, alu kʼo̩ya ki adʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼo̩kpo̩ akwo bʼo̩ko̩-wñ te̩,
Ma chane̩ egbʼomu kwʼoj otete otete kʼoji-wñ de̩ bo̩lo̩ bo̩lo̩ me̩;
Me̩ mudabiwa, ame̩ amo̩ma ku me̩ lubiubi le̩,
Ochochi, ate̩ko ki kwʼoj otete otete le̩ chʼibe̩te̩ ofo,
E̩wñ anyo̩ le̩ la mʼakanya uko̩lo̩ amata-wa ko je̩ kwʼo̩jo̩ imo̩to̩-wa, ame̩wño̩re̩-ma egini kpai amokuno̩-ma, kpʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai amo̩ma-ma onobule̩.

Awa ki dachi ef anyo̩-wa ke, ibe-wa edajugu-i kʼi bʼuwa o̩la ma; todu awa fu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, dure me̩, awa kpʼamata-wa, akwʼo̩jo̩ imo̩to̩-wa, gbogbo tʼo̩joluñini; awa la gbʼomu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa gbo̩ n.
Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ jʼadabi, O Israe̩l, Jihofa aka-i,
Kʼuwe̩ ago̩ lʼo̩na ochochi kpai o̩na oji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa, kpʼo̩kpakpa,
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka ñw aboke̩le̩ Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m le̩ de̩ kakini:
Fʼo̩la-me̩ ko̩da bʼe̩wñ ki bo̩ te̩ ñw Jihofa,
Me̩ ki dʼu ka Juda, me̩ ki dʼu kpogo Je̩rusale̩m, kakini,
Me̩ ki dʼigaliga dago rʼo̩wo̩ Zayo̩n,
Idu kwʼef etutu-wñ dufu me̩,
Todule̩ me̩ ki kʼe̩gbanukpo lʼago-me̩ de,
Oñ i awatu, iko le̩ Jihofa aka-i, kʼe̩do̩ onu akpabie̩ rinyo̩, kpai e̩do̩ amagboji-ma; ugoju la fʼamatama mu oñ aye-wñ aje̩ ñw amakache̩ n.
Tak u kakini, Aya, Ondu Jihofa! mak uwe̩ dʼo̩wo̩ yʼabo-i kpai Je̩rusale̩m eju ochochi! Uwe̩ kakini, Ame̩ anʼure̩do̩; Okwo̩chageli la te̩ gbogbo tʼiñmi-ma.

Iko le̩ ma aka ñw amone̩-i kpai abo Je̩rusale̩m kakini, Afu ki chʼuna una aju kwʼotete otete kʼoji-wñ de̩ bo̩lo̩ bo̩lo̩ ef aje̩tachi le̩ wa rʼe̩wo̩ o̩ma onobule̩ e-abo-mi, i la chʼutodu o̩ka efe̩ n, i la chʼigbogbo e̩wñ eko rinyo̩ n;
afu ki gbiti akwʼo̩mo̩ wa todu mi: fa-i tak u ñʼakpʼoji ajo̩ ñw ma.
Go i ate̩gu wa dabe̩ne̩ kʼakpa ojale,
O Je̩rusale̩m, fʼe̩do̩-we̩ gwe̩ bʼe̩wñ
Todu i nʼomuko̩la kʼi aka Dan,
Me̩ ki hi alu-me̩ mʼo̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi;
Ma jo̩ lʼo daka dabe̩ne̩ kʼabo ku ma dide oko,
O̩na-we̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼe̩ che
Efu-mi, efu-mi! natʼagbala gbala!
E̩wñ ekpabie̩ anʼoji e̩wñ ekpabie̩, ma ka,
Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ nali agaliga le̩ kade?
Todu abo-mi chʼame̩nidada,
U fʼane̩ ile̩ go, e̩ la go, i de̩ jugu te̩ ofo;
U la gʼuwo uwo, e̩ la go, o̩la-wñ naga,
U go, e̩ la go, one̩ du do̩mo̩ n,
U go, e̩ la go, oko ki te̩te̩rʼoje̩ chʼo̩kpakpala te̩,
Todu abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ane̩-i duu achʼalache̩ te̩; omi muda che ki takpa hioko n.
Ile̩-i adaido̩ tod e-le̩,
Ewo ewo du ara
Oñ uwe̩ fa? e̩gba kʼe̩ chile̩che̩ te̩,
Todu u fʼomuko̩la gbo̩, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼe-onobule̩ kʼi achʼefu,
Fule tʼemi tʼemi lʼo̩na o̩na Je̩rusale̩m,
Dagba ma kakini, Oji Jihofa,
O Jihofa, eju-we̩ atejane̩ ochochi n?
Tak u kakini, ame̩nubie̩ de̩ ochochi,
Nanyʼugbo ame̩ne̩lile,
Todule̩ iduʼka akwʼefoko dufu wa akpa ma,
Ab u nale kʼu natʼo̩ no̩ ñw e̩?
Ma tale dab amanya kʼefu-ma ko̩,
Omi awa fejudo ma tod e̩wñ-i n? Jihofa ka-i;
Mute̩gu tʼoj o̩do̩-wñ kʼe̩ fʼu kpabie̩,
Todu abunyi Israe̩l kpʼabunyi Juda
Ma fʼaire̩ Jihofa re̩,
Amakache̩ amud afu ofo;
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini:
Go, omi akʼabo uche̩ichiʼka kwʼo̩najiji wa
Ahiagba-ma dab oji kʼalu-wñ chʼe̩bi te̩,
Ma akʼe̩wñ oko-we̩ kpʼuje̩wñ-we̩ je̩ kpa;
I chaka chʼiko e-le̩, omi akpʼoji-we̩ hioko ta n, Jihofa ka-i.

Oñ i awatʼe̩gba ku me̩ akakini, E̩wñ chi ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, fʼe̩wñ-i du che wa ta? E̩gbale̩ uwe̩ aka ñw ma kakini, Alu ku me̩ hiʼumi tinyo̩, ku me̩ la re̩ amo̩jo̩ ononojo oj ane̩-me̩-i, abe̩le̩ ame̩ are̩ ab o̩wo̩ e̩jaduña oj ane̩ ki ma chʼe-me̩ n.
Me̩ ki dʼe-i ka ef unyi Jeko̩b,
Me̩ gbʼe-i ta, O ame̩nidada, ku me̩ ma nʼibe efu n,
Me̩ railo mi n? Jihofa ka-i;
Amone̩-i muda nʼe̩do̩ agbo̩go̩ kʼi alañu;
Ma la ka ef e̩do̩-ma kakini,
Udu ku me̩ fe̩ fʼe̩wñ-i rida bʼume̩ te̩,
Todu ma fʼame̩ne̩bibi li ef amone̩-mi;
Alu kʼame̩we̩ che̩ko̩ unyi e̩we̩,
ma yoyo, o̩la-ma ade̩.
Omi awa fejudo ma tod e̩wñ-i n? Jihofa ka-i,
E̩wñ awuwu kpʼe̩wñ ugoju
Amakache̩ kache̩ olemi,
Ra tod oji-me̩, O, abo Be̩njamin, kwʼalumeji Je̩rusale̩m!
Nakʼe̩ne̩ ki fe̩reju ki de̩ de̩wu de̩wu le̩,
Amadidala kpʼujo̩ ujo̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-ma awʼugbo-wñ;
Me̩ fʼo̩logu mu nyʼu;
Kwane̩, kʼa te̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩ odu,
Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩, kakini:
Mu kʼomi obuga chʼetito̩ e̩gba du,
O Je̩rusale̩m, e̩ ki je̩ ñw ma kʼuwe̩ o̩la,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini:
E̩ne̩ oñ omi ako̩la ñw u kʼu nagbibenu,
Todule̩ e̩do̩fulu Jihofa che̩ko̩ efumi;
Ma la akʼunyi-ma ñw abo omune̩,
Todu akwʼe̩ne̩ ki nya efu ma gbogbo nyʼe̩ne̩lile ma,
Ma la fʼagbe abo-mi kpa fe̩le̩ fe̩le̩,
Anyo̩ mu ma e̩gba ku ma fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ che?
Abu ku Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Tak u kʼabo ku ma dide jo̩, kakini,
Todule̩ me̩ gbo̩, ame̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi
O ile̩, gbo̩ ke; go, omi akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa bʼoji amone̩-i ma,
Frankinse̩ns ki akwo Shiba wʼugbo mi fa?
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Ma gwo̩nyu o̩o̩do̩ kpai o̩kwo̩,
Awa gbʼinabali-wñ me̩,
Me̩ ki dufu nyʼoko n,
O o̩monobule̩ amone̩-mi, kʼe̩gbanukpo nyʼo̩la,
Omi mʼuwe̩ du tef amone̩-mi kʼe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki añwa ma go kpʼaku,
O̩chaka-ma chʼamagbo̩go̩ e-agbo̩go̩,
Ma chʼobutu nyʼu nana,
Amone̩ ado̩ ma ko̩ iwa ajifa,
O̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
Dago alaku unyi Jihofa, kʼe̩ fʼakoya o̩la-i ta, kakini, Me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa, ame̩ abo Juda chaka, kʼame̩ gudu lʼalaku-i nyʼadojikane̩ ñwu Jihofa.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, kakini, Me̩ ñw o̩na-me̩ kpai uko̩lo̩-me̩ che, tak u naje̩ ñwu me̩ dodo ugbo-i.
Me̩ ki ke̩do̩nʼo̩la olemi, kakini, Unyi Jihofa, unyi Jihofa, unyi Jihofa jo̩-i n.
Todu iche̩wñ ku me̩ ñw o̩na-me̩ kpai uko̩lo̩-me̩ che nyo̩nyo̩; kʼame̩ la che e̩wñ kʼoji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa ka agbagba one̩ kpʼekeji-wñ;
kʼame̩ ma la fʼilowa kpai e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n kpai o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ te̩mane̩ n, ku me̩ ma la dʼe̩bie̩ ki ma nʼudu n dafo ugbo-i n, ku me̩ ma la alule̩ tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi ki chʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ñwu me̩ n;
e̩gba le̩ naje̩ ñwu me̩ dodo ugbo-i, oj ane̩ kʼu du ñw amata-me̩ kwʼigbegbele gbogbo alo.
Go, ame̩ ke̩do̩nʼo̩la olemi, ki ma neke nʼile ñwu me̩ n.
Ame̩ ajoji? ame̩ akpone̩? ame̩ ache̩ño̩ya? ame̩ ago̩ olemi? ame̩ agu otulale jo ñwu Beal? ku me̩ la alule̩ tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼame̩ ma ma ma mama ta n ubi?
tak ame̩ awa dago o̩gba-mi ef unyi ku ma dʼodu-mi mʼo̩-i, ku me̩ kakini, Ma mʼuwa gba me̩, kʼame̩ ki che e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-i du?
Unyi ki de̩ ku ma dʼodu mi mʼo̩ mud owo amadinya eju-me̩? Go, omi de̩, u fʼu li, Jihofa ka-i.
Me̩ hi muda nyʼuña-mi ki te̩te̩de̩ Shailo fai, owñ chʼugbo kʼu dʼodu-mi te̩ e̩gba ejodudu le̩, ku me̩ go e̩wñ kʼu chʼo todu e̩wñ bibi kʼamone̩-mi Israe̩l che.
Fai ge̩, todabu kʼame̩ fʼuko̩lo̩-i chaka che, Jihofa ka-i, kʼu la ko̩la ñwu me̩; kʼu takpa kwane̩ aka, me̩ muda gbo̩ n. U la do̩ me̩, me̩ muda je̩ n.
Todule̩ omi ache unyi ku ma du rʼodu-mi, e-kʼame̩ ke̩do̩no-i, kpai uña kʼu du ñwu me̩ kpʼamata-me̩, alu kʼu che Shailo le̩.
Oñ nako me̩ rikpolo bʼumi eju te̩, alu kʼu kʼamo̩maye-me̩ chaka rikpolo dufu le̩, owñ chʼo̩gbo̩ ugbe̩ Ifraim chaka.
Todule̩ e̩kichʼadua todu amone̩-i n, e̩ ki la chʼomu nyʼate̩, kʼe̩ la chadua todu ma n, e̩ ki la gbo̩ko̩bʼumi n; todu nagbo̩ e̩wñ kʼe̩ ka n.
E̩ li e̩wñ kʼama jʼache ewo ewo Juda, kpai ej o̩na ej o̩na Je̩rusale̩m-i n?
Abimo̩to̩ achʼiji wa, amata-ma la akʼuna, abobule̩ la afʼomu ku ma chʼakala ñw onu onobule̩ e-efojale, ku ma laño̩ dʼomi dafo ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩, kʼama ki bi mi eju.
Omi ma bi eju le̩? Jihofa ka-i. I chʼo̩la-ma kʼeju-ma ki ku e̩bo̩no̩ ma che n?

Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, ma adʼuwe̩do̩-mi kpʼe̩do̩fulu-mi danyʼuña kide̩, abʼoji one̩, kpai abʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, kpai oli oko du, kpai e̩ro ane̩pe̩te̩ ma; i la ajo waa, una-wñ la jʼakpalu n.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ka de̩ kakini, kʼe̩wñ e̩gujo ku me̩ ko wa le̩ manyʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩-me̩, kʼame̩ ki jʼe̩la.
Todu u ko̩la ñw amata-me̩ n, u la ñwa ñwu ma, o̩jo̩ kʼu ko ma kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu, o̩la e̩wñ ekowa gujo kpai iche̩bo̩ eche n.
E̩wñ kʼomi muda ñwa ñwu ma de̩ kakini, Netirʼomu-mi, tak omi achʼO̩jo̩-me̩, oñ ame̩ achʼamone̩-mi. Me̩ ki la lule̩ o̩na du kʼomi añwa ñwu me̩ kʼi ra ñwu me̩.
Ma la nyeti n, ma hi eti-ma wane̩ n, ma muda lule̩ lʼo̩na ibe e-ma ku ma kpe̩ ef e̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-ma ki bie̩ne̩ ñwa, taku ma lʼubiubi, ma le tʼo̩gba n.
Akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼamata-me̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa gbogbo wʼeñini-i, omi te̩takpʼamadu-mi amakache̩ chaka uche̩ rʼume̩; u takpa kwane̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa akpe̩ ma.
Ma muda netirʼumi n kpo̩, ma la hi eti-ma wane̩ n; ma fʼo̩lo̩-ma lo; ma che bie̩ne̩ tʼamata-ma le.
Uwe̩ ki la kʼo̩la-i du ñw ma; ma muda anetirʼuwe̩ n; uwe̩ ki ño̩ do̩ ma udo̩; ma muda aje̩ n.
Uwe̩ la aka ñw ma kakini, Uche̩ichi amone̩ kʼama ma netirʼomu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-ma n-i de̩; ma la agba uko̩-o̩la n: ubi one̩ eche lenyo̩, i la muko̩da bʼalu-ma te̩.
Fʼiloji-we̩ ja kʼe̩ mʼu ko rinyo̩;
Todu amo̩ma Juda fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ che eju-mi me̩, Jihofa ka-i; ma mʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma ko gugu ef unyi ku ma du rʼodu e-mi, ku ma fʼu daji.
Ma ño̩ fʼotete otete Tofe̩t du ge̩, owñ chʼe-ki dʼef o̩go̩ o̩ma Hino̩m, kʼama ki fʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ gujo ef una; omi la ñwʼe-le̩ ñw ma n, i la wʼef e̩do̩-mi n.
Todule̩, go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa ka-i, kʼama ñʼadʼo̩ ko̩ Tofe̩t ge̩ n, kpai o̩go̩ amo̩ma Hino̩m i n, chai O̩go̩ One̩ Ekpa: todu ma akʼoku one̩ ji Tofe̩t, gbogbo taku ma ñʼali uña ge̩ n.
Tak oku amone̩-i achʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩we̩ ojale, kpai tod ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ile̩-i; e̩ne̩ du la anyʼuma okpo kwʼo̩mo̩ n.
E̩gba le̩ naje̩ ñw omu anyi kpai omu e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ kpai omu o̩ko̩ etito̩ kpai omu o̩ya etito̩ ki muda bʼewo ewo Juda te̩, kpai kwo bʼo̩na o̩na Je̩ruaale̩m te̩; todu ane̩ le̩ amud alache̩ te̩.
Iko le̩, Jihofa ka-i, ama akʼachiku amonu Juda kpai achiku amagboji-wñ kpai achiku amatama kpai achiku amakache̩ kpai achiku abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m kwef oji-ma dufu;

taku ma akʼo kpatuka jo̩ ej olu kpai ochu, kpai eju uwewe e̩wñ du ki jʼojale kʼama fe̩do̩ le̩, e-kʼama re̩ le̩, ku ma la te̩tatʼo̩ ubi, kʼama tejane̩-wñ, kʼama la dojikane̩ ñw u le̩: ma ñʼayajo̩ ge̩ n, ma la akʼo ji n, achiku le̩ la akoji echu ebʼeju ile̩-i ma.
Oñ abubo̩ abunyi e̩bie̩ne̩-i ku ma bo̩ ugbo du kʼu ne̩ ma ru le̩ adʼuku akoji iñmi, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Uwe̩ ñʼaka ñw ma ge̩ kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini;
Mak e̩wñ chi kʼabo Je̩rusale̩m-i
Omi neti u ño̩ gbo̩,
Ochochi, utu ki awu ojale
Abile ku ma ka kakini, Awa chenʼibe,
Anyo̩ mu amanibe,
Todule̩ omi akʼamo̩ya-ma ñw abomune̩
Ma fʼagbe omonobule̩ amone̩-mi kpa fe̩le̩ fe̩le̩,
Anyo̩ mʼuma e̩gba ku ma fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ che le̩?
Nafʼuma lie̩ hioko, Jihofa ka-i,
E̩wñ chi kʼa guguane̩ ofo?
Awa neju ure̩do̩, e̩nyo̩ du la wa n,
Iñmo̩ kʼamanya-wñ abu Dan, ma gbo̩ emi;
Todu, go, omi akpe̩ amejo
O, i ma nʼe̩wñ kʼu ne̩ nyʼo̩la-mi e̩do̩ kʼu we echʼe̩do̩dudu!
Gbo̩! omu ukwa omonobule̩ abo-mi
Ewo e̩wñ oko eko wʼunyi le me̩, o̩lo̩ji lale me̩,
Tod agbe ku ma che o̩monobule̩ abo-mi, omi ma chʼo,
Ekpo agbe de̩ Gilead ge̩ n?
Aya, oji-mi ma chʼomiofo,
O, omi ma nʼuru abelo̩na
Ma fʼukpalu-ma fa todu olemi dabe̩ne̩ kʼi chʼo̩o̩do̩;
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki fʼo̩la mu tod ekeji-wñ,
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma la akʼekeji-wñ ru,
Odo-we̩ dʼo̩ge̩ge̩de̩ e̩wñ akpaine̩,
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini:
Ukpalu-ma chʼo̩fa kʼi akpʼone̩;
Omi awa fejudo ma tod e̩wñ-i n? Jihofa ka-i;
Naraku, nadinaku tod uwo uwo-i,
Omi la adu Je̩rusale̩m chʼugbudu ugbudu jo̩,
E̩ne̩ chʼanibe kʼi amʼoji e̩wñ-i? e̩ne̩ oñ alu Jihofa ko̩la ñw u, kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ki ka dufu? E̩wñ chi kʼane̩-i kpabie̩, kʼi jo rinyo̩ dab aje̩tachi, kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ñʼalale gu ef uwñ du ge̩ n?
Oñ Jihofa kakini, Todabu ku ma hi uko̩-o̩la-mi kʼu ko̩ jʼo̩gba-ma le̩ tinyo̩, ku ma ma gbʼomu-mi gbo̩ n, ma la lule̩ tikpa-wñ n.
Chai alu kʼe̩do̩-ma chʼagbo̩go̩ oñ ma lule̩ tikpa-wñ, ma la tʼamiBeal ubi, alu kʼamata-ma ko̩ ma le̩.
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ka de̩ kakini, Go, omi adʼo̩ge̩le̩ chʼuje̩wñ ma, oñ nadʼomi ololo ñw ma ñmo̩, owñ chʼamone̩-i.
U ñʼakpa ma tuka rʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi e-kʼama kpʼamata-ma ma ma ma ni ge̩; tak u nakʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpe̩ tʼuma ubi, gbogbo tak u fʼuma lie̩ kpa.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini:
ama ki hiane̩ wa ku ma dinaku todu wa,
Todu ma gbo̩ omu ukwa abo Zayo̩n:
Me̩ ki muda gbʼomu Jihofa, O ame̩ abobule̩,
Todu uku lewa alu ope-wa me̩,
E̩ ki ka kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Anibe kʼi je̩nyu ibe-wñ n, agbiti kʼi la je̩nyu agbiti-wñ n, anana kʼi la je̩nyu anana-wñ n.

Ama e̩ne̩ ki aje̩nyu ñw e̩wñ, e̩wñ kʼi aje̩nyʼu de̩ kakini, Owñ chʼemoji e̩wñ, i la fʼumi ma, ka kʼomi che Jihofa kʼu nache e̩wñ lʼo̩na ufe̩de̩nyo̩, kpai alu kʼoji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa aka kpai o̩kpakpa ile̩-i: todu ef e̩wñ-i oñ uyo̩-mi de̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa aka-i, kʼomi abʼudu ñw abo du kʼe̩pi-ma chʼe̩da ku ma muda dʼef e̩wñ e̩pi odukulu-mata:

Ijipti kpai Juda kpai Ido̩m kpai amo̩ma Amo̩n kpai Moab kpai abo du ku ma be̩ o̩wo̩ meji eji ilagba-ma, ku ma dodo ef aje̩tachi le̩; todu abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du la dʼe̩pi n, oñ abo unyi Juda chaka la chʼabo e̩pi odukulu ef e̩do̩-ma.
Me̩ gbo̩ o̩la ki Jihofa aka ñw me̩, ame̩ abunyi Israe̩l.
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
todu e̩wñ o̩hio̩gu amone̩ du ku ma che chʼo̩wai.
Ama kʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia cho̩ñwe̩ nyʼu,
I dab oli ku ma du gwʼanyane̩ ku ma kʼina nyʼu ofo,
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki dab uwe̩ n, O Jihofa;
E̩ne̩ do̩mo̩ ki ma arailo we̩ n? O Onu abo uche̩ichi?
Ma muda dab ame̩la chaka, ma nʼibe n;
I nʼajifa ku ma gwu kpe̩te̩ke̩ ku ma ko kwo Tarshish wa,
Jihofa muda chʼO̩jo̩ ogbolo;
Alu kʼuwe̩ aka ñw ma de̩ kakini, Amo̩jo̩ ku ma ma che efojale kpʼane̩ ile̩-i n, abo-i alenyo̩ bʼane̩-ile̩ te̩, kpʼakwʼo̩gane̩ efojale-i te̩ ge̩.
Owñ-i nʼukpahiu-wñ che ane̩-ile̩-i,
I mʼomu-wñ chi, ekuku omi jʼefojale,
E̩ne̩ du dab e̩la, ma ma e̩wñ du n;
O̩wai i che, uko̩lo̩ ako̩ru i che;
Ukpe̩ e-Jeko̩b la dab abo-i n,
Fʼadu-we̩ kpama bʼane̩-i te̩,
Todu abu ku Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Atogwo, ekpa ku ma kpa mi!
Unyabo-mi mukpabie̩,
Todu amadide le̩ dab ame̩la me̩,
Omuko̩la inabali! Go, i awa!—
O Jihofa, u chema ka kʼo̩na one̩ dʼef owñ onugo n,
E̩ ko̩ mi o̩la, O Jihofa, e̩ muda che alu kʼoj ajo̩ kʼe̩ dute̩ ka;
Mʼuke̩do̩fulu-we̩ ko danyʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma ma mʼuwe̩ n oji,
O̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
Ame̩ ki gbʼo̩la alo-i, kʼe̩ la ko̩la ñw aboke̩le̩ Juda kpai abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m,
kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ka de̩ kakini, Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du ki ma adʼo̩la alo-i n,

owñ chʼe-kʼu ñwa ñw amata-me̩ o̩jo̩ kʼu ko ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti kwʼef aido ebije le̩ wa, kakini, Me̩ ki gbʼomu-mi gbo̩, ku me̩ che teju alu du kʼu nañwa ñwu me̩; abe̩le̩ tak ame̩ achʼamone̩-mi, oñ omi achʼO̩jo̩-me̩;
kʼu fʼego̩ kʼu go̩ ñw amata-me̩ lonyane̩, kʼu kʼane̩ ugbo kʼomi e̩nya kpʼomi iño̩ acha ef uwñ ñwu ma, alu ki de̩ eñini-i. Tak u dohi kakini. Ami, O Jihofa.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ fʼakoya o̩la-i du ta ewo ewo Juda, kpai ej o̩na o̩na Je̩rusale̩m, kakini, Me̩ gbʼo̩la alo-i, ku me̩ che.
Todu u fʼamata-me̩ eti kpaka o̩jo̩ kʼu ko ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa gbogbo tʼeñini, u takpa takpa kwane̩ afʼuma eti kakini, Me̩ gbʼomu-mi gbo̩.

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma gbagbo̩ n, ma la hi eti-ma wane̩ n, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma muda lule̩ ef agbo̩go̩ e̩do̩-ma ki bie̩ne̩; todule̩ oñ u mʼo̩la alo-i du ko wa abʼuma ma, owñ chʼe-kʼu ñwa ñwu ma ku ma che ku ma ma che n.
Taku Jihofa ño̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, U cheli abu kʼaboke̩le̩ Juda kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m jʼalu me̩,
ma mudabi tef udu efe̩ e-amata-ma, ku ma ko̩ egbʼo̩la-mi le̩; ma le nyʼatʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi ku ma re̩ ma. Abunyi Israe̩l kpʼabunyi Juda fʼalo-mi kʼu kpe̩ kpʼamata-ma bie̩.
Todule̩, abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ku ma ma neke fʼo̩ o̩wo̩ n wa abʼuma ma. Tak ama araku do̩ mi, u muda anetirʼuma n.
Tak ewo ewo Juda kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m anyʼaraku do̩ amo̩jo̩ ku ma gu otulale jo ñwu ma le̩. Ma muda ajadu ma re iko o̩bata-ma n.

Todu amo̩jo̩-me̩ wewe alu kʼewo ewo-me̩ wewe, O Juda. Oñ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku me̩ ne ñw e̩wñ anyo̩ la wewe alu kʼo̩na o̩na Je̩rusale̩m wewe, owñ chʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ugbo ku me̩ agu otulale jo ñwu Beal le̩.
Todule̩ uwe̩ ki chadua ñw amone̩-i n. E̩ ki chʼomu ukwa n, kpai adua todu ma n, todu omi agbo̩ e̩gba ku ma raku do̩ mi iko o̩bata-ma n.
Todu ugbo e̩ne̩ kʼomi afe̩do̩ le̩ nʼo̩na kʼi atʼef unyi-mi, abu kʼi fʼe̩wñ omefa-i che? O̩re̩la kiafo̩ le̩ neke kpʼo̩na nyʼo̩bata-we̩ ki awa? Uwe̩ neke gwoye e̩gba le̩ ge̩?
Jihofa dʼuwe̩ ko̩ Oli O̩lif Emimi, e̩ chʼuto̩ eju e̩ro-we̩ la nyo̩: i muda nʼekuku afu ibi kʼuna nyʼu, e̩to̩-wñ la guche̩ rinyo̩.
Todu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi dʼuwe̩ gbe̩, tʼojomu-wñ ka kʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ake̩re̩bʼe̩, tod e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ kʼabo unyi Israe̩l kpʼabunyi Juda che ñw o̩la-ma, owñ chʼotulale egujo ñwu Beal ku ma biʼumi eju.
Jihofa la je̩ ñw mi ma tak u fʼu ma;
Omi muda dab o̩mala ki de̩ yo̩o̩
Ama, uwe̩ O Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼe̩ kajo̩ tʼo̩kpakpa,
Todule̩ abu ku Jihofa ka ugbo aboke̩le̩ Anato̩t ku ma tene oji-we̩, ku ma kakini, Uwe̩ ki kache̩ ef odu Jihofa n, cho̩kpo̩ni o̩wo̩-wa adʼe̩ kpa.
Todule̩ abu ku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi abʼudu ñw ma; o̩kwo̩chageli akʼabokolobia-ma kpa, o̩kpo̩ta la kpa amo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩;
ma abo̩ n. Todu omi akʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ wa abʼoji aboke̩le̩ Anato̩t ma, owñ chʼo̩do̩ udu-ma ebu ñw ma.
Uwe̩ chʼo̩kpakpa, O Jihofa, e̩gba kʼu kʼomu-mi ñw e̩;
Uwe̩ ko ma gbe̩, ma la fʼili nyʼane̩;
Uwe̩, O Jihofa, muda ma mi;
Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ ane̩-i adaido̩ kade,
Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ bʼabo ku ma nʼe̩re̩ ofo fule kʼi la fʼe̩ hia,
Todu i chaka chʼamo̩maye-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼabunyi ata-we̩,
Omi hi unyi-mi tinyo̩,
E̩wñ ogu-mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼidu efoko ñw mi;
E̩wñ ogu-mi dab e̩we̩ adike̩ke̩ kʼi amʼe̩la je̩?
Amadidala wewe fʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-mi kpabie̩,
Ma mʼu du chʼalache̩,
Amakpʼe̩wñ bie̩ lewa
Ma dʼo̩ka gbe̩, ikeke ma ja wʼunyi;

Abu ki Jihofa ka bʼabo e̩bie̩ne̩ du ku ma dodo kpenyʼumi ma, ku ma la i do̩wo̩kado e̩wñ ogu kʼu je̩ ñw abo-mi Israe̩l ku ma je̩, kakini, Go, omi amʼuma chi kwo bʼane̩-ma te̩, oñ nachi abunyi Juda bʼef uma te̩.
Tak a bu kʼu fʼuma chi, u ñʼadabi ali ma ejumo-mi, oñ nako ma dabiwa, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ awʼugbo e̩wñ ogu-wñ, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la awʼugbo ane̩-wñ.
I la chʼe̩wñ kʼama ache̩do̩chacha o̩na o̩na abo-mi eko̩che̩, ku ma fʼodu mi go̩ kakini, Oji Jihofa, alu kʼama ko̩ abo-mi ku ma fu Beal go̩ le̩, mak ama anʼo̩la-ma nyo̩gba alumeji abo-mi le̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼabo uche̩ichiʼka ko̩ egbo̩, mak omi amʼu chi tʼe̩te̩ tʼe̩te̩ kʼu fʼu kpabie̩, Jihofa aka-i.
Abu ki Jihofa ka ñwu mi de̩ kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ fʼukpo ulago line̩n oka la, kʼe̩ mʼu ko lʼago-we̩, e̩ ki dʼu tunyʼomi n.
Abe̩le̩, u fʼukpo ulago la, alu kʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka, oñ u mʼu ko lʼago-mi.
Tak o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi onukeji, kakini
Mʼukpo ulago kʼe̩ la le̩ ko, owñ chʼe-ki dʼago we̩, kʼe̩ kwane̩, kʼe̩ nyʼeti Yufretis, kʼe̩ mʼu ko maja ef e̩kpana okuta o̩mo̩.
Abe̩le̩ u le, oñ u mʼu ko maja eti Yufretis, alu ki Jihofa ñwa ñwu mi.
Abu ki nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ wewe Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ nyʼeti Yufretis, kʼe̩ mʼukpo ulago kʼu ñwa ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ko maja o̩mo̩ ko.
Tak u le tʼeti Yufretis, oñ u mʼu du gwadufu, u mʼe̩wñ ulago le̩ ko kwʼugbo kʼu du maja te̩. E̩ la go, ukpo ulago le̩ mukpabie̩; i nyo̩ e̩wñ du n.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini:
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Abe̩le̩ oñ omi akpʼuba Juda kpai uba inaina e-Je̩rusale̩m bie̩.

Amone̩ e̩bie̩ne̩-i, ku ma ko̩ egbʼo̩la-mi, ku ma chʼagbo̩go̩ ku ma tʼe̩do̩-ma onugo ubi, ku ma le teketʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi, ku ma re̩ ma ku ma ño̩ dojikane̩ ñwu ma, ama adab ukpo ulago kʼi ma nyo̩ e̩wñ du n-i.

Todu alu kʼukpo ulago alamo̩ ago one̩, abe̩le̩ oñ omi che kʼo̩gbo̩ abunyi Israe̩l du kpʼo̩gbo̩ abunyi Juda du kʼu ma lamʼumi, Jihofa ka-i, todu kʼama ki chʼamone̩ kpai odu kpai uñwulo̩ kpai ojima ñwu mi; ma muda nyeti n.
Todule̩ o̩la kʼuwe̩ aka ñw ma de̩ kakini, Abu ku Jihofa. O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ka de̩ kakini, Aiko du ako̩ ñw omi achiwebe̩te̩ma; taku ma aka ñw e̩ kakini, Awa ma ka kʼaiko du ako̩ ñw omi achiwebe̩te̩ma n?

E̩gbale̩ uwe̩ aka ñw ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, omi akʼo̩te̩ emu danyʼe̩ne̩ du ki dodo ane̩-i efu e̩ko̩, tʼamonu ku ma gugu ede Defid, tʼamatama, tʼamakache̩, tʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m chaka.
Oñ nako ma fiʼomune̩, amata kpai amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ manyʼomune̩, Jihofa ka-i. Omi ali uma eju n, nachʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ n, nali ejumomi n, todu kʼu kpa ma bie̩.
Me̩ gbo̩, me̩ netiru; me̩ ki ke n,
Me̩ dʼojima ñw Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩,
Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ ma muda gbo̩ n,
E̩ ka ñw onu kpai iye onu kakini:
Ewo ewo o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ fʼo̩na re me̩,
Me̩ chi eju-me̩ nyʼate̩ ku me̩ go
E̩gba ku ma kʼabo kʼuwe̩ onugo ko̩ ma ku ma chʼamonuku-we̩ chʼamagboji-we̩,
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ ka ef e̩do̩-we̩ kakini,
E̩ne̩ Itio̩pia neke dʼaño̩-wñ kpailo̩ omune̩?
Omi akpʼuma tuka dab igbogbo
Ukpe̩ e-we̩ de̩,
Todule̩ omi onugo adʼeti ukpo-we̩ kwane̩ abʼuwe̩ eju ma,
U fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ li me̩,
O̩la Jihofa ki wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya lugbo omi ki ma lo̩ n le̩ de̩ kakini:
Juda adaido̩,
Ame̩nojima-wñ akpʼabuko̩lo̩-ma nyʼakpʼomiofo wa;
Todu ane̩ ki muda koi koi,
I chaka chʼe̩la abikolo oko, i ahi o̩ma ki bi e̩bie̩ e̩bie̩ tinyo̩
Amo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ oko dago jʼotete otete kʼoji-wñ chʼo̩kpakpala,
Dagba udu kʼa fe̩ gbʼibenu nyʼuwa,
O uwe̩, kʼe̩ chʼukibeno Israe̩l,
Abile kʼuwe̩ adab e̩ne̩ kʼawuwu fu mu,
E̩wñ ki Jihofa aka ñw amone̩-i de̩ kakini;
Oñ Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, E̩ ki chadua kʼi ra ñw amone̩-i n.
E̩gba ku me̩ ji alu, omi agbʼukwa-ma n; e̩gba ku ma kʼe̩wñ wa agujo, kpai e̩wñ ele wa, omi agba ma n; u muda anʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpʼo̩kpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ ibi fʼuma lie̩.
Tak u kakini, Aya, Ondu Jihofa, Go, amakache̩ naka ñw ma kakini, E̩ju-me̩ aleli o̩kwo̩chageli n, o̩kpo̩ta la akpa me̩ n, omi muda adʼure̩do̩ ogbolo ñw me̩ ugbo-i.

Taki Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, Olemi oñ amakache̩ jʼakache̩ ef odu-mi le̩; i chʼomi kpʼuma uche̩ n, omi la ñwa ñw ma n, u la ko̩la ñw ma n. Ane̩ ego e-olemi oñ ma jʼakache̩ ñw me̩ le̩, ifa ibe̩te̩ ma bo̩ le̩, ibe eda e-ma oñ ma ka ñw me̩ le̩.

Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa aka ugbo amakache̩ kʼomi ma chaka kpʼuma uche̩ n, ku ma kache̩ ef odu-mi, kakini, O̩kwo̩chageli kpʼo̩kpo̩ta awʼoj ane̩-i n kakini, O̩kwo̩-chageli kpʼo̩kpo̩ta afʼamakache̩ le̩ lie̩.

Oñ ma akʼamone̩ ku ma kache̩ ñw ma le̩ rikpolo jʼej o̩na ej o̩na Je̩rusale̩m, nojʼo̩kpo̩ta kpʼo̩kwo̩chageli le̩; i la anʼe̩ne̩ du ki ako ma ji n—tʼama, tʼamo̩ya-ma, tʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼamo̩ma-ma onobule̩. Todu omi akʼe̩wñ bibi-ma danyʼuma oji.
Uwe̩ akʼo̩la-i ñw ma kakini;
U dufu nyʼoko,
Uwe̩ fu Juda hi tinyo̩ pioo?
Awa agbalu e̩wñ bibi-wa, O Jihofa,
E̩ ki che̩de̩te̩ wa n, tod odu e-we̩;
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ef amibe̩te̩ olemi e-abo uche̩ichi ku ma neke je̩ ñw omi lo̩?
Taku Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, Dagba Mose̩s kpai Samue̩l dago o̩gba-mi-i, e̩do̩-mi ma rida tʼugbo amone̩-i n. Je̩ ñw ma kwo bʼumi eju te̩, e̩ la tʼuma no̩ ku ma lo!
Oñ e̩gba ku ma tʼuwe̩ ene kakini, Ugbo a anyi? E̩gbale̩ uwe̩ aka ñw ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Omi akʼame̩wñ me̩le̩ wa nʼo̩da ma, Jihofa ka-i; o̩kwo̩chageli ki kpa ma amabia ku ma fʼuma fana, oñ ame̩we̩ ojale kpʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ile̩ kʼama ki ko ma je̩ ku ma la ko ma kpabie̩.
Omi la aje̩ ñw ma chʼe̩wñ ku ma ño̩ alo tʼemi tʼemi ojane̩ ojane̩ ile̩-i du, tod e̩wñ ku Manasa, o̩ma He̩ze̩kaya, onu Juda, che Je̩rusale̩m.
E̩ne̩ alʼuwe̩ ejumomi, O Je̩rusale̩m?
Uwe̩ hi umi tinyo̩ me̩, Jihofa aka-i,
Omi nʼo̩da fʼuma fe̩
Omi je̩ ñw amo̩ya ukuo̩ko̩-ma ku ma wewe
O̩la e̩ne̩ ki fʼo̩ma mebie bi muda,
Atogwo chʼe-mi, iye-mi, abu kʼuwe̩ fʼumi bi kʼu chʼe̩ne̩ uja kpʼe̩ne̩ aida ñw o̩gbo̩ ane̩-i du! U me̩ e̩wñ ñw one̩ n, one̩ la me̩ e̩wñ ñw mi n, o̩chaka ma muda abʼumi na.
Jihofa kakini, Ochochi, omi adʼo̩bata ñw e̩ kʼi chʼe̩nyo̩ ñw e̩; ochochi naje̩ ñw e̩nebi le̩ ki gbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩ iko e̩bie̩ne̩ kpai iko o̩bata.
Ebije jʼaguche̩? ebije ki kwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩? kpai ebije-ikpa?
Nakʼidu-we̩ kpʼe̩wñ akoko-we̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩, i nʼo̩me̩ era n, todu adure-we̩ chaka ugbo du ef alo̩me̩-we̩.
U la aje̩ ñw ma lale bʼame̩nebi-we̩ tʼoj ane̩ kʼe̩ ma ma n, todu una chʼeko te̩ ef uwe̩do̩-mi ki a jo bʼume̩ ma.
O Jihofa, uwe̩ chema;
Ma fʼo̩la-we̩ li, oñ omi mʼu ko je̩,
U gugu ef ujeju abo ku ma chiya n, u la gwoye n;
E̩wñ chi kʼiwo̩-mi ma nʼuda n?
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Tak u naje̩ ñw e̩ chʼaku ebijekpa ñw amone̩-i;
Nagbʼe̩ bʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩ne̩bibi te̩,
O̩la Jihofa wʼugbo-mi kakini,
Uwe̩ ki nʼo̩ya n, e̩ la anʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k o̩ma onobule̩ ugbo-i n.
Todu e̩wñ ki Jihofa aka ugbo amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ ku ma bi ugbo-i, kpai ugbo amiye ki bi ma kpʼamata ki bi ma oj ane̩-i de̩, kakini,

Ma aku uku o̩ga. Ma araku ma n, ma la ako ma ji n; ma adab echu bʼane̩pe̩te̩ ma. Ma alenyo̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli kpʼo̩kpo̩ta; oku-ma la achʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩we̩ ojale, kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ane̩-ile̩-i.

Todu abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Uwe̩ ki gudu tef unyi ugbo ku ma deku n; e̩ ki kʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩ n, e̩ ki la kwaliwo̩ ma n; todu omi mʼure̩do̩-mi du bʼamone̩-i te̩ me̩, owñ chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-mi kpʼejumomi-mi, Jihofa ka-i.
Tʼabo lile, tʼabo kekele aku oj ane̩-i; ma ako ma ji n, i la anʼe̩ne̩ du ki adʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩ todu ma n, abe̩k efʼo̩la-wñ na n, abe̩k oji ela todu ma n.
One̩ añwʼuje̩wñ che ñw abo ku ma adaido̩ kʼi nyʼu ma e̩do̩ tod abo-ma ki ku le̩ n; e̩ne̩ du la adʼago e̩wñ unyi e̩do̩ ñw u ma ku ma ñmo̩ tod ata-ma kpʼiye-ma n.
Uwe̩ la anyʼef unyi okuje̩wñ uyo̩ kʼe̩ guane̩ kpʼama kʼe̩ je̩ kʼe̩ ñmo̩ n.

Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, ki chʼO̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi aje̩ ñw omuko̩la iya kpai omuko̩la e̩do̩-e̩bo̩ kpʼomuko̩la o̩ko̩ya etito̩ kpʼomuko̩la o̩ya tito̩ ki we ugbo-i, eju-we̩ iko-we̩-i.
Oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-i du ka ñw amone̩-i ku ma la aka ñw e̩ kakini, E̩wñ chi ki Jihofa ka e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩-i du nyʼuwa oji ta? Udu e̩wñ a fe̩? E̩wñ chʼedure kʼa du Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa re?

Tak uwe̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, Todu abu kʼamata-me̩ hi umi tinyo̩, Jihofa aka-i, ku ma la kwotʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi, ka ma la re̩ ma, ma laño̩ dojikane̩ ñwu ma, ku ma la hi umi tinyo̩, ku ma ma de uko̩-o̩la-mi n,
todabu kʼame̩ ño̩ che bie̩ne̩ tʼamata-me̩ le ge̩, todu go, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne-me̩ atʼe̩do̩-wñ ki chʼagbo̩go̩ ki bie̩ne̩ ubi ku me̩ ko̩ enetirʼumi.
Todule̩ omi ako me̩ rikpolo bʼoj ane̩-i te̩ tʼoj ane̩ ugbo kʼame̩ kpʼamata-me̩ ma ma n, o̩mo̩ ame̩ la are̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩ tʼodu tʼo̩ro̩ka, todu omi ali me̩ eju n.
Todule̩ Jihofa kakini. Go, iko-wñ awa e̩gba ku ma ma ñʼaka kakini, Oji Jihofa, kʼi ko abo Israe̩l kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti le̩ wa, ge̩ n,
chai ma akakini, Oji Jihofa kʼi kʼabo Israe̩l kwʼoj ane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, kpai akwʼoj ane̩ ugbo du kʼi ne ma ru le̩, tak u nako ma dabi wa ane̩ e-ma e-kʼu du ñw amata-ma le̩.
Go, nakpʼuche̩ akʼamekwuji wa-i, tak ama amu ma, Jihofa ka-i; ubi le̩ tak u nakpʼuche̩ akʼamajo̩de̩ wewe wa, tak ama achʼajo̩de̩ ma akw oj uwo du kpʼotete du kpʼe̩kpana okuta du.
Todu eju-mi tʼo̩na o̩na-ma du; ama maja ñw eju mi n, udu kʼama fe̩ la maja ñw eju-mi n.
Ejodudu nadʼakoji ñw ma tod udu ku ma fe̩ kpʼadure-ma onu meji, todabu ku ma nʼoku e̩wñ e̩de̩te̩-ma fʼane̩-mi daji, ma la je̩ ñw e̩wñ ogu-mi ki che̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma.
O Jihofa, ukpahiu-mi kpʼaku-mi,
One̩ neke che amo̩jo̩ ñw o̩la-wñ?
Todule̩ omi aje̩ ñw ma ma, onu ʼkate-i oñ naje̩ ñw ma ma ukpahiu-mi kpʼugbiti-mi, tak ama ama ka kʼodu-mi ko̩ Jihofa.
Ma nʼiko̩ ebije ko̩ adure e-Juda; ma nʼalu okuta daimo̩nd ko̩ nyʼalo e̩do̩-ma kpʼo̩la igba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-ma,
abu kʼamo̩ma-ma jʼachurewa ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ma kpʼAshe̩rim-ma, e̩tʼoli emimi ki jʼoj otete otete ki gbo̩gba.
O, uwo-mi oko le̩, nakʼidu-we̩ kpʼe̩wñ akoko-we̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩ kpʼotete otete-we̩ ki gbo̩gba le̩ tod adure kʼi dʼugbo du oj ane̩-we̩ du.
Uwe̩ atʼo̩wo̩-we̩ bʼe̩wñ ogu-we̩ kʼu ko ñw e̩ le̩ te̩ o̩to̩to̩la-we̩, oñ naje̩ ñw e̩ re̩ ame̩nebi-we̩ oj ane̩ kʼe̩ ma ma n, todu me̩ fʼuna ko ef uwe̩do̩-mi kʼi ajo ogbegbele̩.
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
I dab etutu o̩go̩ uwo o̩go̩ o̩kpe̩,
E̩ne̩ ki ke̩do̩no Jihofa gbede,
I dab oli ku ma du gbe̩ o̩lʼomi omi,
E̩do̩ one̩ mugo̩ tʼe̩wñ du le,
Omi, Jihofa, atejane̩ ef e̩do̩ one̩,
Dab agbailo ki ade oj e̩ge̩ ki ma chʼowñ nyi n,
Ede ojima ku ma du gugu atate̩ kwʼabakwane̩
O Jihofa, kʼe̩ chʼukibeno Israe̩l,
Fʼo̩ga-mi che, O Jihofa, tak o̩ga-mi atakpa;
Go, ma ka ñw mi kakini,
I muda chʼe-mi, u naju ekwo bʼide ala ede te̩ kʼu tʼe̩ ubi n,
uwe̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ubailo ñw mi n;
E̩ ki je̩ ñw anyo̩ mu abo ku ma doli mi,
Abu ki Jihofa ka ñwu mi de̩ kakini, Lo kʼe̩ dago alaku amo̩ma amone̩ le̩, ugbo kʼamonu Juda aguduwa kpai ugbo ku ma ale dufu, kpai alaku alaku Je̩rusale̩m chaka,
kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa, ame̩, amonu Juda kpʼabo Juda chaka, kpʼabo ku me̩ dodo Je̩rusale̩m chaka, ku me̩ gudu lalaku, alaku-i;
abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, Me̩ nago tod oji-me̩, me̩ ki la nʼadu o̩jo̩ uñmi n, me̩ ki la nʼe̩ wa lʼalaku alaku Je̩rusale̩m-i n.
Me̩ ki la nʼadu kwef unyi-me̩ dufu o̩jo̩ uñmi n, me̩ ki la chʼuko̩lo̩ du n, me̩ ki muda fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi de ki fo̩, alu kʼomi ñwa ñw amata-me̩ le̩.
Ma muda netirʼu n, ma la hi eti wane̩ n, chai o̩lo̩-ma ma lo dago, kʼama ki we egbo̩, ku ma we egba uko̩-o̩la.
I muda che̩wñ kʼame̩ anetirʼumi ogbolo, Jihofa ka-i, ku me̩ ma la dʼadu du wa lʼalaku alaku ewo ewo-i o̩jo̩ uñmi n, ku me̩ muda ade o̩jo̩ uñmi ki fo̩, ku me̩ ma la chʼuko̩lo̩ du o̩jo̩ le̩ n,

mak amonu ku ma agugu oj ede Defid, ku ma atʼo̩ko̩ ane̩ kpai eta nʼanya, tʼama tʼamagboji-ma, tʼaboke̩le̩ Juda kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m, agudu wʼalaku alaku ewo-i; oñ amone̩ adodo ewo-i ogbegbele̩.

Amone̩ la akwo ewo ewo Juda wa, kpai adogbe adogbe ki le Je̩rusale̩m daka-i, kpai akwo ane̩ Be̩njamin, akwo She̩fela, kpai akwo ane̩ uwo, kpai akwo ane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, ku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ki bo̩, kpai e̩wñ ele kpai frankinse̩ns, kpai e̩wñ eko-wa ku ma gwugwa wʼunyi Jihofa-i.

I muda che̩wñ ku me̩ ma anetirʼumi ku me̩ ma fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi de kʼi fo̩ n, ku me̩ ma la we enʼadu gudu lʼalaku alaku-i wa Je̩rusale̩m o̩jo̩ uñmi n, maku nafʼu na ko alaku-wñ alaku-wñ-i, oñ e-le̩ ako unyi ojima Je̩rusale̩m mi; i akpalu n.
O̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
Kwane̩, kʼe̩ gwo̩ru nyʼunyi abucha le̩, o̩mo̩ tak u naje̩ ñw e̩ gbʼo̩la-mi.
Abe̩le̩ omi gwo̩ru nyʼunyi abucha le̩, oñ i nʼuko̩lo̩-wñ ache ef anade-wñ o̩mo̩.
Oñ e̩wñ eku kʼabucha nʼama abo le̩ mukpabie̩ nyʼu o̩wʼo̩; tak i dabi nʼama le̩ bʼe̩wñ eku omune̩ ojoji, alu ki rʼabucha le̩ eju kʼi che.
E̩gba le̩ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo-mi, kakini,
O, abo unyi Israe̩l, omi neke che kpʼame̩ alu kʼabucha-i che n? Jihofa ka-i. Me̩ go, alu kʼama de̩ ef o̩wo̩ abucha, abe̩le̩ ame̩ de̩ ef o̩wo̩-mi, O abunyi Israe̩l.
Iche̩wñ kʼu ka o̩la abo uche̩ichiʼka abe̩k ojane̩ʼka achigili ka kʼu nawʼu rinyo̩, kʼu nakpʼo̩ fo̩, kʼu fʼu kpabie̩ rinyo̩,
i la che̩wñ kʼabo uche̩ichi e-kʼu nʼo̩la-ma aka le̩ rida bʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩-ma te̩, mak e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼibe-mi ka ñwu mi kʼu che ma le̩ awo̩ mi.
I la che̩wñ kʼi nʼadiko kʼu nanʼo̩la abo uche̩ichiʼka abe̩k ojane̩ʼka aka kʼomi akʼo̩, kʼu la agbe̩,
i la che̩wñ ku ma che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju-mi, ku ma ma la gbʼomu-mi gbo̩ n, mak e̩nyo̩ kʼu ka kʼu nache ñwu ma awo̩ mi ge̩.

Fa-i, todule̩, e̩ naka ñw aboke̩le̩ Juda kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m, kakini, Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi do̩mo̩ añwa e̩bie̩ne̩ nyʼume̩, ibeʼka u do̩mo̩ añwa nyʼume̩. Mudabi wa, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki mudabi bʼo̩na e̩bie̩ne̩-wñ te̩, ku me̩ ñwʼo̩na-me̩ kpʼuko̩lo̩-me̩ che.
Me̩ muda kakini, E-le̩ nʼo̩na n! Awa atʼe̩wñ kʼa ñw ibe-wñ ubi, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ wa ache teju agbo̩go̩ e̩do̩-wñ ki bie̩ne̩.
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini;
Sno e-Le̩bano̩n akwo
Todu abo-mi gbenyo̩ mi me̩,
ku ma je̩ ñw ane̩-ma mud e̩wñ ugoju,
Alu kʼafu olodudu ache le̩, abe̩le̩ omi akpʼuma tuka

Taku ma kakini, Lewa kʼa ñwa Je̩re̩maya e̩ñwa, todu uko̩-o̩la la atakpa rʼamatama efu n, ohi o̩la la atakpa rʼamanibe efu n, o̩la la atakpa rʼamakache̩ efu n. Lewa, kʼa nʼukpalu-wa kpʼo̩, kʼa la we enyʼo̩la-wñ du eti.
Nyʼumi eti, O Jihofa,
ma adʼe̩bie̩ne̩ chʼuro̩me̩ e̩nyo̩?
Todu e̩ nakʼamo̩ma-ma jo̩ ñw o̩kpo̩ta;
Ukwa ki dago unyi unyi-ma,
O Jihofa, e̩ muda ma
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini. Lo, kʼe̩ la ugege abuchaʼka, kʼe̩ mʼabogijo amone̩-i iche̩ka kpʼamatama ogijo iche̩ka ko,
kʼe̩ dufu nyʼef o̩go̩ Be̩n Hinno̩m, kʼi me̩rʼalaku Anade, kʼe̩ fʼakoya o̩la kʼu naka ñw e̩ ta o̩mo̩.

Uwe̩ akakini, Me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa, ame̩, amonu Juda kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m. Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l aka de̩ kakini, Go, u nanʼe̩bie̩ne̩ awa bʼuña-i ma kʼi aje̩ ñw eti e̩ne̩ du ki gbʼinabali-wñ achʼo kpoo.

Todabu ku ma hi umi tinyo̩, ku ma la mʼugbo-i du chʼe̩wñ ejaduña ku ma la nʼotulale egujo ef uwñ ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼama kpʼamata-ma kpʼamonu Juda ma la ma ma n; ma la je̩ ñw uña-i ki che̩ko̩ ñw e̩bie̩ e-abo ku ma ma fʼudu n.
Ma laño̩ fʼotete otete Beal du jo̩ ku ma gu amo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ jo ef una ku ma mud e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñwu Beal, e-kʼomi ma ñwa ñwu ma n, u la ka n, i wʼewʼef ibe-mi n;
todule̩, e̩ go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa aka-i, ku ma ma ñʼado̩ uña-i ko̩ Tofe̩t ge̩ n, abe̩k O̩go̩ Be̩n Hinno̩m in, chai O̩go̩ One̩ Ekpa.

Omi la akʼo̩la ki Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m lo ef uña-i chʼofofo, oñ naje̩ ñwu ma wane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli rʼo̩gba ame̩nebi-ma, kpai lʼo̩wo̩ abo ku ma tene oji-ma ge̩. Nakʼoku-ma chʼuje̩wñ ame̩we̩ ojale kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ane̩-ile̩-i.
Oñ Naje̩ ñw ewo-i mud e̩wñ ugoju kpʼe̩wñ ku ma chʼo chui. Ugoju amu e̩ne̩ du ki lale da, ma achʼo chui tod atulubo̩ ki ake̩re̩bʼuma chaka.
U la aie̩ ñwu ma je̩ o̩re̩la amo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩, oñ e̩ne̩ du aje̩ o̩re̩la onuku-wñ iko ku ma akpala nyʼu le̩ kpai ef o̩bata kʼame̩nebi-ma kpʼabo ku ma tene oji ma ache ma le̩.
E̩gbale̩ tak uwe̩ akpʼugege le̩ fo̩ eju aboke̩le̩ ku ma ale bʼuwe̩,

oñ uwe̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Abe̩le̩ oñ omi akpʼamone̩-i kpʼewo-i fo̩, alu kʼone̩ akpʼucha kʼabucha bo̩ fo̩, kʼone̩ ma ño̩ neke hiʼu ko̩ ge̩ n. Ma la akʼoku one̩ ji Tofe̩t gbogbo tak uña ma ñʼaho ku ma akʼone̩ ji ge̩ n.
Abu kʼu nache uña-i kpʼabo ku ma dodo o̩mo̩ de̩, Jihofa aka-i. Nache kʼewo-i ki dab Tofe̩t.

Oñ unyi unyi Je̩rusale̩m, kpʼunyi unyi amonu Juda ku ma fʼu daji le̩ adab uña Tofe̩t, owñ chʼunyi du ku ma gu otulale jo ñw uwewe e̩wñ ojale, ku ma la dʼomi iche̩bo̩ danyu ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩ ojokunyi-wñ.
Taku Je̩re̩maya kwo Tofe̩t, ugbo ki Jihofa kpʼo̩ che̩ kʼi nyʼakache̩ le̩, wa dago ologbo unyi Jihofa, oñ i ka ñw amone̩ le̩ chaka kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l aka de̩ kakini, Go, nakʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du kʼu ka bʼewo-i kpai adogbe adogbe-wñ ma wa, todabu ku ma fʼo̩lo̩-ma lo ku ma ki we egbʼo̩la-mi.
Oñ Pashur, o̩ma Ime̩r, atama kʼi chʼagboji ki tʼo̩gba ef unyi Jihofa, gbo̩ abu ku Je̩re̩maya do̩mo̩ akache̩ e̩wñ-i.
Taku Pashur gwo Je̩re̩maya akache̩ le̩, oñ i mʼu du tʼodo ki dʼalaku unyi Jihofa e-ate̩ ku ma do̩ ko̩ e-Be̩njamin.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, Pashur tu Je̩re̩maya no̩ tane̩ bʼoj odo te̩. Taku Je̩re̩maya ka ñw u kakini, Jihofa dʼodu-we̩ ko̩ Pashur in, chai Mago̩r-missabib.

Todu, abu ku Jihofa ka de̩ kakini. Go, omi adʼuwe̩ chʼe̩wñ ubailo ñw o̩la-we̩ kpʼamonuku-we̩ o̩lali chaka. O̩kwo̩chageli ame̩nebi-ma agwo ma da jʼane̩ eju-we̩ meji. Omi la akʼo̩chaka abo Juda-i nyʼef o̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n, oñ i amʼuma nyi Babilo̩n. I la anʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma.

Anubi le̩ ge̩, omi ñʼako e̩wñ anana ewo-i, tʼile du kʼi je̩, tʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩-wñ du; ochochi nakʼe̩wñ akoko amonu Juda chaka nyʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-ma, ma ako ma chʼe̩wñ akpa, ku ma mu ma ku ma ko ma nyi Babilo̩n.
Tak uwe̩, Pashur-i, kpʼabo du ku ma gugu unyi-we̩, anyʼef amu le̩, Babilo̩n uwe̩ la anyi; o̩mo̩ uwe̩ aku, o̩mo̩ le̩ ma la adʼe̩ ji, uwe̩ kpʼamonuku-we̩ o̩lali, kʼuwe̩ kache̩ olemi ñwu ma le̩ chaka.
O Jihofa, e̩ fʼumi gwo̩gwo̩ me̩,
Todu e̩gba du kʼu nako̩la ekwa nakwa.
Iche̩wñ kʼu kakini, Nahi alu-mi mʼo̩ n,
Todu u gbo̩ abu kʼamone̩ wewe achakpabie̩ mi ye̩ye̩.
Jihofa muda dʼugbo mi dab agbiti ki abʼone̩ ailo;
O Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼe̩ la ñw abo̩kpakpa go,
Me̩ kʼeli ñw Jihofa,
Ama ki mu o̩jo̩
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩
E̩ne̩ le̩ ki dab ewo ewo
todabu kʼi ma dʼumi kpa efu iye-mi n;
E̩wñ chi kʼu kwef iye-mi dufu?
O̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya e̩gba ku Ze̩de̩kaya, onu, fu Pashur, o̩ma Malkija kpai Ze̩fanaya, atama, kʼi chʼo̩ma Maaseya kpe̩ nyʼugbo-wñ kakini,
Agba, e̩ ti Jihofa ene todu wa, todu Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, akogu bʼuwa ma me̩; ukani Jihofa ache ñw a teju uko̩lo̩-wñ awuwu du kʼi ache, kʼi mudabi bʼuwa oji te̩.
Taku Je̩re̩maya ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ku me̩ aka ñwu Ze̩de̩kaya de̩ kakini,

Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩ kakini, Go, narʼe̩wñ ido̩na ogu ki jʼef o̩wo̩-me̩ le̩ da tʼubi, owñ chʼe-kʼame̩ ne̩ akʼogu bʼonu Babilo̩n kpai abo Kaldia ku ma kpala nyʼume̩ ej o̩do̩da aku le̩; u la ako ma wa jeju alumeji ewo-i.
Omi onugo anʼo̩wo̩ ki gbiti dala akʼogu bʼume̩ ef uwe̩do̩ kpʼe̩do̩fulu, kpai ef eju e̩kpa inaina.
U la agwo abo ku ma dodo ewo-i, tʼone̩, tʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩; e̩wñ ibi lile akpa ma.

Jihofa kakini, Anubi e-le̩ nako̩ Ze̩de̩kaya onu Juda kpʼabimo̩to̩-wñ kpai amone̩ ku ma bo̩ jʼef ewo-i kʼe̩wñ ibi kpʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpʼukpo̩ta ma kpa ma n, jʼef o̩wo̩ Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, kpai ef o̩wo̩ ame̩ne̩bi-ma, kpai ef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma tene oji-ma. Owñ anʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli gwo ma da; i achʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ ñwu ma n, i la abʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ñwu ma n, i ali uma ejumomi re n.
Tak uwe̩ ki ka ñw amone̩-i kakini, Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, Go, o̩na e-iñmi kpʼo̩na e-uku nako jo̩ ñw me̩-i.

E̩ne̩ ki guane̩ ef ewo-i aku ñw o̩kwo̩chageli, kpai o̩kpo̩ta, kpai e̩wñ ibi le̩; e̩ne̩ ki muda le dufu kʼi ñwa tef o̩wo̩ abo Kaldia ku ma kpala nyʼume̩-i adeju; oji o̩la-wñ chʼe̩wñ uro̩me̩ kʼi ane̩ kwʼef ogu-i.
Todu u fʼeju-mi kparʼewo-i tod e̩bie̩ne̩, i chʼutodu e̩nyo̩ n, Jihofa ka-i; ma adʼu tef o̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n owñ la anʼuna gujo rinyo̩.
I la chʼe-unyi onu Juda, me̩ gbʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka kakini;
O abunyi Defid, abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini,
Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼuwe̩, uwe̩ kʼe̩ dodo ef o̩go̩ le̩,
Omi abʼudu ñw me̩ alu kʼe̩ro uko̩lo̩-me̩ de̩,
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, E̩ gwo̩ru nyʼunyi onu Juda, kʼe̩ kʼo̩la-i o̩mo̩,
kʼe̩ ka kakini, E̩ ki gbʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka, O onu Juda, kʼe̩ gugu oj ede Defid, uwe̩ kpʼabo ku ma jʼugbo-we̩, kpai amone̩-we̩ ku ma gudu wʼalaku-i.

Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Me̩ ki che tʼeju alu kʼoji ajo̩ ku ma du te̩ de̩, kpai e̩wñ o̩kpakpa, ku me̩ gba e̩ne̩ kʼoji ji bʼef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ ki atʼo̩ mane̩ te̩. Me̩ ki chʼilowa kpʼabo ku ma ma nʼata n kpʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ du uji kpʼo̩lachi n. Me̩ ki la dʼe̩bie̩ ki ma fʼudu n dafo ugbo-i n.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼame̩ che teju o̩la-i ochochi, mak amonu ku ma gugu oj ede Defid atʼef o̩ko̩ane̩ kʼanya afo̩, kpʼabo ku ma tanʼanya, tʼama, tʼamadu-ma, tʼamone̩-ma, agudu wʼalaku, alaku unyi-i.
Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ muda ako̩ gbʼo̩la-i, u fʼoji o̩la-mi go̩, Jihofa aka-i, ka kʼunyi-i amud alache̩.
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka ugbo unyi onu Juda de̩ kakini:
Omi afʼamakpe̩wñ bie̩ do̩ tʼuwe̩ o̩la,
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi wewe la alale gu ewo-i du, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ aka ñw ekeji-wñ kakini, E̩wñ chi ki Jihofa che ewo inaina-i abe̩i ta?
Taku ma adohi kakini, Todu abu ku ma hi alo Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma tinyo̩, ku ma la dojikane̩ ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩, kʼama ño̩ re̩ ma.
Me̩ ki raku e̩ne̩ ki ku n,
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka ugbo Shalum o̩ma Jo̩saya, onu Juda, kʼi jʼonu koji Josaya, ata-wñ, kʼi la kwʼugbo-i dufu, kakini, I ñʼadabiwʼemi ge̩ n.
Ama ugbo ku ma ñʼo̩ nyi le̩, o̩mo̩ i aku, i lañʼali ane̩-i ge̩ n.
Atogwo ñw e̩ne̩ ki nʼuji akʼunyi-wñ,
kʼi kakini, Nakʼunyi lile ñw o̩la-mi
Uwe̩ do̩ ka kʼuwe̩ achʼonu
I fʼo̩la e̩no̩bata kpai e̩nale ka da;
Eju-we̩ kpʼe̩do̩-we̩ muda kad ile uji
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa aka ugbo Jihoyakim o̩ma Josaya, onu Juda le̩ de̩ kakini,
Ma adʼoku-wñ ji alu ku ma dʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ji,
Te̩gu nyi Le̩bano̩n, kʼe̩ kwa taa,
E̩gba kʼe̩wñ ara ñw e̩ le̩, u ko̩la ñw e̩,
Afu ki aju akʼabo ku ma dide we̩ mi chaka,
O, uwe̩ kʼe̩ dodo Le̩bano̩n,
Oji-mi! Jihofa aka-i, dagba Konaya o̩ma Jiho̩yakim, onu Juda le̩, ma chʼelika e̩hiuko̩ ki dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-mi, omi ma fʼuwe̩ gwo kwʼo̩mo̩.
Oñ nadʼe̩ tʼef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma tene oji-we̩, tef o̩wo̩ abo kʼe̩ arailo ma, owñ chʼef o̩wo̩ onu Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, kpai tef o̩wo̩ abo Kaldia.
Omi la akʼuwe̩ kpʼiye ki bi we̩ rikpolo tʼoj ane̩ omune̩, ugbo ku ma ma bi me̩ n, oñ o̩mo̩ ame̩ aku.
I muda chʼe-ane̩ kʼeju-wñ ane̩ ma ku ma dabi tʼo̩mo̩, ama ñʼadabi tʼo̩mo̩ n,
E̩ne̩ ku ma do̩ ko̩ Konaya-i chʼanade ku ma chʼe̩de̩te̩-wñ?
O ane̩, ane̩, ane̩,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Atogwo ki chʼe-amadidala ku ma fʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini oko ije̩-mi kpabie̩, ku ma fʼuma kpatuka! Jihofa aka-i.

Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa. O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, aka ugbo amadidala ku ma dejutʼamone̩-mi de̩ kakini, Ame̩ fʼame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini kpatuka me̩, me̩ la fʼuma ne rinyo̩, me̩ la fejute̩ ma n. Go, omi anʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ku me̩ jʼache wa afejudo me̩, Jihofa aka-i.
Tak omi akʼe̩bo̩bo̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini kwʼoj ane̩ du ugbo kʼu ne ma ru le̩ wa. Oñ omi ako ma dabi wʼef iga-ma, tak ama arabi oñ ma awewe nyo̩gba.
U la akʼamadide kwane̩ ku ma adejute̩ ma, ma ñʼarailo ge̩ n, e̩do̩-ma la ada kpu n, e̩ne̩ʼkate ef uma achi n, Jihofa aka-i.

Go, o̩jo̩-wñ awa, Jihofa aka-i, e̩gba kʼomi adʼE̩pa o̩kpakpa kwane̩ ñwu Defid, tak owñ le̩ ajʼonu, i la ache e̩wñ ibeibe, i la ache e̩wñ tʼeju alu kʼoj ajo̩ ku ma dute̩ ka, kpai e̩wñ o̩kpakpa oj ane̩-i.
Iko-wñ le̩ ma ajadu Juda, oñ Israe̩l agugu to̩ko̩o̩. Odu ku ma adʼo̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, Jihofa O̩kpakpa E-wa.
Todule̩, go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa aka-i, e̩gba kʼamone̩ ñʼaka kakini, Oji, Jihofa kʼi ko abo Israe̩l kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa ge̩ n,
chai, Oji Jihofa kʼi ko kʼi ño̩ ne̩ ugbe̩ abunyi Israe̩l kwʼoj ane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, kpai kwoj ane̩ du ugbo kʼu ne ma ru le̩ wa. E̩gba le̩ ma adodo oj ane̩ e-ma onugo.
I chʼe-amakache̩:
Todu ane̩-i che̩ko̩ ñw o̩ya one̩ etene;
Tʼakache̩, tʼatama ejeji-ma akpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n;
Todule̩ o̩na o̩na-ma adab o̩na ki añwo̩ kʼi chʼe̩chubi ñw ma,
U fʼe̩wñ o̩gwo̩ li ef amakache̩ Samaria:
U la ño̩ li e̩wñ omefa ef amakache̩ Je̩rusale̩m:
Todule̩ e̩wñ ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka ugbo amakache̩ le̩ de̩, kakini:
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩, kakini, Me̩ ki ne̩tirʼo̩la amakache̩ ku ma kache̩ ñw me̩ le̩ n. Ma ko̩ me̩ e̩wñ o̩wai ofo; ane̩ ego ku ma go ef ibe e-ma ma ka, i la kwʼugbo alu Jihofa n.
Ma ka ñw abo ku ma chʼe̩de̩te̩ mi o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, kakini, Jihofa kakini, I ara ñw me̩; oñ ma ka ñw e̩ne̩ du ki chʼagbo̩go̩ kʼi atʼe̩do̩-wñ onugo ubi, kakini. E̩wñ bie̩ne̩ du abʼe̩ ma n.
Todu e̩ne̩ dago ef abo̩hiala Jihofa,
Go, ofutu e-Jihofa!
Uwe̩do̩ Jihofa dabi tʼubi n
Omi kpʼamakache̩ le̩ wa n,
Ma ma dago ef abo̩hiala-mi,
Omi chʼO̩jo̩ kʼi me̩ru anane̩, kʼu ma ño̩ chʼO̩jo̩ o̩najiji n? Jihofa aka-i.
I nʼe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ maja ofio̩lifio̩ kʼomi ma li u n? Jihofa aka-i. Omi che̩ko̩ efojale kpʼane̩ ile̩-i n? Jihofa aka-i.
U gbʼe̩wñ kʼamakache̩ ku ma kache̩ olemi ef odu-mi ka, ma kakini, U fʼo̩na na, u fʼo̩na na me̩!
Gbogbo wʼe̩gba oñ e̩wñ abe̩-i ajʼef e̩do̩ amakache̩ ku ma kache̩ olemi kade ta? Owñ chʼe-ku ma kache̩ e̩wñ edʼone̩ ibe ki dʼef e̩do̩-ma onugo.
Ma nʼibe ka kʼama anʼo̩na ku ma na kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ aka ñw ekeji-wñ je̩ ñw amone̩-mi gbenyo̩ odu-mi, alu kʼamata-ma gbenyo̩ odu-mi todu Beal le̩.
Akache̩ ki nʼo̩na i ki ka oj o̩na-wñ dufu ke, e̩ne̩ ki la nʼo̩la-mi i ki kʼo̩la e-mi o̩gbolo. Ma dʼelikpo ñwa e̩yo̩ o̩ka? Jihofa aka-i.
O̩la-mi dab una n? Jihofa aka-i, i dab ihama ki akpʼokuta fo̩ n?
Todule̩, go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼamakache̩ kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ma ajʼoji o̩la-mi ugbo ekeji-wñ, Jihofa ka-i.
Go, Jihofa kakini, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼamakache̩ ku ma nʼukpalu-ma aka kakini, I kakini.

Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼabo ku ma kache̩ o̩na ku ma na olemi ofo, Jihofa aka-i, oñ ma mʼu du ka, ku ma la nʼolemi-ma kpʼuba-ma ibe̩te̩ kʼamone̩-mi la. I la chʼomi kpʼuma uche̩ n, u la ñwa ñwu ma abe̩le̩ n, ma la nʼile du ñw amone̩-i n, Jihofa aka-i.
E̩gba kʼamone̩-i, abe̩k akache̩ʼka, abe̩k atama, atʼuwe̩ ene kakini, E̩wñ chʼadu Jihofa ke? Uwe̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, A me̩ chʼadu-wñ, u la ahi ume̩ tinyo̩, Jihofa aka-i.
I la chʼe-akache̩ abe̩k atama abe̩k e̩ne̩ʼka ef amone̩-i kʼi kakini, Adu Jihofa de̩, omi la abʼudu ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ kpʼabunyi-wñ chuu.
Abu kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ aka ñw ekeji-wñ kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la aka ñw o̩maye-wñ kakini, Abu Jihofa dohi? kpai Abu Jihofa ka?
Me̩ ñʼahi alu mʼo̩ ka ki, Adu Jihofa de̩, ge̩ n, todu uko̩la e-e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ achʼadu e-owñ onugo, todu ame̩ fʼuko̩la O̩jo̩ ki deju, kʼi che Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼO̩jo̩-wa rida me̩.
Abu kʼame̩ aka ñw akache̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, Abu Jihofa dohi ñw e̩? kpai, Abu Jihofa ka?
I muda che̩wñ ku me̩ kakini, Adu Jihofa de̩, abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Todabu ku me̩ kʼo̩la le̩ kakini, Adu Jihofa de̩, kʼu la fʼuche̩ kpe̩ rʼume̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki we eka kakini, Adu Jihofa de̩,
todule̩, go, u mʼume̩ ko le hioko, oñ nako me̩ kpʼewo kʼomi du ñw ame̩ kpʼamata-me̩-i rikpolo kwo bʼeju-mi te̩.
Tak u nakʼina ebu e-ogbegbele̩ kpai anyo̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ ki ma nʼegbenyo̩ n wa bʼume̩ ma.

Abu ku Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, mu Je̩konaya, o̩ma Jiho̩yakim, onu Juda, manyʼamagboji Juda kpʼamacho̩na e̩wñ, kpʼamagwalo̩ ño̩ kwo Je̩rusale̩m kʼi la ko ma wa Babilo̩n, Jihofa dʼe̩wñ-i ña mi: Go, agba o̩gbaikolo meji jʼane̩ o̩gba unyi Jihofa.
Agbaʼka nʼe̩ro o̩gbaikolo e-o̩me̩me̩le̩, dab e̩ro o̩gbaikolo ki kpa ejodudu, agba ekeji muda nʼe̩ro o̩gbaikolo ki bie̩ne̩ nana, e̩bie̩ne̩-wñ jʼaje̩ n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Je̩re̩maya, e̩wñ e̩ li? U kakini, E̩ro o̩gbaikolo, o̩gbaikolo-wñ e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ nyo̩ tabale, e-e̩bie̩ne̩-wñ la bie̩ne̩ tabale, e̩bie̩ne̩-wñ jʼaje̩ n.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo-mi kakini,

Abu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l aka de̩ kakini, Dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ro o̩gbaikolo e o̩me̩me̩le̩-i, abe̩le̩ oñ abo ku ma ño̩ bi Juda te̩ ade̩ eju-mi, owñ chʼabo kʼu ko kpuche̩ kwʼugbo-i nyʼane̩ abo Kaldia kʼi chenyo̩ ñwu ma.
Nakʼeju-mi rʼuma tod e̩nyo̩, tak u nako ma dabi wʼane̩-i. Ene nane ma nyʼo̩gba, nagu uma lo̩ n; nako ma gbe̩, nachi ma rinyo̩ n.
Oñ nadʼe̩do̩ ñwu ma kʼama ki ma kʼomi che Jihofa; tak ama achʼamone̩-mi, oñ omi achʼO̩jo̩ e-ma, todu ama adabi wa ba mi kpʼo̩gbo̩dudu e̩do̩-ma.

Jihofa kakini, Alu kʼe̩ro o̩gbaikolo le̩ bie̩ne̩ kʼe̩bie̩ne̩-wñ ma jʼaje̩ n, abe̩le̩ oñ nache Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda kpʼamagboji-wñ kpʼabubo̩ abo Je̩rusale̩m ku ma bo̩ oj ane̩-i kpʼabo ku ma gugu ane̩ Ijipti chuu.
U la ako ma jo̩ ku ma fʼume̩ ne tʼemi tʼano̩mo̩ nyʼojane̩ ojane̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ile̩-i du kʼi bie̩ne̩ ñwu ma, ku ma mud oli ina kpai ita kpai aku kpai ama, ugbo du kʼu nane ma ru.
Tak unakʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpai o̩kpo̩ta kpai e̩wñ ibi wa efuma, gbogbo taku ma fu malie̩ bʼane̩ kʼu ko ñwu ma kpʼamata-ma te̩ hioko.
O̩la abo Juda chaka ki wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya o̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ki Jiho̩yakim, o̩ma Josaya, jʼonu Juda (owñ chʼo̩do̩ Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, ejodudu),
e-ku Je̩re̩maya akache̩ ko̩la ñw amone̩ Juda chaka kpai abo du ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m de̩, kakini,
O̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩ta, owñ chʼakwʼo̩do̩ Josaya, o̩ma Amo̩n onu Juda, e̩ke̩gwe̩ta, gbogbo wʼeñini, o̩la Jihofa te̩tawʼugbo mi. U la takpa kwane̩ aka ñwu me̩, me̩ muda netiru n.
Me̩ la netiru n, me̩ la hi eti-me̩ wane̩ ku me̩ gbo̩ n, dagba Jihofa chaka takpa kwane̩ akpʼamadu-wñ du ku ma chʼamakache̩ rʼume̩,
i kakini, Fai, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki rida bʼo̩na-wñ ki bie̩ne̩ te̩, kpai bʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ku me̩ jʼache te̩, ku me̩ dodo oj ane̩ ku Jihofa du ñwu me̩ kpʼamata-me̩ akwʼigbelegbele tʼogbegbele̩,
me̩ ki tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi ku me̩ re̩ ma ku me̩ laño̩ dojikane̩ ñwu ma n. Me̩ ki la nʼuko̩lo̩ kʼo̩wo̩-me̩ che nyʼumi uwe̩do̩ n. Tak omi ma ñʼachʼume̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ n.
Me̩ muda netirʼumi n, Jihofa ka-i, todu kʼame̩ ki nʼuko̩lo̩ kʼo̩wo̩-me̩ che nyʼumi uwe̩do̩, ki bie̩ne̩ ñwu me̩.
Todule̩ abu ku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼame̩ ma gbʼo̩la-mi n,
