go, nakpuche̩ ado̩ abo̩lo̩pu, o̩lo̩pu du o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ wa, Jihofa aka-i, kpai Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n adu-mi le̩, oñ nako ma wa ako-bʼane̩-i kpai abo ku ma dodo oji-wñ kpai abʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du ku ma lo daka; oñ nako ma jo̩ ñw o̩la-mi hioko, u la ako ma chʼe̩wñ ugoju kpai e̩wñ chui, kpai egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
Ubi le̩ ge̩, naje̩ ñw omu anyi kpai omu uyo̩, omuko̩la o̩ko̩ya tito̩ kpai omuko̩la o̩ya tito̩, kpai ekuku e̩wñ eno̩ odokuta, kpai ugane̩ agege lenyo̩ bʼuma te̩.
Ane̩-i du amud egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta kpai e̩wñ ugoju, oñ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi-i arʼonu Babilo̩n o̩do̩ e̩te̩gwa.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ e̩te̩gwa le̩ jo̩ kpa, omi awa fejudo onu Babilo̩n kpai abo uche̩ichi e-le̩ kpai ane̩ abo Kaldia, tod udu ku ma fe̩, Jihofa ka-i, oñ nache kʼane̩ le̩ ki mud alache̩ te̩ ogbegbele̩.
U la ako o̩la du kʼu ka nyʼane̩ le̩ wa abʼo oji ma, owñ chʼe̩wñ du ki che̩ko̩ ef ubuku-i, e-ku Je̩re̩maya kache̩ bʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du ma.
Todu abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi wewe kpai amonu lile amʼuma ko chʼadu, owñ chʼama ama le̩; omi la adʼakoji ñwu ma alu kʼe̩wñ ku ma che de̩, kpʼalu kʼuko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-ma de̩.
Todu abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ka ñwu mi de̩ kakini: Mʼago omi achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩do̩fulu-i gba kwʼo̩wo̩-mi, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du kʼomi akpʼe̩ rʼuma ñmo̩.
Ma añmo̩ taku ma aro̩ko̩ibu, ma la ahimu tod o̩kwo̩chageli kʼu nakpe̩ wʼef uma.
Abe̩le̩ omi mʼago le̩ gba kwʼo̩wo̩ Jihofa, oñ u je̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki Jihofa kpe̩ mi rʼuma ñmo̩.
Owñ che Je̩rusale̩m, kpʼewo ewo Juda, kpʼamonu-wñ kpʼamagboji-wñ, kʼu ko ma chʼegbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta, kpai e̩wñ ugoju, kpai e̩wñ chui kpai ama, alu ki de̩ eñini-i.
Fero, onu Ijipti kpʼamadu-wñ kpʼamagboji-wñ kpai abo-wñ chaka,
kpʼabo ichi du ki kpe̩gwa nyʼuma kpʼamonu ane̩ Uz kpʼamonu ane̩ Filistia chaka kpʼAshkelo̩n kpai Gaza kpʼE̩kro̩n kpai abubo̩ abo Ashdo̩d;
Ido̩m kpai Moab kpʼamo̩ma Amo̩n;
kpʼamonu Taya chaka kpʼamonu Saido̩n chaka kpʼamonu ala kʼi jʼudaba ohimini le̩;
owñ che Dedan kpai Tema kpai Buz kpʼabo du ku ma fʼilagba-ma be̩;
kpʼamonu Arabia chaka kpʼamonu abo ichi ojoji ojoji ku ma kpe̩gwa nyʼomune̩ gugu aje̩tachi le̩;
kpʼamonu Zimri du kpʼamonu Elam du kpʼamonu Me̩dia chaka;
kpʼamonu o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ chaka, tʼabo̩-najiji, tʼabo ki me̩rʼanane̩, aro̩ne aro̩ne, kpai ojane̩ ojane̩ ile̩ du ku ma jo̩ oj ane̩ ile̩-i. Ubi ma tak onu Babilo̩n añmo̩.

Tak uwe̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l aka de̩, kakini, Me̩ ñmo̩, kʼi mu me̩, ku me̩ re̩, ku me̩ wane̩ ku me̩ ño̩ kwane̩ ge̩ n, tod o̩kwo̩chageli kʼu nadu kpuche̩ rʼef ume̩-i.
I la che̩wñ ku ma ko̩ egbʼago le̩ kwʼo̩wo̩-we̩ ku ma ñmo̩, tak uwe̩ aka ñw ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩, kakini. Ame̩ añmo̩ tila!

Todu go, u chane̩ uko̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ eche ugbo ewo ku ma dʼodu-mi mʼo̩ le̩, ma ñʼawe ebʼudu ñw me̩ ge̩? Ma awe ebʼudu ñw me̩ n, todu omi do̩mo̩ adʼo̩kwo̩chageli udo̩ abʼabo du ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩-i ma, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka-i.
Todule̩ e̩ ki kache̩ o̩la-i du bʼuma ma, kʼe̩ la ka ñw ma kakini,
Ekuku-wñ awa gbogbo tʼukpoji ane̩-ile̩,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini:
Oñ abo ki Jihofa akpa o̩jo̩ le̩ ate̩ kwʼukpoji ile̩ o̩wo̩ʼka gbogbo tʼukpoji ile̩ o̩wo̩ ekeji. Ma adeku ma n, ma ayʼoku-ma jo̩ n, ma la ako ma ji n; ma amud echu bʼej ane̩ ma.
Dinaku, ame̩ amadidala, kwa ke!
Amadidala anʼugbo ku ma ara nyi n,
Neti, ukwa amadidala de̩,
oñ iga iga ki jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩ le̩ ade hiim,
I hi ugbe̩ga-wñ tinyo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼidu,
E̩gba uchane̩ o̩fe̩ Jiho̩yakim, o̩ma Josaya, onu Juda, o̩la-i kwʼugbo Jihofa wa kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Dago ologbo unyi Jihofa kʼe̩ kʼo̩la ñw ewo ewo Juda chaka kʼabo-wñ awa dojikane̩ ef unyi Jihofa o̩la du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma; e̩ ki bʼo̩laʼkate wane̩ n.
Ikani ma anetirʼu, kʼe̩ne̩ du arida bʼo̩na-wñ ki bie̩ne̩ te̩, tak e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼu nʼibe ka kʼu nache ma tod e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩-ma ku ma jʼache awo̩ mi.
Tak e̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, Ame̩ ma netirʼumi, ku me̩ lule̩ teju uko̩-o̩la-mi kʼu dʼu gugu o̩gba-me̩ le̩ n,
ku me̩ ma la nyʼo̩la amadu-mi ku ma chʼamakache̩ e-kʼomi takpa kwane̩ akpe̩ ma rʼume̩ ku me̩ ma muda nyʼuma eti n le̩,
mak e̩gbale̩ nachʼunyi-i ki dabu Shailo, oñ nachʼewo-i ki chʼina ñw abo uche̩ichi du ane̩ ile̩-i.
Amatama kpʼamakache̩ kpai amone̩ le̩ du gbo̩ abu ku Je̩re̩maya nʼo̩la-i aka ef unyi Jihofa.
Oñ e̩gba ku Je̩re̩maya fʼo̩la du ki Jihofa ñwa ñw u kʼi ka ñw amone̩ le̩ du ka kpa, tak amatama kpʼamakache̩ kpʼamone̩ le̩ du gwonyʼuwñ, ma kakini, Eku uwe̩ aku!
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ kache̩ ef odu Jihofa kakini, Unyi-i adabu Shailo, oñ ewo-i amud akpokpo te̩, one̩ adodo o̩mo̩ n? Tak amone̩ le̩ du donyu Je̩re̩maya daka ef unyi Jihofa.
E̩gba kʼamagboji Juda gbo̩ e̩wñ-i, ma kwʼunyi onu te̩gu wa unyi Jihofa, oñ ma kwoguane̩ Alaku Etito̩ unyi Jihofa le̩.
Tak amatama kpʼamakache̩ ka ñw amagboji kpai amone̩ le̩ du kakini, I dukpe̩ kʼe̩ne̩-i kʼi ku, todabu kʼi kache̩ achagwunyu ewo-i, alu kʼame̩ nʼeti-me̩ gbo̩ le̩.
Taku Je̩re̩maya kʼo̩la ñw amagboji kpʼamone̩ le̩ du kakini, Jihofa kpe̩ mi wa kʼu kache̩ o̩la du ku me̩ gbo̩ le̩ achagwunyu unyi-i kpʼewo-i.
Todule̩ me̩ ki fʼo̩na-me̩ kpʼe̩wñ ku me̩ jʼache ñwo̩che, ku me̩ gbʼomu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ gbo̩ tak e̩bie̩ne̩ ku Jihofa ka kʼi awa abʼume̩ ma-i awʼo̩.
I muda chʼe-mi, go, omi dʼef o̩wo̩-me̩ me̩. Me̩ che mi alu du ki nyo̩, kʼi chʼo̩kpakpa eju e-me̩.

Ama me̩ ki muda ma ogbolo-wñ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ du mi kpa, mak e̩bie̩ ki ma fʼudu n oñ me̩ adu wa abʼoji o̩la-me̩ kpʼabʼoji ewo-i kpʼabʼoji abo du ku ma dodo ef uwñ ma. Todu, ochochi Jihofa kpe̩ mi wa kʼu kʼo̩la-i du nyʼume̩ eti.
Tak amagboji kpʼamone̩ le̩ chaka ka ñw amatama kpʼamakache̩ kakini, I dukpe̩ kʼe̩ne̩-i aku n, todu i ko̩la ñw a ef odu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa me̩.
Tak abogijo oj ane̩ le̩ iche̩ka kwane̩, oñ ma ko̩la ñw amone̩ du ku ma jeju o̩mo̩ kakini,
Maika e̩ne̩ Mo̩reshe̩t le̩ kache̩ iko He̩ze̩kaya, onu Juda, oñ i ka ñw amone̩ Juda chaka kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩, kakini,

He̩ze̩kaya onu Juda, kpʼabo Juda chaka dʼu kpa? I chʼerailo i railo Jihofa tak i gbo̩ko̩bo̩ Jihofa kʼi li u eju n? Tak e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ku Jihofa ka kʼi awa bʼuma ma wʼo̩ n? Awa ache kʼa dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ inaina wa abʼonugo-wa ma-i.
E̩ne̩ omune̩ kʼi akache̩ ef odu Jihofa ño̩ do̩mo̩, owñ che Uraya, o̩ma Shemaya, kʼi chʼabo Kiriat-jearim. Owñ la kache̩ achagwunyu ewo-i kpʼachagwunyʼane̩-i teju o̩la du ku Je̩re̩maya ka le̩.
Tak e̩gba ku Jiho̩yakim, onu, manyʼabogu-wñ kpʼamagboji-wñ chaka, gbʼo̩la kʼi ka, onu tene kʼi dʼu kpa. Ama e̩gba kʼUraya gbʼo̩, i railo, oñ i ra, i la fʼuma o̩wo̩ nyʼIjipti.
Taku Jiho̩yakim, onu, fʼaboke̩le̩ kpe̩ nyʼIjipti, ama che Elne-tan, o̩ma Akbo̩r, manyʼabo kibo̩.
Oñ ma dʼUraya kwʼIjipti wa ñwu Jiho̩yakim, onu. Owñ le̩ nʼo̩kwo̩chageli fʼu kpa, oñ i dʼoku-wñ ro̩ tʼugbo ku ma kʼame̩no̩talaka ji.
O̩wo̩ Ahaikam, o̩ma Shefan, muda dʼubi Je̩re̩maya, ku ma ki we edʼu ñw amone̩ kpa.
E̩gba ejodudu ku Ze̩de̩kaya, o̩ma Josaya, onu Juda, chane̩ ejʼo̩fe̩, o̩la-i kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya.
Abu ki Jihofa aka ñwu mi de̩, kakini, Uwe̩ ki fʼe̩cha kpai oli uno̩lo̩ che kʼe̩ ko nʼo̩lo̩-we̩.
E̩ la kʼo̩ kpuche̩ rʼonu Ido̩m kpʼonu Moab kpʼonu amo̩ma Amo̩n kpʼonu Taya kpʼonu Saidon, lʼo̩wo̩ amonuche̩ ku ma wa Je̩rusale̩m ugbo Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda.
Dʼo̩la ide kide̩ ñwu ma tod amodu-ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, E̩wñ ku me̩ aka ñw amodu-me̩ le̩ de̩, kakini,
Omi nʼukpahiu-mi lile kpʼo̩wo̩-mi kʼu nadala te̩ chʼane̩-ile̩-i manyʼamone̩ kpʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ku ma jʼane̩ ile̩-i. Oñ nakʼo ñw e̩ne̩ du ki nyʼumieju.
Fai, umʼane̩ ane̩-i du ko nyu Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n, adu-mi, o̩wo̩. U laño̩ mʼe̩wñ iñmi oko du ko ñw u ku ma rʼo̩.
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du arʼowñ kpʼo̩ma-wñ kpʼaaju-wñ gbogbo tak iko ane̩-wñ onugo ki jo̩. E̩gbale̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi wewe kpʼamonu lile adʼowñ chʼadu-ma.

I la awatu ka kʼabo uche̩ichi abe̩k ojane̩ ki ma je̩ re̩ Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n-i n, kʼi ma jʼakʼo̩lo̩-ma tʼofe oli uno̩lo̩ onu Babilo̩n-i n, u la anʼo̩kwochageli kpʼo̩kpo̩ta, kpʼe̩wñ ibi bʼudu ñw abo uche̩ichi le̩, Jihofa aka-i, gbogbo tak u nʼo̩wo̩-wñ fʼuma lie̩ kpa.
I la chʼe-ame̩, me̩ ki we enetirʼamakache̩-me̩ kpʼamabifa-me̩ kpʼamano̩na-me̩ kpʼabo ku ma gʼakpa ojale kpʼamochu-me̩ ku ma jʼaka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ are̩ onu Babilo̩n in.
Todu ache̩ olemi ma ka ñwu me̩ le̩, kʼama ki mʼume̩ ño̩ bʼane̩-me̩ te̩ nyʼo̩najiji, kʼomi ki ne me̩ dufu, kʼame̩ ki lenyo̩.
Ama abo uche̩ichi kʼi jʼadʼo̩lo̩-wñ tʼofe oli uno̩lo̩ onu Babilo̩n, kʼi arʼo̩, natʼuma no̩ jʼojane̩ e-ma, ma la dodo o̩mo̩, ma anʼuche̩-ma alo, Jihofa aka-i.
U la ku teju o̩la-i du ñwu Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda, u kakini, Me̩ mʼo̩lo̩-me̩ ko jʼofe oli uno̩lo̩ onu Babilo̩n, ku me̩ rʼowñ kpʼabo-wñ, kʼame̩ ki deju.
E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ kpʼabo-we̩ aku ñw o̩kwo̩chageli kpʼo̩kpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ ibi le̩, alu ki Jihofa ka ugbo abo uche̩ichi du ki ma jʼarʼonu Babilo̩n in?
Me̩ ki la netirʼo̩la amakache̩ n ku ma ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ arʼonu Babilo̩n in. Todu ache̩ olemi ma ka ñwu me̩ le̩.
Omi kpʼuma uche̩ n, Jihofa aka-i; Ma muda akache̩ olemi ef odu-mi, kʼu ne me̩ dufu ku me̩ lenyo̩, owñ chʼame̩ kpʼamakache̩ ku ma jʼakache̩ ñwu me̩.

U ño̩ ko̩la ñw amatama kpʼamone̩-i du kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Ame̩ ki netirʼo̩la amakache̩-me̩ ku ma kache̩ ñwu me̩ n kakini, Go, ma akʼe̩wñ eku unyi Jihofa dabi kwo Babilo̩n wa faifai, todu ache̩ olemi ma jʼaka ñwu me̩ le̩.
Me̩ ki netirʼuma n; me̩ rʼonu Babilo̩n, ka me̩ ki deju. E̩wñ chi kʼewo-i amud alache̩?

Iche̩wñ kʼama chʼamakache̩ kʼo̩la Jihofa la dʼugbo-ma ochochi, mak ama ki chologu bo̩ Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼe̩wñ eku ki bo̩ jʼef unyi Jihofa, kpai ef unyi onu Juda, kpʼefu Je̩rusale̩m, ki we enyi Babilo̩n.
Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka ugbo ebijeikpa ki dago waala jo̩, kpai ohimini, kpʼakete, kpʼe̩wñ eku du ki bo̩ jʼef ewo-i,
owñ chʼe-ki Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n, ma ko kwʼemi e̩gba kʼi mu Je̩konaya, o̩ma Jiho̩yakim, onu Juda, kpʼame̩nojima e-Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m ño̩ le le̩ n.
I-i, abu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka ugbo e̩wñ eku ki bo̩ ef unyi Jihofa kpʼef unyi onu Juda kpʼefu Je̩rusale̩m de̩, kakini,
Ma añʼo̩ nyi Babilo̩n, ane̩ le̩ la ajʼo̩mo̩ gbogbo wʼiko kʼu nyʼafejudʼo, Jihofa aka-i. E̩gbale̩ omi akʼo dabiwa, kʼu ko wa ajʼe̩gu-wñ uña-i.

O̩do̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩, e̩gba ku Ze̩de̩kaya onu Juda ma jʼo̩fe̩ ta n, ochu e̩ke̩lu ki nʼoji o̩do̩ me̩ta, Hananaya, o̩ma Azur, akache̩ kʼi chʼabo Gibeo̩n le̩, ko̩la ñwu mi ef unyi Jihofa eju amatama kpʼamone̩ le̩ chaka kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, Omi fʼoli uno̩lo̩ onu Babilo̩n guche̩ me̩.
O̩do̩ meji ajo̩ tak u nakʼe̩wñ eku unyi Jihofa dabi wa jʼuña-i n, owñ chʼe-ki Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n, ko kwʼuña-i nyi Babilo̩n le̩.
U ñʼako Je̩konaya, o̩ma Jiho̩yakim, onu Juda, manyʼabo Juda du ku ma mʼuma ño̩ ku ma nyi Babilo̩n dabi wa jʼuña-i ge̩, Jihofa ka-i, todu nagu oli uno̩lo̩ onu Babilo̩n che̩.
Taku Je̩re̩maya, akache̩ le̩, ko̩la ñwu Hananaya akache̩ eju amatama kpʼamone̩ du ku ma dago jo̩ ef unyi Jihofa le̩;
owñ che Je̩re̩maya, akache̩, kakini, Ami! Jihofa ki fʼabe̩le̩ che, Jihofa ki je̩ ache̩ o̩la kʼe̩ ka le̩ ki che̩, kʼi la mʼe̩wñ eku unyi Jihofa, kpʼame̩namu le̩ ko kwo Babilo̩n dabiwa jo̩ uña-i.
E̩ ki muda gbo̩ o̩la kʼu naka nyʼuwe̩ eti-i kpʼeti amone̩-i du.
Amakache̩ ku ma wa o̩gba mi kpʼuwe̩ akwʼigbelegbele fʼache̩ ogu kpʼo̩kpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ ibi ka chʼagwunyu ane̩ wewe kpʼojane̩ ojane̩ lile.
I la chʼe-akache̩ kʼi fʼache̩ ure̩do̩ ka, e̩gba kʼo̩la akache̩ le̩ lewa che̩, mak ama ama ka ku Jihofa kpʼakache̩ le̩ wa ochochi.
Taku Hananaya, akache̩, mʼoli uno̩lo̩ du kwʼo̩lo̩ Je̩re̩maya, akache̩, oñ i mʼudu guche̩.

Taku Hananaya ko̩la eju amone̩ le̩ du kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Abe̩le̩ oñ omi agu oli uno̩lo̩ Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n, che̩ bʼo̩lo̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du te̩ gbogbo tak o̩do̩ meji ki jo̩. Taku Je̩re̩maya akache̩ le owñ.
Oñ abu ku Hananaya, akache̩ le̩, fʼoli uno̩lo̩ guche̩ bʼo̩lo̩ Je̩re̩maya te̩ kpo̩kpe̩ pe̩e̩, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya, kakini,
Lo kʼe̩ ka ñwu Hananaya kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Uwe̩ fʼugbo̩lo̩ e-oli guche̩ me̩, e̩ muda fʼugbo̩lo̩ ebije che koji-wñ.

Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, ka de̩, kakini, Omi mʼebije uno̩lo̩ ko nʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi-i du o̩lo̩ kʼama ki chʼadu ñwu Ne̩biukadne̩za onu Babilo̩n, ma la arʼo̩; u laño̩ mʼame̩wñ iñmi oko ko ñw u ge̩.
Taku Je̩re̩maya akache̩ ka ñwu Hananaya akache̩ kakini, Gbo̩, Hananaya, i che Jihofa kpʼuwe̩-i n, uwe̩ muda je̩ ñw amone̩-i ke̩do̩nʼolemi.
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi adʼe̩ kpuche̩ bʼeju ane̩ ile̩-i te̩. O̩do̩-i pitii oñ uwe̩ aku, todabu kʼe̩ ko̩la ubi edagbo̩ Jihofa.
Abe̩le̩ Hananaya akache̩ le̩ leku ochu ekebie o̩do̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩.

O̩la ki jʼef o̩takada ki Je̩re̩maya, akache̩, du kpuche̩ kwo Je̩rusale̩m rʼabogijo ku ma bo̩ ef abo ku ma mu lelo le̩ kpʼamatama kpʼamakache̩ kpʼamone̩ du ku Ne̩biukadne̩za mu lelo akwo Je̩rusale̩m nyi Babilo̩n le̩ de̩.
(Owñ chʼabu ku Je̩konaya, onu, kpai iye onu kpʼamonoji kpʼamagboji Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m kpʼamacho̩na e̩wñ kpʼamagwalo̩ kwo bi Je̩rusale̩m te̩ me̩.)

Je̩re̩maya dʼo̩takada le̩ kpuche̩ lʼo̩wo̩ E̩lasa o̩ma She̩fan kpai Gamaraya, o̩ma Hilkaya, (ama chʼabo ku Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda kpe̩ nyi Babilo̩n ugbo Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n). O̩takada le̩ kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka ñw abo ku ma mu ma ño̩ le̩ chaka, e-kʼomi je̩ ñwu ma mu ma ño̩ kwo Je̩rusale̩m nyi Babilo̩n de̩ kakini,
Me̩ kʼunyi ku me̩ jʼef uwñ me̩ fʼe̩wñ gbe̩ ef uche̩ ku me̩ jʼe̩ro-wñ.

Me̩ nʼo̩ya, ku me̩ bi amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩. Me̩ ki nʼo̩ya ñw amo̩ma-me̩, me̩ ki la kʼamo̩ma-me̩ onobule̩ kpʼo̩ko̩, kʼama ki bi amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩. Me̩ ki wewe nyʼo̩gba o̩mo̩, uwewe-me̩ ki we ebu wane̩.
Me̩ ki tene o̩lafia ewo ugbo kʼu je̩ ñwu ma ño̩ me̩ nyi le̩, me̩ ki la rodubʼO̩jo̩ tod ewo le̩, todu ugbo o̩lafia-wñ oñ me̩ anʼo̩lafia e-me̩.

Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, Ame̩ ki je̩ ñw amakache̩-me̩ kpʼamabifa-me̩ ku ma jʼef ume̩ le̩ gba me̩ ibe n; me̩ ki la netirʼo̩na ki nyo̩ me̩ eju ku me̩ na le̩ n,
todu ama jʼakache̩ olemi ñwu me̩ ef odu-mi; omi kpʼuma uche̩ n, Jihofa ka-i.
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, E̩gba kʼo̩do̩ Babilo̩n e̩te̩gwa le̩ jo̩ kpa, nawa fejudo me̩, kʼu nache kʼo̩la kʼu katane̩ ñwu me̩ le̩ kʼi che̩, owñ chʼeko me̩ dabi wʼuña-i.
Todu u chema ibe kʼu kpe̩ todu me̩, Jihofa ka-i, owñ chʼibe o̩lafia, i la chʼibe e̩bie̩ne̩ n, kʼu dʼukibeno ñwu me̩ tod ukpoji-me̩ otitala.
Tak ame̩ akwado̩ mi, oñ me̩ awa agbo̩ko̩bʼumi, tak u nanetirʼume̩.
Ame̩ atene mi, oñ me̩ ali mi; owñ chʼe̩gba ku me̩ tene mi kpʼe̩do̩ʼka.

Ame̩ ali mi Jihofa ka-i, tak u narʼamu-me̩ da, oñ nako me̩ kwʼugbo abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du kpai kwʼugbo du kʼu ne me̩ ru le̩ wa jo̩, Jihofa ka-i, oñ nako me̩ dabi wa jʼuña ugbo kʼu je̩ ñwu ma ño̩ me̩ kwo le̩.
Todabu ku me̩ kakini, Jihofa mʼamakache̩ ko kwane̩ ñw a Babilo̩n me̩,
Abu ki Jihofa ka ugbo onu kʼi gugu oj ede Defid le̩ kpai ugbo amone̩ du ku ma dodo ewo-i, owñ chʼamo̩maye-me̩ ku ma ma dufu kpʼame̩ nyʼef amu n, kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini. Go, omi akʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpai o̩kpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ ibi kpuche̩ abʼuma ma, oñ naje̩ ñwu ma ku ma dab o̩gbaikolo bibi, e-kʼe̩bie̩ne̩-wñ ma je̩ ñw one̩ je̩ n.

Tak u nanʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpai o̩kpo̩ta kpai e̩wñ ibi rano ma, kʼu mʼuma ko jo̩ ku ma ko ma rikpolo tʼemi tʼano̩mo̩ tʼojane̩ ojane̩ ane̩-ile̩ du, ku ma mud e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ kpai e̩wñ ugoju kpai e̩wñ chui, kpai oli ina ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du ugbo kʼu ne ma ru le̩.
Todabu ku ma ma nyʼo̩la-mi eti n, Jihofa ka-i, owñ chʼe-kʼomi takpa kwane̩ ko kpuche̩ rʼuma lʼo̩wo̩ amadu-mi amakache̩ le̩. Ame̩ muda ko̩ enye̩ti, Jihofa ka-i.
Oñ ame̩ ku ma mʼume̩ ño̩ le̩ chaka kʼomi ko me̩ kpe̩ kwo Je̩rusale̩m nyi Babilo̩n le̩, me̩ ki gbʼo̩la Jihofa kakini.

Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l ka ugbo Ehab, o̩ma Kolaya, kpai Ze̩de̩kaya, o̩ma Maaseya, ku ma kache̩ olemi ñwu me̩ ef odu-mi le̩: Go, omi ako ma nyu Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, o̩wo̩, tak owñ akpa ma eju-me̩.
Todu ma, oñ abo ku ma ño̩ kwo Juda nyi Babilo̩n le̩ chaka anʼina-i abu kakini, Jihofa ki dʼuwe̩ ehe kʼe̩ dʼalu ku Ze̩de̩kaya kpai Ehab de̩, owñ chʼabo kʼonu Babilo̩n fu ro̩ ef una,
todabu ku ma fʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩ che Israe̩l, ku ma bʼamo̩ya amekeji-ma dachi, ma laño̩ ka o̩la olemi ef odu-mi e-kʼomi ma ñwa ñwu ma n. Omi chʼe̩ne̩ ki ma, u laño̩ chʼe̩nibenu-wñ, Jihofa ka-i.
Uwe̩ ki ka o̩la She̩maya e-Nehelam le̩, kakini,

Alu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, ki chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l aka de̩, kakini, Todabu kʼe̩ kʼo̩takada kpuche̩ ef odu e-we̩ rʼamone̩ du ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m, kpai tʼugbo Ze̩fanaya, o̩ma Maaseya atama le̩, kpai tʼugbo amatama chaka ka ki,
Jihofa mʼe̩ du chʼatama koji Je̩hoyada, atama, kʼuwe̩ ki nʼo̩da amahimu du ku ma kache̩ ef unyi Jihofa, kʼe̩ mʼuma ko nyʼodo kʼe̩ fʼiku kpanyʼuma o̩fa.
Mak e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma dejuru Je̩re̩maya e-Anato̩t kʼi do̩mo̩ akache̩ ñwu me̩ le̩ n?
Todu i fʼuche̩ kpe̩ru wa Babilo̩n emi kakini, Me̩ akpo̩kpe̩ ef amu le̩; me̩ fʼunyi ko̩ ku me̩ jʼef uwñ, me̩ ki la fʼe̩wñ gbe̩ uche̩ ku me̩ je̩ e̩ro-wñ.
Oñ Ze̩fanaya, atama fʼo̩kalatu le̩ che ñwu Je̩re̩maya akache̩ gbo̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
Fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼame̩namu le̩ chaka kakini, O̩la She̩maya e-Nehelam ku Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Todabu ku She̩maya fʼache̩ ka ñwu me̩ ki ma chʼomi kpʼo̩ uche̩ n, kʼi la je̩ ñwu me̩ ke̩do̩no olemi,

todule̩ abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, Go, nabʼudu ñwu She̩maya e̩ne̩ Nehelam kpʼugbe̩-wñ; i anʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ki agugu ef amone̩-i n; eju-wñ la ali e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ kʼu nache ñw abo-mi-i n, Jihofa ka-i, todabu kʼi te̩tako̩la ubi edagbo̩ Jihofa.
O̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya de̩, kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, E̩ nafʼo̩la du kʼu ka ñw e̩ ko̩ nyʼibuku.
Todu, go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa aka-i, kʼomi arʼamu abo-mi Israe̩l kpai Juda da, Jihofa aka-i, tak u naje̩ ñw ma dabi wʼane̩ kʼu du ñw amata-ma, taku ma agba.
O̩la Israe̩l kpai Juda ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini:
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Tene ta, ku me̩ go,
Atogwo! todu o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i tabale
Oñ abe̩le̩ i ade̩, iko le̩ nagu oli uno̩lo̩-wñ che̩ bʼume̩ o̩lo̩ te̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka-i, U la afʼiku-we̩ jada; ab o̩wo̩ ejaduña año̩ dʼowñ chʼadu-ma ge̩ n.
Ma muda are̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma kpai Defid onu-ma, kʼomi adʼu kwane̩ todu ma.
Todule̩, uwe̩, O Jeko̩b adu-mi, e̩ ki railo n, Jihofa aka-i, e̩do̩-we̩ ki da kpu n, O Israe̩l;
Todu omi dʼugbo we̩ kʼu najadu we̩,
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini:
I nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi agbʼomu-we̩ ka n,
Amonuku-we̩ o̩lali chaka gbenyo̩ we̩ me̩;
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ kwa tod ewo̩ ki awʼe̩?
Todule̩ ma ak abo du ku ma du we̩ mi mi,
Todu omi adʼo̩lafia dabi wa ñw e̩,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini;
Eli ugwa kpʼomuko̩la abo ku ma chiya,
Amo̩ma-ma ñʼade̩ alu ku ma de̩ igbelegbele,
E̩nojima-ma achʼe̩ne̩ e-ma onugo,
Tak ame̩ achʼamone̩ e-mi,
Me̩ go afu ibi e-Jihofa!
Uwe̩do̩ Jihofa ki kpuna le̩ adabi n,
Iko le̩ omi achʼO̩jo̩ abo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l du, oñ ama achʼamone̩ e-mi, Jihofa ka-i.
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini:
Jihofa kwotejugede ñw mi kwʼo̩najiji.
Nadabi ane we̩, ene̩-we̩ la achi n,
Uwe̩ adabi agbe̩ uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma
Todu o̩jo̩-wñ ade̩ e̩gba kʼamadide adudo̩
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini;
Go, omi ako ma kwʼane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ wa,
Ma awa kpai aku ero̩,
O abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa,
Todu Jihofa fu Jeko̩b la tane̩ me̩,
Ma la awa akeli taa oj otete Zayo̩n,
E̩gbale̩ amigbe̩le̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n ayo̩ ef ido,
Nanʼula kʼamatama efu,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini:
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
I chenʼukibeno tod ejo̩gba-we̩,
U gbo̩ abu kʼlfraim do̩mo̩ afifi kakini,
Abu kʼu muna ochochi, u chane̩ ejumama;
Ifraim chʼo̩ma ufe̩do̩-mi?
E̩ kʼoli ujiwe gwanyane̩ ñw o̩la-we̩,
Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ e̩ ale tʼemi tʼano̩mo̩ kade?
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l aka de̩, kakini, E̩ne̩de̩-i ma ñʼadʼo̩la-i ka ojane̩ Juda kpai ef ewo-wñ, e̩gba kʼu mʼamu-ma le̩ ko dabiwa, ma akakini,
Taku Juda kpʼewo ewo-wñ du ajo̩ kpʼomune̩ o̩mo̩, kpʼamaluche̩, kpʼabo ku ma nʼujo̩ ujo̩ e̩wño̩re̩-ma ale.
Todu nache kʼefu onugo one̩ du kʼuhia fʼu hia ki ko̩ oñ naje̩ ñw onugo one̩ du ki ache̩do̩dudu ki bo̩.
E-le̩ kad o̩mo̩, oñ u mʼolu ji, u la go, oñ olu kʼu le̩ la rinyo̩ ñw mi.
Go, o̩jo̩-wñ awa, Jihofa ka-i, e̩gba kʼomi akʼugbe̩ one̩ kpai ugbe̩ e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ gbe̩ unyi Israe̩l kpai unyi Juda.
Oñ alu kʼu te̩tʼafʼeju te̩ ma kʼu chi rinyo̩ kʼu ño̩ kpo̩fo̩, kʼu gu lo̩, kʼu kpabie̩ rinyo̩, kʼu ño̩ chʼo e̩bie̩ne̩, abe̩le̩ nafejute̩ ma kʼu fʼuma ne, kʼu ño̩ ko ma gbe̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Adiko le̩ ma ñʼaka kakini,
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ muda aku tod udu e-wñ ki fe̩; e̩ne̩ du ki fʼe̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩ka je̩, enyi e̩ne̩ le̩ akpijele.
Go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa ka-i, e̩gba kʼomi akpʼalo tito̩ kpʼabunyi Israe̩l kpʼabunyi Juda.
Alo le̩ adab e-kʼomi kpe̩ kpʼamata-ma e̩gba kʼu gwo̩nyu ma o̩wo̩ kʼu ko ma kwʼojane̩ Ijipti dufu le̩ n, alo-mi le̩ ma fʼu bie̩, abu kʼu chaka chʼo̩ko̩ ñwu ma, Jihofa ka-i.
Alo kʼomi akpe̩ kpʼunyi Israe̩l e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ e-le̩ lale la de̩, kakini, Nadʼuko̩-o̩la-mi tʼuma efu, oñ nakʼo̩ nyʼef e̩do̩-ma; tak u nachʼO̩jo̩-ma, oñ ma achʼabo-mi.

Tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ñʼakʼekeji-wñ n, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la ñʼako̩ o̩maye-wñ n kakini, E̩ ki fu Jihofa ma; todu o̩chaka-ma ama mi, akwʼugbo e̩ne̩ ki nya gbogbo wʼugbo e̩ne̩ ki tule ef uma, Jihofa ka-i; todu natʼudu ku ma fe̩ no̩ ñwu ma, u ñʼare-wa adure-ma ge̩ n.
Abu ki Jihofa
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kide̩ kwo bʼumi o̩gba te̩, Jihofa aka-i,
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini:
Go, o̩jo̩-wñ awa, Jihofa ka-i, kʼama ane̩ ewo-i ñw Jihofa, akwʼo̩do̩go̩ Hanane̩l gbogbo wʼalaku agbade aku meji le̩.
Tak iku e̩ñwa-wñ ñʼalo gu o̩mo̩ du kpaala gbogbo wʼuwo Gare̩b, tak i arida wa Goa.

Tak o̩gbo̩ o̩go̩ ugbo kʼoku one̩ kpai elulu-wñ jo̩ le̩ kpai oko oko du gbogbo wʼaji Kidro̩n, wʼagbade alaku Anya kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ olodudu le̩ afo̩ todu Jihofa; ma ñʼachi rinyo̩ n, ma lañʼagulo̩ ogbegbele̩ ge̩ n.
O̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwa ku Ze̩de̩kaya jʼonu Juda, owñ chʼo̩do̩ Ne̩biukadre̩za e̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩.
Iko le̩ abogu onu Babilo̩n kpala nyu Je̩rusale̩m jo̩; ma la fu Je̩re̩maya, akache̩, dahi tʼef ologbo abo ide, e-ki dʼunyi onu Juda le̩.
Todu Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda, fʼu dahi tʼo̩mo̩ kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ akache̩ kʼe̩ kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Go omi adʼewo-i tʼef o̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n; owñ la afʼu du;
Ze̩de̩kaya onu Juda la afʼabo Kaldia o̩wo̩ tane̩ n, ma muda adʼowñ tʼef o̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n chuu, ama meji akʼalu de ako̩la, eju-ma meji la ade.
I adu Ze̩dekaya nyi Babilo̩n. O̩mo̩ i la ade̩ gbogbo tak u nawa fejudo wñ, Jihofa ka-i. Dagba me̩ chaka jogu kpʼabo Kaldia, i ara ñwu me̩ n.
Taku Je̩re̩maya kakini, O̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
Go, Haname̩l, o̩ma Shalum, o̩maye ata-we̩ le̩, awʼugbo we̩ kakini, Mʼoko-mi ki dʼAnato̩t gba la; todu uwe̩ chʼefu pio̩o̩ kʼe̩ nʼo̩da kʼe̩ gba tane̩.

Abe̩le̩ Haname̩l, o̩ma o̩maye ata-mi le̩, lewʼugbo mi ef ologbo abo ide alu kʼo̩la Jihofa ka. Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, Agba e̩ mʼoko-mi ki dʼAnato̩t e-ane̩ Be̩njamin gba la; todu uwe̩ nʼo̩da ogu-wñ eje̩, kpʼo̩da e̩gba tane̩; mʼu gba la ñw o̩la-we̩. E̩gbale̩ omi ma ka kʼo̩la Jihofa le̩ de̩.
Tak u mʼoko ki dʼAnato̩t le̩ gba la o̩wo̩ Haname̩l, o̩ma o̩maye ata-mi le̩. U la fʼo̩ko̩-wñ ñwa ñw u, owñ che she̩ke̩l ajifa me̩gwebie.
Taku mʼo̩wo̩-mi du tʼo̩takada-wñ, u la fʼu hiuko̩. Tak u fʼame̩nibenu do̩ wa, oñ u fʼo̩ko̩-wñ ñwa ñw u oj e̩bo̩.
Abe̩le̩ u mʼo̩takada ijali e̩wñ ela tʼe-ku ma fʼu hiuko̩ alu kʼuko̩-wñ kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ de̩, kpʼe-kʼi chʼe̩bi te̩ ko;

oñ u mʼo̩takada ijali e̩wñ kʼu la le̩ du ñwu Baruk, o̩ma Neraya, o̩ma Maseya, eju Haname̩l, o̩ma o̩maye ata-mi le̩ kpʼeju ame̩nibenu ku ma dʼo̩wo̩-ma tʼo̩takada ijali e̩wñ kʼu la le̩, eju amaJu chaka ku ma gugu jʼef ologbo abo ide le̩.
Tak u ñwañwu Baruk eju-ma kakini,

Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, ka de̩, kakini, Mʼo̩takada ijali-i ko, owñ chʼo̩takada ijali e̩wñ kʼe̩ la ku ma fʼu hiuko̩-i, kpʼo̩takada ijali ki che̩bite̩-i, kʼe̩ ko nyʼef ucha ku ma nʼama bo̩, todu kʼi kpo̩kpe̩.
Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l ka de̩, kakini, Ma ñʼadabi la unyi kpʼane̩ kpʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma oj ane̩-i ge̩.
Oñ abu kʼu mʼo̩takada ijali e̩wñ kʼu la le̩ du ñwu Baruk, o̩ma Neraya, u rodubo̩ Jihofa kakini,
Ayaa, Ondu Jihofa, go, uwe̩ nʼukpahiu-we̩ kpʼo̩wo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ nadala te̩ nyi efojale kpʼane̩ ile̩. I nʼe̩wñ du ki gbiti tʼe̩ le n.
Uwe̩ adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ña abo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩; e̩ la kʼudu kʼamata fe̩ nʼamo̩ma-ma agbe̩do̩ ubi-ma. O̩jo̩ ukpahiu e-inaina, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, oñ odu-wñ ko̩.
Inaina-wñ chʼef o̩la elo, ukpahiu-wñ chʼef uko̩lo̩ eche. Eju-wñ la che̩birʼo̩na o̩na du kʼamone̩ ale, kʼi du ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ teju alu kʼo̩na-wñ de̩, kpai alu kʼe̩ro e̩wñ kʼi ache de̩.
Owñ le̩ kʼi kʼujiwe kpʼuno̩ jo̩ oj ane̩ Ijipti gbogbo tʼojoluñini; tʼef abo Israe̩l tʼef amone̩ ki bo̩; kʼe̩ la fʼodu ne̩ ñw o̩la-we̩ alu ki de̩ eñini-i.
E̩ la nʼujiwe kpʼuno̩ kpʼo̩wo̩ ukpahiu kpʼo̩wo̩ ki chenadala te̩ kpʼubailo lile kʼabo-we̩ Israe̩l kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu.
E̩ laño̩ mʼane̩-i kʼe̩ go̩ ñw amata-ma ka kʼe̩ ko ñwu ma le̩ ko ñwu ma, owñ chʼane̩ ugbo kʼomi e̩nya kpʼiño̩ nacha-i.
Oñ ma lewa mʼu gba; ma muda gbʼomu-we̩ gbo̩ n, ma la lule̩ tʼuko̩-o̩la-we̩ ubi n. Ma te̩tache e̩wñ du kʼe̩ ñwa ñwu ma ku ma che le̩ n. Todule̩ oñ uwe̩ je̩ ñw e̩bie̩ne̩-i du wa bʼuma ma.

E̩ go, ugbudu ugbudu ma kpa jo̩-i, ma lewa ewo-i ku ma fʼu du. Ma la mʼewo-i du tʼo̩wo̩ abo Kaldia ku ma wa akʼogu bʼo̩, todu o̩kwo̩chageli kpʼukpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ ibi. E̩wñ kʼe̩ ka le̩ lewa che me̩. E̩ la go, e̩ cheliʼu.
O Ondu Jihofa, e̩ la ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ nʼo̩ko̩ fʼane̩ uche̩ le̩ la, kʼe̩ dʼame̩nijali wa. E̩ la mʼewo-i du tʼo̩wo̩ abo Kaldia me̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
Go, omi che Jihofa kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ o̩re̩la du. I nʼe̩wñ ki gbiti tʼumi le?
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Go, omi adʼewo-i tʼo̩wo̩ abo Kaldia, kpai tʼo̩wo̩ Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, owñ la adʼu.

Oñ abo Kaldia ku ma kʼogu bʼewo-i awa dʼuna tʼewo-i, ma la agʼu jo, manyʼunyi unyi-wñ ugbo ku ma kʼotulale wa ñwu Beal, ku ma laño̩ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ omi wa dafo ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩ ojokunyi-wñ le̩ ku ma nyʼumi uwe̩do̩.
Todu amo̩ma Israe̩l kpʼamo̩ma Juda fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ kate che eju-mi kwʼo̩jo̩kolobia-ma; todu amo̩ma Israe̩l nʼuko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-ma nyʼumi uwe̩do̩ kate, Jihofa ka-i.
Todu ewo-i tetachʼe̩wñ ki dʼuwe̩do̩ kpʼe̩do̩fulu-mi kwane̩ akwʼo̩jo̩ ku ma ne gbogbo tʼeñini-i; todu kʼu mʼu du bʼumi eju te̩,
todu e̩wñ biene̩ kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l kpʼamo̩ma Juda che ku ma nyʼumi uwe̩do̩, tʼama tʼamonu-ma, tʼamagboji-ma, tʼamatama-ma, tʼamakache̩-ma, tʼabo Juda, tʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m.
Ma la mʼubi dagba mi, ma la dʼeju te̩ ñw mi n. Dagba kʼu chaka ko̩ ma e̩wñ, kʼu la takpa takpa kwane̩ ako̩ ma, ma la neti ku ma gbʼuko̩-o̩la n.
Ma muda kʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma jʼef unyi ku ma dʼodu-mi mʼo̩ le̩, ku ma fʼu daji.

Ma laño̩ ne otete otete Beal, kʼi jo̩ ef o̩go̩ o̩ma Hinom le̩, kʼama ki je̩ ñw amo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ ku ma lewa gu ef una du nyʼugbo Mole̩k. Omi la ñwʼe-le̩ ñwu ma n, i la wewʼef e̩do̩-mi kʼama ki che e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abe̩i, ku ma je̩ ñwu Juda dure n.
Todule̩ fa-i e̩wñ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩ Israe̩l aka ugbo ewo-i ku me̩ nʼo̩la-wñ aka kakini, Ma mʼu du tʼo̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n lugbo o̩kwo̩chageli kpʼo̩kpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ ibi, kakini,
Go, nako ma kwʼojane̩ ojane̩ du ugbo kʼu ne ma nyi ef uwe̩do̩-mi kpʼe̩do̩fulu-mi kpʼeju e̩kpa nana nana wa; oñ nako ma dabi wʼuña-i, u la aje̩ ñwu ma jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩.
Tak ama ache amone̩-mi, oñ omi ache O̩jo̩ e-ma.
U la adʼe̩do̩ʼka kpʼo̩naʼka ñwu ma kʼama ki railo mi ogbegbele̩, todu ki mud e̩nyo̩ ñwu ma kpʼamo̩ma-ma ubi-ma ge̩.
Tak omi akpʼalo ogbegbele̩ kpʼama, kʼomi ma ñʼana bʼuma ubi te̩ ef e̩nyo̩ eche ñwu ma n. Omi la adʼailo-mi tʼef e̩do̩-ma, kʼama ki we ekwo bʼumi te̩.
Ochochi, nayo̩ ñwu ma kʼu che e̩nyo̩ ñwu ma. U la ako ma gbe̩ ef ane̩-i ef ochochi kpʼe̩do̩-mi chaka, kpʼonugo-mi chaka ge̩.
Todu abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Alu kʼu ko e̩bie̩ne̩ inaina-i wa abʼamone̩-i ma, abe̩le̩ nakʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ du kʼu kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ ñwu ma wa abʼuma ma ge̩.
Ma la alʼane̩ uche̩ oj ane̩-i ugbo ku me̩ kakini, I chʼalache̩ te̩ ofo, one̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ de̩ n, ma mʼu du tʼo̩wo̩ abo Kaldia me̩.

O̩mo̩ amone̩ anʼo̩ko̩ la ane̩ uche̩, ma la adʼo̩wo̩ tʼo̩takada ijali-wñ, ma la a hi uko̩, oñ ma adʼame̩nibenu wa oj ane̩ Be̩njamin, kpʼane̩ ki le̩ Je̩rusale̩m daka kpʼewo ewo Juda kpʼewo ewo ane̩ uwo kpʼewo ewo ugbo kʼane̩ de̩ te̩e̩le̩ kpʼewo ewo ane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, todu naje̩ ñw amu ma ki rida ku ma dabi, Jihofa ka-i.
Tak o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya onuʼke̩ji abu ku ma fʼu dahi te̩ ologbo unyi abo ide le̩, kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa, kʼi ache ka de̩, owñ che Jihofa kʼi fʼu bo̩ kʼi lonyane̩; odu-wñ ko̩ Jihofa; i kakini,
kwa do̩ mi, oñ nadohi ñw e̩, u la akʼe̩wñ inaina kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ ma tu n e-kʼuwe̩ ma mʼo̩ n ñʼuwe̩.
Todu abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, ka ugbo unyi unyi ewo-i kpai ugbo unyi unyi amonu Juda ku ma kpo̩fo̩ wane̩ ku ma mʼu ko chʼaku tod ugbudu ku ma du le̩ kpai o̩kwo̩chageli.

Abu ku ma wa akogu bʼabo Kaldia, ku ma ño̩ kʼoku one̩ jʼef uwñ e̩ko̩, owñ chʼone̩ kʼomi kpa ef uwe̩do̩-mi kpai ef e̩do̩fulu-mi, kpʼabo du kʼe̩wñ bibi-ma ku ma che je̩ ñwu mi dʼeju-mi maja bʼewo-i te̩.
Go nafʼikete-ma ji kʼu fʼu kpa, oñ nachʼo̩ga-ma kpa; tak u nadʼure̩do̩ kpʼochochi ololo ololo tejugede ñwu ma.
Tak u nafʼamu Juda kpʼamu Israe̩l rida, oñ nadabi ne ma alu ku ma de̩ e̩gba ejodudu le̩.
U la agwe̩ ma bʼudu du ku ma fe̩ ku ma du mi re le̩ te̩. U la atʼudu du ku ma fe̩ ku ma du mi re le̩ no̩ ge̩,

oñ ewo-i achʼodu uyo̩ ñwu mi kpʼuñwulo̩ kpʼojima eju abo uche̩ichi ane̩ ile̩-i du, ku ma agbʼinabali e̩nyo̩ du kʼu nache ñwu ma. Ma la arailo, o̩la-ma aga noji e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ du kpʼure̩do̩ du kʼomi agba wa ñw u.

Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, Ugbo-i ku me̩ kʼo̩la-wñ kakini, oku ane̩ i che, one̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ dʼemi n, owñ chʼef ewo ewo Juda kpʼo̩na o̩na Je̩rusale̩m ugbo kʼi chʼalache̩, ugbo kʼone̩ ma de̩ n, kʼone̩ ma dodo n, kʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ du ma do̩mo̩ n-i,

ma adabi gbo̩ omuko̩la uyo̩ kpʼomuko̩la e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ kpʼomuko̩la o̩ko̩ya tito̩ kpʼomuko̩la o̩ya tito̩, kpʼomuko̩la abo ku ma kakini, A ki gogbodo̩ Jihofa kʼi nʼe̩wñ du, todu Jihofa che nyo̩, todu ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ chʼogbegbele̩, kpʼe-abo ku ma kʼe̩wñ ugwa wʼef unyi Jihofa ge̩. Todu nache kʼamu ane̩-i kʼi rida kʼi dʼalu kʼi de̩ e̩gba ejodudu le̩, Jihofa aka-i.

Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Ef uña oku ane̩ ugbo kʼone̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ma de̩ n-i, kpʼewo ewo-wñ chaka, ugbo kʼamadidala agugu, ku ma ñʼaje̩ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩-ma egini ki dachi jo̩, adabi de̩ ge̩.

Ef ewo ewo ane̩ uwo-wñ, kpai ef ewo ewo ane̩ o̩go̩-wñ, kpʼef ewo ewo o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, kpʼe-oj ane̩ Be̩njamin, kpʼuña uña ki me̩ru Je̩rusale̩m kpʼewo ewo Juda, ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ñʼadabi le o̩gane̩ o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi akʼuma aluka okoke, Jihofa ka-i.
Go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa ka-i, kʼomi ache teju o̩la e̩nyo̩ kʼu ka ugbo unyi Israe̩l kpai ugbo unyi Juda.
Iko le̩ kpʼe̩gba le̩, naje̩ ñw Epa O̩kpakpa kʼi pa ñwu Defid; owñ le̩ ache teju alu kʼoji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa ka, i la ache e̩wñ o̩kpakpa oj ane̩-i.
Iko le̩ ma ajadu Juda, Je̩rusale̩m la agugu to̩ko̩o̩; odu-wñ ku ma la adʼo̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, JIHOFA O̩KPAKPA-WA.
Todu abuki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, One̩ aña Defid kʼi gugu oj ede abo unyi Israe̩l ogbegbele̩ n;
one̩ kʼi akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa, kʼi la agu e̩wñ ele ku ma ko wa jo, kʼi la ñʼachʼiche̩bo̩ o̩gba-mi o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ la aña amatama ku ma chʼabo Lifai n.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ neke fʼalo-mi e-o̩ro̩ka bie̩, kpʼalo-mi e-odu, kʼodu kpʼo̩ro̩ka ki we ede̩ iko-wñ,
mak e̩gba le̩ ma neke ño̩ fʼalo-mi kʼu kpe̩ kpai Defid adu-mi bie̩, todu kʼi we enʼo̩ma kʼi ajʼonu gugu oj ede-wñ; kpʼabo Lifai ku ma chʼamatama, abo ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu mi le̩.
Abu ku ma ma neke kʼuwewe e̩wñ ojale aluka n, ku ma ma la neke ñwa e̩lanyi ohimini n; alu le̩ naje̩ ñw ugbe̩ Defid adu-mi, kpʼugbe̩ abo Lifai ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu mi wewe nyʼo̩gba.
Oñ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
Ibe-we̩ chetʼe̩wñ kʼabo-i jʼaka kakini, O̩pu meji ki Jihofa chi le̩, i mʼu ko rinyo̩ me̩ n? Abu ku ma chʼe̩de̩te̩ abo-mi de̩, kʼama ki we echʼuche̩ichi amone̩ eju-ma.
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼalo-mi e-o̩ro̩ka kpʼodu ma dago n, kʼi ma chʼomi fʼuhio̩me̩ efojale kpʼane̩-ile̩ ñwa te̩ n;
mak e̩gbale̩ omi ñʼakʼugbe̩ Jeko̩b kpʼe-Defid, adu-mi, rinyo̩, kʼu we echi ugbe̩-wñ ku ma chʼame̩nuto̩gba ugbe̩ Ebraham kpʼAise̩k kpai Jeko̩b in; todu narʼamu-ma da bʼuma te̩, oñ nali uma ejumomi.

O̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya, e̩gba ki Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu Babilo̩n, kpʼabogu-wñ chaka kpʼojane̩ ojane̩ ile̩-i du kʼi nʼo̩da-ma, kpʼamone̩ du nakʼogu bo̩ Je̩rusale̩m kpʼewo ewo-wñ chaka, kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩ kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ ko̩la ñwu Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda, kʼe̩ ka ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, Go, nadʼewo-i tʼo̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n, owñ la anʼuna fʼu gujo;
uwe̩ ñʼafʼo̩ o̩wo̩ n; ma amʼe̩ chuu, ku ma mʼe̩ du tʼo̩wo̩-wñ; eju-we̩ la ali eju onu Babilo̩n. Owñ la anʼalu-wñ ko̩la ñw e̩. Tak uwe̩ anyi Babilo̩n.
E̩ muda gbo̩ o̩la Jihofa, O Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda, abu ki Jihofa nʼo̩la-we̩ aka de̩, kakini, Uwe̩ aku uku o̩kwo̩chageli n;

uwe̩ aku ef ure̩do̩; oñ alu ku ma gu e̩wñ jo̩ ñw amata-we̩, amonu ku ma je̩ o̩gba we̩ le̩, abe̩le̩ ma agu e̩wñ jo todu we̩; ma la adʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩ kakini, Aya, odu-mi! Todu u fʼo̩la le̩ ka me̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Taku Je̩re̩maya, akache̩, kʼo̩la-i du ñwu Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda efu Je̩rusale̩m,
e̩gba kʼabogu onu Babilo̩n jʼakʼogu bo̩ Je̩rusale̩m, kpʼewo ewo Juda ki bo̩, kpai Lakish, kpai Azika; todu abʼe-le̩ kate bo̩ chʼewo Juda ki nʼaku.
O̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa lewʼugbo Je̩re̩maya le̩ de̩, owñ chʼabu ku Ze̩de̩kaya, onu, kpʼalo kpʼamone̩ ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m chaka ku ma adʼomi nʼo̩la-mi kpogo ñwu ma;
kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki tʼadu-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, kpʼadu-wñ onobule̩, ku ma chʼabo Hibru, no̩ tane̩; kʼe̩ne̩ du ki we ekʼama chʼadu, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki che Ju, o̩maye-wñ.

Tak amagboji kpʼamone̩ du ku ma jʼef alo le̩ ekpe̩ mu gbagbo̩, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ tʼadu-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼadu-wñ onobule̩ no̩ tane̩, kʼe̩ne̩ du ki ño̩ ko ma chʼadu ge̩ n. Ma mu gbagbo̩, oñ ma tʼuma no̩.
Ama ubi le̩ ma murida, oñ ma je̩ ñw amadu-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ ku ma tʼuma no̩ tane̩ le̩ mudabi, oñ ma fʼuma kamuhite̩ ku ma chʼamadu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ ge̩.
Todule̩ o̩la Jihofa kwʼugbo Jihofa lewʼugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, Omi kpʼalo kpʼamata-me̩ o̩jo̩ kʼu ko ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti kwef unyi adu le̩ dufu, kakini,

O̩do̩ mebie muda e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki tʼo̩maye-wñ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ Hibru no̩ tane̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma dʼu ta ñw e̩ la, kʼi la fʼuko̩lo̩ o̩do̩ me̩fa che ñw e̩; uwe̩ ki tʼo̩ no̩ tane̩ bʼo̩la-we̩ te̩ ofofo. Amata-me̩ muda netiru mi n, ma la hi eti-ma wane̩ n.
Me̩ la rida faifai me̩, oñ me̩ fʼe̩wñ ki chʼo̩kpakpa eju-mi che, owñ chʼe-kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ka ñw ekeji-wñ ka kʼomi nʼo̩la-mi; me̩ la fʼalo kpe̩ eju-mi ef unyi ku ma dʼodu-mi mʼo̩ le̩.

Me̩ muda rida, oñ me̩ fʼodu-mi bie̩; oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ je̩ ñw adu-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ ku me̩ tʼuma no̩ tane̩ ku ma le alu ki nyo̩ ma eju, ku ma mudabi wa. Me̩ la ño̩ fʼuma kamuhite̩, ku ma chʼadu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ ñwu me̩.

Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Ane̩ la netirʼumi kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki ka ñw o̩maye-wñ kpʼekeji-wñ ka kʼomi nʼo̩la-mi n; Go, nadʼomi nʼo̩la-mi kpogo ñwu me̩ ugbo o̩kwo̩chageli kpʼe̩wñ ibi kpʼo̩kpo̩ta; oñ naje̩ ñw abo ojane̩ ojane̩ ile̩-i du ku ma ko me̩ jo̩ aro̩ tʼemi tʼano̩mo̩ ef uma.
Oñ nakʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma fʼada alo-mi je̩, ku ma ma che teju o̩la alo ku ma kpe̩ o̩gba-mi e̩gba ku ma fʼo̩mokuno̩ le̩ ko̩da meji ku ma lale gu alumeji-wñ du le̩ n;
owñ chʼamagboji Juda kpʼamagboji Je̩rusale̩m kpʼamonoji kpʼanaatama kpʼamone̩ ane̩ le̩ kʼama lale gu alumeji e̩ko̩da o̩mokuno̩ le̩ du chaka;
ama le̩ nako ma jʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-ma, kpai jʼef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma tene oji-ma; oñ oku-ma ajo̩ ñw ame̩we̩ ojale ki chʼuje̩-wñ ñwu ma, kpʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ane̩-ile̩-i.
Omi la ñʼako Ze̩de̩kaya onu Juda kpʼamagboji-wñ jʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-ma, kpai jʼef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma teno oji-ma, kpai jʼef o̩wo̩ abogu onu Babilo̩n ku ma kwo bʼume̩ te̩ le̩.
Go, omi añwa ñwu ma, Jihofa ka-i, oñ naje̩ ñwu ma mudabi wʼewo-i; ma la akogu bʼo̩, oñ ma fʼu du ku ma la anʼuna gʼu jo; oñ omi aje̩ ñw ewo ewo Juda chʼalache̩ te̩, one̩ ñʼadodo ef uwñ n.
O̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya iko Jiho̩yakim, o̩ma Josaya, onu Juda kakini,
E̩ nyʼunyi abo Rekab kʼe̩ ko̩la ñwu ma, kʼe̩ la mʼuma ko wʼef unyi Jihofa, nyʼef e̩ko̩da-wñ oka, kʼe̩ dʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma ñwu ma ñmo̩.
Tak u mu Jaazaniya, o̩ma Je̩re̩maya, o̩ma Haba-ziniya kpai amo̩maye-wñ kpʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼabo unyi Rekab chaka;

oñ u mʼuma ko wʼef unyi Jihofa, nyʼef e̩ko̩da unyi amo̩ma Hanan, o̩ma Igdaliya, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, kʼe-ko̩da-wñ me̩rʼe̩ko̩da unyi amagboji, e-kʼi dʼate̩ ñw e̩ko̩da unyi Maaseya, o̩ma Shalum, kʼi ade alo̩na.
Tak u mʼugba kʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma che̩ko̩-wñ kpʼago ko jʼane̩ o̩gba amo̩ma abunyi Rekab; oñ u ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ñmʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma.
Ma muda kakini, Awa añmʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma du n; todu ata-wa Jo̩nadab, o̩ma Rekab, ñwa ñw a kakini, Ame̩ ki ñmʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma n, tʼame̩, tʼamo̩ma-me̩, ogbegbele̩.
Me̩ ki la ko̩ unyi n, me̩ ki gbe̩ e̩wñ n, me̩ ki chi achiwebe̩te̩ma ne ef uche̩ n, me̩ ki la nʼe-du n. O̩jo̩ udeju-me̩ du me̩ ki gugu ef unyabo, kʼame̩ ki kwojolugbo oj ane̩ ugbo ku me̩ ge̩ne̩-i.
A la gbʼomu ata-wa Jo̩nadab, o̩ma Rekab, ugbo e̩wñ du kʼi ñwañw a, kʼa we eñmʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma o̩jo̩ du kʼa adeju kade, tʼawa, tʼamo̩ya-wa, tʼamo̩ma-wa e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼamo̩ma-wa onobule̩;
a la ko̩ unyi kʼa gugu ef uwñ n; a la nʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma n, a nʼuche̩ n, a la nʼulu e̩wñ n.
A muda gugu ef unyabo, oñ a gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩, a la che teju alu du ku Jo̩nadab ata-wa ñwa ñw a.
Ama i lewatʼe̩gba ku Ne̩biu-kadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n wa oj ane̩-i, tak a kakini, Lewa, kʼa nyi Je̩rusale̩m tod ailo abogu abo Kaldia kpʼailo abogu abo Siria kʼi aba wa; oñ a gugu Je̩rusale̩m-i.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l aka de̩ kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ ka ñw aboke̩le̩ Juda kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m, kakini, ame̩ agba o̩la ku ma ko̩ me̩ ku me̩ netirʼo̩la-mi n? Jihofa aka-i.

O̩la ku Jo̩nadab, o̩ma Rekab, ñwa ñw amo̩ma-wñ ku ma we eñmʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma, ma che tʼeju-wñ; gbogbo tʼeñini ma ñmʼe-du n, todu ma gbʼuko̩ kʼata-ma te̩ ñwu ma gbo̩. Omi la ko̩la ñwu me̩, etakpa omi takpa kwane̩ ako̩la, me̩ la netirʼo̩la-mi n.

Omi laño̩ fʼamadu-mi amakache̩ chaka kpe̩ rʼume̩, etakpa omi takpa kwane̩ akpe̩ ma, kakini. E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki nadabi bʼo̩na-wñ ki bie̩ne̩ te̩, me̩ nache e̩wñ ki nyo̩, me̩ ki la tʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi ku me̩ re̩ ma n, tak ame̩ agugu oj ane̩ kʼomi du ñwu me̩ kpʼamata-me̩. Me̩ muda hi eti-me̩ wane̩ n, me̩ la netirʼo̩la-mi n.
Abu kʼamo̩ma Jo̩nadab, o̩ma Rekab che teju uko̩ kʼamata-ma te̩ ñwu ma, kʼamone̩-i muda anetirʼo̩la e-mi n;

todule̩ abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi akʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du kʼu ka nyʼuma le̩ wa abʼabo Juda kpʼabʼabo du ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m ma; todabu kʼomi ko̩la ñwu ma, ku ma ma gbo̩ n; u la do̩ ma, ma la je̩ n.

Taku Je̩re̩maya ka ñw abo unyi Rekab kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, Todabu kʼame̩ gbʼuko̩ kʼata-me̩ Jo̩nadab te̩ ñwu me̩ gbo̩, ku me̩ la fʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ de, ku me̩ la che teju e̩wñ du kʼi fʼuko̩-wñ te̩ ñwu me̩ le̩;
todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩ kakini, One̩ aña Jo̩nadab, o̩ma Rekab, kʼi adago o̩gba-mi o̩jo̩ du ki ñwa n.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ku Jiho̩yakim, o̩ma Josaya, jʼonu Juda, o̩la-i kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya, kakini,

E̩ mʼibuku ku ma ko̩ nyʼo̩la-wñ le̩ du, kʼe̩ fʼo̩la du kʼu ka ñw e̩, achagwunyʼIsrae̩l kpai Juda kpʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du akwo o̩jo̩ kʼu chane̩ eko̩la ñw e̩, owñ chʼakwʼo̩kpanachi Josaya gbogbo wʼeñini-i.
Ikani abunyi Juda anetirʼinabali e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du kʼibe-wñ dʼef umi kʼu nache ma, todu kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki rida bʼo̩na-wñ ki bie̩ne̩ te̩, kʼomi ki tʼudu ku ma fe̩ kpʼadure-ma no̩ ñwu ma.
Taku Je̩re̩maya fu Baruk, o̩ma Neraya, do̩ wa; oñ Baruk fʼo̩la du ki kwʼalu Je̩re̩maya e-ki Jihofa ka ñw u ko̩ nyʼibuku le̩.
Taku Je̩re̩maya ñwa ñwu Baruk kakini, Ma fʼumi dahi te̩, u neke nyʼef unyi Jihofa n;

todule̩ uwe̩ ki le, oñ o̩jo̩ alu eji uwe̩ ki cho̩kalatu o̩la Jihofa ki dʼef ibuku kʼe̩ ko̩ kwʼalu-mi le̩, ef unyi Jihofa ugbo kʼamone̩ du agbʼo̩. Uwe̩ ki ño̩ chʼo̩kalatu wñ ugbo kʼamone̩ Juda du ku ma kwʼewo ewo-ma awa agbʼo̩ ge̩.
Ikani o̩ko̩ ku ma gbabʼo̩ awʼo̩gba Jihofa, kʼe̩ne̩ du adabi bʼo̩na-wñ kiʼ bie̩ne̩ te̩; todu uwe̩do̩ kpʼe̩do̩fulu ki Jihofa ka nyʼabo-i gbe̩.
Baruk, o̩ma Neraya, la che alu du ki Je̩re̩maya, akache̩, ñwa ñw u. I fʼo̩kalatu o̩la Jihofa ki dʼef ibuku le̩ che ef unyi Jihofa.
Oñ o̩do̩ e̩ke̩lu ku Jiho̩yakim, o̩ma Jo̩saya, jʼonu Juda, ochu e̩ke̩la-wñ, abo Je̩rusale̩m chaka kpʼamone̩ du ku ma kwʼewo ewo Juda wa Je̩rusale̩m fʼo̩jo̩ i alu eji o̩gba Jihofa da.

E̩gbale̩ Baruk fʼo̩kalatu o̩la Je̩re̩maya ki dʼef ibuku le̩ che ef unyi Jihofa, ef e̩ko̩da-wñ ugbo ku Ge̩maraya, o̩ma She̩fan, ako̩takada de̩, ef ologbo ate̩-wñ, ugbo alaku etito̩ unyi Jihofa ugbo kʼamone̩ du gbʼo̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku Maikaya, o̩ma Ge̩maraya, o̩ma Shefan, gbʼo̩la Jihofa du kwef ibuku le̩,

i mugwo̩ru nyʼef unyi onu, tʼef e̩ko̩da unyi ako̩takada; e̩ la go, amagboji chaka gugu jʼo̩mo̩. Ama che Elishama, ako̩takada, kpai Delaya, o̩ma Shemaya, kpai E̩lne-tan, o̩ma Akbor, kpai Ge̩maraya, o̩ma Shefan, kpai Ze̩de̩kaya, o̩ma Hananaya, kpʼamagboji chaka.
Taku Maikaya fʼo̩la du kʼi gbo̩ e̩gba ku Baruk fʼo̩la ibuku kalata ugbo kʼamone̩ agbʼo̩ ka jʼane̩ ñwu ma.

Tak amagboji le̩ chaka fu Jehudi, o̩ma Netanaya o̩ma Shele̩maya, o̩ma Kushi, kpe̩ nyʼugbo Baruk kakini, Mʼibuku kʼe̩ fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che ugbo kʼamone̩ du gbo̩ le̩ mʼu du nʼo̩wo̩ kʼe̩ nawa. Abe̩le̩ Baruk, o̩ma Neraya, mʼibuku le̩ du nʼo̩wo̩, oñ i lewʼugbo ma.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Gugu ane̩ kʼe̩ fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che kʼa agbʼo̩. Oñ Baruk fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che ñwu ma gbo̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma gbʼo̩la le̩ du, ailo fʼuma mu oñ ma chane̩ erʼeju da go omune̩, oñ ma ka ñwu Baruk, kakini, A adʼo̩la-i du ka ñw onu chuu.
Taku ma tu Baruk ene kakini, Ka ñw a ta, ab e̩ le kʼe̩ kʼo̩la-i chaka? I nʼalu-wñ ka ñw e̩?
Baruk dohi ñwu ma kakini, Owñ nʼalu-wñ kʼo̩la-i du ñwu mi, oñ omi nʼomi-ejiji fʼu ko̩ nyʼibuku-i.
Tak amagboji le̩ ka ñwu Baruk kakini, Uwe̩ kpai Je̩re̩maya ki nyʼamaja. Me̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ki ma ugbo ku me̩ jo̩ n.
Taku ma nyʼef ologbo ugbo onu; ma muda dʼibuku le̩ ne ef e̩ko̩da unyi Elishama, ako̩takada le̩. Taku ma mʼo̩la le̩ du du ka ñw onu gbo̩.
Tak onu fu Jehudi kpe̩ nyʼadʼibuku le̩ wa, Oñ i mʼu du kwef e̩ko̩da unyi Elishama, ako̩takada le̩. Taku Jehudi fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che ñw onu kpʼamagboji chaka ku ma jo̩ kpenyʼonu gbo̩.
Onu la gugu ef unyi ugbo kʼi agugu o̩jo̩ uwo ochu e̩ke̩la; una la jʼef aido o̩gba-wñ.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku Jehudi fʼo̩kalatu o̩gba me̩ta ñw e̩le̩ che, onu mʼagbeli ako̩takada du kʼo̩ da, oñ i mʼu ko ro̩ nyʼuna ki dʼef aido le̩, gbogbo tak una ki dʼaido fʼibuku le̩ jo kpa.
Ailo la ba ma n, ma la fʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma na n, tʼonu, tʼe̩ne̩ du ef abuko̩lo̩-wñ ku ma gbʼo̩la le̩ chaka.
Manyʼe-le̩ ge̩, E̩lnetan kpai Delaya kpai Ge̩maraya gbo̩ko̩bʼonu kʼi we egu ibuku le̩ jo; i muda ko̩ egbʼomu-ma.
Tak onu ñwa ñwu Je̩re̩mee̩l, o̩ma onu, kpai Se̩raya o̩ma Azrie̩l, kpai Shelamaya, o̩ma Abdee̩l, ku ma mu Baruk ako̩takada le̩ kpai Je̩re̩maya akache̩. Jihofa muda mʼuma ko maja.
Tak abu kʼonu fʼibuku le̩ gujo kpʼo̩la ki kwʼalu Je̩re̩maya e-ki Baruk ko̩ le̩, o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
E̩ ki dabi mʼibuku omune̩ du kʼe̩ fʼo̩la o̩gbo̩gba le̩ du ki jʼef ibuku e-ki Jiho̩yakim, onu Juda, gujo le̩ ko̩ nyʼu.

E̩ ki laño̩ nʼo̩la Jiho̩yakim, onu Juda, aka kakini. Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, Uwe̩ fʼibuku-i gujo, kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ko̩ nyʼu? kakini, Onu Babilo̩n awa fʼane̩-i chile̩che̩ chuu, kʼi la aje̩ ñw one̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ku ma we ejʼo̩mo̩?
Todule̩ o̩la Jiho̩yakim, onu Juda, ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Owñ anʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi agugu oj ede Defidi n; ma la adʼoku-wñ ro̩ tʼo̩do̩da ñw olu o̩ro̩ka, i la ate̩ ñw afu odu.

Omi la abʼudu ñw u kpʼugbe̩-wñ kpʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ todu udu ku ma fe̩. Omi la ako e̩bie̩ne̩ du kʼu ka nyʼuma o̩la ku ma ma gbo̩ n le̩ wa abʼama kpʼabʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m kpʼabʼaboke̩le̩ Juda oji ma.

Taku Je̩re̩maya mʼibuku omune̩ du oñ i mʼu du ñwu Baruk, o̩ma Neraya, ako̩takada le̩, owñ le̩ la fʼo̩la du ki jʼef ibuku ku Jiho̩yakim, onu Juda, gujo ef una le̩ ko̩ nyʼu kwef alu Je̩re̩maya ge̩. Ma ño̩ ko̩ o̩la e̩go̩-wñ wewe manyʼu ge̩.
Oñ Ze̩de̩kaya, o̩ma Josaya ku Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n du jʼonu ane̩ Juda, jʼonu koji Konaya, o̩ma Jiho̩yakim.
Ama tʼowñ, tʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ, tʼamone̩ ane̩ le̩ la netirʼo̩la Jihofa e-kʼi ka ñwu ma lʼalu Je̩re̩maya, akache̩ le̩ n.
Ze̩de̩kaya, onu, la fu Jehukal, o̩ma Shelamaya, kpai Ze̩fanaya, o̩ma Maaseya atama le̩, kpe̩ nyʼugbo Je̩re̩maya akache̩, kakini, E̩ rodubo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa todu wa fai ke.
E̩gbale̩ Je̩re̩maya do̩mo̩ alelo lewa ef amone̩ le̩; todu ma dʼu tʼunyi uga ta n.
Abogu Fero la kwʼIjipti dufu wa me̩. Oñ e̩gba kʼabo Kaldia ku ma kpala nyu Je̩rusale̩m gbʼinabali-ma, ma muchi kwo bi Je̩rusale̩m te̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya akache̩ kakini,

Abu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩ Israe̩l ka de̩, kakini, Abu ku me̩ aka ñw onu Juda kʼi kpe̩ me̩ wʼugbo mi ku me̩ tʼumi ene le̩ de̩, kakini. Go, abogu Fero ku ma dufu wa ku ma te̩ko we̩ adabi tʼIjipti, tʼane̩ e-ma le̩.
Tak abo Kaldia ñʼadabi wa ku ma la akogu bʼewo-i. Ma la adʼu, oñ ma anʼuna gujo.
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, Me̩ ki dʼo̩la-me̩ ibe n kakini. Abo Kaldia akwo bʼuwa te̩ chuu; todu ama akwo bʼume̩ te̩ n.
Todu dagba me̩ ma fʼabogu abo Kaldia ku ma kogu bʼume̩ chaka gwoda, kʼabo ku ma che ma agbe kate ma bo̩ ef uma, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ma kwane̩ ef unyabo-wñ, ku ma la nʼuna agu ewo-i jo.
Oñ i lewatʼabu kʼabogu abo Kaldia muchi bi Je̩rusale̩m te̩ tod ailo abogu Fero ku ma ra,
taku Je̩re̩maya kwo Je̩rusale̩m dufu kʼi nyʼane̩ Be̩njamin kʼi mʼukpe̩ e-wñ gba ef amone̩ o̩mo̩.

Oñ e̩gba kʼi lewʼalaku Be̩njamin, agboji abideʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Irija, o̩ma Shelemaya o̩ma Hananaya, dʼano̩mo̩ oñ i gwo̩nyu Je̩re̩maya akache̩, kakini, Uwe̩ ache kʼe̩ kwef uwa kʼe̩ nyʼugbo abo Kaldia de̩.
Taku Je̩re̩maya kakini, Olemi, omi ahi ume̩ tinyo̩ kʼu nanyʼugbo abo Kaldia n. I muda netirʼu n; abe̩le̩ Irija gwo̩nyu Je̩re̩maya oñ i mʼu du wʼugbo amagboji.
Amagboji le̩ la we̩do̩ru Je̩re̩maya, ma fʼu gwo, oñ ma mʼu du tʼef unyi uga ef unyi Jo̩natan ako̩takada; todu o̩mo̩ ma dʼu chʼunyi uga.
E̩gba ku Je̩re̩maya lewʼef unyi uga ef e̩ko̩da unyi kekele ugbo ku ma mʼone̩ te̩, ku Je̩re̩maya la jʼo̩jo̩ wewe o̩mo̩;
taku Ze̩de̩kaya fʼone̩ kpe̩ wa amʼu du. Oñ onu tʼowñ ene ejubi ef unyi-wñ kakini, I nʼo̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa ge̩? Taku Je̩re̩maya kakini, I do̩mo̩. I ño̩ kakini, Ma adʼuwe̩ tʼo̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n.
Je̩re̩maya ño̩ ka ñwu Ze̩de̩kaya onu kakini, Ugbo omi dʼuwe̩ abe̩k abuko̩lo̩-we̩ abe̩k amone̩-i re, kʼame̩ dʼumi tʼef unyi uga-i ta?
Ugbo amakache̩-me̩ ku ma kache̩ ñwu me̩ kakini, Onu Babilo̩n awa kobʼume̩ kpʼane̩-i ge̩ n, jo̩ ge̩?
O, odu-mi onu, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ gbo̩ fai ke; nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñw ologu kʼu nache kʼi wʼo̩gba-we̩, kʼuwe̩ ki we eje̩ ñwu ma dʼumi dabi tʼunyi Jo̩natan, ako̩takada, tode̩gba kʼu naku o̩mo̩.

Taku Ze̩de̩kaya onu ñwa ñwu ma, oñ ma du Je̩re̩maya nyʼefologbo abide. Oñ ma dʼodukulu akalaʼka ñw u o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa kwʼej o̩na amachʼakala, gbogbo tak akala ño̩ bo̩ ef ewo le̩ ge̩ n. Abe̩le̩ Je̩re̩maya tʼologbo ugbo abide le̩.
Oñ She̩fe̩taya, o̩ma Matan, kpai Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Pashur, kpai Jukal, o̩ma She̩le̩maya, kpai Pashur, o̩ma Malkija, gbʼo̩la ku Je̩re̩maya aka ñw amone̩ le̩ du kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, E̩ne̩ ki gugu ef ewo-i o̩kwo̩chageli kpai ukpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ bibi akpa; e̩ne̩ ki muda dufu nyʼugbo abo̩ Kaldia adeju. Oji-wñ achʼe̩wñ kʼi aje̩ ef ogu le̩, oñ i adeju.
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, Ma adʼewo-i tʼef o̩wo̩ abogu onu Babilo̩n chuu; owñ le̩ adʼu.

Tak amagboji ka ñw onu kakini, O̩ko̩ a agba bʼe̩, e̩ je̩ ñwu ma dʼe̩ne̩-i kpa, todabu kʼi aje̩ ñw o̩wo̩ abogu ku ma bo̩ ewo-i ki bulo̩, kpʼo̩wo̩ amone̩-i chaka, ugbo o̩la abe̩le̩ kʼi aka ñwu ma. Todu e̩ne̩-i atene o̩lafia amone̩-i n, chai e̩bie̩ne̩.
Taku Ze̩de̩kaya, onu, kakini, Go, i dʼef o̩wo̩-me̩ me̩; todu onu-i neke che e̩wñ du kʼi akpʼo̩na nyʼume̩ n.

Taku ma mu Je̩re̩maya du, oñ ma mʼu du rikpolo tef ura Malkija, o̩ma onu, kʼi dʼef ologbo abide le̩. Iku ma du ro̩ tu Je̩re̩maya oñ ma ne̩ du tʼef ura le̩. Omiofo la dʼef ura le̩ n chai e̩pio̩. Oñ Je̩re̩maya kwo tunyʼe̩pio̩ le̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku E̩be̩d-me̩le̩k, e̩ne̩ Itiopia, onoji kʼi dʼef unyi onu, gbo̩ ka ku ma mu Je̩re̩maya du tef ura le̩ (onu la gugu alaku Be̩njamin iko le̩),
E̩be̩d-me̩le̩k kwef unyi onu dufu, oñ iko̩la ñw onu kakini,
Odu-mi, onu, e̩wñ du kʼabo-i che Je̩re̩maya, akache̩ le̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ ma che. Ma mʼu du rikpolo tef ura le̩. Eku i aku ugbo kʼi de̩ le̩ tod o̩kpo̩ta ki akpa; todu uje̩wñ ño̩ bo̩ ewo-i ge̩ n.
Tak onu ñwa ñw E̩be̩d-me̩le̩k, e̩ne̩ Itiopia le̩, kakini, E̩ mʼone̩ ogue̩gwa ko kwʼemi ku ma le bʼuwe̩, kʼe̩ mu Je̩re̩maya akache̩ du kwef ura le̩ o̩gba tak i ku.

Abe̩le̩ E̩be̩d-me̩le̩k mʼabo le̩ ko lebʼowñ oñ i nyʼef unyi onu o̩gane̩ unyi o̩pata e̩wñ akoko-wñ oñ i mʼe̩gbanukpo kpʼe̩wñ o̩la ki gbo ko kwʼo̩mo̩, oñ i nʼiku kʼukpo le̩ wʼane̩ ef ura le̩ ugbo Je̩re̩maya.
Tak E̩be̩d-me̩le̩k e̩ne̩ Itiopia le̩ ka ñwu Je̩re̩maya kakini, Mʼukpo-i ko lʼef iya-we̩ de kʼiku-i ki lʼoji-wñ. Je̩re̩maya la fʼabe̩le̩ che.
Oñ ma nʼiku le̩ fa Je̩re̩maya dufu, ma la mʼu du kwef ura le̩ dufu. Oñ Je̩re̩maya kwogugu ef ologbo abide le̩.
Taku Ze̩de̩kaya onu kpʼone̩ nyʼadu Je̩re̩maya wʼugbo-wñ ugbo alo̩na e̩ke̩ta unyi Jihofa. Oñ onu ka ñwu Je̩re̩maya kakini, Natʼuwe̩ ene e̩wñʼka; e̩ ki dʼe̩wñ du maja ñwu mi n.
Taku Je̩re̩maya ka ñwu Ze̩de̩kaya kakini, U mʼu du ka ñw e̩, i chʼekpa e̩ akpa mi n? Omi la bʼe̩ lʼo̩la uwe̩ anetirʼumi n.
Taku Ze̩de̩kaya, onu, go̩ ñwu Je̩re̩maya ejubi kakini, Oji Jihofa, kʼowñ che onugo-wa le̩, nadʼe̩ kpa n, u ñʼadʼe̩ tef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma jʼatene oji-we̩-i n.

Taku Je̩re̩maya ka ñwu Ze̩de̩kaya, kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ adufu nyʼugbo amagboji onu Babilo̩n, mak onugo-we̩ adeju, oñ ma awe enʼuna gu ewo-i jo; oñ uwe̩ adeju manyʼabo unyi-we̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ ma dufu nyʼugbo amagboji onu Babilo̩n in, e̩gbale̩ ma adʼewo-i tʼo̩wo̩ abo̩ Kaldia tak ama anʼuna gu jo, uwe̩ la afʼuma o̩wo̩ n.
Taku Ze̩de̩kaya, onu, ka ñwu Je̩re̩maya kakini, Nachokpo amaJu ku ma kwʼef uwa ku ma kʼo̩la-ma ñw abo Kaldia le̩, tod e̩gba ku ma adʼumi tʼo̩wo̩-ma, ku ma ako̩ mi ru.
Ama Je̩re̩maya kakini, Ma adʼuwe̩ ñwu ma n. Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ gbʼomu Jihofa gbo̩ ef o̩la kʼu naka ñw e̩-i; abe̩le̩ tak i ara ñw e̩, oñ onugo-we̩ adeju.
E̩muda ko̩ eledufu, mak o̩la ki Jihofa duña mi le̩ de̩, kakini,
Go, ma ako abobule̩ du ku ma bo̩ jʼef unyi onu Juda dufu wʼugbo amagboji onu Babilo̩n; oñ abobule̩ le̩ akakini,
Tak ama akʼamo̩ya-we̩ chaka kpʼamo̩ma-we̩ dufu wa ñw abo Kaldia; uwe̩ la afʼuma o̩wo̩ n; o̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n muda adʼuwe̩. Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ aje̩ ñwu ma nʼuna gu ewo-i jo.
Taku Ze̩de̩kaya ka ñwu Je̩re̩maya kakini, E̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ma o̩la kʼe̩ ka-i n, kʼe̩ we eku.

I muda che̩wñ kʼamagboji gbo̩ ka kʼomi ko̩la kpʼuwe̩, ku ma la wʼugbo we̩ aka ñw e̩ kakini, E̩wñ kʼe̩ ka ñw onu le̩, e̩ ka ñw a abajo̩-i; e̩ ki dʼu maja ñw a n, tak a we edʼe̩ kpa; kpʼe̩wñ kʼonu ño̩ ka ñw e̩ ge̩.
E̩gbale̩ uwe̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, Omi fʼologu che bʼonu kʼi we eje̩ ñwu mi dabi nyʼunyi Jo̩natan kʼu ku o̩mo̩.
Tak amagboji le̩ chaka wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya, oñ ma tʼe ene; tak i ka ñwu ma teju o̩la du kʼonu ñwa ñw u le̩. Todule̩ ma tʼo̩la eka kpʼowñ no̩; todu o̩la le̩ tu dufu n.
Abe̩le̩ Je̩re̩maya gugu ologbo abo ide gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ ku ma fu Je̩rusale̩m du.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩la ku Ze̩de̩kaya jʼonu Juda, ochu e̩ke̩gwa-wñ, Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, kpʼabogu-wñ chaka lewa akobo̩ Je̩rusale̩m, oñ ma kpala nyʼu.
Oñ o̩do̩ Ze̩de̩kaya e̩ke̩gwaka nyʼochu me̩le̩-wñ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩la ochu le̩, ma fʼaku ewo kpo̩fo̩.

Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku ma fu Je̩rusale̩m du amagboji onu Babilo̩n mugudu wa gugu alaku alumeji, ama che Ne̩rgal-shareza kpai Samagar-nebo kpai Sarsechim kpai Rabsaris kpai Ne̩rgal-shareza kpai Rabmag manyʼamagboji onu Babilo̩n kibo̩ chaka.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku Ze̩de̩kaya kpʼabogu chaka li ma, ma ra, oñ ma kwef ewo le̩ dufu odu lʼo̩na uche̩ ubioko onu, lef alaku ki dʼagbagba aku meji le̩, oñ i le rʼo̩wo̩ Araba.
Abogu abo Kaldia muda rano ma, oñ ma fu Ze̩de̩kaya mu egbili Je̩riko. Abu ku ma fʼu mu, ma mʼu du te̩gu nyʼugbo Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, kʼi de̩ Ribla oj ane̩ Hamat; tak i fʼoji ajo̩-wñ kpa.
Taku onu Babilo̩n fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ze̩de̩kaya kpa eju-wñ Ribla. Onu Babilo̩n ño̩ fʼame̩nojima Juda chaka kpa ge̩.
I laño̩ fʼeju Ze̩de̩kaya kpo̩fo̩, oñ i nʼigbaligba ebije ikpa jiʼi, kʼi mʼu du nyi Babilo̩n.
Tak abo Kaldia nʼuna fʼunyi onu kpʼunyi unyi abo ki bo̩ gujo, ma la fʼaku Je̩rusale̩m kpo̩fo̩ wane̩.
Taku Ne̩biuzaradan, agboji abide, mʼe̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩ ku ma bo̩ ef ewo le̩ ko nyʼef amu wa Babilo̩n, kpʼabo ku ma kwef amaJu ra wʼugbo-wñ le̩, kpai e̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩ ki bo̩ chaka.
Ne̩biuzaradan agboji abide le̩, muda tʼame̩nubie̩ ef amone̩ le̩ ku ma ma nʼe̩wñ du n no̩ jʼoj ane̩ Juda. I laño̩ mʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma kpʼane̩ uche̩ ko ñwu ma iko le̩ ge̩.
Oñ Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, la ñwa ñwu Ne̩biuzaradan, agboji abide, ugbo Je̩re̩maya kakini,
E̩ mʼu du kʼe̩ dejutʼo̩ nyo̩nyo̩, e̩ ki la chʼo e̩bie̩ne̩ du n; e̩ muda ache ñw u alu du kʼi aka ñw e̩.
Abe̩le̩ Ne̩biuzaradan, agboji abide, fʼone̩ kpe̩, kpai Ne̩biushasban kpai Rabsaris kpai Ne̩rgal-shareza kpai Rabmag kpai amagboji onu Babilo̩n ku ma tʼo̩gba chaka
ño̩ fʼone̩ kpe̩, oñ ma mu Je̩re̩maya du kwʼef ologbo abide, oñ ma mʼu du nyu Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, o̩ma Shefan, o̩wo̩, kʼi mʼu du le tʼunyi-wñ. Abe̩le̩ i la gugu ef amone̩ le̩.
O̩la Jihofa la wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya abu ku ma fʼu dahi tʼef ologbo abide le̩ kakini,

Lo, kʼe̩ ko̩la ñw E̩be̩d-me̩le̩k, e̩ne̩ Itiopia le̩, kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, Go, omi akʼo̩la-mi kʼu ka le̩ wa abʼewo-i ma todu ki bie̩ne̩ ñw u, i chʼutodu ki nyo̩ ñw u n; i la ache̩ eju-we̩ o̩jo̩ le̩.
Omi muda agbʼe̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, Jihofa ka-i; ma la adʼuwe̩ tʼo̩wo̩ abo kʼe̩ railo ma le̩ n.
Todu omi ajadu we̩ chuu, uwe̩ la awane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli n, oji-we̩ muda ache e̩wñ kʼe̩ je̩ ef ogu-i; todabu kʼe̩ ke̩do̩no mi, Jihofa ka-i.
O̩la ki kwʼugbo Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya abu ku Ne̩biuzaradan, agboji abide, tʼo̩ no̩ Rama, abu kʼi chʼe̩ji igbaligba tʼef ame̩namu Je̩rusale̩m kpai Juda chaka ku ma mu ma ño̩ nyi Babilo̩n.
Tak agboji abide le̩ mu Je̩re̩maya du, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼo̩la e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩-i du wa abʼuña ki de̩-i ma.
Jihofa la dʼu wa me̩, i la che teju alu kʼi ka le̩. Todabu kʼame̩ du Jihofa re, ku me̩ ma la gbʼomu-wñ gbo̩ n, todule̩ e̩wñ-i wa bʼume̩ ma.

Fai e̩ la go, omi atu we̩ tane̩ bʼigbaligba ki dʼo̩wo̩-we̩-i te̩ eñini-i. I nyo̩ we̩ eju kʼe̩ lebʼumi nyi Babilo̩n, lewa, kʼomi adejutʼuwe̩ nyo̩nyo̩. Iche̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju-we̩ kʼe̩ le̩bʼumi nyi Babilo̩n, e̩ we. Go, ane̩ du tʼo̩gba-we̩-i, ugbo du ki nyo̩ we̩ eju ki chʼo̩kpakpa kʼe̩ nyi, e̩ lo.

Oñ abu kʼi akpibe, agboji le̩ kakini, Mak e̩ dabi nyʼugbo Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahai-kam, o̩ma Shefan, e-kʼonu Babilo̩n dʼu che igo̩bina ewo ewo Juda, kʼe̩ bʼo̩ gugu ef amone̩ le̩. Abe̩k ugbo du ki nyo̩ we̩ eju kʼe̩ lo, e̩ lo ke. Tak agboji abide mʼe̩wñ o̩na ule̩ ko ñw u manyʼe̩wñ ele, oñ i tʼo̩ no̩ kʼi lo.
E̩gbale̩ Je̩re̩maya nyʼugbo Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, Mizpa, oñ i bʼo̩ gugu o̩mo̩ ef amone̩ ku ma bo̩ jʼoj ane̩ le̩.

Oñ e̩gba kʼamagboji abogu du ku ma jʼojoko ojoko owñ chʼama kpʼabo-ma, e̩gba ku ma gbo̩ ka kʼonu Babilo̩n du Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, chʼigo̩bina oj ane̩ le̩, kʼi laño̩ mʼaboke̩le̩ kpʼabobule̩ kpʼabimo̩to̩, kpʼame̩nubie̩ ane̩ le̩ ko nyʼo̩ o̩wo̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma ma ko ma nyʼef amu nyi Babilo̩ni n;

taku ma lewʼugbo Ge̩dalaya, Mizpa, ama che Ishmael, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, kpai Johanan kpai Jo̩natan, amo̩ma Kareya, kpai Se̩raya, o̩ma Tanhume̩t, kpʼamo̩ma E̩fai e̩ne̩ Nehofat le̩, kpai Jazanaya, o̩ma e̩ne̩ Maakat le̩, ama kpʼabo-ma wa.
Taku Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, o̩ma Shafan, go̩ ñwu ma kpʼabo-ma, kakini, Ame̩ ki railo e̩re̩ abo̩ Kaldia n; gugu oj ane̩-i, ku me̩ re̩ onu Babilo̩n, tak i anyo̩ ñwu me̩.

I chʼe-mi, me̩ go, omi agugu Mizpa kʼu dago o̩gba abo Kaldia ku ma awʼugbo wa ejo̩gba; i muda chʼame̩, me̩ ki ko omi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpʼuje̩wñ o̩lo̩ji kpʼekpo wa jo̩ ku me̩ ko nyʼe̩wñ eku-me̩, ku me̩ kwogugu ewo ewo-me̩ ku me̩ du le̩.

Abe̩le̩ ge̩ e̩gba kʼamaJu du, ku ma jo̩ Moab, kpʼef amo̩ma Amo̩n, kpʼoj ane̩ Ido̩m, ku ma jʼo̩j ane̩ oj ane̩ du, gbo̩ ka kʼonu Babilo̩n, tʼabo e̩bo̩bo̩ Juda no̩, kʼi la du Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, o̩ma Shafan, chʼagboji-ma;
tak amaju chaka mudabi kwʼugbo du ku ma ne ma nyi le̩, oñ ma wa ane̩ Juda ugbo Ge̩dalaya, Mizpa. Oñ ma ko omi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpʼuje̩wñ o̩lo̩ji wa jo̩ nana nana.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, kpʼamagboji abogu du ku ma jʼojoko ojoko ño̩ wʼugbo Ge̩dalaya, Mizpa,
oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ma ka ku Baalis, onu amo̩ma Amo̩n, fʼIshmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, kpe̩ wa kʼi mʼe̩ oji du? Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, muda dʼo̩la-ma rʼochochi n.

Taku Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, ko̩la ñwu Ge̩dalaya Mizpa, ejubi, kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi nyʼakpa Ishmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya le̩. E̩ne̩ du la ama n. Tode̩wñ i adʼuwe̩ oji, kʼamaJu du ku ma wa jʼugbo-we̩-i ki kpatuka, kʼabo Juda ki bo̩bo̩ ki lenyo̩?
Ama Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, ka ñwu Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, kakini, Uwe̩ ache e̩wñ-i n; todu olemi e̩ ro̩ nyʼIshmae̩l le̩.

Oñ i lewatu ochu e̩kebie, tak Ishmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, kʼi chʼo̩ma Elishama, kʼi chʼo̩mo̩fe̩, kpai e̩ne̩ʼka ki tʼo̩gba ef amagboji onu, manyʼaboke̩le me̩gwa, lewʼugbo Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, Mizpa; ma la bʼo̩la-ma jʼe̩wñ Mizpa o̩mo̩.

Taku Ishmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, kwane̩ kpʼaboke̩le̩ me̩gwa ku ma jʼugbo-wñ le̩, oñ ma nʼo̩kwo̩chageli da Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, o̩ma Shefan, oñ ma fʼu kpa; owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼonu Babilo̩n mʼu du chʼigo̩bina oj ane̩ le̩.
Ishmae̩l ño̩ kpa amaJu chaka ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, owñ chʼugbo Ge̩dalaya, Mizpa, kpʼabo Kaldia ku ma li o̩mo̩, ama chʼabogu.
Oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ ekeji kʼi fu Ge̩dalaya kpa, kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ma n,

kʼabo iche̩ka kwo She̩ke̩m kpai Shailo kpai Samaria wa, ama chʼaboke̩le̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩. Agba-ma chela, ukpo-ma chʼe̩fana, ma fʼo̩la-ma fana, oñ ma nʼe̩wñ ele kpai frankinse̩ns o̩wo̩-ma ku ma ko wʼunyi Jihofa.
Tak Ishmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, kwo Mizpa dufu aledo ma, i nʼaku aro̩ abu kʼi alo; oñ i lewatu abu kʼi de kpʼama i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ lewa ugbo Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku ma lewa alumeji ewo le̩, Ishmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, fʼuma kpa, oñ i mʼuma ko rikpolo nyʼef o̩fe̩, owñ kpʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ le̩.

Ma muda li aboke̩le̩ me̩gwa ef uma ku ma ka ñw Ishmae̩l kakini, E̩ ki kpa wa n; todu i chenʼe̩wñ kʼa ko maja oko, owñ chʼo̩ka wit kpai barli kpai ekpo kpai iño̩, todule̩ i we, oñ i ma kpa ma manyʼamo̩maye-ma le̩ n.
Oñ o̩fe̩ ugbo kʼIshmae̩l ko oku aboke̩le̩ du kʼi kpa le̩ nyʼef uwñ manyu Ge̩dalaya, owñ le̩ chʼo̩fe̩ kʼEsa, onu, gwa todu ailo Beasha onu Israe̩l kʼi ra. Ishmae̩l kʼabo ku ma kpa le̩ nyʼu e̩ko̩.

Tak Ishmae̩l fʼabo e̩bo̩bo̩ ku ma jo̩ Mizpa mu lelo, tʼamo̩ma onobule̩ e-onu, kpʼamone̩ du ku ma bo̩ Mizpa e-ku Ne̩biuzaradan, agboji abide le̩, ko nyu Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, o̩wo̩. Ishmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, mʼuma ko nyʼef amu, oñ i kwʼo̩mo̩ kʼi daba nyʼugbo amo̩ma Amo̩n.
Ama e̩gba ku Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, kpʼamagboji abogu chaka ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, gbʼinabali e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du ku Ishmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, che,
taku ma mʼaboke̩le̩ du ko, oñ ma le nakʼogu bʼIshmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, ma la fʼu li etʼomi lile ki de̩ Gibeo̩n.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼamone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo Ishmae̩l li Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, kpʼamagboji abogu chaka ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, tak e̩do̩-ma bo̩.
Abe̩le̩ amone̩ du kʼIshmae̩l mu kwo Mizpa lelo, murida dabi wa, oñ ma nyʼugbo Johanan, o̩ma Kareya.
Ishmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, muda fʼu Johanan o̩wo̩ manyʼaboke̩le̩ me̩jo̩, oñ ma nyʼugbo amo̩ma Amo̩n.

Taku Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, kpʼamagboji abogu du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ mʼe̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩ ki dabi gba bʼIshmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, o̩wo̩ te̩, ko kwo Mizpa, owñ chʼabu kʼi fu Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, kpa le̩, abo kʼi ko chʼabogu, kpʼabobule̩ kpʼabimo̩to̩ kpʼamonoji, e-kʼi ko kwo Gibeo̩n dabi wa.
Oñ ma kwo bʼo̩mo̩ te̩, oñ ma wa kwojo̩ uru Chimham kʼi me̩ru Be̩tle̩he̩m, ma che ku ma legudu tʼIjipti,
todu abo Kaldia; todu ma railo ma, todabu kʼIshmae̩l, o̩ma Ne̩tanaya, fu Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, kʼonu Babilo̩n dʼu che igo̩bina ane̩ le̩ kpa.
Tak amagboji abogu chaka, kpai Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, kpai Je̩zanaya, o̩ma Hoshaya, kpʼamone̩ du, kwʼe-ki nya gbogbo wʼe-ki nana, te̩ wa,

oñ ma ka ñwu Je̩re̩maya akache̩ kakini, A gbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, e̩ ki je̩ ñw a kʼologu-wa jʼane̩ o̩gba-we̩, kʼuwe̩ ki rodubo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, tod e̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩-i chaka, todu a kʼa wewe bo̩ re me̩, alu kʼeju-we̩ li wa-i,
todu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩ ki ña wa o̩na ki dukpe̩ kʼa le, kpʼe̩wñ ki dukpe̩ kʼa che.

Taku Je̩re̩maya akache̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, U gbo̩ abu ku me̩ ka; go, omi arodubo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, teju alu ku me̩ ka; oñ i awatu e̩wñ du ki Jihofa adohi ñwu me̩, omi adʼu dufu ñwu me̩; nadʼe-du maja ñwu me̩ n.
Taku ma ka ñwu Je̩re̩maya kakini, Jihofa ki chʼe̩nibenu ochochi ki de̩ kpaka ef uwa, iche̩wñ kʼa ma che teju o̩la du ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, akpʼe̩ uche̩ rʼuwa n.
Dagba i nyo̩, dagba i bie̩ne̩, a agbʼomu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, e-kʼa akpʼe̩ uche̩ rʼu-i gbo̩; todu ki ra ñw a, e̩gba kʼa gbʼomu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, gbo̩.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ me̩gwa jo̩, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya.
Tak i fu Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, kpʼamagboji ogu du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ chaka, kpʼamone̩ du akwʼabo ki nya gbogbo wʼabo ki nana,
oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, ku me̩ kpe̩ mi rʼu kʼu chʼologu-me̩ bʼo̩ ka de̩, kakini,
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ jʼagugu oj ane̩-i waa, mak u nane me̩ nyʼo̩gba, u la ñʼagu me̩ lo̩ n, nako me̩ gbe̩, u la achi me̩ rinyo̩ n; todu e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼu che me̩ le̩ awo̩ mi me̩.
Me̩ ki railo onu Babilo̩ni n, e̩ne̩ ku me̩ railo-wñ le̩; me̩ ki railo-wñ n, Jihofa aka-i; todu omi dʼugbo me̩ kʼu najadu me̩, kʼu la ño̩ mʼume̩ gba bʼo̩ o̩wo̩ te̩.
Omi la adʼejumomi ña me̩, todu kʼowñ ki li me̩ ejumomi kʼi la aje̩ ñwu me̩ dabi tʼane̩-me̩ onugo.
Ama iche̩wñ ku me̩ akakini, A adodo ane̩-i n, kʼame̩ ma agbʼomu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ gbo̩ n,
kakini, O̩da; a la anyʼane̩ Ijipti, ugbo kʼeju-wa ma ñʼadʼogu ge̩ n, kʼa ma ñʼagbʼuko̩la o̩kakachi n, kʼuje̩wñ ma ña wa n, o̩mo̩ a la adodo.

Fai, todule̩ me̩ ki gbo̩ o̩la ki Jihofa aka, O ame̩ abo e̩bo̩bo̩ Juda kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ fʼeju-me̩ kparu egudu nyʼoj ane̩ Ijipti, ku me̩ nyʼage̩ne̩ o̩mo̩;
mak e̩gbale̩ i awatu kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kʼame̩ dejiji-wñ le̩ amu me̩ ane̩ Ijipti o̩mo̩; oñ ukpo̩ta kʼame̩ railo-wñ le̩ anʼume̩ ubi ule ule, ane̩ Ijipti o̩mo̩; o̩mo̩ me̩ la aku.

Abe̩le̩ i ade̩ ñw amone̩ du ku ma fʼeju gwanyi enyʼIjipti ku ma ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩. Ama akʼuku o̩kwo̩chageli, kpai o̩kpo̩-ta, kpai e̩wñ ibi; e̩ne̩ du efu ma la abo̩ n, ma la afu e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼu nako wa abʼuma ma o̩wo̩ te̩ n.

Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l le̩, aka de̩ kakini, Alu kʼu kʼuwe̩do̩-mi kpʼe̩do̩fulu-mi danyʼoji abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m, abe̩le̩ e̩do̩fulu-mi adanyʼume̩ oji, e̩gba ku me̩ mugudu tʼoj ane̩ Ijipti. Ame̩ la achʼama, kpai awuwu kpai oli ina kpai ina; eju-me̩ la ñʼadʼuña-i ge̩ n.
Jihofa fʼo̩la-me̩ ka me̩, O ame̩ abe̩bo̩bo̩ Juda, me̩ ki nyʼIjipti n. Me̩ ki ma jalii, ka kʼomi gbʼijali ñwu me̩ eñini-i me̩.

Todu ame̩ fʼe̩wñ olemi che nyʼamonugo-me̩ me̩; todu ame̩ fʼumi kpe̩ru Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩, kakini, E̩ rodubo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa todu wa. Oñ a ache teju e̩wñ du ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ wa, aka, abe̩le̩ e̩ ki ka dufu ñw a, oñ a ache.
Omi la mʼu du ka dufu ñwu me̩ eñini-i me̩; me̩ muda gbʼomu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ gbo̩ ef e̩wñ okate kʼi kpe̩ mi rʼume̩ tod uwñ n.
Todule̩, me̩ ki ma fai ka kʼame̩ akʼuku o̩kwo̩chageli kpai ukpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ ibi, ugbo ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ nyʼage̩ne̩ o̩mo̩ chuu.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ku Je̩re̩maya fʼo̩la Jihofa, O̩jo̩-ma, du ka ñw o̩gbo̩ amone̩ le̩ kpa, owñ chʼo̩la ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩-ma, du kpe̩ Je̩re̩maya rʼuma, owñ chʼo̩la le̩ chaka,

taku Azaraya, o̩ma Hoshaya, kpai Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, kpai abo ejene̩ chaka ko̩la ñwu Je̩re̩maya kakini, Olemi e̩ ro̩; Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa, kpʼe̩ wa kʼe̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki nyi Ijipti ku me̩ ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩ ni n;
chai Baruk, o̩ma Ne̩raya le̩, kʼuwe̩ e̩che̩ akobʼuwa, kʼi mʼuwa du tʼo̩wo̩ abo Kaldia kʼama ki fʼuwa kpa, ku ma ko wa nyʼef amu Babilo̩n.
Abe̩le̩ Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, kpʼamagboji abogu chaka, kpʼamone̩ le̩ du ma gbʼomu Jihofa gbo̩ ku ma gugu oj ane̩ Juda n.
Johanan, o̩ma Kareya, kpʼamagboji abogu chaka, muda mʼabʼe̩bo̩bo̩ Juda ku ma mudabi bʼugbo abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ugbo ku ma ne ma ru le̩ te̩ ku ma ge̩ne̩ oj ane̩ Juda ko;

tʼaboke̩le̩, tʼabobule̩, tʼabimo̩to̩, tʼamo̩ma onobule̩ onu, kpʼe̩ne̩ du ku Ne̩biuzaradan, agboji abide le̩, to̩no̩ jʼugbo Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Ahaikam, o̩ma Shefan, manyu Je̩re̩maya akache̩ kpai Baruk, o̩ma Ne̩raya.
Oñ ma lewa Ijipti, todu ma gbʼomu Jihofa gbo̩ n; oñ ma lewa Tapanhe̩s.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya, Tapanhe̩s, kakini,
Mʼokuta lile ko nʼo̩wo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ mʼu ko maja jʼej o̩na alu unyi Fero, Tapanhe̩s kʼe̩ nʼo̩biafʼu kwo̩, eju aboke̩le̩ Juda;

kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, Me̩ go, omi akpʼonuche̩ nyʼadu Ne̩biu-kadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, adu-mi le̩, wa, oñ nadʼede-wñ gugu oj okuta kʼu ko maja-i; owñ la afʼunyabo onu-wñ ta bʼoji okuta le̩ ma.
Tak i awa akpʼane̩ Ijipti fo̩; abo ku ma chʼe-uku aku, oñ abo ku ma chʼe-amu atef amu, oñ abo ku ma chʼe-o̩kwo̩chageli, ma ako ñw o̩kwo̩chageli.
Tak omi akʼuna ef unyi unyi amo̩jo̩ Ijipti; owñ la agu uma jo, oñ i ako ma lo tef amu; i la akʼane̩ Ijipti bʼo̩la ma, alu kʼadidala akʼukpo-wñ bʼo̩la ma; tak i akwʼo̩mo̩ dufu kpʼure̩do̩.
I ñʼakpʼojibo ojibo Be̩t-shimesh kʼi jʼane̩ Ijipti fo̩; oñ i anʼuna gu unyi unyi amo̩jo̩ Ijipti jo.
O̩la amaJu du ku ma gugu oj ane̩ Ijipti, ku ma gugu Migdol kpai Tapanhe̩s kpai Me̩mfis kpai oj ane̩ Patro̩s ki lewʼugbo Je̩re̩maya le̩ de̩, kakini,

Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, ki chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, Ame̩ li e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du kʼu kowa abi Je̩rusale̩m kpai ewo ewo Juda du ma; e̩ la go, egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta i che eñini-i, e̩ne̩ du la gugu o̩mo̩ n.
Tod e̩wñ bibi-ma ku ma che ku ma nyʼumi uwe̩do̩, owñ chʼabu ku ma nyʼagu otulale jo ku ma rʼamo̩jo̩ omune̩ kʼama ma ma n, tʼama, tʼame̩, tʼamata-me̩.
U muda kpʼamadu-mi akache̩ le̩ du rʼume̩. U takpa kwane̩ akpe̩ ma wa, kakini, O, ame̩ ki che e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-i ki chʼe̩wñ ulaka-mi-i n.
Ma muda neti n, ma la hi eti wane̩ ku ma rida bʼe̩wñ bibi-ma te̩, ku ma we egu otulale jo ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩ n.
Todule̩ e̩do̩fulu-mi kpʼuwe̩do̩-mi mu ke̩che̩ dufu, oñ i mʼutajo ewo ewo Juda, kpʼo̩na o̩na Je̩rusale̩m; oñ o̩mo̩ mud egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta kpʼalache̩ te̩, alu kʼi de̩ eñini-i.

Todule̩, fai, abu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ ache e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ inaina-i nyʼonugo-me̩, ku ma fʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ kpʼo̩me̩kpa kpai o̩ma ki aguane̩ ko̩da bʼalumeji Juda te̩, kʼe̩ne̩ du ki ño̩ bo̩ ñwu me̩ ge̩ n?

Owñ chʼabu ku me̩ nʼuko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-me̩ nyʼumi uwe̩do̩, otulale ku me̩ gujo ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩ oj ane̩ Ijipti ugbo ku me̩ nyi ku me̩ ge̩ne̩ le̩; kʼama ki kʼume̩ da rinyo̩, ku me̩ mud ama kpʼoli ina ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ane̩-ile̩-i.
Ame̩ gbenyo̩ e̩wñ bibi amata-me̩ le̩ kpʼe̩wñ bibi amonu Juda kpʼe̩wñ bibi amo̩ya-ma kpʼe̩wñ bibi e-me̩ onugo kpʼe̩wñ bibi amo̩ya e-me̩, ku ma che oj ane̩ Juda kpai ej o̩na ej o̩na Je̩rusale̩m?
Ma la hi o̩la-ma wane̩ gbogbo tʼeñini n, ma la railo n, ma lule̩ ef uko̩-o̩la-mi n, kpʼef uhio̩me̩-mi kʼu ko jʼo̩gba-me̩ kpʼo̩gba amata-me̩ n.
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l le̩, aka de̩, kakini, Me̩ go, omi akpʼeju-mi rʼume̩ kʼi bie̩ne̩ ñwu me̩ owñ chʼutodu kʼu fʼabo Juda du ko̩da rinyo̩.

Tak omi akʼabo e̩bo̩bo̩ Juda ku ma fʼeju-ma gwanyi enyʼIjipti ku ma ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩, ma alie̩ rinyo̩ chaka, ma awane̩, oj ane̩ Ijipti. O̩kwo̩chageli kpʼukpo̩ta ako ma mi. Ama aku akwʼe-ki nya gbogbo wa e-ki nana tule, lʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli kpʼukpo̩ta. Ama la ache ama kpai awuwu kpai oli ina kpai ina.
Todu omi abʼudu ñw abo ku ma gugu oj ane̩ Ijipti, alu kʼu bu ñwu Je̩rusale̩m, lʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli kpai ukpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ ibi.

Todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ef abʼe̩bo̩bo̩ Juda ku ma nyʼoj ane̩ Ijipti ku ma ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩ ma ñʼafu tane̩ n, e̩ne̩ du la abo̩ kʼi adabi tʼoj ane̩ Juda ugbo ku ma añeju ku ma dabi agugu o̩mo̩ n. Todu e̩ne̩ du adabi n chai e̩ne̩ ki afu tane̩.

Tak aboke̩le̩ du ku ma ma ka kʼamo̩ya-ma agu otulale jo ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩, kpʼabobule̩ du ku ma dago o̩mo̩, ujeju lile i che, owñ chʼamone̩ du ku ma gugu oj ane̩ Ijipti, ewo Patro̩s, dohi ñwu Je̩re̩maya kakini,
I chʼe-o̩la kʼe̩ ka ñw a ef odu Jihofa a anetirʼuwe̩ n.

A muda ache teju o̩la du ki kwef alu-wa dufu tila, kʼa gu otulale jo ñw onu onobule̩ e-efojale, kʼa la kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ omi dajane̩ ñw u, alu kʼa te̩tache, awa kpʼamata-wa, amonu-wa kpʼamagboji-wa ewo ewo Juda, kpʼo̩na o̩na Je̩rusale̩m, todu e̩gba le̩ a nʼuje̩wñ e̩kute̩, i la ra ñw a, oñ a ma li e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ n.
Ama akwe̩gba kʼa tʼotulale egujo ñw onu onobule̩ efojale no̩ kʼa ma ño̩ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ omi dajane̩ ñw u n, e̩wñ du aña wa, oñ o̩kwo̩chageli kpʼukpo̩ta fʼuwa lie̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼa gu otulale jo ñw onu onobule̩ efojale, kʼa la kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ omi dajane̩ ñw u le̩, a chʼakala kʼa gwʼo̩ a adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ omi dajane̩ ñw u ubi amo̩ko̩-wa?
Taku Je̩re̩maya ka ñw abo le̩ du, tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼonobule̩, owñ chʼo̩chaka amone̩ ku ma dohi le̩ ñw u, kakini,
Otulale ku me̩ gujo ewo ewo Juda kpʼej o̩na o̩na Je̩rusale̩m, ame̩ kpʼamata-me̩, kpʼamonu-me̩ kpʼamagboji-me̩, kpai amone̩ ane̩ le̩ du, Jihofa rewa n? Ibe-wñ la tʼe-le̩ n?

Oñ Jihofa ma ño̩ neke je̩do̩ ge̩ n tod e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ ku me̩ jʼache le̩ bie̩ne̩, kpai todu e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ku me̩ che; todule̩ oñ ane̩-me̩ mud alache̩ te̩, kpʼawuwu kpʼoli ina, ugbo kʼone̩ ma dodo n, alu kʼi de̩ eñini-i.

Todabu ku me̩ gu otulale jo, kpai todabu ku me̩ du Jihofa re, ku me̩ ma gbʼomu Jihofa gbo̩ n, ku me̩ma la lule̩ ef uko̩-o̩la-wñ n, kpʼef uhio̩me̩-wñ n, kpʼef o̩la ibenu-wñ n, todule̩ oñ e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ke̩re̩bʼume̩-i, alu ki de̩ eñini-i.
Je̩re̩maya ño̩ ko̩la ñw amone̩ le̩ chaka, kpʼabobule̩ chaka kakini, Me̩ ki gbʼo̩la Jihofa, abo Juda du ku me̩ jʼoj ane̩ Ijipti;

abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini, Ame̩ kpʼamo̩ya-me̩, ejeji-me̩ nʼalu-me̩ ko̩la, me̩ la nʼo̩wo̩-me̩ che teju-wñ, kakini, Oji kʼa da a ara tila, owñ chʼotulale egujo ñw onu onobule̩ e-efojale, kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ omi eko dajane̩ ñw u; me̩ fʼoji ku me̩ da lonyane̩, ku me̩ ra ke.

Todule̩ ame̩ ki gbo̩ o̩la Jihofa, ame̩ abo Juda du ku me̩ gugu oj ane̩ Ijipti: Go, omi fʼodu-mi inaina go̩ Jihofa aka-i, ka kʼodu-mi edo̩ adʼef alu e̩ne̩ Juda du ugbo du ane̩ Ijipti ku me̩ ñʼago̩ kakini, Oji Jihofa n.
Go, omi adide ma tod e̩bie̩ne̩, i la chʼutodu e̩nyo̩ n; oñ o̩kwo̩chageli kpʼukpo̩ta afʼaboke̩le̩ Juda chaka ku ma jo̩ oj ane̩ Ijipti, lie̩ gbogbo taku ma ño̩ do̩mo̩ ge̩ n.

Oñ abo ku ma fu bʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli te̩ adabi kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti tʼoj ane̩ Juda, aluka-ma ade̩ ke̩e̩; tak abʼe̩bo̩bo̩ Juda, ku ma nyʼane̩ Ijipti ku ma ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩, ama o̩la e̩ne̩ ki adago, e-mi abe̩k e-ma.
E̩wñ ki la achʼujiwe-wñ ñwu me̩ de̩, Jihofa ka-i, Omi abʼudu ñwu me̩ ugbo-i todu kʼame̩ ki ma ka kʼo̩la e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼu ka nyʼume̩ le̩ adago chuu.

E̩wñ ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi adu Fero Hofra, onu Ijipti, tʼo̩wo̩ ame̩ne̩bi-wñ, kpai tʼo̩wo̩ abo ku ma tene oji-wñ. Alu kʼu du Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda, tʼo̩wo̩ Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, kʼi chʼe̩nebi-wñ, kʼi la tene oji-wñ le̩.
O̩la ku Je̩re̩maya akache̩ ka ñwu Baruk, o̩ma Ne̩raya, e̩gba kʼi kʼo̩la-i nyʼef ubuku abu ku Je̩re̩maya aka ñw u kpʼalu-wñ, o̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ku Jiho̩yakim, o̩ma Josaya, jʼonu Juda le̩ de̩, kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka ñw e̩ de̩, O Baruk, kakini,
Uwe̩ kakini, Atogwo chʼe-mi fai ke! Todu Jihofa mʼe̩do̩dudu du manyʼu iwo̩-mi ñwu mi, ifi efi fʼumi hia me̩, u nʼuñmi n.
Abu kʼuwe̩ aka ñw u de̩, kakini, Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini. Go, e̩wñ kʼomi ko̩ nagulo̩ wane̩. E̩wñ kʼu la mudu gbe̩, nagudu rinyo̩. Owñ chʼugbo du ane̩-i.
Uwe̩ atene e̩wñ lile ñw o̩la-we̩? E̩ ki tene n; todu, go, omi akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa bʼoji o̩re̩la du ma, Jihofa ka-i; omi muda adʼoji-we̩ ñw e̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩ ñw e̩ ugbo du kʼuwe̩ anyi.
O̩la abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki Jihofa ka kʼi wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya akache̩ le̩ de̩:
E-Ijipti de̩: I chʼe-abogu Fero Neko, onu Ijipti, ku ma jʼo̩lʼohimini Yufretis, Karkemish, ku Ne̩biukadre̩za onu Babilo̩n kpa o̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ku Jiho̩yakim, o̩ma Josaya, jʼonu Juda.
Me̩ ki ñwʼikpako kpʼugbe̩yo̩ che,
Me̩ fʼamanya ji;
E̩wñ chi kʼeju-mi dʼo?
Me̩ ki je̩ ñw abo kʼe̩re̩-ma ale̩ ñw ule ki ra n,
E̩ne̩ akwane̩ dab ohimini Naye̩l-i?
Ijipti akwane̩ dabu Naye̩l,
O amanya, me̩ mute̩gu alo ke,
Todu pjp kʼa ka-i chʼo̩jo̩ Ondu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du,
Te̩gu nyi Gilead, kʼe̩ mʼogu agbe du,
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi gbʼinabali anyo̩-we̩ me̩,
O̩la ku Jihofa ka ñw Je̩re̩maya akache̩, alu ku Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, awa gwo ane̩ Ijipti da de̩:
Me̩ dʼu kpogo Ijipti, fʼakoya-wñ ta Migdo̩l;
E̩wñ chi ku ma fʼamagbiti-we̩ gba rinyo̩ ta?
I je̩ ñw amone̩ wewe ke̩re̩, ma wane̩ noj omune̩,
Ma kwokwa o̩mo̩, Fero, onu Ijipti chʼekuku ofofo,
Oji-mi, Onu, kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, aka-i,
O uwe̩ o̩ma onobule̩ kʼe̩ gugu Ijipti,
Ijipti chʼagbadufu ole okuno̩ kʼi chʼefe̩rʼeju,
Abo kʼi aro̩me̩ ñw ma ku ma jʼalumeji-wñ le̩
Iche̩wñ adab iche̩ ejo ki afa alo;
Ma adʼoko-wñ rinyo̩, Jihofa aka-i,
Anyo̩ amu o̩ma onobule̩ Ijipti,
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l le̩, kakini, Go, omi abʼudu ñw Amo̩n e-No le̩, kpai Fero kpai Ijipti manyʼamo̩jo̩-wñ kpʼamonu-wñ; owñ che Fero kpʼabo ku ma ke̩do̩nʼo.
Omi la ako ma jʼef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma tene oji-ma, kpai ef o̩wo̩ Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, kpai jʼef o̩wo̩ abuko̩lo̩-wñ. Ubi le̩ tak one̩ adodo o̩mo̩, alu ki de̩ iko igbegbele, Jihofa ka-i.
Uwe̩ ki muda railo n, O Jeko̩b, adu-mi,
E̩ ki railo n, O Jeko̩b, adu-mi,
O̩la abo Filistia ku Jihofa ka kʼi wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya o̩gba taku Fero kpo̩ Gaza fo̩ de̩.
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Ekuku etikpa amagbiti-wñ ku ma du dʼane̩,
tod o̩jo̩ ki añwa ki fʼabo Filistia chaka chile̩che̩,
Oji bo̩lo̩bo̩lo̩ lewa bu Gaza ma me̩,
O, uwe̩ o̩kwo̩chageli Jihofa!
Ab i ale kʼi awe,
E-Moab de̩.
uñwulo̩ Moab de̩ ge̩ n.
Iche̩ ukwa kwo Horonaim wa,
Ma fu Moab kpo̩fo̩ me̩;
Todu ma anʼaku ero̩ ate̩gu Luhit;
Me̩ ra! Me̩ fʼoji o̩la-me̩ jadu!
Todu, todabu kʼe̩ ke̩do̩nʼuko̩lo̩ kʼe̩ che, kpʼe̩wñ akoko-we̩,
Oñ akpe̩wñ bie̩ le̩ abʼewo ewo du ma,
Me̩ kʼika ñw Moab,
Ama ki mu e̩ne̩ du ki achʼuko̩lo̩ Jihofa ayechi ofo; ama ki ño̩ mu e̩ne̩ du kʼi agwo̩nyʼo̩kwo̩chageli-wñ ubi bʼe̩bie̩ te̩.
Moab te̩tañmi to̩ko̩o̩ akwo ojokolobia-wñ
Todule̩, go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa aka-i, kʼomi akpe̩ abo ku ma rʼe̩wñ da ke̩ge̩ wʼugbo-wñ, oñ ma arʼowñ da ke̩ge̩. Ma la akʼe̩wñ eku-wñ dafo, ku ma la kpʼañmo̩-ma fo̩.
Tak anyo̩ Chimo̩sh amu Moab, alu kʼanyo̩ Be̩te̩l, uke̩do̩no-ma le̩, mu abunyi Israe̩l.
Abile ku me̩ kakini, Awa chʼame̩nuwohi
Mafu Moab chile̩che̩rinyo̩ me̩, ewo ewo-wñ le̩ mud oduduna me̩,
Uchobi Moab me̩rʼo̩wo̩ me̩
O̩chaka-me̩ ku me̩ jo̩ lʼo daka le̩, me̩ kwaliwo̩-wñ, kpʼame̩ ku me̩ chemʼodu-wñ chaka,
O uwe̩, o̩ma onobule̩ kʼe̩ gugu Dibo̩n,
O uwe̩ kʼe̩ dodo Aroe̩r,
Anyo̩ fu Moab mu, todu e̩do̩-wñ muda kpu;
Oji ajo̩ le̩ lewa bʼegbili ma, i bo Holon ma, i bo Jaza ma, i bo Me̩faat ma,
i bo Dibo̩n ma, i bo Nebo ma, i bo Be̩t-diblat ma,
i bo Kinataim ma, i la bo Be̩t-gamul ma, i la bo Be̩t-meon ma,
i la bo Keriot ma, i la bo Bozra ma, i la bʼewo ewo du oj ane̩ Moab ma tʼe-ki jʼo̩na jiji tʼe-ki dʼanane̩.
Igba Moab muko̩da me̩, o̩wo̩-wñ muguche̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Me̩ dʼo̩te̩ ñw u ñmo̩ ki mʼu; todu i hi o̩la-wñ ne ñw Jihofa; Moab la ali gbigbili ef ire̩-wñ, ma ñʼadokanyi rʼo̩ oji.
Todu Israe̩l chʼe̩wñ okanyi ñw e̩ akwoubi n? Ma liʼi ef amajoji? Todu e̩gba du kʼe̩ nʼo̩la-wñ aka, uwe̩ ami oji-we̩ ejo.
O, ame̩ ku me̩ dodo Moab,
A gbʼinabali uba Moab—
U chema o̩fu e̩do̩-wñ, kʼo̩wai i che, Jihofa aka-i;
Todule̩ omi adinaku todu Moab;
Aku ki tʼe-ki Jeza aro̩ le nadu raku we̩,
Ma la mʼe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ kpʼuyo̩ ko bʼane̩ uro̩je̩ te̩, kpai kwo bʼane̩ Moab te̩;
Akwo ukwa He̩shbo̩n gbogbo wa Eleale, gbogbo wa Jahaz ma nʼomu dala, akwo Zoar gbogbo wa Horona, wa Eglat-shilishiya; todu omi omi Nimrim ñʼagbe̩ kʼo̩mo̩ ki mud alache̩.
Anoji e-le̩, naño̩ je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi achʼiche̩bo̩ oj otete, kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi agu otulale jo ñw amo̩jo̩-wñ ki takpa rʼane̩ Moab, Jihofa aka-i.
Todule̩ e̩do̩-mi afifi todu Moab dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩kpana, oñ e̩do̩-mi la afifi dab o̩kpana tod aboke̩le̩ Kir-he̩re̩s, todu e̩wñ kʼi yajo̩ e̩kute̩ le̩ lenyo̩.
Todu oji du de̩ bo̩lo̩bo̩lo̩, ma fʼilagba du ja; o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ du chʼagbe agbe, e̩gbanukpo la lʼago ago de̩.
Oj ojokunyi Moab chaka kpʼojukpologu-wñ, inaku eda dʼugbo du. Todu u fu Moab kpo̩fo̩ dab e̩wñ eku ki ma wʼe̩ne̩ du eju n, Jihofa aka-i.
Go ab i gulo̩ wane̩! Go abu ku ma jʼakwa! Go abu ku Moab mubidagba kpʼanyo̩! Abe̩le̩ oñ Moab amud e̩wñ okanyi kpʼe̩wñ ubailo ñw abo du ku ma jo̩ lo daka.
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
ma fʼewo ewo du me̩
Ma la akpa Moab bie̩ kʼi we e̩chʼuche̩ichi amone̩,
Ailo, kpʼura kpʼoku
E̩ne̩ ki ara bʼailo te̩
Abo ku ma ra dago jʼolubo̩ He̩shbo̩n
Atogwo ñw e̩, O Moab!
Omi muda arʼamu Moab da iko otitala, Jihofa aka-i.
E-amo̩ma Amo̩n de̩.
Todule̩ go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa aka-i,
O He̩shbo̩n, dinaku ke, todu ma fu Ai chile̩che̩ me̩!
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ nʼane̩ o̩go̩ le̩ aba, o̩go̩-we̩ kʼi acha le̩,
Go, omi adʼailoʼka wa abʼuwe̩ oji ma,
Ama anubi-wñ narʼamu amo̩ma Amo̩n da, Jihofa aka-i.
E-Ido̩m de̩.
Me̩ ra, mudabi, kwogugu ef unefu,
Iche̩wñ kʼabo ku ma kʼe̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma lewʼugbo-we̩,
Omi muda fʼlso̩ tago ofo,
Tʼamo̩ma-we̩ ku ma ma nʼata n no̩,
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, Abo ku ma ma kpʼoji ajo̩-ma ka ku ma añmo̩ ago-i n; añmʼo tila; uwe̩ ñʼachʼe̩ne̩ kʼudu echi afʼuwe̩ oji hioko? Udu echi la afʼuwe̩ oji n, uwe̩ la añmʼo̩ chuu.
Todu u fʼo̩la-mi go̩ Jihofa aka-i, ka ku Bozra amud e̩wñ awuwu, kpʼina kpʼane̩ e̩gbe̩, kpʼama; oñ ewo ewo-wñ chaka amud egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta gbogbo alo.
U gbʼinabali kwʼugbo Jihofa,
Todu go, omi che kʼuwe̩ nya ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi
I chʼe-ailo-we̩ ki aba,
Ido̩m la amud e̩wñ awuwu, oñ ugoju amʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi alale o̩mo̩ da, oñ ma achʼo chui! todu atulubo̩ du ki ke̩re̩bʼo̩.
Alu ki de̩ e̩gba ku ma gu So̩do̩m kpai Go̩mo̩ra kpʼadogbe-ma lo̩ le̩, e̩ne̩ du agugu o̩mo̩ n, o̩ma one̩ du la age̩ne̩ o̩mo̩ n, Jihofa aka-i.

Go, i ate̩gu wa dab idu kwʼuwobi Jo̩rdan kʼi ako̩bʼo̩do̩ ki gbiti le̩; todu naje̩ ñw ma ra kwʼugbo-wñ achi-gili; oñ nadʼo̩da-wñ ñw e̩ne̩ kʼomi achi. Todu e̩ne̩ dab omi? E̩ne̩ ñʼadʼ iko ñw mi? E̩ne̩ chʼadidala kʼi adago o̩gba-mi?

Todule̩, me̩ ki gbʼo̩la ki Jihofa lo, owñ chʼe-kʼi lo nyʼIdo̩m, kpʼe̩wñ ki ñwa ef e̩do̩-wñ owñ chʼe-kʼi ñwa nyʼabo ku ma dodo Te̩man; i chaka chʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ef ujo̩ le̩, efa ma afa ma kwʼo̩mo̩ chuu; i la aje̩ ñw odo-ma ki mud e̩wñ awuwu ñw ma tila.
Ane̩-ile̩ aga noj ekuku ewane̩-ma; ukwa dago; ma gbʼekuku-wñ gbogbo kad ohimini Ekpikpa.
Go, i ate̩gu wa, i la awu dab o̩re̩, i la anʼika-wñ dala ako̩bo̩ Bo̩zra. Tak e̩do̩ amagbiti Ido̩m adab e̩do̩ onobule̩ kʼi achefu iko kʼa ka-i.
E-Damaskus de̩.
Damaskus gwegbo me̩, i arʼo̩la-wñ da kʼi ra,
Go, abile ku ma ma dʼewo ku ma ñwulo̩ uwñ le̩ tinyo̩ n,
Todule̩ abokolobia-wñ awane̩ ej o̩na-wñ,
Tak omi akʼuna ef aku Damaskus,
E-Kedar, kpʼe-ojane̩ ojane̩ Hazo̩r ku Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, kpo̩fo̩ le̩ de̩.
Ma akʼunyabo unyabo-ma kpai ame̩wño̩re̩-ma egini;
Me̩ ra, me̩ da yo̩o̩, da yo̩o̩ ku me̩ nyʼo̩najiji, me̩ kwogugu ugbo ki nefu,
Kwane̩, kʼe̩ nyʼugbo abo uche̩ichi ʼka ku ma jʼañmi,
Aminyakulumi-ma amud e̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ adinya,
Taku Hazo̩r amud unyi amogbem-gbem,
O̩la Elam ki Jihofa ka kʼi wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya, akache̩, e̩gba ku Ze̩de̩kaya chane̩ o̩fe̩ Juda eje̩ de̩, kakini.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩, kakini, Go, nagu o̩o̩do̩ Elam che̩, owñ chʼonu ukpahiu-ma.
Naño̩ kʼafu me̩le̩ kwʼago̩go̩ me̩le̩ e-efojale wa abʼElam ma, oñ nafia ma tuka rʼej afu le̩ chaka; i la anʼabo uche̩ichi kate kʼabo Elam ku ma no ma rinyo̩ le̩ ma awʼugbo ma n.

Tak u naje̩ ñw e̩do̩ abo Elam ki muda kpu rʼo̩gba ame̩nebi-ma, kpai o̩gba abo ku ma tene oji-ma; naño̩ kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ wa abʼuma ma, owñ chʼuwe̩do̩-mi ki kpuna, Jihofa aka-i; oñ nakpe̩ o̩kwo̩chageli tʼuma ubi, gbogbo tak u fʼuma lie̩ kpa.
