Tak u nadʼede-mi dago Elam, oñ nakpʼonu kpʼamagboji rinyo̩ bʼo̩mo̩ te̩, Jihofa ka-i.
I muda awa che iko otitala kʼomi arʼamu Elam da, Jihofa ka-i.
O̩la Babilo̩n kpʼe-ane̩ Kaldia ki Jihofa ka lʼalu Je̩re̩maya, akache̩ de̩.
Me̩ ka dufu ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, ku me̩ mʼu du kpogo,
Todu uche̩ichiʼka kwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ awa ku ma kʼogu bʼo̩, abo le̩ aje̩ ñw ane̩-wñ chʼe̩wñ awuwu, e̩ne̩ du la agugu o̩mo̩ n. Era ma ra, ma le me̩, tʼone̩ tʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩.
O̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i kpʼiko le̩, amo̩ma Israe̩l awa, ama kpʼamo̩ma Juda akpe̩re̩, Jihofa aka-i; ma anʼaku aro̩ tʼo̩na alo, ma la afeju Jihofa, O̩jo̩-ma.
Ma afeju-ma kparʼo̩wo̩ Zayo̩n atene, kakini, Me̩ lewa, kʼa kʼo̩la-wa dama kpai Jihofa ef alo ogbegbele̩ ki ma nʼegbenyo̩ ge̩ n.
Abo-mi te̩te̩chʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ki lenyo̩; amadide-ma je̩ ñw ma la. Ma je̩ ñw ma muna rʼiba oj uwo oj uwo; ma kwʼoj uwo le tʼoj otete. Ma gbenyo̩ uña uñmi-ma.
E̩ne̩ du ki li ma fʼuma lie̩; ame̩no̩la-ma la kakini, I nʼuda ñw a n, todu ama du Jihofa, ugbo kʼo̩kpakpa adodo, re, owñ che Jihofa kʼi chʼukibeno amata-ma le̩.
Me̩ ra bʼalumeji Babilo̩n te̩, me̩ ki la kwo oj ane̩ abo Kaldia dufu, ku me̩ dab amobuko̩ ku ma tʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini o̩gba.

Todu, go, omi adʼe̩do̩ abo uche̩ichi abo uche̩ichi lile kwane̩ ku ma jʼalu kʼu naje̩ ñw ma kwʼane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩ ku ma wa akʼogu bo̩ Babilo̩n. Tak ama akʼo̩la-ma donyʼu jo̩; o̩mo̩ ma afʼu du. O̩fa-ma la adab e-agbiti kʼi chʼo̩ka o̩fa eta. E̩ne̩ du adabi o̩wo̩ ofo n.
Kaldia la amud e̩wñ kʼogu je̩. Efu abo ku ma wa ñʼane̩-wñ ako, Jihofa aka-i.
Todabu kʼe̩do̩-me̩ bo̩, todabu ku me̩ gwoye,
anyo̩ amʼiye-me̩ ogbolo,
Todu uwe̩do̩ Jihofa one̩ ñʼadodo ef uwñ ge̩ n,
Me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ donyu Babilo̩n daka,
Me̩ ki kpogu rʼo̩ oji daka,
Me̩ fʼe̩ne̩ ki agbe̩ e̩wñ kpʼe̩ne̩ ki anʼo̩pia chʼuko̩lo̩ iko ku ma kʼe̩wñ oko wʼunyi,
Israe̩l chʼe̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma ne bʼunyi te̩; amidu fʼu ne tinyo̩. Ejo-dudu, onu Asiria mʼu du je̩; oñ fai ubiane̩-i, Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, fʼachiku-wñ guche̩.
Todule̩ abu ku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l, aka de̩, kakini. Go, omi abʼudu ñw onu Babilo̩n kpai ane̩-wñ, alu kʼu bʼudu ñw onu Asiria le̩.
Tak u ñʼadu Israe̩l dabi wa okije̩ e-wñ ge̩, owñ la ajije̩ oji Karme̩l kpai Beshan, oñ onugo-wñ aje̩ kʼefu oj uwo Ifraim kpai Gilead.
O̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i kpʼiko le̩, Jihofa aka-i, me̩ atejane̩ udu kʼIsrae̩l fe̩, i la ñʼade̩ ge̩ n; kpʼadure e-Juda, ma ñʼaliʼi ge̩ n. Todu natʼo̩ no̩ ñw abo kʼu tʼuma no̩ jʼemi ku ma chʼe̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩.
Mute̩gu nyʼako bʼane̩ Me̩rata,
Ma gbʼiche̩ ogu ane̩-i,
Go abʼihama ile̩ du ko̩da meji kʼi la kpo̩fo̩ te̩!
Omi fʼoku bane te̩ ñw e̩, oñ i fʼe̩ mu, O Babilo̩n,
Jihofa mʼo̩na unyi ane̩ ogu-wñ bi,
Ame̩ ki kwʼalo̩me̩ ane̩ otitala wa akobʼo̩;
Fʼamo̩kokuno̩-wñ chaka kpa,
Omuko̩la abo ku ma ra ku ma la fu tane̩ bʼoj ane̩ Babilo̩n te̩, ku ma du ache̩ ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩-wa na le̩ ka dufu Zayo̩n, owñ chʼache̩ unyi-wñ kʼi na.

Me̩ dʼamato̩fa wa jeju nyu Babilo̩n, owñ chʼo̩chaka abo ku ma afʼo̩o̩do̩. Me̩ ru ru jo lʼo daka; me̩ je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du fu tane̩ n, dʼakoji ñw u teju alu kʼuko̩lo̩-wñ de̩; teju alu du kʼi che, me̩ chʼo; todu i te̩takeru Jihofa, owñ chʼE̩ne̩ Kiafo̩ e-Israe̩l le̩.
Todule̩ abo-kolobia-wñ awane̩ ojikpadala-wñ. Oñ oli atʼabogu-wñ chaka alu o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i, Jihofa ka-i.
Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼuwe̩, O uwe̩ kʼe̩ ke le̩,
Tak e̩ne̩ ki ake le̩ ake̩re̩ i la awane̩,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩, kakini, Ma fʼamo̩ma Israe̩l kpʼamo̩ma Juda demane̩ alu kate; oñ abo du ku ma mu ma gwo̩nyu ma gaga, ma ko̩ eje̩ ñw ma lo.
Agba ma tane̩ chʼegbiti: Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, oñ odu-wñ ko̩; i agba ma tubi, todu kʼi dʼuñmi ñw ane̩ ile̩, kʼi la je̩ ñw abo ku ma dodo Babilo̩n ku ma we enʼuñmi.
O̩kwo̩chageli bʼabo Kaldia kpʼabo ku ma dodo Babilo̩n ma me̩, Jihofa ka-i,
O̩kwo̩chageli bʼabo ku ma ba ma,
O̩kwo̩chageli la bʼamanya-ma kpʼo̩kogu-ma,
Omi omi-wñ chane̩ egbe̩,
Todule̩ ame̩la oko kpʼamogbe-mgbem kpʼamobijim ajʼo̩mo̩; one̩ ñʼadodo o̩mo̩ gbogbo alo ge̩ n. Akwʼo̩gba nʼo̩gba-ma ma ñʼagugu o̩mo̩ n.
Alu ki de̩ e̩gba kʼO̩jo̩ gu So̩do̩m kpai Go̩mo̩ra kpʼewo ewo ki me̩ru lo̩, Jihofa ka-i, abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ du agugu o̩mo̩ n, o̩ma one̩ du lañʼage̩ne̩ o̩mo̩ ge̩ n.
Go, amone̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ awa me̩;
Ma kʼo o̩do̩ kpʼo̩kwo̩ nyʼo̩wo̩;
Onu Babilo̩n fʼinabali-ma gbo̩ me̩,

Go, i awa dabe̩ne̩ kʼidu kʼi akwefʼuwobi Jo̩rdan wa kʼi kobʼugbo kʼone̩ adodo kʼi gbiti le̩ ma; todu omi aje̩ ñw ma ra bʼo̩ te̩ achigili. Oñ e̩ne̩ ku ma chi, e̩ne̩ le̩ nadʼu chʼagboji-wñ. Todu e̩ne̩ dab omi? E̩ne̩ la adʼiko ñw mi? Ugbo adidala kʼi la neke dago o̩gba-mi de̩?

Todule̩ me̩ ki gbʼo̩la ki Jihofa alo, owñ chʼe-kʼi lo nyu Babilo̩n, kpʼibe kʼi ñwanyʼane̩ amaKaldia: ma afa ma kwʼo̩mo̩ tila, owñ chʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini: i la ache kʼodo-ma ki mud alache̩ bʼuma ma chuu.
Noj ekuku Babilo̩n ku ma du le̩ ane̩-ile̩ naga, ma la gbʼukwa-wñ ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi.
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Tak u nakpʼabo o̩wo̩ ejaduña nyi Babilo̩n,
Ato̩fa ki nafʼo̩o̩do̩-wñ fa ñw e̩ne̩ du ki afa o̩o̩do̩,
Ekpa ku ma akpa ma ma awane̩ oj ane̩ abo Kaldia,
Todu O̩jo̩-wñ, ki che Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du,
Me̩ ra bʼalumeji Babilo̩n te̩,
Babilo̩n te̩tachʼago o̩jamalia ef o̩wo̩ Jihofa,
Achigili Babilo̩n lewane̩, oñ i mukpabie̩ te̩;
I dʼuwa e̩do̩ kʼa fʼo̩ga Babilo̩n che,
Jihofa mʼo̩kpakpa-wa du dufu me̩;
Me̩ fʼo̩fa no̩!
Mʼagaliga du dago ku ma wa kobo̩ aku aku Babilo̩n;
O uwe̩, kʼe̩ gugu ej omi wewe le̩,
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du fʼo̩la-wñ go̩, kakini:
I nʼukpahiu-wñ che ane̩ ile̩-i,
E̩gba kʼi kʼomuʼka ekuku omi omi dʼefojale,
One̩ du mud e̩la i la ma e̩wñ du n;
O̩wai i che, uko̩lo̩ ayechi i che;
Ukpe̩ e-Jeko̩b la dab e-le̩ n,
Uwe̩ chʼakeke kpʼido̩na ogu-mi ki bo̩:
u la anʼuwe̩ kpa anya kpʼe̩ne̩ ki atanʼo fo̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩;
omi la anʼuwe̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ fo̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩;
omi anʼuwe̩ kpʼadidala kpʼujo̩-wñ fo̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩;
Oñ nakʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du kʼabo Babilo̩n kpʼabo du ku ma dodo Kaldia che efu Zayo̩n ñw ma eju-we̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼuwe̩. O uwo akpʼe̩wñ bie̩-i, Jihofa ka-i,
Ma ñʼadʼokuta okate kwʼugbo we̩ ku ma adʼu chʼoji alo n,
Me̩ dʼagaliga dago oj ane̩-i,
Fʼabo uche̩ichi date̩ ku ma kobʼo̩,
Ane̩ le̩ la agegbulu o̩la-wñ awʼo̩,
Amagbiti Babilo̩n we ogu eja,
Afuleʼka afule ledo ekeji,
ma fʼo̩na o̩na-wñ kpa,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Israe̩l ka de̩ kakini:
Ne̩biukadre̩za onu Babilo̩n fʼumi lie̩ me̩,
Afuma kʼi che mi kpʼo̩re̩la-mi ki ni Babilo̩n oji,
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
taku Babilo̩n amud ugbudu ugbu-du jo̩,
Ma ajo̩ akwa dab amidu agbadufu;
E̩gba kʼe̩do̩-ma kpa kpa nachʼuje̩-wñ uyo̩ ñw ma
Nako ma wa dab amo̩mala nyʼugbo ku ma akpa ma,
Me̩ go abu ku ma fu She̩shak du!
Ohimini lewa abi Babilo̩n ma me̩;
Ewo ewo-wñ mud e̩wñ awuwu te̩,
Omi la adʼajo̩ wa fejudo Be̩l efu Babilo̩n le̩,
Abo-mi, me̩ kwʼalumeji-wñ dufu!
E̩do̩-me̩ ki da n, me̩ ki la railo
Todule̩, go, iko-wñ awa
Tak efojale efojale kpai ane̩ ile̩,
Alu ku Babilo̩n je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l ku ma kpa wane̩,
A me̩ ku me̩fʼo̩kwo̩chageli o̩wo̩ tane̩,
Ukata-wa muchi me̩ todu a gbʼina ku ma bu;
Todule̩, me̩ go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa ka-i,
Dagba Babilo̩n ki chaka te̩gu nyʼefojale,
Ukwa dago Babilo̩n!
Todu Jihofa afu Babilo̩n chile̩che̩ me̩,
todu ajakpa e̩wñ lewa bʼo ma,
Omi la aje̩ ñw o̩te̩ mu amagboji-wñ kpʼamanibe-wñ,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini:

O̩la ki Je̩re̩maya, akache̩, ñwa ñwu Se̩raya, o̩ma Ne̩raya, o̩ma Maseya, e̩gba kʼi lebo̩ Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda, nyi Babilo̩n o̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ku Ze̩de̩kaya jʼo̩fe̩ le̩ de̩. Se̩raya le̩ la chʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩da unyi olu onu.
Oñ Je̩re̩maya la fʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du ki awa abi Babilo̩n ma ko̩ rʼef ibuku, owñ chʼo̩la Babilo̩n du ku ma ko̩-i.
Oñ Je̩re̩maya ka ñwu Se̩raya kakini, E̩gba kʼe̩ lewa Babilo̩n, mak e̩ fʼo̩kalatu o̩la-i du che,
kʼe̩ la kakini, O Jihofa, uwe̩ ka o̩la ugbo-i kakʼuwe̩ akʼo̩ da tinyo̩, kʼe̩ne̩ du ki ño̩ dodo emi n, tʼone̩ tʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, kʼi muda achʼalache̩ te̩ ogbegbele̩.
Oñ i awatu, e̩gba kʼe̩ fʼo̩kalatu ibuku-i che kpa, tak uwe̩ ki dʼokuta ji mʼo, kʼe̩ dʼu ro̩ tʼalumeji Yufretis;
kʼuwe̩ ki kakini, Abu ku Babilo̩n aji le̩ de̩, i ñʼatu ge̩ n, noj e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼomi akowa bʼo ma; uhia la ahia ma.
O̩do̩ Ze̩de̩kaya chʼogu nyokeʼka e̩gba ki chane̩ ejʼo̩fe̩; i la jʼo̩fe̩ Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ me̩gwaka. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Hamutal, o̩ma Je̩re̩maya e-Libna.
Owñ la che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa, teju alu du ku Jiho̩yakim che le̩.
Todu lef uwe̩do̩ Jihofa e-le̩ wa che efu Je̩rusale̩m kpai Juda, gbogbo tak i fʼuma ne rinyo̩ bʼeju-wñ te̩.

Oñ i lewa tʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩la kʼi jʼo̩fe̩, ochu e̩ke̩gwa-wñ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa ochu le̩, Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, lewa, owñ kpʼabogu-wñ chaka, ku ma ko bʼo̩ Je̩rusale̩m. Taku ma ru ru nyʼu; ma la fʼugbudu ogu du nyʼu le daka.
Abe̩le̩ ma kpala nyʼewo le̩ gbogbo tʼo̩do̩ onu Ze̩de̩kaya e̩ke̩gwaka.
Ochu e̩ke̩le̩-wñ, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩la ochu le̩, ukpo̩ta akpa ewo le̩ bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩, oñ uje̩wñ du ño̩ de̩ tod amone̩ ane̩ le̩ ge̩ n.

Taku ma fʼaku ewo le̩ gudu, oñ abogu chaka ra. Ma la kwʼef ewo le̩ dufu odu lʼo̩na alaku kʼi dʼagbagba o̩do̩ meji kʼi me̩ru uche̩ ubioko onu, oñ ma le rʼo̩wo̩ Araba. (Abo Kaldia la donyʼewo le̩ daka e̩gba le̩ me̩.)
Abogu abo Kaldia la ranʼonu, oñ ma fu Ze̩de̩kaya mu egbili Je̩riko; abogu-wñ chaka fiatuka bʼo̩ te̩.
Taku ma mʼonu du, oñ ma mʼu du le tʼugbo onu Babilo̩n, Ribla, oj ane̩ Hamat; oñ i fʼoj ajo̩-wñ kpa.
Tak onu Babilo̩n fʼamo̩ma Ze̩de̩kaya kpa eju-wñ; i ño̩ fʼamagboji Juda chaka kpa Ribla o̩mo̩.
Tak i fu Ze̩de̩kaya eju kpo̩fo̩; oñ onu Babilo̩n fʼu ji igbaligba ebije ikpa, i la mʼu du le tu Babilo̩n. Oñ i mʼu du tʼef unyi uga gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa ochu e̩ke̩lu, kʼi chʼo̩do Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, e̩ke̩gwe̩la, Ne̩biuzaradan, agboji abide kʼi adago o̩gba onu Babilo̩n, lewa Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ i fʼunyi Jihofa gujo kpʼunyi onu, kpʼunyi unyi Je̩rusale̩m chaka; i fʼuna tʼunyi lile du ki fʼu gujo rinyo̩.
Tak abogu Kaldia chaka ku ma jʼugbo agboji abide le̩, fʼaku Je̩rusale̩m chaka kpo̩fo̩ dagbala daka.

Taku Ne̩biuzaradan, agboji abide le̩, fʼame̩nubie̩ iche̩ka ef amone̩ le̩ kpʼe̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩ ku ma bo̩ ef ewo le̩, kpʼabo ku ma chi o̩la-ma kwef abo-ma, ku ma ñwa tʼo̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n, kpʼe̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩ ku ma chʼo̩ka uko̩lo̩ ko nyʼef amu alo.
Ne̩biuzaradan, agboji abide muda tʼabo iche̩ka ku ma chʼame̩nubie̩ tule no̩ ubi ku ma dejute̩ uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma kpʼe̩wñ uche̩ ki bo̩.
Tak abo Kaldia fʼe̩wñ udago waala ku ma nʼebije ikpa che ki jʼef unyi Jihofa kpʼo̩ka-wñ kpʼohimini ebije ikpa ki jʼef unyi Jihofa le̩ ko̩da kpikpi, oñ ma kʼebije ikpa-wñ alo tu Babilo̩n.
Ma ño̩ mʼucha-wñ kpʼuko̩che̩-wñ kpʼalapa ku ma ne̩ ñw owu agege che kpʼugba-wñ kpʼuko̩de̩-wñ kpʼe̩wñ eku du ku ma nʼebije ikpa che e-ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ ñw u ko kwʼo̩mo̩.
Agboji abide la mʼago-wñ kpʼigbeli-wñ kpʼugba-wñ kpʼucha-wñ kpʼakete-wñ kpʼuko̩de̩-wñ kpʼukpachi-wñ e-ki chʼo̩jamalia, kpʼe-kʼi chʼajifa ko alo.
Ebije ikpa meji ki dago waala le̩ kpʼohiminiʼka, kpʼamokuno̩ ebije ikpa me̩gweji ku ma jʼofe o̩ka-wñ, e-ku So̩lo̩mo̩n, onu, che tod unyi Jihofa, uwoji ebije ikpa e̩wñ eku-i chaka nʼeñwan.
I la chʼe-e̩wñ udago waala le̩, o̩gba udago waala-wñ oka chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩; iku kʼujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gweji tak i alʼo de; ukpa-wñ la chʼo̩mo̩wo̩ me̩le̩; efu-wñ chʼetʼawo.

Ukata ebije ikpa la dʼoji-wñ ate̩; o̩gba ukata le̩ oka chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, iga kpai po̩me̩grane̩t che̩ta nyʼukata-wñ daka, ebije ikpa i che chaka: e̩wñ udago waala ekeji ño̩ ne̩ abe̩le̩, kpai po̩me̩grane̩t ge̩.
Po̩me̩grane̩t e̩le̩gwa nyoke me̩fa jʼakolo-wñ me̩le̩. Po̩me̩grane̩t du ki jʼo̩la iga le̩ daka chʼogume̩lu.
Tak agboji abide le̩ mu Se̩raya, agboji amatama, kpai Ze̩fanaya, ata-ma ekeji, kpʼamadalona me̩ta le̩, ko;

tak i mʼonojiʼka ku ma kʼabogu jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ du kwef ewo le̩, kpʼone̩ mebie ku ma jʼef abo ku ma li eju onu, ku ma li ef ewo le̩, kpʼako̩takada agboji abogu, kʼi akʼodu amone̩ oj ane̩ le̩ nyʼo̩takada; kpʼaboke̩le̩ amone̩ ane̩ le̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta ku ma li alumeji ewo le̩,
oñ Ne̩biuzaradan, agboji abide, mʼabo le̩ ko, i la mʼuma ko wʼugbo onu Babilo̩n Ribla.
Tak onu Babilo̩n fʼuma gwo, oñ i mʼuma ko kpa Ribla, ane̩ Hamat le̩. Abe̩le̩ ma fʼabo Juda ño̩ kwʼoj ane̩-ma nyʼef amu.
Abo ku Ne̩biukadre̩za ko nyʼef amu le̩ de̩: o̩do̩ e̩kebie-wñ amaju chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩ta nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩ nyoke meta.
O̩do̩ Ne̩biukadre̩za e̩ke̩gwe̩jo̩, i mʼone̩ icham nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke meji ko kwo Je̩rusale̩m nyʼef amu.
O̩do̩ Ne̩bitikadre̩za ogu nyoke me̩ta, Ne̩biuzaradan, agboji abide, mʼamaJu ulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ mebie nyoke me̩lu ko nyʼef amu alo: amone̩ le̩ chaka che icham me̩lu nyʼulo̩gwa.

Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke mebie ku ma mu Jiho̩yachin onu Juda le̩, ochu e̩ke̩gweji-wñ, o̩jo̩ ogu nyoke me̩lu ochu le̩, Ifil-Me̩rodak, onu Babilo̩n, o̩do̩ ejodudu-wñ kʼi jʼonu, mʼoji Jiho̩yachin, onu Juda, du dago, oñ i mʼu du kwef unyi-uga dufu.
Oñ i ko̩la ube̩do̩ ñw u, i la mʼede-wñ du nyʼate̩ ñw ede amonu ku ma jʼugbo-wñ Babilo̩n.
I mʼe̩wñ o̩la unyi-uga-wñ ko jane̩. Tak i jʼuje̩wñ o̩gba-wñ o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-wñ kade.
Ukpe̩ uje̩wñ-wñ kʼonu Babilo̩n ñwate̩ ñw u o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ do̩mo̩, i nʼukpe̩ʼka o̩jo̩ du gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-wñ, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-wñ kade.
Aiyaa, abʼewo ki te̩tako̩ ñw amone̩ le̩
I araku anyanyi odu,
Juda kwo bʼane̩-wñ te̩ noj o̩bata
O̩na o̩na Zayo̩n du adeku,
Ame̩no̩la-wñ kwotʼo̩gba,
Ojima-wñ du la kwo
O̩jo̩ o̩bata-wñ kpʼetale ofofo-wñ
Je̩rusale̩m fʼadure ta bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩,
Iwa-wñ dʼef obunuku-wñ;
Jihofa, go o̩bata-mi!
E̩no̩la le̩ fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala
Abo-wñ chaka jʼafifi,
I wʼume̩ eju re n, ame̩ ku me̩ alale chaka-i?
I dʼuna kpuche̩ kwʼatate̩ wa tʼef achiku-mi,
O̩wo̩-wñ fʼoli uno̩lo̩ ada-mi kʼu je̩ ji;
Ondu la fʼamagbiti-mi chaka chʼo̩wai
Todu e̩wñ kʼu naraku-i de̩;
Zayo̩n anʼo̩wo̩dala jo̩,
Jihofa chʼe̩no̩kpakpa,
Omi do̩ ame̩nufe̩do̩-mi
Go, O Jihofa, todu u dʼef o̩pe̩cha,
Ma gbo̩ ka kʼu nafifi;
Je̩ ñw e̩wñ bibi-ma du ki wʼo̩gba we̩;
Go alu kʼOndu dʼakpa wa
Ondu mʼodo Je̩ko̩b du ko mi,
Ef uwe̩do̩-wñ ki kpuna
I fʼo̩o̩do̩-wñ fa dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩nebi,
Ondu dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩nebi me̩,
I la fʼo̩gba kʼi bu nyʼu kpo̩fo̩ wane̩ woo, dabe̩ne̩ ki chʼuche̩ ma bʼu nyʼu,
Ondu fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ hi tinyo̩ me̩,
Jihofa fʼibe ñwate̩ ka
Ane̩ mʼalaku-wñ ko mi,
Abogijo o̩ma onobule̩ Zayo̩n chechi jʼane̩pe̩te̩;
Eju-mi gbe̩ ñw omi aku,
Ma ka ñw amiye-ma kakini,
E̩wñ nadu gbʼe̩ ibenu? E̩wñ nadu chʼuwawe we̩,
Amakache̩-we̩ fʼane̩ ego e-olemi
Abo du ku ma lale
Ame̩nebi-we̩ du
Jihofa fʼe̩wñ kʼi ñw ibe-wñ tane̩ le̩ che me̩,
E̩do̩-ma raku do̩ Ondu!
Kwane̩, kʼe̩ fʼogu kpa odu,
Go, O Jihofa, kʼe̩ li!
Imo̩to̩ kpʼogijo dachi
Uwe̩ fʼudo̩ do̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩jo̩ ujeju ku ma da,
Omi chʼe̩ne̩ kʼu li o̩bata
owñ ne̩ mi le oñ i je̩ ñw mi lule̩ ef e̩chubi,
i arʼo̩wo̩-wñ da, rida, rida ño̩ rida
I je̩ ñw o̩re̩la-mi kpʼaño̩-mi gbo,
i fʼe̩wñ ne dago akobʼumi,
i je̩ ñw mi gugu ef uña ki chubi,
I fʼo̩do̩ ne nyʼumi daka kʼomi ma
ochochi, e̩gba kʼu nakwa kʼu nado̩ ate̩ko,
i mʼokuta ku ma da ko nʼo̩do̩ ki fʼo̩na-mi kpa,
I dabe̩ne̩ kʼibe̩a kʼi kpala anede e̩la ñw mi,
i mʼo̩na o̩na-mi rida tʼo̩wo̩ʼka oñ i fʼumi fana pe̩le̩ pe̩le̩;
i fʼo̩o̩do̩-wñ fa,
I je̩ ñw o̩fa ahiagba-wñ
omi mud e̩wñ oye ñw abo-mi chaka,
i je̩ ñw e̩wñ e̩rikoko kʼumi efu,
I nʼe̩yo̩go̩ okuta gu umi enyi che̩,
uwe̩ la mʼonugo-mi du ro̩ tʼo̩najiji bʼure̩do̩ te̩,
tak u kakini, Ukpahiu-mi lenyo̩,
E̩ narewa o̩bata-mi, kpʼalu ku ma fʼumi ne tʼoko-i,
Onugo-mi narewa e̩wñ le̩ ta
u mʼe̩wñ le̩ du tʼe̩do̩,
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Jihofa ojoji ojoji chʼe̩wñ
i chʼetito̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa;
Jihofa chʼukpe̩ e-mi, onugo-mi aka-i,
Jihofa chenyo̩ ñw abo ku ma nede owñ,
i chenyo̩ kʼone̩ ki kibeno
i nyo̩ kʼone̩ ki nʼoli uno̩lo̩
Owñ kate chechi gugu,
i ki dʼalu-wñ tunyʼebutu—
i ki dʼiti-wñ te̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki akpʼo̩,
Ehi tinyo̩ e-Ondu
todu dagba kʼi chaka gwʼone̩ e̩do̩dudu, i ali ejumomi
todu i dʼe̩do̩-wñ kʼi dʼone̩ ma n,
Enʼe̩re̩ fʼame̩namu ane̩-ile̩ chaka kpetili mʼane̩,
erʼo̩kpakpa one̩ da
echʼo̩la one̩ jugujugu,
E̩ne̩ aka, tak e̩wñ le̩ awa che,
E̩bie̩ne̩ kpʼe̩nyo̩
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ne̩ ki deju ajeñmini
Awa ki tejane̩ kʼa jʼo̩na o̩na-wa ma,
Awa ki mʼe̩do̩-wa kpʼo̩wo̩-wa ko
Awa fʼada je̩, awa lañu rʼu,
Uwe̩ kʼuwe̩do̩ bʼo̩la ma oñ e̩ ra nʼuwa,
uwe̩ la kʼakpa bʼo̩la-we̩ ma
uwe̩ ko wa chʼiwa ku ma deli rinyo̩
Ame̩nebi-wa chaka
ailo kpʼo̩fe̩ lewa bʼuwa ma me̩,
omi aku-mi acha wane̩ dab aji aji,
Omi aku eju-mi acha dafo,
gbogbo taku Jihofa tʼejukpe̩
eju-mi achʼonugo-mi o̩la,
Ma nʼumi ure bie̩ne̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼu chʼe̩we̩,
ma mʼudeju-mi bu wane̩ ef ura amu,
omi cha lʼumi oji;
U kwa do̩ odu-we̩, O Jihofa,
uwe̩ gbo omu-mi me̩,
o̩jo̩ kʼu kwadʼe̩ uwe̩ te̩me̩rʼumi,
O Ondu, uwe̩ fʼologu o̩la onugo-mi che,
O Jihofa, uwe̩ fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ku ma che mi li me̩,
uwe̩ fʼache̩ du ku ma na
Uwe̩ fʼina ku ma bu gbo̩ me̩. O Jihofa,
kpʼuko abo ku ma kwane̩ tʼumi o̩la
uwe̩ ki go uguguane̩-ma kpʼukwane̩-ma;
Uwe̩ adʼakoji ñw ma, O Jihofa,
uwe̩ adʼe̩wñ bʼe̩do̩-ma ma,
uwe̩ arano ma ef uwe̩do̩,
Go abu kʼo̩jamalia de̩ chunuu,
Amo̩ma Zayo̩n e-akoko le̩,
I chaka chʼamogbemgbem ma dʼe̩nya te̩
Ukpalu o̩ma ki añmʼe̩nya
Abo ku ma te̩tajʼuje̩wñ e̩nyo̩
Todu udu kʼo̩ma onobule̩ abo-mi fe̩
Abo-wñ ki chʼe̩daru fe̩ ti sno le
Eju-ma mud edudu tʼeginibibi le,
Abo ku ma nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma
Abobule̩ ku ma li ejumomi nʼo̩wo̩ e-ma
Jihofa che teju e̩do̩fulu-wñ kpa,
Amonu ane̩-ile̩-i du
Owñ chʼutod adure amakache̩-wñ
Ma tale ej o̩na ej o̩na dab amafeju,
Ma kpogu rʼuma oji kakini,
Eju Jihofa fʼuma kpatuka,
Eju-wa agbe̩ noj e̩neju ate̩ko-wa e-owai;
Ma tejane̩ e̩re̩-wa,
Abo ku ma rano wa hiane̩
Ma mʼiñmi iñmo̩-wa ko jʼef ura-ma,
Gwoguyo̩, e̩do̩-we̩ ki bo̩, O o̩ma onobule̩ Ido̩m,
E̩ fʼudu-we̩ chi kpa me̩, O o̩ma onobule̩ Zayo̩n,
O Jihofa, e̩ nadibekado e̩wñ ki lewa bʼuwa ma-i,
E̩wñ ogu-wa murida tʼabo̩wo̩ ejaduña o̩wo̩,
Awa mud amo̩mayoku kpʼabo ku ma ma nʼata n;
O̩ko̩ oñ adu lʼomiofo tak a ñmo̩,
Abo ku ma rano wa nʼuwa o̩lo̩ te̩;
Awa mʼo̩wo̩ du ñw abo Ijipti
Amata-wa dure, ma ño̩ de̩ ge̩ n;
Amadu nʼo̩da-wa;
Oji-wa a adu tinyo̩ tak a nʼuje̩wñ-wa,
Año̩-wa kpa dab aido,
Ma fʼabobule̩ chʼukata Zayo̩n
Ma fʼamagboji o̩wo̩ ji lo̩ko̩li,
Abokolobia nʼokuta unʼe̩wñ;
Abogijo ño̩ jʼalaku ge̩ n,
Uyo̩ e̩do̩-wa muda me̩;
Ike̩be̩ muñwa bʼuwa oji te̩ me̩;
Tod e-le̩ oñ e̩do̩-wa muda;
Tod uwo Zayo̩n ki chʼofofo te̩;
Uwe̩, O Jihofa, gugu ogbegbele̩;
E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ agbenyo̩ wa o̩pioo
Mʼuwa rida bʼuwe̩, O Jihofa, tak e-le̩ achʼerida wa!
Abe̩k e̩ ko wa pioo de̩-i?
Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa, ochu e̩ke̩le̩, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩lu ochu le̩ abu kʼu dʼef ame̩namu o̩la ohimini Che̩bar, kʼefojale mubile̩ oñ u fʼO̩jo̩ li ef ane̩ ego ago ño̩ go.
O̩jo̩ e̩ke̩lu ochu le̩, owñ chʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩lu ku ma mu Jihoyachin onu,
o̩la Jihofa gwoji wʼugbo Izikie̩l, atama kʼi chʼo̩ma Buzi, ane̩ abo Kaldia o̩la ohimini Che̩bar; oñ o̩wo̩ Jihofa nʼo oji o̩mo̩.

Tak u go, e̩ la go, afu ibi ju kwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ wa, kpai akpa lile, kpai una kʼo̩go̩-wñ nawenyʼomune̩, kʼi la mʼane̩ ne̩ lʼo daka; alumeji-wñ la dab e̩ne̩ kʼebije kʼi ada ña ña; owñ chʼalumeji una le̩.
Oñ e̩wñ ki biu ame̩-wñ lñmi me̩le̩ kwʼalumeji-wñ wa. Alu ku ma la de̩ eju le̩ de̩: ma chebiu one̩.
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ muda nʼeju me̩le̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma laño̩ nʼika me̩le̩.
E̩re̩-ma la tʼo̩kpakpa; oñ adaba e̩re̩-ma dab etikpa o̩mokuno̩; ma la bʼeju je̩ dab ebijeikpa ku ma gwe̩.
O̩wo̩ one̩ la jʼo̩gane̩ ika-ma akolo-ma me̩le̩ e̩le̩. Abu kʼeju kpʼika ama me̩le̩ e̩le̩ de̩ de̩:
ika-ma gamʼomune̩; abu ku ma alo ma na n; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ muda fʼeju kparʼo̩gba-wñ alo.
I chʼe-alu kʼeju-ma de̩, ma nʼeju one̩; ama me̩le̩ la nʼeju idu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩; ama me̩le̩ la nʼeju o̩ko̩kuno̩ o̩wo̩ awohi; ama me̩le̩ le̩ laño̩ nʼeju o̩re̩.
Eju-ma kpʼika-ma la che̩daru bʼomune̩ te̩ ate̩; ika meji e-e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ gamʼomune̩, eji la bʼaño̩la-ma ma.
Oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ma le̩ tʼo̩gba-wñ kpaala; ugbo ki dʼukpe̩ kʼafu ale, ma le; ma na abu ku ma alo n.
I chʼe-alu kʼame̩wñ iñmi me̩le̩ le̩ de̩ eju, ma chebiu e̩ge̩ una ki ajo, ma biu e̩mu; una nate̩gu i nagwo̩ru ef ame̩wñ iñmi le̩; una-wñ nabʼeju je̩, oñ o̩mama-nya nada kwef una le̩ dufu.
Oñ ame̩wñ iñmi le̩ ra lo, ra wa dab o̩mamanya ki ada.
Oñ abu kʼu do̩mo̩ ago ame̩wñ iñmi le̩, go, o̩daʼka kad ane̩ akolo eju ame̩wñ iñmi me̩le̩ e̩le̩ le̩.
O̩da o̩da le̩ kpʼuko̩lo̩-wñ dabe̩ne̩ ku be̩re̩l eju; ama me̩le̩ le̩ la chʼalukate; oñ alu ku ma de̩ eju kpʼuko̩lo̩-ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩daʼka dʼef o̩da omune̩.
E̩gba ku ma lule̩, ma le rʼo̩wo̩ ugbo kʼe̩ne̩ʼka akpejuru, ma na abu ku ma alo n.
I chʼe-o̩da-wñ, i gba nana, i la bailo; eju che̩ko̩ ñw e̩le̩ e̩le̩-wñ daka.
Oñ e̩gba kʼame̩wñ iñmi le̩ kwane̩ ule̩, o̩da-ma jʼakolo-ma alo; e̩gba ku ma la kʼe̩wñ iñmi le̩ kwane̩ bʼane̩ te̩, ma ño̩ kʼo̩da-ma kwane̩ manyʼuma.
Ugbo du ki dʼafu e̩do̩ kʼi lo, o̩mo̩ ma le; o̩mo̩ i dukpe̩ kʼafu-wñ ale; taku ma mʼo̩da le̩ ko kwane̩ akolo-ma; todu afu ame̩wñ iñmi le̩ dʼef o̩da-wñ.

E̩gba kʼabo-le̩ le, abo-i ño̩ le ge̩; oñ e̩gba kʼabo-le̩ kwodago, abo-i kwodago; e̩gba ku ma kʼabo le̩ kwane̩ bʼane̩ te̩, ma ño̩ kʼo̩da le̩ kwane̩ akolo-ma ge̩, todu afu ame̩wñ iñmi le̩ dʼef o̩da o̩da-ma.
Oñ e̩wñ ki biu agbagba ki te̩ ofofo dʼate̩ ñw ame̩wñ iñmi le̩, e̩ go i dab ogigo ki abailo, i nadala te̩ oji-ma ate̩.
Oñ ika-ma chenadala te̩ gba-gaa o̩gane̩ agbagba le̩, oka-wñ le̩ rʼo̩wo̩ ekeji; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼe̩ji ki bʼaño̩la-ma ma ej emi, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la nʼe̩ji ki bʼo̩la-ma ma eju ekeji.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma le u gbo̩ ekuku ika-ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼekuku omi lile, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼomuko̩la Odoba-o̩gagu, ekuku-wñ dabe̩ne̩ kʼaboguʼka dutu. E̩gba ku ma kwodago, ma tʼika-ma no̩ wane̩.
Tak omuko̩laʼka dʼate̩ ñw agbagba kʼi dʼoji-ma ate̩ le̩ aka. E̩gba ku ma kwodago, ma tʼika-ma no̩ wane̩.
Oñ e̩wñ ki biu ede̩ dʼate̩ ñw agbagba ki dʼoji-ma ate̩ le̩, i dab okuta safaya eju; e̩wñ ki biu one̩ la dʼoji e̩wñ ki biu ede le̩,
Akwʼugbo ki biu ago-wñ tʼate̩-wñ u li e̩wñ ki dab ebije ki ade̩ ñaña ki wenyu e̩wñʼka ki dab una eju; akwʼugbo ki biu ago-wñ wʼo̩gane̩-wñ e̩wñ do̩mo̩ ki biu una, oñ o̩mo̩ mune̩ pee lʼo daka.
Alu kʼo̩ba o̩la akpa o̩jo̩ kʼomi alo̩ de̩ eju abe̩le̩ ugbo ki ne̩ ki lʼo daka le̩ de̩ eju.
Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩ kwane̩ dago, tak omi ako̩la ñw e̩.
Tak abu kʼi nako̩la ñwu mi afu mugudu wʼef umi, i la mʼumi e̩re̩ ko dʼane̩, oñ u gbo̩ abu kʼi akʼo̩la ñwu mi.
I ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, ekpʼuwe̩ nakpʼuwe̩ nyʼugbo amo̩ma Israe̩l, ugbo abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n, ku ma la ko mi; ama kpʼamata-ma te̩tajʼada gbogbo tʼeñini kide̩.
Amo̩ma-ma aje̩ja, e̩do̩-ma chʼe̩no̩; ama le̩ nakpʼe̩ ru. Uwe̩ ki ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩.
Dagba ma gbo̩, dagba ma chaka ko̩, (todu abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n ma che), ma muda ama ka kʼakache̩ dʼef uma chuu.

I la chʼuwe̩ o̩ma one̩, e̩ ki railo ma n; e̩ ki la railo o̩la ku ma ka n; dagba ikeke kpʼiñwa jʼugbo we̩, kʼe̩ la gugu ef amakpe; e̩ ki railo o̩la ku ma ka n. E̩do̩-we̩ ki da kpu todu ma n; todu abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n ma che ochochi.
E̩ ki la akʼo̩la-mi ñwu ma, dagba ma gbo̩ dagba ma ko̩ egbo̩; todu abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n ma che.
I muda chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩ e̩ gbʼe̩wñ kʼu naka ñwʼe̩-i; e̩ ki koegbʼe̩nyo̩ alu kʼabunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n-i che-i n; mʼalu-we̩ chi, kʼe̩ je̩ e̩wñ kʼu naduñwʼe̩.
Tak u go, go, o̩wo̩ʼkachʼenadala te̩ ñwu mi, e̩ la go, ibukuʼka ki che̩ka dʼef uwñ.
Oñ i fʼu nadala te̩ o̩gba mi, i la nʼorubutu ejefu-wñ kpʼej o̩do̩da-wñ, o̩la inaku eda, kpʼe-ifi efi kpʼe-atogwo la che̩ko̩ nyʼu.
Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, e̩ mʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ li du je̩; mʼibuku-i du je̩, kʼe̩ lo kʼe̩ ko̩la ñw abunyi Israe̩l.
Abe̩le̩ u mʼalu-mi chi; tak i je̩ ñwu mi mʼibuku le̩ du je̩.
Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, mʼibuku kʼu nadu ñw e̩-i du je̩ kʼefu-we̩ ki ko̩. Tak u mʼu du je̩. I la rinyo̩ dab iño̩ ef alu-mi.
Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, lo kʼe̩ nyʼunyi abo Israe̩l, kʼe̩ kʼo̩la-mi ñwu ma.
Todu i chʼamone̩ ku ma kʼichi kpʼabo kʼichi-ma gbiti egbo̩, oñ ma kpʼuwe̩ ru-i n, chai ugbo abunyi Israe̩l.
I chʼugbo amone̩ ojoji ojoji ku ma kʼichi kpʼabo kʼichi gbiti egbo n, e-kʼe̩ ma neke gbo̩ oji o̩la-ma n. Omi ma kpʼe̩ rʼabo o̩gʼe-le̩ ma ma netiru we̩ chuu.
Abunyi Israe̩l muda anetirʼe̩ n; todu i dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma netirʼe-mi n; todu abunyi Israe̩l chaka chʼama je̩ja kpʼe̩do̩ ki chʼagbo̩ni.
Go, omi che eju-we̩ ki kparʼeju e-ma, kʼo̩gba oji-we̩ ki gbiti bʼo̩gboji e-ma jo̩.
Omi che kʼo̩gboji-we̩ dab okuta ki gbiti tʼokuta o̩mu le. E̩ ki railo ma n, e̩do̩-we̩ ki dakpu todu ma n, todu abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n ama che.
I ño̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, o̩la du kʼomi aka ñw e̩, e̩ mugba tʼef e̩do̩-we, kʼe̩ la nʼeti-we̩ gbo̩,
kʼe̩ lo, kʼe̩ nyʼugbo abo ku ma ño̩ ma bʼane̩-ma te̩, owñ chʼamo̩ma abo-we̩, kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩, dagba ma gbo̩, dagba ma ko̩.
Tak Afu mʼumi du kwane̩ oñ u gbʼekuku ubi-mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ ka afule gbudugbudu, i kakini, Ojima Jihofa ki nʼele akwo uña-wñ le̩;
kpʼekuku ika ame̩wñ iñmi le̩ abu ku ma kado omune̩, kpʼekuku o̩da-ma ki jʼakolo-ma, owñ chʼekuku e̩wñʼka ki afule gbudugbudu.
Abe̩le̩ Afu le̩ mʼumi du kwane̩ oñ i mʼumi du le, oñ u le kpʼe̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩, e̩do̩-mi chʼe̩kpa, o̩wo̩ Jihofa la nʼumi oji nana;
tak u lewa ugbo abo ku ma ño̩ ma jo Te̩labib, ku ma gugu o̩lʼohimini Che̩bar, oñ u kwogugu ugbo ku ma gugu le̩. Oñ awuwu fʼumi mu gugu ef uma o̩mo̩ o̩jo̩ mebie.
Oñ e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ mebie le̩ jo, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, omi dʼuwe̩ chʼadide abunyi Israe̩l; todule̩ uwe̩ ki gbʼo̩la alu-mi, kʼe̩ la juka ñw ma ñwu mi.

E̩gba kʼu naka ñw e̩ne̩bibi kakini, Eku uwe̩ aku chuu, kʼe̩ ma juka ñw u n, kʼe̩ ma la ko̩la uka eje̩ ñw e̩ne̩bibi ki kwo bʼo̩na bibi-wñ te̩ n, todu kʼi fʼoji o̩la-wñ jadu n, e̩ne̩bibi le̩ aku ef abi-wñ ki je̩; omi muda atene e̩bie̩-wñ o̩wo̩-we̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ fʼuka je̩ ñw e̩ne̩bibi, kʼi ma la rida bʼe̩wñ bibi-wñ te̩ n, kpai kwo bʼo̩na bibi-wñ le̩ te̩ n, i aku ef abi-wñ kʼi je̩, uwe̩ muda fʼoji o̩la-we̩ jadu me̩.

Omune̩ de̩ ge̩; e̩gba kʼe̩no̩kpakpa rida bʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa-wñ te̩ kʼi la fʼudu, kʼu la dʼe̩wñ uke̩re̩ tʼo̩gba-wñ, eku i aku; todabu kʼuwe̩ ma juka ñw u n, i aku ef adure-wñ le̩. E̩wñ o̩kpakpa du kʼi la che akwoubi, ma ñʼare̩-wa ge̩ n; omi muda tene e̩bie̩-wñ o̩wo̩-we̩.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ juka ñw e̩no̩kpakpa le̩ kʼe̩no̩kpakpa ki we edure, kʼi ma dure gc n, i adeju chuu, ukpe̩ kʼi gbʼuka kʼe̩ je̩ ñw u gbo̩; uwe̩ la fʼoji o̩la-we̩ jadu me̩.
O̩wo̩ Jihofa la nʼumi oji o̩mo̩, oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ dufu nyʼegbili, o̩mo̩ tak u nako̩la ñw e̩.
Abe̩le̩ u kwane̩, oñ u kwodufu nyʼegbili; e̩ la go, ojima Jihofa dago o̩mo̩, i dab ojima kʼu li o̩la ohimini Che̩bar le̩; oñ u lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.
Tak Afu le̩ mugudu tʼef umi, oñ i mʼumi e̩re̩ du dʼane̩; i la ko̩la ñwu mi, oñ i ka ñwu mi kakint, Lo tef unyi-we̩ kʼe̩ fʼo̩na re nyʼo̩la-we̩.
I la chʼuwe̩, O o̩ma one̩, go, ma akʼiku ku ma ba kpo̩chi nyʼuwe̩ o̩la, oñ ma anʼe̩ ji uwe̩, todu kʼe̩ we edufu nyʼef amone̩ le̩.
Omi la aje̩ ñw ukpalu-we̩ gamʼodo̩! enyi-we̩ ate̩, kʼalu-we̩ ki we eko̩la, kʼe̩ ma ñʼaneke chʼadejuru ma ge̩ n; todu abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n ma che.
Ama e̩gba kʼu nako̩la ñw e̩, nachi alu-we̩, tak uwe̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩; e̩ne̩ kʼi agbo̩ kʼi gbo̩; e̩ne̩ ki ako̩ kʼi ko̩; todu abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n ma che.
I la chʼuwe̩, O o̩ma one̩, mʼo̩tubeli du, kʼe̩ mu du tʼane̩ o̩gba-we̩, kʼe̩ Pina alu kʼewo de̩ fa o̩la-wñ, owñ chʼewo Je̩rusale̩m;
kʼe̩ fʼala kpa nyʼu, kʼe̩ la fʼo̩do̩go̩ ogu ne nyʼu, kʼe̩ fʼugbudu du nyʼu; kʼuru uru ogu jo ke̩ fʼigbo oli bu jo̩ lʼo̩ daka, ku ma ne̩ gu o̩do̩-wñ lo̩.
Tak e̩ mʼebije ku ma gwu kpa taka du kʼe̩ dʼu dago chʼo̩do̩ ebije agbagba we̩ kpʼewo le̩. Tak e̩ mʼejuwe̩ koru. Ma la akpala nyʼu, uwe̩ ki kpala nyʼu. E-le̩ achʼujiwe ñw abo unyi Israe̩l.
E̩ ki dachi akolo o̩wo̩ awohi-we̩, tak e̩ dʼudu kʼabo unyi Israe̩l fe̩ nʼo, aluka o̩jo̩ du kʼe̩ dachi nʼo, uwe̩ ane̩ udu-ma.
Todu omi fʼo̩do̩ kʼama te̩tafʼudu bu ñw e̩, kʼo̩do̩ʼka-wñ chʼo̩jo̩ʼka ñw e̩, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ 390, Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ñʼanʼudu kʼabunyi Israe̩l fe̩ le̩.
Omune̩ de̩ ge̩: e̩gba kʼe̩ fʼo̩jo̩ e-le̩ je̩ kpa, uwe̩ adachi akolo-we̩ o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩, oñ uwe̩ ane̩ udu kʼabunyi Juda fe̩ ge̩. O̩jo̩-wñ chʼogbo̩ meji, o̩jo̩ʼka-wñ chʼo̩do̩ʼka, oñ omi bu ñw e̩-i.
Uwe̩ la amʼeju-we̩ koru ala ku ma kpanyu Je̩rusale̩m, e̩wñ abʼugbogbolo o̩wo̩-we̩ ma n; oñ uwe̩ akache̩ e̩wñ ki awa bʼo ma.
E̩ la go, omi akʼiku ku ma ba kpo̩chi nyʼuwe̩ o̩la, kʼuwe̩ ma ñʼarida kwʼakoloʼka tʼakolo ekeji n, gbogbo tak e̩ fʼo̩jo̩ kʼe̩ kpala nyʼu le̩ je̩ kpa.
I chʼuwe̩, e̩ ki namʼiwit kpai barli kpʼagugu kpʼe̩gwa kpʼokodu kpʼahiahi ko nyʼe̩wñ ekuʼka, kʼe̩ ne̩ che akala kʼi bʼaluka o̩jo̩ kʼe̩ dachi akoloʼka kade jo̩; owñ chʼo̩jo̩ 390 oñ uwe̩ aje̩.
Uwoji uje̩wñ kʼuwe̩ la aje̩ o̩jo̩ du achʼe̩ñwa e̩ñwa e̩bo̩ alu ishe̩ke̩l ogu, uwe̩ aje̩ iko-wñ.
Omi kʼuwe̩ añmo̩ achʼe̩ñwa e̩ñwa ge̩, owñ chʼukpe̩ rʼe̩fa hin; iko-wñ uwe̩ añmo̩.
Uwe̩ la aje̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼakala barli oñ uwe̩ la anʼechu ki kwef one̩ chʼiji kʼe̩ ne̩ de̩ eju-ma.
Oñ Jihofa kakini, Abe̩le̩ oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l aje̩ uje̩wñ e̩daji ef abo uche̩ichi ugbo kʼu nane̩ma ru.
Tak u kakini, Aya, Ondu Jihofa! Onugo-mi daji mama ta n; todu akwʼimo̩to ojokolobia-mi gbogbo wʼifai, u je̩ e̩wñ ki ku tinyo̩ ofofo n, kpʼe-kʼame̩la fana n; e̩la ihie̩ne̩ du la tʼef alu-mi mama ta n.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Go, omi mʼechu okuno̩ ko ñw e̩ koji echu one̩ me̩, e-le̩ oñ uwe̩ ane̩ hi uje̩wñ-we̩.
Anubi le̩ i ño̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, go, u la akpo̩ uje̩wñ ku ma lo̩nʼo Je̩rusale̩m fo̩; oñ ama aje̩ uje̩wñ e̩ñwa e̩ñwa, kpʼejiji eda; ma la añmʼomiofo e̩ñwa e̩ñwa ge̩, e̩do̩-ma la ada kpu;
todu uje̩wñ kpʼomiofo aña ma, e̩do̩-ma la amu da kpu kpʼomune̩, ma la agbo̩-gbe̩ rinyo̩ ef udu-ma ku ma jo̩ achi.

I la chʼuwe̩, O o̩ma one̩, mʼo̩kwo̩chageli ki ale̩ du; i adab abe̩ e̩ne̩ ki alʼoji, oñ uwe̩ adʼu, tak uwe̩ ki nʼe-le̩ lʼoji-we̩ kpʼagba-we̩; tak e̩ mʼe̩bo̩ ku ma ne̩ ñwa e̩wñ du, kʼe̩ fʼiloji le̩ kpe̩ru.

E̩ ki fʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ gujo ef una alumeji ewo le̩ e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ kʼe̩ kpala nyʼu le̩ jo̩; tak e̩ mʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ omune̩ du kʼe̩ nʼo̩kwo̩chageli da ugbo du o̩la-wñ; oñ ukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta ki bo̩ e̩ ko fiatuka ñw afu, tak omi awo̩ o̩kwo̩chageli tʼuma ubi.
E̩ ki la chi kwʼef uwñ rere, kʼe̩ fʼu ji nyʼe̩re̩ ukpo-we̩.
Tak e̩ ki ño̩ chi kwef e-le̩, kʼe̩ ko rikpolo nyʼalumeji una; kʼe̩ gujo rinyo̩ ef una le̩; o̩mo̩ oñ una adufu kwo tʼabo unyi Israe̩l o̩la chaka.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Je̩rusale̩m-i de̩. Omi mʼowñ du gugu alumeji abo uche̩ichi abo uche̩ichi, oj ane̩ oj ane̩ la donyʼu daka.

Todu i lañu rʼoji ajo̩-mi kʼu kpa bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩ tʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi le, kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi tʼabo ojane̩ ojane̩ ki lʼo daka le. Todu ama ko̩ oj ajo̩ kʼu kpa; i la chʼe-e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, ma lule̩ teju-wñ mama ta n.

Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Todabu ku me̩ te̩talo̩fu tʼabo uche̩ichi ku ma jo̩ lʼume̩ daka-i le, ku me̩ ma la lule̩ ef uhio̩me̩-mi n, me̩ la de oji ajo̩-mi n, me̩ la che teju oji ajo̩ abo uche̩ichi ku ma jo̩ lʼume̩ daka n.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, omi, omi onugo chʼe̩nagwunyu-we̩; u la ache e̩wñ kʼoji ajo̩ ka nyʼuwe̩ alumeji-we̩ eju abo uche̩ichi.
U la ache alumeji we̩ e̩wñ kʼomi ma che mama ta n, e-kʼomi ma la ño̩ chʼe̩go̩-wñ ate̩to̩gba ge̩ n, todu e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ chaka.
Todule̩ amata ajʼe̩la amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ alumeji we̩, oñ amo̩ma ajʼe̩la amata-ma; oñ omi ache e̩wñ kʼoji ajo̩ ka ef uwe̩; tak u nakʼabo-we̩ ki bo̩ chaka fiatuka rʼafu du.
Todule̩, Oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i, Todabu kʼuwe̩ nʼe̩wñ we̩ ki akʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu ire̩ kpʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ du fʼuña-mi kiafo̩ daji, nachʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ ñw e̩ n; ejumomi-we̩ ñʼache min.

Ukpe̩re̩ta-we̩ aku ñw e̩wñ ibi, ukpo̩ta la afʼuma lie̩ alumeji-we̩; oñ ukpe̩re̩ta-we̩ la aku alu o̩kwo̩chageli alʼuwe̩ daka; tak ukpe̩re̩ta omune̩ nako fiatuka rʼafu afu chaka, oñ nawʼo̩kwo̩chageli tʼuma ubi.
Abu kʼuwe̩do̩-mi ache kpoji le̩ de̩. Tak u naje̩ ñw e̩do̩fulu-mi ki ñmi ugbo ma, oñ e̩do̩-mi anyi. Tak ama ama ka kʼef ogu kʼu naja oñ omi Jihofa ko̩la-i e̩gba kʼu che teju e̩do̩fulu-mi kpa ugbo ma.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, omi adʼuwe̩ chʼegbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta kpʼoli ina ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma jo̩ l uwe̩ daka-i, eju abo du ku ma lale.

Abe̩le̩ i amud oli ina kpʼicha eka kpʼe̩wñ ekʼone̩ kpʼe̩wñ awuwu ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma jo̩ lʼuwe̩ daka-i, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼu nache teju alu kʼoji ajo̩ ka ñw e̩ ef uwe̩do̩ kpʼe̩do̩fulu, kpʼeju edarʼuwe̩ ef e̩do̩fulu, (omi Jihofa fʼu ka me̩);

e̩gba kʼu mʼo̩fa o̩fa e̩bie̩ne̩ e-ukpo̩ta ku ma chʼutod e̩wñ ekpabie̩ ko kpuche̩ rʼume̩ oji, owñ chʼekʼu nakpe̩ wa akpa me̩ bie̩. Tak omi aje̩ ñw o̩kpo̩ta ki kpa we̩ tule, oñ nagu uje̩wñ kʼe̩ lo̩ no le̩ che̩;
u ñʼakpʼo̩kpo̩ta kpʼame̩wñ iñmi e̩bie̩ne̩ wa abʼe̩ ma; ma la akpa amo̩ma-we̩; e̩wñ ibi kpʼe̩bie̩ la alale gu ef uwe̩ du; oñ nadʼo̩kwo̩chageli wa abʼe̩ ma. Omi, Jihofa, ka me̩.
Oñ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, fʼeju-we̩ kparu uwo uwo Israe̩l, kʼe̩ kache̩ rʼuma oji,

kʼe̩ kakini, Ame̩, uwo uwo Israe̩l, me̩ gbʼo̩la Ondu Jihofa: Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka ñw uwo uwo kpʼotete otete kpʼo̩cha o̩cha aji kpʼo̩go̩ o̩go̩ de̩ kakini, Go, omi, omi onugo, adʼo̩kwo̩chageli wa abʼume̩ ma, oñ nakpʼotete otete-me̩ fo̩.
Ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-me̩ la ate̩ i ofo; ma la akpʼojibo ojibo olu-we̩ fo̩; oñ nakʼaboke̩le̩-me̩ kʼuku kpa ma ro̩ jʼane̩ eju ode ode-me̩.
U la akʼoku amo̩ma Israe̩l jo̩ o̩gba ode ode-me̩; tak u nakʼachiku-me̩ fiatuka ale ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-me̩ daka.

Ugbo du ku me̩ dʼodo ma akʼewo ewo-me̩ chihi rinyo̩; otete otete du la ate̩ ofo; todu kʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-me̩ ki chihi rinyo̩ te̩ ofofo, kʼode ode-me̩ ki muguche̩ ki we edo̩mo̩, ku ma ki fʼojibo ojibo olu-me̩ lo̩ wane̩, ku ma fʼuko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-me̩ kpalu rinyo̩.
Oñ abo kʼuku kpa ma awane̩ alumeji-me̩, tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Omi muda atʼe̩bo̩bo̩ abo-me̩ no̩ ku me̩ deju. Owñ chʼabo ku ma fʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli o̩wo̩ ef abo uche̩ichi kʼame̩ ane̩, e̩gba ku me̩ la che̩kpatuka rʼojane̩ ojane̩ jo̩.

Tak abo-me̩ ku ma fʼo̩wo̩ tane̩ arewa mi ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ugbo ku ma amʼuma nyi le̩, e̩gba kʼu fʼe̩do̩ ajo̩ko̩-ma kʼi kwo bʼumi te̩ le̩, kpai eju-ma kʼi tʼajo̩ko̩ atʼode ode-ma ubi guche̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩; tak ama amud e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ eju o̩la-ma onugo tod e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ku ma che ef e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma le̩ du.
Tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩; omi ka ofofo, ka kʼu nache ma e̩bie̩ne̩-i n.

Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, E̩ fʼo̩wo̩ gwo kʼe̩ fʼe̩re̩ da nyʼane̩, kʼe̩ ka kʼAyaa! tod e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ki bie̩ne̩ du kʼabunyi Israe̩l che; todu ama awane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli, kpʼo̩kpo̩ta, kpʼe̩wñ ibi.
E̩ne̩ ki dʼo̩najiji aku ñw e̩wñ ibi le̩; e̩ne̩ kʼi la me̩ru awane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi bo̩ ku ma kpala nyʼu le̩ aku ñw o̩kpo̩ta. Abe̩le̩ nache ma teju e̩do̩fulu-mi kpa.

Tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼoku abo-ma kʼuku kpa jʼe̩re̩ ode ode-ma alʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-ma daka oj otete du ki gbo̩gba, kpʼoj uwo uwo du kpʼofe oli emimi du, kpʼofe oli ok ki hidu chaka, ugbo ku ma kʼe̩wñ ki akpo wa ñw ode-ma chaka.
Oñ omi anʼo̩wo̩-mi dala abʼuma oji ma, kʼu nache kʼane̩ le̩ ki mud alache̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ awuwu tʼaje̩tachi Dibla le ugbo du ku ma dodo jo̩: tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
I la chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩, abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka ñw ane̩ Israe̩l de̩, kakini, Ida-wñ de̩! Ida-wñ lewa bʼago̩go̩ ane̩-i me̩le̩ ma me̩.
Fai tak ida-wñ bʼuwe̩ ma, omi la adʼuwe̩do̩-mi kpuche̩ rʼuwe̩ oji, oñ nakajo̩ we̩ teju alu kʼo̩na o̩na-we̩ de̩. U la akʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ du wa abʼe̩ oji ma.
Nachʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ ñw e̩ n, nali we̩ ejumomi n; omi abʼudu ñw e̩ tod o̩na o̩na-we̩ du, abu kʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ jʼalumeji-we̩ le̩. Tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi che Jihofa.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, E̩bie̩ne̩, e̩bie̩ne̩ okate! Go, i awa me̩.
Ida-wñ lewa me̩, ida-wñ lewa! i ajʼolu tʼuwe̩ o̩la, go, i awa le̩.
E-we̩ ta me̩, uwe̩, kʼe̩ dodo ojane̩-i; iko-wñ lewa, o̩jo̩-wñ me̩ro̩wo̩, o̩jo̩ utu eda i che, i la chʼo̩jo̩ o̩ga echi oj uwo uwo n.
Ofeje-i nakʼe̩do̩fulu-mi danyʼuwe̩ oji, oñ nachʼe̩ tʼeju uwe̩do̩-mi kpa. U ñʼakajo̩ we̩ teju o̩na o̩na-we̩; u la akʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ du wa abʼe̩ oji ma.
Nachʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ ñw e̩ n, u la alʼeju-momi n; nakʼe̩wñ wa abʼe̩ oji ma teju alu kʼo̩na o̩na-we̩ de̩; e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ la ajʼalumeji-we̩; tak uwe̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa chʼe̩ne̩ ki akpa one̩.
Go, o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i! go, i awa me̩! E-we̩ ta me̩. O̩kpa le̩ adikoko, uba abu me̩.
E̩wñ afuma eche gba mud o̩kpa e̩wñ bibi; e̩ne̩ du ef uma abo̩ n, tʼo̩wo̩ one̩-ma, tʼe̩wñ anana-ma; inaku eda todu ma ade̩ n.
Iko-wñ lewa me̩; o̩jo̩-wñ me̩ ewa. E̩ne̩ ki ala e̩wñ ki yo̩ n, e̩ne̩ ki la ata e̩wñ ki daido̩ n, todu uwe̩do̩ bʼoji o̩wo̩ one̩-ma du ma me̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki ta e̩wñ ñʼadabi nyʼugbo e̩wñ kʼi ta n dagba ma chaka deju ta. Todu ane̩ ego-wñ kad o̩wo̩ one̩ chaka; e̩ne̩ du adabi n; e̩ne̩ du la anʼugbite̩re̩-wñ dejutʼoji o̩la-wñ n.
Ma fʼo̩kakachi fa me̩; ma la fʼo̩la mu tane̩ chaka; e̩ne̩ du muda anyʼo̩ko̩-gu n; todu uwe̩do̩-mi bʼo̩wo̩ one̩-ma du oji ma me̩.
O̩kwo̩chageli dʼo̩lo̩fe̩, e̩wñ ibi kpʼo̩kpo̩ta la jʼejefu; e̩ne̩ ki dʼoko akʼuku o̩kwo̩chageli; e̩wñ ibi kpai o̩kpo̩ta la afʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼef ewo lie̩.
Ama e̩ne̩ ef uma kʼi afu tane̩, afu tane̩ aj oj uwo oj uwo dab amikede ef o̩go̩, o̩chaka-ma ajo̩ afifi, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma adʼef e̩wñ ugbite̩re̩-wñ.
O̩wo̩ du ñʼagbiti n, okuku du la de̩ no̩ko̩no̩ko̩ dab omiofo.
Ma ñʼakʼe̩gbanukpo lʼago de, okpo la abʼuma o̩la ma; anyo̩ la abʼeju du ma, oji-ma chaka chʼekpoñma.

Ma akʼajifa-ma rikpolo jʼej o̩na o̩na, o̩jamalia-ma la adab e̩wñ elifo̩. Ajifa kpʼo̩jamalia-ma aneke gba ma o̩jo̩ uwe̩do̩ Jihofa n; ma ñʼanʼe̩wñ ki abʼonugo-ma jo̩ n, efu-ma la ako̩ n. Todu e-le̩ te̩tachʼe̩wñ uke̩re̩ ki dʼef ugbite̩re̩-ma.

I chʼe-alifia e-e̩wñ ijaga-wñ le̩ i mʼu du gugu chʼunyo̩-wñ, ma muda ko che ojibo ojibo e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma kpʼe̩wñ-ma ki achʼakʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu ire̩; todule̩ oñ omi mʼu du che dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ elifo̩ ñwuma.
Omi la adʼu tef o̩wo̩ abo ejaduña ki mud e̩wñ aluje̩, kpai tʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩ne̩bibi ile̩ ki mud e̩wñ kʼogu je̩; tak ama afʼu daji.
Omi ñʼarʼeju-mi dabʼuma te̩, takʼama afʼuña umaja-mi le̩ daji; amadinya la agudu wʼef uwñ adʼo̩ ji ge̩.
Fʼigbaligba-wñ gwu; todu ane̩-i che̩ko̩ ñw udu e̩bie̩, ewo-i la che̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ akpulu eche.
Todule̩ nakʼabo uche̩ichi ki bie̩ne̩ tule wa, oñ ama agbʼunyi unyi-ma ku ma ne̩. U ñʼaje̩ ñw uba amagbiti ki muda, oñ uña uña-ma kiafo̩ adaji.
Ugoju awa mʼuma da, taku ma atene ure̩do̩, i muda ade̩ n.
E̩bie̩ne̩ anʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ubi; ike̩ke̩ o̩la atʼike̩ke̩ o̩la ubi, taku ma atene ane̩ ego ugbo akache̩. Uko̩-o̩la muda alenyo̩ bʼalu atama te̩, kpʼo̩la elo bʼabogijo te̩.
Onu adaido̩, e̩do̩ dudu la abʼo̩la idachi ma. O̩wo̩ abo ojane̩-i la aga. Nache ma teju alu ku ma te̩tache; nanʼajo̩ e-ma kajo̩ ma; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩fa, ochu e̩ke̩fa-wñ, e̩gba kʼochu le̩ nʼo̩jo̩ me̩lu, abu kʼu gugu ef unyi, kʼabogijo Juda jʼo̩gba-mi, o̩wo̩ Ondu Jihofa nʼumi oji o̩mo̩.
U go, i la biu one̩ kʼi dab una eju akwʼugbo ki dab uta-wñ wane̩ chʼuna, oñ akwʼuta-wñ nyʼate̩, i dab e̩wñ kʼi ade̩ ñaña eju, i dab ebije ikpa ku ma gwe̩.

Oñ i dʼe̩wñ ki biu o̩wo̩ nadala te̩, oñ i gwo̩nyʼumi ochuchu kʼi dʼoji-mi; tak Afu mʼumi du kwane̩ tʼagbagba efojale kpai ile̩, oñ i mʼumi du ef ane̩ ego e-O̩jo̩ nyi Je̩rusale̩m, tʼugbo alaku ejefu kʼi kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, ugbo kʼugugu ojibo ogu eja kʼi anyi ogu eja de̩.
E̩ la go, ojima O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l dʼano̩mo̩, i dʼalu kʼe̩wñ ki dab ane̩ ego kʼu li o̩go̩ de̩ eju.

Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, mʼeju-we̩ chi rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ ta, oñ u mʼeju-mi chi rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩: e̩ la go, o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ ñw alaku ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ugbo kʼone̩ agudu, ojibo ogu eja-i de̩.

Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, e̩ li e̩wñ ku ma jʼache? Owñ chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ inaina kʼabʼunyi Israe̩l jʼemiache? Ku ma je̩ ñw umi kwo bʼuña-mi kiafo̩ te̩ tʼo̩najiji? Uwe̩ muda ñʼali e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ki tʼe-i le ta.
Tak i mʼumi du wʼalugbana ologbo le̩; oñ e̩gba kʼu go, go, o̩do̩ o̩mo̩ mugudu.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, gwa o̩do̩ le̩ ta. Oñ abu kʼu gwa o̩do̩ le̩, go, alugbanaʼka te̩.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Mugudu nyʼejefu, kʼe̩ li e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ ku ma jʼemi ache.
Tak u mugudu nyʼejefu oñ u li, ina e̩wñ ki afa ane̩pe̩te̩ ojoji ojoji, kpʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ki akʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu ire̩ kpʼode ode abunyi Israe̩l chaka ku ma ko̩ nyʼo̩do̩ le daka.
Oñ abogijo abunyi Israe̩l e̩te̩gwa dago jʼo̩gba-wñ. Jaazanaya o̩ma She-fan la dago alumeji ma. E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma nʼanade una ef o̩wo̩-wñ, oñ ekpo otulale nate̩gu tʼate tuu dab akpa.

Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, uwe̩ li e̩wñ kʼabogijo abunyi Israe̩l jʼache ef e̩chubi-i, kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ dʼef unyi ojibo-wñ kʼi fʼina-wñ te̩? Todu ma kakini, Jihofa li wa n. Jihofa hiʼane̩ tinyo̩ me̩.
I ftp ka ñwu mi kakini, Uwe̩ ñʼali e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ kʼama che tʼe-i le ta.
Tak i mʼumi du wʼugbo ku ma gudu alaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ unyi Jihofa; e̩ la go, abobule̩ jʼo̩mo̩ araku ñwu Tamuz.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ li, O o̩ma one̩? Uwe̩ ñʼali e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ki tʼe-i le ta.

Tak i mʼumi du wʼef anuku unyi Jihofa; e̩ la go, alu o̩na unyi Jihofa le̩, agbagba agbaru-wñ kpʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩, aboke̩le̩ dab ogue̩lu dubigba unyi Jihofa, ma kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu; oñ ma jʼadojikane̩ ñw olu o̩wo̩ olodudu.

Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Uwe̩ li? O o̩ma one̩. E̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ kʼabo unyi Juda jʼemi ache nyarʼuma kʼama ki ño̩ je̩ ñw ane̩-i che̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ afuma eche, ku ma ño̩ nyʼumi uwe̩do̩ alu waa ge̩? go, ma ño̩ dʼoli ñʼomi eju ge̩.
Todu-le̩ omi ñʼache e̩wñ-mi ef e̩do̩fulu; nachʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ n. Nali ma ejumomi n; dagba ma chaka chʼomu nyʼate̩ akwa nyʼumi eti, nagbʼo̩ n.
Tak i chʼomu nyʼate̩ akwa nyʼumi eti, kakini, Te̩wa, ame̩ ku me̩ nʼo̩da ewo-i, ebije e̩wñ ekpabie̩-wñ ki dʼef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩.

E̩ la go, one̩ me̩fa kwʼo̩wo̩ alaku ate̩, kʼi kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩ wa, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼe̩wñ ebije-wñ ki adu kpʼone̩ ef o̩wo̩-wñ, e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi kʼukpo line̩n efufu bʼo̩la madʼef uma, ugege omi ejiji e-ako̩tako da dʼakolo-wñ. Tak amaʼejefu adago kpenyu ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-ebije ikpa le̩.
Ojima O̩jo̩ Israe̩l la kwane̩ bʼo̩la iche̩rub kʼi nʼoji-wñ akwoubi le̩ nyʼubo̩ alugbana e̩gba le̩ me̩; tak i nʼomudala do̩ e̩ne̩ ki kʼukpo line̩n efufu nyʼo̩la kʼugege omi lo̩ko̩li akolo-wñ le̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu kakini, E̩ le gu alumeji ewo-i du, owñ chʼele gu Je̩rusale̩m-i du, kʼe̩ fʼo̩gboji amone̩ du ku ma jʼale̩do̩ ku ma afifi noji e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ du ku ma che ef uwñ hiuko̩.
Tak u gbo̩ abu kʼi ka ñw abo ki bo̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ tʼo̩ ubi le gu ef ewo-i du ku me̩ kpa ma, me̩ ki chʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ n, me̩ ki la li ma ejumomi n.

Fʼabogijo kpʼabokolobia kpʼabobule̩ ku ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n kpʼabimo̩to egini kpʼabobule̩ kpa rinyo̩; me̩ ki muda dʼo̩wo̩ kado e̩ne̩ du kʼuhiuko̩ le̩ dʼo̩la-wñ n. Me̩ chane̩ ugbo uña-mi kiafo̩. Abe̩le̩ ma chane̩ ugbo abogijo ku ma jo̩ o̩gba unyi le̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ fʼunyi-i daji, ku me̩ kʼabo ku me̩ kpa jʼologbo-i kʼi ko̩. Me̩ lo ke̩. Oñ ma ledufu akpʼone̩ ef ewo le̩.
Oñ abu ku ma jo̩ akpʼone̩, kʼi bo̩ omi kate o̩mo̩, u lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, u kworaku kakini, Aya, Ondu Jihofa! Uwe̩ ñʼakpʼabe̩-bo̩bo̩ abo Israe̩l bie̩ ef e̩do̩fulu-we̩ kʼe̩ du dafo bu Je̩rusale̩m ma?
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Abi kʼabo unyi Israe̩l kpai Juda je̩ nana tabale; ane̩-i ko̩ ñw e̩bie̩, uji la che̩ko̩ ewo-i; todu ma kakini, Jihofa hi ane̩-i rinyo̩ me̩, Jihofa ali n.
I ño̩ chʼe-mi ge̩, nachʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ n, nali ejumomi n, nakʼe̩wñ ku ma che le̩ dabiwa abʼuma ojima.
E̩ la go, e̩ne̩ ki kʼukpo line̩n efufu nyʼo̩la, kʼugege omi ejiji le̩ lo̩ko̩li akolo-wñ, dʼinabali-wñ dabi wa kakini U fʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ ñwa ñwu mi che me̩.
Tak u go, e̩ la go, ef agbagba kʼi dʼate̩ ñw oji amiche̩rub le̩, e̩wñ ʼka kwotejugede ate̩ ñw o̩mo̩, kʼi che-biu okuta safaya, e̩ la go, i biu ede eju.

Tak i ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki kʼukpo line̩n efufu le̩ nyʼo̩la kakini, E̩ lo tʼef o̩da ki jʼarida okokolo ofe iche̩rub le̩; kʼe̩ mʼe̩ge̩ una kʼi jʼagbagba amiche̩rub le̩ ko nyʼe̩do̩-wo̩-we̩ meji e̩ko̩, kʼe̩ ko̩ fia bʼewo-i ma.
Amiche̩rub le̩ la dago jʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ unyi le̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ mugudu tʼejefu; oñ akpa le̩ che̩ko̩ anuku le̩.
Tak ojima Jihofa mute̩gu kwʼo̩la iche̩rub le̩, oñ i lewa dago ate̩ ubo̩ alugbana unyi le̩; unyi le̩ la ko̩ ñw akpa le̩ ologbo-wñ la che̩ko̩-wñ ojiji ojima Jihofa ki ada nʼeju.
Ma gbo̩ ekuku ika amiche̩rub gbogbo wʼologbo ej o̩do̩da, i dab omuko̩la O̩jo̩ Odobao̩gagu e̩gba kʼi ako̩la.
Tak e̩gba kʼi ñwa ñw e̩ne̩ ki kʼukpo line̩n efufu nyʼo̩la le̩, kakini, Mʼuna ko kwʼagbagba o̩da ki jʼarida agbagba amiche̩rub le̩, i mugudu tʼef uwñ adago kpenyʼo̩daʼka.

Tak iche̩rubʼka fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala kwʼagbagba amiche̩rub le̩ tʼugbo una ki dʼagbagba amiche̩rub le̩, amʼu du oñ i mʼu du tʼef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ ki kʼukpo line̩n efufu nyʼo̩la le̩. E̩ne̩ le̩ mʼu gba, oñ i ledufu.
I dabe̩ne̩ ku ma li e̩wñ ki biu o̩wo̩ one̩ o̩gane̩ ika amiche̩rub le̩.
Tak u go, e̩ la go, o̩da me̩le̩ jo̩ kpe̩-nyʼamiche̩rub le̩, o̩daʼka dago kpenyʼiche̩rub oka oñ o̩da omune̩ kpenyʼiche̩rub omune̩, E̩ go o̩da le̩, i dabu okuta krisolait eju.
I chʼe-alu ku ma de̩ eju, e̩le̩ e̩le̩-ma chʼalukate, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩daʼka dʼef o̩da omune̩.
E̩gba ku ma lo ma le rʼakolo-ma o̩wo̩ me̩le̩ e̩le̩, ma rida abu ku ma alo n, ama ugbo kʼoji-wñ kpejuru, ma tʼo̩ ubi; ma rida abu ku ma alo n.
Oñ año̩la-ma chaka kpai ubi-ma kpʼo̩wo̩-ma kpai ika-ma kpai o̩da-ma che̩ko̩ ñw eju daka, owñ chʼo̩da o̩da kʼama me̩le̩ le̩ ne̩.
I chʼe-o̩da o̩da le̩, u gbo̩ abu ku ma do̩ ma ko̩ o̩da o̩da ki arida bilibilibili.
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma nʼeju me̩le̩; eju ejodudu chʼeju che̩rub, eju ekeji chʼeju one̩, eju e̩ke̩ta chʼeju idu, eju e̩ke̩le̩ chʼeju o̩re̩.
Tak amiche̩rub mute̩gu tʼate̩. E̩wñ iñmi kʼu li o̩la ohimin: Che̩bar le̩ de̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼamiche̩rub le, o̩da o̩da le̩ jʼakolo-ma ale; e̩gba kʼami-che̩mb fʼika-ma nadala ku ma kwane̩ bʼane̩ ile̩ te̩, o̩da o̩da le̩ la rida bʼakolo-ma te̩ n.
E̩gba kʼama dago, abo-i kwodago, oñ e̩gba ku ma kwane̩ tʼate̩ abo-i kwane̩ kpai ama. Todu afu ame̩wñ iñmi le̩ dʼef uma.
Tak ojima Jihofa kwo bʼubo̩ ulugbana unyi O̩jo̩ le, oñ i lewa dago ate̩ ñw amiche̩rub le̩.

Tak amiche̩rub fʼika-ma nadala oñ ma kwane̩ bʼane̩-ile̩ te̩ eju-mi abu ku ma alo le̩, o̩da o̩da le̩ la jʼakolo-ma; taku ma lewa dago jʼalugbana alaku o̩wo̩ olodudu unyi Jihofa; ojima O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l la dʼoji-ma ate̩.
E-i chʼe̩wñ iñmi kʼu li o̩gane̩ O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l o̩la ohimini Che̩bar le̩; oñ u fʼu ma ka kʼamiche̩rub ma che.
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼeju me̩le̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la nʼika me̩le̩ e̩wñ ki biu o̩wo̩ one̩ la dʼo̩gane̩ ika-ma.
I chʼe-alu kʼeju-ma de̩, ama chʼeju kʼu li o̩la ohimini Che̩bar le̩. Alu ku ma de̩ eju kpai alu kʼama onugo de̩ de̩. E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma fʼeju kparʼo̩gba-wñ alo kpaala.

Anubi le̩ ge̩, Afu mʼumi du kwane̩, oñ i du mi wʼalaku unyi Jihofa o̩wo̩ olodudu, owñ chʼe-kʼi kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu le̩. E̩ la go, aboke̩le̩ ogue̩lu jʼalu o̩na alaku o̩mo̩; oñ u li abu ku Jaazanaya, o̩ma Azur, kpai Pe̩la-tiya, o̩ma Be̩naya, amagboji amone̩ le̩, jʼalumeji ma.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, abo-i ku ma ñwa ibe e̩wñ ibe̩te̩, ku ma la tohi bibi ef abo̩-hiala ewo-i jo̩-i;
kʼama kakini, Iko kʼa ako̩ unyi me̩rane̩ n. Ewo-i chʼucha, awa la chʼe̩la-wñ.
Todule̩ e̩ nakache̩ rʼuma oji, kache̩ ke, O o̩ma one̩.
Tak Afu Jihofa lewa bʼumi ma. Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, Ko̩la. Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Abu ku me̩ ka le̩ de̩, O abunyi Israe̩l; todu u chema ibe ki awʼef ume̩.
Ame̩ je̩ ñw oku abo-me̩ ku ma kpa wewe nyo̩gba ef ewo-i; me̩ la je̩ ñw ej o̩na-wñ ej o̩na-wñ ki chʼeko̩ ñw oku one̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Oku abo-me̩ ku ma kpa ku me̩ ko dachi jo̩ alumeji-wñ, abo le̩ chʼe̩la-wñ, ewo-i la chʼe̩wñ ku ma nʼahi; omi muda ako me̩ kwʼalumeji-wñ dufu.
Ama te̩tarailo o̩kwo̩chageli; omi la adʼo̩kwo̩chageli wa abʼuwe̩ ma, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Tak omi ako me̩ kwʼalumeji-wñ dufu kʼu la ako me̩ nyʼabo ejaduña o̩wo̩, oñ nabʼudu ñwʼone̩ efu me̩.
Ame̩ awane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli; omi la aka-jo̩ me̩ oj ane̩ Israe̩l; tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Ewo-i achʼucha-me̩ n; ame̩ ñʼachʼe̩la ki ajʼef uwñ n, omi akajo̩ me̩ alu o̩me̩ ane̩ abo Israe̩l;
tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩. Todu ame̩ te̩talule̩ ef e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi n, me̩ la che teju oji ajo̩-mi n; me̩ muda che teju oji ajo̩ kʼabo uche̩ichi ki lʼume̩ daka kpa.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼu fʼache̩ ka, Pe̩latiya, o̩ma Be̩naya, leku. Tak u lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ u chʼomu nyʼate̩ kwa kakini, Aya, Ondu Jihofa! Uwe̩ achʼida e̩bo̩bo̩ abo Israe̩l hioko?
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,

O̩ma one̩, amo̩maye-we̩, owñ chʼamo̩maye e-we̩, abo ku ma chʼamefu-we̩ pio̩o̩ le̩ kpʼabo unyi Israe̩l chaka, o̩chaka-ma, chʼabo kʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ kwo bʼi Jihofa re̩ tʼo̩najiji; ma dʼane̩-i ñw a kʼa ne̩.

Todule̩ uwe̩ ki kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Dagba u chaka mʼuma ño̩ rʼo̩najiji ef abo uche̩ichi, kʼu fʼuma fiatuka rʼojane̩ ojane̩ du, u muda chʼuña kiafo̩ iko re ojane̩ ojane̩ ugbo ku ma wa jo̩ le̩.
Todule̩ uwe̩ ki kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Naya me̩ kwʼef amone̩ amone̩ le̩ wa jo̩. Oñ nako̩ me̩ kwʼojane̩ ojane̩ ugbo ku ma fia me̩ tuka ru le̩ jeju, tak u nadʼane̩ Israe̩l ñwu me̩.
Ama la akwʼo̩mo̩ wa; oñ ma akʼe̩wñ-ma ki akʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu ire̩ kpʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ chaka kwʼo̩mo̩ rinyo̩.
Tak u nadʼe̩do̩ okate ñwu ma, u lañʼadʼafu etito̩ tʼume̩ efu; u la adʼe̩do̩ ki chʼokuta le̩ kwʼef o̩re̩la-ma, kʼu nadʼe̩do̩ o̩re̩la ñwu ma;
kʼama ki lule̩ ef e̩wñ uhio̩me-mi ku ma fʼe̩wñ kʼoji ajo̩-mi ka de, ku ma che teju-wñ, tak ama achʼamone̩-mi, oñ omi achʼO̩jo̩ e-ma.
1 muda chʼe-abo ki rʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma lule̩ tʼe̩wñ-ma ki akʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu ire̩ kpʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma ubi, nadʼakoji e̩wñ ku ma che le̩ wa abʼuma onugo oji ma, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Tak amiche̩rub fʼika-ma nadala, oñ o̩da o̩da le̩ jʼakolo-ma; oñ ojima O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l la dʼoji-ma ate̩.
Tak ojima Jihofa mute̩gu kwʼalumeji ewo le̩ le nyʼadago oj uwo kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ olodudu ewo le̩.
Tak Afu le̩ mʼumi du kwane̩, oñ i mʼumi du ef ane̩ ego le̩ lugbo Afu O̩jo̩ wa Kaldia, ugbo abo ku ma ko̩ nyʼef amu le̩. Abe̩le̩ ane̩ ego kʼu li mute̩gu le bʼumi te̩.
Tak u mʼe̩wñ du ki Jihofa ko̩ ña mi du ka ñw abo amu le̩.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, uwe̩ gugu alumeji abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n le̩, ku ma nʼeju ku ma gane̩, ma la gane̩ n, ku ma nʼeti ku ma gbo̩la, ma la gbo̩ n; todu abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n ma che.
Todule̩, uwe̩ o̩ma one̩, kpʼane̩ ma tod eño̩, tak e̩ ño̩ o̩ro̩ka gbaa eju-ma. Uwe̩ ki la ño̩ kwʼe̩gu-we̩ tʼugbo omune̩ eju-ma; ikani ma jʼakpibe̩, dagba ma chaka chʼabo unyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki la kʼane̩-we̩ dufu eju-ma o̩ro̩ka, ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼane̩ ku ma año̩ nyʼugbo omune̩; tak uwe̩ onugo ki le dufu eju-ma e̩gba ane̩, dab e̩gba ku ma kʼamone̩ nyʼef amu ane̩ omune̩.
Fʼo̩do̩ gwa gudu eju-ma, kʼe̩ kʼane̩-we̩ lʼo̩mo̩ dufu.
Eju-ma uwe̩ ako nʼika-we̩, kʼe̩ la ko dufu e̩gba kʼane̩ achubi; uwe̩ ki kʼe̩wñ bʼeju-we̩ ma, kʼeju-we̩ ki we eli ane̩: todu omi mʼuwe̩ du chʼujiwe te̩ ñw abo unyi Israe̩l.
Oñ u fʼalu ku ma ñwa ñwu mi le̩ che; u mʼane̩-mi ko dufu o̩ro̩ka, dabe̩ne̩ kʼane̩ eño̩; tak e̩gba ane̩ u nʼo̩we̩-mi gwa gu o̩do̩ du; u mʼu ko dufu e̩gba kʼane̩ chubi, oñ u mʼu ko nʼika alo eju-ma.
Odudu o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ e̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, abo unyi Israe̩l-i, unyi abo ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n-i, ka ñw e̩ kakini, Ab e̩ che-i n?
E̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Adu-i chʼe-idachi kʼi de̩ Je̩rusale̩m, kpʼabo unyi Israe̩l du ku ma jʼefu ma le̩.
Uwe̩ ki kakini, Omi chʼujiwe ñwu me̩; alu kʼomi che le̩, alu le̩ ma ñʼache ma ge̩; oñ ma alo tʼojane̩ ononojo, ma anyʼef amu.
Idachi kʼi dʼef uma le̩ la anʼadu ika-wñ e̩gba kʼane̩ chubi, oñ i alo dufu; ama agwa gu o̩do̩ du ku ma kʼane̩ lʼo̩mo̩ dufu; i ako e̩wñ bʼeju ma, todabu kʼi ma ñʼanʼeju-wñ li ane̩ n.
Omi ñʼafʼiga-mi nadala abʼo ma ge̩. Oku-mi la amʼu; oñ omi adʼowñ wa Babilo̩n, ane̩ abo Kaldia; eju-wñ muda adʼo n, o̩mo̩ i la aku.
Oñ omi afʼabo du ku ma donyʼu ku ma te̩kʼowñ fiatuka ñw afu du, kpʼabʼudala-wñ udala-wñ chaka; tak u nawʼo̩kwo̩chageli tʼuma ubi.
Tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, e̩gba kʼu fʼuma kwu rʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi; kʼu la fʼuma fiatuka rʼojane̩ ojane̩.

Omi muda atʼaboke̩le̩ ma no̩ pe̩ kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpʼukpo̩ta kpʼe̩wñ ibi ki we ekpa ma, kʼama kʼi du e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma du kpogo ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ugbo ku ma wa le̩; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Anubi le̩ ge̩ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, jʼuje̩wñ-we̩ kpʼo̩la ega gogodo kʼe̩ la ñmʼomi-we̩ kpʼo̩la ega kpʼejiji eda;

kʼe̩ la ka ñw abo ane̩-i kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka ugbo abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m kpʼojane̩ Israe̩l de̩ kakini, Ma ajʼuje̩-wñ-ma kpʼailo era, omi ku ma añmo̩ e̩do̩-ma ada kpu, todu kʼane̩-wñ ki te̩ ofo kʼe̩wñ du ki we edʼef uwñ, tod e̩wñ afuma kʼabo ku ma gugu oji-wñ ache.
Ewo ewo kʼone̩ dodo ef uwñ le̩ achihi rinyo̩, oñ ane̩ le̩ umud alache̩ te̩; tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩wñ chʼita ku me̩ kpa ane̩ Israe̩l kakini, Iko-wñ kpo̩kpe̩ me̩, ane̩ ego du lenyo̩ rʼile̩ me̩?

Todule̩ e̩ naka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Nache ku ma we ekpʼita-i. Ma ñʼadʼe-le̩ chʼuko̩lo̩ ane̩ Israe̩l ge̩ n; e̩ ki muda ka ñwu ma kakini, Iko-wñ me̩rʼo̩wo̩, kpai o̩la ane̩ ego chaka eche̩.
Todu ane̩ ego e-olemi kpʼifa ebo kpʼurinyo̩ o̩fa eka ñʼade̩ ef unyi abo Israe̩l ge̩ n.
Todu omi Jihofa de̩. O̩la kʼu naka, ma ache teju-wñ; ma ñʼabʼo̩jo̩ tʼo̩ ge̩ n. Todu iko e-we̩, O abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n-i, omi akʼo̩la le̩, oñ na ño̩ che teju-wñ, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩ go ta, abo unyi Israe̩l jʼaka kakini, Ane̩ ego kʼi ali le̩, o̩jo̩-wñ bo̩ tʼo̩gba nana ta; ache̩ kʼi aka le̩ iko-wñ dʼo̩gba o̩gba ta.
Todule̩ e̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, O̩la du kʼu ka ma ñʼabʼo̩jo̩ du tʼo̩ ge̩ n. O̩la kʼomi muda ka ma ache, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, E̩ ki kʼache̩ rʼamakache̩ Israe̩l ku ma kache̩ le̩ oji, kʼe̩ la ka ñw abo ku ma kache̩ kwef e̩do̩ o̩la e-ma onugo, me̩ gbʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Atogwo, ñw amakache̩ idada ku ma tʼafu e-ma onugo ubi, ku ma ma li e̩wñ du n!
O Israe̩l, amakache̩-we̩ te̩te̩dab amajo egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta.
Ame̩ nyʼef e̩kpana o̩do̩ n, me̩ la nʼaku todu unyi Israe̩l kʼama ki dago ef ogu ku ma ja o̩jo̩ Jihofa n.
Ma fʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩ li, ma la fʼifa olemi bo̩; owñ chʼabo ku ma kakini, “Jihofa kakini”; Jihofa muda kpʼuma uche̩ n; ma la je̩ ñw amone̩ kibeno ka kʼo̩la le̩ alonyane̩.
I chʼane̩ ego e-ibe̩te̩ oñ me̩ li le̩ n? I la chʼifa olemi oñ me̩ bo̩ le̩ n? owñ chʼabu ku me̩ kakini, “Jihofa kakini,” kʼomi ma la ka n.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Todabu ku me̩ kʼo̩la ibe̩te̩, ku me̩ la fʼe̩wñ olemi li, todule̩ me̩ go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼume̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.

O̩wo̩-mi la chʼagwunyʼamakache̩ ku ma li e̩wñ ibe̩te̩ ku ma la bʼifa olemi; abo le̩ ñʼajʼef ujeju abo-mi n, ma la akʼodu-ma nyʼef o̩takada abo unyi Israe̩l in, ma la agudu toj ane̩ Israe̩l in. Ame̩ ama ka kʼomi chʼOndu Jihofa.
Todu, i-i, todu ma fʼabo-mi gwo̩-gwo̩ kakini, Ure̩do̩ de̩; ure̩do̩ la do̩mo̩ n; e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ʼka fʼo̩do̩ ne, ma lewa dʼafu kuru.
E̩ ka ñw abo ku ma dʼafu kuru le̩ kakini, I nlo̩, omi akiliwo alo̩; oñ ame̩, okuto̩mo̩jo̩cha lile le̩, awane̩; afu ibi la afʼu kpo̩fo̩.
E̩ la go, e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ le̩ mulo̩ wane̩ ma aka ñwu me̩ n? kakini, Ugbo afu ku me̩ du kuru le̩ de̩?
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Omi anʼafu ibi fʼu kpo̩fo̩ ef e̩do̩fulu-mi. Omi akiliwo la alo̩ ef uwe̩do̩-mi; okuta o̩mo̩jo̩cha awane̩ ef e̩do̩fulu ki fʼu lie̩.
Abe̩le̩ oñ nagu o̩do̩ ku me̩ dʼafu kuru le̩ lo̩, oñ nadʼu wʼane̩pe̩te̩, todu kʼe̩re̩-wñ ki kwo tʼo̩fe̩; i la awane̩, oñ me̩ alie̩ rinyo̩ alumeji-wñ; tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Abe̩le̩ oñ omi ache tʼeju e̩do̩fulu-mi kpa abʼo̩do̩ le̩ ma, kpai abʼoji abo ku ma dʼafu kurʼu. Tak u naka ñwu me̩ kakini, O̩do̩ le̩ do̩mo̩ ge̩ n, tʼabo ku ma dʼe̩wñ kurʼu;
owñ chʼamakache̩ Israe̩l ku ma nʼache̩ Je̩rusale̩m aka kpai ane̩-ego e-ure̩do̩ tod uwñ; ure̩do̩ du la de̩ n, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
I la chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩, fʼeju-we̩ kparʼamo̩ma onobule̩ e-abo-we̩ ku ma kache̩ kwef e̩do̩-ma onugo; kʼuwe̩ ki kache̩ bʼuma ma,

kʼe̩ ka kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Atogwo ñw abobule̩ du ku ma fʼogu-ma da mʼoj iko iko o̩wo̩, ku ma la ga ugbogbo tod oji one̩ alu du kʼi chaka gbo̩gba kade ku ma fʼonugo one̩ mu. Ame̩ ado̩de̩ oji abo-mi? me̩ ache kʼonugo one̩ ku me̩ ne̩ ku ma deju?

Ame̩ fʼumi bie̩ ef abo-mi tod e̩kʼo̩wo̩ e̩kʼo̩wo̩ barli kpʼe̩bu uje̩wñ, ku me̩ dʼabo ki ma dukpe̩ ku ma ku n kpa, ku me̩ la jadu oji abo ki ma dukpe̩ ku ma adeju n, lugbo o̩lemi ku me̩ ro̩ abo-mi ku ma netirʼolemi?

Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼe̩wñ ogu-me̩ ku me̩ damʼo̩wo̩, e-ku me̩ ne̩ do̩de̩ onugo one̩ dab ame̩we̩; nafʼuma jada bʼume̩ o̩wo̩ te̩ oñ natʼonugo one̩ ku me̩ do̩de̩ ma le̩ no̩ tane̩.
U ñʼafʼugbogbo-me̩ fana kʼu gba abo-mi kwef o̩wo̩-me̩; ama ñʼajʼef o̩wo̩-me̩ ku me̩ do̩de̩ ma ge̩ n; tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Todu ame̩ nʼo̩lemi akpʼame̩no̩kpakpa e̩do̩ bie̩, e-kʼomi ma gwʼuma e̩do̩dudu n, oñ me̩ dʼugbiti ñw o̩wo̩ ame̩ne̩bibi, todu kʼi we erida bʼo̩na bibi-wñ te̩ kʼi deju.
Todule̩ ame̩ ñʼali ane̩-ego e-ibe̩te̩ ge̩ n, me̩ la abʼifa n. Oñ nagbʼabo-mi bʼume̩ o̩wo̩ te̩; tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Oñ abogijo Israe̩l iche̩ka lewa jʼane̩ o̩gba-mi.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, abo-i mʼode o̩de-ma gba tʼef e̩do̩-ma me̩, ma dʼugbite̩re̩-ma chʼokuta uke̩re̩ tʼo̩gba-ma; i dʼugbo kʼomi ñʼaje̩ ñwu ma tʼumi ene e̩wñ du ge̩?

Todule̩ e̩ nako̩la ñwu ma, kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ o̩ko̩ke du ef abo unyi Israe̩l kʼi gbʼo̩de-wñ tʼef e̩do̩-wñ, kʼi la adʼugbite̩re̩-wñ chʼokuta uke̩re̩ tʼo̩gba-wñ, kʼi la wʼugbo akache̩, omi Jihofa adohi ñw u o̩to̩to̩la-mi teju alu kʼuwewe o̩de-wñ de̩;
todu kʼu gwo̩nyʼabo unyi Israe̩l ef e̩do̩-ma onugo, todabu kʼo̩chaka-ma mud ab o̩wo̩ e̩jaduña ñwu mi lef ode ode-ma.
Todule̩ e̩ naka ñw abo unyi Israe̩l kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Mudabiwa, me̩ rida bʼode-me̩ te̩; me̩ ki la mʼeju-me̩ rida bʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-me̩ du te̩.

Todu e̩ne̩ du ef abo unyi Israe̩l, abe̩k ef amilowa ku ma ge̩ne̩ oj ane̩ Israe̩l, kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ daru bʼumi te̩, kʼi la mʼode ode-wñ gba tʼe̩do̩, kʼi laño̩ dʼugbite̩re̩-wñ chʼokuta uke̩re̩ o̩gba-wñ, tak i lewʼugbo akache̩ kʼi tene e̩wñʼka ñw o̩la-wñ ugbo mi, omi Jihofa adohi ñw u o̩to̩to̩la-mi
Nafʼeju-mi kparʼe̩ne̩ le̩, kʼu mʼowñ du chʼe̩wñ awuwu kʼi mud ujiwe kpai ita te̩, tak u nakʼo̩ da bʼalumeji abo-mi te̩. E̩gba le̩ ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
I la che̩wñ ku ma gbʼakache̩ le̩ ibe kʼi fʼo̩laʼka ka, mak omi Jihofa, gbʼakache̩ le̩ ibe, oñ omi anʼo̩wo̩-mi dala abʼoji-wñ ma kʼu fʼu kpabie̩ bʼalumeji abo-mi Israe̩l te̩.
Tak ama achi udu ugbite̩re̩-ma; udu akache̩ le̩ achʼoka kpʼe-e̩ne̩ ki tene ugbo-wñ;
todu kʼabo unyi Israe̩l ki ño̩ la bʼumi te̩ ge̩ n; kʼama ki ño̩ nʼada du ku ma je̩ kpʼo̩la-ma bie̩ n, kʼama ki muda chʼabo-mi, kʼomi ki chʼO̩jo̩-ma, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,

O̩ma one̩, e̩gba kʼojane̩ʼka adu mi re lugbo ada ku ma je̩, kʼomi la f ʼe̩wo̩-mi nadala abʼo ma, ku la fʼo̩kpa uka-dane̩-wñ, owñ chʼuje̩wñ-ma, guche̩, kʼu ño̩ dʼo̩kpo̩ta kpuche̩ rʼo̩mo̩, kʼu fʼone̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ko̩da bʼo̩ te̩;
dagba Noa, kpai Danie̩l kpai Job, abo me̩ta le̩, ki jʼoj ane̩ le̩, onugo-ma kate ma ma gba lugbo e̩wñ o̩kpakpa-ma, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Iche̩wñ kʼomi je̩ ñw ame̩wñ iñmi bie̩ne̩ ku ma lale gu ef ane̩ le̩ du ku ma nʼuku wa kpa abo ane̩ le̩, ki mud alache̩ te̩, kʼone̩ du ma neke ño̩ le gu o̩mo̩ du tod ame̩wñ iñmi le̩ n;
dagba abo me̩ta-i chaka jʼOme̩, oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i, ama ma gba amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k amo̩ma onobule̩ n, chai ama kate ma fu, ane̩ le̩ ma chʼalache̩ chuu.
Abe̩k i che̩wñ kʼu dʼo̩kwochageli wa abʼane̩ le̩ ma, kʼu kakini, O̩kwo̩chageli, lale gu ef ane̩ le̩ du; todu kʼu fʼone̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ko̩da bʼo̩ te̩;
dagba abo-i me̩ta ma jʼo̩mo̩, oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i, ma ma gba amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k amo̩ma onobule̩ n; chai o̩la-ma kate ma ma gba.
Abe̩k i che̩wñ kʼu fʼe̩wñ ibi kpe̩ rʼoj ane̩ le̩, kʼu la dʼe̩do̩fulu-mi chʼe̩bie̩ e̩bie̩ da bʼo̩mo̩ ma kʼu fʼone̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ko̩da bʼo̩ te̩;
dagba Noa kpai Danie̩l kpai Job chaka jʼo̩mo̩, oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i, ma ma gba o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ n; chai onugo oji-ma kate ma ma gba lugbo o̩kpakpa-ma.

Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Onu monu i atule e̩gba kʼu fʼoji ajo̩-mi me̩le̩ ki bie̩ne̩ le̩ kpuche̩ wa abu Je̩rusale̩m ma? owñ chʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpʼo̩kpo̩ta kpʼame̩wñ iñmi e̩bie̩ne̩ kpʼe̩wñ ibi kʼu fʼone̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ko̩da bʼo̩ te̩?

E̩ muda go ta, abubo̩ amone̩ la abo̩ jʼef uwñ ku ma ako dufu kpo̩, tʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼamo̩ma onobule̩. Go, ama adufu wʼugbo me̩, oñ ame̩ ali o̩na ku ma le kpai e̩wñ ku ma che. Tak e̩do̩-me̩ anyi ugbo e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼu ko wa abi Je̩rusale̩m ma: owñ chʼe-du kʼu ko wa abʼo ma le̩.
Ama la anyʼume̩ e̩do̩, e̩gba ku me̩ li o̩na ku ma le kpʼe̩wñ ku ma che, tak ame̩ ama ka kʼe̩wñ le̩ du kʼu che ef uwñ u che tebitele ofo n, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Oñ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩wñ oli achiwebe̩te̩ma ne̩ du oli ki bo̩ owñ chʼikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma ki dʼef oli e-efoko le̩?
Ma anʼoli-wñ chʼuko̩lo̩ʼka? one̩ ane̩ chʼuko̩ ku ma kʼe̩wñ eku lo̩ko̩li nyʼu?
Go, iji i che ku ma kʼo rikpolo nyʼef una; una a fʼoji-wñ mejeji lie̩, alumeji-wñ ño̩ jo: i nʼile uko̩lo̩ du?
Go, e̩gba kʼi chʼodukulu te̩ i bʼuko̩lo̩ du jo̩ n; abu kʼuna fʼu lie̩ kʼi la gujo fa? I ñʼabʼuko̩lo̩ du jo̩ ge̩?
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Alu kʼoli ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma de̩ ef oli efoko, owñ chʼe-kʼu mʼu ko chʼiji una, abe̩le̩ omi akʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m che ge.
U la afʼeju-mi kparu ma; ama la akwʼef una le̩ dufu, una-wñ muda afʼuma lie̩; tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, e̩gba kʼu fʼeju-mi kparu ma.
Nagwʼane̩ le̩ alache̩, todabu kʼu ma fʼada je̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugoo̩ mi ge̩ kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩ ki je̩ ñwu Je̩rusale̩m fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-wñ ma,
kʼe̩ la kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka ñwu Je̩rusale̩m de̩, kakini, E̩te̩-we̩, kpʼebi ku ma bi we̩ chʼe-abo Kenan; ata-we̩ chʼe̩ne̩ Amo̩r, iye-we̩ la chʼabo He̩t.
Ebi ku ma bi we̩ le̩, ma dʼukodo-we̩ o̩jo̩ ku ma bi we̩ n, ma la nʼomi ofo fʼe̩ gwe̩ n; ma la bʼomu kuru we̩ o̩la re n, ma kʼukpo we̩nyʼuwe̩ o̩la oke n.
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki chʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ ñw e̩ n, ku ma che e̩wñ-i du ñw e̩ ku ma liʼuwe̩ ejumomi n. Ma muda dʼuwe̩ rikpolo tʼegbili gbaa, todabu ku ma hihie̩ne̩ we̩, o̩jo̩ ku ma biʼe̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼu lale ugbo kʼe̩ de̩ kʼu li abu kʼe̩ chʼete̩mane̩ te̩ ef e̩bie̩-we̩, oñ u ka ñw e̩ ef e̩bie̩-we̩ le̩ kakini, Deju ke, i-i, u ka ñw e̩ ef e̩bie̩-we̩ le̩ kakini, Deju.

U je̩ ñw e̩ wewe nyʼo̩gba dab e̩wñ ki aya oko, oñ e̩ nana nyo̩gba, kʼe̩ la tabale-i, tak e̩ kʼe̩wñ ijaga e-ijaga nyʼo̩la; e̩ fʼe̩nya gwu, iloji-we̩ ño̩ gwe̩; e̩ muda tʼago ofo kpo̩, oñ ago ofo-we̩ chʼo̩pee.

Oñ abu kʼu nalale ugbo kʼe̩ de̩, kʼu la kejurʼe̩, go, iko-we̩ chʼiko ufe̩do̩; tak u fʼeti ukpo-mi nadala bʼe̩ ma, oñ u fʼe̩wñ bʼago̩ ofo-we̩ ma; ochochi, u go̩ ñw e̩, u la fʼalo kpe̩ kpʼuwe̩, oñ e̩ mud e-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Tak u nʼomiofo fʼe̩ o̩la gwe̩; ochochi, u fʼe̩bie̩-we̩ gwe̩ bʼe̩ o̩la te̩ hioko, oñ u fʼekpo ba tʼuwe̩ o̩la.
U kʼukpo ku ma chiya nyʼu bʼuwe̩ o̩la ma, u la kʼe̩da año̩ e̩la omi nyʼuwe̩ e̩re̩, u la kʼukpo line̩n ki che̩hi reju lʼuwe̩ ago de̩, tak u mʼisiliki ko bʼuwe̩ o̩la ma.
Tak u kʼe̩wñ ijaga nyʼuwe̩ o̩la, u la kʼude̩ nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩, oñ u kʼiyagba nyʼe̩ o̩fa.
U la mʼelika du tunyʼiñmo̩-we̩, kpʼaketi nyʼuwe̩ eti, kpʼike̩be̩ alifia nyʼuwe̩ oji.

Abe̩le̩ e̩ kʼo̩jamalia kpʼajifa chʼe̩wñ ijaga o̩la-we̩: e̩wñ kʼe̩ ko bʼo̩la ma, chʼukpo line̩n ku ma hi reju kpʼisiliki kpai ukpo ku ma chiya nyʼu; uwe̩ nʼomu te̩ke̩ te̩ke̩ aje̩, kpai iño̩, kpai ekpo; e̩ la chʼalifia ololo; e̩wñ la ra ñw e̩ gbogbo tak e̩ nʼugugu onu.
Uwohi alifia-we̩ le̩ dufu nyʼef abo uche̩ichi; todu emufu i mufti, lef e̩gahi-mi kʼu ko bʼe̩ o̩la ma, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Uwe̩ muda ke̩do̩nʼalifia-we̩, oñ e̩ kwo̩jʼo̩ko̩ tod uwohi-we̩, e̩ la che e̩wñ abutabu-we̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi alale o̩be̩le̩-ke̩te̩; e̩ne̩ du ki lale nʼe̩.
Tak e̩ mʼe̩wñ o̩la-we̩ iche̩ka ko, oñ e̩ mʼe̩wñ ina ojoji ojoji le̩ ko chʼo̩ñwe̩ nyʼotete otete kʼe̩ che ñw o̩la-we̩ le̩, oñ e̩ tʼajo̩ko̩ oji-wñ. E̩go̩-wñ de̩ mama ta n, i ñʼade̩ ejo̩gba ge̩ n.
E̩ ño̩ mʼe̩wñ ijaga alifia ki chʼo̩jamalia e-mi kpʼajifa e-mi kʼomi ko ñw e̩ le̩ ko chʼojibo aboke̩le̩ ñw o̩la-we̩, oñ e̩ kwojo̩ko̩ bʼuma.
E̩ la mʼe̩wñ o̩la-we̩ ku ma chiya nyʼu le̩ ko bʼuma o̩la ma, oñ e̩ kʼe̩kpo-mi kpʼotulale-mi jʼo̩gba-ma lale.
Uje̩wñ-mi kʼomi ko ñw e̩ ge̩, omu te̩ke̩ te̩ke̩ kpai ekpo kpʼiño̩, e-kʼu du chʼuje̩wñ ñw e̩ je̩, e̩ lako gugu o̩gba ma kʼi kpo rʼuma; ab i de̩ de̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Anubi e-le̩ ge̩, uwe̩ ño̩ mʼamo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ e-kʼuwe̩ bi ñwu mi, oñ e̩ fʼabo le̩ kpa ñwu ma ku ma mʼuma ko je̩. E̩wñ abutabu-we̩ chʼe̩wñ ke̩ke̩?
kʼe̩ ño̩ fʼamo̩ma-mi kpa kʼe̩ la mʼuma ko rinyo̩ ugbo kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu ma lale gu ef una du nyʼugbo ma?
Oñ ef e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ du kpʼef e̩wñ abutabu-we̩, e̩ ño̩ rewa o̩jo̩ imo̩to̩-we̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ tʼago o̩fo, kʼago ofo-we̩ chʼo̩pee, kʼe̩ chʼete̩mane̩ te̩ ef e̩bie̩-we̩ le̩ n.
Oñ anoji e̩wñ bibi-we̩ du (atogwo, atogwo, ñw e̩! Ondu Jihofa ka-i),
e̩ fʼujiwe o̩ko̩ eje̩-we̩ ko̩ ñw o̩la-we̩, e̩ laño̩ fʼotete otete che ñw o̩la-we̩ ej o̩na ej o̩na du.
Uwe̩ fʼotete-we̩ che dago ugwe̩ta o̩na o̩na du, oñ e̩ mʼalifia-we̩ du chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩. E̩ la mʼagada-we̩ chi te̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ki alale, oñ e je̩ ñw e̩wñ abutabʼuwe̩ ki nana nyo̩gba.
Uwe̩ laño̩ fʼe̩wñ abutabu che kpʼabo Ijipti ku ma dodo kpenyʼuwe̩, ku ma chʼegbʼoro le̩; e̩ laño̩ je̩ ñw abutabu-we̩ ki nana nye̩gba ki nyʼumi uwe̩do̩.

Todule̩, go, u fʼo̩wo̩-mi nadala abʼuwe̩ oji ma, oñ u fʼukpe̩-we̩ bu wʼane̩; u la mʼe̩ du ñw abo ku ma chʼulaka-we̩, owñ chʼamo̩ma onobule̩ abo Filistia ku ma chanyo̩ e̩wñ tuñ-we̩, ku ma chʼe̩ alu ki dʼuma e̩do̩.
Uwe̩ ño̩ jo̩ko̩ bʼabo Asiria ge̩, todabu ki ma nʼebʼe̩ jo̩ n; ochochi, uwe̩ te̩ta-jo̩ko̩ bʼuma, i la bʼe̩ jo̩ n.
E̩ laño̩ je̩ ñw abutabu-we̩ ki nana nyʼo̩gba gbogbo nyi Kaldia, ane̩ amachinyama le̩; e-le̩ la bʼe̩ jo̩ n.
Ab e̩do̩-we̩ gwegbo kade ta? Ondu Jihofa ka-i, abu kʼuwe̩ nʼe̩wñ-i du ache, uko̩lo̩ e̩nabutabu kʼeju-wñ chegbo i che;

owñ chʼe-kʼuwe̩ fʼujiwe o̩ko̩ eje̩-we̩ ko̩ dago ñwʼo̩la-we̩ ugwe̩ta o̩na du, kʼe̩ la fʼotete-we̩ che ki gbo̩gba te̩ o̩na o̩na du? Uwe̩ la te̩ta-dab ajo̩ko̩ n, owñ chʼe̩de̩te̩ o̩me̩ era ñw e̩ kʼe̩ che.
O̩ya kʼi tʼajo̩ko̩! kʼi agba ab o̩wo̩ ejaduña koji o̩ko̩-wñ!
Ma kʼe̩wñ chʼamajo̩ko̩ du ele; uwe̩ muda akʼe̩wñ chʼabo ku ma tene we̩ ele, e̩ la dʼobi ñwu ma je̩ todu kʼama ki kwo o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ wʼugbo we̩ tod e̩wñ abutabu-we̩.
Uwe̩ la chʼojoji ñw abobule̩ kibo̩ ef o̩ko̩ eje̩-we̩; owñ chʼugbo kʼe̩ne̩ du ma tene we̩ n; kpai ugbo kʼuwe̩ achʼo̩gu ñw one̩, ma la adʼuro̩me̩ du ñw e̩ n, todule̩ oñ e-we̩ chʼojoji.
Todule̩, O ajo̩ko-i, e̩ ki gbʼo̩la ki Jihofa ka ke:

Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼebije-we̩ ko dafo, kʼago-we̩ kwote̩ ofo lugbo e̩wñ abutabu-we̩ kʼe̩ che kpʼabo kʼe̩ tene ma le̩; kpai todu ode ode e-e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ chaka, kpai tod e̩bie̩ amo̩ma-we̩ kʼe̩ ko ñwu ma;

todule̩, go, omi akʼabo kʼe̩ tene ma le̩ wa jo̩ chaka, kʼuwe̩ kpʼama chiya le̩, manyʼabo du kʼe̩ te̩ta-tene ma, manyʼabo du kʼe̩ te̩tachʼulaka-ma u la ako ma kwʼugbo du wa jeju nyʼuwe̩ o̩la, tak u nadʼago ofo-we̩ te̩ ñwu ma kʼama ki li ago ofo-we̩ jalii.
Tak u nakajo̩ me̩ alu ku ma akajo̩ amo̩ya ku ma ajo̩ko, kpʼabobule̩ ku ma dʼe̩bie̩ dafo. U la adʼe̩bie̩ e-e̩do̩fulu kpʼogu eja wa abʼume̩ oji ma.

Tak u nʼadʼe̩ tʼef o̩wo̩ abo kʼe̩ tene ma le̩, ama la agu ujiwe o̩ko̩ eje̩-we̩ kʼe̩ ko le̩ lo̩, oñ ma akpʼotete otete-we̩ ki gba le̩ fo; ma la agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-we̩ bʼuwe̩ o̩la te̩, ma akʼe̩wñ ijaga-we̩ e-alifia, oñ ma atʼuwe̩ no̩ ago ofo, ago ofo-we̩ la akwo te̩ pee.
Ma akʼamone̩ wa jeju nyʼuwe̩ o̩la, oñ ma akʼokuta ro̩ dʼe̩, ma la adʼo̩kwo̩chageli-ma kʼuwe̩ da o̩kpo̩ o̩kpo̩.
Oñ ma anʼuna gu unyi-we̩ jo, ma la aje̩ ñw we̩ chʼudu eju abobule̩ wewe; oñ nache kʼe̩ we o̩ko̩ eje̩, e̩ laño̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ chʼo̩gu ge̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ tak e̩do̩fulu-mi anʼuñmi, oñ ogu eja-mi akwo bʼe̩ te̩. Tak u nañmi, oñ u ñʼawe̩do̩ ge̩ n.

Todabu kʼe̩ ma dibekadʼo̩jo̩ igbe̩le̩-we̩ n, kʼe̩ muda alo̩-fu rʼumi ef e̩wñ-i du, todule̩, go, omi ñʼakʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ che wa abʼuwe̩ oji ma, Ondu Jihofa ka-i; tak e̩ ñʼache e̩wñ-tuñ-i manyu e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ du ge̩ n.
Go, e̩ne̩ du ki akpʼita, akpʼita o̩la-i nʼe̩ oji kakini, Alu kʼiye de̩ abe̩le̩ o̩ma-wñ onobule̩ de̩.

Uwe̩ chʼo̩ma onobule̩ e-iye-we̩ kʼo̩ko̩-wñ kpʼamo̩ma-wñ achʼe eju; uwe̩ ño̩ chʼo̩maye onobule̩ e-amo̩maye-we̩ onobule̩ kʼamo̩ko̩-ma kpʼamo̩ma e-ma chʼuma eju le̩: iye-we̩ chʼabo He̩t, ata-we̩ la chʼabo Amo̩r.
Acho̩gba-we̩ onobule̩ la che Samaria, kʼi dodo o̩wo̩ awohi-we̩ le̩, owñ kpʼamo̩ma-wñ onobule̩. Oke-kele-we̩ onobule̩ kʼi la dodo o̩wo̩ awo̩-to̩-we̩ le̩ che So̩do̩m, kpʼamo̩ma-wñ onobule̩.
E̩ la lule̩ tʼo̩na e-ma n, e̩ la wʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma che n; ama i dabe̩ne̩ kʼe-le̩ nya tabale̩, o̩na du kʼe̩ le, e̩ kpabie̩ tʼuma le.
Oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i, So̩do̩m, o̩maye-we̩ onobule̩, owñ kpʼamo̩ma-wñ onobule̩, la che alu kʼuwe̩ che n, owñ chʼuwe̩ kpʼamo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩.
Go, e̩wñ ki chʼudu kʼo̩maye-we̩ onobule̩ So̩do̩m fe̩ de̩, kakini, Uba kpʼuje̩wñ ekʼefu kpʼekwojo̩ añmi ofo; e-le̩ dʼef uwñ kpʼamo̩ma-wñ; i la dʼukpahiu ñw o̩wo̩ e̩no̩bata kpʼe̩nale n.
Taku ma ke, oñ ma kwoche e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ eju-mi; todule̩ u mʼuma ko, alu kʼu li le̩.
Samaria la dure tʼukpe̩reji adure e-we̩ n. Uwe̩ muda aje̩ ñw e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ ki wewe nyo̩gba tʼuma le, oñ e̩ dale ñw amo̩maye-we̩ onobule ugbo e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ du kʼe̩ che le̩.

Uwe̩onugo ge̩, gbʼe̩wñ anyo-we̩ nʼoji ke, abu kʼe̩ fʼale da ñw amo̩maye-we̩ onobule̩ le̩, lugbo e̩wñ adure kʼe̩ che kʼi chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ tʼe-ma le, ama chʼo̩kpakpa tʼuwe̩ le: ochochi, ibe-we̩ ki ño̩ mudajugu, kʼe̩ la ne̩ anyo̩-we̩, abu kʼe̩ fʼale da ñw amo̩maye-we̩ onobule̩.
Omi lañʼarʼamu-ma da, owñ chʼamu So̩do̩m kpʼamo̩ma-wñ onobule̩, kpʼamu Samaria kpʼamo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ ge̩, kpʼamu abo-we̩ ku ma mu lelo ku ma jʼalumeji-ma;
todu kʼuwe̩ ki nʼadu anyo̩-we̩ onugo, kʼukata-we̩ ki chi tod e̩wñ du kʼe̩ che, abu kʼuwe̩ nyʼuma e̩do̩.

Oñ amo̩maye-we̩ onobule̩, So̩do̩m kpʼamo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ le̩, adabi tʼe̩gu-ma igbele; Samaria kpʼamo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ la adabi tʼe̩gu e-ma igbele; tak uwe̩ kpʼamo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ adabi tʼe̩gu-me̩ igbele.
Todu iko uba-we̩ le̩ e̩ hiʼalu-we̩ mʼo̩maye-we̩ onobule̩, So̩do̩m le̩ n,

owñ chʼo̩gba taku ma mʼe̩wñ bibi-we̩ du tejugede, dabe̩ne̩ kʼiko ina ebu amo̩ma onobule̩ Siria kpʼabo du ku ma jo̩ lʼo daka, owñ chʼamo̩ma onobule̩ abo Filistia ku ma chʼe̩de̩te̩-we̩ ku ma jo̩ lʼuwe̩ daka-i.
Uwe̩ fʼe̩wñtuñ-we̩ kpʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-we̩ ne̩ me̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Omi ñʼachʼuwe̩ alu kʼe̩ te̩tache, kʼe̩ te̩tachʼe̩de̩te̩ ego̩ le̩, ef alo kʼe̩ bie̩ le̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ omi adibekado alo kʼu kpe̩ kpʼuwe̩ o̩jo̩ igbe̩le̩-we̩, oñ nadʼalo̩ e-ogbegbele̩ lonyane̩ kpʼuwe̩.

Tak uwe̩ arewa o̩na kʼe̩ te̩tale le̩, oñ anyo̩ amʼe̩, e̩gba kʼuwe̩ agba amo̩maye-we̩ onobule̩, acho̩gba-we̩ kpʼo̩kekele̩-we̩ le̩. Omi la akʼuma ñw e̩ ku ma chʼamo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩, i muda chʼugbo alo kʼe̩ kpe̩ n.
Tak omi afʼalo-mi lonyane̩ kpʼuwe̩; tak uwe̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩;
kʼuwe̩ ki rewa, kʼibe-we̩ ki mudajugu, kʼuwe̩ ki ño̩ chi alu-we̩ ge̩ n, tod anyo̩-we̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼu fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che ñw e̩ tod e̩wñ du kʼe̩ che le̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, ko̩la e̩wo̩fi ñwu ma, kʼe̩ la fʼita kpa ñw abo unyi Israe̩l;
kʼe̩ kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, O̩re̩ lile kʼi nʼika lile, kʼiwe̩ ika-wñ jiji, kʼedudu-wñ che nana, kʼina o̩la-wñ chʼojoji, ojoji, lewa Le̩bano̩n, oñ i mʼoji sida du;
i fʼe̩pa-wñ ki dʼoji-wñ ate̩ ko̩da nyʼalu oñ i mʼu du le tʼoj ane̩ amanyaja, oñ i mʼu du nyi ef ewo amanyaja.
I ño̩ mʼulu ane̩ le̩ ko oñ i mʼu ko gbe̩ ef ane̩ uro̩je̩; i fʼu nyi oti omi lile, i da nyʼane̩ alu ku ma dʼoli wilo nyʼane̩.
Tak i ya, oñ i mud ikeli kʼi ma agba n, kʼe̩to̩-wñ ki rida tʼugbo e-wñ, kʼili-wñ kʼi jʼofe-wñ. Oñ i mud ikeli te̩. I la fʼiga fu, oñ i chane̩ enʼeñmi.

O̩re̩ elile omune̩ kʼi nʼika lile kpʼedudu nana ño̩ do̩mo̩ ge̩. E̩ la go, ikeli le̩ rʼili-wñ da le̩ rʼo̩wo̩ ugbo e-le̩, i ño̩ tʼe̩to̩-wñ le̩ rʼo̩wo̩ ugbo-wñ akwʼugbo ikpoga ugbo ku ma danyʼane̩ le̩, todu kʼi chʼomiofo rʼu.
Ma ne ef ane̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩, ugbo kʼomi nana, todu kʼi tʼe̩to̩, kʼi la arʼe̩ro, todu ki mud ikeli o̩me̩me̩le̩.

E̩ ki ka kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, I ara? I ñʼawu tʼili tʼili n? kʼi kʼe̩ro-wñ rinyo̩ n? todu kʼi kwacha; kʼeñmi-wñ ki adufu etito̩ le̩ chaka ki kwacha n? I la atene o̩wo̩ ki gbiti kpʼamone̩ wewe ku ma gudu rinyo̩ tʼili tʼili n.
Go, dagba ma chine ugbo omune̩, o̩la-wñ aya? E̩gba kʼafu olodudu kadʼo i akwacha rinyo̩ hioko n? I akwacha ef ikpoga ugbo kʼo̩la-wñ ya le̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,

E̩ naka ñw abo unyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n-i fai, kakini, Ame̩ ma oji e̩wñ-i n? E̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Go, onu Babilo̩n lewa Je̩rusale̩m, i la fʼonu-wñ kpʼamagboji-wñ mu, oñ i mʼuma ko wa Babilo̩n ugbo-wñ.
Tak i mʼugbe̩ onu oka du, oñ i fʼalo kpe̩ kpʼowñ. I laño̩ fʼe̩bo̩ ñmo̩ kpʼowñ. I mʼamagbiti ane̩ le̩ ko le,
todu kʼo̩da ojane̩ le̩ ki hiʼo̩la-wñ wane̩, kʼi we ehiʼo̩la-wñ ne, todu kʼi fʼalo-wñ de kʼi dago.
I muda fʼe̩re̩ ubi rʼo̩, owñ chʼugbo amonuche̩-wñ kʼi kpe̩ nyʼIjipti kʼama ki kʼo̩manya kpʼabogu wewe ñw u. I ara? E̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ abe̩i afu? I bie̩ alo le̩ kʼi ñʼafu ge̩?
Oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa aka-i, uña ugbo kʼonu kʼi dʼu jʼonu gugu pidi, owñ kʼi chʼe̩de̩te̩ ego̩ kʼi go̩ le̩ kʼi la kpʼalo kpʼowñ tak i fʼu bie̩, i chaka dʼugbo-wñ alumeji Babilo̩n le̩ i aku.
Fero manyʼabogu-wñ ki gbiti, kpʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ la agbutu ñw u ef ogu e̩gba ku ma fʼugbudu du jo̩, ku ma la anʼaku ogu nyʼu ku ma kʼoji one̩ wewe da n.
Todabu kʼi che̩de̩te̩ ego̩ kʼi go̩ le̩ kʼi la fʼalo le̩ bie̩. Go, i mʼo̩wo̩-wñ du tʼo̩ le̩, i muda fʼe̩wñ-i du che kpo̩, i afu tane̩ n.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Oji-mi, ego̩ e-mi kʼi che̩de̩te̩ ñw u le̩, kpʼalo-mi kʼi bie̩, omi adʼuro̩me̩-wñ wa anʼo oji chuu.
Nanʼiga-mi dala bʼo ma, oku-mi la amʼu, tak u nadʼu wa Babilo̩n kʼu bʼo̩ kajo̩ o̩mo̩, tod ada-mi kʼi je̩.
Ame̩nara-wñ ef udala udala-wñ du awane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli; oñ ma afʼabo ki bo̩ fiatu-ka rʼafu tʼafu du; tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi, Jihofa ka-i.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Omi onugo amʼe̩paʼka du kwʼoj oli sida kʼi dʼatate̩ le̩, oñ nadʼu nyi. Nakʼe-emele-wñ kwef e̩pa-wñ ki jʼate̩ ate̩ tule da, oñ omi adʼu nyi oj uwo kʼi gba tʼatate̩.
Oj uwo ugbo kʼIsrae̩l gbo̩gba le̩, e̩me̩ nadʼu nyi, i la atʼe̩to̩, i la arʼe̩ro, i achʼoli sida ki achʼuto̩. Oñ ame̩we̩ ku ma nʼika ojoji ojoji du aru jʼofe-wñ, ma la aru jʼolubo̩ e̩to̩-wñ.
Tak oli oko du ama ka kʼomi, Jihofa, dʼoli ki gbo̩gba le̩ wane̩, u hi oli ki ma gba n, dago, u la je̩ ñw oli emimi gbe̩, u laño̩ je̩ ñw oli e̩gbe̩ hiidu. Omi, Jihofa ka, u laño̩ che me̩.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi ge̩ kakini,
E̩wñ chʼofe-wñ ku me̩ kpa ita-i ugbo ane̩ Israe̩l kakini, Ama-ta fʼe̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩ka je̩, oñ enyi abimo̩to̩ akpijele ta?
Oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i, me̩ ñʼanʼugbo ku me̩ akpʼita-i oj ane̩ Israe̩l ge̩ n.
Me̩ go, amonugo one̩ du chʼe-mi; alu kʼonugo ata chʼe-mi abe̩le̩ onugo o̩ma ño̩ de̩: onugo one̩ ki dure, owñ le̩ aku.
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa, kʼi la ache e̩wñ kʼo̩da je̩ kpʼe̩wñ ki chʼeju-wñ,
kʼi ma la fʼe̩wñ je̩ oj uwo uwo-i n, kʼi ma la dʼeju go ode ode abunyi Israe̩l in, kʼi ma la kpʼoya ekeji-wñ bie̩ n, kʼi ma la te̩me̩rʼonobule̩ kʼo̩la-wñ daji n,

kʼi ma la chʼe̩ne̩ du ihianyi n, kʼi muda dabi dʼe̩wñ uhiowe̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki nʼowñ o̩me̩, kʼi ma la dʼe̩wñ du inya n, kʼi mʼuje̩wñ-wñ ko ñw abo kʼebi akpa ma, kʼi laño̩ kʼe̩wñ o̩la bʼabo ku ma tago ofo o̩la ma;
e̩ne̩ kʼi ma dʼo̩ko̩ ta n, kʼi ma la gbʼile n, kʼi mʼo̩wo̩-wñ gwo̩ bʼuji eche te̩, kʼi la fʼale ochochi da agbagba one̩ meji,
kʼi te̩talule̩ ef e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, kʼi la fʼalu kʼoji ajo̩-mi ka de, kʼi ache ochochi; e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼo̩kpakpa, i adeju chuu, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
I muda che̩wñ kʼi fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi kʼi mud adinya, abe̩k akpone̩, kʼi la achʼo̩maye-wñ e̩wñ-i okate,
kʼi ma la ade e̩wñ-i chaka n, kʼi muda aje̩ e̩wñ oj uwo oj uwo, kʼi la fʼo̩ya ekeji-wñ kpabie̩,
kʼi la chʼame̩no̩bata kpʼame̩nale ihianyi, kʼi adʼinya, kʼi ma la adʼe̩wñ ku ma du hiʼo̩ o̩wo̩ dabi wa ñwu ma n, kʼi la dʼeju-wñ gʼode ode, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ ihje̩ne̩ che,
kʼi la dʼo̩ko̩ ta kʼi jʼile—e̩ne̩ abe̩-i ñʼadeju? i adeju n; i fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-i du che me̩; eku i aku chuu, e̩bie̩-wñ anʼoji o̩la e-wñ.
E la go, iche̩wñ kʼi fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi kʼi fʼe̩wñ adure du kʼata-wñ che li, kʼi arailo, kʼi ma la che abe̩le̩ n;
kʼi ma je̩ e̩wñ oj uwo oj uwo n, kʼi ma la dʼeju go ode ode abunyi Israe̩li n, kʼi ma fʼoya ekeji-wñ kpabie̩ n,
i la che e̩ne̩ du ihianyi n, i la gba e̩wñ uhi-o̩wo̩ du n, i la dʼe̩wñ du inya n, i muda kʼuje̩wñ-wñ ñw abo kʼebi akpa ma, i la kʼe̩wñ o̩la bʼabo ku ma tago ofo o̩la ma;

kʼi ma hi o̩wo̩ mʼame̩no̩bata n, kʼi ma gbʼo̩ko̩ ugwo̩la n, kʼi la gbʼo̩ko̩ oji n, kʼi fʼe̩wñ che teju alu kʼoji ajo̩-mi ka, kʼi te̩talule̩ ef e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi; i aku tod udu kʼata-wñ fe̩ n, edeju i adeju chuu.
I chʼe-ata-wñ, todabu kʼi chʼone̩ o̩lachi, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ o̩maye-wñ dinya, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ ki ma nyo̩ n che ef abo-wñ, go eku i aku ef abi-wñ kʼi je̩ le̩.
Me̩ muda kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼo̩ma ma anʼadu udu kʼata-wñ fe̩ n? E̩gba kʼo̩ma le̩ fʼe̩wñ che tʼeju o̩da kʼi chʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi du de, kʼi laño̩ fʼu che, edeju i adeju chuu.
Onugo e̩ne̩ ki dure, onugo le̩ aku: o̩ma anʼudu ata-wñ n, ata la anʼudu o̩ma-wñ n. O̩kpakpa e̩no̩kpakpa bʼe̩no̩kpakpa le̩ ma, oñ e̩wñ bibi e̩ne̩bibi abʼe̩ne̩bibl le̩ ma.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩bibi murida bʼe̩wñ adure du kʼi che te̩, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi du de, kʼi la ache e̩wñ ki chʼeju o̩da kpʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa, edeju i adeju chuu, i aku n.
Ma ñʼarewa ada du kʼi je̩ ku ma dʼu gwunyʼu ge̩ n: i adeju ef e̩wñ o̩kpakpa kʼi che.
Uku ame̩ne̩bibi nyo̩ mi eju re? Ondu Jihofa ka-i; kʼi ma chʼedabi bʼo̩na-wñ te̩ kʼi deju n?

Oñ e̩gba kʼe̩no̩kpakpa muna bʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa-wñ te̩ kʼi la akwochʼe̩wñ uji, kʼi nache teju e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ du kʼe̩ne̩bibi ache, i adeju? Ma ñʼarewa e̩wñ o̩kpakpa du kʼi che n: ef e̩re̩ ubi kʼi ro̩ ñwu mi kpʼef adure kʼi ta oñ i aku ef uwñ.
Me̩ muda kakini, O̩na Ondu chʼokujo̩ n kpo̩. Me̩ gbo̩ ta, O abunyi Israe̩l: o̩na-mi chʼokujo̩ n? I chʼo̩na e-me̩ ma chʼokujo̩ n in?
E̩gba kʼe̩no̩kpakpa muna bʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa-wñ te̩ kʼi la akwoche e̩wñ uji, kʼi la ku ef uwñ, i aku ef e̩wñ uji kʼi che le̩.
Omune̩ de̩ ge̩: e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩bibi murida bʼe̩wñ bibi kʼi che te̩, kʼi la ache e̩wñ teju o̩da kpʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa, i agbʼonugo o̩la-wñ ki deju.
Todabu kʼi fʼibe-wñ kpe̩, oñ i murida bʼada du kʼi je̩ te̩ edeju i adeju chuu, i aku n.
Abunyi Israe̩l muda kakini, O̩na Ondu chʼokujo̩ n kpo̩. O abunyi Israe̩l, o̩na o̩na-mi chʼokujo̩ n? i chʼo̩na o̩na e-me̩ ma chʼokujo̩ n in?

Todule̩ ami akajo̩ me̩, O̩ abunyi Israe̩l, nakajo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ teju alu kʼo̩na o̩na-wñ de̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i. Me̩ mudabi wa ku me̩ rida bʼada du ku me̩ je̩ te̩, todu kʼudu efe̩ ki wo echʼe̩wñ uke̩re̩-me̩.
Me̩ mʼada du ku me̩ te̩taje̩ le̩ ko rinyo̩ bʼo̩la-me̩ te̩, ku me̩ fʼe̩do̩ etito̩ kpʼafu etito̩ che ñw o̩la-me̩! E̩wñ chi ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ kʼame̩ aku. O abunyi Israe̩l?
Todu uku e̩ne̩ ki aku nyo̩ mi eju re n, Ondu Jihofa ka-i; todule̩ me̩ ki rʼo̩la-me̩ da ku me̩ deju.
Anubi le̩ ge̩, uwe̩ ki dinaku tod amidachi Israe̩l,
kʼe̩ kakini;
I la nʼo̩ma-wñ oka gba,
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ño̩ gbʼinabali-wñ;
Oñ e̩gba kʼiye-wñ li ka kʼenede-wñ chʼofofo,
Owñ le̩ le̩lo lewa ef amidu;
I la fʼachigodo achigodo-ma ma,
Tak abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi kwʼojane̩ ojane̩ wa ado
Taku ma dʼo̩bo̩go̩li ta tʼelika iñmo̩-wñ adʼu tef akpati ebije,
Iye-we̩ la dab ikeli ef e̩bie̩-we̩ ku ma ne eti omi omi,
I la nʼo̩kpa ki gbiti
Ma muda kʼe̩do̩fulu mʼu wu tʼili tʼili,
Fai ma chi ne ef aje̩tachi,
Una la kwʼo̩kpa e̩to̩-wñ oka dufu,
Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ e̩kebie, ochu e̩ke̩lu, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa ochu le̩, abogijo Israe̩l iche̩ka lewa ku ma tene o̩laʼka ugbo Jihofa, oñ ma kwogugu o̩gba-mi.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩ nako̩la ñw abogijo Israe̩l, kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, Me̩ wa ku me̩ tʼumi ene? Oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i, Ame̩ ñʼatʼumi ene n.
E̩ kajo̩ ma n? E̩ kajo̩ ma n, o̩ma one̩? Je̩ ñwu ma fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ e-amata-ma ma,

kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, O̩jo̩ kʼu chi abo Israe̩l le̩; kʼu la dʼo̩wo̩-mi dago ñw abunyi Jeko̩b, kʼu la je̩ ñwu ma fʼumi ma oj ane̩ Ijipti le̩, e̩gba kʼu la dʼo̩wo̩-mi dago ñwu ma kakini, Omi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩;
o̩jo̩ u dʼo̩wo̩-mi dago ñwu ma kʼu nako ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu wʼoj ane̩ kʼu tejane̩ ñwu ma, omi e̩nya kpʼomi iño̩ acha o̩mo̩, kʼi añʼojane̩ ojane̩ du eju.
Oñ u ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki namʼe̩wñ ki akʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu ire̩ ko rikpolo rinyo̩; me̩ ki la nʼode ode Ijipti dʼo̩la me̩ ji n: omi Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩.
Ma muda lañu rʼumi oñ ma ko̩ ene-tirʼumi; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma la kʼe̩wñ ki akʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu ire̩ eju-wñ ro̩ tinyo̩ n, ma la hi ode ode Ijipti tinyo̩ n.
U muda che tod odu-mi, ki we ebie̩ eju abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma jʼef uma le̩, kʼomi laño̩ je̩ ñwu ma fʼumi ma eju abo le̩, owñ chʼeko ma kʼu ko ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu wa.
