Abe̩le̩ u la je̩ ñwu ma kwobʼoj ane̩ Ijipti te̩, oñ u ko ma wʼaje̩tachi.
Tak u kʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi ñwu ma, oñ u je̩ ñwu ma ma oji ajo̩-mi, owñ chʼe-kʼone̩ ache kʼi adeju ef uwñ.
Anubile̩ ge̩ u ño̩ kʼo̩jo̩ uñmi-mi ñwu ma kʼi mud ujiwe agbagba omi kpʼama, kʼama ki ma ka kʼomi che Jihofa ki ache kʼama ki fo̩.
Abunyi Israe̩l muda kwo lañu rʼumi aje̩tachi le̩: ma lule̩ teju uhio̩me̩-mi n; ma la ko̩ oji ajo̩-mi, e-kʼone̩ ache kʼi deju ef uwñ; ma la fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi kpabie̩ ololo ololo.
U muda chʼuko̩lo̩ tod odu-mi, kʼi we ekpabie̩ eju abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi e-ku ko ma dufu wa eju-ma.
Anubi e-le̩ ge̩, u ño̩ dʼo̩wo̩ dago ñwu ma aje̩tachi, ka kʼu nako ma wʼoj ane̩ kʼomi e̩nya kpʼomi iño̩ acha ef uwñ kʼojane̩ ojane̩ du añeju-wñ kʼomi du ñwu ma le̩ ge̩ n,
todabu ku ma ko̩ oji ajo̩-mi ku ma ma lule̩ teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi n, ma laño̩ fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi kpabie̩: todu e̩do̩-ma tʼode o̩de-ma ubi.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, u chʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ ñwu ma, oñ u we ekpa ma bie̩ rinyo̩, u la kpa ma rinyo̩ kpa ef aje̩tachi le̩ n.
Oñ u ka ñw amo̩ma-ma ef aje̩tachi kakini, Me̩ ki lule̩ teju uhio̩me̩ amata-me̩ n, me̩ ki la de oji ajo̩ e-ma n, me̩ ki la nʼo̩de-ma dʼo̩la-me̩ ji n.
Omi Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩; me̩ ki lule̩ teju uhio̩me̩-mi, ku me̩ la fʼoji ajo̩ e-mi de ku me̩ che teju-wñ;
me̩ ki che kʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi ki fo̩; tak e-le̩ achʼujiwe agbagba mi kpʼame̩, kʼame̩ ki ma ka kʼomi Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩.
Amo̩ma le̩ laño̩ lañu rʼumi ge̩; ma lule̩ teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi n, ma la de oji ajo̩-mi ku ma che n, e-kʼone̩ ache kʼi adeju ef uwñ. Ma fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi kpabie̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, u fʼo̩wo̩-mi fa wʼubi, oñ u kwoche tod odu e-mi, kʼi we ekpabie̩ eju abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, kʼomi ko ma dufu wa eju-ma.
Anubile̩ u ño̩ dʼo̩wo̩-mi dago ñwu ma ef aje̩tachi ka kʼu nafʼuma kwu rʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, kʼu la ako ma fia rʼoj ane̩ oj ane̩;
todabu ku ma ma che teju oji ajo̩-mi n, ma muda ako̩ e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, ma laño̩ fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi kpabie̩, oñ eju-ma kwotʼode ode amata-ma ubi.
Anubi le̩ u ño̩ kʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩ ki ma nyo̩ n ñwu ma, kpʼoji ajo̩ ku ma ma adeju ef uwñ n;
u la fʼuma daji ef e̩wñ ele e-ma onugo, owñ chʼe-ku ma je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du kʼi kpʼo̩gba iye-wñ na kʼi le gu ef una du, kʼu fʼuma gwu alache̩, todu kʼama ki ma ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Todule̩, o̩ma one̩, e̩ ki ko̩la ñw abunyi Israe̩l kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ef e-i ge̩, oñ amata-me̩ fʼakpabie̩ mi che, owñ chʼada-mi ku ma je̩ le̩

Todu e̩gba kʼu mʼuma ko wʼoj ane̩ kʼu dʼo̩wo̩-mi dago ka kʼu nadu ñwu ma, ma kwotejane̩ uwo du ki gbo̩gba, kpʼoli ki hidu chaka, oñ ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩-ma wa che o̩mo̩; o̩mo̩ le̩ ma kʼe̩wñ akpʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩bie̩-ma wa jo̩; o̩mo̩ ge̩ ma ño̩ che e̩wñ-ma ki akpo, ma laño̩ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ omi-ma dafo o̩mo̩ ge̩.
Tak u ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chʼoji otete ugbo ku me̩ anyi le̩? Abe̩le̩ odu-wñ ko̩ Bama gbogbo tʼeñini.
Todule̩ e̩ ki ka ñw abunyi Israe̩l kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ame̩ jʼakpʼo̩la-me̩ bie̩ alu kʼamata-me̩ te̩tache? me̩ laño̩ tʼajo̩ko̩ tʼe̩wñ-ma ki akʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu ire̩ ubi?

Oñ e̩gba ku me̩ kʼe̩wñ ele-me̩ wa che, e̩gba ku me̩ je̩ ñw amo̩ma-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ gu ef una le̩ du, me̩ tetanʼode̩ ode-me̩ du kpʼo̩la-me̩ bie̩ gbogbo tʼeñini, tak i ño̩ nʼugbo ku me̩ atʼumi ene ge̩? O abunyi Israe̩l. Oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i, u ñʼaje̩ ñwu me̩ tʼumi ene n.
E̩wñ ki awʼef ibe̩-me̩ le̩ ñʼade̩ kili kili n, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ kakini, Awa adʼab abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, dab o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu ojane̩ ojane̩, kʼa re̩ oli kpʼokuta.
Oji-mi, Jihofa ka-i; omi anʼo̩wo̩ e̩gbiti kpʼo̩wo̩ e̩nadala te̩ kpʼe̩dafo e̩do̩fulu chaka jʼonu-me̩ tila.
Omi la ako me̩ kwʼef amone̩ amone̩ dufu, oñ nanʼo̩wo̩ e̩gbiti kpʼo̩wo̩ e̩nadala te̩ kpʼe̩dafo e̩do̩fulu aya me̩ kwʼojane̩ ojane̩ ugbo ku me̩ mukpatuka ru le̩ jo̩.
Tak u nako me̩ wʼef aje̩tachi ki chʼone̩ one̩ le̩; o̩mo̩ a akpejurʼomune̩ oñ u nabʼume̩ kajo̩.
Alu kʼu bʼamata-me̩ kajo̩ ef aje̩tachi ane̩ Ijipti, abe̩le̩ oñ omi abʼume̩ kajo̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Naje̩ ñwu me̩ lale o̩gane̩ o̩kpa, oñ nako me̩ wʼef e̩wñ ogu e-alo ekpe̩ le̩;
u la agu abo ku ma ko̩ du rinyo̩ bʼef ume̩ te̩, kpʼabo ku ma na bʼumi te̩; nako ma kwʼoj ane̩ ugbo ku ma ge̩ne̩ wa, ma muda agudu tʼojane̩ Israe̩l in. Tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.

I chʼe-ame̩, O abunyi Israe̩l, abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Me̩ lo me̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki che ode-wñ ate̩to̩gba-i, iche̩wñ kʼame̩ ma netirʼumi n. Me̩ muda anʼe̩wñ ele-me̩ kpʼode-me̩ kpʼodu-mi kiafo̩ bie̩ ge̩ n.

Todu oj uwo-mi kiafo̩, owñ chʼuwo ki gbo̩gba ane̩ Israe̩l, o̩mo̩ abunyi Israe̩l chaka, o̩gbo̩ ma du, are̩ mi oj ane̩ le̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i; o̩mo̩ omi agba ma; o̩mo̩ u la atene e̩wñ ku me̩ ko nyʼate̩ le̩, kpʼejo̩ga e̩wñ ku me̩ tʼe̩re̩ kpʼe̩wñ-me̩ kiafo̩ chaka.

Nagba me̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ ki akpo tinyo̩ e̩gba kʼu ko me̩ kwef amone̩ amone̩ dufu, kʼu fʼume̩ ya kwʼojane̩ ojane̩ ugbo ku me̩ mukpatuka ru le̩ jo̩. Tak omi amud e̩ne̩ kiafo̩ ef ume̩ eju abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi.
E̩gba kʼomi mʼume̩ ko wʼoj ane̩ Israe̩l, ane̩ kʼomi dʼo̩wo̩-mi dago ka kʼu nadu ñw amata-me̩, tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
O̩mo̩ ame̩ la arewa o̩na o̩na-me̩, kpʼe̩wñ du ku me̩ che ku me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ kpabie̩; tak ame̩ ahihie̩ne̩ o̩la-me̩ eju o̩la-me̩ onugo tod e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du ku me̩ che.

Oñ ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, e̩gba kʼu fʼe̩wñ che kpʼame̩ kpa tod odu e-mi; nache teju o̩na o̩na-me̩ ki bie̩ne̩ n, kpai teju e̩wñ e̩kpabie̩ ku me̩ che kpa n, O, ame̩, abunyi Israe̩l, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
O̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, fʼeju-we̩ kparʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, kʼe̩ gwʼo̩la jʼane̩ rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, kʼe̩ la kache̩ bʼefoko o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩ ma;

kʼe̩ la ka ñw efoko o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩ kakini, e̩ gbo̩ o̩la ki Jihofa aka, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi akʼuna ef uwe̩, i la afʼoli emimi du kpai oli e̩gbe̩ du ef uwe̩ lie̩; ma akpʼo̩go̩ una-wñ ki ada lu n, i la agu eju du akwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ gbogbo tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ jo.
Tak o̩re̩la du ali ka kʼomi Jihofa fʼuna le̩ ko; ma akpalu n.
Tak u kakini, Ayaa I Ondu Jihofa! ma dʼumi te̩ aka kakini, I chʼita i akpa-i no!
Tak oia Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, fʼeju-we̩ kparʼo̩wo̩ Je̩rusale̩m, kʼe̩ gwʼo̩la-we̩ jʼane̩ rʼo̩wo̩ uña uña kiafo̩ le̩ kʼe̩ la kache̩ bʼane̩ Israe̩l oji ma;
kʼe̩ ka ñw ane̩ Israe̩l kakini, Abu ku Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼuwe̩, u la awʼo̩kwo̩chageli-mi kwʼako-wñ, oñ nakʼame̩no̩kpakpa kpʼame̩ne̩bibi da rinyo̩ bʼe̩ te̩.
Mak abu kʼu nakʼame̩no̩kpakpa kpʼame̩ne̩bibi da rinyo̩ bʼe̩ te̩, todule̩ o̩kwo̩chageli-mi adufu kwʼako̩-wñ kʼi akobo̩ o̩re̩la du akwʼo̩wo̩ du akwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ gbogbo tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩.
Tak o̩re̩la du ama ka kʼomi Jihofa, mʼo̩kwo̩chageli-mi wo̩ kwʼako̩-wñ dufu me̩; i ñʼadabi tunyʼe̩gu-wñ ge̩ n.
Todule̩ e̩ nafifi waa, uwe̩ o̩ma one̩, e̩ nanʼe̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩ kpʼe̩do̩ ki kpa ololo fifi eju-ma.

Tak e̩gba ku ma tʼuwe̩ ene kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ fifi? kʼuwe̩ akakini, Todu inabali kʼu gbo̩, todu i awa me̩, e̩do̩ du la amuyo̩, o̩wo̩ du agulo̩, afu one̩ du la adaku, oñ okuku du alo̩la dab omiofo. Go, i awa me̩, i la ache, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini:
O̩ma one̩, kache̩, kʼe̩ kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini:
Ma fʼalu-wñ no̩ kʼi kpʼone̩;
I dʼu wa te̩ ku ma gwe̩ kʼi de̩, ku ma dʼu nʼo̩wo̩; o̩kwo̩chageli le̩, ma fʼu no me̩, ii, ma fʼu gwe̩ ku ma dʼu tunyʼowe̩ akpone̩.
Kwa taa kʼe̩ dʼinaku, uwe̩ o̩ma one̩, todu i lewʼoji amone̩-mi me̩, i bʼoji amidachi Israe̩l chaka, ma. Ma mʼuma ko ñw o̩kwo̩chageli manyʼamone̩-mi. Todule̩ e̩ nadʼo̩wo̩ gwʼuta-we̩.
Todu añwago i che; i la che̩wñ kʼokute̩ ki achʼe̩de̩te̩ e̩wñ ma ño̩ de̩ ge̩ n fa? Ondu Jihofa ka-i.

Todule̩ uwe̩, o̩ma one̩, kache̩ ke, kʼe̩ la gwʼo̩wo̩; je̩ ñw o̩kwo̩chageli le̩ ki wan? onu meji, i-i, i ki chʼonu me̩ta, o̩kwo̩chageli abo ki ku de̩; o̩kwo̩chageli ki akpʼone̩ wewe ki lʼu ma daka le̩ de̩.
Omi mʼo̩kwo̩chageli kʼi afo̩ko̩ ma le̩ du te̩ akpejurʼalaku alaku-ma chaka kʼe̩do̩ du ki muyo̩, kʼe̩wñ uke̩re̩ ki wewe nyo̩gba; aa, i ada dab o̩mamanya, alu-wñ la chʼe̩dule̩ te̩ tod one̩ ekpa.
O̩kwo̩chageli, fʼo̩la mu ke, lo̩ rʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩, murida, kʼe̩ lo̩ rʼo̩wo̩ awohi, ugbo du kʼalu-we̩ ale ru.
Omi ñʼagwʼo̩wo̩ e-mi, oñ naje̩ ñw u kʼi bʼe̩do̩fulu-mi jo̩. Omi, Jihofa ka-i.
Tak o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi ge̩ kakini,
Omune̩ de̩ ge̩, uwe̩, o̩ma one̩, fʼo̩na meji date̩ ñw o̩la-we̩, e-kʼo̩kwo̩chageli onu Babilo̩n ale wa; o̩na meji le̩ akwʼoj ane̩ okate; kʼe̩ la fʼoli ujiwe che dago ugbo amuna ewo-i.
E̩ ki fʼo̩na date̩ ugbo kʼo̩kwo̩chageli alewa Raba e-amo̩ma Amo̩n kpai e-kʼi alewa Juda, tʼugbo Je̩rusale̩m ku ma bʼaku nyʼu le̩.
Todu onu Babilo̩n dago ugwe̩ta o̩na o̩mo̩, ugbo kʼo̩na meji le̩ wa ade kʼi fʼifa bo̩: i mi o̩fa-wñ ejo tʼemi tʼemi, i tene ugbo amude oji-wñ, i go o̩de̩ e̩wñ kʼi kpa le̩.

Ifa ki aje̩ Je̩rusale̩m la dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ, kʼi nyʼakʼigboli ki kpʼo̩do̩ fo̩ dago jo̩, ku ma chʼalu te̩ ñw e̩bie̩ edafo, ku ma ño̩ fogu kpa, ku ma kʼigboli wa dago alaku (ku ma kpʼolugbo̩na fo̩) ku ma fʼugbudu ugbudu du dago jo̩, ku ma ño̩ fʼo̩do̩go̩ ogu ne nyʼu.
I muda adab ifa olemi eju abo ku ma fʼe̩bo̩ go̩ le̩; i muda aje̩ ñwu ma rewa udu ku ma fe̩, kʼamu ki mu ma.

Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Todabu kʼame̩ che ku ma rewa udu ku ma fe̩, abu kʼada ku me̩ je̩ kwote̩ pee, todu kʼadure-me̩ kwotejugede ef e̩wñ du ku me̩ che; todabu ku ma rewa me̩, o̩wo̩ ado me̩.
Tak uwe̩, idachi Israe̩l, e̩ne̩bibi kʼagbe e-uku dʼo̩la-we̩, kʼiko-we̩ jo̩ me̩, owñ chʼiko ku ma abʼudu ñw e̩ e-o̩jo̩ otitala.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Mʼalauni-we̩ tu jʼane̩, mʼike̩be̩-we̩ chi tane̩, e̩wñ ade̩ alu kʼi de̩ ge̩ n; fʼe̩wñ ki hiwane̩ hine, fʼe̩wñ ki hine hi wane̩.
E̩gulo̩, e̩gulo̩, e̩gulo̩ oñ nadʼu che. E̩wñ le̩ ñʼade̩ ge̩ n, gbogbo tak e̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩da-wñ lewa; tak u nadʼu ñw u.

I la chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩, kache̩, kʼe̩ kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka ugbo amo̩ma Amo̩n, kpai ina ku ma bu le̩ de̩, kakini, Uwe̩ ki kakini, O̩kwo̩chage̩li, ma fʼo̩kwo̩chageli wo̩ kʼi kpʼone̩, i chʼe̩gwe̩ todu ki de̩ ñaña dab o̩mamanya, kʼi kʼone̩ mi,

abu ku ma jʼali e̩wñ ane̩ ego e-olemi todu we̩, ku ma la bʼuwe̩ ifa olemi, ku ma dʼuwe̩ dachi nʼo̩lo̩ ame̩ne̩bibi kʼagbe̩ uku dʼo̩la-ma, e-kʼiko-ma jo̩ me̩, owñ chʼiko ku ma abʼudu ñwu ma iko otitala le̩.
Mʼu du dabi tunyʼako̩-wñ. Ugbo ku ma nyi we̩, oj ane̩ ugbo ku ma bi we̩ le̩, o̩mo̩ nakajo̩ we̩.
Omi la akʼe̩do̩ e̩kpa-mi da bʼuwe̩ oji ma; nanʼuna uwe̩do̩-mi fʼalu bʼuwe̩ o̩la ma; oñ nadʼuwe̩ tef o̩wo̩ ame̩nofugamu, ku ma chʼo̩ka e̩wñ e̩kpabie̩.
Uwe̩ achʼiji ñw una; e̩bie̩-we̩ adʼalumeji ane̩ le̩; ma ñʼarewa we̩ ge̩ n: todu omi, Jihofa ka me̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, uwe̩ akajo̩? uwe̩ akajo̩ ewo e̩bie̩ le̩? Mak e̩ je̩ ñw u ma e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-wñ chaka.
Uwe̩ akakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ewo ki adʼe̩bie̩ dafo alumeji-wñ, todu kʼiko-wñ ki jo, kʼi la achʼode ode nyʼo̩la-wñ kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ daji.

Uwe̩ fʼabi je̩ ugbo e̩bie̩ kʼe̩ du dafo le̩, o̩la-we̩ la daji ugbo ode kʼe̩ che le̩. E̩ la f ʼiko-we̩ fa wa me̩, e̩ la lewa ukpoji o̩do-we̩ me̩. Todule̩ oñ omi mʼuwe̩ du chʼoli ina ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du, kpʼe̩wñ ako̩ru ugbo abo ojane̩ ojane̩ chaka.
Abo ku ma me̩rʼuwe̩ anane̩ kpʼabo ku ma jʼona jiji akʼuwe̩ ru, uwe̩ e̩nodu e̩kpabie̩, kʼutu eda chʼe̩kʼef uwe̩.
Go, amidachi Israe̩l ef uwe̩, alu du kʼukpahiu e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ de̩ i la dʼe̩do̩-wñ tʼe̩bie̩ edafo.
Ef uwe̩ ma dʼata kpʼiye rʼoche̩ke̩ne̩; ma la gbʼamilowa e̩wñ alumeji-we̩; ma chʼe̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n kpʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ihianyi ef uwe̩.
Uwe̩ fʼe̩de̩te̩ e̩wñ-mi kiafo̩ che me̩, e̩ la fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi-mi bie̩.
I nʼabo ku ma bʼulu mʼone̩ ku ma jʼef uwe̩ todu ku ma dʼe̩bie̩ dafo, ma la jʼef uwe̩ aje̩ e̩wñ oj uwo oj uwo: ma che e̩wñtuñ ef uwe̩.
Ma fʼamata-ma tago ofo ef uwe̩; ma fʼonobule̩ ki dʼefʼo̩la edaji chʼukata ef uwe̩.
I nʼe̩ne̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ kpʼo̩ya ekeji-wñ; i la nʼe̩nomune̩ kʼi fʼe̩wñ tuñ che kpʼo̩ya o̩ma-wñ, e̩nomune̩ la fʼo̩maye-wñ onobule̩ chʼukata, owñ chʼo̩ma onobule̩ ata-wñ.
Ef uwe̩ ma gbʼobi ku ma dʼe̩bie̩ dafo; uwe̩ dʼo̩ko̩ ta, e̩ la je̩ ile, oñ e̩ jʼile ugbo ame-keji-we̩ afuma, e̩ la fʼumi gbenyo̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Go, todule̩, omi fʼo̩wo̩-mi gwo mʼomune̩ todu e̩wñ afuma kʼe̩ che le̩, kpai tod e̩bie̩ ki te̩te̩dʼalumeji-we̩ le̩.
E̩ neke ne̩do̩ abe̩le̩ alo? O̩wo̩-we̩ neke gbiti iko kʼu nawa che kpʼuwe̩? Omi, Jihofa ka-i, u la ache.
Nafʼuwe̩ fiatuka ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, u la afʼe̩ kwu rʼoj ane̩ ojane̩, oñ nafʼiwa-we̩ lie̩ bʼef uwe̩ te̩.
Uwe̩ onugo la afʼo̩la-we̩ daji eju abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi; tak uwe̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, abo unyi Israe̩l mud iwa ñwu mi; o̩chaka-ma chʼebije ikpa kpai okuja kpai ebije kpai o̩de̩le̩ma alumeji aido; ma mud iwa ajifa me̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼame̩ mud iwa chaka, todule̩ go, omi ako me̩ wa jo̩ alumeji Je̩rusale̩m.

Alu kʼone̩ ayʼajifa kpai ebije ikpa kpai ebije kpai o̩de̩le̩ma kpai oku ja jʼef aido ku ma chʼobutu nyʼu ki yo̩, abe̩le̩ omi akʼume̩ wa jo̩ ef uwe̩do̩-mi kpai ef e̩do̩fulu-mi, oñ nako me̩ jʼef uwñ ayo̩ me̩.
I-i, omi aya me̩ jo̩ oñ nachʼobutu nyʼuna o̩fu e̩do̩-mi nyʼume̩, tak ame̩ amuyo̩ alumeji-wñ.
Alu kʼajifa ayo̩ alumeji aido, abe̩le̩ oñ ame̩ ayo̩ alumeji-wñ, tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi, Jihofa, mʼe̩do̩fulu-mi dudofo bʼume̩ oji ma.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, ka ñw u kakini, Ane̩ ku ma ma gwo rinyo̩ n uwe̩ che, kpʼe-kʼomi ma lo̩ bʼo ma o̩jo̩ e̩do̩ e̩kpa n.

Amakache̩-wñ dʼalu nyʼu alumeji-wñ, ma jo̩ dab amidu ku ma akwa ku ma afʼe̩la ku ma kpa na; ma mʼonugo amone̩ ko̩ mi; ma mʼe̩wñ akoko kpai e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ ko; ma che kʼamo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ki wewe alumeji-wñ.

Amatama-wñ fʼuko̩-o̩la-mi chʼakpulu, ma la fʼe̩wñ-mi kiafo̩ daji; ma fʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ kpʼe̩wñ o̩ja kpe̩ru ojoji n, ma la kʼone̩ alu kʼojoji e̩wñ ki chʼiwa kpʼe̩wñ ki fe̩ de̩ n, oñ ma mʼeju-ma du maja ñw o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi, ma la dʼumi te̩ ubi abie̩.
Amagboji-wñ ku ma iʼalumeji-wñ dab amo̩gu ku ma fʼe̩la ku ma mu na rinyo̩, ku ma dʼe̩bie̩ dafo, ku ma ño̩ kpʼonugo amone̩ bie̩, kʼama ki jʼile uji.
Amakache̩-wñ la fʼafu fo̩ nyʼe̩wñ ofo, abu ku ma li e̩wñ ane̩ ego ki chʼo̩wai, ku ma la bʼuma ifa olemi, ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, Jihofa la ko̩la du n.
Abo̩ ane̩ le̩ te̩tagba one̩ e̩wñ le̩, ma laño̩ dʼe̩wñ inya; ma chʼame̩no̩bata kpʼame̩nale ihianyi, ma la gbʼamilowa e̩wñ je̩ o̩lachi ofo, i nʼajo̩ n.
U la tejane̩ one̩ ef uma kʼi anʼo̩do̩ le̩ kʼi la adago ef e̩kpana-wñ eju mi, kʼu we ekpʼo̩ bie̩; u muda li e̩ne̩ du n.
Todule̩ oñ u dʼe̩do̩ e̩kpa-mi danyʼuma oji; u nʼuna o̩fu e̩do̩-mi fʼuma lie̩; o̩na e-ma onugo oñ nako dabiwa abʼuma onugo oji ma, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, abobule̩ meji do̩mo̩ ku ma chʼamo̩ma iye;
oñ ma kwojo̩ko̩ Ijipti; e̩gba ku ma chʼimo̩to̩ igbe̩le̩ oñ ma tʼajo̩ko̩ le̩. O̩mo̩ ma dʼo̩wo̩ chʼe̩nya-ma; o̩mo̩ ma la dʼe̩nya-ma chiya e̩gba ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ta n.
Odu e-ogijo la ko̩ Ohola, kpʼOholiba, o̩maye-wñ. Ma mud e-mi, ma la fʼamo̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼamo̩monobule̩ bi. I la chʼe-odu-ma, Ohola le̩ che Samaria, oñ Oholiba che Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ iko kʼu ne̩ Ohola le̩ i tʼajo̩ko̩ ale, ibe-wñ kwote̩ ame̩nufe̩do̩-wñ chaka, ibe-wñ tʼugbo abo Asiria kʼane̩-ma te̩ kadʼe-wñ,
ku ma kʼukpo odufa nyʼo̩la, ame̩nuto̩gba kpʼabʼo̩da, o̩chaka-ma chʼabokolobia ku ma ñeju, abo ku ma nʼanya ma che, ma tanʼamanya ale.
I la tʼo̩la-wñ no̩ ñwu ma, o̩chaka-ma chʼabo Asiria ku ma fe̩rʼeju tule; oñ i nʼode ode abo du kʼibe-wñ tʼo̩ le̩ fʼo̩la-wñ daji.
Akwʼiko Ijipti le̩ i la tʼo̩ko̩ eje̩-wñ le̩ no̩ n; todu ma bʼo̩ dachi o̩jo̩ igbe̩le̩-wñ, ma la dʼe̩nya-wñ chʼiya e̩gba kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ta n, ma la kʼe̩wñ abutabu-ma danyʼu o̩la.
Todule̩ omi mʼowñ du tʼef o̩wo̩ abo kʼibe-wñ tʼo̩ le̩, tʼef o̩wo̩ abo Asiria, kʼibe-wñ te̩ ma le̩.
Abo-i mʼago ofo-wñ du tejugede; ma mʼamo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ ko, taku ma nʼo̩kwo̩chageli fʼowñ onugo kpa; owñ la mud oli ina ef abobule̩, oñ ma bʼudu ñwu tʼalu kʼoji ajo̩ ka.
O̩maye-wñ, Oholiba, la liʼu, i muda kpabie̩ tule ef udo̩laga-wñ kpʼe̩wñ abutabu-wñ, kʼi la tʼo̩ko̩ eje̩ e-o̩maye-wñ le.
Ibe-wñ tʼabo Asiria, ama chʼame̩nuto̩gba kpʼabʼo̩da ku ma me̩ru, e̩wñ o̩la-ma mufu, amananya ku ma tanʼanya ale ma che, o̩chaka-ma chʼabokolobia ku ma ñeju ma.
Oñ u li ka kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ daji; ejeji-ma mʼo̩na okate du,
abutabu-wñ la mudabʼo̩ta; todu i fʼina ku ma ko̩ kʼi biu aboke̩le̩ jʼo̩lʼo̩do̩ li, ojibo abo Kaldia i che, ku ma nʼipeti ekpikpa kʼina-wñ,
e̩wñ ulago lʼuma ago de, alawoni ki nʼo̩jaja jʼoji-ma, o̩chaka-ma chʼame̩nojima eju, ma chebiu abo Babilo̩n Kaldia, ane̩ ugbo ku ma bi ma le̩.
E̩gba kʼi fʼeju do ma ababa i tene ma, oñ i fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩rʼuma Kaldia.
Tak abo Babilo̩n lewʼugbo-wñ tʼoj ate̩ ufe̩do̩, oñ ma nʼe̩wñ abutabu-ma fʼo̩ o̩la daji, oñ i la fʼo̩la-wñ kpabie̩ ugbo ma, tak e̩do̩ onugo-wñ muke̩che̩ ubi bʼuma te̩.
Abe̩le̩ i mʼo̩ko̩ eje̩-wñ du tejugede, i laño̩ dʼago ofo-wñ tejugede ge̩. Tak onugo-mi muke̩che ubi bʼowñ te̩, alu kʼonugo-mi muke̩che̩ ubi bʼo̩maye-wñ te̩ le̩.
I muda ño̩ che kʼo̩ko̩ eje̩-wñ ki nana nyo̩gba, ibe-wñ kado o̩jo̩ igbe̩le̩-wñ e̩gba kʼi tʼajo̩ko̩ ane̩ Ijipti le̩.
Ibo-wñ la tʼame̩naja-ma ku ma che̩ño̩ya dab o̩ke̩ke̩te̩, kʼato̩-ma dab e-amanja.
Abe̩le̩ ibe-we̩ to̩ e̩wñtuñ o̩jo̩ igbe̩le̩-we̩ e̩gba kʼabo Ijipti do̩wo̩che e̩nya-we̩ ku ma laño̩ dʼe̩nya-we̩ tʼachʼiya.
Todule̩, O Oholiba, abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, omi akʼame̩-nulʼe̩do̩-we̩ kwane̩ tʼuwe̩ o̩la, owñ chʼabo kʼonugo-we̩ muke̩che̩ ubi bʼuma te̩ le̩, oñ nako ma kwʼugbo tʼugbo du wa akobʼuwe̩;

owñ chʼabo Babilo̩n kpʼabo Kaldia chaka, Pekod kpai Shoa kpai Koa, kpʼabo Asiria du manyʼuma, abokolobia ku ma ñeju ma ma che, ame̩nuto̩gba kpʼabʼo̩da, o̩chaka ma che, amagboji kpʼame̩nuwohi ma che, o̩chaka-ma tanʼamanya ale.

Tak ama unʼe̩wñ idonu ogu wa akobʼe̩, o̩kogu, kpʼo̩kane̩ kʼamanya afo̩ manyʼo̩wo̩ amone̩; ma anʼikpako kpʼugbe̩yo̩ kpʼukata ebije akʼo̩la-mu donyʼuwe̩ daka, tak omi adʼajo̩ le̩ tʼef o̩wo̩ e-ma, tak ama akajo̩ we̩ teju alu kʼoji ajo̩ e-ma de̩.

Oñ naje̩ ñw ogu eja-mi ki chʼagwunyʼuwe̩ takʼama akʼe̩do̩fulu ache we̩ o̩la. Ma akʼuwe̩ iñmo̩ kpʼeti da, oñ abo-we̩ ki bo̩bo̩ awane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli. Ma umʼamo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ ko, tak una akʼabo-we̩ ki bo̩bo̩ mi.
Ma la ñʼagwʼe̩wñ o̩la-we̩ bʼuwe̩ o̩la te̩, ku ma kʼe̩wñ ijaga-we̩ ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ oñ naje̩ ñw e̩wñtuñ-we̩ kpʼo̩ko̩ eje̩-we̩ kʼe̩ ko kwʼane̩ Ijipti wa le̩ ki muda bʼe̩ o̩la te̩, kʼuwe̩ ki ño̩ chʼeju-we̩ ago ma ge̩ n, e̩ lañʼarewa Ijipti ge̩ n.
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, omi adu we̩ tʼef o̩wo̩ abo kʼe̩ chulaka ma-i, owñ chʼef o̩wo̩ abo kʼonugo-we̩ muke̩che̩ ubi bʼo̩ te̩ le̩.

Tak ama ache e̩wñ kpʼuwe̩ ef ulaka, mu la año̩ e̩wñ du kʼuwe̩ chʼakanya uko̩lo̩-wñ le̩, ku ma atʼe̩ no̩ te̩ ago ofo, oñ ago ofo-we̩ akwote̩ pee. Ma adʼago ofo oko eje̩-we̩ tejugede, tʼe̩wñtuñ-we̩ tʼe̩wñ abutabu-we̩.
Ma achʼuwe̩ e̩wñ-i ukpe̩ kʼe̩ tʼajo̩ko̩ tʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ubi, kʼe̩ la nʼode ode-ma fʼo̩la-we̩ daji.
Uwe̩ lule̩ tʼo̩na o̩maye-we̩; todule̩ u mʼago omi-wñ du tʼef o̩wo̩-we̩ me̩.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
efu-we̩ ako̩ ñw one̩ kʼo̩te̩ mu ma kpai e̩do̩dudu.
uwe̩ añmo̩, uwe̩ awelo ñmo̩,
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini: Todabu kʼe̩ gbenyo̩ mi, kʼe̩ la mʼumi du rikpolo tʼubi-we̩, todule̩ uwe̩ ki ño̩ nʼadu e̩wñtuñ-we̩ kpʼe̩wñ abutabu-we̩ ge̩.
Jihofa ño̩ ka ñw mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, uwe̩ akajo̩ Ohola kpʼOholiba? mak e̩ mʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ku ma che du ka jʼane̩ ñw ma.
Todu ama mʼe̩re̩ du rinyo̩ me̩, e̩bie̩ la jʼef o̩wo̩-ma; ma la fʼo̩ko̩ je̩ bʼode ode-ma me̩; ma ño̩ je̩ ñw amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ku ma bi ñw mi le gu ef una du ku ma chʼuje̩wñ ñw ode ode-ma.
E̩wñ ku ma ño̩ che mi de̩ ge̩: ma fʼuña-mi kiafo̩ daji o̩jo̩ʼkate le̩, ma la ño̩ fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi kpabie̩;
todu e̩gba ku ma fʼamo̩ma-ma kpa ñw ode ode-ma kpa, o̩jo̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩ ma mugudu wʼef uña-mi kiafo̩ oñ ma fʼu kpabie̩. Me̩ la go, ma fʼabe̩le̩ che ef unyi-mi ge̩ge̩de̩.
Ame̩ laño̩ fʼone̩ kpe̩rʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma kwʼo̩najiji wa; ma fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ gbe̩re̩ ma; me̩ la go, ma lewa. E̩ la fʼo̩la-we̩ gwe̩ todu ma, e̩ la fʼo̩tajele nyi, oñ e̩ kʼe̩wñ ijaga nyʼo̩la,
oñe̩kwogugu oj ate̩ ojima, e̩wñ te̩rʼoj itebulu o̩gba-wñ, oñ otulale-mi kpʼekpo-mi jʼoji-wñ.
Oñ uko̩la o̩wo̩ among ku ma mʼibe-ma ko rinyo̩ dʼugbo-wñ; ma kʼo̩wo̩ aboke̩le̩ kpʼamañmo̩te̩ kwʼaje̩tachi wa, oñ ma kʼude̩ nyʼo̩wo̩-ma kpʼike̩be̩ alifia jʼuma oji.
Tak u nʼo̩la e̩ne̩ ki dʼef abutabu-wñ kpo̩kpe̩ le̩ aka kakini, Fai tak i achʼe̩wñ abutabu-wñ, onobule̩-i.
Oñ ma nyʼejefu ugbo wñ, alu kʼaboke̩le̩ agbe̩re̩ ajo̩ko̩, abe̩le̩ ma nyʼejefu ugbo Ohola kpʼOholiba, abobule̩ e̩wñtuñ le̩.
Ame̩no̩kpakpa la akpa ma abi ku ma chʼudu o̩ko̩ eje̩ ma, kpai udu abobule̩ ku ma dʼe̩bie̩ dafo; todabu ku ma chʼamajo̩ko̩, kʼe̩bie̩ la dʼo̩wo̩-ma.
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Omi akʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ wa akobʼuma, oñ nako ma jo̩ ku ma fʼuma ro̩ tʼemi tʼano̩mo̩, ku ma fʼe̩wñ-ma dinya.
Tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ akʼokuta ro̩do ma, ku ma la nʼo̩kwo̩chageli gwo ma da jʼane̩; ma la akʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ kpa, oñ ma anʼuna gu unyi unyi-ma jo.
Abe̩le̩ oñ nache kʼe̩wñ-tuñ eche ki takpa oj ane̩ le̩; kʼabobule̩ du ki ko̩che̩ kʼama ki we ewʼe̩wñtuñ-me̩ che.
Ma la akʼe̩wñtuñ-me̩ dabiwa abʼume̩ oji ma; oñ ame̩ achʼudu adure-me̩ ugbo ode ode-me̩ le̩, tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Ondu Jihofa de̩.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩la, ochu e̩ke̩gwa-wñ, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa ochu le̩ ge̩, o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, fʼodu o̩jo̩ eñini-i ko̩, owñ chʼeñini-i gbage̩de̩: eñineñini-i gbage̩de̩ onu Babilo̩n bʼada no Je̩rusale̩m.
E̩ ki la fʼita kpa ñw abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n-i. Ka ñw ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩:
mʼe̩kpanya-wñ ya jʼef uwñ,
Mʼe̩wño̩re̩ egini e-ome̩me̩le̩ ef ujo̩ le̩ du,
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Atogwo ñw ewo e̩bie̩ le̩! owñ chʼuchade̩ kʼejefu-wñ te̩kala le̩, kʼe̩te̩kala-wñ ma kwef uwñ n. Mʼu ko kwef uwñ dufu o̩kpo̩ o̩kpo̩, i nʼanya ero̩ oji-wñ n:
todu e̩bie̩ dʼalumeji-wñ le̩; i mʼu du tʼoj okuta kʼoji-wñ de̩ gbaa, i la dʼu dajʼane̩pe̩te̩ kʼebutu ki bʼo ma n.
Todu kʼi je̩ ñw e̩do̩fulu ki kwane̩, kʼi fʼache̩-wñ na. Omi mʼe̩bie̩-wñ du tʼoj okuta kʼoji-wñ de̩ gbaa, kʼe̩wñ du ki we ebʼo̩ ma.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Atogwo ñw ewo e̩bie̩ le̩! Omi ñʼagbʼiji nyʼu nana ge̩.
Me̩ gbʼiji nyʼu, fʼuna-wñ ta jo, hi e̩la-wñ bie̩ nyo̩ nyo̩, dʼobobo-wñ dafo, fʼe̩la-wñ hi nyo̩nyo̩, achiku-wñ ki gujo rinyo̩.
Tak e̩ du uchade̩ ofo le̩ gugu oj e̩ge̩ una todu kʼi kpa, kʼebije ikpa-wñ ki gujo, kʼiwa-wñ ki muyo̩ ef uwñ, kʼi fʼe̩te̩kala-wñ lie̩.
Akanya uko̩lo̩-wñ gwʼu uhia, e̩te̩kala-wñ ki jukpa le̩ la akwo n; e̩te̩kala ki tʼef una!
E̩te̩kala-wñ le̩ chʼihie̩ne̩-we̩ ki chʼiwa; todabu kʼu fʼe̩ gwe̩ kʼe̩ ma fe̩ n, ma ñʼagwe̩ we̩ bʼ iwa-we̩ te̩ ge̩ n, gbogbo tak u je̩ ñw e̩do̩fulu-mi kʼi ñmi.

Omi Jihofa, ka me̩; i awa che̩ chuu, omi la ache, nadabi tʼubi n, na chʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ n, i la awo̩ mi n; teju alu kʼona o̩na kʼe̩ le̩ de̩, kpai teju alu kʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ che de̩, alu le̩ ma akajo̩ we̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, go, omi ache kʼu nʼatu-lubo̩ gbʼuñeju-we̩ bʼe̩ te̩; uwe̩ ki muda adaido̩ n, uwe̩ ki la araku n, omi aku-we̩ ki la awʼane̩ n.
E̩ fifi, one̩ ki muda gbʼo̩ n. E̩ ki daido̩ tod e̩ne̩ ki ku le̩ n. Fʼalawoni-we̩ ji, e̩ la mʼe̩da-we̩ ko nyʼe̩re̩, e̩ ki dʼe̩wñ bʼuko-we̩ ma n, e̩ ki la jʼuje̩wñ unyi aku n.
Abe̩-le̩ oñ u ko̩la ñw amone̩ odudu-wñ; oñ e̩gba ane̩ o̩ya-mi ku; u la che alu ku ma ñwa ñwu mi odudu.
Tak amone̩ le̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ache-i uwe̩ aka ñw a e̩wñ kʼi ache wa n?
Tak u ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo-mi kakini,

E̩ nako̩la ñw abo unyi Israe̩l kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi afʼuña-mi kiafo̩ daji, owñ chʼuba ukpahiu-me̩ kpʼe̩wñ uñeju-me̩ kpʼe̩wñ kʼonugo-me̩ ali ejumomi-wñ le̩. O̩kwo̩-chageli la akʼamo̩ma-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ kʼume̩ tʼuma no̩ jʼubi dajane̩.
Tak ame̩ ache alu kʼomi che-i; ame̩ akʼe̩wñ bʼuko-me̩ ma n, me̩ la ajʼuje̩wñ unyi aku n.
Alawoni-me̩ la ajʼoji-me̩; e̩da-me̩ la adʼe̩ne̩-me̩. Me̩ adaido̩ n, me̩ la araku n; me̩ muda ajo̩ agbe̩ rinyo̩ alo waa noj udu ku me̩ fe̩; me̩ la afifi nyʼomune̩ o̩la.
Abe̩le̩ Izikie̩l achʼujiwe ñwu me̩; ame̩ la ache teju e̩wñ du kʼowñ che le̩; e̩wñ-i lewa, tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Ondu Jihofa de̩.
I la chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩, o̩jo̩ kʼu nabʼuma gbʼukpahiu-ma, kpʼuyo̩ e̩wñ alifia-ma kpʼe̩wñ ku ma ñeju-wñ kpʼe̩wñ ku ma dʼe̩do̩-ma tʼo̩ le̩ kpʼamo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ ge̩,
o̩jo̩ le̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi fu tane̩ awʼugbo-we̩, kʼi je̩ ñw eti-we̩ gbo̩.
O̩jo̩ kʼu naka-i uwe̩ achi alu-we̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki fu tane̩; uwe̩ la ako̩la, alu-we̩ ñʼaji ge̩ n; abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ achʼujiwe ñwu ma; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa lewʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, mʼeju-we̩ kparʼugbo amo̩ma Amo̩n, kʼe̩ kache̩ rʼuma oji.

E̩ ki la ka ñw amo̩ma Amo̩n kakini, Me̩ gbʼo̩la Ondu Jihofa kel Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, todabu kʼe̩ kakini, Ibaa! nyʼuña-mi kiafo̩ e̩gba ku ma fʼudaji; kpai arʼojane̩ Israe̩l e̩gba ku ma fu gwʼalache̩; kpai arʼabunyi Juda e̩gba ku ma nyʼef amu le̩;
todule̩, go nako me̩ ñw amo̩ma o̩wo̩ olodudu kʼama ki ne̩ me̩, ma la amʼebu ugbo ku ma aru ef uwe̩, oñ ma adodo jo̩ ef uwe̩; ama aje̩ e̩ro̩-e̩wñ-we̩, ma la añmo̩ omi e̩nya-we̩.
Oñ nadu Raba chʼunyi tod aminyakulumi, amo̩ma Amo̩n la amud ugbo kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini adachi: tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼe̩ fʼo̩wo̩ gwo kʼe̩ la dʼe̩re̩ nyʼane̩ kpakpakpa, kʼe̩ la gwoye rʼane̩ Israe̩l oji alu du kʼonugo-we̩ chʼe̩de̩te̩-wñ;

todule̩, go, omi fʼo̩wo̩-mi nadala bʼe̩ oji ma, oñ nadʼe̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi; omi la akʼuwe̩ da bʼamone̩ amone̩ kibo̩ te̩, oñ naje̩ ñw e̩ lenyo̩ bʼojane̩ ojane̩ te̩; nakpʼe̩ bie̩; tak uwe̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Todabu ku Moab kpai Seir aka kakini, Go, unyi abo Juda dab abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi chaka me̩;
todule̩, go, omi abi akolo Moab akwo ewo ewo-wñ, akwʼewo-wñ ki jʼalo̩me̩ ane̩-wñ, owñ chʼojima ojane̩ le̩: Be̩t-je̩shimot kpai Bealmeo̩n kpai Kiriataim manyʼamo̩ma Amo̩n,
nako ma ñw amo̩ma abo o̩wo̩ olodudu ku ma ki ne̩ ma, kʼama ki ño̩ rewa amo̩ma Amo̩n ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ge̩ n.
U la ache alu kʼoji ajo̩ ka abu Moab oji ma; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼabo Ido̩m che nyu abo unyi Juda, owñ chʼache̩ ku ma na le̩, kʼi che e̩wñ abieju nana, kʼi la fʼache̩ o̩la-wñ na ugbo ma;

todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Omi anʼo̩wo̩-mi dala abʼIdo̩m ma, oñ nakʼone̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ da bʼo̩ te̩; oñ nadʼu chʼegbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta akwo Teman. Ma awʼane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli gbogbo wa Dedan.
U la anʼo̩wo̩ abo-mi Israe̩l fʼache̩-mi na abʼIdo̩m ma; tak ama ache Ido̩m teju uwe̩do̩-mi kpai e̩do̩fulu-mi efu Ido̩m; abe̩le̩ ama ama ache̩ ena-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼabo Filistia fʼache̩ na, ku ma la nʼe̩rikoko e̩do̩ fʼache̩-ma na ku ma kpʼuma bie̩ ef ulaka-ma ki ma nʼuda n le̩;
todule̩, abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi anʼo̩wo̩-mi dala abʼoji abo Filistia ma, u la akʼabo Ke̩re̩t da rinyo̩, kʼu nakpʼabe̩bo̩bo̩ alu ohimini bie̩ rinyo̩.
Omi la anʼuka e-e̩do̩fulu enu nʼache̩ lile wa abʼuma ma; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼu dʼache̩-mi wa ana oji-ma.
Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwaka, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu le̩, kʼo̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, todabu ku Taya ko̩la nyu Je̩rusale̩m kakini, Ibaa, owñ ki chʼalaku amone̩ amone̩ le̩ mukpo̩fo̩, i mubi ñwu mi me̩, abu kʼi fu chihi rinyo̩ oñ nanʼe̩wñ ololo ke.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyu-we̩, O Taya, oñ naje̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ojoji ojoji wewe wa akobʼuwe̩, alu kʼohimini abadi akʼakpoli-wñ wa.
Ma la akpʼaku Taya fo, oñ ma agu o̩do̩go̩-wñ lo̩; omi ñʼañʼebutu-wñ bʼo̩la-wñ te̩ ki mud okuta ki ko te̩ gbaa.
I la achʼugbo ku ma fʼiga nadala jo alumeji ohimini abadi; todu omi ka me̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i; owñ la amud e̩wñ kʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ajʼakpa-wñ.
Ma la anʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa amo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ ku ma jʼoko; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, omi ako Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, onu amonu le̩, manyʼamanya kpʼo̩kogu kpʼamananya kpʼujo̩ amone̩ wewe e̩kute̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ wa abo Taya ma.
I la anʼokwochageli kpa amo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ oko; i abʼaku nyʼe̩ kʼabo-wñ ki kpala jʼubi-wñ, ma akpʼugbudu dago nyʼe̩, tak i anʼugbe̩yo̩ achʼojokunyi ku ma jʼofe-wñ akobʼe̩.
I la akʼijini kʼi kpʼaku fo̩ wa kad aku-we̩, i la anʼugbada-wñ gu odogo-we̩ lo̩.

Uwewe amanya-wñ aje̩ ñw ebutu-ma akwu bʼuwe̩ o̩la-ma; aku aku-we̩ amiejo noj ekuku amananya, kpʼokane̩ ki anʼadu, kpʼokogu, e̩gba kʼi mugudu alaku-we̩, alu kʼaboke̩le̩ agudu e-ugbo ku ma gu aku lo̩ wʼef ewo.
I anʼetikpa amanya-wñ fʼo̩na o̩na-we̩ te̩ mane̩; i anʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpʼabo-we̩ rinyo̩; ugbogaga ukpahiu-we̩ la awʼane̩pe̩te̩.

Taku ma akʼe̩wñ anana-we̩ chʼe̩wñ aluje̩, oñ ma akʼe̩wñ inyama-we̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩; ma agu aku aku-we̩ lo̩, ma lañʼakpʼunyi unyi alifia-we̩ fo̩; taku ma akʼokuta-we̩ kpʼigboli-we̩ kpʼebutu-we̩ jʼalumeji omi le̩.
Omi lañʼaje̩ ñw ekuku eli-we̩ muda; ma ñʼagbʼuko̩la umolo-we̩ ge̩ n.
U la adu we̩ chʼokuta kʼoji-wñ te̩ gbaa; uwe̩ achʼugbo ku ma fʼiga nadala jo̩; ma ñʼadabi anʼe̩ ge̩ n; todu omi Jihofa ka me̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
E̩wñ kʼOndu Jihofa ka ñwu Taya de̩ kakini, Ala ala aga ekuku ewane̩-we̩ ku ma gbo̩ n? e̩gba kʼabo ki chʼagbe jʼafifi, e̩gba ku ma akpʼone̩ alumeji-we̩.

E̩gbale̩ amidachi ohimini abadi chaka agwo̩ru kwʼoj ede-ma tane̩; ma la akʼotogbo-ma jʼane̩, ma la agwʼukpo-ma ku ma chiya nyʼu bʼo̩la te̩; ma ako o̩la ega bʼo̩la ma; ma aguane̩pe̩te̩, o̩la-ma agagogodo e̩gba du, oñ ugoju-we̩ amu ma da.
Taku ma adinaku we̩, ku ma aka ñw e̩ kakini,
Fai tak ala ala aga o̩jo̩ kʼe̩ wane̩;
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, E̩gba kʼu nadʼuwe̩ chʼoku ewo dab ewo ewo ugbo kʼone̩ ma dʼodo ge̩ n, e̩gba kʼu mʼunefu le̩ ko wa abʼuwe̩ ma kʼomi inaina lewa bʼuwe̩ oji ma;

e̩gba le̩ omi adʼuwe̩ gwo̩ru wʼane̩ manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu, tʼugbo abo igbe̩le gbele, oñ naje̩ ñw e̩ dodo ugbo o̩gane̩ ile̩-i ugbo ki chʼegbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta kwʼigbelegbele manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼo̩lo̩ulu, kʼone̩ ki we edodo ef uwe̩. U la adʼojima te̩ ojane̩ abo ku ma deju;
nadʼuwe̩ chʼe̩wñ ubailo, uwe̩ ñʼade̩ ge̩ n; dagba ma tejane̩ we̩, ma ñʼali uwe̩ ogbegbele̩ ge̩ n, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
I chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩ e̩ ki nʼinaku Taya ada;
kʼe̩ ka ñw Taya kakini, Uwe̩ kʼe̩ gugu alu ohimini abadi, kʼe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ chʼanyaja e-amone̩ amone̩ ugbo ala ala wewe, abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Alo̩me̩-we̩ jʼo̩ge̩ge̩de̩ ohimini abadi;
Ma nʼoli fe̩r kwʼoko Senia
Ma mʼok e-Be̩shan
Lemo̩-we̩ chʼukpo line̩n ku ma hi reju taku ma chiya nyʼu
Abo ku ma dodo Saido̩n kpai Arfad
Abogijo Gebal kpʼamanibe̩-ma jʼef uwe̩
Abo Pe̩rsia kpai Lud kpai Put jʼef abogu-we̩, abo-we̩ ku ma ajogu de̩; ma kʼo̩kpatabeli kpʼukata ogu lo̩ko̩li ef uwe̩; ama je̩ ñw alifia-we̩ kʼi ne̩reju.
Aboke̩le̩ Arfad manyʼabogu-we̩ jʼoj aku-we̩ daka, amagbiti la jʼef o̩do̩go̩-we̩; ma kʼo̩kpatabeli-ma lo̩ko̩li aku-we̩ daka; ama je̩ ñw alifia-we̩ ki mufu.
Tarshjsh chʼachinyama-we̩ ukpe̩ kʼe̩wñ anana ojoji ojoji kʼe̩ ne̩ ta chʼo̩wo̩wo̩; ajifa kpai ebije kpʼokuja kpʼo̩de̩le̩ma, ma muko kpailo̩ ane̩-we̩.
Jafan kpai Jubal kpai Me̩she̩k, abo le̩ chʼamanyaja ugbo we̩; ma kʼonugo one̩ kpʼe̩wñ eku ebije ikpa kpailo̩ tod e̩wñ aja-we̩.
Abo unyi Togama ko amanya kpʼamanya ogu kpʼami-miulu wa kpailo̩ e̩wñ aja-we̩.
Aboke̩le̩ Dedan chʼamagbagbata ugbo we̩ ge̩; ala ala wewe chʼaja ki atʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩; ma nʼenyi adagba kpai oli e̩boni rʼo̩me̩ ñw e̩.

Siria achinyama-we̩ ukpe̩ kʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ che ata chʼe̩kute̩; ama ne̩ e̩me̩rald kpai ukpo ekpikpa odufa, kpʼukpo ku ma hi e̩gudu, kpai ukpo line̩n ku ma hi reju, kpai ko̩ral kpai okuta rubi wa kpailo e̩wñ aja-we̩.
Juda kpʼane̩ Israe̩l chʼamanyaja ugbo-we̩, ama ko o̩ka wit e-mi nit kpai e̩wñ ayaga ki rinyo̩ kpai omi iño̩ kpai ekpo kpai balm kpailo e̩wñ aja-we̩.
Damaskus chʼachinyama-we̩ todu kʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ che ta chʼe̩kute̩, ukpe̩ kʼe̩wñ anana ojoji ojoji chʼo̩wo̩wo̩, manyʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma e-He̩lbo̩n, kpʼedudu ala efufu,
Fedan kpai Jafan nʼowu e̩da kpailo̩ e̩wñ aja-we̩; ebije efufu kpai kesia kpai kalamus jʼef e̩wñ aja-we̩.
Dedan chʼanyaja ukpo o̩me̩me̩le̩ tod ofidi anya ugbo we̩.
Arabia kpʼamidachi Kedar chaka, ama chʼamachinyama kʼe̩wñ mʼo̩wo̩-ma amo̩mala kpʼamokolo, kpʼamobuko̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼabo le̩ chʼamachinyama-we̩ ef uwñ.
Abo Shiba kpai abo Raama ku ma chʼamanyaja, abo le̩ chʼama-nyaja ugbo-we̩. Ama la nʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩ ki tʼo̩gba manyʼokuta akoko du kpʼo̩jamalia wa kpailo̩ e̩wñ aja-we̩.
Haran kpai Kane̩ kpai Ide̩n, amanyaja e-Shiba kpʼAshur kpai Chilmad le̩ chʼamanyaja ugbo we̩.
Abo le̩ chʼamanyaja ugbo we̩ ef ukpo ki nʼo̩ko̩, ef ukpo odufa kpʼukpo ku ma chiya nyʼu, kpai ukpo ojoji ojoji kʼaja-wñ che̩kpuna, ku ma nʼiku ji tʼef akpati akpati oli sida jʼef e̩wñ aja-we̩.
O̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ Tarshish koji aminyakulumi nʼadu e̩wñ aja-we̩.
Amagwo̩ko̩-we̩ mʼuwe̩ du dufu
E̩wñ anana-we̩ kpʼaja-we̩ kpʼe̩wñ aja-we̩,
Ukwa amañʼo̩ko̩-we̩ o̩na ku ma gbo̩
tak abo du ku ma nʼoche chʼuko̩lo̩
oñ amone̩ agbo̩ ogu-we̩ ku ma kpa,
Ma alʼoji-ma o̩bobo̩lo todu we̩,
Oñ ef aku ku ma aro̩ le̩ ma adinaku we̩,
E̩gba kʼane̩-we̩ kʼe̩ ta kwʼohimini abadi kpatuka,
Iko̩ kʼohimini abadi fʼuwe̩ kpo̩fo̩,
Ugoju-we̩ mʼabo̩ du ku ma dodo ala ala da;
Amanyaja ku ma jʼef amone̩ amone̩ kibo̩ chʼe̩ chui;
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, ka ñw e̩nuto̩gba Taya, kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
go, e̩ nʼibe tu Danie̩l le;
lugbo ibe kʼe̩ ne̩ kpʼoji e̩wñ kʼe̩ ma
lugbo ibe-we̩ ki tabale kpʼaja enya-we̩
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
todule̩, go, omi akʼabo̩wo̩ ejaduña wa abʼe̩ ma,
Ma adʼuwe̩ wane̩ tʼef o̩lo̩ulu,
Uwe̩ ñʼaka eju e̩ne̩ kʼi adʼuwe̩ kpa le̩ kakini,
Uwe̩ aku uku abo e̩pi odukulu
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini:
O̩ma one̩, e̩ nafʼinaku da tod onu Taya, kʼe̩ la ka ñw u kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩:
Uwe̩ dʼlde̩n, uche̩ O̩jo̩ le̩;
Uwe̩ che che̩rub ku ma bʼekpo tʼo̩ oji ki abʼo̩mo̩ ma;
E̩ mufu kpa o̩na o̩na-we̩ du
Lugbo aja enya-we̩ ki chʼololo
E̩do̩-we̩ hi o̩la-wñ ne noj alifia-we̩;
Lugbo uwewe udu kʼe̩ fe̩,
Ugoju-we̩ amʼe̩ne̩ du ki mʼe̩
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, fʼeju-we̩ kparʼo̩wo̩ Saido̩n, kʼe̩ kache̩ bʼo ma
kʼe̩ kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
todu omi adʼe̩wñ ibi kpuche̩ rʼef uwñ,
Tak ikeke ki agwunyʼone̩ kpʼikeke e̩bie̩ne̩ ef abo du ku ma donyʼu daka ku ma fʼe̩de̩te̩-ma che akwoubi ñʼade̩ ñw abo unyi Israe̩l ge̩ n. Tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.

Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, E̩gba kʼu mʼabo unyi Israe̩l ko wa kwʼef amone̩ ojoji ojoji ku ma fiatuka rʼef uma le̩ jo̩, ku ma che kʼomi fo̩ ef uma eju abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, tak ama agugu oj ane̩ e-ma e-kʼomi du ñw adu-mi Jeko̩b le̩.

Taku ma agugu o̩mo̩ to̩ko̩o̩; ochochi, ama akʼ-unyi, ma la ane̩ uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma. Ma la ajo̩ to̩ko̩o̩ e̩gba kʼu bʼudu kʼajo̩ ka ñw abo du ku ma chʼe̩de̩te̩ ma ku ma jo̩ lʼuma daka le̩; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma de̩.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwa, ochu e̩ke̩gwa, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gweji ochu le̩, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, fʼeju-we̩ kparu Fero, onu Ijipti, kʼe̩ la kache̩ abʼowñ kpʼabo Ijipti du oji ma;
ko̩la, kʼe̩ kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Omi la akʼuwo̩ nyʼuwe̩ alu,
Tak omi adʼuwe̩ rikpolo tʼef aje̩tachi,
Tak abo du ku ma dodo Ijipti ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, todabu kʼama te̩tachʼo̩kpa elikpo ñw abo unyi Israe̩l.
E̩gba ku ma gwo̩nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩, uwe̩ muguche̩, e̩ la fʼuma ojika guche̩ chaka; oñ e̩gba ku ma lo̩nʼuwe̩ uwe̩ muguche̩, e̩ la je̩ ñw ago-ma du ga.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jiholʼa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi adʼo̩kwo̩chageli wa abʼuwe̩ ma, oñ nakʼone̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ da rinyo̩ bʼe̩ te̩;
oñ ane̩ Ijipti amud alache̩ ki chʼegbili e̩lanyi kpʼ-okuta; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
todule̩, go, omi chʼe̩na-gwunyʼuwe̩, kpʼe̩nagwunyu aji aji-we̩, oñ nache kʼane̩ Ijipti kʼi mud egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta hioko, kʼi chʼalache̩ te̩ akwo odo̩go̩ Se̩fena gbogbo wa alpme̩ Itiopia.
E̩re̩ one̩ du alale gu ef uwñ du n, e̩re̩ e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ la ale gu ef uwñ du n, e̩ne̩ du la adodo o̩mo̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩do̩ o̩gbo̩meji n.

Oñ nadʼane̩ Ijipti chʼalache̩ tʼalumeji ane̩ ane̩ kʼi chʼachigodo; ewo ewo ki jʼef ewo ewo ki chihi rinyo̩ le̩ achʼalache̩ te̩ o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩meji; u la akʼabo Ijipti fiatuka rʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, oñ nakpa ma tuka rʼojane̩ ojane̩ kibo̩.
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, E̩gba kʼo̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji jo̩, nako abo Ijipti kwef amone̩ amone̩ ugbo ku ma kpatuka ru wa jo̩;
tak u narʼamu Ijipti da, oñ naje̩ ñwu ma mudabi tʼojane̩ Patros, owñ chʼoj ane̩ e̩te̩-ma, taku ma achʼojane̩ ki chʼo̩wo̩ wane̩ jʼo̩mo̩.
I achʼojane̩ kʼi chʼo̩wo̩ wane̩ tʼojane̩ du le; i ñʼahi o̩la-wñ ne ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki bo̩ ge̩ n; naño̩ bu ma wane̩. Ma ñʼanʼo̩da abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ge̩ n.
Ijipti ñʼachʼuke̩do̩no abo unyi Israe̩l kʼi aje̩ ñwu ma rewa udu ku me̩ fe̩ e̩gba du ku ma rida ago ma ge̩ n; tak ama ama ka kʼomi chʼOndu Jihofa.
Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ ogu nyoke mebie-wñ, ochu ejodudu-wñ, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu le̩, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,

O̩ma one̩, Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, je̩ ñw abogu-wñ chʼuko̩lo̩ inaina bo Taya oji ma; oji e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ mud o̩bo̩bo̩lo̩, ojika du mugwo̩; i muda nʼuro̩me̩ du ñw owñ kpʼabogu-wñ kwʼo̩wo̩ Taya todu uko̩lo̩ kʼi che bʼo ma n.

Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi adʼane̩ Ijipti ñwu Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n; owñ la akʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ alo, i la añʼane̩-wñ, kpʼe̩wñ kʼogu-wñ je̩; oñ e-le̩ achʼo̩me̩ ku ma ara ñw abogu-wñ.
U mʼane̩ Ijipti du ñw u kʼi chʼe̩wñ akoji uko̩lo̩ kʼi che, todu uko̩lo̩-mi ma che le̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
O̩jo̩ le̩ omi aje̩ ñw igba ki fu ñw abo unyi Israe̩l, oñ omi adʼalu e̩chi ñw e̩ alumeji-ma; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, kache̩ kʼe̩ kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Todu o̩jo̩-wñ me̩,
O̩kwo̩chageli la awa bʼIjipti ma,
Itiopia kpai Put kpai Lud kpʼabo ojoji ojoji ku ma kpe̩gwa nyʼomune̩ le̩ kpai Kub kpʼamo̩ma ane̩ ku ma kpʼalo kpʼama le̩, awane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli manyʼuma.
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Tak ama achihi te̩ alumeji
Tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩,
O̩jo̩ le̩ amonuche̩ atʼo̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ dufu kwʼo̩gba mi ku ma je̩ ñw abo Itiopia ku ma chubiyʼo̩la-ma ajo̩ le̩, ki railo; tak iwo̩ lile abʼuma ma, dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩jo̩ e-Ijipti le̩; todu me̩ go, i awa.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Ma adʼowñ kpʼabo-wñ manyʼowñ wa, ku ma fʼane̩-i kpabie̩,
Tak u naje̩ ñw aji aji-wñ ki gbe̩,
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Tak u nache ku Patros ki chihi rinyo̩,
U la adʼe̩do̩fulu-mi danyu Sin
Omi la akʼuna Ijipti;
Abokolobia Afe̩n kpai Pi-be̩se̩t awane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli;
O̩jo̩ ñʼadu Tehafnehe̩s,
Abe̩le̩ oñ nache alu kʼoji ajo̩ ka abʼIjipti oji ma,
Oñ i lewa tʼodo e̩ke̩gwaka-wñ, ochu ejodudu-wñ, o̩jo̩ e̩kebie ochu le̩, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, omi fʼo̩wo̩ Fero, onu Ijipti, guche̩ me̩; e̩ la go, e̩ne̩ du ji ku ma dʼogu tʼo̩ n, ku ma dʼukpo ji kʼi gbiti kʼi gwo̩nyʼo̩kwo̩chageli n.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyu Fero, onu Ijipti; u la afʼo̩wo̩-wñ meji guche̩, e-ki gbiti kpʼe-ki guche̩ te̩; oñ naje̩ ñw o̩kwo̩chageli ki fʼo̩wo̩ wane̩.
Tak u nafʼabo Ijipti fiatuka rʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, oñ nakpa ma tuka nyʼoj ane̩ ane̩.
Tak u nadʼukpahiu ñwʼo̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n meji; u la adʼo̩kwo̩chageli e-mi tunyʼo̩ o̩wo̩; omi muda agu o̩wo̩ Fero meji che̩ tak i afifi o̩gba-wñ, ifi-wñ chʼifi e̩ne̩ ku ma chʼagbe kʼi ache kʼi ku.
Omi la akʼo̩wo̩ onu Babilo̩n dago, oñ o̩wo̩ Fero awane̩; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼu mʼo̩kwo̩chageli-mi du tunyʼonu Babilo̩n o̩wo̩, owñ la afʼu nadala abʼane̩ Ijipti oji ma.
Tak u nakpʼabo Ijipti tuka rʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, oñ nafia ma tuka rʼugbo du oj ane̩ ane̩; tak ama ama kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwaka, ochu e̩ke̩ta-wñ, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu le̩, kʼo̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩ ka ñw u Fero onu Ijipti, kpʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ, kakini:
Go, e̩ne̩ Asiria le̩ chʼoli sida Le̩bano̩n,
Omi omi fʼu ne̩,
Todule̩ o̩gba-wñ tʼatate̩
Ame̩we̩ ojale chaka
Abe̩le̩ uto̩-wñ de̩ ef ugbiñmi-wñ,
Oli sida ki jʼef uche̩ O̩jo̩ neke dʼu maja n,
U je̩ ñw u fe̩reju
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼe̩ hi o̩la-we̩ ne ef e̩gba kʼe̩ gba kʼi la mʼoji-wñ du tunyʼakpa, oñ i fʼe̩do̩-wñ hi ne ef o̩gba-wñ le̩;
omi lañʼadʼu tef o̩wo̩ agbiti kʼi dʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi le̩; e̩ne̩ le̩ achʼo chuu; omi fʼu ne dufu tod e̩wñ bibi-wñ.

Oñ ab o̩wo̩ ejaduña, owñ chʼabo ku ma bailo̩ ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, fʼu ko̩da rinyo̩, oñ ma tʼo̩ no̩ tinyo̩; o̩me̩to̩-wñ lewane̩ oj uwo uwo kpʼo̩go̩ du, e̩to̩-wñ la guche̩ jo̩ iba o̩cha o̩cha omi ane̩ le̩; amone̩ ane̩-ile̩ du mugwo̩ru tane̩ bʼolubo̩-wñ te̩, oñ ma tʼo̩ no̩ tinyo̩.
Ame̩we̩ ojale chaka adodo o̩la-wñ ki wane̩ le̩; ame̩wñ iñmi oko chaka ajʼoji o̩me̩to̩-wñ;

todu kʼoli du ki jʼo̩la omi omi ki we ehi o̩la-ma ne ef e̩gba ku ma gba, ku ma la we edʼoji-ma tunyʼakpa, kʼamagbiti-ma ki we edago ef o̩gba-ma, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi añmʼomi; todu ma mʼo̩chaka-ma ko ñw uku me̩, ku ma nyʼugbo ki chʼo̩gane̩ ile-i, alumeji amo̩ma amone̩, manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu.

Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ kʼi gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩jegu omi je̩ ñwu ma daido̩; u mʼe̩wñ ko bʼunefu ma tod uwñ, u laño̩ fʼuwobi-wñ bulo̩; tak omi-wñ ki tabale we hioli; u la je̩ ñwu Le̩bano̩n ki chubi gbe̩m, oli egbili chaka la daku tod uwñ.

U je̩ ñw o̩la abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki ga noj ekuku ewane̩-wñ, e̩gba kʼu dʼowñ rikpolo nyʼef o̩jegu manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu; tak e̩do̩ oli Ide̩n chaka, kpʼoli Le̩bano̩n e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ kpʼe-ki nyo̩ tule, e-du ki añmʼomiofo, nyi ugbo ki chʼo̩gane̩ ile̩ le̩.
Ma ño̩ gwo̩ru nyʼo̩jegu manyʼowñ nyʼugbo abo kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa; ochochi, owñ chʼabo ku ma chʼo̩wo̩ e̩gbiti-wñ, ku ma jo̩ olubo̩-wñ alumeji abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi.
E̩ne̩ e̩ dab owñ ef oli Ide̩n ef ojima kpʼugbiñmi ta? Ma muda dʼuwe̩ wane̩ manyʼoli Ide̩n tʼef ugbo ki chʼo̩gane̩ ane̩-ile̩; uwe̩ adachi o̩ge̩ge̩de̩ abo e̩pi odukulu, manyʼabo kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩gweji, ochu e̩ke̩gwe̩ji-wñ, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu le̩, kʼo̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩ mʼinaku da todu Fero onu Ijipti, kʼe̩ ka ñw u kakini:
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Oñ natʼuwe̩ no̩ tʼane̩pe̩te̩,
U la akʼo̩re̩la-we̩ jo oj uwo uwo,
Naño̩ nʼe̩bie̩-we̩ chʼomiofo kʼu nacherʼane̩
E̩gba kʼu la fʼe̩ kpalu, nakʼe̩wñ bʼojale ma,
Naje̩ ñw e̩wñ ki agane̩ jali efojale-i
Naño̩ kpʼamone̩ amone̩ wewe e̩do̩ bie̩, e̩gba kʼu dʼe̩kpabie̩-we̩ te̩ ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi tʼojane̩ ojane̩ kʼe̩ ma ma mama ta n.

Ochochi, omi aje̩ ñw awuwu-we̩ ki fʼamone̩ amone̩ wewe mu; amonu-ma la arailo todu we̩ bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩, e̩gba kʼu dʼBabilo̩n-mi te̩ añʼuma eju; o̩la-ma la aga iko tʼiko du, o̩la e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ aga tod oji-wñ onugo, o̩jo̩ ewane̩-we̩.
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, O̩kwo̩-chageli onu Babilo̩n awa bʼe̩ ma.
Omi la aje̩ ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩-we̩ leane̩ alʼo̩kwo̩chageli amagbiti. O̩chaka-ma chʼabo ku ma bailo ef abo uche̩ichi abo uche̩ichi.
Naño̩ kpa ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩-wñ tinyo̩
Tak u naje̩ ñw omi omi-ma ki de̩ jali,
E̩gba kʼu na Iʼane̩ Ijipti chʼalache̩ te̩
Inaku ku ma la ada o̩mo̩ le̩ de̩; amo̩ma onobule̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi anʼinaku le̩ ada; ma anʼe-le̩ dinaku Ijipti kpʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
I ño̩ lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩gweji-wñ, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu le̩ kʼo̩la Jihofa lewʼu-gbo mi kakini,

O̩ma one̩, e̩ nakwa tod o̩wo̩ abo Ijipti, kʼe̩ la ko ma ro̩ nʼane̩, owñ chʼowñ onugo kpʼamo̩ma onobule̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki nʼuwohi, tʼef ugbo ki chʼo̩gane̩ ane̩-ile̩ manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu.
E̩ne̩ e̩ du alifia?
Ma awane̩ o̩ge̩ge̩de̩ abo kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma; ma mʼowñ du ñw o̩kwo̩chageli me̩; fʼu fa kwʼo̩mo̩ manyʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka.
Abo ku ma nʼukpahiu ef amagbiu ako̩la ñw u alumeji o̩jegu, manyʼabo ku ma gbutu ñw u; ma mugwo̩ru le, ma dachi chii; owñ chʼabo ku ma ma de̩pi n, kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma.
Ashur do̩mo̩ kpʼabujo̩-wñ chaka; ojinoji-wñ To daka jo̩; o̩chaka-ma chʼabo ku ma kpa ma, ma wane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli;
ura ura-ma jʼlba iba o̩lo̩ulu, abujo̩-wñ la donyʼura-wñ daka, o̩chaka-ma chʼabo kʼone̩ kpa, ma wane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli; owñ chʼabo ku ma je̩ ñw ailo ki ba oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju.

O̩mo̩ Elam de̩, oñ o̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka donyʼojinoji-wñ daka jo̩; abo ku ma kpa ma ma che chaka, ma wane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli, ma nʼe̩pi odukulu-ma gwo̩ru nyʼugbo ki chʼo̩gane̩ ane̩-ile̩-i, owñ chʼabo ku ma je̩ ñw ailo-ma ba one̩ oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju. Anyo̩ la mu ma manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu.

Ma fʼate̩ nadala te̩ ñw u alumeji abo ku ma kpa, manyʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka; ojinoji-wñ jo̩ lʼo̩ daka; o̩chaka-ma chʼabo e̩pi odukulu kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma; todu ailo-ma la ba oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju, oñ anyo̩-ma mu ma manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu. Ma mʼowñ du te̩ alumeji abo ku ma kpa ma.
O̩mo̩ Me̩she̩k kpai Tubal kpʼo̩wo̩ one̩-ma chaka jo̩; ojinoji-ma lʼuma daka jo̩; o̩chaka-ma chʼabo e̩pi odukulu kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma; todu ama je̩ ñw ailo-ma ki ba oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju.

Ma muda adachi kpe-nyʼamagbiti ef abo e̩pi odukulu ku ma wane̩, ku ma nʼido̩na ogu-ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩jegu n. Abo le̩ la mʼoji-ma ko nʼokwo̩chage̩li-ma, oñ udu ku ma fe̩ bʼachiku-ma ma; todu ama chʼe̩wñ ubailo ñw amagbiti oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju.
Ma muda agu uwe̩ che̩ alumeji abo e̩pi odukulu, oñ uwe̩ adachi kpenyʼabo kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma.
O̩mo̩ Ido̩m kpʼamonu-wñ kpʼamidachi-wñ chaka jo̩, alu du kʼukpahiu-ma chaka de̩ o̩mo̩ ma ko ma dachi ef abo kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma. Ma adachi ef abo e̩pi odukulu kpʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu.

Amadokanya o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ jʼo̩mo̩ chaka, kpʼabo Saido̩n ku ma gwo̩ru le manyʼabo ku ma kpa; todu ailo du ku ma nʼugbiti-ma anyʼone̩ ailo, anyo̩ mʼuma; oñ ma dachi ef e̩pi odukulu-ma manyʼabo kʼo̩kwochageli kpa ma, oñ anyo̩-ma dʼo̩la-ma manyʼabo ku ma gwo̩ru nyʼo̩lo̩ulu.
Fero ali ma, oñ e̩do̩-wñ anyi tod o̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka, owñ che Fero kpʼabogu-wñ kʼo̩kwo̩chageli fu ma kpa du, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Todu u mʼailo du te̩ oj ane̩ abo ku ma deju; ma la amʼowñ du dachi alumeji abo e̩pi odukulu manyʼabo kʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa ma; owñ che Fero kpʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩ nako̩la ñw amo̩ma abo-we̩, kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini: E̩gba kʼu nanʼo̩kwo̩chageli wa abʼane̩ ʼka ma kʼabo le̩ chi one̩ ef uma, ku ma mʼu du chʼe̩ne̩ ide-ma;
e̩gba kʼi li ka kʼo̩kwo̩chageli awa abʼane̩ le̩ ma, kʼi fʼo̩kakachi fa kʼi juka ñw amone̩ le̩;
e̩ne̩ du kʼi gbo̩ uko̩la o̩kakachi, kʼi ma gba uka kʼi je̩ ñw u n, iche̩wñ kʼo̩kwo̩chageli le̩ lewa mʼowñ du, e̩bie̩-wñ adʼoji o̩la-wñ.
I gbʼuko̩la o̩kakachi, oñ i ko̩ egbʼuka le̩ gbo̩; e̩bie̩-wñ adʼoji-wñ onugo. I ma gbʼu-ka-wñ gbo̩, i ma gbʼonugo-wñ.

I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ ide le̩ li abu kʼo̩kwo̩cha-geli awa, kʼi ma la fa o̩kakachi n, kʼi ma la juka ñw amone̩ le̩ n, tak o̩kwo̩chageli lewa mʼe̩ne̩ʼka du kwef uma, mak edu ma dʼe̩ne̩ le̩ alo ef udu-wñ kʼi fe̩; omi muda atene e̩bie̩-wñ o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ ide le̩.
O̩ma one̩, omi dʼuwe̩ chʼadide abo unyi Israe̩l; todule̩ uwe̩ ki gbʼo̩la alu-mi, kʼe̩ la juka ñw ma ñw ml.

Egba kʼu naka ñw e̩ne̩bibi kakini, O uwe̩ e̩ne̩bibi, eku uwe̩ aku chuu, kʼe̩ ma la ka kʼe̩ juka ñw e̩ne̩bibi le̩ kʼi kwo bʼo̩na-wñ te̩ n; e̩ne̩bibi le̩ aku ef abi-wñ kʼi je̩, omi muda atene e̩bie̩-wñ o̩wo̩-we̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ fʼuka je̩ ñw e̩ne̩bibi todu kʼi rida bʼo̩na-wñ te̩; kʼi ma la rida bʼona-wñ te̩ n, i aku ef abi-wñ kʼi je̩; uwe̩ muda fʼoji o̩la-we̩ jadu me̩.
I la chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩, e̩ ka ñw abo unyi Israe̩l. Abu kʼuwe̩ ake̩la de̩ kakini, Ada kʼa je̩ kpʼadure-wa jʼoji-wa me̩, oñ a jʼachihi rinyo̩ ef uwñ; ab a ale kʼa deju?

E̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i. U nʼe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ ugbo uku e̩ne̩bibi n; chai kʼe̩ne̩-bibi ki rida bʼo̩na-wñ te̩ kʼi deju. Me̩ rida, me̩ rida bʼo̩na o̩na-me̩ ki bie̩ne̩ te̩; todu e̩wñ chi kʼame̩ aku, O abo unyi Israe̩l.

I la chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩, e̩ naka ñw amo̩ma abo-we̩, kakini, E̩wñ o̩kpakpa e̩no̩kpakpa agbʼo̩ o̩jo̩ kʼi jʼada n; i chʼe̩wñ bibi e-e̩ne̩bibi, i awane̩ tod uwñ o̩jo̩ kʼi arida bʼe̩wñ bibi-wñ te̩ n; e̩ne̩ ki chʼe̩no̩kpakpa la neke deju lef e-le̩ o̩jo̩ kʼi adure n.
E̩gba kʼu naka ñw e̩no̩kpakpa ka kʼi adeju chuu, iche̩wñ kʼi ake̩do̩nʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa e-wñ kʼi la fʼudu fe̩, ma ñarewa e̩wñ o̩kpakpa-wñ du kʼi che n. I muda aku ef udu kʼi fe̩.
Omune̩ de̩ ge̩, e̩gba kʼu naka ñw e̩ne̩bibi, kakini, Eku uwe̩ aku chuu; iche̩wñ kʼi murida bʼadure-wñ te̩, kʼi la ache e̩wñ kʼo̩da je̩ kpʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa;
iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩bibi dʼe̩wñ ku ma du nyʼo̩wo̩ dabi wa ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi du ñw u, kʼi la mʼe̩wñ one̩ kʼi dinya dʼu dabi, kʼi alule̩ teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ e-iñmi, kʼi ma fʼudu du n; edeju i adeju chuu, i aku n.
Ma ñʼarewa e̩wñ adure du kʼi che ku ma dʼu biʼu ge̩ n; i fʼe̩wñ kʼo̩da je̩ kpʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa che me̩; i adeju chuu.
Amo̩ma abo-we̩ muda aka kakini, O̩na Ondu chʼokujo n: i muda chʼe-ma, o̩na e-ma chʼokujo n.
E̩gba kʼe̩no̩kpakpa rida bʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa-wñ te̩ kʼi la fʼudu fe̩, eku i aku tod uwñ.
Abe̩le̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩bibi rida bʼe̩wñ bibi-wñ te̩, kʼi la ache e̩wñ kʼoda je̩ kpʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa, edeju i adeju tod e-le̩.
Ame̩ muda kakini, O̩na Ondu chʼokujo n kpo̩. O abo unyi Israe̩l, Nakajo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ alu kʼo̩na o̩na-wñ de̩.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩gweji ku ma mu wa, ochu e̩ke̩gwa-wñ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩lu ochu le̩, kʼe̩ne̩ʼka kʼi fʼuma o̩wo̩ ra bo̩ Je̩rusale̩m te̩ lewʼugbo mi, i kakini, Ma fʼewo le̩ kpo̩fo̩ me̩.
O̩wo̩ Jihofa la nʼumi oji te̩ ane̩-wñ o̩gba tak e̩ne̩ kʼi fʼuma o̩wo̩ le̩ lewa; owñ la mʼalu-mi chi tak e̩ne̩ le̩ ki lewʼugbo mi odudu-wñ, oñ alu-mi muchite̩, u ño̩ chʼajalu ge̩ n.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, abo ku ma dodo egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta oj ane̩ Israe̩l le̩ aka kakini, Ebraham chʼe̩ne̩ʼkate, owñ la mʼane̩-i gba e̩wñ ogu; awa muda awe we; ma la mʼane̩-i du ñw a chʼe̩wñ ogu-wa.
Todule̩ e̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Ame̩ aje̩ e̩wñ manyʼe̩bie̩, me̩ la chʼeju-me̩ ago ode ode-me̩, me̩ laño̩ kʼe̩bie̩ dafo; ame̩ ñʼanʼane̩-i ge̩?
Me̩ dago jʼoj o̩kwo̩chageli, me̩ che e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ la akpʼo̩ya ekeji-wñ bie̩; oñ ame̩ ñʼanʼane̩-i ge̩?

Abu kʼuwe̩ aka ñwu ma de̩ kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Oji mi, abo ku ma jo̩ egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta le̩ awane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli chuu; oñ nadʼe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼegbili gbaa ñw ame̩wñ iñmi oko ku ma mʼu du je̩; abo ku ma la jo̩ ef aku kpʼef owo aku ñw e̩wñ ibi.
U la agwu ane̩-i alache̩ kpʼe̩wñ awuwu te̩; oñ uba ukpahiu-wñ ada; oj uwo uwo Israe̩l adʼalache̩ te̩, kʼone̩ ki we elale gu ef uwñ du.
Tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, e̩gba kʼu mʼane̩-i du chʼalache̩ kpʼe̩wñ awuwu te̩, tod e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ du ku ma che le̩.
I la chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩, amo̩ma abo-we̩ jʼo̩la o̩do̩ kpʼalu unyi anʼoluka-we̩ ache, ma la nako̩la ñw omune̩; e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ aka ñw o̩maye-wñ kakini, Lewa, agba, kʼe̩ gbo̩ o̩la kʼi akwʼugbo Jihofa wa.
Taku ma wʼugbo we̩ alu kʼamone̩ le̩ awa, oñ ma jʼane̩ o̩gba we̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼabo e-mi, ma la gbʼo̩la kʼe̩ ka, ma muda che n; todu ma nʼalu-ma ñʼone̩ ufe̩do̩, e̩do̩-ma la tile uji ku ma aje̩ ubi.
E̩ la go, e̩ dab eli ufe̩do̩ kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi nʼomu e̩rinyo̩ kʼi la anʼumolo e̩te̩le̩ ako̩; todu ma gbʼo̩la kʼe̩ ka, ma muda che n.
E̩gba kʼe̩wñ-i lewa che, go i awache! Taku ma ama ka kʼakache̩ te̩te̩dʼef uma ochochi.
Oñ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,

O̩ma one̩, kache̩ bʼamadide Israe̩l oji ma, kache̩, kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma, owñ chʼamadide le̩, kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Atogwo ñw amadide Israe̩l ki kʼuje̩wñ ñw o̩la-ma je̩! I dukpe̩ kʼamadide kʼi kʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini je̩ n?
Me̩ je̩ ula-wñ, me̩ la nʼedudu-wñ chʼukpo ubʼo̩la ma-me̩, me̩ fʼabo ki yoyo kpa, me̩ muda kʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini je̩ n.
Me̩ dʼukpahiu ñw aboga n, me̩ la fʼo̩ga e-kʼi chʼo̩ga che n, me̩ la fʼachiku ki guche̩ ji n, me̩ la dʼe-ku ma ne tinyo̩ dabiwa n, e-kʼi lenyo̩ me̩ la tejane̩ n; me̩ muda ne̩ ma kpʼukpahiu kpʼafuma.
Taku ma fiatuka, ukpe̩ kʼadide-ma ma de̩ n; ma la mud uje̩wñ ñw ame̩wñ iñmi oko du, oñ ma mukpatuka.
Ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini tale oj uwo uwo ki gbo̩gba chaka, kpʼoj otete okoke du, ochochi, ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini mukpatuka jʼeju ile̩ ugbo du; i la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi tejane̩ kpʼetene ma n.
Todule̩ ame̩ amadide ala le̩, me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa:

Oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa aka-i, todabu kʼame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini mud e̩wñ aluje̩, kʼame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini mud uje̩wñ ñw ame̩wñ iñmi oko chaka, todabu kʼadide ma de̩ n, kʼamadide e-mi ma la tejane̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini n, chai edʼuje̩wñ ñw o̩la-ma oñ amadide dʼuje̩wñ ñw o̩la-ma ku ma ma la kʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ e-mi egini je̩ n;
todule̩, ame̩ amadide ala, me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa kakini,

abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼamadide le̩; natene ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini o̩wo̩-ma, oñ nache ku ma we ekʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini le je̩; amadide le̩ lañʼakʼuje̩wñ ñw o̩la-ma ge̩ n; naño̩ gba ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini bʼalu-ma te̩, kʼama ki we echʼuje̩wñ ñwu ma.
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Go, omi onugo owñ chʼomi-i, atejane̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini, oñ natene ugbo ku ma jo.
Alu kʼadide atene abujo̩ e-wñ o̩jo̩ kʼi dʼef ame̩wño̩re̩-wñ egini ku ma mukpatuka, abe̩le̩ omi atene ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini; oñ nagba ma bʼugbo du ku ma kpatuka ru o̩jo̩ kʼomi du kʼane̩ la chubi te̩.

Omi la ako ma kwef amone̩ amone̩ dufu wa, kʼu ño̩ ko ma kwʼojane̩ ojane̩ wa jo̩, tak u nako ma wʼoj ane̩ e-ma onugo; tak omi akʼuje̩wñ ñwu ma je̩ oj uwo uwo Israe̩l o̩la o̩cha o̩cha omi-wñ, kpʼugbo du kʼone̩ dodo ane̩ le̩.
Omi akʼije̩ ki nyo̩ ñwu ma je̩. Iga-ma la adʼoj uwo uwo Israe̩l ki gbo̩gba: o̩mo̩ ma adachi jo̩ ef iga o̩me̩me̩le̩; ma ajo̩ oj uwo uwo Israe̩l ajʼije̩ ugbo kʼi ra nyo̩nyo̩.
Omi onugo achʼadide ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini oñ naje̩ ñwu ma dachi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.

U la atene e-ki lenyo̩ le̩, oñ nakʼe-ku ma ne tinyo̩ dabiwa, u la aji achiku ki muguche̩, oñ nadʼukpahiu ñw e-kʼi chʼo̩ga; u muda ako abo ki yoyo kpʼabo ki gbiti kpabie̩ rinyo̩; omi akʼije̩ ñwu ma je̩ lʼo̩na kʼoji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa ka.
I la chʼe-me̩, O, ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Go, omi akʼajo̩ agbagba e̩wño̩re̩ egini kpai e̩wño̩re̩ egini kpʼagbagba amokolo kpʼamobuko̩.
Ejo̩ ugbo ije̩ ki nyo̩ aje̩ chʼe̩wñ ke̩ke̩ eju-me̩, ku me̩ ño̩ nʼe̩re̩-me̩ fʼe̩bo̩bo̩ ije̩-me̩ kpetili mane̩? ku me̩ fʼomi ki de̩ gbaa ñmo̩, tak ame̩ nʼe̩re̩-me̩ fʼe̩bo̩bo̩-wñ bu?
I chʼe-ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini, e-kʼame̩ nʼe̩re̩-me̩ te̩mane̩, ama je̩. E-kʼame̩ nʼe̩re̩-me̩ bu, oñ ama ñmo̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka ñwu ma de̩ kakini, Go, omi de̩, omi akajo̩ agbagba e̩wño̩re̩ egini ki yoyo kpʼe̩wñ o̩re̩ egini ki gbo̩gbe̩.
Todabu ku me̩ nʼakolo kpʼojika ake̩che̩, ku me̩ la nʼigba igba-me̩ aro̩dʼabo̩ kʼo̩ga dʼo̩la-ma, gbogbo taku me̩ fʼuma fiatuka rʼo̩do̩da;
todule̩ omi ajadu ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini, ma ñʼachʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ge̩ n; oñ nakajo̩ agbagba e̩wñ ore̩ egini kpai e̩wñ o̩re̩ egini.
Tak u nadʼadide okate dago kʼi ne ma, owñ le̩ akʼuje̩wñ ma je̩, owñ chʼadu-mi Defid; owñ la akʼuje̩wñ ñwu ma je̩, owñ la achʼadide-ma.
Tak omi, Jihofa, achʼO̩jo̩-me̩, oñ adu-mi Defid achʼidachi ef uma; omi, Jihofa ka me̩.
Tak omi akpʼalo ure̩do̩ kpʼama, oñ naje̩ ñw ame̩wñ iñmi ki bie̩ne̩ ki takpa bʼane̩-i te̩; tak ama agugu jʼaje̩tachi to̩ko̩o̩, ma la adachi alolu efoko.
Oñ nache kʼama kpʼuña uña ki donyʼuwo-mi daka ki mud e̩nyo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ adʼu ñw one̩; u la aje̩ ñw omi ki lo̩ iko-wñ; e̩nyo̩ awa dab omi ki alo̩ gwo̩gwo̩-gwo̩.

Oli egbili la arʼe̩ro-wñ, ane̩-ile̩ la arʼo̩je̩, oñ ma ajo̩ ane̩-ma to̩koo̩. Taku ma ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼu fʼoli uno̩lo̩-ma guche̩, kʼu la mʼuma gba kwef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma ko ma chʼadu.
Ma ñʼachʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ge̩ n. Ame̩wñ iñmi ile̩-i lañʼako ma je̩ ge̩ n; ma muda ajo̩ to̩ko̩o̩, oñ e̩ne̩ du anyʼuma okpo n.
Tak omi adʼe̩wñ oko ki nʼuwohi gbe̩ kʼi atiga ñwu ma, ukpo̩ta la ñʼakpa ma ane̩ le̩ ge̩ n, anyo̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ñʼanʼuma oji ge̩ n.
Tak ama ama ka kʼomi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma, dʼugbo ma, ka kʼama abo unyi Israe̩l, chʼabo e-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Oñ ame̩, ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini, owñ chʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku me̩ jo̩ oki-je̩-mi, la chʼamone̩, omi, O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Anoji e-le̩ o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩ nafʼeju-we̩ kparʼuwo Seir kʼe̩ kache̩ bʼo ma,
kʼe̩ la ka ñw u kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼuwe̩, O uwo Seir, u la anʼo̩wo̩-mi dala akobʼuwe̩, oñ nadʼe̩ chʼalache̩ kpʼe̩wñ awuwu.
Nakʼewo ewo-we̩ chʼegbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta tak uwe̩ achʼalache̩ te̩; tak uwe̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Todabu kʼulaka-we̩ chʼo̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, kʼe̩ la kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l rʼef ukpahiu o̩kwo̩chageli iko uchobi-ma, owñ chʼiko udu echi otitala;
todule̩ Oji-mi! Ondu Jihofa ka-i, omi añwʼuwe̩ che te̩ ñw e̩bie̩, e̩bie̩ la ara nʼuwe̩: abu kʼe̩bie̩ ma chʼe̩wñ ulaka-we̩ n, mak e̩bie̩ aranʼuwe̩.
Abe̩le̩ omi ache kʼuwo Seir ki mud alache̩ e-alache̩; oñ nakʼe̩ne̩ ki alale gu ef uwñ du kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi adabiwa da rinyo̩ bʼo̩ te̩.
Omi la ache kʼuwo uwo-wñ ki ko̩ ñw abo-wñ ku ma kpa; abo ku ma nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa awane̩ o̩la uwo uwo-we̩ kpʼef o̩go̩ o̩go̩-we̩ kpʼo̩na o̩na omi-we̩ chaka.
Omi ache kʼe̩ mud achigodo gbogbo alo, one̩ ñʼadodo ewo ewo-we̩ ge̩ n. Tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Todabu kʼe̩ kakini, Abo uche̩ichi meji-i kpʼane̩ meji-i omi ane̩, awa la agba ñw o̩la-wa; dagba Jihofa chaka do̩mo̩;
todule̩, Oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa aka-i, Nache teju uwe̩do̩ e-we̩, kpai teju ulie̩na-we̩ e-kʼe̩ che ma kwef ulaka-ma kʼe̩ che; oñ naje̩ ñw ma ma mi ef uma e̩gba kʼu fʼajo̩-we̩ ka kpa.
Tak uwe̩ ama ka kʼomi, Jihofa, gbo̩ icha du kʼe̩ ka ñw uwo uwo Israe̩l, kakini, Ma fʼuma gwʼalache̩, ma mʼu ko ñw a kʼa fʼuma lie̩ me̩.
Oñ me̩ nʼalu-me̩ bukpa tʼo̩la-me̩ chagwunyʼumi; o̩la-me̩ ku me̩ ka nyʼumi la nana nyo̩gba; omi gbʼo̩ me̩.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, e̩gba kʼile̩ du do̩mo̩ agwoguyo̩, naje̩ ñw e̩ chʼalache̩ te̩.
Alu kʼe̩ gwoguyo̩ rʼe̩wñ ogu abo unyi Israe̩l oji, abu ki mud alache̩ te̩, abe̩le̩ omi achʼuwe̩. Uwe̩ achʼalache̩, O uwo Seir, kpai Ido̩m chaka, e-du abo n; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
I la chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩, e̩ nakache̩ ñw uwo uwo Israe̩l, kʼe̩ kakini, Ame̩ uwo uwo Israe̩l, me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼe̩nebi le̩ ka chʼagwunyʼume̩ kakini, Ibaa! kpai, A fʼotete otete igbele igbele le̩ ne̩ ñw o̩la-wa me̩;

todule̩ e̩ nakache̩ kʼe̩ kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Todu, owñ chʼutodu ku ma fʼume̩ gwʼalache̩, ku ma la kʼame̩ mi o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du, ku me̩ ki mud e̩wñ kʼe̩bobo abo uche̩ichi ane̩, kʼamako̩la la mʼume̩ ko nʼalu aka, ku me̩ mud inabali e̩bie̩ne̩ ugbo amone̩;

todule̩ ame̩ uwo uwo Israe̩l, me̩ gbʼo̩la Ondu Jihofa; Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka ñw uwo uwo ki gbo̩gba kpʼuwo uwo du, kpʼo̩cha ocha omi, kpʼo̩go̩ o̩go̩, kpʼegbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta ugbo kʼe̩wñ du ma de̩ n, kpʼewo ewo ku ma hi tinyo̩ le̩, e-ki mud e̩wñ aluje̩ kpʼe̩wñ anyi ñw e̩bobo abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma jo̩ daka-i;

todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Ochochi, ef una ogu e̩ja-mi oñ omi fʼo̩la ka nyʼe̩bo̩bo̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, kpai nyʼabo Ido̩m, ku ma fʼo̩la ane̩-mi kpe̩ ñw o̩la-ma kpʼuyo̩ ef e̩do̩-ma chaka kpʼe̩de̩te̩ ki dʼef onugo-ma chaka, kʼama ki ne̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ñwu ma.

Todule̩ e̩ nakache̩ o̩la ane̩ Israe̩l, kʼe̩ la ka ñw uwo uwo kpʼotete otete kpʼo̩cha o̩eha omi-wñ, kpʼo̩go̩ o̩go̩-wñ kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi ka ef ogu eja-mi kpʼef e̩do̩fulu-mi, todabu ku me̩ te̩tanʼadu anyo̩ kʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi le̩ ko mʼume̩;
todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, U mʼo̩wo̩-mi du nyate̩ kakini, Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma jo̩ lʼume̩ daka-i anʼadu anyo̩ e-ma onugo.
I muda chʼame̩, O uwo uwo Israe̩l, ame̩ apa oñ e̩to̩-me̩ aya, me̩ la arʼe̩ro-me̩ ñw abo-mi Israe̩l; todu ama me̩rʼo̩wo̩, ma awʼunyi fai fai.
Todu, go, omi chʼe̩ne̩-me̩, u la arida abʼume̩, ma aluche̩ o̩mo̩, ma agbe̩ e̩wñ;
naje̩ ñw amone̩ ki wewe oji-we̩, owñ chʼo̩gbo̩dudu abo unyi Israe̩l, o̩chaka-wñ naka-i; one̩ la dodo ewo ewo-wñ, oñ ma akʼunyi egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta le̩;

u la aje̩ ñw one̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ki wewe nyo̩gba oji-we̩; oñ ma awewe, ma la abi o̩ma jo̩, oñ naje̩ ñw one̩ dodo ef ume̩ alu ki te̩te de ñwu me̩ o̩gbo̩gba; u la ache enyo̩ ñwu me̩ tʼe-uchane̩-me̩ le̩ le̩ ñwu me̩; tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Ochochi, naje̩ ñw amone̩ ki lule̩ oji-we̩, owñ chʼabo-mi Israe̩l; ama le̩ ane̩ we̩, uwe̩ la ache e̩wñ ogu-ma; e̩ ñʼakʼuma o̩ma ate̩to̩gba-i ge̩ n.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Todabu ku ma ka ñw e̩ kakini, Uwe̩ chʼakʼone̩ mi, uwe̩ te̩takʼamo̩ma abo uche̩ichi-we̩,
todule̩ uwe̩ ñʼakʼamone̩ mi ge̩ n, uwe̩ la akʼamo̩ma abo uche̩ichi-we̩ ge̩ n, Ondu Jihofa ka-i;
omi lañʼaje̩ ñw e̩ gbo̩ anyo̩ kʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ako mʼuwe̩ ge̩ n; e̩ la anʼadu ina kʼamone̩ amone̩ abʼe̩ ge̩ n. E̩ lañʼaje̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi-we̩ ki wane̩ ge̩ n, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Abe̩le̩ ge̩ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, e̩gba kʼabo unyi Israe̩l dodo ane̩ e-ma le̩, ma nʼo̩na e-ma kpʼe̩wñ ku ma che fʼu daji: o̩na-ma ku ma le eju-mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼiwa onobule̩ kʼi achʼelifo̩-wñ.
Todule̩ oñ u dʼe̩do̩fulu-mi danyʼuma oji tod e̩bie̩ ku ma du dajʼane̩ le̩, kpai todabu ku ma nʼode ode̩-ma fʼu daji.
U la fʼuma fiatuka rʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, oñ ma mukpatuka rʼoj ane̩ ane̩; u fʼajo̩ ka teju o̩na o̩na-ma kpai teju e̩wñ ku ma che̩.
Tak e̩gba ku ma lewa ugbo abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, ugbo ku ma nyi le̩, ma fʼodu-mi kiafo̩ kpabie̩; owñ chʼabu kʼamone̩ nʼo̩la-ma aka kakini, Abo Jihofa jo̩-i, ma la kwo bʼoj ane̩-wñ te̩ me̩.
Odu-mi kiafo̩ le̩ muda wʼumi eju, owñ chʼe-kʼabo unyi Israe̩l fʼu kpabie̩ te̩ ef abo uche̩-ichi uche̩ichi ugbo ku ma nyi le̩.

Todule̩ e̩ naka ñw abo unyi Israe̩l, kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, I chʼutodu me̩ oñ nache-i n, O abo unyi Israe̩l, chai todu odu-mi kiafo̩, e-kʼame̩ fʼu kpabie̩ ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ugbo ku me̩ nyi le̩.

U la ache kʼodu-mi inaina ki fo̩, owñ chʼe-ku ma fʼu kpabie̩ te̩ ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, owñ chʼe-kʼame̩ fʼu kpabie̩ alumeji-ma le̩; tak abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, Ondu Jihofa aka-i, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼomi afo̩ ef ume̩ eju e-me̩.
Todu omi ako me̩ kwef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, kʼu la ako me̩ kwʼoj ane̩ ane̩ du wa jo̩, oñ nako ma wa oj ane̩ e-me̩ onugo.
Omi la adʼomiofo ki fe̩ tafiʼume̩ o̩la, taku me̩ afe̩. Nache ku me̩ fe̩ bʼe̩wñ iwa-me̩ du kpʼode-me̩ du te̩.
Naño̩ dʼe̩do̩ etito̩ ñwu me̩, oñ nadʼafu etito̩ tʼume̩ efu; u la adʼe̩do̩ okuta le̩ bʼef o̩re̩la-me̩ te̩, oñ nadʼe̩do̩ o̩re̩la ñwu me̩.
TakunadʼAfu e-mi tʼume̩ efu, kʼu naje̩ ñw me̩ lule̩ ef uhio̩me̩-mi, tak ame̩ ade oji ajo̩-mi o̩kpakpa ku me̩ che teju-wñ.
Me̩ la adodo oj ane̩ kʼomi du ñw amata-me̩; me̩ la achʼa bo-e-mi, oñ omi achʼO̩jo̩ e-me̩.
U la agba me̩ bʼe̩wñ iwa-me̩ du te̩; tak u nado̩ e̩wñ e̩yo̩ omu wa, oñ naje̩ ñw u nʼawo; u ñʼadʼo̩kpo̩ta nʼume̩ oji ge̩ n.
U la aje̩ ñw e̩ro oli kpʼe̩wñ oko ki nʼawo, kʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi kʼi ño̩ bʼume̩ na tod o̩kpo̩ta ge̩ n.
E̩gbale̩ ame̩ arewa o̩na o̩na-me̩ ki bie̩ne̩ ku me̩ le le̩, kpʼe̩wñ ku me̩ che ki ma nyo̩ n; tak ame̩ amud e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ eju o̩la-me̩, tod udu ku me̩ fe̩ kpʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ kʼame̩ che.
I chʼutodu e-me̩ oñ nache-i n, Ondu Jihofa aka-i, ame̩ ki fʼe-le̩ ma. Anyo̩ o̩na o̩na-me̩ ki mu me̩, ibe-me̩ ki mudajugu ke, O abo unyi Israe̩l.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ kʼomi agwe̩ me̩ ku me̩ fe̩ bʼada du ku me̩ je̩ te̩, naje̩ ñw amone̩ ki dodo ewo ewo-i, oñ ma akʼunyi egbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta le̩.
Taku ma aluche̩ ane̩ ki te̩te̩chʼoku ane̩ te̩, abu ki chaka chʼalache̩ te̩ eju e̩ne̩ du kʼi alale.
Tak ama kakini, Ane̩ ki chʼoku ane̩ te̩-i dabe̩ne̩ kʼuche̩ Ide̩n abajo̩-i; oñ ewo ewo ki chihi, ki chʼachigodo ki chʼuchodo̩ te̩ le̩ chʼenʼaku aku oñ amone̩ dodo jʼo̩mo̩ me̩.
Tak abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi kibo̩ ku ma jo̩ lʼume̩ daka ama ka kʼomi, Jihofa, fʼugbo ki chʼucho̩do̩ ne, kʼu laño̩ fʼe̩wñ gbe̩ ugbo ki chʼoku ane̩ akwoubi le̩; omi Jihofa ka me̩, omi la ache.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, abo unyi Israe̩l atʼuiru ene e̩wñ-i todu kʼu che ñwu ma; omi aje̩ ñw one̩-ma wewe nyo̩gba dab ame̩wño̩re̩ egini.

Dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kiafo̩, dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini Je̩rusale̩m e̩gba uje̩wñ uyo̩ ku ma dʼiko-wñ te̩, abe̩le̩ ewo ewo ki chihi te̩ ako̩ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma chʼone̩; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
O̩wo̩ Jihofa nʼumi oji, oñ i dʼumi dufu ef Afu Jihofa wʼo̩doda, i la dʼumi guane̩ alumeji o̩go̩ le̩; i la che̩ko̩ ñw achiku.
Tak i je̩ ñwu mi lale gu ef uwñ du ugbo tʼugbo du. E̩ la go, i la wewe tabale ef o̩go̩ ki te̩ gbaa le̩; e̩ la go, i la chʼe̩gbe̩ nana.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, achiku-i neke adeju? Oñ u dobi kakini, O Ondu Jihofa, uwe̩ ma.
Tak i ño̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, Kache̩ bʼachiku-i ma, kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, O ame̩ achiku e̩gbe̩-i, me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa ke.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka ñw achiku-i de̩, kakini, Go, omi aje̩ ñw iñmi mugudu tʼef ume̩, oñ ame̩ adeju.
Nako ili nyʼume̩, u la ñʼakʼo̩re̩la wa abʼume̩ ma, oñ nadʼaño̩ bʼume̩ ma, kʼu nadʼafu tʼume̩ efu, tak ame̩ adeju; oñ ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
Abe̩le̩ u kwokache̩ alu ku ma ñwa ñwu mi. Oñ abu kʼu do̩mo̩ akache̩, ekuku chane̩, e̩ la go ane̩ kwomiejo; tak achiku achiku le̩ hi mʼomune̩, achiku du kwokado achiku e-wñ.
Tak u go, oñ go, ili la manyʼu, oñ o̩re̩la mute̩gu wa, año̩ la bʼuma ma; afu du muda dʼef uma n.

Tak I ka ñwu mi kakini, Kache̩ ñw afu, kache̩, uwe̩ o̩ma one̩, kʼe̩ la ka ñw afu kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, E̩ kwʼugbo afu me̩le̩ le̩ wa, O afu, kʼe̩ ñmirʼabo ku ma kpa-i, kʼama ki deju.
Abe̩le̩ u kache̩ alu kʼi ñwa ñwu mi, oñ afu iñmi mugudu ʼtef uma taku ma deju, oñ ma mʼe̩re̩-ma ko dʼane̩ dago, uwewe-ma nana tabale.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, achiku achiku-i chʼo̩gbo abo unyi Israe̩l chaka. Go, ama kakini, Achi-ku-wa gbe̩ rinyo̩, ukjbeno-wa la lenyo̩; ma fʼuwa ko̩da rinyo̩ hioko.
Todule̩ e̩ nakache̩, kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Me̩ go, omi abi alu ura-me̩, oñ naje̩ ñwu me̩ kwʼef ura-me̩ dufu, O abo-mi; u la ako me̩ wa ane̩ Israe̩l.
Tak ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼu mʼalu ura-me̩ bi, kʼu la je̩ ñwu me̩ mute̩gu kwʼef ura-me̩ dufu wa, O abo-mi.
Tak u nadu Afu-mi tʼef ume̩, oñ ame̩ adeju, tak u nako me̩ jʼoj ane̩ e-me̩ onugo: oñ ame̩ ama ka kʼomi Jihofa ka, u laño̩ che ge̩, Jihofa ka-i.
O̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo mi ge̩ kakini,

I la chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩, mʼoliʼka du, kʼe̩ ko̩ nyʼu kakini, Todu Juda kpai tod amo̩ma Israe̩l ame̩nu-mana-wñ le̩; tak e̩ mʼoli omune̩ du, kʼe̩ ko̩ nyʼu kakini, Todu Jose̩f, oli e-Ifraim, kpʼabo unyi Israe̩l ame̩numana-wñ le̩ chaka;
tak e̩ mʼama meji koga mʼomune̩ ñw o̩la-we̩ ki mud oli okate, kʼama ki mud okate ef o̩wo̩-we̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼamo̩ma abo-we̩ aka ñw e̩ kakini, Uwe̩ aña wa e̩wñ ki chʼofe e̩wñ kʼe̩ che-i n?

E̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi adʼoli Jose̩f, kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ Ifraim, kpʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l ame̩nu-mana-wñ le̩, oñ nako ma dama kpʼoli e-Juda le̩, kʼu fʼuma che oli okate, tak ama achʼokate ef o̩wo̩-mi.
Oñ oli kʼe̩ ko̩ e̩wñ nyʼu le̩ ajʼef o̩wo̩-we̩ eju-ma.

Tak e̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi akʼamo̩ma Israe̩l kwef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ugbo ku ma nyi le̩ dufu oñ nako ma kwʼo̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ ugbo tʼugbo du wa jo̩, kʼu nako ma wʼane̩ e-ma onugo.
Tak u nako ma che abo uche̩ichiʼka oj ane̩-i, oj uwo uwo Israe̩l; onuʼkate la achʼonu-ma chaka; ma ñʼachʼuche̩ichi meji ge̩ n, ma ñʼakpe̩ rʼojane̩ ojane̩ amonu meji ate̩tʼo̩gba-i ge̩ n.

Ma lañʼanʼode ode-ma kpʼe̩wñ-ma ki akʼone̩ e̩do̩fulu ire̩, kpai ada ku ma je̩ fʼo̩la-ma daji ge̩ n; omi muda ajadu ma kwʼugbo ku ma dodo ku ma dure le̩ chaka; u la agwe̩ ma hiolo; abe̩le̩ taku ma achʼabo-mi, oñ omi achʼO̩jo̩ e-ma.
Taku Defid, adu-mi, ajʼonu-ma, o̩chaka-ma la anʼadide okate; ma la alule̩ tʼeju oji ajo̩-mi o̩kpakpa, ma la ade e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, ku ma che teju-wñ.
Ma la adodo oj ane̩ kʼu du ñw adu-mi Jekob ugbo kʼamata-me̩ dodo le̩; o̩mo̩ ma la adodo jo̩, ama kpʼamo̩ma-ma kpʼamaaju-ma ogbegbele̩; oñ Defid, adu-mi Je̩, achʼidachi-ma ogbegbele̩ ge̩.
Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, omi akpʼalo ure̩do̩ kpʼama; alo e-ogbegbele̩ i ache ñwu ma. Omi la ako ma jo̩, kʼu la aje̩ ñwu ma wewe nyo̩gba, oñ nadʼuña-mi kiafo̩ tʼalumeji ma ogbegbele̩.
Uña ugugu-mi ñʼabʼuma oji ma, oñ omi achʼO̩jo̩ e-ma, ama la achʼabo e-mi.
Tak abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ama ka kʼomi, Jihofa, ache ñw abo Israe̩l ku ma fo̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼuña-mi kiafo̩ adʼalumeji-ma o̩gbegbele̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, fʼeju-we̩ kparu Go̩g e-ane̩ Mago̩g, kʼi chʼidachi ki tʼo̩gba Ro̩sh kpai Me̩she̩k kpai Tubal, kʼe̩ kache̩ bʼo ma,
kʼe̩ ka kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyu-we̩, O Go̩g, idachi ki tʼo̩gba e-Ro̩sh kpai Me̩she̩k kpai Tubal le̩.

Omi la arʼuwe̩ da tʼubi, oñ nakʼuwo̩ tunyʼalu-we̩, u la akʼuwe̩ kpʼabogu-we̩ chaka tʼamanya tʼamananya dufu, o̩chaka-ma fʼo̩lʼogu ji kpa, o̩wo̩ one̩ lile ku ma ne̩ o̩kpatabe̩li kpʼugbe̩yo̩, o̩kwo̩chageli jʼo̩wo̩-ma chaka;
Pe̩r-sia kpai Kush kpai Put manyʼuma, o̩chaka-ma nʼugbe̩yo̩ kpʼukata ebije;
Go̩me̩r kpʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka; abo unyi Togama, otitala o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩, kpʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ chaka; owñ chʼamone̩ wewe ku ma amanyʼuwe̩.
Fʼo̩la-we̩ mu, ochochi, fʼo̩la-we̩ mu, uwe̩ kpai o̩wo̩ one̩ ku ma jeju ugbo we̩ le̩, kʼuwe̩ ki chʼonu ogu ñwu ma.

E̩ jʼo̩jo̩ wewe taku ma awa fejudʼe̩: iko o̩do̩ e-otitala uwe̩ agudu tʼoj ane̩ ku ma bʼo̩kwo̩chageli gba, ku ma ya kwʼef amone̩ amone̩ wewe jo̩, oj uwo uwo Israe̩l, ki te̩te̩chʼegbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta; ku ma muda du kwef amone̩ amone̩ wa, taku ma adodo jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩, o̩chaka-ma.
Uwe̩ la ate̩gu, uwe̩ awa dab omi ki du awa, uwe̩ la adab akpa kʼe̩ bʼoj ane̩ le̩ ma, uwe̩ kpʼo̩wo̩ o̩wo̩ one̩-we̩ chaka, kpʼamone̩ amone̩ wewe manyʼuwe̩.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, I awatu o̩jo̩ le̩ kʼibe e̩wñ awʼef uwe̩, tak uwe̩ añwa ibe e̩bie̩ne̩;
uwe̩ la aka kakini, Nate̩gu nyʼane̩ kʼewo ewo-wñ ma nʼaku n; nanyʼugbo abo ku ma jʼañmi, ku ma jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩ le̩, o̩chaka-ma jo̩ ofo ma nʼaku n, ma la nʼoli otuka n, ma la nʼe̩wñ ki are alaku n;

kʼu mʼe̩wñ kʼogu aje̩ ko, kpʼe̩wñ aluje̩; kʼe̩ rʼo̩wo̩-we̩ da akobʼegbili e̩lanyi kpʼokuta ugbo kʼamone̩ dodo jo abajo̩-i, kpai akobʼamone̩ ku ma ya kwef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi le̩ jo̩, ku ma nʼame̩wñ ukpa kpʼane̩ ku ma dodo alumeji ane̩-ile̩.

Shiba kpai Dedan kpʼamachinyama Tarshish, manyʼamo̩ma idu-wñ chaka aka ñw e̩ kakini, Uwe̩ wa kʼe̩ kʼane̩ je̩? uwe̩ kʼo̩gbadu-we̩ jeju kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ko? kʼe̩ mʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia ko? kʼe̩ mʼame̩wñ ukpa kpʼane̩ ko, kʼe̩ kʼane̩ e̩kute̩ je̩?
Todule̩, o̩ma one̩, e̩ kache̩ kʼe̩ ka ñwu Gog, kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ kʼabo-mi Israe̩l jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩ le̩, uwe̩ ama n?
Tak uwe̩ akwo uña-we̩ kwʼugbo ki chʼotitala o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩, owñ chʼuwe̩ kpʼamone̩ amone̩ wewe manyʼuwe̩, o̩chaka-ma atʼanʼamanya, o̩gbadu ma atabale, abogu-wñ la agbiti;

tak uwe̩ ate̩gu wa kʼe̩ kobo̩ abo-mi Israe̩l, dabe̩ne̩ kʼakpa ki abʼoj ane̩ ma. Oñ i awache iko o̩jo̩ otitala, kʼomi adʼuwe̩ wa akobʼane̩-mi kʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki fʼumi ma, e̩gba kʼu chʼo̩la-mi kʼu fo̩ alumeji-we̩ eju-ma, O Go̩g.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼomi nʼo̩la-wñ aka igbegbele alu amadu-mi amakache̩ Israe̩l kʼama kache̩ iko le̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩do̩ wewe ka kʼomi ma du we̩ wa akobʼuma?
I la awache iko le̩, e̩gba ku Go̩g awa kobʼane̩ Israe̩l, Ondu Jihofa ka-i, tak e̩do̩fulu-mi ate̩gu tʼumi eju.
Todu ef ogu-mi kʼu naja, kpʼef una o̩fu e̩do̩-mi u ka, kakini, O̩jo̩ le̩ emiejo inaina ade̩ ane̩ Israe̩l chuu;

kʼame̩ja ohimini kpʼame̩we̩ ojale, kpʼame̩wñ iñmi egbili kpʼe̩wñ du ki afa, kʼi afa ane̩pe̩te̩, kpʼamone̩ du ku ma jo̩ eju ile̩-i, amiejo eju-mi ki dane̩ o̩mo̩, uwo uwo ki gbo̩gba agulo̩ wane̩, oñ ugbo ki dago kpakpa awane̩, aku aku du la awʼane̩pe̩te̩.
Tak u nadʼudo̩ ugbo du uwo uwo-mi kʼo̩kwo̩chageli ki lewa akobʼo̩. O̩kwo̩chageli e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ akobʼo̩maye-wñ.
Oñ u nanʼe̩wñ ibi kpʼe̩bie̩ bʼo̩ kajo̩; u la aje̩ ñw omi akiliwo kpʼokuta o̩mo̩jo̩cha lile kpʼuna kpʼitolu ki lo̩ bʼowñ kpʼo̩wo̩ abo-wñ kpʼamone̩ amone̩ wewe ku ma jʼugbo-wñ ma.
Tak u nache kʼomi onugo anana eju-ma, kʼu ño̩ fo̩, oñ naje̩ ñwu ma fʼumi ma eju abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi wewe; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
I lachʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩, kache̩ bi Go̩g ma, kʼe̩ ka kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼuwe̩, O Go̩g, idachi Ro̩sh kpai Me̩she̩k kpai Tubal le̩;
oñ narʼuwe̩ da, tak u nanʼe̩ alo, oñ naje̩ ñw e̩ mute̩gu kwʼugbo ki chʼotitala o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ wa; u la adʼuwe̩ wa oj uwo uwo Israe̩l,
tak u nadʼe̩wñ gwʼo̩o̩do̩-we̩ bʼo̩wo̩-we̩ awohi te̩, oñ naje̩ ñw o̩fa-we̩ ñwa nʼane̩ bʼo̩wo̩-we̩ awo̩to̩ te̩.

Uwe̩ awane̩ oj uwo uwo Israe̩l, uwe̩, kpʼo̩wo̩ o̩wo̩ amone̩-we̩ chaka, kpai amone̩ amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo we̩. Nadʼe̩ ñw ame̩we̩ uche̩ uche̩ du ku ma chʼe̩ño̩ e̩la, kpʼame̩wñ iñmi egbili ku ma mʼe̩ du je̩.
Uwe̩ awane̩ egbili gbaa; todu omi ka me̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Tak u nadʼuna kpuche̩ ru Mago̩g, kpʼabʼoji abo ku ma dodo to̩ko̩o̩ o̩lʼomi omi ma; tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩.
U la aje̩ ñwu ma fʼodu-mi kiafo̩ ma alumeji abo-mi Israe̩l; u lañʼaje̩ ñwu ma fʼodu-mi kiafo̩ kpabie̩ ge̩ n; tak abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, kʼu chʼe̩ne̩ kiafo̩ efu Israe̩l.
Go, i awa, i la ache, Ondu Jihofa ka-i; O̩jo̩ kʼomi te̩tako̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ de̩.

Tak abo ku ma dodo ewo ewo Israe̩l adufu, oñ ma anʼido̩na ogu kʼuna ku ma gujo rinyo̩, tʼo̩kpatabeli, tʼugbe̩yo, tʼo̩o̩do̩, tʼo̩fa, kpai ugbolo ku ma ko nʼo̩wo̩, kpʼo̩kwo̩chageli, oñ ma anʼabʼe-le̩ kʼuna o̩do̩ mebie;

todule̩ ma ñʼachʼiji kwʼoko wa n, ma la alo̩ oli efoko wane̩ n, todu ama anʼe̩wñ ido̩na ogu le̩ kʼuna; oñ abo ku ma ko ma che e̩wñ kʼogu je̩ le̩ amud e̩wñ kʼogu e-ma je̩, ma la akʼabo ku ma ko ma chʼe̩wñ aluje̩ chʼe̩wñ aluje̩ e-ma, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.

Oñ i awache iko le̩, kʼomi adʼuña kʼi aji one̩-wñ ñw Go̩g oj ane̩ Israe̩l, owñ chʼogo̩ abo ku ma lale gudu kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ olodudu ohimini abadi le̩ e-le̩ akpʼo̩na nyʼabo ku ma lale gudu ku ma we ele; o̩mo̩ ma ako Go̩g kpʼo̩wo̩ one̩-wñ ji chaka, ma la adʼodu o̩mo̩ ko̩ O̩go̩ Hamo̩n-go̩g.
Abo unyi Israe̩l ajʼef oku-ma eji ochu mebie kʼama ki fʼane̩ le̩ gwo rinyo̩.
Ochochi, o̩chaka abo ane̩-i ako ma ji; oñ i amud e̩wñ uwohi ñwu ma o̩jo̩ kʼu fʼojima-mi ne̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Ma la achi amone̩ tʼef uko̩lo̩ le̩ ku ma atale ane̩-i e̩gbadu, oñ abo ku ma akʼoku one̩ ki bo̩ oj ane̩-i ji ale bʼabo ku ma tale le̩ ku ma fʼu gwo rinyo̩; ochu mebie le̩ ki jo̩ taku ma atejane̩.
Tak abo ku ma tale oj ane̩-i alale gu ef uwñ du, oñ e̩gba ku ma fʼachiku one̩ li ma adʼujiwe-wñ dago, gbogbo tak abo ku ma kʼone̩ ji lewa mʼu du aji ef o̩go̩ Hamon-go̩g,
(ma la ñʼadʼewoʼka ko̩ Hamo̩na ge̩). Abe̩le̩ ma ache kʼane̩ le̩ ki fe̩.

I la chʼuwe̩, o̩ma one̩, abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, E̩ nako̩la ñw ame̩we̩ uche̩ uche̩ du, kpʼame̩wñ iñmi egbili okoke du kakini, Me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ jeju, ku me̩ lewa; kʼo̩la-me̩ wa jo̩ o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du ñw iche̩bo̩-mi kʼu nache todu me̩, owñ chʼiche̩bo̩ akakata oj uwo uwo Israe̩l kʼame̩ ki je̩ o̩re̩la ku ma ñmo̩ e̩bie̩.
Ame̩ aje̩ o̩re̩la amagbiti, me̩ la añmo̩ e̩bie̩ amidachi ile̩, e-amo̩kolo kpʼamo̩mala kpʼe-amo̩buko̩ kpʼamo̩kokuno̩, iche̩ka-ma chʼamala Beshan ki yoyo le̩.
Ame̩ la ajʼula gbogbo tak efu-me̩ ko̩, me̩ la añmo̩ e̩bie̩ gbogbo tak i mu me̩, owñ chʼe-iche̩bo̩-mi kʼu che todu me̩.
Efu-me̩ la ako̩ ñw amanya kpʼabo ku ma gwa o̩kogu kpʼamagbiti kpʼabogu chaka oj itebulu e-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Tak omi adʼojima-mi te̩ ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi; oñ abo uche̩ichi du ali oj ajo̩-mi kʼu che teju-wñ, kpʼo̩wo̩-mi kʼu du nʼuma oji.
Abe̩le̩ abo unyi Israe̩l ama ka kʼomi Jihofa, O̩jo̩-ma de̩, akwʼo̩jo̩ le̩ nyʼate̩to̩gba-wñ.

Tak abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ama ka kʼabo unyi Israe̩l nyʼef amu tod udu ku ma fe̩; todabu ku ma fʼada-mi je̩, kʼu la meju-mi du maja bʼuma te̩; abe̩le̩ omi mʼuma ko jʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩no̩la-ma. O̩chaka-ma lewane̩ alu o̩kwo̩chageli.
Teju alu kʼiwa-ma de̩ kpai teju alu kʼada ku ma je̩ de̩, oñ u che ma; u la mʼeju-mi du maja bʼuma te̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de kakini, Fai tak u narʼamu Jeko̩b da, oñ nail o̩gbo abo unyi Israe̩l du ejumomi; oñ najogu tod odu-mi kiafo.
Ma agbenyo anyo̩-ma kpʼo̩wo̩ ku ma du tef ukpo aro ñwu mi chaka, e̩gba ku ma gugu oj ane̩-ma to̩ko̩o̩. E̩ne̩ du la anyʼuma okpo n,
e̩gba kʼu mʼuma ko kwʼef amone̩ amone̩ wa kʼu ño̩ mʼuma yajo̩ kwʼoj ane̩ oj ane̩ ame̩nebi-ma, kʼu la mud e̩ne̩ kiafo̩ ef uma eju abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi wewe.
Tak ama ama ka kʼomi Jihofa, O̩jo̩-ma de̩, oñ chʼabu kʼu je̩ ñwu ma nyʼef amu ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, kʼu laño̩ mʼuma ko wa oj ane̩-ma ajo̩; u ñʼatʼe̩ne̩ du ef uma no tʼo̩mo̩ ge̩ n;
u lañʼadʼeju-mi maja bʼuma te̩ ge̩ n; todu u mʼAfu-mi du danyʼunyi abo Israe̩l, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
O̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩lu ku ma mu wa lo, e̩gba uchane̩ o̩do̩ le̩, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwa ochu, owñ chʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ku ma kpʼewo le̩ fo̩, eñeñini o̩jo̩ le̩, o̩wo̩ Jihofa nʼumi oji, oñ i mʼumi du nyʼomo̩.
Ef ane̩ ego e-O̩jo̩ i mʼumi du nyʼoj ane̩ Israe̩l, oñ i mʼumi du gugu oj uwo ki gbo̩gba tabale. E̩wñ ki dab akala ewo dʼoji-wñ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩.
Oñ i mʼumi du nyʼo̩mo̩; e̩ la go, one̩ dʼo̩mo̩, e̩ go i dabe̩ne̩ kʼebije ikpa eju, i nʼiku owu o̩wo̩-wñ kpʼelikpo uñwa; oñ i dago alaku-wñ.

Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, e̩ nʼeju-we̩ go, kʼe̩ la nʼeti-we̩ gbo̩, kʼe̩ dʼe̩do̩-we̩ tʼe̩wñ du kʼu nadu ña we̩; todu ma dʼe̩ wʼemi kʼu kʼe̩wñ-i ñʼuwe̩; e̩wñ du kʼe̩ li e̩ mudu ka ñw abo unyi Israe̩l.

E̩ la go, aku la chʼe̩bu lʼunyi le̩ daka, elikpo uñwa-wñ la dʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ le̩, ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa, ohiba e-le̩ chʼowoʼka nyʼo̩gabaʼka oji; abe̩le̩ i fʼukpa o̩do̩-wñ ñwa, elikpoʼka, o̩gba-wñ la chʼelikpoʼka ge̩.
Tak i lewa ugbo alaku kʼi akpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu, oñ i mute̩gu ubo̩-wñ, tak i fʼalugbo̩na-wñ ñwa, unabe̩-wñ chʼelikpoʼka; kpʼalugbo̩na ekeji, i ño̩ chʼelikpoʼka ge̩.
Ujiji unyi ide-wñ du chʼelikpoʼka, unabe̩-wñ la chʼelikpoʼka; owe agbagba unyi ide unyi ide chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu; oñ alugbo̩na alaku kʼi dʼugbo agbnru alaku o̩wo̩ unyi le̩ chʼelikpoʼka ge̩.
I ño̩ fʼagbaru alaku o̩wo̩ unyi le̩ ñwa, i chʼelikpoʼka.
Tak i fʼagbaru alaku ñwa, ohibo̩wo̩ me̩jo̩; kpʼoli ugbogaga-wñ, ohibo̩wo̩ meji eji, agbaru alaku le̩ la dʼo̩wo̩ unyi.
Unyi ide unyi ide alaku o̩wo̩ olodudu chʼe̩ta ej emi, kpʼe̩ta ej ano̩mo̩; e̩ñwa e̩te̩ta-wñ chʼokate; oli ugbogaga-wñ laño̩ chʼe̩ñwaʼka e-ejemi kpʼe-ejano̩mo̩-wñ.
Tak i fʼunabe̩ alu o̩na ñwa, ohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa; kpʼujiji alaku-wñ, i chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwe̩ta.
Ajita la dʼo̩gba unyi ide le̩ okoke; o̩wo̩ʼka ajita le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka, o̩wo̩ ekeji ño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka; unyi ide le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa o̩wo̩ mejeji-wñ.
Tak i fʼalaku ñwa akwo ojokunyi unyi ideʼka kad ojokunyi ekeji, unabe̩-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogue̩lu; alugbo̩na kpejurʼalugbo̩na.
I ño̩ fʼoli ugbogaga-wñ che, ohibo̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta; ologbo-wñ la te̩ gbogbo kad oli ugbogaga le̩ lʼalaku le̩ daka.
Akwo̩gba alaku ugbo ku ma gudu wa le̩ kad o̩gba agbaru alaku ej efu chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje.
Unyi ide unyi ide le̩ nʼope ope kpʼoli ugbogaga-wñ ejefu alaku lʼo daka; abe̩le̩ i te̩ gbogbo kad oli akofida-wñ; ejefu-wñ chʼope ope aledaka. Oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ che̩ko̩ nyʼo̩lʼoli ugbo̩gaga-wñ.
Tak i dʼumi wʼef ologbo ejo̩do̩da, go, unyi unyi jʼo̩mo̩ kpai ajita ku ma gwu lʼologbo le̩ daka; unyi ogue̩gwa jʼoj ajita ku ma gwu le̩.
Ajita le̩ la dʼakolo alaku alaku le̩, ujijiwñkpʼalaku alaku chʼe̩re̩ʼka. Owñchʼajita e-o̩gane̩.
Tak i fʼunabe̩-wñ ñwa akwʼo̩gba alaku e-o̩gane̩ gbogbo wa kad o̩gba anuku ejo̩do̩da-wñ. O̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ kpʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata-wñ ate̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu-me̩lu.
Tak i ño̩ fʼujiji kpʼunabe̩ alaku ologbo e-ododa ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ ñwa.
Unyi ide-wñ la chʼe̩ta ejemi kpʼe̩ta ejano̩mo̩-wñ; oñ oli ugbogaga-wñ kpʼoli ako̩fida-wñ dʼalu kʼe̩ñwa alaku ejodudu de̩; ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩-wo̩ ogue̩lu.
E̩ñwa ope-wñ kpʼoli akofida-wñ kpʼoli-wñ ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩ dʼalu kʼe̩ñwa alaku ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu le̩ de̩; ubo̩-wñ ku ma a te̩gu tʼef uwñ chʼebie; oli ako̩fida-wñ la jʼo̩gba-ma o̩mo̩.
Alaku anuku ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ ekeji la do̩mo̩, tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ tʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ. Tak i ñwa kwʼalakuʼka tʼalaku ekeji, oñ ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu.
Tak i ne̩ mi le tʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩; e̩ la go, alakuʼka do̩mo̩ ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩. Oñ i fʼoli ugbogaga-wñ kpʼoli ako̩fida-wñ ñwa, teju e̩ñwa-i.
Ope ope la jʼef uwñ kpʼef ako̩fida-wñ le daka dab ope ekeji le̩. Ujiji-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje, oñ unabe̩-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogue̩lu.
I la nʼubo̩ mebie ku ma te̩gu le tʼef uwñ, oli ako̩-fida-wñ la jʼo̩gba-ma o̩mo̩; i ño̩ nʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩, oka-wñ dʼo̩wo̩ ejemi-wñ omune̩ la dʼo̩wo̩ ej ano̩mo̩ o̩la oli ugbo̩gaga-wñ.
Oñ anuku nʼalaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ ge̩; tak i ñwa akwo alakuʼka tʼalaku ekeji alerʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩ oñ i chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu.
Tak i mʼumi du lʼalaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩ wʼef anuku. Tak i fʼalaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩ ñwa teju alu kʼe̩ñwa abʼe-le̩ de̩,
