kpʼunyi ide-wñ unyi ide-wñ kpʼoli ugbogaga-wñ kpʼoli akofida-wñ; ope ope jʼo̩la-wñ kpʼo̩la oli ako̩fida-wñ ale daka, ujiji-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje, oñ unabe̩-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogue̩lu.
Oli akofida-wñ la jo̩ lʼo daka, ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogue̩lu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu.
Oli ako̩fida-wñ la jʼo̩wo̩ ologbo o̩do̩da; oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ la jʼo̩la oli ugbogaga-wñ; ate̩gu-wñ la chʼubo̩ me̩jo̩.
Tak i mʼumi du wʼef anuku o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ; oñ i fʼalaku-wñ ñwa teju e̩ñwa e-le̩ ge̩;
e̩ñwa unyi ide-wñ kpʼoli ugbogaga-wñ kpʼoli akoñda-wñ dʼalu kʼe̩ñwa e̩ñwa-i de̩; ope ope la jʼef uwñ, kpʼef oli ako̩fida-wñ le daka; ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogue̩lu,
oli akofida-wñ la jo̩ o̩wo̩ ologbo ej o̩do̩da; oli ki dab ekpe le̩ la jʼo̩la oli ugbogaga-wñ o̩wo̩ ej emi kpʼo̩wo̩ ejano̩mo̩-wñ. Ate̩gu-wñ ño̩ chʼubo̩ me̩jo̩ ge̩.
Tak i mʼumi du wʼalaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩: i la fʼe-le̩ ñwa teju e̩ñwa e̩ñwa kʼi te̩tañwa-i.
Unyi ide unyi ide-wñ kpʼoli ugbogaga-wñ kpʼoli akofida-wñ; ope ope laño̩ jʼef uwñ le daka; ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje, oñ unabe̩-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogue̩lu.
Oli ugbogaga-wñ la jo̩ o̩wo̩ ologbo ejo̩do̩da; oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ la jʼo̩la oli ugbogaga-wñ ejemi kpʼejano̩mo̩-wñ. Ate̩gu ño̩ chʼubo̩ me̩jo̩.
Unyiʼka kpʼalugbo̩na-wñ dʼugbo oli ugbogaga-wñ ugbo alaku-wñ; o̩mo̩ ma fʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo gwe̩.
Oñ ef agbaru alaku le̩ itebulu meji jo̩ ejemi, itebulu meji laño̩ jʼejano̩mo̩, ku ma fʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure kpʼe̩wñiche̩bo̩abi kwu oji-wñ.
Tak itebulu meji ño̩ jʼiba o̩do̩da ugbo kʼone̩ ate̩gu nyʼugbo ku ma gudu wʼalaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩; oñ o̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ ki chʼe-agbaru alaku le̩ itebulu meji ño̩ jo̩.
Itebulu mele la jo̩ ejemi, itebulu mele la jʼejano̩mo̩, o̩wo̩ alaku le̩; owñ chʼite-bulu me̩jo̩, ugbo ku ma kwu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ oji-wñ.

Itebulu me̩le̩ ku ma nʼokuta ku ma da che chʼutodu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, ujiji-wñ chʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ʼka nyʼe̩kpe̩-reji, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka nyʼe̩kpe̩reji, o̩gba-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka; o̩mo̩ ma kʼe̩wñ eku ku ma ne̩ kpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ du jo̩.
Uko̩ uko̩ kʼujiji-wñ chʼo̩gaba o̩wo̩ ʼka la kʼoli ejefu-wñ daka; e̩la e̩wñ O̩jo̩ la jʼoj itebulu-wñ.

Oñ ejo̩do̩da alaku ejefu le̩, unyi jo̩ tod amakeli, owñ chʼef anuku kʼi dʼakolo alaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, unyi unyi le̩ la kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩; oka dʼakolo alaku o̩wo̩ olodudu i la kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Unyi ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-i chʼutodu amatama ku ma de e̩wñ ku ma ñwa ñwu ma ef unyi-i.

Unyi ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-i la chʼutodu amatama ku ma de e̩wñ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku ma ñwa ñwu ma. Abo-i chʼamo̩ma Zedo̩k, ama chʼabo ku ma jʼef amo̩ma Lifai kʼama te̩me̩ru Jihofa ku ma che e̩wñ ñw u.
Tak i fʼologbo ñwa, ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu, agogo̩-wñ me̩le̩ chʼokujo̩; ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ la dʼo̩gba unyi le̩.

Tak i mʼumi du wʼagbaru unyi le̩, i la fʼoli ugbogaga agbaru ñwa oko-ke, o̩wo̩ʼka-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, o̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu: unabe̩ alaku le̩ ejemi-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩ta, ejano̩mo̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩ta.

Ujiji agbaru le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwaka; ubo̩ alugbo̩na-wñ ku ma te̩gu le tʼef uwñ chʼe̩gwa. E̩wñ udago waala-wñ dago me̩ru oli ugbogaga-wñ, oka-wñ dʼeje-mi, oka dʼejano̩mo̩.
Tak i mʼumi du wʼunyi O̩jo̩, oñ i fʼoli ugbogaga-wñ ñwa, unabe̩ o̩wo̩ʼka-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa, unabe̩ o̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ ño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa ge̩, e-le̩ chʼunabe̩ unyabo le̩.

Unabe̩ alu-wñ ugbo ku ma gudu tʼo̩ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa; oñ iba-wñ ugbo ku ma gudu tʼo̩ le̩ o̩wo̩ʼka-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu, o̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu; tak i fʼujiji-wñ ñwa, i chʼohibo̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu.
Tak i tʼejefu alo. Oñ i fʼoli ugbogaga alu o̩na le̩ ojika ñwa, i chʼohibo̩wo̩ meji; unefu alu-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa; unabe̩ e̩gudu-wñ le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ mebie.
Tak i fʼujiji-wñ ñwa, i chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu, owñ chʼo̩gba unyi O̩jo̩ le̩. Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Ugbo ki afo̩ e-efo̩ de̩.
Tak i fʼo̩do̩ unyi-wñ ñwa, ohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa i che; unabe̩ unyi ki yamo̩ akolo-wñ du chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩; unyi le̩ jʼo̩ta unyi O̩jo̩ daka o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du.
Unyi unyi ki jʼakolo-wñ le̩ noji omune̩ me̩ta, aluka-wñ ki ro̩nʼomune̩ chʼogue̩gwa. Ab e-le̩ tunyu ogili unyi le̩ ki chʼutodu unyi unyi akolo-wñ le daka, kʼi gwo̩nyʼu, kʼi we gwo̩nyʼo̩do̩ unyi onugo.
Unyi akolo le̩ la nʼabe̩ tule abu kʼi lʼunyi daka tʼate̩ alo. Todu alʼunyi le̩ daka anana alo abu kʼi agba nyʼate̩ ate̩. Oñ abu kʼone̩ ate̩gu i ale gu ef ekeji-wñ du tak i alo tʼe-ki dʼate̩.
U ño̩ li ka kʼunyi le̩ nʼubo̩ ki gba lʼe̩re̩-wñ daka; e̩rane̩ unyi akolo le̩ chʼelikpoʼka odukulu, owñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ lile me̩fa.
Ukpa o̩do̩-wñ ki chʼutodu unyi unyi ki jʼakolo-wñ le̩, ej o̩do̩da-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu. E-kibo̩ ejubi unyi akolo-wñ le̩ chʼe-unyi O̩jo̩ ge̩.
Agbagba unyi unyi le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogu lʼunyi le̩ daka o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du.
Alugbo̩na unyi unyi akolo-wñ la jʼo̩wo̩ ugbo ki bo̩ tane̩, alugbo̩naʼka kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, oñ alugbo̩na omune̩ kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩; oñ uña ki bo̩ tane̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu ale daka.
Oñ unabe̩ unyi ki dʼo̩gba uña ku ma date̩ ojoji o̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ e̩te̩gwa; ukpa o̩do̩ unyi le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩lu le daka, ujiji-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ e̩le̩gwa.
Abe̩le̩ i fʼunyi le̩ ñwa ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu uña ki date̩ le̩ kpʼunyi-wñ manyʼo̩do̩-wñ, ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu.
Unabe̩ o̩gba unyi le̩ ge̩, kpʼuña ki date̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu.
Tak i fʼujiji unyi ki dʼo̩gba uña ki date̩ ki dʼubi-wñ ñwa oñ o̩na-wñ ugbo ku ma lule̩ o̩wo̩ʼka-wñ kpʼo̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ, chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu; unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu, kpʼagbaru agbaru ologbo le̩,

ajita ajita-wñ ugbo alugbo̩na-wñ, kpʼope-wñ ki che̩re le̩ kpʼo̩na o̩na-wñ ugbo ku ma le unyi ki nʼoji omune̩ me̩ta le̩ daka, ame̩ru ajita alugbo̩na-wñ, ma fʼoli te̩rʼate̩-wñ dab o̩pata le daka, kpʼakwʼane̩-wñ gbogbo wa ope-wñ, e̩wñ la bʼalu ope-wñ ma,
gbogbo tʼate̩ ñw alo̩na, gbogbo wʼunyi ejefu kpʼej o̩do̩da-wñ, kpʼo̩la o̩do̩-wñ ki le daka chaka tʼejefu-wñ tʼejo̩do̩da-wñ, e̩ñwa e̩ñwa i che.
Ma fʼamicherub kpʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩ che nyʼo̩la-wñ; oli ki dab ekpe̩ le̩ la dago agbagba che̩rub meji, oñ che̩rub okoke du nʼeju meji eji.
Abe̩le̩ eju one̩ kpʼeju rʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩ o̩wo̩ʼka, oñ eju agbadufu idu kparu oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ; abe̩le̩ ma che ugbo du lʼunyi le̩ daka.
Akwʼane̩pe̩te̩-wñ gbogbo tʼate̩ ñw alugbo̩na-wñ ma che amiche̩rub kpʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ jo̩. Abu kʼo̩do̩ unyi O̩jo̩ de̩ de̩.
I chʼe-unyi ejefu, ma fʼoli alugbo̩na-wñ fa ago̩go̩ me̩le̩. E̩wñʼka dago o̩gba uña kiafo̩ le̩ ki biu
ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ku ma nʼoli che; o̩gba-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩ta, ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ meji; alo-wñ kpʼo̩wo̩ ujiji-wñ kpʼo̩do̩-wñ chʼoli. Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Itebulu ki dʼo̩gba Jihofa le̩ de̩.
Alugbo̩na unyi ejefu kpʼe-uña kiafo̩ chʼe̩kpana meji eji,
alugbo̩na-wñ okoke nʼoli uro̩na meji eji, ejeji-wñ arida; oli uro̩na meji chʼutodu alugbo̩naʼka, eji-wñ la chʼutodu alugbo̩na ekeji.
Ma fʼamiche̩rub kpʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ le̩ ko̩ nyʼalugbo̩na unyi ejefu alu ku ma ko̩ nyʼo̩lʼo̩do̩ le̩; o̩joku-nyi ku ma nʼoli che̩ dado agbaru-wñ e̩j o̩doda-wñ.
Ope ope kpʼoli ki dab e̩kpe̩ jʼo̩la o̩do̩ o̩wo̩ agbaru le̩ mej eji. Abe̩le̩ unyi unyi akolo unyi le̩ de̩, kpʼojokunyi ku ma nʼoli che le̩.
Tak i dʼumi dufu wa ologbo o̩do̩-da ale rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, oñ i dʼumi wʼunyi unyi kekele ki jʼugbo uña ki date̩ ki laño̩ jʼo̩la unyi le̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ.
Oñ i dʼumi wa o̩gba o̩wo̩ ujiji-wñ ki te̩ ohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu, kʼalugbo̩na dʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje.
O̩la ohibo̩wo̩ ogu anuku le̩ kpʼame̩ru ajita e-ologbo agbaru ki te̩ ko̩o̩lo̩ kad omune̩ ef unyi e̩ke̩ta ate̩ le̩.
O̩na dʼejefu ale tʼo̩gba unyi unyi ke̩ke̩ le̩. Unabe̩-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwa, ujiji-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu, alugbo̩na-wñ la jʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩.
Unyi unyi ke̩ke̩ ki jʼate̩ otitala nyarʼu; todu agbaru agbaru-wñ fʼu bu wane̩ tʼe-kʼi che e-o̩gane̩ kpʼe-alumeji unyi le̩ le.
Todu i chʼunyi me̩ta noji omune̩, ma la nʼoli urane̩ dab oli urane̩ ologbo le̩ n; todule̩ e-ki dʼate̩ chʼe̩kpama tʼe-o̩gane̩ kpʼe-alumeji le ef unyi le̩.
Ogili-wñ ki dʼo̩do̩da akolo unyi unyi ke̩ke̩ le̩ ale rʼo̩wo̩ ologbo ejʼo̩gba unyi ke̩ke̩ le̩, ujiji-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje.
Todu ujiji unyi unyi ke̩ke̩ ku ma jʼologbo chʼohibo̩wo̩ ooje. E̩ la go, ejo̩gba unyi le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ogume̩lu.
Ofe unyi unyi ke̩ke̩ alo̩na-wñ o̩wo̩ olodudu de̩, abu kʼone̩ akwʼolo̩gbo awʼef e-le̩.
Unyi unyi ke̩ke̩ jʼoj ujukpa ogili ologbo ale rʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ, o̩gba uña ki date̩ le̩ kpʼo̩gba unyi onugo.
Oñ o̩na ki dʼo̩gba-wñ dʼalu kʼe-unyi unyi ke̩ke̩ ki jʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ de̩ eju; alu kʼujiji-wñ de̩ abe̩le̩ unabe̩wñ de̩. Alo̩na aledufu-wñ chaka dʼalu kʼe-le̩ de̩, kpʼalu kʼalugbo̩na-wñ de̩.
Oñ alu kʼalugbo̩na alugbo̩na unyi unyi ki jo̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ de̩ alugbo̩na ki dab owñ dago oji o̩na le̩, owñ chʼo̩na ki dʼo̩gba ogili o̩wo̩ olodudu abu kʼone̩ agudu wale̩.

E̩gbale̩ i ka ñwu mi kakini, Unyi unyi ke̩ke̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, kpʼunyi ke̩ke̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ ki jʼo̩gba uña ki date̩ le̩, abʼe-le̩ chʼunyi ke̩ke̩ kiafo̩, e̩wñ ele ugbo kʼamatama ku ma me̩ru Jihofa aje̩ e̩wñ kiafo̩ tule; o̩mo̩ ma akʼe̩wñ efo̩ e-efo̩ jo̩, kpʼe̩wñ ele, kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi; todu ugbo le̩ afo̩.

E̩gba kʼamatama mugudu wʼef uwñ, ma ñʼadufu kwʼef uña kiafo̩ le̩ nyʼologbo ge̩ n, ma muda akʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma ku ma nyi achʼe̩wñ ñw O̩jo̩ jʼo̩mo̩, todu ukpo le̩ afo̩; oñ ma akʼe̩wñ omune̩ nyʼo̩la taku ma ate̩ me̩ru e̩wñ e-amone̩ o̩fo.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi fʼunyi ejefu le̩ ñwa kpa, i mʼumi du lʼo̩na alaku ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu dufu, tak i fʼu ñwa dagbala daka.
I nʼe̩likpo e̩ñwa le̩ ñwa o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ, oñ i chʼe̩likpo oli me̩gwa; i nʼelikpo le̩ fʼu ñwa dagba-la daka.
I nʼelikpo e̩ñwa le̩ ñwa o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ daka, owñ chʼelikpo oli me̩gwa.
Tak i nʼelikpo e̩ñwa le̩ ñwa o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, elikpo-wñ chʼoli me̩gwa.
Taki rida tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩, oñ i nʼelikpo le̩ ñwa elikpo oli me̩gwa ge̩.
I la fʼu ñwa o̩wo̩ afu me̩le̩; i nʼogili ale daka, ujiji-wñ chʼoli me̩gwa, unabe̩-wñ la chʼoli me̩gwa, ki fʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ kpʼe̩wñ o̩ja daru bʼomune̩ te̩.
Ubile̩ i mʼumi du wʼalaku, owñ chʼalaku ki akpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu.
E̩ la go, ojima O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l kwʼo̩wo̩ o̩na olodudu awa; omuko̩la-wñ dab ekuku omi ki nana; ane̩-ile̩ la ade̩ ñaña noji ojima-wñ,
I la dab ane̩ ego kʼu li le̩, owñ chʼalu kʼane̩ ego de̩ kʼu li e̩gba kʼu wa kʼu fʼewo-i kpabie̩; ane̩ ego ojoji ojoji kʼu li la dab ane̩ ego kʼu li o̩la aji Che̩bar le̩; tak u lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.
Oñ ojima Jihofa wʼef unyi le̩ lʼo̩na alaku ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu.
Tak Afu mʼumi du kwane̩, oñ i mʼumi du wʼef anuku; e̩ la go, ojima Jihofa che̩ko̩ unyi le̩.
Tak u gbo abu kʼe̩ne̩ʼka dʼef unyi le̩ ako̩la ñwu mi; e̩ne̩ʼka la lewa dago kpenyʼumi;

oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, uña ede-mi de̩, kpʼugbo kʼu nadʼadaba e̩re̩-mi tʼo̩ i che, ugbo kʼu nagugu alumeji amo̩ma Israe̩l ogbegbele̩; abunyi Israe̩l ñʼanʼabutabu-ma kpʼoku amonu oj otete otete-ma dʼodu-mi kiafo̩ ji ge̩ n, tʼama tʼamonu-ma.

Owñ chʼugbo ku ma fʼajita alugbo̩na-ma che kpenyʼajita alugbo̩na e-mi, ku ma la kʼoli ona-ma gwanyi kpenyʼoli o̩na e-mi kʼo̩do okate tʼagbagba mi kpʼama; ma la nʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma ku ma che fʼodu-mi kiafo̩ daji; todule̩ oñ omi fʼuma lie̩ ef uwe̩do̩-mi.
Fai ama ki mʼabutabu-ma kpai oku amonu-ma ko bʼumi o̩la te̩ rʼo̩najiji, tak omi agugu alumeji-ma ogbegbele̩.
Uwe̩, o̩ma one̩, dʼunyi-iña abunyi Israe̩l kʼanyo̩ udu ku ma fe̩ ki mu ma. E̩ naje̩ ñwu ma fʼe̩wñ uwo̩li-wñ-i ñwa.

I la che̩wñ kʼanyo̩ e̩wñ du ku ma che le̩ fʼuma mu, mak e̩ je̩ ñwu ma ma alu kʼunyi le̩ de̩ eju, kpai alu kʼe̩wñ chʼe̩te̩ru jʼef uwñ, kpʼo̩na aledufu-wñ kpʼo̩na egudu nyʼejefu-wñ kpʼalu kʼi ade̩ eju chaka, kpʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ chaka kpʼalu du ki ade̩ eju chaka kpʼuko̩-o̩la-wñ chaka, kʼe̩ fʼu ko̩ eju-ma; kʼama ki de o̩gbo̩-wñ du yiili chaka, kpʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ chaka, ku ma che teju-wñ.
E̩wñ ki chʼuko̩-o̩la unyi le̩ de̩ kakini, oj uwo-i ugbo tʼugbo du ki te̩ kade dagbala daka afo̩ e-efo̩; e̩ go, uko̩-o̩la unyi le̩ de̩.

E̩ñwa ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ de̩, ohibo̩wo̩ ohibo̩wo̩, (ohibo̩wo̩-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ ʼka nyʼo̩gaba). Ofe-wñ achʼohibo̩wo̩ ʼka unabe̩-wñ la achʼo̩hibo̩wo̩ʼka, oñ oli ku ma be̩ tʼiba-wñ lale achʼo̩gabaʼka; ubi ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ de̩.
Akwo ofe-wñ ane̩pe̩te̩ kad e̩bale-wñ o̩gane̩ achʼohibo̩wo̩ meji, unabe̩-wñ la achʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka; oñ akwo e̩bale-wñ ki nya le̩ kad e̩bale-wñ ki nana chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka.
Ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-ate̩ achʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩; oñ akwʼugbo ku ma kʼuna jo̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ kpʼate̩ tʼate̩-wñ igba me̩le̩ ajo̩.
Ujiji ugbo ku ma akʼuna oji-wñ le̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gweji, unabe̩-wñ laño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gweji ge̩; o̩wo̩-wñ me̩le̩ e̩le̩ chʼokujo̩.

Ujiji e̩bale-wñ achʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwe̩le̩, unabe̩-wñ laño̩ chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩gwe̩le̩, o̩wo̩ me̩le̩le̩-wñ. E̩be̩ tʼo̩ u la achʼukpe̩reji ohibo̩wo̩-ñw ʼka ofe-wñ la achʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka aledaka. Ate̩gu ubo̩-wñ la akpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, E̩wñ uhio̩me̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ o̩jo̩ ku ma che de̩, ku ma kʼe̩wñ wa gujo oji-wñ, ku me̩ la fʼe̩bie̩ ta fiʼo̩.
Uwe̩ adʼo̩mʼo̩kokuno̩ ñw amatama abo Lifaiku ma chʼugbe̩ Zedo̩k, ku ma me̩ru mi ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu mi, ku ma mʼudu che iche̩bo̩ adure, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Tak uwe̩ ache e̩bie̩-wñ, kʼe̩ dʼu kado igba-wñ me̩le̩ kpʼoji alo e̩bale-wñ me̩le̩ kpʼoji e̩wñ ku ma be̩ tʼo̩ daka. Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ agwʼo rinyo̩, kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che tod uwñ.
E̩ ki ño̩ mʼo̩kokuno̩ iche̩bo̩ adure le̩ du, ku ma fʼu gujo ugbo ku ma fudate̩ ugbo unyi le̩ ejo̩do̩da uña kiafo̩.
Tak O̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ uwe̩ adʼo̩mʼobuko̩ ki ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo n wa che iche̩bo̩ adure ge̩. Tak ama agwʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ rinyo̩, alu ku ma nʼo̩kokuno̩ le̩ gwʼo rinyo̩.
E̩gbakʼe̩ fʼu gworinyo̩ kpa, tak uwe̩ anʼo̩mʼo̩kokuno̩ kʼi ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n, kpʼokolo ki ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini wa.
E̩ ki la ko ma wʼo̩gba Jihofa anane̩, tak amatama abʼomu rʼuma o̩la, oñ ma ako ma chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ egu-jo̩ ñwu Jihofa.
O̩jo̩ mebie uwe̩ añwʼobuko̩ che kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure o̩jo̩ ñwa o̩jo̩ ñwa; ma ñʼañwʼo̩mʼo̩kokuno̩ kpʼokolo kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma ma ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n che.
Ama ki che e̩wñ e̩boma todu ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ o̩jo̩ mebie, tak i afe̩, ki te̩ ñw e̩wñ O̩jo̩ kate.
E̩gba kʼo̩jo̩-wñ jo̩ kpa, tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ, kpʼate̩to̩gba-wñ, amatama, akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-me̩ kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-me̩ wa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-i. Tak u nagba me̩, Ondu Jihofa aka-i.
Tak i dʼumi dabi wa lʼo̩na alaku o̩do̩da e-uña kiafo̩, owñ chʼe-ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu le̩; i la che̩re.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Alaku-i ki che̩re te̩ gbogbo alo; ma ñʼabi ge̩ n, e̩ne̩ du la agudu lʼo̩mo̩ n; todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, mugudu lʼo̩mo̩ me̩; todule̩ i ki che̩re.
I chʼe-idachi, i agugu ejefu-wñ o̩mo̩ kʼi chʼidachi kʼi ajʼuje̩wñ o̩gba Jihofa; i agudu lʼo̩na agbaru aluka, tak i adufu lʼo̩na e-le̩ gbage̩de̩.
Tak i mʼumi du lʼo̩na alaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ wʼo̩gba unyi le̩; oñ u go, e̩ la go, ojima Jihofa che̩ko̩ unyi Jihofa; oñ u lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.

Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, dʼe̩do̩-we̩ tʼo̩ nyo̩nyo̩, kʼe̩ la nʼeju-we̩ go, kʼe̩ la nʼeti-we̩ gbo̩ e̩wñ du kʼu naka ñw e̩ ugbo e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ unyi Jihofa-i du, kpʼuko̩-o̩la-wñ chaka; kʼe̩ laño̩ dʼe̩do̩-we̩ tʼo̩na ku ma gudu wʼef uwñ, kpʼo̩na du ku ma kwef uña kiafo̩-i dufu.
Tak uwe̩ aka ñw abo ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n-i, owñ chʼabo unyi Israe̩l, kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, O ame̩, abo unyi Israe̩l, e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-me̩ du ki bʼume̩ jo̩ ke!

Owñ chʼabononojo kʼe̩do̩-ma kpʼo̩re̩la-ma ma de̩pi n, ku me̩ ko wa ku ma jʼef uña-mi kiafo̩ kʼama ki fʼu daji, owñ chʼunyi e-mi-i, e̩gba ku me̩ kʼuje̩wñ-mi, ula kpʼe̩bie̩ le̩, wa. Ma la fʼalo-mi bie̩, manyʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-me̩ chaka!
Me̩ la fʼide̩ e̩wñ-mi ki afo̩ de n; me̩ muda kʼabo ku ma de e̩wñ-mi kʼu ñwañwu me̩ le̩ jʼef uña-mi kiafo̩ alu ki rʼume̩ eju.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa la aka de̩ kakini, Ononojo du ki ma de̩pi ef e̩do̩ kpʼef o̩re̩la n agudu wʼef uña-mi kiafo̩ n, owñ chʼabononojo du ku ma jʼef amo̩ma Israe̩l-i.
Abo Lifai ku ma muda le̩ jiji bʼumi te̩, e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l la bʼumi te̩, ku ma la bʼumi te̩ atʼode ode-ma ubi, ama la achʼudu t-mo.

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ama achʼabo ku ma ache e̩wñ ef uña-mi kiafo, kʼama ki jʼalaku tinyi-i afejutʼo̩, kpai e̩wñ eche ef unyi-i; ama la akpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ todu amone̩, oñ ma adago jʼo̩gba-ma ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu ma.

Todabu ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu ma o̩gba ode ode-ma ku ma laño̩ mud udu efe̩ ki aje̩ ñw one̩ ke̩re̩ ñw abo unyi Israe̩l, todule̩ omi mʼo̩wo̩-mi du nyʼate̩ achʼagwunyʼuma, Ondu Jihofa aka-i; ama la achʼudu-ma ku ma fe̩.
Ma la ate̩me̩rʼumi, ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ atama ñwu mi n, ma la ate̩me̩ru e̩wñ-mi du kiafo̩ n, owñ chʼugbo e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ le̩; ma muda anʼadu anyo̩-ma, kpʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma ku ma che le̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ omi ako ma chʼabo ki adide e̩wñ kʼu ñwa ñwu ma ef unyi-i, todu uko̩lo̩-wñ chaka, kpai todu e̩wñ du ku ma ache ef uwñ.

Ama amatama, ku ma chʼabo Lifai, amo̩ma Zedo̩k, ku ma fʼide̩ uña-mi kiafo̩ de̩ e̩gba kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l la bʼumi te̩ le̩, ama ate̩me̩rʼumi ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu mi; ma adago jʼo̩gba-mi ku ma kʼula kpʼe̩bie̩ wa ñwu mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Ama agudu wʼef uña-mi kiafo̩, ama la ate̩me̩rʼitebulu-mi ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu mi; ama le̩ la ade e̩wñ kʼu ñwañwu ma.
Oñ e̩gba kʼama mugudu lʼalaku anuku le̩, ma anyi e̩wñ o̩la line̩n; edudu ala re atʼo̩la-ma abu ku ma jo̩ ache e̩wñ ñwu mi alaku alaku anuku le̩ kpʼej ef uwñ n.
Alawoni line̩n la ajʼoji-ma, oñ ma anyi ichaka line̩n ago-ma; ma anyʼe̩wñ du ki achʼugu n.

Tak e̩gba ku ma ledufu ku ma nyʼologbo owñ chʼologbo ugbo kʼamone̩ jo̩, ma akʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma ku ma nyi ache e̩wñ jane̩, ku ma kojʼunyi unyi ke̩ke̩ kiafo̩ le̩; taku ma akʼe̩wñ omune̩ nyʼo̩la, kʼama ki we enʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma chʼamone̩ le̩ ku ma fo̩.
Ma la alʼoji-ma n, ma ñʼaje̩ ñw iloji-ma ki gwe̩ jiji n, chai eja ma aja iloji-ma.
Amatama du la añmʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩gba ku ma gudu tʼanuku n.
Ma la adʼoyaukuo̩ko̩ chʼo̩ya-ma n, kpʼonobule̩ ku ma dʼu tinyo̩ n; chai abobule̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, ku ma chʼugbe̩ abunyi Israe̩l, kpʼo̩ya atamaʼka ki ku.
Ma ako̩ abo-mi e̩wñ ki chʼojoji e̩wñ kiafo̩ kpʼe̩wñ o̩ja. Ma la aje̩ ñwu ma mʼojoji e̩wñ iwa kpʼe̩wñ ki fe̩.

Ukana lewa ama le̩ adago akpʼoji-wñ; teju alu kʼoji ajo̩-mi de̩ oñ ama akpʼoji-wñ. Ama la ade uko̩-o̩la-mi kpʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi kpʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ kʼu dʼiko-wñ te̩ chaka. Ma la ache kʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi ki fo̩.

Ma ñʼanyʼejefu ugbo oku e̩ne̩ du ku ma fʼo̩la-ma daji n; chai tod ata abe̩kʼiye, abe̩kʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩kʼo̩ma onobule̩ abe̩kʼo̩maye e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩kʼo̩maye onobule̩ kʼi ma nʼo̩ko̩ n, i la adʼugbo ku ma dʼo̩la-ma ji.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ gworinyo̩, ma abʼo̩jo̩ mebie ñw u.
Tak o̩jo̩ kʼi agudu tef uña kiafo̩ le̩, owñ chʼef anuku, kʼi che e̩wñ ef uña kiafo̩, i adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure-wñ wa che, Ondu Jihofu aka-i.
Ama ane̩ e̩wñ ogu ku ma aje̩: omi chʼe̩wñ ogu-ma; ame̩ la akʼe̩wñ du ñwu ma ku ma ne̩ oj ane̩ Israe̩l-i n; omi chʼe̩wñ-ma ku ma ne̩.
Ama aje̩ e̩wñ ele le̩ kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure, kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi; oñ e̩wñ du ku ma du te̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ane̩ Israe̩l ama ane̩.

E̩wñ ejodudu chaka ef e̩wñ ejo̩ga e̩wñ du, kpʼe̩wñ du ku me̩ ko ne ate̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ef e̩wñ-me̩ ku me̩ ko ne ate̩ ñw u le̩, achʼutodu atama. Ame̩ ñʼako̩ eli o̩ka ejodudu ñw amatama kʼe̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ ki bʼunyi-we̩ ma.
Amatama aje̩ e̩wñ du ki ku tinyo̩ ofofo n, kpʼe-ku ma fana te̩, dagba i chʼe̩we̩, dagba i chʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩.

Anubi le̩ ge̩, e̩gba kʼame̩ rʼanya ku me̩ fʼane̩ le̩ kpe̩jo̩ ki mud e̩wñ ogu, ame̩ adʼukpe̩ʼka ko ne ñwu Jihofa, owñ chʼukpe̩ ane̩ kiafo̩. Ujiji-wñ la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu, unabe̩-wñ la ache icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa. Ugbo du gbogbo kad alo̩me̩-wñ daka afo̩.
Ef e-le̩ uña ade̩ tod uña kiafo̩ le̩, ujiji-wñ achʼe̩ñwa oli me̩gwa, unabe̩-wñ laño̩ chʼoli me̩gwa ge̩. Ago̩go̩ me̩le̩ i ache; o̩hibo̩wo̩ ooje atane̩ ofo lʼo daka.
Ef e-kʼe̩ ñwa le̩ uwe̩ añwa ujiji-wñ ki chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu, kpʼunabe̩-wñ ki chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa. Ef e-le̩ oñ uña kiafo̩ ade̩, owñ chʼelo̩ e-efo̩.

E-le̩ chʼukpe̩ ane̩ le̩ kiafo̩; i achʼutodu amatama, ku ma chʼabo ku ma che e̩wñ ef uña kiafo̩, ku ma te̩me̩rʼu ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu Jihofa; e-le̩ achʼugbokʼunyi-maajo̩, kpʼugbo kiafo̩ tod uña kiafo̩ le̩.
Oñ e-kʼujiji-wñ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu, kʼunabe̩-wñ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa, abo Lifai, ku ma che e̩wñ unyi le̩ ane̩ kʼi chʼugbo ku ma adodo.

Tak ame̩ adʼukpe̩ ane̩ te̩ kʼewo le̩ ki ne̩; unabe̩-wñ le̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu, ujiji-wñ la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu. Akolo-wñ akad ako-lo ukpe̩ ane̩ kiafo̩ ku ma ko ne ñw O̩jo̩ le̩ gbogbo wa tʼane̩-wñ; e-le̩ achʼutodu o̩gbo abo unyi Israe̩l chaka.

Idachi le̩ anʼukpe̩ e-wñ o̩wo̩ʼka kpʼo̩wo̩ ekeji e-kiafo̩ ku ma ko ne ñw O̩jo̩ le, kpʼe-kʼewo le̩ ne̩; i akad e-kiafo̩ ku ma ko ne ñw O̩jo̩ kpʼe-kʼewo le̩ ne̩, akwʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ ale rʼo̩wo̩ olane̩, kpʼakwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ ale rʼo̩wo̩ olodudu. Ujiji-wñ le̩ adʼalu kʼujiji ukpe̩ʼka-wñ de̩, akwʼalo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olane̩ gbogbo wʼalo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olodudu.
I ane̩ e-le̩ kʼi achʼane̩-wñ kʼi ane̩ oj ane̩ Israe̩l. Amidachi-mi ñʼatʼabo-mi mane̩ ge̩ n; ma la akʼane̩-i ñw abo unyi Israe̩l teju alu kʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma ade̩.

AbukʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩, kakini, I ki bʼume̩ jo̩, O ame̩ amidachi Israe̩l! Mʼe̩wñ afuma kpʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ko̩, ku me̩ che teju alu kʼoji ajo̩ ka kpʼo̩kpakpa; mʼone̩ ene-me̩ du bʼabo-mi te̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
E̩bo̩ uñwʼe̩wñ-me̩ ki chʼo̩kpakpa, kpʼefa o̩kpakpa kpʼibat o̩kpakpa.
E̩fa kpai ibati ki nʼe̩ñwa okujo̩, ibati le̩ ki je̩ ukpe̩re̩gwa homaʼka, kʼe̩fa ki ño̩ chʼe̩kpe̩re̩gwa homa ge̩; e̩ñwa-wñ ki dʼalu kʼe-homa de̩.
She̩ke̩l oka la ache gera ogu; she̩ke̩l ogu, she̩ke̩l ogue̩lu, kpai she̩ke̩l me̩gwe̩lu ache mane̩-me̩.
E̩wñ eko ne ate̩ ku me̩ ako wa le̩ de̩: e̩kpe̩re̩fa e̩faʼka ku ma bu kwef homa witʼka; me̩ ñʼad e̩kpe̩re̩fa e̩faʼka kwef homa barliʼka ge̩;
kpai ukpe̩ ekpo alu ku ma da kwef ibat ekpoʼka; e̩kpe̩re̩gwa ibat oka ki kwef ko̩r oka; ibati me̩gwa che ko̩r oka, i ño̩ che homaʼka ge̩,

kpai e̩wño̩re̩ eginiʼka kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini o̩gwo̩ko̩, i ki kwef o̩gwo̩ko̩ ki jʼokije̩ Israe̩l ki nʼomi nyo̩nyo̩; e-le̩ ki chʼutodu e̩wñ ele, kpʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kpʼiche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩, todu ku ma ki che e̩wñ e̩boma todu ma, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Amone̩ ane̩-i du akʼe̩wñ wa tod e̩wñ eko nyʼate̩ todu idachi kʼi dʼIsrae̩l.

Oñ i adukpe̩ kʼidachi le̩ ki kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, kpʼe̩wñ ele, kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ omi wa, ef uje̩wñ uyo̩-ma, kpʼiko ochu etito̩, kpʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi, kpʼe̩gba kʼiko du kʼo̩jo̩ uje̩wñ ku ma date̩ ñw abo unyi Israe̩l jo̩; owñ le̩ añwʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure kpʼe̩wñ ele kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ che, kʼi che e̩wñ e̩boma tod abo unyi Israe̩l.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Ochu ejodudu, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu le̩, uwe̩ ki mʼo̩mʼo̩kokuno̩ ki ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n du, kʼuwe̩ ki fʼuña kiafo̩ le̩ gworinyo̩.
Tak atama ache e̩bie̩ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure kʼi adʼu kad oli alo̩na unyi-i o̩wo̩ meji-wñ, kpʼalo e̩bale ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ me̩le̩, kpʼoli alo̩na anuku.
Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ache o̩jo̩ e̩kebie ochu le̩ tod e̩ne̩ du kʼi la, kpai tod e̩nemo̩, abe̩le̩ oñ ame̩ ache e̩wñ e̩boma tod unyi-i.
Ochu ejodudu, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ochu le̩, ame̩ aje̩ E̩laloji, uje̩wñ uyo̩-wñ chʼo̩jo̩ mebie; uje̩wñ ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n oñ ame̩ aje̩.
O̩jo̩ e-le̩ idachi añwʼo̩kokuno̩ che kʼi mud e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure tod o̩la-wñ kpai todu amone̩ oj ane̩-i chaka.

O̩jo̩ okoke o̩jo̩ mebie le̩ i añwʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo che ñwu Jihofa, o̩kokuno̩ mebie kpʼokolo mebie ku ma ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n i ako wa che o̩jo̩ mebie le̩ okoke du, kpʼo̩mobuko̩ tod e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure o̩jo̩ du.
I la añwʼe̩wñ ele che, e̩fa-wñʼka chʼutodu o̩kokuno̩ʼka, kpʼe̩faʼka tod okoloʼka, e̩fa omuʼka ane̩ hin ekpoʼka.

Ochu e̩kebie, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu ochu le̩, e̩gba uje̩wñ uyo̩ le̩, i ñʼache abe̩le̩ o̩jo̩ o̩koke-wñ mebie ge̩; alu kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure de̩, kpʼalu kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo de̩, kpʼalu kʼe̩wñ ele de̩, kpʼalu kʼekpo-wñ de̩.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ uko̩lo̩ me̩fa alaku anuku kʼi kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu abi n; ma muda abi o̩jo̩ uñmi, ma ñʼabi o̩jo̩ kʼochu ne etito̩.

Oñ idachi agudu lʼo̩na agbaru alaku e-o̩do̩da, i la adago ugbo oli alo̩na o̩mo̩; tak amatama añwʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-wñ kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-wñ che, tak i adojikane̩ oj ajita alaku le̩. Tak i adufu; ma muda arʼo̩na-wñ gbogbo tak olu tunyane̩ n.
Oñ amone̩ ane̩-i adojikane̩ ugbo alugbo̩na alaku le̩ o̩gba Jihofa o̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi, kpʼo̩jo̩ kʼochu ne etito̩ du.
E̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kʼidachi le̩ la akowa ñwu Jihofa o̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ u-ñmi le̩ achʼamo̩mala me̩fa ku ma ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n, kpʼokoloʼka ki ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n ge̩;
e̩wñ ele-wñ la ache e̩faʼka tod okoloʼka, kpʼe̩wñ ele tod amo̩mala le̩ adʼalu du kʼo̩wo̩-wñ tu kʼi ache, e̩fa-wñ du la ane̩ hin ekpoʼka.
Oñ o̩jo̩ kʼochu ne etito̩ i la chʼo̩mʼo̩kokuno̩ kʼi ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n kpʼamo̩mala me̩fa kpʼokoloʼka, ma la anʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n.
Tak i añwʼe̩wñ ele che, e̩faʼka chʼutodu o̩kokuno̩ʼka, e̩faʼka la chʼutodu okoloʼka, kpʼalu kʼo̩wo̩-wñ atu tod amo̩mala le̩, e̩faʼka la ane̩ ekpo hinʼka.
Tak e̩gba kʼidachi agudu wa, i agudu wa lʼo̩na agbaru alaku le̩, i año̩ lʼo̩na e-le̩ dufu ge̩.

Oñ e̩gba kʼamone̩ ane̩-i awʼo̩gba Jihofa iko iko uje̩wñ uyo̩ kʼi date̩, e̩ne̩ ki agudu lʼo̩na alaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ kʼi adojikane̩ adufu lʼo̩na alaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩; oñ e̩ne̩ ki mugudu lʼo̩na alaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ ale o̩na alaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ dufu; i ñʼadabi lʼo̩na alaku ugbo kʼi gudu wa le̩ dufu n, i afʼe̩do̩ kʼe̩do̩ kpaala dufu.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma nyʼejefu, idachi le̩ atʼalumeji-ma gudu nyʼejefu, oñ e̩gba ku ma dufu, ma akpe̩re̩ dufu.
Tak e̩gba uje̩wñ uyo̩-ma kpʼuje̩wñ ku ma dʼiko-wñ te̩, e̩wñ ele-ma achʼe̩faʼka tod o̩kokuno̩ʼka, kpʼe̩faʼka tod okoloʼka, e-amo̩mala achʼalu du kʼo̩wo̩-wñ atu; e̩fa du ane̩ hin ekpoʼka.

Tak e̩gba kʼidachi gʼe̩do̩la-wñ añwʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ che, abe̩k e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo abe̩k e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ kʼi agʼe̩do̩la-wñ ache ñwu Jihofa, e̩ne̩ʼka abi alaku ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu ñw u; tak i añwʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo-wñ kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩-wñ che, alu kʼi ache o̩jo̩ uñmi; tak i adufu; ubi-wñ abu kʼi ledu-fu e̩ne̩ʼka are alaku le̩.
Oñ uwe̩ añwʼo̩mala o̩do̩ʼka kʼi ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n che tod e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ache ñwu Jihofa o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa, odudu du uwe̩ añwʼo̩ che.

Uwe̩ lañʼañwʼe̩wñ ele che manyʼu odudu du; omu-wñ chʼe̩kpe̩re̩fa e̩faʼka, kpʼekpo e̩kpe̩re̩ta hinʼka ki kpe̩gwa nyʼomu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ le̩; e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ-iche̩bo̩ omu eche ñwu Jihofa o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, uhio̩me̩-wñ te̩ gbogbo alo.
Abe̩le̩ ma añwʼo̩mala le̩ kpʼe̩wñ ele kpʼekpo-wñ che odudu o̩jo̩ du, kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ki ma nʼuda n.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼidachi le̩ dʼe̩wñ chʼo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka ele, mak e̩wñ ogu-wñ, amo̩ma e-wñ ane̩; e̩wñ kʼame̩ ne̩ ef e̩wñ ogu ku ma je̩ i che.
I muda chʼe̩wñ kʼi mʼe̩wñ du kwef e̩wñ ogu-wñ kʼi mʼu du chʼadu-wñʼka ele, owñ ane̩ kad odo omi nʼo̩la-mi le̩: e̩gba le̩ e̩wñ le̩ adabi tʼo̩wo̩ idachi le̩; i chʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ, amo̩ma-wñ ne̩.

Anubi le̩ ge̩, idachi le̩ abʼamone̩ le̩ gbʼe̩wñ ogu-ma, kʼi fʼuma ke̩che̩ kwo bʼe̩wñ-ma ku ma ne̩ te̩ n; i akʼe̩wñ ogu ñw amo̩ma-wñ kwef e̩wñ kʼowñ onugo ne̩ kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ abo-mi ki we ekpatuka bʼane̩-wñ kʼi ne̩ te̩.

Tak i mʼumi du le gu ef ugbo ku ma gudu wa du, e-ki dʼo̩wo̩ʼka alaku le̩, tef unyi unyi ke̩ke̩ kiafo̩ e-amatama le̩, owñ chʼe-ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩; e̩ la go, i nʼugboʼka ki dʼubi-wñ o̩wo̩ olane̩.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Ugbo kʼamatama ahi e̩la iche̩bo̩ abi kpʼe̩la iche̩bo̩ adure kpʼugbo ku ma ade̩ e̩wñ ele de̩; kʼama ki we ekʼo dufu wʼologbo o̩do̩da ku ma che kʼamone̩ ki fo̩.
Tak i dʼumi dufu wʼologbo o̩do̩da le̩, oñ i je̩ ñwu mi lale alo alo ologbo le̩ me̩le̩; e̩ la go, ologbo omune̩ la dʼalo ologbo me̩le̩.
Ef alo me̩le̩ e-ologbo le̩ ologbo omune̩ ku ma bʼo̩gba nyʼu jo̩. Ujiji-wñ chʼogbo̩ meji, una-be̩-wñ la che ogue̩gwa: ologbo me̩le̩ ki jʼalo-wñ le̩ nʼe̩ñwa okate.
O̩gba la lʼef uwñ daka i lʼologbo me̩le̩ le̩ daka, oñ ma fʼigbeli ugbo ku ma ahi e̩wñ che jʼofe o̩gba-wñ daka.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Unyi ugbo ku ma ahi e̩wñ jo̩-i, owñ chʼugbo kʼabo ku ma che e̩wñ unyi-i, ahi e̩la iche̩bo̩ amone̩ le̩.

Tak i mʼumi du dabi wʼalugbo̩na unyi le̩; e̩ la go, omi nacha kwʼofe ubo̩ alugbo̩na unyi le̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu, todu unyi le̩ kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu. Omi le̩ la cha kwʼofe-wñ wa, akwo o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ unyi le̩, o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ.
Tak i mʼumi du le o̩na alaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ dufu, oñ i ne̩ mi dagbala lʼo̩na o̩do̩da le̩ nyʼugbo alaku e-e̩j o̩do̩da, lʼo̩na e-ki akpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu; e̩ la go, omi nʼabi dufu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ.
E̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ nʼiku uñwʼe̩wñ o̩wo̩ le dufu tʼo̩wo̩ olodudu, i fʼohibo̩wo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ñwa, tak i je ñwu mi lale gu ef omi le̩ du, omi le̩ kad iko e̩re̩.

Tak i ño̩ fʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ñwa ge̩, oñ i je̩ ñwu mi lale gu ef omi le̩ du, omi le̩ la jʼone̩ kad okuku. Tak i ño̩ fʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ñwa, oñ i je̩ ñwu mi lale gu ef uwñ du, omi-wñ ajʼon? kad ago.
Ubile̩ i ño̩ fʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ñwa ge̩, oñ i mud aji kʼomi ma ño̩ neke lale gu ef uwñ du ge̩ n, todu omi-wñ ako̩, oñ i mud ugbo kʼone̩ agwa, i mud ohimini ku ma ma neke daba n.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, uwe̩ li me̩?
Oñ e̩gba kʼu mudabi wʼo̩mo̩, go, oli wewe wewe jʼoj otete-wñ ej emi-wñ kpʼej ano̩mo̩-wñ.

Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Omi-i acha dufu rʼo̩wo̩ ane̩ olodudu, i la agwo̩ru nyʼAraba; i la cha rʼo̩wo̩ ohimini aba-di; omi ku ma je̩ ñwu cha dufu le̩ acha nyʼohimini abadi. Oñ ma añwʼomi-wñ che kinyo̩.

I la ade̩ kʼonugo e̩wñ du ki añmiñmi ki achiche̩ ugbo du kʼohimini lile le̩ acha kade adeju. Uwewe e̩ja-wñ le̩ atabale; todu omi-i lewa o̩mo̩ me̩. Oñ o̩ga du atakpa. Ugbo du kʼohimini le̩ acha kade e̩wñ o̩mo̩ du adeju!
I la awatu, kʼamekwuji adago jʼeti-wñ; akwo E̩nge̩di gbogbo wa E̩ne̩glaim achʼugbo ku ma anʼiga dala. E̩ja-wñ la achʼuche̩ uche̩-wñ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ja Ohimini Elite, ma awewe tabale.
Ama ugbo kʼi nʼe̩pio̩ kpʼugbo kʼite̩-wñ de̩, ma añwʼo̩mo̩ che n; ma tʼe-le̩ no̩ tinyo̩ ki chʼomu.

Oñ o̩la ohimini le̩ oj otete-wñ ej emi-wñ kpʼej ano̩mo̩, oli ije̩ du aya o̩mo̩, eñmi-wñ la akwacha n. I la awe ero n. I arʼe̩ro etito̩ ochu du, todabu kʼomi-wñ le̩ nacha kwef uña kiafo̩ le̩ dufu wa. E̩ro-wñ la chʼutodu uje̩wñ; eñmi-wñ la chʼutodu o̩ga one̩ eche.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Alu ku me̩ ahi ome̩ ku me̩ fʼane̩-i kpe̩ru ñw abo̩lo̩pu Israe̩l me̩gweji kʼi mud e̩wñ ogu-ma de̩. Jose̩f anʼukpe̩ meji.
Ame̩ aje̩, e̩ne̩ʼka aje̩ alu kʼekeji aje̩. Todu u dʼo̩wo̩ nyate̩ go̩ ka kʼu nadu ñw amata-me̩; oñ ane̩-i atʼume̩ o̩wo̩ ki mud e̩wñ ogu-me̩.
Alo̩me̩ ane̩ le̩ de̩: O̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ, akwʼOhimini Elile alʼo̩na He̩tlo̩n gbogbo wʼojukpologu Zedad;
Hemat kpai Berota kpai Sibraim e-ki dʼagbagba alo̩me̩ Damaskus kpʼalo̩me̩ Hemat; Hazo̩r Hatiko̩n kʼi kad alo̩me̩ Hauran.
Alo̩me̩-wñ ki ate̩ kwʼo̩la ohimini abadi ache Hazareno̩n, kʼi dʼalo̩me̩ Damaskus; ale rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata-wñ alo̩me̩ Hemat de̩, o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ de̩.
Alo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ agbagba Hauran kpai Damaskus kpai Gilead kpai ane̩ Israe̩l ache aji Jo̩rdan; me̩ añwa akwʼalo̩me̩-wñ gbogbo wa ohimini o̩wo̩ olodudu, o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ la de̩.
Alerʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ ate̩ kwo Temar gbogbo wa omi Me̩ribo̩t Kede̩sh gbogbo wʼaji Ijipti gbogbo wa kad Ohimini Elile. O̩me̩-wñ ale rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ la de̩.
Ohimini Elile adʼakolo-wñ o̩wo̩ olane̩, akwʼalo̩me̩-wñ gbogbo wa ame̩ru ojukpologu Hemat, o̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olane̩ de̩.
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ akpe̩ ane̩-i ñw o̩la-me̩ teju alu kʼabo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l de̩.

Oñ i awatu, kʼame̩ anʼanya ero̩ akpe̩, kʼi mud e̩wñ ogu ñwu me̩ kpʼamilowa ku ma ge̩ne̩ ef ume̩, ku ma ñʼabi amo̩ma ef ume̩ ge̩; oñ abo le̩ adab amo̩mane̩ ñwu me̩ ef amo̩ma Israe̩l; ama anʼe̩wñ ogu ku ma aje̩ kpʼame̩ ef abo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l.
Oñ i awatu ef o̩lo̩pu du kʼilowa le̩ ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩ le̩, me̩ adʼe̩wñ ogu e-wñ ñw u ki je̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.

Odu o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu la de̩: akwʼotitala-wñ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ eti o̩na He̩tlo̩n gbogbo wʼojukpologu Hemat, Hezar-enan ugbo alo̩me̩ Damaskus le̩ ale rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ o̩wo̩ʼka Hemat, (akolo ugbo meji le̩ ate̩rʼo̩wo̩ olodudu kpʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ) e-Dan chʼukpe̩ʼka.
Oñ ale alo̩me̩ Dan akwʼolodudu-wñ gbogbo wʼolane̩-wñ, Ashe̩r chʼukpe̩ʼka.
Oñ ale alo̩me̩ Ashe̩r akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo wa o̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ, Naftali chʼukpe̩ʼka.
Oñ ale alo̩me̩ Naftali, akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ Manasa chʼukpe̩ʼka.
Oñ ale alo̩me̩ Manasa, akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo wʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ Ifraim chʼukpe̩ʼka.
Oñ ale alo̩me̩ Ifraim, akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo wʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ Rube̩n chʼukpe̩ʼka.
Oñ ale alo̩me̩ Rube̩n akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ Juda chʼukpe̩ʼka.

Oñ ale alo̩me̩ Juda akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo wʼolane̩-wñ ache e̩wñ ako ne ku me̩ adu ñw O̩jo̩ le̩. Unabe̩-wñ chʼe̩ñwa-icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu, ujiji-wñ la adab ukpe̩ʼka ki bo̩ le̩ de̩, owñ chʼakwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo wa olane̩-wñ; uña kiafo̩ le̩ adʼalumeji-wñ.
E̩wñ ku me̩ ako ne ku me̩ adu wa ñwu Jihofa le̩, ujiji-wñ la achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu, unabe̩-wñ la achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa.

E̩wñ kiafo̩ ku ma ko ne achʼutodu amatama; ujiji o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu, oñ unabe̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa, unabe̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa, ujiji o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu. Oñ uña Jihofa kiafo̩ le̩ adʼalumeji-wñ.
E-le̩ ado̩mo̩ ñw amatama ku ma jʼef amo̩ma Zedo̩k ku ma che ma ku ma fo̩ le̩, ku ma fʼe̩wñ-mi kʼu ka le̩ de ku ma ma chiia e̩gba kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l chila le̩ n, owñ chʼalu kʼabo Lifai la le̩.
Oñ e̩wñ ku ma ko ne kwef ane̩ ku ma ko ne ñw O̩jo̩ le̩ achʼe̩wñ ki afo̩ e-efo̩ ñwu ma, alo̩me̩ abo Lifai i de̩.

Oñ alu kʼalo̩me̩ amatama de̩, abe̩le̩ abo Lifai ane̩ ane̩ kʼujiji-wñ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu, unabe̩-wñ la achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa. Ujiji-wñ chaka achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko ogue̩lu, unabe̩-wñ la achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa.
Ma la adʼe-du ef uwñ ta n, ma la adʼu kpailo̩ n; ma la aje̩ ñw e̩ne̩ omune̩ ki nʼejo̩ga ane̩-i n; todu i a fo̩ todu Jihofa.
Oñ unabe̩-wñ ki bo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu ki dʼo̩gba e-icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu le̩, ade̩ kʼo̩ja ki dʼu chʼe̩wñ, owñ chʼutodu ewo le̩, todu odo edo kpʼokije̩; ewo le̩ la adʼalumeji-wñ.

Alu kʼe̩ñwa-wñ ade̩ la de̩: O̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ nyʼoli me̩gwa, o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ la achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ nyʼoli me̩gwa, o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ la achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ nyʼoli me̩gwa, o̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ la achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ nyʼoli me̩gwa ge̩.
Ewo le̩ la anʼokije̩ okije̩: oli me̩lu ajʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ, oli me̩lu ajʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ, oli me̩lu la ajʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ, oli me̩lu la ajʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ.

Oñ ujiji-wñ ki bo̩ ki dʼiba ane̩ kiafo̩ ku ma ko ne le̩, o̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ la achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa, o̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ lañʼachʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwa. E-le̩ adʼakolo kʼakolo ane̩ kiafo̩ ku ma ko ne le̩. E̩wñ oko-wñ achʼuje̩wñ tod abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ ef ewo le̩.
Oñ abo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l du ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ ef ewo le̩ alʼuche̩-wñ.
Ane̩ ku ma ko ne ñw O̩jo̩ le̩ chaka achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu kpai icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu; me̩ akʼane̩ kiafo̩ ku me̩ ko ne le̩ ki chʼago̩go̩ me̩le̩ manyʼewo le̩ ku Jihofa ki ne̩.

E̩bo̩bo̩-wñ la achʼutodu idachi, o̩wo̩ʼka kpʼo̩wo̩ ekeji ane̩ ki afo̩ ku ma du ne tod O̩jo̩ le̩, kpʼe-kʼewo le̩ ne̩; ejo̩gba e̩ñwa icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu e-ku ma du ne ñw O̩jo̩ ki dʼo̩wo̩ alo̩me̩-wñ o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩, kpʼe-kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ ejo̩gba e̩ñwa icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ogue̩lu kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ alo̩me̩ o̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ ki chʼeju ukpe̩ ukpe̩ki bo̩; e-le̩ achʼutodu idachi. Oñ e-ki afo̩ ku ma du ne̩ ñw O̩jo̩ kpʼuña kiafo̩ e-unyi le̩ ajʼalumeji-wñ.
Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, akwʼugbo e-kʼabo Lifai ne̩ kpʼakwʼugbo e̩wñ kʼewo le̩ ne̩ kʼi dʼalumeji e-kʼidachi ne̩ le̩, owñ chʼagbagba alo̩me̩ Juda kpʼalo̩me̩ Be̩njamin e-le̩ ñʼachʼutodu idachi ge̩.
I la chʼe-abo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu ki bo̩, akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo tʼo̩wo̩ o̩lane̩-wñ, Be̩njamin nʼukpe̩ʼka.
Oñ ale alo̩me̩ e-Be̩njamin akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ Simeo̩n anʼukpe̩ʼka.
Oñ ale alo̩me̩ Simeo̩n akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ, Isakar anʼukpe̩ʼka.
Oñ ale alo̩me̩ Isakar akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo tʼo̩wo̩ o̩lane̩-wñ, Ze̩biulo̩n anʼukpe̩ʼka.
Oñ ale alo̩me̩ Ze̩biulo̩n akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ gbogbo tʼo̩wo̩ olane̩-wñ Gad anʼukpe̩ʼ ʼka.
Oñ ale alo̩me̩ Gad o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ, ale rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ, alo̩me̩-wñ ate̩ kwo Te̩mar gbogbo wa omi Me̩ribat Ke̩de̩sh, gbogbo wʼaji Ijipti gbogbo tʼo̩l Ohimini Elile.
Ane̩ kʼuwe̩ aranya akpe̩ ñw o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l ki chʼe̩wñ ogu-ma de̩; ukpe̩ ojoji ojoji kʼama la ane̩ le̩ de̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
O̩na o̩na ugbo ku ma akwʼef ewo le̩ dufu la de̩: o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ ma anʼe̩ñwa le̩ añwa icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ nyʼoli me̩gwa.
Odu alaku alaku ewo le̩ la ade̩ alu kʼodu o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l de̩; alaku me̩ta ajʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩-wñ; alaku Rube̩n chʼo̩ka, alaku Juda chʼoka, alaku Lifai chʼoka.
O̩wo̩ olodudu-wñ la ache icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ nyʼoli me̩gwa, kpai alaku me̩ta: owñ chʼalaku Jose̩f chʼoka, alaku Be̩njamin chʼoka, alaku Dan chʼo̩ka.
O̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩-wñ la achʼe̩ñwa icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ nyʼoli me̩gwa, kpai alaku me̩ta: alaku Simeo̩n chʼoka, alaku Isakar chʼoka, alaku Ze̩biulo̩n chʼoka.
O̩wo̩ o̩lane̩-wñ ache icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ nyʼoli me̩gwa kpʼalaku-wñ me̩ta ge̩: alaku Gad chʼoka, alaku Ashe̩r chʼoka, alaku Naftali chʼoka.
Ale daka-wñ achʼe̩ñwa icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩. Akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i odu ewo le̩ ako̩ O̩mo̩ Jihofa De̩.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta ku Jiho̩yakim jʼonu Juda, Ne̩biukadne̩za onu Babilo̩n, lewa fʼala kpa nyu Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak Ondu mu Jiho̩yakim, onu Juda, du tʼowñ o̩wo̩ manyʼe̩wñ eku unyi O̩jo̩ iche̩ka; oñ i mʼu ño̩ nyʼane̩ Shainar tʼunyi o̩jo̩ e-wñ; tak i mʼe̩wñ eku le̩ ko nyʼunyi e̩wñ akoko o̩jo̩-wñ.
Tak onu ko̩la ñw Ashpe̩naz kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ ki tʼo̩gba amonoji-wñ kʼi kʼabimo̩to̩ Israe̩l iche̩ka wa, owñ chʼamo̩ma onu kpai abo ku ma bi lʼeju O̩jo̩ iche̩ka.

Ama ki chʼabokolobia ku ma ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n, kʼo̩la-ma de̩ bo̩lo̩bo̩lo̩, ku ma chʼo̩ka e̩wñ ibe ojoji ojoji, ku ma chema e̩wñ, ku ma chemeju e̩wñ eko̩che̩. Ama ki ño̩ chʼabo ku ma bo̩jo̩ ku ma dago ef unyi onu; kʼama ki ko̩ ma e̩wñ kʼabo Kaldia ko̩che̩ kpai ichi-ma ge̩.

Tak onu fʼukpe̩ uje̩wñ e-wñ ki rinyo̩ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma e-wñ kʼi añmo̩ ñwate̩ ñwu ma alu ku ma ako ñwu ma o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa, ku ma ne̩ ma o̩do̩ me̩ta; o̩do̩ le̩ muda kʼama ki lewa dago o̩gba onu.
Oñ Danie̩l kpai Hananaya kpai Mishae̩l kpai Azaraya jʼef amo̩ma Juda ku ma jʼef abo le̩.
Tak agboji amonoji le̩ mʼodu omune̩ ko ñwu ma; Be̩lte̩shaza i du ñwu Danie̩l; Shedrak i du ñwu Hananaya; Mishe̩k i du ñwu Mishae̩l; Abe̩d-nego i la du ñw Azaraya.
Danie̩l muda fʼibe-wñ kpe̩ te̩ ka kʼowñ akpʼo̩la-wñ bie̩ ugbo uje̩wñ e̩rinyo̩ e-onu kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ kʼi añmo̩ n. Todule̩ i bi agboji amonoji kʼi we ekpʼo̩la-wñ bie̩.
O̩jo̩ la je̩ ñw agboji amonoji ki li Danie̩l eju kʼi mo̩la ñw u kʼi no̩ liʼu ejumomi.

Tak agboji amonoji le̩ ka ñwu Danie̩l kakini, Narailo odu-mi onu, owñ le̩ fʼuje̩wñ-me̩ kpai omi-me̩ ñwate̩; e̩wñ chi kʼi ali eju-me̩ ki ma nyo̩ dab eju abokolobia eje̩go̩-me̩ n? Oji-mi me̩ tene edu ñw onu.
Taku Danie̩l ka ñw imo̩to̩ kʼagboji amonoji mu Danie̩l kpai Hananaya kpai Mishae̩l kpai Azaraya ko nyʼo̩ o̩wo̩ kakini,
Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ jʼamadu-we̩-i ma o̩jo̩ me̩gwa; e̩ la je̩ ñwu ma kʼe̩wñ oko kwe̩ kwe̩ kwe̩ ñw a je̩ kpʼomiofo ñw a ñmo̩.
E̩gba le̩ tak e̩ je̩ ñwu ma gʼeju-wa o̩gba-we̩, kpai eju abokolobia kʼama le̩ je̩ uje̩wñ onu ki arinyo̩ le̩; oñ alu kʼe̩ li o̩mo̩ alu le̩ oñ e̩ che ñw amadu-we̩-i.
Abe̩le̩ i netirʼuma ef o̩la le̩, oñ i jʼuma ma o̩jo̩ me̩gwa.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ me̩gwa le̩ le rʼane̩, eju-ma la chʼuto̩ tule, ma chenʼaño̩la tʼabokolobia ku ma jʼuje̩wñ e̩rinyo̩ e-onu chaka le.
Todule̩ imo̩to̩ onu mʼuje̩wñ e̩rinyo̩ kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma ki dukpe̩ kʼama añmo̩ ko kwʼo̩mo̩, oñ i mʼe̩wñ oko kwe̩ kwe̩ kwe̩ ko ñwu ma.
I chʼe-abokolobia me̩le̩ le̩, O̩jo̩ mʼibe kpʼugbeju ko ñwu ma ef e̩wñ eko̩che̩ kpai e̩wñ ibe du. Danie̩l la chemoji ane̩ ego kpai o̩na kʼone̩ ana chaka.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ kʼonu bu ñwu ma taku ma ako ma wa jo̩, agboji amonoji le̩ mʼuma ko wʼejefu o̩gba Ne̩biukadne̩za.
Tak onu bʼuma chʼoluka; ma la li e̩ne̩ du ef uma ki dabu Danie̩l kpai Hananaya kpai Mishae̩l kpai Azaraya n: todule̩ ma kwodago o̩gba onu.
Oñ ef o̩la ibe du kpʼugbo oji e̩wñ ema, kʼonu tʼuma ene, i li ka kʼama nyo̩ tʼamachifamu kpai amade̩bo̩ du ku ma jʼojane̩-wñ le onu me̩gwa.
Danie̩l la kpo̩kpe̩ gbogbo wʼo̩do̩ ejodudu ki Sairo̩s jʼonu.
Oñ o̩do̩ ekeji ku Ne̩biukadne̩za jʼonu, Ne̩biukadne̩za fʼo̩na na ana ño̩ na; e̩do̩-wñ la nyo̩ n, eju-wñ la gbe̩.
Tak onu ñwañwu ma ku ma do̩ amachifamu kpai amade̩bo̩ kpai amagomi kpai abo Kaldia wa ku ma kʼoji o̩na-wñ ñw onu. Abe̩le̩ ma lewa dago jʼo̩gba onu.
Tak onu ka ñwu ma kakini, U fʼo̩na na, oñ e̩do̩-mi ache mi akanya kʼu ma oji o̩na le̩.
Tak abo Kaldia ka ñw onu ichi abo Siria, kakini, O Onu, oji-we̩ ki gbo kala kala; e̩ ka ñw amadu-we̩ alu kʼe̩ nʼo̩na le̩ tak a akʼofe-wñ ñw e̩.
Tak onu dohi, oñ i ka ñw abo Kaldia kakini, U fʼo̩la le̩ ñwate̩ me̩; ame̩ ma kʼo̩na le̩ kpʼofe-wñ ñwu mi n, ma akʼume̩ da ye̩ge̩ ye̩ge̩, oñ ma akʼunyi unyi-me̩ chʼojeita.
Me̩ muda mʼo̩na le̩ kpʼofe-wñ du dufu, me̩ agba e̩wñ ele kpai uloko kpai ojima nana o̩wo̩-mi; todule̩ me̩ ki kʼona le̩ kpʼofe̩-wñ ñwu mi.
Taku ma dohi onukeji kakini. Onu ki ka ñw amadu-wñ o̩na kʼi na le̩, tak a akʼofe-wñ.
Onu dohi kakini, U fʼofe-me̩ ma me̩, ame̩ tene kʼame̩ ki lʼiko de̩, todabu ku me̩ cheli ka kʼu fʼo̩la le̩ ñwate̩ me̩.

Ame̩ ma la kʼo̩na le̩ ñw omi n, o̩da ki do̩mo̩ ñwu me̩ chʼokate: todu o̩lemi kpʼo̩la e̩bie̩ne̩ oñ me̩ ñwo̩che jo̩ ku me̩ ka o̩gba-mi, gbogbo tak iko-i ki lale; todule̩ me̩ ki kʼo̩na le̩ ñwu mi, tak omi ama ka kʼame̩ neke kʼofe-wñ ñwu mi.

Oñ abo Kaldia le̩ mʼohi du o̩gba onu kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki dʼile̩ kʼi neke dʼo̩la onu le̩ dufu n, todu alu du kʼi chaka nana kpai alu du kʼukpahiu-wñ de̩, i nʼonu du abe̩k e̩ne̩ o̩da ki tene e̩wñ abe̩le̩ ugbo achifamu kpai ade̩bo̩ kpai Kaldia mama ta n.
E̩wñ kʼonu tene-i chekpuna, i la nʼe̩ne̩ du ki neke dʼu dufu o̩gba onu-i n, chai amo̩jo̩ kʼama ma dodo kpenyʼo̩re̩la n.
Tod e-le̩ e̩do̩ onu kpa, oñ i we̩do̩ tabale, tak i ñwañw abo-wñ ku ma fʼamanibe Babilo̩n du kpa rinyo̩.
Abe̩le̩ o̩da le̩ le dufu, ka kʼama ki fʼamanibe kpa; taku ma kwotejane̩ Danie̩l kpʼamekeji-wñ le̩ ku ma ko ma kpa.
Taku Danie̩l dabi dohi ibe ibe ñw Erio̩k, kʼi chʼagboji abo ide onu kʼi dufu kʼi kpa amanibe Babilo̩n;
oñ i dohi ñw Eriok kʼi chʼagboji abʼonu le̩ kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼo̩da ki kwʼugbo onu chʼuna una abe̩i taa? Tak Eriok fʼofe-wñ ka ñwu Danie̩l.
Oñ Danie̩l nyʼejefu agbo̩ko̩bʼonu kʼi dʼiko ñw u kʼi dʼoji o̩na le̩ ka ñw onu.
Taku Danie̩l nyʼunyi-wñ, oñ i mʼu du ka ñwu Hananaya kpai Mishae̩l kpʼAzaraya, amekeji-wñ le̩,
kʼama ki bi O̩jo̩ e-efojale kʼi li ma ejumomi ugbo e̩wñ ki maja-i; todu ki Danie̩l kpai amakeji-wñ ki we elenyo̩ manyʼamanibe Babilo̩n ki bo̩.
Tak e̩wñ ki maja le̩ tejugede ñw Danie̩l ef ane̩ ego odu.
Daniel kakini:
I arʼiko e̩wñ kpai ewo e̩wñ da;
I adʼe̩wñ ki nʼefu kpai e̩wñ ki maja tejugede;
Nagwʼe̩, nakele we̩,
Todule̩ Danie̩l nyʼejefu ugbo Erio̩k, e-kʼonu du dago kʼi fʼamanibe Babilo̩n kpa; oñ i nyʼakʼabe̩-i ñw u kakini, E̩ ki kpa amanibe Babilo̩n in; mʼumi du nyʼo̩gba onu, tak u nakʼofe o̩na le̩ ñw onu.
Tak Eriok hika du Danie̩l wʼo̩gba onu o̩mo̩ piopio, oñ i fʼabe̩-i ka ñw u kakini, U fʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka li kʼi dʼef abimo̩to̩ Juda ku ma mu wa le̩ kʼi aje̩ ñw onu ma ofe o̩na-wñ.
Tak onu dohi ka ñwu Danie̩l, kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Be̩lte̩shaza, kakini, Uwe̩ neke je̩ ñwu mi ma o̩na kʼu li le̩ kpʼofe-wñ ge̩?
Danie̩l mʼohi du eju onu o̩mo̩ kakini, E̩wñ umaja kʼonu ka le̩, tʼamanibe̩, tʼamade̩bo̩, tʼamachifamu, tʼamake̩ma neke kʼofe-wñ ñw onu n;

O̩jo̩ʼka muda dʼefojale kʼi adʼe̩wñ ki maja tejugede. Owñ le̩ la aje̩ ñw onu Ne̩biukadne̩za ma e̩wñ ki ado̩mo̩ iko o̩jo̩ otitala. O̩na kʼe̩ na kpai ane̩ kʼe̩ go e̩gba kʼe̩ dʼoj ate̩-we̩ le̩, e̩wñ ki che de̩:
I chʼuwe̩ O onu, ibe e̩wñ ki awache ejo̩gba wʼef uwe̩ oj ate̩-we̩ o̩mo̩, oñ e̩ne̩ ki adʼe̩wñ ki maja tejugede le̩ la je̩ ñw e̩ ma e̩wñ ki awache.
I muda chʼe-mi e̩wñ ki maja le̩ tejugede ñwu mi tod ibeʼka kʼu ne̩ tʼabo ki bo̩ ku ma deju le n, chai todu kʼonu ki mʼofe-wñ kʼuwe̩ ki la ma ibe ki wʼef uwe̩ le̩.
O, uwe̩ onu, ojibo lileʼka e̩ li le̩, ojibo le̩ tabale, ufane̩-wñ chʼe̩gahi, oñ i dago o̩gba-we̩; i la abailo.
I chʼe-ojibo le̩, oji-wñ chʼo̩jamalia hiolo, agbe̩do̩-wñ kpʼo̩wo̩-wñ chʼajifa, efu-wñ kpai uta-wñ chʼebijekpa,
akwʼuta-wñ meji wʼagbe̩re̩ ane̩-wñ ma chʼebije, e̩rane̩-wñ chʼebije kpai ike̩te̩ kpe̩gwa nyʼomune̩.
E̩ kejurʼu gbogbo, taku ma fʼokuta da ki ma chʼo̩wo̩ one̩ che n, oñ i lewa nu e̩re̩ ojibo ki chʼebije kpai ike̩te̩ le̩, i la fʼu kpo̩fo̩ ye̩ge̩-ye̩ge̩.

Tak ebije kpai ike̩te̩ kpai ebijekpa kpai ajifa kpai o̩jamalia mukpo̩fo̩ nyʼomune̩, oñ i dab igbogbo ugbo ku ma gwu o̩ka iko afu o̩we̩; afu le̩ la mʼu ko kwʼo̩mo̩ alo, ma ño̩ li uña tod uwñ ge̩ n. Tak okuta ki kpʼojibo le̩ fo̩ mud uwo lile, oñ i mʼile̩du gba nyʼo̩wo̩.
O̩na kʼe̩ na le̩ de̩. Awa akʼofe-wñ o̩gba onu-i:
O onu, uwe̩ chʼonu amonu, e-kʼO̩jo̩ e-efojale mʼojane̩-wñ kpʼukpahiu-wñ kpʼugbiti-wñ kpʼojima-wñ ko ñw e̩;
oñ ugbo du kʼamo̩ma one̩ dodo kpai ame̩la oko kpai ame̩we̩ ojale, i mʼu ko nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ kʼe̩ nʼo̩da-ma chaka; uwe̩-i chʼoji e-o̩jamalia le̩.
Ubi we̩ tak onu ojane̩ omune̩ ki nyarʼuwe̩ akwane̩; kpʼo̩da ojane̩ e̩ke̩ta ki chʼebijekpa, kʼabo le̩ anʼo̩da ane̩-ile̩ du.
O̩da ojane̩ e̩ke̩le̩ la agbiti dab ebije, abu kʼebije akpʼe̩wñ fo̩ kʼi la afʼe̩wñ du du; oñ alu kʼebije akpʼe̩wñ-i du fo̩ mane̩, alu le̩ oñ e-i akpʼe̩wñ fo̩ kʼi fʼu te̩mane̩.

Oñ abu kʼe̩ li kʼe̩re̩-wñ kpai o̩me̩re̩-wñ ugboʼka-wñ chʼama kʼugboʼka-wñ la chʼebije, ojane̩-wñ akpe̩ru abe̩le̩; ukpahiu ebije muda adʼef uwñ alu kʼe̩ li ka kʼebije kpʼe̩pio̩ le̩ chʼe̩kpe̩gwa nyʼomune̩.
Oñ alu kʼo̩me̩re̩-wñ ugbo ʼka chʼebije kʼugboʼka-wñ chʼike̩te̩, alu le̩ oñ ojane̩ le̩ anʼugbo ki gbiti, i la anʼugbo ki ma gbegbe dako dako n.
Oñ alu kʼe̩ li ka kʼebije le̩ chʼe̩kpe̩gwa nyʼe̩pio̩, amone̩ le̩ akpe̩gwa nyʼugbe̩ one̩ ofo; ma muda amanyu o̩la-ma n, alu kʼebije ma dama nyʼike̩te̩ n.

Tak iko amonu e-le̩ O̩jo̩ e-efojale adʼojane̩ dago ki ma lañʼakpabie̩ ogbegbele̩ n. Ma la atʼo̩da o̩fe̩-wñ no tane̩ ñw abo omune̩ n; owñ le̩ muda akpʼojane̩-i du fo̩ kʼi fʼu lie̩, owñ onugo la adago ogbegbele̩.

Abu kʼe̩ li ka ku ma fʼokuta da kwʼibe̩ uwo le̩, ki ma chʼo̩wo̩ one̩ che n, ki la fʼebije kpʼebi-jekpa kpʼama kpʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia le̩ kpo̩fo̩ rinyo̩, mak O̩jo̩ Inaina je̩ ñw onu ma e̩wñ ki awache ejo̩gba: alu kʼo̩na le̩ de̩ achi n, oji-wñ ogbolo la de̩.
Tak onu Ne̩biukadne̩za fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ i dojikane̩ ñwu Danie̩l, i la ñwañw abo-wñ ku ma kʼe̩wñ ele kpai e̩wñ ki akpo wa achʼo.
Onu dohi ñwu Danie̩l, oñ i kakini, Ochochi, O̩jo̩-we̩ chʼO̩jo̩ e-amo̩jo̩, kpai Ondu amonu. E̩ne̩ ki la akʼe̩wñ ki maja tejugede i che, abu kʼe̩ neke dʼe̩wñ ki maja-i tejugede.
Tak onu mu Danie̩l du chʼe̩ne̩ lile, oñ i kʼe̩wñ lile wewe chʼe ele, i la je̩ ñw u nʼo̩da ojane̩ Babilo̩n chaka, oñ i dʼowñ chʼuto̩gba amakoji onu kʼi nʼo̩da amanibe Babilo̩n du.
Taku Danie̩l bi onu ebi-wñ oñ i ko e̩wñ ojane̩ Babilo̩n nyu Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego o̩wo̩; Danie̩l muda dʼanuku onu.
Ne̩biukadne̩za, onu le̩, nʼoo̩amalia chʼojibo, o̩gba-wñ chʼohibo̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohibo̩wo̩ me̩fa: i la mʼu du dago egbili Dura, ojane̩ Babilo̩n.

Taku Ne̩biukadne̩za onu le̩, fʼuche̩ kpe̩ ado̩ amakomu onu kpʼamakoji onu kpʼamigo̩bina kpʼamedibo kpʼamadigede, kpʼabohiala, kpʼamamoli o̩lo̩da, kpai abo̩da ojane̩ ojane̩ du kʼama ki wa go edunyane̩ kʼama adʼojibo ki Ne̩biukadne̩za onu le̩ du dago, nyane̩.

Tak amakomu onu kpʼamakoji onu kpʼamigo̩bina kpʼamedibo kpʼamadigede kpʼabo̩hiala kpʼamamoli o̩lo̩da kpʼabo ku ma nʼo̩da ojane̩ ojane̩ du jeju wʼugbo ku ma adʼojibo ki Ne̩biukadne̩za onu le̩ du dago nyane̩. Oñ ma kwodago jʼo̩gba ojibo ku Ne̩biukadne̩za du dago le̩.
Taku ma fʼakoya ta kakini, Ame̩ ma ka-i, O amone̩, abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi kpʼamakichi ojoji ojoji,

ma kakini, Iko kʼame̩ gbo̩ uko̩la bijila kpʼo̩kpana kpʼumolo kpʼokugulu kpʼugwoje kpʼalije̩ta ku ma nʼobutu fa, kpʼe̩wñ iya ojoji chaka, ame̩ ki lewane̩ adojikane̩ ñw ojibo o̩jamalia ki Ne̩biukadne̩za onu du dago-i.
E̩ne̩ ki ma lewane̩ adojikane̩ n, ma adʼu rikpolo tʼalumeji una ki ajo̩ ef aido iko le̩ gbage̩de̩.

Todule̩, iko le̩, e̩gba kʼamone̩ chaka gbo̩ uko̩la bijila kpʼo̩kpana kpʼumolo kpʼokugulu kpʼugwoje kpʼe̩wñ iya ojoji du, amone̩ uche̩uche̩ kpai ichi ichi du lewane̩ adojikane̩ ñw ojibo o̩jamalia ki Ne̩biukadne̩za onu du dago o̩mo̩.
Tak iko le̩ abo Kaldia iche̩ka te̩wa agwʼajo̩ nʼamaju.
Ma kʼohi ñwu Ne̩biukadne̩za onu, kakini, O onu, oji-we̩ ki gbo kala kala.
O onu, uwe̩ dʼo̩da te̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki agbʼuko̩la bijila kpʼo̩kpana kpʼumo̩lo kpʼokugulu kpʼugwoje kpʼalije̩ta kpʼe̩wñ iya ojoji du kʼi nawane̩ adojikane̩ ñw ojibo o̩jamalia le̩;
oñ e̩ne̩ ki ma lewane̩ adojikane̩ ñw u n, ma adʼu rikpolo tʼalumeji una ki ajo ef adido.

AmaJu iche̩ka do̩mo̩ kʼuwe̩ dʼo̩da e̩wñ ojane̩ Babilo̩n nyʼuma o̩wo̩: She̩drak, Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego; O onu, aboke̩le̩-i anyʼuwe̩ eti n: ma are̩ amo̩jo̩-we̩ n, ma la adojikane̩ ñw ojibo o̩jamalia kʼe̩ du dago le̩ n.
Tak ef uwe̩do̩-wñ kpʼe̩do̩fulu-wñ Ne̩biukadne̩za ka ñwu ma ku ma ko Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego wa. Oñ ma mʼabo le̩ ko wa o̩gba onu.
Ne̩biukadne̩za tʼuma ene kakini, O Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego, ame̩ gwejugede ko̩ ere̩ o̩jo̩-mi? kpai e̩dojikane̩ ñw ojibo o̩jamalia kʼu du dago le̩?

I la che̩wñ kʼo̩la-me̩ chʼe̩mu dede iko ku me̩ gbʼuko̩la bijila kpʼo̩kpana kpʼumolo kpʼokugulu kpʼugwoje kpʼalije̩ta kpʼe̩wñ iya ojoji du, ku me̩ lewane̩ adojikane̩ ñw ojibo kʼu che le̩, mak i nyo̩; me̩ ma muda dojikane̩ n, iko le̩ gbage̩de̩ ma ako me̩ rikpolo tʼalumeji una ki ajo ef adido; e̩ne̩ chʼO̩jo̩ kʼi agba me̩ bʼef o̩wo̩-mi te̩?
Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego dohi, oñ ma ka ñw onu kakini, O Ne̩biukadne̩za, eku edohi ñw e̩ ef o̩la-i ku uwa n.
I dʼabe̩le̩ ochochi, mak O̩jo̩-wa kʼa are̩ neke gba wa kwef una ki ajo ef adido le̩; i la agba wa kwʼef o̩wo̩-we̩, O onu.
I ma dʼabe̩le̩ n, uwe̩ ki ma, O onu, ka kʼawa are̩ amo̩jo̩-we̩ n, a la adojikane̩ ñw ojibo o̩jamalia kʼe̩ du dago le̩ n.
Taku Ne̩biukadne̩za ke̩do̩fulu ololo, oñ alu kʼeju-wñ de̩ ugbo Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego rida; i la fʼo̩la ka, i ñwa ñwu ma ku ma kʼuna nyʼadido̩ ki kpa tʼalu ki te̩takpa le̩ onu mebie.
Tak i ñwañw amagbiti iche̩ka ku ma jʼef abogu-wñ, kʼama ki fu Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego̩ ji, ku ma ko ma rikpolo tef una ki ajo ef adido le̩.
Taku ma fʼabo le̩ ji kpai afe̩-ma kpʼichaka-ma kpʼalawoni-ma kpʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma du, oñ ma mʼu ma ko rikpolo nyʼalumeji una ki ajo ef adido le̩.
Todabu kʼo̩la kʼonu ñwañwu ma chʼunaju unaju, kʼadido le̩ la kpa tabale, o̩go̩ una-wñ fʼabo ku ma ko Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego kpa.
Oñ abo me̩ta le̩, owñ che Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego lewane̩ alumeji una ki ajo ef adido le̩, e̩wñ ku ma ne̩ ji ma dʼo̩la-ma ta.
Tak awuwu fu Ne̩biukadne̩za onu le̩ mu, oñ i hika kwane̩; i la ko̩la ñw abohiala-wñ kakini, I chʼe̩ji one̩ me̩ta oñ awa ko rikpolo nyʼalumeji una-i n? Ma dohi ñw onu kakini, Ochochi, O onu.
I dohi kakini, Go, u che li aboke̩le̩ me̩le̩ abu ku ma kwotane̩ ku ma tale alumeji una, e̩wñ du la che ma n; eju e̩ne̩ e̩ke̩le̩-ma la dab o̩ma amo̩jo̩ abe̩i.

Taku Ne̩biukadne̩za te̩ me̩rʼalu adido kʼuna ajo ef uwñ le̩; i ko̩la, kakini, Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego, ame̩, amadu O̩jo̩ Chamachala, me̩ dufu wa ku me̩ wʼemi. Taku Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego kwʼalumeji una le̩ dufu wa.

Oñ abu kʼamakomomi kpʼamakoji onu kpʼamigo̩bina kpʼabo̩hiala onu jʼugbo kate o̩mo̩, ma fʼabo-i li kʼuna ma nʼukpahiu du año̩la-ma n, kʼiloji oji-ma la jo n, i la chʼafe̩-ma abu du n, e̩ la gbʼulu una o̩la-ma n.

Ne̩biukadne̩za ko̩la, i kakini, O̩jo̩ Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpai Abe̩d-nego kʼi nele owñ fʼonuche̩-wñ kpe̩ wa agba amadu-wñ ku ma dachi nʼowñ ku ma la fʼo̩la onu rida, Ma la dʼoj o̩la-ma tinyo̩ kʼama ki we ere̩ ku ma la we edojikane̩ ñw amo̩jo̩ du tʼO̩jo̩ e-ma le.

Todule̩ nadʼo̩da te̩-i kakini, Amone̩ kpʼuche̩ichi du kpʼaluichi du ki ako̩la akpʼO̩jo̩ Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpʼAbe̩d-nego bie̩, ma akʼo̩ da ye̩ge̩ ye̩ge̩, ma la ako unyi unyi-ma che ojeita; todu O̩jo̩ omune̩ du kʼi aneke gbʼone̩ dab owñ do̩mo̩ ge̩ n.
Tak onu ko Shedrak kpai Mishe̩k kpʼAbe̩d-nego nyo̩gba ef uko̩lo̩ ojane̩ Babilo̩n.
O̩wo̩ onu Ne̩biukadne̩za tʼugbo amone̩ du kpʼabo uche̩ichi kpʼalichi ugbo du kʼone̩ dodo ane̩-ile̩-i: I ra ñw me̩ kpo̩o̩!
I nyʼumi eju kʼu dʼujiwe kpʼuno̩ kʼO̩jo̩ Chamachala che ñw mi ña me̩.
Ujiwe-wñ gbe̩ gbe̩!
Omi Ne̩biukadne̩za, dʼef unyi-mi añmi, u la dʼef unyi-mi ajʼura.
U fʼo̩na ki bʼumi ailo na; oñ ibe ki wʼef umi oj ate̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼoji-mi li che mi e̩do̩ñwañwala.
Todule̩ u dʼo̩da te̩ kʼama ki kʼamanibe Babilo̩n chaka wa o̩gba-mi, ku ma ki je̩ ñw mi ma ofe o̩na le̩.
Tak amachifamu kpai amade̩bo kpai abo Kaldia kpai amake̩ma lewa; oñ u mʼo̩na kʼu na du ka jane̩ ñw ma; ma muda kʼofe-wñ ñw mi n.
Gbogbo tʼotitala-wñ taku Danie̩l mugudu wʼo̩gba-mi, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Be̩lte̩shaza, ukpodu o̩jo̩-mi, kʼAfu amo̩jo̩ kiafo̩ la dʼef uwñ le̩: tak u kʼo̩na le̩ jane̩ ñw u, u kakini,
O Be̩lte̩shaza, odu amachifamu, todabu kʼu chema kʼafu amo̩jo̩ kiafo̩ dʼef uwe̩, e̩wñ afili du la tʼuwe̩ le n, e̩ nakʼe̩wñ kʼu li ef o̩na-mi le̩ ñwu mi kpʼofe-wñ.
E̩wñ kʼoji-mi li oj ate̩-mi le̩ de̩: U li, e̩ la go, oli dʼalumeji ile̩-i; o̩gba-wñ la tabale.
Oli le̩ nagba waa, i la gbiti, o̩gba-wñ te̩ gbogbo kad efojale, oñ ugbo du kʼone̩ de̩ gbogbo kad ukpoji ile̩-i i aliʼu.
Eñmi-wñ chʼuto̩ eju, e̩ro-wñ la tabale, uje̩wñ i che ñw e̩ne̩ du, ofe-wñ chenʼolubo̩ kʼame̩la oko ajo̩, ame̩we̩ ojale la kʼunyi jʼe̩to̩-wñ, oñ o̩re̩la du nʼuje̩wñ-ma o̩mo̩.
E̩wñ kʼu li ef oji-mi oj ate̩-mi le̩, e̩ la go, e̩ne̩ ki adide kpai e̩ne̩ kiafo̩ gwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa.
I fʼukwa kwa, oñ ab i ka de̩ kakini, Fʼoli le̩ lo̩ wane̩, e̩ la fʼe̩to̩-wñ ko̩da, fʼeñmi-wñ mi rinyo̩, fʼe̩ro-wñ fiatuka; ame̩la ki kwo bʼofe-wñ te̩, ame̩we̩ ki la kwo bʼe̩to̩-wñ te̩.
E̩ muda tʼikakpunu-wñ no̩ dago ane̩, me̩ nʼebije kpʼebije-kpa fʼu ji te̩ ef egbe emimi oko le̩; eli ojale ki nachi nyʼu: ukpe̩ e-wñ ki la dʼugbo ame̩la ef egbe ane̩ ile̩-i;
e̩do̩-wñ ki murida bʼe-one̩ te̩ ku ma ki dʼe̩do̩ e̩la ñw u; iko iko mebie ki lʼowñ oji.

Udu ku ma bu le̩ kwʼugbo abo ku ma adide, o̩la le̩ la chʼo̩la abo kiafo̩; owñ chʼutodu kʼabo ki deju ki ma ka kʼO̩machala nʼo̩da ojane̩ amone̩, i la adʼu ñw e̩ne̩ du ki dʼowñ e̩do̩, i adʼe̩ne̩ ki chʼo̩wo̩wane̩ ñw amone̩ dago kʼi dʼo̩da le̩ nyʼu o̩wo̩.
O̩na-i, omi, onu Ne̩biukadne̩za na; oñ uwe̩, O Be̩lte̩shaza, ki kʼofe-wñ dufu, abu kʼamanibe ojane̩-mi du ma neke je̩ ñwu mi ma ofe-wñ n; uwe̩ muda neke che; todu afu amo̩jo̩ kiafo̩ dʼef uwe̩.

Tak ugoju mu Danie̩l, kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Be̩lte̩shaza le̩ da dago gbogbogbogbo; ibe-wñ kʼi akpe̩ la mud e̩do̩ñwañwala ñw u. Oñ onu dohi kakini, Be̩lte̩shaza, o̩na le̩ kpʼofe-wñ eka ki chʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ ñwañwala n. Be̩lte̩shaza dohi oñ i kakini, Odu-mi o̩na le̩ ki che̩ rʼabo ku ma chʼulaka-we̩, ofe-wñ ki la che̩ rʼame̩no̩la-we̩.
Oli kʼe̩ li, kʼi gba alo ki ño̩ gbiti, e-kʼo̩gba-wñ kad efojale, kʼabo ile̩ du aliʼi;
kʼeñmi-wñ chʼuto̩ eju, kʼe̩ro-wñ la tabale, kʼi ño̩ chʼuje̩wñ ñw e̩ne̩ du le̩; kʼunyi ame̩la oko jʼofe-wñ kʼame̩we̩ ojale la kʼunyi-ma jʼe̩to̩-wñ:
O onu, uwe̩ de̩, kʼuwe̩ nana kʼe̩ chenʼukpahiu; todu iñmi-we̩ nyo̩gba me̩, i gba kad efojale, o̩da-we̩ la kad otitala ane̩-ile̩-i.

Oñ abu kʼonu fʼe̩ne̩ ki adide kpai e̩ne̩ kiafo̩ʼka li abu kʼi agwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa, kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kakini, Fʼoli le̩ lo̩ wane̩, ku me̩ la fʼu chile̩che̩; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ me̩ tʼikakpunu-wñ no̩ dago ane̩, me̩ nʼebije kpʼebijekpa fʼu ji te̩ ef egbe emimi oko o̩mo̩, kʼeli ojale ki chi nyʼu; ukpe̩ e-wñ ki la dʼugbo ame̩la ef egbe ane̩-ile̩-i, gbogbo tak iko iko mebie ki lʼowñ oji;
ofe-wñ de̩, O onu, o̩da O̩machala ki bʼodu-mi onu ma, i la che;

ka ku ma anʼuwe̩ bʼef amone̩ te̩, oñ ugugu-we̩ adʼugbo ame̩la oko, ma la aje̩ ñw e̩ lʼegbe dab amo̩kokuno̩. Eli ojale la achi nyʼuwe̩ o̩la, oñ iko iko mebie alʼuwe̩ oji; gbogbo tak uwe̩ ama ka kʼO̩machala nʼo̩da ojane̩ amone̩, kʼi la adʼu ñw e̩ne̩ du ki dʼowñ e̩do̩.
Oñ abu ku ma ñwañwu ma ku ma tʼikakpunu oli le̩ no̩; e̩gba kʼe̩ fu ma ka kʼefojale efojale nʼo̩da ile̩-i, ojane̩-we̩ achʼe-we̩ chuu.
Todule̩ O onu, o̩hiala kʼu naka ñw e̩ ki rʼe̩ eju, kʼe̩ nʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa fʼoji adure-we̩ kpa, oñ ejumomi ame̩ne̩chikimi eli ki kpoji udu kʼe̩ fe̩; ikani ma neke bʼuñmi tʼo̩ ñw e̩.
E̩wñ-i du lewa bʼonu Ne̩biukadne̩za ma.
E̩gba kʼochu me̩gweji jo̩ i tale ojokunyi onu Babilo̩n.
Onu fʼo̩la ka kakini, I che Babilo̩n lile kʼomi nʼugbiti ukpahiu-mi ko̩ ki chʼunyi onu le̩ de̩ n? todu kʼi chʼojima unana e-mi n?
Abu kʼo̩la le̩ dʼalu onu ta, omuko̩laʼka ñwa kwʼefojale, kakini, O, onu Ne̩biukadne̩za, uwe̩ ma ka-i. Ojane̩-i kwo bʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ te̩ me̩;

ma la anʼuwe̩ bʼef amone̩ te̩; ugugu-we̩ la adʼugbo ame̩la oko; ma aje̩ ñw e̩ lʼegbe dab amo̩kokuno̩; oñ iko iko mebie alʼuwe̩ oji; gbogbo tak uwe̩ fu ma ka kʼO̩machala nʼo̩da ojane̩ amone̩, i la adu ñw e̩ne̩ du ki dʼowñ e̩do̩.

Iko le̩ gbage̩de̩ e̩wñ le̩ che̩ bo Ne̩biukadne̩za ma; oñ ma fʼu ne bʼef amone̩ te̩, i la kwolʼegbe dab amo̩kokuno̩, año̩la-wñ la chʼomi ñw eli efojale, gbogbo tak iloji-wñ ko̩ dab edudu o̩re̩, oñ anyiga-wñ dab e-ame̩we̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼiko-wñ jo̩, omi Ne̩biukadne̩za chʼeju-mi ago ojale, oñ ibe-mi mudabiwa ef umi, tak u kwokele O̩machala, u la diba ñw u, oñ u dojima ñw e̩ne̩ ki deju tʼo̩gbegbele̩, le̩;
ma lʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩-ile̩-i du rʼe̩wñ du n;

Iko le̩ kpakpa ibe-mi mudabi wʼef umi; oñ todu ojima ojane̩-mi, inaina-mi kpai e̩gahi-mi mudabi wʼugbo mi; tak abo̩hiala-mi kpʼabojima-mi tene mi; oñ e̩re̩-mi nyane̩ ojane̩-mi, ma ño̩ bʼunana tʼo̩ ñwu mi.
Fai omi, Ne̩biukadne̩za, adiba ñw Onu efojale, nahiʼu ne naño̩ dojima ñw u; todu uko̩lo̩-wñ du chʼochochi, o̩na-wñ la tʼo̩kpakpa; i la neke chi abo ku ma lule̩ ef uba ukata.
Belshaza, onu, hi uje̩wñ lile ñw abojima-wñ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, oñ i chane̩ eñmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma eju abo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ le̩.

Abu ki Be̩lshaza do̩mo̩ adʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ kadʼalu, i ka ñwu ma ku ma kʼe̩wñ eku o̩jamalia kpai ajifa e-ki Ne̩biukadne̩za, ata-wñ, ko kwef unyi O̩jo̩ ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m todu kʼonu kpʼabojima-wñ, kpʼamo̩ya-wñ, kpʼamabadu-wñ, ki ñmo̩ kwef uwñ.
Taku ma kʼe̩wñ eku o̩jamalia ku ma ko kwef unyi O̩jo̩ ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m wa; oñ onu kpʼabojima-wñ, kpʼamo̩ya-wñ, kpʼamabadu-wñ ne̩ ñmo̩.
Ma fʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma ñmo̩, oñ ma kwokele amo̩jo̩ o̩jamalia kpʼajifa kpʼe-ebijekpa kpʼe-ebije kpʼe-oli kpʼe-okuta.
Iko le̩ kpakpa o̩mo̩wo̩ o̩wo̩ one̩ dufu wa, oñ i chane̩ ekorubutu o̩la o̩do̩ unyi onu ku ma kwo̩ ame̩rʼakete; oñ onu li e̩bu o̩wo̩ ki ko̩.
Tak eju onu ki chʼanyi murida, oñ ibe ki dʼef uwñ chʼo e̩do̩ñwañwala iko uta-wñ la lo̩la, oñ okuku-wñ chane̩ egwʼomune̩.

Onu kwokwa taa, kʼama ki ko amade̩bo̩ kpʼabo Kaldia kpʼamabifa wa. Oñ onu ko̩la ñw amanibe Babilo̩n kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki achʼo̩kalatu orubutu-i kʼi la akʼofe-wñ ñwu mi, e̩wñ o̩la-wñ achʼukpo odufa ekpikpa, ma la dʼiyagba o̩jamalia tʼo̩ o̩fa, owñ la atʼe̩ke̩ta ef abo̩da ojane̩-i.
Tak amanibe onu le̩ chaka mugudu wa; ma muda neke chʼo̩kalatu orubutu le̩ n, ma la neke je̩ ñw onu mʼofe-wñ n.
Tak e̩do̩ onu Be̩lshaza mukpabie̩ tabale, alu kʼeju-wñ de̩ murida, oñ ibe abojima onu mudajugu nyʼomune̩.

Noj o̩la onu kpʼabojima-wñ le̩, iye onu le̩wʼef unyi oko̩te̩ ugbo ku ma jo̩ le̩: iye onu ko̩la, oñ i kakini, O onu, oji-we̩ ki gbo kala kala; ibe ef uwe̩ le̩ ki chʼe̩ e̩do̩ñwañwala n, eju-we̩ ki rida n.

E̩ne̩ʼka dʼojane̩-we̩ kʼAfu amo̩jo̩ kiafo̩ dʼef uwñ; o̩kpanachi ata-we̩ ma fʼugane̩ kpʼoji e̩wñ ema kpʼibe li ef uwñ, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼibe amo̩jo̩ abe̩i. Oñ onu Ne̩biukadne̩za ata-we̩, owñ chʼonu kʼi chʼata-we̩ le̩, mʼowñ du chʼodu amachifamu kpʼamade̩bo̩ kpʼabo Kaldia kpʼamake̩ma;

todabu ku ma li ufu o̩me̩me̩le̩ kpʼe̩wñ ema kpʼoji e̩wñ ema kpʼofe o̩na eka kpʼoji o̩la ki gbiti edudufu kpʼo̩la ki gwuji ene̩, efu Danie̩l, owñ chʼe-kʼonu dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Be̩lte̩shaza. E̩ ki je̩ ñwu ma do̩ Danie̩l wa, owñ la adʼofe-wñ dufu ñw e̩.
Taku ma du Danie̩l wʼejefu o̩gba onu. Oñ onu ko̩la ñwu Danie̩l kakini, Uwe̩ che Danie̩l ki dʼef abimo̩to̩ Juda ku ma mu wa le̩? Owñ chʼabo kʼonu, ata-mi, ko kwʼojane̩ Juda wa.
U gbʼinabali-we̩ ka kʼafu amo̩jo̩ dʼef uwe̩, oñ ma li ugane̩ kpʼoji e̩wñ ema kpʼibe o̩me̩me̩le̩ ef uwe̩.
Ma la mʼamanibe, ku ma chʼamade̩bo̩, ko wʼo̩gba-mi fai kʼama ki chʼo̩kalatu orubutu-i, kʼama ki je̩ ñwu mi ma ofe-wñ; ma muda neke dʼofe e̩wñ le̩ dufu n.

Omi muda gbo̩ inabali-we̩ ka kʼuwe̩ neke kʼofe e̩wñ dufu, kʼe̩ ño̩ neke fʼo̩la ki gwuji ne̩. I la che̩wñ kʼuwe̩ neke chʼo̩kalatu orubutu-i, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñwu mi ma ofe-wñ, ma anyʼuwe̩ otogbo odufa ekpikpa, oñ iyagba o̩jamalia atʼuwe̩ o̩fa, tak uwe̩ achʼe̩ne̩ e̩ke̩ta ki anʼo̩da ojane̩-i.
Taku Danie̩l dohi o̩gba onu kakini, Uwe̩ ki gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ ele-we̩, mʼuloko-we̩ ko ñw e̩ne̩ omune̩; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩, nachʼo̩kalatu-i ñw onu, oñ naje̩ ñw u ma ofe-wñ.
O uwe̩ onu, O̩jo̩ Chamachala mʼojane̩-i kpʼunana-i kpʼojima-i kpʼinaina-i ko̩ ñwu Ne̩biukadne̩za, ata-we̩.

Oñ noji unana kʼi du ñw u, o̩la amone̩ du kpʼabo uche̩ichi kpʼichi ichi du ga, ma la railo o̩gba-wñ; e̩ne̩ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ i mʼu du kpa, oñ e̩ne̩ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ i je̩ ñw u deju, e̩ne̩ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ i mʼu du dago, oñ e̩ne̩ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ i hiʼu wane̩.
Ama e̩gba kʼe̩do̩-wñ hine, kʼafu efu-wñ la cheno̩ todu kʼi chʼe̩wñ uba, ma muyo̩ tane̩ bʼede o̩fe̩-wñ te̩, oñ ma mʼojima-wñ gba bʼo̩ te̩.

Abe̩le̩ ma fʼu ne bʼef amo̩ma amone̩ te̩, oñ ma mʼe̩do̩-wñ du che dab e̩do̩ ame̩la, tak i dodo kpʼamo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ oko; ma kʼije̩ ñw u je̩ dab amo̩kokuno, oñ eli efojale chi nyʼaño̩la-wñ; gbogbo tak i fuma ka kʼO̩jo̩ Chamachala nʼo̩da ojane̩ amone̩, ka kʼe̩ne̩ du ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ i adʼu nyʼo̩ o̩wo̩.
Uwe̩, o̩ma-wñ, O Be̩lshaza, e̩ la hi e̩do̩-we̩ wane̩ n, dagba e̩ chaka ma e̩wñ-i du;

e̩ muda hi o̩la-we̩ ne akobʼOndu efojale; ma la kʼe̩wñ eku unyi-wñ wa jʼo̩gba-we̩-i, tak uwe̩ kpʼabojima-we̩ kpʼamo̩ya-we̩ kpʼamabadu-we̩, ne̩ e-le̩ ñmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma; uwe̩ la kele amo̩jo̩ aji-fa kpʼo̩jamalia kpʼebijekpa kpʼebije kpai oli kpʼokuta ki ma gane̩ n, i gbʼo̩la n, i la ma e̩wñ n; kʼuwe̩ ma la dojima ñw O̩jo̩ kʼiñmi-we̩ dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ n, e-kʼi ne̩ o̩na-we̩ du le̩.
E̩gbale̩ taku ma dʼe̩bu o̩wo̩ le̩ kpuche̩ kwʼo̩gba-wñ wa, oñ i fʼorubutu-i ko̩.
E̩wñ ki la chʼo̩rubutu ku ma ko̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, MENE, MENE, TEKEL, kpai PARSIN.
Ofe-wñ de̩ kakini, MENE: O̩jo̩ fʼojane̩-we̩ kaluka, oñ i fʼida-wñ che me̩.
TEKEL: ma fʼuwe̩ ñwa o̩j e̩bo̩, ma la li ka kʼe̩ nyaru.
PE̩RE̩S, owñ chʼukakini, Ma fʼojane̩-we̩ kpe̩ru, oñ ma mʼu ko ñw abo Midia kpai Pe̩rsia me̩.
Taku Be̩lshaza ka, oñ ma nyi Danie̩l otogbo odufa ekpikpa, oñ ma dʼiyagba o̩jamalia tʼo̩ o̩fa, taku ma dʼo̩la-wñ takoya, kʼowñ ki chʼe̩ne̩ e̩ke̩ta ef abo̩da ojane̩ le̩.
Odu o̩jo̩ le̩ ma du Be̩lshaza, onu abo Kaldia le̩, kpa.
Taku Darius, e̩ne̩ Midia, gba ojane̩ le̩, o̩do̩-wñ la dabu o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke meji e̩gba le̩.
I nyo̩ Darius eju kʼi dʼojane̩ le̩ tʼo̩wo̩ amakomonu o̩gbo̩ me̩fa, kʼama ki jʼugbo du ojane̩ le̩;
i la kʼabo me̩ta chʼame̩nuto̩gba-ma, Danie̩l la chʼoka ef abo le̩; kʼamakomonu ki choli e̩wñ du ñwu ma, kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du ki che onu n.
Tak oji Danie̩l dufu tʼame̩nuto̩gba kpai amakomonu le, todabu kʼafu o̩me̩me̩le̩ dʼef uwñ; tak ibe dʼef onu kʼi adʼo̩chaka ojane̩-wñ tʼef o̩wo̩-wñ.

Tak ame̩nuto̩gba le̩ kpai amako̩-monu tejane̩ e̩wñ ku ma agwuno Danie̩l ugbo e̩wñ ojane̩ le̩; ma muda neke li e̩wñ du n, ma li e̩wñ du kʼi kpabie̩ n, todabu kʼowñ chʼachubi onu; ma la li ila kpai e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du ef uwñ n.
Tak aboke̩le̩ le̩ kakini, Awa ali e̩wñ kʼa adʼu gwunyu Danie̩l-i n, chai e̩gba kʼa ali e̩wñ ugbo o̩lo̩da O̩jo̩-wñ kʼa adʼu gwunʼowñ.
Tak ame̩nuto̩gba kpʼamakomonu wʼugbo onu kpʼekuku, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Onu Darius, oji-we̩ ki gbo kala kala.

Ame̩nuto̩gba ojane̩-i du kpai amakoji onu kpai amakomonu kpai abo̩hiala kpai amigo̩bina nyʼojuju ku ma dʼo̩da onu te̩, ku ma ki fʼu lo nyane̩ ka kʼe̩ne̩ ki bi o̩jo̩ʼka abe̩k one̩ ʼka ebi, ki ma chʼuwe̩ i biʼu n, gbogbo nyʼo̩jo̩ ogue̩gwa, O onu, ma adʼe̩ne̩ le̩ rikpolo tef ura amidu.
Fa-i onu, uwe̩ ki dʼo̩da le̩ nyane̩ ke, kʼe̩ dʼo̩wo̩ tʼo̩, ki we erida alu kʼo̩da abo Me̩dia kpai abo Pe̩rsia ki ma alu n de̩.
Todule̩ onu Darius mʼo̩wo̩-wñ du tʼorubutu kpai o̩da le̩.

Tak e̩gba ki Danie̩l ma ka kʼonu mʼo̩wo̩ dutʼorubutu le̩, i nyʼef unyi-wñ (ope unyi-wñ la chʼe̩bi rʼo̩wo̩ Je̩rusale̩m), tak i kʼokuku-wñ nyʼane̩ onu me̩ta o̩jo̩ du, oñ i chadua, i la fʼo̩ko̩-wñ gbabʼO̩jo̩ alu kʼi te̩tache akwoubi.
Tak abo le̩ kʼo̩la-ma jeju, oñ ma fu Danie̩l li abu kʼi abi ebi kʼi año̩ gbo̩ko̩bʼO̩jo̩-wñ.

Taku ma te̩wa oñ ma nʼo̩la aba kʼonu ne aka o̩gba onu kakini, Uwe̩ mʼo̩wo̩-we̩ du tʼaba ka kʼe̩ne̩ du ki bi o̩jo̩ abe̩k one̩ du ebi gbogbo nyʼo̩jo̩ ogue̩gwa ki ma chʼuwe̩-i i bi n, O onu, ma adʼe̩ne̩ le̩ rikpolo tef ura amidu n? Onu dohi kakini, Ochochi i che, alu kʼo̩da abo Me̩dia kpai abo Pe̩rsia ki ma jʼalu ni de̩.
Taku ma dohi o̩gba onu kakini, Danie̩l, kʼi dʼef abimo̩to̩ Juda ku ma mu wa le̩, anyʼuwe̩ eti n, kpai aba kʼe̩ dʼo̩wo̩-we̩ tʼo̩ le̩ n, i muda abi ebi-wñ onu me̩ta tak o̩jo̩ ki du.
Oñ e̩gba kʼonu gbʼo̩la-i i wʼo̩ nana, i la mʼe̩do̩-wñ du te̩ Danie̩l alu kʼi ale kʼi adʼo̩ inya tane̩; oñ i dʼef akanya-wñ eche alu kʼi ale kʼi agbʼo̩ tane̩ gbogbo tak olu tunyane̩.
Tak abo le̩ kʼo̩la-ma jeju wʼugbo onu, oñ ma ka ñw onu kakini, O onu, uwe̩ ki ma ka kʼi chʼo̩lo̩da abo Me̩dia kpai abo Pe̩rsia, ka kʼaba kʼonu ne kpai o̩me̩ kʼi hi kʼi fʼu lonyane̩ arida n.
Tak onu ñwañwu ma, oñ ma mu Danie̩l du wa, ma la mʼu du rikpolo tef ura amidu. Onu la ko̩la ñwu Danie̩l kakini, O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ rʼo̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, owñ le̩ agbʼe̩!
Taku ma dʼokuta wa, oñ ma mʼu du bʼalu ura ma; onu la nʼelika-wñ onugo kpʼelika abojima-wñ fʼu hiuko̩, todu kʼe̩wñ du ku ma ñwa ugbo Danie̩l le̩ ki we erida.
Tak onu le tʼunyi-wñ. I la dʼe̩wñ du kadʼalu odu o̩jo̩ le̩ n; ma la kʼe̩wñ iya wʼo̩gba-wñ n: oñ eju-wñ gbe̩.
Tak onu takpa takpa kwane̩ odudu, oñ i hiane̩ nyʼugbo ura amidu.

Tak e̩gba kʼi lewa me̩rʼura ugbo ki Danie̩l de̩, i nʼomu-wñ kwa anyanyi; onu ko̩la ñwu Danie̩l kakini, O Danie̩l, uwe̩, adu O̩jo̩ ki deju le̩, O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ rʼo̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ neke gbʼuwe̩ ugbo amidu le̩?
Taku Danie̩l ka ñw onu kakini, O onu, oji-we̩ ki gbo kala kala.
O̩jo̩-mi fʼonuche̩-wñ kpe̩ wa, i la fʼalu amidu hide, oñ ma ma che mi abu du n; todabu ku ma li kʼu chefe̩ o̩gba-wñ; o̩gba-we̩ ge̩, O onu, u chʼe̩bie̩ne̩ du n.
Tak e̩do̩ onu bo̩ ololo, oñ i ñwañw ma ku ma mu Danie̩l du kwef ura le̩ dufu. Abe̩le̩ ma du Danie̩l kwef ura le̩ dufu, ma la li e̩wñ du ki chʼo n, todabu kʼi ke̩do̩nʼO̩jo̩-wñ.

Tak onu ñwañw abo-wñ, oñ ma mʼabo ku ma gwʼajo̩ no Danie̩l le̩ ko wa, taku ma mʼuma ko rikpolo nyʼef ura amidu, tʼama, tʼamo̩ma-ma, tʼamo̩ya-ma, oñ o̩gba taku ma wʼane̩ ef ura amidu muro̩ bʼuma ma, ma la fʼachiku-ma du guche̩ yo̩go̩ yo̩go̩.
Tak onu Darius fʼo̩takada ko̩ rʼamone̩ du kpʼabo uche̩ichi kpʼabo ichi ichi du ku ma dodo ugbo du ile̩-i kakini, I ra ñw me̩ kpo̩o̩!
O̩da nadu te̩-i, ka kʼugbo du kʼo̩da ojane̩-mi kade, amone̩ ki gagogodo ku ma railo o̩gba O̩jo̩ e-Danie̩l;
I agbʼone̩ tane̩, i adʼone̩ inya,
Abe̩le̩ i ra ñw Danie̩l le̩ iko ki Darius jʼonu, kpʼiko ku Sairo̩s e̩ne̩ Pe̩rsia le̩ jʼonu ge̩.
O̩do̩ ejodudu ku Be̩lshaza jʼonu Babilo̩n, Danie̩l fʼo̩na na, oñ e̩wñ ane̩ ego wʼef oji-wñ abu kʼi dachi oj ate̩. Tak i fʼo̩na-wñ le̩ ko̩, oñ i fʼo̩la le̩ choli jʼane̩.
Danie̩l ko̩la kakini, U li e̩wñ ef ane̩ kʼu go odu, e̩ la go, afu ojale me̩le̩ muke̩che̩ ab ohimini lile ma.
Ame̩la lile me̩le̩ la kwef ohimini dufu, año̩la-ma chʼojoji ñw omune̩.

E-ejodudu dab idu, i muda nʼika o̩re̩. U go gbogbo taku ma mʼiwe̩ ika-wñ chi rinyo̩ kpa, taku ma mʼu du kwane̩ tʼate̩ bʼane̩pe̩te̩ te̩, oñ ma je̩ ñw u kʼe̩re̩-wñ meji dago ane̩ dab one̩; ma la mʼe̩do̩ one̩ du ñw u.
E̩ la go, e̩la ekeji omune̩, dab ibe̩a; oñ i dʼakolo-wñ pwoʼka kwane̩, ikeli me̩ta la jʼalu-wñ, enyi-wñ chedʼo: oñ ma fʼabe̩i ka ñw u kakini, Kwane̩ kʼe̩ jʼe̩la nana.
Ubi le̩ u ño̩ go, e̩ la go, omune̩ kʼi dab ikpali, kʼi nʼika e̩we̩ me̩le̩ ubi-wñ; e̩la le̩ ño̩ nʼoji me̩le̩; ma la dʼo̩da ñw u.

Ubi le̩ tak u li ef ane̩ ego odu, e̩ la go, e̩la e̩ke̩le̩ ki abailo, ki chenʼe̩gahi, kʼukpahiu-wñ la tabale; oñ enyi-wñ chʼebije lile. E-le̩ fʼe̩wñ lie̩ oñ i fʼe̩wñ kpo̩fo̩ yo̩go̩ yo̩go̩; e̩bo̩bo̩-wñ i la nʼe̩re̩ fʼu kpetili mʼane̩. E-le̩ la chʼojoji ñw e̩la du ki do̩mo̩ akwoubi; igba-wñ la chʼe̩gwa.

U do̩mo̩ akpibe igba-wñ le̩; e̩ la go, igba omune̩ ño̩ kwane̩ ef uma, i de̩ ke̩ke̩; eju-wñ ma mʼigba me̩ta chi tʼe̩te̩te̩te̩ kwef e-ejodudu le̩. E̩ la go, eju ki dab eju one̩ jʼo̩la igba-i, kpai alu ki ako̩la e̩wñ ogbemede.
U go gbogbo,
Aji una kwʼef uwñ dufu o̩gba-wñ;
U go iko le̩ tod omu o̩la ogbemede̩ kʼigba le̩ aka. U go gbogbo taku ma fʼe̩la le̩ kpa, ma la fʼaño̩la-wñ chile̩che̩, oñ ma mʼu du te̩ kʼuna ki jo.
I la chʼe-ame̩la ki bo̩ le̩, ma mʼo̩da-ma gba bʼuma o̩wo̩ te̩; ma muda je̩ ñw udeju-ma ki kpo̩kpe̩ oweʼka kpai ikoʼka.
U li ef ane̩ ego odu,
Oñ ma mʼo̩da kpʼojima kpʼojane̩ ko ñw u,
I bo̩ tʼe-mi Danie̩l, e̩do̩-mi kpabie̩ gbogbo tʼalumeji año̩la-mi, oñ ane̩ kʼu go ef oji-mi che mi e̩do̩ ñwañwala.
U lewʼugbo e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi dago kpenyʼu, oñ u tene alu kʼochochi e̩wñ-i de̩. Tak i ka ñw mi, oñ i je̩ ñw mi mʼofe e̩wñ le̩.
Ame̩la lile me̩le̩-i chʼamonu me̩le̩, kʼama akwane̩ kwef ile̩-i.
Abo kiafo̩ e-O̩machala muda agba ojane̩ le̩, ma la ane̩ ojane̩ le̩ ogbegbele̩, owñ chʼogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa.

Tak u tene kʼu mʼofe o̩la e̩la e̩ke̩le̩ le̩, owñ chʼe-ki chʼojoji ñw abo kibo̩ chaka, kʼi abailo tabale, owñ chʼe-kʼenyi-wñ chʼebije, kʼanyiga-wñ la chʼebijekpa; e-kʼi fʼe̩wñ lie̩ kʼi la fʼe̩wñ kpo̩fo̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩, kʼi la ño̩ nʼe̩re̩-wñ fʼe-ki bo̩ te̩mane̩,

kpai o̩la igba me̩gwa ki jʼoji-wñ, kpʼe-omune̩ ki ño̩ kwane̩, e-kʼabo me̩ta lewane̩ o̩gba-wñ le̩, owñ chʼigba ki nʼeju kpai alu ki ako̩la e̩wñ ogbemede le̩; e̩ fʼu li i dabe̩ne̩ kʼi gbo̩ka tʼabo-wñ le.
U go, oñ igba le̩ gbage̩de̩ kʼogu bʼabo kiafo̩, oñ i fʼuma du.
Gbogbo tak e̩ne̩ kʼo̩jo̩-wñ kpo̩kpe̩ le̩ lewa taku ma fʼoji ajo̩ abo kiafo̩ ki nʼojane̩ e-O̩machala ka da. Oñ iko-wñ jo̩ kʼabo kiafo̩ ki nʼojane̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ i ka kakini:
I la chʼe-igba me̩gwa le̩,
Owñ la anʼo̩la aka nyʼO̩machala,
Taku ma amʼo̩la ajo̩ jo̩,
Taku ma akʼojane̩ le̩ kpʼo̩da-wñ
Ukpoji e̩wñ le̩ du de̩. I chʼe-mi Danie̩l, ibe ki wʼef umi che mi e̩do̩ ñwañwala. Eju-mi la murida, u muda fʼo̩la le̩ de ef e̩do̩-mi.
O̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta kʼonu Be̩lshaza jʼonu, omi, Danie̩l fʼane̩ʼka go, manyʼe-ejodudu ki tejugede ñwu mi le̩.
Oñ u fʼe̩wñ li ef ane̩ ego le̩; oñ e̩gba kʼu li, u dʼef unyi onu Shushan, owñ chʼe-ki dʼane̩ Elam; oñ u li ef ane̩ ego le̩, u la dʼo̩la ohimini Ulai.
Tak u chi eju-mi nyʼate̩, oñ u li, go, okolo ki nʼigba meji dago eti ohimini le̩; igba-wñ meji la chʼe̩gwe̩; oka muda gwe̩ tʼekeji le, e-ki fu dufu otitala la gwe̩ tule.

Oñ u li abu kʼokolo le̩ nagwo̩ko̩ rʼolane̩, kpai rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, kpai rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩; i la nʼame̩wñ iñmi du ku ma neke dago o̩gba-wñ n, i la nʼame̩la du ku ma neke gbʼe̩wñ bʼo̩ o̩wo̩ te̩ n. Oñ i che e̩wñ du ki dʼe̩ e̩do̩, i la bukpa tʼo̩la-wñ.
Oñ abu kʼu do̩mo̩ akpibe, go, obuko̩ʼka kwʼolane̩ wa lale eju ile̩-i du, e̩re̩-wñ du kad ane̩ n: obuko le̩ la nʼigbaʼka ki kadʼagbagba eju-wñ meji.
Oñ i lewʼugbo okolo ki nʼigba meji e-kʼu li abu kʼi dago eti aji le̩, oñ i gwo̩ko̩ tʼo̩ o̩la ef e̩do̩fulu ukpahiu-wñ.

Oñ u li abu kʼi te̩me̩rʼokolo le̩. E̩do e̩rikoko-wñ je̩ ñw u n, oñ i chane̩ ekpʼokolo le̩, i la fʼigba-wñ meji guche̩; ukpahiu okolo le̩ la bʼowñ jo̩ n. Oñ i mʼu du ro̩ nʼane̩. I la fʼu te̩ mane̩ pio̩pio̩pio̩. I la nʼe̩ne̩ du ki neke gbʼokolo le̩ bʼo̩ o̩wo̩ te̩ n.
Tak obuko̩ le̩ hiʼo̩la-wñ ne tabale; ama e̩gba kʼiñmi-wñ ko du, igba lile le̩ mu guche̩. Oñ igba uwohi me̩le̩ fu koji rʼo̩wo̩ afu ojale me̩le̩.
Tak igba kekeleʼka fu kwef oka-wñ dufu, oñ e-le̩ la anana tabale rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩, kpai rʼo̩wo̩ olodudu kpai rʼo̩wo̩ ane̩ ojima le̩.
Oñ i nana alo gbogbo wa kado abogu ojale; i la kʼabogu-ma iche̩ka kpai awo awo iche̩ka rikpolo jʼane̩, oñ i fʼu te̩mane̩.
I la hi o̩la-wñ ne gbogbo wa kad onu abogu; ma la mʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩jo̩ ñwa o̩jo̩ ñwa gba bʼo̩ o̩wo̩ te̩, oñ ma fʼuña-wñ kiafo̩ gulo̩ wʼane̩.
Ma la hi abogu le̩ tinyo̩ manyʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ku ma che o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ lef echada ku ma chada. I la fʼochochi ro̩ tane̩; i fʼe̩wñ ki rʼe eju che, i la ra ñw u.

Tak u gbo̩ abu kʼe̩ne̩ kiafo̩ʼka ako̩la; oñ e̩ne̩ kiafo̩ omune̩ ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki ko̩la le̩ kakini, Ane̩ kʼi go le̩, owñ chʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai echada ki agwʼe̩wñ alache̩, ku ma anʼe̩re̩ fʼuña kiafo̩ kpai o̩wo̩-ma le̩ kpetili mane̩, iko e̩gba i akade taa?
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Gbogbo wʼodudu kpʼane̩ ogume̩lu chi kwef icham me̩ta; e̩gba le̩ taku ma agwʼuña kiafo̩ le̩ rinyo̩.
Oñ i lewatu, abu kʼomi, owñ chʼomi Danie̩l-i, fʼane̩ ego le̩ li, u tejane̩ alu kʼu nale kʼu namʼoji-wñ; e̩ la go, e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi bi one̩ dago o̩gba-mi.
Oñ u gbo̩ omuko̩la one̩ aji Ulai, e-le̩ dudo̩, oñ i kakini, Gebrie̩l, e̩ che kʼe̩ne̩-i ki moji ane̩ kʼi go le̩.

Todule̩ i lewa me̩rʼugbo kʼu dago; oñ e̩gba kʼi lewa, ailo fʼumi mu, oñ u leane̩ afʼeju bʼane̩ ma; i muda ka ñwu mi kakini, O o̩ma one̩, uwe̩ ki mʼoji-wñ; todu ane̩ kʼe̩ go le̩ chʼe̩wñ iko ubi otitala.
Oñ abu kʼi do̩mo̩ ako̩la ñwu mi, olu lile mʼumi du abu kʼeju-mi bʼane̩ ma le̩; i la do̩wo̩kado mi, oñ i mʼumi du kwane̩ dago kpakpa.
Tak i kakini, Go, omi aje̩ ñw e̩ ma e̩wñ ki ade̩ e̩gba otitala iko e̩do̩ e̩kpa le̩ todu iko ubi otitala ki che̩date̩ ne̩-i.
Okolo kʼuwe̩ li, e-ki nʼigba meji le̩, abo le̩ chʼamonu Me̩dia kpai Pe̩rsia.
Oñ obuko̩ ki nʼedudu chʼonu abo Grik; igba inaina ki kadʼagbagba eju-wñ meji le̩ chʼonu-ma ejodudu.
I la chʼe-ki muguche̩ le̩, kʼe̩le̩ kwane̩ e̩gu-wñ, ojane̩ me̩le̩ akwane̩ kwef abo uche̩ichiʼka le̩, ma muda anʼukpahiu e̩go̩ e-wñ n.
Tak e̩gba iko otitala ojane̩-ma, e̩gba kʼamajada le̩ jʼada kpoji, onu, kʼeju-wñ abailo, kʼi laño̩ meju ita ekpa, akwane̩.
Ukpahiu-wñ la anana, i muda chʼukpahiu e-wñ che n; alu kʼi afʼe̩wñ chile̩che̩ chʼawuwu, e̩wñ kʼi ache ara ñw u; i la afʼamagbiti chile̩che̩, kpai amone̩ abo kiafo̩.

Lugbo ugbeju-wñ i aje̩ ñw one̩ egba ibe ra nyʼo̩wo̩. Oñ ef ibe e-wñ i ahi o̩la-wñ ne. Oñ ejo̩ yo̩ ku ma jo̩ yo̩ le̩ achigili i afʼamone̩ wewe chile̩che̩; i ñʼahidago bʼAgboji e-amagboji onugo; i muda aguche̩, i la chʼo̩wo̩ one̩ achʼo n.
O̩la ane̩ kʼe̩ go e-olane̩ kpʼolodudu ku ma ka le̩ chʼochochi: e̩ muda fʼo̩wo̩ no ane̩ kʼe̩ go le̩, todu o̩jo̩-wñ chebo̩ jiji ta.
Tak omi Danie̩l mudaku, oñ u fʼo̩ga che ikoʼka; tak u kwane̩ oñ u fʼuko̩lo̩ onu che: u la yaye ane̩ e̩go le̩, e̩ne̩ du muda mʼoji-wñ n.
O̩do̩ Darius ejodudu, o̩ma Ahasuerus, ugbe̩ abo Me̩dia, ku ma du jʼonu ojane̩ abo Kaldia,
owñ chʼo̩do̩ ejodudu kʼi jʼonu, omi, Danie̩l, fʼo̩takada o̩takada go, oñ u ma aluka o̩do̩ ki Je̩rusale̩m achʼalache̩ kade, teju o̩la Jihofa kʼi wʼugbo Je̩re̩maya akache̩, owñ chʼo̩do̩ e̩te̩gwa.
Tak u fʼeju-mi kparʼOndu O̩jo̩, kʼu nʼadua kpʼo̩ko̩ egbabʼo̩ manyu alu eji kpʼe̩gbanukpo kpʼelulu atene.
Oñ u rodubo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-mi, oñ u gbalu kakini, Aya, Ondu, uwe̩ O̩jo̩ inaina kʼuwe̩ abailo, kʼi ade alo kpai ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ugbo abo ku ma fe̩dʼowñ ku ma la de uko̩-wñ,
a fʼe̩ dure, a fʼudu fe̩, a la fʼe̩wñ bibi che̩, a la fʼe̩re̩ ubi rʼe̩, ena a na bʼuko̩ kʼe̩ te̩ le̩ kpʼoj ajo̩ o̩kpakpa kʼe̩ kpa te̩,
a la netirʼamadu-we̩ amakache̩ ku ma ko̩la ñw amonu-wa kpʼamagboji-wa kpʼamata-wa kpʼamone̩ ane̩-i chaka ef odu-we̩ n.

O Ondu, uwe̩ nʼo̩kpakpa, e-wa chʼeju anyo̩, alu ki de̩ eñini-i ñw aboke̩le̩ Juda kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m kpʼabo Israe̩l ku ma me̩rʼanane̩ kpai abo ku ma jʼo̩najiji chaka, ojane̩ ojane̩ ugbo du kʼe̩ ne ma ru tod ada-we̩ ku ma je̩.
O Ondu, eju anyo̩ chʼe-wa kpʼe-amonu-wa kpʼamagboji-wa kpʼamata-wa todabu kʼa fʼuwe̩ dure.
Ondu O̩jo̩-wa nʼejumomi kpai o̩la eto̩no̩ ñw one̩; todu a fʼe̩re̩ ubi ro̩ ñw u me̩.
A la netirʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa kʼa alule̩ ef uko̩-o̩la-wñ kʼi kojo̩ ñw a lugbo amadu-wñ amakache̩ n.

Ochochi, abo Israe̩l du fʼada uko̩-o̩la-we̩ je̩, ena ma na tʼo̩wo̩ʼka kʼama ki we egbʼomu-we̩ gbo̩; todule̩ oñ ma dʼama-i kpʼego̩ ku ma ko̩ tef uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s, adu O̩jo̩ le̩, danyʼuwa oji; todu awa fʼowñ dure me̩.
I la fʼo̩la-wñ kʼi ka nyʼuwa kpai nyʼamakajo̩-wa ku ma kajo̩ wa lonyane̩ lugbo e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ lile kʼi du bʼuwa oji ma-i; todu i nʼugbo du o̩gane̩ efojale ku ma che e̩wñ ku ma che Je̩rusale̩m-i n.
E̩wñ bie̩ne̩-i du bʼuwa ma teju alu ku ma ko̩ ef uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s le̩; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ a nyi Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa e̩do̩, kʼawa ki rida bʼudu kʼa fe̩ te̩, kʼa ki mʼoji ochochi-we̩ n.
Todule̩ Jihofa fʼeju bʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ le̩ le, oñ i dʼu wa abʼuwa ma-i; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa chʼo̩kpakpa ugbo uko̩lo̩-wñ du kʼi ache, awa la gbʼomu-wñ gbo̩ n.
Oñ fa-i, O Ondu, O̩jo̩-wa, kʼe̩ nʼo̩wo̩ ukpahiu kʼamone̩-we̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa, kʼe̩ la fʼodu ne̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe-eñini-i; a dure me̩, a fʼe̩wñ bibi che.

O Ondu, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, uwe̩do̩-we̩ kpʼe̩do̩fulu-we̩ ki narida bʼewo-wa Je̩rusale̩m te̩, owñ chʼuwo-we̩ kiafo̩-i, teju alu kʼo̩kpakpa-we̩ chaka de̩. Todu Je̩rusale̩m kpʼamone̩-we̩-i mud ina ñw abo du ku ma jo̩ lʼuwa daka noji adure-wa kpai udu kʼamata-wa fe̩.
O, O̩jo̩-wa, fa-i e̩ nanetirʼadua adu-we̩ kpai o̩ko̩ kʼi agbabʼuwe̩-i: e̩ je̩ ñw eju-we̩ ki bo̩rʼuña-we̩ kiafo̩ kʼi mud alache̩ te̩, tod Ondu.
O O̩jo̩-mi, hi eti-we̩ wa kʼe̩ gbo̩; mʼeju-we̩ chi kʼe̩ go alache̩-wa, kpʼewo ku ma du rʼodu e-we̩. Todu o̩ko̩ kʼa agba bʼe̩-i chʼutodu e̩wñ o̩kpakpa e-wa n, chai todu ejumomi o̩gbaje̩je̩ e-we̩.
O Ondu, gbo̩ ke; O Ondu, tʼo̩ no̩; O Ondu, neti kʼe̩ che; e̩ ki che̩du n, tod o̩la-we̩ onugo, O O̩jo̩-mi; todu ewo-we̩-i kpʼamone̩-we̩ ma du rʼodu e-we̩.
Oñ abu kʼu do̩mo̩ aka ta, kʼu la achadua, kʼu nagbalu adure e-mi kpʼadure amone̩-mi, Israe̩l, kʼu dʼo̩gba Jihofa, O̩jo̩-mi, agbʼo̩ko̩-mi bʼo̩ tod uwo kiafo̩ e-O̩jo̩-mi le̩,
ochochi, abu kʼu do̩mo̩ ako̩la ef adua, e̩ne̩ ku ma do̩ ko̩ Gebrie̩l, kʼomi fʼu li ef ane̩-ego e̩gba ejodudu le̩, wu wa piopio, oñ ame̩rʼiko e̩wñ ele olane̩ i lewa do̩wo̩kadʼomi.
Tak i bi o̩la rʼumi eju, i la kʼo̩la ñwu mi, i kakiui, O Danie̩l, omi dufu wa-i kʼu dʼibe kpʼoji o̩la ema ñw e̩.
E̩gba kʼe̩ chane̩ o̩ko̩ egba bʼo̩ le̩ o̩da-wñ le dufu, oñ u lewa kʼu ka ñw e̩-i; todu i fe̩do̩ we̩ tabale; todule̩ e̩ nafʼibe o̩la le̩ kpe̩, kʼe̩ la fʼoji ane̩ ego le̩ ma.

Ma fʼebie ebie ugbo e̩te̩gwa ñwate̩ abʼoji amone̩-we̩ kpʼewo-we̩ kiafo̩ le̩ ma, ku ma fʼoji echada kpa, ku ma la fʼoji adure kpa hioko, ku ma fʼe̩wñ e̩boma che tod udu ku ma fe̩, ku ma laño̩ dʼo̩kpakpa e-ogbegbele̩ wa, ku ma fʼane̩ ego kpai ache̩ eka hiuko̩, ku ma ño̩ fʼekpo ba tʼuña kiafo̩ e-efo̩ le̩.

Todule̩, uwe̩ ki ma, kʼe̩ la nʼibe-wñ kakini, Akwʼe̩gba kʼo̩la dufu ka ku ma ki du Je̩rusale̩m dabi tʼe̩gu ku ma la ño̩ fʼu ko̩ gbogbo tʼiko Me̩saya, kʼi chʼE̩nuto̩gba le̩, achʼebie mebie kpai ebie ebie ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke meji. Ma adabi kʼo̩ ge̩. I anʼojukpologu kpai o̩kpe̩. E̩gba le̩ achʼadiko o̩bata.

Oñ e̩gba kʼebie ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke meji jo̩ kpa, ma ako̩ Me̩saya da rinyo̩, i la anʼe̩wñ du n. Tak abo e̩nuto̩gba ki awa akpʼewo kpai uña kiafo̩ le̩ fo̩; ukpoji-wñ la awa fuulu dabe̩ne̩ kʼuwobi omi; ma la ajʼogu gbogbo tʼukpoji-wñ. Ma fʼalache̩ alache̩ ñwate̩ me̩.

Tak owñ akpʼilo gaga kpʼamone̩ wewe tod ebieʼka: oñ alumeji ebie le̩ i aje̩ ñwu ma we iche̩bo̩ eche kpʼe̩wñ ele eduwa; todabu kʼe̩ne̩ ki agwʼe̩wñ alache̩ atanʼika e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ awa; gbogbo taku ma mʼukpoji-wñ ku ma da te̩ le̩ du danyʼalache̩ le̩.

O̩do̩ e̩ke̩ta ku Sairo̩s jʼonu Pe̩rsia ma mʼo̩laʼka biru Danie̩l ku ma rʼodu ko̩ Be̩lte̩shaza eju. O̩la le̩ la chʼochochi. O̩la ogu inaina i la che. Tak i fʼoji o̩la le̩ ma, oñ i fʼoji ane̩ kʼi go le̩ ma.
Iko le̩, omi Danie̩l, nʼeku ade̩ o̩jo̩ mebie ebie me̩ta.
U jʼuje̩wñ e̩rinyo̩ du n, e̩la kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma la kadʼalu-mi n; u la dʼekpo kulu o̩la re n, gbogbo wa tak o̩jo̩ mebie ebie me̩ta ki jo̩ kpa.
E̩gba kʼochu ejodudu nʼolu ogu nyoke me̩le̩, abu kʼu dago eti aji lile le̩, owñ che He̩de̩ke̩l,
u chʼeju-mi nyʼate̩ ago, e̩ la go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka fʼukpo line̩n efufu bʼo̩la ma dago, o̩jamalia Ufaz lʼago-wñ de;

año̩la-wñ la dab okuta be̩re̩l; oñ eju-wñ dab o̩mamanya; e̩yo̩ eju-wñ la dab e̩mu ki adʼo̩go̩; o̩wo̩-wñ kpai e̩re̩-wñ abʼeju je̩ ña ña ña dab ebijekpa ku ma gwe̩; omuko̩la-wñ la dab ekuku o̩wo̩ amone̩.
Omi, Danie̩l, kate fʼane̩ ego le̩ li, todu aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼugbo mi li ane̩ ego le̩ n; o̩la-ma muda agagogodo nana, oñ ma ra le ku ma kʼo̩la-ma maja.
Abe̩le̩ i bo̩ omi kate, oñ u fʼane̩ ego lile-i li; ukpahiu du la bo̩ ef umi n; alifia-mi murida e̩che̩; ukpahiu du la bo̩ ef umi n.
U muda agbʼomuko̩la-wñ; oñ e̩gba kʼu fʼomuko̩la-wñ gbo ugoju mʼumi da, oñ u fʼeju tunyʼane̩, eju-mi la bʼane̩ ma.
