Me̩ la go, o̩wo̩ʼka kadʼomi, i mi umi ejo, i la mʼo̩wo̩-mi kpai okuku-mi ko kad ane̩.

Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, O Danie̩l, uwe̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi afe̩do̩ tabale-i, e̩ gbo̩ o̩la kʼu naka ñw e̩-i, kʼe̩ la kwane̩ dago kpakpa, todu uwe̩ oñ ma kpe̩ mi ru-i. Abu kʼi do̩mo̩ akʼo̩la-i ñwu mi, u kwane̩ dago, o̩la-mi naga.

Tak i ka ñwu ml kakini, Danie̩l, e̩ ki railo n, todu akwʼo̩jo̩ ejodudu kʼe̩ fu ñwa ef e̩do̩-we̩ ka kʼuwe̩ ama oji-wñ, kʼe̩ lañʼahi o̩la-we̩ wane̩ eju O̩jo̩-we̩, ma gbo̩ uko̩la-we̩, ewa-mi-i chʼutodu uko̩la-we̩ le̩.
Agboji ojane̩ Pe̩rsia gbʼo̩na nyʼumi o̩jo̩ ogu nyokeʼka; e̩ la go, Maike̩l, kʼi dʼef amagboji ki tʼo̩gba, lewa kʼi te̩ko mi; oñ ma ño̩ nʼeku mi ugbo amonu Pe̩rsia.
Fa-i, u la lewa kʼu je̩ ñw e̩ mʼoji e̩wñ ki ake̩re̩bʼamone̩-we̩ e̩gba iko otitala; todu ane̩ ego le̩ chʼutodu iko o̩jo̩ ki dʼubi.
Tak e̩gba kʼi nʼo̩la abe̩le̩ ko̩la ñwu mi kpa, u mʼeju-mi korʼane̩, oli la kpo̩ tʼumi alu.

E̩ la go, e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi biu amo̩ma amone̩ do̩wo̩kadʼuko-mi; tak u mʼalu-mi chi, u chane̩ eko̩la, oñ u ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki dago o̩gba-mi kakini, O odu-mi, Lugbo ane̩ ego le̩ e̩do̩dudu-mi mudabi wa abʼumi ma, ukpahiu-mi la bo̩ n.
Todu abile̩ kʼadu odu-mi-i aneke ko̩la ñw odu-mi-i? Todu i bo̩ tʼe-mi, e̩re̩re̩le̩ ukpahiu ño̩ bo̩ ef umi n, iñmi du la bo̩ ef umi n.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi dab one̩ ño̩ do̩wo̩kadʼomi, i la dʼukpahiu ñwu mi.

Oñ i kakini, O one̩ kʼi afe̩do̩ tabale le̩, e̩ ki railo n; ure̩do̩ ki chʼe-we̩, fʼukpahiu ne̩; ochochi, fʼukpahiu ne̩. Tak e̩gba kʼi ko̩la ñwu mi, u fʼukpahiu ne̩ nyʼo̩-gba, oñ u kakini, Odu-mi ki ko̩la ke; todu e̩ mʼukpahiu du ñwu mi me̩.
Tak i kakini, E̩ chema e̩wñ ki chi kʼomi wʼugbo we̩? Fa-i tak u nadabi akʼogu bʼagboji Pe̩rsia le̩; oñ e̩gba kʼu ledufu agboji Griki awa.
Omi muda aka e̩wñ ku ma kʼo̩rubutu-wñ ef O̩takada Ochochi le̩ ñw e̩. I la nʼe̩ne̩ du ki adʼukpahiu ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi ako bʼe̩wñ-i manyʼumi n, chai Maike̩l, agboji-we̩ le̩.
I la chʼe-mi, o̩do̩ Darius, e̩ne̩ Me̩dia ejodudu le̩, u dago kʼu dʼe̩do̩ e̩gbo ñw u kʼu ño̩ dʼugbiti ñw u.

Fa-i tak u nadʼochochi ñʼe̩. Go, i bo̩ amonu omune̩ me̩ta ku ma akwane̩ ane̩ Pe̩rsia ta; tak e̩ne̩ e̩ke̩le̩-ma achʼanana tʼuma le ololo; oñ e̩gba kʼi fʼukpahiu-wñ ne̩ lʼef anana-wñ le̩, i akʼo̩chaka-ma kwane̩ akobʼojane̩ abo Griki.
Tak onu ki gbitiʼka akwane̩. I anʼo̩da lile ache e̩wñ du ki dʼowñ e̩do̩.

Tak e̩gba kʼi akwane̩, ojane̩-wñ akpo̩fo̩, oñ ma afʼu kpe̩rʼo̩wo̩ afu ojale me̩le̩, i muda chʼamugbe̩-wñ aje̩ n, i la akpe̩ru teju alu kʼi che kpai o̩da-wñ kʼi ne̩ n. Todu ma achi o̩da ojane̩-wñ tʼe̩te̩te̩te̩te̩ todo ki tʼabo omune̩ ojoji o̩wo̩, ki we etʼabo-wñ-i o̩wo̩.
Oñ onu o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ kʼi chʼagboji-wñ oka agbiti, e̩nomune̩ muda agbiti tʼowñ le, e-le̩ anʼo̩da, o̩da-wñ la achʼo̩da lile.

Ma adʼo̩do̩ pe̩e̩ taku ma akpalo; oñ o̩ma onobule̩ onu o̩pata o̩gane̩ awʼugbo onu o̩pata ate̩ kʼi che teju alo ku ma kpe̩; o̩wo̩ onobule̩ le̩ muda anʼukpahiu-wñ nyane̩ n; e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ la adago n, o̩wo̩-wñ adago n; ma muda adʼonobule̩ le̩, kpʼabo ku ma dʼu wa kpʼe̩ne̩ ki bi onobule̩ le̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼukpahiu ñw u tinyo̩ iko le̩.
E̩ne̩ʼka kʼi kwef iga ki ta kwʼo̩la ili onobule̩ le̩ adago e̩gu-wñ, owñ le̩ awʼugbo abogu le̩, oñ i agudu tef aku onu o̩pata ate̩. Tak i ache ma e̩wñ, i la adu ma.
I la año̩ amo̩jo̩-ma kpai ojibo ku ma da kpai e̩wñ eku akoko ku ma nʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia che nyʼIjipti; owñ la adʼo̩do̩ pe̩e̩ tʼonu o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩.
Tak onu o̩pata ate̩ awʼojane̩ onu o̩pata o̩gane̩; i muda adabi tʼojane̩ e-wñ.
E̩do̩ amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ akwane̩. Ma la akʼo̩wo̩ abogu ku ma nʼukpahiu nana wa jo̩, oñ e̩ne̩ʼka awa chuu, i la agulo̩ bʼo ma alale gudu. Tak i adabi akʼogu wa gbogbo wʼaku-wñ.
Tak e̩do̩ e̩rikoko-wñ aje̩ ñw onu o̩pata o̩gane̩ dufu wa akogu bʼonu o̩pata ate̩; i la akʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ lile dago jo̩, ma muda akʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ nyʼowñ o̩wo̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi mʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ko, i ahi o̩la-wñ ne, tak i akʼamone̩ icham icham ro̩ fiane̩. I muda anʼukpahiu lʼef e-le̩ n.
Todu onu o̩pata ate̩ adabiwa, i la akʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ lile wa jo̩ ku ma wewe tʼabo o̩gbo̩gba le; tak e̩gba kʼiko o̩do̩-wñ kpoji i anʼabogu wewe kpʼane̩ ogu nana wa chuu.
Iko iko le̩ amone̩ wewe akwane̩ tʼonu o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ o̩la. Oñ amo̩ma ame̩nafuma ef abo-we̩ onugo adʼo̩la-ma kwane̩ ku ma che kʼane̩ ego le̩ ki che̩; ma muda awane̩.
Abe̩le̩ onu o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ awa kpʼugbudu, oñ i adʼewo ku ma bʼaku lile nyʼu le̩. Abogu abʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ adago n, i chaka chʼabo-wñ kʼi chi le̩, todu ma anʼukpahiu ku ma adago n.
E̩ne̩ ki muda awa akobʼo̩ ache alu ki dʼowñ e̩do̩, e̩ne̩ du la abʼo̩gba-wñ edago jo̩ n. I la adago ojane̩ ki chʼuto̩ le̩, oñ ukpʼe̩wñ bie̩ adʼef o̩wo̩-wñ.
Eju-wñ la akparʼenʼukpahiu ojane̩-wñ chaka wa, ame̩nokpoko alebʼo̩ wa; tak i ache e̩wñ. I la adʼo̩ma abobule̩ le̩ ñw u ki fʼu kpabie̩; i muda adago n, i la anʼile ñw u n.
Ubi le̩ tak i arʼeju-wñ da tʼo̩wo̩ ane̩ o̩lomi, oñ i agba ane̩ ane̩ o̩lomi le̩ wewe. Agbojiʼka muda afʼoli nʼina-wñ kʼi abu le̩; anoji e-le̩ i aje̩ ñw ina kʼi abu le̩ ki mudabi abʼo oji-wñ onugo ma.
Tak i arʼeju-wñ da rʼo̩wo̩ aku aku ane̩-wñ onugo; i muda ake̩re̩ kʼi awane̩, oñ one̩ ñʼaliʼu ge̩ n.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka ki aje̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki agbʼe̩wñ ef afuma lale ef ojane̩ ojane̩ le̩ akwane̩ dago e̩gu-wñ; i muda ajʼo̩jo̩ re ofo taku ma akpʼowñ fo̩, i la chʼuwe̩do̩ n, i la chʼogu akpʼo̩ fo̩ n.
E̩ne̩ e̩de̩te̩ʼka akwane̩ e̩gu-wñ, e-ku ma ma dʼojima o̩fe̩ eje̩ ñw u n; i awa dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩nure̩do̩, oñ i anʼurinyo̩ o̩fa-wñ bʼuma gbʼojane̩ le̩.
Taku ma akʼane̩ ogu o̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩ le̩ rʼo̩gba-wñ alu kʼomi akʼane̩, oñ i aguche̩ rinyo̩, manyʼe̩nuto̩gba alo ku ma kpe̩ le̩.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼalo kpe̩ kpʼowñ, tak i achane̩ eche e̩wñ ugbeleke-wñ, todu i ate̩gu wa, abo-wñ chaka de̩ re ofo, i agbiti alo waa.

I awa abʼugbo kʼane̩ arʼo̩je̩ tule ojane̩ le̩ ma iko kʼane̩ bo̩ no̩ko̩; e̩wñ kʼamata-wñ kpai amo̩ra ata-wñ ma che mama ta n, i ache; i ako e̩wñ kʼogu je̩ kpʼane̩ ku ma ño̩ kpʼidu fiatuka rʼefu ma; i la añwʼibe e̩wñ ojoji ojoji rʼaku aku, i la ache e-le̩ ikoʼka.

I la adʼukpahiu-wñ kpʼe̩do̩-wñ kwane̩ akobʼonu o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩; abogu-wñ la awewe. Tak onu o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ anʼabogu ku ma gbiti ku ma ño̩ wewe tabale ajʼogu le̩; i muda adago n, todu ama añwʼibe e̩wñ ojoji ojoji nyʼu.
Ochochi, abo ku ma bʼo̩ je̩ e̩wñ e̩rinyo̩ e-wñ akpʼowñ fo̩, oñ abogu-wñ afia bʼo̩ o̩wo̩ te̩; oñ amone̩ wewe awane̩ noj ekpa ku ma kpa ma.
I la chʼe-amonu meji le̩, ibe e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ eche adʼef uma, ama ajʼajʼe̩wñ oj itebuluʼka arʼolemi, i muda anʼile ñwu ma n; todu ukpoji-wñ ade̩ iko ku ma da le̩ chuu.
Tak i akʼane̩ otemeje dabi nyʼojane̩-wñ; e̩do̩-wñ muda aje̩ kpai alo kiafo̩ ku ma kpe̩ le̩ n. I la ache e̩wñ kʼi rʼe eju, tak i adabi tʼojane̩-wñ.
I dabi wa o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ iko ku ma da le̩. I muda ade̩ ubi ane̩-i alu ki de̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩ n.
Todu o̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ Kitim awa kobʼo̩; e-le̩ la awʼo̩. Tak i adabi, i akʼiyala ñw alo kiafo, i la ache alu ki rʼe eju. I adabi wa oñ abo ku ma hi alo kiafo̩ le̩ tinyo̩ awʼo̩ eju.
Tak abogu adago ubi-wñ, ma la adʼuña kiafo̩ ji, tʼaku-wñ le̩. Taku ma akʼiche̩bo̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa ku ma che le̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ ku ma dʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ki agwʼe̩wñ alache̩ dago.
Tak i anʼurinyo̩ o̩fa fʼabo ku ma fʼabi alo le̩ je̩ kpabie̩; amone̩ ku ma chema O̩jo̩-ma muda anʼukpahiu, ma la ache e̩wñ.
Abo ku ma nʼibe ef amone̩ le̩ la ako amone̩ wewe e̩wñ; ma muda awane̩ noj o̩kwo̩chageli kpʼo̩go̩ una kpʼamu kpai ane̩-ma edinya, e-le̩ ache o̩jo̩ wewe pe̩.
E̩gba ku ma awane̩ le̩ ate̩ko-ma achʼo̩re. Amone̩ wewe muda anʼurinyo̩ o̩fa amanyʼuma o̩la.
Oñ abo iche̩ka ef abo ku ma nʼibe le awane̩ ki fʼuma gwe̩ ki che kʼo̩la-ma ki fe̩ ku ma mud efufu, gbogbo wʼiko ukpoji, todu iko-wñ ku ma da bo̩ ta.

Tak onu-i ache alu ki dʼowñ e̩do̩; i ahi o̩la-wñ ne, i la abukpa tʼo̩la-wñ ka kʼi tʼo̩jo̩ du le, i la aka e̩wñ awuwu rʼO̩jo̩ e-amo̩jo̩ o̩la. I la ara ñw u gbogbo kadʼiko kʼe̩do̩ e̩kpa le̩ ki takpa; todu ma ache tʼeju ibe ku ma ñwatane̩ le̩ chuu.
Amo̩jo̩ amata-wñ la wʼo̩ eju n, kpʼe̩wñ e̩ne̩ kʼabobule̩ añe-ju owñ le̩; o̩jo̩ du awʼo̩ eju n, todu i abukpa tʼo̩la-wñ ka kʼi tʼuma le̩ chaka.
I muda abʼojima mʼo̩jo̩ ki chʼagbiti ogu koji. I la anʼo̩jamalia kpʼajifa kpʼokuta akoko kpʼe̩wñ ube̩do̩ abumʼo̩jo̩ kʼamata-wñ ma mʼo̩ n.

O̩jo̩ ononojo abʼo̩ che abu kʼi nʼe̩wñ ache ef aku aku ki gbiti tule. I abʼojima mʼe̩ne̩ ki je̩ kpʼowñ kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ki nana nyo̩gba. I la aje̩ ñwu ma nʼo̩da amone̩ wewe; i akpʼane̩ le̩ ñwu ma ki chʼuro̩me̩-ma.

Iko̩ ukpoji onu o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ awako bʼo̩; onu o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ anʼo̩ko̩ ogu kʼanya afʼo̩ kpʼamananya kpʼo̩ko̩ wewe agwo̩ko̩ tʼo̩ o̩la dab ofutu. I la agudu wʼojane̩ ojane̩, oñ i agulo̩ bʼuma ma alale gudu.
I ñʼawʼojane̩ ojima le̩ ge̩. I la aje̩ ñw abo wewe wewe awane̩; ma muda agba abo-i bʼo̩ o̩wo̩ te̩: Ido̩m kpai Moab kpʼame̩nuto̩gba ef amo̩ma Amo̩n.
I la anʼo̩wo̩-wñ dala abʼane̩ ane̩ ma ge̩, ane̩ Ijipti la afu tane̩ n.
I muda anʼo̩da e̩wñ akoko e-o̩jamalia kpʼajifa kpai idu o̩me̩me̩le̩ du e-Ijipti. Abo Libia kpʼabo Itio̩pia alʼikpa-wñ.
Inabali kʼi agbo̩ kwʼolodudu kpʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ muda achʼo e̩do̩ñwañwala; tak i ake̩do̩fulu dufu kʼi fʼuma chile̩che̩ kʼi kʼamone̩ wewe jo̩ ñw uku.
Tak i afa unyabo onu-wñ agbagba ohimini abadi kpʼuwo alifai kiafo̩ le̩; ida-wñ muda awa chuu, i la anʼe̩ne̩ ki ate̩ko owñ n.

Iko le̩ Maike̩l kʼi chʼagboji lile kʼi adago ubi amo̩ma amone̩-we̩ akwane̩; oñ iko o̩pe̩cha ade̩ e-kʼe̩go̩-wñ ma de̩ akwʼe̩gba kʼuche̩ichi amone̩ de̩ gbogbo wʼiko kʼa ka-i n. Iko le̩ taku ma agba amone̩-we̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ du ku ma li ka kʼodu-wñ che̩ko̩ nyʼo̩takada le̩.
Oñ abo wewe ku ma jʼef ebutu ile̩-i alolu ajʼolu, iche̩ka anyʼef iñmi ogbegbele̩, iche̩ka anyʼef anyo̩ kpai o̩lajijili ogbegbele̩.
Abo ku ma kʼone̩ ibe la afane̩ gbaa alu kʼagbagba ojale ate̩-i de̩ gbaa; oñ abo ku ma rʼone̩ wewe da tʼo̩na o̩kpakpa adab ilawo ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa.
I muda chʼuwe̩, Danie̩l, fʼo̩wo̩ nʼo̩la le̩, kʼe̩ la fʼo̩takada-wñ hiuko̩, gbogbo wʼiko ukpoji. Amone̩ wewe ara tʼemi, tʼano̩mo̩, e̩wñ ema la anana nyo̩gba.
Tak omi Danie̩l chʼeju go, e̩ la go, abʼomune̩ meji dago jo̩, e̩ne̩ʼka dʼotete ohimini ej emi, e̩ne̩ʼka la dago otete ohimini ej ano̩mo̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka-ma ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki kʼukpo line̩n efufu bʼo̩la ma ki dʼate̩ ñw omi ohimini le̩, kakini, Ab iko-wñ akpo̩kpe̩ kade tak e̩wñ uno̩-i akpoji?

Tak u gbʼuko̩la e̩ne̩ ki kʼukpo line̩n efufu bʼo̩la ma le̩, e-kʼi dʼate̩ ñw omi ohimini le̩; i la mʼo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ kpʼawohi ko nyʼate̩ rʼo̩wo̩ ojale, oñ i fʼe̩ne̩ ki deju ogbegbele̩ go̩, i kakini, I ade̩ tod ikoʼka kpai iko meji kpai ukpe̩reji iko; tak e̩gba ku ma fʼukpahiu abo kiafo̩ le̩ ge̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩ kpa, e̩wñ-i ache kpa.
Omi gbo̩, u muda mʼoji-wñ n; tak u kakini, O odu-mi, e̩wñ achʼoji otitala e̩wñ-i ta?
Oñ i kakini, E̩ nalo we̩, Danie̩l, todu ma fʼo̩wo̩ nʼo̩la le̩ me̩, i la chʼe̩hiuko̩ gbogbo wʼiko ukpoji otitala.
Amone̩ wewe agwʼo̩la-ma rinyo̩ ma la ache kʼo̩la-ma ki mud efufu, ma la agwe̩ ma ku ma fe̩; ame̩nebibi muda ache e̩wñ bibi-ma; ame̩ne̩bibi le̩ du la amʼoji-wñ n; abo ku ma nʼibe muda amʼoji-wñ.
Oñ akwʼiko ku ma kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa kwʼo̩mo̩, ku ma la dʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ki agwʼe̩wñ alache̩ le̩ dago, o̩jo̩-wñ achʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼoli me̩lu nyʼo̩gbo̩ meji.
E̩ne̩ ki anede owñ kʼi lewa tʼo̩jo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼoli me̩fa nyʼogue̩gwa nyoke me̩lu le̩ gbede.
Uwe̩ ki muda nalo we̩ gbogbo tʼukpoji-wñ otitala. Uwe̩ la añmi, tak uwe̩ adago ukpe̩ uña e-we̩ e̩gba ukpoji o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i.
O̩la Jihofa ki wʼugbo Hosiya, o̩ma Been, iko Uzaya kpai Jotan kpai Ehaz kpai He̩ze̩kaya, amonu Juda, kpai iko Je̩roboam, o̩ma Joash, onu Israe̩l de̩.
E̩gba ku Jihofa ko̩la ñw Hosiya ejodudu, Jihofa ka ñw Hosiya kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ mʼajo̩ko̩ʼka du chʼo̩ya, kʼe̩ nʼamo̩ma ajo̩ko̩, todu ane̩-i ajo̩ko̩ tabale, ekwo kʼi akwo bo̩ Jihofa te̩.
Abe̩le̩ i le nane̩ Gome̩r, o̩ma Dibleim, oñ i fʼefu nyo̩, i la fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi ñw u.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Je̩zree̩l ; todu iko bo̩ pe̩e̩ tak omi anache̩ e̩bie̩ Je̩zree̩l abʼunyi Jihiu ma, oñ na je̩ ñw o̩fe̩ ojane̩ Israe̩l ki ku.
I la awatʼiko le̩, kʼomi agu o̩o̩do̩ Israe̩l che̩ ef o̩go̩ Je̩zree̩l.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ ño̩ dabi fʼefu nyo̩ ge̩. I la fʼo̩ma onobule̩ bi. Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Lo-ruhama ; todu omi ñʼali abunyi Israe̩l ejumomi, kʼu natʼo̩la no̩ ñw ma kilikili ge̩ n.
Omi muda ali abunyi Juda ejumomi, kʼu najadu ma lugbo Jihofa, O̩jo̩-ma; u la anʼo̩o̩do̩ abe̩k o̩kwo̩chageli abe̩k ogu eja abe̩k amanya abe̩k amananya jadu ma n.
Oñ e̩gba ku Lo-ruhama mʼalu e̩nya da, iye-wñ ño̩ fʼefu nyo̩, oñ i fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi.
Tak i kakini. E̩ ki dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Lo-ammi ; todu ame̩ chʼabo-mi n, u la adʼubi-me̩ n.

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ aluka amo̩ma Israe̩l awewe dab e̩lanyi ohimini, e-ki ma jʼañwa n, kʼi ma la jʼakaluka n; oñ i awatu ka kʼugbo ku ma ka ñw ma kakini, Ama chʼabo-mi n, ma aka ñw ma kakini, Amo̩ma O̩jo̩ ki deju.
Taku ma akʼamo̩ma Juda kpʼamo̩ma Israe̩l wa jʼugbokate, oñ ma achi e̩ne̩ ka kʼi chʼagboji-ma; taku ma akwo bʼojane̩ le̩ te̩, todu iko Je̩zree̩l le̩ atabale.
Me̩ ki ka ñw amo̩maye-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kakini, Ammi;me̩ ki ka ñw amo̩maye-me̩ onobule̩ kakini, Ru-hama.
Me̩ kobʼiye-me̩, kobʼo̩ ke—
tode̩gba kʼu nafʼu tago ofo,
Ochochi, omi ñʼali amo̩ma-wñ ejumomi n,
Todu iye-ma te̩tachʼajo̩ko̩;
Todule̩ go, omi anʼikeke kpʼo̩gba nyʼo̩na-wñ;
Tak owñ atʼame̩naja-wñ ubi,
Todu i ma ka kʼomi kʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩
Todule̩ omi adabi gbʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩-mi iko-wñ,
Fai tak u nakʼe̩wñ bʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩-wñ te̩
Omi ñʼaje̩ ñw anyi-wñ du
Oñ nakpʼikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ kpʼoli o̩gbaikolo-wñ bie̩ rinyo̩,
Tak omi akʼiko ami Beal wa fejudʼo
Todule̩, go, omi agbʼo̩ ibe̩,
Tak u nakʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ ñw u o̩mo̩,
I la ade̩ iko le̩ Jihofa aka-i, kʼuwe̩ adomi ko̩ Ishi,e̩ ñʼado̩ mi ko̩ Beal ge̩ n.
Todu omi akʼodu odu ami-Beal kwʼef alu-wñ, ma ñʼahi alu mʼodu-wñ ge̩ n.

Tak o̩jo̩ le̩ nakpʼalo̩ todu ma kpʼame̩wñ iñmi oko kpʼame̩we̩ ojale kpʼame̩wñ ki afa ane̩pe̩te̩; naño̩ fʼo̩o̩do̩ kpʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpʼo̩gu eja guche̩ kwo bʼoj ane̩-i te̩, oñ naje̩ ñw ma dachi añmi to̩ko̩o̩.
Tak omi adʼe̩ kpʼo̩la-mi o̩gbegbele̩; i-i, nadʼe̩ kpʼo̩la-mi ef o̩kpakpa kpai lʼo̩na kʼoji ajo̩ ka kpʼef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼef ejumomi.
Omi la adʼuwe̩ kpʼo̩la-mi kʼe̩ chʼe-mi kʼe̩ chubi mi tak uwe̩ ama Jihofa.
Tak i awache̩ iko le̩
tak ane̩ ile̩ adohi ñw e̩wñ e̩yo̩ kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpʼekpo,
tak omi adʼu gbe̩ ñw o̩la-mi oj ane̩-i.

Taku Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, E̩ ño̩ lo ta, kʼe̩ fe̩do̩ onobule̩ kʼonuku-wñ afe̩do̩-wñ le̩, kʼi ño̩ chʼajo̩ko̩, alu ku Jihofa a fe̩do̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l dagba ma chaka rida tʼugbo amo̩jo̩ omune̩, ku ma la fe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma.
Abe̩le̩ tak u nʼo̩ko̩ ajifa me̩gwe̩lu kpai barli e̩ñwa homor oka kpʼe̩kpe̩reji fʼu la ñw O̩la-mi.
Tak u ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki bʼumi gugu o̩jo̩ wewe; e̩ ki ño̩ jo̩ko̩ ge̩ n, e̩ ki la chʼo̩ya e̩ne̩ du n; abe̩le̩ omi ñʼade̩ ñw e̩ ge̩.
Todu amo̩ma Israe̩l ajo̩ o̩jo̩ wewe, ma nʼonu n, ma la anʼagboji n, ma anʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ache n, ma anʼojibo n, ma anʼe̩fo̩d kpai amudoji n.
Ubile̩ tak amo̩ma Israe̩l adabi, oñ ma atejane̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma kpai Defid onu-ma; ma la awʼugbo Jihofa kpai ugbo e̩nyo̩-wñ iko o̩jo̩ otitala kpʼailo era.
Me̩ ki gbʼo̩la Jihofa, ame̩ abo Israe̩l;
e̩wñ du de̩ n, chai e̩bo̩ ego̩ kpʼe̩bo̩ ebie̩ kpʼone̩ ekpa, kpʼoji eji kpʼe̩ño̩ya eche kpʼo̩ko̩ eje̩;
Todule̩ ane̩-i adaido̩,
E̩ne̩ du ki muda juja n,
E̩ la akʼe̩re̩ oro̩ka,
Abo-mi mukpabie̩ tod e̩wñ ema ku ma ma ne̩ n;
Alu kʼama wewe nyo̩gba,
Ama nʼadure abo-mi chʼuje̩wñ-ma;
Abe̩le̩ i la ade̩, alu kʼamone̩ de̩ abe̩le̩ atama ade̩;
Ma la aje̩ e̩wñ, i abʼuma jo̩ n;
Abutabu eche kpʼo̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma
Abo-mi anyʼojuju kpʼoli-ma,
Ma kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ oj uwo uwo ki gbo̩gba,
Omi abʼudu ñw amo̩ma-me̩ onobule̩ e̩gba ku ma chʼabutabu n,
Dagba kʼuwe̩, O Israe̩l, chaka tʼajo̩ko̩,
Todu Israe̩l te̩tachʼe̩wñ ugbite̩re̩
Ifraim kwomanyʼode ode me̩, tʼo̩ no̩.
Omi-ma ka, ma kwochʼabutabu ale;
Afu ki aju mʼika-wñ ko wenyʼu,
Me̩ gbʼe-i, O ame̩ amatama!
Abo ku ma la fʼe̩re̩ ubi ro̩ la nyʼef e̩kpabie̩ jiji jiji me̩;
U chema Ifraim,
E̩wñ ku ma jʼache aje̩ ñw ma rida
Eke Israe̩l la do̩mo̩ agbʼibenu eju-wñ;
Ma alo kpʼame̩wño̩re̩-ma egini kpʼamokuno̩-ma
Ama kʼo̩wo̩-ma nyʼukpo arʼo̩kpo̩ ñw Jihofa me̩;
Me̩ ki fʼo̩kakachi kekele fa Gibea,
Ifraim amud akpokpo e̩wñ
Amagboji Juda dab
Ma fʼIfraim che o̩lachi, ma fʼu demane̩ ef ajo̩,
Todule̩ omi dabe̩ne̩ kʼojudu ñw Ifraim,
E̩gba kʼIfraim fʼo̩ga-wñ li,
Todu omi adab idu ñw Ifraim,
Nalo kʼu dabi tʼe̩gu-mi,
Lewa, kʼa mudabi tʼugbo Jihofa;
O̩jo̩ meji jo̩ fa-i, i aje̩ ñw a muye;
Awa ki ma, awa ki tʼo̩ ubi alo kʼa fu Jihofa ma;
O Ifraim, abʼu nachʼuwe̩?
Todule̩ oñ omi nʼamakache̩ fʼuma lo̩ wane̩,
Todu ufe̩de̩nyo̩ chʼe̩wñ ki rʼumi e̩do̩,
Ama muda fʼalo-mi daba dab Ade̩m;
Gilead chʼewo abo kuma ache ibe̩te̩,
Alu amadinya kpala jo̩ anede one̩,
Omi la fʼe̩wñ omefa li ef unyi Israe̩l;
Uwe̩ ge̩, O Juda, o̩jo̩ e̩wñ-we̩ eko wʼunyi chʼe̩date̩ ñw e̩ me̩.
E̩gba ki dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu fʼo̩ga Israe̩l che,
Ma la aka ef e̩do̩-ma
Ma nʼe̩wñ bibi-ma fʼonu e̩do̩ bo̩,
Ama chʼamatene o̩ya one̩ chaka;
O̩jo̩ onu-wa le̩, amagboji nʼe̩do̩fulu o̩te̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma dʼo̩ga ñw o̩la-ma;
Todu ma fʼe̩do̩-ma ñwo̩che te̩ dab igbeli todu bre̩di abu ku ma kpala jo̩ anede one̩;
O̩chaka-ma kpuna dab igbeli,
I chʼe-Ifraim, i fʼo̩la-wñ kpe̩gwa nyʼef amone̩ ojoji ojoji;
Abo̩wo̩ ejaduña mʼukpahiu-wñ ko̩ je̩,
Uba Israe̩l agbʼibenu nyʼu eju-wñ;
Ifraim la dab ikede,
E̩gba kʼama alo̩, omi anʼiga-mi da-la abʼuma oji ma;
Atogwo ki chʼe-ma, todu ku ma kwobʼumi te̩ ale!
Ma la raku do̩ mi kpʼe̩do̩-ma n,
Dagba omi chaka ko ma e̩wñ kʼu la dʼukpahiu ñw o̩wo̩-ma, ma ño̩ ñwibe e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ nyʼumi kpo̩.
Ma dabi, i muda chʼugbo e̩ne̩ ki dʼatate̩ n;
Dʼo̩kakachi kad alu-we̩,
Ma araku do̩ mi kakini,
Israe̩l fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ hi tinyo̩ me̩;
Ma kʼamonu gugu jo̩, o̩wo̩-mi muda dʼef uwñ n.
O̩mokuno̩-we̩ mʼe̩ du tinyo̩ me̩, O Samaria.
Todu i chaka chʼe̩wñ-i, ugbo Israe̩l i kwo;
Todu ma du afu ki aju gbe̩,
Ma mʼIsrae̩l du dami me̩;
Todu ama mute̩gu le tʼAsiria,
Ochochi, dagba ma chaka faya ef abo uche̩ichi,
Todabu kʼIfraim fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ che, kʼugbo kʼama adure ki wewe nyo̩gba,
Omi fʼe̩wñ uko̩-o̩la-mi icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩gwa le̩ ko̩ nyʼe̩wñ tod uwñ,
I chʼe-e̩wñ ku ma ko wa akpa chʼiche̩bo̩ ñw mi le̩,
Todu Israe̩l fʼAcho̩na-wñ gbenyo̩,
E̩ ki gwoguyo̩, O Israe̩l,
Ajita ugwo̩ka kpai agu o̩ko̩lo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma akʼuje̩wñ ñw ma jo̩ n,
Ma agugu oj ane̩ Jihofa n;
Ma adʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma dajane̩ ñw Jihofa n;
Abu me̩ ache o̩jo̩ ujeju eju e̩kpa le̩
Todu go, ma kwo bʼe̩kpabie̩ te̩ me̩;
Iko ewa fejudo lewa,
Ifraim chʼadaku ugbo O̩jo̩-mi,
Ma fʼo̩la-ma kpabie̩ tabale
Omi fʼIsrae̩l li dabe̩ne̩ kʼachiwebe̩te̩ma ef aje̩tachi,
I chʼe-Ifraim, ojima-ma awu rinyo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩we̩—
Dagba ma chaka nʼamo̩ma-ma gba,
Ma du Ifraim gbe̩ uña ube̩do̩
Ko ñw ma, O Jihofa—
E̩wñ bibi-ma du jo̩ Gilgal;
Ma fʼIfraim gwo,
O̩jo̩-mi ako ma rinyo̩,
Israe̩l chʼikeli ki hidu kʼi arʼe̩ro-wñ.
E̩do̩-ma chʼejeji;
Fa-i ama aka chuu kakini:
O̩la ofo ma ka;
Okpo achʼabo ku ma dodo Samaria ofe
Ma ñʼane̩ nyʼAsiria,
I chʼe-Samaria, ma fʼonu-wñ ko̩da bʼo̩ te̩,
Ma ñʼakpʼotete otete Afe̩n,
O Israe̩l, uwe̩ te̩tadure akwʼiko Gibe̩a le̩;
E̩gba ki dʼumi e̩do̩ nako̩ ma o̩la;
Ifraim la dab ole okuno̩ agbadufu ku ma kʼo̩ uko̩lo̩
Me̩ ki fʼe̩wñ gbe̩ ñw o̩la-me̩ ef o̩kpakpa,
Ame̩ te̩takʼe̩be̩ e̩wñ bibi,
todule̩ ekuku akwane̩ ef abo-we̩,
Abe̩le̩ Be̩te̩l ache me̩,
E̩gba kʼIsrae̩l chʼimo̩to̩, u fe̩do̩ uwñ,
Alu ku ma do̩ ma tule,
Omi la chʼe̩ne̩ ki ko̩ Ifraim ule̩ ele,
Omi nʼiku one̩ afa ma,
Ma ñʼadabi tʼoj ane̩ Ijipti ge̩ n,
O̩fu o̩kwo̩chageli la akwane̩ abʼewo ewo-ma ma,
E̩do̩ abo-mi la chekado elubibi bʼumi te̩;
Ab u nale kʼu natʼuwe̩ no̩? O Ifraim!
Omi la ache teju ukpuna uwe̩do̩-mi n,
Ama alule̩ atu Jihofa ubi,
ma achi kwo Ijipti wa kpʼo̩la ega dab ame̩we̩,
Ifraim mʼolemi ko donyʼumi daka me̩,
Afu ki aju chʼuje̩wñ Ifraim,
Jihofa ño̩ nʼiñwa kʼi aje̩ kpai Juda,
I gwo̩nyʼo̩maye-wñ agbe̩re̩ efu iye-wñ,
Ochochi, i nʼukpahiu tʼonuche̩ O̩jo̩ le oñ i fʼu du,
owñ che Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du,
Todule̩ e̩ narida tʼugbo O̩jo̩-we̩,
Owñ chʼanyaja, e̩bo̩ o̩lemi la dʼo̩wo̩-wñ,
Oñ Ifraim kakini, U mud anana, ochochi,
Omi muda che Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩
Omi ño̩ ko̩la ñw amakache̩;
Gilead chʼibe̩te̩?
Jeko̩b la ra nyʼoko Aram,
Jihofa la du Israe̩l kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa lʼo̩wo̩ akache̩,
Ifraim la nyi uwe̩do̩ bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩;
E̩gba kʼIfraim ko̩la, i mud o̩la ega;
Fai taku ma dure ño̩ dure tule,
Todule̩ ama adab atula odudu
Omi muda che Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩
Omi fʼe̩ ma ef aje̩tachi,
alu kʼoko ije̩-ma de̩, abe̩le̩ efu-ma ko̩,
Todule̩ omi la dab idu ñw ama,
Nade kpʼama dab ibe̩a ku ma kʼamo̩ma-wñ kpa,
E̩wñ ki kpʼe̩ bie̩ de̩, O̩ Israe̩l;
Ugbo onu-we̩ de̩ fa-i kʼi agbʼe̩ ef ewo ewo-we̩ chaka?
Omi mʼonu du ñw e̩ ef uwe̩do̩-mi,
Ma fʼudu kʼIfraim fe̩ ji te̩,
E̩do̩dudu onobule̩ kʼi achefu abʼo ma
Nala ma tane̩ bʼo̩wo̩ o̩jegu te̩?
Dagba i chʼabio̩ma ef amo̩maye-wñ,
Samaria achʼudu e-wñ,
O Israe̩l, mudabiwa abo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩,
E̩ mʼuko̩la ko le bʼuwe̩
Asiria agba wa n,
Omi añwʼelubibi-ma che;
Omi adab eli ki achi ñw abo Israe̩l;
e̩to̩-wñ ata;
Abo ku ma gugu olubo̩-wñ adabiwa,
Ifraim akakini, E̩wñ ño̩ chʼe-mi kpʼode ge̩?
E̩ne̩ chʼo̩ka kʼi neke mʼoji e̩wñ-i?
O̩la Jihofa ki wʼugbo Joe̩l o̩ma Pe̩tiue̩l de̩;
Me̩ gbʼe-i, ame̩ abogijo,
Me̩ mʼu du ka ñw amo̩ma-me̩,
E̩wñ kʼide̩ imiejo to̩no̩,
Mʼolu ji, ame̩ amañmo̩te̩, ku me̩ raku;
Todu abo uche̩ichiʼka lewa oj ane̩-mi me̩,
I mʼikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma-mi du chihi rinyo̩,
Dinaku dabe̩ne̩ kʼigbe̩le̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n
Ma mʼe̩wñ ele eduwa kpai omi eduwa ko̩da
Ane̩ uche̩ chile̩che̩ te̩,
Anyo̩ ki mu me̩, ame̩ amaluche̩,
Ikeli le̩ gbe̩,
Kʼe̩wñ lʼago-me̩, ku me̩ dinaku, ame̩, amatama,
Me̩ che kʼalu ejiʼka ki fo̩,
Atogwo ñw o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i!
Uje̩wñ muda eju-wa n?
Ugbe̩-wñ ku ma nʼebo ñw u ache̩ me̩,
Me̩ gbʼabu kʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ jʼafifi!
O Jihofa, uwe̩ naraku do̩.
Ochochi ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ oko du jʼache fafafa ñw e̩
Me̩ ki fʼo̩kakachi fa Zayo̩n,
O̩jo̩ kʼane̩ chubi i che, kʼe̩wñ de̩ bulubulu,
Una do̩mo̩ alie̩ e̩wñ o̩gba ma,
E̩ li ma, ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼamanya ejuwe̩,
Ekuku-ma dab ekuku o̩kogu o̩kogu,
Eju-ma kʼamone̩ li ma jʼane̩ ali gbigbili,
Ma gwo̩ko̩ wa dabe̩ne̩ kʼamagbiti,
E̩ne̩ du akʼekeji-wñ e̩che̩ n,
Ma muro̩ bʼewo le̩ ma,
Ane̩-ile̩ aga o̩gba-ma,
Taku Jihofa anʼomu-wñ data
Ama i chaka che ifa-i, Jihofa aka-i,
me̩ ki la fʼe̩do̩-me̩ na i ki chʼukpo-me̩ ofofo n.
E̩ne̩ ma, abe̩k i adabi awʼo̩,
Fʼo̩kakachi fa Zayo̩n;
kʼamone̩ wa jo̩.
Amatama, ku ma chʼama che e̩wñ ñw Jihofa,
Taku Jihofa jogu tod ane̩-wñ,
Taku Jihofa dohi, oñ i ka ñw abo-wñ kakini.
Omi muda akʼabogu o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩ bʼume̩ te̩ nyʼo̩najiji,
O ane̩-i, e̩ ki railo n;
Ame̩, ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ oko, me̩ ki railo n,
E̩do̩-me̩ ki bo̩, ame̩ amo̩ma Zayo̩n,
Ajita ugwo̩ka du ako̩ ñw o̩ka wit,
Omi adʼo̩do̩ o̩do̩
Ame̩ aje̩ kʼefu, e̩do̩-me̩ la abo̩,
Ame̩ ama ka kʼomi dʼalumeji abo Israe̩l,
Tak i awatu anubi-wñ,
Omi ñʼadʼAfu-mi danyʼamadu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩
Tak u nakʼe̩wñ uno̩ nye̩ña efojale kpai ane̩-ile̩, e̩bie̩ kpai una kpai oduduna ki dago waala.
Olu arida e̩chubi, ochu la arida e̩bie̩, o̩gba tak o̩jo̩ lile e-Jihofa ki abailo le̩ lewa.
Oñ i awatu ka kʼe̩ne̩ du ki akwa do̩ odu Jihofa afʼo̩wo̩ tane̩; todu abo ku ma mufu ajo̩ oj uwo Zayo̩n kpʼefu Je̩rusale̩m, alu ki Jihofa ka le̩. Oñ abo ki Jihofa ado̩ ma ajʼef e̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩ le̩.
Todu go, o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i, kpai iko le̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼu nako Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m kwef amu le̩ dabiwa,

nakʼabuche̩ichi du wajo̩, oñ nako ma gwo̩ru wʼef o̩go̩ Jiho̩shafat, tak u nache ma alu kʼajo̩ ka tod amone̩-mi kpʼe̩wñ ogu-mi Israe̩l, e-kʼama fʼuma fiatuka rʼef abuche̩ichi ku ma laño̩ fʼane̩-mi kpe̩rʼojoji,
ma la ranya tod abo-mi, ma mʼimo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du la ajo̩ko̩, ma la dʼimo̩to̩ onobule̩ ta todu o̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma, ma la mʼu du ñmo̩ me̩.

Ochochi, e̩wñ chʼe-mi kpai ame̩, O Taya kpai Saido̩n? kpai ane̩ Filistia chaka? Akoji e̩wñʼka me̩ du ñw mi le̩? I la che̩wñ ku me̩ adʼakoji ñw mi, omi ahika dʼakoji-me̩ le̩ dabiwa abʼume̩ onugo oji ma piopio.
Todu ame̩ mʼajifa-mi kpʼo̩jamalia-mi ko, kʼame̩ mʼe̩wñ alifia-mi ki abe̩do̩ le̩ ño̩ jʼef unyi ode-me̩.
Me̩ la mʼamo̩ma Juda kpʼamo̩ma Je̩rusale̩m ko ta ñw amo̩ma abo Grik la, todu ku me̩ mʼuma ño̩ bʼalo̩me̩ ane̩-ma te̩ nyʼo̩najiji.
Go, omi ako ma kwane̩ kwʼugbo ku me̩ ko ma ta nyi le̩, oñ u nadʼakoji-me̩ dabiwa abʼume̩ onugo oji ma.
Tak u nakʼamo̩ma-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ ta rʼef o̩wo̩ amo̩ma Juda, oñ ma ako ma ta ñw abo Sheba, abuche̩ichi ku ma jʼo̩najiji le̩; todu Jihofa ka me̩.
Me̩ ki dʼe-i kpogo ef abuche̩ichi uche̩ichi kakini,
Me̩ kʼuko̩che̩-me̩ gwʼo̩kwo̩chageli,
Me̩ hiane̩ wa,
Abuche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki nakʼo̩la-ma kwane̩,
Dʼujo̩ka kadʼo,
O̩wo̩ one̩, o̩wo̩ one̩,
Olu kpʼochu achubi me̩,
Jihofa la de̩ Zayo̩n akwa,
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ ama ka kʼomi che Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩,
Oñ o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i
Ijipti achʼalache̩ te̩
One̩ muda adodo Juda ogbegbele̩,
Omi la adale ñw ma ugbo e̩bie̩ e-kʼu ma dale ñw ma ugbo-wñ le̩ n,
O̩la Emo̩s kʼi dʼef amadide ame̩wño̩re̩ Te̩koa, owñ chʼo̩la Israe̩l kʼi li iko Uzaya, onu Juda, kpʼiko Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Joash, onu Israe̩l. I li o̩do̩ meji tak ane̩ le̩ miejo.
Oñ i kakini:
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Omi la adʼuna kpuche̩ wa abʼunyi Hazae̩l ma,
Tak omi agu ugbo̩lo̩ oli Damaskus che̩,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Omi la adʼuna kpuche̩ wa abʼo̩lo̩do̩ Gaza ma,
Omi lañʼakʼabo ku ma dodo Ashdod da bʼo̩ te̩,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Omi la dʼuna kpuche̩ wa abʼo̩lo̩do̩ Taya ma,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Omi la adʼuna kpuche̩ wa abo Teman ma,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Omi la akʼuna o̩lo̩do̩ Raba,
onu-ma la anyʼef amu,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Omi la adʼuna kpuche̩ wa abo Moab ma,
omi akʼakajo̩ da bʼalumeji-wñ te̩,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
Omi la adʼuna kpuche̩ wa abo Juda ma,
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini:
abo ku ma chʼe̩do̩ fafa tod ebutu ki dʼoji ame̩nubie̩,
ma la kʼo̩la-ma dachi o̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ du
U la fʼe̩ne̩ Amo̩r le̩ chile̩che̩ rʼo̩gbama,
Omi laño̩ ko me̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa,
Oñ u kʼamo̩ma-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ iche̩ka kwane̩ ku ma chʼamakache̩,I chʼabe̩le̩ n? ame̩ abo Israe̩l,
Me̩ la kʼo̩te̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ñw abo Nazarait-me̩ ñmo̩,
Go, omi ade me̩ mane̩ e̩gu-me̩ le̩,
Era afʼabo kʼe̩re̩-ma le̩ o̩wo̩,
e̩ne̩ ki atʼo̩fa la adago n,
e̩ne̩ ki la nʼe̩do̩ ef amagbiti le̩
Me̩ gbʼo̩la ku Jihofa ka nyu me̩-i, O ame̩ abo Israe̩l, owñ chʼe-kʼu ka nyu o̩gbo̩ abo unyi du kʼu ko kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu wa kakini:
Ame̩ kate oñ omi ma ef abo unyi unyi abo ile̩-i;
Alu-ma ma jo̩ n,
ldu akwa efoko,
E̩we̩ neke ñwa tef oku ane̩-ile̩,
Ma afʼo̩kakachi ogu ef ewo,
Ondu Jihofa ache e̩wñ du n tila,
Idu fʼukwa kwa me̩,
Ame̩ ki dʼu kpogo unyi unyi ojima Ashdo̩d,
Todu ama ma e̩nyo̩ eche n, Jihofa aka-i,
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩, kakini:

Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini: Alu kʼadide ame̩wño̩re̩ agba e̩re̩ meji kwʼef alu idu, abe̩k e̩bo eti-wñ, abe̩le̩ ma agba abo Israe̩l ku ma gugu Samaria oj o̩kpo̩kpo̩ lile o̩wo̩ʼka, kpʼoji aloji siliki oj ate̩.
Me̩ gbo̩ ku me̩ la gbʼibenu nyʼunyi Jeko̩b,
Todu o̩jo̩ kʼu nakʼada kʼIsrae̩l je̩ wa afejudʼo,
U ñʼakpa unyi uwo manyʼunyi o̩lo̩ji;
Me̩ gbʼo̩la-i, ame̩ amole okuno̩ e-Beshan,
Ondu Jihofa fʼefo̩-wñ go̩ kakini,
Oñ ame̩ ale e̩kpana e̩kpana aku dufu,
Me̩ lewa Be̩te̩l ku me̩ jʼada ke;
me̩ ki kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ugwa kʼo̩jo̩wu dʼef uwñ wa gujo,
Omi laño̩ kʼenyi efe̩ ñw me̩ ewo ewo-me̩ du,
U ño̩ fʼomi ojale fa wʼubi bʼume̩ te̩
abe̩le̩ ewo meji ñe̩ta tale wʼemi wʼemi gbogbo nyʼewoʼka
U kʼikpetubi kpʼe̩wñ ekpebu kpa me̩;
U dʼe̩wñ ibi kpuche̩ wʼef ume̩ alu ki de̩ Ijipti;
U la fʼewo ewo gulo̩ ef ume̩,
Todule̩, e̩wñ kʼu nachʼe̩ de̩, O Israe̩l;
Todule̩, go, e̩ne̩ ki abo̩ ewo uwo jo̩, kʼi la nyʼafu ki aju,
Me̩ gbo̩ o̩la kʼu nadu chʼinaku eda todu me̩-i, O abunyi Israe̩l;
Igbe̩le̩ Israe̩l ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n le̩ lewane̩ me̩,
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩, kakini:
Todu abu ki Jihofa aka ñw abunyi Israe̩l de̩ kakini:
me̩ ki muda tene Be̩te̩l in,
Me̩ tene Jihofa tak ame̩ adeju,
Ame̩ ku me̩ rʼoj ajo̩ da ki mud o̩ge̩le̩,
E̩ne̩ kʼi che o̩ya o̩machi kpai ajuwe̩ anʼo̩ma,
kʼi adʼe̩kpabie̩ wa achigili abʼabo ku ma nʼtikpahiu ma,
Ma chulaka e̩ne̩ ki adʼo̩la biu one̩ alaku,
Todule̩ todabu kʼame̩ fʼe̩re̩ tʼe̩nubie̩
Todu omi chema alu kʼada ku me̩ je̩ chewewe,
Todule̩ e̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ ibe ibe achechi gugu iko e̩go̩-i;
Me̩ ki tejane̩ e̩wñ e̩nyo̩, i ki chʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ n,
Me̩ ki chulaka e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩, me̩ ki la fe̩do̩ e̩wñ e̩nyo̩,
Todule̩, abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du, owñ chʼOndu, aka de̩ kakini:
Aku ero̩ la ajʼoko achiwebe̩te̩ma du,
Atogwo ñw ame̩ ku me̩ tene iko o̩jo̩ Jihofa le̩!
i dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ ara bʼidu te̩,
O̩jo̩ Jihofa le̩ achʼugane̩ n chai e̩chubi,
Uje̩wñ uyo̩-me̩ chʼe̩wñ ulaka-mi kpʼe̩wñ e̩de̩te̩-mi,
Dagba me̩ chaka kʼe̩wñ e̩gujo-me̩ manyʼe̩wñ ele-me̩ wa ñw mi,
Mʼekuku eli-me̩ ko bʼumi eti te̩;
Oji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka ki nacha wane̩ dab omiofo,
Ame̩ kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ kpʼe̩wñ ele wa che mi ef aje̩tachi o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, O abunyi Israe̩l?
Ame̩ mʼebu Molo̩k-me̩ kpʼo̩jo̩-me̩ kʼi chʼilawo, owñ chʼojibo ku me̩ che ñw o̩la-me̩ le̩ ko,
todule̩ nako me̩ nyʼef amu ej ano̩mo̩ ñwu Damaskus, Jihofa kʼodu-wñ ko̩ O̩jo̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du aka-i.
Atogwo ñw abo ku ma jo̩ Zayo̩n añmi ofo,
Me̩ lale nyi Kaine ku me̩ li;
Ame̩ ku me̩ hi o̩jo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ tʼubi tʼo̩najiji,
Ame̩ dachi oj ate̩ ku ma nʼenyi adagba che,
me̩ nʼumolo akʼeli ibe̩te̩,
ku ma la nʼugba ñmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma,
Todule̩, fa-i ama le̩ anyʼef amu manyʼabo ku ma nyʼef amu ejodudu,
Ondu Jihofa fʼo̩la-wñ go̩,
Tak i awate̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ me̩gwa bo̩ jʼunyiʼka, eku ama aku.

Oñ e̩gba kʼone̩ mʼe̩ne̩ ki chʼefu-wñ du, i chaka chʼe̩ne̩ ki jo, kʼi kʼachiku-wñ kwʼef unyi, kʼi la aka ñw e̩ne̩ ki dʼejefu ejefu unyi le̩ kakini, One̩ bo̩ ugbo we̩ ta? ki la akakini, O̩da! tak i akakini, Chechi ke! todu i nʼugbo kʼa hiʼalu mʼodu Jihofa n.
Todu go, Jihofa aka,
Amanya afule oj apata okuta?
Ame̩ ku me̩ yo̩ ñw e̩wñ o̩wai,
Todu go, omi akʼabuche̩ichiʼka wa akobʼume̩,
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ña mi le̩ de̩: me̩ la go, i nabo̩ amimiejo iko kʼo̩la e̩wñ oko e-ubiane̩ chane̩ eya; me̩ la go, i chʼiko kʼe̩wñ oko aya abu kʼonu mʼuje̩wñ ejodudu ko.
Oñ i lewa tu, abu ku ma fʼije̩ ane̩ lo̩ kpa, tak u kakini,
E̩wñ-i wo̩ Jihofa;
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ña mi de̩: me̩ la go, Ondu Jihofa dʼudo̩ ku ma nʼuna wa juja; oñ e-le̩ fʼunefu lie̩ kpa, oñ i le kʼi ño̩ mʼane̩-i ko mi.
Tak u kakini,
E̩wñ-i la wo̩ Jihofa;
Oñ i ña mi: me̩ la go, Ondu dago oj o̩do̩ ku ma nʼiku kʼe̩wñ ki woji ji mʼo̩ añwa udago o̩kpakpa-wñ. Iku e̩ñwa udago o̩kpakpa e̩wñ la dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ.
Oñ Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, Emo̩s, e̩wñ e̩ li-i? Tak u kakini, U cheli iku e̩ñwa udago o̩kpakpa e̩wñ. Tak Ondu kakini,
oñ otete otete Aise̩k amud alache̩
Tak Amazaya, atama Be̩te̩l, fʼuche̩ kpe̩ru Je̩ro̩boam onu Israe̩l, kakini, Emo̩s fʼalo da nyʼuwe̩ alumeji abunyi Israe̩l; ane̩-i la neke nʼadu uko̩la-wñ kpa n.
Todu abu kʼEmo̩s ka de̩, i kakini,
Amazaya ño̩ ka ñw Emo̩s kakini, O uwe̩ agane̩, lo, ra tʼane̩ Juda, kʼe̩ jʼuje̩wñ o̩mo̩, kʼe̩ laño̩ kache̩ o̩mo̩;
e̩ ki la gbe̩do̩ kache̩ Be̩te̩l ge̩ n, todu uña kiafo̩ e-onu, kpʼunyi o̩fe̩ i la che.
Tak Emo̩s dohi ñw Amazaya kakini, Omi chʼakache̩ no, u la chʼo̩ma akache̩ n; chai adejute̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ u che kpʼe̩ne̩ ki adejute̩ oli sikamo̩r,
Jihofa la mʼumi du bʼetʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ubi te̩, oñ Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ kache̩ ñw abo-mi Israe̩l.
Todule̩, fa-i, uwe̩ ki gbʼo̩la Jihofa.
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Abu ki Jihofa ña mi de̩: e̩ la go, agba e̩roli o̩lo̩ji te̩.
Oñ I kakini, Emo̩s, e̩wñ e̩ li? Oñ u kakini, E̩roli o̩lo̩ji ki che̩ko̩ agba. Taku Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini,
Eli unyi O̩jo̩ la amud inaku eda o̩jo̩ le̩.
Me̩ ki gbʼe-kide̩, ame̩, kʼe̩do̩ ache me̩ fafafa ku me̩ dʼe̩nale mi,
ku me̩ kakini, E̩gba oñ ochu etito̩ alale
todu kʼa ki nʼajifa la ame̩nubie̩
Jihofa fʼedufu kʼoji Jeko̩b dufu le̩ go̩, kakini,
Ane̩ le̩ aga tod e̩wñ-i n?
Oñ i awatu iko kʼa ka-i, Ondu Jihofa aka-i,
Tak u naje̩ ñw uje̩wñ uyo̩-me̩ ki rida aido̩ eda,
Me̩ go, iko-wñ awa, Ondu Jihofa aka-i,
Tak ama atale akwʼo̩la ohimini abadi nyʼohimini abadi omune̩,
O̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i, amo̩ma igbe̩le̩ ku ma fe̩rʼeju
Ama ku ma go̩ adure Samaria,
Omi li Ondu abu kʼi dago oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, oñ i kakini:
Dagba ma gwʼura gbogbo nyʼef o̩jegu,
Dagba ma kʼo̩la-ma maja oj uwo Karme̩l,
Dagba ame̩ne̩bi-ma chaka ko ma alo rʼo̩gba-ma tʼef amu,
Todu Ondu, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du,
owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki akʼunyi unyi ojale-wñ efojale,
Ame̩ dab amo̩ma abo Itio̩pia ñw omi n?
Go, eju Ondu Jihofa do ojane̩ adure-i,
Todu go, nañwa ñw ma,
Ame̩nadure ef abo-mi chaka akʼuku o̩kwo̩chageli,
Iko le̩ omi adʼebu Defid ki wane̩ le̩ kwane̩
kʼama ki gba e̩bo̩bo̩ abo Ido̩m
Go, iko-wñ awa, Jihofa aka-i,
Omi akʼabo-mi Israe̩l dabi kwef amu wa,
Omi la ako ma gbe̩ oj ane̩ e-ma,
Ane̩ kʼO̩badaya go de̩.
Go, omi ache kʼe̩ nya ef abo uche̩i-chi,
Eke ki dʼef e̩do̩-we̩ mʼe̩ du le.
Dagba e̩ ate̩gu tʼatate̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩te̩,
Iche̩wñ kʼamoji wʼugbo-we̩,
Go abu ku ma tejane̩ e̩wñ Iso̩,
Abo du kʼuwe̩ kpʼama jʼalu,
Jihofa kakini,
Tak e̩do̩ amagbiti-we̩ adakpu, O Teman,
Tod e̩wñ afuma kʼe̩ che o̩maye-we̩ Je̩ko̩b,
O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ dago ej udaba le̩,
I ma dukpe̩ kʼe̩ dago ago ofoo̩jo̩ o̩maye-we̩ o̩jo̩
I ma dukpe̩ kʼe̩ mugudu lʼalaku abo-mi iko uchobi-ma;
I ma dukpe̩ kʼe̩ dago ugwe̩ta o̩na
Todu o̩jo̩ e-Jihofa me̩ me̩ kʼi abʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du ma.
Todu alu kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ ñmo̩ oj uwo-mi kiafo̩-i,
Ama abo ku ma fʼo̩wo̩ tane̩ ajʼoj uwo Zayo̩n,
Oñ abo unyi Jeko̩b achʼuna,
Tak abo o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ ane̩ uwo Iso̩,
Oñ ame̩namu ef o̩wo̩ amo̩ma Israe̩l-i
Amajadu amute̩gu wʼoj uwo Zayo̩n
Oñ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Jona o̩ma Amitai, kakini,
Kwane̩, kʼe̩ lo tu Nine̩fa, ewo lile le̩, kʼe̩ takoya bʼo ma; todu e̩bie̩ne̩-ma mute̩gwu wʼo̩gba-mi me̩.

Jona muda kwane̩ kʼi ra nyi Tarshish bʼeju Jihofa te̩. Oñ i gwo̩ru nyi Jo̩pa, i la fʼo̩ko̩ ki anyi Tarshish li; abe̩le̩ i fʼo̩me̩ ule̩-wñ ra, oñ i gwo̩ru nyʼef uwñ kʼi lebʼuma nyi Tarshish, kʼi kwo bʼeju Jihofa te̩.
Ama Jihofa fʼafu lile ro̩ bʼeju ohimini le̩ ma, oñ i mud afu ki aju bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩ ej omi le̩, i bo̩ pe̩e̩ kʼo̩ko̩ le̩ ma mukpo̩fo̩.

Tak abo ku ma gwʼo̩ko̩ kwochokpo, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma kwokwado̩ o̩jo̩ e-wñ; oñ ma mʼe̩wñ ki jʼef o̩ko̩ le̩ ko rikpolo nyʼef ohimini, todu kʼo̩ko̩ ki mutu nʼej omi ñw ma. Ama e̩gbale̩ Jona mugwo̩ru tʼo̩gane̩ o̩gane̩ o̩ko̩, oñ i dachi alʼolu-wñ kpanaa.
Tak onu o̩ko̩ lewʼugbo-wñ aka ñw u kakini, E-kʼe̩ che-i chʼe̩wñ? uwe̩, alolu-i. Kwane̩, kʼe̩ kwadʼO̩jo̩-we̩! Ikani O̩jo̩ adibete̩ wa, kʼa we elenyo̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ka ñw ekeji-wñ kakini, Lewa, kʼa rʼanya, kʼa ma tod e̩ne̩ oñ e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩-i bʼuwa ma-i. Abe̩le̩ ma fʼanya ro̩, oñ anya fi Jona mu.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, A agbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ ka ñw a tod e̩ne̩ oñ e̩bie̩ne̩-i wa bʼuwa ma-i? E̩wñ chʼobe-we̩ kʼe̩ che? Ugbo e̩ kwo wa? Ugbo chʼane̩-we̩? Ichi e̩wñ e̩ che?
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abo Hibru u che; omi la arailo Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-efojale kʼi chʼohimini kpai ane̩ e̩gbe̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ le̩ kworailo ololo, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, E-kʼe̩ che-i chʼe̩wñ? Todu aboke̩le̩ le̩ chema ka kʼi ara bʼeju Jihofa te̩, todabu kʼi ka ñwu ma.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Ab a achʼuwe̩, kʼohimini ki nye̩do̩ ñw a? Todu omi nacho̩ko̩ nyo̩gba alo waa.
Tak i ka ñw ma kakini, Mʼnmi du rikpolo tef ohimini, abe̩le̩ tak omi anye̩do̩ ñw me̩; todu u chema ka kʼutodu mi oñ afu lile-i wa bʼume̩ ma-i.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, aboke̩le̩ le̩ gwa ukpahiu ukpahiu ku ma dʼu wa mʼane̩, ma muda neke che n, todu ohimini nacho̩ko̩ nyo̩gba nana abʼuma ma.

Todule̩ ma kwokwado̩ Jihofa, oñ ma kakini, A gbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ O Jihofa, a gbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, e̩ ki je̩ ñw a lenyo̩ tod oji e̩ne̩-i n, e̩ ki la dʼe̩bie̩ e̩ne̩ ki ma fʼudu n abʼuwa oji ma n; todu uwe̩, O Jihofa, alu ki rʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ oñ e̩ che-i.
Taku ma mi Jona du, oñ ma mʼu du rikpolo tef ohimini; tak ohimini we echo̩ko̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ le̩ railo Jihofa ololo ololo, oñ ma dʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa ñwu Jihofa taku ma kwodoji.
Jihofa la fʼe̩ja lile ñwo̩che te̩ kʼi du Jona mi; oñ Jona dʼef ukulu e̩ja le̩ o̩ro̩ka me̩ta kpai odu me̩ta.
Jona la dʼef ukulu e̩ja le̩ arodubo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ.
Oñ i kakini,
Tod uwe̩ dʼumi rikpolo tef unefu,
Tak u kakini, Ma mʼumi du rikpolo bʼeju-we̩ te̩ me̩;
Omi le̩ lʼumi daka gbogbo wa kad onugo-mi;
U gwo̩ru nyʼe̩re̩ uwo uwo ejefu ejefu.
E̩gba kʼonugo-mi daku ef umi,
Abo ku ma nyʼe̩wñ o̩lemi eti
Omi muda anʼomu ugwa chʼiche̩bo̩ ñw e̩;
Taku Jihofa ka ñw e̩ja le̩, oñ i fu Jona re̩ tʼane̩ e̩gbe̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo Jona onukeji, kakini,
Kwane̩, kʼe̩ lo tu Nine̩fa, ewo lile le̩, kʼe̩ nʼo̩la kʼu naka ñw e̩ takoya ñwu ma.
Abe̩le̩ Jona kwane̩ oñ i le tu Nine̩fa, teju alu ki Jihofa ka. Nine̩fa le̩ la chʼewo ki tabale, ule̩-wñ chʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta.
Taku Jona chane̩ egudu nyʼef ewo le̩, ule̩ o̩jo̩ʼka. Oñ i dʼomu dago kakini, I bʼo̩jo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji taku ma agu ewo Nine̩fa-i lo̩!
Oñ abo Nine̩fa le̩ dʼo̩la O̩jo̩ le̩ rʼochochi; ma la fʼakoya alu eji ta, oñ ma mʼe̩gbanukpo ko nyʼo̩la, akwʼabo ki nana tule ef uma gbogbo wa tʼabo ki nya tule ef uma.
Inabali-wñ la tʼonu Nine̩fa eti, oñ i kwane̩ bʼoj e̩de̩-wñ te̩, i la mʼotogbo-wñ gwo̩ jʼane̩, oñ i mʼe̩gbanukpo ko bʼo̩la ma, tak i kwogugu ef elulu.

Tak i fʼakoya ta, oñ i ka ugbo du Nine̩fa, alu ki chenyo̩ eju onu kpʼame̩ne̩lile kakini, Tʼone̩ tʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩, tʼamokuno̩, tʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ki dʼe̩wñ kad alu n; ama ki jʼe̩wñ n, ama ki la ñmʼomi n,
e̩gbanukpo ki la bʼone̩ kpai e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ o̩la ma, kʼama ki raku do̩ O̩jo̩ una una; i-i, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki narida bʼo̩na e̩bie̩ne̩ e-wñ te̩, kʼi kwo bʼo̩lachi ki dʼefo̩wo̩-wñ te̩.
E̩ne̩ma, abe̩k O̩jo̩ aribeda kʼi la arida bʼuwe̩do̩-wñ ki kpuna-i te̩, kʼa we elenyo̩?
Tak O̩jo̩ fʼuko̩lo̩-ma li, ka kʼama murida bʼo̩na e̩bie̩ne̩-ma te̩, tak e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼi ka kʼi ache ma le̩ wo̩ O̩jo̩. I la che̩ ge̩ n.
Oñ i bie̩ne̩ eju Jona gbali, i la we̩do̩ tabale̩.

Tak i rodubo̩ Jihofa kakini, O̩ko̩ nagbabʼe̩, O Jihofa, i chʼabu kʼu ka e̩gba kʼu dʼane̩-mi le̩ de̩ n? Todule̩ oñ u takpa ra nyi Tarshish; todu u chema ka kʼuwe̩ chʼO̩jo̩ ki ali one̩ eju kpai ejumomi, e̩ hika we̩do̩ n, ufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ la chʼololo, e̩bie̩ne̩ echʼone̩ la awʼe̩.
Todule̩ fai, nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩ O Jihofa, kʼe̩ bʼumi gbʼiñmi-mi, tod eku nyo̩ ñw omi tʼedeju le.
Taku Jihofa kakini, Ewe̩do̩ kʼe̩ we̩do̩ i chenyo̩?
Taku Jona kwef ewo dufu oñ i kwoguane̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu ewo le̩, i la fʼala ne ñw o̩la-wñ o̩mo̩. Oñ i kwogugu olubo̩-wñ gbogbo tak i ali e̩wñ ki awa che ewo le̩.
Taku Jihofa O̩jo̩ fʼiga o̩cha ñwo̩che te̩, oñ i je̩ ñw u te̩to̩ abʼoji Jona ma, kʼi mud olubo̩ oji-wñ kʼi bʼowñ gba bʼe̩bie̩ne̩-wñ o̩mo̩ te̩. Abe̩le̩ e̩do̩ Jona bo̩ nana tabale tod iga o̩cha le̩.
Ama odudu o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, O̩jo̩ fʼide̩ ñwo̩che te̩, i la fʼo̩cha le̩ kpa, kʼi kwacha.

Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼolu kwane̩ O̩jo̩ la fʼafu o̩wo̩ olodudu ki agu e̩wñ jo ñwo̩che te̩, tak olu nada bi Jona oji ma oñ o̩la-wñ muda; tak i kwogbo̩ko̩ kʼowñ onugo ki ku, oñ i kakini, Eku nyo̩ ñwu mi tʼedeju le.
Tak O̩jo̩ ka ñwu Jona kakini, Ewe̩do̩ kʼe̩ we̩do̩ tod o̩cha-i chenyo̩? Tak i kakini, Ewe̩do̩ kʼu nawe̩do̩-i e̩nyo̩ nache, gbogbo tʼef uku.
Taki Jihofa kakini, E̩ la chʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ ñw o̩cha le̩, uwe̩ la chʼakanya-wñ n, i la chʼuwe̩ je̩ ñw u ya n, i la tiga odu o̩jo̩ʼka, i laño̩ lenyo̩ rʼeju odu o̩jo̩ʼka.
I la nyo̩ kʼomi kʼu chʼeju e̩ye̩ge̩ ñwu Nine̩fa, ewo inaina-i, kʼone̩ ku ma jʼef uwñ ku ma ma ma o̩wo̩-ma awo̩to̩ kpai e-awohi n, tʼicham oli me̩ta le kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ e̩kute̩?
O̩la Jihofa ki wʼugbo Maika, e̩ne̩ Mo̩rashe̩t, o̩kpanachi Jotan kpʼEhaz kpai He̩ze̩kaya, amonu Juda, owñ chʼo̩la Samaria kpai Je̩rusale̩m kʼi li.
Me̩ gbo̩ ame̩ amone̩, o̩chaka me̩;
Todu, go, Jihofa dufu kwʼe̩gu-wñ awa me̩,
Uwo uwo la amuyo̩ o̩gane̩ owñ,
Todu ada ki Jeko̩b je̩ oñ e̩wñ-i chaka de̩,
Todule̩ omi ache Samaria ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼugbudu ki dago oko,
Ma la agu ojibo-wñ ku ma gbe̩ le̩ du che ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩,
Todu e-le̩ oñ omi adinaku, u la akwa;
Todu agbe-wñ agbʼogu n;
Me̩ ki ka efu Gat in,
E̩ ki lale rinyo̩,
Todu onobule̩ kʼi dodo Maro̩t le̩,
Fʼo̩kogu ji manyʼe̩la ki afule,
Todule̩ uwe̩ ñʼache Mo̩reshe̩t-gat ele e̩gba kʼe̩ lo;
Omi adʼe̩ne̩ ki anʼo̩da-we̩ wa ugbo we̩ ta,
Fʼoji-we̩ la bo̩bo̩lo̩, kʼe̩ fʼiloji-we̩ ja,
Atogwo ñw abo ku ma ñwʼibe udu efe̩
Ma chejufufu oko oko, ma la bʼone̩ gba afuma;
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa aka de̩, kakini,
Iko le̩ ma akpʼita rʼume̩ oji,
Todule̩ uwe̩ ñʼanʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi arʼanya kʼiku e̩ñwa ki je̩ ñw e̩ ef ujeju Jihofa n.
Me̩ ki kache̩ n; ma kache̩ waa.
O uwe̩ kʼe̩ kʼodu Unyi Jeko̩b, i nyo̩
O̩feje-i abo-mi kwane̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩nebi;
Me̩ kʼabobule̩ abo-mi rikpolo
Me̩ kwane̩, ku me̩ lo̩,
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ ki alule̩ ef afu olemi fʼo̩lemi ro̩ kakini,
O Jeko̩b, omi akʼabo-we̩ chaka jeju chuu,
Akpʼe̩wñ fo̩ le̩ mute̩gu wa o̩gba ma me̩;
Oñ u kakini,
Ame̩ kʼe̩nyo̩ chʼe̩wñ ulaka-me̩, ku me̩ la fe̩do̩ e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩;
ku me̩ laño̩ je̩ o̩re̩la abo-mi,
E̩gbale̩ ma akwa do̩ Jihofa,
Abu ki Jihofa aka ugbo amakache̩
Todule̩ i achʼodu ñwu me̩, kʼame̩ ki ñʼanʼane̩ ego ge̩ n,
E̩gbale̩ ukata abo ku ma gʼane̩ la achi,
I muda chʼe-mi, ukpahiu che̩ko̩ efu mi,
Me̩ gbʼe-i, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼume̩, ame̩ ku me̩ dʼoji dufu ef unyi Jeko̩b
Ma nʼe̩bie̩ akʼunyi Zayo̩n
Abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef uma kajo̩ tod e̩wñ eje̩,
Todule̩ tod e-me̩ le̩
I awatu e̩gba o̩jo̩ otitala
Tak abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi wewe anyʼaka kakini:
Owñ la akajo̩ agbagba amone̩ ojoji ojoji wewe,
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ muda agugu of ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ kpʼof oli o̩gbaikolo-wñ,
Todu amone̩ ojoji ojoji du
Iko le̩, Jihofa aka-i,
tak omi ache kʼe-ki te̩tachika ki mud e̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩;
Oñ uwe̩, O o̩do̩go̩ ujo̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ le̩,
Fai e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ akwa taa ta?
I ki wʼe̩, kʼe̩ chʼakanya o̩ma ebi, uwe̩ o̩monobule̩ Zayo̩n, dabe̩ne̩ kʼonobule̩ kʼi achefu;
Fai abo uche̩ichi ojoji wewe
Ma muda ma
Kwane̩ kʼe̩ gwu,
Fai, uwe̩ ki kʼo̩la-we̩ wa jo̩ udala udala,
Ama uwe̩, Be̩tle̩he̩m E̩frata,
Todule̩ oñ i atʼuma no̩ gbogbo wʼe̩gba
Tak owñ adago akʼije̩ ñw ujo̩-wñ je̩ ef ukpahiu Jihofa,
E-le̩ la achʼure̩do̩,
oñ ama anʼo̩kwo̩chageli fʼane̩ Asiria gwʼalache̩ rinyo̩,
Tak e̩bo̩bo̩ abo Jeko̩b ajʼef
Tak e̩bo̩bo̩ abo Jekob ajʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
Uwe̩ adʼo̩wo̩-we̩ kwane̩ tʼame̩no̩la-we̩ o̩la,
Oñ i awatu iko le̩, Jihofa aka-i,
Oñ nakʼewo ewo ane̩-we̩ du da rinyo̩;
U lañʼakʼe̩wñ amobochi da rinyo̩ bʼo̩wo̩-we̩ te̩,
u la akʼojibo-we̩ ku me̩ gbe̩,
Tak omi achi Ashe̩rim-we̩ bʼalumeji-we̩ te̩;
E̩gbale̩ omi anache̩ ef uwe̩do̩ kpʼuke̩do̩fulu
Fai me̩ gbo̩ e̩wñ ki Jihofa aka:
O ame̩ uwo uwo, me̩ gbo̩ ukana Jihofa,
O abo-mi, e̩wñ omi che me̩?
Todu omi ko me̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa,
O abo-mi, fai me̩ rewa ibe ku Bele̩k, onu Moab ñwa,
E̩wñ nane̩ nyʼo̩gba Jihofa?
Amokolo icham nyo̩gwo̩ko̩ wewe anyo̩ Jihofa eju?
I ña we̩ e̩wñ ki nyo̩, O one̩;
Omuko̩la Jihofa nakwa ñw ewo-i—
E̩wñ akoko bibi ño̩ bo̩ jʼef unyi e̩ne̩bibi ge̩?
Omi neke nʼe̩bo̩ olemi
Todu amanana-wñ che̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ akpulu eche;
Todule̩ oñ omi ño̩ fʼagbe ki bie̩ne̩ che we̩,
Uwe̩ aje̩ e̩wñ, i muda akʼuwe̩ efu n,
Uwe̩ akʼe̩wñ gbe̩, e̩ muda akʼo wʼunyi n;
Todu ma fʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩ O̩mri de me̩,
Atogwo ñw omi! Todu u dabe̩ne̩
E̩ne̩ ki akpe̩do̩rʼo̩jo̩ lenyo̩ bʼane̩ ile̩ te̩ me̩,
Ma nʼo̩wo̩ meji ache e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩, o̩wo̩-ma le̩ aya;
E̩ne̩ ki nyo̩ tʼuma le ef uma dab ikeke,
E̩ ki dʼo̩la ekeji-we̩ rʼochochi n,
todu o̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ achʼata-wñ e̩de̩te̩,
I muda chʼe-mi, nakejuru Jihofa,
E̩ ki gwoye rʼumi oji n, O e̩nebi-mi;
Omi ane̩ e̩do̩ e̩kpa e-Jihofa
Tak e̩nebi-mi aliʼi,
O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ nʼo̩do̩-we̩ awa!
Iko le̩ ma akwo Asiria gbogbo wʼewo ewo Ijipti
Ane̩ le̩ muda achʼalache̩ te̩
Nʼo̩kpa-we̩ dejutʼabo-we̩,
Alu ki de̩ iko kʼe̩ kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu wa,
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ali oñ anyo̩ ugbiti e-ma chaka amu ma;
ma afʼebutu na dab ejo,
E̩ne̩ chʼO̩jo̩ ki dab uwe̩, kʼi atʼudu kʼone̩ fe̩ no̩?
I arida, i la adabi lʼuwa ejumoni,
Uwe̩ adʼochochi ña Jeko̩b
O̩la Nine̩fa de̩. O̩takada e̩wñ ku Nehum, e̩ne̩ E̩lko̩sh, li ef ane̩ ego de̩.
Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩ ajogu i la anache̩,
Jihofa ahika we̩do̩ n, ukpahiu-wñ la tabale,
I anukarʼohimini oñ i aje̩ ñw u gbe̩,
Uwo uwo naga o̩gba-wñ,
E̩ne̩ neke dago o̩gba e̩do̩ e̩kpa-wñ?
Jihofa chenyo̩,
I muda anʼomi ki wobi
E̩wñ me̩ ñwa nyu Jihofa?
Todu ma chʼe̩ji dab ikeke,
E̩ne̩ʼka kwʼef uwe̩ dufu
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini,
Fai tak u nagu oli uno̩lo̩-wñ che̩ bʼe̩ o̩lo̩ te̩
Jihofa la ñwa ñw ma tod uwe̩ me̩:
Go, e̩re̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼuche̩nyo̩ wa le̩
E̩ne̩ kʼi akpʼe̩wñ fo̩ rʼane̩ lewa kʼi akobʼe̩.
Todu Jihofa adʼe̩gahi Jeko̩b dabi wa
Ugbeyo̩ amagbiti-wñ akpa me̩,
O̩kogu okogu jʼej o̩na alo̩fu,
I arewa ame̩nojima-wñ,
Ma mʼo̩na ohimini ohimini bi me̩,
ma fʼibe-wñ kpe̩ me̩, ma fʼodu-wñ onobule̩ le̩ tago ofo, ma adʼu kwʼo̩mo̩ alo,
Nine̩fa la te̩te̩ do̩mo̩ kwʼigbelegbele
Me̩ mʼajifa-wñ ko,
Efu-wñ te̩ ofo! E̩wñ du de̩ ge̩ n! i tʼo̩mo̩ ofofo!
Ugbo owo amidu le̩ de̩?
Idu le̩ fʼe̩wñ fana ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩ ki bʼamo̩ma-wñ jo̩

Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼuwe̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i, u la agu okogu-we̩ jo ef odudu, oñ o̩kwo̩chageli afʼamo̩ma idu-we̩ lie̩ rinyo̩; u la akʼe̩wñ kʼuwe̩ akpa kʼe̩ je̩ da bʼane̩ ile̩ te̩, e̩ne̩ du ñʼagbo̩ omuko̩la amonuche̩-we̩ ge̩ n.
Atogwo ñw ewo e̩bie̩ le̩,
Itali fʼo̩la ka, e̩re̩ o̩kogu o̩kogu nachʼekuku,
Amanya ki afule,
Todu o̩wo̩ e̩wñ abutabu e-ajo̩ko̩,
Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼuwe̩,
Nakʼiwa ihie̩ne̩ ro̩ bʼe̩ ma
Tak abo du ku ma kejurʼe̩ ara bʼe̩ te̩, oñ ma akakini,
Uwe̩ nyo̩ tu Noamo̩n
Itio̩pia kpʼIjipti chʼukpahiu-wñ,
Ma muda mʼu ño̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ kpo̩,
O̩te̩ ñʼamʼe̩ ge̩
Aku aku-we̩ du dab oli o̩gbaikolo
Go, amone̩-we̩ ku ma jʼalumeji-we̩ le̩
Fʼomiofo kpa ñw o̩la-we̩ gbe̩gba ku ma kpala nyʼuwe̩,
O̩mo̩ una afʼe̩ lie̩,
Uwe̩ je̩ ñw amanyaja-we̩ ku ma wewe
Amagboji-we̩ dab amimiejo,
Amadide-we̩ jʼalolu oji,
Ugbo ki awʼe̩ nʼenye̩do̩ ge̩ n,
O̩la ku Habakuk, akache̩, li de̩.
O Jihofa, gbogbo wʼe̩gba oñ nakwadʼe̩,
E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ adʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩ ña mi
Todule̩ o̩lo̩da bulo̩,
Me̩ go ef abo uche̩ichi abo uche̩ichi ku me̩ li;
Todu go, omi akʼabo Kaldia kwane̩ me̩,
Ma bailo, e̩gahi-ma gbe̩;
Amanya-ma ale̩ tʼamikpali le,
O̩chaka-ma awa ku ma chʼe̩wñ akpulu;
Ochochi, ma chʼamonu e̩de̩te̩,
Taku ma lale fuu dab afu alo-ma waa,
I chʼuwe̩ do̩mo̩ kwʼigbelegbele n,
Uwe̩ kʼeju-we̩ chefe̩ tʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ego le
Todu e̩ che kʼamone̩ ki dab ame̩ja ohimini abadi,
Ma anʼuwo̩ mu ma chaka,
Todule̩ ma akpʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ ñw e̩hia-ma
Todule̩ ma ñʼawe ekʼe̩wñ ki jʼef e̩hia-ma dajane̩ alo waa,
Omi adago oj ide-mi,
Taku Jihofa dohi ñw mi kakini:
Todu ane̩ kʼe̩ go le̩ chʼutod iko-wñ ki che̩date̩ ta;
Go, onugo-wñ chʼe̩wu te̩, i chʼo̩kpakpa ef uwñ n,
Anoji e-le̩ ge̩, omi achiwebe̩te̩ma adʼo̩wo̩ tʼef ukpo aro̩kpo̩; e̩ne̩ ki ake ado̩mo̩ gbane̩ n.
Abo-i du akpʼita rʼo̩ oji n? ku ma achʼo uke̩ kakini,
Ame̩no̩me̩-we̩ akwane̩ tʼuwe̩ o̩la achigili n?
Todabu kʼuwe̩ kʼane̩ abo uche̩ichi wewe,
Atogwo ki chʼe-e̩ne̩ kʼi ajʼile e̩bie̩ne̩ ñw abunyi-wñ,
Uwe̩ fʼe̩wñ anyo̩ ñwa nyʼunyi-we̩
Todu okuta kʼi dʼo̩la o̩do̩ akwa,
Atogwo chʼe-e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼe̩bie̩ akʼunyi,
Go, i che Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du
Todu ile̩-i ako̩ ñw ojima Jihofa ema,
Atogwo chʼe-e̩ne̩ kʼi adʼe̩wñ ñw ekeji-wñ ñmo̩
Anyo̩ akʼuwe̩ efu koji ojima.
Todu e̩wñ afuma ku ma che Le̩bano̩n abʼe̩ ma;
Ugbo chʼile ojibo ku ma gbe̩
Atogwo ki chʼe-e̩ne̩ ki aka ñw oli kakini, Mʼolu ji;
Jihofa muda dʼef unyi-wñ kiafo̩;
Adua Habakuk, akache̩, ku ma nu oji Shigiono̩t de̩.
O Jihofa, omi fʼinabali-we̩ gbo̩ me̩, oñ narailo.
O̩jo̩ kwo Teman wa,
Ufane̩-wñ la dab ugane̩,
E̩wñ ibi tʼowñ o̩gba alo,
I kwodago oñ i fʼile̩-i ñwa;
Omi Ji unyabo Kushan ki jʼef o̩bata;
Ohimini ohimini bi we̩ eju, O Jihofa?
E̩ mʼo̩o̩do̩-we̩ du te̩ gbaa,
Uwo uwo fʼe̩ li, oñ i kwoli gbili-gbili;
Olu kpʼochu kwodago ka ef odo-ma
Uwe̩ lale gu ef ane̩ le̩ du ef e̩do̩ e̩kpa-we̩,
Uwe̩ dufu tod ujadu abo-we̩,
Uwe̩ nʼo̩kpa-wñ onugo gwunyʼoji abogu-wñ,
Uwe̩ nʼamanya-we̩ le ej ohimini abadi,
U gbo̩, tak o̩la-mi kwoga,
Todu dagba kʼoli o̩gbaikolo̩ ma dikoko n,
omi muda agwoye efu Jihofa kpo̩,
Jihofa, Ondu, chʼukpahiu-mi;
O̩la Jihofa ki wʼugbo Ze̩fanaya, o̩ma Kushai, o̩ma Ge̩dalaya, o̩ma Amaraya, o̩ma He̩zakaya, iko Josaya, o̩ma Amo̩n, onu Juda.
Omi agbʼe̩wñ du rinyo̩
Nagbʼone̩ kpʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ rinyo̩;
Nanʼo̩wo̩-mi dala ab iJuda
kpʼabo ku ma dojikane̩ ñw uwewe e̩wñ ojale ojokunyi;
kpʼabo ku ma muna ubi bʼiJihofa ubi te̩,
Chechi eju Ondu Jihofa ki dane̩!
I la awa tu o̩jo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa le̩—
O̩jo̩ le̩ omi la awa bʼudu
Oñ o̩jo̩ le̩, Jihofa aka-i,
Me̩ kwa, ame̩ ku me̩ dodo Agu!
Iko le̩ omi anʼagege atejane̩ efu Je̩rusale̩m,
E̩wñ anana-ma la amud e̩wñ kʼogu je̩,
O̩jo̩ inaina e-Jihofa le̩ me̩rʼewa,
O̩jo̩ le̩ chʼo̩jo̩ uwe̩do̩,
o̩jo̩ ojike efa
Nadʼo̩pe̩cha wa abʼamone̩ ma,
Ajifa-ma kpʼo̩jamalia
Me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ wa jeju, kʼo̩la-me̩ jeju ugboʼkate,
o̩gba tak e̩wñ ku ma ñwate̩ le̩ fʼo̩ma bi,
Me̩ ki tejane̩ Jihofa, ame̩ abo ile̩ ku me̩ de̩ chikimi chaka,
Todu ma ahiu Gaza tinyo̩,
Atogwo chʼe-abo o̩la ohimini abadi,
O̩la ohimini abadi le̩ ache oko ije̩,
Oñ o̩lʼomi o̩mo̩ achʼutodu
Omi gbo̩ icha ku Moab ka
Todule̩, oji-mi, Jiliofa ki nʼe̩wñ du,
E̩wñ ku ma la ane̩ tod uba-ma le̩ de̩,
Jihofa achʼe̩wñ ubailo ñw ma;
Kpʼame̩, abo Itiopia ge̩,
Tak i anʼo̩wo̩-wñ dala akobo̩ abʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩,
Ujo̩ ujo̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ adachi jʼalumeji-wñ,
Ewo uyo̩ ki gugu no̩ko̩o̩ le̩ de̩
Atogwo ñw e̩ne̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ rikoko kʼi chʼe̩daji,
I gbʼomu le̩ gbo̩ n,
Amagboji-wñ ku ma jʼalumeji-wñ
Amakache̩-wñ chʼame̩ne̩fule̩fu,
Jihofa kʼi dʼalumeji-wñ chʼo̩kpakpa,
Omi fʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ko̩da rinyo̩ me̩;
Omi kakini, Uwe̩ arailo mi chuu,
Todule̩ ame̩ ki nede mi, Jihofa aka-i,
Todu e̩gba le̩ omi arʼichi ki de̩ hiolo da
Abo ku ma bi mi ebi
Iko e-le̩ anyo̩ e̩wñ kʼe̩ che le amʼe̩ n,
Omi muda atʼame̩no̩bata ku ma chʼame̩nubie̩ no̩
abo Israe̩l ku ma bo̩ re le̩
Mʼeli da, O o̩ma onobule̩ Zayo̩n;
Jihofa mʼoji ajo̩ kʼi kpa ugbo we̩ ko bʼe̩ te̩ me̩,
O̩jo̩ le̩ ma aka ñw Je̩rusale̩m kakini:
Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, dʼalumeji-we̩,
Nakʼabo ku ma che̩do̩dudu wa tod uje̩wñ uyo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ da le̩,
Go, iko le̩ nache
Iko le̩ omi ako me̩ wa,

O̩do̩ ekeji ku Darius jʼonu, ochu e̩ke̩fa-wñ, o̩jo̩ ejodudu ochu le̩, o̩la Jihofa lʼugbo Hagai akache̩ wʼugbo Zerubabe̩l o̩ma Shealtie̩l ki chʼigo̩bina Juda, kpai ugbo Jo̩shua o̩ma Jehozadak, ki chʼagboji amatama, kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩, kakini, Amone̩-i jʼaka kakini, Iko-wñ wa ta n, owñ chʼiko ku ma ako̩ unyi Jihofa.
Tak o̩la Jihofa lʼugbo Hagai akache̩ le̩ wa kakini,
Abu kʼunyi-i chʼalache̩ te̩-i, iko kʼame̩ onugo agugu unyi-me̩ ku me̩ kwo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ le̩ de̩?
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Me̩ ki dʼe̩do̩ tʼo̩na o̩na ku me̩ le le̩ ku me̩ fʼibe-wñ kpe̩.

Ame̩ fʼe̩wñ gbe̩ tuu, me̩ kʼe̩wñ ree wʼunyi; me̩ je̩ e̩wñ, i muda bʼume̩ jo̩ n; me̩ ñmʼomi, efu-me̩ la ko̩ n; me̩ kʼukpo bʼo̩la ma, i muda anʼe̩ne̩ du kʼafu ma kpʼo̩ n in; oñ e̩ne̩ ki achʼuko̩lo̩ ku ma rʼo̩me̩ ñw u agbʼo̩me̩-wñ tef akpulu kʼofe-wñ chʼe̩gudu.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Me̩ ki dʼe̩do̩-me̩ tʼo̩na o̩na ku me̩ le le̩ ku me̩ fʼibe-wñ kpe̩.
Me̩ nyʼibe uwo le̩ akʼoli wa ku me̩ fʼunyi-i ko̩; tak i abʼumi e̩do̩, oñ u nanʼojima, Jihofa ka-i.

Ame̩ neju e̩wñ nana, me̩ la go, i mud e̩wñ ree; tak e̩gba ku me̩ mʼu ko wʼunyi, u fʼu fʼafu rinyo̩. E̩wñ chi? Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka-i. Tod unyi-mi kʼi chʼalache̩ te̩, oñ ame̩ aboke̩le̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ jʼara nyʼunyi e-wñ.
Todule̩ noji e-me̩ le̩ oñ efojale fʼeli dahi ki we̩ echi, oñ ane̩ adʼe̩ro-wñ hi.

Omi la do̩ udolu kʼi lewa bʼane̩ ma, kpai abʼuwo uwo ma kpai abʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩ ma kpai abʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ ma kpai abʼekpo ma kpai abʼe̩wñ kʼane̩ adu dufu ma, kpai abʼone̩ ma kpai bʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ma kpai abʼe̩wñ du kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ achakanya uko̩lo̩-wñ ma, kʼe̩wñ du ki gbe̩ te̩.

Taku Zerubabe̩l o̩ma Shealtie̩l, kpai Jo̩shua o̩ma Jehozadak, agboji amatama, manyʼabubo̩ amone̩ le̩ chaka gbʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma gbo̩, kpai o̩la Hagai akache̩, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma fʼu kpuche̩ wa le̩; oñ amone̩ le̩ kwo railo eju Jihofa.
Taku Hagai onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ fʼuche̩ Jihofa je̩rʼamone̩ le̩ kakini, Omi dʼugbo me̩, Jihofa ka-i.

Oñ Jihofa dʼe̩do̩ Zerubabe̩l o̩ma Shealtie̩l, igo̩bina Juda le̩, kwane̩, kpai e̩do̩ Jo̩shua o̩ma Jehozadak, agboji amatama, kpai e̩do̩ abubo̩ amone̩ le̩ chaka; taku ma lewa chʼuko̩lo̩ unyi Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, O̩jo̩-ma le̩,
o̩jo̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ ochu e̩ke̩fa o̩do̩ ekeji ku Darius jʼonu.
Ochu e̩kebie-wñ, o̩jo̩ ogu nyokeʼka ochu le̩, o̩la Jihofa lʼugbo Hagai akache̩ le̩ wa kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñwu Zerubabe̩l o̩ma Shealtie̩l, igo̩bina Juda, kpai Jo̩shua o̩ma Jehozadak, agboji amatama, kpai abubo̩ amone̩ le̩ kakini,
E̩ne̩ bo̩ ef ume̩ kʼi li unyi-i iko ojima-wñ o̩gbo̩gba le̩? Ab i de̩ eju-me̩ fa-i? I dabe̩ne̩ kʼibe̩te̩ ofofo eju-me̩ n?

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, fʼeju gbiti, uwe̩ Zerubabe̩l, Jihofa ka-i; fʼeju gbiti, uwe̩ Jo̩shua o̩ma Jehozadak, agboji amatama; me̩ fʼeju gbiti, ame̩ amone̩ ane̩-i du, Jihofa ka-i, ku me̩ chuko̩lo̩: todu omi dʼugbo me̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i,
owñ chʼo̩la kʼu kpalo kpʼame̩ e̩gba kʼame̩ kwʼIjipti wa le̩, abe̩le̩ Afu-mi dʼef ume̩; me̩ ki railo n.
Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini, Iko-wñ bo̩ ree, kʼu naño̩ fʼefojale kpai ane̩-ile̩ kpai ohimini kpai ane̩ e̩gbe̩ miejo onuʼka ta;
oñ nami abo uche̩ichi du ejo tak e̩wñ ube̩do̩ e-abo uche̩ichi du awa; tak omi akʼojima jʼef unyi-i e̩ko̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Ajifa chʼe-mi, o̩jamalia chʼe-mi, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Ojima unyi-i e-otitala anana tʼe-o̩gbo̩gba le, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i; uña kide̩ oñ nadʼure̩do̩ te̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
O̩jo̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ ochu e̩ke̩la, o̩do̩ ekeji ki Darius jʼonu, o̩la Jihofa lʼugbo Hagai akache̩ le̩ wa, kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini, Tʼamatama ene ugbo e̩wñ o̩lo̩da ta, kakini,

Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ nʼe̩la kiafo̩ nyʼe̩re̩ otogbo-wñ kʼe̩re̩ otogbo-wñ kwokadʼakala, abe̩k o̩je̩, abe̩k omi achiwebe̩te̩ma, abe̩k ekpo, abe̩k uje̩wñ du, e̩wñ kʼotogbo-wñ kado le̩ afo̩? Tak amatama dohi kakini, O̩da.
Taku Hagai kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩kʼo̩la-wñ daji lugbo oku e̩wñ kwokado e-du ef e̩wñ-i, e̩wñ le̩ adaji? Tak amatama dohi kakini, I adaji.
Taku Hagai dohi kakini, Abe̩le̩ amone̩-i de̩, oñ abe̩le̩ abo ichi-i de̩ eju-mi-i, Jihofa ka-i; abe̩le̩ uko̩lo̩ du kʼo̩wo̩-ma che la de̩ ge̩; oñ e̩wñ du ku ma ko wa o̩mo̩ chʼe̩daji.
O̩ko̩ nagba bʼume̩-i kakini, Me̩ fulo akwʼejubi wʼeñini-i, o̩gba taku ma kʼokuta nʼe̩do̩ okuta ef unyi Jihofa-i.
Agbagba le̩ du e̩gba kʼone̩ lewa ugbo ku ma kʼoj adu ogu jo̩, i mud e̩gwa; e̩gba kʼone̩ lewa añmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma kʼi che otube̩ ooje, i mud ogu kate.
U ne̩ ikpetubi kpai ekpebu kpai okuto̩mo̩jo̩cha kpa me̩ ugbo uko̩lo̩ du kʼo̩wo̩-me̩ che, me̩ muda dabi wa ba mi n, Jihofa ka-i.
Me̩ fʼibe akwʼejubi wʼeñini kide̩ owñ chʼakwo o̩jo̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ ochu e̩ke̩la le̩ lo, owñ chʼakwʼo̩jo̩ ku ma dʼe̩re̩ unyi Jihofa nyane̩, me̩ fʼibe e-le̩ lo.
Ulu e̩wñ jʼef aka ta? Ochochi, ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai oli o̩gbaikolo kpai po̩me̩grane̩t kpai oli o̩lif la ro ta n; akwʼeñini ki de̩ nadʼe̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa ño̩ wʼugbo Hagai onu keji o̩jo̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ ochu le̩, kakini,
E̩ ka ñwu Zerubabe̩l, igo̩bina Juda kakini, Nami efojale kpai ile̩ ejo;

u la agu ede ojane̩ ojane̩ amonu lo̩; u ñʼakpʼukpahiu ojane̩ ojane̩ abo uche̩ichi bie̩; u la akʼo̩ko̩ ogu kpai abo ku ma jʼef uwñ dafo; tak amanya kpʼabo ku ma tanʼo awane̩, o̩kwo̩chageli o̩maye-wñ adʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ wane̩.

Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kakini, O̩jo̩ kʼu naka-i, omi amʼuwe̩ Zerubabe̩l adu-mi, kʼe̩ chʼo̩ma Shealtie̩l le̩ du kʼu dʼe̩ che dabe̩ne̩ kʼelika uhiuko̩, Jihofa ka-i: todu uwe̩ omi chi, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Ochu e̩ke̩jo, o̩do̩ ekeji ki Darius jʼonu, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Ze̩karaya akache̩, o̩ma Be̩rikaya o̩ma Ido, kakini,
Jihofa we̩do̩ rʼamata-me̩ nana.
Todule̩ e̩ ki ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩, Mudabi aba mi, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i, tak omi adabi abʼame̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.

Ame̩ ki we edab amata-me̩, e-kʼamakache̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩ kwa rʼuma oji kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini, Me̩ mudabiwa bʼo̩na e̩bie̩ne̩-me̩ kpai e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ku me̩ jʼache le̩ te̩ fai. Ma muda gbo̩ n, ma la nyʼumi eti n, Jihofa ka-i.
Amata-me̩ le̩ fa, ugbo ma jo̩? Oñ amakache̩ fa, udeju-ma chʼogbegbele̩?

Uko̩la-mi kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, e-kʼomi ñwa ñw amadu-mi amakache̩ le̩ fa, i mʼamata-me̩ n? Taku ma murida kakini, Alu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ñwa ef e̩do̩-wñ kʼi che wa, teju alu kʼo̩na o̩na kʼa le de̩ kpai alu kʼe̩wñ kʼa ache de̩, abe̩le̩ i che wa.
O̩jo̩ ogu nyoke me̩le̩ ochu e̩ke̩gwaka, owñ chʼochu Shibat, o̩do̩ ekeji ki Darius jʼonu, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Ze̩karaya akache̩, o̩ma Be̩rikaya, o̩ma Ido le̩ kakini,
U fuli odu, e̩ la go, e̩ne̩ʼka tanʼanya ekpikpa! I dago ef ujo̩ oli me̩rte̩l ef o̩go̩ le̩; amanya ekpikpa kpai acha kpai efufu la jʼubi-wñ.
Tak u kakini, Abʼe-i chʼe̩wñ, odu-mi? Tak onuche̩ ki ko̩la ñwu mi ka ñwu mi kakini, Nañʼuwe̩ e̩wñ kʼabʼe-i che.
Tak e̩ne̩ ki dago ef ujo̩ oli me̩rte̩l le̩ kakini, Abo-i chʼabo ki Jihofa kpuche̩ wa ku ma lelo lewa ef ile̩-i.
Taku ma mʼohi du ñw onuche̩ Jihofa ki dago ef ujo̩ oli me̩rte̩l le̩ kakini, Awa fʼule̩ le lelo lewa ef ile̩-i, e̩ la go, o̩gbo̩ abo ile̩ du gugu yo̩o̩, ma jʼañmi.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ dohi kakini, Uwe̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ uwe̩ ma ali Je̩rusale̩m kpai ewo ewo Juda ejumomi n ta, e-kʼe̩do̩-we̩ kparʼu o̩do̩ e̩te̩gwa-i?
Taku Jihofa nʼo̩la e̩nyo̩ kpai ube̩do̩ dohi ñw onuche̩ ki ako̩la kpʼomi le̩.
Tak onuche̩ ki ako̩la ñwu mi le̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ nakwa, kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini, Alu kʼonobule̩ ajʼogu ekeji-wñ oñ naja inaina todu Je̩rusale̩m kpai Zayo̩n.
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma jʼañmi le̩ abi mi eju nana tabale; todu ma bi mi eju ree tak ama bʼe̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ che.
Todule̩, abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Omi nʼejumomi, dabiwa Je̩rusale̩m me̩; ma akʼunyi-mi o̩mo̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i, ma la afʼiku ku ma du ñw e̩wñ bʼoji Je̩rusale̩m ma.
E̩ ñʼakwa ta kakini, Abuki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini, Ewo ewo-mi uko̩ adafo ñw ura ta, Jihofa laño̩ anyi Zayo̩n e̩do̩, i la adu Je̩rusale̩m chʼe-wñ chuu.
Tak u chi eju-mi nyʼate̩ oñ u li, e̩ la go, igba me̩le̩ jo̩!
Tak u ka ñw onuche̩ ki ako̩la ñwu mi kakini, E̩wñ jo̩-i? Tak i dohi ñwu mi kakini, Igba ki fu Juda kpai Israe̩l kpai Je̩rusale̩m fiatuka jo̩-i.
Taku Jihofa kʼamagwalo̩ me̩le̩ ña mi.

Oñ u kakini, E̩wñ abo-i wa ache ta? Oñ i kakini, Igba ki fu Juda fiatuka kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ño̩ dʼoji-wñ dago ge̩ n jo̩-i; abo-i muda wa ku ma nyʼuma okpo, ku ma kʼigba abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma kʼigba-ma kwane̩ abo Juda ku ma fu fiatuka ro̩ jʼane̩.
Tak u chi eju-mi nyʼate̩, e̩ la go, u li e̩ne̩ ki nʼiku uñwe̩wñ ef o̩wo̩-wñ!
Tak u kakini, Ugbo e̩ nyi? Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, Nanyʼañwa Je̩rusale̩m, kʼu ma unabe̩-wñ kpai ujiji-wñ.
E̩ la go, onuche̩ ki ako̩la ñwu mi le̩ ledufu, tak onuche̩ omune̩ dufu aledʼo,
oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Fule, kʼe̩ ka ñw okolobia-i kakini, One̩ adodo Je̩rusale̩m dabe̩ne̩ kʼegbili noji uwewe amone̩ kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ki ajʼef uwñ.
Todu omi Jihofa ka-i, omi onugo chʼaku una alʼo daka, omi laño̩ achʼojima alumeji-wñ.
Elelelele! Me̩ ra bʼane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩ te̩! Jihofa ka-i; todu omi fʼume̩ fiatuka rʼo̩do̩da dabe̩ne̩ kʼafu ojale me̩le̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Elelelele! Zayo̩n ra ke, uwe̩ kʼe̩ bʼo̩ma onobule̩ Babilo̩n dodo le̩.
Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini, Anubi ojima le̩ i fʼumi kpuche̩ rʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki ko me̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩ le̩; todu e̩ne̩ ki do̩wo̩kadʼuwe̩, do̩wo̩kadʼe̩yo̩ eju-wñ.
Todu go, nami o̩wo̩-mi ejo bʼuma oji ma, tak ama amud e̩wñ kʼogu je̩ ñw abo ku ma te̩tare̩ ma. Tak ame̩ ama ka ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kpe̩ mi wa-i,
Kʼeli taa, kʼe̩ gwoguyo̩, uwe̩ o̩ma onobule̩ e-Zayo̩n; todu go, omi awa, oñ nadodo alumeji-we̩, Jihofa ka-i.
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi wewe la akʼo̩la-ma dama ñwu Jihofa iko le̩, tak ama achʼamone̩ e-mi. Omi la adodo alumeji-we̩, tak uwe̩ ama ka ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kpe̩ mi wʼugbo we̩.
Taku Jihofa adu Juda chʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ ki chʼukpe̩-wñ oj ane̩ kiafo̩ le̩, i la adu Je̩rusale̩m chʼe-wñ chuu.
O̩re̩la du ki nachechi jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa; todu i mʼolu ji kwo bʼef unyi ugugu-wñ kiafo̩ te̩ me̩.
Tak i du Jo̩shua agboji amatama le̩ ña mi abu kʼi dago o̩gba onuche̩ Jihofa, kʼE̩no̩la le̩ dago o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ kʼi gwʼajo̩ nʼo.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw E̩no̩la le̩ kakini, Jihofa ki nukarʼuwe̩, O E̩no̩la; i-i Jihofa ki du Je̩rusale̩m le̩ ki nukarʼe̩. I chʼiji e̩munaʼka ku ma dinya kwef una le̩ de̩ n?
E̩wñ ki bʼo̩la Joshua ma la chʼiwa iwa, oñ i dago o̩gba onuche̩ le̩.

Tak i tohi, oñ i ko̩la ñw abo ku ma dago jʼo̩gba-wñ le̩ kakini, Me̩ mʼe̩wñ o̩la ki chʼiwa le̩ ko bʼo̩ o̩la te̩. Tak i ka ñw owñ onugo kakini, Go, omi je̩ ñw udu kʼe̩ fe̩ ki lale bʼuwe̩ o̩la te̩ me̩, oñ nakʼotogbo ku ma chiyanyʼu nyʼuwe̩ o̩la.
Tak u kakini, Je̩ ñwu ma dʼalawoni ki fe̩ jiʼi oji. Abe̩le̩ ma dʼalawoni ki fe̩ jiʼi oji, oñ ma mʼe̩wñ o̩la ko nyʼo̩ o̩la; onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ la dago kpenyʼuma.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ juka ñwu Jo̩shua kakini,

Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ alule̩ tʼo̩na e-mi, kʼuwe̩ la ade e̩ñwa-mi, mak uwe̩ ñʼakajo̩ abo unyi-mi, uwe̩ lañʼade anuku-mi ge̩, oñ omi abʼuña ñw e̩ kʼe̩ tale ef abo ku ma dago jo̩-i.
Gbo̩ ta, uwe̩ Joshua agboji amatama-i, uwe̩ kpai ame̩numana-we̩ ku ma gugu o̩gba-we̩ le̩; todu ujiwe e̩wñ oñ abo-i che; todu go, omi adʼadu-mi E̩pa le̩ dufuwa.
Todu, go, okuta kʼu du tʼo̩gba Joshua le̩, eju mebie jʼo̩la okutaʼka. Go ebe̩ ku ma abe̩ omi abe̩-i, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i, omi la akʼudu kʼane̩-i fe̩ kwo bʼo̩ te̩ o̩jo̩ okate.
Iko le̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ado̩ ekeji-wñ wʼolubo ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma kpai oli o̩gbaikolo.
Tak onuche̩ ki ko̩la ñwu mi le̩ ño̩ mudabiwa, oñ i jʼumi olu, alu ku ma jʼone̩ olu.

Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩wñ e̩ li? Oñ u kakini, Go, u cheli, e̩ la go akete ki chʼo̩jamalia chaka, kʼuli la dʼoji-wñ kpai agege-wñ mebie; okoka agege ki jʼoji-wñ le̩ nʼo̩na mebie kʼekpo acha kwef uli-wñ wʼef uwñ.
Oli o̩lif meji la jo̩ kpenyʼu, oka-wñ dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ uli, ekeji la dʼo̩wo̩ awohi-wñ.
Tak u dohi ka ñw onuche̩ ki ako̩la ñwu mi le̩ kakini, Odu-mi, abo-i chʼe̩wñ?
Tak onuche̩ kʼomi kpʼowñ ako̩la le̩ kakini. E̩ ma e̩wñ kʼabo-i che n? Oñ u kakini, O̩da, odu-mi.
Tak i dohi ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩la Jihofa ki awʼugbo Zerubabe̩l le̩ de̩, kakini, I lʼugbo ugbiti n, i la lʼugbo ukpahiu n, chai lʼugbo Afu-mi, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
E̩ne̩ uwe̩ che uwe̩ uwo inaina? Uwe̩ amud egbili te̩ o̩gba Zerubabe̩l; oñ i adʼokuta ukpoji-wñ dufu wa kpai o̩ga echi, kakini, Ufe̩de̩nyo̩, ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ñw u!
O̩la Jihofa laño̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩wo̩ Zerubabe̩l dʼe̩re̩ unyi-i nyʼane̩; o̩wo̩-wñ la año̩ fʼu che kpa ge̩; tak uwe̩ ama ka ku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du fʼumi kpe̩rʼuwe̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ keru iko e̩wñ ree-i? Todu abo mebie-i ayo̩, oñ ma ali e̩wñ ku ma du ñwa udago o̩kpakpa e̩wñ ef o̩wo̩ Zerubabe̩l. Eju Jihofa ki ale tʼemi tʼemi o̩gbo̩ ile̩ du jo̩-i.
Tak u dohi, oñ u ka ñw u kakini, Oli o̩lif meji o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ akete le̩ kpai awohi-wñ fa, e̩wñ de̩?
Tak u dohi onuke̩ji, u ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chʼe̩to̩ oli o̩lif meji ku ma jʼakolo o̩na o̩jamalia meji kʼekpo ki ade̩ dab o̩jamalia ale ef uwñ dufu le̩?
Tak i dohi ñwu mi kakini, Uwe̩ mʼe̩wñ kʼabo-i che n? Oñ u kakini, O̩da n, odu-mi.
Tak i kakini, Abo-i chʼamo̩ma ekpo meji, ku ma dago ugbo Ondu e-o̩gbo̩ ile̩ du le̩ de̩.
Tak u ño̩ chʼeju-mi nyʼate̩ ge̩, oñ u go, e̩ la go, ibuku ki awu!
Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩wñ e̩ li? Tak u kakini, U cheli ibuku ki awu; ujiji-wñ chʼohiba ogu, unabe̩-wñ la chʼohiba me̩gwa.

Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Ama kʼu ma na ki aledufu abʼeju ane̩-i du ma le̩ de̩; todu ma akʼe̩ne̩ du ki ajʼoji da rinyo̩ alu ki ka ejʼemi-wñ: oñ ma akʼe̩ne̩ du ki age̩bo̩ da rinyo̩, alu ki ka ejʼano̩mo̩-wñ.
Naje̩ ñw u dufu, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i, oñ i agudu tef unyi ajoji, kpai tef unyi e̩ne̩ ki ago odu-mi olemi; oñ i aru alumeji unyi-wñ, i la fʼunyi-wñ lie̩ manyʼoli-wñ kpʼokuta-wñ.
Tak onuche̩ ki ako̩la ñwu mi le̩ ledufu, oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, Chʼeju-we̩ nyʼate̩ fa-i ke, kʼe̩ li e̩wñ ki adufu.
Tak u kakini, E̩wñ i che ta? Oñ i kakini, E̩fa uñwe̩wñ ki adufu le̩ de̩. I ño̩ kakini, Alu kʼe̩wñ le̩ de̩ eju ugbo du ane̩-i de̩.
(E̩ la go, ma dʼo̩de̩ie̩ma okokoloʼka kwane̩ dago ate̩;) e-i la chʼonobule̩ ki gugu alumeji e̩fa le̩,
Tak i kakini, E̩wñ bibi jo̩-i. Takimʼu du rikpolo tʼalumeji e̩fa le̩; oñ i mʼo̩de̩le̩ma ki woji le̩ du ro̩ bʼalu-wñ ma.
Tak u chʼeju-mi nyʼate̩, oñ u go, e̩ la go, abobule̩ meji ledufu wa! Afu la dʼef ika-ma; ika-ma la dab ika utu; oñ ma mʼe̩fa le̩ du kwane̩ te̩ agbagba ojale kpai ane̩.
Tak u ka ñw onuche̩ ki ako̩la ñwu mi le̩ kakini, Ugbo abo-i nʼe̩fa le̩ nyi?
Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, Ma anyʼane̩ Shaina, ku ma fʼunyi ko̩ ñw u o̩mo̩; tak e̩gba ku ma dʼu nyane̩, ma ahiʼu gugu uña-wñ onugo o̩mo̩.
Tak u ño̩ chʼeju-mi nyʼate̩ ago, e̩ la go, o̩kogu me̩le̩ kwʼagbagba uwo meji dufu; uwo le̩ la chʼuwo ebijeikpa.
O̩kogu ejodudu nʼamanya ekpikpa; o̩kogu ekeji la nʼamanya edudu;
o̩kogu e̩ke̩ta la nʼamanya efufu; o̩kogu e̩ke̩le̩ la nʼamagelema adibabala ekpikpa.
Tak u dohi ka ñw onuche̩ ki ako̩la ñwu mi le̩ kakini, Abo-i chʼe̩wñ, odu-mi?
Tak onuche̩ le̩ dohi ka ñwu mi kakini, Afu ojale me̩le̩ ki kwʼo̩gba Ondu ile̩ du adufu le̩ jo̩-i.
E-ki nʼamanya edudu adufu rʼo̩wo̩ ane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩; tak e-efufu dufu atʼuma ubi; e-adibabala la ledufu rʼo̩wo̩ ane̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩.
Tak abo ki nʼukpahiu le̩ ledufu, oñ ma feju ku ma tʼalelo lewa ile̩. Tak i kakini, Kwʼemi alo, me̩ te̩ lelo lewa ef ile̩. Abe̩le̩ ma kwotʼalelo lewa ile̩.
Tak i kwado̩ mi, oñ i ko̩la ñwu mi kakini, Go, abo ku ma ledufu rʼo̩wo̩ ane̩ o̩pata ate̩ fʼumi e̩do̩ nyi ugbo o̩wo̩ ate̩ le̩ me̩.
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
Gba o̩wo̩ abo ku ma mu alo le̩, owñ che He̩ldai kpai Tobaija, kpai Jedaya; kʼe̩ lewa eñeñini le̩ kʼe̩ mugudu tef unyi Josaya, o̩ma Ze̩fanaya, ugbo ku ma kwo Babilo̩n wa jo̩ le̩.
I-i, e̩ gba ajifa kpai o̩jamalia kʼe̩ fʼike̩be̩ ike̩be̩ gwu kʼe̩ dʼu do Jo̩shua, o̩ma Jeho̩sadak, agboji amatama le̩ oji;
kʼe̩ la ko̩la ñw u kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩, kakini, Go, e̩ne̩ ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ E̩pa le̩; owñ la apa kwʼuña-wñ le̩ dufu, oñ i akʼunyi Jihofa;
owñ le̩ pitii akʼunyi Jihofa; tak owñ le̩ anʼojima-wñ, i la agugu añwʼoda ñw amone̩ oj ede-wñ le̩, i lañʼachʼatama oj ede-wñ, ohi ure̩do̩ la adʼagbagba ama meji.
Oñ ike̩be̩ ike̩be̩ le̩ achʼutodu He̩ldai kpai Tobaija kpai todu Je̩daya kpai todu Josiaya o̩ma Ze̩fanaya, ki chʼe̩wñ urewa ef unyi Jihofa.
Oñ abo ku ma jʼo̩najiji awa fʼunyi Jihofa ko. Tak ame̩ ama ka ku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du fʼumi kpe̩ wʼugbo-me̩. Me̩ netirʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ gbali mak e̩wñ-i awa che chuu.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ku Darius jʼonu, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ochu e̩ke̩la-wñ, owñ chʼochu Chisle̩f, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Ze̩karaya.
E̩gbale̩ abo Be̩te̩l fu She̩re̩ze̩r kpai Rige̩m-me̩le̩k kpai abo-ma kpe̩ wa ku ma chʼologu bo̩ Jihofa,
ku ma laño̩ kʼo̩la ñw amatama ku ma jʼef unyi Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kpai amakache̩-wñ, kakini, Naraku ochu e̩ke̩lu kʼu ño̩ fʼo̩la-mi date̩ ojoji, alu kʼu te̩tache o̩do̩ wewe-i?
Tak o̩la Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du wʼugbo mi kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw amone̩ ane̩-i du, kpai amatama kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ jialu ku me̩ la daido̩ ochu e̩ke̩lu kpai ochu e̩kebie o̩do̩ e̩te̩gwa-i, omi me̩ jialu ñw u? E-mi dʼef uwñ ree?
E̩gba ku me̩ la aje̩ e̩wñ ku me̩ la añmo̩, i chʼo̩la-me̩ me̩ je̩ e̩wñ ñw u n? I chʼo̩la-me̩ me̩ ñmo̩ ñw u n?

I chʼo̩la ki Jihofa kwa aka ñwu me̩ lʼalu amakache̩ o̩gbo̩gba e̩gba kʼone̩ dodo Je̩rusale̩m ki la ra ñw u kʼadogbe adogbe-wñ lʼo daka-i de̩ n? Kʼone̩ ño̩ dodo o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ kpai ane̩ o̩go̩ le̩ n?
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Ze̩karaya kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka le̩ de̩ kakini, Me̩ ki nʼochochi kpʼoji ajo̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki chʼufe̩denyo kpʼo̩maye-wñ kʼi ño̩ liʼi ejumomi,
kʼi la tʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ abe̩k e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n, abe̩k ilowa abe̩k e̩no̩bata mane̩ n; e̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ ki ñwa ibe e̩bie̩ne̩ nyʼo̩maye-wñ ef e̩do̩-wñ n.
Ma muda ko̩ enetirʼu, ma gbikanyi, oñ ma fʼeti chʼo̩hialigbo̩, kʼama ki we egbo̩.

Ochochi ma fʼe̩do̩-ma che ki gbiti dab okuta omu, tode̩gba ku ma gbo̩ uko̩-o̩la kpʼo̩la ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kpuche̩ wa lugbo Afu-wñ lʼalu amakache̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩; todule̩ oñ e̩do̩fulu inaina kwʼugbo Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du wa.
Abe̩-le̩ i lewa tu kakini, Abu kʼi kwado̩ ma ku ma ko̩ egbo̩, alu le̩ ama akwa tak omi ako̩ egbo̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i;

u muda anʼofutu fʼuma kpatuka rʼabo uche̩ichi du e-kʼama ma ma ma mama ta n. Abe̩le̩ ane̩ le̩ mud e̩wñ akpokpo te̩ ubi-ma, gbogbo tak e̩ne̩ du ma ño̩ lale gu ef uwñ du ge̩ n, e̩ne̩ du la dabi tʼo̩mo̩ n: todu ma mʼane̩ ku ma ñeju-wñ le̩ du che e̩wñ akpokpo te̩ ofofo.
Tak o̩la Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du lewʼugbo mi, kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Alu kʼonobule̩ ajogu ekeji-wñ najogu inaina todu Zayo̩n, u la nʼe̩do̩fulu lile ajogu tod uwñ ge̩.
Abu ki Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, Omi mudabi wa Zayo̩n me̩, omi ñʼadodo alumeji Je̩rusale̩m, taku ma ado̩ Je̩rusale̩m ko̩ ewo ugbo kʼochochi de̩, ma la ado̩ uwo Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ko̩ Uwo kiafo.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Aboke̩le̩ ogijo kpai abobule̩ ogijo agugu et o̩na o̩na Je̩rusale̩m ta, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ anʼo̩kpa-wñ o̩wo̩ todabu ki kwʼojolugbo nana.
Ej o̩na ej o̩na ewo-wñ la ako̩ ñw abimo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ ku ma jo̩ achiya ej o̩na-wñ.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Dagba i chʼe̩wñ awuwu eju abubo̩ amone̩-i iko le̩, i ño̩ dukpe̩ ki chʼe̩wñ awuwu eju-mi ge̩? Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka-i.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Go, najadu abo-mi kwo ane̩ olodudu kpai akwo ane̩ o̩wo̩ olane̩;
oñ nako ma wa, ma la adodo o̩ge̩ge̩de̩ Je̩rusale̩m; tak ama achʼabo e-mi oñ nachʼO̩jo̩ e-ma, ef ochochi kpai ef o̩kpakpa.

Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Me̩ fʼo̩wo̩ gbo, ame̩ ku me̩ gbʼo̩la-i iko-i lʼalu amakache̩, ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ iko ku ma dʼe̩re̩ unyi Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du-i nyʼane̩, owñ chʼunyi O̩jo̩-i kʼama ki ne.

Todu e̩gba kʼiko le̩ ma wa ta n o̩gu de̩ kʼone̩ agba n o̩gu la de̩ tod e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ n, ure̩do̩ la de̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki dufu kpʼe̩ne̩ ki gudu wa n tod E̩no̩la le̩; todu omi fʼo̩la nyi te̩ agbagba e̩ne̩ du kpʼekeji-wñ.
Ama fa-i omi ade̩ ñw abubo̩ amone̩-i alu kʼu de̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩ n, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka-i.
Todu ulu ure̩do̩ ade̩; achiwebe̩te̩ma aro, ane̩ la arʼo̩je̩, oñ ojale achʼeli-wñ wa; tak u naje̩ ñw abubo̩ amone̩-i ku majʼe̩wñ-i du ogu.
Oñ i awatu alu kʼame̩ te̩te̩chʼoli ina ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi, O abunyi Juda kpai abunyi Israe̩l, alu le̩ najadu me̩, oñ ame̩ amud e̩nyo̩ jo̩. Me̩ ki railo n, o̩wo̩-me̩ ki gbo.
Todu abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Alu ki dʼef ibe-mi kʼu nache me̩ e̩bie̩ne̩, e̩gba kʼamata-me̩ gwʼumi uwe̩do̩ le̩, kʼibe-mi ma rida n, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i,
alu le̩ i ño̩ dʼef ibe-mi kʼu chʼe̩nyo̩ ñwu Je̩rusale̩m kpʼabunyi Juda iko-i; me̩ ki railo n.
E̩wñ ku me̩ ache de̩, E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki nakʼochochi kpʼeke-ji-wñ, kʼajo lʼo̩na ochochi kpai ure̩do̩ alaku-me̩,
e̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ ki la ñwʼibe e̩bie̩ne̩ ef e̩do̩-wñ nyʼekeji-wñ n; me̩ ki la fe̩do̩ olemi ego̩ du n; todu e̩wñ-i du chʼe̩wñ ulaka-mi, Jihofa aka-i.
Tak o̩la Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ño̩ wʼugbo mi, kakini,

Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Alu eji ochu e̩ke̩le̩, kpʼalu eji ochu e̩ke̩lu, kpʼalu eji ochu e̩kebie, kpʼalu eji ochu e̩ke̩gwa achʼuyo̩ kpʼe̩do̩ e̩bo kpai uje̩-wñ e̩do̩ afu ñw abunyi Juda; todule̩ me̩ ki fe̩do̩ ochochi kpai ure̩do̩.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Amone̩ amone̩ awa pio̩o̩, kpʼabo ku ma dodo ewo wewe wewe;
oñ abo ku ma dodo ewoʼka anyʼugbo abo ewo ekeji ku ma kakini, A ki hio̩ane̩ alo kʼa chʼologu bo̩ Jihofa kʼi li wa eju, kʼa ño̩ tene Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, omi ñʼale ge̩.
I-i, amone̩ wewe abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki gbiti awa tene Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du Je̩rusale̩m-i, ku ma ño̩ chʼologu bo̩ Jihofa kʼi li ma eju.
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka de̩ kakini, Iko le̩ aboke̩le̩ me̩gwa kwef abo ichi ichi ojoji du agwo̩nyʼe̩re̩ otogbo e̩ne̩ ki che Ju kakini, A ale bʼuwe̩, todu a gbo̩ ka kʼO̩jo̩ dʼugbo-we̩.
Adu o̩la Jihofa kʼi abʼane̩ Hedrak ma
kpai He̩mat, ki te̩ kadʼo ge̩,
Taya la fʼaku bu nyʼo̩la-wñ,
Go, Ondu anʼo bʼo̩ te̩
Ashke̩lo̩n aliʼu, oñ ailo-wñ amʼu;
agbabi la adodo Ashdo̩d;
Omi la amʼe̩bie̩-wñ du bʼalu-wñ te̩,
Tak omi aruru ogu donyʼunyi-mi daka tod abogu le̩,
E̩ nagwoguyo̩ nana, uwe̩ o̩monobule̩ e-Zayo̩n!
Oñ nakʼo̩kogu da bʼIfraim te̩
I chʼe-we̩ onugo ge̩, tod e̩bie̩ alo-we̩
Mudabi wʼef aku, ame̩ ame̩namu e-ibe ekono le̩;
Todu u fu Juda fa ñw o̩la-mi;
Oñ ma ali Jihofa oji-ma ate̩,
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ahie̩do̩ bʼo ma,
Taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma ajadu ma o̩jo̩ le̩
Todu, alifia-wñ tabale uto̩-wñ la gbe̩gbe̩!
Me̩ ki bi Jihofa omi iko omi otitala
Todu amude te̩tako̩la ibe̩te̩,
Uwe̩do̩-mi mutajo bʼamadide ame̩ wño̩re̩ oji ma,
Ugbo-wñ okuta ukpoji alo le̩ akwo wa,
Ma la adab amagbiti ku ma jʼatʼame̩nuja-ma mane̩
Tak u nadʼugbiti ñw unyi Juda,
Ifraim la adab agbiti,
Nafufo do̩ ma oñ nako ma wa jʼugboʼkate,
Oñ nako ma gbe̩ ef amone̩ ojoji ojoji,
Omi ñʼako ma kwʼojane̩ Ijipti wa ge̩,
Tak i alale gu ef ohimini o̩pe̩cha du,
Oñ nadʼukpahiu ñw ma efu Jihofa
Mʼo̩na-we̩ bi, o Le̩bano̩n,
Kwa, uwe̩ oli fe̩r, todu sida le̩ lewane̩,
Gbo̩, omu ukwa amadidala le̩,
Abu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi ka de̩ kakini, Me̩ kʼije̩ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma kpa le̩ je̩.
Owñ chʼe-kʼabo ki la ma akpa ma ku ma ma la gbʼo̩wo̩ abi n; abo ku ma ko ma ta kakini, Jihofa ki nele, todu u mud anana me̩; kʼamadide e-ma onugo ma li ma ejumomi n.

Todu omi ñʼali abo ku ma dodo ane̩-i ejumomi ge̩ n, Jihofa ka-i. Me̩ muda go, nakʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ aboke̩le̩-ma nyʼekeji-wñ o̩wo̩, kpai tʼef o̩wo̩ onu-wñ; tak abo le̩ akpʼane̩-i; omi la agba ma bʼuma o̩wo̩ te̩ n.

Abe̩le̩ u kʼije̩ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku ma kpa le̩ je̩, owñ chʼame̩no̩bata ef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini le̩. Tak u mʼo̩kpa meji ko; u la dʼodu o̩ka-wñ ko̩ Ube̩do̩, u la dʼekeji-wñ ko̩ Ejidama. U la kʼije̩ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini le̩ je̩.
Tak u fʼamadidala me̩ta le̩ ko̩da rinyo̩ ochu ʼka. Todu uhia-ma fʼonugo-mi hia, onugo-ma laño̩ hihie̩ne̩ mi ge̩.
Tak u kakini, Nakʼije̩ ñwu me̩ je̩ n. E-ki aku, ki ku ke; e-ki dukpe̩ ki lenyo̩, ki lenyo̩; oñ abo ki bo̩ du ki naje̩ o̩re̩la omune̩.
Oñ u mʼo̩kpa-mi Ube̩do̩ le̩ du, oñ u mʼu ko da meji, todu kʼu fʼalo-mi kʼu kpe̩ kpai amone̩ le̩ du bie̩.
Tak i mubie̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, abe̩le̩ tak ame̩ no̩bata ku ma nyʼumi eti ef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini le̩ ma ka kʼo̩la Jihofa i che.
Tak u ka ñwu ma kakini, i nyo̩ eju-me̩, maku me̩ fʼo̩me̩-mi ra ñwu mi ke; i ma dʼabe̩le̩ n, me̩ we. Oñ ma fʼajifa ogue̩gwa ñwa ki chʼo̩me̩-mi.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, mʼu ko rikpolo jʼane̩ ñw abucha le̩—owñ chʼalaja o̩me̩me̩le̩ ku ma ñwa ki chʼeju-mi. Tak u mʼajifa ogue̩gwa le̩ ko oñ u ko rikpolo jʼane̩ ñw abucha ef unyi Jihofa.
Tak u ño̩ fʼo̩kpa-mi ekeji ko̩da meji, owñ chʼe-Ejidama le̩, kʼu fʼo̩maye agbagba Juda kpai Israe̩l bie̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ ki ño̩ mʼe̩wñ eku idada ki adide amala ko ge̩.

Todu go, omi adu adidala kwane̩ oj ane̩-i kʼi ma la anyʼafejudo abo ku ma che ku ma lenyo̩ n, i la atejane̩ abo ku ma fiatuka n, i la akpʼagbe abo ki chagbe n, i la akʼije̩ ñw abo ki nʼo̩lafia je̩ n; i muda aje̩ o̩rela abo ki yoyo, i la afʼetikpa-ma fana rinyo̩.
Atogwo ñw adide ibe̩te̩,
Adu o̩la Jihofa ugbo Israe̩l le̩ de̩. E̩ne̩ ki fʼojale ojale nadala te̩, kʼi la adʼe̩re̩ ile̩ nyʼane̩, kʼi la abe̩ afu one̩ ej ef uwñ;
Jihofa le̩ kakini, Go, nadu Je̩rusale̩m chʼago ki aje̩ ñw amone̩ du ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ daka, ro̩ko̩ibu, i la ñʼabʼoji Juda ma e̩gba ku ma kpala nyu Je̩rusale̩m ge̩.
Oñ i awatu iko le̩, kʼomi ache ki Je̩rusale̩m ki chʼokuta ki woji ñw amone̩ du; abo du ku ma che ku ma nʼadu-wñ achagbe nana; tak abo uche̩ichi ane̩ ile̩-i du ajeju nyʼu O̩la.
O̩jo̩ le̩, Jihofa ka-i, Nadʼailo gwo anya du, oñ nanʼimu ehi gwo e̩ne̩ ki tanʼo; tak u nachʼeju-mi abʼunyi Juda ma, oñ nakpʼanya amone̩ le̩ okoke du eju fo̩.
Tak amidachi Juda aka ef e̩do̩-ma kakini, Abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusae̩lm achʼukpahiu-mi lefu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼO̩jo̩-ma le̩.

Iko le̩ naje̩ ñw amidachi Juda dab una ef anade alumeji iji, ma la adab e̩mu ki ado̩go̩ ki kado uti o̩ka; ma la afʼamone̩ du ku ma donyʼuma daka le̩ lie̩, tʼab o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩, tʼabo o̩wo̩ awohi; oñ abo Je̩rusale̩m la ñʼagugu e̩gu e-ma pio̩o̩, owñ che Je̩rusale̩m.
Jihofa ñʼajadu unyabo Juda ejodudu todu kʼojima unyi Defid kpai ojima abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m ki we enana tʼe-Juda le.
Iko le̩ Jihofa ahi e̩do̩ bʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m ma; oñ e̩ne̩ ki chʼe̩ne̩gbo ef uma iko le̩ adabu Defid; oñ abunyi Defid adab O̩jo̩, dabe̩ne̩ kʼonuche̩ Jihofa o̩gba-ma.
Oñ i awatu iko le̩, omi ache kʼu nakpʼabo uche̩ichi du ku ma wa ku ma kobo̩ Je̩rusale̩m rinyo̩.

Tak u nadʼafu ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ologu eche danyʼoji unyi Defid kpai oji abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m; taku ma akejurʼomi ku ma dʼe̩wñ gunyu le̩; ma la adʼaido̩-wñ alu kʼone̩ adaido̩ o̩mokpono-wñ, o̩la-wñ akpa nyʼuma e̩do̩ gaa alu kʼo̩la o̩mo̩gba one̩ akpa nyʼe̩ e̩do̩.
Iko le̩ edaido̩ lile ade̩ Je̩rusale̩m, alu kʼedaido̩ Hedadrimo̩n de̩ ef o̩go̩ Me̩gido̩n le̩.
Oñ ane̩-i adaido̩, akwo̩ra unyi du adate̩ ojoji; akwo̩ra unyi Defid adate̩, amo̩ya-ma adate̩; akwo̩ra unyi Netan adate̩, amo̩ya-ma la adate̩ ojoji;
akwo̩ra unyi Lifai adate̩, amo̩ya e-ma la adate̩ ojoji; akwo̩ra unyi Shimeai adate̩, amo̩ya-ma la adate̩ ojoji;
akwo̩ra unyi du kibo̩, akwo̩ra unyi du adate̩ ojoji, amo̩ya-ma la ñʼadate̩ ojoji ge̩.
O̩jo̩ le̩ ma abi e̩bi omiʼka ñw abo unyi Defid, kpʼabo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m, tod adure kpʼiwa, i che.
Oñ i awatu iko le̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i, kʼomi akʼodu ode ode da bʼane̩-i te̩, ma ñʼarewa-wñ ge̩ n; naño̩ je̩ ñw amakache̩ kpai amafu ki ma de̩ hiolo n ku ma kwo bʼane̩-i te̩ ge̩.

Tak i awatu, e̩gba kʼone̩ akache̩ kpo̩, tak ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ ki bi owñ aka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ adeju n; todu olemi oñ e̩ ro̩ ef odu Jihofa le̩; tak ata-wñ kpʼiye-wñ ki bi owñ adʼe̩wñ gunyʼu dufu eju ekeji e̩gba kʼi akache̩.
Oñ i awatu iko le̩ kakini, Akache̩ okoke du achanyo̩ ane̩ kʼi go, e̩gba kʼi akache̩; ma ñʼakʼukpo edudu nyʼo̩la ku ma gbʼone̩ ibe n.
I muda akakini, Omi chʼakache̩ no, aluche̩ ane̩ u che; todu one̩ mʼumi du chʼadu kwʼo̩jo̩ imo̩to̩-mi gbogbo wa.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka aka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chʼagbe ki jʼagbagba o̩wo̩-we̩ le̩? Tak i adohi kakini, E-le̩ chʼagbe ku ma che mi ef unyi ame̩nufe̩do̩-mi.
O o̩kwo̩chageli, mʼolu ji ke, kʼe̩ kobʼadidala-mi,
Oñ i awatu kakini, oj ane̩-i du, Jihofa ka-i,

Tak omi adʼukpe̩ru e̩ke̩ta le̩ nyʼef una, oñ nafʼuma gwe̩ alu ku ma gwe̩ ajifa, u la ajʼuma ma alu ku ma jʼo̩jamalia ma. Ma akwadʼodu-mi, tak u nagbʼomu-ma. Omi akakini, Abo-mi de̩; oñ ma akakini, Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩-mi.
Go, o̩jo̩ e-Jihofa añwa, e̩gba le̩ ma akpe̩ ane̩-me̩ kʼogu je̩ alumeji-me̩.

Todu nakʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du wa jeju ku ma kʼogu bo̩ Je̩rusale̩m; ma la afʼewo-i du, ma la añʼane̩ unyi unyi, ma la akpa abobule̩-wñ bie̩; ukpe̩re̩ji abo ewo-i adufu tef amu; ma muda akʼamone̩ ki bo̩bo̩ da bʼewo-i te̩ n.
Taku Jihofa adufu, oñ i akobʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi le̩ alu ki de̩ e̩gba kʼi jogu iko ogu igbele.

Tak o̩jo̩ le̩ e̩re̩-wñ adago oj uwo O̩lif, owñ chʼe-ki dʼo̩gba Je̩rusale̩m o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩; taku ma akpʼuwo O̩lif le̩ na alumeji-wñ rʼo̩wo̩ olodudu kpai olane̩, o̩go̩-wñ atabale; ukpe̩re̩ji uwo le̩ achi rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩, eju ekeji-wñ ale rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩.

Tak ame̩ ara le o̩go̩ uwo uwo-mi; todu o̩go̩ uwo le̩ ate̩ gbogbo kado Eze̩l; ochochi ame̩ ara alu ku me̩ ra kwʼugbo kʼane̩ miejo ki kpana te̩ iko Uzaya, onu Juda le̩; oñ Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi awa, kpai abo kiafo̩ du manyʼuwe̩.
Tak i awatu o̩jo̩ le̩, kʼugone̩ ma ade̩ n; abo ki agane̩ la afʼo̩la-ma wʼubi.
I muda ache o̩jo̩ʼka ki Jihofa chema o̩jo̩-wñ i la chʼo̩ro̩ka n, i la chʼodu n; i muda awatu, e̩gba olane̩ ugane̩ ade̩.
Oñ i awatu o̩jo̩ le̩, kʼomi iñmi acha kwefu Je̩rusale̩m; ukpe̩reji-wñ acha rʼo̩wo̩ ohimini o̩wo̩ olodudu, ukpe̩reji-wñ la acha rʼo̩wo̩ ohimini o̩wo̩ olane̩; tʼuwo tʼo̩lo̩ji i ade̩ abe̩le̩.
Taku Jihofa achʼonu ane̩-ile̩ du; o̩jo̩ le̩ Jihofa achʼokate, odu-wñ lañʼachʼokate.

Ma ache kʼane̩-i du la adab Araba le̩, akwo Geba gbogbo wa Rimo̩n, o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ Je̩rusale̩m; ma la adʼowñ kwane̩, tak i agugu uña-wñ, akwo alaku Be̩njamin gbogbo wʼugbo alaku ejodudu, gbogbo wʼalaku ugbo alo-wñ le̩, kpai akwo o̩do̩go̩ Hanane̩l gbogbo wʼugbo aguo̩ko̩lo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma e-onu le̩.
Tak amone̩ adodo ef uwñ, ekojo̩ ñw uku ñʼade̩ ge̩ n; Je̩rusale̩m muda agugu to̩ko̩o̩.

E̩wñ ki la chʼegwo e-ki Jihofa ane̩ gwo amone̩ amone̩ du ku ma kʼogu wa abo Je̩rusale̩m de̩: o̩re̩la-ma atakpa rʼuma eju e̩re̩re̩ ugbo ku ma dago le̩, e̩yo̩ eju-ma la atakpa rʼef akpo-wñ, ukpalu-ma atakpa rʼuma alu.
Tak i awatu iko le̩ kʼutu ki nana kwʼugbo Jihofa ada ef uma; oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma agwo̩nyʼo̩wo̩ onuku-wñ, tak o̩wo̩-wñ akwane̩ achagwunyʼo̩wo̩ onuku-wñ.
Juda la ade̩ Je̩rusale̩m ajogu. Oñ ma akʼe̩wñ anana abo uche̩ichi du ku ma donyʼuma le̩ wa jʼugboʼkate, tʼo̩jamalia, tʼajifa, tʼukpo, i ajʼo̩mo̩ be̩le̩ke̩te̩.
Abe̩le̩ egwo anya kpai imiulu kpai inyakulumi kpai o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ kpai ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ du ku ma jʼef uru uru ogu le̩ ade̩, alu kʼegwo e-fa-i le̩ de̩.
Oñ i awatu ka kʼe̩ne̩ du ki bo̩ ef abo uche̩ichi du ku ma wa kobo̩ Je̩rusale̩m anyʼo̩mo̩ o̩do̩ o̩do̩ ku ma dojikane̩ ñw Onu, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, ku ma laño̩ de uje̩wñ e-ebu emu le̩.
Oñ i ade̩ kʼe̩ne̩ du ef akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩ra unyi abo ile̩ du ki ma anyi Je̩rusale̩m kʼi dojikane̩ ñw Onu, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du le̩ n, omi alo̩ ñwu ma n.
