I la che̩wñ kʼakwo̩ra unyi Ijipti ma le n, ku ma ma wa n, i la ade̩ ñwu ma n; egwo ki Jihofa ane̩ gwo abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ku ma ma nyʼade uje̩wñ uyo̩ e-ebu emu n le̩ ade̩.
E-le̩ chʼudu adure abo Ijipti kpai udu adure abo uche̩ichi du ku ma ma nyʼade uje̩wñ uyo̩ e-ebu emu le̩ n.
O̩jo̩ le̩ o̩la ki che̩ko̩ nyʼo̩la ilo amanya akakini, Efo̩ ñwu Jihofa. Ucha ki jʼunyi Jihofa la adab ugba ki jʼo̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩;

ochochi, ucha du ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m kpai Juda afo̩ ñwu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du; oñ abo du ku ma achʼiche̩bo̩ awʼo̩mo̩ adʼu ku ma hi e̩wñ ef uwñ. Iko le̩ e̩ne̩ Kenan du ñʼadʼef unyi Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ge̩ n.
Adu o̩la Jihofa ki lʼugbo Malakai wʼugbo abo Israe̩l de̩.
Omi te̩tafe̩do̩ me̩, Jihofa ka-i. Ame̩ muda kakini, Ugbo, oñ uwe̩ te̩tafe̩do̩ wa ke? Iso̩ chʼo̩maye Jeko̩bi n? Jihofa ka-i; u la fe̩do̩ Jeko̩b;
u muda chʼulaka Iso̩, oñ u che kʼane̩ uwo-wñ ki mud alache̩ te̩, oñ u mʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ ko ñw amogbemgbem aje̩tachi je̩.

Dagba Ido̩m ki kakini, Ma fʼuwa gwʼale me̩, a muda adabi fʼuchodo le̩ ne. Abu ku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka de̩ kakini, Ama ane̩, omi muda agulo̩ wane̩; oñ amone̩ ado̩ ma ko̩ Ane̩ E̩wñ bibi, kpai Amone̩ kʼe̩do̩ Jihofa akpa rʼuma ogbegbele.
Eju-me̩ la aliʼu, taku me̩ akakini, Jihofa ki nana nyo̩gba gbogbo tʼudaba alo̩me̩ abo Israe̩l.

O̩ma adojima ñw ata-wñ, adu la ache ñw odu-wñ; mak iche̩wñ kʼomi chʼata one̩, ugbo ojima-mi de̩ ke? I la che̩wñ kʼomi chʼodu, ugbo ailo-mi ku ma ra de̩? Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ako̩la ñwu me̩, ame̩ amatama, ku me̩ dʼodu-mi rʼibe̩te̩. Oñ me̩ kakini, Ugbo oñ awa dʼodu-we̩ rʼibe̩te̩ ke?
Ame̩ kʼuje̩wñ e̩daji wa che oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-mi. Oñ ame̩ kakini, Ugbo oñ a fʼuwe̩ daji? Owñ chʼe-kʼame̩ kakini, Itebulu Jihofa chʼe̩wñ ide̩te̩.

E̩gba ku me̩ kʼe̩wñ akpejufo̩ wa ku me̩ ko chʼiche̩bo̩, mak i bie̩ne̩ n de̩? oñ e̩gba ku me̩ kʼe̩wñ ki achika kpai e̩wñ ki achʼo̩ga wa, mak i bie̩ne̩ n de̩? Mʼe̩wñ le̩ ko wa ñw igo̩bina-we̩ ke̩, e̩do̩-wñ abo̩rʼu we̩? I ali we̩ eju? Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Fa-i, nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, me̩ gbo̩ko̩bo̩ Jihofa kʼi li uwa eju, todu kʼi chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼawa. E̩wñ kʼi kwʼo̩wo̩-me̩ de̩-i? I ali e̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ eju? Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du aka-i.
O, i ma nʼe̩ne̩ ʼkate ef ume̩ kʼi ma fʼo̩na le̩ re, kʼame̩ ki we ekʼuna oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-mi ibe̩te̩ ofo. U nʼe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ du ef ume̩ n, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i, U la agba e̩wñ ele du o̩wo̩-me̩ n.

Todu akwugbo kʼolu akwane̩ odudu gbogbo tʼugbo kʼi atunyʼane̩, odu-mi anana ef abo uche̩ichi; oñ ugbo tʼugbo du ma akʼe̩wñ ki akpo wa ñw odu-mi, kpai e̩wñ ele ki fe̩; todu odu-mi anana ef abo uche̩ichi, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Ame̩ muda adʼo̩ ji, owñ chʼabu ku me̩ kakini, itebulu Jihofa mudaji me̩, e̩ro e̩wñ ki jʼoji-wñ, owñ chʼuje̩wñ-wñ, chʼe̩wñ ide̩te̩.

Ame̩ ño̩ kakini, Go, ihianyi-wñ gbe̩! oñ me̩ to̩pianya ñw u, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i; oñ me̩ kʼe̩wñ ku me̩ gba o̩lachi kpai e̩wñ ki achika kpai e̩wñ kʼi acho̩ga wa; abe̩le̩ oñ me̩ kʼe̩wñ ele wa. I dukpe̩ kʼu gba e-le̩ o̩wo̩-me̩? Jihofa ka-i.

Ama ki fʼe̩ne̩ ki chʼO̩jo̩ e̩la mu, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩kʼe̩la ef ujo̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-wñ tak i doji, tak i dʼe̩wñ e̩kpabie̩ wa chʼiche̩bo̩ ñw Ondu; todu Onu inaina omi che, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i; oñ odu-mi abailo ef abo uche̩ichi.
Oñ fai ame̩, amatama, uko̩-i chʼutodu me̩.

Ame̩ ma gbo̩ n, kʼame̩ ma adʼu tʼe̩do̩ n, kʼame̩ ki dʼojima ñw odu-mi n, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i, mak u nakpʼama le̩ wa anʼume̩ oji, tak omi anama ñw e̩nyo̩ kʼu du ñwu me̩; ochochi, omi fʼama na ñw ume̩, todabu ku me̩ ma dʼu tʼe̩do̩ n.
Go, nadejurʼugbe̩ me̩, oñ nakʼechu fia nyʼume̩ eju, owñ chʼechu uje̩wñ uyo̩-me̩; taku ma ako me̩ alo manyʼu.
Oñ ame̩ ama ka kʼomi dʼuko̩-i kpuche̩rʼume̩, kʼalo-mi kʼu kpe̩ adʼugbo Lifai, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Alo-mi e-iñmi kpai ure̩do̩ te̩te̩dʼugbo-wñ; u la mʼuko ñw u kʼi railo; i la railo mi, e̩do̩-wñ muda kpu todu odu-mi.
Uko̩o̩la ochochi dʼef alu-wñ, ma la li uji ef uko-wñ n; owñ ño̩ lule̩ kpʼomi ef ure̩do̩ kpʼo̩kpakpa, i la ño̩ mʼabo wewe rida bʼudu efe̩ te̩.
Todu i dukpe̩ kʼuko atama ki gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ ema, kʼama ki tene uko̩-o̩la le̩ alu-wñ; todu, owñ chʼonuche̩ Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du.
Ame̩ muda muna bʼo̩na te̩ me̩; me̩ je̩ ñw amone̩ wewe ke̩re̩ ef uko̩-o̩la le̩; me̩ fʼalo Lifai bie̩ me̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Todule̩ omi ño̩ kʼume̩ chʼe̩wñ ide̩te̩, kpai e̩wñ achukata, eju amone̩ du, teju alu kʼame̩ ma de o̩na o̩na-mi n, kʼame̩ la nʼe̩nejuma ef uko̩-o̩la le̩.
Ata-wa du chʼokate n? I chʼO̩jo̩ okate nyi wa n? E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-wa adʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼo̩kpo̩ ñw o̩maye-wñ, kʼa la fʼalo amata-wa bie̩ ta?
Juda dʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼo̩kpo̩, ma la fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ che efu Israe̩l kpai Je̩rusale̩m; todu Juda fʼefo̩ e-Jihofa kʼi afe̩do̩ le̩ daji, oñ i fʼo̩ma o̩jo̩ ononojo ne̩ chʼo̩ya.
Jihofa akʼe̩ne̩ ki adʼudo̩ kpai e̩ne̩ ki adohi da bʼunyabo Jeko̩b te̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ-i, kpai e̩ne̩ ki adʼe̩wñ ele wa ñwu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ge̩.

E̩wñ ekeji ku me̩ ño̩ che de̩ ge̩: me̩ kʼomi aku kpai aku ero̩ kpai ifi efi bʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa ma, todabu kʼi ma ñʼanyʼe̩wñ ku me̩ duwa le̩ eti ge̩ n, i lañʼali me̩ eju kʼi agba e̩wñ ele o̩wo̩-me̩ ge̩ n.

Me̩ muda kakini, E̩wñ chi? Todabu ki Jihofa chʼe̩nibenu agbagba-we̩ kpai o̩ya o̩jo̩ okolobia-we̩, e-kʼe̩ dʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼo̩kpo̩ ñw u le̩, abu kʼi chaka chʼachimo̩la-we̩ kpai o̩ya kʼuwe̩ kpʼowñ kpʼalo.

I la chʼokate i che n? Afu-e-iñmi la chʼebo̩bo̩ ñw owñ. E̩wñ chi ki chʼokate ta? Todabu kʼi neku ugbe̩ e-O̩jo̩. Todule̩ me̩ nafʼe̩do̩-me̩ de, e̩ne̩ du ki dʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼo̩kpo̩ ñw o̩ya o̩jo̩kolobia-wñ n.
Todu edʼo̩ya tinyo̩ chʼe̩wñ ulaka-mi, Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ka-i, kpai e̩ne̩ ki kʼotogbo-wñ bʼe̩wñ afuma kʼi ache ma; todule̩ me̩ nafʼafu-me̩ de, ku me̩ we edʼo̩wo̩ tef ukpo arʼo̩kpo̩.

Uko̩la-me̩ fi Jihofa hia me̩. Me̩ muda kakini, Ugbʼe̩wñ oñ agwʼo̩ uhia? Owñ chʼe-ku me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki achʼe̩bie̩ne̩ chenyo̩ eju Jihofa, i la ayo̩ ñwu ma; abe̩k e-ku me̩ kakini, Ugbo O̩jo̩ e-ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka de̩ ke?
Go, nakpʼonuche̩-mi wa, kʼi ñwʼo̩na che o̩gba-mi; tak Ondu kʼame̩ atene owñ le̩ awʼunyi-wñ achigili. Onuche̩ e-alo kʼame̩ ayo̩ ñw u le̩, me̩ go, owñ awa, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
E̩ne̩ muda abʼo̩jo̩ ewa-wñ jo̩? I kwo tejugede, e̩ne̩ adago? Todu owñ dab una utolo ki ayo̩ ebije kpai o̩che̩ ku ma du gwʼukpo;
i agugu dab e̩ne̩ ki ayo̩ ajifa kʼi fʼu gwe̩ hiolo. I agwe̩ amo̩ma Lifai hiolo, i la agwe̩ ma dab O̩jamalia kpai ajifa; taku ma akʼe̩wñ ele wa ñwu Jihofa lʼo̩na o̩kpakpa.
Tak e̩wñ ele ki Juda kpai Je̩rusale̩m akowa anyo̩ Jihofa eju dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩jo̩ igbegbele le̩, kpʼalu ki de̩ o̩do̩ o̩do̩ ki lale.

Tak omi ate̩me̩rʼume̩ tod ajo̩; oñ nagbibenu piopio nyʼamochu, kpai abo ku ma tene o̩ya one̩ kpai abo ku ma go̩ olemi kpai abo ku ma che abuko̩lo̩ uji ef o̩me̩ ku ma ra ñwu ma, kpai abo ku ma che o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ kpai e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n uji; kpai abo ku ma fʼilowa ke̩che̩ tʼo̩wo̩ʼka, ku ma ma la railo mi n, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Todu omi Jihofa arida n; todule̩ ame̩, amo̩ma Jeko̩b ma lie̩ rinyo̩ kpa n.
Akwʼe̩gba amata-me̩ me̩ te̩tarida bʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi te̩, me̩ la de n. Mudabiwa aba mi, tak u nadabiwa aba me̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i. Ama me̩ kakini, Ugbo a dʼo̩na tinyo̩, tak a dabi?
One̩ achʼO̩jo̩ uji? Me̩ muda ache mi uji. Ama me̩ kakini, Ugbo a chʼe̩ uji? Owñ chʼugbo e̩wñ ukpe̩gwa-me̩ kpai ugbo e̩wñ edu ne ate̩.
Ama fʼume̩ mu me̩; todu ame̩ ache mi uji gbo, owñ chʼabo ichi-i du.

Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kakini, me̩ mʼe̩wñ ukpe̩gwa le̩ chaka ko wa jʼef aka-wñ, kʼuje̩wñ ki dʼunyi-mi, ku me̩ nʼe-le̩ jʼumi ma, abe̩k omi ma abi ope efojale ñwu me̩ kʼu dʼe̩nyo̩ danyʼume̩ oji kʼuña ma ño̩ bʼo̩ jo̩ ge̩ n.
Tak omi adejurʼafʼe̩wñ lie̩ le̩ todu me̩, kʼi we ekpʼe̩ro ane̩-me̩ bie̩; e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma oko-me̩ aña rinyo̩ o̩gba tak iko-wñ jo̩ n, Jihofa, ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Abo uche̩ichi du la ado̩ me̩ kʼabo ki gbede; todu ame̩ amud ane̩ ube̩do̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
O̩la o̩kʼo̩ko me̩ te̩taka nyʼumi, Jihofa ka-i. Me̩ muda akakini, E̩wñ chʼo̩la kʼa ka nyʼuwe̩?
Ame̩ kakini, Ere̩ Jihofa chʼofo; ede o̩la kʼi ñwa ñw a kpai ukpo eku eko nyʼo̩la alule̩ o̩gba Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, ugbo ile-wñ de̩?
Fa-i awa la dʼabo ku ma ke ko abo ku ma gbede; abo ku ma chʼe̩wñ bibi anana nyʼo̩gba; ochochi, ma la jʼO̩jo̩ ma oñ ma mufu tane̩.
Tak abo ku ma railo Jihofa nako̩la ñw o̩la-ma. Jihofa neti, i la gbo̩, oñ ma fʼo̩takada urewa abo ku ma railo Jihofa ku ma la dibetʼodu-wñ ko̩ o̩gba-wñ.
Abo le̩ la achʼabo e-mi, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i, ma achʼabo e-mi ogbolo o̩jo̩ kʼu nache te̩; omi la adʼo̩wo̩ mʼuma alu kʼata o̩ma adʼo̩wo̩ mʼo̩ma-wñ onugo kʼi arʼo̩.
Tak ame̩ adabiwa amejuma ojoji e̩no̩kpakpa kpai e̩ne̩bibi, kpai ojoji e̩ne̩ ki arʼO̩jo̩ kpai e̩ne̩ ki ma arʼo̩ n.

Todu, go, o̩jo̩-wñ awa, una-wñ ajo dabe̩ne̩ kʼe-aido; oñ abo ku ma ke du, kpai abo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ bibi du, amud elikpo oj inata; o̩jo̩ ki awa le̩ agu uma jo rinyo̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i, tʼili, tʼe̩to̩-wñ i ato̩no̩ ñwu ma n.
Ama olu e-o̩kpakpa akwane̩ ñw ame̩ ku me̩ railo odu e-mi, o̩ga echekpa adʼ ika-wñ. Tak ame̩ adufu añwugu dab amo̩ma okuno̩ ku ma kwef unyi dufu.
Tak ame̩ afʼame̩ne̩bibi kpetili mane̩; todu ama adab elulu kʼadaba e̩re̩-me̩ atʼo̩ mane̩ o̩jo̩ kʼu nache e̩wñ le̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i.
Me̩ nadibekado uko̩-o̩la Mose̩s adu-mi, owñ chʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kpai ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka kʼu ñwa ñw u oji Ho̩re̩b le̩ tod abo Israe̩l chaka.
Me̩ go, nakpʼE̩laija akache̩ le̩ wa ñwu me̩ o̩gba tak o̩jo̩ inaina ki abailo e-Jihofa le̩ wa.
Owñ la arʼe̩do̩ amata da abʼamo̩ma-ma, oñ e̩do̩ amo̩ma arida abʼamata-ma; tode̩gba kʼomi lewa anʼama ena fʼane̩ le̩ chile̩che̩.
O̩takada o̩lo̩pu Jisus Kraisti o̩ma Defid, o̩ma Ebraham o̩gba o̩gba de̩.
Ebraham bi Aise̩k. Aise̩k la bi Jeko̩b. Jeko̩b la bi Juda kpʼamo̩maye-wñ.
Tamar la bi Pe̩re̩z kpai Ze̩ra ñwu Juda. Pe̩re̩z la bi He̩zro̩n. He̩zro̩n la bi Ram.
Ram la bi Aminadab. Aminadab la bi Naasho̩n. Naasho̩n la bi Salmo̩n.
Rehab la bi Boaz ñwu Salmo̩n. Rutu la bi Obe̩d ñwu Boaz. Obe̩d la bi Je̩si.
Je̩si la bi Defid kʼi chʼonu. E-Uraya le̩ la bi So̩lo̩mo̩n ñwu Defid.
So̩lo̩mo̩n la bi Reho̩boam. Reho̩boam la bi Abaija. Abaija la bi Esa.
Esa la bi Jeho̩shafat. Jeho̩shafat la bi Jo̩ram. Jo̩ram la bi Uzaya.
Uzaya la bi Jotam. Jotam labi Ehaz. Ehaz la bi He̩ze̩kaya.
He̩ze̩kaya la bi Manase. Manase la bi Amo̩n. Amo̩n la bi Josaya.
Josaya la bi Je̩konaya kpʼamo̩maye-wñ iko ku ma mʼuma chʼodo nyi Babilo̩n.
Abu ku ma la mʼuma chʼodo nyi Babilo̩n taku Je̩konaya bi She̩altie̩l. Shealtie̩l la bi Ze̩ro̩babe̩l.
Ze̩ro̩babe̩l la bi Abihud. Abihud la bi E̩layakim. E̩layakim la bi Ezo̩r.
Ezo̩r la bi Zado̩k. Zado̩k la bi Akim. Akim la bi E̩liud.
E̩liud la bi E̩leaza. E̩leaza la bi Matan. Matan la bi Jeko̩b.
Jeko̩b la bi Jose̩f kʼi chʼo̩ko̩ Me̩ri kʼi bi Jisus ku ma do̩ ko̩ Kraisti le̩.

Abe̩le̩ o̩gba o̩gba du akwo Ebraham gbogbo wa Defid chʼo̩gba o̩gba me̩gwe̩le̩; akwo Defid gbogbo wʼe̩gba ku ma mʼuma chʼodo nyi Babilo̩n ño̩ chʼo̩gba o̩gba me̩gwe̩le̩; oñ akwʼe̩gba ku ma mʼuma chʼodo nyi Babilo̩n gbogbo wa Kraisti la chʼo̩gba o̩gba me̩gwe̩le̩ ge̩.
Oñ alu ku ma bi Kraisti la de̩ kakini, Abu ku ma mʼiye-wñ Me̩ri du kpe̩ Jose̩f, o̩gba taku ma wa dama kpʼo̩la-ma, ma li abu kʼi defu lugbo Afu Kiafo̩.
Oñ abu ku Jose̩f o̩ko̩-wñ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa, ki ma la dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi adʼu nye̩ña ejo̩ja n, i nʼeku etʼo̩ no̩ ejubi.

Abu kʼi la nʼibe e̩wñ-i akpe̩, go, onuche̩ Ondu kwotejugede ñw u ef o̩na kʼi na. I kakini, Jose̩f, uwe̩ o̩ma Defid, e̩ ki railo Me̩ri, o̩ya-we̩ le̩ egba n; todu efu-wñ kʼi nyo̩ le̩ kwʼugbo Afu Kiafo̩.
Owñ la abi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tak uwe̩ adʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jisus; todu owñ ajadu abo-wñ bʼadure-ma te̩.
Oñ o̩gbo̩ e̩wñ-i du wa che todu kʼe̩wñ kʼOndu ka lef akache̩ le̩ ki che̩ kakini,
Me̩ go, igbe̩le̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n le̩ adefu,
Tak abu ki Jose̩f kwane̩ kwef olu i che alu kʼonuche̩ Ondu ñwa ñw u, oñ i mʼo̩ya-wñ gba;
i muda mʼowñ n gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼi fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi; tak i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jisus.
Oñ abu ku ma fi Jisus bi Be̩tle̩he̩m e-Judia o̩kpanachi onu He̩ro̩d, me̩ go, amakuli kwʼolodudu lewa Je̩rusale̩m, ma kakini,
Ugbo e̩ne̩ ku ma bi kʼi chʼonu amaJu de̩? todu a li awo-wñ o̩wo̩ olodudu oñ a wa adojikane̩ ñw u-i.
Tak abu kʼonu He̩ro̩d gbo̩, e̩do̩ ñwañwala je̩ ñw u kpai o̩chaka abo Je̩rusale̩m-i n.
Tak i fʼamagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada amone̩ do̩ jeju, oñ i tene ugbo ma ugbo ku ma abi Kraisti.
Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Be̩tle̩he̩m e-Judia; todu abe̩le̩ ma ko̩ lef akache̩ kakini,
Oñ uwe̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m, ane̩ Judia,
E̩gbale̩ He̩ro̩d fʼamakuli do̩ wʼubi oñ i tene ugbo ma o̩bie̩ o̩bie̩ adiko kʼawo le̩ kwotejugede.
Tak i kpe̩ ma nyi Be̩tle̩he̩m kakini, Me̩ le, me̩ gwili o̩la o̩ma le̩ o̩bie̩ o̩bie̩. Oñ e̩gba ku me̩ fʼu li me̩ mʼohi-wñ du dabi wa ñwu mi, kʼomi onugo kʼu wa adojikane̩ ñw u ge̩.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼomu onu gbo̩ ma le ma; me̩ go, awo ku ma li o̩wo̩ olodudu la tʼuma o̩gba gbogbo tak i lewa dago ate̩ ugbo kʼo̩ma le̩ de̩.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼawo le̩ li, eyo̩ ku ma yo̩ i nana tabale̩.

Tak abu ku ma mugudu tef unyi ma fʼo̩ma kekele le̩ li kpai Me̩ri, iye-wñ, oñ ma lewa bʼane̩ ma adojikane̩ ñw u. Taku ma mʼe̩wñ akoko-ma tu, ma kʼo̩jamalia, kpai o̩bia frankinse̩ns kpai otulale mur chʼowñ ele.
Oñ abu kʼO̩jo̩ fʼuka je̩ ñwu ma ef o̩na ku ma we edabi nyʼugbo He̩ro̩d, ma mudakubi le o̩na omune̩ tʼane̩-ma.

Abu ku ma la kwʼo̩mo̩ le, me̩ go, onuche̩ Onduʼka kwotejugede ñwu lose̩f ef o̩na kʼi na, i kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ mʼo̩ma kekele kpai iye-wñ ko kʼe̩ ra nyʼIjipti, kʼe̩ dʼo̩mo̩ gbogbo nyʼe̩gba kʼu naka ñw e̩; todu He̩ro̩d ache kʼi tene oji o̩ma kekele le̩ kʼi mʼu du kpa tinyo̩.
Tak i kwane̩, i mʼo̩ma kekele le̩ kpai iye-wñ ko odu, oñ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼIjipti,
i la dʼo̩mo̩ gbogbo taku He̩ro̩d ku; todu kʼe-kʼOndu ka lef akache̩ le̩ ki che̩ kakini, Ijipti oñ u do̩ O̩ma-mi kwo wa.

E̩gbale̩ abu ki He̩ro̩d li ka kʼamakuli le̩ chʼo uke̩, i ke̩do̩fulu nana, oñ i fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nakpa amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ku ma jo̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m kpai abo adogbe adogbe-wñ chaka, ku ma bi akwʼo̩do̩ meji gbogbo wʼe̩gbale̩, alu kʼiko-wñ de̩ kʼi fʼili-wñ gwa obie̩ ugbo amakuli le̩.
E̩gbale̩ e̩wñ ku ma ka lefu Je̩re̩maya, akache̩, le̩, che̩ kakini,
Ma gbʼomuko̩la Rama,
Ama abu ki He̩ro̩d leku, me̩ go, onuche̩ Onduʼka kwotejugede ñwu Jose̩f ef o̩na kʼi na Ijipti, i kakini,
kwane̩, kʼe̩ mʼo̩ma kekele le̩ kpʼiye-wñ ko kʼe̩ lo tʼane̩ Israe̩l; todu abo ku ma feju oji o̩ma kekele le̩ leku me̩.
Tak i kwane̩, i mʼo̩ma kekele le̩ kpʼiye-wñ ko, oñ i lewa ane̩ Israe̩l.
Abu kʼi la gbo̩ ka kʼArke̩laus jʼonu Judia koji He̩ro̩d ata-wñ, i railo enyʼo̩mo̩. Tak abu kʼO̩jo̩ juka ñw u ef o̩na kʼi na, i mudabi tʼo̩wo̩ʼka oj ane̩ Galili.
Oñ i lewa fʼodo do ef ewo ku ma do̩ ko̩ Nazare̩t, todu kʼe-ku ma ka lef amakache̩ kʼi che̩, kakini.
Oñ adiko le̩ Jo̩n, kʼi ache baptism, lewa atakoya ef ajetachi ane̩ Judia.
I kakini, Me̩ ribeda, todu ojane̩ e-efojale me̩rʼo̩wo̩ me̩.
Todu owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ lef Aizaya akache̩, kakini,
Oñ e̩wñ ki Jo̩n le̩ ko bʼo̩la ma, ma nʼedudu inyakulumi hi, i la dʼaño̩ lʼago-wñ de; e̩wñ kʼi aje̩ chʼakubaliba kpʼiño̩ oko.
E̩gbale̩ abo Je̩rusale̩m kpʼabo Judia kpʼabo kʼi dab ohimini Jo̩rdan jo̩ chaka kwodufu nyʼugbo-wñ.
Oñ i nache ma baptism ef ohimini Jo̩rdan abu ku ma jʼagbalu adure-ma.
Ama abu kʼi li ka kʼabo Farisi kpʼabo Sadiusi wewe awʼugbo baptism le̩, i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩, amato̩ olijo! E̩ne̩ juka ñwu me̩ ku me̩ ra bʼuwe̩do̩ kʼi ache kʼi wa te̩?
Todule̩ ame̩ ki rʼe̩ro kʼi chʼeju ibe erida.
Me̩ ki we eka ef ume̩ kakini, Ata-wa kʼa ne̩ chʼEbraham; todu eka naka ñwu me̩-i, kakini, O̩jo̩ neke kʼamo̩ma kwane̩ ñwu Ebraham kwef okuta ki jo̩-i.
O̩kanyi tʼane̩pe̩te̩ ugbo ili oli ki jo̩-i me̩; oñ ma alʼoli du kʼi ma rʼe̩ro o̩me̩me̩le̩ n wane̩ ku ma ko rikpolo tʼef una.
Omi ache me̩ baptism ef omiofo tef ibe erida, mana. Iñmi E̩ne̩ ki muda dʼubi-mi awa chetʼe-mi le, u bebʼe̩da e̩re̩-wñ jo̩ kʼu nane̩ n. Owñ le̩ ache me̩ baptism ef Afu Kiafo̩ kpʼuna.
O̩fe̩fe̩ ufo̩ka-wñ dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ me̩, i la ache kʼajita ugwo̩ka-wñ ki fe̩ hiolo. Tak i ayʼo̩ka-wñ nyʼaka; i muda anʼuna ki ma jʼalu n gu igbogbo-wñ jo.
E̩gbale̩ Jisus kwo Galili lewa eti Jo̩rdan ugbo Jo̩n kʼi chʼo baptism.
Jo̩n muda che kʼi kpo̩na nyʼu, i kakini, Omi kʼeku aku mi kʼuwe̩ ki che mi baptism, uwe̩ ñʼawʼugbo mi?
Ama Jisus dohi ñw u kakini, E̩ je̩ abe̩le̩ ta; todu abe̩le̩ i cheju-wñ kʼa fʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa du chekpa. Tak i je̩.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼiJisus che baptism, ababale̩ i mute̩gu kwef omi; me̩ la go, efojale muchite̩, oñ i li Afu O̩jo̩ abu kʼi agwo̩ru awa dab ikede, kʼi la awʼoji-wñ.
Me̩ la go, omuko̩laʼka ka kwʼefojale kakini, Owñ-i chʼO̩ma ufe̩do̩-mi e-kʼu fʼuyo̩-mi li ef uwñ.
E̩gbale̩ Afu mʼiJisus du le tef aje̩tachi kʼAbulumone̩ ki jʼo̩ ma.
Tak abu kʼi jialu o̩jo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, kpʼodu o̩gbo̩ meji, ubi le̩ ebi kwokpʼo̩.
Tak ajone̩ma le̩ te̩ wa ka ñw u, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩, e̩ ka ñw okuta ki jo̩-i ki mud uje̩wñ.
I muda dohi kakini, I che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
E̩gbale̩ Abulumone̩ mʼowñ du le tef ewo kiafo̩ le̩, oñ i mʼu du gugu ochigene unyi O̩jo̩,
oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩, mʼo̩la-we̩ du ro̩ tane̩; todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, I laño̩ che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Abulumone̩ le̩ ño̩ dabi mʼowñ du le tʼoj uwo kʼi gbo̩gba tabale, oñ i mʼojane̩, ojane̩ ile̩-i du du ñʼo̩, kpʼojima-wñ.
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ leane̩ adojikane̩ ñwu mi, nakʼe̩wñ-i du ñw e̩.
E̩gbale̩ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Lo we̩, Setan! todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
E̩gbale̩ Abulumone̩ tʼowñ no̩; me̩ la go, amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ mute̩wa ache e̩wñ ñw u.
Oñ abu kʼi gbo̩ ka ku ma mʼiJo̩n du ñwu ma mu, i mudawubi tʼiGalili.
Tak i kwo Nazare̩t wa gugu Kapanahum kʼi dʼo̩lʼohimini, ojane̩ Ze̩biulo̩n kpai Naftali;
todu kʼo̩la ku ma ka lef Aizaya akache̩ kʼi che̩ kakini,
Ane̩ Ze̩biulo̩n kpʼane̩ Naftali,
amone̩ du ku ma te̩te̩ gugu ef e̩chubi le̩ fʼugane̩ lile li me̩;
Akwe̩gba le̩ Jisus chane̩ etakoya, i nakakini, Me̩ ribeda; todu ojane̩ e-efojale me̩ro̩wo̩ me̩.
Oñ abu kʼi alule̩ etʼohimini Galili, i fʼamo̩maye meji li, Saimo̩n ku ma do̩ ko̩ iPita kpʼAnduru, o̩maye-wñ; ma jʼarʼiga ef ohimini; todu ma chʼamekwuji.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ lewa tʼumi ubi, oñ nako me̩ chʼamekwuji ku me̩ mʼamone̩.
Ababale̩ ma la tʼiga-ma no̩, ma tʼo̩ ubi.
Oñ abu kʼi kwʼo̩mo̩ alo i fʼamo̩maye meji omune̩ li, Jeme̩s e-Ze̩be̩di kpai Jo̩n o̩maye-wñ; ma jʼef o̩ko̩ kpai Ze̩be̩di ata-ma añwʼiga-ma che. I la fʼuma do̩.
Ababale̩ ma la tʼo̩ko̩ kpʼata-ma no̩, oñ ma tʼo̩ ubi.
Taku Jisus fʼo̩gbo̩ ane̩ Galili du le ako̩ ma e̩wñ ef unyi ujeju-ma. I la nʼakoya Uche̩nyo̩ Ojane̩ ata, kpʼo̩ga du kpʼe̩gbo du ef amone̩ le̩ ache kpa.

Tak inabali-wñ ledufu nyʼo̩gbo̩ ane̩ Siria du, oñ ma mʼabo ku ma nʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ o̩la ko wʼugbo-wñ, e-kʼo̩ga ojoji ojoji kpʼuwa mʼuma ne̩ gaga, kpʼabo ku ma nʼebili kpʼabo ku ma chʼajukpakpa kpʼabo̩ga ekuto̩la; oñ i fʼo̩ga-ma che.
O̩wo̩ amone̩ lile la kwo Galili kpai De̩kapo̩lis kpai Je̩rusale̩m kpai Judia kpʼejudaba Jo̩rdan wa darʼo̩ ubi.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ li, i mute̩gu nyʼibe̩ uwo; abu kʼi kwoguguane̩, amako̩che̩-wñ la wʼugbo-wñ.
Oñ i mʼalu-wñ chi nako̩ ma e̩wñ kakini:
Ame̩nale ef afu gbede, todu ojane̩ e-efojale chʼe-ma.
Abo ku ma daido̩ gbede, todu ma anyʼuma e̩do̩.
Abo ku ma de̩ chikimi gbede, todu ama aje̩ ane̩ ile̩ e̩wñ ogu.
Abo kʼebi kpʼalugbe̩ e̩wñ o̩kpakpa akpa ma gbede, todu efu-ma ako̩.
Abo ku ma li ejumomi one̩ gbede, todu ma ali ma ejumomi.
Abo kʼe̩do̩-ma de̩ hiolo gbede, todu ama afʼeju-ma dʼO̩jo̩.
Abo ku ma bʼuja gbede, todu ma ado̩ ma ko̩ amo̩ma O̩jo̩.
Abo ku ma doli ma tod o̩kpakpa gbede, todu ojane̩ e-efojale chʼe-ma.
Me̩ gbede, e̩gba du ku ma kicha ñwu me̩, ku ma doli me̩ ku ma laño̩ ka e̩wñ bibi du nyʼume̩ olemi ofo todu mi.
Me̩ yo̩; me̩ nagwoguyo̩; todu o̩me̩ ku ma ara ñwu me̩ efojale chenana; todu abu ku ma doli amakache̩ ku ma jʼo̩gba-me̩ le̩ de̩.
Ame̩ chʼomu ane̩-ile̩. I muda che̩wñ kʼomu mud o̩gbo̩, e̩wñ ma adu tʼef uwñ kʼi ñʼarinyo̩ ta? I nyo̩ ku ma nʼache e̩wñ ge̩ n, chai ekorinyo̩ ma akorinyo̩ o̩do̩da kʼamone̩ ki fʼu kpetili mʼane̩.
Ame̩ chʼugane̩ ile̩. Ewo ki dʼoj uwo jʼamaja n.
Ma la adʼuna tʼagege ku ma dʼu gugu of agba n, chai oj akete; tak i amʼane̩ ne̩ ñw abo du ku ma jʼef unyi le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ugane̩-me̩ ki namʼane̩ ne̩ o̩gba amone̩, todu ku ma ki li uko̩lo̩-me̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩, ku ma la dʼojima ñw Ata-me̩ kʼi dʼefojale.
Me̩ ki nʼibe ka kʼu wa kʼu fʼaba o̩lo̩da kpʼo̩la amakache̩ la n; u lewa kʼu la n, chai todu kʼu che kʼi jo̩ kpa.
Todu, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Gbogbo tak efojale kpʼane̩-ile̩ ki lale rinyo̩, ina-wñ re okate kpʼomi-wñ re okate alale rinyo̩ bʼo̩lo̩da te̩ n, gbogbo tak o̩chaka-wñ wache.

Todule̩ e̩ne̩ du ki fʼo̩la uko̩ ki nya-i okate la, kʼi laño̩ kʼamone̩ abe̩le̩, ma adʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ko̩ e̩ne̩ ki nya ojane̩ e-efojale; e̩ne̩ du ki muda che teju-wñ kʼi laño̩ dʼu ko̩ one̩, ma adʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ko̩ e̩ne̩ lile ojane̩ efojale.
Todu eka naka ñwu me̩-i kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼo̩kpakpa e-me̩ ma tʼe-amako̩takada kpʼe-amiFarisi le ge̩-ge̩ n, i nʼugbo du ku me̩ ñʼagudu tʼojane̩ e-efojale n.
Ame̩ gbo̩ ku ma ka ñw abo igbele kakini, E̩ ki kpone̩ n; e̩ne̩ du kʼi la kpone̩, ajo̩ i fa bʼo̩la-wñ ma le̩.

Omi muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼawe̩do̩ rʼo̩maye-wñ, fʼajo̩ fa bʼo̩la-wñ ma me̩; e̩ne̩ du kʼi la ka ñw o̩maye-wñ kakini, Uwe̩ e̩nidada, fʼo̩la abo̩hiala fa bʼo̩la-wñ ma le̩; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi kakini, Uwe̩ e̩ne̩fule̩fu! i fʼuña ubie̩ e-una fa bʼo̩la-wñ ma me̩.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ anʼe̩wñ ele-we̩ wa kʼe̩ dʼu tʼoj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩, o̩mo̩ tak e̩ rewa ka kʼo̩maye-we̩ nʼo̩la kpʼuwe̩,
mak e̩ tʼe̩wñ ele-we̩ no̩ o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ o̩mo̩, oñ e̩ lo kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ kpʼo̩maye-we̩ ño̩ru ejodudu, tak e̩ wa kʼe̩ dʼe̩wñ ele-we̩ wa che.
E̩ nachʼali e̩nyo̩ kpʼe̩no̩la-we̩ piopio abu kʼuwe̩ kpʼowñ jʼej o̩na ale, tode̩gba kʼe̩no̩la-we̩ amʼuwe̩ du ñw akajo̩ kʼakajo̩ la amʼuwe̩ du ñw idegeli, ku ma laño̩ mʼuwe̩ du rikpolo tef unyiuga;
ami, naka ñwe̩, inʼugbo du kʼe̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu n gbogbo tak e̩ fʼo̩me̩ anini otitala ra.
Ame̩ gbo̩ ku ma kakini, E̩ ki tene o̩ya e̩ne̩ omune̩ n.
Omi muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼi agʼonobule̩ kʼe̩ño̩-wñ dʼe̩do̩-wñ, mu te̩ mʼo̩ ef e̩do̩-wñ me̩.

I la che̩wñ kʼeju-we̩ e-awo̩to̩ fʼe̩ dahi, mʼu ne̩ kʼe̩ dʼu rikpolo tinyo̩ bʼo̩la-we̩ te̩; todu i nʼile ñw e̩ kʼe̩wñ año̩la-we̩ʼka kʼi lenyo̩, ku ma la we edʼo̩gbo̩ año̩la-we̩ du rikpoʼo̩ tef uña ubie̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ awo̩to̩ fʼe̩ dahi, mʼu ko̩da kʼe̩ dʼu rikpolo tinyo̩ bʼo̩la-we̩ te̩; todu i nʼile ñw e̩ kʼe̩wñ año̩la-we̩ʼka kʼi lenyo̩ kʼo̩gbo̩ año̩la-we̩ chaka kʼi we elo tef uña ubie̩.
Ma laño̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki adʼo̩ya-wñ tinyo̩ kʼi namʼo̩takada e̩daru du ñw u;
omi muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼoya-wñ tinyo̩, ki ma chʼutodu abutabu-wñ n, mak owñ chʼe̩wñ kʼi ajo̩ko̩. E̩ne̩ du kʼi la gbʼe̩ne̩ ku ma du tinyo̩ chʼo̩ya, o̩ya one̩ i te̩mʼo̩ le̩.
Omune̩ de̩ ge̩: ame̩ gbo̩ ku ma ka ñw abo igbele kakini, E̩ ki ge̩bo̩ o̩lemi n, e̩wñ kʼe̩ ka kʼe̩ kpe̩bo̩ nʼo̩la-we̩ le̩, e̩ ki la che ñw Ondu.
Ama omi aka ñwu me̩ kakini, Me̩ ki ge̩bo̩ du n, i chaka chʼe-efojale, todabu kʼi chʼede O̩jo̩,
i chaka chʼane̩-ile̩-i, todabu ki chʼe̩wñ kʼi akʼe̩re̩ no, i chaka chʼe-Je̩rusale̩m, todabu kʼi chʼewo Onu lile.
E̩ ki la gʼoji-we̩ n, todabu kʼuwe̩ ma neke che kʼiloji-wñʼka kʼi mud efufu n, uwe̩ aneke che kʼi mud edudu n.
Ama o̩la kʼe̩ ka kʼi chʼEba, eba; O̩da, o̩da; e-du kʼi tʼe-i le kwʼugbo e̩ne̩bibi le̩.
Ame̩ gbo̩ ku ma kakini, Eju akoji eju, enyi la akoji enyi.
Omi muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Me̩ ki ko̩wo̩de kpʼe̩ne̩bibi le̩ n; ama e̩ne̩ du kʼi akʼuwe̩ awo eti awo̩to̩, e̩ ño̩ mʼe-ekeji rida te̩ ñw u ge̩;
i la che̩wñ ki dʼe̩ne̩ʼka e̩do̩ kʼi dʼuwe̩ ajo̩ kʼi mʼafe̩-we̩ gba, e̩ ki ño̩ tʼotogbo no̩ ñw u kpo̩fo̩ ge̩;
e̩ne̩ kʼi la achʼe̩ atʼe̩ne̩ le kʼe̩ lebʼo̩ imailiʼka, e̩ lebʼo̩ eji.
E̩ne̩ kʼi bi we̩ e̩wñ, e̩ nadʼu ñw u; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi me̩ e̩wñ ugbo we̩, e̩ ki dubigbʼo̩ n.
Ame̩ gbo̩ ku ma kakini, E̩ ki fe̩do̩ ekeji-we̩, kʼe̩ la chulaka e̩nebi-we̩.
Omi muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki fe̩do̩ ame̩nebi-me̩, me̩ ki la chadua tod abo ku ma doli me̩,
todu kʼame̩ ki mud amo̩ma Ata-me̩ kʼi dʼefojale; todu i aje̩ ñw olu-wñ tadufu abʼoj ame̩ne̩bibi kpʼame̩ne̩nyo̩ ma, omi-wñ la alo̩ bʼoji ame̩no̩kpakpa kpai ame̩nuji ma.
Todu iche̩wñ ku me̩ fe̩do̩ abo ku ma fe̩do̩ me̩, e̩wñ chʼuro̩me̩ ku me̩ ane̩? I chaka chʼamagbo̩kane̩ onugo chʼe-le̩ n?
I la che̩wñ kʼi chʼamo̩maye-me̩ kate oñ ame̩ agwa ma, e̩wñ chʼache tule-me̩? I chaka chʼabo uche̩ichi onugo chʼe-le̩ n?
Todule̩ ame̩ ki chʼabo ku ma mufu kpa alu kʼAta-me̩ kʼi dʼefojale chʼE̩ne̩ ki mufu kpa.
Me̩ mʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩ ku me̩ ki we eche e̩wñ o̩kpakpa-me̩ eju amone̩ ku ma go; cho̩kpo̩ni ame̩ anʼuro̩me̩ du ugbo Ata-me̩ kʼi dʼefojale n.

Todule̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ dʼe̩wñ chʼele ejumomi, e̩ ki fʼo̩kakachi o̩gba-we̩, alu kʼame̩nayechi ache ef unyi ujeju kpʼej o̩na, todu kʼamone̩ ki dʼojima ñwu ma n. Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ma mʼuro̩me̩-ma gba kpa me̩.
I muda chʼuwe̩, e̩gba kʼe̩ dʼe̩wñ chʼele ejumomi, e̩ ki je̩ ñw o̩wo̩-we̩ awohi kʼi ma e̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ awo̩to̩ ache le̩ n,
todu kʼele ejumomi-we̩ eche kʼi nadʼef umaja; tak Ata-we̩ kʼi agane̩ ef umaja adʼakoji-wñ ñw e̩.

Oñ e̩gba ku me̩ chadua, ame̩ ki dʼalu kʼame̩nayechi de̩ n; todu edago ef unyi ujeju kpʼugwe̩ta o̩na achadua mʼuma e̩do̩, todu ku ma ki tejugede ñw amone̩. Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ma mʼuro̩me̩-ma gba kpa me̩.
Ama e̩gba kʼuwe̩ achadua, e̩ mugudu tef unyi-we̩ ejefu, tak abu kʼe̩ fʼo̩na re, e̩ nachadua ñw Ata-we̩ kʼi dʼef umaja; tak Ata-we̩ kʼi agane̩ ef umaja adʼakoji-wñ ñw e̩.
E̩gba ku me̩ la chadua, me̩ ki kekale̩ ofo dabalu kʼabo uche̩ichi ache n; todu ama do̩ kakini, Ef o̩la ku ma ka jiji le̩ oñ O̩jo̩ agbʼomu-ma.
Todule̩, ame̩ ki dab ama n; todu Ata-me̩ chema eku e̩wñ kʼi aku me̩ o̩gba taku me̩ biʼu.
Todule̩, abu ku me̩ achadua le de̩ kakini:
Ojane̩-we̩ ki lewa,
Dʼukpe̩ uje̩wñ o̩jo̩ʼka ñw a eñini;
E̩ la tʼo̩me̩ kʼa je̩ no̩ ñw a,
E̩ ki ko wa nyʼef ajama n,
Todu iche̩wñ ku me̩ tʼuñwanane̩ amone̩ no̩ ñwu ma, Ata-me̩ e-efojale ñʼatʼe-me̩ no̩ ñwu me̩ ge̩,
i muda che̩wñ ku me̩ ma tʼuñwanane̩ amone̩ no̩ ñwu ma n, Ata-me̩ la atʼuñwanane̩ e-me̩ no̩ ñwu me̩ n.

E̩gba ku me̩ la ajialu, me̩ ki bʼeju nyʼo̩wo̩ dab ame̩nayechi le̩ n; todu ma che kʼeju-ma ki kpa todu kʼi tejugede ñw amone̩ ka ku ma ajialu le̩. Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ama mʼuro̩me̩-ma gba kpa me̩.
Ama e̩gba kʼuwe̩ ajialu, e̩ dʼekpo kuru oji-we̩, kʼe̩ la fʼeju-we̩ gwe̩,
todu kʼalu kʼe̩ ji kʼi we etejugede ñw amone̩, chai ñw Ata-we̩ kʼi dʼef umaja; tak Ata-we̩ kʼi agane̩ ef umaja adʼakoji-wñ ñw e̩.
Me̩ ki kʼe̩wñ akoko maja ñw o̩la-me̩ ane̩ ile̩ ugbo kʼojudu kpʼete̩kala aje̩ rinyo̩ n, kpʼugbo kʼamajoji agwagudu ku ma aji.
Ama me̩ muda kʼe̩wñ akoko maja ñw o̩la-me̩ efojale, ugbo kʼojudu kpʼete̩kala ma aje̩ n, kpʼugbo kʼamajoji ma gwagudu n, ma la joji o̩mo̩ n.
Todu, ugbo kʼe̩wñ akoko-we̩ de̩, o̩mo̩ oñ e̩do̩-we̩ la ade̩ kpo̩fo̩.
Agege e-año̩la chʼeju. Todule̩, iche̩wñ kʼeju-we̩ kad ugboʼkate, mak o̩gbo̩ año̩la-we̩ du achʼugane̩;
i muda che̩wñ kʼeju-we̩ che bibi, o̩gbo̩ año̩la-we̩ du achubi. Todule, iche̩wñ kʼugane̩ kʼi dʼef uwe̩ chʼe̩chubi, mak e̩chubi le̩ gbe̩!

I nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi neke chuko̩lo̩ adu ñw odu meji n; todu i ma chaka chulaka oka kʼi fe̩do̩ ekeji n, mak i amanyʼoka o̩la kʼi la adʼekeji rʼo̩che̩ke̩ne̩. Ame̩ neke chʼadu ñw O̩jo̩, ku me̩ laño̩ chʼadu ñw o̩ko̩ n.

Lef e-le̩ naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki dejiji tod onugo-me̩, e̩wñ ku me̩ aje̩ kpʼe̩wñ ku me̩ añmo̩ n, kpai tod año̩la-me̩, e̩wñ ku me̩ adu tʼo̩ n. Onugo one̩ tʼuje̩wñ le n? Año̩la la tʼe̩wñ ku ma du tʼo̩ le n?
Ame̩ ki kejurʼame̩we̩ ojale, ma gbe̩ e̩wñ n, ma la ja n, ma ya nyʼaka n; Ata-me̩ kʼi dʼefojale muda akʼe̩wñ ñwu ma je̩. Ame̩ chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ tʼuma le n?
E̩ne̩ la dʼef ame̩ ku me̩ dejiji le̩, kʼi neke bʼohibo̩woʼka tʼo̩gba-wñ?
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ la dejiji e̩wñ ku me̩ adu tʼo̩la? Me̩ ki tejane̩ alu kʼo̩la ododo oko de̩, alu kʼi aya; i achakanya uko̩lo̩ n; i la achʼowu n;
ama naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I chaka che So̩lo̩mo̩n ef ojima-wñ chaka i kʼe̩wñ bʼo̩la ma dab oka ef e̩wñ-i n.
I la che̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ akʼe̩wñ abe̩le̩ tʼo̩la egbe oko, e-kʼi do̩mo̩ eñini, ku ma la kʼo ro̩ tef igbeli o̩na, i chʼe-me̩ tule nana n? Ame̩, abe̩do̩ ekono re.
Todule̩, ame̩ ki we edejiji kakini, E̩wñ a aje̩? abe̩k e̩wñ a añmo̩? abe̩k e̩wñ a ako bʼo̩la ma?
Todu abo uche̩ichi jʼafeju e̩wñ-i du; todu Ata-me̩ e-efojale chema ka kʼeku e̩wñ le̩ du aku me̩.
Me̩ ki la feju Ojane̩ e-wñ kpʼo̩kpakpa-wñ ejodudu, taku ma akʼe̩wñ le̩ du manyʼu ñwu me̩.
Todule̩ me̩ ki dejiji tod o̩jo̩ o̩na n. Todu, o̩jo̩ o̩na nʼejiji o̩la-wñ. E̩bie̩ne̩ ki de̩ eñini bʼeñini jo̩.
Me̩ ki kajo̩ n, tode̩gba ku ma kajo̩ me̩.
Todu ajo̩ ku me̩ du kajo̩ one̩, e-le̩ ma adʼu kajo̩ me̩, oñ e̩ñwa ku me̩ du ñwa e-one̩, e-le̩ ma adu ñwa e-me̩.
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ la go e̩wñ re kʼi dʼeju o̩maye-we̩, kʼe̩ ma la dibetʼigboli kʼi dʼeju e-we̩ n?
Abile kʼuwe̩ aka ñw o̩maye-we̩ kakini, To̩no̩ kʼu mʼe̩wñ re kʼi dʼeju-we̩ le̩ du tinyo̩? E̩ go, igboli la dʼeju e-we̩.
Uwe̩ e̩nayechi, e̩ ki mʼigboli le̩ du tinyo̩ kwef eju e-we̩ ejodudu, e̩gbale̩ tak uwe̩ gane̩ nyo̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ dʼe̩wñ re tinyo̩ kwef eju o̩maye-we̩.
Me̩ ki dʼe̩wñ kiafo̩ ñw amabia n; me̩ ki la kʼako̩ efufu ro̩ jʼane̩ o̩gba amoko n, tode̩gba ku ma nʼe̩re̩-ma fʼu kpetili mane̩, ku ma la arida afʼuwe̩ na.
Me̩ bi, ma la adu ñwu me̩; me̩ feju, me̩ ali; me̩ dʼo̩wo̩ kʼo̩na, ma la abi ñwu me̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi abi, agba; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi afeju, ali; ma la abi o̩na ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi adʼo̩wo̩ kʼo̩na.
Abe̩k e̩ne̩ dʼef ume̩ kʼo̩ma-wñ abiʼu akala, kʼi adʼokuta ñw u?
Abe̩k i biʼu e̩ja, i adʼejo ñw u?
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼame̩ ku me̩ chʼame̩ne̩bibi chema e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ edu ñw amo̩ma-me̩, Ata-me̩ kʼi dʼefojale adʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ ñw abo ku ma bi owñ tule n?
Todule̩, e̩wñ du kʼi che kʼi dʼume̩ e̩do̩ kʼamone̩ ki che ñwu me̩, mak abe̩le̩ ame̩ ki ño̩ che ñw amone̩ kpo̩fo̩: todu e-le̩ chʼoji o̩lo̩da kpʼo̩la amakache̩.
Me̩ mugudu lʼalaku fiili le̩ wa; todabu kʼalaku kʼi adʼone̩ le tef ulenyo̩ ehenʼula, o̩na-wñ la chenʼabe̩, oñ abo ku ma jʼagudu lef e-le̩ chewewe.
Todu, alaku kʼi adʼone̩ le tef iñmi de̩ fiili, o̩na-wñ la chʼekpamate̩, oñ abo ku ma liʼu de̩ ke̩.
Me̩ mʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩ tod amakache̩ olemi ku ma le ef e̩wñ kʼamala ako bʼo̩la ma awʼugbo me̩, ejefu-ma chʼo̩gu kʼi chʼajefu.
Ugbo e̩ro-ma oñ me̩ ama ma. Ma kʼe̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma o̩lʼoli ikeke? abe̩k e̩ro o̩gbaikolo o̩la e̩kaño̩?
Abe̩le̩ oli e̩nyo̩ du arʼe̩ro o̩me̩me̩le̩, oli e̩che̩ muda arʼe̩ro bibi.
Oli e̩nyo̩ neke rʼe̩ro bibi n, oli e̩che̩ la neke rʼe̩ro o̩me̩me̩le̩ n.
Oli du kʼi ma rʼe̩ro o̩me̩me̩le̩ n ma alʼo̩ wane̩, ku ma mʼu du ro̩ tef una.
Todule̩ ugbo e̩ro-ma oñ me̩ ama ma.
I chʼinade̩de̩ one̩ kʼi aka ñwu mi kakini, Ondu, Ondu, agudu tʼojane̩ efojale n, chai e̩ne̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ kʼi dʼAta-mi e-efojale e̩do̩.
Iko le̩ amone̩ wewe aka ñwu mi kakini, Ondu, Ondu, i chʼef odu-we̩ oñ a kache̩ n? I chʼef odu-we̩ oñ a nʼamebili dufu n? I laño̩ chʼef odu-we̩ oñ a chʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu wewe n?
Ama e̩gba le̩ natʼoj omu ñwu ma kakini, U ma me̩ mama ta n: me̩ kwo bʼumi te̩, ame̩ amachuko̩lo̩ ugbite̩re̩-i.
Todule̩, e̩ne̩ du kʼi agbʼo̩la-mi-i kʼi la ache, ma adʼu wawe e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi nʼibe, kʼi fʼunyi-wñ ko̩ oj apata;
tak omi ojale mugulo̩ wa, oñ omi lile lewa, afu laño̩ ju i lewa abʼunyi le̩ ma, i la wane̩ n; todu ma dʼe̩re̩-wñ nyʼane̩ oj apata le̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-mi-i tʼo̩ eti kʼi ma la che n, ma adʼu wawe e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e̩fule̩fu kʼi fʼunyi-wñ ko̩ oj e̩lanyi;
tak omi ojale mugulo̩ wa, oñ omi lile lewa, afu la ju, oñ i lewa anʼunyi le̩, tak i leane̩, uwane̩-wñ la tabale!
Oñ i lewa tʼe̩gba ki Jisus fʼo̩la le̩ ka kpoji, awuwu fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ mu noj uko̩ o̩la-wñ:
todu i ako̩ ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩da, i la dab amako̩takada e-ma n.
Oñ abu kʼi mugwo̩rʼuwo le̩ tane̩, o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile rʼo̩ ubi.
Me̩ la go, e̩no̩ga ikpemuteʼka te̩wa adojikane̩ ñw u, i kakini, Ondu, i dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ e̩ neke je̩ ñw o̩la-mi kʼi fe̩.
Tak i fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala, i dʼu kadʼo, i kakini, I dʼumi e̩do̩, o̩la-we̩ ki fe̩ ke. Tak ababale̩ ikpemute-wñ kwo hiolo.
Taku Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Go, e̩ ki ka ñw e̩ne̩ du n; e̩ muda lo, kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ ñʼatama kʼe̩ la dʼe̩wñ ele ku Mose̩s ñwa le̩ wa kʼi gbibenu ñwu ma.
Oñ abu kʼi agudu wa Kapanahum agboji amisoja ogume̩luʼka dufu wʼugbo-wñ agbo̩ko̩bʼo̩,
oñ i kakini, Ondu, imo̩to̩-mi dachi ef unyi acho̩ga e̩kuto̩la, i ali uwa bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩.
I ka ñw u kakini, Omi awa achʼo̩ga-wñ kpa.
Agboji amisoja le̩ muda dohi ñw u kakini, Ondu, u bo̩jo̩ kʼe̩ gudu tef unyi-mi n. Chai o̩la e̩ ka kate, tak o̩ga imo̩to̩-mi atakpa.
Todu omi onugo chʼe̩ne̩ kʼu dʼef o̩da, kʼu nʼamisoja o̩wo̩-mi, oñ naka ñw e-i kakini, Lo, i la alo; oñ naka ñw ekeji kakini, lewa, i la awa; u la aka ñw adu-mi kakini, Chʼe-i, i la ache.
Oñ abu ki Jisus gbo̩, i kwoyaye, oñ i ka ñw abo ku ma rʼo̩ ubi kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, U li e̩do̩ e̩ko̩no abe̩i ugbo e̩ne̩ du ef abo Israe̩l mama ta n.
U la aka ñwu me̩ kakini, Amone̩ wewe akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu kpʼo̩we̩ olane̩ wa achʼeku kʼane̩ manyʼEbraham kpʼAise̩k kpai Jeko̩b ojane̩ e-efojale,
ma muda akʼamo̩ma ojane̩ le̩ onugo rikpolo tef e̩chubi o̩do̩da: o̩mo̩ aku ero̩ kpʼenyi elo̩ ade̩.
Taku Jisus ka ñw agboji amisoja le̩ kakini, E̩ nalo we̩, alu kʼe̩ ke̩do̩no, i ki dʼabe̩le̩ ñw e̩. Oñ o̩ga imo̩to̩-wñ takpa e̩re̩re̩ le̩.
Tak abu ki Jisus lewʼef unyi Pita, i li iye o̩ya-wñ kʼi dachi, kʼafu akpʼo̩;
tak i dʼo̩wo̩ kad o̩wo̩-wñ oñ afu le̩ tʼo̩ no̩. Tak i kwane̩ oñ i chane̩ eche e̩wñ ñw u.
Oñ abu kʼane̩ lo̩ ma mʼamone̩ wewe ku ma chʼebili ko wʼugbo-wñ, tak i nʼuko̩la okate nʼamafu le̩ dufu, i ño̩ fʼo̩ga abo du kʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ dʼo̩la-ma che kpa.
Todu kʼe-ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ lef Aizaya, akache̩ ki che̩ kakini, Owñ o̩to̩to̩la-wñ mʼe̩gbo-wa gba, i laño̩ gbʼo̩ga-wa ne̩.
Oñ abu ki Jisus li kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ donyʼu, i je̩ ñwu ma kwʼo̩mo̩ nyʼudaba.
Tak ako̩takadaʼka te̩wa ka ñw u kakini, Akone̩ e̩wñ, natʼe̩ ubi ugbo du kʼe̩ nyi.
Oñ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Amajo chenʼura e-ma, ame̩we̩ ojale la nʼunyi, O̩ma One̩ muda nʼugbo kʼi adʼoji-wñ te̩ n.
Tak e̩nomune̩ ojoji ef amako̩che̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, je̩ ñwu mi nyʼaji ata-mi ejodudu.
Taku Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Tumi ubi, kʼe̩ la tʼabo ki ku no̩ ku ma ji abo e-ma ki ku.
Tak abu kʼi kwotʼo̩ko̩, amako̩che̩-wñ rʼo̩ ubi.
Me̩ la go, afu ibi chane̩ eju ej ohimini, todabe̩le̩ akpoli naro̩ bʼo̩ko̩ le̩ ma, owñ muda alolu.
Taku ma te̩ wʼugbo-wñ ajʼo olu, ma kakini, Ondu, mʼuwa gba, elenyo̩ oñ a alenyo̩-i.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ chʼe̩nokpo? ame̩, abe̩do̩ ekono re-i. E̩gbale̩ i kwane̩ i dejurʼafu kpʼohimini, tak e̩wñ du kpade hioli.
Oñ abo le̩ kwoyaye, ma kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼe̩go̩-i kʼafu kpʼohimini agbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩ taa?
Tak e̩gba kʼi lewa ejudaba oj ane̩ abo Gadarene, abo meji ku ma nʼebili kwʼef ache̩ku wa de kpʼowñ; ma cho̩ko̩ tabale, todabe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ du gbiti bo̩jo̩ kʼi lale o̩na gu o̩mo̩ du n.
Oñ ma kwa kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-wa kpʼuwe̩, O̩ma O̩jo̩? E̩ wʼemi kʼe̩ je̩ ñw a li uwa o̩gba tak iko jo̩?
Ujo̩ amoko wewe la jʼo̩najiji ma o̩mo̩ ajije̩.
Oñ amebili le̩ gbo̩ko̩bʼowñ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ ne wa dufu, e-le̩ e̩ kpe̩ wa nyʼef ujo̩ amoko le̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ lo. Oñ abu ku ma kwo dufu ma le tef amoko le̩. Me̩ la go, o̩gbo̩ ujo̩ amoko le̩ du gwo̩ko̩ gwo̩rʼo̩gba le̩ nyʼef ohimini, oñ ma leku ef omi le̩.
Abo ku ma ne̩ ma nyʼokije̩ la ra, oñ abu ku ma kwʼo̩mo̩ nyʼef ewo, ma mʼe̩wñ le̩ du du ka, kpʼo̩la abo ku ma nʼebili le̩.
Me̩ la go, abo ewo le̩ chaka le dufu ku ma ledo Jisus: oñ abu ku ma fʼowñ li ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi kwo bʼalo̩me̩ ane̩-ma te̩.
Tak abu kʼi kwotʼo̩ko̩, i mʼomi daba oñ i lewa ewo e-wñ.
Me̩ la go, ma mʼe̩no̩ga ekuto̩la kʼi dachi oj ate̩ du wʼugbo-wñ; oñ abu ku Jisus li e̩do̩ ekono-ma, i ka ñw e̩no̩ga ekuto̩la le̩ kakini, O̩ma-mi, fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ ke; ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ ñw e̩ me̩.
Me̩ la go, amako̩takada iche̩ka ka ef uma kakini, E̩ne̩-i achakpabie̩ O̩jo̩.
Tak abu ki Jisus chema ibe ku ma kpe̩ le̩, i kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ kpʼibe bibi efe̩do̩-me̩?
Todu, kali e-kʼi tukpo̩ eka tule, kakini, Ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ ñw e̩ me̩, abe̩ku, Kwane̩ kʼe̩ lule̩?
Ama todu kʼame̩ ki ma ka kʼO̩ma One̩ nʼo̩da kʼi atʼadure no ñw one̩ ane̩-ile̩-i, e̩gbale̩ tak i ka ñw e̩no̩ga ekuto̩la le̩ kakini, Kwane̩, mʼate̩-we̩ du kʼe̩ lo tʼunyi-we̩.
Tak i kwane̩, oñ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyi-wñ.
Oñ abu kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ li ma kworailo, ma chane̩ edojima ñw O̩jo̩ kʼi dʼo̩da abe̩le̩ ñw one̩.
Tak abu ki Jisus kwʼo̩mo̩ alale, i li e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi gugu unyi ugbo ku ma gbʼo̩kane̩, odu-wñ ko̩ Matiu. Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Tʼumi ubi. Tak i kwane̩ atʼo̩ ubi.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼi chekukane̩ ef unyi, me̩ la go, amagbo̩kane̩ kpʼame̩nadure wewe lewa chekukane̩ kpai Jisus kpʼamako̩che̩-wñ.
Tak abu kʼamaFarisi li, ma ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼako̩ me̩ e̩wñ aje̩-wñ kpʼamagbo̩kane̩ kpʼame̩nadure ta?
Oñ abu kʼi gbʼo̩, i kakini, Eku obochi ku abo kʼo̩la-ma gbiti n, chai abo kʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ dʼo̩la-ma
Me̩ muda lo ku me̩ ko̩che̩ e̩wñ kʼi chʼofe, Ejumomi dʼumi e̩do̩, e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ la dʼumi e̩do̩ n; todu u wa kʼu do̩ abo̩kpakpa n, chai ame̩nadure.
E̩gbale̩ amako̩che̩ Jo̩n lewʼugbo-wñ, ma kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼawa kpʼamaFarisi ajialu, kʼamako̩che̩-we̩ la ajialu n?
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Amo̩ma unyi iyawo neke daido̩ iko kʼo̩ko̩ya dʼugbo ma? Iko̩-wñ muda awa, e̩gba ku ma adʼo̩ko̩ya kwʼugbo ma, tak e̩gbale̩ ma ajialu.
E̩ne̩ du la abʼukpo kʼi ma ro̩nyi ta n gamʼafe̩ igbele n; todu e-ku ma gamʼo̩ kʼi bʼowe-wñ ma afʼo̩la afe̩ le̩, e̩fana-wñ la abie̩ne̩ tule.

Ma la dʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ tef aiko igbele n, cho̩kpo̩ni aiko-wñ akpana; tak omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ adafo, oñ aiko-wñ achihi rinyo̩. Ma muda adʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ tef aiko emimi, tak e̩wñ meji le̩ agbane̩.
Abu kʼi nʼo̩la e̩wñ-i aka ñwu ma, go, agbojiʼka wʼugbo-wñ adojikane̩ ñw u, i kakini, O̩ma-mi onobule̩ leku faifai me̩: e̩ muda awa kʼe̩ dʼo̩wo̩ nʼo tak i adeju.
Taku Jisus kwane̩ tʼo̩ ubi, kpʼamako̩che̩-wñ ge̩.
Me̩ la go, onobule̩ʼka kʼi te̩tarʼe̩bie̩ o̩do̩ me̩gweji, lʼubi-wñ wa dʼo̩wo̩ kad eti afe̩-wñ.
Todu owñ ka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼu mʼo̩wo̩ du kad afe̩-wñ kate, i ajadu mi.
Ama abu ku Jisus murida, kʼi la fʼowñ li, i kakini, O̩ma-mi onobule̩, fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ ke; e̩do̩ e̩kono̩-we̩ fʼe̩ jadu me̩. Oñ akwʼauwa kide̩ onobule̩ mujadu.
Tak abu ki Jisus mugudu wʼef unyi agboji le̩ kʼi la go abo ku ma fʼo̩kpachine̩ kpʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma jo̩ achekuku le̩,
i kakini, Me̩ kwʼemi alo: todu o̩ma igbe̩le̩-i ku n, chai olu i ale̩-i. Taku ma dʼoke anyi rʼo oji.
Ama e̩gba ku ma mʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ko dufu, i mugudu tʼejefu agwo̩nyʼu o̩wo̩, tak igbe̩le̩ le̩ kwane̩.
Oñ uwohi-wñ kwodufu tʼo̩gbo̩ oj ane̩ le̩ du.
Tak abu ku Jisus kwʼo̩mo̩ alo, amafeju meji rʼo̩ ubi, ma nakwa kakini, Lʼuwa ejumomi, uwe̩, O̩ma Defid!
Oñ abu kʼi lewʼef unyi, amafeju le̩ wʼugbo-wñ; taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ke̩do̩no ka kʼomi neke che e̩wñ-i? Ma ka ñw u kakini, I-i, Ondu.
E̩gbale̩ i dʼo̩wo̩ kad eju-ma, i kakini, Alu kʼe̩do̩ ekono-me̩ de̩, kʼi dʼabe̩le̩ ñwu me̩.
Tak eju-ma muchi; taku Jisus fʼuma eti kakini, Me̩ nago; e̩ne̩ du ki ma n.
Ama abu ku ma ledufu ma mʼowñ du kpogo ugbo du ane̩ le̩.
Oñ abu ku ma dufu alo, me̩ go, ma mʼajialu kʼi nʼebili du wʼugbo-wñ.
Tak abu kʼi fʼebili le̩ ne dufu, ajialu le̩ kwoko̩la. Oñ o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ kwoyaye, ma kakini, E̩wñ abe̩i tejugede ane̩ Israe̩l mama ta n.
AmiFarisi muda kakini, Lugbo agboji amebili oñ i ane amebili dufu.
Oñ Jisus tale ewo ewo du kpʼadogbe adogbe; i nʼe̩wñ ako̩ ma ef unyi ujeju-ma, i la nʼakoya Uche̩nyo̩ o̩da ojane̩ le̩ ata, i laño̩ nʼo̩ga du ache kpa kpʼe̩gbo o̩la du.
Tak abu kʼi fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ li ejumomi-ma je̩ ñw u n, todabu kʼuhia ahia ma, ku ma la chʼefiatuka jo̩ dab amala ku ma ma nʼadide n.
E̩gbale̩ i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, E̩wñ ki bie̩ tʼoko-i tabale, ochochi, abuko̩lo̩-wñ muda de̩ ke̩e̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼodu e̩wñ oko-i, todu kʼi kʼabuko̩lo̩ e̩che̩ nyʼef e̩wñ oko-wñ.
Tak abu kʼi fʼamako̩che̩-wñ me̩gweji do̩ wa, i mʼo̩da amafu ki ma fe̩ n du tef o̩wo̩ e-ma, todu ku ma ki ne ma dufu, ku ma laño̩ fʼo̩ga du kpʼe̩gbo o̩la du chekpa.
Odu ame̩nukpuche̩ me̩gweji le̩ la de̩: e-ejodudu ko̩ Saimo̩n ku ma do̩ ko̩ Pita, kpʼAnduru o̩maye-wñ; kpai Jeme̩s e-Ze̩be̩di kpai Jo̩n o̩maye-wñ;
Filip kpai Barto̩lomiu; To̩mas kpai Matiu agbo̩kane̩ le̩; Jeme̩s e-Alfio̩s kpai Tadeus;
Saimo̩n abo Kenan kpai Judas Iskario̩t, e-kʼi mʼowñ du ñwu ma mu le̩.
Jisus fʼama me̩gweji kpʼuche̩ alo, abu kʼi ñwa ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ki tʼo̩na abo uche̩ichi n, me̩ ki la gudu tef ewo abo Samaria du n.
Me̩ muda nyʼugbo amala unyi Israe̩l ki lenyo̩ le̩.
Abu ku me̩ alo me̩ natakoya kakini, Ojane̩ e-efojale me̩rʼo̩wo̩ me̩.
Me̩ nafʼame̩ne̩gbo o̩la che kpa, me̩ kʼabo ki ku kwane̩, me̩ fʼame̩no̩ga ikpemute o̩la fe̩, me̩ fʼamebili ne rinyo̩; ele ofo oñ me̩ gba, ele ofo le̩ me̩ ki dʼu ñw one̩.
Me̩ ki nʼo̩ko̩ o̩jamalia kpʼajifa kpʼebije ikpa ef ugbo̩ ago-me̩ n,
me̩ ki la nʼikpa nyʼule̩-i n, me̩ ki nʼafe̩ meji n, me̩ ki nʼo̩patachi n, me̩ ki la nʼo̩kpa n; todu e̩nuko̩lo̩ chebʼuje̩wñ jo̩ ku ma du ñw u.
Ewo kpʼadogbe du ku me̩ la gudu nyʼef uwñ, me̩ natene e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼef uwñ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩; o̩mo̩ me̩ gugu gbogbo taku me̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu.
Abu ku me̩ la mugudu nyʼef unyi le̩, me̩ fʼugwa gwa.
I la che̩wñ kʼunyi le̩ chʼeju-wñ, ure̩do̩-me̩ ki lewa bʼo ma; i ma la chʼeju-wñ n, mak ure̩do̩-me̩ ki mudabi wʼugbo me̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ du ki ma agba me̩ n, kʼi ma la agbʼo̩la-me̩ n, abu ku me̩ kwʼef unyi le̩ abe̩k ewo le̩ dufu, me̩ fʼebutu e̩re̩-me̩ gbanyo̩.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I ame̩ ñw ane̩ So̩do̩m kpai Go̩mo̩ra o̩jo̩ ajo̩ tʼe-ewo le̩ le.
Go, uche̩ kʼomi akpe̩ me̩-i dabe̩ne̩ kʼamala nyʼo̩ge̩ge̩de̩ amo̩gu; todule̩ me̩ ki gbeju dab amejo, ku me̩ ki muda chʼame̩ne̩do̩foo dab ikede.
Me̩ muda mʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩ ugbo amone̩ todu ama amʼume̩ ko ñw abo o̩hiala, ma la aja me̩ ef unyi ujeju-ma;
ma ako me̩ wʼo̩gba amuto̩gba kpʼamonu todu mi, ku me̩ chʼame̩nibenu nyʼuma kpʼabo uche̩ichi.
Ama e̩gba du ku ma mʼume̩ ko ñwu ma mu, me̩ ki dejiji alu ku me̩ ale n, kpʼo̩la ku me̩ aka n. Todu ma adʼo̩la ku me̩ aka ñwu me̩ iko le̩;
todu i chʼame̩ aka n, chai Afu Ata-me̩ ako̩la ef ume̩.
O̩maye la adʼo̩maye ñwu ma kpa; ata la achʼo̩ma-wñ abe̩le̩; amo̩ma la akwane̩ tʼabo ku ma bi ma o̩la ku ma ko ma kpa.
Amone̩ du la achulaka me̩ tod odu-mi; e̩ne̩ ki muda fʼe̩do̩ lichi nyʼukpoji, ma afʼu jadu.
Oñ e̩gba du ku ma doli me̩ ef ewoʼka, me̩ ra nyʼewo omune̩: todu, ami naka ñwu me̩-i ka kʼi nʼugbo du ku me̩ afʼewo ewo Israe̩l le kpa gbogbo tak O̩ma One̩ wa n.
Ako̩che̩ tʼe̩ne̩ kʼi kʼo̩ le n, adu la tʼodu-wñ le n.
Ako̩che̩ dab e̩ne̩ kʼi kʼowñ dee, mak i nyo̩ me̩; adu ki la dab odu-wñ. Iche̩wñ ku ma dʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi ko̩ Bee̩lze̩bul, i chʼe-abunyi-wñ chʼololololo n?
Todule̩, me̩ ki railo ma n: todu, i nʼe̩wñ du ku ma dʼe̩wñ bʼo ma ku ma ma abi te̩ n, kpʼe̩wñ kʼi maja ku ma la awe ema n.
E̩wñ kʼu naka ñwu me̩ ef e̩chubi, ame̩ ki ka ef ugane̩; e̩wñ ku me̩ la gbo̩ nyʼeti, me̩ dʼu takoya ojokunyi.
Me̩ ki la railo abo ku ma kpa año̩la ku ma ma la neke kpa onugo one̩ n, i muda nyo̩ ku me̩ railo e̩ne̩ kʼi neke dʼonugo one̩ kpʼaño̩la one̩ tinyo̩ ef uña ubie̩.
Ma ta icho̩lo̩ meji iko̩bo̩ n? Okate ef uma la wʼane̩ ubi Ata-me̩ n.
I la chʼame̩, i chaka chʼiloji-me̩, okoke-wñ chenʼaluka.
Todule̩ me̩ ki we ailo era: ame̩ tʼamicho̩lo̩ wewe le.
Todule̩, e̩ne̩ du kʼi agbalu mi eju amone̩, omi ñʼagbalu e̩ne̩ le̩ eju Ata-mi kʼi dʼefojale ge̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi la araire̩ mi eju amone̩, omi ñʼaraire̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ eju Ata-mi kʼi dʼefojale ge̩.
Me̩ ki do̩ ka kʼu lewa kʼu dʼure̩do̩ ro̩ bʼane̩ ile̩ ma n: u wa kʼu dʼure̩do̩ ro̩ te̩ n, chai ugbada.
Todu u wa kʼu fʼata kpʼo̩ma, kpʼo̩monobule̩ kpʼiye-wñ, kpʼo̩ya o̩ma kpʼiye o̩ma bie̩.
Ame̩nebi one̩ la achʼabunyi-wñ onugo.
E̩ne̩ kʼi ache̩do̩ ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ tʼumi le, nyo̩ bʼumi jo̩ n. E̩ne̩ kʼi la ache̩do̩ o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k o̩ma onobule̩ tʼumi le nyo̩ bʼumi jo̩ n.
E̩ne̩ kʼi ma la mʼoli-uku-wñ du kʼi tʼumi ubi n, nyo̩ bʼumi jo̩ n.
E̩ne̩ kʼi fʼonugo oji-wñ tene ñw o̩la-wñ, mak elenyo̩ i alenyo̩. E̩ne̩ kʼi la mʼonugo oji-wñ du tinyo̩ todu mi, mak i ali.
E̩ne̩ kʼi gba me̩, mak omi i agba le̩; e̩ne̩ kʼi la gba mi, mak e̩ne̩ kʼi kpʼumi uche̩ wa i agba le̩.
E̩ne̩ kʼi gba akache̩ ukpe̩ kʼi ma ka kʼakache̩ de̩, agbʼuro̩me̩ akache̩; e̩ne̩ kʼi la agba e̩no̩kpakpa ukpe̩ kʼi ma ka kʼe̩no̩kpakpa de̩, ñʼagbʼuro̩me̩ e̩no̩kpakpa.
Oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi che kʼi dʼago omi urudo̩do̩ ñw abo o-kekele-iʼka kʼi ñmo̩ ukpe̩ kʼi ma ka kʼako̩che̩ de̩ kate— Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼuro̩me̩-wñ alenyo̩ n.
Oñ i lewatʼe̩gba ki Jisus fuñwa ñw amako̩che̩-wñ me̩gweji kpa, i kwʼo̩mo̩ le nyʼakʼamone̩ e̩wñ kpʼakoya eta ewo ewo-ma.
Oñ abu ki Jo̩n kʼi dʼef unyidudu gbʼinabali uko̩lo̩ Kraisti, i fʼuche̩ kpe̩ lʼo̩wo̩ amako̩che̩-wñ.
I ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi awa le̩? abe̩k a aneju e̩nomune̩?
Taki Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nalo ku me̩ dʼe̩wñ ku me̩ gbo̩ kpʼe̩wñ ku me̩ li-i ka ñwu Jo̩n;
amakpejufo̩ adabi agane̩, amachika alule̩, o̩la ame̩no̩ga ikpemute afe̩, amajeti la agbo̩la, ma kʼabo ki ku kwane̩, ma ño̩ jʼUche̩nyo̩ rʼame̩nale.
E̩ne̩ kʼi ma dʼo̩la-wñ hi ugbo mi n gbede.
Abu kʼabo le̩ alo Jisus chane̩ ekʼo̩la Jo̩n ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩. I kakini, E̩wñ me̩ dufu nyʼaje̩tachi ago le̩? Ikpo kʼafu ofo amiejo?
E̩wñ me̩ la dufu alike? One̩ kʼi kʼe̩wñ ne̩wu ne̩wu nyʼo̩la? Me̩ go, abo ku ma anyi e̩wñ ne̩wu ne̩wu jʼunyi amonu.
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ muda dufu ke? ku me̩ fʼakache̩ li? I-i, naka ñwu me̩, ka kʼi chetʼakache̩ le ololo.
Owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma ko̩ o̩la-wñ tane̩ kakini,
Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi kwane̩ ef abo kʼabobule̩ bi kʼi tu Jo̩n kʼi che baptism le n. E̩ne̩ kʼi muda nya ojane̩ e-efojale tʼowñ le.
Oñ akwʼiko Jo̩n kʼi ache baptism awʼifa-i ma gwo̩ko̩rʼojane̩ e-efojale, oñ abo ku ma cho̩ko̩ le̩ adʼowñ inya.
Todu amakache̩ chaka kpʼo̩lo̩da kache̩ e-ma gbogbo wʼiko Jo̩n;
i la che̩wñ ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ gba, owñ-i chʼE̩laija kʼi ache kʼi wa.
E̩ne̩ kʼi nʼeti kʼi nagbo̩.
E̩wñ u la adʼabo o̩gba-i wawe-wñ ta? I chebi abimo̩to̩ ku ma gugu jʼef aja aja ku ma dʼamonuku-ma omu,
ku ma kakini,
Todu, Jo̩n lewa, i la je̩ n, i la ñmo̩ n, oñ ma kakini, E̩nebili de̩.
O̩ma One̩ lewa, i aje̩, i añʼañmo̩, oñ ma kakini, Go, añmʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpʼachʼajefu de̩! Onuku amagbo̩kane̩ kpʼame̩nadure i che. Uko̩lo̩ ibe muda adale ñw ibe.
Tak i chane̩ ekicha ñw ewo ewo ugbo kʼojile uko̩lo̩ ukpahiu-wñ wache, todabu ku ma ma ribeda n.
Atogwo ñw e̩, Ko̩raisin! Atogwo ñw e̩, Be̩tsaida! Todu, iche̩wñ kʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu kʼi wache ef ume̩ ma che Taya kpai Saido̩n, ma ma kʼukpo eku kpʼelulu nyʼo̩la ku ma ma ribeda kpo̩kpe̩ me̩.
U muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, I ame̩ ñwu Taya kpai Saido̩n o̩jo̩ ajo̩ tʼame̩ le.
Oñ uwe̩, Kapanahum, e̩ ñʼahi o̩la-we̩ ne gbogbo kad efojale? Uwe̩ agwo̩ru gbogbo kad o̩jegu: todu i ma che̩wñ kʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu kʼi wache ef uwe̩ ma wache So̩do̩m, i ma do̩mo̩ gbogbo tʼeñini.
U muda ka ñw e̩ kakini, I ame̩ ñw ane̩ So̩do̩m o̩jo̩ ajo̩ tʼuwe̩ le.
Adiko le̩ Jisus mʼomu-wñ da kakini, Nagogbodʼuwe̩, Ata-mi, Ondu efojale kpʼane̩-ile̩, todabu kʼuwe̩ kʼe̩wñ-i maja bʼamanibe kpʼame̩nugbeju te̩, kʼe̩ la mʼu bite̩ ñw amo̩me̩kpa.
I-i, Ata-mi, todu abe̩le̩ i rʼuwe̩ eju.
Ata-mi mʼe̩wñ du ko nyʼumi o̩wo̩ me̩. I la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi mʼO̩ma ogbolo n, chai Ata; i la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi mʼAta ogbolo n chai O̩ma, kpʼe̩ne̩ du kʼO̩ma neku kʼi mʼu birʼeju.
Me̩ lewʼugbo mi, o̩chaka-me̩ ku me̩ jo̩ achʼakanya, ku me̩ la nʼadu ki fʼume̩ ka, kʼu nadʼuñmi ñwu me̩.
Me̩ nadʼoli uno̩lo̩ e-mi nʼo̩lo̩-me̩ ku me̩ la ko̩che̩ ugbo mi, todu omi de̩ chikimi, e̩do̩-mi la chʼe̩hi wane̩, taku me̩ ali uñmi ñw onugo-me̩.
Todu oli uno̩lo̩ e-mi chʼe̩bo̩la, adumi la de̩ fuye̩.
Adiko le̩ Jisus lale gu ef uche̩ o̩ka du o̩jo̩ uñmi; ebi la akpʼamako̩che̩-wñ, oñ ma chane̩ ejʼoji o̩ka da lo̩.
Ama abu kʼamaFarisi liʼu ma ka ñw u kakini, Go, amako̩che̩-we̩ jʼache e̩wñ kʼo̩da ma je̩ ñw one̩ ki che o̩jo̩ uñmi n.
Oñ i dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ cho̩kalatu e̩wñ ki Defid che e̩gba kʼebi kpʼo̩ le̩ n?
Abu kʼi mugudu tef unyi O̩jo̩ kʼi la mʼakala ku ma ko te̩ jʼo̩mo̩ ko je̩; o̩da la je̩ ñw u kpʼabo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ je̩ n, chai amatama kate.
Abe̩k ame̩ cho̩kalatu ef o̩lo̩da ka kʼamatama ajʼef unyi O̩jo̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi ache e̩wñ kʼi akpʼo̩jo̩ uñmi bie̩ n? I la nʼudu ñwu ma n.
Omi la aka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼi tʼunyi O̩jo̩ le dʼemi.
Ame̩ ma mʼe̩wñ kʼi chʼoji, Ejumomi dʼumi e̩do̩, e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ la dʼumi e̩do̩ n, ame̩ ma kpʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ma fʼudu n abi n.
Todu O̩ma One̩ chʼOndu o̩jo̩ uñmi.
I kwʼo̩mo̩ le oñ i nyʼef unyi ujeju-ma.
Me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ʼka kʼo̩wo̩-wñ gbe̩ do̩mo̩. Taku ma tʼowñ ene kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñwu ma chʼo̩ga one̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi? todu ku ma nʼo̩la ku ma agwu nʼo.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼef ume̩ kʼi nʼalaʼka, kʼe-le̩ ñwa tef o̩fe̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi fa? I agwo̩nyʼu kʼi dʼu dufu n?
E̩re̩ onu monu unyo̩ e-one̩ tʼe-ala le? Todabe̩le̩ o̩da aje̩ ñwu ma che e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi.
E̩gba le̩ ika ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ kakini, Fʼo̩wo̩ we̩ nadala. Oñ i mudabi tʼiko o̩lafia dab ekeji-wñ.
AmaFarisi muda ledufu oñ ma fʼabo̩hiala do̩ jeju ku ma lʼo̩la nyʼu alu ku ma ale ku ma akpʼo̩ tinyo̩.
Oñ abu ki Jisus chema, i kwo bʼo̩mo̩ te̩; amone̩ wewe la tʼowñ ubi, oñ i fʼo̩ga-ma che chaka.
Tak i fʼuma eti chaka todu kʼama ki we edʼowñ tejugede.
Todu kʼo̩la ku ma ka lef Aizaya akache̩ ki che̩ kakini,
Me̩ go, Imo̩to̩ kʼu chi ñw o̩la-mi de̩,
I achaida n, i la akpogu n,
i akʼikpo ki muguche̩ da n,
abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi la akibenʼodu-wñ.
E̩gba le̩ ma dʼe̩ne̩ kʼi nʼebili wʼugbo-wñ, i chʼafeju kpai ajialu: oñ Jisus fʼo̩ga-wñ che kpa. Tak abale̩ ajialu le̩ kwoko̩la, i laño̩ gane̩.
Tak ibe o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ mukpatuka, oñ ma kakini, Owñ-i neke chʼO̩ma Defid de̩-i?
Ama abu kʼamaFarisi gbo̩, ma kakini, E̩ne̩-i anʼamebili dufu n, chai efu Bee̩lze̩bul, agboji amebili le̩.
Abu ki Jisus muda ma ibe ku ma kpe̩, i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ojane̩ du kʼi mudareji, ku ma chane̩ eko̩ bʼo̩la-ma adʼalache̩; ewo du abe̩k unyi du kʼi mudareji ku ma chane̩ eko bʼo̩la-ma adago n.
I la che̩wñ ki Setan ane̩ Setan dufu mak i mudareji ako bʼo̩la-wñ me̩. Ab i ale kʼojane̩ adago ke?
I la che̩wñ ki chʼefu Bee̩lze̩bul oñ omi ane̩ amebili dufu, amo̩ma-me̩ fa, ef e̩ne̩ oñ ma ane ma dufu? Lef e-le̩ ama le̩ achʼamakajo̩-me̩.
I muda che̩wñ ki chʼef Afu O̩jo̩ oñ omi ane̩ amebili dufu, mak Ojane̩ O̩jo̩ fʼume̩ buru me̩.
Cho̩kpo̩ni ab one̩ ale kʼi neke mugudu tef unyi agbiti kʼi año̩ ane̩-wñ, chai e̩gba kʼi fʼagbiti le̩ ji ejodudu? E̩gba le̩ tak i añʼane̩ unyi-wñ.
E̩ne̩ ki ma chʼe̩ne̩ ubi-mi n, mak e̩nagwunyʼumi de̩. E̩ne̩ ki ma la bʼumi yajo̩ n mak efiatuka i afiatuka le̩.
Lef e-le̩ naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ma atʼadure du kpʼachakpabie̩ du no̩ ñw amone̩; ma muda atʼakpabie̩ Afu ku ma che no̩ n.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi la akʼo̩la nyʼO̩ma One̩, ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u; e̩ne̩ du kʼi muda kʼo̩la nyʼAfu Kiafo̩, ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u n, i chaka chʼef o̩kpanachi kide̩, i chaka chʼef e-ki awa.
Me̩ mama che oli kʼi chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩, kpʼe̩ro-wñ kʼi ño̩ chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩, cho̩kpo̩ni me̩ mama fʼu che kʼi chʼoli e̩che̩ kʼe̩ro-wñ kʼi ño̩ chʼe̩che̩ ge̩; todu e̩rʼoli oñ ma nʼama oli kʼi che.
Amato̩ olijo, abile kʼame̩ ku me̩ chʼame̩ne̩bibi aneke ko̩la e̩wñ e̩nyo̩? Todu alu anʼe̩wñ ki chʼe̩kwute̩ ef e̩do̩ aka.
E̩ne̩nyo̩ akʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ kwef e̩wñ akoko-wñ e̩nyo̩ dufu; e̩ne̩bibi la akʼe̩wñ bibi kwef e̩wñ akoko-wñ bibi dufu.
Ama naka ñwu me̩ kakini, O̩la o̩wai du kʼamone̩ aka, ma acholi-wñ o̩jo̩ ajo̩.
Todu ef o̩la alu-we̩ ma adale ñw e̩, oñ ef o̩la alu-we̩ ma la akpʼuwe̩ abi.
E̩gbale̩ amako̩takada kpʼamaFarisi iche̩ka dohi ñw u kakini, Akone̩-wñ, i dʼuwa e̩do̩ kʼa ali ujiweʼka ugbo we̩.
I muda dohi ñwu ma kakini, Abo o̩gba bibi kpʼamajo̩ko̩ kpʼamache̩ño̩ya afeju ujiwe; ma la adʼujiwe du ñw u n, chai ujiwe Jona, akache̩ le̩.
Todu alu ki Jona dʼef e̩la omi lile le̩ o̩ro̩ka me̩ta kpʼodu me̩ta, abe̩le̩ oñ O̩ma One̩ adʼef e̩do̩ ane̩-i o̩ro̩ka me̩ta kpʼodu me̩ta.
Aboke̩le̩ Nine̩fa la akwane̩ ef ajo̩ manyʼabo̩gba kide̩-i, ma la kpʼo̩ abi; tod akoya ki Jona ta ma mʼibe e-ma rida, me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ kʼi tu Jona le la dʼemi.
Onu onobule̩ e-o̩gane̩ le̩ la akwane̩ ef ajo̩ manyʼabo̩gba kide̩-i ge̩, i ñʼakpʼo̩ abi: todu owñ kwʼukade otitala ane̩-ile̩ wa kʼi gbʼofili So̩lo̩mo̩n; me̩ la go, E̩ne̩ kʼi tu So̩lo̩mon le la dʼemi.
Ama e̩gba du kʼafu ki ma fe̩ n kwʼef one̩ dufu, i alale gu ef ugbo kʼomiofo ma de̩ n du afeju uñmi, i la ali n.
E̩gbale̩ i akakini, Nadabi tʼunyi-mi ugbo kʼu kwo wa; oñ abu kʼi lewa o̩mo̩, i li abu kʼefu-wñ te̩ ofo, efu-wñ chʼe̩gba te̩, ane̩-wñ la jʼuña-wñ.

E̩gbale̩ i alo namʼamafu mebie omune̩ ku ma bie̩ne̩ tʼowñ onugo le gba manyʼo̩la-wñ, taku ma gudu wʼo̩mo̩ adodo. Alu kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ de̩ ubiane̩-i ño̩ bie̩ne̩ tʼalu kʼi de̩ ejodudu le. Abe̩le̩ i ade̩ ñw abo̩gba bibi-i.
Abu kʼu do̩mo̩ ako̩la ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ta, go, iye-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ dago o̩do̩da, ma feju eko̩la ñw u.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka ka ñw u kakini, Go, iye-we̩ kpʼamo̩maye-we̩ dago jʼo̩do̩da-i, ma feju eko̩la ñw e̩.
Oñ i dohi ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi ko̩la ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ chʼiye-mi? abo ugbo la chʼamo̩maye-mi?
Tak i fʼo̩wo̩ ña amako̩che̩-wñ okoolo, i kakini, Me̩ gʼiye-mi kpʼamo̩maye-mi.
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi ache e̩wñ ki dʼAta-mi kʼi dʼefojale e̩do̩, owñ le̩ chʼo̩maye-mi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼo̩maye-mi onobule̩ kpʼiye-mi.
O̩jo̩ le̩ Jisus kwʼef unyi dufu nyʼeti ohimini agugu.
Tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile wa jʼugbo-wñ, todabe̩le̩ i le tef o̩ko̩ agugu; oñ o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ chaka dago jo̩ eto̩ba-wñ.
Tak i ko̩la e̩wñ wewe ñwu ma lef ita kakini, Me̩ go, agbe̩yo̩ le dufu kʼi gbʼe̩yo̩.
Oñ abu kʼi agbe̩, iche̩ka lewane̩ eti o̩na, tak ame̩we̩ lewa mʼu reje̩.
Iche̩kibo̩ la wane̩ ef okuta ugbo kʼike̩te̩ ma nana n; oñ ababale̩ i tiga todu ane̩-wñ nʼukpa n.
Oñ abu kʼolu muta dufu, i jo; oñ ili kʼi ma ne̩ n, i gbe̩ rinyo̩.
Iche̩kibo̩ muda wane̩ ef ikeke tak ikeke le̩ kwane̩ fʼu gwebo.
Iche̩kibo̩ la wane̩ ef ane̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩. Tak e-le̩ rʼe̩ro, iche̩ka-wñ ro ogume̩lu, iche̩ka ro o̩gbo̩ me̩ta, iche̩ka la ro ogue̩gwa.
E̩ne̩ ki nʼeti kʼi nagbo̩.
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ te̩wa ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ko̩la ñwu ma ef ita ke?
Oñ i dohi ñwu ma kakini, Todabu ku ma mʼe̩wñ afili e-ojane̩ efojale ko ñwu me̩ ku me̩ ma; ma muda ko ñw abo ki jo̩-i n.
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi ne̩, ma ñʼadu ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ tak i ane̩ ololo; e̩ne̩ du ki muda ma ne̩ n, i chaka chʼe̩wñ kʼi ne̩, ma abʼo̩ gba.
Todu kʼu nako̩la ñwu ma ef ita le̩ de̩, todu egane̩ ma gane̩, ma gane̩ n; egbo̩ ma gbo̩ ma agbo̩ n; ma la mʼoji e̩wñ n.
Ache̩ kʼAizaya ka le̩ la che̩ rʼuma o̩la, owñ chʼe-kʼi kakini,
Todu e̩do̩ amone̩-i mud e̩do̩ agbo̩go̩,
Ame̩ muda gbede, eju-me̩ kʼi agane̩; kpʼeti-me̩ ki agbʼo̩la.
Todu, ami naka ñwu me̩ ka ki nʼamakache̩ kpʼame̩no̩kpakpa wewe ku ma ñeju eli e̩wñ kʼame̩ jʼago-i, ma la liʼu n; ma ño̩ ñeju egbo̩ e̩wñ kʼame̩ jʼagbo̩-i, ma la gbo̩ n.
Todule̩, me̩ nagbo̩ oji ita agbe̩yo̩ le̩.
E̩gba du kʼone̩ agbʼo̩la ojane̩ le̩, kʼi ma la mʼoji-wñ n, e̩gbale̩ e̩ne̩bibi le̩ awa adʼe̩wñ ku ma du gbe̩ ef e̩do̩-wñ le̩ inya. Owñ le̩ chʼe-ku ma du gbe̩ eti o̩na.
Oñ e-ku ma du gbe̩ ef okuta, owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi agbʼo̩la le̩, tak ababale̩ i mʼugba kpʼuyo̩.
I la nʼili o̩to̩to̩la-wñ n, i muda chʼo̩fe̩fe̩le̩; oñ e̩gba kʼo̩bata lewʼo̩la-wñ, abe̩ku amone̩ chane̩ edoli-wñ tod o̩la le̩, ababale̩ i fʼowñ dahi.
Oñ e-ku ma du gbe̩ ef ikeke, owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi agbʼo̩la le̩ tak ejiji o̩kpanachi-i eda kpʼedʼone̩ ibe kʼe̩wñ ene̩ nana adʼone̩ ibe agwʼo̩la le̩ bo, tak i mud oche.
Oñ e-ku ma du gbe̩ ef ane̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩, owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi agbʼo̩la le̩ kʼi amʼoji-wñ kʼi la arʼe̩ro ochochi: iche̩ka la anʼe̩ro ogume̩lu, e-iche̩ka chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta, e-iche̩ka la chʼogue̩gwa.
I fʼita omune̩ kpa jʼane̩ ñwu ma kakini, Ojane̩ efojale dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ kʼi adʼe̩yo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ gbe̩ ef uche̩-wñ;
ama abu kʼamone̩ jʼalolu, e̩nebi-wñ lewa mʼe̩kwe̩ ko gbe̩ nyʼef o̩ka le̩, oñ i le owñ.
Oñ e̩gba kʼo̩ka-wñ fʼiga, kʼi la tʼoji, e̩gba le̩ e̩kwe̩ ño̩ kwotejugede.
Tak amadu e̩ne̩fe̩nyi le̩ lewa ka ñw u kakini, Odu, i chʼe̩yo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩ du gbe̩ ef uche̩-we̩ n? Abile kʼi nʼe̩kwe̩ ef uwñ ta?
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩nebiʼka che le̩. Tak amadu le̩ ka ñw u kakini, I dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼa nyʼagudu, kʼa fʼu yajo̩?
Ama i kakini, O̩da, tode̩gba ku me̩ gu e̩kwe̩ du jo̩ ku me̩ fʼo̩ka gudu manyʼu.

Me̩ tʼejeji-wñ no̩ ku ma gba gbogbo wʼiko ku ma kpa; tak iko ku ma kpa le̩, naka ñw abo ku ma kpa kakini, Me̩ fʼe̩kwe̩ yajo̩ ejodudu, ku me̩ la fʼu ji oti oti, ku ma ko gujo; me̩ muda mʼo̩ka ko wa jʼef aka-mi.
I fʼita omune̩ kpa tʼane̩ ñwu ma kakini, Ojane̩ efojale dab e̩yo̩ mustadi kʼone̩ mʼu du gbe̩ ef uche̩-wñ.
E̩yo̩-wñ chenya falii tʼe̩yo̩ du le; i muda tiga kʼi nana kpa, i tʼe̩wñ oko kwe̩ kwe̩ kwe̩ du le, i la mud oli. Todabe̩le̩ ame̩we̩ ojale lewa ru jʼe̩to̩-wñ.
I ño̩ kpʼita omune̩ ñwu ma kakini, Ojane̩ efojale dab o̩jo̩wu e-kʼonobule̩ mʼu gba kʼi la du maja ef agbam-gbam omu me̩ta, gbogbo tak o̩jo̩wu bie̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩dudu-wñ.
Jisus ko̩la e̩wñ-i du ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ ef ita; i ma chʼita n i ko̩la du ñwu ma n.
Todu kʼo̩la ku ma ka lef akache̩ le̩ kʼi che̩ kakini,
E̩gba le̩ i tʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ no̩ ku ma lo, oñ i le tef unyi. Tak amako̩che̩-wñ lewʼugbo-wñ, ma kakini, kʼoji ita e̩kwe̩ ef uche̩ le̩ ñw a.
Oñ i dohi kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼi adʼe̩yo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ gbe̩ le̩ chʼO̩ma One̩.
Uche̩ le̩ la chʼile̩-i; e̩yo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ la chʼamo̩ma Ojane̩ kʼa ka le̩; e̩kwe̩ le̩ chʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩bibi le̩.
E̩nebi kʼi kʼe̩kwe̩ gbe̩ chʼAbulumone̩; iko ku ma kpa la chʼukpoji o̩kpanachi-i; abo ku ma kpa chʼamonuche̩ O̩jo̩.
Todule̩ alu ku ma yʼe̩kwe̩ jo̩ ku ma kʼo nyʼuna agujo, abe̩le̩ i ade̩ ukpoji o̩kpanachi-i.
O̩ma One̩ akpʼamonuche̩-wñ uche̩, taku ama ayʼe̩wñ du kʼi adʼone̩ hi kwʼojane̩-wñ jo̩ kpʼabo ku ma nʼe̩wñ ugbite̩re̩ ache;
ma la ako ma ro̩ jef adido una: o̩mo̩ aku ero̩ kpʼenyi elo̩ ade̩.
E̩gbale̩ abo̩kpakpa amʼane̩ ne̩ pee dab olu ojane̩ Ata-ma. E̩ne̩ kʼi nʼeti kʼi nagbo̩.
Ojane̩ efojale dab e̩wñ akoko kʼi maja oko kʼe̩ne̩ʼka fʼu li tak i ño̩ hiʼu maja; oñ tod eyo̩ kʼi ayo̩ i nyʼakʼe̩wñ kʼi ne̩ ta, tak i mʼoko le̩ gba la.
Omune̩ ño̩ de̩ ge̩, Ojane̩ efojale dabe̩ne̩ kʼachinyama kʼi afeju okuta efufu o̩me̩me̩le̩;
oñ abu kʼi fʼokuta efufuʼka kʼalu aja-wñ tabale li, i le mʼe̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ ko ta, oñ i mʼu gba la.
Omune̩ ño̩ de̩ ge̩, Ojane̩ efojale dab iga ku ma ro̩ nyʼef ohimini kʼi ayʼe̩ja kwef uche̩ uche̩ ame̩ja du wajo̩.
E̩gba kʼiga le̩ ko̩ ma fʼu fa wʼoj e̩lanyi. Taku ma guguane̩ oñ ma fʼe-o̩me̩me̩le̩ re jʼef e̩wñ-ma. Ma muda kʼe-o̩bu rikpolo rinyo̩.
Abe̩le̩ i ade̩ e̩gba ukpoji o̩kpanachi-i; amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ adufu wa adʼabo bibi bʼalumeji abo̩kpakpa te̩,
oñ ma ako ma rikpolo jʼef adido una. O̩mo̩ aku ero̩ kpʼenyi elo̩ ade̩.
Ame̩ gbo̩ oji e̩wñ-i du me̩? Ma ka ñw u kakini, I-i.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Lef e-le̩ ako̩takada du kʼi ko̩che̩ e̩wñ ojane̩ efojale dab one̩ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi kʼi ako e̩wñ etito̩ kpʼe̩wñ igbele kwef e̩wñ akoko-wñ jo̩.
Oñ i lewa tʼe̩gba ki Jisus fʼita-i kpa kpoji, i kwo bʼo̩mo̩ te̩.
Oñ abu kʼi lewa oj ane̩ e-wñ, i nako̩ ma e̩wñ ef unyi ujeju-ma, todabe̩le̩, awuwu fʼuma mu, oñ ma kakini, Ugbo E̩ne̩-i nʼibe kpʼukpahiu-i kwo ta?
I chʼo̩ma ikapita le̩ de̩ n? Ma dʼodu iye-wñ ko̩ Me̩ri n? kʼamo̩maye-wñ la ko̩ Jeme̩s kpai Jose̩s kpai Saimo̩n kpai Judas in?
Amo̩maye-wñ onobule̩ chaka jʼugbo-wa-i n? Mak ugbo e̩ne̩-i nʼe̩wñ-i du kwo ta?
Abe̩le̩ ma fʼo̩la-ma dahi ef uwñ. Jisus muda ka ñwu ma kakini, Akache̩ awe ojima ene̩ n, chai oj ane̩ ata-wñ kpʼef unyi e-wñ.
I la che e̩wñ ukpahiu wewe o̩mo̩ n lef e̩do̩ ku ma ko̩ ekono.
Iko le̩ He̩ro̩d, ate̩trark, gbʼinabali Jisus.
Oñ i ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, Jo̩n kʼi ache baptism le̩ de̩, owñ kwane̩ kwugbo abo ki ku me̩; oñ lef e-le̩ uko̩lo̩ ukpahiu-i ache ef uwñ.
Todu He̩ro̩d gwo̩nyu Jo̩n, i la fʼu ji, oñ i mʼu du atʼunyi uga todu He̩ro̩dias, o̩ya Filip o̩maye-wñ.
Todu Jo̩n ka ñw u kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñw e̩ kʼe̩ nʼo̩ n.
I la dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi fʼu kpa, ailo o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ la je̩ ñw u n, todabu kʼi dab akache̩ eju-ma.
Oñ abu kʼo̩do̩ ku ma bi He̩ro̩d muda ko, o̩ma He̩ro̩dias onobule̩ do̩mo̩ atido alumeji-ma i la nyo̩ He̩ro̩d eju.
Ugbo kide̩ i fʼe̩bo̩ go̩ ñw u ka kʼe̩wñ du kʼi abiʼu i adʼu ñw u.
Oñ abu kʼiye-wñ la ko̩ nyefu i kakini, Dʼoji Jo̩n kʼi ache baptism noj o̩kpa ñwu mi emi.
Tak e̩do̩ onu mukpabie̩, ama tod e̩bo̩ kʼi go̩ kpai tod eju abo ku ma chekukane̩ kpenyʼu, i ñwa ñwu ma kʼama du ñw u.
Tak i fʼone̩ kpe̩ amu Jo̩n oji bu ef unyidudu,
oñ ma dʼoji-wñ noj o̩kpa wa ñw u, taku ma mʼu du ñw igbe̩le̩ le̩, tak i mʼu du wʼugbo iye-wñ.
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ te̩wa amʼoku-wñ du, oñ ma mʼu du ji, taku ma lewa mʼu du ka ñwu Jisus.
Oñ abu ku Jisus gbo̩ i tʼo̩ko̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le tef aje̩tachi ugbo kʼowñ kate ade̩. Tak e̩gba kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ gbo̩, ma kwʼewo ewo le e̩re̩ tʼo̩ ubi.
Tak abu kʼi dufu wa i fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ lile li. Ejumomi-ma la je̩ ñw u n, oñ i fʼo̩ga ame̩no̩ga-ma che kpa.
Tak e̩gba kʼane̩ lo̩ amako̩che̩-wñ wʼugbo-wñ, ma kakini, Ugbo-i chʼaje̩tachi, iko la legudu me̩; tʼo̩wo̩ amone̩-i no̩ todu ku ma nyʼadogbe adogbe ala e̩wñ ku ma aje̩.
Jisus muda ka ñwu ma kakini, i dʼugbo ku ma kwʼemi alo n, ame̩ ki kʼe̩wñ ñwu ma je̩.
Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, A nʼe̩wñ du emi tʼakala me̩lu kpʼe̩ja meji le n.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Mʼu ko wa ñwu mi emi.

Tak i ñwa ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ku ma chekukane̩ oj egbe oñ i mʼakala me̩lu kpʼe̩ja meji le̩ gba, i mʼeju korʼojale, i fʼaduwa-wñ che; tak i fʼakala le̩ guche̩, oñ i mʼu ko ñw amako̩che̩-wñ, oñ amako̩che̩ mʼu ko ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩.
Tak o̩chaka-ma je̩ oñ efu-ma ko̩. Ma la mʼaje̩bo̩ kʼi ku ma bo̩ ko̩, i che̩ko̩ aligada me̩gweji.
Oñ abo ku ma je̩ la dab aboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu, abobule̩ kpʼabimo̩to̩ la dʼo̩ n.
Tak ababale̩ i kutʼamako̩che̩-wñ ku ma tʼo̩ko̩ ku ma dʼo̩gba-wñ nyʼejudaba, gbogbo tak i tʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ no̩ ku ma lo.
Tak abu kʼi tʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ no̩ owñ kate mute̩gu nyʼibe̩ uwo kʼi chaduwa. Oñ abu kʼane̩ lo̩ owñ kate do̩mo̩.
O̩ko̩ le̩ la kwʼeto̩ba te̩ jiji me̩, akpoli narʼo̩, todu afu aju kwʼo̩gba-wñ awa.
Oñ e̩gba ide e̩ke̩le̩ odu i lule̩ ej ohimini awʼugbo ma.
Oñ abu kʼamako̩che̩ le̩ fʼowñ li abu kʼi alule̩ ej ohimini, ibe-ma mukpatuka, ma kakini, Ibegu de̩! Tak okpo-wñ je̩ ñwu ma kwukwa.
Ama ababale̩ Jisus ko̩la ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ ke, kʼomi de̩, me̩ ki chokpo n.
Oñ Pita dohi ñw u kakini, Ondu, i chʼuwe̩ de̩, e̩ ñwa ñwu mi kʼu wʼugbo we̩ ej omi-i.
Oñ i kakini, Lewa. Taku Pita kwʼef o̩ko̩ tej omi, oñ i kwolule̩ ej omi awʼugbo Jisus;
abu kʼi muda li alu kʼafu aju, i kwochokpo, tak abu kʼi chane̩ elawo̩nye̩ i kwa kakini, Ondu, mʼumi gba.
Oñ ababale̩ Jisus fʼo̩wo̩ nadala agwo̩nyʼu, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ e̩ne̩do̩ ekono re, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩do̩-we̩ deji?
Tak abu ku ma kwotʼo̩ko̩, afu le̩ nye̩do̩.
Oñ abo ku ma jʼef o̩ko̩ le̩ dojikane̩ ñw u, kakini, Ochochi, O̩ma O̩jo̩ uwe̩ che.
Tak abu ku ma mudaba, ma lewa ane̩ Ge̩ne̩sare̩t.
Tak abu kʼaboke̩le̩ ugbo le̩ mejuma owñ, ma fʼuche̩ kpe̩ rʼoj ane̩ le̩ du daka, oñ ma mʼamone̩ ku ma nʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ o̩la chaka ko wʼugbo-wñ.
Taku ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ todu kʼama ki do̩wo̩kado o̩jaja eti afe̩-wñ kate, oñ aluka one̩ ku ma do̩wo̩kado, ache̩ka che ma hioko.
E̩gba le̩ amaFarisi kpai amako̩takada kwo Je̩rusale̩m wʼugbo Jisus. Ma kakini,
E̩wñ chi kʼamako̩che̩-we̩ ajʼada e̩wñ o̩gu abogijo? Todu ma gwʼo̩wo̩-ma e̩gba ku ma jʼakala n.
Oñ i dohi ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ ño̩ jʼada o̩la-uko̩ O̩jo̩ lef e̩wñ o̩gu e-me̩?
Todu O̩jo̩ kakini, Bumʼata-we̩ kpai iye-we̩; i ño̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki akʼebi ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ, eku i aku.
Ame̩ muda kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki aka ñw ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ kakini, E̩wñ-mi kʼe̩ ma jʼile ugbo-wñ chʼele kʼu chʼO̩jo̩;
mak i nʼugbo kʼi abumo̩ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ n. Me̩ la nʼe̩wñ o̩gu-me̩ fʼo̩lO̩jo̩ kpalu.
Ame̩, ame̩nayechi, Aizaya fʼache̩-me̩ ka o̩me̩me̩le̩ kakini,
Abo-i nʼuko-ma abumo̩ mi,
Ma la diba ñwu mi ibe̩te̩ ofofo,
Tak i fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ do̩ wa oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ gbo̩, me̩ ki ño̩ mʼoji-wñ, kakini,
I chʼe̩wñ ki agudu tef alu adʼone̩ ji n; chai e-kʼi kwef alu dufu, e-le̩ adʼone̩ ji.
E̩gba le̩ amako̩che̩-wñ te̩wa aka ñw u kakini, E̩ chema ka kʼabu kʼamaFarisi gbʼo̩la le̩ i fʼuma dahi?
Oñ i dohi ñwu ma kakini, Iga e̩wñ du kʼi ma chʼAta-mi e-efojale gbe̩ n, ma agudu rinyo̩
Tʼuma no̩; amakpejufo̩ ku ma ña amakpejufo̩ o̩na ma che. I la che̩wñ kʼakpejufo̩ aña akpejufo̩ o̩na, ejeji-ma awane̩ ef o̩go̩.
Taku Pita mʼomu da ka ñw u kakini, Mʼoji ita-i du ne̩rʼuwaeju.
Oñ i kakini, Me̩ ño̩ nʼibe abe̩le̩ ni ge̩?
Ame̩ mʼoji-wñ kakini, E̩wñ du ki agudu tef alu anyʼef ukulu, tak i atinyo̩ ubioko n?
Ama e̩wñ ki alʼalu dufu, mak ef e̩do̩ i kwo wa le̩; e̩wñ ki la adʼone̩ ji le̩ de̩.
Todu ef e̩do̩ oñ ibe bibi elo kpai one̩ ekpa kpai e̩ño̩ya eche kpai e̩wñ abutabu eche kpai oji eji kpai ibenu olemi egba kpai akpabie̩ eka adufu kwo wa.
E̩wñ ki adʼone̩ ji le̩ de̩. Enʼo̩wo̩ ki ma gwe̩ n aje̩ e̩wñ la adʼone̩ ji n.
Taku Jisus kwʼo̩mo̩ oñ i le rʼo̩wo̩ Taya kpai Saido̩n.
E̩ la go, onobule̩ Kenan la kwʼalo̩me̩-wñ le̩ awa; i nakwa kakini, Li umi ejumomi, Ondu, O̩ma Defid! o̩ma-mi onobule̩ nʼebili kʼi bie̩ne̩.
I muda dohi o̩laʼkate ñw u n. Tak amako̩che̩-wñ te̩wa agbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kakini, Tʼowñ no̩ kʼi lo, todu i nakwa tʼuwa ubi-i.
Ama i dohi kakini, Chai ugbo amala abo unyi Israe̩l ki lenyo̩ oñ ma kpʼumi uche̩-i.
I muda lewa adojikane̩ ñw u, i kakini, Ondu, te̩ko mi.
Oñ i dohi kakini, I nyo̩ kʼa gba akala amo̩ma kʼa ko rikpolo jʼane̩ ñw amabia n.
Ama i kakini, Ochochi, Ondu; todu i chaka chʼamabia ma je̩ e̩gbanyo̩ uje̩wñ ki akwʼoj itebulu amodu-ma wane̩.
E̩gba le̩ Jisus dohi ka ñw u kakini, Onobule̩, e̩do̩ ekono-we̩ tabale; i ki dʼalu ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ ñw e̩. Oñ akwo iko le̩ o̩ma-wñ nʼo̩lafia.
Taku Jisus kwʼo̩mo̩ lewa o̩la ohimini Galili, oñ i mute̩gu nyʼibe̩ uwo agugu o̩mo̩.
Tak amo̩wo̩ amone̩ wewe wewe wʼugbo-wñ. Ma nʼamachika kpai ame̩no̩lo̩ kpai amafeju kpai amajalu kpai abo omune̩ wewe manyu o̩la-ma, oñ ma ko ma jʼane̩ e̩re̩-wñ; tak i fʼo̩ga-ma che.
Todabe̩le̩ o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ chane̩ eyaye abu ku ma li amajalu ku ma ako̩la, kʼame̩no̩lo nʼo̩lafia, kʼamachika alule̩, kʼamafeju agane̩; oñ ma kwodojima ñw O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l.

Taku Jisus fʼamako̩che̩-wñ do̩ wa, i kakini, Ejumomi o̩wo̩ amone̩-i ache mi, todabu kʼi chʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta ku ma te̩te̩jʼugbo mi de̩. Ma la nʼe̩wñ du kʼama aje̩ n; i la dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu natʼuma no̩ elu ofofo n, tode̩gba ku ma achuba ej o̩na.
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo a ali akala ki bo̩jo̩ ki ako̩ o̩wo̩ amone̩ abe̩i efu aje̩tachi emi?
Oñ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Akala monu me̩ ne̩? Oñ ma kakini, Ebie, kpai e̩ja egini pe̩e̩.
Tak abu kʼi ñwa ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ku ma chekukʼane̩,
i mʼakala mebie kpai e̩ja egini le̩ gba, oñ abu kʼi fʼO̩jo̩ gwa i fʼu guche̩ tak i mʼu ko ñw amako̩che̩, oñ amako̩che̩ mʼu ko ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩.
O̩chaka-ma la je̩, oñ efu-ma ko̩. Taku ma mʼabubo̩-wñ ki kwu ma bo̩ ko e̩ko̩ agba mebie.
Abo ku ma la je̩ che aboke̩le̩ icham me̩lu, abobule̩ kpai abimo̩to̩ la do̩ ta n.
Tak i tʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ no̩ ku ma lo; i kwo tʼo̩ko̩, oñ i lewa alo̩me̩ Magadan.
Tak amaFarisi kpʼamaSadiusi lewa ajʼo̩ ma, oñ ma tʼowñ ene kʼi dʼujiwe kwʼefojale ña ma.
I muda dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ojale gu una te̩ gaa e̩gba olane̩, me̩ kakini, Ane̩ muda gboo;
ojale la kpa gaa odudu, me̩ kakini, Ane̩ nyo̩ eñini n, gʼakpa ki jukpa te̩. Me̩ la meju eñwa eju ojale go, me̩ neke mejuma ujiwe adiko adiko n?
Abo̩gba bibi kpʼamajo̩ko̩ kpʼamache̩ño̩ya feju ujiwe; ma la adʼujiwe du ñw u n, chai ujiwe e-Jona. Tak i tʼuma no̩ oñ i le e-wñ.
Oñ amako̩che̩-wñ lewʼej udaba, ma la gbenyo̩ uje̩wñ ene̩ wa.
Oñ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nago, me̩ mʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩ ugbo o̩jo̩wu e-amaFarisi kpʼamaSadiusi.
Taku ma kwolʼo̩la ef uma kakini, Tod uje̩wñ kʼa ma ne̩ wa ni de̩.
Jisus ma, oñ i kakini, Ame̩ abe̩do̩ ekono re, e̩wñ chi ku me̩ lʼo̩la ef ume̩ todabu ku me̩ ma nʼuje̩-wñ n?
Ame̩ mʼoji-wñ ta n, me̩ laño̩ rewa akala me̩lu e-one̩ icham me̩fa nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ le̩ kpʼaligada monu ku me̩ ko n?
Kpʼakala mebie e-one̩ icham me̩lu le̩, kpʼagba monu ku me̩ ko le̩ n?
Abile ku me̩ ma mʼoji-wñ n kakini, I chʼo̩la uje̩wñ oñ u ka ñwu me̩-i n? Me̩ muda mʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩ ugbo o̩jo̩wu e-amaFarisi kpʼamaSadiusi.
E̩gbale̩ taku ma mʼoji-wñ kakini, I chʼo̩la emune̩ ugbo o̩jo̩wu ku ma du tʼuje̩wñ n, chai ugbo uko̩ o̩la e-amaFarisi kpʼamaSadiusi.
Oñ abu ku Jisus lewa oj ane̩ Se̩saria e-Filipai, i nʼamako̩che̩-wñ ene kakini, E̩ne̩ oñ amone̩ aka kʼO̩ma One̩ che ta?
Oñ ma kakini, Aboʼka aka ki Jo̩n kʼi ache baptism le̩; abo iche̩ka ka kʼE̩laija; abomune̩ ojoji ojoji la ka ku Je̩re̩maya, cho̩kpo̩ni e̩ne̩ʼka ef amakache̩.
I ka ñwu ma kakini, Ama ame̩ fa. E̩ne̩ oñ ame̩ ka kʼomi che?
Taku Saimo̩n Pita dohi kakini, Uwe̩ chʼiKraisti, O̩ma e-O̩jo̩ kʼi deju.
Oñ Jisus dohi ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ gbede, uwe̩ Saimo̩n Barjona, todu o̩re̩la kpʼe̩bie̩ biʼi rʼe̩ eju n, chai Ata-mi kʼi dʼefojale.
Omi laño̩ aka ñw e̩ ge̩ kakini, Uwe̩ che Pita, oñ oj apata le̩ u la ako̩ ujeju abo-mi kʼu do̩; e̩wñ uro̩na alaku o̩jegu ñʼagbiti bʼowñ jo̩ n.
Nakʼo̩ma igede ojane̩ efojale ñw e̩; oñ e̩wñ duu kʼe̩ fʼu ji ane̩-ile̩-i achʼe-kʼi chʼe̩ji efojale. Oñ e̩wñ du kʼe̩ tu ane̩-ile̩-i achʼe-kʼi chʼe̩tu efojale.
E̩gbale̩ i hi amako̩che̩-wñ owu ku ma we eka ñw e̩ne̩ du ka kʼowñ che Kraisti.

Akwʼe̩gbale̩ Jisus chane̩ eña amako̩che̩-wñ ka kʼenyi Je̩rusale̩m e-wñ nʼechi n, kʼi ali uwa nana o̩wo̩ abogijo kpʼo̩wo̩ amagboji amatama kpʼamako̩takada, kʼekpa ma akpa, taku ma ñʼadʼu kwane̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ.
Taku Pita mʼowñ du, i chane̩ edejurʼu kakini, O̩jo̩ ki li ejumomi-we̩, Ondu; i nʼugbo du kʼe-le̩ ake̩re̩bʼuwe̩ n.
Oñ i murida ka ñwu Pita kakini, Lale tʼubi-mi, Setan: e̩wñ e̩da mi hi e̩ che, todabu kʼe̩ ma dʼibe tʼe̩wñ e-O̩jo̩ n, chai tʼe̩wñ e-amone̩.
Taku Jisus ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, Iche̩wñ ki dʼe̩ne̩ du e̩do̩ kʼi tʼumi ubi, i ki fʼaire̩ o̩la-wñ re̩, kʼi la mʼoli uku-wñ du, kʼi tʼumi ubi.
Todu e̩ne̩ du ki dʼe̩ e̩do̩ kʼi fʼoji o̩la-wñ jadu, i afʼu o̩wo̩ tinyo̩; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi la adʼoji o̩la-wñ tinyo̩ todu mi, i ñʼaliʼi.
Todu e̩wñ chʼile-wñ kʼone̩ ki mʼile̩-i du gba nyʼo̩wo̩, kʼoji-wñ onugo la chʼofu? Abe̩k e̩wñ oñ one̩ adʼu kpailo̩ oji-wñ?
Todu O̩ma One̩ ache kʼi wa ef ojima Ata-wñ manyʼamonuche̩-wñ, e̩gbale̩ tak i adu ñw one̩ akoji alu kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ che e̩wñ e-wñ.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Iche̩ka jʼef abo ku ma dago emi-i ki ma nʼugbo du ku ma ñʼama alu kʼuku de̩ n, gbogbo wʼe̩gba ku ma li abu kʼO̩ma One̩ awa ef o̩da ojane̩-wñ.
Tak ubi o̩jo̩ me̩fa, Jisus mʼiPita kpai Jeme̩s kpʼo̩maye-wñ Jo̩n ko-te̩gu nyʼibe̩ uwo kʼi gbo̩gba ku ma jo̩ kpʼo̩la-ma ojoji.
Oñ i mud eida eju-ma, eju-wñ la fu dab olu, e̩wñ o̩la-wñ mud efufu dab ugane̩.
Me̩ la go, ma li abu ku Mose̩s kpʼE̩laija jo̩ ako̩la kpʼowñ.
Oñ Pita mʼomu da ka ñwu Jisus kakini, Ondu, i chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw a kʼa jʼemi: i dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ mak u namʼebu me̩ta emi; oka achʼutodu we̩, oka-wñ achʼutodu Mose̩s, oñ oka-wñ la achʼutodu E̩laija.
Abu kʼi nʼo̩la le̩ aka ta, go, akpa kʼi afane̩ debono ma; me̩ la go, omuko̩la kwef akpa le̩ kakini, Owñ-i chʼO̩ma ufe̩do̩-mi kʼu fʼuyo̩-mi li ef uwñ; me̩ gbʼo̩la-wñ.
Tak abu kʼamako̩che̩ gbʼo̩, ma lewane̩ afʼeju bʼane̩ ma; ma la railo nana tabale.
Taku Jisus te̩wa adʼo̩wo̩ kado ma, i kakini, Me̩ kwane̩, me̩ ki railo n.
Oñ abu ku ma chʼeju dago ma ño̩ li e̩ne̩ du ge̩ n, chai owñ kʼi che Jisus le̩ kate.
Tak abu ku ma gwo̩ru uwo le̩ awane̩, Jisus hi uma owu kakini, E̩wñ igo ku me̩ li le̩, me̩ ki ka ñw e̩ne̩ du gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼO̩ma One̩ kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku n.
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ tʼowñ ene kakini, Mak e̩wñ chi kʼamako̩takada aka ka kʼE̩laija awa o̩gba chuu?
Oñ i dohi ñwu ma kakini, E̩laija awa mana, i la ahi e̩wñ du tʼe̩gu.
Omi muda aka ñwu me̩-i ka kʼE̩laija lewa me̩, ma la mejuma owñ n, oñ ma fʼe̩wñ du ki dʼuma e̩do̩ chʼo. Abe̩le̩ O̩ma One̩ ache kʼi li uwa ugbo ma ge̩.
E̩gba le̩ amako̩che̩-wñ mʼoji-wñ ka kʼo̩la Jo̩n kʼi ache baptism, oñ i ka ñwu ma le̩.
Tak abu ku ma le wʼugbo o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩, e̩ne̩ʼka te̩ wʼugbo-wñ akʼokuku nyʼane̩ ñw u kakini,
Ondu, li o̩ma-mi ejumomi, todabu kʼi achʼajukpakpa o̩la-wñ bie̩ne̩. I awane̩ ef una o̩gbe̩nugbe̩, kpai tef omi o̩gbe̩e̩ ge̩.
U la mʼowñ du wʼugbo amako̩che̩-we̩, ma la neke chʼo̩ga-wñ n.
Oñ Jisus dohi kakini, O, ame̩ abo̩gba kʼi ko̩ eke̩do̩no, ku ma laño̩ mʼame̩ ibe da, gbogbo nyʼe̩gba nadʼugbo me̩ ta? Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ naje̩ kpʼame̩ kade? Mʼowñ du wʼugbo-mi emi.
Taku Jisus dejurʼu oñ ebili le̩ kwʼef uwñ dufu; o̩ga imo̩to̩ le̩ la takpa akwʼiko le̩.
E̩gba le̩ amako̩che̩ te̩wʼugbo Jisus o̩wo̩ʼka ojoji, ma kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼawa ma neke nʼo dufu n?

Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Lef e̩do̩ ekono-me̩ kʼi de̩ re-i. Todu, ami, naka ñwu me̩, iche̩wñ ku me̩ nʼe̩do̩ ekono dab e̩yo̩ mustadi, ame̩ aka ñw uwo-i kakini, Chi kwʼemi kʼe̩ nyʼano̩mo̩, i la achi alo, oñ e̩wñ du kʼome̩ ma neke che n ade̩ n. [
Abʼe̩go̩-i muda adufu n, chai lugbo adua eche kpʼalu eji.]
Oñ abu ku ma aletʼemi tʼemi ane̩ Galili Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Ma che ku ma dʼO̩ma One̩ tef o̩wo̩ amone̩ me̩.
Ama la adʼowñ kpa, tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ ma adʼu kwane̩. Oñ e̩do̩-ma mukpabie̩ ololo ololo.
Oñ abu ku ma lewa Kapanahum, abo ku ma gba ute̩ o̩ko̩ unyi O̩jo̩ te̩wʼugbo Pita oñ ma kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼi akʼume̩ e̩wñ le̩ ate̩ ukpe̩reji she̩ke̩l le̩ n? I kakini, I-i.
Tak abu kʼi mugudu tef unyi Jisus gba nyʼa alu kakini, Ab i de̩ eju-we̩, Saimo̩n? O̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ oñ amonu ile̩-i agbʼute̩ o̩ko̩ kpʼo̩ko̩ ane̩ kwo ta? O̩wo̩ amo̩na e-ma? abe̩k o̩wo̩ abomune̩ ojoji?
Oñ ab i kakini, O̩wo̩ abomune̩ ojoji, Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Mak amo̩ma-ma kwojʼane̩ ofofo ke.
Ama tode̩gba kʼa da ma hi, e̩ nyʼo̩la ohimmi kʼe̩ tʼali, tak e̩ mʼe̩ja kʼi adufu wa ejodudu du, kʼe̩ la mʼalu-wñ chi, oñ uwe̩ ali she̩ke̩l oka; e̩ mʼe-le̩ gba kʼe̩ mʼu du ñwu ma tod omi kpʼuwe̩.
Iko le̩ amako̩che̩ te̩wʼugbo Jisus, ma kakini, Mak e̩ne̩ tule ojane̩ e-efojale?
Tak abu kʼi fʼimo̩to̩ ʼka do̩ wa, i mʼu du dago alumeji-ma,
oñ i kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Me̩ ma rida ku me̩ dab abimo̩to̩ n, i anʼugbo du ku me̩ agudu tʼojane̩ e-efojale n.
Todule̩ e̩ne̩ du kʼi ahi o̩la-wñ wane̩ dab imo̩to̩-i, e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi tule ojane̩ e-efojale.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi la mʼimo̩to̩ e̩go̩-iʼka gba ef odu-mi, omi i gba le̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi la fʼimo̩to̩ʼka ef abo ku ma ke̩do̩no mi-i dahi, i ma nyo̩ tule ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ ku ma mʼokuta unʼe̩wñ elile du lo̩koli o̩fa-wñ ku ma mʼu du ji ef ohimini ugbo kʼi nefu.
Atogwo ñw ile̩ tod e̩wñ udʼone̩ hi! Todu e̩wñ udʼone̩ hi awa chuu, i muda chʼatogwo ñw e̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ udʼone̩ hi lʼef uwñwa.

I la che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ abe̩k e̩re̩-we̩ fʼe̩ dahi mʼu ko̩da kʼe̩ dʼu rikpolo bʼo̩la-we̩ te̩; echʼe̩no̩lo̩ abe̩k ade̩re̩ kʼe̩ mugudu tef iñmi chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw e̩, tʼe-nʼo̩wo̩ meji abe̩k e̩re̩ meji ku ma ta dʼuwe̩ rikpolo tef una e-ogbegbele̩ le.
I la che̩wñ kʼeju-we̩ adʼe̩ hi, mʼu ne̩ tinyo̩ kʼe̩ dʼu rikpolo bʼo̩la-we̩ te̩; echʼabejuʼka kʼe̩ mugudu tef iñmi chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw e̩ tʼenʼeju meji ku ma adʼuwe̩ rikpolo tef uña ubie̩ e-una le.
Nago, me̩ ki dʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef abo egini-i ro̩che̩ke̩ne̩ n; todu naka ñwu me̩ kakini, amonuche̩ e-ma jʼago eju Ata-mi e-efojale pioo. [
Todu O̩ma One̩ lewa kʼi fʼe-kʼi lenyo̩ jadu.]
Ab i de̩ eju-me̩ ta? Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka nʼamala ogume̩lu tak oka chila kwef uma, i atʼokeka chi ef ogume̩lu le̩ no̩ kʼi nyʼoj uwo uwo afeju e-kʼi chila le̩ n?
I la che̩wñ kʼi fʼu li fe̩de̩lii, ami, naka ñwu me̩, ka kʼi ayo̩ ñw e-le̩ tʼabo okeka chi ef ogume̩lu ku ma ma chila n le.
Abe̩le̩ i la dʼAta-me̩ ki dʼefojale e̩do̩ todu kʼabo egini-iʼka kʼi lenyo̩ n.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩maye-we̩ dʼe̩ re, lo, kʼe̩ mʼu du biʼu e̩gba kʼeju-we̩ kpʼowñ kate dʼane̩. Iche̩wñ kʼi fʼomu-we̩ gbo̩, e̩ fʼo̩maye-we̩ je̩ me̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼi ma agbo̩ n, e̩ mʼone̩ʼka abe̩k one̩ meji omune̩ ko mʼo̩la, todu kʼalu ame̩nibenu meji abe̩k e̩ta ki je̩ ñw o̩la du ki dago.
I la che̩wñ kʼi ko̩ egbo̩ e-ma, e̩ ka ñw abo udo̩ ujeju. I la che̩wñ kʼi ño̩ ko̩ egbo̩ e-abo udo̩ ujeju ge̩, i ki dab abo uche̩ichi kpʼagbo̩kane̩ ñw e̩.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩, kakini, E̩wñ du ki che ku me̩ ji ane̩-ile̩-i, achʼe-kʼi chʼe̩ji efojale; oñ e̩wñ du ku me̩ tu ane̩-ile̩-i achʼe-kʼi chʼe̩tu efojale.
Omune̩ de̩ ge̩, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼalu one̩ meji ef ume̩ chʼoka ile̩-i ugbo e̩wñ du ki che ku me̩ bi, i amud e-ma kwugbo Ata-mi e-efojale.
Todu ugbo du kʼone̩ meji abe̩k e̩ta wa jo̩ tef odu-mi, u dʼalumeji-ma o̩mo̩.
E̩gba le̩ Pita te̩wa ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, e̩re̩ onu monu oñ o̩maye-mi adʼumi re kʼu natʼo̩ no̩ ñw u? gbogbo nyʼonu mebie?
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, I che gbogbo nyʼonu mebie oñ naka ñw e̩-i n, chai gbogbo onu mebie ebie ugbo o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩gwa.
Todu ojane̩ e-efojale chebiu one̩ʼka kʼi chʼonu kʼi dʼe̩ e̩do̩ kʼi fʼo̩ko̩-wñ lo kpʼamadu-wñ.
Oñ abu kʼi chane̩ elo, ma dʼe̩ne̩ʼka-ma wʼugbo-wñ kʼi jʼo̩ o̩me̩ dab ipam e̩jika o̩gba me̩gwa.
Oñ abu kʼi ma neke ra n, odu-wñ ñwa ñwu ma ku ma mʼowñ kpʼo̩ya-wñ kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼe̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ ko ta kʼo̩me̩ ki ra.
Todule̩ adu le̩ lewa abʼane̩ ma, i dʼoji kane̩ ñw u kakini, E̩ fe̩do̩je̩ kpʼomi ta, kʼu narʼo̩me̩ ñw e̩ chaka.
Oñ abu kʼejumomi adu le̩ ma je̩ ñw u n, odu-wñ tʼadu le̩ no̩ tane̩, oñ i tʼo̩ko̩ kʼi me̩ le̩ no̩ chʼe̩ ele.
Adu le̩ muda le dufu oñ i fʼe̩ne̩ʼka kʼowñ kpʼowñ chʼadu li, kʼi jʼo̩ o̩me̩ ipam me̩ta nyʼolia me̩gwa; oñ i lewa gwo̩nyʼu i kpakanyʼu o̩fa, i kakini, E̩ fʼo̩me̩ kʼe̩ je̩ mi ra!
Todule̩ e̩ne̩ kʼowñ kpʼowñ chʼadu le̩ lewa bʼane̩ ma, i gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kakini, E̩ fe̩do̩je̩ kpʼomi, kʼu narʼo̩me̩ ñw e̩.
I muda dʼe̩ e̩do̩ n, oñ i kwʼo̩mo̩ nyʼadʼowñ rikpolo tef unyi uga gbogbo tak i fʼo̩me̩ kʼi je̩ ra.
Todule̩ abu kʼabo kʼama kpʼowñ chʼadu li e̩wñ ki wache le̩ e̩do̩-ma kpabie̩ tabale oñ ma lewa choli e̩wñ du kʼi che le̩ jane̩ ñw odu-ma.
E̩gba le̩ odu-wñ fʼu do̩ wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ adu bibi, todu o̩ko̩ kʼe̩ gba bʼumi u tʼo̩me̩ kʼe̩ je̩ le̩ du no̩ chʼuwe̩ ele.
I ño̩ dukpe̩ kʼe̩ li e̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ kpʼowñ chʼadu le̩ ejumomi n? dabalu kʼomi li uwe̩ ejumomi n?
Oñ odu-wñ we̩do̩, i la mʼu du ñw abo ku ma adʼo̩bata ñw u, gbogbo tak i arʼo̩me̩ du kʼi je̩ ñw u.
Abe̩le̩ Ata-mi e-efojale ñʼache me̩ ge̩, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ma to̩no̩ ñw o̩maye-wñ kpʼe̩do̩-wñ n.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ki Jisus fʼo̩la-i ka kpoji i kwo bi Galili te̩, oñ i lewa oj ane̩ Judia ejudaba Jo̩rdan.
O̩wo̩ amone̩ lile la rʼo̩ ubi, oñ i fʼo̩ga-ma chekpa o̩mo̩.
Tak amaFarisi lewʼugbo-wñ ajʼo ma, ma kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñw one̩ dʼo̩ya-wñ tinyo̩ tod o̩la tʼo̩la du?
Oñ i dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ cho̩kalatu ka kʼAnyi e̩wñ le̩ che ma o̩ko̩ kpʼo̩ya kwʼabakwane̩ n?
I laño̩ kakini, Tod e-ki de̩ oñ one̩ atʼata-wñ kpʼiye-wñ no̩, tak i amanyʼo̩ya-wñ. Oñ ama meji achʼo̩re̩laʼka.
Tod abe̩le̩ ama ño̩ chʼeji ge̩ n, chai o̩re̩laʼka. Todule̩ e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ fugwodama rʼoka, one̩ ki fʼu daru n.
Ma ka ñw u kakini, Mak e̩wñ chi ku Mose̩s ñwa ñwu ma ku ma dʼo̩takada e̩daru ñw u ku ma tʼo̩ no̩ tinyo̩?
I ka ñwu ma kakini, Tod e̩do̩-me̩ ki chʼe̩no̩ oñ Mose̩s je̩ ñwu me̩ tʼamo̩ya-me̩ no̩ rinyo̩; i muda dʼabe̩le̩ kwʼabakwane̩ n.

Omi muda aka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼo̩ya-wñ tinyo̩ ki ma chʼutod e̩wñ abutabu kʼi che n, kʼi nyʼanʼo̩ya omune̩, e̩ño̩ya i ache le̩; e̩ne̩ kʼi la ane̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma du tinyo, e̩ño̩ya i ache le̩.
Amako̩che̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼo̩la one̩ kpʼo̩ya dabe̩le̩, mak ile dʼef o̩ya ene̩ n.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, I la chʼo̩chaka amone̩ neke bute̩ ñw o̩la ku ma ka-i n, chai abo kʼO̩jo̩ du ñwu ma.
Todu amonoji do̩mo̩ ku ma bi kwef iye-ma abe̩le̩; amonoji kʼone̩ che ma la do̩mo̩; amonoji laño̩ do̩mo̩ ku ma dʼo̩la-ma chʼonoji tod ojane̩ e-efojale. E̩ne̩ kʼi neke bute̩ ñw u kʼi bute̩ ñw u.
E̩gba le̩ ma kʼabimo̩to̩ wʼugbo-wñ todu kʼi kʼo̩wo̩ nʼuma oji kʼi chadua. Amako̩che̩-wñ muda dejurʼuma.
Ama Jisus kakini, Me̩ tʼabimo̩to̩ no̩, me̩ ki fu ma naba ku ma we ewʼugbo mi n; todu ojane̩ e-efojale do̩mo̩ ñw abo e̩go̩-i.
Oñ abu kʼi kʼo̩wo̩ nʼuma oji i kwʼo̩mo̩ le.
E̩ la go, e̩ne̩ʼka wʼugbo-wñ kakini, Akone̩ e̩wñ, e̩nyo̩ e̩wñ nache todu kʼu nʼiñmi ogbegbele̩?
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ tʼumi ene o̩la e̩wñ e̩nyo̩? E̩ne̩ʼkate nyo̩. I la che̩wñ ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ gudu tef iñmi, e̩ nadejutʼo̩la uko̩ le̩.
I ka ñw u kakini, E-ugbo? Oñ Jisus kakini, E̩ ki kpʼone̩ n; e̩ ki tene o̩ya e̩ne̩ omune̩ n; e̩ ki joji n; e̩ ki gbʼibenu olemi n; i
e̩ bumʼata-we̩ kpʼiye-we̩; kʼe̩ ki fe̩do̩ ekeji-we̩ dab o̩la-we̩.
Okolobia le̩ ka ñw u kakini, U fʼe̩wñ-i du de me̩; e̩wñ ño̩ bo̩ ñwu mi ta?
Taku Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ mufu, e̩ nyʼamʼane̩-we̩ ko ta, kʼe̩ mʼu ko ñw ame̩nale, tak uwe̩ anʼe̩wñ akoko efojale; tak e̩ lewa tʼumi ubi.
Ama abu kʼokolobia le̩ gbo̩, i kwʼo̩mo̩ le kpʼe̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩, todu i chenʼe̩wñ nana.
Oñ Jisus ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩, ka kʼakanya i che ñw anana tak i agudu tʼojane̩ e-efojale.
Naño̩ dabi aka ñwu me̩ kakini, Inyakulumi ele gu awo ebije uge̩wñ du me̩ tʼanana egudu nyʼojane̩ e-O̩jo̩ le.
Oñ abu kʼamako̩che̩ gbo̩ awuwu-wñ fʼuma mu tabale. Ma kakini, Mak e̩ne̩ ma neke jadu ke?
Oñ Jisus mʼeju korʼuma, i kakini, Ugbo amone̩ e̩wñ-i jʼache n, ama ugbo O̩jo̩ e̩wʼñ du jʼache.
E̩gba le̩ Pita dohi ñw u kakini, Go, a tʼe̩wñ du no̩, a la kwotʼuwe̩ ubi me̩, e̩wñ oñ awa ane̩ taa?

Oñ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩, ka kʼame̩ ku me̩ te̩tatʼumi ubi-i, iko ku ma nyʼe̩wñ du etito̩, e̩gba kʼO̩ma One̩ gugu oj ede ojima-wñ, ame̩ onugo agugu oj ede me̩gweji akajo̩ o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l me̩gweji.
Tak e̩ne̩ du kʼi tʼunyi abe̩k amo̩maye e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k amo̩maye onobule̩ abe̩k ata abe̩k iye abe̩k amo̩ma abe̩k ane̩ uche̩ no̩ tod odu-mi agba ogume̩lu-wñ i ñʼaje̩ iñmi ogbegbele̩ e̩wñ ogu ge̩.
Abo o̩gba wewe muda achʼabo ubi otitala, oñ abo ubi achʼabo o̩gba.
Todu ojane̩ e-efojale dab one̩ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi, kʼi takpa dafu odudu kʼi tene abuko̩lo̩ kʼi adʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ chʼo̩gu ñwu ma.
Oñ abu kʼowñ kpʼabuko̩lo̩ le̩ fʼalude o̩jo̩ʼka iko̩bo̩ me̩jo̩, i je̩ ñwu ma lo tef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ.
