Tak abu kʼi le-dufu dab agogo me̩la, i li abomune̩ ku ma dago jʼef aja ofofo.
Oñ i ka ñw abo le̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki ño̩ nyʼef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-mi, tak e̩wñ du kʼi chʼo̩kpakpa-wñ nara ñwu me̩. Oñ ma le.
Oñ i ño̩ ledufu dabe̩ne̩ kʼagogo me̩gweji kpʼagogo me̩ta, i ño̩ chʼalu le̩ ge̩.
Oñ abu kʼi ño̩ ledufu dabe̩ne̩ kʼagogo me̩lu, i fʼabomune̩ li ku ma dago jo̩; tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ dago jʼemi o̩wo̩ ofofo gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩?
Ma ka ñw u kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼo̩gu ñw a n. I ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ki ño̩ lo tef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma ge̩.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ adu, odu uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ ka ñw adanuku-wñ kakini, Fʼabuko̩lo̩ le̩ do̩ wa kʼe̩ rʼo̩me̩ ñwu ma; e̩ chane̩ kwʼabo ubiane̩ gbogbo wʼabo ejodudu.
Oñ abu kʼabo agogo me̩lu le̩ lewa ma gba iko̩bo̩ me̩jo̩ iko̩bo̩ me̩jo̩ le de̩.
Tak abu kʼabo ejodudu lewa, ma neju ka kʼama agba tʼe-le̩ le̩; ama laño̩ gba iko̩bo̩ me̩jo̩ iko̩bo̩ me̩jo̩ ge̩.
Oñ abu ku ma mʼu gba, ma kwokʼeñmini rʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi le̩ o̩la, ma kakini,
Abo ubiane̩-i ku ma che auwaʼkate, e̩ la mʼawa kpʼama ko chʼokujo̩? awa kʼa nʼadu kʼolu kpa wa gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩.
I muda dohi ñw e̩ne̩ʼka-ma kakini, Onuku, u chʼe̩ uji n, i chʼiko̩bo̩ me̩jo̩ omi kpʼuwe̩ dʼalu n?
Mʼe̩wñ-we̩ ko kʼe̩ lo we̩. I dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu nadʼu ñw e̩ne̩ ubiane̩-i alu kʼu nadʼu ñw e̩.
O̩da aje̩ ñwu mi che e̩wñ ki dʼumi e̩do̩ ef e̩wñ e-mi n? Abe̩k eju-we̩ che bibi ukpe̩ kʼomi chʼe̩ne̩ e̩nyo̩?
Abe̩le̩ abo ubi achʼabo o̩gba, oñ abo o̩gba achʼabo ubi otitala.
Oñ abu ki Jisus ache kʼi te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m, i mʼamako̩che me̩gweji le̩ ko le tʼo̩wo̩ʼka, tak ej o̩na le̩ i ka ñwu ma kakini,
Go, a ate̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m-i, ma la adʼO̩ma One̩-i ñw amagboji amatama kpʼamako̩takada, taku ma akpʼo̩ abi e-uku.
Taku ma adʼowñ ñw abo uche̩ichi ku ma chʼo uke̩, ku ma fʼu ja ku ma la fʼu kamoli. Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ ma adʼu kwane̩.
E̩gbale̩ iye amo̩ma Ze̩be̩di manyʼamo̩ma e-wñ wʼugbo-wñ, ma dojikane̩ ñw u, ma la bi owñ ebi e̩wñʼka.
Oñ i ka ñw onobule̩ le̩ kakini, E̩wñ dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩? I ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ka, kʼamo̩ma-mi meji-i, oka ki gugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-we̩, oka ki gugu o̩wo̩ awohi-we̩ ef o̩da ojane̩-we̩.
Jisus la dohi kakini, Me̩ ma e̩wñ ku me̩ biʼi n. Me̩ neke ñmo̩ ago kʼu nache kʼu ñmo̩? Ma ka ñw u kakini, A neke che.
I ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ añmo̩ ago-mi, mana, ama egugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-mi kpʼo̩wo̩ awohi-mi chʼe-mi kʼu nadʼu ñw one̩ n, chai abo kʼAta-mi ñwo̩che tane̩ ñwu ma.
Oñ abu kʼamame̩gwa gbʼo̩ o̩la amo̩maye meji le̩, i bi ma eju.
Ama Jisus fʼuma dʼo̩ wʼugbo-wñ i kakini, Ame̩ chema ka kʼamagboji abo uche̩ichi akʼo̩la-ma chʼodu-ma, ame̩ne̩lile-ma achʼo̩wo̩ o̩da ñwu ma.
I muda dʼabe̩le̩ ef ume̩ n, e̩ne̩ du kʼi muda dʼe̩ e̩do̩ kʼi mud e̩ne̩lile ef ume̩, achʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ ñwu me̩,
oñ e̩ne̩ du ki dʼe̩ e̩do̩ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ o̩gba ef ume̩, adu-me̩ i ache.
I dabalu kʼO̩ma One̩ ma wa ku ma che e̩wñ ñw owñ n, chai kʼowñ ki che e̩wñ ñw one̩ kʼi laño̩ dʼoji o̩la-wñ chʼe̩wñ uro̩me̩ koji amone̩ wewe.
Tak abu ku ma kwo Je̩riko alo, o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile darʼo̩ ubi.
E̩ la go, abu kʼamafeju meji ku ma gugu et o̩na gbo̩ ka ku Jisus alale, ma kwa kakini, Ondu, O̩ma Defid, li uwa ejumomi!
O̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ la dejurʼuma ku ma chechi; ma muda kwa tule kakini, Ondu, O̩ma Defid, li uwa ejumomi!
Tak abu ki Jisus kwodago, i fʼuma do̩, oñ i kakini, E̩wñ dʼume̩ e̩do̩ kʼu nache ñwu me̩?
Ma kakini, Ondu, todu kʼeju-wa ki mubi ke.
Oñ abu kʼejumomi-ma ma je̩ ñw u n, Jisus do̩wo̩kadʼeju-ma, tak ababale̩ ma kwogane̩, oñ ma rʼo̩ ubi.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma me̩ru Je̩rusale̩m awa, ku ma lewa Be̩tfage ugbo uwo O̩lif, e̩gbale̩ Jisus fʼamako̩che̩-wñ meji kpuche̩.
I ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nyʼef adogbe kʼi kpejurʼume̩ le̩, oñ ababale̩ me̩ ali o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ku ma dʼu tʼuro o̩mo̩, o̩ma-wñ la manyʼu. Me̩ mutu ku me̩ dʼu wa ñwu mi.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du kʼabu du ñwu me̩, me̩ aka kakini, Eku-ma aku Ondu-wa. Ababale̩ i la ako ma kpuche̩ wa.
E̩wñ-i la wache todu kʼo̩la ku ma ka lef akache̩ le̩ kʼi che̩ kakini,
Me̩ ka ñw o̩ma Zayo̩n e-onobule̩ kakini,
Oñ abu kʼamako̩che̩ le ku ma che alu ki Jisus ñwa ñwu ma,
ma mʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ kpʼo̩ma-wñ le̩ ko wa. Taku ma mʼukpo ubo̩lama-ma ko nʼubi ma, tak i kwogugu oji-ma.
Tak ojile o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ mʼukpo-ma ko te̩ jʼej o̩na, abo kibo̩ la gu eñmi oli che̩ ko te̩ jʼej o̩na.
Oñ o̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma rʼo̩ o̩gba kpʼabo ku ma tʼo̩ ubi kwukwa kakini, Hosana ñw O̩ma Defid; e̩ne̩ kʼi awa ef odu Ondu ki nʼele, Hosana ef uña kʼi dʼatate̩!
Oñ abu kʼi mugudu tefu Je̩rusale̩m ewo le̩ du amiejo, ma kakini, E̩ne̩ de̩-i?
Oñ o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ kakini, Owñ-i che Jisus, akache̩ kʼi kwo Nazare̩t e-Galili le̩.
Taku Jisus mugudu tef unyi O̩jo̩, oñ i fʼabo du ku ma ta e̩wñ kpʼabo ku ma la e̩wñ ne kwef unyi O̩jo̩ dufu. Oñ i fʼitebulu abo ku ma kpailo̩ o̩ko̩ ke̩che̩ nʼane̩, kpʼe̩wñ ugugu abo ku ma ta amikede.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, I che̩ko̩ tane̩ kakini, Ma ado̩ unyi-mi ko̩ unyi adua, ame̩ muda dʼu chʼo̩wo̩ amadinya.
Tak amafeju kpʼabo ku ma chika lewʼugbo-wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩, oñ i fʼo̩ga-ma che.
Oñ abu kʼamagboji amatama kpʼamako̩takada fʼe̩wñ aye kʼi che li, kpʼabimo̩to̩ ku ma jʼef unyi O̩jo̩ akwukwa kakini, Hosana ñw O̩ma Defid, i bi ma eju.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩ gbo̩ e̩wñ kʼabo-i jʼaka-i? Oñ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, I-i; ame̩ chʼo̩kalatu mama ta n kakini,
Tak i tʼuma no̩ jʼo̩mo̩, i kwʼef ewo le̩ dufu nyi Be̩tani, oñ i ru o̩mo̩.
Oñ odudu-wñ abu kʼi anyʼewo le̩ ebi nakpʼo̩.

Oñ abu kʼi fʼoli o̩gbaikoloʼka li eti o̩na, i lewa ofe-wñ, i la li e̩wñ du oji-wñ n, chai eñmi kate. Tak i ka ñw u kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼe̩ ro ogbegbele̩ ge̩ n. Tak e̩re̩re̩ le̩ oli o̩gbaikolo le̩ gbe̩.
Oñ abu kʼamako̩che̩-wñ li ma yaye kakini, Abile kʼoli o̩gbaikolo gbe̩ e̩re̩re̩-i?

Oñ Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ ku me̩ nʼe̩do̩ ekono, kʼe̩do̩-me̩ ma chʼejeji n, iche̩wñ e-oli o̩gbaikolo-i kate oñ me̩ ache n; dagba me̩ chaka ka ñw uwo-i kakini, E̩ ki muchi kwʼemi kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ rikpolo tef ohimini abadi, i adʼabe̩le̩.
Oñ e̩wñ du ki che ku me̩ abi ef adua, ku me̩ la ke̩do̩no, me̩ agba.
Tak abu kʼi wʼef unyi O̩jo̩ kʼi do̩mo̩ ako̩ ma e̩wñ, amagboji amatama kpʼabogijo amone̩ lewʼugbo-wñ kakini, O̩da e̩wñ e̩ nʼache e̩wñ-i? E̩ne̩ la dʼo̩da kide̩ ñwe̩?
Oñ Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Omi ñʼatʼume̩ ene o̩laʼka ge̩, iche̩wñ ku me̩ kʼe-le̩ ñwu mi, tak omi ñʼaka ñwu me̩ o̩da e̩wñ kʼu ne̩ ache e̩wñ-i.
Baptism e-Jo̩n le̩, ugbo i kwo ta? Efojale abe̩k ugbo amone̩ i kwo? Oñ ma kwolo̩la kpʼo̩la-ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼa ka kʼi kwʼefojale, i aka ñw a kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ ma ke̩do̩nʼo n?
I la che̩wñ kʼa kakini, Ugbo one̩ i kwo, a arailo o̩wo̩ amone̩-i, todu Jo̩n dab akache̩ eju amone̩ du.
Taku ma dohi ñwu Jisus kakini, A ma n. Tak owñ ño̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi la aka ñwu me̩ ef o̩da e̩wñ kʼu nache e̩wñ-i n.
Abu me̩ do̩ ta? E̩ne̩ʼka nʼo̩ma meji; oñ i lewʼugbo e-ejodudu, i kakini, O̩ma-mi, lo kʼe̩ chʼuko̩lo̩ ef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma eñini.
Oñ i dʼohi ñw u kakini, I dʼumi e̩do̩ n. I de̩ pe̩e̩, i chane̩ ejumama tak i le.
Oñ i lewʼugbo e-ekeji, i ño̩ ka abe̩le ge̩. Tak e-le̩ dohi kakini, Elo-mi de̩, Daudu. I la le n.
Ef uma meji e̩ne̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi che e̩wñ ki dʼata-wñ e̩do̩? Ma kakini, E-ejodudu. Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩, ka kʼamagbo̩kane̩ kpʼamajo̩ko̩ atʼo̩gba ñwu me̩ nyʼojane̩ O̩jo̩.
Todu Jo̩n wʼugbo me̩ lʼo̩na o̩kpakpa, me̩ la ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ n; amagbo̩kane̩ kpʼamajo̩ko̩ muda ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ. Abu ku me̩ la li, me̩ jumama ubiane̩-i ku me̩ ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ n.

Me̩ ño̩ gbo̩ ita omune̩ ge̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka do̩mo̩ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi, kʼi fʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma lo, kʼi la fʼo̩gba bu nyʼu daka; tak i fʼagu o̩ko̩o̩lo̩ gwa tef uwñ; oñ i fʼo̩do̩go̩ ne; i la mʼu du nyʼamaluche̩ o̩wo̩, tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le.
Oñ e̩gba kʼadiko e̩ro-wñ me̩rane̩ i fʼamadu-wñ kpuche̩ nyʼugbo amaluche̩ le ku ma gbʼe̩ro-wñ wa.
Tak abu kʼamaluche̩ le̩ gwo̩nyʼamadu-wñ, ma fʼoka kpigbe, ma fʼoka kpa, ma la fʼokuta ro̩ dʼoka.
I ño̩ dabi fʼamadu wewe tʼabo ejodudu le̩ le kpuche̩ nyʼugbo ma, taku ma ño̩ che ma abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Tak ubiane̩-wñ i fʼo̩ma-wñ kpuche̩ nyʼugbo ma, i kakini, Ma adiba ñw o̩ma-mi.
Abu kʼamaluche̩ le̩ muda li o̩ma-wñ ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, E̩ne̩ ki aje̩ e̩wñ ogu-i de̩. Me̩ lewa, kʼa mʼu du kpa, tak a anʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼu mu, ma mʼu du rikpolo kwef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ tʼo̩do̩da, ma la mʼu du kpa.
Todule̩, e̩gba kʼodu uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ lewa, ab i ache amaluche̩ le̩ taa?
Ma ka ñw u kakini, Ame̩ne̩bie̩ne̩ le̩, i akpa ma rinyo̩ bie̩ne̩ bie̩ne̩, tak i adʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ nyʼamaluche̩ omune̩ o̩wo̩, abo le̩ akʼe̩ro-wñ ñw u iko iko-wñ.
Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini,
Lef e-kide̩ naka ñwu me̩ ka kʼama abʼume̩ gba ojane̩ O̩jo̩, taku ma adʼu ñw abo uche̩ichi ku ma ache e̩wñ kʼi arʼe̩ro-wñ. [
Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi lewa nʼokuta kide̩ age̩ye̩geye̩ge̩; e̩ne̩ kʼokuta-i muda awane̩ anʼu akwu rinyo̩ dab ebutu.]
Oñ abu kʼamagboji amatama kpʼamaFarisi gbʼita-wñ ma chema ka kʼama i aka-i.
Ma la feju ku ma gwo̩nyʼu, ma muda railo o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩, todu owñ chʼakache̩ eju-ma.
Taku Jisus dohi, i ño̩ dabi ko̩la ñwu ma ef ita, kakini,
Ojane̩ e-efojale chebiu e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼonu, kʼi hi uje̩wñ iyawo tod o̩ma-wñ.
Tak i fʼamadu-wñ kpuche̩ nyʼado̩ abo kʼi nye̩ka ñwu ma wʼugbo iyawo le̩. I la dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma wa n.

I ño̩ dabi fʼamadu omune̩ kpuche̩ kakini, Me̩ ka ñw abo ku ma nye̩ka ñwu ma le̩ kakini, Me̩ go, u fʼuje̩wñ ñwo̩che te̩ me̩, ma fʼamo̩kokuno̩-mi kpʼame̩la abula kpa me̩, e̩wñ du la cheñwo̩che te̩, me̩ lewa jʼuje̩wñ iyawo.
I muda wʼuma eju n, oñ ma le e-ma: e̩ne̩ʼka le tʼoko e-wñ, oka le tʼugbo e̩wñ inyama-wñ;
oñ abo kibo̩ gwo̩nyʼamadu-wñ, ma bʼuma ina, ma la fʼuma kpa.
Tak onu le̩ we̩do̩, oñ i fʼabogu-wñ kpe̩ nyʼakpʼamakpʼone̩ le̩ rinyo̩, i la fʼewo-ma gujo.
E̩gba le̩ i ka ñw amadu-wñ, kakini, Uje̩wñ iyawo le̩ cheñwo̩che te̩ mana, abo ku ma nye̩ka ñwu ma le̩ la nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ n.
Todule̩ me̩ nyʼugwe̩ta o̩na o̩na, oñ aluka one̩ du ku me̩ li me̩ do̩ wa uje̩wñ iyawo-i.
Tak abu kʼamadu le̩ le dufu tʼo̩na o̩na, ma kʼabo du ku ma li wa jo̩, tʼe̩ne̩ bibi tʼe̩ne̩ e̩nyo̩; tak ef unyi iyawo le̩ che̩ko̩ ñw abo ku ma chekukane̩ jo̩.
Ama abu kʼonu le̩ mugudu wa kʼi go abo ku ma chekukane̩ jo̩ le̩ i fʼe̩ne̩ʼka li o̩mo̩ kʼi ma nyi e̩wñ o̩la iyawo n;
tak i ka ñw u kakini, Onuku, abile kʼe̩ mugudu wʼemi, kʼe̩ ma nʼe̩wñ o̩la iyawo n? Oli kwo tʼa alu.
E̩gba le̩ onu ka ñw abo ku ma che e̩wñ ñw u, kakini, Fʼowñ e̩re̩ kpʼo̩wo̩ ji ku me̩ dʼu rikpolo tef e̩chubi o̩do̩da. O̩mo̩ aku ero̩ kpʼenyi elo̩ ade̩.
Todu abo ku ma do̩ ma chewewe, abo ku ma muda chi de̩ ke̩e̩.
E̩gbale̩ amaFarisi le nanyojuju alu ku ma ale ku ma je̩ ñw u dʼo̩la tinyo̩ ku ma mʼu.

Taku ma fʼamako̩che̩ e-ma kpai abo He̩ro̩d kpuche̩ nyʼugbo-wñ, ma kakini, Akone̩ e̩wñ, a chema ka kʼe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ochochi, kʼe̩ la kʼone̩ o̩na O̩jo̩ ef ochochi, kʼo̩la e̩ne̩ du ma wʼe̩ eju n, todu uwe̩ ago eju one̩ n.
Todule̩ e̩ naka ñw a, ab i de̩ eju-we̩? O̩da aje̩ ñw a dʼo̩kane̩ ñwu Sisa abe̩k i aje̩ n?
Ama abu ki Jisus chema ali bibi-ma i kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ jʼumi ma-i? Ame̩ ame̩nayechi.
Dʼo̩ko̩ ane̩ le̩ ña mi. Taku ma dʼo̩ko̩ʼka wa ñw u kʼi go.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ojibo-i kpʼorubutu ku ma ko̩-i, e-e̩ne̩ de̩?
Ma kakini, E-Sisa de̩. Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Maku me̩ kʼe̩wñ e-Sisa ñwu Sisa, kpai e̩wñ e-O̩jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩.
Oñ abu ku ma gbʼo̩, ma kwoyaye. Taku ma tʼowñ no̩ le e-ma.
O̩jo̩ le̩ amaSadiusi wʼugbo-wñ, owñ chʼabo ku ma ka kʼudajikwane̩ du do̩mo̩ n, oñ ma nʼowñ ene,
kakini, Akone̩ e̩wñ, Mose̩s kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ kʼi ma nʼo̩ma n leku, o̩maye-wñ ki mʼo̩ya-wñ du ubi-wñ kʼi dʼebi o̩na ugbe̩ ñw o̩maye-wñ.
Amo̩maye e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mebie la jʼugbo wa; tak e-ejodudu fʼo̩ya ne̩, i leku, oñ abu kʼi ma nʼugbe̩ n, i tʼo̩ya-wñ no̩ ñw o̩maye-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ ekeji kpʼe̩ke̩ta ño̩ de̩ ge̩, gbogbo wʼe̩kebie.
Ubiane̩-wñ du onobule̩ la leku.
Todule̩ e̩gba udajikwane̩ fa, o̩ya e-e̩ne̩ i ache ef ama mebie-i? Todu o̩chaka-ma fʼowñ ne̩ o̩ya.
Oñ Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ela me̩ la abu ku me̩ ma ma O̩takada O̩lo̩jo̩ n kpʼukpahiu O̩jo̩ n.
Todu e̩gba udajikwane̩ ma anʼo̩ya n, ma la adʼu kpʼo̩ko̩ n, ma muda dab amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ efojale.
I muda chʼe-o̩la udajikwane̩ abo ku ma ku le̩, ame̩ chʼo̩kalatu e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ ka ñwu me̩ n?kakini,
Omi chʼO̩jo̩ e-Ebraham kpʼO̩jo̩ Aise̩k kpai O̩jo̩ e-Jeko̩b in? Owñ la chʼO̩jo̩ e-abo ku ma ku n, chai e-abo ku ma deju.
Oñ abu kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ gbo̩, awuwu o̩la kʼi ako̩ ma fʼuma mu.
Oñ abu kʼamaFarisi gbo̩ ka kʼi je̩ ñw oli kwotʼamaSadiusi alu, ma kʼo̩la-ma jeju jo̩,
tak e̩ne̩ʼka ef uma kʼi chʼamoli o̩lo̩da fʼene tʼu kʼi jʼowñ ma.
I kakini, Akone̩ e̩wñ, ugbo chʼo̩la uko̩ e-kʼi nana ef o̩lo̩da?
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Uwe̩ ki fe̩do̩ Ondu O̩jo̩-we̩ kpai o̩gbo̩ e̩do̩-we̩ du kpai o̩gbo̩dudu onugo-we̩ du kpai o̩gbo̩ ibe-we̩ du.
E-ki chʼo̩la uko̩ lile kpai e-ejodudu de̩.
E-ekeji ño̩ dab owñ, kakini, Uwe̩ ki fe̩do̩ ekeji-we̩ dab o̩la-we̩.
O̩gbo̩dudu o̩lo̩da kpʼo̩la amakache̩ lo̩ko̩li o̩la uko̩ meji-i.
Oñ abu kʼamaFarisi jeju jo̩ Jisus tʼuma ene,
kakini, O̩la Kraisti le̩ fa, ab i de̩ eju-me̩? O̩ma e̩ne̩ i che? Ma ka ñw u kakini, E-Defidi.
I ka ñwu ma kakini, Mak abile ki Defid dʼo̩ ef Afu ko̩ Ondu ta? kakini,
Ondu ka ñw Ondu-mi,
I la che̩wñ ki Defid dʼowñ kʼOndu, abile kʼi chʼo̩ma-wñ?
I la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi neke dohi o̩la okate ñw u n; akwʼo̩jo̩ le̩ e̩ne̩ du la gbe̩do̩ etʼowñ ene du ge̩ n.
E̩gbale̩ Jisus ko̩la ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ kpai amako̩che̩-wñ,
kakini, Amako̩takada kpai amaFarisi gugu e̩gu Mose̩s;
todule̩ e̩wñ du ki che ku ma ka ñwu me̩, me̩ dejutʼo̩ ku me̩ che; me̩ ki muda che tikpa uko̩lo̩-ma n, todu eka ma ka, ma la che n.
Ma la ji oj adu oj adu ki woji ki la chenʼo̩bata e̩ne̩, oñ ma kʼo nʼamone̩ ika; i muda dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma dʼo̩mo̩wo̩ e-ma chʼo iche̩ n.
Ama uko̩lo̩ du ku ma che chʼutodu kʼeju amone̩ ki li; todu ma che kʼaño̩ uko̩lo̩-ma ki nʼabe̩, ma ño̩ che e̩gba e̩re̩ ukpo-ma ki nana,
ma laño̩ che̩do̩ uña ojima ugbo uje̩wñ uyo̩, kpai ugugu e-ojima ef unyi ujeju,
kpai ugwa ef aja, kʼamone̩ ki ño̩ do̩ ma ko̩, Rabai.
Ame̩ ki muda je̩ ñwu ma do̩ me̩ ko̩ Rabai n: todu e̩ne̩ʼka do̩mo̩ kʼi chʼako̩ me̩ e̩wñ; o̩chaka-me̩ la chʼamo̩maye.
Me̩ ki la do̩ e̩ne̩ du kʼata ane̩-ile̩-i n, todu e̩ne̩ʼkate do̩mo̩ kʼi chʼata-me̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼefojale le̩.
Ma ki la do̩ me̩ ko̩ ame̩nuto̩gba n, todabu kʼAtʼume̩ o̩gba chʼoka, owñ che Kraisti le̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki tule ef ume̩ ache e̩wñ ñwu me̩.
E̩ne̩ du ki la che kʼi ahi o̩la-wñ ne ma ahiʼu wane̩; oñ e̩ne̩ du ki che kʼi ahi o̩la-wñ wane̩ ma ahiʼu dago.
Ama atogwo, ame̩, amako̩takada kpai amaFarisi, ame̩nayechi! todabu ku me̩ fʼo̩na ojane̩ e-efojale re nyʼamone̩; todu ame̩ la gudu tʼo̩ n, me̩ la tʼo̩ no̩ ñw abo ku ma che ku ma gudu ku ma gudu n. [

Atogwo, ame̩, amako̩takada kpai amaFarisi, ame̩nayechi! todabu ku me̩ mʼunyi amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ko che e̩wñ aluje̩, abu ku me̩ la nʼadua eche jiji dʼo̩wo̩ yʼuma eju todule̩ ajo̩ e-me̩ ku ma aka akpuna tule.]

Atogwo, ame̩ amako̩takada kpai amaFarisi, ame̩nayechi todabu ku me̩ tale o̩la ohimini kpai ane̩ e̩gbe̩ ku me̩ dʼe̩ne̩ kate chʼe̩ne̩ tito̩ ef ume̩; tak e̩gba kʼi dʼabe̩le̩, me̩ mʼu du che o̩ma uña ubie̩ tʼame̩ onugo le onu meji.

Atogwo ñw ame̩, amafeju ku me̩ ñʼone̩ o̩na, ku me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki fʼunyi O̩jo̩ e-ejefu kpenʼo̩la-wñ, e-le̩ chʼabu du n; e̩ne̩ ki muda fʼo̩jamalia unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu kpe̩nʼo̩la-wñ fʼudu fa bʼo̩la-wñ oji ma me̩.
Ame̩, ame̩ne̩fule̩fu kpai amafeju: todu kali e-ki tule, o̩jamalia le̩? abe̩k unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu kʼije̩ñw o̩jamalia le̩ afo̩?
Me̩ ño̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpenʼo̩la-wñ, i chʼabu du n; e̩ne̩ ki muda fʼe̩wñ ele ki dʼoj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ kpenʼo̩la-wñ fʼudu fa bʼo̩la-wñ oji ma me̩.
Amafeju, me̩ ka e-ki tule, e̩wñ ele le̩? abe̩k ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩wñ ele afo̩?
Todule̩ e̩ne̩ du ki fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpenʼo̩la-wñ, tʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ tʼe̩wñ du ki jʼoji-wñ oñ i kpenʼo̩la-wñ le̩.
E̩ne̩ du ki la fʼunyi O̩jo̩ ejefu kpenʼo̩la-wñ, tʼunyi le̩ tʼe̩ne̩ ki gugu ef uwñ oñ i kpenʼo̩la-wñ le̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki fʼefojale kpenʼo̩la-wñ, mak ede O̩jo̩ kpai e̩ne̩ ki gugu oji-wñ oñ i kpenʼo̩la-wñ le̩.

Atogwo ñw ame̩, amako̩takada kpai amaFarisi, ame̩nayechi! todabu ku me̩ fʼache̩fa kpai aulu kpai aiñmili kpe̩ rʼe̩gwa, oñ me̩ mʼojiʼka-wñ ko ñw Ondu; me̩ la tʼe̩wñ o̩lo̩da ki woji no̩ tinyo̩, owñ chʼajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka kpai ejumomi eli kpai e̩do̩ ekono. I muda dukpe̩ ku me̩ chʼe̩wñ-i tila, ku me̩ la we etʼe-kibo̩ le̩ no̩ tinyo̩.
Ame̩, amafeju ku me̩ ñʼone̩ o̩na, me̩ ta agwiyege rinyo̩, me̩ muda adʼinyakulumi mi!
Atogwo ñw ame̩, amako̩takada kpai amaFarisi, ame̩nayechi! todabu ku me̩ gwe̩ ejo̩do̩da ago omi kpai ugba hiolo, ejefu-wñ la kpe̩ko̩ tiili ñw e̩wñ one̩ egba je̩ kpai e̩wñ awulu.
Uwe̩ Farisi, afeju, fʼejefu ago kpai ugba gwe̩ hiolo ejodudu, todu kʼej o̩do̩da-wñ ki ño̩ de̩ hiolo ge̩.
Atogwo ñw ame̩, amako̩takada kpai amaFarisi, ame̩nayechi! todabu ku me̩ chebiu oji ku ma dʼafu kuru, e-kʼej o̩do̩da-wñ chʼalifia ego kʼej ef uwñ muda kpe̩ko̩ ñw achiku abo ki ku kpai e̩wñ iwa du.
Abe̩le̩ ej o̩do̩da e-me̩ me̩ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa eju amone̩; ej ef ume̩ muda che̩ko̩ ñw ayechi kpai ugbite̩re̩.
Atogwo ñw ame̩, amako̩takada kpai amaFarisi, ame̩nayechi! todabu ku me̩ fʼojinoji amakache̩ ko̩, me̩ laño̩ fʼoji abo o̩kpakpa ñwo̩che jo̩;
oñ me̩ kakini, I ma chʼawa de̩ o̩kpanachi amata-wa, a ma tuta kpai ama ef e̩bie̩ amakache̩ le̩ n.
Todabe̩le̩, ame̩ gbʼo̩la-me̩ ibenu ka kʼame̩ chʼamo̩ma abo ku ma fʼamakache̩ le̩ kpa.
Ame̩ ki chenyu e̩ñwa amata-me̩ kʼi gbagba ko̩ ke.
Amejo, amato̩ olijo! abu me̩ ale kʼajo̩ e-uña ubie̩ afʼume̩ oji?

Me̩ go, lef e-kide̩ omi akpʼamakache̩ kpai amanibe kpai amako̩takada uche̩ wʼugbo me̩: ame̩ akpa abo iche̩ka ef uma, me̩ afʼuma kamoli; ame̩ la aja iche̩ka ef uma ef unyi ujeju-me̩, me̩ la adoli ma nyʼewo ewo:

todu kʼe̩bie̩ o̩kpakpa du kʼi dafo ane̩-ile̩-i, akwo e̩bie̩ Ebe̩l, e̩no̩kpakpa le̩, gbogbo wʼe̩bie̩ Ze̩karaya, o̩ma Barakaya ku me̩ kpa agbagba unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu kpai ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, kʼi lewʼoji e-me̩.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩wñ-i du awa bʼabo o̩gba-i oji ma.

O, Je̩rusale̩m, Je̩rusale̩m, uwe̩ kʼe̩ akpa amakache̩ kʼe̩ lañʼarʼokuta do abo ku ma kpuche̩ wʼugbo-we̩, e̩re̩ onu monu oñ i dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu kʼamo̩ma-we̩ wa jo̩ ugbokate, alu kʼolajuwe̩ ako amo̩ma-wñ jʼef ika-wñ; i la dʼume̩ e̩do̩ abe̩le̩ n.
Me̩ go, ma tʼachigodo unyi-me̩ no̩ ñwu me̩ me̩.
Todu, eka naka ñwu me̩-i kakini, I nʼugbo du ku me̩ ñʼali mi ate̩tʼo̩gba-i ge̩ n, gbogbo wʼe̩gba ku me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki awa ef odu Ondu ki nʼele.
Oñ abu ki Jisus kwo bʼef unyi O̩jo̩ te̩ alo, amako̩che̩-wñ la te̩wʼugbo-wñ ku ma kʼunyi unyi ki jʼef ologbo unyi O̩jo̩ le̩ ñʼo̩.
Ama i dohi ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ li e̩wñ ki jo̩-i chaka? Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I nʼugbo du ku ma atʼokuta okate no̩ nʼe̩do̩ omune̩ emi ku ma ma agulo̩ wane̩ n.
Oñ abu kʼi gugu oj uwo O̩lif, amako̩che̩-wñ lewʼugbo-wñ o̩wo̩ʼka; ma kakini, E̩ ka ñw a, e̩gba oñ e̩wñ-i ade̩ ta? E̩wñ la chʼujiwe ewa-we̩, kpai e-ukpoji o̩kpanachi-i?
Taku Jisus dohi ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nago tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ako me̩ la.
Todu amone̩ wewe awa ef odu-mi, ma kakini, Omi Kraisti le̩ de̩; ma la aje̩ ñw amone̩ wewe la.
Ame̩ agbʼinabali ogu kpai iche̩ ogu; me̩ go, me̩ ki dutu n, todu e̩wñ-i awache chuu. I muda chʼukpoji-wñ de̩ ta n.
Todu abo uche̩ichiʼka akwane̩ tʼabo ichi omune̩ o̩la, oñ ojane̩ʼka ako bʼojane̩ ekeji; ukpo̩ta la akpa, ane̩ ñʼamiejo ugbo ojoji ojoji.
E̩wñ-i du muda chʼuchane̩ efu eche ta.
E̩gba le̩ ma amʼume̩ ko jʼef o̩bata, ma la akpa me̩. Tak abo uche̩ichi du achʼulaka me̩ tod odu-mi.
Oñ e̩gba le̩ amone̩ wewe adʼo̩la-ma hi, ma la akʼomune̩ ñw amone̩ mu, ma la achulaka omune̩.
Tak amakache̩ olemi wewe akwane̩, ma la ako amone̩ wewe la.
Oñ lef ugbite̩re̩ ki akpo̩rane̩ ufe̩do̩ amone̩ wewe abulo̩;
e̩ne̩ ki muda afʼe̩do̩ lichi tʼukpoji, owñ le̩ ma ajadu.
Ma la atakoya Uche̩nyo̩ e-Ojane̩-i ef o̩gbo̩ ile̩ du ugbo kʼone̩ te̩ kade kʼi gbʼibenu ñw abo uche̩ichi du; e̩gba le̩ tak ukpoji-wñ awa.
Todule̩, e̩gba du ku me̩ li e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ e-alache̩, ku ma ka o̩la-wñ lefu Danie̩l akache̩ le̩, kʼi dago ef uña kiafo̩ (e̩ne̩ ki acho̩kalatu-i kʼi namʼoji-wñ),
e̩gba le̩ abo ku ma jo̩ Judia ki nara tʼoj uwo oj uwo.
E̩ne̩ ki dʼojokunyi ki gwo̩ru wane̩ kʼi kʼe̩wñ kwef unyi-wñ n.
E̩ne̩ ki la dʼoko kʼi dabi wubi kʼi mʼotogbo-wñ ko n.
Atogwo, muda achʼe-abo ku ma defu, kpai abo ku ma jʼad e̩nya ñw o̩ma ñmo̩ iko le̩!
Me̩ ki la chaduwa todu kʼera kʼame̩ ara ki we ede̩ e̩gba afʼowe̩ kpai o̩jo̩ uñmi;
todu e̩gba le̩ o̩bata lile ade̩ e-kʼe̩go̩-wñ ma de̩ akwo uchane̩ ile̩-i gbogbo wʼifai n; i la nʼugbo du kʼi ade̩ ate̩tʼo̩gba ge̩ n.
I la che̩wñ ku ma ma bʼo̩jo̩ le̩ wane̩ n, ma ma jadu o̩re̩la du n. Ama todu abo ku ma chi ma tane̩, ma abʼo̩jo̩ le̩ wane̩.
E̩gba le̩ iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du aka ñwu me̩ kakini, go, Kraisti le̩ dʼemi, abe̩k e̩mi-i, me̩ ki gbagbo̩ n.
Todu amiKraisti olemi akwane̩, kpai amakache̩ olemi, ma la akʼujiwe lile kpai e̩wñ uno̩ jo̩; todabe̩le̩, i ma jʼache ma ma ko abo ku ma chi ma tane̩ le̩ la ge̩.
Me̩ go, u ka ñwu me̩ tane̩ me̩.
Todule̩, iche̩wñ ku ma aka ñwu me̩ kakini, Me̩ go, i dʼef aje̩tachi; me̩ ki dufu n. Me̩ go, i dʼef unyi ejefu; me̩ ki gbagbo̩ n.
Todu alu kʼo̩mamanya akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu kʼi ada gbogbo nyʼolane̩, abe̩le̩ ewa O̩ma One̩ ade̩.
Ugbo du kʼoku e̩la de̩, o̩mo̩ amu-gunu awajo̩.
Oñ anubi o̩bata iko le̩ ababa olu amud e̩chubi, ochu la afane̩ n, oñ awo awo achi kwʼojale wane̩, e̩wñ ukpahiu ukpahiu efojale la amiejo.
Tak e̩gba le̩ ujiwe O̩ma One̩ atejugede efojale; iko le̩ amo̩lo̩pu ane̩ ile̩-i du akʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩-ma, ma la ali O̩ma One̩ kʼi awa oj akpa ojale; ukpahiu kpai ojima lile la adʼubi-wñ.
Tak i akpʼamonuche̩-wñ uche̩ manyʼuko̩la o̩kakachi lile, oñ ma kʼabo-wñ kʼi chi ma tane̩ wajo̩, ma akwo o̩wo̩ afu me̩le̩ kwo ukade efojale gbogbo wʼukade-wñ e̩jekeji.
Me̩ ki la ko̩che̩ ita ugbo oli o̩gbaikolo le̩; e̩gba kʼe̩to̩-wñ nʼomi o̩la kʼi lañʼalu etito̩, ame̩ chema ka kʼo̩lo̩ji me̩rane̩ me̩:
abe̩le̩ ame̩ ge̩, e̩gba ku me̩ li e̩wñ-i du me̩ ki ma ka kʼi me̩rʼalugbana anane̩ me̩.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼabo o̩gba kide̩ alale rinyo̩ gbogbo tak e̩wñ-i du wache n.
Efojale kpai ane̩ ile̩-i alale rinyo̩; i muda nʼugbo du kʼo̩la kʼu ka alale rinyo̩ n.
Ama o̩la o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i kpai e-iko le̩, e̩ne̩ du ma n, dagba i chʼamonuche̩ efojale, chai Ata kate ma.
Oñ alu ki de̩ o̩kpanachi Noa, abe̩le̩ ewa O̩ma One̩ ade̩.
Todu alu ma jo̩ aje̩ kpai añmo̩ kpai anʼo̩ya kpai o̩ya edukpʼo̩ko̩ iko o̩gba tak omi wobi le̩ gbogbo wa kad o̩jo̩ ku Noa mugudu tef o̩ko̩ le̩,
ma la ma n, gbogbo uwobi omi le̩ lewa, oñ i mʼuma ko chaka; abe̩le̩ ewa O̩ma One̩ ñʼade̩.
E̩gba le̩ one̩ meji ajʼoko; ma adʼoka, ma atʼoka no̩;
abobule̩ meji ajo̩ anʼe̩wñ odokuta; ma adʼoka, ma atʼoka no̩.
Todule̩, me̩ gwe̩ke̩ adide, todabu ku me̩ ma ma o̩jo̩ kʼOndu-me̩ awa n.
Me̩ ki muda ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi ma ma ide e̩konu kʼajoji ma wa, i ma gwe̩ke̩ adide; i ma la je̩ ñwu ma fʼo̩do̩ unyi-wñ gwa gudu n.
Todu e-kide̩, o̩la e-me̩ onugo ki ño̩ che̩mu tane̩; todu adiko ku me̩ ma do̩ kʼi awa n oñ O̩ma One̩ awa.
E̩ne̩ chʼadu kʼi chʼachubi odu-wñ kpai anibe e-kʼodu-wñ dʼu dago chʼadejute̩ abunyi-wñ kʼi kʼuje̩wñ ñwu ma je̩ iko-wñ?
Adu kʼodu-wñ lewa ke̩re̩bʼo̩ ef e̩wñ le̩ eche gbede.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I adʼadu le̩ dago kʼi mud adejute̩ idu-wñ chaka.
I muda che̩wñ kʼadu ki bie̩ne̩ aka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, Odumi akpo̩kpe̩ ewa;
tak i chane̩ eja abo kʼowñ kpai ama chʼadu, kʼi lañʼaje̩ kpai eñmo̩ kpai amañmo̩te̩;
odu adu kide̩ awa o̩jo̩ kʼi ma nʼeju-wñ n kpai adiko kʼi ma ma n.
Tak i akʼowñ da meji, oñ i adʼukpe̩-wñ te̩ manyʼame̩nayechi; o̩mo̩ aku ero̩ kpai enyi elo̩ ade̩.
E̩gba le̩ ma adu ojane̩ e-efojale wawe abigbe̩le̩ me̩gwa ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, ku ma mʼagege-ma ko ledufu aledo o̩ko̩ya etito̩.
E̩lu ef uma chʼame̩ne̩fule̩fu, one̩ me̩lu-ma la chʼamanibe.
Todu ame̩ne̩fule̩fu le̩ mʼagege-ma ko, ma la nʼekpo manyʼu n.
Amanibe muda nʼekpo ef uli-ma manyʼagege-ma.
Oñ abu kʼo̩ko̩ya etito̩ le̩ che̩du ewa, olu chane̩ ago ma chaka taku ma kwololu.
Oñ alumeji odu ukwa dago kakini, Me̩ go, o̩ko̩ya etito̩ de̩-oo! Me̩ dufu wa ale-dʼo.
E̩gba le̩ abigbe̩le̩ le̩ chaka kwane̩, oñ ma ñwʼowu agege-ma che.
Tak ame̩ne̩fule̩fu ka ñw amanibe le̩ kakini, Me̩ fʼekpo-me̩ ba ñw a, todabu kʼagege-wa alu.
Ama amanibe le̩ dohi kakini, Tode̩gba kʼi ma bʼawa kpʼame̩ jo̩ n; me̩ nyʼugbo abo ku ma tʼekpo ku me̩ la ñw o̩la-me̩.
Oñ ubi ma abu ku ma nyʼala, o̩ko̩ya etito̩ le̩ lewa. Tak abo kʼo̩la-ma chʼe̩mu tane̩ mugudu nyʼugbo uje̩wñ iyawo kpai owñ, oñ ma fʼo̩na re.
Ubi le̩ abigbe̩le̩ ki bo̩ ño̩ lewa ge̩; ma kakini, Odu, odu, mʼo̩na bi ñw a.
Ama i dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, U ma me̩ n.
Todule̩ me̩ ki gwe̩ke̩ adide, todabu ku me̩ ma ma o̩jo̩-wñ abe̩k iko-wñ n.
Todu alu kʼone̩ kʼi anyʼule̩ fʼamadu e-wñ do̩ wa kʼi la kʼane̩-wñ nyʼuma o̩wo̩;
i la mʼejika me̩gwa ko ñw e̩ne̩ʼka, oñ i kʼe̩le̩ ñw e̩ne̩ omune̩, i la kʼeji ñw e̩ne̩ omune̩; i ko ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ alu kʼibe-wñ bo̩jo̩, tak i le tʼule̩-wñ.
Oñ ababa le̩ e̩ne̩ ki gbʼejika me̩gwa le nachinyama; i la jʼile ejika me̩gwa omune̩ manyʼu.
Abe̩le̩ ge̩, e̩ne̩ ki gba e̩le̩ fʼile ejika me̩le̩ je̩ manyʼu.
Ama e̩ne̩ ki gbʼeji le̩ le nafʼura gwa, oñ i kʼo̩ko̩ odu-wñ maja o̩mo̩.
Tak i kpo̩kpe̩ gboogbo, odu amadu le̩ lewa, oñ i fʼo̩la o̩ko̩ le̩ lo kpai ama.
Tak e̩ne̩ ki mʼejika me̩gwa gba lewa, oñ i mʼejika me̩gwa omune̩ ko wa manyʼu; i kakini, Odu-mi, e̩ mʼejika me̩gwa ko nyʼumi o̩wo̩, go, u ño̩ fʼejika me̩gwa omune̩ je̩ manyʼu ge̩.
Odu-wñ ka ñw u kakini, I nyo̩! uwe̩, adu ki nyo̩ ki achubi one̩. E̩ chubi-mi ef e̩wñ re me̩, nadʼuwe̩ dago kʼe̩ nʼo̩da e̩wñ wewe; mugudu wʼef uyo̩ odu-we̩ ke.
Tak e̩ne̩ ki gbʼejika me̩le̩ le̩ ño̩ lewa; i kakini, Odu-mi, e̩ mʼejika me̩le̩ ko nyʼumi o̩wo̩; go, u ño̩ file me̩le̩ je̩ mʼo̩.
Odu-wñ ka ñw u kakini, I nyo̩! uwe̩, adu ki nyo̩ kʼi achubi one̩. E̩ chubi-mi ef e̩wñ re me̩, nadʼuwe̩ dago kʼe̩ nʼo̩da e̩wñ wewe; mugudu wʼef uyo̩ odu-we̩ ke.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki gbʼejika meji le̩ ño̩ lewa; i kakini, Odu-mi, u chema uwe̩, kʼe̩ chʼagbiti; ugbo kʼe̩ ma gbe̩ n, e̩ ja; ugbo ki ma chʼuwe̩ fiatuka n, e̩ yajo̩ kwʼo̩mo̩;
oñ abu kʼu narailo, u le namʼe̩jika-we̩ du maja ef ane̩; go, e̩wñ-we̩ de̩-i.
Oñ odu-wñ dohi ñw u kakini, Adu bibi kʼe̩ chʼo̩kpo̩! E̩ chema kʼomi aja ugbo ki ma chʼomi gbe̩ n, u lañʼayajo̩ ugbo ki ma chʼomi fiatuka n;
todule̩ i ma dukpe̩ kʼe̩ mʼo̩ko̩-mi ko ñw abo ku ma dʼo̩ko̩ ta, tak omi ma wa agba e̩wñ-mi manyʼile oji-wñ.
Todule̩ me̩ bʼowñ gba ejika meji le̩ ku me̩ mʼu ko ñw e̩ne̩ ki nʼejika ogu le̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi nʼe̩wñ, ma ñʼadʼu manyʼu ñw u ge̩, tak i ane̩ ololo; ama e̩ne̩ ki ma ne̩ n tʼe̩wñ kʼi ne̩ ma abʼo̩ gba.
Me̩ dʼadu ki ma chʼeku ñw one̩ n le̩ rikpolo tef e̩chubi o̩do̩da; o̩mo̩ aku ero̩ kpai enyi e̩lo̩ ade̩.
Abe̩le̩ e̩gba du kʼO̩ma One̩ lewa ef ojima-wñ kpai amonuche̩-wñ du ubi-wñ, e̩gba le̩ i agugu oj ede ojima-wñ.
Taku ma akʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du wa jʼo̩gba-wñ. Oñ i ada ma ru bʼomune̩ te̩, alu kʼadide ala adʼamala ru bʼamewo te̩;
tak i akʼamala jo̩ o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ; amewo muda ajo̩ awohi-wñ.
E̩gba le̩ Onu aka ñw abo ku ma jo̩ o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ lewa, ame̩ kʼAta-mi de̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩ le̩. Me̩ ki fʼojane̩ ku ma ñwo̩che tane̩ ñwu me̩ akwe̩gba ku ma kpʼe̩re̩ ile̩-i je̩ ogu:
todu ebi kpa mi, oñ me̩ dʼe̩wñ ñwu mi je̩; alugbe̩ kpa mi, oñ me̩ dʼomi ñwu mi ñmo̩; u chʼononojo, me̩ gba mi uru;
u tago ofo, oñ me̩ kʼukpo ñwu mi lo; u chʼe̩ne̩gbo, oñ me̩ lewa fejudo mi; u dʼef unyidudu, oñ me̩ wʼugbo mi.
E̩gba le̩ abo̩kpakpa adʼohi ñw u kakini, Ondu, e̩gba oñ a li kʼebi akpʼe̩ kʼa la dʼe̩wñ ñw e̩ je̩? abe̩k alugbe̩ akpʼe̩, tak a dʼomi ñw e̩ ñmo̩?
E̩gba oñ a li uwe̩ kʼe̩ chʼononojo tak a gbʼe̩ ru? abe̩k e̩ tago ofo tak a kʼukpo ñw e̩ lʼago?
Oñ e̩gba a li uwe̩ kʼe̩ nʼe̩gbo o̩la, abe̩k e̩ dʼef unyidudu, tak a wʼugbo we̩?
Tak Onu le̩ adohi ñwu ma kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ukpe̩ ku me̩ che ñw e̩ne̩ ki nyaʼka ef amo̩maye-mi-i, mak omi me̩ che ñwu.
E̩gba le̩ i aka ñw abo ku ma jʼo̩wo̩ awohi-wñ kakini, Me̩ kwo bʼumi te̩, ame̩ ku ma nama ñwu me̩-i tef una e-ogbegbele̩ ku ma ñwo̩che tane̩ todu Abulumone̩ kpai amonuche̩-wñ.
Todu, ebi kpa mi, me̩ la dʼe̩wñ ñwu mi je̩ n; alugbe̩ kpa mi, me̩ la dʼomi ñwu mi ñmo̩ n;
u chʼononojo, me̩ la gba mi uru n; u tago ofo, me̩ la kʼukpo ñwu mi lo n; i lo̩ mi n, u laño̩ dʼef unyidudu, me̩ la wa fejudo mi n.
Tak ama ñʼadohi kakini, Ondu, e̩gba oñ a li uwe̩ kʼebi nakpʼe̩? abe̩k alugbe̩? abe̩k uwe̩ chʼononojo? abe̩k e̩ tago ofo? abe̩k i ma lo̩ we̩ n? abe̩k e̩ dʼef unyidudu? kʼa ma la che e̩wñ ñw e̩ n?
Tak i adohi ñwu ma kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩-i ka kʼukpe̩ ku me̩ ma che ñw e̩ne̩ʼka ef abo ki nya-i n, me̩ la che ñwu mi n.
Abo le̩ la akwʼo̩mo̩ nyʼef udu ogbegbele̩ echi; abo̩kpakpa muda alo tʼef iñmi e-ogbegbele̩.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ki Jisus fʼo̩la-i du ka kpoji, i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini,
Ame̩ chema ka ki bo̩ o̩jo̩ meji tak Elaloji awane̩, ku ma adʼO̩ma One̩ ñwu ma mu ku ma fʼu kamoli.
E̩gba le̩ amagboji amatama kpai abogijo amone̩ le̩ jeju jʼanuku agboji amatama kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Kayafas;
oñ ma nyojuju todu ku ma fu Jisus gwo̩gwo̩ kʼi tʼuma o̩wo̩ ku ma mʼu du kpa.
Ama ma kakini, I chʼef uje̩wñ-i n, tode̩gba kʼekuku achi ef amone̩-i.
Oñ abu ki Jisus de̩ Be̩tani ef unyi Saimo̩n e̩no̩ga ikpemute le̩,
onobule̩ nʼugege ekpo kʼaja-wñ chekpuna lewʼugbo kʼi chekukane̩, oñ i mʼu du da nyʼu oji.
Oñ abu kʼamako̩che̩-wñ li u, i bi ma eju, ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku ma dʼu chihi-i?
Todu ma ma neke ta kʼo̩ko̩-wñ ma nana, ku ma kʼo ñw ame̩nale.
Oñ abu ki Jisus chema, i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ che onobule̩-i akanya? Todu i fʼuko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ che rʼumi me̩.
Todu me̩ nʼame̩nale ugbo me̩ e̩gba du; me̩ muda ane̩ omi e̩gba du n.
Todu ekpo kʼi du danyʼumi o̩la-i, todu oku-egu-mi eji oñ i che.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩, kakini, Ugbo du ku ma fʼakoya Uche̩nyo̩-i ta o̩gbo̩ ile̩-i du, ma ñʼadʼe̩wñ kʼonobule̩-i che ka, kʼi chʼurewa-wñ.
Tak abu kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef amame̩gweji le̩ kʼi kʼodu Judas Iskariot nyʼugbo amagboji amatama,
i kakini, E̩wñ dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ du ñwu mi, tak omi adʼu ñwu me̩? Taku ma mʼajifa ogue̩gwa ko jʼoj e̩bo̩ ñw u.
Oñ akwʼe̩gba le̩ i feju uña todu kʼi dʼu ñwu ma mu.
Oñ o̩jo̩ ejodudu ku ma chane̩ eje̩ akala kʼo̩jo̩wu ma dʼo̩ n, amako̩che̩ le̩ lewʼugbo Jisus; ma kakini, Ugbo i dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼa ñwo̩che ñw e̩ kʼe̩ je̩ Elaloji?
Oñ i kakini, Me̩ nyʼef ewo ugbo e̩ne̩ abe̩-i ku me̩ ka ñw u kakini, Akone̩ e̩wñ le̩ kakini, Iko-mi me̩rʼo̩wo̩ me̩; ugbo we̩ oñ nachʼElaloji manyʼamako̩che̩-mi.
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ che alu ki Jisus ñwa ñwu ma, oñ ma fʼElaloji ñwo̩che te̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼane̩ lo̩ i chekukane̩ manyʼamame̩gweji le̩.
Tak abu ku ma jo̩ aje̩ e̩wñ i kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka ef ume̩ adu mi ñw amone̩ mu.
Tak abu kʼe̩do̩-ma kpabie̩ tabale e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ chane̩ eka ñw u kakini, Ondu, i neke chʼomi?
Oñ i dohi kakini, E̩ne̩ ki atʼo̩wo̩ nyʼugba kpai omi, e̩ne̩ le̩ adu mi ñw amone̩ mu.
O̩ma One̩ alo chuu, alu ku ma ko̩ o̩la-wñ tane̩. Ama atogwo ñw e̩ne̩ ku ma adʼO̩ma One̩ ñw amone̩ mu lef uwñ le̩! Ma ma bi e̩ne̩ le̩ n, i ma chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw u.
Oñ Judas, kʼi dʼowñ ñw amone̩ mu le̩, dohi ñw u kakini, Rabai, i neke chʼomi? I ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ka-i.
Abu ku ma la jo̩ aje̩ e̩wñ, Jisus mʼakala du, oñ abu kʼi fʼaduwa chenyʼu, i fʼu guche̩, tak i mʼu ko ñw amako̩che̩, i kakini, Me̩ gba ku me̩ je̩; año̩la-mi de̩.
Tak abu kʼi mʼago du kʼi la fʼugwa gwa, i mʼu du ñwu ma; i kakini, O̩chaka-me̩ ki ñmʼo̩.
Todu e̩bie̩-mi e-alo ekpe̩ le̩ de̩-i, e-ku ma dʼu dafo todu amone̩ wewe todu etʼadure no̩.
Oñ naka ñwu me̩-i kakini, Akwe̩gba-i i nʼugbo du kʼu nañmo̩ e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma-i ge̩ n, gbogbo wʼiko e̩gba kʼu nañmo̩ etito̩-wñ kpai ame̩ ojane̩ Ata-mi.
Tak abu ku ma fʼeli ko̩ ma le dufu nyʼibe̩ uwo O̩lif.
E̩gba le̩ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩chaka-me̩ ali e̩wñ ki ada me̩ hi ugbo mi odu-i. Todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, Nadʼe̩wñ nu adide amala, tak amala ujo̩-i afiatuka.
Ama anubi ekwane̩-mi nadʼo̩gba-me̩ nyi Galili.
Pita muda dohi ñw u kakini, Dagba o̩chaka amone̩ ki li e̩wñ ki ada ma hi ugbo we̩, i ada mi hi ogbegbele̩ n.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Ami, naka ñw e̩-i, kakini, Odu-i o̩gba tak aiko̩ ki ko̩, uwe̩ araire̩ mi onu me̩ta.
Pita ka ñw u kakini, I chaka dʼukpe̩ kʼomi aku kpai uwe̩, i nʼugbo kʼu naraire̩ we̩ n. Abe̩le̩ amako̩che̩ chaka ño̩ ka ge̩.
E̩gba le̩ Jisus kpʼama lewa e̩bu ane̩ ku ma do̩ ko̩ Ge̩tse̩mani, oñ i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ jʼemi gbogbo kʼu nanyʼano̩mo̩ kʼu chaduwa.
Tak i mu Pita kpai amo̩ma Ze̩be̩di meji le̩ ko, i chane̩ eche̩do̩dudu, e̩do̩-wñ la kpa ololo.
E̩gba le̩ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Onugo-mi ache̩do̩dudu tabale gbogbo wa kad uku; me̩ gugu emi, ku me̩ gwe̩ke̩ adide kpai omi.
Tak abu kʼi le tʼo̩gba pe̩e̩ i la fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ i nachaduwa kakini, Ata-mi, iche̩wñ kʼi jʼache, mak ago kide̩ ki lale bʼumi te̩; i ki muda de̩ alu ki dʼumi e̩do̩ n, chaialu ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩.
Tak i lewʼugbo amako̩che̩ le̩ oñ i fʼuma li abu ku ma jo̩ alolu. Tak i ka ñwu Pita kakini, Abe̩le̩ le̩e̩, ame̩ gbiti bo̩jo̩ ku me̩ gwe̩ke̩ adide kpai omi auwa oka n?
Me̩ gwe̩ke̩ adide ku me̩ la chaduwa, tode̩gba ku me̩ gudu tef ajama. Ibe afu la de̩ kolo kolo mana, o̩re̩la muda chʼe̩gbo.
I ño̩ dabi kwʼo̩mo̩ onu ekeji, i chaduwa kakini, Ata-mi, iche̩wñ kʼe-kide̩ ma neke lale bʼumi te̩ n, chai e̩gba kʼu ñmʼo̩, mak e̩wñ ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ ki wache.
Tak abu kʼi ño̩ mudabi wa, i fʼuma li abu ku ma jʼalolu, todu igbegbeneju-ma woji ñw olu.
Tak i tʼuma no̩ oñ i ño̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le achaduwa onu e̩ke̩ta; o̩la le̩ gbage̩de̩ i ño̩ dabi ka ge̩.
E̩gba le̩ i lewa ugbo amako̩che̩ le̩ oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ lolu waa fai, ku me̩ ñmi ke; go adiko le̩ me̩ro̩wo̩ awa me̩; ma la mʼO̩ma One̩ du tʼef o̩wo̩ ame̩nadure me̩.
Me̩ kwane̩ kʼa alo; go, e̩ne̩ kʼi mʼumi du ñwu ma mu le̩ me̩ro̩wo̩ awa-i.
Oñ abu kʼi nʼo̩la le̩ aka ta, go, Judas, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef amame̩gweji le̩, lewa; o̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma nʼugbada kpai ugbolo la darʼo̩ ubi; ugbo amagboji amatama kpai abogijo amone̩ le̩ ma kwo wa.
Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi ache kʼi dʼu ñw amone̩ mu le̩ mʼujiwe du ñwu ma tane̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼu dʼalu-mi kʼo̩ alu owñ le̩ de̩, me̩ gwo̩nyʼuwñ.
Tak ababa le̩ i nyʼugbo Jisus, i kakini, Agba-oo. Rabai! Oñ i dʼalu kʼo̩ alu.
Oñ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩numana-mi, ule̩ e̩wñ e̩ lewa-i? E̩gba le̩ ma te̩wa adʼo̩wo̩ do Jisus, oñ ma gwo̩nyʼuwñ,
E̩ la go, e̩ne̩ʼka ef abo ku ma jʼugbo Jisus fʼo̩wo̩ nadala, i la mʼugbada-wñ wo̩, oñ i fʼadu agboji amatama da, i la mʼeti-wñ la.
E̩gba le̩ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Mʼugbada-we̩ du dabi tunyʼe̩gu-wñ; todu o̩chaka amone̩ ku ma mʼugbada ko alenyo̩ ñw ugbada.
Abe̩k uwe̩ do̩ ka kʼomi neke gbo̩ko̩bʼAta-mi kʼi akʼamonuche̩ ku ma tʼo̩gba me̩gweji le jo̩ ñwu mi n?
I ma dʼabe̩le̩ ab O̩takada O̩lo̩jo̩ ale ki ache̩, kʼi kakini, Abe̩le̩ i ade̩ tila.

Adiko le̩ Jisus ka ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ kakini, Dabe̩ne̩ ku me̩ ko bʼadinya oñ me̩ nʼugbada kpai ugbolo wa ku me̩ mu mi? U te̩te̩ gugu ef unyi O̩jo̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa akʼone̩ e̩wñ, me̩ la gwo̩nyu mi n.
O̩gbo̩ e̩wñ-i du muda wache todu kʼO̩takada O̩lo̩jo̩ e-amakache̩ kʼi che̩. E̩gba le̩ amako̩che̩ chaka tʼowñ no̩, ma ra.
Oñ abo ku ma gwo̩nyu Jisus le̩ mʼowñ du lo tʼugbo Kayafas agboji amatama, ugbo kʼamako̩takada kpai abogijo jeju jo̩.
Pita muda tʼowñ ubi o̩najiji, gbogbo wʼologbo agboji amatama, oñ abu kʼi mugudu tʼejefu, i kwogugu ugbo abimo̩to̩ kʼi li ukpoji-wñ.
Oñ amagboji amatama kpai o̩gbo̩ abo̩hiala du tʼafeju e̩ne̩ ki agbʼibenu olemi nyu Jisus ku ma dʼowñ kpa.
Ma la li n, dagba ame̩nibenu olemi wewe chaka wʼo̩mo̩. Tak ubi le̩ one̩ meji lewa,
ma kakini, Owñ-i ka kakini, U neke fʼunyi O̩je̩ Ejefu-i gulo̩ tak u namʼu du ko̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta.
Tak agboji amatama le̩ kwodago, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, I nʼohi du kʼe̩ du n? E̩wñ chʼibenu kʼabo-i agba nyʼuwe̩-i taa?
Jisus muda chechi-wñ kpo̩, Tak agboji amatama ka ñw u kakini, NakpʼO̩jo̩ kʼi deju nʼuwe̩, iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ che Kraisti, O̩ma e-O̩jo̩, e̩ ka ñw a.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ka-i. U muda aka ñw e̩-i, kakini, Ate̩to̩gba-i ame̩ ali O̩ma One̩ abu kʼi gugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ Ukpahiu, kʼi lañʼawa oj akpa e-efojale.
E̩gba le̩ agboji amatama le̩ fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, i kakini, Akpabie̩ O̩jo̩ oñ i che-i! Eku e̩nibenu ño̩ ku wa ge̩? Me̩ go, me̩ gbo̩ akpabie̩ O̩jo̩ kʼi che fai me̩.
Abu me̩ do̩ taa? Oñ ma dohi kakini, I fʼuku fa bʼo̩la-wñ ma me̩.
E̩gba le̩ ma tʼito̩ rʼowñ eju, ma la fʼo̩kpo̩ rʼowñ; abo ki bo̩ la kʼowñ awo,
ma kakini, Kʼache̩ ñw a, uwe̩ Kraisti! E̩ne̩ dʼo̩wo̩ gwʼuwe̩?
Pita la gugu ef ologbo o̩do̩da; oñ imo̩to̩ onobule̩ʼka lewʼugbo-wñ, i kakini, Uwe̩ ño̩ dʼugbo Jisus e̩ne̩ Galili le̩ ge̩.
I muda re̩ eju-ma chaka; i kakini, U ma e̩wñ kʼe̩ ka-i n.
Tak abu kʼi kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼef atakpa, imo̩to̩ omune̩ fʼu li, oñ i ka ñw abo ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ kakini, E̩ne̩-i te̩te̩dʼugbo Jisus, E̩ne̩ Nazare̩t le̩ ge̩.
Tak i ño̩ dabi re̩ ge̩, i nʼe̩bo̩ ego̩, kakini, U ma one̩ le̩ no.
Oñ ma jo̩ pe̩e̩, tak e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi dago o̩mo̩ te̩wa aka ñwu Pita kakini, Ochochi, uwe̩ ño̩ dʼef uma ge̩, omu uko̩la-we̩ adʼofe-we̩ dufu.
E̩gba le̩ i chane̩ ebina elifo̩ kpai o̩la-wñ enʼe̩bo̩, i kakini, U ma one̩ le̩ no. Oñ ababale̩ aiko̩ ko̩.
Taku Pita rewa o̩la ki Jisus ka kakini, E̩ raire̩ mi onu me̩ta tak aiko̩ kʼi ko̩. Tak i ledufu nyʼo̩do̩da araku anyianyi.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ ñwa, amagboji amatama chaka kpai abogijo amone̩ le̩ fʼojuju nyi nyu Jisus, todu ku ma dʼowñ kpa.
Tak abu ku ma fʼu ji ma mʼu du alo, oñ ma mʼowñ du ñwu Pailat, igo̩bina o̩mo̩.
E̩gba le̩ abu ki Judas kʼi dʼu ñwu ma mu le̩ fu li ka ku ma fʼabi kpʼo̩, i chane̩ ejumama oñ i mʼajifa ogue̩gwa le̩ ko dabiwa ñw amagboji amatama kpai abogijo,
i kakini, U dure me̩, owñ chʼe̩bie̩ ki ma fʼudu n kʼu du ñwu ma mu le̩. Ma muda kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-wa ef uwñ? Uwe̩ nʼe-le̩.
Tak abu kʼi mʼajifa le̩ ko rikpolo jʼef unyi O̩jo̩ Ejefu, i la kwʼo̩mo̩ le namʼo̩la-wñ du lo̩.
Tak amagboji amatama mʼajifa le̩ ko, ma kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñw a kʼo jʼef e̩wñ ele O̩jo̩ n, abu kʼi chʼo̩ko̩ e̩bie̩.
Tak abu ku ma fʼojuju nyi, ma mʼu ko la ane̩ abucha kʼi mud ugbo ku ma kʼabo ononojo ji.
Lef e-le̩ oñ ma do̩ ane̩ le̩ ko̩ Ane̩ E̩bie̩ gbogbo tʼeñini.
E̩gba le̩ e̩wñ ku ma ka lefu Je̩re̩maya akache̩ le̩ che̩, kakini, Ma la mʼajifa ogue̩gwa le̩ ko, oñ chʼalaja e̩ne̩ kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l da le̩.
Oñ ma mʼu ko la ane̩ abucha le̩, alu kʼOndu ñwa ñwu mi.
Abe̩le̩ Jisus dago o̩gba igo̩bina le̩; oñ igo̩bina tʼowñ ene kakini, Uwe̩ chʼOnu amaJu? Oñ Jisus ka ñwu kakini, Uwe̩ ka-i.
Oñ ef o̩la kʼamagboji amatama kpai abogijo gwu-nʼowñ i dohi du n.
E̩gba le̩ Pailati ka ñw u kakini, E̩ gbo̩ ibenu e̩wñ wewe ku ma gba nyʼuwe̩ n?
I la dohi du ñw u n, i chaka chʼo̩laʼkate. Todabe̩le̩ oñ igo̩bina le̩ yaye tabale.
Oñ iko uje̩wñ uyo̩ igo̩bina te̩tatʼe̩namuʼka kʼi dʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ e̩do̩ no̩ ñwu ma.
Oñ e̩gba le̩ ma nʼe̩namuʼka kʼi chenʼuwohi, odu-wñ ko̩ Barabas.
Todule̩ abu ku ma wajo̩ le̩ Pailati ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼume̩ e̩do̩ kʼu nato̩no̩ ñwu me̩, Barabas abe̩ku Jisus ku ma do̩ ko̩ Kraisti le̩?
Todu i chema ka kʼi chʼutodu elie̩na ku ma lie̩na-wñ oñ ma dʼuwñ ñw u mu.
Oñ abu kʼowñ gugu o̩gba ede le̩, o̩ya-wñ fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo-wñ, kakini, O̩wo̩-we̩ ki do̩ kpʼama ugbo e̩no̩kpakpa ki de̩ n. Todu u li uwa nana ef o̩na kʼu na li owñ eñini.
Ama amagboji amatama kpai abogijo kʼo̩wo̩ nyu o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ efu todu ku ma ki bi Barabas, ku ma la du Jisus kpa tinyo̩.
Abe̩le̩ igo̩bina dohi ka ñwu ma kakini, Ef ama meji-i e̩ne̩ dʼume̩ e̩do̩ kʼu nato̩no̩ tane̩ ñwu me̩? Oñ ma kakini, Barabas.
Pailat ka ñwu ma kakini, Mak e̩wñ nache Jisus ku ma do̩ ko̩ Kraisti le̩? O̩chaka-ma kakini, Ma ki mʼowñ du kaba mʼoli.
Oñ i kakini, Tod e̩wñ? E̩bie̩ne̩ e̩wñ i che? Ma muda kwukwa ololo kakini, Fʼu kaba mʼoli.
Oñ abu ki Pailati li ka ki nʼile ñw u n, chai echi oñ ekuku achi, i mʼomiofo du oñ i fʼo̩wo̩-wñ gwe̩ eju o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩, i kakini, O̩wo̩-mi dʼef e̩bie̩ e̩no̩kpakpa-i n. Ame̩ go.
Tak amone̩ le̩ du dohi kakini, E̩bie̩-wñ ki nʼawa kpai amo̩ma-wa oji ke!
E̩gba le̩ i tu Barabas no̩ ñwu ma, oñ abu kʼi fu Jisus gwo, i mʼu du ñwu ma todu kʼama ki dʼowñ kamoli.
E̩gba le̩ amisoja igo̩bina mu Jisus du nyʼef unyi Praito̩rium, oñ mafʼo̩gbo̩ abo oje̩go̩-ma do̩ wa adonyʼuwñ.
Taku ma mʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ gwo̩ jʼane̩, oñ ma mʼaliche̩ba odufa ekpikpa ko bʼo̩ ubi ma,
taku ma fʼikeke ta uloko oñ ma mʼu du dʼo oji, taku ma mʼikpo du tunyʼo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩, taku ma tʼokuku kpe̩ o̩gba-wñ, ma chʼo uke̩ kakini, Agba-oo, uwe̩, Onu amaJu.
Taku ma tito̩ nyʼu o̩la, ma mʼikpo le̩ du agwʼo̩ oji.
Tak e̩gba ku ma fʼu gwʼuke̩ kpa, ma mʼaliche̩ba le̩ du bʼo̩la-wñ te̩, oñ ma mʼe̩wñ e-wñ ko nyʼu o̩la. Taku ma mʼowñ du alo ku ma fʼu kamoli.
Oñ abu ku ma dufu alo ma fʼe̩ne̩ Sairiniʼka li, odu-wñ ko̩ Saimon; ma fʼe̩ne̩ le̩ mu todu kʼi nʼoli uku Jisus.
Tak abu ku ma lewa ugbo ku ma do̩ ko̩ Go̩lgo̩ta, owñ chʼe-ku ma do̩ ko̩ Uña Akokoloji,
ma mʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma kʼololo gwe̩gwa nyʼu du ñw u kʼi ñmo̩; oñ abu kʼi dʼu kadalu i dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi ñmo̩ n.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼowñ kamoli ma fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ kpe̩ jo̩, ma fʼanya-wñ ro̩.
Taku ma gugu ane̩ adejutʼowñ o̩mo̩.
Taku ma fʼolubutu o̩la e̩wñ ki chi du tʼugbo oji-wñ ate̩ kakini: OWÑ-I CHE JISUS, ONU AMAJU.
E̩gba le̩ ma fʼamadinya meji kamoli manyʼowñ, oka dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩, oka la dʼo̩wo̩ awohi.
Oñ abo ku ma alale chʼakpabie̩-wñ, ma miʼoji-ma ejo,
oñ ma kakini, Uwe̩, kʼe̩ gu Unyi O̩jo̩ Ejefu lo̩ kʼe̩ mʼu du ko̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta, fʼo̩la-we̩ jadu! Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩, gwo̩ru kwʼoj oli uku wane̩ ke!
Abe̩le̩ amagboji amatama manyʼamako̩takada kpai abogijo gwʼu uke̩, kakini,
I fʼabo ki bo̩ jadu, i aneke jadu o̩la-wñ n; Onu Israe̩l i che, i ki gwo̩ru kwʼoj oli uku wane̩ tak a ake̩do̩nʼowñ.
I te̩take̩do̩nʼO̩jo̩, i chʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ i che, i ki mʼu gba fai ke, todu i ka kakini, O̩ma O̩jo̩ owñ che.
Amadinya ku ma kamoli manyʼowñ ño̩ kicha abe̩le̩ ñw u ge̩.
Oñ akwo agogo me̩gweji gbogbo wa agogo me̩ta e̩chubi lewa bʼugbo du ane̩ le̩ ma.
Oñ i dabe̩ne̩ kʼiko agogo me̩ta Jisus dʼomu nyate̩ kwa nana kakini, Elai, Elai, lama sabaktani? Owñ che: O̩jo̩-mi, O̩jo̩-mi, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ hi umi tinyo̩-i?
Oñ abu kʼabo iche̩ka ku ma dago jʼo̩mo̩ gbʼo̩, ma kakini, E̩ne̩ le̩ ado̩ E̩laija.
Tak ababa le̩ e̩ne̩ʼka ef uma fule namʼugbo̩che̩ du, i mʼu du tunyʼomi e̩ka kʼi ñmʼo̩ nyʼo̩la e̩ko̩, tak i mʼu du tunyʼoj elikpo, oñ i dʼu ñw u kʼi ñmʼe̩.
Oñ abo ki bo̩ kakini, Tʼo̩ no̩, kʼa ali abe̩k Elaija awa jadu-wñ.
Oñ abu ki Jisus ño̩ dabi dʼomu nyate̩ akwa nana, i tʼafu-wñ no̩.
Me̩ la go, ukpo ugbeju Unyi O̩jo̩ Ejefu le̩ mukpana meji akwo oji-wñ ate̩ gbogbo wa ane̩; tak ane̩ kwomiejo, apata apata la kpana.
Tak ojinoji ojinoji mʼalu chi te̩, oñ año̩la abo kiafo̩ wewe ku ma mʼolu du kwane̩;
oñ abu kʼi kwane̩ ma kwʼef ojinoji ojinoji dufu, oñ ma mugudu tʼef ewo kiafo̩ le̩, ma la kwotejugede ñw amone̩ wewe.
Oñ abu kʼagboji amisoja ogume̩lu le̩ kpai abo ku ma manyʼowñ adejute̩ Jisus le̩, li ane̩ ki amiejo kpai e̩wñ ki wache le̩, ma railo nana; ma kakini, Ochochi, e̩ne̩-i chʼỌma e-O̩jo̩.
Abobule̩ wewe ku ma kwo Galili atu Jisus ubi ache e̩wñ ñw u jʼo̩mo̩ agʼo kwʼo̩najiji.
Me̩ri Magdalini la dʼef uma kpai Me̩ri iye Jeme̩s kpai Jose̩f, kpai iye amo̩ma Ze̩be̩di le̩.
Oñ abu kʼane̩ lo̩, ananaʼka kʼowñ ño̩ chʼako̩che̩ Jisus, kwo Arimatia wa; odu-wñ ko̩ Jose̩f.
E̩ne̩-i lewʼugbo Pailati kʼi bi oku Jisus. Taku Pailati ñwa ñwu ma ku ma mʼu du wa ñw u.
Taku Jose̩f mʼoku-wñ gba oñ i dʼu tef ukpo line̩n efufu ki de̩ hiolo,
tak i mʼu du dachi ef oji e-wñ etito̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi da ef apata. Tak abu kʼi fʼokuta lile li wa alu oji le̩, i le owñ.
Me̩ri Magdalini kpai Me̩ri ekeji le̩ la jʼo̩mo̩, ma kpejuru ura le̩ gugu.
Oñ o̩jo̩ñwa O̩jo̩ Emʼo̩latane̩ ucholo le̩, amagboji amatama kpai amaFarisi wajo̩ ugbo Pailati.
Ma kakini, Odu, a rewa ka kʼadone̩la le̩ ka e̩gba kʼi deju ta kakini, O̩jo̩ me̩ta tak u nakwane̩.

Todule̩ e̩ nañwa ñwu ma ku ma fʼoji le̩ ñwo̩che kpaka gbogbo tʼo̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta, tode̩gba kʼamako̩che̩-wñ lewa ku ma mʼoku-wñ ji lo, ku ma la aka ñw amone̩ ka kʼi kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku me̩. Tak uko̩bi e-ubiane̩-i atʼe-ejodudu le.
Pailati ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ chene̩ abo ide; me̩ lo ku me̩ fʼu che kpaka alu ku me̩ ma.
Oñ ma le manyʼabide le̩ nañwʼoji le̩ che kpaka, ma fʼokuta-wñ hiuko̩.
Abu kʼo̩jo̩ uñmi le̩ le, kʼo̩jo̩ ejodudu o̩jo̩ mebie omune̩ me̩ru eñwa, Me̩ri Magdalini kpai Me̩ri ekeji lewa ku ma go oji le̩.
E̩ la go, ane̩ chane̩ emiejo nana; todu onuche̩ Ondu gwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa, oñ i lewa fʼokuta le̩ li wʼubi, tak i kwogugu oji-wñ.
E̩ go i dab o̩mamanya eju, e̩wñ kʼi la ko bʼo̩la ma chʼefufu dabu sno.
Oñ ailo-wñ ki mu abo ku ma dide le̩ je̩ ñw o̩la-ma ga, taku ma jo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼabo ki ku.
Tak onuche̩ le̩ dohi ñw abobule̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki railo n; todu u chema ka ku me̩ feju Jisus ku ma mʼu du kamoli le̩.
I dʼemi n; todu ma mʼu du kwane̩ alu kʼi ka le̩; me̩ lewa go ugbo ku ma dʼu dachi.
Taku me̩ nalo piopio ku me̩ ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ, kakini, Ma mʼu du kwane̩ kwef abo ku ma ku; me̩ la go, i adʼo̩gba-me̩ alo ti Galili, o̩mo̩ me̩ aliʼu. Go, u ka ñwu me̩ me̩.
Taku ma kwo bʼoji le̩ te̩ piopio, ailo-wñ naba ma, ma la ayo̩ ololo. Oñ ma fule alo ku ma mʼu du ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ.
E̩ la go, Jisus de kpai ama, i kakini, Me̩ gba-oo! Taku ma lewa gwo̩nyʼowñ e̩re̩, oñ ma dojikane̩ ñw u.
E̩gbale̩ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ki railo n. Me̩ lo ku me̩ mudu ka ñw amo̩maye-mi todu kʼama ki nyi Galili; o̩mo̩ ma la ali mi.
Oñ abu ku ma alo, me̩ go, iche̩ka ef abo ide le̩ wʼef ewo, ma mʼe̩wñ du ki wache le̩ duka ñw amagboji amatama.
Tak abu ku ma wajo̩ manyʼabogijo, ku ma la fʼojuju nyi, ma kʼo̩ko̩ ñw amisoja le̩ e̩kute̩;
ma kakini, Me̩ ki ka kakini, Amako̩che̩-wñ lewa odu abu kʼa jʼalolu oñ ma mʼowñ ji lo.
I la che̩wñ kʼe-le̩ tʼigo̩bina eti, a agbʼo̩ ibe, oñ ache kʼame̩ ki we enʼejiji eda.
Tak abo le̩ mʼo̩ko̩ ajifa gba oñ ma che alu ku ma ko̩ ma. Tak o̩la-i mukpatuka rʼef amaJu gbogbo tʼeñini.
Abe̩le̩ amako̩che̩ me̩gwaka le̩ nyi Galili ugbo uwo ki Jisus ka ñwu ma.
Tak abu ku ma fʼowñ li ma dojikane̩ ñw u; e̩do̩ iche̩ka muda chʼe̩jiji.
Taku Jisus lewa ko̩la ñwu ma kakini, Ma mʼo̩da du efojale kpai oj ane̩-ile̩-i du ñwu mi me̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nyʼafʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi du chʼamako̩che̩; me̩ nache ma baptism tef odu Ata kpai e-O̩ma kpai e-Afu Kiafo̩;
me̩ nako̩ ma ku ma dejute̩ e̩wñ du kʼu fʼuko̩-wñ te̩ ñwu me̩. Me̩ la go, omi dʼugbo me̩ o̩jo̩ du gbogbo tʼukpoji o̩kpanachi-i.
Ukadane̩ Uche̩nyo̩ Jisus Kraist O̩ma O̩jo̩ de̩.
Owñ chʼalu ku ma ko̩ ef o̩takada Aizaya akache̩ kakini,
omuko̩la e̩ne̩ kʼi akwa ef aje̩tachi kakini,
Jo̩n, kʼi chʼone̩ baptism ef aje̩tachi, lewa, i ño̩ takoya o̩la baptism e-uribeda kʼadure ki kwo bʼuma te̩.
Abo ane̩ Judia chaka kpai abo Je̩rusale̩m chaka ledufu wʼugbo-wñ; oñ i che ma baptism ef ohimini Jo̩rdan, ma nagbalu adure-ma.
Jo̩n le̩ la kʼukpo edudu inyakulumi nyʼo̩la, oñ año̩ lʼago-wñ de, i la nʼakubaliba kpai omiño̩ e-efoko aje̩.
I takoya kakini, E̩ne̩ ki gbiti tʼumi le i tʼubi-mi awa, omi bo̩jo̩ kʼu nate̩kpe̩ atu iku e̩da-wñ n.
Omi che me̩ baptism ef omiofo; owñ muda ache me̩ baptism ef Afu Kiafo̩.
I lewa ef adiko le̩, ku Jisus kwo Nazare̩t e-Galili wa, oñ Jo̩n chʼo baptism efu Jo̩rdan.
Ababale̩ abu kʼi ate̩gu kwef omi awa i li efojale ki mukpana te̩, kpai Afu kʼi agwo̩ru wʼoji-wñ dabu ikede;
oñ omuko̩laʼka kwʼefojale kakini, Uwe̩ chʼO̩ma ufe̩do̩-mi, u fʼuyo̩-mi li ef uwe̩.
Ababale̩ Afu fʼowñ ne tef aje̩tachi.
I la dʼef aje̩tachi le̩ o̩jo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, Setan najʼowñ ma; i la do̩mo̩ kpai ame̩la efoko; oñ amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ che e̩wñ ñw u.
Abu ku ma mu Jo̩n du ñwu ma mu, Jisus wʼane̩ Galili atakoya Uche̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩, kakini,
E̩gba-wñ jo̩ me̩, o̩da onu ojane̩ O̩jo̩ me̩rane̩; me̩ ribeda ku me̩ ke̩do̩no Uche̩nyo̩.
Oñ abu kʼi alale eti ohimini Galili, i fu Saimo̩n kpai Anduru o̩maye Saimo̩n li, abu ku ma jʼariga ef ohimini; todu ku ma chʼamekwuji.
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ lewa tu mi ubi, kʼu naje̩ ñwu me̩ mud amekwuji ki amʼamone̩.
Ababale̩ ma tʼiga no̩, oñ ma rʼo̩ ubi.
Abu kʼi le tʼo̩gba pe̩, i li Jeme̩s o̩ma Ze̩be̩di kpai Jo̩n o̩maye-wñ, ama le̩ ño̩ jʼef o̩ko̩ añwʼiga che ge̩.
Ababale̩ i la fʼuma do̩; oñ ma tʼata-ma Ze̩be̩di no̩ ef o̩ko̩ manyʼabuko̩lo̩ ku ma rʼo̩me̩ ñwu ma, oñ ma rʼo̩ ubi.
Taku ma le tʼefu Kapanahum; oñ ababale̩ i mugudu tef unyi ujeju o̩jo̩ uñmi oñ i ko̩ ma e̩wñ.
Awuwu uko̩-o̩la kʼi ko̩ ma la fʼuma mu: todu i nako̩ ma dab e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩da, i che dab amako̩takada n.
Oñ ababale̩ e̩ne̩ʼka kʼafu ki ma de̩hiolo n dʼef uwñ dʼef unyi ujeju-ma; oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ kwukwa, kakini,
E̩wñ chʼe-wa kpʼuwe̩, Jisus abo Nazare̩t? E̩ wa kʼe̩ ko wa rinyo̩? Omi chema uwe̩, e̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ che, E̩ne̩ Kiafo̩ e-O̩jo̩ uwe̩ che.
Taku Jisus dejurʼu kakini, Fʼo̩wo̩ bʼalu-we̩ ma kʼe̩ kwʼef uwñ dufu.
Tak afu ki ma de̩hiolo n le̩ chʼo dab ajukpakpa, i dʼomu dago akwa, oñ i kwʼef uwñ dufu.
E̩gahi fʼuma mu chaka, todabe̩le̩ ma nʼo̩lo̩-ma ene kakini, E̩wñ de̩? Uko̩-o̩la etito̩ ku ma ko̩ one̩ de̩-i! I nʼo̩da kʼi añwa ñw amafu ki ma de̩hiolo n oñ ma gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩.
Ababale̩ uwohi-wñ kwodufu lʼugbo du oj ane̩ Galili.
Ababale̩ e̩gba ku ma kwʼef unyi ujeju dufu, ama kpai Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n lewʼef unyi Saimo̩n kpai Anduru.
Iye o̩ya Saimo̩n la dachi, o̩la-wñ akpuna; ababale̩ ma ka o̩la-wñ ñw u.
Tak i lewa gwo̩nyʼu o̩wo̩, oñ i mʼu du kwane̩; o̩la e̩kpuna le̩ tʼo̩ no, oñ i kwoche e̩wñ ñwu ma.
E̩gba ane̩ e̩gba kʼolu kwotunynʼane̩, ma mʼabo̩ga chaka ko wʼugbo-wñ kpai abo ku ma chʼebili.
Abewo le̩ du jeju jʼalugbo̩na.
I la fʼo̩ga amone̩ wewe kʼo̩ga-ma chʼojoji ojoji che kpa; i ño̩ ne amebili wewe dufu, i la je̩ ñw amebili ko̩la n, todabu ku ma chemʼo̩.
Inajo̩-inajo̩ i kwane̩ ledufu nyʼaje̩tachi, tak i chadua o̩mo̩.
Oñ Saimo̩n kpai abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ chi e̩re̩-wñ.
Ma fʼu li, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Amone̩ du jʼafeju we̩.
I ka ñwu ma kakini, Wa kʼa nyʼugbo omune̩ tef ewo ki me̩ro̩wo̩, kʼu natakoya o̩mo̩ ge̩; ofe-wñ kʼu dufu wa-i de̩.
Oñ i lewa atakoya ef unyi ujeju-ma o̩gbo̩ ojane̩ Galili du, i laño̩ nʼamebili ane dufu.
Oñ e̩no̩ga-ikpemuteʼka lewʼugbo-wñ agbo̩ko̩bʼo̩, i kʼokuku nyane̩ aka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩, uwe̩ neke je̩ ñw o̩la-mi fe̩.
Abu kʼejumomi-wñ achʼo i fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala kadʼo, i ka ñw u kakini, I dʼumi e̩do̩; o̩la-we̩ ki fe̩.
Ababale̩ o̩ga-ikpemute tʼo̩ no̩, oñ o̩la-wñ fe̩.
Tak i fejukparʼu o̩me̩me̩le̩, oñ ababale̩ i mʼu du dufu,
i ka ñw u, kakini, E̩ nago, e̩ ki ko̩la du ñw e̩ne̩ du n; e̩ muda lo, kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ ña atama, kʼe̩ ne̩ e̩wñ ku Mose̩s ñwa te̩ wa kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ gworinyo̩, todu kʼi gbibenu ugbo ma.
Ama i ledufu oñ i chane̩ etakoya, i du o̩la-i kpogo ugbo du, todabe̩le̩ Jisus ma neke ño̩ gudu tef ewo ejugede ge̩ n, i muda dʼo̩do̩da ugbo kʼi chʼaje̩tachi, oñ ma kwʼugbo du wʼugbo-wñ.
Abu kʼi nʼo̩jo̩ pe̩ e̩gba kʼi ño̩ mugudu nyi Kapanahum ge̩, ma ro̩ ka kʼi dʼunyi.
Tak amone̩ wewe jeju jo̩, todabe̩le̩ i chaka chʼalugbo̩na, uña ño̩ de̩ ge̩ n; oñ i ka o̩la le̩ ñwu ma.
Ma lewa mʼe̩no̩ga ekuto̩laʼka du wʼugbo-wñ, one̩ me̩le̩ ne̩ wa.
Abu ku ma ma neke me̩rʼu todu o̩wo̩ amone̩ ki tinyo̩ jʼo̩mo̩ n, ma mʼojokunyi ugbo kʼi de̩ gudu; oñ abu ku ma fʼu kpo̩fo̩, ma mʼakpata kʼe̩no̩ga ekuto̩la le̩ dachi oji-wñ du lʼo̩mo̩ tane̩.
Oñ abu ku Jisus li e̩do̩ ku ma konʼo, i ka ñw e̩no̩ga ekuto̩la le̩ kakini, O̩ma, ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ me̩.
Amako̩takada iche̩ka muda gugu o̩mo̩, ma jʼakpibe ef e̩do̩-ma kakini,
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ne̩-i ako̩la abe̩i? I achakpabie̩ O̩jo̩. E̩ne̩ neke tʼadure no̩ chai e̩ne̩ʼkate? owñ chʼO̩jo̩.
Ababale̩ abu ku Jisus chema ef afu-wñ ku ma kpibe abe̩le̩ ef uma, i ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ kpibe e̩wñ-i ef e̩do̩-me̩?
Kali e-ki tukpo̩ eka ñw e̩no̩ga ekuto̩la-i, Ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ me̩; abe̩ku Kwane̩, mʼakpata-we̩ du kʼe̩ lule̩?
Ama todu ku me̩ ki ma ka kʼO̩ma One̩ chenʼo̩da ane̩ ile̩ kʼi atʼadure one̩ no̩ ñw u, (i ka ñw e̩no̩ga ekuto̩la le̩) kakini,
Naka ñw e̩, kwane̩, mʼakpata-we̩ du kʼe̩ lo tʼunyi we̩.
Oñ i kwane̩, i mʼakpata-wñ du ababa, oñ i ledufu eju-ma chaka; todabe̩le̩ ibe-ma chaka mukpatuka, ma kwodojima ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, A li e̩wñ abe̩i mama ta n.
I ño̩ dabi dufu nyʼeti ohimini ge̩, o̩gbo̩ amone̩ le̩ du wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i ko̩ ma e̩wñ.
Abu kʼi alale, i fu Lifai o̩ma Alfio̩s li abu kʼi gugu ugbo ku ma gba o̩kane̩. Tak i ka ñw u, kakini, Tʼumi ubi. Oñ i kwane̩ tʼo̩ ubi.
Oñ ileatu abu kʼi chekukane̩ aje̩-wñ ef unyi-wñ, kʼamagbo̩kane̩ kpai ame̩nadure wewe chekukane̩ kpai Jisus kpai amako̩che̩-wñ; todu ma che̩wewe, oñ ma rʼo̩ ubi.
E̩gba kʼamako̩takada e-amaFarisi li ka kʼi aje̩wñ kpai ame̩nadure kpai amagbo̩kane̩, ma ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, I ajʼe̩wñ, i año̩ ñmo̩ kpai amagbo̩kane̩ kpai ame̩nadure?
E̩gba ku Jisus gbo̩ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Eku obochi ku abo kʼo̩la-ma gbiti n, chai abo ki acho̩ga. Omi wa kʼu do̩ abo̩kpakpa n, chai ame̩nadure.
Amako̩che̩ Jo̩n kpai amaFarisi jʼajialu; oñ ma lewa ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼamako̩che̩ Jo̩n kpai amako̩che̩ amaFarisi ajialu, amako̩che̩-we̩ la jialu n?
Oñ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Abokolobia o̩ko̩ya etito̩ neke jialu abu kʼo̩ko̩ya etito̩ dʼugbo ma? Abu kʼo̩ko̩ya etito̩ dʼugbo ma, ma neke jialu n.
Ama o̩jo̩-wñ awa, e̩gba ku ma adʼo̩ko̩ya etito̩ kwʼugbo ma, o̩jo̩ le̩ taku ma ajialu.
E̩ne̩ du abʼukpo ki ma ro̩nyi ta n gamo̩ afe̩ igbele n; cho̩kpo̩ni e-kʼi dukpe̩ kʼi aboma afa kwʼef uwñ, e-etito̩ afʼe-igbele, tak efana-wñ abie̩ne̩ tule.

E̩ne̩ du adʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ danyʼaiko igbele n; cho̩kpo̩ni omi achiwebe̩te̩ma afʼaiko kpana, tak omi achiwebe̩te̩ma achihi kpai aiko-wñ; ma muda adʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma etito̩ danyʼaiko etito̩.
Oñ ileatu abu kʼi alale gu ef uche̩-o̩ka du o̩jo̩ uñmi, kʼamako̩che̩-wñ chane̩ ejʼoji o̩ka da abu ku ma alo.
Tak amaFarisi ka ñw u kakini, Go, e̩wñ chi ku ma che e̩wñ kʼo̩da ma je̩ n o̩jo̩ uñmi?
I ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩wñ ku Defid che e̩gba kʼeku e̩wñ akʼu, kʼebi nakpʼo̩, uwñ kpai abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, me̩ cho̩kalatu o̩la le̩ mama ta n?
Abu kʼi gudu tef unyi O̩jo̩ adiko kʼAbayata chʼagboji amatama kʼi la je̩ akala ku ma ko te̩ jʼo̩mo̩ e-kʼo̩da ma je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du je̩ n, chai amatama, i laño̩ ko ñw abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kpo̩fo̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Ma fʼo̩jo̩ uñmi che todu one̩, i chʼone̩ ma che tod o̩jo̩ uñmi n;
todabe̩le̩ O̩ma One̩ chʼOndu o̩jo̩ uñmi kpo̩fo̩.
Tak i ño̩ mugudu tef unyi ujeju ge̩; oñ e̩ne̩ʼka do̩mo̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñʼka chʼe̩gbe̩.
Ma fejumʼu ne̩ tode̩gba kʼi ache o̩ga-wñ kpa o̩jo̩ uñmi, ku ma li uña ku ma gwo̩nyʼo̩la-wñ.
Oñ i ka ñw e̩ne̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ chʼe̩gbe̩-i, kakini, Kwane̩ dago alumeji.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñw one̩ che e̩nyo̩ abe̩k e̩bie̩ne̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi? Ejadu oji one̩, abe̩k ekpa? Ama ma hi alu-ma de.
Abu kʼe̩do̩-wñ chʼe̩kpabie̩ tod e̩do̩-ma kʼi gbiti, i rejuda go ma kpai uwe̩do̩, oñ i ka ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ kakini, Fʼo̩wo̩-we̩ nadala te̩. Tak i fʼu nadala, oñ o̩wo̩-wñ mudabi tʼiko.
Tak amaFarisi ledufu, oñ ababale̩ ama kpai abo He̩ro̩d nyojuju nyʼu alu ku ma le ku ma fu kpa tinyo̩.
Jisus kpai amako̩che̩-wñ la mudabi tʼo̩l ohimini; tak ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ kwo Galili darʼo̩ ubi.
Tak abu kʼugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ gbʼinabali e̩wñ du kʼi che, ma kwo Judia kpai Je̩rusale̩m kpʼIdumea kpʼejudaba Jo̩rdan, kpai ane̩ ki le Taya kpai Saido̩n daka wʼugbo-wñ.
Tak i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kʼo̩mo̩ko̩ ki tʼo̩mo̩ anede owñ todu ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ le̩, tode̩gba ku ma kpʼo̩ ma;
todu abo kʼi che o̩ga-ma kpa che wewe; todabe̩le̩ abo du ku ma chʼo̩bata o̩ga gulo̩ bʼowñ ma, ku ma ki do̩wo̩kadʼo.
Oñ e̩gba du kʼamafu ki ma de̩hiolo n, gʼo, ma fiane̩ o̩gba-wñ, ma kwukwa kakini, Uwe̩ chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩.
Tak i fʼuma eti nana todu ku ma ki we eje̩ ñw o̩ja mʼo̩.
Tak i mute̩gu tʼibe̩uwo le̩, oñ i fʼabo ki dʼowñ onugo e̩do̩ do̩ wʼugbo-wñ; ma la nyʼugbo-wñ.
Oñ i chi one̩ me̩gweji ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, kʼi nakpe̩ ma nyʼatakoya,
ku ma ño̩ nʼo̩da ku ma ne amebili dufu;
i mʼodu Pita du manyu Saimo̩n;
kpai Jeme̩s e-Ze̩be̩di kpai Jo̩n o̩maye Jeme̩s; i la mʼodu Boane̩rje̩s, kʼofe-wñ chʼAmo̩ma Akpabana, du manyu ma;
kpai Anduru kpai Filip kpai Barto̩lomiu kpai Matiu kpai Tomas kpai Jeme̩s e-Alfio̩s kpai Tadio̩s kpai Saimo̩n abo Kenan,
kpai Judas Iskario̩t e-ki mʼowñ du ñwu ma mu.
Amone̩ ño̩ jeju tinyo̩ o̩mo̩ ge̩, todabe̩le̩ i chaka chʼakala ma neke je̩ n.
E̩gba kʼabo-wñ gbo̩, ma ledufu ku ma gwo̩nyʼu; todu ma kakini, Ibe-wñ mukpatuka.
Amako̩takada ku ma gwo̩ru kwo Je̩rusale̩m wa kakini, I chene̩ Bee̩lze̩bul, lef agboji amebili i ane amebili dufu.
Tak i do̩ ma wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i kpita ñwu ma kakini, Abu Setan ale kʼi neke ne Setan dufu ke?
Iche̩wñ kʼojane̩ʼka mudareji ku ma kobʼo̩la-ma, ojane̩ le̩ neke dago n.
Iche̩wñ kʼunyi mudareji ku ma kobʼo̩la-ma, unyi le̩ aneke dago n.
Iche̩wñ ku Setan kwane̩ akobʼo̩la-wñ, kʼi mudareji, i neke dago n, ama ida-wñ de̩.
E̩ne̩ du muda neke gudu tef unyi agbiti kʼi mʼe̩wñ-eku-wñ ño̩ n, chai e̩gba kʼi fʼagbiti le̩ ji ejodudu e̩gba le̩ tak i añʼane̩-wñ.
Ami naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ma atʼadure du kpai echakpabie̩ du kʼamo̩ma amone̩ adu kpʼO̩jo̩ bie̩ no̩ ñwu ma;
e̩ne̩ du ki muda achakpabie̩ Afu Kiafo̩, ma ato̩no̩ ñw u ogbegbele̩ n, i la fʼadure ogbegbele̩ ta me̩;
todabu ku ma kakini, I chenʼafu ki ma de̩hiolo n.
Tak iye-wñ kpai amo̩maye-wñ lewa, oñ ma kwodago o̩do̩da, oñ ma fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo-wñ adʼo̩.
Amone̩ wewe la gugu kpenyʼu, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Go, iye-we̩ kpai amo̩maye-we̩ jʼo̩do̩da afeju we̩.
Tak i dohi ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ chʼiye-mi kpai amo̩maye-mi?
Tak i rejuda go abo ku ma gugu kpenyʼu, oñ i kakini, Me̩ go iye-mi kpai amo̩maye-mi!
Todu e̩ne̩ du ki ache e̩wñ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩, e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼo̩maye-mi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai omaye-mi onobule̩ kpai iye-mi.
Tak i ño̩ chane̩ ekʼone̩ e̩wñ eti ohimini. Amone̩ wewe otemeje jeju wʼugbo-wñ; oñ i kwotʼef o̩ko̩ oñ i gugu ej ohimini; o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ du jʼane̩pe̩te̩ akpejurʼohimini.
Tak i ko̩ ma e̩wñ wewe lef ita, i ka ñwu ma ef uko̩-o̩la kʼi ako̩ ma kakini,
Me̩ neti: me̩ go, agbe̩yo̩ ledufu kʼi gbʼe̩yo̩.
Oñ ileatu abu kʼi agbe̩, iche̩ka lewane̩ eti o̩na, ame̩we̩ la lewa mure je̩.
Omune̩ lewane̩ oj okuta ugbo kʼike̩te̩ ma nana n, ababale̩ i fʼiga fu todabu kʼike̩te̩-wñ ma jukpa n;
e̩gba kʼolu kwane̩ i fʼu gujo; todabu kʼi ma nʼili n, igbe̩rinyo̩.
Omune̩ lewane̩ ef ikeke tak ikeke le̩ debonʼo, i la fʼu gwebo, i la nʼe̩ro̩ du n.
Iche̩kibo̩ omune̩ lewane̩ ef ane̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩; abu kʼi gba nana alo waa i nʼe̩ro, i la nʼawo ogue̩gwa kpai o̩gbo̩ me̩ta kpai ogume̩lu.
Tak i kakini, E̩ne̩ ki nʼeti kʼi agbo̩la, ki nagbo̩.
Oñ e̩gba ki bo̩ owñ kate, abo ku ma donyʼu manyʼamame̩gweji le̩ tene ofe ita le̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ma mʼe̩wñ afili e-ojane̩ O̩jo̩ du ñwu me̩;, ma muda che e̩wñ du lef ita ñw abo ku ma jʼo̩do̩da;
todu kʼego ku ma go, ku ma ki li n; kʼegbo̩ ku ma gbo̩, kʼama ki mʼoji-wñ n; tode̩gba ku ma ma murida ge̩, ku ma la to̩no̩ ñwu ma.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼo̩la ita-i n? Abu me̩ ale ku me̩ amʼofe ita du ke?
Agbe̩yo̩ nʼO̩la O̩jo̩ agbe̩.
Abo ku ma jʼetʼo̩na ugbo ku ma dʼO̩la le̩ gbe̩ la de̩, e̩gba du ku ma gbo̩, ababale̩ Setan awa mʼO̩la ku ma gbe̩ ef uma ko.
Abe̩le̩ abo ku ma gbe̩ ugbo okuta le̩ de̩, e̩gba ku ma gbo̩ O̩la le̩, ababale̩ ma gba kpai uyo̩;
ma la nʼili du ef o̩la-ma n, ma muda jo̩ pe̩; tak e̩gba o̩bata akwane̩ abe̩ku ma chane̩ edoli ma tod O̩la le̩, ababale̩ i fu ma dahi.
Iche̩kibo̩ omune̩ chʼabo ku ma gbe̩ ef ikeke; ama chʼabo ku ma gbo̩ O̩la le̩;
tak ejiji e̩wñ o̩kpanachi-i eda kpai edʼone̩ ibe kʼe̩wñ anana adʼone̩ ibe, kpai e̩ño̩ e̩wñ omune̩ ki aguduwa, fʼO̩la le̩ gwebo, tak i awe enʼero̩.
Abo ku ma ko gbe̩ ef ane̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ la de̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma gbo̩ O̩la le̩, ku ma mʼu gba, ku ma la nʼe̩ro, iche̩ka nʼawo o̩gue̩gwa kpai o̩gbo̩ me̩ta kpai ogume̩lu.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ma ne̩ omutala wa ku ma dʼu gugu of agba abe̩k of ate̩? I chʼuña-wñ ma dʼu gugu n?
Todu i nʼe̩wñ du ku ma du maja n chai todu ku ma ki du tejugede; e̩wñ la bʼe̩wñ ma ofo n, chai todu kʼi kwotejugede.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du nʼeti kʼi agbo̩la, i ki nagbo̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ nago e̩wñ ku me̩ gbo̩; ef e̩wñ ku me̩ du ñwa ñwʼone̩, ma añwa ñwu me̩; ma la adutʼo̩ ñwu me̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki nʼe̩wñ, ma adʼu manyʼu ñw u; e̩ne̩ ki ma ne̩ n, I chaka chʼe̩wñ kʼi ne̩, ma abʼo̩ gba.
Tak i kakini, Abu kʼojane̩ O̩jo̩ de̩ de̩, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ mʼe̩yo̩ ko fia jʼane̩,
kʼi alolu, kʼi akwane̩, odu kpai o̩ro̩ka, kʼe̩yo̩ le̩ tiga, kʼi agbo̩gba alo, e̩ne̩ le̩ ma abile n.
Ane̩ abi e̩wñ o̩to̩to̩la-wñ, ejodudu i fʼiga, tak i toji, tak e̩yo̩-wñ agbo oji-wñ.
Ama e̩gba kʼe̩ro-wñ bie̩, ababale̩ i adʼo̩be̩ dufu, todabu kʼiko-e̩kpa lewa.
Tak i kakini, E̩wñ a du ojane̩ O̩jo̩ wawe-wñ ta? Abe̩k e̩wñ chʼita kʼa du jiwe-wñ?
I chebi e̩yo̩ mustadi oka, e̩gba ku ma mʼu du gbe̩ ef ane̩, abʼi chaka nya tʼulu du ki dʼile̩ le,
ama e̩gba ku ma gbe̩, i agba oñ i anana tʼe̩wñ-uche̩ du le, i la atʼe̩to̩ lile; oñ ame̩we̩ ojale neke ru olubo̩-wñ.
I la mʼita abe̩le̩ wewe du kʼO̩la O̩jo̩ ñwu ma, alu ku ma neke gbo̩.
I ma chʼita n, i ko̩la du ñwu ma n; i muda kʼofe e̩wñ du ñw amako̩che̩-wñ ejubi.
E̩gba kʼane̩ lo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Wa kʼa daba tʼo̩wo̩ ekeji.
Ma la kwo bʼamone̩ ki tinyo̩ le̩ te̩ oñ ma mʼowñ du alu kʼi de̩ ef o̩ko̩ kpai ama. O̩ko̩ omune̩ ño̩ jʼugbo-wñ ge̩.
Tak afu lile chane̩ eju, akpoli cherʼef o̩ko̩, oñ o̩ko̩ le̩ chane̩ eko̩ ñw omi.
Owñ onugo dʼo̩wo̩ oku o̩ko̩ alolu oj aloji; ma fʼu jolu, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Akone̩wñ, i awʼe̩ eju abu kʼa jʼalenyo̩-i n?
Tak i mʼolu ji, i dejurʼafu, oñ i ka ñw ohimini, kakini, Chechi, we. Tak afu we oñ omi bo̩ lii.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ chʼokpo-i? Me̩ nʼe̩do̩ ekono ta n?
Oñ ailo fu ma mu nana, ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, E̩ne̩ de̩-i ta? kʼichaka chʼafu kpai ohimini agbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩?
Ma lewʼudaba ohimini tʼoj ane̩ abo Gerasa.
E̩gba kʼi kwef o̩ko̩ tane̩, ababale̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼafu ki ma de̩hiolo n kwʼugbo ojinoji de kpʼowñ;
unyi e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼef ache̩ku; i chaka chʼigbaligba e̩ne̩ du la neke dʼu jiʼu ge̩ n:
todabu ku ma fʼu tʼagba o̩gbe̩nugbe̩, ma ño̩ dʼigbaligba jiʼi ge̩, i la fʼigbaligba jada, i la fʼagba kpo̩fo̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩, e̩ne̩ du la gbiti bo̩jo̩ kʼi afʼu dolo n.
E̩gba du, tʼodu tʼo̩ro̩ka, ef ache̩ku kpʼibe̩uwo i do̩mo̩ akwa. I nadʼokuta fʼo̩la-wñ na.
E̩gba kʼi fu Jisus li o̩najiji, i fule wa dojikane̩ ñw u,
i dʼomu dago kwa kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-mi kpʼuwe̩, Jisus, uwe̩ O̩ma O̩jo̩ Chamachala? Nago̩ O̩jo̩ nʼe̩ e̩ ki je̩ ñwu mi li uwa n.
Todu i ka ñw u kakini, Kwʼef e̩ne̩ le̩ dufu, uwe̩ afu ki ma de̩hiolo n.
Tak i tʼowñ ene, kakini, Ab odu-we̩ ko̩? I ka ñw u, kakini, Odu-mi ko̩ Lijio̩n, todukpe̩ kʼawa chewewe.
Tak i gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ nana kʼi we ekpe̩ ma kwʼoj ane̩ le̩ alo.
Amoko wewe la dʼujo̩ akolo uwo o̩mo̩ ajije̩.
Oñ ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kakini, Fʼuwa kpe̩ ref amoko le̩ kʼa gudu nyʼef uma.
Tak i je̩ ñwu ma. Oñ amafu ki ma de̩hiolo n le̩ kwodufu, ma la gudu tef amoko, tak ujo̩ le̩ gwo̩ko̩ gwo̩ru o̩gba nyʼef ohimini, uwewe-ma dab o̩gba; oñ ma lenyo̩ ef ohimini.
Tak abo ku ma adejute̩ ma ra, oñ ma mʼo̩la-i duka ef ewo kpai oj oko. Abo le̩ la lewa ku ma li e̩wñ ki wache.
Taku ma lewʼugbo Jisus oñ ma go abu kʼe̩nebili le̩ nyi afe̩ gugu, eju-wñ mune̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ne̩ lijio̩n le̩; oñ ma kwochokpo.
Tak abo ku ma liʼu choli e̩wñ du ki wache e̩nebili le̩ kpai o̩la amoko ñwu ma.
Taku ma chane̩ egbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi kwʼoj ane̩-ma lo.
Oñ abu kʼi alo tef o̩ko̩, e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼebili akwoubi le̩ gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi lebʼo̩.
I je̩ ñw u le n, ama i ka ñw u, kakini, Lo tʼunyi-we̩ ugbo abo-we̩ kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ lile kʼOndu che ñw e̩ duka ñwu ma, kpai ejumomi-we̩ kʼi li.
Tak i le wñ, oñ i chane̩ etakoya De̩kapo̩lis alu kʼe̩wñ chenana ku Jisus che ñw u; amone̩ du kwoyaye.
E̩gba ku Jisus ño̩ tʼo̩ko̩ mudaba tʼo̩wo̩ ekeji ge̩, amone̩ wewe jeju wʼugbo-wñ, owñ la dʼeti ohimini.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka ef amagboji unyi ujeju lewa, odu-wñ ko̩ Jairo̩s; abu kʼi fʼu li, i lewane̩ e̩re̩-wñ,
oñ i gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ nana, kakini, O̩ma-mi onobule̩ kekele ache kʼi ku; kʼe̩ lewa kʼe̩ kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ nʼo oji, todu kʼo̩ga-wñ ki takpa, kʼi deju.
Tak i lebʼo̩, amone̩ wewe wewe darʼo̩ ubi, ma muke̩che̩ abʼowñ ma.
Oñ onobule̩ʼka, kʼi dʼef e̩bie̩ eru o̩do̩ me̩gweji,
kʼi la li uwa nana ugbo amobochi wewe, kʼi laño̩ mʼe̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ ko kpabie̩ kpa, kʼi ma nʼile du ñw u n, ama o̩ga-wñ nabie̩ne̩ nyo̩gba;
abu kʼi la gbo̩ inabali Jisus, i lef amone̩ ki tinyo̩ le̩ wa ubi-wñ, oñ i do̩wo̩kado afe̩-wñ.
Todu i kakini, I chaka chʼafe̩-wñ kate u dʼo̩wo̩ kado, i ajadu mi.
Ababale̩ ugbo kʼe̩bie̩-wñ abikwo le̩ gbe̩, oñ i fu ma ef año̩la-wñ kʼo̩la-wñ takpa.
Ababale̩ abu ku Jisus chema ef onugo-wñ ka kʼukpahiu le̩ kwʼef uwñ dufu me̩, i murida ef amone̩ ki tinyo̩ le̩, i kakini, E̩ne̩ do̩wo̩kado e̩wñ-o̩la-mi?
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ ka ñw u, kakini, Uwe̩ go amone̩ ki tinyo̩-i abu ku ma ke̩che̩ bʼuwe̩ ma, oñ uwe̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ do̩wo̩kado mi?
Tak i rejuda koolo kʼi li e̩ne̩ kʼi che e̩wñ-i.
Onobule̩ le̩ muda railo, o̩la-wñ naga todu i chema e̩wñ kʼi chʼo, oñ i lewa fiane̩ o̩gba-wñ, i ka ochochi le̩ du ñw u.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, O̩ma-i, e̩do̩-ekono-we̩ fʼuwe̩ jadu me̩; lo kpai ure̩do̩, ache̩ka ki chʼuwe̩ kwef o̩pe̩cha-we̩.
Abu kʼi nʼo̩la aka ta, ma kwʼunyi agboji unyi ujeju le̩ wa kakini, O̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ leku me̩; e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ che Akone̩wñ akanya ta?
Jisus muda nyʼo̩la ku ma ka-i eti n, i ka ñw agboji unyi ujeju kakini, E̩ ki railo n, eke̩do̩no e̩ ke̩do̩no kate.
Oñ i je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du lebʼo̩ n, chai Pita kpai Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n o̩maye Jeme̩s.
Taku ma lewa unyi agboji unyi ujeju le̩; oñ i go abu ku ma jo̩ achekuku, ma raku, ma la dinaku nana.
E̩gba kʼi mugudu tʼejefu, i ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ chekuku, ku me̩ la raku-i? O̩ma-i ku n, olu i ale̩-i.
Ma dʼoke anyi rʼo̩ oji. Ama e̩gba kʼi fʼuma ne dufu chaka, i mʼata o̩ma kpai iye-wñ kpai abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ ko, oñ i le tʼejefu ugbo kʼo̩ma le̩ de̩.
Tak i gwo̩nyʼo̩ma le̩ o̩wo̩, i ka ñw u kakini, Talita kumi; ku ma jomudechi-wñ kakini, O̩ma igbe̩le̩, uwe̩ naka ñw u, kwane̩.
Ababale̩ o̩ma igbe̩le̩ le̩ kwane̩ oñ i kwolule̩; todu o̩do̩-wñ chʼe̩gweji me̩. Ababale̩ ibe-ma mukpatuka tabale.
Tak i hi ma owu nana kʼone̩ du ki ma e-i n. Tak i ñwa ñwu ma ku ma du e̩wñ ñw u je̩.
Tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu oñ i lewa oj ane̩ ata-wñ onugo, amako̩che̩-wñ la tʼo̩ ubi.

Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ uñmi muñwa, i chane̩ eko̩ amone̩ e̩wñ ef unyi ujeju; oñ abu ku ma gbo̩ o̩la-wñ, ibe amone̩ wewe takpa rʼuma efu, ma kakini, Ugbo e̩ne̩-i nʼe̩wñ-i kwo ta? Ma ño̩ ka ge̩, kakini, Ibe e̩wñ oñ ma du ñw e̩ne̩-i? uko̩lo̩ ukpahiu abe̩i ki awache lef o̩wo̩-wñ, e̩wñ de̩?
I chʼikapita kʼi chʼo̩ma Me̩ri le̩ de̩ n? I chʼo̩maye Jeme̩s kpai Jose̩s kpai Judas kpai Saimo̩n de̩ n? Amo̩maye-wñ abobule̩ ta jʼugbo wa emi n? Todule̩ ma fʼo̩la-ma dahi ef uwñ.
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Akache̩ awe enʼojima n, ugbo kʼi ma ne n chʼane̩-wñ kpai ugbo amefu-wñ kpai ef unyi-wñ.
Oñ i ma neke che e̩wñ ukpahiu du o̩mo̩ n, chai o̩wo̩-wñ kʼi ko noji ame̩no̩ga pe̩, kʼi che o̩ga-ma kpa.
I la kwoyaye tod eke̩do̩no ku ma ko̩ eke̩do̩no.
Tak i fʼamame̩gweji le̩ do̩ wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i chane̩ ekpe̩ ma uche̩ eji eji, i la dʼo̩da amafu ki ma de̩hiolo n ñwu ma,
oñ i hi ma owu todu ku ma ki we edu e̩wñ ule̩ du tʼuje̩wñ, tʼikpa, tʼo̩ko̩ ef ugbo̩ ago-ma chai o̩kpa;
ama ki muda nyi o̩patachi; i ño̩ kakini, Me̩ ki nyi afe̩ meji n.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Ugbo du ku me̩ gudu tef unyi, o̩mo̩ me̩ ru gbogbo tʼe̩gba ku me̩ kwʼugbo le̩ dufu.
Ugbo du ku ma ma gba me̩ n, ku ma ma gbo̩ o̩la-me̩ n, e̩gba ku me̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ adufu, me̩ fʼebutu ki dʼef e̩re̩-me̩ gbanyo̩ todu kʼi gbibenu ñwu ma.
Taku ma dufu nyʼatakoya todu kʼamone̩ ki ribeda.
Ma la ne amebili wewe dufu, ma laño̩ dʼekpo kuru ame̩no̩ga wewe, oñ ma che o̩ga-ma kpa.
Tak onu He̩ro̩d gbo̩, todabu kʼodu-wñ kwotejugede e̩gba le̩ me̩. Oñ i kakini, Jo̩n kʼi che baptism le̩ mudajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, todule̩ oñ ukpahiu-i achuko̩lo̩ ef uwñ.
Ama aboʼka kakini, E̩laija de̩. Aboʼka la kakini, Akache̩ de̩, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ ka ef amakache̩.
Ama abu ku He̩ro̩di gbo̩, i kakini, Jo̩n kʼomi kʼoji-wñ da le̩ mudajikwane̩ me̩.
Todu He̩ro̩d onugo kpuche̩ nyʼagwo̩nyu Jo̩n, oñ i fʼu ji ef unyi-uga todu He̩ro̩dias, o̩ya Filip o̩maye-wñ; todabu kʼi nʼe̩ o̩ya.
Todu Jo̩n ka ñwu He̩ro̩d kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñw e̩ ne̩ o̩ya o̩maye-we̩ n.
He̩ro̩dias la je̩ kpʼowñ n, i dʼe̩do̩-wñ kʼi fʼu kpa, i la neke che n;
todu He̩ro̩d railo Jo̩n abu kʼi chema kʼi chʼe̩no̩kpakpa kpai e̩ne̩ kiafo̩, oñ i nafejutʼo̩. E̩gba kʼi gbʼo̩la-wñ, i fitʼowñ nana, i la yo̩ ñw o̩la-wñ e̩gbo̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ ki nʼuña lewane̩, ku He̩ro̩d hi o̩te̩ ñw amadokele-wñ kpai amonu-ogu kpai ame̩nuto̩gba e-Galili e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩-wñ ku ma biʼi mudako,

oñ e̩gba kʼo̩ma onobule̩ He̩ro̩dias onugo mugudu wa atido i la nyo̩ He̩ro̩d kpai abo ku ma chekukane̩ aje̩wñ kpai owñ eju. Oñ onu ka ñw igbe̩le̩ le̩, kakini, Bi mi e̩wñ du ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩, oñ nadu ñw e̩.
Tak i fʼe̩bo̩ go̩ ñw u, kakini, E̩wñ du kʼe̩ bi mi, omi adu ñw e̩, gbogbo tʼukpe̩ji ojane̩-mi.
Oñ i ledufu aka ñw iye-wñ, kakini, E̩wñ nabiʼu ta? Tak i kakini, Oji Jo̩n kʼi chʼone̩ baptism le̩.
Ababale̩ i hiane̩ gudu wʼugbo onu, oñ i biʼu, kakini, I dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼuwe̩ mʼoji Jo̩n kʼi che baptism le̩ du tʼoj o̩kpa ñwu mi e̩re̩re̩-i.
E̩do̩ onu la kpabie̩ tabale; ama tod e̩bo̩ kʼi go̩, kpai tod abo ku ma jʼajʼe̩wñ le̩, i dʼe̩do̩-wñ kʼi de̩yakpʼo̩ n.
Ababale̩ onu fʼokolofoʼka kpuche̩, i ñwa ñw u kʼi dʼoji-wñ wa; tak i le mʼoji-wñ ko̩da ef unyiuga,
oñ i mʼoji-wñ du tʼoj o̩kpa wa, oñ i mudu ñw igbe̩le̩ le̩; tak igbe̩le̩ le̩ mʼu du ñw iye-wñ.
E̩gba kʼamako̩che̩-wñ gbʼo̩, ma lewa mʼoku-wñ du, oñ ma mudu tef oji.
Tak ame̩nukpuche̩ kʼo̩la-ma jeju wʼugbo Jisus, oñ ma mʼo̩gbo̩dudu e̩wñ du duka ñw u, owñ chʼe̩wñ du ku ma che kpai e̩wñ du ku ma ko one̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Ame̩ onugo ki lewa jʼo̩wo̩ʼka tef aje̩tachi ku me̩ ñmi pe̩. Todu amone̩ ku ma lelo lewa chewewe; i chaka chʼuje̩wñ ma lio̩wo̩ ku ma je̩ n.
Oñ ma tʼo̩ko̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ nyi o̩wo̩ʼka tef aje̩tachi.
Ma la fʼuma li abu ku ma alo, amone̩ wewe chema ma. Taku ma kwʼewo du e̩re̩ ofo oñ ma fule kpe̩re̩ nyʼo̩mo̩, ma la dʼabo Ondu o̩gba.
Tak i dufu wa ali amone̩ ki wewe otemeje, ejumomi-ma chʼo, todabu ku ma jo̩ dab amala ku ma ma nʼadide n; oñ i chane̩ eko̩ ma e̩wñ wewe.
E̩gba kʼojile o̩jo̩ le̩ le, amako̩che̩-wñ lewʼugbo-wñ, ma kakini, Ugbo-i chʼaje̩tachi, olu alo me̩;
je̩ ñwu ma lo tef uche̩ kpai ewo ewo ki lʼuwa daka-i, ku ma la e̩wñ ñw o̩la-ma je̩.
I muda dohi ñwu ma, kakini, Ame̩ ki dʼuje̩wñ ñwu ma je̩. Ma ka ñw u, kakini, Awa anyʼala, akala alu ipam me̩gwa kʼa ko ñwu ma je̩?
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Akala monu me̩ ne̩? Me̩ nyʼago. E̩gba ku ma fʼaluka-wñ ma, ma kakini, Akala me̩lu kpai e̩ja meji.
Tak i ñwa ñwu ma kʼo̩chaka-ma ki guane̩ uche̩uche̩ ef egbe emimi le̩.
Oñ ma gugu o̩gba o̩gba one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu, kpai ooje ooje.
Tak i mʼakala me̩lu kpai e̩ja meji le̩ ko, abu kʼi cheju go ojale, i fʼadua che nyʼu, oñ i mʼakala le̩ bu jo̩, tak i mʼu ko ñw amako̩che̩-wñ ku ma kʼo jo̩ ñwu ma, e̩ja meji le̩ i kpe̩ ñwu ma chaka.
O̩chaka-ma je̩, efu-ma la ko̩.
Taku ma mʼabubo̩-wñ ko, i ko̩ aligada me̩gweji, kpai e-e̩ja ge̩.
Oñ abo ku ma je̩ akala le̩ chʼaboke̩le̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu.
Ababale̩ i kʼamako̩che̩-wñ e̩che̩ ku ma kwotʼo̩ko̩, ku ma dʼo̩gba-wñ nyi Be̩tsaida ejudaba, gbogbo tak owñ onugo ki je̩ ñw amone̩ ki tinyo̩ le̩ lo.
Oñ abu kʼowñ kpai ama mudaru, i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼibe̩uwo kʼi chadua.
E̩gba kʼane̩ lo̩ o̩ko̩ le̩ dʼalumeji ohimini, owñ kate dʼane̩pe̩te̩.
Oñ abu kʼi li ma abu ku ma jʼali uwa o̩ko̩ egwa, todabu kʼafu aju bʼuma o̩gba ma, dab ide e̩ke̩le̩ odu oñ i lule̩ eju omi awʼugbo ma, i dʼe̩do̩-wñ kʼi alale gu uma du.
Ama abu ku ma liʼu kʼi alule̩ eju omi, ma do̩ kʼi chʼibegu, oñ ma kwokwa;
todu o̩chaka-ma fʼu li, oñ i che ma e̩do̩ ñwañwala. Ama ababale̩ i ko̩la ñwu ma, i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ fe̩do̩ ne̩, omi de̩, me̩ ki railo n.
Tak i nyʼugbo ma ef o̩ko̩; afu le̩ muda; tak ibe ef uma mukpatuka ololo ololo.
Todu eju-ma ne̩ rʼo̩la akala le̩ n, i la chi nyʼuma e̩do̩.
Tak abu ku ma mudaba, ma lewa ane̩ Ge̩ne̩sare̩t, oñ ma fʼo̩ko̩-ma fa amʼane̩.
E̩gba ku ma la kwʼef o̩ko̩ tane̩, ababale̩ amone̩ fʼowñ ma,
ma fule le tʼef o̩gbo̩ ane̩ le̩ du, oñ ma chane̩ ene̩ abo̩ga oj akpata-ma tʼugbo ku ma gbo̩ kʼi de̩.

Ugbo du kʼi mugudu tʼef adogbe abe̩k ewo abe̩k ojoko, ma ko ame̩ne̩gbo o̩la jʼef aja, oñ ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ ku ma do̩wo̩kado, dagba i chaka chʼo̩jaja eti afe̩-wñ kate; abo du ku ma la do̩wo̩kadʼo, mujadu.
Tak amaFarisi kpʼamako̩takada iche̩ka kwo Je̩rusale̩m wa jʼugbo-wñ.
Oñ ma li abu kʼamako̩che̩-wñ iche̩ka nʼo̩wo̩ elifo̩, owñ chʼo̩wo̩ ku ma ma gwe̩ n, ajʼuje̩wñ.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼamaFarisi kpai amaju chaka ma gwe̩ o̩wo̩-ma nyo̩nyo̩ n, ma jʼe̩wñ n, todu ma gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ-o̩gu abogijo;
ma kwef aja, ma ma dʼo̩la tunyʼomi n, ma jʼuje̩wñ n. E̩wñ omune̩ wewe ku ma mugba ku ma gwo̩nyu ño̩ do̩mo̩ ge̩, owñ chʼago kpai ucha kpai e̩wñ eku ebije-ekpikpa edu tunyʼomi.
Oñ amaFarisi kpai amako̩takada tʼowñ ene kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼamako̩che̩-we̩ ma le tikpa e̩wñ-o̩gu abogijo n, ku ma muda nʼo̩wo̩ elifo̩ ajʼuje̩wñ-ma?
Oñ i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Aizaya kache̩ o̩meme̩le̩ ugbo me̩, ame̩nayechi, owñ chʼalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Ma la diba ñwu mi ibe̩te̩ ofofo,
Me̩ tʼo̩la uko̩ e-O̩jo̩ no̩, oñ me̩ gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ-o̩gu e-amone̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, I nyo̩ gbe̩, me̩ hi uko̩ e-O̩jo̩ tʼiba, todu ku me̩ dejutʼe̩wñ-o̩gu e-me̩.
Todu Mose̩s kakini, Bumʼata-we̩ kpʼiye-we̩; kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi la akebi ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ, uku ki fʼoji-wñ kpa.
Ame̩ muda kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ aka ñw ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ kakini, E̩wñ-mi kʼe̩ ma jʼile ugbo-wñ che ko̩rban, owñ chʼele O̩jo̩.
Me̩ je̩ ñw u che e̩wñ du tod ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ ge̩ n;
oñ me̩ nʼe̩wñ-o̩gu e-me̩ ku me̩ du te̩ fʼo̩da o̩la O̩jo̩ la; i ño̩ nʼe̩wñ e̩gʼe-le̩ wewe kʼame̩ che ge̩.
Tak i ño̩ dabi fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ do̩ wʼugbo-wñ ge̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma, kakini, O̩chaka-me̩ ki nagbʼomu-mi, ku me̩ mʼoji-wñ.
I nʼe̩wñ du ki akwʼo̩do̩da atʼef one̩ ki aneke fʼo̩la-wñ daji n; e̩wñ ki muda akwef one̩ dufu chʼe̩wñ ki adʼo̩la one̩ ji. [
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du nʼeti ki agbo̩la, ki nagbo̩.]
Oñ e̩gba kʼi kwo bʼo̩wo̩ one̩ le̩ te̩ kʼi mugudu tef unyi amako̩che̩-wñ tʼowñ ene oji ita le̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ onugo nʼibe abe̩le̩ ni ge̩? Ame̩ ma ka kʼe̩wñ du ki kwʼo̩do̩da atʼef one̩ aneke fʼo̩la-wñ daji n?
Todu i chʼef e̩do̩-wñ i atʼo̩ n, chai tʼef ukulu-wñ, tak i adufu ubioko. Oñ uje̩wñ du fe̩.
Tak i kakini, E̩wñ ki akwef one̩ dufu, e-le̩ adʼo̩la one̩ ji.
Todu akwʼejefu, kwef e̩do̩ amone̩ ibe e̩bie̩ne̩ adufu, abutabu eche, oji eji, one̩ ekpa, o̩ya one̩ etene,
ejufufu e̩wñ eche, e̩wñ bibi eche, o̩gwo̩, e̩wñ tuñ, eju bibi, echakpabie̩, eke, idada,
e̩wñ bibi-i du akwʼejefu dufu, abʼe-le̩ la adʼo̩la one̩ ji.
Tak abu kʼi kwane̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ i nyʼalo̩me̩ Taya kpai Saido̩n. Oñ i gudu tef unyiʼka, i dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ne̩ du ki ma n; i la neke maja n.
Ama ababale̩ abu kʼonobule̩ kʼo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ kekele chenʼafu ki ma de̩hiolo n gbʼinabali-wñ, i lewa fiane̩ e̩re̩-wñ.
Onobule̩ le̩ la chʼe̩ne̩ Grik, o̩lo̩pu-wñ chʼe-Sairo̩foniki. Oñ i rodubʼo̩ kʼi ne ebili le̩ kwef o̩ma-wñ onobule̩ dufu.
I ka ñw u, kakini, Je̩ ñw efu amo̩ma ki ko̩ ejodudu ta; todu i nyo̩ ku ma kʼuje̩wñ amo̩ma rojane̩ ñw amabia n.
I la dohi ñw u, kakini, Ochochi, Ondu, ama i chaka chʼamabia ki jʼof itebulu aje̩ e̩gbanyo̩ e-abimo̩to̩.
Tak i ka ñw u, kakini, Tod o̩la kʼe̩ ka-i, e̩ lo we̩; ebili le̩ kwʼef o̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ dufu me̩.
Tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyi-wñ, oñ i li abu ku ma dʼimo̩to̩ le̩ dachi oj ate̩, ebili la dʼef uwñ ge̩ n.
Oñ i ño̩ kwʼalo̩me̩ Taya le ge̩, I legu Saido̩n du wa ohimini Galili, i lalegu ane̩ De̩kapo̩lis du.
Taku ma dʼe̩ne̩ʼka wʼugbo-wñ kʼi chʼajeti, kʼi ño̩ akwoulo̩ ge̩; oñ ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi dʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼo.
Tak i mʼu du kwo bʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ te̩ tʼo̩wo̩ʼka, i mʼo̩wo̩-wñ ko tunyʼeti-wñ, i tito̩, i la do̩wo̩kado ukpalu-wñ;
tak i chʼeju go ojale, i nafifi, oñ i ka ñw u, kakini, E̩fata, owñ che, Mubite̩.
Tak eti-wñ mubi, iku ukpalu-wñ la mutu, oñ i kwoko̩la nyo̩nyo̩.
Tak i hi ma owu ku ma we eka ñw e̩ne̩ du; ama alu du kʼi hi uma owu, abe̩le̩ ma nyo̩gba atakoya-wñ ololo tule.
Ibe la takpa rʼuma efu chaka, ma kakini, I fʼe̩wñ du che o̩me̩me̩le̩; i aje̩ ñw amajeti onugo ku ma gbo̩la, kpai amajalu ku ma ko̩la.
Iko le̩ o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile ku ma ma nʼe̩wñ du ku ma je̩ n ño̩ wajo̩ ge̩, oñ i fʼamako̩che̩-wñ do̩ wʼugbo-wñ, i ka ñwu ma, kakini,
Ejumomi o̩wo̩ amone̩-i ache mi, todabu ku ma te̩tajʼugbo-mi o̩jo̩ me̩ta, ma la nʼe̩wñ du ku maje̩ n;
iche̩wñ kʼu naje̩ ñwu ma lo tʼunyi-ma kpai elu ofo, ma achuba ej o̩na; abo iche̩ka ef uma la kwʼugbo ki jiji wa.
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ dohi ñw u kakini, Ugbo one̩ neke li uje̩wñ kʼi ako̩ abo-i efu aje̩tachi emi?
Oñ i tʼuma ene, kakini, Akala monu me̩ ne̩? Ma kakini, Ebie.
Tak i ka ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ku ma jʼane̩; oñ i mʼakala mebie le̩ ko, tak abu kʼi fʼugwa gwa, i mʼu bu, tak i mʼu ko ñw amako̩che̩-wñ ku ma mʼu du gugu o̩gba-ma; taku ma mu du gugu o̩gba amone̩ le̩.
Ma ño̩ nʼe̩ja egini pe̩ ge̩; tak i fʼadua che nyʼu, i ño̩ ka ku ma kʼe-le̩ jo̩ ñwu ma ge̩.
Ma je̩, oñ efu-ma ko̩; ma mʼabubo̩ ki ku ma bo̩ ko, e̩ko̩ agba mebie.
Ma la dab one̩ icham me̩lu; tak i je̩ ñwu ma lo.
Ababale̩ i kwotʼo̩ko̩ manyʼamako̩che̩-wñ oñ i lewa ane̩ Dalmanuta.
Tak amaFarisi dufu wa, oñ ma chane̩ ejʼo̩ iñwa, ma feju ujiwe ki akwʼojale ugbo-wñ, ma jʼowñ ma.
Tak i ñmiru gbogbo ef afu-wñ, i kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼabo̩gba kide̩ afeju ujiwe taa? Ami, naka ñwu me̩, kakini, Ma adʼujiwe du ñw abo̩gba kide̩ n.
Tak i tʼuma no̩, oñ i ño̩ kwotʼo̩ko̩ le tʼudaba.
Oñ ma gbenyo̩ enʼakala; ma la nʼe̩wñ du ef o̩ko̩ kpai ama n, chai akala okate.
Tak i fʼuma eti kakini, Me̩ nago, me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ de todu o̩jo̩wu e-amaFarisi kpai o̩jo̩wu e-He̩ro̩d.
Taku ma kwo lʼo̩la kpʼomune̩ kakini, Uje̩wñ kʼa ma ne̩ n.
Oñ abu kʼima, i ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ jʼalo, todabu ku me̩ manʼuje̩wñ n? Me̩ mata n? I ne̩rʼume̩ eju n? Me̩ fʼe̩do̩-me̩ no̩?
Me̩ nʼeju, me̩ gane̩ n? Me̩ la nʼeti, me̩ gbo̩la n? Me̩ re̩wa n?
E̩gba kʼu mʼakala me̩lu bu ñw amone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩lu le̩ fa, abubo̩-wñ ko̩ aligada monu oñ me̩ ko taa? Ma ka ñw u, kakini, E̩gweji.
E̩gba kʼi chʼakala mebie ku ma kpe̩ ñw amone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩le̩ le̩ fa, abubo̩-wñ ko̩ agba monu me̩ ko taa? Ma ka ñw u, kakini, Ebie.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, I ne̩rʼume̩ eju ta n?
Taku ma lewa Be̩tsaida. Oñ ma dʼafejuʼka wʼugbo-wñ, ma la gbo̩ko̩bʼowñ kʼi do̩wo̩kadʼo.
Tak i gwo̩nyu afeju le̩ o̩wo̩, oñ i mʼu du le kwef ewo le̩ dufu; oñ abu kʼi tito̩ nyʼu eju, kʼi ño̩ dʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼo i tʼowñ ene, kakini, E̩ li e̩wñ?
Tak i chʼeju nyate̩, i kakini, Nali amone̩, todu i dabe̩ne̩ kʼoli ki jʼalule̩ nali.
Tak i dabi ko o̩wo̩ nʼeju-wñ; tak i go chii, oñ i mudabi tiko, i la fʼe̩wñ du li jalii.
Tak i fʼowñ kpe̩ nyʼunyi-wñ, i kakini, E̩ ki gudu nyʼef ewo n.
Taku Jisus kpai amako̩che̩-wñ ledufu tef ewo ewo ane̩ Se̩saria e-Filipai; oñ i tʼamako̩che̩-wñ ene eju o̩na, kakini, E̩ne̩ amone̩ aka kʼomi che ta?
Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Jo̩n kʼi a che baptism le̩; abomune̩ la ka kʼE̩laija; ama abo iche̩ka muda ka kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef amakache̩.
Tak owñ tʼuma ene, kakini, Ama ame̩ fa? E̩ne̩ ame̩ ka kʼu che? Pita dohi ñw u, kakini, Uwe̩ che Kraisti.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kpaka ku ma we ekʼo̩la-wñ ñw e̩ne̩ du.
Tak i chane̩ e̩ko̩ ma kakini, O̩ma One̩ ali uwa wewe tila, kʼabogijo kpai amagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada añwʼowñ ka kʼinyo̩ n, ku ma la fʼu kpa, o̩jo̩ me̩ta tak i adajikwane̩.
I fʼo̩la-i ka ejugede. Taku Pita mʼu du i chane̩ edejurʼu.
Ama abu kʼi murida kʼi li amako̩che̩-wñ, i dejuru Pita, i kakini, Lale̩ tʼubi-mi, Setan, todu ibe-we̩ kadʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ n, chai e̩wñ one̩.
Tak i fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ kpai amako̩che̩-wñ do̩ wʼugbo-wñ, i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼi dʼe̩ne̩ du e̩do̩ kʼi akadʼumi ubi awa, i ki fʼaire̩ o̩la-wñ re̩, kʼi mʼoliuku-wñ du, tak i ki tʼumi ubi.
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi fʼonugo-wñ jadu, onugo-wñ alenyo̩; e̩ne̩ du ki la adʼonugo o̩la-wñ tinyo̩ todu mi kpai uche̩nyo̩ ajadu onugo-wñ.
Todu e̩wñ chʼile kʼone̩ aje̩, kʼi mʼo̩gbo̩ ile̩-i du gba nyʼo̩wo̩, kʼi la mʼonugo-wñ du chofu?
Todu e̩wñ one̩ adu kpailo̩ onugo-wñ?
Todu e̩ne̩ du ki achanyo̩ mi kpai o̩la-mi ef o̩gba amajo̩ko̩ kpai adure kide̩-i, O̩ma One̩ ñʼachanyo̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ e̩gba kʼi awa ef ojima Ata-wñ manyʼamonuche̩ kiafo̩.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ami naka ñwu me̩, kakini, I nʼiche̩ka ef abo ku ma dago jʼemi, ki ma nʼugbo du kʼuku akado ma n, gbogbo tʼe̩gba ku ma li ojane̩ O̩jo̩ abu ki lewa ef ukpahiu.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ me̩fa jo̩ Jisus mu Pita kpai Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n ko, oñ i ne̩ ama kate nyʼo̩wo̩ʼka tʼibe̩ uwo ki gbo̩gba; tak i dʼeida ojoji eju-ma.
E̩wñ o̩la-wñ la kwo̩dʼojiji, i chefufu gbaa; i nʼañwʼukpo che du ki dʼile̩ ki neke che kʼi chʼefufu abe̩le̩ n.
Taku ma li E̩laija kpai Mose̩s, ma jʼacholuka kpai Jisus.
Taku Pita dohi ñwu Jisus, kakini, Rabai, i chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw a kʼa jʼemi; awa ki fʼebu me̩ta mu, oka todu we̩, oka todu Mose̩s, oñ oka todu E̩laija.
Todu i ma ohi kʼi ate̩ n, todu ma chane̩ erailo nana.
Tak akpa lewa mud ebo no ma, oñ omuko̩laʼka ka kwef akpa le̩, kakini, Owñ-i chʼO̩ma ufe̩do̩-mi de̩-i, me̩ gbʼo̩la-wñ.
Tak achigili abu ku ma rejuda go, ma ño̩ li e̩ne̩ du ge̩ n, chai Jisus kate manyʼama onugo.
Oñ abu ku ma nagwo̩ru kwʼibe̩ uwo le̩ awa, i hi uma owu ku ma we echoli e̩wñ ku ma li ñw e̩ne̩ du, chai e̩gba kʼO̩ma One̩ mudajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku.
Oñ ma gwo̩nyu o̩la le̩ tʼefu, ma natʼo̩la-ma ene e̩wñ ki chʼofe edajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku.
Taku ma tʼowñ ene, kakini, E-kʼamako̩takada aka ka kʼE̩laija awa ejodudu tila fa?
Oñ i ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩laija awa ejodudu mana, kʼi la ako e̩wñ du dabi jʼe̩gu-wñ; ama abile ku ma fʼo̩la O̩ma One̩ ko̩tane̩, ka kʼi ali uwa e̩wñ wewe, ku ma ñʼache̩de̩te̩ wñ ge̩?
U muda aka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩laija lewa me̩, ma la fʼe̩wñ du ki rʼuma e̩do̩ chʼo, alu ku ma fʼo̩la-wñ ko̩tane̩ le̩.
Tak e̩gba ku ma lewʼugbo amako̩che̩-wñ ma li o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile ku ma donyʼuma, kʼamako̩takada jʼanʼuma ene.
Oñ ababale̩ abu kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ du fʼowñ li, awuwu fu ma mu tabale, oñ ma ra nyʼugbo-wñ agwʼo̩.
