Tak i tʼuma ene, kakini, E̩wñ chʼene ku me̩ nʼuma?
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka ef o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ dohi ñw u, kakini, Akone̩wñ, omi dʼo̩ma-mi kʼi nʼafu ajalu wʼugbo we̩;
ugbo du kʼi agwo̩nyʼu, i afʼu fana, tak alu-wñ awuwowo, oñ i alenyi; o̩la-wñ la agbo̩gbe̩. Oñ u ka ñw amako̩che̩-we̩ todu ku ma nʼo dufu; iñmi-ma la wʼo̩ n.
Tak i dohi ñwu ma, kakini, O, abo o̩gba ki ko̩ eke̩do̩no-i, gbogbo wʼe̩gba nadʼugbo me̩ ta? Gbogbo wʼe̩gba oñ naje̩ kpʼame̩? Me̩ mʼu du wʼugbo mi.
Taku ma mʼowñ du wʼugbo-wñ; tak abu kʼafu le̩ fʼowñ li, ababale̩ i chʼo dab o̩ga ebili, tak i leane̩ ali gbiligbili, alu-wñ awuwowo.
Tak i tʼata-wñ ene, kakini, Adiko e̩gba e̩wñ-i chane̩ echʼo? Oñ i kakini, Kwʼimo̩to̩.
I la dʼu ro̩ tef una kpai ef omi o̩gbe̩nugbe̩, todu kʼi mʼu du kpa tinyo̩; e̩ muda nʼe̩wñ du kʼe̩ neke che, e̩ te̩ko wa, li uwa ejumomi.
Oñ Jisus ka ñw u, kakini, E neke kʼe̩ ka-i fa? E̩wñ du jʼache ñw e̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩no.
Ababale̩ ata imo̩to̩ le̩ kwukwa, kakini, Nake̩do̩no; te̩ko e̩do̩-mi ki ko̩ ekono.

Tak e̩gba ku Jisus li ka kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ ara wa jo̩ i dejurʼafu ki ma de̩hiolo n le̩, i ka ñw u, kakini, Uwe̩, afu kʼe̩ chʼajalu kpai ajeti-i, omi añwa ñw e̩ kʼe̩ kwʼef uwñ dufu, e̩ ki ño̩ gudu tʼef uwñ ge̩ n.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼukwa kwa kʼi laño̩ chʼo dab o̩ga ebili, i kwodufu; oñ imo̩to̩ le̩ dab oku one̩ te̩; todabe̩le̩ amone̩ wewe kakini, I leku.
Jisus muda gwo̩nyʼuwñ o̩wo̩ mʼu du kwane̩, oñ i kwane̩ dago.
Tak e̩gba kʼi gudu wʼef unyi, amako̩che̩-wñ tʼowñ ene o̩wo̩ʼka, kakini, Abile kʼawa ma neke nʼo dufu n?
Oñ i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Abʼe̩go̩-i neke dufu lef e̩wñ du n, chai ef adua.
Ma kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu, ma legu efu Galili du; i la dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼone̩ du ki ma n.
Todu i nʼe̩wñ ako̩ amako̩che̩-wñ, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ma adʼO̩ma One̩ tef o̩wo̩ amone̩, taku ma adʼowñ kpa; oñ abu ku ma fʼu kpa, o̩jo̩ me̩ta tak i adajikwane̩.
Ma la mʼoji o̩la le̩ n, oñ ma railo etʼowñ ene.
Taku ma lewa Kapanahum; oñ abu kʼi dʼef unyi, i tʼuma ene, kakini, Iñwa e̩wñ me̩ je̩ eju o̩na le̩?
Ma muda hi alu-ma de; todu eju o̩na le̩ ma najʼo̩la-ma iñwa e̩ne̩ ki tule.
Tak i kwoguguane̩, oñ i fʼamame̩gweji do̩ wa, i ka ñwu ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼi dʼe̩ne̩ du e̩do̩ kʼi kad o̩gba, i achʼe̩ne̩ ubi otitala kpai ache̩wñ ñw e̩ne̩ du.
Tak i mʼimo̩to̩ʼka du gugu alumeji-ma; oñ abu kʼi mʼu gba mʼe̩do̩, i ka ñwu ma, kakini,
E̩ne̩ du ki agba imo̩to̩ʼka abe̩i ef odu-mi, omi i gba le̩; oñ e̩ne̩ du ki agba mi, i chʼomi i gba n, chai e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa.
Jo̩n ka ñw u, kakini, Akone̩wñ, a li abu kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ane̩ amebili dufu ef odu-we̩; tak a fʼu naba, todabu kʼi ma tʼuwa ubi n.
Ama Jisus kakini, Me̩ ki naba n; todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki achʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu ef odu-mi, kʼi aneke hika kʼebi mi n.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki ma chʼe̩nagwunyʼuwa n, e̩ne̩-wa i che.
Todu e̩ne̩ du ki adʼago omiofo ñwu me̩ ñmo̩ ef odu-mi, todabu ku me̩ chʼabo Kraist, ami, naka ñwu me̩, kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼuro̩me̩-wñ alenyo̩ n.
E̩ne̩ du ki la fʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef abo kekele-i ki ake̩do̩no mi dahi, i ma chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw u tule ku ma dʼokuta uno̩ka ji mʼo̩fa-wñ, ku ma mʼu du ro̩ tef ohimini.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ dʼuwe̩ hi, fʼu ko̩da tinyo̩; i chʼo̩me̩me̩le ñw e̩ kʼe̩ gudu tef iñmi ado̩wo̩ tʼenʼo̩wo̩ meji anyʼef uña-ubie̩ le, tef una ki ma jʼalu n; [
ugbo kʼideneku-ma ma dʼiñmi n, kʼuna-wñ ma jʼakpalu n.]
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩re̩-we̩ adʼe̩ hi, fʼu ko̩da tinyo̩; i chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw e̩ kʼe̩ gudu tef iñmi udere̩ tʼenʼe̩re̩ meji ku ma mʼe̩ du ro̩ tef uña ubie̩ le; [
ugbo kʼideneku-ma ma dʼiñmi n, kʼuna-wñ ma jʼakpalu n.]
I la che̩wñ kʼeju-we̩ adʼe̩ hi, mʼu ne̩ tinyo̩; i chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw e̩ kʼe̩ chʼabejuʼka kʼe̩ gudu tef ojane̩ O̩jo̩ tʼenʼeju meji ku ma mʼe̩ du ro̩ tef uña-ubie̩ le;
ugbo kʼideneku-ma ma dʼiñmi n, kʼuna-wñ ma jʼakpalu n.
Todu ma dʼuna ñaru e̩ne̩ du dab omu.
Omu chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩; i muda che̩wñ kʼomu ma nʼurinyo̩-wñ ge̩ n, e̩wñ me̩ du che kʼi arinyo̩? Me̩ ki nʼomu ef o̩la-me̩, me̩ ki la nʼure̩do̩ kpai omune̩.
I kwane̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ wa oj ane̩ Judia kpai ejudaba Jo̩rdan; oñ o̩wo̩ amone̩ ño̩ kpe̩re̩ wʼugbo-wñ ge̩; tak i ño̩ ko̩ ma e̩wñ alu kʼi te̩tache.
Tak abo Farisi te̩wʼugbo-wñ, atʼowñ ene, kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñw one̩ dʼo̩ya-wñ tinyo̩? Ejama ma jʼowñ ma.
Oñ i dohi ñwu ma, kakini, Abu Mose̩s tuko̩ ñwu me̩?
Ma kakini, Mose̩s je̩ ñwu ma ko̩ o̩takada e̩daru ku ma dʼu tinyo̩.
Jisus muda ka ñwu ma, kakini, Tod e̩do̩-me̩ ki gbiti oñ i ko̩ o̩la uko̩ kide̩ ñwu me̩.
Ama akwo ukadane̩ ejodudu kʼO̩jo̩ nyi e̩wñ, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ i che ma.
Tod e-kide̩ one̩ atʼata-wñ kpai iye-wñ no̩, kʼi amanyʼo̩ya-wñ;
tak ama meji le̩ achʼo̩re̩la okate; abe̩le̩ ma ño̩ chʼeji ge̩ n, chai o̩re̩la okate.
Todule̩ e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ ji dama, one̩ ki daru n.
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ ño̩ dabi tʼowñ ene o̩la-i ef unyi ge̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki adʼo̩ya-wñ tinyo, kʼi ane̩ omune̩, e̩ño̩ya i achenyʼu le̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼonobule̩ onugo kʼo̩ko̩-wñ kʼi ne̩ e̩ne̩ omune̩, o̩ko̩ i aje̩ le̩.
Taku ma ne̩ abimo̩to̩ wʼugbo-wñ, todu kʼi do̩wo̩kado ma; amako̩che̩-wñ muda dejurʼuma.
Ama abu ku Jisus li, i bieju nana, oñ i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ je̩ ñw abimo̩to̩ wʼugbo mi; ame̩ ki fʼuma naba n; todu kʼojane̩ O̩jo̩ chʼe-abo e̩go̩-i.
Ami naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki ma agba ojane̩ O̩jo̩ dab imo̩to̩ n, i nʼugbo du kʼi agudu tef uwñ n.
Tak i mʼuma gba mʼe̩do̩, i du o̩wo̩ nʼuma oji, oñ i de̩nyo̩ ñwu ma.
Oñ abu kʼi dʼe̩re̩ tʼo̩na alo, e̩ne̩ʼka fule wa kʼokuku nyane̩ ñw u atʼowñ ene kakini, Akone̩wñ, uwe̩ e̩ne̩nyo̩, e̩wñ nache todu kʼu naje̩ iñmi ogbegbele̩ o̩gu?
Oñ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ do̩ mi kʼe̩ne̩nyo̩? E̩ne̩ du nyo̩ n, chai e̩ne̩ okate, owñ chʼO̩jo̩.
E̩ chema o̩la uko̩ le̩, E̩ ki kpone̩ n, e̩ ki tene o̩ya e̩ne̩ omune̩ n, e̩ ki joji n, e̩ ki gbibenu olemi n, e̩ ki chuji n; bumo̩ ata-we̩ kpai iye-we̩.
Oñ i dohi ñw u, kakini, Akone̩wñ, omi te̩tade e̩wñ-i du akwe̩gba kʼu chʼimo̩to̩ okolobia.
Oñ abu ku Jisus kejurʼu, i fe̩do̩ wñ, oñ i ka ñw u, kakini, E̩wñ kate nyarʼe̩: lo, fʼe̩wñ du kʼe̩ ne̩ ta, kʼe̩ mʼo̩ko̩-wñ ko ñw ame̩nale, tak uwe̩ anʼe̩wñ akoko efojale: tak e̩ lewa tʼumi ubi.
Tak i fʼeju bu nyʼo̩wo̩ tod o̩la le̩ oñ i chʼe̩do̩dudu kwʼo̩mo̩ alo, todu i nʼidu nana.
Taku Jisus rejuda go, oñ i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, Go abu kʼi gbiti ñw abo ku ma nʼe̩wñ nana taku ma gudu nyʼojane̩ O̩jo̩.
E̩gahi o̩la-wñ fʼamako̩che̩ mu. Oñ Jisus ño̩ dohi ñwu ma ge̩, i kakini, Amo̩ma-mi, go abu kʼi gbiti ñw abo ku ma ke̩do̩nʼe̩wñ ene̩ nana ku ma gudu nyʼojane̩ O̩jo̩.
I tukpo̩ ñw inyakulumi kʼi legu awo ebije uge̩wñ du tʼanana kʼi gudu nyʼojane̩ O̩jo̩ le.
Ibe la takpa rʼuma efu ololo, ma ka ñw u, kakini, Mak e̩ne̩ ma neke jadu ke?
Jisus kejuru ma, i kakini, Ugbo amone̩ e̩wñ-i jʼache n; i muda dʼabe̩le̩ ugbo O̩jo̩ n: todu e̩wñ du jʼache ugbo O̩jo̩.
Pita chane̩ eka ñw u, kakini, Go, awa tʼe̩wñ du no̩ oñ a te̩tatʼe̩ ubi.
Jisus kakini, Ami naka ñwu me̩, kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki tʼunyi no̩, abe̩k amo̩maye e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, abe̩k onobule̩, abe̩k iye, abe̩k ata, abe̩k amo̩ma, abe̩k ane̩, todu mi kpai uche̩nyo̩,

kʼi ma agba ogume̩lu-wñ fai iko-i n, tʼunyi, tʼamo̩maye e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼamo̩maye onobule̩, tʼamiye, tʼamo̩ma, tʼane̩, manyʼedoli ku ma ño̩ dʼoli-wñ ge̩; tak ef o̩kpanachi ki awa i agba iñmi ogbegbele̩.
Ama abo o̩gba wewe achʼabo ubi, abo ubi la achʼabo o̩gba.

Taku ma jeju o̩na ate̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m; Jisus dʼo̩gba ma alo; e̩gahi fu ma mu; abo ki rʼo̩ ubi la railo. Tak i ño̩ mʼamame̩gweji le̩ ko ge̩, oñ i chane̩ ekʼo̩la e̩wñ ki ache kʼi ake̩re̩bʼowñ ñwu ma,
i kakini, Go, awa anyi Je̩rusale̩m; ma la adʼO̩ma One̩ ñw amagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada mu, ma akpʼo̩ abi kʼi ku, ma adʼu ñw abo uche̩ichi;
ma la agwʼo̩ uke̩, ma afʼito̩ rʼu o̩la, oñ ma ajʼo edili taku ma adʼu kpa; o̩jo̩ me̩ta tak i adaji-kwane̩.
Taku Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n, amo̩ma Ze̩be̩di, te̩me̩rʼuwñ, ma ka ñw u, kakini, Akone̩wñ, i dʼuwa e̩do̩ kʼe̩ che e̩wñ du kʼa abi we̩ ñw a.
I ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩wñ dʼume̩ e̩do̩ kʼu nache ñwu me̩?
Ma ka ñw u, kakini, Dʼo̩da ñw a kʼe̩ne̩ʼka-wa ki gugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-we̩, kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ki gugu o̩wo̩ awohi-we̩ ugbo ojima-we̩.
Ama Jisus ka ñwu ma, kakini, Ame̩ ma e̩wñ ku me̩ bi-i n. Ame̩ neke ñmo̩ ago omi kʼomi añmo̩? Abe̩ku me̩ bo̩ baptism ku ma che mi jo̩ ku ma che me̩?
Ma ka ñw u, kakini, A chebo̩jo̩. Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma, kakini, Ago-mi kʼomi añmo̩ ame̩ añmo̩ mana; ma ñʼache me̩ baptism e-ku ma che mi ge̩;
ama egugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-mi abe̩k o̩wo̩ awohi chʼe-mi kʼu nadu chʼone̩ ele n, i muda chʼe-abo ku ma che tane̩ ñwu ma.
E̩gba kʼamame̩gwa le̩ gbʼo̩, o̩la Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n chane̩ ebi ma eju.
Taku Jisus do̩ ma wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ chema kakini, Abo ku ma nibe ka kʼama atʼo̩gba ef abo uche̩ichi kʼo̩la-ma che odu-ma; abojima-ma la ñw o̩da ñwu ma.
I muda dabe̩le̩ ef ume̩ n; ama e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼe̩do̩-wñ kʼi mud e̩ne̩lile ef ume̩ achʼe̩ne̩ ki ache̩wñ ñwu me̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi chʼe̩no̩gba ef ume̩ achʼadu e̩ne̩ du.
Todu O̩ma One̩ onugo wa ku ma chʼe̩wñ ñw u n, ama kʼowñ ki chʼe̩wñ ñw one̩, kʼi la du oji o̩la-wñ chʼe̩wñ-uro̩me̩ koji amone̩ wewe.
Oñ ma lewa ewo Je̩riko; tak abu kʼowñ manyʼamako̩che̩-wñ kpai o̩wo̩ amone̩ o̩temeje kwo Je̩riko dufu, o̩ma Timio̩s, kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Bartimio̩s ki chʼafeju ki abiebi, gugu et o̩na.
Oñ abu kʼi gbo̩ ka ki Jisus abo Nazare̩t de̩, i chane̩ ekwa, i kakini, Jisus, uwe̩ O̩ma Defid, li ejumomi mi.
Amone̩ wewe la dejurʼu kʼi hi alu-wñ de; i muda nakwa nana tule, kakini, Uwe̩, O̩ma Defid, li ejumomi mi.
Jisus la kwodago, i kakini, Me̩ dʼo̩ wa. Taku ma fʼafeju le̩ do̩wa, ma ka ñw u, kakini, Fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, kwane̩, i adʼe̩.
Tak i mʼafe̩-wñ korinyo̩, i murokwane̩ oñ i wʼugbo Jisus.
Oñ Jisus dohi ñw u, kakini, E̩wñ dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼu nache ñw e̩? Oñ afeju le̩ ka ñw u, kakini, Rabonai, todu kʼu dabi agane̩.
Taku Jisus ka ñw u, kakini, Nalo we̩; e̩do̩-ekono-we̩ fʼe̩ jadu me̩. Ababale̩ i kwogane̩, oñ i tʼo̩ ubi ej o̩na.
E̩gba ku ma me̩ru Je̩rusale̩m kpai Be̩tfage kpai Be̩tani awa, ugbo uwo O̩lif, i fʼamako̩che̩-wñ meji kpe̩,
i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ nalo me̩ tef ewo ke̩ke̩ ki kpejurʼume̩ le̩; ababa ku me̩ gudu wʼef uwñ, me̩ ali o̩mo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ki tʼiku o̩mo̩ e-kʼe̩ne̩ du ma tanʼo mama ta n; me̩ mʼu tu ku me̩ dʼu wa.
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ ka ñwu me̩, kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ che-i? me̩ kakini, Ondu chenʼeku-wñ; tak ababale̩ i adʼu kpuche̩ wʼemi ge̩.
Oñ ma le, ma la fʼo̩mo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ki tʼiku o̩do̩da alugbo̩naʼka ojikpadala li, taku ma mʼu tu.
Oñ abo iche̩ka ku ma dago jʼo̩mo̩ ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩wñ me̩ che, o̩mo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ku me̩ tu-i?
Ma ka ñwu ma alu ku Jisus ka le̩; taku ma tʼuma no̩.
Ma la mʼo̩mo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ du wʼugbo Jisus, oñ ma kʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma nʼubi-wñ; tak i kwogugu oji-wñ.
Amone̩ wewe la fʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma nadala jʼej o̩na, e-abo kibo̩ chʼeñmi oli ku ma nya kwef oko wa.
Oñ abo ku ma rʼo̩gba kpai abo ku ma rʼubi kpʼogu, kakini, Hosana; ekele ma kele e̩ne̩ ki awa ef odu Ondu;
ekele ma kele ojane̩ ki awa, e-ata-wa Defid; Hosana efojale ojale.
Tak i gudu wʼefu Je̩rusale̩m tef unyi O̩jo̩; oñ abu kʼi rejuda go e̩wñ du, abu kʼane̩ lo̩ e̩gba le̩, i kwodufu nyi Be̩tani kpai amame̩gweji le̩.
Oñ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ e̩gba ku ma kwo Be̩tani dufu, ebi nakpʼo̩.
Abu kʼi li oli o̩gbaikoloʼka ki nʼeñmi o̩najiji, i lewa, ikani i fali e̩wñ oji-wñ; e̩gba kʼi lewʼugbo-wñ, i li e̩wñ du tʼeñmi-wñ le i n; todu i chʼiko kʼi aro de̩ n.
Tak i ka ñw u, kakini, Akwe̩gba-i e̩ne̩ du ki ño̩ je̩ e̩ro-we̩ ogbegbele̩ ge̩ n. Oñ amako̩che̩-wñ gbʼo̩.

Taku ma lewa Je̩rusale̩m; i mugudu tef unyi O̩jo̩, oñ i chane̩ enʼabo ku ma ta e̩wñ kpai abo ku ma la e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩ dufu, i ño̩ mʼitebulu abo ku ma chenji o̩ko̩ rida dachi kpai odide abo ku ma ta ikede.
I la je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ki ne̩ e̩wñ eku du legu ef unyi O̩jo̩ du n.
I la nʼo̩la ako̩ ma kakini, Ma fʼo̩takada ko̩ kakini, Ma ado̩ unyi-mi ko̩ unyi adua todu abo uche̩ichi du n? Ame̩ mʼu du chʼo̩wo̩ amadinya.
Amagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada la gbʼo̩, oñ ma tejane̩ alu ku ma ale ku ma adʼu kpa tinyo̩; todu ailo-wñ aba ma, todu ibe takpa rʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ chaka efu noj uko̩-o̩la kʼi ako̩ ma.
Tak ane̩ ane̩ du i kwef ewo le̩ dufu.
Oñ abu ku ma alale odudu, ma li oli o̩gbaikolo le̩ kʼi chʼe̩gbe̩ kwʼe̩te̩-wñ.
Taku Pita libekadʼo, i ka ñw u, kakini, Rabai, go, oli o̩gbaikolo kʼe̩ nama ñw u le̩ gbe̩ me̩.
Oñ Jisus dohi ka ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ ke̩do̩nʼO̩jo̩.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩, E̩ne̩ du ki aka ñw uwo-i kakini, Muchi kwʼo̩mo̩ kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ rikpolo tef ohimini kʼe̩do̩-wñ ma la chʼejeji n, kʼi la ake̩do̩no ka kʼe̩wñ kʼi aka la anoji, i ado̩mo̩ ñw u.
Todule̩ naka ñwu me̩, kakini, E̩wñ du ku me̩ chadua ku me̩ bi, me̩ ke̩do̩no ka kʼame̩ mʼu gba me̩, tak e̩wñ le̩ ado̩mo̩ ñwu me̩.
E̩gba du ku me̩ dago achadua, ame̩ nʼo̩la kpai e̩ne̩ du, me̩ ki to̩no̩ ñw u; todu kʼAta-me̩ ki dʼefojale kʼi ño̩ tʼuñwa-nane̩ e-me̩ no̩ ñwu me̩ ge̩. [
I muda che̩wñ ku me̩ ma to̩no̩ n. Ata-me̩ ki dʼefojale la atʼuñwanane̩ e-me̩ no̩ n.]
Taku ma mudabi wa Je̩rusale̩m ge̩; abu kʼi alule̩ ef unyi O̩jo̩, amagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada kpai abogijo wʼugbo-wñ,
oñ ma ka ñw u, kakini, Ef o̩da e̩wñ oñ uwe̩ ache e̩wñ kide̩? Abe̩k e̩ne̩ dʼo̩da-i ñw e̩ kʼuwe̩ ki che e̩wñ-i?
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma, kakini, Natʼume̩ ene o̩laʼka, ku me̩ dohi ñwu mi, tak u naka ñwu me̩ o̩da kʼu nache e̩wñ kide̩ ef uwñ.
Baptism e-Jo̩n fa? Efojale i kwo abe̩k i kwʼugbo one̩? Me̩ dohi ñwu mi.
Ma kpibe kpai o̩la-ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼa kakini, Kwʼefojale, owñ aka kʼe̩wñ chi ku me̩ ma ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ n?
A muda aka ki, Kwʼugbo one̩? ma chokpo amone̩; todu kʼo̩chaka-ma do̩ ku Jo̩n chʼakache̩ O̩jo̩ ochochi.
Taku ma dohi ñwu Jisus, kakini, A ma n. Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma, kakini, Omi la aka o̩da kʼu naduche e̩wñ-i ef uwñ ñwu me̩ n.

Tak i chane̩ eko̩la ñwu ma ef ita. E̩ne̩ʼka luche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma, i fʼo̩gba bunyʼu lede, i fʼura gwa tod aguo̩ko̩lo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ, i la fʼakpata ro̩, oñ i mudu nyʼamaluche̩ o̩wo̩; tak i le tʼoj ane̩ omune̩.
I la fʼaduʼka kpuche̩ nyʼugbo amaluche̩ le̩ iko-wñ kʼi mʼukpe̩ e̩ro uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ gba kwef o̩wo̩ amaluche̩.
Oñ ma mʼowñ du, ma fʼu gwo, oñ ma je̩ ñw u kwʼo̩mo̩ o̩wo̩ ofo.
Tak i ño̩ kpe̩ adu omune̩ nyʼugbo ma ge̩, ma la fʼowñ oji chagbe, oñ ma fʼu chukata.
Tak i fʼomune̩ kpe̩ wa; ma fʼowñ le̩ kpa; kpai abomune̩ wewe, ma fʼabo iche̩ka gwo, ma la fʼabo iche̩ka kpa.
I nʼe̩ne̩ʼkate ta, owñ chʼo̩ma ufe̩do̩-wñ; i fʼowñ kpuche̩ nyʼugbo ma otitala, kakini, Ma adiba ñw o̩ma-mi-i.
Ama amaluche̩ le̩ ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, E̩ne̩ ki ajogu ata-wñ de̩; me̩ lewa kʼa mʼu du kpa, tak e̩wñ ogu le̩ amud e-wa.
Oñ ma mʼu du kpa, ma la mʼu du rikpolo bʼef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ te̩.
Mak e̩wñ odu uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ ache taa? I awa kpʼamaluche̩ le̩ rinyo̩, kʼi adʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ ñw abomune̩.
I chaka chʼo̩la o̩takada O̩jo̩ kide̩-i, me̩ chʼo̩kalatu mama ta n? kakini,
Ugbo Ondu oñ e̩wñ-i kwo,
Taku ma feju ku ma gwo̩nyʼu, ma muda chokpo o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩; todu ma ma ka kʼi fʼita-i kpa mʼuma o̩la. Taku ma tʼowñ no̩ oñ ma le ma.
Taku ma fʼamaFarisi kpai abo He̩ro̩d iche̩ka kpʼuche̩ nyʼugbo-wñ, ku ma fʼu mu ef o̩la kʼi aka.

Oñ abu ku ma lewa, ma ka ñw u, kakini, Akone̩wñ, a chema ka kʼe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ochochi, kʼe̩ne̩ du la wʼe̩ eju n; todu i chʼeju amone̩ e̩ go n; chai o̩na O̩jo̩ ochochi uwe̩ ako̩ one̩; o̩da aje̩ ñw one̩ tʼo̩ko̩-ane̩ ñwu Sisa, abe̩k i aje̩ n?
I dʼugbo kʼa te̩, abe̩k a ki te̩ n? Ama abu kʼi chema ayechi-ma, i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ jʼumi ma-i? Dʼo̩ko̩ʼka wa kʼu go.
Oñ ma mʼu du wa. Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ojibo kpai o̩la ku ma ko̩-i, e-e̩ne̩ de̩? Ma ka ñw u, kakini, E-Sisa de̩.
Oñ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ kʼe̩wñ e-Sisa ñwu Sisa; e̩wñ O̩jo̩ me̩ ko ñw O̩jo̩. Taku ma yʼaye-wñ nana.
Tak abo Sadiusi lewʼugbo-wñ, owñ chʼabo ku ma ka kʼudajikwane̩ do̩mo̩ n; oñ ma tʼowñ ene kakini,
Akone̩wñ, Mose̩s ko̩tane̩ ñwu wa, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼo̩maye one̩ leku bʼo̩ya-wñ te̩, ki ma nʼo̩ma tane̩ n, o̩maye-wñ ki mʼo̩ya-wñ du, kʼi nʼugbe̩ ñw o̩maye-wñ.
Amo̩maye mebie do̩mo̩: e-ejodudu ne̩ o̩ya, i leku, i la nʼugbe̩ tane̩ n;
e-ekeji ño̩ mʼu du, i ño̩ leku, i la nʼugbe̩ tak i ku bʼo̩ te̩ n; e-e̩ke̩ta ño̩ fʼabe̩le̩ che ge̩;
ama mebie le̩ la nʼugbe̩ tane̩ n. Otitala-ma du, onobule̩ le̩ ño̩ leku ge̩.
E̩gba udajikwane̩ e̩ne̩ anʼe̩ chʼo̩ya? todu ama mebie nʼe̩ chʼo̩ya me̩.
Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, I chʼutod e̩wñ-i oñ me̩ la n? owñ chʼabu ku me̩ ma mʼO̩takada O̩lo̩jo̩ n, me̩ la mʼukpahiu O̩jo̩ n.
Todu e̩gba ku ma dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, ma nʼo̩ya n, ma la dukpo̩ko̩ n; ma muda dab amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ efojale.

Ama i chʼe-o̩la abo ki ku, ka ku ma adu ma kwane̩; ame̩ chʼo̩kalatu ef o̩takada Mose̩s ugbo o̩la oli ye̩le̩ le̩ mama ta n? abu kʼO̩jo̩ ko̩la ñw u kakini, Omi chʼO̩jo̩ Ebraham kpai O̩jo̩ Aise̩k kpai O̩jo̩ Jeko̩b.
Owñ chʼO̩jo̩ abo ki ku n, chai e-abo ki deju; ame̩ la tabale!
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka ef amako̩takada lewa, oñ i gbo̩ abu ku ma nʼo̩la-ma ene; oñ abu kʼi chema kʼowñ dʼohi o̩me̩me̩le̩ ñwu ma, i tʼowñ ene kakini, E̩wñ chʼo̩la uko̩ ki chʼe-o̩gba ejodudu chaka?
Jisus dohi kakini, E-ejodudu de̩: Abo Israe̩l, me̩ neti: Ondu O̩jo̩-wa, Ondu le̩ chʼokate;
uwe̩ ki la fe̩do̩ Ondu O̩jo̩-we̩ kpʼe̩do̩-we̩ du, kpʼonugo-we̩ du, kpʼibe-we̩ du, kpʼugbiti-we̩ du.
Ekeji-wñ de̩: Uwe̩ ki fe̩do̩ ekeji-we̩ dab o̩la-we̩. O̩la uko̩ omune̩ ki tʼe-i le do̩mo̩ ge̩ n.
Ako̩takada le̩ ka ñw u kakini, I nyo̩, Akone̩wñ, o̩la ochochi uwe̩ ka kʼowñ chʼokate; omune̩ do̩mo̩ tʼowñ le n;
efe̩do̩-wñ kpʼe̩do̩ chaka kpʼibe chaka kpʼugbiti du kʼi la afe̩do̩ ekeji-wñ dab o̩la-wñ, tʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo odukulu kpai iche̩bo̩ du le.
Oñ e̩gba ku Jisus li kʼi dohi anibe ñw u, i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ jiji rʼojane̩ O̩jo̩ no. Akwe̩gba le̩ e̩ne̩ du la ne̩do̩ etʼowñ ene ge̩ n.
Tak abu ki Jisus do̩mo̩ akʼone̩ e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩, i dohi kakini, Abile kʼamako̩takada ka ki Kraisti chʼO̩ma Defid taa?
Defid onugo ka ef Afu Kiafo̩ kakini,
Defid onugo dʼo̩ ko̩ Ondu; kwʼugbo i chʼo̩ma-wñ ke? Ame̩no̩talaka la yo̩ ñw o̩la-wñ egbo̩.
Ef uko̩-o̩la kʼi ko̩ ma i kakini, Me̩ nago todu amako̩takada kʼi dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma nyʼotogbo alule̩, kpʼugwa ef aja
kpʼugugu ki tʼo̩gba ef unyi ujeju unyi ujeju, kpʼuña ki tʼo̩gba ef idina-ma:
ama ku ma kʼunyi unyi amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ je̩, taku ma nʼadua eche jiji ku ma du yʼone̩ eju; abi ku ma akpa abo-i a tule.
Tak i kwogugu o̩gba akpati o̩ko̩, i ago alu kʼamone̩ wewe dʼo̩ko̩ ro̩ tef akpati o̩ko̩ le̩; amanana wewe la ro̩ tʼo̩ nana.
Tak o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ʼka ki chʼe̩nale lewa, oñ i dʼanini meji tʼo̩, owñ dab ukpe̩reji ade̩li.
Tak i fʼamako̩che̩-wñ do̩ wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ami naka ñwu me̩, o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ e̩nale kide̩ du e̩wñ nana ro̩ tʼo̩ tʼamone̩ du ku ma kʼe̩wñ ro̩ tef akpati o̩ko̩-i le;
todu o̩chaka-ma du kwef e̩wñ-ma ki kwʼuma bo̩ ro̩ tʼo̩: ama owñ le̩ kwef e̩wñ ki nyarʼu kʼe̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ ro̩ tʼo̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ udiñmino-wñ chaka.
Tak abu kʼi akwʼef unyi O̩jo̩ du-fu, e̩ne̩ʼka ef amako̩che̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Akone̩wñ, gʼalu kʼokuta kpʼunyi kijo̩-i de̩!
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ li unyi lile kijo̩-i? Ma atʼokuta kate no̩ noj omune̩ emi ku ma ma agwulo̩ wane̩ n in.
Abu kʼi guguane̩ ugbo uwo O̩lif ki kpejurʼunyi O̩jo̩ o̩mo̩, Pita kpai Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n kpai Anduru tʼowñ ene o̩wo̩ʼka, kakini,
Ka ñw a e̩gba kʼe̩wñ le̩ ade̩? kpʼe̩wñ achʼujiwe-wñ, e̩gba ku ma che ku ma che e̩wñ kʼe̩ ka le̩ kpa?
Taku Jisus chane̩ eko̩la ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ nago tod one̩ eko me̩ la.
Amone̩ wewe awa ef odu-mi, ma akakini, Omi le̩ de̩; ma la akʼamone̩ wewe la.
E̩gba ku me̩ agbʼiche̩ ogu kpai inabali ogu, me̩ ki dutu n; e̩wñ-i awache tila; i muda chʼukpoji-wñ de̩ ta n.
Todu abo uche̩ichiʼka akwane̩ tʼabo uche̩ichi omune̩ o̩la, abojane̩ʼka la akwane̩ tʼabojane̩ omune̩ o̩la; ane̩ amiejo ugbo ojoji ojoji; ukpo̩ta akpa kpa ño̩ kpa; e̩wñ ki jo̩ le̩ chʼuchane̩ echefu.
Ama me̩ nago o̩la-me̩; todu ma ako me̩ ñw abo̩hiala mu; ma la aja me̩ ef unyi ujeju unyi ujeju; ame̩ la adago o̩gba amigo̩bina kpai o̩gba amonu todu mi, ku me̩ gbibenu ugbo ma.
Ma atakoya uche̩nyo̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi du ejodudu tila.
Tak e̩gba du ku ma ko me̩ ñwu ma mu, ame̩ ki kpibe o̩wo̩wo̩ tane̩ ugbo o̩la ku me̩ aka n; ama e̩wñ du ku ma adu ñwu me̩ ef auwa le̩, e-le̩ me̩ ka; todu i chʼame̩ ako̩la n, chai Afu Kiafo̩.
O̩maye la adʼo̩maye-wñ ñw amone̩ ku ma dʼu kpa, ata año̩ che o̩ma-wñ ge̩; abimo̩to̩ la akwane̩ tʼabo ki bi ma o̩la ku ma fʼuma kpa.
Amone̩ du la achulaka me̩ todu odu-mi; e̩ne̩ ki muda afe̩do̩ lichii gbogbo wa tʼotitala, owñ le̩ ma ajadu.
Ama e̩gba ku me̩ ali e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ e-alache̩ ki adago ugbo kʼi ma dukpe̩ ki dago n (e̩ne̩ ki acho̩kalatu ki namʼofe-wñ), e̩gba le̩ abo ku ma jʼane̩ Judia ki nara tʼugbo kʼuwo jo̩;
e̩ne̩ ki dʼojokunyi ki gwo̩ru wane̩ n, ki la gudu nyʼejefu kʼi mʼe̩wñʼka du kwef unyi-wñ n;
oñ e̩ne̩ ki dʼoko ki dabi wʼubi ki ko afe̩-wñ n.
Ama atogwo ñw abo ku ma defu kpai abo ku ma dʼe̩nya ñw o̩ma ñmo̩ iko le̩.
Me̩ nachadua ki we echʼe̩gba afu o̩we̩.
Todu o̩jo̩ kʼu naka-i o̩bata ade̩ kʼe̩go̩-wñ ma de̩ akwe̩gba abakwane̩ e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ nyi gbogbo wʼifai n, i ñʼade̩ ate̩to̩gba-i ge̩ n.
Ondu ma bʼo̩jo̩-wñ wane̩ n, i ma nʼo̩re̩la du ku ma ajadu n; ama todu abo kʼi chi ma tane̩, i bʼo̩jo̩-wñ wane̩.
Tak e̩gba le̩ iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du aka ñwu me̩, kakini, Go, Kraist dʼemi; abe̩ku me̩ go, owñ dʼano̩mo̩-i; me̩ ki do̩ rʼochochi n;
todu amaKraist olemi kpai amakache̩ olemi akwane̩, ma la akʼujiwe wewe kpai uno̩ wewe ña amone̩, kʼama ki kʼabo kʼi chi ma tane̩ le̩ la, iche̩wñ kʼi ma jʼache.
Ama me̩ nago; me̩ go, omi fʼe̩wñ du ka ñwu me̩ tane̩ me̩.
Ama agbagba o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i e̩gba kʼo̩bata le̩ kpoji, olu achubi, ochu afane̩ n,
awo awo achi kwʼojale wane̩, oñ ukpahiu ukpahiu efojale amiejo.
E̩gba le̩ taku ma ali O̩ma One̩ kʼi awa ef akpa ojale ef ukpahiu nana kpai ojima.
E̩gba le̩ tak i akpe̩ amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ uche̩, oñ ma akʼabo-wñ kʼi chi jeju kwʼef afu me̩le̩, kwʼukade ile̩ gbogbo wʼukade ojale.
Me̩ ko̩che̩ ita-i ugbo oli o̩gbaikolo; e̩gba kʼe̩to̩-wñ chʼemele kʼi alu eñmi etito̩, me̩ ma ka kʼo̩lo̩ji me̩ ewa me̩;
abe̩le̩ ame̩ ge̩, e̩gba ku me̩ li kʼe̩wñ kʼu naka-i ache, ame̩ ma ka kʼi me̩ru alu o̩na anane̩.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I nʼugbo kʼabo o̩gba kide̩-i alale gbogbo tak e̩wñ-i du wache n.
Efojale kpai ane̩-ile̩ alale rinyo̩, o̩la e-mi muda alale rinyo̩ n.
I muda chʼinabali o̩jo̩ le̩ abe̩k auwa le̩ e̩ne̩ du ma n, tʼamonuche̩ O̩jo̩ efojale, tʼO̩ma onugo chai Ata ma.
Me̩ nago, me̩ gwe̩ke̩ adide, me̩ chadua; todu me̩ ma iko-wñ n.
I dab e̩ne̩ʼka ki dʼule̩, kʼi tʼunyi-wñ no̩, kʼi la dʼo̩da e-e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ñw amadu-wñ, oñ i fʼuko̩ te̩ ñw adide o̩na todu kʼi gwe̩ke̩ akʼeju rʼo̩na.
Todule̩, ame̩ ki gwe̩ke̩ akejurʼo̩na; todu me̩ ma e̩gba kʼOdu unyi awa n, abe̩k ane̩, abe̩k iñaliña odu, abe̩k e̩gba kʼaiko̩ ako̩, abe̩k odudu, me̩ ma n;
tode̩gba kʼi awa achigili, kʼi ake̩re̩bʼume̩ abu me̩ jʼalolu.
Oñ e̩wñ kʼu naka ñwu me̩-i, naka ñw amone̩ du, me̩ gwe̩ke̩ akejurʼo̩na.
I bo̩ o̩jo̩ meji ku ma je̩ Elaloji kpʼuje̩wñ ku ma ma dʼo̩jo̩wu tʼo̩ n; tak amagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada jʼafeju alu ku ma agwʼo̩ o̩gwo̩ kʼi tʼuma o̩wo̩ ku ma fʼu kpa.
Todu ma kakini, I ki chʼe̩gba ujeju-ucholo-i n, tode̩gba kʼamone̩ amudutu.

E̩gba kʼi de̩ Be̩tani ef unyi Saimo̩n e̩no̩ga ikpemute le̩, abu kʼi chekukane̩ aje̩wñ, onobule̩ʼka ki nʼugege ekpo nard ogbolo, e-kʼaja-wñ kpuna tabale lewa; oñ i fʼugege-wñ kpo̩fo̩, i mʼu du danyʼoji-wñ.
Oñ abo iche̩ka do̩mo̩ i bi uma eju, ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku ma dʼekpo-i chihi rinyo̩?
Todu ma ma neke ta ekpo kide̩ tʼo̩ko̩ ipam me̩gwa le, ku ma mʼo̩ko̩-wñ ko ñw ame̩nale. Oñ i bi uma eju nana.
Ama Jisus kakini, Me̩ tʼo̩ no̩; e̩wñ chi ku me̩ chʼo akanya? I fʼuko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ che o̩la-mi.
Todu me̩ nʼame̩nale ugbo me̩ e̩gba du; e̩gba du kʼi dʼume̩ e̩do̩ me̩ neke chʼe̩nyo̩ ñwu ma; me̩ muda ne̩ mi e̩gba du n.
E̩wñ kʼi ne̩ i che me̩; i fʼekpo ba tʼaño̩la-mi tane̩ ku ma ji oku-mi.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩, ugbo du ku ma fʼakoya Uche̩nyo̩ ta ef o̩gbo̩ ile̩ du, ma ñʼadʼe̩wñ kʼonobule̩-i che ka tod arewa-wñ.
Taku Judas Iskario̩t, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef amame̩gweji le̩, kwʼo̩mo̩ nyʼugbo amagboji amatama, todu kʼi mʼowñ du ñwu ma mu.
E̩gba ku ma gbo̩, ma yo̩, oñ ma ka ku ma adʼo̩ko̩ ñw u. Tak i feju alu kʼi ale kʼi alʼiko kʼi adʼu ñwu ma mu.
Oñ eñeñini ku ma chane̩ eje̩ akala ku ma ma dʼo̩jo̩wu tʼo̩ n, e̩gba ku ma fʼe̩wñ Elaloji kpa, amako̩che̩-wñ ka ñw u, kakini, Ugbo dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼa nyʼacho̩na Elaloji kʼe̩ je̩?
Tak i fʼamako̩che̩-wñ meji kpuche̩, i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ nyʼef ewo-i, oñ ame̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka ki anʼotube̩ omiofo ade; me̩ tʼo̩ ubi;
oñ ugbo du kʼi agudu nyi, me̩ ka ñw e̩ne̩fe̩nyi le̩, kakini, Akone̩wñ kakini, Ugbo unyi uru-mi ugbo kʼomi kpai amako̩che̩-mi aje̩ Elaloji de̩?
Tak owñ adʼunyi ojale lile ña me̩, ane̩-wñ chʼe̩te̩ru jʼef uwñ, me̩ ñwʼo̩mo̩ che tane̩ ñw a.
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ kwʼo̩mo̩ nyʼef ewo, oñ ma li abu kʼi dʼalu kʼi ka ñwu ma; taku ma fʼElaloji ñwo̩che te̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼane̩ lo̩, owñ kpʼamame̩gweji lewa.
Oñ abu ku ma gugu aje̩wñ, Jisus kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩, e̩ne̩ʼka ef ume̩ amʼumi du ñw amone̩ mu, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ajʼe̩wñ kpʼomi.
Edo̩-ma chane̩ ekpabie̩, ma la ka ñw u okoka, kakini, Omi le̩?
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka ef amame̩gweji, i do̩mo̩, ato̩wo̩ nyu ugba kpʼomi-i.
Todu O̩ma One̩ alo alu ku ma ko̩ o̩la-wñ tane̩ chuu; ama atogwo ñw e̩ne̩ ku ma dʼO̩ma One̩ ñw amone̩ mu lugbo wñ! Ma ma bi e̩ne̩ le̩ n, i ma chʼome̩me̩le̩ ñw u.
Tak abu ku ma jʼajʼe̩wñ, i mʼakala du, oñ abu kʼi chʼadua nyʼu, i mʼu bu, tak i mudu ñwu ma, oñ i kakini, Me̩ gba; año̩la-mi de̩-i.
Tak i mʼago du, abu kʼi fʼugwa gwa, i mʼu du ñwu ma; oñ o̩chaka ma ñmʼo̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩bie̩-mi e-alo ekpe̩ ku ma du dafo todu amone̩ wewe le̩ de̩.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩, kakini, Naño̩ ñmo̩ e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma ge̩ n, gbogbo kad o̩jo̩ kʼu nañmo̩ etito̩-wñ ojane̩ O̩jo̩.
Tak e̩gba ku ma fʼeli ko̩ ma dufu nyʼugbo uwo O̩lif.
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩chaka-me̩ adʼo̩la-me̩ hi; todu i che̩ko̩ tane̩ kakini, Nagwo adidala oñ amala-wñ akpatuka.
Ama e̩gba ku ma mʼumi du kwane̩, natʼume̩ o̩gba nyi Galili.
Ama Pita ka ñw u kakini, Dagba kʼo̩chaka-ma dʼo̩la-ma hi, i muda chʼomi n.
Oñ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Ami, naka ñw e̩ kakini, Eñini odu-i, gbogbo tak aiko̩ ko̩ onu meji, uwe̩ arʼaire̩-mi onu me̩ta.
I muda ño̩ ka tule kakini, Dagba i chaka dukpe̩ kʼomi kpʼuwe̩ akpe̩re̩ aku, naraire̩ we̩ n. Abe̩le̩ o̩chaka-ma ño̩ ka ge̩.
Taku ma lewa ugbo ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Ge̩tse̩mani; oñ i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ guguane̩ emi gbogbo tak u nachadua.
Tak i mu Pita kpai Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n ko manyʼo̩la-wñ lo, awuwu chane̩ emʼu tabale, e̩do̩-wñ kpa ololo.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩do̩ onugo-mi mukpabie̩ tabale gbogbo wa kadʼuku; ame̩ ki jʼemi, ku me̩ gwe̩ke̩ adide.
Tak ile tʼo̩gba pe̩, oñ i lewane̩ ane̩pe̩te̩; i chadua tode̩gba ki jʼache kʼauwa le̩ ki kwo bʼowñ te̩.
Oñ i kakini, Ada, Ata, e̩wñ du jʼache ñw e̩; mʼago-i du kwo bʼumi te̩; amani, i ki chʼe̩wñ ki dʼumi e̩do̩ n, chai e̩wñ ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩.
Tak i lewa fʼuma li abu ku ma jʼalolu, oñ i ka ñwu Pita kakini, Saimo̩n, e̩ lolu le̩? E̩ gbiti bo̩jo̩ kʼe̩ gwe̩ke̩ adide auwa okate n?
Me̩ gwe̩ke̩ achadua, todu ku me̩ we etʼef ajama; ibe afu de̩ kokolo mana, o̩re̩la muda chʼe̩gbo.
I ño̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ achadua ge̩, i laño̩ kʼo̩la le̩ gbage̩de̩.
I ño̩ lewa fʼuma li abu ku ma alolu ge̩, todabu kʼigbe-gbeneju-ma chewoji ñw olu; ma ma abu ku ma adohi ñw u n.
Tak i lewa onuke̩ta aka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nalolu waa, me̩ nañmi waa; i nyo̩ me̩, auwa le̩ lewa me̩; me̩ go, ma mʼO̩ma One̩ du ñw ame̩nadure mu me̩.
Me̩ kwane̩ kʼa lo; me̩ go, e̩ne̩ ki dʼumi ñw amone̩ mu me̩rʼemi me̩.
Oñ ababale̩ abu kʼi nʼo̩la le̩ aka, Judas, e̩ne̩ʼka ef amame̩gweji le̩ lewa, o̩wo̩ amone̩ nʼugbada kpʼugbolo kpe̩re̩ wa kpʼowñ, ma kwʼugbo amagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada kpai abogijo wa.
E̩ne̩ kʼi dʼowñ ñwu ma mu le̩ dʼujiwe ñwu ma tane̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du kʼu nadʼalu-mi kʼo̩ alu, owñ le̩ de̩; me̩ gwo̩nyʼu ku me̩ mʼu dʼalo ye̩e̩.
Oñ abu kʼi lewa i te̩wʼugbo-wñ ababa, i kakini, Rabai; oñ i dʼalu kʼo̩ alu nana.
Taku ma dʼo̩wo̩ dʼo, ma la gwo̩nyʼu.
Ama e̩ne̩ʼka ef abo ku ma dago o̩mo̩ mʼugbada wo̩, oñ i fʼadu agboji amatama da, i la mʼowñ eti la.
Jisus dohi ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ dufuwa kpai ugbada kpai ugbolo ku me̩ mu mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼadinya?
Omi dʼugbo me̩ ef unyi O̩jo̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa ako̩ amone̩ e̩wñ, me̩ la gwo̩nyʼumi n; ama todu kʼO̩la ki dʼef O̩takada O̩jo̩ ki che̩.
Tak o̩chaka ma tʼo̩ no̩ oñ ma ra.
Oñ okolobiaʼka do̩mo̩ ki lebʼo̩, i tago ofo tef ukpo line̩n; taku ma gwo̩nyʼu,
i muda tʼukpo line̩n no̩, i ra kpʼago ofo le.
Taku ma du Jisus alo tʼugbo agboji amatama; oñ amagboji amatama chaka kpai abogijo kpai amako̩takada wa jʼugbo-wñ.
Pita la tʼo̩ ubi o̩najiji gbogbo tʼejefu tef anuku agboji amatama; i la gugu ugbo abimo̩to̩ awʼuna.
Amagboji atama kpai abo̩hiala chaka feju e̩ne̩ ki agbibenu nyu Jisus ku ma dʼu kpa; ma la li n.
Todu amone̩ wewe gbibenu olemi nyʼu, alu-ma muda chʼokate n.
Abo iche̩ka la kwane̩ agbibenu olemi nyʼu kakini,
A gbo̩ abu kʼi kakini, Omi agu unyi O̩jo̩ kʼone̩ nʼo̩wo̩-wñ ko̩-i lo̩, o̩jo̩ me̩ta nako̩ omune̩ e-kʼone̩ ma anʼo̩wo̩-wñ ko̩ n.
Ama dagba i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ibenu-ma tʼokate n.
Tak agboji amatama kwodago alumeji, oñ i tu Jisus ene kakini, E̩ dohi du n? E̩wñ chʼibenu kʼabo-i agba nyʼuwe̩?
I muda chechi, i la dohi du n. Agboji amatama ño̩ tʼe ene onu keji ge̩, i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ che Kraisti, O̩ma E̩ne̩ ki nele le̩?
Oñ Jisus kakini, Omi de̩; ame̩ ali O̩ma One̩ abu kʼi gugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ Ukpahiu kpʼabu kʼi awa ef akpa ojale.
Tak agboji amatama le̩ fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, i kakini, Eku ame̩nibenu ñʼaku wa ta?
Me̩ gbo̩ abu kʼi chakpabie̩ O̩jo̩-i; abu i de̩ eju-me̩? Oñ o̩gbo̩ ma chaka du kpʼo̩ abi, ka kʼi fʼuku fa bʼo̩la-wñ ma.
Tak iche̩ka ef uma chane̩ efito̩rʼowñ o̩la, ma la kʼe̩wñ bʼeju-wñ ma, ma ro̩kpo̩ ñw u, ma ka ñw u kakini, Kache̩; tak abimo̩to̩ le̩ mʼu gba kpai igbe ekpa.
Oñ abu ku Pita dʼo̩gane̩ ef anuku, e̩ne̩ʼka ef abimo̩to̩ igbe̩le̩ agboji amatama lewa;
oñ abu kʼi fu Pita li kʼi awʼuna, i kejurʼu, i kakini, Uwe̩ ño̩ dʼugbo e̩ne̩ Nazare̩t le̩ ge̩, owñ che Jisus.
I muda raire̩ kakini, U mʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ ka-i n, u la mʼofe-wñ n; tak i dufu nyʼo̩be̩ya; oñ aiko ko̩.
Imo̩to̩ igbe̩le̩ fʼu li, i ño̩ chane̩ eko̩la ñw abo ki dago o̩mo̩ ge̩ kakini, Amʼama le̩ de̩.
Ama i ño̩ re̩ ge̩. Ma jo̩ pe̩, tak abo ku ma dago o̩mo̩ ka ñwu Pita kakini, Ochochi, uwe̩ dʼef uma; todu abo Galili uwe̩ che.
I muda chane̩ ebina elifo̩, i chane̩ ege̩bo̩ kakini, U ma e̩ne̩ ku me̩ kʼo̩la-wñ-i n.
Ababale̩ aiko̩ ko̩ onukeji. Taku Pita rewa o̩la le̩, alu ku Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Gbogbo tak aiko̩ ki ko̩ onumeji, uwe̩ arʼaire̩-mi onu me̩ta. Abu kʼi adibekadʼo, i chane̩ eraku.
Oñ ababale̩ odudu-wñ amagboji amatama kpʼabogijo kpʼamako̩takada kpʼabo̩hiala du fʼojuju nyi; taku ma fu Jisus ji, oñ ma nʼe̩ alo adʼu ñwu Pailat.
Pailat tʼowñ ene kakini, Uwe̩ chʼOnu amaJu? I dohi ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ aka-i.
Oñ amagboji amatama gwʼajo̩ wewe nʼo.
Pailat ño̩ tʼowñ ene ge̩, kakini, E̩ dohi du n? Go alu kʼe̩wñ chewewe ku ma gwunʼe̩.
Jisus muda dohi du ge̩ n; Todabe̩le̩ Pailat kwoyaye.
E̩gba ujeju-ucholo i te̩tatʼe̩ne̩ unyi-ugaʼka ku ma bi ugbo-wñ no̩ tane̩ ñwu ma.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Barabas, ma fʼu ji te̩ manyʼabo ku ma dʼane̩ utu le̩, ma chʼabo ku ma kpone̩ ef ane̩ ku ma dutu le̩.
Tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ mute̩gu nyʼugbo-wñ, ma chane̩ ebi kʼi che alu kʼi te̩tache ñwu ma.
Oñ Pailat dohi ñwu ma kakini, I dʼume̩ e̩do̩ kʼu natʼOnu amaJu no̩ tane̩ ñwu me̩?
Todu i chema ka kʼi chʼutodabu ku ma lie̩na-wñ oñ amagboji amatama mʼowñ du ñw u i.
Ama amagboji amatama ko̩nyʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ efu todu ku ma ka kʼi tu Barabas no̩ tane̩ ñwu ma.
Taku Pailat ño̩ dohi ñwu ma kakini, Mak e̩wñ nache e̩ne̩ ku me̩ do̩ kʼOnu amaJu le̩ ke?
Ma ño̩ kwukwa ge̩ kakini, Mʼu du kabamoli.
Pailat muda ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩bie̩ne̩ e̩wñ i che ke̩? Ama ma ro̩wo̩ ekwa tule kakini, Mʼu du kabamoli.
Tak abu ku Pailat neku eche e̩wñ ki nyʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ eju, i tu Barabas no̩ tane̩ ñwu ma, oñ i fu Jisus gwo, tak i mʼu du ñwu ma ku ma mʼu du kabamoli.
Oñ amisoja dʼowñ alo tef anuku, owñ che Praitorio̩n; ma fʼabudala-ma chaka do̩ wa.
Taku ma nyi owñ otogbo odufa ekpikpa, ma la fʼikeke ta ugugu uloko, oñ ma mʼu du dʼo oji.
Taku ma chane̩ egwʼo̩ ugwa kakini, Agba-o, Onu amaJu!
Ma la du elikpo fiʼo̩ oji, oñ ma fito̩rʼowñ o̩la, taku ma kekunyane̩ adojikane̩ ñw u.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma chʼo uke̩ kpa, ma mʼotogbo odufa ekpikpa le̩ gwo̩ kwʼo̩la-wñ, oñ ma mʼe̩wñ o̩la e-wñ ko nyʼo̩la-wñ. Taku ma mʼu du dufu ku ma dʼu kabamoli.
Oñ ma gwo̩nyʼe̩ne̩ʼka kʼi kwʼoko awa lale o̩mo̩ todu kʼi ne̩ oli uku-wñ. Odu e̩ne̩ le̩ ko Saimo̩n, abo Sairini, ata Ale̩ksanda kpai Rufo̩s.
Taku ma mʼu du wʼugbo ku ma do̩ ko̩ Go̩lgo̩ta, ku ma jʼomudechi-wñ ko̩ Uña Akokoloji.
Oñ ma mʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma ku mur gwe̩gwanyʼu du ñw u, i muda gba n.
Taku ma mʼowñ du kamoli; ma la fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ kpe̩ ñw o̩la-ma, ma mʼu ko ato̩ko̩ ku ma ma e̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ adu.
Auwa e̩ke̩ta i la che, oñ ma mʼu du kamoli.
O̩la e̩wñ ki chi ku ma dʼu kamoli ku ma ko̩ tʼugbo oji-wñ che, ONU AMAJU.
Ma la kʼamadinya meji kamoli manyʼowñ, oka dʼo̩wo̩ awoto-wñ, oka la dʼo̩wo̩ awohi-wñ. [
Abe̩le̩ o̩la ki dʼef o̩takada O̩jo̩ kʼi kakini, Ma fʼu choli tʼef ame̩nugbite̩re̩ che̩.]
Abo ku ma lale chʼakpabie̩-wñ, ma mi oji-ma ejo, ma kakini, E̩he̩! Uwe̩ ki agu unyi O̩jo̩ lo̩ kʼe̩ ñʼadabi ko̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta,
fʼo̩la-we̩ jadu, kwʼoj oli tane̩!
Abe̩le̩ ge̩, amagboji amatama manyʼamako̩takada mʼowñ du tʼachʼo uke̩, ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, I fʼabo ki bo̩ jadu, i neke jadu o̩la-wñ n.
Kraist Onu Israe̩l-i ki kwʼoj oli tane̩ fa-i, todu kʼa li kʼa ke̩do̩no. Abo ku ma ko kamoli kpai owñ ño̩ kicha ñw u ge̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼauwa e̩ke̩fa jo̩, ane̩ chubi chaka gbogbo tʼauwa e̩ke̩la.
Tak e̩gba kʼauwa e̩ke̩la jo̩, Jisus dʼomu dago kwa, kakini, E̩loi, E̩loi, lama sabaktani? e-ku ma jʼomudechi-wñ kakini, O̩jo̩-mi, O̩jo̩-mi, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ tʼumi no̩ tinyo̩-i?
Oñ e̩gba kʼabo iche̩ka efabo ku ma dago o̩mo̩ gbʼo̩, ma kakini, Me̩ go, i ado̩ E̩laija.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka fule adʼugbo̩che̩ tunyʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩ka ki ñmo̩ nyʼo̩la, tak i mudu tunyʼoli ikpo, oñ i dʼu ñw u kʼi ñmo̩ kakini, To̩no̩, kʼa li abe̩k E̩laija awa kʼi dʼowñ tane̩.
Taku Jisus fʼogu kpa, oñ i mʼiñmi da.
Oñ ukpo ugbo̩na unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu mukpana meji kwʼate̩ gbogbowa tʼane̩.
E̩gba kʼagboji amisoja ogume̩lu kʼi dago akpejurʼu li ka kʼi mʼiñmi da abe̩le̩, i kakini, Ochochi, e̩ne̩-i chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩.
Abobule̩ ño̩ jʼo̩najiji ago ge̩; Me̩ri Magdalini kpai Me̩ri iye Jeme̩s kekele kpai Jose̩s kpai Salome jʼef uma,
ama le̩ tʼowñ ubi achʼe̩wñ ñw u, e̩gba kʼi de̩ Galili; kpai abobule̩ omune̩ wewe kʼama kpai owñ kpe̩re̩ wa Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ e̩gba kʼane̩ lo̩, todabu kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ Emo̩latane̩, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ kʼo̩na-wñ bo̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi,
Jose̩f e-Arimatia lewa, kʼowñ chʼe̩ne̩ o̩hialaʼka ku ma diba ñw u, kʼowñ onugo aneju ojane̩ O̩jo̩; i fʼe̩do̩ ji anyʼugbo Pailat, oñ i bi oku Jisus.
Awuwu-wñ la je̩ ñwu Pailat n, i neke leku e̩gba-i me̩? oñ i do̩ agboji amisoja le̩ wʼugbo-wñ, i tʼowñ ene ka kʼi leku kpo̩kpe̩ me̩?
Tak abu kʼi ma ugbo agboji amisoja le̩, i mʼoku-wñ du ñwu Jose̩f.
Tak i fʼukpo line̩n la, oñ i mʼowñ du wane̩, i la fʼukpo line̩n le̩ wenyʼu, tak i mʼu du dachi ef oji ku ma da ef apata; tak i fʼokuta li bʼalu oji le̩ ma.
Oñ Me̩ri Magdalini kpai Me̩ri iye Jose̩s li ugbo ku ma dʼu dachi.
E̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ uñmi lale, Me̩ri Magdalini kpai Me̩ri iye Jeme̩s, kpai Salome fʼe̩wñ ki akpo ojoji ojoji la todu ku ma lewa fo̩ nyʼoku-wñ.
Odudu odudu ef o̩jo̩ ejodudu ef o̩jo̩ mebie, ma wʼugbo oji e̩gba kʼolu adufu.
Ma naka ñw o̩la-ma, kakini, E̩ne̩ ali okuta le̩ bʼalu oji te̩ ñw a?
Taku ma chʼeju nyate̩, ma go abu kʼokuta le̩ muli ubi; todu i nana tabale.
Abu ku ma gudu nyʼef oji, ma li okolobiaʼka ki gugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩, otogbo efufu dʼo̩la-wñ; tak e̩gahi-wñ fu ma mu.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Awuwu ki mu me̩ n; me̩ feju Jisus, abo Nazare̩t, ku ma du kamoli le̩; i mudajikwane̩ me̩; i dʼemi n; me̩ go, ugbo ku ma dʼu dachi de̩!
Me̩ muda nalo, ku me̩ ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kpai Pita kakini, I atʼume̩ o̩gba nyi Galili; o̩mo̩ ame̩ ali u, alu kʼi ka ñwu me̩.
Ma kwodufu oñ ma ra bʼoji te̩; todu o̩la-ma chane̩ ega, ibe-ma ño̩ mukpatuka ge̩; ma ka abu du ñw e̩ne̩ du n; todu ma chʼokpo tabale.
E̩gba kʼi kwane̩ odudu odudu o̩jo̩ ejodudu ef o̩jo̩ mebie, i tejugede ñwu Me̩ri Magdalini ejodudu, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi fʼamebili mebie ne kwef uwñ dufu le̩.
I lenaka ñw abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ akwoubi, abu ku ma jʼadaido̩ ku ma la araku.
Tak e̩gba ku ma gbo̩ ka kʼi deju, kʼowñ ño̩ fʼu li, ma ko̩ edo̩ rʼochochi.
Tak anubi e-le̩, i kwotejugede o̩la ojoji ñw abo meji ef uma, abu ku ma alule̩ nyʼegbili.
Tak abo le̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ mʼu duka ñw abo ki bo̩; ma la ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-ma ni ge̩.

Ubi le̩ i tejugede ñw amame̩gwaka onugo, abu ku ma chekukane̩ ajʼuje̩wñ; oñ i du eke̩do̩no ku ma ko̩ eke̩do̩no kpai ugbiti e̩do̩-ma kicha ñwu ma, todabu ku ma ma ke̩do̩nʼo̩la abo ku ma fʼowñ li abu kʼi mudajikwane̩ n.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ lo tef ile̩ du, ku me̩ natakoya uche̩nyo̩ ñw e̩wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ nyi.
Ma ajadu e̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩nʼo, ku ma la chʼo baptism. Ma muda akpʼe̩ne̩ ki ako̩ eke̩do̩no abi.
Ujiwe ki alebʼabo ku ma ke̩do̩nʼo la jo̩-i: ma ane amebili dufu ef odu-mi; ma ako̩la alu ichi tito̩ ojoji ojoji;
ma amʼamejo̩ ko nʼo̩wo̩; i la che̩wñ ku ma ñmo̩ e̩wñ ki akpone̩, i nʼugbo du kʼi ache ma abu du n; ma akʼo̩wo̩ nʼoji ame̩no̩ga, taku ma anʼo̩lafia.
Abe̩le̩ e̩gba kʼOndu Jisus ko̩la ñwu ma kpa, ma mʼowñ gba tʼefojale, oñ i kwogugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ O̩jo̩.
Tak abo le̩ ledufu atakoya ugbo du, Ondu la bʼuma chuko̩lo̩, i je̩ ñw O̩la le̩ lonyane̩ lef ujiwe ki tʼo̩ ubi.]
Todabu kʼamone̩ wewe mʼo̩la e̩wñ ki chʼo̩gbali ef e̩do̩-wa le̩ ko nyʼo̩wo̩ acholi jo̩ okoke,
dabalu kʼabo ku ma li o̩la le̩ kpai eju-ma ku ma laño̩ chʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ kwʼabakwane̩ mʼu du ka ñw a;
abu kʼu fʼe̩re̩ e̩wñ le̩ du chi kwʼuchane̩-wñ o̩bio̩bie̩, omi ño̩ do̩ ki nyo̩ kʼu ko̩ o̩takada rʼuwe̩ alu ki de̩ aro̩ne aro̩ne, Teo̩filo̩s uwe̩ e̩ne̩gbani;
todu kʼuwe̩ ki ma o̩kpaka o̩la ku ma ko̩ we̩ le̩.
Ef o̩kpanachi He̩ro̩d, onu Judia, atamaʼka do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Zekaraya, abo uche̩ Abaija i che; o̩ya-wñ dʼef amo̩ma Aro̩n, odu-wñ la ko̩ E̩lizabe̩t.
Ama meji le̩ la chʼame̩no̩kpakpa eju O̩jo̩, ma nʼule̩-ma ale ef o̩la uko̩ Ondu kpʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa-wñ du, ma nʼuchalu n.
Ma muda nʼo̩ma n, todabu kʼE̩lizabe̩t chʼagaji; ama meji la lewa tʼo̩jo̩ ogijo-ma e̩gba kʼa ka-i.
Oñ i leatʼe̩gba kʼe̩ne̩-i nʼucholo agboji amatama ache o̩gba O̩jo̩ adiko kʼabo uche̩-wñ le̩ gbʼo̩jo̩ e-ma,
alu kʼucholo atama le̩ te̩te̩de̩, ukpe̩-wñ kʼi ache chʼegudu tef unyi Ondu ejefu kʼi gu e̩wñ ki akpo jo.
Oñ ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ du jʼo̩do̩da achadua ef auwa ki chʼadiko ku ma gu e̩wñ ki akpo jo le̩.
Tak onuche̩ Onduʼka kwotejugede ñw u, i dago o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ ubo̩ ku ma gu e̩wñ ki akpo le̩ jo oji-wñ.
Oñ abu ku Zekaraya li u, e̩do̩ ñwañwala la je̩ ñw u n, ailo la fʼu mu.
Ama onuche̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki railo n, Zekaraya; todabu ku ma fʼo̩ko̩ kʼe̩ gbabʼo̩ le̩ gbo̩ me̩, o̩ya-we̩ E̩lizabe̩t la abi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ñw e̩, tak uwe̩ adʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jo̩n.
Uyo̩ kpai egwoguyo̩ la achʼe-we̩,
Todu i anana eju Ondu,
I la aje̩ ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l wewe rida tʼOndu, O̩jo̩-ma.
E̩ne̩-i adʼo̩gba eju-wñ alo ef afu kpai ukpahiu E̩laija,
Taku Zekaraya ka ñw onuche̩ le̩ kakini, Lugbo e̩wñ oñ nama e-kide̩? todu omi chʼogijo, o̩ya-mi la lewa tʼo̩jo̩ ogijo-wñ me̩.
Tak onuche̩ O̩jo̩ dohi ñw u kakini, Omi che Gebrie̩l ki adago o̩gba O̩jo̩; oñ ma kpʼumi wa kʼu ko̩la ñw e̩, kʼu laño̩ jʼuche̩nyo̩ e̩wñ-i rʼuwe̩.
E̩ la go, uwe̩ ahialu de, e̩ la neke ko̩la n, gbogbo kad o̩jo̩ kʼe̩wñ kide̩ awache, todabu kʼe̩ ma ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-mi e-ki awache adiko-wñ n.
Oñ amone̩ jo̩ aneju Zekaraya, ma la yaye abu kʼi akpo̩kpe̩ ef unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu.
Abu kʼi la kwodufu, i neke ko̩la ñwu ma n; taku ma ma ka kʼi fʼane̩ʼka go ef unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu le̩; oñ i do̩mo̩ anʼo̩wo̩ ko̩la ñwu ma; alu-wñ la chʼe̩ji waa.
Oñ i leatʼe̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ kʼi achabune̩ e-wñ jo̩ kpa, tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyi-wñ.
Tak abu kʼadiko le̩ lerane̩ E̩lizabe̩t o̩ya-wñ fʼefu nyo̩; oñ i dʼo̩la-wñ maja ochu me̩lu, i kakini,
Abe̩le̩ Ondu che ñwu mi ef o̩jo̩ kʼi wa go mi, kʼi mʼicha ku ma ka ñwu mi ef amone̩ du kwobʼumi te̩.
Oñ ochu e̩ke̩fa-wñ ma fu Gebrie̩l onuche̩ le̩ kpe̩ kwugbo O̩jo̩ nyʼewo Galili kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Nazare̩t,
ugbo igbe̩le̩ʼka ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n ku ma dukpo̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jose̩f, o̩lo̩pu Defid i che. Odu igbe̩le̩ le̩ la ko̩ Me̩ri.
Oñ abu kʼi mugudu wʼugbo-wñ, i kakini, Agba-o, uwe̩ ku ma chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ñw u le̩, Ondu dʼubi-we̩.
Oñ i kwodejiji nana noj o̩la kʼi ka le̩; i chane̩ ekpibe alu kʼugwa le̩ de̩.
Tak onuche̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki railo n, Me̩ri; todu e̩ fʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ li ugbo O̩jo̩ me̩.
E̩ la go, uwe̩ anyefu, e̩ la abi o̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, uwe̩ ki la dʼodu-wñ ko̩ JISUS.
Owñ le̩ anana,
oñ i ajonu abo unyi Jeko̩b tʼogbegbele̩;
Oñ Me̩ri ka ñw onuche̩ le̩ kakini, Abu kʼu ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, abʼe̩wñ-i ale ki ache ta?
Tak onuche̩ le̩ dohi ñw u kakini,
E̩ la go, E̩lizabe̩t, efu-we̩ le̩, ño̩ fʼefu nyo̩ o̩jo̩ ogijo-wñ ge̩; ochu e̩ke̩fa kʼe̩ne̩ ku ma do̩ kʼagaji le̩ nyʼefu-i de̩.
Todu e̩wñ du kʼi ma neke che n dʼugbo O̩jo̩ n.
Oñ Me̩ri kakini, Go, adu Ondu u che; i ki wache ñwu mi alu kʼe̩ ka. Tak onuche̩ le̩ kwʼugbo-wñ le.
Oñ Me̩ri kwane̩ iko le, i la hiane̩ alo tʼane̩ uwo nyʼewo Judaʼka;
oñ i mugudu tʼef unyi Zekaraya, afʼE̩lizabe̩t gwa.
Oñ i leatu abu kʼE̩lizabe̩t gbo̩ ugwa Me̩ri, o̩ma muro̩ kpu ef uwñ; tak Afu Kiafo̩ che̩ko̩ E̩lizabe̩t efu,
oñ E̩lizabe̩t dʼomu nyʼojale kwa nana kakini, Uwe̩ ma de̩nyo̩ ñw u ef abobule̩, O̩jo̩ laño̩ de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ro abio̩ma-we̩ ge̩.
Ugbo oñ omi nʼe-i kwo ta? kʼiye Ondu-mi awʼugbo-mi?
Todu go, abu kʼomu ugwa-we̩ muta tʼumi eti, o̩ma muro̩ kpu ef efu-mi noj uyo̩,
E̩ne̩ ki ke̩do̩no le̩ gbede, todu e̩wñ du ku ma ka ñw u kwʼugbo Ondu ache kpoji.
Taku Me̩ri kakini,
afu-mi agwoguyo̩ ef O̩jo̩ E̩najadu-mi me̩
todu i wa go alu kʼaduwñ onobule̩-i chʼe̩niba; todu, go, akwe̩gba-i abo o̩gba o̩gba du ado̩ mi ko̩ e̩ne̩-ugbede.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki nʼukpahiu le̩ fʼe̩wñ ki nana che ñwu mi me̩;
Oñ ejumomi-wñ dʼugbo abo ku ma railo owñ
I fʼukpahiu-wñ che kpai o̩wo̩-wñ; i fʼabo ku ma chʼikatabani kpatuka ef ibe ku ma kpe̩.
I mʼabukpahiu yo̩ tane̩ bʼoj ede te̩;
I je̩ ñw efu abo kʼebi kpa ma ki ko̩ ñw e̩wñ e̩nyo̩;
I fʼabune̩ Israe̩l, imo̩to̩-wñ, che,
(alu kʼi ko̩la ñw amata-wa)
Oñ Me̩ri bʼo̩ gugu dab ochu me̩ta, tak i dabi tʼunyi-wñ.
O̩jo̩ o̩ma-ebi Elizabe̩t la jo̩, oñ i fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi.
Abadogbe-wñ kpai amefu-wñ la gbo̩ ka kʼOndu li u ejumomi nana tabale; oñ ma bʼo̩ yo̩.
Oñ i leatu o̩jo̩ eke̩jo̩-wñ, ma lewa ku ma de̩pi imo̩to̩ le̩; ma le ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Zekaraya alu kʼodu ata-wñ ko̩.
Iye-wñ muda dohi kakini, O̩da, ma adʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jo̩n;
oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼodu-wñ ko̩ abe̩le̩ ef amefu-we̩ n.
Oñ ma dʼo̩wo̩ ko̩la ñw ata-wñ ku ma li e̩wñ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩.
Tak i fʼalo bi, oñ ikʼolubutu kakini, Odu-wñ ko̩ Jo̩n. Tak o̩chaka-ma kwoyaye.
E̩re̩re̩ le̩ alu-wñ muchi, iku ukpalu-wñ mutu, tak i nako̩la akele O̩jo̩.
Oñ ailo kwoba abadogbe-ma du; o̩la-i du la mud oluka ane̩ uwo Judia chaka.
Abo du ku ma la gbʼo̩ mʼu du tef e̩do̩-ma, ma kakini, Abʼimo̩to̩ kide̩ ade̩ ta? Todu o̩wo̩ Ondu dʼubi owñ.
Tak ata-wñ Zekaraya che̩ko̩ ñw Afu Kiafo̩ oñ i chane̩ ekache̩ kakini,
Ondu, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l ki nele;
i laño̩ mʼigba ujadu du kwane̩ ñw a ef unyi Defid imo̩to̩-wñ,
(dabalu kʼi ko̩la lef amakache̩-wñ kiafo̩ kwo igbelegbele).
Ujadu ki ajadu wa bʼame̩nebi-wa te̩,
kʼi chejumomi amata-wa,
owñ chʼego̩ kʼi go̩ ñw Ebraham ata-wa,
ka kʼabu ku ma mʼuwa gba tane̩ kwef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-wa,
Ef efo̩ kʼe̩wñ afo̩ kpai o̩kpakpa o̩gba-wñ o̩jo̩ du
Oñ uwe̩ ge̩, o̩ma-i, ma adʼuwe̩ ko̩ akache̩ e-O̩jo̩ Chamachala,
kʼe̩ je̩ ñw amone̩-wñ ma ujadu ef eto̩no̩
lef ibefu e-ejumomi e-O̩jo̩-wa,
kʼi mane̩ ne̩ ñw abo ku ma gugu ef e̩chubi kpai ef ebo uku;
Oñ o̩ma le̩ nagba waa, i chane̩ enukpahiu ef afu-wñ; i la do̩mo̩ ef aje̩tachi le̩ gbogbowa adiko ku ma dʼu ña abo Israe̩l.
I lewa tʼiko le̩, oñ o̩da kwʼugbo Sisa O̩gosto̩s dufu ka ku ma ki kʼodu abile̩ du rʼef o̩takada.
E-le̩ chʼo̩takada ejodudu ku ma kʼodu amone̩ rʼef uwñ e̩gba ku Sairinius chʼigo̩bina Siria.
Tak amone̩ du le ku ma kʼodu-ma rʼef o̩takada, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼewo e-wñ.
Oñ Jose̩f mute̩gu kwʼojane̩ Galili kwʼewo Nazare̩t nyi ewo Defid ku ma do̩ ko̩ Be̩tle̩he̩m ane̩ Judia, todu kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼo̩lo̩pu abo akwo̩ra unyi Defid,
kʼi kʼodu-wñ nyʼef o̩takada manyu Me̩ri, ku ma dukpʼo̩ le̩; efu-wñ la nana me̩.
I leatu abu ku ma jʼo̩mo̩, o̩jo̩ o̩ma-ebi-wñ jo̩.
Oñ i fʼo̩mo̩gba-wñ bi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩; i la kʼukpo wenyʼu o̩la, oñ i mʼu du dachi ef akpati uje̩wñ ame̩wño̩re̩, todabu kʼuña ma de̩ ef unyi uru ñwu ma n.
Amadidala la jo̩ egbili o̩mo̩, ma ru jo̩ oko adide amala-ma odu.
Tak onuche̩ Ondu wa bano ma, ojima Ondu la mʼane̩ ne̩ lʼuma daka; oñ ailo lile fʼuma mu.
Tak onuche̩ le̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ki railo n; todu go, uche̩nyo̩ e-uyo̩ lile ki ado̩mo̩ ñw amone̩ du oñ naje̩rʼume̩-i;
todu ma fʼE̩najadu bi ñwu me̩ ewo Defid eñini-i, owñ che Kraist Ondu.
Oñ e̩wñ ki achʼujiwe-wñ ñwu me̩ de̩ kakini, Me̩ ali o̩me̩kpa ku ma kʼukpo wenyʼo̩la kʼi la dachi ef akpati uje̩wñ ame̩wño̩re̩.
Tak achigili ugwe̩ko̩ abo efojale wajo̩ manyʼonuche̩ le̩ añwulo̩ O̩jo̩, ma kakini,
O̩jo̩ ki nʼojima ef uña atate̩,
Oñ i leatʼe̩gba kʼamonuche̩ le̩ kwʼugbo ma nyʼefojale, amadidala ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, A ki legudu gbogbo nyi Be̩tle̩he̩m kʼa li e̩wñ ki wache e-kʼOndu je̩ ñw a ma-i.
Oñ ma hiane̩ alo, ma fu Me̩ri kpai Jose̩f li, kpʼo̩me̩kpa abu kʼi dachi ef akpati uje̩wñ ame̩wño̩re̩.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼu li, ma je̩ ñw amone̩ ma o̩la ku ma ka ñwu ma ugbo imo̩to̩-i.
Tak abo du ku ma gbʼo̩ kwoyaye o̩la kʼamadidala ka ñwu ma le̩.
Me̩ri la nʼo̩la e̩wñ le̩ du adejute̩, i nʼibe-wñ akpe̩ ef e̩do̩-wñ.
Tak amadidala le̩ mudabi kpai edojima ñw O̩jo̩ kpai eñwulo̩-wñ noj e̩wñ du ku ma gbo̩ ku ma li, alu ku ma ko̩la ñwu ma.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩-wñ jʼe̩jo̩ ku ma fʼe̩pi-wñ da, ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jisus, e-kʼOnuche̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ dʼu ko̩ o̩gba tak iye-wñ nyʼefu-wñ.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩-wñ jo̩ ku ma fʼo̩la-ma gwo̩rinyo̩ alu kʼo̩lo̩da Mose̩s ka, taku ma mʼowñ duwa Je̩rusale̩m ku ma dʼu te̩ ñw Ondu
(owñ chʼalu ki che̩ko̩ te̩ ef o̩lo̩da Ondu kakini, O̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ki kpʼo̩gba iye-wñ na ma aduko̩ E̩wñ kiafo̩ ñw Ondu),
ku ma laño̩ ko e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa alu ku ma ka ef o̩lo̩da Ondu kakini, Ikede meji, cho̩kpo̩ni i chʼo̩mo̩ke̩te̩be̩ meji.
Taku me̩ go, e̩ne̩ʼka de̩ Je̩rusale̩m kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Simeo̩n; e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa kpai e̩ne̩ ki ahimama O̩jo̩, i do̩mo̩ aneju e̩ne̩ ki adugbe̩do̩ ñw Israe̩l; Afu Kiafo̩ la dʼo̩la-wñ.
Afu Kiafo̩ la juka ñw u ka kʼi ali uku o̩gba tak i li Kraist e-Ondu n.
Oñ i le ef Afu le̩ wʼef unyi O̩jo̩; tak abu kʼabo ku ma bi Jisus imo̩to̩ le̩ la dʼu wa ku ma che e̩wñ italigba o̩lo̩da ñw u,
i mʼowñ gba nʼo̩wo̩-wñ, i chane̩ ekele O̩jo̩ i kakini,
Ondu Onu, fai tak uwe̩ ki tʼadu-we̩
todabu kʼeju-mi fʼujadu-we̩ li me̩,
owñ chʼe-kʼe̩ ñwo̩che te̩ eju amone̩ du;
owñ chʼugane̩ ki abi e̩wñ te̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi,
Oñ ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ jʼo̩mo̩ ayaye o̩la-wñ ku ma ka lugbo-wñ-i;
taku Simeo̩n kadua ñwu ma, oñ i ka ñwu Me̩ri iye-wñ kakini,
i la chʼuwe̩ onugo, o̩kwo̩chageliʼka agwunyu onugo-we̩ kpo̩fo̩;
Oñ Annaʼka kʼi chʼakache̩ onobule̩ do̩mo̩, i chʼo̩ma Fanue̩l, abo o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r; (i gbo nana, i bʼo̩ko̩-wñ gugu kwʼojʼigbe̩le̩-wñ gbogbo wʼo̩do̩ mebie,
tak i chʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ gbogbo tak o̩do̩-wñ chʼo̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ nyoke me̩le̩), i kwo bʼunyi O̩jo̩ te̩ n; alueji kpai o̩ko̩ e̩gbabʼo̩ oñ i nʼache O̩jo̩ tʼodu tʼo̩ro̩ka.
Oñ abu kʼi lewa bano ma iko auwa kʼa ka-i, i dago aje̩nyʼO̩jo̩, oñ i nʼo̩la-wñ aka ñw abo du ku ma jʼaneju adiko e̩gba ku ma agba Je̩rusale̩m tane̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma fʼe̩wñ du chekpa alu kʼo̩lo̩da Ondu ka, ma mojida wa Galili, tefu Nazare̩t ki chʼewo e-ma.
Oñ imo̩to̩ le̩ anana waa, i la nʼukpahiu nyo̩gba, ibe che̩ko̩ ñw u, ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ la gugu oji-wñ.
Abo ku ma bi Owñ la nyi Je̩rusale̩m o̩do̩ o̩do̩ du e̩gba uje̩wñ Elaloji.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩do̩-wñ jo̩ e̩gweji, ma ño̩ te̩gu le alu ku ma te̩tache ugbo uje̩wñ le̩;
oñ abu ku ma fo̩jo̩-wñ je̩ kpa ku ma doji awa, Jisus, imo̩to̩ le̩ fe̩do̩ lichii gugu ubi efu Je̩rusale̩m; abo ku ma bi u la ma n;
ama abu ku ma do̩ kʼi dʼef abo elo̩na le̩, ma fʼule̩ o̩jo̩ʼka le; taku ma tene owñ ugbo amefu-ma kpai abo ku ma ma ma;
oñ abu ku ma ma li u n, ma mudabi tu Je̩rusale̩m atene owñ.
Oñ i lea tu abu kʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta jo̩ taku ma fʼu li ef unyi O̩jo̩ abu kʼi gugu alumeji amakone̩wñ anetiru o̩la-ma kpai ene enʼuma ge̩.
Ibe abo du ku ma netirʼu mukpatuka tod eju-wñ ki chene̩ kpai ohi kʼi adu ñwu ma.
Tak abu ku ma li u, ibe takpa rʼuma efu; tak iye-wñ ka ñw u kakini, O̩ma-mi, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ che wa abe̩i? Go, i wo̩ omi kpai ata-we̩ tabale, oñ a jʼatene we̩-i.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ tene mi? Me̩ ma ka kʼu nadʼef e̩wñ Ata-mi tila n?
Ma la mʼofe o̩la kʼi ka ñwu ma-i n.
Tak i lebʼuma oñ i lewa Nazare̩t; i la fʼo̩la-wñ kamuhi te̩ ñwu ma; oñ iye-wñ dejutʼo̩la-i du ef e̩do̩-wñ.
Oñ ibe Jisus nanyo̩gba, i nagbʼo̩kone̩ alo waa, i laño̩ nʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ nyo̩gba, ugbo O̩jo̩ kpai ugbo amone̩ ge̩.

Ef o̩do̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩lu kʼonu Taibirio̩s Sisa jʼo̩fe̩, e̩gba ku Po̩ntius Pailat chʼigo̩bina Judia, ku He̩ro̩d je̩ Te̩trark e-Galili, kʼo̩maye-wñ Filip la je̩ Te̩trark ane̩ Ituria kpai Trako̩naitis, ku Lise̩nias la je̩ Te̩trark Abilini,
owñ chʼadiko ku Anas kpai Kayafas chʼagboji amatama le̩, O̩la O̩jo̩ lewa abi Jo̩n, o̩ma Zekaraya, ma ef aje̩tachi.
Tak i lewʼoj ane̩ du ki dabi Jo̩rdan jo̩ o̩wo̩ mejeji atakoya o̩la baptism e-uribeda ku ma tʼadure-ma no̩ ñwu ma;
alu ku ma ko̩ tef o̩takada o̩la Aizaya akache̩ kakini,
Ma afʼo̩go̩ du du kʼi ko̩;
tak o̩re̩la du ali ujadu O̩jo̩.
Todule̩ i ka ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma ledufu kʼi che ma baptism kakini, Ame̩ amato̩ olijo, e̩ne̩ juka ñwu me̩ ku me̩ ra bʼuwe̩do̩ ki ache ki wa te̩?

Todule̩ me̩ naro e̩ro e-ki nyo̩ bʼuribeda jo̩, me̩ ki la we echane̩ eka efu o̩la-me̩ kakini, Ata-wa kʼa ne̩ chʼEbraham; todu naka ñwu me̩ ka kʼO̩jo̩ neke du amo̩ma kwane̩ ñw Ebraham kwef okuta ki jo̩-i.
Ma la mʼo̩kanyi du tʼane̩ ugbo ili oli fa-i me̩; todule̩ oli du ki ma arʼe̩ro o̩me̩me̩le̩ n, ma jʼalo̩ wane̩ ku ma ko ro̩ rʼef una.
Tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ tʼowñ ene kakini, Mak e̩wñ a che ke?
Oñ i dohi ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ ki nʼafe̩ meji ki nadʼu ñw e̩ne̩ ki ma ne̩ n; e̩ne̩ ki nʼuje̩wñ ki ño̩ che abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Oñ amagbo̩kane̩ ño̩ lewa ku ma che ma baptism, taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Akone̩wñ, e̩wñ a ache ke?
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ki gba tʼe-ku ma ñwate̩ ñwu me̩ le n.
Amisoja ño̩ tʼowñ ene ge̩ kakini, Awa fa, e̩wñ awa ache? Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ki chʼe̩ne̩ du afuma n, me̩ ki dʼo̩la ji mʼone̩ du n; alibachi-me̩ ki bʼume̩ jo̩.
Oñ abu kʼamone̩ le̩ jʼaneju e̩wñʼka kʼo̩chaka amone̩ la jo̩ akpibe o̩la Jo̩n ef e̩do̩-ma, abe̩k owñ che Kraist abe̩k i chʼowñ n,
Jo̩n dohi ka ñwu ma chaka kakini, Omi nʼomiofo ache me̩ baptism mana; ama e̩ne̩ ki nʼiñmi tʼumi le awa, e-kʼomi ma nyo̩ bʼetu iku e̩da-wñ jo̩ n; owñ le̩ ache me̩ baptism ef Afu Kiafo̩ kpai una;
o̩fe̩fe̩ kʼi nʼakwu igbogbo-wñ kʼi aje̩ ñw ajita-wñ kwo hiolo dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ, kʼi ayʼo̩ka-wñ nyef aka-wñ; i muda agwʼigbogbo-wñ jo ef una ki ma jʼalu n.
Todule̩ i ño̩ nʼo̩la ugbe̩do̩ omune̩ wewe ajʼuche̩nyo̩ rʼamone̩ le̩;
ama abu kʼi dʼo̩la bi He̩ro̩d, todu He̩ro̩dias, o̩ya o̩maye-wñ, kpai e̩wñ bibi du ki He̩ro̩d ki jʼo̩fʼe̩ Te̩trark le̩ che,
He̩ro̩d ño̩ fʼe-kide̩ che nʼo̩gbo̩ e̩wñ ki jo̩-i du owñ chʼo̩na erenyu Jo̩n tef unyi-uga.
Oñ i leatu, e̩gba ku ma fʼamone̩ le̩ chaka che baptism, ku ma laño̩ fu Jisusi che baptism kʼi la achadua, efojale mubite̩,
tak Afu Kiafo̩ gwo̩ru wa tanʼo, año̩la-wñ dab ikede, tak omuko̩la ka kwʼefojale kakini, Uwe̩ chʼO̩ma ufe̩do̩-mi; u fʼuyo̩-mi li ef uwe̩.
Oñ o̩do̩ Jisus e̩gba kʼi chane̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼogue̩gwa; amone̩ do̩ kʼi chʼo̩ma Jose̩f e-Hifai,
e-Matat, e-Lifai, e-Me̩lkai, e-Jana, e-Jose̩f,
e-Matatayas, e-Emo̩s, e-Nehum, e-E̩slai, e-Nagi,
e-Me̩at, e-Matatayas, e-Se̩me̩ai, e-Jose̩k, e-Juda,
e-Joana, e-Risa, e-Ze̩rubabe̩l, e-Salatie̩l, e-Nirai,
e-Me̩lkai, e-Adai, e-Kosam, e-Elmedam, e-E̩r,
e-Josi, e-E̩liesa, e-Jorim, e-Matat, e-Lifai,
e-Simeo̩n, e-Juda, e-Jose̩f, e-Jonan, e-E̩layakim,
e-Me̩le̩a, e-Minan, e-Matata, e-Netan, e-Defid,
e-Je̩si, e-Obe̩d, e-Boas, e-Salmon, e-Neason,
e-Aminadab, e-Ami, e-He̩zro̩n, e-Pe̩re̩s, e-Juda,
e-Jeko̩b, e-Aise̩k, e-Ebraham, e-Te̩ra, e-Neho̩r,
e-Sirug, e-Riyu, e-Pile̩g, e-Ibe̩r, e-Shila,
e-Kenan, e-Arpaksad, e-She̩m, e-Noa, e-Leme̩k,
e-Matuse̩la, e-Ino̩k, e-Jare̩d, e-Mahale̩lil, e-Kenan,
e-Ino̩s, e-Se̩t, e-Ade̩m, e-O̩jo̩.
Oñ Jisus, kʼi che̩ko̩ ñw Afu Kiafo̩, mudabi kwo Jordan wa, oñ Afu le̩ nʼowñ ale ef aje̩tachi
o̩jo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji Abulumone̩ le̩ najʼowñ ma. I la je̩ e̩wñ du iko le̩ n, oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji le̩ jo̩ kpa ebi akpʼo̩.
Tak Abulumone̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩ e̩ ka ñw okuta-i kʼi mud uje̩wñ.
Taku Jisus dohi ñw u kakini, I che̩ko̩ tane̩ kakini, I chʼugbo uje̩wñ kate oñ one̩ adeju n.
Tak i nʼo̩ te̩gu oñ i mʼojane̩ ojane̩ du ugbo kʼabile̩ te̩ kade du ñʼo̩ rarara.
Tak Abulumone̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ nadu o̩da kide̩ du kpai ojima-wñ ñw u; todu ma mʼu ko ñwu mi me̩, oñ e̩ne̩ du ki la dʼumi e̩do̩ nadu ñw u.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ jʼadojikane̩ o̩gba-mi, o̩chaka-wñ achʼe-we̩.
Taku Jisus dohi ka ñw u kakini, I che̩ko̩ tane̩ kakini,
Tak i nʼo̩ lo tu Je̩rusale̩m, oñ i mʼu du gugu o̩chigene unyi O̩jo̩, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩, dʼo̩la-we̩ ro̩ kwʼemi wʼane̩;
todu i che̩ko̩ tane̩ kakini,
i laño̩ che̩ko̩ kakini,
Oñ Jisus dohi ka ñw u kakini, Ma kakini, E̩ ki jʼOndu O̩jo̩-we̩ ma n.
Tak abu kʼAbulumone̩ le̩ fʼajama-wñ du chekpa, i kwo bʼo̩ te̩ gbogbo tʼadiko omune̩.
Taku Jisus mojida wa Galili ef ukpahiu Afu; oñ uwohi o̩la-wñ kwodufu tʼoj o̩gbo̩ ane̩ du ki lʼo̩mo̩ daka.
I la tʼunyi unyi ujeju-ma ako̩ ma e̩wñ, oñ amone̩ du nadojima ñw u.
Tak i lewa Nazare̩t, ugbo ku ma nʼowñ gba; oñ i mugudu tef unyi ujeju o̩jo̩ uñmi alu kʼi te̩tache, tak i kwodago kʼi cho̩kalatu,
oñ ma mʼo̩takada Aizaya akache̩ du ñw u. Tak i mʼo̩takada le̩ chi, oñ i li ugbo ku ma kʼolubutu kakini,
Afu Ondu dʼo̩la-mi,
kʼu ño̩ fʼakoya o̩do̩ e̩nyo̩ kʼOndu agba ta.
Tak i fʼo̩takada le̩ che̩, i mʼu du ñw e̩ne̩ ki adejutʼo̩ oñ i kwoguane̩; abo du ku ma jʼef unyi ujeju le̩ la mʼeju korʼu.
Oñ i chane̩ eka ñwu ma kakini, Eñini o̩la o̩takada-i che̩ ef eti-me̩.
Oñ o̩chaka amone̩ nagbʼo̩ ibenu, ma laño̩ yaye o̩la ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki kwʼef alu-wñ dufu; taku ma kakini, Owñ-i chʼo̩ma Jo̩se̩f de̩ n?
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ akpʼita kide̩ ñwu mi chuu kakini, Obochi, fʼo̩ga o̩la-we̩ che̩; e̩wñ du kʼa gbo̩ ki wache ewo Kapanahum le̩ mak e̩ ki ño̩ che ane̩ ata-we̩ emi ke.
Tak i kakini, Ami naka ñwu me̩ ka kʼi nʼakache̩ du ki nyo̩ abo ane̩ ata-wñ eju ku ma agba n.
U muda aka ochochi ñwu me̩ kakini, Amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ wewe jo̩ oj ane̩ Israe̩l o̩kpanachi E̩laija, e̩gba kʼefojale che̩re o̩do̩ me̩ta nyʼochu me̩fa kʼukpo̩ta nakpa nana oj ane̩ le̩ du;
ma la kpe̩ E̩laija nyʼugbo e̩ne̩ du ef uma n, chai nyʼugbo o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ Sare̩fat ki dʼoj ane̩ Saido̩n oka.
Ame̩no̩ga ikpemute wewe laño̩ jʼoj ane̩ Israe̩l adiko E̩laisha akache̩ le̩; ma la je̩ ñw o̩la e̩ne̩ kate ef uma ki fe̩ n, chai Neaman abo Siria le̩ kate.
Tak e̩do̩fuulu kʼo̩chaka amone̩ ku ma gbʼo̩la e̩wñ le̩ ku ma jʼef unyi ujeju le̩ efu;
oñ ma kwane̩, ma fʼu ne kwef ewo le̩, ma mʼu du le gbogbo nyʼalu o̩gba kʼabewo le̩ dodo oji-wñ, todu ku ma dʼu li o̩gba tane̩.
I muda lalegu alumeji-ma du oñ i le owñ.
Tak i gwo̩ru wa Kapanahum ewo Galiliʼka, oñ i do̩mo̩ ako̩ ma e̩wñ o̩jo̩ uñmi;
ibe la takpa rʼuma efu noj o̩la kʼi ako̩ ma, todabu kʼo̩la-wñ chenʼo̩da.
E̩ne̩ʼka la dʼef unyi ujeju le̩ kʼi nʼafu ebili ki ma de̩hiolo n; oñ i dʼomu dago akwa kakini,
Ehe! e̩wñ chʼe-wa kpai uwe̩, Jisus, uwe̩ e̩ne̩ Nazare̩t? E̩ wa kʼe̩ kpa wa rinyo̩? U chemʼe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ che, E̩ne̩ Kiafo̩ e-O̩jo̩ e̩ che.
Taku Jisus dejurʼu kakini, Fʼo̩wo̩ bʼalu-we̩ ma, kʼe̩ kwʼef uwñ dufu! Oñ abu kʼebili le̩ mʼu dufiane̩ alumeji ma i kwʼef uwñ dufu, i la chʼo abu du n.
Tak e̩gahi fʼuma mu chaka, oñ ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, O̩la e̩wñ de̩-i ta? Todu i nʼo̩da kpʼukpahiu añwañw amafu ku ma ma de̩hiolo n oñ ma kwʼef one̩ dufu?
Tak iche̩ o̩la-wñ kwodufu ugbo du ane̩ o̩mo̩.
Abu kʼi kwane̩ bʼunyi ujeju le̩ te̩ i la mugudu tef unyi Saimo̩n. Iye o̩ya Saimo̩n do̩mo̩, o̩la-e̩kpuna la mʼu ne̩ gaga; oñ ma chologubʼo̩ tod uwñ.
Tak i lewa banʼo, i dejuru o̩la-e̩kpuna le̩ oñ i tʼo̩ no̩; oñ e̩re̩re̩le̩ i kwane̩ i chane̩ eche̩wñ ñwu ma.
Oñ abu kʼolu ache ki tunyane̩, abo du ku ma nʼame̩ne̩gbo kʼo̩ga-ma chʼojoji ojoji ko ma wʼugbo-wñ; i la ko o̩wo̩ nʼuma oji okoke du lale, oñ i chʼo̩ga ma kpa.
Amebili ño̩ kwo bʼefu amone̩ wewe te̩, ma nakwa kakini, Uwe̩ chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩! Oñ i dejuru ma, i la je̩ ñwu ma ko̩la n, todabu ku ma ma ka kʼowñ che Kraist.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ muñwa, i ledufu, oñ i nyʼugbo ki chʼaje̩tachi; tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ kwotejane̩ owñ, ma le wʼugbo owñ, oñ ma che ku ma gwo̩nyʼu kʼi we ekwobʼuma te̩.
Ama i ka ñwu ma kakini, I chʼe̩wñ otila ñwu mi kʼu najʼuche̩nyo̩ ojane̩ e-O̩jo̩ rʼabewo omune̩ kibo̩ ge̩; todu uche̩ ku ma kpe̩ mi wa-i de̩.
Tak i do̩mo̩ atakoya ef unyi ujeju e-Galili.
Oñ i leatu adiko kʼowñ la dago o̩lʼoduda Ge̩ne̩sare̩t kʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ nake̩che̩ bʼo ma ku ma gbo̩ O̩la O̩jo̩;
i fʼo̩ko̩ meji ki dago o̩lʼoduda le̩ li, amekwuji la kwʼef uwñ tane̩, oñ ma jʼagwe̩ iga-ma.
Oñ i kwo tef o̩ko̩ le̩ʼka, e-kʼi chʼe-Saimo̩n, i la bi u kʼi ke̩che̩ ubi bʼane̩ te̩ pe̩e̩. Tak i kwoguane̩ ef o̩ko̩ le̩ ako̩ o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ e̩wñ.
Oñ abu kʼi we o̩la le̩ eka i ka ñwu Saimo̩n kakini, Ke̩che̩ tugbo ki nefu ku me̩ mʼiga-me̩ konyʼomi ku me̩ fa.
Taku Saimo̩n dohi kakini, O̩dafe̩, a chʼakanya gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩, a la mu e̩wñ du n! ama tod o̩la kʼe̩ ka nakʼiga nyʼomi.
Tak abu ku ma fʼe-le̩ che, ma fʼe̩ja bunyi e̩ko̩; oñ iga-ma ako̩da;
taku ma nʼoji do̩ abo umana-ma ku ma jʼef o̩ko̩ omune̩ le̩, ku ma wa bʼuma che. Taku ma lewa, oñ ma konyʼo̩ko̩ meji e̩ko̩, todabe̩le̩ ma chane̩ ewomi.
Abu ku Saimo̩n Pita fʼu li, i kwofiane̩ okuku e̩re̩ Jisus, i kakini, Ondu, kwo bʼumi te̩, todabu kʼu chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ adure.
Todu e̩gahi fʼu mu kpai abo du ku ma manyʼuwñ noj e̩ja ku ma mu le̩;
Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n, amo̩ma Ze̩be̩di kʼama kpai Saimo̩n atuta, ño̩ dʼabe̩le̩ ge̩. Taku Jisus ka ñwu Saimo̩n kakini, E̩ ki railo n; akwifai, amone̩ oñ uwe̩ amu;
tak abu ku ma mʼo̩ko̩-ma komʼane̩, ma tʼe̩wñ du no̩, oñ ma tʼo̩ ubi.

Tak i leatu abu kʼi dʼef ewoʼka, me̩ go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka kʼo̩ga-ikpemute che̩ko̩ o̩la-wñ lewa; oñ abu kʼi li Jisus, i lewane̩ afejubane̩ma, i gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kakini, Ondu, iche̩wñ kʼi dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩, e̩ neke je̩ ñwu mi de̩hiolo.
Tak i fʼo̩wo̩-wñ nadala kadʼo, i kakini, I dʼumi e̩do̩; e̩ ki de̩hiolo. Ababale̩ o̩ga-ikpemute le̩ kwobʼo̩ te̩.
Tak i hiu owu kʼi we eka ñw e̩ne̩ du; ama e̩ nalo we̩, kʼe̩ du o̩la-we̩ ña atama O̩jo̩, e̩ ki la ne̩ e̩wñ wa kʼe̩ du fʼo̩la-we̩ gworinyo̩ alu ku Mose̩s ñwate̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ ibenu ñwu ma.
Ama o̩la o̩la-wñ le̩ ño̩ mukpatuka tule; tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ wewe wajo̩ ku ma gbo̩, kʼi laño̩ fʼe̩gbo-ma chekpa.
Owñ muda hinyubi tef aje̩tachi achadua.

Tak i leatu o̩jo̩ʼka kʼi do̩mo̩ akʼone̩ e̩wñ, kʼabo Farisi kpai abo ku ma kʼone̩ o̩lo̩da ku ma kwo ewo ewo Galili kpai e-Judia kpai e-Je̩rusale̩m du wa ño̩ gugu jʼo̩mo̩; ukpahiu Ondu laño̩ dʼane̩ kʼi fʼo̩ga o̩la-ma chekpa.
Me̩ la go, aboke̩le̩ ne̩ e̩ne̩ o̩ga e̩ku-to̩laʼka oj akpata awa; ma feju ku ma nʼe̩ wʼejefu ku ma dʼu tane̩ o̩gba owñ.

Tak abu ku ma ma li alu ku ma ale ku ma ne̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ gudu wa tod o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ n, ma mute̩gu tʼojokunyi, oñ ma tʼo̩ no̩ wane̩ kpai akpata-wñ lef ojokunyi ku ma du ama che tʼalumeji-ma o̩gba Jisus.
Tak abu kʼi li e̩do̩-ekono-ma i kakini, One̩, ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ ñw e̩ me̩.
Tak amako̩takada kpai amaFarisi chane̩ eji-ñwa kakini, E̩ne̩ ako̩la achakpabie̩ O̩jo̩-i? E̩ne̩ neke tʼadure no̩ chai O̩jo̩ kate?
Ama abu ku Jisus li iñwa ku ma je̩ le̩, i dohi ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ jiñwa ef e̩do̩-me̩?
Kali e-ki tukpo̩ eka tule kakini, Ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ ñw e̩ me̩, abe̩ku ma aka kakini, Kwane̩ kʼe̩ lule̩?
Ama todu ku me̩ ki ma ka kʼO̩ma One̩ chenʼo̩da ane̩-ile̩ kʼi tʼadure one̩ no̩ ñw u (i ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki chʼo̩ga-ekuto̩la le̩) kakini, Naka ñw e̩, Kwane̩, mʼakpata-we̩ du kʼe̩ lo tʼunyi-we̩.
Tak e̩re̩re̩le̩ i kwane̩ eju-ma, oñ i mʼe̩wñ kʼi dachi oji-wñ le̩ du, i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyi-wñ kpai ojima edu ñw O̩jo̩.
Ibe o̩gbo̩-ma chaka du la mukpatuka, oñ ma dojima ñw O̩jo̩; efu-ma la che̩ko̩ ñw ailo, ma kakini, E̩wñ-aduña oñ a li eñini.
Tak ubi e̩wñ kide̩-i i kwodufu oñ i li agbo̩kane̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Lifai, i gugu ugbo ku ma gba o̩kane̩, tak i ka ñw u kakini, Tʼumi ubi.
Tak i tʼe̩wñ du no̩, oñ i kwane̩ atʼo̩ ubi.
Taku Lifai fʼo̩jojo lile hi ñw u ef unyi-wñ; oñ o̩wo̩ amagbo̩kane̩ lile kpai abo ki bo̩ chekukane̩ jʼo̩mo̩ aje̩wñ kpai ama.
Tak amaFarisi kpai amako̩takada-ma keñmini nyʼamako̩che̩-wñ o̩la kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼame̩ aje̩wñ, kʼame̩ la añmo̩ kpʼamagbo̩kane̩ kpʼame̩nadure-i?
Oñ Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Eku obochi aku abo ku ma nʼo̩lafia n, chai abo kʼo̩la-ma ma nyo̩ n.
U wa kʼu do̩ abo̩kpakpa n chai ame̩nadure ku ma lef uribeda.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini Amako̩che̩ Jo̩n ajialu o̩gbe̩nugbe̩, ma la nʼo̩ko̩ agba bʼO̩jo̩: abe̩le̩ abo e-amaFarisi jʼache ge̩; abo e-we̩ muda aje̩ ma la añmo̩.
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ neke che kʼabokolobia o̩ko̩ya-etito̩ ajialu e̩gba kʼo̩ko̩ya tito̩ dugbo ma?
Iko-wñ muda awa; owñ chʼe̩gba du ku ma mʼo̩ko̩ya tito̩ du kwobʼuma te̩, e̩gbale̩ chʼiko ku ma ajialu.
I laño̩ kpita ñwu ma kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki afa otogbo tito̩ na kʼi abʼu ga mʼotogbo igbele n; i dabe̩le̩ i afʼetito̩ na, oñ e-kʼi bu kwef e-tito̩ la acheju e-igbele n.
I la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼomi-achiwebe̩te̩ma tito̩ danyʼaiko igbele n; i fʼabe̩le̩ che mak omi achiwebe̩te̩ma tito̩ le̩ akpʼaiko na adafo, aiko-wñ ñʼakpabie̩ ge̩.
Ma muda adʼomi-achiwebe̩te̩ma tito̩ danyʼaiko tito̩ tila.
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki ñmo̩ e-igbele kʼe-tito̩ adʼowñ e̩do̩ n; todu i kakini, E-igbele rinyo̩ alu.
Tak i leatu o̩jo̩ uñmi ekeji kʼowñ alalegu ef uche̩ o̩ka du; oñ amako̩che̩-wñ jʼoji-o̩ka da, ma muko li o̩wo̩-ma, oñ ma kwolo̩.
Ama amaFarisi iche̩kibo̩ kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ che e̩wñ kʼo̩da ma je̩ ku ma che o̩jo̩ uñmi n?
Taku Jisua dohi ñwu ma kakini, I chaka chʼe̩wñ ku Defid che e̩gba kʼebi kpʼo̩, owñ chʼowñ kpai abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ, me̩ cho̩kalatu e-le̩ ta n?
alu kʼi gudu tef unyi O̩jo̩ kʼi la mʼakala ku ma ko te̩ jʼo̩mo̩ gba je̩, kʼi laño̩ ko ñw abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ ge̩; owñ chʼe-kʼo̩da ma je̩ ñw one̩ je̩ n, chai amatama O̩jo̩ kate?
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩ma One̩ chʼOndu o̩jo̩ uñmi.
Oñ i leatu o̩jo̩ uñmi omune̩ i mugudu tef unyi ujeju oñ i ko̩ amone̩ e̩wñ; e̩ne̩ʼka la dʼane̩ o̩me̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ che̩gbe̩.
Tak amako̩takada kpʼabo Farisi fʼeju mʼu ne̩ tode̩gba kʼi ache o̩ga one̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi; todu ku ma ki li e̩wñ ku ma du gwajo̩nʼo.
Owñ muda ma ibe ki dʼef uma, oñ i ka ñw e̩ne̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ gbe̩ le̩ kakini, Kwane̩ wa kʼe̩ dago alumeji-i. Tak i kwane̩ wa adago.
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Ene natu-i kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñw one̩ che e̩nyo̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi abe̩ku ma chʼe̩bie̩ne̩? Ejadu oji one̩ abe̩k edutinyo̩?
Tak i rejuda go ma chaka lale, oñ i ka ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ kakini, Fʼo̩wo̩-we̩ nadala. Tak i fʼabe̩le̩ che, oñ o̩wo̩-wñ mudabi tiko.
Tak ibe takpa rʼuma efu nʼoji uwe̩do̩ ki kʼuma efu; ma la kwolo kpʼomune̩ e̩wñ ku ma ache Jisus.
Oñ ileatu iko le̩ i kwodufu nyʼibe̩uwo kʼi chadua; i la do̩mo̩ achadua ñw O̩jo̩ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ muñwa, i fʼamako̩che̩-wñ do̩ wa; oñ i fʼone̩ me̩gweji chi efu ma; i ño̩ dʼodu abo le̩ ko ame̩nukpuche̩.
Ama che Saimo̩n e-ki ño̩ dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Pita, kpai Anduru o̩maye-wñ, kpai Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n, kpai Filip kpai Barto̩lomiu,
kpai Matiu kpai To̩mas, kpai Jeme̩s e-Alfio̩s, kpai Saimo̩n ku ma ño̩ du ko̩ Ago̩laru e̩wñ,
kpai Judas e-Jeme̩s, kpai Judas Iskario̩t e-ki mʼowñ du ñw amone̩ mu.

Tak owñ kpʼama mugwo̩ru wa, oñ i kwodago ugbo ki de̩ te̩e̩le̩, tak o̩wo̩ amako̩che̩-wñ lile kpai ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ wewe ki kwo Judia du kpai Je̩rusale̩m kpʼo̩lʼomi ane̩ Taya kpai Saido̩n ku ma wa ku ma gbʼo̩la-wñ, todu kʼi ño̩ fʼuma o̩ga chekpa.
Tak o̩la abo kʼamafu ki ma de̩hiolo n fu ma chawuya takpa.
O̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ chaka la tene ku ma dʼo̩wo̩ kadʼo; todabu kʼukpahiu kwʼo̩la-wñ dufu achʼo̩ga-o̩la-ma kpa chaka.
Tak i chi eju-wñ go amako̩che̩-wñ, oñ i kakini:
Ame̩ kʼebi akpa me̩ fai gbede, todabu kʼefu-me̩ ako̩. Ame̩ ku me̩ raku fai gbede, todabu ku me̩ anya-nyi.
Me̩ gbede, e̩gba kʼamone̩ achulaka me̩, kpai e̩gba ku ma fʼume̩ date̩ bʼo̩la-ma te̩ ku ma la kicha ñwu me̩, ku ma la dʼodu-me̩ tinyo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ bibi tod O̩ma One̩.
Me̩ nayo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, me̩ ki kpakolo nyʼojale noj uyo̩; todu go, e̩wñ uro̩me̩-me̩ chenana efojale; todu abe̩le̩ gbage̩de̩ oñ amata-ma che amakache̩.
Ama atogwo ñwu me̩ ku me̩ chʼanana! todabu ku me̩ jʼagba e̩wñ ugbe̩do̩ e-me̩.
Atogwo ñwu me̩, kʼefu-me̩ ko̩ abajo̩-i! todabu kʼebi akpa me̩. Atogwo ñwu me̩, ku me̩ nyanyi abajo̩-i! todabu ku me̩ adaido̩, me̩ la araku.
Atogwo ñwu me̩ e̩gba kʼamone̩ jʼakele me̩! todu abe̩le̩ gbage̩de̩ oñ amata-ma che amakache̩ olemi.
U muda aka ñw ame̩ ku me̩ jʼagbʼo̩la-i kakini, Me̩ nafe̩do̩ ame̩nebi-me̩; me̩ ki che e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw abo ku ma chulaka me̩;
me̩ je̩nyu ñw abo ku ma nama ñwu me̩, me̩ chadua tod abo ku ma jʼabʼume̩ ina akpʼume̩ bie̩.
E̩ne̩ ki kʼuwe̩ awo itiʼka, e̩ ño̩ mʼe-ekeji du te̩ ñw u ge̩; e̩ne̩ ki bʼe̩ gbʼotogbo-we̩, e̩ ki ko̩ edʼafe̩-we̩ manyu ñw u n kpo̩fo̩.
E̩ne̩ du ki bi we̩ e̩wñ e̩ nadu ñw u; e̩ne̩ ki mʼane̩-we̩ gba, e̩ ki bi ugbo-wñ ge̩ n.
Oñ alu ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ kʼamone̩ ki che ñwu me̩, ame̩ ki nache ñwu ma abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ fe̩do̩ abo ku ma fe̩do̩ me̩, ugbo ugwa-me̩ de̩? todu i chaka chʼame̩nadure, ma fe̩do̩ abo ku ma fe̩do̩ ma.
I la che̩wñ ku me̩ chʼe̩nyo̩ ñw abo ku ma chʼe̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩, ugwa e̩wñ ma agwa me̩? todu i chaka chʼame̩nadure, ma che e-le̩.
I laño̩ che̩wñ ku me̩ me̩ e̩wñ ñw abo ku me̩ kibeno ka ku me̩ adabi gba kwʼo̩wo̩-ma, ugwa e̩wñ me̩ ane̩ ef uwñ? I chaka chʼame̩nadure, ma me̩ e̩wñ ñw ame̩nadure ku ma dabi gba e̩go̩-wñ ge̩.

Me̩ ki la fe̩do̩ ame̩nebi-me̩, me̩ nachʼe̩nyo̩ ñwu ma, me̩ me̩ e̩wñ ñw one̩, me̩ we ekibeno akoji-wñ; tak e̩wñ uro̩me̩-me̩ anana, me̩ la amud amo̩ma O̩jo̩ Chamachala; todabu kʼowñ le̩ chemo̩la ñw abo ku ma ko̩ egwugwa e̩wñ kpʼame̩ne̩bibi.
Me̩ ki lejumomi one̩ alu kʼAta-me̩ chʼe̩nejumomi.
Me̩ ki la kajo̩ n taku ma akajo̩ e-me̩ n; me̩ ki la kpʼone̩ abi n, taku ma ñʼakpʼame̩ abi n; me̩ ki tʼo̩ no̩ ñw one̩, taku ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñwu me̩;

me̩ kʼe̩wñ chʼele, taku ma akʼe̩wñ chʼume̩ ele; ma añwa e̩ñwa o̩me̩me̩le̩ ñwu me̩, ma ake̩che̩mane̩, ma amiejo ki hime̩rʼo̩la-wñ, i ako̩ adaho, oñ ma adʼu mʼume̩ e̩do̩. Todu uñwa e̩wñ ku me̩ du ñwa ñw one̩, e-le̩ ma adu ñwa ñw ame̩ koji.
I ño̩ kpita ñwu ma kakini, Afeju neke ne̩ afeju le̩ o̩na? Ama meji añwa tef ura n?
Ako̩che̩ tʼe̩ne̩ ki ako̩ owñ e̩wñ le n; ama e̩ne̩ du ku ma fʼu ñwo̩che kpa adab e̩ne̩ ki ko̩ owñ e̩wñ.
Oñ e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ ago e̩wñ ke̩ke̩ ki dʼef eju o̩maye-we̩, kʼe̩ ma la nibe igbo oli ki dʼef eju e-we̩ n?

Abe̩k abile kʼe̩ neke ka ñw o̩maye-we̩ kakini, O̩maye, to̩no̩ kʼu mʼe̩wñ ke̩ke̩ ki dʼef eju-we̩ le̩ dutinyo̩, abu kʼuwe̩ onugo ma li igbo oli ki dʼef eju-we̩ n? Uwe̩ e̩nayechi, mʼigbo oli le̩ du kwef eju-we̩ ejodudu, e̩gba le̩ tak e̩ gane̩ nyo̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ ke̩ke̩ ki dʼef eju o̩maye-we̩ dutinyo̩.
Todu oli o̩me̩me̩le̩ ki arʼe̩ro e̩che̩ de̩ n; omune̩ ge̩, oli e̩che̩ la arʼe̩ro o̩me̩me̩le̩ n.
Todu ef e̩ro e-wñ onugo oñ ma amʼoli okoke du kwo. Todu ma ako e̩ro ugbaikolo̩ kwʼo̩la oli abikeke n, i la chʼo̩la olige̩e̩le̩ oñ ma aka e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma n.
E̩ne̩nyo̩ akʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ kwef e̩wñ akoko e̩nyo̩ e-e̩do̩-wñ dufu; e̩ne̩bibi la akʼe̩wñ bibi kwef e̩wñ bibi-wñ dufu; todu kwef e̩wñ ololo ki dʼef e̩do̩ oñ alu ako̩la.
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ do̩ mi ko̩ Ondu, Ondu, ku me̩ ma la che e̩wñ kʼu ka n?
E̩ne̩ du ki awʼugbo mi, kʼi la agbʼo̩la-mi, kʼi ache tʼeju-wñ, najiwe ñwu me̩ e̩wñ kʼi biu.

I che̩bi e̩ne̩ ki akʼunyi, e-kʼi fʼura e̩re̩ unyi-wñ gwa jiji, tak i mʼe̩re̩ unyi-wñ du nyʼane̩ oj apata; oñ e̩gba kʼomi wobi, i mucha lewa bʼunyi le̩ ma, i la bo̩jo̩ kʼi achʼunyi le̩ iche̩ n, todu ma fʼu ko̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩.
Ama e̩ne̩ ki agbo̩, kʼi ma la che n che̩bi e̩ne̩ ki fʼunyi ko̩ ane̩pe̩te̩, kʼi ma nʼe̩re̩ ane̩ n; tak omi mucha lewa bʼo ma, oñ i lewane̩ ababa, i la fʼunyi le̩ gwʼalache̩ tabale.
Abu kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ du ka rʼamone̩ le̩ eju kpa i gudu nyi Kapanahum.
Oñ agboji amisoja ogume̩luʼka nʼadu kʼi che̩nʼojima ugbo-wñ kʼi acho̩ga, i ache ki ku.
Oñ abu kʼi gbʼinabali Jisus, i fʼabogijo amaJu kpuche̩ nyʼugbo owñ, arodubʼo̩ kʼi wa jadu adu-wñ.
E̩gba ku ma lewʼugbo Jisus, ma gboko̩bʼo̩ kpakaa, ma kakini, E̩ne̩-i nyo̩ bʼe̩wñ-i jo̩ kʼe̩ che ñw u,
todu i afe̩do̩ abo-ichi-wa, owñ la fʼunyi ujeju-wa le̩ ko̩ ñw a.

Oñ Jisus lebʼuma. Tak e̩gba kʼi ma jiji rʼunyi le̩ ge̩ n, agboji amisoja le̩ fʼamonuku-wñ kpe̩ nyʼugbo-wñ, i ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, e̩ ki chʼo̩la-we̩ akanya n; todu u nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ kʼe̩ gudu tʼofe ojokunyi-mi n;
todabe̩le̩, oñ u ma fʼibe-mi lo ka kʼomi onugo nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ kʼu nawʼugbo we̩ n; e̩ ki muda kʼo̩laʼka, tak o̩ga imo̩to̩-mi le̩ atakpa.
Todu omi onugo dʼef o̩da, amisoja la jʼef o̩wo̩-mi; u naka ñw e̩ne̩-i ka ki Lo ke, i la alo; naka ñw e̩ne̩ omune̩ ka ki Lewa, i la awa; naño̩ ka ñw adu-mi kakini, Che e-kide̩, i la ache.
Oñ abu ku Jisus gbʼo̩la e̩wñ kide̩ i yaye-wñ, tak i murida ka ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma tʼo̩ ubi kakini, Naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I chaka chʼoj ane̩ Israe̩l u li e̩do̩-ekono nana e̩ge-i n.
Tak e̩gba kʼabo ku ma kpe̩ ma wa le̩ mudakubi wʼunyi, ma fʼadu le̩ li abu kʼi nʼo̩lafia.
Tak ileatu ubi e-le̩, i nyʼewoʼka ku ma do̩ ko̩ Nen; amako̩che̩-wñ kpʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ nana ño̩ lebʼo̩.
Oñ abu kʼi me̩ru alaku ewo le̩ awa, me̩ go, ma nʼoku one̩ dufu, o̩mokpono iye-wñ i che, iye-wñ le̩ la chʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩; o̩wo̩ abewo le̩ otemeje manyʼu.
Tak abu kʼOndu li u, ejumomi-wñ je̩ ñw u n, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩ raku n.
Tak i mute̩wa ado̩wo̩kadʼakpata-wñ, oñ abo ku ma nʼe̩ kwodago. Tak i kakini, Okolobia, uwe̩ naka ñw u, kwane̩!
Tak e̩ne̩ ki ku le̩ kwane̩ gugu, oñ i chane̩ eko̩la. Tak i mʼu du ñw iye-wñ.
Oñ ailo fʼabo du mu; ma la kwodojima ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, Akache̩ lile kwane̩ ef uwa-i, O̩jo̩ lewa fejudo abo-wñ me̩.
Oñ inabali o̩la-wñ le̩ kwodufu tef o̩gbo̩ ane̩ Judia du kpai ane̩ du ki lʼo daka.
Amako̩che̩ Jo̩n la mʼe̩wñ-i du duka ñw u.
Taku Jo̩n fʼamako̩che̩-wñ meji do̩ wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i kpe̩ ma nyʼugbo Ondu kakini, Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki awa le̩, abe̩k a aneju e̩ne̩ omune̩?
Oñ abu kʼaboke̩le̩ le̩ lewʼugbo-wñ ma kakini, Jo̩n kʼi ache baptism le̩ fʼuwu kpe̩ wʼugbo we̩ kakini, Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki awa le̩, abe̩k a aneju e̩ne̩ omune̩?
Ef adiko auwa le̩, i je̩ ñw o̩ga kpai o̩pe̩cha kpai afu ibi kwo bʼamone̩ wewe te̩; i ño̩ mʼugane̩ du chʼamafeju wewe ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ge̩.

Tak i dohi ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nyʼadʼinabali e̩wñ ku me̩ li ku me̩ la gbo̩ ñwu Jo̩n; amafeju agane̩, amachika alule̩, o̩la ame̩no̩ga ikpemute akwo hiolo; amajeti agbo̩la, ma jʼakʼabo ki ku kwane̩, ma jʼajʼuche̩nyo̩ rʼame̩nale;
e̩ne̩ ki ma la dʼo̩la-wñ hi efu mi n gbede.
Oñ abu kʼamonuche̩ Jo̩n kwo bʼo̩mo̩ te̩, i chane̩ eka o̩la Jo̩n ñw o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ kakini, E̩wñ me̩ dufu nyʼaje̩tachi ago le̩ taa? Ikpo e-kʼafu amiejo ofo?
E̩wñ me̩ muda ledufu ali ke? One̩ kʼi dʼe̩wñ newu newu tʼo̩la? Me̩ go, abo ku ma nyi otogbo ojima ku ma la jʼachile̩ ef unyi amonu ma jo̩.
Mak e̩wñ me̩ ledufu ku me̩ li? Akache̩? Eba, naka ñwu me̩, i laño̩ che tʼakache̩ le ololo.
E̩ne̩-i chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma ko̩ o̩la-wñ tane̩ kakini,
Naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki tu Jo̩n le ef abo kʼabobule̩ bi n; e̩ne̩ ki muda nya ef ojane̩ O̩jo̩ tʼowñ le.
Tak amone̩ du ku ma gbo̩, kpai amagbo̩kane̩ dale ñw O̩jo̩ abu ku ma che ma baptism e-Jo̩n.
Ama amaFarisi kpai amamoli o̩lo̩da de̩ya kpo̩ e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ neku le̩ ñw o̩la-ma, abu ku ma ma je̩ ñw u che ma baptism n.
Todule̩ e̩wñ nadu abo o̩gba-i wawe-wñ? E̩wñ ma bi taa?
Ma chebi abimo̩to̩ ku ma jʼef aja akwado̩ omune̩ kakini,
Todu Jo̩n kʼi ache baptism lewa, i la jʼakala n, i la ñmʼomi-achiwebete̩ma n, taku me̩ kakini, I chenʼebili.
O̩ma One̩ lewa aje̩ añmo̩, oñ me̩ kakini, Me̩ go, one̩ ki chʼachʼajefu kpʼañmʼomi-achiwebe̩te̩ma de̩, onuku amagbo̩kane̩ kpʼame̩nadure i che!
Amo̩ma ibe chaka muda fʼale da ñw ibe.
Oñ e̩ne̩ Farisiʼka tene todu kʼi bʼo̩ jʼe̩wñ. Tak i mugudu tef unyi e̩ne̩ Farisi le̩ achekukane̩ kʼi jʼe̩wñ.
Me̩ la go, onobule̩ʼka kʼi chʼe̩nadure kʼi dʼef ewo le̩, abu kʼi ma ka kʼi chekukane̩ kʼi jʼe̩wñ ef unyi e̩ne̩ Farisi le̩, i mʼugege ekpoʼka du
oñ i dago ubi wñ ugbo e̩re̩-wñ araku, i chane̩ echi omi aku-wñ nyʼe̩re̩-wñ, i la nʼilo-ji-wñ ali, i ño̩ nʼalu-wñ ko̩ ko̩ ño̩ ko̩ e̩re̩-wñ, oñ i nʼekpo le̩ akurʼu.
Ama abu kʼe̩ne̩ Farisi ki dʼo̩ wa le̩ li, i ka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, E̩ne̩-i ma chʼakache̩ i ma ma e̩ne̩ kʼonobule̩ ki ado̩wo̩kadʼo-i che kpʼalu kʼi de̩, todabu kʼi chʼe̩nadure.
Taku Jisus dohi ka ñw u kakini, Saimo̩n, u chenʼe̩wñ kʼu naka ñw e̩. Oñ i kakini, Akone̩wñ, ka ke.
Amajo̩me̩ meji do̩mo̩ ku ma je̩ ato̩ko̩ʼka o̩me̩; oka nʼo̩ o̩me̩ olia oli mebie, e-ekeji la chʼolia ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩ta.
Abu ku ma ma nʼe̩wñ ku ma du rʼo̩me̩ n, i muko che amamejeji ele. Mak e̩ne̩ ef uma afe̩do̩ owñ tule?
Saimo̩n la dohi kakini, Eju-mi e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼe ele tule. Oñ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, O̩kpakpa-wñ e̩ ka-i.
Tak i murida ago onobule̩ le̩, oñ i ka ñwu Saimo̩n kakini, E̩ li onobule̩-i? U gudu wʼef unyi-we̩, e̩ la dʼomi ñwu mi tod e̩re̩-mi n; e̩ne̩-i muda chʼomi aku-wñ nyʼe̩re̩-mi, tak i du iloji-wñ li.
E̩ dʼalu kʼomi alu n; ama akwe̩gba kʼu muguduwa, e̩ne̩-i we edʼalu ko̩ ko̩ ño̩ kʼe̩re̩-mi n;
e̩ du ekpo kuru mi oji n; e̩ne̩-i muda dʼekpo o̩ko̩chi kuru e̩re̩-mi.
Tod e-kide̩ naka ñw e̩ kakini, Ma tʼadure-wñ ki wewe no̩ ñw u me̩, todabu kʼi fe̩do̩ nana; ama e̩ne̩ ku ma to̩no̩ ñw u ree, e̩ne̩ le̩ afe̩do̩ ree.
Tak i ka ñw onobule̩ le̩ kakini, Ma tʼadure-we̩ no̩ me̩,
tak abo ku ma chekukane̩ kpʼowñ chane̩ eka ef e̩do̩-ma kakini, E̩ne̩-i, i chaka chʼadure i ato̩no̩ ñw one̩, e̩ne̩ de̩ taa?
Oñ i ka ñw onobule̩ kakini, E̩do̩-ekono-we̩ fʼe̩ jadu me̩; e̩ nalo tef ure̩do̩.
Ubile̩ i leatu i lale gu ef ewo ewo kpai o̩ja du; i nʼakoya ata, i la nʼuche̩nyo̩ ojane̩ O̩jo̩ aje̩ rʼuma; abo me̩gweji le̩ manyʼo̩ o̩la,
kpʼabobule̩ iche̩ka e-kʼamafu bibi kpai e̩gbo o̩la kwobʼuma te̩; abo le̩ che Me̩ri, ku ma do̩ ko̩ Magdalini, e-kʼamebili mebie kwʼef uwñ dufu,
kpai Joana o̩ya Chusa, adigede He̩ro̩d, kpai Susana kpai abobule̩ omune̩ ojoji wewe. Abobule̩-i nʼane̩ e-ma ache e̩wñ ñwu ma.
Abu kʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ awa ugbo kate, kʼabo ewo ewo la awʼugbo Jisus, i ko̩la lef ita kakini,
Agbe̩yo̩ ledufu kʼi gbe̩ e̩yo̩-wñ; oñ abu kʼi agbe̩, iche̩ka lewane̩ eti o̩na; oñ amone̩ fʼu kpetili mane̩, ame̩we̩ ojale la mure je̩.
Omune̩ lewane̩ oj apata; oñ e̩gba kʼi fʼiga fu i kwacha rinyo̩ todu omi kʼi ma ne̩ n.
Omune̩ lewane̩ ef ikeke; tak ikeke fʼiga kpʼowñ oñ i fʼu gwebo.
Omune̩ la lewane̩ ef ane̩ e̩nyo̩, oñ i fʼiga, i la ro̩ ogume̩lu. Abu kʼi nʼo̩la kide̩ aka, i nomudala ka nana kakini, E̩ne̩ ki nʼeti ki agbo̩, ki nagbo̩.
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ tʼowñ ene e̩wñ ki chʼoji ita-i.
Oñ i kakini, Ma du ñw ame̩ ku me̩ mʼe̩wñ afili e-ojane̩ O̩jo̩; ma muda du ñw abo ki bo̩ ef ita; todu kʼabu ku ma gane̩ ma ki we ego, oñ abu kʼeti-ma agbʼo̩la kʼama ki we maʼoji-wñ.
Oji ita-i la de̩. E̩yo̩ le̩ chʼO̩la O̩jo̩.
Abʼe-ku ma la jʼetʼo̩na chʼabo ku ma gbo̩; e̩gbale̩ tak Abulumone̩ awa are o̩la le̩ kwef e̩do̩-ma, tode̩gba ku ma ke̩do̩no ku ma ajadu ma.
Abʼe-ki la jʼoji apata chʼabo ku ma mʼo̩la le̩ gba kpai uyo̩ e̩gba du ku ma gbo̩; abʼe-i muda nʼili n, ma ake̩do̩no ikoʼka, tak iko kʼajama lewa ma kwohi nyʼubi.
Oñ e-ki ñwa tef ikeke le̩, abʼe-le̩ chʼabo ku ma gbo̩, oñ abu ku ma jʼef ejiji eda kpai e̩wñ anana kpai e̩wñ-ube̩do̩ ile̩-i alo waa i fu ma gwebo, e̩ro-ma du la agbo n.
E-ki dʼef ane̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ le̩ chʼabo ku ma gbo̩ o̩la le̩ ef e̩do̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ kpai e̩do̩ e̩nyo̩ ku ma mʼu ne̩ gaga ku ma la fe̩do̩lichi are̩ro.
I la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼuna tʼagege kʼi adu e̩wñ eku bʼo ma n, i la adʼu tʼofe ate̩ n; chai oj akete i adʼu ne todu kʼabo ku ma agudu wʼo̩mo̩ ki li ugane̩ le̩.
Todu i nʼe̩wñ du ki maja ki ma atejugede n. I la nʼe̩wñ du ku ma du maja ku ma awe ema n kʼi ma la awe ekwotejugede n.
Todule̩ me̩ nago alu ku me̩ gbo̩; todu e̩ne̩ kʼi la ne̩, ma adʼu mʼo̩ ñw u; oñ e̩ne̩ du ki ma ne̩ n, i chaka chʼe̩wñ kʼi do̩ kʼi ne̩, ma la amʼe-le̩ du kwobʼo̩ te̩.
Tak iye-wñ kpai amo̩maye-wñ wʼugbo kʼi de̩, ma la neke tʼugbo-wñ n tod o̩wo̩-amone̩.
Oñ ma mʼu du ka ñw u kakini, Iye-we̩ kpai amo̩maye-we̩ dago jʼo̩do̩da, i dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma li uwe̩.
I muda dohi ñwu ma kakini, Iye-mi kpʼamo̩maye-mi chʼabo ku ma jʼagbo̩ O̩la O̩jo̩ ku ma la ache teju-wñ.
Tak i leatu o̩jo̩ʼka i kwotʼo̩ko̩ʼka kpʼamako̩che̩-wñ, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, A ki mʼoduda-i daba tʼejʼano̩mo̩, taku ma muhibʼane̩ te̩.
Oñ abu ku ma gwʼo̩ko̩ alo, olu fʼu mu; tak afu lile chane̩ eju bʼeju oduda le̩ ma, oñ o̩ko̩ la chane̩ eko̩ ñw omi, oñ ma gbali jo̩.
Taku ma lewʼugbo-wñ aji owñ olu, ma kakini O̩dafe̩, O̩dafe̩, a alenyo̩! Oñ i mʼolu ji, adejurʼafu kpai o̩gba-gba-gba e-omi le̩; tak i we, oñ o̩mo̩ bo̩ hiolii.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ugbo e̩do̩-ekono-me̩ de̩? Ma la railo, ma kwoyaye, ma ko̩la ñw o̩la-ma kakini, E̩ne̩ de̩-i taa? I chaka chʼomi kpai afu, i añwa ñwu ma, ma la gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩?
Taku ma lewa mʼane̩ abo Ge̩rasa ki kpejuru Galili le̩.
Oñ abu kʼi kwʼef o̩ko̩ tʼane̩, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka kʼi nʼame-bili kwʼef ewo le̩ lewa de kpai owñ; i kʼukpo nyʼo̩la kpo̩kpe̩, i la gugu ef unyi du n chai ef ache̩ku.
Oñ abu kʼi fu Jisus li, i fʼukwa kwa afiane̩ o̩gba-wñ, i domudago kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-mi kpai uwe̩, Jisus, uwe̩ O̩ma O̩jo̩ Chamachala? narodubʼe̩ kʼe̩ we eje̩ ñwu mi li uwa.

Todu i do̩mo̩ aka ñw afu ki ma de̩hiolo n le̩ kʼi kwʼef e̩ne̩ le̩ dufu. Todu i te̩tamʼe̩ne̩ le̩ o̩gbe̩nugbe̩ oñ ma kʼagba nyʼowñ o̩wo̩ kpai e̩re̩ adidewñ; i muda fʼigbaligba jada, oñ ebili fʼowñ ne tʼaje̩tachi.
Taku Jisus tʼo̩ ene kakini, Ab odu-we̩ ko̩? Oñ i kakini, Lijio̩n; todabu kʼamebili wewe mugudu tef uwñ.
Taku ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi we eñwañwu ma ku ma kwʼo̩mo̩ nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu.
Amoko wewe la dujo̩ oj uwo o̩mo̩ ajije̩; oñ ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ todu kʼi je̩ ñwu ma nyʼef abʼe-le̩. Tak i je̩ ñwu ma.
Tak amebili kwobʼef one̩ le̩ te̩ oñ ma mugudu rʼef amoko le̩; tak ujo̩ amoko gwo̩ko̩ gwo̩ru o̩gba tef oduda le̩, oñ ma fʼomi ñmo̩ leku.
Oñ abu kʼabo ku ma kʼuje̩wñ ñwu ma li e̩wñ ki wache le̩, ma ra, oñ ma mʼu du ka ef ewo kpʼoj oko.
Taku amone̩ ledufu ku ma li e̩wñ ki wache le̩, oñ ma lewʼugbo Jisus, ma la fʼe̩ne̩ kʼamebili kwobʼef uwñ te̩ le̩ li abu kʼi guane̩ e̩re̩ Jisus, ukpo dʼo̩la-wñ, ibe-wñ la lewane̩; taku ma railo.
Oñ abo ku ma fʼu li mʼu du ka ñwu ma alu ki le ku ma fʼe̩ne̩ kʼi nʼamebili le̩ jadu.
Tak ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ ku ma jʼojane̩ ki le Ge̩rasa daka bi u kʼi kwobʼuma te̩; todabu kʼailo fu ma mu nana; oñ i kwotʼo̩ko̩ le̩ mudabi.
Oñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼamebili kwʼef uwñ dufu le̩ narodubʼo̩ kʼi dʼugbo-wñ; ama i je̩ ñw u lo, i kakini,
E̩ mudakubi tʼunyi-we̩, kʼe̩ la choli aluka e̩wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ che ñw e̩. Tak i le owñ, i nʼakoya aluka e̩wñ du ku Jisus che ñw u le̩ ata ugbo du ef ewo le̩ chaka.
Oñ e̩gba ku Jisus mudabi wa, o̩wo̩-amone̩ yo̩ ñw u todu o̩chaka-ma jʼadeju-wñ.
Me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jairo̩s kʼi chʼagboji unyi-ujeju lewa, awane̩ e̩re̩ Jisus, oñ i gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi wʼunyi-wñ;
todabu kʼi nʼo̩ma okpono kʼi chʼonobule̩, kʼo̩do̩-wñ dab o̩do̩ me̩gweji, kʼi ache kʼi ku.
Tak onobule̩ʼka kʼe̩bie̩-wñ ma nʼeda gbogbo o̩do̩ me̩gweji n, kʼi la mʼe̩wñ udiñmino-wñ du ko kpabie̩ ugbo amobochi, e̩ne̩ du la bo̩jo̩ kʼi ache o̩ga-wñ kpa n,
onobule̩ le̩ lʼubi-wñ wa oñ i dʼo̩wo̩kadʼojaja eti afe̩-wñ; oñ e̩re̩re̩le̩ e̩bie̩-wñ ki aru le̩ muda.
Taku Jisus kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼo̩wo̩kado mi? Oñ abu kʼo̩chaka-ma re̩, Pita kpʼabo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kakini, O̩dafe̩, o̩wo̩-amone̩ ku ma donyʼuwe̩ daka ku ma la ake̩che̩ bʼuwe̩ ma-i!
Ama Jisus kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka do̩wo̩kado mi le̩; todu omi chema kʼukpahiu kwʼef umi dufu.
Oñ abu kʼonobule̩ le̩ li ka kʼi ma maja ñwu Jisusi n, i lewa kpai o̩la-ega afiane̩ o̩gba-wñ, oñ i mudu ka eju amone̩ le̩ du e̩wñ ki chi kʼi do̩wo̩kadʼo, kpai alu kʼo̩la-wñ takpa e̩re̩re̩le̩.
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, O̩ma-mi onobule̩, e̩do̩-ekono-we̩ fʼe̩ jadu me̩; e̩ nalo tef ure̩do̩.
Abu kʼi nʼo̩la aka ta, e̩ne̩ʼka kwʼunyi agboji unyi-ujeju le̩ wa kakini, O̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ leku me̩; e̩ ki che Akone̩wñ le̩ akanya ge̩ n.
Ama abu ku Jisus gbʼo̩, i dohi ñw u kakini, E̩ ki railo n; chai eke̩do̩no e ke̩do̩no kate taku ma ajadu-wñ.
Oñ abu kʼi lewa unyi le̩ i je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ki guduwʼef unyi kpʼowñ n, chai Pita kpai Jo̩n kpai Jeme̩s kpʼata imo̩to̩ onobule̩ le̩ kpʼiye-wñ.
Oñ o̩chaka-ma jo̩ araku, kpai ekʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩ tod uwñ; ama i kakini, Me̩ ki raku n, todu i ku n, chai olu i ale̩ le̩.
Taku ma dokanyi rʼowñ oji, todabu ku ma chema ka kʼi leku.
I muda gwo̩nyʼu o̩wo̩, i dʼomu kakini, O̩ma kwane̩!
Tak afu-wñ mudabiwa, oñ i kwane̩ e̩re̩re̩le̩; tak i ñwañwu ma ku ma dʼe̩wñ ñw u je̩.
Tak ibe ata-wñ kpʼiye-wñ mukpatuka; i la ka ñwu ma ku ma we eka e̩wñ ki wache le̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du.
Tak abu kʼi fʼabo me̩gweji le̩ do̩wajo̩, i dʼukpahiu kpʼo̩da amebili chaka kpʼo̩ga e̩chekpa ñw ma.
Tak i fʼuma kpe̩ olo ku ma nyʼatakoya ojane̩ O̩jo̩, ku ma laño̩ fʼe̩gbo̩ ame̩ne̩gbo o̩la chekpa.
Oñ i ka ñw ma kakini, Me̩ nʼe̩wñ du lo tod ule̩-me̩ n, tʼo̩kpa, tʼikpa, tʼuje̩wñ, tʼo̩ko̩; me̩ ki la nʼafe̩ meji n.
Unyi du ku me̩ la gudu tʼo̩, o̩mo̩ me̩ jo̩; o̩mo̩ me̩ la adufu kwo.
Oñ aluka amone̩ du ku ma ko̩ eyo̩ ñw me̩, abu ku me̩ kwʼef ewo le̩ dufu, me̩ fʼebutu-wñ gbanyo̩ bʼe̩re̩-me̩ te̩ kʼi gbibenu nyʼuma.
