Taku ma kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu, oñ ma tʼewo ewo ale, ma nʼuche̩nyo̩ aje̩; ma la nʼo̩ga amone̩ ache ugbo du.
Oñ He̩ro̩d ajo̩fe̩ Te̩trark le̩ gbʼinabali e̩wñ du ki wache le̩; i la fitʼowñ eju, tod iche̩ka ka ku ma mu Jo̩n du dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku;
iche̩ka la ka kʼE̩laija kwotejugede; abomune̩ la ka kʼakache̩ igbeleʼka mudajikwane̩ le̩.
Ama He̩ro̩d kakini, Omi fu Jo̩n oji ko̩da; ama e̩ne̩ kʼu nagbo̩ e̩wñ abe̩i o̩la-wñ ño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ge̩? Oñ i feju eli u.
Tak abu kʼame̩nukpuche̩ mudakubi wa, ma fʼe̩wñ du ku ma che choli ñw u. Tak i mʼuma ko, ahi tʼo̩wo̩ʼka tef ewo ku ma do̩ ko̩ Be̩tsaida.
Ama abu kʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ fʼu ma, ma tʼo̩ ubi; i la yo̩ ñwu ma, i ko̩la e̩wñ ojane̩ O̩jo̩ ñwu ma, oñ i fʼo̩ga abo kʼeku o̩ga eche aku ma chekpa.

Oñ ane̩ chane̩ elo̩; oñ abo me̩gweji le̩ lewa aka ñw u kakini, Je̩ ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩-i ku ma lo, ku ma nyʼef ewo ewo kpʼojoko ki lʼuwa de daka-i, ku ma ru, ku ma la li uje̩wñ; todabu kʼa jʼugbo ki chʼaje̩tachi-i.
I muda ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ki kʼe̩wñ ñwu ma je̩. Ma kakini, E-kʼa ne̩ tʼakala me̩lu kpai e̩ja meji le n; chai e̩gba kʼa nyʼala e̩wñ ñw amone̩-i chaka du je̩.
Todu aboke̩le̩ ma dab icham me̩fa nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩. Oñ i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ je̩ ñwu ma chekukane̩ uche̩ uche̩ ooje ooje.
Oñ ma fʼabe̩le̩ che, ma je̩ ñw o̩chaka-ma chekukane̩.
Tak abu kʼi mʼakala me̩lu kpai e̩ja meji le̩ ko, i chʼeju go ojale, i fʼele O̩jo̩ ka nyʼu, tak i mʼu bu, oñ i mʼu ko ñw amako̩che̩-wñ ku ma dugugu o̩gba o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩.
Ma la je̩, oñ efu-ma chaka ko̩; taku ma mʼabubo̩-wñ ki kwu ma bo̩ ko, i chʼaligada me̩gweji.
Tak ileatu abu kʼowñ kate do̩mo̩ achadua, amako̩che̩-wñ jʼugbo-wñ; oñ i tʼuma ene kakini, E̩ne̩ oñ amone̩ aka kʼomi che?
Ma dohi kakini, Jo̩n kʼi ache baptism le̩; abomune̩ muda aka kʼE̩laija, abomune̩ la aka kʼakache̩ igbeleʼka mudajikwane̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ fa, e̩ne̩ oñ ame̩ ka kʼomi che? Oñ Pita dohi kakini, Kraist e-O̩jo̩.
Ama i fʼuma eti, iño̩ka ku ma we eka ñw e̩ne̩ du,
i kakini, O̩ma One̩ ali uwa wewe tila, kʼabogijo kpai amagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada ki laño̩ kʼo̩, ku ma ñʼadʼu kpa ge̩, tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ ma adʼu dajikwane̩ ge̩.
Tak i ka ñw o̩chaka amone̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ ki dʼone̩ e̩do̩ kʼi kadʼumi ubi awa, i ki fʼaire̩ o̩la-wñ re̩ kʼi namʼoli uku-wñ du o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa, kʼi lewa tʼumi ubi.
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi jadu oji o̩la-wñ adʼu tinyo̩; e̩ne̩ du ki la adʼoji o̩la-wñ tinyo̩ todu mi, e̩ne̩ le̩ ajadu-wñ.
Todu one̩ mʼo̩gbo̩ ile̩ du gba nyʼo̩wo̩, kʼi mʼoji o̩la-wñ du tinyo̩ abe̩k i dʼu chofu ugbo ile kʼi aje̩ de̩?
Todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi achanyo̩ mi kpai o̩la-mi, O̩ma One̩ achanyo̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ e̩gba kʼi lewa ef ojima e-wñ kpai e-Ata kpʼe-amonuche̩ kiafo̩.
Ama nakʼochochi ñwu me̩ kakini, Abo iche̩ka jʼef abo ku ma dago jo̩-i ki ma nʼugbo du kʼuku akado ma n gbogbo tʼe̩gba ku ma fejudʼojane̩ O̩jo̩.
Oñ i leatu dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩jo̩ me̩jo̩ kʼi kʼo̩la kide̩ i mu Pita kpai Jo̩n kpai Jeme̩s ko oñ i mute̩gu tʼoj uwo le̩ kʼi chadua.
Tak i leatu echadua kʼi achadua alu kʼeju-wñ de̩ murida ojoji, oñ afe̩-wñ chane̩ edefufu kʼi abʼeju je̩.
Me̩ la go, aboke̩le̩ meji bʼo̩ chʼoluka, owñ che Mose̩s kpʼE̩laija,
ku ma tejugede ef ojima, oñ ma nʼo̩la elo kʼi alo aka, owñ chʼe-kʼi ache kʼi kpoji Je̩rusale̩m.
Eju Pita kpai abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ la woji ñw olu; ama abu ku ma moluji jali, ma li ojima-wñ kpʼaboke̩le̩ meji-i ku ma dago kpenyʼu.

Tak i leatu abu kʼabo le̩ nate̩ ubi bʼo̩ te̩, Pita ka ñwu Jisus kakini, O̩dafe̩, i chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw a kʼa jʼemi; awa ki fʼebu me̩ta mu, oka ki chʼutodu we̩, oka ki chʼutodu Mose̩s, oka ki chʼutodu E̩laija—i ma e̩wñ kʼi aka n.
Oñ abu kʼi nʼo̩la-i aka akpa ojaleʼka lewa debono ma; oñ ma railo abu ma agudu tef akpa le̩.
Tak omuko̩laʼka ka kwʼef akpa le̩ kakini, Owñ-i chʼO̩ma-mi kʼu chi; me̩ gbʼo̩la-wñ!
Oñ eka kʼomuko̩la le̩ ka, ma fu Jisus kate li o̩mo̩. Taku ma chechi, ma la dʼe̩wñ du ku ma li le̩ ka ñw e̩ne̩ du iko le̩ n.
Oñ i leatu o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ abu ku ma gwo̩ru kwʼoj uwo le̩ wane̩, o̩wo̩-amone̩ nana de kpʼowñ.
Me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka ef o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ nakwa kakini, Akone̩wñ, narodubʼe̩ kʼe̩ go o̩ma-mi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, todu owñ chʼo̩ma-mi okpono;
e̩ la go, afuʼka amʼu, tak achigili ukwa afʼo̩ alu; oñ i achʼo dab ajukpakpa, alu-wñ la awuwowo, i aguche̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩, akanya i la che tak afu le̩ ki kwobʼo̩ o̩la te̩,
u la rodubʼamako̩che̩-we̩ ku ma nʼo dufu, ma muda neke che n.
Taku Jisus dohi kakini, Abo o̩gba ku me̩ ko̩ eke̩do̩no ku me̩ ño̩ murida bʼo̩na te̩, gbogbo nyʼe̩gba nadʼugbo me̩, kʼu naje̩ kpai ame̩ taa? Mʼo̩ma-we̩ du wʼemi.
Oñ abu kʼi awa, ebili le̩ fʼu ro̩ fiane̩, i la chʼo dab ajukpakpa. Taku Jisus dejurʼafu ki ma de̩hiolo n le̩, oñ i fʼo̩ga imo̩to̩ le̩ chekpa, tak i mʼu dudabi ñw ata-wñ.
Oñ ibe takpa rʼo̩chaka-ma efu noj e̩gahi elile e-O̩jo̩-i.
O̩la-i ki natunyʼume̩ eti; todu ma ache ku ma dʼO̩ma One̩ tef o̩wo̩ amone̩.
Ma muda mʼofe e̩wñ kʼi ka-i n, e̩wñ bʼo̩la le̩ ma todu ku ma ki we eli oji-wñ; ma la railo etʼowñ ene oji o̩la kʼi ka-i.
Tak iñwa chi ñwu ma, e̩ne̩ ki tʼomune̩ le̩ efu-ma.
Ama abu ku Jisus li ibe ku ma kpe̩ ef e̩do̩-ma-i, i mʼimo̩to̩ kekeleʼka du, oñ i mʼu du dago akolo-wñ;
tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki agba imo̩to̩ kekele-i ef odu-mi, omi i gba le̩, oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi agba mi, e̩ne̩ kʼi kpe̩ mi wa i agba le̩; todu e̩ne̩ ki nya efu me̩ chaka, e̩ne̩ le̩ gbe̩gbe̩.
Oñ Jo̩n dohi kakini, O̩dafe̩, a fʼe̩ne̩ʼka li kʼi do̩mo̩ ane amebili dufu ef odu-we̩, tak a kpo̩na nyʼu todabu kʼi ma tʼo̩kpa kate kpʼawa n.
Oñ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Me̩ ki kpo̩na nyʼu n; todu e̩ne̩ kʼi ma chʼagwunyʼume̩ n, e̩ne̩-me̩ i che.
Oñ i leatu e̩gba kʼadiko ku ma amʼowñ gba nyʼate̩ me̩rejo̩, i fʼeju-wñ gwanyi elo tu Je̩rusale̩m,
oñ i fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ dʼo̩gba-wñ; oñ ma nyʼagudu tef ewo abo Samariaʼka, ku ma ñw e̩wñ chetane̩ ñw u.
Ma la gbʼowñ n todabu kʼeju-wñ kadʼenyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ abu kʼamako̩che̩-wñ, Jeme̩s kpai Jo̩n fʼu li ma kakini, Ondu, i dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼa ka ñw una ki kwʼefojale wa kʼi fʼuma lie̩ ma ne̩?
Ama i murida adejuru ma.
Oñ ma legudu tʼewo omune̩.
Abu ku ma dʼej o̩na alo, e̩ne̩ʼka ka ñw u kakini, Natʼe̩ ubi ugbo du kʼe̩ nyi.
Taku Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Amajo nʼura e-ma, ame̩we̩ ojale la nʼunyi, O̩ma One̩ muda nʼugbo du kʼi adʼoji-wñ lo n.
I ño̩ ka ñw e̩ne̩ omune̩ kakini, Tʼumi ubi. Ama e̩ne̩ le̩ kakini, Ondu, je̩ ñwu mi kʼu fʼata-mi ji ejodudu ta.
Ama i ka ñw u kakini, Tʼabo ki ku no̩ ku ma jʼoku abo e-ma ki ku, ama uwe̩ ki nalo kʼe̩ dʼo̩la ojane̩ O̩jo̩ kpogo.
Tak e̩ne̩ omune̩ kakini, Natʼe̩ ubi, Ondu, e̩ muda je̩ ñwu mi che abo ki dʼunyi-mi agbo ejodudu ta.
Ama Jisus ka ñw u kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki mʼo̩wo̩-wñ dudo uko̩che̩ kʼi la ñʼadejubi, kʼi anyo̩ bʼojane̩ O̩jo̩ jo̩ n.
Ubi e̩wñ kide̩ Ondu mʼabo ojoji omune̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩gwa chi, oñ i fʼuma kpe̩ eji eji o̩gba-wñ, tef ewo du kpai ugbo du kʼowñ onugo ache kʼi nyi.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ ki bie̩ tʼoko-i tabale, ochochi, abuko̩lo̩-wñ muda de̩ ke̩e̩. Todule̩ me̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼodu e̩wñ oko-i, todu kʼi kʼabuko̩lo̩ e̩che̩ nyʼef e̩wñ oko-wñ.
Me̩ nalo me̩; me̩ go, omi akpʼume̩-i dabe̩ne̩ kʼamo̩mala rʼalumeji amo̩gu.
Me̩ ki ne̩ alita n, abe̩k ikpa n, abe̩k e̩da n; me̩ ki la gwa e̩ne̩ du ej o̩na n.
Unyi du ku me̩ la gudu tef uwñ, ejodudu me̩ kakini, Ure̩do̩ ki dʼunyi-i.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩ma ure̩do̩ dʼo̩mo̩, ure̩do̩-me̩ la anʼoji-wñ; i ma la dʼabe̩le̩ n, i adabi wa ñwu me̩.
Me̩ ki la gugu ef unyi le̩ gbage̩de̩, ku me̩ je̩ ku me̩ la ñmo̩ e̩wñ ku ma ne̩ ugbo ma; todu e̩nuko̩lo̩ nyo̩ bʼo̩me̩-wñ jo̩ ku ma ra ñw u. Me̩ ki ru tʼunyi unyi ale n.
Oñ ewo du ku me̩ gudu tʼo̩, ku ma la yo̩ ñwu me̩, me̩ naje̩ e̩wñ ku ma dugugu o̩gba-me̩;
me̩ ki che o̩ga abo ki ma lo̩ ñwu ma n ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ kpa, ku me̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Ojane̩ O̩jo̩ me̩ru me̩ me̩.
Ama ewo du ku me̩ gudu tʼo̩ ku ma ma yo̩ ñwu me̩ n, me̩ nyʼojukpologu-wñ ku me̩ kakini,
I chaka chʼebutu ewo-me̩ kʼi gamʼe̩re̩-wa, a agbanyo̩ bʼe̩re̩-wa te̩ rʼume̩ oji-i; i chaka dʼabe̩i ame̩ ki muda ma ka kʼojane̩ O̩jo̩ lewa anane̩ me̩.
Naka ñwu me̩ kakini, O̩bata So̩do̩m o̩jo̩ le̩ ame̩ tʼe-ewo le̩ le.

Atogwo ñw e̩, Ko̩raisin! Atogwo ñw e̩, Be̩tsaida! todu iche̩wñ ku ma ma fʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu ku ma che ef ume̩ le̩ che efu Taya kpai Saido̩n ma ma miberida kpo̩kpe̩ me̩, ma ma mʼukpo-eku ko nyʼo̩la agugu ef elulu me̩.
E-Taya kpai Saidon la ame̩ tʼe-me̩ le o̩jo̩ ajo̩.
Oñ uwe̩, Kapanahum ge̩, uwe̩ ahi o̩la ne gbogbo nyʼefojale? Ma adʼe̩ wane̩ gbogbo nyʼefo̩jegu.
E̩ne̩ ki agbʼo̩la-me̩, o̩la-mi i gbo̩ le̩; e̩ne̩ ki la feyakpo̩ me̩, omi i feyakpo̩; e̩ne̩ ki feyakpo̩ mi le̩, i feyakpo̩ e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa.
Abo o̩gbo me̩ta nyoke me̩gwa le̩ mudakubi wa kpai uyo̩; ma kakini, Ondu, i chaka chʼamebili ma chʼe̩kamuhite̩ ñw a ef odu-we̩.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, U fu Setan li dab o̩mamanya kʼi da kwʼefojale wane̩.
Me̩ go, u mʼo̩da du ñwu me̩ ku me̩ fʼamejo kpai amakpe kpetili mane̩ me̩, kpʼugbo ukpahiu e-e̩nebi le̩ chaka; i la nʼugbo du kʼe̩wñ du ache me̩ uji n.
Ama me̩ ki nayo̩ ef e-kide̩ ka kʼamafu chʼe̩kamuhite̩ ñwu me̩ n; me̩ ki muda nayo̩ todabu kʼodu-me̩ che̩ko̩ tef o̩takada efojale.

Ef adiko auwa le̩ onugo i gwoguyo̩ ef Afu Kiafo̩, i kakini, Nagogbodʼuwe̩ Ata-mi, uwe̩ kʼe̩ chʼOndu efojale kpʼane̩-ile̩, todabu kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ-i komaja ñw ame̩nugbeju kpai abo eju-ene̩, kʼe̩ la mʼu bite̩ ñw amo̩me̩kpa. Eba, Ata, tod abu kʼi rʼuwe̩ eju le̩ de̩.
Ata-mi kʼe̩wñ nyʼumi o̩wo̩ me̩; e̩ne̩ du la ma e̩ne̩ kʼO̩ma-i che n chai Ata; e̩ne̩ du la ma e̩ne̩ kʼAta che n chai O̩ma-i kpʼe̩ne̩ du kʼO̩ma neku ebite̩ ñw u.
Tak i murida tugbo amako̩che̩-wñ ejubi, i kakini, Eju kʼi ali e̩wñ kʼame̩ li-i gbede!
Todu naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I dʼamakache̩ kpai amonu wewe e̩do̩ ku ma li e̩wñ kʼame̩ li-i, ma la li u n; ku ma la gbo̩ e̩wñ kʼame̩ gbo̩-i, ma la gbo̩ n.
Me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ ki moli-o̩lo̩daʼka kwodago kʼi jʼowñ ma kakini, Akone̩wñ, e̩wñ nache kʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ amud e̩wñ ogu kʼu naje̩?
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ ma ko̩ rʼef o̩lo̩da taa? Ab e̩ cho̩kalatu-wñ?
Oñ i dohi kakini, Uwe̩ ki fe̩do̩ Ondu O̩jo̩-we̩ kpʼe̩do̩-we̩ chaka, kpʼonugo-we̩ chaka, kpʼiñmi-we̩ chaka, kpʼibe-we̩ chaka; uwe̩ ki fe̩do̩ ekeji-we̩ dab o̩la-we̩.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, E̩ mʼohi o̩kpakpa du me̩; uwe̩ fʼe-le̩ che mak uwe̩ adeju.
Ama abu kʼi dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi dale ñw o̩la-wñ, i ka ñwu Jisus kakini, E̩ne̩ ño̩ chʼekeji-mi ke?

Jisus danʼo̩la le̩ kakmi, E̩ne̩ʼka kwo Je̩rusale̩m agwo̩ru nyi Je̩riko; oñ i lewa wʼamadinya o̩wo̩; ma mʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ da, ma la fʼowñ gwo o̩titili, taku ma kwʼo̩mo̩ le, iñmi dʼo̩wo̩ O̩jo̩ i bo̩, oñ ma tʼo̩ no̩.
Alu kʼe̩wñ agbajiko-i atama O̩jo̩ ʼka la agwo̩ru o̩na le̩ alo, oñ e̩gba kʼi fʼu li, i lʼo̩wo̩ ekeji le.
Abe̩le̩ ge̩, e̩ne̩ Lifaiʼka, abu kʼi lewa ugbo le̩ kʼi ño̩ fʼu li, i lʼo̩wo̩ ekeji le ge̩.
Ama e̩ne̩ Samariaʼka, abu kʼi dʼej o̩na ule̩, i lewa ugbo kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ de̩; oñ abu kʼi fʼu li, ejumomi-wñ je̩ ñw u n.
Tak i lewʼugbo-wñ, i fʼagbe-wñ ji, i la mʼekpo-o̩lif kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma du danyʼu; tak i mʼu du gugu oj o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ e-wñ onugo, oñ i mʼu du le tʼunyi uruʼka, i la fejutʼo̩.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ i la mʼolia meji dudufu, oñ i muko ñw odu unyi uru le̩ i kakini, E̩ nafejutʼo̩; tak e̩wñ du kʼe̩ kpabie̩ tu e-le̩ le, e̩gba kʼu mʼoji da omi aro̩me̩ ñw e̩.
Ef abo me̩ta le̩, e̩ne̩ chʼekeji e̩ne̩ ki wʼamadinya o̩wo̩ le̩ eju-we̩ taa?
Oñ i kakini, E̩ne̩ ki chʼejumomi ñw u le̩. Taku Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩ nalo kʼuwe̩ ki ño̩ che abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Oñ abu ku ma alo, i gudu tef ewo ke̩ke̩ʼka; oñ onobule̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Marta mʼowñ gba tef unyi-wñ.
I la nʼo̩maye onobule̩ʼka ku ma do̩ ko̩ Me̩ri kʼi la guane̩ e̩re̩ Ondu kʼi agbʼo̩la-wñ.

Ama ibe Marta mud o̩gwo̩ko̩ noj e̩wñ wewe kʼi do̩mo̩ ache ñwu ma; oñ i lewa banʼo, i kakini, Ondu, i wʼe̩ abu kʼo̩maye-mi onobule̩ tʼomi kate no̩ kʼu che e̩wñ ñwu me̩ n? Todule̩ e̩ ka ñw u kʼi bʼumi che ke.
Ama Ondu dohi ñw u kakini, Marta, Marta, e̩wñ ki awʼe̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼe̩ chʼakanya ugbo-wñ chewewe;
ama e̩wñ okate oñ eku-wñ aku; Me̩ri la mʼukpe̩ e-ki nyo̩ du me̩, ma ñʼadʼe-le̩ kwobʼo̩ te̩ n.
Tak i leatʼabu kʼi dʼugboʼka achadua, oñ e̩gba kʼi che kpa e̩ne̩ʼka ef amako̩che̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, ko̩ wa adua eche, dabalu ku Jo̩n la ko̩ amako̩che̩ e-wñ.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba du ku me̩ chadua, me̩ ka kakini:
E̩ ki kʼuje̩wñ ki chʼukpe̩-wu ñw a o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa.
E̩ ki la tʼadure-wa no̩ ñw a; todu awa onugo la ato̩no̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du kʼi jʼuwa o̩me̩. E̩ ki ne̩ wa nyʼef ajama n.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼef ume̩ kʼi nʼonuku kʼi anyʼugbo-wñ iñaliña odu aka kakini, Onuku, fʼakala me̩ta me̩ ñwu mi;
todabu kʼonuku-miʼka kwo ule̩ wʼugbo mi, u la nʼe̩wñ kʼu nadʼu gu o̩gba-wñ kʼi je̩ n;
tak e̩ne̩ le̩ adohi kwʼejefu kakini, E̩ ki che mi akanya n; o̩na che̩re me̩, abimo̩lo̩-mi jʼugbo mi oj ate̩; u neke kwane̩ kʼu kʼo ñw e̩ n?
Naka ñwu me̩ kakini, I ma chaka chʼe-onuku-wñ adʼu kwane̩ kʼi ko ñw u n, tod ebi o̩lafi kʼi abi i la akwane̩ kʼi kʼo ñw u alu du kʼi nʼeku-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ omi aka ñwu me̩-i kakini, Me̩ nabi taku ma adʼu ñwu me̩; me̩ feju taku me̩ ali; me̩ do̩wo̩ko̩na taku ma abi o̩na ñwu me̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ du ki abi, agba; e̩ne̩ ki la afeju, ali; oñ e̩ne̩ ki ado̩wo̩ko̩na, ma abi o̩na ñw u.
E̩ne̩ dʼef ume̩ ki chʼata o̩ma, kʼo̩ma-wñ abiʼu akala, kʼi adʼokuta ñw u? abe̩k e̩ja, kʼi adʼejo ñw u koji e̩ja?
abe̩k kʼi la abi e̩ge̩ fa, i adʼakpe ñw u?
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼame̩ ku me̩ chʼame̩ne̩bibi chema alu ku me̩ adʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ che amo̩ma-me̩ ele, onu monu oñ Ata ki dʼefojale adʼAfu Kiafo̩ che abo ku ma bi owñ ele tule taa?
Tak i do̩mo̩ anʼebili kʼi chʼajalu dufu. Oñ i leatu abu kʼebili le̩ kwodufu ajalu le̩ kwoko̩la; tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ kwoyaye.
Ama iche̩ka ef uma kakini, Bee̩lze̩bul ki chʼagboji amebili le̩ oñ i adu nʼamebili dufu.
Abomune̩ ojoji feju ujiwe kʼi kwʼefojale ugbo-wñ ku ma jʼowñ ma.
Ama abu kʼi chema ibe ki dʼef uma, i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ojane̩ du ki mudareji ku ma chagwunyu o̩la-ma adʼalache̩; oñ unyi alo̩ bʼunyi ma.
I la che̩wñ ku Setan mudareji kʼi la chagwunyu o̩la-wñ, abʼojane̩-wñ ale kʼi adago? todabu ku me̩ ka kʼu ne̩ Bee̩lze̩bul anʼamebili dufu.
I la che̩wñ kʼomi ane Bee̩lze̩bul anʼamebili dufu, e̩ne̩ oñ amo̩ma-me̩ ne̩ ane ma dufu ke? tod e-kide̩ ama chʼabo ku ma akajo̩ me̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼu ne̩ o̩mo̩wo̩ O̩jo̩ anʼamebili dufu, mak o̩da ojane̩ O̩jo̩ lewa bʼume̩ rume̩.
E̩gba du kʼe̩nugbiti fʼo̩logu ji chaka adide anuku e-wñ, idu-wñ ajʼo̩mo̩ o̩lafia;
ama e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi gbiti tʼowñ le lewa bʼo ma, kʼi la fʼu du, i akʼe̩wñ ogu chaka kʼi ke̩do̩no le̩, tak i akʼane̩ ogu le̩ kpe̩.
E̩ne̩ ki ma chʼe̩ne̩-mi n chʼe̩nagwunyu mi; e̩ne̩ ki ma la bʼumi yajo̩ n, afuyagada de̩.
E̩gba du kʼafu ki ma de̩hiolo n kwʼef one̩ dufu, i atʼale ugbo kʼi chʼe̩gbe̩ afeju uñmi, oñ abu kʼi ma li n, i akakini, Nadakubi tef unyi-mi ugbo kʼu kwo dufu le̩.
Tak abu kʼi lewa i ali ane̩ le̩ kʼi che̩gbate̩, e̩wñ du la jʼuña-wñ.
E̩gbale̩ i anyʼakʼamafu mebie omune̩ ojoji ku ma chʼe̩ne̩bibi tʼowñ onugo le wa; taku ma mugudu adodo o̩mo̩; tak alu kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ de̩ ubiane̩ abie̩ne̩ tʼalu kʼi de̩ ejodudu le.
Oñ i leatu abu kʼi nʼo̩la le̩ aka, onobule̩ʼka ef o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ domudago ka ñw u kakini, Efu onobule̩ ki fʼuwe̩ bi kpai e̩nya e̩ne̩ kʼe̩ ñmo̩ gbede!
Ama i kakini, Abo ku ma gbo̩ O̩la O̩jo̩ ku ma laño̩ fʼu de nʼegbede tule.
Oñ abu kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ wa jeju nyʼo o̩la, i chane̩ eka kakini, Abo o̩gba kide̩ chʼo̩gba bibi; ma feju ujiwe; ma la adʼujiwe du ñwu ma n, chai ujiwe Jona.
Todu alu ku Jona mud ujiwe ñw abo Nine̩fa, abe̩le̩ O̩ma One̩ ade̩ ñw abo o̩gba kide̩ ge̩.

Onu onobule̩ e-o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ le̩ akwane̩ manyʼaboke̩le̩ o̩gba kide̩ ef ajo̩ oñ i akpa ma abi; todabu kʼowñ kwʼukade ane̩-ile̩-i wa kʼi gbo̩ ofili So̩lo̩mo̩n; me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ ki tu So̩lo̩mo̩n le la dʼemi.
Aboke̩le̩ Nine̩fa le̩ akwane̩ kpai abo o̩gba-i ef ajo̩, oñ ma akpa ma abi; todabu ku ma rʼibe da tod akoya ku Jona ta; me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ ki tu Jona le la dʼemi.
I nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼuna tʼagege tak i adʼu gugu ef akpo n, i la adʼu tʼofe e̩wñ uñwo̩ka n, chai oji akete, todu kʼabo du ku ma guduwʼo̩mo̩ ki li ugane̩ le̩.
Agege año̩la-we̩ chʼeju: e̩gba du kʼeju-we̩ kadʼugboʼkate, o̩gbo̩ año̩la-we̩ du chʼugane̩; ama e̩gba kʼi chʼebili, mak ano̩la-we̩ du chʼe̩chubi.
Todule̩ e̩ nafejutʼo̩ tode̩gba kʼugane̩ ki dʼef uwe̩ achʼe̩chubi.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼo̩gbo̩ año̩la-we̩ du chʼugane̩, kʼi ma nʼe̩chubi ugbo kate n, mak o̩gbo̩-wñ du achʼugane̩, dabalu ki de̩ e̩gba du kʼagege agane̩ chaa ñw e̩.
Oñ abu kʼi nʼo̩la-i aka, Farisiʼka tʼowñ ene kʼi wa kpucho̩ ugbo-wñ: oñ i mugudu tʼejefu guane̩ kʼi jʼe̩wñ.
Oñ abu ku Farisi le̩ li abu kʼi ma dʼo̩la-wñ tunyʼomi o̩gba tak i kpucho̩ n aye-wñ je̩ ñw u n.
Tak Ondu ka ñw u kakini, Fai, ame̩ ku me̩ chʼamaFarisi nagwʼejo̩do̩da ago kpʼugba; ejefu-me̩ muda che̩ko̩ tiili ñw e̩wñ edinya kpai e̩wñ bibi.
Ame̩ ame̩nidada! I chʼe̩ne̩ ki che ejo̩do̩da che ejefu kpo̩fo̩ n?
Ama me̩ ki kʼe̩wñ ki jʼejefu che ele ejumomi, taku me̩ go ka kʼe̩wñ du de̩hiolo ñwu me̩.

Ama atogwo ñwu me̩, amaFarisi! Todabu ku me̩ fʼache̩fa kpai riu kpai e̩wñ oko egini kwe̩ kwe̩ kwe̩ du kpe̩ me̩gwa ku me̩ dʼukpe̩ʼka tef unyi O̩jo̩, ama ajo̩ eka tʼo̩kpakpa, kpʼufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩, me̩ lale gudu ofo: i ma dukpe̩ ku me̩ che e̩wñ-i tila, ku me̩ la we etʼe̩wñ kibo̩ le̩ no̩ tinyo̩.
Atogwo ñw ame̩, amaFarisi! todabu ku me̩ fe̩do̩ ugugu ojima ef unyi ujeju kpai ugwa efaja.
Atogwo ki chʼe-me̩! todabu ku me̩ dab oji e-kʼeju one̩ ma li n kʼamone̩ ku ma le oji-wñ la ma n.
Oñ amʼoli o̩lo̩daʼka dohi ñw u kakini, Akone̩wñ, e-kʼe̩ ka le̩, e̩ ño̩ fʼawa bie̩ kpo̩fo̩.
Tak i kakini, Atogwo ki chʼe-me̩ ku me̩ chʼamamʼoli o̩lo̩da ge̩! todabu ku me̩ kʼadu o̩bata e-kʼiñmi-wñ ma wo̩ kʼi ane̩ n nʼone̩ oji, ame̩ onugo la adʼo̩mo̩wo̩ʼka chʼadu-o̩bata-i n.
Atogwo ñwu me̩! Todabu ku me̩ jʼako̩ ache̩ku amakache̩, kʼamata-me̩ fʼuma kpa.
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ chʼame̩nibenu-wñ, me̩ laño̩ je̩nyu uko̩lo̩ kʼamata-me̩ che le̩: todabu kʼama fʼuma kpa, oñ ame̩ la ako̩ ache̩ku-ma.
Tod e-kide̩ ofili O̩jo̩ ño̩ kakini, Nakpʼamakache̩ kpʼame̩nukpuche̩ nyʼugbo ma; taku ma akpa abo iche̩ka efu-ma, ma la adoli abo iche̩kibo̩;
todu kʼama ki feju e̩bie̩ amakache̩ chaka ku ma dudalʼo akwe̩gba ku ma kpʼe̩re̩ ile̩-i, ugbo abo o̩gba kide̩.
Owñ chʼakwo e̩bie̩ Ebe̩l gbogbo tʼe̩bie̩ Zekaraya kʼoji-wñ lenyo̩ agbagba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpʼunyi-i; ochochi, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ma afeju-wñ ugbo abo o̩gba kide̩.
Atogwo ki chʼe-me̩, amam oli-o̩lo̩da! todabu kʼame̩ mʼigede uma-e̩wñ du: ame̩ onugo la gudu tʼejefu n, oñ me̩ fʼo̩na kpanyʼabo ku ma jʼagudu.
Tak abu kʼi kwʼo̩mo̩ alo amako̩takada kpai amaFarisi chane̩ ekegidi bʼo̩ nana; oñ ma tʼo̩wo̩ nyʼu efu una una kʼi ko̩la e̩wñ wewe;
ma dide-wñ ku ma mu e̩wñʼka nyʼu alu.

Agbagba le̩, abu kʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ wewe wa jʼugbokate ku ma chane̩ edʼe̩re̩ do omune̩, i chane̩ eka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ ejodudu kakini, Ame̩ ki mʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩ ugbo o̩jo̩wu amaFarisi kʼi chʼayechi.
I nʼe̩wñ du ku ma kʼe̩wñ bʼo ma ku ma ma abi rʼeju ni n, kpʼe̩wñ kʼi maja ku ma ma ama ni n.
E̩wñ du ku me̩ ka ef e̩chubi le̩, ma agbo̩ ef ugane̩; oñ e̩wñ ku me̩ ko̩la nyʼone̩ eti ef unyi eje-fu, ma atakoya-wñ ojokunyi.
Oñ naka ñw me̩ ku me̩ chʼamonuku-mi, kakini, Me̩ ki railo abo ku ma kpa año̩la ofo n, ku ma ma ne̩ e̩wñ du ku ma neke che tʼe-le̩ le n.
U muda ajuka ñw me̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma arailo-wñ; me̩ ki railo e̩ne̩ kʼi akpa kʼi ño̩ nʼo̩da edurikpolo tef una uña ubie̩; ochochi, naka ñw me̩, me̩ narailo e̩ne̩ le̩.
Ma ta amicho̩lo̩ me̩lu iko̩bo̩ meji n? okate ef uma alʼO̩jo̩ eju n.
I chaka chʼiloji oji-me̩ i chenʼaluka chaka. Me̩ ki railo n: ame̩ nʼaja tʼamicho̩lo̩ wewe le̩.
Oñ naka ñw me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki agbalu mi eju amone̩. O̩ma One̩ ñʼagbalu e̩ne̩ le̩ eju amonuche̩ O̩jo̩.
E̩ne̩ ki muda fʼaire̩-mi re̩ eju amone̩, ma arʼaire̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ eju amonuche̩ O̩jo̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi la fʼo̩laʼka ka nyʼO̩ma One̩, ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u; ama e̩ne̩ ki muda achakpabie̩ Afu Kiafo̩ ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u n.
Oñ e̩gba du ku ma ko me̩ wʼo̩gba abʼunyi ujeju kpʼamagboji kpʼabo̩da, me̩ ki dejiji alu ku me̩ ale ku me̩ adohi n, abe̩k e̩wñ ku me̩ aka n:
todu Afu Kiafo̩ ako̩ me̩ e̩wñ ki dukpe̩ ku me̩ ka iko le̩ kpakpa.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka ef o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Akone̩wñ, ka ñw o̩maye-mi kʼi fʼe̩wñ-ogu kpe̩ kpʼomi.
Jisusi muda ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ one̩-i, e̩ne̩ dʼumi chʼakajo̩ abe̩k onu e̩wñ-e̩kpe̩ ugbo me̩?
Tak i ka ñw ma kakini, Me̩ nago, me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ de ugbo ejufufu du: todu i chʼef idu-one̩ kʼi chʼololo oñ iñmi-wñ de̩ n.
Oñ i fʼita kpa ñw ma kakini, Ane̩ uche̩ ananaʼka rʼo̩je̩ ñw u:
tak i kpʼibe kakini, E̩wñ nache, todabu kʼu ma ne̩ ugbo kʼu nakʼe̩ro e̩wñ oko-mi jo̩ n?
Tak i kakini, E̩wñ kʼu nache de̩: nachi akami wane̩, kʼu naro̩ e-ki tʼe-i le; oñ nakʼo̩ka-mi kpʼe̩wñ-mi ki nyo̩ chaka jʼo̩mo̩.
Taku naka ñw onugo-mi kakini, Onugo-mi, e̩ che̩nʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ nana kʼe̩ ko jo̩ anede o̩do̩ wewe; ñmi ke, je̩ ke, ñmo̩ ke, gwoguyo̩ ke.
O̩jo̩ muda ka ñw u kakini, E̩nidada-i! odu eñini-i ma tene onugo-we̩ ugbo we̩, e̩wñ kʼe̩ la ñwo̩che jo̩, e̩ne̩ ane̩ ge̩?
Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ ki afe̩do̩ e̩wñ akoko tane̩ ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi ma la chʼanana ñw O̩jo̩ n de̩.
Tak i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, Lef e-kide̩ naka ñwu me̩, kakini, Me̩ ki dejiji tod oji-me̩ n, e̩wñ ku me̩ aje̩ n; kpʼaño̩la-me̩, e̩wñ ku me̩ adu tʼo̩ n.
Todu oji one̩ tʼuje̩wñ le, año̩la la tʼe̩wñ ku ma du tʼo̩ le.
Me̩ ki dibetʼamo̩tagalama, ka ku ma gbe̩ e̩wñ n, ma la ko wʼunyi n; ma nʼakpata kpʼaka ugbo ku ma ko e̩wñ jo̩ n; O̩jo̩ la dʼe̩wñ ñwu ma je̩ kpo̩; onumonu oñ me̩ chʼeku tʼame̩we̩ le taa?
Oñ e̩ne̩ dʼef ume̩ kʼi adejiji-i kʼi aneke mʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka du nʼo̩gba-wñ?
Todule̩ iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma la neke che e̩wñ ki nya le̩ n, e̩wñ chi ku me̩ dejiji e̩wñ ki bo̩?
Me̩ dibetʼododo oko le̩, alu kʼo̩la-wñ aya; ma chʼakanya e̩wñ n, ma la chʼowu n; u muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Tu So̩lo̩mo̩n ef ojima-wñ du nʼe̩wñ kʼi ko nyʼo̩la dab oka ef abʼe-i n.
I muda che̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ kʼe̩wñ abe̩le̩ nyʼo̩la egbe oko e-kʼi do̩mo̩ eñini, ku ma la ko rikpolo tef igbeli o̩na; onumonu e-kʼi ako nyʼame̩ o̩la atule taa ame̩ abe̩do̩-ekono re-i!
Me̩ ki feju e̩wñ ku me̩ aje̩ kpʼe̩wñ ku me̩ añmo̩ n; ibe-me̩ ki la chʼeji eji n.
Todu abo uche̩ichi ile̩-i jʼatejane̩ e̩wñ le̩ du; Ata-me̩ chema ka kʼeku e̩wñ-i aku me̩.
Ama ame̩ ki feju ojane̩ e-wñ, taku ma akʼe̩wñ-i manyʼu ñwu me̩ kpo̩fo̩.
Me̩ ki railo n, ame̩ ujo̩ amala ree, todabu kʼi cherʼAta-me̩ e̩do̩ kʼi dʼojane̩ le̩ ñwu me̩.

Me̩ kʼane̩-me̩ ta, ku me̩ kʼo chʼele ejumomi; me̩ nachʼalita ki ma jʼagbo n ñw o̩la-me̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ akoko ki ma atakpa rʼo̩wo̩ n efojale, ugbo kʼajoji du ma te̩me̩ru n, kʼojudu ma la akʼo chile̩che̩ n.
Todu ugbo kʼe̩wñ akoko-me̩ de̩, o̩mo̩ oñ e̩do̩-me̩ ñʼade̩ ge̩.
E̩wñ ki nalʼume̩ ago de, una ki tʼagege-me̩,
ku me̩ jo̩ dab amone̩ ku ma aneju odu-ma kʼi doji kwʼoko uje̩wñ iyawo, todu kʼe̩gba kʼi lewa kʼi la ado̩woko̩na, ma abi ñw u ababa.
Amadu kʼodu-ma lewa ali abu ku ma jʼagwe̩ke̩ adide gbede; ami naka ñwu me̩, ka kʼowñ adʼe̩wñ lʼago o̩la-wñ de, oñ i aje̩ ñwu ma chekukane̩ ku ma jʼe̩wñ, i la awʼugbo ma i ache e̩wñ ñwu ma.
I la che̩wñ kʼi lewa ef ide ekeji abe̩k ef e-e̩ke̩ta, kʼi la fʼuma li abe̩le̩, abo le̩ gbede.
Ama me̩ ki fʼu ma kakini, E̩ne̩fe̩nyi le̩ ma ma auwa e̩gba kʼajoji awa i ma gwe̩ke̩ adide, i ma la je̩ ñwu ma fʼo̩do̩ unyi-wñ gwagudu n.
Ame̩ ki ño̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ mu jo̩, todu iko kʼone̩ ma do̩ kʼO̩ma One̩ awa n, iko le̩ i awa.
Oñ Pita kakini, Ondu, e̩ kpʼita kide̩ ñw awa, abe̩k e̩ne̩ du oñ e̩ kpa ñw u?
Tak Ondu kakini, E̩ne̩ chʼadigede kʼi achubi odu-wñ kʼi ño̩ chenʼibe kʼodu-wñ akʼabunyi-wñ nyʼu o̩wo̩ kʼi mʼukpe̩ uje̩wñ-ma ko ñwu ma iko-wñ taa?
Adu kʼodu-wñ awa li kʼi achʼabe̩le̩ gbede.
Ochochi, naka ñw me̩ kakini, Owñ akʼe̩wñ du ki ne̩ nyʼu o̩wo̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼadu kide̩ ka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, Odu-mi akpo̩kpe̩ ewa, tak i chane̩ egwo abimo̩to̩-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩, kʼi chane̩ eje̩ kpʼeñmo̩ kʼo̩te̩ la fʼu mu,
odu adu le̩ awa o̩jo̩ kʼi ma neju owñ n kpʼauwa kʼi ma ma n, tak i akʼo-wñ da meji, oñ i adʼukpe̩-wñ te̩ manyʼabo ku ma ma chubi odu-ma n.
Adu ki la ma e̩wñ ki dʼodu-wñ e̩do̩, kʼi ma la mo̩la tane̩ n, i la che alu ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ n, ma aja o̩me̩me̩le̩;
ama e̩ne̩ ki ma ma n, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ che bʼitali jo̩ ma aja ree. Ma la afeju e̩wñ nana ugbo e̩ne̩ du ku ma kʼe̩wñ ñw u nana, oñ e̩ne̩ ku ma kʼe̩wñ nana nyʼu o̩wo̩, ma atene ololo ugbo-wñ.
U wa kʼu fʼuna ro̩ bʼile̩ ma; iche̩wñ ku ma fʼu ko̩ me̩, e̩wñ ño̩ dʼumi e̩do̩ ge̩?
U chene̩ baptism oka ku ma ache mi, go alu kʼu chʼe̩kpama te̩ gbogbo tʼe̩gba ki fʼoji ne̩.
Ame̩ do̩ ka kʼure̩do̩ oñ u wa kʼu du tef ane̩-ile̩-i? Naka ñw me̩, O̩da; chai edaru.
Todu akwe̩gba-i one̩ me̩lu ajʼef unyiʼka ku ma daru bʼomune̩ te̩; e̩ta agwunyʼeji, eji la agwunyʼe̩ta.
Ma adaru, ata agwunyʼo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, o̩mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ la agwunyʼata-wñ; iye agwunyʼo̩ma-wñ onobule̩, o̩mʼonobule̩ la agwunyʼiye-wñ; iye-o̩ko̩ agwunyʼo̩yʼo̩ma-wñ, oñ o̩yʼo̩ma agwunyʼiye-o̩ko̩-wñ.
I ño̩ ka ñw o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ kakini, E̩gba du ku me̩ li kʼakpa achate̩gu o̩wo̩ o̩lane̩, ababale̩ me̩ kakini, Omi awa; oñ abe̩le̩ i ade̩.
Oñ e̩gba du ku me̩ li kʼafu aju kwʼo̩pata o̩gane̩ me̩ kakini, Ane̩ akpuna eñini; abe̩le̩ i la ade̩.
Ame̩, ame̩nayechi! Ame̩ chema alu ku me̩ añwa eju ane̩-ile̩-i kpʼefojale go; ama abile kʼame̩ ma ma alu ku me̩ añwa iko-i go n?
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ ma la ñwa e̩wñ ki chʼo̩kpakpa kpʼojika o̩la-me̩ n?

Todu abu kʼuwe̩ kpʼe̩no̩la-we̩ alo tʼo̩gba agboji, e̩ nache alu du kʼe̩ neke che kʼe̩ ñʼo̩la-we̩ kpʼowñ ru ej o̩na le̩, tode̩gba kʼi afʼuwe̩ nyʼugbo akajo̩, kʼakajo̩ le̩ la mʼe̩ du ñw idegeli tak idegeli le̩ mʼe̩ du rikpolo tef unyiuga.
Naka ñw e̩ kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼe̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu n gbogbo tak e̩ fʼo̩me̩-wñ ra tʼanini otitala.
Abo iche̩ka la jʼane̩ o̩mo̩ iko le̩ kpakpa ku ma fʼuka o̩la abo Galili je̩ ñw u, owñ chʼabo ku Pailat mʼe̩bie̩-ma du gwe̩gwanyʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩-ma.
Tak i dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ do̩ ka kʼabo Galili e-le̩ chʼame̩nadure tʼabo Galili du le, tod ukpe̩ ku ma li uwa abe̩le̩?
O̩da! naka ñwu me̩; ama iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma ribeda n, o̩chaka-me̩ alenyo̩ dab ama.
Abe̩k abo me̩gwe̩jo̩ kʼo̩do̩go̩ Sailoam wane̩ bʼuma ma kʼi fʼuma kpa le̩, ame̩ do̩ ka kʼo̩me̩ nʼuma oji tʼamone̩ du ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m le?
O̩da! naka ñwu me̩; ama iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma ribeda n, o̩chaka-me̩ alenyo̩ abe̩le̩.
Tak i fʼita kide̩ kpa kakini, E̩ne̩ ʼka nʼoli o̩gbaikolo e-kʼi gbe̩ ef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ; oñ i lewa feju e̩ro o̩la-wñ, i la li e-du n.
Tak i ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki adejutʼachiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ kakini, Go, o̩do̩ me̩ta kʼu tetawʼemi afeju e̩ro o̩la o̩gbaikolo-i de̩, u la li e-du n. Fʼu lo̩ wʼane̩; tod e̩wñ i la agbogili nʼane̩ te̩?
Oñ i dohi ñw u kakini, Odu-mi, e̩ tʼo̩ no̩ o̩do̩-i ta, gbogbo tak u fʼane̩ ofe-wñ nu, kʼu mʼechu ko nyʼu.
Ukani i aro ate̩to̩gba-i; i ma ro n, e̩ fʼu lo̩ wʼane̩.
Oñ i dʼef unyi ujejuʼka ako̩ ma e̩wñ o̩jo̩ uñmi.
Me̩ la go, onobule̩ ki nʼafu e̩gbo̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩ do̩mo̩; i la fʼu pu te̩; i la nʼukpahiu kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ te̩ dago nyo̩nyo̩ n.
Oñ abu ku Jisus fʼowñ li i nomudala adʼo̩, i ka ñw u kakini, Onobule̩, e̩gbo o̩la-we̩ tʼuwe̩ no̩ me̩.
Tak i mʼo̩wo̩-wñ ko nʼo, tak e̩re̩re̩le̩ i to̩ru tʼo̩kpakpa, tak i dojima ñw O̩jo̩.

Oñ abu ki bi agboji unyi ujeju le̩ eju nana todabu ku Jisus fʼo̩ga one̩ che o̩jo̩ uñmi, i dohi ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ me̩fa do̩mo̩ ki dukpe̩ ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩: todule̩ me̩ nawa o̩jo̩ me̩fa le̩ ku ma fʼo̩ga-me̩ che, kʼi la we echʼo̩jo̩ uñmi.
Ama Ondu dohi ñw u kakini, Ame̩ ame̩nayechi! e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ef ume̩ atʼiku okuno̩-wñ abe̩k oke̩ke̩te̩-wñ bʼakpati uje̩wñ te̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi kʼi ne̩ nyʼañmʼomiofo n?
Oñ i ma dukpe̩ ku ma mʼiku onobule̩ kʼi chʼo̩ma Ebraham ku Setan fʼu ji te̩ o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩-i tu o̩jo̩ uñmi n?
Oñ abu kʼi nʼe̩wñ-i aka anyo̩ fʼabo du ku ma ko bʼo̩ mu. Tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ chaka kwoyo̩ noj e̩wñ ojima du ki wache ugbo-wñ.
Todule̩ i kakini, E̩wñ ojane̩ O̩jo̩ biʼu? Oñ e̩wñ nadu wawe-wñ?
I chebi e̩yo̩ mustadi oka, e-kʼone̩ mʼu duro̩ tef uche̩-wñ; oñ i fʼiga tak i gba mud oli, oñ ame̩we̩ ojale kworu jʼe̩to̩-wñ.
I ño̩ dabi kakini, E̩wñ nadʼojane̩ e-O̩jo̩ wawe-wñ taa?
I chebi o̩jo̩wu kʼonobule̩ mʼu du maja ef omu e̩ñwa me̩ta, gbogbo tak o̩gbo̩-wñ du mud o̩jo̩wu.
Tak i kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩-wñ ale gu ef ewo kpai adogbe du, i nʼe̩wñ ako̩ ma, oñ i nʼule̩-wñ alo tu Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, abo ku ma ajadu ma de̩ ke̩e̩? Oñ i kañwu ma kakini,
Me̩ ki fejugbiti ku me̩ mugudu lef alugbo̩na fiili le̩; todu amone̩ wewe afeju ku ma agudu lʼo̩mo̩, iñmi-ma muda awo̩ n, omi aka-i.
E̩gba kʼe̩ne̩fe̩nyi kwane̩ kʼi la fʼo̩na re, kʼame̩ chane̩ edago jʼo̩do̩da, ku me̩ do̩wo̩kʼo̩na, kakini, Ondu, mʼu bi ñw a; tak i adohi ñwu me̩ kakini, U ma me̩ ugbo ku me̩ kwowa-i n;
e̩gbale̩ me̩ achane̩ eka kakini, A je̩, a la ñmo̩ eju-we̩, e̩ laño̩ ko̩ amone̩ e̩wñ ej o̩na-wa;
tak I akakini, Naka ñwu me̩ ka kʼu ma ugbo ku me̩ kwo wa-i n; me̩ te̩ nyʼubi bʼumi te̩ o̩chaka me̩ ku me̩ chʼamachuko̩lo̩ uji.
O̩mo̩ aku ero̩ kpai enyi elo ade̩, e̩gba ku me̩ fʼEbraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Jeko̩b kpʼamakache̩ chaka li ojane̩ e-O̩jo̩, kʼame̩ la che̩rikpolo jʼo̩do̩da.
Amone̩ le̩ akwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu kpʼo̩wo̩ olane̩ kpai kwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ kpʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ wa, oñ ma achekukane̩ ef ojane̩ e-O̩jo̩.
Me̩ la go, abo ubi do̩mo̩ ku ma achʼabo ejodudu, oñ abo ejodudu do̩mo̩ ku ma achʼabo ubi.
AmaFarisi iche̩ka kwodufu wʼugbo owñ auwa le̩ gbage̩de̩, ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩ kwʼemi alo: todabu ki du He̩ro̩d e̩do̩ kʼi adʼe̩ kpa.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ lo ku me̩ ka ñw ajo le̩ kakini, Go, nanʼebili dufu, naño̩ chʼo̩ga one̩ eñini kpai ona, tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ namufu kpa.
I muda dukpe̩ kʼu nanule̩-mi ale eñini kpʼo̩na kpʼo̩jo̩ ki ro̩nʼe-le̩ tila; todabu ki ma nʼugbo du kʼakache̩ʼka ki lenyo̩ ej o̩do̩da Je̩rusale̩m in.

O, Je̩rusale̩m, Je̩rusale̩m, e-kʼi akʼamakache̩ kpa-i, kʼi la nʼokuta aro̩ dʼabo ku ma kpuche̩ nyʼugbo-wñ! E̩re̩ onumonu i dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu fʼamo̩ma-we̩ ko wa jʼugbo kate alu kʼolajuwe̩ akʼamo̩ma-wñ nyʼef ika-wñ, oñ i ma dʼume̩ e̩do̩ n!
Go, ma tʼunyi-me̩ no̩ ñwu me̩ me̩; u la aka ñwu me̩-i kakini, I nʼugbo du ku me̩ li mi n, gbogbo tʼe̩gba ku me̩ akakini, Ekele ma kele E̩ne̩ kʼi awa ef odu Ondu.
Tak ileatʼabu kʼi alo tef unyi agboji amaFarisiʼka o̩jo̩ uñmi kʼi jʼuje̩wñ, ma la jo̩ afʼeju mʼowñ ne̩.
Me̩ la go, e̩no̩ga uñwefuʼka do̩mo̩ o̩gba-wñ.
Taku Jisus tohi oñ i ka ñw abo ku ma mʼoli-o̩lo̩da kpʼamaFarisi le̩, kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñwu ma chʼo̩ga one̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi?
Oñ ma chechi jo̩. Tak i gwo̩nyʼu, i fʼo̩ga-wñ che, oñ i tʼo̩ no̩ kʼi lo-wñ.
Oñ i ño̩ tohi, i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼefu me̩ kʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ abe̩k okuno̩-wñ añwa tef obuga, kʼi ma la afa dufu ababa o̩jo̩ uñmi n?
Oñ iñmi-ma wʼohi o̩la e̩wñ le̩ ku ma du ñw u n.
Oñ i fʼita kpa ñw abo ku ma do̩ ma wa, abu kʼibe-wñ tʼalu ku ma chi ugugu e-ojima; i ka ñwu ma kakini,
E̩gba du kʼone̩ do̩ we̩ nyʼugbo uje̩wñ iyawo, e̩ ki che̩kukane̩ uña o̩gba n, tode̩gba kʼi adʼe̩ne̩ kʼi nʼojima tʼuwe̩ le wa,
tak e̩ne̩ ki do̩ uwe̩ kpʼowñ lewa kʼi aka ñw e̩ kakini, Kwobʼuña te̩ ñw e̩ne̩-i, e̩gbale̩ tak uwe̩ achane̩ abʼuña e-ubi otitala ma kpai anyo̩.

Ama e̩gba du ku ma dʼe̩, lo kʼe̩ guane̩ uña e-ubi otitala: todu kʼe̩gba du kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi do̩ we̩ wa lewa, i nʼugbo kʼi aka ñw e̩ kakini, Onuku, te̩ nyʼo̩gba ate̩ emi; e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ anʼojima eju abo du ku ma che̩kukane̩ ajʼe̩wñ kpai uwe̩.
Todu, e̩ne̩ du kʼi hi o̩la-wñ ne, ma afʼo̩ wane̩; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi ahi o̩la-wñ wane̩, ma ahi u ne.

Oñ i ño̩ ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki dʼo̩ wa le̩ kakini, E̩gba kʼe̩ hi o̩je̩ ñwu ma, abe̩k e̩ kʼe̩wñ ñw one̩ kʼi kpucho̩, e̩ ki do̩ amonuku-we̩ kpʼamo̩maye-we̩ kpʼamefu-we̩ kpʼamekeji-we̩ ku ma chʼamanana n, tode̩gba ku ma dabi do̩ we̩ koji, kʼe-le̩ la amud akoji-wñ ñw e̩.
Ama e̩gba du kʼe̩ hi o̩je̩ ojo e̩ nado̩ ame̩nale kpʼamado̩wo̩ kpʼamachika kpʼamafeju wa,
tak uwe̩ agbede, todabu ku ma ma nʼe̩wñ ku ma du ñw e̩ koji n; ma adʼakoji-wñ ñw e̩ ef udajikwane̩ e-abo̩kpakpa.
Oñ abu kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef abo ki bʼo̩ chekukane̩ le̩ gbo̩ o̩la-i, i ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼi ajʼuje̩wñ ef ojane̩ e-O̩jo̩ agbede!
Oñ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka fʼo̩je̩ ojo lile hi, tak i fʼamone̩ wewe do̩ wa;
oñ i fʼadu-wñ kpuche̩ iko ku ma je̩ o̩je̩ ojo le̩ kʼi ka ñw abo kʼi do̩ ma wa le̩ kakini, Me̩ lewa; todabu kʼu fʼe̩wñ du che jʼane̩ me̩.
Tak o̩chaka-ma nʼalu kate, ma chane̩ ekʼudʼumi o̩la. E-ejodudu ka ñw u kakini, U fʼane̩ uche̩ʼka la, oñ i dukpe̩ kʼu nyʼagʼo; agba, e̩ tʼo̩wo̩ no̩ ñwu mi.
Tak e̩nekeji kakini, U fʼamo̩ko̩ okuno̩ eji dama eji dama ugbo me̩lu la, nanyʼañwa ma go; agba, e̩ tʼo̩wo̩ no̩ ñwu mi.
Tak e̩nomune̩ ojoji kakini, U fʼo̩ya tito̩ ne̩, tod e-kide̩ u neke wa n.

Tak adu le̩ lewa mʼe̩wñ-i duka ñw odu-wñ. E̩gbale̩ e̩ne̩fe̩nyi le̩ we̩do̩ i ka ñw adu-wñ kakini, E̩ nadufu nyʼojukpologu kpai o̩kpa o̩kpa o̩na ewo-i piopio kʼe̩ mʼame̩nale kpʼamado̩wo̩ kpʼamade̩re̩ kpʼamafeju kpʼamachika ko wʼejefu emi.
Tak adu le̩ kakini, E̩wñ kʼe̩ ñwa ñwu mi le̩, u che me̩, uña muda bo̩ ta.
Tak odu-wñ ka ñw adu le̩ kakini, E̩ dufu nyʼojikpadala kpʼugbo o̩gba o̩gba, kʼe̩ kute̩ ma ku ma lewa, todu kʼunyi-mi ki ko̩ ñw one̩.
Todu naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du ef aboke̩le̩ kʼu do̩ wa le̩ ahi alu mʼuje̩wñ ojo-mi n.
O̩wo̩ amone̩ wewe la kpe̩re̩ kpʼowñ; oñ i murida i ka ñwu ma kakini,
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du awʼugbo mi, kʼi ma la nʼulaka ata-wñ onugo kpʼiye-wñ kpʼo̩ya-wñ kpʼamo̩ma-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼe-onobule̩ kpʼonugo o̩la-wñ ache n ge̩, i neke chʼako̩che̩-mi n.
E̩ne̩ du ki che kʼi ma ne̩ oli-uku e-o̩la-wñ, kʼi ma la ne̩ awa ubi-mi n, i neke chʼako̩che̩-mi n.
Todu e̩ne̩ dʼefu me̩, kʼi dʼe̩ e̩do̩ kʼi ako̩ o̩do̩go̩, kʼi ma la fʼokuta-wñ re alu o̩ko̩-wñ ejodudu n abe̩k e-kʼi ne̩ abo̩jo̩ nyane̩?
Tode̩gba kʼi mʼe̩re̩-wñ du nyane̩ kʼiñmi-wñ ma wo̩ eche kpoji n, oñ o̩chaka amone̩ ku ma li u chane̩ echʼo uke̩,
kakini, E̩ne̩-i chane̩ ekʼunyi, tak iñmi-wñ ma wo̩ kʼi ache kpoji n.

Abe̩k e̩ne̩ chʼonu kʼi alo kʼi kʼo̩wo̩ de kpʼonu ekeji ef ogu, kʼi ma aguguane̩ ejodudu kʼi fʼu lo abe̩k owñ kʼi nʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo me̩gwa anʼukpahiu kʼi de kpʼe̩ne̩ kʼi nʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogu kʼi awa abʼowñ ma le̩ n?
Iñmi-wñ ma wo̩ n abu kʼe̩ne̩ ekeji le̩ chejiji rʼu ta, i akpʼabogijo uche̩ natene e̩wñ kʼi adu hi o̩ iñmi wane̩ kʼure̩do̩ ki de̩.
Abe̩le̩ ge̩, e̩ne̩ du efu-me̩, kʼi ma la kʼe̩wñ du kʼi ne̩ jane̩ n, i neke chʼako̩che̩-mi n.
Omu la chʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩: ama iche̩wñ kʼomu mud o̩gbo̩, e̩wñ ma adu tʼo̩ kʼi ñʼarinyo̩ ge̩?
I la chʼeju ane̩ n i anyo̩ ojeita n; erikpolo ma du rikpolo tʼo̩do̩da. E̩ne̩ ki nʼeti kʼi agbo̩la, kʼi nagbo̩.
Oñ amagbo̩kane̩ kpai ame̩nadure chaka nato̩la mʼowñ ku ma gbʼo̩la-wñ.
AmaFarisi kpʼamako̩takada nakeñmini kakini, E̩ne̩-i ayo̩ ñw ame̩nadure, i la ajʼe̩wñ kpʼama.
Tak i fʼita kide̩ kpa ñwu ma kakini,
E̩ne̩ dʼefu-me̩ kʼi nʼamala ogume̩lu kʼoka-wñ lenyo̩, kʼi ma la tʼo̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ nyoke me̩gwe̩la no̩ jʼef aje̩tachi, kʼi la kadʼe-kʼi lenyo̩ le̩ ubi gbogbo tak i li n?
Oñ e̩gba kʼi fʼu li, i mʼu du nʼika-wñ ayo̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi lewʼunyi, i adʼamonuku-wñ kpai amekeji-wñ jo̩, kʼi aka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nabʼumi yo̩ todabu kʼu fʼala-mi kʼi lenyo̩ le̩ li.
Naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Abe̩le̩ uyo̩ ade̩ efojale noj e̩nadureʼka kʼi ribeda, tʼe-kʼi de̩ noj ame̩no̩kpakpa o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ nyoke me̩gwe̩la kʼeku ibe-erida ma ku ma n le.
Abe̩k e̩ne̩ chʼonobule̩ kʼi nʼajifa me̩gwa, kʼoka-wñ kwotinyo̩, kʼi ma la dʼuna tʼagege, kʼi fʼane̩ ef unyi gba kʼi ñʼafʼeju de̩kpa afeju gbogbo tak i li n?
Tak e̩gba kʼi fʼu li i adʼamonuku-wñ kpʼamekeji-wñ wajo̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nabʼumi yo̩ todabu kʼu fʼajifa ki lenyo̩ le̩ li me̩.
Abe̩le̩, naka ñwu me̩, uyo̩ awate̩ eju amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ noj e̩nadureʼka kʼi aribeda.
Tak i kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka nʼamo̩ma okolobia meji.
Oñ e-imo̩to̩ efu ma ka ñw ata-wñ kakini, Ata-mi, bʼane̩-we̩ e-ki chʼukpe̩ kʼu naje̩ ñwu mi. Tak i fʼe̩wñ-udiñmino-wñ kpe̩ ñwu ma.
Tak i ma nenʼo̩jo̩ wewe n, oñ o̩ma e-imo̩to̩ le̩ fʼo̩chaka ane̩-wñ ño̩ le tʼane̩ o̩najiji, oñ i gugu o̩mo̩ achʼofubo̩, i mʼane̩-wñ ko chihi rinyo̩.
Oñ abu kʼi mʼane̩-wñ chaka ko kpabie̩ kpa ukpo̩ta lile bʼane̩ le̩ ma; oñ eku-e̩wñ chane̩ ekʼu.
Tak i le nafʼo̩la mʼabo ane̩ le̩ʼka o̩la, oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ fʼowñ kpe̩ tʼoko-wñ kʼi kʼe̩wñ ñw amoko je̩.
Tak e̩ño̩ e̩ro-oli kʼamoko aje̩ kwochʼo kʼefu-wñ ki ko̩; i la nʼe̩ne̩ du ki du ñw u n.
Ama abu kʼeju-wñ lewane̩ i kakini, Abuko̩lo̩ ata-mi kʼi aro̩me̩ ñwu ma ku ma nʼuje̩wñ ki ku ma bo̩, one̩ onu ma che ta? Omi la dʼemi alenyo̩ ñw ebi!
Nakwane̩ anyʼugbo ata-mi kʼu naka ñw u kakini, Ata-mi, u fʼefojale dure kpai eju-we̩;
u nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ ku ma ño̩ do̩ mi kʼo̩ma-we̩ ge̩ n. E̩ du mi che dab e̩ne̩ʼka ef abo kʼuwe̩ aro̩me̩ ñwu ma-i.
Tak i kwane̩, oñ i lewʼugbo ata-wñ. Ama abu kʼi dʼo̩najiji ta, ata-wñ fʼu li, ejumomi-wñ la je̩ ñw u n, oñ i fule wa anʼo̩lo̩-wñ, i la dʼalu kʼo̩ alu ño̩ dʼalu kʼo̩ alu-wñ.
Tak o̩ma le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Ata-mi, u fʼefojale dure kpai eju-we̩, u nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ ku ma ño̩ do̩ mi kʼo̩ma-we̩ ge̩ n.
Ata le̩ muda ka ñw amadu-wñ kakini, Me̩ mʼotogbo e-ki nyo̩ tʼuma le le̩ du dufu wa piopio ku me̩ du tʼo̩la-wñ ku me̩ ki la dʼelika tʼunyʼu o̩wo̩ kpai e̩da tunyʼu e̩re̩.
Taku me̩ mʼo̩mokuno̩ e-ki yoyo le̩ duwa ku me̩ fʼu kpa, kʼa je̩ kʼa gwoguyo̩,
todu o̩ma-mi-i leku, i la dabi deju-i; i lenyo̩, ma laño̩ fʼu li me̩.
O̩ma-wñ e-ogijo la dʼoko, oñ abu kʼi me̩ru unyi awa, i gbo̩ eli kpai ido.
Tak i fʼimo̩to̩ʼka do̩ wʼugbo-wñ agwili e̩wñ ki chʼofe-wñ.
Oñ imo̩to̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, O̩maye-we̩ lewa me̩; ata-we̩ la fʼo̩mokuno̩ ki yoyo le̩ kpa todabu kʼi mʼowñ gba o̩lafia.
Ama i kwowe̩do̩, i la dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi gudu nyʼejefu n: tak ata-wñ dufu wa agbo̩ko̩bʼo̩.
I muda dohi ka ñw ata-wñ kakini, Go, omi te̩tachʼuko̩lo̩ adu ñw e̩ o̩do̩ wewe-i, u la daba o̩la kʼe̩ tuko̩ ñwu mi mama ta n; e̩ la dʼo̩mewo ñwu mi kʼomi kpʼamonuku-mi ki gwoguyo̩ mama ta n;
ama e̩gba kʼo̩ma-we̩-i e-kʼowñ kpai amajo̩ko̩ mʼe̩wñ udiñmino-we̩ chaka ko kpabie̩ rinyo̩ lewa, e̩ la fʼo̩mokuno̩ ki yoyo kpa ñw u.
Ama i ka ñw u kakini, O̩ma-mi, uwe̩ dʼugbo mi e̩gba du; e̩wñ du ki chʼe-mi la chʼe-we̩.
Ama egwoguyo̩ kpai eyo̩ chʼeju-wñ; todabu kʼo̩maye-we̩ kide̩ leku, tak i ño̩ dabi adeju-i ge̩; i laño̩ lenyo̩, ma la fʼu li me̩.
Tak i ño̩ ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ le̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka do̩mo̩ kʼi chʼanana, e-kʼi chenʼadigede; oñ ma ro̩lo̩ nyʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ugbʼowñ ka kʼi do̩mo̩ ako idu-wñ chihi rinyo̩.
Tak i fʼu do̩ wa, i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chʼo̩la-we̩ kʼu nagbo̩-i taa? E̩ ki fʼo̩la igede-we̩ kʼe̩ de choli jane̩ ñwu mi; todu uwe̩ neke ño̩ chʼadigede ge̩ n.
Oñ adigede le̩ ka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, E̩wñ nache, todabu kʼodu-mi abʼumi gba uko̩lo̩ igede-mi? Iñmi-mi wo̩ uche̩ elo̩ n; i la chʼebiebi, anyo̩ aje̩ ñwu mi n.
U chema e̩wñ kʼu nache, todu kʼe̩gba du ku ma mʼumi du tane̩ bʼef uko̩lo̩ igede-ede te̩ kʼama ki mʼumi gba tef unyi e-ma.
Tak i fʼame̩no̩me̩ odu-wñ do̩ wʼugbʼowñ okoke. I ka ñw e-ejodudu kakini, Onu e̩ je̩ odu-mi o̩me̩ taa?
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩ñwa ekpo ogume̩lu. Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Mʼo̩takada o̩me̩-we̩ du, kʼe̩ guguane̩ piopio kʼe̩ ko̩, ooje.
Tak i ka ñw e̩nekeji, kakini, O̩me̩ e-we̩ la chʼonu? Oñ i kakini, E̩ñwa o̩ka wit ogume̩lu. I ka ñw u kakini, Mʼo̩takada o̩me̩-we̩ du kʼe̩ ko̩, o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩.
Odu-wñ la je̩nyu adigede uji le̩ todabu kʼi che ibe ibe: todabu kʼamo̩ma o̩kpanachi-i ef o̩lo̩pu e-ma chenʼibe tʼamo̩ma ugane̩ le.
Omi la aka ñwu me̩ kakini, Me̩ nanʼe̩wñ uji ene̩ le̩ chʼamonuku ñw o̩la-me̩; todu kʼe̩gba du kʼi ña kʼama ki mʼume̩ gba tef ebu e-ogbegbele̩.
E̩ne̩ ki achubi one̩ ef e̩wñ ki nya laño̩ chʼachubi one̩ ef e̩wñ ki nana ge̩. Achuji ef e̩wñ ki nya ñʼachʼachuji ef e̩wñ nana.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼame̩ ma chʼamachubi one̩ ef e̩wñ-ene̩ e-uji n, e̩ne̩ ake̩do̩no me̩ kʼi akʼe̩wñ ogbolo ñwu me̩?
I la che̩wñ ku me̩ ma chʼamachubi one̩ ef e̩wñ e̩nomune̩ n, e̩ne̩ adʼe̩wñ ñwu me̩ ku me̩ ne̩ chʼe̩-me̩?

E̩nuko̩lo̩ ef unyi du neke chʼuko̩lo̩ adu ñw odu meji n; todu i achulaka oka kʼi fe̩do̩ ekeji, cho̩kpo̩ni i amanyʼoka o̩la kʼi la dʼekeji roche̩ke̩ne̩. Ame̩ neke chʼuko̩lo̩ adu ñw O̩jo̩ manyu e̩wñ-ene̩ nana n.
AmaFarisi ku ma achʼalu o̩ko̩ la gbo̩ e̩wñ-i chaka; oñ ma gwʼowñ iñmo̩ je̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ chʼabo ku me̩ dale ñw o̩la-me̩ eju amone̩; O̩jo̩ muda chema ef e̩do̩-me̩; todu e̩wñ ki nʼojima ef amone̩ chʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ eju O̩jo̩.
O̩lo̩da kpai amakache̩ do̩mo̩ gbogbo wʼe̩gba Jo̩n: akwʼe̩gba le̩ ma nʼuche̩nyo̩ ojane̩ O̩jo̩ aje̩, oñ e̩ne̩ du nagwo̩ko̩ rʼef uwñ.
I muda me̩ tule kʼefojale kpai ane̩-ile̩-i ki lale rinyo̩ tʼina re ef o̩lo̩da kʼi wane̩ le.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi ako̩ o̩ya-wñ kʼi la fʼomune̩ ne̩, o̩ya one̩ i atene le̩; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi la ane̩ e-ku ma ko̩, o̩ya one̩ i atene-i ge̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka do̩mo̩ ki chʼanana; i la anyi e̩wñ odufa kpai ukpo line̩n ki nyo̩, i la do̩mo̩ achile̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa.
Oñ e̩naleʼka do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Lazaro̩s ku ma du dachi alu atakpa-wñ, o̩la-wñ chaka chʼikete,
e̩ño̩ e̩gbanyo̩ uje̩wñ e-ki wane̩ kwʼoj itebulu anana le̩ achʼo kʼi je̩; amabia nawa afʼikete-wñ na.
Oñ i leatu, e̩nale le̩ leku, oñ amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ mʼu du le tʼagbe̩do̩ Ebraham. Anana le̩ laño̩ ku ge̩, taku ma mʼu du ji.
Tak ef o̩jegu o̩mo̩, i mʼeju-wñ ko rʼate̩, abu kʼi dʼef uwa, oñ i li Ebraham o̩najiji kpai Lazaro̩s agbe̩do̩-wñ.
Tak i dʼomu dago akwa kakini, Ata-wa, Ebraham, li mi ejumomi, kʼe̩ la fu Lazaro̩s kpe̩ wa kʼi mʼoji o̩mo̩wo̩-wñ du tunyʼomiofo kʼi je̩ ñw ukpalu-mi ki bo̩; todabu kʼu dʼef o̩go̩ una-i aliwo̩.
Ama Ebraham kakini, O̩ma-i, e̩ nalibekado kakini, E̩ mʼe̩nyo̩-we̩ gba kpa e̩gba kʼe̩ deju le̩. Abe̩le̩ Lazaro̩s la mʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ gba. Fa-i ma mʼugbe̩do̩ du ñw u emi me̩, uwe̩ la alʼiwo̩.
Anubi e̩wñ le̩ du ge̩, o̩go̩ lile tʼagbagba awa kpai uwe̩, todu kʼabo ki dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma daba kwʼemi nyʼugbo-we̩ aneke che n, ma la neke daba kwʼo̩mo̩ wʼugbo wa-i n.
Oñ i kakini, Todule̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, ata, todu kʼuwe̩ ki kpʼowñ nyʼunyi ata-mi,
todu u chenʼamo̩maye e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ me̩lu, todu kʼi gbʼibenu ñwu ma nyo̩nyo̩, todu kʼama ki we ewʼemi ali uwa-i.
Ama Ebraham kakini, Ama chene̩ Mose̩s kpai amakache̩, ma ki gbʼo̩la e-ma.
Ama i kakini, I chʼabe̩le̩ n, ata-wa, Ebraham, i muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka kwʼugbo abo ki ku nyʼugbo ma, ma aribeda.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ ku ma ma gbʼo̩la e-Mose̩s kpai e-amakache̩ n, dagba e̩ne̩ʼka kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku ma jʼake̩do̩no n.
Oñ i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼe̩wñ e̩dahi awe ewa n; ama atogwo chʼe-e̩ne̩ kʼi alʼugbo-wñ wa!
I ma nyo̩ ñw u tule ku ma ma dʼokuta une̩wñ lo̩ko̩li o̩fa-wñ, ku ma mʼowñ du rikpolo tef ohimini, tʼowñ edʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef abo ke̩ke̩-i hi le.
Me̩ mʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩: iche̩wñ kʼo̩maye-we̩ dure, e̩ nadejurʼu; i la che̩wñ kʼi ribeda tʼo̩ no ñw u.
I la che̩wñ kʼi dʼe̩ re onu mebie o̩jo̩ʼka, kʼi laño̩ rida tʼugbo-we̩ onu mebie kʼi kakini, U ribeda me̩, e̩ ki to̩no̩ ñw u.
Tak ame̩nukpuche̩ le̩ ka ñw Ondu kakini, Dʼe̩do̩-ekono manyu ñw a.
Oñ Ondu kakini, Iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma ne̩ e̩do̩-ekono dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩yo̩ mustadi, me̩ ma ka ñw oli sikamain kide̩ kakini, Muwu tʼe̩te̩te̩te̩, kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ ne ef ohimini; oñ i ma gbo̩la-me̩ gbo̩.
E̩ne̩ la dʼefu-me̩ kʼi nʼadu ki alʼuche̩-wñ, abe̩k i adide amala-wñ, kʼi aka ñw u e̩gba kʼi doji kwʼoko, kakini, Lewa ababa, kʼe̩ guane̩ kʼe̩ jʼe̩wñ;
kʼi ma la aka ñw u n kakini, E̩ ki fʼo̩je̩ o̩kpane̩ hi ñwu mi, kʼe̩ laño̩ dʼe̩wñ tʼo̩la-we̩ kʼe̩ che e̩wñ ñwu mi, gbogbo tak u je̩ kʼu la ñmo̩ kpa; tak ubi e-le̩ uwe̩ aje̩ uwe̩ la añmo̩?
I agwʼadu le̩ ukpe̩ kʼi fʼe̩wñ kʼi ñwa ñw u le̩ che?
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ de̩ ge̩, e̩gba ku me̩ fʼe̩wñ du ku ma ñwa ñwu me̩ le̩ chekpa, me̩ ki ka kakini, Awa chʼamadu ki ma nʼeku n le̩; e̩wñ ki chʼukpe̩-wa oñ a che le̩.
Oñ i leatu, abu ku ma dʼef ule̩ alo tu Je̩rusale̩m kʼowñ ale gu efu Samaria kpai Galili du,
abu kʼi la mugudu tef adogbeʼka, aboke̩le̩ me̩gwa ku ma chʼame̩no̩ga-ikpemute de kpʼowñ, oñ ma kwodago o̩najiji:
taku ma dʼomu dago kakini, Jisus, O̩dafe̩, e̩ li wa ejumomi.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼuma li i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nalo ku me̩ dʼo̩la-me̩ ña amatama. Oñ i leatu, abu ku ma alo, o̩la-ma kwo hiolo.
Tak oka efʼuma abu kʼi li ka kʼo̩la-wñ takpa, i mudakubi, oñ i nʼomu lile adojima ñw O̩jo̩.
Tak i lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma e̩re̩-wñ, i nagwʼo̩; e̩ne̩ le̩ la chʼabo Samaria.
Oñ Jisus dohi kakini, I chʼo̩la one̩ me̩gwa le̩ kwo hiolo n? Ugbo abo me̩la le̩ de̩ taa?
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ku ma li kʼi adabiwa kʼi dʼojima ñw O̩jo̩ n, chai akichi kide̩ kate?
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ lo we̩: e̩do̩ ekono-we̩ fʼe̩ jadu me̩.
Oñ abu kʼamaFarisi tʼowñ ene kakini, Adiko e̩gba ojane̩ O̩jo̩ awa? I dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ojane̩ e-O̩jo̩ awa kpai e̩wñ-igo-ego n;
ma la aka kakini, Me̩ go, emi, abe̩k, ano̩mo̩ n! todu me̩ go ta, ojane̩ e-O̩jo̩ dʼefu-ume̩.
Oñ i ka ñw amako̩che̩ le̩ kakini, O̩jo̩-wñ awa, e̩gba kʼe̩ño̩ o̩jo̩ʼka e-O̩ma One̩-i eli ache me, me̩ la aliʼu n.
Taku ma aka ñwu me̩ kakini, Me̩ go, o̩mo̩-i! me̩ go, emi! Me̩ ki le n, me̩ ki bʼuma kpe̩re̩ n.
Todu dabalu kʼo̩mamanya ada kwef ojale o̩wo̩ʼka kʼi fʼojale mu gaa gbogbo nyʼo̩wo̩ ekeji efojale, abe̩le̩ O̩ma One̩ ade̩ ef adiko o̩jo̩ e-wñ.
Ama ejodudu i ali uwa wewe tila, oñ abo̩gba kide̩ afʼowñ ñwago ku ma kʼo̩ dab ijo̩bu.
Alu kʼi wache ef adiko Noa, abe̩le̩ i año̩ de̩ ef adiko O̩ma One̩ ge̩.
Ma je̩ e̩wñ, ma ñmo̩, ma nʼo̩ya, ma la du kpo̩ko̩, gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ ku Noa kwo̩tʼef o̩ko̩ le̩, tak uwobi omi le̩ lewa, oñ i fʼuma kpa rinyo̩ chaka.
Abe̩le̩ dabalu ki wache ef adiko Lo̩t; ma je̩ e̩wñ, ma ñmo̩, ma la e̩wñ, ma la tʼe̩wñ, ma gbe̩ e̩wñ, ma kʼunyi;
ama o̩jo̩ ku Lo̩t kwʼefu So̩do̩m dufu una kpai itolu lo̩ kwʼojale dab omiofo, oñ i fʼuma kpa rinyo̩ chaka:
alu le̩ gbage̩de̩ i ade̩ ef o̩jo̩ ku madʼO̩ma One̩ bite̩.
Adiko o̩jo̩ le̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼojokunyi kʼe̩wñ-eku-wñ la jʼef unyi, i ki gwo̩ru nyʼo̩mo̩ kʼi ko n: oñ abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼoko ge̩, i ki ño̩ dabi tʼubi n.
Me̩ libekado o̩ya Lo̩t.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi afeju kʼi nyomi oji o̩la-wñ adutinyo̩ le̩; ama e̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼu rinyo̩, agba udeju-wñ.
Naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Odu o̩jo̩ le̩ one̩ meji ajʼoj ate̩ʼka; ma adʼoka, ma la atʼekeji no̩.
Abobule̩ meji la ajo̩ ano̩ e̩wñ kpʼo̩la-ma; ma adʼoka, ma la atʼekeji no̩. [
One̩ meji ajʼoko; ma adʼoka, ma la atʼekeji no̩.]
Taku ma dohi ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo de̩ Ondu? Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ugbo kʼoku e̩wñ de̩, o̩mo̩ oñ amugu awa jo̩.
Oñ i fʼita kpa ñwu ma alu kʼi dukpe̩ kʼamone̩ achadua e̩gba du, uhia ki we ehia ma;
i kakini, Akajo̩ ki ma railo O̩jo̩ n dʼef ewoʼka, one̩ la wʼo̩ eju n.
Oñ o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ʼka dʼef ewo kide̩; i te̩tawʼugbo-wñ o̩gbe̩nugbe̩ aka ñw u kakini, Fʼache̩ na mi ugbo e̩no̩la-mi.
Tak abu kʼi ma dʼowñ e̩do̩ n gboo̩gbo; ama ubi le̩ i ka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, Dagba u ma railo O̩jo̩ n, kʼone̩ ma la wʼomi eju n;
ama todabu kʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩-i ache mi akanya-i, nanʼache̩-wñ tode̩gba kʼewa kʼi awa o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ adʼumi te̩ agwoli gwoku.
Oñ Ondu kakini, Me̩ nagbo̩ e̩wñ kʼakajo̩ uji le̩ aka ke.
Oñ i ma nʼugbo du kʼO̩jo̩ anʼache̩ abo-wñ kʼi tutane̩ ku ma jʼakwadʼo̩ o̩ro̩ka kpai odu n? E̩do̩ i muda aje̩ ugbo ma le̩.
Naka ñwu me̩, kakini, Owñ anʼache̩ ma piopio. Ama e̩gba kʼO̩ma One̩ lewa i ñʼali e̩do̩-e̩kono̩ oj ane̩-ile̩-i?
Oñ i fʼita-i kpa ugbo abo iche̩ka ku ma ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-ma ka kʼama chʼame̩no̩kpakpa, ma la do̩ abo ki bo̩ du rʼibe̩te̩.
I kakini, One̩ meji mute̩gu nyʼunyi O̩jo̩ ku ma chadua; oka efu ma chʼiFarisi, ekeji-wñ la chʼagbo̩kane̩.

E̩ne̩ Farisi le̩ kwodago achadua abe̩-i kpai o̩la-wñ: i kakini, O̩jo̩, nagwʼe̩ ukpe̩ kʼu ma dab abo ki bo̩ n, amagba-e̩wñ-afuma, amachuji, amatene o̩ya one̩, i chaka chʼalu kʼagbo̩kane̩-i de̩, u dabe̩le̩ n.
Najalu onu meji tak o̩jo̩ mebie ñwa; e̩wñ du kʼu ne̩ nakpe̩ rʼe̩gwa kʼu dʼukpe̩ʼka chele.
Ama agbo̩kane̩ le̩ kwodago o̩najiji; i chaka chʼe-eju ekorʼojale i je̩ che n; i muda dʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩-wñ, i kakini, O̩jo̩, e̩do̩ kʼi nyʼe̩ ñw omi kʼu chʼe̩nadure.
Naka ñwu me̩ kakini, e̩ne̩-i mugwo̩ru kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyi-wñ kpai ale eje̩ ñw e̩nekeji le̩, todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi ahi o̩la-wñ ne ma ahi u wane̩; ama e̩ne̩ kʼi hiʼo̩la-wñ wane̩ ma ahi u dago.
Ma la jʼakʼamo̩me̩kpa-ma wʼugbo owñ, todu kʼi do̩wo̩kado ma ge̩; oñ abu kʼamako̩che̩ fʼu li, ma dejuru ma.
Ama Jisus fʼuma do̩ wʼugbo-wñ, i kakini, Me̩ to̩no̩ kʼabimo̩to̩ kekele ki wʼugbo mi, me̩ ki la kpo̩na nyʼuma n: todu ojane̩ O̩jo̩ chʼe-abe̩go̩-i.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma gba ojane̩ O̩jo̩ alu kʼimo̩to̩ kekele agba e̩wñ n, i nʼugbo du kʼi agudu tef uwñ n.
Tak agbojiʼka tʼowñ ene kakini, Akone̩wñ, uwe̩ e̩ne̩nyo̩, e̩wñ nache kʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ amud e̩wñ ogu kʼu naje̩?
Oñ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ do̩ mi kʼe̩ne̩nyo̩? E̩ne̩ du nyo̩ n, chai e̩ne̩ kate, owñ chʼO̩jo̩.
Uwe̩ chema o̩la uko̩ le̩, E̩ ki tene o̩ya e̩ne̩ omune̩ n, e̩ ki kpʼone̩ n, e̩ ki joji n, e̩ ki gbibenu olemi n, e̩ bumo̩ ata-we̩ kpai iye-we̩.
Tak i kakini, U fʼe̩wñ-i du de kwʼe̩gba kʼu chʼimo̩to̩ okolobia.
Oñ abu ku Jisus gbo̩, i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñʼka bo̩ ñw e̩ ta, mʼe̩wñ du kʼe̩ ne̩ ko ta, kʼe̩ mʼu ko kpe̩ ñw ame̩nale, oñ uwe̩ anʼe̩wñ akoko efojale: tak e̩ lewa, tʼumi ubi.
Oñ abu kʼi gbo̩ e̩wñ-i, i mud e̩do̩-e̩kpabie̩ ñw u nana, todu kʼanana-wñ tabale.
Oñ abu ku Jisus li u i kakini, Me̩ go abu kʼi gbiti ñw abo ku ma nʼe̩wñ-eku nana ku ma gudu nyʼef ojane̩ O̩jo̩.
Todu i me̩ ñw inyakulumi kʼi gudu lef awo ebije uge̩wñ tʼanana egudu nyʼef ojane̩ O̩jo̩ le.
Oñ abo ku ma gbo̩ kakini, Mak e̩ne̩ ma neke ajadu ke?
I muda kakini, E̩wñ ki ma je̩ ache ñw amone̩ n, je̩ ache ñw O̩jo̩.
Oñ Pita kakini, Go, a tʼe̩wñ e-wa no̩ me̩, a la tʼuwe̩ ubi-i.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩, ka kʼi nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi tʼunyi abe̩k o̩ya abe̩k amo̩maye abe̩k abo ki bi owñ abe̩k amo̩ma no̩ tod ojane̩ O̩jo̩
e-ki ma agba e̩wñ wewe tʼe-le̩ le ef adiko kide̩ n, tak ef o̩kpanachi ki awa-i i ñʼagba iñmi ogbegbele̩.
Tak i mʼamame̩gweji le̩ ko oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ go, a ate̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m, tak o̩la O̩ma One̩ du ki che̩ko̩tane̩ lef amakache̩ achekpoji.
Todu ma adʼowñ ñw abo uche̩ichi mu, ma achʼo uke̩, ma akpʼowñ bie̩, ma la afiʼito̩ rʼowñ o̩la;
taku ma ajʼowñ edili, ma la akpʼo̩ tinyo, tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ i udajikwane̩ ge̩.
Eju-ma la ne̩m o̩la-i du n; o̩la kʼi ka le̩ la chemaja ñwu ma, ma la ma e̩wñ kʼi ka le̩ n.
Oñ i leatu, eme̩ru kʼi me̩ru Je̩riko awa, afejuʼka gugu eti o̩na abiebi.
Tak abu kʼi gbo̩ ekuku o̩wo̩-amone̩ ku ma lale, i tene e̩wñ ki chʼofe-wñ.
Oñ ma fʼuka je̩ ñw u kakini, Jisus abo Nazare̩t le̩ alale.
Tak i kwokwa kakini, Jisus, uwe̩ O̩ma Defid, lʼumi ejumomi.
Tak abo ku ma jʼo̩gba dejurʼu kʼi chechi: i muda nakwa tule nyo̩gba nana kakini, Uwe̩, O̩ma Defid, lʼumi ejumomi.
Taku Jisus kwodago, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma mʼu du wʼugbo owñ. Oñ abu kʼi me̩rʼu, i tʼowñ ene kakini,
E̩wñ dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼu nache ñw e̩? Tak i kakini, Ondu, todu kʼomi kʼu gane̩.
Taku Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Gane̩ ke; e̩do̩-ekono-we̩ fʼe̩ jadu me̩.
Oñ e̩re̩re̩le̩ i kwogane̩, i la tʼowñ ubi, i nadojima ñw O̩jo̩: oñ abu kʼamone̩ le̩ chaka li u, ma nañwulo̩ O̩jo̩.
Tak abu kʼi mugudu nyi Je̩riko oñ i che kʼi lewa legudu,
me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Zakio̩s do̩mo̩, owñ la chʼagboji amagbo̩kane̩, anana i che.
Oñ i feju kʼi li Jisus, kʼi mʼe̩ne̩ kʼi che; i la neke che n, noji o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩, todabu kʼi chʼo̩di.
Oñ i fule le tʼo̩gba, i mute̩gu toj oli sikamo̩r todu kʼi liʼu: todu abu kʼi ache kʼi lale o̩mo̩.
Tak e̩gba ku Jisus lewa ugbo le̩ i chʼeju gʼate̩ i ka ñw u kakini, Zakio̩s, hika gwo̩ru wane̩; todu unyi-we̩ nagugu eñini, tila.
Tak i hika gwo̩ru wane̩, oñ i mʼowñ gba kpai uyo̩.
Tak abu ku ma li u, o̩chaka-ma kwokeñmini kakini, I le tʼejefu kʼi ru ugbo e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi chʼe̩nadure.
Oñ Zakio̩s kwodago, i ka ñw Ondu kakini, Go, Ondu, ukpeji idu-mi nako ñw ame̩nale; i la che̩wñ kʼu gba e̩wñʼka lef uji ugbo e̩ne̩ du nadabi rʼo̩me̩-wñ ugbo me̩le̩.
Oñ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Ujadu lewate̩ ñw unyi kide̩ eñini-i me̩, todukpe̩ kʼowñ-i ño̩ chʼo̩ma Ebraham.
Todu O̩ma One̩ lewa kʼi feju kʼi laño̩ jadu e-ki lenyo̩.
Oñ abu ku ma gbo̩ e̩wñ-i, i mʼita du manyu kʼi kpa ñwu ma tod eme̩ru kʼi ame̩ru Je̩rusale̩m kpai todukpe̩ ku ma do̩ ka kʼe̩re̩re̩le̩ oñ ojane̩ O̩jo̩ ache ki dufu ejugede.
Todule̩ i kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka kʼi chʼo̩mo̩fe̩ le tʼane̩ o̩najiji, kʼi gbʼojane̩ ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi dabiwa.
I la fʼamadu-wñ me̩gwa do̩wa, oñ i mʼipamu me̩gwa ko ñwu ma, tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ nadʼu chinyama gbogbo tak u wa.
Abane̩-wñ muda chulaka-wñ oñ ma fʼabogijo kpe̩ tʼo̩ ubi, ma kakini, I dʼuwa e̩do̩ kʼe̩ne̩-i ki chʼonu-wa n.
Oñ i leatu, ef edabiwa-wñ, abu kʼi mʼojane̩ le̩ gba, i ka kʼama ki fʼamadu kʼi kʼo̩ko̩ ñwu ma le̩ do̩ wʼugbo-wñ, todu kʼi ma ile e̩wñ ku ma je̩ ef inyama ku ma che.
Oñ e-ejodudu kwodufu wʼo̩gba-wñ, i kakini, Odu, ipamu-we̩ nʼile ipamu me̩gwa.
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, I nyo̩ gbe̩, uwe̩, adu ki nyo̩; todabu kʼe̩ chubi mi ef e̩wñ ki nya, uwe̩ ki nʼo̩da ewo me̩gwa.
Tak e-ekeji lewa kakini, Odu, ipamu-we̩ i mʼipamu me̩lu je̩ mʼo̩.
Oñ i ño̩ ka ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ ge̩ kakini, Uwe̩ ki ño̩ nʼo̩da ewe me̩lu ge̩.
Tak e-omune̩ lewa kakini, Odu, go, ipamu-we̩, kʼu fʼu daku te̩ ef ugbogbo, owñ de̩:
todu u railo we̩, todabu kʼe̩ ma chʼe̩niyachi n: e-kʼe̩ ma du tʼane̩ n, e-le̩ e̩ du, e̩wñ kʼe̩ ma gbe̩ n, e-le̩ e̩ la aja ko wʼunyi.
I ka ñw u kakini, Nanʼalu e-we̩ kajo̩ we̩, uwe̩ adu bibi-i. E̩ chema ka kʼomi ma chʼe̩niyachi n, kʼu nadu e̩wñ kʼu ma du te̩ n, kʼu laño̩ aja kowʼunyi e̩wñ kʼomi ma du gbe̩ n;
todu kide̩ e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma dʼo̩ko̩-mi nyʼabo ku ma dʼo̩ko̩ ta o̩wo̩ n? tak abu kʼu lewa u ma gba e̩wñ-mi manyu ile oji-wñ,
tak i ka ñw abo ku ma dago jo̩ kakini, Me̩ mʼipamu le̩ gba bʼo̩ o̩wo̩ te̩, ku me̩ du ñw e̩ne̩ ki ne̩ ipamu me̩gwa le̩.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Odu, i chene̩ ipamu me̩gwa me̩.
Naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki ne̩ oñ ma adu ñw u: ama e̩ne̩ ki ma ne̩ n, tʼe̩wñ kʼi ne̩ ma abʼo̩ gba.
Ama ame̩ne̩bi-mi ki ma dʼuma e̩do̩ kʼomi ki chʼonu-ma-i n, me̩ mu ko wʼemi, ku me̩ mʼuma kokpa eju-mi.
Tak abu kʼi fʼe̩wñ kide̩ ka, i le tʼo̩gba ate̩gu alo tu Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ i leatu, abu kʼi ame̩ru Be̩tfeji kpai Be̩tani, ugbo uwo ku ma dʼo̩ ko̩ O̩lif, i fʼamako̩che̩ meji kpuche̩,
i kakini, Me̩ nalo me̩ tef adogbe ki kpejuru me̩ o̩mo̩; abu ku me̩ mugudu wa ababa me̩ ali o̩mo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ki tʼiku o̩mo̩, e-kʼe̩ne̩ du ma tanʼoji-wñ mama ta n; me̩ mʼu tu ku me̩ duwa.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du tʼume̩ ene kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ atu-i? Abe̩le̩ me̩ aka ñw u kakini, Ondu chenʼeku-wñ.
Oñ abo ku ma kpʼuma uche̩ le̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le, oñ ma li alu kʼi ka ñwu ma.
Oñ abu ku ma jʼatu o̩mo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩, amodu-wñ, ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ atu o̩mo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-i?
Oñ ma kakini, Ondu chenʼeku-wñ.
Taku ma mʼu du wʼugbo Jisusi: ma la mʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma ko bʼo̩mo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ ubi ma, taku ma du Jisusi gugu oji-wñ.
Oñ abu kʼi alo ma fʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma nadala jʼejʼo̩na.
Oñ abu kʼi ame̩ru awa, ugbo agwo̩ru uwo O̩lif le̩, ugwe̩ko̩ amako̩che̩ le̩ chaka chane̩ e̩yo̩, ma nʼomu lile añwulo̩ O̩jo̩ todu uko̩lo̩ ukpahiu du ku ma li,
ma kakini, Ekele ma kele Onu kʼi awa ef odu Ondu; ure̩do̩ ki dʼefojale kpai ojima ate̩ ate̩.
Tak amaFarisi iche̩ka ef o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Akone̩wñ, dejuru amako̩che̩-we̩.
Tak i dohi kakiru, Naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼabo-i hiʼalu-ma de, okuta ki jo̩-i akwa.
Tak abu kʼi me̩ru awa, kʼi fʼewo le̩ li i kworaku-wñ,
I kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ma ma ef o̩jo̩ kide̩, owñ chʼuwe̩ onugo, e̩wñ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ure̩do̩! Ama fai i che̩maja bʼuwe̩ eju te̩.
Todabu kʼadiko o̩jo̩-wñ awa bʼuwe̩ ma e̩gba kʼame̩nebi-we̩ abʼaku nyʼuwe̩ daka, ku ma donyʼuwe̩ daka afʼuwe̩ bunyi te̩,
taku ma agwʼuwe̩ mane̩, kpai amo̩ma-we̩ efu-we̩; ma la atʼokuta okate no̩ oji omune̩ efu-we̩ n; ukpe̩ kʼe̩ ma ma iko ku ma wa feju dʼuwe̩-i n.
Tak i mugudu tef unyi O̩jo̩, oñ i chane̩ enʼabo ku ma ta e̩wñ dufu,
i naka ñwu ma kakini, I che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, Unyi-mi la achʼunyi adua; ame̩ muda dʼu chʼo̩wo̩ amadinya.
I la do̩mo̩ ako̩ ma e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa. Ama amagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada kpai abo ku ma to̩gba ef amone̩ le̩ feju ku ma kpʼo̩ tinyo̩:
ma la li e̩wñ ku ma ache n; todu amone̩ le̩ chaka ronyʼowñ aneti.
Oñ i leatu, o̩jo̩ʼka le̩, abu kʼi nako̩ amone̩ e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩, kʼi nʼUche̩nyo̩ aje̩ru ma, amagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada manyʼabogijo lewabanʼo;
oñ ma ko̩la, ma ka ñw u, kakini, E̩ ka ñw a, ef o̩da e̩wñ e̩ che e̩wñ-i taa? Abe̩k e̩ne̩ dʼo̩da kide̩ ñw e̩?
Oñ i dohi ka ñwu ma, kakini, Omi ñʼatʼume̩ ene o̩laʼka ge̩; ku me̩ ka ñwu mi:
Baptism e-Jo̩n le̩ fa, efojale i kwo? abe̩k i kwʼugbo amone̩?
Oñ ma kwolo̩la kpʼo̩la-ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼa kakini, I kwʼefojale, i akakini, Tode̩wñ me̩ ma ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ n?
I la che̩wñ kʼa akakini, I kwʼugbo amone̩, amone̩-i chaka arokuta ñw a, todu ama cheke̩do̩no ka ku Jo̩n chʼakache̩.
Taku ma dohi ka kʼama ma ugbo kʼi kwo n.
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi la aka ef o̩da e̩wñ kʼu nache e̩wñ-i ñwu me̩ ni ge̩.
Tak i chane̩ ekpʼita kide̩ ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ʼka fʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma lo, oñ i mʼu du nyʼamaluche̩ o̩wo̩, tak i le tʼane̩ omune̩ kʼi kpo̩kpe̩ nana o̩mo̩.
Tak iko-wñ i fʼaduʼka kpuche̩ nyʼugbo amaluche̩ le̩, kʼama ki kʼe̩ro ñw u kwef e̩ro uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩. Amaluche̩ le̩ muda fʼu gwo, oñ ma fʼu kpuche̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ o̩wo̩ ofo.
Tak i ño̩ kpe̩ adu omune̩ ge̩: oñ ma ño̩ fʼowñ le̩ gwo ge̩, ma la fʼu chukata, ma fʼu kpe̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ o̩wo̩ ofo ge̩.
Tak i fʼe̩ke̩ta kpe̩ ge̩: oñ ma ño̩ fʼe-le̩ chagbe, ma mʼu du rikpolo dufu.
Tak odu uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ kakini, E̩wñ nache? Nakpe̩ o̩ma ufe̩do̩-mi; ukani ma adiba ñw u.
Ama abu kʼamaluche̩ le̩ fʼowñ li ma chane̩ elo̩la kpʼo̩la-ma kakini, E̩ne̩ ki aje̩ e̩wñ ogu ata-wñ de̩-i; a ki fʼu kpa, todu kʼe̩wñ-o̩gu le̩ ki mud e-wa.
Taku ma mʼu du ro̩ kwef uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ tʼo̩do̩da, oñ ma fʼu kpa. Todule̩ e̩wñ odu uche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ ache ma ta?
I awa kʼi fʼamaluche̩ le̩ kpa rinyo̩, tak i adʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ ñw abomune̩. Oñ abu ku ma gbo̩, ma kakini, O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na.
Ama i cheju go ma, i kakini, Mak e̩wñ chʼe-ki che̩ko̩tane̩ kide̩ kakini,
E̩ne̩ du ki awane̩ bʼoj okuta kide̩ ma, i age̩ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼokuta-i awane̩ abʼo ma, i afʼu kwu ebutu.
Tak amako̩takada kpai amagboji amatama feju ku ma ko o̩wo̩ nyʼowñ o̩la ef auwa kide̩ gbage̩de̩; ma la railo amone̩; todu ma chema ka kʼugbo ma oñ i kpʼita kide̩.
Taku ma feju bʼo̩ le, ma la fʼamone̩ kpuche̩ anyo̩ge̩ jo̩, ma chakpaine̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼama chʼabo̩kpakpa, todu kʼama ki gwonyʼo̩la-wñ, todu kʼi nʼugbo ku ma amʼowñ du ñw agboji kpai o̩da igo̩bina.
Ma la tʼowñ ene kakini, Akone̩wñ, a chema kakini, E̩ ko̩la, e̩ laño̩ akone̩ e̩wñ tʼo̩kpakpa, e̩ la nʼe̩nejuma n, chai o̩na O̩jo̩ e̩ kʼone̩ ochochi:
o̩da aje̩ ñw a te̩ o̩ko̩ ñwu Sisa? abe̩k i aje̩ n?
Ama abu kʼi mʼibe ugbeju-ma i ka ñwu ma kakini,
Me̩ dʼoliaʼka ña mi, ojibo e̩ne̩ kpai olubutu e̩ne̩ jʼo̩la-wñ? Oñ ma kakini, E-Sisa.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Maku me̩ dʼe̩wñ e-Sisa ñwu Sisa, e̩wñ e-O̩jo̩ me̩ ki la du ñw O̩jo̩.
Iñmi-ma la wo̩ egwo̩nyʼo̩la kʼi ka le̩ eju amone̩ n. Taku ma kwoyaye noj ohi-wñ, oñ ma jo̩ chii.
Tak abo iche̩ka ef amaSadiusi wʼugbo-wñ, owñ chʼabo ku ma ka kʼudajikwane̩ do̩mo̩ n;
oñ ma tʼowñ ene kakini, Akone̩wñ, Mose̩s ko̩lubutu ñw a, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼo̩maye one̩ kʼi nʼo̩ya leku, kʼi ma la nʼo̩ma n todu kʼo̩maye-wñ ki mʼo̩ya-wñ le̩ du, kʼi dʼugbe̩ tane̩ ñw o̩maye-wñ.
Todule̩ amo̩maye mebie do̩mo̩: tak e-ejodudu fʼo̩ya ne̩ oñ i leku, i la nʼo̩ma n;
tak e-ekeji
kpai e-e̩ke̩ta mʼowñ du; alu le̩ amamebie ne̩, ma la tʼo̩ma du no̩ tane̩ n, oñ ma leku,
anubi-wñ onobule̩ le̩ ño̩ leku ge̩.
Todule̩ ef udajikwane̩ e̩ne̩ i achʼo̩ya-wñ ef uma? Todu amamebie le̩ dʼowñ chʼo̩ya.
Taku Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Amo̩ma o̩kpanachi kide̩ ane̩ o̩ya, ma laño̩ ko ma kpo̩ko̩ ge̩:
ama abo ku ma fuñwa ku ma nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ ku ma tʼo̩kpanachi e-le̩ kpai udajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, nʼo̩ya n, ma la ko ma kpo̩ko̩ n;
todu ma la neke ño̩ ku ge̩ n: todu ma chʼokujo̩ kpai amonuche̩ O̩jo̩; ma la chʼamo̩ma O̩jo̩, abu ku ma chʼamo̩ma udajikwane̩.
I muda chʼe-ku ma ako abo ki ku kwane̩, i chaka che Mose̩s dʼoji e-le̩ dufu ugbo oli ye̩e̩le̩ le̩, abu kʼi kakini, Ondu, O̩jo̩ e-Ebraham, kpai O̩jo̩ e-Aise̩k, kpai O̩jo̩ e-Jeko̩b.
Owñ la chʼO̩jo̩ e-abo ki ku n, chai e-abo ki deju: todu o̩chaka-ma adeju ñw owñ.
Oñ iche̩ka ef amako̩takada le̩ dohi kakini, Akone̩wñ, o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩ ka le̩.
Todu ma gbe̩do̩ etʼowñ ene tʼe-le̩ le ge̩ n.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abile ku ma ka ku Kraist chʼO̩ma Defid ta?
Todu Defid onugo ka ef o̩takada Eli kʼi ko̩ dʼO̩jo̩ le̩ kakini,
Gbogbo tak u kʼame̩nebi-we̩ chʼuke̩re̩no e̩re̩-we̩.
Todule̩ Defid dʼowñ ko̩ Ondu, abile kʼi ño̩ chʼo̩ma-wñ ge̩?
Oñ abu kʼamone̩ le̩ chaka nʼeti agbo̩ i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini,
Me̩ namʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩ ugbo amako̩takada e-ki dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma nyi otogbo lile alule̩ ku ma laño̩ che̩do̩ ugwa ef aja, kpai ugugu ojima ef unyi ujeju, kpai uña ojima ugbo idina,
e-ku ma mʼunyi amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ko je̩, tak ukpa ku ma ache chʼechadua jiji. Abo-i ajʼabi ololo tule.
Oñ i mʼeju ko rʼate̩ ali amanana ku ma jʼakʼe̩wñ ele-ma rikpolo tef akpati o̩ko̩.
Oñ i li o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ʼka kʼi chʼe̩nale kʼi akʼanini meji rikpolo nyʼo̩mo̩.
Tak i kakini, Ochochi, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, O̩yaukuo̩ko̩ e̩nale-i kʼe̩wñ rikpolo tʼo̩ tʼuma le chaka:
todu o̩chaka abo-i mʼe̩wñ ko kwef e̩wñ-ma ki ku ma bo̩ rikpolo tef e̩wñ ele le̩; owñ muda ko kwef e̩wñ ki nyarʼowñ, owñ chʼudiñmino-wñ du kʼi ne̩, oñ i du rikpolo tʼo̩.
Tak abu kʼabo iche̩ka nʼo̩la unyi O̩jo̩ le̩ aka, alu ku ma nʼokuta o̩me̩me̩le̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼamone̩ kowa chʼo̩ñwe̩ nyʼu, i kakini,
I chʼe-e̩wñ ku me̩ li-i, adiko o̩jo̩-wñ awa e̩gba kʼokutaʼka abo̩ nʼoji omune̩ emi e-ku ma awe egulo̩ wane̩ n.
Oñ ma tʼowñ ene kakini, Akone̩wñ, e̩gba oñ e̩wñ-i ache? E̩wñ la chʼujiwe e̩gba du kʼe̩wñ-i ache ki wache?
Tak i kakini, Me̩ nago edʼume̩ la, todu abo wewe awa ef odu-mi, ma akakini, Omi de̩; ma ñʼaka kakini, Iko-wñ me̩ro̩wo̩ me̩: me̩ ki tʼuma ubi alo n.
E̩gba du ku me̩ la gbo̩ uka ogu kpai ekuku, me̩ ki gagogodo n; todu e̩wñ-i awache ejodudu tila; i muda chʼukpoji-wñ ababa de̩ ta n.
E̩gbale̩ i ka ñw ma kakini, Abo uche̩ichi akwane̩ tʼabo uche̩ichi o̩la, oñ ojane̩ onuʼka akwane̩ tʼojane̩ onu omune̩ o̩la;
ane̩ amiejo nana, ugbo ojoji ojoji ukpo̩ta la akpa, atulubo̩ ado̩mo̩; oñ e̩wñ ubailo kpʼujiwe lile akwʼefojale wa.
Ama o̩gba tak e̩wñ-i du wache ma agwo̩nyu me̩, ma la adoli me̩, ma akʼume̩ nyʼef unyi ujeju kpʼunyi uga, ma ako me̩ wʼo̩gba amonu kpʼamigo̩bina tod odu-mi.
E-le̩ amud e̩wñ ibenu ñw ame̩.
Todule̩ me̩ ki mute̩ ef e̩do̩-me̩ ka ku me̩ añwa tane̩ alu ku me̩ adohi n.
Todu omi adʼalu ñwu me̩ kpʼibe, e-kʼame̩no̩la-me̩ du ma neke rʼo̩na nyʼu n, abe̩k echagwunyu n.
Abo ki bi me̩ kpʼamo̩maye-me̩ kpʼamefu-me̩ kpʼamonuku-me̩ onugo ako me̩ ñwu ma mu; ma la aje̩ ñwu ma kpa abo iche̩ka ef ume̩.
E̩ne̩ du la anʼulaka-me̩ ache tod odu-mi.
I muda nʼugbo du kʼilojiʼka ef oji-me̩ alenyo̩ n.
Ef e̩do̩-me̩ ku me̩ lichi gugu, me̩ aje̩ oji o̩la-me̩.
Ama e̩gba du ku me̩ li ka kʼamisoja uche̩uche̩ donyu Je̩rusale̩m, e̩gbale̩ me̩ ki ma ka kʼi me̩ru edʼalache̩ me̩.
E̩gbale̩ abo ku ma jo̩ Judia ki nara tʼane̩ uwo; oñ abo ku ma jʼo̩ge̩ge̩de̩-wñ ki nakwo bʼo̩ te̩; abo ku ma la jo̩ egbili ki gudu tʼef uwñ n.
Todu o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i chʼo̩jo̩ ache̩ ena, kʼe̩wñ du ki che̩ko̩tane̩ ki che̩kpa.
Atogwo chʼe-abo ki defu, kpʼabo ku ma dʼe̩nya ñw o̩ma ñmo̩ iko le̩, todu o̩pe̩cha lile adʼoj ane̩-i, kpai uwe̩do̩ ku ma we̩do̩ru amone̩-i.
Oñ alu ugbadu agwo ma da jane̩, ogu la ako ma alo tʼef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi chaka. Abo uche̩ichi la anʼe̩re̩ te̩ Je̩rusale̩m mane̩ gbogbo tak iko iko abo uche̩ichi ki jo̩ kpa.
Tak ujiwe ado̩mo̩ ef olu kpai ochu kpai awo; oñ ane̩-ile̩-i abo uche̩ichi ache̩kpama te̩, ma agane̩ n noj ekuku ohimini kpai akpoli-wñ;
amone̩ adaku noj ailo ku ma ra, kpai e̩wñ ku ma nibe ka kʼi awa bʼugbo du kʼone̩ te̩ kade ma. Todu ma miʼamukpahiu efojale efojale ejo.
E̩gbale̩ taku ma ali O̩ma One̩ kʼi awa kpai ukpahiu kpai ojima ki nana ef akpa.
Ama echane̩ kʼe̩wñ-i achane̩ ewache, me̩ kʼeju rʼate̩, me̩ ki la hi oji-me̩ dago; todabu kʼugba me̩ tane̩ me̩ro̩-wo̩.
Tak i kpʼita ñwu ma, kakini, Me̩ gʼoli o̩gbaikolo, kpai oli du:
e̩gba du kʼi alu, ame̩ li, me̩ la ma kpai ojika o̩la-me̩ ka kʼo̩lo̩ji me̩ro̩wo̩ me̩.
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ ge̩, e̩gba du ku me̩ li kʼe̩wñ-i ache me̩, ame̩ ki ma kakini, Ojane̩ O̩jo̩ me̩ro̩wo̩ me̩.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩, kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼabo̩gba-i alale, gbogbo tak e̩wñ-i chaka wache n.
Efojale kpai ane̩-ile̩-i alale; i muda nʼugbo du kʼo̩la-mi alale rinyo̩ ofo n.
Me̩ ki la mʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩, tode̩gba kʼadu eju-wuluwulu kpai o̩te̩ eñmo̩ kpai ejiji e̩wñ-ile̩-i eda tʼe̩do̩ me̩ le, tak o̩jo̩ le̩ kwogbulu awa bano me̩ dab ada:
todu abu kʼi awa bʼabo ku ma gugu eju ane̩-ile̩-i du ma le̩ de̩.
Ama me̩ nagwe̩ke̩ iko du, me̩ ki gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ todu kʼiñmi-me̩ ki wo era bʼe̩wñ du kʼi awache-i te̩, ku me̩ la dago o̩gba O̩ma One̩.
O̩ro̩ka du i do̩mo̩ ako̩ ma e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩; tak odu odu i ledufu aru oj uwo ku ma do̩ ko̩ O̩lif le̩.
Tak amone̩ du nawʼugbo-wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩ e̩gba kʼane̩ ane̩ ku ma gbo o̩la-wñ.
Oñ uje̩wñ-ucholo ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n, e-ku ma do̩ ko̩ Elaloji le̩ me̩ro̩wo̩.
Tak amagboji amatama kpai amako̩takada feju alu ku ma ale ku ma dʼowñ kpa; todu ailo amone̩ aba ma.
Oñ Setan mugudu tefu Judas, ku ma hiodu ko̩ Iskario̩t, owñ dʼef aluka amame̩gweji le̩.
Tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le nako̩la kpai amagboji amatama kpai amagboji amadide Unyi O̩jo̩, alu kʼi ale kʼi adʼowñ ñwu ma mu.
Taku ma kwoyo̩, oñ ma jalu kpʼowñ ku ma dʼo̩ko̩ ñw u.
Oñ i je̩, i tʼafeju adiko kʼi amʼowñ du ñwu ma mu e̩gba kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ma jʼane̩ o̩mo̩ n.
Tak o̩jo̩ e-uje̩wñ ku ma ma dʼo̩jo̩wu tʼo̩ n lewa, owñ chʼe-kʼi dukpe̩ ku ma kpa iche̩bo̩ Elaloji tila.
Oñ i fu Pita kpai Jo̩n kpe̩ lo kakini, Me̩ lo ku me̩ fʼe̩wñ Elaloji ñwo̩che ñw a kʼa ki je̩.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo i dʼe̩ e̩do̩ kʼa ñwo̩che?
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ go, abu ku me̩ mugudu tef ewo-i, e̩ne̩ ki ane̩ otube̩ omiofo ade kpai ame̩: me̩ ki tʼo̩ ubi tef unyi kʼi alo tʼefu-wñ.
Tak ame̩ ki ka ñw e̩ne̩fe̩nyi unyi le̩, kakini, Akone̩wñ le̩ aka ñw e̩ kakini, Ugbo unyi uru ononojo de̩ ugbo kʼu naje̩ Elaloji kpai amako̩che̩-mi?
Tak e̩ne̩ le̩ adʼunyi-ojale lile e-kʼe̩wñ ugugu jʼefu-wñ ña me̩; o̩mo̩ me̩ ñwo̩che.
Oñ ma le, ma la li kʼi dʼalu kʼi ka ñwu ma. Taku ma fʼElaloji ñwo̩che.
Tak e̩gba kʼauwa-wñ jo̩, i guane̩, ame̩nukpuche̩ la jʼane̩ kpʼowñ.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ño̩-wñ che mi alu du kʼe̩ño̩ ache one̩ kʼu je̩ Elaloji-i kpʼame̩ o̩gba tak u li uwa le̩;
todu eka naka ñwu me̩-i kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼu najʼe-i ge̩ n, gbogbo tʼe̩gba kʼi che̩kpa ojane̩ O̩jo̩.
Tak i mʼago gba oñ abu kʼi fʼugwa gwa, i kakini, Me̩ mʼe-kide̩ du ku me̩ kpe̩ ñw o̩la-me̩:
todu naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Akwʼifai i nʼugbo du kʼu nañmo̩ kwef e̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma ge̩ n, gbogbo tʼe̩gba kʼojane̩ O̩jo̩ lewa.
Tak i mʼakala du oñ abu kʼi fʼugwa-wñ gwa, i fʼu bu, oñ i mʼu du ñwu ma, kakini, E-kide̩ chʼaño̩la-mi [ku ma du chele todu me̩: me̩ che e-kide̩ kʼi chʼurewa-mi.
Tak i mʼago du e̩go̩ e-le̩ abu ku ma fʼo̩je̩ ane̩ je̩ kpa, i kakini. Ago kide̩ chʼalo tito̩ ekpe̩ ef e̩bie̩-mi, e-ku ma du dafo todu me̩.]
Ama me̩ go, o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi adu mi ñwu ma mu le̩ dʼoj itebulu-i ugbo mi-i.
Todu O̩ma One̩ alo alu ku ma date̩ chuu; ama atogwo ki chʼe-e̩ne̩ ku ma dʼowñ ñwu ma mu lugbo-wñ!
Taku ma chane̩ enʼo̩la-ma ene, e̩ne̩ ki dʼefu ma kʼi ache kʼi che e̩wñ kide̩.
Tak ukana lewa te̩ ef uma, e̩ne̩ ku ma do̩ kʼi tʼuma le ef uma.
Oñ i ka ñw ma kakini, Amonu abo uche̩ichi dʼo̩la-ma chʼodu-ma; oñ ma do̩ abo ki nʼo̩da-ma ko̩ amabʼone̩ che.
Ame̩ muda adʼabe̩le̩ n; ama e̩ne̩ ki tule ef ume̩, owñ ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼi chʼimo̩to̩; oñ e̩ne̩ ki chʼagboji kʼi dabe̩ne̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ ñw one̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ tule? e̩ne̩ ki chekukane̩ ku ma dʼe̩wñ ñw u je̩? abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ ñw u? I chʼe̩ne̩ ki chekukane̩ n? Omi muda dʼalumeji-me̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ ñw one̩.
Ame̩ la chʼabo ku ma te̩tabʼumi gu ef ajama-mi ku ma ja mi ma.
Omi la adʼojane̩ du te̩ ñw me̩-i dabalu kʼAta-mi dute̩ ñw mi,
todu kʼame̩ ki je̩ kʼame̩ ki ño̩ ñmo̩ oj itebulu-mi ojane̩ e-mi; me̩ lañʼagugu oj ede akajo̩ amo̩lo̩pu Israe̩l me̩gweji le̩.
Saimo̩n, Saimo̩n, go, Setan tene me̩, kʼi fʼume̩ fe̩ dab o̩ka;
omi muda gbo̩ko̩bʼO̩jo̩ todu we̩ kʼe̩do̩-ekono-we̩ ki we eda; tak uwe̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ mudabiwa e̩ nahi amo̩maye-we̩ e̩re̩ nyane̩.
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, o̩la-mi che̩mu kʼu na le bʼuwe̩ tef unyi uga kpai tef uku ge̩.
Oñ i kakini, Naka ñw e̩ Pita, aiko̩ ako̩ eñini n, gbogbo tak e̩ fʼaire̩ re̩ onu me̩ta ka kʼe̩ ma mi n.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩gba kʼu kpʼume̩ uche̩ ku me̩ ma ne̩ alita n le̩ fa? kpʼugbo̩ o̩ko̩ kpʼe̩da le̩ fa? e̩wñʼka ña me̩? Oñ ma kakini, O̩da, i nʼe̩wñ du ki ña wa n.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ama fa-i, e̩ne̩ ki nʼalita namʼu du kpai ugbo̩ o̩ko̩ abe̩le̩ ge̩; oñ e̩ne̩ ki ma ne̩ n kʼi namʼotogbo-wñ du ta kʼi fʼugbada la.
Todu naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E-ki che̩ko̩tane̩ le̩ achekpoji efu mi tila, kakini, Ma la fʼowñ choli tef ame̩nugbite̩re̩: todu e̩wñ e-o̩la-mi chenʼukpoji.
Oñ ma kakini, Ondu, go, ugbada meji de̩. Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, I bo̩jo̩ me̩.
Tak i kwodufu oñ i le tʼoj uwo O̩lif alu kʼi te̩tache; amako̩che̩ le̩ ño̩ tʼo̩ ubi.
Oñ abu kʼi tʼugbo le̩ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ chadua ku me̩ we etʼef ajama.
Tak i chejugbolo kwʼugbo ma le jiji dabalu kʼone̩ arikpolo okuta; tak i mʼokuku ko nyane̩ achadua,
kakini, Ata-mi, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ neku e̩ mʼago kide̩ du bʼumi te̩: i muda chʼe-ki dʼumi e̩do̩ n chai e-ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼi wache.
Tak onucheʼka kwʼefojale wa kwotejugede ñw u ki bʼiñmi tʼiñmi ñw u.
Oñ abu kʼeju-wñ kpa nana i no̩ feju kpa rʼadua ache tule; ugu kʼi gu la dab e̩bie̩ ki akito̩ wane̩ dab o̩kpo̩ omi lile.
Tak abu kʼi kwane̩ bʼadua-wñ te̩ i lewa ugbo amako̩che̩ le̩, oñ i li ma abu ku ma jʼalolu noj e̩do̩dudu.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ jʼalolu? Me̩ kwane̩ ku me̩ chadua, todu kʼame̩ ki we egudu nyef ajama.
Oñ abu kʼi nʼo̩la aka ta, me̩ go, o̩wo̩ amone̩ kpai e̩ne̩ ku ma do̩ ko̩ Judas kʼi chʼoka ef amame̩gweji le̩ tʼuma o̩gba, oñ i te̩me̩ru Jisus kʼi dʼalu-wñ kʼo̩ alu.
Ama Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Judas, e̩ nʼalu ekʼO̩ma One̩ alu adu ñw u ma mu le̩?
Oñ abu kʼabo ku ma jo̩ lʼo daka li e̩wñ ki awa-che, ma kakini, Ondu, a dʼugbada da?
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka efu ma fʼadu agboji amatama le̩ da, oñ i mʼeti-wñ awo̩to̩ la.
Ama Jisus dohi oñ i kakini, Me̩ naje̩ gbogbo ta. Tak i dʼo̩wo̩ kad eti-wñ, i fʼu che tʼe̩gu-wñ.
Oñ Jisus ka ñw amagboji amatama kpai amagboji amadide unyi O̩jo̩ kpai abogijo ku ma wa ako bʼo̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ dufu wa kpai ugbada kpai ugbolo dabe̩ne̩ ku me̩ gbe̩re̩ adinya?
Omi dʼugbo me̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa ef unyi O̩jo̩, me̩ la nʼo̩wo̩-me̩ dala bʼumi ma n: e-i muda chʼauwa e-me̩ kpai e-o̩da e̩chubi.
Taku ma gwo̩nyʼowñ alo, oñ ma mʼu du le tef unyi agboji amatama. Pita muda tʼo̩ ubi o̩najiji.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼuna ko alumeji anuku le̩, ku ma la gugu kpai o̩la-ma jo̩. Pita kwogugu alumeji-ma.
Oñ imo̩to̩ onobule̩ʼka fʼowñ li abu kʼi gugu ugbo ugane̩ le̩, tak i kejurʼu chii, i kakini, E̩ne̩-i ño̩ dʼugbʼowñ ge̩.
Ama i raire̩, i kakini, Onobule̩, u mʼowñ no.
Taku ma jo̩ pe̩, oñ e̩nomune̩ fʼowñ li, i kakini, Uwe̩ ño̩ dʼefu ma ge̩. Pita muda kakini, One̩, i chʼomi no.
Tak i dabe̩ne̩ kʼauwaʼka oñ e̩nomune̩ ojoji gwo̩nyʼo̩la le̩ gbiti kakini, Ochochi e̩ne̩-i ño̩ dʼugbʼowñ ge̩; todu abo Galili i che.
Ama Pita kakini, One̩, u mema e̩wñ kʼe̩ ka-i n. Tak e̩re̩re̩le̩ abu kʼi nʼo̩la le̩ aka, aiko̩ ko.
Tak Ondu murida, oñ i go Pita. Taku Pita libekadʼo̩la e-Ondu le̩, abu i kʼi ka ñw u kakini, E̩ raire̩ mi onu me̩ta tak aiko̩ ki ko̩ eñini-i.
Tak i ledufu nyʼaraku anyanyi.
Tak aboke̩le̩ ku ma mu Jisus ne̩ gaga le̩ kwochʼo uke̩, ma fʼu gwo.
Taku ma fʼe̩wñ ji u eju, oñ ma tʼowñ ene kakini, Kache̩ ke: e̩ne̩ dʼe̩wñ nʼuwe̩-i?
Ma la ka e̩wñ omune̩ nyʼowñ o̩la wewe achakpabie̩ owñ.
Tak abu kʼo̩jo̩ muñwa, abo̩hiala abogijo amone̩ le̩ wajo̩, tʼamagboji amatama tʼamako̩takada; oñ ma dʼowñ alo tef ujo̩ abo̩hiala-ma, ma kakini,
Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ che Kraist le̩, e̩ naka ñw a. Ama i ka ñwu ma kakini, Dagba u ka ñwu me̩, i nʼugbo du ku me̩ jʼake̩do̩no n:
Dagba u tʼume̩ ene, i nʼugbo du ku me̩ jʼadohi n.
Ama akwʼe̩gba-i O̩ma One̩ agugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ ukpahiu e-O̩jo̩.
Oñ o̩chaka ma kakini, Mak uwe̩ chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩? Tak i ka ñw ama kakini, Ame̩ ka kʼomi che.
Oñ ma kakini, Eku e̩nibenu ño̩ ku wa taa? Todu awa onugo gbo̩ alu e-wñ.
Tak ugwe̩ko̩-ma chaka kwane̩, oñ ma mʼowñ du wʼo̩gba Pailat.
Oñ ma chane̩ egwajo̩ nʼowñ kakini, A li abu kʼe̩ne̩-i do̩mo̩ arʼabo uche̩ichi-wa da, i la akpo̩nanyʼe̩wñ-are̩ edu ñwu Sisa, i laño̩ ka kʼowñ onugo che Kraist onuʼka.
Taku Pailat tʼowñ ene kakini, Uwe̩ chʼOnu amaJu? Oñ i dohi ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ka-i.
Taku Pailat ka ñw amagboji amatama kpai amo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ kakini, U li udu du kʼe̩ne̩-i fe̩ n.
Ma muda je̩ ñw o̩la le̩ kʼi kpanyane̩ tule; ma kakini, I ako̩nyu amone̩ efu, i ako̩ amone̩ e̩wñ o̩gbo̩ ane̩ Judia chaka, i la chane̩ akwo Galili gbogbo wʼemi kide̩.
Ama abu ku Pailat gbʼo̩, i tene kakini, E̩ne̩ Galili i che?
Tak abu kʼi fu ma ka kʼi kwʼojane̩ ku He̩ro̩d nʼo̩da-wñ, i fʼowñ kpe̩ nyʼugbo He̩ro̩d, abu kʼowñ onugo la de̩ Je̩rusale̩m o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i.
Oñ abu ku He̩ro̩d li Jisus, i yo̩ tabale; todu i dʼowñ e̩do̩ ki ma li owñ kpo̩kpe̩ me̩ tod inabali-wñ kʼi gbo̩; i la kibeno ka kʼi ali e̩wñ ujiweʼka kʼi ache.
Oñ i nʼo̩la wewe atʼowñ ene; i muda dʼohi du ñw u n.
Tak amagboji amatama kpʼamako̩takada dago agwajo̩ nʼowñ kpa kpa kpa.
Oñ He̩ro̩d kpʼamisoja-wñ fʼowñ do̩rʼibe̩te̩, ma la fʼu chuke̩, ma mʼukpo ki afane̩ dab aili ko bʼo̩ o̩la ma, taku ma dʼowñ dabi nyʼugbo Pailat.
Oñ He̩ro̩d kpai Pailat mud onuku kpai omune̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ o̩jo̩ le̩: todu akwoubi ma chʼe̩nebi kpʼo̩la-ma.
Taku Pailat fʼamagboji amatama kpʼamagboji kpʼamone̩ le̩ do̩wajo̩,
i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ dʼe̩ne̩-i wʼugbo mi dab e̩ne̩ kʼi arʼamone̩ da tʼo̩wo̩ʼka: me̩ go, abu kʼomi fʼajo̩-wñ ka eju me̩, u la li udu du ef e̩ne̩ kide̩ ugbo ajo̩ ku me̩ gwunʼowñ n;
i chaka che He̩ro̩d, i li n: todu owñ dʼu dabi wʼugbo wa; me̩ la go, i ne̩ e̩wñ du kʼi che bʼuku jo̩ n.
Todule̩ nakʼowñ o̩la kʼu natʼo̩ no̩ tane̩. [
Todu I mud otila ñw u kʼi atʼe̩ne̩ʼka no̩ ñwu ma e̩gba ujeju ucholo du.]
Ama aluka-ma du kwokwa alukate kakini, Dʼe̩ne̩-i alo, kʼe̩ la tu Barabas no̩ ñw a:
owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma du tʼunyi uga tod uja ki chi ewo le̩ kpai tod one̩ ekpa.
Taku Pailat ño̩ dabi nomudala ako̩la ñwu ma, abu ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi tu Jisus no̩;
ama ma chʼomu kwa kakini, Mʼu du kamoli, mʼowñ du kamoli.
Tak i ka ñw ma onuke̩ta kakini, Todu e̩wñ? o̩la bibi e̩wñ e̩ne̩-i che? Omi li e̩wñ kʼi che kʼi aku ef uwñ n: todule̩ nakʼo̩ o̩la, kʼu natʼo̩ no̩.
Ama ma nʼomu nana kute̩ ebi-ebi ku ma fʼowñ kamoli. Oñ omu-ma fʼuma du.
Taku Pailat fʼoji ajo̩ le̩ kpa kʼi mud alu ku ma bi owñ.
Oñ i tʼe̩ne̩ ku ma du tʼunyi uga tod uja ki chi kpai one̩ ekpa no̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma bi le̩; i la mu Jisusi du ñw ma ku ma che e̩wñ ki dʼuma e̩do̩.
Tak abu ku ma dʼowñ alo, ma gwo̩nyu Saimo̩n oka kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ Sairini kʼi kwo egbili awa, oñ ma mʼoli uku le̩ du nʼowñ oji kʼi ne̩ tu Jisus ubi.
Oñ ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ wewe tʼowñ ubi, kpʼabobule̩ ku ma kʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩ ku ma deli e̩do̩dudu.
Todu Jisusi murida tugbo ma oñ i kakini, Amo̩ma onobule̩ e-Je̩rusale̩m, me̩ ki raku mi n, me̩ ki muda raku o̩la-me̩ kpʼamo̩ma-me̩.
Todu, me̩ go, o̩jo̩-wñ awa e̩gba ku ma akakini, Amagaji, kpʼabio̩ma ki ma bi o̩ma mama ta n gbede, kpʼe̩nya e-kʼo̩ma ma ñmo̩ mama ta n.
E̩gbale̩ ma achane̩ eka ñw uwo, uwo, kakini, Mulo̩ bʼuwa ma; ma la aka ñw uwo kekele kakini, Kwobʼuwa ma.
Todu iche̩wñ ku ma chʼe̩wñ kide̩ ef oli emimi, e̩wñ awate̩ ef e-e̩gbe̩ ge̩?
Ma laño̩ kʼabomune̩ ojoji meji ku ma che ame̩nuko̩lo̩ bibi lebʼo̩ ku ma mʼuma ko kpa.
Tak e̩gba ku ma lewa ugbo uña ku ma do̩ ko̩ Akokoloji, ma mʼu du kamoli o̩mo̩, kpai ame̩nuko̩lo̩ bibi le̩, oka dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩, oka la dʼo̩wo̩ awohi.
Oñ Jisus kakini, Ata-mi, to̩no̩ ñwu ma, todu ma ma e̩wñ ku ma ache-i n. Taku ma fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ kpe̩ ñw o̩la-ma, ma muko ato̩ko̩.
Amone̩ la dago ago. Amagboji ño̩ gwʼu iñmo̩ je̩, ma kakini, I fʼabomune̩ jadu, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩-i che Kraist e̩ne̩ kʼO̩jo̩ du le̩ i ki jadu o̩la-wñ ke.
Amisoja laño̩ chʼo uke̩, ma lewʼugbo-wñ, oñ ma mʼomi-e̩ka du te̩ ñw u,
ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ chʼOnu amaju, jadu o̩la-we̩ ke.
Oñ olubutu ku ma ko̩ ño̩ dʼoji-wñ ate̩ kakini, Onu amaJu de̩-i.
Tak oka ef ame̩nuko̩lo̩ bibi ku ma du lo̩ le̩ chakpabie̩ owñ kakini, I chʼuwe̩ che Kraisti n? Fʼo̩la-we̩ jadu kpʼawa.
Ama ekeji-wñ dohi, i dejurʼu kakini, Uwe̩ ño̩ railo O̩jo̩ ni ge̩, abu kʼuwe̩ ño̩ dʼef udu echi e̩re̩ʼka kpai owñ?
E-wa la tʼo̩kpakpa mana, todu e̩wñ kʼi bʼe̩wñ kʼa che jo̩ oñ a gba-i: e̩ne̩-i muda chʼe̩wñ ebita du n.
Tak i kakini, Jisus, e̩ narewa mi e̩gba du kʼe̩ lewa ef ojane̩-we̩.
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Ami naka ñw e̩, eñini-i uwe̩ adʼugbo mi efu Paradais.
I la dab auwa e̩ke̩fa e̩gbale̩, oñ e̩chubi wa te̩ bʼo̩gbo ane̩ le̩ du ma gbogbo wʼauwa e̩ke̩la;
olu kwodade, oñ ukpo uro̩na unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu mukpana alumeji.
Oñ Jisus dʼomu dago nana ko̩la kakini, Ata-mi, ef o̩wo̩-we̩ oñ nadu afu-mi te̩; tak abu kʼi fʼabe̩-i ka, i mʼafu-wñ du dufu.
Oñ abu kʼagboji amisoja ogume̩lu le̩ li e̩wñ ki wache, i dʼojima ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ kide̩ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa ogbolo.
Tak o̩wo̩-amone̩ du ku ma wajo̩ ugbo igo le̩, abu ku ma fʼe̩wñ ki wache le̩ go, ma mudabi kpai o̩wo̩ efiʼe̩do̩.
Oñ abo kʼi ma ma du kpai abobule̩ ku ma lebʼo̩ kwo Galili wa dago o̩najiji akejuru e̩wñ kide̩.
Me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abo Arimatia, ewo amaJu kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jose̩f, kʼi chʼabohialaʼka do̩mo̩. I chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ki nyo̩ kpai e̩no̩kpakpa,
kʼi ma dʼalu tʼo̩la ku ma lo kpai e̩wñ ku ma che le̩ n. I do̩mo̩ aneju ojane̩ e-O̩jo̩.
Owñ le̩ nyʼugbo Pailat, oñ i bi año̩la Jisus.
Tak i mʼu du wane̩, i la kʼukpo line̩n wenyʼu, oñ i mʼowñ du dachi ef oji ku ma da ef okuta, e-kʼone̩ ma dachi efu-wñ mama ta n.
O̩jo̩ le̩ la chʼO̩jo̩ Emo̩latane̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi la añwa waa.
Oñ abobule̩ ku ma lebʼo̩ kwo Galili wa darʼo̩ ubi, ma la go oji le̩ kpai alu ku ma du año̩la-wñ dachi.
Oñ ma mojida wa añwʼe̩wñ ki akpo kpai mur che.
Ama o̩jo̩ ejodudu ef o̩jo̩ mebie, inajo̩, inajo̩, ma lewʼugbo oji le̩, ma nʼe̩wñ ki akpo ku ma ñwo̩che le̩ wa.
Oñ ma li abʼokuta muliubi bʼalu oji te̩.
Taku mamugudu, ma la li año̩la Ondu Jisusi n.
Tak i leatu, abu kʼibe takpa rʼuma efu, me̩ go, aboke̩le̩ meji, kʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma afane̩ gbaa, wa bano ma.
Oñ abu kʼailo̩ fu ma mu, ku ma la fʼoji dalo̩ wʼane̩, ma ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ feju e̩ne̩ ki deju ef abo ki ku?
I dʼemi n, i kwane̩ me̩; me̩ dibekadʼalu kʼi ko̩la ñwu me̩ e̩gba kʼi de̩ Galili le̩,
i ka ku ma adʼO̩ma One̩ tef o̩wo̩ ame̩nadure tila, ku ma fu kamoli, tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ i adabi kwane̩.
Taku ma rewa o̩la kʼi ka,
oñ ma mudabi kwʼugbo oji le̩ wa, ma la fʼuka e̩wñ-i du je̩ ñw abo me̩gwaka le̩ kpʼabo ki bo̩ chaka.
Ama le̩ la che Me̩ri e-Magdalini kpai Jo̩ana kpai Me̩ri e-Jeme̩s; tak abobule̩ ki bo̩ ku ma jʼugbo ma fʼe̩wñ-i ka ñw ame̩nukpuche̩.
O̩la le̩ la dab o̩la e̩fule̩fu eju-ma; oñ ma ko̩ eke̩do̩nʼo̩la-ma. [
Ama Pita kwane̩, i fule nyʼugbo oji le̩; tak i tejukpe̩ go, i li ukpo line̩n le̩ kate ki jo̩ ojoji; tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼugbo abo-wñ; i nayaye e̩wñ ki wache le̩.]
Me̩ la go, one̩ meji ef uma dʼej o̩na alo tʼadogbe kʼodu-wñ ko̩ E̩meus o̩jo̩ le gbage̩de̩, ujiji-wñ akwo Je̩rusale̩m dab imaili mebie nyʼe̩bo̩.
Ma la nʼoluka e̩wñ ki ke̩re̩bo̩ ma-i du ache kpʼomune̩.
Oñ i leatu, ef oluka ku ma che, kpʼene ku ma nʼomune̩, Jisus, onugo, la te̩meru ma, oñ i le kpʼama.
Ama e̩wñʼka fʼo̩wo̩ bʼuma eju ma ku ma we emejumʼowñ.
Oñ i ka ñw ma kakini, O̩la e̩wñ me̩ jʼaro̩ kpʼomune̩ abu ku me̩ lule̩-i? Taku ma kwodago, ma fʼeju-ma bunyo̩wo̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka-ma kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Kliopas dohi ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ kate dodo kpʼo̩la-we̩ Je̩rusale̩m le̩, kʼe̩ ma ma e̩wñ ki wache iko-i n?
Tak i ka ñw ma kakini, Owñ chʼe̩wñ? Oñ ma ka ñw u ka kʼo̩la e-Jisus abo Nazare̩t e-kʼi chʼakache̩ kʼi nʼukpahiu ef uko̩lo̩ kpʼo̩la eju O̩jo̩ kpai eju amone̩ chaka;
kpai alu kʼamagboji amatama kpʼamagboji wa mʼowñ du tʼef ajo̩ uku, ku ma laño̩ mʼu du kamoli.
A la kibeno ka kʼowñ ma chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ache kʼi agba abo Israe̩l tane̩. Oñ amanyʼe-le̩ du, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta kʼe̩wñ-i wache de̩.
Abobule̩ iche̩ka ef uwa ño̩ je̩ ñw ibe-wa kpatuka ge̩, abu ku ma jʼugbo oji inajo̩-i;
oñ abu ku ma ma li año̩la-wñ n, ma lewa ka kʼama fʼamonuche̩ O̩jo̩ li ef ane̩ ego ku ma ka kʼowñ deju.
Tak iche̩ka ef abo ku ma jʼugbo wa le tugbo oji, oñ ma li ka kʼi dʼalu kʼabobule̩ le̩ ka; ma muda li owñ onugo n.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ku me̩ ma nʼibe n, kʼe̩do̩-me̩ ache̩durʼeke̩do̩no e̩wñ du kʼamakache̩ ka le̩!
Idukpe̩ ku Kraist ali uwa ugbo e̩wñ-i tila n? kʼi laño̩ mugudu tef ojima-wñ n?
Tak i chane̩ akwo Mose̩s kpʼamakache̩ chaka, oñ i fʼomudechi o̩la e̩wñ-wñ du kʼi dʼef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ je̩ ñwu ma.
Oñ ma me̩ru adogbe ugbo ku ma nyi le̩ alo waa; tak i che dabe̩ne̩ kʼi ale gudu nyʼo̩gba.
Taku ma chʼadahi-wñ kakini, E̩ bʼuwa gugu todu ane̩ alo̩, o̩jo̩ la me̩ru edu me̩. Tak i mugudu tʼejefu kʼi bʼuma gugu.
Oñ i leatu, abu kʼi chekukane̩ kʼi jʼe̩wñ kpʼama, i mʼakala du oñ i fʼugwa-wñ gwa; tak i fu bu, oñ i mʼu du ñwu ma.
Tak eju-ma mune̩, oñ ma fʼowñ ma; tak i takpa rʼuma eju.
Taku ma ka ñw omune̩ kakini, E̩do̩-wa bʼuwa je̩ abu kʼi ko̩la ñw a ej o̩na abu kʼi nʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ abi rʼuwa eju le̩ n?
Taku ma kwane̩ auwa le̩ gbage̩de̩, ma la mudabi nyi Je̩rusale̩m, oñ ma li kʼabo me̩gwaka le̩ jejujo kpʼabo ku ma jʼugbo ma,
ma kakini, Ochochi, Ondu kwane̩ me̩, i laño̩ kwotejugede ñwu Saimo̩n.
Taku ma fʼe̩wñ ej o̩na le̩ choli jo̩, kpai alu ku ma meju mʼowñ ef akala kʼi bu le̩.
Oñ abu ku ma jʼako̩la e̩wñ-i, owñ onugo kwodago alumeji ma, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ure̩do̩ ki dʼugbo me̩.
Ma muda kwogagogodo, ailo fʼuma mu, ma do̩ kʼafuʼka ma li le̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ chʼe̩do̩ ñwa ñwala? Tode̩wñ o̩la elo kwane̩ ef e̩do̩-me̩?
