Me̩ gʼo̩wo̩-mi kpʼe̩re̩-mi, kakini, Omi onugo de̩; me̩ dʼo̩wo̩ che mi ku me̩ go; todabu kʼafu ma ne̩ o̩re̩la kpai achiku dabalu kʼame̩ li kʼomi ne̩-i n. [
Tak abu kʼi fʼe-kide̩ ka, i mʼo̩wo̩-wñ kpʼe̩re̩-wñ ko ñama.]
Oñ abu ku ma ma ke̩do̩no ta n, noj eyo̩ ku ma yo̩, ku ma laño̩ jo̩ ayaye, i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ne̩ e̩wñ kʼa je̩ emi?
Taku ma mʼe̩bu e̩ja ewoʼka du ñw u.
Oñ i mʼu du, i la je̩ eju-ma.

Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E-i chʼo̩la-mi kʼu ka ñwu me̩ e̩gba kʼu dʼugbo me̩ ta, ka kʼi chʼotila kʼe̩wñ du ki che̩ko̩tane̩ ef o̩loda Mose̩s kpʼamakache̩ kpʼEli ku Defid ko̩ do̩ O̩jo̩ ugbo o̩la-mi, ki che̩ kpa.
E̩gbale̩ i mʼibe-ma bi, kʼama ki moji O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abe̩le̩ i che̩ko̩tane̩ ka ku Kraist ali uwa kʼi lañʼakwane̩ kwef abo ki ku o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta;
ku ma ki ño̩ fʼakoya ibe erida kpai adure eto̩no̩ ta ef odu-wñ ugbo abo uche̩ichi chaka, kʼama ki chane̩ Je̩rusale̩m.
Ame̩ chʼame̩nibenu e̩wñ kide̩.
Me̩ la go, omi akpʼe̩wñ kʼAta-mi kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ dufu abʼume̩ ma: ame̩ ki muda gugu ewo-i, gbogbo wʼe̩gba ku ma dʼukpahiu kwo ojale tʼo̩la-me̩.
Oñ i mʼuma ko ledufu, gbogbo wa Be̩tani: tak i mʼo̩wo̩-wñ ko dago, i la de̩nyo̩ ñwu ma.
Oñ i leatu, abu kʼi do̩mo̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñwu ma le̩, i kwobʼuma te̩, ma la mʼowñ du tʼefojale.
Taku ma dojikane̩ ñw u, oñ ma mudabi nyi Je̩rusale̩m kpʼuyo̩ lile;
ma la jʼef unyi O̩jo̩ e̩gba du akele O̩jo̩.
E̩gba abakwane̩ ejodudu o̩la kʼa ka-i do̩mo̩. Oñ o̩la le̩ dʼugbo O̩jo̩. O̩la le̩ la chʼO̩jo̩.
E̩ne̩-i do̩mo̩ e̩gba abakwane̩ ejodudu ugbo O̩jo̩.
E̩wñ du wajo̩ lef uwñ, ef e̩wñ du ki wajo̩, i nʼe-du ki wajo̩ ubi-wñ ojoji n.
Ef uwñ iñmi de̩; iñmi le̩ la chʼugane̩ amone̩.
Oñ ugane̩ le̩ natejugede ef e̩chubi, e̩chubi la fʼu bo n.
E̩ne̩ʼka ku ma kpʼo̩ uche̩ kwugbo O̩jo̩ wate̩, odu-wñ ko̩ Jo̩n.
E̩ne̩-i lewa todu kʼi gbʼugane̩ le̩ ibenu, todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki ke̩do̩no lef uwñ.
I chʼowñ chʼugane̩ le̩ n, chai todu kʼi gba ugane̩ le̩ ibenu.
Ugane̩ e-ogbolo chʼe-ki agane̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du abu kʼi awʼile̩.
I dʼile̩, ile̩ la wate̩ lef uwñ, ile̩ muda mʼo̩ n.
I wʼugbo e̩wñ e-wñ; abo e-wñ la gbʼo̩ n.
I muda dʼo̩da ñw abo du ku ma mʼowñ gba ku ma mud amo̩ma O̩jo̩: owñ chʼabo du ku ma ke̩do̩nʼodu-wñ.
I chʼabo kʼe̩bie̩ ojoji ojoji chʼe̩te̩-ma n; e̩wñ ki dʼo̩re̩la e̩do̩ la chʼe̩te̩-ma n; e̩wñ ki dʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e̩do̩ la chʼe̩te̩-ma n; chai abo ku ma bi kʼO̩jo̩ chʼe̩te̩-ma.
O̩la kʼa ka-i la mud ore̩la oñ i ge̩ne̩ ef uwa, (a la fʼojima-wñ li, ojima-wñ dab e-omokpono ugbo Ata-wñ), i che̩ko̩ ñw ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼochochi.
Jo̩n do̩mo̩ agbʼo̩ ibenu, ila kwukwa kakini, E̩ne̩-i chʼe̩ne̩ kʼu kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼi dʼubi-mi awa mud e̩ne̩ ki tʼo̩gba ñwu mi, todu i do̩mo̩ ejodudu tak omi do̩mo̩.
Todu o̩chaka wa mʼe̩wñ gba kwef e̩ko̩-wñ, ufe̩de̩nyo̩ la koji ufe̩de̩nyo̩.
Todu ma dʼo̩lo̩da wa lefu Mose̩s; ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼochochi wate̩ lefu Jisus Kraist.
E̩ne̩ du li O̩jo̩ mama ta n; O̩jo̩, O̩mokpono kʼi dʼagbe̩do̩ Ata, e-le̩ ka alu kʼi de̩ dufu.
Ibenu ki Jo̩n gba le̩ de̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼamaJu fʼamatama kpʼabo Lifai kpe̩ kwo Je̩rusale̩m nyʼugbo-wñ kʼama ki tʼo̩ ene kakini, Uwe̩, e̩ne̩ de̩?
Oñ i gbalu, i la je̩; oñ i gbalu kakini, Omi che Kraisti n.
Taku ma tʼowñ ene kakini, Tod e̩wñ? Uwe̩ chʼE̩laija? Oñ i kakini, I chʼomi no. Uwe̩ chʼakache̩ le̩? Ila dohi kakini, O̩da.
Todule̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ e̩ che? todu kʼawa ki kʼohi wa ñw abo ku ma kpʼuwa uche̩-i. Ab e̩ kʼeka e-o̩la-we̩ ke?
I kakini, Omi chʼomuko̩la ki dʼaje̩tachi akwukwa kakini, Me̩ ki chʼo̩na Ondu te̩ ogbolo alu kʼAizaya akache̩ le̩ ka.
Abo ku ma kpʼuma uche̩ wa le̩ chʼabo Farisi.
Taku ma tʼowñ ene, ma la ka ñw u kakini, Mak e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ achʼone̩ baptism? kʼuwe̩ ma chʼiKraisti n, abe̩k E̩laija n, abe̩k akache̩ le̩ n taa?
Jo̩n dohi ñwu ma kakini, Omi achʼone̩ baptism ef omiofo; e̩ne̩ʼka dago alumeji-me̩ e-kʼame̩ ma mʼo̩ n;
owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼubi mi awa, e-kʼomi ma nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ kʼu natʼiku e̩da-wñ n.
E̩wñ-i wache Be̩tani, ejudaba Jo̩rdan odede ugbo ki Jo̩n de̩ ache baptism.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ i li abu ki Jisus awʼugbo-wñ, oñ i kakini, Go, O̩mala O̩jo̩ ki adʼadure abile̩ kwʼemi le̩ de̩.
E̩ne̩-i chʼe̩ne̩ kʼu kʼo̩la-wñ kakini, E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka dʼubi mi awa e-kʼi mud e̩ne̩ ki tʼo̩gba ñwu mi, todu i do̩mo̩ ejodudu tak omi do̩mo̩.
U la mʼo̩ n; ama todu kʼi atejugede ñw abo Israe̩l, todule̩ oñ omi lewa achʼone̩ baptism ef omiofo.
Oñ Jo̩n gbʼibenu kakini, Omi li abu kʼAfu agwo̩ru kwʼefojale awa, oñ i gugu oji-wñ.

U la mʼo̩ n; e̩ne̩ ki muda kpe̩ mi wa ache baptism ef omiofo, owñ le̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ ali abu kʼAfu agwo̩ru awa kʼi la kwogugu oji-wñ, e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki achʼone̩ baptism ef Afu Kiafo̩.
Omi la fʼu li me̩. U laño̩ fʼibenu-wñ gba kakini, E̩ne̩-i chʼO̩ma e-O̩jo̩.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ Jo̩n dago kpʼamako̩che̩-wñ meji.
Oñ abu kʼi kejuru Jisus kʼi alule̩, i kakini, Go, O̩mala e-O̩jo̩ de̩.
Amako̩che̩-wñ meji le̩ la gbo̩ abu kʼi aka-i, oñ ma kwotu Jisus ubi.
Oñ abu ki Jisus murida kʼi la go abu ku ma atʼo̩ ubi, i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ me̩ feju? Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Rabai (ku ma jʼomudechi-wñ kakini, Akone̩wñ), ugbo e̩ gugu?
I ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ lewa taku me̩ ali. Todule̩ ma lewa go ugbo kʼi gugu, oñ ma bʼo̩ gugu o̩jo̩ le̩. E̩gbale̩ dab agogo me̩le̩.
Anduru, o̩maye Saimo̩n Pita, chʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef abo meji ku ma gbo̩ ugbo Jo̩n ku ma la tʼo̩ ubi.
E̩ne̩ le̩ fu Saimo̩n, o̩maye-wñ onugo li ejodudu, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, A fu Me̩saya li me̩, (e-ku ma jʼomudechi-wñ ko̩ Kraisti).
I nʼowñ nyʼugbo Jisus. Abu ki Jisus kejurʼu i kakini, Uwe̩ che Saimo̩n, o̩ma Jo̩n; ma adʼodu-we̩ ko̩ Kifas, (e-ku ma jomudechi-wñ ka ku Pita).
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ i dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi dufu nyi Galili. Tak i fu Filip li, oñ Jisus ka ñwu kakini, Tʼumi ubi.
Filip la chʼabo Be̩tsaida, ewo Anduru kpai Pita le̩.

Filip fu Natanie̩l li, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ ku Mose̩s fʼo̩la-wñ ko̩ nyʼef o̩takada o̩lo̩da, kpʼe̩ne̩ kʼamakache̩ ño̩ kʼo̩takada-wñ le̩, a fu li me̩. Owñ che Jisus, o̩ma Jo̩se̩f, kʼi kwo Nazare̩t.
Taku Natanie̩l ka ñw u kakini, E̩te̩ e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ neke de̩ Nazare̩t? Filip ka ñw u kakini, Lewa go,
Jisus li Natanie̩l abu kʼi awʼugbo-wñ, oñ i nʼo̩la-wñ aka kakini, Go, e̩ne̩ Israe̩l ochochi, e-kʼo̩gwo̩ ma dʼef uwñ ni de̩.
Natanie̩l ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo e̩ ma mi kwo? Jisus dohi ka ñw u kakini, O̩gba taku Filip dʼuwe̩ omu, abu kʼe̩ dʼof oli o̩gbaikolo u li we̩.
Natanie̩l dohi ñw u kakini, Rabai, Uwe̩ che O̩ma O̩jo̩; uwe̩ chʼOnu Israe̩l.
Jisus dohi oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Todabu kʼu ka ñw e̩ ka kʼu li we̩ of oli o̩gbaikolo le̩, uwe̩ ake̩do̩no? Uwe̩ ali e̩wñ ki tʼabʼe-i le.
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ ali efojale kʼi mubite̩, kpʼamonuche̩ O̩jo̩ ku ma jo̩ ate̩gu agwo̩ru wʼoji O̩ma One̩.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ mud iyawo Kena e-Galili; iye Jisus la dʼane̩ o̩mo̩.
Ma ño̩ do̩ Jisus kpʼamako̩che̩-wñ wʼugbo iyawo le̩ ge̩.
Tak abu kʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma takpa, iye Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Ma nʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma ge̩ n.
Taku Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Onobule̩, e̩wñ chʼe-mi kpai uwe̩? Iko-mi tu ta n.
Iye-wñ ka ñw abuko̩lo̩ kakini, E̩wñ du kʼi aka ñwu me̩, me̩ che.
Añmo̩ me̩fa la nyane̩ jʼo̩mo̩, teju alu kʼamaJu ache ku ma fʼe̩wñ gwe̩ hiolo, okoke-wñ aje̩ otube̩ me̩lu abe̩k e̩fa.
Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ kpʼomi ofo nyʼañmo̩ le̩ e̩kʼe̩ko̩. Oñ ma kpanyʼu gbogbo wʼalu-wñ.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Fa-i me̩ che ku me̩ du wa ñw agboji uje̩wñ-i. Oñ mʼa mʼu du alo.
Tak e̩gba kʼagboji uje̩wñ le̩ dʼomi ki mud omi achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩ chʼalu, kʼi ma la mʼugbo kʼi kwo n, (abuko̩lo̩ ku ma kpʼomifo le̩ muda ma), agboji uje̩wñ le̩ fʼo̩ko̩ya etito̩ do̩wa,

oñ i ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ du adʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ ne ejodudu, e̩gba ku ma ñmʼo̩ kefu (taku ma adʼe-ki ma nyo̩ dab owñ n ne); uwe̩ muda dʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ maja gbogbo wʼe̩gba-i.
Uchane̩ ujiwe-wñ-i Jisus che Kena e-Galili. Oñ i dʼojima-wñ tejugede. Amako̩che̩-wñ la ke̩do̩nʼowñ.
Ubi le̩ tak i gwo̩ru nyi Kapanahum, owñ kpʼiye-wñ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ kpʼamako̩che̩-wñ. Ma gugu o̩mo̩ pe̩, ma muda jʼo̩jo̩ wewe n.
Elaloji e-amaJu la me̩rane̩; oñ Jisus mute̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak i fʼabo ku ma ta amokuno̩ kpai amala kpai amikede li ef unyi O̩jo̩, kpai abo ku ma chenji o̩ko̩ ku ma gugu jo̩.
Tak i mʼiku du chʼedili. Oñ i fʼuma ne kwef unyi O̩jo̩ dufu chaka, tʼamala, tʼamokuno̩; i la mʼo̩ko̩ abo ku ma chenji o̩ko̩ ko dafo, oñ i mʼitebulu-ma rida bane̩ma.
I ka ñw abo ku ma ta amikede kakini, Me̩ mʼe̩wñ-i ko kwemi, me̩ ki dʼunyi Ata-mi chʼunyi-aja n.
Amako̩che̩-wñ la rewa ka kʼi che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, E̩do̩-mi ki tʼunyi-we̩ akʼumi e̩che̩.
Todule̩ amaJu dohi ka ñw u kakini, Ujiwe e̩wñ e̩ duña wa, todabu kʼe̩ che e̩wñ abe̩i?
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ gu unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu-i lo̩, gbogbo nyʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta nadʼu kwane̩.
Todule̩ amaJu kakini, O̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke me̩fa ma jʼef unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu-i ako̩, uwe̩ ñʼadʼu kwane̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta?
I muda chʼo̩la unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu e-año̩la-wñ oñ i ka le̩.
Todule̩ e̩gba ku ma mʼowñ du dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, amako̩che̩-wñ rewa o̩la kʼi ka-i, ma la ke̩do̩nʼo̩la kʼo̩takada O̩jo̩ ka kpai o̩la ki Jisus ka ge̩.
Oñ abu kʼi de̩ Je̩rusale̩m ugbo Elaloji ef uje̩wñ uyo̩ le̩, amone̩ wewe ke̩do̩nʼodu-wñ, abu ku ma jʼago ujiwe-wñ kʼi ache.
Jisus onugo muda ke̩do̩no ma kʼi tʼo̩la-wñ no̩ ñwu ma n, todu ema kʼi ma e̩ne̩ du,
i ño̩ chʼutodabu kʼeku kʼe̩ne̩ du ki gbibenu one̩ ma ku owñ n; todu owñ chema e̩wñ ki dʼef one̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka ef amaFarisi do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Nikodimus, e̩nuto̩gba ef amaju i che;
owñ le̩ wʼugbo Jisus odu, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Rabai, a chema kʼuwe̩ chʼakone̩wñ ki kwugbo O̩jo̩ wa; todu e̩ne̩ du neke che ujiwe kʼuwe̩ ache-i n, chai e̩gba kʼO̩jo̩ dʼubi wñ.
Jisus dohi ñw u kakini, Ami, ami, naka ñw e̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ ku ma ma bi one̩ etito̩ n i neke li ojane̩ O̩jo̩ n.
Niko̩dimus ka ñw u kakini, Abile ku ma nekʼabi one̩ e̩gba kʼi chʼogijo? I neke gudu tʼefu iye-wñ onuʼkeji ku ma ñʼabi?
Jisus dohi kakini, Ami, ami naka ñw e̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ ku ma ma bi one̩ kwef omi kpai Afu n, i neke gudu nyʼojane̩ O̩jo̩ n.
E-ku ma bi kwef o̩re̩la, o̩re̩la i che; e-ku ma la bi kwef Afu, afu i che.
Uwe̩ ki we eyaye todabu kʼu ka ñw e̩ ka ki dukpe̩ ku ma bi me̩ etito̩ tila.
Afu aju ugbo du ki dʼe̩ e̩do̩, e̩ la gbo̩ iche̩wñ, e̩ muda ma ugbo kʼi kwo wa n, e̩ la ma ugbo kʼi anyi n; abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ du ku ma bi kwef Afu de̩ ge̩.
Niko̩dimus dohi ka ñw u kakini, Abile kʼe̩wñ-i neke ache ta?
Oñ Jisus dohi ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ako̩ abo Israe̩l e̩wñ, e̩ la ma ofe e̩wñ-i n?
Ami, ami, naka ñw e̩ ka kʼe̩wñ kʼa ma oñ a kʼo̩la-wñ, e̩wñ kʼa li e̩wñ le̩ a gbʼibenu-wñ; ame̩ la do̩ ibenu kʼa gba rʼochochi n.
Iche̩wñ kʼu ko̩la e̩wñ ile̩ ñwu me̩, ku me̩ ma la ke̩do̩no n, iche̩wñ kʼu nako̩la e̩wñ efojale ñwu me̩, abile ku me̩ ake̩do̩no?
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki te̩gu nyʼefojale n, chai e̩ne̩ ki gwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa, owñ chʼO̩ma One̩ kʼi dʼefojale.
Alu ku Mose̩s dʼejo le̩ dago aje̩tachi le̩ abe̩le̩ ma adu O̩ma One̩ dago tila,
todu kʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi ake̩do̩no kʼi nʼiñmi ogbegbeie̩ ef uwñ.
Todu, abu kʼO̩jo̩ fe̩do̩ ile̩ le̩ de̩, todabe̩le̩ i mʼO̩ma-wñ okpono duchele, todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki ake̩do̩nʼo ki we elenyo̩, kʼi muda nʼiñmi ogbegbeie̩.
Todu O̩jo̩ kpʼO̩ma-wñ wʼile̩ todu kʼi kajo̩ ile̩ n, chai todu ku ma fʼile̩ jadu lef uwñ.
Ma akajo̩ e̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩nʼowñ n; ma fʼajo̩ e̩ne̩ ki ma ke̩do̩nʼo n ka me̩, todabu kʼi ma ke̩do̩nʼodu O̩ma okpono O̩jo̩ n.
Ajo̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, Ugane̩ le̩ lewʼef ile̩ me̩, amone̩ la fe̩do̩ e̩chubi tʼugane̩ le̩ le; todu e̩wñ ku ma agwo̩nyu ache chʼuko̩lo̩ bibi.
Todu e̩ne̩ du ki dʼef e̩wñ ibe̩te̩ eche achʼulaka ugane̩, i la awʼugbo ugane̩ n, todu ku ma we edʼuko̩lo̩-wñ kʼi ache biʼu.
E̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ ochochi muda awʼugbo ugane̩, todu kʼuko̩lo̩-wñ kʼi ache ki tejugede kakini, Ef O̩jo̩ oñ i achuko̩lo̩ le̩.
Anubi e̩wñ le̩ Jisus kpai amako̩che̩-wñ wʼoj ane̩ Judia, i la kpo̩kpe̩ o̩mo̩ kpai ama, oñ i nʼone̩ ache baptism.
Jo̩n la ño̩ de̩ Eno̩n ki me̩ru Selim ache baptism ge̩, todabu kʼomi chenana o̩mo̩; taku amone̩ lewa oñ i che ma baptism.
Todu ma du Jo̩n rikpolo tef unyi-uga e̩gbale̩ ta n.
Todule̩ iñwa chi ñw amako̩che̩ Jo̩n kpai e̩ne̩Juʼka noji e̩wñ egwe̩ hiolo.
Taku ma le wʼugbo Jo̩n, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Rabai, e̩ne̩ ki dʼugbo we̩ ejudaba Jo̩rdan, e̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ gbʼo̩ ibenu le̩, go, owñ le̩ achʼone̩ baptism amone̩ du la wʼugbo-wñ.
Jo̩n dohi kakini, Iche̩wñ ku ma ma du ñw u kwʼefojale n, one̩ neke gba e̩wñ du n.
Ame̩ onugo chʼe̩nibenu-mi kʼu kakini, I chʼomi che Kraisti n, chai kakini, Ekpe̩ ma kpe̩ mi uche̩ tʼo̩gba e̩ne̩ le̩.
E̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩ya etito̩, o̩ko̩ya de̩; ama eyo̩ okolobia o̩ko̩ya, e-kʼi dago agbʼo̩la-wñ ayo̩, tod omuko̩la o̩ko̩ya le̩ kʼi agbo̩; todule̩ uyo̩-mi kide̩ nyo̩ kpa me̩.
E̩ne̩ le̩ ki naya nyo̩gba tila, kʼomi ki nacho̩wo̩wane̩.
E̩ne̩ ki kwʼefojale wa tʼamone̩ du le; e̩ne̩ kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼane̩-ilee̩mak abo ile̩ i che, oñ i ako̩la kwef e̩wñ ane̩-ile̩; e̩ne̩ ki kwʼefojale wa tʼamone̩ du le.
E̩wñ kʼi li kpai e̩wñ kʼi gbo̩ e̩wñ le̩ i agbʼibenu-wñ; e̩ne̩ du la ado̩ ibenu-wñ kʼi gba rʼochochi n.
E̩ne̩ ki mʼo̩la ibenu-wñ gba, mak i fʼu hiuko̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ chʼochochi.
Todu e̩ne̩ kʼO̩jo̩ kpuche̩ wa aka o̩la kʼO̩jo̩ ka; todu i adu Afu le̩ chele e̩ñwa-e̩ñwa n.
Ata afe̩do̩ O̩ma, i la mʼe̩wñ du ko nyʼowñ o̩wo̩.
E̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩nʼO̩ma le̩ fʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ ne̩ me̩; ama e̩ne̩ ki ma agbʼo̩la O̩ma le̩ gbo̩ n ali iñmi n, uwe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ muda gugu oji-wñ.
Todule̩ e̩gba kʼOndu ma kʼamaFarisi gbo̩ kaku Jisus ache amako̩che̩ wewe, kʼi la ache ma baptism ku ma wewe tu e-Jo̩n le
(Jisus onugo muda che ma baptism n, chai amako̩che̩-wñ che ma),
i tu Judia no̩, i ño̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ nyi Galili ge̩;
i la dukpe̩ kʼi alale gu Samaria du.
Abe̩le̩ i lewa ewo Samariaʼka ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Saikar; i me̩ru ane̩ ku Jeko̩b bu ñw o̩ma-wñ Jose̩f le̩.
Omi e-Jeko̩b ki abi kwef ane̩ dufu la dʼugbo le̩. Todule̩ abu ule̩ kʼi le fu Jisus hia, i kwogugu abe̩le̩ ugbo kʼomi abi dufu le̩.
Oñ i onobule̩ʼka kwo Samaria wa kʼi kpa omiofo. Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Dʼomi ñwu mi ñmo̩.
Todu amako̩che̩-wñ kwʼo̩mo̩ le tef ewo ku ma la uje̩wñ.
Todule̩ onobule̩ Samaria le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Abile kʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ chʼiJu abi omi kʼe̩ ñmo̩ ugbo mi kʼu chʼonobule̩ Samaria? (Todu amaJu anaru abo Samaria n.)
Jisus dohi ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ma ma ele O̩jo̩, kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi aka ñw e̩-i kakini, Dʼomi ñwu mi ñmo̩, uwe̩ ma bi owñ, tak owñ ma dʼomi ki adeju ñw e̩.
Onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Odu-mi, e̩ nʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ nʼakpa n, obuga-i la chʼenefu; ugbo e̩ nʼomi ki deju le̩ kwo ta?
Uwe̩ tʼata-wa Jeko̩b le? e-ki mʼobuga-i du ñwu wa, kʼowñ onugo la ñmo̩ omi-wñ, kpai amo̩ma-wñ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩-wñ?
Jisus dohi ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki añmo̩ omi kide̩ olugbe̩ ñʼakpʼo̩ ge̩;
e̩ne̩ du kʼi muda ñmo̩ omi e-kʼomi adu ñw u, alugbe̩ ñʼakpʼo̩ gbegbele̩ ge̩ n, omi kʼu nadu ñw u la amud omi ki abi efu-wñ e-ki aroko tef iñmi ogbegbele̩.
Onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw owñ kakini, Odu-mi, dʼomi kide̩ ñwu mi, todu kʼalugbe̩ ki we ekpa mi, kʼu we ele gbogbo wʼemi kʼu kpa.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ dʼo̩ko̩-we̩ omu, kʼe̩ lewa emi.
Onobule̩ le̩ dohi kakini, U nʼo̩ko̩ n. Jisus ka ñw u kakini, O̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩ ka kakini, U nʼo̩ko̩ n;
todu e̩ fʼo̩ko̩ me̩lu ne̩ me̩, e̩ne̩ kʼe̩ ne̩ fa-i i la chʼo̩ko̩-we̩ de̩ n; ochochi e̩ ka le̩.
Onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Odu-mi, u cheli kʼuwe̩ chʼakache̩.
Amata-wa dojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩ oj uwo kide̩; ame̩ la ka ku Je̩rusale̩m chʼugbo ki dukpe̩ kʼamone̩ adojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Onobule̩, e̩ ki dʼo̩la-mi rʼochochi kakini, Adiko auwa awa, e̩gba le̩ tʼoj uwo kide̩ tʼefu Je̩rusale̩m, me̩ ñʼadojikane̩ ñw Ata n.
Ame̩ jʼadojikane̩ ñw e̩wñ ku me̩ ma ma n; awa adojikane̩ ñw e̩wñ kʼa ma; todu ef amaJu oñ ujadu kwo.
Ama adiko auwa awa, owñ la chʼifa-i, kʼabo ku ma dojikane̩ ogbolo adojikane̩ ñw Ata ef afu kpai ef ochochi; todu Ata do̩mo̩ afeju abo ki dʼabʼe-i ku ma dojikane̩ ñw u.
O̩jo̩ chʼAfu; oñ i dukpe̩ kʼabo ku ma dojikane̩ ñw u ki dojikane̩ ñw u ef afu kpai ochochi tila.
Onobule̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, U chema ka ku Me̩saya awa (e-ku ma do̩ Kraisti le̩); e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ lewa, i aka e̩wñ du ñwu wa.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Omi, ki ako̩la ñw e̩-i, omi le̩ de̩.
Tak ababa le̩ amako̩che̩-wñ lewa; aye je̩ ñwu ma n, todabu kʼi ako̩la kpai onobule̩; e̩ne̩ du muda kakini, E̩wñ e̩ feju? abe̩k e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ko̩la kpai owñ? n.
Tak onobule̩ le̩ tʼotube̩-wñ no̩ tane̩, oñ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tef ewo, oñ i ka ñw amone̩ kakini,
Me̩ lewa ku me̩ go e̩ne̩ ki fʼe̩wñ du kʼu che ka ñwu mi; e̩ne̩-i neke che Kraisti le̩ de̩?
Ma kwʼef ewo dufu, oñ ma jʼo̩na awʼugbo-wñ.
Agbagba le̩ amako̩che̩-wñ rodubʼo̩ kakini, Rabai, je̩ e̩wñ ke.
I muda ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi chenʼuje̩wñ kʼu naje̩ e-kʼame̩ ma ma n.
Todule̩ amako̩che̩ le̩ ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, I neke chʼone̩ dʼe̩wñ wa ñw u je̩?
Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Uje̩wñ-mi de̩: todu kʼu che e̩wñ ki dʼe̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa e̩do̩, kʼu la fʼuko̩lo̩-wñ chekpa.
Ame̩ kakini, Ochu me̩le̩ tak iko o̩ka e̩ja awane̩ n? Me̩ go, naka ñwu me̩, me̩ ki chi eju-me̩ nyʼate̩ ku me̩ la go oko, abu kʼi chefufu te̩, i tʼe̩gba e̩ja me̩.
E̩ne̩ ki aja agbʼuro̩me̩, oñ i amʼe̩ro kowa jo̩ tef iñmi o̩gbegbele̩; todu kʼe̩ne̩ ki agbe̩ kpai e̩ne̩ ki aja ku ma yo̩ e̩gba kate.
Todu ef e̩wñ-i oñ o̩la le̩ chʼogbolo kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka agbe̩; e̩ne̩ omune̩ la aja.
Omi kpʼume̩ uche̩ ku me̩ ja e̩wñ ki ma chʼame̩ chʼakanya uko̩lo̩-wñ n; abomune̩ chʼakanya wñ tak ame̩ lewa tef akanya e-ma.
Abo Samaria wewe ef ewo le̩ la ke̩do̩nʼowñ tod o̩la onobule̩ ki gbʼibenu kakini, I fʼe̩wñ du kʼu che ka ñwu mi me̩.
Todule̩ e̩gba kʼabo Samaria wʼugbo wñ, ma rodubʼo̩ kʼi bʼuma gugu; oñ i gugu o̩mo̩ o̩jo̩ meji.
Amone̩ wewe tʼe-le̩ le ño̩ ke̩do̩no tod o̩la e-wñ ge̩,
taku ma ka ñw onobule̩ le̩ kakini, I chʼutod o̩la kʼe̩ ka oñ a ke̩do̩no-i ge̩ n; todu awa onugo nʼeti-wa gbo̩ me̩, a la chema kakini, E̩ne̩-i chʼE̩najadu ile̩ ochochi.
O̩jo̩ meji le̩ lerane̩ tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu nyi Galili.
Todu Jisus onugo gbʼibenu kakini, Akache̩ nʼojima ane̩ e-wñ n.
Abe̩le̩ e̩gba kʼi lewa Galili, abo Galili mʼowñ gba abu ku ma fʼe̩wñ du kʼi che Je̩rusale̩m ef uje̩wñ ucholo le̩ li; todu ama ño̩ nyʼugbo uje̩wñ ucholo le̩ ge̩.
Todule̩ i ño̩ dabi wa Kena e-Galili ge̩, ugbo kʼi dʼomiofo le̩ che omi achiwebe̩te̩ma. Oñ edibo onuʼka kʼo̩ma-wñ achʼo̩ga de̩ Kapanahum.
Abu kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ gbo̩ ka ku Jisus kwo Judia wa ane̩ Galili me̩, i nyʼugbo wñ, oñ i rodubʼo̩ kʼi gwo̩ru wa kʼi che o̩ga o̩ma-wñ kpa; todu i ache kʼi ku.
Todule̩ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Me̩ ma li ujiwe kpai uno̩ n, i nʼugbo du ku me̩ jʼake̩do̩no n.
Edibo le̩ ka ñw owñ kakini, Odu-mi, gwo̩ru wa o̩gba tak o̩ma-mi ki ku.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩ nalo we̩, o̩ma-we̩ deju. E̩ne̩ le̩ ke̩do̩nʼo̩la ku Jisus ka ñw u, oñ i le wñ.
Tak abu kʼi agwo̩ru alo, owñ kpai amadu-wñ de, ma ka ñw u kakʼo̩ma-wñ deju.
Todule̩ i tʼuma ene auwa e̩gba kʼi checheme̩. Todule̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, Auwa e̩kebie o̩nale̩ oñ o̩la-e̩kpuna le̩ tʼo̩ no̩.
Oñ ata le̩ ma ka kʼauwa ku Jisus ka ñw u kakini, O̩ma-we̩ deju, le̩ de̩; tak owñ onugo ke̩do̩no kpai o̩gbo̩ abunyi-wñ du.
Ujiwe ekeji ki Jisus che abu kʼi kwo Judia nyi Galili le̩ de̩.
Anubi e̩wñ-i ge̩ uje̩wñ ucholo amaJuʼka do̩mo̩, oñ Jisus te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Abukpe omiʼka la de̩ Je̩rusale̩m me̩ru alo̩na amala; ma dʼodu-wñ alu Hibru ko̩ Be̩tsaida; i che̩nʼagbaru me̩lu.
Ef agbaru me̩lu-i ugwe̩ko̩ ame̩ne̩gbo o̩la dachi, tʼamafeju, tʼamade̩re̩, tʼabo kʼo̩la-ma che̩gbe̩. [Ma nede e̩gba kʼomi amiejo:
todu i chenʼe̩gba kʼonuche̩ Ondu agwo̩ru wʼef e̩dagu-omi le̩ kʼi la fʼomi le̩ miejo; todule̩ abu kʼomi le̩ ami, e̩ne̩ ki dʼo̩gba tunyʼu, alu du kʼo̩ga de̩ ki mʼu ne̩, o̩la-wñ adabi tiko.]
E̩ne̩ʼka la do̩mo̩ kʼi dʼef e̩gbo o̩la-wñ o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩jo̩.
E̩gba ku Jisus li-u abu kʼi dachi, kʼi la ma ka kʼi dachi abe̩le̩ kpo̩kpe̩ me̩, i ka ñw u kakini, I dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼo̩la-we̩ ki dabi tiko?
E̩ne̩gbo le̩ dohi ñw u kakini, Odu-mi, u nʼone̩ ki adu mi rikpolo tef abukpe̩ omi-i e̩gba kʼomi-wñ amiejo n; ama e̩gba du kʼu le kʼu wa e̩nomune̩ agwo̩ru o̩gba mi.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Kwane̩, mʼakpata-we̩ du kʼe̩ lule̩.
Tak ababale̩ o̩la e̩ne̩ le̩ mudabi tiko, i la mʼakpata-wñ du i kwane̩ alule̩. O̩jo̩ le̩ la chʼo̩jo̩ uñmi.
Todule̩ amaju ka ñw e̩ne̩ ku ma che o̩ga-wñ kpa le̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ uñmi de̩, o̩da je̩ ñw e̩ dʼakpata-we̩ n.
Ama i dohi ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ ki je̩ ñw o̩la-mi dabi tiko, e̩ne̩ le̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, Mʼakpata-we̩ du kʼe̩ lule̩.
Ma tʼowñ ene kakini, E̩ne̩ ka ñw e̩, Mʼu du, kʼe̩ lule̩?
E̩ne̩ ku ma che o̩ga-wñ kpa le̩ la ma e̩ne̩ ki che n; todu Jisus muji kwʼo̩mo̩ abu kʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ jʼugbo le̩.
Anubi e-le̩ Jisus fʼu li ef unyi O̩jo̩, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Go, e̩ mudabi tiko me̩; e̩ ki ño̩ dure ge̩ n, tode̩gba kʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ tule ake̩re̩bʼe̩.
E̩ne̩ le̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le; oñ i ka ñw amaJu kaku Jisus chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi je̩ ñw o̩la-wñ dabi tiko.
Tod ekide̩ ge̩ oñ amaJu kwodoli Jisus, todabu kʼi fʼe̩wñ-i che o̩jo̩ uñmi.
Ama Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ata-mi te̩tachuko̩lo̩ gbogbo wʼe̩gba-i, omi la achuko̩lo̩ ge̩.
Todu ekide̩ amaJu ño̩ feju tule ku ma fʼu kpa, i chutodabu kʼi atu o̩jo̩ uñmi kate n, i muda ño̩ ka kʼO̩jo̩ chʼAta e-wñ ge̩; kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ chʼokujo̩ kpai O̩jo̩.

Todule̩ Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ami, ami naka ñwu me̩ kakini, O̩ma neke chʼe̩wñ du kpai ojika o̩la-wñ n, chai e̩wñ kʼi li kʼAta ache; todu e̩wñ du kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ache, e̩wñ le̩ oñ O̩ma ñʼache abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Todu Ata ache̩do̩ O̩ma; i adʼe̩wñ du kʼi ache ñʼo̩; i adʼuko̩lo̩ ki tʼe-i le i ñʼo̩ ge̩, todu kʼame̩ ki yaye.
Todu alu kʼAta akʼabo ki ku dajikwane̩, kʼi año̩ du iñmi ñwu ma, abe̩le̩ O̩ma adʼiñmi ñw e̩ne̩ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ ge̩.
Todu Ata akajo̩ e̩ne̩ du n, i la mʼajo̩ eka chaka ko ñw O̩ma me̩;
todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki bumʼO̩ma alu ku ma bumʼAta. E̩ne̩ ki ma bumʼO̩ma n abumʼAta e-ki kpʼo̩ wa n.
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki agbʼo̩la-mi kʼi laño̩ ke̩do̩nola e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa fʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ ne̩ me̩, i ñʼawʼef ajo̩ ge̩ n, i muda kwʼef uku lale tef iñmi me̩.
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Adiko auwa-wñ awa, owñ le̩ la chʼifa-i, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼabo ki ku agbo̩ omuko̩la O̩ma O̩jo̩; abo ku ma la gbo̩ adeju.
Todu alu kʼAta chenʼiñmi ef o̩to̩to̩la-wñ, abe̩le̩ i ño̩ du ñw O̩ma kʼi nʼiñmi ef o̩to̩to̩la-wñ ge̩;
i laño̩ mʼo̩da ajo̩ du ñw u kʼi kada, todabu kʼi chʼO̩ma One̩.
Me̩ ki yaye e̩wñ-i n; todu adiko awa e̩gba kʼabo du ku ma jʼef oji agbo̩ omuko̩la-wñ,
ma ñʼadufu wa; abo ku ma te̩tachʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ atef udajikwane̩ e-iñmi, abo ku ma te̩tache e̩wñ ibe̩te̩ atef udajikwane̩ e-ajo̩.
U neke gʼe̩do̩la-mi ache e̩wñ du n; alu kʼu nagbo̩, alu le̩ nakajo̩, ajo̩ e-mi la chʼo̩kpakpa, todabu kʼu ma feju e̩wñ ki du mi onugo e̩do̩ n, chai e̩wñ ki dʼe̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa e̩do̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼomi agbʼo̩la-mi ibenu, mak ibenu-mi le̩ chʼochochi n.
E̩ne̩ omune̩ do̩mo̩ kʼi agba mi ibenu, u la chema ka kʼibenu kʼi agba mi chʼochochi.
Ame̩ fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nyugbo Jo̩n me̩, i la gba ochochi ibenu,
i muda chʼijali e-one̩ omi agba n; ama naka e̩wñ-i todu ku ma ki fʼume̩ jadu.
E̩ne̩ le̩ chʼagege e-ku ma dʼuna tʼo̩ kʼi adʼe̩wñ tejugede; i la dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ jʼef ugane̩-wñ agwoguyo̩ pe̩.
Omi muda chene̩ ibenu ki tʼe-ki Jo̩n gba le̩ le; todu uko̩lo̩ kʼAta du ñwu mi todu kʼu chekpa, uko̩lo̩ le̩ onugo e-kʼu nache agba mi ibenu kakini, Ata kpe̩ mi wa-i.
Oñ Ata ki kpe̩ mi wa le̩, owñ le̩ gba mi ibenu. Me̩ gbʼomuko̩la-wñ mama ta n, me̩ la li alu kʼi de̩ n.
Me̩ la nʼo̩la-wñ ki gugu ef ume̩ n; todu me̩ ke̩do̩nola e̩ne̩ kʼowñ le̩ kpuche̩ wa n.
Me̩ tejane̩ ef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ todabu kʼame̩ do̩ ka ku me̩ ne̩ iñmi ogbegbele̩ ef uwñ; e-le̩ la chʼe-kʼi agba mi ibenu,
i la dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ wʼugbo mi ku me̩ anʼiñmi n.
Nagba ojima kwʼugbo one̩ n.
U muda chema ame̩ ka kʼame̩ nʼufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ ef o̩la-me̩ n.
Omi lewa ef odu Ata-mi, me̩ la gba mi n; iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ lewa ef odu e-wñ, me̩ agba e̩ne̩ le̩.
Ame̩ ku me̩ gba ojima kwʼugbo o̩la-me̩, ku me̩ ma tene ojima ki kwugbo O̩jo̩ kate le̩ n, abile ku me̩ neke ake̩do̩no ke?
Me̩ ki do̩ ka kʼomi agwʼajo̩ nʼume̩ ugbo Ata n; e̩ne̩ʼka do̩mo̩ ki agwajo̩ nʼume̩, owñ che Mose̩s, e̩ne̩ ku me̩ kibeno le̩.
Todu iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma ke̩do̩nola Mose̩s, me̩ ma ke̩do̩nola mi ge̩; todu o̩la-mi i ko̩ nyʼo̩takada le̩.
Ama iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma ke̩do̩nola kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ko̩ tef o̩takada n, abile ku me̩ ake̩do̩nola kʼomi aka?
Anubi e̩wñ le̩ Jisus kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼudaba ohimini Galili e-Taiberias.
O̩wo̩-amone̩ lile darʼo̩ ubi, todabu ku ma li ujiwe kʼi ache o̩la ame̩ne̩gbo.
Oñ Jisus mute̩gu nyʼibe̩uwo, i la gugu o̩mo̩ kpai amako̩che̩-wñ.
Oñ Elaloji, uje̩wñ ucholo e-amaju le̩, la me̩rane̩.
Todule̩ abu ku Jisus chʼeju nyate̩ kʼi la li kʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ lile awʼugbo-wñ, i ka ñwu Filip kakini, Ugbo a ala uje̩wñ kwo todu kʼabo-i ki je̩ ke?
I la fʼe-i ka kʼi jʼowñ ma; todu owñ chema e̩wñ kʼi ache ki che.
Filip dohi ñw u kakini, Uje̩wñ alu ipamu me̩gwa bʼuma jo̩ todu kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki gba pe̩ n.
Anduru, o̩maye Saimo̩n Pita, e̩ne̩ʼka ef amako̩che̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini,
Imo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka dʼemi kʼinʼikpakpa o̩ka barli me̩lu kpai e̩ja meji; ama abʼe-le̩ muda ache ef amone̩ wewe abe̩i?
Jisus kakini, Me̩ je̩ ñw amone̩ guguane̩. Egbe la dʼugbo le̩ nana. Todule̩ aboke̩le̩-ma kwoguguane̩, aluka-ma dab icham me̩fa nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩.
Todule̩ Jisus mʼikpakpa le̩ gba; oñ abu kʼi fʼugwa-wñ gwa, i mʼu ko kpe̩ ñw abo ku ma jʼane̩; abe̩le̩ i ño̩ fʼe̩ja le̩ kpe̩ ñwu ma, alu du ki dʼuma e̩do̩ ge̩.
E̩gba kʼefu-ma ko̩ i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, Me̩ mʼabubo̩ akala ki kwu ma bo̩ le̩ re jo̩, todu kʼe-i du ki we elenyo̩.
Todule̩ ma mʼu rejo̩; ma la mʼabubo̩ ikpakpa barli me̩lu le̩ e-ki kwu abo ku ma je̩ le̩ bo̩ ko nyʼaligada me̩gweji e̩ko̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼamone̩ fʼujiwe kʼi che li, ma kakini, Owñ-i chʼakache̩ O̩jo̩ ki awʼef ile̩-i le̩ de̩, ochochi.
Todule̩ abu ku Jisus chema ka ku ma che ku ma wa ku ma mʼowñ dinya ku ma dʼu jʼonu, i kwʼo̩mo̩ dabi nyʼibe̩uwo, owñ kate.
Tak e̩gba ki mud iko adarane̩, amako̩che̩-wñ gwo̩ru nyʼo̩lʼohimini.
Ma kwo tʼo̩ko̩, oñ ma daba ohimini alo tu Kapanahum; ane̩ chubi e̩gbale̩ me̩, Jisus la wʼugbo ma ta n.
Oñ ohimini chane̩ echo̩ko̩ tod afu lile ki aju.
Todule̩ abu ku ma fʼo̩ko̩ gwa dab imaili me̩ta abe̩k e̩le̩, ma li Jisus abu kʼi alule̩ ej ohimini ame̩ru o̩ko̩ awa; taku ma railo.
I muda ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi de̩, me̩ ki railo n.
Todule̩ oñ i dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma mʼowñ gba tef o̩ko̩; ababa le̩ o̩ko̩ le̩ tʼane̩ ugbo ku ma anyi.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ o̩wo̩-amone̩ ki dago jo̩ ejudaba ohimini le̩ li kʼo̩mo̩ko̩ omune̩ do̩mo̩ n chai okate; Jisus la tʼo̩ko̩ kpai amako̩che̩-wñ n, chai amako̩che̩ kate le̩
(ama o̩mo̩ko̩ kwo Taibe̩rias wa ame̩ru ugbo ku ma jʼakala abu kʼOndu fʼugwa gwa le̩);
todule̩ e̩gba kʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ li ka ki Jisus dʼugbo le̩ ge̩ n, tʼamako̩che̩-wñ duu, ama onugo kwo̩tʼo̩ko̩, oñ ma lewa Kapanahum afeju Jisus.
Tak abu ku ma fʼowñ li ejudaba ohimini le̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, Rabai, e̩gba e̩ wʼemi ke?
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩, i chʼutodabu ku me̩ fʼujiwe li oñ me̩ tene mi n, chai todabu ku me̩ bʼikpakpa le̩ je̩ kʼefu-me̩ la ko̩.
Me̩ ki chuko̩lo̩ tod uje̩wñ ki alenyo̩ rʼile̩ n, chai tod uje̩wñ e-ki ado̩mo̩ nyʼiñmi ogbegbele̩, e-kʼO̩ma One̩ ako ñwu me̩; todu Ata, e-ki chʼO̩jo̩, fʼowñ hiuko̩ me̩.
Todule̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ a che todu kʼawa ki chʼuko̩lo̩ O̩jo̩?
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ ki chʼuko̩lo̩ O̩jo̩ de̩, todu kʼame̩ ki ke̩do̩no e̩ne̩ kʼi kpuche̩ wa.
Todule̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chʼujiwe kʼuwe̩ ache ta, todu kʼawa li kʼawa ki ke̩do̩nola-we̩? Uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ e̩ che?
Amata-wa je̩ mana le̩ ef aje̩tachi; dabalu ki che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, I kʼuje̩wñ kwʼefojale ñwu ma je̩.
Todule̩ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩, i che Mose̩s dʼuje̩-wñ ki kwʼefojale le̩ ñwu me̩ n; Ata-mi muda akʼuje̩wñ e-ogbolo kwʼefojale ñwu me̩.
Todu uje̩wñ e-O̩jo̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki agwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa, kʼi la adʼiñmi ñw abile̩.
Todule̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, Odu-wa, kʼuje̩wñ e-le̩ ñw u wa e̩gba du.
Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi chʼuje̩wñ e-iñmi; i nugbo du kʼebi akpʼe̩ne̩ ki awʼugbo mi n; i la nugbo du kʼolugbe̩ akpʼe̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩nʼomi ogbegbele̩ n.
U muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ fʼumi li me̩, me̩ la ke̩do̩no n.
E̩wñ du kʼAta adu ñwu mi atʼugbo mi, oñ e̩ne̩ ki awʼugbo mi, i nugbo du kʼu nadu rikpolo tʼo̩do̩da n.
Todu u gwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa todu kʼu chʼe̩wñ ki dʼumi onugo e̩do̩ n, chai e̩wñ ki dʼe̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa e̩do̩.
E̩wñ ki la dʼe̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa e̩do̩ le̩ de̩, todu kʼu we edʼe̩wñ okate tinyo̩ kwef e̩wñ du kʼi ko ñwu mi, chai kʼu nadʼu kwane̩ o̩jo̩ otitala.
Todu e̩wñ ki dʼAta-mi e̩do̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki ali O̩ma, kʼi laño̩ ke̩do̩nʼowñ, ki nʼinmi ogbegbele̩, tak omi adʼowñ kwane̩ o̩jo̩ otitala.
Todule̩ amaJu dʼowñ te̩ akeñmini, todabu kʼi kakini, Omi chʼuje̩-wñ ki gwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa.
Ma ño̩ kakini, E̩ne̩-i chʼiJisus o̩ma Jose̩f le̩ de̩ n? e-kʼawa ma ata-wñ kpai iye-wñ n? Abile kʼi aka fa-i kakini, Omi gwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa?
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ki keñmini kpai o̩la-me̩ n.
Ata ki kpe̩ mi wa ma fʼo̩ wa n; e̩ne̩ du neke wʼugbo mi n, tak omi adʼuwñ kwane̩ o̩jo̩ otitala.
I che̩ko̩tane̩ ef o̩takada amakache̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ akʼo̩chaka-ma e̩wñ. E̩ne̩ du ki gbʼo̩la ugbo Ata, ki la ko̩che̩, awugbo mi.
I cheka kʼe̩ne̩ du li Ata n, chai e̩ne̩ ki kwʼugbo O̩jo̩; owñ le̩ fʼAta li.
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩no fʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ ne̩ me̩.
Omi chʼuje̩wñ e-iñmi.
Amata-me̩ fu mana le̩ je̩ ef aje̩tachi, ma la leku.
E-kide̩ chʼuje̩wñ ki agwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa, todu kʼone̩ ki buje̩, kʼi la we eku.
Omi chʼuje̩wñ ki deju e-ki gwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa; iche̩wñ kʼone̩ bʼuje̩wñ kide̩ je̩ i adeju ogbegbele̩, oñ uje̩wñ kʼomi adu chele todu iñmi abʼile̩ chʼo̩re̩la-mi.
Todule̩ amaJu kwokʼuja bʼo̩la-ma, ma kakini, Abile kʼowñ le̩ neke dʼo̩re̩la-wñ ñw a je̩?
Todule̩ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma je̩ o̩re̩la O̩ma One̩ ku me̩ ma la ñmo̩ e̩bie̩-wñ n, ame̩ nʼiñmi ef o̩to̩to̩la-me̩ n.
E̩ne̩ ki aje̩ o̩re̩la-mi kʼi ñʼañmo̩ e̩bie̩-mi, fʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ ne̩ me̩; tak omi adʼowñ kwane̩ o̩jo̩ otitala.
Todu o̩re̩la-mi chʼuje̩wñ ochochi, e̩bie̩-mi la chʼomi ochochi.
E̩ne̩ ki aje̩ o̩re̩la-mi kʼi la añmo̩ e̩bie̩-mi gugu ef umi oñ omi gugu ef uwñ ge̩.
Alu kʼAta ki deju kpʼumi uche̩-i kʼomi la deju lef Ata le̩, abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ ki aje̩ mi, e̩ne̩ le̩ onugo ñʼadeju todu mi ge̩.
Uje̩wñ ki gwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa le̩ de̩; i dabalu kʼamata le̩ je̩ ku ma la ku n; e̩ne̩ ki aje̩ uje̩wñ kide̩ adeju ogbegbele̩.
I fʼe̩wñ kide̩ ka ef unyi ujeju, abu kʼi nʼe̩wñ ako̩ ma Kapanahum.
Todule̩ e̩gba ku ma gbo̩ amako̩che̩-wñ wewe kakini, O̩la kide̩ che-gbiti; e̩ne̩ aneke gbo̩?
Ama abu ku Jisus chema ef uwñ ka kʼamako̩che̩-wñ dʼe-kide̩ tʼakeñmini, i ka ñwu ma kakini, E-i ada me̩ hi-i?
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ li O̩ma One̩ kʼi ate̩gu tʼugbo kʼi de̩ o̩gbo̩gba fa?
Afu chʼe-ki adʼiñmi ñw e̩wñ, o̩re̩la nʼile du n; o̩la kʼomi ka ñwu me̩ le̩, afu i che, iñmi i laño̩ che ge̩.
Ama aboʼka jʼef ume̩ ku ma ma ke̩do̩no n. Todu Jisus chema kwʼejodudu abo ki che ku ma ma ke̩do̩no n, kpai e̩ne̩ ki adʼowñ ñw amone̩ mu.
Tak i kakini, To̩d e-kide̩ u ka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du neke wʼugbo mi n, chai e̩gba ku ma du ñw u kwugbo Ata.
Akwe̩gbale̩ amako̩che̩-wñ wewe kwʼo̩mo̩ le, ma mudabi tubi, ma ño̩ lule̩ kpai owñ ge̩ n.
Todule̩ Jisus ka ñw abo me̩gweji le̩ kakini, I ño̩ dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ lo ge̩?
Saimo̩n Pita dohi ñw u kakini, Ondu, ugbo e̩ne̩ owñ a anyi ke? kʼuko̩la e-iñmi ogbegbele̩ uwe̩ ne̩-i.
A la mʼe̩do̩ kono me̩, a la chema ka kʼuwe̩ chʼE̩ne̩ Kiafo̩ e-O̩jo̩.
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, I chʼomi chi me̩, ame̩ abome̩gweji-i n? E̩ne̩ʼka efu me̩ la chʼabulumone̩.
O̩la Judas, o̩ma Saimo̩n Iskario̩t oñ i ka-i, todu owñ, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef abo-me̩gweji le̩, ache ki mʼowñ du ñw amone̩ mu.
Tak ubi e-kide̩ Jisus tʼalule̩ ane̩ Galili, todu i dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi lule̩ ane̩ Judia n, todabu kʼamaJu feju ku ma dʼu kpa.
Ujeju ucholo amaJu e-ebu-emu la me̩rane̩.
Todule̩ amo̩maye-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Kwʼemi, kʼe̩ nyi Judia, todu kʼamako̩che̩-we̩ ki ño̩ li uko̩lo̩-we̩ kʼe̩ che ge̩.
Todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki afeju kʼeju o̩ja ki mʼo̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ umaja n. Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ache e̩wñ-i, dʼo̩la-we̩ tejugede ñw ab ile̩.
Todu ichaka chʼamo̩maye-wñ onugo ma ke̩do̩nʼowñ n.
Todule̩ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Iko e-mi tu ta n; iko e-me̩ muda chʼe̩gba tʼe̩gba du.
Abile̩ neke chulaka me̩ n; i muda achulaka mi, todabu kʼomi gbibenu o̩la-wñ kakini, Uko̩lo̩-wñ chʼuko̩lo̩ bibi.
Ame̩ ki te̩gu nyʼugbo ujeju ucholo-i; omi ate̩gu nyʼugbo ujeju ucholo-i ta n, todabu kʼiko-mi ma jo̩ kpa ta n.
Abu kʼi fʼe̩wñ-i ka ñwu ma, i la kwogugu Galili ta.
Ama e̩gba kʼamo̩maye-wñ mute̩gu nyʼugbo ujeju ucholo le̩, e̩gbale̩ tak owñ onugo mute̩gu le, i le ejugede n, ama i dabe̩ne̩ kʼi le umaja umaja.
Todule̩ amaJu feju-wñ ef ujeju ucholo le̩ oñ ma kakini, Ugbo e̩ne̩ le̩ de̩?
Eñmini o̩la-wñ ki dʼef o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ nana; aboʼka ka kakini, E̩ne̩ ki nyo̩ i che; abomune̩ kakini, O̩da, o̩wo̩ amone̩ i ako la le̩.
E̩ne̩ du la kʼo̩la-wñ ejo̩ja n, todu ailo amaJu aba ma.
E̩gba ku ma fʼujeju ucholo je̩ wʼukpeji, Jisus mute̩gu nyʼunyi O̩jo̩, oñ i nako̩ ma e̩wñ.
Todule̩ amaJu nayaye kakini, Abile kʼowñ le̩ chemʼo̩takada? I la ko̩che̩ n.
Todule̩ Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Uko̩o̩la kʼomi ako̩ one̩ chʼe-mi n, chai e-e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa-i.
Iche̩wñ ki du e̩ne̩ du e̩do̩ ki ache e̩wñ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩, i ama oji uko̩-o̩la-i abe̩k e-O̩jo̩ i che, abe̩k ugbo o̩to̩to̩la-mi omi aka o̩la-i kwo.
E̩ne̩ ki agʼe̩do̩la-wñ ako̩la afeju kʼowñ onugo ki nʼojima, ama e̩ne̩ ki feju kʼe̩ne̩ ki kpʼo̩ uche̩ ki nʼojima, owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ochochi, uji du la dʼef uwñ n.
I che Mose̩s dʼo̩lo̩da ñwu me̩ n? E̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ la che alu kʼo̩lo̩da ka n.
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ feju ekpa mi? O̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ dohi kakini, Uwe̩ chenʼebili, e̩ne̩ feju ki akpʼuwe̩?
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, U fʼuko̩lo̩ʼka che, o̩chaka me̩ yaye todu wñ.
Mose̩s mʼe̩pi-eda du ñwu me̩ (i chʼeka kʼe-Mose̩s i che n, chai e-amata-wa igbele); me̩ la dʼe̩pi one̩ o̩jo̩ uñmi.
Iche̩wñ ku ma dʼone̩ e̩pi o̩jo̩ uñmi todu kʼo̩lo̩da Mose̩s ki we etu, me̩ lo̩fu rʼumi ukpe̩ kʼu che kʼo̩chaka año̩la one̩ ki dabi tiko o̩jo̩ uñmi?
Me̩ ki ñwʼe̩wñ go alu kʼejo̩do̩da-wñ de̩ n; chai ajo̩ o̩kpakpa me̩ ka ke.
Todule̩ iche̩kibo̩ ef abo Je̩rusale̩m kakini, Owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma feju ku ma du kpa de̩-i n?
Me̩ la go, i ako̩la ejo̩ja, ma la kʼabu du ñw owñ n. I neke chʼeka kʼamagboji chema ochochi ka kʼowñ le̩ che Kraisti le̩ de̩?
A muda chema ugbo kʼe̩ne̩-i kwo; ama e̩gba du ku Kraisti awa, e̩ne̩ du ama ugbo kʼi kwo wa n.
Todule̩ abu ku Jisus nako̩ ma e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩, i domudago kakini, Tʼomi, tʼugbo kʼu kwo, me̩ chema; u la gʼe̩do̩la mi wa n, e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa e-ku me̩ ma mʼo̩ n le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ogbolo.
Omi chemʼo̩, todabu ki chʼugbo wñ omi de̩, owñ le̩ la kpʼumi uche̩ wa-i.
Todule̩ ma feju ku ma fʼowñ mu; e̩ne̩ du la hi o̩wo̩ mʼo̩ n, todabu kʼiko-wñ ma jo̩ ta n.
Ama amone̩ wewe ef o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ la ke̩do̩nʼo. Ma kakini, Kraisti lewa, i ache ujiwe wewe tʼe-kʼe̩ne̩-i che le?
AmaFarisi gbo̩ abu kʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ dʼo̩la-wñ te̩ ajeñmini, abe̩-i; tak amagboji amatama kpai amaFarisi fʼabimo̩to̩ kpe̩ wa ku ma fʼu mu.
Todule̩ Jisus kakini, Nadʼugbo me̩ pe̩ ta, tak u nalo tʼugbo e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa.
Me̩ afeju mi, me̩ la ali mi n; ugbo kʼomi de̩, ame̩ la neke wa n.
Todule̩ amaJu ka kpʼo̩la-ma kakini, Ugbo e̩ne̩-i ache kʼi nyi, kʼawa ma ali owñ n? i ache kʼi nyʼugbo abo ku ma fʼuma kpatuka rʼef amaGrik, kʼi ako̩ amaGrik e̩wñ?
E̩wñ chʼo̩la kʼi ka-i kakini, Me̩ afeju mi, me̩ la ali mi n, ugbo kʼomi de̩, ame̩ la neke wa n?
E̩gba o̩jo̩ otitala e-ki chʼo̩jo̩ lile e-ujeju ucholo le̩, Jisus kwodago, i domudago kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼolugbe̩ akpʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi nawʼugbo mi añmʼomi.
E̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩no mi, i ade̩ alu kʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ka kakini, Ohimini wewe e-omi ki deju acha kwef uwñ.
Ama e-kʼi ka-i chʼo̩la Afu, ki bo̩ pe̩ kʼabo ku ma ke̩do̩nʼowñ agba: todu Afu do̩mo̩ ta n, todabu ku ma ma dʼojima ñwu Jisus e̩gbale̩ ta n.
Todule̩ abu kʼaboʼka ef o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ gbʼo̩la le̩, ma kakini, Owñ le̩ chʼakache̩ le̩ de̩ ochochi.
Abo-mune̩ kakini, Owñ le̩ che Kraisti le̩ de̩. Ama abo iche̩ka kakini, Maku Galili oñ Kraist akwo wa?
O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ka kakini, Kwef ugbe̩ Defid, kwo Be̩tle̩he̩m, ewo ugbo ku Defid de̩ oñ Kraist akwo wa n?
Abe̩le̩ o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ mudareji tod owñ.
I la du aboʼka ef uma e̩do̩ ku ma fʼu mu, e̩ne̩ du muda hi e̩wo̩ mʼo̩ n.
Todule̩ abimo̩to̩ le̩ lewʼugbo amagboji amatama kpai amaFarisi; oñ abo le̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ ma dʼowñ wa n?
Abimo̩to̩ le̩ dohi kakini, One̩ du ko̩la alu kʼe̩ne̩ kide̩ aka mama ta n.
Todule̩ amaFarisi dohi ñwu ma kakini, I ño̩ mʼame̩ ko la ge̩?
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ef amagboji abe̩k ef amaFarisi kʼi ke̩do̩nʼowñ me̩?
O̩wo̩-amone̩ ku ma ma ma o̩lo̩da-i n, ama ku ma na fʼuma mu me̩.
Niko̩dimus e-kʼi wʼugbo wñ o̩gbo̩gba le̩ abu kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef uma,
i ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩lo̩da-wa akpʼone̩ abi e̩gba ki ma gbʼalu e̩ne̩ le̩ ejodudu kʼi ma e̩wñ kʼi che n?
Ma dohi ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ Galili uwe̩ ño̩ che ge̩? Tejane̩ kʼe̩ li kakini, I nʼakache̩ du kʼi akwane̩ Galili n. [
Tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ le tʼunyi-wñ.
Ama Jisus le tʼibe̩ uwo O̩lif.
Odudu odudu i ño̩ dabi wʼef unyi O̩jo̩ ge̩, tak amone̩ du wʼugbo-wñ, oñ i kwoguguane̩ ako̩ ma e̩wñ.
Tak amako̩takada kpʼamaFarisi mʼonobule̩ʼka ku ma mu ef o̩ko̩ eje̩ du wʼugbo-wñ; abu ku ma mʼowñ du dago alumeji,
ma ka ñw u kakini, Akone̩wñ, ma fʼonobule̩-i mu abu ki do̩mo̩ ajo̩ko̩.
Efo̩lo̩da Mose̩s la tuko̩ ñw a ka kʼa ki kʼokuta ro̩ dʼe̩ne̩ e̩go̩-i; uwe̩ fa, ab e̩ ka?
E-ku ma ka-i ma du jʼowñ ma, todu ku ma nʼe̩wñ ku ma gwo̩nyu ugbo-wñ. Ama Jisus te̩kpe̩ adʼo̩mo̩-wo̩-wñ kʼolubutu ane̩.
Oñ abu ku ma natʼowñ ene waa, i mute̩dago, i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ ki ma nʼadure n, e̩ne̩ le̩ ki kʼokuta ro̩ dʼo ejodudu.
Tak i ño̩ dabi te̩kpe̩ akʼolubutu ane̩ ge̩.
Oñ abu kʼabo le̩ gbʼo̩, ma kwodufu okoka, ma chane̩ kwo ogijo ogijo gbogbo wa e̩ne̩ otitala; tak i bo̩ Jisus kate kpʼonobule̩ le̩ alumeji onto ugbo kʼi de̩.
Jisus mute̩dago, i ka ñw u kakini, Onobule̩, ugbo ma jo̩? I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki kpʼe̩ abi n?
Oñ i kakini, I nʼe̩ne̩ du n, Ondu. Taku Jisus kakini, Omi la akpʼe̩ abi ni ge̩; lo we̩, e̩ ki ño̩ dure ge̩ no.]
Todule̩ Jisus ño̩ dabi ko̩la ñwu ma kakini, Omi chʼugane̩ ile̩; e̩ne̩ ki atʼumi ubi alule̩ ef e̩chubi n, i muda ane̩ ugane̩ e-iñmi.
Todule̩ amaFarisi ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ agba o̩la-we̩ ibenu me̩; ibenu-we̩ chʼochochi n.
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Dagba omi chaka agba o̩la-mi ibenu, ibenu-mi chʼochochi, todabu kʼu chema ugbo kʼu kwo wa kpai ugbo kʼu nanyi; ame̩ muda ma ugbo kʼu kwo wa-i n, kpai ugbo kʼu nanyi n.
Ame̩ kajo̩ alu kʼo̩re̩la de̩; omi akajo̩ e̩ne̩ du n.
Omi chaka kajo̩, ajo̩ e-kʼomi aka chʼajo̩ ogbolo, todabu ki ma chʼomi kate de̩-i n, ama i chʼomi kpai Ata ki kpe̩ mi wa.
I laño̩ che̩ko̩ ef o̩lo̩da e-me̩ kakini, Ibenu kʼone̩ meji gba chʼochochi.
Omi chʼe̩ne̩ ki agba o̩la-mi ibenu, Ata ki kpe̩ mi wa lañʼagba mi ibenu ge̩.
Todule̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo Ata-we̩ le̩ de̩? Jisus dohi kakini, Tʼomi, tʼAta-mi me̩ ma n; me̩ ma ma mi, me̩ ma ma Ata-mi kpo̩fo̩.
Uko̩la-i i ka ef unyi o̩ko̩, abu kʼi do̩mo̩ ako̩ amone̩ e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩; e̩ne̩ du la mʼu n todabu kʼiko-wñ ma wa ta n.
Todule̩ i ño̩ dabi ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi alo, me̩ ñʼafeju mi, me̩ la aku ef adure-me̩; ugbo kʼomi anyi, ame̩ neke wa n.
Todule̩ amaJu kakini, I adʼo̩la-wñ kpa? kʼi akakini, Ugbo kʼomi anyi ame̩ neke wa n?
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ chʼabo o̩gane̩, omi chʼabo ate̩; ame̩ chʼabo ile-i, omi chʼabo ile̩-i n.
Todule̩ u ka ñwu me̩ ka kʼame̩ aku ef adure-me̩; todu, iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma ke̩do̩no ka kʼomi de̩ n, me̩ aku ef adure-me̩.
Todule̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ uwe̩ che ke? Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ e-kʼu ko̩la ñwu me̩ kwʼabakwane̩.
Omi chenʼo̩la-me̩ wewe kpai ajo̩-me̩ kʼu naka ge̩; ama e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa chʼe̩ne̩ ochochi; e̩wñ kʼomi la gbo̩ ugbo-wñ e-le̩ nako̩la ñw abile̩.
Ma ma kʼo̩la Ata i ka ñwu ma le̩ n.
Todule̩ Jisus kakini, E̩gba du ku me̩ dʼO̩ma One̩ dago, e̩gbale̩ me̩ ama ka kʼomi de̩; u la gʼe̩dʼo̩la-mi ache e̩wñ du n, chai alu kʼAta ko̩ mi, oñ nako̩la e̩wñ-i.
E̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa la dʼubi-mi; i tʼomi kate no̩ n; todabu kʼomi ache e̩wñ ki rʼowñ e̩do̩ e̩gba du.
Abu kʼi nʼo̩la-i aka, amone̩ wewe ke̩do̩nʼowñ.
Todule̩ Jisus ka ñw amaJu ku ma ke̩do̩nʼowñ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ gugu ef o̩la e-mi alo waa, mak ame̩ chʼamako̩che̩-mi ochochi;
me̩ ñʼama ochochi, oñ ochochi ako me̩ chʼamo̩mone̩.
Ma dohi ñw u kakini, Ugbe̩ Ebraham a che, a la chʼuko̩lo̩ adu ñw e̩ne̩ du mama ta n; abile kʼe̩ kakini, Ma ako me̩ chʼamo̩mone̩?
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki ache e̩wñ adure chʼadu adure.
Adu la agugu ef unyi ogbegbele̩ n; o̩ma agugu ogbegbele̩,
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼO̩ma ako me̩ chʼamo̩mone̩, mak ame̩ achʼamo̩mone̩ ogbolo.
U chema ka ku me̩ chʼugbe̩ Ebraham, me̩ muda feju ekpa mi, todabu kʼo̩la e-mi ma nʼuña ef ume̩ n.
Nako̩la e̩wñ kʼomi li ugbo Ata-mi; ame̩ la ache e̩wñ kʼame̩ gbo̩ ugbo ata e-me̩ ge̩.
Ma la dohi ñw u kakini, Ebraham chʼata e-wa. Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ma chʼamo̩ma Ebraham, me̩ ma che uko̩lo̩ e̩-Ebraham.
Ama fai me̩ feju ekpa mi, omi, e̩ne̩ ki ako̩la ochochi kʼi gbo̩ ugbo O̩jo̩ ñwu me̩. Ebraham chʼe-le̩ n.
Ame̩ chʼuko̩lo̩ ata-me̩. Ma ka ñw u kakini, I chʼabutabu ma che oñ ma bi wa n: ata okate a ne̩, owñ chʼO̩jo̩.
Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩jo̩ ma chʼata-me̩, me̩ ma fe̩do̩ mi; todu ugbo O̩jo̩ oñ omi kwo wa, u lewa me̩; todu, u la ge̩do̩la mi wa n, ama owñ le̩ kpe̩ mi wa-i.
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ ma moji o̩la kʼu naka n? owñ chʼutodabu ku me̩ ma neke gbo̩ o̩la-mi n.

E̩te̩-me̩ chʼata-me̩ Abulumone̩ le̩, oñ e̩ño̩ e̩wñ ata-me̩ dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ che. E̩ne̩ le̩ chʼakpone̩ kwʼabakwane̩, i la dago ef ochochi n, todabu kʼochochi ma dʼef uwñ n. E̩gba du kʼi ako̩la ki chʼolemi, kwef e̩wñ e-wñ oñ i aka le̩ todabu kʼi chʼe̩nolemi, ata-wñ i la che.
Ama todabu kʼomi akʼochochi, me̩ ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-mi n.
E̩ne̩ dʼef ume̩ ki ma e̩wñ adure kʼu che kʼi adu bi mi? Iche̩wñ kʼu nakʼochochi, e̩wñ chi ku me̩ ma kedonʼo̩la-mi n?
E̩ne̩ kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼO̩jo̩ agbʼuko̩la O̩jo̩; e̩wñ ki chi ku me̩ ma gbo̩ ni chʼutodabu kʼe̩te̩-me̩ ma chʼO̩jo̩ n.
AmaJu le̩ dohi ñw u kakini, Mak o̩me̩me̩le̩ awa ka kʼuwe̩ chʼabo Samaria, kʼe̩ la chenʼebili n?
Jisus dohi kakini, Omi nʼebili no, u muda bumʼAta-mi, ame̩ la chi mi ukata.
Omi la feju ojima e-mi n; e̩ne̩ ki afeju kpai e̩ne̩ ki akajo̩ do̩mo̩.
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩, iche̩wñ kʼone̩ dejutʼo̩la e-mi, i nʼugbo du kʼeju-wñ adʼuku ogbegbele̩ n.
AmaJu le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Fai a chema ka kʼe̩ chenʼebili. Ebraham leku, amakache̩ la leku, tak uwe̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ dejutʼo̩la-mi i nʼugbo du kʼuku akadʼo ogbegbele̩ n.
Uwe̩ tʼata-wa Ebraham e-ki ku le? Amakache̩ la leku; e̩ne̩ oñ e̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ che ta?
Jisus dohi kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼomi dojima ñw o̩la-mi, ojima-mi le̩ chʼe̩wñ du n; Ata-mi chʼe̩ne̩ ki adojima ñwu mi, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ku me̩ ka kʼowñ chʼO̩jo̩-me̩ le̩;
me̩ la te̩te̩mʼo̩ n, omi muda chemʼo̩; i la che̩wñ kʼu ka kʼu mʼo̩ n, u ma chʼe̩nolemi dab ame̩; ama u chemʼo̩, u la adejutʼo̩la-wñ.
Ebraham ata-me̩ le̩ gwoguyo̩ todu kʼi ali o̩jo̩ e-mi ki añwa, oñ i fʼu li i la yo̩.
Todule̩ amaJu ka ñw u kakini, O̩do̩-we̩ jo̩ ooje ta n, e̩ la fʼEbraham li me̩?
Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩, omi do̩mo̩ taku ma bi Ebraham.
Todule̩ ma mʼokuta ko todu ku ma ro̩ dʼo. Jisus la maja, oñ i kwef unyi O̩jo̩ dufu.
Tak abu kʼi alale i li e̩ne̩ʼka ki chʼafeju kwʼe̩gba ku ma biʼi.
Tak amako̩che̩-wñ tʼowñ ene kakini, Rabai, e̩ne̩ dure, owñ le̩ abe̩k abo ku ma biʼu, todu ku ma ki biʼi afeju?
Jisus dohi kakini, Tʼe̩ne̩-i, tʼabo ku ma biʼi dure n, chai todu kʼuko̩lo̩ O̩jo̩ ki kwotejugede ef uwñ.
I dukpe̩ kʼawa ki che uko̩lo̩ e-e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa abu ki chʼo̩ro̩ka ta; o̩jo̩ adu fai e̩gbale̩ e̩ne̩ du aneke chʼuko̩lo̩ n.
E̩gba kʼu dʼef ile̩ u chʼugane̩ ile̩.
Abu kʼi fʼe-le̩ ka kpa, i fʼito̩ to̩ jane̩, tak i mʼito̩ le̩ du chʼe̩pio̩, oñ i mʼe̩pio̩ le̩ du fo̩ nyʼu eju;
tak i ka ñw u kakini, Nalo, kʼe̩ gwe̩ ef abukpe omi e-Sailoam (e-ku ma jo-mudechi-wñ ko̩ Ekpuche̩). Todule̩ i le, i la fʼu gwe̩, oñ i gane̩ awa.
Todule̩ abʼane̩-wñ kpai abo ku ma li kwoubi kʼowñ chʼabiebi kakini, I chʼe̩ne̩ ki gugu abiebi le̩ de̩ n?
Abomune̩ kakini, owñ le̩ de̩; abomune̩ ño̩ kakini, O̩da, i muda chʼebiʼu ofo. E̩ne̩ le̩ kakini, Omi le̩ de̩.
Todule̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, Abile kʼeju-we̩ muchi ta?
E̩ne̩ le̩ dohi kakini, E̩ne̩ ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jisus le̩, i fʼe̩pio̩ fo̩, oñ i mʼu du fo̩ nyʼumi eju, tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Lo tu Sailoam kʼe̩ gwe̩; todule̩ abu kʼu le kʼu la fʼu gwe̩ u kwogane̩.
Taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo e̩ne̩ le̩ de̩? I kakini, U ma no.
Ma mʼowñ ki chʼafeju e̩gbaʼka le̩ du wʼugbo amaFarisi.
O̩jo̩ ku Jisus fʼe̩pio̩ le̩ kʼi la mʼeju-wñ chi chʼo̩jo̩ uñmi.
Todule̩ amaFarisi ño̩ dabi tʼowñ ene abile kʼi gane̩. Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, I mʼe̩pio̩ du nʼumi eju, tak u fʼu gwe̩, oñ nagane̩-i.

Todule̩ iche̩kibo̩ ef amaFarisi kakini, Owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ n, todabu kʼi ma dejutʼo̩jo̩ uñmi n. Abomune̩ muda kakini, Abile kʼe̩ne̩ ki chʼe̩nadure neke che ujiwe abe̩-i? Ukpe̩ru la lewʼef uma.
Todule̩ ma dabi ka ñw afeju le̩ kakini, O̩la e̩ne̩ le̩ fa, ab uwe̩ ka, todabu kʼi mʼuwe̩ eju chi?
Todule̩ amaJu ke̩do̩no ka kʼowñ chʼafeju kwoubi tak i kwogane̩ n, gbogbo taku ma fʼabo ku ma bi e̩ne̩ ki kwogane̩ le̩ do̩ wa;
taku ma tʼuma ene kakini, Owñ kide̩ chʼo̩ma-me̩ ku me̩ kakini, A bi afeju? Abile kʼi agane̩ abajo̩-i ta?
Todule̩ abo ku ma biʼi dohi kakini, A chema ka kʼowñ le̩ chʼo̩ma-wa, kʼa la biʼi afeju;
ama abile kʼi agane̩ fai, a ma n, abe̩k e̩ne̩ ki mʼeju-wñ chi awa la ma n; me̩ tʼowñ ene; i chʼo̩kone̩ me̩; i ako̩la o̩la-wñ.
Abo ku ma bi owñ kʼo̩la kide̩ todabu ku ma railo amaJu; todu amaJu fʼalu jo̩ me̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du gbalu ka kʼowñ le̩ che Kraist, a mʼu du tinyo̩ bʼujeju te̩.
Tod e-kide̩ abo ku ma bi owñ kakini, I mud o̩kone̩ me̩, me̩ tʼowñ ene.
Todule̩ ma ño̩ dʼe̩ne̩ ki chʼafeju le̩ wa onukeji ge̩; taku ma ka ñw u kakini, Dʼojima ñw O̩jo̩; awa chema ka kʼe̩ne̩ kide̩ chʼe̩nadure.
Todule̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ dohi kakini, Abe̩k e̩nadure i che, u ma n; e̩wñ kate kʼu ma de̩, kakini, Omi kʼu chʼafeju akwoubi fa-i nagane̩.
Todule̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ i chʼuwe̩? Abile kʼi mʼeju-we̩ chi?
I dohi ñwu ma kakini, U ka ñwu me̩ me̩, me̩ la gbo̩ n; e̩wñ chi ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ ñʼadabi gbo̩ ge̩? Idʼame̩ onugo e̩do̩ ku me̩ ño̩ mud amako̩che̩-wñ ge̩?
Taku ma kwobʼo̩ ina oñ ma kakini, Uwe̩ chʼako̩che̩ e̩ne̩ le̩. Awa muda chʼamako̩che̩ Mose̩s.
A chema ka kʼO̩jo̩ ko̩la ñwu Mose̩s; a muda ma ugbo kʼe̩ne̩-i kwo n.
E̩ne̩ le̩ dohi ka ñwu ma kakini, Ef e-i oñ e̩wñ awuwu de̩, kakini, Ame̩ la ma ugbo kʼi kwo n, i la mʼeju-mi chi!
A chema ka kʼO̩jo̩ agbʼo̩la ame̩nadure n; one̩ muda adiba ñw O̩jo̩, kʼi la achʼe̩wñ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩, i agbʼo̩la e̩ne̩ le̩.
Akwʼigbelegbele ma gbo̩ ka kʼe̩ne̩ du mʼeju e̩ne̩ ku ma bi afeju chi n.
Iche̩wñ kʼowñ le̩ ma kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ n, i ma neke che e̩wñ du n.
Ma dohi ka ñw u kakini, Ef adure ma bi we̩ ogbolo, uwe̩ ñʼako̩ wa e̩wñ? Taku ma mʼowñ du rikpolo tʼo̩do̩da.
Jisus gbo̩ ka ku ma mʼowñ du ro̩ tʼo̩do̩da; tak abu kʼi fʼowñ li i kakini, Uwe̩ ake̩do̩nʼO̩ma O̩jo̩?
E̩ne̩ le̩ dohi kakini, Owñ chʼe̩ne̩, Odu-mi, todu kʼu ke̩do̩nʼowñ?
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩ fʼu li me̩, e̩ne̩ ki la akʼo̩la kpʼuwe̩-i, owñ le̩ de̩.
Oñ i kakini, Nake̩do̩no, Odu-mi. Tak i dojikane̩ ñw u.
Taku Jisus kakini, Tod ajo̩ oñ omi wʼef ile̩ kide̩, todu kʼabo ku ma ma gane̩ n ki gane̩; i ño̩ chʼutodu kʼabo ku ma gane̩ ki mud afeju.
Abo ku ma jʼugbo-wñ ku ma chʼabo Farisi, gb o̩la le̩, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Awa ño̩ chʼamafeju ge̩?
Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ma chʼamafeju, me̩ ma ne̩ adure n; ama fa-i me̩ kakini, A gane̩; adure-me̩ do̩mo̩ ta.
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki ma le alugbana iga-ala gudu tef uwñ n, kʼi muda ate̩gu le ugbo omune̩ wa, e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼajoji kpai adinya.
Ama e̩ne̩ ki agudu lʼalugbana, chʼadide amala.
Adaku abi o̩na ñw e̩ne̩ le̩, amala la agbʼomu-wñ; oñ i ado̩ amala e-wñ odu okoka, tak i ako ma dufu.
E̩gba du kʼi ne̩ e-i ki chʼe-wñ dufu i atʼuma o̩gba alo, oñ amala le̩ atʼowñ ubi; todabu ku ma chema omuko̩la-wñ.
I la nʼugbo du ku ma tʼe̩nomune̩ ojoji ubi n, ma la ara bʼo̩ te̩; todabu ku ma ma ma omuko̩la abomune̩ ojoji n.
Jisus kpʼita kide̩ ñwu ma; abo le̩ muda mʼoji e̩wñ ki che kʼi ako̩la ñwu ma n.
Todule̩ Jisus ño̩ dabi ka ñwu ma kakini, Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩, ka kʼomi chʼalugbana amala.
Abo du ku ma wa o̩gba mi le̩ chʼamajoji kpʼamadinya; amala muda gbo̩la-ma n.
Omi chʼalugbana; iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du guduwa lefu mi ma ajadu-wñ; tak i anyʼejefu, i adufu, oñ i ali ije̩ kʼi je̩.
Ajoji awa ofo n, chai todu kʼi joji, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ kpa, kʼi ño̩ kpʼe̩wñ bie̩; omi lewa todu ku ma ki nʼiñmi, ku ma ki nʼe̩ ololo.
Omi chʼadide o̩me̩me̩le̩ ki ade amala; adide o̩me̩me̩le̩ adʼoji-o̩la-wñ tinyo̩ tod amala.
E̩ne̩ ku ma rʼo̩me̩ ñw u, kʼi ma chʼamala e-wñ onugo i ade n, i li abu kʼogu awa tak i atʼamala no̩, oñ i ara, tak o̩gu le̩ adʼuma inya, oñ i akpa ma tuka;
todabu kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma rʼo̩me̩ ñw u, kʼo̩la amala le̩ ma wʼowñ eju n.
Omi chʼadide e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ ki ade amala; u chema e-mi, e-mi la chemʼomi ge̩,
alu kʼAta chema mi, kʼomi laño̩ chema Ata; kʼu nadʼoji-o̩la-mi tane̩ tod amala.
U laño̩ chenʼamala omune̩, e-ku ma ma chʼabo iga kide̩ n; i ño̩ dukpe̩ kʼu naño̩ mʼabo le kowa ge̩, ama la agbo̩ omu-mi; tak ujo̩ amala amud okate, adide-ma la chʼoka.
Tod e-kide̩ oñ Ata afe̩do̩ mi, todabu kʼu nadʼoji-o̩la-mi tane̩, todu kʼu ño̩ dabi gba ge̩.
E̩ne̩ du la abʼumi gba n, chai omi age̩do̩la-mi adʼu tane̩. U chenʼo̩da kʼu nadʼu tane̩, u laño̩ chenʼo̩da kʼu nadabi dʼu ge̩. O̩la uko̩ kide̩ u gba ugbo Ata-mi.
AmaJu ño̩ dabi kpe̩ru ojoji ojoji noj o̩la-i ge̩.
Oñ amone̩ wewe efu ma kakini, I chenʼebili, imu i ahi le̩; e̩wñ chi ku me̩ gbʼo̩la-wñ?
Abo-mune̩ kakini, Uko̩la kide̩ chʼo̩la e̩ne-bili de̩ n; ebili neke mʼeju amafeju chi?
Oñ i mud iko ucholo e̩wñ edaji etito̩ Je̩rusale̩m; e̩gba afu o̩we̩ i che.
Oñ Jisus do̩mo̩ alule̩ ef unyi O̩jo̩ ef atakpa So̩lo̩mo̩n.
Todule̩ amaJu donyʼu daka, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Gbogbo wʼe̩gba oñ e̩ dʼonugo-wa nyʼojale kade ta? Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ che Kraist, ka ñwu wa pee.
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, U ka ñwu me̩, me̩ la ke̩do̩no n; uko̩lo̩ kʼomi ache ef odu Ata-mi, e-le̩ agba mi ibenu. Me̩ la ke̩do̩no n,
todabu ku me̩ ma jʼef amala e-mi n.
Amala e-mi agbʼomuko̩la-mi; omi la chema ma, ma la atʼumi ubi;
oñ omi adʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ ñwu ma, i ñʼanʼugbo du ku ma alenyo̩ ogbegbele̩ n, e̩ne̩ du la adʼuma inya kwef o̩wo̩-mi n.
Ata-mi e-kʼi mʼuma ko ñwu mi, owñ tʼe̩ne̩ du le; i la nʼe̩ne̩ du ki neke dʼuma inya kwef o̩wo̩ Ata-mi n.
Omi kpai Ata chʼoka.
AmaJu ño̩ dabi mʼokuta konyʼo̩wo̩ todu ku ma ro̩dʼo.
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Uko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ ki kwʼugbo Ata kʼu du ña me̩ chewewe, kali e-ki che ku me̩ kʼokuta ro̩ do mi tod uwñ?
AmaJu dohi ñw u kakini, I chʼutodu uko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ oñ a kʼokuta ro̩ dʼe̩-i n, chai todu akpabie̩ O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ che; i laño̩ chʼutodabu kʼuwe̩ kʼe̩chʼone̩ adʼo̩la-we̩ chʼO̩jo̩.
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, I che̩ko̩ tʼef o̩lo̩da-me̩ kakini, Omi ka kʼame̩ chʼamo̩jo̩ n?
Iche̩wñ kʼi ka kʼabo kʼo̩lO̩jo̩ wate̩ ñwu ma le̩ chʼamo̩jo̩ ma la neke tu o̩la ki dʼef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ n,
e̩ne̩ kʼO̩jo̩ mʼefo̩ du ñw u kʼi la kpʼo̩ uche̩ tef ile̩, ame̩ ka kakini, Uwe̩ chakpabie̩ O̩jo̩, todabu kʼu kakini, O̩ma O̩jo̩ u che?
Iche̩wñ kʼu ma chʼuko̩lo̩ Ata-mi n, me̩ ki ke̩do̩nʼomi n;
i muda che̩wñ kʼu do̩mo̩ ache, dagba me̩ ma chaka ke̩do̩nʼomi n, me̩ nake̩do̩nʼuko̩lo̩ le̩, todu ku me̩ ki ma, kʼame̩ ki laño̩ ma gbogbo alo kakini, Ata dʼef umi, omi la dʼef Ata.
Todule̩ ma ño̩ dabi feju emʼu; oñ i kwʼef o̩wo̩-ma le.
Tak i ño̩ dabi le tʼudaba Jo̩rdan ugbo ku Jo̩n de̩ ache baptism e̩gba ejodudu le̩, oñ i kwogugu o̩mo̩.
Tak amone̩ wewe wʼugbo-wñ; oñ ma kakini, Jo̩n chʼujiwe du n, ama o̩la e̩ne̩-i du ku Jo̩n ka chʼochochi.
Oñ amone̩ wewe ke̩do̩nʼowñ o̩mo̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka do̩mo̩ kʼo̩ga fʼu gwe̩gbo, owñ chʼiLazaro̩s abo Be̩tani, abo ewo Me̩ri kpai Marta o̩maye-wñ onobule̩.
Me̩ri e-kʼo̩maye-wñ Lazaro̩s nʼe̩gbo o̩la le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼekpo kuru Ondu o̩la, kʼi la dʼiloji-wñ li e̩re̩-wñ.
Todule̩ amo̩maye-wñ onobule̩ le̩ kpuche̩ nyʼugbo-wñ kakini, Ondu, go, o̩ga fʼe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ che̩do̩-wñ le̩ gwe̩gbo te̩.
Ama abu ku Jisus gbʼo̩ i kakini, E̩gbo o̩la kide̩ i chʼe-uku n, ama tod ojima O̩jo̩, todu kʼO̩ma O̩jo̩ ki nʼojima lef uwñ.
Jisus la fe̩do̩ Marta kpʼo̩maye-wñ onobule̩ kpai Lazaro̩s.
Todule̩ abu kʼi gbo̩ ka kʼe̩gbo dʼo̩la-wñ, e̩gbale̩ i kwogugu ugbo kʼi de̩ o̩jo̩ meji.
Tak ubi e-kide̩ i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, A ño̩ dabi nyi Judia ge̩.
Amako̩che̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Rabai, faifai kʼamaJu feju we̩ ku ma rʼokuta dʼe̩ de̩, e̩ ñʼadabi nyʼo̩mo̩ ge̩?
Jisus dohi kakini, I chʼauwa me̩gweji chʼo̩jo̩ oka n? Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ alule̩ o̩ro̩ka, i ake̩re̩ n, todabu kʼi ali ugane̩ ile̩ kide̩.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼone̩ alule̩ odu i ake̩re̩, todabu kʼugane̩ ma dʼef uwñ n.
I fʼe-le̩ ka; tak ubi e-kide̩ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Lazaro̩s, onuku-wa le̩ mʼolu du me̩; u muda alo todu kʼu jʼuwñ olu.
Todule̩ amako̩che̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, iche̩wñ kʼi mʼolu du, mak i mujadu.
O̩la uku-wñ Jisus muda ka-i; ama abo le̩ do̩ ka kʼolu uñmi kʼone̩ ale̩ oñ i aka-i.
E̩gbale̩ Jisus ka ñwu ma ejugede kakini, Lazaro̩s leku.
Oñ u nayo̩ todu me̩ todu kʼu ma dʼane̩ o̩mo̩ n, todu ku me̩ ki ke̩do̩no; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ me̩ lewa, kʼa nyʼugbo-wñ.
Todule̩ To̩mas, e-ku ma do̩ ko̩ Ukpejima, ka ñw abo kʼowñ kpai ama chʼamako̩che̩ kakini, Awa ki ño̩ le, todu kʼa ki ku kpai owñ.
Todule̩ abu ku Jisus lewa, i li abu kʼi dʼef oji o̩jo̩ me̩le̩ me̩.
Be̩tani le̩ la cheme̩ru Je̩rusale̩m ujiji-wñ dab imaili meji.
Oñ amone̩ wewe ef amaJu lewʼugbo Marta kpai Me̩ri, todu ku ma ba ma aku tod o̩maye-ma.
Todule̩ abu ku Marta gbo̩ ka ku Jisus awa me̩, i ledʼo; Me̩ri muda gugu ef unyi ta.
Todule̩ Marta ka ñwu Jisus kakini, Ondu, e̩ ma dʼemi, o̩maye-mi ma ku no.
I chaka chʼifa-i, u chema kakini, E̩wñ du kʼe̩ bi O̩jo̩, O̩jo̩ adu ñw e̩.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, O̩maye-we̩ ñʼadajikwane̩ ge̩.
Marta ka ñw u kakini, U ma ka kʼi ada-jikwane̩ ef udajikwane̩ e̩gba o̩jo̩ otitala.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Omi chʼuda-jikwane̩ kpai iñmi: dagba e̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩no mi chaka leku, i adeju chuu;
oñ e̩ne̩ du ki deju kʼi la ake̩do̩no mi, i nʼugbo du kʼi aku ogbegbele̩ n. Uwe̩ ake̩do̩nʼo̩la kide̩-i?
I ka ñw u kakini, I-i, Ondu; omi te̩take̩do̩no, kakini, Uwe̩ chʼiKraist O̩ma O̩jo̩ e-ki awʼef ile̩ le̩.
Tak abu kʼi fʼo̩la-i ka, i kwʼo̩mo̩ le, tak i fʼo̩maye-wñ Me̩ri do̩ maja maja, kakini, Akone̩wñ dʼemi, i adʼe̩.
Abu kʼowñ le̩ gbo̩ i kwane̩ piopio, oñ i lewa ugbo-wñ.
(E̩gbale̩ Jisus la gudu wʼef ewo le̩ ta n, ama i dʼugbo ku Marta de kpʼowñ.)
Todule̩ amaJu ku ma jʼugbo-wñ ef unyi, ku ma la abʼo̩ aku, abu ku ma li ka ku Me̩ri kwane̩ piopio ledufu, tʼo̩ ubi, ma do̩ ka kʼi anyʼugbo oji, todu kʼi raku o̩mo̩.
Todule̩ abu ku Me̩ri lewʼugbo ku Jisus de̩ kʼi la fʼu li, i lewane̩ e̩re̩-wñ, i ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, e̩ ma dʼemi, o̩maye-mi ma ku no.
Todule̩ abu ku Jisus li kʼi araku, kpʼamaJu kʼowñ kpai ama kpe̩re̩ wa ku ma ño̩ raku, e̩do̩-wñ kpa ef afu-wñ, o̩la-wñ kwoga;
tak i kakini, Ugbo me̩ dʼoku-wñ te̩? Ma ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, lewa kʼe̩ go.
Omi aku Jisus lewane̩.
Todule̩ amaJu kakini, Me̩ go abu kʼi che̩do̩-wñ!
Ama iche̩kibo̩ efu-ma kakini, Owñ ki mʼeju afeju chi le̩, i nekeche kʼowñ-i ki we eku n?
Todule̩ abu kʼe̩do̩-wñ ño̩ kpa ef uwñ, Jisus lewʼugbo oji le̩; owo i la che, okuta la nʼalu-wñ.
Jisus kakini, Me̩ mʼokuta du. Marta, o̩maye e̩ne̩ ki ku, ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, i alu me̩, todu o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩le̩-wñ de̩.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, U ka ñw e̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ ke̩do̩no uwe̩ ali ojima O̩jo̩ n?
Todule̩ ma mʼokuta le̩ du. Oñ Jisus mʼeju-wñ korʼate̩, i kakini, Ata-mi, nagwʼe̩ todabu kʼe̩ netirʼo̩la-mi.
Omi muda ma kʼe̩ netirʼo̩la-mi e̩gba du; ama todu o̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma dago jo̩-i oñ u ka le̩, todu ku ma ki ke̩do̩no ka kʼuwe̩ kpe̩ mi wa-i.
Abu kʼi fʼo̩la-i ka, i dʼomu dago ka nana, kakini, Lazaro̩s, dufu wa.
E̩ne̩ ki ku le̩ la kwodufu wa, e̩re̩-wñ kpai o̩wo̩-wñ chʼe̩ji o̩kpe̩; ugbogbo la chʼe̩wenyʼeju-wñ. Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼu tu ku me̩ tʼo̩ no̩ kʼi lo.
Todule̩ amone̩ wewe ef amaJu ku ma wʼugbo Me̩ri, ku ma la li e̩wñ kʼi che, ke̩do̩nʼowñ.
Ama iche̩kibo̩ efu-ma kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼugbo amaFarisi, oñ ma ka ñwu ma e̩wñ ku Jisus che le̩.
Todule̩ amagboji amatama kpʼamaFarisi fʼabo̩hiala do̩ jeju, ma kakini, E̩wñ a jʼache-i taa? todu e̩ne̩ kide̩ ache ujiwe wewe.
Iche̩wñ kʼa tʼo̩ no̩ abe̩-i, amone̩ du ake̩do̩nʼowñ, tak abo Rom awa ku ma mʼuña-wa kpai abo uche̩ichi-wa gba.
Ama Kayafas, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ʼka efu-ma abu kʼi chʼagboji amatama o̩do̩ le̩, ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ mʼe̩wñ du n;
me̩ la alo kakini, I anʼile ñwu me̩ kʼone̩ okate kʼi leku tod amone̩-i kʼo̩gbo̩ abuche̩ichi-i du ki we elenyo̩ n?
I la gʼe̩do̩la-wñ ko̩la kide̩ n; ama abu kʼi chʼagboji amatama o̩do̩ le̩, ache̩ i ka ka ku Jisus ache kʼi ku tod abuche̩ichi le̩,
i la chʼutodu abuche̩ichi e-le̩ kate n, ama todu kʼi mʼamo̩ma O̩jo̩ ku ma kpa ma tuka ko wa jeju rʼokate.
Todule̩ akwʼo̩jo̩ le̩ ma chane̩ enyo-juju todu ku ma ki dʼowñ kpa.
Todule̩ Jisus ño̩ lule̩ ejugede ef amaJu ge̩ n; i muda kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼane̩ ki me̩ru aje̩tachi tef ewo ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Ifraim; i la gugu o̩mo̩ kpai amako̩che̩-wñ.
Oñ Elaloji e-amaJu me̩rane̩; tak amone̩ wewe kwo oji oko te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m o̩gba tak Elaloji le̩ wane̩ todu ku ma gwʼo̩la-ma rinyo̩.
Todule̩ ma jʼafeju Jisus, oñ ma naka ñw o̩la-ma abu ku ma dago jo̩ ef unyi O̩jo̩ kakini, Abu me̩ do̩ taa? I nʼugbo du kʼi awʼujeju ucholo-i n?
Amagboji amatama kpai amaFarisi la fʼuko̩ te̩ e̩gba le̩ me̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ugbo kʼi de̩ kʼi ka dufu ku ma fʼu mu.
Todule̩ Jisus lewa Be̩tani o̩jo̩ me̩fa tak Elaloji wane̩, owñ chʼugbo ku Lazaro̩s e-ku Jisus dʼu kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku le̩ de̩.
Todule̩ ma fʼidina hi ñw u o̩mo̩, Marta la chʼuko̩lo̩ ñwu ma, Lazaro̩s muda chʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef abo ku ma chekukane̩ kpʼowñ.
Todule̩ Me̩ri mʼe̩ñwa ekpo nard ogboloʼka, e-kʼaja-wñ chʼe̩kpuna, du kuru e̩re̩ Jisus, tak i mʼiloji-wñ du li e̩re̩-wñ; oñ ef unyi le̩ che̩ko̩ ñw ekpo kʼekpo le̩ akpo.
Ama Judas Iskario̩t, e̩ne̩ʼka ef amako̩che̩-wñ e-kʼi ache kʼi mʼowñ du ñw amone̩ mu, kakini,
E̩wñ chi ku ma ma dʼekpo kide̩ ta olia oli me̩fa ku ma la mʼu ko ñw ame̩nale n?
I la ko̩la kide̩ todabu kʼame̩nale chewʼowñ eju n, chai todabu kʼi chʼajoji, kʼi la nʼakpati ku ma kʼe̩wñ nyʼu.
Todule̩ Jisus kakini, Tʼo̩ no̩, todu kʼi nadejutʼo̩ nyʼo̩jo̩ ku ma dʼumi ji.
Todu me̩ chenʼame̩nale ugbo me̩ e̩gba du, me̩ muda anʼomi e̩gba du n.
Todule̩ o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile ef amaJu ma ka kʼi dʼano̩mo̩, oñ ma lewa todu Jisus kate n, chai todu ku ma ki ño̩ li Lazaro̩s e-kʼi dukwane̩ kwef abo ki ku le̩.
Oñ amagboji amatama nyojuju todu ku ma ki ño̩ mu Lazaro̩s du kpa ge̩;
todabu ki chʼutod uwñ oñ amone̩ wewe ef amaJu le̩, ma ño̩ ke̩do̩no Jisus.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ abu kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ lile ku ma wʼugbo-ujeju ucholo le̩ gbo ka ku Jisus awa Je̩rusale̩m,
ma mʼima oli ki dab e̩kpe̩ ko, ma la kwodufu nyʼaledʼo, taku ma kpogu kakini, Hosana! Ekele ma kele e̩ne̩ ki alʼef odu Ondu wa, owñ la chʼOnu Israe̩l.
Abu ku Jisus fʼo̩ma o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ʼka li, i kwogugu oji-wñ, alu ki che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
E̩ ki railo n, uwe̩ o̩ma onobule̩ Zayo̩n;
Amako̩che̩-wñ mʼoji e̩wñ kide̩ e̩gba ejodudu n, ama e̩gba ku Jisus fʼojima-wñ je̩, e̩gbale̩ ma rewa kakini, E-kide̩ chʼo̩la-wñ ku ma ko̩tane̩; ma la fʼe̩wñ le̩ che ñw u.
Todule̩ o̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ e̩gba kʼi do̩ Lazaro̩s kwef oji kʼi dʼu kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, gbʼo̩ ibenu.
E̩wñ ki chi kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ la ledʼowñ chʼutodabu ku ma gbo̩ ka kʼi fʼujiwe kide̩ che.
Todule̩ amaFarisi ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, Me̩ go, ka kʼuko̩lo̩-me̩ nʼile du n; go, abo ile̩ du kwotʼo̩ ubi me̩.
Oñ abo Griki iche̩kibo̩ jʼef abo ku ma te̩gu alo todu ku ma dojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ef ujeju ucholo le̩;
todule̩ abo le̩ te̩wʼugbo Filip kʼi chʼabo Be̩tsaida e-Galili; ma la tʼowñ ene kakini, Odu-wa, i dʼuwa e̩do̩ kʼa li Jisus.
Filip lewa ka ñwu Anduru; tak Anduru kpai Filip lewa ka ñwu Jisus.
Oñ Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Adiko auwa le̩ lewa me̩, todu kʼO̩ma One̩ ki je̩ ojima.
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩, iche̩wñ kʼe̩yo̩ e̩wñ ma lewa tef ane̩ kʼi ku n, mak owñ kate atʼo̩mo̩; i muda che̩wñ kʼi leku i anʼe̩ro nana.
E̩ne̩ ki ache̩do̩ oji o̩la-wñ, edʼu tinyo̩ i adʼu tinyo̩ le̩; e̩ne̩ ki achulaka oji o̩la-wñ ef ile̩ kide̩, mak ede i ade̩ tef iñmi ogbegbele̩ le̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ache e̩wñ ñw omi, i ki natʼumi ubi; tak ugbo kʼomi de̩, o̩mo̩ e̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ ñwu mi ñʼade̩ ge̩; iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ache e̩wñ ñwu mi, Ata-mi abumʼo̩.
Fai e̩do̩wuulu ache onugo-mi me̩; ab u naka ke? Ata-mi, fʼumi jadu kwef auwa kide̩? E̩wñ ki chi kʼu wʼauwa kide̩ le̩ de̩.
Ata-mi, dʼojima ñw odu-we̩. Todule̩ omuko̩la kwʼefojale wa kakini, U mʼojima du ñw u me̩, naño̩ dabi dʼojima ñw u ge̩.
Todule̩ o̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma dago jo̩ ku ma la agbo̩, ka kʼakpabana ko̩la; abomune̩ kakini, Onuche̩ O̩jo̩ ko̩la ñw u.
Jisus dohi kakini, I chʼutodu mi oñ omuko̩la kide̩ ka n, chai tod ame̩.
Fa-i ajo̩ ile̩-i eka de̩; fa-i ma adʼagboji ile̩-i ro̩ tʼo̩do̩da.
Tak omi, iche̩wñ ku ma dʼumi dago kwef ane̩-ile̩, nafʼamone̩ du wʼugbo mi.
I la kʼe-le̩ kʼi jiwe alu kʼuku kʼi ache kʼi ku ade̩.
Todule̩ o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ dohi ñw u kakini, A gbo̩ kwef o̩lo̩da kakini, Kraist agugu ogbegbele̩, abile kʼuwe̩ akakini, I dukpe̩ ku ma dʼO̩ma One̩ dago? E̩ne̩ chʼO̩ma One̩ le̩ taa?
Todule̩ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Ugane̩ le̩ ade̩ ef ume̩ pe̩ ta. Me̩ ki tale abu ku me̩ chene̩ ugane̩ le̩, todu kʼe̩chubi ki we ebʼume̩ ma; e̩ne̩ ki tale ef e̩chubi ama ugbo kʼi anyi n.
Abu ku me̩ chene̩ ugane̩ le̩ me̩ nake̩do̩no ugane̩ le̩ todu ku me̩ ki mud amo̩ma ugane̩.
Ama abu kʼi chaka fʼujiwe wewe abe̩le̩ che eju-ma, ma la ke̩do̩nʼowñ n;
todu kʼo̩la Aizaya akache̩ le̩ ki che̩, e-ki kakini,
Tod e-kide̩ ma ma neke ke̩do̩no n, todabu kʼAizaya ño̩ dabi kakini,
I fʼuma eju chubi, i laño̩ fʼuma e̩do̩ no̩;
Aizaya ko̩la kide̩ todabu kʼi fʼoji-ma-wñ li, o̩la-wñ i la ka le̩.
Ama ichaka dabe̩le̩ amagboji onugo ku ma ke̩do̩nʼowñ chewewe; ama tod amaFarisi ma ma gbalu n, tode̩gba ku ma amʼuma ko kwef unyi ujeju rinyo̩;
todu ma fe̩do̩ ojima e-one̩ tʼojima e-O̩jo̩ le.
Jisus la domudago kakini, E̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩nʼomi, i chʼomi i ake̩do̩no n, chai e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa le̩.
E̩ne̩ ki la ago mi, mak e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa i ago le̩.
Omi kʼu chʼugane̩, u lewa ef ile̩ me̩, todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki ake̩do̩nʼomi ki we egugu ef e̩chubi.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du gbʼo̩la ki kwʼalu-mi, kʼi ma la fʼu de n, i chʼomi akʼajo̩-wñ n; todu u lewa todu kʼu kajo̩ ile̩ n, chai todu kʼu jadu ile̩.
E̩ne̩ ki ako̩ mi, kʼi ma gba o̩la-mi n, chenʼe̩ne̩ ki akʼajo̩-wñ; o̩la kʼu ka le̩ e-le̩ akʼajo̩-wñ ef o̩jo̩ otitala.
Todabu ki ma chʼomi gʼe̩do̩la-mi ko̩la n; ama e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa le̩, owñ chʼAta, owñ le̩ fʼuko̩ e̩wñ kʼu naka kpʼo̩la kʼu naka te̩ ñwu mi.
U la chema ka kʼuko̩-wñ kʼi te̩ ñwu mi le̩ chʼiñmi ogbegbele̩; todule̩ o̩la e̩wñ kʼomi aka le̩, e̩wñ kʼAta ka ñwu mi, abe̩le̩ naka.

Oñ o̩gba tak ujeju ucholo Elaloji le̩ wane̩, abu ku Jisus chema ka kʼauwa-wñ todu kʼi kwo bʼef ile̩ te̩ kʼi nyʼugbo Ata lewa me̩; alu kʼi te̩tafe̩do̩ abo e-wñ ku ma jʼef ile̩, i fe̩do̩ ma gbogbo tʼukpoji.
Oñ abu ku ma jo̩ ajʼo̩je̩ o̩kpane̩, e̩gba le̩ Abulumone̩ mʼibe du tʼef e̩do̩ Judas e-Saimo̩n Iskario̩t todu kʼi mʼowñ du ñw amone̩ mu me̩,
abu ku Jisus chema ka kʼAta mʼe̩wñ du ko jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ, kʼowñ la kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ dufu wa le̩, kʼowñ la anyʼugbo O̩jo̩ ge̩,—
i kwane̩ kwʼugbo o̩je̩ o̩kpane̩ le̩, oñ i mʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ ko lane̩: i la mʼugbogbo line̩n ku ma du li o̩wo̩ du lʼago-wñ de.
Tak i chʼomiofo nyʼukpachi-ugwo̩wo̩, oñ i chane̩ egwʼe̩re̩ amako̩che̩-wñ kʼi dʼugbogbo line̩n ki lʼago-wñ de le̩ li e̩re̩-ma.
Todule̩ i lewa ugbo Saimo̩n Pita, i ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, uwe̩ agwʼe̩re̩ e-mi?
Jisus dohi ñw u kakini, E̩wñ kʼomi ache-i, e̩ ma fa-i ta n, e̩ muda ama ubi e̩wñ-i.
Pita ka ñw u kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼuwe̩ agwʼe̩re̩-mi ogbegbele̩ n. Jisus dohi ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼu ma gwʼuwe̩ n, e̩ nʼukpe̩ du ugbo mi n.
Saimo̩n Pita ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, i chʼe̩re̩-mi kate n, ama tʼo̩wo̩-mi tʼoji-mi du.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ ki fʼo̩la gwe̩ i nʼeku kʼi aku n chai e̩re̩ egwe̩, o̩gbo̩ o̩la-wñ la de̩ hiolo me̩; ame̩ la de̩ hiolo me̩, i muda chʼo̩chaka-me̩ n.
Todu i chema e̩ne̩ ki adʼowñ ñw amone̩ mu, tod e-kide̩ oñ i kakini, I chʼo̩chaka-me̩ de̩ hiolo n.
Todule̩ e̩gba kʼi fʼe̩re̩-ma gwe̩ kpa kʼi la mʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ ko, kʼi ño̩ dabi chekukane̩, i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ chema e̩wñ kʼu che ñwu me̩-i?
Ame̩ do̩ mi ko̩ Akone̩wñ kpai Ondu, o̩me̩me̩le̩ me̩ la ka-i, todu abe̩le̩ u de̩.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼomi kʼu chʼOndu kpai Akone̩wñ fʼume̩ e̩re̩ gwe̩, mak ame̩ chenʼo̩me̩ ku me̩ gwʼomune̩ e̩re̩.
Todu e̩wñ ku me̩ awʼo̩li-wñ oñ omi du ñwu me̩-i, todu kʼame̩ ki ño̩ che alu kʼomi che ñwu me̩.
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Adu atʼodu-wñ le n, e̩nukpuche̩ la tʼe̩ne̩ ki kpʼo̩ le n.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma e-kide̩, ku me̩ la che, me̩ gbede.
I chʼo̩la-me̩ chaka oñ naka-i n. Omi chema abo kʼu chi ma tane̩; ama todu kʼo̩la ki dʼef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ki che̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki aje̩ akala-mi fʼagbe̩re̩ ro̩ nyu mi.
Akwe̩gba-i naka ñwu me̩ o̩gba tak i wache, todu kʼe̩gba du kʼi wache kʼame̩ ki ke̩do̩no ka kʼomi de̩.
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩, e̩ne̩ ki agba e̩ne̩ du kʼu nakpe̩ wa, omi i agba le̩; e̩ne̩ ki la agba mi mak e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa i agba le̩.
Abu ku Jisus fʼe-kide̩ ka, e̩do̩-wuulu chane̩ echʼo ef afu-wñ, tak i gbibenu kakini, Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka efu me̩ adu mi ñw amone̩ mu.
Oñ amako̩che̩-wñ gʼo̩la-ma eju, o̩la e̩ne̩ kʼi aka-i fitu ma.
E̩ne̩ʼka dʼef amako̩che̩-wñ ku Jisus afe̩do̩, e̩ne̩ le̩ chekukane̩ ugbo agbe̩do̩ Jisus.
Todule̩ Saimo̩n Pita dʼoji do̩ e̩ne̩ le̩, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Ka e̩ne̩ ki che kʼi aka-i.
Abu kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ mubichiyo̩ agbe̩do̩ Jisus abe̩le̩, i ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, owñ chʼe̩ne̩?
Jisus dohi kakini, Owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼomi abʼo̩we̩ o̩je̩ kad obobo kʼu nadʼu ñw u. Todule̩ abu kʼi mʼo̩we̩ o̩je̩ le̩ du kad obobo, i la mʼu du ñwu Judas e-Saimo̩n Iskario̩t.
Tak ubi o̩we̩ o̩je̩ le̩, e̩gba le̩ Setan mugudu tef e̩ne̩ le̩. Todule̩ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ kʼe̩ che, e̩ kwoche piopio.
Ama e̩ne̩ du ef abo ki chekukane̩ le̩ ma e̩wñ ki chi kʼi ko̩la kide̩ ñw u n.
Todu iche̩kibo̩ do̩ kʼukpe̩ ku Judas nʼakpati le̩ oñ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩ nyʼala e̩wñ kʼeku-wñ aku uwa tod ujeju ucholo; abe̩k utodu kʼi dʼe̩wñʼka ñw ame̩nale.
Todule̩ abu kʼi mʼo̩we̩ o̩je̩ le̩ gba e̩ne̩ le̩ ledufu ababa; odu i la che.
Todule̩ e̩gba kʼi ledufu Jisus kakini, Fa-i O̩ma One̩ fojima ne̩ me̩, O̩jo̩ laño̩ fʼojima ne̩ ef uwñ.
Iche̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ nʼojima ef uwñ, mak O̩jo̩ adʼojima ñw u ef uwñ. I la adʼojima ñw u ababa.
Amo̩ma-mi, nadʼugbo-me̩ pe̩ ta. Me̩ afeju mi, oñ alu kʼu ka ñw amaJu kakini, Ugbo kʼomi anyi, ame̩ neke wa n, fa-i naño̩ ka ñwu me̩ ge̩.
O̩la uko̩ tito̩ nadu ñwu me̩-i, todu ku me̩ ki fe̩do̩ omune̩; alu kʼu fe̩do̩ me̩ todu kʼame̩ ki ño̩ fe̩do̩ omune̩ abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Ef e-kide̩ oñ amone̩ du ama ka kʼame̩ chʼamako̩che̩-mi, iche̩wñ ku me̩ ne̩ ufe̩do̩ kpʼomune̩.
Saimo̩n Pita ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, ugbo uwe̩ anyi? Jisus dohi kakini, Ugbo kʼu nanyi e̩ neke tʼumi ubi fa-i ta n; e̩ muda atʼumi ubi e̩gba tʼe̩gba.
Pita ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, e̩wñ chi kʼu ma neke tʼuwe̩ ubi fa-i ta n? nadʼoji o̩la-mi tinyo̩ tod uwe̩.
Jisus dohi kakini, Uwe̩ adʼoji-we̩ tinyo̩ tod umi? Ami, ami, naka ñw e̩ kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼaiko̩ ako̩ gbogbo tak e̩ raire̩ mi onu me̩ta n.
Me̩ ki chʼe̩do̩ wuulu n; me̩ ke̩do̩nʼO̩jo̩, me̩ ño̩ ke̩do̩nʼomi ge̩.
Ef unyi Ata-mi uña ugugu wewe do̩mo̩; i ma dʼabe̩le̩ n u ma ka ñwu me̩; todabu kʼu nalo kʼu ñwʼuña che ñwu me̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼu le kʼu ñwʼuña che tane̩ ñwu me̩, nadabi wa ge̩, oñ namʼume̩ gba wʼugbo mi onugo; todu kʼugbo kʼomi de̩ kʼame̩ ki ño̩ jo̩ kpo̩fo̩.
Ugbo kʼomi anyi me̩ chema o̩na-wñ.
To̩mas ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, a ma ugbo kʼuwe̩ anyi n; abile kʼa ma o̩na-wñ?
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Omi chʼo̩na kpʼochochi kpʼiñmi: i ma lʼef umi n, e̩ne̩ du awʼugbo Ata n.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma ma mi, me̩ ma ma Ata-mi ge̩. Akwe̩gba kide̩ me̩ chemʼowñ, me̩ la fʼu li me̩.
Filip ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, dʼAta ña wa, tak i abʼuwa jo̩.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, U kpo̩kpe̩ ugbo me̩ abe̩-i, e̩ la ma mi ta n, Filip? E̩ne̩ ki fʼumi li fʼAta li me̩; abile kʼuwe̩ akakini, DʼAta ña wa?
E̩ ke̩do̩no ka kʼomi dʼef Ata, kʼAta la dʼef umi n? O̩la alu-mi e-kʼomi aka ñwu me̩-i, i chʼibe efu-mi oñ naka-i n; Ata kʼi muda gugu efu mi achʼuko̩lo̩ e-wñ le̩.
Me̩ nake̩do̩nʼo̩la mi kakini, Omi dʼef Ata, kʼAta la dʼef umi ge̩; i ma chʼabe̩le̩ n, me̩ nake̩do̩no tod uko̩lo̩ kide̩.
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩, e̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩nʼomi, uko̩lo̩ kʼomi ache, e̩ne̩ le̩ ñʼache ge̩, kpai e-ki tʼe-i le i ache ge̩; todabu kʼomi anyʼugbo Ata.
E̩wñ du ku me̩ la abi ef odu-mi, e-le̩ nache, todu kʼAta ki nʼojima ef O̩ma.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ bi e̩wñ ef odu-mi, omi ache.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ fe̩do̩ mi, me̩ adejutʼo̩la uko̩-mi.
Oñ omi arodubʼAta tak i adʼe̩nugbe̩do̩ omune̩ ñwu me̩, todu kʼi dʼugbo me̩ ogbegbele̩.
Owñ chʼAfu e-ochochi e-kʼile̩-i ma neke gba n; todabu kʼi ma ali n, kʼi ma la amʼo̩ n; ame̩ chemʼo̩; todabu kʼi gugu ugbo me̩, kʼi la adʼef ume̩ ge̩.
Natʼume̩ no̩ chʼamo̩maye-oku n; nawʼugbo me̩.
I bo̩ pe̩ tak ile̩ ma ñʼali mi ge̩ n, ame̩ muda ali mi; todabu kʼomi deju, ame̩ ñʼadeju ge̩.
O̩jo̩ e-le̩ ame̩ ama ka kʼomi dʼef Ata-mi, kʼame̩ la dʼef umi, kʼomi la dʼef ume̩.
E̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩la uko̩-mi kʼi la adejutʼo̩, e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki afe̩do̩ mi; oñ e̩ne̩ ki afe̩do̩ mi, Ata-mi afe̩do̩-wñ, tak omi afe̩do̩-wñ, naño̩ dʼo̩la-mi onugo tejugede ñw u.
Judas, e-kʼi ma chʼe-Iskario̩t in, ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, e̩wñ wache kʼe̩ che kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ onugo tejugede ñw a, kʼe̩ ma du te̩ ñw abile̩ n?
Jisus la dohi ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du afe̩do̩ mi i adejutʼo̩la-mi, tak Ata-mi afe̩do̩ wñ, oñ a awʼugbo-wñ, kʼa fʼugugu che ugbo-wñ.
E̩ne̩ ki ma fe̩do̩ mi n adejutʼo̩la-mi n; o̩la ku me̩ gbo̩-i la chʼe-mi n, chai e-Ata ki kpe̩ mi wa.
U fʼe-kide̩ ka ñwu me̩ abu kʼu gugu ugbo me̩.
Ama E̩nugbe̩do̩ le̩, owñ chʼAfu Kiafo̩ e-kʼAta akpe̩ wa ef odu-mi, e̩ne̩ le̩ ako̩ me̩ e̩wñ du, i la are me̩ wa e̩wñ du kʼu ka ñwu me̩.
Ure̩do̩ oñ nato̩no̩ ñwu me̩-i, ure̩do̩ e-mi nadu ñwu me̩; i chʼalu kʼile̩ adu ñw one̩ oñ omi adʼu ñwu me̩ n. Ame̩ ki chʼe̩do̩ wuulu n, me̩ ki la chokpo n.
Ame̩ gbo̩ ka kʼomi ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Nalo, u ñʼawʼugbo me̩ ge̩. Me̩ ma fe̩do̩ mi, me̩ ma yo̩ todabu kʼu nanyʼugbo Ata, todabu kʼAta tʼumi le.
Fa-i u la ka ñwu me̩ o̩gba tak i wache, todu kʼe̩gba du kʼi wache kʼame̩ ki ke̩do̩no.
U ñʼako̩la nana kpʼame̩ ge̩ n, todu agboji ile̩-i awa me̩: i la nʼe̩wñ du ef umi n,
ama todu kʼile̩ ki ma ka kʼomi afe̩do̩ Ata, alu kʼAta tuko̩ ñwu mi, abe̩le̩ nache. Me̩ kwane̩ kʼa kwʼemi alo.
Omi chʼoli achiwebe̩te̩ma e-ogbolo, Ata-mi la chʼaluche̩-wñ.
E̩to̩ du ef umi ki ma nʼe̩ro n, i adʼalo, e-du ki la arʼe̩ro i año̩ todu kʼi rʼe̩ro tule.
Ame̩ chʼabo ki chʼe̩ño̩ me̩, lef o̩la kʼu ka ñwu me̩ le̩. Me̩ nagugu efu mi waa, omi la dʼefu me̩.
Alu kʼe̩to̩ ma neke rʼe̩ro kpai ojikʼo̩la-wñ n, chai e̩gba kʼi kad achiwebe̩te̩ma, abe̩le̩ ame̩ la aro n, chai e̩gba ku me̩ gugu efu mi.
Omi chʼoli achiwebe̩te̩ma le̩, ame̩ chʼe̩to̩-wñ; e̩ne̩ ki gugu efu mi kʼomi la gugu efu wñ, e̩ne̩ le̩ arʼe̩ro nana; todabu ku me̩ ma neke che e̩wñ du ubi mi ojoji n.
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ ma gugu efu mi n, ma dʼu ro̩ tʼo̩do̩da dab e̩to̩ oli, tak i agbe̩; taku ma mʼu yajo̩, oñ ma ko rikpolo nyʼef una, tak i jo.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ gugu efu mi, kʼo̩la alu-mi la gugu efu me̩, e̩wñ du ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ me̩ nabi, oñ i amud e-me̩.
Ef e-kide̩ oñ Ata-mi nʼojima, todu ku me̩ ki rʼe̩ro nana, ku me̩ la mud amako̩che̩-mi.
Alu kʼAta fe̩do̩ mi, abe̩le̩ omi ño̩ fe̩do̩ me̩; me̩ nagugu ef ufe̩do̩ e-mi waa.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ dejutʼo̩la uko̩-mi ame̩ agugu ef ufe̩do̩-mi: alu kʼomi dejutʼo̩la uko̩ Ata-mi le̩, kʼu la gugu ef ufe̩do̩-wñ.
U kʼo̩la e̩wñ kide̩ ñwu me̩ todu kʼuyo̩-mi ki nadʼef ume̩, kʼuyo̩ e-me̩ le̩ ki la nyo̩ kpa.
O̩la-uko̩ e-mi le̩ de̩ kakini, Todu kʼame̩ ki fe̩do̩ omune̩ alu kʼu fe̩do̩ me̩.
Ufe̩do̩ ki tʼe-le̩ le e̩ne̩ du ne̩ n, owñ chʼutodu kʼone̩ ki mʼoji o̩la-wñ du tinyo̩ tod amonuku-wñ.
Ame̩ chʼamonuku-mi, iche̩wñ ku me̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼomi tuko̩ ñwu me̩.
U ñʼado̩ me̩ kʼadu ge̩ n; todabu kʼadu ma ma e̩wñ kʼodu-wñ ache n; u la do̩ me̩ ko̩ amonuku, todabu kʼu je̩ ñwu me̩ ma e̩wñ du kʼu gbo̩ ugbo Ata-mi.
I chʼame̩ chi mi n, chai omi chi me̩, u la ko me̩ jo̩ todu ku me̩ lo ku me̩ rʼe̩ro, kʼe̩ro-me̩ le̩ ki kpo̩kpe̩; todu kʼe̩wñ du ku me̩ bi Ata ef odu-mi, kʼi nadu ñwu me̩.
Uko̩ e̩wñ kide̩ nate̩ ñwu me̩ todu ku me̩ ki fe̩do̩ omune̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼile̩-i achulaka me̩, me̩ ma ka kʼulaka e-mi oñ i che o̩gba e-me̩.
E̩te̩-me̩ ma chʼile̩-i, ile̩ ma che̩do̩ e̩wñ e-wñ; todabu kʼe̩te̩-me̩ ma chʼile̩-i n, ama omi chi me̩ kwef ile̩-i, lef e-kide̩ oñ ile̩-i achulaka me̩.
Me̩ nadibekadʼo̩la kʼomi ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Adu tʼodu-wñ le n. Iche̩wñ ku ma doli mi, maku ma ñʼadoli me̩ ge̩; iche̩wñ ku ma dejutʼo̩la-mi, maku ma ñʼadejutʼe-me̩ ge̩.
Ma muda che me̩ e̩wñ kide̩ du tod odu-mi, todabu ku ma ma ma e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa n.
Iche̩wñ kʼu ma wa ko̩la ñwu ma n, ma ma nʼadure n; fa-i ma la nʼugbo du ku ma chukpa tod adure-ma ge̩ n.
E̩ne̩ ki achulaka mi achulaka Ata-mi kpo̩fo̩.
I ma chʼabu kʼu chʼuko̩lo̩ efu ma e-kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ ma che n, ma ma nʼadure n: fa-i ma la li, ma la chulaka mi kpʼAta-mi.
Ama e-le̩ chʼutodu kʼo̩la e-ki che̩ko̩tane̩ ef o̩lo̩da-ma ki che̩kpa kakini, Ma chulaka mi echichi ofofo.
Ama e̩gba du kʼE̩nugbe̩do̩ le̩ lewa, owñ chʼe-kʼu nakpe̩ kwʼugbo Ata wʼugbo me̩, Afu e-ochochi e-ki akwʼugbo Ata dufu, e̩ne̩ le̩ agba mi ibenu.
Ame̩ la ñʼagba ibenu ge̩, todabu ku me̩ jʼugbo mi kwʼabakwane̩.
O̩la e̩wñ kide̩ u ka ñwu me̩ todu ki we edʼame̩ hi.
Ma ache ku me̩ kwef ujeju-ma tane̩, oñ auwa awa todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki akpa me̩ ado̩ kʼe̩wñ ucholo oñ i adu ñw O̩jo̩,
ma ache e̩wñ kide̩ todabu ku ma ma ma Ata n, ma la mʼomi n.
U muda fʼo̩la e̩wñ kide̩ ka ñwu me̩ me̩, todu kʼe̩gba du kʼauwa le̩ lewa kʼame̩ ki dibekadʼo ka kʼomi ka ñwu me̩ me̩.
Ama fa-i nanyʼugbo e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa, e̩ne̩ du efu me̩ la tʼumi ene kakini, Ugbo uwe̩ anyi n?
Ama todabu kʼu ko̩la e̩wñ kide̩ ñwu me̩ e̩do̩dudu che̩ko̩ efu me̩.
Ama, ochochi oñ omi aka ñwu me̩-i, i chenʼile ñwu me̩ todu kʼomi kʼu kwʼemi alo; todu iche̩wñ kʼu ma kwʼemi alo n, i nʼugbo du kʼE̩nugbe̩do̩ le̩ awʼugbo me̩ n; i la che̩wñ kʼu le nakpʼowñ wʼugbo me̩.
E̩ne̩ le̩ la lewa i adʼo̩la adure kpai o̩la o̩kpakpa kpai o̩la ajo̩ bi abo ile̩.
O̩la adure chʼutodabu ku ma ma ke̩do̩nʼomi n;
o̩la o̩kpakpa la chʼutodabu kʼu nanyʼugbo Ata ku me̩ ma ñʼali mi ge̩ n;
oñ o̩la ajo̩ chʼutodabu ku ma fʼajo̩ agboji ile̩-i ka me̩.
U chenʼe̩wñ wewe kʼu naka ñwu me̩ ta, me̩ muda neke nʼadu-wñ abajo̩-i n.
Ama e̩gba du kʼe̩ne̩ kʼu ka le̩ lewa, owñ chʼAfu e-ochochi, i adʼume̩ mʼo̩na ochochi chaka; todu i agʼe̩do̩la-wñ ako̩la n, chai e̩wñ du kʼi agbo̩ oñ i aka; e̩wñ ki awa i ñʼadu ka ñwu me̩ ge̩.
Omi oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ adʼojima ñw u, todabu kʼi agba kwef e-mi, kʼi aduka ñwu me̩.
E̩wñ du kʼAta ne̩ e-mi i che; todule̩ u ka kʼi agba kwef e-mi tak i aduka ñwu me̩.
I de̩ pe̩ me̩ ñʼali mi n; tak i ñʼada-bi de̩ pe̩ oñ eju-me̩ ado mi; todabu kʼomi anyʼugbo Ata.

Todule̩ iche̩kibo̩ ef amako̩che̩-wñ ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, E̩wñ chʼe-kʼi aka ñwu wa kakini, I de̩ pe̩ me̩ ñʼali mi n, tak i ñʼadabi de̩ pe̩ oñ eju-me̩ ado mi? kpʼe-kʼi kakini, Todabu kʼu nanyʼugbo Ata?
Todule̩ ma kakini, E-i chʼe̩wñ? e-kʼi ka kʼi de̩ pe̩ le̩? A ma o̩la e̩wñ kʼi aka-i n.

Jisus chema ka ki dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma tʼowñ ene, tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, O̩la kide̩ oñ me̩ tʼo̩la-me̩ ene oji-wñ? Owñ chʼe-kʼu kakini, I de̩ pe̩ me̩ ñʼali mi n; tak i año̩ dabi de̩ pe̩ oñ eju-me̩ ado mi?
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kʼame̩ araku, me̩ la akʼeli oye, abile̩ la ayo̩, me̩ la che̩do̩dudu, e̩do̩dudu-me̩ le̩ amud uyo̩.
E̩gba du kʼonobule̩ achefu o̩ma, i anʼe̩do̩dudu, todabu kʼadiko-wñ lewa, ama e̩gba du kʼi fʼo̩ma bi tane̩ i ño̩ libe̩kadʼo̩bata-wñ ge̩ n, tod uyo̩, todabu ku ma fʼone̩ bi tef ile̩ me̩.
Todule̩ ame̩ la chenʼe̩do̩dudu fa-i mana; u muda adabi ali me̩ ge̩, tak e̩do̩-me̩ ayo̩, e̩ne̩ du la adu uyo̩-me̩ kwugbo me̩ n.
Tak ef o̩jo̩ kʼu naka-i me̩ ñʼatʼumi ene e̩wñ du n. Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩, Me̩ bi Ata e̩wñʼka i adu ñwu me̩ ef odu-mi.
Gbogbo wʼifa-i me̩ bi e̩wñ du ef odu-mi ta n, me̩ bi, me̩ la agba, todu kʼuyo̩-me̩ ki chʼe̩kefu.
O̩la e̩wñ kide̩ u ka ñwu me̩ lef ita; adiko awa e̩gba kʼu ma ñʼako̩la lef ita ñwu me̩ ge̩ n, ama nadʼo̩la Ata ka ñwu me̩ ejugede e̩gbale̩.
O̩jo̩ le̩ me̩ abi ef odu-mi; naka ñwu me̩ ka kʼomi arodubʼAta todu me̩ n.
Todu Ata onugo ache̩do̩ me̩ me̩, todabu kʼame̩ che̩do̩ mi ku me̩ laño̩ ke̩do̩no kakini, Ugbo Ata omi kwodufu wa.
U kwugbo Ata dufu wa, u la lewʼef ile̩ me̩; nadabi atʼile̩ no̩, naño̩ nyʼugbo Ata ge̩.
Amako̩che̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Go, fa-i tak e̩ ko̩la ejugede, i chʼo̩la ita e̩ ka-i ge̩ n.
Fa-i a ma kʼuwe̩ chema e̩wñ du, e̩ la nʼeku ki aku uwe̩ kʼone̩ atʼuwe̩ ene n: ef e-kide̩ oñ a ke̩do̩no ka kʼugbo O̩jo̩ e̩ kwodufu wa.
Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ke̩do̩no fa-i?
Me̩ go, auwa awa, i la lewa me̩; todu kʼame̩ akpatuka kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki tef e-wñ tak ume̩ atʼumi kate no̩; i la chʼomi kate n, todabu kʼAta dʼugbo mi.
U ko̩la e̩wñ kide̩ ñwu me̩ todu kʼame̩ ki nʼure̩do̩ efu mi. Me̩ nʼo̩bata ef ile̩-i, ama me̩ fe̩do̩ ne̩, omi fʼile̩ du me̩.
Jisus ko̩la e̩wñ kide̩ tak abu kʼi chʼeju-wñ gʼojale i kakini, Ata-mi, auwa le̩ lewa me̩; dʼojima ñw O̩ma-we̩ todu kʼO̩ma-we̩ ki dʼojima ñw e̩;
dabalu kʼe̩ mʼo̩da o̩re̩la du du ñw u, todu kʼi dʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ ñw abo du kʼe̩ ko ñw u.
E̩wñ ki la chʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ le̩ de̩, todu kʼama ki mʼuwe̩ kʼuwe̩ kate chʼO̩jo̩ ogbolo, kpʼe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ kpe̩ wa le̩—owñ che Jisus Kraist.
Omi mʼojima du ñw e̩ ane̩-ile̩ me̩; abu kʼu fʼuko̩lo̩ kʼe̩ du ñwu mi kʼu che le̩ che kpa;
Ata-mi, fa-i tak e̩ dʼojima ñwu mi manyʼO̩la-we̩, ojima e-kʼu ne̩ ugbo we̩ o̩gba tak ile̩ de̩.
U mʼodu-we̩ du tejugede ñw amone̩ kʼe̩ ko ñwu mi kwef abile̩. Abo-we̩ ma che; tak e̩ mʼuma ko ñwu mi, ma la dejutʼo̩la-we̩ me̩.
Fa-i ma chema ka kʼe̩wñ du kʼe̩ ko ñwu mi, ugbo we̩ i kwo.
Tod uko̩la kʼuwe̩ ko ñwu mi le̩, u mʼu ko ñwu ma me̩, ma la mʼu gba, oñ ma ma ka kʼugbo we̩ u kwodufu wa ochochi, ma ño̩ ke̩do̩no ka kʼuwe̩ kpe̩ mi wa.
Todu ma oñ omi atene-i; natene tod abile̩ n, chai tod abo kʼe̩ muko ñwu mi, todabu ku ma chʼabo-we̩.
E̩wñ e-mi du la chʼe-we̩, e̩wñ e-we̩ la chʼe-mi; u la fʼojima ne̩ efu-ma me̩.
U la dʼef ile̩ fa-i ge̩ n, ama le̩ la jʼef ile̩, oñ omi awʼugbo we̩. Ata Kiafo̩, dejute̩ abo kʼe̩ ko ñwu mi ef odu-we̩, todu ku ma ki chʼoka, alu kʼawa la de̩.
E̩gba kʼu dʼugbo ma omi dejute̩ ma ef odu-we̩, owñ chʼabo kʼe̩ ko ñwu mi, u la fʼuma de, oñ e̩ne̩ du lenyo̩ kwefu ma n, chai o̩ma ulenyo̩ le̩—todu kʼo̩la ki dʼef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ki che̩ kpa.
Fa-i nawʼugbo we̩; oñ nako̩la e̩wñ kide̩ ef ile̩-i todu ku ma ki nʼuyo̩-mi kʼi che̩ko̩ efu-ma.
Omi mʼo̩la-we̩ du ñwu ma me̩, ile̩ la chulaka ma, todabu kʼe̩te̩-ma ma chʼabo ile̩ n, dabalu kʼe̩te̩-mi ma chʼabo ile̩ n.
Natene todu kʼe̩ mʼuma ko kwef ile̩ n, chai todu kʼuwe̩ ki dejute̩ ma bʼe̩wñ bibi te̩.
E̩te̩-ma chʼabo ile̩ n, dabalu kʼe̩te̩-mi ma chʼabo ile̩ n.
Che ma ku ma chʼabo kiafo̩ ef ochochi; o̩la-we̩ le̩ chʼochochi.
Dabalu kʼe̩ kpe̩ mi tef ile̩, abe̩le̩ omi la kpe̩ ma tef ile̩;
todu ma oñ nache o̩la-mi ki fo̩, todu kʼama onugo ki chʼabo kiafo̩ ef ochochi.
I la chʼutodu abo-i kate oñ natene-i n, ama todu abo ku ma ake̩do̩no mi lef o̩la-ma kpo̩fo̩,
todu kʼo̩chaka-ma ki chʼoka, alu kʼuwe̩, Ata, dʼef umi, kʼomi la dʼef uwe̩, todu kʼama ki jʼef uwa abe̩le̩, todu kʼabile̩ ki ke̩do̩no ka kʼuwe̩ kpe̩ mi wa.
Omi la mʼojima e-kʼe̩ du ñwu mi du ñwu ma me̩, todu kʼama ki chʼoka alu kʼAwa chʼoka.
Omi dʼef uma, uwe̩ la dʼef umi, todu kʼama ki chʼabo ki mufu tef okate, todu kʼabile̩ ki ma ka kʼuwe̩ kpe̩ mi wa, kʼe̩ la fe̩do̩ ma alu kʼe̩ fe̩do̩ mi.
Ata-mi, i dʼumi e̩do̩ todu kʼabo kʼe̩ ko ñwu mi ki jʼugbo mi ugbo kʼomi de̩, todu kʼama ki gʼojima e-mi kʼe̩ mudu ñwu mi, todabu kʼuwe̩ fe̩do̩ mi o̩gba taku ma kpʼe̩re̩ ile̩-i.
Ata o̩kpakpa, ile̩ la mʼuwe̩ n, omi la mʼuwe̩, tak abo-i ma ka kʼuwe̩ kpe̩ mi wa.
U la je̩ ñwu ma mʼodu-we̩, naño̩ je̩ ñwu ma ma ge̩; todu kʼufe̩do̩ e-kʼe̩ ne̩ fe̩do̩ mi ki nadʼef uma, kʼomi kʼu la dʼef uma ge̩.
Abu ku Jisus fʼe-kide̩ ka owñ kpai amako̩che̩-wñ dufu tʼudaba ukpolo Ke̩dro̩n, ugbo kʼuche̩ de̩, owñ kpai amako̩che̩-wñ mugudu tef uwñ.
Judas, e̩ne̩ ki adʼuwñ ñwu ma mu, ño̩ chema ugbo le̩, todabu ku Jisus kpai amako̩che̩-wñ jeju o̩mo̩ o̩gbe̩nugbe̩.
Todule̩ abu ku Judas mʼuche̩ amiso̩jaʼka kpai abimo̩to̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ amagboji amatama kpai amaFarisi gba, i nʼomutula kpai e̩mu kpai e̩wñ ido̩na ogu awa o̩mo̩.
Todule̩ abu ku Jisus chema e̩wñ du ki awa abʼowñ ma, i ledufu oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ me̩feju?
Madohi ñwu kakini, Jisus abo Nazare̩t. Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Omi de̩. Judas, e-kʼi adʼuwñ ñwu ma mu, la dago efu ma ge̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼi ka ñwu ma ka kʼomi de̩, ma lʼubi ubi oñ ma lewa nʼane̩.
Todule̩ i ño̩ dabi tʼuma ene ge̩ kaikini, E̩ne̩ me̩ feju? Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Jisus abo Nazare̩t.
Jisus dohi kakini, U ka ñwu me̩ ka kʼomi de̩. Todule̩ iche̩wñ ku me̩ feju mi, me̩ tʼabo-i no̩ ku ma lo ma,
todu kʼo̩la kʼi ka kakini, Abo kʼe̩ ko ñwu mi le̩ u je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du efu ma lenyo̩ n, ki che̩ kpa.
Todule̩ abu ku Saimo̩n Pita nʼugbada i mʼu wo̩ oñ i fʼadu agboji amatama da, i la mʼeti-wñ awo̩to̩ la. Odu adu le̩ la ko̩ Malkus.
Todule̩ Jisus ka ñwu Pita kakini, Mʼugbada du tunyʼako̩-wñ; ago kʼAta du ñwu mi i nʼugbo du kʼu nañmo̩ ge̩ n?
Todule̩ uche̩ amiso̩ja kpai onu-ogu kpai abimo̩to̩ e-amaju le̩ fu Jisus mu, ma la fʼu ji;
taku ma mʼu du nyʼugbo Anas ejodudu, todu owñ chʼata o̩ya Kayafas, e-kʼi chʼagboji amatama o̩do̩ le̩.
