Kayafas le̩ la chʼe̩ne̩ ki tʼohio̩la ñwu amaju ka ki chenʼile kʼone̩ okate ki leku todu amone̩.
Oñ Saimo̩n Pita kpai ako̩che̩ omune̩ʼka tu Jisus ubi. Agboji amatama la chema ako̩che̩ e-le̩, oñ i gudu kpai Jisus tef anuku atama le̩.
Pita muda dago alugbana o̩do̩da. Todule̩ ako̩che̩ omune̩ le̩, e-kʼagboji amatama chemʼo̩, ledufu oñ i ko̩la ñw onobule̩ ki adʼalugbana tak i mu Pita du wʼejefu.
Todule̩ imo̩to̩ onobule̩ ki adʼalugbana le̩ ka ñwu Pita kakini, Uwe̩ ño̩ dʼef amako̩che̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ ge̩? Owñ le̩ kakini, U dʼefu ma no.
Abu ku ma fʼuna-ige̩ ko omadu kpai abimo̩to̩ dago jʼo̩mo̩ todabu kʼafu akpa, oñ ma jʼawuna; Pita la dago efu ma awuna.
Todule̩ agboji amatama tu Jisus ene o̩la amako̩che̩-wñ, kpai o̩la e̩wñ kʼi akone̩.
Jisus dohi ñw u kakini, Omi te̩tako̩la ejugede ñw abile̩; omi ko̩ ma ef unyi ujeju kpai ef unyi O̩jo̩ ugbo kʼamaJu chaka wa jeju e̩gba du, u la ko̩la e̩wñ du maja n.
E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ tʼumi ene? Tʼabo ki gbʼo̩la e̩wñ kʼu ka ñwu ma ene; go, abo-i chema e̩wñ kʼomi ka.
Abu kʼi fʼe-kide̩ ka imo̩to̩ʼka ki dago o̩mo̩ fʼawo ko̩ Jisus, i kakini, Abu kʼe̩ dohi ñw agboji amatama de̩-i?
Jisus dohi ñw u kakini, I chʼo̩la e̩bie̩ne̩ u ka le̩ mak e̩ gbibenu e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼi che, i la chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ dʼo̩wo̩ gwo mi?
Todule̩ Anas mʼowñ du kpuche̩ alu kʼi che̩ji le̩ nyʼugbo Kayafas, agboji amatama.
Saimo̩n Pita la dago awuna. Todule̩ ma ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ño̩ dʼef amako̩che̩-wñ ge̩? E̩ne̩ le̩ raire̩, i kakini, U dʼefu ma no.
E̩ne̩ʼka ef amadu agboji amatama, kʼi chʼefu e̩ne̩ ku Pita mʼeti-wñ la le̩, kakini, Omi li we̩ ef uche̩ le̩ kpai owñ n?
Todule̩ Pita ño̩ dabi raire̩ ge̩; ababale̩ aiko̩ la ko̩.
Todule̩ ma du Jisus kwugbo Kayafas alo tef unyi Praito̩rio̩n, odudodudu i la che. Ama le̩ la gudu tefu Praito̩rio̩n n, tode̩gba kʼo̩la-ma adaji, chai kʼama ki je̩ Elaloji le̩.
Todule̩ Pailati ledufu wʼo̩do̩da ugbo ma, oñ i kakini, O̩la e̩wñ me̩ du dʼe̩ne̩-i ajo̩?
Ma dohi ka ñw u kakini, Owñ le̩ ma chʼe̩ne̩ ki ache e̩bie̩ne̩ n, a ma dʼowñ ñw e̩ n.
Todule̩ Pailati ka ñwu ma kakini, A me̩ mʼowñ du ku me̩ kajo̩-wñ teju o̩lo̩da e-me̩. AmaJu ka ñw u kakini, O̩da je̩ ñwu wa kpʼe̩ne̩ du n;
todu kʼo̩la Jisus ki che̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi ka kʼi du jiwe alu kʼuku kʼi ache kʼi ku de̩.
Todule̩ Pailati ño̩ dabi gudu tef unyi Praito̩rio̩n, oñ i fu Jisus do̩, i la ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ chʼOnu amaJu?
Jisus dohi kakini, Uwe̩ gʼe̩do̩la-we̩ ko̩la kide̩? abe̩k abomune̩ kʼo̩la-mi ñw e̩?
Pailati dohi kakini, Omi che Ju? Abuche̩ichi e-we̩ kpai amagboji amatama inʼuwe̩ du ñwu mi; ab e̩ che ke?

Jisus dohi kakini, E̩te̩ o̩da Ojane̩ e-mi chʼile̩ kide̩ n. E̩te̩ o̩da Ojane̩ e-mi ma chʼe-ile̩ kide̩, abimo̩to̩-mi ma fʼeju gbiti ajuja todu ku ma ki we edu mi ñw amaJu; ama o̩da Ojane̩ e-mi dʼemi fa-i n.

Todule̩ Pailati ka ñw u kakini, Mak onu we̩ che ke? Jisus dohi kakini, Uwe̩ ka kʼu chʼonu. Todu e-kide̩ ma bi mi, tod e-kide̩ oñ u lewʼef ile̩, todu kʼu gbʼochochi ibenu. E̩ne̩ du kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼochochi agbʼomu-mi.
Pailati ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chʼochochi?
I muda chenʼe̩wñ o̩gu ku ma te̩tache ñwu me̩, todu kʼu tʼe̩ne̩ʼka no̩ tane̩ ñwu me̩ ef Elaloji: todule̩ ame̩ neku kʼu natʼOnu amaJu no̩ tane̩ ñwu me̩?
Todule̩ ma dabi kpogu kakini, I chʼe̩ne̩ kide̩ n, chai Barabas. Barabas le̩ la chʼadinya.
Todule̩ Pailati mu Jisus du e̩gbale̩ oñ i fʼu ja.
Tak amisoja mʼikeke ko ta ki chʼuloko oji-wñ, ma mʼu du dʼo oji. Taku ma mʼotogbo odufa-ekpikpa du tʼo̩ o̩la,
ma la wʼugbo wñ oñ ma kakini, Agba-o, Onu amaJu! Taku ma fʼawo kʼo̩.
Taku Pailati dabi dufu wʼo̩do̩da, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ go, nadʼu tʼo̩do̩da ñwu me̩ todu ku ma ki ma ka kʼu li o̩la du kʼi fe̩ n.
Todule̩ Jisus ledufu tʼo̩do̩da, ikeke ugugu uloko le̩ la dʼoji-wñ, otogbo odufa-ekpikpa la dʼo̩la-wñ. Taku Pailati ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ gʼe̩ne̩-i!

Todule̩ e̩gba kʼamagboji amatama kpai abimo̩to̩ le̩ fʼowñ li ma kpogu kakini, Me̩ mʼu du kamoli! me̩ mʼu du kamoli! Pailat ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ki mʼowñ du ku me̩ du kamoli, todu omi li o̩la du kʼi fe̩ n.
AmaJu le̩ dohi ñw u kakini, Awa chenʼo̩lo̩da, oñ ugbo o̩lo̩da e-wa i dukpe̩ kʼi aku, todabu kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩.
Todule̩ e̩gba ku Pailati gbʼo̩la kide̩, i railo tule.
Tak i dabi gudu tefu Praito̩rio̩n ge̩, oñ i ka ñwu Jisus kakini, Ugbo we̩ kwo? Jisus muda dohi ñw u n.
Todule̩ Pailati ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ako̩la ñwu mi n? E̩ ma ka kʼomi chenʼo̩da kʼu natʼuwe̩ no̩ tane̩ n, kʼu la chenʼo̩da kʼu nadʼuwe̩ kamoli n?
Jisus dohi ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ ku ma ma du ñw e̩ kwʼate̩ n, e̩ ma nʼo̩da du ugbo mi n. Tod e-kide̩ e̩ne̩ ki mʼumi du ñw e̩ nʼadure ki nana tule.
Kwef e-kide̩ oñ Pailati feju kʼi tʼowñ no̩ tane̩; amaJu muda kpogu kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ tʼe̩ne̩ kide̩ no̩ tane̩ mak e̩ chʼonuku Sisa n; e̩ne̩ du kʼi adʼo̩la-wñ chʼonu achʼakpabie̩ Sisa.
Todule̩ abu ku Pailati gbʼo̩la-i i mu Jisus du wʼo̩do̩da, tak i kwogugu o̩gba-e̩de̩ ugbo ku ma do̩ kʼAjita-okuta, alu Hibru-wñ muda ko̩ Gabata.
O̩jo̩ Emo̩latane̩ ñw Elaloji i che, i dab auwa e̩ke̩fa-wñ. Tak i ka ñw amaJu kakini, Me̩ go, Onu-me̩-i!
Todule̩ abo le̩ kpogu kakini, Mʼu du alo, mʼu du alo, fʼowñ kamoli! Pailati ka ñwu ma kakini, U mʼOnu-me̩-i du kamoli? Amagboji amatama dohi kakini, A nʼonu du n, chai Sisa.
Todule̩ i mʼowñ du ñwu ma e̩gba le̩, todu ku ma fʼu kamoli. Todule̩ ma mu Jisus gba.
Tak i nʼoli uku-wñ ñw o̩la-wñ alo tʼugbo ku ma do̩ kʼuña Akokoloji, e-ku ma do̩ alu Hibru ko̩ Go̩lgo̩ta;
o̩mo̩ le̩ ma fʼowñ kamoli, owñ kpai abomune̩ meji, oka dʼo̩wo̩ʼka, oka dʼo̩wo̩ ekeji, Jisus la dʼalumeji.
Oñ Pailati ño̩ kʼorubutu ujiwe-wñ, i la mʼu du gamʼoj oli uku le̩. Oñ olubutu kʼi ko̩ kakini, JISUS ABO NAZARE̩T, ONU AMAJU.
Todule̩ amaJu wewe chʼo̩kalatu o̩la ujiwe kide̩, todabu kʼuña le̩ cheme̩rʼewo le̩, owñ chʼugbo ku ma fu Jisus kamoli le̩; olubutu-wñ la chʼalu Hibru kpʼalu Rom kpʼalu Grik.
Todule̩ amagboji amatama e-amaJu ka ñwu Pailati kakini, E̩ ki ko̩ ka kʼOnu amaJu n, e̩ muda ko̩ ka kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kakini, Onu amaJu u che.
Pailati dohi kakini, E-kʼu ko̩ u ko̩ me̩.
Todule̩ e̩gba ku ma fu Jisus kamoli, amisoja mʼe̩wñ-o̩la-wñ ko, oñ ma fʼu kpe̩ me̩le̩, isoja du ne̩ ukpe̩ʼka; kpai afe̩-wñ ge̩; afe̩ le̩ la nʼe̩ga n, kwʼate̩-wñ gbogbo wʼane̩-wñ ma hi odukulu.
Todule̩ ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, A ki fʼo̩ na n, chai anya a aro̩ oji-wñ kʼa ma e̩ne̩ ki aje̩; todu kʼo̩la ki dʼef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ki che̩, e-ki kakini,
Abo ku ma la dago o̩la oli uku Jisus chʼiye-wñ kpʼo̩maye iye-wñ onobule̩ kpai Me̩ri e-Klopas kpai Me̩ri Magdalini.
Todule̩ abu ku Jisus li iye-wñ, kpʼako̩che̩ kʼi afe̩do̩ kʼi ño̩ dago o̩mo̩, i ka ñw iye-wñ kakini, Onobule̩, go, o̩ma-we̩ de̩.
Taki ka ñw ako̩che̩ le̩ kakini, Go, iye-we̩ de̩. Oñ akwʼe̩gba le̩ ako̩che̩ le̩ mʼowñ gba tef abo-wñ.
Ubi e-kide̩, abu ku Jisus chema ka kʼe̩wñ du kpoji me̩, todu kʼo̩la ki dʼef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ki kpoji, i kakini, Alugbe̩ akpa mi.
Omi e̩ka la che̩ko̩ e̩wñ ekuʼka gugu o̩mo̩, todule̩ ma mʼugbo̩che̩ e-ki fʼomi e̩ka le̩ ñmo̩ nyʼo̩la du tunyʼo̩j oli hiso̩p, oñ ma mʼu dute̩ kpʼalu-wñ.
Todule̩ e̩gba ku Jisus mʼomi e̩ka le̩ gba, i kakini, I kpoji me̩; tak abu kʼi fʼoji-wñ dalo̩ i mʼafu-wñ du dufu.

Todule̩, abu kʼo̩jo̩ le̩ chʼo̩jo̩ Emo̩latane̩, todu kʼoku amone̩ le̩ ki we ejʼoj oli o̩jo̩ uñmi, (todu o̩jo̩ uñmi kide̩ chʼo̩jo̩ ma), amaJu rodubo̩ Pailati todu ku ma fʼe̩re̩-ma guche̩, ku ma mʼuma ko kwʼo̩mo̩.
Todule̩ amisoja lewa, oñ ma fʼe-ejodudu e̩re̩ guche̩, kpai e-omune̩ ku ma fʼu kamoli kpai owñ;
ama abu ku ma le wʼugbo Jisus, ku ma li ka kʼi leku me̩, ma gu e̩re̩-wñ che̩ n.
Iso̩jaʼka muda dʼo̩kwo̩ gwunyʼakolo-wñ, oñ ababale̩ e̩bie̩ kpai omi kwodufu.
E̩ne̩ ki la li mʼibenu-wñ gba me̩, ibenu-wñ kʼi gba le̩ la chʼogbolo, e̩ne̩ le̩ ño̩ chema ka kʼochochi i aka-i, todu kʼame̩ ki ño̩ ke̩do̩no ge̩.
Todu e-kide̩ wache todu kʼo̩la ki dʼef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ki che̩ kakini, Achiku-wñ okate aguche̩ n.
Oñ o̩la omune̩ ojoji ki dʼef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ño̩ kakini, Ma afʼeju-ma do e̩ne̩ ku ma dʼe̩wñ gwunyʼu.

Ubi e̩wñ le̩ Jose̩f kʼi kwo Arimatia, (abu kʼi chʼako̩che̩ Jisus kʼi la du maja ef uwñ tod ailo amaJu kʼi ara), i tu Pailati ene todu kʼi mʼoku Jisus du; oñ Pailati je̩. Todule̩ oñ i lewa mʼoku-wñ du.
Niko̩dimus, kʼi wʼugbo wñ odu e̩gba ejodudu le̩, ño̩ ne̩ mur kpai alos ki kpe̩gwa nyʼomune̩ e-kʼe̩bo̩ du ogu me̩lu wa.
Todule̩ ma mʼoku Jisus du oñ ma mʼo̩kpe̩ line̩n du wenyʼu manyʼe̩wñ ki akpo le̩, alu kʼe̩wñ-o̩gu amaJu de̩ ku ma che okuegu taku ma ji.
Ugbo ku ma fʼu kamoli le̩ uche̩ʼka la do̩mo̩; oñ ef uche̩ le̩ oji tito̩ do̩mo̩, e-ku ma ma dʼe̩ne̩ du tʼef uwñ mama ta n.
O̩mo̩ ma du Jisus dachi, tod Emo̩latane̩ e-amaju, todabu kʼoji le̩ cheme̩rʼo̩wo̩.
Oñ o̩jo̩ ejodudu ef o̩jo̩ mebie Me̩ri Magdalini, awa alu oji inajo̩ e̩gba kʼane̩ che̩chubi ta, oñ i li abu ku ma mʼokuta du bʼalu oji te̩.
Todule̩ i fule wʼugbo Saimo̩n Pita kpʼugbo ako̩che̩ omune̩ e-ku Jisus che̩do̩-wñ le̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ma mʼOndu du kwef oji me̩, a la mʼugbo ku ma dʼu te̩ n.
Todule̩ Pita kpʼakoche̩ omune̩ le̩ ledufu, oñ ma lewʼalu oji.
Ama meji la fule kpe̩re̩, ako̩che̩ omune̩ le̩ muda fule tu Pita le, oñ i lewa alu oji ejodudu.
Oñ abu kʼi te̩kpe̩ go, i li o̩kpe̩ le̩ abu kʼi jʼane̩; i muda gudu tejefu n.
Todule̩ Saimo̩n Pita la tʼo̩ ubi awa, oñ i mugudu tef oji, i la li abu kʼo̩kpe̩ line̩n tʼane̩
kpai ugbogbo ki jʼoji-wñ, kʼi ma la tʼane̩ ugbo o̩kpe̩ le̩ n, i muda chʼe̩che̩ jʼugboʼka ojoji.
E̩gbale̩ tak ako̩che̩ omune̩ e-kʼi wʼugbo oji o̩gba le̩ mugudu tejefu, oñ i fʼu li, i laño̩ do̩rʼochochi.
Todu e̩gbale̩ ma mʼoji O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ kʼi kakini, I dukpe̩ kʼowñ ki kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, ta n.
Todule̩ amako̩che̩ ño̩ dabi kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼo̩ja-ma.
Me̩ri muda dago o̩do̩da oji le̩ araku. Todule̩ abu kʼi do̩mo̩ araku i te̩kpe̩ gʼef oji,
oñ i li amonuche̩ meji ku ma kʼe̩wñ efufu bʼo̩la ma gugu, oka dʼugbo oji-wñ, oka la dʼugbo e̩re̩-wñ ugbo kʼaño̩la Jisus dachi le̩.
Tak abo le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Onobule̩, e̩wñ chʼe̩ aku? I ka ñwu ma kakini, Todabu ku ma mʼOndu-mi du, u la mʼugbo ku ma dʼowñ te̩ n.
Abu kʼi fʼe-i ka i murida tubi, oñ i li abu ku Jisus dago, i la ma ka ku Jisusi de̩ n.

Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Onobule̩, e̩wñ chʼe̩ aku? E̩ne̩ e̩feju? Owñ le̩, abu kʼi do̩ ka kʼaluche̩ le̩ de̩, ka ñw u kakini, Odu-mi, iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ nʼe̩ kwʼemi, ka ñwu mi ugbo kʼe̩ dʼowñ te̩, tak omi amʼu du.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Me̩ri! Onobule̩ le̩ murida ka ñw u alu Hibru kakini, Raboni, (owñ chʼukakini. Akone̩wñ).
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ki do̩wo̩kado mi n, todu u te̩gu nyʼugbo Ata ta n; e̩ muda alo tʼugbo amo̩maye-mi kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma kakini, Nate̩gu nyʼugbo Ata-mi kpʼAta-me̩, O̩jo̩-mi kpʼO̩jo̩-me̩.
Me̩ri Magdalini le̩ lewa fʼuche̩ je̩rʼamako̩che̩ kakini, U fʼOndu li me̩, kpʼo̩la e̩wñ kʼi ka ñw u le̩.

Todule̩ e̩gba kʼane̩ lo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩, owñ chʼo̩jo̩ ejodudu ef o̩jo̩ mebie abu kʼo̩na ugbo kʼamako̩che̩ jo̩ la chʼe̩re tod ailo amaJu ki aba ma, Jisus lewa dago alumeji, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ure̩do̩ ki chʼe-me̩.
Tak abu kʼi fʼe-le̩ ka, i dʼo̩wo̩-wñ kpʼakolo-wñ ña ma. Todule̩ amako̩che̩ le̩ yo̩ abu ku ma fʼOndu li.
Todule̩ Jisus ño̩ dabi ka ñwu ma kakini, Ure̩do̩ ki chʼe-me̩; alu kʼAta kpe̩ mi, abe̩le̩ oñ omi akpe̩ me̩ ge̩.
Tak abu kʼi fʼe-le̩ ka i ñmiñmi rʼuma o̩la, i la ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ gba Afu Kiafo̩:
abo du ku me̩ tʼadure-ma no̩ ñwu ma, maku ma tʼo̩ no̩ ñwu ma me̩; e-abo ku me̩ gwo̩nyu maku ma gwo̩nyʼu me̩.
To̩mas, e̩ne̩ʼka ef abo me̩gweji le̩, e̩ne̩ ku ma do̩ ko̩ Ukpejima le̩, la dʼugbo ma e̩gba ku Jisus wa n.

Todule̩ amako̩che̩ kibo̩ ka ñw u kakini, A fʼOndu li me̩. Ama i ka ñwu ma kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼu ma li ame̩ ale ef o̩wo̩-wñ n, kʼu ma la dʼo̩mo̩wʼo̩-mi tunyʼu n; ku ma la dʼo̩wo̩-mi tunyʼakolo-wñ n, i nugbo du kʼu nake̩do̩no n.
Abu kʼo̩jo̩ me̩jo̩ lale amako̩che̩-wñ ño̩ dabi jʼejefu. Tomas la dʼugbo ma. Abu kʼo̩na chʼe̩re Jisus lewa oñ i dago alumeji, tak i kakini, Ure̩do̩ ki chʼe-me̩.
Tak i ka ñwu To̩mas kakini, Dʼo̩mo̩wo̩-we̩ wʼemi, kʼe̩ go o̩wo̩-mi; e̩ ki ño̩ dʼo̩wo̩-we̩ wa kʼe̩ dʼu tunyʼakolo-mi; e̩ ki la mud e̩ne̩ ki ako̩ eke̩do̩no n, chai e̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩no.
To̩mas dohi oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Ondu-mi kpʼO̩jo̩-mi.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Todabu kʼe̩ fʼumi li oñ e̩ ke̩do̩no; abo ku ma ma li mi n, ku ma muda ke̩do̩no gbede.
Todule̩ Jisus ño̩ che ujiwe omune̩ wewe eju amako̩che̩-wñ e-ku ma ma kʼolubutu-wñ ef o̩takada kide̩-i n;
ma muda fʼe-i ko̩ todu ku me̩ ki ke̩do̩no kakini, Jisus che Kraist O̩ma O̩jo̩, todu kʼabu ku me̩ la ke̩do̩no ku me̩ ki nʼiñmi ef odu-wñ.
Ubi e̩wñ kide̩ Jisus dabi dʼo̩la-wñ tejugede ñw amako̩che̩-wñ o̩l ohimini Taiberias: abu kʼi dʼu tejugede la de̩:
Saimo̩n Pita kpai To̩mas kʼi kʼodu Ukpe̩jima, kpai Natanie̩l kʼi kwo Kena e-Galili kpʼamo̩ma Ze̩be̩di, kpʼabomune̩ meji ef amako̩che̩-wñ jʼugboʼkate.
Saimo̩n Pita ka ñwu ma kakini, Nanyʼakpe̩ja. Ma ka ñw u kakini, Awa kpʼuwe̩ akpe̩re̩. Taku ma ledufu oñ ma kwotʼo̩ko̩; ma la mʼe̩wñ du odu o̩jo̩ le̩ n.
Abu kʼo̩jo̩ añwa Jisus la dago eti ohimini; amako̩che̩ muda ma ka ku Jisus de̩ n.
Todule̩ Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Abimo̩to̩, me̩ nʼuje̩wñ? Ma dohi ñw u kakini, Ehee.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ rʼiga tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ o̩ko̩, taku me̩ ali. Todule̩ ma rʼo̩, oñ ma ño̩ bo̩jo̩ ku ma fʼo̩ ge̩ n noj e̩ja ki che̩ko̩-wñ.
Todule̩ ako̩che̩ ku Jisus fe̩do̩ le̩ ka ñwu Pita kakini, Ondu de̩. Todule̩ abu ku Saimo̩n Pita gbo̩ ka kʼOndu de̩, i mʼikagwoji-wñ du lʼago, (todu i tʼo̩la ofo), tak i fʼo̩la-wñ ro̩ tef ohimini.
Amako̩che̩ kibo̩ muda tʼo̩mo̩ko̩ afʼiga e̩ja wa, todu ma jiji rʼane̩ n, i la dab ohibo̩wo̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩.
Todule̩ abu ku ma mudachi tʼane̩, ma li una ige̩ ane̩ o̩mo̩ kʼe̩ja jʼoji-wñ kpai akala.
Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ kʼe̩ja egini kwef e̩ja ku me̩ mu fa-i le̩ wa.
Todule̩ Saimo̩n Pita kwo̩tʼo̩ko̩ oñ i fʼiga le̩ fa wʼane̩, ame̩ja lile oli me̩ta nyoke me̩ta che̩ko̩-wñ; abu ku ma chaka chewewe iga le̩ jada n.
Jisus ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ lewa kpucho̩. E̩ne̩ du ef amako̩che̩ le̩ la gbe̩do̩ tʼowñ ene kakini, E̩ne̩ uwe̩ che n, abu ku ma chema ka kʼOndu de̩.
Jisus lewa oñ i mʼakala le̩ gba, i mʼu du ñwu ma, kpai e̩ja egini, abe̩le̩ ge̩.
E-le̩ mud onu e̩ke̩ta ku Jisus kwotejugede ñw amako̩che̩-wñ abu kʼi dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku.

Todule̩ e̩gba ku ma fʼucho̩ kpa, Jisus ka ñwu Saimo̩n Pita kakini, Saimo̩n, o̩ma Jo̩n, e̩ fe̩do̩ mi tʼabo ki jo̩-i le? I ka ñw u kakini, I-i, Ondu; e̩ chema ka kʼu nache̩do̩ we̩. I ka ñw u kakini, Kʼe̩wñ ñw amala-mi je̩.
I dabi ka ñw u onu ekeji kakini, Saimo̩n, o̩ma Jo̩n, e̩ fe̩do̩ mi? I ka ñw u kakini, I-i, Ondu, e̩ chema ka kʼu nache̩do̩ we̩. I ka ñw u kakini, Dejutʼamala-mi.

I ka ñw u onu e̩ke̩ta kakini, Saimo̩n, o̩ma Jo̩n, e̩ che̩do̩ mi? Pita chʼe̩do̩dudu todabu kʼi ka ñw u onu e̩ke̩ta le̩ kakini, E̩ che̩do̩ mi? Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, uwe̩ chema e̩wñ du; uwe̩ chema ka kʼu nache̩do̩ we̩. Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Kʼuje̩wñ ñw amala-mi.

Ami, ami, naka ñw e̩ kakini, E̩gba kʼe̩ chʼimo̩to̩ e̩ dʼe̩wñ lʼo̩la-we̩ ago de̩, ugbo du ki la dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ e̩ tale e̩gbale̩; ama e̩gba kʼe̩ gbo uwe̩ anʼo̩wo̩-we̩ dala oñ e̩nomune̩ adʼe̩wñ lʼuwe̩ ago de, tak i adʼuwe̩ nyʼugbo ki ma dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ n.
I la ka e-le̩ ki chʼujiwe alu kʼuku kʼi aku kʼi adojima ñw O̩jo̩ ade̩. Tak abu kʼi f ʼe-kide̩ ka i ka ñw u kakini, Tʼumi ubi.
Pita murida, oñ i li ako̩che̩ ku Jisus fe̩do̩ le̩ kʼi tʼo̩ ubi, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ño̩ chubiyʼagbe̩do̩-wñ e̩gba o̩je̩-o̩kpane̩ le̩, kʼi la ka ñw u kakini, Ondu, e̩ne̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki adʼuwe̩ ñw amone̩ mu?
Todule̩ abu ku Pita fʼe̩ne̩ le̩ li i ka ñwu Jisus kakini, Ondu, owñ-i fa?
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Iche̩wñ ki dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼi gugu gbogbo tak u wa, o̩wo̩-we̩ do̩? Uwe̩ ki tʼumi ubi.
Todule̩ o̩la le̩ kwodufu tef amo̩maye le̩ kakini, Ako̩che̩ kide̩ aku n; Jisus muda aka ñw u ka kʼi aku n in, chai, Iche̩wñ ki dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼi gugu gbogbo tak u wa, o̩wo̩-we̩ do̩?
Owñ le̩ chʼako̩che̩ kʼi agba e̩wñ-i ibenu, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ-i ko̩ rʼef o̩takada; a la ma ka kʼibenu kʼi agba chʼochochi.
E̩wñ omune̩ wewe ku Jisus che la ño̩ do̩mo̩ ge̩; iche̩wñ ku ma fʼe̩wñ le̩ ko̩ rʼef o̩takada okoka, eju-mi ile̩-i ma anʼuña bʼo̩takada ku ma ko̩ le̩ jo̩ n.
O̩la kʼu lo nyʼo̩takada o̩gbo̩gba le̩, O Teo̩filo̩s, chʼo̩la e̩wñ du ki Jisus chane̩ eche kpai ekʼone̩,
gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ ku ma mʼowñ gba tʼate̩, abu kʼi fʼuko̩ te̩ lef Afu Kiafo̩ ñw ame̩nukpuche̩ kʼi chi ma.
Abu kʼi fʼuwa le̩ li kpa i ño̩ dʼudeju o̩la-wñ te̩ ñwu ma go ef e̩wñ ijali wewe ki ma nʼiñwa n. Ma liʼu gbogbo o̩jo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, i la nʼe̩wñ ojane̩ O̩jo̩ aka.
Oñ abu kʼi de̩ kpenyʼuma, i ñwa ñwu ma ku ma we ekwo bi Je̩rusale̩m te̩, ku ma muda gugu anede e̩wñ kʼAta kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ gbo̩ ugbo-mi le̩, i ka.
Todu Jo̩n chʼone̩ baptism ef omiofo ochochi; ma muda ache me̩ baptism ef Afu Kiafo̩ ofeje-i.
Todule̩ abu ku ma wa jo̩ le̩ ma tʼowñ ene kakini, Ondu, iko-i oñ e̩ dʼo̩fe̩ ojane̩ Israe̩l dabi tʼe̩gu ñwu ma?
I ka ñwu ma kakini, Ema iko e̩wñ kpai ewo e̩wñ kʼAta du tef o̩da e-wñ ame̩ nʼe-le̩ n.
Me̩ muda agba ukpahiu e̩gba kʼAfu Kiafo̩ lewa bʼume̩ ma, tak ame̩ achʼame̩nibenu-mi Je̩rusale̩m kpai Judia kpai Samaria chaka kpai gbogbo wʼukade ane̩ ile̩.
Tak abu kʼi fʼo̩la-i ka, abu ku ma lʼagʼo, ma mʼu du le tʼate̩, oñ akpaʼka mʼowñ gba bʼuma eju te̩.
Oñ abu kʼi alo ku ma jʼakejurʼojale chii, me̩ go, aboke̩le̩ meji ku ma kʼe̩wñ efufu bʼo̩la ma la dago kpenyu ma;
oñ abo le̩ kakini, Aboke̩le̩ Galili, e̩wñ chi ku me̩ dago ago ojale-i? Jisus ku ma mugba bʼume̩ eju te̩ tef ojale-i, alu ku me̩ liʼu abu kʼi alo tef ojale, abe̩le̩ i awa ge̩.
E̩gba le̩ ma kwʼugbo uwo ku ma do̩ ko̩ e-O̩lif le̩ dabi wa Je̩rusale̩m. Uwo le̩ la me̩ru Je̩rusale̩m, ule̩-wñ chʼule̩ o̩jo̩ uñmiʼka.

Oñ e̩gba ku ma mʼu gudu wʼo̩mo̩ ma mute̩gu nyʼunyi ojale ugbo ku ma gugu le̩, owñ che Pita kpai Jo̩n kpai Jeme̩s kpai Anduru, Filip kpai Tomas, Barto̩lomiu kpai Matiu, Jeme̩s e-Alfio̩s kpai Saimo̩n Zelo̩tes, kpai Judas e-Jeme̩s.
Abo-i chaka nʼibe kate jʼakute̩ adua eche manyʼabobule̩ kpai Meri, iye Jisus, manyʼamo̩maye-wñ ge̩.
Tak iko o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i Pita kwodago alumeji amo̩maye le̩ (uwewe odu one̩ ku ma jʼugbo kate le̩ dab o̩gbo̩ me̩fa) Pita kakini,
Abo̩ke̩le̩, amo̩maye, i dukpe̩ kʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ki che̩ kpa, owñ chʼo̩la Judas kʼi dʼo̩na ña abo ku ma fi Jisus mu kʼAfu Kiafo̩ ka o̩gbo̩gba lef alu Defid le̩.
Todu ma fʼowñ kaluka tʼefu-wa, i laño̩ mʼukpe̩-wñ ef e̩wñ-eche-ñw one̩-i gba.
Todule̩ owñ le̩ fʼane̩ʼka ne̩ ñw o̩la-wñ kwef uro̩me̩ uji-wñ le̩; tak i fʼoji da nyʼane̩, efu-wñ ka kpa! oñ ifu-wñ chaka muke̩che̩ dufu.
Abo du ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m la gbʼo̩: todabe̩le̩ ma dʼodu ane̩ le̩ ko̩ Ake̩ldama alʼichi e-ma, owñ chʼAne̩ E̩bie̩.
Todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ ef o̩takada Eli Eko̩ DʼO̩jo̩ kakini,
Todule̩ i dukpe̩ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef aboke̩le̩ ku ma lebʼuwa e̩gba du abu ki Ondu Jisus lelo lewa efu-wa
akwʼe̩gba baptism e-Jo̩n gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ ku ma mʼowñ gba tʼate̩ bʼuwa te̩ le̩, kʼi mud e̩nibe̩nu udajikwane̩-wñ manyʼawa.
Taku ma kʼone̩ meji jo̩, owñ che Jose̩f ku ma ño̩ do̩ ko̩ Barsabas, e-ku ma hiodu Justus, kpai Matias.
Oñ ef adua ku ma che ma kakini, Uwe̩, Ondu, kʼe̩ chema ef e̩do̩ e̩ne̩ du, ef abo meji-i e̩ duña wa e̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ chi,
kʼi mʼuña e̩wñ-eche-ñw one̩ kpai uko̩lo̩ e̩nukpuche̩ e-ki Judas ñwa bʼo̩ te̩ kʼi le tʼuña e-wñ gba.
Taku ma kʼama meji ne, ma fʼanya ro̩, oñ anya fi Matias je̩. Taku ma fʼu kaluka tef ame̩nukpuche̩ me̩gwaka le̩.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ e̩kʼooje-wñ jo̩ o̩chaka-ma jʼugbo kate.
Oñ achigili iche̩ che kwef ojale dabe̩ne̩ kʼafu ki aju gbo gbo gbo ane̩ wa. I la ko̩ ef unyi ugbo ku ma gugu le̩ chaka.
Tak ukpalu ki chʼe̩kpana meji eji, dabe̩ne̩ kʼe-una, kwotejugede ñwu ma. I la kwogugu oji-ma okoke.
Oñ o̩chn-ka-ma che̩ko̩ ñw Afu Kiafo̩, taku ma chane̩ eko̩la ichi omune̩ omune̩ dabalu kʼAfu le̩ du ñwu ma ku ma ka dufu.
AmaJu iche̩ka la dodo Je̩rusale̩m ku ma chʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma himama O̩jo̩ ku ma kwʼugbo abo uche̩ichi du ku ma jʼo̩gane̩ ojale-i wa jo̩ le̩.
Oñ abu kʼiche̩-i wate̩ ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ le̩ wa jʼugbo kate. Ibe-ma la dajugu todabu kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ gbo̩ abu ku ma jʼako̩la ichi e-wñ onugo.
Awuwu la fu ma mu, oñ ma kwoyaye kakini, Me̩ go ta, abo ku ma jʼako̩la-i du chʼabo Galili jo̩ le̩ n?
Mak abile kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-wa agbo̩ ef ichi e-wa ku ma bi wa efu-wñ ke?
Abo Partia kpai Me̩dia kpai Ilam kpai abo ku ma dodo Me̩sopo̩temia, kpai Judia, kpai Kapadosia, Ponto̩s kpai Esia.
Tʼabo Frigia kpai Pamfilia, kpai Ijipti kpai ojane̩ Libia ugbo ki te̩ kado Sairini, kpai abononojo Rom ku ma gugu emi, tʼamaJu tʼabo ku ma tefu-ma,
abo Krit kpai abo Arabia, a agbo̩ abu ku ma jʼako̩la e̩wñ inaina e-O̩jo̩ alichi-wa.
Oñ awuwu fʼo̩chaka-ma mu, i la fitu ma tabale. Ma ka ñw omune̩ kakini, E-i chʼe̩wñ ta?
Ama abomune̩ ojoji dokanyi rʼuma oji, ma kakini, Iwain etito̩ kʼuma efu-i.

Pita muda hi dago manyʼamame̩gwaka le̩, i dʼomu-wñ dago oñ i gwʼo̩la jane̩ ñwu ma kakini, Aboke̩le̩ Judia kpai ame̩ ku me̩ dodo Je̩rusale̩m chaka, me̩ ki mʼe-kide̩, me̩ ki laño̩ netirʼe̩wñ kʼu naka-i.
Todu i chʼo̩te̩ mu abo̩-i alu kʼame̩ do̩ le̩ n, todu auwa e̩ke̩ta kʼo̩jo̩ ñwa de̩ ta.
E̩wñ-i muda chʼe-ku ma ka lefu Joe̩l akache̩ le̩ kakini,
O̩jo̩ kakini, Ab i la ade̩ adiko o̩jo̩ otitala le̩ de̩,
u lañʼadʼAfu-mi danyu amadu-mi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ oji
Tak u nakʼe̩wñ uno̩ jo̩ ojale ate̩-i,
Olu arida e̩chubi, ochu la arida e̩bie̩,
I la ade̩ kʼama ajadu e̩ne̩ du kʼi akwado̩ odu Ondu.

Aboke̩le̩, abo Israe̩l, me̩ nagbʼo̩la-i kakini, Jisus e̩ne̩ Nazare̩t, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼO̩jo̩ du ña me̩ pee lugbo uko̩lo̩ ukpahiu kpai e̩wñ uno̩ kpai ujiwe e-kʼO̩jo̩ che lef uwñ alumeji-me̩ le̩, alu kʼame̩ onugo ma;
owñ, ku ma mudu te̩ ñwu ma alu kʼuneku O̩jo̩ date̩, kpai alu kʼO̩jo̩ fuma tane̩, ame̩ nʼo̩wo̩ ame̩nugbite̩re̩ fʼu kaba mʼoli, me̩ la fʼu kpa ku:
O̩jo̩ mʼu du kwane̩, abu kʼi mʼiwo̩ e-uku tu, todabu ki ma nʼugbo du kʼe̩wñ le̩ ma neke gwo̩nyʼowñ n.
Todu Defid nʼo̩la-wñ aka kakini,
Lef e-le̩ e̩do̩-mi bo̩, oñ ukpalu-mi kwogwoguyo̩;
todabu kʼe̩ ma jʼatʼonugo-mi no̩ ñw o̩jegu n,
E̩ je̩ ñw mi fʼo̩na o̩na iñmi ma me̩;
Aboke̩le̩, amo̩maye-mi, u neke ka o̩la Defid, o̩ra-wa le̩ ñw me̩ pee, ka kʼi leku, ma ño̩ mʼu du ji, ojinoji-wñ la dʼugbo wa gbogbo tʼeñini-i.
Todule̩, abu kʼi chʼakache̩, kʼi la ma ka kʼO̩jo̩ fugo̩ ñw u ka kʼi adʼugbe̩ uta-wñʼka gugu oj ede-wñ:
abu kʼi fʼe-le̩ li tane̩, i fʼo̩la udajikwane̩ Kraisti ka kakini, Ma tʼo̩ no̩ tʼef o̩jegu n, o̩re̩la-wñ la li e̩che̩ n.
O̩jo̩ du Jisusi kide̩ dajikwane̩, o̩chaka-wa chʼame̩nibenu e-le̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ O̩jo̩ dʼowñ dago atate̩, kʼi laño̩ gba Afu Kiafo̩ ku ma katane̩ le̩ ugbo O̩jo̩ Ata, i fʼe̩wñ ku me̩ li ku me̩ la gbo̩ dafo-i.
Todu i che Defid te̩gu nyʼefojale n, owñ muda kakini,
gbogbo tak u kʼame̩nebi-we̩ chʼuke̩re̩no e̩re̩-we̩.
Todule̩ abo unyi Israe̩l du ki ma o̩kpaka-wñ kakini, O̩jo̩ mu Jisus kʼame̩ du kamoli le̩ du che Ondu kpai Kraist, ejeji-wñ.
Oñ abu ku ma gbo i gwunyʼuma e̩do̩, taku ma ka ñw Pita kpʼame̩nukpuche̩ kibo̩ kakini, Aboke̩le̩, amo̩maye-wa, abʼa ache?
Oñ Pita ka ñw ma kakini, Me̩ ribeda, kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki nache baptism ef odu Jisusi Kraisti, ku ma tʼadure-me̩ no̩ taku me̩ agbʼAfu Kiafo̩ ele.
Todu ame̩ ma kʼo̩la le̩ tane̩ ñwu, kpai amo̩ma-me̩ kpai abo du ku ma jʼo̩najiji, owñ chʼaluka one̩ du kʼOndu O̩jo̩-wa ado̩wʼugbo-wñ.
I ño̩ nʼo̩la omune̩ wewe gbʼibenu nyo̩nyo̩, i laño̩ kute̩ ma kakini, Me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ jadu bʼo̩gba e̩go̩-i te̩.
Abe̩le̩ abo ku ma yo̩ ñw o̩la-wñ fu baptism che: oñ onugo one̩ ku ma du tʼo̩ o̩jo̩ le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gwe̩lu.
Oñ ma jʼakute̩ uko̩-o̩la ame̩nukpuche̩ kpai uta-ma eta kpai akala ebu kpai adua eche.
Oñ ailo lewa fʼonugo e̩ne̩ du mu: uno̩ kpai ujiwe wewe la wache lef ame̩nukpuche.
Oñ amake̩do̩no chaka jʼugbo kate, e̩wñ du ku ma la ne̩ mud e-o̩de̩de̩-ma;
taku ma mʼane̩-ma kpai idu-ma ko ta, oñ ma fʼu kpe̩rʼo̩chaka amone̩, alu kʼeku-wñ aku e̩ne̩ du.
O̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa ma kute̩ ibe kate ene̩ ajʼef unyi O̩jo̩ kpai akala ebu unyi unyi, ma nʼuje̩wñ-ma aje̩ ef egwoguyo̩ kpai e̩do̩ foo,
ma jʼañwulo̩ O̩jo̩, o̩gbo̩ amone̩ du la li uma eju. Oñ Ondu na kʼabo kʼi nʼajadu le̩ manyʼuma o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa.
Oñ Pita kpai Jo̩n jʼate̩gu nyʼunyi O̩jo̩ e̩gba auwa adua, owñ chʼauwa e̩ke̩la.
Oñ ma nʼe̩ne̩ʼka kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩ kwefu wʼile̩ alale, ku ma dʼu dachi unyi O̩jo̩ ugbo alugbo̩na ku ma do̩ kʼAlifia o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa kʼi bi abo ku ma nyʼef unyi O̩jo̩ ebi ejumomi.
Abu kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ li ki Pita kpai Jo̩n ache ku ma nyʼef unyi O̩jo̩, i bi e̩wñ ejumomi.
Oñ Pita kejurʼu manyu Jo̩n, i kakini, Go wa.
I la dibete̩ ma abu kʼi neju ka kʼi agba e̩wñʼka ugbo ma.
Ama Pita kakini, I chʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia i de̩ ñwu mi n; ama e̩wñ kʼu ne̩ e-le̩ nadu ñw e̩. Ef odu Jisus Kraisti, e̩ne̩ Nazare̩t le̩, lule̩ ke.
Tak abu kʼi gwo̩nyu wñ o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ i mʼu du kwane̩: oñ e̩re̩re̩ le̩, e̩re̩-wñ kpai iko e̩re̩-wñ fʼukpahiu ne̩.
Tak i muro̩ dago, oñ i nalule̩; tak owñ kpaʼama mugudu tef unyi O̩jo̩, i nʼule̩ ale, i naroko, i nañwulo̩ O̩jo̩.
Amone̩ le̩ du la li owñ abu kʼi alule̩ kʼi añwulo̩ O̩jo̩.
Oñ ma mejumʼowñ, kʼowñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki te̩tagugu alaku Alifia e-unyi O̩jo̩ le̩ tod e̩wñ ejumomi; tak e̩gahi kpʼawuwu fʼuma mu noj e̩wñ ki wa che o̩la-wñ.
Oñ abu kʼi nagwo̩nyu Pita kpai Jo̩n, amone̩ le̩ chaka fule nyʼugbo ma ef atakpa ku ma do̩ kʼe-So̩lo̩mo̩n le̩, e̩gahi fʼuma mu tabale.

Oñ abu ki Pita li i dʼohi ñw amone̩ le̩ kakini, Aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l, e̩wñ chi ku me̩ yaye e̩wñ-i? e̩wñ chi ku me̩ la mʼeju-me̩ korʼawa dabe̩ne̩ ki chʼukpahiu e-wa, abe̩k e̩do̩ kʼawa kparʼO̩jo̩ oñ a ne̩ che kʼowñ alule̩-i?
O̩jo̩ Ebraham kpai Aise̩k kpai Jeko̩b, O̩jo̩ e-amata-wa le̩, mʼojima du ñw imo̩to̩-wñ Jisus kʼame̩ mʼu du ñw ma mu, kʼame̩ laño̩ fʼaire̩-wñ re̩ o̩gba Pailat abu kʼi fuñwa ka kʼi atʼowñ no̩ tane̩.
Ame̩ muda fʼaire̩ E̩ne̩ Kiafo̩ kpʼE̩no̩kpakpa le̩ re̩, oñ me̩ bi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ki chʼakpone̩ ku ma du chʼume̩ ele.
Me̩ la fʼUchane̩ e-iñmi kpa; owñ le̩ O̩jo̩ mʼu du kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku; awa la chʼame̩-nibenu e-le̩.
Oñ noj e̩do̩ ekonʼodu-wñ, odu-wñ le̩ mʼugbiti du ñw e̩ne̩ ku me̩ li ku me̩ ño̩ ma-i. E̩do̩ eko̩no ki do̩mo̩ lef owñ le̩ la du ñw e̩ne̩-i ki mufu kpa eju-me̩ chaka.
Amo̩maye-mi, u la chema fai ka kʼugbo ema kʼame̩ ma ma n, oñ me̩ che le̩, abe̩le̩ amagboji-me̩ ño̩ che duu.
Ama e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ lef alu amakache̩ du ka ki Kraisti-wñ a li uwa-wñ, abe̩le i la je̩ ñw u che̩.
Todule̩ me̩ naribeda, me̩ ki la rida to̩ kʼama ki fʼadure-me̩ kpalu, todu kʼiko iko o̩la eruko ki kwʼo̩gba Ondu wa:
kʼi laño̩ fi Kraisti kʼi dute̩ ñw me̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩ kpuche̩ wa, owñ che Jisus:
e-kʼefojale agbʼo̩ tila gbogbo wʼiko iko ku ma kʼe̩wñ du dabi jʼiko iko, owñ chʼe-kʼO̩jo̩ kʼo̩la-wñ lef alu amakache̩-wñ kiafo̩ kwʼigbegbele.
Ochochi, Mose̩s kakini, Ondu O̩jo̩ adʼakache̩ kʼi dab omi kwane̩ kwef amo̩maye-me̩ ñwu me̩; owñ le̩ me̩ anetiru ugbo e̩wñ du ki che kʼi ako̩la ñwu me̩.
I la ade̩ ka kʼonugo one̩ du ki ma anetiru akache̩ kide̩ n, e̩ne̩ le̩ achile̩che̩ bʼef amone̩-i te̩.
Ochochi, amakache̩ du akwe̩gba Samiue̩l kpai abo ku ma ro̩nʼo, aluka one̩ ki ko̩la du laño̩ nʼo̩la adiko o̩jo̩ kide̩ aka.
Ame̩ chʼamo̩ma amakache̩ kpai alo kʼO̩jo̩ kpe̩ kpai amata-me̩ kʼi ka ñw Ebraham kakini, Oñ ef ugbe̩-we̩ o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abʼile̩ du ali e̩nyo̩.
Abu kʼO̩jo̩ mʼimo̩to̩-wñ le̩ du daji kwane̩ i fʼowñ kpuche̩ rʼume̩ ejodudu kʼi de̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩ ef erida kʼi arʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ da bʼe̩wñ bibi-me̩ te̩.
Oñ abu ku ma jʼako̩la ñw amone̩, amatama kpai agboji amadide unyi O̩jo̩ kpai amaSadiusi lewa bano ma,
i wo̩ ma todu ku ma ko̩ amone̩ e̩wñ, ku ma laño̩ dʼo̩la udajikwane̩ efu Jisusi kwef abo ki ku kpogo.
Taku ma dʼo̩wo̩ do ma oñ ma ko ma nyʼide gbogbo nyʼo̩na: todu ane̩ lo̩ me̩.
Amone̩ wewe kuma gbʼo̩la le̩ la ke̩do̩no: oñ aluka aboke̩le̩-ma lewa i dab icham me̩fa nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩.
I lewa, o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, ame̩nuto̩gba-ma kpʼabogijo kpʼamako̩takada wa jʼugbo kate Je̩rusale̩m;
kpʼAnas, kʼi chʼagboji amatama, kpai Kayafas kpai Jo̩n kpʼAle̩ksanda kpʼe̩ne̩ du ki chʼefu atama ogijo le̩.
Oñ abu ku ma ko ma dago alumeji ma chane̩ egwili kakini, Ef ukpahiu e̩wñ, abe̩k ef odu e̩ne̩ oñ me̩ che e̩wñ-i?
E̩gbale̩ Pita kʼi kpe̩ko̩ ñw Afu Kiafo̩ ka ñw ma kakini, Ame̩, ame̩nuto̩gba amone̩ kpʼabogijo,
iche̩wñ kʼame̩ jʼagwili wa eñini-i tod uko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩ ki che o̩la e̩ne̩gbo-i, ef e̩wñ ki che ku ma fʼowñ jadu;
o̩chaka-me̩ kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka ki ma kakini, Ef odu Jisusi Kraisti e̩ne̩ Nazare̩t kʼame̩ mʼu du kamoli, kʼO̩jo̩ la mʼu du kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, ef owñ le̩ oñ e̩ne̩-i dago o̩gba-me̩ o̩lafia-i.
Owñ le̩ chʼokuta kʼame̩ amakunyi do̩rʼibe̩te̩ kʼi la mud ukpoji alo.
I la nʼe̩nomune̩ kʼujadu dʼef uwñ n; todu i nʼodu omune̩ ojoji du o̩gane̩ ojale-i ku ma dʼu te̩ ef amone̩ ki dʼugbo ku ma ajadu wa ef uwñ n.
Oñ abu ku ma li eju-e̩gbo Pita kpai Jo̩n, ku ma laño̩ ma ka kʼabo le̩ mʼo̩takada n kʼamo̩talaka ma che, ma kwoyaye; ma la mejuma ma ka kʼama te̩tedʼugbo Jisus.
Oñ abu ku ma li e̩ne̩ ku ma fʼo̩ga-wñ che le̩ kʼi dago kpʼama, i nʼugbo du ku ma ako̩la nyʼu n.
Ama abu ku ma je̩ ñw ma kwʼef ujeju abo̩hiala le̩ tʼo̩do̩da, oñ ma kwolo̩la kpʼomune̩,
kakini, E̩wñ a ache abo-i taa? todu Amone̩ ma ka kʼujiwe wache lʼef uma le̩, i la kwotejugede ñw abo du ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m; a la neke re̩ n.
Ama todu kʼi we ekpatuka nyo̩gba tule ef amone̩-i, efo̩ko̩ a afo̩ko̩ ma ku ma we eko̩la ef odu-i ñw e̩ne̩ du ate̩to̩gba-i.
Taku ma fʼuma do̩ wa, ma ka ñw ma ku ma we eka kpʼekʼone̩ ef odu Jisusi-i kilikili.
Pita kpai Jo̩n muda dohi ñw ma kakini, Abe̩k i chʼo̩kpakpa eju O̩jo̩ kʼa netirʼame̩ tʼO̩jo̩ le, me̩ go!
todu e̩wñ kʼa li kpʼe̩wñ kʼa gbo̩ a neke we eka n.
Oñ abu ku ma ño̩ fo̩ko̩ ma, ma tʼuma no̩, abu ku ma ma li uña ebʼudu ñw ma n, todu amone̩ le̩; todu amone̩ du dojima ñw O̩jo̩ noj e̩wñ ki wache le̩.
Todu o̩do̩ e̩ne̩ kʼujiwe o̩ga eche kpa kide̩ wa che o̩la-wñ tʼo̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji le.
Abu ku ma la tʼuma no̩ ma lewa ugbo abo e-ma, oñ ma mʼe-du kʼamagboji amatama kpai abogijo ka duka ñwu ma.
Oñ abu ku ma gbo̩ ibe-ma mud okate, ma fʼomu-ma ka ñw O̩jo̩, ma kakini, Ondu Onu, uwe̩ kʼe̩ che efojale kpai ane̩-ile̩ kpai ohimini kpai e̩wñ du ki jʼef uwñ:
kʼe̩ ka lef Afu Kiafo̩ lef alu Defid, imo̩to̩-we̩ ata-wa le̩, kakini,
Amonu ane̩-ile̩ kwotala jo̩,
Todu ochochi, He̩ro̩d kpai Po̩ntius Pailat manyʼabo uche̩ichi kpai abo Israe̩l wajo̩ ef ewo kide̩-i ako bʼimo̩to̩-we̩ kiafo̩ Jisus kʼe̩ bʼekpo tʼo̩ oji le,
ku ma che e̩wñ du kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ kpai uneku-we̩ date̩ tane̩ kʼi wache.
Fai ge̩, Ondu, e̩ nago efo̩ko̩ ku ma jʼafo̩ko̩-i, kʼe̩ du ñw amadu-we̩ ku ma nʼeju e̩gbo ogbolo adʼo̩la-we̩ ka,
abu kʼe̩ nʼo̩wo̩-we̩ dala kʼe̩ chʼo̩ga kpa; kʼujiwe kpai uno̩ ki wa che lef odu Jisus, imo̩to̩-we̩ kiafo̩.
Tak abu ma fʼo̩ko̩-ma gba bʼo̩, uña ugbo ku ma wa jʼef uwñ le̩ kwomiejo; tak Afu Kiafo̩ che̩kʼef uma chaka, oñ ma nʼeju e̩gbo akʼo̩lO̩jo̩.
Oñ e̩do̩ ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ ku ma ke̩do̩no le̩ kpʼonugo-ma chʼoka; i la nʼe̩ne̩ kate kʼi ka kʼe̩wñ kʼi ne̩ chʼe-wñ o̩to̩to̩la-wñ n; e̩wñ du la chʼe-ma de̩de̩.
Oñ ame̩nukpuche̩ nʼukpahiu nana agbʼudajikwane̩ Ondu Jisus ibenu; ufe̩de̩nyo̩ liie la bʼo̩chaka-ma ma.
Todu e̩ne̩ du ki Iʼubie̩ la dʼef uma n: todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi nʼane̩ abe̩k unyi mʼu ko ta, oñ i mʼo̩ko̩ e̩wñ du kʼi ta le̩ ko wa,
i la mʼu ko jʼe̩re̩ ame̩nukpuche̩, oñ ma kpe̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ alu kʼeku e̩wñ akwʼu.
Oñ Jose̩f, e̩ne̩ Lifai ku ma bi Saipro̩s, kʼame̩nukpuche̩ hiodu ko Barnabas (ku ma jomudechi ka kʼO̩ma Ugbe̩do̩)
abu kʼi chenʼane̩ uche̩ i mʼu du ta, oñ i mʼo̩ko̩-wñ ko wa jʼane̩ e̩re̩ ame̩nukpuche̩.
Ama e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Ananaius, manyu Safaira o̩ya-wñ, mʼane̩ʼka du ta,
tak i mʼo̩ko̩-wñ chi ejubi, o̩ya-wñ laño̩ chema du, oñ i mʼukpe̩ʼka ko wa jʼane̩ e̩re̩ ame̩nukpuche̩.
Oñ Pita kakini, Ananaius, e̩wñ chi ki Se̩tan ko nyʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ e̩ko̩, kʼe̩ rʼAfu Kiafo̩ olemi? kʼe̩ laño̩ mʼo̩ko̩ le̩ chi ejubi?
E̩gba kʼe̩ ma ta ta n, i chʼuwe̩ ne̩ n? tak abu kʼe̩ ta, ichʼuwe̩ nʼo̩da-wñ n? Abile kʼe̩ ñwa e̩wñ kide̩ ef e̩do̩-we̩? I chʼamone̩ oñ e̩ rʼo̩ emi-i n, chai O̩jo̩.
Oñ abu kʼAnanaius gbʼo̩la-i, i lewane̩, i mʼiñmi da. Ailo lile la lewa bʼabo du ku ma gbo̩ le̩ ma.
Tak abokolobia kwane̩ mʼowñ du tʼef o̩kpe̩, oñ ma mʼu du kwef unyi naji.
I lewa agbagba-wñ la dab auwa me̩ta tak o̩ya-wñ ki ma ma e̩wñ ki wa che-i n mugudu wʼo̩mo̩.
Oñ Pita mʼomu-wñ da ka ñw u kakini, E̩ ka ñwu mi, i chʼo̩ko̩ abe̩i oñ me̩ dʼane̩ le̩ ta n? Oñ i kakini, li, onu ki che de̩.
Taki Pita ka ñw u kakini, Abile kʼame̩ fʼalu-me̩ jo̩ ku me̩ jʼAfu Ondu ma? Go, e̩re̩ abo ku ma dʼoku o̩ko̩-we̩ ji jʼalugbana-i, ma la adʼuwe̩ dufu ge̩.
Oñ ababale̩ i lewane̩ e̩re̩-wñ, i ño̩ mʼiñmi da: abokolobia le̩ mugudu wa oñ ma fʼowñ li abu kʼi leku te̩. Taku ma mʼowñ du dufu oñ ma mʼu du le naji ugbo o̩ko̩-wñ.
Tak ailo lile wa fʼo̩gbo̩ ujeju abudo̩ Ondu mu, kpʼabo du ku ma gbo̩ e̩wñ le̩.
Oñ e̩wñ ujiwe kpʼuno̩ wewe wa che ef amone̩ lʼo̩wo̩ ame̩nukpuche̩ le̩. O̩chaka-ma la nʼibeʼkate ajʼef atakpa So̩lo̩mo̩n.
I muda chʼe-abo ki bo̩ e̩ne̩ du gbe̩do̩ amanyʼuma n: ama amone̩ le̩ bute̩ ma nana.
Ugwe̩ko̩ aboke̩le̩ kpʼabobule̩ ku ma ke̩do̩no ño̩ kwotʼo̩ manyu ñw Ondu tule:
todabe̩le̩ ma laño̩ mʼabo ku ma chʼo̩ga ko wa jʼej o̩na, ma la ko ma jʼo̩j ate̩ kpʼakpata tode̩gba ki Pita lale, i chaka chʼojiji-wñ ki danʼiche̩ka.
Oñ ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ ewo ewo ki le Je̩rusale̩m daka ño̩ wa jo̩. Ma nʼame̩no̩ga wa kpʼabo kʼamafu ki ma de̩ hiolo n ke̩che̩ bʼuma ma; ma la fʼo̩ga-ma che kpa chaka.
Ama agboji amatama iko le̩ kwane̩ kpʼabo ku ma manyʼowñ o̩la (ma chʼabo uche̩ ki date̩ ku ma do̩ ma ko̩ amaSadiusi) ulie̩na che̩kʼef uma.
Oñ ma dʼo̩wo̩ dʼame̩nukpuche̩ le̩, ma la ko ma jʼef unyi uga e-o̩ja.
Onuche̩ Ondu muda mʼo̩na unyi uga le̩ bi odu oñ i mʼuma ko dufu, i kakini,
Me̩ nyʼadago ef unyi O̩jo̩ ku me̩ kʼo̩la e-Iñmi kide̩ chaka ñw amone̩ le̩.
Oñ abu ku ma gbo̩-i ma mugudu tef unyi O̩jo̩ abu kʼo̩jo̩ añwa bulubulu, taku ma kwokamone̩ e̩wñ.
Ama abimo̩to̩ ku ma wa le̩ la li ma ef unyi uga n: oñ ma mojida wa, akakini,
A li alu kʼo̩na unyi uga che̩re kpaka, amadide la dago jʼalugbana-wñ; ama abu kʼa mubi ali e̩ne̩ du ejefu o̩mo̩ n.
Oñ e̩gba kʼagboji amadide unyi O̩jo̩ kpʼamagboji amatama gbʼo̩la kide̩ i fitu ma tabale, ab e̩wñ le̩ ade̩ ejo̩gba taa?
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka lewa ka ñw ma kakini, Me̩ go, aboke̩le̩ ku me̩ ko nyʼunyi uga le̩ dago jo̩ ef unyi O̩jo̩ ako̩ amone̩ e̩wñ.
E̩gbale̩ agboji amadide le̩ manyʼabimo̩to̩ le̩ namʼuma ko wa, ma muda che ma kpukpulu n, todu ma railo amone̩ tode̩gba ku ma arʼokuta do ma.
Oñ abu ku ma mʼuma ko wa ma ko ma dago jʼo̩gba abo̩hiala. Tak agboji amatama tʼuma ene,
kakini, I cheka a ka ñw me̩ ku me̩ we ekʼone̩ ef odu kide̩ n? Me̩ la go, me̩ je̩ ñw Je̩rusale̩m che̩ko̩ ñw uko̩ o̩la-me̩, me̩ la neku edʼe̩bie̩ e̩ne̩ kide̩ nʼuwa oji.
Ama Pita kpʼame̩nukpuche̩ dohi kakini, O̩jo̩ oñ i dukpe̩ ku ma agbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩ tʼe-amone̩ le tila.
O̩jo̩ e-amata-wa mu Jisus du kwane̩, owñ ku me̩ du kpa abu ku me̩ dʼu lo̩ko̩li oj oli le̩.
O̩jo̩ nʼo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ mʼowñ le̩ dudago kʼi mud Uchane̩ kpʼE̩najadu, kʼi dʼibe enda kpʼadure eto̩no̩ ñw abo Israe̩l.
Awa la chʼame̩mbenu e̩wñ kide̩: kpʼAfu Kiafo̩ e-kʼO̩jo̩ mudu ñw abo ku ma gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩.
Oñ abu ku ma gbo̩ i wo̩ ma, taku ma neku eko ma kpa.
Ama e̩ne̩ Farisiʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Gamelie̩l kwane̩ ef abo̩hiala, e̩ne̩ ki mʼoli o̩lo̩da i che, i chenʼojima ugbo amone̩ le̩ chaka, oñ i je̩ ñw ma kʼabo le̩ nyʼo̩doda ku ma jo̩ pe̩.
Tak i ka ñw ma kakini, Ame̩, aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l, me̩ mʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩ ugbo abo-i, e̩wñ ku me̩ che ku me̩ che ma.

Todu o̩gba tak o̩jo̩ eñini ñwa Teudas kwane̩, i ka kʼowñ onugo chʼe̩ne̩ʼka; oñ aboke̩le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ ulo̩ko̩ kwolamʼowñ; owñ le̩ ma mʼu du kpa; taku ma fʼo̩chaka one̩ du kʼi gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩ kpatuka, oñ i mud ofofo.

Anubi e̩ne̩ le̩ ge̩, Judas, abo Galili kwane̩ adiko ku ma gbʼunyi aluka le̩, oñ i fʼamone̩ iche̩ka fa rʼo̩la-wñ ubi: owñ le̩ ño̩ lenyo̩ ge̩; tak o̩chaka amone̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ du ki gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩, mukpatuka rʼo̩do̩da.
Oñ fai naka ñw me̩ kakini, Me̩ te̩ nyʼubi bʼabo-i te̩, me̩ ki la tʼuma no̩. Todu iche̩wñ kʼuneku-i abe̩k uko̩lo̩-i kwʼugbo amone̩, mak i agulo:
i muda che̩wñ kʼi kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ ame̩ aneke gʼuma lo̩ n. Tode̩gba ku ma ali ka kʼO̩jo̩ me̩ jʼukogu bʼo̩ le̩.
Ma la gbʼe-wñ le̩ gbo̩. Tak abu ku ma fʼame̩nukpuche̩ do̩ wa, ma fʼuma gwo, oñ ma ka ñw ma ku ma we eko̩la ef odu Jisus. Taku ma tʼuma no̩ jane̩.
Todule̩ ma le dufu bʼeju abo̩hiala le̩ te̩, ma jʼayo̩ todabu ku ma fʼuma li ka ku ma bʼukata echi tod odu le̩ jo̩.
Oñ o̩jo̩ du, ef unyi O̩jo̩ kpʼunyi unyi ma we ekʼone̩ n, kpʼUche̩nyo̩ eje̩ rʼone̩ ka ku Jisus che Kraist n.
Oñ iko le̩, abu kʼamako̩che̩ awewe nyo̩gba, amaJu ku ma kʼichi Grik chane̩ ejeñmini nyʼabo Hibru o̩la todabu ku ma dʼeju-ma le gu abo-ma du ef e̩wñ ku ma che ñw amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa.
Oñ amame̩gweji le̩ fʼugwe̩ko̩ amako̩che̩ do̩ wʼugbo ma, ma kakini, I nyo̩ kʼawa tʼo̩lO̩jo̩ no̩ kʼawa jʼakpʼuje̩wñ n.
Todule̩ amo̩maye, me̩ na chi aboke̩le̩ mebie efu-me̩ e-kʼamone̩ agba ma ibenu ka kʼAfu la che̩ko̩ efu-ma kpai ofili, kʼa ko ma dago kʼe̩wñ eku-i eche ki jʼef o̩wo̩ e-ma.
Awa muda akute̩ adua kpai e̩wñ o̩lO̩jo̩ eche.

O̩la le̩ la chenyo̩ ugwe̩ko amone̩ le̩ du eju. Taku ma fi Stifan ki chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ki che̩ko̩ ñw e̩do̩ ekono kpai Afu Kiafo̩ kpai Filip kpai Proko̩rus kpai Nikano̩r kpai Timo̩n kpai Parmenas kpai Nikalaus kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ Antio̩k ki tʼefu-ma chi.
Ma mʼabo le̩ ko dago jʼo̩gba ame̩nukpuche̩. Tak abu kʼama fʼadua che ma kʼo̩wo̩ no ma.
Tak o̩lO̩jo̩ nyʼo̩gba tule, oñ aluka amako̩che̩ ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m ño̩ wewe nyo̩gba e̩kute̩, o̩wo̩ amatama otemeje laño̩ detitʼo̩la e̩do̩ ekono ge̩.
Stifan, ki che̩ko̩ ñw ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ukpahiu, la chʼe̩wñ uno̩ kpai ujiwe inaina ef amone̩.
Ama abo iche̩ka ef unyi ujeju ku ma do̩ kʼAbo Libe̩rta-ini kpʼabo Sairini kpʼabo Ale̩kisandria kpʼabo ku ma kwo Silisia kpai Esia kwane̩ ku ma bo̩ Stifan jiñwa.
Ma la gbiti ku ma bʼibe kpai afu kʼi ne̩ ko̩la jo̩ n.
Taku ma kwoko̩nyʼaboke̩le̩ʼka efu ku ma ka kakini, A gbo̩ abu kʼi ka o̩la akpa Mose̩s kpai O̩jo̩ bie̩.
Taku ma fʼamone̩ dogo kpʼabogijo kpʼamako̩takada, oñ ma wa banʼo, ma fʼowñ mu ma la mʼu du wʼugbo abo̩hiala,
ma laño̩ mʼame̩nibenu olemi ko dago. Ama le̩ kakini, E̩ne̩-i awe edʼalu kpʼuña kiafo̩ kpai o̩lo̩da bie̩ n:
todu a gbo̩ abu kʼi kakini, Jisus abo Nazare̩t le̩ agu ugbo kide̩ lo̩, kʼi la año̩ mʼe̩wñ ogu ki Mose̩s ko ñw a kpailo̩.
Tak abu ku ma jʼakejurʼu chii e̩ne̩ du ki gugu ef abo̩hiala o̩mo̩ li eju-wñ kʼi dabe̩ne̩ kʼeju onuche̩ O̩jo̩.
Oñ agboji amatama kakini, Abe̩le̩ e̩wñ-i de̩?
Oñ i kakini, Amo̩-maye aboke̩le̩ kpʼamata-mi, me̩ neti ta. O̩jo̩ e-ojima kwotejugede ñw ata-wa Ebraham e̩gba kʼi de̩ Me̩so̩potemia, o̩gba tak i dodo Haran.
I la ka ñw u kakini, E̩ kwʼoj ane̩-we̩ kpai ugbo amefu-we̩ dufu, kʼe̩ lewa ane̩ ugbo kʼu naduñʼuwe̩.
Tak i kwʼoj ane̩ amaKaldia dufu, oñ i dodo Haran. Tak abu kʼata-wñ leku i kwʼo̩mo̩ i mʼowñ ño̩ tʼane̩ ugbo kʼame̩ dodo abajo̩-i.
I la dʼukpe̩ du ef uwñ ñw owñ kʼi aje̩ n, dagba i chʼadabe̩re̩ʼka i du ñw u n. I la katane̩ ñw u ka kʼi adʼu ñw u kʼi ne̩ kpai ugbe̩-wñ ki ro̩nʼowñ. I la nʼo̩ma ta n.
Abe̩le̩ O̩jo̩ la ka kʼugbe̩-wñ achʼilo̩wa oj ane̩ omune̩ ojoji, tak abo le̩ adʼu chʼadu, ma la achʼo o̩lachi o̩do̩ ulo̩ko̩.
Tak omi akajo̩ abo uche̩ichi e-ku ma chʼadu-wñ le̩, abu kʼO̩jo̩ ka de̩. Tak anubi e-le̩ ma akwo dufu wa ku ma che mi ef uña kide̩.
Tak i fʼalo e̩pi eda kpe̩ kpʼowñ. Oñ abe̩le̩ i fʼAise̩k bi i la mʼe̩pi-wñ da o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩-wñ. Aise̩k la bi Jeko̩b. Taku Jeko̩b bi ame̩te̩ me̩gweji le̩.
Tak abu kʼame̩te̩ le̩ lie̩na Jose̩f ma mʼu du ta nyʼIjipti. O̩jo̩ la dʼugbo-wñ.
Oñ i mʼowñ gba kwef o̩bata-wñ du. Tak i mʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼibe du ñw u eju Fero onu Ijipti. Owñ le̩ mʼowñ du dago kʼi chʼuto̩gba ane̩ Ijipti kpʼo̩gbo̩ abunyi-wñ du.
Ukpo̩ta la lewa bʼo̩gbo̩ ane̩ Ijipti du kpai Kenan ma, kpʼo̩bata inaina. Tak amata-wa ño̩ li e̩wñ ku ma du mʼelu ne̩ n.
Abu ku Jeko̩b la gbo̩ kʼe̩wñ eje̩ dʼIjipti, i fʼamata-wa kpe̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ e̩gba ejodudu le̩.
Tak onu ekeji-wñ ma je̩ ñw amo̩maye-wñ ma Jose̩f. Abe̩le̩ o̩lo̩pu Jose̩f lewa kwotejugede ñw Fero.
Oñ Jose̩f fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼadʼata-wñ Jeko̩b kpʼamefu-wñ chaka wa. Onugo one̩-ma chʼone̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩gwe̩lu.
Taki Jeko̩b mugwo̩ru nyʼIjipti, oñ i leku, owñ kpʼamata-wa le̩.
Taku ma mʼuma ko kwʼo̩mo̩ nyi Saike̩m, oñ ma ko ma jʼef oji kʼEbraham nʼo̩ko̩ ajifa la o̩wo̩ amo̩ma Emo̩r, abo Saike̩m le̩.
Ama abu kʼiko ukatane̩ e-kʼO̩jo̩ gbalu ñw Ebraham le̩ ame̩rʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ nawewe nyʼo̩gba, oñ ma chane̩ ewewe otemeje ojane̩ Ijipti.
Gbogbo tak onu Ijiptiʼka kwane̩ kʼi ma ma Jose̩f in.
Owñ le̩ chʼugbeju nyʼabo̩lo̩pu-wa, i chʼamata-wa e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼama ki kʼamo̩me̩kpa-ma jo̩ ku ma ki we enʼiñmi.
Iko e-le̩ ma bi Mose̩s. I chʼalifia eju O̩jo̩. Ma la nʼe̩ ef unyi ata-wñ ochu me̩ta.
Oñ abu ku ma mʼowñ du tʼo̩lo̩fe̩ o̩ma Fero onobule̩ mʼowñ du, tak i nʼe̩ chʼo̩ma-wñ onugo.
Oñ ma ko̩ Mose̩s e̩wñ ibe e-abo Ijipti chaka. I la nʼukpahiu ef o̩la kpʼuko̩lo̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼo̩do̩-wñ jo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji, e̩do̩-wñ ka ñw u kʼi nyʼafejudʼamo̩maye-wñ amo̩ma Israe̩l le̩.
Tak ab i li ka ku ma achʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef uma uji i mʼe̩ne̩ le̩ gba ubi-wñ, oñ i fʼache̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma achʼo o̩bata le̩ na. I fʼe̩ne̩ Ijipti le̩ kpa.
I la nʼibe ka ki ane̩rʼamo̩maye-wñ eju ka kʼO̩jo̩ adʼujadu ñw ma lef o̩wo̩-wñ. I la ne̩rʼuma eju n.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ i ño̩ dufu ugbo ma ahu ku ma jʼajuja oñ i chane̩ eba ma uja. I kakini, Aboke̩le̩, ame̩ chʼo̩maye, e̩wñ chi ku me̩ chʼomune̩ o̩gu-muta-i?
Ama e̩ne̩ ki achʼekeji-wñ ogumuta le̩ fʼowñ ke̩che̩ wʼubi, i kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼuwe̩ dago kʼe̩ chʼagboji kpʼakajo̩-wa?
I dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ kpa mi alu kʼe̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ Ijipti o̩nale̩?
Ef o̩la kide̩ oñ Mose̩s ra, tak i mud ilowa ane̩ Midian. O̩mo̩ i bi amo̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ meji.
Tak abu kʼodo̩ o̩gbo̩ meji muda onuche̩ Onduʼka kwo dufu ñw u go ef una oli ye̩e̩le̩ aje̩tachi uwo Sainai le̩.
Abu ku Mose̩s la liʼu, i yaye e̩wñ igo kʼi li. Oñ abu kʼi me̩rʼu kʼi agʼo, omuko̩la Ondu ka kakini,
Omi chʼO̩jo̩ amata-we̩, O̩jo̩ Ebraham kpʼe-Aise̩k kpʼe-Jeko̩b. Abu kʼo̩la Mose̩s chane̩ ega i nʼe̩do̩ kʼi akpibe e̩wñ ki che n.
Oñ Ondu ka ñw u kakini, Mʼo̩patachi e̩re̩-we̩ gwo̩, todu ugbo kʼe̩ dago le̩ chʼane̩ kiafo̩.
Eli omi li e̩bie̩ne̩ ku ma ache abo-mi ku ma jʼIjipti. U laño̩ gbo̩ ifi-ma ku ma fi. Egwo̩ni u la gwo̩ru kʼu ko ma dufu-i. E̩ ki ño̩ lewa fai, nakpʼuwe̩ nyʼIjipti.
Mose̩s kide̩-i e-ku ma ko̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ dʼuwe̩ dago kʼe̩ chʼagboji kpʼakajo̩? Owñ le̩ O̩jo̩ kpe̩ wa kʼi chʼagboji kpʼagbone̩tane̩, manyʼo̩wo̩ onuche̩ kʼi dufu ñw u go ef oli ye̩e̩le̩ le̩.
Owñ le̩ ne̩ ma dufu abu kʼi fʼuno̩ kpʼe̩wñ ujiwe che Ijipti kpʼef Ohimini Ekpikpa kpʼef aje̩tachi o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji le̩.
Owñ le̩ che Mose̩s ki ka ñw amo̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Israe̩l kakini, O̩jo̩ adʼakache̩ kʼi dab omi kwef amo̩maye-me̩ dago ñw me̩.
Owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼef ujeju abudo̩ ef aje̩tachi kpʼonuche̩ kʼi ko̩la ñw u oj uwo Sainai le̩, i ño̩ ko̩la ñw amata-wa ge̩. Owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki gba o̩la ki deju kʼi du ñw a.
Owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ma dʼamata-wa e̩do̩ ku ma gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩ n le̩. Ma la fʼu ke̩che̩ bʼuma te̩, oñ e̩do̩-ma mudabi tʼIjipti.
Ma ka ñw Aro̩n kakini, E̩ ki fʼamo̩jo̩ che ñw a ku ma atʼuwa o̩gba; todu i chʼe-Mose̩s kʼi ne̩ wa kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti dufu le̩, a mʼugbo kʼi leru n.
Taku ma fʼo̩mokuno̩ che adiko le̩, oñ ma mʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ko wa ñw ode le̩. Taku ma kwogwoguyo̩ noj uko̩lo̩ kʼo̩wo̩-ma che.
Ama O̩jo̩ murida, oñ i mʼuma ko jo̩ ku ma che uwewe e̩wñ ojale, alu ku ma ko̩ rʼef o̩takada amakache̩ kakini,
Ame̩ laño̩ mʼebu Molo̩k gba,
Ebu e-ibenu le̩ de̩ ñw amata-wa ef aje̩tachi, dabalu kʼe̩ne̩ ki ko̩la ñw Mose̩s ñwa te̩ kʼi che kʼi chʼuwoli e̩wñ kʼeju-wñ li le̩,
e-kʼamata-wa ño̩ mugba arone aro̩ne oñ ma dʼu wa ti Jo̩shua ubi e̩gba ku ma chane̩ enʼane̩ abo uche̩ichi kʼO̩jo̩ ne bʼeju amata-wa te̩ le̩, gbogbo wʼiko Defid
kʼi li ufe̩de̩nyo̩ eju O̩jo̩, tak i bi kʼi fʼebu li tod O̩jo̩ e-Jeko̩b.
So̩lo̩mo̩n la fʼunyi ko̩ ñw u.
O̩jo̩ Chamachala muda dodo uña kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ che n, dabalu kʼakache̩ le̩ ka kakini,
Efojale chʼede-mi,
I chʼo̩wo̩-mi chʼe̩wñ-i du n?
Ame̩ ku me̩ nʼugbogbo fʼo̩lo̩-me̩ we, kʼe̩pi e-e̩do̩-me̩ ma da n, kpʼe-eti-me̩, me̩ te̩tako bʼAfu Kiafo̩ pioo. Alu kʼamata-me̩ che abe̩le̩ ame̩ che ge̩.
E̩ne̩ dʼef amakache̩ kʼamata-me̩ ma doli-wñ n? Ma la kpa abo ku ma jʼuche̩ ewa E̩no̩kpakpa rʼuma o̩gbo̩gba le̩. Owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼame̩ mud abo ku ma mʼowñ du ñw amone̩ mu ku me̩ laño̩ dʼu kpa fai me̩!
Ame̩ ku me̩ mʼo̩lo̩da gba lef eñwa kʼamonuche̩ O̩jo̩ ñwa ñw me̩, ku me̩ ma la de n.
Abu ku ma la gbʼe-kide̩ i gwunyʼuma e̩do̩, taku ma chane̩ elenyi bʼo ma.
Abu kʼAfu Kiafo̩ che̩kʼef uwñ i kejurʼojale chii, oñ i li ojima O̩jo̩ kpai Jisusi kʼi dago o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ O̩jo̩.
Tak i kakini, Me̩ go, nali efojale ki chʼe̩bite̩ kpʼO̩ma O̩ne̩ kʼi dago o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ O̩jo̩.
Taku ma dʼomu lile kwukwa, ma fʼo̩wo̩ jʼeti-ma, oñ ma nʼibeʼkate agwo̩ko̩ bʼo ma.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼu rikpolo kwef ewo le̩ tʼo̩do̩da, ma rʼokuta dʼo̩; ame̩nibenu le̩ʼ la kʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma jʼane̩ e̩re̩ o̩ko̩lobiaʼka ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ So̩l.
Oñ abu ku ma narʼokuta do Stifan i nadu-do̩, i kakini, Ondu Jisus, mʼafu-mi gba.
Abu kʼi la mʼokuku-wñ ko̩ nyʼane̩, i nʼomu lile kwa kakini, Ondu, e̩ ki fʼadure kide̩ lo manyu ñwu ma n. Tak abu kʼi fʼe-kide̩ ka i mʼolu du.
So̩l la do̩mo̩ aje̩nyʼekpa ku ma kpa-i.
Oñ aboke̩le̩ ku ma himama O̩jo̩ mu Stifan du ji; ma la dinaku-wñ nana nana.
So̩l muda che ujeju abudo̩ Ondu achekpa, i tʼunyi unyi ale akʼaboke̩le̩ kpai abobule̩ nyʼunyi uga.
Todule̩ abo ku ma mukpatuka le̩ tale ajʼuche̩nyo̩ o̩lO̩jo̩.
Oñ Filip mugwo̩ru tʼewo Samariaʼka, i fi Kraist takoya ñwu ma.
O̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ la nʼibeʼkate anyʼe̩wñ ki Filip aka le̩ e̩ti, e̩gbʼo̩ ku ma gbo̩ ku ma laño̩ li ujiwe kʼi che.
Todu amafu ki ma fe̩ n kwef amone̩ wewe dufu kpai ogu lile ekpa; oñ o̩ga ame̩no̩ga e̩kuto̩la kpai ame̩no̩lo̩ wewe takpa.
Tak i mud uyo̩ lile ef ewo le̩.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka la do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Saimo̩n, i dʼewo le̩ o̩gbo̩gba achifamu; awuwu-wñ la fʼabo uche̩ichi Samaria mu, i ka kʼowñ onugo chʼe̩ne̩ lileʼka.
O̩chaka-ma, tʼabo ki nya, tʼabo lile, nadibetʼo̩la-wñ, ma kakini, owñ-i chʼukpahiu O̩jo̩ ku ma do̩ kʼe-Inaina.
Oñ ma nadibetʼowñ todu i nʼe̩wñ ifamu le̩ fʼuma ibe kpatuka kpo̩kpe̩ me̩.
Ama e̩gba ku ma ke̩do̩nʼo̩la Filip kʼi ajʼuche̩nyo̩ ojane̩ O̩jo̩ kpai odu Jisus Kraist! rʼuma, ma fʼuma che baptism, tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼonobule̩.
Saimo̩n onugo ño̩ ke̩do̩no ge̩; oñ abu ku ma fʼu che baptism i kute̩ Filip o̩la. Abu kʼi go ujiwe kpai uko̩lo̩ ukpahiu lile ku ma che, ibe-wñ mukpatuka.
Abu kʼamenukpuche̩ ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m la gbo̩ ka kʼabo Samaria mʼo̩lO̩jo̩ gba, ma fi Pita kpai Jo̩n kpe̩ nyʼugbo ma.
Abu kʼabo le̩ mugwo̩ru wʼo̩mo̩, ma kwochadua todu ma, kʼama ki gba Afu Kiafo̩.
Todu i wʼo̩la e̩ne̩ du ef uma e̩gba le̩ ta n; chai eche ma che ma baptism tef odu Ondu Jisus kate.
E̩gbale̩ ma kʼo̩wo̩ no ma oñ ma mʼAfu Kiafo̩ gba.
Tak abu ki Saimo̩n li ka kʼi lugbo o̩wo̩ kʼame̩nukpuche̩ ko nʼuma ofo oñ ma dʼAfu Kiafo̩ ñwu ma, i kʼe̩wñ anana wa ñwu ma,
i kakini, Me̩ ki ño̩ dʼo̩da kide̩ ñwu mi ge̩, todu kʼe̩ne̩ du kʼu nakʼo̩wo̩ nʼoji-wñ kʼi gba Afu Kiafo̩.
Ama Pita ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ kpʼajifa-we̩ ki lenyo̩, todabu kʼuwe̩ nʼibe ka kʼuwʼanʼe̩wñ anana-we̩ gba ele O̩jo̩.
Tʼuche̩ʼka, tʼukpe̩ʼka, uwe̩ ne̩ ef o̩la kide̩ n: todu e̩do̩-we̩ de̩ gbolo eju O̩jo̩ n.
Todule̩ e̩ narida bʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩-we̩ kide̩ te̩, kʼe̩ la gbo̩ko̩ bʼOndu, ikani ma neke tʼibe kʼe̩ kpe̩ ef e̩do̩-we̩ le̩ no̩ ñw e̩.
Todu u cheli ka kʼe̩ dʼef ololo ki lukoko kpai e̩ji e-uji.
Oñ Saimon dohi kakini, Ame̩ ki chologu bʼOndu todu mi, kʼe-du kʼame̩ ka-i ki we ebʼumi ma.
Todule̩ abu ku ma fʼibenu gba nyo̩nyo̩ ku ma la fʼo̩la Ondu ka, ma dabi alo ti Je̩rusale̩m, oñ ma nʼUche̩nyo̩ aje̩ rʼewo ewo Samaria wewe.
Ama onuche̩ Ondu ko̩la ñwu Filip kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ lo rʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩wo̩ o̩gane̩, tʼo̩na ki agwo̩ru kwo Je̩rusale̩m nyi Gaza le̩; o̩mo̩ chʼaje̩tachi.

Tak i kwane̩ le. Me̩ la go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Itiopiaʼka, onoji kʼi nʼo̩da nana kʼi dʼef o̩wo̩ Kandesi onu Itiopia onobule̩ le̩, e-kʼodochiya onobule̩ le̩ chaka jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ, e-kʼi wa Je̩rusale̩m kʼi dojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩;
oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ gu ef o̩kane̩-wñ adabi alo, i la nʼo̩takada Aizaya akache̩ le̩ acho̩kalatu.
Oñ Afu O̩jo̩ ka ñwu Filip kakini, Te̩me̩rʼo̩kane̩-i kʼe̩ lebʼo̩.
Oñ abu ki Filip fule awa kʼi la gbo̩ abu kʼi acho̩kalatu o̩takada Aizaya akache̩ le̩, i kakini, E̩ chemoji e̩wñ kʼe̩ cho̩kalatu-wñ le̩?
Oñ i kakini, One̩ ma ña mi o̩na-wñ n abile kʼu neke ma? Tak i gbo̩ko̩ bo̩ Filip kʼi te̩gu wa agugu kpʼowñ.
Ugbo O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ kʼi acho̩kalatu le̩ de̩ kakini,
Ehi o̩la-wñ wane̩ kʼi hi o̩la-wñ wane̩ oñ ma mʼajo̩-wñ du bʼo̩ te̩.
Oñ onoji le̩ dohi ñwu Filip kakini, Agba, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼe̩, o̩la e̩ne̩ oñ akache̩ le̩ ka-i? o̩la e-wñ onugo abe̩k e-e̩ne̩ omune̩ ojoji?
Taku Filip mʼalu-wñ chi i chane̩ kwugbo O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ kide̩, oñ i fʼUche̩nyo̩ Jisus je̩rʼu.
Oñ abu ku ma jʼej o̩na alo, ma lewa ugbo omiʼka. Tak onoji le̩ kakini, Go, omi la de̩; e̩wñ ño̩ kpo̩na nyʼumi baptism eche? [
Taku Filip kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ ke̩do̩no kpʼe̩do̩-we̩ chaka ma je̩. Tak i dohi kakini, Omi ke̩do̩no ka ku Jisus Kraist chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩.]
Tak i je̩ ñwu ma fʼo̩kane̩ mu dago; tak ama meji mu gwo̩ru tef omi, ti Filip, tʼonoji le̩, oñ i chʼo baptism.
E̩gba ku ma la mute̩gu kwef omi dufu, Afu Ondu mi Filip dinya kwʼo̩mo̩; oñ onoji ma ño̩ li owñ ge̩ n, todu i ayo̩ tʼo̩na-wñ alo.
Ma la fu Filip li Azotos. Oñ abu kʼi lale o̩mo̩ i fʼuche̩nyo̩ je̩rʼabo ewo ewo le̩ chaka gbogbo tak i lewa Se̩saria.
Oñ So̩l nʼiñmi ef o̩ko̩ kpai one̩ ekpa añmi rʼamako̩che̩ Ondu waa, ab i nyʼugbo agboji amatama
i biʼi o̩takada ku ma ko̩ rʼab unyi ujeju Damaskus ugbo-wñ, todu kʼiche̩wñ kʼi li e̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼabʼO̩na kide̩, tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼonobule̩ kʼi fʼuma ji wa Je̩rusale̩m.
I la watʼe̩gba kʼi alo i me̩ru Damaskus, tak achigili ugane̩ kwo ef ojale wa alʼo daka.
Tak ab i leane̩ i gbʼomuko̩la kʼi ka ñw u kakini, So̩l, So̩l, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ doli mi?
Oñ i kakini, E̩ne̩ uwe̩ che, Ondu? Oñ i kakini, Omi che Jisus e-kʼuwe̩ adoli ñw u le̩.
E̩ muda kwane̩ kʼe̩ gudu nyef ewo-i, taku ma aka ñw e̩ e̩wñ otila kʼe̩ che.
Ugoju mʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma kpe̩re̩ kpʼowñ nyule̩ da dago abu ku ma gbo̩ omuko̩la le̩ ku ma ma muda li e̩ne̩ du n.
Taku So̩l kwane̩ dago. Ab i la mʼeju-wñ chi i li e̩wñ du n. Oñ ma gwo̩nyʼo̩wo̩-wñ alo tu Damaskus.
Tak i je̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta, i gane̩ n, i la je̩ n, i la ñmo̩ n.
Ako̩che̩ʼka la de̩ Damaskus kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Ananaius. Tak Ondu ka ñw u ef ane̩ ego kakini, Ananaius.
Oñ i kakini, Go, omi de̩, Ondu. Oñ Ondu ka ñw u kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ nyʼej o̩na ku ma do̩ kʼO̩kpakpa le̩, kʼe̩ feju e̩ne̩ ku ma do̩ ko̩ So̩l abo Tarsus ef unyi Judas: todu, go, i achadua.
I laño̩ fʼe̩ne̩ke̩le ku ma do̩ ko̩ Ananaius li abu kʼi awʼejefu akʼo̩wo̩ nʼowñ todu kʼi dabi agane̩.
Ananaius muda dohi kakini, Ondu, u gbo̩ o̩la e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kide̩ alu amone̩ wewe aluka e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼi che abo-we̩ kiafo̩ Je̩rusale̩m tabale;
tʼemi ge̩, i ño̩ nʼo̩da kwugbo amagboji amatama kʼi fʼabo du ku ma do̩ odu-we̩ ji.
Oñ Ondu ka ñw u kakini, Nalo ke, todu e̩ne̩ kide̩ chʼe̩wñ eku kʼomi du kʼi ane̩ odu-mi o̩gba abo uche̩ichi kpai amonu kpai amo̩ma Israe̩l;
todu nakʼaluka e̩wñ du kʼi ali uwa-wñ tod odu-mi chuu ñʼo̩.

Tak Ananaius kwʼo̩mo̩ le, i la mugudu tef unyi le̩; tak ab i kʼo̩wo̩ nʼowñ i kakini, So̩l, o̩maye-mi, Ondu, Jisus kʼe̩ li ej o̩na kʼe̩ lewa le̩, kpe̩ mi wa todu kʼe̩ dabi gane̩ kʼe̩ laño̩ che̩ko̩ ñw Afu Kiafo̩.
Tak ababa le̩ e̩wñʼka kwʼeju-wñ wane̩ daba e̩tei-kpa e̩wñ, i chane̩ egane̩, tak i kwane̩ oñ ma chʼo baptism.
Tak i bʼuje̩wñ tʼalu oñ o̩la-wñ gbiti.
Tak ababale̩ i nʼakoya Jisus ata ef unyi ujeju ka kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩.
Tak ibe abo du ku ma gbo̩ mukpatuka, oñ ma kakini, Owñ-i chʼe̩ne̩ ki fʼabo ku ma do̩ odu kide̩ chile̩che̩ Je̩rusale̩m n? i chʼutodu ki wʼemi de̩ n? todu kʼi fʼuma ji wa ñw amagboji amatama.
Ukpahiu So̩l muda nanyo̩gba waa, i la fʼibe amaJu ku ma dodo Damaskus dajugu, i mu-birʼuma eju ka kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ che Kraist.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ wewe jo̩ amaJu nyojuju ku ma dʼowñ kpa.
So̩l la fʼo̩la ku ma lo nyʼu ma. Ma ño̩ de alaku alaku tʼo̩ro̩ka tʼodu kʼama ki dʼowñ kpa.
Amako̩che-wñ muda mʼowñ du odu, oñ ma mʼu du tʼef agba lʼef aku tane̩.
Oñ abu kʼi lewa Je̩rusale̩m i chajama e̩dʼo̩la-wñ manyʼamako̩che̩ le̩. O̩chaka-ma la railo owñ, ma ke̩do̩no ka kʼowñ chʼako̩che̩ n.
Ama Barnabas mʼowñ gba, i dʼu wʼugbo ame̩nukpuche̩, tak i choli ñwu ma alu kʼi li Ondu ej o̩na le̩, kʼowñ la ko̩la ñw u, kpai alu kʼi nʼeju e̩gbo ko̩la ef odu Jisus, Damaskus.
Tak i do̩mo̩ kpʼama alelo lewa Je̩rusale̩m, i nʼeju e̩gbo ako̩la ef odu Ondu.
I laño̩ ko̩la kpai amaJu ku ma chʼichi o̩la Grik, i la bʼuma jiñwa; oñ ma chʼibe ku ma dʼu kpa.
Ama abu kʼamo̩maye fu ma, ma mʼowñ du lo tu Se̩saria, oñ ma fʼowñ kpe̩ nyi Tarsus.

Todule̩ ujeju abudo̩ Ondu ojane̩ Judia chaka kpai Galili kpai Samaria fʼure̩do̩ ne̩, abu ku ma ne ma eju nyo̩gbe̩; ma la nʼule̩ ale ef ubailo Ondu kpai ef ugbe̩do̩ kʼAfu Kiafo̩ adu ñwu ma, i ño̩ nana nyo̩gba.
Abe̩le̩ abu ku Pita tʼale ugbo du, i ño̩ gwo̩ru nyʼugbo abo kiafo̩ ku ma dodo Lida.
I la li e̩ne̩ʼka o̩mo̩ ku ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ E̩nias, kʼi dachi oj akpata o̩do̩ me̩jo̩, todu i chʼe̩no̩ga e̩kuto̩la.
Taku Pita ka ñw u kakini, E̩nias, Jisus Kraist achʼo̩ga-we̩ me̩, kwane̩, kʼe̩ ñwʼate̩-we̩ che. Tak i kwane̩ ababa.
Oñ abo du ku ma dodo Lida kpai Saro̩n fʼu li, oñ ma murida abʼOndu.
Ako̩che̩ onobule̩ʼka la de̩ Jo̩pa, e-kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Tabita, e-ku ma jʼomudechi-wñ ko̩ Do̩rkas, onobule̩ le̩ che̩ko̩ ñw uko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩ eche kpai ejumomi eli.
Abe̩le̩ iko le̩ e̩gbo o̩la fʼu mu, oñ i leku; abu ku ma la fʼowñ o̩la gwe̩ ma mʼu du dachi ef unyi ojale.
Oñ abu ku Lida cheme̩ru Jo̩pa, abu kʼamako̩che̩ gbo̩ ka ku Pita dʼo̩mo̩ ma fʼaboke̩le̩ meji kpuche̩ nyʼugbo owñ, ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi we eche̩du ewugbo ma.

Taku Pita kwane̩ lebʼuma. Oñ abu kʼi lewa o̩mo̩ ma mʼowñ du nyʼef unyi ojale le̩, tak amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ chaka kwo dago kpe̩nyʼowñ araku, oñ ma mʼafe̩ kpai e̩wñ o̩la ku Do̩rkas che e̩gba kʼi dʼugbo ma ko ñʼo̩.
Pita muda ko ma jʼo̩do̩da chaka, tak i kwodanyeku achadua. Tak i murida tugbo oku-wñ le̩, i kakini, Tabita, kwane̩. Oñ i mʼeju-wñ chi, tak abu kʼi fu Pita li i kwoguguane̩.
Taku Pita dʼo̩wo̩-wñ ñw u, i mʼu du kwane̩, tak i fʼabo kiafo̩ kpai amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ do̩ wa, oñ i mʼudeju-wñ dudago ñwu ma.
Oñ ma fʼu ma ugbo du Jo̩pa, tak amone̩ wewe ke̩do̩no Ondu.
Oñ i jʼo̩jo̩ wewe Jo̩pa ugbo Saimo̩n ahiaño̩ ʼka.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka la de̩ Se̩saria kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Ko̩rnilio̩s, i chʼagboji amisoja iche̩ka ku ma dʼodu-ma ko̩ Italia.
E̩ne̩ kʼi kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ kʼowñ kpʼabunyi-wñ du railo O̩jo̩, i achʼamone̩ ele ejumomi nana, i la agbo̩ko̩bo̩ O̩jo̩ e̩gba du.
Dab auwa e̩ke̩la i li onuche̩ O̩jo̩ kʼi awʼugbo-wñ ejugede ef ane̩ ego, kʼi la aka ñw u kakini, Ko̩rnilio̩s.
Tak abu kʼi kejurʼu chii kʼailo la fʼu mu i kakini, E̩wñ de̩, Ondu? Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Urodubo̩-we̩ kpai ele ejumomi-we̩ kʼe̩ che mute̩gu mud arewa-we̩ o̩gba O̩jo̩.
Fai tak e̩ kpʼaboke̩le̩ nyi Jo̩pa, kʼe̩ kpe̩ ma nyʼado̩ Saimo̩n ku ma hiodu ko̩ Pita.
E̩ne̩ le̩ naru ugbo Saimo̩n ahiaño̩ʼka e-kʼunyi-wñ dʼalu ohimini.
Oñ abu kʼonuche̩ kʼi ko̩la ñw u kwʼo̩mo̩ le, i fʼabunyi-wñ meji do̩ wa kpʼisojaʼka kʼi akpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ kʼi dʼef abo ku ma dʼugbo-wñ e̩gba du,
Tak i choli e̩wñ du ñwu ma, oñ i kpe̩ ma nyi Jo̩pa.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ abu ku ma tʼej o̩na alo ku ma la me̩ru ewo le̩ awa, Pita mute̩gu tʼoj unyi kʼi chadua, e̩gba le̩ dab auwa e̩ke̩fa.
Oñ ebi nakpʼo̩, i dʼe̩ e̩do̩ kʼi je̩ e̩wñ. Ama abu ku ma jʼachʼo̩na-wñ ane̩ ego lewa bʼo ma.
Tak i li ojale kʼi che̩chi te̩, kʼe̩wñ ekuʼka agwo̩ru wa, i dab ukpo line̩n efufu inaina ku ma nʼago̩go̩-wñ me̩le̩ adu wʼane̩pe̩te̩.
Ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ chaka jʼef uwñ kpʼame̩wñ ki afa ane̩pe̩te̩ kpʼame̩we̩ ojale.
Tak omuko̩laʼka ka ñw u kakini, Pita kwane̩, kʼe̩ kpa, kʼe̩ je̩.
Ama Pita kakini, I nʼo̩na n, Ondu; todu, u je̩ e̩wñ elifo̩ du kpai e̩wñ ki ma fe̩ n mama ta n.
Tak omuko̩la ño̩ dabi ka ñw u onukeji kakini, E̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ che ki fe̩ uwe̩ ki ka kʼe̩wñ elifo̩ n.
E̩wñ kide̩ la wache onu me̩ta, tak ababa le̩ ma dabi gba e̩wñ eku le̩ tʼefojale.
Oñ abu kʼoji e̩wñ kʼi li le̩ ema nañtu Pita tabale, go, aboke̩le̩ ku Ko̩rnilio̩s kpe̩ ma wa le̩ fʼunyi Saimo̩n tene oñ ma wa bano alaku.
Taku ma nʼomudala atene ka ki Saimon ku ma hiodu ko Pita ru emi?
Oñ abu ku Pita do̩mo̩ akpibe e̩wñ kʼi li le̩, Afu ka ñw u kakini, Go, one̩ me̩ta afeju we̩.
E̩ ki la kwane̩, kʼe̩ gwo̩ru tane̩ kʼe̩ lebʼuma, e̩ ki ñwa ibe du tʼemi tʼemi n, todu omi kpe̩ ma wa.
Oñ abu kʼiPita mugwo̩ru tane̩ i ka ñw aboke̩le̩ le̩ kakini, Me̩ go, omi ku me̩ feju le̩ de̩; o̩la e̩wñ du me̩ wa-i?

Oñ ma kakini, Ko̩rnilio̩s agboji amisoja ogume̩lu, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ o̩kpakpa kpʼe̩ne̩ kʼi arailo O̩jo̩ i che, o̩gbo̩ uche̩ichi amaJu chaka agbʼo̩ ibenu, i gbʼuka O̩jo̩ lugbo onuche̩ kiafo̩, kʼi kpʼone̩ nyʼado̩ uwe̩ wa unyi-wñ, kʼi gbo̩ uko̩la ugbo we̩.
Abe̩le̩ i fʼuma do̩ wʼejefu oñ i mʼuma ko ru.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ ma la mugudu nyi Se̩saria. Abu ki Ko̩rnilio̩s fʼamefu-wñ kpʼamonuku-wñ o̩lali do̩ jeju, i do̩mo̩ aneju ma.
Abe̩le̩ abu ku Pita mugudu wa, Ko̩rnilio̩s ledʼowñ oñ i leane̩ e̩re̩-wñ, i chane̩ edojikane̩ ñw u.
Ama Pita mʼowñ du kwane̩, i kakini, Kwane̩ dago, one̩ oñ omi onugo che ge̩.
Tak abu kʼi abʼo̩ choluka i mugudu tʼejefu, oñ i li abu kʼamone̩ wewe wa jo̩.
Tak i ka ñw ma kakini, Ame̩ chema abu kʼedama abe̩k ete̩me̩ru abo ichi omune̩ chʼe̩wñ udu ñw e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ju. O̩jo̩ muda duña mi ka kʼu we edo̩ e̩ne̩ du kʼe̩ne̩ elifo̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ ki ma fe̩ n.
Todu e-kide̩ u la jiñwa n, abu ku ma kpʼone̩ ado̩ mi, u lewa. Todule̩ ene kʼu natʼuma de̩ kakini, Tod o̩la e̩wñ me̩ kpʼone̩ ado̩ mi wa-i?
Taku Ko̩rnilio̩s kakini, Akwo enyike̩le̩ gbogbo wʼadiko auwa kide̩-i u te̩tade auwa adua e̩ke̩la ef unyi-mi; e̩ la go, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka dʼukpo ki afane̩ bʼo̩la ma wa dago o̩gba-mi.
Oñ i kakini, Ko̩rnilio̩s, ma fʼadua-we̩ gbo̩, ma la dibekado ele ejumomi kʼe̩ che eju O̩jo̩ me̩.
Todule̩ e̩ ki kpʼone̩ nyi Jo̩pa kʼe̩ do̩ Saimo̩n ku ma hiodu ko̩ Pita wʼugbo we̩; owñ le̩ ru unyi Saimo̩n ahiaño̩ etʼohimini.
Todule̩ ababale̩ u fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo we̩; ewa kʼe̩ wa-i, chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩. Todule̩ o̩chaka-wa jo̩ o̩gba O̩jo̩ emi kʼa gbo̩ e̩wñ du kʼOndu ñwajo̩ ñw e̩.
Taku Pita mʼalu-wñ chi, i kakini, U mugba ochochi ka kʼO̩jo̩ nʼe̩nejuma n,
ama ef abo uche̩ichi du e̩ne̩ kʼi arailo owñ kʼi la achuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ o̩kpakpa oñ O̩jo̩ aje̩.
O̩la kʼi du kpuche̩ nyʼugbo amo̩ma Israe̩l, kʼi fʼUche̩nyo̩ ure̩do̩ je̩ rʼuma lefu Jisusi Kraist (owñ le̩ chʼOndu e̩wñ du);
ame̩ chema, uko̩la kʼi chane̩ akwo Galili aro̩ne baptism e-ku Jo̩n fʼakoya-wñ ta wajo̩ ugbo du ane̩ Juda;
alu kʼO̩jo̩ bʼAfu Kiafo̩ kpʼukpahiu ti Jisus abo Nazare̩t le̩ oji, kʼowñ la nyʼugbo du achuko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩, kʼi laño̩ fʼo̩ga abo du kʼAbulumone̩ tʼuma ma chekpa, todu kʼO̩jo̩ dʼubi-wñ.
Awa la chʼame̩nibenu e̩wñ du kʼi che tʼe-kʼi che oj ane̩ amaju kpʼe-Je̩rusale̩m; owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma ño̩ mudu kpa lo̩ko̩li oj oli le̩.
Owñ le̩ O̩jo̩ mudu kwane̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ, oñ i du ñw u kʼi kwotejugede,
i chʼugbo o̩chaka amone̩ n, chai ugbo ame̩nibenu kʼO̩jo̩ chi ma tane̩, owñ chʼawa, kʼa bʼo̩ jʼuje̩wñ kʼa la bʼo̩ ñmo̩ abu kʼi mudajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku.
Tak i ka ñw a kʼa takoya ñw amone̩, kʼa la fʼibenu gba nyo̩nyo̩ kakini, Owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼO̩jo̩ fudate̩ kʼi chʼakajo̩ abo ki deju kpʼabo ki ku.
Amakache̩ chaka gbʼowñ ibenu ka kʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi ake̩do̩nʼowñ agba adure-wñ eto̩no̩ lef odu-wñ.
Abu ku Pita nʼo̩la-i aka ta, Afu Kiafo̩ lewa abʼo̩la abo du ku ma gbʼo̩la le̩ ma.
Tak ibe abo ku ma chʼame̩ne̩do̩-ekono ef abo e̩pie̩da mu-kpatuka, owñ chʼaluka one̩ ki lebo̩ Pita wa le̩, todabu ku ma ño̩ mʼele Afu Kiafo̩ du da bʼabo uche̩ichi oji ma ge̩:
todu ma gbo̩ abu ku ma nʼalu ichi ichi aka ku ma la nabumʼO̩jo̩. Taku Pita dohi kakini,
E̩ne̩ du neke fʼomifo naba ku ma we̩ eche abo-i ku ma mʼAfu Kiafo̩ gba dab awa baptism?
Oñ i ñwa ñwu ma ku ma che baptism ef odu Jisus Kraist. Taku ma rodubʼo̩ kʼi bʼuma nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ pe̩.
Oñ ame̩nukpuche̩ kpai amo̩maye ku ma jo̩ Judia gbo̩ ka kʼabo uche̩ichi ño̩ mʼo̩lO̩jo̩ gba ge̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku Pita mute̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m abo e̩pie̩da bʼo̩ kajo̩,
ma kakini, Kʼuwe̩ nyʼejefu ugbo aboke̩le̩ ku ma ma de̩pi n, e̩ la bʼuma je̩ e̩wñ.
Oñ Pita chane̩, i la bi o̩la ru ma eju kakini,
Omi de̩ ewo Jo̩pa achadua, tak u li e̩wñ ef ane̩ ego, e̩wñ ekuʼka nagwo̩ru wane̩, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼukpo line̩n inaina ku ma gwo̩nyʼago̩go̩-wñ me̩le̩ ato̩no̩ wane̩ kwʼefojale oñ i le gbogbo wʼugbo mi.
Abu kʼu kejurʼu u chane̩ ekpibe, oñ u li kʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ane̩ ile̩-i kpʼame̩la ef o̩ko̩ kpʼame̩wñ ki afa kpʼame̩we̩ ojale jʼoji-wñ.
Oñ u ño̩ gbo̩ omuko̩la kʼi ka ñwu-mi, kakini, Pita, kwane̩ kʼe̩ kpa kʼe̩ je̩.
U muda kakini, I nʼo̩na n, Ondu, todu e̩wñ elifo̩ kpai e̩wñ ki ma fe̩ n tunyu mi alu mama ta n.
Tak omuko̩la dohi kwʼefojale ñwu mi onukeji kakini, E̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ che ki fe̩ uwe̩ ki ka kʼe̩wñ elifo̩ n.
Oñ e-le̩ wache onu me̩ta, taku ma dabi fʼo̩chaka-wñ fa tʼefojale.
Me̩ la go! e̩re̩re̩ le̩, aboke̩le̩ me̩ta ku ma kpe̩ ma kwo Se̩saria wʼugbo mi lewa banʼunyi kʼa jʼefu-wñ.
Oñ Afu ka ñwu mi kʼu lebʼuma, kʼu we eñwʼibe tʼemi tʼemi. Amo̩maye me̩fa kide̩ ño̩ lebʼumi, tak a mugudu tef unyi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kide̩.
Tak i kajane̩ ñwu wa alu ki le kʼi li onuche̩ Ondu ki dago ef unyi-wñ, kʼi la ka ñw u kakini, Fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ nyi Jo̩pa, kʼe̩ du Saimo̩n ku ma hiʼodu ko̩ Pita wa,
e̩ne̩ le̩ akʼuko̩la ku ma ane̩ jadu we̩ efu-wñ ñwʼe̩, owñ chʼuwe̩ kpʼabunyi-we̩ chaka.
Oñ echane̩ kʼu chane̩ eko̩la Afu Kiafo̩ lewa bʼuma ma dabalu kʼi la bʼuwa ma e̩gba ejodudu le̩.
Tak u rewa uko̩la Ondu, abʼi kakini, Jo̩n che amone̩ baptism kpʼomiofo mana, ma muda ache me̩ baptism ef Afu Kiafo̩.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ mʼe-ʼle̩ du ñwu ma e̩go̩ alu kʼi du ñw a kpo̩ho̩ e̩gba kʼa ke̩do̩nʼOndu Jisus Kraisti le̩, e̩ne̩ omi che kʼu neke kpo̩na nyʼO̩jo̩?
Oñ abu ku ma gbo̩-i ma chechi, ma la dʼojima ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, Mak O̩jo̩ ño̩ mʼibe-erida du ñw abo uche̩ichi ku ma tef iñmi me̩ ge̩!
Todule̩ abo e-kʼo̩bata ki wache oji Stifan le̩ fʼuma kpatuka legudu gbogbo wa Fonisia kpai Saipro̩s kpʼAntio̩k, ma kʼo̩la O̩jo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du n, chai amaJu kate.
Ama iche̩ka jʼefu-ma ku ma chʼaboke̩le̩ Saipro̩s kpʼabo Sairini, abu kʼabo le̩ mugudu nyʼAntio̩k ma ño̩ ko̩la ñw amaGrik ge̩, ma nʼUche̩nyo̩ Ondu Jisus aje̩ru ma.
O̩wo̩ Ondu la dʼubi-ma, oñ aluka amone̩ ku ma ke̩do̩no ku ma lafio rida abʼOndu chewewe.
Tak inabali o̩la-ma kwotʼeli ujeju abudo̩ Ondu ki de̩ Je̩rusale̩m, oñ ma fu Barnabas kpuche̩ gbogbo wa Antio̩k.
Abu kʼi lewa o̩mo̩ kʼi la fʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ li, i chane̩ eyo̩ oñ i dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw o̩chaka-ma ku ma nanʼe̩do̩ okpoko amanyʼOndu.
Todu owñ chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ki nyo̩, i la che̩ko̩ ñw Afu Kiafo̩ kpai e̩do̩-ekono. Abe̩le̩ o̩wo̩ amone̩ elile kwomanyu ñw Ondu.
Tak i ledufu nyi Tarsus kʼi feju So̩l.
Tak abu kʼi fʼu li i mʼu duwa Antio̩k. Abe̩le̩ o̩do̩ odukulu ma bʼuma jeju ef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu, ma la ño̩ ko̩ o̩wo̩ amone̩ elile e̩wñ, Antio̩k oñ ma do̩ amako̩che̩ ko̩ abo Kraist o̩mama.
Adiko le̩ amakache̩ iche̩ka la kwo Je̩rusale̩m gwo̩ru nyʼAntio̩k.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka efu-ma kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Agabus kwane̩ dago, i la jiwe ñwu ma lef Afu kakini, Ukpo̩ta elile ache ki bʼo̩gbo ile̩ du ma, e-le̩ wache̩ o̩kpanachi Klaudius.
Oñ amako̩che̩ fʼibe-ma ñwa tane̩ ka kʼalu kʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ bo̩jo̩, ma achʼo̩takachi-wñ wa ñw amo̩maye-ma ku ma dodo Judia.
Ma la fʼe-le̩ che, ma mʼu ko kpuche̩ nyʼugbo abogijo lʼo̩wo̩ Barnabas kpai So̩l.
I dabe̩ne̩ kʼiko le̩ kʼonu He̩ro̩d gwo̩nyʼabo iche̩ka ef abudo̩ Ondu kʼi che ma e̩bie̩ne̩.
I la nʼugbada kpa Jeme̩s o̩maye Jo̩n.
Tak abu kʼi li ka kʼe-le̩ chenyo̩ amaJu eju, i ño̩ gbo̩gba gwo̩nyu Pita ge̩. (E̩gbale̩ la chʼo̩jo̩ uje̩wñ ku ma ma dʼo̩jo̩wu tʼo̩ n.)
Abu kʼi la fʼu mu, i mʼu du tʼunyi uga; i mʼowñ du nyʼamisoja me̩gwe̩fa o̩wo̩ ku ma fejutʼo̩. I neku edʼowñ dufu ñw amone̩ e̩gba kʼElaloji lale.
Abe̩le̩ ma fi Pita de ef unyi uga le̩. Ama ujeju abudo̩ Ondu jʼafejukparʼadua eche ñw O̩jo̩ tod uwñ.
Oñ e̩gba ki He̩ro̩d ache kʼi dʼu dufu, odu o̩jo̩ le̩ Pita dʼagbagba amisoja meji alolu, ma nʼigbaligba meji fʼu ji; abo ku ma dide ño̩ jʼalugbo̩na ade unyi uga ge̩.
Me̩ la go, onuche̩ Ondu wa banʼo, tak ugane̩ʼka mʼane̩ ne̩ ef unyi: oñ i fʼo̩wo̩ fio̩ Pita akolo, i la fʼu jʼolu, i kakini, Kwane̩ piopio. Tak igbaligba le̩ mugwo̩ kwʼo̩wo̩-wñ jʼane̩.
Oñ onuche̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Mʼukpo-we̩ ko lo, kʼe̩ mʼo̩patachi ko̩ nyʼe̩re̩. Oñ i fʼabe̩le̩ che. Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Mʼe̩wñ o̩la-we̩ ko nyi kʼe̩ tʼumi ubi.
Tak i tʼo̩ ubi dufu, i la ma ka kʼe̩wñ ochochi wache owñ lugbo onuche̩-i n, i do̩ kʼane̩ ego i li le̩.

Oñ abu ku ma lale gu adide ʼka du kpʼekeji, ma lewa olugbo̩na ebije e-ku ma legudu tef ewo; e-le̩ mʼo̩la-wñ bi ñw ma o̩to̩to̩la-wñ; taku ma ledufu, ma tʼo̩naʼka gbogbo tak onuche̩ kwo bʼo̩ te̩ ababale̩.
Oñ abu kʼeju Pita mune̩, i kakini, Fai tak u ma ochochi ka kʼOndu fʼonuche̩-wñ kpe̩ wa oñ i mʼumi gba kwʼo̩wo̩ He̩ro̩d kpai kwef e̩wñ du kʼamaJu kibeno ka ki ake̩re̩bʼumi.
Oñ abu kʼeju-wñ mune̩, i lewa unyi Me̩ri iye Jo̩n ku ma hi odu ko̩ Mark, ugbo kʼamone̩ wewe jo̩ achadua.
Oñ abu kʼi do̩wo̩kʼo̩na atakpa le̩, imo̩to̩ onobule̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Roda lewa kʼi neti.
Tak abu kʼi mejuma omuko̩la Pita, eyo̩ kʼi ayo̩ je̩ ñw u bi o̩na atakpa n, i ra dabi tʼejefu, oñ i muduka ka ki Pita dago alu atakpa.
Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, E̩ himu. I muda gwo̩nyʼomu-wñ gbali ka kʼabe̩le̩ i de̩. Taku ma kakini, Onuche̩-wñ de̩.
Ama Pita nado̩wo̩kʼo̩na waa; tak e̩gba ku ma mʼo̩na bi ma fʼowñ li, oñ ibe-ma mukpatuka.

Ama abu kʼi chʼo̩wo̩ pe̩pe̩ ñw ma ku ma jo̩ chii, i choli ñw ma alu kʼOndu mʼowñ du kwef unyi uga dufu. Tak i kakini, Me̩ fʼuche̩ e̩wñ-i kpe̩ru Jeme̩s kpai amo̩maye. Tak i ledufu, oñ i nyʼugbo omune̩ ojoji.
Tak abu kʼo̩jo̩ muñwa ekuku ki dʼef amiso̩ja le̩ chʼo̩pe̩ n, abu Pita le?
Tak abu ki He̩ro̩d fej uwñ kʼi ma li n, kʼi la gwili amadide le̩, i je̩ ñw ma mʼuma ko nyʼakpa. Tak i kwo Judia nyi Se̩saria, oñ i nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ o̩mo̩.

O̩la abo Taya kpai abo Saido̩n la chʼe̩bie̩ nyʼu e̩do̩; oñ ma falujo̩ lewʼugbo-wñ, tak abu ku ma gba Blastus ki nʼo̩da unyi olu onu ibe kʼi chʼonuku-ma, ma tʼo̩ ene kʼure̩do̩ ki dʼagbagba-ma, todabu kʼabo ojane̩-ma ali uje̩wñ je̩ ojane̩ onu le̩.
Tak o̩jo̩ ku ma da He̩ro̩d mʼe̩wñ onu ko̩ nyʼo̩la oñ i kwogugu o̩gba e̩de̩, tak i ko̩la ñwu ma ej o̩ja.
Tak o̩wo̩ o̩ja dʼomu nyate̩ kakini, Omuko̩la o̩jo̩ʼka de̩, i chʼe-one̩ de̩-i n.
Tak onuche̩ Ondu mʼowñ du kpa e̩re̩re̩le̩, todabu kʼi ma dʼojima ñw O̩jo̩ n. Oñ abu kʼideneku chane̩ elo̩ i mʼiñmi da.
O̩lO̩jo̩ muda gbʼane̩ nyʼo̩wo̩ alo waa, i ño̩ nana nyo̩gba.
Tak e̩gba ki Barnabas kpai So̩l fʼe̩wñ ku ma che ñw one̩ le̩ che kpa ma mudabi bi Je̩rusale̩m te̩; ma mu Jo̩n ku ma hi odu ko̩ Mark du lebʼuma.

Amakache̩ kpʼamakone̩wñ la jʼef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu Antio̩k; ama che Barnabas kpai Simeo̩n ku ma do̩ ko̩ Naija kpai Lukio̩s e̩ne̩ Sairini kpai Mane̩e̩n ku ma nʼowñ kpai He̩ro̩d kʼi je̩ Te̩trak le̩ gba kpai So̩l.
Oñ abu ku ma jʼachabune̩ Ondu, ku ma nʼalu aji, Afu Kiafo̩ kakini, Me̩ ki fi Barnabas kpai So̩l date̩ ñw mi tod uko̩lo̩ kʼu do̩ ma tʼef uwñ.
Tak e̩gba ku ma fʼalu ji ku ma la fʼadua che, ma kʼo̩wo̩ nʼuma oji oñ ma tʼuma no̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼAfu Kiafo̩ fʼuma kpe̩ dufu ma gwo̩ru nyi Se̩lusia; oñ ma tʼo̩ko̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ nyi Saipro̩s.
Tak abu ku ma lewa Salamis, ma dʼuche o̩lO̩jo̩ kpo̩go ef unyi unyi ujeju amaju. Ma la ne̩ Jo̩n kʼi chʼimo̩to̩ uko̩lo̩-ma.
Oñ abu ku ma lale gu ef ala le̩ du gbogbo wa Pafo̩s, ma fʼachifamuʼka kʼi chʼakache̩ olemi li, e̩ne̩ Ju kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Barjisus i che.
E-kʼi manyʼakoji onu, Se̩rgius Po̩lo̩s, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi nʼibe, o̩la. Abu kʼowñ le̩ fi Barnabas kpai So̩l do̩ wʼugbo-wñ, i feju kʼi gbo̩ alu kʼo̩lO̩jo̩ de̩.
Ama achifamu le̩ ku ma jomudechi odu-wñ ko̩ Elimas, gbo̩nanyʼuma, i feju kʼi fʼakoji onu le̩ rida bʼo̩na e̩dekono te̩.
Ama abu kʼAfu Kiafo̩ che̩ko̩ efu So̩l kʼi ño̩ ko̩ Po̩l le̩, i mʼeju korʼu chii,
oñ i kakini, Uwe̩ kʼo̩gwo̩ kpʼe̩wñ e̩fule̩fu du che̩ko̩ ef uwe̩, uwe̩ o̩ma Abulumone̩, e̩nebi e̩wñ o̩kpakpa du, uwe̩ awe erʼo̩na Ondu kʼi tʼokpoolo da n?
E̩ la go ke, o̩wo̩ Ondu nʼuwe̩ oji me̩, eju we̩ la afo̩, uwe̩ ali olu n gbogbo wʼikoʼka. E̩re̩re̩le̩ o̩bulubulu kpʼe̩chubi lewa bʼo ma, oñ i tale afeju e̩ne̩ ki agwo̩nyʼu o̩wo̩ tʼo̩na.
E̩gbale̩ abu kʼakoji onu li e̩wñ ki wache le̩, i ke̩do̩no, ibe la takpa rʼowñ efu noji uko̩la Ondu.
Oñ abu ki Po̩l kpʼabo-wñ tʼo̩ko̩ kwo Pafo̩s ma lewa Pe̩rga e-Pamfilia; Jo̩n la kwo bʼuma te̩ mudabi ti Je̩rusale̩m.
AmiPo̩l muda kwo Pe̩rga, ma lale gu ane̩ le̩ du oñ ma lewa Antiok e-Pisidia; oñ abu ku ma mugudu tʼunyi ujeju amaJu o̩jo̩ uñmi agugu ane̩.

Tak abu ku ma fʼo̩kalatu e-olo̩da kpai e-amakache̩ che kpa abogijo unyi ujeju le̩ fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo ma kakini, Aboke̩le̩, amo̩maye, iche̩wñ kʼo̩la dʼef ume̩ ku me̩ dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw amone̩-i, me̩ ka waa.
Oñ abu ki Po̩l kwane̩ dago, kʼi la chʼo̩wo̩ pe̩pe̩ ñwu ma, i kakini:
O̩jo̩ amone̩ Tsrae̩l-i fʼamata-wa chi tak i ko ma dago ef ilowa-ma ane̩ Ijipti, tak i dʼugbogbolo o̩wo̩-wñ dago ko ma kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu.
Tak i ne̩ ma dab o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji ef aje̩tachi.
Tak abu kʼi fʼabo uche̩ichi ojoji mebie oj ane̩ Kenan kpo̩fo̩, i mʼane̩-ma ko ñwu ma ku ma je̩ dab o̩do̩ oli me̩la.
Oñ ubi e-le̩ i mʼamakajo̩ ko ñwu ma gbogbo wa Samiue̩l akache̩ le̩.
Tak e̩gba le̩ ma bi onu: oñ O̩jo̩ mi So̩l, o̩ma Kish, abo o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin du ñw ma o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji.
Tak abu kʼi fʼowñ yo̩ tane̩, i mi Defid du kwane̩ kʼi jʼonu-ma; i ño̩ gbʼe-le̩ ibenu kakini, U fi Defid o̩ma Je̩si, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ki rʼumi e̩do̩, li me̩, owñ le̩ ache e̩wñ du ki dʼumi e̩do̩.
O̩jo̩ la mi Jisus E̩najadu, duwa ñw Israe̩l kwef ugbe̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ dabalu kʼi ko̩la-wñ tane̩;
abu ki Jo̩n fʼakoya baptism e-ibe erida ta ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l du eju-wñ abu kʼi aguduwa.
Oñ abu ki Jo̩n nʼukpe̩-wñ ache, i kakini, E̩ne̩ me̩ neju ka kʼomi che ta? I chʼomi no. Me̩ muda go ta, e̩ne̩ʼka awa ubi-mi, e-kʼomi ma nyo̩ bʼiku e̩da-wñ etu jo̩ n.
Amo̩maye, aboke̩le̩, amo̩ma o̩lo̩pu Ebraham, kpʼabo ku ma railo O̩jo̩ ku ma jʼef ume̩ le̩, awa oñ ma dʼo̩la ujadu kide̩ kpuche̩ru.
Todu abo ku ma dodo Je̩rusale̩m kpʼamagboji-ma, abu ku ma ma ma e̩ne̩ le̩ kpʼomuko̩la amakache̩ ku ma chʼo̩kalatu-wñ o̩jo̩ uñmi du le̩ n, ekpabi ku ma kpʼo̩ abi ma fʼo̩la le̩ che kpa me̩.
Dagba ku ma ma li e̩wñ du ki bʼuku jo̩ n, ma rodubo̩ Pailat ku ma dʼowñ kpa kpo̩.
Abu ku ma la fʼe̩wñ du ku ma ko̩tane̩ ugbo-wñ che kpa, ma mʼowñ du kwʼoj oli le̩ wane̩, oñ ma mʼu du atʼef oji.
O̩jo̩ muda mʼowñ du kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku.
I la kwotejugede ñw abo ku ma bʼo̩ te̩gu kwo Galili nyi Je̩rusale̩m o̩jo̩ wewe: abo le̩ chʼame̩nibenu-wñ ugbo amone̩ abajo̩-i.
Oñ a ajuche̩nyo̩ e̩wñ ku ma katane̩ ñw amo̩ra-wa rʼume̩-i, kakini,
O̩jo̩ la fʼe-le̩ che kpa ñw awa kʼa chʼamo̩ma-ma, owñ che Jisusi kʼi du kwane̩ le̩; i ño̩ dabalu ku ma ko̩ ef Eli Eko̩ DʼO̩jo̩ ekeji kakini,
I chʼe-edʼu kwane̩ kʼi dʼowñ kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku kʼi ma ñʼadabi tef e̩che̩ ge̩ n, i fʼabe̩-i ka kakini,
Todabu kʼi ño̩ ka ugbo ojoji kakini,
Todu Defid, abu kʼi fʼe̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ neku che ñw abo o̩gba e̩-wñ, mʼolu du, taku ma mʼu du adachi manyʼamata-wñ, i la fʼe̩che̩ li.
E̩ne̩ kʼO̩jo̩ muda dʼu kwane̩ le̩ li e̩che̩ du n.
Todule̩ amo̩maye, aboke̩le̩, me̩ ki ma kakini, Le̩f e̩ne̩ kide̩ oñ ma dʼuche̩ utʼadure no̩ kpogo ñw me̩-i;
ef e̩ne̩-i ma fʼale da ñw e̩ne̩ du ki ake̩do̩no ugbo e̩wñ du ku me̩ ma neke jale ef o̩lo̩da Mose̩s n.
Todule̩ me̩ nago̩, tode̩gba kʼe̩wñ ku ma ka ef amakache̩ le̩ wa abʼume̩ ma kakini,
Me̩ go, ame̩ amakerʼone̩, ku me̩ yaye, ku me̩ lenyo̩ pioo̩;
Oñ abu ku ma kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu, abo le̩ gbo̩ko̩bʼuma ku ma ka o̩la le̩ ñw ma o̩jo̩ uñmi ki ro̩nʼe-le̩.

Oñ abu kʼujeju le̩ muchi, amaju wewe kpʼabo ku ma kʼo̩la-ma jʼef uma okpoko ku ma la akpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩, kwoti Po̩l kpai Barnabas ubi; ama le̩ la ko̩la ñw ma, ma kute̩ ma ku ma gugu ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ alo waa.
Tak o̩jo̩ uñmi ki ro̩nʼo abo ewo le̩ jeju ku ma gbo̩ o̩lO̩jo̩, abo ku ma ma wa n ma bʼonu ge̩ n.
Ama abu kʼamaJu fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ li, ulie̩na che̩ko̩ ef uma, taku ma kwo du Po̩l o̩wo̩ e̩wñ du kʼi aka, ma la chakpabie̩.

Po̩l kpai Barnabas la nʼeju e̩gbo ako̩la kakini, I dukpe̩ ku ma kʼo̩lO̩jo̩ ñwu me̩ ejodudu. Abu ku me̩ fʼu ke̩che̩ rinyo̩, kʼame̩ la fʼajo̩ o̩la-me̩ ka ka kʼame̩ nyo̩ bʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ jo̩ n, go, a arida tef abo uche̩ichi.
Todu abu kʼOndu tuko̩ ñw a de̩ kakini,
Oñ abu kʼabo uche̩ichi gbo̩-i ma kwoyo̩, ma la dojima ñw o̩lO̩jo̩; oñ aluka one̩ du ku ma chi jo̩ ñw iñmi ogbegbele̩ la ke̩do̩no.
Ma la mʼo̩la Ondu du le rʼo̩gbo̩ ane̩ le̩ du.
Tak amaJu ko̩nyʼabobule̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ ku ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ efu ololo, kpai abogijo ewo le̩, oñ ma nyi edoli Po̩l kpai Barnabas wa, oñ ma ko ma rikpolo bʼalu o̩me̩ ane̩-ma te̩.
Taku ma fʼebutu e̩re̩-ma gbanyo̩ nʼuma oji oñ ma lewa Aikonium.
Amako̩che̩ le̩ la che̩ko̩ ñw uyo̩ kpai Afu Kiafo̩.
Oñ i lewatu Aikonium o̩mo̩ ma kpe̩re̩ nyʼef unyi ujeju amaju, oñ alu ku ma ko̩la o̩mo̩ je̩ ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile, tʼamaJu tʼamaGrik, ke̩do̩no.
Ama amaju ku ma ko̩ egbagbo̩ fʼabo uche̩ichi dogo oñ ma je̩ ñw onugo-ma bie̩ne̩ ali ñw amo̩maye le̩.
Todule̩ ma kpo̩kpe̩ o̩mo̩ anʼeju e̩gbo ako̩la ef Ondu. Owñ la gbʼo̩la ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ ibenu, i je̩ ñw ujiwe kpai uno̩ ki wache lef o̩wo̩-ma.
Tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ ewo le̩ mukpe̩reji; iche̩ka manyu amaju, iche̩ka la manyʼame̩nukpuche̩.
Oñ abu kʼabo uche̩ichi kpai amaJu manyʼamagboji-ma che ku ma gwo̩ko̩ tʼuma o̩la ku ma bʼuma ina ku ma ño̩ rʼokuta ñw uma,
ma fʼafu-wñ gbo̩ oñ ma ra nyʼewo ewo Laikaonia kpai Listra kpai De̩rbi, kpai ane̩ ki lo daka.
Taku ma kwo jʼo̩mo̩ ajʼUche̩nyo̩ rʼuma.
Oñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka kʼili e̩re̩-wñ ma gbiti n gugu Listra, i chʼe̩no̩lo̩ kwef uwile̩ kʼi ma lule̩ mama ta n.
Owñ le̩ gbo̩ abu ki Po̩l ako̩la: Po̩l la kejurʼu chii, oñ abu kʼi li ka kʼi nʼe̩do̩ ekono ku ma ajadu owñ,
i dʼomu dago kakini, Kwane̩ dago e̩re̩-we̩ kpakpa. Tak i muro̩ dago, oñ i kwolule̩.
Oñ abu kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ li e̩wñ ki Po̩l che, ma dʼomu-ma dago alu ichi Laikaonia kakini, Amo̩jo̩ ku ma dʼalu kʼamone̩ de̩ mugwo̩ru wʼugbo wa me̩!
Ma la dodu Barnabas ko̩ Jupiter; ma la do̩ Po̩l ko̩ Me̩rke̩ri, noj ukpe̩ kʼi tʼo̩gba o̩la le̩ eka.
Oñ atama e-Jupiter kʼi do̩gba ewo le̩ mʼamokuno̩ o̩ko̩ kpai e̩wñ ku ma ta wenyu ma o̩la kowa alu-aku, i dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼowñ kpai o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ki chʼiche̩bo̩.
Ama abu ku Barnabas kpai Po̩l ame̩nukpuche̩ le̩ gbo̩-i, ma fʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma na, taku ma ra ref o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ma kwokwa, ma kakini,

Aboke̩le̩, e̩wñ chi ku me̩ chʼei taa? awa onugo chʼone̩, uche̩ʼka kpʼame̩ oñ a che, Uche̩nyo̩ a la je̩ru me̩-i ku me̩ ki rida bʼe̩wñ o̩wai kide̩ te̩ tugbo O̩jo̩ ki deju, e-kʼi che efojale kpai ane̩-ile̩ kpai ohimini kpai ame̩wñ du ki jʼefu-wñ.
I tʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi duu o̩gba o̩gba ki la le le̩ no̩ ku ma le o̩na e-ma.
I muda tʼo̩la-wñ no̩ kʼi we enʼe̩nibenu n, i che e̩wñ e̩nyo̩, i du omi ojale wa ñwu me̩ kpai adiko kʼe̩wñ aro, i je̩ ñw e̩do̩-me̩ ko̩ ñw uje̩wñ kpai uyo̩.
E̩wñ ku ma ka le̩ du i chakanya taku ma ba o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩, ku ma we eche ma.
Ama amaJu kwo Antio̩k kpai Aikonium wʼo̩mo̩; oñ abu ku ma gba o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ibe, ma fʼokuta ro̩do Po̩l, ma la fʼowñ fa tʼejo̩do̩da ewo le̩, ma do̩ ka kʼi leku.
Ama abu kʼamako̩che̩ donyʼu jo̩, i kwane̩ dago, oñ i mugudu tef ewo le̩. Tak o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ i lebi Barnabas nyi De̩rbi.
Abu ku ma fʼUche̩nyo̩ je̩rʼab ewo le̩, ku ma laño̩ nʼamako̩che wewe, ma mudabi nyi Listra kpai Aikonium kpai Antio̩k,
afʼo̩wo̩ kʼonugo amako̩che̩ le̩ dago; ma dʼugbe̩do̩ ñwu ma ku ma gugu ef o̩la e̩do̩ ekono waa, ma kakini, lef o̩bata wewe tak awa agudu nyi ojane̩ O̩jo̩ tila.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼabogijo chi ñwu ma ujeju ujeju du, ku ma laño̩ chadua kpai alu eji, ma mʼuma ko jo̩ ñwu Ondu ku ma ke̩do̩no le̩.
Tak uma legu ef Pisidia du oñ ma lewa Pamfilia.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼo̩la le̩ ka Pe̩rga ma gwo̩ru nyʼAtalia;
tak akwo̩mo̩ ma tʼo̩ko̩ nyʼAntio̩k, ugbo ku ma jo̩ taku ma mʼuma ko jo̩ ñw ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ todu uko̩lo̩ ku ma chekpa-i.
Oñ abu ku ma lewa ku ma la fʼujeju abudo̩ Ondu le̩ do̩ jeju, ma mʼaluka e̩wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ che ugbo ma duka ñwu ma, ma ño̩ kak i mʼo̩na e̩do̩ ekono bi ñw abo uche̩ichi.
Oñ ekpo̩kpe̩ ku ma kpo̩kpe̩ o̩mo̩ kpai amako̩che̩ le̩ chʼo̩pe̩ n.
Tak aboʼka kwo Judia gwo̩ru wa ako̩ amo̩maye le̩ e̩wñ kakini, Iche̩wñ ku ma ma fʼume̩ e̩pi da alu kʼe̩wʼñ o̩gu Mose̩s de̩ n ma neke jadu me̩ n.

Oñ abu kʼuja kpai iñwa ki ma de̩ ke̩ke̩ n chi te̩ agbagba-ma kpai Po̩l kpai Barnabas, ma ñwa ki Po̩l kpai Barnabas kpai abomune̩ ef uma ku ma te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m tugbo ame̩nukpuche̩ kpai abogijo noj iñwa kide̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼujeju abudo̩ Ondu le̩ fʼaite̩-ma che ma lale gu efu Fonisia kpai Samaria du acholi ñwu ma erida kʼabo uche̩ichi rida. Ma la je̩ ñw amo̩maye du yo̩ nana.
Tak abu ku ma lewa Je̩rusale̩m, ujeju abudo̩ Ondu kpai ame̩nukpuche̩ kpai abogijo yo̩ ñwu ma, oñ ma mʼaluka e̩wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ che lugbo ma duka ñwu ma.
Tak abo ʼka ku ma chʼuche̩ ki date̩ e-amaFarisi ku ma ke̩do̩no kwane̩ dago kakini, I dukpe̩ ku ma fe̩pi-ma da, kʼa laño̩ ka ñwu ma ku ma fʼo̩lo̩da Mose̩s de tila.
Oñ ame̩nukpuche̩ kpai abogijo wa jo̩ ku ma go oji o̩la kide̩.

Tak abu ku ma fʼiñwa je̩ nana tabale Pita kwane̩ dago ka ñwu ma kakini, Amo̩maye-mi, aboke̩le̩, ame̩ chema ka kʼakwʼigbelegbele O̩jo̩ fʼuwa tu oñ i mʼumi chi kʼabo uche̩ichi ki gbo̩ o̩la Uche̩nyo̩ lef alu-mi kʼama ki ke̩do̩no.
O̩jo̩ kʼi chema ef e̩do̩ one̩, la gbʼuma ibenu, i mʼAfu Kiafo̩ du ñwu ma dabalu kʼi du ñw a.
I la ñwa agbagba awa kpai ama rʼeji n abu kʼi nʼe̩do̩ ekono fʼuma e̩do̩ gwe̩ hiolo.
Todule̩, e̩wñ chi ku me̩ jʼO̩jo̩ ma fa-i, ku me̩ dʼadu nʼamako̩che̩ o̩lo̩ e-kʼamata-wa tʼawa onugo ma gbiti bo̩jo̩ kʼa ne̩ n?
Awa muda ake̩do̩no ka ku ma ajadu wa lef ufe̩do̩ e̩nyo̩ Ondu Jisus, alu kʼe-ma onugo de̩ ge̩.
Tak ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ le̩ chaka jo̩ chii, oñ ma neti abu ki Barnabas kpai Po̩l nacholi ujiwe kpai uno̩ du kʼO̩jo̩ che ef abo uche̩ichi lugbo ma.
Oñ abu ku ma jo̩ chii gbogbo taki Jeme̩s dohi kakini, Amo̩maye-mi aboke̩le̩, me̩ gbʼo̩la-mi.
Simeo̩n choli ñwu me̩ alu kʼO̩jo̩ wa fejudʼabo uche̩ichi ejodudu kʼi chi amone̩ kwef uma tod odu-wñ.
Oñ e-le̩ mud omuʼka kpai amakache̩ du; dabalu ki che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Ubi e-kide̩ nadabiwa,
todu kʼamone̩ ki bo̩bo̩ ki nafeju Ondu,
Ondu, kʼi je̩ ñwu ma ma e̩wñ-i kwʼigbelegbele aka-i.
Todu kide̩ abu kʼomi li de̩ kakini, A ki che abo ku ma rida tugbo O̩jo̩ kwef abo uche̩ichi e̩do̩wulu n;
kʼa muda kʼo̩takada rʼuma ku ma ki hi-mama e̩wñ ode ki adʼone̩ ji kpai e̩wñ abutabu eche kpai e̩wñ ku ma kpa okutulu kpai e̩bie̩.
Todu akwʼe̩gba abogijo igbelegbele Mose̩s chene̩ abo ku ma takoya-wñ ef unyi ujeju ewo ewo du, o̩jo̩ uñmi du ma la nʼo̩kalatu-wñ ache.

E̩gba le̩ tak i nyo̩ eju ame̩nukpuche̩ kpai abogijo kpai o̩gbo̩ ujeju abudo̩ Ondu du ku ma fʼaboke̩le̩ ef uma chi ku ma kpe̩ manyu Po̩l kpai Barnabas nyʼAntio̩k. Abo ku ma chi che Judas ku ma hiodu ko̩ Barsabas kpai Sailas ku ma chʼame̩nuto̩gba ef amo̩maye le̩:
abu ku ma kʼo̩takada lʼo̩wo̩-ma kakini, Ame̩nukpuche̩ kpai abogijo ku ma chʼamo̩maye, tugbo amo̩maye ku ma jʼef abo uche̩ichi Antio̩k kpai Siria, kpai Silisia, me̩ gba-o.
Abu kʼa gbo̩ ka kʼaboʼka ku ma kwefu wa nʼo̩la chʼume̩ e̩do̩ ñwañwala, ku ma la mʼonugo-me̩ ibe ko, a la kpe̩ ma abe̩le̩ duu n;
i nyo̩ eju-wa abu kʼibe-wa mud okate, kʼa chi aboke̩le̩ kʼa kpe̩ ma nyugbo me̩, manyu ame̩nufe̩do̩-wa Barnabas kpai Po̩l,
ku ma chʼabo ku ma mʼoji o̩la-ma du tinyo̩ todu odu Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist.
Todule̩ a la fu Judas kpai Sailas-i kpe̩, kʼama le̩ la anʼalu-ma aka o̩la e̩wñ kide̩ ñwu me̩.
Todu i nyo̩ Afu Kiafo̩ eju kpai awa onugo, kʼa we edʼadu o̩bata omune̩ nʼume̩ oji tʼe̩wñ ki chʼukpe̩ one̩-i le: kakini,
Me̩ ki himama e̩wñ ku ma du chʼode̩ kpʼe̩bie̩ kpʼe̩wñ ku ma kpa okutulu kpʼe̩wñ abutabu; me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ de bʼef e̩wñ-i te̩ mak e̩nyo̩ me̩ ache le̩. I ra ñw me̩ kpo̩o̩.
Todule̩ abu ku ma tʼuma no̩ ma lewa Antio̩k; tak abu ku ma fʼugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ le̩ do̩ jeju ma mʼo̩takada le̩ du ñw ma.
Tak abu ku ma fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che ma yo̩ tod o̩la ugbe̩do̩ le̩.
Oñ abu ku Judas kpai Sailas onugo la chʼamakache̩, ma nʼo̩la wewe du-gbe̩do̩ ñw amo̩maye le̩, ma la fʼo̩wo̩ kʼuma dago.
Tak abu ku ma nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ pe̩ ma tʼuma no̩ ku ma kwʼugbo amo̩maye le̩ kpʼure̩do̩ ku ma nyʼugbo abo ki kpʼuma wa le̩. [
I muda nyo̩ Sailas eju kʼi gugu omo̩.]
Po̩l kpai Barnabas la kpo̩kpe̩ Antio̩k ako̩ amone̩ e̩wñ kpʼUche̩nyo̩ eje̩ ru ma kpʼabomune̩ ojoji wewe, owñ chʼo̩la Ondu.
Tak abu ku ma nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ pe̩ Po̩l ka ñw Barnabas kakini, Lewa kʼa dabi kʼa fejudʼamo̩maye-wa ewo ewo du ugbo kʼa dʼuche̩ o̩la Ondu kpogo ñw ma le̩, kʼa go alu ku ma de̩.
Barnabas la neku kʼi du Jo̩n e-ku ma dʼo̩ ko̩ Mark le̩ lebʼuma;
ama eju Po̩l i nʼo̩na ku ma du e̩ne̩ ki mudabi bʼuma te̩ Pamfilia, kʼi ma lebʼuma nyʼoko uko̩lo̩ le̩ n, lebʼuma n.
Oñ i chʼiñwa ej olo ñw ma, todabe̩le̩ ma mudaru bʼomune̩ te̩, Barnabas la mu Mark du oñ ma tʼo̩ko̩ nyi Saipro̩s.
Po̩l la mu Sailas du, oñ abu kʼamo̩maye le̩ mʼuma ko ñw ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu, ma kwʼo̩mo̩ le.
Oñ i leale gu efu Siria kpai Silisia du afʼo̩wo̩ kʼujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu dago.
Oñ i ño̩ lewa De̩rbi kpai Listra; go, ako̩che̩ʼka do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Timoti, iye-wñ che Ju ki ke̩do̩no, ata-wñ muda che Grik.
Amo̩maye ku ma jo̩ Listra kpai Aikonium agbʼo̩ ibenu.
I du Po̩l e̩do̩ kʼene̩ le̩ alebʼowñ; tak i mʼowñ du, i la fʼe̩pi-wñ da todu amaJu ku ma jʼugbo kide̩, todu o̩chaka ma chema ka kʼata-wñ che Grik.
Oñ abu ku ma alale gu ef ewo ewo du ma mʼo̩la kʼame̩nukpuche̩ kpai abogijo Je̩rusale̩m ñwate̩ du ñwu ma ku ma de.
Todule̩ ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu hi e̩re̩ nyane̩ ef o̩la e̩do̩ ekono nyo̩nyo̩, aluka-ma anyo̩gba otemeje o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa.
Oñ ma lale gu ef ane̩ Frigia kpai Galatia du ofo, abu kʼAfu Kiafo̩ kpo̩nanyʼuma ku ma we eko̩la Esia;
oñ abu ku ma lewa alo̩me̩ Misia, ma che ku ma nyi Be̩tunia; Afu Jisus muda je̩ ñw uma n;
oñ abu ku ma lale gu Misia du ma gwo̩ru wa Troas.
