Tak ane̩ ego oka kwodufu ñwu Po̩l go odu: e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Masidoniaʼka dago agbo̩ko̩bo̩ Po̩l, i kakini, mudaba wa Masidonia-i kʼe̩ te̩ko wa.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼane̩ ego le̩ li, ababale̩ a feju kʼa nyi Masidonia, a fʼo̩la le̩ lo dama ka kʼO̩jo̩ do̩ wa kʼa fʼUche̩nyo̩ je̩r uma.
Tak a tʼo̩ko̩ kwo Troas, a le ogbogbolo nyi Samotresi, o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ a la nyi Neapolis,
tak akwʼo̩mo̩ a nyi Filipai, e-kʼi chʼewo Masidonia kʼe̩ lewa nʼo ejodudu ane̩ o̩mo̩, abo Rom dodo jʼo̩mo̩. A nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ ewo le̩ pe̩e̩.
O̩jo̩ uñmi a la lʼalaku-wñ dufu nyʼo̩lʼohiminiʼka ugbo kʼa do̩ kʼugbo ku ma chadua de̩; oñ a guguane̩ ako̩la ñw abobule̩ ku ma wa jʼugbo kate o̩mo̩.
Tak onobule̩ʼka kʼi la kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Lidia kʼi chʼabʼewo Tayataira e-kʼi ata e̩wñ ku ma du chʼukpo odufa, i do̩mo̩ agbo̩. Ondu la mʼe̩do̩-wñ bi kʼi netirʼe̩wñ ku Po̩l akʼo̩la-wñ le̩.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma fʼowñ kpʼabunyi-wñ che baptism i rodubʼawa kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ fuñwa ka kʼomi chʼe̩ne̩ ki achubi Ondu, e-le̩ me̩ gudu wʼnyi-mi ku me̩ gugu. Tak i chʼadahi wa.
Oñ i leatu abu kʼa alo tʼugbo ku ma chadua, imo̩to̩ onobule̩ʼka e-kʼi nʼafu Paito̩n, e-kʼuko̩lo̩ ifa ebo̩ ki ache chʼile ñw amodu-wñ nana, de kpʼawa.
I natu Po̩l kpʼawa ubi akwukwa kakini, Abo-i chʼamudu O̩jo̩ Odobao̩gagu, e-ku ma dʼuche̩ o̩na ujadu kpogo ñw me̩.
I la nʼe-le̩ ache o̩jo̩ wewe. Ama abu ki ko̩ Po̩l o̩la i mu-nda oñ i ka ñw afu le̩ kakini, Uwe̩ naka ñw u ef odu Jisusi Kraisti: kwʼef uwñ dufu. Tak i kwʼef uwñ dufu e̩re̩re̩ le̩.
Oñ abu kʼamodu-wñ li ka kʼukibeno ile eje̩-ma le me̩, ma gwonyu Po̩l kpai Sailas oñ ma fʼuma fa nyʼef aja o̩gba amagboji.
Tak abu ku ma ko ma wʼugbo abo̩hiala, ma kakini, Abo-i chʼamaJu, ma chʼabʼewo-wa e̩do̩ñwañwala ololololo.
Ma dʼuche̩ e̩wñ o̩gu ki ma dukpe̩ kʼawa kʼa chʼabo Rom-i agba kʼa che n, kpogo.
Tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ño̩ kwane̩ tʼuma o̩la, tak abu kʼabohiala fʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma fana bʼuma o̩la te̩ oñ ma je̩ ñw ma gwo ma itali.
Tak abu ku ma fʼuma gwo o̩me̩me̩le̩ ma mʼuma ko ro̩ jʼef unyi uga, ma ka ñw e̩ne̩ ki ade unyi uga kʼi dejute̩ ma kpaka.
Oñ abu kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ mʼuko̩ o̩la abe̩le̩ gba, i mʼuma ko rikpolo nyef unyi uga ejefu, i la mʼuma e̩re̩ ko nyʼodo kpaka.
Ama ame̩ru alumeji odu Po̩l kpai Sailas jʼachadua, akele O̩jo̩, oñ abunyi uga jʼanetirʼuma;
achigili ane̩ kwomiejo nana, todabe̩le̩ e̩re̩ unyi uga kwoga ligaliga, e̩re̩re̩le̩ alugbo̩na chaka mubi, oñ e̩wñ ki ji ma chaka bulo̩.
Oñ abu kʼade unyi uga le̩ mʼolu ji, kʼi la li alugbo̩na unyi uga ki che̩bi lale, i mʼugbada-wñ wo̩, i che kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ kpa abu kʼi do̩ kʼabunyuga ra le.
Po̩l muda dʼomu-wñ kwane̩ nana, kakini, E̩ ki chʼo̩la-we̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ n; todu o̩chaka-wa jʼemi.
Abu kʼi fʼe̩wñ kʼi nʼagane̩ bi i gwo̩ko̩ tʼejefu, tak i leane̩ o̩gba Po̩l kpai Sailas, o̩la-wñ naga.
Tak abu kʼi mʼuma ko wʼo̩do̩da i kakini, Amodu-mi, e̩wñ dukpe̩ kʼu nache ku ma fʼumi jadu?
Oñ ma kakini, Ke̩do̩no Ondu Jisus taku ma ajadu uwe̩, uwe̩ kpai abunyi-we̩.
Taku ma kwo kʼo̩la Ondu ñw u, kpʼabo ku ma jʼunyi-wñ chaka.
Tak i mʼuma gba e̩re̩re̩ odu le̩, oñ i fʼagbe itali-ma gwe̩; taku ma fʼowñ kpʼabo-wñ du che baptism e̩re̩re̩le̩.
Oñ abu kʼi mʼuma ko wʼef unyi-wñ, i la kʼuje̩wñ jo̩ ñw uma, tak owñ kpai abunyi-wñ chaka kwoyo̩ abu kʼi ke̩do̩nʼO̩jo̩.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ muñwa, abo̩hiala fʼamisarje̩nt kpuche̩ wa kakini, Me̩ tʼabo le̩ no̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki ade unyi uga le̩ fʼo̩la le̩ je̩ru Po̩l, kakini, Abo̩hiala fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ wa todu kʼawa ki tʼume̩ ño̩. Todule̩ me̩ dufu wa fai ku me̩ lo kpʼure̩do̩.

Po̩l muda ka ñw uma kakini, Ma fʼuwa gwo eju o̩ja, ma kajo̩ wa tak a jʼabi n, awa kʼa chʼabo Rom-i, ma la mʼuwa koro̩ jʼef unyi uga; fai ma ko wa ro̩ dufu maja, maja? E-le̩ nʼo̩na n; ama ama onugo ki lewa ko wa dufu.
Tak amisarje̩nt mʼuko̩la le̩ duwaka ñw abohiala. Oñ ailo fʼuma mu abu ku ma gbo̩ ka kʼama chʼabo Rom;
Tak uma lewa agbo̩ko̩ bʼuma, oñ abu ku ma mʼuma ko dufu, ma rodubo̩ ma ku ma kwo bʼewo le̩ te̩.
Abe̩le̩ abu ku ma kwʼef unyi uga le̩ ma mugudu nyʼugbo Lidia: abu ku ma la fʼamo̩maye le̩ li ma dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw uma, taku ma le ma.
Oñ ef ule̩-ma abu ku ma lale gu Amfipolis kpʼApolonia du ma lewa Te̩se̩lonaika, ugbo kʼunyi ujeju amaJu de̩.
Tak alu ki mu Po̩l o̩la kʼi te̩tache, i nyʼejefu ugbo ma, oñ i kʼo̩la kwef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ rʼuma eju o̩jo̩ uñmi me̩ta,
i mubi rʼuma eju, i ño̩ muko jo̩ ñw ma ejugede kaku Kraisti ki li uwa kʼi laño̩ akwane̩ kwef abo ki ku chʼe̩wñ tila, oñ i kakini, Kraisti le̩ de̩-i, owñ che Jisus e-kʼomi adʼuche̩-wñ kpogo ñw me̩-i.
Oñ iche̩ka ef uma mʼu gbagbo̩, oñ ma dama kpai Po̩l kpai Sailas kpʼugwe̩ko̩ abo Grik ku ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ kpʼamuto̩gba ef abobule̩ ku ma ma de̩ ke̩ n.

Ama abu kʼulie̩na che̩ko̩ ef amaJu ma mʼaboke̩le̩ bibi iche̩ka ku ma chʼofogoli nyef aja gba mʼo̩la, tak abu ku ma fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ ke̩che̩ wa jo̩ ma fʼewo le̩ gwʼekuku; tak abu ku ma wa bano unyi Jeso̩n ma feju ku ma ko ma dufu wa ñw ame̩no̩talaka le̩.
Ama abu ku ma ma li ma n, ma fu Jeso̩n kpʼamo̩maye iche̩ka fa nyʼugbo amo̩ma-dachi ewo kpʼukwa kakini, Abo-i ku ma fʼile̩ do̩wo̩ ño̩ lewa emi ge̩.
Jeso̩n la mʼuma gba nyi; oñ o̩chaka-ma jʼef e̩wñ ki akpʼo̩da Sisa bie̩ ache, ma ka kʼonu omune̩ ojoji do̩mo̩ kʼowñ che Jisus.
Oñ egbo̩ kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ kpai amo̩madachi ewo gbo̩ e̩wñ kjde̩ i che ma e̩do̩ñwañwala.
Tak abu ku ma gba Jeso̩n kpʼabo ki bo̩ e̩wñ uhio̩wo̩ ma tʼuma no̩.
Oñ ababale̩ amo̩maye le̩ je̩ ñw Po̩l kpai Sailas kwʼo̩mo̩ nyi Be̩rea odu, abu ku ma lewa o̩mo̩ ma le tef unyi ujeju amaJu.
Abo le̩ la chʼame̩numo̩la tʼabo Te̩se̩lonaika le. Ma nʼibe kokolo chaka agba o̩la le̩, ma nʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ agwili-wñ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa ku ma li abe̩k e̩wñ-i dʼabe̩le̩ ochochi.
Todule̩ abo-ma wewe manyʼabobule̩ aguchi Grik kpʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma ke̩do̩no ma de̩ ke̩ n.
Ama e̩gba kʼamaJu e-Te̩se̩lonaika ma kaku Po̩l ño̩ nʼuche̩ o̩lO̩jo̩ adu kpogo Be̩rea ma ño̩ lewa o̩mo̩ abe̩le̩ ami o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ejo, ma je̩ ñw ma dejiji.
Tak ababale̩ amo̩maye o̩mo̩ je̩ ñw Po̩l kwʼo̩mo̩ kʼi nyʼo̩lʼohimini; Sailas kpai Timoti muda fe̩do̩lichi jʼo̩mo̩ ta.
Oñ abo ku ma fʼaite̩ Po̩l che mʼowñ du gbogbo wa Ate̩ns; tak abu ku ma mʼe̩ñwa ku Po̩l ñwa ñw Sailas kpai Timoti gba kʼama ki che alu du ku ma hiaka che ku ma awʼugbo-wñ piopio, ma le ma.
Oñ abu ku Po̩l de̩ Ate̩ns anede ma, i kpa nyʼe̩do̩-wñ abu kʼi li ka kʼewo le̩ chʼode ode.
Todule̩ i nʼo̩la aka rʼamaJu kpʼabo ku ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ ef unyi ujeju kpʼabo ku ma ke̩re̩bʼowñ ef aja o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa eju.

Ama iche̩ka ef abo Epikiurian kpai ef abo Stoik kʼama chʼamache̩do̩ ibe ko bʼo̩. Iche̩ka-ma kakini, E̩wñ dʼako̩la iye̩ye̩ kide̩ e̩do̩ kʼi aka ta? oñ iche̩jibo kakini, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼi adu e̩wñ amebili ejuaduñaʼka ka le̩: todabu kʼi nʼUche̩nyo̩ o̩la Jisus kpʼo̩la udajikwane̩ aje̩ru ma.
Oñ abu ku ma gwo̩nyʼowñ, ma mʼu du alo tʼoj uwo Mars, ma kakini, Awa neke ma e̩wñ etito̩ kʼuwe̩ aka-i?
Todu e̩wñ ejuaduñaʼka oñ e̩ kowa nyʼuwa eti-i. Todule̩ a neku ema oji e̩wñ-i.
Iko kʼo̩wo̩ abo Ate̩ns kpai abononojo du ku ma ge̩ne̩ o̩mo̩ tane̩ ofo ma nʼe̩wñ omune̩ ojoji du eche tʼe̩wñ etito̩ eka kpai egbo̩ le n.
Oñ abu ku Po̩l kwodago alumeji oj uwo Mars, i kakini:

todu abu kʼu nalale kʼeju-mi kadʼe̩wñ ku me̩ kpe̩do̩ru lale le̩, u ño̩ li ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-ku ma ko̩rubutu o̩la-wñ kakini, E-O̩JO̩ KU MA MA MA NI DE̩. Todule̩ e̩wñ ku me̩ ma ma n ku me̩ la kpe̩do̩ru le̩, oñ omi ajʼuche̩-wñ rʼume̩-i.
O̩jo̩ kʼi che ile̩-i kpai ame̩wñ du ki jʼef uwñ, owñ le̩, abu kʼi chʼOndu efojale kpai ane̩-ile̩-i, i agugu ef unyi ejefu e-kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ che n,
o̩wo̩ one̩ la ache e̩wñ ki bo̩ ñw owñ n, abu kʼowñ onugo adu iñmi kpʼafu kpʼe̩wñ du ñw ame̩wñ du;
I la che abo uche̩ichi amone̩ chaka kwef e̩ne̩ kate, ku ma ki dodo oj ane̩-ile̩-i du, abu kʼi fʼiko-ma kpai alo̩me̩ alo̩me̩ odo-ma kʼi ñwa ñwu ma tane̩ date̩;
kʼama ki feju O̩jo̩, ikani ma adʼo̩wo̩ tejane̩ owñ, ku ma li u, i la jiji rʼe̩ne̩ kate ef uwa n:
todu a adeju, a la achiche̩, a laño̩ do̩mo̩ ef owñ, dabalu kʼiche̩ka ef amakeli-me̩ onugo ka kakini, Todu awa ño̩ chʼo̩lo̩pu-wñ.
Todule̩ abu kʼa chʼo̩lo̩pu O̩jo̩, i dukpe̩ kʼa nʼibe ka kʼO̩jo̩ dab o̩jamalia abe̩k ajifa abe̩k okuta e-kʼibe one̩ ñwa kʼi du che uko̩lo̩ e̩te̩le̩ n.
Todule̩ abu kʼO̩jo̩ fʼeju kpʼiko ugbodu kide̩ bo, fa-i i aka ñw amone̩ du ugbo du ku ma ribeda:

todabu kʼi fʼo̩jo̩-wñ date̩, o̩jo̩ le̩ i ache kʼi kajo̩ ile̩ ugbo du kʼone̩ dodo kade ef o̩kpakpa lef E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi fʼu date̩ le̩. I mʼokpoko-wñ du ne ñw e̩ne̩ du, abu kʼi dʼowñ kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku.
Oñ egbo̩ ku ma gbo̩ o̩la udajikwane̩ abo ki ku, iche̩ka ma kwokʼopeli; abo iche̩ka muda kakini, A ñʼadabi gbo̩ o̩la kide̩ ugbo we̩ ta.
Abe̩le̩ Po̩l kwʼalumeji-ma dufu.
Aboke̩le̩ iche̩ka la lamʼowʼñ, ma ke̩do̩no; Dio̩nyusius abo Areopagait la dʼefu-ma, kpʼonobule̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Damaris kpʼabomune̩ ojoji manyu ma ge̩.
Oñ ubi e̩wñ kide̩ Po̩l kwo bʼAte̩ns te̩ oñ i lewa Ko̩rint;

tak abu kʼi fʼe̩ne̩Juʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Akwila, kʼi chʼo̩lo̩pu Pontus kʼowñ kpai o̩ya-wñ Prisila ma kwo Itali wa kpo̩kpe̩ n li (todabu ki Klaudius dʼo̩da te̩ ka kʼamaju chaka ki kwo bo̩ Rom te̩); i lewa ugbo ma;
oñ ukpe̩ kʼobe-wñ chʼoka kpʼe-ma, i gugu ugbo ma oñ ma chuko̩lo̩; todu ma chʼabo ku ma hi unyabo ta, obe-ma de̩.
Tak i nako̩la rʼuma eju ef unyi ujeju-ma o̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi, i la che kʼi tʼamaJu kpai amaGrik eju gu.
Ama e̩gba ku Sailas kpai Timoti kwo Masidonia wa, abu kʼo̩la le̩ mu Po̩l ne̩ gaga i nagbibenu ñw amaJu nyo̩nyo̩ kakini, Jisus che Kraist le̩.
Ama abu ku ma fʼalu jo̩ nyʼu ku ma la chʼakpabie̩-wñ, i fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ gbanyo̩, i ka ñw uma kakini, E̩bie̩-me̩ ki dʼoji o̩la-me̩ ke, omi de̩ hiolo, akwe̩gba-i nanyi ugbo abo uche̩ichi.
Tak abu kʼi kwo bʼo̩mo̩ te̩ i lewa unyi e̩ne̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Taito̩s Justus, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ kʼunyi-wñ dago o̩la unyi ujeju le̩.
Ama Krispus, agboji unyi ujeju le̩, ke̩do̩no Ondu kpʼo̩gbo̩ abunyi-wñ du; tak abo Ko̩rint wewe kʼuma gbo̩ ke̩do̩no, ma la che ma baptism.
Oñ Ondu ka ñw Po̩l ef ane̩ ego odu kakini, E̩ ki railo n, e̩ nako̩la waa, e̩ ki la hi alu-we̩ de n:
todabu kʼomi dʼubi-we̩, e̩ne̩ du la akobʼuwe̩ kʼi achʼuwe̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ n; todabu kʼamone̩ wewe jʼewo-i ñw mi.
Oñ i gugu o̩mo̩ o̩do̩ʼka kpai ochu me̩fa akone̩ o̩lO̩jo̩ ef uma.
Ama adiko ku Galio chʼakoji-onu Akaya, amaJu nʼibe okate kwane̩ tu Po̩l o̩la oñ ma dʼu nyʼo̩gba-e̩de̩;
ma kakini, E̩ne̩ kide̩ agba amone̩ ibe ku ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ alu kʼo̩lo̩da ma je̩ n.
Ama abu ku Po̩l che kʼi chi alu-wñ, Galio ka ñw amaJu kakini, AmaJu, i ma chʼe̩wñ uji abe̩k e̩wñ udu bibi, i ma nʼe-i kʼu naje̩ kpai ame̩;
ama i chʼe-ene e̩te̩ ugbo uko̩la alu ofo, kpai odu one̩ edo̩ kpai o̩lo̩da e-me̩, me̩ fejutʼe-le̩ o̩to̩to̩la-me̩; omi neku kʼu chʼakajo̩ abe̩le̩ n.
Oñ i fʼuma ne kwo bʼo̩gba e̩de̩ te̩.
Tak o̩chaka-ma mu Sostenes, agboji unyi ujeju, du tʼopee o̩gba e̩de̩ akpʼo̩ igbe. E̩wñ-i du la wu Galio eju n.
Tak abu ki Po̩l ño̩ nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ o̩mo̩ wewe, i chʼamo̩maye le̩ agbo, oñ i kwotʼo̩ko̩ alo tu Siria, Prisila kpʼAkwila le bʼowñ (i fʼoji-wñ ja Se̩nkria; todu i fʼoji da).
Oñ ma lewa E̩fe̩sus, tak i tʼuma no̩ jʼo̩mo̩; owñ onugo muda mugudu tef unyi ujeju akʼo̩la rʼamaJu eju.
Abu ku ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi ño̩ bʼuma nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ ta, i ko̩.
Ama i che ma agbo, i kakini, O̩jo̩ je̩, nañʼadabi wʼugbo me̩. I tʼo̩ko̩ kwo E̩fe̩sus.
Tak abu kʼi kwotʼane̩ Se̩saria, kʼi la mute̩gu nyʼagwa ujeju abudo̩ Ondu, i gwo̩ru tʼAntio̩k.
Tak abu kʼi kpo̩kpe̩ o̩mo̩ pe̩ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le, oñ i lale gu ane̩ Galatia kpai Frigia du aro̩ne aro̩ne, i hi amako̩che̩ le̩ chaka e̩re̩ nyane̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩Juʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Apo̩lo̩s, ku ma bi Ale̩kisandria, lewa E̩fe̩sus; e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼukpahiu ef o̩lO̩jo̩, kʼi meju eko̩la e̩te̩le̩ i che.
E̩ne̩ le̩ chʼone̩ ku ma nʼalu ko̩ o̩kalatu o̩na Ondu; abu kʼi la chʼe̩ne̩do̩ chacha, i nʼo̩la Jisus aka kpʼe̩kʼone̩ tʼeju-wñ kpakpa; o̩la baptism Jo̩n kate oñ i chʼo̩ka-wñ.
Oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ chane̩ eko̩la kpai eju e̩gbo̩ ef unyi ujeju. Oñ abu ku Prisila kpai Akwila gbʼo̩la-wñ, ma mʼowñ gba cho̩la, taku ma mʼe̩wñ o̩na O̩jo̩ dute̩ ñw u o̩bie̩ o̩bie̩ tule.
Oñ abu ki neku elalegudu nyʼAkaya amo̩maye le̩ kʼowñ e̩che, ma kʼo̩takada rʼamako̩che̩ ku ma yo̩ ñw u: oñ abu kʼi lewa o̩mo̩ i bʼabo ku ma ke̩do̩no lef ufe̩de̩-nyo̩ che nana;
todu i dʼo̩la bi amaJu kpaka ejo̩ja, i nʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ aña ma ka ki Jisus che Kraist le̩.
Ileatu abu kʼApolo̩s de̩ Korint ki Po̩l la lale gu ef ane̩ o̩wo̩ ate̩-wñ du i lewa E̩fe̩sus, oñ i fʼamako̩che̩ iche̩ka li,
tak i ka ñw ma kakini, Me̩ gbʼAfu Kiafo̩ abu ku me̩ ke̩do̩no le̩? Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Abe̩k Afu Kiafo̩ do̩mo̩, a gbʼegbo̩ mama n.
Tak i kakini, Tef e̩wñ oñ ma che me̩ baptism? Oñ ma kakini, Tefu baptism e-Jo̩n.
Oñ Po̩l kakini, Jo̩n ne̩ baptism e-uribeda achʼone̩, i naka ñw amone̩ le̩ todu ku ma ki ke̩do̩no e̩ne̩ ki awa ubi owñ, owñ che Jisus.
Oñ abu ku ma gbo̩, ma che ma baptism tef odu Ondu Jisus.
Tak abu ki Po̩l kʼo̩wo̩ nʼuma Afu Kiafo̩ lewa bʼuma ma; taku ma kwoko̩la ichi ichi, ma laño̩ nʼache̩ aka.
Aboke̩le̩ le̩ chaka la dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ me̩gweji.
Oñ abu kʼi mugudu tef unyi ujeju amaJu i la nʼeju e̩gbo ako̩la ochu me̩ta, i kʼo̩la rʼuma eju, i laño̩ tʼuma eju gu ugbo o̩la ojane̩ O̩jo̩.

Ama abu kʼe̩do̩ iche̩ka ef uma no̩ ku ma la ko̩ egbagbo̩, ku ma chakpabie̩ O̩na le̩ eju ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩, i te̩ ubi bʼuma te̩, oñ i fʼamako̩che̩ date̩ ojoji, o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa i dʼef iskulu Tairanus akʼo̩la rʼuma eju.
E-le̩ che gbogbo o̩do̩ meji; todabe̩le̩ amone̩ du ku ma dodo Esia gbo̩ o̩la Ondu, tʼamaJu, tʼama-Grik.
O̩jo̩ ño̩ nʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu ki ma kpo̩ rʼo̩ja n che lʼo̩wo̩ Po̩l,
todabe̩le̩ ma kwokʼugbogbo kpʼukpo ki kad año̩la-wñ nyʼugbo abo kʼo̩ga fʼuma gwegbo, tak o̩ga-ma kwobʼuma o̩la te̩, oñ amafu bibi la kwʼef uma dufu.
Tak abo iche̩ka ef amaJu ku ma tʼache obochi ale mʼodu Ondu Jisusi du ku ma dʼodu-wñ nʼabo ku ma nʼamafu bibi oji, ma kakini, Jisusi ku Po̩l atakoya-wñ le̩ nakpe no me̩-i.
Skifa, e̩ne̩ Juʼka kʼi chʼagboji amatama, nʼamo̩me̩ne̩ke̩le̩ mebie ku ma nʼe-le̩ ache.
Oñ afu bibi le̩ dohi ñw ma kakini, U chema Jisus, eju-mi la che̩mu Po̩l ne̩; i muda chʼame̩, e̩ne̩ me̩ che?
Tak e̩ne̩ kʼafu bibi le̩ dʼef uwñ gwo̩ko̩ rʼuma o̩la, i fʼuma nu mane̩, i la che ma ukpahiu, todabe̩le̩ ma ra kwʼef unyi le̩ dufu kpai ago ofo kpai agbe.
Oñ i mud e̩wñ kʼabo du ku ma dodo E̩fe̩sus ma, tʼamaJu chaka kpai amaGrik; tak ailo lewa abʼuma ma chaka, oñ odu Ondu Jisusi mud inaina.
Tak abo ku ma ke̩do̩no wewe lewa gbalu, oñ ma dʼe̩wñ ku ma te̩tache ka.
Oñ abo iche̩ka ku ma jʼef uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ ifamu eche kʼo̩takada-ma wa agujo eju-ma chaka. Ma la fʼoko-wñ lo, oñ ma li abu kʼi dabe̩ne̩ kʼipam icham me̩lu.
Abe̩le̩ O̩la Ondu gbiñmi, oñ i nanyo̩gba achʼukpahiu-wñ alo.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼe̩wñ kide̩ chekpa, Po̩l fu lo ef afu-wñ ka kʼi alale gu efu Masidonia kpʼAkaya du kʼi nyi Je̩rusale̩m, i kakini, U fʼo̩mo̩ le i dukpe̩ kʼu ño̩ nyʼafu Rom go chuu.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼiTimoti kpai Irasto̩s ku ma chʼabo meji ku ma che e̩wñ ñw owñ, kpuche̩ nyi Masidonia, owñ onugo nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ Esia ta.
Oñ ame̩rʼiko le̩ e̩do̩ñwañwala ki che noj o̩la O̩na-i de̩ ke̩ n.
Todu e̩ne̩ʼka, kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Deme̩trius kʼi chʼagwalo̩ ajifa, kʼi nʼajifa agwu uwo̩li ejefu unyi ode Artimis, dʼuko̩lo̩ nana ñw abo ku ma chʼo̩ka obe abe̩le̩ eche.
Deme̩trius fʼabo le̩ do̩ jeju manyʼabo ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ abe̩le̩, oñ i kakini, Aboke̩le̩, me̩ chema ka kʼobe-i chʼe̩te̩ ile kʼa je̩.

Me̩ li, me̩ la gbo̩ kakini, I chʼE̩fe̩sus kate n ama i bo̩ pe̩ ki chʼo̩gbo̩ ane̩ Esia du ku Po̩l kide̩ gbʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ iche̩ka ibe, i laño̩ rʼuma da bʼo̩ te̩, abu kʼi aka kakini, E̩wñ ki awate̩ lʼo̩wo̩ one̩ chʼamo̩jo̩ de̩ n.

I la chʼofe ukpe̩ e-wa edʼu dufu gbali te̩ kate n, ma neke lo ka kʼunyi Artimis, o̩jo̩wa onobule̩ inaina-i, chʼibe̩te̩, ma che ku ma bʼe̩gahi-wñ wane̩, owñ kʼo̩gbo̩ abo Esia kpʼabo ile̩ du akpe̩do̩rʼu-i.
Oñ abu ku ma gbo̩ uwe̩do̩ kʼuma efu, ma kwokwa kakini, Artimis e-E̩fe̩sus inaina-i!
Tak ewo le̩ chaka muduya, oñ ma gwo̩nyu Gayo̩s kpai Aristarkus, abo Masidonia ku ma le̩bo̩ Po̩l nyʼule̩ le̩ gaga, oñ ma nʼibe okate agwo̩ko̩ nyʼojukpologu.
Po̩l la neku kʼi nyʼef abo kʼi tinyo̩ jʼo̩mo̩, amako̩che̩ muda je̩ ñw owñ le n.
Oñ iche̩ka ef amagboji Esia ku ma chʼonuku-wñ kpʼone̩ rʼu, oñ ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi we ejibenu anyʼef o̩gbo̩ le̩.
Todule̩ abomune̩ omune̩ kwokwa e̩wñ ojojojoji; todu ibe abo ujeju le̩ dajugu nyʼomune̩, ojile-ma la ma e̩wñ ki chi ku ma wa jo̩ le̩ n.
Tak abo o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ iche̩ka ko̩ nyʼAle̩ksanda efu adʼu dufu, oñ amaJu kʼowñ e̩che̩ tʼo̩gba. Tak Ale̩ksanda chʼo̩wo̩ pe̩pe̩ ñw ma, i dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi kʼomu-ma ñw amone̩ le̩.
Ama abu ku ma ma ka kʼe̩ne̩ Ju i che, omuko̩la abo le̩ chaka mud okate, i dabe̩ne̩ ki tʼauwa meji le ma jʼakwa kakini, Artimis e-E̩fe̩sus inaina!
Tak abu kʼako̩takadaʼka fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ ba, i kakini, Aboke̩le̩ E̩fe̩sus ugbo one̩ de̩ ki ma ma ka kʼewo E̩fe̩sus chʼadejute̩ unyi Artimis inaina-i kpʼe̩wñ kʼi ñwa kwʼefojale wa-i n?
Todule̩ abu ki ma nʼugbo du kʼone̩ are̩ e-le̩ n, i dukpe̩ kʼe̩do̩-me̩ ki wane̩, ku me̩ ki we eche e̩wñ e̩dagbudu.
Todu me̩ mʼaboke̩le̩ kide̩ kowa me̩, ma la dinya e̩wñ kwʼef unyi ode n ma la achakpabie o̩jo̩-me̩ n.
Todule̩ i la che̩wñ ku Deme̩trius kpʼamo̩ka obe le̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ nʼo̩la kpai e̩ne̩ du, ujeju abo̩hiala do̩mo̩, amakoji onu laño̩ do̩mo̩ ge̩: ama ki do̩ omune̩ ajo̩.
I la nʼe̩wñ omune̩ ku me̩ tene oji-wñ le̩, mak ef ujeju e-kʼo̩da je̩ o̩mo̩ ma akpʼoji-wñ.
Todu a gbali te̩ ñw ajo̩ edo̩-wa noj utu ki da eñini-i, todu eke̩che̩ wa kʼa ke̩che̩ wa jo̩-i nʼe̩te̩ e̩wñ ki chi kʼa neke choli ñw ma n.
Tak abu kʼi fʼe-le̩ ka, i tʼujeju le̩ no̩ ki muchi.
Oñ abu kʼe̩kuku le̩ muda, ku Po̩l fʼumako̩che̩ do̩ wa kʼi la dugbe̩do̩ ñw ma, i che ma agbo̩ oñ i le dufu kʼi nyi Masidonia.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼane̩ o̩wo̩ o̩mo̩ le, kʼi la nʼo̩la wewe adugbe̩do̩ ñw ma, i lewa ane̩ Grik.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼochu me̩ta je̩, kʼamaJu la jʼalu nyʼu abu kʼi ache kʼi tʼo̩ko̩ nyi Siria, ibe ka ñw u kʼi mudabi le Masidonia.
Oñ Sopater e-Pairus e̩ne̩ Be̩rea, kpʼAristarkus kpai Sekundus abo Te̩se̩lo̩nia kpai Gayo̩s abo De̩rbi kpai Timoti kpai Taikikus kpai Trofimus abo Esia fʼahite̩ owñ che gbogbo wʼEsia.
Tak abo le̩ do̩gba unede wa Troas.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ uje̩wñ ku ma ma dʼo̩jo̩wu tʼo̩ n lale a tʼo̩ko̩ kwo Filipai; o̩jo̩ me̩lu a je̩ tak a nyane̩ ugbo ma Troas. O̩jo̩ mebie a je̩ o̩mo̩.
Oñ o̩jo̩ ejodudu ef o̩jo̩ mebie, abu kʼawa jeju kʼa bʼakala je̩ Po̩l kʼo̩la rʼuma eju, abu kʼa che kʼa lo o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ; oñ i dʼef o̩la le̩ eka gbogbo wʼalumeji odu.
E̩mu wewe la jʼef unyi ojale ugbo kʼawa jo̩ le̩.
Okolobiaʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Yutikus la gugu alu iwido, olu fʼu mu gbali; oñ abu ku Po̩l ka o̩la rʼuma eju alo waa, olu ki mʼu du i muñwa kwo unyi ojale e̩ke̩ta afiane̩, oñ ma mʼoku-wñ du.
Po̩l muda gwo̩ru wane̩ afʼo̩wo̩ lʼu de̩ mʼe̩do̩, i kakini, Me̩ we ekuku-i ta: todu onugo iñmi-wñ dʼef uwñ.
Oñ abu kʼi mute̩gu kʼi fʼakala bu kʼi la dʼu kad alu kʼi laño̩ chʼoluka nana nana gbogbo ñwʼo̩jo̩, abe̩le̩ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le.
Taku ma mʼudeju imo̩to̩ le̩ du lo, oñ e̩do̩-ma kʼi nyi i de̩ ke̩ n.
Oñ awa mʼo̩gba du, a tʼo̩ko̩ nyi Aso̩s, o̩mo̩ a che kʼa gba Po̩l tʼo̩ko̩; todu abu kʼa ka tane̩ le̩ de̩; owñ che kʼi le e̩re̩.
Ama e̩gba kʼi wa de̩ kpʼawa Aso̩s kʼa mʼowñ du, a lewa Mitilini.
Tak abu kʼa tʼo̩ko̩ kwo̩mo̩ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ a lewa odenideni Chio̩s, o̩jo̩ñwa e-le̩ ge̩ a lewa mane̩ Samo̩s; tak o̩jo̩ñwa e-le̩ a lewa Mailitus:
todu Po̩l fʼibe-wñ ñwa kʼi tʼo̩ko̩ lale gu E̩fe̩-sus du, kʼi we elugo̩ Esia; todu i anaju, iche̩wñ ki je̩ ache kʼi de̩ Je̩rusale̩m o̩jo̩ e̩kʼooje le̩.
Oñ i fʼone̩ kpe̩ kwo Mailitus nyʼE̩fe̩sus kʼi do̩ abogijo ujeju abudo̩ Ondu le̩ wa.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma lewa ugbo owñ i ka ñw ma kakini,
ef uhio̩la wane̩ chaka achuko̩lo̩ adu ñw Ondu, kpʼomi-aku kpai ajama e-kʼi ke̩re̩bʼomi ef alu kʼamaJu jo̩ nyu mi.
Me̩ chema abu kʼu ma dʼo̩wo̩ mo̩ e̩wñ du ki nʼile kʼu we eduka ñw me̩ n, u la we eko̩ me̩ ejʼo̩ja kpai unyi unyi n.
U gbibenu ibe-erida tʼO̩jo̩ kpʼe̩do̩-ekono Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti ñw amaJu kpai amaGrik nyo̩nyo.
Fai, me̩ la go, nanyi Je̩rusale̩m abu kʼomi chʼe̩ji te̩ ñw afu, u la ma e̩wñ ki ake̩re̩bʼumi o̩mo̩ n:
chai kakini Afu Kiafo̩ nagbʼibenu ñw mi nyo̩nyo̩ ewo tʼewo du kakini e̩ji e-iku kpʼo̩bata anede mi.

U muda fʼonugo-mi lo ka kʼu chʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ akoko ejʼo̩la-mi n, todu kʼule-mi kʼu nara-i kʼu ra kpoji kpʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ñw one̩ kʼu gba kwugbo Ondu Jisus owñ chʼibenu Uche̩nyo̩ ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ egba nyo̩nyo̩.
Fa-i me̩ la go, omi chema ka kʼe̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ kʼu te̩te̩tefu me̩ ale atakoya ojane̩ O̩jo̩ ñʼali eju-mi ge̩ n.
Todu kide̩ nagbo̩la-mi ibenu ugbo me̩ eñini kide̩ kakini, Omi de̩hiolo ugbo e̩bie̩ e̩ne̩ du,
todu u dʼo̩wo̩ mʼuneku O̩jo̩ du kʼu we eduka ñw me̩ n.
Me̩ dibetʼo̩la-me̩ kpʼujo̩ amala chaka e-kʼAfu Kiafo̩ ko me̩ jo̩ ku me̩ chʼamafejute̩ ma ku me̩ dejute̩ ujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩ e-kʼi nʼe̩bie̩ e-wñ la.
Omi chema ka kʼu mʼubi dagba fai amo̩gu e̩bie̩ne̩ awʼef ume̩, ma ado̩wo̩mʼujo̩ amala-i n.
Ef e-me̩ onugo aboke̩le̩ la akwane̩ ako̩la e̩wñ e̩dalo̩ ku ma fʼamako̩che̩ fa tʼama onugo ubi.
Todule̩ me̩ gwe̩ke̩, me̩ ki dibekado ka kʼo̩do̩ me̩ta, tʼodu tʼo̩ro̩ka u we enʼomi aku-mi ako̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ibe n.
Oñ fa-i nako me̩ jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ kpai o̩la ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ e-kʼi neke fʼume̩ ne nyo̩gba, kʼi laño̩ neke kʼe̩wñ-ogu ñw me̩ je̩ ef abo kiafo̩ du.
Tʼajifa, tʼajamalia, tʼe̩wñ ku ma du tʼo̩la u che̩ño̩-wñ ugbo e̩ne̩ du n.
Ame̩ onugo chema ka kʼeku e̩wñ kʼi ku mi kpʼabo ku ma jʼugbo-mi o̩wo̩-mi kide̩ u du chʼo̩wo̩ imo̩to̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ñw a.
U kʼe̩wñ du ña me̩ ka kʼabe̩le̩ i dukpe̩ kʼa achʼakanya uko̩lo̩ tila kʼa chʼabune̩ abʼe̩gbo, kʼa laño̩ dibekado O̩la kʼOndu Jisus ka, kakini, Owñ onugo kakini, Edu e̩wñ ñw one̩ nʼugbede tʼe̩gba le.
Tak abu kʼi fʼe-kide̩ ka i mʼokuku-wñ ko nyane̩ oñ i bʼo̩chaka-ma chadua.
Aku kʼo̩chaka-ma ro̩ la chenana; taku ma lewa anʼo̩lo̩ Po̩l oñ ma dʼalu kʼo̩ alu nana,
e-kʼi awo̩ ma tule oñ chʼo̩la kʼi ka kakʼama ñʼali eju-wñ ge̩ n. Taku ma chaite̩-wñ wʼugbo o̩ko̩.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼa mudaru bʼuma te̩, kʼa la tʼo̩ko a le ogbogbolo nyi Ko̩s, tak o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ a nyi Rode̩s, oñ akwo̩mo a nyi Patara;
oñ abu kʼa fʼo̩ko̩ kʼi adaba nyi Fonisia li, kʼa la tʼo, a kwane̩ ule̩-wa.
Oñ abu kʼa li Saipro̩s, kʼa la mu dʼu tinyo̩ o̩wo̩ a wo hi, a nyi Siria, tak a mane̩ Taya, todu o̩mo̩ oñ o̩ko̩ le̩ akʼadu-wñ jʼane̩.
Oñ abu kʼa fʼamako̩che̩ li a jʼo̩jo̩ mebie o̩mo̩; ama le̩ laño̩ ka ñw Po̩l lef Afu kʼi we ete̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ e̩gba kʼa fʼo̩jo̩ le̩ je̩ kpa, a kwo̩mo̩ le oñ a mʼe̩re̩ ko nyʼule̩-wa. O̩chaka-ma manyʼabobule̩ kpʼabimo̩to̩ chaihite̩ wa gbogbo wʼo̩do̩da ewo le̩. Tak a kʼokuku-wa nyane̩ ogbe̩ga o̩mo̩ achadua.
Tak a chʼo̩la-wa agbo, oñ a kwotʼo̩ko̩, abo le̩ la mudabi tʼunyi-ma.
Oñ abu kʼa mʼoji ule̩-wa da kwo̩ Taya a lewa To̩le̩me̩is, tak abu kʼa fʼamo̩maye le̩ gwa, a jʼo̩jo̩ʼka kpʼama.
Oñ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ a kwʼo̩mo̩ oñ a lewa Se̩saria; a la mugudu tef unyi Filip, ajuche̩nyo̩ kʼi dʼef amamebie le̩, a kwogugu ugbo owñ.
E̩ne̩ kide̩ la nʼamo̩monobule̩ me̩le̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n ku ma jʼakache̩.
Oñ abu kʼa bʼuma nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ pe̩, akache̩ʼka kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Agabus gwo̩ru kwo Judia wa.

Tak i lewa ugbo wa, oñ i mʼe̩wñ ujiñmi Po̩l du oñ i fʼo̩la-wñ o̩wo̩ kpʼe̩re̩ ji, i kakini, E-kʼAfu Kiafo̩ ka de̩ kakini, Abe̩le̩ oñ amaJu ku ma jo̩ Je̩rusale̩m aji e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi nʼe̩wñ ujiñmi kide̩ ku ma la adʼu tef o̩wo̩ abo uche̩ichi.
Tak abu kʼa gbʼe̩wñ-i, tʼawa tʼabo ugbo kide̩ a gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi we ete̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
E̩gbale̩ Po̩l dohi kakini, E̩wñ me̩ che-i? Aku ero̩ kpʼe̩do̩-mi egulo̩-i? Todu omi o̩la-mi che̩mu tod eji kate n ama todu kʼu ku efu Je̩rusale̩m tod odu Ondu Jisus kpo̩fo̩.
Oñ abu kʼe̩do̩-wñ ma je̩ gba n, a chechi, a kakini, E̩wñ ki du Ondu e̩do̩ ki wache ke.
Tak abu kʼo̩jo̩ le̩ lerʼane̩ a mʼane̩-wa ño̩ oñ a mute̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Amako̩che̩ iche̩ka ku ma kwo Se̩saria ño̩ lebʼuwa, ma ko wa nyʼunyi Mnason e̩ne̩ Saipro̩s kʼi chʼako̩che̩ kwʼigbele kʼa aru unyi-wñ.
Oñ abu kʼawa lewa Je̩rusale̩m, amo̩maye le̩ yo̩ ñw wa tabale̩.
Tak o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ Po̩l lebʼuwa nyʼejefu ugbo Jeme̩s; oñ abogijo chaka wajʼo̩mo̩.
Tak abu kʼi fʼuma gwa, i fʼe̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ che ef abo uche̩ichi lef e̩wñ kʼi ache ñw one̩ le̩ choli jʼane̩ ñw ma okoke.
Tak abu ku ma gbo̩ ma kwodojima ñw O̩jo̩, oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, O̩maye-wa, e̩ cheli abu kʼamaJu icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ wewe ku ma ke̩do̩no jʼemi, o̩chaka-ma la go̩laru o̩lo̩da.
Amone̩ la nʼalu-ma aka o̩la-we̩ ñw ma kakini, Uwe̩ ako̩ amaJu du ku ma jʼef abo uche̩ichi ku ma dabi wʼubi bu Mose̩s te̩, ka ku ma ki we̩ ede̩pi amo̩ma-ma, kʼama ki we etale ef e̩wñ o̩gu-wa.
Todule̩ abʼi de̩ ta? Ma la agbo̩ chuu ka kʼuwe̩ lewa.
Todule̩ e̩ ki nache e̩wñ kʼa ka ñwʼe-i. Abo̩ke̩le̩ me̩le̩ jʼugbo wa ku ma dʼoji;

e̩ ki mʼabo le̩ ko kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ gwo rinyo̩ manyʼama; oñ e̩wñ du ku ma kpabie̩ ef uwñ e̩ fʼo̩me̩-wñ ra todu ku ma ki fʼoji-ma la, tak amone̩ du ama ka kʼo̩la e̩wñ-we̩ du kʼamone̩ nʼalu-ma aka ñw ma le̩ chʼofofo, ama kʼuwe̩ onugo alule̩ tʼo̩kpakpa kʼe̩ la nʼo̩lo̩da ade.
Oñ i chʼe-abo uche̩ichi ku ma ke̩do̩no le̩, a dama nyʼo̩takada ako̩ rʼuma me̩, a la fʼibe ñwañw ma ku ma fʼo̩la-ma de̩ ugbo e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ kpʼe̩bie̩ kpʼe̩wñ ku ma kpa okutulu kpʼabutabu eche.

E̩gbale̩ Po̩l mʼaboke̩le̩ le̩ ko, tak o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ abu kʼu ma fʼo̩la-ma gworinyo̩, i le̩bʼuma nyʼef unyi O̩jo̩, ma nʼaluka o̩jo̩ ku ma aje̩ tak o̩la-ma egwo̩rinyo̩ ajo̩ kpa gbogbo tak uma akʼe̩wñ ele-O̩jo̩ wa tod e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ma adu kpogo.
Ama abu kʼo̩jo̩ mebie le̩ bo̩ pe̩ ki jo̩ kpa, amaJu ku ma kwo Esia fʼowñ li ef unyi O̩jo̩, ma fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ du ke̩che̩ oñ ma dʼo̩wo̩ dʼo,

ma nakwa kakini, Aboke̩le̩ Israe̩l, me̩ te̩ko wa! E̩ne̩ kʼi ako̩ amone̩ du ugbo du o̩la agwunyu amone̩ kpʼo̩lo̩da kpʼuña-i de̩; i laño̩ mʼabo̩ Grik ko wʼef unyi O̩jo̩-i, oñ i mʼuña kiafo̩-i du che e̩wño̩ja.
Todu ma fu Trofimus e̩ne̩ E̩fe̩sus le̩ li o̩gbo̩gba ef ewo kpʼowñ, oñ ma nibe ka ku Po̩l dʼu wʼef unyi O̩jo̩.
Tak ogbo̩ ewo le̩ du mudogo. Oñ amone̩ mute̩gidi jʼugboʼkate, oñ abu ku ma gwo̩nyu Po̩l, ma fʼowñ fa wʼo̩do̩da unyi O̩jo̩, tak ababale̩ ma fʼo̩na-wñ re.
Oñ abu ku ma jʼafeju alu ku ma ale ku ma dʼowñ kpa, inabali-wñ lewa ugbo onu-ogu le̩, kakini, Ogbo̩ Je̩rusale̩m du mudutu.
E̩re̩re̩le̩ i mʼamisoja kpai amagboji uche̩ amisoja ko oñ i fule gwo̩ru abʼuma ma: tak abu ku ma li onu-ogu kpʼamisoja-ma, ma we ekpa Po̩l.
E̩gbale̩ onu-ogu le̩ te̩wa agwo̩nyʼu, oñ i je̩ ñw ma nʼigbaligba meji fʼu ji; tak i chane̩ egwili e̩ne̩ kʼi che, kpai e̩wñ kʼi che.
Tak abo iche̩ka ef o̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ nʼomudala ka e̩wñʼka, abomune̩ ka e̩wñ omune̩. Oñ abu kʼi ma neke ma o̩kpakpa-wñ tod ekuku le̩ n, i je̩ ñw ma mʼowñ du le tef aku.
Ama e̩gba kʼi ate̩gu ubo̩ agube amisoja mu Po̩l du okudododo tod o̩wo̩ amone̩ ku ma gwo̩ko̩ rʼu o̩la;
todu ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ le̩ tʼo̩ ubi akwa kakini, Me̩ mʼowñ du alo!
Ama abu ku ma che ku ma du Po̩l nyʼef aku le̩ i ka ñw onu-ogu le̩ kakini, O̩da aje̩ ñw mi ka e̩wñʼka ñw e̩? Oñ i kakini, Uwe̩, e̩ chegbo̩ Griki?
Mak i chʼuwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ Ijipti kʼi fʼamone̩ do̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩ kʼi laño̩ mʼamakpone̩ icham me̩lu le̩ ko le tef aje̩tachi le̩ n?
Po̩l kakini, Omi chʼe̩ne̩ Ju, abo Tarsus, omane̩ Silisia ki ma chʼewo e̩fule̩fu n. Narʼoduʼka bʼuwe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw mi ko̩la ñw amone̩-i.
Tak abu kʼi mʼo̩da du ñwʼu, Po̩l kwodago oj ubo̩ ku ma te̩gu le oñ i chʼo̩wo̩ pe̩pe̩ ñw amone̩ le̩; tak abu ku ma we hioli i nʼomudala ka ñw ma alu Hibru kakini:
Aboke̩le̩ amo̩maye-mi kpʼamata-mi, me̩ nagbʼomu-mi kʼu naka ñw me̩.
Oñ abu ku ma gbo kʼi anʼomu dala ako̩la ñw ma alu Hibru, ma ño̩ chechi tule. Tak i kakini:

Omi chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Ju ku ma bi Tarsus e-Silisia, oñ ma ne̩ mi gba ewo-i, e̩re̩ Gamelie̩l, u gugu ako̩che̩ tikpa o̩lo̩da amata-wa chichili; e̩ne̩ kʼi ago̩larʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩ u che, alu kʼo̩chaka-me̩ de eñini-i.
U doli abo O̩na kide̩ gbogbo wʼuku, u fʼaboke̩le̩ kpʼabobule̩ ji, u la ko ma nyʼunyi uga;

agboji amatama kpʼabogijo chaka jʼagba mi ibenu abe̩le̩; o̩wo̩-ma u la gbʼo̩takada kwo tʼugbo amo̩maye-wa, oñ u dʼej o̩na ule̩-mi alo tu Damaskus kʼu fʼabo ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ ji kʼu ko ma wa Je̩rusale̩m, ku ma fʼailo-wñ ra ma.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼu nale ame̩ru Damaskus awa iko kʼolu awʼoji, achigili ugane̩ lile kwʼefojale muda lʼumi de.
Tak u leane̩, oñ u gbʼomu kʼi aka ñw mi kakini, So̩l, So̩l, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ doli mi?
Omi la dohi kakini, E̩ne̩ uwe̩ che, Ondu? Oñ i ka ñw mi kakini, Omi che Jisus abo Nazare̩t e-kʼuwe̩ adoli-wñ le.
Oñ abo ku ma jʼugbo mi ño̩ li ugane̩ le̩ ge̩, ma muda gbʼomu e̩ne̩ kʼi ko̩la ñw mi n.
Tak u kakini, Ondu, abʼu nache ke? Tak Ondu ka ñw mi kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ nyi Damaskus; o̩mo̩ taku ma akʼinabali e̩wñ du ku ma kojo̩ kʼe̩ che ñw e̩.
Oñ abu kʼomi ma gane̩ n noj ojima ugane̩ le̩, abo ku ma jʼugbo mi gwo̩nyʼumi o̩wo̩ tʼo̩gba alo, oñ u lewa Damaskus.
Tak Ananaius, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka kʼi akpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ tikpa o̩lo̩da, e̩ne̩ kʼamaJu du ku ma dodo o̩mo̩ agbʼo̩ ibenu,
lewa banʼomi, i kakini, So̩l, o̩maye-mi, chʼeju nyʼate̩. Tak auwa le̩ pitii omi chʼeju nyʼate̩ agʼowñ.
Tak i kakini, O̩jo̩ e-amata-wa mʼo̩wo̩ ko nʼuwe̩ oji tane̩ kʼe̩ ma e̩wñ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩, kʼe̩ la dʼeju dʼE̩no̩kpakpa le̩, kʼe̩ la gbo̩ omuko̩la kwʼef alu-wñ;
todabu kʼuwe̩ achʼe̩nibenu-wñ ugbo e̩wñ kʼe̩ li kpʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ gbo̩ ñw amone̩ du.
Fai e̩wñ e̩ de? Kwane̩ ku ma fʼuwe̩ che baptism, kʼe̩ fʼadure-we̩ gwe̩ rinyo̩, ekwado̩ e̩ nakwadʼodu-wñ.
Oñ abe̩le̩ abu kʼu mudabi nyi Je̩rusale̩m, kʼu la do̩mo̩ achadua ef unyi O̩jo̩, ane̩ ego lewa bʼumi ma,
tak u li abu kʼi aka ñw mi kakini, Hika che ke, kʼe̩ kwo Je̩rusale̩m alo piopio, todu ma je̩ gba ibenu kʼe̩ gba mi n.
Tak omi kakini, Ondu, ama chema ka kʼomi te̩te̩do̩mo amu abo ku ma ke̩do̩nʼuwe̩ ugbo du ef unyi unyi ujeju nyʼunyi uga agwo ma;
oñ e̩gba ku ma dʼe̩bie̩ Stifan e̩nibenu-we̩ le̩ dafo, omi onugo la dago o̩mo̩ aje̩nyu ñw ma, u la nʼe̩wñ o̩la abo ku ma kpa ade.
Tak i ka ñw mi kakini, Kwane̩ ule̩-we̩ ke, todabu kʼomi akpʼuwe̩ rʼabo uche̩ichi o̩najiji.
Oñ ma gbʼo̩ gbogbo wa kadʼo̩la kide̩, taku ma dʼomu-ma dago kakini, Mʼe̩ne̩ e̩go̩-i du bʼile̩ te̩! todu i dukpe̩ kʼi adeju n.
Abu ku ma la jʼef ukwa-i akwa, ku ma nakʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma ro̩ jʼane̩, ku ma nakwu ebutu rʼojale,
onu-ogu le̩ je̩ ñw ma rnʼowñ du gudu wʼef aku, i ka ku ma nʼedili gwili o̩la-wñ, todu kʼi ma e̩wñ ki chi ku ma kpogu rʼowñ oji abe̩le̩.
Ama e̩gba ku ma nʼe̩cha fʼu fa le̩, Po̩l ka ñw agboji uche̩ amisoja ogume̩lu kʼi dago o̩mo̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki chʼo̩mane̩ Rom ku ma ma kpʼo̩ abi n, o̩da aje̩ ñw ma ja edili?
Oñ abu kʼagboji uche̩ amisoja ogume̩lu le̩ gbo i nyʼugbo onu-ogu i muduka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ e̩ che̩ kʼe̩ che-ike? Todu omane̩ Rom oñ e̩ne̩-i che.
Tak onu-ogu lewa ka ñw u kakini, Ka ñw mi, uwe̩ chʼo̩mane̩ Rom? Oñ i kakini, Ii.
Oñ onu-ogu le̩ dohi kakini, O̩ko̩ lile oñ omi ne̩ fʼo̩da o̩mane̩ la. Taku Po̩l kakini, Ebi ma la bi omi.
Todule̩ abo ku ma che ku ma gwiii o̩la-wñ kwobʼo̩ te̩ ababa, tʼonu ogu le̩ ño̩ railo abu kʼi fʼu ma ka kʼo̩mane̩ Rom i che, kʼowñ la je̩ ñw ma fʼu ji.
Oñ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ abu kʼi neku kʼi ma o̩kpakpa-wñ e̩wñ ki chʼo̩la-wñ kʼamaju gwo̩nyʼu, i mʼowñ tu tane̩, tak i je̩ ñw amagboji amatama kpʼabo o̩hiala-ma du ku ma wajo̩, tak i mu Po̩l duwa ate̩ o̩gba-ma.
Taku Po̩l kejurʼabo̩hiala le̩ chii, i kakini, Amo̩maye-mi aboke̩le̩, omi te̩te̩do̩mo̩ ache e̩wñ-mi, akone̩ o̩la ki dʼe̩do̩-mi kpʼumi abi o̩gba O̩jo̩ n, gbogbo tʼojolu eñini-i.
Tak Ananaius, agboji amatama ñwa ñw abo ku ma dago kpenyʼu ku ma fʼo̩wo̩ fiʼo̩ alu.
E̩gbale̩ Po̩l ka ñw u kakini, O̩jo̩ ache kʼi fʼo̩wo̩ fiʼuwe̩, uwe̩ o̩do̩ ku ma dʼafu kurʼu! kʼuwe̩ la gugu kʼe̩ kajo̩ mi alu kʼo̩lo̩da ka, oñ e̩ je̩ ñw ma fʼo̩wo̩ fio̩ mi alu kʼo̩lo̩da ma ka n?
Tak abo ku ma dago kpenyʼu kakini, E̩ bʼagboji amatama ina?
Oñ Po̩l kakini, Amo̩maye-mi, u ma kʼagboji amatama de̩ n: Todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, E̩ ki kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ nyʼagboji amone̩-we̩ n.

Oñ abu ku Po̩l chema ka kʼo̩wo̩ʼka-ma che Sadiusi, kʼo̩wo̩ ekeji-ma la che Farisi, i kwa ef unyi o̩hiala le̩ kakini, Amo̩maye-mi, aboke̩le̩, omi che Farisi, o̩ma Farisi u che̩, tod o̩la ibekono kpʼo̩la e̩dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku oñ ma kajo̩-mi-i.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼe-kide̩ ka, i chʼaro̩ te̩ ñw amaFarisi kpʼamaSadiusi, tak ugwe̩ko̩ amone̩ le̩ kpe̩reji.
Todu amaSadiusi ka kʼudajikwane̩, tʼe-onuche̩ O̩jo̩, tʼe-afu do̩mo̩ n. AmaFarisi muda gbalu ka kʼejeji-wñ do̩mo̩.

Tak i mud ukwa lile lile jo̩, oñ abu kʼamako̩takada iche̩ka e-o̩wo̩ amaFarisi kwane̩ dago ma chane̩ ejuja kakini, A li e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du o̩la e̩ne̩ kide̩ n; iche̩wñ kʼafuʼka abe̩k onuche̩ O̩jo̩ ko̩la ñw u fa?
Oñ abu kʼi mud aro̩ lile jo̩ onu ogu kwodejiji tode̩gba ku ma fu Po̩l fana rinyo̩, i je̩ ñw amisoja mugwo̩ru nyʼo̩mo̩ ku ma mu Po̩l dinya kwʼalumeji ku ma mʼu du wʼef aku.
Oñ odu o̩jo̩ le̩ Ondu wa banʼowñ, oñ Ondu kakini, Fʼe̩do̩ ne̩, todu lu kʼe̩ gbibenu e̩wñ o̩la-mi Je̩rusale̩m nyo̩nyo̩ abe̩le̩ e̩ ñʼagba Rom chuu.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ muñwa, amaJu fʼalu-ma jo̩ ma fʼe̩bo̩ kpe nʼo̩la-ma ka ku ma aje̩ n, ma añmo̩ n, gbogbo tʼe̩gba ku ma fu Po̩l kpa.
Abo ku ma la jʼalu o̩la le̩ tʼone̩ o̩gbo̩ meji le.
Taku ma lewa ugbo amagboji amatama kpʼabogijo, ma kakini, A fʼe̩bo̩ kpe nʼo̩la-wa kakini, A dʼe̩wñ du chalu n gbogbo tʼe̩gba kʼa fu Po̩l kpa.
Todule̩ ame̩ kpʼabo̩hiala mʼinabali duwa ñw onu ogu fa-i kʼi mʼowñ du gwo̩ru wa ñw me̩ dabe̩ne̩ ku me̩ che kume̩ gwili e̩wñ o̩la-wñ o̩bio̩bie̩; o̩la-wa la che̩mu kʼa fʼu kpa o̩gba tak i me̩ro̩mo̩.
O̩ma o̩maye Po̩l onobule̩ muda gbo̩ ku ma kpala jʼanede-wñ, i lewa oñ i mugudu tef aku oñ i mʼu duka ñw Po̩l.
Taku Po̩l fʼagboji uche̩ amisoja ogume̩luʼka do̩ wa, kakini, E̩ mʼokolobia kide̩ du nyʼugbo onu ogu, todu i chenʼe̩wñ kʼi adu ka ñw u.
Todule̩ i mʼu du le tʼugbo onu ogu, oñ i kakini, Po̩l, e̩namu le̩, do̩ mi wʼugbo-wñ oñ i rodubo̩ mi kʼu mʼokolobia kide̩ du wʼugbo we̩, abu kʼi chenʼe̩wñ kʼi aka ñw e̩.
Tak onu ogu le̩ gwo̩nyʼu o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ʼka, i tʼowñ ene, kakini, O̩la e̩wñ e̩ ne̩ kʼe̩ duka ñw mi?
Oñ i kakini, AmaJu fʼalu jo̩ ku ma rodubʼe̩ todu kʼe̩ du Po̩l gwo̩ru nyʼunyi o̩hiala o̩na, dabe̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma agwili o̩la-wñ o̩bio̩bie̩ tule.

Todule̩ e̩ ki je̩ ñw ma gbʼe̩ ibe n, todu aboke̩le̩-ma ku ma kpala jo̩ anede owñ tʼo̩gbo̩ meji le; ma fʼe̩bo̩ kpe nʼo̩la-ma ka ku ma aje̩ n, ma añmo̩ n gbogbo tʼe̩gba ku ma mʼowñ du kpa; ma la fʼo̩la-ma mu fa-i, ma jʼaneju alu kʼuwe̩ aka ñw ma.
Todule̩ onu ogu ka ñw okolobia le̩ kakini, E̩ ki ka ñw e̩ne̩ du ka kʼe̩ mʼinabali kide̩ du ñw mi n, oñ i tʼo̩ no̩ kʼi lo.

Tak i fʼamagboji uche̩ amisoja ogume̩lu meji do̩ wʼugbo-wñ, i kakini, Me̩ je̩ ñw amisoja o̩gwo̩ko̩ kpʼamananya o̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩gwa kpʼabo ku ma nʼo̩kwo̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ fʼo̩la-ma mu anede agogo me̩la odu eñini ku ma le gbogbo nyi Se̩saria.
I ño̩ je̩ ñw ma tene ame̩la ku ma nʼadu todu ku ma du Po̩l tanʼo, ku ma nʼe̩ nyʼugbo Filiks igo̩bina e̩be̩bo̩.
Tak i fʼo̩takada ko̩; uwo̩li alu kʼo̩takada le̩ de̩ de̩-i kakini:
Klaudius Laisius tugbo igo̩bina Filiks e̩ne̩lile, agba;
amaJu fʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kide̩ mu, oñ ma che ku ma dʼu kpa, tak omi kpʼamisoja lewa bʼuma ma, oñ a bʼuma gba abu kʼu gbo̩ ka kʼo̩mane̩ Rom i che.
Oñ abu kʼu neku kʼu ma e̩wñ ki chʼofe o̩la ku ma kʼalu darʼowñ o̩la, u mʼu du gwo̩ru tef unyi amo̩hiala-ma:
oñ u li ka kʼalu ku ma ko darʼowñ o̩la i chʼugbo ene e-o̩lo̩da-ma, ama udajo̩-ma nʼe̩wñ du ki bʼuku kpʼeji jo̩ n.
Ama abu ku ma mʼoji o̩la kʼamaJu ñwa nyʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩-i ku ma tene echʼo du ka ñw mi, e̩re̩re̩ le̩, u mʼu du kpuche̩ wʼugbo we̩, oñ u ka kʼabo ku ma gwajo̩ nʼowñ ku ma kʼo̩la-ma kpʼowñ o̩gba-we̩.
Todule̩ amisoja mu Po̩l du alu ku ma ñwa ñw ma le̩, oñ ma mʼu du nyi Anripatris odu.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ ma la je̩ ñw amananya le̩ mʼowñ du le oñ abo ki bo̩ mudabi tef aku.
Tak abo le̩ mugudu tef ewo Se̩saria, oñ ma dʼo̩takada le̩ ñw igo̩bina, ma ño̩ mu Po̩l du ñw u.
Tak abu kʼi fʼo̩takada le̩ kalata kʼi la tene ojane̩ ugbo kʼi kwo kʼi la fʼili-wñ gwa ka kʼi kwo Silisia,
i kakini, Nagbʼo̩la-we̩ nyane̩ e̩gba du kʼabo ku ma gwajo̩ nʼuwe̩ lewa. Tak i je̩ ñw ma dʼu tefu Praito̩rium e-He̩ro̩d ku ma dide owñ.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ me̩lu jo̩ Ananaius agboji amatama le̩ kpʼabogijo manyʼe̩ne̩ kʼi chʼo̩ka o̩la ekaʼka ku ma dʼo̩ ko̩ Tertulus lewa, taku ma fʼo̩la akpabie̩ Po̩l ka ñw Igo̩bina le̩ pee.
Abu ku ma la fu Tertulus do̩ wa, i chane̩ egwajo̩ nʼo kakini:
a yo̩ ef e̩wñ du ugbo du oñ ugwa-wñ a du ñw e̩.
Ama kʼomi kʼu we edʼuwe̩ hi ololo, narodubʼe̩, uwe̩ e̩ne̩ yo̩o̩, kʼe̩ gbʼo̩la-wa kpiniki.
Todu a fʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩-i li, abu kʼi chʼe̩nañwahia kʼi anyʼuja ef amaJu ugbo du kʼone̩ te̩ kade, kʼi ño̩ chʼe̩nuto̩gba uche̩ e-abo Nazare̩t ki che̩date̩ le̩.
I ño̩ che kʼi fʼunyi O̩jo̩ bie̩, tak a gwo̩nyʼu. [Oñ i dʼuwa e̩do̩ kʼa kajo̩-wñ tikpa o̩lo̩da-wa,
ama Laisius, onu ogu le̩, lewa gwo̩ko tʼuwa o̩la, oñ I mʼu gba kpʼukpahiu bʼuwa o̩wo̩ te̩,
tak i je̩ ñw abo ku ma gwajo̩ nʼowñ ku ma wʼo̩gba we̩-i.] Uwe̩ onugo neke gwili o̩la-wñ kʼe̩ mʼofe ajo̩ kʼa gwunʼo ogbolo.
Tak amaJu ño̩ fʼalu de nyʼu manyʼu, ma kakini, Abe̩le̩ e̩wñ-i de̩.
Oñ abu kʼigo̩bina le̩ nʼo̩wo̩ do̩ kʼi ko̩la, Po̩l kakini.
Uwe̩ neke ama kakini, I tʼo̩jo̩ me̩gweji le kʼu te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m adojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩ n.
I chaka chʼef unyi O̩jo̩, ma la li mi ef iñwa eje̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ du n, abe̩k e̩kʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ wa jo̩, tʼe-ef unyi ujeju, tʼe-ef ewo le̩.
E̩wñ ku ma la gwajo̩ nʼumi fa-i ma neke nʼijali-wñ ugbo we̩ n.
E-kʼu muda gbalu-wñ ñw e̩ de̩ kakini, Ugbo o̩la O̩na ku ma do̩ ko̩ uche̩ ki che̩date̩ le̩, abe̩le̩ nache O̩jo̩ e-amata-wa, nadʼo̩la e̩wñ du ku ma ko̩tane̩ ef o̩lo̩da kpʼef amakache̩ rʼochochi;
u chenʼibe ekono O̩jo̩ e-kʼama onugo ño̩ gba kakini, Uda-iikwane̩ e-abo̩kpakpa kpʼe-ame̩nuji ado̩mo̩.
Ef e-kide̩ nafejude̩kpa e̩gba du kʼakone̩ o̩la ki dʼef umi ki we edʼo̩la bi umi ugbo e̩wñ O̩jo̩ kpʼugbo amone̩.
Oñ abu kʼo̩do̩ wewe muda, u lewa kʼu mʼele ejumomi kowa ñw abo ichi-mi, kpʼe̩wñ ku ma ko wa ñw O̩jo̩.
Ef e-le̩ ma fʼumi li ef unyi O̩jo̩, o̩la-mi la chʼe̩gwo̩ rinyo̩, o̩wo̩ amone̩ abe̩k ekuku la jʼugbo mi n;
chai amaJu iche̩ka ku ma kwo Esia wa. Ma nʼo̩la kpʼomi, i dukpe̩ kʼeju abo le̩ ki dane̩ o̩gba-we̩ ku ma gwajo̩ nʼumi;
cho̩kpo̩ni abo-i ki naka e̩wñ uji ku ma li ugbo mi abu kʼu dago o̩gba abo̩hiala-i,
abe̩k ukomu ukwa kate kʼu kwa alu kʼu dago ef uma le̩ kakini, Todu o̩la udajikwane̩ e-abo ki ku oñ ma kajo̩ kpʼomi o̩gba-we̩ eñini.
Ama abu ku Filiks cheli o̩pio̩o̩ o̩la O̩na le̩ tule i fʼe̩ya kpʼo̩la-ma kakini, E̩gba du ku Laisius, onu ogu le̩, gwo̩ru wa nafʼoji e̩wñ-me̩ le̩ kpa.
Tak i ñwa ñw agboji amisoja ogume̩lu le̩ kʼi dejute̩ Po̩l kʼi muda bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ñw u, kʼe̩ne̩ du ki we̩ ekpo̩na nyʼabo-wñ ku ma we̩ ewa che e̩wñ ñw u n.
Oñ abu ku ma nʼo̩jo̩ je̩ pe̩ Filiks kpʼo̩ya-wñ Drisila, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ Ju, lewa, oñ i kpʼone̩ do̩ Po̩l, tak i gbʼo̩la-wñ ugbo o̩la e̩do̩ ekono ki dʼefu Kraisti Jisus.
Oñ abu kʼi aka o̩la o̩kpakpa rʼuma eju kpʼo̩la efʼo̩wo̩ mʼo̩la ne̩ kpʼo̩la ajo̩ ki ache ki wa, Filiks kwo railo, oñ i dohi kakini, Lo fai ta; u la fʼo̩wo̩ li nadʼuwe̩.
Ibe-wñ laño̩ tʼo̩ko̩ kʼi do̩ ku Po̩l adu ñw u je̩. Todule̩ i ño̩ kpʼone̩ adʼowñ kʼi bʼo̩ choluka o̩gbe̩nugbe̩.
Ama abu kʼo̩do̩ meji muda Po̩rtius Fe̩stus gba e̩gu Filiks je̩; oñ abu ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼamaju ki li owñ eju Filiks tu Po̩l no̩ oj agba o̩mo̩.
Todule̩ abu ku Fe̩stus lewa ojane̩ le̩, i fʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta je̩ tak i mute̩gu kwo Se̩saria nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ amagboji amatama kpʼamagboji amaJu mʼo̩la Po̩l du tejugede ñw u oñ ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩,
ma biʼu kʼi lʼuma eju ugbo owñ, todu kʼi fʼone̩ kpe̩ adʼo̩ wa Je̩rusale̩m, ma che ku ma kpala jʼej o̩na ku ma fʼu kpa.
Todule̩ Fe̩stus dohi ka kʼama jʼadejute̩ Po̩l Se̩saria, kʼowñ onugo ache kʼi nyʼo̩mo̩ piopio.
Oñ i kakini, Todule̩ abo ukpahiu ki jʼef ume̩ ki nagwo̩ru lebʼumi; iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñʼka dʼef e̩ne̩ke̩le̩-i ki ma chʼeju-wñ n, mak ama ki gwajo̩ nʼowñ o̩mo̩.
Oñ abu kʼi kpo̩kpe̩ ef uma i tʼo̩jo̩ me̩jo̩ kpʼe̩gwa le n, i gwo̩ru nyi Se̩saria; o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ i kwogugu o̩gba e̩de̩, i je̩ ñw ma du Po̩l wa.
Oñ abu kʼi lewa, amaJu ku ma gwo̩ru kwo Je̩rusale̩m wa donyʼu daka, oñ ma nʼo̩la ki woji wewe e-ku ma ma nʼijali ef uwñ n wa agwunyʼu.
Po̩l kʼomu e-wñ i kakini, Tʼo̩lo̩da amaJu tʼunyi O̩jo̩, tu Sisa u la tʼadure e̩wñ-ma du n.
Ama abu ki du Fe̩stus e̩do̩ kʼamaJu ku ma li owñ eju, i dohi ñw Po̩l kakini, I dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m ku me̩ fʼajo̩ e̩wñ-i ka o̩gba-mi o̩mo̩?
Ama Po̩l kakini, Sisa nʼo̩da o̩gba e̩de̩ kʼu dago-i, ugbo ki dukpe̩ ku ma la kajo̩-mi la de̩, u chʼamaJu e̩bie̩ne̩ du n, alu kʼuwe̩ onugo chema nyo̩nyo̩.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼu fʼe̩wñ ujiʼka che kʼi chebʼuku, jo̩, nako̩ eku n. I muda che̩wñ ki ma nʼe̩wñ kpaka ef ajo̩ ku ma gwunʼomi n, e̩ne̩ du neke du mi ñw ma n. Nachʼapili nyʼo̩gba Sisa.
E̩gbale̩ Fe̩stus ko̩la kpʼabo̩hiala tak i dohi kakini, E̩ chʼapili nyʼugbo Sisa me̩, mak ugbo Sisa e̩ nyi ke.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ jo̩ pe̩e̩, Agripa kʼi chʼonu kpai Bernise lewa Se̩saria agwa Fe̩stus.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ ku ma ño̩ kpo̩kpe̩ o̩mo̩ chewewe Fe̩stus mʼo̩la Po̩l le̩ du ka ñw onu le̩, kakini, E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ʼka do̩mo̩ ku Filiks to̩no̩ tʼoj agba,
e-kʼamagboji amatama kpʼabogijo amaJu dʼo̩la-wñ tejugede ñw mi e̩gba kʼu de̩ Je̩rusale̩m, ma rodubʼumi kʼu kpʼo̩ abi.
Oñ u dohi ñw ma kakini, I chʼe̩wñ italigba abo Rom ku ma dʼone̩ ñw ma o̩gba tak eju e̩ne̩ ku ma gwajo̩ nʼo kpʼabo ku ma gwunʼo de kʼi la li uña kʼi kʼomu-wñ ugbo o̩la ku ma du dajo̩ n.
Todule̩ abu ku ma lewa jo̩ emi, u che̩du n, ama o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ u kwogugu o̩gba e̩de̩, oñ u je̩ ñw ma dʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ wa.
E̩gba kʼabo ku ma gwajo nʼo kwodago jo̩, ma dʼo̩la e̩wñ bibi du alu kʼomi do̩ gwunʼo n;
chai ene ene iche̩ka ugbo e̩wñ O̩jo̩ e-ma, kpʼo̩la Jisus oka e-kʼi leku, e-ku Po̩l ka kʼi deju.
Oñ abu kʼomi ma mʼo̩na ohi ene e̩gʼe-le̩ n, u tʼe ene iche̩wñ kʼi neku enyi Je̩rusale̩m, ku ma fʼajo̩ e̩wñ-i ka o̩mo̩.
Ama abu ku Po̩l fʼapili che ku ma dejutʼo̩ kʼAgustus kʼi fʼoji o̩la-wñ kpa, u je̩ ñw ma dejutʼo̩ gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼu dʼu kpuche̩ nyʼugbo Sisa.
Tak Agripa ka ñw Fe̩stus kakini, Omi onugo ño̩ neku egbʼo̩la e̩ne̩ le̩. Oñ i kakini, O̩na, e̩ gbʼo̩la-wñ.
Todule̩ o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ Agripa kpai Bernise kʼe̩wñ ijaga inaina nyʼo̩la wʼo̩mo̩, oñ abu kʼama kpʼamonu ogu kpʼamaguchi aguchi ewo le̩ mugudu tef o̩gba taku Fe̩stus je̩ ñw ma du Po̩l wa.

Oñ Fe̩stus kakini, Onu Agripa kpʼaboke̩le̩ du ku me̩ jʼugbo wa emi, me̩ gʼe̩ne̩-i ekʼugwe̩ko̩ amaJu chaka chologu bʼumi Je̩rusale̩m kpʼemi ge̩, ma kpogu rʼo oji, ka kʼi dukpe̩ kʼi adeju nyo̩gba ge̩ n.
Omi muda li e̩wñ du kʼi che ki bʼuku jo̩ n; oñ abu kʼowñ onugo chʼapili nyʼo̩gba Agustus, mak oji e-mi kʼu li de̩, nadʼu kpuche̩ nyʼo̩mo̩.
I nʼe̩wñ o̩kpaka ef o̩la-wñ kʼu nako̩ rʼodu-mi n, todule̩ oñ u mʼowñ du wʼo̩gba-me̩, ama o̩gba e-we̩ Onu Agripa chʼogbolo-wñ, todu kʼawa ki gwili o̩la-wñ kʼu nʼe̩wñ kʼu nadu ko̩ rʼu.
Todu e̩namu edu nyʼo̩gba kʼomi ma jiwe e̩wñ ki chi n, o̩la idada i che eju-mi.
Tak Agripa ka ñw Po̩l kakini, Ma je̩ kʼe̩ kʼo̩la-we̩ me̩. E̩gbale̩ Po̩l nʼo̩wo̩-wñ dala, oñ i fʼomu o̩la-wñ ka kakini.
U gbede eju o̩la-mi, Onu Agripa, abu kʼu nache kʼu kʼomu o̩la-mi o̩gba-we̩ eñini-i ugbo e̩wñ du kʼamaJu agwajo̩ nʼumi-i.
Okpoko-wñ che todabu kʼuwe̩ chʼo̩ka ugbo e̩wñ italigba amaJu kpʼene-ma. Lef e-le̩ oñ narodubʼe̩ kʼe̩ fʼe̩do̩ je̩ kʼe̩ gbʼo̩la-mi nyʼane̩.
Todule̩ amaJu du chema alu kʼali-mi de̩ akwʼo̩jo̩ imo̩to̩ okolobia-mi abu kʼu te̩te̩dʼef abo ichi-mi Je̩rusale̩m kwʼabakwane̩,
abu ku ma te̩te̩ma mi kwʼejodudu i dʼuma e̩do̩ ma neke gba mi ibenu kakini, U do̩mo̩ ache teju e̩wñ uche̩ ki date̩ ki ache teju o̩lO̩jo̩ e-wa tʼuma le, e̩ne̩ Farisi u che.
Fa-i todu ibe kʼu kono e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ katane̩ ñw amata-wa le̩ oñ u dago emi kʼu ma kajo̩-mi;
e-le̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼamo̩lo̩pu-wa me̩gweji kibeno ku ma feju kparu e̩wñ O̩jo̩ eche tʼodu tʼo̩ro̩ka, ku ma tʼugbo-wñ. Todu o̩la ukibeno kide̩ oñ amaJu jʼagwajo̩ nʼumi, Onu.
Iche̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ ako abo ki ku kwane̩ fa, e̩wñ chi kʼame̩ ñwa ka kʼi che̩wñ ku ma ke̩do̩no de̩ n?
Omi onugo ño̩ do̩ kʼi dukpe̩ kʼu che e̩wñ akpabie̩ odu Jisus e̩ne̩ Nazare̩t le̩ nana.
Abe̩le̩ u la che Je̩rusale̩m, oñ u fʼabo kiafo̩ wewe dahi jʼef unyi uga, abu kʼu gba o̩da le̩ ugbo amagboji amatama; oñ abo ku ma jʼakpa u ño̩ dalunyu ma.
O̩gbe̩nugbe̩ ef unyi ujeju du u rʼuma ailo-wñ, u kute̩ ma ku ma chakpabie̩ O̩jo̩ tila, abu kʼo̩fu-ma kwane̩ ef e̩do̩-mi, u doli ma gbogbo nyʼef ewo ewo o̩najiji.
Ule̩ Damaskus le̩ u dʼef uwñ kpʼo̩da kpʼuko̩lo̩ eche e-kʼamagboji amatama du tef o̩wo̩-mi.
Ej o̩na le̩ o̩ro̩ka gbaa, Onu, u li ugane̩ ki abʼeju je̩ tʼolu le ki da Tumi kpʼabo ku ma nyʼule̩ kpʼomi daka.
Oñ abu kʼo̩chaka-wa lewane̩ u gbo̩ omuko̩la kʼi ako̩la ñw mi alu Hibru, kakini, So̩l, So̩l, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ doli mi? Erʼe̩re̩ dʼe̩wñ ku ma du gwunyʼuwe̩-i chegbiti.
Tak omi kakini, E̩ne̩ uwe̩ che, Ondu? Oñ Ondu kakini, Omi che Jisus kʼuwe̩ adoli-wñ le̩.
Kwane̩ kʼe̩ dago e̩re̩-we̩; todu kʼu kwotejugede ñw e̩ le̩ de̩, todu kʼu dʼo̩wo̩ kadʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ chʼimo̩to̩ uko̩lo̩ kpʼe̩nibenu e̩wñ kʼe̩ li kpʼe̩wñ kʼomi ñʼadʼo̩la-mi tejugede ñw e̩ ef uwñ ge̩.
Nagbʼe̩ ugbo amone̩-i kpʼugbo abo uche̩ichi kʼomi akpʼuwe̩ nyʼugbo ma,
kʼe̩ mʼuma eju chi kʼama ki rida kwef e̩chubi tef ugane̩ kpai kwef o̩da Setan tugbo O̩jo̩, ku ma gba utʼadure no̩ kpʼukpe̩ e̩wñ ogu ef abo ku ma fo̩ lugbo e̩do̩ ekono ki dʼef umi.
Akwʼugbo kide̩, Onu Agripa, u ko̩ egbʼo̩la ane̩ ego e-efojale le̩ gbo̩ n.
Ama u mudu ka ñw abo Damaskus ejodudu, kpʼabo Je̩rusale̩m kpʼabo ane̩ Judia chaka, kpʼabo uche̩ichi ka ku ma ki ribeda ku ma laño̩ rida abʼO̩jo̩ ku ma nʼuko̩lo̩ ki chʼeju ibe erida ache.
Tod e-kide̩ amaJu fʼumi mu ef unyi O̩jo̩ oñ ma chʼajama ekpa mi.
Todule̩ abu kʼu wa chʼef ate̩-ko̩ kʼi kwʼugbo O̩jo̩, edago nadago gbogbo wʼeñini kide̩, agbibenu ugbo imo̩to̩ kpʼogijo, naka e̩wñ ojoji du tʼe-kʼamakache̩ kpai Mose̩s ka kʼi ache kʼi wa le le n.
Abe̩ku Kraisti ali o̩pe̩cha kʼowñ ki dʼuche̩ ugane̩ kpogo ñw amone̩-i kpʼabo uche̩ichi ejodudu kwef udajikwane̩ e-abo ki ku.
Oñ abu kʼi nʼomu-wñ aka abe̩i Fe̩stus dʼomu dago kakini, Po̩l, e̩ himu; o̩takada kʼe̩ ko̩che̩ ololo le̩ agwʼe̩ imu.
Ama Po̩l kakini, Fe̩stus, e̩ne̩lile, u himu no; chai uko̩la e-ochochi kpʼe-ibe ki wane̩ akwʼef alu-mi dufu-i.
Tod onu chema o̩foo e̩wñ-i, oñ nanʼeju-e̩gbo ko̩la ñw u-i; Todu e̩do̩-mi mugba kakini, E̩wñ-i du maja ñw u n, todu ma che e̩wñ-i adakeli n.
Onu Agripa, e̩ dʼo̩la amakache̩ rʼochochi? U chema kʼe̩ do̩ rʼochochi.
Oñ Agripa ka ñw Po̩l kakini, Ef e̩wñ re oñ e̩ gbʼumi ibe kʼu mud e̩ne̩ Kraist.
Oñ Po̩l kakini, O O̩jo̩! i rʼumi e̩do̩ dagba i chʼef e̩wñ re dagba ki chʼef e̩wñ nana kʼi chʼuwe̩ kate n chai kʼabo du ku ma jʼagbʼo̩la-mi eñini kide̩ ku ma dʼalu kʼomi de̩, mak agba-i kate.
Tak onu kpʼigo̩bina kpai Be̩mise kpʼabo ku ma gugu ugbo ma kwane̩.
Oñ abu ku ma le tʼo̩wo̩ʼka ma ko̩la ñw o̩la-ma kakini, One̩ kide̩ che e̩wñ du ki bʼuku kpʼagba jo̩ n.
Oñ Agripa ka ñw Fe̩stus kakini, E̩ne̩-i ma chʼapili nyʼo̩gba Sisa n e̩ ma neke tʼo̩ no̩ tane̩.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼoji-wñ kpa ka kʼawa ki tʼo̩ko̩ alo tʼItali, ma mu Po̩l kpʼame̩namu omune̩ iche̩ka ko̩ ñw agboji amisoja ogume̩lu kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Julius. Uche̩ amisoja ku ma de Augustus i che.
Oñ abu kʼawa kwotʼo̩ko̩ e-Adramaitium kʼi ache kʼi dabʼane̩ Esia lʼugbo ku ma dʼo̩ko̩ mʼane̩ mʼane̩ jo̩, a mʼo̩ko̩ du kwane̩ alo, Aristarkus, e̩ne̩ Masidoniaʼka e-Te̩se̩lonaika la dʼugbo wa.
O̩jo̩ñwa-wñ a lewa mʼane̩ Saido̩n; Julius la bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ñw Po̩l, i je̩ ñw u nyʼugbo amonuku-wñ ku ma dejutʼo̩.
Akwʼo̩mo̩ a kwo̩tʼo̩ko̩ oñ a lʼe̩do̩ omi o̩gane̩ Saipro̩s todabu kʼafu ma je̩ ñw a n.
Oñ abu kʼa mudaba omi-omu e̩-Silisia kpai Pamfilia a lewa Maira, ane̩ Lisia.
Tak abu kʼagboji amisoja ogume̩lu le̩ fʼo̩ko̩ Ale̩kisandria kʼi anyʼItali li i je̩ ñw a tʼo̩.
Oñ a le ye̩ye̩ o̩jo̩ ki ma nʼaluka n, akanya i che tak a lewa odenideni Knidus todabu kʼafu ma je̩ ñw a n, a gwʼo̩ko̩ lʼo̩gane̩ Krit ame̩ru Salmoni;
akanya i che tak a le iba iba-wñ oñ a lewa ugbo ku ma do̩ ko̩ O̩gbe̩ga-O̩me̩me̩le̩. Ewo Lasea me̩ru o̩mo̩.
Oñ abu kʼa fʼiko kpabie̩ o̩mo̩ nana kʼule̩-wa lewa iko kʼule̩ ej omi abailo, todabu kʼiko alu eji lale me̩, Po̩l juka ñw ma kakini,
Aboke̩le̩, u cheli, ka kʼule̩-wa-i ache kʼi chʼe̩wñ ekpabie̩ kpʼofu ugbo adu kpʼo̩ko̩ kate n ama ugbo onugo e-wa ge̩.
E̩do̩ agboji amisoja ogume̩lu le̩ muda gba o̩la e̩ne̩ ki añʼo̩ko̩ o̩na kpʼodu o̩ko̩ tʼo̩la ku Po̩l ka le.

Oñ abu kʼo̩gbe̩ga kide̩ ma nyo̩ ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ iko afu-o̩we̩ n, ojile-ma lo̩la ku ma gwʼo̩ko̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ alo, ukani i nʼalu ku ma le ku ma neke wa mʼane̩ Finiks, kʼi chʼo̩gbe̩gaʼka ane̩ Krit kʼi kpejurʼo̩go̩go̩ olane̩ kpʼolodudu ku ma gu o̩mo̩ kʼiko afu o̩we̩ ki lale.
Ama abu kʼafu aju kwʼo̩gane̩ pe̩ pe̩ pe̩, ma do̩ kʼe̩wñ ku ma Awʼibe-wñ le̩ lewʼo̩wo̩-ma me̩, ma mʼugbo o̩ko̩ chi kwane̩ oñ ma gwa lʼiba iba adabo Krit jo̩.
Ama i la kpo̩kpe̩ n tak afu inaina ku ma do̩ Euroklaido̩n lewa ju bʼumama:
oñ abu kʼi gwo̩nyʼo̩ko̩, ku ma ma neke kpejurʼafu ge̩ n, ma tʼo̩ no̩ ñw afu oñ i mʼuwa du alo.
Oñ abu kʼa le o̩wo̩ o̩gane̩ ala kekele ku ma dʼo̩ Klauda, akanya i che tak a gwo̩nyʼo̩ma o̩ko̩-wñ.
Oñ abu ku ma mʼu du ma mʼe̩wñ kʼi ate̩ko ma ko oñ ma mʼu du le ofe o̩ko̩ awenyʼu, tak abu ku ma railo tode̩gba ku ma ma ugbo e̩lanyi Sirtis, ma tʼe̩wñ ugwa o̩ko̩ no̩ wane̩, abe̩le̩ afu mʼuma ko le.
Ama abu kʼafu ibi le̩ gwo̩nyʼuwa tabale, o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ ina chane̩ ekʼadu rinyo̩.
Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta ma nʼo̩wo̩-ma onugo kʼane̩ o̩la o̩ko̩ rinyo̩.
Oñ o̩jo̩ kʼolu kpʼawo dufu chewewe, kʼafu ibi kʼi bʼuwa ma ma chʼafu ke̩ke̩ n, ibe kʼa kono ka ku ma ajadu wa i kwo bʼuwa efu te̩ chaka.

I la kpo̩kpe̩ kʼo̩je̩ kad e̩ne̩ du alu me̩, taku Po̩l kwodago alumeji-ma, i kakini, Aboke̩le̩, i dukpe̩ ku me̩ ma gbʼo̩la-mi gbo̩, ku me̩ we etʼo̩ko̩ Krit alo kʼe̩wñ ekpabie̩ kide̩ kpʼofu ma che me̩ n.
Ama fa-i nadʼibe ñw me̩ ka kʼame̩ ki nʼe̩do̩, todu onugo e̩ne̩ du alenyo̩ ef ume̩ n, chai o̩ko̩ kate.
Todu onuche̩ O̩jo̩ ki ne̩ mi e-kʼu nache dago kpenyʼumi odu eñini-i;
i ka ñw mi kakini, Po̩l, e̩ ki railo n; uwe̩ adago o̩gba Sisa chuu: go, O̩jo̩ ño̩ mʼabo ku ma jʼef o̩ko̩-i kpʼuwe̩ ko chʼuwe̩ ele.
Lef e-kide̩ aboke̩le̩, me̩ fʼe̩do̩ ne̩ ke, todu nake̩do̩nʼO̩jo̩ kakini, Alu kʼi ka ñw mi le̩, abe̩le̩ i ade̩.
Awa muda awa abʼalaʼka ma tila.
Ama abu kʼodu e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩-wñ lewa kʼafu ako wa tʼemi tʼemi ef omi Adria, ame̩ru alumeji odu amagwo̩ko̩ nʼibe ka kʼama me̩ru ane̩ʼka me̩.
Taku ma fʼunefu omi le̩ ñwa oñ ma li ka kʼi chʼo̩gba one̩ ogu, taku ma le tʼo̩gba pe̩, ma ño̩ dabi ñwa ma li ka kʼi chʼo̩gba one̩ me̩gwe̩lu.
Oñ abu kʼa railo tode̩gba kʼa awa nʼokuta ma mʼanga me̩le̩ ko lʼo̩kpu o̩ko̩ tef omi, ma gule kʼo̩jo̩ ki hika ñwa.
Ama abu kʼamagwo̩ko̩ feju ku ma ra kwef o̩ko̩, ku ma tʼo̩ko̩ e-kekele no̩ wane̩ tef ohimini, ma chukpa dabe̩ne̩ ku ma che ku ma dʼanga lʼo̩gba o̩ko̩ tef omi.
Po̩l ka ñw agboji amisoja ogume̩lu le̩ kpʼamisoja onugo kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼabo-i ma jo̩ ef o̩ko̩ ye̩e̩ n, ma neke jadu me̩ n.
E̩gbale̩ amisoja mʼiku o̩ko̩ kekele le̩ ko̩da rinyo̩, oñ ma tʼo̩ no̩ kʼi wane̩.
Oñ abu kʼo̩jo̩ ache ki ñwa, Po̩l dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw ma kʼo̩chaka-ma ki jʼuje̩wñ; i kakini, Eñini-i chʼo̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gwe̩le̩ ku me̩ jʼef ide ede, ku me̩ ma je̩ e̩wñ du n.
Tod e-kide̩ narodubʼume̩ ku me̩ gbʼuje̩wñ ku me̩ je̩, tod e-kide̩ dʼef ujadu o̩la-me̩, todu iloji okate alenyo̩ kwʼoji e̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ n.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼe-kide̩ ka kʼi laño̩ mʼakala gba, i fʼO̩jo̩ gwa eju-ma chaka, oñ abu kʼi mʼu bu i chane̩ eje̩.
Tak abu kʼe̩do̩-ma chaka lewane̩, ama ño̩ mʼuje̩wñ gba ge̩.
O̩chaka-wa kʼa la jʼef o̩ko̩ le̩ chʼonugo, one̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼe̩te̩gwa nyoke me̩fa.
Oñ abu kʼuje̩wñ bʼuma jo̩ ma bʼadu o̩ko̩ wane̩, ma kʼo̩ka rikpolo nyʼef ohimini.
Tak e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ muñwa ma mejuma ane̩ kide̩ n; ma muda fʼako-wñ oka li e-kʼi nʼe̩lanyi, taku ma ne̩ku iche̩wñ kʼi jʼache ku ma dʼo̩ko̩ wa mane̩ o̩mo̩.
Taku ma fʼanga-ma ko̩da ma tʼo̩ no̩ jʼef ohimini, e̩gbakate le̩ ma mʼiku oche ki aña o̩ko̩ o̩na bulo̩, ma mu lemo̩ e-o̩gba du nyate̩ ñw afu, ma mʼo̩wo̩ etʼo̩ba du.
Ama abu ku ma lewa ade ohimini meji, ma fʼo̩ko̩ gwa jʼamane̩; tak abu kʼo̩gba-wñ fʼane̩ mu i kwogugu i chiche̩ ge̩ n, ama uwe̩do̩ akpoli mʼo̩kpu o̩ko̩ guche̩.
Oñ amisoja neku todu ku ma ki fʼame̩namu kpa, tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du ef uma agwʼomi kʼi ara.
Agboji amiso̩ja ogume̩lu le̩ muda neku kʼi fu Po̩l jadu i fʼo̩na kpanyʼibe ku ma lo le̩; oñ i je̩ ñw abo ku ma meju egwʼomi ku ma kʼo̩la-ma ro̩ rʼomi ku ma nyʼane̩pe̩te̩ ejodudu.
Tak abo ki bo̩, iche̩ka-ma jʼoj akatakpo, iche̩ka la jʼoj e̩wñ ki kwʼef o̩ko̩, abe̩le̩ ma fʼo̩chaka-ma jadu rʼane̩.
Oñ abu kʼa mufu tane̩ e̩gbale̩ tak a ma ka ku ma do̩ ala le̩ ko̩ Me̩lita.
Tak eche̩do̩ kʼamakagudo̩gudo̩ o̩mo̩ che̩do̩ wa i chʼibe̩te̩ n; todu ma fʼuna ko, oñ ma mʼo̩chaka-wa gbanyi, tod omi ki alo̩ kpʼafu ki akpa.
Oñ abu ku Po̩l mʼotiji ya jo̩ kʼi ako nyʼuna, olijoʼka kwʼef uwñ tod una ki kpa nyʼo̩la oñ i kwomanyʼo̩wo̩-wñ.
Oñ abu kʼamakagudo̩gudo̩ le̩ li e̩la e̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ abu kʼi lo̩ko̩li o̩wo̩-wñ, ma ka ñw o̩la-ma kakini, I chʼomune̩ n, akpone̩ e̩ne̩-i che, dagba ma fu jadu kwʼef ohimini, o̩kpakpa aje̩ ñw u adeju n.
Tak i fʼe̩la e̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ miejo tef una, i la chʼo e̩bie̩ne̩ du n.
Ama ma jʼaneju e̩gba kʼi awu abe̩k i aleane̩ achigili kʼi aku, ama abu ku ma jʼaneju gbogbogbo ku ma li kʼe̩wñ du ma chʼo n, ma mʼalu-ma rida oñ ma ka kʼo̩jo̩ʼka de̩.
Ame̩ru o̩wo̩ o̩mo̩ le̩ ane̩ uche̩ e̩nuto̩gba ala le̩ de̩, odu e̩ne̩ le̩ ko̩ Publius; i mʼuwa gba ru unyi-wñ ache̩-do̩ wa o̩jo̩ me̩ta.
Oñ abe̩le̩, ata Publius dachi, afu kpʼatini mʼowñ ne̩ gaga. Po̩l mugudu nyʼugbo-wñ, oñ i fʼadua che oñ i mʼo̩wo̩-wñ du nʼo, i fʼo̩ga-wñ che kpa.
Tak abu kʼe-le̩ wache, abo ku ma nʼe̩gbo o̩la kibo̩ ef ala le̩ lewa, oñ i fʼo̩ga-ma che.
Abo le̩ ño̩ bumo̩ wa nana tak e̩gba kʼa tʼo̩ko̩ alo ma mʼe̩wñ kʼeku-wñ aku wa ko ñw a.
Oñ abu kʼochu-wñ jo̩ e̩ta, a kwotʼo̩ko̩ e-Ale̩kisandria e-kʼi jʼo̩jo̩ uwo ugbo ala le̩, e̩wñ ujiwe o̩ko̩ le̩ che Ukpejima.
Tak abu kʼe-le̩ mʼuwa ko wa Sarakius a gugu o̩mo̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta.
Akwʼo̩mo̩ a dagbala wa Re̩ge̩um; oñ a fʼoluʼka le̩, tak afu chane̩ eju kwʼo̩pata o̩gane̩, oñ o̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ a lewa Puteoli.
Oñ abu kʼa fʼamo̩maye li o̩mo̩, ma rodubʼuwa kʼa bʼuma gugu o̩jo̩ mebie. Abe̩le̩ tak a lewa Rom.
Abu kʼamo̩maye le̩ gbʼinabali-wa ma kwʼo̩mo̩ ledo wa gbogbo wa Aja Apius, kpʼUto̩je̩ Me̩ta; abu ku Po̩l fejudo ma, i fʼO̩jo̩ gwa, oñ i fʼe̩do̩ ne̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼa mugudu tef ewo Rom agboji amisoja ogume̩lu le̩ je̩ ñw Po̩l kʼi gugu e-wñ ojoji kpʼisoja kʼi adide owñ.

Oñ i leatu e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta jo̩ i fʼabo ku ma chʼamuto̩gba ef amaJu do̩ wa jʼugboʼkate; oñ abu ku ma lewa jo̩ i ka ñw ma kakini, Amo̩maye-mi aboke̩le̩, abu kʼomi ma chaka chʼe̩wñ du agwunyʼamone̩-wa kpʼe̩wñ o̩gu amata-wa n, oj agba u de̩ kwo Je̩rusale̩m oñ ma dʼumi ñw abo Rom.
Abo le̩ fʼili ajo-mi gwa, ma la neku etʼumi no̩, todabu kʼe̩wñ du kʼu che ku ma du mi kpa ma dʼef umi n.
Ama abu kʼamaJu mʼubi dagbʼe-le̩, i mud otila ñw mi kʼu chʼapili nyʼo̩gba Sisa; i cheka kʼomi nʼe̩wñ kʼu nagwajo̩ nʼabo ichi-mi n.
Todule̩ e̩te̩ udo̩ kʼu do̩ me̩ chʼutodu kʼu li eju-me̩ kʼu ko̩la ñw me̩. Todu e̩wñ ukibeno e-abo Israe̩l oñ igbaligba kide̩ wenyʼumi-i.
Oñ ma ka ñw u kakini, Awa la gbʼo̩takada o̩la-we̩ kwo Judia n, e̩ne̩ du ef amo̩maye le̩ la wa ka ñw a n, ma la ko̩la e̩wñ bibi du nyʼe̩ n.
I la nyo̩ wa eju kʼa gbo̩ ibe e̩wñ kʼi dʼef uwe̩ alu-we̩, todu i chʼe-o̩la uche̩ ki date̩-i, a chema ka ku ma mʼubi dagbʼo ugbo du.

Oñ abu ku ma fʼo̩jo̩ da ñw u amone̩ ño̩ wa ef uru ugbo-wñ tule. I fʼo̩la le̩ kajane̩ ñw ma, i gba ojane̩ O̩jo̩ ibenu nyo̩nyo̩, i nʼo̩lo̩da Mose̩s kpʼamakache̩ tʼuma eju gu ugbo e̩wñ Jisus kwʼodudu gbogbo wʼane̩.
Abo iche̩kibo̩ la dʼo̩la kʼi ka le̩ rʼochochi, iche̩ka la ko̩ eke̩do̩nʼo.
Oñ abu kʼibe-ma chʼojoji kpʼo̩la-ma ma kwʼo̩mo̩ le, abu ku Po̩l fʼo̩laʼka ka: i kakini, Afu Kiafo̩ fʼo̩la o̩me̩me̩le̩ ka lef Aizaya akache̩ ñw amata-me̩ kakini,
E̩ nalo tʼugbo amone̩ kide̩ kʼe̩ ka kakini,
Todu e̩do̩ amone̩-i mud e̩do̩ agbo̩go̩,
Todule̩ ame̩ ki ma ka ku ma fʼujadu O̩jo̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo abo uche̩ichi me̩; ama la agbo.
Tak abu kʼi fʼe̩wñ kide̩ ka amaJu kwʼo̩mo̩ le ma, ma nʼiñwa nana aje̩ kpʼo̩la-ma.]
Po̩l la gugu ef unyi kʼowñ onugo faya le̩ o̩do̩ meji odukulu, i la yo̩ ñw abo du ku ma wʼugbo-wñ,
i la nʼakoya ojane̩ O̩jo̩ ata, i la nʼeju e̩gbo kʼone̩ o̩la e̩wñ du ki jʼugbo Ondu Jisusi Kraist, e̩ne̩ du la fʼu naba n.
Po̩l, adu Jisus Kraisti, e̩nukpuche̩ lugbo edo̩ ku ma do̩, ku ma fʼu date̩ ñw Uche̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩,
kʼi kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ o̩gbo̩gba lef amakache̩-wñ ef o̩takadu O̩la kiafo̩.
Owñ chʼo̩la O̩ma-wñ kʼi wate̩ kwef ugbe̩ Defid lo̩na o̩re̩la.
Ma fʼu jiwe ka kʼO̩ma e-O̩jo̩ ef ukpahiu lo̩na Afu e-efo̩, kwef udajikwane̩ e-abo ki ku, owñ che Jisus Kraisti, Ondu-wa.
Lef uwñ a mʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼuko̩lo̩ uche eje̩ gba todu kʼegbʼo̩la e̩do̩ ekono gbo̩ ki do̩mo̩ ef abo uche̩ichi du tod odu-wñ.
Ame̩ ño̩ jʼef uma, ame̩ ku me̩ chʼabo udo̩ e-Jisus Kraisti.
Omi Po̩l le̩, tʼugbo abo du ku ma jo̩ Rom ku ma chʼabo ufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩, abo udo̩ ku ma chʼabo kiafo̩. Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼure̩do̩ ki dʼugbo me̩ kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ Ata-wa kpai Ondu Jisus Kraisti.
Ejodudu nagwʼO̩jo̩-mi ugwa lefu Jisus Kraisti todu me̩ chaka, todabu ku ma jʼadʼinabali e̩do̩ ekono-me̩ kpogo ugbo du ile̩-i.
Todu O̩jo̩ kʼu nache ef afu-mi ef uche̩nyo̩ O̩ma-wñ chʼe̩nibenu-mi alu kʼomi ma kpeke chʼarewa-me̩ n.
E̩gba du ef adua-mi narodubʼO̩jo̩ ka kʼiche̩wñ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ ki nʼugbo kʼule̩ ki ra ñwu mi kʼu nawʼugbo me̩ ubi ane̩-i.
Todu eju ache mi kʼu li me̩ todu kʼu fʼe̩wñ ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-afuʼka kpe̩ ñwu me̩, kʼi fʼume̩ e̩re̩ nyane̩;
owñ che, kʼomi kpai ame̩ ki nʼugbe̩do̩ ef ume̩ lef e̩do̩ ekono e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩, tʼe-me̩, tʼe-mi.

Amo̩maye, i dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼame̩ ki chʼugbodu-wñ n, todu u te̩tañwʼibe-mi tane̩ o̩gbe̩nugbe̩ kʼu nawʼugbo me̩, todu kʼu ño̩ nʼe̩ro ef ume̩ dab ef abo uche̩ichi ki bo̩. Ma muda kpʼo̩na nyʼumi gbogbo tʼeñini-i.
U chʼe̩no̩me̩ amaGrik, kpʼabo ku ma kʼagudo̩gudo̩, kpʼamanibe, kpʼabo ku ma ma nʼibe n.
Abe̩le̩ alu du ki de̩ ugbo e-mi ibe-mi de̩ kolo kolo kʼu najʼuche̩nyo̩ rʼame̩ ku me̩ jo̩ Rom ge̩.
Todu nachʼanyo̩ Uche̩nyo̩-i n. Todu owñ chʼukpahiu O̩jo̩ tef ujadu ñw e̩ne̩ du ki ake̩do̩nʼo, tʼe̩ne̩ Ju ejodudu kpʼe̩ne̩ Grik ge̩.
Todu efuwñ o̩kpakpa O̩jo̩ chʼe̩bite̩ kwef e̩do̩ ekono tef e̩do̩ ekono. I dabalu ku ma ko̩ tane̩ kakini, E̩no̩kpakpa la adeju kwef e̩do̩ ekono.
Tod uwe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ chʼe̩bite̩ kwʼefojale kʼi noji eko̩ ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ kpʼuji amone̩ du ku ma mʼochochi ne̩ gaga ef uji.
Todu e̩wñ O̩jo̩ kʼone̩ ma tejugede ef uma; todu O̩jo̩ dʼu tejugede ñwu ma.
Todu e̩wñ e-wñ ki ma jʼali n, akwʼe̩gba ku ma nyi ile̩-i ma li foo me̩. Ma nʼibe-wñ lef e̩wñ kʼi che te̩, tʼukpahiu-wñ e-ogbegbele̩ tʼe̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ, kʼama ki we enʼe̩wñ ku ma aka gbʼo̩la-ma te̩.
Todu abu ku ma chema O̩jo̩ ma bʼukpe̩ ojima e-O̩jo̩ mʼo̩ n; ma la gwʼo̩ ugwa n; chai ibe ma kpe̩ tinyo̩ ofofo, oñ e̩do̩-ma ki ma nʼeju ene̩ n kwochubi.
Abu ku ma jʼaka ku ma che̩nʼibe ma mud ame̩ne̩fule̩fu.
Ma la mʼojima O̩jo̩ ki ma achile̩che̩ n du kpailo̩ e̩wñ ki dab ojibo one̩ ki achile̩che̩, kpʼe-ame̩we̩ kpʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kpʼe-ame̩wñ ki afa ane̩pe̩te̩.
Todule̩ O̩jo̩ fuma turʼiwa ef e̩ño̩ e̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-ma ache, kʼama ki chi año̩la-ma ukata ef uma:
ama ku ma mʼochochi O̩jo̩ du kpailo̩ o̩lemi le̩, ku ma la diba ñw e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ nyi ku ma laño̩ che tʼe-ku ma che ñw e̩ne̩ ki nyi e̩wñ le. Owñ ki nele ogbegbele̩. Ami.
Lef e-le̩ O̩jo̩ fʼuma turʼudo̩laga e̩wñ ki achʼone̩ ukata eche; todu i chaka chʼabobule̩, ma fʼe̩wñ ki chʼukpe̩ ku ma che rida tef e̩wñ ki ma chʼukpe̩ kʼone̩ ache n.

Abe̩le̩ ge̩, abu kʼaboke̩le̩ tʼe̩wñ ki chʼukpe̩ ku ma che kpʼabobule̩ no̩, e̩ño̩ o̩la-ma filichi nyʼuma o̩la oñ aboke̩le̩ kwoche e̩wñ anyo̩ kpʼaboke̩le̩. Ma la dabi gba uro̩me̩ ki chʼukpe̩ ela ku ma la ef o̩to̩to̩la-ma.
Oñ alu ku ma ko̩ eñwa ki nyo̩ ku ma nʼO̩jo̩ ef e̩wñ ku ma ama, O̩jo̩ la fʼuma turʼibe ki ko̩ eñwa e̩wñ ru, ku ma nache e̩wñ ki ma chʼeju-wñ n.
Uji du che̩ko̩ ef uma kpai e̩wñ bibi kpʼejufufu kpʼe̩bie̩ne̩. Ma che̩ko̩ tiili ñw ulie̩na kpʼone̩ ekpa kpʼaro̩ kpʼo̩gwo̩ kpʼe̩bie̩ne̩ efu. Ma chʼamaka ye̩ye̩ nyʼone̩;
ma chʼamachʼakpabie̩ one̩ kpʼamachulaka O̩jo̩ kpʼamake kpʼabo ku ma hio̩la-ma ne kpʼamabuba kpʼabo ku ma ñwʼofili e̩bie̩ne̩ tito̩, ma ko̩ egbʼo̩la abo ku ma bi ma gbo̩;
eju-ma ne̩ n, ma fʼalo ku ma kpe̩ bie̩, abo-ma wo̩ ma eju n, ame̩nukpe̩do̩ ma che.
Abu kʼabo-i chaka ma oji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa e-O̩jo̩ kʼi kakini, Abo ku ma jʼef e̩wñ abe̩-i eche bʼeku jo̩, i chʼeche ma che kate n, ma laño̩ je̩nyu ñw abo ku ma jʼef e̩wñ-i ache ge̩.

Todule̩ uwe̩ nʼe̩wñ kʼuwʼaka gbʼo̩la-we̩ te̩ n, uwe̩ one̩, e̩ne̩ duu ki akpʼoji ajo̩: todu ef e̩wñ kʼe̩ kpʼoji ajo̩ e̩nomune̩, e̩ kpʼo̩la-we̩ abi; todu uwe̩ kʼe̩ kpʼoji ajo̩ nʼe̩wñ le̩ gbage̩de̩ ache.
A la chema ka kʼabi kʼO̩jo̩ akpa alʼo̩na ochochi wa abʼabo ku ma jʼache e̩wñ abe̩-i oji ma.
Uwe̩ one̩, kʼe̩ kpʼabo ku ma nʼe̩wñ abe̩-i ache abi, kʼuwe̩ onugo la che e̩wñ le̩, e̩ fulo ka kʼuwe̩ afu tane̩ bʼajo̩ O̩jo̩ te̩?
Abe̩k uwe̩ adʼunana umo̩la-wñ kpai o̩wo̩ kʼi damʼuwe̩ kpai e̩do̩-wñ kʼi je̩ rʼo̩che̩ke̩ne̩? E̩ ma ka kʼumo̩la O̩jo̩ anʼuwe̩ nyʼugbo uribeda n?
Ama alu kʼe̩do̩-we̩ chʼe̩ji, ki ma nʼuribeda n, uwe̩ afe̩do̩ uwe̩do̩ tane̩ ñw o̩la-we̩ tod o̩jo̩ uwe̩do̩ ki chʼo̩jo̩ kʼajo̩ o̩kpakpa O̩jo̩ abite̩.
I adu ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ koji alu kʼuko̩lo̩-wñ de̩.
I adʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ ñw abo ku ma feju ojima kpʼubumo̩ kpʼewe echile̩che̩ lugbo uko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩ ku ma fe̩do̩ lichi ache.
I adʼuwe̩do̩ kpʼuke̩do̩fulu ñw abo ku ma tene aida, ku ma la ko egbʼochochi gbo̩, ku ma muda agbʼo̩la uji gbo̩.
O̩pe̩cha kpʼuwa adʼoji onugo one̩ du ki nʼuko̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ ache, tʼe̩ne̩ Ju ejodudu kpʼe̩ne̩ Grik ge̩.
Ama ojima kpʼubumo̩ kpʼure̩do̩ muda ado̩mo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ki achʼuko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩, tʼe̩ne̩ Ju ejodudu kpʼe̩ne̩ Grik ge̩;
todu O̩jo̩ nʼe̩nejuma n.
Todu aluka one̩ du ku ma ma nʼo̩lo̩da n ku ma dure, dagba o̩lo̩da ma de̩ n, ma alenyo̩ kpo̩. Oñ aluka one̩ du ku ma dure ef o̩lo̩da, ma akajo̩ ma lef o̩lo̩da.
Todu i chʼabo ku ma gbʼo̩lo̩da nyeti chʼo̩kpakpa ugbo O̩jo̩ n, chai abo ku ma ache e̩wñ kʼo̩lo̩da ka oñ ma adale ñwu ma.
Todu e̩gba du kʼabo uche̩ichi ku ma ma nʼo̩lo̩da n gʼibe efu-ma ache e̩wñ o̩lo̩da, abo-i ma chaka nʼo̩lo̩da n, ma chʼo̩lo̩da ñw o̩la-ma,
Ma du ñe̩ña ka kʼuko̩lo̩ o̩lo̩da che̩ko̩ rʼef e̩do̩-ma, akone̩o̩la ki dʼefu-ma agbʼo̩ ibenu, oñ ibe ku ma kpe̩ kpʼomune̩ agwajo̩-nʼuma cho̩kpo̩ni i aka e̩wñ ki chi.
O̩jo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ akajo̩ e̩wñ umaja e-amone̩ lefu Jisus Kraisti likpa alu kʼUche̩nyo̩-mi ka.
I muda che̩wñ kʼuwe̩ kʼodu Ju kʼe̩ la kwotanʼo̩lo̩da añmi kʼe̩ la dʼO̩jo̩ buba,
kʼe̩ la chema e̩wñ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩, kʼe̩ la fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ tule ñwa rʼojoji kʼe̩ la aje̩nyu ñw u abu ku ma nʼalu akʼuwe̩ kwef o̩lo̩da le̩,
kʼe̩ la ke̩do̩no ka kʼuwe̩ onugo chʼaña amafeju o̩na, kpʼugane̩ ñw abo ku ma jʼef e̩chubi,
kpʼe̩ne̩ ki ane̩ ame̩nidada kpʼako̩ amome̩kpa e̩wñ, abu kʼe̩ chenʼuwo̩li alu kʼe̩wñ-ema kpʼochochi de̩ ef o̩lo̩da le̩.
Todule̩ uwe̩ kʼe̩ kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ o̩la, uwe̩ akʼo̩la-we̩ n? Uwe̩ kʼe̩ tʼakoya ka kʼone̩ ki joji n, uwe̩ ajoji?
Uwe̩ kʼe̩ ka kʼone̩ ki che̩ño̩ya n, uwe̩ ache̩ño̩ya? Uwe̩ kʼe̩ hihie̩ne̩ ode, uwe̩ añʼane̩ kwef unyi-wñ?
Uwe̩ kʼe̩ dʼo̩lo̩da buba, lef echada kʼe̩ chada o̩lo̩da e̩ chʼO̩jo̩ ukata?
Todu ame̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼama dʼodu O̩jo̩ te̩ achʼakpabie̩-wñ ef abo uche̩ichi, alu ku ma ko̩ nyʼo̩takada le̩.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe̩ nʼe̩wñ kʼo̩lo̩da ka ache, mak e̩pi eda chenʼile mana. I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki achʼachada o̩lo̩da mak e̩pi eda-we̩ mud e̩pi odukulu.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩pi odukulu ade e̩wñ o̩kpakpa o̩lo̩da, ma alʼe̩pi odukulu-wñ rʼe̩pi eda n?
Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼitaligba-wñ chʼe̩nʼe̩pi odukulu kʼi che e̩wñ teju o̩lo̩da akʼajo̩ we̩ n? Uwe̩ kʼe̩ nʼolubutu kpʼe̩pi eda kʼe̩ chʼachada o̩lo̩da le̩.
Todu i chʼe̩ne̩ ki tejugede ofo che Ju n. E-ki tejugede ef o̩re̩la ofo la chʼe̩pi eda n.
Chai e̩ne̩ ki chemaja efu-wñ chʼe̩ne̩ Ju. E̩pi eda la chʼe-e̩do̩, ef afu, i chʼef olubutu ofo n; e-kʼe̩te̩ eñwulo̩ ñw u ma chʼone̩ n, chai O̩jo̩.
Mak ugbo e̩tule e̩ne̩ Ju de̩ ta? abe̩k e̩wñ chʼile e̩pi-eda ke?
I chenana alu du, ejodudu-wñ de̩: ama chʼabo ku ma ke̩do̩no ma ku ma mʼomu kʼO̩jo̩ ka ko ñwu ma.
Todu i dagba aboʼka ko̩ eke̩do̩no fa? Eke̩do̩no ku ma ko̩ eke̩do̩no, e-le̩ aje̩ ñw e̩do̩-ekono e-O̩jo̩ gbogili te̩?
O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na: O̩jo̩ ki mud e̩nochochi, kʼone̩ du ki mud e̩nolemi; dabalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Ama iche̩wñ kʼuji-wa adʼo̩kpakpa O̩jo̩ dago pee, ab a ka ke? O̩jo̩ ki adʼuwe̩do̩ wa chʼe̩nuji? (Alu kʼone̩ aka oñ naka-i.)
O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na: cho̩kpo̩ni ab O̩jo̩ ale kʼi akajo̩ abile̩ ke?
Ama iche̩wñ ki chelʼef olemi e-mi oñ ochochi O̩jo̩ chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩ jo̩ kʼi chʼojima ñw u, e̩wñ chi ku ma ñʼakajo̩ mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼomi chʼe̩nadure ta?
E̩wñ chi kʼa ma ache alu ku ma chakpabie̩ wa le̩ n? kʼaboʼka ta aka kʼawa aka kakini, Awa ki chʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ ki wa. Abi ku ma akpa abo le̩ chʼeju-wñ!
E̩wñ le̩ ta? A nyo̩ tule? O̩da, a tule oke n; todu a gwuno amaju kpai amaGrik o̩gbo̩gba le̩ ka kʼo̩chaka-ma jʼef o̩wo̩ adure,
i dʼalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ le̩ kakini,
e̩ne̩ kʼeju-wñ ne̩ do̩mo̩ n, e̩ne̩ ki afeju O̩jo̩ do̩mo̩ n.
O̩chaka-ma muna tiba me̩,
Ef o̩fa-ma chʼoji ki che̩bite̩,
alu abo-i che̩ko̩ ñw ama ena kpai o̩la ki alukoko̩.
E̩re̩-ma chele̩ ñw e̩bie̩ edafo;
e̩kpʼe̩wñ fo̩ kpai ubie̩ dʼej o̩na-ma du;
ma mema o̩na ure̩do̩ n.
Eju-ma kado ailo O̩jo̩ n.
A la chema kakini, e̩wñ du kʼo̩lo̩da aka, i ako̩la ñw abo ku ma jʼef o̩lo̩da; todu kʼoli ki kwotʼamone̩ du alu, ku ma ki do̩ abile̩ du ajo̩ ñw O̩jo̩.
Todu i nʼo̩re̩la du ki ajale eju-wñ kwef uko̩lo̩ o̩lo̩da eche n; todu adure ema lʼef o̩lo̩da wa.
Ama fai lubi o̩lo̩da ma mʼo̩kpakpa e-O̩jo̩ dute̩ ejugede me̩, o̩lo̩da kpai amakache̩ la gbʼo̩ ibenu;
owñ chʼo̩kpakpa e-O̩jo̩ ki lʼef e̩do̩ ekono Jisus Kraisti tugbo abo du ku ma ke̩do̩no; todu i nʼojoji ojoji n;
todu e̩ne̩ du dure, ma la nyaru ojima O̩jo̩;
ma du ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ dale ñwu ma ele-ofofo lʼef ugbone̩tane̩ ki dʼefu Kraisti Jisus,
owñ kʼO̩jo̩ dudago o̩gba kʼi chʼe̩wñ-unyie̩do̩, lef e̩do̩ ekono, ef e̩bie̩-wñ, kʼi du o̩kpakpa-wñ ñe̩ña, todu eduba ku ma dʼadure ku ma che akwoubi le̩ ba ñwu ma, ef e̩do̩ kʼO̩jo̩ je̩;
kʼi dʼo̩kpakpa-wñ ñe̩ña adiko ojoluñini, kʼowñ ki chʼe̩no̩kpakpa, kʼi lañʼachʼe̩ne̩ ki adale ñw e̩ne̩ ki dʼef e̩do̩ ekono Jisus.
Todule̩ ugbo ebuba-wñ de̩ ta? Ma fʼo̩na kpanyʼu. Lef o̩lo̩da e̩wñ? E-uko̩lo̩? O̩da, chai lef o̩lo̩da e-e̩do̩-ekono.
Todu a fu lo ka ku ma adale ñw one̩ ef e̩do̩ ekono ubi uko̩lo̩ o̩lo̩da o̩ioji.
O̩jo̩ chʼe-amaju kate abe̩? I ño̩ chʼe-abo uche̩ichi n? I-i, i chʼe-abo uche̩ichi kpo̩fo̩;
abu kʼO̩jo̩ ki adale ñw e̩pi-e̩da kwef e̩do̩ ekono kʼi lañʼadale ñw e̩pi-odukulu lef e̩do̩ ekono chʼokate.
Mak a je̩ ñw o̩lo̩da gbogili te̩ lef e̩do̩ ekono de̩ ke n? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na! Chai eko̩ dago oñ a akʼo̩lo̩da dago-i.
Todule̩ e̩wñ a ka kʼEbraham ata-wa li lo̩na o̩re̩la taa?
Todu iche̩wñ ku ma dale ñw Ebraham kwef uko̩lo̩ kʼi che, i chenʼe̩wñ kʼi adu buba; i muda ne̩ ugbo O̩jo̩ n.
Todu ab O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ka ta? I kakini, Ebraham la ke̩do̩nʼO̩jo̩, oñ ma fʼu lorʼo̩kpakpa ñw owñ.
Ma fʼo̩me̩ ku ma ra ñw e̩ne̩ ki achuko̩lo̩ lo̩na ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ n, chai lo̩na o̩me̩ eje̩.
Ama e̩ne̩ ki ma chuko̩lo̩ n, kʼi muda ake̩do̩no E̩ne̩ ki adale ñw e̩ne̩ ki ma te̩te̩-kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n, ma lʼe̩do̩ ekono e̩ne̩ le̩ rʼo̩kpakpa.
Owñ chʼalu ki Defid ño̩ ka kʼe̩ne̩ kʼO̩jo̩ fʼo̩kpakpa lorʼu ubi uko̩lo̩ eche gbede, i kakini,
Abo ku ma tʼugbite̩re̩-ma no̩ ñwu ma,
e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼOndu ma jʼalo adure rʼu n, gbede.
Ugbede-i dʼoji abo e̩pi eda? abe̩k i ño̩ dʼoji abo e̩pi-odukulu ge̩? todu a kakini, Ma fʼe̩do̩ ekono Ebraham lorʼo̩kpakpa ñw u.
Mak ab i de̩ ku ma lo-i ta? Ef e̩pi e̩da i de̩? abe̩k ef e̩pi odukulu? I dʼef e̩pi e̩da n, chai ef e̩pi odukulu;
oñ i mʼujiwe e̩pi-eda gba kʼi chʼuhiuko̩ o̩kpakpa e-e̩do̩ ekono kʼi ne̩ ef e̩pi-odukulu-wñ; kʼowñ ki chʼata abo du ku ma ake̩do̩no ef e̩pi-odukulu, ku ma ki fʼo̩kpakpa loru ñwu ma;
kʼi ño̩ chʼata e̩pi-e̩da ñw abo ku ma chʼabo e̩pi-e̩da kate n, ma muda ño̩ jʼale ikpa e̩do̩ ekono kʼata-wa Ebraham ne̩ iko e̩pi odukulu-wñ le̩.
Todu o̩la kʼi ka tane̩ ñw Ebraham abe̩k ugbe̩-wñ ka kʼile̩ chʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ kʼi aje̩ le̩ lef o̩lo̩da wa n, chai lef o̩kpakpa e-e̩do̩ ekono.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼabo kʼe̩te̩-ma chʼo̩lo̩da chʼabo ku ma je̩ e̩wñ ogu, mak e̩do̩ ekono-i mud ofofo, o̩la ukatane̩ le̩ ño̩ gbogili te̩.
Todu o̩loda achuko̩lo̩ uwe̩do̩; ama ugbo kʼo̩lo̩da ma de̩ n, i la nʼedaba n.

Lef e-le̩ oñ e̩te̩-wñ chʼe̩do̩ ekono, todu kʼi lo̩na ufe̩de̩nyo̩ owñ chʼutodu kʼo̩la ukatane̩ le̩ ki lonyane̩ ugbo ugbe̩-wñ chaka; kʼi we chʼe-kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼo̩lo̩da kate, chai e-kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼe̩do̩ ekono e-Ebraham manyʼu ge̩, owñ le̩ chʼata-wa chaka,
(i dabalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini, Omi mʼuwe̩ du chʼata abo uche̩ichi wewe) eju e̩ne̩ kʼEbraham ke̩do̩no, owñ chʼO̩jo̩ e-ki adʼiñmi ñw abo ki ku, kʼi año̩ do̩ e̩wñ ki ma do̩mo̩ n dabe̩ne̩ kʼi do̩mo̩.
E̩gba ki ma nʼugbo kʼi akibeno ge̩ n, i kʼe̩do̩nʼo̩la ibe ekono le̩ todu kʼi mud ata abo uche̩ichi wewe; owñ chʼalu kʼo̩la ku ma ka le̩ de̩ kakini, Abe̩le̩ oñ ugbe̩-we̩ ade̩.
I la gwegbo ef e̩do̩ ekono n, i fʼibe tʼaño̩la e-wñ kʼi lekutile̩ (o̩do̩-wñ la dab o̩do̩ ogume̩lu), kpai eku kʼabio̩ma Sara leku te̩.
I la ko̩ eke̩do̩no kʼi ñwa temi temi ugbo o̩la ukatane̩ kʼO̩jo̩ katane̩ ñw u n, ukpahiu-wñ muda nyo̩gba ef e̩do̩ ekono, oñ i nadojima ñw O̩jo̩.
Oñ i chʼo̩gbali e̩do̩-wñ kakini, E̩wñ kʼi katane̩ le̩, i la neke che.
Lef e-le̩ oñ ma fʼu lorʼo̩kpakpa ñw owñ.
I la chʼutod owñ kate oñ ma ko̩tane̩ kakini, Ma fʼu loru ñw u n,
i muda ño̩ chʼutodu e-wa ge̩, awa ku ma che ku ma fʼu loru ñwu wa, owñ chʼawa kʼa jʼake̩do̩no e̩ne̩ ki du Jisus Ondu-wa kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku,
owñ ku ma mudu ñwu ma mu lef uñwanane̩-wa, ku ma la mʼu du kwane̩ lef ale ku ma da ñw a.
Todule̩ abu ku ma fʼale da ñw a kwef e̩do̩-ekono, a ki nʼure̩do̩ ugbo O̩jo̩ lef Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti,
lef uwñ, lʼo̩na e̩do̩ ekono, a ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki adʼuwa gudu tef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-kʼa dago ef uwñ-i ne̩ me̩, a la buba noj ojima O̩jo̩ kʼa kibeno.
I chʼe-le̩ kate n, ama a ño̩ buba ef o̩bata ge̩; abu kʼa chema ka kʼo̩bata anʼe̩do̩ elichi wa,
e̩do̩ elichi la anʼuje̩nyu wa, uje̩nyu la anʼibe ekono wa;
ibe ekono la achʼone̩ anyo̩ n; todabu ku ma mʼufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ du danyʼe̩do̩-wa lef Afu Kiafo̩ ku ma du ñwu wa le̩.
Todu e̩gba kʼa chʼame̩ne̩gbo ta, e̩gba kʼiko-wñ lewatu, Kraisti leku tod abo ku ma ma te̩takpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n.
Todu i chakanya tak one̩ jʼaku tod e̩no̩kpakpa; todu ikani one̩ fa do̩mo̩ kʼi anʼe̩do̩ eku tod e̩ne̩nyo̩;
O̩jo̩ muda dʼufe̩do̩ e-wñ dago pee ñw a, kakini, E̩gba kʼa chʼame̩nadure ta, Kraisti leku todu wa.
Todule̩, abu ku ma fʼale da ñw a ef e̩bie̩-wñ fai me̩, mak ejadu ku ma ajadu wa kwo bʼuwe̩do̩ te̩ lef uwñ atule ololo.
Todu iche̩wñ ku ma fʼO̩jo̩ kpai awa kʼa chʼame̩nebi-wñ ño̩ru lef uku O̩ma-wñ, abu ku ma fʼuwa ño̩ru mak ejadu ku ma ajadu wa ef iñmi-wñ ñʼatule ololo:
i la chʼe-le̩ kate n, a muda ño̩ dʼO̩jo̩ buba lef Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti, lef uwñ a mʼuño̩ru le̩gba fai me̩.
Tod e-kide̩, alu kʼadure gudu lef e̩ne̩kate wʼef ile̩, kʼuku laño̩ lef adure wa, abe̩le̩ tak uku legudu nyʼugbo amone̩ du, todu o̩chaka-ma dure;
todu gbogbo tak o̩lo̩da wa, adure dʼef ile̩; ama o̩lo̩da ma do̩mo̩ n, ma lo adure mʼonen.
Uku muda chʼonu akwe̩gba Ade̩m gbogbo wʼe̩gba Mose̩s; i chʼonu abo ku ma ma chaka dure ki bi ada kʼAde̩m je̩ le̩ n, Ade̩m chʼuwo̩li e̩ne̩ ki ache kʼi wa.

I muda chʼalu kʼuñwanane̩ le̩ de̩ oñ ele ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩-i de̩ n. Todu iche̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ leku tod uñwanane̩ e̩ne̩ kate le̩, mak ufe̩de̩-nyo̩ O̩jo̩ kpai ele ki dʼef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-One̩ kate, kʼowñ che Jisus Kraisti le̩, kpo̩rane̩ ñw o̩wo̩ amone̩ tule ololo.
I la dabe̩ne̩ kʼele le̩ lʼef e̩ne̩ ki dure wa n; todu ajo̩ le̩ kwef e̩wñ okate tef abi-ekpa, ama ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kwef uñwanane̩ wewe tef ale-eda.

Todu iche̩wñ kʼuñwanane̩ e̩ne̩ kate le̩ je̩ ñw uku chʼonu lef e̩ne̩ʼka le̩, mak abo ku ma mʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ololo le̩ kpai o̩kpakpa ku ma du chʼone̩ ele gba achʼonu ef iñmi tule, lef e̩ne̩ʼkate kʼowñ che Jisus Kraisti.
Todabe̩le̩ alu kʼabi eje̩ lʼef uñwanane̩ʼka tʼugbo amone̩ du, abe̩le̩ ale eje e-iñmi lʼef o̩kpakpaʼka eche tʼugbo amone̩ du ge̩.
Todu alu kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ mud ame̩nadure lef eko kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ko̩ egbagbo̩, abe̩le̩ o̩wo̩ amone̩ amud ame̩no̩kpakpa lef egbagbo̩ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka le̩ gbagbo̩.
O̩lo̩da la muguduwa todu kʼuñwanane̩ le̩ ki chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩; ama ugbo kʼadure chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩ le̩, ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ kpo̩rane̩ ololololo;
todu kʼalu kʼadure chʼonu ef uku le̩, kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki ño̩ chʼonu abe̩le̩ lef o̩kpakpa tef iñmi ogbegbele̩ lefu Jisus Kraisti Ondu-wa ge̩.
Ab a ñʼaka ge̩? A ki ño̩ jʼef adure; alo waa todu kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki mud o̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩?
O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na! Awa kʼa leku ñw adure, ab a ale kʼa ñʼadeju ef uwñ abajo̩-i ta?
Abe̩k ame̩ ma ka kʼo̩chaka wa ku ma che wa baptism tʼefu Kraisti Jisus i chʼef uku-wñ ma che wa tʼo̩ n?
Oñ ma fʼawa kpai owñ ji lefu baptism tef uku, todu kʼalu ku ma mu Kraisti du dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku lef ojima Ata le̩, abe̩le̩ kʼawa ki ño̩ tale ef e-etito̩ e-iñmi.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼawa kpai owñ mud abo ki dama okate ef e̩wñ ki bi uku-wñ, mak abe̩le̩ a la ade̩ ef udajikwane̩-wñ ge̩.
A chema ka ku ma mʼone̩ kʼa che igbele du kamoli manyʼowñ, todu kʼaño̩la e-adure ki gbogili te̩, kʼawa ki we echʼuko̩lo̩ adu ñw adure;
todu e̩ne̩ ki leku mufu tane̩ bʼadure te̩ me̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼawa bo̩ Kraisti ku a ake̩do̩no kakini, a ñʼabʼo̩ deju ge̩.
Todu a chema ka kʼabu ku ma mu Kraisti du dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku i ñʼaku ge̩ n, uku laño̩ chʼodu-wñ ge̩ n.
Todu eku kʼi ku, i leku ñw adure onu kate, o̩pioo-wñ de̩; ama edeju kʼi adeju, i adeju ñw O̩jo̩.
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ ki nafʼo̩la-me̩ lo rʼef abo ki ku ñw adure, ku me̩ la adeju ñw O̩jo̩ efu Kraisti Jisus.
Todule̩ me̩ ki je̩ ñw adure ki chʼonu ef año̩la-me̩ e-uku-i ku me̩ gbʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ kʼi ache gbo̩ n.

Me̩ ki la mʼe̩wñ año̩la-me̩ ko jo̩ ñw adure kʼi chʼido̩na uji n; me̩ ki muda kʼonugo o̩la-me̩ jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩, dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩ kwef uku adeju me̩, ku me̩ la kʼe̩wñ año̩la chʼido̩na o̩kpakpa jo̩ ñw O̩jo̩.
Todu adure achʼodu-me̩ n, todu me̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ o̩lo̩da n, chai ef o̩wo̩ ufe̩de̩nyo̩.
E̩wñ le̩ ta? A ki ño̩ dure ukpe̩ kʼa ma jʼef o̩wo̩ o̩lo̩da n chai ef o̩wo̩ ufe̩de̩nyo̩? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na!
Ame̩ ma kakini, E̩ne̩ ku me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ chʼadu jo̩ ñw u ku me̩ gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩, i chʼadu e̩ne̩ ku me̩ gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩ le̩ me̩ che n? dagba i chʼe-adure tef uku, dagba i chʼe-ugbagbo̩ tef o̩kpakpa?
O̩jo̩ nʼugwa, todu me̩ chʼadu adure akwoubi, ama me̩ muda mʼe̩wñ ku ma da o̩na nyʼu, kʼi chʼuko̩ o̩la ku ma ko me̩ jo̩ ñw u le̩, gbagbo̩ kpai e̩do̩-me̩ me̩,
oñ abu ku ma mu me̩ ko jʼane̩ bʼo̩wo̩ adure te̩, me̩ mud amadu ñw o̩kpakpa.

Uko̩la e-one̩ naka, todabu kʼo̩re̩la-me̩ chʼe̩gbo; todu, alu ku me̩ mʼe̩wñ año̩la-me̩ ko chʼadu ñw iwa kpai ugbite̩re̩ tef ugbite̩re̩, abe̩le̩ ame̩ ki namʼe̩wñ año̩la-me̩ ko chʼadu ñw o̩kpakpa fai tef efo̩.
Todu e̩gba ku me̩chʼamadu adure le̩, me̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ o̩kpakpa n.
Todule̩ e̩ro e̩wñ me̩ ne̩ e̩gbale̩? I la ache me̩ anyo̩ abajo̩-i todu ukpoji e̩wñ le̩ chʼuku.
Ama fai abu ku me̩ kwotane̩ bʼo̩wo̩ adure te̩ ku me̩ la mud amadu ñw O̩jo̩, me̩ nʼe̩ro-me̩ tef efo̩, ukpoji-wñ la chʼiñmi o̩gbegbele̩.
Todu uro̩me̩ adure chʼuku; ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-O̩jo̩ muda chʼiñmi o̩gbegbele̩ efu Kraisti Jisus Ondu-wa.
Amo̩maye, abe̩k ame̩ ma ka kʼo̩lo̩da chʼodu one̩ iko kʼi deju n? todu abo ku ma mʼo̩lo̩da oñ naka ñwu ma-i.
Todu o̩lo̩da fʼonobule̩ ki nʼo̩ko̩ jimanyʼo̩ko̩-wñ gbogbo abu kʼi deju; i muda che̩wñ kʼo̩ko̩-wñ leku, o̩lo̩da e-o̩ko̩-i gbogili te̩ ñw u me̩.

Todule̩, iche̩wñ kʼi fʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ omune̩ ne̩ abu kʼo̩ko̩-wñ deju, ma ahi owñ odu ko̩ ajo̩ko̩; ama iche̩wñ kʼo̩ko̩-wñ leku, i kwotane̩ bʼo̩wo̩ o̩lo̩da le̩ te̩ me̩, oñ i ma ño̩ chʼajo̩ko̩ n, dagba i chaka nʼo̩ko omune̩.
Todabe̩le̩, amo̩maye-mi, ma la je̩ ñwu me̩ ku ñw o̩lo̩da lef año̩la Kraisti, kʼame̩ ki mud e-e̩ne̩ omune̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma mudu dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku le̩, todu kʼawa ki re̩ro ñw O̩jo̩.
Todu, e̩gba kʼa jʼef o̩re̩la ali udo̩laga e̩wñ adure ki lef o̩lo̩da wa eche, chuko̩lo̩ ef e̩wñ año̩la-wa, kʼawa re̩ro ñw uku.
Ama abajo̩-i o̩lo̩da mugbogili te̩ ñw a, abu kʼa leku ef e̩wñ ki mʼuwa ne̩ gaga le̩; abe̩le̩ oñ awa achuko̩lo̩ adu ef e-etito̩ e-afu, a la che lʼo̩na olubutu igbele le̩ ge̩ n.
Todule̩ ab a aka ta? O̩lo̩da le̩ chʼe̩wñ adure? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na. U muda ma ki chʼadure n, chai lef o̩lo̩da le̩; todu i ma chʼabu kʼo̩lo̩da ka kʼuwe̩ ki chejufufu n in, u ma ma ejufufu n;
ama adure fʼuña ñw o̩la-wñ lef uko̩ ku ma te̩ le̩, oñ i fʼuko̩lo̩ ejufufu du che ef umi, todu, o̩lo̩da ma de̩ n adure leku te̩.
Omi la deju lubi o̩lo̩da e̩gba le̩, ama abu kʼuko̩ ku ma te̩ le̩ lewa adure mudaji, omi la leku;
oñ u li ka kʼuko̩ ku ma te̩ ki chʼutodu iñmi, e-le̩ chʼutodu uku ñw omi;
todu adure fʼuña ñw o̩la-wñ lef uko̩ le̩, oñ i mʼumi ibe da, i la fʼumi kpa lef uwñ.
Abe̩le̩ o̩lo̩da afo̩ mana, uko̩ le̩ laño̩ fo̩ ge̩, i chʼo̩kpakpa, i la chenyo̩.

Mak e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ le̩ mud uku ñw omi? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na. Adure muda che-i todu ki tejugede ka kʼadure i che, oñ i chʼuko̩lo̩ uku ñw omi lef e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ le̩, todu kʼadure ki mud e̩wñ adure ololololo lef uko̩ ku ma te̩ le̩.
Todu a chema ka kʼo̩lo̩da chʼe̩wñ afu; omi muda chʼe̩wñ o̩re̩la, ma fʼumi ta tef o̩wo̩ adure.
Todu u ma uko̩lo̩ kʼu do̩mo̩ ache-i n; todu i chʼe-ki dʼumi e̩do̩ oñ u dʼef uwñ ache n; chai e̩wñ ulaka-mi, e-le̩ nache.
I muda che̩wñ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ki ma dʼumi e̩do̩ n oñ nache, mak eje̩nyu naje̩nyu o̩lo̩da ka kʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ i che.
I muda chʼomi achʼuko̩lo̩ le̩ fai ge̩ n, chai adure ki dodo ef umi ache-i.
Todu u chema kakini, E̩wñ ki nyo̩ du dodo ef umi n, owñ chʼef o̩re̩la-mi-i, todu edʼe̩do̩ dʼugbo-mi, ama echʼuko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ nyane̩, e-le̩ nʼoji n.
Todu i chʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ ki dʼumi e̩do̩, oñ nache n; chai e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ ki ma dʼumi e̩do̩ n, oñ u dʼef uwñ ache.
I muda che̩wñ kʼu nache e̩wñ ki ma dʼumi e̩do̩ n i ño̩ chʼomi achuko̩lo̩ le̩ ge̩ n, chai adure ki dodo ef umi.
Mak o̩lo̩da kʼu nali le̩ de̩ kakini, E̩bie̩ne̩ dʼugbomi, omi ki dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu che e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩.
Todu i chʼe-one̩ ki dʼeje̩f umi i ayo̩ ñw o̩lo̩da O̩jo̩;
u muda ali o̩lo̩da omune̩ ef e̩wñ año̩la-mi ki akʼogu bʼo̩lo̩da e-ibe-mi, kʼi amu mi ef o̩lo̩da adure e-ki dʼef e̩wñ año̩la-mi.
Omi, e̩nubie̩-i! E̩ne̩ agba mi kwef año̩la e-uku-i?
O̩jo̩ nʼugwa, lefu Jisusi Kraist Ondu-wa. Todabe̩le̩ onugo e-mi nʼibe-mi achuko̩lo̩ adu ñw o̩lo̩da e-O̩jo̩, u muda nʼo̩re̩la-mi achʼadu ñw o̩lo̩da e-adure.
Todule̩ i ño̩ nʼabi ekpa abo ku ma jʼefu Kraisti Jisus fa-i ge̩ n.
Todu o̩lo̩da Afu e-iñmi efu Kraisti Jisus mʼumi gbatane̩ bʼo̩wo̩ o̩lo̩da e-adure kpai e-uku te̩.
Todu e̩wñ kʼo̩lo̩da ma neke che n, ef e̩gbo̩ kʼi ne̩ lef o̩re̩la, abu kʼO̩jo̩ fʼO̩ma e-wñ onugo kpuche̩ wa ef e̩wñ ki bi o̩re̩la e-adure kʼi chi udu adure, i kpʼadure ef o̩re̩la abi,
todu kʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa e-o̩lo̩da ki jo̩ kpa ef awa kʼa ma tale tʼikpa o̩re̩la n, chai tʼikpa Afu.
Todu abo ku ma lʼikpa o̩re̩la adʼibe tʼe̩wñ o̩re̩la, ama abo ku ma lʼikpa Afu adʼibe tʼe̩wñ e-Afu.
Todu ibe o̩re̩la chʼuku, ama ibe e-Afu chʼiñmi kpai ure̩do̩;
lef e-le̩ oñ ibe o̩re̩la chʼe̩nebi e̩wñ O̩jo̩; todu i chʼe̩kamuhite̩ ñw e̩wñ o̩loda O̩jo̩ n, i la neke che n;
abo ku ma jʼef ore̩la la neke nyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju n.
Ame̩ muda jʼef o̩re̩la n, chai ef Afu, abu kʼAfu O̩jo̩ dodo ef ume̩. I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma nʼAfu Kraisti n, e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩-wñ n.
I muda che̩wñ ku Kraisti dʼef ume̩, año̩la leku te̩ lef adure me̩, afu muda chʼiñmi lef e̩wñ o̩kpakpa.
I la che̩wñ kʼAfu e̩ne̩ ki du Jisus dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku dodo ef ume̩ mak e̩ne̩ ki du Kraisti Jisus dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku le̩ ñʼadʼiñmi ñw año̩la-me̩ e-uku-i ge̩ lef Afu-wñ kʼi dodo ef ume̩.
Todabe̩le̩, amo̩maye, ame̩no̩me̩ a che, i chʼo̩re̩la a jʼo̩ o̩me̩ kʼa deju a chʼe̩wñ tʼikpa o̩re̩la n;
todu iche̩wñ kʼame̩ deju achʼe̩wñ tʼikpa o̩re̩la, maku me̩ che ku me̩ ku de̩; ama iche̩wñ ku me̩ nʼAfu le̩ fʼe̩wñ kʼaño̩la ache che ño̩ che̩ kpa ku, ame̩ adeju.
Todu aluka abo kʼAfu O̩jo̩ ane̩ ma le̩, abo le̩ chʼamo̩ga o̩ma e-O̩jo̩.
Todu i chʼafu e-adu ki aje̩ ñwu me̩ railo oñ me̩ dabi gba n; chai Afu e-ki ako me̩ chʼo̩ma oñ me̩ gba, ef e-le̩ a kwa kakini, Ada, Ata.
Afu le̩ onugo abʼafu e-wa gbibenu ka kʼa chʼamo̩ma O̩jo̩;
i la che̩wñ kʼa chʼamo̩ma, mak a ño̩ chʼabo ku ma ajʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ ge̩; a chʼabo ku ma ajʼe̩wñ-o̩gu O̩jo̩, a la abo Kraisti je̩ e̩wñ ogu-wñ; abu kʼawa abʼo̩ chʼo̩bata todu kʼawa ki ño̩ bʼo̩ jʼojima.
Todu u fu lo kakini, O̩bata ki de̩ abajo̩-i bo̩jo̩ ku ma du ñwa ojima ku ma che ku ma bite̩ todu wa n.
Todu eju e̩wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ nyi chefe̩rane̩ aneju iko ku ma ako amo̩ga o̩ma O̩jo̩ bite̩.
Todu ibe ekono chʼe̩wñ kʼe̩wñ kʼi chʼe̩nyite̩-i chʼe̩kamuhite̩ ñw ibe̩te̩, i gʼe̩do̩la-wñ che n, chai lef e̩ne̩ ki fu kamuhite̩,
todu ma agba e̩wñ ki chʼe̩nyi te̩ onugo tane̩ bʼo̩wo̩ uko̩lo̩ adu uchile̩che̩ eche te̩ tef omi nʼo̩la-mi e-ojima e-amo̩ma O̩jo̩.
Todu a chema ka kʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼe̩nyi te̩ jʼafifi, ma jo̩ achefu gbogbo wʼifai.
I la chʼe-le̩ kate n, ama awa onugo kʼa nʼejo̩ga Afu jʼafifi ef o̩to̩to̩la-wa, abu kʼa jʼaneju ku ma ko wa jʼef o̩ga o̩ma le̩, owñ chʼaño̩la-wa e̩gbatane̩.
Todu ma fʼuwa jadu ñw ibe ekono; eju dʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ kibeno, i ño̩ chʼibe ekono de̩-i ge̩ n; todu one̩ fʼe̩wñ li, abile kʼi akibeno aneju-wñ ge̩?
I muda che̩wñ kʼa kibeno e̩wñ kʼeju-wa ma dʼo ta n, a afe̩do̩lichi aneju e̩wñ le̩.
Alu le̩ ge̩, oñ Afu O̩jo̩ ate̩ko e̩gbo-wa ge̩; todu a mʼema alu ki dukpe̩ kʼa chadua e̩wñ n, Afu le̩ onugo muda nʼifi ki ma jʼaka n afi achologu todu wa,
oñ e̩ne̩ ki atejane̩ ef e̩do̩ le̩ chema ibe ki dʼef Afu le̩, todu, i achologu todu abo kiafo̩ lo̩na O̩jo̩.
A la chema kakini, E̩wñ du kpe̩re̩ achʼuko̩lo̩ kʼi anyo̩ ñw abo ku ma afe̩do̩ O̩jo̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma fʼuma do̩ alu kʼi ñwʼibe e-wñ tane̩.
Todu, abo kʼi ma ma tane̩, i fʼuma date̩ tane̩ ku ma chʼuche̩ ojibo o̩ma e-wñ, kʼowñ ki chʼo̩mo̩gba ef amo̩maye wewe:
oñ abo kʼi fʼuma date̩ tane̩, abo le̩ oñ i fʼuma do̩; abo kʼi fʼuma do̩ le̩, abo le̩ oñ i dale ñwu ma; abo kʼi fʼale da ñwu ma le̩, abo le̩ oñ i dʼojima ñwu ma.
