Todule̩ ab a ñʼaka ugbo e̩wñ-i ta? Iche̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ chʼe̩ne̩-wa, e̩ne̩ akobʼuwa?
E̩ne̩ ki ma do̩wo̩mʼO̩ma e-wñ onugo n, kʼi muda mʼowñ duchʼele te̩ todu wa chaka, ab i ale kʼi ma akʼe̩wñ du chʼuwa ele ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ manyʼu n?
E̩ne̩ agwʼajo̩ nʼabo kʼO̩jo̩ chi ma tane̩? O̩jo̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki adale:
e̩ne̩ akpʼabi? Kraisti Jisus kʼi leku ku ma la mʼu du dajikwane̩, kʼi ño̩ dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ O̩jo̩, kʼi lañʼacholugu todu wa?
E̩ne̩ ada wa kpai ufe̩do̩ Kraisti ru taa? O̩bata? abe̩k uwa? abe̩k udoli? abe̩k ukpo̩ta? abe̩k ago-ofo? abe̩k e̩wñ ubailo? abe̩k ugbada?
Owñ chʼalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Ama ef e̩wñ-i du awa adu, adu ño̩ du lef e̩ne̩ ki fe̩do̩ wa le̩.
Todu e̩do̩-mi mugba kakini, Tʼuku, tʼiñmi, tʼamonuche̩ O̩jo̩, tʼamagboji, tʼe̩wñ ki jo̩-i, tʼe̩wñ ki ache ki wa, tʼamukpahiu,
tʼo̩gba, tʼunefu, tʼe̩wñ ojoji omune̩ du kʼO̩jo̩ nyi nekʼada wa kpʼufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ ki dʼefu Kraisti Jisus Ondu-wa ru n.
Ochochi efu Kraisti naka-i, i chʼolemi naro̩-i n; akone̩-o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩-mi abʼumi gbʼibenu ef Afu Kiafo̩,
kakini, E̩do̩dudu-mi tabale, ila kpeke ewo̩ mi n.
Todu i ma nyo̩ mi eju ku ma mʼumi onugo du te̩ ñw O̩jo̩ kwo bi Kraisti te̩ tod amo̩maye-mi, owñ chʼamefu-mi lo̩na o̩re̩la.
Ama chʼabo Israe̩l, kʼugugu o̩ga o̩ma kpai ojima kpai alo ku ma kpe̩ kpai edʼo̩lo̩da te̩ kpai ucholo O̩jo̩ eche kpai e̩wñ ku ma katane̩ le̩ chʼe-ma;
abogijo igbele le̩ chʼabo e-ma, ama la chʼe̩te̩ Kraisti lo̩na o̩re̩la, owñ le̩ kʼe̩wñ du jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ, O̩jo̩ ku ma kele-wñ ogbegbele̩. Ami.
I la dabe̩ne̩ ka kʼo̩lO̩jo̩ chi n. Todu i chʼo̩chaka amone̩ ku ma kwef Israe̩l, chʼabo Israe̩l n;
i chʼo̩chaka-ma chʼo̩ma ukpe̩ ku ma chʼugbe̩ Ebraham in; chai, Ef Aise̩k ma ado̩ ugbe̩ ñw e̩.
Owñ chʼukakini, I chʼamo̩ma o̩re̩la chʼamo̩ma O̩jo̩ n; chai amo̩ma e-o̩la ukatane̩ oñ ma alo rʼugbe̩.
Todu o̩la ukatane̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, E̩go̩ iko-i oñ nawa, taku Sara anʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩.
I la chʼe-le̩ kate n, Ribe̩ka muda ño̩ fʼefu nyo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ʼka, owñ chʼAise̩k ata-wa.

Todu, e̩gba ku ma ma bi ma ta n, ku ma ma la chʼe̩wñ du ta n tʼe̩nyo̩, tʼe̩fule̩fu, todu kʼibe kʼO̩jo̩ ñwa tane̩, ugbo one̩-wñ kʼi achi, kʼi dago ka kʼi chʼef uko̩lo̩ eche i kwo n, chai kwef e̩ne̩ ki adudo̩ le̩,
oñ ma ka ñw onobule̩ le̩ kakini, E-ogijo achuko̩lo̩ adu ñw e-imo̩to̩.
I dʼalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini, U fe̩do̩ Jeko̩b, u muda chʼulaka Iso̩.
Todule̩ ab a ñʼaka? Uji dʼugbo O̩jo̩? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na!
Todu i ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼu li ejumomi-wñ, owñ nali ejumomi-wñ, e̩ne̩ kʼu mo̩la ñw u, owñ namo̩ia ñw u.
Todabe̩le̩ i chʼe-e̩ne̩ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ n, i la chʼe-e̩ne̩ ki afule n, chai e-O̩jo̩ ki ali ejumomi one̩.
Todu O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ka ñwu Fero kakini, Tod e̩wñ-i gbage̩de̩ oñ u dʼuwe̩ kwane̩-i, owñ chʼutodu kʼu dʼukpahiu-mi ñe̩ña ef uwe̩, todu ku ma ki dʼodu-mi kpogo ugbo du ane̩ ile̩-i.
Todabe̩le̩, e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼowñ e̩do̩ i ali ejumomi-wñ, oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼowñ e̩do̩ i adʼe̩do̩ e̩no̩ ñw u.
Tak uwe̩ aka ñwu mi kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼO̩jo̩ akalu nyʼone̩ o̩la la? Todu e̩ne̩ agbo̩nanyʼe̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ neku?
O̩da, uwe̩ one̩, e̩ne̩ uwe̩ che kʼuwe̩ abʼO̩jo̩ kajo̩? E̩wñ ku ma bo̩ aka ñw e̩ne̩ ki bʼo̩ kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ che mi abe̩-i?
Abe̩k abucha nʼo̩da ama-wñ kʼi adʼe̩bo̩-wñ odukuluʼka bo̩ e̩wñ eku e-ki nʼojima kpʼe-ki ma nʼojima ni n?
I muda che̩wñ kʼi dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ kʼi dʼuwe̩do̩-wñ ñe̩ña, kʼi la je̩ ñwu ma ma ukpahiu-wñ, oñ i fe̩do̩je̩ nana ugbo e̩wñ eku e-uwe̩do̩ kʼi ñwʼo̩la-wñ che ñw ulenyo̩,
todu kʼi la je̩ ñw one̩ ma unana ojima-wñ ki dʼo̩la e̩wñ eku e-ejumomi, e-kʼi chʼo̩na-wñ tane̩ todu ojima,
owñ chʼawa kʼi ma do̩ wa kwef amaju kate n, chai kwef abo uche̩ichi kpo̩fo̩?
Alu kʼi ño̩ ka ef o̩takada Hoseya kakini,
Oñ i ade̩ ka kʼugbo ku ma ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ chʼabo e-mi n,
Oñ Aizaya nakwa tod abo Israe̩l kakini, Dagba aluka amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Israe̩l chaka wewe dab e̩lanyi ohimini, e̩fiye̩-ma oñ ma ajadu;
todu Ondu ache tʼeju o̩la-wñ oj ane̩ ile̩-i kpa, tak i akʼo̩ da pio.
I ñʼadʼalu kʼAizaya ka o̩gbo̩gba le̩ kakini,
Todule̩ ab a aka? Kakini, Abo uche̩ichi, ku ma ma bʼo̩kpakpa kpe̩re̩ n, fʼo̩kpakpa ne̩, o̩kpakpa kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼe̩do̩ ekono i muda che;
ama Israe̩l, kʼi bʼo̩lo̩da e-o̩kpakpa le̩ kpe̩re̩, la nyʼane̩ ugbo o̩lo̩da le̩ n.
E̩wñ chi? Todabu ku ma ma tene e-kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼe̩do̩ ekono n, chai e-ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼuko̩lo̩ eche. Ma fʼe̩re̩ ko̩ okuta uke̩re̩ le̩,
owñ chʼalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Amo̩maye, e̩wñ ki rʼumi onugo e̩do̩ kpai o̩ko̩ kʼu nagbabʼO̩jo̩ todu ma chʼutodu kʼi fʼuma jadu.
Todu nagbʼuma ibenu kakini, Ma go̩laru e̩wñ O̩jo̩, ma muda mʼo̩na-wñ n.
Todu, abu ku ma ma mʼo̩kpakpa O̩jo̩ n, ku ma muda feju e̩dʼe-ma dago, ma fʼo̩la-ma kamuhite̩ ñw o̩kpakpa e-O̩jo̩ n.
Todu Kraist chʼukpoji o̩lo̩da tef o̩kpakpa ñw e̩ne̩ du ki ake̩do̩no.
Todu Mose̩s fʼo̩takada ko̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki nʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa ki dʼef o̩lo̩da ache adeju ef uwñ.
O̩kpakpa ki muda kwef e̩do̩ ekono muda aka abe̩-i kakini, Uwe̩ ki we eka ef e̩do̩-we̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ate̩gu nyʼefojale? (owñ che kʼi du Kraist kwʼo̩mo̩ wʼane̩);
abe̩k, e̩ne̩ agwo̩ru nyʼef o̩lo̩ulu? (owñ che kʼi du Kraist kwef abo ki ku te̩gu wa).
Ama ab i ka taa? I kakini, O̩la le̩ me̩rʼuwe̩, i dʼef alu-we̩ kpʼef e̩do̩-we̩, owñ chʼo̩la e̩do̩ ekono kʼa atakoya-wñ,
kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ nʼalu-we̩ aje̩ ka ki Jisus chʼOndu, kʼe̩ la ke̩do̩no ef e̩do̩-we̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ mʼowñ du dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku me̩, ma ajadu we̩;
todu e̩do̩ oñ one̩ akono tef o̩kpakpa, oñ alu ma ne̩ je̩ tef ujadu.
Todu O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ kakini, Anyo̩ amu e̩ne̩ du ki ake̩do̩nʼowñ n.
Todu e̩ne̩-Ju kpai e̩ne̩-Grik chʼojoji ñw omune̩ n; todu owñ okate le̩ gbage̩de̩ chʼOndu e̩wñ du, i chʼanana ñw abo du ku ma kwadʼowñ.
Todu, ma ajadu e̩ne̩ du kʼi akwadʼodu Ondu.
Todule̩ abu ma ale ku ma akwado̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma ma ke̩do̩no ni taa? Abu ma ale ku ma ake̩do̩nʼe̩ne̩ ku ma ma gbʼo̩la-wñ mama ta n? Oñ abu ma ale ku ma agbo̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ ki atakoya ma de̩ n?
E̩ne̩ du ma kpʼuma uche̩ n abu ma ñʼale ku ma atakoya? Owñ chʼalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ le̩ kakini, Go abu kʼe̩re̩ abo ku ma nʼuche̩ e̩wñ ki nyo̩ aje̩ chʼalifia!
I muda chʼo̩chaka-ma gbʼo̩la Uche̩nyo̩ gbo̩ n. Todu Aizaya kakini, Ondu, e̩ne̩ ke̩do̩nʼo̩la kʼi gbo̩ ugbo wa?
Abe̩le̩ e̩do̩ eko̩no kwef o̩la egbo̩; o̩la egbo̩ la lʼef o̩la Kraist wa.
Ama u kakini, Ama gbo̩ n? Ma gbo̩ mana,
Ama u kakini, Abo Israe̩l ma n? Ejodudu Mose̩s kakini,
Aizaya la ne̩do̩ tabale, oñ i kakini,
I muda ka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, U fʼo̩wo̩-mi nadala gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩ ñw amone̩ ku ma ko̩ egbagbo̩ ku ma jʼajiñwa.
Todule̩ u kakini, O̩jo̩ kʼamone̩-wñ rinyo̩? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na! Todu abo Israe̩l omi che, ugbe̩ Ebraham, abo o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin u che.
O̩jo̩ kʼamone̩-wñ kʼi ma ma tane̩ rinyo̩ n. Abe̩k ame̩ ma e̩wñ kʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ka ef o̩la E̩laija abu kʼi rodubʼO̩jo̩ bʼabo Israe̩l ma n?
I kakini, Ondu, ma fʼamakache̩-we̩ kpa me̩, ma fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-we̩ kpo̩fo̩; oñ i bo̩ omi kate, ma la tene oji e-mi.
Ab O̩jo̩ muda dʼohi ñw u? I kakini, Aboke̩le̩ icham me̩jo̩ nyʼulo̩gwa ku ma ma kʼokuku nyane̩ ñwu Beal in bo̩ ñwu mi.
Abe̩le̩ iko-i ge̩, e̩fiye̩-ma ku ma chi lef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ chebo̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼi chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ che, mak i ño̩ kwef uko̩lo̩ eche ge̩ n; cho̩kpo̩ni ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ma ño̩ chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ge̩ n.
E̩wñ le̩ ta? O̩wo̩ abo Israe̩l la tu e̩wñ ku ma tene le̩ n; o̩wo̩ abo ku ma chi le̩ tʼu, i muda chi nyʼabo ki bo̩ o̩la,
i dʼalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ le̩ kakini,
Defid la kakini,
eju-ma ki chubi ku ma we egane̩;
Todule̩ u kakini, Ma ro̩ko̩ibu todu ku ma wane̩? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na! Uñwanane̩-ma muda je̩ ñw ujadu do̩mo̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi, todu kʼi nyi abo Israe̩l ogu eja.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼuñwanane̩-ma chʼe̩wñ ene̩ nana ñw abo ile̩ kʼofu ki bu ma je̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi ki nʼe̩wñ nana, mak e̩wñ-ma jo̩ kpa fa i atule ololo n?
U muda aka ñw ame̩ abo uche̩ichi todabu kʼomi chʼe̩nukpuche̩ ku ma kpe̩ nyʼugbo abo uche̩ichi, nabʼojima mʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ñw one̩ kʼu nache,
natene ugbo du kʼu nanyʼabo o̩re̩la-mi le̩ ogu eja, kʼu fʼiche̩kibo̩ jadu kwef uma.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼeko ma rinyo̩ chʼuño̩ru ñw abo ile̩, emʼuma gba fa ki ma chʼiñmi kwef abo ki ku n?
I la che̩wñ kʼejo̩ga e̩wñ afo̩ mak abe̩le̩ o̩gbo̩dudu-wñ de̩; iche̩wñ kʼili oli afo̩, mak abe̩le̩ e̩to̩-wñ de̩ ge̩.
I muda che̩wñ ku ma fʼe̩to̩-wñ iche̩kibo̩ nya, taku ma fʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ chʼoli o̩lif efoko be̩nyʼu tʼef uma, kʼuwe̩ la mud e̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ kpʼama mana nyʼili oli o̩lif le̩ kʼe̩ la ñmʼomi o̩la-wñ,
uwe̩ ki buba ñw e̩to̩-wñ n; i muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ buba, i chʼuwe̩ nʼili le̩ n, chai ili nʼuwe̩.
Todule̩ uwe̩ akakini, Ma fʼe̩to̩-wñ nya ku ma fʼumi be̩nyʼu koji.
I nyo̩; tod eko̩ ku ma ko̩ eke̩do̩no oñ ma fʼuma nya, e̩do̩ ekono la chʼe̩wñ kʼuwe̩ dago. E̩ ki ke n, chai ailo-wñ ki nabʼe̩,
todu iche̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ ma do̩wo̩mʼe̩to̩ kʼoli le̩ ta o̩to̩to̩la-wñ n, i la adowomʼuwe̩ ni ge̩.
Todule̩ e̩ nago umo̩la O̩jo̩ kpai ukpuna-wñ ta. Ukpuna-wñ dʼoji abo ki wane̩, umo̩la O̩jo̩ la dʼoji e-we̩, iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ adʼef umo̩la-wñ alo waa; cho̩kpo̩ni ma ñʼakʼuwe̩ da tinyo̩ ge̩.
Oñ abo-i ge̩, iche̩wñ ku ma ma ko̩ eke̩do̩no gbogbo alo n, ma afʼuma be̩nyʼu, todu O̩jo̩ neke dabi fʼuma be̩nyʼu ge̩.

Todu iche̩wñ ku ma fʼuwe̩ ko̩da kwef oli o̩lif e-efoko, ku ma la fʼuwe̩ be̩nyʼoli o̩lif e-unyi kʼuwe̩ ma chʼe̩to̩-wñ kwʼabakwane̩ n, i chʼabo ku ma chʼe̩to̩ e-unyi kwʼabakwane̩ oñ ma abe̩nyʼoli o̩lif e-ma tule n?
Todu, amo̩maye, i dʼumi e̩do̩ ku me̩ chʼugbodu afili-i n, tode̩gba ku me̩ mud amanibe ej o̩la-me̩, kakini, E̩do̩ eno̩ ke̩re̩bʼabo Israe̩l iche̩ka gbogbo tak aluka abo uche̩ichi ki jo̩ kpa;
tak abe̩le̩ ma ajadu abo Israe̩l chaka alu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini,
alo kʼomi akpe̩ kpai ama,
I chʼe-Uche̩nyo̩ ma chʼame̩nebi lugbo e-me̩; i muda chʼe-one̩ echi ma chʼabo ufe̩do̩ lugbo abogijo igbele le̩.
Todu ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai udo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ adʼone̩ nʼeribeda n.
Todu alu kʼame̩ ko̩ egbʼo̩la O̩jo̩ gbo̩ akwoubi, ku ma la li ume̩ ejumomi fai lef eko̩ kʼabo-i ko̩ egbagbo̩,
abe̩le̩ abo-i ño̩ ko̩ egbʼo̩la gbo̩ fa-i, todu kʼi ño̩ li uma ejumomi lef ejumomi e-me̩ kʼi li.
Todu O̩jo̩ fʼo̩na re nyʼo̩chaka amone̩ tef eko̩ egbagbo̩ todu kʼi li o̩chaka-ma ejumomi.
O, anana O̩jo̩ ki nʼefu, kpai ibe kpai ema kʼi ma e̩wñ! Ili oj ajo̩-wñ kʼi akpa jʼagwa n, o̩na-wñ jʼate̩ n!
Todu e̩ne̩ ma ibe Ondu? abe̩k e̩ne̩ te̩tabʼo̩ lʼo̩la?
Abe̩k e̩ne̩ du e̩wñ ñw owñ o̩gba taku ma adabi du ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ koji?
Todu owñ chʼe̩te̩ e̩wñ du, e̩wñ du lef uwñ wa, e̩wñ du la do̩mo̩ ñw owñ. O̩jima ki chʼe-wñ ogbegbele̩. Ami.
Todule̩ amo̩maye, nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, tod ejumomi-wa kʼO̩jo̩ li, ame̩ ki mʼaño̩la-me̩ kojo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ki deju kʼi afo̩ kʼi nyʼo̩ eju, ucholo ku me̩ nʼibe ache de̩.

Me̩ ki che ku me̩ dab abo o̩kpanachi-i eju one̩ n, ama ibe-me̩ ki dʼetito̩ alo waa kʼi rʼume̩ da ojoji, kʼame̩ ki nañwa e̩wñ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩, kʼi nyo̩ kʼi ño̩ nyo̩ eju, kʼi la mufu kpa, go ka kʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ i che.

Todu naka ñw e̩ne̩ du ki dʼef ume̩ lef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ku ma du ñwu mi, ka kʼi we edʼo̩la-wñ rʼone̩ tʼalu ki chʼukpe̩ ibe-wñ le̩, ibe e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki muda chʼibe ki wane̩, teju alu kʼO̩jo̩ fʼe̩ñwa e̩do̩ ekono kpe̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩.
Todu alu kʼawa chenʼe̩wñ año̩la wewe ef año̩laʼka, kʼuko̩lo̩ kʼe̩wñ año̩la wewe le̩ nʼache ma chʼokate n,
abe̩le̩ awa kʼa chʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ chʼaño̩laʼka efu Kraisti, okoke-wa la chʼe̩wñ año̩la omune̩.
Abu kʼa la nʼele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ojoji ojoji teju alu kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ku ma du ñw a de̩, dagba i chʼache̩-eka, ache̩-eka-wa ki chʼeju e̩do̩ ekono-wa;
abe̩k i chʼe̩wñ eche ñw one̩, kʼa najʼef e̩wñ eche ñw one̩ alo waa; abe̩k i chʼe̩ne̩ ki akone̩wñ, kʼi nadʼef e̩wñ ekone̩ alo waa;

abe̩k i chʼe̩ne̩ ki adʼugbe̩do̩ ñw one̩, kʼi nadʼef ugbe̩do̩ edu ñw one̩ alo waa; e̩ne̩ ki akpʼe̩wñ kpʼone̩, kʼi nache kpai e̩do̩-wawa; e̩ne̩ ki tʼo̩gba, kʼi nache ef e̩do̩chacha; e̩ne̩ ki ali ejumomi one̩, kʼi nache kpai e̩do̩ afu.
Ufe̩do̩-me̩ ki nʼako̩ru n; e̩wñ bibi ki nachʼe̩wñ o̩lajijili ñwu me̩; me̩ nalamʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩.
I chʼeche̩do̩ amo̩maye, me̩ ki che̩do̩ omune̩ dabe̩ne̩ ku me̩ chʼefu; i chʼebumʼone̩, me̩ ki dʼomune̩ tʼo̩gba.
I chʼe-e̩do̩ chacha, me̩ ki chʼo̩kpo̩ n; afu ki kpuna ef e̩do̩-me̩, me̩ nachuko̩lo̩ adu ñw Ondu;
me̩ nayo̩ ef ibe ekono; me̩ nafe̩do̩ lichi ef o̩bata; me̩ gwo̩nyʼadua eche alo waa;
me̩ natuta kpai abo kiafo̩ ef eku e̩wñ ki aku ma; me̩ nabʼojo eche kpe̩re̩;
me̩ nakadua ñwabo ku ma doli me̩; me̩ kadua, me̩ ki nama n.
Me̩ nabʼabo ku ma yo̩ yo̩; me̩ nabʼabo ku ma raku raku.
Ibe-me̩ ki chʼokate kpai omune̩. Ibe-me̩ ki tʼe̩wñ ogbemede n, me̩ ki muda leb abo ku ma hi o̩la-ma wane̩. Me̩ ki mud amanibe eju o̩la-me̩ n.
Me̩ ki dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ koji e̩bie̩ne̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du n. Me̩ fʼibe wñ kpe̩ tane̩ kʼe̩wñ-me̩ chaka ki chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ eju amone̩ du.
Iche̩wñ kʼi jʼache i bo̩ te̩ ñw e-me̩, ure̩do̩ ki dʼagbagba me̩ kpai amone̩ du.
Abo ufe̩do̩, me̩ ki nache̩ o̩la-me̩ n, me̩ ki la bʼuña te̩ ñw uwe̩do̩; todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, Ondu kakini, Ache̩ ena chʼe-mi, omi anakoji.
I muda che̩wñ kʼebi akpa e̩nebi-we̩, e̩ ñwʼo̩ o̩je̩ kʼi je̩; alugbe̩ akpʼo, dʼomi ñw u ñmo̩; todu e̩ che-i, mak e̩ge̩-una uwe̩ agbanyʼo oji le̩.
E̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩bie̩ne̩ fʼe̩ du n, e̩ ki muda nʼe̩nyo̩ fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ du.
Onugo e̩ne̩ du ki nafʼo̩la-wñ kamuhite̩ ñw abo̩da ki nʼowñ, todu o̩da du do̩mo̩ tʼe-ki kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ le n. E-ki do̩mo̩ abajo̩-i O̩jo̩ ko jo̩-i.
Todu abe̩le̩, e̩ne̩ ki ako̩ e̩gba e̩wñ kʼo̩da ka, mak e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ du nyane̩ oñ i akobo̩ le̩; abo ku ma kobʼo̩ fʼajo̩ fa bʼo̩la-ma ma me̩.
Todu ame̩nuto̩gba chʼe̩wñ ubailo ugbo uko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩ n, chai ugbo e-ki bie̩ne̩. I la dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ we erailo o̩da? Mak e̩ che e̩wñ ki nyo̩, tak uwe̩ anʼuñwulo̩ ugbo-wñ;

todu owñ chʼache e̩wñ ñw O̩jo̩ kʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ ñw e̩. I muda che̩wñ kʼuwe̩ dʼef e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ eche mak e̩ narailo; todu ugbada kʼi ne̩ chʼofofo n; todu achʼe̩wñ ñw O̩jo̩ i che, owñ chʼanache̩ kʼi awe̩do̩ rʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼef e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ache.
Lef e-le̩ oñ i dukpe̩ ku me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ kamuhite̩ ñw u, i chʼutodu uwe̩do̩ kate n, chai tod akone̩-o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩-we̩ ge̩.
Todu e̩wñ ki chi ku me̩ re̩ ma de̩; todu ama chʼame̩nuko̩lo̩ O̩jo̩ ku ma dikpala e̩wñ-i gbage̩de̩.

Me̩ ki rʼo̩me̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ku me̩ nʼo̩me̩; e̩ne̩ ku ma dʼo̩kane̩ ñw u me̩ nadʼo̩kane̩ ñw u; e̩ne̩ ku ma dʼo̩kʼo̩da ñw u me̩ nadʼo̩kʼo̩da ñw u; e̩ne̩ ku ma railo-wñ, me̩ narailo-wñ; e̩ne̩ ku ma bʼojima mʼo̩, me̩ nabumʼo̩.
Me̩ ki je̩ e̩ne̩ du o̩me̩ n, chai efe̩do̩ omune̩; todu e̩ne̩ ki afe̩do̩ e̩ne̩ omune̩ fʼe̩wñ o̩lo̩da chekpa me̩.

E̩ ki tene o̩ya e̩ne̩ omune̩ n, e̩ ki kpone̩ n, e̩ ki joji n, e̩ ki chʼejufufu n, i la che̩wñ kʼo̩la uko̩ omune̩ ojoji ño̩ do̩mo̩, o̩chaka-wñ rʼoji jo̩ ef o̩la okate-i kakini, E̩ ki fe̩do̩ ekeji-we̩ dab o̩la-we̩.
Ufe̩do̩ achuko̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ ñw ekeji-wñ n; todule̩ ufe̩do̩ chʼe̩wñ o̩lo̩da echekpa.
Kpʼe-i ge̩ kakini, Abu ku me̩ chema iko-i kakini, Adiko ku me̩ jolu lewa me̩; todu fa-i ujadu-wa me̩ru tʼe̩gba kʼa ke̩do̩no le.
O̩jo̩ du kpo̩kpe̩ me̩; o̩jo̩ la me̩ eñwa; todule̩ awa ki mʼuko̩lo̩ e̩chubi gwojane̩, kʼa la mʼe̩wñ ido̩na ogu ugane̩ ko nyʼo̩la.
A ki tale e̩te̩le̩ dabe̩ne̩ ki chʼoro̩ka; awa ki jʼef e̩wñ awulu kpai o̩te̩ eñmo̩ n, awa ki jʼef ejuaga kpai e̩wñtuñ eche n, awa ki jʼef aro̩ ero̩ kpai ogu eja n.
Me̩ kʼi muda mʼOndu Jisus Kraisti dutʼo̩la; me̩ ki kpʼibe tane̩ tod e̩wñ kʼo̩re̩la achʼe̩ño̩-wñ n.
Oñ e̩ne̩gbo ef e̩do̩ ekono, me̩ mʼu gba cho̩la; i ki muda chʼutodu kʼame̩ ki ñwʼibe kʼi dʼef uwñ go n.
I nʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ake̩do̩no kʼi aje̩ e̩wñ du, e̩ne̩gbo la aje̩ e̩wñ uche̩ kate.
E̩ne̩ ki aje̩ ki dʼe̩ne̩ ki ma je̩ n rʼibe̩te̩ n, e̩ne̩ ki ma je̩ n le̩ ki we ekpʼe̩ne̩ ki aje̩ abi; todu O̩jo̩ mʼowñ gba cho̩la me̩.
Uwe̩ kʼuwe̩ akajo̩ imo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ omune̩, e̩ne̩ uwe̩ che taa? Edago-wñ ewane̩-wñ, o̩wo̩ odu-wñ i de̩. I la adago; todu Ondu neke je̩ ñw u dago.
Eju e̩ne̩ʼka o̩jo̩ ki añwa tʼomune̩ le: eju e̩ne̩ omune̩ o̩jo̩ du chʼe̩go̩. E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki namʼo̩gbali-wñ ef ibe e-wñ.
E̩ne̩ ki adʼibe tʼo̩jo̩ʼka, mak Ondu i adʼibe tʼo̩ ñw u; oñ e̩ne̩ ki aje̩ e̩wñ, Ondu i aje̩ ñw u, oñ O̩jo̩ i agwʼo̩ ugwa-wñ; e̩ne̩ ki we̩ eje̩, mak Ondu i we eje̩ ñw u, O̩jo̩ i la agwʼo̩ kpo̩.
Todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du ef uwa ki adeju ñw o̩la-wñ n, e̩ne̩ du la aku ñw o̩la-wñ n.
Todu dagba a adeju, a adeju ñw Ondu; dagba a ku, a ku ñw Ondu; todule̩ dagba a adeju, dagba a aku abo Ondu a che.
Todu e̩wñ le̩ Kraisti leku, i ño̩ deju ge̩, owñ chʼutodu kʼi mud Ondu abo ki ku kpai abo ki deju.
E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ akajo̩ o̩maye-we̩ taa? abe̩k e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ achʼe̩de̩te̩ o̩maye-we̩? todu o̩chaka-wa adago o̩gba e̩de̩ O̩jo̩.
Todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-wa acholi e̩wñ e-wñ ñw O̩jo̩ chuu.
Todule̩ awa ki ño̩ kajo̩ omune̩ ge̩ n; e-ku me̩ muda ka de̩, kakini, One̩ ki we edʼe̩wñ uke̩re̩ abe̩k e̩wñ udahi te̩ ñw o̩maye-wñ.
U chema, eju-mi la mute̩gu ef Ondu Jisus, kakini, I nʼe̩wñ du ki chʼe̩wñ elifo̩ kpʼojika o̩la-wñ n, chai ugbo e̩ne̩ ki fʼu lo rʼelifo̩, ugbo e̩ne̩ le̩ i mud elifo̩.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe̩do̩ o̩maye-we̩ mukpabie̩ lef uje̩wñ kʼe̩ je̩, mak i chʼufe̩do̩ oñ e̩ tale ef uwñ le̩ ge̩ n. E̩ ki dʼuje̩wñ-we̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ ki Kraisti leku tod uwñ bie̩ n.
Todule̩ e̩nyo̩-me̩ ki we echʼe̩wñ ku ma chʼakpabie̩-wñ;
todu ojane̩ O̩jo̩ chʼe̩wñ eje̩ kpai e̩ñmo̩ n, chai o̩kpakpa kpai ure̩do̩ kpai uyo̩ ef Afu Kiafo̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki dʼef e̩wñ-i achuko̩lo̩ adu ñwu Kraisti nyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju, amone̩ la fʼu ñwa kʼi nyo̩.
Todabe̩le̩ awa ki nabʼe̩wñ e-ure̩do̩ kpe̩re̩, kpai e̩wñ kʼa du ne omune̩ nyo̩gba.
E̩ ki gu uko̩io̩ O̩jo̩ lo̩ tod uje̩wñ n. E̩wñ du chefe̩ mana; i muda bie̩ne̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki aje̩ lef uke̩re̩.
I nyo̩ kʼe̩ we e̩la eje̩ kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩ñmo̩ kpai ewe eche e̩wñ du kʼo̩maye-we̩ ake̩re̩ ef uwñ, abe̩k e-kʼi adʼo̩ hi, abe̩k e-kʼi agwe̩gbo.
E̩do̩ ekono kʼe̩ ne̩ e̩ ki ne̩ ñw o̩la-we̩ eju O̩jo̩. E̩ne̩ ki fʼe̩wñ ñwa rʼe̩nyo̩ kʼi ma dabi agwʼajo̩ nʼo̩la-wñ ef uwñ n, gbede!
Ama e̩ne̩ kʼibe-wñ chʼeji eji, kʼi la je̩, ma fʼabi kpʼo̩ me̩, todabu kʼe̩te̩-wñ ma chʼe̩do̩ ekono n; e̩wñ du kʼe̩te̩-wñ ma chʼe̩do̩ eko̩no̩ n, adure i che.
I la dukpe̩ kʼawa kʼa nʼukpahiu kʼa bʼabo ku ma ma nʼukpahiu n nʼadu e̩gbo̩-ma, kʼa we enyo̩ o̩la-wa eju.
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-wa ki nache e̩wñ ki rʼekeji-wñ eju, owñ chʼe̩wñ kʼi nyo̩ kʼi ane̩ owñ nyo̩gba.
Todu Kraisti onugo che e̩wñ ki rʼo̩la-wñ eju n; chai alu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini, Icha ku ma ka ñw e̩ lewa bʼumi ma.
Todu alu-ka e̩wñ du ku ma ko̩tane̩ o̩gbo̩gba, ma ko̩tane̩ todu kʼi ko wa e̩wñ, todu kʼawa ki nʼibe-ekono lef e̩do̩ e̩lichi kpai lef ugbe̩do̩ e-O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩.
O̩jo̩ e-e̩do̩-elichi kpai e-ugbe̩do̩ ki nadu ñwu me̩ kʼibe-me̩ ki chʼokate kpai omune̩ alu ku Kraisti Jisus neku;
todu kʼe̩do̩-me̩ ki chʼoka ku me̩ nʼalu okate adojima ñw O̩jo̩ kpai Ata Ondu-wa Jisusi Kraist.
Lef e-le̩ me̩ nagbʼo̩la-me̩ cho̩la, alu ki Kraisti ño̩ gba wa cho̩la, kʼO̩jo̩ ki nʼojima.
Todu u kakini, Kraisti mud e̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ lʼo̩na e̩pi-eda ñw ochochi O̩jo̩, kʼi je̩ ñw o̩la kʼi katane̩ ñw abogijo igbele le̩ ki lonyane̩,
kʼabo uche̩ichi ki ño̩ dojima ñw O̩jo̩ tod ejumomi-wñ; alu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini,
I ño̩ ka kakini,
I ño̩ ka ge̩ kakini,
Aizaya ño̩ ka kakini,
Oñ O̩jo̩ e-ibe ekono le̩ ki naje̩ ñwu me̩ ko̩ ñw uyo̩ du kpai ure̩do̩ ef eke̩do̩no ku me̩ ake̩do̩no, kʼibe ekono-me̩ ki chʼololo ef ukpahiu Afu Kiafo̩.
Ama, amo̩maye-mi, eju-mi onugo mute̩gu ugbo e-me̩ kakini, Ame̩ onugo che̩ko̩ tiili ñw e̩nyo̩, e̩wñ ema du che̩ko̩ ef ume̩, me̩ la neke ko̩ omune̩ ibe.
Oñ i nʼugbo kʼu ne̩do̩ tule ef o̩takada kʼu ko̩ rʼume̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼu re me̩ wa lef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ku ma du ñwu mi kwugbo O̩jo̩,

kʼomi ki chʼe̩nuko̩lo̩ Kraisti Jisus ñw abo uche̩ichi kʼu chuko̩lo̩ atama ef Uche̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩, kʼekowa ku ma kʼabo uche̩ichi wa ki mud e̩wñ ki nyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju e̩gba, abu ku ma mud e̩wñ kiafo̩ ef Afu Kiafo̩.
Todule̩ u chenʼuba kʼu naba efu Kraisti Jisus ugbo e̩wñ e-O̩jo̩.
Todu u gbe̩do̩ ako̩la e̩wñ du ki ma chʼe-ki Kraisti che lef umi todu kʼabo uche̩ichi ki mugbagbo̩, ugbo o̩la eka kpai uko̩lo̩ eche n,
ef ukpahiu ujiwe kpai uno̩ ef ukpahiu Afu Kiafo̩; todabe̩le̩ akwo Je̩rusale̩m kpai ane̩ ki lʼo daka gbogbo wa Iliriko̩m, omi fʼUche̩nyo̩ Kraisti je̩rʼuma kpa;
abe̩le̩ e̩wñ ki kad omi eju chʼUche̩nyo̩ eje̩, i chʼugbo ku ma dʼodu Kraisti akwoubi n, todu kʼu we ekʼunyi oj e̩re̩ unyi kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ ñwa;
ki la dʼalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Lef e-le̩, oñ o̩na kʼu ma lewʼugbo me̩ chʼe̩kpanyʼumi ogbe̩e̩;
ama fai, abu kʼu ma nʼuña ugbo-i ge̩ n, abu kʼo̩do̩ kʼeju che mi kʼu wʼugbo me̩ chewewe me̩,
e̩gba du kʼu nalale nyi Spen u kibeno ka kʼu nali me̩ ab u nalale gu ef ume̩ du, ku me̩ chʼahite̩-mi nyʼo̩mo̩ kʼe̩do̩-mi ki bo̩ pe̩ ejodudu lugbo eju-me̩ kʼu nali,
ama nanyi Je̩rusale̩m abajo̩-i, achʼe̩wñ ñw abo kiafo̩.
Todu i rʼabo Masidonia kpai abo Akaya e̩do̩ ku ma tuta kpai ame̩nale ku ma jʼef abo kiafo̩ Je̩rusale̩m.
Todu erʼuma e̩do̩ i rʼuma e̩do̩, ame̩no̩me̩-ma ma la che. Todu iche̩wñ kʼabo uche̩ichi tuta kpai ama ef e̩wñ e-afu, mak ama le̩ la nʼuma o̩me̩ ku ma chʼabune̩-ma ef e̩wñ o̩re̩la.
Todule̩ e̩gba kʼu fʼe̩wñ-i chekpa, kʼu la fʼe̩ro-i hiuko̩ ñwu ma, nakwʼo̩mo̩ lʼugbo me̩ nyi Spen.
U la chema kakini, Ewa kʼu nawʼugbo me̩ achʼef e̩ko̩ e̩nyo̩ Kraisti.
Ama, amo̩maye, nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩ lef Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti, kpai lef ufe̩do̩ Afu Kiafo̩ ge̩, ku me̩ fejugbiti ku me̩ bʼumi chadua ñw O̩jo̩ tod umi;
ku ma ki mʼumi gba bʼo̩wo̩ abo ku ma jo̩ Judia ku ma ko̩ egbagbo̩ te̩, kʼe̩wñ-mi kʼu nache ñw abo Je̩rusale̩m ki mud e̩wñ ki nyo̩ abo kiafo̩ eju e̩gba;
todu kʼu wʼugbo me̩ kpai uyo̩ kʼomi kpʼame̩ ki nʼuñmi iche̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ je̩.
O̩jo̩ e-ure̩do̩ ki dʼugbo me̩ chaka. Ami.
Fibi o̩maye-wa onobule̩ ku me̩ li-i omi me̩ li le̩, owñ ño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ ñw ujeju abudo̩ Ondu ki de̩ Se̩nkria;
todu ku me̩ ki mʼu gba cho̩la ef Ondu alu ki chʼeju-wñ ugbo abo kiafo̩; ku me̩ bʼo̩ kpe̩nyʼu eku e̩wñ du kʼi akʼu; todu owñ mud e̩ne̩ ki gbʼamone̩ wewe nyi kpʼomi onugo ge̩.
Me̩ gwa Priska kpai Akwila, ku ma abʼumi chuko̩lo̩ efu Kraisti Jisus,
ku ma la fʼoji-ma gbali te̩ tod onugo-mi; i chʼomi kate agwa ma n, abo ujeju Ondu du ku ma chʼabo uche̩ichi agwa ma ge̩:
me̩ gwa ujeju abudo̩ Ondu ki dʼunyi-ma. Me̩ gwa E̩paine̩to̩s e̩nufe̩do̩-mi, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ ejo̩ga abo Esia ñwu Kraisti.
Me̩ gwa Me̩n, ki chakanya e̩wñ nana todu me̩ le̩.
Me̩ gwa Andro̩niko̩s kpai Janias, amefu-mi kʼomi kpai ama chʼe̩namu, ku ma nʼuwohi ef ame̩nukpuche̩ le̩; ma laño̩ jʼefu Kraisti o̩gbami.
Me̩ gwa Ampliato̩s, e̩nufe̩do̩-mi ef Ondu.
Me̩ gwa O̩rbano̩s, e̩ne̩ ki abʼuwa chuko̩lo̩ efu Kraisti, kpai Stakus e̩nufe̩do̩-mi.
Me̩ gwa Ape̩le̩s e̩ne̩ ku ma fʼu ñwa kʼi nyo̩ efu Kraisti. Me̩ gwa abo Aristo̩bulo̩s.
Me̩ gwa He̩ro̩dio̩n, kʼi chʼefu-mi. Me̩ gwa abo Narsiso̩s ku ma jʼefu Ondu.
Me̩ gwa Trufana kpai Trufosa ku ma achʼakanya uko̩lo̩ ef Ondu le̩. Me̩ gwa Pe̩rsis e̩nufe̩do̩ kʼi chʼakanya uko̩lo̩ nana ef Ondu.
Me̩ gwa Rufo̩s e̩ne̩ ku ma chi ef Ondu le̩, kpai iye-wñ ki ño̩ chʼiye-mi ge̩.
Me̩ gwa Asunkrito̩s kpai Fle̩go̩n kpai He̩rme̩s kpai Patro̩bas kpai He̩rmas, kpai amo̩maye ku ma manyʼuma.
Me̩ gwa Filo̩lo̩go̩s kpai Julia kpai Nere̩o̩s kpai o̩maye-wñ onobule̩, kpai O̩lumpas kpai abo kiafo̩ du ku ma manyʼuma.
Me̩ dʼukalu kiafo̩ gwʼomune̩. Ujeju abudo̩ Kraisti duu agwa me̩.
Oñ o̩ko̩ nagha bʼume̩, amo̩maye, me̩ nafʼeju mʼabo ku ma jʼadʼamone̩ rʼeji ku ma la ada amone̩ hi tʼojoji ñw o̩la kʼame̩ ko̩che̩ le̩ ne̩: ku me̩ muna bʼuma te̩.
Todu abo e̩go̩-i achuko̩lo̩ adu ñw Ondu-wa Kraisti n, chai ef uma ma re̩; oñ ma nʼurinyo̩ o̩fa kpai ele eka mʼame̩ne̩do̩foo̩ ibe da.
Todu egbagbo̩ ku me̩ gbagbo̩ kwo̩tʼamone̩ du e̩ti. Todule̩ oñ nayo̩ todu me̩, i la dʼumi e̩do̩ ku me̩ chʼamanibe ugbo e̩wñ ki nyo̩, kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ki we egwe̩gwa nyʼume̩.
Oñ O̩jo̩ e-ure̩do̩ la akpi Setan fo̩ ef e̩re̩-me̩ ofeje̩i. Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu-wa Jisusi Kraisti ki dʼugbo me̩.
Timoti, kʼi abʼumi chʼuko̩lo̩, agwa me̩, kpai Lukio̩s kpai Jeso̩n kpai Sosipata amefu-mi le̩.
Omi, Te̩rtio̩s kʼu nakʼo̩takada-i, agwa me̩ ef Ondu.
Gayo̩s e̩ne̩nyi-mi kpai abo ujeju-i chaka agwa me̩. Irasto̩s, adʼo̩kpulu ewo-i, agwa me̩, kpai Kwarto̩s o̩maye le̩. [
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti ki dʼugbo me̩ chaka. Ami.]
Tʼugbo e̩ne̩ ki neke fume̩ e̩re̩ nyane̩ teju alu kʼUche̩nyo̩-mi kpai o̩la akoya Jisus Kraisti de̩, teju alu ku ma mʼafili bite̩ ku ma dute̩ chii o̩kpanachi o̩kpanachi ogbegbele̩ le̩,
ku ma la mʼu du tejugede abajo̩-i, oñ ma je̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi du ku ma mʼo̩ lef o̩takada kʼamakache̩ ko̩ teju alu kʼO̩jo̩ e-ogbegbele̩ fʼuko̩-wñ te̩, kʼama ki mʼo̩la e̩do̩ ekono gbagbo̩;
tʼugbo O̩jo̩ kate ki nʼibe le̩, lefu Jisus Kraisti, owñ ki nʼojima tʼogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa. Ami.
Po̩l, e̩nukpuche̩ e-Jisusi Kraisti lugbo edo̩ ku ma dʼo̩ lef ede̩ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩, kpai So̩ste̩nes, o̩maye le̩,
tugbo ujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩ ki de̩ Ko̩rint, ku ma je̩ ñw ma fo̩ efu Kraisti Jisus, abo kiafo̩ tod edo̩ ku ma do̩ ma, manyʼabo ugbo du ku ma jʼakwadʼodu Ondu-wa Jisusi Kraist, e-ma kpai e-wa:
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼure̩do̩ ki chʼe-me̩ kwugbo O̩jo̩ Ata-wa kpai Ondu Jisusi Kraist.
NagwʼO̩jo̩-mi e̩gba du todu me̩ noj ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ ku ma du ñw me̩ efu Kraisti Jisus;
todabu ku ma mʼume̩ ko chʼanana ef e̩wñ du ef uwñ, ef o̩la du kpai ef e̩wñ ema du;
dabalu ku ma fʼibenu Kraisti lonyane̩ ef ume̩:
todabe̩le̩ ame̩ dubi ef ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ du n: me̩ jo̩ afejuto̩na ane̩de ubireju e-Ondu-wa Jisusi Kraist;
e-ki año̩ fʼume̩ lonyane̩ gbogbo wʼukpoji, ki we enʼugbo ku ma akʼalu nyʼume̩ o̩la iko o̩jo̩ Ondu-wa Jisusi Kraist.
O̩jo̩ chʼachubi one̩, lef uwñ ma fʼume̩ do̩ tef uta e-O̩ma-wñ Jisusi Kraist Ondu-wa, eta.

Oñ nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, amo̩maye, lef odu Ondu-wa Jisusi Kraisti, todu kʼo̩chaka-me̩ ki kʼomu okate, kʼudate̩ i ojoji ki we edʼef ume̩: ku me̩ la chʼe̩ñwo̩che rʼalukate te̩, kʼibe-me̩ ki chʼoka. Oñ alu kʼe̩wñ de̩ eju-me̩ ki ño̩ chʼoka ge̩.
Todu abo Klo dʼo̩la-me̩ dufu ñw mi, amo̩maye, ka kʼaro̩ dʼef ume̩.
E-kʼu naka-i de̩, kakini, E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ef ume̩ aka kakini, Omi kʼu chʼe̩ne̩ Po̩l de̩; omi la chʼe̩ne̩ Apolo̩s; omi la chʼe̩ne̩ Kifas; omi la chʼe̩ne̩ Kraist.
Kraisti chʼe̩kpe̩ru ojoji ojoji le̩e̩? Po̩l oñ ma fʼu kamoli todu me̩-i ke n? Abe̩ku ma fʼume̩ che baptism tef odu Po̩l?
NagwʼO̩jo̩ ugwa todabu kʼu ma chʼe̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ baptism n, chai Krispus kpai Gayo̩s ñwa-i.
Tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du ma aka kakini, Ma fʼume̩ che baptism ef odu e-mi Po̩l.
U muda ño̩ che abʼunyi Stefano̩s baptism ge̩: i chʼe-abo ki bo̩, abe̩k u che e̩ne̩ omune̩ baptism le̩-o, u ma n.
Todu Kraisti kpʼumi uche̩ baptism echʼone̩ n, chai Uche̩nyo̩ eje̩ rʼone̩: i chʼef o̩la ofili eka n, tode̩gba kʼoli uku Kraist amud ofofo.
Todu o̩la oli uku le̩ chʼe̩wñ e̩fu-le̩fu ñw abo ku ma jʼalenyo̩-i; ama ukpahiu O̩jo̩ i muda che ñw awa ku ma jadu-i.
Todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Ugbo e̩nofili de̩? Ugbo ako̩takada de̩? Ugbo e̩niñwa e-o̩kpanachi kide̩-i de̩? O̩jo̩ mʼofili ile̩-i du chʼe̩wñ e̩fule̩fu ta n?
Todu abu ki chʼef ofili O̩jo̩ oñ ile̩ ma nʼofili e-wñ ma O̩jo̩ n, i rʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ kʼi fʼamake̩do̩no jadu lef e̩fule̩fu e-akoya eta.
Abu kʼamaJu tene ujiwe, kʼamaGrik la feju e̩wñ ofili:
awa muda nʼakoya Kraisti ku ma kamoli le̩ ata, e̩wñ-udʼamaJu hi i che, e̩wñ e̩fule̩fu i la che ugbo abo uche̩ichi.
Ama ugbo abʼudo̩, tʼamaju tʼamaGrik, Kraisti chʼukpahiu O̩jo̩ kpai ofili O̩jo̩.
Todabu kʼe̩fule̩fu e-O̩jo̩ chʼofili tʼamone̩ le̩; e̩wñ e̩gbo e-O̩jo̩ la gbiñmi tʼamone̩ le ge̩.
Todu, me̩ gʼudo̩ ku ma do̩ me̩ le̩, amo̩maye, kakini, I chʼame̩no̩fili likpa o̩re̩la wewe n, i chʼame̩nukpahiu wewe n, i chʼabo ku ma bi ma lʼeju O̩jo̩ wewe n:
chai e̩wñ e̩fule̩fu ile̩-i oñ O̩jo̩ chi, todu kʼi je̩ ñw anyo̩ mu ame̩nofili; O̩jo̩ laño̩ fʼe̩wñ e̩gbo ile̩-i chi todu kʼi je̩ ñw anyo̩ ki fʼe̩wñ ki gbiñmi mu:
kpai e̩wñ ku ma ma bi lʼeju O̩jo̩ n, kpai e̩wñ ibe̩te̩ oñ O̩jo̩ chi, e̩wñ ki ma dede̩ n le̩, todu kʼi fʼe̩wñ ki do̩mo̩ gbogili te̩.
Todu kʼo̩re̩la du ki we ebuba eju O̩jo̩.
Owñ la chʼe̩te̩-me̩ efu Kraisti Jisusi kʼi mud ofili ñw wa kwugbo O̩jo̩, tʼo̩kpakpa tʼefo̩, tʼula-one̩-tane̩:
todu ki dabalu ki che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki abuba kʼi nabuba ef Ondu.
Oñ ewa kʼomi wʼugbo me̩ le̩, amo̩maye, u wa kpai o̩la e̩te̩le̩ eka, abe̩k ofili ajʼuche̩ o̩la ibenu e-O̩jo̩ rʼume̩ n.
Todu u fʼu ñwa te̩ ka kʼu namʼe̩wñ du ef ume̩ n, chai Jisusi Kraist, owñ le̩ la chʼabu ku ma fʼu kamoli le̩.
Omi laño̩ dʼugbo me̩ ef e̩gbo kpʼef ailo kpʼef o̩la ega nana.
Oñ o̩la kʼu ka kpʼakoya kʼu ta i la chʼef o̩la ofili ki agbʼone̩ ibe n, chai ef Afu kpai ukpahiu kʼame̩ li:
todu kʼe̩do̩ ekono-me̩ ki we ede̩ ef ofili one̩, chai ef ukpahiu O̩jo̩.
A muda ako̩la ofili ef amo̩kone̩: i muda chʼofili e-o̩kpanachi kide̩ n, i la chʼe-amagboji o̩kpanuchi-i ku ma fʼu gbogili te̩-i n:
a muda ako̩la ofili O̩jo̩ ef afili, owñ chʼe-ki te̩te̩maja le̩, e-kʼO̩jo̩ fudate̩ o̩gba tak o̩kpanachi, o̩kpanachi do̩mo̩ tod ojima e-wa.
E-kʼe̩ne̩ du ef amagboji o̩kpanachi kide̩ ma ma n: todu ama ma ma, ma ma dʼOndu ojima kaba mʼoli uku le̩ n:
ama i dabalu ki che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
O̩jo̩ muda mubite̩ ñw wa lef Afu-wñ; todu Afu le̩ atejane̩ e̩wñ du, i chaka chʼe̩wñ unefu e-O̩jo̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ dʼef amone̩ kʼi ama e̩wñʼ e-one̩? chai afu e-one̩ ki dʼef uwñ? Abe̩le̩ oñ e̩ne̩ du ma ma e̩wñ e-O̩jo̩ n chai Afu e-O̩jo̩.
I la chʼafu e-ile̩ a gba le̩ n, chai Afu e-ki kwugbo O̩jo̩, todu kʼawa ki ma e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ ko chʼuwa ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩.
I la chʼef o̩la kʼofili one̩ ko̩ wa oñ a nʼe̩wñ le̩ aka n, chai ef e-kʼAfu ko̩ wa; e̩wñ Afu ma nʼañwa e̩wñ Afu.
Onugo one̩ agba e̩wñ Afu e-O̩jo̩ n: todu e̩wñ e̩fule̩fu i che ugbo-wñ, i la neke mʼo̩ n, todu ku ma ñwʼo̩ go lo̩na Afu.
E̩ne̩ Afu añwa e̩wñ du go, e̩ne̩ du la añwa owñ go n.
Todu e̩ne̩ ma ibe Ondu? kʼi abʼo̩ ñw o̩la? Awa la ne̩ ibe e-Kraist.
Amo̩maye, omi la neke ko̩la ñw me̩ alu kʼu ma ako̩la ñw abo kʼAfu wʼuma o̩la n, chai dabe̩ne̩ kʼabo̩re̩la, dabe̩ne̩ kʼamo̩me̩kpa efu Kraist.
E̩nya u du ñw me̩ ñmo̩, i chʼo̩je̩ u du ñw me̩ n; todu me̩ bʼo̩ jo̩ e̩gba le̩ n: me̩ la bʼo̩ jo̩ abajo̩-i ta n;
todu me̩ chʼabo̩re̩la ta. Todu abu kʼogu eja kpʼuja jʼef ume̩, i chʼabo̩re̩la me̩ che n? I chʼikpa one̩ oñ me̩ tʼo̩ alule̩ le̩ n?
Todu e̩gba du kʼe̩ne̩ʼka kakini, Omi chʼe̩ne̩ Po̩l; kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ ojoji kakini, Omi chʼe̩ne̩ Apo̩lo̩s; i chʼamone̩ ofo me̩ che n?
Apo̩los chʼe̩ne̩? abe̩k e̩ne̩ che Po̩l? Amache e̩wñ ñw one̩ ku me̩ ke̩do̩no lefu ma ma che; kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma la de̩ alu kʼOndu du ñw u.
Omi du gbe̩, Apolo̩s tʼomiofo fiʼo; O̩jo̩ muda je̩ ñw u ya.
Todu abe̩le̩ fe̩ne̩ kʼi adʼu gbe̩ tʼe̩ne̩ kʼi atʼomiofo fiʼo̩ chʼe̩wñ du n; chai O̩jo̩ ki aje̩ ñw u ya.
Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi adʼu gbe̩ kpai e̩ne̩ ki atʼomiofo fiʼo̩ chʼoka: e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la agba uro̩me̩-wñ alu kʼakanya uko̩lo̩ e-wñ de̩.
Todu awa mejeji chʼabuko̩lo̩ O̩jo̩: uche̩ e-O̩jo̩, unyi e-O̩jo̩ oñ ame̩ che.
U dʼe̩re̩-wñ nyane̩ teju ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ ku ma du ñw mi, dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩nofili kʼi chʼo̩ka unyi eko̩; e̩nomune̩ la akʼo̩ oji-wñ. E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki muda nago alu kʼi ako̩ oji-wñ.
Todu e̩ne̩ du neke dʼe̩re̩ unyi omune̩ ojoji nyane̩ manyʼe-ku ma jʼadunyane̩ kʼowñ che Jisusi Kraisti le̩ n.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du nʼo̩jamalia abe̩k ajifa abe̩k okuta akoko abe̩k oli abe̩k egbe abe̩k elikpo, ane̩ oji e̩re̩ unyi le̩,
uko̩lo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ atejugede: todu o̩jo̩ le̩ adʼu dufu, todabu ku ma abiʼu te̩ ef una; una le̩ onugo añwa uko̩lo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ go alu ki de̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼuko̩lo̩ unyi eko̩ kʼe̩ne̩ du ne oji-wñ do̩mo̩ nyane̩, i agba uro̩me̩-wñ.
Iche̩wñ kʼuko̩lo̩ e̩ne̩ du gujo rinyo̩, ofu abʼu, ma la ajadu owñ onugo, i muda dabe̩ne̩ kʼi chʼelef una.
Ame̩ ma ka kʼame̩ chʼunyi-O̩jo̩ ejefu n? kʼAfu O̩jo̩ la dodo ef ume̩ n?
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du fʼunyi-O̩jo̩ ejefu bie̩, O̩jo̩ akpʼe̩ne̩ le̩ bie̩; todu unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu afo̩, e-le̩ la chʼame̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi mʼo̩la-wñ ibe da n. Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du dʼef ume̩ kʼi do̩ kʼi chenʼofili ef o̩kpanachi kide̩, i ki namud e̩ne̩ e̩fule̩fu, todu kʼi mud e̩no-fili.
Todu ofili ile̩ kide̩ chʼe̩fule̩fu ugbo O̩jo̩. Todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, I agwo̩nyʼame̩nofili ef ugbeju-ma;
omune̩ ño̩ de̩ ge̩ kakini, Ondu chema ibe kʼame̩nofili akpe̩, ka kʼi chʼofofo.
Todabe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ du ki hi one̩ ne abuba n. Todu e̩wñ du chʼe-me̩,
dagba i che Po̩l, abe̩k Apo̩lo̩s, abe̩ku Kifas, abe̩k ile̩-i, abe̩k iñmi, abe̩k uku, abe̩k e̩wñ ki jo̩ abajo̩-i, abe̩k e̩wñ ki ache ki wa; o̩chaka-wñ chʼe-me̩;
ame̩ la chʼe-Kraist; Kraisti la chʼe-O̩jo̩.
A Abe̩le̩ one̩ ki lʼuwa ru dabe̩ne̩ kʼabimo̩to Kraisti kpai amadigede e̩wñ afili O̩jo̩.
E̩wñ ku ma ñʼatejane̩-wñ ef amadigede emi de̩: ku ma li ka ku ma chʼamachubi one̩.
Ama ugbʼe-mi kʼame̩ abe̩k o̩jo̩ ki añwa e-one̩ ki gwili mi chʼe̩wñ kpiniki; i muda chʼomi agwili o̩la-mi n.
Todu u mʼe̩wñ du ki afʼajo nyʼumi n, i muda chʼef e-le̩ oñ ma adale ñw mi n; e̩ne̩ ki la agwili e-mi chʼOndu.

Todabe̩le̩ ame̩ ki kpʼoji ajo̩ du o̩gba tak adiko-wñ jo̩ n, gbogbo nyʼe̩gba kʼOndu lewa, owñ le̩ adʼe̩wñ umaja e-e̩chubi wʼugbo ugane̩. I año̩ dohi o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩ one̩ tejugede. E̩gbale̩ tak e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ane̩ uñwulo̩ e-wñ kwugbo O̩jo̩.
Amo̩maye-mi, u mʼe̩wñ-i rida nʼo̩la-mi kpʼApo̩lo̩s oji, todu kʼame̩ ki ko̩che̩ ef uwa ku me̩ we egu e̩wñ ki che̩ko̩tane̩ le̩ daba; todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ kʼi we edʼe̩ne̩ʼka ñwo̩ achagwunyu ekeji.
Todu, e̩ne̩ fʼuwe̩ ñwarʼojoji? E̩wñ e̩ ne̩ ki ma chʼegba e̩ gba n? I la che̩wñ ki chʼegba e̩ gba, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ buba dabe̩ne̩ ki ma chʼegba e̩ gba ni ta?
Efu-me̩ ko̩ me̩; me̩ mud amanana me̩: me̩ la fʼonu je̩ ubi wa ojoji me̩; O i ma chʼejile onu eje̩ me̩ ne̩, todu kʼawa ki ño̩ bʼame̩ jʼonu ge̩!
Todu u do̩ ka kʼO̩jo̩ mʼawa kʼa chʼame̩nukpuche̩ ko ñe̩ña jo̩ otitala dabe̩ne̩ kʼudu uku nʼuwa oji. Todu, a mud e̩wñ igo ñw ile̩, tʼamonuche̩ O̩jo̩, tʼamone̩.
Awa chʼame̩ne̩fule̩fu todu Kraist, ame̩ la chʼamanibe efu Kraist; awa chʼame̩ne̩gbo, ame̩ la chʼamagbiti; ame̩ chenʼojima, ma la bumʼuwa re n.
Gbogbo wʼiko auwa kide̩ ebi kpʼolugbe̩ akpa wa, a la tago ofo, ma nʼuwa o̩kpo̩ ugbo du, ma ñwʼuwa ikafa n, a nʼe̩re̩ ane̩ n,
awa la achʼakanya e̩wñ, a la nʼo̩wo̩ e-wa onugo chʼuko̩lo̩: ma bʼuwa ina, a je̩nyu ñw ma; ma doli wa, a mugba;
ma chakpabie̩ wa, a la gbo̩ko̩bʼuma; a dabe̩ne̩ kʼiwa ile̩-i, a chʼiwa ku ma delikwo bʼe̩wñ du te̩ gbogbo wʼifai.
I chʼanyo̩ nako mʼume̩ o̩takada kʼu nako̩-i n, chai dabe̩ne̩ kʼibe oñ nadu tʼamo̩ma-mi kʼu nafe̩do̩ efu.
Todu dagba me̩ chaka nʼabo icham icham ku ma kʼume̩ o̩la efu Kraisti, me̩ muda nʼata wewe ge̩ n; todu omi fʼume̩ bi efu Kraisti Jisusi lef Uche̩nyo̩ le̩.
Todule̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, me̩ ki mud abo ki awʼumi che.
Todu kʼu kpe̩ Timoti wʼugbo me̩ le̩ de̩, owñ chʼo̩ma ufe̩do̩-mi kʼi achubi mi ef Ondu, kʼowñ are me̩ wa o̩na o̩na-mi efu Kraisti, dabalu kʼu nakʼone̩ ugbo du ef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu du.
Aboʼka la añwo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼomi ma ñʼawʼugbo me̩ ge̩ n.
Iche̩wñ ki muda dʼOndu e̩do̩ nawugbo me̩ piopio; tak u nama o̩la alu e-abo ku ma ñwo̩ le̩ ofo n, chai ukpahiu-ma.
Todu ojane̩ e-O̩jo̩ dʼef o̩la alu ofo n, chai ef ukpahiu.
E̩wñ dʼume̩ e̩do̩? O̩kpa nane̩ wʼugbo me̩? abe̩k ufe̩do̩? kpai afu o̩chikimi?
Ma ro̩ pee kakini, Abutabu eche dʼef ume̩, owñ chʼe̩go̩ abutabu ki ma la dedʼef abo uche̩ichi n, owñ cheka kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ne̩ o̩ya ata-wñ.
Oñ me̩ jʼañwo̩-i? kʼi ma chʼaido̩ eda n? Todu ku me̩ ki mʼe̩ne̩ ki chʼe̩wñ e̩go̩-i du kwo bʼalumeji-me̩ te̩ n?
Todu, ochochi, omi dʼane̩ efaño̩la n, u muda dʼane̩ ef afu, oñ u fʼabi kpʼe̩ne̩ ki chʼe̩wñ abe̩le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼu dʼane̩ o̩mo̩ me̩.
Ef odu Ondu Jisus, abu ku me̩ wajo̩, ame̩ kpai afu-mi manyʼukpahiu Ondu Jisus,
kʼa mʼe̩ne̩ abe̩le̩ du ñw Setan kʼi fʼo̩re̩la-wñ kpaku, todu ku ma ki fʼafu-wñ jadu o̩jo̩ Ondu Jisus.
Uba-me̩ le̩ chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ n. Ame̩ ma kʼo̩jo̩wu re abie̩ nyʼodukulu e̩wñ n?
Me̩ ki fʼo̩jo̩wu e-igbele le̩ gwe̩ rinyo̩, todu kʼame̩ ki chʼodukulu etito̩, alu ku me̩ de̩ ku me̩ ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n le̩. Todu ma ño̩ fʼElaloji-wa kpa me̩— owñ che Kraist.
Todabe̩le̩ a ki fʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ le̩ de, o̩jo̩wu e-igbele ki dʼo̩ n, o̩jo̩wu e-e̩bie̩ne̩ kpʼebibi ki dʼef uwñ n, chai ef e̩wñ e̩do̩ yaala kpai ochochi e-ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu n.
U ko̩ rʼume̩ ef o̩takada le̩ ku me̩ we ekʼame̩nabutabu chʼo̩la;
i la chʼo̩chaka ame̩nabutabu e ile̩-i abe̩k ame̩nejufufu abe̩k amadinya e̩wñ, abe̩k amachode n; todu e̩gbale̩ i ma dukpe̩ ku me̩ kwo bʼef ile̩-i te̩.

Fa-i u muda ko̩ rʼume̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ku ma do̩ kʼo̩maye chʼe̩nabutabu, abe̩k e̩nejufufu, abe̩k achode, abe̩k abʼone̩ ina, abe̩k añmo̩te̩ abe̩k adinya e̩wñ; me̩ ki gbʼo̩ chʼo̩la n; me̩ ki la bʼe̩ne̩ e̩go̩ le̩ jʼuje̩wñ n.
Todu e̩wñ chʼe-mi kpʼajo̩ abo̩do̩da eka? I chʼanie̩ akajo̩ abo ejefu n?
Ama O̩jo̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki akajo̩ abo o̩do̩da. Me̩ mʼe̩ne̩bibi le̩ du bʼef ume̩ te̩.
E̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ kʼi nʼo̩la kpʼekeji-wñ ne̩do̩ edʼa ajo̩ o̩gba ame̩nuji? ki ma la chʼo̩gba abo kiafo̩ n?
Abe̩k ame̩ ma ka kʼabo kiafo̩ akpʼoji ajo̩ ile̩-i n? Iche̩wñ ki chʼame̩ akpʼoji ajo̩ ile̩-i me̩ bʼoji ajo̩ kekele̩ re̩-i ekpa jo̩ n?
Ame̩ ma kakini, Awa akpʼoji ajo̩ amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ n? E̩wñ chʼe-e̩wñ udeju-wa ile̩-i ke̩?
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼo̩la e̩wñ udeju-wa-i chi ñw me̩, mak ame̩ ki kʼabo ku ma do̩ rʼibe̩te̩ ef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu gugu jo̩ ku ma ka o̩gbama.
Nakʼe-i kʼanyo̩ ki mu me̩. Abe̩le̩? I nʼugbo kʼe̩nofili okate dʼef ume̩ kʼi adale agbagba amo̩maye n?
Chai kʼo̩maye kʼi do̩ o̩maye ajo̩? kʼe-le̩ la chʼo̩gba abo ku ma ma ke̩do̩no n?
Todule̩ me̩ la dabu o̩mo̩ ogbolo me̩, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ dʼo̩la-me̩ ajo̩ le̩. E̩wñ chi ku me̩ ma ro̩no ku ma chʼume̩ uji n? E̩wñ chi ku me̩ ma to̩no̩ ku ma chʼume̩ e̩la n? E-le̩ ma me̩.
Me̩ muda chʼuji, me̩ la chʼone̩ e̩la, e-le̩ la chʼamo̩maye oñ me̩ che ma.

Abe̩k ame̩ ma kakʼame̩nuji aje̩ ojane̩ O̩jo̩ ogu n-in? Me̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ko̩ me̩ la n. Tʼame̩nabutabu tʼamachode tʼabo ku ma tene o̩ya one̩, tʼabo ku ma deide̩le, tʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma bʼe̩ne̩kele̩ dachi,
tʼamajoji, tʼame̩nejufufu, tʼamañmo̩te̩, tʼamabʼone̩ ina, tʼamadinya aje̩ o̩da ojane̩ O̩jo̩ ogu n.
Abo iche̩ka ef ume̩ la dabe̩le̩ akwoubi; ma muda fʼume̩ o̩la gwe, ma fʼume̩ che ku me̩ fo̩ me̩, ma la fʼale da ñw me̩ ef odu Ondu Jisusi Kraisti kpʼef Afu O̩jo̩-wa.
O̩da aje̩ ñw mi che e̩wñ du. I muda chʼo̩chaka e̩wñ anʼile n. O̩da aje̩ ñw mi che e̩wñ du, omi muda je̩ ñw e-du ki nʼo̩da-mi n.
Uje̩wñ chʼutod ukulu, ukulu la chʼutod uje̩wñ; ama tʼe-i tʼe-le̩ O̩jo̩ aje̩ ñw ejeji-wñ gbogili te̩. Año̩la la chʼutodu e̩wñ abutabu eche n, chai tod Ondu, oñ Ondu chʼutodu año̩la.
O̩jo̩ la mʼOndu du kwane̩ me̩, i año̩ ko wa kwane̩ lef ukpahiu-wñ ue̩.
Me̩ ma ka kʼaño̩la e-me̩ chʼe̩wñ año̩la Kraisti n? Todule̩ namʼe̩wñ año̩la Kraisti ko chʼe̩wñ año̩la ajo̩ko̩? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na!
Abe̩k ame̩ ma kakini, E̩ne̩ ki dama kpʼajo̩ko̩ chʼaño̩laʼka kpʼowñ n? Todu i kakini, Ama meji le̩ achʼaño̩laʼka.
E̩ne̩ ki la dama kpʼOndu chʼafu okate kpʼowñ.
Me̩ ki ra bʼe̩wñ abutabu eche te̩. E̩wñ adure du kʼone̩ chaka ache ej o̩do̩da año̩la i de̩, ama e̩ne̩ ki achʼabutabu kpʼajo̩ko̩, año̩la e-wñ onugo i adure le̩.
Abe̩k ame̩ ma ka kʼaño̩la-me̩ chʼunyi ejefu e-Afu Kiafo̩ kʼi dʼef ume̩ ku me̩ ne̩ kwugbo O̩jo̩ n? I la chʼame̩ nʼo̩la-me̩ n.
Todu e̩wñ akoko ku ma du la me̩ do̩mo̩; me̩ ki dojima ñw O̩jo̩ ef año̩la-me̩ ke!
Oñ ugbo o̩la e̩wñ ku me̩ la kʼo̩takada-wñ rʼumi le̩: i chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw one̩ ki we egwo̩nyʼonobule̩.
Ama lef abutabu eche ki do̩mo̩ e̩ne̩nene̩ne̩ ki nanʼo̩ya e-wñ. E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki la nʼo̩ko̩ e-wñ.
O̩ko̩ ki narʼo̩me̩ kʼi je̩ ñw o̩ya; abe̩le̩ o̩ya ki nadu ñw o̩ko̩-wñ.
I chʼo̩ya nʼo̩da año̩la e-wñ n, chai o̩ko̩-wñ ne̩; abe̩le̩ ge̩ i chʼo̩ko̩ nʼo̩da año̩la e-wñ n, chai o̩ya-wñ ne̩.
Ame̩ ki dʼo̩wo̩ mʼo̩la-me̩ ñw omune̩ n, chai e̩gba kʼalu-me̩chʼoka todu ku me̩ li o̩wo̩ adua eche, taku me̩ adama ge̩, todu ku Setan ki we ejʼume̩ ma lef emʼo̩la ne̩ ku me̩ ma neke mʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩ n.
E-kʼu ka-i, o̩wo̩ nabulo̩ ñw me̩ le̩, i chʼuko̩ ete̩ de̩ n.
I la dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼamone̩ du ki dʼalu kʼomi onugo de̩. Ama e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-wñ kʼO̩jo̩ du ñw u, oka ne̩ abe̩i, omune̩ ne̩ abe̩i.
Oñ naka ñw abo ku ma ma nʼo̩ya abe̩k o̩ko̩ ta n, kpʼamo̩yaukuo̩ko̩, kakini, I chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw ma ku ma jo̩ alu kʼomi de̩.
I muda che̩wñ ku ma ma neke mʼo̩la-ma ne̩ n, ama ki ne̩ ke; todu ene̩ nyo̩ tʼe̩ño̩-wñ ekpa nyʼo̩la le.
U la ka ñw abo ku ma nʼo̩ya, i muda chʼomi n, chai Ondu, kakini, O̩ya ki kwo bʼo̩ko̩-wñ te̩ n.
(Ama iche̩wñ kʼi la kwo bʼo̩ te̩ i ki we enʼo̩ko̩, cho̩kpo̩ni kʼi dabi ñʼo̩la-wñ ru ñw o̩ko̩-wñ); o̩ko̩ ki la dʼo̩ya-wñ tinyo̩ ni ge̩.
I muda chʼe-abo ki bo̩, omi aka ñw ma-i—i chʼOndu n—kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼo̩maye nʼo̩ya kʼi ko̩ eke̩do̩nʼOndu, kʼonobule̩ le̩ je̩ kʼi bʼo̩ gugu, i ki dʼu tinyo̩ n.
Onobule̩ ki la nʼo̩ko̩ kʼi ma ke̩do̩nʼOndu n, kʼi la je̩ kʼi bʼo̩ gugu, i ki kʼo̩ n.
Todu o̩ko̩ kʼi ma ke̩do̩no n afo̩ ef o̩ya-wñ, o̩ya kʼi ma la ke̩do̩no n afo̩ ef o̩maye le̩, cho̩kpo̩ni amo̩ma-me̩ ma de̩hiolo e̩gbale̩ n, ama fa-i ma chʼabo kiafo̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ ki ma ke̩do̩nʼOndu n kwo bʼo̩ te̩, i ki kwo ke. O̩maye e-e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k o̩maye e-onobule̩ le̩ mud adu ef e̩wñ abe̩le̩ n. O̩jo̩ la fʼuwa do̩ ef ure̩do̩.
Todu, o̩ya, abe̩k uwe̩ ajadu o̩ko̩-we̩, e̩ ma? abe̩k o̩ko̩, uwe̩ ajadu o̩ya-we̩, e̩ ma?
Chai alu kʼOndu kpe̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩, alu kʼO̩jo̩ do̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ i ki nalu-le̩ abe̩le̩. Abe̩le̩ oñ u ñwa te̩ ef ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu du.
I nʼe̩ne̩ ki de̩pi taku ma dʼo̩? I ki kula e̩pi odukulu n. I nʼe̩ne̩ du ku ma ma da e̩pi n taku ma dʼo̩? I ki de̩pi n.
E̩pi eda chʼe̩wñ du n; e̩pi odukulu la chʼe̩wñ du n; chai eju edutʼuko̩ kʼO̩jo̩ te̩.
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki nagugu alu kʼi de̩ ef udo̩ ku ma dʼo̩.
Adu e̩ che oñ ma do̩ we̩? e̩ ki kula n. I muda che̩wñ kʼu-we̩ neke mud o̩mone̩, mʼu du che e̩wñ ke.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki chʼadu ku ma dʼo̩ ef Ondu, chʼe̩ne̩ Ondu kʼi nʼo̩la-wñ; abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼo̩mone̩ taku ma dʼo̩ chʼadu Kraisti.
I che̩nʼalu aja ku ma du la me̩; me̩ ki mud amadu one̩ n.
Amo̩maye, e̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ dʼef uwñ ku ma dʼo̩, i ki nagugu ef e-le̩ kpʼO̩jo̩.
I chʼe-amigbe̩le̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, i nʼuko̩-wñ kʼOndu te̩ ñw mi n: ama naka e̩wñ kʼomi ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ kʼOndu lʼejumomi-wñ kʼi chʼachubi-wñ.
Todule̩ lef o̩pe̩cha ki de̩ abajo̩-i, eju-mi, e̩wñ ki chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ de̩, kakini, Alu ki chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ kʼone̩ ki de̩ de̩.
E̩ che̩ji mʼo̩ya? E̩ ki feju kʼe̩ mutu tane̩ n. E̩ mutu tane̩ bʼo̩ya te̩ me̩? E̩ ki feju o̩ya n.

Ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ nʼo̩ya, i chʼadure oñ e̩ ta le̩ n; i la che̩wñ kʼigbe̩le̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n fʼo̩ko̩ ne̩, i chʼadure i ta le̩ n. Ama abo e̩go̩-i anʼo̩bata ef o̩re̩la. Edo̩wo̩mo̩ oñ omi ado̩wo̩mʼume̩-i.
Ama e-kʼu naka de̩, amo̩maye, kakini, Iko-i bo̩ re me̩; e-ki bo̩ de̩: todu kʼabo ku ma nʼo̩ya ki dabe̩ne̩ ku ma ma ne̩ n;
abo ku ma la araku ku ma ki dabe̩ne̩ ku ma ma raku n; abo ku ma la jʼayo̩ ki dabe̩ne̩ ku ma ma yo̩ n; abo ku ma la la e̩wñ ki dabe̩ne̩ ku ma ma ne̩ n;
abo ku ma la nʼe̩wñ ile̩-i ache e̩wñ, ku ma be̩te̩ma. Todu alu kʼile̩-i de̩ eju alale rinyo̩.
I muda dʼumi e̩do̩ ku me̩ we enʼejiji eda. E̩ne̩ ki ma nʼo̩ya n nʼejiji e̩wñ Ondu eda, alu kʼi ale kʼi anyʼOndu eju:
ama e̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩ya nʼejiji e̩wñ ile̩-i eda, alu kʼi ale kʼi anyʼo̩ya-wñ eju. Oñ ibe-wñ chʼejeji.
Onobule̩ ki ma nʼo̩ko̩ n kpʼigbe̩le̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n nʼejiji e̩wñ Ondu ada, todu kʼi fo̩ tʼaño̩la tʼafu-wñ. Ama e̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩ko̩ nʼejiji e̩wñ ile̩-i ada, alu kʼi ale kʼi anyʼo̩ko̩-wñ eju.
E̩wñ kʼu naka-i chʼutodu kʼi nʼile ñw me̩; i chʼutodu kʼu nʼoku te̩ ñw me̩ n, chai todu ki chʼeju-wñ ñw me̩ ku me̩ jo̩ ñw Ondu ki we enʼe̩wñ kʼi afa me̩ tʼemi tʼemi.

Ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du do̩ kʼe̩wñ kʼi ache, ma cheju-wñ ñw igbe̩le̩-wñ kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ni n le̩, i la che̩wñ kʼi legu o̩jo̩ e̩gbakpa-wñ du kʼabe̩le̩ i dukpe̩ kʼi de̩; i chʼadure i ata le̩ n, ama ki nʼo̩la-ma ke̩.

Ama e̩ne̩ kʼo̩la le̩ chʼelonyane̩ ef e̩do̩-wñ kpaka, kʼi ma la chʼeku akʼu n, i la chenʼo̩da kʼi che e̩wñ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩, kʼi laño̩ fʼoji-wñ kpa ef e̩do̩ e-wñ kʼi adejutʼigbe̩le̩-wñ kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n le̩, o̩me̩me̩le̩ i ache.
Tod abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ k i adʼigbe̩le̩-wñ kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n chʼo̩ya, o̩me̩me̩le̩ i ache; e̩ne̩ kʼi ma dʼu chʼo̩ya n ache tule.
O̩ya che̩ji te̩ gbogbo tʼadiko kʼo̩ko̩-wñ deju kade; ama iche̩wñ kʼo̩ko̩-wñ mʼolu du, i kwotane̩ kʼi nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼowñ e̩do̩, chai ef Ondu kate.
I muda gugu alu kʼi de̩ i agbede tule eju e-mi: eju-mi omi ño̩ nʼAfu O̩jo̩ ge̩.
Oñ ugbo o̩la e̩la iche̩bo̩ le̩; a cheli ka kʼo̩chaka-wa chema e̩wñ. E̩wñ ema ofo muda dab afu emu nyʼe̩wñ kʼi wu te̩, ufe̩do̩ la ane̩ nyo̩gba.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du do̩ kʼi fʼe̩wñ ma, mak i ma e̩wñ du alu kʼi dukpe̩ kʼi ma ta n;
ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du fe̩do̩ O̩jo̩, mak owñ fʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ma me̩.
Todule̩ i chʼe-ugbo o̩la e̩la iche̩bo̩ eje̩ le̩, a cheli ka kʼode chʼe̩wñ du ef ile̩-i n, kʼO̩jo̩ du la do̩mo̩ n, chai okate le̩.
Todu dagba kʼe̩wñ ku ma do̩ ko̩ amo̩jo̩ ki chaka do̩mo̩, tʼefojale tʼane̩ ile̩-i; kʼamo̩jo̩ wewe kpʼamodu wewe jo̩ le̩;
i muda chʼugbo e-wa O̩jo̩ kʼi chʼAta chʼokate, owñ chʼe̩te̩ e̩wñ du, awa la jo̩ ñw owñ; Ondu Jisusi laño̩ chʼo̩ka, lef owñ e̩wñ du do̩mo̩, awa la do̩mo̩ lef uwñ ge̩.
I muda chʼo̩chaka amone̩ mʼe̩-i n: oñ abo iche̩ka te̩taje̩ e̩wñ ode dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩, oñ abu kʼakone̩ o̩la kʼi dʼef uma chʼe̩gbo, iwa mudamʼo̩ me̩.
Uje̩wñ la adʼuwa dago ñw O̩jo̩ n: dagba a ma je̩ n, a nya n; dagba a je̩, a anana tule n.
Ama me̩ nago tode̩gba kʼo̩da-me̩-i amud e̩wñ uke̩re̩ ñw ame̩ne̩gbo̩.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼone̩ li uwe̩ kʼe̩ nʼuma e̩wñ, kʼe̩ chekukane̩ ef unyi ode, akone̩ o̩la kʼi dʼef e̩ne̩gbo le̩ adʼugbiti ñw u kʼi je̩ e̩la iche̩bo̩ n?
Tak o̩maye e-e̩gbo ku Kraisti ku tod uwñ le̩ alenyo̩ ef uma e-we̩.
Oñ abu kʼe̩ dʼamo̩maye re kʼe̩ la fʼakone̩ o̩la-ma ku ma chʼe̩gbo le̩ chagbe abe̩le̩ maku Kraisti me̩ dure.
Todule̩ i chʼe-kʼuje̩wñ adʼo̩maye-mi hi, mak i nʼugbo du kʼu naje̩ e̩la ogbegbele̩ ge̩ n; tode̩gba kʼu nadʼo̩maye-mi hi.
Omi nʼo̩la-mi n? U chʼe̩nukpuche̩ n? Eju-mi do Jisus Ondu-wa n? I chʼame̩ chʼuko̩lo̩-mi kʼu che ef Ondu n?
U ma chaka chʼe̩nukpuche̩ ugbo abomune̩ n, u muda che ugbo e-me̩ ke; todu ame̩ chʼuhiuko̩ o̩da e̩nukpuche̩-mi ef Ondu.
Omu-mi kʼu naka ñw aho ku ma gwili mi de̩:
A nʼo̩da kʼa je̩ kʼa la ñmo̩ n?
A nʼo̩da kʼa nʼo̩maye onobule̩ chʼo̩ya dab ame̩nukpuche̩ ki bo̩ kpʼamo̩maye Ondu kpai Kifas le̩ n?
Abe̩k omi kpai Barnabas kate ma nʼo̩da kʼa we uko̩lo̩ eche n?
E̩ne̩ chʼisoja kʼi arʼo̩me̩ ñw o̩la-wñ mama me̩? E̩ne̩ dʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma gbe̩ kʼi ma la je̩ e̩ro-wñ n? abe̩k e̩ne̩ adejutʼame̩wño̩re̩ kʼi ma la dʼomi e̩nya ame̩wño̩re̩ le̩ mi n?
Alu kʼone̩ aka oñ nako̩la-i ke n? I chʼe̩wñ kʼo̩lo̩da ño̩ ka de̩i ge̩ n?
Todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ ef o̩lo̩da Mose̩s, kakini, Me̩ ki gʼalita tunyʼalu okuno̩ ki agwʼọka n. Amokuno̩ wʼO̩jo̩ eju le̩?
Abe̩k o̩chaka-wñ chʼutodu wa oñ i aki-i? Todu wa oñ ma ko le̩, todu i dukpe̩ kʼe̩ne̩ ki aluche̩ kʼi kibeno uche̩ kʼi alo, oñ e̩ne̩ ki agwʼoka kʼi kibeno ka kʼi anʼukpe̩-wñ.
Iche̩wñ kʼa kʼe̩wñ e-Afu gbe̩ ñw me̩, e̩wñ lile i che eju-me̩ kʼa mʼe̩wñ o̩re̩la e-me̩ ko wʼunyi-wa?
I la che̩wñ kʼabomune̩ mananyʼo̩da-i, e-wa tule n?
Ame̩ ma ka kʼabo ku ma chuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ unyi O̩jo̩ nʼe̩wñ unyi O̩jo̩ aje̩ n? Oñ abo ku ma gugu kpʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ abʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpe̩ n?
Abe̩le̩ oñ Ondu fuñwate̩ ñw abo ku ma nʼUche̩nyo̩ akpogo, ku ma nʼe̩wñ udiñmino-ma kwef Uche̩nyo̩.
Omi muda dʼe̩wñ-i du chʼeku ñw o̩la-mi mama ta n. U la kʼo̩takada e̩wñ-i rʼume̩ todu ki dabe̩le̩ ñw mi n; todu uku eku ma chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ ñw mi tʼeje̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du mʼuba-mi-i du chʼofofo le.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼu najʼUche̩nyo̩ rʼone̩, i nʼuba ñw mi n, todu udu-wñ nʼumi oji te̩; todu omi ma jʼUche̩nyo̩ rʼone̩ n, atogwo chʼe-mi!
Todu iche̩wñ kʼu ge̩do̩la-mi ache, i chenʼuro̩me̩ ñw mi; ama u ma ge̩do̩la-mi ache n, igede ku ma ke̩do̩no mi ku ma du nyʼumi o̩wo̩ kʼu de do̩mo̩.
Todule̩ e̩wñ chʼuro̩me̩-mi-i taa? owñ chukakini, Todu kʼUche̩nyo̩ kʼu naje̩-i, kʼu dʼUchenyo̩ te̩ ñw me̩ ki we enʼo̩ko̩ oji, todu kʼu we eche tʼalu kʼo̩da-mi ef Uche̩nyo̩ te̩ kade.
Todu abu kʼo̩wo̩ du ma ne̩ mi n, u mʼo̩la-mi du chʼadu ñw o̩chaka amone̩, todu kʼu je̩ amone̩ tule.
Abe̩le̩ ugbo amaJu u dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ne̩ Ju, todu kʼu fʼamaJu je̩; ugbo abo ku ma jʼef olo̩da u dabe̩ne̩ kʼu dʼef o̩lo̩da, u la dʼef o̩lo̩da n, todu kʼu fʼabo ku ma jʼef o̩lo̩da je̩;
ugbo abo ku ma ma ne̩ o̩loda n u dabe̩ne̩ kʼomi ma ne̩ o̩lo̩da n, i che kakini, u we dʼef o̩lo̩da ñw O̩jo̩ n, u la dʼef o̩lo̩da ñw Kraisti, todu kʼu fʼabo ku ma ma ne̩ o̩lo̩da n je̩,
Ugbo abʼe̩gbo u mud e̩gbo, todu kʼu fʼame̩ne̩gbo je̩; ugbo e̩ne̩ du u mud e̩wñ du, todu kʼu fʼabo iche̩ka jadu alu du ku ma chaka de̩.
Oñ nache e̩wñ-i du lef Uche̩nyo̩ le̩, todu kʼomi kʼu mud e̩ne̩ ki abʼabo ki bo̩ tuta ef uwñ.
Ame̩ ma ka kʼabo ku ma fule ef o̩gbo̩, o̩chaka-ma afule, okate-ma muda agba e̩wñ ure n? Me̩ fule abe̩le̩ todu kʼame̩ ki gba.
Oñ e̩ne̩ du ki afejugbiti ache e̩wñ amʼo̩la-wñ ne̩ ef e̩wñ du. Todule̩ abo le̩ che ku ma gba uloko ki ache̩; awa muda agba e-ki ma che̩ n.
Todule̩ omi afule abe̩le̩, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼu nafule ejugu n; abe̩le̩ naju-ja, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼu nadʼo̩wo̩ gwo̩ afu n:
nadʼaño̩la-mi te̩ agwoli gwoku, oñ u ne̩ ale kʼi chʼadu-mi, tode̩gba kʼabu kʼu fʼakoya ta ñw abo omune̩ kʼomi onugo mud ijo̩bu.
Todu i dʼumi e̩do̩ ku me̩ chʼugbodu-wñ n, amo̩maye-mi, kakini, Amata-wa chaka jʼof akpa le̩, o̩chaka-ma ño̩ lale gu ef ohimini le̩ du;
ma laño̩ chʼo̩chaka-ma baptism ñw Mose̩s ef akpa le̩ kpʼef ohimini ge̩;
o̩chaka-ma la jʼuje̩wñ e-afu okate le̩;
o̩chaka-ma laño̩ ñmʼomi e-afu okate le̩; todu ma ñmo̩ kwef apata e-afu ki tʼuma ubi le̩; apata le̩ la che Kraist.
I muda chʼojile-ma rʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ n; todu ma chigbegbele jʼane̩ ef aje̩tachi le̩.
Oñ e̩wñ-i du mud e̩wñ uwo̩li ñw a, todu kʼa ki we eche̩ño̩ e̩wñ bie̩ne̩, alu kʼama che̩ño̩-wñ le̩.
Me̩ ki la chʼamacho̩de, alu kʼabo iche̩ka-ma che n; i dabalu ki che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, Amone̩ le̩ guguane̩ ku ma je̩ ku ma ñmo̩, taku ma kwane̩ ku ma chiya.
A ki la chʼe̩wñ abutabu alu kʼabo iche̩ka-ma che̩, tak one̩-ma icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo ogu nyoke me̩ta leane̩ o̩jokate le̩ n.
A ki la jʼOndu ma, alu kʼabo iche̩ka-ma jʼowñ ma tak amejo̩ fʼuma kpa rinyo̩ le̩ n.
Me̩ ki la jeñmini alu kʼabo iche̩ka-ma jeñmini tak e̩nafe̩wñ chile̩che̩ le̩ fʼuma kpa rinyo̩ n.
E̩wñ-i du la ke̩re̩bo̩ ma dab e̩wñ uwo̩li; ma la fʼu ko̩ nyʼo̩takada ku ma ko̩ wa kʼukpoji o̩kpanachi o̩kpanachi du tʼugbo-wa-i ibe.
Todu abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ kʼi do̩ kʼi dago, kʼi nago ewane̩.
Ajama du wʼo̩la-me̩ tʼe-kʼone̩ te̩tali le n; O̩jo̩ chʼachubi one̩, owñ aje̩ ñw ma jʼume̩ ma tʼe-ku me̩ nʼukpahiu-wñ le n; i año̩ chʼo̩kpa edufu te̩ manyʼajama le̩ ku me̩ neke nʼadu-wñ.
Tod e-kide̩, abufe̩do̩-mi, me̩ ki ra bʼode eche te̩.
Dabe̩ne̩ kʼabo ki nibe oñ naka ñw ma-i; me̩ ñwʼe̩wñ kʼu naka-i go.
Ago uje̩nyu kʼa je̩nyʼuwñ le̩, i chʼuta e̩bie̩ Kraist eta de̩ n? Akala kʼa abu le̩, i chʼuta e-año̩la Kraist eta de̩ n?
Todabu kʼawa, kʼa che̩wewe-i, chʼakalaʼka kpʼaño̩laʼka: todu o̩chaka-wa amana nyʼakala okate le̩.
Me̩ gʼab Israe̩l ugbo o̩re̩la ta: i chʼabo ku ma je̩ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ le̩ atuta kpʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ n?
Todule̩ ab u ka-i ta? kak e̩la iche̩bo̩ chʼe̩wñʼka? abe̩k ode chʼe̩wñʼka?
U muda kakini, Ama kʼe̩wñ chʼiche̩bo̩ ñw amebili, ma la che ñw O̩jo̩ n; i la dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼame̩ mud abo ku ma tuta kpʼamebili n.
Ame̩ neke ñmo̩ ago Ondu kpʼago amebili n; me̩ la neke mana nyʼe̩wñ oj itebulu Ondu kpʼe̩wñ oj itebulu amebili n.
Abe̩k a je̩ ñw Ondu jogu le̩? A gbiti tʼowñ le?
O̩da aje̩ e̩wñ du; i muda chʼe̩wñ du nʼile n. O̩da aje̩ e̩wñ du; i muda chʼe̩wñ du ane̩ nyo̩gba n.
E̩ne̩ du ki feju e̩wñ ñw o̩la-wñ n, ama e̩ne̩ du ki nafeju e̩wñ ñw ekeji-wñ.
E̩wñ du ku ma ta ef aja, me̩ je̩, me̩ ki gwili-wñ n tod akone̩ o̩la ki dʼef ume̩.
Todu Ondu nʼane̩ ile̩-i kpʼe̩wñ du ki che̩ko̩ ef uwñ.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ ki ma ke̩do̩no n oka dʼume̩ udo̩ uje̩wñ, ki la dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ le̩, e̩wñ du ku ma kojo̩ ñw me̩, me̩ je̩, me̩ ki gwili e̩wñ du tod akone̩ o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩-me̩ n.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ka ñw me̩ kakini, E̩wñ Iche̩bo̩ de̩, me̩ ki je̩ n, tod e̩ne̩ ki dʼoji-wñ dufu le̩, kpai akone̩ o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩:
akone̩ o̩la kʼu ka le̩, chʼe-we̩ onugo n, chai e-e̩ne̩ ekeji le̩; todu e̩wñ chi kʼakone̩ o̩la kʼi dʼef e̩no-mune akpʼoji ajo̩ o̩da o̩mone̩ e-mi?
Iche̩wñ kʼomi mana nyʼu lo̩na ufe̩de̩nyo̩, e̩wñ chi ku ma chakpabie̩ e-mi noj e̩wñ kʼomi fʼugwa-wñ gwa ta?
Todule̩ dagba me̩ je̩, dagba me̩ ñmo̩, dagba me̩ che e̩wñ, me̩ ki chʼe̩wñ du tef ojima O̩jo̩.
Ame̩ ki mud e̩wñ uke̩re̩ ñw amaJu kpʼamaGrik kpʼujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩ n:
dabalu kʼomi ño̩ chenyo̩ o̩chaka-ma eju ef e̩wñ du, kʼu ma tene ile ñw o̩la-mi n chai ile ñw amone̩ wewe le̩, todu ku ma ki jadu ma.
Ame̩ ki mud abo ki awʼumi che, alu kʼomi awi Kraisti che ge̩.
Oñ nañwulo̩ me̩ todabu ku me̩ rewa mi ef e̩wñ du, me̩ laño̩ mʼe̩wñ-ogu le̩ ne̩ gaga dabalu kʼu ko ñw me̩.
I muda dʼumi e̩do̩ ku me̩ ma ka kʼoji e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du che Kraist; oñ oji onobule̩ chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩; oji Kraisti la chʼO̩jo̩.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ki achadua abe̩k i akache̩ kʼi dʼe̩wñ bʼoji-wñ ma, i mʼanyo̩ ko mʼoji-wñ.
Ama onobule̩ du ki achadua abe̩k i akache̩ kʼoji-wñ te̩ ofo mʼanyo̩ ko mʼoji-wñ me̩; todu e-le̩ kpai oji ela chʼokate.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ ma bʼoji onobule̩ ma n, mak i gbagba fʼoji-wñ ja ke. I muda che̩wñ ki chʼe̩wñ anyo̩ ñw onobule̩ kʼoji-wñ cheja abe̩k ela, i ki dʼe̩wñ bʼo ma.
Todu i dukpe̩ kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi dʼe̩wñ bʼoji ma n ochochi, todabu kʼowñ chʼojibo kpʼojima e-O̩jo̩: onobule̩ la chʼojima e̩ne̩ke̩le̩,
todu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kwʼef onobule̩ n; chai onobule̩ kwʼef e̩ne̩ke̩le̩:
todu ma la nyi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tod onobule̩ n, chai onobule̩ tod e̩ne̩ke̩le̩.
Lef e-kide̩ oñ i dukpe̩ kʼonobule̩ anʼe̩wñ o̩da bʼoji-wñ ma, tod amonuehe̩ O̩jo̩.
Ama tʼonobule̩, i chʼe̩wñ du lubi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩, chʼe̩wñ du lubi onobule̩ ef Ondu n.
Todu alu kʼonobule̩ kwʼef e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩le̩ oñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ do̩mo̩ lef onobule̩ ge̩; O̩jo̩ muda chʼe̩te̩ e̩wñ du.
Ame̩ ki ñwago o̩to̩to̩la-me̩; i chʼeju-wñ kʼe̩wñ ma bʼoji onobule̩ ma n kʼi chadua ñw O̩jo̩?
Alu kʼe̩wñ de̩ ile̩-i ako̩ me̩ ka kʼiche̩wñ kʼiloji e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ chʼegwe̩ i chʼachukata de̩ n?
Ama iche̩wñ kʼiloji onobule̩ chegwe̩ i chʼojima ñw owñ n? Todabu ku ma mʼiloji ki gwe̩ du ñw u koji ugbogbo.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du do̩ kʼi chʼo̩ka iñwa eje̩, mak o̩la-wa mʼe-le̩ n, tʼawa tʼujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩.
Ama e-kʼu naduka ñw me̩-i nañwulo̩ me̩ n, todu me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ wa jo̩ tod e-ki tʼo̩gba n, chai tod e-ki chʼo̩wo̩ wane̩.
Todu ejodudu e̩gba ku me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ wajo̩ ef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu, nagbo̩ ka kʼukpe̩ru ojoji ojoji dʼef ume̩; i chene̩ e-kʼu do̩ rʼochochi ef uwñ.
Todu uche̩ ki date̩ ojoji ojoji adʼef ume̩ tila, todu kʼabo ku ma fu ma ñwa ki nyo̩ ki kwotejugede ef ume̩.
Todule̩ abu ku me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ wajo̩ ugbo kate i chʼutodu ku me̩ jʼuje̩-wñ o̩kpane̩ e-ki chʼojima Ondu n:
todu ef eje̩ ku me̩ je̩ le̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ agba uje̩wñ o̩kpane̩ e-wñ o̩gba; ebi la akpa e̩ne̩ʼka, o̩te̩ la amu e̩ne̩ omune̩.

E̩wñ de̩ taa? Me̩ ne̩ unyi ugbo ku me̩ jo̩ aje̩ kpʼeñmo̩ n? Abe̩ku me̩ do̩ ujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩ rʼo̩che̩ke̩ne̩, ku me̩ kʼanyo̩ mʼabo ku ma ma ne̩ n? Ab u naka ñw me̩? Nañwulo̩ me̩? Nañwulo̩ me̩ ef e-i n.
Todu omi mʼe̩wñ kʼu ño̩ du ñw me̩ le̩ gba ugbo Ondu, kakini, Ondu Jisusi mʼakala du odu o̩jo̩ ku ma mʼowñ du ñw amone̩ mu le̩,
oñ abu kʼi fʼugwa gwa i mʼu bu, tak i kakini, E-kide̩ chʼaño̩la-mi, e-kʼi chʼutodu me̩: me̩ chʼe-i tef urewa-mi.
Alu le̩ i ño̩ de̩ ugbo ago le̩ ge̩, abu ku ma fʼuje̩-wñ o̩kpane̩ je̩ kpa i kakini, Ago-i chʼalo etito̩ ku ma kpe̩ ef e̩bie̩-mi: me̩ chʼe-i, e̩gba du ku me̩ ñmo̩ tef urewa-mi.
Todu e̩gba du ku me̩ je̩ akala, ku me̩ la ñmo̩ ago-i, uche̩ uku e-Ondu oñ me̩ dukpogo le̩, gbe̩gba kʼi awa.
Todabe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ du kʼi ajʼakala abe̩k i añmo̩ ago Ondu kʼi ma la de̩ alu kʼi chʼeju-wñ n mak abi año̩la Ondu kpʼe̩bie̩-wñ i je̩ le̩.
Ama one̩ ki nañwa o̩la e-wñ go, ki chʼeju-wñ kʼi aje̩, abe̩le̩ tak i aje̩ kwef akala-i tak i añmo̩ kwef ago-i.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki je̩ kʼi laño̩ ñmo̩ ajo̩ i aje̩ i añmo̩ nyʼo̩la-wñ le̩ abu kʼi ma fʼaño̩la le̩ ñwa te̩ ojoji n.
Tod e-le̩ amone̩ wewe ef ume̩ chʼe̩gbo, ma chʼe̩no̩ga de̩wu de̩wu, abo ki mʼolu du la de̩ ke̩ n.
I la chʼe-kʼa ma fʼo̩la-wa ñwa ru ojoji i ma nʼajo̩ ñw a n.
Ama ajo̩-wa ku ma ka le̩, o̩la oñ Ondu ako̩ wa todu ku ma ki we ekpa wa abi manyʼabile̩.
Todabe̩le̩, amo̩maye mi, abu ku me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ wajo̩ ku me̩ je̩ le̩, me̩ nanede omune̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼebi akpa e̩ne̩ du, i ki je̩ e̩wñ unyi-wñ; todu ku me̩ ki we ekʼo̩la-me̩ wajo̩ tod ajo̩. Oñ e̩wñ ki bo̩ le̩ e̩gba du kʼu lewa nafʼu te̩ru e̩gu-wñ.
Amo̩maye, i chʼe-o̩la ugbo e̩wñ Afu le̩ i dʼumi e̩do̩ ku me̩ chʼugbo-du e-le̩ n.
Ame̩ chema ka kʼe̩gba ku me̩ che abo uche̩ichi le̩, ma ane̩ me̩ nyʼugbo ode ki ma nʼomu uko̩la n, alu du ku ma chaka ne̩ me̩ le.
Todule̩ naje̩ ñw me̩ ma kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki ako̩la ef Afu O̩jo̩ kʼi akakini, Ama mu Jisus, i de̩ n, e̩ne̩ du la neke kakini, Jisus Ondu n, chai ef Afu Kiafo̩.
Oñ ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ojoji ojoji do̩mo̩. Afu la chʼokate.
E̩wñ eche laño̩ do̩mo̩ ojoji ojoji ge̩, Ondu la chʼokate,
ukpahiu uko̩lo̩ eche laño̩ do̩mo̩ ojoji ojoji ge̩, O̩jo̩ la chʼokate, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki achuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ du ef e̩wñ du.
Ma la dʼutejugede Afu le̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ todu kʼi nʼile ñw u.
Todu, ma dʼo̩la ibe ñw e̩ne̩ʼka, lef Afu le̩, ma la dʼo̩la e̩wñ ema ñw e̩nomune̩ likpa Afu le̩ gbage̩de̩:
ma dʼe̩do̩ ekono ñw e̩nomune̩ ojoji ef Afu le̩ pitii: oñ e-e̩nomune̩ chʼele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki acho̩ga kpa ef Afu okate le̩;
e-e̩nomune̩ la chʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu eche; e-e̩nomune̩ chʼache̩ eka; oñ e-e̩nomune̩ la chʼama-fu eñwaru; e-e̩nomune̩ ojoji chʼalu ichi ichi eka; oñ e-e̩nomune̩ chʼomudechi eje̩;
e̩wñ-i du Afu le̩ gbage̩de̩ la achuko̩lo̩-wñ, i akpe̩ ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ okoke alu kʼi neku.
Todu dabalu kʼaño̩la chʼokate kʼi la nʼe̩wñ wewe ki ronyʼu, kʼe̩wñ año̩la wewe le̩ la mud año̩la okate, abe̩le̩ Kraisti laño̩ de̩ ge̩.
Todu ma fʼo̩chaka-wa che baptism tef año̩la oka ef Afu oka le̩, dagba ma chʼamaJu, dagba ma chʼamaGrik, dagba ma chʼamadu, dagba ma chʼo̩mone̩; ma laño̩ je̩ ñw o̩chaka-wa ñmo̩ Afu okate le̩.
Todu i chʼe̩wñ okate ki ronyʼaño̩la chʼaño̩la n, chai e̩wñ wewe.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩re̩ kakini, Todabu kʼomi ma chʼo̩wo̩ n, u dʼef e̩wñ año̩la n, tod e-le̩ i awe edʼef e̩wñ año̩la n.
I la che̩wñ kʼeti kakini, Todabu kʼomi ma chʼeju n, u dʼef e̩wñ año̩la n, tod e-le̩ i we edʼef e̩wñ año̩la n.
Iche̩wñ kʼo̩gbo̩dudu año̩la ma chʼeju, ugbo o̩la egbo̩ ma de̩? Iche̩wñ kʼo̩gbo̩dudu-wñ ma chʼe̩wñ ugbo̩la, ugbo ulu egbo̩ ma de̩?
Ama fa-i O̩jo̩ kʼe̩wñ ki aronyʼaño̩la jo̩ okoke alu ki dʼowñ e̩do̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼo̩chaka-wñ chʼe̩wñ okate ki dʼef año̩la, ugbo año̩la ma de̩?
Abe̩le̩ fa-i, e̩wñ ki ronyʼaño̩la wewe mana, año̩la muda chʼokate.
Eju la neke ka ñw o̩wo̩ kakini, Eku-we̩ aku mi n in: oji la neke ka ñw e̩re̩ kakini, Eku-we̩ aku mi n in;
ama e̩wñ ki ronyʼaño̩la ki chʼe̩gbo tule eju one̩ chʼe̩wñ eku tule ololo.
Oñ e̩wñ ki ronyʼaño̩la e-kʼa do̩ ki ma nʼojima n le̩ e-le̩ a akʼe̩wñ ojima nyʼu ololo, tak e̩wñ-wa ki ma chʼuto̩ n, e-le̩ nʼuto̩ ololo.
Eku e̩wñ du la aku e̩wñ uto̩ ki ronyʼaño̩la-wa n. O̩jo̩ la fʼaño̩la kpe̩gwa nyʼomune̩, oñ i mʼojima du ñw e-kʼe̩wñ ñʼo̩;
tode̩gba kʼukpe̩ru adʼef año̩la. I muda dukpe̩ kʼe̩wñ ki ronyʼaño̩la le̩ du ki wʼomune̩ eju okujo̩.
E̩wñ año̩laʼka chaka li uwa, e̩wñ ki ronyʼaño̩la le̩ du abʼo̩ li uwa; ma chaka dʼojima ñw e̩wñ año̩laʼka, e̩wñ año̩la le̩ du abʼo̩ yo̩.
Ame̩ la chʼaño̩la Kraist, e̩wñ ki aronyʼaño̩la-wñ okoke a che.

O̩jo̩ la kʼe̩wñ iche̩ka jo̩ ef ujeju abudo̩-wñ, ejodudu chʼame̩nukpuche̩, ekeji chʼamakache̩, e̩ke̩ta chʼamakone̩wñ, ubile̩ tak i chʼamachʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu, ubile̩ tak ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ o̩ga echekpa, amabone̩che, amañone̩o̩na, alu ichi uche̩uche̩.
O̩chaka-ma chʼame̩nukpuche̩? O̩chaka-ma chʼamakache̩? O̩chaka-ma chʼamakone̩wñ? O̩chaka-ma chʼamachʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu?
O̩chaka-ma nʼele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-o̩ga echekpa? O̩chaka-ma ako̩la ichi ichi? O̩chaka-ma ajomudechi?
Me̩ ki go̩laru ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-ki tule ke.
Iche̩wñ kʼu nʼichi ichi amone̩ kpai e-amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ ako̩la, kʼu ma la nʼufe̩do̩ n, u mud ude̩ ki ako̩la kiñ kiñ kiñ abe̩k agogo ki ako̩la goñ goñ goñ ofo.
Iche̩wñ kʼu nʼache̩ eka, kʼu laño̩ chema e̩wñ afili chaka, kpʼe̩wñ ema du; i la che̩wñ kʼu nʼe̩do̩ ekono chaka, kʼu chʼuwo ki gbo̩gba kwʼe̩gu-wñ, kʼu ma la nʼufe̩do̩ n, u chʼe̩wñ du n.
I la che̩wñ kʼu mʼe̩wñ du kʼu ne̩ ko kpe̩ chʼele, kʼu laño̩ mʼaño̩la-mi du ñw ma todu ku ma fʼu gujo, kʼu ma la nʼufe̩do̩ n, i nʼile du ñw mi n.
Ufe̩do̩ aje̩do̩, i amo̩la; ufe̩do̩ alie̩na n; ufe̩do̩ añwo̩ n, i aba n,
i achʼe̩wñ ki ma chʼeju-wñ ni n; i ahi e-wñ to̩gba n, i abieju n, i alo e̩bie̩ne̩ ku ma chʼo n;
i ayo̩ ugbo e̩wñ uji n, i muda abʼochochi yo̩:
i agbʼe̩wñ du nyʼe̩do̩, i adʼe̩wñ du rʼochochi, i akibeno e̩wñ du, i afʼe̩do̩ lichi ugbe e̩wñ du.
I nʼe̩gba kʼufe̩do̩ achibu n: ama i chaka chʼache̩ ku ma ka, agbogili te̩; i chaka chʼichi ichi, i awe; i chaka chʼe̩wñ ema, i agbogili te̩.
Todu a chema e̩wñ kado̩na, a laño̩ kache̩ kado̩na ge̩;
ama e̩gba du kʼe̩wñ ki mufu kpoji lewa, mak e-ki kado̩na le̩ agbogili te̩.
E̩gba kʼu chʼo̩me̩kpa u ko̩la o̩me̩kpa, u nibe o̩me̩kpa, u lo e̩wñ o̩me̩kpa; ama abu kʼu mud o̩kone̩ u fʼe̩wñ o̩me̩kpa gbogili te̩.
Todu abajo̩-i a gane̩ lef ogigo ef ita ta, ama e̩gbale̩ eju meji ade: abajo̩-i u chema e̩wñ kado̩na; ama e̩gbale̩ nama ogbolo, dabalu ku ma ma mi ogbolo.
Oñ fai e̩do̩ ekono kpʼibe eko̩no̩ kpʼufe̩do̩ la jo̩-i, e̩wñ me̩ta-i; ama e-ki tʼo̩gba chʼufe̩do̩.
Me̩ nabʼufe̩do̩ kpe̩re̩; me̩ ki la go̩laru e̩wñ e-Afu le̩, e-ki to̩gba ki chʼutodu ku me̩ ki kache̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki ako̩la ichi i chʼone̩ i ako̩la ñw u n, chai O̩jo̩; todu e̩ne̩ du agbo̩ n; i la ako̩la e̩wñ afili ef afu.
Ama e̩ne̩ ki akache̩ ako̩la ñw amone̩, i anʼuma eju nyo̩gba, i adugbe̩do̩ ñw ma, i nyʼuma e̩do̩.
E̩ne̩ ki ako̩la ichi anʼo̩la-wñ eju nyʼo̩gba, ama e̩ne̩ ki akache̩ anʼujeju abudo̩ Ondu eju nyʼo̩gba.

I la dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼo̩chaka-me̩ ki ko̩la ichi ichi, ama e-ki tʼo̩gba chʼutodu ku me̩ ki kache̩: oñ e̩ne̩ ki akache̩ la tʼe̩ne̩ ki ako̩la ichi ichi le, chai e̩gba kʼi fʼomudechi-wñ je̩, todu kʼujeju abudo̩ Ondu ki gba e̩wñ ki anʼuma eju nyʼo̩gba.
Ama fai, amo̩maye-mi, iche̩wñ kʼu nʼichi ichi aka awʼugbo me̩, ile e̩wñ u du ñw me̩? chai e̩gba kʼu ko̩la ñw me̩ ef o̩la ebite̩, abe̩k ef e̩wñ ema, abe̩k ef ache̩ eka, abe̩k ef o̩la e̩wñ ekone̩?
Ama e̩wñ ki ma deju n, kʼi nʼomuko̩la, dagba i chʼufele, dagba i chʼumolo, iche̩wñ kʼukomu-wñ ma chʼojoji ojoji n abu ma ale ku ma ma ufele e̩wñ ku ma fa? abe̩k umolo e̩wñ ku ma nu?
Todu iche̩wñ kʼo̩kakachi komu adaru ofo, e̩ne̩ aji o̩la ogu?
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ de̩ lef ichi eka le̩ ge̩: iche̩wñ ki ma dʼo̩la te̩ pee n, ab one̩ ale kʼi ma e̩wñ ku ma ka le̩? todu ame̩ ajʼo̩mo̩ ako̩la ref afu ofo.
Ukani omuko̩la jʼef ile̩-i uche̩uche̩ kʼe-du ma awe nʼomuko̩la n.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼomi ma ma e-kʼukomu le̩ ka n nachʼe̩ne̩ ki akagudo̩-agudo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki ako̩la le̩, owñ la chʼe̩ne̩ ki akagudo̩agudo̩ ñw omi.
Abe̩le̩ ame̩ ge̩, abu ku me̩ go̩laru e̩wñ afu ene̩ le̩, me̩ feju e-kʼi aje̩ ñw me̩ nʼujeju abudo̩ Ondu eju nyo̩gba ololo.
Todule̩ e̩ne̩ ki ako̩la ichi kʼi na-chadua todu kʼi meju omudechi-wñ eje̩.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼu nachadua alichiʼka, afu-mi achadua, ibe-mi muda nʼe̩ro̩ n.
Todule̩ ab i de̩? nanʼafu chadua, naño̩ nʼibe chadua ge̩. Nanʼafu keli dʼO̩jo̩, naño̩ nʼibe keli dʼO̩jo̩ ge̩.
Cho̩kpo̩ni iche̩wñ kʼe̩ nʼafu akele O̩jo̩ abile̩ kʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼef uña o̩talaka aje̩ Ami e̩gba kʼe̩ fʼugwa gwa, todabu kʼi ma ma e̩wñ kʼe̩ ka n?
Todu ugwa kʼe̩ gwa chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ mana, i muda ane̩ ekeji eju nyo̩gba n.
NagwʼO̩jo̩, omi ako̩la alu ichi ichi tʼo̩chaka me̩ le:
i muda dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu nʼibe-mi ako̩la me̩lu ef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu todu kʼu kʼabomune̩ o̩la, tʼo̩la icham me̩gweji nyʼulo̩ko̩ eka ef ichi le.
Amo̩maye, me̩ ki nʼibe imo̩to̩ efu n; ama ugbo e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ eche me̩ ki mud o̩me̩kpa, ama ibe-me̩ ki mud ibe o̩kone̩.
I che̩ko̩tane̩ ef o̩lo̩da, kakini, Nanʼalichi ojoji ojoji kpʼuko abomune̩ ojoji ko̩la ñw amone̩-i; i chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma anyʼumi eti n, Ondu ka-i.
Todabe̩le̩ alu ichi ichi eka chʼutod ujiwe ñw abo ku ma ke̩do̩no n, chai abo ku ma ma ke̩do̩no n; ama ache̩-eka chʼutod abo ku ma ma ke̩do̩no n in, chai tod abo ku ma ke̩do̩no.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼo̩gbo̩ ujeju abudo̩ Ondu du wajugbo kate, kʼo̩chaka-ma ako̩la alʼichi ichi, oñ amo̩talaka abe̩k abo ku ma ma ke̩do̩no n mugudu wʼo̩mo̩, ama aka ku me̩ ko̩la dab ahimu n?
Ama iche̩wñ kʼo̩chaka-me̩ akache̩, oñ e̩ne̩ ki ma ke̩do̩no n abe̩k e̩no̩talakaʼka mugudu wa, o̩chaka-me̩ adʼo̩la biʼu, o̩chaka-me̩ agwili-wñ.
E̩wñ ki maja ef e̩do̩-wñ atejugede; oñ abe̩le̩ i awane̩ afʼeju bʼane̩ ma, i adojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩, i aka kʼO̩jo̩ dʼef ume̩ ochochi.

Todule̩ e̩wñ de̩, amo̩maye? E̩gba du ku me̩ wajo̩ kpʼo̩la-me̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ nʼeli ako̩ dʼO̩jo̩, i nʼo̩la kʼi akʼone̩, i nʼo̩la kʼi abite̩, i nʼalichi kʼi aka, i nʼomudechi kʼi aje̩. E̩wñ du ki mud e̩wñ ki anʼone̩ eju nyo̩gba.
Dagba e̩ne̩ du ko̩la alichi, i ki chʼone̩ meji abe̩k e̩ta, i ki tʼe̩ta le̩ n, ma ki ka aro̩ne aro̩ne; e̩ne̩ʼka ki jomudechi;
ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ ki ajomudechi ma do̩mo̩ n, mak e̩ne̩ le̩ ki gugu chi ef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu le̩; i ki ko̩la ñw o̩la-wñ kpʼO̩jo̩.
Amakache̩ ki nako̩la eji abe̩k e̩ta, tak abo ki bo̩ ki nañwʼo̩la-ma go.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼo̩laʼka mubite̩ ñw e̩nomune̩ kʼi gugu o̩mo̩, e̩ne̩ ejodudu ki chechi.
Todu o̩chaka-me̩ neke kache̩ okoke, todu kʼamone̩ du ki ko̩che̩, kʼo̩chaka-ma ki nʼugbe̩do̩;
afu amakache̩ la chʼe̩kamuhite̩ ñw amakache̩;
todu O̩jo̩ chʼO̩jo̩ e̩wñ bulubulu n chai e-ure̩do̩.
abobule̩ ki chechi jo̩ ef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu. Todu ma je̩ ñw ma ko̩la n; ama ki muda fʼo̩la-ma kamuhite̩ alu kʼo̩lo̩da ño̩ ka le̩.
I la che̩wñ ki dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma ko̩che̩ e̩wñʼka, ama ki tʼo̩ko̩ e-ma ene ef unyi. Todu i chʼe̩wñ anyo̩ ñw onobule̩ kʼi ko̩la ef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu.
Abe̩k ugbo me̩ oñ o̩lO̩jo̩ kwo dufu? Abe̩k ame̩ kate i tʼugbo-wñ?
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩dudo̩ kʼi chʼakache̩, abe̩k i chʼe̩ne̩ kʼAfu wʼo̩ o̩la, i ki ma ogbolo ka kʼe̩wñ kʼu nako̩rubutu-wñ ñw me̩-i, kakini, Uko̩ kʼOndu te̩ i che.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ko̩ ema, kʼi nako̩ ema waa.
To̩dabe̩le̩, amo̩maye-mi, me̩ nago̩laru ache̩ eka, me̩ ki la fʼo̩la ichi ichi eka naba n.
Me̩ ki muda che e̩wñ du tʼeju-wñ kpai aro̩ne aro̩ne.
Oñ naje̩ ñw me̩ ma, amo̩maye, ka kʼuche̩nyo̩ e-kʼu je̩ ru me̩ le̩, e-ku me̩ ño̩ mugba le̩, e-ku me̩ la dago ef uwñ le̩,
e-ku ma ñʼajadu me̩ lef uwñ iche̩wñ ku me̩ mʼo̩la e̩wñ kʼu fʼUche̩nyo̩-wñ je̩ ru me̩ le̩ ne̩ gaga, iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma ke̩do̩no tebitele ofo n.
Todu ejodudu e̩wñ kʼomi onugo gba dʼef e̩wñ ejodudu kʼu du ñw me̩ le̩: kakini, Kraisti leku tod adure-wa, alu kʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ka;
ka ku ma ño̩ mʼu du ji; ka ku ma la mʼowñ du kwane̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta alu kʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ka;
ka ku Kifas fʼu li, tak amame̩gweji le̩ liʼi;
ubile̩ tak amo̩maye ku ma tʼone̩ oli me̩gwa le liʼi e̩gba kate, ojile abo le̩ do̩mo̩ gbogbo wʼifai, ama iche̩ka ef uma mʼolu du me̩;
ubile̩ taku Jeme̩s fʼu li; tak ame̩nu-kpuche̩ chaka liʼu;
ubiane̩ e-ma du, omi kʼu dab o̩ma ki ma gbo taku ma bi n, ño̩ liʼi ge̩.
Todu omi chʼe̩ne̩ ki nya ef ame̩nukpuche̩ le̩, u bebo̩jo̩ ku ma do̩ mi ko̩ e̩nukpuche̩ n, todabu kʼu doli ujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩.
Ama lugbo ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ oñ u de̩ abe̩i, oñ ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ mud ofofo ugbo mi n, u ño̩ chʼakanya uko̩lo̩ tʼo̩chaka-ma le ololo: i muda chʼomi che n, chai ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ bʼumi che.
Todule̩ dagba i chʼomi dagba i chʼama, abe̩le̩ a takoya oñ abe̩le̩ ame̩ ke̩do̩no.
Oñ iche̩wñ ku ma fʼakoya Kraisti ta kaku ma mʼu du kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, abile kʼiche̩ka ef ume̩ kakini, Udajikwane̩ e-abo ki ku do̩mo̩ n?
I la che̩wñ kʼudajikwane̩ e-abo ki ku ma do̩mo̩ n, maku ma du Kraisti kwane̩ n;
ma ma du Kraisti kwane̩ n, mak akoya-wñ kʼa ta le̩ chʼofofo, e̩dekono-me̩ laño̩ mud ofofo ge̩.
Oñ ma li ka kʼa agbʼO̩jo̩ ibenu olemi; todabu kʼa gbʼO̩jo̩ ibenu kak i du Kraisti kwane̩: e-kʼi ma du kwane̩ n, iche̩wñ ku ma ma du abo ki ku kwane̩ n.
Todu iche̩wñ ku ma ma du abo ki ku kwane̩ n, maku ma du Kraisti kwane̩ n:
i la che̩wñ ku ma ma du Kraisti kwane̩ n, mak e̩dekono-me̩ chʼowai; me̩ jʼef adure-me̩ ta.
Mak abo ku ma mʼolu du efu Kraisti le̩ la lenyo̩ me̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼa kibeno Kraist ef udeju-wa ile̩-i kate, mak a chʼe̩nejumomi tʼamone̩ du le.
Ma muda mu Kraisti du kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku fa-i me̩, oñ i mud ejo̩ga abo ku ma mʼolu du.
Todu abu ki che lef one̩ oñ uku wa, lef one̩ oñ udajikwane̩ e-abo ki ku laño̩ do̩mo̩ ge̩.
Todu alu kʼefu Ade̩m o̩chaka amone̩ ku, abe̩le̩ efu Kraist o̩chaka amone̩ año̩ nʼiñini ge̩.
Ama e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ef uche̩ e-wñ: ejo̩ga-wñ che Kraist; ubile̩ tak abo e-Kraist ef ewa-wñ.
Ubile̩ chʼukpoji-wñ e̩gba du kʼi mʼo̩da ojane̩ le̩ du ñw O̩jo̩ kʼi laño̩ chʼAta, owñ chʼe̩gba du kʼi fʼagboji chaka kpai o̩da chaka kpai ukpahiu chaka gbogili te̩.
Todu owñ ajʼonu tila gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼi fʼame̩nebi-wñ chaka kojo̩ o̩gane̩ e̩re̩-wñ.
E̩nebi otitala ku ma afu gbogili te̩ chʼuku.
Todu i fʼe̩wñ du kamuhi tʼo̩gane̩ e̩re̩-wñ me̩. Ama e̩gba du kʼi ka kʼi fʼe̩wñ du kamuhi te̩ le̩, oji-wñ dufu, kakʼi bo̩ e̩ne̩ ki fʼe̩wñ du kamuhite̩ ñw u le̩.
Ama e̩gba du kʼi fʼe̩wñ du kamuhite̩ ñw owñ, e̩gbale̩ tak O̩ma onugo afʼo̩la-wñ kamuhite̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki fʼe̩wñ du kamuhite̩ ñw owñ, todu kʼO̩jo̩ ki chʼo̩chaka ef o̩chaka.
Cho̩kpo̩ni abo ku ma ache ma baptism tod abo ki ku faa? iche̩wñ ku ma ma akʼabo ki ku kwane̩ kilikili n, e̩wñ chi ku ma che one̩ baptism tod abo ki ku?
E̩wñ chi kʼa ño̩ dʼo̩la-wa gbalite̩ iko tʼiko du ge̩?
O̩jo̩-ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa naku, amo̩maye-mi: O̩da! ef uba kʼu ne̩ me̩ aba efu Kraisti Jisus Ondu-wa.
Iche̩wñ kʼu nʼibe one̩ ofo fʼuja ja kpai amo̩ke̩la E̩fe̩sus ile e̩wñ i ne̩ ñw mi? Ma ma kʼabo ki ku kwane̩ n, mak a je̩ kʼa ñmo̩ ke, kʼa aku o̩na.
Me̩ ki je̩ ñw ma ko me̩ la n: eke̩fa kpʼame̩ne̩bie̩ne̩ aje̩ ñw ali e̩nyo̩ ki che̩.
Eju-me̩ ki wane̩ tef o̩kpakpa, me̩ ki la dure ño̩ dure n; todu abo iche̩kibo̩ ko̩ ema O̩jo̩. Nako̩la-i ki mu me̩ anyo̩.
Ama e̩ne̩ʼka akakini, Abile ku ma akʼabo ki ku kwane̩? año̩la e̩wñ oñ ma ane̩ wa?
E̩ne̩dada; e̩wñ kʼuwe̩ adu gbe̩ atiga n chai e̩gba kʼi ku.
I chʼaño̩la ki awa etito̩ oñ e̩ dugbe̩ le̩ n, chai e̩yo̩ ki ma ne̩ igbogbo n, ukani i chʼo̩ka abe̩k iche̩ka kwef e̩wñ ki bo̩ le̩;
O̩jo̩ la adʼaño̩lañw u alu ki dʼe̩ e̩do̩, oñ i adʼaño̩la e-wñ ñw e̩yo̩ okoke le̩.
O̩re̩la du chʼo̩re̩la okate n; oka-wñ la chʼe-one̩, omune̩ la chʼo̩re̩la e-e̩la, omune̩ la chʼo̩re̩la e-ame̩we̩, omune̩ la chʼe-e̩ja.
Año̩la e̩-efojale̩ la do̩mo̩, kpʼaño̩la e-ane̩ ile̩-i ge̩. Ojima e-efojale muda chʼojoji, oñ ojima e-ane̩ ile̩-i la chʼojoji.
Omune̩ la chʼojima e-olu, omune̩ la chʼojima e-ochu, omune̩ la chʼojima e-awo; todu awo chʼojoji ñw awo̩ ef ojima.
Abe̩le̩ udajikwane̩ e-abo ku ma ku ño̩ de̩ ge̩. Ma gbe̩ ef e̩che̩; ma dʼu kwane̩ ef e̩wñ ki ma che̩ n;
ma gbe̩ ef achukata; ma dʼu kwane̩ ef ojima; ma gbe̩ ef e̩gbo̩; ma dʼu kwane̩ ef ukpahiu;
ma dʼaño̩la one̩ alu kʼiye-wñ bi gbe̩; ma dʼaño̩la e-afu kwane̩. Iche̩wñ kʼaño̩la one̩ alu kʼiye-wñ bi do̩mo̩, mak año̩la e-afu do̩mo̩ ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma ño̩ ko̩tane̩ ge̩, kakini, Ade̩m, e̩ne̩ ejodudu le̩ mud onugo one̩ ki deju. Ade̩m e-ubi-otitalachʼafu ki adʼiñmi ñw e̩wñ.
E-ejodudu la chʼe-afu n, chai onugo one̩ alu kʼiye-wñ bi; ubi e-le̩ tak e-afu do̩mo̩.
One̩ e-ejodudu le̩ kwef ane̩ ile̩-i, ebutu i che: one̩ e-ekeji kwʼefojale.
Alu kʼe̩ne̩ e-ebutu le̩ de̩ e̩go̩ e-le̩ oñ abo ebutu de̩; oñ alu kʼe-efojale le̩ de̩ e̩go̩ e-le̩ abo e-efojale ño̩ de̩ ge̩.
Oñt dabalu kʼa fʼojibo e-ebutu le̩ ne̩, abe̩le̩ a ñʼane̩ ojibo e-efojale le̩ ge̩.
Ama e̩wñ kʼu naka de̩ amo̩maye, kakini, O̩re̩la kpʼe̩bie̩ neke je̩ ojane̩ O̩jo̩ ogu n; eche̩ aje̩ ewe eche̩ ogu n.
Me̩ go, naka e̩wñ afili ñw me̩: O̩chaka-wa alolu n, ma muda arʼuwa da chaka.
Eche raa, echʼeju be, e̩gba o̩kakachi ubi otitala; todu o̩ka-kachi ako̩la, taku ma akʼabo ku ma ku kwane̩ ku ma ñʼache ge̩ n, taku ma arʼuwa da ojoji.
Todu e-e̩che̩-i adʼe-ki ma che̩ n tʼo̩la tila; oñ e-ki aku-i adʼe-ki ma ku n tʼo̩la tila.
Ama e̩gba du kʼe-e̩che̩-i mʼe-ki ma che̩ n du tʼo̩la, kʼe-ki aku-i mʼe-ki ma ku n du tʼo̩la, e̩gbale̩ tak o̩la le̩ awache, owñ chʼe-ki che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Uku-e, ugbo edu kʼe̩ du de̩ ke?
Ope uku la chʼadure; ukpahiu adure la chʼo̩lo̩da.
Ama O̩jo̩ nʼugwa-wñ, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki adu ñw a kʼa du lef Ondu-wa Jisusi Kraist.
Todabe̩le̩ amo̩maye-mi e-ufe̩do̩, ame̩ ki fʼofe mane̩, kʼe̩wñ du ki chʼume̩ iche̩ n, ku me̩ jʼef uko̩lo̩ Ondu eche ololo e̩gba du, abu ku me̩ chema kakini, Akanya-me̩ ku me̩ che chʼofofo ef Ondu n.
Oñ ugbo o̩la o̩ko̩ ete̩ tod abo kiafo̩ le̩, dabalu kʼu ñwa ñw ujeju abudo̩ Ondu Galatia, abe̩le̩ ame̩ ki ño̩ che ge̩.
O̩jo̩ ejodudu ef o̩jo̩ mebie du e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki nadʼe̩wñ ne ugbo-wñ teju alu ki ra ñw u, todu ki we enʼo̩ko̩ ete̩ e̩gba du kʼu lewa.
Oñ e̩gba du kʼu lewʼo̩mo̩ abo du ku me̩ ñwa ku ma nyo̩, nadʼo̩takada ñw ma kʼu kpe̩ ma ku ma ne̩ e̩wñ ufe̩de̩nyo̩-me̩ nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
I la che̩wñ ki cheju-wñ kʼomi ki ño̩ le ge̩, ama ale bʼumi.
U la awugbo me̩ e̩gba du kʼu fʼane̩ Masidonia le kpa; todu nale ane̩ Masi-donia kpa ta;
ama nagugu ugbo me̩, ukani najʼo̩jo̩ uwo-i nyane̩, todu kʼame̩ ki chʼona ule̩ ñw mi ugbo du kʼu nanyi.
Todu i dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu nali me̩ ef elale fa-i ta n; todu u kibeno kak u nabʼume̩ gugu ikoʼka, iche̩wñ kʼOndu je̩.
U muda gugu E̩fe̩sus gbe̩gba o̩jo̩ e̩kʼooje le̩;
todu alo̩na lile ugbo kʼuko̩lo̩ anoji ef uwñ mubi ñw mi, abo ku ma la kpona nyʼu lachawewe.
I la che̩wñ ku Timoti lewa, me̩ nago todu kʼi dʼugbo me̩ ki we nʼailo̩ era ñw u; todu uko̩lo̩ Ondu i ache, dab omi ge̩;
todule̩ e̩ne̩ du ki dʼo̩ rʼibe̩te̩ n. Me̩ ki la chʼo̩na ule̩-wñ ef ure̩do̩, todu kʼi wʼugbo mi: todu omi kpʼamo̩maye le̩ jʼemi aneju-wñ.
Oñ ugbo o̩la Apo̩lo̩s, o̩maye le̩, u gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ nana todu kʼi nyʼugbo me̩ manyʼamo̩maye le̩, i muda dʼowñ e̩do̩ du todu kʼi wa fa-i ta n; ama i awa e̩gba du kʼi li iko ki nyo̩.
Me̩ gwe̩ke̩ adide, me̩ dago kpaka ef e̩do̩ ekono, me̩ ki chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩, me̩ gbo e̩do̩.
E̩wñ-me̩ du ki mud ef ufe̩do̩.
Amo̩maye, nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, ame̩ chema abunyi Stefano̩s kak ama chʼejo̩ga abo Akaya, kʼama la dʼe̩do̩-ma tʼeche̩wñ ñw abo kiafo̩;
todu kʼame̩ ki ño̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ kamuhite̩ ñw abo e̩go̩-i, kpʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi abʼuwa chuko̩lo̩ kʼi ño̩ dʼef akanya-wñ eche.
Oñ nayo̩ noji ewa Stefano̩s kpai Fo̩rtunatus kpʼAkaikus: todabu ku ma chenyʼe̩wñ-me̩ ki ña le̩ e̩ko.
Todu ma je̩ ñw afu-mi ruko kpai e-me̩ ge̩; todule̩ me̩ namejuma abo e̩go̩-i.
Ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu e-Esia agwa me̩. Akwila kpai Priska manyʼujeju abudo̩ Ondu ki dʼef unyi-ma agwa me̩ nana ef Ondu.
Amo̩maye du la agwa me̩. Me̩ ki nʼalu ekalu kʼi afo̩ agwa omune̩.
Ugwa e-mi Po̩l kʼu nako̩ kpʼo̩wo̩-mi de̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma che̩do̩ Ondu n, ama ki fʼu mu. Maranata, owñ chʼOndu-wa wa ke.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu Jisusi Kraisti ki dugbo me̩.
Ufe̩do̩ e-mi ki dugbo me̩ chaka efu Kraisti Jisus.
Po̩l e̩nukpuche̩ Kraist Jisus lugbo ede̩ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩, kpai Timoti o̩maye-wa, tugbo ujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩ ki de̩ Ko̩rint, manyʼabo kiafo̩ ku ma jʼef o̩gbo ane̩ Akaya chaka du:
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼure̩do̩ kwugbo O̩jo̩ Ata-wa kpʼOndu Jisus Kraist ki dʼugbo me̩.
O̩jo̩ kʼi ño̩ chʼAta Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist ki nele, owñ chʼAta ejumomi eli kpʼO̩jo̩ ki nʼugbe̩do̩ chaka edu ñw one̩,
owñ le̩ kʼi nʼugbe̩do̩ adu ñw a ef o̩bata-wa duu, todu kʼawa ki neke dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw abo du ku ma jʼef o̩bata, lef ugbe̩do̩ kʼO̩jo̩ du ñw awa onugo.
Todu alu kʼiwo̩ e-ku Kraist li le̩ kwubo̩ jane̩ ñw a, abe̩le̩ ugbe̩do̩ laño̩ kwubo̩ jane̩ ñw a lefu Kraisti ge̩.

Ama dagba a chaka chʼe̩kpama te̩, owñ chʼutod ugbe̩do̩ e-me̩ kpʼujadu-me̩; dagba ma dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw a, i chʼutodu ugbe̩do̩ e-me̩, e-ki nʼuko̩lo̩-wñ ache ef e̩do̩ ku me̩ lichii ef iwo̩-i pitii kʼawa onugo jʼali.
Tak ibe kʼa kono todu me̩ che̩lonyane̩; abu kʼa chema kakini, Alu kʼame̩ jʼatuta kpʼawa ef iwo̩-i, abe̩le̩ ame̩ nʼuta ata, ef ugbe̩do̩-wñ ge̩.
Amo̩maye i dʼuwa e̩do̩ kʼame̩ ki chʼugbodu-wñ n, owñ chʼugbo o̩bata kʼa li Esia, kak adu-wñ fʼuwa ka ololo, i tʼukpahiu-wa le, todabe̩le̩ a mema kʼa ñʼadeju ge̩ n.
A muda nʼibe udu uku ku ma bu ñw a ef o̩to̩to̩la-wa, todu kʼa we eke̩do̩nʼo̩la-wa, chai O̩jo̩ kʼi ako abo ki ku kwane̩;
e-kʼi gba wa kwef uku akakata le̩, kʼi lañʼagba wa ge̩: owñ le̩ a kibenʼo kak i añʼagba wa ta.
Ame̩ onugo ki bʼo̩ chuko̩lo̩ todu wa ef o̩ko̩ e̩gbabʼO̩jo̩, todu kʼamone̩ wewe ki fʼu gwa nyo̩nyo̩ todu wa, tod ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki wugbo wa le̩.

Todu e̩wñ ki chʼuba kʼa ba de̩, owñ chʼibenu kʼakone̩ o̩la ki dʼef uwa agba kakini, Ef efo̩ kpʼo̩yala e-O̩jo̩, i la chʼef o̩fili o̩re̩la n, chai ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-O̩jo̩, a jo̩ achʼe̩wñ ef ile̩-i, ugbo e-me̩ itʼoji.
Todu akʼe̩wñ omune̩ ru me̩ n, chai e-kʼame̩ cho̩kalatu-wñ ku me̩ la ma ogbolo, oñ u kibeno kak ame̩ ama ogbolo gbogbo wʼukpoji,
dabalu kʼame̩ laño̩ bu ma wa, kakʼawa chʼuba e-me̩, alu kʼame̩ onugo achʼuba e̩-wa o̩jo̩ Ondu-wa Jisus.
Oñ eju-mi ki te̩gu-i u fʼu lo̩ kʼu wugbo me̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩, todu kʼame̩ ki nʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ekeji;
kʼu lef ume̩ alegudu nyi Masidonia, tak u ño̩ dabi kwo Masidonia awugbo me̩, kʼame̩ ki chʼo̩na ule̩ ñw mi kʼu nyi Judia.
Todule̩ eneku kʼu neku ewʼugbo me̩ le̩ chʼe̩wñ fuye̩e̩ eju-me̩? e̩wñ kʼu neku-wñ, naneku-wñ likpa o̩re̩la, todu kʼi-i, i-i, kpai o̩da, o̩da, ki dʼugbo mi?
O̩jo̩ la chʼachubi one̩ ka kʼo̩la-wa ugbo e-me̩ chʼi-i kpai o̩da n.
Todu O̩ma e-O̩jo̩ Kraisti Jisus, e-ku ma fʼakoya-wñ ta ef ume̩, lef umi kpai Silfano̩s kpai Timoti, mud i-i kpai o̩da n, chai ef owñ i-i de̩.
Todu alu du kʼO̩jo̩ ko̩la e̩wñ tane̩, ef owñ i-i de̩; todule̩ lef uwñ Ami ño̩ de̩ ge̩, kʼojima ki dʼugbo O̩jo̩ lugbo wa.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki afʼuwa lonyane̩ manyu me̩ efu Kraist kʼi laño̩ fʼekpo ba tʼuwa oji chʼO̩jo̩;
owñ ño̩ fʼuwa hiuko̩, i laño̩ mʼe̩wñ ugbo̩wo̩ du ñw a ef e̩do̩-wa, owñ chʼO̩jo̩-Afu.
Abe̩le̩ omi ado̩ O̩jo̩ kʼi chʼenibenu onugo-mi, kakini, Edo̩wo̩ mʼume̩ kʼu do̩wo̩ mʼume̩ oñ u ma wa Ko̩rint-in.
Icheka kʼa chʼodu e̩dekono-me̩ n, a muda chʼamabʼuyo̩-me̩ chuko̩lo̩: todu e̩dekono chʼe̩wñ ku me̩ dago.
Ama e̩wñ kʼu ñwa kpʼo̩la-mi de̩, kak u naño̩ dabi wʼugbo me̩ ef e̩do̩dudu ge̩ n.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼu je̩ ñw me̩ che̩do̩dudu, mak e̩ne̩ aje̩ ñw mi gwoguyo̩ kʼi ma chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi nʼe̩do̩dudu kwugbo e-mi le̩ n?
Tak u fʼe̩wñ kide̩ gbage̩de̩ ko̩ ru me̩, tode̩gba kʼewa kʼomi ma wa u ma nʼe̩do̩dudu kwugbo abo ki dukpe̩ kʼomi ma nʼuyo̩ ugbo ma; abu kʼu ke̩do̩no me̩ chaka kak uyo̩ e-mi achʼuyo̩-me̩ chaka.
Todu u dʼef o̩buta nana e̩do̩-mi la de̩ chukuu oñ u fʼo̩takada ko̩ru me̩ lef omi aku nana; i chʼutodu kʼame̩ ki che̩do̩dudu n, chai todu kʼame̩ ki ma ufe̩do̩ kʼu ne̩ ololo tule todu me̩.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du dʼe̩do̩dudu wa, i chʼomi i dʼe̩do̩dudu ñwu n, ukpe̩ e-me̩ chaka dʼef uwñ (todu kʼu we edʼadu ki woji ñw me̩).
Udu kʼojile amone̩ bu ñw u-i bʼe̩ne̩ e̩go̩ le̩ jo̩;
todabe̩le̩ i nyo̩ tule ku me̩ murida anʼo ku me̩ mudu chʼowñ ele-ufe̩de̩nyo̩, ku me̩ dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw u, tode̩gba kʼe̩do̩dudu ololololo amʼe̩ne̩ abe̩le̩ du mi.
Todu kide̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩ ku me̩ mʼoji ufe̩do̩-me̩ ugbo-wñ da.
Todu e-ki de̩ u ko̩takada, todu kʼu ma ijali-me̩, abe̩ku me̩ gbʼo̩la-mi ef e̩wñ du gbo̩.
E̩ne̩ ku me̩ la tʼe̩wñ no̩ chʼe ele-ufe̩de̩nyo̩, mak omi manyʼume̩ ge̩. Todu iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñʼka kʼomi tono̩ che ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ do̩mo̩, mak e̩wñ kʼu to̩no̩ che ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ chʼutodu me̩ eju Kraist,
tode̩gba ku Setan achʼuwa je̩: todu a chugbodu ibe-wñ n.
Oñ abu kʼu lewa Troas tod Uche̩nyo̩ Kraist, kʼalugbana la mubi ñw mi ef Ondu,
eli ku ma li Taito̩s o̩maye-mi n, e̩do̩-mi dachi n. Tak u fʼagbo che ma, oñ u kwʼo̩mo̩ nyi Masidonia.
O̩jo̩ muda nʼugwa, owñ ki ako wa le ef abo ku ma gwoye ogu efu Kraist e̩gba du, kʼi laño̩ dʼurinyo̩ e̩wñ-ema e-owñ tejugede lef uwa ugbo du.
Todabu kʼa chʼe̩wñ e-Kraist ki akporʼO̩jo̩ ef abo ku ma ajadu ma kpai ef abo ku ma alenyo̩;
ugbo abubiane̩ le̩ a chʼe̩wñ ki alu kwef uku tef uku, ugbo abejodudu le̩ a la chʼe̩wñ ki akpo kwef iñmi tef iñmi. E̩ne̩ la bʼe̩wñ-i jo̩ taa?
Todu a dab amone̩ wewe ku ma dʼo̩lO̩jo̩ chʼinyama n; ama alu kʼo̩la akwef e̩do̩ yala, kʼi la kwef O̩jo̩, abe̩le̩ awa aka efu Kraist eju O̩jo̩.
A ño̩ dabi je̩nyu o̩la-wa ge̩? abe̩k eku aku wa, alu ki ku iche̩kibo̩, kʼa nʼo̩takada ki aje̩nyu ñw a ugbo me̩, abe̩k e-ki kwugbo me̩?
Ame̩ onugo chʼo̩takada-wa e-ki che̩korubutu ef e̩do̩-wa kʼamone̩ du ama ku ma la nʼokalatu-wñ ache;
abu ki kwotejugede, kak ame̩ chʼo̩takada e-Kraist, e-kʼa ne̩ che e̩wñ ñw one̩, e-ki ma chʼomi ejiji ma du ko n, chai Afu e-O̩jo̩ ki nʼiñmi; i la chʼef alo okuta n, chai ef alo ki chʼe̩do̩ o̩re̩la.
Oñ e̩do̩ ekono e̩go̩ e-le̩ a ne̩ lefu Kraist ugbo O̩jo̩.
I cheka kʼawa bo̩jo̩ kpai ojika o̩la-wa, kʼa ki fʼe̩wñ lo dabe̩ne̩ ki kwʼef e-wa n, chai ebo̩jo̩ e-wa kwugbo O̩jo̩,
e-ki ño̩ che wa kʼa bʼe̩wñ eche e-alo etito̩ jo̩, i chʼe-kʼu kʼolubutu-wñ n, chai e-Afu; todu olubutu adʼone̩ kpa, Afu muda adʼiñmi ñw one̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe-e̩wñ eche e-uku kʼi che̩ko̩ nyʼo̩la okuta le̩ mud ojima kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l ma neke go Mose̩s eju lef ojima ki gbogili te̩ le̩ n,
abile kʼe̩wñ eche e-Afu ma adʼef ojima tule n?
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ eche e-abi ekpa le̩ nʼojima, mak e̩wñ eche e-o̩kpakpa atule ef ojima ololololo.
Todu ef e-i, e-ku ma dʼojima ñw u kʼi agbogili te̩ le̩ nʼojima du n, noj ojima ki tule ololo le̩.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe-ki agbogili te̩ lef ojima wa, mak e-kʼi ado̩mo̩ alo waa dʼef ojima tule mana.
Todule̩ abu kʼa nʼukibeno o̩gʼe-le̩, a nʼeju-e̩gbo ache e̩wñ nana,
a la che alu ki Mose̩s che kʼi dʼe̩wñ bʼeju-wñ ma todu kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l ki we ekejurʼukpoji e̩wñ ki agbogili te̩ le̩ n;
ama ibe-ma cheno̩; todu gbogbo tʼojolu eñini e̩gba du ku ma fʼo̩kalatu alo e-igbele le̩ che e̩wñ, le̩ gbage̩de̩ bʼuma eju ma ta, abu ki ma birʼuma eju ka kʼefu Kraist oñ i agbogili te̩ n.
Ama gbogbo tʼeñini e̩gba du ku ma cho̩kalatu o̩la Mose̩s, e̩wñʼka dachi nʼuma e̩do̩.
Ama e̩gba du kʼi arida tugbo Ondu ma mʼe-le̩ du bʼo̩ te̩.
Ondu la chʼAfu le̩; oñ ugbo du kʼAfu Ondu de̩, o̩mo̩ “omi nʼo̩la-mi” de̩.
Ma la bi e̩wñ le̩ rʼuwa eju chaka kʼa jʼago ojima Ondu dabe̩ne̩ kʼef ogigo, oñ i amʼuwa da tef ojibo e-le̩ gbage̩de̩ kwugbo ojima tef ojima, dabe̩ne̩ ki kwugbo Ondu ki chʼAfu le̩.
Tod e-kide̩ abu kʼa ne̩ uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche-i, alu ku ma lʼuwa ejumomi le̩, a gwegbo n.
