A muda fʼe̩wñ anyo̩ ki maja le̩ naba me̩, a lule̩ ugbeju n, a la chʼe̩wñ gwo̩ o̩lO̩jo̩ n; ama ef edutejugede kʼa dʼochochi tejugede a dʼo̩la-wa dago ñw akone̩ o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩ e̩ne̩ du eju O̩jo̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩wñ la chebʼeju Uche̩nyo̩-wa ma, mak ef abo ku ma lenyo̩ oñ e̩wñ bʼeju-wñ ma.
Owñ chʼef abo kʼo̩jo̩ e-okpanachi-i fʼeju ibe e-abo ku ma ma ke̩do̩no n chubi, todu kʼugane̩ Uche̩-nyo ojima Kraisti e-kʼi chʼojibo O̩jo̩ ki we eta dufu.
Todu i chʼo̩la-wa oñ a takoya-wñ n, chai Kraisti Jisus Ondu, kʼawa onugo la chʼadu-me̩ lefu Jisus.
Todabu kʼO̩jo̩ kʼi kakini, Ef e̩chubi oñ ugane̩ amʼane̩ ne̩ kwo, owñ le̩ mʼane̩ ne̩ ef e̩do̩-wa, todu kʼeju ki ne̩ ugbo ojima O̩jo̩ ema ef eju Jisusi Kraist.
A la nʼe̩wñ akoko kide̩ ef e̩wñ eku e-e̩ke̩te̩-i, todu kʼukpahiu-wñ ki tule ololo ki chʼe-O̩jo̩, kʼi we che akwugbo wa.
A chʼekpama te̩ o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du, ma muda fʼuwa dolo n; i fitu wa, ibe-wa la ta bʼo̩ te̩ n;
ma doli wa, ma muda tʼuwa no̩ tinyo̩ n; ma fʼuwa ka mʼane̩, a muda lenyo̩ n;
e̩gba du a ne̩ uku Jisus ef año̩la-wa ale, todu kʼiñmi Jisusi ki ño̩ kwotejugede ef año̩la-wa ge̩.
Todu ma jʼakʼawa kʼa deju-i ñw uku e̩gba du todu Jisus, todu kʼiñmi Jisusi ki kwotejugede ef año̩la-wa kʼi aku-i.
Todabe̩le̩ uku nachuko̩lo̩ ef e-wa, iñmi muda achuko̩lo̩ ef ume̩.
Oñ abu kʼawa de̩de̩ nʼafu e-e̩dekono okate, likpa alu ki che̩ko̩tane̩ le̩, kakini, U ke̩do̩no, todule̩ u ko̩la, awa onugo ke̩do̩no, todule̩ oñ a ako̩la,
abu kʼa chema kakini, E̩ne̩ ki dʼOndu Jisus kwane̩ le̩ ñʼako wa kwane̩ manyu Jisus kʼi la ako wa dago jo̩ manyu me̩.
Todu e̩wñ du chʼutodu me̩, todu kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩, kʼi natule nyo̩gba lef ojile amone̩ ki je̩ ñw ugwa ki chʼololo tod ojima O̩jo̩.
Todule̩ oñ a ma gwegbo ni; ama dagba one̩ e-ejo̩do̩da-wa do̩mo̩ ache̩, e-ejefu-wa achʼetito̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa alo waa.
Todu o̩bata fuye̩ ki de̩ iko-i kʼa li-i nachuko̩lo̩ uwoji adu ojima ololo ololo e-ogbegbele̩ ñw a;
abu kʼa ma kejurʼe̩wñ kʼeju ali-i n, chai e̩wñ kʼeju ma li n; todu e̩wñ kʼeju ali-i chʼe̩wñ adiko-i, ama e̩wñ kʼeju ma li n le̩ chʼe̩wñ ogbegbele̩.
Todu a chema kakini, Dagba ma mʼunyi e-ki chʼebu kʼa ge̩ne̩ ef uwñ ane̩ ile̩-i gulo̩, a chenʼunyi ku ma ko̩ kwugbo O̩jo̩, owñ chʼunyi e-ku ma ma nʼo̩wo̩ ko̩ n, e-ogbegbele̩ i che, i dʼefojale.
Todu a jʼef e-i afifi, eju ache wa kʼunyi-wa e-ki akwʼefojale ki lewa bʼuwa o̩la ma;
iche̩wñ ku ma ko bʼo̩la-wa ma ma ñʼali wa kʼa tago ofo ge̩ n.
Todu awa kʼa jʼef ebu-i jʼafifi mana, adu fʼuwa ka; i la dʼuwa e̩do̩ kʼa gwo̩ e̩wñ o̩la jane̩ n, chai ku ma ki ko e̩wñ o̩la bʼuwa o̩la ma, todu kʼe-iñmi ki mʼe-uku-i ko mi.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki fʼuwa che todu e̩wñ-i gbage̩de̩ chʼO̩jo̩, kʼowñ ño̩ mʼe̩wñ ugbo̩wo̩ kʼi chʼAfu le̩ du ñw a.
Todule̩ a chenʼe̩do̩ e̩gba du, a laño̩ chema kakini, Abu kʼa dʼunyi ef año̩la-i a dʼunyi ugbʼOndu ta n de̩,
todu lef e̩do̩ ekono a tale̩-i a le̩ ef e̩wñ kʼeju li n,
a la ne̩do̩, i la che̩rʼuwa e̩do̩ tule kʼa kwo bʼunyi año̩la te̩, kʼa ki jʼunyi ugbo Ondu.
Lef e-le̩ ge̩ dagba a jʼunyi, dagba a ma jʼunyi n, a chʼeju kpolo kʼa rʼowñ e̩do̩.
Todu ma akʼo̩chaka-wa jo̩ ejugede o̩gba e̩de̩ e-Kraisti chuu; todu kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki gba e̩wñ kʼi che iko kʼi dʼef año̩la, teju alu kʼi che, dagba i nyo̩, dagba i bie̩ne̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼa chema ailo Ondu, a tʼamone̩ eju gu, oñ awa kwotejugede ñw O̩jo̩; u laño̩ kibeno kʼa kwotejugede ef akone̩ o̩la ki dʼef ume̩ ge̩.
I chʼedabi a ño̩ dabi adʼo̩la-wa dago ñw me̩ n, ama a muda abʼuña ñw me̩ ku me̩ du wa buba, todu ku me̩ nʼohi ugbo abo ku ma ale alu kʼeju de̩ abu ki ma chʼalu kʼe̩do̩ de̩ n.
Todu dagba ibe-wa mukpatuka, O̩jo̩ i kpatuka ñw u; dagba ibe-wa lewane̩, ame̩ i wane̩ ñw u.
Todu ufe̩do̩ Kraisti mʼuwa ne̩ gaga; a fʼoji-wñ kpa kakini, E̩ne̩ʼka leku tod o̩chaka amone̩, mak o̩chaka amone̩ ku le̩;
i la leku tod o̩chaka amone̩, todu kʼabo ku ma deju ku ma deju ñw o̩la-ma ge̩ n, chai kʼama ki deju tod e̩ne̩ kʼi leku todu ma, ku ma mʼu du kwane̩.
Todule̩ akwʼe̩gba-i awa ño̩ li e̩ne̩ du alu ki de̩ ef o̩re̩la ge̩ n: dagba kʼa ma chaka te̩te̩ma Kraist alu kʼide̩ ef o̩re̩la ogbolo, fa-i a ño̩ mʼo̩ abe̩le̩ ge̩ n.
Todabe̩le̩ iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du dʼefu Kraist, enyi kʼO̩jo̩ nyiʼi etito̩ i che: e̩wñ igbele lale rinyo̩; me̩ go, i mud etito̩.
E̩te̩ e̩wñ du la chʼO̩jo̩, kʼi fʼuwa ño̩ru ñw o̩la-wñ lefu Kraisti, kʼi la mʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ñw one̩ e-eñʼone̩ ru-i du ñw a ge̩;
alu kʼO̩jo̩ dʼefu Kraist añʼile̩ ru ñw o̩la-wñ, i lʼuñwanane̩-ma ru ma n, oñ i mʼo̩la uño̩ru le̩ du tef uwa.
Todule̩ awa chʼabogijo ki maluna todu Kraist dabe̩ne̩ kʼO̩jo̩ do̩mo̩ agbo̩ko̩bʼone̩ lef uwa. A arodubʼume̩ todu Kraist, me̩ ki che̩ño̩ru ñw O̩jo̩.
I mʼe̩ne̩ ki ma ma adure n le̩ du che adure todu wa; todu kʼawa ki mud o̩kpakpa e-O̩jo̩ ef uwñ.
A laño̩ bʼomune̩ chʼuko̩lo̩ o̩ko̩ e̩gba bʼume̩ ku me̩ we egbʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ te̩ ofo,
todu i kakini,
A dʼe̩wñ du te̩ kʼone̩ ki ke̩re̩ n, tode̩gba ku ma chʼakpabie̩ uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ñw one̩-i,
a muda adʼo̩la-wa dago ef e̩wñ du alu kʼamache e̩wñ ñw one̩ e-O̩jo̩ de̩, ef e̩do̩ elichi nana, ef o̩bata, ef o̩pe̩cha, ef uwa kʼa li, ef egwo ku ma gwo wa,
ef unyi uga ku ma dʼuwa te̩ ate̩ ño̩ te̩, ef utu eda, ef e̩wñ echʼakanya-wñ, ef ide kʼa gwe̩ke̩ ade, ef alu eji;
ef e̩wñ yaala, ef e̩wñ ema, ef e̩do̩ eje̩, ef umo̩la, ef Afu Kiafo̩, ef ufe̩do̩ ki ma nʼakoru n,
ef o̩la ochochi, ef ukpahiu O̩jo̩; lef ido̩na ogu e-o̩kpakpa e-o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ kpʼe-awohi,
lef ojima kpʼachukata, lef uwohi e̩bie̩ne̩ kpʼuwohi e̩nyo̩, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼa chʼamadone̩ la kpʼame̩nochochi;
a dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ma wa n, ma la ma wa ogbolo; a dabe̩ne̩ kʼa aku, me̩ la go, a deju; a dabe̩ne̩ ku ma kʼuwa o̩la, ma muda dʼuwa kpa n;
a dabe̩ne̩ kʼa che̩do̩-dudu, ama a jʼayo̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩; a dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩nale, a la je̩ ñw amone̩ wewe chʼanana; a dabe̩ne̩ kʼa ma nʼe̩wñ du n, a muda chene̩ e̩wñ du.
Abo Ko̩rint, a mʼefu chi ñw me̩, e̩do̩-wa la de̩ gbagada.
I chʼef uwa me̩ che̩kpama jo̩ n, me̩ muda che̩kpa-ma jo̩ ef e̩do̩ e-me̩.
Ama e̩wñ akoko koji e-le̩, dabe̩ne̩ kʼamo̩ma-mi oñ naka ñw me̩-i, ame̩ ki ño̩ de̩ gbagada ge̩.
Me̩ ki mud abo ki dama kpʼabo ku ma ma ke̩do̩no n in, ame̩ kpʼama chʼojoji, todu e̩wñ chʼumana o̩kpakpa kpʼugbite̩re̩? E̩wñ chʼuta kʼugane̩ ata kpʼchubi ke?
E̩wñ la chʼomu Kraisti kpai Belial ki ade? abe̩k ukpe̩ e̩wñ oñ e̩ne̩do̩ ekono ne̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ ki ma ke̩do̩no n?
E̩wñ la chʼalu unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu ki ade kpʼunyi ode? Todu awa chʼunyi ejefu e-O̩jo̩ ki deju, alu kʼO̩jo̩ ka, kakini,
Todu kide̩ me̩ kwef alumeji-ma dufu wa,
tak u nachʼAta ñw me̩,
Todule̩ ame̩nufe̩do̩, abu kʼa ne̩ o̩la ukatane̩ kide̩ a ki che kʼa fe̩ bʼe̩kpabie̩ o̩re̩la kpʼe-afu du te̩, a ki che kʼefo̩ ki kpoji ef ailo O̩jo̩ era.
Me̩ ki bʼuña ñw wa ef e̩do̩-me̩: a chʼe̩ne̩ du uji n, a la kpʼe̩ne̩ du bie̩ n, a la chʼe̩ne̩ du je̩ n.
U kʼe-i kʼu kpʼame̩ abi no; todu u ka o̩gbo̩gba me̩ kak ame̩ dʼef e̩do̩-wa todu kʼa bʼo̩la-wa ku, kʼa la bʼo̩la-wa deju.
Eju e̩gbo kʼu nane̩ ko̩la ñw me̩ chenana, eba kʼu nane̩ me̩ ba chenana ge̩; ugbe̩do̩ che̩ko̩ ef umi, uyo̩-mi che̩ko̩ adafo ef o̩bata-wa chaka.
Todu i chaka che Masido̩nia kʼa nyi le̩, i nʼebo̩wo̩lo̩ ñw o̩re̩la-wa n, e̩wñ du fʼuwa kpama te̩: ejo̩do̩da chʼegidi, ejefu chʼailo.
Ama e̩ne̩ ki adugbe̩do̩ ñw abo kʼe̩do̩-ma chʼe̩kpabie̩, owñ chʼO̩jo̩, dugbe̩do̩ ñw a lef ewa Taito̩s,
i la chʼef ewa-wñ kate n, ama i ño̩ chʼef ugbe̩do̩ kʼi ne̩ ugbo e-me̩, abu kʼi fʼinabali eñeju kʼame̩ ñeju, ku me̩ dogeneji, ku me̩ go̩larʼe̩wñ todu mi ka ñw mi; todabe̩le̩ omi ño̩ yo̩ tule.
Todu dagba u chaka gwʼume̩ e̩do̩dudu ef o̩takada-mi le̩, ki la wo̩ mi, i wo̩ mi ge̩ n; u cheli ka kʼo̩takada le̩ gwʼume̩ e̩do̩dudu, dagba i chaka chʼiko auwa kate,

fa-i nayo̩, i chʼutodu ku me̩ chʼe̩do̩dudu n chai todabu ku me̩ chʼe̩do̩dudu tef ibe erida; todu i je̩ ñw me̩ chʼe̩do̩dudu alu ki chʼeju-wñ ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩, todu kʼawa ki we echʼe̩wñ kʼofu bʼume̩ ef e̩wñ du.
Todu e̩do̩dudu ki chʼeju-wñ ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ achuko̩lo̩ ibe erida tef ujadu, e-le̩ nʼejumama n; e̩do̩dudu ile̩-i la achuko̩lo̩ uku.

Todu me̩ go, e̩wñ kide̩ gbage̩de̩, owñ ebʼe̩do̩dudu ki chʼeju-wñ ñw e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ ku me̩ che le̩, alu ki chʼuko̩lo̩ e̩do̩chacha ef ume̩, ku me̩ kʼomu e-me̩, kʼi wo̩ me̩, ku me̩ railo, ku me̩ ñeju, ku me̩ go̩larʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩, ku me̩ bʼudu ñw u! ef e̩wñ du me̩ dʼo̩la-me̩ dago ku me̩ de̩ yaala ugbo o̩la le̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼu chaka kʼo̩takada ru me̩ le̩, i chʼutodu e̩ne̩ ki chʼuji le̩ n, i la chʼutod e̩ne̩ ku ma chʼo uji n, chai todu kʼe̩do̩chacha ku me̩ che todu wa le̩ ki kwotejugede eju O̩jo̩.
Todule̩ a fʼugbe̩do̩ ne̩ me̩.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼu du me̩ buba ef e̩wñ du ugbo-wñ, anyo̩ mʼumi n, ama alu kʼa kʼo̩la e̩wñ du ñw me̩ ef ochochi le̩, abe̩le̩ uba-me̩ kʼu ba ugbo Taito̩s ño̩ mud ochochi ge̩.
E̩do̩-wñ la chefe̩rʼume̩ ololo tule, abu kʼibe-wñ kad alu kʼo̩chaka-me̩ gbo̩la gbo̩ ku me̩ la mʼowñ gba kpʼailo era kpʼo̩la e̩ga.
Nayo̩ todabu kʼe̩do̩-mi dachi ef e̩wñ du ugbo me̩.
Amo̩maye, a je̩ ñw me̩ ma ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ kʼi duchele te̩ ef ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu Masido̩nia;
kakini, Ef o̩bata ki ñwa ma go nana le̩, uyo̩-ma ololololo kpʼale-ma ki nefu i kwu ma bo̩, oñ ma chʼo̩wo̩ anana ñw one̩.
Todu nagba ibenu kakini, Likpa alu kʼukpahiu-ma de̩, kpʼe-ki tʼukpahiu-ma le, oñ ma ge̩do̩la-ma che le̩,
ma nʼurodubo̩ kpʼo̩ko̩ e̩gbabʼuwa nana kʼo̩wo̩-ma ki tʼef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼuta eta ef e̩wñ eche ñw abo kiafo̩-i:
ma la che teju alu kʼa neju-wñ n, ma muda mʼo̩la-ma ko ñw Ondu kpʼawa alu ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ ejodudu.
Todu kʼa dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw Taito̩s le̩ de̩, todu alu kʼi chane̩ o̩gbo̩gba, abe̩le̩ kʼi nafʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ le̩ che tʼukpoji ef ume̩ ge̩.
Oñ alu kʼame̩ chʼololo ef e̩wñ du, owñ chʼe̩do̩ ekono kpʼo̩la eka kpʼe̩wñ ema kpʼe̩do̩chacha du, kpʼufe̩do̩ ku me̩ ne̩ fe̩do̩ wa, todu kʼame̩ ki ño̩ chʼololo ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩-i ge̩.
I chʼeñwa nañwa ñw me̩ oñ naka-i n chai todu kʼu nadʼe̩do̩chacha abomune̩ ojoji ñwʼufe̩do̩-me̩ go kʼu ma o̩gbolo-wñ.
Todu ame̩ chema ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist, kakini, Abu kʼi chaka chʼanana, todu me̩ i mud e̩nale, todu kʼame̩ ki mud anana lef ale-wñ le̩.
Ibe ki dʼef umi ugbo e̩wñ-i oñ nadu ñw me̩; todu i chenʼile ñw me̩, i chʼabu ku me̩ chane̩ kwʼechi echi kate n, i ño̩ dʼume̩ e̩do̩ abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Oñ fa-i me̩ ki la fʼeche ku me̩ chane̩ eche le̩ che̩ kpoji; todu alu kʼibe-me̩ de̩ kolokolo kʼi dʼume̩ e̩do̩ le̩, abe̩le̩ kʼeche kpoji-wñ kʼi ño̩ kwef e̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-me̩ tu ge̩.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼibe ki de̩ kolokolo tane̩, mak O̩jo̩ agba e̩wñ teju e̩wñ kʼone̩ ne̩, i agba teju e-kʼone̩ ma ne̩ n in.
E-i chʼutodu ki bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ñw abomune̩, kʼame̩ ki li o̩bata n,
chai todu ki chʼokujo̩: ikofa-i ololo e-me̩ chʼutodu unyaru e-ma, todu kʼololo e-ma ki ño̩ chʼutod unyaru e-me̩, todu ki mud okujo̩.
Owñ chʼalu ki che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki ya nana i kwʼu bo̩ n, oñ e̩ne̩ ki ya re i nyarʼowñ n.
Oñ O̩jo̩ nʼugwa, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki du e̩do̩chacha kide̩ tef e̩do̩ Taito̩s todu me̩.
Todabu kʼi mʼo̩ko̩-wa kʼa gba bʼo̩ le̩ gba ochochi, ama abu kʼowñ onugo chʼe̩do̩chacha i la ge̩do̩la-wñ dufu wʼugbo me̩ le̩.
Oñ a ño̩ fʼo̩maye kʼuñwulo̩-wñ ef uche̩nyo̩ dugbo du ef ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu kpe̩ lebʼo̩ ge̩;
i la chʼe-le̩ kate n, ama owñ ño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu kʼo̩wo̩ nʼo oji kʼi lebʼuwa nyʼule̩ kʼa le ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kʼa ne̩ che e̩wñ ñw one̩ tod ojima Ondu, kpʼibe-wa ki de̩ kolokolo.
A himama-wñ, tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du abulumʼuwa ef e̩wñ odimili kʼa che ñw one̩-i,
todu a libe e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ tane̩ tod eju Ondu kate n, ama eju amone̩ kpo̩fo̩.
Oñ a fʼo̩maye-wa kʼa fʼu ñwa ef e̩wñ wewe o̩gbe̩nugbe̩ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩do̩chacha kpe̩ lebʼuma. Fa-i i la nʼe̩do̩chacha tule nana tod ame̩ kʼi ake̩do̩no ololo le̩.
Dagba kʼi chʼe-Taito̩s, owñ chʼuta-mi kpʼe̩ne̩ ki abʼumi chuko̩lo̩ todu me̩. Abe̩k amo̩maye-wa le̩, ama chʼame̩nukpuche̩ e-ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu, ojima Kraisti ma che.
Todule̩ me̩ ki dʼuñwa ufe̩do̩-me̩ kpʼuba-wa todu me̩ ña ma eju ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu.
Todu i chʼo̩la e̩wñ eche ñw abo kiafo̩ le̩, i nʼugbo kʼu nakʼo̩takada-wñ rʼume̩ n, me̩ chʼo̩je̩bi-wñ,
todu u chema alu kʼibe-me̩ de̩ kolokolo, e-le̩ nadu buba ugbo abo Masidonia todu me̩, kakini, Abo Akaya fʼo̩la-ma mu kwʼechi echi; oñ ego̩laru ku me̩ go̩laru kʼabo wewe ef uma e̩che̩.
U muda fʼamo̩maye kpe̩ wa, todu kʼuba-wa kʼa ba todu me̩ ki we echʼofofo ef ukpe̩ kide̩; todu kʼame̩ ki mʼo̩la tane̩ alu kʼu ka le̩;
tode̩gba kʼukani abo Masidonia lebʼumi wa, ku ma li abu ku me̩ ma mʼo̩la tane̩ n, ki we enʼugbo kʼanyo̩ amʼuwa (todu kʼa we eka kʼame̩) ef o̩kpaka uba-wa le̩.

Todule̩ eku aku eju-mi kʼu gbo̩kobʼamo̩maye le̩ todu kʼama ki dʼo̩gba nyʼugbo me̩, ku ma ki fʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ ku me̩ kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ kpama, kʼi che̩ñwo̩che tane̩ abe̩le̩ ki mud e̩wñ ku ma akadua ñw me̩, kʼi we edabe̩ne̩ ku me̩ piepi e̩wñ.
E-le̩ la de̩, e̩ne̩ ki dʼe̩yo̩ gbe̩ fe̩fe̩le̩, o̩fe̩fe̩le̩ i ako wʼunyi; oñ e̩ne̩ ki dʼe̩wñ gbe̩ ku ma tadua ñw u año̩ kʼadua wʼunyi.
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kʼi che alu kʼi ñwatane̩ ef e̩do̩-wñ, i ki che lef e̩do̩dudu n abe̩k ef otila n: todu O̩jo̩ afe̩do̩ e̩ne̩ ki ache ele e̩do̩ afu.
Oñ O̩jo̩ aneke je̩ ñw ufe̩de̩nyo̩ du ki chʼololo ñw me̩, todu kʼame̩ ki nʼe̩wñ du e̩gba du ki bʼume̩ jo̩ chaka, kʼi kwʼume̩ bo̩ tod uko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩ du eche.
Alu ki che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki adʼe̩yo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki agbe̩, kʼi año̩ dʼakala wa tod uje̩wñ la adu ñw me̩ ku me̩ gbe̩, i la aje̩ ñw u nawo ñw me̩, i año̩ je̩ ñw e̩ro e̩wñ o̩kpakpa e-me̩ ki nyo̩gba.
I la aje̩ ñw me̩ mud anana ef e̩wñ du ku me̩ ki chʼo̩wo̩ ñw one̩ alu du ku ma chʼo̩wo̩ ñw one̩; e-le̩ achʼuko̩lo̩ ugwa egwʼO̩jo̩ lef uwa.
Todu abune̩ e̩wñ eche ñw one̩-i chʼe̩wñ ki nyarʼabo kiafo̩ eko ñw ma kate n, i ño̩ nʼe̩kwubo̩ ki mud e-O̩jo̩, owñ chʼugwa wewe ku ma gwʼo̩.

Lef eñwa ku ma ñwa e̩wñ ku me̩ che ñw one̩ go, ma jʼadʼojima ñw O̩jo̩ abu ku me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩, kamuhi teju alu ku me̩ gbalu Uche̩nyo̩ Kraisti, kpʼo̩wo̩ ku me̩ chi ñwone̩ ef uta kʼame̩ ta kpʼama kpʼamone̩ du-i.
Oñ ef o̩ko̩ kʼama gba bʼO̩jo̩ todu me̩ ma añeju-me̩, tod ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ ki tabale ki dʼugbo me̩.
Ugwa ki chʼe-O̩jo̩ tod ele-wñ ki ma je̩ ka n le̩.
Oñ omi, Po̩l, o̩to̩to̩la-mi agbo̩ko̩bʼume̩ lef o̩chikimi kpʼo̩yo̩o̩ e-Kraisti, owñ chʼomi kʼu chʼe̩ne̩ kʼu nahi o̩la-mi wane̩ e̩gba kʼu dʼugbo me̩, kʼu kwugbo me̩ tak u ne̩do̩ eko̩la ñw me̩ le̩;
oñ narodubʼume̩, kʼu we ene̩do̩ iko kʼeju-mi dʼane̩ ugbo me̩, teju alu kʼeju-mi mute̩gu kʼu fulo ka kʼu nane̩do̩ egbo ugbo abo iche̩kibo̩ ku ma fu wa lo rʼabo ku ma alule̩ tikpa o̩re̩la.
Todu abu kʼa chaka dʼef o̩re̩la ale, a jogu likpa alu kʼo̩re̩la aja n,
todu ido̩na e̩wñ ogu-wa chʼe̩wñ o̩re̩la n, ukpahiu O̩jo̩ muda dʼef uwñ ki akpʼo̩do̩ okuta fo̩ wane̩.
I agu o̩la kʼone̩ ñwa kʼi che lo̩ wane̩, kpʼe̩wñ ki gbo̩gba du ki adʼo̩la-wñ kwane̩ ki chagwunyʼe̩wñ ema e-O̩jo̩, oñ i akʼibe du kʼone̩ akpe̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩ ku ma ki gbʼo̩la Kraisti gbo̩;
o̩la-wñ laño̩ che̩mu te̩ kʼi bʼudu ñw eko̩ gbo̩lagbo̩ du, e̩gba du kʼugbagbo̩ e-me̩ jo̩ kpa.
Alu kʼe̩wñ de̩ eju oñ me̩ go. I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ ka kʼe̩ne̩ Kraist i che, i ki nadabi fʼo̩la-wñ lo kakini, Dabalu kʼowñ chʼe̩ne̩ Kraist abe̩le̩ oñ awa de̩ ge̩.
Todu dagba u ma chaka buba ololo ugbo o̩da-wa kʼa ne̩ (owñ chʼe-kʼOndu duwa kʼa ne me̩ nyo̩gba, i chʼutodu kʼa fa me̩ wane̩ n,) anyo̩ amu mi n.
Todu ki we edabe̩ne̩ kʼu nadʼo̩takada nyʼume̩ okpo.
Todu, i kakini, O̩la o̩takada-wñ chewoji, i la chegbiti; i muda lewa año̩la-wñ che̩gbo, uko̩la-wñ la chʼibe̩te̩.
E̩ne̩ e̩go̩-i ki nafʼu lo kakini, Abu kʼa de̩ ef o̩la o̩takada e̩gba kʼa ma dʼane̩ n, abe̩le̩ a de̩ ef uko̩la e̩gba kʼa dʼane̩.

Todu e̩do̩-wa gbo kʼa dʼo̩la-wa tef abo iche̩ka ku ma je̩nyu ñw o̩la-ma le̩ n, a la dʼo̩la-wa wawe e-ma n. Ama abo le̩ ku ma jo̩ kpʼo̩la-ma añwa o̩la-ma, ku ma la jo̩ adʼo̩la-ma wawe o̩la-ma, eju-ma ne̩ n.
A muda abuba tʼe̩ñwa-wa le̩ n, chai teju alu kʼe̩ñwa alo̩me̩ e-kʼO̩jo̩ ki añwa e̩wñ kpe̩ ñw a, e-wa te̩ gbogbo kad ugbo me̩.
Todu a fʼo̩la-wa no̩miya tabale dabe̩ne̩ kʼa ma tʼugbo me̩ n: todu a chʼabo ejodudu kʼa tʼugbo me̩ ef Uche̩nyo̩ Kraisti.
A dʼakanya uko̩lo̩ kʼabomune̩ ojoji che ba tʼe̩ñwa-wa le n; a muda kibeno ka kʼe̩ya kʼe̩dekono-me̩ aya nyo̩gba oñ awa anana nyo̩gba ef ume̩ teju alo̩me̩ e-wa kʼa chʼololo,
todu kʼa ki fʼUche̩nyo̩ je̩rʼabane̩ ki dʼo̩gba-me̩ le̩, kʼa we e̩dʼe̩wñ ki che̩ñwo̩che te̩ alo̩me̩ abomune̩ buba.
Ama e̩ne̩ ki abuba ki nabuba ef Ondu.
Todu i chʼe̩ne̩ ki je̩nyu ñw o̩la-wñ oñ ma ñwa go ki nyo̩ n, chai e̩ne̩ kʼOndu je̩nyu ñw u.
I dukpe̩ ku me̩ ma je̩ kpʼidada-mi pe̩. Me̩ muda je̩ kpʼomi me̩.
Todu najogu e-O̩jo̩ todu me̩: todu u ko me̩ kpʼo̩ko̩ okate, kʼu ko me̩ chʼigbe̩le̩ ki de̩ yaala ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n ñw Kraisti.
Ama narailo tode̩gba ki anʼugbo du ku ma afʼume̩ ibe kpabie̩ bʼe̩do̩-foo̩ kpʼe̩do̩-yaala Kraisti te̩ alu kʼejo̩ le̩ mʼIf ibe da ef ugbeju-wñ.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du wa atakoya Jisus omune̩ e-kʼa ma takoya owñ n, abe̩ku me̩ gbʼafu omune̩ ojoji, abe̩k uche̩nyo̩ omune̩ ojoji e-kʼame̩ ma gba akwoubi n, me̩ je̩ kpʼe-le̩ kak o̩me̩me̩le̩ i che.
Todu u fulo ka kʼu nyarʼame̩nukpuche̩ ku ma bʼukpa tʼo̩la-ma le̩ kikili n.
Dagba kʼu chaka chʼe̩no̩talaka ef o̩la eka, u muda dabe̩le̩ ef e̩wñ ema n; ama a mʼo̩la-wa du tejugede ñw me̩ ef e̩wñ du lʼo̩na du me̩.
Abe̩k adure u ta o̩la-mi kʼu hiwane̩ kʼame̩ ki hidago le̩? todabu kʼu fʼUche̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ je̩rʼume̩ ele ofo?
U fʼoji ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu omune̩ ji, owñ chʼuro̩me̩ kʼu gba ugbo ma todu kʼu che e̩wñ ñw me̩;

oñ e̩gba kʼu dʼugbo me̩ kʼe̩wñ nyarʼumi le̩, u dachi nʼe̩ne̩ du n. Todu e̩wñ ki nyarʼumi amo̩maye ku ma kwo Masidonia wa le̩ ko ñw mi kpa; ef e̩wñ du u fʼo̩la-mi de, naño̩ de ate̩to̩gba kʼu we chʼadu nʼume̩ oji.
Ochochi e-Kraisti dʼef umi, kakini, E̩ne̩ du akpo̩na nyʼuba-i ñw mi ane̩ Akaya n.
Tod e̩wñ? Todabu kʼu ma fe̩do̩ me̩ n? O̩jo̩ ma.
Oñ e̩wñ kʼu nache-i u ñʼache ge̩, todu kʼu we ebʼuña ñw abo ki dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma li uña, todu kʼamone̩ ki li ka kʼama dʼalu kʼa de̩ ef e̩wñ uba-ma le̩.
Todu abo e̩gʼe-le̩ chʼame̩nukpuche̩ olemi, amachuko̩lo̩ o̩gwo̩ ku ma fʼalu ku ma de̩ eju one̩ rida ame̩nukpuche̩ Kraist.
E-le̩ chʼe̩wñ aye n, todu i chaka che Setan onugo, i arʼalu kʼi de̩ eju one̩ da chʼonuche̩ ugane̩.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼamache̩wñ ñw Setan rʼalu ku ma de̩ eju one̩ da dabe̩ne̩ ku ma chʼamache̩wñ o̩kpakpa, i chʼe̩wñ elile de̩ n; ukpoji e-ma ateju alu kʼuko̩lo̩-ma de̩.
Naño̩ dabi ka, e̩ne̩ du ki do̩ ka kʼe̩nidada u che n; i ma dabe̩le̩ n maku me̩ mʼumi gba dabe̩ne̩ kʼu chʼe̩nidada, todu kʼomi ki ño̩ buba re.
E̩wñ kʼu naka-i, u ka teju e-Ondu n, i muda dabe̩ne̩ kʼef idada, ef udago uba kide̩.
Alu kʼamone̩ wewe abuba likpa o̩re̩la, omi ñʼaba ge̩.
Todu me̩ hika je̩ kpʼame̩nidada, abu ku me̩ chʼamanibe.
Todu one̩ mʼume̩ ko chʼadu abe̩k i mʼume̩ ko mi, abe̩k i gwʼume̩ je̩, abe̩k i hiʼo̩la-wñ ne, abe̩k i fʼo̩wo̩ gwʼume̩ eju, me̩ je̩.
E̩wñ kʼu naka-i ukata-mi nachi dabe̩ne̩ kʼa te̩te̩chʼe̩gbo. Ama ef e̩wñ du kʼe̩ne̩ du nʼe̩do̩ omi ño̩ nʼe̩do̩ ge̩ (o̩la idada naka-i).
Abo Hibru ma che? Abe̩le̩ omi ño̩ de̩. Abo Israe̩l ma che? Abe̩le̩ omi ño̩ de̩. Ugbe̩ Ebraham ma che? Abe̩le̩ omi ño̩de̩.
Amache̩wñ Kraisti ma che? e-mi tʼuma le (imu nahi oñ naka-i); ef akanya eche, e-mi chʼololo, ef unyi uga, e-mi chʼololo; ef egwo ku ma gwʼone̩, e-mi tabale; ef uku, e-mi chʼo̩gbe̩nugbe̩.
Onu me̩lu u gbʼitali okeka chi kwʼef o̩gbo̩ meji ugbo amaJu.
Onu me̩ta ma gwʼomi o̩kpa, ma rʼokuta do mi onuʼka, onu me̩ta o̩ko̩ kʼu dʼef uwñ dafo, odu kpʼo̩ro̩ka o̩jo̩ʼka u dʼef unefu ohimini;

ule̩ chʼale ño̩ le, u gbali te̩ ñw aji lile, u gbali te̩ ñw amajoji, u gbali te̩ ñw abʼane̩-mi, u gbali te̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi, u gbali te̩ ef ewo, u gbali te̩ ef aje̩tachi, u gbali te̩ ef ohimini, u gbali te̩ ef amo̩maye olemi:
ef akanya eche kpʼuwa eli, ef egwe̩ke̩ adide o̩gbe̩nugbe̩, ef ebi kpʼalugbe̩, ef alu eji o̩gbe̩nugbe̩, ef afu ki akpa kpʼago ofo.
Ubi e̩wñ o̩do̩da le̩ ojoji, e̩wñ ki ake̩che̩ bʼumi ma o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa chʼejiji eda tod ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu.
E̩ne̩ chʼe̩gbo kʼomi onugo ma chʼe̩gbo n? E̩ne̩ ma fʼu dahi kʼe̩do̩-mi ma kpa dab una n?
Iche̩wñ ki dukpe̩ kʼu nabuba tila, mak e̩wñ e̩gbo-mi nadu buba.
O̩jo̩ kʼi ño̩ chʼAta Ondu-wa Jisus, owñ ku ma kele-wñ ogbegbele̩ le̩, owñ chema ka kʼu remi n.
Igo̩bina ki dʼef o̩wo̩ onu Are̩tas Damaskus, je̩ ñw amisoja donyʼewo abo Damaskus kʼi fʼumi mu;
taku ma du mi tef agba lef ope o̩gba tane̩, oñ u fʼo̩ o̩wo̩.
I dukpe̩ uba eba, i la nʼile ni mana, oñ nadʼe̩wñ ane̩ ego kpʼo̩la Ondu ebite̩ wane̩ i.
U chemʼe̩ne̩ʼka efu Kraist ku ma mʼu dinya gbogbo tʼefojale e̩ke̩ta o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩le̩ ki tule-i; abe̩k ef año̩la le̩ oo u ma n, abe̩k ejo̩do̩da año̩la le̩ oo u ma n: O̩jo̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ma.
U la chemʼe̩ne̩ e̩gʼe-le̩, abe̩k ef año̩la, abe̩k ubi año̩la ojoji, u ma n: O̩jo̩ ma,
ka ku ma mʼowñ dinya tefu Paradais, oñ i gbʼo̩la ki ma jʼaka n, owñ chʼo̩la ku ma ma je̩ ñw one̩ ki ka n.
Todu e̩ne̩ e̩gʼe-le̩ nabuba, u muda abuba tod o̩la-mi n, chai ef e̩gbo-mi.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼuba eba ma dʼumi e̩do̩, u ma chʼe̩nidada n, todu ochochi naka, u muda ado̩wo̩ mo, tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du alo ka kʼomi tʼalu kʼi li kʼomi de̩ le, abe̩k omi tʼalu kʼi gbo̩ ugbo mi le.
Todu kʼu we ehiʼo̩la-mi ne tabale noj e̩wñ ku ma mubi rʼumi eju ololololo le̩, ma dʼikeke gwunyʼumi o̩la, onuche̩ Setan i che, todu kʼi ro̩kpo̩ ñw mi, todu kʼu we ehi o̩la-mi ne tabale.
U gbo̩ko̩bʼOndu onu me̩ta, todu kʼe̩wñ le̩ ki kwo bʼumi te.
Tak i ka ñw mi kakini, Ufe̩-de̩nyo̩-mi bʼuwe̩ jo̩; todu ukpahiu-mi mufu kpoji ef e̩gbo. Todule̩ e̩do̩-mi bo̩ tule kʼu buba ef e̩gbo̩-mi, todu kʼukpahiu Kraisti ki chʼunyabo ku ma fa bʼumi oji ma.
Lef e-kide̩ e̩gbo kpʼina ku ma bu mi kpʼekue̩wñ ki aku kpʼedoli kpʼekpama ku ma kpa mi ma todu Kraisti cherʼumi e̩do̩; todu e̩gba kʼu chʼe̩gbo, e̩gba le̩ u chʼe̩nukpahiu.
U mud e̩nidada me̩! ame̩ kʼumi e̩che̩ tʼo̩. Todu i dukpe̩ kʼame̩ ma je̩nyu ñw mi, todu u nyarʼame̩nukpuche̩ ku ma bukpa tʼo̩la-ma le̩ n, abu kʼu ma chaka chʼe̩wñ du n.
U nʼe̩do̩ elichi du chʼuko̩lo̩ ujiwe e̩nukpuche̩ ef ume̩, tʼujiwe, tʼuno̩, tʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu.
Todu e̩wñ do̩mo̩ kʼujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu ki bo̩ fʼume̩ du ef uwñ taa? Ukani i chʼe-kʼomi ma dachi no me̩ n? Me̩ mʼuji kide̩ du chʼumi ele!

Me̩ go, onu e̩ke̩ta kʼu mʼo̩la kʼu wʼugbo me̩ de̩-i, u muda dachi no me̩ n, todu nafeju e̩wñ-me̩ n, chai ame̩ onugo; todu i dukpe̩ kʼamo̩ma akʼe̩wñ akoko maja tod abo ku ma bi ma n, chai abo ku ma bi ma ache tod amo̩ma-ma.
Omi la akʼe̩wñ-mi kpʼo̩la-mi onugo kpabie̩ kpʼe̩do̩ e̩bo tod onugo-me̩. Nafe̩do̩ me̩ ololo tule oñ efe̩do̩ ku me̩ fe̩do̩ mi achʼo̩wo̩ wane̩?
I dʼabe̩le̩ ke, omi dʼadu ki aka me̩ ñw me̩ n, ama abu kʼu chʼe̩nugbeju oñ u nʼo̩gwo̩ fʼume̩ mu le̩.
U jakpa e̩wñ ugbo e̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ lugbo abo kʼu kpuche̩ wʼugbo me̩ le̩?
U rodubo̩ Taitos, u ño̩ fʼo̩maye le̩ kpuche̩ lebʼowñ. Taito̩s jakpa e̩wñ-me̩ ke n? I chʼAfu okate oñ a tale ef uwñ n? A dʼe̩re̩-wa tej e̩re̩ omune̩ n?
Ame̩ do̩ ka kʼa ka gbʼo̩la te̩ oñ a aka ñw me̩ kpo̩kpe̩ abe̩-i. A ko̩la eju O̩jo̩ efu Kraist. Ama abufe̩do̩, e̩wñ du chʼutodu ki ne me̩ nyo̩gba.

Todu narailo, tode̩gba kʼu ño̩ lewa kʼu li me̩ ku me̩ dʼalu ki ma dʼumi e̩do̩ n, kʼame̩ la fʼumi li kʼu ma dʼalu ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ n; tode̩gba kʼuja kpʼelie̩na kpʼe̩do̩fulu kpʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ elʼubi e̩ne̩-wñ kpʼalu eko nyʼone̩ o̩la ubi, kpʼo̩la eka nyʼone̩ eti ye̩ye̩, kpʼe̩ke kpʼekuku, ado̩mo̩;
tode̩gba kʼu lewa kʼO̩jo̩-mi año̩ fa mi wane̩ eju-me̩ ge̩, kʼomi adaido̩ tod abo wewe ku ma dure akwoubi ku ma ma ribeda ugbo e̩wñ iwa kpʼabutabu kpʼe̩wñtuñ ku ma te̩tache le̩ n.
Onu e̩ke̩ta kʼu nawʼugbo me̩ de̩-i. Alu ame̩nibenu meji kpʼe̩ta oñ o̩la du anʼudago.
U ka o̩gbo̩gba, e̩gba kʼu dʼane̩ onuʼkeji le̩, alu le̩ fa-i abu kʼu ma dʼane̩ n naño̩ ka ñw abo ku ma dure akwoubi kpʼabo ki bo̩ du tane̩, kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼu ño̩ dubi wa ge̩, nado̩wo̩ mo̩ n;
abu ku me̩ feju ijali-wñ ka ku Kraist ako̩la ef umi; kʼi ma chʼe̩gbo ugbo e-me̩ n, kʼi la nʼukpahiu ef ume̩ le̩.
E̩gbo chʼe̩wñ ku ma fʼowñ kamoli, ukpahiu O̩jo̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼi deju. Todu awa ño̩ chʼe̩gbo ef uwñ ge̩, a muda adeju manyʼowñ ñw me̩ kwef ukpahiu O̩jo̩.
Me̩ najʼo̩la-me̩ ma, abe̩k ame̩ jʼef e̩do̩ ekono? me̩ ñwʼo̩la-me̩ go. Abe̩k ame̩ onugo ma ogbolo ka ku Jisusi Kraisti dʼef ume̩ me̩ n? cho̩kpo̩ni ijo̩bu me̩ che.
Ama u kibeno ka kʼame̩ ama ka kʼawa chʼijo̩bu n.

Oñ a rodubʼO̩jo, kʼame̩ ki we echʼe̩wñ e̩biene̩ kilikili; i cheka kʼutodu ki kwotejugede ka ku ma fʼuwa ñwago kʼa nyo̩ n, chai todu kʼame̩ ki che e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩, dagba i dabe̩ne̩ kʼa chʼijo̩bu eju one̩.
Todu a neke che e̩wñ du agwunyʼochochi le̩ n, chai tod ochochi le̩.
Todu a yo̩ e̩gba du kʼa chʼe̩gbo, kʼame̩ la nʼukpahiu; e̩wñ kʼa ño̩ rodubʼo̩ tod uwñ de̩ ge̩: kʼame̩ ki che̩ñwo̩che alo waa.
Lef e-le̩ oñ nakʼo̩takada e̩wñ-i abu kʼu ma dane̩ n, todu e̩gba kʼu dane̩ kʼu we ekpuna ñw me̩ teju o̩da kʼOndu du ñw mi kʼu ne one̩ nyo̩gba, i la chʼutodu kʼu gulo̩ wane̩ n.
I chʼe-ki bo̩, amo̩maye, me̩ agba-oo. Me̩ ki ñwʼo̩la-me̩ che, me̩ ki dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw o̩la-me̩, ibe-me̩ ki chʼoka, me̩ gugu ef ure̩do̩, tak O̩jo̩ ufe̩do̩ kpʼure̩do̩ adʼugbo me̩.
Me̩ nʼalu ekalu kiafo̩ gwa omune̩.
Abo kiafo̩ chaka agwa me̩.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu Jisusi Kraisti, kpʼufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ kpʼuta Afu Kiafo̩ ki dʼugbo me̩ chaka.
Po̩l, e̩nukpuche̩ ki ma chʼone̩ kpe̩ n, kʼo̩da-wñ ma la lef one̩ wa n, chai lefu Jisus Kraist kpai O̩jo̩ Ata ki dʼowñ kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku,
Po̩l-i manyʼamo̩maye du ku ma jʼugbo mi tʼugbo ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu ojane̩ Galatia.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ure̩do̩ ki dʼugbo me̩ kwugbo O̩jo̩ Ata kpai Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist,
kʼi mʼo̩la-wñ du chele tod adure-wa, todu kʼi gba wa kwef o̩kpanachi bibi-i, alu ki dʼO̩jo̩ kpai Ata-wa e̩do̩.
Ojima ki chʼe-wñ ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa. Ami.
I chʼaye ñwu mi kakini, Ame̩ hika adʼawubi bʼe̩ne̩ ki do̩ me̩ ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Kraist te̩ tef uche̩nyo̩ omune̩ ojoji;
i la chʼomune̩ i che n, abo iche̩ka muda do̩mo̩ ku ma mi me̩ ejo, abu ki dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma rʼUche̩nyo̩ Kraist da.
Ama dagba i ma chaka chʼawa abe̩k onuche̩ ki kwʼefojale wa nʼuche̩nyo̩ aje̩rʼume̩ tʼUche̩nyo̩ e-kʼa je̩rʼume̩ le̩ le, ama ki fʼe̩ne̩ le̩ mu.
Alu kʼa ka o̩gbo̩gba le̩, abe̩le̩ naño̩ dabi ka fa-i ge̩, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du nʼuche̩nyo̩ aje̩rʼume̩ tʼe-kʼame̩ gba le̩ le, ama ki fʼe̩ne̩ le̩ mu.
Todu one̩ nache kʼu gbʼo̩ ibe-i? abe̩kʼO̩jo̩? abe̩k one̩ nafeju kʼu nyo̩ eju? I ma chʼone̩ u che kʼu nyʼo̩ eju ta, u ma chʼadu Kraisti n.
Todu, amo̩maye, naje̩ ñwu me̩ ma ka kʼUche̩nyo̩ kʼomi je̩rʼamone̩ le̩, teju alu kʼone̩ añwa n.
Todu, i chʼugbo one̩ oñ omi gba n, one̩ la ko̩ mi n, chai lef ebite̩ e-Jisus Kraist oñ omi gba.
Todu ame̩ gbo̩ alu kʼu te̩tache akwoubi ef e̩wñ amaJu kakini, U doli ujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩ dabo̩ta, u laño̩ fʼu chile̩che̩;
u la hito̩gba ef e̩wñ amaJu ñw amoje̩go̩-mi wewe ef abo-mi, abu kʼu do̩mo̩ adikpala ef e̩wñ-o̩gu e-amata-mi tʼuma le ololo.
Ama e̩gba ki rʼO̩jo̩ kʼi fʼumi date̩ kwʼefu iye-mi, kʼi laño̩ fʼumi do̩ lef ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ e̩do̩,
kʼi mʼO̩ma-wñ dubite̩ ef umi, todu kʼu du owñ chʼUche̩nyo̩ kʼu naje̩rʼabo uche̩ichi; ababale̩ u nyʼojuju kpʼo̩re̩la kpʼe̩bie̩ n;
u la te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m ugbo abo ku ma chʼame̩nukpuche̩ dʼo̩gba mi n. U muda kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼArabia, tak u ño̩ mudabi wa Damaskus ge̩.
Ubi e-le̩, abʼodo me̩ta muda, u te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m kʼu fu Kifas ma, oñ u bʼo̩ gugu o̩jo̩ me̩gwe̩lu.
I muda chʼe-ame̩nukpuche̩ omune̩ ki bo̩ u li ma n, chai Jeme̩s, o̩maye Ondu.
O̩la e̩wñ kʼu nako̩takada-wñ rʼume̩-i, go, eju O̩jo̩ naka-i, u remi n.
Ubi le̩ tak u lewa ane̩ Siria kpai Silisia.
Ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Judia ku ma jʼefu Kraist la ma mi kpai eju e̩gba le̩ ta n.
Chai egbo̩ ma gbo̩ kate kakini, E̩ne̩ ki doli wa e̩gbaʼka le̩, fai i nʼUche̩nyo̩ e̩do̩-e̩kono e-kʼi du tʼachile̩che̩ e̩gbaʼka le̩ aje̩rʼone̩;
taku ma dojima ñw O̩jo̩ ef umi.
Ubi le̩ abu kʼo̩do̩ me̩gwe̩le̩ muda omi kpai Barnabas dabi te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m; u mu Taito̩s du le bʼumi.

Ete̩gu kʼu te̩gu le̩ teju alu kʼo̩la bite̩. Oñ u mʼUche̩nyo̩ e-kʼu natakoya-wñ ef abo uche̩ichi du kajane̩ ñwu ma. U muda ka ej ubi o̩gba abojima, tode̩gba kʼule kʼu ra akwobi abe̩k e-kʼu nara abajo̩-i amud ofofo.
Ama ichaka chʼiTaito̩s kʼi lebʼumi, abu kʼi chaka chʼiGriki, ma chʼo otila e̩pi eda n.
E-ku ma muda che chutodu amo̩maye olemi ku ma ji we̩e̩le̩ wa. Ma wa we̩e̩le̩ le̩ todu ku ma ki tu ane̩ o̩da o̩mone̩-wa kʼa ne̩ efu Kraist Jisus, todu ku ma ki ko wa nyʼef adu.
A muda bʼuña ñwu ma kʼa fʼo̩la-wa kamuhi te̩ ñwu ma auwaʼkate n: todu kʼochochi e-Uche̩nyo̩ le̩ ki nadʼugbo me̩ waa.
Ama ugbo abojima kʼamone̩ ka ku ma chʼe̩wñʼka (e̩wñ du ku ma chaka che, i nʼile ñwu mi n. I chʼeju one̩ oñ O̩jo̩ agba n); u kakini, I nʼe̩wñ du kʼabo ki nʼojima le̩ du manyu ñwu mi n.
Oñ o̩la le̩ mudabi tubi, abu ku ma li kakini, Ma ke̩do̩no mi oñ ma mʼUche̩nyo̩ e-abo ku ma ma de̩pi n du ñwu mi, alu ku ma mʼe-e̩pi-eda du ñwu Pita le̩.
(Todu e̩ne̩ ki chu-ko̩lo̩ ñwu Pita kʼi tef e̩nukpuche̩ e-abo e̩pi-eda ño̩ chuko̩lo̩ ñwu mi kʼu tef e-abo ucheichi ge̩.)

Oñ abu ku Jeme̩s kpai Kifas kpai Jo̩n, ku ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼugbogaga-ma, chema ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ku ma mudu ñwu mi, ma mʼo̩wo̩-awo̩to̩ e-uta O̩jo̩ Ata du ñw omi kpai Barnabas, todu kʼa ki nyʼugbo abo uche̩ichi, kʼama ki nyʼugbo abo e̩pi-e̩da;
chai kʼa ki dibekado ame̩nale dee; e̩wñ le̩ gbage̩de̩ oñ nachʼe̩do̩ chacha-wñ.
Ama e̩gba ku Kifas lewa Antio̩k, eju-wñ u ko̩ nyʼo̩wo̩, todu i dʼugbo kʼi akpʼo̩la-wñ abi.
Todu o̩gba tak abo iche̩ka kwʼugbo Jeme̩s wa, i nabʼabo uche̩ichi je̩ e̩wñ; tak e̩gba ku ma lewa i nahiwubi, i fʼo̩la-wñ date̩ ojoji, abu kʼi arʼailo abo-e̩pi-e̩da.
Tak amaJu ki bo̩ ño̩ bʼowñ do̩wo̩ yʼuma eju ge̩, todu abe̩le̩ ayechi-ma le̩ ño̩ mu Barnabas du le bʼuma ge̩.

Ama e̩gba kʼu li ka ku ma ma lule̩ tʼo̩kpoolo teju alu kʼochochi Uche̩nyo̩ de̩ n, u ka ñwu Kifas eju ma chaka kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ chʼiJu do̩mo̩ ache e̩wñ ile̩-i alu kʼabo uche̩ichi ache, kʼe̩ ma la che dab amaJu n, abile kʼe̩ kute̩ abo uche̩ichi kʼama ki che e̩wñ dab amaJu ke?
Awa ku ma bi wa amaJu, kʼa ma la chʼame̩nadure e-abo uche̩ichi n,

oñ abu kʼa la chema ka ku ma adale ñw one̩ kwef uko̩lo̩ o̩lo̩da eche n, chai lef e̩do̩-ekono e-Jisus Kraisti, oñ awa onugo la ke̩do̩no Kraist Jisus, todu kʼama ki dale ñw a kwef e̩do̩ ekono e-Kraisti le̩, i la chʼekwef uko̩lo̩ o̩lo̩da eche n; todabu ku ma ma adale ñw o̩re̩la du kwef uko̩lo̩ o̩lo̩da eche n.
I muda che̩wñ kʼabu kʼa jʼafeju ku ma dale ñw a efu Kraist, ma ño̩ li ka kʼawa onugo chʼame̩nadure kpo̩ ge̩, Kraist chʼe̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ ñw adure? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼu nada-bi ane̩ e̩wñ kʼu fugulo̩ le̩ mak u dʼo̩la-mi te̩ pee ka kʼu chʼajada.
Todu omi leku ñw o̩loda lef o̩lo̩da le̩, todu kʼu deju ñw O̩jo̩.

Ma fʼumi kamoli manyu Kraisti; i la chʼomi ño̩ deju-i ge̩ n, chai Kraist deju ef umi; oñ edeju kʼu nadeju ef año̩la fai, nadeju ef e̩do̩-ekono e-O̩ma O̩jo̩ kʼi afe̩do̩ mi kʼi laño̩ mʼo̩la-wñ onugo du chele todu mi.
Nade̩yakpo̩ ufe̩do̩-enyo̩ O̩jo̩-i n: todu iche̩wñ kʼo̩kpakpa lef o̩lo̩da wa, maku Kraist leku o̩bo̩ ofofo.
Ame̩ abo Galatia ame̩nidada, e̩ne̩ kʼume̩ eju ne e̩wñʼka, ame̩, ku ma fu Jisus Kraist jiwe te̩ foo eju-me̩ abu kʼi chʼe̩kamoli le̩?
E-i kate i dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu ko̩che̩ ugbo me̩ kakini, Kwef uko̩lo̩ o̩lo̩da ku me̩ che oñ me̩ gbʼAfu Kiafo̩? abe̩k i kwʼef egbo̩ e-e̩do̩-ekono ku me̩ gbo̩ le̩?
Ame̩ chʼidada abe̩le̩? Abu ku me̩ chane̩ ef Afu, fai me̩ ñʼamufu kpoji ef o̩re̩la?
Me̩ li uwa inaina le̩ tinyo̩ ofofo? I neke chʼeche tinyo̩ ofofo de̩-i?
Todule̩ e̩ne̩ ki dʼAfu le̩ ñwu me̩, kʼi laño̩ do̩mo̩ achuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu ef ume̩ le̩, i kwʼef uko̩lo̩ o̩lo̩da eche? abe̩k i kwʼef egbo̩ ku me̩ gbo̩ e-e̩do̩-ekono le̩?
I dabalu kʼEbraham ke̩do̩no O̩jo̩, oñ ma fʼe-le̩ lo rʼo̩kpakpa ñw owñ.
Mak ame̩ ki ma kakini, Abo kʼe̩te̩-ma chʼe̩do̩-ekono, abo le̩ chʼamo̩ma Ebraham.
Oñ abu kʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ li tane̩ ka kʼO̩jo̩ adale ñw abo uche̩ichi kwef e̩do̩-ekono, i fʼUche̩nyo̩ je̩rʼEbraham tane̩, kakini, Abo uche̩ichi du ali e̩nyo̩ ef uwe̩.
Todu abe̩le̩ abo kʼe̩te̩-ma chʼe̩do̩-ekono fʼe̩nyo̩ li manyʼEbraham ki ke̩do̩no le̩.
Todu ama dʼoji aluka one̩ du kʼe̩te̩-ma chʼe-uko̩lo̩ o̩lo̩da eche, todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, Ama dʼoji e̩ne̩ du kʼi ma gugu ef e̩wñ du ki che̩ko̩rubutu ef o̩takada o̩lo̩da kʼi che n.
Oñ i nʼe̩rʼeju kakini, Ma adʼale ñw e̩ne̩ du ef o̩lo̩da eju O̩jo̩ n; todabu kʼe̩no̩kpakpa adeju kwef e̩do̩-ekono;
e̩te̩ o̩lo̩da le̩ la chʼe̩do̩-ekono n; chai, e̩ne̩ ki che teju-wñ adeju ef uwñ.
Kraist mʼuwa gbatane̩ kwef ama e-o̩lo̩da, abu kʼi mud ama todu wa: todu, i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, Ama fʼe̩ne̩ du ki lo̩ko̩li oj oli mu:
todu kʼe̩nyo̩ e-Ebraham ki lewa te̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi efu Kraist Jisus; todu kʼawa ki mʼAfu ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ gba lef e̩do̩-ekono.
Amo̩maye-mi, nako̩la alu kʼone̩ aka: dagba i chʼalo-ekpe̩ e-one̩ ofo ku ma fʼe̩bo̩-wñ ñmo̩, e̩ne̩ du ade̩yakpo n, e̩ne̩ du abʼomune̩ tʼo̩ n.
Ebraham kpʼugbe̩-wñ oñ ma ko̩la e̩wñ-i tane̩ ñwu ma. I ka kʼamugbe̩, dabe̩ne̩ ku ma wewe n; chai dabe̩ne̩ kʼi chʼokate oñ i kakini, Ñw Ugbe̩-we̩, owñ le̩ che Kraist.
Oñ e-kʼu naka de̩, kakini, Alo-ekpe̩ kʼO̩jo̩ fʼe̩bo̩-wñ ñmo̩ tane̩, o̩lo̩da ki lewa ubi-wñ o̩do̩ ulo̩ko̩ nyogue̩gwa neke fʼu la todu kʼi fʼe̩wñ ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ gbogili te̩ n.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe̩te̩ e̩wñ ogu ku ma aje̩ le̩ chʼo̩lo̩da, e̩te̩-wñ ño̩ chʼo̩la-ekatane̩ de̩-i ge̩ n; O̩jo̩ la dʼu chʼele-ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ ñw Ebraham lef o̩la-ekatane̩.
Todule̩ e̩wñ chʼoji o̩lo̩da ke? Ma mʼu du manyʼu noji ada ku ma je̩, gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼUgbe̩ ku ma kʼo̩la e̩wñ le̩ tane̩ ñw u ki lewa; ma mʼu du te̩ lef amonuche̩ ef o̩wo̩ e̩nagbagba.
E̩ne̩ kate la nʼe̩nagbagba n, O̩jo̩ muda chʼoka.
Todule̩ o̩lo̩da chʼe̩nagwunyu e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩? O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na. Todu iche̩wñ ku ma ma du o̩lo̩da ki ma neke je̩ ñwu one̩ deju wa, mak o̩lo̩da ma chʼe̩te̩ o̩kpakpa ochochi.
O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ muda fʼe̩wñ du bunyi tofe adure, todu ki nʼugbo ku ma mʼe̩wñ ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼe̩do̩-ekono Jisus Kraist le̩ ko ñw abo ku ma ake̩do̩no.
Ama o̩gba tak e̩do̩-ekono wa, ma jʼade wa ofe o̩lo̩da, ma fʼuwa bunyi te̩ todu e̩do̩-ekono ku ma che ku ma mubite̩.
Todabe̩le̩ o̩lo̩da mud e̩ne̩ ki ane̩ wa gba ñwu Kraist, todu kʼama ki dale ñw a kwef e̩do̩-ekono.
Ama abu kʼe̩do̩-ekono lewa-i, a ño̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ ki ane̩ wa gba ge̩ n.
Todu o̩chaka-me̩ chʼuche̩ amo̩ga o̩ma O̩jo̩ lef e̩do̩-ekono efu Kraist Jisus.
Todu aluka me̩ du ku ma fʼume̩ che baptism tefu Kraist le̩, me̩ mu Kraisti ko bʼo̩la ma me̩.
Ju kpai Grik neke do̩mo̩ ge̩ n, adu kpai o̩mone̩ la neke do̩mo̩ ge̩ n, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ la aneke do̩mo̩ ge̩ n; todu o̩chaka me̩ chʼokate efu Kraist Jisus.
I la chʼe̩wñ ku me̩ chʼabo Kraist, mak ugbe̩ Ebraham me̩ che, me̩ chʼabo ku me̩ ajʼe̩wñ ogu lʼo̩na ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩.
Oñ u kakini, Gbogbo abu kʼe̩ne̩ ki aje̩ e̩wñ ogu le̩ ma mʼo̩la ta n, i chʼojoji ñw adu n, abu kʼi chaka chʼodu e̩wñ du;
i la dʼef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma dʼu nyʼuma o̩wo̩, kpai o̩wo̩ abo ku ma dejutʼunyi gbogbo kad o̩jo̩ kʼata-wñ da.
Abe̩le̩ awa ge̩, e̩gba kʼa ma mʼo̩la ta n, a jʼef o̩wo̩ e̩wñ-uko̩che̩-ile̩-i dab adu:
ama e̩gba kʼiko-wñ jo̩, O̩jo̩ fʼO̩ma-wñ kpuche̩ dufu, onobule̩ bi, i la bi tef o̩lo̩da,
todu kʼi fʼabo ku ma jʼef o̩wo̩ o̩lo̩da la rʼane̩, todu kʼawa ki mʼo̩da o̩ma gba.
Oñ abu ku me̩ chʼamo̩ga o̩ma, O̩jo̩ fʼAfu O̩ma-wñ kpuche̩ dufu tʼef e̩do̩-wa, i nakwa kakini, Ada, Ata.
To̩dabe̩le̩ e̩ ño̩ chʼadu ge̩ n, chai o̩ga o̩ma; i la che̩wñ kʼe̩ chʼo̩ga o̩ma, mak e̩ne̩ ki aje̩ e̩wñ ogu lef O̩jo̩ uwe̩ che.
Ama e̩gbale̩, abu ku me̩ ma ma O̩jo̩ n, ame̩ chʼadu ñw abo kʼitaligba-ma ma chʼamo̩jo̩ n:
ama fai abu ku me̩ ma O̩jo̩-i, (O̩jo̩ ma me̩, ma nyo̩ eka tule,) abile ku me̩ ño̩ dabi rida anʼe̩wñ e̩gbo kpai e̩wñ uko̩che̩ ile̩-i, ki ño̩ du me̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ dabi chʼadu ñw u etito̩ ge̩?
Ame̩ nʼo̩jo̩ ucholo kpai ochu kpai iko iko kpai o̩do̩ ade.
Narailo todu me̩, tode̩gba kʼu fʼakanya uko̩lo̩ ugbo me̩ che tinyo̩ ofofo.
Me̩ ki dab omi, todabu kʼomi ño̩ dab ame̩ ge̩, amo̩maye, o̩ko̩ nagbabʼume̩-i. I nʼuji du ku me̩ che nyʼumi n:
ame̩ la chema kakini, Lugbo e̩gbo e-o̩re̩la oñ u fʼUche̩nyo̩ je̩rʼume̩ e̩gba ejodudu le̩;
oñ e̩wñ ef o̩re̩la-mi kʼi jʼume̩ ma le̩ me̩ dʼo̩ ribe̩te̩ n, me̩ la chihie̩ne̩ owñ n; me̩ muda gba mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼu che onuche̩ O̩jo̩, dabe̩ne̩ ku Kraist Jisus.
Todule̩ ugbo ugbede e-me̩ de̩? Todu nagba me̩ ibenu kakini, I ma jʼache, ame̩ ma mʼe̩yo̩ eju-me̩ ne̩ ku me̩ ko ñwu mi.
Oñ u mud e̩nebi-me̩ ugbo ochochi kʼu naka ñwu me̩?
Ego̩laru ku ma ago̩larʼume̩ le̩ chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ n; i la dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma rʼo̩na nyʼume̩ tʼo̩do̩da, todu kʼame̩ ki go̩larʼama.
I la nyo̩ kʼone̩ ki dʼef ego̩larʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩gba du, i ki chʼe̩gba kʼu dʼugbo me̩ kate n.
Amo̩ma-mi, kʼu dabi achefu ebi me̩ gbogbo taku ma fu Kraist da atʼume̩ efu,
i la dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu dʼugbo me̩ abajo̩-i, kʼu rʼomuko̩la-mi da; todu alu ku me̩ de̩ chefitu mi.
Me̩ ka ñwu mi, ame̩ ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ o̩lo̩da, me̩ gbo̩ abu kʼo̩lo̩da ka n?
Todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini, Ebraham nʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ meji, imo̩to̩ uko̩lo̩ le̩ bi oka ñw u, o̩mone̩ le̩ la bi oka ñw u.
E-kʼimo̩to̩ uko̩lo̩ muda bi, i bi lo̩na o̩re̩la; ama e-kʼo̩mone̩ le̩ bi lʼef o̩la ukatane̩ le̩.
E̩wñ meji-i chʼujiwe o̩la; todu abo-i chʼalo-ekpe̩ meji; oka kwo oj uwo Sainai, kʼi abi amo̩ma rʼef adu, owñ che Hagar.
Oñ Hagar kide̩ chʼuwo Sainai ef ane̩ Arabia, oñ i dʼoj o̩gbaʼka kpai Je̩rusale̩m ki do̩mo̩ fai; todu owñ dʼef adu manyʼamo̩ma-wñ.
Ama Je̩rusale̩m ki dʼate̩ chʼo̩mone̩, e-le̩ chʼiye-wa.
Todu i che̩ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Oñ ame̩, amo̩maye, me̩ chʼamo̩ma e-o̩la ukatane̩ alu kʼAise̩k de̩.
Ama alu kʼe̩ne̩ ku ma bi lo̩na o̩re̩la le̩ doli e̩ne̩ ku ma bi lo̩na Afu e̩gbale̩, abe̩le̩ i ño̩ de̩ fai ge̩.
AbʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ muda ka ta? I kakini, Me̩ fʼimo̩to̩ uko̩lo̩ le̩ kpai o̩ma-wñ ne dufu: todu i nʼugbo du kʼo̩ma imo̩to̩ uko̩lo̩ aje̩ e̩wñ ogu manyʼo̩ma o̩mone̩ le̩ n.
Todu kide̩, amo̩maye, awa chʼamo̩ma imo̩to̩ uko̩lo̩ n, chai e-o̩mone̩.
Kraist ko wa chʼo̩mone̩ todu kʼa ki jʼef o̩mone̩: todule̩ me̩ nadago waa, me̩ ki ño̩ dabi je̩ ñw oli uno̩lo̩ e-adu gbaji tʼume̩ o̩la ge̩ n.
Me̩ go, omi, Po̩l, aka ñwu me̩-i kakini, iche̩wñ ku me̩ dʼe̩pi, Kraist anʼile ñwu me̩ n.
Oñ edabi nadabi gbibenu ñw e̩ne̩ du ki adʼe̩pi kakini, I fʼo̩me̩ je̩ kʼi che o̩gbo̩ e̩wñ du kʼo̩lo̩da ka.
Ame̩ ku ma adale ñwu me̩ ef o̩lo̩da gbogili te̩ ñwu Kraist; me̩ muñwanane̩ bʼufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ te̩ me̩.
Todu kwef e̩do̩ ekono ef Afu a jʼafejutʼo̩na anede o̩kpakpa kʼa kibenʼo le̩.
Todu efu Kraist Jisus tʼe̩pi-eda, tʼe̩pi-odukulu chʼabu du n; chai e̩do̩-ekono ki achuko̩lo̩ lef ufe̩do̩.
Ule o̩me̩me̩le̩ me̩ te̩tʼara le̩, e̩ne̩ kpʼo̩na nyʼume̩ kʼame̩ ma gbʼochochi gbo̩ ni ge̩?
Ibe ku ma gbʼame̩ e̩wñ le̩ kwef e̩ne̩ ki ado̩ me̩-i n.
O̩jo̩wu re abie̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩dudu e̩wñ kʼe̩ du tʼo̩.
Omi ke̩do̩no me̩ ef Ondu, ka kʼame̩ anʼibe ojoji n: ama e̩ne̩ ki ami me̩ ejo le̩ ane̩ adu ajo̩-wñ, e̩ne̩ du ki chaka che.
I muda chʼomi, amo̩maye, iche̩wñ kʼi chʼakoya e̩pi-eda nata, e̩wñ chi ku ma tetadoli mi ta? Mak e̩wñ udʼone̩ hi kʼi chʼoli-uku le̩ gbogili te̩ me̩.
I dukpe̩ kʼabo ku ma dʼume̩ o̩wo̩ le̩ ki kʼo̩la-ma da ke!
Todu ma do̩ me̩ tʼef o̩mone̩, amo̩maye; e-kide̩ kate: ame̩ ki du o̩mone̩-me̩ chʼuña ugbo kʼe̩re̩ o̩re̩la amane̩ n, me̩ ki muda chʼadu ñw omune̩ lef ufe̩do̩.
Todu o̩lo̩da le̩ chaka jo̩ kpa ef o̩la okate, owñ chʼukakini, Uwe̩ ki fe̩do̩ ekeji-we̩ dab o̩la-we̩.
I muda che̩wñ ku me̩ fʼomune̩ lo̩ ku me̩ fʼu je̩, me̩ nago tod efʼomune̩ lie̩.
Oñ u kakini, Me̩ natale ñw Afu, tak i ñʼanʼugbo du kʼame̩ ache teju alu kʼe̩ño̩ o̩re̩la ache me̩ n.
Todu e̩ño̩ e̩wñ kʼo̩re̩la ache chagwunyu Afu, Afu la chagwunyʼo̩re̩la; todu abo-i jʼako bʼo̩la-ma; todu kʼame̩ ki we eche e̩wñ ki dʼume̩ e̩do̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼAfu ane̩ me̩ mʼo̩na, me̩ jʼef o̩wo̩ o̩lo̩da n.
Uko̩lo̩ kʼo̩re̩la ache la kwotejugede me̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ abutabu eche kpʼiwa kpʼe̩wñtuñ eche
kpʼode eche kpʼobochi eche kpʼe̩nebi eche kpʼuja enyi kpʼogu eja kpʼeke̩do̩fulu kpʼedanekpeju kpʼedʼone̩ ru kpʼuche̩ edate̩ ojoji ojoji

kpʼelie̩na kpʼo̩te̩ eñmo̩ kpʼe̩wñ awulu eche kpʼe̩wñ ki dab e-le̩; naka ñwu me̩ tane̩ ugbo e̩wñ-i, alu kʼu ño̩ ka ñwu me̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩ kakini, Abo ku ma jʼef e̩wñ e̩go̩-i ache aje̩ e̩wñ ogu ojane̩ O̩jo̩ n.
E̩ro e-Afu muda chʼufe̩do̩ kpʼuyo̩ kpʼure̩do̩ kpʼe̩do̩-eje̩ kpʼumo̩la kpʼe̩nyo̩ kpʼechubi one̩
kpʼuchikimi kpʼefʼo̩wo̩ mʼo̩la ne̩; o̩lo̩da ki achagwunyu e̩wñ e̩go̩-i do̩mo̩ n.
Oñ abo Kraist Jisus fʼo̩re̩la kpʼudo̩laga-wñ kpʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ ki ache kamoli me̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼa deju ñw Afu, mak a ki hiʼika tʼika alule̩ ñw Afu.
Me̩ ki mud abo ku me̩ bʼukpa tʼo̩la-me̩ ofo ku me̩ kʼomune̩ e̩che̩ achʼe̩bie̩ne̩ ku me̩ ño̩ lie̩na omune̩ n.

Amo̩maye, dagba e̩wñ uñwanane̩ ʼka gbʼe̩ne̩ʼka o̩gba kʼi muñwanane̩, ame̩ ku me̩ mʼo̩la-me̩ ko ñw Afu Kiafo̩ me̩ nañwʼe̩ne̩ e̩go̩-i che te̩gu-wñ ef afu o̩chikimi, e̩ nafʼeju tʼo̩la e-we̩ tode̩gba ku ma ño̩ jʼuwe̩ onugo ma ge̩.
Me̩ nagbʼadu akanya omune̩ ne̩, abe̩le̩ tak ame̩ ache teju olo̩da Kraist kpa.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du do̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñʼka abu kʼi ma chʼe̩wñ du n, mak ibe o̩la-wñ i ada le̩.
Ama e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki nañwa uko̩lo̩ o̩la-wñ go, kʼi nyo̩ e̩gbale̩ tak i anʼuba ki aba ugbo o̩la-wñ onugo kate, i la chʼe-ekeji-wñ n.
Todu e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ane̩ adu ukpe̩ e-wñ.
E̩ne̩ ku ma la kʼo̩ o̩la kʼi nanʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ du kʼi ne̩ tuta kpʼako̩ owñ.
Me̩ ki dʼo̩la-me̩ la n; ma gwʼO̩jo̩ iñmo̩ je̩ n: todu e̩wñ du kʼone̩ gbe̩, e-le̩ i ñʼako wʼunyi ge̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki agbe̩ e̩wñ ñw o̩re̩la-wñ onugo akʼe̩wñ e̩che̩ kwef o̩re̩la-wñ wʼunyi, e̩ne̩ kʼi muda agbe̩ ñw Afu akʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ kwef Afu wʼunyi.
E̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩che̩ ki hia wa n: todu a ma bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ n adiko-wñ lewa a ako wʼunyi.
Todule̩, alu kʼa nʼiko, a ki chuko̩lo̩ ki nyo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du, a ki muda che ñw abo unyi e̩do̩-ekono tule.
Me̩ go orubutu elile kʼu nʼo̩wo̩-mi ko̩-i.
Aluka one̩ du ki dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma achʼuto̩-eju ef o̩re̩la, abo le̩ akute̩ me̩ ku me̩ de̩pi; todu kʼamone̩ ki we edoli ma tod oli-uku Kraisti kate ma che̩-i.
Todu ichaka chʼabo ku ma de̩pi le̩, ma la de o̩lo̩da n; i muda dʼuma e̩do̩ ku me̩ de̩pi, todu ku ma ki buba ef o̩re̩la-me̩.
Ama O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na nyʼuba e̩ba ñw omi, chai ef oli-uku Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist, lef e-le̩ ile̩-i chʼe̩kamoli ñw omi, omi laño̩ chʼe̩kamoli ñw ile̩.
Todu tʼe̩pi-eda chʼe̩wñ du n, tʼe̩pi odukulu chʼe̩wñ du n, chai one̩ e̩nyi etito̩.
Oñ aluka one̩ du ku ma hi ika tʼika alule̩ teju e̩ñwa kide̩, ure̩do̩ kpʼejumomi ki bʼuma ma, i ki ño̩ bʼabo Israe̩l e-O̩jo̩ ma ge̩.
Ate̩to̩gba-i e̩ne̩ du ki ño̩ che mi akanya ge̩ n; todu omi ne̩ ame̩ Jisus ef año̩la-mi.
Ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti ki dʼugbo afu-me̩, amo̩maye. Ami.
Po̩l, e̩nukpuche̩ Kraist Jisus lef edʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩, tʼugbo abo kiafo̩ ku ma jʼE̩fe̩sus, ku ma laño̩ chʼabo ku ma chʼachubi O̩jo̩ efu Kraist Jisus.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ure̩do̩ ki dʼugbo me̩ kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ Ata-wa kpai Ondu Jisus Kraist.
O̩jo̩ ki chʼAta Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist ki nʼele, owñ de̩nyo̩ ñw a ef e̩nyo̩ e-afu du ef uña efojale efu Kraist,
alu kʼi ño̩ chi wa tane̩ ef uwñ o̩gba taku ma kpʼe̩re̩ ile̩-i kʼawa ki chʼabo kiafo̩ kʼa we enʼenyo̩lo̩ o̩gba-wñ ef ufe̩do̩.
Abu kʼi mʼuwa date̩ tane̩ todu ku ma ki mʼuwa ko jʼef o̩da o̩ga o̩ma ñw owñ lefu Jisus Kraist,
alu ki rʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ du, ku ma ki ñwulo̩ ojima e-ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ e-kʼi mʼu ko chʼuwa ele ef E̩nufe̩do̩ le̩.
Ela wa tane̩ ku ma la wa tane̩ a ne̩ ef uwñ lef e̩bie̩-wñ, owñ chʼeto̩no̩ kʼi tʼuñwa-nane̩-wa no̩ ñwu wa tʼeju alu kʼunana ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-wñ de̩.
Owñ chʼe-kʼi je̩ ñw u mud ololo ñw a ef ofili du kpai ibe;
oñ i je̩ ñwu wa ma afili e̩wñ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ teju alu ki rʼowñ e̩do̩, owñ chʼibe kʼi ñwa tane̩ ef uwñ,
ki nʼigede e-ukpoji iko iko du ede, kʼi fʼe̩wñ du rʼoji jo̩ efu Kraist, tʼe̩wñ efojale, tʼe̩wñ ane̩-ile̩-i ef owñ.
Ma ño̩ chi wa ef uwñ kʼa chʼe̩wñ ogu, abu kʼa chedate̩ tane̩ teju alu kʼe̩ne̩ ki aje̩ ñw e̩wñ du chuko̩lo̩ alu kʼe̩do̩ o̩la-wñ akʼo̩ fʼibe-wñ ñwate̩ tane̩,
todu kʼawa ki chʼe̩wñ ku ma ñwulo̩ ojima-wñ, awa kʼa kibeno Kraist akwoubi.
Ef uwñ oñ ame̩ ge̩, abu ku me̩ gbo̩ o̩la ochochi le̩, owñ chʼUche̩nyo̩ e-ujadu-me̩, abu ku me̩ ke̩do̩nʼo, ma nʼAfu Kiafo̩ ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ fʼume̩ hiuko̩ ef uwñ;
owñ le̩ chʼe̩wñ ugbo̩wo̩ e-e̩wñ ogu-wa gbogbo wʼe̩gba ku ma wa gba e̩wñ kʼi ne̩-i tane̩ kʼojima-wñ ki nʼuñwulo̩.
Lef e-le̩, omi onugo ge̩, abu kʼu gbʼinabali e̩do̩ ekono ef Ondu Jisus ki dʼef ume̩, kpai ufe̩do̩ ku me̩ ne̩ tod abo kiafo̩ du,
nawe ugwa egwa todu me̩ n, nachʼarewa me̩ ef adua-mi;
todu kʼO̩jo̩ e-Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti, Ata ojima le̩, kʼi nadʼafu e-ibe ñwu me̩ kpai e-o̩la ebite̩ ku me̩ ki fʼowñ ma ogbolo;
kʼeju e-e̩do̩-me̩ ki nʼugane̩, ku me̩ ki ma e̩wñ ki chʼukibeno ef udo̩ kʼi ado̩, kpai e̩wñ ki chʼunana ojima e̩wñ ogu-wñ ef abo kiafo̩
kpai e̩wñ ki chʼunana tabale e-ukpahiu-wñ ñw awa kʼa ke̩do̩no-i, alu kʼugbiti ugbiñmi-wñ achuko̩lo̩,
owñ chʼe-kʼi ne̩ chuko̩lo̩ efu Kraist, kʼi ne̩ dʼowñ kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, kʼi laño̩ dʼowñ gugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ ef uña efojale;
atate̩ ololo ñw agboji du kpai o̩da kpai ukpahiu, kpai ondu du, kpai odu du ku ma ko̩, i chʼef okpanachi-i kate n, i muda ño̩ chʼef e-ki ache kʼi wa ge̩:
i laño̩ fʼe̩wñ du kamuhi tʼo̩gane̩ e̩re̩-wñ me̩, oñ i mʼowñ du che oji e̩wñ du ñw ujeju abudo̩ Ondu;
kʼi chʼaño̩la-wñ, kʼi chʼukefu e-e̩ne̩ ki ako̩ e̩wñ tʼe̩wñ du efu le̩.
Tak ame̩, abu ku me̩ leku te̩ ef uñwanane̩ kpai adure-me̩,
owñ chʼe-ku me̩ tale ef uwñ e̩gbaʼka le̩ likpa abo o̩kpanachi ile̩-i, teju alu kʼagboji abo̩da e-afu ki aju ate̩-i ache, owñ chʼafu ki achuko̩lo̩ ef amo̩ma ku ma ko̩ egbagbo̩ fai.
O̩chaka-wa jʼef uma ada ef e̩ño̩ e̩wñ o̩re̩la-wa e̩gbaʼka le̩, oñ a nʼe̩wñ ki dʼo̩re̩la kpai ibe e̩do̩ ache le̩. Italigba e-wa chʼamo̩ma uwe̩do̩ alu kʼe-abo ki bo̩ de̩.
Ama O̩jo̩, kʼi chʼanana ef ejumomi eli, lef ufe̩do̩-wñ nana kʼi ne̩ fe̩do̩ wa,
abu kʼa leku jʼef uñwanane̩-wa, i che kʼawa bo̩ Kraisti nʼiñmi. Lugbo ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ oñ me̩ jʼef ujadu.
Oñ i che kʼa bʼowñ dajikwane̩ kʼa la bʼowñ gugu ef uña efojale efu Kraist Jisus;
todu kʼi dʼunana ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki tabale ef emo̩la kʼi mo̩la ñw a efu Kraist Jisus le̩ ñe̩ña ef o̩kpanachi du ki awa.
Todu ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ chʼe̩wñ ku me̩ jʼef ujadu lef e̩do̩ ekono. E-le̩ la chʼefu-me̩ i kwo n, chai ele O̩jo̩ i che;
i la chʼef uko̩lo̩ eche i kwo n, tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du abuba-wñ.
Todu awa chʼe̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ che, i nyi wa efu Kraist Jisus todu uko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩, e-kʼO̩jo̩ chʼo̩na-wñ tane̩ todu kʼawa ki tale ef uwñ.
Todule̩ me̩ nalibekado kakini, E̩gba kʼame̩, abo uche̩ichi ef ore̩la chʼabo kʼabo ku ma do̩ ma ko̩ abo kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ da ma e̩pi ef o̩re̩la, ado̩ Ame̩ kʼabo e̩piodukulu;

kakini, Ame̩ jo̩ e-me̩ ojoji ñwu Kraist iko le̩, o̩wo̩-me̩ la dʼef e̩wñ ane̩ Israe̩l in, abu ku me̩ chʼononojo ugbo alo ku ma kpe̩ ugbo e̩wñ ku ma ko̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩, me̩ nʼukibeno n, me̩ nʼO̩jo̩ n, me̩ jo̩ ile̩-i ofofo.
Fai, efu Kraist Jisus, ame̩ ku me̩ jʼo̩najiji e̩gbaʼka le̩ mud abo ki me̩ru ef e̩bie̩ Kraist me̩.
Todu owñ chʼure̩do̩-wa, owñ ki kʼawa mejeji chʼokate le̩, kʼi laño̩ fʼo̩kaga o̩do̩ owñ chʼulaka, ki dʼagbagba-wa le̩ gulo̩,
abu kʼi fʼolo̩da e-uko̩ ku ma te̩ kpai owu owu ku ma hi le̩ gbogili te̩ ef o̩re̩la-wñ, todu kʼowñ ki fʼama mejeji nyi ef o̩la-wñ tef one̩ etito̩ okate, kʼi fʼure̩do̩ che;
kʼi laño̩ fʼamamejeji ño̩ru ef año̩la okate ñw O̩jo̩ lef oli uku le̩, abu kʼi fʼulaka le̩ kpaku ef uwñ.
Oñ i lewa fʼuche̩nyo̩ e-ure̩do̩ je̩ rʼame̩ ku me̩ jʼo̩najiji, kpai ure̩do̩ ñwʼabo ki me̩ru anane̩,
todu lef uwñ awa mejeji chenʼo̩na kʼa gudu nyʼugbo Ata ef Afu okate.
Todule̩ ame̩ ño̩ chʼononojo kpai ilowa fai ge̩ n, ame̩ kpai abo kiafo̩ le̩ la chʼamo̩mane̩, me̩ la chʼabo unyi O̩jo̩.
Abu ku ma fʼume̩ ne oj e̩re̩ unyi e-ame̩nukpuche̩ kpai amakache̩, Jisus Kraist onugo la chʼokuta ki kpoji ade alo-wñ meji;
ef uwñ, o̩gbo̩ unyi le̩ du ru ko omune̩, oñ i agba waa ki chʼunyi ejefu kiafo̩ ef Ondu.
Ef owñ ge̩, ma fʼume̩ ne mʼomune̩ ku me̩ chʼunyi kʼO̩jo̩ adodo ef uwñ ef Afu.
Todu e-le̩, omi Po̩l, e̩namu e-Kraist Jisus tod ame̩ abo uche̩ichi—
u neju ka kʼame̩ gbʼinabali igede ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-O̩jo̩ ku ma du ñwu mi kʼu de todu me̩ kakini,
Lʼo̩na o̩la ebite̩ oñ ma je̩ ñwu mi ma afili le̩ alu kʼu ko̩ o̩la-wñ pe̩ nyʼef o̩takada o̩gbo̩gba le̩.
I chʼe-le̩, me̩ chʼo̩kalatu-wñ me̩ neke mʼoji ibe kʼu ne̩ ef afili Kraist,
e-ku ma ma du ñw amo̩ma amone̩ o̩gba o̩gba kibo̩ ku ma ma alu ku ma mubite̩ ñw ame̩nukpuche̩-wñ kiafo̩ kpai amakache̩-wñ ef Afu-wñ abajo̩-i n.
O̩wñ chʼeka kʼabo uche̩ichi kpai amaju chʼabo kʼama de̩de̩ aje̩ e̩wñ ogu le̩, ama de̩de̩ la chʼaño̩laʼka, ama de̩de̩ la ñʼadama nyʼe̩wñ ku ma ko̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ efu Kraist Jisus lef Uche̩nyo̩,
e-kʼomi mud e̩ne̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ ñw one̩ ef uwñ, likpa ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-O̩jo̩ ku ma du ñwu mi alu kʼukpahiu-wñ achuko̩lo̩.
Omi ki nya tʼabo kiafo̩ du le, oñ ma du ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kide̩ ñw u, kʼu fʼuche̩nyo̩ unana Kraist e-kʼo̩kpa-wñ ma je̩ ate̩ n le̩ je̩ rʼabo uche̩ichi;
kʼu laño̩ dʼe̩wñ ki chʼigede afili ki maja ef O̩jo̩ kʼi nyi e̩wñ du le̩ kwo igbele igbele wʼef ugane̩,
todu ku ma ki je̩ ñw amagboji kpai abo̩da ef uña efojale ma unibe O̩jo̩ ki chʼo̩la ojoji ojoji wewe fai lef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu.
Owñ chʼalu kʼi ñwʼibe e̩wñ ogbegbele̩ du tane̩ efu Kraist Jisus Ondu-wa.
Ef owñ a nʼeju e̩gbo kpai o̩na kʼa guduwa ef e̩do̩-edachi lef e̩do̩ ekono e-owñ.
Lef e-le̩ oñ nabi me̩ ku me̩ we egwegbo̩ ef o̩bata kʼu nali todu me̩, e-le̩ chʼojima e-me̩.
E̩wñ ki chi de̩ kʼu natʼokuku-mi kpe̩ ñw Ata,
e-kʼunyi du tʼe-efojale tʼe-ane̩ ile̩-i, kʼodu kwugbʼowñ le̩,
todu kʼi du ñwu me̩, teju alu kʼunana ojima-wñ de̩, kʼukpahiu-me̩ ki nyo̩gba ku me̩ gbiti ef one̩ e-ejefu lef Afu-wñ;
ku Kraist kʼi dodo ef e̩do̩-me̩ lef e̩do̩ ekono; abu ku me̩ fʼili nyʼane̩ kʼe̩re̩-me̩ ño̩ dʼane̩ ef ufe̩do̩;
todu ku me̩ ki chegbiñmi kʼame̩ manyʼabo kiafo̩ duu ki dʼo̩wo̩ e-ibe do e̩wñ ki chʼunula kpʼujiji kpʼo̩gba kpʼunefu-wñ;
ku me̩ ki ño̩ fʼufe̩do̩ Kraist e-ki tʼe̩wñ kʼone̩ ama le ma, todu ku me̩ ki che̩ko̩ gbogbo wa e̩ko̩ e-O̩jo̩ chaka.
Ama tugbo e̩ne̩ ki neke che tʼe̩wñ du kʼa abiebi abe̩k e-kʼibe-wa atʼo̩ le nana ololo teju ukpahiu ki achuko̩lo̩ efu-wa;
ojima ki chʼe-owñ ef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu kpai efu Kraist Jisus gbogbo tʼo̩gba o̩gba du ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa. Ami.
Todule̩ omi, kʼu chʼe̩namu ef Ondu, arodubʼume̩ ku me̩ ki tale nyo̩nyo̩ bʼudo̩ ku ma do̩ me̩ jo̩.
Ibe-me̩ ki chʼewane̩ chaka, kʼame̩ ki jo̩ chikimi, manyʼe̩do̩ eje̩, me̩ ki je̩ kpʼomune̩ ef ufe̩do̩;
me̩ ki chʼe̩do̩ chacha afejute̩ udama e-Afu; ure̩do̩ ki ji me̩ dama.
Año̩la chʼoka, Afu la chʼo̩ka, dabalu ku ma ño̩ fʼume̩ do̩ udo̩ ef ukibenoʼka ge̩;
Ondu chʼoka, e̩do̩ ekono chʼoka, baptism chʼoka.
O̩jo̩ kpai Ata e̩ne̩ du chʼoka, owñ dʼate̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du, kpai lef e̩wñ du, kpai ef e̩wñ du.
Ma muda dʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ñw a okoke teju alu kʼe̩ñwa ele Kraist de̩.
Todule̩ i kakini,
Ete̩gu kʼi ka le̩ fa? e̩wñ de̩? ki ma chʼukakini, i ño̩ gwo̩ru tʼugbo ki chʼo̩gane̩ ile̩-i n?
E̩ne̩ ki gwo̩ru le̩ onugo ño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki te̩gu tʼatate̩ ñw efojale du, todu kʼi ko̩ e̩wñ du efu.
Tak owñ du ñw abo iche̩kibo̩ ku ma chʼame̩nukpuche̩; e-abo iche̩kibo̩ la chʼamakache̩; e-iche̩kibo̩ la chʼamajuche̩nyo̩ rʼone̩; e-iche̩kibo̩ la chʼamadide kpai amakone̩wñ;
todu ku ma ñwʼabo kiafo̩ che kpa, todu uko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ñw one̩ ku ma ki ne año̩la Kraist,
gbogbo tak o̩chaka-wa ki lewa tʼudama e-e̩do̩ ekono, kpai O̩ma O̩jo̩ ema kpa, kʼa mud o̩kone̩ ogbolo, kʼa tʼe̩ñwa o̩gba alu kʼe̩ko̩ Kraisti gba le̩,
todu kʼawa ki we echʼo̩me̩kpa kʼafu uko̩-o̩la du ki aju aro̩ temi temi kʼi ñʼane̩ wa alo tʼugbo tʼugbo du ef ebʼone̩ eju maja e-amone̩ ef ugbeju tef ugbeleke e-ila.
Kʼa muda nʼochochi aka ef ufe̩do̩, kʼa gbʼo̩kone̩ ef e̩wñ du alo waa tef owñ kʼowñ chʼoji año̩la, owñ che Kraisti.

Owñ chʼe̩te̩-wñ kʼo̩gbo̩dudu año̩la ku ma ko kadʼomune̩ kʼi la gamʼomune̩ lef e̩wñ kʼiko iko du ane̩wa teju alu kʼe̩ñwa uko̩lo̩ kʼe̩wñ año̩la okoke ache kʼaño̩la ki gba nyo̩gba de̩, kʼunyi le̩ ki fʼo̩la-wñ ne ef ufe̩do̩.
Todule̩ e̩wñ kʼu naka, kʼu na ñʼagbibenu ef Ondu de̩, kakini, Ame̩ ki we etale alu kʼabo uche̩ichi atale ef o̩wai e-ibe-ma le̩,
abu kʼef ibe-ma chʼe̩chubi, ku ma mud ononojo ñw iñmi O̩jo̩, lef ugbodu ki dʼefu-ma, lef echi kʼe̩do̩-ma chi;
abo le̩, abu kʼe̩wñ du ma wo̩ ma eju ge̩ n, ma mʼo̩la-ma kojo̩ ñw e̩wñtuñ eche ku ma che uko̩lo̩ du ki ma de̩ hiolo n ef eju-fufu.
I muda chʼabu kʼame̩ ko̩che̩ Kraist le̩ de̩ n;
iche̩wñ ku me̩ fʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩ ochochi, ku ma laño̩ ko̩ me̩ e̩wñ ef owñ, teju alu kʼochochi de̩ efu Jisus;
kʼame̩ ki mʼone̩ e-igbele, ugbo e̩wñ kʼi te̩tache akwoubi le̩, kojane̩, abu kʼe-le̩ chile̩che̩ te̩ teju e̩ño̩ e̩wñ ki adʼone̩ ibe;
ku me̩ dabi chʼetito̩ ef afu e-ibe-me̩,
ku me̩ laño̩ mʼone̩ etito̩ omune̩ le̩ duto̩la, owñ chʼe-ku ma nyi teju alu kʼO̩jo̩ de̩ ef o̩kpakpa kpai efo e-ochochi.
Lef e-le̩ me̩ nakʼolemi jane̩, kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki kʼochochi kpai ekeji-wñ; todabu kʼawa chʼe̩wñ o̩la omune̩.
Me̩ we̩do̩, me̩ ki la we edure: olu ki tunyʼane̩ ke̩re̩bʼubieju-me̩ n:
me̩ ki la bʼuña ñw Abulumone̩ le̩ n.
E̩ne̩ ki joji ki ño̩ joji ge̩ n: chai o̩wo̩ e-wñ onugo i adu chʼakanya uko̩lo̩ ki nyo̩, todu kʼi ne̩ e̩wñ kʼi akpe̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ kʼeku e̩wñ aku.
O̩la e̩fule̩fu du ki nawe edufu alu-me̩, chai e-ki nyo̩ ki ane̩ one̩ nyo̩gba kʼi chʼeku wñ, todu kʼi dʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ñw abo ku ma gbo̩.
Me̩ ki we ekpa Afu Kiafo̩ e-O̩jo̩ e̩do̩ bie̩, owñ ku ma fʼume̩ hiuko̩ ef uwñ tod o̩jo̩ ku ma wa gbʼone̩ tane̩.
Me̩ namʼo̩la ulukoko kpai uke̩do̩fulu kpai uwe̩do̩ du kpai ukwa kpai achakpabie̩ ko bʼo̩la-me̩ te̩, manyʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du.
Me̩ ki la mud abo ku ma mo̩la ñw omune̩, e̩do̩-me̩ ki chʼafu, me̩ nache ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ñw o̩la-me̩ alu kʼO̩jo̩ che ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ñwu me̩ efu Kraisti.
Todule̩ me̩ ki mud abo ku ma awʼO̩jo̩ che, dabe̩ne̩ kʼamo̩ma kʼi afe̩do̩;
me̩ ki tale ef ufe̩do̩, alu ku Kraist ño̩ fe̩do̩ me̩, kʼi la mʼo̩la-wñ du tinyo̩ todu wa, kʼi mud e̩wñ ku ma duwa kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ todu ki kpo e̩rinyo̩.
Ama e̩wñ abutabu kpai e̩wñ iwa du, abe̩k ejufufu, i chaka chʼodu-wñ e̩do̩ ofo, i ki dʼefu-me̩ n, alu ki chʼeju-wñ ñw abo kiafo̩;
e̩wñ mugu mugu kpai o̩la ibe̩te̩, abe̩k o̩la iye̩ye̩-eka e-le̩ du chʼeju-wñ n; chai ugwa egwa ki koji e-le̩.
Todu ame̩ chema ogbolo kakini, E̩nabutabu du, abe̩k e̩ne̩ ki ma de̩ hiolo n, abe̩k e̩ne̩ ki achejufufu, owñ chʼachode, e̩ne̩ du ef uma ne̩ e̩wñ ogu kʼi aje̩ ef ojane̩ Kraist kpai e-O̩jo̩ n.
Me̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ne̩ o̩la ofofo mʼume̩ ibe da n; todu lef e̩wñ-i oñ uwe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ awa bʼamo̩ma uko̩ egbo̩lagbo̩ oji ma.
Todule̩ ame̩ ki mud amadama nyʼe̩wñ kpʼama n.
Todu ame̩ chʼe̩chubi e̩gba le̩, ame̩ muda chʼugane̩ ef Ondu fai me̩: me̩ natale dab amo̩ma ugane̩
(todu e̩ro ugane̩ dʼef e̩wñ ki nyo̩ du kpai o̩kpakpa kpai ochochi),
me̩ nañwa ku me̩ go e̩wñ ki arʼOndu e̩do̩;
me̩ ki we etuta kpʼuko̩lo̩ e̩chubi ki ma ne̩ e̩ro n le̩, chai edu bi oñ me̩ dʼe-le̩ bi ma.
Todu e̩dʼe̩wñ untaja ku ma jo̩ ache-i tʼalu aka ofo chʼe̩wñ anyo̩.
Ama e̩wñ du ku ma du bi one̩ ugane̩ le̩ adʼu tejugede, todu e̩wñ du ku majʼadu tejugede chʼugane̩.
Lef e-le̩ i kakini,
Todule̩ me̩ go alu ku me̩ atale tʼeju-wñ yiili, me̩ ki le dab abo ku ma ma nibe ni n, chai dab amanibe;
me̩ nafʼiko-i la te̩, todabu kʼojoluñini chʼiko bibi.
Lef e-le̩ me̩ we echʼidada, ku me̩ mʼoji e̩wñ ki chʼe-ki dʼOndu e̩do̩.
Me̩ ki ñmʼo̩te̩ ki mu me̩ n, ofubo̩ dʼef e-le̩, me̩ ki muda nache̩ko̩ ñw Afu;
me̩ nanʼeli eko̩ dʼO̩jo̩ kpai eli o̩lO̩jo̩ kpai eli e-Afu O̩jo̩ ako̩la ñw o̩la-me̩; me̩ ki la nʼeli ako̩ kpʼeli ako̩ dʼOndu kpʼe̩do̩-me̩;
ugwa egwa O̩jo̩, owñ chʼAta, tod e̩wñ du ef odu Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist ki nʼuda n;
abu ku me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ kamuhi jo̩ ñw omune̩ ef ailo Kraist.
Amo̩ya ki jo̩ ñw amo̩ko̩ e-ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼOndu ma jo̩ ñw u.
Todabu kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ chʼoji onobule̩ alu ki Kraist chʼoji ujeju abudo̩-wñ, owñ onugo chʼE̩najadu año̩la.
Oñ alu kʼujeju abudo̩ Ondu fʼo̩la-wñ kamuhite̩ ñwu Kraist, abe̩le̩ abobule̩ ki ño̩ jo̩ ñw aboke̩le̩ e-ma ef e̩wñ du.
Aboke̩le̩, me̩ ki fe̩do̩ abobule̩-me̩ alu ki Kraisti ño̩ fe̩do̩ ujeju abudo̩-wñ, kʼi la mʼo̩la-wñ du chele tod uwñ;
todu kʼi je̩ ñw u ki fo̩, kʼi la nagwe̩ hiolo ef omi ugwʼe̩wñ ki chʼo̩lO̩jo̩.
Todu kʼowñ ki mʼowñ du dago kpenyʼo̩la-wñ kʼi chʼujeju abudo̩-wñ e-ojima, kʼi we enʼiwa ki bumo̩, abe̩k e̩gbe̩nyi, abe̩k I e̩wñ e̩go̩ e-le̩ du; todu kʼi muda afo̩ kʼi la we e̩nʼenyo̩lo̩.
Abe̩le̩ i dukpe̩ kʼaboke̩le̩ ki fe̩do̩ amo̩ya-ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼaño̩la-ma onugo. E̩ne̩ ki afe̩do̩ o̩ya e-wñ mak o̩la e-wñ i afe̩do̩ le̩.
Todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki chʼulaka o̩re̩la e-wñ mama ta n; chai e̩ne̩ i ane̩ owñ, i la ahie̩do̩ bʼowñ ma dabalu ku Kraist ñʼahie̩do̩ bʼujeju abudo̩-wñ ma.
Todabu kʼa chʼe̩wñ ki ro̩nyʼaño̩la-wñ.
Tod e-kide̩ one̩ akwo bʼata-wñ kpʼiye-wñ te̩, kʼi la amanyʼo̩ya-wñ; oñ amameji le̩ achʼo̩re̩laʼka.
Afili kide̩ chʼelile: omi muda nʼo̩la Kraist kpʼujeju abudo̩-wñ aka-i.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, ame̩ okoke e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki nafe̩do̩ o̩ya e-wñ dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ abe̩le̩; todu kʼo̩ya ki narailo o̩ko̩-wñ.
Amo̩ma, me̩ nagbo̩la abo ku ma bi me̩ ef Ondu; todu e-le̩ chʼo̩kpakpa.
E̩ ki bumo̩ ata-we̩ kpai iye-we̩ (owñ chʼuko̩ ejodudu kʼi te̩ ki ne̩ e̩le̩ ubi le̩ kaki),
todu kʼuwe̩ ki li e̩nyo̩, kʼe̩ la kwojolugbo ile̩-i.
Amata o̩ma ge̩, me̩ ki nyi amo̩ma-me̩ uwe̩do̩ n: chai e̩ne̩ me̩ nane̩ ma gba ef o̩la eko̩-ma kpʼibe e-Ondu edu ñw uma.
Amadu ge̩, me̩ nʼailo kpʼo̩la ega agbo̩la abo ku ma chʼodu-me̩ likpa o̩re̩la, ef e̩do̩ foo dabe̩ne̩ ki che Kraist me̩ che ñw u;
me̩ ki chʼadu eche e̩wñ eju ofo dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ me̩ che nyo̩ eju n; chai dabe̩ne̩ kʼamadu Kraist, me̩ ki che e̩wñ ki du O̩jo̩ e̩do̩ kwef onugo-me̩;
me̩ nʼibe foo achuko̩lo̩ adu dabe̩ne̩ kʼOndu me̩ che ñw u, ki ma chʼone̩ n;
abu ku me̩ chema ka kʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ache, e-le i agba ugbo Ondu, dagba i chʼadu dagba i chʼo̩mone̩.
Oñ ame̩ ku me̩ chʼodu one̩ me̩ nache e̩wñ le̩ gbage̩de̩ ugbo e-ma ge̩, me̩ ki bʼo̩wo̩lo̩ efoko ma: abu ku me̩ chema ka kʼOdu e-ma kpai e-me̩ dʼefojale, e̩nejuma la dʼugbo owñ n.
I chʼe-ki bo̩ le̩, me̩ ki nʼukpahiu ef Ondu kpai ef ugbiti ugbiñmi e-wñ.
Me̩ nakʼe̩wñ ogu O̩jo̩ chaka nyʼo̩la, ku me̩ nʼukpahiu ebʼugbeleke e-Abulumone̩ le̩ jo̩.
Todu uja-uke̩do̩ e-wa kʼa ja chʼe-ugbo e̩bie̩ kpai o̩re̩la n, chai e-ugbo amagboji kpai abo ukpahiu kpai amugbiti e-e̩chubi ile̩-i kpai amafu bibi ef uña efojale.
Lefe-le̩ oñ me̩ mʼe̩wñ ido̩na ogu e-O̩jo̩ chaka ko todu ku me̩ nʼukpahiu ebʼuma jo̩ ef o̩jo̩ bibi, tak abu ku me̩ fʼe̩wñ le̩ du che kpa, ku me̩ kwodago ka.
Todule̩ me̩ dago, ochochi ki lʼume̩ ago de, o̩kpakpa ki la chʼebije-ube̩do̩-ma-me̩ ku me̩ duji mʼe̩do̩,
o̩la uche̩nyo̩ e-ure̩do̩ emu ki chʼe̩da ku me̩ nyi;
me̩ mʼo̩kpatabili ugbe̩yo̩ e-e̩do̩ ekono gba manyʼe̩wñ du, me̩ neke dʼe-le̩ kpʼo̩fa-una e̩ne̩bibi le̩ lu chaka.
Taku me̩ mʼukata ujadu gba, kpai ugbada e-Afu, owñ chʼo̩lO̩jo̩.
Lef adua kpai o̩ko̩ e̩gbabʼo du; me̩ nachadua iko tʼiko du ef Afu, me̩ ki la gwe̩ke̩ adide-wñ, me̩ fejugbiti alu du ku me̩ gbo̩ko̩bo̩ tod abo kiafo̩ du,
kpai utodu mi ge̩, ku ma ki dʼo̩la ñwu mi kʼu ka, kʼalu-mi ki chi kʼu nanʼeju e̩gbo eje̩ ñw amone̩ ma afili Uche̩nyo̩-i,
todu e-le̩ oñ omi chʼe̩nogijo ku ma fuji igbaligba-i; todu kʼu dʼef e-le̩ ako̩la e̩do̩ e̩gbo alu ki dukpe̩ kʼu naka.
Oñ Taikikus, kʼi chʼo̩maye e-ufe̩do̩ ki ache e̩wñ ñw one̩ kʼi achubi wa ef Ondu, aje̩ ñwu me̩ ma e̩wñ du ki dʼugbo mi kpai e̩wñ kʼu dʼemi ache,
tod e̩wñ le̩ gbage̩de̩ oñ u kpʼo̩ uche̩ wʼugbo me̩, owñ chʼutodu ku me̩ ki ma alu kʼe̩wñ de̩ ugbo wa, kʼi la dʼugbe̩do̩ ñwu me̩ kʼe̩do̩-me̩ ki wane̩.
Ure̩do̩ ki dʼugbo amo̩maye kpai ufe̩do̩ manyʼe̩do̩-ekono kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ Ata kpai Ondu Jisus Kraist.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki dʼugbo abo du ku ma fe̩do̩ Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist kpʼufe̩do̩ ki ma chʼe-ekado̩na n.
Po̩l kpai Timoti, amadu Kraist Jisus-i, tʼugbo abo kiafo̩ efu Kraisti Jisus chaka ku ma jo̩ Filipai, manyʼamafejute̩ kpai abo ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu ma.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ure̩do̩ kwugbo O̩jo̩ Ata-wa kpai Ondu Jisusi Kraisti kʼi dʼugbo me̩.
NagwʼO̩jo̩-mi e̩gba du kʼu rewa me̩.
E̩gba du ef o̩ko̩ du kʼu nagbabʼo̩ todu me̩ chaka nagbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kpai uyo̩
noji uta ku me̩ ta kpʼawa ñw Uche̩nyo̩ le̩ akwʼo̩jo̩ ejodudu gbogbo wʼifa-i.
A ke̩do̩no kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼi chane̩ uko̩lo̩ ki nyo̩ eche ef ume̩ le̩ ache gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ Jisusi Kraisti ki kpoji.

I chʼo̩kpakpa ñw omi kʼu nibe abe̩le̩ todu me̩ chaka, todu ene̩ kʼu ne̩ me̩ ef e̩do̩-mi, abu kʼo̩chaka me̩ jʼabʼumi tuta ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩-mi ef eji ku ma ji mi-i, kpai ef ohi kʼu nadu, kpai ef Uche̩nyo̩ elonyane̩.
Todu O̩jo̩ chʼe̩nibenu-mi, alu kʼeju-me̩ chaka ano mi ef e̩do̩ Jisusi Kraisti ki achʼiwo̩ one̩ le̩.
Oñ adua kʼu nache-i chʼutodu kʼufe̩do̩-me̩ ki tule nyo̩gba ololo ef e̩wñ-ema ogbolo kpai o̩ka e̩wñ eche;
kʼame̩ ki ñwa e̩wñ ojoji ojoji go; todu kʼame̩ ki de̩ yaala wʼo̩jo̩ Kraisti; ku me̩ we eje̩ ñw one̩ ke̩re̩.
E̩ro o̩kpakpa ki kʼume̩ efu lefu Jisus Kraist tod ojima kpai uñwulo̩ O̩jo̩.
U la cheneku ku me̩ ma, amo̩maye, kakini, E̩wñ ugbo-mi-i je̩ ñw Uche̩nyo̩ nyʼo̩gba tule,
oñ eji ku ma ji mi-i kwotejugede efu Kraist ef o̩gbo̩ Praito̩rium-i chaka kpai ugbo abo ki bo̩ du.
Ojile amo̩maye ef Ondu ño̩ ke̩do̩no tule tod eji ku ma ji mi-i, e̩do̩-ma la gbo ololo oñ ma ma railo o̩lO̩jo̩ eka n.
Abo iche̩ka la ka lef ulie̩na kpai iñwa ochochi; abo iche̩ka muda nʼakoya Kraist ata ef ibe e̩nyo̩:
abo-i la ka kwef ufe̩do̩ abu ku ma chema kakʼu tʼemi kʼu kʼomu Uche̩nyo̩;
abo ekeji le̩ dʼUche̩nyo̩ Kraist kpogo kwef edane̩kpeju, e-ma fe̩ n, ma nʼibe kaku ma adʼo̩bata kwane̩ ñwu mi ef eji ku ma ji mi te̩-i.
Tod e̩wñ? Alu du ki chaka de̩, dagba i chʼedʼo̩wo̩ yʼone̩ eju dagba i chʼochochi, ma du Kraist kpogo me̩; u nayo̩ ef e-le, u ñʼayo̩ kpo̩ ge̩.
Todu u chema ka kʼoji e-i achʼujadu ñwu mi lef o̩ko̩ ku me̩ agba bʼO̩jo̩ kpai ate̩ko e-Afu Jisusi Kraisti.

I ade̩ alu kʼeju-mi chʼefe̩rʼo̩na, kʼu nakibeno ka kʼanyo̩ amu mi ef e̩wñ du n, ama alu ki te̩te̩ de̩, fa-i ge̩ ef eju e̩gbo du uwohi anana Kraist atule ef año̩la-mi, dagba i che lef udeju, dagba i che lef uku.
Todu ugbo e-mi edeju che Kraisti, eku la chʼile eje̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼedeju ef o̩re̩la chʼe-ki anʼe̩ro uko̩lo̩ ñwu mi, mak e-kʼu nadu u ma n.
E̩wñ meji le̩ la mʼumi ne̩ gaga, e̩ño̩-wñ ache mi kʼu mutu kwʼemi alo kʼu dʼugbo Kraist; todu e-le̩ nyo̩ tule nana ololo.
Eguane̩-mi ef o̩re̩la-i muda chʼeku ki aku ume̩ tule.
Oñ abu kʼu ke̩do̩no abe̩le̩, u che ma kak u naguane̩, kʼu la bʼo̩chaka-me̩ gugu, ku me̩ dʼo̩na nyo̩gba, ku me̩ ño̩ nʼuyo̩ ef e̩do̩-ekono;
todu kʼuba-me̩ ki mud ololo efu Kraisti Jisus ef umi lef eju-mi kʼi ñʼadubi adane̩ ugbo me̩ ge̩.

Ama ke, me̩ ki nʼe̩wñ ache alu kʼo̩mane̩ ache nyo̩nyo̩ bʼUche̩nyo̩ Kraisti jo̩: todu dagba u lewa ali me̩, dagba kʼeju-mi ma dane̩ n, todu kʼu gbʼinabali-me̩ kakini, Ame̩ dago ef afuʼka, e̩do̩-me̩ chʼoka, oñ me̩ jo̩ abʼomune̩ dobulu ñw o̩la e̩do̩-ekono e-Uche̩nyo̩;
ku me̩ ma chʼokpo abo ku ma kobʼume̩ le̩ ef e̩wñ du n; e-te̩ chʼujiwe ule-nyo̩ ñwu ma, i muda chʼujiwe ujadu ugbo e̩-me̩, e-i la kwʼugbo O̩jo̩.
Todu i chʼeke̩do̩nʼo kate oñ ma du chʼume̩ ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ todu Kraist in, chai ku me̩ ki ño̩ li uwa todu owñ ge̩:
abu ku me̩ ne̩ eju egbiti e-ku me̩ li ef umi le̩, ku me̩ laño̩ gbo̩ ka kʼi dʼef umi fa-i.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼi nʼugbe̩do̩ ki dʼefu Kraist, iche̩wñ kʼi nʼenyʼone̩ e̩do̩ e-ufe̩do̩, iche̩wñ ki nʼuta eta e̩-Afu, iche̩wñ kʼi nʼe̩do̩ ki achʼiwo̩ one̩ kpai ejumomi,
maku me̩ che kʼuyo̩-mi ki jo̩ kpa, todu kʼame̩ ki nʼihe̩ okate, ku me̩ nʼufe̩do̩ okate, onugo-me̩ ki chʼoka, me̩ ki fʼibe e̩wñ okate kpe̩;
me̩ ki che e̩wñ du lo̩na edane̩kpeju kpʼo̩na ojima owai etene n, ibe-me̩ ki muda chʼe̩hiwane̩, abo omune̩ ki tʼume̩ le eju e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩;
e̩wñ e-wñ kate ki wʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ eju n chai e̩wñ abomune̩ ki ño̩ wʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ eju.
Ibe kʼi adʼef ume̩ kʼi ño̩ chʼe-ki dʼefu Kraist Jisus:
owñ le̩ ki dʼalu kʼO̩jo̩ de̩ kwʼabakwane̩, eju-wñ echokujo̩ kpai O̩jo̩ chʼe̩wñ ku ma akpaka nyʼu i che n,
i muda fʼo̩la-wñ chʼakpokpo te̩, i mʼalu kʼadu ade̩ du, i mud e̩ne̩ ki bi one̩;
oñ abu ku ma li ka kʼi dab one̩ eju, i ño̩ hi o̩la-wñ wane̩, i mud e̩ne̩ ki agbo̩la gbogbowa uku, uku kʼa ka-i chʼe-ojoli.
Lef e-le̩ O̩jo̩ ño̩ hi owñ ne tʼatate̩, oñ i mʼodu ki tʼodu du le du chʼowñ ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩;
todu kʼef odu Jisus kʼokuku du ki te̩kpe̩, tʼe-efojale tʼe-ile̩ tʼe-o̩gane̩ ile̩,
kʼukpalu du ki la agbalu kakini Jisus Kraist che Ondu tod ojima O̩jo̩ Ata.
Todabe̩le̩, abo ufe̩do̩-mi, alu ku me̩ te̩tagbo̩la e̩gba du, ki ma chʼeju-mi kate n, fai me̩ ki la che tule nana ubi-mi le̩, me̩ ki nʼailo kpai o̩la-ega chʼuko̩lo̩ ujadu-me̩ dufu;
todu O̩jo̩ ehʼe̩ne̩ ki achuko̩lo̩ ef ume̩, tʼe-du e̩do̩ tʼe-uko̩lo̩-eche kʼi che e̩wñ ki rʼowñ e̩do̩.
Me̩ ki che e̩wñ du, i ki nʼeñmini n, i ki nʼo̩la oka temi temi n:

todu ku me̩ ki we enʼuchalu, kʼe̩wñ ejaduña ki we egwe̩gwa nyʼume̩, ku me̩ chʼamo̩ma e-O̩jo̩ ku ma ma nʼe̩kpabie̩ o̩la n jʼalumeji o̩gba amone̩ ki mugo ki murida tʼiba-i, ef abo e-le̩ ame̩ kwotejugede dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ ugane̩ ef ile̩-i,
abu ku me̩ mʼO̩la e-Iñmi du nʼo̩wo̩dala te̩; kʼi chʼe̩wñ uba ñwu mi o̩jo̩ Kraist, ka kʼomi fule tinyo̩ ofo n, u la chakanya ofofo n.
Dagba ma mʼumi du danyʼoji iche̩bo̩ kpai abune̩ e-e̩do̩-ekono e-me̩, nayo̩, u la abʼo̩chaka-me̩ yo̩:
ame̩ ki laño̩ yo̩ abe̩le̩, me̩ ki la bʼumi yo̩.
Oñ u kibeno ef Ondu Jisus ka kʼu nakpe̩ Timoti wʼugbo me̩ piopio, todu kʼe̩do̩-mi ki ño̩ wane̩ e̩gba kʼu fʼalu kʼe̩wñ ugbo me̩ de̩ ma.
Todu u nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼe̩do̩-wñ dab owñ kʼe̩wñ ugbo me̩ awʼowñ eju ogbolo n.
Todu o̩chaka-ma feju e̩wñ o̩la e-ma, ma feju e̩wñ e-Jisus Kraisti n.
Ama ame̩ chema ijali-wñ kakini, Alu kʼo̩ma are̩ ata-wñ, alu le̩ oñ i bʼumi chuko̩lo̩ adu ef Uche̩nyo̩.
Todule̩ u kibeno ka kʼu nakpe̩ owñ ababa, e̩gba kʼu fʼoji e̩wñ ugbo e-mi-i le.
U ño̩ ke̩do̩no ef Ondu ka kʼona onugo ñʼawa piopio ge̩.
Eju-mi i la dukpe̩ kʼu kpe̩ E̩pafrodaitus, o̩maye-mi kʼi abʼumi chuko̩lo̩ kʼomi kpʼowñ la chʼisoja kʼi la chʼe̩nukpuche̩ e-me̩ kʼi chabune̩ mi ef eku e̩wñ ki ku mi, wʼugbo me̩-i ge̩;
todabu kʼeju-me̩ chaka anʼowñ, e̩do̩-wñ la kpabie̩ ololo todabu kʼame̩ gbo̩ ka kʼi lo̩ ñwun:
todu o̩ga kʼi che i bo̩ pe̩ kʼi ma ku: O̩jo̩ muda li owñ ejumomi; i la chʼowñ kate n, i ño̩ li omi ejumomi ge̩, tod e̩gba kʼomi nʼe̩do̩dudu noj e̩do̩dudu.
Todule̩ u nʼe̩do̩-chacha akpe̩ owñ wa tule, todu kʼame̩ ki li u ku me̩ dabi yuyo̩ ge̩, kʼe̩do̩dudu e-mi ki buchi.
Todule̩ me̩ mʼowñ gba ef Ondu kpʼuyo̩ chaka; abo-e̩go̩-i ki ne̩ ubumo ugbo me̩:
todabu ki chʼutodu uko̩lo̩ Kraist i wa gbogbo me̩ru uku le̩, i dʼojʼo̩la-wñ tinyo̩ todu kʼi chemʼabune̩-mi kʼugbo ki bo̩ ku me̩ ma neke che n ki jo̩ kpa.
I chʼe-kibo̩, amo̩maye-mi, me̩ nayo̩ ef Ondu. Eko̩ ko̩ ño̩ ko̩ o̩takada e̩wñ le̩ gbage̩de̩ rʼume̩ awo̩ mi n, ugbo e-me̩ i la chʼe̩wñ kpaka.
Me̩ nago amabia, me̩ nago ame̩nuko̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩, me̩ nago abo ku ma kʼe̩wñ da le̩:
todu awa chʼabo-e̩pi-e̩da, owñ chʼawa kʼa nʼAfu O̩jo̩ ache O̩jo̩, kʼa laño̩ buba efu Kraisti Jisusi, kʼa ma la ke̩do̩no e̩wñ ef o̩re̩la re n;
dagba omi chaka nʼe̩wñ kʼu nake̩do̩no ef o̩re̩la; iche̩wñ kʼe̩nomune̩ do̩ kʼi nʼe̩wñ kʼi ake̩do̩no ef o̩re̩la, e-mi tule ta:
ma dʼe̩pi-mi o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩jo̩, u chʼuche̩ abo Israe̩l, o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin, Hibru e-Hibru u che; lʼo̩na o̩lo̩da u chʼabo Farisi;
i chʼikpala e̩wñ eda, u nʼujeju abudo̩ Ondu adoli ma; i chʼe-o̩kpakpa ki dʼef o̩lo̩da, u nʼuchalu n.
Ama e̩wñ ki nʼile ñwu mi le̩ chʼe̩wñ ofu eju-mi todu Kraist.

Abe̩le̩ ochochi, e̩wñ du mud ofu eju-mi todu Kraist Jisus Ondu-mi ema, owñ kʼi fʼe̩wñ du du e̩nyo̩ le̩: todu owñ le̩ e̩wñ du che mi ofu, eju-mi e̩wñ-mi du la mud e̩wñ ojeta, todu ki Kraist ki mud ile kʼu na je̩,
ku ma ki ño̩ fʼumi li ef uwñ kʼu we enʼo̩kpakpa e-mi kʼo̩lo̩da chʼe̩te̩-wñ le̩, chai e-ki do̩mo̩ lef e̩do̩-ekono Kraist, owñ chʼo̩kpakpa kʼO̩jo̩ chʼe̩te̩-wñ lʼo̩na e̩do̩ ekono:
kʼu fʼowñ kpai ukpahiu udajikwane̩-wñ ma kʼu tuta kpʼowñ ef uwa-wñ kʼu de̩ alu ki dukpe̩ kʼu de̩ ñw uku-wñ alo waa;
todu ukani i anʼugbo kʼu natʼudajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku.
I cheka kʼomi gba ta n, u la mufu kpoji ta n: u muda abʼo̩ kpe̩re̩, ukani nadʼo̩wo̩ do e-ku Kraisti Jisus la dʼo̩wo̩ do mi tod uwñ le̩.
Amo̩maye, omi lo ka kʼomi onugo dʼo̩wo̩ do ta n; e̩wñʼka muda de̩ kakini, Egbenyo̩ nagbe̩nyo̩ e̩wñ ubi, oñ nano̩ miyaa rʼe̩wñ ki dʼo̩gba
eju-mi chʼegwanyʼugbo kʼu nanyi, oñ nabo̩kpe̩re̩ todu e̩wñ ule udo̩ ate̩ e-kʼO̩jo̩ ado̩ one̩ efu Kraist Jisus.
Todule̩, aluka wa kʼa chʼo̩kone̩, a ki nʼibe e-le̩. I la che̩wñ kʼibe-me̩ chʼojoji ugboʼka, O̩jo̩ ñʼabi e-le̩ rʼume̩ eju ge̩.
Alu du ki de̩, ugbo kʼa lewa tu, a ki nalule̩ tʼeju e-le̩ gbage̩de̩.
Amo̩maye, me̩ ki mud abo ku ma bʼomune̩ wʼumi che, me̩ nafʼeju gwanyi abo ku ma tale abe̩le̩, owñ chʼalu ku me̩ ne̩ wa chʼe̩wñ ku me̩ wo̩li-wñ.
Todu amone̩ wewe tale kʼomi ka o̩la-ma ñwu me̩ o̩gbe̩nugbe̩, aku naro̩ ab u naño̩ ka ñwu me̩ fa-i ge̩ kakini, Ama chʼame̩nebi oli-uku Kraist,
ukpoji e-ma chʼelenyo̩, O̩jo̩ e-ma chʼukulu-ma, oñ ojima-ma chʼef anyo̩-ma, ibe-ma chekadʼe̩wñ ane̩ ile̩-i.
Todu ugbo kʼa chʼo̩mane̩ chʼefojale; a la ñʼafejuto̩na anede E̩najadu kʼi kwʼo̩mo̩ wa, owñ chʼOndu Jisus Kraist:
kʼi arʼaño̩la-wa e-e̩hiwane̩-i da etito̩ kʼi dʼalu kʼaño̩la e-ojima-wñ de̩, alu kʼukpahiu-wñ achʼuko̩lo̩ kʼi fʼe̩wñ du kamuhi te̩ ñw o̩la-wñ.
Todabe̩le̩, amo̩maye-mi e-ufe̩do̩ kʼeju-me̩ la ano̩ mi, ku me̩ chʼuyo̩-mi kpai uloko-mi, abe̩le̩ me̩ ki dago ka ef Ondu, abufe̩do̩-mi.
Nagbo̩ko̩bo̩ Io̩dia, naño̩ gbo̩ko̩bo̩ Sintike, kʼibe-ma ki chʼokate ef Ondu.

I-i, u ñʼabi we̩, uwe̩ kʼe̩ te̩tane̩ oli uno̩lo̩ kpʼomi ogbolo, e̩ nate̩ko abobule̩-i ma bʼumi dobulu ef Uche̩nyo̩ manyu Kle̩me̩t kpai abo ki bo̩ ku ma bʼumi chʼuko̩lo̩ le̩, kʼodu-ma la jʼef o̩takada e-iñmi.
Me̩ nayo̩ ef Ondu e̩gba du; naño̩ dabi ka, Me̩ nayo̩.
Me̩ ki je̩ ñw amone̩ du ki ma o̩yo̩o̩-me̩. Ondu me̩ro̩wo̩ me̩.
Me̩ ki dejiji e̩wñ du n; ama ef e̩wñ du me̩ nanʼadua eche kpʼo̩ko̩ e̩gba bʼo̩ manyʼugwa egwa je̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ma ebi-me̩ ku me̩ bi.
Tak ure̩do̩ e-O̩jo̩ e-kʼi tʼibe e̩ne̩ du le adonyʼe̩do̩-me̩ kpai ibe-me̩ ku me̩ lo efu Kraist Jisus.

I chʼe-kʼi bo̩, amo̩maye, aluka e̩wñ du kʼi chʼochochi, aluka e̩wñ du ku ma diba ñw u, aluka e̩wñ du ki chʼo̩kpakpa, aluka e̩wñ ki de̩ yala, aluka e̩wñ du ki chʼalifia, aluka e̩wñ du ki nʼuwohi e̩nyo̩, iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ ki nʼodu-e̩nyo̩ du do̩mo̩, iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ ku ma ñwulo̩ uwñ do̩mo̩, me̩ ki dʼibe tʼe̩wñ le̩ du.
E̩wñ ku me̩ ko̩che̩, ku me̩ la mugba, ku me̩ la gbo̩, ku me̩ laño̩ li ef umi, me̩ ki nʼe̩wñ le̩ ache: tak O̩jo̩ e-ure̩do̩ adʼubi me̩.
U la yo̩ nana ef Ondu, todabu ku me̩ je̩ ñwu ibe-me̩ ku me̩ dute̩ mi mutajo ubi ane̩-i ge̩; ibe-me̩ te̩te̩te̩ mi, me̩ muda nʼiko n.
I cheka kʼe̩wñʼka nyaru mi oñ naka-i n: todu omi ko̩che̩ me̩, alu du ki de̩ u chebʼo̩la-mi jo̩.
U chema e̩wñ edabu, u la chema ololo e̩wñ ene̩: lʼo̩na du, kpai ef e̩wñ du tʼefu eko̩, tʼe-ebi ekpa, tʼe-e̩wñ ene̩ ololo, tʼe̩wñ enyaru omi mud o̩ka-wñ me̩.
Iñmi-mi chewo e̩wñ du ef e̩ne̩ kʼi adʼukpahiu ñwu mi le̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩, etuta ku me̩ bʼumi tuta ef o̩bata-mi le̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ me̩ che.
Ame̩ onugo la chema, ame̩ abo Filipai, ka kʼe̩gba abakwane̩ Uche̩nyo̩ e̩gba ku kwo bo̩ Masidonia te̩ le̩, ujeju abudo̩ Ondu okate tuta kpai omi ef e̩wñ-echele kpai e̩wñ-egba n, chai ame̩kate;
todu me̩ ño̩ dʼe̩wñ kʼeku-wñ aku mi kpuche̩ rʼumi Te̩se̩lonaika onuka kpai onukeji ge̩.
I cheka kʼu natejane̩ e̩wñ-ele le̩ n; u muda atejane̩ e̩ro ki mud o̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩ ku ma ki loru ñwu me̩.
U la chene̩ e̩wñ du, i ño̩ chʼololo ge̩: efu-mi ko̩ me̩, abu kʼu mʼe̩wñ ki kwʼugbo me̩ gba o̩wo̩ E̩pafrodaitus, e̩kpo e̩rinyo̩ i che, e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ki nyo̩-egba i che, i cherʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩.
O̩jo̩ e-mi la ache kʼe̩wñ kʼeku-wñ aku me̩ ki jo̩ kpa ñwu me̩ teju alu kʼanana-wñ de̩ ef ojima efu Kraist Jisus.
Ojima ki chʼe-O̩jo̩ kʼi ño̩ chʼAta-wa ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa, ami.
Me̩ fʼabo kiafo̩ efu Kraist Jisus gwa okoke du. Amo̩maye ku ma jʼugbo mi agwa me̩.
Abo kiafo̩ du agwa me̩, oñ e-abo ku ma jʼef unyi Sisa toji.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-Ondu Jisus Kraist ki dʼugbo afu-me̩.
Po̩l, e̩nukpuche̩ Kraist Jisus lef edʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩, kpai Timoti, o̩maye-wa,
tugbo abo kiafo̩ ku ma chʼamo̩maye ku ma chubi Ondu efu Kraist ku ma jo̩ Ko̩lo̩se: Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ure̩do̩ kwugbo O̩jo̩ Ata-wa ki dʼugbo me̩.
A agwʼO̩jo̩, Ata Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist, e̩gba du kʼa rodubʼo̩ todu me̩,
abu kʼa gbʼinabali e̩do̩-ekono-me̩ efu Kraisti Jisusi, kpai inabali ufe̩do̩ ku me̩ ne̩ fe̩do̩ abo kiafo̩ du,
todu e̩wñ ukibeno ku ma du ne ñwu me̩ efojale, owñ chʼe-ku me̩ gbʼinabali-wñ tane̩ ef o̩la ochochi e-Uche̩nyo̩
kʼi wʼugbo me̩ alu kʼi ño̩ dʼugbo du ile̩ kʼi la nʼe̩ro aro. I naya nyo̩gba, alu kʼi te̩tache ef ume̩ akwʼo̩jo̩ ku me̩ fʼu gbo̩ ku me̩ laño̩ fʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-O̩jo̩ ef ochochi ma ogbolo,
alu ku me̩ ko̩che̩ ugbo Ipafras, e̩nufe̩do̩ kʼa kpʼowñ chʼadu, kʼi ño̩ chʼache e̩wñ e-Kraisti kʼi achʼubi-wñ todu me̩.
I laño̩ je̩ ñw a ma ufe̩do̩-me̩ ef Afu ge̩.
Lef e-le̩, akwʼo̩jo̩ kʼa gbo̩, awa ño̩ we echadua todu me̩ n. A la abiʼi ebi todu kʼema e̩wñ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ o̩gbolo ki che̩ko̩ ef ume̩, ef ibe kpai oji e̩wñ e-afu du ema,
kʼame̩ ki tale nyo̩nyo̩ bʼOndu jo̩ ku me̩ rʼowñ eju chaka, ku me̩ nʼe̩ro aro ef uko̩lo̩ ki nyo̩ du, ku me̩ la ya nyʼo̩gba ef O̩jo̩ ema o̩gbolo.
I ki dʼukpahiu ñwu me̩ ef ukpahiu du, teju ugbiti e-ojima-wñ ku me̩ ki fe̩do̩ lichi alu du, ku me̩ laño̩ fe̩do̩ je̩ kpai uyo̩.
Me̩ nagwa Ata kʼi je̩ ñw a bʼukpe̩ e̩wñ ogu e-abo kiafo̩ jo̩ ef ugane̩.
Owñ le̩ mʼuwa gba kwef o̩da e̩chubi, oñ i mʼuwa ko rʼef ojane̩ e-O̩ma ufe̩do̩-wñ;
e-kʼawa nʼulone̩tane̩ ef uwñ, owñ chʼeto̩no̩ ku ma tʼadure-wa no̩ le̩.
Owñ le̩ dʼalu kʼO̩jo̩ e-kʼeju ma li n de̩ hie̩hie̩, udago-wñ chʼo̩mo̩gba ugbo e̩wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ nyi;

todu ef uwñ ma nyi e̩wñ du, tʼe-efojale kpai e-ane̩-ile̩-i, tʼe̩wñ kʼeju li, tʼe̩wñ kʼeju ma li n, dagba i chʼede, dagba i chʼodu-eche, dagba i chʼagboji-eche, dagba i chʼo̩da-ene̩; ma nyi e̩wñ du lef uwñ kpʼutod uwñ.
Owñ la dʼo̩gba e̩wñ du, e̩wñ du la chefama te̩ ef uwñ.
Owñ la chʼoji año̩la, kʼi chʼujeju abudo̩-wñ. Owñ chʼuchane̩, i chʼo̩mo̩gba kwef abo ki ku: todu kʼowñ ki mud e̩ne̩ ki tʼo̩gba ef e̩wñ du.
Todu, i rʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩wñ ukefu le̩ du kʼi dodo ef uwñ,
kʼi la fʼe̩wñ du ño̩ru ñw o̩la-wñ lef uwñ, dagba i chʼe̩wñ ane̩-ile̩-i, dagba i chʼe̩wñ efojale abu kʼi fʼure̩do̩ che lef uwñ lef e̩bie̩ oli-uku-wñ.
Oñ ame̩, dagba me̩ te̩tachʼabo e̩ne̩ omune̩ akwoubi ku me̩ laño̩ chʼame̩nebi ef ibe-me̩ ef uko̩lo̩ bibi-me̩ le,
i fʼume̩ ño̩ru ef año̩la e-o̩re̩la-wñ lef uku fa-i me̩, kʼi che ku me̩ fo̩ ku me̩ we enʼe̩kpabie̩ o̩la, ki la we enʼugbo du ku ma do̩ me̩ ajo̩, kʼi mʼume̩ ko jo̩ o̩gba-wñ.

Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ jʼef e̩do̩-e̩ko̩no alo waa, kʼe̩re̩-me̩ dʼane̩, kʼofe-me̩ chemane̩, ku me̩ ma jʼachi wʼubi bʼibe e̩kono Uche̩nyo̩ ku me̩ gbo̩ le̩ te̩ n, owñ chʼe-ku ma fʼakoya-wñ ta ugbo du kʼO̩jo̩ nyi o̩gane̩ efojale, e-kʼomi, Po̩l, mud ache e̩wñ ñw one̩ ef uwñ.
Fa-i nayo̩ ef iwo̩ kʼu nali todu me̩, oñ nache kʼo̩bata Kraisti ki bo̩ ki jo̩ kpa ef o̩re̩la-mi todu año̩la-wñ, owñ chʼujeju abudo̩ Ondu,
e-kʼomi mud ache e̩wñ ñw u teju igede e-O̩jo̩ ku ma du ñwu mi kʼu nade todu me̩, kʼo̩lO̩jo̩ ki jo̩ kpa.
Owñ chʼafili ki te̩tamaja o̩kpanachi o̩kpanachi kpai o̩gba nʼo̩gba akwoubi le̩, ku ma muda dʼu tejugede ñw abo-wñ kiafo̩ fa-i me̩.
Oñ i dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ kʼi je̩ ñw abo le̩ ma e̩wñ ki chʼunana ojima afili-i ef abo uche̩ichi, kʼafili kʼa ka-i che Kraisti ef ume̩, kʼowñ chʼukibeno ojima le̩.
Uche̩-wñ oñ a aje̩ rʼamone̩, a adʼibe ñw e̩ne̩ du, a la nʼofili du ako̩ e̩ne̩ du todu kʼa ki kʼe̩ne̩ du jo̩ kʼi chʼo̩kone̩ efu Kraist.
Todu e-le̩ ge̩ oñ nafejugbiti achʼakanya teju alu kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi achʼuko̩lo̩ ef umi ef ukpahiu achʼuko̩lo̩-wñ.
Todu i dʼumi e̩do̩ ku me̩ ma alu kʼu nafejugbiti tabale todu me̩ kpai tod abo ku ma jo̩ Leode̩sia, kpai tod aluka one̩ du ku ma ma li eju-mi ef o̩re̩la ta n,
todu kʼe̩do̩-ma ki gbo̩, ku ma ki gamʼomune̩ ef ufe̩do̩, ku ma ki ño̩ tef e̩wñ unana du kʼi jʼef oji e̩wñ ema gbali, ku ma fʼafili O̩jo̩ ma o̩gbolo, owñ che Kraist,
e̩wñ akoko e-ibe kpai e̩wñ ema du maja jʼef uwñ.
U kʼe-le todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki we̩ e̩nʼo̩la ibe eka e̩te̩le̩ gba me̩ ibe tinyo̩,
todu dagba u ma dʼane̩ ef o̩re̩la n, u muda dʼugbo me̩, ef afu-mi ayo̩ abu kʼu nali alu ku me̩ tala jo̩ iko iko kpai alu kʼe̩do̩-ekono-me̩ chemane̩ efu Kraisti.
Todule̩ alu ku me̩ mu Kraist Jisus Ondu gba le̩, me̩ natale ef uwñ,
abu ku me̩ tʼili mʼane̩ ku ma la fʼume̩ ne ef uwñ kʼe̩re̩-me̩ la chelonyane̩ ef e̩do̩-ekono-me̩, alu ku ma ko̩ me̩ le̩, ugwa egwa-me̩ ki chʼololo.
Me̩ nago tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du do̩mo̩ kʼi ane̩ eju ene̩ kpai o̩gwo̩ ofofo, ki teju e̩wñ-o̩gu amone̩, lo̩na e̩wñ-uko̩che̩ ile̩-i, kʼi ma la lo̩na Kraist in ko me̩ chʼe̩wñ akpa.
Todu ukefu onugo O̩jo̩ du dodo ef uwñ ef año̩la,
ame̩ laño̩ che̩ko̩ ef uwñ kʼowñ le̩ chʼoji e̩wñ uto̩gba kpai o̩da du.
Ef uwñ le̩ ma laño̩ fʼume̩ e̩pi da ef año̩la e-o̩re̩la ekojane̩, ef e̩pi-eda e-Kraist; e-le̩ chʼe̩pi kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ ada de̩ n.
Ma fʼume̩ ji kpai owñ efu baptism; ma ño̩ du me̩ kwane̩ kpai owñ ef e-le̩ lef e̩do̩ ku me̩ konʼuko̩lo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ che kʼi du owñ kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku.
Oñ ame̩ ku me̩ leku te̩ ñw uñwanane̩-me̩ kpai e̩pi odukulu-me̩ e-o̩re̩la, i che ku me̩ bʼo̩ nʼiñmi i mʼuñwanane̩-wa chaka ko chʼuwa ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩.
I fʼorubutu kʼo̩wo̩ ko̩ chʼagwunyu wa le̩ kpalu, owñ chʼuko̩ kʼi te̩ ki kobʼuwa le̩; i la mʼe-le̩ du kwʼalumeji, i mʼu du kaba manyʼoli uku-wñ.
I mʼame̩nuto̩gba kpai abo̩da gwo̩ kwʼo̩la-wñ, oñ i mʼuma ko nye̩ña ejugede pee. I kwochiya ogu bʼuma ma ef oli uku-wñ.
Todule̩ e̩ne̩ du kʼi chakajo̩-me̩ ef e̩wñ ku me̩ je̩ abe̩k ef e̩wñ ku me̩ ñmo̩ abe̩k ef uje̩wñ uyo̩ abe̩k ugbo o̩la ochu ki ane̩ etito̩ abe̩k ugbo o̩la o̩jo̩ uñmi n.
E̩wñ kʼa ka-i du chʼojiji e̩wñ ki ache ki wa; onugo e̩wñ le̩ muda chʼe-Kraisti.

Me̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du nʼe̩wñ udʼe̩ e̩do̩ ef o̩la-ehiwane̩ kpai ucholo amonuche̩ eche ñwa me̩ go kʼi kpʼume̩ uloko ene̩ chi n. O̩la-wñ i adu tunyʼaye kʼi aye ofo le̩, ibe e-o̩re̩la-wñ aje̩ ñw u bukpatʼo̩la-wñ;
i la agwonyʼoji n, e-kʼi chʼe̩te̩ año̩la du, kʼi agbʼuje̩wñ lef iko kpai ili, kʼi fʼu gamʼomune̩ le̩, i nʼeyanyo̩gba e-O̩jo̩ aya nyo̩gba.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ bo̩ Kraisti ku kwo bʼe̩wñ uchane̩ uko̩che̩ ile̩-i te̩, e̩wñ chi ku me̩ dʼo̩la-me̩ tef o̩lowu dabe̩ne̩ ku me̩ deju jʼile̩-i?
Me̩ ki dʼo̩wo̩ kadʼo n, me̩ ki dʼu kadʼalu n, me̩ ki dʼu nʼo̩wo̩ n:
e̩wñ ku ma ka le̩ du do̩mo̩ ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ tak i ache̩ rinyo̩, teju o̩la-uko̩ kpai uko̩-o̩la e-amone̩?
E̩wñ le̩ du nʼuwohi dabe̩ne̩ ki akʼo̩la ibe ugbo one̩ egʼe̩dʼo̩la-wñ nʼo̩la-wñ ehiwane̩ kpai echʼo̩la-wñ o̩bata achʼucholo; i muda achʼeku du ugbo ewe eche e̩wñ kʼo̩re̩la achʼe̩ño̩-wñ n.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ ku ma mʼume̩ ko kwane̩ kpai Kraist, me̩ nafeju e̩wñ ki dʼate̩, ugbo ku Kraist kʼi gugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ O̩jo̩ de̩.
Ibe-me̩ ki kadʼe̩wñ ki dʼate̩, i ki kado e̩wñ oj ane̩-ile̩-i n.
Todu ame̩ leku, oñ iñmi-me̩ maja kpai Kraist ef O̩jo̩.
E̩gba du ku Kraist kʼi chʼiñmi-wa le̩ kwotejugede, e̩gbale̩ ame̩ ñʼateiugede kpai owñ ef ojima.
Todule̩ me̩ ki fʼe̩wñ año̩la-me̩ kʼi jʼoj ane̩-ile̩-i kpa ku; e̩wñ le̩ che e̩wñ abutabu, iwa, udo̩laga e̩wñ ki ma nyo̩ n, e̩ño̩ e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩, ejufufu, owñ chʼode eche;
lef e̩wñ le̩ oñ uwe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ awa bʼamo̩ma ku ma ko̩ egbo̩la gbo̩ oji ma.
Ame̩ tale ef e̩wñ le̩ e̩gbaʼka, owñ chʼe̩gba ku me̩ deju ef uwñ le̩.
Ama fa-i me̩ ki ño̩ kʼe̩wñ-i du rinyo̩ ge̩: owñ chʼuwe̩do̩, e̩do̩fulu, e̩bie̩ne̩ ali, echakpabie̩, kpʼo̩la-anyo̩ ki akwef alu-me̩.
Me̩ ki rʼomune̩ olemi n, abu ku me̩ mʼe̩ne̩ igbele le̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼi ache gwo̩-jane̩,
ku me̩ la mʼe̩ne̩ etito̩ e-ki achʼetito̩ alo waa tef e̩wñ ema ogbolo teju alu kʼe̩ne̩ ki nyʼi de̩ dutʼo̩la:
owñ chʼugbo ku Grik kpai Ju kpai e̩pi-eda kpai e̩pi-odukulu kpai e̩ne̩ ki aka o̩gudo̩gudo, kpai Ske̩tain, kpʼadu, kpʼo̩mone̩ ma ño̩ de̩ ge̩ n, chai Kraisti chʼo̩gbo̩dudu e̩wñ, i la dʼef e̩wñ du.
Todule̩, abu ku me̩ chʼabo kʼO̩jo̩ chi me̩, ku me̩ chʼabo kiafo, kʼi te̩tafe̩do̩ me̩, me̩ ki ko e̩do̩ ki ali one̩ eju kpai umo̩la kpai o̩la-ehiwane̩ kpai o̩chikimi kpai e̩do̩-eje̩ nyʼo̩la;
me̩ naje̩ kpai omune̩. Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ nʼe̩ro̩la kpʼe̩ne̩ du, me̩ ki chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai o̩la-me̩. Alu kʼOndu chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼame̩, ame̩ ki ño̩ che abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Ufe̩do̩ ki bʼe̩wñ le̩ du ma; e-le̩ akʼe̩wñ le̩ ji mʼomune̩ ki mufu kpa.
Ure̩do̩ Kraisti ki la dʼef e̩do̩-me̩ kʼi dʼale, ma fʼume̩ do̩ tef e-le̩ ef año̩laʼka; me̩ ki la mud abo ku ma gwugwa.
O̩la Kraisti ki nadodo ef ume̩ nana. Me̩ ki nʼofili du akʼo̩la-me̩ o̩la, me̩ ki dʼibe ñw o̩la-me̩; me̩ nanʼeli ku ma ko̩ do̩ O̩jo̩ kpai eli e̩wñ Afu ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ako̩ ef e̩do̩-me̩ ñw O̩jo̩.
Oñ e̩wñ du ku me̩ che, ef o̩la eka abe̩k ef uko̩lo̩ eche, e̩wñ du ki chʼef odu Ondu Jisusi, me̩ ki nagwʼO̩jo̩ Ata ugwa lef uwñ.
Amo̩ya, me̩ ki fʼo̩la-me̩ kamuhi te̩ ñw amo̩ko̩-me̩, alu ki chʼeju-wñ ef Ondu.
Amo̩ko̩ o̩ya, me̩ ki fe̩do̩ amo̩ya-me̩, me̩ ki la nʼulukoko e̩do̩ ñwu ma n.
Amo̩ma, me̩ ki gbo̩la abo ku ma bi me̩ alu du, todu e-le̩ arʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ nyo̩nyo̩ ef Ondu.
Amata, me̩ ki dʼalu tʼamo̩ma-me̩ o̩la n, tode̩gba kʼo̩la-ma arido̩do̩.
Amadu, me̩ ki gbo̩la abo ku ma chʼodu-me̩ lo̩na o̩re̩la alu du; me̩ ki chʼadu eju ofo, dabe̩ne̩ kʼone̩ me̩ nyo̩ eju n; me̩ ki muda che ef e̩do̩ foo, ailo Ondu ki naba me̩:
e̩wñ du ku me̩ che, me̩ nachuko̩lo̩ le̩ kpʼe̩do̩ʼka, dabe̩ne̩ kʼOndu me̩ che ñwu, kʼi ma chʼone̩ n;
abu ku me̩ chema kakini, Ugbo Ondu oñ ame̩ agba e̩wñ-ogu le̩ chʼakoji-wñ; Ondu Kraist ame̩ chʼadu ñwu.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki anʼe̩wñ uji ache, uji ki che adabiwa anʼo oji: e̩nejuma du la dʼo̩ n.
Amodu one̩, me̩ nache e-ki chʼo̩kpakpa kpai e-ki chʼeju-wñ ñw amadu-me̩; abu ku me̩ chema ka kʼame̩ ño̩ nʼOndu efojale ge̩.
Me̩ gwo̩nyʼadua-eche waa, me̩ gwe̩ke̩ ef uwñ ef ugwa egwa.
Me̩ ki chadua todu wa manyu, todu kʼO̩jo̩ kʼi bi o̩na O̩la-wñ ñw a, kʼa dʼo̩la afili Kraist ka, lef e-le̩ oñ ma fʼumi ji-i;
todu kʼu mʼu dutejugede alu ki dukpe̩ kʼomi aka.
Me̩ tale ibe ibe ugbo abo ku ma jʼo̩do̩da, me̩ fʼiko-i la te̩.
Uko̩la-me̩ ki chʼef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e̩gba du, omu ki chʼeburʼu, ku me̩ ma alu ki dukpe̩ ku me̩ dʼohi ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ okoke.
