Taikikus, o̩maye-ufe̩do̩, kʼi ache e̩wñ ñw one̩, kʼi ñʼachʼubi odu-wñ, kʼowñ kpʼomi chʼadu ef Ondu, aje̩ ñwu me̩ ma alu kʼe̩wñ du de̩ ugbo mi.
Nakpʼo̩ nyʼugbo me̩-i tod e-le̩ gbage̩de̩, todu kʼame̩ ki ma alu kʼe̩wñ-wa de̩, kʼi ño̩ dʼume̩ e̩do̩ kwane̩.
One̩simus, kʼi chʼo̩maye kʼi achubi one̩ kpai e-ufe̩do̩, kʼi ño̩ chʼe̩ne̩-me̩ʼka, manyʼu o̩la. Ama le̩ aje̩ ñwu me̩ ma e̩wñ emi chaka.
Aristarkus, kʼogu ño̩ je̩ manyu mi, ñʼagwa me̩ ge̩, kpai Mark, okekele̩ Barnabas, (ame̩ gba uko̩-wñ kʼu te̩ me̩; i wʼugbo me̩ le̩ me̩ yo̩ ñw u)
kpai Jisus ku ma dʼodu ko̩ Justus; ama jʼef abo e̩pi-e̩da; abo-i kate chʼamabʼumi chuko̩lo̩ tod ojane̩ e-O̩jo̩, ama chʼabo ku ma je̩ ñw e̩do̩-mi bo̩ lii.
Ipafras, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩-me̩ kʼi chʼadu Kraist Jisus kʼi afejugbiti todu me̩ e̩gba du ef adua-wñ, todu kʼame̩ ki mufu dago kʼe̩wñ du ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ ki jo̩ kpa o̩la-me̩, agwa me̩.
Todu nagba owñ ibenu kakini, I nʼakanya nana ache todu me̩ kpai todu abo ku ma jo̩ Leode̩sia kpai todu abo ku ma jo̩ Hairo̩po̩lis ge̩.
Luku, obochi ku ma fe̩do̩ le̩, kpai Dimas agwa me̩.
Me̩ gwa amo̩maye ku ma jo̩ Leode̩sia kpai Nimfo̩s kpai ujeju abudo̩ Ondu ki dʼef unyi-wñ.
E̩gba du ku ma la fʼo̩kalatu o̩takada-i che ñwu me̩ kpa, me̩ che ku ma ño̩ fʼo̩kalatu-wñ che ef ujeju Leode̩sia ge̩; todu kʼame̩ ki ño̩ chʼo̩kalatu e-kʼi kwo Leode̩sia ge̩.
Taku me̩ ka ñwu Arkipas kakini, E̩ nago e̩wñ eche ñw one̩ kʼe̩ mugba ef Ondu le̩, todu kʼe̩ che nyane̩.
Ugwa e-mi Po̩l kpai o̩wo̩ e-mi de̩. Me̩ nadibekado eji ku ma ji mi-i. Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki dʼugbo me̩.
Po̩l kpai Silfano̩s kpai Timoti tʼugbo ujeju abudo̩ Ondu e-Te̩se̩lonaika ef O̩jo̩ Ata kpai Ondu Jisus Kraisti: ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ure̩do̩ ki dʼugbo me̩.
A gwa O̩jo̩ e̩gba du tod ume̩ chaka, a achʼurewa-me̩ ef adua-wa.
A kpeke chʼurewa uko̩lo̩-me̩ e-e̩do̩ ekono kpai akanya e-ufe̩do̩ ku me̩ che kpai alu ku me̩ fʼe̩do̩ lichi akibenʼOndu-wa Jisus Kraisti eju O̩jo̩-wa kpa; Ata-wa n.
Amo̩maye, ame̩ kʼO̩jo̩ te̩tafe̩do̩, abu kʼa chema echi kʼi chi me̩,
todabu kʼUche̩nyo̩-wa ma wate̩ ñwu me̩ ef o̩la eka kate n, kʼi muda ño̩ wa ef ukpahiu kpai ef Afu Kiafo̩ kpai ef o̩gbali e̩do̩ nana, abu ku me̩ chema alu kʼa de̩ ef ume̩ todu me̩.
Tak ame̩ mud abo ku ma wʼuwa kpai Ondu che ku me̩ yo̩ ñw o̩la le̩ oñ me̩ gba ef o̩bata nana manyʼuyo̩ e-Afu Kiafo̩.
Todabe̩le̩ ame̩ mud e̩wñ kʼabo Masidonia kpai Akaya awo̩li-wñ.
Todu ugbo me̩ oñ ekuku o̩la Ondu kwo dufu, i chʼoj ane̩ Masidonia kpai Akaya kate n, inabali e̩do̩ ku me̩ konʼO̩jo̩ ño̩ mukpatuka rʼugbo tʼugbo du. Todabe̩le̩ eku-wñ aku wa kʼa ki ka e̩wñ du n.
Todu ama onugo dʼo̩la-wa ka e̩go̩ alu kʼegudu kʼa gudu wʼugbo me̩ de̩, kpai alu ku me̩ rida tʼugbo O̩jo̩ bʼode te̩ ku me̩ chʼadu ñw O̩jo̩ kʼi deju kpʼe-ogbolo;
ku me̩ la gugu anode O̩ma-wñ kʼi akwʼefojale wa, owñ chʼe-kʼi dʼu kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, owñ che Jisus kʼi agba wa bʼuwe̩do̩ ki awa te̩.
Todu, amo̩maye, ame̩ onugo chema egudu kʼa gudu wʼugbo me̩ le̩ ka kʼi chʼofofo n.
Ama abu kʼa fʼuwa li tane̩ ku ma laño̩ fʼuwa bina kpa Filipai alu ku me̩ chema le̩, a nʼeju egbo ef O̩jo̩-wa kʼa fejugbiti nana ako̩la Uche̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ ñwu me̩.
Todu, ugbe̩do̩ kʼa du ñwu me̩ kwef ila n, i la kwef iwa n, i la chʼo̩gwo̩ i che n.
I muda dabalu kʼO̩jo̩ fʼuwa ñwago kʼa nyo̩ ku ma ke̩do̩no wa ku ma dʼUche̩nyo̩ tef o̩wo̩-wa, abe̩le̩ a ako̩la; a ache dabe̩ne̩ kʼa nyʼamone̩ eju n, chai O̩jo̩ kʼi añwʼe̩do̩-wa go.
Todu a ko̩la urinyo̩ o̩fa mama ta n, ame̩ chema e-le̩. A la nʼakpaine̩ chʼejufufu e̩wñ n, O̩jo̩ chʼe̩nibenu.
A la tene ojima ugbo amone̩ n, i chaka chʼugbo me̩, i chaka chʼugbo abo omune̩, abu kʼa ma neke woji nʼume̩ ukpe̩ kʼa chʼame̩nukpuche̩ Kraisti.
A muda de̩ yo̩o̩ alumeji-me̩, dabe̩ne̩ kʼa chʼonobule̩ kʼi anʼe̩ma kʼi adejutʼo̩ma-wñ onugo.
Abe̩le̩ abu ku me̩ che̩mu wa e̩do̩ tabale i rʼuwa e̩do̩ kʼa dʼUche̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ kate ñwu me̩ n, chai onugo e-wa manyʼu ge̩, todabu ku me̩ mud ame̩nufe̩do̩-wa.
Todu ame̩ rewa akanya-wa kpʼo̩bata uko̩lo̩-wa, amo̩maye, abu kʼa chʼuko̩lo̩ odu kpʼo̩ro̩ka kʼa we edʼadu nʼe̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ oji, oñ a fʼakoya Uche̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ ta ñwu me̩.
Ame̩ chʼame̩nibenu kpʼO̩jo̩, alu kʼa de̩ ugbo ame̩ ku me̩ ke̩do̩no, alu kʼa chʼefe̩, kʼa chʼo̩kpakpa, kʼa ma nʼuchalu n.
Ame̩ ño̩ chema alu kʼa che kpʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ okoke alu kʼata ache kpʼamo̩ma-wñ onugo, kʼa dʼugbe̩do̩ ñwu me̩, a la nyʼume̩ e̩do̩, oñ a gbibenu,
todu kʼame̩ ki tale nyo̩nyo̩ bʼO̩jo̩ kʼi ado̩ me̩ tʼojane̩-wñ kpʼojima-wñ jo̩.

Oñ lef e-le̩ a ño̩ gwʼO̩jo̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, ka kʼabu ku me̩ mʼo̩lO̩jo̩ ku me̩ gbo̩ ugbo wa le̩ gba, me̩ yo̩ ñw u dabe̩ne̩ kʼi chʼo̩la amone̩ n, chai alu ki de̩ ochochi, kʼi chʼo̩lO̩jo̩, kʼi laño̩ dʼef ame̩ ku me̩ ke̩do̩no achʼuko̩lo̩-wñ.
Todu, amo̩maye, ame̩ mud abu ku ma wʼujeju ujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩ ku ma jo̩ Judia efu Kraisti Jisus che, todabu kʼame̩ ño̩ li uwa ugbo abo ichi-me̩ onugo alu kʼama le̩ li ugbo amaJu,
ku ma fʼOndu Jisus kpai amakache̩ kpa ku ma ño̩ fʼuwa ne dufu; ma la nyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju n, ma laño̩ chʼe̩nuja amone̩ du.
Ma jʼagbʼo̩na nyʼuwa kʼa we o̩la ki ajadu abo uche̩ichi eka ñw uma; todu ku ma gbʼadure-ma nyʼu e̩gba du ki jo̩ kpa. Uwe̩do̩ le̩ muda lewa bʼuma ma tʼukpoji me̩.
Ama, amo̩maye, abu kʼa chedaru bʼume̩ te̩ iko re-i, e-eju ede i che, i chʼe-e̩do̩ n, a chʼe̩do̩chacha ololo tule todu kʼa li eju-me̩, e̩ño̩-wñ che wa nana.
Todule̩ oñ i dʼuwa e̩do̩ kʼa wʼugbo me̩ onu meji ñw e̩ta, owñ chʼomi Po̩l, Setan muda kpʼo̩na nyʼuwa.
Todu e̩wñ chʼukibeno-wa kpai uyo̩-wa kpai uloko kʼa dʼu buba o̩gba Ondu-wa Jisus ef ewa-wñ? I chʼame̩ n?
Todu ame̩ chʼojima-wa kpai uyo̩-wa.
Todule̩ abu kʼa ma neke ño̩ gba nyʼe̩do̩ ge̩ n, i rʼuwa e̩do̩ ku ma tʼuwa kate no̩ jʼAte̩ns,
oñ a fu Timoti, o̩maye-wa kpʼe̩ne̩ kʼawa kpʼowñ achʼuko̩lo̩ O̩jo̩ ef Uche̩nyo̩ Kraisti, kpe̩ wa kʼi fʼume̩ e̩re̩ lonyane̩, kʼi laño̩ dʼugbe̩do̩ ñwu me̩ ef e̩do̩ ekono-me̩,
kʼo̩bata-i ki we emi e̩ne̩ du ejo. Todu ame̩ onugo chema ka kʼe-le̩ ma ko wa jo̩ ñw u.
Todu e̩gba kʼa jʼugbo me̩ le̩ a ka ñwu me̩ tane̩ ka kʼama ache ku ma che wa o̩bata me̩, alu kʼi wache kʼame̩ la ma le̩.
Lef e-le̩ abu kʼomi ma neke ño̩ gba nyʼe̩do̩ ge̩ n, u fʼone̩ kpe̩ wa kʼu ma e̩do̩ e̩kono-me̩, tode̩gba kʼajone̩ma le̩ ma fʼume̩ jama tak akanya uko̩lo̩-wa ma mud ofofo.
Ama fa-i abu ku Timoti kwʼugbo me̩ wʼugbo wa-i, kʼi la fʼuche̩nyo̩ e-e̩do̩ ekono kpʼufe̩do̩-me̩ kpʼalu ku me̩ nʼurewa-wa ki nyo̩ ache e̩gba du, ku me̩ la ñeju eli wa alu kʼa ñeju e-me̩, je̩ rʼuwa,
lef e-le̩ amo̩maye, a nʼugbe̩do̩ lef e̩do̩ ekono e-me̩ ugbo o̩pe̩cha kpʼo̩bata-wa chaka.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe̩re̩-me̩ mane̩ ef Ondu dee, mak a deju fai me̩.
Todu ugwa e̩wñ oñ a neke dabi du ñw O̩jo̩ todu me̩ noji uyo̩ du kʼa ayo̩ lef ume̩ eju O̩jo̩-wa?
Odu kpʼo̩ro̩ka a abiebi ololo ololo todu kʼa li eju-me̩, kʼa fʼe̩wñ ki nyaru ef e̩do̩ ekono-me̩ hiu tʼeju-wñ.
Oñ O̩jo̩ onugo kpʼAta-wa kpʼOndu-wa Jisus ki che kʼo̩na-wa ki te̩ tʼugbo me̩ kpaala.
Ondu ki la che kʼufe̩do̩-me̩ ki chʼololo ki kpo̩rʼane̩ ñw omune̩ kpai e̩ne̩ du, alu kʼa ño̩ che kpʼame̩ ge̩,
todu kʼi fʼe̩do̩-me̩ lonyane̩ kʼe̩fo̩-wñ ki we enʼuchalu eju O̩jo̩ kpʼAta-wa ef ewa Ondu-wa Jisus manyʼabo-wñ kiafo̩ chaka.

Todule̩, amo̩maye, i chʼe-e̩wñ kibo̩, a bi me̩, a laño̩ dʼugbe̩do̩ ñwu me̩ ef Ondu Jisus, todu kʼalu ku me̩ gba abʼi dukpe̩ ku me̩ atale ku me̩ nyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju ugbo wa le̩, owñ chʼalu ku me̩ tale le̩, todu kʼame̩ ki che tule ololo.
Todu ame̩ chema e̩wñ kʼa ñwa ñwu me̩ lef Ondu Jisus.
Todu e̩wñ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ de̩, owñ che kʼame̩ ki nafo̩, ku me̩ fʼo̩wo̩ mʼo̩la ne̩ bʼe̩wñ abutabu eche te̩,
kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki ma alu kʼi ane̩ o̩ya e-wñ onugo ef efo̩ kpʼojima,
i ki we echʼef udo̩laga e-e̩ño̩ e̩wñ eche alu kʼabo uche̩ichi ku ma ma mʼO̩jo̩ n ache le̩,
kʼe̩ne̩ du ki we edaba kʼi chʼo̩maye-wñ uji ef e̩wñ-i, todabu kʼOndu chʼanache̩ ugbo e̩wñ-i chaka, alu kʼa ka ñwu me̩ tane̩ le̩, kʼa laño̩ gbibenu-wñ nyo̩nyo̩.
Todu O̩jo̩ do̩ wa tod iwa n, chai ef efo̩.
Todu e-le̩, e̩ne̩ kʼi adʼo̩la-i rʼibe̩te̩, i chʼone̩ i dʼo̩ rʼibe̩te̩ n, chai O̩jo̩ kʼi adʼAfu-wñ Kiafo̩ ñwu me̩ oñ i dʼo̩ rʼibe̩te̩ le̩.
I la chʼeche̩do̩ o̩maye, eku-wñ aku me̩ kʼu nakʼo̩takada-wñ ru me̩ n, todu O̩jo̩ kʼame̩ onugo ku me̩ fe̩do̩ omune̩.
Todu abe̩le̩ oñ me̩ ache ñw amo̩maye chaka ugbo du ane̩ Masidonia. A muda dʼugbe̩do̩ ñwu me̩, amo̩maye, ku me̩ che tule ololo,
egu chi ki chʼojima ku me̩ che̩do̩-wñ le̩; ku me̩ najʼef e̩wñ e-me̩ onugo ache, ku me̩ ki la nʼo̩wo̩-me̩ chʼuko̩lo̩, alu kʼa ñwa ñwu me̩ le̩;
todu kʼame̩ ki tale e̩te̩le̩ eju abo o̩do̩da, kʼeku e̩wñ du ki ku me̩ n.
I la dʼuwa e̩do̩, amo̩maye, ku me̩ chʼugbodu ugbo o̩la abo ku ma mʼolu du n, tode̩gba ku me̩ chʼe̩do̩dudu dab abo ki bo̩ ku ma ma nʼukibeno n.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼa ke̩do̩no ka ku Jisus leku, kʼi laño̩ kwane̩, abe̩le̩ ge̩ O̩jo̩ ñʼakʼabo ku ma mʼolu du lefu Jisus wa manyʼowñ.
Todu a akʼe-i ñwu me̩ ef o̩la Ondu kakini, Awa kʼa chʼabo ki deju kʼa abo̩bo̩ nyʼe̩gba ewa Ondu, i nʼugbo du kʼa dʼabo ki mʼolu du o̩gba n.
Todu Ondu onugo agwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa kpai udo̩ e-o̩da kpai omuko̩la agboji amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ kpai o̩kakachi O̩jo̩, tak abo ki ku efu Kraisti adabi kwane̩ ejodudu,
ubi le̩ tak ama akʼawa kʼa deju kʼa bo̩ dinya ef akpa manyu ma kʼa de kpʼOndu ef afu-i; abe̩le̩ a la ajo̩ kpʼOndu e̩gba du.
Todule̩ me̩ nanʼo̩la-i adʼugbe̩do̩ ñw omune̩.
I la chʼe-iko e̩wñ kpai ewo e̩wñ, amo̩maye, eku-wñ aku me̩ ku ma ko̩takada-wñ rʼume̩ n;
todu ame̩ onugo chema o̩bie̩ o̩bie̩ kakini, Alu kʼoji awa odu abe̩le̩ o̩jo̩ Ondu awa.
E̩gba ku ma jʼakakini, Ure̩do̩, ane̩ bo̩ du me̩; e̩gba le̩ achigili ukpabie̩ awa bʼuma ma alu kʼefu amu onobule̩ kʼi defu, i la anʼugbo du ku ma afo̩wo̩ tane̩ n.
I muda chʼame̩, amo̩maye, me̩ jʼef e̩chubi tak o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i ki mu me̩ dab oji n.
Todu o̩chaka-me̩ chʼamo̩ma ugane̩ kpʼamo̩ma o̩ro̩ka. A chʼabo odu kpʼabo e̩chubi n.
Todule̩ a ki we olu ele̩ alu kʼabo kibo̩ ale̩ le̩; a ki muda gwe̩ke̩ adide, eju-wa ki chene̩.
Todu abo ku ma alolu, odu ma ale̩, abo kʼo̩te̩ mu ma, odu oñ i amu ma.
Ama abu kʼa chʼabo o̩ro̩ka eju-wa ki chene̩, kʼa kʼe̩wñ ube̩do̩ma e-e̩do̩ ekono kpʼufe̩do̩ nyʼo̩la, ukata ebije-wa kʼi chʼukibeno e-ujadu.
Todu O̩jo̩ ko wa jo̩ ñw uwe̩do̩ n, chai todu kʼa ki che kʼujadu ki mud e-wa ogbolo lef Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti,
kʼi leku todu wa, todu ki dagba kʼa gwe̩ke̩ adide, dagba a lolu kʼa ki bʼowñ deju.
Lef e-le̩ me̩ ki dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw omune̩, ku me̩ ne omune̩ nyo̩gba, alu ku me̩ jʼache le̩.
Oñ a bi me̩, amo̩maye, me̩ ki fʼabo ku ma jʼachʼakanya ef ume̩ ku ma la tʼo̩gba ñwu me̩ ef Ondu, ku ma la ako̩ me̩ ibe ma.
Ama le̩ ki wʼume̩ eju nana tabale ef ufe̩do̩ todu uko̩lo̩-ma. Ure̩do̩ ki dʼagbagba-me̩.
A la dʼugbe̩do̩ ñwu me̩, amo̩maye, me̩ ki ko̩ abo ku ma chʼo̩kpo̩ ibe, me̩ nanyʼabo kʼe̩do̩-ma kpabie̩ e̩do̩, gwo̩nyʼame̩ne̩gbo dago, me̩ je̩do̩ ugbo e̩ne̩ du.
Me̩ nago tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ʼka adabi dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ koji e̩bie̩ne̩ ñw one̩. Me̩ muda nabʼe̩nyo̩ kpe̩re̩ kpʼomune̩, kpʼe̩ne̩ du ge̩, e̩gba du.
Me̩ nayo̩ e̩gba du.
Me̩ ki chadua o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
Me̩ fʼugwa-wñ gwa ef e̩wñ du, todu e̩wñ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ efu Kraisti Jisus ñwu me̩ le̩ de̩.
Me̩ ki kpʼAfu lu n.
Me̩ ki chʼe̩de̩te̩ ache̩ eka n.
Me̩ ki ñwa e̩wñ du go, ku me̩ mʼe-o̩me̩me̩le̩ ne̩ gaga.
Me̩ nahimama e̩wñ bibi alu du kʼi chaka de̩ eju.
Oñ O̩jo̩ e-ure̩do̩ onugo ki che ku me̩ fo̩ ogbolo, kʼo̩gbo̩-me̩ du, tʼafu, tʼonugo, tʼaño̩la kʼi do̩mo̩ kʼi we enʼuchalu ef ewa Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti.
E̩ne̩ kʼi ado̩ me̩ chʼachubi one̩, i la ñʼache.
Amo̩maye, me̩ ki chadua todu wa.
Me̩ ki nʼalu ekalu kiafo̩ fʼamo̩maye chaka gwa.
Ondu nago̩ nʼume̩ ku me̩ fʼo̩kalatu o̩takada-i che ñw amo̩maye kiafo̩ chaka.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti ki dʼugbo me̩.
Po̩l kpai Silfano̩s kpai Timoti tʼugbo ujeju abudo̩ Ondu, Te̩se̩lonaika, ef O̩jo̩ Ata-wa kpʼOndu Jisus Kraisti:
ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼure̩do̩ ki dʼugbo me̩ kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ Ata kpʼOndu Jisus Kraisti.
I dʼuwa o̩la kʼa gwʼO̩jo̩ e̩gba du todu me̩, amo̩maye, alu ki chʼeju-wñ todabu kʼe̩do̩ ekono-me̩ aya tabale, kʼufe̩do̩ kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ okoke du ne̩ fe̩do̩ omune̩ nanyo̩gba alo waa.
Todabe̩le̩ a dʼume̩ nʼoji ago ef ujeju ujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩, todu e̩do̩ elichi kpʼe̩do̩ ekono-me̩ ef edoli ku ma doli me̩ du kpʼef o̩bata ku me̩ je̩do̩ ef uwñ le̩.
E-le̩ chʼujiwe ajo̩ o̩kpakpa e-O̩jo̩; todu kʼama ki lo ka kʼame̩ nyo̩ bʼojane̩ O̩jo̩ ku me̩ jʼali uwa todu-wñ le̩ jo̩:
abu kʼi chʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa ugbo O̩jo̩ kʼi dʼo̩bata rʼo̩me̩ ñw abo ku ma dʼo̩bata ñwu me̩,
kʼi taño̩ dʼuñmi ñw ame̩, ku ma dʼo̩bata ñwu me̩ le̩, manyʼawa ef ebite̩ ku ma abi Ondu Jisus te̩ kwʼefojale, manyʼamonuche̩-wñ e-ukpahiu, ef una ki ado̩go̩.
I adʼache̩ ena wa abʼabo ku ma ma mʼO̩jo̩ n kpai abo ku ma ma la gbʼo̩la Uche̩nyo̩ Ondu-wa Jisus gbo̩ n oji ma.
Abole̩ achʼudu-wñ, owñ chʼekpabie̩ bʼeju Ondu kpʼebʼugbo ojima e-ugbiti-wñ te̩ ogbegbele̩,
e̩gba du kʼi lewa ku ma bʼojima mʼo̩ ef abo-wñ kiafo̩, ku ma laño̩ yaye-wñ ef abo du ku ma ke̩do̩no, o̩jo̩ e-le̩ (todabu ku me̩ dʼibenu kʼa gba ugbo me̩ le̩ rʼochochi).
Tod e-le̩ a ño̩ chadua todu me̩ e̩gba du, todu kʼO̩jo̩-wa ki je̩ ñwu me̩ nyo̩ bʼudo̩ ku ma do̩ me̩ jo̩, kʼi laño̩ che e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ du ki rʼe̩ e̩do̩ kpa, kpʼuko̩lo̩ e̩do̩ ekono du ef ukpahiu;
todu kʼama ki bʼojima mʼodu Ondu-wa Jisus ef ume̩, kpʼame̩ ef owñ ge̩, teju ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩-wa kpʼOndu Jisus Kraisti.
Oñ o̩ko̩ a gba bʼume̩-i, amo̩maye, tod ewa Ondu Jisus Kraisti, kpʼewa kʼawa onugo awajo̩ ugbo-wñ le̩;

todu kʼame̩ ki we eje̩ ñw ibe-me̩ ki hika kpatuka, me̩ ki la dutu n, dagba o̩la lef afu wa, dagba i lef alu one̩ wa, dagba i lef o̩takada dabe̩ne̩ kʼi kwʼugbo wa wa, dabe̩ne̩ kakini, Iko o̩jo̩ e-Ondu de̩ ke.
Me̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du kʼi mʼume̩ ibe da alu du kʼi chaka che n, todu chai e̩gba kʼefʼe̩re̩ ubi ro̩ le̩ lewa ejodudu, ku ma la ño̩ mʼe̩nugbite̩re̩ bite̩, owñ chʼo̩ma ulenyo̩,
kʼi ako̩bo̩ kʼi lañʼahi o̩la-wñ ne achagwu-nyʼe̩wñ du kʼi kʼodu O̩JO̩, abe̩k e-ku ma akpe̩do̩ru. Todabe̩le̩ i gugu ef unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu, oñ i adʼo̩la-wñ ñe̩ña ka kʼowñ chʼO̩jo̩.
Ame̩ rewa ka kʼe̩gba kʼu dʼugbo me̩ le̩, u kʼe-le̩ ñwu me̩ n?
Oñ fai ame̩ chema e̩wñ kʼi amʼu ne̩ mane̩ gaga le̩, todu ku ma ki dʼowñ bite̩ iko e-wñ.
Todu afili e-ugbite̩re̩ chane̩ echuko̩lo̩ me̩; e̩ne̩ kʼi amʼu ne̩ mane̩ le̩ muda do̩mo̩ abajo̩-i, gbogbo tak i kwo bʼalumeji te̩.
Tak e̩gba le̩ ma abi e̩nugbite̩re̩ le̩ te̩, e-kʼOndu Jisus anʼafu alu-wñ lie̩ mane̩, kʼi ñʼanʼetejugede ewa-wñ fʼu gbogili te̩;
owñ le̩ kʼewa e-wñ teju uko̩lo̩ ku Setan ache ef ukpahiu kpʼujiwe kpʼuno̩ olemi ojoji du,
manyʼe̩wñ du kʼuji adu mʼone̩ ibe da tod abo ku ma alenyo̩, ukpe̩ ku ma ma gba ufe̩do̩ kʼi aje̩ ñwu ma fe̩do̩ ochochi todu kʼi jadu ma n.
Oñ todu e-le̩ O̩jo̩ akpe̩ ukpahiu e̩wñ ila eche rʼuma, todu ku ma ki ke̩do̩nʼolemi;
todu ku ma ki kpa o̩chaka abo ku ma ma ke̩do̩nʼochochi n, kʼuji muda rʼuma e̩do̩ abi.
I muda dʼuwa o̩la kʼa gwʼO̩jo̩ todu me̩ e̩gba du, amo̩maye kʼOndu te̩tafe̩do̩ me̩ le̩; todabu kʼO̩jo̩ chi me̩ kwʼabakwane̩ ku me̩ tef ujadu ef efo̩ e-Afu kpʼe̩do̩ ekono e-ochochi.
Owñ chʼe-kʼi do̩ me̩ tʼef uwñ lef Uche̩nyo̩-wa, todu ku me̩ ki fʼojima Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti ne̩ ñw o̩la-me̩.
Todule̩, amo̩maye, me̩ dago waa, me̩ ki la gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ o̩gu kʼa ko̩ me̩ le̩, dagba i lʼef o̩la eka, dagba i lʼef o̩takada wa.
Oñ Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti onugo kpʼO̩jo̩ Ata-wa kʼi fe̩do̩ wa kʼi laño̩ mʼugbe̩do̩ e-ogbegbele̩ kpʼe̩wñ o̩me̩-me̩le̩ kʼa akibeno ko ñw a ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩,
owñ le̩ ki nadʼe̩do̩ e̩gbo ñwu me̩ kʼi laño̩ hi ume̩ e̩re̩ nyane̩ ef uko̩lo̩ ki nyo̩ du kpʼef o̩la ki nyo̩ du.
E-ki bo̩ de̩, amo̩maye, me̩ ki chadua todu wa, todu kʼo̩la Ondu ki fule, kʼi fʼojima ne̩, alu kʼi ño̩ de̩ ugbo me̩ ge̩;
todu ku ma ki gba wa bʼame̩nebita kpʼame̩ne̩bibi o̩wo̩ te̩. Todu i chʼo̩chaka amone̩ nʼe̩do̩ ekono n.
Ondu muda chʼachubi one̩, owñ le̩ ahi ume̩ e̩re̩ nyane̩, i lañʼade me̩ bʼe̩ne̩bibi le̩ o̩wo̩ te̩.
E̩do̩-wa mugba ef Ondu ugbo e-me̩, ka kʼe̩wñ kʼa ñwa ñwu me̩ le̩, me̩ jʼo̩mo̩ ache, me̩ ñʼache alo waa ge̩.
Oñ Ondu ki naña e̩do̩-me̩ o̩na tef ufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ kpai tef e̩do̩ elichi e-Kraisti ogbolo.
A la añwa ñwu me̩-i ef odu Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti, amo̩maye, me̩ te̩ubi bʼo̩maye du kʼi tale alala te̩, kʼi ma likpa e̩wñ o̩gu ku me̩ gba ugbo wa le̩ n.
Todu ame̩ onugo chema alu ki dukpe̩ ku me̩ wʼuwa che; todabu kʼawa ma tʼachʼalala ef ume̩ le̩ n.
A la je̩ uje̩wñ ele ofo ugbo e̩ne̩ du n; chai akanya kpʼo̩pe̩cha ki wo̩ wa oñ a che odu kpʼo̩ro̩ka kʼa we echʼadu ki anʼe̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ oji.
I cheka kʼa nʼo̩da-wñ ni n, ama todu kʼawa ki kʼo̩la-wa chʼe̩wñ uwo̩li ñwu me̩ ku me̩ wʼuwa che.
Todu i chaka chʼe̩gba kʼa jʼugbo me̩ le̩, a fʼe-i ñwa ñwu me̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ ki ma dʼone̩ e̩do̩ ki chuko̩lo̩ n, mak i ki we eje̩ e̩wñ.
Todu a gbʼinabali abo iche̩ka ef ume̩ ku ma tale alala, ma chuko̩lo̩ du n, chai amagwoji ma che.
Oñ a añwa ñw abo e̩gʼe-le̩, a lañʼadugbe̩do̩ ñwu ma ef Ondu Jisus Kraisti, todu kʼama ki gugu chii achuko̩lo̩ ku ma nʼuje̩wñ e-ma o̩toto̩la-ma ku ma je̩.
I muda chʼame̩, amo̩maye, e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ eche ki hia me̩ n.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma gbʼo̩la-wa kʼi dʼef o̩takada-i gbo n, me̩ fʼeju kʼo̩ hi, todu ku me̩ ki we̩ edʼu cho̩la, todu kʼi fejutunyane̩.
I ki muda dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩nebi eju-me̩ n, me̩ ki muda kʼo̩ ibe dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩maye.
Oñ Ondu ure̩do̩ onugo ki dʼure̩do̩ ñwu me̩ e̩gba du lʼo̩na tʼo̩na du. Ondu ki dʼugbo me̩ chaka.
Ugwa e-mi Po̩l, kʼo̩wo̩-mi onugo ko̩ de̩. E-le̩ chʼujiwe-mi ef o̩takada du, abe̩le̩ nako̩.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti ki dʼugbo me̩ chaka.
Po̩l, kʼi chʼe̩nukpuche̩ Kraisti Jisus alu kʼO̩jo̩ E̩najadu-wa kpai Kraisti Jisus ukibeno-wa ñwate̩,
tʼugbo Timoti, o̩ma-mi o̩gbo̩lo̩ ef e̩do̩ ekono:
Alu kʼu dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw e̩ kʼe̩ guane̩ E̩fe̩sus, abu kʼu tʼo̩na anyi Masidonia le̩, todu kʼe̩ hi abo iche̩ka le̩ owu ku ma we o̩la omune̩ ojoji ekʼone̩,
ku ma laño̩ we enyʼalo̩ ofo ku ma lo̩ kpʼo̩la o̩gba o̩gba jeele ki ma nʼuda n le̩ eti; abʼe-le̩ anyi ili o̩la e̩gwa ofo wa tʼigede e̩wñ O̩jo̩ ede ef e̩do̩ ekono le.
Ukpoji owu kʼu hi le̩ muda chʼufe̩do̩ ki kwʼef e̩do̩ ki fe̩, kpʼakone̩ o̩la ef e̩do̩ ki ma li e̩wñ kʼi adʼu gwunyʼuwe̩ n kpʼe̩do̩ ekono ki ma nʼakoru n.
Abu kʼabo iche̩ka ju lʼo̩wo̩ʼka, ma muna tef o̩la o̩wai eka.
I dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma mud amakʼone̩ o̩lo̩da; ma moji e̩wñ ku ma ka n, ma la moji o̩la ku ma gwo̩nyu kpaka kpaka le̩ n.
A muda ma kakini, O̩lo̩da le̩ chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ iche̩wñ kʼone̩ dʼu che e̩wñ teju o̩lo̩da;

abu kʼa fʼu ma kakini, Ma dʼo̩lo̩da te̩ tod e̩no̩kpakpa n, chai tod ame̩nugbite̩re̩ kpʼame̩nugbolu kpʼabo ku ma ko̩ ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ kpʼame̩nadure kpʼabo kʼo̩la-ma ma fe̩ n kpʼabo ku ma ma dinye̩rʼe̩wñ n kpʼabo ku ma kpa amata-ma kpʼabo ku ma kpa amiye-ma kpʼamakpone̩ ofo
kpʼame̩nabutabu kpʼaboke̩le̩ ku ma bʼaboke̩le̩ dachi kpʼabo ku ma mʼone̩ taje̩ kpʼamaremi kpʼabo ku ma ge̩bo̩ olemi kpʼe̩wñ du ki bo̩ kʼi akobʼuko̩-o̩la o̩lafia
ki alʼikpa Uche̩nyo̩ ojima O̩jo̩ kʼi nʼele, e-ku ma ke̩do̩no mi ku ma dʼu nyʼumi o̩wo̩ le̩.
Egwa nagwa e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼukpahiu ñwu mi, owñ che Kraisti Jisus, Ondu-wa, todabu kʼeju-wñ omi mud e̩ne̩ ki achubi owñ oñ i mʼumi du tef e̩wñ eche ñw u;
dagba u chaka chʼe̩nachakpabie̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ ki adoli kpʼe̩nalachi; ma muda li mi ejumomi todabu kʼu ma ma n, uche e̩gbakʼu ma ke̩do̩no ta n;
oñ ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu-wa ño̩ nana tabale manyu e̩do̩ ekono kpai ufe̩do̩ e-ki dʼefu Kraisti Jisus.
O̩la ku ma ke̩do̩no i che, i la nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ kʼe̩he̩ du ki gba kakini, Kraisti Jisus lewʼef ile̩-i kʼi jadu ame̩nadure; omi la chʼenejodudu efu ma:
ama lef e-kide̩ oñ ma li mi ejumomi, todu kʼefu mi kʼu chʼe̩nejodudu le̩ Jisus Kraisti ki dʼe̩do̩ eje̩ e-wñ chaka ñe̩ña ki mud e̩wñ uwo̩li e-abo ku ma che ku ma ke̩do̩nʼowñ tef iñmi ogbegbele̩.
I Oñ tʼugbo Onu e-ogbegbele̩, kʼi ma nʼe̩chile̩che̩ n, e-kʼeju one̩ ma li n, kʼowñ kate chʼO̩jo̩, ubumo̩ kpai ojima ki dʼugbo owñ tʼogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa. Ami.
O̩ma-mi, Timoti, o̩la kʼu du ka-i udu oñ nadu te̩ ñw e̩ eju ache̩ ku ma ka ugbo we̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩, todu kʼuwe̩ ki dʼef e-le̩ aja ogu e-o̩me̩me̩le̩;
kʼuwe̩ ki mʼe̩do̩ ekono kpai akone̩ o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩ ki ma nʼe̩wñ ki adu gwunyʼuwe̩ n ne̩; e-kʼabo iche̩ka mu ke̩che̩ bʼo̩la-ma te̩ amʼe̩wñ e̩do̩ ekono ko dafo,
Haime̩nio̩s kpai Ale̩ksanda jʼef abo le̩; oñ u mʼuma ko ñwu Setan, todu ki kʼuma o̩la ku ma we echakpabie̩.
Todule̩ e̩wñ kʼu nadʼugbe̩do̩ ñw one̩ kʼi che ñw e̩ne̩ du ejodudu de̩ kakini, Ku ma gbo̩ko̩bo̩, ku ma chadua, ku ma chologu, ku ma ño̩ fʼugwa gwa tod amone̩ du;
todu amonu kpʼabo du ku ma jʼef uña ki dago; todu kʼa ki jo̩ to̩ko̩o̩ ache e̩wñ yo̩o̩ kʼa akpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ kʼa che e̩wñ ki nyo̩ du kʼo̩kone̩ ache.
E-kide̩ chʼe̩wñ o̩me̩-me̩le̩, i laño̩ chʼe̩wñ ku ma jʼagba eju O̩jo̩ E̩najadu-wa,
kʼi du owñ e̩do̩ kʼamone̩ du ki tʼujadu ku ma ño̩ lewa tef ochochi ema ogbolo.
Todu O̩jo̩ chʼoka, e̩nagbagba O̩jo̩ kpʼamone̩ laño̩ chʼoka ge̩, owñ chʼone̩ Kraisti Jisus,
kʼi mʼo̩la-wñ du che e̩wñ ukoji o̩me̩ todu amone̩ du; ku ma agbʼibenu-wñ iko e-wñ.
Todu ku ma mʼumi du chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi atakoya kpai e̩nukpuche̩ le̩ de̩, (ochochi naka-i, u remi n), owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ako̩ abo uche̩ichi e̩wñ ef e̩do̩ ekono kpai ochochi.
Todule̩ u chenʼeku kʼaboke̩le̩ ki nachadua ugbo du, ku ma ki kʼo̩wo̩ ki fe̩ nyʼate̩, uwe̩do̩ kpai iñwa eje̩ ki do̩ n.
Abe̩le̩ ge̩ abobule̩ ki namʼo̩la ef e̩wñ ubo̩la ma ki chʼiko-ma manyʼeju anyo̩ kpʼibe ewane̩, i ki chʼef oji eba abe̩ kʼo̩jamalia abe̩kʼokuta akoko efufu abe̩ kʼafe̩ ki nʼoko nana n;
chai lef uko̩io̩ ki nyo̩ eche (e-le̩ chʼeju-wñ ugbo abobule̩ ku ma ka ku ma akpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩).
Onobule̩ ki nako̩che̩ yo̩o̩, o̩la-wñ ki chʼe̩kamuhite̩ chaka.
U la je̩ kʼonobule̩ ki ko̩ abe̩kʼi chʼodu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, i ki muda de̩ yo̩o̩.
Todu ma fʼAde̩m bo ejodudu, ubile̩ taku ma bo̩ If;
i la chʼAde̩m ma gba ibe n, ama abu ku ma fʼonobule̩ le̩ ibe da i kwo tef ada eje̩ le̩.
Ma muda ajadu owñ lef o̩ma ebi iche̩wñ ku ma jo̩ ef e̩do̩ ekono kpʼufe̩do̩ waa, kpai efo̩ manyʼibe ehiwane̩.
O̩la uke̩do̩no i che kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du afo̩ta rʼuko̩lo̩ adejute̩ mak e̩ño̩ uko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ i ache le̩.

Todule̩ i dukpe̩ kʼadejute̩ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ ki ma nʼugbo ku ma dalukado n tila; kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ki nʼonobule̩ʼka, eju-wñ chefe̩rane̩, e̩ne̩ kʼibe-wñ wane̩, e̩ne̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ tʼiko, e̩ne̩ ki ache̩do̩ ononojo, e̩ne̩ kʼi meju ekʼone̩ e̩wñ,
i ki chʼañmo̩te̩ n, e̩ne̩ ki ma hika kpʼone̩ igbe n, chai e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼebo̩la, e̩ne̩ ki ma chaida n, e̩ne̩ ki ma che̩ñʼo̩ko̩ n;
e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼe̩nuto̩gba unyi e-wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩, ali-wñ ki chʼe̩wñ kʼamo̩ma-wñ abumʼo̩ ku ma fʼo̩la-ma kamuhi te̩ ñw u.
Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ ma ma abu kʼi ale kʼi chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo unyi e-wñ n, ab i ale kʼi afejutʼujeju abudo̩ O̩jo̩ ke?
I ki chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi gba o̩lO̩jo̩ etitʼetito̩ n, tode̩gba kʼi akoneju kʼi añwa tef udu Abulumone̩.
I laño̩ dukpe̩ kʼabo̩do̩da agbʼo̩ ibenu kʼowñ chʼe̩no̩me̩me̩le̩; tode̩gba kʼi añwa tef ina ebu kpai oku Abulumone̩ le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ge̩, amache e̩wñ ñw one̩ ki nachʼabo ku ma chʼali e̩nyo̩, ku ma ma kʼalu meji n, ku ma ma chʼalu o̩te̩ wain n, e̩ne̩ ki ma jakpa o̩ko̩ n,
kʼi mʼafili e̩do̩ ekono ne̩ kpʼakone̩ o̩la ki de̩ hiolo ef e̩do̩.
Ama kʼi ño̩ ñwa abo-i go ejodudu ta, iche̩wñ ku ma ma nʼugbo ku ma kalu nyʼuma o̩la n, ubile̩ taku ma aje̩ ñwu ma chʼabo ku ma che e̩wñ ñw one̩.
Abe̩le̩ i dukpe̩ kʼabobule̩ ki nʼali e̩nyo̩, ku ma ma bulumʼone̩ n, kʼeju-ma chefe̩rane̩, ku ma chʼabo ku ma chubi one̩ ef e̩wñ du.
Amache e̩wñ ñw one̩ le̩ ki chʼo̩ko̩ onobule̩ʼka, ma ki kadʼamo̩ma-ma kpai abunyi e-ma o̩gba o̩me̩me̩le̩.
Todu abo ku ma fʼuko̩lo̩ e̩wñ eche ñw one̩ che o̩me̩me̩le̩ fʼuña o̩me̩me̩le̩ mu ñw o̩la-ma, kpai eju e̩gbo nana ef e̩do̩ ekono e-ki dʼefu Kraisti Jisus.
O̩la e̩wñ-i nako̩ rʼuwe̩ abu kʼu kibeno ka kʼu nawʼugbo we̩ piopio;
ama iche̩wñ kʼu kpo̩kpe̩, todu kʼuwe̩ ki ma alu ki dukpe̩ kʼone̩ ki hi ofe mane̩ ache e̩wñ ef unyi O̩jo̩ e-kʼi chʼujeju abudo̩ e-O̩jo̩ ki deju, ujeju le̩ chʼugbogaga kpai ofe emane̩ kʼochochi ne̩.
I la nʼiñwa n, afili ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ tabale:
Oñ Afu nʼo̩la le̩ pitii aka, kakini, Adiko otitala, abo iche̩ka ana tʼo̩wo̩ʼka bʼo̩la e̩do̩ ekono te̩, ma anyʼamafu ku ma da one̩ ibe kpai uko̩-o̩la e-amebili eti,
ef ayechi e-amaremi, kʼakone̩ o̩la ki dʼef uma che̩muna kʼi chʼuhiuko̩-ma,
ma fʼo̩na kpanyʼo̩ya-ene̩, ma fʼuje̩wñ iche̩ka naba, O̩jo̩ la nyi kʼabo ku ma ke̩do̩no ku ma laño̩ fʼochochi ma kʼama ki gba ku ma fʼugwa-wñ gwa.
Todu e̩wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ nyi chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩, i la nʼe-du ku ma gba ku ma fʼugwa-wñ gwa ku ma ahiʼu tinyo̩ n;
todu i afo̩ lef o̩lO̩jo̩ kpʼologu eche.
E̩ kʼe̩wñ-i jʼane̩ ñw amo̩maye le̩ mak uwe̩ achʼe̩ne̩ Kraisti Jisus kʼi ache e̩wñ ñw one̩ e-ome̩me̩le̩, ku ma ne̩ o̩la e̩do̩ ekono kpʼuko̩-o̩la e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ kʼe̩ tetatʼo̩ ubi le̩ nʼe̩ gba.
Ama alo̩ ki chʼe̩wñ o̩ja, kpʼe-kʼabobule̩ anagbo alo̩ le̩ e̩ ki ko̩ tiba; e̩ ki la che ache ño̩ che kʼo̩la-we̩ ki ma ugbo ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo.
Todu ache ño̩ che kʼaño̩la ki ya chenʼile ree; ama ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ chenʼile alu du, abu kʼi chenʼe̩wñ e-iñmi e-abajo̩-i kpai e-ki ache ki wa ku ma katane̩ ubi-wñ.
O̩la ku ma ke̩do̩no i che, i laño̩ nyo̩ bʼe̩ne̩ du jo̩ ki agba.
Todu e̩wñ ki chi kʼa chakanya kʼa la fʼeju gbiti-i de̩, owñ che todabu kʼa kibenʼO̩jo̩ e-ki deju, kʼi chʼE̩najadu amone̩ du, e-abo ku ma ke̩do̩no tʼoji.
E̩ ki dʼugbe̩do̩ ñwu ma kʼe̩ laño̩ ko̩ ma e̩wñ-i.

I ki nʼugbo kʼe̩ne̩ du adʼe̩ rʼo̩che̩ke̩ne̩ ukpe̩ kʼe̩ chʼokolobia n; uwe̩ ki muda che e̩wñ kʼame̩nuke̩do̩no awo̩li owñ, owñ chʼef o̩la eka kpʼalu kʼe̩ che e̩wñ ile̩-i kpʼef ufe̩do̩ kpʼef e̩do̩ ekono kpʼef o̩yaala.
Gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼu lewa, e̩ namʼo̩kalatu eche ñw amone̩ kpai ugbe̩do̩ edu ñw one̩ kpai o̩la ekone̩ ne̩.
E̩ ki che dabe̩ne̩ kʼele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki dʼef uwe̩ ma wʼuwe̩ eju n, owñ chʼe-ku ma du ñw e̩ lef ache̩ eka kpai o̩wo̩ kʼabogijo ko nʼuwe̩ le̩.
E̩wñ-i ki nawʼe̩ eju; e̩ ki dʼef uwñ; todu kʼenyo̩gba-we̩ ki tejugede ñw e̩ne̩ du.
E̩ namʼo̩la-we̩ ne̩, e̩ ki ño̩ mʼuko̩ o̩la le̩ ne̩, gugu ef e̩wñ-i waa; todu eche kʼe̩ che e̩wñ-i tʼo̩la-we̩ onugo, tʼabo ku ma gbo̩ o̩la-we̩ uwe̩ ajadu.
E̩ ki kpa ogijo alu n, ama e̩ nadʼugbe̩do̩ ñw u dabe̩ne̩ kʼata-we̩, abokolobia dabe̩ne̩ kʼamo̩maye-we̩,
abobule̩ ogijo dabe̩ne̩ kʼamiye-we̩, amigbe̩le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼamo̩maye-we̩ ef o̩yaala chaka.
E̩ ki bumo̩ amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ku ma chʼamo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ogbolo.

Iche̩wñ kʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ nʼamo̩ma abe̩ kʼamaaju, ama le̩ ki ko̩che̩ ejodudu ku ma ki kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ ef e̩wñ ku ma che kpai abunyi e-ma, ku ma ki ko ñw abo ku ma bi ma koji e̩nyo̩ ku ma gba; todu e-kide̩ chʼe̩wñ ku ma agba eju O̩jo̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ogbolo kʼi ma la nʼone̩ n, mʼibe-wñ konʼO̩jo̩ me̩, i la dʼef o̩ko̩ e̩gbabʼo̩ kpʼadua echo odu kpai o̩ro̩ka.
Ama e̩ne̩ ki achile̩ ab i adeju le̩ oku one̩ i che.
E̩ ki ño̩ dʼugbe̩do̩ ñwu ma ugbo e̩wñ-i ge̩ todu ki we̩ nʼugbo ku ma dʼalu kado ma.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma kpʼibe e̩wñ tane̩ tod abo e-wñ n kʼe-abunyi-wñ ma tule n kʼe-ma ki chi n, mak i fʼaire̩ e̩do̩ ekono re̩ me̩, i la bie̩ne̩ tʼe̩ne̩ ki ma ke̩do̩no n le.
Ma ki kʼodu o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ kʼo̩do̩-wñ ma jo̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩ta ta n kʼi te̩te̩chʼo̩ya o̩ko̩ okate nyʼo̩takada le̩ n,
uko̩lo̩-wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ agbʼo̩ ibenu, kʼi fʼamo̩ma ne̩ gba, kʼi te̩tachojo, kʼi fʼe̩re̩ abo kiafo̩ gwe̩, kʼi mʼabo ku ma chekpama te̩ gbanyi, kʼi la tʼuko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩ duu eche ubi.
E̩ ki muda ko̩ ekʼodu amo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ku ma chʼigbe̩le̩ nyʼo̩takada le̩, tode̩gba ku ma chane̩ edʼe̩re̩ ma ubi bi Kraisti te̩, ki du ma e̩do̩ ku ma nʼo̩ko̩ omune̩,
oñ ma fʼabi je̩ todabu ku ma hi e̩do̩ ekono-ma e-ejodudu le̩ tinyo̩.
Ma laño̩ ko̩che̩ ku ma jo̩ acho̩kpo̩ ofofo, ma tʼunyi unyi ale; i chʼejo̩ ofofo kate n, ama ma ño̩ chʼamaro̩lo̩ kpai amagwoji, ma nʼo̩la e̩wñ ki ma dukpe̩ ku ma ka n aka.
Todule̩ u neku kʼamigbe̩le̩ anʼo̩ko̩, ku ma bi o̩ma, ku ma chʼodu unyi, ku ma ki we ebʼuña ñw e̩ne̩ ki akobʼuwa le̩ ki bina.
Todu abo iche̩ka muna me̩, ma kwodaru Setan ubi.
Iche̩wñ kʼonobule̩ kʼi ake̩do̩nʼo chenʼamo̩yaukuo̩ko̩, i ki gba ma nyi ku ma we edachino ujeju abudo̩ Ondu, todu kʼama ki gba abo ku ma chʼamo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ogbolo nyi.
Abogijo ku ma kad o̩gba o̩me̩me̩le̩ ki nabʼukpe̩ ubumo̩ meji jo̩ eju-me̩, e-abo ku ma chʼakanya ef o̩la kpai uko̩-o̩la le̩ ki toji.
Todu o̩la o̩takada O̩jo̩ kakini, E̩ ki gʼalita tunyʼalu okuno̩ kʼi agwu o̩ka n. Kpai, E̩ne̩ ki achuko̩lo̩ chebʼome̩-wñ jo̩ ku ma ra ñw u.
E̩ ki gba o̩la ajo̩ ku ma gwuno ogijo n, chai kʼi kwo alu amenibenu meji abe̩ kʼe̩ta.
I chʼe-abo ku ma dure ño̩ dure e̩ dubi ma eju amone̩ du, todu kʼailo ki fʼabo ki bo̩ mu.
Eka naka ñw e̩ pee eju O̩jo̩ kpʼeju Kraisti Jisus kpʼeju amonuche̩ e-ku ma che̩chitane̩ le̩ todu kʼuwe̩ ki fʼe-le̩ de, i ki nʼachumu ñw e̩ n, e̩ ki che e̩wñ du tʼe̩ne̩ʼka ubi tʼekeji le n.
E̩ ki kʼo̩wo̩ nʼe̩ne̩ du achigili n e̩ ki la bʼabomune̩ tuta ef adure n. Fejutʼo̩la-we̩ kʼe̩ de̩ yaala.
E̩ ki ño̩ ñmo̩ omiofo kate ge̩ n, ama e̩ nadʼo̩te̩ wain pe̩ todu efu we̩ kpai elo ki ma lo̩ ñw e̩ n o̩gbe̩nugbe̩ le̩.
Adure abo iche̩ka chʼo̩pee, i atʼuma o̩gba tef ajo̩, i laño̩ atʼabo kibo̩ ubi ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ uko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ ki chʼopee do̩mo̩; e-ki chʼojoji ma la neke dʼe̩wñ gwebo n.
Aluka amone̩ du ku ma jʼef adu amodu-ma ki nyo̩ bʼubumo jo̩ eju-ma alu du, todu kʼamone̩ ki we echʼakpabie̩ odu O̩jo̩ kpai uko̩-o̩la-i.
Oñ abo kʼodu-ma ake̩do̩nʼo, ama ki kerʼuma ukpe̩ ku ma chʼamo̩maye n; ama ma nachuko̩lo̩ adu ñwu ma tule, ukpe̩ kʼabo ku ma gba uko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩ le̩ chʼame̩nuke̩do̩no kpai abo ufe̩do̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ako one̩ o̩la omune̩ ojoji, kʼi ma la je̩ kpai o̩la o̩lafia n, owñ chʼo̩la Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist le̩ kpai uko̩-o̩la kʼi cheju ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩;
mak i fʼafu mu nyʼefu de̩, i mʼe̩wñ du n, chai o̩ga ugbo ene ete̩ kpai uja noj o̩la ki kwef alu ofo i ache le̩, e-le̩ anyʼelie̩na te̩ kpai uja eja kpai echakpabie̩ e̩wñ kpai ibe-bibi ekpe̩
kpʼe̩ro̩la ef amone̩ kʼibe-ma chʼe̩che̩ e-ku ma mʼochochi gba bʼuma te̩, ma do̩ ka kʼekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ chʼo̩na ile eje̩.
Ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ manyʼe̩do̩ e̩bo̩ muda chʼile eje̩ ki nana;
todu a ne̩ e̩wñ du wʼef ile̩ n, a la neke nʼe̩wñ du kwef uwñ alo n;
ama abu kʼa ne̩ e̩wñ kʼa je̩ kpai e̩wñ kʼa ko bʼo̩la ma, e-le̩ abʼuwa jo̩.
Ama abo ku ma neku echʼanana añwa tef ejama kpai oku kpai e̩ño̩ e̩wñ idada ki wewe kpai e-ki akpʼone̩ bie̩ kʼi adʼone̩ te̩ji tef ukpabie̩ kpai ulenyo̩.
Todu eche̩do̩ o̩ko̩ chʼili e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ du; owñ chʼe-kʼabo iche̩ka fʼo̩wo̩ nadala rʼu oñ i ko ma la bʼe̩do̩ ekono te̩, i la nʼiwo̩ wewe gunyʼo̩la-ma.
Ama uwe̩, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩, e̩ nara bʼe̩wñ-i du te̩; oñ e̩ nabʼo̩kpakpa kpe̩re̩ kpʼekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ kpʼe̩do̩ ekono kpʼufe̩do̩ kpʼe̩do̩ elichi kpʼo̩chikimi.
Fejugbiti kʼe̩ fʼuja e̩nyo̩ e-e̩do̩-ekono ja, e̩ nagwo̩nyʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ e-ku ma fʼe̩ do̩ tʼef uwñ, kʼe̩ la gbalu ugbalu o̩me̩me̩le̩ le̩ eju ame̩nibenu wewe.
Nadʼugbe̩do̩ ñw e̩ eju O̩jo̩ kʼi adʼiñmi ñw e̩wñ du kpʼeju Kraist Jisus kʼi gbalu o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩gba kʼi fʼibenu-wñ gba o̩gba Po̩ntius Pailat le̩,
kʼuwe̩ ki nafejute̩ uko̩ le̩ kʼi we enʼubie̩ o̩la, kʼi we enʼugbo ku ma adʼalu kadʼo, gbogbo wʼe̩gba ekwotejugede e-Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist;
e-kʼi adu ñe̩ña ef adiko e-wñ, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma kele owñ kpai e̩ne̩ kʼowñ kate nʼukpahiu, owñ chʼOnu amonu kpai Ondu amodu;
owñ kate chʼe̩ne̩ ki ma nʼuku n, unyi-wñ dʼef ugane̩ kʼone̩ ma ate̩me̩ru n; owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma li n, ma la neke liʼu n: owñ ki nʼojima kpai ukpahiu ogbegbele̩. Ami.

E̩ ki dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw abo ku ma chʼanana ef o̩kpanachi ki de̩ abajo̩-i ku ma ki nʼibe eke n, kʼama ki la we ekibeno ikani ikani e-e̩wñ anana, chai ku ma konʼO̩jo̩ e-kʼi akʼe̩wñ du ñw a lef anana kʼe̩do̩-wa ki bo̩;
ama ki chʼuko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩, ku ma ki chʼanana ef uko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩che, kʼo̩wo̩-ma ki chʼechi ñw one̩, ku ma ki nʼibe one̩ efamo̩la;
abe̩le̩ ama adʼe̩re̩ unyi o̩me̩me̩le̩ maja ñw o̩la-ma todu ejo̩gba, todu kʼama ki gwo̩nyʼe-ki chʼiñmi o̩gbo̩lo.
O Timoti, e̩wñ ku ma du tunyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ le̩ e̩ nade, e̩ narida bʼekale̩ kʼo̩ja ofo aka kpʼe̩wñ ema ki akobʼe̩wñ du te̩, owñ chʼe-ku ma do̩ kʼe̩wñ ema olemi ofofo,
owñ chʼe-kʼabo iche̩ka aka te̩ taku ma mube̩be̩ lʼo̩wo̩ʼka ugbo e̩do̩ ekono le̩.
Po̩l e̩nukpuche̩ Kraist Jisus lef edʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ lagbo̩ iñmi ki dʼefu Kraist Jisus ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩.
Ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ kpʼejumomi kpʼure̩do̩ kwugbo O̩jo̩ Ata kpai Kraist Jisus Ondu-wa, ki tugbo Timoti, o̩ma ufe̩do̩-mi.
Egwa nagwa O̩jo̩ e-kʼu nache akwʼe̩gba amo̩ra-mi, kʼakone̩ o̩la kʼi dʼefu-mi ma dʼe̩wñ gunyʼumi n, alu kʼomi ma kpe̩ke erewa e̩wñ ugbo we̩ ef egbo̩ko̩ kʼu nagbo̩ko̩bʼO̩jo̩ odu kpai o̩ro̩ka n;
eju ache mi kʼu li uwe̩, abu kʼu cherewa omi aku-we̩ todu kʼuyo̩ ki kʼumi efu;
narewa e̩do̩ ekono ki ma nʼakoru n ki dʼef uwe̩ le̩; owñ chʼe-ki dʼef oukwo̩-we̩ Lois ejodudu, kpai ef iye-we̩, Yunis; e̩do̩-mi ño̩ mugba ka kʼi laño̩ dʼef uwe̩ ge̩.
Tod e-le̩ oñ narʼuwe̩ wa kʼe̩ fʼuna ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ ki dʼef uwe̩ lef o̩wo̩ kʼomi konʼuwe̩ oji le̩ tajo̩.
Todu O̩jo̩ dʼafu e-okpo ñw a n; chai e-ukpahiu kpʼe-ufydo̩ kpʼe-ibe ewane̩.
Todule̩ e̩ ki chanyo̩ o̩la ibenu e-Ondu-wa kpai omi kʼu chʼe̩namu-wñ n: ama e̩ nabʼUche̩nyo̩ le̩ li uwa e̩bie̩ne̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ lʼo̩na ukpahiu O̩jo̩
kʼi jadu wa, kʼi laño̩ nʼudo̩ kiafo̩ do̩ wa, lʼo̩na alu kʼuko̩lo̩ e-wa de̩ n, chai lʼo̩na ibe e-wñ kʼi ñwatane̩ kpʼufe̩do̩ e̩nyo̩ e-kʼi du ñw a efu Kraist Jisus o̩gba tak iko ogbegbele̩ chane̩,
fai i la mʼu du tejugede lef ukwotejugede E̩najadu-wa Kraist Jisus kʼi fʼuku gbogili te̩ i laño̩ mʼiñmi kpʼewe eche̩, ejeji-wñ, ko wʼugbo ugane̩ lef Uche̩nyo̩;
ma dʼumi te̩ e-le̩ kʼu chʼe̩natakoya-wñ kpʼe̩nukpuche̩ kpʼakone̩wñ.
Lef e-le̩ oñ u do̩mo̩ ali uwa e̩wñ-i ge̩. U muda chanyo̩ n, todu u chema e̩ne̩ kʼu ke̩do̩no le̩, e̩do̩-mi laño̩ mugba ka kʼi neke fʼe̩wñ-mi kʼu konyʼowñ o̩wo̩ le̩ de nyʼo̩jo̩ le̩.
E̩ ki mʼuwo̩li o̩la o̩lafia kʼe̩ gbo̩ ugbo mi le̩ ne̩ ef e̩do̩ ekono kpʼufe̩do̩ ki dʼefu Kraist Jisus.
E̩ nade e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ ku ma konyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ le̩ lef Afu Kiafo̩ ki adodo ef uwa le̩.
E̩ chema ka kʼabo du ku ma jʼEsia muna ubi bʼumi te̩ me̩; Faige̩lus kpai Hermagonis la jʼef uma.
Ondu ki li abʼunyi One̩sifo̩rus ejumomi, todabu kʼowñ je̩ ñw o̩la-mi ruko o̩gbe̩, i la chanyo̩ igbaligba ku ma konyʼumi ago n,
e̩gba kʼi de̩ Rom i la nʼe̩do̩ chacha tejane̩ mi, tak i fʼumi li—
Ondu kʼi du ñw kʼi fʼejumomi li ugbo Ondu o̩jo̩ le̩, uwe̩ la chema aluka e̩wñ wewe kʼi che ñwu ma E̩fe̩sus nyo̩nyo̩.
Todule̩, uwe̩, o̩ma-mi, e̩ ki nʼukpahiu ef ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ ki dʼefu Kraist Jisus.
Oñ e̩wñ kʼe̩ gbo̩ ugbo mi eju ame̩nibenu wewe le̩, e̩ nakonyʼabo ku ma achubi one̩ o̩wo̩, ku ma ñʼabo̩jo̩ ku ma ko̩ abo omune̩ e̩wñ ge̩.
E̩ ki ño̩ bʼumi li uwa e̩bie̩ne̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼisoja o̩me̩me̩le̩ e-Kraist Jisus.
Isoja du ki dʼoko uko̩lo̩-wñ la añwa e̩wñ udeju ile̩-i nyʼo̩la-wñ n; todu kʼi chenyo̩ e̩ne̩ ki dʼu tef isoja eju.
I la che̩wñ kʼkʼone̩ chiya ule le̩ ma dʼuloko ñw u n chai e̩gba kʼi che teju alu ku ma ñw o̩da-wñ te̩.
I dukpe̩ kʼaluche̩ ki chʼakanya uko̩lo̩ uche̩-wñ ejodudu tak i atʼo̩wo̩ nyʼe̩wñ uche̩-wñ chuu.
E̩ nadibotʼe̩wñ kʼu naka-i; todu Ondu adʼibe ñw e̩ kʼe̩ mʼoji-wñ ef e̩wñ du.
E̩ nadibekado Jisus Kraist kʼi kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, ugbe̩ Defid i che alu kʼuche̩nyo̩-mi ka.
Ef e-le̩ nali uwa e̩bie̩ne̩ gbogbo tʼoj agba dabe̩ne̩ kʼachuko̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩, o̩lO̩jo̩ muda dʼoj agba n.
Todule̩ oñ nafe̩do̩lichi ugbo e̩wñ du tod abo ku ma chi ma tane̩ le̩, todu kʼo̩wo̩-ma ki ño̩ tʼujadu e-ki dʼefu Kraist Jisus manyʼojima ogbegbele̩.
O̩la ku ma ke̩do̩no i che kakini,
Iche̩wñ kʼa fe̩do̩ lichij, mak a ñʼabʼo̩ jʼonu ge̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼa ma chubi owñ n, owñ le̩ achubi o̩la-wñ kpo.
E̩ nare ma wa e̩wñ-i, e̩ ki ño̩ gbibenu ñwu ma kpaka eju Ondu ku ma we uja tod o̩la ki kwʼef alu ofo eja, e-ki ma nʼeku du n, chai ekʼabo ku ma gbo̩ adafo.
E̩ nanʼe̩do̩-chacha kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ te̩ ñw O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma fʼu ñwa kʼi nyo̩, kʼe̩ chʼe̩nuko̩lo̩ kʼe̩ ma nʼugbo kʼe̩ chanyo̩ n, kʼe̩ fʼo̩na o̩kpakpa da ef O̩la Ochochi.
E̩ ki himama ekale̩ kʼo̩ja aka ofofo le̩: todu ama anyo̩gba tule ef ewe ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩,
oñ o̩la alu-ma aya dab odumu-be̩ne̩je̩; Haime̩ruus kpai Filitus jʼef abo le̩;
ama mube̩be̩ lʼo̩woʼka Ochochi le̩, ma ka kʼudajikwane̩ leale me̩, oñ ma jʼakʼe̩do̩ ekono abo iche̩ka adafo.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ e̩re e̩wñ O̩jo̩ ki de̩ kpaka le̩ dago kpo, abu kʼi fʼuhiuko̩-i ne̩, kakini, Ondu chema abo ku ma chʼabo-wñ, kpai, Abo du ku ma dʼodu Ondu ki kwo bʼe̩wñ ki ma tʼo̩kpakpa n te̩.
E̩wñ eku ki jʼef unyi lile la chʼe-o̩jamalia kpai ajifa kate n, chai e-oli kpai e-e̩ke̩te̩ ño̩ jʼo̩mo̩ ge̩; uche̩ka la chʼutodu e̩wñ ojima, uche̩ka la chʼutodu e̩wñ ki ma nʼojima n.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du fʼo̩la-wñ gwe̩ hiolo bʼe-ubiane̩ le̩ te̩ mak i achʼe̩wñ eku tod e̩wñ ojima, i afo̩, kʼi anʼeku ñw odu-wñ kʼi chʼeñwo̩che te̩ tod uko̩lo̩ e̩nyo̩ du.
Abe̩le̩ e̩ ki ra bʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ kʼokolobia ache le̩ te̩, kʼe̩ nabʼo̩kpakpa kpʼe̩do̩ eko̩no kpʼufe̩do̩ kpʼure̩do̩ kpe̩re̩ manyʼabo ku ma do̩ Ondu udo̩ kwef e̩do̩ ki de̩hiolo.
E̩ ki la hi alu mʼene e̩fule̩fu e-ki dab e-imo̩to̩ ki ma ko̩che̩ e̩wñ ni n, e̩ chema kʼabʼe-le̩ anyʼuja.
I la dukpe̩ kʼadu Ondu ki we uja eja tila, kʼi che e̩wñ yo̩o̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ du, kʼi meju ekʼone̩ e̩wñ, kʼi naje̩do̩;
i ako̩ abo ku ma kujabʼo̩la-ma o̩la ef o̩chikimi. Ukani O̩jo̩ adu ñwu ma ku ma ribeda ku ma ki fʼochochi ma,
kʼama ki mʼolu ji akwʼef oku Abulumone̩, abu kʼi fʼuma mu te̩ tef e̩wñ ki du owñ e̩do̩.
E̩ ki la fʼu ma kakini, Iko o̩jo̩ otitala iko ku ma afo̩ko̩ uja awajo̩-i.
Todu e̩gbale̩ amone̩ ache̩do̩ o̩la-ma, ma ache̩do̩ o̩ko̩, ma abuba, ma ake, ma achakpabie̩ one̩, ma ako̩ egbʼo̩la abo ki bi ma, ma agwʼone̩ n, o̩la-ma afe̩ n,
abo-ma awʼuma eju n, ma achʼame̩nokolofi kpʼamabulumone̩ kpʼame̩nawulu, ma dab ame̩la ef oko, ma che̩do̩ e̩wñ ki nyo̩ n,
amadʼone̩ oji, ame̩-nagbulu, amakʼe̩wñ neju, ma che̩do̩ e̩wñ ki abʼuma e̩do̩ tʼalu ku ma che̩do̩ O̩jo̩ le̩;
ma mʼe̩go̩ alu ku ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ ne̩, ma muda arʼaire̩ ukpahiu-wñ. E̩ ki himama abo kide̩.
Todu abo ku ma gwo̩ tef unyi ye̩e̩ jʼef abo le̩ ku ma la fʼabobule̩ kʼibe ma de̩ kpii e-kʼadu adure nʼuma oji te̩ mu, kʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ ojoji ojoji wewe ane̩ ma alo,
ma jʼako̩che̩ e̩wñ e̩gba du, ma la neke wʼugbo ochochi ema n.
Alu ku Jane̩s kpai Jambre̩s ko̩bo̩ Mose̩s le̩, abe̩le̩ abo-i ño̩ kobo̩ ochochi ge̩, amone̩ kʼef ibe-ma chʼe̩che̩ ma che, ma chʼabo ku ma chʼijo̩bu ugbo o̩la e̩do̩ ekono-i.
Ma muda anyo̩gba tʼe-le̩ le ge̩ n, todu idada-ma adufu ñw e̩ne̩ du li, alu kʼe-abo meji le̩ ño̩ wate̩ ge̩.
Uwe̩ la tʼo̩la-mi kʼu ko̩ we̩ kpʼalu kʼu tale kpʼibe ki dʼef umi kʼu tene eche kpʼe̩do̩ ekono-mi kpʼe̩do̩ kʼu je̩, kpʼufe̩do̩-mi, kpʼe̩do̩ elichi-mi
kpʼedoli ku ma doli mi, kpʼiwo̩-mi ubi chili chili me̩; owñ chʼe̩wñ ki ke̩re̩bʼumi Antio̩k, kpʼAiko̩nium, kpai Listra; alu kʼedoli ku ma doli mi kʼu ma kʼo̩ n de̩: Ondu la mʼumi gba kwef e-le̩ du.
Ochochi ma achʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼu e̩do̩ kʼi deju ache̩wñ akpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ efu Kraist Jisus o̩bata.
Ame̩ne̩bibi kpʼamadʼo̩wo̩ yʼone̩ eju abie̩ne̩ nyʼo̩gba, ma adʼone̩ la, one̩ la ako ma la ge̩.
I muda chʼuwe̩ e̩ ki nagugu ef e̩wñ kʼe̩ ko̩che̩, kʼe̩do̩-we̩ mugba ogbolo le̩, abu kʼe̩ chema e̩ne̩ kʼe̩ ko̩che̩ kwʼugbo-wñ
kpai alu kʼe̩ teta ma O̩la O̩takada O̩jo̩ kʼi neke je̩ ñw e̩ nʼibe tef ujadu lef e̩do̩ ekono ki dʼefu Kraist Jisus akwʼo̩jo̩ o̩me̩kpa-we̩.
Iñmi O̩jo̩ chʼe̩ñmiru o̩la o̩takada-wñ du, i la chenʼile ku ma du kʼone̩, ku ma du o̩la-wñ biu one̩, ku ma du owñ hi one̩ tʼo̩na, ku ma du kʼone̩ o̩la e-ki dʼef o̩kpakpa,
todu kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ ki mufu, todu kʼe̩wñ du o̩la-wñ ki jo̩ kpa todu uko̩lo̩ du ki che nyo̩.
Nagbibenu ñw e̩ gbalii eju O̩jo̩ kpai Kraist Jisus e-kʼi ache kʼi kajo̩ abo ki deju kpai abo ki ku, kpai, utejugede-wñ kpai ojane̩-wñ:
e̩ ki fʼakoya o̩la-i ta; e̩ bʼo̩ le iko-wñ, kpai e̩gba ki ma chʼiko-wñ n; dʼu bi one̩, dejuru, dʼugbe̩do̩; e̩do̩ eje̩ kpai o̩la ekone̩ ki nʼuda n.
Todu iko awa e̩gba kʼamone̩ ma ñʼaje̩ ku ma ko̩ ma o̩la o̩lafia n, ama abu kʼeti-ma ayo̩ ñw o̩la urinyo̩ egbo̩, ma agba amakone̩ e̩wñ jo̩ ñw o̩la-ma teju alu kʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ ache ma;
taku ma arʼeti-ma da bʼochochi egbo̩ te̩, oñ ma ana tugbo alo̩ ku ma lo̩.
Ama i chʼuwe̩, eju-we̩ ki nafe̩rane̩ ef e̩wñ du, e̩ naje̩ kpʼuwa e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼe̩ li, e̩ ki chʼuko̩lo̩ ajuche̩nyo̩, e̩wñ kʼe̩ che ñw one̩ le̩ e̩ nache rʼoji kpa.
Todu ma chane̩ edʼumi dafo dab iche̩bo̩ omi me̩, iko ku ma tʼumi no̩ kʼu lo le̩ lewa me̩.
U fʼuja e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ le̩ ja kpa, u fʼule-mi ra kpoji, u dejute̩ o̩la e̩do̩ ekono le̩ me̩:
e-ki bo̩ chʼuloko o̩kpakpa ku ma du te̩ ñwu mi le̩, owñ chʼe-kʼOndu kʼi chʼakajo̩ o̩kpakpa, adu ñwu mi o̩jo̩ le̩; i chʼomi kate i adʼu ñw u n, i adu ñw abo du ku ma fe̩do̩ utejugede-wñ.
E̩ nachʼe̩do̩ chacha kʼe̩ wʼugbo mi piopio.
Todu Dimas hiʼumitinyo̩, abu kʼi fe̩do̩ e̩wñ o̩kpanachi e-fa-i, oñ i le tu Te̩se̩lonaika; Kre̩ske̩ns le tu Galatia, Taito̩s le tu Dalmatia.
Luku kate dʼugbo mi. E̩ namu Mark du, kʼuwe̩ kpai owñ ki wa; todu i chʼeku ñwu mi nana ugbo e̩wñ eche ñw one̩.
U la fu Taikikus kpuche̩ nyʼE̩fe̩sus.
E̩gba kʼe̩ wa e̩ mʼukpo afu kʼu to̩no̩ Troas ugbo Karpus le̩ kpʼibuku ki jʼo̩mo̩ ko wa, e-año̩ le̩ ki chi n.
Ale̩ksanda, agwalo̩ ebije ikpa le̩, dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ nana ña mi; Ondu adu ñw u teju alu kʼuko̩lo̩-wñ de̩.
Uwe̩ onugo ki fʼo̩la-we̩ de ugbo-wñ, todu i kobʼo̩la kʼa ka nana tabale.
E̩gba kʼu fʼo̩la-mi ka ejodudu le̩, e̩ne̩ du je̩ tʼumi ubi n, o̩chaka-ma hi umi tinyo̩: O̩jo̩ ki lʼe-le̩ rʼuma n.
Ondu muda dago kpenyu mi, oñ i dʼukpahiu ñwu mi todu kʼama ki fʼo̩la akoya le̩ ta kpa lef umi, kʼabo uche̩ichi chaka ki gbʼo̩. Oñ i mʼumi gba kwef alu idu le̩.
Ondu agba mi bʼuko̩lo̩ bibi du te̩, i la ajadu mi tef ojane̩-wñ e-efojale: ojima ki chʼe-wñ tʼogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa. Ami.
E̩ nagwa Priska kpai Akwila, kpai abunyi One̩sifo̩rus.
Irasto̩s kwogugu Ko̩rint; u tu Trofimus no̩ te̩ Mailitus, i lo̩ ñw owñ n.
E̩ nachʼe̩do̩chacha kʼe̩ wa tak uwo ki wane̩. Yubulus agwʼe̩, kpai Pude̩ns kpai Linus kpai Klaudia kpʼamo̩maye chaka.
Ondu ki dʼugbo afu-we̩. Ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ ki dʼugbo-we̩.
Po̩l, adu O̩jo̩ kʼi ño̩ chʼe̩nukpuche̩ Jisus Kraist, lʼo̩na e̩do̩-ekono e-abo kʼO̩jo̩ chi ma tane̩ kpai ochochi le̩ ema ogbolo lʼo̩na ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩,
noj ukibeno e-iñmi ogbegbele̩, e-kʼO̩jo̩, ki ma neke remi n, kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ o̩gba taku ma chane̩ ekaluka o̩kpanachi o̩kpanachi;
i la dʼO̩la-wñ tejugede iko e-wñ ef o̩la-akoya e-ku ma ke̩do̩nʼomi ku ma du nyʼumi o̩wo̩ teju alu kʼO̩jo̩, E̩najadu-wa, ñwa te̩.
Tugbo Taito̩s, o̩ma-mi ogbolo lʼo̩na e̩do̩-ekono kʼa tuta ef uwñ-i:
Todu kʼu tʼuwe̩ no̩ Krit le̩ de̩, owñ chʼutodu kʼe̩ fe̩wñ ki bo̩ te̩ru, kʼe̩ la kʼabogijo dago jo̩ ewo ewo du alu kʼomi ñwa ñw e̩.

Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du do̩mo̩ ki ma nʼugbo ku ma adʼalu kadʼo n, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ki nʼonobule̩ oka, kʼi chenʼamo̩ma ku ma chʼame̩nuke̩do̩no, ki ma nʼugbo kʼamone̩ akʼalu nyʼuma ka ku ma chʼame̩nofubo̩ n, abe̩kʼame̩nugbolu n.
Todu i dukpe̩ kʼadejute̩ ki chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma ma dʼalu kadʼo n, alu kʼadigede O̩jo̩ ade̩ tila, i achʼe̩ne̩do̩ kpako n, i achʼe̩ne̩do̩fulu n, i achʼalu o̩te̩ n, i afʼo̩ko̩ uja n, i ajakpa ile eje̩ ofo n,
i muda ache̩do̩ ononojo, i ache̩do̩ e̩wñ e̩nyo̩, ibe-wñ achewane̩, i achʼe̩no̩kpakpa, e̩do̩-wñ ade̩ jalii, i la ache e̩wñ gu e̩gu du n;
i agwo̩nyʼo̩la uke̩do̩no alu ku ma ko̩ wa le̩ kpaka, todu kʼi neke ne̩ uko̩-o̩la o̩lafia le̩ adugbe̩do̩ ñw one̩, kʼi laño̩ neke du o̩la bi abo ku ma jiñwa.
Todu ame̩nugbolu ku ma kʼalu ofo chewewe, ma la kʼone̩ ibe ila, abo e̩pi-eda tule efu ma,
i dukpe̩ kʼa fʼe̩wñ bʼabo ku ma fʼo̩gbo̩dudu unyi gulo̩ le̩ alu ma; ama chʼabo ki ma dukpe̩ ku ma kʼone̩ n tila, ma kʼone̩ tod ile eje̩ ofo ku ma jakpa-wñ.
E̩ne̩ʼka efu ma kʼi chʼakache̩ e-ma, kakini, Abo Krit chʼamaremi ogbegbele̩, ame̩la e̩bie̩ne̩ kpʼame̩nogbodala ku ma chʼachajefu ma che.
Ibenu kʼabo le̩ gba chʼochochi. E̩wñ ki chi kʼe̩ dʼo̩la bi ma una una chʼutodu kʼama ki nʼo̩lafia ef o̩la e̩do̩-ekono,
ku ma ki we enyʼalo̩ kʼamaJu alo̩ kpai uko̩ kʼamone̩ ku ma jʼana bʼochochi te̩ ate̩ eti.
E̩wñ du de̩ hiolo ñw ame̩ne̩hiolo; e̩wñ du muda de̩ hiolo ugbo abo kʼe̩wñ damʼuma o̩la ku ma la ko̩ eke̩do̩no n: e̩wñʼka la damʼibe ma, kpʼakone̩o̩la ki dʼefu e̩do̩-ma me̩.
Ma gbalu ka kʼama chema O̩jo̩; ma la nʼuko̩lo̩-ma araire̩ wñ, e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ ma che, ma gbo̩lagbo̩ n, ma fʼuma ñwa go ka ku ma nyo̩ ef uko̩lo̩ ki nyo̩ du n.
Ama uwe̩ ki nako̩la e̩wñ ki chʼeju uko̩-o̩la o̩lafia;
eju abogijo ki nafe̩rane̩, ama ki jʼef e̩wñ ki chʼeju-wñ ñw o̩kone̩, ibe-ma ki wane̩, ama ki nʼo̩lafia ef e̩do̩-ekono kpʼef ufe̩do̩, kpʼef e̩do̩-elichi.
Abe̩le̩ ge̩, abobule̩ ogijo ki ño̩ jʼef udago e-ma, alu ki chʼeju-wñ ñw e̩ne̩ o̩lO̩jo̩, ama ki bulu mʼone̩ n, ama ki chʼadu o̩te̩ n, ama ki chʼama-kone̩ e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩;
todu kʼama ki ko̩ abigbe̩le̩ ibe ku ma che̩do̩ amo̩ko̩-ma ku ma laño̩ che̩do̩ amo̩ma-ma,
ku ma che e̩wñ ibe ibe kʼo̩la-ma ki de̩ yaala, ama ki fejutʼunyi e-ma, ama ki chʼame̩ne̩nyo̩, ama ki fʼo̩la-ma kamu-hite̩ ñwu amo̩ko̩ e-ma todu kʼamone̩ ki we echakpabie̩ o̩lO̩jo̩:
e̩ dugbe̩do̩ ñw abokolobia abe̩le̩ kʼibe-ma ki wane̩,
e̩ namʼo̩la-we̩ ne̩ ugbo e̩wñ du kʼe̩ chʼuwo̩li uko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ eche; uko̩-o̩la kʼe̩ kʼone̩ ki nʼe̩che̩ n, ibe-we̩ ki chʼe-o̩kone̩;
o̩la-alu-we̩ ki chʼo̩la o̩lafia ku ma ma neke kpʼo̩ bie̩ n, todu kʼanyo̩ ki mu e̩ne̩ ki ako bʼe̩ abu kʼi ma li e̩wñ e̩fule̩fu ugbo we̩ kʼi aka n.
Amadu ki nafʼo̩la-ma kamuhite̩ ñw abo ki ne̩ ma, ku ma nyo̩ ma eju ef e̩wñ du; ama ki jʼuma iñwa n;
ama ki la chʼo̩wo̩ kwe̩ kwe̩ n, ama ki duñe̩ña ka ku ma chubi amodu-ma alu du ef e̩wñ ki nyo̩; todu kʼama ki chʼo̩ñwe̩ nyʼuko̩-o̩la O̩jo̩, E̩najadu-wa, ef e̩wñ du.
Todu ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ e-O̩jo̩ kʼi ane̩ ujadu wa ñw e̩ne̩ du kwotejugede me̩,
i nʼako̩ wa, todu kʼawa ki raire̩ e̩wñ du ki ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n kpai e̩ño̩ e̩wñ ile̩ e̩che, kʼa ki deju jʼef o̩kpanachi ki de̩ abajo̩-i kpai ibe ki wane̩ kpʼef o̩kpakpa kpʼekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩;
kʼa jo̩ aneju ugbede kʼa kibeno le̩ kpʼutejugede ojima O̩jo̩ lile kpai E̩najadu-wa Kraist Jisus,
kʼi mʼo̩la-wñ duchele todu wa todu kʼi la wa tane̩ bʼo̩wo̩ ugbite̩re̩ du te̩, kʼi laño̩ fʼamone̩ gwe̩hiolo ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi ne̩ ma, ku ma go̩laru uko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩.
E̩ nanʼo̩la e̩wñ-i aka, e̩ ki ne̩ adugbe̩do̩ ñw one̩, e̩ nadu bi ma alu du ku ma ñwa ñw one̩. E̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du nʼibe fʼibe e-we̩ du n.
E̩ nare ma wa ku ma fʼo̩la-ma kamuhite̩ ñw amagboji kpʼabo̩da, ku ma gbo̩lagbo̩, kʼo̩la-ma ki che̩mu tane̩ tod uko̩lo̩ ki nyo̩ du,
ma ki chakpabie̩ e̩ne̩ du n, ma ki chʼe̩naida n, ma ki de̩ yo̩o̩, ma ki dʼo̩chikimi du ña amone̩ du.

Todu i ño̩ nʼe̩gba kʼawa onugo ma nʼibe n me̩, a la gbo̩lagbo̩ n, ma ko wa la, a jo̩ achʼadu e̩ño̩ e̩wñ kpʼe̩wñ ube̩do̩ ojoji ojoji, oñ a jo̩ ef e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ eche kpai ule̩na, e̩wñ ulaka a che, a laño̩ nʼulaka omune̩ ache.
Ama e̩gba kʼumo̩la kpai eche̩do̩ kʼO̩jo̩ E̩najadu-wa che̩do̩ amone̩ kwotejugede,
i kwʼef uko̩lo̩ eche o̩kpakpa kʼa jʼache n, chai alu kʼejumomi e-wñ de̩ oñ i jadu wa, lef egwe̩ ku ma gwe̩ wa, ebi wa etito̩ le̩, kpai eñwo̩che kʼAfu Kiafo̩ añwʼuwa che etito̩.
Owñ chʼe-kʼi dudanyʼuwa oji nana nana lefu Jisus Kraist E̩najadu-wa;
todu kʼabu kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ fʼale da ñw a kʼa ki mud abo ku ma je̩ e̩wñ ogu le̩ teju ibe ekono e-iñmi ogbegbele̩.
O̩la kʼa ake̩do̩no i che.
e̩ ki muda dubigbʼene e̩fule̩fu kpʼo̩la o̩gba nʼo̩gba jeele, kpai aro̩, kpai uja egidi ugbo o̩lo̩da; todu abʼe-le̩ nʼile n, e̩wñ o̩wai i la che.
E̩ne̩ ki chʼadane̩kpeju kʼe̩ kʼo̩ o̩la onuʼka, e̩ kʼo̩ onuʼkeji e̩ ki ño̩ naru ge̩ n;
abu kʼe̩ chema ka kʼe̩ne̩ abe̩i murida bʼo̩na te̩ me̩ e̩wñ adure i ache le, i fʼo̩la-wñ kpabi me̩.
E̩gba du kʼu nakpe̩ Arte̩mas abe̩-ku Taikikus wʼugbo we̩, e̩ ki che̩do̩ chacha kʼe̩ wʼugbo mi Niko̩po̩lis; todu u fʼibe-mi kpe̩ ka kʼu nagugu o̩mo̩ uwo-i.
E̩ nache̩do̩ chacha kʼe̩ fʼaihite̩ Zinas, amoli-o̩lo̩da le̩, kpai Apo̩lo̩s che ku ma nyo̩gba ule̩-ma todu kʼe̩wñ du ki ña ma n.
Abo-wa ki ño̩ ko̩che̩ eto̩gba ef uko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ eche tod eku e̩wñ ki aku one̩, todu kʼama ki we erʼe̩ro n.
Amone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo mi agwʼe̩. E̩ nagwa abo ku ma che̩do̩ wa ef e̩do̩-ekono.
Po̩l, e̩namu e-Kraist Jisus, kpai Timoti o̩maye-wa, tʼugbo Filimo̩n, e̩nufe̩do̩-wa kʼi abʼawa chʼuko̩lo̩,
kpai Afia, o̩maye-wa e-onobule̩, kpai Archipus kʼowñ kpai awa chʼiso̩ja, kpai ujeju abudo̩ Ondu ki dʼef unyi-we̩:
Ufede̩nyo̩ ki dʼugbo me̩ kpai ure̩do̩, kwugbo O̩jo̩ Ata-wa kpai Ondu Jisus Kraist.
Nagwa O̩jo̩-mi ugwa e̩gbadu, nachʼurewa-we̩ ef adua-mi,
abu kʼu gbʼinabali ufe̩do̩-we̩ kpai e̩do̩-ekono kʼe̩ ne̩ ugbo Ondu Jisus kpai ugbo abo kiafo̩ chaka,
todu kʼuta e̩do̩-ekono kʼe̩ ta ki nachuko̩lo̩ ef e̩wñ ki nyo̩ du ki dʼefu wa ema, todu Kraist.
Todu u nʼuyo̩ kpʼugbe̩do̩ nana noji ufe̩do̩-we̩, todabu kʼe̩do̩ abo kiafo̩ te̩taruko lef uwe̩, o̩maye-mi.
Todule̩, dagba u chaka nʼeju e̩gbo du efu Kraist kʼu ñwa ñw e̩, e-ki chʼeju-wñ,
ama todu ufe̩do̩ e̩dugbe̩do̩ nadʼugbe̩do̩ ñw e̩, (abu kʼu de̩ alu ku Po̩l ogijo-i de̩, fa-i u laño̩ chʼe̩namu e-Kraist Jisus ge̩),
nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ tod o̩ma-mi kʼu bi ef amu-mi, owñ chʼOne̩simus.
I la chʼeku ñw e̩ e̩gbaʼka le̩ n, i muda chʼeku ñw uwe̩ kpʼomi abajo̩-i.
Nakpʼowñ, kʼi chʼe̩do̩-mi onugo onugo dabi wʼugbo we̩-i.
Omi neku egwo̩nyʼu tʼugbo mi onugo, todu kʼi che e̩wñ ñwu mi tod uwe̩ ef amu e-Uche̩nyo̩-i;
i muda dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu che e̩wñ du e̩gba kʼe̩ ma ma ni n; todu kʼe̩nyo̩-we̩ ki we edabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ otila, chai e̩wñ kʼe̩ gʼe̩do̩la-we̩ che.
Todu ukani i chutodu kide̩ oñ ame̩ daru iko pe̩e̩ le̩, owñ chʼutodu kʼuwe̩ kʼi fʼowñ ne̩ ogbegbele̩;
i ño̩ dab adu ge̩ n, i la tʼadu le̩, o̩maye ufe̩do̩ i che, ugbo e-mi i toji, e̩ muda go alu kʼi tule ugbo e-we̩ ge̩, tʼe-ef o̩re̩la, tʼe-ef Ondu.
Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼe̩ je̩ kʼu chʼe̩numana-we̩, e̩ mʼowñ gba dabe̩ne̩ kʼomi.
I la che̩wñ ki nʼuji kʼi chʼe̩ abe̩k i nʼuwe̩ o̩me̩ʼka, fʼe-le̩ lo tef o̩me̩ e-mi kʼu jʼe̩.
Omi, Po̩l, nʼo̩wo̩ e-mi kʼorubutu-i, nachʼudu-wñ; todu kʼu we eka ñw e̩ kakini, O̩me̩ kʼe̩ je̩ mi la chʼo̩la-we̩ onugo.
I-i, o̩maye, je̩ ñwu mi nʼabune̩ ugbo we̩ ef Ondu; fʼe̩do̩-mi ruko efu Kraist.
Abu kʼe̩do̩-mi mugba ka kʼe̩ gbʼo̩la-mi gbo̩, oñ nako̩takada rʼuwe̩-i; u chema ka kʼe̩ ñʼache tʼalu kʼu ka-i le̩ ge̩.
Oñ amanyu e-le̩ du e̩ nafʼuru ñwo̩che tane̩ ñwu mi ge̩: todu u kibeno kakini, Lef adua-me̩ ma adʼumi chʼame̩ ele ufe̩de̩nyo̩.
Ipafras, kʼowñ kpai omi chʼe̩namu efu Kraist Jisus agwʼe̩,
kpai Mark kpʼAristarkus kpai Dimas kpai Luku, amabʼumi chuko̩lo̩ le̩.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist ki dʼugbo afu-me̩.
Abu kʼO̩jo̩ fʼukpe̩ ukpe̩ o̩la-wñ wewe ka ñw abogijo igbele lʼo̩na o̩na ki wewe ef amakache̩ le̩,
ef o̩jo̩ otitala-i i ko̩la ñw a ef O̩ma, e-kʼi mʼu du chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi aje̩ e̩wñ ogu du, oñ i fʼo̩kpanachi o̩kpanachi che te̩ lef uwñ;

abu kʼowñ chʼo̩gaa e-ojima-wñ, alu kʼonugo onugo O̩jo̩ de̩ alu le̩ i de̩ che̩ che̩ che̩, i laño̩ mʼe̩wñ du gbane̩ lef o̩la ukpahiu-wñ, abu kʼi fʼe̩gwe̩hiolo e-adure che kpa, i kwogugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ inaina ef uña atate̩-i,
abu kʼi mud e̩ne̩ ki tʼamonuche̩ le alu kʼodu-wñ kʼi je̩ fʼe-ma du ololololo.
Todu ugbo onuche̩ de̩ kʼi ka ñw u mama kakini,
Oñ e̩gba du kʼi ño̩ dabi dʼO̩ma o̩gba le̩ dabi wʼef ile̩ ugbo du kʼone̩ te̩ kade-i, i kakini,
I la chʼo̩la e-amonuche̩ i kakini,
Ama o̩la e-O̩ma kʼi aka de̩:
Uwe̩ afe̩do̩ e̩wñ o̩kpakpa, e̩ la achulaka e̩wñ ugbite̩re̩;
Omune̩ de̩ ge̩:
e̩wñ le̩ du alale rinyo̩, uwe̩ muda agugu pioo;
dab ukpo ku ma ko bʼo̩la ma oñ uwe̩ afʼuma che̩,
Ama ugbo onuche̩-wñ de̩ kʼi ka ñw u mama kakini,
O̩chaka-ma chʼamafu ku ma chabune̩, todu ku ma ki che e̩wñ ñw abo ku ma che ku ma aje̩ ujadu e̩wñ ogu, oñ i kpe̩ ma wa-i n?
Lef e-kide̩ oñ i dukpe̩ kʼa dibetʼe̩wñ kʼa gbo̩ le̩ ololololo tode̩gba kʼa cha gwʼo̩ du.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼo̩la ku ma ka lef alu amonuche̩ le̩ mud o̩la ki lonyane̩, kʼuchada du kpʼeko̩-gbo̩la du mʼuro̩me̩ ki chʼeju-wñ gba,
iche̩wñ kʼujadu inaina-i ma wʼuwa eju n ab a ale kʼa fʼu o̩wo̩ tane̩ ke? Owñ chʼe-kʼuchane̩-wñ chʼo̩la kʼOndu ka, tak abo ku ma gbo̩ fʼu lonyane̩ ñw a,
abu kʼO̩jo̩ onugo nabʼuma gbibenu lugbo ujiwe kpʼuno̩ kpʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu ojoji ojoji, kpʼAfu Kiafo̩ kʼi kpe̩ ñw amone̩ likpa alu ki dʼowñ e̩do̩.
Todu i chʼamonuche̩ oñ i fʼile̩ du ugbo kʼone̩ te̩kade ki ache ki wa le̩ kamuhite̩ ñw ma n, owñ chʼe-kʼa ko̩la-wñ-i.
Ama e̩ne̩ʼka ka pee ugboʼka kakini,
E̩ fʼowñ che kʼi chʼo̩wo̩ wane̩ ñw amonuche̩ iko le̩ pe̩,
e̩ fʼe̩wñ du kamuhitʼo̩gane̩ e̩re̩-wñ.
A muda jʼagʼe̩ne̩ ku ma fʼu hiwane̩ tʼamonuche̩ le iko pe̩ le̩, todu, lugbo ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩, kʼi dʼuku kad alu tod e̩ne̩ du, owñ che Jisus, todu iwo uku kʼi li, ojima kpʼubumo chʼuloko oji-wñ.
Todu i chʼeju-wñ ñw owñ, kʼe̩wñ du jʼo̩mo̩ ñw owñ, kʼe̩wñ du laño̩ jʼo̩mo̩ lef uwñ le̩, abu kʼi anʼo̩ma wewe alo tef ojima kʼi fʼUchane̩ ujadu-ma che kpoji lef iwo̩.
Todu tʼe̩ne̩ ki che ma ku ma fo̩, tʼabo ku ma fo̩ le̩, e̩te̩ o̩chaka-ma chʼokate, lef e-kide̩ oñ i ma chanyo̩ edo̩ ma kʼamo̩maye-wñ n,
i kakini,
Omune̩ la de̩:
Todule̩ abu kʼabimo̩to le̩ nʼuta-ma ata ef e̩bie̩ kpʼo̩re̩la, owñ onugo ño̩ bʼuma mananyʼe̩wñ le̩ pitii abe̩le̩ ge̩; ʼtodu kʼi fʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼo̩da uku gbogili te̩ lef uku, owñ chʼAbulumone̩ le̩,
kʼi ño̩ gba abo-i tane̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma jʼef adu, o̩jo̩ udeju-ma du lef ailo uku ku ma jʼara.
Todu ochochi, i chʼamonuche̩ i agwo̩nyʼuma-i n, chai ugbe̩ Ebraham oñ i gwo̩nyʼuma.
Kwef e-le̩ oñ i nʼo̩me̩ kʼi adab amo̩maye le̩ ef e̩wñ du, todu kʼi mud agboji amatama kʼi ali ejumomi kpʼe-kʼi achubi one̩ ef e̩wñ e-O̩jo̩, todu kʼi fʼe̩wñ unye̩do̩ che tod adure amone̩.
Todu abu kʼowñ fʼuwa li ef ajama ku ma jʼowñ ma, i neke te̩ko̩ abo ku ma ajʼuma ma ge̩.
Todule̩, amo̩maye kiafo̩, kʼame̩ mananyʼudo̩ e-efojale, me̩ nadibetʼe̩nukpuche̩ kpʼagboji amatama e-ugbalu kʼa gbalu-wñ le̩, owñ che Jisus;
owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi chubi e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼowñ che le̩, alu ku Mose̩s ño̩ de̩ ef abunyi-wñ ge̩.
Todu ma fʼe̩ne̩-i lo̩ ka kʼi bʼojima ki nana tʼe-Mo̩se̩s le jo̩, alu kʼe̩ne̩ ki akʼunyi nʼubumo̩ tʼunyi onugo le.
Todu unyi du nʼe̩ne̩ ki ako̩; ama e̩ne̩ ki fʼe̩wñ du ko̩ chʼO̩jo̩.
Mose̩s la chubi odu-wñ ef abunyi-wñ du alu kʼe̩nuko̩lo̩ ache, todu kʼi chʼe̩nibenu e̩wñ ku ma ñʼako̩la-wñ ejo̩gba,
Kraisti muda chʼalu kʼo̩ma de̩ kʼabunyi-wñ jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ; awa chʼabunyi e-wñ, iche̩wñ kʼa gwo̩nyʼeju-e̩gbo̩ kpʼuba e-ibe ekono-wa le gaga gbogbo wʼukpoji.
Lef e-le̩, alu kʼAfu Kiafo̩ le̩ aka kakini,
me̩ ki fʼe̩do̩-me̩ no̩, alu ku ma che ef e̩do̩ ulukoko ku ma nyi le̩ n,
Ugbo kʼamata-me̩ jʼumi ma, ku ma ñwa mi go le̩,
Lef e-le̩ e̩do̩-mi kparʼabo o̩lo̩pu kide̩,
Alu kʼu go̩ el uwe̩do̩-mi, kakini,
Me̩ nago, amo̩maye, tode̩gba kʼe̩do̩ bibi ki ko̩ eke̩do̩no ñʼadʼef e̩ne̩ʼka me̩ ef ena ku ma na tʼo̩wo̩ʼka bʼO̩jo̩ ki deju te̩,
me̩ ki la dugbe̩do̩ ñw omune̩ o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa ku ma do̩ kʼeñini; tode̩gba kʼe̩wñ ki jʼef ila adure aje̩ ñw e̩do̩-me̩ no̩.
Todu awa mud abo ku ma mananyu Kraisti me̩, iche̩wñ kʼa mʼuchane̩ o̩kpaka e̩do̩-wa le̩ ne̩ gaga gbogbo wʼukpoji,
ef e-ku ma ka le̩ kakini,
Todu e̩ne̩ gbo̩ kʼi ño̩ nyi e̩do̩ ulukoko wa? I la chʼo̩chaka amone̩ ku ma kwef Ijipti wa lugbo Mose̩s le̩ n?
Abo i we̩do̩ rʼuma o̩do̩ o̩gbo̩ meji le̩? I chʼabo ku ma dure, kʼoku-ma jʼane̩ ef aje̩tachi le̩ n?
Abo i go̩ ñw ma ka kʼama ñʼagudu tef uñmi-wñ n? ki ma chʼabo ku ma ko̩ eke̩do̩no le̩ n?
Oñ a li kakini, Ma neke gudu wʼo̩mo̩ n, tod eko̩ ku ma ko̩ eke̩do̩no.
Todule̩ a ki railo abu ku ma tʼo̩la ku ma katane̩ le̩ no̩ ñw a, owñ chʼo̩la egudu nyʼef uñmi-wñ le̩, tode̩gba kʼi dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef ume̩ anyarʼu.
Todu ochochi awa chʼabo ku ma fʼuche̩nyo̩ je̩rʼuma, dabalu kʼama de̩ ge̩; ama o̩la ku ma gbo̩ le̩ nʼile ñw ma n, abu kʼi ma kpe̩gwanyʼe̩do̩ ekono ugbo abo ku ma gbo̩ le̩ n.
Todu awa, kʼa chʼabo kʼa ke̩do̩no, agudu tef uñmi le̩; i dabalu kʼi ka kakini,
Todu i ko̩la o̩jo̩ ekebie le̩ ugboʼka abe̩-i kakini, Tak o̩jo̩ e̩kebie le̩ O̩jo̩ ñmi bʼuko̩lo̩-wñ te̩ chaka;
oñ ugbo-i i ño̩ ka kakini,
Todule̩ abu ki bo̩ kʼabo iche̩ka agudu tef uwñ, kʼabo ku ma la fʼuche̩nyo̩ je̩rʼuma o̩gbo̩gba le̩ ma gudu tʼo̩ n lef eko̩ ku ma ko̩ eke̩do̩no,
i ño̩ dabi fʼo̩jo̩ʼka date̩, owñ chʼEñini, abu kʼiko le̩ le kpo̩kpe̩ abe̩i, i ño̩ dabi ka efu Defid dabalu kʼi ka o̩gbo̩gba le kakini,
Todu iche̩wñ ku Jo̩shua ma dʼuñmi ñw ma, i ma dabi kʼo̩la o̩jo̩ omune̩ ubi e-le̩ ge̩ n.
Mak o̩jo̩ uñmiʼka chebo̩ tod amone̩ O̩jo̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki mugudu tef uñmi-wñ mak e̩ne̩ le̩ onugo ñmi bʼuko̩lo̩-wñ te̩ me̩, alu kʼO̩jo̩ ñmi bʼe-wñ te̩.
Todule̩ a ki chʼe̩do̩chacha kʼa gudu tef uñmi e-le̩, kʼe̩ne̩ du ki we eñwanane̩ ef uwoli eko̩ eke̩do̩no e-le̩ gbage̩de̩.

Todu o̩lO̩jo̩ deju, i la nʼuko̩lo̩-wñ ache, i ale̩ tʼugbada du ki ale̩ eju meji le, i agu e̩wñ du gbogbo monugba kʼi fʼonugo one̩ kpʼafu daru, tʼiko iko tʼo̩ko̩to̩, oñ i hika añwa ibe kʼone̩ kpe̩ kpʼibe ki dʼefe̩do̩ go.
Oñ e̩wñ kʼi nyi ki ma tejugede eju-wñ n de̩ n, e̩wñ du la tago ofo, e̩wñ du ño̩ che̩chite̩ eju e̩ne̩ e-kʼa acholi e̩wñ jo̩ ñw u.
Todule̩ abu kʼa fʼagboji amatama lile-i e-kʼi lale gu efojale efojale du ne̩ me̩, owñ che Jisus, O̩ma O̩jo̩, a ki gwonyʼegbalu kʼa gbalule̩,
todu a chene̩ agboji amatama, i chʼe-kʼi ma neke kwaliwo ñw a ef e̩gbo-wa n in; chai e-ku ma fʼu jama iʼo̩na du dab awa, adure dʼo̩ n.
Todule̩ a ki naneju e̩gbo te̩me̩rʼede ufe̩de̩nyo̩ le̩, todu kʼawa ki gba ejumomi kʼa ki laño̩ fʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ li ki ate̩ko wa iko kʼeku e̩wñ aku wa.
Todu ma dʼagboji amatama du kwef amone̩ ku ma dʼu dago tod amone̩ ef e̩wñ e-O̩jo̩, todu kʼi kʼe̩wñ ele kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa tod adure:
i neke je̩do̩ teju e̩ñwa alu ku ma je̩do̩ ugbo amugbodu kpʼabo ku ma jʼachila bʼo̩na te̩, abu kʼe̩gbo ño̩ chewenyʼowñ onugo o̩la.
Abe̩le̩ lef e-le̩ i chenʼo̩me̩ kʼi kʼe̩wñ wa tod adure e-owñ onugo alu kʼi ache tod amone̩.
E̩ne̩ du la agba ojima e-le̩ ñw o̩la-wñ n, chai e̩gba kʼO̩jo̩ fʼu do̩, alu kʼe-Aro̩n ño̩ de̩.
Abe̩le̩ Kraisti dojima ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi mud agboji amatama n, chai e̩ne̩ kʼi ko̩la ñw u kakini,
dabalu kʼi ño̩ ka ugbo omune̩ kakini,
Ef o̩jo̩ o̩re̩la-wñ i nʼukwa akwa taa kpʼaku ero̩ agbo̩ko̩bo̩ kpʼejumomi eche ugbo e̩ne̩ ki neke jadu-wñ kwef uku, oñ abu kʼO̩jo̩ gbo̩ tod ekpe̩do̩ru kʼi kpe̩do̩rʼu,
dagba i chaka chʼo̩ma i ko̩che̩ o̩la egbagbo̩ kwef uwa kʼi li le̩;
oñ abu kʼi mufu kpoji i mud e̩wñ ki chi kʼujadu ogbegbele̩ do̩mo̩ ñw abo du ku ma gbʼo̩la-wñ gbo̩,
O̩jo̩ bʼodu-wñ nyʼalu ka kʼagboji amatama teju uche̩ Me̩lke̩side̩k.
Ugbo e̩ne̩ le̩ a nʼo̩la wewe kʼomudechi-wñ kpuna eje̩ kʼa ka, abu ku me̩ mud aule̩ ugbo o̩la egbo̩.
Todu abu ki dukpe̩ kʼame̩ chʼamakone̩wñ lef iko-me̩ ki kpo̩kpe̩, eku ño̩ dabi aku me̩ kʼone̩ ki ko̩ me̩ uchane̩ e̩wñ o̩la O̩jo̩. Me̩ mud abo kʼeku omie̩nya aku me̩, i chʼo̩je̩ e-o̩je̩ n;
todu e̩ne̩ du ki añmo̩ omi-e̩nya mud ugbodu ugbo o̩la o̩kpakpa; todu ome̩-kpa i che.
O̩je̩ e-oje̩ muda chʼe-amo̩kone̩, owñ chʼabo kʼeche ño̩ che je̩ ñw ibe-ma ma eñwa e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ kpʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ rʼojoji.
Todule̩ a ki tʼuchane̩ o̩la Kraisti no̩ kʼa te̩ tef okone̩ alo, a ki we emʼe̩re̩ ibe erida bʼuko̩lo̩ uku te̩ kpʼe̩do̩ ekono O̩jo̩ du nyane̩ ño̩ du nyane̩,
kpʼo̩la baptism, kpʼo̩wo̩ ekonʼone̩, kpʼabo ki ku edajikwane̩ kpʼajo̩ o̩gbegbele̩ ekʼone̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ je̩ e-le̩ a la ache.
Todu i chʼe-abo kʼeju-ma ne̩ e̩gbaʼka, ku ma la dʼele̩ e-efojale le̩ kadalu taku ma mananyʼAfu Kiafo̩,
ku ma ño̩ mʼo̩lO̩jo̩ ki nyo̩ kpʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu e-o̩kpanachi ki ache ki wa du kadalu,
taku ma muñwa nʼane̩, ma neke dabi che ma etito̩ ku ma ribeda ge̩ n; abu ku ma fʼO̩ma O̩jo̩ kamoli ñw o̩la-ma etito̩, ma laño̩ mʼowñ du nyʼe̩ña.
Todu ane̩ ki fʼomi ojale ki awa bʼo ma o̩gbe̩nugbe̩ ñmo̩ nyʼo̩la, kʼi la akʼe̩wñ oko kwe̩ kwe̩ kwe̩ dufu ñw abo ku ma fʼuche̩-wñ lo todu ma, e̩nyo̩ i agba kwugbo O̩jo̩ le̩.
I muda mʼikeke kpʼedudu egbe ko dufu, ma añwa ki nyo̩ n tak i me̩ru ama ena ñw u; ukpoji-wñ chʼegujo.
Ama, abufe̩do̩, dagba a chaka kʼabe̩le̩ e̩do̩-wa mugba ka kʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ tʼe-le̩ le kpʼe̩wñ e-ujadu dʼugbo me̩,
todu O̩jo̩ chʼe̩nuji kʼi agbenyo̩ uko̩lo̩-me̩ kpʼufe̩do̩ e-ku me̩ duña todu odu-wñ le̩ n, abu ku me̩ che e̩wñ ñw abo kiafo̩ akwoubi kpʼe-ku me̩ jʼef uwñ ache abajo̩-i,
i lañʼache wa e̩ño̩ kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ ki nadʼe̩do̩chacha e-le̩ gbage̩de̩ ñe̩ña ugbo ibe ekono ki ko̩ me̩ efu gbogbo wʼukpoji:
todu kʼame̩ ki we edʼaule̩, ku me̩ la wʼabo ku ma fʼo̩la ukatane̩ le̩ je̩ ogu lef e̩do̩ ekono kpʼe̩do̩ eje̩ che.
Todu abu kʼO̩jo̩ nakʼo̩la e̩wñ le̩ tane̩ ñw Ebraham, abu ki ma nʼe̩ne̩ ki tule kʼi ago̩ n, i fʼo̩la-wñ go̩,
i kakini, Ede̩nyo̩ nade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ chuu, naño̩ je̩ ñw e̩ wewe nyo̩gba.
Abe̩le̩, abu kʼi fe̩do̩ je̩ kpo̩kpe̩ i fʼe̩wñ ku ma katane̩ le̩ je̩ ogu.
Todu amone̩ ago̩ e-ki tule; iñwa du ku ma je̩, e̩bo̩ ego̩ chʼida-wñ tak o̩la le̩ alo̩-nyane̩.
Ef e-kide̩ abu kʼO̩jo̩ neku kʼi ña abo ku ma aje̩ e̩wñ kʼi katane̩ le̩ ogu ololo, ka kʼuneku e-wñ arida n, i mʼego̩ du tʼagbagba-ma;
todu ki chʼelef e̩wñ meji ki ma nʼerida n, e-kʼO̩jo̩ ma neke remi ef uwñ n, kʼawa ki nʼugbe̩do̩ ki gbiti, owñ chʼawa kʼa ra kʼa gwo̩nyʼibe ekono ku ma du te̩ o̩gba-wa.
A nʼe-le̩ dab ugbo onugo-wa, e̩wñ o̩kpaka kʼi lonyane̩ i che, i ño̩ mugudu tʼejefu ukpo ugbo̩na,
ugbo ku Jisus e̩ne̩ kʼi dʼo̩gba mugudu tʼo̩ todu wa le̩, abu kʼi mud agboji amatama teju uche̩ Me̩lke̩side̩k tʼogbegbele̩.
Todu Me̩lke̩side̩k kʼa ka-i chʼonu Se̩le̩m, atama O̩jo̩ Chamachala, kʼi ledo Ebraham kʼi adʼoji kwugbo kʼi fʼamonu le̩ kpa awa tak i de̩nyo̩ ñw u,
Ebraham la fʼe̩wñ chaka le̩ kpe̩ rʼe̩gwa, oñ i mʼojiʼka du ñw u, (ejodudu ma jomudechi odu-wñ ka kʼOnu E̩wñ O̩kpakpa, oñ o̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ i chʼOnu Sele̩m, owñ chʼOnu Ure̩do̩).
I nʼata n, i nʼiye n, i nʼo̩lo̩pu n, i nʼuchane̩ o̩jo̩-wñ n, iñmi-wñ la nʼuloji n, oñ abu ku ma che kʼi biʼO̩ma O̩jo̩, ugugu atama-wñ chʼo̩pioo.
Me̩ la go abu kʼe̩ne̩-i nana; e-kʼEbraham o̩ra-wa fʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ kʼogu je̩ kpe̩ rʼe̩gwa oñ i mʼukpe̩ʼka du ñw u.
Oñ ma tuko̩ ñw amo̩ma Lifai ku ma jʼef amatama ku ma gba ukpe̩ e̩ke̩gwa ugbo amone̩ le̩ teju o̩lo̩da, owñ chʼugbo amo̩maye-ma, abu ku ma chaka kwʼef uta Ebraham.
Ama e̩ne̩-i kʼi ma dʼef o̩lo̩pu e-ma n bʼEbraham gba ukpe̩ e̩ke̩gwa le̩, oñ i de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ku ma kʼo̩la tane̩ ñw u le̩.
I la nʼiñwa n, e̩ne̩ ki tule ade̩nyo̩ ñw e-ki nya.
I la chʼemi, amone̩ ku ma aku agba ukpe̩ e̩ke̩gwa le̩; o̩mo̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma gbʼo̩ ibenu ka kʼi deju agba.
Oñ e̩ge̩ne̩ ku ma ako̩la-i, Lifai ki agba ukpe̩ e̩ke̩gwa fʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩gwa te̩ ñw e̩nomune̩ lef Ebraham,
todu owñ dʼef uta o̩ra ata-wñ e̩gba ku Me̩lke̩side̩k de kpʼowñ le̩.

Todule̩ iche̩wñ kʼemufu kpoji ma do̩mo̩ lef uko̩lo̩ atama e-Lifai, todu ef e-le̩ oñ ma dʼo̩lo̩da ñw amone̩ le̩, eku e̩wñ ku ma kʼatama omune̩ ojoji ñʼakwane̩ teju uche̩ Me̩lke̩side̩k kʼi ma chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma ka teju uche̩ Aro̩n le̩ n?
Todu abu ku ma fʼuko̩lo̩ atama rida, o̩lo̩da ñʼarida duu.
Todu e̩ne̩ ku ma ka-i chʼabo̩lo̩pu omune̩ ojoji, e̩ne̩ du ef abʼe-le̩ la dʼef uko̩lo̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩-i mama ta n,
todu i kwote̩ pee kakini, Efu Juda oñ Ondu-wa dufu kwo, Mose̩s la kʼo̩la uko̩lo̩ ugugu amatama ugbo abo̩lo̩pu le̩ du n.
Oñ i ño̩ kwote̩ pee tule ololo kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼatama omune̩ ojoji kwane̩ kʼi bi Me̩lke̩side̩k,
e-kʼi ma mud atama teju o̩lo̩da kʼuko̩-wñ ku ma te̩ ma chʼe-o̩re̩la n, chai teju ukpahiu iñmi ki ma nʼeyo̩ rinyo̩ n;
todu ma gbʼo̩ ibenu kakini,
Todu elaba uko̩ ku ma te̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩ wate̩ tod e̩gbo-wñ kpʼile kʼi ma ne̩ n,
todu o̩lo̩da le̩ mʼe̩wñ du fu kpoji n, oñ ma dʼibe ekono ki nyo̩ tule wa koji-wñ, lef e-le̩ oñ a ate̩me̩rʼO̩jo̩.
Oñ alu kʼe-le̩ ma wa lubi e̩bo̩ ego̩ ojoji n;
todu abo le̩ mud amatama kʼe̩bo̩ ego̩ ma dʼef uwñ n; e-owñ la nʼe̩bo̩ ego̩ lef e̩ne̩ kʼi ko̩la ñw u kakini,
Jisusi la mud e̩nugbo̩wo̩ alo ekpe̩ e-ki nyo̩ tule likpa e̩wñ ki nana e̩go̩-i.
Abo ku ma mud atama akwoubi chewewe lef uku ki fʼo̩na egugu pioo kpanyʼuma;
ama owñ, lef ugugu-wñ ki chʼogbegbele̩, nʼuko̩lo̩ atama kʼi ma nʼeje̩ ño̩ je̩ ge̩ n.
Kwʼugbo e-le̩ i neke jadu abo ku ma gudu wʼugbo O̩jo̩ lef uwñ tʼukpoji, abu kʼi deju e̩gba du kʼi chologu todu ma.
Todu agboji amatama e̩go̩ e-le̩ chʼeju-wñ ñw a, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki fe̩, ali e̩bie̩ne̩ dʼef uwñ n, i de̩ jali, i che̩date̩ bʼame̩nadure te̩, oñ i mud e̩ne̩ ki dʼatate̩ tʼefojale efojale le;

eku akʼu kʼi akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa tod adure e-wñ ejodudu, ubile̩ tak i akʼe-amone̩ wa alu ki de̩ ugbo amagboji amatama le̩ n: todu i fʼe-le̩ che onuʼkate, o̩pioo-wñ de̩, owñ chʼo̩la-wñ onugo kʼi du wa.
Todu o̩lo̩da akʼamone̩ ku ma nʼe̩gbo o̩la chʼamagboji amatama; ama o̩la ego̩ kʼi go̩ le̩ kʼi ro̩ne o̩lo̩da, e-wñ chʼO̩ma ki mufu kpoji ogbegbele̩.
Oñ ef e̩wñ kʼa ka le̩ edano-wñ la de̩: awa chenʼagboji amatama abe̩le̩, e-kʼi kwogugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ ede Inaina efojale efojale,
i chʼe̩nabune̩ ugbo e̩wñ kiafo̩ kpʼe-ebu e-ogbolo le̩, e-kʼOndu mu kʼi ma chʼone̩ n.
Todu ma dʼagboji amatama du dago todu kʼi kʼe̩wñ ele kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa; todule̩ eku aku e̩ne̩ le̩ kʼi nʼe̩wñ kʼi aduwa ge̩.
I ma chʼane̩ ile̩-i i de̩, i ma nʼugbo du kʼi ma chʼatama n, abu kʼabo ku ma kʼe̩wñ ele wa teju o̩lo̩da jʼo̩mo̩;

owñ chʼabo ku ma chʼe̩wñ ki chʼuwo̩li kpʼojiji e̩wñ efojale alu kʼO̩jo̩ juka ñw Mose̩s e̩gba kʼi ache kʼi mʼebu le̩; todu i kakini, Go, e̩ nachʼe̩wñ du teju e-ku ma duña uwe̩ oj uwo le̩ kʼe̩ wo̩li-wñ.
Ama fai i fʼuko̩lo̩ abune̩ ki chʼo̩me̩-me̩le̩ tule ne̩ alu kʼowñ ño̩ chʼe̩nagbagba alo ekpe̩ ki nyo̩ tule, owñ chʼe-ku ma dʼo̩da-wñ nyane̩ oj e̩wñ ukatane̩ ki nyo̩ tule.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe-ejodudu le̩ ma nʼuchalu n, ma ma tene uña tod e-ekeji n.
Todu abu kʼi kalunyʼuma o̩la, i kakini,
I ateju alo kʼu kpe̩ kpʼamata-ma
Todu o̩jo̩ le̩ le rʼane̩ alo kʼu nakpe̩
Tak i añʼa nʼugbo du kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma ako̩ abane̩-wñ e̩wñ n,
Todu nagbʼe̩wñ unye̩do̩ tod uji-ma,
Ef e-kʼi ka kʼetito̩ le̩, mak i fʼe-ejodudu dʼigbele me̩. E-ki mud igbele kʼi achʼogijo alo me̩rʼelenyo̩ rʼeju.
Todule̩ e-ejodudu le̩ la ne̩ e̩wñ o̩kpakpa-wñ ku ma ñwa ku ma chʼucholo-wñ, uña-wñ kiafo̩ la chʼe-ile̩-i.
Todu i chenʼebu ku ma ñwo̩che le̩: agege kpʼitebulu kpʼakala ku ma ko̩te̩ jo̩ jʼef e-ejodudu le̩; e-le̩ ma do̩ ko̩ uña kiafo̩.
Oñ ejefu ukpo ugbo̩na ekeji le̩, ebu ku ma do̩ ko̩ uña kiafo̩ e-efo̩ do̩mo̩;

e̩wñ ki jʼef e-le̩ chʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ ajamalia ku ma kʼe̩wñ ki akpo jʼoji-wñ kpʼakpati e-alo ekpe̩ kʼajamalia chewenyʼo̩la-wñ chaka, ef akpati le̩ ucha ajamalia ku mana jʼef uwñ, kpʼo̩kpa Aro̩n ki dikoko, kpʼalo e-alo ekpe̩ le̩ jo̩
oñ anoji e-le̩ ate̩ amiche̩rub e-ojima ku ma debono uña unye̩do̩ le̩ jo̩; i chʼokoke o̩la e̩wñ-i oñ a ka fai n.
Oñ abu ku ma fʼe̩wñ-i ñwo̩che te̩ abe̩le̩, amatama anyʼef ebu ejodudu le̩ e̩gba du ache e̩wñ ucholo-wñ;
agboji amatama kate anyʼef e-ekeji, e-wñ la chʼonuʼka o̩do̩ʼka, i ale lʼubi e̩bie̩ ojoji n, i adʼe-le̩ wa tod onugo o̩la-wñ kpai tod e̩wñ kʼamone̩ che ef ugbodu.
Abe̩le̩ oñ Afu Kiafo̩ adudufu ka kʼo̩na tef uña kiafo̩ tejugede abu kʼebu ejodudu le̩ dago o̩mo̩ ta n;
e-le̩ chʼita tod iko abajo̩-i; likpa e-le̩ ma kʼe̩wñ ele kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ wa e-ki ma neke je̩ ñw akone̩ o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩ e̩ne̩ ki achʼucholo le̩ mufu kpoji n,
chai ugbo uje̩wñ, kpʼe̩wñ eñmo̩, kpʼe̩wñ ojoji ojoji edu tunyʼomi, o̩kpakpa e̩wñ e-o̩re̩la kate ku ma ko jo̩ ñw amone̩ gbogbo wʼe̩gba ku ma ñwʼe̩wñ che rʼe̩gu-wñ.
Ama abu ku Kraisti, kʼi chʼagboji amatama e-e̩wñ ki nyo̩ ki ache ki wa le̩ wate̩, lef ebu ki tule le̩ kpʼe-ki mufu tule, owñ chʼe-kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ ma che n, owñ chukakini i chʼe-ef e̩wñ e̩nyi ile̩-i n,
i la lef e̩bie̩ amewo kpʼamo̩mokuno̩ n, chai lef e̩bie̩ e-wñ, oñ i mugudu tef uña kiafo̩ onuʼkate o̩pioo-wñ de̩, i la fʼulone̩tane̩ e-ogbegbele̩ li me̩.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe̩bie̩ amewo kpʼe-amo̩kokuno̩ kpʼelulu-igbe̩le̩-oku-no̩ ku ma tafio̩ abo kʼo̩la-ma daji le̩ aje̩ ñw ma fo̩, owñ chʼugbo o̩re̩la egwe̩-hiolo:
kali onu monu kʼe̩bie̩ Kraisti kʼi mʼo̩la-wñ ki ma nʼe̩nyo̩lo̩ n du ñw O̩jo̩ lef Afu e-ogbegbele̩ le̩ agwe̩ akone̩ o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩-wa hiolo bʼuko̩lo̩ uku te̩ kʼa chʼucholo ñw O̩jo̩ ki deju?

Oñ abu kʼuku kpa tod echada ku ma chada e̩gba ku ma jʼef o̩wo̩ alo ekpe̩ e-ejodudu ki fʼulone̩tane̩ che lef e-le̩ i mud e̩nagbagba ugbo alo ekpe̩ etito̩, todu kʼabo ku ma dudo ki gba e̩wñ ogu e-ogbegbele̩ ku ma katane̩ le̩.
Todu ugbo ku ma kʼo̩takada e̩wñ ogu ekpe̩ tane̩, mak i dukpe̩ ku ma nʼijali ka kʼuku kpa e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ tila.
Todu o̩takada e̩wñ ogu ekpe̩ lonyane̩ ugbo oku one̩: todu i nʼugbiti abu kʼe̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ deju n.
Tod e-kide̩ dagba i chʼe-ejodudu le̩ ma du wane̩ etito̩ lubi e̩bie̩ n.
Todu abu ku Mose̩s fʼuko̩-wñ du ka jane̩ ñw amone̩ le̩ du teju o̩lo̩da, i nʼe̩bie̩ amo̩mokuno̩ kpʼamewo ko̩ manyʼomiofo kpʼedudu ala ekpikpa, kpai hiso̩p oñ i tafio̩ ubuku kpʼamone̩ le̩ du,
i kakini, E-kide̩ chʼe̩bie̩ alo ekpe̩ e-kʼO̩jo̩ tuko̩ ñw me̩.
Oñ i ño̩ tʼe̩bie̩ le̩ fiʼebu kpʼe̩wñ eku uko̩lo̩ abune̩ ki jʼef uwñ chaka abe̩le̩ ge̩.
I bo̩ re ku ma nʼe̩bie̩ gwe̩ e̩wñ du hiolo teju o̩lo̩da oñ ubi e̩bie̩ edafo ojoji etʼadure no̩ de̩ n.
Todule̩ eku ku ku ma nʼe̩bie̩ le̩ fʼe̩wñ uwo̩li e̩wñ efojale gwe̩hiolo: ama ma anʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ki nyo̩ tʼabo le̩ le gwe̩ e̩wñ efojale onugo hiolo.
Todu Kraisti mugudu tef uña kiafo̩ e-kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ che e-ki chʼujiwe ki bi e-ogbolo le̩ n; chai tef ojale onugo, kʼi kwotejugede fa-i eju O̩jo̩ todu wa.
I la chʼutodu kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ wa che o̩gbe̩nugbe̩ alu kʼagboji amatama nʼe̩bie̩ e̩wñ omune̩ mugudu nyʼef uña kiafo̩ o̩do̩ tʼo̩do̩ du le̩ n;

cho̩kpo̩ni i ma dukpe̩ ñw u kʼi ma li uwa o̩gbe̩nugbe̩ akwʼe̩gba ku ma kpʼe̩re̩ ile̩-i. Ama fa-i i kwotejugede onuʼkate e̩gba ukpoji o̩kpanachi o̩kpanachi-i, todu kʼi dʼadure tinyo̩ lef iche̩bo̩ kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ che le̩.
Oñ alu ku ma ko jo̩ ñw amone̩ ku ma ku onuʼkate, tak ubile̩ chʼajo;
abe̩le̩ ge̩ alu ku ma du Kraisti te̩ onuʼka kʼi nʼadure amone̩ wewe, i atejugede onuʼkeji ubi adure ojoji ñw abo ku ma jʼaneju owñ tod ujadu.

Todu abu kʼo̩lo̩da le̩ nʼojiji e̩wñ ki nyo̩ ki ache ki wa, kʼowñ le̩ ma chʼojibo e̩wñ le̩ onugonugo n, i neke je̩ ñw abo ku ma te̩wa mufu kpoji lef e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ku ma kowa o̩do̩ tʼo̩do̩ du o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ o̩gbegbele̩ n.
Cho̩kpo̩ni i ma nʼe̩gba ku ma ma we eduwa n? todu abu ku ma fʼabo ku ma jʼachucholo le̩ gwe̩ hiolo onuʼkate akone̩ o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩-ma ma ño̩ dʼo̩la adure bi ma ge̩ n.
Ama erewa adure o̩do̩ o̩do̩ dʼef e-le̩.
Todu e̩bie̩ amo̩kokuno̩ kpʼamewo neke kʼadure rinyo̩ n.
Lef e-le̩ oñ abu kʼi awʼef ile̩ i kakini,
iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe-ku ma che tod adure rʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ n.
E̩gbale̩ u kakini, U lewa kʼu che e̩wñ ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ me̩,
Abu kʼi ka ate̩ o̩mo̩ kakini, E̩wñ iche̩bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ eduwa kpʼiche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ tod adure dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ n, i la rʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ n, (owñ chʼe-ku ma che teju o̩lo̩da).
E̩gbale̩ i kakini, Go, u lewa kʼu che e̩wñ ki dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ me̩. I mʼe-ejodudu du kwʼo̩mo̩ todu kʼi dʼe-ekeji dago.
Ef edʼowñ e̩do̩ kidʼowñ e̩do̩ le̩ awa chʼabo kiafo̩ lef eduwa ku ma dʼaño̩la Jisusi Kraisti wa onuʼkate le̩.
Oñ atama du dago o̩jo̩ñwa o̩jo̩ñwa achabune̩ e-wñ, i la akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ o̩laʼkate wa o̩gbe̩nugbe̩, e̩wñ le̩ la neke kʼadure rinyo̩ ogbegbele̩ n.
Abu kʼowñ-i la mʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ oka duwa che tod adure pioo i kwoguguane̩ o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ O̩jo̩;
e-ki bo̩ chʼenede gbogbo taku ma kʼame̩nebi-wñ jo̩ chʼuke̩re̩no e̩re̩-wñ.
Todu lugbo e̩wñ okate kʼi duwa le̩ i je̩ ñw abo ku ma jʼache ma ku ma fo̩ mufu kpoji pioo.
Afu Kiafo̩ laño̩ nʼibenu agba ñw a ge̩; todu abu kʼi kakini,
Alo kʼu nakpe̩ kpʼama
i la nʼugbo du kʼu narewa adure-ma kpʼugbite̩re̩-ma ge̩ n.
Ugbo ku ma tʼe-le̩ no̩ e̩wñ eduwa tod adure i ño̩ ado̩mo̩ ge̩ n.
Todule̩, amo̩maye, abu kʼa chene̩ eju-e̩gbo kʼa gudu nyʼef uña kiafo̩ le̩ ef e̩bie̩ Jisus,
owñ chʼo̩na etito̩ ki deju kʼi dunyʼane̩ etito̩ todu wa le̩, lef ukpo ugbo̩na kʼe-le̩ chʼo̩rela-wñ,
oñ abu kʼatama inaina-i kʼabunyi O̩jo̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-wñ do̩mo̩;
a ki nʼe̩do̩ ogbolo kʼi che̩ko̩ ñw e̩do̩ ekono te̩wa, e̩wñ ki chʼetafio̩ e̩do̩-wa bʼe̩wñ bibi kʼakone̩ o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩ adʼu gwunyʼuwa te̩, o̩la ki chegwe̩ kpʼomi ki de̩ hiolo,
a ki mʼugbalu e-ibe ekono kʼa gbalu le̩ ne̩ gaga ki we emi daa, mi daa, todu E̩ne̩ ki ko̩la tane̩ ñw a le̩ chʼachubi one̩;
a ki nadibete̩ omune̩ kʼa kʼomune̩ e̩che̩ tef ufe̩do̩ kpʼuko̩lo̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩che̩,
a ki tʼekʼo̩la-wa jeju no̩ dabalu kʼabo iche̩ka te̩tache le̩ n; a ki la dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw omune̩; me̩ ki la che tule abu ku me̩ li ka kʼo̩jo̩ le̩ me̩ru awa me̩.
Todu a gwejugede dure abu kʼa mʼuma e-ochochi le̩ gba, iche̩bo̩ ño̩ bo̩ tod adure ge̩ n.
Chai ailo era anede ajo̩ kpʼuna ki adʼo̩go̩ ki ache ki kʼabo ku ma kobʼe̩wñ du mi.
E̩ne̩ du ki fe̩yakpo̩ o̩lo̩da Mose̩s, i nʼejumomi-wñ eli n, one̩ meji abe̩k e̩ta fʼibenu gba mak i leku.

E̩ne̩ ki fʼe̩re̩ tʼO̩ma O̩jo̩ mane̩ kʼe̩bie̩ alo ekpe̩ e-ki je̩ ñw u afo̩ le̩ chʼe̩wñ oja ofofo eju-wñ kʼi laño̩ fʼafu ufe̩de̩nyo̩ bina fa? e̩re̩ onumonu ame̩ do̩ kʼudu chʼeju-wñ ku ma abu ñw e̩ne̩ le̩ taa?
Todu awa che̩mʼe̩ne̩ ki kakini, Ache̩ ena chʼe-mi, omi ana koji. Tak i ño̩ dabi ka ge̩: Ondu akajo̩ amone̩-wñ.
Eñwa tef o̩wo̩ O̩jo̩ ki deju abailo.
Me̩ nalibekadʼadiko o̩gbo̩gba le̩, iko le̩ abu ku ma je̩ ñw eju-me̩ mune̩ uja iwo̩ ku me̩ fe̩do̩ lichi ugbo-wñ le̩ tabale,
o̩wo̩ʼka-wñ chʼabu ku ma mʼume̩ ko jo̩ ñw ina kpʼo̩bata ku me̩ chʼe̩wñ igo; o̩wo̩ ekeji-wñ owñ ño̩ chʼabu ku me̩ mud abo ku ma tuta kpʼabo ku ma che ma abe̩le̩.
Todu tʼame̩namu, ame̩ kwaliwo ñw ma, tak edinya ku ma dinya ane̩-me̩ le̩ ame̩ mugba kpʼuyo̩, abu ku me̩ chema ku me̩ ne̩ e-ki nyo̩ tule, owñ chʼe-ki akpo̩kpe̩.
Todule̩ me̩ ki dʼeju-e̩gbo-me̩ e-ki nʼuro̩me̩ lile le̩ tinyo̩ n.
Todu eku e̩do̩ elichi aku me̩, todu ku me̩ fʼe̩wñ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ ko̩che̩ kpa ku me̩ ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ ne̩.
Todu i bo̩ re tiki tiki
E̩no̩kpakpa e-mi muda adeju lugbo e̩do̩ ekono;
Awa muda chʼabo kʼa dabi tubi tef ulenyo̩ n; ama awa chʼabo e̩do̩ ekono kʼa gbʼonugo-wa.
Oñ e̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ kʼone̩ ma kʼe̩wñ ki akibeno do̩mo̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ ki adʼe̩wñ kʼeju ma li n bi rʼone̩ eju.
Todu ef e-le̩ oñ ma gba abogijo ibenu.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ kʼa nʼibe-wñ ka ku ma fʼo̩kpanachi o̩kpanachi ñwo̩che te̩ lugbo o̩la kʼO̩jo̩ ka, todu e̩wñ kʼeju ali-i wate̩ kwef e̩wñ ki tejugede-i n.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ kʼEbe̩l dʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ki nyo̩ tʼe-Ken le wa ñw O̩jo̩, lef e-kide̩ ma gbʼibenu kʼowñ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa, O̩jo̩ gbʼe̩wñ ele-wñ ibenu; oñ lef e-le̩ abu kʼi chaka leku i ako̩la ta.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ ku ma mʼIno̩k du kʼi we eli uku; ma la li owñ n, todabu kʼO̩jo̩ mʼowñ du le. Todu ma gbʼo̩ ibenu o̩gba taku ma mʼowñ du le ka kʼi chenyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju.
Ama lubi e̩do̩ ekono ojoji ache kʼe̩ nyʼO̩jo̩ eju jʼache n, todu i chʼotila kʼe̩ne̩ ki ate̩me̩rʼO̩jo̩ ki ke̩do̩no ka kʼi do̩mo̩, kʼowñ ño̩ mud e̩ne̩ ki aro̩me̩ ñw abo ku ma feju owñ.

E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ ku Noa ki akpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ ñwʼo̩ko̩ che kʼi jadu abunyi-wñ, abu ku ma fʼuka je̩ ñw u ugbo o̩la e̩wñ kʼeju ma li ta n; lef e-kide̩ i fʼile̩ kpabi, tak i mud e̩ne̩ ki aje̩ o̩kpakpa e-ki do̩mo̩ likpa e̩do̩ ekono le̩.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ kʼEbraham gbʼo̩la abu ku ma fʼu do̩ le̩ kʼi ledufu tef uña e-kʼi ache kʼi gba e̩wñ o̩gu; oñ i ledufu, i ma ugbo kʼi anyi o̩gbolo n.

E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ kʼi chʼilowa ef ane̩ ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩, dabe̩ne̩ kʼojane̩ e̩nomune̩, i gugu ef ebu manyʼAise̩k kpai Jeko̩b, ku ma chʼabo kʼama kpʼowñ aje̩ e̩wñ ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ ogu:
todu i aneju ewo ki nʼe̩rane̩ le̩, e-kʼacho̩na-wñ kpʼe̩nuko̩lo̩-wñ chʼO̩jo̩.
E̩do̩ ekono ño̩ chʼe̩wñ ku Sara onugo fʼukpahiu ne̩ kʼi dʼugbe̩ nyʼane̩ e̩gba kʼewo-wñ le, abu kʼe̩ne̩ ki ko̩la ñw u tane̩ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki achubi one̩ eju-wñ.
Tod e-kide̩ ge̩ kwugbo e̩ne̩ʼka kʼowñ la dabe̩ne̩ kʼoku one̩, uwewe one̩ ku ma dab awo ojale kpʼe̩lanyi ki dʼeti ohimini wate̩.
Abo-i chaka leku lo̩na e̩do̩ ekono, abu kʼe̩wñ ku ma kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ ma tʼuma o̩wo̩ n, ma muda li kwʼo̩najiji, ma laño̩ yo̩ ñw u, oñ ma gbalu ka kʼama chʼabononojo kpʼamilowa ane̩ ile̩.
Todu abo ku ma nʼo̩la e̩wñ abe̩-i aka adutejugede kakini, Ma tene ane̩ e-ma.
I la che̩wñ kʼibe-ma ma kadʼe-ku ma kwef uwñ dufu le̩ ma ma lʼuña edabi.
Ama fa-i ma fo̩tarʼe-ki nyo̩ tule, owñ chʼe-efojale: lef e-le̩ oñ i ma chʼe̩wñ anyo̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ku ma dʼowñ kʼO̩jo̩ e-ma n; todu i fʼewo ñwo̩che ñw ma me̩.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ kʼEbraham dʼAise̩k wa te̩ abu ku ma ajʼowñ ma le̩; owñ ki yo̩ ñw o̩la ku ma katane̩ le̩ la do̩mo̩ adʼo̩ma-wñ okpono wa ñw O̩jo̩;
owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ku ma ko̩la-wñ kakini, Efu Aise̩k ma ado̩ ugbe̩ ñw e̩.
Owñ fulo ka kʼO̩jo̩ neke dʼu kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku; ef uwo̩li uku i ño̩ dabi ne̩ kwo.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ kʼAise̩k kadua ñw Jeko̩b kpai Iso̩, ugbo o̩la e̩wñ ki ache ki wa.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ ku Jeko̩b kadua ñw amo̩ma Jose̩f okoke abu kʼi aku le̩; i laño̩ dojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩ oj o̩kpa-wñ.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ ku Jose̩f dibekadʼakwodufu amo̩ma Israe̩l abu kʼi me̩ ediñmi; oñ i fʼuko̩ te̩ ñw ma ugbo o̩la achiku-wñ.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ kʼabo ku ma bi Mose̩s dʼowñ maja ochu me̩ta, todabu ku ma li kʼi chʼo̩ma alifia; ma la ruilo o̩da onu le̩ n.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ ku Mose̩s ko̩ je̩ ñw ma dʼo̩ owñ kʼo̩ma o̩ma Fero e-onobule̩ e̩gba kʼi nana;
ebʼamone̩ O̩jo̩ li e̩bie̩ne̩ chʼe-kʼi du tʼe̩ne̩ e̩do̩ e̩bo̩ e-adure ki ma kpo̩kpe̩ n le.
Ina ku ma bu Kraisti chʼe̩wñ anana eju-wñ tʼe̩wñ akoko ane̩ Ijipti le, todu i mʼeju korʼuro̩me̩-wñ.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ ki tʼIjipti no̩, kʼi ma la railo e̩do̩fulu onu le̩ n: todu i fʼe̩do̩-wñ ji dabe̩ne̩ kʼi ali e̩ne̩ kʼeju ma li n le̩.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ ki fʼElaloji le̩ che, kʼi la dʼe̩bie̩ fonyʼolugbo̩na le̩, tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ ki akpʼamomo̩gba le̩ akʼuma o̩wo̩.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ ku ma lale gu ef Ohimini Ekpikpa du dabe̩ne̩ kʼane̩ e̩gbe̩; e-kʼabo Ijipti chʼajama-wñ kʼi la mʼuma ko mi.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ kʼaku Je̩riko gulo̩, owñ chʼabu ku ma lʼo daka o̩jo̩ mebie le̩.
E̩do̩ ekono chʼe̩wñ ku Rehab ajo̩ko̩ le̩ ma lenyo̩ manyʼabo ku ma ko̩ egbo̩lagbo̩ le̩ n, abu kʼi mʼabo ku ma kpe̩ atu ane̩ gba kpʼure̩do̩.
E̩wñ naño̩ ka taa? todu iko nyarʼumi kʼu choli o̩la Gidio̩n kpai Barak kpai Samson kpai Je̩fta, tʼe-Defid kpʼe-Samiue̩l kpʼe-amakache̩:
lef e̩do̩ ekono oñ ma fʼojane̩ ojane̩ du, ma fʼuko̩lo̩ o̩kpakpa che, e̩wñ ku ma katane̩ kwotʼuma o̩wo̩, ma je̩ ñw oli kwotʼamidu alu;
ma fʼukpahiu una kpalu, ma fʼalu ugbada o̩wo̩, ma fʼukpahiu ne̩ ef e̩gbo, ma mud amagbiti ef ogu, ma je̩ ñw amisoja abomune̩ ojoji mʼoji dalo̩.
Abobule̩ mʼabo-ma ki ku gba kwef udajikwane̩. Ma la fʼabomune̩ gwo okute̩, abu ku ma ko̩ e̩gba ula-ma tane̩; todu kʼama ki dʼo̩wo̩ dʼudajikwane̩ e-ki nyo̩ tule.
Ma la nʼakoru kpʼedili jʼabomune̩ ojoji ma, kpʼeji kpʼemu tʼunyi uga ge̩.
Ma nʼokuta fʼuma kpa, ma nʼebije fʼuma ko̩da meji, ma jʼuma ma, ma kʼuku ugbada; ma tale ef año̩ ala, kpʼef año̩ ewo; ma li ubie̩, ma chʼuma o̩bata, ma chʼuma e̩bie̩ne̩;
abo ile̩-i nyo̩ bʼabo kʼa ka-i jo̩ n; ma chila jʼaje̩tachi, kpʼuwo kpʼowo, kpʼef ura, ane̩-ile̩-i.
Oñ abo-i chaka abu ku ma gbʼuma ibenu lef e̩do̩ ekono-ma, ma la ne̩ e̩wñ ukatane̩ le̩ n,
abu kʼO̩jo̩ fʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ tule li tan? todu wa, todu kʼama ki we emufu kpoji lubi wa ojoji.

Abe̩le̩ awa ge̩ awa kʼame̩nibenu wewe abe̩-i donyʼuwa daka-i dabalu kʼakpa ojale adu te̩, ki namʼe̩wñ du ki agbaji tʼuwa o̩la kpʼadure ki ahika donyʼuwa gwo̩ jane̩, kʼa fe̩do̩lichi kʼa fʼule ku ma du te̩ o̩gba-wa-i ra.

Eju-wa ki kwo bʼe̩wñ ki bo̩ te̩ kʼi fe̩rʼUchane̩ kpʼAchʼe̩do̩ ekono kpoji, owñ che Jisusi kʼi fe̩do̩lichi ugbo oli uku, kʼi la dʼanyo̩-wñ rʼibe̩te̩ tod uyo̩ ku ma du te̩ o̩gba-wñ, fa-i i la kwogugu o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ ede O̩jo̩ me̩.
Todu ame̩ ki fʼibe alu kʼi fe̩do̩lichi ugbo o̩la kʼame̩nadure ka nyʼowñ o̩la ñwa, tode̩gba kʼo̩la-me̩ ada ki fʼonugo-me̩ hia.
Me̩ la fejugbiti akobʼadure ñʼe̩bie̩ rʼume̩ o̩la mama ta n:
me̩ la legbenyo̩ o̩la ugbe̩do̩ kʼi ako̩la ñw me̩ dab amo̩ma le̩ kakini,
todu e̩ne̩ kʼOndu afe̩do̩, i akʼo̩ o̩la,
Todu o̩la ku ma ko̩ me̩ le̩ oñ me̩ fe̩do̩ lichii. O̩jo̩ ache e̩wñ kpʼame̩ dab amo̩ma; todu ugbo o̩ma de̩ kʼata-wñ ma kʼo̩ o̩la n?
I la che̩wñ ku me̩ jo̩ ki ma nʼo̩la eko̩ me̩ n, mak amagbabi me̩ che, me̩ la chʼo̩ma n, todu e-duu ki chʼo̩ma anʼo̩la ku ma ako̩.
Ubile̩ ge̩ a nʼamata-wa e-o̩re̩la ku ma kʼuwa o̩la oñ a diba ñw ma; i dukpe̩ kʼa fʼo̩la-wa kamuhite̩ tule ñw Ata amafu kʼa adeju n?
Todu ama le̩ kʼuwa o̩la iko re teju alu ki nyo̩ eju-ma; owñ muda che ki nʼile ñwa, todu kʼa kitʼo̩wo̩ nyʼefo̩ e-owñ.
Uko̩ o̩la du ku ma kʼone̩ abajo̩-i anʼuyo̩ wa n, chai e̩do̩dudu eju-wa; e̩gba tʼe̩gba i arʼe̩ro ure̩do̩ e-o̩kpakpa ñw abo ku ma ko̩che̩ ugbo-wñ.
Todule̩ me̩ nafʼo̩wo̩ ki lo̩la kpʼokuku ki ku tʼo̩la ñwo̩che tʼe̩gu;
me̩ ki laño̩ fʼikpa okpoolo te̩ tod e̩re̩-me̩ tode̩gba ki fʼe-ki achika rida tiba, chai o̩ga-wñ echekpa.
Me̩ nabʼure̩do̩ kpʼefo̩ e-kʼeju e̩ne̩ du ma adʼOndu lubi-wñ n kpe̩re̩ ugbo e̩ne̩ du.
Me̩ nafeju gwanyi to̩de̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ʼka nyarʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩; tode̩gba kʼili ulukokoʼka afiga ki ache me̩ ihianyi, kʼe̩wñ damʼamone̩ wewe o̩la lef e-le̩;
tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ du chʼe̩nabutabu abe̩k e̩ne̩ ki ma dinye̩rʼe̩wñ n dabe̩ne̩ kʼIso̩ kʼi mʼo̩da o̩mo̩gba-wñ du ta tod o̩kpa o̩je̩ʼka de̩.
Todu ame̩ chema kakini, Ubi e-le̩ abʼi chaka dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi je̩ e̩nyo̩ le̩ ogu, ma fuñwa ka kʼi nyo̩ ku ma du ñw u n; todu i li uña eribeda du n, abʼi chaka nʼomi aku afeju nana nana.
Todu me̩ dufu wʼugbo uwo ku ma adʼo̩wo̩ chʼo kpʼe-ku ma la fʼuna-wñ ko kpʼugbo akpa ki du te̩ fioo kpʼugbo e̩chubi kpʼugbo ukpogo afu
kpʼugbo uko̩la o̩kakachi, kpʼugbo omu uko̩la n; owñ chʼe-kʼabo ku ma gbʼo̩ gbʼejumomi ku ma we edʼo̩la le̩ manyu ñw ma le̩;
todu ma neke ne̩ e̩wñ ku ma kpe̩ru ma le̩ n, i chaka chʼe̩la kad uwo le̩ ma arʼokuta kpa.
Oñ abu kʼe̩wñ ki tejugede le̩ abailo abe̩-i Mose̩s kakini, Ailo aba mi nana, o̩la-mi aga:
ame̩ muda dufu wa ugbo uwo Zayo̩n kpʼugbo ewo e-O̩jo̩ ki deju owñ che Je̩rusale̩m e-efojale, kpʼugbo amonuche̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ wewe,
ugbo o̩gbadu kpʼugbo ujeju abudo̩ e-amo̩mo̩gba e-ku ma kʼodu-ma rʼefojale, kpʼugbo O̩jo̩ kʼi chʼakajo̩ e̩ne̩ du kpʼugbo amafu e-ame̩no̩kpakpa ku ma mʼuma fu kpoji
kpʼugbo Jisusi ki chʼe̩nagbagba alo e-etito̩ kpʼugbo e̩bie̩ ku ma tafio̩ ki ako̩la e̩wñ tʼe-kʼe-Ebe̩l ka le.
Me̩ nago, ku me̩ we ede̩yakpʼe̩ne̩ ki ako̩la le̩. Todu iche̩wñ kʼabo ku ma de̩yakpo̩ e̩ne̩ ki juka ñw ma ile̩-i ma fʼo̩wo̩ tane̩ n, e-wa, kʼa dubigba e̩ne̩ ki kwʼefojale le̩ atule nana n?
Omuko̩la-wñ fʼane̩ miejo e̩gba le̩; i muda katane̩ fa-i me̩ kakini, I bo̩ onuʼka ta, kʼomi amiʼane̩ ile̩ kate ejo n, chai efojale kpoho.
