Oñ onuʼka ta kʼi ka dudufu kakini, E̩wñ emiejo le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ ku ma che te̩-i eko kwʼo̩mo̩, todu kʼe̩wñ ki ma miejo n, ki jo̩ alo waa.
Tod e-kide̩ abu kʼa agba o̩da ojane̩ ki ma miejo n, a ki nʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ kʼa che e̩wñ ki rʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ lef uwñ ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ kpʼe̩gahi ki ño̩ manyʼu:
todu O̩jo̩-wa ño̩ chʼuna ki afʼe̩wñ lie̩ mana.
Eche̩do̩ o̩maye ki nado̩mo̩ alo waa.
Me̩ ki gbenyo̩ eche̩do̩ ononojo n: todu lef e-le̩ abo iche̩ka chʼamonuche̩ O̩jo̩ ojo, ma la ma n.
Me̩ nadibekadʼabo ku ma jʼoj agba, dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩ kpʼama jʼoj agba; kpʼabo ku ma chʼuma e̩bie̩ne̩, abu kʼame̩ onugo laño̩ dʼef año̩la le̩ ta.
Echʼo̩ko̩ ñw o̩ya ki chʼe̩wñ ojima ef e̩wñ du, ojʼate̩-ma ki de̩ jali; todu O̩jo̩ akajo̩ ame̩nabutabu kpʼabo ku ma tene o̩ya one̩.

Alu ku me̩ de̩ ache e̩wñ ile̩-i ki nʼo̩ko̩ eche̩ño̩-wñ n; e̩wñ ki dʼugbo me̩ abu ku me̩ jo̩-i ki nabʼume̩ jo̩; todu owñ onugo kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼu nabʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ugbo we̩ n, i la nʼugbo du kʼu nadʼuwe̩ tinyo̩ n.
Todabe̩le̩ awa nʼeju-e̩gbo kʼa kakini,
Me̩ nalibekadʼame̩nuto̩gba-me̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma kʼo̩lO̩jo̩ ñw me̩ le̩; me̩ nafejugo alu kʼoji e̩wñ ku ma che ef ile̩-i de̩ lale ku me̩ wʼe̩do̩ ekono-ma che.
O̩nale̩ kpʼeñini Jisusi Kraist dʼalu kʼi de̩ ogbegbele̩.
Me̩ ki je̩ ñw uko̩ o̩la ojoji ojoji kpʼe-ejaduña ki ko me̩ alo n; todu i chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki fʼe̩do̩-me̩ lonyane̩; i ki chʼuje̩wñ, e-ki ma nʼile ñw abo ku ma tale ef uwñ n in.
Awa chenʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩, e-kʼabo ku ma che e̩wñ ebu le̩ ma n o̩da ku ma je̩ kwef uwñ n.
Todu ma kʼoku e̩la e-kʼagboji amatama kʼe̩bie̩-wñ wa ef uña kiafo̩ tod adure le̩, gujo ejo̩do̩da ala le̩.
Lef e-kide̩ Jisus onugo fʼuwa li ejo̩do̩da ala le̩, todu kʼi che kʼamone̩ le̩ ki fo̩, lef e̩bie̩ e-wñ,
oñ abe̩le̩ a ki nadufu nyʼugbo owñ ejo̩do̩da ala-i, kʼa ne̩ ina ku ma bʼowñ.
Todu a nʼewo ki akpo̩kpe̩ emi n, chai e-ki ache ki wa oñ a feju.
Todule̩ a ki dʼuñwulo̩ wa ñw O̩jo̩ e̩gba du kʼi chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩-wñ, e-le̩ chʼe̩ro uko ki agbalu ñw odu-wñ.
Me̩ ki muda gbenyo̩ e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ eche kpʼuta eta n, todu iche̩bo̩ e̩gʼe-le̩ chenyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju tabale.

Me̩ nagbʼo̩la ame̩nuto̩gba-me̩ gbo̩, me̩ ki la gbʼo̩wo̩ e̩lo̩ ñw ma; todu ma jʼagwe̩ke̩ adide tod onugo-me̩, abu kʼama acholi e̩wñ jo̩; todu kʼama ki che-i kpʼuyo̩, ki we echʼifi efi, todu e-le̩ ma chʼofu ñw me̩.
Me̩ nachadua todu wa, todu e̩do̩-wa mugba ka kʼa chenʼakone̩ o̩la o̩me̩me̩le̩ ef e̩do̩-wa, i dʼuwa e̩do̩ kʼa jʼachʼe̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ du.
Oñ naño̩ gbo̩ko̩bʼume̩ ku me̩ che ololo tule todu kʼomi kʼu dabi tʼe̩gu-mi ñw me̩ piopio tule.
Oñ O̩jo̩ e-ure̩do̩, e-ki mʼAdidala elile le̩ du dabi wa kwef abo ki ku ef e̩bie̩ alo ogbegbele̩, owñ chʼOndu-wa Jisus.
I ki nahi ume̩ iñmi ko ef e̩wñ ki nyo̩ du ku me̩ ki che e̩wñ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩, kʼi nachʼe̩wñ ki nyʼowñ eju ef uwa lefu Jisusi Kraist; ojima ki chʼe-owñ ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa. Ami.
Oñ nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, amo̩maye, me̩ naje̩ kpʼo̩la ugbe̩do̩-i; todu u fʼo̩takada o̩la pe̩ ko̩ rʼume̩-i.
Ame̩ ki ma ka ku ma tʼo̩maye-wa Timoti no̩ me̩; i takpa wa nali me̩ manyʼu.
Me̩ nagwa ame̩nuto̩gba-me̩ chaka, kpʼabo kiafo̩ chaka. Abo Itali agwa me̩.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki dʼugbo me̩ chaka. Ami.
Jeme̩s, adu O̩jo̩ kpʼe-Ondu Jisus Kraisti, tʼugbo abo̩lo̩pu me̩gweji ku ma chʼe̩kpatuka jo̩ le̩, Me̩ agba-oo!
O̩chaka-wñ ki chʼuyo̩ eju-me̩, amo̩maye-mi, e̩gba du ku me̩ ñwa rʼef ajama ojoji ojoji,
abu ku me̩ chema ka kʼe̩do̩ ekono-me̩ eñwago achuko̩lo̩ e̩do̩ elichi.
Me̩ ki la je̩ ñw e̩do̩ elichi le̩ ki nʼuko̩lo̩-wñ ache tʼukpoji, todu kʼame̩ ki mufu kpoji, kʼe̩wñ du ki jo̩ o̩la-me̩, ki nʼe̩wñ du ki bo̩ n.
I la che̩wñ kʼibe nyarʼe̩ne̩ʼka ef ume̩, i ki bi ugbo O̩jo̩ kʼi nʼe̩do̩ foo kʼi akʼe̩wñ ñw e̩ne̩ du, kʼi ma la akicha ñw e̩ne̩ du n, taku ma adʼu ñw u.
I ki muda bi ef e̩do̩ eko̩no̩, i ki ñwa tʼemi tʼemi n. Todu e̩ne̩ ki do̩mo̩ añwa tʼemi tʼemi dab akpoli ohimini kʼafu adʼu, kʼi la arʼo̩ tʼemi tʼemi.
Todu e̩ne̩ le̩ ki we e̩nʼibe ka kʼi agba e̩wñʼka kwʼugbo Ondu.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ibe meji i che, o̩na kʼi ale nʼofe ane̩ n.
O̩maye kʼi la chʼo̩wo̩wane̩ kʼi nabuba ef udago-wñ kʼi chʼatate̩.
E̩ne̩ kʼi chʼanana ki nabuba ef ehio̩wo̩-wane̩-wñ, todu i alale rinyo̩ dab ododo egbe.
Todu olu kwane̩ manyʼafu ki kpuna, oñ i aje̩ ñw egbe gbe̩, tak ododo-wñ achi wane̩, oñ uto̩ eju e-wñ alenyo̩ rʼile̩. Abe̩le̩ anana ñʼakwacha rinyo̩ o̩na o̩na-wñ kʼi ale.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi afe̩do̩lichi ugbo eja-ma ku ma ajʼowñ ma, gbede. Todu e̩gba du ku ma fʼu ñwago̩ kʼi nyo̩ kpa, i agba uloko e̩-iñmi, e-kʼi ko̩la-wñ tane̩ ñw abo ku ma afe̩do̩ owñ.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi dʼef ajama ki we eka kʼO̩jo̩ ajʼumi ma-i. Todu i nʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du ki ajʼO̩jo̩ ma n. Owñ la ajʼe̩ne̩ du ma n.
Ajama e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ la kwʼugbo eño̩ e̩wñ kʼowñ onugo ache, e-le̩ afʼo̩, e-le̩ adʼo̩jo̩ te̩ ñw u.
Tak e̩gba kʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ le̩ fʼefu nyo̩, i abi adure. Adure la gbakpa, i adʼuku dufu.
Me̩ we edʼo̩la-me̩ ibe, amo̩maye-mi kʼu nafe̩do̩.
Ele eche nyo̩nyo̩ kpʼele ki mufu du kwo ate̩ wa. I nagwo̩ru awa kwʼugbo Ala ugane̩ e-kʼuña erida alu kʼojiji olu arida le̩ ma dʼugbo-wñ n.
Abu kʼi neku, i nʼo̩la ochochi bi wa, todu kʼawa ki chʼejo̩ga e̩wñ kʼi nyi uche̩ʼka.
A me̩ ma, amo̩maye-mi kʼu nafe̩do̩. E̩ne̩ du ki hika gbo̩, kʼi la che̩du eko̩la, kʼi ño̩ che̩du e̩we̩do̩.
Todu uwe̩do̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ achuko̩lo̩ o̩kpakpa O̩jo̩ dufu n.
Todule̩, me̩ ki fʼe̩wñ iwa du kpʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ki chʼo̩be̩le̩ke̩te̩ jo̩ gwo̩ jane̩, me̩ ki jo̩ chikimi ku me̩ gbʼo̩la ki neke jadu onugo-me̩, owñ chʼe-ku ma chine ef ume̩ le̩.
Me̩ ki muda chʼamache e̩wñ kʼo̩la le̩ ka; ku me̩ la we echʼamagbo̩ kate, o̩la-me̩ eda ibe e-le̩ che.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka chʼagbo o̩la le̩, kʼi ma la chʼache n, e̩ne̩ le̩ dab e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼi ago eju-wñ ef ogigo alu kʼi de̩ ku ma bi u.
Todu i fʼibe alu kʼo̩la-wñ de̩ ma, oñ i le owñ, tak ababa le̩ i gbenyo̩ alu kʼo̩la-wñ de̩.
Ama e̩ne̩ ki hie̩do̩ wane̩ chii ago ef o̩lo̩da ki mufu kʼi ño̩ chʼe-o̩mone̩ le̩, kʼi la gugu ef uwñ waa, kʼi ma mud agbo̩ kʼi agbenyo̩ n, chai ache uko̩lo̩-wñ, owñ le̩ agbede ef e̩wñ kʼi ache.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka do̩ kʼi ache O̩jo̩, kʼi ma la fʼo̩wo̩ mʼalu-wñ ne̩ n, kʼi muda mʼe̩do̩-wñ ibe da, eche O̩jo̩ e-e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼo̩wai.
O̩jo̩ eche ki de̩ hiolo kpʼe-kʼi de̩ jali ugbo O̩jo̩ kpʼAta chʼukakini, Enyʼafejudʼamo̩mayuku kpʼamo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ef o̩bata-ma, kpai o̩la-wñ onugo ede bʼe̩wñ ile̩-i te̩ kʼe̩wñ ki we edamʼo̩.
Amo̩maye-mi, me̩ ki we enʼe̩do̩ ekono Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti e-ojima le̩ ef e̩nejuma.
Todu, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kʼelika o̩jamalia tunyʼo̩ o̩wo̩ kʼi la kʼukpo o̩me̩me̩le̩ nyʼo̩la mugudu wʼef unyi ujeju-me̩, kʼe̩nale kʼi nʼukpo ane̩bo̩ ño̩ gudu wa,

kʼame̩ la li e̩ne̩ kʼi kʼukpo o̩me̩me̩le̩ le̩ nyʼo̩la eju, ku me̩ kakini, Uwe̩ ki gugu uña o̩me̩me̩le̩ emi-i, ku me̩ la ka ñw e̩nale le̩ kakini, Uwe̩ ki dago o̩mo̩, cho̩kpo̩ni, e̩ gugu ofe e̩wñ uke̩re̩no-mi-i,
i chʼo̩la-me̩ eñwaru ojoji ojoji de̩ n? Oñ me̩ mud amañwa one̩ ru ku ma nʼibe bibi akpe̩.
Me̩ gbo̩, amo̩maye-mi kʼomi afe̩do̩ me̩, i chʼame̩nale ile̩-i oñ O̩jo̩ chi ku ma mud amanana ef e̩do̩ ekono n? kpʼamaje̩ e̩wñ ogu ojane̩-wñ kʼi kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ ñw ame̩nufe̩do̩-wñ ni
A me̩ muda chi e̩nale ukata! I chʼamanana ade me̩ ma n? ku ma laño̩ fʼume̩ fa wʼef ajo̩ n?
I chʼama achakpabie̩ odu o̩me̩me̩le̩ ku ma do̩ manyʼume̩ le̩ n?
Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ che e̩wñ kʼo̩lo̩da Onu ka tʼeju alu kʼOtakada O̩la O̩jo̩ ka kpa, kakini, Uwe̩ ki fe̩do̩ ekeji-we̩ dab o̩la-we̩, mak o̩me̩me̩le̩ me̩ che.
I muda che̩wñ kʼame̩ nʼe̩nejuma, mak adure me̩ ta le̩. O̩lo̩da adʼe-le̩ bi me̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼada me̩ je̩ le̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ ki fʼo̩gbo̩ o̩lo̩da du de, kʼi la ro̩ko̩ibu ef e̩wñ okate, i mud e̩ne̩ ki fʼabi o̩chaka-wñ je̩.
Todu, e̩ne̩ kʼi kakini, E̩ ki tene o̩ya e̩ne̩ omune̩ n, ño̩ ka kakini, E̩ ki kpone̩ n. I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ ma tene o̩ya one̩ n, kʼe̩ muda kpʼone̩ mak e̩ mud e̩ne̩ ki fʼada o̩lo̩da je̩ me̩.
Me̩ ko̩la, me̩ ki la che e̩wñ dabe̩ne̩ ku ma ache ku ma kajo̩ me̩ lef o̩lo̩da e-o̩mone̩ le̩.
Todu ajo̩ e̩ne̩ ki ma ali ejumomi one̩ n anʼejumomi eli ef uwñ n. Ejumomi muda abuba ñw ajo̩.
Amo̩maye-mi, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka ka kʼi chenʼe̩do̩ ekono, kʼi ma la nʼuko̩lo̩ kʼi che n, e̩wñ chʼile-wñ? Edo̩ ekono le̩ neke jadu-wñ?
Iche̩wñ kʼo̩maye e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ tago ofo, kʼuje̩wñ añʼo̩ o̩jo̩ du,
oñ e̩ne̩ʼka ef ume̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, I ra ñwu me̩ kpo̩o̩. Afu ki we ekpa me̩. Efu-me̩ ki la ko̩ ke, ku me̩ ma la kʼe̩wñ eku año̩la ñwu ma n, e̩wñ chʼile-wñ?
Abe̩le̩ e̩do̩ ekono la de̩. I ma nʼuko̩lo̩ eche mʼo̩ n, owñ o̩to̩to̩la-wñ chʼoku e̩wñ.
E̩ne̩ʼka muda kakini, Uwe̩ nʼe̩do̩ ekono, omi la nʼuko̩lo̩ kʼu che. Mak uwe̩ ki dʼe̩do̩ ekono-we̩ ña mi ubi uko̩lo̩ eche ojoji, tak omi anʼuko̩lo̩ kʼu che dʼe̩do̩ ekono-mi ñʼuwe̩.
Uwe̩ ke̩do̩no ka kʼO̩jo̩ chʼokate; o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩ che le̩. I chaka chʼamebili ake̩do̩no e-le̩; o̩la-ma la aga.
I dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ ma? uwe̩ e̩no̩wai, ka kʼe̩do̩ ekono ubi uko̩lo̩ eche ojoji chʼagaji?
I che kwef uko̩lo̩ kʼEbraham ata-wa che oñ ma dale ñw u n? Owñ chʼo̩ma-wñ Aise̩k, kʼi duwa ñw O̩jo̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ n?
E li ka kʼe̩do̩ ekono-wñ bʼuko̩lo̩-wñ che taku kwef uko̩lo̩ le̩ e̩do̩ ekono-wñ mufu kpoji.
Oñ O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ che̩ kpa ki kakini, Ebraham la ke̩do̩nʼO̩jo, oñ ma fʼe-le̩ lorʼo̩kpakpa ñw owñ. Taku ma dʼo̩ ko onuku O̩jo̩.
Ame̩ li ka ku ma adale ñw one̩ kwef uko̩lo̩ eche, i la kwef e̩do̩ ekono kate n.
Abe̩le̩ Rehab ajo̩ko̩ ge̩, i che kwef uko̩lo̩ kʼi che oñ ma dale ñw u n? Owñ chʼamonuche kʼi gba ma nyi le, kʼi la ko ma kwʼo̩mo̩ lʼo̩na omune̩.
Todu alu kʼaño̩la ubi afu ojoji chʼoku e̩wñ, abe̩le̩ e̩do̩ ekono ubi uko̩lo̩ eche ojoji ño̩ chʼoku e̩wñ ge̩.
Amo̩maye-mi, ame̩ ku me̩ mud amakone̩wñ, me̩ ki wewe n, abu ku me̩ chema ka kʼajo̩ e-wa akpuna tʼuma le.
Todu o̩chaka-wa aro̩ko̩ibu ef e̩wñ wewe. E̩ne̩ du kʼi ma ro̩ko̩ibu ef o̩la eka n, e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ki mufu oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ che, i laño̩ neke fʼo̩wo̩ mʼo̩gbo̩ año̩la-wñ du ne̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼa dʼajamu tʼalu amanya ku ma ki gbʼo̩la-wa gbo̩, o̩gbo̩ año̩la-ma du a la añʼo̩ o̩na le̩.
Me̩ ño̩ gʼo̩ko̩ ge̩; dagba i chaka nana kʼafu ki gbiti ako, oche ki nya añʼo̩ o̩na kʼi le ugbo du kʼe̩do̩ onu o̩ko̩ neku.
Abe̩le̩ ukpalu ño̩ chʼe̩wñ año̩la re ge̩; i muda aba tabale! Me̩ go abu kʼuna re amu iji inaina kʼi jo!
Ukpalu laño̩ chʼuna ge̩; ile̩ e uji i che; ukpalu te̩ ef e̩wñ año̩la-wa adʼiwa mʼo̩gbo̩ año̩la du. I akʼuna nyʼe̩wñ du ki dʼo̩la one̩, una uña ubie̩ la akʼuna nyʼowñ.
Todu ma neke nʼame̩la kpʼame̩we̩ kpʼamejo kpʼame̩la ef omi chaka ku ma mʼone̩ o̩la, one̩ la ne̩ abe̩le̩ me̩.
I muda nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi neke nʼukpalu kʼi amʼone̩ o̩la n. E̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ki ma nʼedolo te̩ n i che; i che̩ko̩ ñw olo ki akpʼone̩.
E-le̩ a du je̩nyʼOndu kpʼAta; a laño̩ dʼe-le̩ nama ñw one̩ ku ma che kʼi biu O̩jo̩;
kwef aluʼkate le̩ uje̩nyu kpʼama ena adufu wa. Amo̩maye-mi, i chʼeju-wñ kʼe̩wñ-i adʼabe̩le̩ n.
Alu e̩bi omi okate adʼomi e̩rinyo̩ kpʼe-e̩lukoko dufu?
Amo̩maye-mi, oli o̩gbaikolo neke ro o̩lif? Ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma aro o̩gbaikolo? Abe̩le̩ omi omu neke mud omi ki rinyo̩ eñmo̩ n.
E̩ne̩ dʼef ume̩ kʼi nʼibe kʼi laño̩ mʼoji e̩wñ? E̩ne̩ le̩ ki nʼali e̩nyo̩-wñ añʼone̩ uko̩lo̩-wñ ef ibe chikimi.
I muda che̩wñ kʼogu eja ki lukoko kpʼibe edane̩kpeju jʼef e̩do̩-me̩, me̩ ki buba n, me̩ ki la rʼolemi nyʼochochi n.
I chʼibe ki akwʼate̩ wa de̩ n, chai e-ane̩-ile̩-i de̩, e-onugo one̩ i che, e-amebili de̩.
Todu ugbo kʼogu eja kpʼedane̩kpeju de̩, o̩mo̩ utu e̩da kpʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩ eche chaka ajo̩.
E̩wñ ki dʼo̩gba ef ibe ki akwʼate̩ wa muda chʼede̩ yaala, tak i chʼe-ure̩do̩, i ache e̩wñ yo̩o̩; i chʼebo̩la, i che̩ko̩ ñw ejumomi one̩ eli kpʼe̩ro ki nyo̩; i añwa tʼemi tʼemi n, i nʼako̩ru n.
Ma la dʼe̩ro o̩kpakpa gbe̩ ef ure̩do̩ tod abo ku ma che e̩wñ ure̩do̩.
Uja e̩gidi kpʼogu ki awʼef ume̩ fa, ugbo i kwo ta? I chʼugbo e̩wñ ki abʼume̩ e̩do̩ ki jʼef e̩wñ año̩la-me̩ aja le̩ i kwo n?
Me̩ chʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ, me̩ la ne̩ n; me̩ kpone̩, me̩ la jogu omune̩, o̩wo̩-me̩ la neke tu n; me̩ jʼegidi, me̩ jogu; me̩ la ane̩ n, ukpe̩ ku me̩ ma bi n.
Me̩ bi, me̩ la agba n, todabu ku me̩ bi lʼo̩na e̩bie̩ne̩, todu kʼame̩ ki dʼu kpabie̩ ef e̩wñ ki abʼume̩ e̩do̩ ofo.
Ame̩ amajo̩ko̩! me̩ ma ka kʼonuku ile̩-i eche chʼe̩nebi O̩jo̩ eche n? Todule̩ e̩ne̩ du kʼi neku echʼonuku ile̩ mʼo̩la-wñ du chʼe̩nebi O̩jo̩.
Abe̩k ame̩ do̩ kʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ako̩la o̩wai ofo? Afu kʼi je̩ ñw u dodo ef uwa añeju e̩wñ gbogbo tʼelie̩na.
I muda adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ki tule wa. Lef e-le̩ i kakini, O̩jo̩ ako bʼabo ku ma hi o̩la-ma ne̩, i muda adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ñw abo ku ma hi o̩la-ma wane̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nafʼo̩la-me̩ kamuhite̩ ñw O̩jo̩; me̩ ki muda dago bʼAbulumone̩ tak i ara bʼume̩ te̩.
Me̩ te̩me̩rʼO̩jo̩ tak owñ ate̩me̩ru me̩. Me̩ ki fʼo̩wo̩-me̩ gwe̩ ki fe̩, ame̩ ame̩nadure; me̩ fʼe̩do̩-me̩ gworinyo̩, ame̩ abo ibe meji.
Me̩ ki li ubie̩, me̩ daido̩, me̩ raku ge̩. Anyi-me̩ ki rida tef aido̩ edo̩, uyo̩-me̩ ki ño̩ rida chʼayiku ge̩.
O̩la-me̩ ki chʼe̩hiwane̩ eju Ondu, tak owñ ahi ume̩ ne.

Me̩ ki chakpabie̩ omune̩ n, amo̩maye. E̩ne̩ ki achakpabie̩ o̩maye, abe̩k i akpʼo̩maye-wñ abi mak akpabie̩ o̩lo̩da i ache le̩, i akpʼo̩lo̩da abi de̩: i la che̩wñ kʼe̩ kajo̩ o̩lo̩da, i chʼache e̩wñ kʼo̩lo̩da ka oñ e̩ che n, chai e̩ne̩ ki akajo̩ o̩lo̩da uwe̩ che.
Adʼo̩lo̩da wa kpʼakajo̩ chʼe̩ne̩kate, Owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼukpahiu kʼi ajadu, kʼi laño̩ nʼukpahiu kʼi ako nyʼef ulenyo̩ le̩. E̩ne̩ uwe̩ che, kʼe̩ kpʼekeji-we̩ abi ta?
Me̩ lewa ta, ame̩ ku me̩ kakini, Eñini-i abe̩k o̩na oñ a anyʼewo abe̩i kʼa che e̩wñ o̩mo̩ o̩do̩ʼka, kʼa chʼinya-ma kʼa jʼile;
me̩ la ma e̩wñ ki ade̩ o̩na n. Ab iñmi-me̩ de̩? Todu ame̩ chʼatula ki atejugede pe̩e̩ tak i alenyo̩ rʼeju.
E-ku me̩ ma ka koji de̩, kakini, Iche̩wñ ki dʼOndu e̩do̩ a la adeju oñ a achʼe-i abe̩k e-le̩.
Fa-i me̩ jʼabuba ef eke-me̩ le̩. Uba e̩go̩ e-le̩ du chʼe̩wñ bibi.
Todu, ugbo e̩ne̩ ki ma e̩wñ ki chʼo̩me̩me̩le̩ kʼi ache, kʼi ma la ache n, adure i che nw e̩ne̩ le̩.
Me̩ lewa ke, ame̩ amanana, me̩ raku, me̩ kwa taa noj ubie̩ ki awa abʼume̩ma.
E̩wñ anana-me̩ che̩ me̩, ojudu fʼotogbo-me̩ lo̩ kpa.
O̩jamalia-me̩ kpʼajifa-me̩ te̩kala me̩; e̩te̩kala-wñ agbʼibenu nyu me̩, i ñʼaje̩ o̩re̩la-me̩ dab una. Ame̩ gbʼe̩wñ akoko jo̩ o̩jo̩ otitala-i.
Me̩ go, ome̩ abuko̩lo̩ ku ma kpa e̩wñ oko-me̩ e-ku me̩ gwo̩nyʼu afuma le̩ nakwa; oñ ukwa abo ku ma kʼe̩wñ oko-me̩ wʼunyi la raugudu tʼeti Ondu ki nʼe̩wñ du me̩.
Ame̩ te̩tajʼile-i ajʼura, me̩ la jʼachile̩; me̩ je̩ ñw e̩do̩-o̩la-me̩ bo o̩jo̩ku ma kpʼone̩ dab e̩la.
Me̩ fʼabi kpʼo̩, me̩ ño̩ fʼE̩no̩kpakpa le̩ kpa ge̩; i akobʼume̩ n.
Todule̩ me̩ nafe̩do̩je̩ waa, amo̩maye, gbogbo tʼewa Ondu. Me̩ go, aluche̩ do̩mo̩ anede e̩ro ane̩-ile̩-i e-o̩me̩me̩le̩. I aje̩do̩ gbogbo tak i mʼomi ojale ejodudu kpʼe-ubiane̩ gba.
Ame̩ ki ño̩ je̩do̩ ge̩. Me̩ nahi e̩do̩-me̩ e̩re̩ nyane̩; todabu kʼewa Ondu me̩ro̩wo̩ me̩.
Me̩ ki fiʼomune̩ ifi n, amo̩maye, todu ku ma ki we ekpa me̩ abi: go, Akajo̩ dago alugbo̩na me̩.
Amo̩maye, me̩ kʼamakache̩ ku ma ko̩la ef odu Ondu le̩ chʼe̩wñ uwo̩li uwa e̩bie̩ne̩ eli kpai e̩do̩ eje̩.
Me̩ go, a aka kʼabo ku ma fʼe̩do̩ lichi gbede: ame̩ la gbʼinabali e̩do̩ lichi e-Job me̩; me̩ laño̩ li ukpoji Ondu, kakini, Ondu nʼe̩do̩ ki achʼiwo̩ one̩ gbe̩, i ali ejumomi one̩.
E̩wñ ki muda tʼo̩gba e̩wñ du la de̩, amo̩maye-mi, me̩ ki ge̩bo̩ n, tʼe-efojale, tʼe-ane̩-ile̩-i, tʼe-e̩bo̩ omune̩ du. I-i-me̩ ki chʼi-i ke, oda-me̩ ki chʼo̩da! todu e̩gba ku me̩ ñwa tʼef ajo̩.
I nʼe̩ne̩ ki ali uwa e̩bie̩ne̩ ef ume̩? I ki chʼadua. I nʼe̩ne̩ kʼe̩do̩-wñ bo̩? I ki kʼeli dʼO̩jo̩.
I nʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼef ume̩ ki ma lo̩ ñw u n? I ki fʼabogijo ujeju abudo̩ Ondu do̩ wa; abu ku ma dʼekpo kulu ef odu Ondu ama ki chʼadua bʼo ma.
Adua e-e̩do̩ ekono la ajadu e̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ muda le̩, tak Ondu adʼu kwane̩. I la che̩wñ ki chʼa dure i ta ño̩ ta le̩, ma ato̩no̩ ñw u.
Todule̩ me̩ nagbalu adure-me̩ ñw omune̩, ku me̩ nachadua tod omune̩, ku ma ki fʼo̩ga-me̩ che. Uko̩lo̩ kʼo̩ko̩ kʼe̩no̩kpakpa agba bʼO̩jo̩ ache chʼegbiti.
E̩laija chʼone̩ kʼe̩wñ awo̩ dab awa, echadua i la chʼadua kʼomi ki we elo, oñ omi ma lo̩ bʼane̩-ile̩ ma n gbogbo o̩do̩ me̩ta kpʼochu me̩fa.
Tak i ño̩ dabi chʼadua, oñ efojale dʼomi wa tak ane̩-ile̩ ño̩ kʼe̩ro-wñ dufu wa ge̩.
Amo̩maye-mi, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ chila bʼochochi te̩, tak e̩ne̩ʼka rʼowñ da tʼe̩gu,
ame̩ ki ma kakini, E̩ne̩ ki rʼe̩nadure da kwef ila o̩na-wñ ajadu onugo e̩ne̩ le̩ kwef uku, i lañʼadʼe̩wñ bʼugwe̩ko̩ adure ma ge̩.
Pita, e̩nukpuche̩ Jisusi Kraisti, tʼugbo amilowa ku ma che̩kpatuka jʼane̩ Po̩nto̩s kpai Galatia kpai Kapadosia kpai Esia kpai Be̩tunia.

Owñ chʼabo kʼO̩jo̩ Ata chi ma likpa alu kʼi fʼe̩wñ du ma tane̩ ef efo̩ e-Afu, kʼame̩ ki gbʼo̩la Jisusi Kraisti gbo̩, kʼe̩bie̩-wñ ki natafi ume̩ o̩la. Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼure̩do̩ ki dʼugbo me̩. I ki nana nyo̩gba.
O̩jo̩ kʼi laño̩ chʼAta Ondu-wa Jisusi Kraisti ki nele. I fʼuwa bi etito̩ teju ejumomi-wñ o̩gbaje̩je̩ ñw ukibeno ki deju, lef edajikwane̩ ki Jisusi Kraisti dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku.
Kʼa ki jʼe̩wñ ogu ki ma ache̩ n, e-kʼe̩wñ ma damʼo̩ n, kʼi ma la acha n, e-kʼama jʼadejutʼo̩ efojale tod ame̩,
kʼukpahiu O̩jo̩ jʼadide me̩ lef e̩do̩ ekono tod ujadu kʼi chʼeñwo̩che te̩ ku ma mubi rʼeju adiko otitala.
Me̩ nagwoguyo̩ ef e-le̩ waa; dagba i chaka dukpe̩ kʼame̩ ache̩do̩dudu iko re-i ef ajama ojoji ojoji ta.
Todu ku ma ki li ka kʼe̩do̩ ekono-me̩ ku ma añwago kʼi chʼe̩wñ akoko tʼo̩jamalia ki akpabie le nana dagba ma chaka nʼuna gwe̩, anʼuñwulo̩ kpʼojima kpʼubumo̩ ef ebite̩ Jisusi Kraist,
owñ kʼame̩ ma li n, kʼame̩ muda afe̩do̩ uwñ le̩; dagba kʼeju-me̩ ma dʼo̩ fa-i ta n; abu ku me̩ muda ake̩do̩nʼo, me̩ nʼuyo̩ ki ma jʼaka n e-kʼojima che̩ko̩ ñw u agwoguyo̩.
Ame̩ agba oji e̩do̩ ekono-me̩ le̩, owñ chʼujadu e-onugo-me̩.
Amakache̩ ku ma fʼache̩ o̩la ufe̩de̩nyo̩ le̩ ka ñwu me̩ feju oji e̩wñ ujadu kʼa ka-i ema, ma laño̩ tejane̩-wñ kiili.
Ma jʼatejane̩ iko e̩gba, kpai alu kʼiko kʼAfu Kraisti kʼi dʼef uma le̩ adu dufu ade̩, owñ chʼabu kʼi nagbʼibenu tane̩ ugbo iwo̩ ki Kraist ali kpai ojima ki dʼubi-wñ.

Ma mubi rʼuma eju ka kʼi chʼo̩la-ma n, chai ame̩ oñ ma jo̩ ache e̩wñ le̩ ñw u, owñ chʼe-ku ma dʼu ka ñwu me̩ fa-i lef abo ku ma fʼuche̩nyo̩ je̩ rʼume̩ ef Afu Kiafo̩ ku ma kpe̩ kwʼefojale wa. E̩ño̩-wñ che amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ ku ma te̩kpe̩ agʼo̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nafʼe̩wñ lʼago e-ibe-me̩ de. Ibe-me̩ ki chʼewane̩, ku me̩ kibeno ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ku ma ane̩ wa ñwu me̩ ef ebite̩ ku ma abi Jisus Kraisti te̩ tʼukpoji.
Dabe̩ne̩ kʼamo̩ma ku ma agbʼo̩la gbo̩, ame̩ ki chʼo̩la-me̩ ku me̩ biu alu ku me̩ de̩ o̩gbo̩gba ef e̩ño̩ e̩wñ ku me̩ che iko ugbodu-me̩ le̩ n;
ame̩ ki la mud abo kiafo̩ ef e̩wñ du ku me̩ jo̩ ache, alu kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi do̩ me̩ afo̩ le̩.
Todu ma fʼu ko̩ tane̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki chʼabo kiafo̩, ukpe̩ kʼomi afo̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ ku me̩ do̩ kʼAta-me̩ le̩ ma nʼe̩nejuma n, kʼi muda akajo̩ one̩ teju alu kʼuko̩lo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ de̩, maku me̩ ki jo̩ ef ailo era iko ilowa-me̩-i,
abu ku me̩ chema ka kʼi chʼe̩wñ kʼi ache̩ dab ajifa kpʼo̩jamalia oñ ma ne̩ la me̩ tane̩ kwef e̩wñ o̩gu o̩wai kʼamata-me̩ du tane̩ ñwu me̩ le̩ n.
Chai e̩bie̩ akoko, kʼi dabe̩ne̩ kʼe-o̩mala kʼi ma nʼuchalu n, kʼi ma la nʼe̩kpabie̩ o̩la n, owñ chʼe-Kraisti,
e-kʼO̩jo̩ fʼu ma tane̩ o̩gba taku ma kpʼe̩re̩ ile̩-i, ma muda dʼu tejugede iko otitala-i tod ame̩,
ku me̩ ke̩do̩nʼO̩jo̩ lefuwñ. Owñ chʼO̩jo̩ kʼi dʼowñ kwane̩ kwef abo ki ku, kʼi laño̩ mʼojima du ñw u, todu kʼuke̩do̩no-me̩ kpʼukibeno-me̩ ki chʼO̩jo̩.
Abu ku me̩ fʼonugo-me̩ gworinyo̩ ef ochochi ku me̩ mugbagbo̩ kʼeche̩do̩ amo̩maye-me̩ ki we enʼakoru, me̩ ki fe̩do̩ omune̩ kpʼe̩do̩-me̩ gbali,
abu ku ma ma fʼume̩ bi etito̩ kwef ugbe̩ kʼi ache̩ n, chai kwef e-ki ma ache̩ n, lef o̩lO̩jo̩ kʼi deju ki ado̩mo̩ pioo.
Todu, o̩re̩la du dab egbe, ojima-wñ chaka la dab ododo egbe; egbe-wñ gbe̩, ododo-wñ chi tane̩.
Uko̩la Ondu muda ado̩mo̩ tʼogbegbele̩. E-le̩ la chʼuko̩la kʼa dʼu juche̩nyo̩ rʼume̩.
Todule̩ me̩ ki kʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du kpʼe̩wñ o̩gwo̩ du kpʼe̩wñ akoru kpʼe̩wñ ulie̩na kpʼalu eka nyʼone̩ chaka rinyo̩.
Ame̩ ki ñeju omi e̩nya ku ma ma chʼe̩wñ gwʼo̩ n, kʼi chʼe-ibe, dabe̩ne̩ kʼamo̩me̩kpa ku ma bi e̩bie̩ e̩bie̩, todu kʼame̩ ki gbʼo̩kone̩ alo ef e-le̩ tef ujadu,
iche̩wñ kʼame̩ fʼu jama ku me̩ ma ka kʼOndu chʼe̩numo̩la.
Me̩ ki te̩me̩rʼowñ waa, owñ le̩ kʼi chʼokuta ki deju, e-kʼamone̩ fʼu ñwa ki nyo̩ n, kʼO̩jo̩ muda chi, kʼi la chʼakoko eju-wñ.
Ama ño̩ jʼako me̩ ne unyi e-Afu dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩ chʼokuta ki deju, ku me̩ chʼuche̩ amatama kiafo̩, kʼame̩ ki kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ Afu e-ki nyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju kʼi gba lefu Jisus Kraisti wa.
Todu i dʼef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ kakini,
Todule̩, ugbo ame̩ ku me̩ chʼamake̩do̩nʼowñ akoko le̩ de̩. Ama ugbo abo ku ma ko̩ eke̩do̩nʼo,
kpai,

Ame̩ muda chʼo̩lo̩pu kʼO̩jo̩ chi. Me̩ chʼuche̩ amatama kʼo̩wo̩ onu ne̩ me̩, abo uche̩ichi kiafo̩, amone̩ todu kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ki ne̩ me̩ ki nʼugbo ku me̩ akʼunyo̩-wñ dufu, owñ ki fʼume̩ do̩ kwef e̩chubi tef ugane̩-wñ ki chʼawuwu le̩.
Ku me̩ ma chʼamone̩ e̩gbaʼka le̩ n, ku me̩ muda chʼamone̩ O̩jo̩ fai-i me̩; abo ku ma ma li me̩ ejumomi n, ku ma muda lʼejumomi-me̩ abajo̩-i.
Ame̩nufe̩do̩, nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩ ku me̩ hi ubi bʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ o̩re̩la te̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩ chʼabononojo kpʼamilowa emi; owñ chʼe̩wñ kʼo̩re̩la achʼe̩ño̩-wñ ki akʼogu bʼonugo one̩.

Me̩ jo̩ ache e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ ef abo uche̩ichi, todu dagba ma chaka jʼakʼalu nyʼume̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩ chʼamache̩bie̩ne̩, kʼama ki nʼugbo ku ma adʼojima ñw O̩jo̩, o̩jo̩ kʼi awa go ma, tod uko̩lo̩-me̩ o̩me̩me̩le̩ kʼama jʼali-i.
Me̩ ki fʼo̩la-me̩ kamuhite̩ ñw o̩da e-one̩ du tod Ondu: dagba kʼi chʼonu kʼi tʼo̩gba,
dagba i chʼamigo̩bina kʼonu akpe̩ ma nyʼabʼudu ñw amache̩bie̩ne̩, kʼama ki ño̩ ñwulo̩ amache e̩wñ e̩nyo̩.
Todu abe̩le̩ oñ i dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩, kʼame̩ ki nʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ eche dʼoli tʼugbodu ame̩nidada alu.
Ame̩ ki jo̩ dab amo̩mone̩. Me̩ ki muda dʼo̩mone̩-me̩ chʼe̩wñ ubʼone̩ eju maja ugbo e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ n. Me̩ ki muda jo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼamadu O̩jo̩.
Me̩ bʼumʼe̩ne̩ du. Me̩ fe̩do̩ amo̩maye. Me̩ railo O̩jo̩. Me̩ nabumʼOnu.
Abuko̩lo̩, me̩ nafʼo̩la-me̩ kamuhite̩ ñw abo ku ma ne̩ me̩ ef ailo du, i chʼugbo ame̩ne̩nyo̩ kpʼabo ku ma bo̩la kate n, chai ñw abo ku ma bie̩ne̩ ñwu me̩ du.
Todu e-kʼi chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ de̩: iche̩wñ kʼone̩ mʼe̩do̩dudu ugbo uwa kʼi ali uji ofo gba ne̩ todu kʼakone̩o̩la kʼi dʼef uwñ kʼi we edʼo̩la gwunyʼu tod O̩jo̩;

todu iche̩wñ kʼame̩ dure taku me̩ fe̩do̩lichi ugbo igbe ku ma kpa me̩, ugbo uwohi e-le̩ de̩? I muda che̩wñ kʼame̩ chʼe̩nyo̩ ku me̩ la fe̩do̩lichi ugbo uwa ku me̩ li tod e-le̩, mak e-le̩ chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ ugbo O̩jo̩.
Todu e-le̩ oñ ma fʼume̩ do̩ wa todu-wñ, todabu ku Kraisti laño̩ li uwa todu me̩; i la tʼe̩wñ uwo̩li no̩ tane̩ ñwu me̩, todu kʼame̩ ki lʼeju e̩re̩-wñ:
owñ ki ma che e̩wñ adure du n, ku ma ma la li o̩gwo̩ ef alu-wñ n.
Abu ku ma bʼo̩ ina, i gba bu ma n. I do̩mo̩ ali uwa, i fo̩ko̩ ma n. I la mʼo̩la-wñ dute̩ ñw Akajo̩ o̩kpakpa le̩.
Owñ onugo la kʼadure-wa ef año̩la-wñ tʼoj oli le̩, todu kʼabu kʼa leku ñw adure kʼa ki deju ñw o̩kpakpa. Lugbo egwenunu ku ma fʼowñ gwenunu o̩ga-wa takpa.
Todu ame̩ jʼachila dab amala e̩gbaʼka, me̩ muda rida abʼAdide kpʼAfejute̩ onugo-me̩ fa-i me̩.

Abe̩le̩ ge̩, ame̩ amo̩ya, me̩ nafʼo̩la-me̩ kamuhite̩ ñw amo̩ko̩ e-me̩; todu, dagba e̩ne̩ʼka chaka ma gba O̩la le̩ gbo̩ n, lef e̩wñ kʼamo̩ya-ma jo̩mo̩ ache, dagba ma ma ne̩ O̩la le̩ n, me̩ ne̩kʼaje̩ ma;
abu ku ma nʼeju-ma li e̩wñ-yala ku me̩ jʼache ef ailo.
Ijaga e-me̩ ki chʼijaga ejo̩do̩da e-oji-eba n kpai o̩jamalia eko nyʼo̩la n, kpai e̩wñ o̩la enyi n;
chai one̩ e-e̩do̩ ki maja le̩, ef e̩wñ ki ma che̩ n, owñ chʼafu o̩chikimi kpai e-e̩ne̩ ami, e-le̩ chʼe-kʼalu aja-wñ ma nʼeka eju O̩jo̩ n.
Todu abe̩le̩ abobule̩ kiafo̩ ku ma kibenʼO̩jo̩ akwoubi le̩ chʼijaga e-ma ge̩, ma fʼo̩la-ma kamuhite̩ ñw amo̩ko̩ e-ma
alu ku Sara gbo̩la Ebraham gbo̩ kʼi la dʼo̩ ko̩ odu; ame̩ mud amo̩ma e-wñ fa-i me̩, iche̩wñ ku me̩ nʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ ache kʼailo e̩wñ du ma ba me̩ n.

Ame̩ amo̩ko̩ alu le̩ ge̩ me̩ nabʼuma gugu unyi ibe ibe, me̩ nabumo̩ onobule̩ alu ku ma che kpai e̩wñ eku ki chʼe̩gbo tule, abu kʼame̩ meji ño̩ chʼabo ku me̩ bʼomune̩ je̩ ufe̩de̩nyo̩ e-iñmi e̩wñ ogu; kʼadua-me̩ ki we nʼuda.
Ukpoji-wñ la de̩ kakini, Ibe-me̩ ki chʼoka, me̩ nakwo̩lawo̩ omune̩, me̩ che̩do̩ omune̩ dab amo̩maye, me̩ chʼiwo̩ omune̩, ibe-me̩ ki che̩hiwane̩;
me̩ ki chʼone̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ koji e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼi che me̩ n, me̩ ki bʼina koji ina n, chai adua one̩ me̩ ka; todabu ku ma fʼume̩ do̩ tef e-le̩, todu kʼame̩ ki je̩ e̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ e̩wñ ogu.
Todu
i ki na bʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ te̩, kʼi che e̩wñ e̩nyo̩;
Todabu kʼeju Ondu tʼabo̩kpakpa,
I la che̩wñ ku me̩ chʼabo ku ma go̩laru e̩wñ e̩nyo̩ eche, e̩ne̩ achʼume̩ e̩bie̩ne̩?
Ama dagba me̩ chaka chʼo̩bata tod e̩wñ o̩kpakpa ku me̩ che, me̩ gbede; me̩ ki la railo ailo e-ma n, me̩ ki chʼe̩do̩ wuulu n;

me̩ ki muda che ku Kraisti ki chʼOndu kʼi nafo̩ ef e̩do̩-me̩: o̩la-me̩ ki che mutane̩ e̩gba du ku me̩ nʼohi ku me̩ adu ñw e̩ne̩ du ki atʼume̩ ene oji-wñ ugbo o̩la ibe ekono ki dʼef ume̩, me̩ muda dohi efu o̩chikimi kpai ailo.

I ki nʼugbo kʼakone̩ o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩-me̩ adʼo̩la gwunyu me̩ n; todu kʼugbo e̩wñ ku ma kalu nyu me̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩ chʼamache̩bie̩ne̩ kʼanyo̩ ki fʼabo ku ma chakpabie̩ e̩wñ ki nyo̩ ku me̩ jʼefu Kraist ache le̩ kpabie̩.
Todu, iche̩wñ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ i nyo̩ tule ku me̩ li uwa tod e̩wñ ki nyo̩ ku me̩ che tʼeli uwa tod e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ku me̩ che le.
Todabu ku Kraisti ño̩ fʼuwa li tod adure onu ʼkate. E̩no̩kpakpa le̩ li tod ame̩nuji, todu kʼi mʼuwa ko wʼugbo O̩jo̩; ma fʼowñ kpaku ef o̩re̩la, ma muda dʼiñmi ñw u ef Afu;
ef e-le̩ i ño̩ le natakoya ñw amafu ku ma jʼef unyi uga,

ku ma ko̩ egbagbo̩ e̩gbaʼka le̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼe̩do̩ eje̩ e-O̩jo̩ do̩mo̩ anede iko Noa, abu ku ma jʼo̩mo̩ añwʼo̩ko̩ le̩ che, owñ chʼe-kʼone̩ re, owñ chʼonugo one̩ me̩jo̩, fʼo̩la-ma jadu lef omi ef uwñ.
Uwo̩li e-le̩ ño̩ do̩mo̩ ajadu me̩ fa-i, owñ che baptism, i chʼiwa o̩re̩la eko rinyo̩ n, chai ohi kʼakone̩ o̩la ki dʼef e̩do̩ ki ma dʼe̩wñ gwunyu one̩ n adu ñw O̩jo̩, lef udajikwane̩ e-Jisus Kraist.
Owñ ki dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ O̩jo̩ abu kʼi le tʼefojale le̩; amonuche̩ kpʼabo̩da kpʼabukpahiu che̩kamuhite̩ ñw u.
Todule̩ abu ku Kraisti fʼuwa li ef o̩re̩la, ame̩ ki ño̩ nʼibe ki def e̩do̩-i gbage̩de̩ chʼo̩logu-me̩ ku me̩ ji; todabu kʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ ki fʼuwa li ef o̩re̩la mugwo kwef adure eche;
kʼame̩ ki ño̩ jo̩ iko ki bo̩ ñw me̩ ef o̩re̩la-i ache e̩wñ kʼamone̩ ache̩ño̩-wñ ge̩ n, me̩ ki muda adeju ache e̩wñ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩.

Todu kʼiko ki lale le̩ ki bʼuko̩lo̩ kʼabo uche̩ichi neku-wñ eche jo̩, i ki ño̩ bʼule̩ ele ef e̩wñtuñ kpʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ eche kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma eñmo̩ kpʼo̩te̩ eñwo̩ kpʼe̩wñ awulu eche kpʼode ode ku ma nʼaba-wñ eche jo̩.
E̩wñ ugoju i che eju-ma ukpe̩ kʼame̩ ma fule ef e-le̩ tef ofubo̩ ki adafo le̩ kpʼama n, ma chakpabie̩ me̩.
Ama le̩ acholi e̩wñ-ma ñw e̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ che̩mute̩ kʼi akajo̩ abo ki deju kpʼabo ki ku.
Todu i chaka chʼabo ki ku e̩wñ ki chi ku ma fʼuche̩nyo̩ je̩rʼuma chʼutodu ku ma ki kajo̩ ma alu ku ma kajo̩ amone̩ ef o̩re̩la ku ma muda deju lo̩na O̩jo̩ ef afu.
Ama ukpoji e̩wñ du me̩ro̩wo̩ me̩: todule̩ ibe-me̩ ki chʼewane̩, eju-me̩ ki nafe̩rane̩ ñw adua eche.
E̩wñ ki atʼo̩gba e̩wñ du chefejude̩kparu ufe̩do̩ ku me̩ fe̩do̩ omune̩, todabu kʼufe̩do̩ abʼugwe̩ko̩ adure ma.
Me̩ ki chʼomune̩ ojo, i ki nʼeñmini efu n:
teju alu kʼe̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ mʼele ufe̩de̩nyo̩ gba, me̩ ki dʼe-le̩ che e̩wñ ñw o̩la-me̩, ku me̩ chʼamadigede e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ e-ufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ ki chʼojoji ojoji.

Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ko̩la, i ki ko̩la dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩la e-O̩jo̩ i aka; iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du nʼe̩wñ eche ñw one̩, i ki che dabe̩ne̩ kʼukpahiu e-kʼO̩jo̩ du ñw u i nʼache; todu kʼO̩jo̩ ki nʼojima ef e̩wñ du lefu Jisus Kraisti, e-kʼojima kpai ukpahiu chʼe-wñ tʼogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa. Ami.
Ame̩nufe̩do̩, una ki wʼef ume̩ kʼi jʼume̩ ma le̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ugoju eju-me̩ n, i chʼe̩wñ ugoju ke̩re̩bʼume̩ le̩ n.
Ama dabalu kʼame̩ jʼatuta ef uwa Kraisti le̩, me̩ nayo̩; todu kʼame̩ ki ño̩ nʼugwo̩guyo̩ ayo̩ ef ebite̩ e-ojima-wñ.
Iche̩wñ ku ma bʼume̩ ina ef odu Kraisti, me̩ gbede; todabu kʼAfu ojima kpai e-O̩jo̩ tane̩ me̩ añmi me̩.
Todu e̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ ki li uwa ugugu akpone̩ n abe̩k ajoji n, abe̩k ache e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ n, abe̩k i ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼi ajikpekpe ef e̩wñ abomune̩ n.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du li uwa ugugu e̩ne̩-Kraisti, i ki chanyo̩ n: i ki muda dʼojima ñw O̩jo̩ ef odu kide̩.
Todu iko kʼajo̩ chane̩ kwʼunyi O̩jo̩ lewa me̩; i la che̩wñ ki chane̩ ugbo e-wa ejodudu mak e̩wñ chʼukpoji abo ku ma ko̩ egbʼUche̩nyo̩ e-O̩jo̩ gbo̩ ke?
I la che̩wñ kʼejadu abo̩kpakpa chenʼakanya
Todabe̩le̩ abo ku ma li uwa teju alu ki du O̩jo̩ e̩do̩ ki nakʼonugo-ma jo̩ ef uko̩lo̩ ki nyo̩ eche ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi nyi e̩wñ kʼi achubi one̩ le̩.

Todule̩, omi kʼu chʼe̩nogijo kpai ama kpai e̩ne̩ ki ño̩ gbibenu uwa e-ku Kraisti li kʼu laño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki atuta ef ojima e-ku ma che ku ma bite̩ le̩ nadʼugbe̩do̩ ñw abogijo ku ma jʼef ume̩ le̩ kakini;

me̩ ki dejute̩ ujo̩ amala e-O̩jo̩ ki jʼef ume̩ le̩, me̩ ki che teju uko̩lo̩ afejute̩; i ki chʼotila ñwu me̩ taku me̩ che n, chai e̩do̩la-me̩ me̩ go alu ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩, i ki la chʼutodu e̩ño̩ o̩ko̩ ki ache me̩n, chai kpʼibe kokolo;
i ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ chʼodu e̩wñ ku ma du nyʼe̩ o̩wo̩ le̩ n; ame̩ ki muda dʼo̩la-me̩ chʼabo kʼujo̩ le̩ ago ki wʼo̩li-wñ.
Tak e̩gba ku ma mʼagboji amadidala du tejugede, ame̩ agba uloko e-ojima e-ki ma cha n.

Abe̩le̩, ame̩, abimo̩to̩, me̩ ki fʼo̩la-me̩ kamuhite̩ ñw abogijo. O̩chaka-me̩, me̩ ki fʼe̩do̩ ehiwane̩ daku nyʼo̩la-me̩ ku me̩ che e̩wñ ñw omune̩; todabu kʼO̩jo̩ ako bʼabo ku ma hi o̩la-ma ne, i muda adu ufe̩de̩nyo̩ ñw abo ku ma hi o̩la-ma wane̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nahi o̩la-me̩ wane̩ o̩gane̩ o̩wo̩ ukpahiu O̩jo̩, todu kʼi hi ume̩ ne iko-wñ.
Me̩ namʼejiji eda-me̩ chaka ko rikpolo jʼoji-wñ, todabu kʼe̩wñ o̩la-me̩ chewʼe eju.
Eju-me̩ ki chefe̩rane̩, me̩ gwe̩ke̩ adide: e̩no̩la-me̩, Abulumone̩ le̩, dab idu ki ako̩la, i tale afeju e̩ne̩ kʼi adu mi:
me̩ hidago bʼo̩, e̩re̩ e̩do̩ ekono-me̩ ki che̩nyane̩, abu ku me̩ chema ka kʼuwa kide̩ gbage̩de̩ achekpoji ef amo̩maye-me̩ ku ma jʼile̩-i.
Oñ abu ku me̩ jo̩ ku me̩ fʼuwa li pe̩, O̩jo̩ e-ufe̩de̩nyo̩ chaka, e-kʼi do̩ me̩ tef ojima-wñ e-ogbegbele̩ le̩ efu Kraisti, owñ onugo ache me̩ teju-wñ kpa, i adʼe̩re̩-me̩ nyan e̩, i adʼugbiti ñwu me̩.
Ukpahiu ki chʼe-wñ tʼogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa. Ami.
U fʼo̩takada ko̩ ru me̩ re̩-i lugbo Silfano̩s, o̩maye-wa ki achubi wa eju-mi. Edugbe̩do̩ nadugbe̩do̩ ñwu me̩, naño̩ gbibenu ka kʼe-i chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ e-ogbolo; me̩ ki dago kpaka ef uwñ.
Onobule̩ kʼi de̩ Babilo̩n e-kʼO̩jo̩ chi manyʼame̩ le̩ agwa me̩; kpai Mark, o̩ma-mi.
Me̩ nʼukalu e-ufe̩do̩ gwʼomune̩.
Saimo̩n Pita, adu kpʼe̩nukpuche̩ Jisusi Kraisti, tʼugbo abo ku ma fʼe̩do̩ ekono kʼakoko-wñ chʼokujo̩ kpʼe-wa je̩ ef o̩kpakpa O̩jo̩ kpai E̩najadu-wa Jisusi Kraisti:
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ure̩do̩ ki nana nyo̩gba ñw ume̩ ef O̩jo̩ kpai Jisus, Ondu-wa, ema ogbolo.
Alu kʼukpahiu O̩jo̩-wñ kʼe̩wñ du ki cheju iñmi kpai O̩jo̩ ekpe̩do̩ru ñw a, lef ema ogbolo kʼa ma e̩ne̩ ki do̩ wa lef ojima kpai ali e̩nyo̩ e-wñ,

lef e̩wñ kʼa ka le̩ i mʼo̩la ukatane̩ kʼi chʼakoko kʼi ño̩ chʼinaina tʼuma le ko ñw a, todu kʼame̩ ki mud abo ku ma tuta ef alu kʼO̩jo̩-wñ de̩ lef uwñ, abu ku me̩ fʼe̩che̩ ki jʼef ile̩ ef e̩ño̩ e̩wñ o̩re̩la eche o̩wo̩.
Oñ tod e-le̩ gbage̩de̩ ge̩ me̩ ki kʼe̩do̩chacha alu du wa manyʼu ku me̩ kʼali e̩nyo̩ mʼe̩do̩ ekono-me̩ kpai e̩wñ ema mʼali e̩nyo̩
kpai o̩wo̩ emo̩lane̩ mʼe̩wñ ema kpai e̩do̩lichi mʼo̩wo̩ emo̩lane̩ kpai ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ mʼe̩do̩ e̩lichi,
kpai eche̩do̩ o̩maye mʼekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩, kpai ufe̩do̩ mʼeche̩do̩ o̩maye.
Todu e̩wñ-i jʼugbo me̩ ololololo, i aje̩ ñw ume̩ tʼo̩wo̩ ofo n, i la aje̩ ñw ume̩ we enʼe̩ro ef Ondu-wa Jisusi Kraist ema ogbolo n.
Todu e̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ-i ma jʼugbo-wñ n, afeju i che, i ali e̩wñ o̩najiji n, i gbenyo̩ egwe̩ ku ma gwe̩ adure-wñ o̩gbo̩gba le̩ rinyo̩.
Todule̩, amo̩maye, me̩ ki che̩do̩chacha tule ku me̩ che kʼedo̩ ku ma do̩ me̩ kpai echi ku ma chi me̩ ki lonyane̩ waa, todu me̩ jʼef e̩wñ le̩ ache i anʼugbo du ku me̩ aro̩ko̩ibu gbogbo alo n;
todu, abe̩le̩ taku ma abi o̩na tʼojane̩ e-ogbegbele̩ e-Ondu-wa kpai E̩najadu-wa Jisusi Kraisti foo ñwu me̩.
Lef e-le̩ oñ nache kʼu re me̩ wa ugbo e̩wñ-i pioo, dagba me̩ chaka ma, kʼe̩re̩-me̩ laño̩ chewane̩ ef ochochi ki de̩abajo-i.
I la chʼo̩kpakpa eju-mi kʼu nʼe̩wñ urewa wa ajʼume̩ olu gbogbo abu kʼu dʼef ebu-i;
abu kʼu chema ka kʼebu-mi-i egwojane̩ chʼopiopio, owñ chʼalu kʼOndu-wa Jisusi Kraisti du ne̩rʼumi eju le̩.
U lañʼachʼe̩do̩-chacha ku me̩ nʼe̩wñ udubigba-mi ki aje̩ ñwu me̩ rewa e̩wñ-i e̩gba du.
Todu i chʼalo̩ ku ma nʼibe elo̩ oñ a tʼo̩ ubi tak a je̩ ñwu me̩ ma ukpahiu kpai ewa e-Ondu-wa Jisusi Kraisti n, ama awa onugo la mud abo kʼeju-wa li e̩gahi-wñ.
Todu e̩gba kʼi mʼubumo̩ kpai ojima gba ugbo O̩jo̩ Ata, abu kʼojima inaina le̩ nʼomuko̩la abe̩le̩ wa ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩-i chʼo̩ma ufe̩do̩-mi kʼomi fʼuyo̩-mi li ef uwñ.
Oñ awa onugo gbʼomuko̩la kide̩ abu ku ma dʼu kwʼefojale wa, e̩gba kʼa jʼugbo-wñ oj uwo kiafo̩ le̩.

Tak o̩la kʼamakache̩ ka le̩ ño̩ lonyane̩ ñw a tule; me̩ mʼe-le̩ ne̩, dabe̩ne̩ ki chʼagege ki agane̩ ef uña ki de̩ bulubulu, gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ añwa kʼawo-ina kwane̩ ef edo-me̩, mak o̩me̩me̩le̩ me̩ che le̩.
E̩wñ ku me̩ ama o̩gba de̩ kakini, I nʼache̩ du ef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ kʼi atu oji o̩la e-wñ n.
Todu, e̩wñ ki du one̩ e̩do̩ nʼache̩ eka du wa mama ta n: chai abo kʼAfu Kiafo̩ ne̩ ma alo kʼo̩la ki kwʼugbo O̩jo̩.

Amakache̩ olemi muda ño̩ wajo̩ ef abo le̩ dabalu kʼamakone̩ olemi ñʼajʼef ume̩ ge̩, abo le̩ akʼe̩wñ edane̩kpeju e-ulenyo̩ wa ye̩e̩ye̩, ma la anʼaire̩ Ondu Onu ki fʼuma la are̩, elenyo̩ piopio ma jʼakowaabʼo̩la-maojimale̩.
Amone̩ wewe la atʼe̩wñtuñ-m a le̩ ubi; lef abo le̩ abile̩ achakpabie̩ o̩na e-ochochi-i.
Tak ef ejufufu-ma ma anʼo̩la abelefu ko me̩ chʼe̩wñ inyama: oji ajo̩-ma ku ma kpa kwʼigbegbele do̩mo̩, i acho̩kpo̩ n, elenyo̩-ma la jʼalolu oji n.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ ma dʼo̩wo̩ mʼamonuche̩ ku ma dure le̩ n, kʼi muda mʼuma ko jʼef ura ura e-e̩chubi efu Tartaro̩s ku ma ki dejute̩ ma tod ajo̩;
kʼi ma la dʼo̩wo̩ mʼile̩ e-igbele le̩ n, i muda fu Noa e̩ne̩ke̩jo̩ kʼi chʼatakoya o̩la o̩kpakpa de abu kʼi dʼuwobi omi wa bʼoji ile̩ e-abo ku ma ma kpe̩do̩rʼowñ n ma;
oñ abu kʼi mʼewo So̩do̩m kpai Go̩mo̩ra ko che elulu, egu ma lo̩ wane̩ chʼabi kʼi kpa ma, i mʼuma ko chʼe̩wñ uwo̩li jo̩ ñw abo ku ma che ku ma ko̩ ekpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩;
i la mu Lo̩t e̩no̩kpakpa le̩ gbatane̩, owñ kʼe̩wñ ebita kʼabo le̩ jʼo̩mo̩ ache ef e̩wñtuñ-ma kʼowñ o̩la
(todu ell kʼe̩no̩kpakpa le̩ li kpʼegbe̩ kʼi gbʼinabali uko̩lo̩ ugbite̩re̩-ma o̩jo̩ ñwa o̩jo̩ ñwa abu kʼi dodo ef uma le̩ je̩ ñw onugo-wñ o̩kpakpa ki li uwa)
mak Ondu chema kʼi agba abo ku ma kpe̩do̩rʼowñ tane̩ kwef ejama, i ño̩ chema alu kʼi ale kʼi adejute ame̩nuji ef udu echi tod o̩jo̩ e-ajo̩;
abo kʼe-ma to̩gba chʼabo ku ma lule̩ tʼo̩re̩la ubi ef e̩ño̩ e̩wñ ki akpone̩ bie̩ ku ma laño̩ dʼe̩no̩da du rʼoche̩ke̩ne̩.
amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ ku ma nʼugbiti kpai ukpahiu tʼuma le muda jʼagwajo̩ echakpabie̩ no ma ugbo Ondu n.
Ama abo-i dab ame̩la ku ma ma kpibe n ku ma bi ma kʼe̩wñ italigba-ma chʼemu ma ku ma che̩ rinyo̩, ef e̩wñ ku ma ma ma n, ma ko̩la akpabie̩, ma aje̩ ñw ma che̩ rinyo̩ ef e̩che̩ e-ma chuu,
uro̩me̩ uji-ma ma agba le̩, e̩wñ ki rʼone̩ e̩do̩ eju-ma chʼile̩ eche o̩ro̩ka. Iwa ki abumo̩ e̩wñ kpai e̩wñ anyo̩ ma che̩, ma jo̩ achile̩ ef e̩wñ ila-ma, abu ku ma jo̩ okuje̩wñ kpʼame̩.
Okudeli ajo̩ko̩ dʼeju-ma, ma la awe e̩wñ adure eche n; ma dʼo̩jo̩ te̩ ñw onugo amone̩ ku ma ma nʼe̩re̩ ane̩ n; lugbo eche che ño̩ che e̩do̩-ma chʼo̩ka ejufufu eche. Amo̩ma ama-ena ma che!
Abu ku ma hi o̩na o̩kpala tinyo̩ le̩, ma chila tʼo̩na Belam o̩ma Bio̩r kʼi fe̩do̩ uro̩me̩ uji le̩ alo,
ma muda dʼo̩la ugbite̩re̩ e-wñ le̩ biʼu; e̩la ki anʼadu ki ma nʼalu uko̩la n le̩ nʼomuko̩la one̩ ko̩la, oñ i fʼo̩na kpanyʼimu kʼakache̩ le̩ hi.
Abo-i chʼe̩bi omi ki ma nʼomi n, kpai atula kʼukpogafu ako alo̩, e-ku ma fʼe̩chubi gbe̩mu de tane̩ todu ma.
Todu ma bʼukpa tʼo̩la ibe̩te̩ ofofo aka, oñ ma nʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ o̩re̩la efe̩wñtuñ-ma adʼo̩jo̩ te̩ ñw abo ki bo̩ pe̩e̩ bo̩ pe̩e̩ ku ma ma fʼabo ku ma te̩le ef ila-ma o̩wo̩ tane̩.
Ma gbalu ñw uma ka ku ma anʼo̩la-ma, ama onugo la chʼamadu e̩che̩; todu e̩ne̩ ki fʼone̩ du, one̩ le̩ mud adu e̩ne̩ le̩.

Todu iche̩wñ ku ma fʼe̩wñ e-ile̩-i kʼi akpʼone̩ bie̩ o̩wo̩ tane̩ ef ema ku ma ma Ondu-wa kpʼE̩najadu-wa, Jisusi Kraist ogbolo, tak e̩wñ le̩ ño̩ dabi gwuji nyʼuma o̩la kʼi la fʼuma du, e-otitala mud e̩bie̩ne̩ ñw ma tʼe-ejodudu le.
Todu i ma me̩ ñw uma ku ma we ema o̩na o̩kpakpa-i ogbolo, tʼema taku ma mudabi ubi bʼo̩na uko̩ kiafo̩ ku ma du ñw ma le̩ te̩.
Oji ita e-ogbolo le̩ ke̩re̩bʼuma kakini, Abia ki adabi tʼugbo ekpo̩ kʼi kpo̩. Ma la fʼole oko o̩la gwe̩ kʼi fʼe̩pio̩.
Abufe̩do̩, o̩takada ekeji kʼu nako̩ rʼame̩ de̩-i; eji u jʼibe-me̩ ki de̩ yaala olu kʼu re me̩ wa ef ejʼeji-wñ;
ku me̩ dibete̩ o̩la kʼamakache̩ kiafo̩ katane̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩, kpai uko̩ kʼOndu kpai E̩najadu-wa te̩ lugbo ame̩nukpuche̩ le̩.
E̩wñ ku me̩ ama ejodudu de̩ kakini, E̩gba adiko o̩jo̩ otitala abo ku ma chʼone̩ uke̩ anʼuke̩ wa, ma la atale teju e̩ño̩ e̩wñ o̩re̩la e-ma,
oñ ma akakini, Ugbo e̩wa-wñ ku ma ko̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ de̩? todu akwʼe̩gba kʼamo̩ra-wa mʼolu du e̩wñ du te̩te̩de̩ alu ki de̩ kwʼabakwane̩ enyi ku ma nyi e̩wñ.
Todu i dʼuma e̩do̩ kʼeju-ma ki legudu kakini, Efojale efojale do̩mo̩ igbegbele, kpʼane̩-ile̩ kʼi kwef omi, kʼi laño̩ che̩kpama te̩ lef omi lugbo O̩la O̩jo̩.
Lef e-le̩ ile̩ ki do̩mo̩ e̩gbale̩ lenyo̩ abu kʼomi uwobi bʼo ma;
i laño̩ nʼo̩la e-le̩ gbage̩de̩ mʼefojale efojale kpʼane̩-ile̩ e̩-fa-i kojo̩ ñw una, ma jʼadejutʼo̩ tod o̩jo̩ e-ajo̩ kpai o̩jo̩ ulenyo̩ e-abo ku ma ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n.
Ama abufe̩do̩, e̩wñʼka kʼame̩ awe eje̩ ñw eju-me̩ legudu de̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ʼka ugbo Ondu dab o̩do̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, o̩do̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ la dab o̩jo̩ʼka.
I cheka kʼOndu afo̩kpane̩ ugbo o̩la kʼi katane̩ alu kʼefo̩kpane̩ de̩ eju abo iche̩ka n; e̩do̩ i muda aje̩ ugbo me̩, i neku kʼe̩ne̩ du ki lenyo̩ n, chai kʼo̩chaka amone̩ ki tu eribeda.
O̩jo̩ e-Ondu muda awa dabe̩ne̩ kʼajoji, ef e-le efojale efojale alale rinyo̩ wuu, oñ e̩wñ ugbiti-wñ chaka ajo̩ rinyo̩ ki ayo̩, tak ane̩ ile̩ kpai uko̩lo̩ du ku ma che ef uwñ ajo rinyo̩ hioko.
Abu kʼe̩wñ-i chaka ayo̩ abe̩le̩, e̩go̩ one̩ e̩wñ i dukpe̩ kʼame̩ ki che ef ejo̩ kʼame̩ jo̩-i ache e̩wñ kiafo̩ kpʼe̩kpe̩-do̩rʼO̩jo̩?
Kʼame̩ ki jo̩ aneju-wñ, kʼewa o̩jo̩ e-O̩jo̩ ki hika, lef e-le̩ abu ku ma fʼuna tʼefojale ayo̩, tak una-wñ ki ajo̩ oñ e̩wñ ugbiti-wñ aya.
Awa muda jo̩ aneju efojale etito̩ kpai ane̩-ile̩ etito̩ e-kʼo̩kpakpa dodo ef uwñ teju alu kʼi ko̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩.
Todule̩ abufe̩do̩, abu ku me̩ jo̩ anejue̩wñ-i, me̩ che̩do̩chacha rʼukʼowñ ki li me̩ ef ure̩do̩, kʼiwa du ki bumo̩ me̩ n, kʼe̩wñ anyo̩ ki we edʼo̩la-me̩ eju-wñ.
E̩do̩ kʼOndu-wa je̩ ki chʼujadu eju-me̩; alu ki Po̩l, o̩maye-wa kʼa fe̩do̩ le̩, ño̩ ko̩takada rʼume̩ teju ibe ku ma du ñw u,

dabalu kʼi ño̩ nʼo̩la e̩wñ-i aka ef o̩takada-wñ chaka. E̩wñ iche̩ka jʼef uwñ kʼoji-wñ chʼe̩kpuna ema, e-kʼabo ku ma ma ko̩che̩ n kpai abo kʼe̩re̩-ma ma lonyane̩ n adalo̩ alu ku ma che O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ ki bo̩ ki mud elenyo̩ e-ma onugo.
Todule̩, ame̩ abufe̩do̩, abu ku me̩ chemʼe-le̩ tane̩, me̩ nafʼo̩la-me̩ de tode̩gba kʼila e-abo ku ma jo̩ ache e̩wñ ebita ako me̩ kpʼama alo, ku me̩ la wane̩ bʼe̩re̩ enyane̩ e-me̩ te̩.
Ama me̩ ki nyo̩gba ef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpai ef ema ku me̩ ma Ondu-wa kpai E̩najadu-wa, Jisusi Kraist. Ojima ki chʼe-wñ tʼifai, tʼo̩jo̩ ogbegbele̩. Ami.
E̩wñ ki do̩mo̩ kwʼabakwane̩, e̩wñ kʼa gbo̩, e̩wñ kʼa nʼeju-wa li, e̩wñ kʼa go, kʼo̩wo̩-wa la kadʼo ugbo o̩la e-iñmi le̩ de̩.
Iñmi le̩ la kwotejugede oñ a fʼu li, a la agbʼo̩ ibenu, oñ a adʼo̩la e-iñmi ogbegbele̩ e-ki dʼugbo Ata kʼi la kwotejugede ñw a le̩ ka ñwu me̩-i —
e̩wñ kʼa fuli, kʼa la gbo̩, a ño̩ du ka ñwu me̩, todu kʼame̩ ki ño̩ nʼuta eta kpʼawa; oñ a nʼuta-wa ala kpʼAta kpʼO̩ma-wñ Jisus Kraisti.
O̩la-wñ a la ako̩ ru me̩-i todu kʼuyo̩-wa ki nyo̩ kpa.
E-i la chʼuche̩ kʼa gbo̩ ugbo-wñ, oñ a adʼinabali-wñ ñwu me̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ chʼugane̩, e̩chubi la dʼef uwñ kili-kili n.
Iche̩wñ kʼa aka kakini, A atuta kpʼowñ kʼa la tale ef e̩chubi, olemi a aro̩ le̩; i chʼe̩wñ ochochi oñ a jʼache-i n;
iche̩wñ kʼa muda tale ef ugane̩, alu kʼowñ def ugane̩, mak a nʼuta ata kpʼomune̩, oñ e̩bie̩ Jisus O̩ma-wñ nʼawa agwe̩ hiolo bʼadure du te̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼa aka kakini, A nʼudure n, o̩la-wa a adʼo̩ ibe le̩, ochochi la dʼefu-wa ni de̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼa agbalu adure-wa, owñ chʼe̩nuke̩do̩no kpʼe̩no̩kpakpa todu kʼi tʼadure no̩ ñw a, kʼi ño̩ gwe̩ wa bʼe̩wñ uji du te̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼa ka kʼa dure mama ta n, a dʼowñ chʼaremi, o̩la-wñ la dʼef uwa ni de̩.
Amo̩ma-mi, o̩la e̩wñ-i nako̩ rʼume̩ todu kʼame̩ ki we edure; i la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka dure, a chenʼE̩nugbe̩do̩ ugbo Ata, owñ che Jisus Kraist, E̩no̩kpakpa le̩;
owñ la chʼe̩wñ unyie̩do̩ tod adure-wa, i muda chʼutodu e-wa kate n, chai todu abo ile̩ du ge̩.
Oñ ef e-i a chema ka kʼa fʼowñ ma me̩, owñ chʼuko̩-wñ kʼa ade.
E̩ne̩ ki kakini, “U fʼowñ ma me̩” kʼi ma la ade uko̩-wñ n chʼaremi, ochochi la dʼef e̩ne̩ le̩ n;
e̩ne̩ ki muda ade o̩la-wñ ochochi, ufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ mufu kpa ef e̩ne̩ le̩ me̩. Ef e-le̩ oñ a ma ka kʼa jʼef uwñ:
i dukpe̩ kʼe̩ne̩ ki ka kʼi gugu ef uwñ kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ onugo ki tale alu kʼowñ le̩ tale.
Ame̩nufe̩do̩, i chʼo̩la uko̩ etito̩ oñ nako̩ rʼume̩-i n, chai uko̩ igbele e-kʼame̩ ne̩ kwʼabakwane̩; e-igbele chʼo̩la kʼame̩ gbo̩ le̩.
Omune̩ ño̩ de̩: o̩la uko̩ etito̩ oñ nako̩ rʼume̩-i, owñ chʼe-kʼi chʼochochi ef uwñ kpʼef ume̩ ge̩; todabu kʼe̩chubi alale me̩, ugane̩ ogbolo la kwotejugede.
E̩ne̩ ki aka kʼi dʼef ugane̩ kʼi la nʼulaka o̩maye-wñ ache dʼef e̩chubi gbogbo wʼifai.
E̩ne̩ ki afe̩do̩ o̩maye-wñ gugu ef ugane̩, e̩wñ ki adʼone̩ hi la dʼef uwñ n.
E̩ne̩ ki muda achulaka o̩maye-wñ dʼef e̩chubi, i la tʼef e̩chubi ale, i la mʼugbo kʼi anyi n, todabu kʼe̩chubi fʼe eju chubi.
Nakʼo̩takada rʼume̩, amo̩ma-mi, ukpe̩ ku ma tʼadure-me̩ no̩ ñwu me̩ lef odu-wñ.

Nakʼo̩takada rʼume̩, abogijo, ukpe̩ kʼame̩ te̩tama e̩ne̩ ki do̩mo̩ kwʼabakwane̩ le̩. Nakʼo̩takada rʼume̩, abokolobia, ukpe̩ kʼame̩ fʼe̩ne̩bibi le̩ du me̩. U fʼo̩takada ko̩ rʼume̩, abimo̩to̩, ukpe̩ kʼame̩ te̩tama Ata.

U fʼo̩takada ko̩ rʼume̩, abogijo, ukpe̩ kʼame̩ te̩tama e̩ne̩ ki do̩mo̩ kwʼabakwane̩ le̩. U fʼo̩takada ko̩ rʼume̩, abokolobia, ukpe̩ kʼame̩ gbiti, kʼo̩lO̩jo̩ la gugu ef ume̩, me̩ laño̩ fʼe̩ne̩bibi le̩ du me̩.
Me̩ we efe̩do̩ ile̩ kpʼe̩wñ ki jʼile̩-i. Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka afe̩do̩ ile̩-i, mak ufe̩do̩ Ata dʼef e̩ne̩ le̩ n.
Todu e̩wñ du ki jʼile̩, tʼe̩ño̩ e̩wñ o̩re̩la tʼe̩wñ kʼeju achʼe̩ño̩-wñ kpʼe̩wñ eke ofo ile̩-i, Ata chʼe̩te̩-wñ n, chai ile̩-i chʼe̩te̩-wñ.
Ile̩-i la alo me̩, kpʼe̩ño̩-wñ; ache̩wñ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ muda agugu ogbegbele̩.
Abimo̩to̩, iko otitala i che; oñ alu kʼame̩ gbo̩ ka kʼe̩ne̩ ki adʼo̩la-wñ chʼakoji Kraisti awa, abe̩le̩ amakoji Kraist wewe kwane̩ fai me̩; o̩mo̩ a chema ka kʼiko otitala le̩ de̩.
Ma kwʼef uwa dufu, ma muda chʼabo-wa mama ta n; todu ma ma chʼabo-wa, ma ma gugu ef uwa; ama todu ki tejugede ka kʼo̩chaka-ma chʼabo-wa n.
I la chenʼekpo ku ma ba tʼume̩ oji kwʼugbo E̩ne̩ Kiafo̩ le̩ me̩, me̩ la chema e̩wñ du.
U kʼo̩takada rʼume̩, ukpe̩ ku me̩ ma ma ochochi le̩ ni n, chai todabu ku me̩ chemʼo̩, kpai todabu kʼochochi le̩ ma chʼe̩te̩ olemi du n.
E̩ne̩ chʼaremi ki ma chʼe̩ne̩ ki araire̩ ka ki Jisus che Kraisti n? E̩ne̩ du ki la araire̩ Ata kpʼO̩ma le̩, e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki adʼo̩la-wñ chʼakoji Kraisti.
E̩ne̩ du ki la araire̩ O̩ma nʼAta n duu; e̩ne̩ ki agbalu O̩ma ño̩ fʼAta ne̩ me̩ ge̩.
E̩wñ kʼame̩ gbo̩ kwʼabakwane̩ ki nagugu ef ume̩ alo waa. Iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñ kʼame̩ gbo kwʼabakwane̩ le̩ gugu ef ume̩, mak ame̩ gugu ef O̩ma kpai ef Ata pioo.
E̩wñ kʼi katane̩ ñw a de̩, owñ chʼiñmi ogbegbele̩.
U fʼe̩wñ-i ko̩ rʼume̩ todu abo ku ma ako me̩ la le̩;

i la chʼame̩, ekpo ku ma ba tʼoji, kʼame̩ mugba kwugbo-wñ le̩, dʼef ume̩ waa, eku e̩ne̩ ki ako̩ me̩ la kʼume̩ n; ama alu kʼekpo ebatoji e-wñ le̩ ako̩ me̩ e̩wñ du, kʼi la chʼochochi, kʼi ma la chʼolemi n, alu kʼi la ko̩ me̩ le̩ me̩ gugu ef uwñ waa.
Tʼifai, amo̩ma-mi, ame̩ ki gugu ef uwñ, todu kʼe̩gba du kʼi kwotejugede kʼa ki nʼeju e̩gbo kʼeju-wa ki we eleku o̩bo̩no̩ bʼo̩ te̩ ef ewa-wñ.
Iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma ka kʼowñ chʼe̩no̩kpakpa, mak ame̩ chema ka kʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi chʼache e̩wñ o̩kpakpa, owñ le̩ chʼe̩te̩-wñ ku ma fʼu bi.
Me̩ go alu kʼufe̩do̩ kʼAta che ñw a de̩, todu kʼama ki do̩ wa kʼamo̩ma O̩jo̩; abe̩le̩ a de̩. Lef e-le oñ ile̩ ma amʼawa n, ukpe̩ kʼi ma mʼowñ n.
Ame̩nufe̩do̩, fai a chʼamo̩ma O̩jo̩ me̩; alu kʼa la ade̩ ejo̩gba tejugede ta n, a chema ka kʼowñ kwotejugede a adab owñ, ukpe̩ kʼa ali owñ alu kʼi de̩.
Oñ e̩ne̩ du ki nʼibe ekonʼowñ-i agwʼo̩la-wñ rinyo̩ ki fe̩ alu kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ chefe̩.
E̩ne̩ du ki chʼache e̩wñ adure la ache e̩wñ ugbite̩re̩ ge̩; adure la chʼugbite̩re̩.
Ame̩ la chema ka kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kwotejugede todu kʼi ne̩ adu adure le̩, adure du la dʼef uwñ n.
E̩ne̩ du ki chʼagugu ef uwñ adure n; e̩ne̩ ki chʼache e̩wñ adure li owñ mama ta n, i la mʼowñ n.
Amo̩ma-mi, me̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩ne̩ du ko me̩ la n. Ache e̩wñ o̩kpakpa chʼo̩kpakpa, alu kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ chʼo̩kpakpa.
E̩te̩ ache e̩wñ adure chʼAbulumone̩; todu Abulumone̩ te̩tadure kwʼabakwane̩. Todule̩ oñ O̩ma O̩jo̩ kwotejugede, owñ chʼutodu kʼi mʼuko̩lo̩ Abulumone̩ tu.
E̩ne̩ du ku ma bi kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼO̩jo̩ ache e̩wñ adure n; ukpe̩ kʼugbe̩-wñ gugu ef uwñ; i la nekʼadure n, todu kʼO̩jo̩ chʼe̩te̩-wñ ku ma bʼi.
Ef e-le̩ oñ amo̩ma O̩jo̩ kpʼamo̩ma Abulumone̩ tejugede jo̩: e̩ne̩ du ki ma chʼache e̩wñ o̩kpakpa n, mak e̩te̩-wñ chʼO̩jo̩ n, kpʼe̩ne̩ ki ma afe̩do̩ o̩maye-wñ n.
Todu e̩wñ ki chʼuche̩ kʼame̩ gbo̩ kwʼabakwane̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, Todu kʼawa ki fe̩do̩ omune̩,
i ki chʼalu kʼe̩te̩ Ken chʼe̩ne̩bibi le̩ tak i dʼo̩maye-wñ kpa n. E̩wñ la chʼofe-wñ kʼi dʼowñ kpata? Todabu kʼuko̩lo̩-wñ chʼebibi kʼe-o̩maye-wñ muda chʼo̩kpakpa.
Iche̩wñ kʼile̩-i nʼulaka-me̩ ache i ki chʼaye ñwu me̩ n, amo̩maye.
Awa chema ka kʼa kwʼef uku le tef iñmi todabu kʼa afe̩do̩ amo̩maye. E̩ne̩ ki ma chʼe̩nufe̩do̩ n gugu ef uku ta.
E̩ne̩ du ki chʼachulaka o̩maye-wñ chʼakpone̩, me̩ la chema ka kʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ gugu ef akpone̩ du n.
Ef e-le̩ oñ a fʼufe̩do̩ ma, owñ chʼabu kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ mʼoji-wñ du tinyo̩ tod uwa; o̩me̩ la dʼawa o̩la kʼa ki dʼoji e-wa tinyo̩ tod amo̩maye.
E̩ne̩ du ki muda nʼe̩wñ udiñmino e-ile̩-i kʼi la ali ka kʼeku e̩wñ aku o̩maye-wñ, kʼi la fejukpʼo̩ bo, abʼufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ de̩ ef e̩ne̩ le̩ ta?
Amo̩ma-mi, awa ki nʼuko̩lo̩ kpʼukpalu ofofo fe̩do̩ n, chai uko̩lo̩ kpʼochochi.
Ef e-le̩ oñ a ama ka kʼochochi chʼe̩te̩-wa, oñ a aje̩ ñw e̩do̩-wa chʼokpoko o̩gba-wñ
todu, iche̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-wa adʼo̩la gwunyʼuwa mak O̩jo̩ tʼe̩do̩-wa le, i la chema e̩wñ du.
Ame̩nufe̩do̩, iche̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-wa ma dʼo̩la gwunyʼuwa n, mak a nʼeju e̩gbo ugbo O̩jo̩;
oñ e̩wñ du kʼa abiʼu a agba ugbo-wñ, todabu kʼa ade uko̩-wñ, kʼa la ache e̩wñ ki rʼowñ eju.
E̩wñ ki la chʼuko̩-wñ le̩ de̩, kakini, Todu kʼa ki ke̩do̩nʼodu O̩ma-wñ Jisus Kraist kʼa la afe̩do̩ omune̩, alu kʼi tʼuko̩ ñw a le̩.
Ade uko̩-wñ la gugu ef uwñ, owñ la dʼef e̩ne̩ le̩. Ef e-i oñ a ma ka kʼi gugu ef uwa, owñ chʼef Afu-wñ kʼi du ñw a.
Ame̩nufe̩do̩, me̩ ki dʼo̩la afu tʼafu du rʼochochi n, chai eñwa me̩ nañwʼamafu go abe̩k O̩jo̩ chʼe̩te̩-ma, abe̩k i che n? todu amakache̩ olemi wewe kwodufu ile-i me̩.
Ef e-i oñ ame̩ ama Afu O̩jo̩: afu du ki agbalu ka ki Jisus Kraisti lewa ef o̩re̩la me̩, mak e̩te̩-wñ chʼO̩jo̩,
afu du ki ma la agbalu Jisusi n, mak e̩te̩-wñ chʼO̩jo̩ n. E-i chʼe-e̩ne̩ kʼi adʼo̩la-wñ chʼakoji Kraisti le̩, ku me̩ gbo̩ ka kʼi awa, fai i la dʼile̩-i me̩.
E̩te̩-me̩ chʼO̩jo̩, amo̩ma-mi, me̩ la fʼuma du me̩; ukpe̩ kʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼef ume̩ tʼe̩ne̩ ki dʼef ile̩-i le.
E̩te̩ e-ma chʼile̩-i, lef e-le̩ ma nʼe̩wñ kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼile̩-i aka, oñ ile̩ agbo̩ e-ma.
E̩te̩ e-wa chʼO̩jo̩. E̩ne̩ ki chʼama O̩jo̩ agbʼe-wa, e̩ne̩ kʼe̩te̩-wñ ma chʼO̩jo̩ n agbʼe-wa n. Kwef e-le̩ oñ a ma Afu e-ochochi kpʼafu ila.
Ame̩nufe̩do̩, a ki fe̩do̩ omune̩; todabu kʼe̩te̩ ufe̩do̩ chʼO̩jo̩, e̩ne̩ du ki chʼe̩nufe̩do̩, O̩jo̩ chʼe̩te̩-wñ ku ma bi, i la chemʼO̩jo̩.
E̩ne̩ ki ma chʼe̩nufe̩do̩ n mʼO̩jo̩ n, todabu kʼO̩jo̩ chʼufe̩do̩.
Ef e-i oñ ufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ kwotejugede ef uwa, ka kʼO̩jo̩ fʼO̩ma-wñ okpono kpuche̩ wʼile̩ todu kʼawa ki deju lef uwñ.
Ef e-i ufe̩do̩ de̩, i chʼeka kʼa te̩tafe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ n chai ka kʼowñ fe̩do̩ wa oñ i fʼO̩ma-wñ kʼi chʼe̩wñ unye̩do̩ tod adure-wa kpe̩ wa.
Ame̩nufe̩do̩, iche̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ la fe̩do̩ wa abe̩le̩, mak i ño̩ dukpe̩ kʼawa ki fe̩do̩ omune̩.
E̩ne̩ du li O̩jo̩ mama ta n; iche̩wñ kʼa fe̩do̩ omune̩, mak O̩jo̩ gugu ef uwa, oñ ufe̩do̩-wñ amufu kpa ef uwa.
Ef e-i oñ a ma ka kʼa gugu ef uwñ kʼowñ la dʼef uwa, owñ chʼugbo Afu-wñ kʼi mudu ñw a le̩.
Awa la fʼu li me̩, oñ a gbʼibenu ka kʼAta fʼO̩ma-wñ kʼi chʼE̩najadu ile̩ kpuche̩ wa.
E̩ne̩ du ki agbalu kakini, Jisus chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩, mak O̩jo̩ gugu ef e̩ne̩ le̩, oñ e̩ne̩ le̩ gugu ef O̩jo̩.
Awa la fʼu ma, a laño̩ mʼe̩do̩ ko̩no ufe̩do̩ kʼO̩jo̩ ne̩ ef uwa. O̩jo̩ chʼufe̩do̩, oñ agugu ef ufe̩do̩ gugu ef O̩jo̩, O̩jo̩ la gugu ef e̩ne̩ le̩.
Ef e-i oñ ufe̩do̩ mufu kpa ugbo e-wa, todu kʼa ki nʼeju e̩gbo̩ o̩jo̩ ajo̩, todu alu kʼowñ le̩ de̩, abe̩le̩ awa la de̩ ile̩-i.
Okpo dʼef ufe̩do̩ n, ufe̩do̩ ki mufu muda anʼokpo dufu. Todu okpo chʼugbo udu echi, achokpo la mufu ef ufe̩do̩ kpa n.
Awa afe̩do̩, ukpe̩ kʼowñ fe̩do̩ wa o̩gba.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka kakini, Nafe̩do̩ O̩jo̩, kʼi la nʼulaka o̩maye-wñ ache, i chʼaremi; todu e̩ne̩ ki ma afe̩do̩ o̩maye-wñ kʼeju-wñ ali n neke fe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ kʼi ma li n in.
Uko̩ kʼa ne̩ kwʼugbo-wñ la de̩, todu kʼe̩ne̩ ki afe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ kʼi nafe̩do̩ o̩maye-wñ.
E̩ne̩ du ki chʼake̩do̩no ka ki Jisus che Kraisti, mak O̩jo̩ chʼe̩te̩-wñ ku ma biʼi, e̩ne̩ du ki chʼe̩nufe̩do̩ e̩ne̩ ki bio̩ma afe̩do̩ o̩ma kʼi bi.
Ef e-i a ma ka kʼa afe̩do̩ amo̩ma O̩jo̩, owñ chʼabu kʼa afe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ kʼa la ade uko̩-wñ.
Todu e̩wñ ki chʼufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ de̩, kʼa ki de uko̩-wñ. Uko̩-wñ la woji n.
Todu e̩wñ du ku ma bi kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼO̩jo̩ afʼile̩ du; edu ki la adu ile̩-i la de̩, owñ chʼe̩do̩ ekono-wa.
E̩ne̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki adu ile̩-i kʼi ma chʼe̩ne̩ ki ake̩do̩no ka ki Jisus chʼO̩ma O̩jo̩ n?
Owñ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki wa lef omi kpʼe̩bie̩, owñ che Jisusi Kraisti, i chʼef omi kate n, chai ef omi kpʼe̩bie̩.
Afu la chʼe̩ne̩ ki agbʼo̩ ibenu, todabu kʼAfu le̩ chʼochochi.
Todu, abo ku ma agbʼo̩ ibenu chʼe̩ta, owñ chʼAfu kpʼomi kpʼe̩bie̩ le̩; alu-ma me̩te̩ta la chʼoka.
I la che̩wñ kʼa gbʼibenu kʼamone̩ agba, ibenu O̩jo̩ tule; todu, e-ki chʼibenu O̩jo̩ de̩, todu i fʼibenu o̩la O̩ma-wñ gba me̩.
Ake̩do̩nʼO̩ma O̩jo̩ nʼe̩nibenu le̩ ef uwñ. E̩ne̩ ki ma ke̩do̩nʼo̩la O̩jo̩ n, mʼowñ du chʼaremi me̩, abu kʼi ma ke̩do̩no ibenu O̩ma-wñ kʼO̩jo̩ gba le̩ n.
Ibenu le̩ la de̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ dʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ ñw a, iñmi le̩ la dʼef O̩ma-wñ.
AnʼO̩ma le̩ fʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ ne̩ me̩, e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼO̩ma O̩jo̩ n nʼiñmi n.
U fʼe̩wñ-i ko̩ rʼume̩ todu kʼa-me̩ ki ma ka kʼame̩ fʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ ne̩ me̩, owñ chʼame̩ amake̩do̩nʼodu O̩ma O̩jo̩.
E-ki chʼeju e̩gbo̩ kʼa ne̩ ugbo-wñ la de̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼa abi e̩wñʼka likpa alu ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ mak i agbo̩ ebi-wa.
I la che̩wñ kʼa ma ka kʼi agbo̩ e̩bi-wa, mak e̩wñ du ki che kʼa abi, a chema ka kʼe̩wñ ebi kʼa bi ugbo-wñ a ne̩ me̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ʼka li abu kʼo̩maye-wñ adure, ki ma chʼedure e-uku n, i abi, tak i adʼiñmi ñw u tod abo kʼedure-ma ma chʼe-uku n. Adure e-uku do̩mo̩; i chʼutodu e-le̩ oñ u ka kʼi atene n.
E̩wñ du ki ma tʼo̩kpakpa n chʼadure, adure la do̩mo̩ ki ma chʼe-uku n.
A chema ka kʼe̩ne̩ du ku ma bi kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼO̩jo̩ adure ño̩ dure n, ama e̩ne̩ ku ma bi kʼe̩te̩-wñ chʼO̩jo̩, O̩jo̩ ade e̩ne̩ le̩, oñ e̩ne̩bibi la neke do̩wo̩ kadʼo n.
A chema ka kʼO̩jo̩ chʼe̩te̩-wa, kʼo̩gbo̩ ile̩-i du la dachi of e̩ne̩bibi le̩.
A la chema ka kʼO̩ma O̩jo̩ lewa me̩, i laño̩ dʼibe e̩wñ ema ñw a, todu kʼa ki ma E̩nogbolo le̩; a la jʼef E̩nogbolo le̩, ef O̩ma-wñ Jisusi Kraist. Owñ le̩ chʼO̩jo̩ ogbolo kpʼiñmi ogbegbele̩.
Amo̩ma-mi, fʼo̩la-me̩ de bʼode te̩.
Ogijo-i tʼugbo odu-mi onobule̩ ku ma chi le̩ kpai amo̩ma-wñ kʼomi afe̩do̩ ma ef ochochi, i la chʼomi kate n, abo du ku ma te̩tama ochochi le̩ manyʼumi kpo̩fo̩,
lef ochochi ki gugu ef uwa kʼi lañʼadʼugbo wa ogbegbele̩.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼejumomi kpʼure̩do̩ kwʼugbo O̩jo̩ Ata, kpai kwʼugbo Jisus Kraist O̩ma Ata le̩ adʼugbo wa, ef ochochi kpai ufe̩do̩.
Nayo̩ tabale todabu kʼu fʼiche̩kibo̩ ef amo̩ma-we̩ li abu ku ma tale ef ochochi, alu kʼa gba uko̩-wñ kwʼugbo Ata.
Oñ fai o̩ko̩ nagba bʼuwe̩, Odu-mi onobule̩, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼuko̩ etito̩ ku ma te̩ oñ nako̩ rʼuwe̩-i n, chai e-kʼa ne̩ kwʼabakwane̩ le̩, todu kʼa ki fe̩do̩ omune̩.
E̩wñ ki la chʼufe̩do̩ la de̩, todu kʼa ki tale teju uko̩-wñ le̩. E̩wñ ki chʼuko̩ le̩ de̩ kakini, Alu ku me̩ gbo̩ kwʼabakwane̩ le̩, todu kʼame̩ ki tale ef e-le̩.
Todu amadone̩la wewe kwodufu tef ile̩-i me̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma ma gbalu ka ku Jisus awa ef ore̩la n. E̩ne̩ le̩ chʼadone̩la kpai achagwunyu Kraist le̩.
Me̩ nago o̩la-me̩, todu kʼame̩ ki we eko e̩wñ kʼa chʼuko̩lo̩ tod uwñ le̩ rinyo̩, chai kʼame̩ ki mʼuro̩me̩ gba e̩kʼe̩ko.
E̩ne̩ du ki lalegudu nyo̩gba, kʼi ma gugu ef uko̩-o̩la Kraisti n nʼO̩jo̩ n; e̩ne̩ ki gugu ef uko̩-o̩la le̩ alo waa, tʼAta tʼO̩ma e̩ne̩ le̩ ne̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du wʼugbo me̩, kʼi ma la ne̩ uko̩-o̩la-i wa n, me̩ ki gbʼo̩ tef unyi n, me̩ ki la ka ñw u ka kʼAgba oo n:
todu e̩ne̩ ki ka ñw u ka kʼAgba oo, nʼuta ata ef uko̩lo̩-bibi-wñ me̩.
Abu kʼu chenʼe̩wñ wewe kʼu nako̩ rʼume̩, u neku enʼo̩takada kpʼomi ejiji ako̩ n; chai ibe u kono ka kʼu nawʼugbo me̩, kʼalu-wa ki de kʼa ko̩la, todu kʼuyo̩-me̩ ki jo̩ kpa.
Amo̩ma o̩maye-we̩ onobule̩ ku ma chi le̩ agwʼe̩.
Ogijo le̩ tʼugbo Gayo̩s e̩nufe̩do̩, e-kʼomi afe̩do̩ owñ ef ochochi.
E̩nufe̩do̩, nachadua kʼe̩wñ du ki ra ñw e̩ kʼe̩ nʼo̩lafia, alu ki ara ñw onugo-we̩ le̩.
Todu u yo̩ tabale abu kʼamo̩maye iche̩ka lewa gba ochochi-we̩ ibenu, alu kʼuwe̩ tale ef ochochi.
U nʼuyo̩ ki tʼegbo̩ ka kʼamo̩ma-mi tale ef ochochi le n.
E̩nufe̩do̩, uko̩lo̩ du kʼe̩ che ñw amo̩maye ku ma la chʼabononojo le̩, chʼubi Ondu eche,
ma la gbʼufe̩do̩-we̩ ibenu eju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu: e̩ fʼahite̩-ma che nyo̩ nyo̩ bʼO̩jo̩ jo̩ ef ulema, mak o̩me̩me̩le̩ e̩ che̩.
Todu, tod odu le̩ oñ ma ledufu, ma agba e̩wñ du o̩wo̩ abo uche̩ichi n.
Todule̩ a nʼo̩me̩ kʼa gbʼabe̩go̩-i nyi, todu kʼawa ki mud amabʼochochi chuko̩lo̩.
U fʼo̩la e̩wñʼka ko̩ rʼujeju abudo̩ Ondu le̩, ama Diatre̩fe̩s, kʼi ache̩do̩ uña ogijo ef uma le̩ jʼagba e-wa n.

Lef e-kide̩ iche̩wñ kʼu lewa, nadʼo̩la uko̩lo̩ kʼi ache le̩ wane̩, ulu bibi kʼi abumʼuwa le̩; oñ abu kʼe-le̩ ma bʼowñ jo̩ ta n, owñ onugo la gba amo̩maye le̩ n, i año̩ kpʼo̩na nyʼabo ku ma neku, oñ i ane̩ ma kwef ujeju abudo̩ Ondu dufu.
E̩nufe̩do̩, e̩ ki wʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ che n, chai e̩wñ ki nyo̩. E̩ne̩ ki nʼe̩wñ e̩nyo̩ ache, mak e̩te̩-wñ chʼO̩jo̩; e̩ne̩ ki nʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ache le̩ li O̩jo̩ n.
Amone̩ du kpʼochochi onugo agba Deme̩trius ibenu. I-i, awa onugo ñʼagbʼo̩ ibenu; oñ e̩ chema kakini, Ibenu-wa kʼa gba chʼochochi.
U ne̩ e̩wñ wewe kʼu ma ko̩ rʼe̩, i muda dʼumi e̩do̩ kʼu nʼomi ejiji kpʼiko̩ ko̩ rʼe̩ n;
u la kibeno ka kʼu nali we̩ faifai, tak alu-wa ade kʼa ko̩la.
Jud, adu Jisus Kraisti kpʼo̩maye Jeme̩s, tʼugbo abo udo̩, ku ma la te̩tafe̩do̩ ma ef O̩jo̩ Ata, ku ma la te̩tadejute̩ ma ñwu Jisus Kraisti:
Eju-momi kpʼure̩do̩ kpʼufe̩do̩ ki nana nyo̩gba ñwu me̩.

Ame̩nufe̩do̩, abu kʼu dʼemi ache̩do̩chacha alu du kʼu fʼo̩takada o̩la ujadu kʼi chʼe-wa de̩de̩ ko̩ rʼume̩, i mud otila ñwu mi kʼu fʼo̩takada ko̩ rʼume̩ adugbe̩do̩ ñwu me̩ ku me̩ fʼuja e̩do̩-ekono ku ma mʼu du ñw abo kiafo̩ o̩pioo le̩ ja.

Todu abo iche̩ka mugwo̩ we̩e̩le̩ tʼo̩ me̩. Owñ chʼabo ku ma kʼinabali-ma tane̩ igbegbele tod abi-i eje̩. Abo ku ma ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n ma che. Ma adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ rida ku ma li uña e̩wñtuñ eche. Ma la nʼaire̩ Jisus Kraisti, kʼowñ kate chʼOndu Onu kpʼOndu-wa, are̩.
U la neku kʼu re me̩ wa, abu ku me̩ chaka fʼe̩wñ du ma e̩gbaʼka le̩, kakini, Abu kʼOndu fʼamone̩ le̩ jadu kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti, ubi le̩ i fʼabo ku ma ma ke̩do̩no n kpabie̩ rinyo̩,
Oñ amonuche̩ O̩jo̩ ku ma ma fejute̩ o̩da oji o̩la e-ma n, ku ma muda hi odo e-ma tinyo̩, i la nafejute̩ ma oj igbaligba e-ogbegbele̩ ef e̩chubi gbe̩m ñw o̩jo̩ ajo̩ lile le̩.
Alu ku So̩do̩m kpai Go̩mo̩ra kpʼewo ewo ki lʼo̩ daka, kʼo̩la-ma jʼef abutabu e̩che̩ ku ma laño̩ kwo̩tʼo̩re̩la ojoji ubi dab abo-i, taku ma mʼuma kojo̩ chʼuwo̩li alu kʼudu e-una ogbegbele̩ echi ade̩.
Abe̩le̩ ge̩, amano̩na-i akpʼo̩re̩la bie̩, ma ño̩ hi o̩da Ondu tʼiba. Ma laño̩ chakpabie̩ abo ojima.
E̩gba ki Maike̩l, kʼi chʼagboji amonuche̩ O̩jo̩, muda bʼAbulumone̩ tukana año̩la Mose̩s, i gbe̩do̩ egwʼajo̩ nʼo̩ achakpabie̩-wñ n. Chai eka i ka kakini, Ondu ki dejurʼe̩.
Abo-i muda achakpabie̩ e̩wñ kʼama ma mʼo̩ n, oñ e̩wñ kʼama mʼoji-wñ kwef italigba-ma, alu kʼame̩la ku ma ma nʼibe ekpe̩ n amʼoji e̩wñ le̩, ef e-le̩ ma fo̩la-ma chile̩che̩.
Atogwo ñwu ma! Todabu ku ma mʼo̩na Ken du, ma laño̩ mʼo̩la-ma darʼef ila Belam ku ma rʼo̩me̩ ñwu ma, oñ ma lenyo̩ rʼef iñwa Ko̩ra.

Abo-i chʼokuta ki bʼo̩la maja ugbo uje̩wñ ufe̩do̩-me̩ abu ku ma jʼaje̩ e̩wñ kpai ame̩, amadidala ku ma tene ije̩ ñw o̩la-ma kʼailo ma ba ma n ma che. Ma chʼakpa ki ma nʼomi n, kʼafu ako alo teml temi; oli o̩lo̩ji ki ma nʼe̩ro n, uku-ma chʼonu meji, ma chʼe̩wu tʼili tʼili,
akpoli ki acho̩ko̩ ohimini, anyo̩ o̩la-ma oñ ma wuwowo dufu le̩, o̩kpa ojale e-ku ma dejutʼe̩chubi e-e̩chubi ogbegbele̩ todu ma.
Ino̩k, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ ekebie ki ro̩no Ade̩m, ño̩ fʼache̩ abo-i ka kakini, Me̩ go, Ondu lewa ef abo-wñ kiafo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ wewe,

kʼi che alu kʼoj ajo̩ ka abʼe̩ne̩ du ma, kʼi laño̩ du uko̩lo̩ ki ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n ku ma che lʼo̩na ki ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n le̩ biu abo du ku ma ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n, kpai o̩la ki gbiti du kʼame̩nadure ku ma ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n du ko̩la nyʼowñ.
Abo-i chʼamajeñmini kpʼame̩ne̩ro̩la ku ma lule̩ tikpa e̩ño̩ e̩wñ ku ma che, alu-ma la nʼo̩la ogbemede aka, ma kʼele eju one̩ ku ma jʼile.
I muda chʼame̩, abufe̩do̩, me̩ nadibekado o̩la kʼame̩nukpuche̩ Onduwa Jisus Kraist ka o̩gbo̩gba le̩;
kʼama ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ef adiko otitala amakone̩ru ado̩mo̩, ma alule̩ tikpa e̩ño̩ e-ma ku ma che ki ma kpe̩do̩rʼO̩jo̩ n.
Abo-i chʼabo ku ma nyʼudate̩ ojoji wa, onugo one̩ ma che dab e̩la, ma ne̩ Afu n.
I muda chʼame̩, abufe̩do̩, me̩ nafʼo̩la-me̩ ne nyo̩gba ef e̩do̩-ekono-me̩ kiafo̩ le̩, me̩ nachadua ef Afu Kiafo̩,
me̩ nadejute̩ o̩la-me̩ ef ufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩, me̩ naneju ejumomi Ondu-wa Jisus Kraist tef iñmi o̩gbegbele̩.
Me̩ ki la li abo iche̩ka ejumomi, me̩ fʼuma ñwa ru ojoji ojoji;
me̩ ki la fʼabo̩ iche̩ka jadu, me̩ fʼuma dinya kwef una; me̩ laño̩ li abo iche̩ka ejumomi, ailo ki muda ba me̩, i chaka chʼafe̩ kʼiwa o̩re̩la bumʼo̩, i ki chʼe̩wñ ulaka-me̩.
Fai, tʼugbo e̩ne̩ ki neke fʼume̩ de ku me̩ we eke̩re̩, kʼi laño̩ neke ko me̩ gugu o̩gba ojima-wñ ku me̩ we ene̩ e̩kpabie̩ o̩la ef oguyo̩,

tʼugbo O̩jo̩ okate kʼi chʼE̩najadu-wa, lefu Jisus Kraist, Ondu-wa, ojima kpʼe̩gahi kpʼinaina, kpʼiñmi, kpai o̩da ki chʼe-wñ, o̩gba tak o̩kpanachi du do̩mo̩, tʼifai, kpai tef o̩kpanachi du ki awa. Ami.
O̩la Jisusi Kraist ebite̩ e-kʼO̩jo̩ du ñw u kʼi kʼe̩wñ ki awache piopio tila ña amadu-wñ. I la fʼu jiwe ñw adu-wñ Jo̩n abu kʼi dʼu kpuche̩ rʼu lef onuche̩-wñ,
kʼi gbʼo̩lO̩jo̩ Ibenu, kʼi ño̩ chʼe̩nibenu Jisusi Kraist ugbo aluka e̩wñ du kʼi li.
E̩ne̩ kʼi acho̩kalatu kpʼabo ku ma agbʼo̩la ache̩-i ku ma la dejutʼe̩wñ kʼi che̩ko̩ rʼef uwñ agbede; todu, iko-wñ me̩ro̩wo̩ me̩.
Jo̩n tʼugbo ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu mebie ki jʼojane̩ Esia:
kpai kwʼugbo Jisusi Kraist E̩nibenu kʼi achubi one̩, kʼi chʼO̩mo̩gba e-abo ki ku, kʼi ño̩ chʼAgboji amonu ane̩ ile̩-i.
kʼi laño̩ mʼuwa ko chʼuche̩ amonu, kʼa chʼamatama ñw O̩jo̩-wñ kʼi laño̩ chʼAta-wñ. Ami.
Go, i awa kpʼakpa ojale oñ eju e̩ne̩ du ali owñ, kpʼabo ku ma dʼe̩wñ gwunyʼu, o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu du ane̩ ile̩-i la adʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩ tod uwñ. I-i, Ami.
Omi che “Alfa” kpʼ“O̩me̩ga”, Ondu O̩jo̩, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi do̩mo̩ abajo̩-i, kʼi la do̩mo̩ akwoubi, kʼi ñʼawa ge̩, Odoba-o̩gagu aka-i.
Omi Jo̩n, o̩maye-me̩, kʼi abʼame̩ tuta ef o̩bata kpʼe̩wñ o̩da Ojane̩ kpʼe̩do̩ e̩lichi efu Jisusi, lewa te̩ ala ku ma do̩ ko̩ Patmo̩s tod o̩lO̩jo̩ kpʼo̩la ibenu Jisus.
U lewate̩ ef Afu, o̩jo̩ ki chʼojima Ondu. Tak u gbʼomuko̩la lile ubi-mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩kakachi,

i kakini, E̩wñ kʼuwe̩ ali-i e̩ nako̩ nyʼo̩takada kʼe̩ dʼu kpuche̩ rʼujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu mebie le̩, owñ chʼE̩fe̩sus kpai Sme̩rna kpai Pe̩rgamo̩s kpai Tayataira kpai Sardis kpai Filade̩lfia kpai Leode̩sia.
Tak u rida kʼu go omuko̩la kʼi ako̩la ñw mi; oñ abu kʼu murida u li akete agege o̩jamalia mebie.
Oñ e̩neʼka kʼi dab o̩ma e-one̩ dʼalumeji akete agege le̩; otogbo kʼi du tʼo̩la wa abʼe̩re̩ ane̩-wñ ma, oñ e̩wñ ujiñmi e-o̩jamalia lʼe̩do̩-wñ de ugbo e̩nya-wñ.
Oji-wñ kpʼiloji-wñ la chʼefufu dab edudu ala, efufu dabu sno; eju-wñ la dab o̩go̩ una;
e̩re̩-wñ la biʼudo̩ ku ma gwe̩, dabe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼef adido akpa; omuko̩la-wñ la dab omuko̩la omi omi wewe.
Oñ i nʼawo mebie ef o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩: o̩kwo̩chageli ki ale̩ eju meji nakwʼef alu-wñ dufu, eju-wñ la dabe̩ne̩ kʼolu ki ada ef ukpahiu-wñ.
Tak e̩gba kʼu fʼowñ li u lewane̩ e̩re̩-wñ dabe̩ne̩ kʼoku one̩. Tak i mʼo̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ du nʼomi, i kakini, E̩ ki railo n; omi chʼe̩ne̩ ejodudu kpʼe̩ne̩ ubi otitala,
kpʼe̩ne̩ kideju, u leku, e̩ la go, edeju nadeju tʼogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa. U la nʼo̩ma igede uku kpʼo̩jegu.
Todule̩ e̩ nakʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ li kpʼe̩wñ ki do̩mo̩, kpʼe̩wñ kʼi ache ki wache anubi e̩wñ-i rʼef o̩takada.
Afili awo mebie kʼe̩ li o̩wo̩-mi awo̩to̩ le̩, kpʼake̩te agege o̩jamalia mebie de̩: awo mebie le̩ chʼamonuche̩ ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu mebie; akete mebie le̩ la chʼujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu mebie.
E̩ nako̩ rʼonuche̩ ujeju abudo̩ Ondu E̩fe̩sus, kakini, E̩ne̩ ki gwo̩nyʼawo mebie o̩wo̩-wñ awo̩to̩ kʼi tale alumeji akete agege mebie le̩, aka e̩wñ-i kakini,

U chema uko̩lo̩-we̩ kpʼakanya kʼe̩ che kpʼe̩do̩ elichi-we̩ kpʼalu kʼe̩ ma neke je̩ kpʼabo e̩bie̩ne̩ n; kpʼalu kʼe̩ fʼabo ku ma dʼo̩la-ma ko̩ ame̩nukpuche̩, ku ma ma dʼabe̩le̩ n, jama, kʼe̩ li ka kʼama chʼame̩nolemi.
E̩ la che̩nʼe̩do̩ elichi, kʼe̩ la nʼadu-wñ tod odu e-mi; uhia la hiʼuwe̩ n.
I muda nʼe̩wñ kʼu nadu biʼuwe̩, kakini, E̩ tʼufe̩do̩-we̩ e-ejodudu le̩ no̩ me̩.
Todule̩ e̩ nadibekadʼugbo kʼe̩ wane̩ kwo, kʼe̩ ribeda kʼe̩ la che uko̩lo̩ e-ejodudu le̩; cho̩kpo̩ni nawʼugbo we̩, oñ e̩ ma ribeda n, nadʼakete agege-we̩ kwʼuña-wñ.
E̩wñ kʼe̩ muda ne̩ la de̩, kakini, E̩ nʼulaka uko̩lo̩ abo Nikoletia ache, e-kʼomi onugo ño̩ chʼulaka-wñ.
E̩ne̩ ki nʼeti kʼi nagbʼe̩wñ kʼAfu aka ñw ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu-i. E̩ne̩ ki fʼu du nadʼe̩ro̩ oli e-iñmi kʼi dʼefu Paradais e-O̩jo̩ ñw u je̩.
Tak e̩ nako̩ rʼonuche̩ ujeju abudo̩ Ondu Sme̩rna kakini, E̩ne̩ ejodudu kpʼe̩ne̩ ubi otitala e-kʼi leku, kʼi laño̩ dabi deju aka e̩wñ-i, kakini.
U chema o̩bata-we̩ kpʼale-we̩, e̩ muda chʼanana, kpʼechakpabie̩ kʼabe ku ma dʼo̩la-ma kʼamaju, ku ma ma dʼabe̩le̩ n chakpabie̩ we̩, chai ujeju Setan ma che.

E̩ ki railo uwa kʼe̩ che kʼe̩ li le̩ du n. Go Abulumone̩ ache kʼi kʼabo iche̩ka ef ume̩ rikpolo jʼef unyi uga todu ku ma jʼume̩ ma; ame̩ la ali o̩bata o̩jo̩ me̩gwa. E̩ ki mud e̩ne̩ ki achubi mi gbogbo wʼuku, tak u nadʼuloko e-iñmi ñw e̩.
E̩ne̩ ki nʼeti ki nagbʼe̩wñ kʼAfu aka ñw ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu-i. I la nʼugbo du kʼuku ekeji ache e̩ne̩ ki du abu du n.
Tak e̩ nako̩ rʼonuche̩ ujeju abudo̩ Ondu Pe̩rgamo̩s, kakini, E̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kʼi ale̩ eju meji le̩ aka e̩wñ-i, kakini.

U chema ugbo kʼe̩ dodo, owñ chʼugbo kʼede Setan de le̩; kʼuwe̩ la gwo̩nyʼodu-mi; i chaka chʼiko Antipas, e̩nibenu kʼi achubi mi ku ma kpa ef ume̩ ugbo ki Setan dodo le̩, me̩ rʼaire̩ o̩la e̩do̩ ekono-mi n.

Omi muda nʼe̩wñ meji ñw e̩ta kʼu nadu gwunyʼe̩, kakini, E̩ chenʼabo ku ma gwo̩nyʼuko̩ o̩la Belam o̩mo̩, owñ ki ko̩ Bele̩k kʼi kʼe̩wñ udahi jo̩ o̩gba amo̩ma Israe̩l, kʼama ki je̩ e̩wñ ku ma kpa ñw ode ku ma ki ño̩ che e̩wñ abutabu.
Abe̩le̩ e̩ laño̩ chenʼabo ku ma gwo̩nyʼuko o̩la abo Nikoletia ge̩.
Todule̩ e̩ naribeda, cho̩kpo̩ni nawʼugbo we̩ piopio, oñ nanʼo̩kwo̩chageli e-alu-mi-i kʼogu bʼuma.

E̩ne̩ ki nʼeli ki nagbʼe̩wñ kʼAfu aka ñw ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu-i. E̩ne̩ kʼi du, nadu mana ki maja le̩ ñw u, tak u nadʼokuta efufu ñw u, odu etito̩ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ma n, chai e̩ne̩ kʼi gba le̩ la che̩ko̩ tʼo̩la okuta le̩.
Tak e̩ nako̩ rʼonuche̩ ujeju abudo̩ Ondu Tayataira, kakini, O̩ma O̩jo̩ kʼi nʼeju dab o̩go̩ una, kʼe̩re̩-wñ la dab udo̩ ku ma gwe̩, aka e̩wñ-i, kakini.
U chema uko̩lo̩-we̩ kpʼufe̩do̩-we̩ kpʼe̩dekono-we̩ kpʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ che ñw one̩ kpʼe̩do̩ elichi-we̩, ka kʼuko̩lo̩-we̩ e-ubi otitala tʼe-ejodudu le.

I muda nʼe̩wñ kʼu nadu gwunyʼe̩, ka kʼuwe̩ tʼonobule̩ Je̩ze̩be̩l le̩ no̩ te̩ ofo, owñ ki adʼo̩la-wñ kʼakache̩ le̩, kʼi la ako̩ amadu-mi, oñ i agba ma ibe ku ma che e̩wñ abutabu ku ma ño̩ je̩ e̩wñ ku ma kpa ñw ode.
U la bʼiko ñw u kʼi ribeda; i la dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼi ribeda kwef e̩wñ abutabu-wñ le̩ n.
Go, nadʼu rikpolo tʼoj ate̩ o̩ga, oñ abo ku ma bʼo̩ dachi atʼef o̩bata elite, chai e̩gba ku ma ribeda kwef uko̩lo̩-wñ.
Oñ nanʼuku kpa amo̩ma-wñ; tak ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu du ama ka kʼomi chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi atejane̩ ef ekpili kpʼef e̩do̩: u la adu ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩ teju alii kʼuko̩lo̩-wñ de̩.
Oñ naka ñw ame̩ ku me̩ la bo̩ Tayataira kakini, Aluka amone̩ du ku ma ma ne̩ uko̩ o̩la kide̩-i n, ku ma ma la ma e̩wñ unefu e-Setan in owñ chʼalu ku ma ka le̩, nadʼadu omune̩ nʼume̩ oji n.
Me̩ ki muda gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ ku me̩ ne̩ le̩ gbogbo tʼe̩gba kʼu lewa.
Oñ nadʼo̩da abo uche̩ichi ñw e̩ne̩ ki adu kʼi la adejute̩ uko̩lo̩-mi gbogbo wʼukpoji:
I la anʼo̩kpa ebije dide ma, alu ku ma kpa e̩wñ eku ama fo̩, alu kʼomi onugo gba ugbo Ata-mi.
Tak u nadʼawo ina ñw u.
E̩ne̩ ki nʼeti ki nagbʼe̩wñ kʼAfu aka ñw ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu-i.
Tak e̩ nako̩ rʼonuche̩ ujeju abudo̩ Ondu Sardis, kakini, E̩ne̩ ki nʼamAfu O̩jo̩ mebie kpʼawo mebie le̩ aka e̩wñ-i, kakini.
E̩ ki mud e̩ne̩ ki gwe̩ke̩ adide kʼe̩ hi e̩wñ ki bo̩ le̩ e̩re̩ nyane̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ kʼi ache kʼi ku le̩; todu u li ka kʼe̩ chʼuko̩lo̩-we̩ kpoji o̩gba O̩jo̩-mi n.
Todule̩ e̩ nadibekadʼalu kʼe̩ le kʼe̩ gba kpʼalu kʼe̩ gbo̩, kʼe̩ la dejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ ribeda. Todule̩ e̩ ma gwe̩ke̩ adide n, nawa dabe̩ne̩ kʼoji; i la anʼugbo du kʼuwe̩ ama iko e̩gba kʼu nawʼo̩la-we̩ n.
E̩ muda chenʼodu amone̩ pe̩ Sardis ku ma ma kpʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma bie̩ n, abo le̩ anyi e̩wñ o̩la efufu atʼale kpʼomi, todabu ku ma nyo̩ bo̩jo̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma akʼe̩wñ o̩la efufu bʼo̩la e̩ne̩ kʼi adu ma, i la nʼugbo du kʼu nakpʼodu-wñ lu bʼef ibuku iñmi te̩ n, oñ nagbalu odu-wñ o̩gba Ata-mi kpʼo̩gba amonuche̩-wñ.
E̩ne̩ ki nʼeti ki nagbʼe̩wñ kʼAfu aka ñw ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu-i.

Tak e̩ nako̩ rʼonuche̩ ujeju abudo̩ Ondu Filade̩lfia, kakini, E̩ne̩ kiafo̩, e̩ne̩ ogbolo le̩, e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼo̩ma igede Defid, e̩ne̩ kʼi abi kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ñʼare ge̩ n, kʼi la are kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ñʼabi ge̩ n, aka e̩wñ-i, kakini.
U chema uko̩lo̩-we̩, go, omi dʼo̩na ku ma mubite̩ tʼo̩gba-we̩ le̩, e̩ne̩ du la neke re n; todabu kʼe̩ nʼukpahiu tiki, kʼe̩ la dejute̩ O̩la-mi, kʼe̩ ma la raire̩ odu-mi n.
Go, nakʼabo ku ma dʼo̩la-ma kʼamaJu, ku ma ma dʼabe̩le̩ n, chai olemi ma ro̩, kwef ujeju Setan, oñ naje̩ ñw ma wa ku ma dojikane̩ o̩gba e̩re̩-we̩; taku ma ama ka kʼomi fe̩do̩ we̩.
Todabu kʼe̩ dejutʼo̩la e̩do̩ elichi-mi, omi ñʼadejutʼuwe̩ bʼef iko ajama kʼi ajʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩ ma te̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi ache kʼi wa abʼo̩gbo̩ ile̩ du ugbo kʼone̩ dodo kade ma.
Nawa piopio; gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ ne̩ le̩, todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki we e̩gbʼe̩ uloko.

E̩ne̩ kʼi du, nadʼu chʼoli ugbogaga ef unyi O̩jo̩-mi ejefu. I la nʼugbo du kʼi adufu nyʼo̩do̩da ge̩ n. Oñ nakʼodu O̩jo̩-mi kpʼodu ewo O̩jo̩-mi Je̩rusale̩m Etito̩ kʼi agwo̩ru kwʼefojale ugbo O̩jo̩-mi awa, nyʼo̩la-wñ, kpʼodu-mi etito̩ ge̩.
E̩ne̩ ki nʼeti kʼi nagbo̩ e̩wñ kʼAfu aka ñw ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu-i.
Tak e̩ nako̩ rʼonuche̩ ujeju abudo̩ Ondu Leo̩de̩sia, kakini, Ami, E̩nibenu kʼi achubi one̩ kpʼe-ogbolo le̩, kʼi chʼuchane̩ e̩wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ nyi, aka e̩wñ-i, kakini.
U chema uko̩lo̩-we̩, kakini, E̩ rudo̩do̩ n, e̩ la kpuna n, i ma nyʼumi eju kʼe̩ rudo̩do̩, cho̩kpo̩ni e̩ kpuna!
Abe̩le̩, todabu kʼe̩ de̩ we̩le̩ we̩le̩, kʼe̩ ma kpuna n, e̩ la rudo̩do̩ n, nache kʼu fʼe̩ tu kwef alu-mi rinyo̩.
Todabu kʼe̩ kakini, Anana u che, u la fʼe̩wñ anana ne̩ me̩, eku e̩wñ la ku mi n; e̩ la ma ka kʼe̩no̩bata kpʼe̩nejumomi kpʼe̩nale kpʼafeju kpʼe̩nago ofo e̩ che̩ n.

Nadʼibe ñw e̩ kʼe̩ la ajamalia kʼuna gwe̩ ugbo mi, todu kʼuwe̩ ki chʼanana; kpʼe̩wñ o̩la efufu, todu kʼuwe̩ ki ko bʼo̩la ma, kʼanyo̩ ago ofo-we̩ ki we etejugede; kpʼogu eju, kʼe̩ dʼu kurʼeju-we̩, todu kʼuwe̩ ki gane̩.
Aluka amone̩ du kʼu nache̩do̩ ma, nadʼo̩la bi ma oñ nako̩ ma o̩la ge̩: todule̩ e̩ nago̩laru kʼe̩ la ribe̩da.
Go, u dago alugbo̩na oñ nadʼo̩wo̩ kʼo̩na; iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du gbʼomuko̩la-mi ki laño̩ mʼo̩na bi, nawʼejefu ugbo-wñ oñ naje̩ e̩wñ kpʼowñ, owñ la ajʼe̩wñ kpʼomi.
E̩ne̩ ki du nadu ñw u kʼi guguane̩ kpʼomi oj ede-mi, alu kʼomi onugo du tak u guguane̩ kpʼAta-mi oj e̩de-wñ.
E̩ne̩ ki nʼeti ki nagbʼe̩wñ kʼAfu aka ñw ujeju ujeju abudo̩ Ondu-i.
E̩ la go, ubi e̩wñ-i u li o̩na efojale ku ma mubite̩, oñ omuko̩la ejodudu kʼu gbo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩kakachi ako̩la kpʼomi, kakini, Mute̩gu wʼemi, oñ nakʼe̩wñ ki awache ubi e̩wñ-i tila ñʼuwe̩.
Ababale̩ u wate̩ ef Afu: e̩ la go, edeʼka dago efojale, e̩ne̩ʼka la gugu oj ede le̩,
e̩ne̩ ki gugu le̩ la dab okuta jasper kpai sardius eju: oñ o̩ba lʼede le̩ daka, e̩ go, i dab e̩me̩rald.
Oñ ede ogu nyoke me̩le̩ jo̩ lʼede le̩ daka, abogijo ogu nyoke me̩le̩ la gugu oj ede le̩, otogbo efufu bʼo̩la-ma ma; oñ ulo-ko ajamalia chʼugugu ike̩be̩jʼoji-ma.
Oñ o̩mamanya kpʼomuko̩la kpʼakpabana nadufu kwef ede le̩. Agege una mebie jʼo̩gba ede le̩ ajo, ama le̩ chʼamAfu mebie e-O̩jo̩;
tak o̩gba ede le̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼohimini e-egigo, i dabu kristal.
E̩wñ iñmi ejodudu la dab idu, e̩wñ iñmi ekeji dab o̩mʼokuno̩, eju e̩wñ iñmi e̩ke̩ta le̩ la dabe̩ne̩ kʼe-one̩, e̩wñ iñmi e̩ke̩le̩ la dab o̩re̩ ki awu.
Oñ ame̩wñ iñmi me̩le̩ le̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma nʼika me̩fa e̩fa, elʼuma año̩la daka kpʼejefu-ma che̩ko̩ ñw eju: ma la nʼuñmi o̩ro̩ka kpʼodu n, ma jʼakakini,
E̩gba du kʼame̩wñ iñmi le adʼojima kpʼubumo̩ kpʼugwa ñw e̩ne̩ ki gugu oj ede le̩ kʼi laño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki adeju ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa,
tak abogijo ogu nyoke me̩le̩ le̩ awane̩ o̩gba e̩ne̩ ki gugu oj ede le̩ oñ ma adojikane̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki adeju ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa le̩, ma la akʼuloko-ma rikpolo jʼo̩gba ede le̩, ma akakini,
Ondu-wa kpʼO̩jo̩-wa, uwe̩ nyo̩ bo̩jo̩
Tak u li ubuku ef o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ ki gugu oj ede le̩, kʼi la che̩ko̩ ñw orubutu ejefu kpʼejo̩do̩da-wñ, ma nʼe̩wñ uhiuko̩ mebie fʼu hiuko̩.
Tak u li onuche̩ kʼi gbiñmi kʼi nʼomuko̩la lile atakoya kakini, E̩ne̩ nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ ki achi ubuku-i te̩, kʼi atu uhiuko̩-wñ?
E̩ne̩ du efojale abe̩k oj ane̩ ile̩ abe̩k o̩gane̩ ane̩ ile̩ la neke chi ubuku le̩ te̩, tʼego ma neke gʼo n.
Tak u raku nana, todabu ku ma ma li e̩ne̩ du ki nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ kʼi achi ubuku le̩ te̩ abe̩k egʼo n.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka ef abogijo le̩ ka ñw mi kakini, E̩ ki raku n; go, Idu ki kwef o̩lo̩pu Juda, ili Defid le, fʼuma du kʼi mʼubuku le̩ chi, kpʼe̩hiuko̩-wñ mebie le̩.

Tak u li abu kʼO̩mala kʼi dabe̩ne̩ ku ma fʼu kpa akwoubi, i nʼigba mebie kpʼeju mebie e-kʼi la chʼamAfu mebie e-O̩jo̩ ku ma ko kpuche̩ rʼef ane̩ ile̩ chaka dago alumeji ede kpʼef alumeji ame̩wñ iñmi me̩le̩ le̩, kpʼalumeji abogijo le̩.
Oñ i lewa mʼu gba kwef o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ e̩ne̩ ki gugu oj ede le̩.

Tak e̩gba kʼi mʼubuku le̩ gba ame̩wñ iñmi me̩le̩ le̩ kpʼabogijo ogu nyoke me̩le̩ le wane̩ o̩gba O̩mala le̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma nʼumolo kpʼugba ajamalia ki che̩ko̩ ñw e̩wñ ki akpo, e-le̩ chʼadua abo kiafo̩.
Oñ ma nʼeli etito̩ ako̩, kakini,
oñ e̩ ko ma chʼamonu kpʼamatama ñw O̩jo̩-wa;
Tak u li, u ño̩ gbʼomuko̩la amonuche̩ wewe kpʼame̩wñ iñmi kpʼabogi-jo le̩ ku ma jo̩ lʼede daka; aluka-ma la chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ wewe ugbo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ki wewe.
Ma nʼomuko̩la lile kakini, O̩mala ku ma du kpa le̩ nyo̩ bo̩jo̩ kʼi gba ukpahiu kpʼe̩wñ anana kpʼibe kpʼugbiñmi kpʼubumo̩ kpʼojima kpʼuje̩nyu.

Tak u gbo̩ abu kʼe̩wñ du ku ma nyi e-ki jʼefojale kpʼe-ki jʼane̩ ile̩ kpʼe-ki jʼo̩gane̩ ane̩ ile̩ kpʼe-ki jʼej o̩himini kpʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef uwñ jʼakakini, Uje̩nyu kpʼubumo̩ kpʼojima kpʼugbiñmi ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa tugbo e̩ne̩ ki gugu oj ede le̩, kpai tugbo O̩mala.
Tak ame̩wñ iñmi me̩le̩ le̩ kakini. Ami. Oñ abogijo le̩ lewane̩ adojikane̩.
Tak u li e̩gba kʼO̩mala le̩ mʼuhiuko̩ʼka ef ebie le̩ chi, oñ u gbo̩ abu kʼe̩wñ iñmiʼka ef ama me̩le̩ ako̩la, dabe̩ne̩ kʼomuko̩la akpabana, kakini, Lewa.
Me̩ la go, u li anya efufu oñ e̩ne̩ ki tanʼoji-wñ nʼo̩o̩do̩, oñ ma mʼuloko du ñw u; tak i kwodufu kpʼedu, todu kʼi fʼuma du.
Tak e̩gba kʼi mʼuhiuko̩ ekeji chi, u gbo̩ abu kʼe̩wñ iñmi ekeji le̩ aka kakini, Lewa.
Tak anya omune̩ ki chʼekpikpa kwodufu; ma du ñw e̩ne̩ ki tanʼoji-wñ kʼi mʼure̩do̩ gba bʼane̩ ile̩ te̩, todu kʼama ki kpʼomune̩; oñ ma mʼugbada lile du ñw u.
Tak e̩gba kʼi mʼuhiuko̩ e̩ke̩ta chi u gbo̩ abu kʼe̩wñ iñmi e̩ke̩ta aka kakini, Lewa. E̩ la go, u li anya edudu, oñ e̩ne̩ ki tanʼoji-wñ nʼe̩bo̩ uñwe̩wñ ef o̩wo̩-wñ.

Tak u gbo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼomuko̩la dʼalumeji ame̩wñ iñmi me̩le̩ le̩ aka kakini, E̩ñwa o̩ka witʼka chʼo̩ko̩ uro̩me̩ uko̩lo̩ o̩jo̩ʼka; oñ e̩ñwa barli me̩ta ño̩ chʼo̩ko̩ uro̩me̩ uko̩lo̩ o̩jo̩ʼka, me̩ ki la kpʼekpo kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma bie̩ n.
Tak e̩gba kʼi mʼuhiuko̩ e̩ke̩le̩ chi u gbo̩ omuko̩la e̩wñ iñmi e̩ke̩le̩ kʼi aka kakini, Lewa.

E̩ la go, u li anya otubulu kpʼe̩ne̩ ki tanʼoji-wñ, odu-wñ ko̩ Uku; oñ o̩jegu tʼo̩ ubi ale. Ma la mʼo̩da ukpe̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ane̩-ile̩-i du ñw ma ku ma nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpʼukpo̩ta kpʼuku kpʼame̩la ane̩ ile̩-i akpa one̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi mʼuhiuko̩ e̩ke̩lu chi u li onugo abo ku ma kpa tod o̩lO̩jo̩ kpai tod o̩la ibenu kʼama gba le̩ ofe ubo̩ iche̩bo̩;
oñ ma nʼomuko̩la lile akwa kakini, Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba, O Ondu Onu kiafo̩ kpʼe-ogbolo, oñ e̩ ma kajo̩ kʼe̩ fʼache̩ e̩bie̩-wa na oji abo ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩ n?
Taku ma mʼafe̩ efufu ko̩ ñw ma okoke; oñ ma ka ñw ma todu ku ma ki ñmi pe̩ ta, gbogbo nyʼe̩gba kʼabo kʼama kpʼama chʼadu kpʼamo̩maye-ma ku ma che ku ma kpa ma dab ama onugo fʼe̩wñ-ma che ki jo̩ kpa.
Tak u li e̩gba kʼi mʼuhiuko̩ e̩ke̩fa chi, ane̩ kwomiejo otemeje, olu la mud edudu dabe̩ne̩ kʼukpo eku ku ma nʼedudu e̩la hi; ochu odukulu la dab e̩bie̩.
Oñ awo awo ojale chi wʼane̩ ile̩-i, alu kʼoli o̩gbaikolo akʼe̩ro-wñ ki ma kpa ta n jʼane̩ e̩gba kʼafu lile amiejo.
Tak ojale muka bʼeju te̩ dab ibuku ku ma ka, tak uwo du kpʼala du muchi kwʼe̩gu-wñ.
Oñ amonu ane̩ ile̩-i kpʼame̩ne̩lile kpʼamonu ogu kpʼamanana kpʼabo ki gbiti kpʼadu du kpʼo̩mone̩ du kʼo̩la-ma maja ef owo kpʼef okuta uwo uwo;
taku ma ka ñw uwo kpʼokuta kakini, Wane̩ abʼuwa ma ku me̩ ko wa maja bʼeju e̩ne̩ ki gugu oj ede kpʼuwe̩do̩ O̩mala le̩ te̩;
todabu kʼo̩jo̩ lile e-uwe̩do̩-ma lewa me̩; e̩ne̩ neke dago bʼe-le̩ jo̩?
Anubi le̩ u li amonuche̩ me̩le̩ ku ma dago̩ jʼago̩go̩ me̩le̩ ane̩ ile̩-i, ma gwo̩nyʼafu ane̩ ile̩-i me̩le̩, todu kʼafu ki we eju ane̩ ile̩ kpʼohimini kpʼoj oli du.
Tak u li abu kʼonuche̩ omune̩ ate̩gu kwʼo̩wo̩ olodudu, oñ i nʼuhiuko̩ e-O̩jo̩ kʼi deju; i la nʼomuko̩la lile kwa dʼamonuche̩ me̩le̩ ku ma du ñw ma ku ma che ane̩ ile̩ kpʼohimini e̩bie̩ne̩ le̩,
i kakini, Me̩ ki che ane̩ ile̩-i kpʼohimini kpʼoli e̩bie̩ne̩ n, gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼa fʼamadu O̩jo̩-wa hiuko̩ o̩gboji-ma.
Tak u gbo̩ aluka abo ku ma fʼuma hiuko̩ le̩, owñ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ mebie nyoke me̩le̩. Ma fʼone̩ hiuko̩ kwef o̩lo̩pu amo̩ma Israe̩l okoke du:
Kwef o̩lo̩pu Juda ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩; kwef o̩lo̩pu Rube̩n ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩; kwef o̩lo̩pu Gad ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩;
kwef o̩lo̩pu Ashe̩r ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩; kwef o̩lo̩pu Naftali ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩; kwef o̩lo̩pu Manasa ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩;
kwef o̩lo̩pu Simeo̩n ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩; kwef o̩lo̩pu Lifai ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩; kwef o̩lo̩pu Isakar ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩;

kwef o̩lo̩pu Ze̩biulo̩n ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩; kwef o̩lo̩pu Jo̩se̩f ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩; kwef o̩lo̩pu Be̩njamin ma fʼone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ me̩gweji hiuko̩.

Me̩ la go, anubi e̩wñ-i u li o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile, e-kʼone̩ du ma neke ka aluka-ma n, ma kwef abo uche̩ichi du kpʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu du kpʼamone̩ du, kpʼalichi du, ma dago jʼo̩gba ede kpʼo̩gba O̩mala le̩, afe̩ efufu dʼo̩la-ma, ima oli ki dab e̩kpe jʼef o̩wo̩-ma.
Ma la nʼomuko̩la lile akwa kakini, Ujadu ki dʼugbo O̩jo̩-wa kʼi gugu oj ede le̩, kpʼugbo O̩mala le̩.
Oñ amonuche̩ chaka dago lʼede le̩ kpʼabogijo kpʼame̩wñ iñmi me̩le̩ le̩ daka, oñ ma lewane̩ afʼeju bʼane̩ ma o̩gba ede le̩, oñ ma dojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩,
kakini, Ami, uje̩nyu kpʼojima kpʼibe kpʼugwa kpʼubumo̩ kpʼukpahiu kpʼugbiñmi ki dʼugbo O̩jo̩-wa ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa. Ami.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka ef abogijo le̩ dohi ka ñw mi kakini, Abo ku ma dʼafe̩ efufu tʼo̩la-i, e̩ne̩ ma che taa? ugbo ma kwo?
Tak u ka ñw u kakini, Odu-mi, uwe̩ ma. Oñ i ka ñw mi kakini, Abo-i chʼabo ku ma kwef o̩bata e-lile le̩ wa, ma la fʼafe̩-ma gwe̩ me̩, oñ ma je̩ ñw ma mud efufu ef e̩bie̩ O̩mala le̩.
Lef e-kide̩ oñ ma jʼo̩gba ede O̩jo̩,
Ebi ñʼakpa ma ge̩ n, olugbe̩ la akpa ma ge̩ n,
todu O̩mala ki dʼalumeji ede le̩ adide ma,
Tak e̩gba du kʼi mʼuhiuko̩ e̩kebie chi, efojale de hialii dab ukpeji auwa.
Tak u li amonuche̩ ku ma dago o̩gba O̩jo̩; oñ ma mʼo̩kakachi mebie ko̩ ñw ma.

Tak onuche̩ omune̩ lewa dago ugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, i nʼe̩wñ o̩jamaliaʼka ku ma kʼe̩wñ ki akpo jʼef uwñ; oñ ma kʼe̩wñ ki akpo le̩ ñw u nana, todu kʼi mudu manyʼadua e-abo kiafo̩ chaka ki nʼoj ubʼo iche̩bʼo e-o̩jamalia kʼi dʼo̩gba ede le̩.
Tak odudu e̩wñ ki akpo le̩ manyʼadua abo kiafo̩ kwef o̩wo̩ onuche̩ le̩ ate̩gu tʼo̩gba O̩jo̩.

Tak onuche̩ le̩ mʼe̩wñ kʼe̩wñ ki akpo le̩ jʼef uwñ du, oñ i fʼe̩ge̩ una e-ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ gbanyʼu e̩ko̩, tak i mʼu du rikpolo tʼane̩ ile̩; oñ akpabana kpʼomuko̩la kpʼo̩mamanya kpʼane̩ emi-ejo wate̩.
Tak amonuche̩ mebie ku ma nʼo̩kakachi mebie le̩ fʼo̩la-ma ñwo̩che jo̩ ku ma fʼokakachi.

Tak e-ejodudu fa, oñ i mud okuto̩mo̩jocha kpʼuna ki gwe̩gwa nyʼe̩bie̩, oñ ma mʼu ko rikpolo tʼane̩ ile̩; tak ukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta ane̩ ile̩ gujo rinyo̩, ukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta oli la gujo rinyo̩, oñ egbe emimi du gujo rinyo̩.
Tak onuche̩ ekeji fʼo̩kakachi-wñ, oñ i dabe̩ne̩ ku ma kʼuwo lile ki ajo una rikpolo tef ohimini, oñ ukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta ohimini omu le̩ mud e̩bie̩;
oñ ukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta e̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ nyi ku ma nʼiñmi ku ma jʼef ohimini le̩ leku; oñ ukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta o̩ko̩ chihi rinyo̩.
Tak onuche̩ e̩ke̩ta fʼokakachi-wñ, oñ awo lile muchi kwʼefojale wane̩, i najo dab agege, oñ i lewane̩ bʼoji ukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta ohimini ma, kpʼabʼoji e̩bi omi ma.
Odu awo le̩ la ko̩ O̩ge̩le̩; oñ ukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta omi le̩ mud o̩ge̩le̩, amone̩ wewe la leku noj omi le̩, todabu ki alukoko.

Tak onuche̩ e̩ke̩le̩ fʼo̩kakachi-wñ: oñ ma fʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta e-olu kpa, kpʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta ochu kpʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta awo awo; todu kʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ ki chubi, todu kʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta o̩ro̩ka ki we etejugede, kpʼodu abe̩le̩ ge̩.

Tak u li, oñ u gbo̩ abu kʼo̩re̩ ʼka ki awu alumeji ojale nʼomuko̩la lile kakini, Atogwo, atogwo, atogwo, tugbo abo ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩, lef omuko̩la o̩kakachi e-amonuche̩ me̩la ki bo̩ ku ma che ku ma fa-i.
Tak onuche̩ e̩ke̩lu fʼo̩kakachi-wñ, oñ u li awo ki kwʼefojale wʼane̩ ile̩, ma la mʼomigede ura o̩lo̩ulu du ñw u.
Tak i mʼo̩na ura o̩lo̩ulu le̩ bi; oñ odudu kwʼef ura le̩ tuu tʼatate̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼodudu adido lile oñ olu kpʼafu-i chubi noj odudu ki kwʼef ura le̩.
Tak amakubaliba kwef odudu le̩ wa bʼane̩ ile̩ ma, ma la dʼo̩da ñw ma alu kʼamakpe ane̩ ile̩ nʼo̩da.
Oñ ma ka ñw ma todu ku ma ki we echʼegbe ane̩ ile̩-i kpʼe̩wñ emimi du kpʼoli du e̩bie̩ne̩, chai amone̩ ku ma ma nʼuhiuko̩ O̩jo̩ o̩gboji-ma n kate.
Ma la du ñw ma ku ma kpa ma n, chai todu ku ma chʼuma o̩pe̩cha ochu me̩lu: o̩pe̩cha-ma la dabe̩ne̩ kʼiwo̩ akpe̩ e̩gba kʼi atʼone̩.
Oñ iko le̩ amone̩ afeju uku, i la anʼugbo du ku ma li u n; e̩ño̩ eku la ache ma, oñ uku ara bʼuma te̩.
Oñ o̩la amakubaliba le̩ dab amanya ku ma ñwʼo̩la-ma che tod ogu; oñ i dabe̩ne̩ kʼuloko ki dab e-o̩jamalia jʼoji-ma, oñ eju-ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼeju amone̩.
Oñ ma nʼiloji dabe̩ne̩ kʼiloji abobule̩, enyi-ma la dabe̩ne̩ kʼe-amidu.
Ma nʼe̩wñ ogu ku ma du bʼe̩do̩ ma ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ ubʼe̩do̩ ma e-ebije, oñ ekuku ika-ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼekuku o̩ko̩ kʼamanya wewe afo̩ ku ma fule nyʼokogu.
Ma la che̩nʼotihi dab amakpe̩ kʼi atʼone̩, oñ o̩da-ma ku ma ne̩ achʼamone̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ ochu me̩lu le̩ dʼoj otihi-ma.
Ma che̩nʼonu e-ma, owñ chʼonuche̩ o̩lo̩ulu le̩: odu-wñ alu Hibru ko̩ Abado̩n,oñ odu-wñ alu Grik ko̩ Apalio̩n.
Atogwo e-ejodudu lale me̩. Me̩ go, atogwo meji ñʼawa ubi e̩wñ-i ge̩.
Tak onuche̩ e̩ke̩fa fʼo̩kakachi-wñ: oñ u gbo̩ omuko̩la ki kwef igba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ e-o̩jamalia kʼi dʼo̩gba O̩jo̩ le̩,
kʼi aka ñw onuche̩ e̩ke̩fa ki nʼo̩kakachi le̩ kakini, Mʼamonuche̩ me̩le̩ ku ma chʼe̩ji ugbo ohimini lile e-Yufretis le̩ tu jʼane̩.
Taku ma mʼamonuche̩ me̩le̩ le̩ tu jʼane̩, ama chʼabo ku ma ñwʼo̩la-ma che te̩ tod auwa le̩ kpʼo̩jo̩ le̩ kpʼochu le̩ kpʼodo̩ le̩, todu kʼama ki fʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta amone̩ kpa.
Oñ aluka abogu ku ma tanʼanya le̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ki wewe ugbo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ki wewe, e-le̩ chʼonu meji; u la gbo̩ aluka-ma.

Oñ abe̩le̩ u li amanya ef ane̩ ego le̩, kpʼabo ku ma tanʼoji-ma: ma chenʼe̩wñ ubʼe̩do̩ ma kʼejo̩do̩da-wñ bi una kpʼekpikpa chuwa, kpʼitolu; oji amanya-ma la dab oji amidu oñ una kpʼodudu kpʼitolu nadufu kwef alu-ma.
Ma nʼe̩wñ o̩pe̩cha me̩ta-i fʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩ta amone̩ kpa leku, owñ chʼef una kpʼodudu kpʼitolu ki nakwef alu-ma dufu le̩.
Todu o̩da amanya le̩ dʼef alu-ma, kpʼoj otihi-ma: todu otihi-ma dab amejo, ma chenʼoji; oñ ma nʼe-le̩ chʼe̩bie̩ne̩.

Tak amone̩ kibo̩ kʼegwo ku ma gwo ma-i ma kpa ma n, ma ribeda kwef uko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-ma todu ku ma we edojikane̩ ñw amebili n, kpʼode e-o̩jamalia kpʼe-ajifa kpʼe-udo̩ kpʼe-okuta kpʼe-oli ku ma ma neke gane̩ n, ma la neke gbʼo̩la n, ma la neke lule̩ n;
