ma la ribeda kwef one̩ ekpa-ma n, abe̩ku kwef obochi-ma eche n, abe̩ku kwef e̩wñ abutabu-ma eche n, abe̩ku kwef oji-ma eji n.
Tak u li onuche̩ omune̩ ki gbi-ñmi kʼi agwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa, akpa bʼo̩la-wñ ma, o̩ba dʼoji-wñ, eju-wñ la dab olu, oñ e̩re̩-wñ dab una ki gba dago dab ugbogaga e̩wñ.
I la nʼubuku kekele ki che̩bite̩ ef o̩wo̩-wñ, tak i mʼe̩re̩-wñ awo̩to̩ du nʼohimini, i la dʼe-awohi nʼane̩ ile̩-i,
tak i nʼomuko̩la lile akwa alu kʼidu ako̩la: oñ e̩gba kʼi kwa, akpabana mebie le̩ nʼomu-ma ako̩la.
Oñ e̩gba kʼakpabana mebie le̩ fʼo̩la ka, u le kʼu ko̩ nyʼo̩takada, u muda gbʼomuko̩la kwʼefojale, kakini, Fʼe̩wñ kʼakpabana mebie le̩ ka hiuko̩ te̩, e̩ ki ko̩ e-le̩ n.
Tak onuche̩ e-kʼu li abu kʼi adago ej ohimini kpʼane̩ ile̩-i dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-wñ nyʼate̩ rʼo̩wo̩ efojale,
oñ i fʼe̩ne̩ kʼi deju ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa, e-kʼi nyi efojale kpʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef uwñ, kpʼane̩ ile̩ kpʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef uwñ, kpʼohimini kpʼe̩wñ du ki jʼef uwñ go kakini, Iko ñʼade̩ ge̩ n,
ama iko o̩jo̩ omuko̩la onuche̩ e̩kebie-i, e̩gba du kʼi le kʼi fʼo̩kakachi, afili O̩jo̩ kpoji, alu kʼi fʼuche̩nyo̩-wñ je̩rʼamadu-wñ ku ma chʼamako̩che̩-wñ.
Tak omuko̩la kʼu gbo̩ kwʼefojale ño̩ dabi ko̩la ñw mi ge̩, i kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ gbʼibuku ki che̩chite̩ ef o̩wo̩ onuche̩ ki adago ej ohimini kpʼane̩ ile̩ le̩.
Tak u nyʼugbo onuche̩ le̩ u ka ñw u kʼi dʼibuku kekele le̩ ñw mi. Oñ i ka ñw mi kakini, Gba, kʼe̩ mʼu du je̩; i la aje̩ ñw efu-we̩ lukoko, i muda arinyo̩ dab iño̩ ef alu-we̩.
Tak u mʼibuku kekele le̩ gba kwef o̩wo̩ onuche̩ le̩, oñ u mʼu du je̩; oñ i rinyo̩ dab iño̩ ef alu-mi; e̩gba kʼu fʼu je̩, i je̩ ñw efu-mi lukoko.
Taku ma ka ñw mi kakini, I dukpe̩ kʼe̩ ñʼadabi kache̩ ñw amone̩ kpʼabo uche̩ichi kpʼalu ichi kpʼamonu wewe chuu.
Taku ma mʼikpo ki dab o̩kpa du ñw mi, oñ ma kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ ñwa unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu kpʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ kpʼabo ku ma dojikane̩ ef uwñ.
Ologbo ki dʼo̩do̩da unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu le̩ to̩no̩ tʼo̩do̩da, e̩ ki ñwa e-le̩ n; todabu ku ma mʼe-le̩ du ñw abo uche̩ichi, ma la anʼe̩re̩-ma fʼewo kiafo̩ le̩ kpetili mane̩ ochu o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke meji.
Tak u nadu ñw ame̩nibenu-mi meji, ku ma akache̩ o̩jo̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩gwe̩ta, ukpo eku adʼo̩la-ma.
Abo-i chʼoli o̩lif meji le̩ kpʼagege meji ku ma dago jʼo̩gba Ondu e-ane̩ ile̩ le̩ de̩.
I la che̩wñ ki dʼe̩ne̩ du e̩do̩ kʼi che ma e̩bie̩ne̩, una akwʼef alu-ma dufu kʼi afʼame̩nebi-ma lie̩; i la che̩wñ ki dʼe̩ne̩ du e̩do̩ ki che ma e̩bie̩ne̩ mak abe̩le̩ ma adʼe̩ne̩ le̩ kpa chuu.

Abo-i chenʼo̩da ku ma fʼefojale re todu kʼomi ki we elo̩ ef adiko o̩jo̩ ache̩-ma ku ma ka, ma laño̩ nʼo̩da ugbo omi ku ma fʼu rida e̩bie̩, ma ño̩ nʼo̩da ku ma ki nʼuchobi kide̩ fʼane̩ ile̩-i gwo e̩gba du ki dʼuma e̩do̩.
Tak e̩gba du ku ma fʼibenu-ma gba kpoji e̩la ki ate̩gu kwef o̩lo̩ulu le̩ wa akʼogu bʼuma, i la afʼuma du, tak i akpa ma.
Okuma la ajʼej o̩na ewo lile ku ma do̩ lʼo̩na Afu ko̩ So̩do̩m kpʼIjipti le̩, o̩mo̩ ma ño̩ dʼOndu-ma kamoli ge̩.
Tak abo iche̩ka ef amone̩ le̩ kpʼef o̩lo̩pu, o̩lo̩pu, kpʼefʼalu ichi ichi kpʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ago oku-ma o̩jo̩ me̩ta kpʼukpeji, ma la aje̩ ñw ma kʼoku-ma ji n.
Tak abo ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩ agwoye rʼuma oji, ma achiya; ma la akʼe̩wñ ele kpuche̩ rʼo̩la-ma, todabu kʼamakache̩ meji-i je̩ ñw abo ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩ li uwa.
Tak anubi kʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta kpʼukpeji le̩ le rʼane̩, afu iñmi kwef O̩jo̩ gudu tef uma, taku ma mʼe̩re̩-ma ko dʼane̩, tak ailo lile lewa bʼabo ku ma li ma ma.
Oñ ma gbʼomuko̩la lile ki kwʼefojale aka ñw ma kakini, Me̩ mute̩gu wʼemi. Taku ma mute̩gu tʼefojale ef akpa; oñ ame̩nebi-ma U ma.

Tak ef auwa kide̩, ane̩ kwomiejo otemeje, ukpe̩ e̩ke̩gwa ewo le̩ la lewane̩, oñ odu one̩ kʼi ku ef ane̩ ki miejo le̩ chʼicham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ mebie, tak ailo fʼabo ki bo̩ mu, oñ ma kwodojima ñw O̩jo̩ e-efojale.
Atogwo e-ekeji lale me̩. Me̩ go, atogwo e̩ke̩ta awa piopio.
Tak onuche̩ e̩kebie le̩ fʼo̩kakachi-wñ; oñ i mud omuko̩la lile efojale, kakini, O̩da ojane̩ ile̩ mud e-Ondu-wa kpʼe-Kraisti-wñ me̩; i la ajʼonu-wñ ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa.
Tak abogijo ogu nyoke me̩le̩ ku ma gugu oj ede-ma o̩gba O̩jo̩ lewane̩ afʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ ma dojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩, kakini,
A gwʼuwe̩ ugwa, uwe̩ Ondu O̩jo̩, O̩dobao̩gagu, e̩ne̩ kʼi do̩mo̩, kʼi laño̩ do̩mo̩ akwoubi;
Abo uche̩ichi la we̩do̩, oñ uwe̩do̩-we̩ lewa,
Taku ma mʼef unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu ki dʼefojale le̩ bite̩; oñ ma li akpati alo-wñ ef unyi-wñ ejefu le̩; tak o̩mamanya kpʼomuko̩la kpʼakpabana kpʼane̩ emiejo kpʼokuto̩mo̩jo̩cha lile lile wate̩.
Tak u dago oj e̩lanyi e-ohimini. Oñ u li e̩laʼka ki ate̩gu kwef ohimini awa, i nʼigba me̩gwa kpʼoji mebie, oñ oj igba-wñ ukata onu me̩gwa jo̩, odu achakpabie̩ la jʼoji-wñ.
Oñ e̩la kʼu li le̩ dab e̩ko̩, e̩re̩-wñ la dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩re̩ ibe̩a, alu-wñ la dab alu idu; taku dragon le̩ mʼukpahiu-wñ kpʼede-wñ kpʼo̩da elile ko ñw u.
Oñ oji-wñ oka dabe̩ne̩ ku ma fʼu kpa leku tak agbe oka-wñ le̩ bie̩ kpa, oñ o̩gbo̩ ane̩ ile̩ du kwoyaye tʼe̩la le̩ ubi.
Ma la dojikane̩ ñw drago̩n todabu kʼi dʼo̩da ñw e̩la le̩; oñ ma dojikane̩ ñw e̩la le̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ dab e̩la-i? E̩ne̩ neke bʼo̩ jogu?
Oñ ma dʼalu ñw u kʼi ko̩la ogbemede, kpʼechakpabie̩; ma la dʼo̩da ñw u kʼi chʼe̩wñ ochu o̩gbo̩ meji nyoke meji.
Tak i mʼalu-wñ chi tef akpabie̩ O̩jo̩ eche, kʼi la chakpabie̩ odu-wñ, kpʼebu-wñ kpʼabo ku ma mʼebu jʼefojale.
Taku ma du ñw u kʼi kogu bʼabo kiafo̩ kʼi la fʼuma du; ma la dʼo̩da abo o̩lo̩pu kpʼalichi kpʼabo uche̩ichi du ñw u.
Oñ abo du ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩-i ku ma ma kʼodu-ma rʼef ibuku e-iñmi e-O̩mala ku ma kpa akwʼe̩gba ku ma kpʼe̩re̩ ile̩ n le̩, adojikane̩ ñw u.
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du nʼeti, kʼi nagbo̩:
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du do̩mo̩ kʼamu chʼukpe-wñ,
Tak u li e̩la omune̩ ki ate̩gu kwef ane̩ ile̩-i awa; i la nʼigba meji dab o̩mala, oñ i ako̩la dabu drago̩n.
I la nʼo̩da e-e̩la ejodudu le̩ chaka che e̩wñ eju-wñ. Oñ i ache todu kʼane̩ ile̩-i kpʼabo du ku ma dodo ef uwñ ku ma dojikane̩ ñw e̩la ejodudu e-kʼagbe egwu uku-wñ bie̩ le̩.
Oñ i achʼujiwe lile, i la aje̩ ñw una ki gwo̩ru kwʼefojale tef ane̩ ile̩ eju amone̩.
Oñ i kʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩-i la, lef ujiwe ku ma du ñw u kʼi che eju e̩la le̩; i aka ñw abo ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩ ku ma ki fʼojibo gbe̩ ñw e̩la e-ku ma gwu ugbada kʼi ño̩ dabi deju le̩.
Taku ma du ñw u kʼi dʼiñmi ñw ojibo e̩la le̩, todu kʼojibo e̩la le̩ ki nako̩la, kʼi laño̩ je̩ ñw ma fʼaluka one̩ du ku ma ma dojikane̩ ñw ojibo e̩la le̩ n kpa.
Oñ i aje̩ ñw amone̩ du, tʼabo kekele, tʼame̩ne̩lile, tʼanana, tʼe̩nale, tʼe̩mone̩, tʼadu, todu ku ma ki ko̩ ma ina o̩wo̩ awo̩to̩-ma abe̩k o̩gboji-ma;
todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki neke la e̩wñ n, i la neke ta e̩wñ n, chai e̩ne̩ ki nʼina le̩, owñ chʼodu e̩la le̩ abe̩k inaba odu-wñ.
Emi afili de̩: e̩ne̩ ki nibe ki nakaluka inaba e̩la le̩, todu inaba e-one̩ i che, inaba-wñ chʼulo̩gwa nyʼo̩gbo̩ me̩ta nyoke me̩fa.
Me̩ la go, u li O̩mala le̩ kʼi dago oj uwo Zayo̩n, one̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ mebie nyoke me̩le̩ jʼugbo-wñ, ma fʼodu e-wñ kpʼe-Ata-wñ ko nyʼo̩gboji-ma.
Tak u gbʼomuko̩la kwʼefojale, i ka dab omuko̩la omi ki wewe, kpai dab uko̩la akpabana lile: oñ omuko̩la kʼu gbo̩ le̩ dab amanʼumolo ku ma nʼumolo-ma anu,

oñ ma nʼeli etito̩ ako o̩gba ede le̩ kpʼo̩gba ame̩wñ iñmi me̩le̩ kpʼabogijo le̩. E̩ne̩ du la neke ko̩che̩ eli le̩ n chai abo icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ ugbo o̩gbo̩ mebie nyoke me̩le̩ ku ma la ma kwʼef ane̩ ile̩ le̩.

Abo-i chʼabo ku ma ma kpʼo̩la-ma bie̩ ugbo abobule̩ n, todu ma chʼabo ku ma ma mʼonobule̩ n. Abo-i chʼabo ku ma atʼO̩mala ubi ugbo du kʼi anyi. Ma fʼabo-i la kwʼugbo amone̩, ma chʼejo̩ga e̩wñ ñw O̩jo̩, kpʼO̩mala le̩.
Ma la li olemi ef alu-ma n, ma nʼe̩kpabie̩ o̩la n.
Tak u li onuche̩ omune̩ abu kʼi awu alumeji ojale, i nʼuche̩nyo̩ e-ogbegbele̩ kʼi aje̩rʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩ kpʼabo uche̩ichi du kpʼo̩lo̩pu du kpʼalichi du kpʼamone̩ du,
oñ i nʼo-muko̩la lile aka kakini, Me̩ railo O̩jo̩, me̩ ki la dojima ñw u, todabu kʼauwa ajo̩-wñ lewa me̩; me̩ ki la dojikane̩ ñw e̩ne̩ ki chʼefojale kpʼane̩ ile̩ kpʼohimini kpʼe̩bi omi.
Tak onuche̩ omune̩ tʼo̩ ubi kakini, I lewane̩ me̩! i lewane̩ me̩! owñ che Babilo̩n lile ki dʼo̩te̩ wain e-e̩do̩fulu e-abutabu-wñ le̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi du ñmo̩.
Tak onuche̩ e̩ke̩ta tʼuma ubi, i nʼomuko̩la lile aka kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du dojikane̩ ñw e̩la le̩ abe̩k ojibo-wñ abe̩k i mʼina-wñ gba ogboji-wñ abe̩k o̩wo̩-wñ,
e̩ne̩ le̩ ñʼañmo̩ kwef o̩te̩ wain e-e̩do̩fulu e-O̩jo̩, e-ki chʼe̩gwe̩gwa ef ago uwe̩do̩-wñ ku ma ma chʼomi gwʼo̩ n; oñ ma aje̩ ñw u li uwa ef una kpʼitolu eju amonuche̩ kiafo̩ kpʼeju O̩mala le̩.
Odudu uwa-ma le̩ ate̩gu tʼate̩ ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa; ma la anʼuñmi o̩ro̩ka kpʼodu n; owñ chʼabo ku ma dojikane̩ ñw e̩la le̩ abe̩k ojibo-wñ kpʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi gbʼina odu-wñ.
Emi e̩do̩ elichi e-abo kiafo̩ de̩: ama chʼabo ku ma dejutʼo̩la uko̩ e-O̩jo̩ kpʼe̩dekono e-Jisus.

Tak u gbʼomuko̩la kwʼefojale kʼi aka kakini, Ko̩ kakini, Abo ki ku gbede, owñ chʼabo ku ma ku ef Ondu akwʼe̩gba-i alo̩: ochochi, Afu le̩ ka-i, todu kʼama ki ñmi kwef akanya uko̩lo̩-ma, todu uko̩lo̩-ma tʼuma ubi alo.
Me̩ la go, u li akpa efufu, oñ oj akpa le̩ e̩ne̩ʼka kʼi dab O̩ma One̩ gugu, i la nʼuloko o̩jamalia oji-wñ, oñ ujegbe ki ale̩ dʼef o̩wo̩-wñ.
Tak onuche̩ omune̩ kwef unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu dufu, oñ i nʼomu elile kwa dʼe̩ne̩ ki gugu oj akpa le̩ kakini, Fʼujegbe-we̩ kpe̩ lo kʼe̩ ja: todu iko e̩ja lewa me̩; todabu kʼe̩wñ oko ane̩ ile̩ bie̩ kpa.
Tak e̩ne̩ kʼi gugu oj akpa le̩ mʼujegbe-wñ du rikpolo tʼane̩ ile̩, oñ i fʼane̩ ile̩ ja kpa.
Tak onuche̩ omune̩ kwʼunyi O̩jo̩ ejefu e-ki dʼefojale dufu, owñ le̩ ño̩ nʼujegbe ki ale̩.

Tak onuche̩ omune̩ kwef ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ dufu, owñ chʼe-ki nʼo̩da una, oñ i nʼomu elile dʼe̩ne̩ ki nʼujegbe ki ale̩ le̩, kakini, Fʼujegbe-we̩ ki ale̩ le̩ kpe̩ lo kʼe̩ fʼe̩ro achiwebe̩te̩ma ane̩ ile̩ ka, todabu kʼachiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ kpa kpa me̩.
Abe̩le̩ onuche̩ le̩ mʼujegbe-wñ du rikpolo tef ane̩ ile̩, oñ i fʼiga achiwebe̩te̩ma ja, tak i mʼu du rikpolo tef aguo̩ko̩lo̩ lile ki chʼe-e̩do̩fulu O̩jo̩ le̩.
Taku ma fʼu te̩ ef aguo̩ko̩lo̩ ejo̩do̩da ewo le̩, oñ e̩bie̩ kwef aguo̩ko̩lo̩ le̩ dufu gbogbo wʼugbo ajamu amanya, akwo maili o̩gwo̩ko̩.
Tak u fʼujiwe omune̩ li efojale, i chʼe-lile, aye-wñ gbe̩, owñ chʼamonuche̩ mebie ku ma nʼuchobi mebie, e-otitala de̩, todabu kʼef e-le̩ e̩do̩fulu O̩jo̩ kpoji.
Tak e̩wñ kʼu li dabe̩ne̩ kʼohimini egigo kʼuna chʼe̩gwe̩gwanyʼu; kpʼabo ku ma du ugbo uja e̩la le̩ kpʼugbo ojibo-wñ kpʼugbo inaba odu-wñ, ma nʼumolo e-O̩jo̩ dago jʼo̩la ohimini egigo le̩.
Oñ ma nʼeli Mose̩s adu O̩jo̩ le̩ kpʼeli O̩mala ako̩, ma kakini,
E̩ne̩ ma arailo n, Ondu, e̩ne̩ ma la adʼojima ñw odu-we̩ n?
Tak ubi e̩wñ-i u li, ma la mʼo̩na unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu e-ebu ibenu efojale le̩ bi,
oñ amonuche̩ mebie ku ma nʼuchobi mebie le̩ kwef unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu dufu, ukpo line̩n ki de̩ hiolo ki afane̩ bʼo̩la-ma ma, oñ e̩wñ ujiñmi ajamalia ji mʼe̩do̩-ma ugbo e̩nya-ma.
Tak oka ef ame̩wñ iñmi me̩le̩ le̩ mʼucha o̩jamalia mebie ki che̩ko̩ ñw e̩do̩fulu O̩jo̩ ki deju ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa ko ñw amonuche̩ mebie le̩.
Tak unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu le̩ che̩ko̩ ñw odudu kwef ojima e-O̩jo̩, kpai kwʼef ukpahiu-wñ; e̩ne̩ du la neke gudu tef unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu n, gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼuchobi mebie e-amonuche̩ mebie le̩ kpoji.
Tak u gbʼomuko̩la lile ki kwʼef unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu le, i naka ñw amonuche̩ mebie le̩ kakini, Me̩ lo, ku me̩ mʼucha mebie e-e̩do̩fulu O̩jo̩ ko da rʼef ane̩ ile̩.
Tak e-ejodudu le, oñ i mʼucha-wñ du da rʼef ane̩ ile̩; oñ ikete e̩bie̩ne̩ kpʼe-bibi Icwʼo̩la amone̩ ku ma nʼina e̩la ku ma laño̩ dojikane̩ ñw ojibo-wñ le̩.
Tak e-ekeji mʼucha-wñ du da rʼef ohimini; oñ i mud e̩bie̩, dabe̩ne̩ kʼe-e̩ne̩ ki ku; tak onugo e̩wñ du ki deju ef ohimini leku.
Tak e-e̩ke̩ta mʼucha-wñ du da rʼef aji aji kpʼe̩bi omi e̩bi omi, oñ i mud e̩bie̩.
Tak u gbo̩ abu kʼonuche̩ omiofo le̩ akakini,
Todabu kʼama le̩ kʼe̩bie̩ abo kiafo̩ kpʼe-amakache̩ dafo,
Tak u gbo̩ abu kʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ akakini,
Tak e-e̩ke̩le̩ mʼucha-wñ du da rʼolu, oñ ma du ñw u kʼi nʼuna fʼamone̩ gujo,
tak ukpuna lile fʼamone̩ gujo oñ ma kwochakpabie̩ odu O̩jo̩ ki nʼo̩da uchobi-i; ma la ribeda ku ma dʼojima ñw u n.
Tak e-e̩ke̩lu mʼucha-wñ du darʼoj ede e̩la le̩; tak ojane̩-wñ mud e̩chubi te̩; taku ma kwolʼukpalu-ma tod ewo ki awo̩ ma,
oñ ma kwochakpabie̩ O̩jo̩ e-efojale tod ewo ki awo̩ ma, kpai tod ikete-ma; ma la ribeda bʼuko̩le̩-ma te̩ n.
Tak e-e̩ke̩fa mʼucha-wñ du da rʼohimini lile le̩, owñ chʼe-Yufretis; tak omi-wñ gbe̩; todu ku ma ñwʼona che tod amonu ku ma akwʼolodudu wa.
Tak u li amafu me̩ta ku ma ma de̩ hiolo n ku ma dab amo̩bana, ma dufu kwef alu dragon kpai kwef alu e̩la kpai kwef alu akache̩ e-olemi le̩;

todu ma chʼamafu e-amebili ku ma nʼe̩wñ ujiwe ache, kʼama le̩ ale dufu nyʼugbo amonu o̩gbo̩ ile̩ ugbo kʼone̩ dodo kade du, ku ma ko ma wa ugbo ogu e-o̩jo̩ lile e-O̩jo̩ Odobao̩gagu; me̩ go, nawa dabe̩ne̩ kʼoji.
E̩ne̩ ki agwe̩ke̩ adide, kʼi la adejutʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ agbede, todu kʼi we etale ago ofo, ku ma we eli anyo̩-wñ.
Oñ ma ko ma wa jʼugbo ku ma do̩ Harmage̩do̩n alu Hibru.
Tak e-e̩kebie mʼucha-wñ du darʼoj afu ki aju-i; oñ omuko̩la lile kwʼunyi O̩jo̩ ejefu ugbo ede le̩ dufu, i kakini, I lewache me̩.
Tak o̩mamanya kpʼomuko̩la kpʼakpabana kpʼane̩ emiejo nana wache e-kʼe̩go̩-wñ ma wache akwihi kʼamone̩ wa jʼane̩ ile̩-i mama ta n, abe̩le̩ oñ unana ane̩ emiejo le̩ de̩.
Tak ewo lile le̩ mukpe̩ rʼe̩ta, ewo ewo abo uche̩ichi ño̩ mugulo̩ wane̩. Oñ ma dibete̩ Babilo̩n lile le̩ o̩gba O̩jo̩, ku ma dʼago omi achiwebe̩te̩ma e-e̩do̩fulu e-uwe̩do̩-wñ ñw u.
Tak ala ala du ra le, ma ño̩ li uwo ge̩ n.
Tak okuto̩mo̩jo̩cha lile, gwo̩ru kwʼefojale wa bʼone̩ ma, oka-wñ tʼoj adu le pe̩, oñ amone̩ kwochakpabie̩ O̩jo̩, tod uchobi e-okuto̩mo̩jo̩cha le̩, todu uchobi-wñ la nana tabale.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka kwef amonuche̩ mebie ku ma nʼucha mebie le̩ lewa ko̩la ñw mi kakini, Lewa, nadʼudu ku ma bu ñw ajo̩ko̩ lile le̩ ñʼuwe̩, owñ chʼe-ki gugu ej omi wewe le̩,
e-kʼamonu ane̩ ile̩ bʼo̩ chʼabutabu kʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma abutabu-wñ la mʼabo ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩ dab o̩te̩.
Tak i mʼumi du kwʼo̩mo̩ ef Afu tef aje̩tachi, oñ u li onobule̩ kʼi gugu oj e̩la ekpikpa, odu achakpabie̩ che̩ko̩-wñ, i nʼoji mebie kpʼigba me̩gwa.

Oñ onobule̩ le̩ dʼe̩wñ odufa ekpikpa kpʼe̩wñ ekpikpa bʼo̩la-wñ ma, oñ i nʼo̩jamalia kpʼokuta akoko kpai pure̩l chʼo̩ñwe̩nyʼo̩la-wñ, i nʼago o̩jamalia ef o̩wo̩-wñ, i cheko̩ ñw e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ abutabu-wñ ki ma de̩hiolo n le̩;
odu afiliʼka la che̩ko̩ tʼo̩gboji-wñ, kakini, BABILO̩N E-LILE, IYE AME̩NABUTABU KPʼE̩WÑ IHIE̩NE̩ ANE̩ ILE̩ DE̩.
Oñ u li onobule̩ le̩ abu kʼe̩bie̩ abo kiafo̩ kpʼe̩bie̩ ame̩nibenu Jisusi fʼu mu.
Tak onuche̩ le̩ ka ñw mi kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ yaye? Nakʼoji afili onobule̩ kpʼe-e̩la ki nʼoji mebie kpʼigba me̩gwa kʼi tanʼo le̩ ñw e̩.

E̩la kʼe̩ li le̩ do̩mo̩ akwoubi, i la de̩ abajo̩-i n, i muda ache kʼi te̩gu kwʼef o̩loulu wa kʼi anyʼef ulenyo̩. Tak abo ku ma dodo ane̩ ile̩ ku ma ma kʼodu-ma rʼef ubuku e-iñmi akwʼe̩gba ku ma kpʼe̩re̩ ile̩ n ayaye, abu ku ma li e̩la le̩ ka kʼi do̩mo̩ akwoubi, i la de̩ abajo̩-i n, kʼi ñʼawa ge̩.
Ibe ki nʼofili de̩-i. Oji mebie le chʼuwo mebie, ugbo kʼonobule̩ le̩ gugu oji-wñ:
Onu mebie laño̩ do̩mo̩ ge̩, e̩lu ef uma lewane̩ me̩, oka do̩mo̩ fa-i, e-omune̩ le̩ la wa ta n; oñ e̩gba du kʼi lewa ukpo̩kpe̩-wñ achʼo̩re tila.
Tak ela ki do̩mo̩ akwoubi kʼi ma la de̩ abajo̩-i n, cwñ ño̩ chʼe̩ke̩jo̩-ma, i la chʼe̩re̩ʼka kpʼama mebie le̩, i lañʼanyʼef ulenyo̩.
Oñ igba me̩gwa kʼe̩ li le̩ ño̩ chʼamonu me̩gwa ku ma ma gba o̩fe̩ ojane̩ ta n; ma muda agba o̩da dabe̩ne̩ kʼamonu manyʼe̩la le̩ auwaʼka.
Ibe abo-i chʼoka, oñ ma akʼukpahiu-ma kpʼo̩da-ma ñw e̩la le̩.
Abo-i akʼogu bʼO̩mala le̩, tak O̩mala le̩ afʼuma du todabu kʼowñ chʼOndu amodu kpʼOnu amonu, abo ku ma la jʼugbo-wñ chʼabo ku ma do̩ kpʼabo ku ma chi kpʼabo ku ma chubi-wñ.
Tak i ka ñw mi kakini, Omiofo kʼe̩ li ugbo kʼajo̩ko̩ gugu le̩ chʼamone̩ kpʼo̩wo̩ amone̩, kpʼabo uche̩ichi, kpʼalu ichi ichi.
Oñ igba me̩gwa kpʼe̩la kʼe̩ li le̩, abo-i achulaka ajo̩ko̩ le̩ oñ ma achʼo kʼi mud alache̩ kpʼe̩nago̩fo, oñ ma akʼo̩re̩la-wñ je̩, taku ina anʼuna fʼowñ onugo lie,
todu O̩jo̩ dʼibe kʼi ñwa tef e̩do̩-ma kʼibe e-ma ki tʼoka, ku ma ki kʼojane̩-ma ñw e̩la le̩ gbogbo wʼe̩gba kʼo̩la kʼO̩jo̩ ka akpoji.
Oñ onobule̩ e-kʼe̩ li le̩, chʼewo elile le̩, e-kʼamonu ane̩ ile̩ jʼef o̩da onu-wñ.
Anubi e̩wñ-i u li onuche̩ omune̩ kʼi agwo̩ru kwʼefojale, i chenʼo̩da nana; oñ ane̩ ile̩ mune̩ pee ef oji-ma-wñ.
Oñ i nʼomu ki gbo̩ka kwa kakini,
todabu kʼabo uche̩ichi du fʼo̩te̩ wain e-e̩do̩fulu abutabu-wñ che ñmo̩ me̩,
Tak u gbʼomuko̩la omune̩ kʼi aka kwʼefojale kakini,
todabu kʼadure-wñ nʼe̩dʼomune̩ gbogbo kad efojale,
Alu kʼi ko ñw one̩ me̩ ko ñw u koji,
Alu du kʼi dojima ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi laño̩ gugu ali ura,
Lef e-kide̩ oñ uchobi-wñ awa o̩jo̩ʼkate,
Tak amonu ane̩ ile̩ ku ma bʼo̩ chʼabutabu ku ma ño̩ gugu ali ura kpʼowñ araku ma la akʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩ tod owñ, owñ chʼe̩gba ku ma li odudu ejo-wñ,
ma adago jʼo̩najiji tod ailo uwa-wñ akakini,
Oñ amachinyama ane̩ ile̩ araku ma la adaido̩ tod owñ, todabu kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ñʼala e̩wñ aja-ma ge̩ n;

adu e̩wñ aja-ma chʼo̩jamalia kpʼajifa kpʼokuta akoko kpai pure̩l kpʼukpo line̩n ki nyo̩ kpʼe-odufa ekpikpa kpʼisiliki, kpʼekpikpa, kpʼoli taine chaka, kpʼe̩wñ eku du ku ma nʼenyi adagba che, kpʼe̩wñ eku du ku ma nʼoli o̩me̩me̩le̩ che, kpʼe-udo̩ kpʼe-ebije, kpʼe-marbe̩l

kpai sinamo̩n kpʼe̩wñ ido̩ro̩ kpʼotulale kpʼekpo ku ma du kurʼo̩la kpai frankinse̩ns kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpʼekpo kpʼomu te̩ke̩ te̩ke̩ kpʼo̩ka wit kpʼamokuno̩ kpʼamala, kpʼamanya, kpʼo̩ko̩ kʼanya afo̩ kpʼaño̩la one̩, kpʼamonugo amone̩.
Oñ e̩ro kʼonugo-we̩ che̩ño̩-wñ le̩ kwo bʼuwe̩ te̩ me̩,
Abo ku ma chinyama e̩wñ-i ku ma mud anana lugbo-wñ adago o̩najiji tod ailo uwa-wñ ku ma ra, ma ajʼaraku kpʼaido̩ eda,
ma akakini,
Todu auwa okate oñ e̩wñ anana abe̩-i mud alache̩-i.
oñ abu ku ma li odudu ejo-wñ, ma kwa kakini, E̩wñ dab ewo inaina-i?
Taku ma fʼebutu gba nyʼo̩la-ma oji oñ ma kwukwa, ma raku, ma daido̩, ma kakini,
Me̩ nagwoguyo̩ rʼowñ oji, uwe̩ efojale
Tak onuche̩ʼka ki gbiñmi mʼokuta ki dab okuta une̩wñ lile du, oñ i mʼu durikpolo tef ohimini, i kakini,
Oñ i nugbo du ku ma ñʼagbo̩ omuko̩la abo ku ma nʼumolo,
I la nugbo du kʼugane̩ agege atejugede ef uwe̩ ge̩ n;
Oñ ma ño̩ fʼe̩bie̩ amakache̩ kpʼe-abo kiafo̩
Ubi e̩wñ-i u gbo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼomuko̩la o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile dʼef efojale aka nana kakini,
todabu kʼajo̩-wñ kʼi aka chʼochochi i ño̩ chʼo̩kpakpa;
Taku ma ka onu ekeji kakini,
Tak abogijo ogu nyoke me̩le̩ kpʼame̩wñiñmi me̩le̩ le̩ lewane̩ adojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ki gugu oj ede le̩ kakini,
Tak omuko̩la kwef ede le̩ dufu kakini,
Tak u gbo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼomuko̩la o̩wo̩-amone̩ lile, kpai dabe̩ne̩ kʼomuko̩la omi ki wewe, kpai dabe̩ne̩ kʼomuko̩la akpabana ki gboka aka kakini,
A ki nayo̩, a ki nagwoguyo̩ a ki namʼojima du ñw u:
Oñ ma du ñw u kʼi nʼukpo line̩n ki nyo̩ ki afane̩, kʼi de̩hiolo bʼo̩la ma:
Tak i ka ñw mi kakini, Ko̩ kakini, Abo ku ma do̩ wʼugbo uje̩wñ O̩mala le̩ gbede. Tak i ka ñw mi kakini, o̩lO̩jo̩ e-ochochi de̩-i.

Tak u lewane̩ o̩gba e̩re̩-wñ kʼu dojikane̩ ñw u. Tak i ka ñw mi kakini, Nago e̩ ki che n: omi chʼe̩ne̩ kʼomi kpʼuwe̩ kpʼamo̩maye-we̩ ku ma nʼo̩la ibenu Jisus chʼadu, e̩ ki dojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩. Todu afu ache̩ ku ma ka le̩ chʼo̩la ibenu e-Jisus.
Tak u li abu ku ma mʼefojale chite̩, e̩ la go, anya efufu kpʼe̩ne̩ ki gugu oji-wñ, e-ku ma do̩ kʼE̩nuke̩do̩no ogbolo kpʼE̩nochochi; oñ ajo̩-wñ kʼi aka kpʼogu kʼi aja chʼo̩kpakpa.
Eju-wñ la chʼo̩go̩ una, ukata onu wewe la jʼoji-wñ; i chenʼodu ku ma ko̩ e-kʼe̩ne̩ du ma ma n chai owñ o̩to̩to̩la-wñ.
Otogbo ku ma nyi ef e̩bie̩ dʼo̩la-wñ; ma la dʼodu-wñ ko̩ o̩lO̩jo̩.
Oñ amiso̩ja ku ma jʼefojale tanʼoj anya efufu rʼo̩ ubi, ukpo line̩n efufu ki de̩hiolo bʼo̩la-ma ma.

O̩kwo̩chageli ki ale̩ eju meji la nadufu kwef alu-wñ, todu kʼi nʼe-le̩ gwo abo uche̩ichi da: oñ i anʼo̩kpa ebije adide ma. Owñ la ate̩ ef aguo̩ko̩lo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma e-e̩do̩fulu e-uwe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ Odobao̩gagu.
Oñ i chenʼodu ki che̩ko̩ o̩lʼotogbo-wñ kpʼoj uta-wñ kakini, Onu amonu, kpai Ondu amodu.
Tak u li onuche̩ʼka kʼi dago ef olu; oñ i nʼomuko̩la lile kwa aka ñw ame̩we̩ du ku ma awu alumeji ojale-i, kakini, Me̩ lewa, me̩ kʼo̩la-me̩ wa jʼugbo uje̩wñ lile e-O̩jo̩-i,
todu kʼame̩ ki je̩ o̩re̩la amonu kpʼo̩re̩la amonu ogu, kpʼo̩re̩la amagbiti kpʼo̩re̩la amanya, kpʼabo ku ma tanʼoji-ma, kpʼo̩re̩la e̩ne̩ du, tʼe-o̩mone̩, tʼe-ki chʼadu, tʼekekele, tʼe-lile.
Tak u li e̩la le̩ kpʼamonu ane̩-ile̩ kpʼamisoja-ma, abu ku ma wajo̩ ku ma kogu bʼe̩ne̩ kʼi gugu oj anya le̩ kpʼamisoja-wñ.

Taku ma fʼe̩la le̩ mu kpʼakache̩ olemi manyʼu, owñ chʼe-ki che ujiwe eju-wñ le̩, e-kʼi ne̩ ko abo ku ma mʼina e̩la le̩ gba la, kpʼabo ku ma dojikane̩ ñw ojibo-wñ, oñ ma kʼudeju abo le̩ meji rikpolo tef odudu e-una ki nʼitolu ajo le̩.
Taku ma nʼo̩kwo̩chageli ki adufu kwef alu e̩ne̩ ki gugu oj anya le̩ fʼabo ki bo̩ kpa. Efu ame̩we̩ chaka la ko̩ ñw o̩re̩la-ma.
Tak u li onuche̩ kʼi agwo̩ru kwʼefojale awa, inʼomigede o̩lo̩ulu kpʼigbaligba lile ef o̩wo̩-wñ.
I la gwo̩nyu Dragon, owñ chʼejo e-igbele le̩, kʼi chʼAbulumone̩ kpai Setan, oñ i fʼu ji,

i la mʼu du rikpolo tef o̩lo̩ulu oñ i fʼu re tʼo̩mo̩ o̩do̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩, i la fʼoji-wñ ate̩ hiuko̩, todu kʼi ñʼako abo uche̩ichi la nyo̩gba ge̩ n, gbogbo tak o̩do̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ le̩ jo̩: ubi le̩ ma atʼu tane̩ chuu kʼi kpo̩kpe̩ pe̩.

Tak u li ede ki jo̩ kpʼabo ku ma gugu oji-wñ, ku ma mʼajo le̩ du ñwu ma ku ma ka, kpʼamonugo one̩ ku ma kʼoji-ma da tod o̩la ibenu Jisus kpai todu o̩lO̩jo̩, kpʼabo ku ma ma dojikane̩ ñw e̩la le̩ abe̩k ojibo-wñ n, ku ma ma gba ina-wñ o̩gboji-ma abe̩k ugbo o̩wo̩ ma n; taku ma deju, ma ño̩ bʼo̩ Kraist jʼonu o̩do̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ le̩.
Udajikwane̩ e-ejodudu le̩ de̩. Abo uku ki bo̩ la adeju n gbogbo tak o̩do̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko le̩ jo̩.
E̩ne̩ ki nʼukpe̩ ef udajikwane̩ e-ejodudu le̩ gbede, i afo̩, uku ekeji ñʼa nʼo̩da ugbo abo-i ge̩ n; ma muda achʼamatama e-O̩jo̩ kpʼe-Kraist, ma la abʼo̩ jʼonu o̩do̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩.
Oñ e̩gba du kʼo̩do̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ le̩ jo̩, ma atu Setan tane̩ kwef unyi-uga-wñ le̩,
tak i adufu wa kʼi ko abo uche̩ichi ku ma jo̩ o̩go̩go̩ me̩le̩ ane̩-ile̩ la, owñ che Go̩g kpai Mago̩g kʼi ko ma wʼugbo ogu; aluka-ma dab e̩lanyi ohimini.
Taku ma mute̩gu bʼunula ane̩-ile̩-i ma, oñ ma kwo donyʼala e-abo kiafo̩ kpʼewo ku ma la fe̩do̩ uwñ le̩; tak una gwo̩ru kwʼefojale ugbo O̩jo̩ wa, oñ i fʼuma lie̩.
Taku ma mʼAbulumone̩ ki ko ma la du rikpolo tef ubu-una kpʼitolu, ugbo kʼe̩la kpʼakache̩ olemi jo̩ le̩; oñ ma ali uwa o̩ro̩-ka kpai odu ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa.
Tak u li ede efufu lile kpʼe̩ne̩ ki gugu oji-wñ, e-kʼane̩-ile̩ kpʼefojale ra bʼeju-wñ te̩; ma ño̩ li uña todu ma ge̩ n.

Tak u li abo ki ku, tʼab e-lile tʼabo e-kekele, ku ma dago jʼo̩gba ede le̩; taku ma mʼibuku ibuku chi; oñ ma ño̩ mʼibuku omune̩ kʼi chʼe-iñmi chi ge̩. Taku ma fʼajo̩ abo ki ku ka kwef e̩wñ ki che̩ko̩ ref ibuku ibuku le̩ teju alu kʼuko̩lo̩-ma de̩.
Ohimini la kʼabo ki ku ku ma jʼef uwñ dufu: oñ uku kpʼo̩jegu kʼabo ki ku ku ma jʼef uwñ dufu, taku ma fʼajo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ka teju alu kʼuko̩lo̩-wñ de̩.
Taku ma mʼuku kpʼo̩jegu ko rikpolo tef ubu e-una.
Uku ekeji le̩ de̩, owñ chʼubu e-una-i. I la che̩wñ ku ma li e̩ne̩ du kʼi ma che̩ko̩ tefu ibuku e-iñmi n, ma mʼu du rikpolo tef ubu e-una le̩.
Tak u li efojale e-etito̩ kpʼane̩-ile̩ e-etito̩: todu efojale e-ejodudu kpʼane̩-ile̩ e-ejodudu le̩ lale rinyo̩ me̩; ohimini laño̩ do̩mo̩ ge̩ n.
Tak u li ewo kiafo̩ le̩, owñ che Je̩rusale̩m etito̩, ki agwo̩ru kwʼefojale kwugbo O̩jo̩ wa, o̩la-wñ chʼe̩ñwo̩che te̩ dabu o̩ya etito̩ ki chʼijaga ñw o̩ko̩-wñ.
Tak u gbo̩ omuko̩la elile kwʼefojale i kakini, Me̩ go, ebu O̩jo̩ dugbo amone̩, i la age̩ne̩ kpʼama, oñ ma achʼamone̩-wñ, O̩jo̩ onugo la adʼugbo ma kʼi chʼO̩jo̩-ma,
i la ali omi aku du bʼuma eju te̩; uku ñʼa do̩mo̩ ge̩ n; abe̩k edaido̩, abe̩k akuero̩, abe̩k iwo̩ ado̩mo̩ ge̩ n; e̩wñ ejodudu le̩ lale rinyo̩ me̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ ki gugu oj ede le̩ kakini, E̩ go, nache e̩wñ du etito̩. Tak i kakini, E̩ nako̩, kakini, o̩la-i chʼuke̩do̩no ogbolo i ño̩ chʼochochi.
Tak i ka ñw mi, kakini, I wache me̩. Omi chʼAlfa kpʼO̩me̩ga, Uchane̩ kpai ubi-otitala. Nadʼomi kwef e̩bi-omie-iñmi ñw e̩ne̩ kʼolugbe̩ akpʼo̩ ele ofo.
E̩ne̩ ki du aje̩ e̩wñ-i ogu, oñ nachʼO̩jo̩ ñw owñ, tak owñ acho̩ma ñw mi.

I la chʼe-amachokpo, kpʼabo ku ma ko ke̩do̩no, kpʼabo ihie̩ne̩, kpʼamakpone̩, kpʼame̩-nabutabu, kpʼamachobochi, kpʼamachode, kpʼamaremi chaka, ukpe̩ e-ma chʼef ubu ki ajo una kpai itolu; e-le̩ chʼuku ekeji.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka kwef amonuche̩ mebie e-ku ma nʼucha mebie kʼuchobi e-otitala che̩ko̩-wñ lewa ugbo mi; oñ i ko̩la ñw mi kakini, Lewa, nadʼo̩ya etito̩ kʼi chʼo̩ya O̩mala le̩ ñʼuwe̩.
Tak i mʼumi du ef Afu alo tʼoj uwo elile ki gbo̩gba, oñ i du Je̩rusale̩m ewo kiafo̩ le̩ ña mi, abu ki agwo̩ru kwʼefojale ugbo O̩jo̩ wa,
i nʼojima e-O̩jo̩: ugane̩-wñ la dab okuta akoko o̩me̩me̩le̩, i dab okuta jaspe̩r ki de̩ yaala dabu kristal:
i nʼaku elile ki gbo̩gba; i nʼalaku me̩gweji, amonuche̩ me̩gweji jʼalaku-wñ le̩; oñ odu amo̩lo̩pu me̩gweji e-amo̩ma Israe̩l che̩ko̩ nyʼo̩la-wñ.
Alaku me̩ta jʼo̩wo̩ olodudu; alaku me̩ta la jʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩; alaku me̩ta la jʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩; alaku me̩ta la jʼo̩wo̩ olane̩.
Oñ aku ewo le̩ che̩nʼe̩rane̩ me̩gweji, oñ odu me̩gweji e-ame̩nukpuche̩ me̩gweji e-O̩mala le̩ jʼo̩la-wñ.
Oñ e̩ne̩ ki ako̩la ñw mi le̩ nʼikpo uñwe̩wñ o̩jamalia todu kʼi ne̩ ñwa ewo le̩, kpʼalaku-wñ kpʼo̩do̩-wñ.
Oñ ewo le̩ te̩ o̩go̩go̩ me̩le̩, ujiji-wñ la chokujo̩ kpʼunula-wñ: tak i nʼikpo le̩ ñwa ewo le̩, ujiji-wñ chʼimele ogu me̩lu chi kwef icham meji: ujiji-wñ kpʼunula-wñ kpʼo̩gba-wñ chʼokujo̩.
Tak i fʼo̩do̩-wñ ñwa, i chʼohibo̩wo̩ o̩gbo̩ mebie nyoke me̩le̩, e̩ñwa one̩ i che, e-le̩ chʼe-onuche̩.
Oñ ma du okuta jasper ne aku-wñ; ewo-wñ la chʼajamalia ki de̩ hiolo, dab egigo yaala.
Ma nʼokuta akoko du chʼo̩ñwe̩nyʼe̩rane̩ ewo le̩. E̩rane̩-wñ ejodudu che jaspe̩r; ekeji che safaie̩r; e̩ke̩ta che kaisidoni; e̩ke̩le̩ che e̩me̩rald;
e̩ke̩lu che sardoniks; e̩ke̩fa che sardius; ekebie che kriso̩lait; e̩ke̩jo̩ che be̩re̩l; e̩ke̩la che topas; e̩ke̩gwa che krisofras; e̩ke̩gwaka che jesint; e̩ke̩gweji che ame̩tis.
Oñ e̩wñ ku ma du rʼalaku me̩gweji le̩ che pure̩l me̩gweji; alaku-wñ oka oka le̩ ne̩ pure̩l oka. Ejʼo̩na ewo le̩ chʼo̩jamalia ki de̩ hiolo, dabe̩ne̩ kʼegigo ki de̩ yaala.
U ño̩ li unyi O̩jo̩ ejefu ef uwñ n: todu Ondu O̩jo̩ Odobao̩gagu kpʼO̩mala le̩ chʼunyi-O̩jo̩-ejefu-wñ.
Eku olu abe̩k ochu la aku ewo le̩ ki fu bʼo ma n: todu ojima O̩jo̩ chʼugane̩-wñ, agege-wñ la chʼO̩mala le̩.
Tak abo uche̩ichi atale ef ugane̩-wñ; oñ amonu ane̩-ile̩ akʼojima-ma wʼef uwñ.
I la nugbo du kʼalaku are o̩ro̩ka n, (todu odu ade̩ o̩mo̩ n):
oñ ma akʼojima kpʼubumo̩ e-abo uche̩ichi wʼef uwñ.
I la nʼugbo du kʼe̩wñ o̩ja ofo kpʼe̩ne̩ ki ache e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ kpʼe̩wñ olemi agudu wʼef uwñ n, chai abo ku ma che̩ko̩ rʼef ibuku e-iñmi e-O̩mala le̩ kate.
Tak i dʼohimini omi e-iñmi ña mi, i afane̩ dabu kristal; i nadufu kwef ede O̩jo̩ kpʼe-O̩mala le̩.
Alumeji o̩na-wñ kpʼej emi kpʼej ano̩mo̩ ohimini le̩ oli e-iñmi kʼi aro e̩ro me̩gweji jo̩, i aro ochu ochu; oñ eñmi oli-wñ chʼutodu ku ma ne̩ fʼo̩ga abo uche̩ichi che.
Ama-ena du ñʼa do̩mo̩ ge̩ n. Ede O̩jo̩ kpʼe-O̩mala la ade̩ ef uwñ. Amadu-wñ la ache e̩wñ ñw u;
ma ali eju-wñ; odu-wñ la adʼo̩gboji-ma.
O̩jo̩ ñʼadu ge̩ n; eku ugane̩ e-agege kpʼugane̩ e-olu aku ma ge̩ n; tod Ondu O̩jo̩ achʼugane̩-ma. Ma la ajʼonu ogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa.
Tak i ka ñw mi kakini, O̩la-i chʼuke̩do̩no ogbolo i ño̩ chʼochochi; oñ Ondu, kʼi chʼO̩jo̩ amafu e-amakache̩ fʼonuche̩-wñ kpe̩ wa kʼi kʼe̩wñ ki awache piopio tila ña amadu-wñ.
Me̩ la go, nawa piopio.
Oñ omi Jo̩n chʼe̩ne̩ ki gbo̩ kpʼe̩ne̩ ki li e̩wñ-i. Tak e̩gba kʼu gbo̩ kʼu ño̩ li, u lewane̩ kʼu dojikane̩ e̩re̩ onuche̩ kʼi ko e̩wñ-i ña mi.
Tak i ka ñw mi kakini, Nago, e̩ ki che n; omi chʼe̩ne̩ kʼomi kpʼuwe̩ kpʼamo̩maye-we̩ ku ma chʼamakache̩, kpʼabo ku ma fejute̩ o̩la e-ibuku-i chʼadu. E̩ dojikane̩ ñw O̩jo̩.
Tak i ka ñw mi kakini, E̩ ki fʼo̩la ache̩ e-ibuku-i hiuko̩ n, todu iko-wñ me̩ro̩wo̩ me̩.
E̩ne̩ ki achʼuji kʼi nache uji-wñ alo waa; e̩ne̩ ki la chʼe̩niwa kʼi nache e̩wñ-iwa alo waa; e̩ne̩ ki la chʼe̩no̩kpakpa kʼi nache e̩wñ-o̩kpakpa alo waa; oñ e̩ne̩ kiafo̩ kʼi nachʼe̩ne̩ kiafo̩ alo waa.
Go, nawa piopio; e̩wñ-uro̩me̩-mi la dʼugbo mi kʼu nadu ñw e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ alu kʼuko̩lo̩-wñ ade̩.
Omi chʼAlfa kpai O̩me̩ga owñ chʼe̩ne̩-ejodudu kpʼe̩ne̩-ubi otitala, kpʼabakwane̩ e̩wñ kpʼukpoji e̩wñ.
Abo ku ma fʼotogbo-ma gwe̩, todu kʼama ki nʼo̩da oli e-iñmi, ku ma ki ñʼa gudu lʼalaku tef ewo le̩ gbede.
Amabia kpʼamachobochi kpʼame̩-nabutabu kpʼamakpone̩ kpʼamachode kpʼe̩ne̩ du ki ache̩do̩ e̩wñ olemi ki laño̩ che jʼo̩do̩da-wñ.
Omi, Jisus, fʼonuche̩-mi kpe̩ wa kʼi gba e̩wñ-i ibenu ñw me̩ tod ujeju ujeju abudo̩-mi. Omi chʼili kpʼe̩pa Defid, kpʼawina kʼi afane̩ odudu le̩.
TʼAfu, tʼo̩ya-etito̩ le̩ kakini, Lewa. E̩ne̩ ki la gbo̩ kʼi nakakini, Lewa, oñ e̩ne̩ kʼolugbe̩ akpʼo̩, kʼi nawa: e̩ne̩ du ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ ki lewa gba omi e-iñmi ele ofofo.
Omi agbibenu ñw e̩ne̩ du ki agbo̩ o̩la ache̩-e-ibuku-i, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du du manyʼu, mak O̩jo̩ akʼuchobi ki che̩ko̩ ef ibuku-i manyu ñw e̩ne̩ le̩;
i la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du muchi kwef o̩la ibuku ache̩-i, mak O̩jo̩ achi ukpe̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ kwugbo oli e-iñmi le̩, kpai kwef ewo kiafo̩ e-kʼo̩la-wñ che̩ko̩ ef ibuku-i.
E̩ne̩ ki gbigbenu e̩wñ-i kakini, I-i; nawa piopio. Ami! lewa, Ondu Jisus.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu Jisus Kraisti ki dugbo abo kiafo̩. Ami.
